Paphibangga, Tingwang niu ting-kadih dam: Kadih hai palun thiumakjiu khatdi wadi hajiu bamniu-e. Kasuakjiu bambo duinai khuan siniu wahinatu gomnam lujiu tamiuting bamniu-e, siga Tingwang pumtan
Siga Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaide, “Kabenbo padmilo” sichiugap kabenbose padmide.
Sise Tingwang paniu ngaoluboga pachun wimide, Sichiujiu paniu tamiubo gasu kabenbo situ kamtam khai bide.
Sichiu paniu kabenbo situ “N-nien” khatdi tamiubo situ, “Nchun” kukhaide. Nchun loijiu nsuan padlanbo situ raithubo tingmik kumide.
Paniu tingpuk situ “Tinggen” kukhaide. Nchun loijiu nsuan padlanbo situ paniabo tingmik kumide.
Sibosai Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaide, “Tingpuk hangga bambo dui hai pabam khatga wang aruang milo, chiujiu rampumgen padmilo” siga sise padmide.
Paniu rampumgen situ “Kadih” khatdi tadui wang aruangbo situ “Duipui” kukhaide. Khatdi Tingwang paniu ngaoboga palung kimde.
Sibosai paniu chamtan pikhaide, “Kadihpiriga singbang, chapiubuan hina padmilo khatdi sise pabuan bonjiu pasy masi milo,” siga sise padmide.
Sijengniu kadihpiri gahai singbang, chapiubuan hina padmide, sise Tingwang paniu ngaoboga palung kim mide.
Nchun loijiu nsuan padmide, sise pasumbo tingmik mide.
Sibosai Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaide, “Tingpuk ga kabenbo hai padmilo, sichiujiu nchun nai n-nien situ njantam padlujiu tingmikdung, tingkumdung maksai pating pawan
sichiujiu paliu siniu tingpuk gasu kadihpiriga pabiuse pikhai milo,” siga sise padmide.
Haichiujiu Tingwang niu di-nkiubo kabenbo nia damkhaijiu naimik siniu n-nientu khatdi chahiu siniu nchuntu mawangra damkhaide; paniu chagandung tudi damkhai bide.
Paniu kadihpiriga kabenbodung siniu pabiu thaokhai raleng tingpukga pibam khaide.
Sichiujiu nchun n-nien saomakjiu mawang bamra, tamiubo gasu kabenbo situ kamtam khaide. Khatdi Tingwang niu ngaoboga palung kimde.
Nchun loijiu nsuan padlande, haise pamadaibo tingmik mide.
Sibosai Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaide, “Taduiga pijiu karingbo khaoringdung siniu phuimilo, khatdi pijiu tingkai gase thingnadungniu phuimilo”.
Sichiujiu Tingwang niu duipui gu kadibo khaoringdung khatdi tadui jiuga lungbo khaoring pajat hina khatdi thingna pajat hinatu damkhaide. Khatdi Tingwang paniu sise ngaoboga palung kim mide.
Paniu paliu mathiutu thoikhaide, sichiujiu tadui jiuga lungbo khaoringdung hinatu king-kajiu duipui gase lungphui mira thoikhai bide, paniu thingnadung hinatudi king-kajiu lungra thoikhai bide.
Nchun loijiu nsuan padmide, sise pamangiubo tingmik mide.
Sibosai Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaide, “Kadihpiriga khaoring-khaona jat hina, chaky-khaorui tadi, nkan khaoring tadi, katidi, kadidi pijiu padmilo” siga sise padmide.
Sichiujiu Tingwang niu wahinatu damkhai lujiu, sise paniu ngaoboga palung kimde.

Panaitu thoikhaijiu din-e, “Nanai kai-kik kengjiu lunglo, sichiujiu nanai kai-kikdung siniu kadihpiri thinjiu lungrabo-e. Iniu nanaitu wakhao hina riga, thingnadung riga khatdi khaoring-khaona hina riga pumtan bamra pikhaibo-e.
Iniu nanaileng alin-tara hina khatdi charasy hina tiura pikhaibo-e.
Chiudi khaoring khaona khatdi thingna hina lengra chapiubuan chaganniwse paliu tatek leng pikhaibo-e” siga sise padmide.
Tingwang paniu damkhaibo hinatu ngaolujiu palung kimchang kim mide, Nchun loijiu nsuan padlande--sise pacharukbo tingmik mide.
Sichiujiu ting-kadih pakhiangna damloi mide.
Paniu chinniabo tingmik situ thoikhaijiu nkiubo tingmik leng kamtam khaide, palamra paniu sibo tingmik gase pagu gandam hina loilujiu mathak mide.
Haichiujiu ting-kadih haitu damkhaide.
Sichiujiu
kadihpiriga chapiubuan wadi lungmak bamniu-e, khatdi alin tara wadi bammak niu-e, palamra paniu pijiu tingriu khai makge, khatdi kadih ga tatien tenra maidi lungmak niu-e.
Chiudi tadui siniu kadih hanglamsu pinpadjiu rampumgen situ pitim khaijiu bamniu-e.
Sigasu
Paniu ngao wibo singbang jat hina damlujiu pasy pimasi khaide. Kareng n-gang gase ringting pikhaibo singbang khat, khatdi ningting kawi kasa sibo
Eden lungga kareng situ tadui kajin khaira singgiu khat piluang khai-e, Eden lenlam sise singgiu madai thiujiu luongra padle.
Karaibo singgiu siniu Pishon giu-e, haisiniu Havilah kadihtu luong magui bamme.
(Masanbo kachia khatdi kakungbo parim wibo wasa, khatdi paman kungbo tudung siga dao-e).
Niabo singgiu siniu Gihon giu-e; Haise Kush
Pasumbo singgiu siniu Tigris giu-e, haise Assyria gu tingbanglam luong bamme, khatdi pamadaibo singgiu siniu Euphrate giuki-e.
Sichiujiu
Paniu pakhuga din-e, “Kareng lungga bambo singbang rasy hina nang tiubo sui-e.
Chiudi ningting kawi kasa sibo, singbang sira tiubo suimakge. Nangniu sibo rasy tiugapbo nai nang shai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu

Sichiujiu paniu kadih gasu taniang khoilujiu chakhao hina khatdi thingna hina damkhaide, sibosai paniu chamaina siniu pazan mathak khaira puiwang khai bide. Sichiujiu paliu mathiu zanse mathak khaide.
Sijengniu thingna hina khatdi chakhao hina zanse chamaina siniu mathak khaide; chiudi paliu ruangga khatniudi paka leng kabuibo daomakge.
Sigasu
Paniu sibo tupekra gasu npuimai khat damlujiu pakhuga patu maluang wang khai bide.
Siga chamaina siniu din-e,
“Kanamboga, haiga ajat khat bamme,
charahse arahga su-e, khatdi tatiase atia gasu-e.
pazanse “Npuimai” chiujiu kurabo-e,
palamra pahai npiumai khugasu padbo-e.”
Maipui nai maipiuse panai pumruang bamniu-e, chiudi panaise mangambo thiumak bamniu-e.
Maipui siniu paokakge, “N-gangga bambo singbang rasyse makjiu, kareng lungga bambo singbang rasy hina anainiu tiubo sui-e.
Sibo singbang rasy tiumakra, maksai niadi nia makra, Tingwang niu anai khuga dinkhai-e; sichiu maksai anai shairabo-e chiu-e.”
Kaniu siniu paokakge, “Sise maji makge, nanai shai lakge.
Tingwang niu sise dinbo rambara, nanainiu uibo rasy tiugap khaisai, nanaidi Tingwang kum mirabo-e, khatdi kawi kasa simi rabo-e, chiubo pah sibo jengniu tiutulo chiubo-e”.

Maipui siniu singbangse dejiukha ngao wilo, parasydi dejiukha tiuwi ralo khatdi ningting misai dejiukha maisuang haralo chiubo maning sude. Sijengniu paniu charasyse railujiu tiusude, khatdi paniu pakina leng kasia pikhaide, sichiujiu padi tiulude.
Panainiu sise tiukhai kaji-kari, panai chun thiupad mide, sichiujiu panaise panai pumruang-e chiubo simide, siga panainiu ndutniw charui lujiu panaitu topman sude.
Sibonai chawanse
Chiudi
Paniu paokakge, “Kareng lungga nang wangkinbo khuan chiuboga, natu pingjiu nbai bambo-e, palamra I hai apumruang bamniu-e.”
Tingwang niu maniu-e, “Nang hai napumruang-e chiubo saoniu nakhuga dinjiulo? Iniu natu tiutulo chiubo rasyse nang tiumi jiuma?”
Maipiu siniu paokakge, “Nangniu akhuga pikhaibo maipui siniu atu pijiu I tiumide.”
Paniu paokakge, “Kaniu siniu atu tiura sonjiu-e.”
Sigasu
Iniu maipui nanai kakga marengbo pikhai rabo-e; pakai-pakik nai nakai-nakik hai tingtheng mikrejiu lung rabo-e. Pakai pakik siniu napi kampang rabo-e, khatdi nangniu paliu phimik machao rabo-e.”

Sichiujiu paniu maipui khuga din-e, “Nangniu nawon phungbo tingga khatdi manabo tingga, magenthiu nkiura Iniu khaisan mide, Sichiujiu bamdi, naluni hina nakina khuga bamrabo-e, khatdi pahangga nang lungrabo-e.”
Iniu chapiuniw nai tathu-kara pilung khaine, sichiujiu nkan piubuan nang tiurabo-e.
Nangniu wahina kampad raleng nakasuangdui padjiu, natu damkhaibo taniang gase malanwang makthen matan rabo-e, Natu taniang gasu damkhaibo-e, siniu nang taniang mawilan rabo-e.”
Adam
Sichiujiu
Sichiujiu

Sigasu paniu karenggu tingbanglamse pake machang marijiu bambo taobambo heng thin bambo karingbo wakhao khat situ khai mide. Sichiu kambo sira, sibo ringting pikhaibo singbang mungga mai khattudi pijiu wang manamak raleng-e.
Sichiujiu Adam niu panao Eve tu nphiuji khaide, siga pah pawon phung mide. Paniu panah npiumai khat manalujiu din-e, “
Pasai paniu npiumai nah khat, Abel tu lunglan-e. Abel niu mily khuanmai khat thiukhang-e, khatdi Cain niu chalu tien thiumai khat thiukhang-e.
Wathengkha sai Cain niu palu atiat lubo gasu miusy phungwang
Sigasu Abel niu pagu piangraithubo mily khattu kamshat lujiu withubo damse kadkhai-e.
Chiudi Cain tu khatdi pagu kadkhaibo situ lukhai makge. Siga Cain palung pomchang pom mide, chiujiu palung pomboniu pazu mangtik mide.
Siga
Nangniu majibose kamkhai bamsai, nang nuibam rabo-e,
Paniu paokakge, “I simakge, Iniu asaikariupiutu alukin jiuma?”
Nang tasiang hangga bam mide, nang wadaodi tatien tentiu silak mide. Nangniu nasai kariupiutu kamshat mibo jengniu, haise pazainiu chungkham mide.
Nangniu alin-tara lingkhai bamdi kadih-tam siniu wadi lungpad ngamlak mide, kadihpiriga naky hajiu rontadjiu lungra mide.”
Siga Cain niu
Nangniu atu nakhu gasu khatdi haibo kadih gasu hathon mide. Kadihpiriga aky hajiu Iniu rontad kinsai, atu kadaomai siniu kamshat mirabo-e.”
Chiudi
Sichiujiu Cain niu
Cain nai panaoniu panai nah npiumai khat lung-e, pazanniu Enoch chiu ku-e. Siga Cain niu namdi khat thiukhang lujiu, sise panah zan champonjiu mathak khai-e.
Enoch niu piumai nah khat lung-e, pazanniu Irad chiujiu mathak khai-e, pahai Mahujael piu-e, khatdi Mahujael niu piumai nah khat lung-e, pazanniu Mathushael chiujiu mathak khai-e, pahai Lamech piu-e,
Lamech niu panao nia thiu-e,, panai zan siniu Adah nai Zillah chiu-e.
Adah niu Jabal tu mana-e, pahai chakhao maruijiu mathenkyga lungmai paopeh si-e.
Pasaikariupiu Jubal hainiu chalui kathiumai khatdi nthiam nai tara thinmai paopeh si-e.
Zillah niu Tubal Cain tu mana-e, pahai chagi khatdi tanaagi gasu wa mania hina kampadbo piu-e. Tubal Cain tanpui khat bam-e, pazanniu Naamah chiu ku-e
Lamech niu panao kania khuga din-e,
Adah nai Zillah yo, alad nkinglo,
Iniu akhangmai khattu kamshat mide,
palamra paniu atu dapbo gasu-e.
Cain tu kamshatboga khang chinniatu kamshatne chiusai,
atu kamshat maitura khang riakchinnia-je-chinniakiu kamshat rabo-e,.
Adam nai panao siniu npiumai nah khat lung lan-e. Siga paniu din-e, “Cain niu kamshat mibo sung Tingwang niu aleng npiumai nah khat pikhai lande.” Sichiujiu paniu patu Seth
Seth niu npiumai nah khat lung-e, paniu pazan Enosh chiu mathak khai-e. Haichiujiu chamaina hainiu
Paniu npiumai khatdi npuimaitu damkhai-e, sichiujiu panaitu thoikhaijiu “Chamaina” chiujiu kukhaide).
Adam niu tingkum 130 tangmiboga, pakumbo npiumai nah khat lung-e, paniu Seth chiujiu pazan mathak khai-e.
Sibosai, Adam hai tingkum 800 lung lan-e. Panah kakibodungdi lungkhai-e.
Sichiujiu pah tingkum 930 ga shai mide.
Sichiujiu Seth niu tingkum 105 miboga, piumai nah khat, Enosh tu lung-e.
Sibosai pah tingkum 807 lungkhai-e. Panah kakibodungdi lungkhai lan-e,
sichiujiu pah tingkum 912 ga shai mide.
Enosh niu tingkum 90 miboga, piumai nah khat, Kenan tu lung-e,
sibosai pah tingkum 815 lungkhai-e, panah kakibodungdi lungkhai lan-e,
sichiujiu pah tingkum 905 ga shai mide.
Kenan niu tingkum 70 miboga, piumai nah khat, Mahalalel tu lung-e,
sibosai pah tingkum 840 lungkhai-e, panah kakibodungdi lungkhai lan-e,
sichiujiu pah tingkum 910 ga shai mide.
Mahalalel niu tingkum 65 miboga, piumai nah khat Jared tu lung-e,
sibosai pah tingkum 830 lungkhai-e, panah kakibodungdi lungkhai lan-e,
sichiujiu pah tingkum 895 ga shai mide.
Jared niu tingkum 162 miboga, piumai nah khat, Enoch tu lung-e,
sibosai pah tingkum 800 lungkhai-e, panah kakibodungdi lungkhai lan-e,
sichiujiu pah tingkum 962 ga shai mide.
Enoch niu tingkum 65 miboga, piumai nah khat, Methuselah tu lung-e,
Sibosai, Enoch niu Tingwang tu maluang akadjiu tingkum 300 lungkhai-e, panah kakibodungdi lungkhai-e.
Pah tingkum 365 lungkhai-e.
Paniu Tingwang tu maluang akadjiu lung-e, sichiujiu patu ngaota mide, palamra Tingwang niu patu lutad mide.
Methuselah niu tingkum 187 miboga, piumai nah khat, Lamech tu lung-e,
sibosai pah tingkum 782 lungkhai-e, panah kakibodungdi lungkhai lan-e,
sichiujiu pah tingkum 969 ga shai mide.
Lamech niu tingkum 182 miboga, piumai nah khat lung-e,
sichiujiu paniu din-e, “
Sibosai, Lamech niu tingkum 595 lungkhai-e, panah kakibodungdi lungkhai lan-e,
sichiujiu pah tingkum 777 ga shai mide.
Noah niu tingkum 500 mibo saiga, panah piumai khang sum, Shem, Ham, khatdi Japheth tu lung-e.
chara nahdung
Siga

Sibo tingga khatdi sibo saiga, kadihpiriga lungkamai thiujiu maipuidung nai chara nahdung maluang lungkhaibo nahdung kengjiu lungpadde. Paliu hai nda katan-kahumai khatdi pazan katadmai thiujiu lungkhai mibo-e.
paniu paliutu damkhai lujiu kadihpiriga pilung khaibo jengniu palungmak mide. Palung makju mibo jengniu,
paniu din-e, “Iniu damkhai mibo chamaina khatdi chakhao thingna hinatu kam maha mine, palamra Iniu paliutu damkhaibo jengniu alung chariu mide.”
Chiudi
chiudi mai hina Tingwang masuangga sakam bamniu-e, khatdi pabam hinaga kasabo siniu phuibam niu-e.
Tingwang niu kadihpiri haitu phuikiuboga kasabo haitu ngaode, palamra chamaina hina kasabo lunlungga lungkam mide.
Tingwang niu Noah khuga din-e, “Iniu chamaina haitu kam mahamira alung chap mide. Iniu paliu mathiutu kam mahakam mine, palamra paliugu n-gi-athaobo ngamkam siniu kadihpiri pakhiangna phuimide.
Tasing kawibo gasu naleng malee khat ruisulo; sibo lungga pachen-chen kam khailo, sichiujiu palung lamdi, palen lamdi kaliangtamniu taimilo.
Sise pathenniu gaphek 133, padetniu gaphek 22, khatdi pakodniu gaphek 13 kamlo.
Malee lung gase paliap khat kamlujiu singgen
Iniu duidet langwangjiu kadihpiriga bambo hinatu kam maha mine. Kadihpiriga bambo hina shaikam mine,
chiudi Iniu nakhuga ladriat thiukhai bine. Nanao, nanahmai khatdi paliu naodungtu puilujiu malee lung gase ngut milo.
Sichiujiu malee lung gase thingna, chakhao hinagu papui, pareng khat khat jam khailulo.
Naleng khatdi paliuleng katiu-kasak hina khailulo.”
Tingwang niu dinbo kumjiu Noah niu wahina kam khaide.
Chara-chengga masanbo khaoring hina ndah chinnia, chiudi masan makbo khaoringra ndah khat khailulo.
Thingna hinadi ndah chinnia khailulo. Kadihpiriga pi lungpad lanra jengniu khaoring hina khatdi thingnatu haichiu kam lulo.
Tuhoi gasu jeng chinnia sailam, Iniu nchun n-nien saomakjiu jeng atai tingriu langwang khaine, sichiujiu Iniu damkhai mibo khaoring-khaona hinatu kam maha mine.”
Sichiujiu
Kadihpiriga tadui diwangbo tingga Noah hai tingkum kai charuk tangmide.
Panao panai, khatdi panahmaidung nai pamumaidung paliu duidet situ marira malee lungga ngut mide.
Khaoring hina khatdi thingna hina, chara-chengga masanbodi, masan makbodi tammakjiu,
malee lung gase Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu Noah saisui ngut mide.
Jeng chinnia saiga duidetse wangsude.
nchun n-nien saomakjiu jeng atai kadihpiriga tingriu kiu sude.
Sibo nai siak Noah niu panao khatdi panahmai khang sum, Shem, Ham khatdi Japheth khatdi paliu naodungtu majang lujiu malee lungga ngut mide.
Sichiujiu chaky-khaodi, nkan-khaodi, kati kadi tammakjiu, khatdi thingna hinatu paliuniu majang ngut mide.
Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaibo saisuijiu malee lung gase karingbo khaoring hina, papui pareng khat khat Noah saisui lujiu ngut mide.
Sibosai
Tadui naibo hai jeng atai khangmide, sichiujiu maleese maten khangra tadui hai kusui mide.
Tadui hai kubi-bi khangjiu malee hai malam khangsude.
Tadui hai kengkhangjiu kuthubo maluong sidi naimide;
haise kukhangjiu maluongton riga tachao kariu-je-mangiukiu tangbo kukhang mide.
Kadihpiriga bambo khaoring hina—thingna, chakhao khatdi chamaina hina shai mide.
Kadihpiriga bambo pasiu kathi hina shai mide.
niu kadihpiriga bambo khaoring-khaona—chakhao, chamai khatdi thingna hinatu kam maha kammide. Masiak khaibo sira Noah khatdi pasai suilujiu malee lungga ngutmai ronna-e.
Naimikpui kai khat-je-ringiu lungga tadui hai npikiu makge.
Malee lungga bambo Noah khatdi pasai suikinbo khaoringdungtu Tingwang niu mangai makge; Paniu tingkai tu hunra kamkhaijiu tadui hai npikiu sude.
Kadihpiriga bambo aladky khatdi tingpukga bambo duidet tingriuki hina kham mide. Siga tingriu tamide,
sichiujiu tadui hai naimikpui kai khat-je-ringiu lungga npibi-bi mide.
Chahiu chinniabogu tingmik kariu-je-chiniakiubo nai maleese Ararat Luongga kiujiu nbeng khai mide.
Tadui hai npikiujiu chahiu kariubogu raithubo naise maluanggen ngaopad sude.
Jeng atai sai Noah niu kiranki khat lepadde khatdi n-gek khattu langkhaide.
Haise wanglan makge, chiudi tadui hai npikiu makthen len maguijiu bammide.
Sibo lungga, Noah niu tadui npikiu mima chiubo phuira, makhao khattu langkhai-e,
chiudi tadui hainiu phuiting bamkhabo jengniu, makhaose taokhaira hajiu, malee gase lenwang lanne. Sichiujiu Noah niu paben henpadjiu minkhai lan-e.
Paniu jeng chinnia saiga, makhao situ langkhai lan-e.
Haisiniu chawan pamun-juangga takiniu karingbo khat ponlujiu pakhuga wang lan-e. Sijengniu tadui hai npikiu mide chiubo Noah niu silude.
Sibosai jeng chinnia saiga paniu makhao situ langkhai lan-e; sigara makhaose malan wang tamide.
Noah niu tingkum 601 tangmiboga, raithubo hiugu raithubo naise, taduise npikiu mide. Noah niu malee gomse lepadjiu phuiboga, kadih hai sangkiu mibose ngaode.
Chahiu niabogu tingmik makai-je-chiniakiubo naise kadih hai sangkang mide.
Tingwang niu Noah khuga din-e,
“Malee lung gasu nanao, nanahpiudung khatdi paliu naodungtu maluang lujiu npad sulo.
Chakhao thingna hinatudi puilujiu npad sulo, sichiujiu kadihpiri pakhiangnaga pijiu lungkingpad karen sulo.”
Sijengniu panao, panahmai khatdi pamupuidungtu Noah niu malee gasu maluang npad mide.
Sichiujiu chakhao thingna hina pajat-jat, paphom-phom thiujiu malee gasu npad kam mide.
Noah niu
Rathakga rukhaibo rimse
Kadihpiriniu bamthen, lingbo wan khatdi atiatbo wan bamrabo-e. Siga ka-agibo nai kathiubo, tathe nai kariak, khatdi nchun nai n-nien chiujiu bamrabo-e.”
Chakhao thingna hinaniu natu pingjiu lungrabo-e. Paliu mathiutu nahangga pikhaibo-e.
Tuhoira nangniu paliutu tiura leng; khatdi chapiubuan chaganniwdi tiura leng; Iniu naleng pikhai mibo-e.
Nangniu tazai kampad makbo misira tiumak rabo-e; Iniu haise suimakge, palamra karingriangse tazaiga bambo-e.
Mai khatniu chamainagu ringting kam mahasai, patu sajai pirabo-e. Wakhao khatniu chamainagu karingting kam mahasai, kashaibo siniu patu sajai pirabo-e.
Chamainatu Tingwang lun kumjiu damkhai mibo-e, siniu mai khat kumboniu mai khattu kamshat sai, patudi mai khatniu kamshat rabo-e.
Tingwang niu Noah nai panahmai khuga din-e,
“Tuhoi Iniu nakhuga khatdi nakai-kikdung khuga,
khatdi malee lung gasu nasaisui npadbo pasiu kathi hina, chakhao thingna pakhiangna khuga ladriat thiukhaibo-e.
Iniu haibo ladkeng thinlujiu naliu khuga ladriat thiukhaibo-e: khaoring-khaona hinatu duidetniu wadaodi Iniu kam maha lanlak mide; wadao khatdi duidetniu kadihpiri haitu kam maha lanlak mide.
Iniu naliu khuga khatdi khaoring-khaona hina khuga tingtheng leng ladriat thiukhaibo situ madan thiujiu.
Iniu kamuong jiuga agu tavaipi hai kamkhaibo-e. Haisiniu ting-kadihga agu ladriatgu madan thiurabo-e.
Iniu tingpukga kamuong nai takimalyse ngaoboga,
Iniu naliu khuga khatdi khaoring-khaona hina khuga duidetniu wadao khatdi pasiu kathi hinatu kam maha lanlakge chiubo ladriatse maningtao rabo-e.
Kamuongjiuga takimaly hai ngaoboga, Iniu kadihpiriga lungbo pasiu kathi hina khuga ladriat thiukhai mibose maningtao khairabo-e.
Pasiu kathi hina khuga Iniu ladriat thiukhai mibo madanse hainiu thiurabo-e.”
Malee lung gasu npadbo Noah nahdung sira Shem, Ham khatdi Japheth hai-e. (Ham hai Canaan piu-e).
Noah nahmai khang sum hainiu kadihpiriga lungmai hina paopeh-e.
Noah hai chalu tien thiumai khatle, paniu mumsy hai lingrai thubo piu-e.
Paniu jaw poinakha sak khaiboga, maniu mijiu, pagu mathenky gase pafai-pani lupad lujiu papumruang jibamme.
Canaan piu, Ham hainiu papiu pumruang jibam niubo ngaolujiu, pasingna kania khuga wang paokhai-e.
Mathenky lung gase Shem nai Japheth niu tadlujiu, papiu pumruang situ ngaomakra, panai makhuakga chafai khailujiu,, sailam nkhinwang thaptom khai bide.
Noah niu pachun marakpad lanboga, panah nathubopiu siniu pakhuga degu kam khailo chiubo siluboga,
paniu dinsude,
“Canaan riga tasiang bam milo!
Pahai pasingnamai vang thiurabo-e.
Shem Rawang,
Tingwang niu pijiu Japheth tu nkiukhangbo thiu milo!
Shem tu pijiu pakai-pakikdungtu maluang lung milo! Canaan hai Japheth vang thiurabo-e.”
Tadui nailubo sai Noah niu takum 350 lungkhai-e,
sichiujiu pah takum 950 ga shai mide.
Haimaidungse Noah nahpiudung, Shem, Ham, khatdi Japheth kaikikdung-e. Panah npiumai khang sum hainiu tadui nailubo sai paliu nahdung lung-e.
Japheth nahdung hainiu Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech khatdi Tiras haisi-e, paliu hai paliu paopeh zan thinjiu lungmai-e.
Gomer kaikikdung siniu Ashkenaz, Riphath khatdi Togarmah-e.
Javan kaikikdung siniu Elishah, Spain, Cyprus khatdi Rhodes paliu-e;
paliu hai singgiu mungga khatdi chapiu kakga lungmaidung-e. Haimaidungse Japheth kaikikdung-e. Sichiujiu jat tam-tamboga khatdi kadih tam-tamboga lungjiu palad-lad tam mibo-e.
Ham nahdung siniu Kush, Egypt, Libya khatdi Canaan paliu-e, paliu hai paliu paopeh zan thinjiu lungmai-e.
Kush kaikikdung siniu Seba, Havilah, Sabtah, Raamah khatdi Sabteca paliu-e. Raamah kaikikdung siniu Sheba nai Dedan maidung si-e.
Kush nahpiu Nimrod kubo khat lung-e, pahai kadihpiritu ngamrai thubo kadibopiu si-e.
gu nkha khaibo jengniu pahai tathiu hasipiu khat thiu-e, sijengniu maidungniu haichiu dinjiu bambo-e, “
Karaigara pagu chawang kadih hai Babylon, Erekh khatdi Accad, haidung sumse Babylon ga bamniu-e.
Sibo kadih gasu paniu Assyria lam tadlujiu Nineveh, Rehoboth Ir, Kalah,
khatdi Resen namdidungse Nineveh nai kadibo namdi Calah kakga thiukhai-e.
Egypt kaikikdung siniu Lydia, Anam, Lehab, Naphtuh,
Pathrus, Kasluh khatdi Crete paliu-e, paliu khugasu Philistine maidung lung padbo-e.
Canaan nah tingthubo siniu Sidon-e, sibosai Heth si-e, paliu hai paliu paopeh zan thenjiu lungmai-e.
Canaan hainiu Jebus mai, Amor mai, Girgash mai,
Hiv mai, Ark mai, Sin mai,
Arvad mai, Zemar mai khatdi Hamath mai paopeh-e. Canaan mai jatdung siniu lung mara padjiu,
Canaan mai ramrai hai dipadjiu, Sidon gasu tingrunlam Gaza mungga bambo Gerar, khatdi tingbanglam Sodom, Gomorrah, Admah khatdi Lasha mungga bambo Zeboiim tangbo si-e.
Haimaidungse Ham kaikik mai-e, paliu hai jat katam-tambo khatdi kadih katam-tam lam lungjiu paliu lad tam-tamjiu lungmibo-e.
Japheth singna Shem hainiu Hebrew mai mathiu paopeh-e.
Shem nahdung siniu Elam, Asshur, Arpachshad, Lud khatdi Aram paliu-e, paliu hai paliu paopeh zan thinjiu lungmai-e.
Aram kaikikdung siniu Uz, Hul, Gether khatdi Meshek paliu-e.
Arpakhshad hai Shelah piu-e, pahai Eber piu-e.
Eber nah khang nia lung-e, khang khatbo zanniu Peleg
Joktan kaikikdung siniu Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,
Hadoram, Uzan, Diklah,
Obal, Abimael, Sheba,
Ophir, Havilah khatdi Jobab paliu-e. Paliu mathiu hai Joktan khugasu lungpadbo-e.
Paliuniu lungbo kadih hai Mesha gasu tingbanglam bambo maluanggen Sephar tangbo dipadle.
Haimaidungse Shem kaikik mai-e, paliu hai jat katam tambo khatdi kadih katam-tam lam lungjiu paliu lad tam-tamjiu lungmibo-e.
Haibo maidungse Noah kaikikdung-e, paliuniu lungbo saisuijiu katam-tambo jat padmibo-e. Duidet saiga, kadihpiriga lungbambo mai hina Noah nahdung khugasu lungkiubo kam-e.
Karaigara, kadihpiri pakhiangna hai chakhuan khat ronna thiujiu chalad khat ronna thiu bamniu-e.
Sichiu paliuniu Tingbanglam lungron tad bambo tingga Babylon ajiangramga paliu wanglung sude.
Paliu khat-khat khuga dinsude, “Wanglo, aliu chagam-niangtu kamkhe.” Sichiujiu paliuniu chaky thiura chagam-niangtu kam sude, khatdi siga taiman raleng tatutam kam sude.
Paliuniu din-e, “Tuhoira aliuniu namdi khat thiu lujiu tingpuk khangtangra ting-ra sukhe, sichiujiu aliu zan tadjiu bamra khatdi aliu lung marami makra kamkhe.”
Siga maidung siniu thiukhang bambo namdi nai ting-rabo situ phuira

sichiujiu paniu din-e, “Tuhoira haimaidung mathiuse khat thiu bambo-e, khatdi paliu khuan khat, lad khat ronna dinbambo-e; haise paliuniu kamrabose kamsugap bambo-e. Pasaira paliuniu kam kanibo hinase kamlumi rabo-e!
Aliu kiulujiu paliu khuan, paliu lad hai kam tabuat mikhe, sichiusai paliu khat-khat lad sitami rabo-e.
Sichiujiu
Namdi situ Babylon
Haimaidungse Shem kaikikdung-e. Tadui nailubo sai tingkum niaga, Shem niu tingkum 100 miboga, piumai nah khat, Arpachshad tu lung-e.
Sibosai pah takum 500 lung lanjiu kakibo nahdung lung lan-e.
Arpakhshad niu takum 35 miboga, piumai nah khat, Shelah tu lung-e;
sibosai pah takum 403 lung lanjiu kakibo nahdung lung lan-e.
Shelah niu takum 30 miboga, piumai nah khat, Eber tu lung-e;
sibosai pah takum 403 lung lanjiu kakibo nahdung lung lan-e.
Eber niu takum 34 miboga, piumai nah khat, Peleg tu lung-e;
sibosai pah takum 430 lung lanjiu, kakibo nahdung lung lan-e.
Peleg niu takum 30 miboga, piumai nah khat, Reu tu lung-e;
sibosai pah takum 209 lung lanjiu, kakibo nahdung lung lan-e.
Reu niu takum 32 miboga, piumai nah khat, Serug tu lung-e;
sibosai pah takum 207 lung lanjiu, kakibo nahdung lung lan-e.
Serug niu takum 30 miboga, piumai nah khat, Nahor tu lung-e;
sibosai pah takum 200 lung lanjiu, kakibo nahdung lung lan-e.
Nahor niu takum 29 miboga, piumai nah khat, Terah tu lung-e;
sibosai pah takum 119 lung lanjiu, kakibo nahdung lung lan-e.
Terah niu takum 70 khangtang miboga, pahai Abram, Nahor khatdi Haran piu thiu-e.
Haibo maidungse Abram, Nahor khatdi Haran piu, Terah kaikikdung-e. Haran hai Lot piu-e,
chiudi Haran hai pakiluang Babylon gu Ur gasu papiu ringbam khaga shai mide.
Abram niu Sarai tu panao leng lu-e, khatdi Nahor niu Haran nahpui Milkah tu panao leng lu-e, pahai Iskah piu-e.
Sarai hai panah lungmakbo nahkampui-e.
Terah niu panah Abram, Haran nahpiu, patah Lot, khatdi Abram nao, pamupui Sarai tu puilujiu Babylon gu Ur namdi gasu Canaan kadih lam tadsude. Paliuniu Haran kadihga wangtang lujiu siga lungsude.
Siga Terah niu tingkum 205 tangmiboga shai mide.
Iniu nakai-kik kengkha pikhai bine, sichiujiu paliuniu kadibo jat khat thiurabo-e. Iniu natu thoikhai bine khatdi nazanse pidikhai bine, sichiujiu nang hai thoidam thiurabo-e.
Chiudi natu siangbo mai hinatu Iniu siangkhai bine.
Sichiujiu napen gasu Iniu jat hinatu thoikhai bine.
Abram tingkum riakchinnia-mangiukiu tangmiboga,
Abram niu panao Sarai, pasai kariupiu nah Lot, khatdi Haran gasu daolubo pakhiu-palan nai pavangdungtu puilujiu Canaan kadihlam jontad sude.
Paliuniu Canaan ga wangtangboga, Shechem ga bambo masanbo bam, Moreh gu masanbo singbang wangtang makthen tadjiu bamme. (Sibo wan gase Canaan maidungse siga lungjiu bamniu-e).
niu Abram khuga ngaolen khaijiu din-e, “Haibo kadihse Iniu nakai-kikdung leng pikhai rabo si-e.” Siga Abram niu
Sibosai, maluangpoi khat bambo Bethel namdi gu tingrun lam, paniu pagu rijikyse tingnu lamniu Bethel, tingbang lamniu Ai kakga thiukhai-e. Sigadi paniu rathakbam khat thiukhaijiu
Sigasu paniu pabam khat gasu khatga tadjiu Canaan gu tingrun lam tadkhai sude.
Chiudi Canaan ga charakhum kadibo khat wangjiu Abram niu Egypt gu tingrun lam tadkiujiu siga pakak khat lungkhai-e.
Paniu Egypt ramrai wangtang suboga panao Sarai khuga din-e, “Nang-hai nazu nalun wibo pui-e.
Egypt maidung siniu natu ngaoboga, paliuniu natu anao-e chiusai, atu kamshat misune khatdi natura piring khai sune.
Siniu nang-hai atanpui-e chiulo; sichiusai najeng gasu paliuniu atu akhi mawikhaijiu pi lungkhai sune.”
Paniu Egypt ramrai ken-ngutboga, Egypt maidung siniu panao hai pazu-palun wi-e chiubo ngaolude.
Chakampaodung khangsianiu patu ngaoboga, pahai pazu-palun dejiukha wilo chiubo chawang khuga paokhai-e, sichiujiu patuse chawangky lam puiwang mide.
Pajeng gasu chawang siniu Abram tu akhi mawi khaijiu, milydung, kamidung, matom-kabuidung, qonniamdung, qontraodung khatdi kavangdung pikhai sude.
Chiudi chawang siniu Sarai tu lulubo jengniu chararen kasabo pariga khatdi chawangkiningga bammai mathiu khuga
Siga chawang siniu Abram tu kuwang maniu sude, “Nangniu degu akhuga kamkhai jiulo? Pahai nanao-e chiujiu dekamjiu akhuga nang dinmak jiulo?
Dekamjiu nangniu patu hai natanpui-e chiujiu pi atu anao leng lujiulo? Nanao haiga bam-e; patu puilujiu tadmilo.”
Chawangniu pamaidung khuga chamtan pikhaijiu, paliuniu Abram tu khatdi panao nai pagu hina pikhaijiu paliu kadih gasu hathon mide.
Abram niu panaotu khatdi pagu kabambo hina phunglujiu Egypt dih tingpi lamsu kensujiu Canaan dih tingrun lamse tadsude, siga Lot di pasai suitadle.
Abram hai kalek wichang wi-e, pagu milydung, kamidung, matom-kabuidung khatdi kachia rangkanggi kengkha bam-e.
Sichiujiu paniu sibo bamse phutlujiu pabam khat gasu khatga tadjiu Bethel lamse tadkhai-e. Paniu karaiga rijiky thiukhai mibo bam Bethel nai Ai gase wangtangde,
siga paniu rathakbam khat thiukhaide. Sichiujiu siga pah
Lot gudi milydung, kamidung, matom-kabuidung khatdi pavangdung kengkha bamme.
Panai khangniagu khaorui-khaona kengju mibo jengniu panaileng piubuanse buita mide.
Sijengniu Abram gu khaorui-khaona khuanmai nai Lot gu khaorui khaona khuanmai n-gi sude. (Sibo wan-gase Canaan mai nai Periz mai sibo kadihga lungbam kha-e).
Siga Abram niu Lot khuga din-e, Ania hai singna-e, siniu namai nai amai n-gi athao makrabo-e.
Sijengniu ania kalek tam mikhe. Nangniu lunibo kadih kada lulo. Nangniu npui khatlam, Iniu khatlam tadrabo-e.
Sijengniu, Lot niu Jordan Ramjeng pakhiangna hai paleng kadalujiu naimikpad lam tadmide. Sichiujiu panai khangniase ramna mibo-e.
Abram niu Canaan dihga bammide, khatdi Lot niu namdigu ramjeng gase lungjiu Sodom mungga rijiky thiukhaide,
haiga lungmaidungra kasa mai-e khatdi
Lot niu tadmibo sai,
Iniu haise naleng khatdi nakai-kikleng pikhai bine, sichiujiu haise tingtheng nagu thiurabo-e.
Iniu nakai-kik leng, mainiu pariak singamlakbo pikhai bine; haise mai khatniu kadihga nbuiniang situ singam lakbo kumrabo-e!
Tuhoira tadlujiu kadih pakhiangnase phuisulo, palamra Iniu haise naleng pikhai rabo-e.”
Sijengniu Abram niu pagu rijibam kali lujiu Hebron ga bambo Mamre gu masanbo singbang mungga wang lungde, siga paniu
Chawang khang madai Babylon mai wang Amraphel, Ellasar mai wang Arioch, Elam mai wang Chedorlaomer khatdi Goiim mai wang Tidal paliuniu,
chawang khang mangiu, Sodom mai wang Bera, Gomorrah mai wang Birsha, Admah mai wang Shinah, Zeboiim mai wang Shemeber, khatdi Bela (maksai Zoar) mai wang paliutu chari thiusude.
Chawang khang mangiu hainiu khat thiulujiu tuhoi Duipui Kashaibo chiu kubambo Siddim Ramjengga wang madui-e.
Paliu hai Chedorlaomer hangga tingkum kariu-je-niakiu bamkhai mibo-e, chiudi kariu-je-sumkiubo kumga paliu patu atungsu mibo-e.
Kariu-je-madaikiubo kumga Chedorlaomer niu pamaluangmai dungtu maluangwang Ashteroth Karnaim ga bambo Rephaim, Ham ga bambo Zuzim, Kiriathaim ajengningga bambo Emim,
khatdi Edom luongga bambo Hor maitu paliuniu ngamlude, sichiujiu ramjing taiga bambo Elparan tangbo paliuniu hameng sude.
Sigasu paliuniu Kadesh (sibo tingga Enmishpat chiu kubo) katang malan wangde. Paliuniu Amalek maidung kadih pakhiangna lulude, sichiujiu Hazazon Tamar ga bambo Amor maidung tudi ngam lude.
Sigasu Sodom, Gomorrah, Admah, Zeboiim khatdi Bela wangdung khang mangiuniu paliu riphendungtu khomwang Siddim gu Ramjengga,
Elam, Goiim, Babylon khatdi Ellasar wangdung khang madaitu, chari thiu subo-e.
Sibo ramjengse chakhomky kengchang keng-e, siga Sodom nai Gomorrah wangpiuse pakkhaiboga, chakhomky gase nkhuang khai mide. Chiudi kakibo wangdung sumra maluonggen lam pak nbai mide.
Chawang khang madai siniu Sodom nai Gomorrah ga bambo hina, katiu-kasakdi suttad kam mide.
Abram chi-nah Lot se Sodom ga lungbam-e, siga paliuniu patudi pagu kabambo hinadi sutlu tad mide.

Chiudi siga mai khangkhat marilujiu wang Amor mai, Mamre gu masanbo singbang mungga lungbambo Hebrew maipiu, Abram khuga chakhum paokhaide. Mamre khatdi pasingna kania Eshcol nai Aner hai Abram lam liangmai-e.
Abram niu pachi nahpiutu minlude chiubo khuan chiuluboga, pagu rijiky gasu paniu chari thiura chamai 318 tu ku-madui lujiu chawang madai situ Dan tangbo hatad sude.
Siga paniu pamaidungtu paphom-phomleng njan tamlujiu mikremaidung situ nchunniu chari thiujiu ngamlude. Paniu paliutu Damascus gu tingpilam Hobah katang hatadle.
Sichiujiu lutadmibo hinase daolan kamlude. Paniu pachi-nahpiu Lot tudi, pagu mania hina khatdi maipui-maina nai kaki-kibo kavangdung tudi kalan lude.
Abram niu Chedorlaomer khatdi kakibo wangdungtu chari ngamlujiu wangboga, Sodom gu wangpiuniu patu Shaveh Ramjeng (Chawang Ramjeng chiujiudi kubo) ga adaora padle.
Siga Salem gu chawang khatdi Kuthubo Rawang gu singkudi thiujiu bambo Melchizedek niu taruak nai jaw phungwangde,
sichiujiu paniu patu thoikhaijiu din-e, “Ting-kadih dambo Kuthubo Rawang siniu Abram tu thoikhai bilo!
Nagu mikremaidung riga chari ngamkhaibo Kuthubo Rawang situ thuonlo!” Sichiujiu chari gasu sutlubo hinagu dam-kariugu damse Melchizedek leng Abram niu pikhaide.
Sodom gu chawang siniu Abram khuga din-e, “Sutlubo hinase naleng lululo, chiudi amai hinatu pikhai kalanlo.”
Abram niu paokakge, “Tingkadih Dampao Kuthubo Rawang
chiubora Iniu nagu wakhatdi, chalangkeng maksai chaphitop-riang tangbo lulakge. Palamra nangniu wadaodi haichiu dinmakra leng-e, “Iniu Abram tu pi lungwi khaibo-e.”
Aleng wakhatdi Iniu lulakge. Amaidungniu thinmibo situ ronna Iniu lukhaine. Chiudi alam liangmaidung Aner, Eshcol khatdi Mamre paliu damra pikhai bilo.”
Haibosai, Abram madungao khat ngaojiu,
Chiudi Abram niu paokakjiu din-e, “Kuthubo
Aleng nangniu nahmai pikhai makbo jengniu avangmainiu agu kalek lumi rabo-e.”
Siga
niu patu lenlam puipad lujiu din-e, “Tingpuk lam phuikhanglo, khatdi chagandung situ pariak chak matailo; sikum gapjiu nakai-kikdung lungrabo-e.”
Siga
Chiudi Abram niu maniu-e, “Kuthubo
Paniu paokakge, “Takum sum sum tangmibo matom khat, kami khat khatdi milychi khat sigasu makhao khat nai kaphina khat akhuga phungwanglo.”
Abram niu khaoringdungse Tingwang khuga phungwangjiu paphan-phan rekhaide, sichiujiu paphan-phanse thom nia thiujiu thomkhaide, chiudi paniu thingnase rekhai makge.
Wakhaodung rigase chamitiuleng
niu pakhuga din-e, “Nakai-kikdungse sangdiumai ramga pazu simakmai thiujiu lungne; siga paliu kavang thiujiu lungne, khatdi paliutu tingkum kai madai mathad khairabo-e.
Chiudi paliutu bangkhaibo jat-dung situ Iniu sajai pikhai rabo-e, sichiujiu paliuniu sibo sangdiumai dih phutpadboga, chakhiu-chalan kengjiu phungtad rabo-e.
Nangra ring mathengne khatdi agi-manaijiu shaine, sichiujiu natu nphum mawi khaine.
Haise nakai nakikdung siniu haiga malanwang makhaga chaken madai-ga padrabo-e, palamra Amor maidungniu wajiukha sajiu paliutu sajai pikhaitang makthen Iniu hathon lakge.”
Naimik kiumiboga khatdi tamiu miboga mikha padbo chali khat nai tao-bansatbo kahiupuang khat ngao-e khatdi sise wakhaodung-jan kakga tadmariu sude.
Siga
sironna makjiu Keni, Kenizz, Kadmoni,
Hitt, Periz, Rephaim,
Amor, Canaan, Girash, khatdi Jebus maidung kadih hai khaisan bine.”
Abram nao Sarai siniu panah wadi lung makge. Chiudi pakhuga Egypt mai liupui khat kavang pazanniu Hagar kubo khat bam-e.
Sijengniu Abram khuga paniu din-e. “
Sijengniu Hagar tu Abram naoleng paniu pikhai bide. (Haise Abram niu Canaan ga tingkum kariu lungkhang mibo saiga-e).
Abram niu Hagar tu nphiuji khaiboga pawon phung mide. Paniu pawon phung mide, chiubo siluboga chaliang sude khatdi Sarai tu wajeng sita mide.

Siga Sarai niu Abram khuga din-e, “Hagar niu atu wajeng sitamibo hai nadon-e. Iniu patu naleng pikhaijiu paniu pawon phungmiboga atu wajeng chakta mide. Nangniu majima, Iniu majima, saoniu majilo chiubo
Abram niu paokakge, “Wichang wide, pahai navang-e, siniu nahangga bamme; nangniu patu kamnibo hina kambo sui-e.” Sigasu Sarai niu Hagar tu mathadchang mathad sude—sijengniu pah paktad mide.
Shur lam tadbo puidi ramjingga bambo ajai khatga
khatdi din-e, “Sarai vangpui Hagar, nang delamsu wangkin jiulo khatdi delam tadkhai ralo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Awangpui khugasu I pak kinbo-e.”
Paniu din-e, “Pakhulam malanwang sulo khatdi pavang thiujiu bamlo.”
Paniu dinlan-e, “Mai khatniudi pariak singam lakbo kai-kikdungse Iniu naleng pikhai bine.
Nangniu nangnah piumai khat lung sune khatdi nangniu pazan Ishmael
Chiudi nangnah hai chahung kumjiu lungrabo-e; paniu mai hinatu atung rabo-e khatdi mai hinaniu patu atung rabo-e. Pasingnadung khugasu para tamsinjiu lungrabo-e.”
Hagar paronna haichiu dinsude, “Pachang siakjiu Iniu Tingwang tu ngaolubo ma, ngaolubo saidi ringlu buima?” Sijengniu patu npao khaibo
Sichiujiu maidungniu Kadesh nai Bered kakga bambo ajai situ “Ringbambo Khat Siniu Atu Ngaolen-khaibo Ajai” chiujiu ku-e.
Sibo wan-ga Abram hai tingkum riaktachat-je-charukkiu tang mide.
Abram niu tingkum riakchakiu-je-chakiukiu tangmiboga,
Iniu natu ladriat thiu khaijiu, nakai-kik leng kengkha pikhai bine.”
Abram niu kadihga makhumkiu kahum-e, siga Tingwang niu din-e,
“Iniu haibo ladriat nakhuga thiu khai-e: nangniu jatdung kakeng paopeh thiurabo-e.
Iniu nakai-kik leng kengkha pikhai bine, khangsia mainiu chawang thiune. Nakai-kikdung hai kingpadjiu paliuniu jatdungse thiurabo-e.
Tuhoi nang sangmai thiujiu bambo dihai naleng khatdi nakaikik leng pikhai bine. Canaan dih pakhiangna hai tingthengjiu nakai-kik gu thiurabo-e, khatdi Iniu paliu Rawang thiu rabo-e.”
Tingwang niu Abraham khuga din-e, “Nangdi akhuga ladriat thiu khaibo hai pasai wanglan rabo chaken-ga nakai-kikdungdi tingthengjiu majai rabo-e.
Nangdi, nakai-kikdungdi npiumai hina chagirom rabo-e.
Tuhoi gasu npiumai nah hina jeng tachat tangmibo hina, nakyga kavang tadi, sangmai khugasu kavang leng liumai tadi, chagi romrabo-e.
Mai hina chagi-rom rabo-e, sichiujiu chapumga lenkhaibo madan hainiu agu ladriatse tingtheng leng-e chiubo lenrabo-e.
Mai khat kumboniu pagi rom maksai, patu amai-e chiubo chakkhai silakge, palamra akhuga ladriat khaibo haitu paniu majai makge.”
Tingwang niu Abraham khuga din-e, “Nangniu nanaotu Sarai chiujiu kuta milo, tuhoi gasu pazan Sarah
Iniu patu thoikhai bine, sichiujiu paniu naleng npiumai khat lungne, Iniu patu thoikhaijiu, pahai jatdung pui thiurabo-e, sichiujiu pakai-kikdung khugasu chawangdung lungpad rabo-e.”
Abraham pazu kadihga makhum kiujiu kahum-e, chiudi “Mai khatniu tingkum kai tangmiboga panah lunglu buima? Sarah tingkum riakchakiu tangmiboga panah lunglu buima?” chiubo paniu maning lujiu nuisude.
Paniu Tingwang khuga maniu-e, “Dekamjiu Ishmael niu alek lumak ralo?”
Chiudi Tingwang niu din-e, “Chiumakge. Nanao Sarah siniu panah piumai khat lungne, siga nangniu pazan Isaac

Nangniu Ishmael lamga khengbose Iniu chiukhaide, sichiujiu Iniu patu thoikhai bine khatdi pakai-kik kengkha Iniu pikhai bine. Pahai chawang nahdung khang kariu-je-niakiu piuse thiurabo-e, khatdi Iniu pakai-pakikdung situ kadibo jat khat pithiu khai bine.
Chiudi haikumbo ting makumga Sarah niu lungrabo panah Isaac khuga Iniu aladriat hai majaikhai rabo-e.”
Tingwang niu Abraham tu npao lubo sai, patu saodiak lujiu tadmide.
Abraham niu Tingwang kadin piujiu, sibonai chawan panah Ishmael tu khatdi paky lungga bambo npiumai hina, pavangdungdi, paniu liuwangbo mai hina tudi paliu-gi rom khaide.
Abraham hai tingkum riakchakiu-je-chakiubo kum tangmiboga pagi rom-e,
siga panah Ishmael se tingkum kariu-je-sumkiu tangmide.
Panai khang nia situ naikhat gasu panai-gi rom-e,
sibo nai Abraham vangmai mathiu situ sibo paliu-gi rom kam-e.
Mamre ga bambo masanbo singbang gase
paniu ngangkhang gapboga, maipiu khangsum chapbam niubo ngao-e. Paniu paliutu ngaogapboga paliutu adaora pakpadle. Pazu kadihga makhum kiujiu,
paniu din-e, “Paohubodung yo, akyga mathak khai makjiu tadtaron khai tulo; naliutu akhi khaira haiga I bam-e.
Naliu haibo singbang hangga bamniulo, naliu ngen n-khiura I tadui thuaklu wangne.
Naliu tabin tadwira katiu poinakhadi I ponwangne, Naliu akyga wangkhaibo hainiu atu chakhuang thiukhaibo-e, siniu I naliutu akhi khaine.”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Thuonkiu-e, aliu sui-e.”
Abraham niu kalunglam pakwang, Sarah khuga din-e. “Kalangjiu, nagu withubo takhui khoilujiu taruak tamnakha khuak sulo.”
Sibosai paniu kabuiky gase pakwang, pamai wibo khatdi palun wibo matompoi khat jupad lujiu, mathan kalangjiu khaira pavang khat khuga pikhaide.
Paniu wasa, matom ndui khatdi chamise ponlujiu paliu khuga wang pikhaide. Sibo singbang hangga pah papumsiakniu paliutu akhi khaijiu paliu tiukhaide.
Siga paliuniu pakhuga maniu-e. “Nanao Sarah dega bamlo.”
Paniu paokakge, “Pah kalungga bamme.”
Sarah se pasailam akham hiu gasu nking bam-e.
Abraham nai Sarah hai thenthui mide, sichiujiu Sarah hai npuimaigu chahiu-zai tadbo
Sijengniu Sarah paronna nuijiu din-e, “Tuhoira I hai tanpejiu thenwang mide, Iniu npui-npiu thiungam lura khama? Sironna makjiu akinadi tanpao mide.”
Siga
leng kungjubo wa bamjiuma? Iniu dinmibo kumjiu, tuhoi gasu chahiu chakiu bamsai I malan wangne, siga Sarah panah npiumai khat lungne.”
Sarah niu pingbo jengniu suimakjiu din-e, “I nuimakge.”
“Yo, nang nui-e.” chiujiu paniu paokakge. “Nang nuisiak mibo-e.”
Sichiu paliuniu phutkhai lujiu Sodom tu phuikiu ngaobo bam khatga tadmide, siga Abraham niu paliutu kapao padle.
niu paronna maning sude, “Iniu kamrabo hai Abraham khuga mahin lakge.
Pakai-kikdung hai kadibo khatdi kangambo jatdung thiurabo-e, sichiujiu Iniu pakhu gasu jat hinatu thoikhai birabo-e.

Paniu panahdungtu khatdi pakai-kikdungtu acham majaijiu majibo khatdi kawibose kamraleng Iniu patu kadakhai mibo-e. Sichiujiu paliuniu kamsai, Iniu ladriat thiukhaibo kumjiu wahinase paleng kamkhai birabo-e.”
Sichiujiu
Iniu paliu lamga chiubambo hai majibo majimakbo phuira I tadrabo mide.”
Sichiujiu khangniase phutlujiu Sodom lam tadkhai mide, chiudi
Abraham niu
Sibo namdiga pakhui-pamao hamai khang ringiu bamniusai, sibo namdi pakhiangnatu nangniu kam mahami rama? Khang ringiu situ kalanlura jengniu nang masiak khai lakma?

Pachangsiakjiu nangra wadi pamao hamai situ, pamao bammai nai kamshatmi lakge. Sise wadaodi suimakge! Sichiu khai tulo. Nangniu sichiusai pamao hamai situdi pamao bammai panai nchamjiu sajai pibo-e. Sise wadaodi suimakge. Kadihpiri pakhiangnatu ladzanpaora majijiu ladzan thiurabo-e.”
Abraham niu dinlan-e, “
Chiudi siga chamai ringiu sung khang atai-je-mangiukiu ronna bamniusai dechiu ralo? Khang mangiu tangmakbo jengniu namdi pakhiangna situ nangniu kam mahami rama?”
Abraham niu dinlan-e, “Siga khang atai ronna bamniusai dechiu ralo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Siga chamai atai bamniusai, Iniu sisetu kam maha lakge.”
Abraham niu din-e, “
Paniu paokakge, “Iniu khang samriutu daosai, sise kam maha lakge.”
Abraham niu din-e, “
Paniu din-e, “Iniu khang makaitu daosai, namdi situ kam maha lakge.”
Abraham niu din-e, “
Paniu din-e, “Siga khang kariutu daosai Iniu namdi situ kam maha lakge.”
Haichiu paniu Abraham tu npao lubosai,

Sibonai chawan maza kania siniu Sodom ga wangbo tingga Lot se namdigu rengmun-ga ntao bamniu-e. Paniu panaitu ngaogapboga suchap lujiu panaitu adaora padle. Panai suangga pah makhumkiu lujiu din-e, “Paohubodung yo, naliutu akhi-khaira I haiga bam-e.
Chalungsajiu akyga wangkhailo. Naliu ngen n-khiu khailo, khatdi thaichun mathak khailo, Nsuannai nsuan buangsu majilujiu nanai tabin tadlanbo sui-e.”
Chiudi panainiu paokakge, “Daolakge, anaira namdi pake khatga wang mathak khai mitane.”
Paniu panai khuga dinlan-lan bambo jengniu panaise pakyga suiwang khaide. Taruak khuaklu katiu-kasak kam mawikhaira Lot niu pavangmaitu chamtan pikhaide, sise kaden khaijiu panai tiukhai-e.
Sangmaidungse jimakhaga, Sodom maidung siniu pakyse taomagui mide. Sibo namdiga lungbammai kating-kana pakhiangna siga wangsude.
Paliuniu Lot tu kulujiu maniu-e, “Thaichun nakyga riukhaira wangbo maidungse dega bamlo? Panaitu aliu khuga pilo!” Sodom maidung siniu panaitu majang npui-npiu thiunibo jengniu-e.
Lot niu kamah-lam padlujiu paky akhamse khamten mide.
Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Akahmaidung yo, sikumbo kasabo ngam kamkhai makra Iniu naliu khuga khengbo-e!

Phuilo, anahpui liuchangpui kania bam-e. Panai khuga naliuniu kamnibose kamlo. Chiudi hainapiu kania tura wa kamkhai tulo; palamra panai akyga agiangmai thiujiu bambo-e. Siniu panaitu Iniu gukhai rabo-e.”

Chiudi paliuniu din-e, “Nang sangmaipiu, aliutu khamtulo, tadmilo! Aliutu hai kamlo, hai kamtulo chiujiu katikhaira nang saolo? Aliu npui gasu tadmilo, chiumaksai paliu sung, natu kam masadiang rabo-e.”
Siga kalunglam bambo khangnia siniu padlujiu Lot tu kalunglam jukhai lujiu akham mide.
Sichiujiu lenlam bammai mathiu mikse kamtiat kam mide. Siniu paliu akhamse phiu silak mide.
Maipiu khangnia siniu Lot khuga din-e. “Namdi lungga natah-nanahmai maksai nasingna kakimai bamsai paliutu haigasu majang npad milo,
palamra anainiu namdi haitu kam maha mine. Haibo maidunggu haijiukha kasabo haitu
Siga panahpuidungtu luraleng kambammai khuga Lot niu tadlujiu din-e. “Kalang sulo, haigasu tadpad milo; palamra haibo namdi haitu
Nsuankhuan maza siniu Lot tu majadra din-e, “Kalang sulo, nanao nai nanahpui kania situ puilujiu tadsulo, sichiusai namdi haitu kam mahabo gasu naliugu karingtingse marilu bui-e.”
Lot hai palung mangebi-e. Chiudi
Sichiujiu maza khat siniu din-e, “Naliu ringlura paksulo! Sailam mariphui tulo khatdi ramjeng gase mathak tulo. Maluong lamse pakhai sulo, sichiusai naliu shailakge.”
Chiudi Lot niu paokakge, “Paohubo yo, aliutu sichiu khai tulo.
Nangniu atu haijiukha lungsajiu agu ringting rankhai bide. Maluongse diusui bamkha-e. I siga pakwang tang makhaga chariu-magenthiubose wangjiu I shaimi rabo-e.
Uibo nampoise nang ngaoma? Haise namide. Uiga I tadkhaimi tane, sise pabam siamjiu tadi I nbaikhai tane.”
Paniu paokakge, “Wide, sui-e. Iniu uibo nampoise kam maha lakge.
Kalanglo! Paksulo! Nang siga mengtang makthen I wadi kamsi lakge.”
Lot niu sise kasiambo kukhaibo jengniu nampoi situ Zoar
Lot niu Zoar mengtangboga naimik padmide.
Simakdakjiu
sichiujiu sibo ramjengga bambo mai hinatu khatdi siga bambo hinatu kam maha mide.
Lot nao siniu masailam mariphuibo jengniu matai-tiang mawi mide.
Pasaibo nai nsuanse Abraham niu
Sodom nai Gomorrah tu paniu phuikiuboga ramjeng pakhiangnase mikhutniu phuiting mide, sise n-mang kadibo khat gasu mikhut khabambo kumjiu ngao-e.
Sibo namdigu ramjengse kam mahami tadi, Tingwang niu Abraham tu maningtao khaijiu Lot tura piring khai bide.
Lot niu Zoar ga bampingbo jengniu maluanggen lam khanglujiu tulimki khatga lungsude.
Panah katingpui siniu pasai-kariupui khuga din-e, “Anaipiu tanpao mide haibo kadihga anaitu maluang lungjiu—nahmai lungpadra mai khatnadi hamide.
Wanglo, apiutu jaw pisak maniukhai lujiu ngena lungra anai pakhuga jisukhe.”
Sibonai nchunse panainiu patu jaw pisak khai lujiu katingpui siniu papiutu maluang nphiu jikhaide. Chiudi para jaw sak maniuju mibo jengniu sise simakge.
Pasaibo naise katingpui siniu pasai-kariupui khuga din-e, “Danai nchun Ira patu maluangji lude, thaichunra nang patu maluangji sulo. Sichiusai anai khangniase apiu khugasu anah lunglubui-e.”
Sijengniu sibonai nchundi panainiu patu jaw pisak maniu khai lujiu nabopui siniu papiutu maluang nphiuji khaide. Para jaw sak maniuju mibo jengniu sisedi simakge.
Haichiujiu Lot nahpui kania siniu panai piu khugasu panai won phungmide.
Katingbopui siniu panah piumai khat lungjiu paniu pazan Moab
Nabopui siniudi panah piumai khat lungjiu paniu pazan leng Benammi
Abraham niu Mamre gasu tadlujiu Canaan gu tingrun lam khatdi Kadesh nai Shur kakga lungsude. Pasai, paniu Gerar ga lungbambo tingga,
panao Sarah situ patanpui-e chiujiu paniu din-e. Sijengniu Gerar gu chawangpiu Abimelech niu Sarah tu puiwang mide.
Naikhat nchun Tingwang niu pamanglam madukhaijiu pakhuga din-e, “Palamra nangniu chamithiu mibopui haitu lubo jengniu nang shairabo mide.”
Chiudi Abimelech niu pakhuga wang mana makge, sichiujiu paniu din-e, “Rapiu yo, Ira amao ha-e! Nangniu atu khatdi amaidungtu kam mahami rama?
Abraham papumsiakniu pahai patanpui-e chiujiu din-e, sise kumgapjiu padi dinlan-e. Haise Iniu masansiakbo lungchunniu kambo-e, Ira kamaobo wadi kam makge.”
Pamang lamsu Tingwang niu paokakge, “Yo, nangniu masansiakjiu kambo jengniu, akhuga maomi makra, Iniu natu pijiu patu piditao khai makbo-e.

Chiudi tuhoira, hainapuitu pakina khuga pikhailan milo. Pahai phaimiukakung khatle, paniu naleng kakheng thiukhai saira nang shai lakge. Chiudi nangniu patu pikhailan maksai nang khatdi namai hina shaikam mirabo-e chiubo hai Iniu natu kachan khaibo-e.”
Pasaibo nai nsuan kalu Abimelech niu pagu chakampaodungtu kulujiu degu padmilo chiubo dinkhaide, siga paliu kapingboniu phuimide.

Siga Abimelech niu Abraham tu kulujiu maniu-e, “Nangniu aliu khuga degu kamgulo? Iniu nariga degu kamaobo kamkhai mibo bamjiu haikumbo chariu magenthiubo hai ariga khatdi amaidung riga dekamjiu phungwang gulo? Nangniu kamkhaibo kumbo hai mai khatnadi akhuga kamkhai makha-e.
Dekamjiu haise nang kamjiulo?
Abraham niu paokakge, “Haiga mai khatnadi Tingwang tu kapingbo habo jengniu anaotu lura paliuniu atu kamshatmi suma chiujiu I maningbo jengniu-e.
Pahai pachangjiu atanpui-e. Pahai apiu nahpui-e, chiudi apuiniu ponbo makge, siniu I patu majang lungbo-e.
Sijengniu apiu ky gasu Tingwang niu atu sangmai dihga langkhaibo tingga, Iniu pakhuga din-e, “I hai napiubo-e chiujiu mai hina khuga dinbo jengniu nang akadin wajiukha sui-e chiubo lenra-e.”
Siga Abimelech niu Abraham khuga Sarah tu pikhailan mide, sichiujiu paniu paleng milydung, matom-kabuidung, khatdi kavangdungdi pikhaide.
Paniu Abraham khuga din-e, “Haiga agu kadih pakhiangna bam-e, nangniu lungnibo bamga lunglo.”
Paniu Sarah khugadi din-e, “Namao wakhatdi ha-e chiubo lenra, Iniu nachileng rangkang sang khat pikhaibo-e, nang kamaobo kammakge chiubo hai mai hinaniu sirabo-e.”

Abraham nao Sarah jengniu Abimelech gu chawangkiningga bambo maipui hinatu pijiu tanah lungmakra Tingwang niu kham mibo-e. Sijengniu Abimelech leng Abraham niu kakheng thiukhaiboga Tingwang niu patu wikhai bide. Paniu panaotudi, pavangpuidung tudi wikhai bide, sichiujiu paliu mathiu tanah lunglan lura wikhai bide.
Paniu ladriat khaibo kumjiu,
sichiujiu Abraham niu tanpao miboga, panao papum ripjiu panah piumai khat manade. Npiumai nah situ
Abraham niu patu Isaac chiujiu pazan mathak khai-e,
sichiujiu Isaac niu jeng tachat changmiboga, Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaibo saisuijiu Abraham niu pagi romkhai-e.
Isaac tu manabo tingga Abraham tingkum kai khat tangmide.
Sarah niu din-e, “Tingwang niu aleng ringabo nai nuibo
Sichiujiu paniu dinlan-e, “Abraham leng Sarah niu ngena lungkhai bamme chiujiu saoniu dinralo? Chiudi paniu tanpao mibo wan-ga Iniu paleng piumainah khat lung khai bamme.”
Ngenase dikhangjiu, patu alaobonai, Abraham niu changee kadibo khat kamkhai-e.
Naikhatra, Egypt maipui Hagar niu Abraham leng lungkhaibo Ishmael niu Sarah nah Isaac tu mathen
Sarah niu panaitu ngaolujiu Abraham khuga dinsude, “Kavangpui nai panah haitu hathon milo. Anah Isaac niu lurabo nagu kalekse, hainapui nahniu wakhatdi daobo suilakge.”
Sichiu dinbo jengniu Abraham palung magenthiu-chang magenthiu sude, palamra Ishmael di panah-e.

Chiudi Tingwang niu Abraham khuga din-e, “Ngena nai papui Hagar jengniu nalung chariu tulo. Sarah niu dinbo saisuijiu kamlo, palamra Iniu nakhuga ladriat khaimibo kai-kikdungse Isaac khugasu padrabo-e.
Kavangpui niu lungbo nah tudi Iniu paleng nahmai kengkha pikhai bine, sichiujiu paliu jat khat thiurabo-e. Palamra padi nanah-e.”
Pasaibo nai nsuan kalu, Abraham niu Hagar tu tek-dom nai tadui-hen khat pikhai lujiu, ngena situ papui ting riga thonkhai lujiu hathon mide. Siga paniu tadpadjiu Beersheba ramjing gase tadmariu sude.
Taduise hamiboga, paniu ngena situ chaphejiuga khaidiak lujiu, chakhet ringiu kumbo tadpad lujiu ntaokiu lujiu,
paronna dinsude, “Anah shaikiubo situ I phui ngam lakge.” Sichiujiu pah ntaojiu bamboga ngenase kapsude.

Ngena siniu kapbose Tingwang niu chiuluboga, tinggen lamsu Tingwang gu maza khatniu Hagar khuga din-e, “Hagar yo, nang dekamjiu nalung chariubam jiulo? Pingtulo. Ngena siniu kapbo khuanse Tingwang niu chiukhai bide.
Sulujiu tadsulo, khatdi ngena situ ponlujiu hiam milo. Iniu pakai-pakik gasu kadibo jat khat pithiu khai bine.”
Sichiujiu Tingwang niu pamik pi rakpad khai bijiu, paniu ajai khat ngaode. Paniu tadlujiu chamigi-lah gasu tadui thuaklu wangjiu ngena situ pikhaide.
Sichiujiu ngena lungkhangboga, Tingwang niu majang khai bi-e; paniu sibo Paran ramjing ga lungjiu tathiu hasipiu khat thiukhang-e.
Papuiniu panao leng Egypt mai liupui khattu phiukhai bi-e.

Sijengniu tuhoi Tingwang masuangga nangniu akhuga, anahmaidung khuga khatdi akai-kikdung khuga arat lakge chiubo ladriat thiukhailo. Iniu natu chakhuang thiujiu lungbambo kum, nangdi atu khatdi nangniu lungbambo kadih haitu chakhuang thiujiu lungne, chiubo ladriat thiukhailo.”
Abraham niu din-e, “Yo, Iniu ladriat thiukhai-e.”
Abimelech vangdungniu sutlubo akhun khat jengniu Abimelech khuga Abraham niu din-e.
Siga Abimelech niu din-e, “Sise saoniu kamjiulo I simakge. Haibo lamga nang akhuga dintao makge, haise Ira chiurai thubo-e.”
Sichiujiu Abraham niu Abimelech leng milydung nai matom kasia pikhaijiu panai chamsiang lude.
Abraham niu pagu milydung ruanggasu milypoi chinniatu jupad tam khaide,
siga Abimelech niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Sise nangniu dekam ralo?”
Abraham niu paokakge, “Haibo milypoi chinnia hai nang lukhailo. Haisiniu akhunse Iniu chukhaibo-e chiubo nangniu suikhaibo-e.”
Sijengniu sibo bam situ Beersheba
Beersheba ga panainiu ladriat thiukhai lubosai, Abimelech nai Phicol se Philistia lam malanwang mide.
Beersheba ga Abraham niu khiangpi bang khat lingkhai lujiu, paniu
Philistia ga Abraham niu pating kathengkha lung khai-e.
Pasaibo nai nsuan kalu, Abraham niu charathiu raleng tasing kamlujiu pagu qonniam bang thiulu, Isaac nai pavang khangniatu majang lujiu tadsude. Tingwang niu pakhuga dinkhaibo bam lamse jontad sude.
Pasumbo naise, Abraham niu pabamse phuimeng ngao mide.
Siga paniu pavang kania khuga din-e, “Konniam hai phui bamniulo. Ngena anai uiga tadlujiu chara kahum lujiu wangne.”
Abraham niu Isaac tu pijiu charathiurabo singse ponkhai lujiu, paniu chaheng nai chami thiuraleng chamise thinlujiu tadsude.
Panai sichiujiu tadbamga, Isaac niu maniu sude, “Apiu yo!”
Paniu paokakge, “Hao, anah yo?”
Isaac niu maniu-e, “Nakhuga chami nai tasing sira I ngao-e, chiudi kadkhai rabo milypoi sira dega bamlo?”
Abraham niu paokakge, “Tingwang niu pikhai rabo-e.” Sichiujiu panai khangniase tadpad sude.
Sichiujiu paniu panahtu gikhai raleng pahengse khengmalen khang sude.
Siga
Paniu paokakge, “Yo, haiga I bam-e.”
Paniu din-e, “Ngena situ wadi kam mathiutulo, wakhatdi kamtulo. Nangniu Tingwang tu pingbo jengniu nangnah khatnakha bambo situ masiak makge, chiubo tuhoira I silude.”
Abraham niu mariwang phuiboga, chaphejiuga kamichi khattu pake gasu kabet manlujiu bambo ngaolude. Sise paniu tadlujiu ponwang, panah sung maring rukhaibo rathakse kadkhaide.
Abraham niu sibo bamtu “Jehovah-Jireh”
“Iniu chamtan gasu ladriat katanbo khat thiukhai-e, chiujiu
Tingpukga chagandung kumjiu maksai duipui taphuga nbuiniangse kumjiu Iniu nakai-kik leng pikhai bine. Nakai-kikdung siniu paliu mikremaidungtu ngamjiu lungrabo-e.
Nangniu acham majaibo jengniu nakai-kikdungtu Iniu thoikhaibo kumjiu thoikhaira jat hinaniu khengrabo-e.”
Abraham niu pavang kania khuga malanwang, panaitu puilujiu Beersheba lamse wanglan mide.
Pakak khat saiga, Milkah niu pasai kariupiu Nahor leng nahmai khang tachat lungkhai-e chiu Abraham niu silude.
Paliu sira tingthubo Uz, pasai kariupiu Buz, Aram piu Kemuel,
Chesed, Hazo, Pildash, Jidlaph khatdi Rebecca piu Bethuel paliu hai-e.
Haichiujiu Milkah niu Abraham saikariupiu Nahor leng nahmai khang tachat lungkhai-e.
Nahor rammai-liupui, Reumah niu Tebah, Gaham, Tahash khatdi Maakah tu lungkhai-e.
Sarah tingkum kai-khatje-makai chinniakiu lungkhai-e.
Pah Canaan kadih Hebron ga shaikhai mide, siga Abraham niu Pah shaibo tu achung khaide.
Panao shaikhaibo bam gase paniu khaidiak lujiu, tadmeng Hitt maidung khuga din-e.
“Ira naliu ruangga sangmai khangkhat thiujiu lung bambo-e, siniu anaotu baikhaira aleng kadih jonkhailo.”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Paohubo yo, aliu lad nking khailo.
Aliuniu natu kangambo jupao khat leng lukhaibo-e, siniu aliugu bambo lungga withubo rawga nanaotu baikhailo.”
Siga Abraham niu paliu masuangga makhumkiu din-e,
“Naliuniu anaotu baikhaira sui-e sai, Zohar nahpiu Ephron khuga, palu mungga bambo Machpelah Tulimkise aleng jonkhaira dinkhai janlo.
Sichiujiu Iniu sibo bamse agu charawbam thiura, naliu mathiu masuangga paman kabuibo pijiu liuraleng, naliu npao khai janlo.”
Namdigu rengmun maduibam gase Ephron papumsiak ntao bam-e, paniu mathiu masuangga paokakjiu din-e,
“Paohubo yo, nking khailo, Iniu siga bambo alu khatdi sibo tulimkiga bambo hina naleng pine. Haise Iniu arammai mathiu masuangga naleng pikhai mibo-e, sijengniu siga nangniu nanaotu baikhai sulo.”
Chiudi Abraham niu Hitt maidung masuangga makhumkiu lujiu,

Ephron khuga, mai mathiu chiulura din-e, “Alad nking khaira Iniu naliu mathiu khuga kheng-e. Iniu chalu pakhiangna haise liura mide. Iniu paman pibo hai lukhailo, sichiusai Iniu anaotu haiga baikhaine.”
Ephron niu paokakge,
“Paohubo yo, kadih haise rangkang kai madai leng sui-e, chiudi sikumbotu anai kakga degu bamjiulo? Haiga nanaotu baikhai sulo.”
Abraham niu suijiu, alimaidungniu tadkinbo saisuijiu, mathiu masuangga, Ephron niu dinbo rangkang kai madai-gise madatpad khai bide.
Sichiujiu Mamre gu tingbang lam bambo Ephron gu kadih Machpelah se Abraham gu thiu mibo-e. Siga chaludi, tulimki sidi khatdi sibo lungga bambo singbang hinadi jaomibo-e.
Haise Abraham gu mide chiubo, sibo madui ruangga bambo Hitt maidung mathiuniu simibo-e.
Sichiujiu Abraham niu panao Sarah tu Canaan kadihga sibo tulimki gase baikhai mibo-e.
Sijengniu Hitt maidunggu thiubam niubo luzam khatdi sibo lungga bambo tulimkise Abraham gu charao-bam thiumibo-e.
Abraham hai tanpao suimide, sichiujiu paniu kambo hinaga
Paniu pavang ruanggasu tingthubo khatdi pagu bambo mania hina thinbambo piutu kulujiu din-e, “Ahingpom kania kakga
Haibo Canaan mai ruanggasu nangniu anah naoleng kadakhai lakge chiubo ting-kadih Rawang zan-ga nangniu tasiang siangra Iniu luni-e.
Nangniu atu manakhaibo kadih lam tadlujiu anah Isaac naoleng asingnamai khugasu lurabo-e.”
Chiudi pavangpiu siniu paokakge, “Sibo aliupui siniu paky phutlujiu haibo kadihga asai suiwangni maksai dechiu ralo? Sichiusai nangniu wangbo bamlamse nanah haitu Iniu pijiu wang lunglan khai rama?”
Abraham niu paokakge, “Nangniu siga wakamdi langkhai lan makra kamrabo-e!
Tinggen Rawang,
Aliupui siniu nasai suiwang nimak misai, haibo siangse nariga wanglakge. Chiudi nangniu wakam-kamdi anahtu siga pui malan wangbo suimakge.”
Sichiujiu pavangpiu siniu, pawangpiu Abraham hingpom kakga paben kariokhai lujiu Abraham niu dinbose kamra tasiang katanbo thiukhaide.
Abraham vangpiu, mania hina thinbambo paniu, pawangpiugu qontrao kariu halujiu Nahor niu lungbambo namdi Mesopotamia gu tingpi lamse tadsude.
Paniu mengtangboga, qontraodung situ namdi lenlam, akhun mungga pi mathak khai-e. Haise chawan ramliang wangmibo ting, maipuidungniu tadui thuakbo wan-e.
Paniu kakheng thiujiu dinsude, “Awangpiu, Abraham Rawang
Tuhoi namdigu aliumaidungniu tadui thuakbo wan-ga akhun mungga hai I bamme.

Iniu paliu ruangga khangkhat khuga haichiu dinsu ra-e, ‘Naduikhiu gasu I tadui sakkhaine.’ Siga paniu ‘saklulo, Iniu nagu qontraodung lengdi thuakkhai bine,’ chiujiu dinsai, pase navangpiu Isaac naoleng nangniu kada khaibo puise thiulo. Haise padgapsai, nangniu awangpiu khuga ladriat khaibose majai khai-e chiubo Iniu sirabo-e.”
Paniu kakheng kamloi makhaga, Rebecca se paduikhiu pamakhuakga ponlujiu mengtang sude. Pahai Abraham singnapiu Nahor nahpiu Bethuel nahpui-e, panao siniu Milkah-e.
Pahai liuchangpui khatdi aliu-chahuna palun wisuibo pui-e. Paniu akhun gase tadlujiu paduikhiu thuaklujiu npad sude.
Kavangpiu siniu pakhuga pakwang manalujiu din-e, “Chalungsajiu naduikhiu gasu tadui sakkhaira aleng pikhailo,”
Paniu din-e, “Paohubo sakkhailo chiujiu paduikhiuse pamakhuak gasu ponkiu lujiu patu pi sakkhai-e.
Sichiu paniu saklubo sai, paniu din-e, “Iniu nagu qontraodung lengdi thuakkhai bine, paliu tudi pijiu tadui thikhai lulo.”
Paniu paduikhiuse kalangjiu chakhao sakbo kuang gase runkhaijiu pagu qontrao hinatu pi tadui thikhai bide.
Siga maipiu siniu pangamse
Rebecca niu sichiu kamloi miboga, maipiu siniu paman kungbo kachia khap khoilujiu paniuga khatdi kachia tah kadibo nia pa-npomga khai bide.
Paniu din-e, “Napiuse saolo, dinkhailo. Thaichun amaidung nai I bamkhaira pakyga pabam daolu suma?”
Paniu paokakge, “Apiura Nahor nah Bethuel si-e, khatdi apui siniu Milkah-e.
Akyga magao nai chakhao tatek kengga bam-e,, khatdi naliu bamkhaira pabamdi bam-e.”
Siga maipiuse khudungkiu lujiu
Paniu din-e, “Awangpiu Abraham Rawang,
Aliupui siniu papui khulam pakwang lujiu, padmibo hinase paokhai sude.
Rebecca piubo pazanniu Laban kubo bam-e, paniu Abraham vangpiu bambo akhun gase pakmeng mide.

Laban niu patanpui leng pikhaibo paniu-khap nai patahdungse ngaolude khatdi sibopiu lamga paniu dinbose chiulude. Akhun mungga, pagu qontraodung khuga chapbam niubo Abraham vangpiu khuga menglujiu paniu din-e,
“Asai suilujiu chakylam wangkhe. Nangra

Sijengniu sibo piuse pakyga tadsude, sichiujiu Laban niu qontraodung bangse khikhai lujiu magao nai piubuanse pikhaide. Sigasu paniu Abraham vangpiu nai pamaidung lengse paliu phi khiura tadui ponwang khaide.
Katiu tiura ponwangboga, maipiu siniu din-e, “Iniu dinrabo ladse din makthen Ira katiu tiu lakge.”
Laban niu din-e, “Dinkhai sulo.”
Paniu haichiu dinsude, “I hai Abraham vangpiu-e.

niu awangpiutu dijiu thoikhaibide, sichiujiu patu pi lungwi khai bide. Paniu paleng milydung, kamidung, matom--kabuidung, kachia, rangkang, kavangpuidung, kavangpiudung, qontraodung khatdi qonniamdung kengjiu pikhai bide.
Awangpiu nao Sarah niu tanpeh miboga panah npiumai khat lungkhai bide, sichiujiu awangpiuniu pagu kabambo hina paleng pikhaibide.
Awangpiu niu pagu chamtanse majaira katanbo ladriat khat akhuga pikhaide, Sisera paniu din-e, ‘Canaan kadih gasu anah naoleng aliumai kadabo suilakge.
Sibosung, apiu kadihlam tadlujiu asingnamai khulamsu panaoleng kada khai rabo-e.’
Siga Iniu awangpiu khuga maniu-e, ‘Aliumai siniu asai suiwang raosai, dechiu ralo?’
Paniu paokakge, ‘Iniu pawan machang majaijiu bambo
Nagu ladriat gasu nangniu duaklu rabo khatnakha bamme; sisera nangniu asingnamaidung khuga tadbo tingga paliuniu suimak misai, sigasu nang duaklu rabo-e.’
“Thainai Iniu akhun gase wangboga, haichiu kakheng thiumibo-e, ‘
Akhun haiga I bamme, siga liuchang khatniu tadui thuakra wang dasai pakhuga, Iniu paduikhiu gasu tadui sakra khengne.
Paniu suikhaijiu khatdi agu qontraodung leng tadui pikhaira kamsai, sibopui situ pijiu awangpiu nah naoleng nangniu kada khaibo-e.’
Iniu arathoise loisui makhaga Rebecca hai pamakhuakga paduikhiu ponlujiu nthuakra meng kinniu-e. Siga Iniu pakhuga din-e, ‘I tadui sak khaine.’
Paniu paduikhiuse ponkiu nuanglujiu din-e, ‘Sakkhailo, Iniu nagu qontraodung lengdi thuakkhai bine.’ Sichiujiu I saklude, khatdi paniu qontraodung lengdi thuakkhai bibo-e.
Siga Iniu pakhuga maniu-e. “Nang sao nahlo?” Siga paniu paokakge, Apiura Nahor nai Milkah nahpiu Bethuel si-e.” Sigasu Iniu paniu-khap nai patahse khaibi mibo-e.
Iniu khudungkiu lujiu
Tuhoira, naliuniu awangpiutu lungsa khaijiu naliuniu kamrabo ngamse kamkhaine sai, lungsajiu dinkhailo, sichiu makge sai, dinkhailo, Iniu kamrabose makum sura mide.”
Laban nai Bethuel niu paokakge, “Haise
Haiga Rebecca bamme; patu puilujiu tadsulo.
Haise Abraham vangpiu siniu chiuluboga makhumkiu
Sigasu paniu chafai-tani, kachia, rangkang khatdi tatiu-tatah khoipad lujiu Rebecca tu pikhai sude. Paniu papiubo nai papui lengdi paman kungbo kalendung pikhaide.
Sichiujiu Abraham vangpiu khatdi pamaidungse tiu-sak lujiu, nchunse siga bamkhaide, Paliu nsuan buangsu miboga, paniu din-e, “Awangpiu khulam I malanwang mine.”
Chiudi Rebecca piubo nai papuiniu din-e, “Aliupui haitu pijiu n-nid kak khat-nia kumbo aliu khuga pibam khailujiu, pasainiu patu pitad khailo.”
Chiudi paniu din-e, “Aliutu pi manaikhai tulo.
Paliuniu paokakge, “Aliupui situ kulujiu paniu degu dinralo aliu nking mataikhe.”
Sijengniu Rebecca tu paliuniu kulujiu wang maniu-e, “Nang hainapiu saisui tadra suima?”
Paniu paokakge, “Yo,”
Sijengniu Rebecca tu paliuniu paky vangpui khattu maluang lujiu Abraham vangpiu nai pamaidung sai pisui lujiu tadkhai mide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu haibo lad dinjiu thoikhai bide:
“Awangpui yo, nang hai chamai sang-sang pui thiulo!
Nakai-nakikdung siniu paliu mikremai namdidungtu kangambo pi thiulo!
Sichiujiu Rebecca nai pavangpuise kaden lujiu khatdi qontraose tuanglujiu Abraham vangpiu paliu tadsude.
Isaac se Canaan gu tingrun lam, “Ringbambo Khat Siniu atu Ngaolen khaibo Akhun” gu ramjing gase wang lung bambo-e.
Paniu chaluga, chawan jawthi-tingga nkimeng bamboga, pagu qontraodungse wangkinbo ngaode.
Rebecca niu Isaac tu ngaoboga, pagu qontrao gasu buang nkum mide,
khatdi Abraham vangpiu khuga maniu-e, “Ui chalu lamsu aliu khulam tadwang kinbose saolo?”
“Pahai awangpiu si-e,” chiujiu kavangpiu siniu din-e. Sijengniu papee takumfai khoilujiu pazu takum mide.
Kavangpiu siniu Isaac khuga paniu kammibo hina dinkhai sude.
Sichiujiu Isaac niu Rebecca tu puiwang papui Sarah niu lungbo mathenky gase panao thiujiu lungde. Isaac niu Rebecca tu lungsa-e, sichiujiu papui hamibo gasudi palung kiu lu-e.
Abraham niu katambo puitu maluang lunglan-e, pazan niu Keturah ku-e.
Paniu Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak khatdi Shuah tu paleng lungkhai-e.
Jokshan hai Sheba nai Dedan piu-e, khatdi Dedan kaikikdungniu Asshurim, Letushim khatdi Leummim paliu-e.
Midia nahdungniu Ephah, Epher, Honokh, Abida khatdi Eldaah-e. Paliu mathiu hai Keturah kaikikdung-e.
Abraham niu pagu hinase Isaac leng pikhai diakge;
chiudi panao katam maidungniu lungbo nahdung lengra paniu ringbam khaga kalen pikhai-e. Sichiujiu haibo nahdungtu paniu panah Isaac khugasu Tingbanglam langkhai mibo-e.
Abraham hai tanpao suijiu, takum kai khat-je-riakchinnia-je-mangiukiu ga shai mide.
Panah Isaac nai Ishmael niu patu Hitt maipiu Zohar nah Ephron gu luzam, Mamre gu tingbanglam bambo Machpelah Tulimki gase baikhaide.
Haise Abraham niu Hitt maipiu khugasu liulubo luzam si-e, siga Abraham nai panao Sarah tu baikhai mibo-e.
Abraham shai mibo saiga, “Ringbambo Khatniu Atu Ngaobambo Ajai” mungga lungbambo tingga panah Isaac tu Tingwang niu thoikhai bide.
Sarah vangpui, Egypt mai liupui Hagar siniu Ishmael nahdung lungbo riak tingthubo gasu:
Nebaioth, Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam.
Mishma, Dumah, Massa.
Hadad, Tema, Jetur, Naphish khatdi Kedemah paliu-e.
Paliu hai chaphiu kariu-je-niakiu gu paopeh maidung-e, sichiujiu paliu zanthen hai paliu namdungga khatdi paliu mathak khai bamga pikhai-e.
Ishmael hai shaibo tingga, tingkum kai khat-je-samriu chinniakiu mide.
Ishmael kaikikdung hainiu Egypt gu tingbanglam. Assyria npuikiga, Havilah nai Shur kadih kakga lung-e. Paliu hai Abraham kaikikdung kakimai khugasu lungtam mibo-e.
Haise Abraham nahpiu Isaac racham-e.
Paniu (Mesopotamia ga bambo Aramea maipiu) Bethuel nahpui khatdi Laban tanpui Rebecca tu maluang lungbo tingga Isaac hai tingkum atai tangmide.
Rebecca niu panah lungmakbo jengniu
Pah ngena taphin manarabo jengniu pawon lung gasu panaise khat-khattu n-gi sude. Siga paniu din-e, “Dekamjiu haikumbo akhuga padjiulo?” Sichiujiu
“Nalung gahai chamai jat nia bamme; akad silakbo khangniatu nangniu lungne.
Khangkhatniu khangkhat suang tan nkiune; katingbopiu siniu nabopiutu macha rabo-e.”
Pawanse wangtang miboga, paniu khangniatu taphin manade.
Katingpiuse hengmaren-e, khatdi pagi hai pagiu thiubo chariang kum-e, sijengniu pazan hai Esau
Niabopiu siniu Esau phimik jammanting lujiu mana kiu-e, sijengniu pazan hai Jacob
Ngena kaniase dikhang sude, siga Esau hai tathiu hasibo, nkanlam lungbotu masenbo mai-e, chiudi Jacob ra chakyga maliu makjiu bambo mai-e.
Isaac niu Esau tu lungsa-e, palamra paniu kamwangbo wakhao janse pah tiuni-e, chiudi Rebecca ra Jacob tu lungsa-e.
Naikhat Jacob niu chara gandui langbamga, Esau hai tathiu habo gasu wangde. Pahai mariu mide.
Sichiujiu Jacob khuga din-e, “I kami mira kum mide, sibo kahengbo ganduise aleng janno.” (Sijengniu patu Edom
Jacob niu paokakge, “Nangniu nagu naraibo kalekdamse aleng pine chiusai, Iniu haise naleng pine.”
Esau niu din-e, “Wide, I shailaje bamme, sichiusai agu kalekdam siniu aleng degu pageng bamralo?”
Esau niu pagu kalekdamse Jacob leng pine chiubogu tasiangse siangkhai mide.
Siga Jacob niu paleng taruak nai chaganduise tam-tamna pikhaide. Paniu tiulujiu khatdi saklujiu tadmide. Esau niu naraibo thiujiu manangbo sira pawonleng ronna-e.
Abraham ken-ga padmibo makjiu kakibo charakhum khat padle. Siga Isaac niu Gerar ga bambo Philistine mai wangpiu Abimelech khuga tadle.
niu Isaac khuga ngaolenjiu din-e, “Egypt lam tadtulo, Iniu nakhu dinbo kadih haiga bamlo.

Haiga lunglo, sichiusai Iniu natu thoikhai bine khatdi maluangkhai bine. Iniu haibo kadih pakhiangna naleng khatdi nakai-kikdung leng pikhai bine. Iniu napiu Abraham khuga ladriat thiukhaibose majaikhai bine.
Iniu nakaikik leng tingpukga chagandung-jiukha pikhai bine, khatdi haibo kadih pakhiangna hai paliuleng pikhai bine. Iniu nakaikik-dungtu thoikhaibo kumjiu jat hinaniu thoikhaira akhuga khengrabo-e.
Iniu natu thoikhai bine, palamra Abraham niu agu tacheng-tajai hina khatdi chamtan hina majai khai mibo-e.”
Sijengniu Gerar ga Isaac lungmide.

Siga lungmaidung siniu panao lamga maniuboga pahai patanpui-e chiujiu paniu din-e. Paniu patu panao-e chiujiu wadaodi suimakge, palamra palun wichang wibo Rebecca jengniu patu kamshat mira pah ping-e.
Isaac niu siga pakak khat lungkhangbo tingga, naikhatra Isaac nai Rebecca marai thiubam niubo chawang Abimelech niu pagu kiranki gasu phuimeng ngaolude.
Abimelech niu Isaac tu kulujiu din-e, “Pahai nanao-e, dekamjiu nangniu patu natanpui-e chiujiu dinjiulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Iniu anao-e chiu dinsai atu kamshat mira pingbo jengniu-e.”
Abimelech niu din-e, “Nangniu aliu khuga degu kamkhai jiulo? Aliu ruangga mai khatniu nanaotu maluangji misai aliu mao pikhaira nang kambo-e.”
Abimelech niu pamaidung mathiutu kachanjiu din-e, “Haibo piutu maksai panaotu mai khat kumboniu kam masakhai sai patu kamshatmi rabo-e.”
Isaac niu sibo kadihga alin lingkhai-e, siga paniu maruk khaibo dam kai thiujiu dao-e, palamra
Sichiujiu pah lungwi jut-jut khangjiu kalek wichang wikhang-e.
Pagu milydung, matom-kabuidung khatdi kavangdung kengkhang mibo jengniu Philistine maidungniu patu manma sude.
Sijengniu nda papiu Abraham niu ringbambo tingga chukhaibo akhundungse paliuniu taniang chula kam mide.
Sichiujiu Abimelech niu Isaac khuga din-e, “Aliu kadih gasu tadmilo. Nang hai aliusuang tan nkiukhang mide.”
Sijengniu Isaac sulujiu Gerar ramjeng lam pagu rijiky thiukhai lujiu, siga pakak khat lungkhai-e.
Papiu Abraham ken-ga chukhaibo, Philistine maidungniu chula mibo akhundungse paniu phelan lujiu papiuniu mathak khaibo zandungse kukhai lan-e.
Isaac vangdungniu ramjeng gase akhun chujiu tadui dao-e.
Gerar maigu mily khuanmaidung nai Isaac gu mily khuanmaidung haichiu dinjiu n-gi sude, “Haibo duise aliu gu-e.” Sijengniu akhun zanse Isaac niu “N-gibo Akhun” chiujiu mathak khaide.
Isaac vangdungniu katambo akhun khat chulande, sibo lamgadi paliu n-gi lande, siniu sibo akhuntu “Mikrebo Akhun” chiujiu paniu kukhaide.
Sibo bam gasu paniu tadlujiu akhun khat chukhai lande. Siga ari-arabo padmakge, sijengniu sibo akhun zanse “Khenrang thiubo Akhun” chiujiu paniu kukhaide. Paniu din-e, “Tuhoira
Isaac niu sibo bam phutlujiu Beersheba lam tadle.
Sibonai nchunse
Siga Isaac niu rathakbam khat thiukhai lujiu
Siga Isaac niu maniu-e, “Dekamra tuhoi naliu atu adaora wangkin jiulo, ndara naliu atu chaka thiuni makjiu naliu kadih gasu atu hathon mibo makma?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Tuhoira
Aliutu wakasa kamlakge chiubo ladriat thiukhai nibo-e. Aliu natu lungsajiu agi-manaijiu pilungkhai mibo-e. Tuhoira
Isaac niu paliuleng katiu-kasak akhi mawi khai bijiu paliu tiu khaide khatdi sak khaide.
Nsuan-kalu paliu khat-khat khuga ladriat thiujiu tasiangniu madan diangkhaide, sichiujiu Isaac niu paliutu kanui mawi khaijiu paliu chakadung kumjiu ramna mide.
Sibonai Isaac vangdungniu wangjiu paliuniu chukhaibo akhun lamga pakhuga paokhai-e. Paliuniu din-e, “Aliuniu tadui daolude.”
Paniu sibo akhun situ “Ladriat khaibo Akhun” chiujiu kukhaide. Sichiujiu Beersheba
Esau niu tingkum atai tangmiboga, paniu Hitt mai liupui khangnia, Beeri nahpui Judith nai Elon nahpui Basemath tu panaoleng kujiu lungde.
Paliuniu Isaac nai Rebecca ringting tu kengkha kam magenthiu khaide.
Isaac hai tuhoira tanpao mibo donniu pamik ngaota mide, Paniu panah katingpiu Esau tu kujiu din-e, “Anah yo!”
Paniu paokakge, “Hao, Apiu yo.”
Isaac niu din-e, “I hai tanpao mide, siniu I shaiji mine chiubo nang si-e.
Nagu tavaipi nai pathu thin lujiu, nkan-ga meng aleng wakhao khat kamwanglo.
Iniu tiunibo tatekse langlujiu aleng ponwanglo. Sise Iniu tiulujiu, I shai makbo suangga agu kanambo thoidamse naleng pikhai diakne.”
Isaac niu Esau tu npao bambo gase Rebecca nking bam-e. Sichiujiu Esau tathiu hara tadmibo tingga,
paniu Jacob khuga din-e “Napiuniu Esau khuga haichiu dinbambo I chiu-e,
‘Aleng tathiu kamlu wang langkhailo. Sise I tiulujiu, I shai makbo suangga,
Rebecca niu dinlan-e, “Alad hai nking lujiu Iniu dinbo haise kamsulo.
Kamidung ruangga tadlujiu pamai kawibo poinia kadalujiu wanglo, sichiusai napiuniu tiunithubo jaiga Iniu langkhai bine.
Sise nangniu napiutu pitiu khailo, sichiujiu pah shai makbo suangga natu thoikhaibi rabo-e.”
Chiudi Jacob niu papui khuga din-e, “Esau ra pagiu lung-e, chiudi Ira agiu lungmakge, chiubo nang si-e.
Apiuniu atu kamedjiu, Iniu patu sonbo-e chiubo silusai, thoidam daobo sung tasiang hai ariga wangrabo-e.”
Papuiniu paokakge, “Anah yo, nariga wangrabo siangse ariga wangbo thiumilo; Iniu dinbo kumjiu tadlujiu kamise akhuga juwanglo.”
Sijengniu kamise juwang papui khuga pikhaide, sichiujiu papiuniu tiunithubo tatekse paniu langkhai bide.
Sigasu paniu chakyga khaibambo Esau faini withubose khoilujiu Jacob tu piukhai bide.
Paniu pawongchengga pagiu habo gase kami giuse guak khai bide.
Paniu tiuwibo katiuse nai khuaklubo taruakse pakhuga pikhai bide.
Sichiujiu Jacob niu papiu khulam tadlujiu dinsude, “Apiu yo!”
Paniu paokakge, “Yo, anah ruanggasu nang saolo?”
Jacob niu paokakge, “I hai nanah katingpiu Esau si-e; nangniu dinbose I kamlude. Lungsajiu buangsu ntaolujiu Iniu phungwangbo mijan hai tiukhai sulo, sichiujiu nagu thoidamse aleng pikhai sulo.”
Isaac niu din-e, “Anah yo, dechiujiu nangniu haijiukha jijiu daolu gulo?”
Jacob niu paokakge, “
Isaac niu Jacob khuga din-e, “Lungsajiu akhulam wangmana khailo, I natu kamed mataine. Pachangjiu nang hai Esau ma?”
Jacob niu papiu khulam ngutmana khaiboga, paniu patu kamedtao lujiu din-e, ‘Nakhuan sira Jacob khuan kum, chiudi namakhuak sira Esau makhuak kumme.”
Paniu Jacob tuse silu makge, palamra pamakhuak hai Esau makhuak kumjiu pagiu thiu-e. Siniu pagu thoidamse pikhaira kamsude,
chiudi maniulan-e, “Pachangsiak nang hai Esau ma?
Paniu paokakge, “Yo, I-ye.”
Isaac niu din-e, “Chamijanse tamnakha ponwanglo. Iniu tiulujiu agu thoidamse naleng pikhaine.” Sichiujiu Jacob niu sise ponwang pikhaide, khatdi sak khaira jawdi tamnakha ponwang pikhaide.
Sibosai papiuniu pakhuga din-e, “Anah yo, akhulam wangmana lujiu atu kapup khailo.”
Sichiu paniu wangjiu patu kupupboga, Isaac niu pafai pani-rai kasiu lujiu pagu thoidamse pikhai sude. Paniu din-e, “Anah rim haira
Tingwang niu tingpuk lamsu naleng kajikdui pikiujiu nagu luzamse patam kawibo pithiu khailo! Paniu naleng miusy nai jaw kengjiu pikhaibo thiulo!

Jatdungse navang thiulo, khatdi maidung siniu namasuangga makhum kiujiu lunglo. Nasingna maidung riga nangniu mawanglo, khatdi napuiniu lungbo kaikik hina namasuangga makhum kiujiu lunglo. Natu siangbo mai hina tasiang daolo, khatdi natu thoikhaibo mai hina sanwibo thiulo.”
Isaac niu pagu thoidam piloigap, khatdi Jacob niu tadpadmi gapboga, pachi Esau hai tathiu habo gasu malan wangde.
Paniudi tiu kawibo katiuse langlujiu papiu khuga ponwangjiu din-e, “Apiu yo, lungsajiu buangsu ntaolujiu, Iniu naleng ponwangbo tatek hai tiulujiu nagu thoidamse aleng pikhai sulo.”
Isaac niu maniu-e, “Nang saolo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Nanah katingpiu Esau si-e.”

Siga Isaac pagiu kasamjiu khatdi papum pakhiang masandi-dijiu dinsude, “Sichiusai, chakhao khat gilujiu akhuga ponwangbose saolo? Namasuang siaknaga I tiulude. Iniu agu kanambo thoidamse paleng pikhai mide, sise tingthengjiu pagu thiumi rabo-e.”
Haise Esau niu chiuluboga, palaipadjiu kap-marungjiu din-e, “Apiu yo, nagu thoidamse alengdi pikhailo!”
Isaac niu paokakge, “Nasai kariupiu siniu wangjiu atu sonlude. Paniu agu thoidamse lutad mide.”

Isaac niu paokakge, “Iniu patu nagu mawangpao thiura khatdi pasingna mai hina siniu pavang thiura thoikhai loimide. Iniu paleng tek, jaw pikhai mide. Tuhoira Iniu naleng wakhatdi kamkhai sonra hamide, anah yo!”
“Tingpuk gu kajikduise naleng hamide,
Kadihtam kawibo luzamse naleng hamide.
chiudi nasai kariupiu vang thiulo.
Chiudi nangniu suini makjiu atungbo gasu, pagu chamtan gasu nang mari lubui-e.”

Esau niu Jacob tu mareng-e, palamra papiuniu Jacob tu thoidamse pikhai mibo jengniu-e. Haichiujiu paniu maning-e, “Apiu shaijiu kiu-huirabo tingse nawang mide, haise loigap dasai, Iniu patu kamshat mirabo-e.”
Chiudi, Esau niu rangbambo hai Rebecca niu siluboga, paniu Jacob tu kulujiu din-e, “Kinglo, nachi Esau niu natu kam maha mira rangbam-e.
Tuhoira Iniu dinbo hai kamlo, anah yo. Kalangjiu Haran lam, asingnapiu khulam tadsulo,
siga nasingnapiu lungpom agikiu makthen pakak khat bammilo,

sichiujiu nangniu pakhuga degu kamkhai milo chiubo paniu mangaimak thenna bammilo. Sichiujiu Iniu natu puiwang lanra mai khattu langkhai sune. Dekamjiu naikhat gasu Iniu anah kaniatu kam mahami ralo?”
Rebecca niu Isaac khuga din-e, “Esau niu sangdiumai liudungtu lubo jengniu I asang mide, khenglulak mide. Jacob niudi haibo Hitt mai liu khattu lulansai, I shairabo mide.”
Isaac niu Jacob tu kuwang, kanui khaijiu din-e, “Canaan mai liutu nanao leng lumane.
Sibosung, Mesopotamia lam, napao Bethuel kyga tadlujiu, siga aliumai khattu, napao Laban nahpui khattu lulo.
Ngamkambo Rawang siniu nagu magiangbo situ thoikhaijiu, nanah kengkha lunglo, sichiujiu nang jatdung kengkha piu thiulo!
Paniu natu khatdi nakai-kikdungtu, paniu Abraham tu thoikhaibo kumjiu thoikhai bilo, khatdi Tingwang niu Abraham leng pikhaibo, tuhoi nangniu bambo kadih hai nagu thiulo!”
Isaac niu Jacob tu Mesopotamia lam, Aramea maipiu Bethuel nahpiu, Laban, Jacob nai Esau pui Rebecca piubo khulam langkhai mide.

Isaac niu Jacob tu thoikhai lujiu Mesopotamia lam panao thiura langkhai mide chiubo hai Esau niu silude. Isaac niu patu thoikhaijiu, khatdi Canaan mai liutu panao thiumakra chamtan pikhai-e chiubodi pah silude.
Jacob niu papui nai papiu kadin suijiu Mesopotamia lam tadmide chiubo silude.
Sigasu Canaan mai puitu lubo haidi papiu Isaac niu suini makge chiubodi pah silude.
Sijengniu, Abraham nahpiu Ishmael khulam tadlujiu, panahpui Mahalath tu panao thiulan-e, pahai Nebaioth tanpui-e.
Jacob niu Beersheba tu phutlujiu Haran lam tadsude.
Naimik ngutmiboga, paniu pabam khatga wangjiu siga pah riji thiukhaide. Paniu tatukang khattu makhum lujiu jikiu mide.
Sichiujiu jikiuboga, kadih gasu tinggen tangbo tasuan khat rakhaibo khatdi sibo riga mazadung siniu kiu-kiu, khang-khangbo pah mansude.
Khatdi sibo riga
Paliu hainiu kadihga nbuiniang kumjiu kengpad rabo-e. Paliuniu paliu kadih hai pake machang disan padrabo-e. Sichiujiu napen gasu khatdi nakai-kikdung pen gasu Iniu jat hinatu thoikhai bine.
Iniu natu maluang khai bine khatdi nangniu tadkhaibo bam machang gukhaijiu haibo kadihga natu puiwanglan khai bine. Iniu nakhuga ladriat khaibo hina kamtang makthen Iniu natu phutkhai lakge.”
Jacob niu buangsu lujiu dinsude, “Haiga
Pah pingjiu haichiu dinsude, “Haise Tingwang ky siak bamrabo-e; haise tinggen rengmun lekhaibo bamsiak rabo-e.”
Jacob niu pasaibonai nsuan kalu buangsu lujiu, paniu makhumbo tukangse ponlujiu mangaimakbo n-niutu leng somkhaide. Sigasu paniu sibo riga Tingwang leng kadpadbo thiujiu takisy-sa runkhaide.
Paniu sibo bam situ Bethel
Sigasu Jacob niu
khatdi Iniu apiu kyga wijiu malanwang lusai, nang hai a-Rawang thiurabo-e.
Iniu somkhaibo n-niutu bam haise natu kahumbo bam thiurabo-e, khatdi Iniu siga naleng pikhaibo agu kabambo hinagu dam kariugu dam khatse Iniu naleng pikhai rabo-e.”
Jacob niu pagu tabin tadjut jutjiu Tingbanglam tadkhai sude.

Simakdakjiu paniu luzamga, akhun khat bamboga mengtangde milydung dungdi sum jimagui bamniubo daode. Milydung situ tadui pikhaira tatu kadibo khatniu gomkhai bambo akhunse lepad lujiu pi tadui sakkhai rabo-e.
Milydung hinase siga wang aruangboga, mily khuanmaidung siniu tatuse lepadlujiu tadui pisak khai rabo-e. Sichiujiu paliuniu tatuse gomkhai lanmi rabo-e.
