Jacob niu mily khuanmaidung khuga maniu-e, “Akahmaidung yo, naliu delam sulo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Aliu Haran gasu-e.”
Paniu maniu-e, “Naliu Nahor tahpiu Laban tu sima?”
“Yo, aliu si-e,” chiujiu paliuniu paokakge.
“Pah wibamma?” chiujiu paniu maniu-e.
“Yo, pah wibamme,” chiujiu paliuniu paokakge. “Phuilo, haiga panahpui Rachel niu pagu milydungtu khomlu wangkinne.”
Jacob niu din-e, “Haise n-nien bamkha-e,, siniu milydung situ hawangra pawan makha-e, dekamjiu paliutu tadui pisak khai lujiu tagira pitadkhai lanmak jiulo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Milydung hinase wangkam makthen sise aliuniu kamdao lakge, paliu wang aruang lubo sainiu tatuse aliuniu lepadlujiu milydung situ tadui pisak khai rabo-e.”
Jacob niu paliutu npao bamkhaga Rachel niu pagu milydungtu khomlujiu wangtang mide.
Jacob niu papao Laban gu milydung nai Rachel tu ngaoboga, akhun gase paniu tadlujiu tatuse lepad khaijiu milydung situ tadui pisak khai bide.
Sichiujiu paniu patu biangpup khaijiu pachun wibo lad dinjiu kapsude.
Paniu pakhuga din-e,, “I hai napiu gu singnapiu-e, Rebecca nahpiu-e.”
Siga paniu papiu khulam paoraleng pakwang mide;
sichiujiu paniu patahpiu Jacob lamga chiuluboga pakmeng patu kiaplujiu patu biang-hiu khailujiu pakylam puiwang mide. Padmibo hina lamga Jacob niu Laban khuga dinkhai biboga,
Laban niu din-e, “Yo, pachangsiakjiu nangra atia nai azai-e.” Siga Jacob niu hiupum khat bamkhangde.
Laban niu Jacob khuga din-e, “Nang hai asingna-e chiujiu matha aleng changam kambo suilakge. Naphijeng kabuibo dejiu nang lunilo?”
Laban nahpui khangnia bamme, katingpui zanniu Leah chiujiu ku-e, khatdi napui zanniu Rachel chiujiu ku-e.
Leah mikphui manonbi-e,
Jacob niu Rachel tu marai-e, sijengniu paniu din-e, “Nangniu Rachel tu aleng pine chiusai, I takum chinnia naleng changam kamne.”
Laban niu paokakge, “Mai katam maitu pirabo suang Iniu patu naleng pirabo-e, akhuga bamlo.”
Jacob niu Rachel tu luraleng takum chinnia changam kam khang-e, chiudi paniu Rachel tu maraibo jengniu naimikpui watheng makbo leng chakkhai-e.
Sichiujiu Jacob niu Laban khuga din-e,, “Pawanse tangmide, nanah situ aleng pikhai sulo.”
Sijengniu mai hinatu Laban niu tanao magiangbo ngee leng katiu kisude.
Chiudi sibonai nchunse paniu Rachel sung Leah tu Jacob leng pikhaide, siga Jacob niu patu nphiuji mide.
(Laban niu pavangpui Zilpah tu panahpui Leah vangleng pikhai bide).

Pasaibo nai nsuan padmakha gara sise Leah-e chiubo Jacob niu silu makge, chiudi paniu siluboga Laban khuga tadlujiu din-e, “Dekamjiu nangniu haikumbo akhuga kamjiulo, Rachel tu lura Iniu changam kambo-e, dekamjiu nangniu atu haichiu sonjiulo?”
Laban niu paokakge, “Haiga aliu chengra katingpui mimakbo suangga nabopuitu chami thiubo pajai makge.
Magiangbo ngeeleng haibo n-nidkak khuankhailo, sichiujiu nangniu tingkum chinnia aleng changam kamne chiusai, Iniu Rachel tudi naleng pine.”
Jacob niu suikhaide, sichiujiu tanao magiangbo ngeese n-nidkak loilubo sai, Laban niu panahpui Rachel tu panao leng pikhaide.
(Laban niu pavangpui Bilhah tu panahpui Rachel vangleng pikhaide).
Jacob niu Rachel tudi maluang nphiuji khaide, khatdi paniu Leah tusuang patu lungsa nkiu-e. Sichiujiu paniu Laban leng tingkum chinnia changam kamkhai-e.
Rachel tusuang Leah tu lungsamak bibose
Leah pawon phungjiu panah piumai khat lung-e. Siga paniu din-e, “Amagenthak hai
Paniu pawon phunglanjiu piumai nah khat lunglande. Siga paniu din-e, “
Paniu pawon phunglanjiu piumai nah khat lunglan-e. Siga paniu din-e, “Tuhoira akinaniu atu lungsa matip nkiu mirabo-e, palamra Iniu paleng npiumai nah khangsum lungkhai bide.” Sichiujiu pazanse Levi
Sibo saidi pawon phunglanjiu panah piumai khat lung-e. Siga paniu din-e, “Tuhoira Iniu
Chiudi Rachel niura Jacob leng nahmai khatdi lungmakge, sijengniu pah pachipuitu manma sude khatdi Jacob khuga din-e, “Aleng ngena pilo, maksai I shai mine.”
Siga Jacob niu palung pomjiu din-e, “Iniu Tingwang sung malin silakge. Paniu natu ngena lungmakra kham mibo-e.”
Paniu din-e, “Haiga avangpui Bilhah bam-e, patu maluangji khailo, chiusai paniu aleng ngena lungkhaibo sui-e. Sichiujiu papen gasu maipui khat I thiulu bui-e.”
Sichiujiu paniu pavangpui Bilhah tu pakina leng pikhaijiu paniu patu maluang nphiuji khaide.
Siga Bilhah pawon phungjiu Jacob leng piumai nah khat lungkhaide.
Rachel niu din-e, “Tingwang niu alam liangjiu ladjan thiu khaide. Paniu arathoi chiukhaijiu aleng piumainah khat pikhai bide.” Sichiujiu paniu pazan leng Dan
Bilhah niu pawon phunglanjiu Jacob leng piumainah khat lungkhai lande.
Siga Rachel niu din-e, “Iniu achitu alai khaijiu chari thiuboga Iniu ngamlude.” Siniu pazanse Naphtali
Leah niu pah ngena lungta mide chiubo siluboga, paniu pavangpui Zilpah tu Jacob naoleng pikhai-e.
Siga Zilpah niu Jacob leng piumainah khat lungkhai-e.
Leah niu din-e, “I hai asan wibo pui-e.” Sichiujiu paniu patu Gad
Zilpah niu Jacob leng piumainah khat lungkhai lan-e.
Siga Leah niu din-e, “I hai dejiukha chunwilo! Tuhoira maidungniu atu chunwiliu chiu kura mide.” Sichiujiu paniu pazan Asher
Atiat tingga Reuben niu chalu mengboga chagaa
Leah niu paokakge, “Nangniu akinatu sutlubose naleng bui makha jiuma? Tuhoidi nangniu anahgu chagaa hai sutlanra kamjiu ma?”
Rachel niu din-e, “Nangniu nanahgu chagaase aleng pisai thaichun nang Jacob tu maluang jibo sui-e.”

Jacob niu chalulam menglu chawan malan wangboga, Leah niu paddao lujiu din-e, “Thaichunra nang akhuga jirabo-e, palamra Iniu sibo manleng anahgu chagaase pimibo-e.” Sijengniu sibonai nchun paniu patu maluang nphiuji khaide.
Tingwang niu Leah rathoi chiukhai bijiu, pawon phunglanjiu Jacob leng pamangiubo nah khat lung lande.
Siga Leah niu din-e, “Tingwang niu aleng tathuon pikhaide, palamra Iniu akina leng avangpuitu pikhai-e.” Sichiujiu paniu pazanse Issachar
Leah niu pawon phunglanjiu Jacob leng piumainah khat lunglan-e.
Siga paniu din-e, “Tingwang niu aleng kawibo kalen pikhai bide.” Tuhoira akinaniu atu lukhai mine, palamra Iniu paleng piumainah khang charuk lungkhai bide.” Sichiujiu paniu pazan Zebulun
Pasaidi paniu panah puimai khat lung-e, paniu pazan leng Dinah chiu mathak khaide.
Sibosai Tingwang niu Rachel tu maningtao khai bide, paniu parathoi paokak khaijiu patu ngena lungra suikhai bide.
Paniu pawon phungjiu piumainah khat lungde. Siga paniu din-e. “Tingwang niu agu mangam luthon khaijiu anah piumai khat pikhai bide.
Tingwang niu kakibo nahdi pikhai sanbo thiulo.” Sichiujiu paniu pazanse Joseph
Joseph tu manalubo sai, Jacob niu Laban khuga din-e, “Iniu akylam malan wangra atu suikhai sulo.
Iniu naleng changam kamkhai mibo phijeng anao anahmaidungtu pikhai sulo, I tadmine. Iniu naleng tatien thiu mawikhai mibose nang sibamme.”
Laban niu pakhuga din-e, “Haise Iniu dinkhaine, najeng gasu
Naphijeng riamsulo, Iniu pikhai bine.”
Jacob niu paokakge, “Iniu naleng dejiukha kamkhailo, khatdi Iniu akhibo milydungse dejiukha kingpadlo chiubo nangniu sibam-e.
I wangmakhabo tingga poinakha bamniubose, tuhoira kengchang keng mide, sichiujiu Iniu tadkhaibo bam hinaga
Laban niu maniu-e, “Iniu naleng degu pikhai ralo?”
Jacob niu paokakge, “I aphijeng wakhatdi lunimakge. Iniu kadinbo hai nang suisai, Iniu nagu milydungtu phuikhai lanne:
Thainai Iniu nagu milydung ruangga tadronjiu mily katikbo
Sichiujiu I hai nchang-e chiubo pasai nang silu sune. Nangniu aphijeng phuira wangbo tingga tarukbo mi maksai katikbo mily makbo bamniusai, sise Iniu agabo-e chiubo nang silubui-e.”
Laban niu paokakge, “I sui-e, nangniu kadinbo kumjiu anai kamkhe.”

Chiudi pasaibo nai Laban niu pachi katrikbo, daoru-rubo mi hina khatdi kaka daobo papui nai tarukbo hina kada lujiu lupad mide. Khatdi katikbo milydung hina jutam mide. Sichiujiu sibo hinase paniu panahdungtu phuira pikhai mide.
Sichiujiu paniu Jacob khugasu ngamdiuthen jengsum lungga sibo milydungtu halujiu chabin tadmide. Laban gu kamalibo milydung situ Jacob niu khuanbam-e.
Jacob niu muksing-ke, kamiusing-ke khatdi nkuangsing-ke tamlujiu paliu gi gaolujiu kamtrik khai sude.
Paniu sibo kedungse thinlujiu milydung nai kamidungniu tadui sakbo kuangdung suangga khai-e. Paniu siga khaibo sira, paliuniu tadui sakra wangbo tingga chakhaodungse wan-wan-e.
Sichiujiu kamidungse singkedung suangga piangbo tingga papoidungse daoru-rubo, katrikbo khatdi daoru-rubo piangpad sude.
Jacob niu milydung situ kamidung khugasu khaitam lujiu katrikbo leng maksai katikbo lengse papao Laban gu khaoruidung khugasu paleng genglura haichiu kam-e.
Papum kawibo khatdi pamai wibo khaodung siniu tadui sakra wangbo tingga khatdi wonbo tingga paniu singkedungse paliu suanggase ponkhai bide, sichiujiu paliuniu piangbo tingga trikbose piangde.
Chiudi pamai sabo maksai papum kasabo khaodung suanggara paniu singkedungse khai makge. Sichiujiu, wathengkha makjiu Laban khaodungse kasa-kason maliang mide, chiudi Jacob gura kawi maliang mide.
Haichiujiu Jacob lungwichang lungwi mide. Pagu kamidung, milydung, kavangdung, qontraodung khatdi qonniamdung hai kingpadjiu keng mide.
Laban nahdungniu haichiu dinbo Jacob niu chiulude, “Aliu piugu bambo hina Jacob niu lulude. Pagu chakhiu-chalan hinase aliu piu khugasu paniu daolubo-e.”
Laban tadi karaiga kumjiu majang atuk tamide chiubo pah ngao-e.
Siga
Sijengniu, pagu khaoruidungtu khuanbambo gasu Rachel nai Leah niu patu luzamga adaora Jacob niu chalad din kalen khaide.
Paniu panai khuga din-e, “Nanai piuniu karaiga kumjiu atu atuk mawi tamide, chiudi apiu Rawang niu atu maluang bamme.
Iniu alai khaijiu apaoleng maran khai mibose nanainiu sibamme,
Chiudi paniu atu sontiujiu, aphijeng kalilon kariu mide. Chiudi atu kam masa raleng Tingwang niu patu suikhai makge.
Laban niu katrikbo mi hina naphijeng-e chiuboga, kami hinase katrikbo maliang piangpadle. Paniu daoru-rubo mi hina naphijeng-e chiuboga sikumbo maliang piangpadle.
Tingwang niu khaoruidungse napiu khugasu lupad lujiu aleng pikhaibi-e.
“Kapiangbo ken-gase kawonbo michidungse katrikbo, daoru-rubo khatdi trukphukbo maliang siniu wonbo amang lamsu ngao-e.
Amang lamsu Tingwang gu mazaniu atu kujiu akhuga din-e, “Jacob.” Siga Iniu paokakjiu din-e, “Yo, haiga I bamme.”
Paniu din-e, “Phuilo, kawonbo michidungse katrikbo, daoru-rubo khatdi trukphukbo maliang-e, haise Iniu kambo lamra Laban niu nakhuga kambambose Iniu ngaobo jengniu-e.

I hai natu Bethel ga ngaolen khaimibo Rawang si-e, siga nangniu maningtaobo tusom somkhaijiu takysa liangkhaijiu akhuga ladriat thiukhai mibo-e. Tuhoira natu mana khaibo kadihlam malanwangra kaden sulo.”
Rachel nai Leah niu Jacob tu paokakge, “Anai piu khugasu anainiu daora wakhatdi ha-e.
Paniu anaitu sangmai kumjiu lukhai-e. Paniu anaitu jon mibo-e, sichiujiu patu pimibo rangkangse tuhoira pah thinloi mide.
Tingwang niu apiu khugasu luthon mibo senlan hina haira aliugu-e, khatdi anahmai gu-e. Tingwang niu nakhuga kadinbo saisuijiu kamsulo.”

Sijengniu papiu kadih Canaan lamse tadra Jacob niu kaden mide. Paniu panaodung, panahmaidungtu qontrao pi tongkhai khai lujiu, pagu khaorui hinatu halujiu khatdi paniu Mesopotamia ga daolubo hina phunglujiu tadsude.
Laban ra sibo tingga pagu mily giu kakipra tadmibo-e, siga Rachel niu papiu ky ramengse agalude.
Jacob niu pah tadmide chiubo dinkhai makjiu Laban tu sonlujiu tadmide.
Paniu pagu kabambo hina phunglujiu kalangjiu tadsude. Paniu Euphrate Giuki kenlujiu Gilead luongriang lam tadsude.
Jengsum sailamniu Jacob pakmide chiubo Laban khuga dinkhai bide.
Siniu pamaidungtu puilujiu jeng chinnia hakhangjiu Gilead luongriang gasu paniu Jacob tu hatang lude.
Sibonai nchun, pamang lamsu Tingwang niu Laban khuga wangjiu din-e, “Wakamdi nangniu Jacob tu kam kapin wimakge.”
Jacob niu maluang gase pagu rijiky thiukhai lujiu bamme, siga Laban di pasingnamaitu maluang lujiu Gilead luongriang gase pagu rijiky thiukhai lujiu bamme.
Laban niu Jacob khuga din-e, “Dekamjiu nangniu anahpuidungtu chari gasu sutlubo puidung kumjiu atu sonlujiu mahin puitad mijiulo?
Dekamjiu nangniu akhuga dinmakjiu mahin paktad mijiulo? Nangniu akhuga dinsai Iniu chalui thiujiu nthiam-tara khuanniu chunwijiu natu kapaokhai lubui-e.
Nangniu anahmai nai atahmaitu pijiu atu biang-hiu khai makge. Sise kapangbo ngamkam-e.
Iniu natu kam masalura pumtan bamme, chiudi kalu-nchun amang lamsu napiu Rawang niu natu wakamdi kam kapin makra dinkhaibo donniu-e.
Nakylam wangni nsang mibo jengniu-e chiubo I si-e, chiudi dekamjiu nangniu aky rameng agalu jiulo?”
Jacob niu paokakge, “Nangniu nanahmaitu sutlu suma chiu maningbo jengniu I pingbo-e.

Chiudi nangniu nagu charamengse mai khat khuga daosai, patu kamshat midi sui-e, haiga amaidung mathiu siniu lamchap thiubo-e, nagu hina phiulujiu khoilulo.” Rachel niu Laban ramengse agalude chiubora Jacob niu simakge.

Laban niu Jacob gu mathenkyga phiusude, sichiujiu paniu Leah gu mathenky khatdi kavangpui kaniagu mathenky gadi phiude, chiudi paniu parameng situ daomakge. Sichiujiu paniu Rachel gu mathenkyga ngut sude.
Rachel niu pagu charameng situ khoilujiu qontrao tongbo bam hangga khailujiu ntaoman mide. Laban niu mathenky lung pakhiangna phiusude chiudi daomakge.

Rachel niu papiu khuga din-e, “Paohubo yo, atu nalung pomkhai tulo, palamra I chahiugu tazai tadbamjiu nasuangga chapkhang ngamlakjiu-e.” Laban niu phiusude, chiudi paniu pagu charameng situ daolu makge.
Siga Jacob niu palung pomjiu din-e, “Iniu degu kamaobo kamkhai mijiulo? Nang degu kamkhaini jiulo? Nagu majise dekumkha bam jiulo?
Tuhoira nangniu agu mania kabambo hina phiuboga nagu mania degu daolo? Namaidung nai amaidung masuangga khailujiu anai saoniu majilo chiubo pijiu chap khailo.
Iniu nakhuga bambo hai tuhoira tingkum makai khang mide. Siga nagu mily maksai kami wakhatnadi kingpad makbo thiu makge, khatdi Iniu kamichi khat tudi tiulubo ha-e.
Mily khattu nkan khaoruiniu kamshat misai, sise Iniu majon-e. Sise I amao makge chiujiu nakhuga khengbo ha-e. Nchun ma, n-nien ma, hamibose nangniu akhuga paman kheng-e.
N-nien tingphuga khatdi nchun ka-agiboga magenthiujiu khengkhai kamigu-e. I jikiu khai makjiu tamibo-e.

Iniu natu maluang bamkhai mibo tingkum makai lungga sichiu wangmibo-e. Tingkum kariu-je-madaikiu siniu nanahpui kania jengniu, tingkum charuk siniu nagu khaorui jengniu I naleng tatien thiukhai mibo-e. Sichiu bamdi nangniu aphijeng hai kalilon kariu khai mibo-e.

Apiu Abraham nai Isaac Rawang siniu atu maluang khai maksai nangniu atu abenruang langkhai lubui-e. Chiudi Iniu kamkhai mibo, amagenthak hai Tingwang niu ngaobambo jengniu kalu nchundi pagu ladzanse paniu pikhaibo-e.”

Laban niu Jacob tu paokakge, “Haibo puidungse anahdung-e, paliu nahdungdi agu-e, khatdi haibo khaoruidungdi agu-e. Pachangsiakjiu, nangniu ngaobambo pakhiangna hai agu-e. Chiudi Iniu anahpuidung tudi paliu nahdung tudi khai-nbam ngamlakbo jengniu,
nakhuga ladriat thiura I kaden lude. Anainiu ladriat thiu khaibo haitu maningtaojiu bamra tubow khat khonsu khaikhe.”
Sijengniu Jacob niu mangaimak raleng chiujiu tatukang khat ponlujiu somkhaide.
Khatdi paniu pamaidungtu tubowse khonsura chamtan pikhaide. Sichiujiu paliuniu tubow munggase katiu-tiu aruang khaide.
Laban niu haisitu Jegar Sahadutha
Laban niu Jacob khuga din-e, “Haibo tubow hainiu ania khangniatu pijiu maningtao khaijiu bamrabo-e.” Sijengniu sibo bam situ Galeed chiujiu mathak khaide.
Laban niu dinlan-e, “Ania ramnajiu bamliudi

Laban niu dinlan-e, “Nangniu anah puidungtu na-nkhai sajiu bamdi, maksai nangniu katambo puidungtu nanao thiujiu bamdi, Iniu sibo lamga simak bamdi Tingwang niu aniatu phuijiu bamme chiubo maningtaolo.
Haiga Iniu khonkhaibo tubow hai ania kakga bamme, haisiniu maningtaobo n-niutu thiurabo-e.

Haibo tubow nai n-niutu hainiu pi maningtao khaijiu bamrabo-e. Iniu natu chari thiura wadaodi haibo tubow kenjiu hameng lakge, sichiujiu nangdi haibo n-niutu kenjiu atu chari thiura hamengbo suilakge.
Abraham nai Nahor
Paniu maluang rigase charathiu khaijiu khaoring khat gikhai-e, khatdi pamaidungtu siga katiu maluang tiu khaide. Paliuniu tiulujiu, nchunse maluong rigase jikhaide.
Pasaibo nai nsuan kalu buangsu lujiu Laban niu patahdung nai panahpuidungtu biang-hiu khaijiu ramna khaide, sichiujiu pakylam malanwang mide.
Jacob niu sichiu tadsubo ga mazadung khangsianiu patu npuiga adao-e.
Paniu paliutu adaoboga paniu din-e, “Haise Tingwang gu rijiky-e.” Sibo bam situ paniu Mahanaim
Jacob niu Edom kadihlam pachi Esau tu adaora leng chakhumpao maitu pamasuangga langkhai-e.
Paniu paliutu haichiu dinra ladti khai-e: “Nacham phungbo navangpiu, Jacob, Iniu awangpiu Esau khuga tacham pisikhai-e, Iniu Laban khuga bammijiu tuhoi tangbo malanwang makjiu-e.
Iniu matom-kabuidung, qonniamdung, milydung, kamidung khatdi kavangdung maruibam-e. Paohubo yo, Iniu nagu lungsiat daolura nakhuga tacham hai paowang kinbo-e.”
Chakhumpao mai siniu malan wangjiu Jacob khuga dinsude, “Aliuniu nachi Esau tu adao-e, sichiujiu pah natu adaora kaden bamme. Paniu chamai kai madaitu puilujiu kin-e.”
Siga Jacob se pingsude khatdi manang sude. Paniu pamaidungtu khatdi pagu milydung, kamidung, matom-kabuidungtu khatdi qontraodungtu thom nia thiujiu njanpad sude.
Paniu maning-e, “Wagaje, Esau niu karaibo thom situ hameng chari thiudi, kanabo thom sira marilu bui-e.”
Sichiujiu Jacob niu chara kahum sude, “Apao Abraham Rawang yo, khatdi apiu Isaac Rawang yo, akhuan nking khailo!

Nangniu navangpiu atu lungsa khaibo khatdi malum khaibo haise Ira wakhatdi buimakge. Iniu wadimakbo thun hai thinlujiu Jordan se kenlude, sichiujiu tuhoira Iniu haibo thom kania haitu puilujiu malanwang kin-e.
Achi Esau khugasu atu gukhailo, chiujiu Iniu kheng-e, I ping-e, paniu wangjiu aliu mathiutu chari thiura, khatdi npui, n-nah pakhiangnatu kamshat mira I ping-e.
Nangniu atu kawi pikhaijiu, akai-akikleng pikhaijiu mainiu pariak singam lakbo, duipui mungga bambo nbuiniang kum pilung khai bine chiujiu ladriat khaibo situ maningtao khailo.”

Siga nchunse manaikhai lubo sai, Jacob niu pagu khaoruidung gasu pachi Esau leng kalenra chiujiu: kamiliu kai nia khatdi pachi makai, milyliu kai nia khatdi pachi makai, pa-ndui tiubo qontrao papoi jaojiu samriu, matomchi kariu, matompui atai, qonniamliu makai khatdi pachi kariu kadapad khaide.
Paniu chakhaodung saisuijiu pavangdungdi kadapad lujiu khaitam-tam khaide. Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Amasuang tadrai sulo, sichiujiu chakhaodung jat saisuijiu pakak-kak saojiu tadlo.
Paniu raithubo vangpiu khuga chamtan pikhaijiu din-e, “Nangniu achi Esau tu adaoboga khatdi paniu haichiu maniuboga, ‘Nawangpiuse saolo? Nang delam tadralo? Nasuangga bambo khaoruidung hai saogulo?’
Siga nangniu haichiu paokak rabo-e, ‘Paliu hai navangpiu Jacob gu-e. Paniu haise pawangpiu Esau leng kalen thiujiu pikhaibo-e. Jacob papumsiak sailam tadkinne.”
Paniu niabo, sumbo khatdi khaoruidungtu phuikinmai hinatu nchamjiu chamtanse pikhaide: “Naliuniu Esau tu adaoboga haikum gapjiu dinrabo-e.
Naliuniu dinrabo-e, ‘Yo, Jacob se aliu sainaga tadkinne.’” Jacob niu haichiu maning-e, “Haibo kalendung siniu patu I hiamlu sune, sichiujiu paniu atu kuak khai sune.”
Paniu pagu kalendungse pamasuangga langkhai lujiu, sibo nai nchunse pagu mathenkyga bamkhai mide.
Sibonai nchunse Jacob niu sulujiu panao kania, pavangpui kania khatdi panahmai khang kariu-je-khatkiu situ puilujiu Jabbok Giuki kenmide.
Paniu paliutu singgiu hugen lamse langkhai lubo sai, pagu kabambo hina tudi langkhai mide.
Chiudi sailam paronna bammide.
Siga mai khat wangjiu patu nsuan tingbenpad makthen manu sude.
Maipiu siniu panai manubose ngamlak mide chiubo siluboga, paniu Jacob khen kakhiu khaide, siga pa-nkhuangra thuak mide.
Maipiu siniu din-e, “Tingben pad kinne, atu phut khailo.”
Jacob niu paokakge, “Nangniu atu thoikhai makthen I natu phut khai lakge.”
Maipiu siniu maniu-e, “Nazan saolo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Jacob.”
Chiudi paniu paokakge, “Nangniu dekamra chamtan sini jiulo.” Sichiujiu paniu Jacob tu thoikhai bide.
Jacob niu din-e, “Iniu Tingwang tu zudao-siak lude, chiudi I ringbam kha-e,” sijengniu sibo bam situ paniu Peniel
Peniel gasu Jacob niu tadsubo tingga naimik padmide, khatdi pa-nkhuang thiubo jengniu tutheng-tutheng tadsude.
Thainai tangbo Israel maidungniu pa-nkhuangraga bambo patiase tiumakge, palamra Jacob tu kakhiu khaibose sibo tia ga-e.
Esau niu pamai kai madaitu puilujiu wangkinbose Jacob niu ngaoluboga, paniu panahmaidungtu Leah, Rachel, khatdi pavangpui kania khuga njantam-tam khai sude.
Paniu pavangpui kania nai panai nahdungtu raithuboga, sibo sai Leah nai panahmaidungtu khatdi kanamthuboga Rachel nai Joseph tu khaide.
Jacob niu paliu mathiu suangga tadrai lujiu pachitu adao suraga kadihga makhumkiu lon chinnia sude.
Chiudi Esau niu patu adaora pakpad, pamakhuak kiapman lujiu, patu biang-hiu khai sude. Panai khangniase kapsude.
Esau niu ngangsu, maipuidung nai mainahdungtu ngaolujiu maniu-e, “Nasai suikinbo maidung hai sao-saolo?”
Jacob niu paokakge, “Paohubo yo, paliu haitu Tingwang niu lungsajiu aleng pikhaibo nahdung-e.”
Sichiujiu pavangpui kania siniu panai nahdungtu puilu wang kahum sude;
Sigasu Leah nai panahdung, sichiujiu kanamthuboga Joseph nai Rachel wangjiu kahum sude.
Esau niu maniu-e, “Iniu kalu daomibo maidung sira dekam mailo? Sise degu rambalo?”
Jacob niu paokakge, “Sisera nalungsiat daolura leng-e.”
Chiudi Esau niu din-e, “Singnapiu yo, alengra keng bamme, nagu bambose nakhuga pijiu bammilo.”

Jacob niu din-e, “Sichiu makge, Iniu nagu lungsiat daolude chiusai, agu kalen hai lungsajiu lukhailo. Nazu ngaolubo hai alengra Tingwang zu ngaolubo kum-e, tuhoira nangniu atu haijiukha kungjiu lukhai bide.
Iniu phungwangbo kalen hai lungsajiu lukhailo; Tingwang niu atu lungsa khaijiu, aleng pageng bambo hina pikhai bide.” Haichiujiu paniu lukhai makthen Jacob niu kheng sude.
Esau niu din-e, Tadra aliu kaden sukhe. Iniu namasuang tadraine.”

Jacob niu paokakge, “Nahmaidung tad ngamlakge chiubo nang sibam-e, sigasu milydung khatdi khaorui-khaonadungtu phuira jengniu I bammine. Paliutu naikhat tadi hamatan khaisai, pakhiangna shaimi rabo-e.
Chalungsajiu tadrai khai sulo, sichiujiu Iniu ngamdiuthen nahmaidung nai khaorui-khaonadungtu puilujiu koina suitadne, sichiujiu Edom gasu natu adaone.”
Esau niu din-e, “Sichiusai amai khangsiatu nakhuga khaidiak bine.”
Chiudi Jacob niu paokakge, “Sichiu makdi wide, Iniu nalungsiattu ronna lunibo-e.
Sichiujiu sibonai Esau niu Edom lam malanwang mide.
Chiudi Jacob niu Sukkoth lam tadkhaijiu, siga pakyleng khatdi pagu khaorui-khaonaleng nbaiky thiu khaijiu lungkhaide. Sijengniu pabam situ Sukkoth
Mesopotamia lamsu malan wangboga, Jacob niu Canaan kadihga bambo Shechem namdiga wijiu tanglu khatdi sibo namdi mungga bambo luzam khatga pagu rijiky thiu khaide.
Paniu Hamor kaikik, Shechem piu khugasu sibo luzamse rangkang kai khatleng liukhaide.
Paniu siga rathakbam khat thiu khaijiu Israel mai Rawang, El zan kukhaide.
Naikhat Jacob nai Leah nahpui Dinah niu Canaan maipuidungtu phuira tadle.
Sibo kyga chawang thiubambo Hiv mai Hamor nahpiu Shechem niu patu ngaolujiu, patu manomjiu nimkhai bide.
Chiudi paniu sibo aliumai situ ngao mawikhai lujiu patu marai mide, sichiujiu paniu patu hiamsude.
Paniu papiu khuga din-e, “Nangniu haibo aliumaina haitu anao leng lukhai rabo-e.”
Jacob niu panah puitu kam mangam khai bide chiubo silude, chiudi panahmaidungse luzam lam pagu khaoruidungtu phuira tadmijiu, paliu wangmak then wadi kam makge.
Shechem piu, Hamor siniu Jacob tu npaora tadsude, siga Jacob nahmaidungse luzam lamsu wang karen sude.
Paliuniu sibo chamse chiuluboga paliu suang hamide, palamra Shechem niu Jacob nahpuitu nimjiu Israel maidung khuga kamangambo kamkhaibo jengniu paliu lung pomchang-pom mide.
Hamor niu pakhuga din-e, “Anah Shechem siniu nanahpui situ marai mide, chalungsajiu patu pi magiang khailo.
Naliu mai nai aliu mai tanao-tanah thiu akinrabo-e chiubo ladriandi aliu kamkhe.
Sichiusai naliuniu aliu kadihga lungbo sui-e, naliuniu lungnibo bamga lungjiu, khenrang thiujiu chali-chala thiubo khatdi naliugu mania bambo sui-e.”
Sichiujiu Shechem niu Dinah piu nai pasingnamai khuga din-e, “Haise aleng suikhailo, chiusai Iniudi naliuniu lunibo hina pikhaine.
Naliuniu lunibo kalense akhuga dinlo, chamipui man lengdi naliuniu din kanithen dinlo; naliuniu atu pijiu patu magiang khaisai, naliuniu kakhengbose pine.
Shechem niu paliu tanpui Dinah tu kam mangam mibo jengniu Jacob nahdung siniu Shechem nai papiu Hamor tu sonjiu paokak khai bide.
Paliuniu pakhuga din-e, “Aliuniu aliu tanpui haitu pagi rommakmai khuga pimi khai silakge, sise aliuleng kamangambo gu-e.
Nangniu namaidung npiumai hinatu pijiu paliu gi romjiu aliu kum lubui-e, sai aliu suirabo-e.
Sichiusai aliuniu khat-khattu magiangbo sui-e. Sichiujiu aliuniu naliu khuga lungjiu naliu nai khat thiu rabo-e.
Chiudi aliuniu kadinbo hai nangniu suimakjiu, chagi rom maksai, aliuniu patu puilujiu tadmine.”
Haise Hamor nai panah Shechem leng kawibo thak kumjiu ngaokhai-e.
Sichiujiu akhangmaina siniu dinkhaibose kalangjiu kamsude, palamra paniu Jacob nahpui situ marai-e, pahai pakikhun-gu kungthubo si-e.
Hamor nai panah Shechem siniu namdigu rengmun gase tadlujiu, namdigu madui gase dinsude:

“Haibo maidung hai chaka thiusuibo mai-e, pijiu paliutu haiga lungjiu paliuniu tadnibo bamga tadjiu pilung khai sulo. Kadih hai paliu lengdi disui bam-e. Aliuniu paliu nahpuidungtu lukhe, khatdi paliu lengdi aliu nahpuidungtu pijiu magiang khaikhe.
Chiudi haibo maidung hainiu, aliudi paliu kumgapjiu aliu-gi romsai suirabo sangnu wakhatdi suilakge.
Sichiusai paliugu kabambo khaorui hina khatdi mania hinase aliugu lakma? Sijengniu paliuniu aliu khuga lungra suikhai bikhe.”
Sibo namdiga bammai hina siniu Hamor nai Shechem niu dinbose suijiu, npiumai hina paliu-gi rom sude.

Jengsum sailam, mai hinase paliu-gi rombo jamthiu bamboga Jacob nah kania, Dinah piubo Simeon nai Levi siniu mai khattudi pijiu maning masakhai makjiu, panai heng thinlujiu namdiga bambo npiumai hinatu, Hamor nai panah Shechem tu tangna kamshat mide.
Sichiujiu panainiu Dinah tu Shechem ky gasu puilujiu tadmide.
Sichiu kamshat mibo sai, Jacob nahdung kakimaidung siniu paliu tanpuitu kam mangam khaibogu chakhum ruibo thiujiu namdigu mania sutra tadlande.
Paliuniu namdiga khatdi luzamga bambo matom-kabui, khaorui khaona, qonniam khatdi wahina lutad mide.
Paliuniu maipui-maina hina khatdi paman kungbo mania hina lutad mide.

Jacob niu Simeon nai Levi khuga din-e; “Nanainiu atu kam chariu khaide, palamra tuhoi gasu Canaan maidung, Periz maidung khatdi haibo kadihga lungbambo mai hinaniu atu mareng mine. Ira amai kengmakge, paliu mathiu khat thiulujiu atu charithiu susai, akinamai mathiu harabo mide.”
Chiudi panainiu paokakge, “Aliuniu aliu tanpuitu papum kajonpuitu kumjiu kambo hai khengngam lakjiu-e.”
Sijengniu pakikhunmai khatdi pasai suikinmai mathiu khuga Jacob niu din-e, “Naliu khuga bambo sangdiumai radung hina phutlujiu naliu ronna kam masan lulo, khatdi masanbo faini piululo.
Aliuniu haibo bam phutlujiu Bethel lam tadmine, siga Iniu chariu magenthiubo tingga atu nkha khaibo khatdi Iniu tadkhaibo bam hinaga maluang khaibo Rawang leng rathakbam khat thiukhai rabo-e.”
Sijengniu, paliuniu sangdiumai radung hina khatdi paliuniu malan bambo chalandungse Jacob khuga pikhai-e. Sise paniu Shechem mungga bambo nfubang hanggase baikhai mide.
Sichiujiu Jacob niu khatdi panahmaidungniu tadsuboga, pamungga lungbambo namdidungga kapingbo wakhat padjiu, paliutu mai khatniudi hatad makge.
Jacob niu pamaidung hinatu puilujiu Luz, tuhoira Bethel kubo bam, Canaan dih gase wangde.
Siga paniu rathakbam khat thiukhai lujiu, sibo bam situ Bethel Rawang chiujiu kukhaide, palamra paniu pachi khugasu pakkinbo tingga Tingwang papumsiakniu patu ngaolen khaibo-e.
Siga Rebecca vangpui Deborah shaimijiu, Bethel gu tingrun lam bambo nfubang hangga baikhai mide. Sijengniu haisitu “Kapbo Nfubang” chiujiu kukhaide.
Jacob niu Mesopotamia gasu malanwangboga, Tingwang niu patu ngaolen daijiu thoikhaibi-e.
Tingwang niu pakhuga din-e, “Nazan hai Jacob kubo-e, chiudi tuhoi gasu Israel kumi rabo-e.” Sichiujiu Tingwang niu pazan Israel chiu kukhai bide.
Khatdi Tingwang niu pakhuga din-e, “I hai Ngamkambo Tingwang si-e. Kingkajiu lunglo. Jatdungse nakhugasu lung padrabo-e, sichiujiu nang hai chawangdung paopeh thiurabo-e.
Iniu Abraham nai Isaac leng pikhai mibo kadihse naleng khatdi nakai-kikdung leng pikhai rabo-e.”
Sigasu Tingwang niu patu saokhai diak mide.
Tingwang niu patu npao khaibo bamgase, Jacob niu n-niutu khat somkhai-e, khatdi siga paniu jaw nai takisysa liangkhaijiu kadkhaide.
Paniu sibo bamtu Bethel chiujiu pazan mathak khaide.
Jacob khatdi pakikhun mainiu Bethel tu saokhai lujiu tadpadboga, paliuniu Ephrath gasu tad madiu makhaga, Rachel panah lungra pating wangtangjiu siga ngena manathad gasu pasang mide.
Sichiujiu pagense thiu matan suboga, patu ponmanabo pui siniu pakhuga din-e, “Rachel yo, pingtulo, haisidi npiumainah ye.”
Chiudi paniu shaikhang suboga, paniu pazan hai Benoni
Sichiujiu Rachel niu shai miboga patu hai Ephrath puidi mungga baikhai-e, haise tuhoira Bethlehem chiujiu kubambo bam haisi-e.
Jacob niu siga n-niutu khat somkhai-e, sise tuhoi tangbo Rachel rawbam-e chiujiu sibam-e.
Jacob niu tadjut khangjiu Eder kyton jaikhat lam pagu riziky thiukhaide.
Jacob nah khang kariu-je-niakiu lung-e.
Leah niu lungbo nahdung hai Reuben (Jacob nah nahraibo,) Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar khatdi Zebulun paliu-e.
Rachel niu lungbo nahdung hai Joseph nai Benjamin-e.
Rachel vangpui Bilhah niu Dan nai Naphtali tu lung-e.
Leah vangpui Zilpah niu Gad nai Asher tu lung-e. Haidungse Mesopotamia gasu lungbo nahdung-e.
Isaac niu tingkum kai khat-je-riak tachat lungkhaijiu,
tanpao suilujiu shai mide; siga panah kania Esau nai Jacob niu patu baikhai mide.
Haidungse Edom chiujiudi kubo, Esau kaikik maidung-e.
Esau niu Canaan maipuidung: Hitt mai Elon nahpui Adah, Hiv mai Zebeon tah Anah nah Oholibamah;
Ishmael nahpui Neboioth tanpui Basemath tu majang lung-e.
Adah niu Eliphaz tu lung-e, Basemath niu Reuel tu lung-e,
khatdi Oholibamah niu Jeush, Jalam khatdi Korah paliutu lung-e. Haibo nahpiudungse Esau niu Canaan kadihga lungbambo tingga lungbo-e.

Sigasu Esau niu panaodung, panahpiudung, panahpuidung khatdi pakyga lungmai mathiu, paniu Canaan kadih gasu daolubo khaorui-khaonadung khatdi pagu kabam hina phunglujiu pasai kariubo Jacob khugasu katambo kadih lam tadmide.
Paniu sibo kadih phutmibo rambara Jacob panai lungbambo kadihse panaileng buita mibo jengniu-e; panaigu khaorui-khaonadung kengju mibo jengniu panai lung aruang ngamlak mibo-e.
Sijengniu Esau niu Edom gu maluanggen lam lungmibo-e.
Haidungse Edom mai paopeh Esau kaikikdung-e.
Esau nao Adah niu Eliphaz tu lung-e, sichiujiu Eliphaz niu piumainah khang mangiu: Teman, Omar, Zepho, Gatam khatdi Kenaz tu lung-e. Khatdi panao katampui Timna niu piumainah khat Amalek tu lung-e.
Esau nao Basemath niu Reuel tu lung-e, sichiujiu Reuel niu piumainah khang madai: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah khatdi Mizzah tu lung-e.
Esau nao Zebeon tah, Anah nahpui Oholibamah niu piumainah khangsum: Jeush, Jalam khatdi Korah tu lung-e.
Haibo phiudungse Esau khugasu lungwangbo maliang-e. Esau nah naraibo Eliphaz niu pahangga raokhai maidung paopeh-e. Teman, Omar, Zepho, Kenaz,
Korah, Gatam khatdi Amalek. Paliu mathiuse Esau nao Adah niu lungbo kaikikdung-e.
Esau nah Reuel niu pahangga raokhai maidung paopeh-e: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah khatdi Mizzah. Paliu mathiu hai Esau nao Basemath niu lungbo kaikikdung-e.
Pahangga raokhai maidungse Esau nao Anah nahpui Oholibamah khugasu lungbo kaikikdung-e: Jeush, Jalam khatdi Korah.
Haibo phiudung hinase Esau khugasu lungkiubo-e.
Edom ga lungmai haitu chaphiu tam-tamjiu njan padle, sibo pao-pehdungse pahangga raokhaibo Hor mai, Seir kaikikdung-e: Lotan, Shobal, Zebeon, Anah, Dishon, Ezer khatdi Dishan.
Lotan hai Hori nai Heman phiugu paopeh-e. (Lotan tanpui Timna kubo khat lung-e).
Shobal hai Alvan, Manahath, Ebal, Shepho khatdi Onam paopeh-e.
Zebeon nah piumai khangnia bam-e, sisera Aiah nai Anah si-e. (Anah hainiu ramjingga papiugu qonniamdung khuankinbo tingga duilum-ruak daolubo piu-e).
Anah hai Dishon piu-e, pahai Hemdan, Eshban, Ithran khatdi Cheran paliugu pao-pehmai-e. Anah nahpui khat bam-e, pazan Oholibamah ku-e.
Ezer hai Bilhan, Zaavan khatdi Akan paliu paopeh-e.
Dishan niu Uz nai Aran kiphiugu paopeh-e.
Edom kadihga lungbo Hor mai kiphiu siniu: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah, Dishon, Ezer khatdi Dishan paliu-e.
Israel maidungniu chawang thiu makhaga, pahangga raokhaibo wangdungniu Edom kadihga mawangjiu bamniu-e:
Dinhabah gasu Beor nahpiu Bela
Bozrah gasu Zerah nahpiu Jobab
Teman luongriang gasu Husham
Avith gasu Bedad nahpiu Hadad (paniu Midian maitu Moab kadih gasu ngamlubo piu-e).
Masrekah gasu Samlah
Rehoboth Giuki gasu Shaul
Akhbor nahpiu Baal Hanan
Pau gasu Hadad (panao hai Mezahab tah khatdi Matred nahpui Mehetabel si-e).

Esau hai pahangga raokhaibo: Timna, Alvah, Jetheth, Oholibamah, Elah, Pinon, Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar, Magdiel khatdi Iram paliugu paopeh-e. Paliuniu lungbo luongriang situ paliu kiphiu zan gasu kumibo-e.
Papiuniu lungkhai bamniubo Canaan kadih gahai Jacob lungjiu bam-e.
Haise Jacob kykhun racham-e.

Takum kariu-je-chinniakiu mibo akhang chabonmai Joseph hainiu papiu vangpui Bilhah nai Zilpah nahdungtu maluang lujiu mily nai kamidungtu khuanjiu bamme. Pasingna maidungniu kasa kambo thak hinase paniu papiu khuga paowang-wang-e.
Jacob niu panahmai ruanggasu Joseph tu lungsa nkiu-e, palamra pah tanpao miboga patu manabo-e. Paniu paleng ntiang taronbo khatdi paben kathengbo khat charuikhai bi-e.
Paliu piuniu Joseph haitu lungsa diangbo hai ngaoluboga, pasingna maidung hainiu patu mareng sude khatdi patu munruijiu koina npaota mide.
Joseph niu naikhat pamang manjiu, sise paniu pasingna maidung khuga dinkhaiboga, paliuniu patu mareng matan sude.
Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Iniu manbo mang nking matailo.
Aliu mathiu chaluga chamiu makhum rat kaduijiu bamboga, agu miukhumse suchap mide. Siga naliugu miukhum siniu agu miukhum mungga wang chap madui lujiu makhumkiu karen bamniu-e.”
Pasingna maidung siniu din-e, “Nangniu aliu riga chawang thiujiu mawangne chiu maning jiuma?” Sichiujiu pamang nai palad jengniu paliuniu patu ngaosabi-bi sude.
Joseph niu pamang katam khat manlanjiu, sisedi paniu pasingna maidung khuga din-e, “Chahiu, naimik khatdi chagan kariu-je-khatkiuniu akhuga makhumkiu bamniubo I man-e.”
Paniu pamangse papiu khuga dinboga, papiuniu patu kasanjiu din-e, “Sikumbo mangse dekumbo gulo? Napui, khatdi nasinggnamai aliu mathiu wang natu kahumne chiu maning jiuma?”
Pasingna maidung siniu patu ngaopun karen mide, chiudi papiura sibo lam pakhiangna makumjiu bam-e.
Naikhatra Joseph singna maidungse paliu piugu khaorui khuanra Shechem lam tadmide.
Jacob niu Joseph khuga din-e, “Nasingna maidungniu khaorui khuanra tadmibo Shechem lam nang meng matailo.”
Joseph niu paokakge, “Yo, I tadne.”
Papiuniu pakhuga din-e, “Tadlujiu nasingna maidung nai khaoruidung wibamma phuilujiu akhuga paowanglo.” Sichiujiu paniu patu Hebron Ramjeng gasu langkhai mide.
Sichiujiu Joseph se Shechem ga mengtang mide,
sichiu paniu siga mengtang lujiu pasuang hajiu ajanjiu phui bamboga maipiu khatniu patu ngaolujiu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nang detu phuibam jiulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Asingna maidungniu paliugu khaorui khonkinbotu Iniu phiukinbo-e. Paliu dega bamlo nang sima?”
Maipiu siniu din-e, “Paliu tadmide. Paliu Dothan lam tadmine chiu dinbo I chiu-e.” Sijengniu Dothan lam Joseph suitad sude, siga pasingna maidungtu daode.
Paliuniu patu kadiu lamsu ngaolujiu paliu khuga wangtang makhaga patu kamshatra paliu makhiam lujiu limsude.
Paliuniu khat-khat khuga dinsude, “Pamang manbo piuse haiga mengkin-e.

Tuhoira wanglo, patu kamshat lujiu paphaw hai kasangbo chakhom khatga khoi taliang khai mikhe. Patu hai nkan khaoniu kamshat mibo-e chiujiu aliuniu dinlubui-e. Sichiusai pamangse degu pad ralo chiubo aliu ngao sune.”
Paliuniu dinbambo hai Reuben niu chiuluboga, Joseph tu gukhaira matanjiu din-e.

Paniu din-e, “Patu hai kamshat tukhe, chiudi haibo ramjeng gu chakhom khatga patu jukhaimi takhe; patura kam mathiu tukhe.” Paniu haichiu dinbora, patu hai paliu khugasu gukhai lujiu papiu khulam langkhai mira maningbo-e.
Joseph niu pasingna maidung khuga mengtang gapda, paliuniu pa-ntiang taronbo khatdi paben kathengbose ntiangse gaothon mide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu patu kasangbo wakhunki khatga taliang khai mide.
Paliuniu wa tiubamga, simakdakjiu Ishmael maidung Gilead lamsu Egypt lam nbintad kin maitu ngaode. Paliugu qontraodungse parim wibo wamud nai wasa phung lujiu kin-e.
Judah niu pasingna maidung khuga din-e, “Aliu singnapiu haitu matha kamshat mibo siniu degu aliuleng pageng bamlo?
Khe, haibo Ishmael maidung khuga jonkhaimi takhe. Sichiusai aliuniu patudi kam masa lakge; palamra pahaidi aliu singna-e, aliu tia-e khatdi aliu zai-e.” Sise pasingna maidungniu suikhaide.

Sichiujiu Midian maidung khangsiase wangboga, pasingna maidung siniu Joseph tu chakhomky gasu jupad lujiu, rangkang makai leng Ishmael maidung khugase jonkhai mide, sichiujiu paliuniu patu Egypt dihlam puitad mide.
Reuben siniu chakhomky gase malan wangboga, Joseph haniu-e, siga palung magen thiubo siniu phuilujiu pafai-pani phetjiu kapsude.
Paniu pasingna maidung khuga malan wangjiu din-e, “Ngenase hamide! Iniu degu kamralo?”
Sichiujiu paliuniu kami khat gilujiu sibo zai siniu Joseph ntiangse kalui khaide.
Paliuniu sibo ntiangse khoilujiu paliu piu khulam langkhaijiu haichiu din-e, “Aliuniu haise daobo-e. Haise nanahgu ntiang makma?”
Papiuniu sise silujiu din-e, “Yo, haise pagu-e! Nkan khaoniu patu kamshat mibo-e. Anah Joseph tuhai phettap-tap mibam talakge!”
Jacob palung magen thiuboniu phuilujiu pafai-pani phet tap-tap lujiu, maliufai bensude. Panah jengniu pating kathengkha kapjiu huikhang-e.

Panahmaidung siniu patu hiamra wang-e, chiudi paniu suimakjiu din-e, “Anah jengniu Ira achun sajiu charuidih lam tadkiura mide.” Sichiujiu paniu panah Joseph jengniu palung magenthiujiu pating thengkha huikhang-e.
Sibo lungga, Midian maidung siniu Egypt dihga, Joseph situ chawanggu chakampao khatdi chawangkiningtu akhemaigu charipi, Potiphar khuga jonkhai mide.
Sibo tingga, Judah niu pasingna maidungtu phutlujiu, Adullam namdi gasu wangbopiu, pazanniu Hirah khulam lungra tadmide.
Siga Judah niu Canaan mailiu khat, Shua nahpuitu adaojiu paniu patu majang lungde.
Sichiujiu paniu panah piumai khat lung-e, paniu pazanse Er chiujiu mathak khaide.
Paniu pawon phunglanjiu npiumai nah khat lunglande, pazanse Onan chiu mathak khaide.
Paniu panah piumai khat lunglan-e, pazan leng Shelah chiu mathak khai-e. Sibo ngenatu lungbo tingga, Judah hai Achzib ga lung bambo-e.
Judah niu panah katingpiu Er leng Tamar kubo puitu panao thiukhai bide.
Er gu nkhai-rili hai wimakge, haise
Siga Judah niu Er saikariupiu Onan khuga din-e, “Tadlujiu nachipiugu kamipui khuga jikhailo. Sichiujiu nachi nao khuga nangniu kamrabo thiakse kamkhai bilo, sichiusai nachipiu kaikikse bamlubui-e.”
Chiudi ngenase panah lakge chiubo Onan niu sibo jengniu, paniu pachi naotu nphiujibo wan-ga ngena lungmakra pagu kazitduise kadihga kamkhai mide.
Paniu kambo hai

Siga Judah niu pamupui Tamar khuga din-e, “Anah Shelah niu akhang makhaga tadlujiu nakyga kamipui thiujiu bamniulo.” Paniu haise dinbo rambara, pachipiu kaniatu kumjiu Shelah tudi kamshat mi suma chiujiu pingbo donniu-e. Sijengniu Tamar pakylam malanwang mide.
Pakak khat saiga Judah nao shai mide. Paniu panaotu huikhai lubosai, Adullam gu pakapiu Hirah tu maluang lujiu pagu mily giu kakipra Timnah lam tadsude.
Tamar khuga mai khatniu papao hai Timnah lam pagu mily giu kakipra tadmide chiubo dinkhaide.

Siga paniu kamipui ponse khai kali lujiu, pazuse takum lujiu Timnah namdi lam tadkhaibo puidi Enaim rengmun gase ntao bamde. Haise paniu Judah nah nathubo piu Shelah se akhang mide, chiudi patu maluang lungra pikhai makge chiubo simasan kalu gasu-e.
Judah niu patu ngaoboga pahai papum kajonpui bam sune chiu maning-e, palamra paniu pazuse takum mide.
Paniu puidi mung gase tadpad lujiu pakhuga maniu-e, “Wide, nang dejiu luralo?” (Pahai pamupui-e chiubo pah simakbo donniu-e).
Paniu din-e, “Nang degu piralo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Iniu agu khaorui gasu kamipoi khat langkhai bine.”
Paniu din-e, “Wide, nangniu kamise langwang makhaga ladriat thiubogu aleng pikhai sai sui-e.”
Paniu maniu-e, “Ladriat thiubogu Iniu naleng degu piralo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Nagu madan diangbo nai nangniu mathun kinbo thunse khaidiaklo.” Sise paniu pakhuga pikhaide. Sichiujiu panai nphiuji khaide, siga pah pawon phungmide.
Tamar niu pakylam malanwang lujiu papee takum faise lupad mide khatdi kamipui ponse khailan mide.
Judah niu pakahbo Hirah tu maipui khugase tadlujiu paniu pikhai mibo maniase nkhiak lanra kami khat ponlujiu mengra langkhaide, chiudi Hirah niu patu daolu makge.
Paniu Enaim ga bammai khangsia khuga maniu-e, “Puidi mungga bambo papum kajonpuise dega bamlo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Haiga wadao khatdi papum kajonpui bam makge.”
Paniu Judah khuga malan wangjiu din-e, “Ira daomakge. Sibo bamga lungmaidung siniudi, siga wadaodi papum kajonpui lungmakge chiujiu din-e.”
Judah niu din-e, “Sibo mania sira patu pi khoilu sulo. Maidungniu aliutu nuibo aliuniu luni makge. Iniu patu pikhaira kambo-e, chiudi nangniu patu daomak tamibo-e.”
Chahiu sum kumbo saiga, mai khatniu Judah khuga din-e, “Namupui Tamar hai chakhapui kumjiu kambam-e, phuilo, tuhoi pah pawon phungmide.”
Judah niu chamtan pijiu din-e, “Patuse lenlam puipad lujiu maring rushat milo.”

Sichiujiu patuse lenlam puitad suboga, paniu papao khuga haichiu chalad din kalen khai-e: “Haibo maniadunggu papao khugasu I awon phungmibo-e. Haise phuilo, saogu madan diangbo gulo khatdi sao thunlo.”

Judah niu sise silujiu din-e, “Pahai maji-e, Iniu pakhuga kamkhai rabo ngamse kamkhai makbo jengniu-e. Iniu anah Shelah tu pijiu patu majang lungra pikhai rabo gu-e.” Sichiujiu Judah niu patu wadaodi nphiuji tamide.
Paniu mana surabo ting wangboga, pahai naphin manane chiubo simide.
Paniu tanah manarabo thad thiusubo tingga, ngena khatse paben kariopad sude, siga patu pon mana bambopui siniu pad thinman lujiu chalangriang kahengbo kabetkhai lujiu din-e, “Haise narai-e.”
Chiudi paniu pabense thadlan lujiu, pasingna piuse mana rai mide. Sijengniu patu pon manabopui siniu din-e, “Haichiujiu nangniu na-npuise kampang padrabo-e!” Sichiujiu patu hai Perez
Sibosai pasingnapiu situ paben-ga chalangriang kahengbo kabetkhai lujiu manapad sude, sichiujiu pazanse Zerah
Tuhoira Ishmael maidung siniu Joseph tu Egypt dihlam puitad lujiu chawanggu chakampao khat, chawangkining khuanbo charipi, Potiphar khuga jonkhai mide.
niu Joseph tu maluang khai-e, siniu paniu kambo hina tathui kam-e.
Pahai Egypt mai mawangpao kyga lungbam-e, sichiujiu patu hai
Potiphar niu pakhuga palung kim-e, sichiujiu pahangsiakga paniu patu khailujiu, paky lunggu khatdi pagu bambo mania hina npao pithiu khai-e.
Sigasu Joseph bambo jengniu Egypt maipiugu bambo paky-palu hina
Sichiujiu Potiphar niu wahina hai Joseph riga pikhai kam lujiu paniu tiubo katiu ronna sangnu wakhatdi manangta mide.
Joseph hai papumdi wi, pazu-palundi wi-e.
Sichiujiu pawangpiu nao siniu Joseph tu maraijiu maluangji radi pakhuga dinsude.
Paniu suimakjiu din-e, “Phuilo, I haiga bambo jengniu awangpiuniu kalungga bambo wakhat jengniudi palung manang makge. Pagu kabambo hina riga atu piphui khaira pikhai bi-e.
Pakhuga pumtan kabambo hina akhugasu natu makjiu kakira masiak makge. Sichiusai Iniu dechiujiu haikumbo kasabo ngamse kamjiu Tingwang tu atungjiu kamaobose kamsu ralo?”
Naimachang paniu Joseph tu maluangji khaira dinjiu bamdi, paniu suikhai makge.
Chiudi naikhatra Joseph niu chaky ngam kamra kalungga ngutbo tingga kavangmai khatdi ha-e.
Paniu pa-ntiang jamman lujiu din-e, “Akhuga wang jilo.” Chiudi paniu pa-ntiangse paben-ga phutkhai diak lujiu lenlam pakpad mide.
Paniu pa-ntiangse phutkhai diaklujiu kalung gasu pak mide chiubo siluboga,

paniu chakyga bammai kavangdungtu kulujiu sensude, “Haise phuilo! Haibo Hebrew maipiu, akinaniu puiwangbo piu hainiu aliutu kam mangam khaira kam bamme. Paniu agu kichen lungga ngutlujiu atu nimra kamsubo-e, chiudi Iniu alai khaijiu akhuan senpadbo-e.
Iniu marapadbo hai paniu chiuluboga, pa-ntiangse amungga thonkhai diaklujiu kamalam paktad mibo-e.”
Joseph wangpiuse chakyga wangmak then, paniu pa-ntiangse pakhuga khai nbam-e.
Sichiujiu paniu pakina khugadi ndanai lad kumgapjiu paokhai sude: “Nangniu puiwangbo Hebrew mai kavang piu siniu agu kichen-ga ngut lujiu atu kam mangamra kambo-e.
Chiudi Iniu marasuboga, pa-ntiang akhuga thondiak lujiu lenlam pah paktad mibo-e.”
Joseph wangpiuse palung pomchang-pom mide,
sichiujiu Joseph tu minlujiu chawanggu kavangkyga khai mide, siga pah lungsude.
Chiudi
Kavangkyga bammai hinatu kamrabo ngam hina paniu Joseph khuga pikhaijiu, kavangky gase papao thiu bamme.
Kavangky thinpao siniu, Joseph ngamkam hinaga wakhatdi phuira pageng bamson makge, palamra
Pakak khat saiga, Egypt mai wangpiugu jaw thinpao nai pagu taruak khuakpaose chawang khuga kamao kam mide.
Paniu sibo chakampao kania situ palung pommide.
Sichiujiu Joseph tu khai bambo chawangtu khuanbo charipigu kavangky gase panai tudi khai mide.
Paliu hai pating thengjiu kavangky gase bam khangde, siga charipi siniu Joseph tu paliu vangleng kumjiu kamkhaide.
Naikhat nchun kavangky gase jaw thinpao nai taruak khuakpaose panai mang mansude, paramba hai tam-tamme.
Joseph niu nsuanse panai khuga wangbo tingga, panai khangnia lung magenthiu bambo paniu ngaode.
Paniu panai khuga maniu-e, “Thainai dekamjiu nanai lung haijiukha chariu jiulo?”
Panainiu paokakge, “Anai khangniase chamang man-e, sichiujiu parambase mai khatniudi dinkhaira haiga hajiu-e.”
Joseph niu din-e. “Chamang ramba chalipadbo hai Tingwang niu pikhaibo-e. Nanai mangse akhuga dinkhailo.”
Sijengniu jaw thinpao siniu dinsude, “Amang lamsu mumsiken khattu ngao-e.
Sichiujiu pake sum gase paniuse padgapboga, papense padmide khatdi mumsyse minnuang mide.
Siga Iniu chawang piangse thinlujiu mumsyse thunkhai lujiu chawang leng pikhaijiu bamniu-e.”
Joseph niu din-e, “Sibo ramba sira, pake sumse jeng sum leng-e.
Pasumbo naise chawangniu natu kuak khaijiu natu phut khai mine, khatdi nabamse pikhai lanne. Nangniu karaiga jaw thinpao thiujiu bambo tingga kumjiu, nangniu papiangse patu pilan rabo-e.
Chiudi wahina naleng suimibo tingga, lungsajiu atu maningtao khaijiu chawang khuga atu dintao khailo sichiujiu kavangky haigasu atu lupadra nkha khailo.
Atu hai Hebrew mai dih gasu minwangbo-e, Egypt dih haigadi kavangky gahai ngutrabo leng I wakhatdi kamaobo kam makge.”
Taruak khuakpao siniu, jaw thinpao mang ramba chalipadbo hai maji-e chiubo siluboga, paniu Joseph khuga din-e, “I di amang khat manbo-e. Iniu taruak takam sum apeeriga singlujiu ponkinniu-e.
Takam nribo gase chawang leng khuak lubo pajat tam-tambo taruak bamme, sise nthingnadungniu wang tiubam niu-e.”
Joseph niu paokakge, “Sibo ramba sira haichiu-e: takam sumse jeng sum leng-e.
Pasumbo naise chawangniu natu phutpadjiu, napi dang mine! Sichiujiu paniu naphawse buitungga maseng khaine, siga thingnadung siniu najanse wang tiu sune.”

Sichiujiu jeng sum saiga, chawanggu manabo tingmik naise, chawangniu pagu chakampaodung hinatu maluang katiu tiu-e; siga paniu pagu jaw thinpao nai taruak khuakpao situ phut khaijiu, panaitu mathiu suangga puiwang-e.
Paniu jaw thinpao situ karaiga pangamse pikhai lande,
Chiudi paniu taruak khuakpao situra kamshat mide. Joseph niu dinkhai mibo kumgapjiu haise padmide.
Chiudi jaw thinpao siniu Joseph tu mangai-jing mide, paniu palamga maningtaota mide.
Tingkum nia saiga, Egypt mai wangpiuse pamang lamsu Nile Giuki mungga pah chapbamboga,
pamai kawibo khatdi lan-lanbo matompui chinnia padlujiu piubuan tagi bambo ngao-e.
Sigasu pamai kasabo khatdi paraku ronna bambo tompui chinnia padlan-e. Paliuniu padlujiu karaibo tompuidung munggase chapbam-e.
Sichiujiu pamai kasabo tompuidung siniu pamai kawibo tompuidung situ tiulude. Siga chawangse rakkhang mide.
Paniu jipkiu lande, siga katambo mang khat manlan-e. Chamiubui kawibo min-majin bambo kuon chinnia tang khatga ngao-e.
Khatdi chamiubui kasabo, kajaitao mibo kuon chinnia ngao-e,
sichiujiu paniu phuibamga, chamiubui kasabo kuon chinnia siniu kawibo kuon chinnia situ kajong lude. Chawangniu buangsu lujiu paniu manbo mang situ makum sude.

Nsuanse chawang palung magenthiubo siniu phuilujiu, Egypt dihga lungbo ningting maidung nai chamik thao-kadad maidung situ kusude. Pamangse paniu paliu khuga dinkhaide chiudi paliu mai khatniudi parambase pakhuga dinkhai ngam makge.
Siga jaw thinpao siniu chawang khuga din-e, “I maosiak mide chiubo thainai I din madu rabo-e.
Nalung pomjiu nangniu taruak khuakpao anaitu chawangky khuanbo charipigu kavangkyga anaitu khai mibo-e.
Naikhat nchunra anai khangniase chamang mande, sichiujiu paramba hai tam-tamme.
Siga charipigu vangpiu, Hebrew mai nah khangkhat bamme. Anai mangse pakhuga dinkhaiboga paniu parambase anai khuga dinkhai bide.
Paniu dinkhaibo kumgapjiu padmide, nangniu abamse pikhai lan-e, chiudi taruak khuakpao situra kamshat mide.”
Chawangniu Joseph tu kuraleng langkhai sude, sichiujiu patuse kavangky gasu kalangjiu puiwangde. Paniu pamun-giu gotlu, khatdi pafai-pani kali lujiu chawang khuga wangde.
Chawangniu pakhuga din-e, “I amang khat man-e, sise mai khatniudi paramba dinngam makge. Nangra chamangdung ramba dinpad ngam-e chiujiu mainiu akhuga din-e.”
Joseph niu paokakge, “Ira ngam lakge, Pakendibo piu yo. Chiudi Tingwang niu kabuibo rambase pikhai sune.”
Chawangniu dinsude, “Iniu Nile Giuki mungga chap bambo man-e,
sichiujiu matompui pamai kawibo khatdi lang-langbo chinnia padlujiu singgiu hugen gase tagi bam-e.
Sigasu katambo matompui pamai kasabo khatdi parakuruang ronna bambo chinnia padle. Sikumbo tompuidung maisiat kasase Iniu Egypt dihga ngao matai makge.
Pamai kasabo tompuidung siniu pamai kawibo tompuidung situ tiulude.
Chiudi sise mai khatniudi simakge, palamra paliuse kalu kumgapjiu paliu-mai sa-palun-e. Sibo sai I buangsu mide.
Sibo sai, Iniu chamiubui kawibo min majin bambo kuon chinnia patang khatga masi bambo mang mandai-e.
Sigasu chamiubui kasabo, kajaitao mibo khatdi pareng ronna bambo kuon chinnia ngao-e.
Sichiujiu chamiubui kasabo chinnia siniu kawibo kuon chinnia situ kajong lude. Iniu haise chamik thao-kadad maidung khuga dinbo-e, chiudi paliu mai khatniudi paramba din ngam makge.”
Joseph niu chawang khuga dinsude, “Mang nia haise khatnakha-e; Tingwang paniu kamrabose nakhuga dinkhai bibo-e.
Pamai wibo tompui chinnia hai tingkum chinnia-e, khatdi chamiubui kawibo kuon chinnia sidi tingkum chinnia-e, niase paramba macham kamme.
Pamai sabo tompui chinnia nai ruangmibo miubui chinniase charakhum wangrabo tingkum chinnia si-e.
Haise Iniu nakhuga dinkhai mibo kumjiu, Tingwang niu kamrabose nakhuga lenkhaibo-e.
Egypt dih pakhiangna tingkum chinnia hai katiu-kasak kengchang kengrabo-e.
Sibo sai, tingkum chinnia hai charakhum kadibo wangrabo-e, sichiujiu kawibo tingkum situ mangaimi rabo-e, palamra charakhum hainiu kadih haitu kam mahami rabo-e.
Sichiujiu katiu kengbo wan haitu mangaijing mirabo-e, palamra charakhum kadibo wangrabo-e, sichiujiu chariuchang chariusu rabo-e.
Nangniu manlon niabo sira Tingwang niu riatkhai mibo-e, sichiujiu haise padji surabo donniu-e.
“Tuhoira nangniu ningtingmai khatdi wa-kasimai khattu kada lujiu haibo kadih haitu phuira kamlulo.
Chakampaodung tudi khangsiatu kada lujiu katiu kengbo tingkum chinnia lunggase padam mangiugu dam khatse khom maduira lengdi nangniu kada khai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu wangkinbo kawibo tingkum lunggase katiu hai khom madui lujiu sise namdi hinaga baikhai lujiu, sise khuanra paliutu chamtan pikhai bilo.
Sichiujiu tingkum chinnia sai, Egypt dihga wangrabo charakhum lunggase katiuse njankhai lubui-e. Haichiusai maidungse kami mijiu shai lakge.”
Chawang nai pagu chakampaodung siniu haibo chamse suijiu lukhaide,
khatdi paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Tingwang hiupuina bambo Joseph suang kawibo kakimaitu aliuniu daolakge.”
Sichiujiu chawangniu Joseph khuga din-e, “Tingwang niu pakhiangna hai nakhuga lenkhaibo-e, sijengniu nang hai mai hina suang ningting bamme khatdi mai hina suang khaoti-e.
Iniu natu agu kadihgu papao pithiu khai bine, sichiujiu amai hina siniu nagu chamtan majai rabo-e. Nagu pumtan hai ahangnaga bamgap rabo-e.
Tuhoi gasu Iniu natu Egypt dih pakhiangnagu dihthinpao pithiukhai mibo-e.”

Sichiujiu chawangniu pagu madan diangbo njungkhapse paben gasu khoipad lujiu Joseph njungga khai bide. Paniu fainoi ntiang kawibo khat pi-ntiang khai lujiu, pawong gadi kachia tiuriang khat matiukhai bide.

Paniu chawanggu niabo chaqon-karise tongra patu pikhaide, sichiujiu patu chakhuang thiubo maluangtad kam khaijiu, haichiu senjiu pitad khai-e, “Npui marelo!” Npui marelo!” Sichiujiu Joseph haitu Egypt dih pakhiangnagu dihthinpao pithiu khaide.
Sichiujiu chawang siniu pakhuga din-e, “I hai chawang si-e, chiudi nangniu suikhaibo makjiu Egypt dihga mai khatniudi paben maksai pangen khengkhangbo suimakge.”
Paniu Joseph tu Egypt mai zan mathak khaijiu, Zaphenath Paneah chiujiu kukhaide. Khatdi panaoleng Heliopolis namdigu phaimiupiu, Potiphera nahpui Asenath tu pikhaide.
Egypt mai wangpiu ngam paniu kamsubo gahai Joseph tingkum samriu tang mide. Sichiujiu paniu chawanggu ladzanky saokhai lujiu, kadih pakhiangna rontad sude.
Katiu kengbo tingkum chinnia lunggase Joseph niu katiuse khalujiu namdidung gase khai makhuan sude.
Sichiujiu namdi hina gase pamungga bambo luzam gasu lulujiu baikhai karen sude.
Miusy hai kengju mibo jengniu, Joseph niu wa madatson makge, haise duipuigu nbuiniang kum mibo-e.
Charakhum hai wangmakbo suangga Asenath khugasu Joseph nah khangnia lungkhaide.
Paniu din-e, “Tingwang niu, amagenthak hina khatdi apiu kykhun mai hinatu pimangai khai bide,” sichiujiu paniu panah katingpiu zan Manasseh
Paniu haichiu dinlan-e, “Iniu chariu magenthiubo kadih gahai Tingwang niu aleng nahmaidung pikhai bide,” sichiujiu paniu panah niabo piu zanse Ephraim
Egypt dih gahai katiu kengbo tingkum chinniase loilujiu charakhum wangbo tingkum chinnia hai wangsude.
Joseph niu dinmibo kumjiu Katam tambo kadih hina gadi charakhum hai wangsude, chiudi Egypt dih gara katiu hai bamme.
Egypt maidung siniu katiu hajiu makim subo tingga chawang khuga katiu kheng sude. Siga chawangniu paliutu Joseph khulam tadra khatdi paniu dinbose kamra chamtan pikhaide.
Charakhum hai sabi-bi khangjiu kadih pakhiangna magenthiu sude, siga Joseph niu chabowky hina lekhaijiu, miusy hai Egypt maidung khuga jonkhai sude.
Kadihpiri pakhiangna gasu katiu liura Joseph khuga wang sude, palamra pabam hinaga charakhum hai sachang sajiu wang sude.
Egypt dihga katiu bam-e chiubo Jacob niu chiuluboga, paniu panah maidung khuga din-e, “Dekamjiu naliu wakhatdi kammak jiulo?
Egypt dih gara katiu bamme chiubo khuan I chiu-e; aliu kami mijiu shaimi makra tadlujiu tamnakha liulu wanglo.”
Sichiujiu Joseph singnamai khang kariuse Egypt dihga katiu malura tadsude,
chiudi Jacob niu Joseph tu pon macham siakbo singna Benjamin tura langkhai makge, palamra pakhu gadi wakhat padlan suma chiubo paniu manang-e.
Canaan kadih gadi charakhum hai wangmibo donniu, Jacob nahdungdi maidung saisui lujiu katiu malura wangde.
Egypt gu dihthinpao, Joseph siniu kadihpiri pabam hina gasu wangmaidung leng katiu jonkhaijiu bamme. Siga Joseph singna maidung siniu wanglujiu, paliu zu kadihga makhum kiujiu kahum sude.
Joseph niu pasingna maidungtu ngaoluboga paliutu silude, chiudi paniu paliutu simakbo kumgapjiu kamsude. Pakhuan-palad sajiu paniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Naliu hai delamsu wangmailo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Aliu hai Canaan kadih gasu katiu liura wangbo-e.”
Joseph niura paliutu sibam tadi, paliura patu simakge.
Paniu pamang manmibo situ maningtao lujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu hai chakhumpao maidung-e, aliugu kadih hai dekumboga sabamlo chiubo phuira wangbo-e.”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Chiumakge, Paohubo yo! Aliu hai navangmai kumjiu katiu liura wangbo-e.
Aliu hai pachi-pana mai-e. Aliura chakhumpao mai makge, paohubo yo, aliura aliu lung masan mai-e.”
Joseph niu paliu khuga din-e, “Chiumakge; Naliu hai aliugu kadih kasuanbo jam situ matadra wangbo-e.”
Paliuniu din-e, “Paohubo yo, aliu pachi-panamai khang kariu-je-niakiu-e, Canaan kadihga lungbambo maipiu khangkhat nahdung-e. Khang khatra shaimide, tuhoi nathubo piuse aliu piu khuga bamme.”
“Iniu dinmibo kumgap rabo-e,” chiujiu Joseph niu paokakge, “Naliu hai chakhumpao maidung-e.
Naliutu haichiujiu madiura mide: naliu saikariubo nathubo piuse haiga wangmak then, naliutu phutsilak mide, chiubo hai Iniu chawang zan gasu siangjiu dinbo-e.

Naliu khangkhat tadlujiu patu maluangwang rabo-e. Sichiujiu kakimaidung sira, naliuniu dinbo hai maji-e chiubo silu makthen bangkhai mirabo-e. Sichiu maksai, naliu chakhumpao maidung-e chiubo hai chawang zan gasu dinbo-e.”
Sichiujiu paniu paliutu kavangkyga jengsum khai mide.
Pasumbo naise Joseph niu paliu khuga din-e, “I hai Charatu pingbo mai-e, siniu pathak khat gasu naliutu rankhai bine.

Naliu hai naliu lung masanbo mai-e chiubo madura, naliu ruangga khangkhattu pijiu naliu bambo kavangky gahai khaidiak lujiu, naliu kakimaidungra naliu kykhun-ga katiu makim bambo maidungleng naliuniu liulubo katiu hai phunglu wangsulo.
Sichiujiu naliu singna nathubopiu situ haiga maomakjiu puimeng rabo-e. Sichiusai naliuniu dinbambo hai maji-e chiubo lura-e, khatdi Iniu naliutu kamshat lakge.”
Haise paliuniu suikhaide,

sichiujiu paliuniu khat-khat khuga dinsude, “Yo, tuhoira aliuniu aliu singnapiu khuga kamkhai mibo jengniu chariubo hai daobambo-e; paniu patu nkha khaira khengboga, pakhuga magenthiu chariubose aliuniu ngaobo-e, chiudi aliuniu paladse nkingkhai makge. Sijengniu, tuhoira aliu khuga magenthiu chariubo hai wangbambo-e.”
Paliuniu dinbambo hai Joseph ra sibam-e, chiudi paliura sise simakge, palamra chalad din chalimaitu khailujiu paliu npao bambo-e.
Joseph niu paliutu phutlujiu wang mahin kapsude. Paniu npaolan ngam lurabo wan ga, paniu malanwang, Simeon tu jupad lujiu paliu masuangga patu ratman mide.
Joseph niu pasingna maidung bangse pithiu mawikhai lujiu, paliugu rangkangse paliu khaoga malankhai bira khatdi npuikiga tiura katiu khai bilo chiubo chamtan pikhai bide. Sise kumgapjiu kamkhai mide.
Pasingna maidungse paliuniu liulubo tasiuse paliugu qonniam bang thiulujiu tadsu mide.
Paliuniu nchun wang mathak khaibo bamga, paliu ruangga khangkhat bang lepad lujiu qonniam leng katiu pira pabang lepadboga, pagu rangkangse pabang maga bamniubo ngaode.

Siga paniu pasingna maidungtu kulujiu din-e, “Phuilo, agu rangkang hai kalankhai nbamme, haiga abang lungga bamniu-e!” Siga paliu lung manangbo nai pingboniu phuilujiu khat-khat khuga dinsude, “Tingwang niu aliu khuga dechiubogu kamkhai jiulo?”
Paliuniu Canaan wangtangboga, paliu khuga padmibo pakhiangnase paliu piu Jacob khuga dinkhaide:
“Egypt maigu dihthinpao siniu palad sajiu aliutu npao-e, khatdi aliutu chakhumpao maidung-e chiujiu madamsui khaide.
Aliuniu paokakge, ‘Aliu chakhumpao maidung makge, aliu ka-nchang maidung-e.
Aliu piu khat nahdung-e, aliu khang kariu-je-niakiu-e. Aliu singna khatra shai mide, nathubo piu sira Canaan dihga aliu piu khuga bamme.’

Siga sibo piu siniu paokakge, ‘Naliu hai ka-nchangbo maidung-e chiubo silura madiura mide. Naliu khangkhat akhuga bamrabo-e, kakimaidung siniu naliu kylam katiu makim bammaidung leng katiu phunglu wangsulo.

Sichiujiu naliu saikariu piu nathubo situ haiga puimenglo, Sichiusai naliu hai chakhumpao maidung makge chiubo I sirabo-e, sichiusai Iniu naliu singna haitu pikhai lanne, sichiujiu naliuniu haiga bamjiu chali-chala thiubo sui-e.”
Sichiu lujiu paliuniu paliu bangdungse kam maruangpad suboga, paliu mathiugu rangkang hinase bamniu-e; sibo rangkangse paliuniu ngaoluboga, paliu mathiuse khatdi paliu piudi ping mide.

Paliu piuniu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliuniu anahmai hinatu kam mahakam khaini jiuma? Joseph hamide. Simeon hamide; sichiujiu tuhoidi naliuniu Benjamin tu lutad lanni jiuma? Chariu magenthiubo sira aronna-e!”
Reuben niu papiu khuga din-e, “Iniu Benjamin tu nakhuga puiwanglan maksai, nangniu anah kania situ kamshat milo. Patu akhuga pikhailo, Iniu patu nakhuga puiwanglan rabo-e.”

Chiudi Jacob niu din-e, “Anahra naliu sai suitad silakge, pachipiu shai mide, sichiujiu paronna bammibo-e. Npuikiga wakhat pakhuga padbo sui-e. Ira tanpao mide, sichiujiu alung magenthiubo siniu atu kamshatmi rabo-e.”
Canaan dihga charakhum wangbo hai sa-nkiu khangsude,
sichiujiu Egypt dih lamsu phungwangbo katiuse Jacob kykhun maidungniu tiuloi miboga, Jacob niu panahmaidung khuga din-e, “Tadlujiu aliuleng katiu tamnakhadi liuwang lanlo.”
Judah niu pakhuga din-e, “Aliuniu aliu saikariu piutu puimeng maksai, aliutu pijiu pakhu gadi wanglakge chiujiu sinapiu siniu palad tanjiu dinkhai mibo-e.
Nangniu aliu saikariu piutu pijiu aliu sai suitadne chiusai, aliu tadlujiu naleng katiu liuwangne.
Chiudi nangniu suimaksai, aliudi tadlakge, palamra aliuniu aliu singnapiutu puimengmak tasai, pakhu gadi aliutu piwang lakge chiujiu dinkhaibo-e.
Jacob niu din-e, “Naliuniu dekamjiu naliu saikariu-piu bamme chiujiu sinapiu khuga dinkhaijiu, atu haichiu kam chariubam jiulo?”

Paliuniu paokakge, “Aliutu khatdi aliu kykhun lamga ronna sinapiu siniu maniu bammibo-e. Naliu piu ringbam khama? Naliu saikariubo bam khama?” Siga aliuniu patu paokakra mibo-e. Dechiujiu aliu saikariu piutu pakhuga puimenglo chiubo paniu dinsune chiubo silu ralo?”
Judah niu papiu khuga din-e, “Ngena situ akhuga pikhailo, sichiusai aliu tadnuang mine. Sichiusai aliu mai khatdi kami mijiu shai lakge.
Iniu agu ringting pondeng lujiu siangbo-e, pasung nangniu atu kam kanibose kamlo. Iniu patu nakhuga wijiu puiwang lan maksai tingthengjiu Iniu kamaobose phungrabo-e.
Aliuniu haithengkha khuan khangmi maksai, tuhoira aliu siga tadlujiu malanwang lonnia lubui mide.”

Siga paliu piu siniu paliu khuga din-e, “Sichiusai, haibo kadih gasu padbo withubose dihthinpao leng naliu bangga: parim wibo wasa, makhuidui, maruta, nsiusy khatdi tathan-takisy kumbo hinase khailujiu phungmeng bilo.
Rangkangdi phung nkiu lulo, palamra danai naliu bangga bamniubo rangkangse phungmeng lanrabo-e. Sise kammao mibo bamdi sui-e.
Naliu saikariu piutu maluang lujiu tadsulo, sichiujiu malanwang majilo.

Sinapiu siniu naliutu lungsa khaira Ngamkambo Tingwang siniu kamkhaibo thiu milo; sichiujiu paniu “Benjamin haitu khatdi naliu singnapiu khat situ naliu khuga pimalan khaibo thiulo. Alengra, anahmai hami tadi harabo mide.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu kalendungse khatdi rangkangse damnia phung lujiu khatdi Benjamin tu maluang lujiu Egypt dih lamse tadsude. Sichiujiu paliu ronna Joseph khuga mengsude.

Joseph niu paliu ruangga Benjamin tu ngaoboga, paky khuanbo kavangpiu khuga din-e, “Haimaidungtu akyga puiwang milo. N-nien-sai Iniu paliutu maluang katiu tiune, siniu wakhao khat kamshat lujiu kaden khailo.”
Kavangpiu siniu patu chamtan pikhaibo kumgapjiu kamkhaide khatdi paliutu Joseph kyga maluangwang khaide.

Sichiujiu paliutu Joseph kyga maluang wangboga, paliu pingmide khatdi maning sude. “Danai meng karaibo men aliu bang lungga bamniubo rangkang jengniu aliutu siga maluang wangbo-e. Paliuniu aliutu minlujiu dapsune, khatdi aliugu qonniamdung sutlujiu aliutu pavang pi thiumi sune.”
Sijengniu kamun mung gasu paliuniu kavangpiu khuga dinsude.
“Paohubo yo, nangniu suikhaijiu aliu haiga katiu liura danai wangkhai mibo-e.
Aliuniu chakyga wangjiu, aliu bang lepadboga, mai hinagu rangkangse wadi machang makbo thiu makjiu dao-e. Haise aliuniu nakhuga phungmenglan kinbo-e.
Aliuniu katiu hai liulanra chiujiu rangkang kasiadi phunglu mengkin-e. Aliu bangga saoniu rangkangse khaidiak jiulo chiubo silu makge.”

Kavangpiu siniu din-e, “Manang tulo. Ping tulo. Naliu Rawang, naliu piu Rawang siniu naliuleng rangkangse khaibibo bamsune. Iniu naliugu rangkangse daolubo-e.” Sichiujiu paniu Simeon tu paliu khuga puiwang khai bide.
Kavang siniu paliutu kalung gase puingut khaide. Paliu phi khiura khatdi paliu qonniamdungtu pisak khaira paniu tadui pikhai bide.
N-niense Joseph niu wangboga, paliuniu paliugu kalense paleng pikhaira kaden lude, palamra paniu paliutu katiu maluang tiune chiubo paliu khuga dinkhai mibo-e.
Joseph niu chakyga wangboga, paliuniu kalense ponlujiu wang patu kahumjiu pikhaide.
Paniu paliu dechiu meng kinlo chiubo maniujiu khatdi haichiu maniu sude, “Naliuniu akhuga naliu piu tanpao racham dinkhai-e, pah dechiu bamlo? Pah ringbam khama khatdi wijiu bamma?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Yo, navangpiu, aliu piuse ringbam kha-e, khatdi wijiu bamme.” Sichiujiu pamasuangga paliuse makhumkiu sude.
Joseph niu pasai kariupiu Benjamin tu ngaoboga, paniu din-e, “Haise naliuniu akhuga dinbo naliu singna nathubopiu bamme chiubo sima? Anah yo, Tingwang niu natu thoikhai bibo thiulo.”
Sichiujiu Joseph niu buangsu lujiu tadnuang mide, palamra pasai kariupiu jengniu palung kheng ngamlak mide. Pakhuan padjiu kap padra kam mide, siniu kalunglam pakwang lujiu mahin kap sude.
Pazu nphiu lujiu khatdi paronna patu khamlujiu pah padlande khatdi katiuse kaden khaira chamtan pikhaide.

Joseph leng kuangkai khatga, pasingnamaidung leng katambo khatga chiujiu kaden khaide. Siga tiubammai. Egypt maidung lengse pabam katam khatga kamkhai-e, palamra paliuniu Hebrew maidungtu paliu suang kasiammai leng chakkhaijiu maluang katiu tiuni makge.

Singnamaidungse Joseph masuangga ntao muntong lujiu, khatdi paliugu tingkum saisuijiu tingthubo gasu nathubo chiujiu ntaogap bam-e. Paliu ntaobamse sichiu ntao bambo paliuniu ngao luboga, paliu suang hajiu khat-khattu phui sude.

Katiuse Joseph kuangkai gasu njan sude, sichiujiu Benjamin lengse kakimai leng suang khailon mangiu-ngiu khai-e. Sichiujiu paliuniu tiu magiu makthen khatdi sak mangiu makthen Joseph tu maluang tiu-e.
Joseph niu paky khuanpao khuga chamtan pijiu din-e, “Maidung situ paliuniu phungtad lubuibo saisuijiu paliu bangse thiukhai bilo, khatdi paliugu rangkang sidi paliu bang maga khai bilo.
Sichiujiu agu rangkanggi-piangse nathubo singnapiu bang maga pagu rangkang nai khai taman bilo.” Pakhuga dinkhaibo kumgapjiu paniu kamkhaide.
Nsuan kalu sibo singnamaidung nai paliugu qonniamdung situ langkhai mide.

Paliuniu namdi gasu watheng makbo kak tadmibo saiga, Joseph niu paky khuanpiu khuga din-e, “Uimaidung situ hatad sulo. Nangniu paliutu hatang luboga, paliu khuga haichiujiu maniulo, ‘Naliuniu dekamjiu kawibo sung kasaboniu malan khai jiulo?
Naliuniu dechiujiu awangpiugu rangkanggi-piangse agalu jiulo? Haise paniu ponsakbo piang-e, khatdi haisiniu pah taden thonjiu bambo-e. Naliuniu chamao maodi kam mide.’”
Kavang siniu paliutu hatang lujiu, sibo ladse dinsude.
Paliuniu patu paokakge, “Nangniu sichiu dinbo ramba hai degulo, paohubo? Aliuniu tasiang siangjiu dinbo-e, sikumbo ngamse aliuniu wadaodi kam makge.
Aliuniu Canaan dihga aliu bang maga daolubo rangkang sidi nakhuga phungmengbo hai nang sibam-e, Sichiusai, aliuniu dechiujiu nawangpiuky gasu kachia maksai rangkang agasu ralo?
Paohubo yo, aliu mai khangkhat khugasu sise daosai patu kamshatmi rabo-e khatdi aliu kakimai hina navang thiu rabo-e.”
Paniu din-e, “Sui-e, chiudi chapiang khoilubo piu ronna avang thiurabo-e, kakimai hinara naliu khenrang thiujiu tadbo sui-e.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu paliu bangse kadihga khikiu lujiu mai hina siniu pabang-bang lepad sude.
Joseph vangpiu siniu phiu mawijiu, tingthubopiu khugasu nathubopiu khuga katang phiu sude, sichiujiu chapiangse Benjamin bang lungga daolude.
Singnamaidungse paliu chun saboniu phuilujiu paliu fai-ni phet sude, sichiujiu paliugu qonniam bangse phunglujiu namdi gase malan wangde.
Judah khatdi pasingna maidung siniu Joseph kyga wangboga, siga pah bamniu-e. Paliuniu pamasuangga makhum kiujiu kahum sude,
siga Joseph niu din-e, “Naliuniu degu kamjiulo? Akumbo kadimai khat siniu taden gasu naliutu minlu bui-e chiubo naliu simak jiuma?”

Judah niu haichiujiu paokak sude, “Paohubo yo, aliuniu nakhuga degu dinralo? Aliuniu dechiu ari-ngamlu ralo? Aliuniu dechiujiu aliu lamga din masanlu ralo? Tingwang niu aliu maomeng hai lepad mibo gu-e. Tuhoira aliu mathiu hai navang thiurabo mide, chapiang bamniubo piu ronna thiu lakge.”
Joseph niu din-e, “Oh, sichiu makge! Iniu sikumbose wadaodi kamlakge! Pabangga chapiang bamniubo piuse ronna avang thiurabo-e, Kakimai hinara malan wangjiu naliu piu chun kam mawi khailo.”
Judah niu Joseph khuga khanglujiu din-e, “Paohubo, chalungsajiu Iniu nakhuga wa dinkhaira suikhailo. Atu nalung pomkhai tulo, nangra chawang papumsiak kumbo-e.
Paohubo yo, nangniu aliu khuga maniu-e, ‘Naliu piu bamma, khatdi naliu saikariu bam khama?’

Siga aliuniu paokakge, ‘Tanpao mibo aliu piu bamme, khatdi paniu tanpao mibo sai lungbo singna khat bam-e. Sibo nah chipiuse shai mide, sichiujiu papui nah ruangga paronna ringbambo-e; papiuniu patu lungsachang lungsa-e.’
Paohubo, nangniu patu phui mataira haiga puimenglo chiujiu aliu khuga dinkhaibo-e,
Siga aliuniu din-e, ‘Sibo nah sira papiutu phutsi lakge, paniu papiutu phutmisai, papiu shaibo sui-e.’
Siga nangniu din-e, ‘Naliuniu naliu saikariu nathubopiu situ puimeng maksai akhuga wangbo suilakge.’
“Aliuniu aliu piu khuga malanwangboga, nangniu dinbo hinase aliuniu pakhuga paokhaibo-e.
Sichiujiu pasai, aliuniu malanmeng katiuse malu lanra paniu aliu khuga din-e.
Siga aliuniu paokakge, ‘Aliu tadsi lakge, aliu saikariubo nathubo piu situ aliuniu puimeng maksai, maipiu khugase aliutu pi-ngut khai lakge. Aliu saikariubo nathubo piu siniu tadsai, aliudi tadne.’
Siga aliu piuniu aliu khuga din-e, ‘Anao Rachel siniu aleng ngena khangnia ronna lungkhai-e chiubo naliuniu sibamme.
Khangkhat piura atu phutlujiu tadmide. Patura nkan-khaoniu tatap-tap mibam sune, palamra paniu tadmibo nai gasu Iniu patu ngaota mibo-e.
Tuhoi naliuniu haina piutu akhugasu puilujiu tadboga, pakhuga wakhat padsai, I tanpao mibo ronna makjiu, naliuniu akhuga chariubo kamkhaibo jengniu I shaimi rabo-e.’
Judah niu dinkiu lan-e, “Siniu paohubo yo, Iniu ngena haitu maluang makjiu, apiu khuga malan wangsai, paniu ngena haitu ngaomak gapsai, pase siunangjiu shainuangmi rabo-e.
Paringting hai ngena ringting hainiu ratman bambo-e, sichiujiu pah tanpaosui kamibo jengniu, palung chariubo siniu pah siunangjiu shainong mirabo-e.

Sijengniu, agu ringting hai thinlujiu ngena leng Iniu apiu khuga tasiang siang mibo-e. Iniu pakhuga dinmibo-e, chiubora Iniu ngena haitu pakhuga puiwanglan maksai, aringtingga kamaobose Iniu phungrabo-e.
Sijengniu, paohubo yo, ngena sung haiga Iniu navang thiujiu bamne; patura pijiu pasingna maidung sai suilujiu wang sulo.
Ngena haitu puimakjiu, dechiu Iniu apiu khuga malanwang ngam ralo? Apiu khuga wangrabo mathadse Iniu phui ngam lakge.”
Paniu pakhuan padjiu nkiu marungjiu kapsude, sise Egypt maidung chiulujiu sibo chamse chawangkiningga paowang sude.
Joseph niu pasingna maidung khuga din-e, “I hai Joseph si-e. Apiu ringbam khama?” Haise chiuluboga, pasingna maidungse pingchang-ping mide, sichiujiu npaokak ngamlak mide.
Siga Joseph niu paliu khuga din-e, “Lungsajiu hailam wang aruang khailo.” Sichiujiu paliu wangboga paniu din-e, “I hai naliuniu Egypt dihga jonkhai mibo, naliu saikariu piu Joseph si-e.

Tuhoira naliu lung chariu talo, maksai naliuniu atu haiga jonkhai mibo lamga naliu mao mide chiubo dintulo. Haise pachangsiakjiu Tingwang niu naliu masuangga atu langkhai lujiu maidungtu gukhaira kamkhaibo-e.
Tuhoi charakhum wangbo hai tingkum nia ronna kha-e, tatien tensi lakbo khatdi atiat silakbo tingkum mangiu bamkha-e.
Tingwang niu atu naliu masuangga langkhai lujiu, haichiu maisuang habo jaigasu naliutu gukhaira khatdi naliu kai-kikdungtu piring khaira kamkhaibo-e.

Sijengniu atu haiga langkhaibo hai naliuniu makge, chiudi Tingwang niu-e. Sichiujiu paniu atu chawanggu dithubo chakampaose pithiu khaibo-e; Iniu pagu kadih pakhiangnagu papao thiu bambo-e. I hai Egypt maidung mathiugu mawangpao si-e.
Naliuniu Goshen luongriangga amungga lungjiu, naliu tah, naliu nahdung, naliugu khaorui-khaonadung, naliu tom-buidung khatdi naliugu kabambo hina lunglu bui-e.

Naliuniu Goshen ga lungsai, Iniu naliutu phuilu bui-e. Charakhum wangrabo hai tingkum mangiu bamkha-e; sijengniu naliu khatdi naliu kykhunmaitu khatdi naliugu khaorui-khaonadungtu pijiu makim khaini makge.’”
Joseph niu dinlan-e, “Tuhoira naliu mathiuniu, Benjamin nangdi, I hai Joseph siakge chiubo ngao lude.
Iniu Egypt dih haiga dejiukha pumtan bamlo chiubo, khatdi naliuniu ngaolubo hina hai apiu khuga paokhai bilo. Sichiujiu kalangjiu patu haiga puiwanglo.”
Paniu pasai kariupiu Benjamin tu kiapman lujiu kapsude, Benjamin di patu kiapman lujiu kapsude.
Sichiu kap-kapjiu, pachimai mathiutu kiaplujiu biang-hiu khai sude. Sichiu khaibo sainiu, pasingna maidungse patu npaopad sude.
Joseph singnamaidung chawangkiningga mengbam-e, chiubo cham hai chiuluboga, chawang khatdi pagu chakampaodung hina paliu chun wisude.
Chawangniu Joseph khuga din-e, “Nasingna maidungtu pijiu paliu khaodung bang thiulujiu Canaan kadih lam malanwang paliu piu khatdi paliu kykhunmaitu puilujiu haiga wangra dinkhai bilo.
Egypt dihga withubo kadihse Iniu paliuleng pikhai bine, sichiujiu paliuniu mali-malanjiu lunglu bui-e.
Egypt dih gasu talai ponlu wang, paliu nao-nahdung khatdi paliu piutu ponwang raleng dinkhai bilo.
Paliugu maniadung phutkhai mira majatulo, palamra Egypt dihga withubo kadihse paliugu thiumi rabo-e.”
Jacob nahdung siniu, paliu khuga dinkhaibo kumjiu kamsude. Chawangniu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, talaidung khatdi npuikiga tiuraleng Joseph niu paliuleng pikhai bide.
Paniu paliu mathiu leng chafai-tani kalira khat-khat pikhai bide, chiudi paniu Benjamin lengra rangkang kai sum nai chafai-tani kalira mangiu pikhai bide.
Paniu papiu leng Egypt dihgu withubo waniadung qonniam kariu bang, khatdi katiu-kasak, alin-taradung, npuikiga tiuraleng qonniam bang kariu pi khai bide.
Paniu pasingnamaidung situ maluangpad kanui khaijiu paliu khuga din-e, “Npuikiga ari-ara tulo.”
Paliuniu Egypt saodiak lujiu paliu ky Canaan lam, paliu piu khulam malanwang mide.
Paliuniu paliu piu khuga din-e, “Joseph hai ringbam kha-e. Pahai Egypt mai mathiugu mawangpao thiu bamme!” Siga Jacob palad padsilak mide khatdi paliutu malum ngam lulak mide.
Chiudi paliuniu pakhuga Joseph niu dinkhaibo hina dinsude, khatdi patu Egypt dihlam ponwangra Joseph niu pikhaibo talaise ngaoboga, pah charenbo gasu wilan wide.
Sichiujiu paniu din-e, “Anah Joseph hai ringbam kha-e! Iniu lunijiu khengbo sira haisitu-e! Iniu shai makhaga tadlujiu patu phuirabo-e!”
Jacob niu pagu bambo hina kaden lujiu, papiu Isaac Rawang tu kahumra, Beersheba lam tadsude.
Nchunse Tingwang niu patu ngaolen khaijiu kusude, “Jacob, Jacob!”
“Yo, haiga I bam-e,” chiujiu paniu paokakge.
Paniu din-e, “I hai napiu Rawang, khatdi Tingwang si-e. Egypt dihlam tadra manang tulo. Iniu siga nakai-kikdung situ kadibo jat pithiu khai bine.
Iniu Egypt dihlam natu maluang tadne, khatdi nakai-kikdungtu haibo kadihga maluangwang khai lanbine. Nang shaibo nai Joseph niu natu maluang bamne.”
Jacob niu Beersheba gasu tadpad sude. Panahmaidung siniu patu khatdi paliu nao-nahdungtu Egypt mai wangpiuniu pikhaibo talai gasu ponlujiu tadsude.
Paliuniu Canaan dih gasu daolubo khaorui-khaonadung hina khatdi mania hina phung lujiu tadpad sude.
Jacob niu patah-panahdung khatdi pakaikikdung hinatu maluang lujiu tadpad sude.
Jacob kykhunmai, patu Egypt dihlam maluangtad maidung sira panah tingthubopiu Reuben,
khatdi Reuben nahdung: Hanokh, Pallu, Hezron khatdi Carmi.
Simeon nai panahdung: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jachin, Zohar khatdi Canaan maipui nah Shaul.
Levi nai panahdung: Gershon, Kohath khatdi Merari.
Judah nai panahdung: Shelah, Perez khatdi Zerah (Judah nahdung kakibo siniu, Er nai Onan hai Canaan gasu shaimibo-e) Perez nahdung siniu Hezron nai Hamul.
Issachar nai panahdung: Tola, Puah, Jashub khatdi Shimron.
Zebulun nai panahdung: Sered, Elon, khatdi Jahleel paliu-e.
Haibo nahdungse panahpui Dinah jaojiu Leah niu Mesopotamia ga Jacob leng lungkhaibo-e. Leah niu lungbo kaikikdung hai pakhiangna samriuje-sumkiu-e.
Gad nai panahdung: Zephon, Haggi, Shuni, Ezbon, Eri, Arod khatdi Areli.
Asher nai panahdung: Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah khatdi paliu tanpui Serah. Beriah nahdung siniu Heber nai Malchiel.
Haibo khang kariu-je-charukkiu haise Laban niu panahpui Leah leng pikhaibo kavangpui Zilpah niu Jacob leng lungkhaibo-e.
Jacob nao Rachel niu npiumainah khangnia Joseph nai Benjamin tu lungkhaibo-e.
Egypt dihga, Heliopolis maigu phaimiu Potiphera nahpui Asenath niu Joseph leng Manasseh nai Ephraim tu lungkhai-e.
Benamin nahdung siniu Bela, Bekher, Ashbel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Rosh, Muppim, Huppim, khatdi Ard paliu-e.
Haibo khang kariu-je-madaikiu hai Rachel niu Jacob leng lungkhaibo-e.
Dan nai panah Hushim.
Naphtali nai panahdung: Jahzeel, Guni, Jezer khatdi Shillem.
Haibo khang chinniase Laban niu panahpui Rachel leng pikhaibo kavangpui Bilhah niu Jacob leng lungkhaibo-e.
Jacob niu Egypt dihlam tadboga puitadbo pakaikikdung siniu, panahmai naodung jaomakjiu riakcharuk-je-charuk kiu-e.
Sichiujiu Joseph niu lungbo nah khangniatu sikhaijiu, Jacob kykhunmai Egypt dihga wangbo haise riakchinnia-e.
Jacob niu Joseph tu Goshen gasu adao raleng chiujiu Judah tu langmeng rai-e.
Joseph niu papiutu adaora pagu chaqon-kari tuanglujiu Goshen lamse tadsude. Panai adaoboga, papiu wongcheng kiapman lujiu kapsui khaide.
Jacob niu Joseph khuga din-e, “Tuhoira I shaidi sui mide, palamra Iniu natu ngaolude, haichiujiu nang ringbam kha-e.”

Sigasu Joseph niu pasingnamaidung khatdi papiu kykhunmai mathiu khuga din-e, “Canaan kadihga lung bambo asingnamaidung khatdi apiu kykhunmai mathiu akhuga wang bamme chiubo hai Iniu tadlujiu chawang khuga paokhai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu naliu haira mily khuanmaidung-e, khatdi naliugu khaorui-khaona khatdi naliugu bambo hina phung lujiu wang bamme chiubo hai Iniu pakhuga paokhai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu chawangniu naliutu kulujiu maniubo tingga, naliu pao-pehdungniu kambo kumjiu naliu haidi khaorui-khaonadung maruijiu lungbo maidung-e chiubo pakhuga dinlo.
Sichiusai, paniu naliutu Goshen luongriang gahai pijiu lungkhai bine.” Joseph niu haise dinbora Egypt maidungniu mily khuanmaidungtu wadi kamra habo jengniu-e.

Sichiujiu Joseph niu pasingnamai khang mangiutu Chawang khuga puiwang lujiu din-e, “Apiu khatdi asingnamaidung Canaan kadih gasu, paliugu matom-kabui, khaorui-khaona khatdi paliugu kabambo hina puilujiu wangbam-e. Tuhoi paliu Goshen luongriangga bamme.”
Sichiujiu paniu pasingnamai situ chawang khuga puiwang khaide.
Chawangniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Naliu nde kamjiu lungmailo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Aliu paopehdung kumjiu aliudi mily khuanjiu lungmai-e, paohubo yo.
Canaan kadihga charakhum wangbo hai saju mibo jengniu, aliugu khaorui-khaona leng piubuan hamide, siniu aliu haiga lungra wangbo-e. Aliutu lungsajiu Goshen luongriangga lungra suikhai khelo.”
Chawangniu Joseph khuga din-e, “Tuhoira, napiu nai nasingna maidung wangbam-e,
Egypt kadih hai paliu gu-e. Withubo kadih Goshen luongriang gase paliutu pilung sulo. Sichiujiu paliu rong gasu kabuimai bamsai, agu khaoruitu phuikhaira paliutu pikhailo.”
Sichiujiu Joseph niu papiutu chawang khuga puiwangde. Siga Jacob niu chawangtu thoikhai bide,
siga chawangniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nagu tingkum dejiukha milo?”
Jacob niu paokakge, “Iniu haichiujiu lungron kinbo hai tingkum kaikhat-je-samriu tang mide. Chiudi agu ringting haira nda apao-apehmai kummakjiu, chariu magenthiu sui khai mibo-e.
Jacob niu chawangtu kanambo thoidam pikhai lujiu tadmide,
Sichiujiu chawangniu dinkhaibo kumjiu, Joseph niu papiutu, pasingna maidungtu khatdi paliu kykhunmai mathiutu withubo kadih Rameses namdi mungga pijiu lungkhai bide.
Joseph niu papiu khatdi pasingnamaidung leng khatdi ngenadung leng tangbo katiu pikhai bide.
Charakhum wangbo hai sabi-bi mide. Siniu Egypt maidi, Canaan maidi paliu pum suankiu kam mide.
Paliuniu katiu liubo gasu rangkang hinase Joseph niu chawangkiningga khai madui kam mide.

Egypt kadihgu khatdi Canaan kadihgu rangkangse thinkam mibo sai, paliuniu Joseph khuga wanglujiu din-e, “Aliu leng katiu pikhailo! Aliutu pishai khai tulo. Wakhatra kam khailo! Aliugu rangkang hamide.”
Joseph niu paokakge, “Naliugu rangkang hamisai, naliu gu khaorui-khaona phungwanglo. Iniu naliuleng katiu nkhiak khai bine.

Sijengniu Joseph khuga paliuniu paliugu khaorui-khaonadung: chaqondung, milydung, kamidung, matom-kabuidung khatdi qonniamdung phungwangjiu katiu nkhiak sude. Sibo kumse, sichiujiu paniu paliugu khaorui-khaonadung nai katiuse nkhiak khai bide.
