Pasaibo kumse paliuniu pakhuga wangjiu din-e, “Aliuniu wakhatdi nakhuga mahinra hamide, aliugu rangkang hamide. Aliugu khaorui-khaonadi hamide. Tuhoira aliu pum nai aliu ram makbo wakhatdi hamide.

Aliutu pijiu shai khai tulo. Wakhatra kamkhailo! Aliugu luzam haitu pijiu mariu kiumibo ram thiu khaimi tulo. Aliu pum nai aliu ram haitu katiu leng nkhiak khai sulo. Aliu chawang vang thiune, khatdi aliu kadihga pijiu alin lingkhailo.”

Joseph niu haichiujiu chawang leng Egypt kadih pakhiang liulude. Egypt mai hinaniu katiu leng paliugu kadih charam hai jonkam mide. Sichiujiu charam hina chawanggu kam mide, palamra charakhum wangbo hai sachang-sa mide.
Joseph niu Egypt dih pakeh machang mai hinatu chawang vang pithiu khai kam mide.
Paniu liumakbo sira singkumaidungu kadih ronna mide. Chawangniu paliuleng katiu hai pikhaijiu bambo jengniu paliuniu paliugu kadihse jonmakbo-e.
Joseph niu maidung khuga din-e, “Phuilo, Iniu naliutu khatdi naliu ram haitu chawang leng liulude. Siniu haiga naliu luzamga lingkhaira alin-tara bamme.
Sichiujiu atiat tingga naliugu dam mangiu-gu dam khatse naliuniu chawang leng pirabo-e. Masiakbo siniu naliuleng khatdi naliu kykhun maileng thiurabo-e.”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Nangniu aliu ringting haitu gukhai bide. Nangniu aliuleng kawibo kamkhai bide, chaibo, siniu aliu chawang vang thiu rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu Joseph niu Egypt dihga atiatpatbo dam mangiu-gu dam khatse chawang leng pirabo cheng hai kamkhai bide. Haise thainai tangbo tadbambo-e. Singkumaidung gu kadih ronna chawanggu makbo-e.
Israel maidungniu Egypt dih, Goshen luongriangga lungjiu kalekwi khang mide khatdi nahmaidung kingpad sude.
Jacob niu Egypt dihga tingkum kariu-je-chinniakiu lung khangjiu, pah tingkum kai khat atai-je-chinniakiu mide.
Paniu shaisu raga, panah Joseph tu kulujiu pakhuga din-e, ‘Nabense ahingpom kania kakga kariokhai lujiu, atu Egypt dihga baikhai lakge chiubo tasiang siang khailo.
Nangniu atu Egypt dih gasu ponpad lujiu apao-apeh mainiu lungbo kadih gase atu baikhai rabo-e.”
Joseph niu paokakge, “Nangniu kadinbose I kamrabo-e.”
Jacob niu din-e, “Nangniu kamrabo-e chiubogu tasiang sianglulo.” Joseph niu tasiangse siangkhaide, sichiujiu Jacob niu pazi gasu Tingwang tu thuonde.
Pakak khat sai, papiu marajiu bamme chiubo cham hai Joseph khuga paowangde. Sijengniu paniu panah kania, Manasseh nai Ephraim tu puilujiu papiu Jacob tu adaora wangde.
Jacob khuga panah Joseph niu patu adaora wangbamme chiujiu paokhaiboga, palaisangjiu paziga buangsu ntaode.
Jacob niu Joseph khuga din-e, “Ngamkambo Rawang siniu atu Canaan kadih Luz ga ngaolen khaijiu thoikhai bibo-e.

Paniu akhuga din-e, “Iniu naleng nahmai kengjiu pikhai bine, sichiujiu nakai-kikdung siniu kadibo jatdung thiurabo-e; Iniu haibo kadihse nakai-kikdung leng pikhaijiu, haise tingtheng paliugu thiurabo-e.”
Jacob niu dinkiu lan-e, “Joseph yo, Iniu haiga wangmakhaga, nangniu nahmai khangnia Egypt dihga lungbose agu-e, Ephraim nai Manasseh hai, anah kania Reuben nai Simeon kumbo-e.
Na-nah kakimai bamdi, paliura agu-e chiubo dinsi lakge; paliuniu daorabo kalekdam sira Ephraim nai Manasseh khugasu wangrabo-e.

Haise Iniu kambo lamra napui Rachel jengniu-e. Iniu magenthiu palanbo tingga, Iniu Mesopotamia gasu malanwangbo tingga, Canaan kadihga, Ephrath gasu diumakbo bamga pah shai mibo-e. Sichiujiu Iniu patu Ephrath npuiki mungga baikhai mibo-e.” (Tuhoira Ephrath haitu Bethlehem chiujiu kumibo-e).
Jacob niu Joseph nah kaniatu ngaoboga, paniu maniu-e, “Haise sao-saolo?”
Joseph niu paokakge, “Haise Egypt dihga Tingwang niu aleng pikhai bibo nah kania si-e.” Jacob niu din-e, “I niu paliutu thoikhaira akhuga puiwanglo.”
Jacob hai tanpaoju mibo jengniu pamik ngaota mibo-e, siniu pah wa ngao masan ngamlak mibo-e. Joseph niu ngena kania situ pakhuga puiwangboga, paniu panaitu kiaplujiu biang-hiu khai-e.
Jacob niu Joseph khuga din-e, “Iniu natu ngaodao lanra wadaodi maningta mibo-e, chiudi tuhoira Tingwang niu nanahdungtu tangbo pi-ngao khaide.”
Sichiujiu Joseph niu panaitu Jacob hingpom gasu jupad lujiu kadihga makhumkiu kahum sude.
Joseph niu Ephraim tu Jacob ben mawilam, Manasseh tu majadlam jukhai bide.
Chiudi Jacob niu paben khoi aki lujiu majadlamse nabopiu Ephraim piriga, paben mawilam siniu katingpiu Manasseh piriga kabakhai sude.
Sichiujiu paniu Joseph tu
“Apiu Abraham nai Isaac Rawang siniu
haibo ngena kaniatu thoikhai bilo!
Atu thainai tangbo maluang khaibo
Rawang siniu panaitu thoikhai bilo!
Chariu magenthiubo hina gasu atu gukhaibo
maza siniu panaitu thoikhai bilo!
Apiu Abraham nai Isaac khatdi chamtan hai ngena kania riga bammilo!
Panai kai-kik kengkha lungbo thiumilo.”
Papiuniu paben majadlamse Ephraim piriga kaba khaibose Joseph niu ngaoboga palung mak mide, siniu papiu bense Ephraim khugasu khoilujiu Manasseh piriga khai sude.
Paniu papiu khuga din-e, “Sichiu makge, apiu yo haise katingpiu-e, naben majatlamniu pariga kaba khailo.”
Chiudi papiuniu suimakjiu din-e, “I si-e, anah yo. Manasseh kai-kikdungdi kadibo mai thiu rabo-e, chiudi pasai kariupiu hainiu khatdi pakai-kikdung siniu di-nkiubo mai thiu rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu Jacob niu Joseph khuga din-e, “Nangniu ngaobo kumjiu Ira shaira pating namide, chiudi Tingwang niu natu maluang khai bine khatdi napao-napeh kadihlam natu puiwanglan khai bine.
Iniu Amor maidung khugasu chari thiujiu ngamlubo kadihtam withubo Shechem hai naleng pikhaibo-e, haise nasingnamaidung leng makge.”
Jacob niu panahmaidungtu kulujiu din-e “Wang maduilo, naliu khuga pasai degu padralo chiubo I dinkhai bine:
“Jacob nahmai yo, wangmadui lujiu nking lulo.
Naliu piu Israel niu dinbo hai nking lulo.
“Anah naraibo Reuben yo, nangra agu pumtan-e.
Nang-hai I chabon thiubogu nahraibo si-e.
Anahmai rong gasu Iniu najeng gasu asao thiu-e.
Nang hai duiliu tanbo duidetse kumbo-e.
Chiudi nangniu parathiubo sira lakge.
Palamra nangniu arammailiupui tu nphiuji mide.
Sichiujiu napiu zitu chakhuangthiu khai makge.
“Simeon nai Levi hai pachi-pana-e.
Panainiu kasa kamra panai heng-ngiu thin-e.
Panaigu mahin ladga I jaolakge,
Panainiu maduiboga I wang lakge.
Palamra panai lungpom gasu maitu kamshat mibo-e.
Khatdi panai chunning gasu kabuichi ngen kamtang mibo-e.
Panai lungpom riga tasiang bamme,
palamra panai lungpomse sachang sa-e.
Iniu panaitu Israel mai kadihga kam mara khaine.
Iniu panaitu paliu ruanggasu hathon mine.
“Judah yo, nasingna maidungniu natu thuonne.
Nagu mikremai situ nangniu ngamlu rabo-e
Nasingna maidung siniu natu kahumjiu lungne.
Pa tatekleng wakhao situ kamlujiu wang
pareng lungga mathakjiu ji kala bamme.
Mai khatniudi patu kam kabuak humakge.
Judah niu chawang thunse thinrabo-e.
Pakai-kikdung siniu pawan machang mawang rabo-e.
Jatdung siniu ramkha pakhuga phungwang rabo-e.
Khatdi pacham majaijiu pasuangga makhumkiu rabo-e.
Paniu pagu qonniampoi situ withubo mumsy rengga piubuanse pitiu khaine.
Tazai kum hengmarenbo mumsy jaw gasu pafai-pani katha rabo-e.
Jaw sakbo gasu pamik tazai kum hengrabo-e.
Ndui sakbo gasu pahiuse kapuang rabo-e.
“Zebulun niu duipui mungga lungrabo-e.
Pagu chaphuse malee-bam thiurabo-e.
Pagu kadih siniu Sidon tangrabo-e.
“Issachar haira qonniam suang wimakge.
Chabam kakga patu kabinman bamme.
Chiudi paniu lungbo bamse wi-e chiubo si-e.
Sichiujiu pagu kadihse kawibo khatle.
Sijengniu kavang kumjiu changam kamra
khatdi pabang phungra pangum marung kiu-e.
“Dan niu pamaidung wang thiurabo-e.
Paliudi Israel mai kakibo phiu kumjiu lungrabo-e.
Dan hai npui mungga kaniu si-e.
Patai karabo phungbo kaniu kumbo-e.
Sichiujiu chaqon phimikse paniu machao rabo-e.
Chaqon-tongbo piu situ sailam saothon mirabo-e.
“Gad tu humtiumai siniu limsune,
Chiudi paniu mariwang paliutu hathonlu rabo-e.
“Asher gu kadih gasu kawibo miusy masine.
Chawangleng kabuibo tatekse paniu pikhai rabo-e.
“Naphtali hai khenrang thiujiu pakkinbo tathan si-e.
Palun wibo khatdi matai wibo tathanpoi si-e.
“Joseph haise singgiu mungga lungbo chahung kumbo-e.
Pahai singgiu mungga lungbo pasy kengjiu masibo singbang kumbo-e.
Pagu mikremaidung siniu paliu heng-ngiu thinlujiu patu harabo-e.
Chiudi Israel maigu Khonpao khatdi Gukhaipao,
Jacob Rawang pumtan pen-gasu paheng-pangiuse palun bamne.
Napiu Rawang siniu natu nkha khaine.
Ngamkambo Tingwang siniu natu thoikhai bine.
Kaku lamsu kiubo tingriugu thoidam siniu,
khatdi kasukbo kadihgu tadui siniu,
nagu khaorui nai nakai-kikdung riga thoikhai bine.
Nagu alin-tara hinatu thoikhai bine.
Napao-napeh ramluong pakhiangnatu thoikhai bine.
Tingtheng ringbambo luong gasu kawibose pikhai bine.
Pasingnamai khugasu tampadbo Joseph rigase.
thoidam hina hai pibam milo.
“Benjamin hai pason kasabo tany kumbo-e.
Nsuan chawan paniu kamlujiu tiu bamme.”
Haidungse Israel mai kiphiu kariu-je-niakiu si-e, paliu piuniu paliutu kanui khaijiu dinkhaibo ladkeng si-e.
Jacob niu panahmaidung khuga chamtan pijiu din-e, “Tuhoira charuidihlam, amaidung khulam I tadmine,
sichiudi Canaan dihga bambo, Hitt mai Ephron gu luzam, Mamre gu tingbanglam bambo Machpelah tulimki gase atu baikhailo.

Haibo kadihse Abraham niu Ephron khugasu charao leng liulubo-e. Siga paliuniu Abraham nai panao Sarah tu baikhai mide, khatdi Isaac nai panao Rebecca tu baikhai mide, khatdi siga Iniu Leah tu baikhai mide.
Sibo luzam nai tulimkise Hitt mai khugasu liulubo-e, atudi siga baikhailo.”
Jacob niu panahmaidung khuga ladpi khailujiu jikiu shai mide.
Joseph niu papiutu kiapman lujiu papiu zu kapupjiu kapsude.
Sichiujiu papiu phawse wasa manuk khaira Joseph niu chamtan pikhaide.
Wasa manuk khaibo hai jeng atai ngutle. Sichiujiu Egypt maidung siniu patu jeng riakchinnia huikhang-e.
Huikhaibo tingse loimiboga, Joseph niu chawang gu chakampaodung khuga din-e, “Chawang khuga chalungsajiu haichiu paokhailo,
‘Apiuniu shai suraga, paniu Canaan kadihga kadenkhai bambo raw gase patu baikhaira ladriat thiukhai diakge.’ Siniu I tadlujiu apiutu baikhai lujiu wanglanne suikhailo.”
Chawangniu paokakge, “Tadsulo, nangniu ladriat khaibo kumjiu napiutu baikhai sulo.”
Sichiujiu Joseph niu papiutu baikhai raleng tadsude. Siga chawanggu chakampaodung, ladzankygu apaimai khatdi Egypt dihga jupaodung hina Joseph tu maluang tadde.
Pakikhunmai, pasingnamai khatdi papiu kykhunmai hinadi tadle. Nahmaidung nai khaoruidung ronna Goshen luongriangga bammibo-e.
Chaqon-kari tongmaidung khatdi chaqon tongmaidung hinadi pasai suitadle. Haise chamai mendi khatle.
Paliuniu Jordan Giuki gu tingbang lam bambo Atad gu asaiphung khatga wangboga pating thengkha nkiu-marungjiu kapsude, khatdi Joseph niu jeng chinnia tadiak khang-e.

Paliuniu Atad ga tadiakbo tien thiubo haitu Canaan dihga lung bammai siniu ngaolujiu haichiu din-e, “Egypt maidungse dejiukha chunsabo changee hai changi bam jiulo?” Sijengniu pabam situ “Abel Mizraim
Jacob nahdung siniu paliu khuga dinkhaibo kumjiu kamkhaide.
Paliuniu paphawse ponlujiu Abraham niu Hitt maipiu Ephron khugasu liukhaibo Canaan kadihga bambo, Mamre gu tingbang lam bambo luzam khatdi Machpelah gu tulimki raw gase baikhai mide.
Papiutu baikhai lubo sai, Joseph niu pasingna maidung nai pasai suitad maidung hinatu puilujiu Egypt dihga malan wang mide.
Paliu piu shaimibo sai, Joseph singnamaidung siniu din-e, “Aliuniu Joseph tu kam masa khai mibo jengniu, thainaira paniu aliutu chakhum ruira kamsai dechiu ralo?”
Sichiujiu paliuniu Joseph khuga haichiu tacham din-kalen khai sude:

“Aliu piu shai makhaga, aliuniu nakhuga kamaobo kamkhai mibo jengniu nakhuga aliu mao khenglulo chiujiu dinkhai diakge. Sijengniu tuhoira aliuniu nakhuga kamaobo kamkhai mibose lungsajiu kuak khailo.” Haibo chamse Joseph niu daoluboga, kapchang kapsude.
Siga pasingnamaidung siniu paliu ronna wanglujiu pamasuangga makhumkiu lujiu din-e, “Navang maidung aliu haiga bamme.”
Chiudi Joseph niu paliu khuga din-e, “Ping tulo, Iniu Tingwang sung thiusi lakge.
Naliura kasa maningbo-e, chiudi Tingwang niu kawi kamkhai bibo-e, palamra thainai tangbo ringbam maidungtu gukhaira haise kamkhai mibo-e.
Naliuniu pingra wadi ha-e. Iniu naliutu khatdi naliu nahdungtu phuikhai bine.” Paniu haibo lad dinjiu paliu lung pikim khai bide.
Joseph niu papiu kykhun maidungtu Egypt dihga maluang lujiu lungkhaide, sichiujiu pah tingkum kai khat kariu tangmiboga shai mide.
Paniu Ephraim nahdung nai patahmaitu ngaolu-e, khatdi Manasseh leng Makhir niu lungkhaibo nahdungtu ngaolu-e.
Paniu pasingnamaidung khuga din-e, “Ira shai mine, chiudi Tingwang niu naliutu haibo kadih gasu nda Abraham, Isaac, khatdi Jacob paliu khuga ladriat khaibo kadih gase maluang khaibi rabo-e.”
Sigasu Joseph niu pasingnamaidung khuga ladriat thiu khaira din-e, “Tingwang niu naliutu sibo kadih lam puitadbo nai aphaw hai pontadne chiujiu ladriat khailo.”
Sichiujiu pah tingkum kai khat-je-kariu lungkhaijiu, Egypt kadihga shai mide. Paliuniu paphaw gase wasa manukkhai lujiu tating lungga khai mide.
Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah,
Issachar, Zebulun, Benjamin,
Dan, Naphtali, Gad khatdi Asher paliu-e.
Jacob kaikik siakniu chamai riakchinnia-e. Panah Joseph sira Egypt dihga lungrai kamigu-e.
Pawan saisuijiu Joseph khatdi pasingnamaidung sigasu sibo ken-ga lungmai hina shaikam mide,
chiudi Israel mai kaikikdung hai lung king-ka khangjiu khatdi tan-hujiu, Egypt dih pakhiangna paliu riak hai kengkhang mide.
Paniu pamaidung khuga din-e, “Haibo Israel maidungse kengju mide khatdi paliu hai tandi tan-e, siniu paliutu aliu pingrabo bam mide.
Wakhat gasu tathiu-chari padjiu aphen susai, paliuniu aliu mikremai khulam lianglujiu, haibo kadih gasu paliu pakmi sune

Sijengniu paliutu thinmanra, Egypt mainiu palung kasamai katanmaitu paliu riga khai sude. Chawanggu katiu-kasak makhuan rabo bamdung thiura pijiu Israel maidungtu Pithom nai Rameses namdidung pithiu khaide.
Chiudi Egypt maidungniu Israel maitu kam chariu, kam mathad khangbo suang paliu riak nkiujiu kengkhang bi-bijiu paliu kadih pakhiangna phuimide. Sichiujiu Egypt maidungse Israel maitu pingsude,
siniu paliutu pijiu kavang ngam kamjiu mathad sude. Paliu-ky, paliu-lu kamboga, paliutu thin piujiu wadi lungsakhai makjiu kamsude.
Sigasu Egypt mai wangpiuniu, Hebrew mai puidungtu tanah lungbo tingga pon mana khaibo pui kania, Shiphrah nai Puah khuga dinsude.
Paniu panai khuga haichiu din-e, “Nanainiu Hebrew mai puidungniu ngena lungbo tingga ngenase piumai nahsai kamshat milo, chiudi puimai nahsai piring khailo.”
Chiudi tanah pon manabo puidungse Charatu pingbo jengniu, panainiu chawang kadin piumakge, sichiujiu piumai nahdung tudi pijiu ring khaide.
Sijeng-niu chawang siniu tanah pon manabo puidung situ kulujiu maniu sude, “Naliuniu kambo hai degulo? Dekamjiu piumainahdung haitu naliuniu piringkhai jiulo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Hebrew mai puidungra Egypt mai puidung kum makge, paliura mana malapa-e, aliu mai khatdi wangtang makhaga, paliura manalulu-e.”
Tanah pon manabo puidungse Charatu pingbo jengniu, paliu tudi Tingwang niu paliu kikhun pithiu khai bide. Sichiujiu Israel maidung hai pariak kengbi-bi khang sude khatdi tankhang sude.
Kanambo gara chawangniu pamaidung mathiu khuga chamtan pikhai sude: “Hebrew mainiu lungbo piumainah hinatu ponlujiu Nile giukiga thonkhai milo, chiudi puimainahdung situra piring khailo.”
Haichiubo ken-ga, Levi kiphiu gasu mai khatniu paky phiu gasu maipui khattu majang lungde,
paniu panah piumai khat manade. Paniu lungbo ngena hai ngaoboga wiju mibo jengniu paniu patu chahiu sum baikhang sude.
Chiudi paniu patu bai ngamlak miboga, chalimniu thiubo khatdi tatamniu tadui ngutmakra tailubo takuk khat khoilujiu, siga ngena situ majikhai lujiu, chapiubang kubibo bam singgiu mungga khai mide.
Ngena chipui siniu degu padralo chiubo pabam khatga chaplujiu phui bamme.
Chawang nahpui siniu tadui nkhiu raleng, pavang puidungtu maluang lujiu sibo singgiu mung gase tadkiu sude. Paniu chapiujiuga takukse ngaoboga, sise lura pavang khattu langkhaide.
Chawang nahpui siniu lepad phuiboga ngena situ ngaolude. Ngena siniu kapsuboga, palung kheng ngamlak mide. Sichiu paniu din-e, “Haise Hebrew mai nah bam talakge.”
Siga pachipui siniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Iniu tadlujiu ngena haitu naleng alu khaira Hebrew maipui khattu kukhai bima?”
Paniu paokakge, “Yo, chalungsajiu kam khailo.” Siga aliumaina siniu tadlujiu ngena puisiak situ puiwang bide.
Chawang nahpui siniu maipui khugase din-e, “Haibo ngena haitu lulujiu aleng alu khailo, Iniu naphijeng pine.” Sichiujiu paniu ngena situ ponlujiu patu makuat sude.

Pasai, ngenase mawikhangjiu dikhang miboga, paniu patu chawang nahpui khuga puiwang mide, sichiujiu paniu ngena situ panahsiak kumjiu makuat sude. Paniu paronna haichiu din-e, “Iniu patu taduijiu gasu jupadbo-e, siniu pazan hai Iniu Mose
Mose niu awajiu phuiboga, mai khat niudi patu ngaomakge chiubo silujiu, paniu Egypt maipiu tuse kamshat lujiu paphawse nbuijiuga baikhai mide.
Pasaibo naise paniu tadpad lanboga Hebrew mai khangnia n-gi bamniubo ngaode. Paniu kamaobo piu khuga din-e, “Nangniu dekamjiu nasingna Hebrew maitu adapbam jiulo?”

Sibo piu siniu paokakge, “Natu saoniu aliugu mawangpao maksai ladjanpao leng kamkhai jiulo? Nangniu danai Egypt maipiutu kamshat mibo kumjiu, atudi kamshat mira chiujiu ma?” Siga Mose pingmide khatdi paronna haichiu dinsude, “Iniu kam mibose maidungniu simide.”
Degu padmilo chiubo chawangniu siluboga, Mose tu kamshat mira kamsude, siga Mose niu Midia lam paktad lujiu siga ga lungmide.
Naikhat, Mose niu akhun khat mungga ntao bamboga, Midia maidunggu singku Jethro nahpui khang chinnia kiulujiu paliu piugu kamidung nai milydung leng tadui thuakra wangde.
Chiudi mily khuanmai khangsianiu wanglujiu Jethro nahpuidung situ hathon sude. Siga Mose niu tadlujiu paliutu nkha khaijiu paliu khaoruidungtu tadui pi thikhai bide.
Paliuniu paliu piu khuga malan wangboga, paniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Dekamjiu thainai naliu wang maji kin jiulo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Egypt maipiu khatniu aliutu mily khuanmaidung khugasu nkha khai bijiu, khatdi paniu aliuleng tadui thuak khaijiu, aliu khaoruidungdi tadui thilubo gasu-e.”
Paniu panahpuidung khuga maniu-e, “Pah dega bamlo? Dekamjiu naliuniu patu siga pibam diakmi jiulo? Tadlujiu patu kuwang katiu pitiu khailo.”
Sichiujiu Mose niu siga lungra palung chap mide, siga Jethro niu panahpui Zipporah tu panao leng pikhaide,
paniu panah piumai khat lungkhai-e. Siga Mose niu paronna haichiu din-e, “Haibo kadihga I sangdiumai khatle, siniu pazan leng Gershon

Tingkum wajiukha sailam Egypt mai wangpiuse shai mide, chiudi Israel maidungra kavang lunlungga lungjiu kap-kiambose palun bamme, sichiujiu nkha khaira khengsude, Paliuniu kapbo khuanse Tingwang niu chiukhaide.
Sichiu paliugu magenthiu chariubo khuanse Tingwang niu chiuluboga paniu Abraham, Isaac khatdi Jacob paliu khuga ladriat khaibose maningtao khaide.
Paniu Israel maidunggu kavang thiubo lunlungse ngaolujiu paliuleng manang khai bide.
Mose niu naikhat papao Jethro, Midia mai singkugu kamidung nai milydung khuanjiu ramjingga tadpadboga, masanbo luang, Sinai ga wangde.
Siga
Paniu haichiu makum sude, “Haise maisuang ha-e. Dekamjiu chaphepiu hai tao kuikiu makjiulo? I tadpad mana lujiu phui mataine.”
Mose niu wangmana kinbose
Paniu paokakge, “Yo, I haiga bamme.”
Tingwang niu din-e, “Wang mana mane. Naphitop lupad milo, palamra nangniu masanbo bamga chap bamme.
I hai napao-napehdung Rawang-e. Abraham, Isaac khatdi Jacob paliu Rawang-e.” Sijengniu Mose pazu kabaman mide, palamra paniu Tingwang tu phuiping-e.
Siga

sijengniu, paliutu Egypt dih gasu Iniu puipad lujiu, kawibo kadih, kadih-tam wibo, Canaan maidung, Hitt maidung, Amor maidung, Periz maidung, Hiv maidung, khatdi Jebus maidungniu tuhoi lungbambo kadih gase paliutu puipadra wangkinbo-e.
Egypt maidungniu paliutu kam mathad bambo khatdi amaidungniu kapbambo khuanse Iniu chiulude.
Tuhoira Iniu natu Egypt mai wangpiu khuga tadlujiu amaidungtu sibo kadih gasu puipadra langkhaibo-e.”
Chiudi Mose niu Tingwang khuga din-e, “Ira wadi makbo mai-e. Iniu dechiu chawang khuga tadlujiu Israel maidungtu Egypt dih gasu puipad ngamlu ralo?”
Tingwang niu paokakge, “Nangniu paliutu maluang padboga Iniu natu maluangjiu bamrabo-e, sichiujiu nangniu haibo luong gasu atu kahum rabo-e, Iniu natu langkhaibo madanse hainiu thiurabo-e.”

, I hai paliu pao-pehmai Rawang, Abraham, Isaac khatdi Jacob paliu Rawang siniu langkhaibo-e chiujiu Israel maidung khuga dinkhai bilo. Tingthengjiu haise chamtan rabo-e; lungkiu rabo chaken hinaniu atu haichiujiu kurabo-e.
Tadlujiu Israel maidunggu kating maidungtu kumadui lujiu,
Paliutu kam chariujiu mathad bambo Egypt dih gasu puipad lujiu, lungwiram, kadih-tam kawibo, Canaan mai, Hitt mai, Amor mai, Periz mai, Hiv mai khatdi Jebus mai kadih gase puiwangra alung chap mide.
“Nangniu paliu khuga dinbose amaidungniu lukhai rabo-e. Siga nangniu Israel maigu jupaodungtu maluang lujiu Egypt mai wangpiu khuga tadlujiu pakhuga haichiu dinrabo-e, ‘
Egypt mai wangpiutu manomjiu kamkhai makthen naliutu paniu pi tadpad khai lakge chiubo I si-e.
Chiudi Iniu agu pumtan thinlujiu Egypt maidung khuga kapingbo ngam kamjiu sajai pikhai rabo-e. Sibo sainiu naliutu pitad padra paniu suikhaibi rabo-e.

Israel maipuidung hinaniu, Egypt mai kiningmai hina puidung khuga tadlujiu chafai-tani, kachia-rangkang kheng sune. Israel maidungniu sibodung hinase paliu nahpuidung khatdi nahpiudung pon thiukhai lujiu khatdi Egypt maigu chakhiu-chalan hina phungtad mirabo-e.”
Siga Mose niu
Siga
Paniu paokakge, “Tathun thin bamme.”
Siga
niu din-e, “Haise kamjiu Israel maidung khuga
Siga
niu din-e, “Karaibo tasibo ngamkam siniu paliuniu natu malum maksai, khatdi paliu lung kim maksai, haisiniu paliu lungchun kimkhai lubui-e.
Haibo tasibo tienkam nia hainiudi paliuniu natu malum maksai khatdi nalad piumaksai, Nile Giuki gasu tadui thuaklujiu sise kadihga runkiu khai bilo. Taduise tazai mawimi rabo-e.”
Chiudi Mose niu din-e, “Chiumakge,
Tuhoira tadsulo! Iniu natu nkha khaijiu, nangniu degu dinralo chiubo katikhai bine.”
Chiudi Mose niu din-e, “Chiumakge,
Siga
Nangniu degu dinralo chiubo pakhuga dinkhaibo sui-e. Iniu nanai khangniatu degu kamralo maksai dinralo chiubo katikhai bine.
Maidung khuga degu dinralo chiubo paniu nasung dinkhai ngamme. Sichiujiu nangniu Tingwang kumjiu degu dinralo chiubo pakhuga dinkhai ngamme.
Haibo thunse khoilujiu tadsulo, palamra haisiniu maisuang habo ngamse nangniu kamrabo-e.”
Sigasu Mose niu papao Jethro khuga wanglujiu din-e, “Iniu Egypt dihga wanglujiu asingna maidung ringbam khama chiubo phui mataine.” Jethro niu suikhaijiu kanui khai bide.
Mose niu Midia ga bamkhaga,
Sijengniu Mose niu panao panah maitu pi qonniam tongkhai lujiu, khatdi Tingwang niu pikhaibo thunse thinlujiu Egypt dihlam tadsude.
Siga nangniu pakhuga haichiu dinbilo,
Anahtu pi tadpad lujiu atu pijiu kahum khailo chiujiu Iniu nakhuga dinbo-e, chiudi nangniu suikhai makge. Sijengniu, tuhoira Iniu nanah naraitu kamshat mine.”
Egypt lam wangbo rijikyga
Sigasu panao Zipporah niu pamun liangbo tu khoilujiu panahpiu-gi romkhaide khatdi siseniu Mose phi
Sibo wan-ga
Siga Mose niu Aaron khuga Egypt dihlam malan wangrabo cham, khatdi
Sichiujiu Mose nai Aaron niu Egypt dihlam malanwang lujiu Israel maigu jupaodungtu kumadui sude.
niu Mose khuga dinkhaibo hinase, Aaron niu paliu khuga dinkhai bide khatdi Mose niu maidung suangga maisuang habo ngam hinase kamlen khaide.
Siga paliu malum mide, sichiujiu paliutu kam mathad bambo paliu magenthakse
Sichiujiu Mose nai Aaron niu Egypt mai wangpiu khuga tadlujiu dinsude, “
Siga chawang siniu din-e, “
Mose nai Aaron niu paokakge, “Hebrew mai Rawang papumsiakniu aliu khuga madulen khaibo-e. Aliuniu ramjingga tadpad lujiu,
Chawang siniu Mose nai Aaron khuga din-e, “Nanainiu dekamjiu haimaidungtu paliu tienkam ga pi make khaira kam bamjiulo? Sibo vangdung situ pijiu paliu ngam kammi sulo!
Naliu hai Egypt maidung suang pariak keng mide, Sijengniu tuhoira naliu changam kamra makemi jiuma!”
Sibonai gasu chawangniu Israel maidung haitu magaodi pimakjiu chagamtuse kamra chamtanse pikhai sude: “Paliu ronna wahina piphiu lujiu kamlo.
Chiudi nda kumjiu chagamtuse pariak nkhin makra paliu khuga dinlo, kang khatnadi nkhinbo suimakge. Paliu ngam kaha jengniu, paliuniu tadlujiu paliu Rawang khuga charathiu raleng kheng bambo-e!
Paliutu changam hai pitan khaijiu, pi pukhaijiu bamlo, sichiusai paliuniu ka-aratbo cham hai nkingra pawan harabo-e.”
Kavangdungtu akhijiu paliu masuang pak mariu kinmai siniu wanglujiu Israel mai khuga din-e, “Naliuleng magao pikhai lakde, chiujiu chawang siniu din-e.
Naliu ronna tadlujiu magaose phiulo, chiudi pariak machambo chagamtuse naliuniu kamrabo-e, chiujiu paniu chamtan pi-e.”
Sijengniu Egypt dih pakhiangna tadjiu paliuniu magaose phiu sude.
Sichiujiu karaiga magao pikhaijiu kambambo chagamtu riak nai machamjiu kampadra kavang maitu akhi-taliumai siniu manomjiu kamsude.
Changam kamra pikhaibo, Israel maidung tadrai mai situ, Egypt maigu kavang akhimai siniu dapsude. Paliuniu haichiu din-e, “Naliuniu karaiga kampadbo chagamtu riak panai dekamjiu macham tami jiulo?”
Tadraimai siniu chawang khuga tadlujiu haichiu din-e, “Dekamjiu nangniu haikumbo thak aliutu kamkhai jiulo, Pakendibopiu yo?
Aliutu magao pikhai makge, chiudi chagamtuse kamra aliutu chamtan pikhai-e; Siniu tuhoira aliutu dap masa mide, haise namaidung mao-e.”
Chawang siniu paokakge, “Naliu hai make-e, khatdi tatien thiuni makge; sijengniu naliuniu tadlujiu
Tuhoira malanwang tatien thiu sulo! Naliutu magao wadi pilakge, chiudi karaiga kambo pariak machambo chagamtuse kampad rabo-e.”
Karaiga paliuniu kampadbo riak panai machamjiu kampadlo chiu dinboga, paliu hai magenthiu rabo mide chiubo tadraimai siniu simide.
Paliuniu sichiu tadpadboga, paliutu khuanbambo Mose nai Aaron tu adaode.
Paliuniu Mose nai Aaron khuga din-e, “Nanainiu aliu khuga pathak makbo kamkhaibo jengniu chawang nai pagu chakampaodung siniu aliutu miktun mide, haijengniu, nanaitu
Siga Mose niu
Iniu chawang khuga tadlujiu naleng dinkhai gapbo ga, paniu paliutu kam mathad sumibo-e. Sichiujiu nangniu paliutu nkha khaira wadi kamkhai makge!”

Iniu Abraham, Isaac khatdi Jacob khuga Ngamkambo Rawang thiujiu ngaolen khai mibo-e, chiudi Iniu agu masanbo zan,
Paliuniu sangdiumai thiujiu lungbambo ram. Canaan kadih hai paliuleng pikhaira ladriandi Iniu thiukhai mibo-e.
Tuhoira paliutu Egypt maidungniu kavang pithiu khaijiu bambo, Israel mainiu kap-kiamjiu bambo khuan hai Iniu chiulude, sichiujiu Iniu ladriat thiukhai mibose maningtao mide.
Sijengniu Israel mai khuga Iniu dinbo-e chiu dinkhai bilo, ‘I hai
Iniu naliutu amaisiak pithiu khai bine, sichiujiu Iniu naliu Rawang thiu rabo-e. Egypt dih gasu Iniu naliutu khenrang pithiu khaisai, I hai naliu Rawang,
Iniu Abraham, Isaac khatdi Jacob khuga ladriat thiu khaibo kadih hai naliugu pithiu khai bine. I hai
Mose niu haise Israel mai khuga dinkhai-e, chiudi paliuniu lukhai makge, palamra paliugu magenthak sa jubo kavang lunlung siniu paliu lungchun kampang mide.
Sibosai
“Egypt mai wangpiu khuga tadlujiu paniu amai, Israel maitu pagu kadih gasu maomakjiu piphut khai rabo-e chiujiu pakhuga dinkhai bilo.”
Chiudi Mose niu paokakge, “Israel mainiu tangbo alad piumaksai, dechiujiu chawang siniu suikhai ralo? I haijiukha chalad dinsi makbo mai-e.”
Jacob nah narai Reuben nahpiu khang madai lung-e: Hanokh, Pallu, Hezron khatdi Carmi paliu-e. Paliu kiriang hai paliu pao-pehmai zan phungmai-e.
Simeon nahpiu khang charuk lung-e: sisera Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jachin, Zohar khatdi Canaan maipuiniu lungbo nahpiu Shaul paliu-e. Paliu kiriang hai paliu pao-pehmai zan phungmai-e.
Levi nahpiu khang sum lung-e: sisera Gershon, Kohath khatdi Merari paliu-e. Paliu kiriang hai paliu pao-pehmai zan phungmai-e. Levi niu takum 137 lungkhai-e.
Gershon nahpiu khang nia lung-e: sisera Libni nai Shimei ye, panai kaikik kengjiu lung-e.
Kohath nahpiu khang madai lung-e: sisera Amram, Izhar, Hebron khatdi Uzziel paliu-e. Kohath niu takum 133 lungkhai-e.
Merari nahpiu khang nia lung-e: sisera Mahli nai Mushi-e. Haidungse Levi kiphiu khatdi paliu kai-kik maidung-e.
Amram niu panai Jokhebed tu maluang lung-e, paniu Aaron nai Mose tu mana-e. Amram takum 137 lungkhai-e.
Izhar nahpiu khang sum lung-e: sisera Korah, Nepheg khatdi Zichri paliu-e.
Uzziel di panahpiu khang sum lung-e: Sisera Mishael, Elzaphan khatdi Sithri paliu ye.
Aaron niu Amminadab nahpui, khatdi Nahshon tanpui Elisheba tu maluang lung-e; paniu paleng Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar khatdi Ithamar paliutu lungkhai-e.
Korah nahpiu khang sum lung-e: sisera Assir, Elkanah khatdi Abiasaph paliu-e; paliu hai Korah kiphiu njan tammibo pao-pehdung-e.
Aaron nahpiu Eleazar niu Putiel nahpui khang khattu maluang lungjiu, paniu Phinehas tu lung-e. Paliu haise Levi kiphiu khatdi kirianggu papee maidung-e.
“Israel mai jattu Egypt dih gasu maluangpad khailo.” chiujiu Aaron nai Mose khuga

Chiudi Mose niu paokakge, “I haijiukha chalad dinsi makbo mai-e chiubo nang sibamme, dechiujiu Iniu dinbo lad haitu chawangniu suikhai ralo?”
Iniu nakhuga chamtan pikhaibo hinase Aaron khuga dinkhai bilo, sichiujiu paniu chawang khuga Israel maitu pijiu pagu kadih gasu phutkhaira dinrabo-e.
Chiudi Iniu chawang situ pijiu palung tankhaine, sichiujiu Iniu Egypt dihga wajiukha kapingbo kamkhai bamdi, paniu nanai kadin suilakge.

Paliuniu nariga, namaidung riga khatdi nagu chakampaodung hina riga machak khangsu rabo-e.’”

“Haibo hiu hainiu naliu lengra takumgu raithubo hiuse thiurabo-e.
Katikhaibo cham hai Israel mai mathiu khuga dinkhai bilo: Haibo hiugu jeng riubo naise mai hinaniu milypoi khat maksai kamipoi khat paky-kyleng kada rabo-e.
Pakikhunmai siniu chakhao khat tiukam laksai, pakining maipiu panainiu tiubuibo chakhao khat kada rabo-e.
Naliuniu milypoi khat maksai kamipoi khat kadabo sui-e, chiudi sise pajam-para thiumakbo, takum khat tangmibo pachipoi rabo-e.
Sichiujiu sibo hiugu jeng kariu-je-madaikiubo naise Israel mai hinaniu sibo khaodungse girabo-e.
Maidung siniu gitiubo wakhao zai kasiase thinlujiu akham piga khatdi kamun-dengga manuk khai rabo-e.
Sibo nai nchunse chamise rulujiu kakhabo piuniu nai chakhi jaomakbo taruakse tiurabo-e.
Sise wadaodi magi tiubo maksai suangtiubo suimakge, chiudi pakhiangnase papeedi, pa-ngendi, palung jandi rutiu rabo-e.
Naliuniu sise nsuan tangbo khai-nbambo suimakge, sise masiaksai rumi rabo-e.
Naliuniu sise kalangjiu tiurabo-e, palamra naliuniu tadrabo tabin leng naliu phitop khairabo-e khatdi tathun mathun rabo-e. Haise
“Sibonai nchunse Iniu Egypt dih pakhiangna rontadjiu npiu mainah nahrai hina, khaorui-khaona piangrai thubo pachi hina kamshatjiu, Egypt mai radungtu sajai pirabo-e. I hai
Kamun piga tazai siniu naliu lungbo kydungtu madan thiurabo-e. Iniu tazaise ngaoboga, Iniu Egypt maitu sajai piboga naliutu kenpad khai rabo-e.
Naliuniu haibo tingmik situ
Raithubo naise khatdi chinniabo naise naliuniu kahumra wang madui rabo-e. Sibo tingmik gase naliuniu changam khatdi kammak rabo-e, chiudi katiu-kasak leng macha rabo-e.
Haibo ngeese kamjiu bamrabo-e, palamra haibo naise Iniu naliutu Egypt dih gasu puitad khaibo-e. Wangrabo chaken hinaniu haibo tingmik situ mania rabo-e.
Raithubo hiugu jeng kariu-je-madaikiubo nai chawan gasu jeng makai-je-khatkiubo nai chawan tangbo, naliuniu chakhi khaibo taruak tiubo suimakge.
Jeng chinnia lunggase chakhi naliu ky lungga khai nbambo suimakge, palamra padih-khun nah tadi, sangdiumai tadi chakhi khaibo taruak tiusai, patuse amai ruangga chakkhai lakge.”
Mose niu Israel maigu jupaodung hinatu kulujiu din-e, “Naliu mai hina milypoi khat maksai kamipoi khat-khat kada lujiu, sise kamshat lujiu naliu kikhunmai Kenpadbo Ngee hai kamsulo.
Chahutang kamlujiu sise wakhao zai gase sumlujiu naliu ky kamundeng khatdi kamunpi hinaga manuk khai sulo. Sichiujiu mai khatdi nsuan tangbo kamalam tadpad mane.
niu Egypt dihga rontadjiu Egypt maitu kamshatboga, paniu tazaise akham piga khatdi kamun-dengga ngaosai, pijiu Kashaibo maza situ naliu kyga ngutjiu kamshat khai lakge.
Naliuniu khatdi naliu tah-nah mainiu haibo chengtu tingthengjiu majai rabo-e.
niu naliuleng pikhaine chiujiu riatkhaibo kadih gase naliuniu ngutbo tingga haibo rachengse majai rabo-e.
Naliu nahmaidung siniu naliu khuga, ‘Haibo racheng rambase degulo?’ chiu maniubo tingga,
naliuniu haichiu paokak rabo-e, ‘Haise
Siga Israel maidung khudung kiujiu kahum sude.
Sichiujiu
Sibonai nchunse chawangdi pagu chakampaodungdi, khatdi Egypt mai mathiuse rakpad sude. Egypt dih pakhiangna kap marung sude, palamra mai khat kygadi shai makbo nah hamide.
Sibonai nchun siak chawangniu Mose nai Aaron tu kulujiu dinsude, “Nanai khatdi Israel mai naliu mathiu tadmilo! Agu kadih phut milo, naliuniu khengbo kumjiu
Naliugu mily, kami khatdi khaorui-khaona hina puilujiu tadsulo. Alengdi thoidam wangra kheng khailo.”
Egypt mainiu paliu kadih situ kalangjiu phutlu tadmi raleng khengjiu haichiu din-e, “Naliu tadmi maksai, aliu mathiu shaikam mirabo-e.”
Sijengniu, Israel mainiu paliugu khanglise, chakhi khaimakbo takhui khailujiu khatdi paliu fainidung domlujiu phunglu tadsude.
Mose niu dinkhaibo kumjiu paliuniu Egypt maigu kachia-rangkang khatdi tatiu-tatah kheng sude.
niu Egypt maitu pijiu Israel maitu chakhuang thiu khaijiu paliuniu khengbo hina pikhai bide. Haichiujiu Israel mainiu Egypt maigu chakhiu-chalan phungtad mibo-e.
Israel mainiu Rameses gasu Sukkoth lam paliu phi kenpad sude. Siga maipui-mainahtu simakjiu, chamai 600,000 tadpadle.
Chamai mendi khatdi milydung, kamidung khatdi khaorui-khaonadung kengjiu paliu saisui tadle.
Paliutu Egypt dih gasu bungjiu hapad mibo jengniu, paliuniu kadenra maksai chakhi khaibo takhui kamra nanglak mijiu paliuniu Egypt dih gasu phungpadbo takhui gasu chakhi khaimakbo taruak khuak sude.
Takum 430 loigapbo nai
Sibonai nchunse Egypt dih gasu paliutu puipadra
chiudi naliu vang thiujiu bammai, naliuniu raijiu pagirom mibo mai sai, pah tiubo sui-e.
Chabinmai maksai chaphi phimai siniu tiubo suilakge.
Langlubo katiuse, kalangbo kilung gasu tiuloi rabo-e, lenlam ponpadbo suimakge. Khatdi khaoring gu parase wakhatdi kamtang mane.
Israel mai hinaniu haibo ngeese kamsiak rabo-e.
Chiudi pagi rommakbo mai khatniudi tiubo suilakge. Naliu ruangga sangdiumai wanglung lujiu, paniu
Haibo thiak-riak hai Israel mai dih-khunmai nai naliu ruangga wanglung mibo sangdiumai khuga machambo-e.”
Sichiujiu
Sibo naise
“Nah-raibo npiumai nah hinase akhuga kadkhai rabo-e, palamra Israel mai nahrai hina khatdi piangrai thubo pachi hinase agu-e.”
Mose niu maidung khuga din-e, “Haibo tingmiktu maningtaojiu bamlo--naliuniu kavang thiujiu bambo bam, Egypt dihtu naliuniu phut mibo-e. Haibo tingmik hai
Naliuniu rai thubo hiu, Abib hiu gasu Egypt dihtu phut mibo-e.

niu pachang-palingjiu naliuleng, Canaan mai, Hitt mai, Amor mai, Hiv mai khatdi Jebus mai kadih hai pikhaine chiujiu naliu pao-pehmai khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo-e. Paniu naliutu lungwibo khatdi kadih-tam kawibo dihga, naliutu maluangwang khaiboga, naliuniu haibo ngee hai takum machang raithubo hiuga changi rabo-e.
Jeng chinnia hai naliuniu chakhi khaimakbo taruak tiurabo-e, sichiujiu chinniabo nai hai
Jeng chinnia lungga hai chakhi khaibo taruak naliuniu tiumak rabo-e; khatdi naliu ram lungga chakhi, maksai pajui khaibo taruak hai pibam mak rabo-e.
Haibo ngee kamsuboga, naliuniu naliu nahdung khuga, naliuniu Egypt dih phutbo tingga
Haibogu maningtaobo haise naliu ben-ga, maksai naliu san-ga wakhat raokhaibo kumjiu bamrabo-e; haisiniu
Haibo ngee hai naliuniu takum machang riatkhaibo tingga changi rabo-e.
Paniu naliuleng pikhaiboga, naliuniu npiumai nahrai hinatu

Chiudi naliuniu piangrai thubo qonniam hina tura sibosung milypoi kadkhaijiu liulan rabo-e. Naliuniu sibo qonniamse liulanni maksai, pawongcheng kamtang milo. Naliuniu naliu nahpiu nahrai hina tura liulan siak rabo-e.
Pasai, naliu nahniu haibo ramba maniusai, naliuniu haichiu paokak rabo-e, ‘
Egypt mai wangpiu siniu palung tanjiu, aliutu pitad khai makboga,
Haichiu maningtaobo hai, aliu ben-ga maksai aliu san-ga ratman khaibo kumbo-e,

Egypt mai wangniu, Israel maitu pitad khaiboga, Philistia kadih lam tadkhaibo npuise dunthubo thiubamdi, Tingwang niu sibo npui makjiu kaki lamsu puitad khai-e. Tingwang niu haichiu maning-e, “Israel maidungniu chari thiura ngaobo tingga paliu lung lilanjiu Egypt dihlam malanwang mira Iniu suini makge”.
Sibosung, paniu paliutu tadkoibo ramjing npui, Hengbo Duipui lamsu majang khai-e. Siga Israel mainiu chari thiura kaden sude.
Israel mainiu Sukkoth tu phut lujiu ramjing mung, Etham ga riji thiukhaide.
niu n-nien sai, kamuang tiang thiujiu, nchun sai, chami tiang thiujiu paliu masuangga tadraijiu npui jukhaibi-e, sichiujiu nchun, n-nien saomakjiu paliu tabin tadlu-e.
N-nien sai kamuang tiang siniu, nchun sai chami tiang siniu paliu masuangga tadrai tan-tan khaibi-e.
Sibosai
“Israel maitu mariwangjiu Baal Zephon mungga bambo, Migdol nai Hengbo Duipui kakga bambo, Pi Hahiroth suangga pijiu riji thiu khaira dinbilo.
Israel maidung ramjing ninggase tadron bamme chiujiu chawang siniu maning sune.
Iniu patu palung pitan khaijiu, paniu naliutu hatad surabo-e, sichiujiu agu maken dibo siniu chari ngamjiu chakhuang thiubose chamtan-ga phungwang khaine. Sigasu I hai

Maidungse pakmide chiubose chawang khuga paokhaiboga, pagu chakampaodung nai palung chunse kali mide siniu haichiu dinsude, “Aliuniu degu kammi jiulo? Aliuniu Israel maitu pipak mide, sichiujiu aliuniu aliu vangdungtu kam maha mide!”
Chawang siniu pagu chaqon-kari khatdi pagu riphendungse kaden sude.
Paniu pagu chaqon-kari hina khatdi withubo kai charuk sidi pagu chakampaodungniu thin lujiu hatad sude.
niu chawang lungchunse pitan khaijiu, chari ngamjiu
Egypt maigu riphendung siniu paliugu chaqon hina, chaqon-kari hina thin lujiu paliutu hatadjiu, paliuniu riji thiu bambo Pi Hahiroth nai Baal Zephon kakga bambo, Hengbo Duipui mung gase hatang mide.
Chawang nai pagu riphendung siniu paliutu hatad kinbose Israel mainiu ngaoboga pingchang pingjiu
Paliuniu Mose khuga din-e, “Egypt kadihga charawbam hami jiuma? Haibo ramjingga aliutu pishai khaira nangniu puitadkin jiuma? Phuilo, nangniu aliutu Egypt dih gasu puitadbo ganiu degu padmilo!

Haise pad makhaga, aliuniu nakhuga haichiu padrabo-e chiu dinmi makma? Aliuniu Egypt mai vang thiujiu bamdiak mira nakhuga dinmibo-e. Aliuniu haibo ramjingga shairabo suang, siga kavang thiujiu bammibo siniu wi-nkiu-e”.
Mose niu paokakge, “Ping mane! Chaplujiu phuilo, thainai
niu naliuleng chari aphen khaibine, naliura mathingjiu bamrabo-e”.
Nathunse duipui riga khengsu khai bilo. Siga taduise njanpad mine, sichiujiu Israel maidungse kasangbo kadih gasu tadngam lubui-e.

Iniu Egypt maidung lungchun pitan khaijiu paliuniu paliutu hangut sune, siga Iniu chawang khatdi pagu riphen maidung, chaqon-kari nai sise tongkin maidung situ chari ngamjiu agu chakhuangthiubose daorabo-e.
Iniu paliutu ngam luboga, Egypt mainiu I hai
Israel mai riphen suangga tadkinbo Tingwang gu maza siniu sailam wangjiu tadsude. Kamuang tiangse Egypt mai nai Israel mai kakga wangtang makthen tadwang sude.
Kamuang siniu Egypt maileng kam tamiu khai-e, chiudi Israel mailengra pabiu pikhai-e, sichiujiu riphendungse khat-khat khuga, nchunse wang manalu makge.
Mose niu duipui riga paben kheng khangboga,
Siga taduise njanpad mide, sichiujiu taduise jai-nialam kakhakdak padmijiu, Israel maidungse kasangbo kadih gasu duipuise ken taron mide.
Egypt mainiu paliugu chaqondung khatdi chaqon-karidung hina thinlujiu duipui lunggase paliutu hangut sude.
Tingben padsu raga,
Paniu paliugu chaqon-kari phise nphum khaijiu, paliu malai silak mide. Egypt mainiu din-e, “
Sichiujiu Mose niu duipui riga paben khengsu khaiboga, nsuan padgapda taduise kalu lun gase kalanwang mide. Egypt maidungse tadui gasu marira kamsude, chiudi
Taduise malan wangjiu chaqon-kari khatdi sise tong kinmai, khatdi duipui lungga Israel maitu hangut mai hinatu khatna khatdi masiak makjiu taduiniu naimide.
Chiudi Israel maidung sira duipui lunggasu kadih kasangga tadjiu, tadui siniu jai-nialam singbengniu dangkhaibo kumjiu tadpad mide.
Sibo naise
niu pagu kendibo pumtanse thinlujiu Egypt maitu ngamkhaibo ngao luboga, Israel mainiu
“Iniu
paniu chaqondung nai paliutu tuangmaitu duipui lungga thonkhai mide.
paniu atu gukhai bide.
Pa haise a-Rawang-e, Iniu patu thuonne,
apiu Rawang kendise Iniu thuonne.
“Paniu Egypt mai riphentu khatdi pagu chaqon-karitu duipuiga thonkhai mide;
pagu withubo chakampaodungse Hengbo Duipuiga kahakshat mide.
Paliutu kasukbo duipui siniu gomnam mide;
tatukang kumjiu paliu pasinglam malimkiu mide.
haisiniu mikremaitu kamtap-tap mide.
Katanbo pumtan siniu nagu mikremaitu ngam lude;
nagu lungpom siniu paliutu magaorengtu kumjiu ruthon mide.
Nangniu duipuitu mudkhaiboga duiliuse kujiu kadun khang mide;
haise singbeng kumjiu kukhang mide;
sukthubo duipui bam sidi pakang mawi mide.
Mikremai siniu din-e, ‘Iniu paliutu hatadjiu minlu rabo-e;
Iniu paliugu senlanse sutlujiu njanlu rabo-e, sichiujiu Iniu lunibo hina daolu rabo-e;
Iniu aheng jusujiu paliugu kabam hina sutlu rabo-e.’
Chiudi
siga paliuse duipuiga chagikang kumjiu malimkiu mide.
Nakumjiu masanboga maisuang habo sao bamlo?
Nagu kadibo tienkam khatdi maisuang habose saoniu kam ngam ralo?
Nangniu naben majatlam khengkhangbo ga
kadih siniu aliu mikremaitu kajong lude.
Nagu ladriatse nangniu chamchang khaijiu nangniu ranlumai situ jupad khai bide;
Nagu pumtan siniu paliutu masanbo kadih gase maluang khai bide.
Jatdung siniu haise chiulujiu pingjiu kaphikdi-di bamme;
Philistia maidungse pingboniu phui mide.
Edom maigu jupaodungse charen mide;
Moab gu katan-kahu maidungse kaphikrai-rai mide;
Canaan maidungse paliu hot hamide.
Pingbo nai manangbo siniu phui mide.
Hey
kavangthiu bambo namaidungtu khenrang thiukhaijiu
pi tadpad khaibo situ paliu suang hajiu phui bamme.
Nangniu paliutu puiwang nagu maluong gase lingkhai-e,
napumsiakniu thiu khaibo gase puiwang khai bide.
Israel mainiu duipui gase kasangbo kadihga tadpadle. Chiudi Egypt mai paliugu chaqon-kari nai chaqon tongmai siniu duipui lungga hangutboga,
Aaron tanpui, phaimiukakungpui, Miriam siniu pagu tarabung thinlujiu khatdi maipuidung siniu pasai suilujiu chalen len sude.
Siga Miriam siniu paliuleng haichiu chalui thiu sude:
paniu chaqondung nai sibo riga tongmai situ duipuiga thonkhai mide”.
Sichiujiu Mose niu Israel maitu Hengbo Duipui gasu Shur ramjing lam jupad khaide. Ramjing gase paliu jeng sum tadkhang sude, chiudi tadui daomakge.
Sibo sai paliuniu Marah kubo bamga wangde, chiudi siga taduise khajubo jengniu sise paliu sak daolak mide. Sijengniu sibo bam situ Marah
Maidung siniu suini makjiu Mose khuga haichiu maniu sude, “Aliuniu degu sakralo?”
Mose niu
Paliuniu thin lungra
Paniu din-e, “Naliuniu agu chamtan hai majaijiu alad piusai, Iniu Egypt mai riga pikhaibo raret siniu naliutu sajai pikhai lakge, I hai naliutu wikhai bibo
Sibosai, paliu tadui-ruak kariu-je-niakiu khatdi kadanbang riak-chinnia bambo Elim ga paliu wangjiu tadui mungga rijiky thiukhaide.
Israel mai hinase Elim gasu kensujiu, paliuniu Egypt dih phutbo chahiu niabogu jeng kariu-je-mangiubo naise Elim nai Sinai kakga bambo Sin ramjingga wangtangde.
Sibo ramjingga paliu mathiuse Mose nai Aaron khuga suini makbo lad dinsude.
Paliuniu haichiu din-e, “
Pacharukbo naise paliuniu dam nia thiujiu khoi kadenbo sui-e”.
Sijengniu Mose nai Aaron niu Israel mai mathiu khuga din-e, “Thainai chawan wangsai
Nsuan padsai,
Mose niu dinlan-e, “Nsuan susai naliuniu tiu kanithen tiura taruak, chawan wangsai chami tiura naliuleng
Mose niu Aaron khuga din-e, “Maidung situ
Aaron niu maidung khuga dinkhai gapboga, paliuniu ramjing lam mariwang phuiboga
niu Mose khuga din-e,

“Israel mainiu suini makbo khuanse Iniu chiulude. Tamiu-ham wangsai paliuniu tiura chami, khatdi nsuan padsai paliuniu tiu kanithen tiura taruakse paliuniu daorabo-e chiujiu paliu khuga dinkhai bilo. Sigasu I hai,
Chawanse paliu rijining kaphui akhoidung lenwang sude, khatdi nsuanse kajikdui phuijiu kiu sude.
Kajikduise luangpad suboga, kadihma gase wakhatra ka-apiubo khuang padsude. Haise kajikdui khuang kumjiu manon-e.
Israel mai haise ngaoboga degulo chiubo simakjiu khat-khat khuga maniu sude, “Haise degulo?”
Mose niu paliu khuga din-e, “Haise
Mai khatniu tiubui buibo ronna khoira
Israel mainiu haise kam sude, khangsia mainiu khoi makeng-e, khangsianiu khoi matamme.
Sichiujiu paliuniu sise madadboga, khoi makengmai nai khoi matammai guse wason makge, macham kamna-e. Paniu khoi lubose paleng buigapbo-e.
Mose niu paliu khuga din-e, “Mai khatniudi nsuannai leng masiak khai mane.”
Chiudi khangsia mainiu Mose kadin suimakjiu kasia masiak khai-e. Pasaibo nai nsuan sise tenjiu pakhaopui padmi-e, siga Mose niu paliutu palung pomme.
Nsuan machang mai hinaniu paniu paniu kabuibo ronna khoi madui-e, n-nien tingphu khangboga kamasiakbo hinase kadihga tunmi-mi-e.
Pacharukbo naise paliuniu maluad nialeng thiujiu, khang khat leng kad madai khoi-e. Israel maigu jupaodung siniu wanglujiu haibo lamga Mose khuga paokhai sude,
siga paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Nsuannai hai masanbo mathakbo nai-e, siniu pakhuga kadkhailo chiujiu
Mose niu chamtan pibo kumjiu kamalibose paliuniu pasaibonai leng masiak khai-e, chiudi sise samakge maksai tenmi makge.
Mose niu din-e, “Haise thainai tiulo, palamra thainai hai Tabamnai-e,
Naliuniu jeng charuk leng katiu phiu rabo-e, chiudi pachinniabo tingmik mathakbo naise wakhatdi daolakge,”
Pachinniabo naise khangsia mainiu tadlujiu katiu phiu tadle, chiudi paliuniu wakhatdi daolu makge.
Siga
, Iniu mathakbo tingmik hai naliuleng pikhaibo-e, sichiujiu charukbo nai hai Iniu jeng nia tiubui leng pikhai rabo-e chiubo hai maningtaolo. Chinniabo naira mai hina paky-kytu phutmakjiu bamrabo-e.”
Sijengniu chinniabo nai hai maidungniu wakhat ngamdi kam makge.
Mose niu din-e, “Egypt dih gasu paniu aliutu puipadbo tingga paniu aliuleng pikhaibo katiu, manna kasia, aliu tah-nah mainiu ngaotang luraleng baikhailo chiujiu
Mose niu Aaron khuga din-e, “Wabung khat thinlujiu, manna dad-nia khailujiu
niu Mose khuga chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu Aaron niu sise khoilujiu Ladrian Bung suanggase baikhai mide.
Israel mainiu Canaan kadih wangtangjiu lungmak then takum atai manna hai tiukhang-e.
(Sibo tingga wa kasangbo tu madadbose wadad makai kumboniu tadkinniu-e).
Paliuniu suini makjiu Mose khuga din-e, “Aliuniu sakra tadui pilo.”
Mose niu paokakge, “Dekamjiu suini makbo ladse naliu dinbam jiulo? Dekamjiu

Chiudi maidungse charichang charijiu bambo jengniu Mose khuga suini makjiu bamme. Paliuniu din-e, “Dekamra nangniu aliutu Egypt dih gasu puipad jiulo? Charibo hainiu aliu nao-nahtu khatdi aliugu khaorui-khaonatu kamshatra lengma?”
Mose niu matanjiu
Sinai Luong gase, Iniu nasuangga chapbam niune, sibo tudise kakhiu khailo, sichiusai maidungniu sakra taduise luangpad rabo-e.” Israel maigu jupaodung suangga sise Mose niu kamkhai bide.
Sibo bam situ Massah khatdi Meribah
Amalek mainiu wanglujiu Israel maitu Rephidim ga chari thiu-e.
Mose niu Joshua khuga din-e, “Khangsiatu kadapad lujiu nsuannai Amalek maitu chari thiura tadsulo. Tingwang niu akhuga pikhaibo thunse Iniu thin lujiu meng maluang rigase chapbam niune.”
Mose niu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu Joshua niu tadlujiu Amalek maitu charithiu sude, siga Mose, Aaron khatdi Hur paliuse maluang riga meng chap bamme.
Mose niu paben khengkhang bamthen Israel mainiu chari ngamme, chiudi paniu paben khaikiu misai Amalek mainiu ngammi-e.
Mose niu paben khengkhang ngamlak miboga, Aaron nai Hur niu pijiu patu tatukang riga ntao khai lujiu panainiu pabense jukhang khai-e, sichiujiu naimik kiumak then kamme.
Haichiujiu Amalek maitu Joshua niu ngamduak lude.
Mose niu rathakbam khat thiukhai lujiu pazanleng, “
Paniu din-e, “
Mose niu Israel maitu Egypt dih gasu maluang padboga Tingwang niu paliuleng kamkhaibo hina lamga Midian maigu phaimiu, papao Jethro niu chiulude.
Siniu sailam khaidiak mibo, Mose nao Zipporah tu maluang lujiu paniu Mose khuga meng-e,
khatdi panah kania Gershom nai Eliezer tudi maluang meng-e. (Mose niu dinkhaibo bamme, “Ira sangmai dihga lungbo sangdiumai-e,” sichiujiu paniu panah khangkhatbo zanse Gershom
Paniu dinlan-e, “Egypt mai wangniu atu kamshat mirabo gasu, apiu Rawang niu atu nkha khai bi-e,” sichiujiu paniu panah khangkhat zanse Eliezer
Mose niu masanbo luongga riji thiu bambolon, Jethro niu Mose nao nai panah kaniatu maluang lujiu ramjing gase meng-e.
Paliu mengkinne chiubo paniu Mose khuga champao langmeng-e.
Siga Mose niu tadpad lujiu, pamasuangga makhumkiu-e khatdi patu biang hiu khai-e. Paliuniu khat-khat khuga dechiu lungkinlo chiubo maniu karen lujiu, Mose niu bambo mathenky lungga ngut mide.
Israel maitu rankhaira jengniu
Jethro niu pakhiangna lamga chiuluboga pachunwi mide.
Sichiujiu paniu din-e, “Egypt maidung khatdi chawang khugasu naliutu gukhai bibo
Tuhoira

Sichiujiu maring rukhaira khatdi Tingwang khuga wa kadkhaira katam-tambo rathak maniadi Jethro niu phungwang-e, sichiujiu Aaron nai Israel maigu jupaodungniu patu maluang lujiu masanbo tatek tiura tadle sise kahumbo dam lubo kumbo-e.
Pasaibo naise paliu ruangga tathu-chara padbose Mose niu nsuan gasu chawan tangbo ladjan thiujiu pujing-e.
Mose niu kambambo hinase Jethro niu ngaoboga, paniu din-e, “Maidung leng nangniu kambambo hai degulo? Nangniu nsuan gasu chawan tangbo haiga chaplujiu dekamjiu naronna haichiu kambam jiulo?”
Mose niu paokakge, “Iniu haise kamsiak rabo-e, palamra maidungniu Tingwang maningse katira akhuga wangjiu bambo-e.

Mai khangnia n-giboga panaise saoniu majilo chiu maniura akhuga wang-e, siga Iniu panai ruangga saose majilo chiubo dinkhai-e, siga Iniu Tingwang gu chamtan nai tacheng-tajaise paliu khuga katikhai-e.”
Siga Jethro niu din-e, “Nangniu haichiu kambambose maji makge.
Nang nsang-nrang mine, khatdi maidungdi magenthiujiu chiami rabo-e. Haichiu naronna kambo sira kungju-e.
Iniu natu ladpi khaine, sichiujiu Tingwang niu natu majang bambo thiulo. Nangniu maidung mathiu sung thiujiu Tingwang suangga paliugu tathu-chara pakhuga phungwangbo hai maji-e.
Tingwang gu chamtanse nangniu paliutu katikhaijiu paliuniu dechiu lungralo chiubo katikhai rabo-e.

Chiudi sibo riga kabuibo maidung khangsiatu kadakhai lujiu maidunggu jupao pithiu khailo, khangsianiu sanggu, khangsianiu kaigu, khangsianiu ringiugu, khatdi khangsianiu kariugu jupao pithiu khai rabo-e. Paliu hai Tingwang tu pingbo mai, malum suibo khatdi tanim tiumak mai thiurabo-e.

Pijiu paliutu tingthengjiu maidunggu ladjanpao pithiu khai rabo-e. Paliuniu kakungbose nakhuga phungwangjiu, kasiam-siambo hina sira paliu ronna ladjan thiu lubui-e. Sichiujiu paliuniu nabangrit kasia phungkhai sai, naleng njiubi rabo-e.
Nangniu haichiu kamsai, Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu nangdi chialakge, maidungdi paliugu tathu-charase loilujiu paliu ky lam wanglu bui-e.”
Mose niu Jethro gu ladpibose lukhaide.
Sichiujiu Israel mai ruanggasu kabuibo maidungtu kada sude. Paniu paliu khangsiatu sanggu, khangsiatu kaigu, khangsiatu ringiugu khatdi khangsiatu kariugu ladjanpao leng kadakhai sude.
Paliuniu tingthengjiu maidunggu ladjanpao thiujiu, kakungbo ronna Mose khuga phungwangjiu, kasiam-siambo hinara paliu ronna ladjan thiu khaide.
Sichiujiu Mose niu Jethro tu kanui khailujiu, Jethro pakylam wanglan mide.
Israel mainiu Egypt dih phutlubo sai, pasumbo hiugu raithubo naise Rephidim phutlujiu, Sinai ramjingga wangde. Siga paliuniu Sinai Luong phiga rijiky thiu khaide.
Sichiujiu Mose niu Tingwang tu adaora maluang lamse khangde.
“Egypt mai khuga
Akhuga kadkhaibo mai khatdi agu singku thiujiu lung rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu Mose niu Israel maigu jupaodungtu kumadui lujiu
Siga maidung siniu chakhuan khat thiujiu paokakge, “
Maidungniu paokakbose Mose niu
siga
Sibo naise mai hinaniu atu ngaolura Iniu Sinai Luongga kiurabo-e.
Maidungniu kenpad makra retmagui milo, sichiujiu mai khat niudi maluong lamse khangmakra khatdi wangmana makra dinbilo. Mai khat kumboniu siga paphi kakhaisai patu kamshat mirabo-e.

Patuse mai khat niudi dinmakjiu tatuniu rotshat maksai tavaipiniu ketshat rabo-e. Haise chakhaodi, chamaidi sonmakge, paliutu kamshat mirabo-e. Chiudi makese mudkhaisai, maidungse maluang lamse khangrabo-e.”
Sichiujiu Mose niu maluang lamsu kiulujiu kahum raleng maidung khuga dinkhai bide. Siga maidung siniu paliu fai-nidungse katha lude,
Siga Mose niu paliu khuga din-e, “kaden sulo, sichiujiu haibo lungga mai khatdi nphiujibo suimakge.”
Tingwang tu adaora Mose niu maidungtu rijiky gasu maluang phiga maluangpad sude.
Sinai Luong pakhiangna mikhutniu phuiting mide, palamra chamijiu gasu
Make khuanse tanbi-bikhang sude. Mose niu npao sude, khatdi Tingwang niu tingsim gasu paokakge.
niu Sinai Luongga kiulujiu Mose tu maluong ton-gase kukhang mide.
Mose niu khangboga
Akhuga wangmanabo singkumai tangbo paliu ronna kam masan rabo-e, chiumaksai Iniu paliu tudi sajai pirabo-e.”
Mose niu
Siga Mose niu kiulujiu
Tingwang niu din-e, khatdi haise pagu ladkengsi-e:
“Naliuniu kavang thiujiu bambo Egypt dih gasu maluang padbo naliu Rawang,
“Atu makbo kaki ratu kahum mane.
Charameng khat tudi kahum mane, palamra naliu Rawang
Chiudi atu lungsamai rigara khatdi agu tacheng tajaitu majaimai rigara Iniu chaken sang-sang tangbo lungsa khai rabo-e.
Naliuniu tatien thiura jeng charuk bamme.
Chiudi chinniabo nai haira aleng kadkhaibo mathakbo nai-e. Sibo nai sira mai khatdi, nangdi, nanahmaidi, nagu khaorui-khaonadi maksai nagu kadihga lungbo sangdiumaidi tatien thiubo suimakge.
Jeng charuk lungga,
Paliuniu Mose khuga din-e, “Nangniu aliu khuga dinsai, aliu nking lune, chiudi Tingwang niu aliu khuga dinsai, aliu shai mira ping-e.”
Mose niu paokakge, “Pingmane, Tingwang niu naliutu madiura khatdi naliuniu palad piujiu bamra, khatdi naliuniu nuan kam makra leng-e.”
Chiudi maidungse chap npenjiu chapbam mide, sichiujiu Tingwang bambo kamuangjiu gase Mose ronna wang mana-e.
Israel mai khuga dinkhaira
Atu makbo naliuniu kahumra naliu ronna kachianiu maksai rangkangginiu charameng dambo suimakge.

Taniangniu rathakbam kamlujiu, sibo rigasu mily khatdi khaoruidung maring rukhaibo maksai kakibo rathak hina akhuga kadkhailo. Naliuniu atu kahumra Iniu naliuleng pikhaibo bam hinaga, Iniu wangjiu naliutu thoikhai bine.
Naliuniu tatu thinlujiu rathakbam thiusai sibo tuse ruimane, palamra naliuniu tatu rigase mikhutki kam khaibose aleng buimakge.
Naliuniu aleng rathakbam kamboga buangkhang raleng tason donkhai mane; naliuniu sise kamsai, siga naliu buangkhangbo tingga wasao thiumi rabo-e.
“Tacheng-tajaidung hai Israel mai khuga pikhai bilo:
Naliuniu Hebrew mai kavang khattu liusai, paniu naliuleng takum charuk tatien thiu rabo-e. Chinniabo kumse patu wadi lumakjiu matha phutkhai rabo-e.

Paniu naliu vang thiuwangbo tingga panao thiumak bamniu sai, patu phutkhaibo tingga panaotu maluang tadmak rabo-e; chiudi paniu naliu vang thiuwangbo tingga panao thiubamniu sai, paniu panaotu maluang tadbo sui-e.
Pawangpiu siniu panaoleng pikhaijiu panahpuidung, panahpiudung lungsai, panao-panahmai hinase pawangpiu gu-e, pah papumruang tadpad rabo-e.
Chiudi kavang siniu pawangpiutu, panao-panahmaitu lungsa-e chiujiu dinsai, khatdi npadni maksai,
pawangpiu siniu kahumbo bamga patu puitad rabo-e. Siga paniu patu kamun-ga maksai kamun hiuga pichap lujiu pakuon butkhai rabo-e. Sichiusai, pase pagu ringting pavang thiumi rabo-e.
“Mai khatniu panahpuitu kavang leng jonkhai sai, patuse npiumai kavangtu kumjiu phutkhai mak rabo-e.

Mai khatniu patu liulujiu panao thiunisai, chiudi paniu luraolan misai, patuse papiu khuga jonkhai lanrabo-e; pawangpiu siniu patu sangdiumai khulam jonkhaibo suimakge, palamra paniu patu kam masa mibo-e.
Mai khatniu kavangpuitu liulujiu panahpiu leng pikhaisai, paniu patu panahpuitu kumjiu kamrabo-e.
Mai khatniu panao-napui thiusai, paniu panao karaipui situ karaiga pibambo katiu-kasak khatdi fai-nidung kumgapjiu pibam rabo-e.
Paniu haikumbose pakhuga kamkhai ngam laksai, paniu patu matha phutkhai rabo-e, sichiujiu paman-pagi lumak rabo-e.
Chiudi sise paniu kamnijiu kambo makjiu kammao misai, naliuleng Iniu kadakhaibo bam gase paniu tadlujiu mari lubui-e, siga pah ring lubui-e.
Chiudi mai khatniu palungpom gasu mai khattu kamshat siakra kamjiu kamshat misai, paniu agu rathakbamga pakwang nbai bamdi patu kamshat mirabo-e.
“Mai khatniu papuitu maksai papiutu dapsai, patu kamshat mirabo-e.
“Mai khatniu n-gijiu mai khattu tatuniu rotjiu, maksai pa-njumniu jumjiu, patuse dapshat maksai, patu sajai pimak rabo-e.
Chiudi paniu dapkhaibo piuse taziga jibam mijiu, pasainiu tathun thinlu tadpad ngamlan lusai, pajeng hamibo kak lungga chaphijengse paniu majonra rabo-e, khatdi pah wimak then paniu akhirabo-e.
“Mai khatniu tasing thinlujiu pavangpuitu maksai pavangpiutu pabam gasu dapshat misai, patuse sajai pirabo-e.
Chiudi kavang siniu naikhat jengnia lungga shaimak misai, pawangpiu situ sajai pira ha-e. Pagu mania nchum mibo siniu buimide.

“Maidung khangsianiu adapjiu pawon phungbo puitu kam ajamjiu panah kiumi sai, chiudi patura kam ajam mathiu maksai, pakinaniu kakhengbo khatdi ladjanpaoniu suikhaibose patu kam-ajambo piuniu majon rabo-e.
Chiudi maipui situ kam-ajam misai, sibo sajai sira ringting sung ringting,
chamik sung chamik, chahiu sung chahiu, chaben sung chaben, chaphi sung chaphi,
chami rubo sung chami rubo, tajam sung tajam thiu rabo-e.
“Mai khatniu pavangpuitu maksai pavangpiutu pamikga dapjiu, pamik tiatmisai, pamik tiatmibo sung patu phutkhai mirabo-e.
Paniu pahiu kakhiutang misai, pahiu sung patu phutkhai mirabo-e.
“Kabuichiniu mai khattu mathaoshat misai, kabuichi situ tatuniu rotshatmi rabo-e, khatdi pazanse tiumak rabo-e; chiudi papaopiu situra sajai pimak rabo-e.

Chiudi kabuichi siniu maitu mathaora kamkinjiu papaopiutu sibo lamga pisikhaijiu kachankhai misai, chiudi paniu wajeng simakjiu, paniu raolu nbangmi maksai haisitu tatuniu rotshat mirabo-e, khatdi papaopiu tudi kamshat mirabo-e.
Chiudi papaopiu siniu majon pira suisai, pagu ringtingtu ranlubui majon rabo-e.
Kabuichi siniu npuimai nahtu tadi, npiumai nahtu tadi kamshat misai sikum gapjiu kamrabo-e.
Kabuichi siniu maivangpui khattu maksai maivangpiu khattu kamshat misai, kavang npaopiu situ rangkang samriu majon rabo-e, khatdi kabuichi situ tatuniu rotshat mirabo-e.
“Mai khatniu chakhomky mahgom lupad lujiu, maksai chakhomky khat chulujiu sise gomkhai makjiu, kabuichi maksai qonniam nkhuang khai misai,
paniu wakhao shaimibo manse majon rabo-e. Paniu wakhao manse majon lujiu paphaw sira paniu lubo sui-e.
Mai khat gu buichiniu mai khat buichitu mathaoshat misai, panai khangnia siniu karingbo situ jonlujiu pamanse njan rabo-e, kashaibo zan sidi njan tiu rabo-e.

Chiudi mai khat buichise mathao tanbo lunlung bamjiu papaopiutu pisikhaijiu kachankhai misai, chiudi paniu wajeng simakjiu paniu raolu nbangmi maksai, hamibo situ paniu karingbo buichi siniu majon rabo-e, chiudi kashaibo khao sira paniu lubo sui-e.
Mai khatniu matom khat maksai mily khat agalujiu maksai kamshat lujiu jonmi sai, paniu matom khatsung matom mangiu, khatdi mily khatsung mily madai majon rabo-e.

Paniu agalubose paniu majon rabo-e. Paniu wakhatdi marui maksai, paniu agabo sung patu kavang leng jonrabo-e, paniu matomma, qonniamma maksai milyma agalubo wakhaose ringjiu pagu maniajiuga bamniu sai, paniu khatsung nia thiujiu majon rabo-e.
“Agatiumai khatniu nchun maiky kampang lujiu ngutboga patu kamshat misai, patu kamshatbo maise pamao ha-e. Chiudi haise n-nien tingga tasai, patu kamshatbo maise, kamshatbogu chamao bam mide.
“Mai khatniu paluga maksai parengga, pagu khaoruitu pi tagi khai nbambo gasu, pakmeng mai luga chamiu maksai alin-tamra tiu maha misai, maigu kam maha mibo miusyse, paniu majon rabo-e.
“Mai khatniu paluga maksai parengga chami thonkhaijiu, mai luga puakbambo maksai gekhai nbambo taomi sai, chami thonkhaibo piu siniu majon rabo-e.
“Mai khatniu maigu rangkang maksai paman kungbo mania pakyga khai nbambo gasu, mai khatniu aga misai, agabopiu situ minlusai, paniu damnia majon rabo-e.
Chiudi agalubo piutu daolu maksai, mania kakung baibopiu situ kahumbokyga puiwang lujiu, paniu khangkhat piugu maniase aga makge chiubogu tasiang siang rabo-e.

“Wa maniagu habo lamga hai, matom-kabui tadi, qonniam tadi mily tadi maksai chafai-tani tadi, papao kania situ kahumbokyga puiwang rabo-e. Siga mao-e chiujiu Tingwang niu dinpadbo piu paniu khangkhatbo piutu damnia majon rabo-e.
“Mai khatniu, mai khatgu qonniam, matom, mily maksai wakhao khat paleng marui khai bine chiulujiu, wakhaose shai misai, maksai ajam misai maksai chari gasu sutlusai, chiudi siga lamchap mai hasai,
paniu kahumbokyga tadlujiu-maigu wakhaose paniu aga makge chiujiu tasiang siang rabo-e. Sichiujiu paniu wakhaose agamak misai, paniu patu wadi majon lakge, hamibose papaopiu siniu suikhai rabo-e;
chiudi wakhao situ paniu agalu bamniu sai paniu papaopiu situ majon rabo-e.
Nkan khaoniu sisetu kamshat misai, para-parumse paniu khoiwang lenrabo-e, sichiusai paniu siga majonra ha-e.
“Mai khatniu wakhaose mathiu lujiu thinbamboga sise ajam misai, maksai sise shai misai, sise majon rabo-e.
Chiudi papaoniu kabambo tingga sise shai misai, paniu majon lakge. Wakhaose paman pijiu mathiubo gusai, kamathiubo man siniu suimibo-e.
Chiudi papiuniu patu maluang lungra suimaksai, paniu liuchang khat man kabuibose papiutu majon rabo-e.
Kamipui-kaminahtu kam masa mane.
Naliuniu paliutu kam masajiu, paliu kapjiu khengsai,
sichiusai Iniu alung pomjiu naliutu chariga kamshat mirabo-e. Sichiujiu naliu naodungse kamipui thiumi rabo-e khatdi naliu nahdungse magennah thiumi rabo-e.
“Naliuniu amai lungkalak maitu rangkang apuk khaisai, rangkang apuk suimai kumjiu, paton-pana pakhuga lubo suimakge.
Mai khatniu pikhaira dindeng khaibo faise naliuniu khoilusai, sise naimik ngut makhaga patu pilan milo,
palamra patu pilum khaira sise ronna pakhuga bambo-e. Sichiu maksai pah degu benji ralo? Nkha khaira paniu akhuga kapjiu khengsai, Iniu patu paokak khai bine, delosai Ira lungsa sibo-e.
“Pawan saisuijiu naliugu miusy, naliu jaw khatdi naliugu takisase akhuga kadkhailo.
“Naliu nah naraise akhuga pikhailo.
Naliugu matom-kabui khatdi mily piangraibo hina akhuga kadkhailo. Piangraibo pachi hina, jeng chinnia papui khuga pi bamkhai lujiu tachadbo naise akhuga kadkhai rabo-e.
Kamajibotu kam kadad lujiu lamchap thiuboga maksai mai kakeng lam suinijiu, kamao kamboga suikhai mane.
Kaleksa maitu ladjan thiuboga chamiu-mareng thiumi mane.
Pagu qonniam siniu pabang phungtad lulakjiu nkhuangkiu misai, sibo qonniamtu jumasu khai lanbilo, tad taronmi mane.
Kamaobo ladjan thiujiu, pamao kahamaitu kamshat mane, palamra sikumbo wa kasa kam maitu Iniu ladjan thiurabo-e.
Tanim lumane, palamra tanim lubo siniu kamajiboga maimik kamtiatjiu pamao kahamaitu kam maha mibo-e.
Chiudi pachinniabo kumse mathak milo, siga padbo wakhatdi atiat mane. Kalek samaitu pijiu sise tiulo khatdi kamasiakbose pijiu nkan-khaotu tiulo. Naliugu mumsireng nai takisy bangdi sikumgap rabo-e.
“Atu chakhuang thiubo leng takum khatga changee lonsum rabo-e.

Naliuniu Egypt dih phutkhaibo hiu Abib hiuga, Chakhi jaomakbo Taruak Ngee hai Iniu naliu khuga chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu changi rabo-e. Haibo ngee jeng chinnia lungga chakhi khaibo taruak tiutulo. Atu kahumra wangboga, wadi phungmakjiu wangmane.
“Naliugu mumsireng nai charapen-reng atiat suraga chaken tingga Kapuang Ngee hai kamlo.
Takum machangna naliu maipiu hinaniu changee lonsum gahai naliu Rawang,
“Naliuniu wakhao ponlujiu charathiuboga chakhi khaibo taruak akhuga kadkhai mane. Haibo ngee ga aleng kadkhaibo wakhao sase pasaibo nai tangbo khai nbam mak rabo-e.
Milypoitu maksai kamipoitu papui nduiga lang taman mane.
“Iniu naliuleng kaden khaibo bam gase naliutu puiwangra khatdi naliu chabin tadkinboga gukhaira Iniu maza khattu naliu masuangga langkhai bine.
Paniu kadinbo nkingjiu palad majailo. Patu atung mane, palamra Iniu patu langkhaibo-e, siniu pah naliutu kuak khai silakge.
Chiudi naliuniu pacham phungjiu, Iniu chamtan pikhaibo hina majaisai, Iniu naliu mikremai hinatu aphen khai bine.
Agu maza siniu naliu masuang tadraijiu, naliutu Amor mai, Hitt mai, Periz mai, Canaan mai, Hiv mai khatdi Jebus mai kadihga naliutu majangjiu, Iniu paliutu kam mahakhai bine.
Paliu radung khuga makhumkiu mane maksai paliutu kahum mane, khatdi paliu racheng majai mane. Paliu radungtu kam mahajiu, paliugu masanbo tusomtu kampang milo.
Naliuniu naliu Rawang,
Sichiusai naliu kadihga maipui khatnadi panah kiulakge, maksai panah lungmakbo thiu lakge. Iniu naliu ringthengra pikhai bine.
“Naliutu atungmaitu pijiu atu pingkhai bine; naliutu charithiu mai khuga Iniu kabuakbo phungwang khai bine, khatdi naliutu mikremai hinatu Iniu naliu khugasu marijiu pakmira kamkhai bine.
Iniu naliu mikremai khuga kapingbo nai manangbo pikhai bine; naliuniu haichiu tadpadboga, Iniu Hiv maitu, Canaan maitu khatdi Hitt maitu hathon khai bine.
Takum khat lunggasu Iniu paliutu hathon khai lakge, Iniu hathon pad kammi sai, sibo kadihse ramjing thiujiu, nkan-khaodungse kengjumi rabo-e.
Sibosung, Iniu paliutu tam-tamna hapad khaijiu kadihse naliukhang kengpadbo saisui pikhai bine.

Iniu naliu kadihse Aqaba Zaibek gasu Euphrate Giuki tangbo khatdi Mediterranean Duipui gasu ramjing tangbo pikhai bine. Sibo kadihga lungmai hina riga Iniu pumtan pikhai bine, khatdi naliuniu sichiu tadkhangboga Iniu paliutu hathon khaibi rabo-e.
Paliutu maksai paliu radungtu akadbo thak kamtulo.

Paliutu pijiu naliu kadihga lung mane; naliuniu paliutu pilung khaisai, paliuniu naliutu pijiu akhuga kamaobo kamkhai rabo-e. Naliuniu paliu radungtu kahum khaisai, siseniu naliuleng maomakjiu kashaibo thak thiurabo-e.”
Naronna makjiu, mai khatnadi akhuga wang mana mane. Maidung sira maluanggen tangbo khangbo suimakge.”
Mose niu tadlujiu
Mose niu
Sichiujiu paniu chabonmai khangsiatu langkhaijiu, paliuniu
Mose niu wakhao zai paphan lamse chakuang lungga khailujiu paphan lamse thinlujiu rathakbam gase kajin khaide.
Sichiujiu
Mose, Aaron, Nadab, Abihu khatdi Israel maigu jupao khang riakchinnia siniu maluang gase khangde, siga Israel mai Rawang tu paliu ngaolude.
Paphipa hanggase tingpuk kumgapjiu majaibo paman kungbo tukang khat bamme.
Tingwang niu Israel maigu jupaodung haitu kam masa khai makge; paliuniu Tingwang tu ngaolude, khatdi siga paliu majang watiu-wasak aruang khaide.
Siga Mose nai patu nkhapiu, Joshua niu kaden lujiu masanbo maluang gase Mose khang mide.

Mose niu maidung khuga din-e, “Anainiu wang makthen, haibo rijikyga anaitu khuanbam niulo. Aaron nai Hur naliu ruangga bamme, siniu mai khat kumboniu n-gi-athaobo bamsai, panai khuga tadlujiu kam manai lulo.”
Mose niu Sinai Luonglam khang mide, siga kamuang siniu kenphuiting mide.

gu ran-ranbo nbiu siniu maluong situ gomnam mide. Sibo nbiuse Israel mai lengra maluong rigase chami taobo kumjiu ngao-e. Kamuang siniu maluong situ jeng charuk gomkhang-e, sichiujiu pachinniabo naise
Mose niu maluong lamse kamuangjiu gasu khang mide. Sichiujiu paniu siga nchun atai, n-nien atai bamkhaide.
“Israel mainiu aleng wa kadkhaira dinbilo. Mai hinaniu pikhaibo maniakad hina lukhailo.
Siga kadkhai rabo sira: kachia, rangkang, tanaagi;
fainoi, kamaobo, kamajaibo, heng-marenbo, chakhao giuniu dakbo fai;
milychi giuniu sumlubo kahengbo, chamigi kawibo, singbom,
chamibung leng wasa, manuk khaira wasa khatdi parim wibo wamud;
tasipum khatdi Singku Dibo fairi nai paga topra wania haisi-e.
Iniu paliu ruangga bamra, maidungniu aleng masanbo Mathenky khat thiu rabo-e.
Iniu natu lenkhaibo thak kumjiu pakhiangnase kam rabo-e, khatdi karukhai rabo-e.
“Singbom singniu ncheng 45 thengbo, ncheng 27 dibo khatdi ncheng 27 kubo Bung khat kamlo.
Palungse kachianiu thiu gomlujiu pamung lenlamdi, pakhu madai khatdi pangen madai chiujiu pajai khatlam pariu nia-nia kamkhailo.
Juraleng patiangdi singbom singniu kamlujiu kachianiu makom khailo,
sichiujiu Wabung mung gase pariu khai maguilo.
Pariuse patiang gasu lupad makjiu khai aruang rabo-e.
Sichiujiu Iniu natu pikhai rabo ladriat raokhaibo tukang kaniase sibo Wabung lungga khairabo-e.
Pakan phungbo wakhao
pagomke machang khat-khat kamkhailo. Sichiujiu pagom panai khatnakha thiura kamkhai rabo-e.
Pakan phungbo wakhao mengse pagom riga khat-khat khulam zudaojiu panai kan siniu pagom situ gomnam khairabo-e.
Tatukang kaniase Wabung lunggase khailujiu pagomse gommilo.
Sigasu Iniu natu adao rabo-e, sichiujiu pakan phungbo wakhao kania kak, sibo gom rigasu Israel maileng agu tacheng-tajaise Iniu nakhuga pikhai bine.
“Singbom singniu ncheng 36 thengbo, ncheng 18 dibo khatdi ncheng 27 kubo wakai khat kam khailo.
Sise masanbo kachianiu thiugom lujiu, pamungse kachianiu thiukhu khailo.
Pamung kamaguibo pakhuse ncheng 3 kamkhai rabo-e, sichiujiu sibo khutu kachianiu thiukhu milo.
Juraleng kachia-riu madai kamkhai lujiu paphi bambo pake madai gase khairabo-e.
Wakaise juraleng patiang riuse pakhu mungga khairabo-e.
Patiangse singbom singniu kamlujiu kachianiu thiu makom khailo.
Mumjaw kadkhai raleng chakuang, chapiang, tadui dungbo-piang khatdi tatam chagan kuang kamkhai rabo-e. Pakhiangna haise kachianiu kam-rabo-e.
Wakaise Ladriat Bung masuangga khairabo-e, sichiujiu sibo wakai rigase akhuga kadkhai rabo masanbo taruakse khai nbam tan-tan rabo-e.
“Chamibung khaibam leng masanbo kachianiu kamlo. Patang nai pabungse kachia-baniu kamlo; pagu karukhaibo rapense paku nai pamumse khatnakha thiurabo-e.
Pake charuk padjiu khatlam sum-sum padrabo-e.
Pake charuk pakhiangnase karukhaibo charapen sum bamrabo-e, sise tathan-takisy parui nai pamum pen taman bambo rapen kumgap rabo-e.
Chamibung khaibam tangse tathan-takisy parui nai pamum pen taman bambo rapen kumbo madainiu karukhai rabo-e.
Pake sumbo ndah hang machangga pamum khat-khat bamrabo-e.
Pamumdung, pakedung khatdi chamibung khaibam hinase kachia pek khatniu kamrabo-e.
Chamibung khaibam lengse chamibung chinnia kamkhaijiu pasuanglam sanbiu padra kam khai rabo-e.
Haibogu takap nai pakuangse masanbo kachianiu kamrabo-e.
Chamibung khaibam nai ngutrabo mania hinase kamra masanbo kachia taju 35 thinrabo-e.
Iniu natu maluang riga lenkhai mibo kumjiu wahina hai kam mawijiu kamlo.
“Iniu bamrabo Mathenky, masanbo Mathenky lungse majaibo, tarikbo khatdi hengbo chakhaogiu fainiu dakbo fainoi lep kariuniu kamlo. Siga pakan phungbo wakhao mengdungse charui khailo.
Palep hinase macham rabo-e, siniu pathense tachao 24, khatdi padetniu tachao 4 rabo-e.
Sise lep mangiu-ngiuniu charui khat thiu rabo-e.
Sibo lep faihan rigase majaibo langniu pacharui-raa kamkhai rabo-e.
Karaibo han-gu karaibo lep gase paraa ringiu, khatdi kanabo han-gadi paraa ringiu kamkhai rabo-e.
Sibo han niase pi-aruang khaira kachianiu paguak ringiu kamkhailo.
“Mathenky situ tomra chakhaogiuniu dakbo fai lep kariu-je-khatkiuniu kamrabo-e.
Pakhiangnase macham kamrabo-e, siniu pathen leng tachao 26, khatdi padet leng tachao 4 rabo-e.
Han khat siniu fai mangiu leng, han khat siniu fai charuk leng charuilo. Charukbo faise kadip nia thiulujiu Mathenky masuang gase khairabo-e.
Han khatgu kanamthubo fairi gase paraa ringiu, khatdi khatbogu fai hanri gase paraa ringiu kamkhailo.
Han nia situ khat thiu khaira paraa gase tanaaginiu paguak ringiu kamkhailo.
Mathenky sailamse katambo fai khatniu julen khailo.
Mathenky situ topmanra tachao khat thengbo fainiu julen khailo.
“Lenlam thaptom khaira, kamichi-giu kahengboga sumlubo faitop nai chakhaogiu fai kawibo faitop chiujiu patom nia kamkhailo.
“Mathenky kajense singbom singniu kamlo.
Pakanse tachao 8, thengbo khatdi ncheng 27 chiujiu dirabo-e.
Sichiujiu kajense mathukra duk macham nia thiulo. Kajen hinase mathukra kariopad macham kam rabo-e.
Tingrunlam leng kajen makai kamlujiu,
kajen hinatu mathuk manrabo duk kaniakak gase parun nia-nia thiujiu rangkang giniu paham atai kam khailo.
Mathenky gu tingpi lamse kajen makai,
chiujiu kajen run hinase rangkang giniu pahamse kam khailo.
Mathenky gu kasai tingnu lamse kajen charuk,
chiujiu pakamik hinase kajen nia-nia khailo.
Pakamikga khaibo kajendung sira parun lamsu mathukjiu papee tangbo khangrabo-e. Pakamik niaga khaibo kajen sira haichiu kamrabo-e.
Sichiujiu kajen tachat run gase rangkang giniu kambo pahamse kariu-je-charukkiu bamrabo-e.
Mathenky jaisum gase singbom singniu tachailon kariu-je-mangiukiu khailo,
pajai khatlamniu kajen mangiu, kasailam tingnu lamse kajen mangiu chiujiu khailo.
Mathenky n-gangga khaibo kajense n-gang gasu tachai khai rabo-e.
Kajendungse kachianiu makom khailo, khatdi tachai khaibose thinmanra kachianiu pakhapse kamkhailo.
Maluong riga Iniu natu lenkhaibo thak kumjiu Mathenky hai thiurabo-e.
“Jusungfaise majaibo, tarikbo khatdi chakhaogiu fai kahengboniu dakbo fainoi kawiniu kamlo.
Sise singbom singniu kambo tiang madai, khatdi rangkang giniu kambo paham gase guak khailo.
Jusungfai lenkhai nbambo Mathenky singgen gase Ladriat Bung bambo tatupek kaniase khai milo. Jusungfai siniu Masan thubo Bam gasu Masanbo bamse kamtam milo.
Ladriat Bung rigase pagom khailo.
Masanthubo Bam lenlamse, Mathenky nai chamibung khaibam khuga tingpi lamdi, tingrun lamdi wakaise kam khai rabo-e.
Mathenky kamun lengse majaibo, tarikbo khatdi hengbo chakhaogiuniu dakbo fainoi khatdi karukhaibo fai siniu jusungfai kam khailo,
Jusungfai tiang hai singbom singniu kamjiu sisetu kachianiu thiu makom khailo khatdi siga paguak mangiu kamkhai lujiu sisetu tanaaginiu parunham kam khailo.
“Singbom singniu rathakbam khat kam khailo. Haise pake madai rabo-e, pathenniu tachao mangiu, padetniu tachao mangiu, khatdi pakodniu tachao sum rabo-e.
Pake madai rigase paton kariopadra kam khailo. Sise rathakbam panai macham rabo-e, sichiujiu tanaaginiu sisetu thiu makom rabo-e.
Buina khairabo khangli, chakuang, tatam-chagan kuang, paguak khatdi khangli kam khailo. Mania pakhiangna hai tanaaginiu kam khailo.
Pake machang juraleng tanaaginiu pakhap kam khailo.
Rathakbam kanse pakhap hangga khaijiu paphan siniu rathakbam khangtang rabo-e.
Juraleng patiangse singbom singniu kamlujiu tanaaginiu thiugom milo,
sichiujiu haise ponboga rathakbamke hina khap hangga khailo.
Maluong riga Iniu natu lenkhai mibo thak kumjiu rathakbamse kapiupekniu kamjiu paki kam khailo.
“Iniu bamrabo Mathenky hai fainoi kawiboniu kam khailo. Tingrun lamgu jusungfaise tachao 100, thengrabo-e,
sise tanaagi tiang makai, pahamdi tanaaginiu kam rabo-e.
Tingpi lamdi sise machamjiu kamrabo-e.
Tingnu lam sira tachao ringiu, thengrabo-e, siga katiang kariu, pahamdi kariu bamrabo-e.
Tingbang lam ngutrabo akham sidi tachao ringiu, dirabo-e.
Kamun mung hinagase tachao kariu-je-mangiu, gu jusungfai nai katiang sum khatdi paham sum bamrabo-e.
Kamun se chakhet madai-paphan thengrabo-e, sise majaibo, tarikbo khatdi hengbo chakhaogiuniu dakbo fainoi gase tathuak khaibo fai siniu karukhai rabo-e.
Siga jaorabo katiang hinase rangkang giniu kambo paguak nai tanaaginiu kambo paham siniu ju-aruang khai rabo-e.
Pakhiangna haise pathenniu tachao kai khat, padetniu tachao ringiu, khatdi pakodniu tachao mangiu rabo-e. Jusungfai haise fainoi kawiboniu kamrabo-e, khatdi tanaaginiu pahamse kamrabo-e.
Mathenky lungga ngutrabo mania hinase tanaaginiu kamrabo-e.
“Israel mainiu withubo takisysa nakhuga phungwangjiu, chawan machang sise mataora chamtan pikhailo.

Iniu bambo Mathenky, Ladriat Bung bambo lenlam jusungfai, suanggase chamibung mataora Aaron nai panahmaitu khaitam milo. Iniu bambo gase nchun gasu nsuan tangbo matao rabo-e. Haibo chamtanse Israel mainiu tingthengjiu paliu kai-kik hinaniu kamrabo-e.
“Nasingna Aaron tu khatdi panahmai, Nadab, Abihu, Eleazer khatdi Ithamar paliutu kululo. Paliutu Israel mai khugasu kadpad tam milo. Sichiujiu paliuniu agu singkumai thiurabo-e.
Nasingna Aaron leng singkugu fai-nise kamkhaijiu patu pijiu chakhuang thiubo nai ngaowibose thiulo.
Iniu pumtan pikhai mibo langsiam kasimai situ kulujiu Aaron fai-ni leng pikam khaijiu, patu pijiu pagu singku tienkamga kadkhai lulo.

Paliutu pijiu paga khekriang, ntiang-taronbo tathuak khaibo ntiang, papee khek, khatdi papee-top leng kam khaira dinbilo. Paliuniu nasingna Aaron leng khatdi panahmaileng singku fai-nise kamkhaijiu, paliuniu agu singku tiense thiurabo-e.
Langsiam kasimai siniu majaibo, tarikbo, chakhaogiu-fai kahengbo, kachia-riang khatdi fainoi kawibo thinrabo-e.
“Paliuniu majaibo, tarikbo, chakhaogiu-fai kahengbo, kachia-riang khatdi fainoi kawibo khatdi tathuak khikhaijiu karukhaibo thinlujiu ntiang-taronbo ntiangse charui khai rabo-e.
Pamakhuak kaniaga kabet khaira chafaipoi niadi charuirabo-e.
Dak mawi lubo khen-gak siniu pa-ntiang taronbo ntiang gase khinkhai rabo-e.
Tabaipum nia thinlujiu Jacob nahmaidung khang kariu-je-niakiu zan raokhailo.
sichiujiu khatlam khang charuk, khatlam khang charuk chiujiu kating-kana thiujiu raokiu khailo.
Kachia, rangkang akiat simaitu pijiu tatupek nia gase Jacob nahmaidung zan raokhailo, sichiujiu tatuse pijiu kachia khaibo saisuijiu khairabo-e.
Ntiang taronbo riangsitu pijiu Israel mai kiphiu kariu-je-niakiu sung thiura pijiu pamakhuak kega phunglo. Haichiujiu Aaron niu paliu jandungse pamakhuakga phungrabo-e, sichiujiu
Kachia-riang nia kamkhailo,
khatdi chalangriang kaphenbo kumjiu masanbo kachia-riang nia sidi kamkhailo.
“Tingwang maning phuira Singku dibo leng pagakhek kamkhailo. Haise ntiang-taronbo gi nai pagiak nchambo siniu kamrabo-e.
Haise nialeng kadip wangboga ncheng chakiu, thengbo khatdi ncheng chakiu dirabo-e.
Sibo riga paman kungbo tuniu lim madai kamkhailo; karaibo ren siniu hengmumbo-tu, majinbo-tu, khatdi hengria-riabo-tu khairabo-e;
paniabo ren siniu kamaobo-tu, majaibo-tu khatdi kapuangbo-tu;
pasumbo ren siniu kapubo-tu, ababo-tu khatdi katikbo-tu;
madaibo ren siniu ngaotaron-tu, tabaipum khatdi tala-tu chiujiu kamkhai rabo-e.
Tatu kariu-je-niakiu gahai Jacob nahmai khang kariu-je-niakiu zan hai raokhaijiu, chaphiu kariu-je-niakiu haitu pisikhai rabo-e.
Chagakhek jengniu masanbo kachia-riang hai chalang phenbo kumjiu kamlo.
Kachia-riang nia kamlujiu gakhek nribo kelamse pijiu aruang khailo,
sichiujiu pakhap nia gase kachianiu phenbo riang niase khin aruang khailo.
Paren kania ton-gase khin aruang lujiu makhuak suanglam bambo ntiang-taronbo gase khin aruang khailo.
Sichiujiu kachia khap nia kamlujiu, gakhek nhanglam ntiang-taronbo lunglam patai gase khai aruanglo.
Kachia khap nia kamlan lujiu, sise ntiang-taronbo pamasuanggu makhuakke kaniaga khatdi pacharui mungga nai khen-gak kawibo rigase mathuk khailo.
Gakhek khapse ntiang-taronbo khapga chalangriang majaiboniu khinkhai lujiu, sisetu khen-gak riga pijiu aluakpad makra kam khailo.
“Aaron niu Masanbo Bamga ngutbo tingga paniu sibo gakhek gase Israel mai kiphiu jan raokhai lujiu ngutrabo-e, sichiujiu
Urim nai Thummim
“Ntiang-taronbo riga khairabo ntiang sira chakhaogiu-fai majaiboniu kamrabo-e.
Papi kario khairaleng paki kamput khairabo-e, sise kekmakra pamung chaliammi rabo-e.
Pakhen n-hanglamse majaibo, tarikbo, khatdi kahengbo chakhaogiuniu dakbo gase majongsy meng kamkhai lujiu siga kachia nsiuna kamkhailo.
Aaron niu singku tien thiuboga paniu sibo ntiangse khairabo-e. Paniu agu Masanbo Bamga ngutboga maksai padboga nsiuna khuanse chiusai, patuse kamshat lakge.
“Masanbo kachianiu mania khat kamlujiu sibo riga, ‘
Haise chapikhek pasuanglam chalangriang majaiboniu khin khailo.
Aaron niu haise pasan-ga topkhai rabo-e, sichiujiu Israel mainiu akhuga wa kadkhaiboga paliuniu kamaobo kammi bamliu tadi, kadkhaibo hinase
“Aaron leng fainoi kawiboniu pa-ntiang leng dakkhailo, Khatdi papeesuang lengse fainoi kawiboniu kamkhai lujiu, siga kheklanra pariang tadi wameng charui khaijiu karu khailo.
“Aaron nahmaileng ntiang, pikhek-riang khatdi pirun kamkhailo, sichiujiu paliutu pi-ngaowi khailo khatdi chakhuang thiu khailo.
Haibo fai-nidungse nasingna Aaron khatdi panahmai khuga pikhai bilo. Sichiujiu paliutu takisy-sa taikhaijiu, paliuniu agu singku tien thiura leng kadkhailo.
Paliuniu wasaothiu mimakra, paliu nileng, paliu khen gasu pahingpom tangbo kamkhailo.

Aaron nai panahmainiu Mathenky lungga ngutjiu Iniu bambo Masanbo Bamga ngutbo tingga haibo fai-nidungse khairabo-e, sichiujiu paliuniu wasao thiuboga, paliutu kamshat mimak raleng-e. Haise Aaron nai pakai-kik maidungniu tingthengjiu majai rabo-e.
“Naliuniu Aaron nai panahmaitu atien thiura haichiujiu singku leng paliutu kadkhai rabo-e. Kabuichipoi khat nai kamichi nia, wadi pajam-para habo thinrabo-e.
Takhui withubo chiudi chakhi jaomakbo thinlujiu, kasianiu takisysa jaobo, kasianiu jaomakbo sichiujiu ka-apiubo taruak khuangse, wasa siniu khuaklo.
Naliuniu aleng kabuichi nai kamichise kadkhaiboga sise takam lungga khailujiu kadlo.
“Aaron nai panahmaitu Iniu bambo Mathenky kamun-ga puiwang lujiu charachengga pijiu nkhiu khai rabo-e.
Sichiu lujiu Aaron tu singku ponse pipiu khailo, ntiang-taronbo riga gakhek nai khen-gakse khai bilo.
