Papikhekse khekhai lujiu masanbogu madan, ‘
Sichiulujiu wasase thinlujiu papeega runkhaijiu patu manuk khai bilo.
“Panahmaitu puiwang lujiu, paliu ntiang khai bilo;
paliu khen-ga khatdi paliu piga chapikhekse khekhai bilo. Haichiujiu naliuniu Aaron nai panahmaitu tatien pikhai rabo-e. Paliudi paliu kaikikdungdi tingthengjiu agu singku thiurabo-e.
“Iniu bambo Mathenky masuang gase kabuichi juwanglujiu Aaron nai panahmaitu pijiu paliu ben kaba khaira dinbilo.
Iniu bambo Masanbo Mathenky kamun gase kabuichi situ gikhailo.
Kabuichi zai kasiase na-njung sumlujiu rathakbam kegase kajin khailo, khatdi kamasiakbo zaise rathakbam hangga runkhailo.
Sibosai, palungga bambo pasa hina, pasin withubo jam, pamaki kaniase pasaren jaojiu aleng rathakbam gase rukhaijiu kadkhailo.
Chiudi kabuichi jan, pagi khatdi palung-niase rijiky lenlam rukhailo. Haise singku maigu nuan luthonra kadkhaibo si-e.
“Kabuichi khatbose julujiu, Aaron nai panahmaitu paliu ben sibo piga kaba khaira dinbilo.
Sise gilujiu, pazaise thinlujiu rathakbam pake madai gase kajin khailo.
Kamichise dangtap-tap lujiu, palungjan nai sailam ngense khoilujiu nkhiu milo khatdi sidungse papee nai kakibo chamikang riga khaimilo.
Kamichi pum pakhiangnase rathakbamga katiubo rathakleng thiujiu rukhailo. Haichiujiu kadkhaibo rimse achun kimme.
“Katambo michi kadkhaira thinbo michise ponlujiu Aaron nai panahmaitu paliu ben kaba khaira dinbilo.
Sise gilujiu, pajai kasia thinlujiu Aaron nai panahmai kuonnam majatlam, paphi-paben majatlam jungpui kania riga manuk khailo. Kamalibo zai hina thinlujiu rathakbam pake madai gase kajin khailo.
Rathakbamga bambo tazaise khatdi manuk khairabo wasase thinlujiu Aaron nai panahmai riga khatdi paliu faini riga kajin khailo. Sichiusai, paliu khatdi paliu fainise akhuga kadkhai mibo-e.
“Kamichi sa, palung-jantu makop khaibo pasaren pasin withubo-jam pamaki kaniase pasaren jaojiu khatdi paphi majatlamse gepad milo.
Aleng kadkhai mibo taruak takam gasu, taruak jat hina: takisy-sa jaobo khuang khat, jaomakbo khuang khat khatdi ka-apiubo taruak khuang khat thinlulo.
Pakhiangnase thinlujiu Aaron nai panahmai ben-ga pikhailujiu, paliutu pijiu aleng nkiubo kalense kadkhailo.
Sibosai, paliu khugasu khoilan lujiu, rathakbam rigase aleng katiu maniakad thiujiu rukhaijiu kadkhailo. Haichiu kadkhaibo rimse alung kimme.
Haibo michi gahse khoilujiu aleng nkiubo kalen thiujiu kadkhailo. Sibo dam haise naleng lurabo-e.
“Singkutu tatien pikhaiboga kamichi gah nai paphise khoilujiu aleng nkiubo kalen thiujiu kadkhaibose singkumai leng-e.
Amaidungniu akadbogu maniakadga, wakhao gah nai paphise singkumai leng-e chiubo hai agu kalimakbo maning-e. Haise
“Aaron gu singku fainise paniu shai miboga, panahmaitu tatien pikhaiboga piukhai rabo gu-e.
Aaron nah patu malinjiu agu Mathenkiga ngutjiu Masanbo Bamga tatien thiurabo paniu sibo fainidungse jeng chinnia khairabo-e.
“Aaron nai panahmaitu tatien pikhaiboga thinbo michi janse khoilujiu masanbo bamga suanglo.
Iniu bambo Mathenky kamun gase takamga masiakbo taruakse nai haise paliuniu tiurabo-e.
Paliutu tatien pikhaiboga thinbo, nuan kuak khaira charathiubo gase tiurabo-e. Haise singkumai ronna tiurabo-e, palamra haise masanbo-e.
Chami tadi, taruak tadi nsuan tiubangbo hinase ruthon mirabo-e, palamra haise masanbo-e.
“Iniu nakhuga chamtan pikhaibo kumgapjiu tatien pikhaibo tiense, Aaron nai panahmaileng jeng chinnia kamkhailo.
Naimachang naliuniu kabuichi khat-khat charathiu khailo, sichiusai nuanse kuak khai bine. Haisiniu rathakbam tudi kam masan khai rabo-e. Sichiujiu haise kam masan khaira takisy-sa taikhailo.
Haise jeng chinnia lungga naimachangna kamlo. Sichiusai rathakbamse masansiak mirabo-e, khatdi mai khat kumboniu sise dikhaisai, masanbo pumtan siniu patu kam masakhai rabo-e.
“Wanglanrabo tingga, naimachangna rathakbam gase, milypoi tingkum khat tangmibo nia-nia rathak thiujiu kadkhailo.
Milypoi khat siniu nsuan, khat siniu chawan chiujiu kadkhailo.
Karaibo milypoi gu rathak gase takhui kawibo madad khatga takisy-sa masanbo taju khat khai taman lujiu kadkhailo. Mumsy jawdi taju khat runkhaijiu kadkhailo.
Niabo milypoi sidi nsuan kadkhai mibo kumgapjiu, takhuidi, takisadi, jawdi liakjiu kadkhailo. Haise
Wanglanrabo chaken hinaga haichiu rukhaibo rathak hai akhuga, Iniu bambo Mathenky kamun gase kadkhai rabo-e. Sise Iniu wangjiu amaidungtu adaojiu, naliutu npao rabo bamsi-e.
Siga Iniu amai Israel maitu adaojiu agu ran-ranbo nbiu siniu, sibo bamtu kam masan khai rabo-e.
Iniu Mathenky situ khatdi rathakbam situ kam masan khaine khatdi Aaron nai panahmaitu pijiu agu singkudung thiura kamtam khaine.
Iniu Israel maidung ruangga lungjiu, Iniu paliu Rawang thiurabo-e.
Egypt dih gasu paliutu maluang padbo paliu Rawang,
“Parim wibo wamud rukhairabo rathakbam khat singbom singniu kamkhailo.

Haise pake madai thiu rabo-e, pathenniu ncheng kariu-je-tachatkiu, padetniu ncheng kariu-je-tachatkiu, khatdi pakodniu ncheng samriu-je-sumkiu, kurabo-e. Haiga kariopadbo tonse pake madaise khat thiu rabo-e.
Pake madaise gomrabo-e, khatdi paton kariopadbose masanbo kachia khatdi pakhu kamaguise kachianiu kamrabo-e.
Haisitu patien tenjiu ponra pake nialamse kachianiu pakhap nia kamkhailo.
Patense singbom singniu kamlujiu kachianiu topman khailo.
Ladrian Bung suangga majukiubo jusungfaise haibo rathakbam lenlam khailo. Haibo bam gasu Iniu naliutu adaorabo-e.
Aaron niu nsuan machang wamudse rukhai rabo-e.
Paniu chawan chamibung mataobo tinggadi machamjiu kamkhai rabo-e. Parim wibo wamud rathak hai wanglan rabo chaken-ga saomakjiu kamrabo-e.
Haibo rathakbam riga, wadao khatdi suimakbo wamud, wakhao rathak, maksai katiubo rathak thiukhai mane, khatdi haibo riga jawdi runkhai mane.

Takum khat lungga Aaron niu rathakbam gase kariopadbo ton madai gase wakhao zai kajin khaijiu nuan leng rathak thiukhaijiu kam masan khai rabo-e. Wanglanrabo chaken hinaga haise takum machang kamrabo-e. Rathakbam haise masansiakjiu kamrabo-e, haise
“Nangniu Israel mai riak raoboga, mai hinaniu pagu ringting jengniu paman pirabo-e, sichiusai chamairiak raobo tingga, pariga wakasa wanglakge.
Pariakga chakkhaibo mai hinaniu, mathiuniu suikhaibo riatgu rangkang tajuse pirabo-e. Mai hinaniu sise akhuga kadkhai rabo-e.
Pariakga chakkhai mibo mai hina, chiubora takum makai tangmibo maksai sibo riga bammai hinaniu sibo manse akhuga pirabo-e.
Kalek wimaidi pimakeng sonmak rabo-e, kaleksa maidi pi matam sonmak rabo-e, paliuniu paliu ringting man pirabo-e.
Haibo rangkangse Israel mai khugasu khom madui lujiu Iniu bambo Mathenky akhiraboga thinpiu rabo-e, sichiusai Iniu paliutu gukhaira maningtao khairabo-e.”
“Tataaginiu kambo tataagi tathikuang kadibo khat kamlo. Haise Mathenky nai rathakbam kakga tadui masunkhai lujiu khairabo-e.
Haise Aaron nai panahmainiu paliu phi, paliu ben nkhiura leng-e.
Paliuniu Mathenky lungga ngutlujiu rathakbamga katiugu rathak thiu makhaga kamrabo-e, sichiusai paliutu kamshat lakge.
Paliuniu shai makra, paliu phi, paliu ben nkhiu rabo-e. Haise paliuniu khatdi paliu tah-nahdungniu majairabo cheng-e.”
“Parim withubo maruta taju charuk, takigee kawibo taju sum, chakhatjiu parim kawibo taju sum,
khatdi khasaniu
Sichiusai parim wibo wasa kumjiu masanbo manuk khaibo tiense kamlo.
Haise thinlujiu Iniu bambo mathenky, Ladrian Bung,
wakai nai sibo maniadung, chamibung khaibam nai sibo maniadung, parim wibo kadkhaibo rathakbam,
maring rukhaibo rathakbam nai sibo maniadung khatdi wakhaibo kuangse manuk khaijiu taikhai rabo-e.
Haidungse haichiujiu kadkhailo, sichiusai paliuse masansiak mirabo-e, sichiujiu haidungtu dikhaibo mai hinatu pagu masanbo pumtan siniu kam masakhai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu Aaron nai panahmaitu atien thiura singkudung leng tatien pikhailo.
Israel maikhuga haichiu dinlo, ‘Masanbo wasa manuk khaijiu taikhaibo hainiu wanglan rabo chaken hinaga atien thiura leng-e.
Haise maidiu-maida maikhuga wadaodi kammak rabo-e, khatdi haikumbo thak hai naliuniu kakibo thakga kamjiu thinbo suimakge. Haise masanbo-e, siniu naliuniu haisitu masanbo leng thinrabo-e.
Singku makjiu haikumbo thak kammai, maksai haikumbo thak thinpiumai situ, wadao khatdi amaileng chakkhai tami rabo-e.’”
Paliutu khai aruang lujiu parim wibose kamkhailo. Haisitu kam masan khaira mataidi kasia khailo.
Kasiase pamud kamlujiu, Iniu bambo Mathenky, Ladrian Bung masuangga mara khailo. Haibo wamudse masansiakbo leng kamrabo-e.
Haibo parim wibo thakse naliu lengra kambo suimakge. Haise masan siakjiu aleng kadkhaibogu thiurabo-e.
Mai khatniu haikumbo parim wibo thinsai, patuse amaileng chakkhai lakge.”
“Iniu Judah kiphiu gasu Hur tah, Uri nahpiu, Bezalel tu kada khaimide.
Iniu patu bensiam hina kamsira ningting, tasi khatdi pumtan hina niu phuikhai mide.
Paniu kachiadi, rangkang gidi, tataagidi thinsijiu palun kamlura;
khatdi tatiu-tatah kamsira, tasingdi marim sira, sichiujiu bensiam hina kamsira pikhai mide.

Patu maluang tatien thiura, Iniu Dan kiphiu gasu Ahisamach nahpiu, Oholiab tu kadakhai mide. Iniu patudi bensiam hina kamsira pumtan pikhai mibo-e, sichiujiu Iniu kamlo chiujiu chamtan pimibo hina panainiu kamlubui-e;
siniu I bambo Mathenky, Ladrian Bung nai pagom, Mathenkiga karukhaibo hina,
wakai nai sibo maniadung, masanbo kachiagu chamibung khaibam nai sibo maniadung, parim wibo maruta rurabo rathakbam,
maring rukhaibo rathakbam nai sibo maniadung, tathikuang nai padung,
Aaron nai panahmainiu piurabo singkugu nkiubo chapuan-tania hina,
manuk khaijiu taikhai rabo wasa, Masanbo Bam leng parim wibo maruta hina, Iniu nakhuga chamtan pikhai mibo kumgapjiu panainiu kamrabo-e.”
Israel mai khuga dinkhaira din-e, “Agu mathakbo tingmik, Tabamnai hai majai rabo-e, palamra wangkinbo chaken hinaga, I hai
Naliuniu mathakbo tingmik hai majaisiak rabo-e, palamra haise masanbo-e. Mai khatniu haisitu majai makjiu, tatien thiusai, patu kamshatmi rabo-e.
Naliuniu naliu tien thiura jeng charuk bamme, chiudi chinniabo tingmik haise aleng kadpadbo tingmik thiurabo-e. Mai khatniu sibo tingmikga tatien thiusai patu kamshat mirabo-e.
Israel maidungniu haibo tingmikse ladriat gu madan thiujiu majai rabo-e.
Haise Israel mai nai akakga tingthenggu madan thiurabo-e, palamra
Sinai Luong gasu Tingwang niu Mose tu npaolubo saiga, Tingwang papum siakniu chamtan raokhaibo tatupek niase, paniu pakhuga pikhai bide.
Aaron niu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu nao-nahdungniu malan bambo kachia-landungse lupad lujiu akhuga khoiwanglo.”
Siga mai hinaniu paliugu kachia-landungse lupad lujiu pakhuga wang pikhaide.
Paniu chalandungse khoilujiu, langpad lujiu kachia tomchi khat meng kampad khai bide.
Maidung siniu din-e, “Israel mai yo, haise Egypt dih gasu aliutu maluang padbo aliu ra si-e!”
Sichiujiu matomchi meng suangga rathakbam khat thiukhai lujiu, haichiu pisikhai sude, “Nsuannai
Pasaibonai nsuan kalu, paliuniu maring rukhaira khatdi akadbo rathak thiu khaira, wakhaodung juwang karen sude. Maidung siniu maluadse tiura wangjiu, jaw sak maniu lujiu npui-npiu thiu sude.

Paliuniu majaira Iniu pikhaibo chamtanse paliu phutmide; sichiujiu paliuniu kachia tomchi meng khat kamlujiu, sisetu kahumjiu siga charathiu bamde, Sibo ra siniu paliutu Egypt dih gasu maluang padbo-e chiujiu paliu din bamme.
Paliu hai dejiukha paliu lung tanlo chiubo I si-e.
Tuhoira atu khamra kamtalo. Paliutu alung pommide, sichiujiu Iniu paliutu kam maha mine. Sibosai Iniu natu khatdi nakai-kiktu kadibo jat pithiu khai bine.”

Dekamjiu nangniu Egypt dih gasu namaidungtu puipad lujiu paliutu maluang gasu kamshatjiu kam mahakam mibo-e chiujiu pi Egypt maitu dinkhai ralo? Nalung pomkhai talo, nalung likhaijiu namaidung riga kasabo phungwang khai mane.

Navangmai, Abraham, Isaac khatdi Jacob paliutu maningtao khailo. Nangniu paliu khuga ladriat thiuting khaijiu paliu kaikikdung tingpukga chagandung jiukha pikhaine khatdi kadih pakhiangna hai tingthengjiu paliugu thiune chiubose maningtao khailo.”
Sijengniu
Jai nialam ladriat raokhaibo tatupek niase ponlujiu maluang gasu Mose nkum sude.
Tingwang papum siakniu ladriatse tatupek gase raokhaibo-e.
Maidungniu marajiu senbambo khuanse Joshua niu chiulujiu Mose khuga din-e, “Rijiky gase chari thiubo khuan kumbo I chiu-e.”
Mose niu din-e, “Sibo khuanse chari ngambo khuandi makge, maksai ngam makjiu kapbo khuandi makge; haise chalui thiubo khuan-e.”
Mose niu rijiky gase wang matomchi mengse ngaoboga, palung pomchang-pom sude. Paniu ponkinbo tatupekse maluang phiga paniu taliangkiu npuakpang mide.
Matomchi mengse paniu khoilujiu pamud thaonoi-noi lujiu khatdi langlujiu taduiga kariu-aja khailujiu Israel maitu pisak khai sude.
Paniu Aaron khuga din-e, “Maidungniu nakhuga degu kamjiu, nangniu paliutu haijiukha kasabo nuanse pi kamkhai jiulo?”
Aaron niu paokakge, “Atu nalung pommane, haimaidung siniu dejiukha kasa kamnilo chiubo nang sibamme.
Paliuniu akhuga din-e ‘Aliutu Egypt dih gasu maluang padbopiu, Mose khuga degu padmi gulo chiubo aliu sitangta mide, siniu aliutu majang khaira chara khat aliuleng damkhailo.’
Sichiujiu paliu khuga kachia tiu-taa bambose akhuga khoiwanglo chiu Iniu dinboga, paliuniu akhuga khoiwang-e. Iniu sibo tiu-taadungse khoilu chamijiuga thonkhaiboga haibo tomchi mengse padmibo-e!”
Maidung situ Aaron niu thinman ngamlak mibo khatdi paliugu mikremai suanga kapangbo ngam kammibose Mose niu ngaolude.
Sijengniu rijiky rengmun-ga paniu chaplujiu sensude, “
siga paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Israel mai Rawang,
Levi maidungniu palad piujiu, sibonai chamai sang sum kumbotu kamshat mide.
Mose niu Levi mai khuga din-e, “Thainai naliuniu
Pasaibonai Mose niu maidung khuga din-e, “Naliuniu kapingbo nuan kam mide. Chiudi tuhoi Iniu maluangga
Sichiu Mose niu
Lungsajiu paliu nuan kuak khailo, chiudi nangniu kuak khai lakge chiusai, nangniu namaidung zan raokhai bambo ariakkhuang gasu azanse nunthon milo.”

Tuhoira tadlujiu Iniu nakhuga dinkhai mibo bamgase maidung haitu puilu tadsulo. Agu maza siniu natu maluang khaine chiubose maningtao bamlo, chiudi paliu nuan jengniu, Iniu paliutu sajai pirabo tingse wangkinne.”
Sichiujiu
Naliutu majang khaira Iniu agu mazatu langkhaine, khatdi Iniu Canaan mai, Amor mai, Hitt mai, Periz mai, Hiv mai khatdi Jebus maitu hathon khai bine.
Naliuniu kadih kawibo patam bambo lam tadrabo-e. Chiudi I apumsiakniu naliutu maluang tad lakge, palamra naliu hai naliu lung tanbo mai-e, siniu Iniu naliutu npuikiga kam mahami sune.”
Maidungniu haise chiuluboga, paliu lung chariujiu tatiu-tatah khaita mide.
Paliu khuga dinra
Sijengniu Sinai Luong phutlubo sai, Israel mainiu tatiu-tataa khaita mide.
Israel mainiu mathenky len machang Mose niu masanbo Mathenky se rijiky gasu diubi jat-jatjiu kamkhai khai-e. Haisitu
Mose niu siga tad machang, maidungniu paliugu mathenky kamun-ga chaplujiu, Mose niu palungga ngut makthen phui bambo-e.
Mose niu ngutmiboga, kamuang tiangse kiujiu, Mathenky kamun gase bamjiu,
Mathenky kamun gase kamuang tiangse maidungniu ngaogap sai kinkiu kahumme.
niu Mose tu mai khatniu pakamaitu npaobo kumjiu zudaojiu npao-e. Sichiujiu Mose niu paliu rijiky gase malanwang mide. Chiudi patu nkhabo akhangmaina, Nun nahpiu Joshua sira Mathenkiga bam mibo-e.
Mose niu
Sichiusai tuhoira, nangniu karangbose akhuga dinkhailo sichiusai Iniu natu machajiu achun kimjiu bamrabo-e. Haibo jattu nangniu nagu thiura kadakhai mide chiubodi maningtao khailo.”
Mose niu paokakge, “Nangniu aliutu majangtad lakge chiusai, aliutu haibo bam piphut khai mane.

Nangniu aliutu majangtad khai maksai, dechiujiu nangniu akhuga khatdi namaidung khuga nalung kim bamme chiubo maidungniu silu ralo? Nangniu aliutu maluang bambo siniu, kadihpiriga lungbammai kakimai khugasu aliutu sitamsin lubui-e.”
Siga Mose niu kheng-e, “Lungsajiu, nangniu bambo nagu ran-ranbo nbiuse atu lenkhailo.”
Iniu natu azu lenlakge, palamra mai khatniu azu ngaolujiu ringbam silakge,
chiudi haiga pabam khat, amungga tatukang rigase nang chapraleng bamme.
Iniu agu kendibo ran-ranbo nbiuse tadwangboga, Iniu naleng lekhai nbambo tukang gase khai lujiu, Iniu tadwang loimakthen natu abenniu kabakhai bine.
Sichiu Iniu aben khoipad misai, nangniu azulam ngaomakjiu, aduklam ngao sune.”
Nsuannai nsuan kaden lujiu Sinai Luongga atu adaora khanglo.
Mai khatdi nasai suikhangbo suimakge, mai khatdi sibo maluanggen jam khatnadi ngaobo suimakge, khatdi sibo maluang phiga mily maksai khaorui khatniudi piubuan tagibo suimakge.”
niu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, Mose niu tatupek nia ruilujiu pasaibonai nsuan kalu sise ponlujiu Sinai Luonglam khang mide.
niu pamasuangga chaplujiu haichiu dinsude, “
Agu ladriattu Iniu chaken sang-sang majai khaijiu, kasabo nai nuantu kuak khaibo piu-e; chiudi nuan tenbo puipiu jengniu chaken pasumbo khatdi pamadaibo katang paliu tah-nahtu sajai pikhai rabo-e.”
Mose niu kalangjiu kadihga makhumkiu kahumde,
Paniu din-e, “
Iniu thainai naliu khuga pikhaibo tacheng-tajaidungse majai lulo. Iniu Amor maitu, Canaan maitu, Hitt maitu, Periz maitu, Hiv maitu khatdi Jebus maitu naliu tadngutboga hathon khai bine.
Naliuniu tadngut rabo kadihga lungmaidungtu khat thiura kammane, palamra siseniu naliu shairabo thak thiulu bui-e.
Sibosung, paliugu rathakbamse rathon milo, paliugu masanbo tusomdi kam maha milo, khatdi paliu rapui Asherah mengtu kam maha milo.
“Kakibo ratu kahum mane, palamra
Sibo dihga lungmai situ khat thiura kam mane, palamra paliuniu paliu ratu kahumjiu, charathiubo gase naliutu kukhaisai paliu radung khuga kadkhaibo katiu-kasakse tiura naliutu hiam sune.
Naliu nahmai siniu sibo sangdiumai puidungtu maluang lungjiu, paliu radungtu kahumboga jukhaijiu atu malumsui makboga jukhai sune.
Chiudi piangrai thubo qonniam sira sibo sung milypoi kadkhaijiu naliuniu liulan rabo-e. Naliuniu liulan maksai pawongcheng kamtang milo. Npiumai nah narai hina tudi liulan rabo-e.
“Mai khatniudi wa kadkhaira jaomakjiu akhuga wangbo suimakge.
“Takum khat lungga, Israel mai Rawang,
Iniu naliu masuangga jatdungtu hathon padmibo saiga, khatdi naliu kadihse pidikhai bidasai, mai khat tudi pijiu changee lonsum lungga hai naliutu ngambo suimakge.
“Milypoitu maksai kamipoitu papui nduiga langmane.
Mose niu siga
Aaron khatdi mai hinaniu Mose tu phui sude, sichiujiu pazu bensat bambose ngaolujiu paliu ping mide.
Chiudi Mose niu Aaron tu khatdi Israel maigu jupao mathiutu kujiu, paliu mathiu patu npao sude.
Sibosai Israel mai hina pakhuga wangboga,
Mose niu paliutu npaolubo sai, paniu pazuse takum mide.
niu bambo Mathenky gase Mose niu tadbo wan machang pazuse lepadle. Sichiujiu paniu npad lanboga, pakhuga chamtan pikhaibo hinase, paniu Israel mai khuga dinkhaibi-e.
Sichiujiu pazu benbo biuse paliuniu ngao-ngao-e. Sichiujiu paniu pasaibo nai
Mose niu Israel mai hinatu kumadui lujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Haichiujiu
Naliuniu naliu tien thiura jeng charuk bamme, chiudi pachinniabo naisira,
Tabamnaise naliu kygadi chami thiu mane.”
Mose niu Israel mai mathiu khuga din-e, “
khuga wa kadkhailo. Mai hinaniu kachia, rangkang maksai tanaagi;
fainoi kawibo, majaibo, hengtarikbo khatdi kahengbo wakhaogiu fai, kamigiuniu dakbo fai;
kamichi giuniu padui sumlubo fai, chamigi kawibo, singbom-sing;
chamibung leng wasadui, manuk khaira wasa khatdi parim wibo maruta;
tabaipum khatdi singku diboniu piurabo tatiu-tatah kumbo pachun-chunbo saisuijiu kadkhaira phungwangbo sui-e.
“Naliu ruanggasu wakam sibo mai hina wanglujiu,
Mathenky, sibo gom khatdi pagomtu malui khaibo pakan nai patang;
Ladrian Bung, patiang, pagom khatdi sisetu gomkhaira jusungfai;
wakai nai patiang, siga ngutrabo mania hina, khatdi Tingwang khuga kadkhairabo taruak;
chamibung khaibam khatdi siga ngutrabo maniadung, chamibung nai padui;
parim wibo maruta rukhaira nai patiang, manuk khaira wasa, Mathenky kamun gombo jusungfai;
wa kadkhairabo rathakbam nai sibo tiangga jaobo tataagi khatdi siga ngutrabo maniadung, wakhiurabo chakuang khatdi padung;
ngutrabogu jusungfai, patiang nai padung, kalungga ngutrabo kamun-ga khaibo jusungfai;
pamathuk-kan nai Mathenky leng chariang khatdi siga ngutrabo maniadung;
Masanbo bamga paliu ngutbo tingga khairabo fainidung khatdi Aaron nai panahmainiu piurabo masanbo fainidungse kamrabo-e.
Israel mai hina tadmide,
sichiujiu
Maipuidi, maipiudi paniu machun chunbo saisuijiu karukhaira npin, chalan, njung-khap, tatiu-tataa khatdi kachiagu mania jat hina
Fainoi kawibo, hengtarikbo maksai chakhaogiu fai kahengbo, kamigiu fai, kamichi giuduiniu sumlubo fai, maksai chakhaogiu fai kawibo hina phungwang-e.
Rangkang nai tataagi kabammai hinadi
Pabensiam kawibo puidung niudi chalang kawibo, majaibo, hengtarikbo khatdi hengmarenbo paliuniu kamlubo hina phungwang-e.
Paliuniu kamigiu langdi kamwang-e.
Jupaodung siniu tabaipum khatdi singku fai-niga khaira khatdi gatop leng waniadung,
khatdi parim wibo wamud nai chamibung leng wasadui, manuk khaira wasa khatdi parim wibo wasadung phung wang-e.
Mose khuga chamtan pikhaibo hina Israel mai hinaniu
Mose niu Israel mai khuga din-e, “
Tingwang niu patu pagu pumtan
sichiujiu paniu kachia, rangkang khatdi tanaagi gasu wathak kamra,
paniu tatiu-tatah kamra, tasing bungra khatdi bensiam hina kamrabo-e.
niu paleng, Dan kiphiu gasu, Ahisamach nahpiu Oholiab tu pikhaijiu paniu kakimaitu katikhai rabo-e.

Paniu paliutu wa bungra, pagiak raokhaira khatdi chafai kawibo dakra; majaibo, hengtarikbo khatdi heng marenbo khatdi katam-tambo fai dakraleng ningting pikhai mibo-e. Paliuniu wahina khatdi pagiak kawi-wibo hina raokhaira kamlubui-e.
Bezalel, Oholiab khatdi
Mose niu Bezalel, Oholiab khatdi
Masanbo Mathenky thiura Israel mainiu kadwangbo mania hinase paliuniu pakhu gasu daolude. Chiudi Israel mainiu nsuan machang paliugu maniakaddungse phungwang saomakge.
Sichiujiu wakam kasimaidung siniu Mose khuga tadle khatdi,
sise paokhai-e, “
Sijengniu rijiky tadronjiu Mose niu Masanbo Mathenky jengniu wa pisanta mira chamtan khailan sude; sigasu maidungniu wa phungwangta mide.
Phungwang khai mibo siniu changamse mali-malanjiu loikhai mide.
Chafai-tap hinase pathen padet machamme, pathenniu chakhet charuk-e, padetniu chakhet nia-e.
Paliuniu pathom khatga failep mangiu-ngiu charui aruang khai-e.
Paliuniu pathom hinagu pataigase majaibo fainiu pari kamkhai-e.
Paliuniu karaibo thomgu raithubo failep gase pari ringiu kamkhai-e.
Paliuniu pathom nia situ pijiu aruang khaira, kachianiu pari ringiu kamkhai-e.
Paliuniu Mathenky topse, kami giuniu daklubo failep kariu-je-khatkiuniu kamme.
Paliugu pathen padetse machamme, pathenniu chakhet kariu sumkiu, padetniu chakhet nia-e.
Paliuniu thom khatga failep charuk, khatdi khatganiu failep mangiu chiujiu charui khai-e.
Paliuniu kanabo thomgu kanambo failep gase pari ringiu, khatdi khatbo thomgu failep gadi pari ringiu kamkhai-e.
Paliuniu pathom nia situ pi-aruang khaira patopse tataaginiu pariu ringiu kamkhai-e.
Paliuniu patop nia kamkhai lanjiu, khatniu kamichi giuniu sumlubo kahengbo, khatniu chamigi kawiboniu lenlam topleng kamkhai-e.
Paliuniu Mathenky kamun pise singbom singniu kamkhai-e.
Pakan hinase chakhet madai ku-e khatdi ncheng riak charuk-je-charuk di-e, sichiujiu machambo kenia padle, sisera pakanse khai-aruang lura leng-e.
Pakan hinase pake pad kamme.
Paliuniu tingrun lamleng pakan makai kamkhai-e,
khatdi pahang lamse rangkang giniu parun hamleng atai kamkhaijiu pake nia situ dungmanra parunham nia-nia kamkhai-e.
Paliuniu Mathenky gu tingpi lamse pakan makai kamkhai-e,
khatdi pakan hina leng parunham nia-nia kamjiu rangkang giniu parunham atai kamkhai-e.
Mathenky kasailam tingnulamse paliuniu pakan charuk kamkhai-e,
sichiujiu pakamik leng pakan nia kamkhai-e.
Pakamik kandungse parun gasu mathuk khaijiu paton tangbo mathuk khai-e. Pakamik niase khatdi pakan niase haichiu kamkhai-e.
Sichiujiu pakan tachat nai rangkang giniu kambo parunham kariu-je-charukkiuse kan khat khat hangga nia-nia bamme.
Paliuniu Mathenky rigase singbom singkan kariu-je-mangiukiuniu kam tachai khai-e, kan mangiuniu Mathenky jai khatlam,
kan mangiuniu pajai khatlam khatdi kan mangiuniu kasaigu tingrunlam chiujiu kamkhai-e.
N-gangga tachai khaibo kan siniu Mathenky paton khatlamsu pajai khatlam tangbo padle.
Sibo kan situ kachianiu makom khai-e. Sichiujiu tachai khaibo situ thinmanra kachia khapdi kamkhai-e, sise kachianiu makom khai-e.
Paliuniu majaibo, hengtarikbo khatdi hengmarenbo chakhaogiuniu daklubo fainoi khatdi siga pakan phungbo wameng raokhaibo khoilu jusungfai kamkhai-e.
Sibo jusungfaise khinkhaira singbom singniu patiang madai kamkhai lujiu kachianiu paniuki kamkhai-e. Sichiujiu patiangse dungra rangkang giniu parunham kamkhai-e.
Mathenky kamun gadi paliuniu majaibo, hengtarikbo khatdi hengmarenbo fainoi wameng kamkhaijiu tathuak khaibo fai khoilu jusungfai kamkhai-e.
Haibo jusungfai leng paliuniu paniuki jaobo katiang mangiu kamkhailu, paliu rigase kachia-tang kamkhai-e khatdi patiangse dungra tataaginiu parunham mangiu kamkhai-e.
Bezalel niu Ladriat Bungse singbom singniu ncheng 45 thengbo, ncheng 27 dibo khatdi ncheng 27 kubo khoilu kamkhaide.
Paniu palungse kachia masanboniu khatdi pamung kamagui pakhiangnase kachianiu kamkhai-e.
Sise ponraleng paniu kachia-khap madai khatdi paphi madai, khatlam nia-nia chiujiu kamkhai-e.
Pontad raleng paniu singbom singniu kamlu, sise kachianiu makom khai-e,
khatdi sibo Bung ke machang pakhap kamkhai-e.
Paniu kachia kamasanbo ncheng 45 thengbo khatdi ncheng 27 dibo khuang khoilu pagom kamkhai-e.
Paniu kachia-ba khoilujiu pakan phungbo wakhao meng nia kamkhai-e,
pagom ton-ga wakhao khat-khat kamkhai-e. Paniu paliu situ pagom panai khatnakha thiura kamkhai-e.
Pakan phungbo wakhaose pagom riga khat-khat khulam ntao zudao lujiu, pakan siniu pakhiangnatu gomnam khai-e.
Paniu singbom sing ncheng 36 thengbo, ncheng 18 dibo khatdi ncheng 27 kubo khoilujiu wakaise kamkhaide.
Paniu sise kachia kamasanbo khoilujiu gomkhai-e khatdi pamungse kachianiu raomagui khai-e.
Paniu ncheng 3 dibo khoilujiu pakan kamkhai-e khatdi pakan kamagui gase kachiadui rimkhai-e.
Sise ponraleng paniu paphi bambo pake madai gase kachia niu pakhap madai kamkhai-e.
Wakaise ponraleng pakan munggase patiangtu thinmanra pakhap kamkhai-e.
Paniu singbom sing khoilujiu patiangse kamkhai-e khatdi sise kachianiu makom khai-e.
Wakuangkai lengse paniu kachia kamasanbo khoilujiu, chakuang, chapiang, taduidung-piang khatdi jaw kadkhaira chakuangdungse kamkhai-e.

Chamibung khaibamse paniu kachia kamasanbo khoilujiu kamkhai-e. Paniu padung nai pagomse kachia-ba khoilu kamkhai-e; haisitu karukhaira chiujiu papen, pamum khatdi patangse khatnakha thiura kamkhai-e.
Haise pake charuk padle, khatlam sum, khatlam sum padle.
Pake charuk machang majongsy niu pamum nai paku jaojiu penbambo kum karukhaibo papen sum-sum bamme.
Chamibung khaibam gom gase majongsy niu pamum nai patang jaojiu penbambo kum karukhaibo papen madai bamme.
Pake charuk hang hinaga pamum khat-khat bamme.
Pamum, pake, khatdi chamibung khaibamse kachia-ba pek khatle.
Chamibung khaibamse paniu chamibung chinnia kamkhai-e, khatdi pariang nai pakuang lengse kachia kamasanbo khoilu kamkhai-e.
Paniu kachia kamasanbo taju 35 khoilujiu chamibung khaibam nai pamaniase kamkhai-e.
Parim wibo rukhaira paniu singbom sing khoilu rathakbam khat kamkhai-e. Haise pake madai thiubo-e, ncheng 18 theng-e, ncheng 18 di-e, khatdi ncheng 36 ku-e. Pake madaiga kariopadbose pek khat thiu-e.
Sibo riga, pake madai gadi, pamun kariopadbo gadi paniu kachia kamasanbo khoilujiu kamkhai-e, khatdi pamung kamagui sidi kachiaduiniu rimkhai-e.
Haisitu ponmanra jainia lamse paniu kachia khap kamkhai lujiu patiangdi kamkhai-e.
Singbom sing khoilujiu paniu patiangse kamkhai-e, khatdi kachianiu makom khai-e.
Rukhaibo rathakbam leng paniu singbom sing thinlujiu kamkhai-e. Haise pake madai-e, pathen siniu tachao mangiu, padet siniu tachao mangiu, khatdi pakod siniu tachao sum-e.
Pake madai magase kariopadbo patang leng paniu kamkhai-e, siseniu rathakbam situ khat thiujiu ngaokhai-e. Pakhiangna situ paniu tanaagi khoilu makom khai-e.
Paniu rathakbamgu mania hina: chali, karathuak, chakuang, chagi-takap, khatdi khanglise kamkhai-e. Mania hinase tataagi khoilu kamme.
Paniu tataagi rendi rathakbam kan hanggase khai-e, sichiujiu sise rathakbam paphan tangbo padle.
Paniu pake madai gase ponraleng pakhap madai kamkhai-e.
Ponrabo katiangse paniu singbom sing khoilu kamme, khatdi sisetu tataaginiu makom khai-e;
sichiulujiu rathakbam ke hinaga pakhapse kamkhai-e. Rathakbamse kapiupekniu kamjiu paki kamput khai-e.
sise tanaagi tiang makaigu tanaagi-ham makainiu rangkanggi tang nai takap siniu tungman khai-e.
Tingpi lamdi sise panai machamme.
Tingnu lamra jusungfaise chakhet kariu-je-khatkiu theng-e, sise katiang kariu nai padung kariu chiujiu rangkanggi tang nai takapniu tungman khai-e.
Kamun bambo tingbang lamsidi chakhet kariu-je-khatkiu di-e.
Kamun hinagase chakhet sum thengbo situ katiang sum nai padung sum kamkhai-e.
Pamung kamagui hina fainoi kawibo khoilujiu jusungfai kamkhai-e.
Katiang khaibamse tataaginiu kamme, khatdi takap, patang khatdi katiang makom khaibo sira rangkanggi khoilu kamme. Katiang hina kamaguibose rangkangginiu pi mathuk khai-e.

Kalunglam ngutrabo kamun-ga khaibo jusungfaise majaibo, hengtarikbo khatdi hengmarenbo wameng charuikhaibo fainoi kawiniu kamkhai-e. Haise chakhet madai-paphan theng-e, khatdi chakhet khat ku-e, haise palungga khai nbambo jusungfai panai machamme.
Haisitu tataagi khaibam madaiga bambo katiang madai siniu tungman bamme. Sibogu takap, pamaga makom khaibo khatdi patangse rangkang giniu kamme.
Mathenky mania hinase khatdi pamung kamagui hinase tataaginiu kamme.
Ladriat Kariu raokhai lujiu khai nbambo tatupek nia bambo,
Patu nkha khaibo, Dan kiphiu gasu Ahisamach nahpiu Oholiab niu tatuse bung-e, wamengdi raokhai-e khatdi majaibo hengtarikbo khatdi hengmarenbo faidi dakge.
Masanbo Mathenkyse thiura maidungniu
Maidung riak chakbo saisuijiu rangkang siniu mathiuniu tadbambo taju 3,430 padle.
Haise chamairiak chakbo saisuijiu raokhaibo gasu wangbo mathiuniu tadbambo taju gasu madiubo-e. Haise takum makai tangmibo maksai sisuang tingmibo gasu chamairiak chakbo gase chamai 603,550 gu-e.
Siga rangkang taju 3,400 siniu Masanbo Mathenky rundung leng nai jusungfai leng, khatdi taju 34 siniu paliu rundung khat khat kamra leng-e.
Kamalibo rangkanggi taju samriuse khoilujiu. Bezalel niu patang, katianggu takap khatdi pamaga patop kamkhai-e.
leng kadkhaibo tanaagi siniu taju 2,425 padle.
Haise khoilujiu paniu
Mathenkiga ngutbo mania hina khatdi sibo mungga kamaguibo hinase paniu kamkhai-e.
Masanbo Bam gase singkudungniu machara ngutbo tingga piurabo fai-nidungse paliuniu majaibo, hengtarikbo khatdi hengmarenbo lang khoilu dakkhai-e.
Paliuniu majaibo, hengtarikbo khatdi hengmarenbo kachia langse khoilujiu fainoigu ntiang-taronbose kamkhai-e.
Paliuniu kachia-pek situ kadi-apiu lujiu sigasu majaibo, hengtarikbo khatdi heng marenbo fainoise kampadbo-e.
Paliuniu ntiang-taronbo gase pamakhuak gasu majukiubo failep niadi kamkhai-e, sise khinkhaibo sui-e.
niu Mose khuga chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, paliuniu sibo-gi panai machambo gasu khen-gakdi kamkhai-e.
Paliuniu tabaipumdi kadenkhai-e, sichiujiu siga kachiadi dakkhai nbamme, sise paliuniu Jacob nahmai khang kariu-je-niakiu zanse raokhai bamme.
niu Mose khuga chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu paliuniu sise pamakhuakga khaibo failep gase Israel mai kiphiu kariu-je-niakiu situ maningtaora kamkhai-e.
Paliuniu gakhek faise ntiang-taronbo fai-gi nai wameng raokhaibo kumjiu kamkhai-e.
Haise pake madai thiujiu kadip lonnia khai-e, sise ncheng 9 theng-e, khatdi ncheng 9 di-e.
Paliuniu sibo riga paman kungbo tuniu ren madai thiujiu kamkhai-e; raibo ren gase heng marenbo tu, majinbo tu khatdi hengria-riabo tu kam khai-e;
niabo ren gase kamaobotu, majaibotu, khatdi kapuangbotu chiujiu khai-e,
sumbo ren gase kapubotu, ababotu khatdi katikbotu chiujiu khai-e;
madaibo ren gase ngaotarontu, tabaipum khatdi talatu chiujiu khai-e. Haise kachianiu khinman khai-e.
Tatu kariu-je-niakiu rigase Israel mai kiphiu kariu-je-niakiu situ maningtaora Jacob nahdung zanse raokhai-e.
Sibo gakhek fai gase paliuniu kachia masanbo riang kamkhai-e, sise chalangpui kumjiu kabet khai-e.
Paliuniu kachia ren nia khatdi kachia khap nia kamkhai lujiu pakhap niase thinlujiu gakhek ton gase mathuk khai-e.
Paliuniu sibo kachia-langpui kaniase pakhap kania gase khin aruang khai-e,
chalangpui kania ton nai paren nia tonse, ntiang-taronbo makhuakke masuangga khin aruang khai-e.
Paliuniu kachia khap nia kamlujiu gakhek fairi n-hanglamse, ntiang-taronbogu patai gase khinkhai-e.
Paliuniu kachia khap nia kamlan lujiu ntiang-taronbo makhuakke jainia lamgu suanglam pacharui mungga, kawibo khen-gak rigase khin khai-e.
niu Mose khuga chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, gakhek fai khap nai ntiang-taronbo khapse majaibo langniu khin aruang khai-e, sichiujiu gakhek faise khen-gak riga bamjiu nkhipad makge.
Ntiang-taronbo riga khailanbo faise majaibo chakhaogiu fai khoilu kamme.
Sise kekmi makra pacharui riangse dak taman khai-e.
niu Mose khuga chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, paliuniu pakhen nhanglamse majongsy mengse majaibo, hengtarikbo khatdi hengmarenbo fainoiniu daklujiu kachia masanbo nsiuna khin khai-e.
Paliuniu Aaron nai panahmai ntiang kamkhai-e,
chapi kabetfai, pirun, fainoiniu dakbo tani-kadunbo,
khatdi
Kamasanbo kachia khuang khoilujiu paliuniu papek gase, “
niu Mose khuga chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, paliuniu sise chalangriang majaibo khoilujiu pasuanglamse khin khai-e.
Tuhoira
Paliuniu Mathenky khatdi siga ngutrabo mania hina, takap, pakan, tachai khaibo kan, patiang, sibo khaibam,
kamichi giuniu daklujiu sumlubo fai kahengbo, chamigi kawibo top, jusungfai;
Ladriat Bung, tatupek jaobo, patiang nai pagom,
wakai nai siga ngutbo maniadung, khatdi Tingwang khuga kadkhaibo taruak;
kachia masanboniu kambo chamibung leng wasadui;
kachianiu kambo rathakbam, manukra wasa, parim wibo wamud, Mathenky kamun-ga lenkhaibo jusungfai;
tanaaginiu kambo rathakbam, sibo tiang, siga ngutbo maniadung, tathikuang nai padung;
jusungfaiga, katiangga khatdi padungga ngut rabo maniadung, Mathenkytu jumanbo ntuang, sichiujiu Mathenkiga ngutrabo maniadung;
Masanbo Bamga ngutbo tingga singku Aaron nai panahmainiu piurabo kawibo fainidung hinase phungwangde.
niu Mose khuga chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu Israel mainiu wahina kamkhaide.
Mose niu
“Raithubo hiugu raithubo naise
Ladriat Kariu jaobo Ladrian Bungse sibo Mathenky lungga khailujiu jusungfaise lenkhailo.
Wakai sidi khoingut lujiu, siga ngutrabo mania hinadi siga khairabo-e. Chamibung khaibam sidi khoingut lujiu chamibungse sibo riga khailo.
Ladrian Bung masuang gase kachiagu rathakbamse khoilujiu parim wibose matao khailo khatdi jusungfaise kamun-ga lenkhailo.
Mathenky kamagase rukhaibo rathakbamse kamkhailo.
Mathenky nai rathakbam kakgase tadui masun lujiu tathikuangse dungkhailo.
Sichiujiu sibo mung kamaguise khatdi kamun gase jusungfai lenkhailo.
“Sichiujiu Mathenkyse khatdi siga ngutbo mania hinase masanbo wasa manuk khailujiu kadkhailo, sichiusai haise masan mirabo-e.
Sibosai, rathakbam nai siga ngutbo mania hinase wasa manuk khailujiu kadkhailo, sichiusai haise masansiak mirabo-e.
Sichiujiu tathikuang nai sibo khaibam sidi sikumjiu kadkhailo.
“Aaron nai panahmaitu Mathenky kamun gase puiwang lujiu tachenggu nkhiuse pijiu nkhiu milo.
Sichiujiu Aaron riga wasase manuk khai lujiu, singku fai-nise piukhai lujiu agu singku tien thiura patu kadkhailo.
Panahmaitu puiwang lujiu paliu ntiang khaibilo.

Sichiujiu naliuniu paliu piutu wasa manuk khaibo kumjiu paliu tudi wasa manuk khailo, sichiujiu paliuniu agu singku tiense kamrabo-e. Sichiu wasa manuk khaibo siniu tingtheng paliu agu singku tien thiulu bui-e.”
Sijengniu paliuniu Egypt dih phutlubo sai, niabo kumgu raithubo hiugu, raithubo naise
Mose niu pakan nai tachai khaibo kanse khoilujiu padung gase patiangse somsude.
niu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu paniu patopse Mathenky riga thaptom khai-e.
Sichiujiu paniu tatupek niase khoilujiu Ladrian Bung lung gase khaimide. Paniu katiangse Wabunggu pakhap gase khailujiu pagomse gommide.
Sigasu paniu Mathenky lung gase wabungse khailujiu jusungfaise lenkhai mide. Haichiujiu
Paniu Mathenky lungga wakaise tingpilam, jusungfai lenlam dungkhai-e,
khatdi
Paniu Mathenky lungga, tingrun lam wakai khaimakbo jailamse chamibung khaibamse kamkhai-e.
Sichiujiu
Mathenky lungga jusungfai suanggase paniu kachiagu rathakbamse kamkhai-e,
khatdi
Mathenky kamun gase paniu jusungfaise lenkhai-e,
sichiujiu jusungfai masuang gase rukhaibo rathakbamse kamkhai-e. Sibo rigase
Paniu Mathenky nai rathakbam kak gase tadui masunkhai lujiu tathikuangse dungkhai-e.
niu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, Mose, Aaron khatdi panahmainiu Mathenky lunglam maksai rathakbamga tad machang paliu phi-ben siga nkhiu-khiu-e.
Mose niu Mathenky mung gase khatdi rathakbam mung gase rengmagui lujiu, jusungfaise kamun-ga lenkhai-e. Sichiujiu paniu changam hina kamloi khaide.
Haijengniu Mathenky lung gase Mose ngutsilak mide.
Mathenky gasu kamuangse kentami sai, Israel mai paliugu rijikyse pabam katamlam kalikhai-e.
Siga kamuangse kenbamthen paliugu rijikyse kali makge.
Sichiujiu paliuniu tadbam thenna Mathenky rigase n-nien sai
Israel mainiu rathak mania kadkhaiboga majaira pikhai-e.

Mai khatniu khaoring kadpadbo rathak kambo wan-ga pagu khaoring ruangga kami maksai mily maksai matom kabuidi sui-e. Rukhaijiu kadpadra paniu pagu matom khat kadpadsai, paniu wadi pajam-para habo kadpad rabo-e.
Chakhao piga papao siniu paben kabakhai rabo-e, sichiusai pagu nuan luthonra charathiubo guse lukhai rabo-e.
Paniu siga matomchise gikhai rabo-e, khatdi Aaron kirianggu singku siniu
Sigasu paniu chakhao gise gaopad lujiu pajanse dimrabo-e,
sigasu singku siniu chamise rathakbamga thiura kaden lujiu chami matao khairabo-e.
Chami dimpadbo pakangdungse paliuniu chami riga khairabo-e, papeedi, pasadi jaojiu khairabo-e.
Kadkhaibo mai siniu palungjan nai pasailam phi nkhiu rabo-e, khatdi changam kambambo singku siniu rathak bamga rathak mania pakhiangnase rukhai rabo-e. Haibo tatek kadkhaibo rimse
Mai khatniu pagu mily maksai kami khat kadkhai sai, sise pajam-para habo pachi khat rabo-e,
Paniu sise rathakbamgu tingpilam gikhai rabo-e, khatdi singku siniu sibo zaise rathakbam pake madai gase kajinkhai rabo-e.
Paniu sise dimlubo saiga, changam kambo singku siniu papum pakhiangna, papee khatdi pasa jaojiu chamiga khairabo-e.
Paniu palungjan khatdi pasai ngense khiurabo-e, singku siniu sise
Mai khatniu nthingna khat rukhaibo rathak leng pipadsai, sise makhao maksai kaphina rabo-e.
Sise singkuniu rathakbamga pikhai rabo-e, pawongse romtap lujiu papeese rathakbamga rukhai rabo-e. Sibo zaise rathakbam mung kamaguiboga majaokhai rabo-e.
Paniu masiak khaibo papumse khoilujiu tabui ponkhaibo bam rathakbam gu tingbang lamse taliang khai mirabo-e.
Paniu pakan thinman lujiu chiudi pakan siakpad mimakjiu papum phetpang padrabo-e, pagiu pakhiangna rathakbamga rukhai rabo-e. Haichiu kadpadbo tiutek rimse
Mai khatniu
Sise Aaron kiriangmai singku khuga phungwang rabo-e, changam kambambo singku siniu takhui kani khat nai wasa khatdi parim wibo mania hina khoilujiu
Masiak bambo alin-tara kadkhaibose singkugu thiurabo-e;
Kadkhaibo taruakse n-mang gasu khuakbo gusai sise chakhi khaimakjiu kamrabo-e. Sise takysa jaojiu takhuimoi tabotlujiu kamlubo kasiubo taruak maksai takysa manuk khaibo taruak manuanbodi sui-e.
Chagikuang ga thalubo taruakpek kadkhai sai, chakhi jaomakbo takhui nai takysa khai tabotlujiu kamrabo-e.
Sise nangniu kadkhaibo ga rotmoi lujiu sibo riga wasa liangkhai rabo-e.
Khangliga langlubo taruak pekse, takhuimoi nai takysa thinlujiu kamrabo-e.
khuga kadkhaibo thiujiu phungwang rabose singku khuga pikhai rabo-e. Paniu sise rathakbamga thin ngutrabo-e.
khuga kadkhai mibo hinase madan thiujiu singkuniu thinrabo-e, khatdi paniu sise rathakbamga rukhai rabo-e. Tatek kadkhai mibo rimse
Kadkhai kabangbose singku leng-e,
Takum machangnaga nangniu atiat lubogu alin-tara raithubose
Alin-tara kadpadbo hinaga matai khailo, palamra matai siniu
Nangniu atiat raithubogu miusy
Sibo riga takysa nai parim wibo wamudse khailo.
Singku siniu sibo tatekse rukhai rabo-e khatdi siga machakhaibo wasa siniu maningtaobogu thiujiu khatdi parim wibo siniu,
Mai khatniu pagu khaorui thinlujiu chakin thiubogu kadpad thiujiu pipadsai, sise matomchi maksai matomliu tadi sise pajam para habose thinrabo-e.
Kadpadbo papao siniu chakhao pigase paben kaba khairabo-e, khatdi
Khatdi pahangga raokhai bambo papumjan pasa hina, palungjan hina,
pamaki khatdi siga bambo hina,
Singku siniu pakhiangna haise rukhaibo rathak bamga rukhai rabo-e. Katiu kadkhaibo rim haise
Mily maksai kaminiu chakin thiubogu rathak thiujiu kadpadsai, sise pachi maksai paliudi sui-e, chiudi sise pajam para kahabo thinrabo-e.
Mai khatniu mily kadpad sai,
paniu mily piga paben kabakhai rabo-e, khatdi Mathenky maga gikhai rabo-e. Singku siniu sibo zaise rathakbam pake madaiga majaokhai rabo-e.
Kadkhai rabodung sira: pasa, pamidang gasu dangpadbo, pasa pakhiangna, palungga bambo pasa hina
pamaki khatdi siga bambo paraidung khatdi pasin ga withubo jamse
Changam kambo singku siniu
Mai khatniu kami kadpad sai,
paniu kami riga paben kabakhai lujiu Mathenky maga kamshat khairabo-e.
Sichiujiu palungjan pasa hinase,
pamaki khatdi siga bambo pasa, pasin gu kawibo hina
Singku siniu haidung pakhiangnase rathakbamga
Israel mai khatnadi pasa khatdi pajai tiumak rabo-e; haibo cheng-hai Israel mai hinaniu paliuniu kalungbo bam hinaga majai rabo-e.
gu chamtan kampang misai haibogu tajai dungse piuraleng dinbilo chiujiu chamtan pikhai-e.
Dibo Singku siniu nuan tenmisai, maidung khuga kamaobose phungwangbo-e, sichiusai paniu matomchi poi pajam para habo thinwang rabo-e khatdi sise panuan jengniu
Paniu matomchise Mathenky kamun gase ju-ngutjiu, papee kabakhai lujiu sise
Sigasu Dibo Singku siniu matomchigu tazai kasiase thinlujiu sise Mathenkiga ngut rabo-e.
Paniu tazai gase pah n-jung sumlujiu masanbo jusungfai maga kajin khailon chinnia rabo-e.

Sigasu paniu parim wibo rathakbam Mathenky gu kariopadbo pake gase tazai kasia khairabo-e. Malipadbo hina paniu rathakbam phibangga khailujiu rukhaibo rathak kamkhai rabo-e, sise Mathenky ngutbo bamga kamrabo-e.
Sibo matomchi gasu paniu pasa hinase, khatdi palung niaga bambo hina,
pamaki khatdi siga bambo pasa, khatdi pasin ga withubo jamse khairabo-e.
Singku siniu sise khoilujiu rukhaibo rathak thiujiu rathak bamga rukhai rabo-e, chakin thiubogu khaoring kadpadbo kumgapjiu kamrabo-e.
Chiudi sibogu pagi, patia hina, papee, paphi, palungjan, parai jaojiu paniu khoirabo-e,
tachengga masanbo bam rijiky lenlam tabui ponthon khaibo bamga thinwang rabo-e. Siga paniu tasingniu chami thiukhaibo riga rukhai rabo-e.
Israel mai mathiu nuan thiujiu paliuniu kamnijiu kammakbo
siga nuan hai padgap dasai, lung aruang bambo maidungniu matomchi poi, nuan gu kadpadbo thiujiu hawang rabo-e. Paliuniu
namgu jupaodungniu sibo piriga paliu ben kaba khailujiu sise kamshat khairabo-e.
Dibo Singku siniu matom zaise kasia Mathenky lungga thinngut rabo-e,
tazaiga pa njung sumlujiu, sise jusungfai masuangga kajinkhai lon chinnia rabo-e.

Paniu Mathenky lunglam tazai poinaga parim wibo khaibo rathakbamgu pake kariopadbo gase khairabo-e khatdi mali padbo hinase rukhaibo rathak thiujiu rathakbam phibangga rukhai rabo-e, sise Mathenky tadngutbo bamga rukhai rabo-e.
Siga paniu pasa hina khoilujiu rathak bamga rukhai rabo-e.
Paniu nuan leng kadpadbo matomchitu kakambo kumgapjiu paniu haisidi kamrabo-e, sichiujiu maidunggu nuan jengniu chara thiubose kamrabo-e, sichiusai paliutu kuak khaibi rabo-e.
Sichiujiu paniu matomchi situ rijiky lenlamse ponpad lujiu rurabo-e, paniu panuan donniu padbo matomchitu kumjiu rurabo-e. Haise nammaigu nuan luthonra kadpadbo ngamkam si-e.
Mawangpao khatniu paniu kamnijiu kammakbo gasu
sigasu paniu nuan tenmide chiubo sigapboga, paniu pajam-para habo kamichi khat hawang rabo-e.
Paniu kamichi pigase paben kaba khairabo-e khatdi rathakbamgu tingpi lamse kamichi situ kamshat khai rabo-e, sigase rukhaibo rathakgu khaoring kamshat khaibo bamme. Haise nuan luthonbogu kadpadbo-e.
Singku siniu chakhao zaiga pa-njung sumlujiu rathakbamgu pake kariopadbo gase majao khairabo-e, sigasu masiabo hina rathakbam phiga majao khairabo-e.
Sibosai paniu chakin thiubogu khaoringse gilujiu pasa rubo kumjiu haisidi rathakbamga rukhai rabo-e. Singku siniu haichiujiu mawangpaogu nuan jengniu rathak mania kadboga, panuanse kuak khai rabo-e.
pagu kamaobose sipadgapboga paniu wadi jamra makbo kamipui khat hawang kadkhai rabo-e.
Paniu sibo piga paben khailujiu rathakbam nrilam chiubora rukhaijiu kadkhaibo khaoring gikhaibo bamga gikhai rabo-e.
Singku siniu chakhao zaiga pa-njung sumlujiu rathakbamgu pake kariopadbo gase kajinkhai rabo-e khatdi kamalibo hinase thinlujiu rathakbam situ majao magui khairabo-e.
Sibosai paniu chakin thiubogu chakhao gilujiu pasa lupadbo sa hinase khoilujiu rukhai rabo-e, siniu
Mai khatniu nuan gu maniakad jengniu mily phungwangsai, sise wadi jamra makbo papui rabo-e.
Paniu sibo khao piga paben khailujiu rathakbamga tingpilam chiubora khaoring gikhaibo bam gase kadkhai rabo-e.
Singku siniu chakhao zaiga pa-njung sumlujiu rathakbamgu pake kariopadbo gase kajinkhai rabo-e, khatdi kamalibo hinase thinlujiu rathakbam situ majao magui khairabo-e.
Sibosai paniu chakin thiubogu mily gikhaijiu pasa hina lupadbo kum khatdi
Pahangga pikhai bambodungse nuan jengniu pipadbo rathak thiurabo-e.
Sisera mai khattu ladjankyga kuwangboga paniu ngaolubo maksai chiulubo lamga paniu wangjiu dinlen maksai, paniu sibo lamga chariubo dao rabo-e.
Mai khatniu maningmak jingjiu charachengga masan makbo chiubora kashaibo wakhaotu dimisai, paniu sise maningtao gap pase maomibo-e khatdi masan tamibo-e.
Mai khatniu maningmak jingjiu chamaipum niabui makbo niamisai sise masanmak mide, sichiujiu paniu kam mibose silu gapboga pase kasabo kam mide chiujiu lurabo-e.
Mai khatniu chamriat malajiu thiusai, sibo lamse wakhat khat bamtadi paniu kamkhai mibose maningwang gapboga pahai mao mibo-e.
Mai khatniu kamaobo kam misai paniu pamaose din madurabo-e,
khatdi panuan jengniu patu kam chariurabo sung paniu milyliu khat maksai kamiliu khat
Maipiu siniu mily maksai kamise pipad ngam maksai paniu makhao chararui nia maksai kaphina nia panuan jengniu
Paniu singku khuga sise ponwangboga singku siniu thingnase nuanleng thiujiu kadpad rairabo-e. Siga paniu papeese dangtap makjiu pawongse romlujiu,
khatdi rathak bamga sibo zaise kajinkhai rabo-e siga malibo zaise rathakbam riga runkhai rabo-e. Haise nuan luthonbogu rathak maniakad si-e.
Sise paniu tajai saisuijiu rukhaibo maniakad thiujiu paniabo thingnase kadrabo-e. Haichiujiu singku siniu mai khat nuan jengniu charathiu rabo-e, sichiujiu patu kuak khairabo-e.

Mai khatniu makhao chararui maksai kaphina nia phungpad ngamlaksai, paniu nuan gu maniakad thiujiu takhui taju khat phungwang rabo-e. Siga paniu takisa maksai parim wibo wadi siga khaimak rabo-e, palamra haise nuan gu maniakadle, alin-taragu maniakad makge.
Siga maningtaojiu bamrabogu thiujiu
Mai khatgu nuan jengniu singku siniu haichiu chara thiujiu kadkhai rabo-e. Siga patuse kuakkhai rabo-e. Siga alin-taragu maniakad kumjiu kamalibo takhui hinase singkupiu leng rabo-e.
Pahangga raokhai bambo tajaidungse
Mai khatniu

Paniu pirabose ruira ngamlak mibo saisuijiu dam mangiuga damkhat khaisan lujiu pirabo-e. Sise paniu singkupiu khuga pikhai rabo-e, khatdi singkupiu siniu sibopiu nuan jengniu kadkhaibo khaoring rathak thiurabo-e, siga panuanse kuak khai rabo-e.
Mai khatniu simakjiu

Paniu chapaw ruibo maniakad thiujiu wadi pajam-para habo milychi maksai kamichi khat phungwang singku khuga pikhai rabo-e. Sichiujiu sibo nuanse pawan-wan saisuijiu chakkhai rabo-e. Siga maojiu nuan kam mibopiu jengniu singku siniu rathak mania thiujiu kadpad rabo-e, siga panuanse kuakkhai rabo-e.
Haise
Israel mai karai wakhat jengniu mania pikhai diakbose malanra suimaksai agalujiu pilanmak misai,
khatdi mai khatgu wakhat sonlujiu pilanmak misai khatdi wakhat hamibo lamga aratjiu daomakge chiujiu dinsai, paniu
Sikumbo thakga nuan tenmai pah palung masan makbo jengniu paniu aratjiu khoilubo mania hina malanrabo-e, di sajai pibo thiujiu siga dam mangiugu damkhat khaisanjiu majon rabo-e.
Paniu
Sibopiu nuan jengniu singku siniu rathak thiujiu kadkhai rabo-e, siga panuanse kuakkhai rabo-e.
pahangga lenkhaibo tajaidungse Aaron khatdi panahpiu dungniu rujiu kadkhaiboga tenrabo-e. Rathakbamga rujiu kadkhai bambo mise nchun rusang khairabo-e, sichiujiu chamise pi taojiu bamrabo-e.
Sibo singku siniu pagu fainoi ntiang nai fainoi ni kadunbose khailujiu rathakbamga mirui kabambose biaklu rathakbam mungga khaimi rabo-e.
Sibosai pagu fainise lilujiu tacheng saisuijiu kam masanbo bamga mirui dungse rijiky lenlam lupad khairabo-e.
Rathakbamga chamise wadaodi midmak rabo-e. Siga nsuan machang singku siniu tasing dikkhai rabo-e, siga rujiu kadbo tienleng kadenkhai rabo-e khatdi chakin thiubogu kadpadbo sase siga rukhai rabo-e.
Rathakbamse chami kammid makjiu pi taobam rabo-e.
Pahangga raokhai bambo tajaidungse alin-tara kadboga tadraleng-e. Alin-tara kadwangbose Aaron kaikikgu singku mainiu rathakbam suangga thinwang rabo-e.
Sibosai singku siniu takhui nai wasa paben katup khat thinlujiu maningtaojiu bamrabogu thiujiu sise pakhiangna
Siga kamalibo hinase singku mainiu tiurabo-e, sise chakhi khaimakjiu taruak khuaklu
leng kadpadbo tatek dungse Aaron kaikik ganiu lungwangbo singkumainiu tiurabo-e. Kadpad mibo tatekse kakimaira niatao misai, masanbo pumtan ganiu patuse kam masa khai rabo-e.
Pahangga lenkhai bambo tajaidungse
Aaron kai-kikgu singku maitu ngam piraleng pikhai-e. Patu ngam pikhaibo nai, paniu takhui taju khat (naimachanggu alin-tara kadbo nai nchambo), nsuan paphan khatdi chawan paphan kadkhai rabo-e.
Sise wasa jalujiu khangliga langrabo-e, sichiujiu alin-taragu maniakad kumjiu parim siniu
Dibo Singku thiujiu bambo Aaron kaikikmai siniu haise tingtheng kamjiu bamrabo-e. Pakhiangna haise
Singku maileng thiujiu kadpadbo alin-taragu maniakadse tiumak rabo-e, sise pakhiangna rukhairabo-e.

Aaron nai panahpiudungniu nuan gu maniakad jengniu tadkiuboga majaira pahangga raokhaibo tajaidungse pikhai-e. Nuan jengniu pipadbo khaoringse rathakbamgu tingpilamse kamshat rabo-e. Haise masanchang masanbo maniakadle.
Khaoringse thinjiu rathak thiubo singku siniu
Mai khatniu maksai wakhatniu chakhao janse niamisai masanbo pumtan siniu patuse kam masa rabo-e. Chakhao zaise chafai-taniga wang kaniang misai, sibo faise masanbo bamga katha rabo-e.
Chagam liga chamise langmisai sibo lise kampang mirabo-e, khatdi chagi liga langsai sibo lise taduiniu khiu mawi mirabo-e.
Singku kikhun piumainiu haibo maniakadgu mise tiubo sui-e, sise masanbo-e.
Chiudi nuan kuak mirabo saisuijiu Mathenkiga phungwangbo zai sira tiumak rabo-e, sise rumirabo-e.
Pahangga lenkhai bambodungse chapaw ruibogu masanbo tajaidung-e.
Rujiu kadpadbo khaoring kamshatbo bam chiubora rathakbamgu tingpilam kadkhaibo khaoringse kamshat rabo-e. Khatdi tazaise rathakbam pake madaiga kajin khairabo-e.
Pasa hina pasap palungjantu majiubo sadung,
pamaki khatdi siga khopbo-sa hina, khatdi pasin ga withubo chiujiu lupadlu rathakbamga kadkhai rabo-e.
Singkupiu siniu pasa hinase tatek maniakad thiujiu
Singku kiriang piumai hina tiubo sui-e, chiudi masanbo bamgasu tiurabo-e. Palamra sise masanchang masanbo-e.
Nuan gu maniakad nai chapaw ruibogu maniakad thiura tajai khat bamme: chamise rathak thiubo singku leng rabo-e.
Rujiu kadkhaibo chakhaogi sidi rathak thiubo singkupiu leng-e.
Alin-taragu maniakad chiubora n-mangga maksai khangliga maksai tatupek gasu thabo hinase Tingwang khuga kadkhaibose rathakguse singku lengrabo-e.
Chiudi langmakbo wasa ajamibo tadi ajamakbo tadi alin-tara maniakad hina sira Aaron ky singkumai leng rabo-e, khatdi sise paliuniu njan nchamjiu lurabo-e.
Pahangga bambose chakin thiubogu maniakad thiujiu

Mai khatniu haise chunwigu kadpadbo thiujiu Tingwang leng pikhai sai, paniu charathiu rabo wakhao nai chakhi khaimakbo taruak kadpadbo aruangjiu pikhai rabo-e: kasiubo taruak takhuimoi nai takisa tabotlujiu kambo taruak maksai takisaniu kambo taruak maksai takhuiga takisa jalujiu kambo taruak thin rabo-e.
Siga khaisanjiu chakhi jaobo taruak kasiubo kadpad rabo-e.
Paniu taruak jat hina jaojiu
Chakhao janse chara thiubo naise tiukammi rabo-e; wakhat nadi pasaibo nai katang khaibam mak rabo-e.

Mai khatniu chamriat khaibotu wangtang khaibo thiujiu chakin thiubogu kadpadbo maksai pagu maninggu thiujiu kadpadbo phungwang sai, sise wakhatdi kadpadbo tingmikga tiukam makrabo-e, chiudi malibose pasaibo nai tiubo sui-e.
Pasaibo nai katang khaibambo chami sira ruthon mirabo-e.
Pasumbo nai mai khatniu tiusai, sibo maigu kadpadse
Chamise charachengga masan makboga niamisai, sise tiumak rabo-e, sise ruthonmi rabo-e.
Charachengga masan mainiu tiubo sui-e,
chiudi masan kamak mainiu tiumisai, patuse Tingwang mai ruangga lukhai tami rabo-e.
Mai khatniu, chamaitu maksai wakhaotu niakhai lujiu charachengga tania mibo saiga rathak mise tiusai, patuse Tingwang maileng chakkhai tami rabo-e.
Mose khuga
Mai khatdi matom-sa, mily-sa maksai kami-sase tiumak rabo-e.
Chakhao paronna shaibogu pasa khatdi nkankhaoniu kamshatbo khaojan tiumak rabo-e, chiudi wakaki lengra thinpiubo sui-e.
Sikumbo jan tiubo mai tura Tingwang mai-e chiubo lukhai tamirabo-e.
Israel maidungniu pabam katam-tamboga lungdi, paliuniu nthingna maksai khaoring zai lujiu tatek thiujiu thinpiu makrabo-e.
Mai khatniu tajai haise kampang misai patu Tingwang maileng chakkhai tami rabo-e.
Pahangga bambo tajaidungse
Mai khatniu chakin thiubogu maniakad pipadsai sibogu damga kawibo kalen thiujiu
Sise paben siakniu tatek kadpadbogu thiujiu pasa nai pagase phungwang rabo-e. Paniu sibo wakhao janse
Singkuniu rathakbam riga pasase rukhai rabo-e, pagajanse singkupiu gu rabo-e.
Chakhao phi majadlamse nkiubo ramkha thiujiu pirabo-e,
sichiujiu chakin thiubogu kadpadbogu pasa nai pajai kadpadbose singkutu pirabo-e.
Chakhaogu pagajan haira kalen kawibo-e, pasaigu paphijan haira Israel maidung khugasu
Haise
Haiga kadpadbogu janse paliutu piraleng Israel maidung khuga
Sichiujiu haidungse, rujiu kadpadbo, alin-tara kadpadbo, nuan gu kadpadbo, chapaw ruibogu kadpadbo, changam pibogu kadpad, khatdi chakin thiubogu kadpadbogu tajaidung si-e.
Sinai Luong Ramjingga bamboga, Israel mainiu paliugu kadpadbo lamga katikhaira chamtan hai Mose khuga
“Aaron nai panahpiu dungtu, singku-faini pikhaira, wasa manuk khaira, matomchipoi khat, khatdi nuan leng kadkhaira kamichi nia, khatdi chakhi khaimakbo taruak takam nia phungwang rabo-e.
Siga nammai mathiutu siga kuwang maduilo.”
paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Iniu tuhoi kamsu rabo ngam haise
Mose niu Aaron khatdi panahpiudungtu pasuanglam majangpad lujiu characheng saisuijiu nkhiu raleng dinkhaide.
Paniu ntiang nai taronbo-ntiang Aaron tu khaibide khatdi pakhuga khen-gak khaibide. Paniu Ephod
Paniu patu pagatop khaibide sibo lungga Urim nai Thummim se khairabo-e.
Paniu chapikhek papeega khaibi-e, pamasuangga paniu kachia ponse khai-e, sise masanbo kadpadbogu madan si-e, haise
Sigasu Mose niu manuk khairabo wasase thin lujiu
Paniu wasa kasia khoilujiu rathakbamga kajinlon chinnia khaide, khatdi siga pageng bambo tathikuang sibogu parunham chiujiu
Paniu Aaron piga wasa runkhaijiu tania-tien thiura pikhaide.
Pasaibonai, Mose niu Aaron nahmaitu
Sigasu Mose niu nuan gu kadpadleng thiujiu matomchi poi juwangde, khatdi Aaron nai panahpiu dungniu sibo khao riga paliu ben kaba khaide.

Mose niu sise kamshat lujiu tazai kasia khoilude, khatdi pah njungniu tazaiga sumlujiu rathak bamgu pake kariopadbo kadpadbo thiujiu tazaise majao khaide. Sigasu mali bambo pajai hinase rathakbam phibangga runkhaide. Haichiubo thakga sise kadpad khailujiu kam masan khaide.
Mose niu palungjan gu pasa hina pasin jaojiu wibo hina khatdi pamakiga bambo pasa hina khoilujiu rathakbam gase rukhaide.
Paniu matomchi jan kamalibo hinase, pagi, patia khatdi palungjan hina jaojiu,
Sibo saiga, Mose niu rukhaibo rathak leng kamichi ponwang-e, siga Aaron nai panahpiudungse sibo khaoriga paliu ben kaba khaide.
Mose niu sise kamshat lujiu rathakbam pake madaiga tazaise kajin khaide.
Paniu kamichi janse dimlujiu, palungjan nai pasailam phise taduiniu khiukhaide, khatdi
Sigasu Mose niu niabo mise thinwang-e, sise tania thiura pikhai mibo singku leng-e, sichiujiu Aaron nai panahpiu dungniu sibo khao piriga paliu ben kaba khai-e.
Mose niu sise kamshat lujiu pajai kasia khoilujiu Aaron gu kuonnam majadlam, paben majad jungpui, khatdi paphi jungpui majadlamse kani khaide.

Sigasu paniu Aaron nahpiu dungtu pasuanglam majangpad lujiu paliu kuon majat lam, paliu ben majadgu jungpuiga, khatdi paliu phigu jungpui gase tazai kani khaide. Sigasu malibo tazai hinase Mose niu rathakbam pake madaiga runkhaide.
Paniu pasa, pamisa, palungjantu makom khaibo pasaren hina, pasin-ga withubo jam, pamaki nai pasaren khatdi pasaiphi majadlamse khoilude.
Sigasu chakhi khaimakbo taruak takam gasu taruak khat khoilujiu
Haibo tiutek hinase paniu Aaron ben ga khatdi panahpiudung ben ga khaide khatdi paliuniu kawibo kalen thiujiu sise
Sigasu tiutekse Mose niu paliu khugasu khoilujiu rathakbamga rukhaibo kadpad bamga tania-tien thiubogu thiujiu kadkhaide. Tiutek kadkhaibo hai
Sigasu Mose niu paga-tiase khoilujiu
Mose niu manukrabo wasa tamnakha khatdi tazai kasia thinlujiu Aaron gen ga khatdi Aaron nahpiudung nai paliu fairiga kajin khaide. Haichiu kambo gasu paliutu khatdi paliugu fainise
Mose niu Aaron nai panahpiudung khuga din-e, “Chamise khoilujiu
Taruak maksai chami tiukabangbo hinase ruthon milo.
Naliutu ngam pikhaibo characheng kam tathuitang makthen naliuniu Mathenky haitu jeng chinnia phutmakjiu bamrabo-e.
Naliu nuan luthon raleng jengniu thainai aliu khuga kamkhai mibo kumjiu, kamraleng
niu naliutu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, nchun, n-nien saomakjiu jeng chinnia hai Mathenky tu phutmakjiu bamrabo-e. Naliuniu sise kam maksai naliu shairabo-e. Haise
Sichiujiu
Tania thiura thiuloi mibo saibo nai, Mose niu Aaron khatdi panahpiudung khatdi Israel maidunggu jupaodungtu kude.
Paniu Aaron khuga din-e, “Matomchipoi khatdi kamichi khat jamra makbo thinlulo, khatdi sise
Sigasu Israel maidungtu nuan gu kadpadleng kamichi khat takum khat tangmibo matompoi khat, sigasu, takum khat tangmibo milypoi khat pajam para habo rukhaibo rathakleng,
khatdi matomchi khat chakin thiubogu kadpadbo leng thinlulo chiujiu dinbilo. Sise
Mose niu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu Mathenky masuangga wahina paliuniu thinwang khaide. Khatdi nammai mathiu
Mose niu din-e, “Haise kamraleng naliutu
Sigasu paniu Aaron khuga din-e, “Rathakbamga tadlo, nuan gu maniakad khatdi rukhaibo maniakad haise maidunggu nuan luthonra kadkhailo. Haibo kalen pipadbo guse
Aaron niu rathakbamga tadlujiu pagu nuan jengniu kadpadbo thiujiu matomchi kamshat khaide.
Panahpiudungniu pazaise thinwangde, khatdi paniu pazai gase pah njung sumlujiu, rathakbamgu pake kario padbo bamga kasia kajin khailujiu malipadbo hina rathakbam phibang hang gase runkhaide.
Sigasu paniu rathakbamga pasa, pa-maki khatdi pasin gu withubo jam
Chiudi pajan nai pagi sira paniu rijiky lenlam rukhaide.
Pagu rukhaibo rathakleng paniu khaoring kamshat khaide, panahpiudungniu tazai khoiwangbose, paniu rathakbam pake madaiga runkhaide.
Paliuniu patu chakhaopi khatdi kakibo pajandung pikhaide, paniu rathakbamga sise rukhaide.
Sigasu paniu palungjan nai pasailam phi nkhiulujiu rukhaibo rathak maniadung riga rukhaide.
Sibo saiga, maidunggu kadpadse paniu pikhaide, maidunggu nuan jengniu kadpadbo mise paniu khoijiu, sise kamshat lujiu paniu papumleng kadpadbo kumjiu kadpad khaide.
Rukhaibo rathakleng thiujiu paniu chakhao thinwang lujiu sise tacheng saisuijiu kadkhaide.
Paniu alin-tara kadpadbo guse pikhaide khatdi takhuimoi kani khat khailujiu rathakbamga rukhaide. (Haise naimachang rukhaibo rathakga khaisanbo thiujiu kambo-e).
Maidung jengniu chakin thiubogu kadpad thiujiu paniu matomchi nai kamichise kamshat khaide. Panah piudungniu pazaise pakhu khoiwang-e khatdi paniu sise rathakbam pake madaiga kajin khaide.
Aaron niu matom nai kamichi sase chakhao gariga khailujiu,
rathakbamga phungmeng khaide. Pasase paniu rathak bamga rukhaide.
Mose niu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, singkudung leng withubo kalen thiujiu paga jannai pasai phise
Mose nai Aaron se
Simak dakjiu bambo wan-ga
Aaron nahpiu Nadab nai Abihu niu chami ponbo kuang khoilujiu sibo kuang lungga mitikang, nai parim wibose siga khailujiu sise
Simak bungjiu
Siga Mose niu Aaron khuga din-e, “Haise
Mose niu Aaron pao, Uzziel nahpiu kania, Mishael nai Elzaphan tu kulujiu panai khuga din-e, “Wanglujiu nanai singnapiu phaw haise masanbo Mathenky gasu ponpad milo khatdi rijibam lenlam khaimilo.”
Sichiujiu Mose niu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, panainiu wanglujiu kashai phawse chafainiu majiu lujiu rijiky lenlam ponpad mide.

Sigasu Mose niu Aaron khatdi panahpiu kania Elezer nai Ithamar khuga din-e, “Naliuniu achungbogu lenjiu naliu pi tamai makbo maksai naliu fai phetbo kamtulo. Sichiu naliuniu kamsai naliu shairabo-e, khatdi
Mathenky tadngutbo kamunse phutmi tulo, maksai naliu shairabo-e, palamra naliutu
“Nang khatdi nanahpiu dungniu jaw maksai pakai tanbo saklujiu Iniu bambo Mathenkiga ngutbo suimakge, naliu ngutsai naliu shairabo-e. Haibo tajaise nakai-nakik mainiu piujiu lungrabo-e.
Tingwang nai maidung tamsin rabo-e khatdi charachengga masanbo nai masan kamakbose tamsin rabo-e.
Mose khuga Iniu natu chamtan pikhai mibo hinase Israel maidung khuga dinkhai rabo-e.”
Masanbo bamgase tiulo, sise
Singkuleng
tu katiu pipadbo rathakga paliuniu pasa, pagajan nai pasai phise paliuniu thinwang rabo-e.
Mose niu kami thinlujiu nuan gu kadpadbo rathak lamga maniuboga sise masuangjiu rumi bamniu-e. Siniu Eleazer nai Ithamar tu palungpom mide, khatdi paniu dinsude,
“Nanainiu dekamjiu masanbo bamga nuan leng kadpad mibose tiumak jiulo? Sise masanchang masanbo-e, sichiujiu
Sibo zaise masanbo bamga phungwang makbo jengniu, Iniu chamtan pikhai mibo kumjiu charathiukhai mibose siga tiurabo-e.”
Aaron niu paokakge, “Iniu thainai nuan leng kadpad mibo guse tiulusai,
Mose niu haise chiuboga palung kiumide.
Pahangga raokhaibo tajaidung hai
Naliuniu kadihga kalungbo khaoringdung hina
chiubora patin-karabo khatdi kataladbo hina tiubo sui-e,
chiudi naliuniu qontrao, tachu maksai tazawang tiumak rabo-e. Paliu haitu masan makbo leng lukhai rabo-e, paliu hai taladbo wakhao-e chiudi patin nia ramakge.
Kavakjan tiutulo. Paliu haitu masan makbo leng lukhai rabo-e, paliu ntin ra-e, chiudi talad makge.
Haibo khaodung jan tiutulo, maksai paliugu kashai pumdi niatulo, palamra paliu hai masan makge.
Chakha pamirangbo nai palip bambo jat hina tiubo sui-e,
chiudi tadui lungga lungbo pamirang habo palip kahabo hinase tiubo suimakge.
Sikumbo khao hinatu masan makbo leng lukhai rabo-e. Naliuniu paliutu tiumak rabo-e, khatdi paliugu kashai pum sidi niamak rabo-e.
Tadui lungga lungbambo khao pamirang habo khatdi palip habo hina tiumak rabo-e.

Pahangga raokhai bambo thingnadung haitu naliuniu tiumak rabo-e: kaleng, abeng, takaoleng, kaleng-woimana, maluipui, chararui, n-gek, ruidi, taduileng, taduirui, khuptariupui, lawai, aluak, chapungrui khatdi chalen.
Pakan bambo wakhaopoi hina masan makbo-e,
machak makjiu machaobo wakhaopoi hina masan makbo-e.
Naliuniu takao, kaobina maksai kaogum tiubo sui-e.
Chiudi kakibo wakhaopoi pakan kabambo chiudi pawonniu tonbo wakhaopui hina masan kamakbo leng lukhai rabo-e.

Pahangga pikhaibo khaodung: patin kabambo khao hina, talad bamdi patin ramakbo khao, khatdi pangen madai karabo khaobamdi pa-tin kathiubo khao hina, kashaibo pum kania maira chawan katangbo masanmak rabo-e: Mai khatniu paliugu kashaibo pum khoisai pafai-pani kathami rabo-e, sichiu bamdi chawan katang pahai masan makjiu bamrabo-e.
Tanam, zasiang, taza, tachu khatdi masuipuitu masan kamakbo leng lukhai rabo-e.
Mai khatniu haidungtu khatdi paliugu kashaibo phaw niasai pase chawan katang masanmak rabo-e.

Khatdi kashaibo phawse wakhatga nkai khaisai, sise masanta mirabo-e. Haise tasingniu kambo wania, chafai-tani, chamigi khatdi takhao, thinpiubo mania hinatu niakhai misai sise masanta mibo-e. Sise taduiga sumrabo-e chiudi chawan katangbo masanmak rabo-e.
Khatdi paliu pum taniang liga nkaikhai misai, palungga kabambo hina masanta mirabo-e, khatdi taniang lise kampangmi rabo-e.
Tiusuibo tatek bamtadi haikumbo li gasu runkiujiu nialubose tania mirabo-e, khatdi siga bambo saksuibo hina masanta mirabo-e.
Kashaibo pum nkaikhai mibo mania hina masan tamibo-e; taniangniu kambo chamibung nai n-mang kampang mirabo-e,
chiudi kashai pumtu niakhai mibo mania hinase taniami tadi tadui akhun maksai karung sira masanjiu bamrabo-e.
Sikumbo khatniu alinpum lingrabo khattu niakhai mibam tadi alin pumse masanbam rabo-e,
chiudi alinpumse taduiga npung rabo-e, khatdi siga alinpum khatniu ntiakkhai misai, masanta mirabo-e.
Langtiu suibo wakhao shai mijiu, sise niatao lubo maise chawan tangbo masanmak rabo-e.

Khatdi mai khatniu haise tiumisai paniu pafai-pani katha rabo-e, chiudi pase chawan katangbo masanmak rabo-e; mai khatniu kashaibo pum ponsai pafai-pani kathami rabo-e, chiudi chawan katangbo masanta mirabo-e.
Naliuniu kadihga buangbo kasiambo khao hina,
paganiu katonbo khao tadi, paphi madainiu tadbo tadi maksai pangen kengbo khao tadi tiumak rabo-e.
Haikumbo khaodung hina tiubo gasu naliu ronna kam taniami tulo.
I hai naliu
Iniu naliu Rawang thiuraleng Egypt gasu naliutu majang npadbo-e. Naliu masanlo, palamra I hai masanbo-e.
Haise khaoringdung nai thingnadung, ramluongga lungbo khao hina khatdi tadui lungga lungbo khao hina lamga tajai si-e.
Naliuniu mathing sijiu deguse charachengga masanlo maksai deguse masan maklo chiubo sitam rabo-e, tiusuibo, tiusui makbo khaoringse sitam rabo-e.
Israel maidung leng pikhai-e. Npuimai khatniu panah npiumai lunglubosai jeng chinnia lungga, pase khaophun phungbo kumgapjiu charachengga pahai masan makbo-e.
Patachadbo naise, ngena situ pagi romrabo-e.

Sigasu naimikpui samriu sumkiu suang kengjiu pajai hamibo gasu kam masan lanlu makbo masuang; paniu masanbo mania wadi niamak rabo-e maksai patu kam masan kalubo wan wangtang makthen masanbo Mathenkiga ngutmak rabo-e.

Npuimai khatniu panah npuimai lunglubo sai jeng kariu-je-madaikiu lungga, pase khaophun kaphungbo wan kumjiu charachengga masan makbo-e. Sigasu pajai hamibogu characheng gasu masan makbo hai naimikpui riak-charuk-charuk suang kengjiu bamkhang rabo-e.
Patu kam masanbo ngam kamloi lubo wan-ga, npuimainah bamdi npiumainah bamdi, paniu nuan gu kadpad raleng takum khat tangmibo milypoi khat
Singku siniu pagu pipadse
Mai khatniu pagen masak padjiu maksai pajam thiubose chungpadjiu nphenbo ra padsuibo bammi sai, patuse Aaron kiriangmai singku khuga puiwang rabo-e.

Singku siniu pajam matadjiu phuirabo-e, siga kathiubo jamse pagi gasu sukjiu thiu ngut misai, khatdi pagiuse purgu wang misai, haise nphenbo rapotle, sichiusai singku siniu sibo piuse masanta mide chiujiu dinpad rabo-e.
Chiudi pazamse kapuang lujiu sibo mungga kasukbo ngaopad maksai khatdi kathiubo jamse purgu wangmak sai, singku siniu sibo piutu jeng chinnia pijiu bamtam khai rabo-e.
Singku siniu jeng chinniabo naise patu phuilan rabo-e, khatdi pazamse kali maksai patu pi tadmariu khai makjiu kakibo jeng chinnia pi bamtam khailan rabo-e.

Jeng chinniabo naise singkuniu patu phuilan rabo-e, siga thiuton padmakjiu pajam wiwangbi misai, pahai charachengga masan mide chiujiu paniu dinpad rabo-e; haise masakbo ronna-e. Kathiubo paose pafai-pani katharabo-e, sichiubo sainiu charachengga masan mirabo-e.
Chiudi singku siniu patu phuilujiu patu charachengga masan mide chiujiu dinpad lubo saiga pajam thiuton padsai sise singku khuga wanglan rabo-e.
Singku siniu patu phuilan rabo-e, khatdi pajam thiumadi padmisai, masanta mide chiujiu paniu patu dinpad rabo-e, haise ka-nphenbo rapot si-e.
Mai khatniu nphenbo ra mara misai, patuse singku khuga majang wangrabo-e.
Singku siniu patu phuirabo-e. Kathiubo jamse thiupad sanjiu purgu wangjiu kana maliang bammisai,
sise wikung mibo nphenbo rapot mide. Singku siniu patu masanta mine chiujiu dinpad rabo-e, patu pi bamtam mira suimide, palamra patuse masan siakjiu tania mide chiubo simibo-e.
Kamasakbo rapotse papee gasu pangen tangbo thiuwang misai,
singku siniu patu phuilan rabo-e. Sise pachangjiu papum pakhiangna thiumak misai paniu patu tachengga masan bamme chiujiu dinpad rabo-e. Pagi pakhiangna benwang misai, pase tachengga masan bambo-e.
Chiudi pazamse thiuhoi-hoi lan misai, pase masanta mibo-e.

Singku siniu patu phuilan rabo-e, khatdi paniu pazamse suk mibo ngaosai, paniu patu masanta mine chiubo dinpad rabo-e. Pajam sukkiu mibo chiubo rambara nphen mibo situ dinbo-e, sichiujiu pase masanta mibo-e.
Chiudi pajamse wibi mijiu puwang misai, paniu singku khuga mengjiu,
patuse phuilan rabo-e. Pajamse benwang misai, pase charachengga masan mibo-e, khatdi singku siniu patu masan mide chiujiu dinpad rabo-e.
Mai khatniu pagen athiu padlujiu wimibo sai,
athiu kapadbo jamga min maren padbo ngao misai, pase singku khuga mengrabo-e.

Singku siniu patu phuirabo-e, khatdi pazamse pamungga bambo suang thiu masuk kiumi sai, khatdi pajam lungga bambo pagiuse purgu wang misai, singku siniu patuse masanta mide chiujiu dinpad rabo-e. Haise athiu padbo gasu nphen mibo-e.

Chiudi singku siniu kathiubo jamse phuiboga palungga bambo pagiuse kapad maksai, khatdi pamung gasu thiu masuk ngutbo hasai, chiudi pazamse ababi misai, singkuniu patu jeng chinnia pi bamtam khai rabo-e.
Pajamse thiumadi padmi sai, singku siniu patu masanta mide chiujiu dinpad rabo-e, pase mara mibo-e.
Chiudi sise kalimakjiu thiu padsan makjiu bamsai, sise athiu padbogu jam kalaili padbo thiujiu bammi sai, singku siniu patu charachengga masan mide chiujiu dinpad rabo-e.
Wakhat gasu mai khattu chami rumisai, pagise hengwang mibo maksai puwang misai,

singku siniu patu phuirabo-e chiujiu rumibo jamse kapuang misai khatdi pagi gasu sukngut mibo bammi sai, sise karubo jam gasu sujiu nphenbo rapotse padmibo-e, singku siniu patu charachengga masanta mide chiujiu dinpad rabo-e.
Chiudi pajam lungga bambo pagiuse puwang misai pajam gasu thiungut masuk mak misai, chiudi pazamse abawang misai, singku siniu patu jeng chinnia pi bamtam khai rabo-e.
Jeng chinniabo nai singku siniu patu phuilan rabo-e, sise thiusan padsai, sise nphenbo rapot mirabo-e; chiujiu singku siniu patu masanta mide chiujiu dinpad rabo-e.

Chiudi pajam kalimakjiu, thiuton padbo hajiu abawang misai, sise nphenbo rapot makge. Singku siniu patu charachengga masan bamme chiujiu dinpad rabo-e, palamra sise karubo bamga ronna kalaili padbo-e.
Npiumai maksai npuimai khatniu papeega maksai pa-ntangga thiupad sai,

singku siniu sise phuirabo-e. Sise pagi magui bambo lunglam thiungut mira kumsai, khatdi kathiubo jam lungga bambo pagiuse majinwang misai khatdi apiu wangmisai, sise nphenbo rapotle, sichiujiu patu masanta mide chiujiu dinpad rabo-e.
Singku siniu pazamse pagi magui bambo gasu thiungut masuk maksai, pajam lungga bambo pagiuse palun wikhang makmi sai, paniu patu jeng chinnia pi bamtam khai rabo-e.
Jeng chinniabo naise singkuniu patu phuilan rabo-e, sise pajam thiuton padmak khatdi pazamse ababo hasai, khatdi pajam maguibo gasu thiungut masuk makra kumsai,
sibo piuniu kathiubo jam mungga bambo pagiuse gotmi rabo-e. Singku siniu patu jeng chinnia nai pi bamtam khai lanrabo-e.

Jeng chinniabo naise singku siniu pazamse phuilan rabo-e, khatdi thiungut masukbo hajiu thiu madi padmak sai, paniu patu charachengga masan bamme chiujiu dinpad rabo-e. Sibopiu siniu pafai-pani kathami rabo-e, chiusai pahai masan mirabo-e.
Chiudi patu masan mide chiujiu dinlubo sai pajam thiuton padsai,
singku siniu patu phuilan rabo-e. Pajamse thiusan padmi sai, paniu pagiu majin wangbotu phuisonra ha-e, sibo piuse masanta kamibo-e.
Sichiudi singku siniu pajam thiumadi san tamide, pajam mase wiwang kinne, chiubo maningsai, sichiujiu pazamse wimisai, singku siniu patu charachengga wimide chiujiu dinmadu padrabo-e.
Npiumai maksai npuimai khat gen ga pajam kakabo maksai kapubo padbo tingga,
sikumbo mai situ singkuniu phuirabo-e. Pajamse kajiu madawang misai, sise pagi gasu thiupadbo chakhan-chara ronna-e; sichiujiu kathiubo paose charachengga masan bamme.
Npiumai khatniu paduk-giu maksai pasan-giu hamidi haisiniu patu kamtania makge.
Chiudi pasan talabo bamga pazamse padsai, sise nphenbo rapotle.
Singku siniu patu phuirabo-e, khatdi pajam heng-kabo padbo bamsai,
singku siniu patu masanta mide chiujiu dinpad rabo-e; palamra papeega nphenbo ra bammibo-e.
Nphenbo rapot phungbo maise pafai-pani kakekbo piurabo-e, papeese tamaimak rabo-e, pamun domlujiu, “Masan makbo, masan kamakbo!” chiujiu senpad rabo-e!
Mai khatniu sikumbo rapot phungbam then pahai masan makbo-e, khatdi maitu majang aruang makjiu rijiky lenlam pah lungrabo-e.
Chafai-tani, chakhaogiu faidi, fainoiga tadi kamee-mangbo padmi sai,
maksai fainoi kata kadaoga, maksai chakhao giufaiga, maksai chamigiga, maksai chamiginiu kakambo mania gadi,
madiak-ring wangbo maksai hengmaren padmibo bamsai, kamee-mangbo-ra ngutmibo-e, sise singku khuga lenkhai rabo-e.
Singkuniu sise phuirabo-e khatdi sibo maniase jeng chinnia leng khaitam mirabo-e.
Jeng chinniabo nai paniu sise phuilan rabo-e, khatdi kamee-mangbose padton misai, chapot maniase masanta mibo-e.
Sise singkuniu rumi rabo-e, palamra sise lenlanbo kamee-mang jengniu chami gasu ruthon mirabo-e.
Chiudi paniu sise phuibo wan-ga, singku siniu kamee-mangse mania gase lensuan padmakbo ngao misai,
sise katha raleng paniu pirabo-e, khatdi jeng chinnia leng khaitam lanrabo-e.

Siga paniu phuilan rabo-e, khatdi kamee-mangbose pagiak kalimak misai, haise len madipad sonmak tadi, sise masanta mibo-e; sibo maniase pasai lam tadi pasuanglam tadi ten misai nangniu ruthon mirabo-e.
Chiubamdi, singku siniu sise phuilanbo wan-ga, kamee-mangse pagiak nkhin misai chamigi gasu tadi chafai-tani gasu tadi phet taliang mirabo-e.
Sigasu, kamee-mangse ngaopad lansai khatdi pajam dipadsan lansai, papaoniu sibo maniase ruthon mirabo-e.
Paniu kathaboga pajam hamisai, paniu sise katha lanrabo-e. Sichiujiu sise charachengga masan mibo-e.

Haichiujiu, haise chafai-taniga fainoi tadi, chakhaogiu-fai tadi, chamigi gasu kambo mania tadi kamee-mangbo maksai kamee-mang makbo lamga haise charachengga masan-e, maksai masan makge chiubo chaprabo-e.
nphenbo ra maralubo gasu charachengga kam masan raleng tadrabo tajai haise pikhai-e. Patu masan mide chiujiu dinpad rabo naise singku khuga majang wangrabo-e,
khatdi singku siniu patu rijiky lenlam majang meng lujiu patu phuirabo-e. Parase wimide chiusai,
charachengga masanbo thingna nia khatdi singbom singpek, chalangriang kahengbo khatdi maram tangdi jaojiu thinwangra singkuniu chamtan khai rabo-e.
Sigasu singgiu gasu thuaklubo tadui bambo taniang kuangga thingna situ kamshat khaira singkuniu chamtan pikhai rabo-e.
Paniu thingna khatse khoilujiu singbom singpek, chalangriang kahengbo, khatdi maram tang jaojiu thingna kamshat khaimibo tadui gase sum khairabo-e.

Ka-nphenbo ra marabo gasu kam masan rabo papao riga tazaise khoilujiu kajinkhai lon chinnia khai rabo-e, sigasu patu masan mide chiujiu paniu dinpad rabo-e. Paniu ringbambo thingna situ malin khaijiu luzamga majong khai mirabo-e.

Sibo piuse pafai-pani katha masanjiu papee thamdi gotmi rabo-e, khatdi nkhiu mirabo-e. Sichiujiu charachengga pah masan mirabo-e. Pah rijikyga ngutsui mide, chiudi paniu pagu Mathenky lenlam jeng chinnia bamrabo-e.

Jeng chinniabo naise papeetham pa-ntanggiu, pamik tunggiu khatdi papumga bambo pagiu hina paniu gotlan rabo-e; pafai-pani kathami rabo-e, khatdi nkhiumi rabo-e, sigasu charachengga pah masanmi rabo-e.

Jeng tachadbo naise milychipoi nia, milyliu poi takum khat tangmibo pajam-para habo khat, khatdi takisa jaobo takhuimoi taju sum, khatdi takisa madatlah jansumgu damkhat jaojiu paniu phungwang rabo-e.
Singku siniu sibo maitu majang lujiu
Sigasu singku siniu milychipoi khat nai takisa madatlah njan sumgu damkhat khoilujiu pipad lanbogu kadpat rabo-e. Singku leng

Paniu milychipoi halujiu rukhaibo kadpat khatdi nuan gu kadpatbo khaoringtu kamshat khaibo masanbo bamga kamshat khairabo-e, paniu haise kamsiak rabo-e. Palamra chapaw ruilanbogu kadpat haise, nuan jengniu kadpatbo panai nchambo-e, sise singkugu rabo-e, palamra haise masanchang masanbo-e.

Singku siniu milypoi zai kasia khoilujiu patu masan mide chiujiu dinpad rabo piugu kuonnam majadlam, paben jungpui majadlam, khatdi patu masan mide chiujiu dinpad rabo piugu majad phigu jungpuiga manuk khairabo-e.
Singku siniu takisa bung thinlujiu, tamnakha pabendi mawilam runkhai lujiu,
paben majadlam jungtonniu sum lujiu,
Paniu pabendiga bambo wasa kasia, khatdi mily zai kasia khoilujiu patu masan mide chiujiu dinpad rabo piugu kuonnam majadlam, khatdi majadlam ben jungpui ga, khatdi paphi jungpuiga manukkhai rabo-e.
Paniu paben ga masiabo wasase sibo piu piga runkhai rabo-e. Haichiubo thak gasu charachengga kam masan lanbo tiense kamrabo-e.
Sigasu singku siniu characheng gasu kam masanbo tien thiujiu nuan gu kadpatbose kadpat rabo-e. Sichiulubo saiga, paniu chakhaose rukhaibo kadpatleng kam rabo-e.
khatdi rathakbamga alin-tara kadpatbo jaojiu kadpat rabo-e. Haichiubo thakga singku siniu charachengga kam masanbo tien kadpad rabo-e, khatdi sibo maise charachengga masan mirabo-e.
Sibo piuse kalek sajiu haikumbo kadngam laksai, paniu patu kam masan raleng pipad lanbogu kadpatbo thiujiu milypoi khat ronna, singku leng
Paniu makhao nia maksai kaphina nia chiujiu khatniu nuan gu kadpatleng khatniu rukhaibo kadpatleng phungwang rabo-e.
Patu kam masanbo naigu jeng tachadbo nai paniu haise singku khuga Mathenky ngutbo bamga phungmeng rabo-e.
Singku siniu mily nai takisa khoilujiu singkuleng
Paniu milyse kamshat lujiu tazai kasia khoilujiu sibo piugu kuonnam majadlam, paben majadgu jungpuiga, paphi jungpuiga gadi manukkhai rabo-e.
Singku siniu paben mawi bendiga wasa runkhai lujiu,
niu bambo bamga paben majadgu njungniu sumlujiu kajinlon chinnia khairabo-e.
Paniu tazaise kambo kumjiu wasa siniu: sibo piugu kuonnam majadlam, paben majadlam jungpuiga, khatdi paphi majadlam jungpuiga khairabo-e.
Paben ndiga masiak bambo wasase paniu sibopiu piriga khairabo-e khatdi haichiujiu kam masanbo ngamse kamrabo-e.
Sigasu paniu makhao maksai kaphina khat khoilujiu nuan gu
kadpat thiujiu kadpat rabo-e khatdi kakilam sira alin-tara kadpatbo jaojiu rukhaibo kadpat kammi rabo-e. Haichiubo thakga singku siniu kam masanbo guse kamrabo-e.
Haibo cheng-jaise ka-nphenbo ra mara mainiu kam masan lurabo leng-e, haichiujiu mai khatniu panuan jengniu kam masan rabo-e.
chakyga kamee-mang padsai tadrabo tajaidung pikhaide. (Haise Israel maidungniu paliugu thiuraleng

Singku siniu kamee-mang wonbotu phuisu raga chakyga bambo mania hina lupadmi raleng chamtan pirabo-e; sichiu maksai chakyga kabambo wania hinase masan makge chiujiu dinpad mirabo-e. Sigasu paniu chakyga tadlujiu
kamee-mang wonbotu phuirabo-e. Siga pazamse padjiu singbengga madiakbo maksai kahengbo padbam niusai,
paniu chakyga npadlujiu jeng chinnia nai khamten manmi rabo-e.
Jeng chinniabo nai paniu malan wangjiu phuilan rabo-e. Kamee-mang wonbose pajam dipad misai,
kamee-mang wonbo tudungse luthonmi raleng chamtan pirabo-e, khatdi namdi lenlam taniabo bamga thonkhai mirabo-e.
Sibosai paniu singbeng makad khaibo khatdi manuk khai nbambo hinase luthon padjiu namdi lenlam taniabo bamga thonkhai mirabo-e.
Sigasu khoipad mibo tatukang gase kasanbo tudung siniu khai malin rabo-e, khatdi kasanbo thinlujiu singbengse manuksin lanmi rabo-e.
Tatu kaladthon kamibo sai sibo kyga kamee-mang padlan sai chakyse got masan lujiu kasan manuk khai lan rabo-e,
singku siniu tadlujiu sise phuirabo-e. Sise pajam dipad lansai, chakyse masanta mibo-e.
Sise rathonmi rabo-e, sibogu tatu, tasing, manuk khai nbambo hinase namdi lenlam ponpadjiu masan makbo bamga thon khai mirabo-e.
Sikumbo ky khamten khaijiu bambo wan-ga mai khatniu ngutsai pase chawan katangbo masanmak rabo-e.
Sikumbo kyga mai khatniu jikhai maksai katiu tiukhai sai pafai-pani katha mirabo-e.

Chiudi singku siniu phuira wangbo wan-ga, chaky manuk kasan lanlubo sai kamee-mang padlan maksai, chakyse charachengga masan mide chiujiu paniu dinpad rabo-e, palamra kamee-mangse pakhiangna hakam mibo-e.
Chaky kam masan raleng, paniu nthingna nia, singbom singpek, chalangriang kahengbo, khatdi maramtang thinrabo-e.
Masanbo singgiudui khaibo taniang kuangga nthingna khatse kamshat khairabo-e.
