Sigasu, paniu singbom singpek, maramtang, chalangriang kahengbo khatdi ringbambo nthingnase thinlujiu tadui kam masanbogu thiujiu kamshat khaibo nthingna zaiga sumrabo-e. Khatdi paniu chakyga kajinkhai lon chinnia khai rabo-e.
Haichiubo thakga paniu chakyse nthingna zai, tadui kam masanbo, karingbo thingna, singbom singpek, maramtang khatdi chalangriang kahengbo thinjiu kam masan rabo-e.

Sigasu paniu karingbo nthingnase namdi lenlam khoipad lujiu luzamga majong khaijiu lentaron khaimi rabo-e. Haichiubo thakga paniu chakyse characheng gasu kam masan khai rabo-e, sichiujiu chakyse charachengga masan mirabo-e.
Haibo guse ka-nphenbo ra marabo,
masakbo, athiu padbo, maksai chami ruchopbo khatdi chafai-tani ga kamee-mang wonbo maksai chakyga kamimang wonbo lamgu tacheng-tajai si-e.
Haibogu tajaise wania khat masan tamiboga khatdi sise masan miboga thinrabo-e.
Israel maidung leng pikhai-e. Npiumai khatniu pakajitdui padbo wan-ga,
pakajitdui pad bamdi, maksai sise khammi bamtadi masanta mibo-e.
Paniu jikhai mibo maksai ntao khai mibo zise masanta mibo-e.
Mai khatniu sibo zise niakhai misai
makdi sibo piuniu ntao khaibo bamga ntaokhai misai, pafai-pani kathami rabo-e khatdi nkhiumi rabo-e, sigasu chawan katang pase masanta mibo-e.
Mai khatniu luangpad bambo piutu niakhai misai pafai-pani kathami rabo-e khatdi nkhiurabo-e, pase chawan katangbo masan makjiu bamrabo-e.

Sikumbo mainiu mai khat gen ga tatai masiupad niakhai misai charachengga pase masan bamme. chiudi sibo piuse pafai-pani kathami rabo-e, khatdi nkhiumi rabo-e, sichiujiu pahai chawan katangbo masan makjiu bamrabo-e.
Padui padbo mainiu chabamga maksai wakhat riga ntao khai misai masanta mibo-e.

Sibopiu siniu niakhai kamibo hinase chawan katangbo masan makrabo-e. Sinapiuniu ntao khai mibo mania kaphungmai sira pafai-pani kathajiu taduidi nkhiumi rabo-e, pase chawan katangbo masan makjiu bamrabo-e.
Mai khatniu padui pad lujiu paben khiumi makjiu mai khattu niakhai misai, sibo maise pafai-pani kathajiu nkhiu siakmi rabo-e, khatdi pase chawan katangbo masan makjiu bamrabo-e.
Paniu niakhai mibo taniang lise kampang mirabo-e, khatdi tasing kuong paniu niakhai kamibose khiumi rabo-e.
Mai khatse luangpad mibo gasu masan lubo sai, pah jeng chinnia nai khuanrabo-e, khatdi sigasu pafai-pani kathajiu tadui kawibo siniu papum khiumi rabo-e. Sichiujiu pase charachengga masanmi rabo-e.
Patachadbo nai paniu makhao nia maksai kaphina nia thinjiu
Singku siniu khatse ponlujiu nuan gu kadpat, khat siniu rukhaibo kadpat thiujiu kadpat rabo-e. Haichiu kambo gasu patuse characheng gasu kam masanbogu kamkhai rabo-e.
Maipiu khatniu pakajitdui padbo wan-ga, paniu papum pakhiangna nkhiu rabo-e, chiudi pase chawan katangbo masanmak rabo-e.
Pakajitduise chafai-taniga, maksai chamiginiu kambo maniaga jaokhai misai sise kathami rabo-e, khatdi chawan katangbo sise masan makjiu bamrabo-e.
Npiumai nai npuimai siniu nphiu jilubo saiga panai khangnia tadui nkhiumi rabo-e, khatdi panai khangniase chawan katang masan makjiu bamrabo-e.
Npuimainiu khaophun phungbo wan-ga, pase jeng chinnia leng masan makjiu bamrabo-e. Mai khatniu patu niamisai pase chawan katang masanmak rabo-e.
Paniu khaophun phungbo tingga ntaokhai mibo maksai jikhai mibo maniase masanta mirabo-e.
Mai khatniu pazi maksai paniu ntao khaibo bam niakhai misai pase pafai-pani kathajiu tadui nkhiumi rabo-e, khatdi chawan katangbo pase masan makjiu bamrabo-e.

Khaophun phungbo puitu npiumai khatniu pumkhat thiujiu nphiuji misai, npuimai masan makbo jengniu npiu mai situ kam tania mibo-e. Siniu pase jeng chinnia nai masan makjiu bamrabo-e, khatdi paniu kajibo zi sidi masanta mibo-e.
Npuimai khatniu chahiugu tadbo kenjiu tazai tadmisai paniu masuang tadkinbo suang nkiujiu tadmisai, chahiugu tazai tadbo kumjiu, tazai tadbam then pahai masanta mibo-e.
Haibo wan-ga paniu jibo tazi khatdi ntaobo bam hinase masanta mibo-e.
Mai khatniu sise niakhai misai pase masan tamibo-e, khatdi pafai-pani kathajiu tadui nkhiu mirabo-e; pase chawan katang masan makjiu bamrabo-e.
Pagu luangpadbose saomibo sai, pah jeng chinnia khonkhang rabo-e, sigasu pase charachengga masanmi rabo-e.
Patachadbo naise paniu makhao nia maksai kaphina nia thinlujiu
Singku siniu khatse nuan gu kadpat leng, khat siniu rukhaibo kadpatleng chiujiu kadpat khai rabo-e, haichiubo thakga patu charachengga kam masan rabo-e.
Haise npiumai khatniu pakajitdui padbo maksai padui luangpadbo, khatdi,
npuimai khatniu khaophun phungbo lamga maksai npiumai khatniu charachengga papum masan makbo puitu nphiujibo lamgu tajaisi-e.
Aaron nah npiumai khangnianiu masan makbo mi

Paniu din-e, “Nasingnapiu Aaron niu pawan kabuiboga Masan Thubo Bam jusungfai saiga pah ngutra dinbilo, palamra Ladriat Bung gom riga bambo kamuang jiuga I bambo-e. Paniu kadin piumaksai, patu kamshat mirabo-e.
Paniu rukhaibo kadpat leng midangchi khatdi nuan gu kadpat leng matomchi hawang lubo saiga Masan Thubo Bamga ngutbo sui-e.”
Sigasu
Israel mainiu rukhaibo kadpat leng midangchi khat, khatdi nuan gu kadpat leng kamichi nia, Aaron khuga pikhai rabo-e.
Paniu pakigu khatdi pagu nuan luthonra matomchi khat charathiujiu kadpat rabo-e.
Sigasu
Siga tatukang nia, khatniu “
leng taden thonboga kadalubo mise Aaron niu charathiu khai rabo-e khatdi nuan gu kadpat thiujiu kadpat rabo-e.
Azazel leng kadalubo mi sira maringjiu
Aaron niu pakileng khatdi pa-nuan gu kadpatbo thiujiu matomchi thinlujiu charathiubo wan-ga.
paniu mitikang tao bansatbo khanglise rathakbam gasu khoilujiu khatdi parim wibo wamudse tajum nia khailujiu Masan Thubo Bamga sise thinngut rabo-e.
niu bambo gase paniu parim wibo guse chamiga rukhairabo-e, sichiujiu paniu kawibogu mikha siniu Ladriat Bung situ baikhai rabo-e sichiusai paniu sise ngaolakge khatdi shailakge.
Paniu matomchi zaise khoilujiu pah njung sumlujiu Ladriat Bungga kajinkhai lon chinnia khatdi sibo pagom masuang gadi kajinkhai rabo-e.

Haichiubo thakga paliu mathiu nuan khatdi Israel maidung masan makbo gasu Masan Thubo Bamtu characheng gasu kam masanbo guse kamkhai rabo-e. Paniu haise Mathenky gase kamrabo-e, palamra sise rijibam n-gangga bambo-e, sise charachengga masanta mibo-e.

Aaron niu characheng gasu kam masanbogu kamra Masan Thubo Bamga ngutbo wan-gasu npadlan makthen, mai khat nadi Mathenkiga bambo suimakge. Paniu pakileng, paleng khatdi mathiuleng charachengga kamkhai lubo saiga,
paniu rukhaibo kadpatleng rathak bamlam tadpatjiu sise kam masan rabo-e. Paniu matomzai kasia khatdi kami-zai tamnakha khoilujiu rathakbam gu kariopadbo pake hinaga kajin khairabo-e.
Pah njung siniu tazai sumlujiu rathak bamga kajin khai lon chinnia rabo-e. Haichiu kamkhaibo gasu Israel maigu nuan khiu masanjiu sise kam masan khairabo-e.
Masan Thubo Bamga

Paniu paben niase kamipee kaba lujiu kasabo nuan hina khatdi Israel maigu n-gi-athaobo nuan hinase siga din madupad khai rabo-e, sichiujiu sibo hina kami peega thonpad khairabo-e. Sigasu kami situ mai khatniu kathaidihga hapadjiu majong khaimi rabo-e.
Kami siniu paliugu nuan hina phunglujiu mai khatdi lungmakbo dihga tadmi rabo-e.
Paniu masanbo bamga nkhiu lujiu pagu, faini khailan rabo-e. Sichiu lubo saiga, paniu tadpat lujiu pagu nuan khatdi maidunggu nuan luthonra rukhaibo rathakse kadpat rabo-e.
Nuan gu kadpat leng chakhao sase rathakbam riga rukhai rabo-e.
Kami situ kathaidih lam Azazel leng majong khai mibo piu sidi paniu rijibam lam malanwang makbo masuangga pafai-pani katha lujiu tadui nkhiumi rabo-e.
Nuan leng kadpatbo matomchi khatdi kami zaise luthonra Masan Thubo Bamga thinwang rabo-e, sichiujiu rijibam lenlam thinmeng lujiu rumi rabo-e. Pagi, pajan, khatdi palungjan hina rumi rabo-e.
Sise karubo paose rijibam malanwang lan makbo masuangga pafai-pani kathajiu tadui nkhiumi rabo-e.
Sibo naise characheng kamjiu paliutu paliugu nuan hina gasu kam masan rabo-e, sichiujiu paliuse charachengga masan mirabo-e.
Sibo naise masanchang-masanbo tingmik rabo-e, sibo naise mai khat nadi changam kammakjiu kalum rirabo-e. Haibogu tadrabo jaise wangrabo pawan hinaga mania rabo-e.
Singku Kadibo, charangam kamraleng changam pimasan kamibo khatdi papiutu malinra kadpadjiu kam masan mibo mainiu charachengga kam masanbogu tiense kamrabo-e. Paniu singku pon khailujiu,
Masan Thubo Bam,
Haichiu tadrabo jaise wangrabo chaken hinaga mania rabo-e. Haibogu charachengse Israel maidungtu paliugu nuan hinaga kam masan raleng takum khatga kamgui rabo-e.
Sichiujiu
Israel maidung, Aaron khatdi panahpiudungtu pikhai raleng Mose khuga chamtan pikhai-e.
Israel mai khatniu
Haibo chamtan gu ramba sira Israel maidungniu nkan hangga chakhao kamshat kinbose tuhoira
Singku siniu Mathenky tadngutbo bam rathakbam pake machang tazaise kajinkhai rabo-e khatdi pasase rujiu parim siniu
Israel maidungniu luzamga chara singmeng khuga chara thiujiu chakhao kamshatjiu,
Israel mai maksai sangdiumai namlungga lungbambo mainiu rukhaibo kadpat maksai kakibo charathiubo kadpatbose
leng chiujiu Mathenky tadngutbo bamga makjiu kakibo bamga kadkhai misai Tingwang mai ruangga patu chakkhai tami rabo-e.
Khaoring hinagu ringtingse tazaiga bambo-e, haichiubo jengniu rathakbamga tazai majao khaibo gasu maidunggu nuan luthon rabo-e chiujiu
Haijengniu Israel mai maksai paliu ruangga lung bammai sangdiumai khatnadi chamiga tazai bamjiu tiumak raleng paliu khuga dinkhaibo-e.
Israel mai maksai namga lungbambo sangdiumai khatniu charachengga masanbo wakhao maksai nthingna kamlu sai, paniu pazaise kadihga majaokhai rabo-e, khatdi sise taniang phesim mirabo-e.
Karingbo khao hina ringtingse pazaiga bambo-e, haijeng gasu Israel maidungtu chamiga tazai bamthen tiumak raleng dinkhaibo-e, khatdi mai khatniu sikumbo kamsai pamaileng lukhai tami rabo-e.

Mai khatniu Israel mai maksai sangdiumai, paniu wakhao paronna kashaibo maksai kakibo wakhaoniu kamshat mibo jan tiumi sai pafai-pani kathajiu tadui nkhiumi rabo-e, sichiujiu pah charachengga masan raleng chawan katangbo khuanrabo-e.
Paniu sichiujiu kammak sai, sibo sung pah chariusiak rabo-e.
“I hai naliu
Naliuniu pawan khat lungkhai mibo Egypt maidungniu, maksai Iniu tuhoi naliutu puiwang kinbo Canaan ramga bambo maidungniu kambo situ majai makrabo-e.
Agu tacheng-tajaidung khatdi Iniu chamtan khaibose majai rabo-e. I hai naliu
Iniu pikhaibo lunlung nai tacheng-tajaidung saisuilo; haichiu kambo pen gasu naliu ringtingse ranlune. I hai
Pahangga bambo tajaidungse
Napuitu nphiujibo gasu napiutu kam mangam khai tulo. Nangniu napui siaktu pijiu, kam mangam khai makrabo-e.
Napiugu kakibo naodung khat tudi nphiujibo gasu napiutu kam mangam mane.
Natanpui maksai napuinabo nahpuidungtu, nangnai kikhun khat gasu lung macham khangma lungcham khangmakma nphiuji tulo.
Natah puitu nphiuji tulo, siseniu nakhuga mangambo wangrabo-e.
Nasingna maksai napuitingna nahpuitu nphiuji tulo; padi natanpui-e.
Nanaitu nphiuji tulo, pahai napiu singna bamdi sui, maksai napui singna bamdi sui-e.
Napao naotu nphiuji tulo; pah haidi, nanai-e.
Namupuitu nphiuji tulo;
maksai nasingna naotu nphiuji tulo.
Nangniu nphiuji mibo nahpuitu maksai patahpuitu nphiuji tulo; paliu hai nakiriang thiubamdi sui-e, sichiujiu siseniu nariang-naruigu kamaobo thiurabo-e.
Nanao ringbam then, pasingnapuitu nanao leng thiujiu lutulo.
Mai naotu nphiuji tulo; siseniu natu charachengga kam taniami rabo-e.
Molech ratu kahumboga thinpiura nanah khattudi pikhai tulo, palamra siseniu
Npiumai khatniu npiumai khattu majang nphiuji makrabo-e; Tingwang niu sisetu mareng-e.
Npiumai khatniu maksai npuimai khatniu khaoruitu maluang nphiuji makrabo-e; sichiu kam kadad khaibo siniu characheng saisuijiu naliutu kam tania mibo-e.
Haikumbo tienkam gasu pijiu naliutu kam taniami tulo, palamra haichiujiu charatu simak mai, naliu masuangga lungkhai mibo charameng kahum maidung situ
Paliugu tienkam jengniu paliu ramtu kam tania mibo-e, khatdi haijengniu

Paliuniu haikumbo matai marengbo ngamse kamme sichiujiu paliu dihtu kam tania mi-e, siniu naliura sikumbose kammak rabo-e. Naliu mathiu, Israel mai maksai naliuniu lung aruangjiu bambo sangdiu maidung bamdi,
sichiusai naliu masuangga lungkhai mibo charatu simak maidungtu paliugu kadihniu luthon mibo kumjiu, naliu kadihniu naliutu luthon lakge.
Haichiujiu mangambo ngam kambo maitu,
Israel mai khuga dinkhai bira
“Masan lulo, palamra naliu Rawang,
Naliu mai hina papui papiutu chakhuang thiulo, khatdi Iniu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, Tabamnaise majai rabo-e. I hai naliu Rawang,
“Chakin thiubogu pipad leng naliuniu khaorui kamshatbo tingga, Iniu naliu khuga pikhai mibo tajaidungse piulo, sichiusai Iniu sibo pipadse lukhaine.
Chakhao kamshatbo nai maksai pasaibo nai sibo mise tiukammi rabo-e.
Malibo mi hinase pasumbo nai rumi rabo-e, palamra sise characheng saisuijiu tania mibo-e, khatdi mai khatniu sise tiusai, kadpatbo maniase Iniu lukhai lakge.
Aleng kadpat mibo maniase pangtiu tiumaise kamaobo kam mibo-e siniu patuse amaidung ruangga chakkhai tami rabo-e.
Naliuniu kam mangai mibo mumsyse maksai kaomibo mumsyse khom maduira naliugu mumsy rengga menglan mane; sise kaleksamai nai sangdiumaileng khaidiak milo. I hai naliu
Nangniu nagu ladriat majaira machun maksai, chamtan gasu ladriat thiulu mane; siseniu chamtan ga kasabo phungwang-e. I hai naliu
Pakuon tidmaitu siang mane maksai pamik tiat maitu paphi masuijiu nkhuangra pamasuangga wakhat khai mane. Atu pinglo; I hai naliu
Mai khat lamgadi aratjiu dinron mane, khatdi mai khatniu paringting leng ladjan bamga, wangboga nagu jengdin siniu patu nkhalura bamsai dinkhai bilo. I hai
Chakhum ruitulo maksai patu marengjut mitulo, chiudi nangniu naronna natu lungsabo kumjiu nakiningmaitu lungsalo. I hai

“Kavangpuise mai khat gu parammai liupui-e chiubo simisai khatdi pamanse pimi makjiu patuse kavang thiubo gasu phutmi makboga, kakibo mai khatniu patu majanglujiu nphiuji sai, panaitu sajai pirabo-e chiudi kamshat makrabo-e, palamra pahai kavang khatle.
Sibopiu siniu midangchi khat pagu majonlanbo pipad thiujiu Iniu bambo Mathenky rengmun gase phungwang rabo-e,
khatdi singku siniu sise thinlujiu sibo piugu nuan luthonbo charachenggu masanbo tiense thiukhai rabo-e, sichiusai Tingwang niu patuse kuakkhai rabo-e.

“Naliuniu Canaan dihga wangbo tingga khatdi charasy bang khat somkhaibo tingga, raithubo takum sum haise characheng saisuijiu taniabo-e chiujiu lurabo-e. Sibo kak lungga naliuniu charasyse tiumak rabo-e.
Pamadaibo kumga charasy pakhiangnase
Chiudi pamangiubo kumra sibo rasyse naliuniu tiubo sui-e. Naliuniu haichiu kamsai, naliugu charasibangse pasy kengjiu masirabo-e. I hai naliu
Napee-juokse kakipthon mimane maksai na-ntanggiuse karup mane,
maksai naronna najam-nara kamkhai mane maksai kashai maileng kap achungjiu napi got mane. I hai
Tabamnai situ manialulo, khatdi atu kahumbo bamsitu chakhuang thiulo. I hai
“Katingmaidungtu chakhuang charao thiulo. Pingbo jaojiu agu kadin piulo; I hai

Paliutu naliu Israel mai karai khuga kamrabo kumjiu kamlo, khatdi naliu ronna naliutu lungsabo kumjiu paliutu lungsalo. Naliudi pawan khatga Egypt dihga sangdiumai thiukhai mibo-e chiubo maningtaolo. I hai naliu Rawang,
Chalung nchangbo madadbung, masanbo taju, khatdi masanbo madadse thinlo. I hai naliu Rawang,
Agu tacheng-tajaidung khatdi chamtandungse majailo, I hai
Israel maidung khuga dinkhai bira
“Naliu ruangga mai khatniu maksai naliu ruangga lungjiu bambo sanglun khatniu Molech ratu kahumboga thinpiura panahtu pipadsai, patuse nammai mathiuniu tatuniu rotshatmi rabo-e.
Mai khatniu panah khattu Molech khuga pikhaijiu agu masanbo Mathenky kam taniajiu khatdi chamtan masanbotu kam masasai, Iniu patuse atung rabo-e, khatdi patu amaileng chakkhai tami rabo-e.
Chiudi paniu tenkhai mibo situ nammainiu wajeng simakjiu khatdi patuse kamshat mak tasai,
I apumsiakniu patu khatdi pakikhun maitu atung rabo-e sichiujiu akhuga chamchang makjiu Molech tu kahum mibo pakhiangnatu atung rabo-e. Iniu paliutu amaidung leng chakkhai tami rabo-e.
“Kashai maigu hiunatu npaobo maidung khuga ladti khairaleng mai khatniu tadsai, Iniu patu atung rabo-e khatdi patuse amaileng chakkhai tamine.
Naliu ronna masanjiu bamlulo, palamra I hai naliu Rawang
Agu tacheng-tajaidungse majai lulo palamra I hai
Mai khatniu papiu naodung khattu nphiuji misai papiu zan kam masa mibo-e, siniu patudi npuimai tudi khangnia situ kamshat mirabo-e. Panaise panai shitgu parip phungrabo-e.
Mai khatniu pamupuitu majang nphiuji misai, panai khangnia situ kamshat mirabo-e. Panainiu panai riangrui kam maha mibo-e khatdi panainiu panai shitgu parip phungrabo-e.
Npiumai khatniu katambo npiumai khattu majangjiu nphiuji sai, panainiu kamangambo guse kam mibo-e, sichiujiu panai khangnia situ kamshat mirabo-e. Panainiu panai shitgu parip phungrabo-e.
Mai khatniu papui-panahtu panaoleng kusai, paliu khangsumtu rushat mirabo-e, palamra paliuniu kamangambo guse kamkhai mibo-e; haikumbose naliu ruangga pijiu kammak rabo-e.
Mai khatniu khaonatu wonsai, patudi sibo khaonatudi kamshat mirabo-e.
Npuimai khatniu wakhao khattu nphiujira kamsai patudi wakhao situdi kamshat mirabo-e. Paliu hai paliu shitgu parip phungrabo-e.
Mai khatniu npuimai khattu pagu khaophun phungbo tingga nphiuji sai, panai khangnia situ nam gasu hathon mirabo-e; palamra panainiu charachengga taniabogu tajaise kampang mibo-e.
Mai khatniu papao naotu majang nphiuji misai, paniu papao zan kam masa mibo-e, khatdi panai khangnia siniu kamaobo damse phungrabo-e; panai khangniase panai nah-pon thiulakge.
Mai khatniu pasai kariupiu naotu panaoleng kusai, panai hai panai nah-pon thiumakjiu shairabo-e. Paniu charachenggu taniabo kammide khatdi pasai kariupiu zu kam masa mibo-e.
Siga lungbammai cheng majai tulo. Siga lung bambo maidungtu Iniu hathon khai bine, chiusai naliuniu sibo kadihga ngutrabo-e. Paliuniu kasabo ngam hina kambo jengniu atu sita mibo-e.
Chiudi Iniu haibo kawibo nai patam bambo kadihse naliugu thiura ladriat thiukhai mibo-e. I hai naliu Rawang

Haichiubo gasu, khaorui nai khaona kakga characheng saisuijiu masanbo nai masan makbo npekbose naliuniu madulen rabo-e. Masan makbo khaorui khaonase tiumane. Iniu paliutu tania-e chiujiu dinmadu khai mide, khatdi sise tiubo gasu naliutu kam tania khairabo-e.
Naliuse masan rabo-e khatdi amai ronna thiurabo-e, palamra I hai
“Shaimi maigu hiunatu npaobo piu maksai npaobo pui tura tatuniu rotshat mirabo-e; haise kambo maira paronna pashit gu parip phungrabo-e.”
“Singku khatniu, papui, papiu, panahpiu, panahpui, pasingna,
maksai pakyga chami thiumakjiu lungbambo patanpui makjiu, pagu singna maidung shaibo tingga, kashai baibo tien ga jaobo gasu paronna patu characheng saisuijiu kam tania mak rabo-e.
Tanao-tanah thiubo gasu, chariang charui thiubo mai shaibo gasu paronna patu kam tania mak rabo-e.
Pahai masan rabo-e khatdi chamtantu kam masamak rabo-e. Paniu katiu kasakdung akhuga pipadbo-e, siniu pahai masansiak rabo-e.
Singku khatniu papum jonbo puitu maksai liuchang thiumakbo puitu maksai mainiu tamibo puitu panaoleng kumak rabo-e, para masanbo-e.
Singku maira masanbo-e chiubo maidungniu lukhai rabo-e, palamra paniu katiu kasak aleng kadpatbo-e, I hai
Singku nahpui khatniu chakhapui thiusai, paniu papiu zu kam masa mibo-e; patuse rushatmi rabo-e.

“Dibo Singku piga manuk khaibo wasa runkhai mibo-e khatdi singkugu chapuan-tania piura kadpat masan khai mibo-e, haijengniu paniu kap nchungbo lenjiu papee tamai makjiu, maksai pafai-pani phet mak rabo-e.

Patu hai kadpat khai mibo-e khatdi paronna patu pijiu characheng saisuijiu paniu kashai maiky lungga ngutjiu kashai maise, papui papiu thiubam tadi agu masanbo Mathenky situ phutlujiu kam tania mak rabo-e.
Paniu liuchang puitu panaoleng lurabo-e.
Kamipui tu maksai mainiu tamibo puitu maksai papum jonbo puitu makjiu, liuchangpui khattu panaoleng lurabo-e. Pakiriang siak gasu liuchang puitu ronna paniu panaoleng kurabo-e.
Sichiu maksai, panahdung, masanbuibo maidungse, characheng saisuijiu taniami rabo-e. I hai
Aaron khuga dinkhaira
“Nakai-nakik mai khatniudi paphi-paben kasa-kason mainiu aleng katiu-kasak kadpatbo suilakge haise wangkinbo chaken hina leng-e.
Paphi-paben kasa-kason mai khatniudi wa kadpadmak rabo-e. Pamik tiatbo, paphi tangbo, mailun luimakbo maksai machang makbo mai khatniudi;
paphi paben kasamai khatniudi
maksai pakhao kasamai khatdi mikliang taimai khatniudi, maksai masakbo ra taobo mai, khatdi papum kamshat mibo mai khatniudi kambo suilakge.
Aaron kaikikmai paphi-paben kasa-kason mai khatniudi aleng katiu-kasak pipadbo suimakge.
Haikum mai khatniu aleng katiu pipatbo tatek, masanbo tatek pipadbose tiubo sui-e,

chiudi palam khatniu papumga kasa-kason bambo jengniu paniu masanbo jusungfai mungga wang manamak rabo-e maksai rathakbamga wang manamak rabo-e. Paniu haibo masanbo maniatu kam taniamak rabo-e, palamra I hai
Haise, Aaron nahpiudung khuga khatdi Israel maidung khuga Mose niu dinkhai mibo-e.
Aaron nai panahpiudung khuga dinkhai bira
“Naliuniu chamtan masanbo ga kamangambo phungwang mak rabo-e, haijengniu Israel maidungniu aleng kadpatbo masanbo maniadungse chakhuang thiujiu lurabo-e. I hai

Naliu kai-kik ruanggasu mai khatniu characheng saisuijiu masan makjiu bambo ga, Israel maidungniu aleng kadpatbo masanbo mania mungga wangsai, paniu wadaodi rathak bamga machalan ngamlakge. Haise wangrabo chaken hinaga tadjiu bamraleng-e. I hai

“Aaron kai-kik khatniu tadi nphenbo-ra taobo maksai pa-kajitdui kapadmai siniu tadi patu characheng saisuijiu kam masan makthen masanbo kadpatbo maniase tiumak rabo-e. Singku khatniu kashaimai pum khattu adaobo gasu maksai mai khatniu pa-kajitdui padbo maitu,
maksai taniabo khaorui-khaona maksai chamaitu adao khaisai pase tania mibo-e.
Singku khatniu tania misai chawan tangbo tania bamrabo-e, khatdi tadui nkhiulu makthenna masanbo kadpatbo maniase tiumak rabo-e.
Naimik ngutmibo sailam pahai masan mibo-e, khatdi sigasu masanbo kadpatbo mania, paniu tiurabo tiutekse tiubo sui-e.
Charum shaibo khao maksai nkan khaoniu kamshatbo khao janse paniu tiumak rabo-e; siseniu patu kam taniami rabo-e. I hai
“Iniu pikhai mibo tajaidungse singku hinaniu majai rabo-e. Sichiu maksai, paliu hai maojiu shairabo-e, palamra paliuniu masanbo tajaidungse piumakge. I hai
“Masanbo kadpatbo maniase singku kikhundung ronna tiurabo-e; sise mai khat niudi singku khuga lungbambo khatniu tadi maksai paniu lankhaijiu bammai tadi tiumak rabo-e.
Chiudi singku khatniu pagu rangkangniu liulubo vang maksai paky gasu manapadbo maira katiu kasakse tiubo sui-e.
Singku nahpui khatniu singku makbo kyga chami thiumisai paniu masanbo kadpatbo maniase tiumak rabo-e.

Chiudi kamipui maksai mainiu tamibo nahpui panah lungmakbo pui khatdi papiu kyga lungra malan wangjiu papiu khuga mangiu khaijiu bambo pui siniu, papiu singku khatniu daolubo tiutekse tiubo sui-e. Haikumbo tiutekse singku khatgu kikhun maidung ronna tiubo sui-e.
“Singku kikhun makbo mai khatniu simakjiu masanbo kadpatbo maniase tiumisai, paniu sise macham gapbose khatdi sibo riga sikumbo dam kai khatgu dam makai thiujiu singku khuga pilan rabo-e.
Singkudungniu masanbo kadpatbo maniase matai kamarengbo thak kam khaijiu
tiubui makbo maitu pitiu khaibo gasu kamaobo phungwangsai, sikumbo mai riga sajai phungwang rabo-e. I hai
Pahangga raokhaibo tachengdung hai Aaron nai panahpiudung khatdi Israel mai mathiu khuga dinkhaira

Israel mai khatniu maksai Israel mai ruangga lungjiu bambo sanglun khatniu ladriat khaibotu pijiu wangtang khaibo, maksai chunwigu thiujiu kadpatbose rujiu kadpatbo khaoruise jamra makboniu kam rabo-e.
Lukhai rabose, pajam-para habo pachi khatniu thiurabo-e.
Naliuniu jamrabo khaorui pipadsai, sise
Mai khatniu chakin thiubogu kadpatbo thiujiu
Pamik tiatbo maksai paphi paben tangbo maksai ajam mibo maksai thiu alaijiu bambo maksai pagi chopjiu bambo maksai masakbo khaorui-khaona hai
Chunwijiu pipatbo ga, wadaodi thinpiu matai makbo maksai jamra makbo khaorui pipadbo sui-e, chiudi haise nangniu ladriat thiu khaibo gura makge.
Patakha niakpet mibo, rommibo, maksai kam ajam mibo, kampang kamkek mibo wakhao
Sangdiumai khugasu daolubo khaorui khatnadi katiu kasak kadpatbo thiujiu pipat mane. Haikumbo khaoruidung tura chakhan-chara bammibo leng chakkhai rabo-e khatdi lukhai makge.
Matompoi khat maksai milypoi khat maksai kamipoi khat piangbo tingga, sise papui khugasu jeng chinnia lungga juphek mimak rabo-e, chiudi sibo sailamra katiu kasak kadpatbo thiujiu lukhaibo sui-e.
Matompui nai papoi tamanjiu maksai mily nai papoi tamanjiu maksai kamipui nai papoi tamanjiu tingmik khatga rathakgu thiujiu kadkhai mane.
Naliuniu
Sibo tingmik siakga katiuse tiukam milo, pasaibo nai nsuan tangbo wakhatdi masiak mane.
Azan masanbo ga kamangambo phungwang mane. I hai
sichiujiu I naliu Rawang thiura naliutu Egypt gasu puipadbo-e. I hai
characheng tadbogu khuang-ngee leng thiujiu, Israel maidungniu kahumra wang maduibo tingga thinpiura pikhai bide.

Naliu ngam kamra, naliuleng jeng charuk bamme, chiudi jeng chinniabo nai Tabamnaise, mathakbo tingmik-e. Sibo tingmikga changam kam mane, chiudi kahum raleng wang maduilo. Naliuniu wakhat khatga lungbam liudi, Tabamnai sira
Pahangga bambo chakhuang changee-dungse dakkhai mibo wan-e, haise din madukhai bilo.
Jengriu-je-mangiukiu naise chakhi jaomakbo taruak ngeese sumilo; khatdi jeng chinnia lungga naliuniu chakhi jaobo taruakse tiumak rabo-e.
Haibo tingmik-dunggu raithubo naise kahumra naliu wang maduilo khatdi naliugu naimachang tenkinbo ngamse wakhatdi kam mane.
Jeng chinnia lungga naliu gu katiu kasak kadpatbose
niu naliuleng pirabo kadihga naliuniu wangbo tingga khatdi naliuniu naliugu atiatbo tingga, raithubo miubuise singku khuga pikhailo.
Paniu sise
Miusy kadpatbose naliuniu pikhaibo tingmikga, pajam-parah habo takum khat tangmibo milypoi khatdi rukhaijiu kadpatbo thiujiu pipad rabo-e.
Sise jaojiu takhui taju nia takisa nai tabotbose tiutek pipadbo thiujiu pikhai rabo-e. Haichiu pipadbo rimse

Miusy kasanbose magi tadi, rumi tadi, maksai taruak thiujiu khuakmi tadi, haise naliuniu Tingwang khuga phungwangjiu katpad makthen tiumak rabo-e. Haibo tajaidungse wangkinbo wan hinaga naliu kai-kikdungniu majai rabo-e.
Jeng ringiubo nai chiubora nidkak chinniabo Tabamnaise miusy kasanbo
Kikhun hinaniu taruak khuang nia thinwangjiu nkiubo kalen thiujiu
Khatdi taruakse jaojiu nammaidungniu takum khat tangmibo milypoi chinnia, matomchi khat, sigasu midangchi nia phungwang rabo-e, haidungse wakhatdi jamra makbo rabo-e. Haidungse
Nuan gu pipadbo thiujiu midangchi khat sigasu takum nia tangmibo milypoi nia, chakin thiubogu thiujiu pipadlo.
Singku siniu taruak nai milypoi niase
Sibo nai naliugu naimachang ngamse wakhatdi kam mane, chiudi kahumrabo leng wang maduilo. Naliu kai-kikdungniu, wangkinbo wan hinaga paliuniu kalung lungbo bamga haibo tajaidungse majai rabo-e.
Chahiu chinniabo gu raithubo tingmik gase nkiubo mathak tingmik khat thiujiu manialo, khatdi make mudbo tingga kahum raleng wang maduilo.
leng pipadbose tiutek pikhailo khatdi naliugu naimachang kamkinbo ngamse wakhatdi kam mane.
Sibo naise changam kam mane, palamra nuan luthonra charathiubo tingmikge.
Sibo nai wa katiubo mai khatse Tingwang mai khatle chiubo chakkhai tami rabo-e.
Khatdi mai khatniu sibo nai changam kamsai,
Haibogu tajaidungse naliu kai-kik pakhiangna paliuniu kalung lungbo bamga majai rabo-e.
Chahiugu jeng chakiubo nai naimik ngutmibo gasu jengriubo nai naimik ngutbo tangbo nkiubo mathakbo tingmik thiujiu manialo, haibo kak lungga wakhatdi tiumak rabo-e.
Haibo tingmikdunggu raithuboga kahum raleng wang madui rabo-e. Khatdi naliuniu naimachang kamkinbo ngamse wakhatdi kammak rabo-e.

Jeng chinniase naimachang naliuniu tiutek kadpat rabo-e. patachadbo naise kahum raleng wang madui lanlo khatdi tiutek kadpatbose pipadlo. Haibo tingmikse kahum rabo nai-e, khatdi naliuniu wakhatdi kammak rabo-e.
(Haidungse characheng tadbo khuang ngeedung thiujiu maidungniu kahumra wang maduijiu
Haibo khuang-ngeedungse naliugu Tabamnai riga khai sanbo-e, khatdi haibo kadpatdungse naliuniu naliugu chunwigu thiujiu

Naliuniu naliu-lu atiatbo tingga, chahiu chinniagu jengriu-je-mangiukiubo nai gasu sujiu jeng chinnia-ling haibo ngeese changi rabo-e. Raithubo tingmik naise mathakbo gu nkiubo tingmik khat thiu rabo-e.
Sibo naise naliugu charasibang gasu withubo rasyse railujiu, kadan kedung khatdi panui wibo kedungse thinlujiu naliu Rawang,
Jeng chinnia changi wanglo. Haibo tajaidungse naliu kai-kikdung siniu wangkinbo wan hinaga majai rabo-e.
Israel maidung pakhiangnase nbaikyga jeng chinnia nbai rabo-e,
chiusai Israel maidungtu
Haichiubo npui gasu
Pahangga raokhaibo chamtandung haise Israel maidung khuga pikhaira,
“Mathenkiga bambo chamibung lengse withubo khatdi masanbo takisa phungwanglo, sichiujiu chamibungse saomakjiu matao bamlo.
Chawan machang Aaron niu chamibung hinase matao khai rabo-e. Khatdi pasaibo nai nsuan tangbo, Masan Thubo Bamga, Chamriat Bung masuangga, ndanbo jusungfai bambo,
Masanbo kachiagu chamibung dungriga bambo chamibung hinase Aaron niu akhijiu khatdi sibo mibung hinase
niu bambo bamga, masanbo kachianiu tomkhaibo chakhuangkai riga, taruak khuangse, paren nia thiujiu paren khatga khuang charuk-ruk hamkhailo.
Taruak khaibo bamga,
Wangkinbo wan machangna, Tabamnai machang,
Taruakse Aaron nai pakai-kikdung gu-e, khatdi sise paliuniu masanbo bamga tiurabo-e, palamra haise

Pawan khatga mai khat, papuiniu Egypt mai, sigasu papiuniu, Dan kiphiu gasu, Dibri nahpui, Shelomith kubo, Israel mai-e. Sibo rijiky lungga haibopiu siniu Israel mai khattu n-gijiu, paniu Tingwang tu siangbo jengniu, paliuniu Mose khuga patuse puiwangjiu,
patu pijiu pakmi makra akhemai ben ga khailujiu, patuse dekam ralo chiubo

“Sibo piu situ rijiky gasu puipadlo. Paniu siangbose chiulubo mai hinaniu sibo piuse mao-e chiubo jengdin thiujiu, paliu mai hina bense sibo piu piriga kabakhai rabo-e, sigasu nammai mathiuniu patuse tatuniu rotshatmi rabo-e.
Israel mai khatniu maksai sangdiumai Israel mai ruangga lungjiu bambo mainiu tadi
siangbo maitura nammai mathiu aruang lujiu tatuniu rotshatmi rabo-e.
khatdi mai khatniu maigu khaorui kamshat misai pasung pimalin rabo-e. Palamra ringting khatniu ringting khatsung chiubo si-e.
“Mai khatniu mai khattu kam ajam misai, paniu kamkhai mibo hinase pakhuga kamkhai rabo-e.

Paniu chara khat kamtang misai, para khat kamtang rabo-e; paniu maimik kamtiat misai, pamik khatlamse kamtiat mirabo-e; paniu pahiu khat kamtang misai, pahiu khat kamtang mirabo-e. Paniu mai khattu kam ajam khaimibo hinase, pakhuga kamkhai rabo-e.
Mai khatniu khaorui khat kamshat misai pasung majon rabo-e, chiudi maitu gibo maitura kamshatmi rabo-e.
Haibo tajaise naliu mathiuniu Israel mai tadi sigasu naliu ruangga lungjiu bambo sanglunniu tadi thinkam rabo-e, palamra I hai naliu Rawang,
Mose niu haise Israel maidung khuga dinkhaiboga, paliuniu sibo piu situ rijiky lenlam puipad lujiu tatuniu rotshat mide. Haichiujiu Israel maidungniu Mose khuga
pahangga bambo tajaidungse Israel maidung khuga pikhaira chamtan pikhaide.
Naliuniu naliu lugase chalin khailo, naliugu mumsy rengse mathanlo, sichiujiu takum charuk miusy khom maduilo.
Chiudi pachinniabo kumra charam mathak khaibo takum,
Chalin khaimakjiu pakhen thiujiu puakkhangbo miusy atiat mane, sigasu naliuniu mathan makbo mumsireng gasu masibo mumsy se khom madui mane; haise charam mathak khaibo takumme.
Sibo kumga charamse tenmak tadi, naliuleng, naliu vangdung, naliuniu lankhaibo maidung khatdi. naliu nai lung aruangjiu bambo sanglundung, naliuniu makuatjiu bambo khaorui-khaonadung
khatdi naliugu luzamga bambo nkan khaoringdung leng katiu pikhaijiu bamrabo-e. Siga puakpad-padbo hinase tiubo sui-e.
Takum chinniase chaklon chinnialo, pakhiangna takum atai-je-chakiu-e.
Chiusai, chahiu chinniagu jengriu naise, Nchuk Thoibo Tingmik thiujiu, mai khattu langkhaijiu kadih pabam hinaga make mudkhai rabo-e.

Haichiubo jaigasu naliuniu haibo ringiubo kumse lupad tamsin rabo khatdi sibo ramlungga kalungbo mai hinaga khenrang thiubose dinron rabo-e. Haibo takum lungga masuang jonmibo mania pakhiangnase papao khuga maksai pakai pakikdung khuga pimalan khai kammi rabo-e, sigasu mai khattu kavangleng jonkhai misai pakikhunmai lam pijiu malan wangmi rabo-e.
Naliuniu naliu luga chalin khai mak rabo-e, maksai paronna puakkhangbo miusy atiat mak rabo-e, maksai naliuniu mathan makbo mumsy reng gasu masibo mumsyse khom madui mak rabo-e.
Takumling naliuleng masanbo thiurabo-e; naliu luzam gasu paronna padbo ronna tiurabo-e.
Masuang jonmibo mania pakhiangna haibo takum lungga papao khuga malan khaimi rabo-e.
Haichiujiu naliuniu naliu kadihse naliu Israel mai karai khuga jonkhaiboga maksai pakhu gasu liuboga, masan makbo kam tulo.
Sibo manse Kalankhai rabo Takum lungga padrabo miusy saisuijiu chakkhai rabo-e.
Siga takum keng bamsai, pamanse kengrabo-e, chiudi takumse tammi sai pamanse tarabo-e, palamra jonkhai mibo ramgasu pad kangambo miusy saisui rabo-e.
Israel mai karai sontulo, sichiujiu naliu Rawang
Kadih gasu miusy se padne, khatdi naliuniu tiunibo pakhiangnase bamlune sigasu amanjiu lung lune.
Chiudi mai khangsianiu luzamga chalin khaimakjiu sigasu miusy khatnadi khom madui makbo, takum chinnia lungga degu tiuralo chiujiu maniu sune.
Takum pacharukbo gase

Naliuniu naliugu luzamga tachadbo kumga maruk khaiboga alinse, naliuniu takum charuk lungga atiat lubose tiujiu bamrabo-e, khatdi chakiubo kumga lingkhaibo miusyse atiatmak then naliuniu tiubuibo bamlu rabo-e.
Naliu kadihse tingthengleng thiujiu jonmak rabo-e, palamra sise naliugu makge, sise Tingwang gu-e, khatdi naliu hai sangdiu maidung kumjiu sise thinpiura suikhaibo-e.
Kadihse jonbo tingga, papaoniu liulan rabo majise sirabo-e.
Israel mai khatniu kaleksa mijiu sigasu pagu kadihse jonra padmisai, pagu nathubo pasingnaniu sise liu malan rabo-e.
Sise liu malan rabo pasingna habo mai khat niura pah pasai kalekwimi tadi sui-e sichiujiu paronna liulanra pakhuga kabuibo wangdi sui-e.
Haikumbo lamgara sibo kadih liulubo piu khuga pasai paniu Malan Khairabo Takum wang makhabo kakgu chaklujiu, khat-khat tadi pagu kadihse lulanboga rangkangse pirabo-e.
Chiudi paniu kadihse liulanra pakhuga kabuibo rangkangse ha-e sai pasai Malan khairabo Takum wangtang makthen liulu mibo piu ben-ga bam rabo-e.
Mai khatniu kareng bambo namdi khat lungga chaky khat jonsai, jonmibo jengtung gasu sibo takum lungga raithubo thiujiu liulan rabo majise bamme.

Chiudi paniu sibo kum lungga liulanlu maksai, liulan rabo majise pakhuga hami rabo-e. Sigasu chakyse liulubo piu nai pakai-pakikgu tingthengjiu thiumi rabo-e; Sise Malan Khaibo Takumga kalan khai lak mide.
Chiudi kareng habo nam lung gara chalu kumjiu kamrabo-e; paphibang gasu papao thiubo siniu liu malan rabogu majise bamme, khatdi sise Malan Khaibo Takumga kalankhai rabo-e.
Sichiudi, Levi mailengra paliuleng pikhai mibo namdi lungga paliugu maniase paliuniu luni-nibo wan ga liu malan rabogu majise bamme.

Levi kimai khatniu namdi lungga chaky khat jonmi sai, khatdi liumalan lumak misai, sise Malan Khaibo Takumga malan khai rabo-e, palamra Levi kymainiu chakygu papao thiubambose paliugu namdi lungga bamjiu Israel maidung ruangga paliugu tingthenggu mania thiujiu bambo-e.
Chiudi Levi kiriang maigu namdi wonjengga khaonadungtu pijiu tagi khaibo ram sira wadaodi jonmak rabo-e; sise tingthengjiu paliugu mania thiu rabo-e.
Pakhuga paton pana wakhatdi lura kam mane, chiudi Tingwang kadin piujiu sigasu Israel mai nah karaitu pijiu namungga lunglulo,
Naliuniu pakhuga apuk khai mibo rangkang leng paton pana pakhuga lutulo khatdi naliuniu pakhuga jonkhai mibo katiu kasak leng paton daora kam mane.
Haise naliu Rawang thiura khatdi naliutu Canaan kadih pikhai raleng Egypt gasu naliutu majang npadbo, naliu
Naliu khuga naliuniu lankhaijiu bambo mai khat kumjiu paniu bamrabo-e, sigasu Malan Khaibo Takum wangtang makthen naliutu machajiu bamrabo-e.
Sibo wan-ga patu khatdi panahmainiu naliutu phut khailujiu sigasu pakikhunmai leng khatdi papao papeh maigu maniaga malan wangmi rabo-e.
Israel maidungra
Paliutu kam masa khai mane, chiudi naliu
Naliuleng kavangmai pageng bamsai naliu wonjengga lungjiu bambo jat gasu liululo.
Naliu ruangga lungjiu bambo sanglun nahdungtu naliuniu liu sui-e. Naliu ramga mana khaibo nahdungse naliugu mania thiuwangbo sui-e.
Sigasu naliuniu, paliutu naliu nahpiudunggu lekkhoi thiujiu paliuniu ringbam thenna machajiu bamra phutkhai bibo sui-e. Chiudi naliu Israel mai karai tura kam masa mak rabo-e.
Dinchampanjiu, Israel mai khatniu kaleksa kiujiu bamboga naliu ruangga lungbambo sangdiumai khatniu kalekwi khangjiu sibopiu khuga maksai pakikhunmai khat khuga patu paronna kavang leng jonkhai mide.
Patu jonkhai mibo sai, patuse liulanra pamajise bamkha-e. Pagu singnadung ruangga mai khatniu,
maksai papaoniu maksai patahniu maksai patu manabo pakai pariang khatniu patuse liu malanbo sui-e; maksai paniu tasen-chalan kabuibo phiulusai, pah paronna pagu khenrangtu liu malanbo sui-e.

Patu liulubo mai khuga paniu npao rabo-e, sigasu patu jonmibo wan-gasu pasai Malan Khaibo Takum wangtang makthen panainiu takum chak rabo-e khatdi patu phutkhai rabo manse chaphijeng leng lankhaibo mai khattu pibo phijeng gasu phuilujiu chapkhai rabo-e.
Bamkhabo takum riak saisuijiu patu liulubo manse paniu pikhai lan rabo-e,
patuse takum khatgu thiujiu lankhaibo kumgapjiu, malankhai rabo-e. Pawangpiuniu patuse kam masamak rabo-e.
Patuse haikumbo jai gasu patudi, panahmai tudi pasai Malan Khaibo Takumga phutkhai rabo-e.
Israel mai khattu pijiu tingthenggu kavangthiu khaimak rabo-e, palamra Israel maidungse
Characheng gu chakhuang-changee hina haise majailo, khatdi Atu kahumbo bamtu chakhuang thiulo. I hai
naliu kadihse miusy kengjiu padra khatdi singbang dungse pasy masira, Iniu tingdui pawan siakga langkiu khaibi rabo-e.

Naliugu miusydungse mali malanjiu wangbo jengniu, mumsy rairabo wan wangmiboga miusydungse atiatjiu bamkha rabo-e, sigasu naliuniu mumsy sidi, miusy lingbo wan-ga raijiu bamrabo-e. Naliuniu tiunibo pakhiangnase naliu khuga bamrabo-e, sichiujiu naliuniu naliu kadihga amanjiu lungrabo-e.

Iniu naliu ramga agi-manaibo pikhai bine khatdi naliuniu mai khangkhat tudi pingbo thiumakjiu jikiu lune. Iniu naliu kadih gase kasabo tathiu-chakhao dungtu hathon khai bine, haichiujiu siga tathiu-chari wakhatdi bamta mirabo-e.
Naliuniu naliugu mikre maidungtu chari ngam rabo-e;
naliu khang mangiuniu chamai kai khattu ngam lune, sigasu chamai kai khatniu chamai sang kariutu ngam lune.
Iniu naliutu thoikhaine sigasu naliu nahdung kengkha pikhai bine; Iniu naliu khuga ladriat thiukhai mibose Iniu majaikhai rabo-e.
Naliugu atiatse kengchang kengbo jengniu takum khat bamwang rabo leng buirabo-e, khatdi kasanbo miusy khaira leng kaguangbo miusy masiak bambose ponthonmi rabo-e.
Iniu naliu ruangga agu masanbo Mathenkiga lungne, naliu khugasu I wadaodi tadmi lakge.
I naliu khuga bamne; Iniu naliu Rawang thiune, khatdi naliuniu amaidung thiune.
I hai naliu
Naliu niu agu tacheng-tajaitu khatdi agu chamtandungtu piuni maksai khatdi naliu khuga chamriat thiukhai mibose kampang misai,

Iniu naliutu sajai pirabo-e. Iniu naliu riga kapingbo wingam lulakbo rapot khatdi kakhunra siniu naliu mik kamtiat khai rabo-e khatdi naliu ringting kam maha mira pikhai rabo-e. Naliuniu naliugu chalinse maruk khaine, chiudi sise naliuleng wa kawibo thiulakge, palamra naliugu mikre maidungniu naliutu chari ngam mine, khatdi naliuniu lingkhai mibose tiulu rabo-e.

Iniu naliutu suini makjiu atung rabo-e, chiusai naliutu kamkao khai rabo-e, khatdi naliutu marengbo maidungniu naliu riga mawang rabo-e; naliutu haichiujiu kam nping khaijiu mai khatniudi hamakbo tingga naliu ronna npingjiu pakrabo-e.
“Haikumbo hina padbam tadi naliuniu akadin piumak palun jutjiu bamsai, naliutu sajai pijiu bambo riga lon chinnia pi nkiukhang rabo-e.
Naliu lung tanjiu chaliangbo situ Iniu kampang khai rabo-e; siga tingriu khai lakge, sichiujiu naliu kadihse sangmi rabo-e, khatdi sise chagi kumjiu tanmi rabo-e.
Naliuniu maranjiu kambo pakhiangna siniu naliuleng kawibo wadi thiulakge, palamra naliu kadihga miusy padlakge khatdi singbang dungse parasy masi lakge.
“Naliuniu atu suimak jutjiu, akadin piumak bamsai, naliutu pibo sajaise, Iniu lon chinnia thiujiu nkiukhang khai rabo-e.

Naliu ruangga kapingbo tathiu-chakhaodung Iniu langkhaine, sigasu paliuniu naliu nahmaitu kamshatmi rabo-e, khatdi naliugu matom- kabui dungtu kam mahami rabo-e, sichiujiu naliu mai poinakha ronna masiak khaijiu naliugu puidise ramjing thiumi rabo-e.
“Haikumbo sajai pakhiangna sailamdi naliuniu aladtu nking khailan makjiu, chiudi madulangjiu atu suimak jutjiu bamsai,
siga Iniu naliu riga karaibo sajai suang tan nkiu lon chinniabo pikhai rabo-e.

Aliugu chamriat kampangbo jengniu naliutu sajai pira Iniu naliu riga chari piwangne, naliuniu naliugu namdi lungga ringlura wang maduisai, naliu riga wingam lulakbo rapotse Iniu langwang rabo-e, sichiujiu naliutu pijiu naliugu mikre maidung khuga madunsun raleng kamkhai rabo-e.

Naliugu tiutek pikhaijiu bambose Iniu kam mahami rabo-e, chiusai maipuidung khang kariuniu paliu khuga bambo taruak pakhiangnase khuak raleng n-mangbam khat nakha ronna pageng bammi rabo-e. Paliugu kaden khaibo tiutekse hami rabo-e, khatdi naliu khuga bambo pakhiangnase tiuloi midi; naliu won mariujiu bamrabo-e.
“Haibo hina sailamdi naliuniu atu madulangjiu suimak jutjiu khatdi akadin piumak lansai,
siga alung pomjiu naliu riga sajaise karaibo suang sa nkiubose Iniu pilon chinnia rabo-e.
Naliu won mariuju kami jengniu naliu ronna naliu nahmaitu tiusu rabo-e.

Luongbut riga bambo naliugu kahumbo bamdungse Iniu kam mahami rabo-e, naliugu maruta rukhaibo rathak bamdungse rathonmi rabo-e, khatdi naliugu kashaibo phawtu ponlujiu naliugu kaomibo charameng riga thonkhai rabo-e.
Iniu alungpom lenjiu, naliugu namdidungse kam nchummi rabo-e, naliugu kahumbo bamdungse kam mahami rabo-e khatdi naliuniu charathiu khaibose Iniu lukhai lakge.
Naliu kadihse haichiujiu kam maha kammi rabo-e chiusai siga lung khamjiu bambo naliugu mikre maidungniu naliugu kam maha miboga paliu suang harabo-e.
Naliu riga Iniu chari phungwang khaine sigasu naliutu sangdiumai dihlam pijiu lung marenkhai rabo-e. Naliu ramse pijiu ramjing thiukhaine, sigasu naliugu namdidungse nchummi rabo-e.
Sigasu kadihse mathak bambo takum thiujiu aman bammi rabo-e, sise naliuniu pikhaibo makge, saokhai mibo-e khatdi naliugu mikremai dihga naliuniu kavang thiu bambo wan-ga sise mathak bammi rabo-e.

“Naliutu kavangleng mintad bambo tingga, naliuniu bambo gase Iniu kapingbo pikhaijiu tingkai niu hun malaibo singniw khuan katang tu naliu pingjiu pakrabo-e. Tathiu-chari bamga naliutu habo kumgapjiu naliu paksu rabo-e. Siga naliugu mikremai khatnadi naliu mungga hawang makdi naliu kaokiu rabo-e.
Mai khatnadi naliutu hamakbo tingga naliu khatniu khat riga naliu phi masui rabo-e, sigasu naliuniu naliugu mikremai khattudi asun ngam lulak rabo-e.
Naliu kavang thiujiu bambo lungga shaijiu, naliugu mikre maidunggu kadihniu naliutu kajuanglu rabo-e.
Naliugu mikre maigu kadihga naliu shaibangbo maidung poinase naliugu nuan jengniu khatdi naliu paopeh nuan jengniu lung mahami rabo-e.
“Chiudi naliu kaikik dungniu paliu nuan jengniu khatdi paliu pao-peh dungniu atu suimakjiu chari thiubo jengniu,

haichiujiu Iniu paliutu suimakra kam khaibo khatdi paliugu mikremai kadihga kavangleng langkhaibo jengniu paliu paopeh mai nuan madu padne. Sichiujiu kanamboga paliutu sajai pikhaibo, paliu nuan jengniu manon kiubo gasu,
Iniu Jacob khuga, Isaac khuga, khatdi Abraham khuga, agu ladriat thiukhai mibose maningtao khaine, khatdi kadihse amaidung khuga pikhaira Iniu agu ladriat kamsan lanrabo-e.
Raithuboga, sibo, kadih gasu maidungtu lupad mirabo-e, chiusai sise wijiu mathak lune, khatdi paliuniu agu tacheng-tajai nai chamtandung lukhai makbo jengniu sajai daosiak rabo-e.

Chiudi paliuniu paliu mikre maidunggu kadihga bamkhabo lon, Iniu paliutu phutkhai kammi lakge maksai paliutu kam maha kammi lakge. Siseniu paliu khuga agu chamriat thiukhaibose kaloibo thiurabo-e, khatdi I hai paliu
Iniu paliu
Haibo tacheng-tajaidung nai chamtandung hinase Israel maileng
Israel maidung leng pahangga raokhaibo tajaidung hai
Mai khatniu
Chiujiu sibo wan-ga tadbo chakamkygu pariat saisuijiu:
--Npiumai, takum makai gasu takum riakcharuk lungga: Rangkang 50
--Npuimai katingmai: Rangkang 30
--Akhangmai, takum mangiu gasu makai lungga: Rangkang 20
--Npuimai chabonmai: Rangkang 10
--Npiumai nahdung, takum mangiu hanglam: Rangkang 5
--Npuimai nahdung: Rangkang 3
--Npiumai takum riakcharuk nrilam: Rangkang 15
--Npuimai takum riakcharuk nrilam: Rangkang 10

Ladriat thiulubo maise pibuibo manse pira, pase kalek sachang sasai, paniu sibo piutu singku khuga puiwang rabo-e, sigasu singku siniu nkhinbo man ga, sibo piuniu pingam lubuibo saisuijiu chapkhai rabo-e.
Ladriat siniu khaona lamga dinkhaisai sise
sigasu ladriat thiulubo mai hainiu sibo khaoleng kakibo khaona niu malin makdi sui-e. Paniu sise kamsai, khaona niase
Chiudi ladriatse characheng saisuijiu taniabo khaona,
Singku siniu sibo manleng, kawi kasagu pawat saisuijiu dakkhai rabo-e. Khatdi sibo manse kaloibo thiurabo-e.
Sibo piuniu liumalan ni-e sai, paman rigasu kai khatga makai khaisanjiu pirabo-e.
Mai khatniu paky hai
Chaky kadkhaibopiu siniu liu malan nisai, paman rigasu kai khatga makai paniu khaisanjiu pirabo-e.
Mai khatniu pagu kadih pabam khat
Paniu kadihse Malan Khaibo Takum saigap kadpatsai, paman pakhiangnase lurabo-e.
Paniu sibo sailam kadpatsai, pasai Malan Khaibo Takum bamkhaga, takum riak saisuijiu singkuniu rangkanggu parip chaklujiu khatdi nkhinbo man-ga dakkhai rabo-e.
Chalu kadpat mibo mai siniu liu malan nisai, paman rigase kai khatga makai khaisanjiu pirabo-e.
Paniu chaluse
Pasai Malan Khaibo Takum ga chaluse tingtheng
Mai khatse paniu liulubo luse
sibogu kabuibo manse Malan Khaibo Takum wangtang makbo lungga takum riak saisuijiu, singkuniu chaklujiu, khatdi sibo manse liurabo piuniu sibo naisiak pamanse pimi rabo-e; rangkangse
Malan Khaibo Takumga chaluse papao khuga maksai pakai pakikdung khuga malankhai rabo-e.
Paman pakhiangnase pawan ga tadbo lunlung saisuijiu dakkhai rabo-e.
Piangrai thubo khaona hai

chiudi masan makbo khaorui-khaonagu piangrai thubose tadjiu bambo kabuibo man pijiu khatdi sibo rigase kai khatga makai khaisanjiu liu malanbo sui-e. Sise liu malan lumak misai, sise mai kakimai khuga kabuibo man ga jonmibo sui-e.
Kadpadmak daolakjiu kadpat mibo chamai khattudi liu malanbo suimakge; patuse kamshat siak mirabo-e.
Mai khatniu sise liu malan ni-e sai, kabuibo man rigase kai khatga makai khaisan lujiu pirabo-e.
Chaky gu khaorui kariu hinagu khat khatse
Papao niu khaoruidung ruangga kasabo khaonatu kadara suimak rabo-e, sigasu paniu khat khatsung malinbose kam mak rabo-e. Paniu khaona khatsung kakibo khaona khattu pijiu malinbo kam sai, khaona niase
Haibo chamtandungse
“Aaron nanainiu Israel maidungtu paliugu kiriang nai kikhundung saisuijiu npiumai mairiak chaklo.
Npiumai hina riak, takum makai maksai sisuang tingmimai charimai tien thiubui maitu chaklulo.
Chaphiu hinagu kiriang khat-khat gu papee thiubo mai khat-khat pijiu natu nkhara dinlulo.”
Npiumaidung haise, paliugu kiphiudunggu jupaodung, haibo tienleng param maidung ruanggasu kadapad mibo maidung-e:
Reuben
Shedeur nahpiu Elizur
Simeon
Zurishaddai nahpiu Shelumiel
Judah
Amminadab nahpiu Nahshon
Issachar
Zuar nahpiu Nethanel
Zebulun
Helon nahpiu Eliab
Ephraim
Ammihud nahpiu Elishama
Manasseh
Pedahzur nahpiu Gamaliel
Benjamin
Gideoni nahpiu Abidan
Dan
Ammishaddai nahpiu Ahiezer
Asher
Okhran nahpiu Pagiel
Gad
Deuel nahpiu Eliashaph
Naphtali
Enan nahpiu Ahira
Haibo mai khang kariuje niakiu gu nkha gasu Mose nai Aaron niu,
panai maidungtu niabo hiuga raithubo nai kumadui lujiu khatdi chakiriang nai kikhun saisuijiu paliu riak raokhaide. Takum makai maksai makai suang tingmibo npiumai hina zanse,
gu chamtan saisuijiu raolude khatdi chaklude. Sinai gu kathaidih lungga Mose niu maidung riak raolude.

Takum makai maksai makaisuang tingmibo npiumai charimai tienleng buimi maidungtu paliu zanse chakiriang nai kikhun saisuijiu, Jacob nahpiu tingthubo Reuben gasu sujiu raokhaide. Pakhiangna riak siniu:
Reuben
Simeon
Gad
Judah
Issachar
Zebulun
Ephraim
Manasseh
Benjamin
Dan
Asher
Naphtali
Pakhiangna:
Levi mai tura paliu phiu ruangga raokhai makge,
palamra
“Nangniu charimai tienleng npiu maidung kabuibo maidungtu paliu riak chakboga, Levi kiphiu tura jaokhai mane.

Sibo sung Levi mai tura Iniu bambo Mathenky nai sibogu mania pakhiangnase phuira pikhai bilo. Paliuniu sibo maniadungse ponlujiu, sibo lungga machajiu bamrabo-e khatdi paliugu rijikyse sibo wonjengga thiurabo-e.
Naliuniu naliu rijiky kalibo tingga, Levi mainiu Mathenkyse rakiu lujiu khatdi Mathenky kasan thiurabo bamgase thiukhai lanrabo-e. Mathenky mungga wangmai tura kamshat mirabo-e.
Kakibo Israel maira paliu rijiky hai paphom-phom saisuijiu, mai hina pagu pagu rupmai saisuijiu khatdi parupgu jupao hangga bambo saisuijiu thiurabo-e.

Chiudi Levi kiphiu maira paliu rijikyse agu Mathenky situ akhera, sibo wonjengga thiurabo-e, chiusai mai khangkhat nadi sibo mungga wang manajiu khatdi alungpom kamkhaijiu Israel maitu kam kabuak mak raleng-e.
Sichiujiu
Israel mainiu paliu rijiky thiubo tingga, mai hina pagu-gu njan gu jupao khatdi paky rianggu pengfai saisuijiu lungrabo-e. Rijikyse Mathenky wonjeng pakhiangna thiu magui rabo-e.
Judah njan gu jupao hangga bammaidungniu, paliugu rup lungga bambo paliugu jupaodung saisuijiu, tingbanglam paliu rijiky thiukhaijiu lungrabo-e:
Judah
Amminadab nahpiu Nahshon
Issachar
Zuar nahpiu Nethanel
Zebulun
Helon nahpiu Eliab
Pakhiangna:
Judah njan-gu rup hainiu tadraithu rabo-e.
Reuben njan gu jupao hangga bammaidung siniu, paliugu rup lungga, pahangga bambo paliugu jupaodung saisuijiu, paliu rijiky thiukhaijiu lungrabo-e:
Reuben
Sheduer nahpiu Elizur
Simeon
Zurishaddai nahpiu Shelumiel
Gad
Deuel nahpiu Eliasaph
Pakhiangna:
Reuben njanniu niaboga tadrabo-e.

Sigasu, karaibo njan kania kakga khatdi kanambo kania kakga, Levi mainiu Mathenkyse ponlujiu tadrabo-e. Pa-njan hinaniu karai kana thiujiu paliuniu kalungbo rijiky saisuijiu, mai hina pagu jupao hangga bamlujiu tadrabo-e.
Ephraim njan gu jupao hangga bammaidung siniu, paliugu rup lungga, pahangga bambo paliugu jupaodung saisuijiu, tingnulam, paliu rijiky thiukhaijiu lungrabo-e:
Ephraim
Ammihud nahpiu Elishama
Manasseh
Pedahzur nahpiu Gamaliel
Benjamin
Gideoni nahpiu Abidan
Pakhiangna:
Ephraim gu njanniu pasumboga tadrabo-e.
Dan njan gu jupao hangga bammaidungniu paliugu rup lungga, pahangga bambo paliugu jupaodung saisuijiu, paliu rijiky thiukhaijiu lungrabo-e:
Dan
Ammishaddai nahpiu Ahiezer
Asher
Ochran nahpiu Pagiel
Naphtali
Enan nahpiu Ahira
Pakhiangna:
Dan gu njanniu kanam thuboga tadrabo-e.
Israel maidung riakniu paphom-paphomgu pa-njandung saisuijiu pakhiangna 603,550 ye.
niu Mose khuga chamtan khaibo saisuijiu Levi mai tura Israel mai riak raobo ruangga jaokhai makge.
Haichiujiu Israel maidungniu Mose khuga
Haise Mose nai Aaron kikhunmai,
Aaron nahpiudung khang madai bamme: Tingthubo piuniu Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar khatdi Ithamar paliu-e.
Paliutu wasa manuk khaide khatdi singkudung thiurabo ngam pikhaide.
Chiudi Nadab nai Abihu tura panainiu Sinai gu kathaidih lungga masan makbo
“Levi mai kiphiutu suanglam puipad lujiu khatdi Aaron singkugu kavang maidung kumjiu lukhai milo.
Iniu bambo agu Mathenky leng pageng bambose paliuniu kamrabo-e khatdi singkumai leng khatdi nammai mathiuleng tatien thiurabo-e.
Paliuniu Mathenkygu mania pakhiangnatu phuirabo-e khatdi paliuniu kakibo Israel maileng thiukhai rabo-e.
Levi maigu ngiudonse Aaron nai panahpiudungtu machabo ronna-e.
Naliuniu Aaron nai panahpiudungtu paliugu singku tiense kamra lukhai rabo-e; haibo tiense mai khat kumboniu tenra matansai patuse kamshat mirabo-e.”

Tuhoira Levi maise amai thiumide, Iniu Egypt maigu nahraipiu pakhiangnatu kamshatbo tingga, Iniu Israel maigu kikhun hinagu tingthubo nahpiudungtu khatdi piangrai thubo khaoring hinatu agu thiumira kadakhai mibo-e. Tuhoira Israel maigu nahraipiudungniu agu thiubo sung, Iniu Levi maitu lukhai-e; paliu hai agu thiumide. I hai
Sinai Ramjingga
Levi maitu chakiriang khatdi kikhundung saisuijiu, chahiu khat maksai sisuang tingbo npiumai hinatu, chak raleng Mose khuga chamtan pikhaide.
Siga Mose niu sikum gapjiu kamde.

Levi niu npiumai nah khangsum lung-e: Gershon, Kohath khatdi Merari. Paliura paliu kiriang paopeh maidung zan thenmai-e. Gershon niu npiumai nah khangnia lung-e: Libni nai Shimei; Kohath niu npiumai nah khang madai lung-e: Amram, Izhar, Hebron khatdi Uzziel; sigasu Merari niu npiumai nah khangnia lung-e: Mahli nai Mushi. Paliura paliu kikhundunggu paopeh maidung zan thenmai-e.
Gershon kiriang hai Libni nai Shimei kikhun kanianiu thiubo-e.
Chahiu khat maksai sisuang tingmibo npiumai riak chaklubo pakhiangna siniu 7,500 ye.
Haibo kiriang hainiu Lael nahpiu Eliasaph haise paliu kirianggu papee thiujiu tingnulam Mathenky sailam paliugu rijiky thiukhaibo-e.
Paliuniu Mathenkygu, palung lamgu top, lenlam top, ladzankygu ngutrabo bamgu jusungfai,
Mathenky magui lungga bambo ladjankygu rathakbam gu jusungfai khatdi ladjankyga ngutrabogu jusungfai hinagu parid phungrabo-e. Haibo lamga kamra thiurabo tien hinase paliuniu paridse phungrabo-e.
Kohath kiriangse Amram, Izhar, Hebron, khatdi Uzziel kikhundungniu thiubo-e.
Chahiu khat maksai sisuang tingmibo npiumai riak chaklubo siniu pakhiangna 8,600 ye.
Haibo kiriang mai Uzziel nahpiu Elizaphan niu paliu gu papee thiujiu Mathenkygu tingrunlam paliugu rijiky thiukhai rabo-e.

Paliuniu Chamriat Bung leng wakai, chamibungdung, rathakbam, masanbo bamga singkudungniu thin piubo chakuang chapiang khatdi Masan Thubo Bamga ngutrabogu jusungfai hinagu paridse phungrabo-e. Haibo lamga tatien thiurabo hinaga paliuniu paridse phungrabo-e.
Levi maigu papee siniu singku Aaron nahpiu Eliazer hai-e. Paniu Masan Thubo Bam lungga tatien thiurabo maidunggu paridse phungrabo-e.
Merari kiriang hai Mahli nai Mushi kikhundungniu thiubo-e.
Chahiu khat maksai sisuang tingmibo npiumai riak chaklubo siniu pakhiangna 6,200 ye.
Haibo kiriang mainiu Abihail nahpiu Zuriel tu paliu kiriang maigu papee thiujiu, Mathenkygu tingpilam paliugu rijiky thiukhai rabo-e.
Paliuniu Mathenkygu kibeng, kachum, katiang, kajen khatdi mania pakhiangnase khairabogu parid phungrabo-e. Paliuniu haibo tienleng pageng bambo hinase kamrabo-e.
Paliuniu ladjanky lenlamgu, katiang, kachum, kare khatdi chariang hinaleng parid phungrabo-e.

Mose nai Aaron khatdi panah piudungniu tingbanglam, Mathenky masuangga paliugu rijiky thiukhai rabo-e. Paliuniu Masanbo Bamga Israel maidung leng kahumbo ngam hinase kamraleng parid phungrabo-e. Haise kamra madiubo maitu kamshat mirabo-e.
Mose khuga
Mose niu kadin piujiu naraibo npiumainah
chahiu khat maksai sisuang tingmibo mai hinatu raokhaijiu pakhiangna 22,273 bamniu-e.
“Tuhoira Levi maitu Israel maigu naraibo npiumai hinagu malin-ga agu thiujiu kadpadlo, sigasu Israel maigu piangrai thubo khaorui-khaona sung, Levi maigu khaorui-khaona siniu kadpad milo.
Israel maigu naraibo npiumai nahdungse Levi mai suang pariak 273 keng nkiubo jengniu, nangniu npiumai nah khangsia luwang nkiusiak rabo-e.
Mai khatleng tadjiu bambo lunlung saisuijiu rangkang mangiu-mangiu pirabo-e.
Khatdi haibo rangkangse Aaron nai panah maidung khuga pikhai rabo-e.”
Mose niu kadin piude,
sichiujiu rangkang 1,365 khoilujiu
sise Aaron nai panahdung khuga pikhaide.
Kohath gu Levi kiriang maitu siambibo kiriang khatdi kikhundung saisuijiu paliu riak chakra,
khatdi takum samriu nai ringiu kakga bambo npiumai hinatu
Paliugu tienkam haira masanthubo maniadungse kamrabo-e.
Paliuniu sibo riga chamigi kom kawiboniu sisetu tomkhai rabo-e, sibo piriga kamaobo fainiu jujang khailujiu, khatdi sise pontadbo pakedungse genkhai rabo-e.
Haibo riga paliuniu kahengbo fai judeng khailujiu khatdi chamigi kom kawibo khatniu sibo riga tomkhai rabo-e, khatdi sise pontadbo pakedungse genkhai rabo-e.
Paliuniu kamaobo fai thinlujiu khatdi chamibung nai padung, takap, chapiang-dung, khatdi takisa khairabo walah pakhiangna situ tomkhai rabo-e.
Paliuniu sise tomkhai lujiu khatdi sibo riga bambo mania pakhiangnatu chamigi kom kawiboniu gomkhai lujiu sise pontadbo kan riga dungkhai rabo-e.
Pachaliga paliuniu kamaobo fainiu, kachia giniu macha padbo rathakbam riga tomkhai lujiu, sibo chamigi tom kawibose tomkhai lujiu, khatdi pontad rabo pake dungse genkhai rabo-e.
Masanbo bamga thinpiubo chakuang chapiang pakhiangnase paliuniu lulujiu sisetu kamaobo fainiu domkhai rabo-e, sigasu chamigi kom kawibo khatniu pariga tomkhai lujiu pontad rabo kanriga khairabo-e.
Paliuniu rathakbam gasu wasa jaobo tabuise nunthon lujiu kamalikbo fainiu sibo riga topkhai rabo-e.

Rathak bamga thinpiubo mania: takap, karathuak khatdi tathikuang hinase sibo riga khairabo-e. Sigasu paliuniu chamigi kom kawibo khatniu sibo riga topkhai lujiu khatdi pontad rabo pakedungse genkhai rabo-e.

Rijiky rapad mirabo tinggase Aaron nai panahpiudung siniu, sibo mania hinase topkhai mibo masanbo maniase Kohath kiriang mainiu wangjiu sise ponrabo-e. Kohath kiriang mainiu masanbo maniase niamak rabo-e maksai paliu shairabo-e.
Haidungse Kohath kiriang mainiu Mathenkyse libo wan hinaga kamrabo tiendung si-e.
Singku Aaron nahpiu Eliazer niu Mathenky khatdi chamibungdung chamidui, maruta, alin tara kadpad rabo leng manuk khairabo wasa, khatdi
“Kohath kiriangtu pijiu masan thubo mania mungga wangjiu pijiu kamshat mitulo.
Sise haichiu padmak raleng, Aaron nai panahmai siniu palunglam ngutjiu mai khat khatgu ngamse pikhai lujiu ndese pontad ralo chiubose katikhai bilo.
Chiudi Kohath kiriang mainiu Mathenky lungga ngut lujiu singkudungniu masanbo maniadungse machajiu bambo paliuniu ngaosai, paliu shairabo-e.”
Gershon gu Levi kiriang maitu siambibo kiriangdung khatdi kikhundung saisuijiu chamai riak chakra,
khatdi
Paliuniu pahangga bambo maniadungse ponra parid phungrabo-e.
Mathenky lung lamgu patop, palen lamgu patop, chamigi kom kawibo sibo riga bambo, ngutrabo kamun ga khaibogu jusungfai,

Mathenky mungga bambo ladjanky nai rathakbamga khai magui bambo jusungfai nai chariang, ladjankyga ngutrabo npuiga khaibo jusungfai khatdi haibo maniadungtu machakhaibo tien ga thinpiubo mania pakhiangna, pageng bambo ngam hinase kamrabo-e.
Aaron nai panahpiudungniu Gershon mai khuga tatien hinase kamraleng pikhai mibo situ Mose nai Aaron niu phuirabo-e.
Pakhiangna haise Gershon kiriangmai siniu Mathenky lungga kamrabo ngiudon si-e: Singku Aaron nahpiu Ithamar gu jukhaibo hang gasu paliuniu wa hinase kamrabo-e.
khatdi
Paliuniu Mathenky gu kare, kajen, katiang khatdi kachum hinase ponrabo-e,

khatdi ladjankygu katiang, kajen tasinggu natri, khatdi Mathenkiga ju magui bambo chariangse, khatdi sise thiukhangboga thinpiubo mania ponrabo hinase parid phungrabo-e. Mai hinaniu patien-tiense kamrabo-e.
Haidungse Merari kiriang mainiu Mathenky lungga paliu tien thiujiu parid phungrabo-e: haidungse paliuniu singku Aaron nahpiu Ithamar gu jukhaibo hangga kamrabo-e.
Kohath
Gershon
Merari
Pakhiangna:
“Ka-nphenmai hina maksai pakazitdui padbo maksai kashaibo phawtu niakhai lujiu kam tania mimai hinatu rijiky gasu hathon mira Israel maidung khuga chamtan pikhailo.
Iniu amaidung ruangga lunglura, paliuniu rijikytu kam tania makra, tacheng-tajai gasu masan makbo mai hinatu hathon mirabo-e.”
Israel maidungniu kadin piujiu paliutu rijiky gasu hathon mide.
Israel maidung leng
paniu pamao madurabo-e, khatdi pakhiangnase majon rabo-e, haibo riga sanjiu paniu maokhai mibo maitu padam mangiugu padam khat khaisan rabo-e.
Chiudi sibo piuse shai misai khatdi pasingna kanamai hasai sise
Israel maidungniu
Singku mainiu paliuleng pikhaibo kalen hinase thinpiu rabo-e.

Israel maidung khuga pikhai-e. Mainao khatniu pakina khuga chamchang makjiu katambo maipiu khattu maluang pumkhat thiujiu papum kam tania mine chiujiu pakinaniu maning masa misai, chiudi pakinaniu panao lamga simasan siak makjiu jengdin habo jengniu, mahinjiu bamta lakge khatdi panao situ pagu kamaobo tienkam siak minlumak bamta lakge. Maksai maipiu siniu panao matun makbo jengniu patu malum masabo padbam talakge.

Wakhat khat bambidi pakinaniu panaotu singku khulam puitad rabo-e. Siga thinra maipiu siniu tasy takhui taju khat phungwang rabo-e, chiudi paniu siga takhui riga takisa wadi runkhai mak rabo-e maksai siga parim wibo wadi khaimak rabo-e, palamra sibo mania hai maning masabo maipiu khatniu majibo silura madiubo khatle.
Singku siniu maipui situ suanglam puikhang lujiu rathakbam masuangga pi chapkhai rabo-e.
Paniu masanbo dui hai chagamli lungga runkhai lujiu khatdi
Siga paniu maipui pitham khi achuak lujiu kadpadbo maniase paben gase khairabo-e. Tasiang bambo khatdi kakhabo dui kuangse singku siniu thinrabo-e.
Siga singkuniu dinpadbo tasiang chamse maipui siniu sui talui rabo-e; “Nangniu maipiu khuga lungmao khai makge sai haibo duiniu phungpatbo tasiang siniu natu kam masa lakge.
Chiudi nangniu maipiu khuga lungmao mibo bamsai,
niu nazanse namai ruanggasu siangkhaibo thiumilo. Paniu pijiu nagu nakeese sangkham milo. Khatdi nawonse pijiu menmi sulo.
Haise nawon ga pi ngutjiu menmi sulo, sichiujiu na-nakeese pijiu sang khammi sulo.”
Maipui siniu “Yo I sui-e,
Sigasu singkuniu tasiangse raokiu lujiu kakhabo dui lungga sumkhai rabo-e.
Maipuitu taduise pijiu sakkhai makhaga,
singku siniu maipui ben ga taduise khoilujiu khatdi thinlujiu
Sigasu paniu sibo takhuise paben tajum khat, maningtaobo pipad thiujiu rathak bamga rukhai rabo-e. Kanamboga, paniu maipui situ taduise pi sakkhai rabo-e.
Maipui siniu maipiu khuga lungmao misai sibo dui siniu patu kam masami rabo-e; pawon menkhangjiu khatdi pagu nakeese sangmi rabo-e. pazanse pijiu pamaidung ruanggasu tasiang daobo thiumi rabo-e.
Chiudi pahai pamao pameng hasai patuse wadi kam masa makjiu panah-pon piujiu lungngam lurabo-e.
Haise maipiu khatniu panaotu aman makbo lamga maning masajiu kamkhaibogu tacheng tajai khatle. Maipui situ pijiu rathakbam suangga pi chapkhai lujiu, kam masanbo tiense thiurabo-e.
Pakina khuga kamaobo bamlakge, sichiujiu panaose pamao bamsai paniu sibogu sansetse daorabo-e.
pahangga bambo ladtidungse Israel maidung khuga pikhaide. Npiumai khatniu maksai npuimai khatniu ganrimai thiura nkiubo chamriat kamsai khatdi papum paronna
paniu jaw maksai pakai bambo chiangna rirabo-e. Paniu mumsy gasu thunpadbo jaw maksai ndutsy jaw maksai pakidi tiumak rabo-e.
Pahai Ganrimai thiuthen mumsy ken gasu padbo khatnadi maksai mumsy siu maksai mumsy-kuong gasu padbo tiumak rabo-e.
Paniu Ganrimai khatgu chamriat hangga bamthen, wadaodi papeetham kakidmak rabo-e. Paniu papum
Papitham hainiu pahai
Paniu Ganripiu thiu then, pahai

Bungjiu shai mibo mungga bamdibo gasu Ganripiu khatgu kadpat masan mibo thamse kamtania misai, paniu jeng chinnia khuanlujiu, sigasu papeetham khatdi pa-ntanggiu kakid mirabo-e; sigasu pahai characheng saisuijiu masan mirabo-e.
Patachadbo naise paniu makhao nia maksai kaphina nia

Singkupiu siniu khatse nuan leng kadpadbo khatdi khat siniu rujiu kadpadbo pipad thiujiu, shaimibo phaw mungga wang khai mibo patuse characheng saisuijiu kam masanbo tiense thiurabo-e. Sibo tingmik siakga Ganripiu siniu papeetham kam masanlan rabo-e.
Siga
wadi jamra makbo khaoring sum: takum khat tangmibo milypoi khat

Chakhi jaomakbo taruak takam khat paniu kadkhai rabo-e; takhui wichang wibo gasuniu takisa khailujiu taruak kasiubo khatdi takisa khailujiu khuaklubo apiubo taruak hai alin-tara nai jaw kadpatbo riga sanjiu kadkhai rabo-e.
Pakhiangna haise singkuniu
Chakin thiubogu pipadbo leng paniu midangchise gikhai rabo-e, khatdi taruak jaobo takam sidi kadkhai taman rabo-e; paniu alin-tara nai jaw sidi kadkhai rabo-e.
Mathenky kamun ga Ganripiu siniu papeetham hai got lujiu chakin thiubogu kadpadbo rukhaibo migase thonkhai mirabo-e.
Sigasu singku siniu langmin lubo midangchigu pasuang phise rampad lujiu kasiubo taruak nai apiubo taruakse takam gasu khat, khat khoipad lujiu Ganripiu ben ga khaibi rabo-e.
Sibo sai, singku siniu
Haidungse Ganripiu leng tajaidung-e; chiudi Ganripiu khatniu pipadrabo lamga ladriat thiukhai mibo riga sanjiu kadpadne chiusai, paniu ladriat thiulubo saisuijiu kamra mide.
Pahangga bambo chamdungse
Israel maidungtu thoikhaiboga Aaron nai panahpiudungniu thinpiura dinbilo chiujiu
lungsa khaibo thiumi sulo;
Sichiujiu
Siga Israel kiphiugu jupaodung thiujiu bambo kiriang mainiu chamai riak chakbo maidung siakniu,

khuga paliugu kadpadbo matomchi kariu-je-nia khatdi talai charuk, jupao khangnia nialeng talai khat khat khatdi jupao hinaleng matomchi khat khat phungwangde. Paliuniu paliugu mania kadpad loibo wan-ga,
niu Mose khuga din-e,
“Mathenky thiuboga thinraleng haibo kalendungse lukhailo; haidungse Levi maitu, paliuniu kamrabo ngam saisuijiu pikhai bilo.”
Haichiujiu Mose niu matomchidungse khatdi talaidungse Levi mai khuga pikhaide.
Paniu talai nia khatdi matomchi madai hai Gershon maidung khuga,
khatdi talai madai sigasu matomchi tachad hai Merari maidung khuga pikhaide. Paliugu ngamkam pakhiang-nase Aaron nahpiu Ithamar niu dinbo saisuijiu kamrabo-e.
Chiudi Mose niu Kohath maidung lengra talai maksai matomchi wadi pikhai makge, palamra masanbo mania paliuniu kamrabo sira paliu ntuang rigasu pontad rabo-e.
Jupaodungniu rathakbam kadkhaibo thiujiu changee raleng paliugu mania piwang khaide. Paliuniu paliugu kalendungse rathak bamga kadkhai rabo tingga,
niu Mose khuga din-e, ‘Jeng kariu-je-niakiu lungga jupao khat khatniu pagu-gu kalendungse rathakbamga kadpad raleng naimachang phungwangra paliu khuga dinkhai bilo.”
Paliuniu pahangga bambo maniadungse paliugu kadpatbo mania thiujiu piwang khaide:

Zuar nahpiu Nethanel

Sheduer nahpiu Elizur

Zurishaddai nahpiu Shelumiel
6bo nai

Deuel nahpiu Eliasaph
7bo nai
Ephraim
Ammihud nahpiu Elishama
8bo nai
Manasseh
Pedahzur nahpiu Gamaliel
9bo nai
Benjamin
Gideoni nahpiu Abidan
10bo nai
Dan
Ammishaddai nahpiu Ahiezer
11bo nai
Asher
Okhran nahpiu Pagiel
12bo nai
Naphtali
Enan nahpiu Ahira

Maidungniu pagu-gu kadpad phungwangbose tam-tamme: taju 1.5 ridbo rangkanggi kuong khatdi madadpiangpoi 800 ridbo rangkangginiu kambo tathikuang, niase mathiuniu tadbambo saisuijiu alin-tara kadkhaibo leng wasa jaojiu takhui phuibo; madadpiangpoi 110 ridbo kachiagi kuong hai parim wiboniu phuibo; matomchipoi khat, midangchi khat, khatdi takum khat tangmibo milypoi khat hai rukhaira; nuan leng kami khat; sigasu chakin thiubogu kadpadleng matomchi nia, midangchi mangiu, kami mangiu khatdi takum khat tangmibo milypoi mangiu hai phungwang-e.
Rathak bamse kadpat raleng jupao kariu-je-niakiuniu phungwangbo mania pakhiangnase pahangga lenkhai-e:
rangkanggi kuong kariu-nia khatdi taju 27.6 ridbo rangkanggi tathikuang--taju 1.32 ridbo, parim wiboniu
phuibo kachia kuang kariu nia--matomchi kariunia, midangchi kariu nia sigasu takum khat tangmibo milypoi kariu nia,
haibonai nchamjiu alin-tara kadkhaira khatdi chamiga rukhaijiu kadkhai rabo pipad
nuan kambo leng pipadbo kami kariu nia--kadpadra, matomchi makai madai chakin thiubogu,
midangchi riak charuk, kami riak charuk, takum khat tangmibo milypoi riak charuk haidungsi-e.
Mose niu
“Aaron niu chamibung chinnia padungga dungbo wan ga pasuanglam thaoben raleng dungkhaira pakhuga katikhai bilo.”
Aaron niu kadin piude khatdi chamibung-dung hinase padungbam suanglam dungmari khaide.
Mose khuga
“Levi maitu kakibo Israel maidung ruanggasu puitam padmilo khatdi pahangga raokhaibo jaiga paliutu kam masan khaibilo:
Kam masan khaibo duise paliu riga kajin khailo khatdi paliu pum pakhiangnagu pagiuse kakid milo, khatdi paliu fai-nidungse katha milo. Sichiusai paliu hai characheng gasu masan mibo-e.
Sigasu paliuniu matomchipoi khat khatdi siga khairabo alin-tara takhui masanbo takisa jaojiu pipadbo, khatdi katambo matomchipoi nuanleng kadra juwang rabo-e.
Sigasu Israel maidung pakhiangnatu puiwang madui lujiu Levi maitu pijiu Iniu bambo Mathenky masuangga chapkhai rabo-e.
Israel maidungniu Levi mai riga paliu ben kabakhai rabo-e,
khatdi Aaron niu Levi maitu pijiu angam kamraleng Israel mai ruanggasu akhuga nkiubo kalen thiujiu kadkhai rabo-e.
Levi mainiu haichiujiu paliu bense matomchi kania piga kaba khaijiu, khatniu nuanleng kadpadra khatdi katambo khatniu Levi maitu kam masanbo tien thiuraleng rukhaijiu kadpad rabo-e.
Levi maitu nkiubo kalen khat thiujiu akhuga kadpatlo, sigasu Aaron nai panah maidung siniu paliutu phuira kamkhai bilo.
Haichiujiu Levi maitu kakibo Israel maidung rong gasu amai thiumira puitam padmilo.
Nangniu Levi maitu kam masan khaimibo sai khatdi kadpad mibo sai, paliu Mathenkiga changam kamra buimibo-e.
Iniu paliutu Israel maigu naraibo nahpiudung pakhiangna sung thiujiu lukhai rabo-e, paliu hai amai ronna thiurabo-e.
Egypt ramlungga Iniu naraibo pakhiangnatu kamshatbo tingga, Israel mai kikhun hinatu khatdi khaoring hinagu piangraibotu Iniu agu kumjiu kam masan khaide.
Tuhoira Iniu Levi maitu Israel mai kikhun gu naraibo pakhiangna sung thiujiu lura mide,

khatdi Levi maitu phui khaira Aaron nai panah maidung khuga Iniu Israel maidunggu nkiubo kalen thiujiu, Mathenkiga Israel maidungleng tatien thiura khatdi Israel maidungniu Masanbo Bamga wangbo gasu paliutu kam masa rabo gasu paliutu gukhaira pikhaibo-e.”
Haichiujiu
Levi mai paliu ronna paliu pum kam masande sigasu paliu faini katha masan lude, khatdi paliutu Aaron niu nkiubo kalen thiujiu
Levi mai lamga Mose khuga
“Levi mai hina, takum makai mangiu tangbo gasu Iniu bambo Mathenkiga pangam-ngam kamrabo-e,
sigasu takum ringiu tangmiboga patien saomi rabo-e.
Sibo sailam, Mathenkiga tatien thiujiu bam maidungtu paniu nkhadi sui-e, chiudi pah paronna tatien thiumak rabo-e. Haise nangniu Levi maitu haichiu tatiense thiura katikhai rabo-e.”
“Haibo hiugu jeng kariu madai naise naimik ngutsubo tingga, Israel maidungniu tacheng-tajai saisuijiu Kenpadbo Ngeese mania rabo-e.”
Mose niu haichiujiu Kenpadbo Ngee maniara maidung khuga dinkhai bide,
sijengniu raithubo ‘hiugu jeng kariu madaibo nai chawan paliuniu Sinai Ramjingga kamde. Mose khuga
Chiudi mai khangsianiu kashaimai pum nialujiu masan mak mibo jengniu sibo nai Kenpadbo Ngeese mania ngamlu lakjiu bamde. Paliuniu Mose nai Aaron khuga tadlujiu din-e,
“Kashaiphaw nialujiu aliura masanta mide chiudi dekamjiu haibo Israel mainiu
Mose niu paokakge, “Iniu
Mose khuga

Israel maidung khuga haichiu dinra katikhai bide, “Naliu ruangga mai khat kumboniu maksai naliu kaikik mainiu kashai phaw nialujiu tania misai, maksai chabin tad madiu miboga, chiudi Kenpadbo Ngee manianijiu bamsai,
chahiu khat sailam niabo hiugu jengriu madaikiubo nai chawan naliuniu maniabo sui-e. Chakhi jaomakbo taruak nai kakhabo takhuiniu changilo.
Wa katiubo mania chiubo khatnadi pasaibo nai nsuan tangbo masiak makrabo-e khatdi wakhao-ra khatnadi kamtangmak rabo-e. Tacheng-tajai hina saisuijiu Kenpadbo Ngee hai manialo.

Chiudi mai khatkumboniu masanjiu khatdi chabin tadmimak lujiu Kenpadbo Ngee mania raosai, pahai amai-e chiubo chakkhaita mirabo-e, palamra daklubo wan-ga paliu aleng wa kadkhai makge. Sibogu nuan wangrabo guse paniu phungrabo mide.
“Sangdiumai naliu ruangga lungbam mainiu Kenpadbo ngee maniani-e chiusai, tacheng-tajaidung saisuijiu paniu mania rabo-e. Dikhun maidi sanglun maidi nchambo tacheng-tajaise kamrabo-e.”
Kamuangse khangmibo tingga, Israel maidungniu paliu rijiky ralujiu, kamuang kiukhaibo bamgase paliu rijiky thiukhai lan-e.
gu chamtan gasu paliu rijiky ra-e, khatdi
Kamuang siniu Mathenky riga bamthen, paliu
Pawan-wan dasai kamuang siniu mathenky riga tingmik tamnakha bamkhai-e; khat khat bamdi, paliu rijikyga bamkhai lujiu maksai
Pawan-wan dasai kamuang siniu chawan gasu pasaibonai nsuan tangbo ronna bamkhaide, sichiujiu kamuang siniu khangmi kaji-kari paliu malaimi-e. Kamuang khangmiboga, paliu tadpad mi-e.
Kamuang siniu mathenky riga jengnia, chahiu khat, takum khat maksai haisuang thengjiu bamsai, kamuang siniu bamthen, paliu bam limakjiu bamme; chiudi sise khangmiboga, paliu kalimi-e.
niu Mose khuga pikhaibo chamtan saisuijiu paliu rijiky thiu-e khatdi ra-e.
“Maidungtu kuwang aruangra khatdi rijiky rami raboga thinpiura make nia rangkangginiu kampadlo.
Make niase mud matheng khaisai Iniu bambo Mathenky ngutbo gase maidung pakhiangna wang aruangrabo-e.
Chiudi make khuan khat ronna mut dasai, kiphiu hinagu jupaodung ronna namungga wang rabo-e.
Mut madun dasai, naimik padlam lungjiu bambo kymaise paliu bam kalimi rabo-e.
Lonniabo thiujiu mut madun dasai, tingrunlam lungbambo kymaise kalimi rabo-e. Rijiky ra-raleng mut madunchang mut madun rabo-e,
chiudi maidungtu kumadui ralengra mut matheng rabo-e.
Makese Aaron nahpiu, singkudungniu mutrabo-e.
“Wangkinbo wan hinaga pahangga bambo tajaise majai rabo-e.
Naliu dihga chari thiuboga, naliutu aphenjiu bammai khugasu naliu pum siakniu asunlura, haibo make gasu chari thiubo madan thiujiu mutlo. Naliu

Mathabo tingmik wan-gadi naliugu Hiusan Ngeega khatdi naliugu kakibo khuang-ngee gadi naliugu rujiu kadpadbose khatdi chakin thiubogu pipadbo wan-ga naliuniu makese mutrabo-e. Sichiusai Iniu naliutu nkha khaine. I hai naliu
Maidungniu Egypt kadih phutlujiu tadpat mibo sai takum niabogu niabo hiugu jeng makaibonai
sigasu Israel maidung siniu ramjing lamse tadsu mide. Kamuangse Paran ramjingga kiujiu bamkhaide.
Mose khuga pikhai mibo

Paliuniu tadpadbo wan machangna paliu hai nchamjiu tadpadle. Judah kiphiu niu munranbo thiujiu jukhaijiu bambo njan siniu tadpat raijiu paphom phom thiujiu Amminadab nahpiu Nahshon niu munranpiu thiujiu tadpadle.
Zuar nahpiu Nethanel niu Issachar phiugu munranpiu,
khatdi Helon nahpiu Eliab niu Zebulun phiugu munranpiu thiujiu tadpadle.
Sigasu Mathenkyse ponkiu lujiu, sise Gershon nai Merari, kiriang kanianiu ponlujiu tadpad rabo-e.
Sibo chaliga, Reuben phiuniu jukhaijiu bambo riphen maise paphom-phom thiujiu Shedeur nahpiu Elizur niu munranpiu thiujiu tadpad rabo-e.
Simeon phiugu munranpiuse Zurishaddai nahpiu Shelumiel niu thiu rabo-e,
khatdi Gad phiugu munran piuse Deuel nahpiu Eliashaph niu thiurabo-e.
Sibo chaliga, Levi kiriang Kohath niu masanbo maniadungse ponlujiu tadpat rabo-e. Paliuniu thiukhai lonniabo rijikyga wangtangbo tingga, Mathenkyse thiukhai lande.
Sibo chaliga, Ephraim phiuniu jukhaijiu bambo riphen mai hai paphom phom thiujiu, Ammihud nahpiu Elishama niu munranpiu thiujiu tadpad rabo-e.
Manasseh phiugu munran piuse Pedahzur nahpiu Gamaliel niu thiurabo-e,
khatdi Gideoni nahpiu Abidan niu Benjamin phiugu munranpiu thiurabo-e.
Kanamthuboga, pa-njan pakhiangnatu phuijiu bambo Dan kiphiuniu jukhai bambo pa-njan riphendungniu paphom paphom thiujiu Ammishaddai niu munranpiu thiujiu tadpad rabo-e.
Okhran nahpiu Pagiel niu Asher phiugu munranpiu thiurabo-e.
Enan nahpiu Ahira niu Naphtali phiugu munranpiu thiurabo-e.
Chiusai, Israel maidungniu paliu rijiky ralujiu tadpadboga paphom-phom thiujiu karai-kana thiujiu tadpad rabogu thaksi-e.
Mose niu pamekpiu Midian mai Jethro nahpiu Hobab khuga din-e, “
Hobab niu paokakge, “Chiumakge, I aramlam malanwang mine.”
Mose niu din-e, “Aliutu phutkhai tulo. Aliuniu ramjing lungga aliugu rijiky debo bamga thiukhai ralo khatdi nangniu aliugu jupao thiu ngamme chiubo nangniu si-e.”
Nangniu aliu sai suiwang-e sai
Maidungniu masanbo Sinai luong saodiak lubo saiga paliu jengsum tadkhaide. Paliu rijiky thiukhai raboga jukhai raleng
Paliu rijiky hina gasu paliuniu tadpadbo machangna
khatdi sise saomiboga, “Israel maigu kikhun sang-sang maikhuga “Malan wanglo,
Maidungniu paliugu chariu magenthiubo lamga
Nkhakhai raleng maidungniu Mose khuga kapjiu khengsude; siga paniu
Haijengniu haibo bamtu Taberah
Israel maidung saisuijiu sangdiu maidung khangsia tad ncham kinne. Paliu hai chami tiuchang tiuni mide, khatdi Israel maidungdi paliu karai suinimakjiu din-e: “Aliuniu chami tamnakhadi tiulu sai!
Egypt kadihga aliuniu chakha tiukani then tiulu-e, khatdi siseniu aliuleng wadi kam nchumbo thiumakge. Magaina, tadui gaina, tanam, nrah, khatdi talao aliuniu tiukhai mibo maningtao khailo.
Chiudi tuhoira aliu pumtan hamide. Naikhat sai naikhat manna makjiu wakhatnadi tiura hamide!”

Sise nchun tingga rijiky riga kajikdui nai kiu nchambo-e. Pasaibo nai nsuan maidungniu tadronjiu ruikadui lujiu, niaklu maksai thaolujiu khatdi sigasu taruak khuang kamlu tiu-e. Pagu chamao hai takisaniu machen lubo taruak kumme).
Maidung siniu paliugu Mathenky rengmun gasu parup-rup thiujiu suini makbo cham dinbose Mose niu chiulude.
Sichiujiu paniu

Iniu paliutu damkhaibo maksai kadihga pijiu manawang khaibo makge! Nangniu dekamjiu atu pijiu namaitu makuatbo mai kumjiu haibo maidungtu agaga ponlujiu, nangniu paliu paopeh mai khuga ladriat khaibo kadihgu npui katheng kadun tadra dinjiulo?
Haibo maidung siniu tiubuibo tatek Iniu delamsu daolu ralo? Paliu tiuni saboniu phui-e, sichiujiu chami tiura kheng-e.
Haibo maidunggu parid I aronna phung ngam lakge; haise aleng kungju-e!
Nangniu atu haichiujiu kambamne chiusai lungsajiu atu kamshat milo. Chiusai Iniu nathak kasabo gase chariu khenglakge.”

Siga Iniu kiujiu natu npaone, khatdi Iniu nakhuga pikhai mibo hiupuinase khoilujiu paliu khuga pikhai bine. Sichiujiu paliuniu haimaidungtu parid phungbo tien ga natu nkha khai sune, haichiusai naronna parid phunglakge.

Tuhoira maidung khuga dinbilo, ‘Nsuannai leng naliu ronna naliu pum kam masan lulo, naliu tiura chami daolune. Naliuniu chami chakha tiunibo khenglu lakjiu, aliu Egypt kadihga bambo tingganiu wi nkiubo-e chiujiu wa tiunijiu dinbambose
Naliuniu sise naikhat leng maksai jengnia leng maksai jeng mangiu leng maksai jeng kariu leng maksai jeng makai leng ronna tiuraleng makge.
Chiudi chahiu khat matin, sise naliu kuon gasu npad makthen, sise tiubose mani makthen tiubam mine. Haise padrabo-e palamra naliu ruangga bambo
Mose niu
Paliutu pi tiu buibo matom kabui khatdi milydung kamshatra bamlu buima? Duipuiga bambo chakhaniu paliuleng builu buima?”
“Agu pumtan ga pamalan thiubo bamma?” chiujiu
Haichiujiu Mose niu tadlujiu
Siga

Jupaodung riakchinnia ruanggasu khangnia, Eldad nai Medad sira Mathenkiga tadmakjiu rijiky lungga bammide. Sichiujiu rijiky lungga hiupuinase panai riga wang khaide siga panaidi phaimiukakungdung kumjiu senpad sude.
Eldad nai Medad niu kambambose chabonmai khatniu ngao lujiu Mose khuga pakwang paokhai-e.
Siga Mose tu nahting gasu nkhawang kinbo Nun nahpiu Joshua niu sulujiu Mose khuga din-e, “Paliutu pijiu saokhai milo, paohubo!”
Mose niu paokakge, “Iniu machunbose nangniu sijiuma?
Sichiujiu Mose nai Israel maidunggu jupaodung riakchinniase rijikyga malanwang mide.
Simakdakjiu

Sichiujiu sibo nai n-nien minjing, nchundi minsang khatdi pasaibo nai tangbo, maidung siniu akhoidung haitu minjing-e, chiudi mai khat niudi taju sang khat suang nkiujiu khomlu makge. Paliuniu akhoidungse phumaki raleng rijiky wonjengga phu khaide.
Paliuniu tiukam lulakjiu bambo tingga,
Sibo bam zanse Kibroth Hattaavah chiu ku-e (sichiubo rambara “Tiuni sabo charawbam”), palamra siga chami tiunibo gasu patiuni sabo maidungtu baikhai mibo-e.
Sibo bam gasu maidungniu Hazeroth ga paliu rijiky thiukhaide.
Mose niu Kush maipui khattu panaoleng kude, siga Miriam nai Aaron niu paken tiak sude.
Panainiu din-e, “
(Mose hai kadihpiriga lungmaidung mathiu maisuang, palung manon nkiubo mai-e).
Simakdakjiu
khatdi
siga
Haise Iniu avangpiu Mose tu npaobo panai ncham makge; Iniu patu amai Israel mai pakhiangnatu phuira pikhai bibo-e.
Haichiujiu Iniu patu din rambabo ganiu makjiu masan siakjiu zudaojiu npaobo-e; paniu alundi ngaobo-e! Dejiukha nanainiu hujiu avangpiu Mose tu din masa jiulo?”
khatdi kamuangse Mathenky gasu hamide, simak dakjiu Miriam pumgen hai nphenbo rapot wangjiu kabun kumjiu kapuang mide, Aaron niu patu phuiboga sibo rapotse pakhuga bammide,
Paniu Mose khuga din-e, “Paohubo yo, chalungsajiu aliugu kamengbo mao jengniu aliutu chariu khengbo sajaise kamkhai mane.
Patuse kashaibo pum thiujiu mana wangbo, papumphan khatlam tiu maha mibo kumjiu pi thiukhai tulo.”
Siga Mose niu
Miriam tu rijiky gasu jeng chinnia hapad mide, haichiujiu patu puiwanglan makthen maidungniu siga bam khangde.
Sigasu paliuse Hazeroth phutlujiu Paran gu ramjingga paliu rijiky thiujiu bamkhaide.
“Chaphiu kariu-je-nia hina gasu jupao khat-khat kadalulo khatdi Israel maileng, Iniu pirabo Canaan kadih phuiraleng chakhumpao maidung thiujiu langkhailo.”

Zakhur nahpiu Shammua

Nun nahpiu Hoshea

Raphu nahpiu Palti

Manasseh
Susi nahpiu Gaddi
Dan
Gemali nahpiu Ammiel
