Machirel nahpiu Sethur
Naphtali
Vophsi nahpiu Nabbi
Gad
Machi nahpiu Geuel
Haimaidungse charam phuira Mose niu langpadbo chakhumpao maidung-e. Nun nahpiu Hoshea tu paniu Joshua chiujiu pazan kali khaibide.
Mose niu paliutu langpadboga, paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Haigasu duiruaklam tadjiu Canaan kadih n-hangbo genlam kiulujiu sigasu maluong tonlam khanglo.
Kadihse dekumlo, siga chamai dejiukha lungbamlo, khatdi paliu hai dejiukha tanlo chiubo phui lulo.
Charamse wima maksai wimaklo, khatdi paliu hai maruangbo namdakga lungma maksai reng maguibo namdiga lunglo chiubo phuilo.
Kadih hai patam bamma khatdi kadih hai tasingbangniu phui bamma chiubo phuilulo. Siga lungbambo charasy kasiadi phungwang siakra kamlo.” (Haibo wanse mumsy minsubo wanne).
Haichiujiu chakhumpao maidung siniu duiruaklam tadlujiu Zin gu ramjing gasu npui hina Rehob tangbo, duiruaklam tadbo Hamath Pass munglam phuimawi lude.

Paliu sibo kadihgu duimilam tadrai lujiu Ahiman, Sheshai Talmai kiriang, Anakim kubo lungkamai phomgu kaikikniu lungbo Hebron ga wangde. (Hebron hai Egypt ga bambo Zoan suang takum chinnia bamrai mibo-e).
Paliuniu Eshcol Ramjeng ga wangde, khatdi siga mumsy rikhat ramlude, sise ridchang ritjiu chamai khang nianiu panai makhuakga khailujiu ponwang-e. Paliuniu majongsy nai ndutsy kasiadi phungwang-e.
(Sibo bamse Israel maidungniu mumsy rikhat ramlubo jengniu sibo bamtu Eshcol Ramjeng chiujiu kubo-e).
Kadihse jeng atai lungga phui lujiu chakhumpao maidungse,
Mose nai Aaron khatdi Paran ramjing Kadesh lungga bammai Israel maidung khuga malan wangde. Paliuniu ngaolubo khatdi phungwang lenkhai mibo charasy lamga paliu khuga dinkhaide.
Paliuniu Mose khuga din-e, “Aliuniu kadihse phuiboga wichang wibo patam bambose ngaolu-e; haiga sibo dihgu rasy kasia bamme.
Chiudi siga lungbam maidungse tanchang tanbo mai-e, sigasu paliugu namdise dichang di-e khatdi kareng wisuijiu kamkhai bamme. Sathubo sira, siga lungmaise, lungkabo kaikik bamne.
Amalek maidungniu sibo n-hangbo ramlamse lung-e khatdi Hitt mai, Jebush mai sigasu Amor maidungniu ramluonglam lung-e; khatdi Canaan maidungniu Mediterranean duipui nai Jordan Giu hugenlam lung-e.”
Mose tu atungjiu bambo maidungtu Caleb niu pi saojing khailujiu din-e, “Tuhoi aliu chari aphen lujiu charamse lumi rabo-e.” Situ ngamlura aliugu kabuibo pumtan bamme.
Chiudi Caleb saisuijiu tadmaidung siniu din-e, “Makge paliutu asunra aliu ngamlu lakge; siga lungjiu bambo maidungse aliu suang tan nkiu-e.”

Sichiujiu paliuniu phuipad lubo kadih lamga kamaobo ladse paliuniu Israel maidung khuga dinronjiu madu sude. “Sibo ram gasu padbo tatek siniu lungjiu bambo maidung lengdi builu makge chiujiu paliu din-e. Aliuniu kangao maidungse paliu khao theng-di-e,
khatdi Anak kaikik, lungkamaidi lungjiu bambo aliuniu ngao-e. Aliura takaopui langga kasiambo mai-e chiubo maning-e, aliuniu haichiubo jailamse paliutu phuikhai mibo-e.”
Nchun masang maidung paliu lung chariujiu kapsang-sang-e.
Paliuniu Mose nai Aaron tu suini makjiu din-e, “Egypt dihga maksai haibo ramjingga shaimiboniu wi nkiu-e!
Deleng
Haichiujiu paliu khatniu khat khuga din-e, “Aliugu jupao kadalujiu Egypt dihlam malanwang mikhe!”
Siga Mose nai Aaron niu maidung pakhiangna masuangga kadihga khudung kiude.
Khatdi Nun nahpiu Joshua nai Jephunneh nahpiu Caleb, chakhumpao kania siniu, panai lung chariujiu panai faini phetjiu
maidung khuga din-e, “Aliuniu phuitadbo kadihse wichang wibo kadih-e.
niu aliutu suikhaisai, paniu aliutu siga puitad lujiu sibo kawibo patam bambo kadihse aliuleng pikhai bine.
tu suimakjiu atungmi tulo khatdi siga lungjiu bammaitu pingmi tulo. Aliuniu paliutu malapajiu ngamlune.
Panai rammai mathiuniu panaitu tatuniu rotjiu kamshat mira kamsude, chiudi simak dakjiu Mathenky rigase
Iniu chararet langwangjiu paliutu kam mahami rabo-e chiudi paliu suang keng nkiubo khatdi tan nkiubo jat khatgu piuse Iniu natu pithiu khaine.”
paliuniu sise siga lungjiu bammaidung khuga dinmi sune.
Tuhoira nangniu namaidung haitu kamshat misai, nagu kendi chiulumai siniu, riatkhaibo kadihga nangniu paliutu puiwang ngamlak mijiu ramjingga kamshat mibo-e chiujiu dinmi sune.
Haijengniu tuhoira
Haijengniu tuhoira,
Chiudi Iniu ringjiu bambo kum khatdi agu pumtanse kadihpiriga phuijiu bambo kum Iniu ladriat thiubo-e,

haimaidung mai khat nadi sibo kadihga ngutlakge, Iniu Egypt kadihga khatdi ramjingga tasibo tenkhai mibose khatdi agu ran-ranbo nbiuse paliuniu ngaomibo-e, chiudi paliuniu agu khengsibo situ madiulan lanjiu madiu-e khatdi akadin piumakge.
Paliu paopeh maidung khuga Iniu ladriat thiukhai mibo kadih gase paliu wadaodi ngutlakge. Atu lukhai mak maidung mai khatniudi siga wakamdi ngutlakge.
Chiudi avangpiu Caleb niu katambo lunlungga bamlujiu khatdi akadin piujiu lungbambo jengniu, paniu phuipad mibo kadih gase Iniu patu puiwang khaibi rabo-e,
sichiujiu tuhoi Amalek mai nai Canaan maidungniu lungjiu bambo taningdih gase pakai pakikgu kadih thiurabo-e. Nsuannai malan wangjiu khatdi Aqaba gu Ajaibek gu ramjinglam tadsulo.”
“Haibo kasabo maidung siniu dethengkha atu suimakjiu bamralo? Suini makbo haise Iniu malenna chiumide!
Tuhoira haibo chamkakse paliu khuga pikhai bilo: ‘Naliuniu khengbo kumjiu naliu khuga kamkhaira I ringjiu bambo kum Iniu siangkhaine.
Naliu shaimi rabo-e khatdi naliu phawdungse ramjing gase khoi mara khaimi rabo-e. Palamra naliuniu atu suini makge, naliu takum makai nrilam bambo mai khatniudi sibo kadihga ngutlakge.
Naliu siga lung raleng Iniu ladriat thiukhai mibo-e, chiudi Caleb nai Joshua makjiu naliu mai khatniudi ngutlakge.
Naliu nahmaidungtu haphung mine chiujiu naliuniu din-e, chiudi naliuniu lukhai makbo kadih gase Iniu paliutu puiwangjiu siga paliu ky pijiu thiu khaine.
Naliu haibo ramjing gasu shai mirabo-e.
Naliuniu chamchang makbo jengniu, naliu ruangga shai kanam thubo mai katang, naliu nahmaidung ramjingga takum atai ronmengjiu chariu khengrabo-e.
Naliu nuan kammibo jengniu kadih phuitadbo haise tingmik ataisung takum atai ngutjiu chariu kheng rabo-e. Sichiujiu naliuniu atu atungbo rambase silu rabo-e!
Atu suini makjiu bammai naliu khuga, Iniu haise kamne chiujiu tasiang thiu-e. Haibo ramjing lungga naliu mai hina shairabo-e chiujiu
Kadihse phui raleng Mose niu langkhaibo maidungniu aratbo ladse phungwangjiu
Chakhumpao maidung kariu-nia gasu Joshua nai Caleb ronna ringlu-e.
Pasaibo nai nsuan paliu ramluong namdi situ chari thiujiu lura tadpatjiu din-e, “Tuhoira
Chiudi Mose niu din-e, “Chiusai tuhoi naliu dekamjiu
Tadmane. Naliu
Naliuniu Amalek mai nai Canaan maitu asunboga, naliu hai chariga shairabo-e; naliu
Sichiujiu siga lungjiu bambo Amalek mai nai Canaan mainiu chari thiujiu paliutu kamkao mide, khatdi paliutu Hormah tangbo hameng sude.
Matomchi khat, midangchi khat, mily khat maksai kami khat
Mai khatniu mily khat maksai kami khat
Kamichi khat kadpatbo tingga takisaniu jalubo takhui madadpiang khat paphan,
jaw-lah khat paphan jaojiu, alin-tara kadpatbo thiujiu kadpat rabo-e. Haichiu kadpatbogu rimse
matomchi khat
jaw-lah nia jaojiu kadpat rabo-e.
Haichiu kadpatbo gu rimse
Sise matomchi, midangchi, mily maksai kami khat khatgu thiujiu pipad rabo side.
Khaoring khatsuang kengjiu kadpatbo tingga, sise kadpat taman rabo maniase sibo khaorui riak saisui rabo-e.
Israel mai hinaniu katiu kasak kadpatbo tingga, haise kamrabo-e, parimse
Sangdiumai khatniu pawan khatleng maksai tingthengleng bamdi naliu ruangga lung lujiu, khatdi katiu kasak kadpatne chiusai
Wangkinbo wan hinaga, haichiu machambo tajaidungse naliu khuga khatdi naliu ruangga lungjiu bambo sangdiumai khuga bamrabo-e. Naliu nai paliuse
haichiu machambo tacheng tajaidungse naliu khuga nai paliu khuga bamrabo-e.
Katiu kasak kampad lujiu tiuraboga, padam kasia
Naliuniu taruak khuakbo tingga, miusy karaibo gasu khuakpat rabo taruak manuanbose
Wangkinbo wan hinaga, haibo nkiubo kalense naliuniu khuakpat raibo taruak gasu
Chiudi wakhat kamjiu mai khangsianiu Mose khuga
khatdi wakhat kamjiu sibo sailam Mose khuga

kamaobose maidungniu simakbo gasuniu-e saira, paliuniu matomchi khat rujiu kadpatra, alin-tara khatdi jaw jaojiu pirabo-e. Haibo riga sanjiu, nuan gu pipatbo thiujiu paliuniu kamichi khat kadpat rabo-e.
Singku siniu lungjiu bammai leng kam masan khaibo tiense thiurabo-e, sichiujiu paliutu kuakkhai birabo-e, palamra kamaobo hai simakbo gasuniu-e khatdi paliuniu paliu nuan leng pipatbo hai
Dikhunmai maksai paliu ruangga lungjiu bammai sangdiumai pakhiangnatu maning maha khaibi rabo-e, palamra mai hinase kamaoboga jaokam mibo-e.
Rathakbam gase singku siniu sibopiu situ panuan gasu kam masankhai bibo tiense thiukhai rabo-e, sigasu patuse kuak khaibi rabo-e.
Dikhunmai maksai paliu ruangga lungjiu bambo sangdiumai tadi simakjiu kammibo mai hinaniu machambo tajaidung haise paliuniu majai rabo-e.
Chiudi mai khat kumboniu sikhennajiu nuan kamsai, pahai dikhunmai maksai sanglun bamdi,
palamra
Israel mainiu ramjingga bambo tingga, naikhat mai khatniu Tabamnai tasing khoijiu bamniubo ngaolude.
Patuse Mose nai Aaron khatdi parammai mathiu khuga puiwang-e,
sigasu patuse akhemai hangga khaibide, palamra patuse degu kamralo chiubo simasanlu makge.
Siga
niu chamtan pikhai mibo kum parammai mathiuniu patuse rijiky lenlam puipad lujiu tatuniu rodshat mide.

Haibo fairiniu pijiu maningtao khaibo thiujiu naliuniu haise ngaobo wan hinaga agu chamtan hina maning taojiu khatdi majaijiu bamrabo-e; sigasu naliuniu akhu gasu marimi lakge, khatdi naliuniu maningboga khatdi machunboga tadmi lakge,
Chafai-ri siniu agu chamtan hina naliuniu majaira pijiu maningtao khaibi rabo-e, khatdi naliu amai thiukam rabo-e.
I hai naliu Rawang,

Levi kiriang Kohath gasu Ishar nahpiu Korah niu, Mose gu jukhaibo tientu suini makge. Reuben kiphiu gasu khangsum Eliab nahpiu Dathan nai Abiram, khatdi Peleth nahpiu Ontu kakibo Israel maidungniu kadalumai simawibo jupaodung 250 niu, pasai suijiu palam ponde.
Paliuniu Mose nai Aaron masuangga wang madui lujiu panai khuga din-e, “Nanai hai kam tanuakju mide! Maidung pakhiangnase
Haise Mose niu chiuluboga, kadihga makhumkiu lujiu kakheng thiusude.
Siga Mose niu Korah khatdi pasai suimaidung, khuga din-e, “Nsuannai nsuan
Nsuannai nsuan nang khatdi nasai kasuimaidungse khangli ponlujiu khatdi siga kijiu bambo mitikang khailujiu khatdi sibo riga maruta khai lujiu rathak bamga ponwanglo. Sigasu aliu ruangga saose
Mose niu Korah khuga dinlanne, “Naliu Levi mai, nkinglo!
Israel mai
Paniu naliutu khatdi Levi mai pakhiangnatu pijiu haibo chakhuangse lutao khaide haichiujiu tuhoira naliuniu singku tiendi thiumine chiujiu matan jiuma!”
Nangniu Aaron tu suini makbora
Mose niu Dathan nai Abiram tu puiwangra maitu langkhaide, chiudi panai niu din-e, “Anai wanglakge!
Kadih patam wibo Egypt dih gasu aliutu puitad lujiu ramjingga kamshat mira kambose buimakha jiuma? Nangniu aliu riga papao thiujiu bamra ma?
Nangniu pachangjiu aliutu kadih kawiboga puiwang khai makge maksai aliuleng thiujiu chalu khatdi mumsireng pikhai makge, sichiu lujiu tuhoira nanainiu aliutu sonra kambamme. Aliu wanglakge!”
Mose palung pommide khatdi
Mose niu Korah khuga din-e, “Nsuannai nang khatdi nasai suimaidung chamai 250 se
Naliu mai hinaniu pagu-gu khangli ponlujiu khatdi siga maruta khailujiu, sise rathakbamga kadkhai rabo-e.”
Haichiujiu mai hinaniu pagu-gu khangli ponlujiu siga kijiu bambo mitikang nai maruta khai lujiu Mose nai Aaron tu majang lujiu wang Mathenky rengmun gase chapde.
Siga Korah niu maidung pakhiangnatu puimadui lujiu Mose nai Aaron tu muntong lujiu Mathenky rengmun gase wang chapde. Siga simak dakjiu
siga
“Haimai-dung khugasu npad chaptam milo, palamra Iniu paliutu kam mahanuang mine.”
Chiudi Mose nai Aaron niu kadihlam panai-zu makhum kiujiu din-e, “Hey, Tingwang yo, nang hai karingbo pakhiangnagu phibang-e. Mai khatniu nuan kam miboga, maidung pakhiangnatu nalung pomrabo ma?”
“Maidungtu Korah, Dathan, khatdi Abiram paliugu mathenky gasu npad mira dinbilo.”
Siga Mose niu pasai suimaidung Israel maigu jupaodungtu maluang lujiu Dathan nai Abiram khulam tadde.

Paniu maidung khuga din-e, “Haibo kasabo maidung khugasu npad chaptam milo khatdi paliugu mania chiubo khatnadi ditulo. Chiumaksai, paliugu nuan pakhiangna jengniu naliutudi paliu nai tamanjiu biakthon mirabo-e.”
Haichiujiu paliuniu Korah, Dathan khatdi Abiram paliugu Mathenky gasu npadkam mide.
Dathan nai Abiram padlujiu panai nao khatdi panai nahdungtu majang lujiu panaigu Mathenky rengmun ga chapde.
Mose niu maidung khuga din-e, “Pakhiangna haise kamra
Haimaidungse Tingwang khugasu sajai daomakjiu charashitga shai misai,
Chiudi simatai makbo jaikhat gasu
Paniu dinloi kaji-kari, Dathan nai Abiram niu bambo kadihse nkak padjiu
sigasu panaitu khatdi panai kikhun maidungtu, Korah saisuimai pakhiangna khatdi paliugu mania hinase kajong lude.
Haichiujiu paliu nai paliugu mania hinase kashaibo kadihga ringjiu tadmide. Kadihse paliu riga karumwangjiu paliu hai hamide.
Paliuniu marabo khuan chiulujiu siga bambo Israel maidung pakhiangnase pakmide. Paliuniu senpadle, “Pakmilo! Aliutudi kadih hainiu kajonglu talakge!”
Sigasu
Siga
“Chaminiu ruthon mibo gasu masiakbo tataagigu khanglise lupadmira khatdi khangli gasu mitikangse wakhatlam ponthon mira singku Aaron nahpiu Eleazar khuga dinlo, palamra khanglise masanbo-e.
Haidungse
Haichiujiu singku Eleazar niu khanglise ponlujiu rathakbam tomrabo leng apiubo chakuangdung kadam padde.
Haise Israel maidungleng kachan khaibo khat thiujiu Aaron kaikik makbo mai khatniudi
Pasaibo nai maidung hinaniu Mose nai Aaron tu suini makbose kamjiu din-e, “Nanainiu
Mose nai Aaron tu suini makbo cham dinra paliuniu wang aruang lubosai, paliuniu Mathenky lam mari wangboga siga kamuangniu gombambo khatdi
Mose nai Aaron niu tadlujiu Mathenky masuangga chapde,
siga
“Haimaidung khugasu npadmilo, sichiujiu Iniu paliutu sibo bam gasu kam maha mine.”
Panai khangniase panai-zu kadihga kinkiu khudung kiude.

Khatdi Mose niu Aaron khuga din-e, “Nagu khanglise ponlujiu, kijiu bambo mitikangse rathakbam gasu sibo lungga khailo. Khatdi maruta kasia mitikang riga khailo. Sise majadjiu maidung khuga kamlujiu paliutu kam masan khaibo tiense thiukhailo. Majadlo!

Aaron niu kadin piujiu, pagu khangli ponlujiu wang maduijiu bambo maidunggu n-gangga pakwangde. Chararetse padmide chiubo paniu ngaoluboga, marutase mitikang riga khaide sigasu maidungtu kam masan khaibo tien paniu kamkhaide.
Haisiniu chararet situ kham khaide, khatdi paniu karingmai nai kashaimai kakga chap khaide.
Shaimibo maidungse Korah gu chari thiubo maitu chakmakjiu 14,700 ye.
Chararet saomibo tingga, Aaron niu Mathenkiga Mose khuga malanwang mide.
“Tathun kariu-je-niakiu, Israel mai kiphiugu jupao hina gasu khat-khat nakhuga ponwangra Israel maidung khuga dinbilo. Tathun rigase pazan zanse raokhailo,
sigasu Aaron zanse Levi mainiu thinrabo thun rigase raokhailo. Chaphiu hinagu jupaodung hinaleng tathun khat-khat bamkam rabo-e.
Sise Iniu bambo Mathenky gase thinwanglo khatdi Iniu paliutu zudaobo, Chamriat Bung masuang gase khailo.
Iniu kadalubo piugu thunse pabuan bonkhangne. Haichiujiu natu pawan machangna suini makbo Israel maidungtu Iniu kham khaine.”
Haichiujiu Mose niu Israel maidungtu npaode, khatdi paliugu jupaodung hinaniu chaphiu hinagu tathun khat-khat, pakhiangna kariu-je-niakiu pakhuga pikhaide, siga Aaron thun sidi ponwang khaide.
Sigasu Mose niu tathun pakhiangnase ponlujiu Mathenkiga
Mose niu tathun pakhiangnase ponlujiu wang Israel maidung khuga lenkhaide. Nde padmi gulo chiubose paliuniu ngaode, sigasu jupaodung siniu pathunse khoilande.
niu Mose khuga din-e, Aaron thunse Chamriat Bung masuangga khailo. Suinimak tanbo Israel maidungleng kachan khaibo khat thiujiu haise khai nbambo-e. Paliuniu suini makbo saomi maksai shairabo-e.”
niu dinbo kumgapjiu Mose niu kamde.
Israel maidungniu Mose khuga din-e, “Chiusai haise aliuleng kaloibode!
Mai khatniu Mathenky mungga wangsai shaisiak rabo-e, sichiusai aliu mathiu kashaibo nai nchamme!”
Mathenkygu tatien thiubo tingga, nang nai nanahpiudungtu tatien thiujiu natu nkhara Levi kiphiutu nakiriangga puiwanglo.

Paliuniu nakhuga paliu ngam khatdi Mathenkiga paliuniu parid phungbo hinase wangtang khairabo-e, chiudi Masanbo Bamga bambo mania maksai rathak bamga paliuniu wang manamak rabo-e. Paliuniu wang manasai, paliu nai natu kamshat mirabo-e.
Paliuniu natu maluang lujiu tatien thiujiu khatdi Mathenkygu tatien hinaleng paliuniu parid phungbo hinase piwang tangkhai rabo-e, chiudi buimakbo mai khatniudi nang nai tatien thiumak rabo-e.
Nang khatdi nanahpiudung ronna Masanbo Bamga maksai rathakbamgu ngiudon hinagu parid phung rabo-e, chiusai agu lungpomse Israel maidung khuga padlan lakge.
Nakhuga kalen khat thiujiu Israel maidung ruang gasu nakiriang leng Levi maitu kada khaibo piuse Iniu-e. Mathenkiga paliu ngamse kamngam lura paliu haitu akhuga kadpat mibo-e.

Chiudi paliuniu rathakbamga khatdi Masanthubo Bamga bambo singku tien lamga nang khatdi nanahpiudung ronna parid phungbo pakhiangnase piwangtang khai rabo-e. Haidungse nangniu phungrabo paridsi-e, palamra Iniu natu singku tien gu kalense pikhaibode. Buimakbo mai khatniudi masanbo mania mungga wang manasai patuse kamshat mirabo-e.”

Rathakbamga rujiu kadpatbo masanthubo pipatdung pahangga bambodungse nagu thiurabo-e: miusy pipatbo, nuan gu pipatbo, ruilanbogu pipatdungse akhuga masanbo khat thiujiu kadpat mibo mania pakhiangnase nagu khatdi nanahpiudunggu thiurabo-e.
Nangniu haidungse masanbo bamga tiurabo-e, khatdi masanbo maniadung-e chiu lukhai lujiu, npiumai ronna sise tiurabo-e.

“Hairiga sanjiu, Israel maidungniu kakibo nkiubo pipat akhuga kadpatbo hinase nagu rabo-e. Haidungse Iniu naleng khatdi nanahpiudung nai nanahpuidung leng wangrabo pawan hinaleng pikhaibo-e. Nakikhun-ga characheng saisuijiu masan mai hinaniu tiubo sui-e.
“Israel maidungniu takum machangna kampad raithubo withubo pakhiangna: takisa, jaw, khatdi miusy akhuga pirabose Iniu nakhu pirabo-e.
Pakhiangna haise nagu rabo-e. Nakikhun-ga characheng saisuijiu masanbo mai hinaniu tiubo sui-e.

“Nahraibo ngena hina maksai khaorui-khaona hina Israel maidungniu akhuga kadpat mibo hina nagu rabo-e. Chiudi naraibo nah hinatu paman pijiu liulanbose, khatdi tajai saisuijiu masanbo khaoring piangrai thubo hinatu paman pijiu liulanbose nangniu suikhai rabo-e.
Chahiu khat tangmibo nah maidungtu mathiuniu tadjiu bambo lunlung saisuijiu riatlubo rangkang mangiuniu liulan rabo-e.

Chiudi piangrai thubo matom, mily khatdi kamidung tura liulan suimakge; haidungse agukam rabo-e sichiujiu kadpat khai rabo-e. Rathakbamga paliu zai manuk khaibo khatdi katiu kasak pipatbo thiujiu pasa rukhaibo, parimse akhuga kimme.
Nkiujiu kadpatbo paga nai majadlamgu paphise nagu rabo-e.

“Israel maidungniu akhuga nkiubo pipat thiujiu kadpatbo pakhiangnase Iniu naleng, nanahpiudung leng, khatdi nanahpuidung leng, wangrabo chaken hina pirabo-e. Haise Iniu nakhuga khatdi natah nanahdung khuga kampang makrabo chamriat thiukhaibo si-e.”
Kakibo Israel maidungniu Mathenkiga wadaodi wang mana makrabo-e, khatdi haichiujiu kashaibo ladjan paliu riga phungwang makrabo-e.

Tuhoi gasu Levi kymai ronna Mathenky haise phuirabo-e khatdi sibogu parid pakhiangnase phungrabo-e. Haise tingtheng leng tajai thiujiu naliu tah-nah maidung pakhiangna khugadi bamrabo-e, Levi maira Israel maidung ruangga paliugu tingtheng leng thiubo mania bamlakge.

Palamra Israel maidungniu paliugu nkiubo pipadbo dam kariugu damkhat akhu pipatbose paliu dam thiura Iniu paliu khu pikhai mibo-e. Haijengniu paliura Israel maidung ruanggasu paliugu tingtheng leng thiubo mania ha-e chiujiu Iniu paliu khuga dinkhaibo-e.”
Haibo nkiubo pipadse chalu tien thiumainiu kasanbo jaw pipatbo nai machamjiu lukhai rabo-e.
Israel maidung khugasu
Naliuniu daolubo withubose pilo.
Withubo damse naliuniu pipatbo tingga, chalu tien thiu mainiu pagu pipat lubosai masiak lubose pakhuga bammibo kum, kakibose naliu khuga khaibambo sui-e.
Nang nai nakikhun maidungniu kakibo dungse tiunibo bam bamga tiubo sui-e palamra haise nangniu Mathenkiga tatien thiubogu phijeng-e.
Sise nangniu tiubo tingga nagu withubo damse
sichiujiu panainiu sise singku Eleazar khuga pirabo-e. Sise lenlam hapad lujiu rijiky tingbang lamse kamshat rabo-e.
Siga Eleazar niu pajai kasia kampad lujiu pah njungniu Mathenky jailamse kajinkhai lon chinnia khai rabo-e.
Chakhaopum pakhiangnase, pagi, patia, pajai, sigasu palungjan hinase singku masuangga rurabo-e.
Sigasu paniu cedar sing kasia, chahutang khatdi chalangriang kahengbo thinlujiu sise chami jiuga thonkhai rabo-e.
Sichiu lusai, paniu pafai pani katha lujiu khatdi pariga tadui kajin khaijiu, khatdi sigasu paniu rijikyga ngutbo sui-e, chiudi characheng saisuijiu chawan tangbo masan makjiu bambo-e.
Matom karumai sidi pafai-pani kathasiak rabo-e, khatdi pariga tadui runkhai rabo-e, padi chawan tangbo masan makjiu bam rabo-e.

Sigasu characheng saisuijiu masan mibo mai pasiniu matomgu miruise ruilujiu sise rijiky lenlam characheng saisuijiu masanbo bamga khailujiu, sibo nam gasu maidungniu characheng saisuijiu taniabose luthon rabo-e. Haibo masanbo tiense nuan luthonra kambo-e.

Mirui karuimai siniu pafai-pani kathami rabo-e, chiudi pase chawan tangbo masan makjiu bam rabo-e. Haibo tajaise wangkinbo wan hinaga, Israel maidung khatdi paliu ruangga lungjiu bambo sangdiumaidung lengdi tadjiu bamrabo-e.
Mai khatniu kashaibo pum khattu nia lusai characheng saisuijiu jeng chinnia masan makjiu bam rabo-e.

Paniu paronna patu khiu masanbo haise jengsumbo nai khatdi jeng chinniabo nai khiu masan sangjing rabo-e, sigasu pahai masanmi rabo-e. Chiudi paniu jengsumbo nai khatdi jeng chinniabo nai paronna patu khiu masan lumaksai, pahai masanta mibo-e.
Mai khatniu kashaibo pum khattu nialujiu khatdi patu paronna khiu masanlu maksai pahai masan makjiu bammibo-e, palamra khiu masan khaibo duise pariga runkhai makbo-e. Paniu
Mai khatniu Mathenky khat lungga shaimi sai, kashaibo wan-ga mai khat kumboniu Mathenkiga bamsai sibo lungga ngutbo pahai jeng chinnia characheng saisuijiu masan makjiu bam rabo-e.
Sibo kilungga pagom khaimakbo karung khatdi chali hina sidi masan tamibo-e.

Nkham lenlamsu kamshat mibo pum khattu maksai charashit shaibo pum khattu mai khatniu niamisai maksai chamai ra situ maksai charao situ, niamisai characheng saisuijiu pahai jeng chinnia masan makjiu bam rabo-e.
Nuan luthonra rumibo matom kahengbogu miruise lupad lujiu, taniabose luthonra, chali khat lungga khailujiu khatdi tadui kasanbo khaisanlo.

Raibo lamniu characheng saisuijiu masanjiu bambo paniu, chahutangse sibo duiga sumlujiu, khatdi Mathenky lungga bambo mania khatdi sibo lungga bambo maidung pakhiangna rigase kajin khailo. Niabo lamniu characheng saisuijiu masanjiu bambo paniu chamai ra maksai shaimibo pum maksai charaw niamibo mai riga taduise kajin khairabo-e.

Jengsumbo nai khatdi jeng chinniabo nai characheng saisuijiu masanjiu bambo paniu characheng saisuijiu pakhuga taduise kajinkhai rabo-e. Jeng chinniabo nai paniu sibo piu situ kam masan khai rabo-e, paniu pafai-pani katha masanlu khatdi taduise pariga paronna kajin khaisai, characheng saisuijiu naimik ngut misai masan mine.
Characheng saisuijiu masan tamibo maise haichiujiu patu paronna khiu masan maksai pahai masan makjiu bam rabo-e, palamra khiu masan khaibo duise pariga runkhai makhabo-e. Paniu

Naliuniu haibo tajaise wangkinbo pawan hinaga majai rabo-e. Khiu masan khairaleng tadui kajin khaibo piu sidi, pafai-pani katha rabo-e; tadui niabo maise characheng saisuijiu chawan tangbo masan makjiu bam rabo-e.
Taniabo mai siniu niabo hinase taniakam mibo-e. Khatdi sise niabo mai hinase chawan tangbo masan makjiu bam rabo-e.
Raithubo hiugase Israel mai pakhiangna Zin ramjingga wang-e khatdi Kadesh ga rijiky thiukhai-e. Siga Miriam shaimide khatdi patu siga baikhai mide.
haichiu din-e: “Aliuniu kakibo Israel maidungtu maluang lujiu
Deleng nanainiu aliutu ramjingga puiwang jiulo? Haichiusai aliura aliugu khaorui nai haiga shaimi raleng ronna ma?
Deleng nanainiu aliutu Egypt dih gasu wadi pageng habo chariu magen thiubo bamga puiwang jiulo? Miusy, ndutsy, mumsy, majongsy wadi haiga ha-e, sigasu taduidi sakra ha-e!”
Mose nai Aaron niu maidung ruanggasu tadpat lujiu Mathenky kamun ga chapde, panai-zu makhumde,siga

“Cham-riat Bung masuangga bambo tathunse thinlujiu, Aaron nanainiu maidung pakhiangnatu puiwang maduilo. Maidung masuang gasu tudi tuse tadui padra mathiu masuangga dinlo siga taduise luangpad rabo-e. Haichiubo thak gasu maidungleng khatdi paliugu khaorui siniu sakra taduise tudi gasu padrabo-e.”
niu chamtan khaibo kumjiu Mose niu tadlujiu tathunse khoilude.
Aaron panainiu maidung pakhiangnatu tudi masuangga puimadui wanglujiu, siga Mose niu din-e, “Nkinglo, chari thiumaidung! Naliuleng anainiu haibo tudi gasu tadui kampad rama?”
Siga Mose niu tathun khengkhang lujiu tudiga lekhai lonnia khaide, siga duipin kadibo khat luangpadde, sichiujiu mai hina khatdi paliugu khaoruidung siniu tadui saklude.
Chiudi
Haise Israel maidungniu
Chakhumpao maitu Mose niu Kadesh gasu Edom wangpiu khuga langkhaide. Paliuniu din-e, “Haibo chamse nasingnamai, Israel mai kiphiudung gasu-e. Aliuniu chariu khengjiu,
takum wajiukha aliuniu lungkhai mibo, Egypt kadihga aliu paopeh maidungniu dechiujiu tadmilo chiubo nangniu si-e. Egypt maidungniu aliu pao-peh maitu khatdi aliutu kam masa khai mibo-e.
Siga aliutu nkha khai raleng

Chalung sajiu aliutu naram tadkenra suikhailo. Aliu nai aliugu matom kabui nagu puidi gasu tadpad lakge, maksai nagu luzam maksai mumsy rengga ngutlakge, khatdi aliuniu nagu akhun gasu tadui sak lakge. Aliuniu naram kenmak thenna nagu puidiga ronna tadkhaine.”
Chiudi Edom mainiu paokakge, “Naliuniu aliu kadih tadkenra suini makge! Naliuniu tadkenra kamsai, aliu padlujiu chari thiune.”
Israel maidungniu din-e, “Aliuniu puidi gase ronna bamne, khatdi aliuniu maksai aliugu khaoruiniu naliu dui saksai, aliuniu sibo manse pine, aliuniu masenbo sira tadken khaira ronna-e.”
Edom mainiu dinlan-e. “Aliu suini makge!” sichiujiu Israel maidungtu chari thiura katanbo riphendungtu puilujiu tadpatde.
Edom mainiu Israel maitu pijiu paliu ram tadken lakge chiubo jengniu, Israel maidungniu katambo npuilam marilujiu tadmide.
Israel maidungniu Kadesh phutlujiu Hor Luong,
Edom arailam wangde. Siga Mose nai Aaron khuga
“Iniu Israel maidung khuga piraleng riatkhaibo kadih gase Aaron niu ngutlakge; pahai shaimi rabo-e, palamra nanai khangniase Meribah ga agu chamtantu suini makjiu atung mide.
Aaron nai panahpiu Eleazar tu Hor Luongga puikhanglo,
khatdi siga Aaron gu singku thiubo ntiangse lupad lujiu sise Eleazar khuga khaibilo. Aaron sira siga shaikhai mirabo-e.”
niu chamtan pikhaibose Mose niu kamde. Mai mathiuniu ngaobamga panainiu Hor Luong ga khangde,
Mose niu Aaron khuga pagu singku ntiangse lupad lujiu Eleazar khuga piukhai mide. Sibo luongton riga Aaron shaikhai mide, sigasu Mose nai Eleazar malankiu mide.
Param maidung pakhiangna siniu Aaron shaimide chiubo silujiu siga paliu mathiu padon jengniu jeng samriu achung khaide.
Siga Israel maidungniu
niu paliu khuan chiukhaide, khatdi Canaan maitu paliuniu ngamlura nkha khai bide. Haichiujiu Israel maidungniu paliugu namdidung kam maha kam mide, haichiujiu sibo bam zanse Hormah

Tingwang nai Mose tu suini makjiu dinsude. Paliuniu suini makboniu, “Deleng aliutu Egypt kadih gasu haibo ramjing katiu-kasak maksai tadui kahabo bamga shai raleng aliutu puitad jiulo? Haikumbo chariu magenthiubo tatek gasu aliu bamngam lulak mide!”
Sigasu paliu ruangga
Maidungniu Mose khuga wanglujiu din-e, “Aliuniu
Haichiujiu maidungleng Mose niu
Haichiujiu Mose niu tanaaginiu kaniu khat machalujiu khatdi sise tasington riga khaide. Kaniuniu machao mimai siniu sibo tanaagi kaniutu phuijiu wimide.
Israel maidungniu tadpatjiu Oboth ga paliu rijiky thiukhaide.
Sibo bamse phutlujiu, Abarim gu kaomibo Moab maigu naimik padlam bambo luongrianggu ramjingga rijiky thiukhaide.
Sibosai paliuniu Zered Ramjengga rijiky thiukhaide
Sigasu paliu tadpat lanjiu Amor maigu luongriang tangboga bambo ramjing lungga, Arnon giu roklam paliugu rijiky thiukhaide. (Arnon hai Moab mai nai Amor mai ramkakga bambo ramrai-e).
Haijengniu
khatdi Arnon namdak gasu Moab mai ramrai tangboga bambo paluong-pabek thiubo ramjeng,” chiujiu dinbo-e.
Sibo bam gasu paliuniu “Amaidungtu puiwang maduilo, siga Iniu paliuleng tadui pikhaine” chiujiu
Sibo wan-ga Israel maidungniu haibo luise thiu-e:
“Akhun yo, tadui luangpad sulo;
Sichiusai chalui thiujiu aliu natu kahumne-
Chawang nahpiudung nai maidunggu jupaodungniu chukhaibo akhun hai
chawang thunniu khatdi maidung thun siniu chukhai-e”
Paliuniu sibo ramjing gasu Mattanah gu ramjingga,
sigasu paliuniu Nahaliel ga, khatdi sigasu Bamoth ga,
khatdi Bamoth gasu Pisgah Luongphi ramjing phuipad ngaobo, Moab maigu luongriang lungga bambo ramjingga tadle.
Siga Israel mainiu Amor mai wangpiu Sihon khuga haichiu dinra champao maidungtu langkhaide.

“Aliutu naliu ram piken khailo, aliu nai aliugu matom kabui puidi gasu majupad lakge khatdi naliugu luzamga maksai mumsirengga pingut lakge, aliuniu naliugu akhun gasu tadui saklakge; aliuniu naram tadton makthenna, parathiubo puidi gase bamne.
Chiudi Sihon niu Israel maidungtu pijiu tadkenra suikhai makge. Paniu pagu riphenmai dungtu kuwang aruanglujiu Jahaz ramjingga padde khatdi Israel maidungtu chari thiude.

Chiudi Israel maidungniu chamai kakeng khatu chari bamga gimide khatdi paliu ramse Arnon giu gasu Jabok nrilam, sisera, Ammoni mai khulam lulu mide, palamra Ammoni mai ramrai lamse tanjiu chapkham lude.
Haichiujiu Israel maidungniu Amor maigu namdi pakhiangnase, Heshbon nai sibo wonjengga bambo namdakdungse lulujiu siga lungbam mide.
Heshbon hai karaiga Moab gu wangtu ngamlujiu Arnon giu tangbo lumibo Sihon chawang gu dihsing namdi-e.
Haijengniu walam makumsi mainiu chalui thiu-e,
“Chawang Sihon gu namdi Heshbon ga wanglo!
Haise thiusu lanbo khatdi kalankhai lanbotu aliu ngaokhai ni-e.
Sihon gu riphenmaise chami katao kumjiu padle:
Haisiniu Moab ga bambo Ar namditu kam maha mide;
khatdi Arnon luong hinase kajuang lude.
Moab mai yo, naliu hai dejiukha sansa ralo!
Chemosh tu kahum maidung naliutu kam maha mide!
Naliu ra siniu maidungtu padih kahamai pithiu khaide,
khatdi maipuidungse Amor mai wangpiugu kavangthiu mide.
Chiudi tuhoira paliu kaikikdung situ kam maha mide.
Heshbon gasu Dibon khatdi Medeba mungga bambo
Nashim gasu Nophah tangbo kam maha mide.”
Haichiujiu Israel maidungniu Amor maigu ramlungga lung mide,
sigasu Jazer namditu chari thiura withubo npuise phuipadra Mose niu maidungtu langkhaide. Israel maidungniu sise sutlude khatdi sibo wonjengga bambo namdakdung khatdi Amor maidungtu hathon mide.
Sigasu Israel maidungniu mariwang Bashan lam tadbo npuise luikhangde, siga Bashan mai Wangpiuniu Edrei ga chari thiura hapad sude.

niu Mose khuga din-e, “Patu pingmane. Iniu natu pijiu pariga khatdi pamaidung pakhiangna riga khatdi pagu kadihse nangniu ngamra pikhai bine. Nangniu Heshbon ga mawangbo Amor mai wangpiu Sihon tu kambo kumjiu patudi kamkhai bilo.”
Haichiujiu Israel maidungniu Og tu, panahpiudungtu, khatdi pamai hinatu, mai khattudi masiak khai makjiu kamshat kam mide, sichiujiu paliuniu pagu kadihse lumide.
Israel mainiu tadpatjiu khatdi Jordan gu naimik padlam Jericho tu muntuangbo bamga bambo Moab maigu taningdihga paliu rijiky thiukhaide.
Israel maidungniu Amor maitu nde kamkhai mibolo khatdi Israel maidung dejiukha bamlo chiubo, Moab wangpiu, Zippor nahpiu Balak niu chiuluboga,
pah khatdi pamaidung pakhiangna charen mide.
Moab maidungniu Midian maidunggu jupaodung khuga din-e, “Matomchi khatniu tagibogu piubuan kumjiu, haibo riphen maidungniu aliu mungga bambo pakhiangnatu kam maha mirabo-e.”

Haijengniu Amaw ramlungga Euphrate giumung Pethor ga bambo, Beor nahpiu Baalam tu kura chawang Balak niu walang tadmaitu langkhaide. Balak khugasu paliuniu haibo chamse pakhuga phungwang meng-e: “Egypt kadih gasu jat hinase wangbamme; sibo maidungse pabam hinaga lung marenjiu khatdi aliu kadih sutmira kam charen khaijiu bambotu Iniu natu pijiu sikhai ni-e.

Paliu hai aliu mairiak suang keng-e haijengniu chalung sajiu wangkhailo khatdi aleng paliu riga tasiang pikhailo. Haichiu dasai aliuniu paliutu kamkao lubui-e, khatdi sibo ramgasu paliutu hathon lubui-e. Nangniu thoidam khengkhaibo tingga, maidung thoidam ngao-e, khatdi nangniu tasiang siangkhaibo tingga, paliutu tasiang hangga khai-e chiubo Iniu si-e.”
Haichiujiu Moab mai nai Midia maigu jupaodungniu tasiang man pilujiu paliutu majang lujiu, Balaam khulam tadjiu, pakhuga Balak chamse pikhaide.
Balaam niu paliu khuga din-e, “Thainai nchun haiga bamkhailo, khatdi nsuannai nsuan
Tingwang niu Balaam khuga wanglujiu maniu-e, “Nakhuga bam maidungse sao-saolo?”
Paniu paokakge,” Egypt kadih gasu tadpat maidungse charam pakhiangnaga bam kajanpan wangkinne,
chiubo paliuniu akhuga dinra Moab mai wangpiu Balak niu langkhaibo-e. Paniu paliutu aphen ngam lujiu sigasu paliutu hathon mira,paliu riga Iniu tasiang siangkhaira paniu atu masenbo-e.”
Tingwang niu Balaam khuga din-e, “Haimaidungtu maluang lujiu tadmane, khatdi Israel mai riga tasiang pikhai mane, palamra paliu khuga agu thoidam bamme.”
Pasaibo nai nsuan Balaam niu Balak walang tadmaidung khuga tadlujiu din-e, “Chakylam malan wang sulo; I naliu saisui tadra
Haichiu paliuniu Balak khulam malanwang lujiu khatdi Balaam niu paliu saisui tadni makge chiujiu paokhaide.
Sigasu Balak niu langkhai raimai suang parathiu nkiubo jupaodung pariak keng nkiujiu langkhaide.
Paliuniu Balaam khuga tadlujiu Balak chamse paokhaide: “Chalungsajiu akhuga wangrabo gasu wakhat niudi natu pijiu khammi tulo!
Iniu naleng tathuon kengjiu pikhai bine khatdi nangniu dinbo hina kamkhai bine. Chalungsajiu wangkhailo khatdi aleng haibo maidungtu siangkhailo.”
Chiudi Balaam niu paokakge, “Balak niu pawangkining bamga pagu kachia rangkang pakhiangna aleng pikhai bidi, Iniu a-Rawang,
Chiudi kakibo mainiu kamkhai mibo kumjiu, thainai nchun bamkhailo, chiusai
Sibo nchun di Tingwang niu Balaam khuga wangjiu din-e, “Haibo maidungniu nakhuga wangjiu paliu nai tad machamra dinsai, tadra kadenlulo, chiudi Iniu dinbo ronna kamlo.”
Haichiujiu pasaibo nai nsuanse, Balaam niu pagu qonniam tuanglujiu Moab maigu jupaodungtu maluang lujiu tadmide.
Balaam tadmibo jengniu Tingwang palung pommide, siga pagu qonniam riga tuanglujiu, pavangpiu kaniatu majang lujiu tadkinboga.
maza siniu chaheng thinlujiu chapbam niubo qonniam siniu ngaoboga, npuise phutlujiu chalu jamlam marikhai mide. Balaam siniu qonniam situ lekjiu khatdi puidilam puiwang lande.
Sigasu Mumsireng kania kakga, jainia lamse chakhao-turen bammibo, npui marumwang mibo gase maza wang chapkham mide.
Konniam niu mazatu ngaoluboga, kareng tun gase jongkhaide khatdi Balaam ngense kagitao mide. Balaam niu qonniam situ leklande.
maza niu suanglam padlande. Pajai khatlamdi padlura pabam wadi hamibo bam khatga maza chapbam mide.
Tuhoira qonniam siniu maza situ ngaoluboga, kaokiu mide. Balaam hai pagu lungpom padmide khatdi pagu qonniam haitu pagu singtangniu leksude.
Siga
Balaam niu paokakge, “Palamra nangniu atu kamengbo thak kamkhaibo gasu-e! Akhuga chaheng bamniusai Iniu natu gimi rabo-e.”
Konniam siniu paokakge, “Naringtingga nangniu tuangjiu bambo qonniam siakse I makma? Iniu karai masuangga haichiujiu nakhuga kamkhai mijiu ma?”
“Makge,” chiujiu paniu paokakge.

Siga
maza siniu din-e, “Nangniu dekamjiu qonniam haitu leklon sum lekkhai gulo? Iniu nagu npui khamra wangbo-e, palamra, nangniu haibo tabinse tadmak rabo-e.
Chiudi nagu qonniam siniu atu ngaoluboga pak mari lonsum mibo-e. Konniam siniu haichiu kammakge sai Iniu natu gimi rabo-e sigasu qonniam situ piring khai rabo-e.”
Balaam niu paokakge, “I maomide. Nangniu atu suimakra puidiga chap bamme chiubo I simakjiu-e; chiudi tuhoira Iniu tadlan rabose mao-e chiu nangniu maningsai, I chakylam malanwang mine.”
Chiudi maza siniu din-e, “Haibo maidungtu maluang lujiu tadsulo chiudi Iniu dinlo chiubo ronna dinlo.” Haijengniu Balaam niu paliutu maluang lujiu tadlan sude.
Balaam wangkinne chiubo Balak niu chiuluboga, Moab ramraigu Arnon giu riga bambo Ar namdi khatga, paniu menglujiu patu sundaode.
Balak niu pakhuga din-e, “Iniu natu kura langkhai raiboga nangniu dekamjiu wangmak jiulo? Iniu natu tathuon pi mawi ngam lakge chiu nangniu maning jiuma?”
Balaam niu paokakge, “I wangde, I wangmak jiuma? Chiudi tuhoira, akhuga degu pumtan bamjiulo? Tingwang niu atu dinlo chiubo ronna I din ngamme.”
Haichiujiu Balak niu Balaam tu maluang lujiu Huzoth gu namdak lam tadmide.
Siga Balak niu matom-kabui khatdi mily kengkha gilujiu Balaam khatdi pasai suiwangbo jupaodungtu pikhai bide.
Pasaibo nai nsuan Balaam tu Balak niu Bamoth Baal ga puikhangde, siga Balaam niu Israel mai khangsiatu ngao-e.
Paniu Balak khuga din-e, “Haiga aleng rathak bam chinnia thiukhailo, sigasu matomchi chinnia khatdi midangchi chinnia akhuga hawanglo.”
Pakhuga dinkhaibo kumjiu Balak niu kam khaide, sichiujiu Baalam panainiu rathakbam hinaga matomchi nai midangchi khat khat kadkhaide.
Siga Balaam niu Balak khuga din-e, “
siga Tingwang niu patu adaode. Balaam niu pakhuga din-e, “Iniu rathakbam chinnia thiukhaide khatdi matomchi khat khat, nai midangchi khat khat rathakbam hinaga kadkhai bamme.”
Degu dinralo chiubo
Haichiujiu paniu malan wangbo tingga, Balak niu Moab maigu jupaodungtu maluang lujiu paniu rujiu kadkhaibo munggase chapbam niubo ngaode.
Balaam niu haibo phaimiu chamse dinpad sude:
“Moab wangpiu Balak niu atu tingbanglam bambo,
Syria luong gasu atu maluang wang-e.
Paniu din-e, ‘Wanglo khatdi aleng dinkhailo,
Israel maidung riga tasiang khaibilo.’
Tingwang niu siangkhai makbo maitu Iniu dechiu siangkhai ralo,
maksai
Kakubo tudi rigasu paliutu Iniu ngao-e;
Maluong poi rigasu Iniu paliutu phuikiu ngao-e.
Paliura paliu ronna lungbo jatle;
Kakibo jattu suang, paliutu thoidam pi nkiu khai-e chiubo paliuniu si-e.
Israel maidung kaikikra nbuiniang kumbo-e
Paliu riak kengjujiu chakngam lakge.
Tingwang maidung khat kumjiu Ira atingmik loikhaijiu tane;
Tacheng matipmai kumjiu agi-manaijiu, Ira shaikhaijiu tane.”
Siga Balak niu Balaam khuga din-e, “Nangniu akhuga degu kamkhai gulo? Agu mikre maidungtu siangkhaira Iniu natu haiga puiwangbo-e, chiudi nangniu kamkhaibo pakhiang hai paliutu thoikhaibo-e.”

Sigasu Balak niu Balaam khuga din-e, “Israel mai khangsiatu nangniu ngaolu rabo katambo bam khatga asai suiwanglo. Siga aleng nangniu paliutu siang khailo.”
Paniu patu hai Zophim luzam gu Pisgah Luongton ga puikhang khaide. Sigadi paniu rathakbam chinnia thiukhaide khatdi sibo ri hina gadi matomchi khat khat nai midangchi khat khat kadkhaide.
Balaam niu Balak khuga din-e, “Nangniu rukhaijiu kadkhaibo bam mungga chapbam niulo, khatdi Iniu uibo bamga Tingwang tu adao lujiu wangne.”
Haichiujiu paniu malan wangbo tingga Balak niu Moab maigu jupao dungtu maluanglu rukhaijiu kadkhaibo bam mungga chapbam niubo ngaode.
“Wanglo, Zippor nahpiu Balak, Sichiujiu Iniu dinrabo situ nkinglo.
Tingwang haira aratbo chamaina kum makge;
Para pachun kalipad kali-ngutbo chamaina kum makge.
Paniu ladriat thiubo hinase, paniu kamme;
Paniu dinbose maomakjiu padmibo-e.
Thoikhaira atu ladti khaibi-e,
sichiu Tingwang niu thoikhai miboga,
Iniu kumalan ngam lakge.
Israel mai donleng Iniu ngao masuangbose
sansabo maksai chariubose pakhuga wanglakge.
Paliu
Pahai paliu wangpiu-e chiujiu paliuniu dinron bamme.
Tingwang niu paliutu Egypt dih gasu puipad khai bide;
Paniu pamaidungleng chara buichi kumjiu aphen khai bine.
Siga chamik thao-kadadbo manguipiu ha-e, siga tathoi ha-e.
Sise thinpiujiu Israel maitu atung ngam lakge.
Tuhoira maidungniu Israel maidung lamga din-e,
‘Tingwang niu kamkhai mibose phuilo!’
Israel mai jatra kangambo ndongqui khat kumme:
Siseniu maki lujiu tatap-tap makthenna,
khatdi gi-dangmi mai zaise saklu makthen mathak lakge.”
Siga Balak niu Balaam khuga din-e, “Nangniu Israel maidungtu siangni makge chiudi paliutu thoikhaibo haira kam khai mane!”
Balaam niu paokakge, “
Balak niu din-e, “Asai suiwanglo, khatdi Iniu natu kakibo bamlam puimeng bine. Saosila, siga nangniu paliutu ajeng gasu siangkhaibo Tingwang niu suikhaidi sui-e.”
Haichiujiu paniu ramjing phuimeng ngaobo Peor Luongton lam puikhangde.
Balaam niu pakhuga din-e, “Haiga rathak bam chinnia thiukhailo khatdi matomchi chinnia sigasu midangchi chinnia hawanglo.
Pakhuga dinkhai mibo kumjiu Balak niu kamkhaide, khatdi matomchi nai midangchi khat-khat rathak bam hinaga kadkhaide.”
Tuhoira paniu Israel maidungtu thoikhaira
khatdi Israel maidungniu chaphiu-chaphiu thiujiu rijiky thiulujiu lungbambose ngaolude. Tingwang gu hiupuina niu patu thinman lujiu,
sigasu haibo phaimiu chamse dinpad sude:
“Ngao masan ngambo Beor nahpiu Balaam chamkeng
Tingwang niu dinbambo chamtu chiu ngambopiu.
Kakubo genlam matingbo mikphui siniu
Ngamkambo Tingwang khugasu
madungao khat Iniu ngao-e.
Israel maidunggu Mathenky haise ngaowi-e,
Kadanbang paren-paren thiubo kumme
maksai singgiu mungga bambo kareng kumme.
Maksai singgiu mungga bambo singchongbang kumme.
Paliuleng mali malanbo tingdui bamme
Paliugu alinse tadui kawibo jamga lingkhai nbamme.
Paliu wangpiuse Agag suang di-nkiu rabo-e,
khatdi pawangkining dihse disanpad rabo-e.
Tingwang niu paliutu Egypt dih gasu puipadbo-e;
Paniu paliuleng charabui kumjiu aphen khaine.
paliugu mikremaidungtu kajonglu rabo-e; paliu rahse niakpetmi rabo-e,
paliugu tavaithuse kam tap-tapmi rabo-e.
Sise njitjiu bambo tingga, mai khatniudi patu ken-hu makge.
Israel maitu thoikhaibo maise thoidam ngaone;
khatdi Israel maitu siangkhaibo maise tasiang daone.”
Balak niu palungpom lamsu pa-njum thun lujiu Balaam khuga din-e, “Agu mikre maidungtu siangkhai ra natu kubo-e, chiudi lonsum paliutu siangkhai rabo malin-ga thoikhai mide.
Tuhoira nakylam wangsulo! Iniu natu tathuon pikhaira ladriat thiukhaibo-e, chiudi nangniu daorabo tathuonse
Balaam niu paokakge, “Nangniu akhuga langkhaibo champao maidung khuga Iniu dinkhai mibo-e chiubora,
nangniu nagu chawangkiningga nagu kachia rangkang pakhiangna aleng pijiu tadi, Iniu amaning kamjiu wakhatdi
Balaam niu Balak khuga din-e, “Tuhoira I amai khulam malanwang mine, chiudi Iniu tadmakhaga, sailam Israel maidungniu namai khuga degu kamkhai ralo chiubose Iniu natu kachan khai bine.”
Sigasu paniu haibo sailadse dinpad sude:
“Beor nahpiu Balaam chamkeng,
Ngao masan ngambo mai khatgu ladkeng,
Tingwang niu nde dinbamlo chiubo chiu ngambo
khatdi Kukachangbo gasu wangbo tasi kabambo piu,
matingjiu phuibo mik siniu kakubo lamsu
Ngamkambo Tingwang gasu madungao khat ngao-e.
Iniu sailamtu phui-e,
siga Israel maigu jattu Iniu ngao-e.
Sibo jat ruanggasu, ganbiu kumjiu chawang khat Israel ga wangne.
Paniu Moab maigu jupaodungtu lek sune khatdi Seth maidung pakhiangnatu lek kaomi rabo-e.
Paniu Edom ga pagu mikredungtu ngamlune.
sichiujiu paliu ramtu pagu mania thiu mine,
Israel maidungniu chari ngamjutjiu,
Israel maigu jatniu paliutu tao-talui rabo-e.
Khatdi ring kabang maitu kam mahami rabo-e.”
Haichiujiu Balaam niu pagu madungao gasu Amalek maitu ngaolujiu sigasu haibo sailadse dinpad sude:
“Amalek maise jat hina ruangga tanthu bamniu-e.
Chiudi kanamboga sise tingtheng hami rabo-e.”
Pagu madungao ga paniu Keni maitu ngaolujiu haibo sailadse dinpad sude:
“Nangniu lungjiu bambo bamse matidle,
Kubo tulipga bambo thingna sip kumme,
Chiudi Assyria niu naliutu kavangleng puitadboga
Keni mai tura kam maha mirabo-e.”
Balaam niu haibo sailadse dinpadle:
“Duiruaklam wang maduijiu bambose dekambo maidunglo?
Chari thiura maidungniu Cyprus gasu malee rampad sune;
Paliuniu Assyria mai nai Eber maitu ngammi rabo-e,
siga paliu hai tingthengjiu hami rabo-e.”
Sigasu Balaam niu kaden loilujiu pakylam malan wangmide, khatdi Balak di pa-npuilam wangmide.
Israel maidungniu Acacia gu Ramjengga rijiky thiukhai lujiu bambo tingga, maipiudungniu siga bambo Moab maipuidungtu maluang nphiuji karen sude.
Moab mai ratu kahumbo bamga, kadpat khaibo khuang ngee gase haibo maipuidung siniudi paliutu kukhaide. Israel maidungniu katiuse tiude khatdi sibo
Peor maigu ra Baal tu kahum sude. Haijengniu
khatdi Mose khuga din-e, “Agu kadinbo piubo thiujiu, Israel maigu jupaodung pakhiangnatu puilujiu paliutu mathiu masuangga kamshat milo, sichiusai Iniu maidung haitu alung pomta mine.”
Mose niu chakampaodung khuga din-e, “Naliu kiphiu gasu Peor maigu Baal tu kahum mibo mai hinatu naliuniu kamshat mirabo-e.”
Haise Eleazar nahpiu Singku Aaron tah, Phinehas niu ngaoluboga, maduijiu bambo maidungtu phutlujiu suchap mide. Paniu changiu khat thinlujiu,
sibo piu nai sibo puitu mathenky lungga hatad mide khatdi pangiuniu panai khangniatu phentaron mide. Haichiu khaibo gasu Israel maidungtu kam mahajiu bambo chararen kasabose saomide,
chiudi sise maidung sang makai madaitu kamshat tang mibo-e.

“Phinehas niu haise kamkhai mibo jengniu, Israel maidungtu Iniu alung pomta mibo-e. Paniu atu makjiu kakibo ratu kahumra suinimakbo jengniu, Iniu haichiujiu agu lungpom gasu paliutu kam maha khaimak tamibo-e.
Sijengniu wangkinbo tingtheng leng Iniu pakhuga agu chamriat thiu khai bine chiubose pakhuga dinkhai bilo.
Patu khatdi pakai pakikdung tura tingtheng agu singku thiura kamkhai mide, palamra atu suini makbo maitu paniu atuk makge, khatdi maidunggu nuan kuak khaibo tiense kam khaide.
Midia maipui panaitu kamshat macham khaimibo Israel maipiu zan siniu, Simeon kiphiuga bambo kikhun-gu papee thiubo, Salu nahpiu Zimri si-e.
Maipui zan siniu Cozbi ku-e. Papiu Zur Midia mai kiriang khatgu papee thiubo mai khatle,
“Midia maitu chari thiulo khatdi paliutu kam mahamilo,
palamra paliuniu Peor ga natu sonjiu khatdi siga chararen kasabo wangbambo tingga Cozbi tu kamshatjiu naliu riga kasabo kamkhai mibo-e.”
“Israel mai pakhiangnatu kikhun saisuijiu, takum makai tangmibo npiumainah pakhiangnatu maksai sisuang tingmibo mai riphen leng buimibo mai hinagu chamairiak chaklo.”

Mose nai Eleazar niu suijiu, sibo ken ga bambo npiumai pakhiangnatu kuwang maduide. Jericho gasu Jordan giuky genlam bambo Moab maigu taningdihga paliu wang maduide. Haidungse Egypt dih gasu tadpatbo Israel maidung-e:
Reuben kiphiu (Reuben hai Jacob nah tingthubo piu-e): Hanokh kiriang Pallu,
Hezron, khatdi Carmi,
Haibo kirianggu npiumaidung riakniu 43,730 ye.
Paliu kaikik siniu Eliab
khatdi panahpiudung Nemuel, Dathan sigasu Abiram ye. (Dathan nai Abiram haitu parammaidungniu kadakhaibo-e. Panainiu Mose nai Aaron tu suimakjiu Korah saisuijiu paliuniu
Kadih nkak padjiu panaitu kajong mide, khatdi chaminiu chamai 250 tu rushatboga Korah panaisai suimaidungdi jaomide.
Chiudi Korah nahpiudung tura kamshat makge).
Simeon kiphiu Nemuel kiriangmai Jamin, Jachin,
Zerah khatdi Shaul ye.
Haibo kirianggu npiumai riakniu 22,200 ye.
Gad kiphiu: Zephon kiriang Haggi, Shuni,
Ozni, Eri,
Arod khatdi Areli-e.
Haibo kiriang maigu npiumai riakniu 40,500 ye.
Judah kiphiu: Shelah kiriang, Perez, Zerah, Hezron khatdi Humul ye. (Judah nahpiu kania, Er nai Onan ra Canaan kadihga shaimide).
Haibo kirianggu npiumai riakniu 76,500 ye.
Issachar kiphiu: Tola kiriang, Puah,
Jashub khatdi Shimron ye.
Haibo kirianggu npiumai riakniu 64,300 ye.
Zebulun kiphiu: Sered kiriang, Elon nai Jahleel ye.
Haibo kirianggu npiumai riakniu 60,500 ye.
Manasseh nai Ephraim khangnia piuse Joseph gu kiphiudung si-e.
Manasseh kiphiu: Manasseh napiu Machir hai Gilead piu-e khatdi pahangga bambo kiriangniu Gilead kaikikdung-e chiujiu madu-e:
Iezer, kiriang: Helek,
Asriel, Shechem,
Shemida, khatdi Hepher paliu-e.
Hepher nahpiu Zelophehad panah npiumai ponmakge, npuimaidung ronna ponne; paliu zanniu: Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milcah khatdi Tirzah paliu-e.
Haibo kiriang gu npiumai riakniu 52,700 ye.
Ephraim kiphiu: Shuthelah kiriang, Becher nai Tahan-e.
Eran kiriangmai gu pao-pehtu majangmeng sai Shuthelah gasu-e.
Haibo kiriang gu npiumai riakniu 32,500 ye.
Haidungse Joseph kiriang gasu lungkiubo-e.
Benjamin kiphiu: Bela kiriang mainiu Ashbel, Ahiram,
Shephupham khatdi Hupham-e.
Ard nai Naaman kirianggu paopeh hai Bela gasu-e.
Hai-bo kirianggu npiumai riakniu 45,600 ye.
Dan kiphiu: Shuham kiriang,
npiumai riakniu 64,400 ye.
Asher kiphiu: Haibo kiriangmai siniu Imnah,Ishvi khatdi Beriah paliu-e.
Heber khatdi Malchiel kiriang majang-meng sai paliu pao-pehse Beriah si-e.
Asher niu panah npuimai khat lung-e, pazanniu Serah ku-e.
Haibo kiriangga npiumai riakniu 53,400 ye.
Naphtali kiphiu: Jahzeel kiriang mainiu Guni,
Jezer khatdi Shillem-e.
Haibo kirianggu npiumai riakniu 45,400 ye.
Israel maidunggu npiumai riak pakhiangna siniu 601,730 ye.
“Kadih hai kiphiu ruangga paliu riak saisuijiu njankhai bilo.
Taden thonjiu charamse njanlo khatdi kadih dibibo damse kengbibo kiphiuga khatdi kasiambo damse siambibo kiphiuga njan khaibilo.
Levi kiphiuniu Gershon, Kohath khatdi Merari kiriangmai jao-e.
Paliu kaikikse Libni, Hebron, Mahli, Mushi khatdi Korah kiriang padlanne. Kohath hai Amram piu-e,
paniu Egypt dihga ponbo, Levi nahpui Jochebed tu panaoleng ku-e. Paniu Amram leng npiumai nah nia, Aaron nai Mose khatdi npui mainah khat Miriam tu lungkhai-e.
Aaron panah npiu maina khang madai, Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar khatdi Ithamar tu pon-e.
Nadab nai Abihu panainiu masan makbo mi

Levi mai npiumailun chahiu khat tangmibo maksai sisuang tingmibo maidung riakse 23,000 ye. Paliura kakibo Israel maidung ruangga chakkhai makge, palamra paliutu Israel lungga mania khatnadi pikhai makge.
Haibo kiriangmai pakhiangnatu Mose nai Eleazar niu Jericho gasu Moab gu taningdih Jordan giugenlam Israel mai riak chakmiboga paliutu chakkhai mibode.
Mose nai Aaron niu Sinai gu Ramjingga chamai riak chakkhai mibo ruangga jaomakbo mai khatnadi haniu-e.
Paliu mathiu ramjingga shairabo-e chiujiu
Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milcah khatdi Tirzah haidungse Hepher nahpiu Machir nahpiu Gilead nahpiu, Manasseh nahpiu, Joseph nahpiu, Zelophehad, nahpui dung-e.
niu bambo Mathenky rengmun ga, paliuniu tadlujiu Mose, singku Eleazar, jupaodung khatdi param maidung pakhiangna masuangga chaplujiu din-e,
“Aliu piu panah npiumai khatnadi khaidiak makjiu ramjingga shaimide.
Panah npiumai habo jengniu, dekamjiu Israel maidung ruanggasu aliu piu zanse pijiu hamiralo? Aliu piugu kiriangmai khuga pagu kalekse pikhai sulo.”
Paliugu tathuse Mose niu
siga
“Zelophehad nahpuidungniu dinbose maji-e; paliu piugu kiriangga pagu kalekse pikhai milo. Pagu kalekse paliu khuga pikhaimi sulo.
Mai khatniu panah npiumai lungmakjiu shaimi sai pagu kalekse panahpuiniu lurabo-e chiujiu Israel maidung khuga dinkhai bilo.
Paniu panah npuimaidi hasai, palekse pagu singna piudungniu lurabo-e.
Paniu pagu singnapiudung ha-e sai, papiugu singna maidungniu sise lurabo-e.
Paniu pagu singna maidung maksai papao maidung ha-e sai, pagu nathubo kiriang mainiu sise lurabo-e khatdi sise pagu mania kumjiu thinrabo-e. Israel maidungniu haise kamrabo tajaidung si-e khatdi
Nangniu sise ngaolubo sailam, nagu singnapiu Aaron kumjiu, nangdi shaimi rabo-e,

palamra nanai khangniase Zin ramjing lungga agu chamtantu suimakjiu atu manud mide. Maidung siniu Meribah ga atu suini makbose kammide, paliuniu maidung masuangga agu masanbo pumtantu suikhai makge.” (Meribah hai Zin ramjing lungga bambo Kadesh duipin si-e).
Mose niu kakheng thiude,
“Hey
khatdi chariga chamtan pingambo, mai khattu kada khaira Iniu kheng-e, chiusai namaidungse milygaopiu habo milydung kummak rabo-e.”
Patuse pijiu singku Eleazar khatdi maidung pakhiangna masuangga pichap khailo, khatdi paliu masuang gasu patu nabam malinbo piu-e chiubo lenlo.
Nagu kangambo kasia pakhuga pikhai bilo chiusai Israel maidung pakhiangna paniu kadinbo piune.
Paniu singku Eleazar khuga mangiu khaijiu Urim nai Thummim
niu pakhuga chamtan pikhaibo saisuijiu Mose niu kamde, paniu Joshua tu pijiu singku Eleazar nai pamaidung pakhiangna masuangga chapkhaide.
Sichiujiu
Haibo katiubo podkadse naimachangna: rujiu
mily khatse nsuan khatdi khatse chawan kadpatlo,
sibo khaoring khat khatga, miusy gu takhui taju khat, withubo takisa madat piang khat jalujiu kadpatlo.
Haise rukhai kamjiu naimachang kadjut-jutjiu bamra-e, parim wibo siniu
Jaw kadkhaibo gase karaibo milygu thiujiu jawse, madatpiang khat rathak bamga liangkhailo.
Nsuan gu jaw liangkhaijiu pipadbo kumjiu chawan ga niabo mily hai kadpat rabo-e. Haisidi katiu pipadbo, parim wibose
Takum khat tangmibo jamra-makbo mily nia, takhui taju nia, takisa jalubose, alin-tara kadpatbo thiujiu, khatdi jaw ladzankygu thiujiu Tabamnaise kadpadlo.
Rujiu kadpatbo haise jaw liangkhaijiu kadpatbo riga sanjiu Tabamnai machang kadkhai rabo-e.
Chahiu machang suraibo gasu
Kabuichi khat khatgu alin-tara kadpatbo thiujiu, takhui takisa jalubo, midangchi khatgu takhui taju sum,
mily hinagu takhui taju khat-khat pipadlo. Katiu rukhaijiu kadkhaibo parim wibo hai

Kabui khat khatleng kadkhai rabo jaw siniu madatpiang nia-e, midangchi leng siniu madatpiang khat paphan-e, khatdi milypoileng siniu madatpiang khat-khatle. Haise takum lungga chahiu machangna raithubo tingmikga rukhai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu naimachangna kadpat riga sanjiu nuan leng kamichi khat nai jaw liakkhai rabo-e.
Jengriu mangiu naise characheng tadbo ngee kamsujiu jeng chinnia kamwangjiu, sibo tingga chakhi khaimakbo taruak ronna tiurabo-e.
Changeegu raithubo tingmik naise kahum raleng naliu wang aruangrabo-e khatdi changam wadi kammak rabo-e.
khuga katiu pipadbo thiujiu rukhaibo pipadbose pipadlo: matomchipoi nia, midangchi khat khatdi takum khat tangmibo mily chinnia, pakhiangnase jamra makrabo-e.
Kabuibo alin-tara pipadbogu takisa jalubo takhui: kabuichi khatgu taju sum, midangchi khatgu taju nia,
mily hinagu taju khat khat pipadlo.
Nuan gu pipadbo thiujiu kamichi khat pipadlo, haichiujiu kambo jaigasu maidungtu kam masanbo rathakse thiurabo-e.
Haise nsuan machangga rujiu kadpatbo riga khaisanjiu pipad rabo-e.
Haise kumjiu,
Jeng chinniabo naise kahum raleng wang maduilo khatdi chamgam wadi kam mane.
Rujiu kadpatbo,
Kabuibo alin-tara pipadbose takisa jalubo takhui: matomchi hinaga taju sum, midangchi khatga taju nia
khatdi mily hinagu taju khat-khat pipadlo.
Nuan gu pipadbo thiujiu kami khat pipadlo, haichiubo thak gasu maidungtu kam masan khaibo rathakse thiulo.
Haichiu kadkhaibo hai, jaw ladzankygu nai rujiu kadpatbogu alin-tara pipadbo riga khaisanjiu pipad rabo-e.
Chahiu chinniagu raithubo tingmik nai kahumra naliu wang aruanglo, khatdi changam wadi kammak rabo-e. Sibo tingmikga makeh mudrabo-e.
Rukhaijiu kadpatbose
Kabuibo alin-tara pipadbogu takisa jalubo takhui, matomchi leng taju sum, midangchigu thiujiu taju nia,
khatdi mily hinagu taju khat khat pipatlo.
Midangchi khatdi nuan gu pipatbo thiujiu pipatlo, haichiubo jaigasu maidungtu kam masan khaibo rathakse kamlo.
Haise changee gu raithubo tingmikga alin-tara pipatbo jaojiu rujiu pipat jutjiu khatdi jaw liakkhaibo riga khaisanjiu pipatlo. Haichiu pipatbo katiugu parimse
Rujiu kadkhaibo hai
Kabuibo alin-tara pipadbogu takisa jalubo takhui: matomchigu thiujiu taju sum, midangchigu thiujiu taju nia,
khatdi mily hinagu thiujiu takhui taju khat khat pipatlo.
Midangchi khat nuan gu thiujiu maidungtu kam masan khaibo leng, khatdi alin-tara pipatbo nai jaw liakkhaibo jaojiu, khatdi rujiu pipatbo riga khai sanjiu pipatlo.
Haibogu raithubo naise katiu pipatbose
Kabuibo alin-tara kadpatbogu takisa jalubo takhui: matomchi hinagu taju sum sum, midangchi hinagu taju nia nia;
khatdi mily hinagu taju khat khat, pageng bambo jaw liakkhaibo jaojiu kadpatlo.
Midangchi khatdi nuan gu kadpatbo thiujiu kadpatlo. Haichiu kadkhaibo hai alin-tara kadpatbogu khatdi jaw liakkhaibo riga sanjiu kadpat rabo-e.
Jengniabo naise matomchipoi kariunia, midangchi nia, khatdi takum khat tangmibo milychi kariu madai, pakhiangna jamra makbo kadpatlo.
Haise raithubo tingmikga kadkhaibo kumjiu kakibo hina jaojiu kadpatlo.
Jengsumbo naise matomchipoi kariu khat, midangchi nia, khatdi milypoi takum khat tangmibo kariu madai, pakhiangna hai jamra makbo kadpatlo.
Haise raithubo tingmikga kadkhaibo kumjiu kakibo hina jaojiu pipatlo.
Jeng madaibo naise matomchipoi kariu, midangchi nia, khatdi takum khat tangmibo milychi kariu madai pakhiangna jamra makbo pipatlo.
Haise raithubo tingmikga kadkhaibo kumjiu kakibo hina jaojiu pipatlo.
Jeng mangiubo nai matomchipoi chakiu, midangchi nia, khatdi takum khat tangmibo milychi kariu madai, pakhiangna jamra makbo pipatlo.
Haise raithubo tingmikga kadkhaibo kumjiu kakibo hina jaojiu pipatlo.
Jeng charuk naise matomchipoi tachad, midangchi nia, khatdi takum khat tangmibo milychipoi kariu madai, pakhiangna chakhan chara habose pipatlo.
Haise raithubo tingmikga kadkhaibo kumjiu kakibo hina jaojiu pipatlo.
Jeng chinnia naise matomchipoi chinnia midangchi nia khatdi takum khat tangmibo milychipoi kariu madai, pakhiangna chakhan-chara habose pipatlo.
Haise raithubo tingmikga kadkhaibo kumjiu kakibo hina jaojiu pipatlo.
Jeng tachad naise kahumra wang aruanglo khatdi changam wadi kam mane.
Rujiu kadpatbose
Haise raithubo tingmikga kadkhaibo kumjiu kakibo hina jaojiu pipatlo.
Haidungse rujiu kadpatbo, alin-tara kadboga jaojiu pipat rabo, khatdi chakin thiubogu kadpatra dakkhai mibo khuang-ngeega
Mose khuga
Mose niu pahangga bambo ladtidungse Israel maidung kiphiugu jupaodung khuga pikhai bibo-e.
Mai khatniu
Liunamai khatniu papiu kyga lungbambo tingga paniu
paniu siangkhai mibo maksai tasiang siangkhai mibo hinase papiuniu sibo lamga chiulujiu sui makbo hasai, paniu kamsiak rabo-e.
Chiudi papiuniu sibo lamga chiulujiu sibo tasiangse wangtang makra patu khammi sai, paniu majaimak rabo-e.
Chami thiumakbo npuimai khatniu tasiang siangsai, sijiu maksai wajeng simakjiu, maksai wakhat kumbo chari-ri mine chiulujiu, sigasu chami thiumi sai,
paniu tasiang siangmibo hinase pakinaniu sibo lamga chiulujiu suimakbo cham dinbo hasai kamsiak rabo-e.
Chiudi pakinaniu pagu tasiang lamse chiulujiu pijiu wangtang makra khammi sai patu
Kamipui khatniu maksai tamibo maipui khatniu kamkhai mibo tasiang hinase khatdi wakhat kumbo chari-rine chiubo tasiang siangkhai mibo hinase majaisiak rabo-e.
Chami thiumibo npuimai khatniu tasiang khat siangsai maksai wakhat kumbo chari-ri mine chiujiu tasiang sianglu misai,
pakinaniu sibo lamse chiulujiu suimakbo dinmaksai paniu siangkhai mibo maksai ladriat thiukhai mibose kamsiak rabo-e.
Chiudi pakinaniu sibo lamga chiulujiu pi wangtang makra kham misai paniu sise majaimak tadi sui-e.
Paniu kamrabo maksai kam makrabo ladriat hinase pakinaniu suikhaira, suikhai makra pagu pumtan bambo-e.

Chiudi pakinaniu tasiang lamga chiulubo tingmik sailam suini makbo dinmak sai paniu siangkhai mibo maksai ladriat khaimibo hinase paniu kamsiak rabo-e. Sibo lamga paniu chiulubo nai gasu suini makbo lad paniu din makbo gasu tasiang lamse suikhai mibo-e.
Chiudi paniu sibo tasiangse pasai lamniu suinimakbo thiusai, tasiangse pijiu wangtang makbogu kasabose paniu phungrabo-e.
Haibo tajaidungse chami thiumakbo npuimai khatniu papiu kyga lungbambo tingga maksai chami thiumibo npuimai khatniu tasiang siangkhai mibo lamga
“Midia mainiu Israel maidung khuga kamkhai mibo jengniu paliutu sajai pilo. Haise nangniu kamkhai lubo sailam nang shairabo-e.”
Sijengniu Mose niu maidung khuga din-e, “Chari thiuraleng kaden lulo, chiusai naliuniu Midia maitu aphenjiu khatdi paliuniu
Israel maigu chaphiu hina gasu npiumaidung sang khat khat chariga langkhailo.”
Haichiujiu chaphiu hina gasu npiumai sang khat khat kadalujiu chamai sang kariu nia charileng kaden lude.
Haichiujiu Mose niu charileng masanbo khatdi madan pirabo make ponbopiu singku Eleazar nahpiu Phinehas gu chamtan hangga, pikhai lujiu langkhaide.
niu Mose khuga chamtan pikhai mibo kumjiu, paliuniu Midia maitu chari thiujiu paliuniu mai hinatu
Midia mai wangpiu khang mangiu: Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur khatdi Reba tu jaojiu kamshat mide. Paliuniu Beor nahpiu Balaam tudi kamshat mide.
Israel maidungniu Midia maipui mainah hinatu minlujiu, paliu tom, paliu bui, lulujiu khatdi paliugu chakhiu-chalan pakhiangnase haphun kam lude,
sichiujiu paliugu namdidung khatdi paliugu rijiky hinase chami khaijiu ruthon mide.
Paliuniu haphun lubo, kavang maidung nai khaorui hinase lulujiu,
Jericho gasu Jordan genlam Moab maigu taningdih rijikyga bambo Mose nai Eleazar khatdi Israel mai khuga phungwangde.
Mose, Eleazar khatdi paliugu jupaodung siniu riphen maidungtu sundao raleng padde.
Riphen maigu kadimai khatdi paliugu siambi mai khatdi munran maidung, khatdi chari gasu malanwang maidungtu Mose niu palung pomde.
Paniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Nde kamjiu npuimaidung haitu pijiu ringkhai jiulo?
Haibo puidungniu Balaam ladtu phungjiu Peor ga maidungtu pijiu
Haichiujiu tuhoira npui-npiu thiukhai mibo npiu mainah khatdi, maipui hinatu kamshat milo,
chiudi liuchangpui thiujiu bambo liunamai nai liutingmai hinatura naliuleng lumilo.

Tuhoira maitu kamshatmi mai maksai kashaibo phawtu niami maidung pakhiangnase rijiky lenlam jeng chinnia bamra mide. Jeng sumbo nai khatdi jeng chinniabo nai naliu khatdi naliuniu haphun lubo maipuidungtu kam masan khaibo tien thiululo.
Naliuniu naliugu chafai tani khatdi chamiginiu, kami giuniu maksai tasingniu kamlubo mania pakhiangnase kam masan rabo-e,”
Singku Eleazar niu charibam gasu malanwang mai khuga din-e, “Haidungse
Rumak rabo mania hina, chiubora kachia, rangkang, tanaagi chagibung, maksai chagipek, hai chami gasu hamlujiu kam masan rabo-e. Mania hinase kam masan khairabo duiniu kam masan rabo-e.
Jeng chinniabo naise naliu faini katha mirabo-e; sigasu naliu hai tajai saisuijiu masan mirabo-e khatdi rijiky lungga ngutra suikhai mirabo-e.”
“Eleazar nanai khatdi nanai maigu jupaodung aruanglujiu, sutlubo mania hina kavang maidung khatdi khaorui hina jaojiu pariak chak rabo-e.
Pa njan nia thiujiu macham njanpad lujiu, pah njan khatniu riphenmaidung leng khatdi pah njan khatniu nammaidung leng thiujiu pilo.
Riphenmaidung dam gasu minwang maidung kai mangiu hinagu khangkhat-khat, khatdi sise nai ncham gapjiu matomgu, qonniamgu milygu khatdi kamigu
Haidungse
Maidungleng pikhai mibo dam gasu, minwang maidung ringiu hina gasu khangkhat-khat, khatdi sikum gapjiu matomgu, qonniamgu milygu khatdi kamigu thiujiu
Mose nai Eleazar niu
Pahangga bambose riphen mainiu paliuleng bailu mibo riga sanjiu haphun lubodung si-e: mily nai kami siniu 675,000, matom kabui niu 72,000, qonniam siniu 61,000, khatdi liuchangmai siniu 32,000 ye.
Riphen maidung paphan khat damniu mily nai kami siniu 337,500 ye. sigasu 675 niu
Haichiujiu Mose niu ramkhase
Nammaigu damse riphenmaigu damnai nchamme: mily nai kaminiu 337,500, matom kabuiniu 36,000, qonniamniu 30,500, khatdi liuchangmai siniu 16,000 ye.
Haibo damgasu Mose niu minwang maidung nai khaorui ringngiu hinagu khat khat khoilujiu
Siga riphen maigu katheng-kadi thiumai munranpiudung siniu Mose khuga tadlujiu,
Haichiu madukhaide, “Paohubo, aliuniu aliu hangga bambo riphen maidungtu pariak chakde sichiujiu mai khatnadi kahabo thiumakge.
Haijengniu aliuniu kachia tiu-taa npomkhap, gakhap, njungkhap, nkhaina, khatdi tatiu-tataa khoilubose phungwang kin-e. Aliuniu haise
Mose nai Eleazar niu sibo kachiagu, tatiu-tataa pakhiangnase lukhaide.
Chakampaodunggu pipatbo pakhiangnase paridniu taju kai nia kumbo-e.
Chakampaodung makbo maidungniu khoilubo sira paliuleng bailu mide.
Haichiujiu Mose nai Eleazar niu Israel maidungtu Rapiu niu gukhaira, kachiase Mathenky lungga phungwang khai mide.
Reuben nai Gad kiphiugu matom-kabui kengkha bamdi-e. Panai kymainiu Jazer nai Gilead ram hai matom kabui leng dejiukha wiralo chiubo ngaoluboga,
panainiu Mose nai Eleazar, khatdi kakibo panai maigu jupaodung khuga tadlujiu din-e,
“Haibo luongriang hai
Chalung sajiu haibo kadih hai aliugu mania thiumira pikhailo, sichiujiu aliutu pijiu Jordan giu kenjiu khatdi siga pi lungkhai tulo.”
Mose niu paokakge, “Naliu kamai kakibo Israel maidungniu charilam tadmiboga naliuniu haiga bammi nijiuma?
Naliuniu dekumkha hujiu Israel mainiu Jordan kenlujiu
Haise naliu piudungtu Kadesh Barnea gasu langpadjiu charamse phiupad raleng kambo tingga kamkhai mibo side.
Paliuniu Eshcol tangbo tadmeng lujiu charamse ngaolude, chiudi paliu malan wangbo tingga,
niu sibo nai palung pomde khatdi ladriat thiude:

‘Paliuniu agu kadin piumakbo jengniu Iniu Abraham, Isaac khatdi Jacob khuga pikhaine chiujiu ladriat thiukhai mibo kadih gase Egypt ramgasu tadpat maidung takum makai tangmibo maksai sisuang tingmibo mai khat niudi siga ngutlakge chiujiu Iniu siangkhaide.’
Haise Keni mai Jephunneh nahpiu Caleb nai Nun nahpiu Joshua makbo kakibo mai hina jaokhai mibode; panaira
niu maidungtu palung pomjiu khatdi patu pijiu kimkhai makbo kentu pishai loimak then paliutu pijiu ramjingga takum atai tadron khai mibode.
Chiujiu tuhoira naliuniu naliu piumai lunlung luijiu nuan phungbo kasanbo kaikiktu puilujiu Israel maidung riga
Naliu Reuben nai Gad maidungniu tuhoi pasai suini makge sai paniu haibo maidung pakhiangnatu pijiu ramjingga phudkhai lan birabo-e, khatdi paliutu kam maharabo lamga naliuniu parid phungrabo-e.”
Paliuniu Mose khuga khengjiu haichiu din-e, “Raiboga, aliutu pijiu haiga aliugu mily leng tatuky khatdi aliuniu nbekhai raleng charireng wibo namdidung pijiu thiukhaira suikhailo.

Sigasu aliuniu kakibo aliu kamai Israel maidungtu majanglujiu chari thiura tadrabo-e khatdi paliuniu lungrabo kadih gase paliuniu lungkham lumak then asunjiu hane. Haichiubo lunggase aliuniu nbe khaira maidungse haibo charireng kawibo namdidung lungga lunglujiu, haibo ram gasu shairabo gasu nbai lune.
Israel maidung pakhiangnaniu paliuleng thiujiu lungrabo bamgase lungmak thenna aliu kylam malanwang lakge.
Jordan gen khatlam aliuniu paliugu kadih bam khatnadi aliugu thiujiu lumi lakge, palamra aliuniu aliu damse haibo Jordan gu naimik padlam daomide.
Mose niu paokakge, “Naliuniu dinbambose pachang siakge sai, haiga
Chari thiurabo naliu mai pakhiangnase Jordan kenlujiu khatdi
sichiujiu kadihse lumak thenna aliu mikre maidungtu chari thiurabo-e. Sibo sailamniu, naliu malanwang rabo-e, palamra naliuniu naliu
Chiudi naliuniu naliugu ladriat majai maksai, naliuniu
Haijengniu naliugu namdidung khatdi naliugu milydung leng nbaiky thiulo, chiudi naliuniu ladriat thiukhai mibose kamlulo!”
Gad nai Reuben maidung niu din-e, “Paohubo, nagu chamtan saisuijiu aliuniu kamrabo-e.
Aliu naodung nai aliu nahdung khatdi aliugu matom kabui sigasu milydungra haibo Gilead namdi lungga bamne.
Chiudi aliu mai hina
Gad nai Reuben maidungniu Jordan kenlujiu
Chiudi paliuniu Jordan kenmak lujiu khatdi naliutu majang lujiu chari thiura tadmak sai naliu kumjiu, Canaan kadih ga paliu damse lurabo-e.”
Gad mai nai Reuben mainiu kenkakge, “Paohubo,
Pagu ladriat hanggasu aliuniu Canaan kadih kenpad rabo-e, khatdi charibamga ngutrabo-e, chiusai haibo Jordan tingbanglam bambo aliugu chakhiu-chalan haise aliuniu daolan lubui-e.

Haichiujiu Mose niu Amor maigu chawangpiu Sihon nai Bashan gu chawang Og kadih pakhiangnase, paliu wonjengga bambo namdakdung nai namdidungse jaojiu Gad nai Reuben kiphiu mai khuga khatdi Manasseh mai kiphiu paphan khat mai khuga njan khai bide.
Gad kiphiuniu Dibon, Ataroth, Aroer,
Ataroth Shophan, Jazer, Jogbehah,
Beth Nimrah khatdi Beth Haran katangbo namdakgu karengse thiukhai lande.
Reuben gu kiphiuniu Heshbon, Elealeh, Kiriathaim,
Nebo, Baal Meon (haibo zanse kali mide), khatdi Shibmah thiukhai lande. Paliuniu thiukhai lanbo namdakdungse kasanbo zan mathak khaide.
Manasseh nahpiu Machir kiriang mainiu Gilead maitu chari thiujiu lungkham lude, khatdi siga lungbambo Amor maitu hathon mide.
Haijengniu Mose niu Gilead hai Machir kiriang maileng, pikhai mide khatdi paliuniu siga lung mide.
Manasseh kiphiu Jair niu nam kasiatu chari thiulujiu “Jair namdung” chiujiu kukhaide.
Nobah niu Kenath tu chari thiujiu sibogu namdungse lulude khatdi paniu sibo zanse, pazan champonjiu Nobah chiujiu mathak khaide.
Pahangga bambo hai Israel mainiu Egypt kadih phutlujiu paliugu chaphiu saisuijiu Mose nai Aaron gu jupao hangga paliu rijiky thiukhaibo bamdung zanse lenkhaibo-e.
gu chamtan saisuijiu Mose niu paliu rijiky thiukhaibo bam machangna sibo bam zanse raokhaide.
Kenpadbo Ngee raithubo nai sailam, takumgu karaibo hiugu jengriu mangiu kiubo nai Israel maidungniu Egypt kadih phutmide. Egypt dihga
niu gukhaibo jengniu paliu Rameses namdi phutmide. Haichiu kamkhaibo gasu
Israel maidungniu Rameses phutlujiu khatdi Sukkoth ga rijiky thiukhaide.
Paliugu pachalibo rijiky hai ramjing mungga bambo Etham ga-e.
Haigasu paliuniu Baal Zephon gu naimik padlam, Pi Hahiroth ga malan wangjiu khatdi Migdol mungga rijiky thiukhaide.
Paliuniu Pi Hahiroth phutlujiu khatdi Hengbo Duipui tangbo kenlujiu, Shur gu ramjingga wangde; jengsum tadpat lubo sainiu paliu Marah ga rijiky thiukhaide.
Sigasu paliu Elim ga tadjiu siga rijiky thiukhaide, palamra sibo bamga duipin kariu nia khatdi kadanbang riak chinnia bamniu-e.
Paliuniu Elim phutlujiu khatdi Suez gu Ajaibek mungga rijiky thiukhaide.
Paliugu pachalibo rijikyniu Sin ramjing lungga-e.
Sigasu paliuniu Dophkah ga rijiky thiukhaide,
khatdi haibo sai Alush ga thiukhaide.
Pachali ga paliu sakra tadui hadibo Riphidim ga si-e.

Riphidim gasu Hor Luongga paliuniu pahangga bambo bamdungga rijiky thiukhaide: Sinai Ramjingga, Kibroth Hattaavah (maksai “Patiuni sabo maidunggu Charawbam”), Hezeroth, Rithmah, Rimmon, Perez, Libnah, Rissah, Kehelathah, Shepher Luong, Haradah, Makheloth, Tihath, Terah, Mithkah, Hashmonah, Moseroth, Bene Jaakan, Hor Haggigad, Jotbathah, Abronah, Eziongeber, Zin gu ramjing (sisera, Kadesh), khatdi Edom kadih taiga bambo, Hor Luong ga, paliu rijiky hai thiukhai-e.

Hor Luong gasu Moab gu taningdih tangbo lungga Israel maidungniu pahangga bambo bamdung gase paliugu rijiky thiukhaide: Zalmonah, Punon, Oboth, Moab luongriang lungga ha nchum mibo Abarim, Dibon, Gad, Almon Diblathaim, Nebo Luong mungga bambo Abarim luongdung khatdi Jericho gasu Jordan giu kenjiu Beth Jeshimoth nai Acacia Ramjeng kakga bambo Moab gu taningdih dungsi-e.
Jericho gasu Jordan kenjiu Moab gu taningdihga
pahangga bambo ladtidungse Israel maidung leng pikhai bide: “Naliuniu Canaan kadihga ngutra Jordan kenbo tingga,
sibo ramga lungjiu bambo maidung pakhiangnatu hathon mirabo-e. Paliutu khatdi chaginiu kambo charamengdung khatdi paliugu kahumbo bamdung pakhiangnase naliuniu kam mahakam milo.
Charamse lulujiu sibo lungga lungmilo, palamra Iniu naliu khuga sise pikhaibo-e.
Charam hai kiphiudung nai chakiriang tam-tambo ruangga taden thonjiu, kadibo kiriangga kadibo damse, katibo kiriangga katibo damse njankhai bilo.

Chiudi naliuniu sibo ramlungga lungjiu bambo maidungtu hathonmi maksai saokhai diakbo maidung siniu naliu mikga kara bambo khatdi naliu lep-ga tathu dokbose kumjiu paliuniu naliutu kam kabuak rabo-e, khatdi paliuniu naliutu atungsu rabo-e.
Paliutu naliuniu hathonmi maksai, Iniu paliutu kam mahamira maningbo kumjiu naliutu kam mahami rabo-e.”
Duimi lamgu ramrai haise Zin ramjing gasu sujiu Edom ramrai saisui rabo-e. Haise naimik padlamsu Kashaibo Duipui gu nhang lam gu kaloibo katang rabo-e.

Chiusai sise nhanglam mari wanglanjiu, Akrabbim Pass lam kenjiu khatdi Zin kenjiu tingrun lam Kadesh Barnea tangbo-e. Sigasu duiruak-tingpi lamsu Hazor Addar lam khatdi Azmon tangbo marikhaijiu bamrabo-e.
Sigasu Egypt gu ramjeng lamsu khatdi Mediterranean gu kaloibo tangbo hainiu thiurabo-e.
“Tingnu lamgu ramrai siniu Mediterranean Duipui si-e.
“Duiruak gu ramrainiu Mediterranean gasu Hor Luong tangboga pariang thiujiu surabo-e
khatdi sibo bam gasu Hamath Pass padrabo-e. Siseniu haichiu judjiu Zedad
khatdi Ziphron tangjiu Hazor Enan ga loikhai rabo-e.
“Tingbang lamgu ramrai siniu Hazor Enan gasu Shepham tangbo pariang thiujiu surabo-e.
Sigasu hanglam, Harbel lam tadkiujiu, Ain gu tingbanglam, khatdi maluong poidung rilam Galilee Ajai gu tingbang lamgu pabek rilam,
sigasu hanglam Jordan Giu saisuijiu Kashaibo Duipui tangbo-e. “Haise naliu gu ramrai madai si-e.”
Reuben nai Gad khatdi Manasseh mai tingbang lamgu pah nphan gu kiphiudungniu, paliugu kikhundung saisuijiu
Jericho sailam bambo Jordan gu naimik padlamse njan lujiu lumibo-e.”
“Singku Eleazar nai Nun nahpiu Joshua niu maidung leng kadih hai njankhai rabo-e.
Sise ka-njanboga maidungtu nkha raleng chaphiu hina gasu jupao khangkhat khat kadalulo.”
Haibo maidungse
Judah
Jephunneh nahpiu Caleb
Simeon
Ammihud nahpiu Shelumiel
Benjamin
Chislon nahpiu Elidad
Dan
Jogli nahpiu Bukki
Manasseh
Ephod nahpiu Hanniel
Ephraim
Shiphtan nahpiu Kemuel
Zebulun
Parnach nahpiu Elizaphan
Issachar
Azzan nahpiu Paltiel
Asher
Shelomi nahpiu Ahihud
Naphtali
Ammihud nahpiu Padahel
Haibo maidung situ Israel maidung leng Canaan dih njanboga
“Israel mainiu daolubo kadih gasu Levi mai lungrabo leng, khatdi namdidunggu wonjengga matom-kabui tagi raleng pibilo chiujiu Israel mai khuga dinbilo.
Haibo namdidungse Levi maileng thiurabo-e, khatdi paliuniu siga lungrabo-e. Chakhao tiutek ram siniu paliu tom, paliu bui khatdi kakibo khaoring leng thiurabo-e.
Chakhao tiutek ram hai namdigu rengbang gasu kadihgu pake madai hinaga gaphek 450 dirabo-e.
Haichiujiu haibo kadihgu pake thiujiu pakhiangna gaphek 900 padjiu namdi siniu n-gangga bamrabo-e.
Naliuniu Levi maileng nbaigu namdi charuk pirabo-e, siga Israel mai khat kumboniu wa kammaojiu chamaitu gimisai paniu ringlura marikhai rabo leng-e. Haibo riga sanjiu, kakibo namdidung atai nia,
chakhao tatek jaojiu pakhiangna atai tachad, paliuleng pikhai bilo.
Levi maigu namdidung hai chaphiu hinagu thiujiu charam det saisuijiu machak rabo-e.”
Israel mai khat kumboniu kammaojiu mai khattu kamshat misai, shairabo gasu marilu raleng naliuniu nbaigu namdidung kadarabo-e.
Sibo bamgasu pahai chakhum ruirabo shai mibo kiriang gasu marilubo sui-e. Mai khat hainiu chamaitu kamshat mine chiubo lad hai charuangga ladjanthiu makjiu patu kamshat makrabo-e,
Namdi charuk kadalulo,
sumniu Jordan tingbanglam khatdi sumniu Canaan kadih lungga.

Haisiniu Israel maidung khatdi sangdiu maidung leng pawan khatleng maksai tingtheng leng thiujiu lungbam maidunggu nbaibo namdidung thiurabo-e. Mai khatniu mai khattu kammaojiu kamshat misai haibo nam ruangga pabam khatga wangjiu marilu bui-e.
“Wakhat kamjiu, mai khatniu maitu kamshat raleng chagi maksai tatu maksai tasing thinsai, pahai chamai gibo gu chamao chameng bambo-e patu kamshat mirabo-e.
Shai mibo maigu nathubo kiriangmai khuga chamai gimi maitu kamshat rabo paridse bambo-e. Patuse adaobo tingga, kamshatmi rabo-e.”
“Mai khatniu kakibo maitu marengjiu khatdi patuse ponkao lujiu maksai patu wakhatniu rodjiu

maksai pabenniu kamshat misai pahai maitu kamshat mibogu chamao-chameng bam mibo-e sichiujiu patuse kamshatmi rabo-e. Shaimibo maigu nathubo kiriang mainiu chamaitu gimibo maitu kamshat rabogu parid bambo-e. Patuse adaobo tingga, kamshatmi rabo-e.
Chiudi wakhat kamjiu, mai khatniu kammaojiu paniu mareng makbo mai khattu patuse ponkaobo gasu niuma, maksai wakhattu rodbo gasu niuma,
maksai wakhat kamjiu mai khatniu pagu mikre makbo mai khattu kam masara maning makjiu kammaojiu tatu phenbo gasu kamshat mine chiulo.
Haikumbo lamgara nammaidi saoniu kamshat mibolo chiubo mailam ponjiu, chiudi chakhum ruira phuijiu bambo shai mibo kinamai lam ponmakjiu ladjan thiurabo-e.

Nam maidungniu shai mibo kinamai gasu kam maomibo piu situ ranlura kamrabo-e, khatdi paniu marikhai mibo, nbaibo bam namdi gase pi bamkhai mira langkhai rabo-e. Sibo tingga Dibo Singku thiujiu bambo piuse shaimi makthenna pase siga lungjiu bamrabo-e.
Maitu kamshat mibo maomeng bambo piu siniu paniu marikhai mibo nbaibam namditu phut misai
khatdi shai mibo kymai siniu patu daolujiu sigasu patu kamshat misai, haibo chakhum ruibo hai chamai gibo tienkam makge.
Dibo Singku siniu shaimak thenna maitu kamshat mibo maomeng bambo maise nbaibam namdi gase lungjiu bamrabo-e, chiudi Dibo Singku siniu shai mibo sailamsu pakylam pah malan wangmibo sui-e.
Naliuniu lungbo bam hinaga haibo tajaidungse naliu khatdi naliu kaikikdungniu majai rabo-e.
Chamai kamshatbo maitu gimi rabo-e. Haibo ladjantu rangkang pijiu pah ringam lulakge.
Mai khatniu nbaibamga paktad misai, Dibo Singku shai makthen patuse pijiu paky lam malan wangra rangkang pijiu suikhai tulo.

Naliuniu haise kamsai, naliuniu lungjiu bambo dih situ kam tania mibo-e. Maitu kamshatbose kadihtu kam tania mibo-e, khatdi maitu kamshat mibo piutu kamshat miboniu makjiu kadih haitu tajai saisuijiu kam masanra wadi npui ha-e.
Naliuniu lungjiu bambo dihtu kam tania mane, palamra I hai
Gilead kiriangga bambo kikhun gu papee thiumai, Machir nahpiu khatdi Joseph nahpiu Manasseh tahniu, Mose khatdi kakibo jupaodung khuga tadde.
Paliuniu din-e, “Kadihse taden thonjiu Israel maidung khuga njan khaibira

Chiudi maning khailo, paliuniu katambo chaphiu mai khuga chami thiusai, paliugu kalekse ui napiugu chaphiugu thiujiu bammi rabo-e, khatdi aliu khuga njan khai mibo pakhiangnase kasia kam nkhinmi rabo-e.

Kalankhaibogu Takumga, mania hina jonmibose papao khuga malan khaibo tingga, Zelophehad nahpuidunggu kalekse paliuniu chami thiukhai mibo kiphiuga tingthengjiu khaisan mirabo-e khatdi aliugu chaphiuga hami rabo-e.”
Sijengniu Mose niu
siniu haichiujiu Zelophehad nahpuidungniu chami thiunibo mai khuga thiubo sui-e chiujiu
Israel mai hinagu kalekse pagu-gu chaphiuga khat thiujiu bamrabo-e.
Israel mai kiphiuga kalek lubo npuimai hinaniu paliu kiphiumai khatga chami thiukhai rabo-e. Haichiubo jaigasu Israel mai hinaniu paliu paopeh dunggu kalekse lurabo-e,
khatdi kalekse chaphiu khat gasu chaphiu khatga lukhai mak rabo-e. Chaphiu hinaniu pagu-gu kalekse lujiu bamrabo-e.”
Haichiujiu
Paliuniu paliu kiriang lungga Joseph nahpiu Manasseh gu chaphiuga chami thiu khaide, sichiujiu paliu piugu chaphiuga paliugu kalekse bamjudle.
Haibo tacheng tajaidungse

Jordan Giuki tingbanglam ramjingga paliuniu bambo lon Israel maidung khuga Mose niu dinkhaibo chamse haibo ariakkhuangga bambo-e. Paran namdakniu khatlam, khatdi kakibo khatlam Tophel, Laban, Hazeroth, khatdi Dizahab chiujiu bambo kakki Jordan Ramjeng mungga bambo Suph ga paliu bamme.
(Edom gu maluang npui Sinai Luong gasu Kadesh Barnea lam tadbo hai jengriu-je khat ngutle).
Paliuniu Egypt phutjiu tadpat lubosai takum ataibogu chahiu kariu khatkiubogu naimikpui raithubo nai paliu khuga dinkhaira
Haise
Haise Israel maidungniu Moab kadih Jordan giuky tingbanglam bambo lon Mose niu Tingwang gu tacheng-tajai din masanjiu katikhaibo-e.
Paniu din-e,
“Aliuniu Sinai Luongga bambo lon, aliu

Rijiky kampang lujiu tadpat sulo. Amor maigu maluongram tangbo khatdi sibo luongriang kamaguibo tangbo Jordan Ramjeng, maluongram khatdi pabekki bambo dih katang khatdi tingrun lam, khatdi Mediterranean munglam tadlo. Canaan kadih katang khatdi Lebanon Luong tadkenjiu kadibo Euphrate Giuki katangbo tadlo.
Haibo kadih pakhiangna,
Mose niu maidung khuga din-e, “Sinai Luongga aliuniu bambo wan, Iniu naliu khuga dinmibo-e, ‘Naliutu majang tadbogu paripse alengra chariuju mibo-e. I aronna majang ngamlak mibo-e.
Naliu
Naliu pao-pehmai
Chiudi dechiujiu I aronna naliu kakga tathu chara kapadbo tiak madio ngamlu ralo?
Naliu kiphiu hinaga ningtingbo mai, kasibo mai, khatdi wasi masanbo mai kadapadlo, naliutu phuira Iniu paliutu changam malin khaine.
Khatdi haise kamraleng wide chiujiu naliu suikhai-e.

Sijeng gasu naliu kiphiu dungga naliuniu kadapadbo ningtingmai khatdi wasi masanmai jupao dungtu Iniu lukhaijiu, naliutu akhiraleng Iniu paliutu pikhaide. Khangsia mainiu chamai sangtu, khangsia mainiu chamai kaitu, khangsia mainiu chamai ringiutu, khatdi khangsia mainiu chamai kariutu chiujiu akhirabo-e. Kiphiudung hinaga kakibo chakampaodung tudi Iniu kada khaide.
“Sibo tingga Iniu paliutu ladpi khaide, “Naliu ruangga tathu-chara kapadbo hina nking mawilo. Siga naliu mai tudi, sangdiumai tudi tathu tiakboga phui ncham ramlo.

Mai khat tudi chamiu mareng thiumane, khang mathiutu ladjan thiu machamlo, pase sao-sao kummai thiubamdi, mai khattudi pingmane, delosai naliuniu tiak khaibibo hinase Tingwang khuganiu wangbo-e. Chiudi tathu-chara kasiaga tiakngam lakbo bam misai, akhuga phungwanglo, Iniu tiak masan khai bine.’
Haichiu kam bamboga, naliu kamrabo siam hina Iniu naliutu ladtikhai bine.
“Aliu

Iniu din-e, ‘Phuilo, uiga bamme. Paniu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu wang siga lungmi sulo, wadi manang mane maksai pingmane. Tuhoira naliuniu Amor maigu maluongram wangtang mide, haise aliu pao-pehmai Rawang, aliu
“Chiudi naliuniu akhuga wanglujiu, ‘khangsia maitu mahin pijiu kadih phui masuangra, chiujiu simainiu npui khatdi namdi phuirai lujiu aliu khuga chakhum paowang lanra langkhailo,’ chiujiu din-e.
“Haise wine chiujiu Iniu suikhaijiu, chaphiu khat ganiu chamai khat-khat chiujiu khang kariu niakiutu kadakhaide.
