Paliuniu maluongram tadjiu Eshcol Ramjeng katang mengtangjiu charamse tadronjiu ajan khaide.
Paliuniu malan wangboga paliuniu siga daolubo charasy phungwang-e, khatdi
Naliuniu ladtumjiu khatniu khat khuga din-e, ‘

Dejengniu aliu siga tadralo? Mai ping-e. Aliuniu lang masuang khaimi mainiu siga lungbam maira aliu suang tandiang-e khatdi aliu suang paliu khao theng-di-e. Khatdi paliugu namdidunggu chari rengse tingpuk khangtang-e chiujiu aliu khuga paokhai-e. Paliutu tan-hubo ngao padle!’
“Chiudi Iniu dinbo-e, ‘Sibo maidungtu pingmi mane.
Naliu Rawang,
Maipiu khatniu panahpiutu phungbo kumgapjiu, haibo bam katangbo npui hinaga paniu naliutu wijiu majang wang khaibibo naliuniu ngaolude.
Chiudi Iniu dinbo kummakjiu, naliu tuhoi katangdi

sichiu bamdi paniu naliu masuang tadrai lujiu pawan machang naliuniu bamkhai rabo bam phuibi-e. Naliutu npui lenkhaira, n-nien tingga kamuangtiang thiujiu khatdi nchun tingga chamitiang thiujiu majang khai-e.
‘Iniu naliu pao-pehmai khuga piraleng ladriat thiukhai mibo kadih patam kawibo gase, kasabo naliu ken haira mai khangkhat nadi ngutlu lakge.
Siga Jephunneh nahpiu Caleb ronna ngutlu rabo-e. Pahai akhuga chamchangjiu bamme. Paniu phuijiu ajankhai mibo bamse pakhuga khatdi patah-panahmai khuga Iniu pikhai rabo-e.’
Naliu jengniu
Chiudi natu nkhapao, Nun nahpiu Joshua tu palung chap matip lura kachukhai bilo. Paniu Israel maidungtu majanglujiu kadihse lunggom lurabo-e.
“Sigasu
Chiudi naliu haira, mariwang lujiu ramjing lamse tadkhai lanra Aqaba Zaibek npai lam tadkhai mide.’
“Naliuniu paokakge, ‘Mose yo, aliuniu
“Chiudi
niu dinkhaibose Iniu naliu khuga dinkhaide, chiudi naliuniu nking khai makge. Naliuniu patu suimakjiu naliugu wasao thiubo siniu ramluongga lungbammai situ charithiu sude.
Siga ramluongga lungbambo Amor maidungniu makhui pengpadbo kumjiu naliutu aphenra hapadde. Sichiujiu paliuniu naliutu Hormah hameng tangjiu Edom gu ramluongga naliutu ngamlude.
Siga naliuniu
“Sichiu mibo gasu, aliuniu Kadesh ga pating kathengkha bamkhai mide.
“Aliuniu sibo maluang ramga rontad maha matheng mide, khatdi aliuniu tingpilam tadrabo mide,
chiujiu
Haidungse naliutu katikhaira paniu akhuga dinkhai-e: ‘Naliu riangrui Esau kaikik maidungniu lungbambo, Edom gu maluang ramga tadkiu sune. Paliuniu naliutu nping rabo-e,
chiudi naliuniu paliutu chari aphen makrabo-e, palamra paliu kadih hai chakhet khat langga tadi naliuleng Iniu pikhai lakge. Edom kadihse Iniu Esau kaikik leng pikhai mibo-e.
Naliuniu paliu khuga katiu-kasak liutiubo sui-e.
“Naliuniu kambo pakhiangnaga
“Sichiujiu aliuniu tadpatjiu Elath nai Eziongeber namdak gasu Kashaibo Duipui tangbo npuitu phudlujiu aliuniu tingpilam Moab lam malan khaide.

niu akhuga din-e, ‘Moab maitu kam chariu mane, paliu hai Lot kaikik maidung-e, khatdi simaitu chari thiumane. Iniu paliuleng Ar namdi pikhai mibo-e, paliugu kadih poinadi Iniu naliuleng pikhai lakge.’”
(Emim chiu kubo kiriang katanbo jatniu Ar ga lung-e. Paliu hai kakibo katanbo jat Anakim mai kumjiu lungka mai-e.
Anakim maitu kumjiu paliu tudi Rephaim chiujiu ku-e, chiudi Moab mainiura paliutu Emim chiujiu ku-e.

Hor mainiu ndara Edom ga lung-e, chiudi Esau kaikik mainiu paliutu hathon lujiu, paliu jattu kam maha mide, Israel maidungniu paliugu mikremaidungtu hathon lujiu paliutu pikhaibo kadihga lunglubo kumjiu paliudi siga lungmide).
“Sichiujiu
Haibo tingga aliuniu Kadesh Barnea saodia lujiu wangbo takum samriu tachad tangmide. Sibo tingga aphenpum thiukinbo chakin dungra
Paliu mathiutu kam mahakam makthen
“Paliu mathiu shaikam mibosai,
niu aliu khuga din-e,
‘Thainai naliuniu Ar npuiki luijiu Moab kadih tadken rabo-e.
Sigasu naliuniu Lot kaikik, Ammon mai ramga manajiu bammi rabo-e. Paliutu kam chariu mane, maksai paliutu charithiu mane. Palamra paliutu pikhai mibo kadihse Iniu naliuleng pikhai lakge.’”
(Haibo kadih haitu Rephaim mai ram chiujiu ku-e. Siga kalungmai; Ammon mainiu paliutu Zamzummim chiujiudi ku-e.
Paliuniu kubose Anakim maitu nchamme. Paliu hai chamai keng-e, khatdi paliu hai katanbo kaikikge. Chiudi Ammon mainiu paliu ram lulujiu lungmi raleng
Sikum gapjiu Esau kaikik Edom kadihga lungbo maidung lengdi
Mediterranean duipui mungkhen ga lungmaidung hai chapiukak Crete ganiu wangbo-e. Paliuniu khunlungmai thiujiu bambo Avvim maitu kam mahalujiu, paliu kadih, tingnulam Gaza namdi katang lulude).
“Aliuniu Moab tadken lubo saiga aliutu
Thainai gasu chamai hinaniu pijiu naliutu npingmi rabo-e. Naliu zan chiuboga mai hina pingjiu kaphikdung-dung mirabo-e.’
“Sichiujiu Iniu Kedemoth ramjing gasuniu Heshbon gu Chawang Sihon khuga agi-manaibo cham pikhaijiu champaomai langkhai-e:
‘Naliu dihga tadken khaine. Aliuniu npui tadken makjiu npui luitad mirabo-e.
Aliuniu tiu-sak khaimibo man pikhai bine, aliuniu masenbora,
aliu
“Chiudi Chawang Sihon niura param tadkenbo suikhai makge. Naliu Rawang,
“Sigasu
Sihon niu aliutu aphenra pamaidungtu majanglujiu Jahaz namdi mungga wangde,
chiudi aliu Rawang,
Siga aliuniu haphun luboga paliu mathiu, maipui, maipiu khatdi nahmai hinatu kamshat kam mide. Mai khangkhat tudi masiak khai makge.
Aliuniu khaorui khaona hina khoilujiu namdi hina kam mahaniang mide.
Aliu Rawang,
Chiudi aliuniu Ammon maigu kadih maksai Jabbok Giu mung maksai maluongram gu namdakdung, maksai aliu Rawang,
“Sibosai, aliuniu tingpilam bambo Bashan luongriang wangboga Chawang Og niu aliutu aphenra pamaidung hinatu majang lujiu Edrei namdak mungga padle.
Chiudi
“Sichiujiu

Sigasu pagu namdak pakhiangna aliuniu haphun lumide--aliuniu lulu makbo pabam khatnadi hamide. Bashan gu Chawang Og niu mawangbo ram Argob luongriang pakhiangna, namdak riakcharuk aliuniu haphun lude.
Haibo namdak pakhiangna kakubo charireng, rengmun khamten bam kamme, khatdi nam kakengkha charireng kahabodi bamniu-e.
Aliuniu Heshbon gu Chawang, Sihon gu namdak rammaitu kambo kumgapjiu, namdi hina kam mahajiu, maipui, maipiu, khatdi nahmai hinatu kamshat kam mide.
Aliuniu namdakdung gasu khaoring hina khatdi mania hina sunglude.
“Sibowan siakga aliuniu Ammon mai wang khangnia gu kadih Jordan Giuki tingbanglam, Arnon Giuki gasu Hermon Luong katang lulude.
(Sidon mainiu Hermon Luongtu Sirion chiujiu ku-e, khatdi Ammon mainiura Senir chiujiu ku-e).
Aliuniu Bashan gu Chawang Og gu kadih pakhiangna lulude: sibodung sira paningkamga bambo namdidung, Gilead luongriang Bashan ram khatdi tingbang lam namdi Salecah nai Edrei katangbo-e.”

(Chawang Og hai Rephaim gu kanambo mai-e. pagu tating hai tatuga bunglujiu khaibambose pathen gaphek madai khatdi padet gaphek nia chiujiu padle. Sise tuhoi katangdi Ammon maigu namdi Rabbah ga bamkha-e).

“Aliuniu kadihse lulubo wan-ga, Iniu Reuben kiphiu maidungtu Arnon Giumung khen ga bambo Aroer gu namdak tingpilam bambo Gad dih khatdi Gilead maluongram kasia jaojiu sibogu namdakdung chiujiu pikhai mide.
Chiujiu Gilead dih kabangbo hina khatdi Bashan kadih Og niu mawangbo Argob luongriang pakhiangna Manasseh kiphiu kasia khuga pikhai mide.”
(Bashan tu Rephaim gu kadih chiujiu si-e.

Manasseh kiphiu gasu, Jair niu Argob dih pakhiangna lude, sise Maacah nai Geshur ramrai katangbo Bashan dih si-e. Paniu nam jamleng pazan luijiu mathak khaide, chiujiu sibo namdungtu Jair namdung chiujiu ku-e).
“Iniu Manasseh kiphiu Machir gu kiriangtu Gilead pikhai mide.

Sigasu Reuben nai Gad kiphiudungtu Gilead kadih gasu Arnon Giuki tangbo Iniu pikhai bide. Paliugu ramraise tingrunlam singgiu n-gangbo ga-e, khatdi tingpilam ramrai sira Jabbok si-e, sise Ammon maitu ramrai tangbo-e.
Paliugu kadih tingnulam Jordan Giuki mengtang-e, tingpilam Galilee Ajai ganiu tingrunlam Kashaibo Duipui katang khatdi tingbanglam Pisgah Luongphi katang-e.
Naliugu khaorui-khaona kengbambo I si-e, haijengniu Iniu naliutu pikhaibo namdakdungga naliu nao-nahdung khatdi khaorui-khaona hina khaidiak milo.
Naliu singna Israel maidungniu paliutu
“Sigasu Iniu Joshua tu ladpikhai-e: ‘Naliu Rawang,
Paliutu pingmane, palamra naliu Rawang,
‘Tanthubo
atu pijiu Jordan Giuki kenpad khailo, chiujiu Lebanon Luong kawibo maluang ram, khatdi patam wibo dih phui khaine.
“Chiudi naliu jengniu
Pisgah Luongton ga khangsulo. Chiulujiu tingpi tingrun khatdi tingbang tingnulam phuikhai lulo. Nangniu phuiboga phui mawisui lulo, delosai nangniu wadaodi Jordan kenpad ngam lakge.
Joshua tu ladpikhai bilo. Palungchun kam mahu khailo. Palamra nangniu kangaobo dihse paniu pamaidungtu majang ngutjiu gomlu rabo-e.’
“Sichiujiu Bethpeor namdaktu muntuangbo bamgase aliu bam khaide.”
Chiujiu Mose niu maidung khuga din-e, “Iniu katikhaibo tacheng-tajai hina majailulo, chiusai naliu pao-peh Rawang,
Iniu naliu khuga chamtan pikhaibo riga wadi khaisan mane khatdi kam nkhin mane.
Naliu miksiakniu Peor Luongga
chiudi
“Aliu Rawang,

Chamchangjiu majailulo, chiusai kakimai jatniu naliu hai ndejiuga ningtinglo chiubo silune. Haibo tacheng-tajaidung chiulusai paliuniu haichiu din-e. ‘Haibo kadibo jat hai paliugu tasi ningting dejiu wilo!’
“Wajiukha dibambo, jatniu tadi, paliu rase paliuniu pageng bamboga najiu bamliu tadi, aliu Rawang,
Thainai Iniu naliutu katikhaibo kumjiu wajiukha dibambo jatniu tadi kamajibo tacheng-tajai bam makge.
Ningting bamlo! Naliu mikniu ngaolubo, naliu ringtingga mangai makra sisiak lulo.
Naliu Rawang,

niu chami gasu naliutu ndechiujiu npaopad khaimi gulo chiubo khatdi naliuniu palun wadi ngaomakjiu naliuniu dechiujiu palad chiu gulo chiubo hai naliu nahmaidung khuga paokhailo chiujiu paniu naliu khuga dinkhai bide,
naliuniu tatupek niaga raokhai bambo ladrian kariuse majai siak rabo-e.
Naliuniu chari hangutjiu lung gomlu rabo kadihga majairabo tacheng-tajai hina naliutu katikhailo chiujiu
“Sinai Luong riga chami gasu
chiubora naliu ronna maipui maksai maipiu,
khaoring khaona maksai thingna,
pawonniu tonbo khao maksai chakha meng kamlujiu naliutu kammao mimane.
Tingpuk ga naliuniu ngaobo-naimik, chahiu khatdi chagan rammaitu naliuniu kahumjiu patien thiurabo lungchun suikhai mimane. Naliu Rawang,
Chiudi paniu naliu tura taobambo mangbam Egypt dih gasu kalan khaibibo dung-e. Naliuniu thaidao lungkinbo kumjiu pamai thiuraleng paniu naliutu jupad khaibo-e.
Naliu jengniu
Ira haiga shaikhai mirabo-e, wadao khatnadi singgiuse kenpadlu lakde, chiudi naliura ngutjiu kawibo dih lunggom lurabo-e.
Naliu Rawang,
palamra naliu Rawang,
“Naliuniu sibo kadihga lungtheng wangjiu naliu nahmai khatdi naliu tahmai lungbo katangdi naliu ronna wameng kamjiu naliutu kamao khaibo thiumi mane. Haise

Naliutu atungjiu lamchap thiura Iniu tinggen nai kadihtu ku-e, naliuniu achamse majai makge sai, naliuniu pating thengmakjiu haibo kadih gasu hami rabo-e. Naliuniu Jordan kenpadjiu wang lungrabo dihga naliu lungtheng lakge. Naliutu kam maha kammi rabo-e.
niu naliutu kakibo jatdungga hamara maren khaimi rabo-e, siga naliu tamnakha ronna ringlu rabo-e.
Siga chamai benniu macha kalubo radung, tasing tatu ra, chiubora ngaomakbo, maksai chiumakbo, tiusi makbo maksai manamsi makbo radungtu naliuniu machami rabo-e.
Siga naliuniu naliu Rawang,
Naliuniu chariubo daojiu haibo hina naliu riga wangbo wan ga naliuniu kanamboga
Pahai lungsa sibo Tingwang-e. Khatdi paniu naliutu phutpad milakge maksai naliutu kam nchummi lakge, papum siakniu naliu pao-peh maitu ladriat thiukhai mibose paniu mangai lakge.
“Naliutu lungkiu makhaboga, Tingwang niu chamainatu kadihga damkhaibo katangna padmibo situ phuilo. Kadih pakhiangna phuilo. Haikumbo kadibose ndadao padmima?
Mai khatniu chami gasu chara niu patu npaolujiu lungkhai mibo bamma?
Naliu Rawang,
niu haidung naliutu kamlen khaibo haira paronna Chara-e khatdi kakibo chara ha-e chiujiu naliuniu silu raleng-e.
Paniu naliutu katikhai lura tinggen lamsu naliutu pi pakhuan chiukhai-e; khatdi kadih ganiu naliutu pi pagu masanbo mibon ngaokhaijiu, naliutu paniu sigasu npaokhai-e.
Palamra paniu naliu pao-peh maitu chalung sa-e, paniu naliutu kadalubo-e, khatdi papumtan kadiboniu naliutu Egypt ganiu majang npad bibo-e.
Naliuniu tadngutboga, paniu, katanbo chawang maitu naliu suangga hathon khaide, sigasu naliutu majang ngut paliu dih pikhaide, sibo dihse tuhoi tangdi naliugu thiubam kha-e.
Sijengniu thainai katang maningtaojiu bamlo wadaodi mangai mane: Tingwang niu tinggen nai kadih ga
Thainai Iniu naliutu pikhaibo tacheng-tajai hina majailo, chiusai naliu mathiuleng kawibo daolune khatdi naliu kaikik lengdi wirabo-e. Naliu Rawang,
siga maikum mainiu pagu mikremai kamak maitu maobo ganiu kamshat misai pakwang siga nbai lubui-e. Haibo namdi rammai khatga pakkhai misai patu kamshat mirabo ganiu nbailu bui-e.

Reuben kiphiu maidung lengra Bezer namdi si-e, sise nbuidih pakamga bambo Bezer namdi si-e: Gad kiphiudung lengra Gilead kadihga bambo Ramoth namdi si-e. Manasseh kiphiudung lengra Bashan dihga bambo Golan namdi si-e.
Mose niu Tingwang gu tacheng-tajai khatdi laddin khaibo cham Israel maidungtu pikhaide.

Haibo tacheng-tajai pikhaibo wan haise paliuniu Egypt ganiu tadpat lubosai khatdi Jordan Giuki tingbanglam Bethpeor namdak masuang ramjengga bambo lon, paniu paliutu haibo tacheng-tajaidung pikhaibo-e. Haise Heshbon gu namdakga mawangjiu bambo Amor mai wangpiu Sihon gu kadih si-e. Paliuniu Egypt gasu kenpadboga Mose khatdi Israel mainiu patu kamkao mibo-e.
Jordan gu tingbanglam lungbambo kakibo Amor mai wang, Bashan gu Chawang Og dih sidi paliuniu lunggom lude.
Haibo dihse Aroer namdak gasu Arnon Giumung tangbo-e. Sigasu tingpilam bambo Sirion Luong, haise Hermon Luong pathen-palen si-e.
Sibo saidi Jordan Giuki tingbanglam bambo luongriang pakhiangna khatdi tingrunlam Shaibo Duipui katang khatdi tingbanglam Pisgah Luongphi mengtangbo-e.
Mose niu Israel maidungtu kumadui lujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Thainai Iniu naliutu pikhaibo tacheng-tajai hinase nking lulo. Naliuniu haidungse majai raleng kamlulo.
Sinai Luong ga aliu
aliu puipiu maitu ronna makjiu thainai aliu lungbammai mathiu tudi-e.
Sibo maluang riganiu naliutu
Sibo wan ga Iniu naliu nai Tingwang kakga chaplujiu tacham paochali khaibo-e, palamra naliuniu chami situ pingjiu maluangga khang lumakge.
‘Naliuniu Egypt dihga kavangthiu bambo gasu naliu Rawang,
“‘Atu makjiu kakibo ratu kahum mane!
Naliuniu charameng khat tudi kahum mane, palamra I hai naliu Rawang,
Chiudi atu lungsamai rigara khatdi agu tacheng-tajaitu majai maidung rigara Iniu chaken sang-sang tangbo lungsa khairabo-e.
Naliuniu tatien thiura jeng charuk bamme.

Chiudi chinniabo nai haira aleng kadkhaibo mathakbo nai-e. Sibo nai sira mai khatnadi tatien thiu mane--nangdi nanahmaidi, navangmaidi, nagu khaorui khaonadi maksai nadihga lungbo sangdiumaidi, tatien thiubo suimakge.
Naliuniu Egypt dihga kavang thiubotu maningtaolo, naliu Rawang,
“Maluongga chaminiu gomsimjiu bambo lon naliuniu tamiubo ganiu chakhuan padbose chiude khatdi naliu kiphiudunggu jupao khatdi papee thiumainiu akhuga wanglujiu haichiu din-e,
‘Chami gasu paniu aliutu npaobo wan ga aliu Rawang,
Chiudi dekamjiu aliuniu aliu ringtingtu kam maha mira kamralo? Kapingbo mi siniu aliutu kam mahalu bui-e. Aliu Rawang,
Mai khatniu ringbo Tingwang khuan chami ganiu chiulujiu ringlu buima?
Mose yo, menglan sulo sichiujiu aliu Rawang,
Paliuniu haichiu makum bammesai paliuniu haichiujiu atu chakhuang thiujiu khatdi achamtan hina majai bamsai paliu don wijiu lungne, khatdi paliu tah-nahmai paliu don wirabo-e.
Wangjiu paliutu paliugu rijikyga malan wangmi raleng dinbilo.
Chiudi Mose nangra, akhu haiga bamlo, khatdi Iniu agu tacheng-tajai hina khatdi ladriandung pikhai bine. Iniu paliutu pikhai bambo kadihga paliuniu sidungse majai luraleng maidung khuga kati khailo.
“Israel maidung yo, naliu Rawang,
Sibo hina majaikam lulo, sichiusai naliuleng wahina wine, khatdi naliuniu wang lungrabo dihga tingtheng lunglune.
“Naliu Rawang,
Naliuniu ringbam thenna, naliu khatdi nakai-nakikdung chiujiu naliu Rawang,
Haidungse nkinglo, Israel maidung yo, haidungse majailo! Chiusai naliuleng wahina wilune, khatdi aliu pao-pehmai Rawang,
Na-
Iniu naliutu thainai pikhaibo chamtandungse wadaodi mangai mane.
Naliu nahmaidungtu haidungse katikhai bilo. Naliuniu chakyga bambo lon, naliuniu tadpatbo lon, naliuniu mathak bambo lon, naliuniu changam kam bambo lon chiujiu haidungse dinkhai lan-lan bilo.
Haidungse nagu npomga khinkhai lulo khatdi haidungse nasan gadi khailulo sichiujiu maningtao jutjiu bamlo.
Naliu ky akham piga khatdi naliugu rengmun ga raokhai lulo.
Naliuniu kamlu makbo, kawibo manianiu naliu ky phuibam rabo-e khatdi naliuniu chukhai makbo akhundi bamdi rabo-e, khatdi naliuniu lingkhai makbo mumsirengdi, takisy rengdi bamdi rabo-e.
Naliuniu kavangthiu bambo Egypt gasu
Naliu
Naliu khuga lung maguijiu bambo maidunggu chara maksai kakibo ratu kahum mane.
Naliuniu kakibo ratu kahum misai
Naliutu pibo tacheng-tajai hina majaikam lulo.
niu dinbo kamajibo kawibose kamlo. Sichiusai naliu mai hina wijiu lunglune,
Khatdi paniu ladriat thiukhai mibo kumjiu naliuniu naliugu mikremaitu hapad lubui-e.
“Naliu nahmaidungniu naliu khuga, ‘Dekamjiu
Sibo wan-ga paliu khuga, ‘Aliu hai Egypt mai wangpiu vang thiubam niubo-e chiudi
Maisuang kahabo ngam khatdi kapingbo Egypt maidung khuga, paliugu chawang khuga khatdi paliugu chakampaodung khuga kamkhai mibo aliu mik siakniu patu ngaolubo-e.
Paniu kamkhai raleng aliu pao-pehmai khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo kumjiu aliutu paniu Egypt gasu majangpad lujiu haibo kadihse aliutu pikhaibo-e.
Sigasu aliu Rawang,
Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaibo hinase aliuniu chamchangjiu majai lusai, paniu naliutu pachun kimbam rabo-e.
Tingwang niu haimaitu naliu khuga khaibijiu naliuniu kamkao lusai, simaitu naliuniu kamshat kam milo. Simaidungtu majang khat thiu mane maksai lungsa mane.
Paliu mai khat tudi magiang mane, khatdi naliu nahmai tudi simaitu pi magiang mane,
palamra simainiu naliu nahmaitu
Sijengniu paliugu rathakbam kamkao milo, paliugu masanbo tatu-tiangse kampang tap-tap milo. Paliugu Asherah ramengdi kamkao milo sichiujiu charameng hinase ruthon kam milo.
Haise kamlulo palamra naliu hai
“Naliu hai maidung suang keng nkiu-e, chiujiu Tingwang niu naliutu lungsajiu kadalubo makge. Naliu hai kadihpiriga siamthubo jat khatle.
Naliu pao-pehdung khuga paniu chamriat thiukhai mibo jengniu
Naliu Rawang,
Chiudi mai khatkumboniu patu mikresai maomakjiu paniu patu sajai pirabo-e.
Siniu tuhoira, naliutu katikhaibo haise naliuniu majai lulo; khatdi Iniu thainai din khaimibo tacheng-tajai hina piululo.

Paniu naliutu lungsarabo-e, khatdi naliutu thoidam pikhai rabo-e, chiusai naliu nahmaidung pariak kengkhang sune. Paniu naliu luzam gadi thoidam khaijiu miusy, mumsy, khatdi takisa, khatdi matom kabui nai milydung kengjiu naliuleng thoidam pikhaine. Naliutu pikhaira paniu naliu pao-pehdung khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo dihga paniu naliutu thoidam pikhaine.
Naliutu thoidam kengjiu pikhaibo kumjiu kadihpiriga mai khat tudi pikhai matai makge. Sichiujiu naliu tudi maksai naliugu khaorui-khaona tudi pijiu kingka makbo thiukhai lakge.

niu naliutu thiuniu rabo hina ganiu gukhai bine, khatdi naliuniu Egypt ga kasa daolubo kumjiu paniu naliu khuga pi kapingbo raren wangkhai lakge, sikumbo hina paniu naliugu mikremai khuga piwang khaine.
Naliu Rawang,
“Paliu hai naliu suang keng-e chiujiu naliu karainiu dinmane sichiusai naliuniu paliutu hapad ngamlakge.
Paliutu pingmi mane; naliu Rawang,
Mai kapingbo raren naliu mikniu ngaolubo, katasibo tien kamkhaibo khatdi kadibo pumtan nai jengtanniu naliutu
Paniu nping-charenbodi paliu ruangga pikhaibi sune khatdi pak marijiu nbai kakinmai tudi kam mahami rabo-e.
Sijengniu haimaitu pingmi mane. Naliu Rawang,

Naliuniu tadngutboga paniu haibo jatdungtu tam-tamna paniu hathon khaibi rabo-e. Naliuniu pawan khatga paliutu kam mahakam lulakge, palamra, naliuniu sichiu kamsai, tathiu chakhaodung kengkhangjiu naliutu kam kapinjiu kam charenkhai rabo-e.
Naliugu mikremaitu
Paliu wangtu paniu naliu ben hangga pikhai bine. Naliuniu paliutu gimirabo-e, chiujiu paliutu mangai mirabo-e. Mai khatniudi naliutu khamngam lulakge, naliuniu mai hinatu kam mahami rabo-e.
Paliugu ramengtu rumilo. Kachia maksai rangkanggi paliugu bambo situ masen mane. Khatdi naliuleng khoimane, naliuniu khoisai, naliu shaine, palamra charamengtu
Charameng haise naliu kyga wadaodi thinwang mane, naliuniu khoisai paliu riga tasiang pikhai bambose naliu rigadi wang rabo-e. Naliuniu charameng situ wajeng simakjiu mareng lulo, palamra sise
“Naliu pao-pehmai khuga
Naliu Rawang,

Naliuniu mariujiu tadraleng katanbo madiu khai mibotu mangaimi mane. Khatdi naliu pao-peh maidung nai naliuniu tiu-matai makbo naliuniu tiuraleng manna naliutu pikhaibi-e. Chamainiu ringra leng taruak ronnatu mangiu khaisi lakge, chiudi
Takum atai tadbo kakga, naliu fai-ni kekmi makge, khatdi naliu phi mensonmi makge.
Maipiu khatniu panah maitu tacheng katikhai bibo kum
Sijeng gasu
Naliu Rawang,
sibo kadihga chabanmiu, tathiu, mumsy, ndutsy, majongsy, takisy khatdi makhuidui bamme.
Sibo bamga naliuniu wadaodi mariu chari lakge, maksai kahabo thiulakge. Siga bambo tatu gasu chagi padle khatdi sibogu maluongga tataagi daobo phungdi bamme.
Naliuniu tiunibo hina daolune, khatdi naliu Rawang,
Naliuniu tiunibo hina daolubo wan-ga, lungra chaky kawibo thiulujiu bammibo ga,
khatdi naliugu matom, kabui khatdi mily, naliugu kachia nai rangkanggi khatdi naliugu mania hina kengkhangbo wan-ga,
naliu chaliangmi lakge khatdi naliu Rawang,

Kaniu patai karabo khatdi charuimai-gapuiniu phuijiu bambo pingbuibo ramjing gasu paniu naliutu majang kenpad khaimibo-e. Sibo kasangbo tadui habo dihga paniu tatutong gasu naliuleng tadui pi padkhai mibo-e.
Naliu pao-pehmainiu wadaodi tiu matai kamakbo tatek, ramjing gase naliutu tiuraleng manna pikhai-e. Kanamboga kawibo thoidam paniu naliutu pikhai raleng, wajiukha naliutu madiura paniu pikhai-e.
Sichiujiu naliu pumtan ganiu naliu lungwi lune chiubo wadaodi naliuniu maning mane.
Naliu Rawang,
Wadao khatnadi naliu Rawang,
Naliuniu

“Kinglo, Israel maidung! Thainai naliuniu Jordan Giuki kenpad sune chiujiu naliu suang di-nkiubo khatdi tan nkiubo jatdunggu kadihtu naliuniu lunggom lune. Paliugu rengdise tingpuk tungtangjiu bambo kadibo namdi-e.
Sibo maidungse theng-di-e khatdi tan-e. Paliu haira lungka mai-e, khatdi mai khatnadi paliu masuangga chap ngamlu makge chiujiu dinbo naliuniu silude.
Chiudi tuhoira, naliuniu ngaolu rabo-e, chiubora naliu Rawang,
“Naliu Rawang,

niu naliutu pi paliu dih lulubo haise naliu wibo donniu maksai majibo kambo gasu makge. Paniu paliutu hathonbo lamra paliu hai sa-e. Khatdi paniu naliu pao-peh Abraham, Isaac, khatdi Jacob khuga ladriat thiukhai mibose kamkhaitang raleng-e.
Naliuniu simasan lulo, chiubora naliuniu haise daobuibo gasu
“Ramjingga
Sinai Luong ganiudi naliuniu
niu naliu khuga ladriat raokhaibo tupek lura Iniu maluang gase khang-e. Siga Iniu nchun atai, n-nien atai katiu tiumakjiu bamkhai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu
Yo, nchun n-nien chiujiu naimikpui atai sailam paniu ladriat raokhaibo tupekse
“Chiujiu
Atu khammane. Paliutu Iniu kam maha mira rangmibo-e sigasu maitudi pijiu paliutu maningtao tamine. Sichiujiu Iniu natu pijiu haimaidung suang keng nkiubo khatdi tan nkiubo jat piu thiukhai bine.’
“Sijengsu Iniu ariwang kadihluong gasu ladriat raokhaibo tupek niase ponlujiu nkumme. Kadihluong ganiu chami taopadle.
Naliu Rawang,
Sijengniu naliu masuangga Iniu tatupekse taliang khaijiu sise npuakpang mide.
Sijeng gasu Iniu
Iniu
, palung pomsiak mijiu Aaron tudi kamshat lubui mibo-e, sijengniu Aaron jengniudi sibo wan-ga Iniu kheng-e.
Naliuniu kampad mibo mania-chaginiu machalubo matomchi mengse Iniu khoilujiu chamiga taliangkhai mide. Sibosai Iniu sise thaoniang lujiu sibo mudse khoilujiu luangbambo singgiuga thonkhai mide.
Chiujiu Kadesh Barnea ganiu naliutu chamtan pikhaijiu paniu naliuleng pikhaibo dihse meng gomlu raleng dinbo londi naliuniu patu malum makge; khatdi pacham phung makge.
Sibowan gasu naliuniu patu atungjiu kadin piuta mibo Iniu sibam mibo-e.
“Sijeng gasu Iniu
Khatdi Iniu kakheng thiu-e, ‘Tanthubo
Navang maidung Abraham, Isaac khatdi Jacob tu maningtao khailo khatdi paliu kuon tanbo, kasabo, maidung gu nuantu phuikhai mane.

Sichiu misai, nangniu paliu khuga ladriat khaimibo dihga namaidungtu nangniu majang ngut ngamlak mide chiujiu Egypt mainiu dinrabo-e. Nangniu paliutu marengjiu namaidungtu nangniu ramjingga kamshat khaira leng paliutu majang npadbo-e chiujiu paliuniu dinrabo-e.
Wakhat khat thiubamdi, haibo maidungtu nangniu namaileng kadalubo-e khatdi nagu kadibo pumtan nai jengtanniu paliutu Egypt gasu majang npad khai mibo-e.’
khatdi Iniu natu raokhaibi mibo, nangniu kampang mibose kumjiu Iniu raokhailan bine, chiusai sise nangniu tasingbungga khailulo.
“Sijeng gasu Iniu singchong singniu wabung khat ruilujiu khatdi karaibo kumgapjiu tatupek nia kamlujiu maluang gase ponkhangde.
Sichiujiu karaibo kumgapjiu
Sichiujiu Iniu maluang gasu malan wang lujiu
Siganiu paliu Gudgodah ga wangde, khatdi sigasu tadui wibo ram Jotbathah ga wangde.
Maluong gasu Levi kimaitu Chamriat Bungse akhira khatdi singku thiujiu thoidam pikhaiboga pazan dinra
Sijengniu Levi kaikik maira mai kakimai kumjiu paliutu charam pimakge; paliu dam pibose
Sigase paniu naliu pao-peh maidungtu pikhai raleng ladriat thiukhai mibo dihga naliuniu ngutlu raleng tadlujiu naliutu jukhailo chiujiu paniu atu din-e.
“Tuhoira, Israel maidung yo, naliu Rawang,
khatdi pagu tacheng tajai hina majailulo. Naliuleng pageng bamlu raleng Iniu naliutu thainai haidungse pikhaibo-e.
Kuthubo tinggen sidi
Chiudi
Tuhoi ganiu
Naliu Rawang,
Paniu kami magennah maitu phui mawikhai bi-e; aliu khuga lungbambo sangdiumai tudi paniu lungsajiu katiu-kasak chafai-tani pikhai-e.
Sijengniu, sangdiumaitu lungsa silo, palamra naliudi pawan khat Egypt ga sangdiumai thiukhai mibo-e.
Naliu Rawang,
Patu thuonlo pahai naliu Rawang-e, khatdi naliu masuangga maisuang habo tienkam naliuleng kam khaibo naliuniu ngaolude.
Naliu pao-peh mainiu Egypt ga wangbo wan gase chamai riak-chinnia ronna-e. Chiudi tuhoira naliu Rawang,
Naliu pumsiakniu
khatdi pagu maisuang habodungse naliuniu ngaolubo-e. Egypt mai wangpiu nai padihga lungbam mai hina khuga tenkhai mibo hinase naliuniu ngaolubo-e.
Egypt riphenmai pakhiangna, paliugu chaqon khatdi chaqon-karidungniu naliutu hakinboga
Naliuniu haiga wangtang makbo masuangga

Paniu Reuben kaikik mai Eliab nah Dathan nai Abiram tu kamkhaibose naliuniu maningtaolo. Mai hina masuangga kadih nkak padjiu paliu kikhundung, paliugu mathenkydung khatdi paliugu kavangdung nai paliugu khaoruidung hina kajong lubo-e.
Yo,
“Thainai Iniu naliu khuga pikhaibo tacheng-tajai hina majailulo. Chiusai naliuniu singgiuse kenpad lujiu naliuniu ngutnejiu bambo dihse lunggom lune.
Khatdi naliuniu siga naliu pao-pehmai khuga paliu kaikik maitu pikhaira
Naliuniu wang lungrabo dihse karaiga naliuniu lungkhai mibo Egypt dih kum makge. Siga naliuniu chamiu lingsai, naliulu wira jengniu tatien maran-e, chaluga aluadlam kamwang-e.
Chiudi naliuniu wang lungrabo dihse maluongdih nai taningdih rabo-e, sibo dihse tingriu khaibo duiniu phuibam rabo-e.
Naliu Rawang,
Pageng bambo wan saisuijiu chakenting tadi kariaktingga tadi paniu tingriu pikhaine, chiusai miusy, mumsy, khatdi takisa naliuleng,
khatdi naliugu khaorui leng piubuan lungbam rabo-e. Naliuniu masenbo tiutek hina bamrabo-e.
Naliu ronna kakibo radungtu kahumra machunjiu
Naliuniu sichiu kamsai,
Na-liu nahmaidungtu katikhailo. Naliuniu chakyga bambo wan gadi, tad mariujiu bambo wan gadi, naliuniu changam kamjiu bamdi, mathak bambo wan gadi, haidungse dinlen bilo.
Naliu ky kamundeng gadi, rengmun gadi raokhailo.
Chiusai naliu pao-peh maitu pira riat-khai mibo dih gase naliu khatdi naliu nahmai tingthengjiu lunglune. Tinggen niu kadih rilam bamthen naliuniu siga lunglune.
“Iniu pikhaibo tacheng-tajai hinase chamchangjiu piululo: Naliu Rawang,
Chiusai naliuniu tadngutboga naliu masuang raijiu maidung situ hathon khai bine, khatdi naliu suang tanmai khatdi kadibo jatniu lunggomjiu bambo dih gase naliuniu lunglune.

Naliuniu tadkhaimibo bam hinase naliugu thiumine. Naliugu kadihse tingrunlam ramjing gasu tingpilam Lebanon tangbo, khatdi tingbanglam Euphrate Giuki gasu tingnulam Mediterranean Duipui tangbo mengtang rabo-e.
Naliuniu sibo dihga tadkhaibo bam hinaga, maidungniu naliutu pijiu pingraleng Tingwang niu ladriat thiukhai mibo kumjiu paniu kamkhai rabo-e. Khatdi mai khat niudi naliutu khamngam lulakge.
“Thainai Iniu naliutu tasiang nai thoidam kada raleng naliutu pikhai-e-
naliu Rawang,
chiudi naliuniu haibo chamtandungse majai makjiu naliuniu wadaodi kahum matai makbo kakibo ratu kahum misai, sise tasiang si-e.
Naliuniu wang lungrabo dihga
(Haibo luong kaniase Gilgal namdak mungga bambo Moreh gu masanbo singbang gasu diumakjiu tingnulam bambo Jordan Giuki nai Canaan mainiu lungbambo kakga-e).
Naliuniu Jordan Giuki kenpad surabo-e khatdi naliu Rawang,
Iniu thainai naliutu pikhaibo tacheng-tajai hina majaine chiubo chapkhai siaklulo.
“Naliu pao-peh Rawang,
Naliuniu wang lungrabo dihga, maidungniu paliu radungtu maluong kuboga, maluong poiga, singbang hangga chiujiu kahum bambo pakhiangna kam maha milo.

Paliugu rathakbam paliugu masanbo tusomdung kampangjiu npuakniang milo. Paliu rapui Asherah meng ruthon milo, khatdi paliugu charamengdungse kam mahaduak milo, sichiu misai wadaodi sibo bamga paliu kahumlan tamine.
“Simaidungniu paliu ratu kahumbo kumjiu naliu Rawang,
Naliu kiphiu hinagu luongren gasu maidungniu wangjiu patu kahumra
Siga naliugu rathak hina, nphong rukhaibo dam, kariugu damkhat, chunwi pipadbo dam, khatdi
Siga lungbo tingga naliu Rawang,
“Siboting wangbo wan-ga, naliuniu masuangga kambo kumjiu kammane. Tuhoi katangdi naliuniu pakhen-khen thiujiu kahum karen bamme.
Palamra
Naliuniu Jordan Giuki kenpad sai, sibo dihtu lunggom lura

niu patu kahumrabo pabam khat kada khaine, chiusai siga Iniu chamtan pibo hina naliuniu: rukhai raleng naliugu chara thiukhaibo, khatdi kaki-kibo chara thiukhaibo, naliugu kariudamgu khat, khatdi naliuniu chunwijiu pipadbo khatdi nkiujiu
Paniu bambo bamga, naliu nahmai dungtu naliu vangmai dungtu khatdi naliu namga lungbambo Levi maidungtu majang lujiu wang chunwi aruang lulo; Levi maidung lengra kadih ha-e chiubo mangai mane.
Naliu ronna kadalubo bam gase charathiu khaibo suimakge;
naliu kiphiugu kadihga
“Chiudi naliuniu lungbo ram hinaga naliuniu tiunibo, naliugu khaoruidung kamshat lujiu langtiubo sui-e.
Chiudi tazainiu naliugu tiutek thiumane, naliuniu haise kadihga tadui runthonbo kumjiu runthon milo.
Naliuniu
Naliu khatdi naliu nahmai, naliu vangmai, khatdi naliu dihga lungbambo Levi mai chiujiu naliu Rawang,
Naliu dihga naliuniu lungbam then, Levi maitu wajeng simakbo thiulakge chiubo chapkhai lulo.
“Naliu Rawang,
Sichiujiu, kahumbo bamse diuju misai,
Mai khatniu charachengga masanbo khaodi, masan makbo khaodi paniu tathan zan maksai chakheng zan tiubo kumjiu tiusui-e.
Chamiga tazai bamthenna tiumane, palamra ringtingse tazaiga bambo-e, naliuniu chami tiuboga ringtingse tiu taman mane.
Tazai siniu tiutek thiujiu thinpiu mane, chiujiu tazaise kadihga taduitu runthonbo kumjiu runthon milo.
Naliuniu haibo chamtan majai sai
Naliuniu
gu rathakbam ganiu kadkhaibo hina rukam khailo. Sibo saidi naliuniu tiubo chamigu tazaise kahumbo rathakbamga runkhailo.
Iniu naliutu pibo chamtan hina chamchangjiu majailo, chiusai naliuleng khatdi naliu kaikik mathiuleng wijiu tingtheng bamlu sune. Palamra naliuniu majibo tien khatdi
“Naliuniu maigu kadihtu habo tingga, naliu Rawang,

niu sibo jattu kam mahamibo sai, paliuniu kahumbo jai situ naliuniu suimak raleng chapkhai lulo, palamra kashaibose naliu riga wangne. Paliu ratu paliuniu kahumbo jai kumjiu naliuniu kahumra leng naliuniu kammane.
Paliu ratu paliuniu kahumbo kumjiu naliu Rawang,
“Naliuniu nda kahum makbo ratu kahum mira khatdi macha miraleng khatdi jukhaira leng,
phaimiukakung mainiu maksai chamang kaphung mainiu maisuang habo khatdi tasibo wangne chiujiu ladriat thiulubui-e. Paniu dinbose maji bamdi sui-e,
chiudi paniu dinbo gase suikhaimi mane. Naliuniu
sai suilo, patu chakhuang thiulo; palad majaijiu khatdi pagu chamtan piululo; patu kahumlulo khatdi pakhuga chamchang lulo.
Chiujiu phaimiu cham dinjiu maksai chamang cham dinjiu naliuniu Egypt ga kavang thiujiu bambo gasu naliutu ranpad khaibibo
“Nasingna, maksai nachipiu maksai nachipui maksai nangniu kungbo nanao maksai naka kawimai niudi mahinjiu naliu pao-peh khatdi naliuniu kahum matai makbo ratu kahumra naliutu kathuat khaibo sui-e.
Kasia mainiu naliu khu kalungmai maksai kadiulam kalungmainiu kahumbo ratudi kahumra kachu sune.
Chiudi pijiu natu hiammi mane; palad tudi nking mane. Patu lungsa mane maksai phuikhai mane, khatdi patu wakhat gadi gukhai mane.
Patu gimilo! Patu tatuniu rotboga raithupiu thiulo, chiujiu mai hinaniu tatu rotmi sulo.
Patu tatuniu rotshat milo! Naliuniu Egypt ga kavangthiu bambo gasu naliutu ranpad khaibo
Sichiu khaisai Israel mai hinaniu padbambose chiusune; paliudi pingsune, chiusai pasaira mai khat niudi sikumbotu npingjiu kasabo tien kamlan tamine.
pageng habo mai kasianiu naliu kangmai kasiatu paliu malum kampangjiu naliuniu wadaodi kahum matai makbo ratu kahumra jukhai mide chiubo chiusune.
Sikumbo cham chiutao sai, kahio mawisui lulo; khatdi sise kasabo tien kampadbo siakge chiubo silusai,
sibo namdakga lungmai hinatu khatdi paliugu khaorui-khaona hinadi kamshatniang milo. Sibo namdakse kam mahaniang milo.
Siga lungmaigu mania hina khom maduiwang lusai sibo namdak bamkhatga khom maduilujiu,
Kam maha miraleng thonpad mibo wakhatnadi naliuleng khoi mane. Chiusai

Thainai Iniu pikhaibo chamtan hina naliuniu majai lusai, khatdi paniu lunibo kamlusai, paniu naliutu lungsa khaine khatdi paniu naliu pao-pehmai khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo kumjiu, naliutu pijiu lungking-ka khai bine.
Naliu haira naliu Rawang,
Naliuniu haibo khaodung zan tiubo sui-e: matom, kabui, mily, kami,
tathan, chahung maksai chakheng--
khatdi wakhao hina patin karabo khatdi taladbo hina tiubo sui-e.

Chiudi wakhao patin ramakbo khatdi talad makbo khao zan hina tiu mane. Kontrao, tazakheng maksai tazaqui rammai janra tiumane. Paliutu masan makbo leng lukhai rabo-e; paliu hai talad makge khatdi patin ramakge.
Kavak zan tiumane. Paliu tudi masan makbo leng lukhailo; patin nia bamme chiudi paliu talad makge. Haibo khao zan rammai tiumane, haidung shaijiu bambo pumdi niamane.
“Chakha pami rang bambo nai palip phungbo hina naliu tiubo sui-e,
taduiga lungbo kakibo khao pamirang habo khatdi palip thiumakbo sira tiumane; haibodungtu masan makbo leng chakrabo-e.
“Masanbo thingna hina naliuniu tiubo sui-e.
Chiusai haibo thingnadung: Lengreng, abeng, takaoleng, kawoimana maluipui, lawai, n-gek, ruidi, taduileng, taduirui, khuptariupui, chararui, aluak, chapungrui, khatdi chalen haise naliuniu tiumane.
“Wakhaopui pakan thiubo hina masan makbo-e, haidung hina tiumane.
Wakhaopui masanbo hinara naliu tiubo sui-e.
“Papui ndui ganiu milypoi maksai kamipoitu langmane.

Tingwang niu patu kahumrabo bam khat kadakhaiboga mengjiu, paniu bambo, siga naliugu daolubo kariudam, jaw, takisa, khatdi naliugu matom-kabui nai mily piangrai thubo hina zan paniu bambo bamga tiulo. Haibo tiense kamlo, chiusai naliuniu pawan machangna
Wagaje kahumrabo bamse naliu khuganiu diuju misai
Naliuniu daolubose jonlujiu rangkang thiujiu kahumbo bamga phungwanglo.
Naliuniu tiunibo hina matom-zan, milypoi zan, jaw, jaw-ari chiujiu--
“Naliugu namdakga lungbambo Levi maitu wajeng simakbo kammane paliura paliu dih ha-e.
Takum sum machang miusygu kariudam khaibo hina kaden lujiu phungwang naliugu namdakga makhuan khailo.

Miusy hai Levi mai damme, paliura paliu dih ha-e, khatdi naliugu namdakga sangdiumai lungbo kami-magennah mailengdi pirabo-e. Paliuniu lunibo hina paliuniu daobo sui-e. Haise kamlo chiusai naliu Rawang,
“Takum chinnia loibo naise naliu paw phungkinbo hina naliuniu kuakkhai bijiu mahami rabo-e.
Haise sichiujiu kamrabo-e. Mai khatniudi Israel mai karaitu rangkang apukbi-e sai chapawse mahamine; mai khat niudi sibo pawse khenglanmak rabo-e;
Sangdiu mainiu naliu paw phungsai khoilulo chiudi namai khugara lumak rabo-e.
“Naliu Rawang,
naliu ruangga mai khatniudi kaleksa lakge.
Paniu dinriat lubo kumjiu,
Sichiu makjiu, naliu lung dijiu thinmak daolakbo hinase paleng apukkhai bilo.
Tingkum chinniaga chapaw maha khaibotu manangbo jengniu maitu rangkang apukraboga kalanmi mane. Naliu lungga wa kasa maning mane. Naliuniu apukrao misai, naliu riga pachun sajiu
Naleng simakjiu mathajiu pilo chiusai naliuniu kambo hinaga
Israel mai kaikik kasia maira kalek sajiu mai nkha changin rabo-e, sijengniu simaitu nkha sira Iniu chamtan pikhaibo-e.
Naliuniu patu lekhaibo nai paben maruangjiu pi tadkhaimi tulo.
niu natu thoidam pibo ganiu—miusy, mily khatdi jawse thinjiu nalung dijiu pikhailo.
Naliu Egypt dihga maivang thiujiu
“Wagaje navang mainiu tadni maksai; paniu natu lungsa bamlu bui-e, maksai nakikhuntu lungsajiu bamni sai,
patu nakilungga puingut lujiu pakuon butmilo; chiusai paringting paniu navang thiubo sui-e. Navang npuimai tudi sichiulo.

Nangniu kavang khattu lekhaibo wan-ga nalung aman makbo thiumane; palamra paman thiujiu maikyga lungbo ngam paphan mandi tangmakjiu takum charuk paniu natu machakhai mibo-e. Haise kamlo, chiusai naliu ngamkam hinaga
Takum machangga
Chiudi wagaje wakhaose sonjiu paphi sabo, pamik tiatbo, makdi lung masa mibo thiusai,
Sikumbo khao janra kalung ganiu langtiu lulo. Mathiuse charachengga masandi, taniadi naliuniu chakheng tathan zan langtiubo kumjiu langtiu lulo.
Tazaise tiumane, kadihga tadui runthonbo kumjiu sise runthon milo.
Kahumbo bam khatga tadlujiu

Naliuniu sibo tiutek tiubo tingga chakhi khaibo taruak tiutulo. Egypt dihtu phutkhai raleng naliuniu pujiu tadmibo kumjiu jeng chinnia haise chakhi khaimakbo taruak tiurabo-e. Haise tiulo—haisitu chariu magenthiubo taruak kurabo-e, sichiujiu naliuniu chariu magenthiubo bam, Egypt dih gasu padbo tingmik situ naliuniu karingthen maningtaojiu bamrabo-e.
Jeng chinnia lungga hai naliu kadihga mai khat ky gadi chakhi hai khai nbam mak rabo-e; khatdi raithubo nai nchun kamshat mibo mijanse sibo nai nchun tiukam mirabo-e.
“Kahumbo bam khatga Kenpadbo Ngee gu chakhaose gikhailo haise
haibo mise suanglujiu kahumbo bamga tiulo; sichiujiu pasaibo nai nsuan naliu kylam malanwang milo.
Sichiujiu pasaibo jeng charuk lungga chakhi khaimakbo taruakse naliuniu tiurabo-e, khatdi pachinniabo naise
sichiujiu Atiat Ngee hai naliu Rawang,
masuangga naliu nao-nahdung, naliu vangdung khatdi naliu ramga bambo Levi maidung, sangdiumaidung khatdi kami-magennahdungtu puilujiu chunwi-ringa lulo. Haise kahumbo bam khatga kamlo.
Haibo chamtanse majaisiak lulo; Egypt dihga naliu kavang thiukhai mibo situ mangaiwi makge.
Naliu nao-nahdung, naliu vangdung khatdi naliu ramga bambo Levi maidung, sangdiumaidung khatdi kami-magennahdungtu puilujiu chunwi lulo.
Naliu Rawang,
“Naliu jatga npiumai hinaniu takum khat lungga kahumbo bam khatga: Kenpadbo Ngee, Atiat Ngee khatdi Kapuong Ngee sum haigase wangjiu
mai hinaniu, paniu paniu kangambo saisuijiu khatdi
“Naliu Rawang,

Paliu hai nchang kamakbo suimakge, maksai paliugu ladjan-ga chamiu mareng thiubo suimakge, khatdi tanim lubo suimakge palamra kalen pibo siniu ningtingmai khatdi lungchun masanmai mikdi kamtiat mibo-e, sichiujiu kamaobo ladjan thiumibo-e.
Pawan machang majijiu nchang lulo, sichiusai naliu Rawang,
charamengtu kahumbo tatutiangdi kamkhai mane; sikumbo situ
Naliu Rawang,
“Din champanjiu dinboga, namdakga khangsia mainiu maipuidi maipiudi
kakibo ratu kahumbo, maksai chahiu, naimik, chagan maksai
Haikumbo naliuniu chiusai palamse kahio mawilo. Kasabo thak Israel maidung khuga padle chiubo silusai,
sikumbo maitu namdak lenlam puipad lujiu tatuniu rotshat milo.
Sichiudi, patuse khangnianiu maksai sisuang kengjiu lamchap thiubo bamsai patu kamshat mibo sui-e; khangkhat ronnaniu lamchap thiusai patuse kamshatbo suilakge.
Lamchap thiumainiu tatu rotrai rabo-e, sibosai katan maidung hinaniu sinatu tatuniu rotrabo-e; haichiujiu kambo gasu naliuniu kasabo tien gasu mari lubui-e.

“Naliu kakga namgu ladjanpao mainiu ladjan thiusi lakbo haikumbogu tathu-chara chiubora kalek lusuibogu, maksai maitu kam ajam mibogu maksai maitu kamshatbo mibo khatdi saoniu kamshat jiulo chiubo sitamra haise kakungbo gu-e. Haikumbo padmi saira, naliu Rawang,
siga Levi kiriangmai nai sibo tingga ladjanpao thiujiu bammai khuga naliu thu-rase pikhaijiu paliuniu ladjan thiukhai rabo-e.
Paliuniu tathuse tiakkhai birabo-e khatdi paliuniu dinbo kumgapjiu naliuniu suirabo-e.
Paliuniu ladjan thiukhaibo suilo khatdi paliuniu dinbo hina naliuniu kamrabo-e.
Mai khatniu singku maksai tathuhgu ladjanpao cham piumakmai tura kamshat mirabo-e; haichiu kambo gasu Israel mai kakga kasabo tien haise kam mahalu rabo-e.
Sigasu mai hinaniu haise chiulusai pingmi rabo-e, sichiujiu mai khat niudi sikumbo kamping mirabo-e.
Sichiujiu naliuniu chawang kadakhaibo piuse
Chawangniu pagu riphen maidungleng chaqon kengjiu makuat makdi sui-e, Egypt ganiu meng chaqon liura maksai nkhiakra chamaitu langkhai makdi sui-e, palamra
Chawangniu panao kengjiu thiumak rabo-e, sichiusai haisiniu patu
Paniu chawang thiulu gapbo wan-ga, Tingwang gu tacheng-tajai khuang khat, Levi mai singku mai khuganiu palingbo khuang ganiu raopadbo katikhaibose pakhuga bamrabo-e.
Haibo khuangse pakhuga khaijiu paringting pakhiangna kenbam rabo-e, chiujiu siga chamtan raokhaibo hina simawira khatdi
Haisiniu pahai wahinaga
Singku thiubo Levi kaikik maidung haira Israel mai kadih ganiu paliu dam daomakge; sibosung paliu sira
Kakibo kaikik kumjiu paliu dih thiumakge; paliu damra
“Matom-kabui khatdi mily kadkhaibo lon, singkumai damgu paba, pa-aja khatdi palungjan pirabo-e.
Miusy, jaw, takisa, chakhaogiu pipad raithubo damse paliuniu lurabo-e.
Naliu kaikik ruangganiu Levi kaikiktu singku thiujiu tingtheng patien thiura
“Levi maira Israel mai namdi kata kadaobo gasu paliuniu kahumbo bamga wangbo sui-e.
Sigasu
Singku kaki mainiu daobo katiu-kasak dam nchamjiu daorabo-e khatdi paky khunniu pikhaibo hina paniu khai nbambo sui-e.
Kahumbo rathak bamga naliu nahmaitu kadkhai mane; chiujiu charachenggu tania thiubo maksai chara kasabotu phuibo maksai tathoi thoibo maksai kahumbo thak alimane.
Khatdi taden thonbo thak kammane, khatdi kashaibo hiunatu npao mane.
Naliu Rawang,
Naliu lung pakhiangnaniu malum siakjiu
Sigasu Mose niu din-e, “Naliuniu wang lungrabo dihga lungbam maira phaimiu cham maniujiu taden thonjiu lungmai-e, chiudi
Sibosung, I kumbo phaimiukakung khangkhat naliu ruangganiu langkhai bine, chiujiu naliuniu pacham majai rabo-e.
“Naliuniu Sinai Luongga maduibo nai,
Sijeng gasu
Nakumjiu phaimiukakung paliu ruanggasu khang khattu langkhaine; paniu dinrabo hina Iniu dinkhai bine, khatdi paniu maidung khuga Iniu dinbo chamtan hina dinlen rabo-e.
Azan gasu paniu din-e, chiujiu mai khatniu pacham majai maksai Iniu sajai pirabo-e.
Chiudi mai khatniu aratjiu Iniu pikhai makbo sailad dinsai, pase shairabo-e, sikumjiu mai khatniu chara katambo zantu thinjiu sailad dinsai padi shairabo-e
Mai khatniu
sibo luongriangse khat-khatgu namdiga malajiu menglu raleng padam sum thiujiu njanpad khailo. Sichiusai mai khatniu mai khattu kamshat misai patu gukhaira namdi khat gara pak mari lubui-e.
Mai khatniu maomengjiu pagu mikremai makbo mai khattu kamshat misai, paniu haibo namdi rong khatga pakkhaibo sui-e chiusai patu kalankhai rabo-e.

Dinrambaboga, maipiu khangnianiu mariuga tasingbang huiraleng majang mengbo wan-ga, panai ruangga khangkhatniu tasingbang dongbamboga, maritang gasu mari mahin padjiu khangkhat piutu kamshat misai, paniu haibo namdi sum ruangga namdi khatga pakkhai rabo-e chiusai patu kalankhai rabo-e.

Namdi khat ronna bammisai, sibo bamgasu diuchang diubam surabo-e, khatdi kamshat mibogu chakhum ruiraleng parip phungbo pariang-paruiniu patu minlu rabo-e, khatdi chalung pomboga pamao kahamaitu kamshat rabo-e. Sichiu bamdi paniu kamshat mibo maise pagu mikremai makge wa kammao padbo gasu kammibo-e.
Haijeng gasu naliuniu namdi sumse khaitam bamraleng Iniu chamtan pibo-e.
“Naliu Rawang,
Sibo wan-ga naliuniu kakibo namdi sum kadakhai rabo-e. (Iniu nthainai naliutu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu naliuniu kamjiu naliu Rawang,
Haise kamlo, sichiusai pamao hamai shailakge khatdi
“Chiudi chalad tu dinjiu, mai khatniu palung riak sajiu pagu mikremaitu kamshat lujiu sibo namdidungga gukhai raleng pak khai mide.
Haichiu padboga, pagu namdakgu jupaodungniu patu meng majang lujiu paniu kamshat mibo maigu chakhum ruiraleng parip phungbo pakimai khuga pikhaibi rabo-e, sichiujiu patu kamshat midi sui-e.
Patu lungsabo lenkhai tulo. Haikumboga Israel maidung duak lulo, sichiusai naliu mai hina wijiu lunglu bui-e.
Mai khatniu mai khattu kam masa khainejiu kamaoboga pamao madam khaisai,
panai khangniase kahumbo bamga tadrabo-e khatdi singkuniu ladjan thiurabo-e khatdi chakamkyga bambo ladjanpaodung niudi ladjan thiurabo-e.
Ladjanpaodungniu tathuse kahio mawijiu palam phiu masan rabo-e; khatdi sibo piuniu pasingna Israel maitu atungjiu kamaobo madam khaibam niusai,
kamaobo madam khaibo mainiu daorabo sajaise paniu daorabo-e. Haichiujiu naliuniu kamaobo gasu duakpad rabo-e.
Siga nde pad milo mai hinaniu chiulujiu pinglu rabo-e; chiusai mai khatnadi haikumbo wadaodi kasabo kamtami rabo-e.

Haikumbo tathu-chara padboga lungsabo wadi lenmane; ringting khatsung ringting khat, chamik khatsung chamik khat, chahiu khatsung chahiu khat, chaben khatsung chaben khat, khatdi chaphi khatsung chaphi khatniu sajai pirabo-e.

“Naliuniu naliugu mikremaitu atungjiu chari thiura mengpadbo wan-ga naliuniu chaqon-karidung, chaqondung khatdi naliu suang nkiubo chari maidung riak ngaorabo-e chiudi paliutu npingmi tulo. Naliu Rawang,
Naliuniu chari thiusu makbo masuangga singku khat situ pi tadpad masuang lujiu chari maidung khuga dinlo,
‘Israel maidung, nking khailo! Thainai naliuniu chari bamga tadra mine. Naliugu mikre maidungtu npingmi tulo, maksai chalung nkhinmi tulo, maksai charen mimane.
Naliu Rawang,

“Sibo wan-ga chakampao maidungniu maidung khuga dinrabo-e, ‘Saokummai paky thiuloi khailujiu, kadpadkhai makhabo mai bamma? Bamme sai, pahai chakyga malanwang rabo-e. Sichiu makjiu patuse charibamga kamshat misai, mai katammai khatniu pakyse kadpadbo tien thiumi rabo-e.

Mai khatkumbo mumsy ken lingkhai diaklujiu, mumsy ken-ga atiatlu tiu nanglu makbo bamma? Bamme sai, pahai chakylam malanwang mirabo-e. Sichiu lumakjiu, paniu chariga shaikhai misai, katammai khatniu mumsy hai lumi rabo-e.
Magiang raleng tanao npao tapkhai kamimai bamma? Bamsai, pahai pakylam wanglan rabo-e. Sichiu lumakjiu, patu hai chariga kamshat misai, paniu panaoleng khamkhai mibo puitu kakimainiu lumi rabo-e.’

“Chakampaodungniu maidung khuga dinlan rabo-e, ‘Saokummai khatniu palung chariujiu npingbo bamma? Sichiubo bamsai, pahai chakylam malanwang rabo-e. Sichiu maksai, paniu kakimai hot kam nkhinmi rabo-e.’
Chakampao maidungniu haise chari maidung khuga dinkhai loilubo saiga, pabao-pabaogu jupaodung leng kadarabo-e.
“Naliuniu namdi khattu chari hara tadsubo wan-ga, raijiu siga bambo maidungtu madunsunra pawan pibilo.
Paliuniu rengdi kamun lepadlujiu madunsun saira, paliu mathiuse naliu vang khatdi naliu jengniu tatien thiubo mai thiumi rabo-e.
Chiudi namdiga bambo maidung siniu madunsunra suimakjiu, chari thiura chap misai, naliugu chari mainiu namditu taoweng magui milo.
Sichiusai, naliu Rawang,
Chiujiu naliuniu naliuleng maipui, mainah, khaorui-khaona khatdi namdiga bambo hina naliuleng khoibo sui-e. Naliu mikre maidunggu hinase naliuniu thinpiubo sui-e, Sise
Naliuniu bamkhai rabo kadih gasu diujiu bambo namditu haichiujiu naliuniu kamrabo-e.
“Chiudi naliu Rawang,
Chamai mathiu chiubora: Hitt mai, Amor mai, Canaan mai, Periz mai, Hiv mai, khatdi Jebus mai chiujiu
Paliutu kamshat milo, chiusai paliuniu paliu radungtu kahumbo kumjiu kasabo hina kamraleng paliuniu naliutu katikhaijiu

“Naliuniu namdi khattu haphunra kamjiu bambo wan-ga, naliuniu wang madui bambo pawan thengmi bamtadi, namdigu charasibang duangkao tulo. Charasy raitiulo, chiudi pabang sira kam masatulo, pabang sira naliugu mikremaigu makge.
Kakibo bangra duangkao kiujiu namdi situ haphun lumakthen sichiu kambo sui-e.
“Wagaje dinboga, naliu Rawang,
Naliugu jupaodung nai ladjan maidungniu menglujiu kashaipum bambo bamgasu siga lungmana bambo namdidunggu kadiubose madad rabo-e.
Chiujiu kashaipum bamboga mana kachangbo namdakgu jupaodungniu wadaodi changam kamboga thinkhai matai makbo matom khat kadapad rabo-e.
Paliuniu matom situ kashaipum bambo mungga wadaodi sangmakbo Giukiga juwang rabo-e, khatdi wadaodi chalu tenmakbo khatdi tasingbang lingkhai makbo kadihga paliuniu pawangkining dangkhai rabo-e.
Levi maigu singkudung siga tadrabo-e, palamra tathu-chara padbose tacheng-tajaiga majijiu paliuniu chapkhai rabo-e. Naliu Rawang,
Sigase kashaibo phawtu daobo bamga mana kachangbo namdigu jupao hinase matom riga paliu ben ntik khaijiu dinrabo-e,
‘Haibo piutu aliuniu kamshat makge, khatdi saoniu kamshatlo chiubo aliuniu simakge.
, nangniu Egypt gasu ranpad khaibo namai Israel maitu kuak khailo. Pamao habo piu haitu kamshat mibogu parip phungmak raleng aliutu kuak khailo.’
Haichiujiu,
Naliu Rawang,
paliu ruanggasu aliu kawimaitu naliu naoleng kadalubo sui-e.
Patu naliu kyga majang wangsulo, siga papee karup milo, pah ntindi linmilo,
Pafai-panidi kalikhai milo. Paniu nakyga bamjiu chahiu khat papui-papiutu maningjiu achung bamrabo-e; sibo saiga naliuniu patu magiangbo sui-e.

Pasai kana, nangniu patu masen tamisai, patu pi khenrang thiujiu tadkhai mirabo-e. Palamra nangniu patu matanjiu nphiuji khaimibo-e, nangniu patu kavangtu kumjiu kammak rabo-e khatdi patu jon makrabo-e.
“Wagaje, maipiu khatniu panao nia thiuboga panai khangniase npiumai lungkanasai, chiudi lung karaibo nahpiuse paniu masenbo nao nah makge chiujiu,
paniu panahmai leng pagu chakhiu-chalan njanbo wan-ga, paniu kakungbo naoniu lungbo nahpiu situ kungbijiu panahpiu naraibogu damse pikhaijiu chamiu mareng lenmak rabo-e.
Panah naraibopiu haise paniu kakungbo pui nahpiu makbam tadi patu damnia thiujiu pirabo-e. Maipiu khatniu panah naraibopiutu lukhaijiu patu tacheng ganiu pikhai suibo hina pikhai rabo-e.
“Wagaje dinboga, maipiu khatniu panah npiumainah khat pakuon tanbo, n-gi athao tanbo bamme, papui-papiu siniu npiumainah situ sajai pibam tadi paniu panai kadin piumakge.
‘Papui-papiuniu patu paniu lungbambo namdigu jupao masuangga majang menglujiu patu ladjan thiura pi chapkhai rabo-e.
Panainiu paliu khuga haichiu dinrabo-e, ‘Anai nahpiu haise pakuon tan-e, n-gi athaosi-e khatdi anainiu kadinbo piumakge; paniu rangkang mathaga thinjiu khatdi jawsak maniu-e.

Sichiusai sibo namdiga bambo maidungniu patu tatu khoilujiu phenshatmi rabo-e, haichiujiu kambo gasu haikumbogu kasabo gasu duakpadlu rabo-e. Israel mai hinaniu haichiu padmibose chiurabo-e khatdi pingmi rabo-e.
“Mai khattu pamao jengniu kamshat lujiu papumse ntuang riga maseng khaibam sai,

sise nchun khai nbam sangmak rabo-e. Sibonai nbaimi rabo-e, palamra kashaipum hai ntuang riga maseng khaibambo siniu kadihga Tingwang gu tasiang phungwang-e. Papumse nphum milo, sichiusai naliu Rawang,
Chiudi papaoniu kadiu lam lungbam misai maksai nangniu chakhao papaotu silu maksai, siga chakhaose nakyga thinwang milo. Papaoniu pakhao phiuwangbo wan-ga, sise patu pikhai bilo.
Sikumgapjiu qonniam daodi, chafai-tani daodi, maksai kaki-kibo hinadi naliu Israel mai karai hamibo daosai haikumjiu kamkhai bilo.
“Israel mai karaigu qonniam maksai matom waga nkhuang khaimibo daosai, waleng chakmakbo thiutulo; chakhao situ paphi bam wiboga wanglan lura patu nkha khailo.
“Npuimainiu npiumaigu faini piumak rabo-e, khatdi npiumainiu npuimaigu faini piumak rabo-e; naliu Rawang,
“Thingna khatniu tasingbangga maksai kadihga pasip ponlujiu papui siniu pabumtu gombambo maksai papoitu majang ntaobambo naliuniu ngaolusai, naliuniu papui situ khoimak rabo-e.
Naliuniu papoinara khoibo sui-e, chiudi papui tura pi lentad mirabo-e, sichiusai naliu ringting thengjiu lungwijiu lungne.
“Naliuniu chaky kasanbo khat thiusuboga, maomakjiu chaky npomkhu khai magui rabo-e. Sichiujiu mai khatniu nkaikiujiu shaimidi naliuniu paripse phunglakge.
“Matomchi nai qonniamtu pijiu chalu tien thiu ncham tulo.
“Chakhaogiu nai takhompuilang aruang lujiu dakpadbo faini piutulo.
“Wagaje dinboga npiumai khatniu aliumai khattu panaoleng lulujiu pasai paniu patu masen tamine chiujiu maning mine.
Sichiuboga paniu patu suimakjiu kamaobo dinkhaijiu panai magiangbo wan gasu pahai liuchang thiumakbo-e chiujiu kasa madam khai-e.
“Haikumbo padsai, npuimai pui-piuniu magiangbo nai nchun ziham-faiga tazai khopbose khoilujiu npuimaise liuchang-e chiubo lenrabo-e, khatdi panainiu haise namdigu jupaodung khuga khoilen rabo-e.
Npuimai piuniu paliu khuga dinrabo-e, ‘Iniu anahpuitu haibo piutu magiangjiu pikhaibo-e, chiudi tuhoira paniu patu lunita mine.

Paniu patu magiangbo nai gasu liuchang thiumakbo-e chiu dinjiu paniu patu kamaobo madam khai-e. Chiudi haiganiu anahpui hai liuchang thiubose majibo lenpad bamme; magiangbo nai nchun ziham faiga tazai khop bambo haiga phuilo!
Sigasu namdakgu jupaodungniu pakinatu julujiu lekhaibi rabo-e.

Paliuniu patu majon rangkanggi kaikhat lurabo-e khatdi npuimai piutu pikhaibi rabo-e, palamra sibo piuniu Israel maizu kasa kampadle. Sironna makjiu, npuimaise panao thiujiu bamrabo-e khatdi paniu ringbam then panaotu talanbo suimakge.
“Chiudi madam khaibose majisai, khatdi npuimaise liuchang-e chiubo majijiu lenpadbo ha-e sai,

siga paliuniu npuimai situ papiu ky kamun gasu jupadrabo-e khatdi namdiga bammai dungniu tatu khoilujiu rotshat mirabo-e. Pahai chami thiumakbo suang papiu kyga bamkhabo lon npiumaitu nphiuji mibo jengniu aliu ruangga paniu mangambo kamkhai mide, haichiu kasa kambo gasu, naliu duaklu rabo-e.
“Npiumai khatniu mai kakimai naotu nphiuji bambo minlu-e sai panai khangnia situ kamshatmi rabo-e. Haichiu kambo gasu naliuniu haikumbogu kasabo gasu duaklu rabo-e.
“Wagaje dinboga chalad loilubo aliumai khattu, mai khatniu namdakga nphiuji bamniubo daosai;

naliuniu panaitu namdi lenlam puipad lujiu tatuniu rotshat mirabo-e. Npuimai siniu namdakga bamlujiu, pakhuan chiulu buiboga, nkhakhai raleng marapad makbo jengniu pah shairabo-e. Khatdi npiumai siniu mainaoleng npaoloi kamimaitu nphiujibo gasu pahai shairabo-e. Haichiu kambo gasu naliuniu haikumbogu kasabo gasu duaklu rabo-e.
“Wagaje dinboga npiumai khatniu charamlam tadmeng lujiu mainaoleng chalad loikhai kamibo npuimaitu manomjiu minsai, siga npiumai situ kamshatmi rabo-e;
npuimai situ wadi kammak rabo-e, palamra paniu shaibuibogu nuan wadi kam makbo-e. Haibo guse mai khangkhatniu kakibo mai khangkhattu asunjiu kamshat mibogu tathu-chara nai nchamme.
Namdi lenlam menglujiu npiumai khatniu mainaoleng chalad loikhai kamibo aliumaitu manom minsai, npuimai siniu nkha khaira marapadle, sichiudi siga patu nkha khaira mai khatnadi ha-e.
paniu npuimai man thiujiu rangkanggi ringiu pirabo-e, khatdi sibo puitu panao thiurabo-e, palamra paniu patu matanjiu nphiuji mibo-e. Paniu ringbam then panaotu tamak rabo-e.
“Npiumai papum kamshat kamimai, maksai pagu dan kamimai mai khatnadi
Chakhanah thiujiu lungwangbo mai maksai sikumbo mai pakai-pakik chaken kariu tangbo mai khattudi

Naliuniu Egypt gasu tad npadbo wan-ga paliuniu naliutu katiu-kasak wadi khekhai makge, khatdi paliuniu Beor nahpiu Balaam tu mathiu lujiu, Mesopotamia gu Pethor namdi gasu naliutu siangkhai raleng kamme.
Chiudi naliu Rawang,
Naliuniu jat khat thiubam thenna, wadaodi haibo jatdungtu nkha mane maksai paliutu pi lungwira kam khai tulo.
“Edom maitu wajeng simakbo kamtulo, paliu hai naliu kaikik-e. Khatdi Egypt maitu wajeng simakbo kamtulo; naliuniu pakak khat paliu dihga lungkhai mibo-e.
Chaken sum sai gasu paliu kaikiktu
Naliuniu charithiubo tingga rijibam kamlujiu bambo wan-ga, naliutu charachengga kam tania rabo situ naliuniu marisi rabo-e.
Npiumai khatniu nchun pamanglamsu pakajindui padmisai pahai masan tamirabo-e, paniu rijibam lenlam padbam mirabo-e.
Chawan ramliang wangsai paniu paronna nkhiumi rabo-e, chiujiu chawan naimik ngutmiboga paniu malan wangbo sui-e.
“Rijibam lenlam naliuniu pabam khat kamkhai bam rabo-e, naliuniu naliu chun kam marak khainibo wan siga tadbo sui-e.
Naliugu manialeng tasingpek khat thinlulo, sichiujiu naliuniu tamud lubo saiga wakhun khat chulujiu kamsin lanmilo.
Naliugu rijibamse charachengga masanjiu khaibamlo, palamra naliu Rawang,
“Kavang khatniu papao khugasu pakpad lujiu naliu khuga gukhai raleng wangsai, patu lang malan khai tulo.
Naliugu namdi ruangga paniu kadaluboga pahai lungbo sui-e, khatdi naliuniu patu wa kasa kam makrabo-e.
Haichiubo thakga rangkang phiu lujiu naliu Rawang,

Sangdiumaitu apukkhaibo wan-gara naliuniu pakhuga paton-pana lubo sui-e, chiudi Israel mai karai apukbibo gara paton-pana khengmak rabo-e. Haibogu tajai piulo sichiusai naliuniu wang lungrabo gase naliutu thoidam pikhai rabo-e.
khuga ladriat thiumakbo haira nuan makge,
Chiudi naliuniu naliu khenrang thiujiu ladriat kamsai, naliuniu sise kamsiak raleng chap lulo.
“Naliuniu mai khatgu mumsy reng npuiga tadwangbo tingga, naliuniu tiu kani then mumsyse raitiubo sui-e chiudi naliuniu pum khatnadi railujiu naliu ky lam phungwang makrabo-e.
Naliuniu mai khatgu alin-tara-reng lungga tad wangbo tingga, naliuniu tiusuibo hina tiusui-e, chiudi alin-tara khatnadi nkhoiniu gelujiu khoimak rabo-e.
Sigasu dinlanjiu paniu maipiu katammai nao thiulan mine,

khatdi paniudi patu masen tamine chiujiu chapkhai lanjiu paniudi tanao tabogu ariak raolujiu, patu pikhai rabo-e. Sichiujiu patu paky gasu tapad mibo-e. Maksai dinlanjiu pakina paniabo piuse shai mijiu,
sigasu, pakina karaibo piuniu patu lulankhe makge sai, paniu npuimai situ tania mide chiujiu lukhai rabo-e. Paniu patu lulansai, sise

“Npiumai khatniu panao kasan thiulujiu bambo wan-ga, patu charimai ngamga maksai kakibo chawanggu changamga lukhai makrabo-e; pahai takum khat changamga jaomak rabo-e, sichiujiu paniu pakyga bamjiu panaotu pachun kam mawi khaijiu bamrabo-e.
“Nangniu mai khattu wakhat mathiubibo wan-ga, wa kasabo padmakra chiujiu paniu thinkinbo kapense khoimak rabo-e. Siseniu pakikhunmai leng katiu pikhaijiu lungbambo-e.
Naliuniu Egypt gasu tadpadbo wan-ga Miriam khuga naliu Rawang,
Lenlam khuanjiu patu pi papumsiakniu nakhuga khoiwanglo.
Pase kalek samai sai, nchun khaisangmi tulo;
chawan machang sise patu kalan khaibi bilo, sichiusai paniu sise piujiu jikiu lune. Sichiusai pase pachun wirabo-e, khatdi naliu Rawang,
Naimachang paliuniu n-nien kamkhai kamibo phizengse naimik kiumakbo suangga pimilo; paniu rangkangse pageng bambo jengniu daobo tingga pariak chakmi rabo-e. Naliuniu patu pimaksai paniu
Naliuniu Egypt ga kavang thiukhai-e khatdi naliu Rawang,
Naliuniu takisy pawan khat raikhai misai, menglanjiu raibang khaibose railan tulo; kabangbose sangdiumai, kami magennah leng-e.
Naliuniu pawan khat mumsy, rai khaimi sai, mumken ga malan meng lanjiu railan tulo, masiadiak kamibose kami-magennah, khatdi sangdiumaitu pi railulo.
Naliuniu Egypt ga kavang thiukhai mibo jenggasu Iniu naliutu haibo chamtan pikhaibo-e chiubo wadaodi mangai tulo.
“Wagaje dinboga, Israel mai khangnia panai thu tiara ladjankyga tadbo lon, khangkhat situ maji-e khatdi khangkhat situ mao-e chiujiu tiapad rabo-e.

Kamao maitu sajai pijiu dapraleng tiakhai bisai, ladjanpaoniu sinatu pijiu kinmasuk khairabo-e khatdi chaqontu kajapbo riangniu patu japlo. Kajapbo riakse kamaobogu katam-tambo saisuijiu pariakse tam-tamjiu pirabo-e.
Pariakse kengthuboga atai tangbo sui-e, chiudi sisuang kengju misai patu kam mangamju mirabo-e.
Chiujiu panai majang lungboga npiu mainah lungkiu raithubo piuse shai mibopiu nah-e chiujiu lukhai rabo-e, chiusai pariang-paruise tapmakjiu Israel mai ruangga bamlune.

Chiudi shai mibopiu singna siniu maipui situ majang lungrao misai, maipui siniu namgu khangkiang mai khuga meng haichiu dinlo, ‘Akina singnaniu patien buibo kamkhai makge; paniu shai mibopiu kaikik Israel mai ruangga pipad khai raleng suimakge.
Chiusai namgu khangkiangmainiu sinatu kulujiu npaone. Sibo katangdi paniu sibo puitu panaoleng lukhai maksai,

khangkiangmai masuang ganiu pasingna shaimibo piu nao siniu mathiu masuangga chaplujiu paphitop khat lupad lujiu pazuga patai masiu khaijiu haichiu dinrabo-e. “Maipiu pasingna kaikik lungkiura suimakbo piu riga haichiu kamkhai-e.”
Israel mai ruangga sibo kimai tura ‘paphitop siakpad mibo kimai,’ chiujiu mathiuniu sirabo-e.
“Maipiu khangnia n-gijiu nthibamboga khangkhat piu naoniu pakinatu nkhajiu khangkhat piu beki kanomjiu chakid sai,
patu lungsami mane, paben danthon milo.
Taju kuang thinsai pathao siakboga chamchangjiu thinlo, chiusai
Maitu sontiu mai tura
Paliura Tingwang tu pingjiu lung makge, sijengniu naliuniu tadjiu malai chiamibo lon sailamniu tadngut kana maitu kamshat kammide.
Sijeng gasu
“Naliu Rawang,
naliu mai hina miusy atiat raithubo guse takamga khailujiu ponmeng kahumbo bam khatga khairabo-e.
Singku thiubambo piu khuga menglujiu haichiu dinlo, ‘Aliu Rawang,
“Singku piuniu nakhuga takamse ponlujiu
Chiujiu
Egypt mainiu aliutu kavang kumjiu kam mathad khaijiu magenthiu chariubo ngam pikam khai-e.
Siga aliutu nkha khaira kapjiu aliu pao-peh
Pagu kadibo pumtan nai jengtanniu aliutu Egypt dih gasu ranpad khai-e. Paniu maisuang habo khatdi tasibo, khatdi mai kapingbogu kamkhaide.
Paniu aliutu haiga majangwang khaide khatdi haibo lungwibo nai patam wibo dih aliutu pikhaide.
Sijeng gasu tuhoi
“Chiujiu takamse
Tingwang niu naleng khatdi nakikhun leng kawibo mania pikhaibibo jengniu thuonkiu silo; khatdi Levi mai khatdi sangdiumai naliu khuga lungbam maitudi changiboga jaokhaijiu paliu chun piwi khailo.

khuga dinlo, ‘Masanbogu kariu dam khatse akylungga wakhatnadi masiak khai makge; nangniu akhuga dinbo kumjiu Levi mai, sangdiumai khatdi kami-magennahtu Iniu sise pikhai mibo-e. Kariu dam khat pibo lamga nangniu atu majaira chamtan pikhaibo hina khatdi Iniu mangaimibo khatdi majai kamakbo ha-e.

Iniu achungjiu bambo wan-ga Iniu sise wakhat nadi tiumakge; Iniu characheng masan kamakbo lon Iniu kalung ganiu khatnadi khoipad kamibo ha-e; khatdi Iniu kashai maileng sigasu khoilujiu kadkhai mibo ha-e. Iniu nacham majai-e, Oh,

Masanbo nabam tinggen ganiu phuikiu khailo khatdi namai Israel mai riga thoidam pikhailo; nangniu aliu pao-pehmai khuga ladriat thiu khaimibo kumjiu aliutu pikhaibo lungwibo nai patam wibo dih haitudi thoidam pikhailo.’
“Thainai naliu Rawang,
Thainai
Paniu ladriat thiukhaibo kumjiu, thainai

Paniu damkhai mibo jat hina suangga naliutu pi di-nkiubo jat khat pithiu khaibo-e, chiujiu naliuniu pazantu thuonjiu chakhuang thiurabo-e. Paniu ladriat thiukhai mibo kumjiu naliu hai pamai thiu mibo-e.”
Sichiujiu Mose niu Israel maigu jupaodungtu kumadui lujiu maidung khuga din-e, “Thainai Iniu naliutu katikhaibo hina majailulo.
Naliuniu Jordan Giuki kenpad lujiu naliu Rawang,
siga haibo tacheng tajai hina khatdi katikhaibo hina raokhai lulo.
khatdi naliuniu Jordan Giuki hugen khatlam kenpad luboga, Iniu thainai naliutu katikhaibo kumjiu Ebal Luongga tatukang rammaisitu tatu tamniu tun madio lulo.
Sibo bamga chagi mania thinjao makjiu tatu maliangniu rathakbam khat thiusu khailo.
Palamra naliu Rawang,
khatdi siga naliuniu chara thiukhai rabo-e khatdi akadbogu pipadbo thiujiu naliu Rawang,
Tatudungse Tingwang gu tacheng-tajai hina masan siakjiu tatu tamniu taimadio lujiu raokhailo.”
Sibosai Mose niu Levi gu singku maidungtu kumadui lujiu Israel maidung mathiu khuga din-e, “Israel maidung yo, naliu lungchun ngutjiu alad hai nkinglo, thainai naliu hai Rawang,
sijengniu thainai Iniu pibo tacheng-tajai hina maomakjiu majailulo khatdi pacham piululo,”
Sichiujiu Mose niu Israel mai khuga din-e,
“Naliuniu Jordan kenpadsai, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar, Joseph, khatdi Benjamin kiphiu mainiu Gerizim Luongga chaplujiu maidung riga thoidam pikhai rabo-e.
Khatdi Reuben, Gad, Asher, Zebulun, Dan khatdi Naphtali kiphiu mainiu Ebal Luongga chaplujiu maidung riga tasiang pikhai rabo-e.
Levi maidungniu haibo chamkengdung chakhuan tanjiu senpad rabo-e:
“Mai hinaniu kenkak rabo-e, ‘Amen!’
“Mai hinaniu kenkak rabo-e, ‘Amen!’
“Mai hinaniu kenkak rabo-e, ‘Amen!’
“Mai hinaniu kenkak rabo-e, ‘Amen!’
“Mai hinaniu kenkak rabo-e, ‘Amen!’
“Mai hinaniu kenkak rabo-e, ‘Amen!’
“Mai hinaniu kenkak rabo-e, ‘Amen!’
“Mai hinaniu kenkak rabo-e, ‘Amen!’
“Mai hinaniu kenkak rabo-e, ‘Amen!’
“ ‘Mahin chamaitu gimai riga, Tingwang gu tasiang bamme.
“Mai hinaniu kenkak rabo-e, ‘Amen!’
“ ‘Mai khatniu pamao kahamaitu giraleng rangkang khoimai riga Tingwang gu tasiang bamme.
“Mai hinaniu kenkak rabo-e, ‘Amen!’
“ ‘Mai khatniu Tingwang gu tacheng-tajai nai katikhaibo situ piumakmai riga, Tingwang gu tasiang bamme.
“Mai hinaniu kenkak rabo-e, ‘Amen!’
Naliu Rawang,
“Naliu namga khatdi naliu luga
“Naliuniu kambo hinaga
“Naliugu mikre maidungniu chari thiubo wan-ga,
“Naliu Rawang,
Sichiujiu kadihga lungmai jat hinaniu
Naliu pao-pehmai khuga naliuleng pikhaira

Paniu takum pawan saisuijiu tingpukga khaimadui bambo tingriu langkhaine, khatdi naliugu ngamkam hinaga thoidam khaine, sichiujiu naliuniu jat kakengtu apukkhai lubui-e, chiudi naliuniu maikhuga apuk lakge.
Naliu Rawang,
Chiudi wadao khatnadi haidungse piumakbo thiu mimane maksai chara kakibotu kahum mimane.
“Chiudi naliu Rawang,
“Naliu kasabo kamjiu naliu
Naliuniu ngut lungrabo dihga naliu khangkhat tangbo bamthenna paniu chariubo khat saiga khat chiujiu naliu riga langwang khairabo-e.

niu naliu riga maitu kalenbora, kamenbora, khatdi kakhunra pikhai rabo-e. Paniu naliugu miusy tiumakra tingcheng nai tingkai katanbo langkhaine. Naliuniu shaimak then haibogu sansabose naliu khuga padrabo-e.
Tingdui kiuta mirabo-e, sichiujiu kadih sangjiu chagi kummi rabo-e.
Tingdui kiurabo sung, nbuinianggu tingthung nai turagu tingthung hainiu naliutu kam maha kam makthen
Naliu shaibo wan-ga, thingna khatdi thiuhu ram mainiu wangjiu naliu phawtu tiune,khatdi siga mai khat niudi paliutu hathon khaira bamlakge.

niu Egypt maitu kamkhai mibo kumjiu paniu naliu riga athiu padbo pikhaine. Naliu pum gen ga pajam rammai thiupadra paniu kam khaine. Naliu pum pakhiangna kathiubo naginiu tomsin mirabo-e, siga naliu masak rabo-e, sichiujiu wadi wilan silakge.
niu naliu chun kam mahami rabo-e; paniu naliu mik ngaota mira khatdi wa makum sita miradi kamkhai rabo-e.

Naliuniu pamik tiat mai kumjiu n-nien tingga kamedjiu tadrabo-e, siga naliuniu naliu npui phiudao lulakge. Naliuniu kambo hina pathaoga kamkhai silak mirabo-e. Naliutu kam chariu surabo-e khatdi naliugu sunglu rabo-e, chiudi siga naliutu mai khat nadi nkha khaira hami rabo-e.

“Naliuniu aliumai khattu magiangra npao tapkhai sune, chiudi mai kakimainiu majang lungmi rabo-e. Naliuniu chaky thiusune chiudi siga wadaodi lunglu lakge. Naliuniu mumsiken lingkhai sune, chiudi parasyse tiulakge.

Naliu masuang ganiu naliugu khaorui bishat sune, chiudi naliuniu pazanse tiulakge. Naliuniu ngaobambo gasu naliugu qonniamdungtu gao tadmi sune, khatdi sise naliu khuga piwanglan lakge. Naliugu mily dungtu naliugu mikremai ben-ga pikhai mirabo-e, siga mai khatniudi naliutu nkha khaira harabo-e.
Naliu masuangsiak gasu naliu nahpiudung nai naliu nahpuidungtu sangdiumai khuga kavang thiujiu pikhai mirabo-e. Naimachangna naliuniu mathaga naliu nahmaidung malan wanglan ratu phuijiu bam rabo-e.
Naliuniu changam maranjiu kampad khaibo miusy pakhiangna naliuniu wadi daomakjiu chiudi naliu chariu siakbo wan-ga sangdiumai jatniu khoilu rabo-e.
Naliugu chariu siniu naliu chun kam mahami rabo-e.
niu naliu phi hai wilan silakbo kathiubo jamniu pithiu khai rabo-e; athiu padbose naliu phi gasu naliu pee tangbo pi thiukhai rabo-e.
niu naliutu hamara khaibo dihga lungmainiu naliu raha siluboga paliu suang harabo-e; paliuniu naliutu thin tanui thiujiu, naliutu thin kaga rabo-e.
“Naliuniu chalin kengkha marakhaijiu tenkhai bidi miusy poinakha ronna daorabo-e, palamra takaoniu miusy tiu kammi rabo-e.
Naliuniu mumsiken lingkhai rabo-e khatdi sise mathan rabo-e, chiudi naliuniu mumsy rai madui silulakge, maksai jaw sak khaira ngaolu lakge, palamra takhompuiniu paken situ tiukam mirabo-e.
Naliu dihga takisibang kengjiu lungrabo-e, chiudi naliuniu takisa daolu lakge, palamra pasadui jaothon mirabo-e.
Naliu nahpuidung nai nahpiudung kengbam rabo-e, chiudi naliu khuganiu hamirabo-e, palamra paliutu chari ganiu minlujiu kavang thiura majangtad kammi rabo-e.
Naliugu singbang hina khatdi mumsiken hinatu takhompuiniu tiukam mirabo-e.
“Naliuniu hamid-mid kiubo wan-ga, naliu dihga lungjiu bambo sangdiumai dungniu pumtan thin mid-midkhang mirabo-e.
Paliuniu naliutu rangkang apuk biraleng bamrabo-e, chiudi naliura paliutu apuk bira wadi harabo-e. Kanamboga paliuniu naliugu jupao thiumi rabo-e.
“Haibo sansabo pakhiangna naliu riga wangne, khatdi haise naliutu kam maha mimak thenna naliu khuga padrabo-e, palamra naliu Rawang,
Haisiniu naliu riga khatdi naliu kaikik mai riga Tingwang gu ladjan wangbo-e chiubo tingtheng simi rabo-e.
niu naliu tienkam hinaga thoidam pikhaide, chiudi naliuniu chunwi ringajiu patu macha makge.
Sijengniu
Naliutu kam mathad rajengniu kadih pake hina lungmai naliuniu paliu lad simak maitu pijiu naliutu atungra
Paliura lungsa simakge, katingmai maksai nahmai chiujiu mai khattudi lungsa sonbo ha-e.

Paliuniu naliugu khaorui khaoring, khatdi miusy hina tiulu rabo-e, sichiujiu naliu kami mijiu shairabo-e. Naliu tiura miusy, jaw, takisa, matom-kabui maksai mily wakhatdi masiak lakge, sichiujiu naliu shairabo-e.
Tingwang niu naliutu pikhaibo namdak hinatu paliuniu asunrabo-e, khatdi naliuniu malumjiu bambo kakubo charirengdung hina kaokiu mirabo-e.
“Naliugu mikremainiu naliugu namdak rammai taoweng lubo wan-ga naliuniu katiu tiuraleng hami rabo-e, sichiujiu

Papui manakiu gasu palung kadimai, withumai katangdi katiu phiulakjiu panahmaitu katang langtiu rabo-e. Palamra pakhuga katiu kasak hamide. Pasingna mai paniu kungbo panao panah ringbam khamai tudi khemak rabo-e.

Papui manakiu gasu palung kadibo maipui withumai katangdi, lung amanjiu tad mariu kin kamakbo pui katangdi haichiu kammine. Mikremainiu namdak taoweng mibo wan-ga, katiu-kasak phiulak misai mai hina paronna panah pamnatu katang langtiu rabo-e. Paniu kungbo pakina maksai panah maitudi mahinjiu, njantiu lakge.
“Haibo ariakkhuangga raokhai bambo Tingwang niu katikhaibo cham hina maomakjiu majai lumaksai khatdi maisuang habo
paniu naliu riga khatdi naliu kaikik riga wingam lakbo rapot khatdi wadaodi mathak lanlakbo kapingbo raren pikhai rabo-e.
Naliuniu Egypt dihga daokhai mibo chararen kasabose paniu naliu riga piwang khailan rabo-e. Khatdi naliuniu wadaodi wilan lakge.
Tingwang gu tacheng-tajaiga khatdi katikhaibo ariakkhuangga raokhai makbo kathiu kaniubo radung khatdi chararen hinadi paniu langkhai rabo-e. Sichiujiu naliutu kam mahami rabo-e.
Naliuniu lung kingjiu tingpukga bambo sikam lakbo chagandung kum bamdi chamai poinakha ronna ringlune, palamra naliu Rawang,
niu naliutu lungwira khatdi lungkingra masenjiu kamkhaibo kumgapjiu, paniu naliutu kam nchum mira khatdi kam mahamira machunsu rabo-e. Naliuniu ngut lungkhai rabo dih gasu naliu men pethonmi rabo-e.
Naliuniu pabam khatna gadi agi-manaibo daolakge, naliu gu-e chiubo wagadi phiudao lakge.
Naliu ringting hai pawan machang manangjiu lungne. N-nienting tadi nchunting tadi kapingboniu phuine, khatdi naliuniu kashaibotu pingjiu lungne.
Naliuniu ngaokhaibo hina naliu lungga kapingboniu phuine. Nsuan susai chawantu agunne, chawan susai nsuantu agun daine.

niu naliutu Egypt dihga lang malankhai lakge chiujiu dinkhai bamdi naliutu aliam ganiu langkhai lanne. Siga naliu ronna mikremai khuga naliutu kavang thiura jonne chiudi mai khat niudi naliutu liuni lakge.
Haise ladriat thiubogu pathiak si-e, chiubora Israel maidungtu Moab dihga chamtan piraleng
Mose niu Israel mai hinatu kuwang madui lujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu pumsiakniu Egypt mai wangtu, pagu chakampaodung khatdi pagu kadihga bambo pakhiang natu
Naliuniu kapingbo, chararen, tasibo tien, khatdi maisuang habo kadibo tien
Chiudi thainai tingmik tangbo naliuniu ngaolubose naliuniu sitanglura paniu pikhai makge.
Takum atai
Naliuniu taruak, maksai jaw maksai jaw ari sakradi hamakge, chiujiu paniu naliuleng pageng bambo pikhaibo lamra pahai naliu Rawang-e chiubo naliutu kamlen khaibo-e.
Khatdi aliuniu haibo dihga wangbo wan-ga, Heshbon wangpiu Sihon khatdi Bashan wangpiu Og niu aliutu atungjiu chari aphenra padsude. Chiudi paliutu aliuniu kamkao lude,
paliu dih lulude, sichiujiu kadihse Reuben nai Gad kiphiudung ruangga, khatdi Manasseh kiphiu paphan lengdi njankhai bide.
Haibo chamriat hinase chamchangjiu majai lulo, sichiusai naliuniu kambo hinaga maomakjiu tathui lune.
“Thainai naliu Rawang,
khatdi nahmaidung, khatdi sangdiumaidung naliutu lung aruangjiu naliuleng tasing renwang maidung khatdi tadui thuakwang maidung chiujiu bambo-e.
Naliuniu thainai haiga bambo haira naliu Rawang,
sichiujiu
Haibogu ladriat haise
Thainai paniu bambo bam haiga chapbambo aliu mathiu khatdi aliu kaikik lungwang makha mailengdi-e.
“Naliuniu Egypt dihga dechiujiu lungkhai milo khatdi kakibo jatdung dihga dechiujiu rontad khai milo chiubo maningtao khailo.
Naliuniu paliugu matai marengbo ramengdung, tasingniu kasiambo, tatuniu kasiambo, rangkangginiu kasiambo, khatdi kachianiu kasiambo hina ngaolude.
Thainai haiga chapbambo maipui, maipiu, kikhun maksai kiphiu chiujiu mai khatnadi naliu Rawang,

Thainai haiga bamjiu kheng matanjiu khengbogu chiulu mai khangkhat kumboniu pakuon tanjiu paniu maningbo npuiga tadmi bamtadi pahai wijiu lunglune chiubo patu paronna maningmi mane. Sichiu misai, naliu mai hina, kawimai tudi kasamai tudi nchamjiu kam mahami rabo-e.
Haikum maitu
niu haikumbo maitu thinjiu Israel mai kiphiudung masuangga kamlen khairabo-e, khatdi
“Pasai lungwang rabo naliu kaikik khatdi kadiubo kadihga lungbo sangdiumainiu naliu dihga
Chalu rammaidi kathaidih thiumine, khatdi chagan-mipiu nai matainiu lungsim mirabo-e. Singbang khatnadi lingkhai silak mine, piumendi lungpadlak mine.
Siga kadihpiri pakhiangnaniu maniu sune, ‘Dekamjiu paliu dihtu
Khatdi kenkak khairabo sira, ‘
Paliuniu wadaodi kahum matai makbo radung,
Sijeng gasu
niu palung pomchang pommide, khatdi palung pomju mibo gasu paniu paliu dih gasu paliu men pelujiu sangdiumai dihga paliutu taliang khai mibo-e, sibo lunlungga thainai paliu hai bamme.’
“Aliu Rawang,
“Tuhoira naliuniu thoidam nai tasiang khaiboga kadara Iniu naliutu pikhai-e. Haidungse naliu khu padbo wan-ga, naliu Rawang,
Iniu thainai naliutu pikhaibo pagu chamtan hina naliu lungsiakniu majaijiu naliu nai naliu kaikikniu
siga naliu Rawang,
Naliutu kadih pake diuthuboga hamara maren khaimi bamtadi, naliu Rawang,

Sichiujiu naliu pao-pehniu pawan khatga lungkhai mibo ramse naliugu thiulan lubui-e. Sichiujiu naliu pao-peh suangdi nkiujiu chamai riak kengkhangra khatdi kalek wi-nkiujiu lungra paniu naliutu kamkhai bine,
Naliu Rawang,
Haibo siang hinase naliutu marengjiu naliutu kam masa bammai khatdi naliugu mikremai riga paniu pikhai sune.
Khatdi Iniu thainai naliutu pikhaibo pagu chamtan hina naliuniu majaijiu palad piulan mirabo-e.
Naliuniu kambo hinaga

chiudi naliuniu pacham majai rabo-e khatdi haibo ariakkhuangga raokhai bambo paniu katikhaibo pagu tacheng-tajai hina piurabo-e. Naliu lungchun pakhiangna khaijiu pakhulam naliuniu mari wanglan rabo-e.
“Iniu thainai naliu khuga chamtan pibo hai kungju makge, maksai naliu sitang lulakbo gudi makge.
Haise tingpuk khangtangbo gudi makge. Naliuniu haichiu maniu bamra pageng ha-e, ‘Saoniu khanglujiu aliuleng phungkiu ralo, sichiujiu aliuniu chiulujiu kadinpiu ngamlu ralo?’
Maksai haise duinai genlamdi bammibo makge. Naliuniu haichiu maniura pageng ha-e, ‘Duinai hugenlam kenpad lujiu saoniu aliuleng phungwangjiu aliu pi chiukhai ngam luralo khatdi kadinpiu ngamlu ralo?’
Sichiu makge, haise naliu khuga bambo-e. Naliuniu sibamme, khatdi khoipad ngamme, sichiujiu tuhoi kadinpiu lubui-e.
“Naliuniu kawibo maksai kasabo, karingbo maksai kashaibo haisitu kadara Iniu thainai naliutu pikhai-e.
Thainai Iniu naliutu pikhaibo naliu Rawang,
Chiudi naliuniu pacham majai makjiu khatdi nking khaimakjiu maritad lujiu, kakibo ratu kahum misai,
naliutu kam mahami rabo-e --Iniu tuhoi khatdi haiga naliutu kachan khaibo-e. Naliuniu Jordan kenpad lujiu lungraleng kam bambo dih gase naliu lung matheng lulakge.

Iniu tuhoi naliutu karingbo maksai kashaibo, Tingwang gu tasiang maksai Tingwang gu thoidam haise kadaraleng pikhaibo-e, khatdi naliuniu kada lubogu lamchap thiura tinggen nai kadihtu Iniu ku-e. Karingbotu kadalulo.
Naliu Rawang,
Mose niu Israel mai khuga
dinkhai lan-e, “Tuhoira agu takum kai-je-makai tangmide siniu, I naliugu jupao thiu matheng ngam lulak mide. Khatdi haironna makjiu I hai Jordan tadken makrabo-e chiujiu
Naliu Rawang,
niu sibo maidungtu, paniu Amor maigu chawang Og nai Sihon tu kam kaokiu khaijiu paliugu kadih kam mahamibo kumgapjiu, kamkhai rabo-e.
Paliutu chari ngamlu raleng
Malum siakjiu chap lulo. Naliu Rawang,
Sigasu Mose niu Joshua tu maidungniu bambo gasu kulujiu din-e, “Malumsiakjiu chap lulo;
papumsiakniu natu jukhairabo-e khatdi majangbam rabo-e. Paniu nakhuga kamtang makbo khatdi phudkhai lakge, siniu chalung nkhinmi mane maksai pingmi mane.”
Sichiujiu Mose niu Tingwang gu tacheng-tajai raolujiu Israel maigu jupaodung khatdi
Paniu paliutu chamtan pi-e, “Takum chinnia kaloibo machang-naga, chapaw mahakhaibo gu pawan kawangboga, nakhuan tanjiu Kapuang Ngee ga kenkhailo.
Israel maidung hinaniu pabam khatga naliu Rawang,
Naliugu namdiga kalungmai hina maipui, maipiu, mainah khatdi sangdiumai mathiutu ku aruanglo, sichiusai mai hina nking lujiu naliu Rawang,
Haichiu kambo gasu wadaodi chiutao makbo nakai nakik hinaniu naliu Rawang,
Haichiujiu
khatdi Mathenky gu kamun mungga chapbambo kamuang tiang gasu

Sichiubo ting wangbo wan-ga, Iniu paliutu alung pomrabo-e; siga Iniu paliutu phutmi rabo-e, sichiujiu paliutu kam mahami rabo-e. Paliu riga wa kapingbo, chariubo kengjiu wangrabo-e, sichiusai paliu Rawang Iniu paliutu majangbam tamibo gasu haise paliu khuga padbambo-e chiubo paliuniu maningtao rabo-e.
Sigase Iniu paliutu nkhakhai lak mine, palamra paliuniu kasa kamjiu kakibo ratu kahum mine.
“Tuhoira, haibo luise raolulo. Haise Israel maitu katikhailo, sichiusai haisiniu matipjiu paliutu atungjiu chapbam mirabo-e.

Paliu pao-pehmai khuga ladriat khai mibo kumjiu kadih kawibo kalek wibo dih gase Iniu paliutu maluang ngut khairabo-e. Siga paliuniu tiunibo tatek hina daolune, khatdi paliuniu amanjiu lungrabo-e. Chiudi paliuniu mariwang kakibo ratu kahum mirabo-e. Paliuniu atu luthonmi rabo-e khatdi agu chamriat kampang mirabo-e.

Siga nping-charenbo kengkha paliu riga wangsune. Chiudi haibo luise thiubam rabo-e, khatdi haisiniu matipjiu paliutu atungjiu chapbam rabo-e. Tuhoi katang, Iniu paliutu pira ladriat khaimibo dihga majang wangtang makbo masuang gadi, paliu lungchunniu maning bambose Iniu si-e.”
Sibo nai siak Mose niu chaluise raolude khatdi Israel maidungtu katikhai bide.
Mose niu wakhatnadi lupad makjiu mathingjiu Tingwang gu tacheng-tajaise ariak khatga raokhaide.
Paniu raoluboga,
Paliu hai dejiuga chaqon tanlo khatdi kadin piumaklo chiubo Iniu si-e. Iniu ringbambo tinggadi paliuniu
Amasuangga chakampaodung nai chaphiugu jupaodung hinatu kuwang maduilo, chiusai Iniu haibo chamdung dinlen khaibine; tinggen nai kadih niudi agu lamchap thiujiu paliutu atungra Iniu kukhaibo-e.

I shai mibo sai gara maidung sawang mirabo-e khatdi Iniu paliutu katikhai mibo situ thonmi rabo-e chiubo Iniu si-e. Siga paliuniu chariubo daorabo wanse wangsu rabo-e, palamra paniu kamtulo chiubose paliuniu kambo gasu
Sichiujiu Israel mai hina nking bambo wan-ga Mose niu chalui haise pakhiangna thiukiu khaide.
“Ting-kadih yo, alad chiukhailo,
Iniu dinbotu nking mawi lulo.
Iniu katikhaibose tingriu kumjiu kiune
chiujiu kadihriga kajikdui kumjiu bamkhaine.
Acham haira piubuan bangga tingsa fai-fai kiubo kum,
piuriang riga tingsa niam-niam khaibo kumbo-e.
Iniu
khatdi pamaidungniu pagu kendibotu din madune.
tathuibo khatdi pagu npui hinase majibo-e;
Naliu Rawang hai chamchangbo khatdi majibo-e;
majibo nai kawibotu paniu kambo-e.
Chiudi naliura chamchang makge,
pamai thiuraleng buimakbo, nuanniu phuibo
khatdi sontiubo jat khatle.
Naliu pachun thiumak mai, naliu kamengmai,
Pahai napiu-e, natu Kadampao-e,
paniu naliutu pi jat khat thiukhai bibo-e.
“Nda pad mibotu maningtao khailo;
degu padmilo chiubo naliu pui-piu khuga maniulo,
tad mibo lamga dinkhaira katingmai khuga maniulo.
