maidungniu dega lungralo chiubo paniu chapkhai-e,
Paniu jat hinatu chara khat-khat pikhai-e,
chiudi Jacob kaikik situ paniu paleng kadalubo-e.
“Tingkai-hunbo ramjeng, mainiu lungmakbo ram,
kathaidihga ronmeng kinboga paniu daolude.
Paniu patu paronna gulubo kumjiu,
paniu paliutu gukhai-e khatdi akhikhai bi-e.
Lengrengniu papoitu len alira katikhaibo kum,
pakan kaphing padjiu paliutu nkaikiu makra gaimanbo kum,
Israel mai kaomi rabo gasu
Sangdiumaigu chara niu nkhabo jaomakjiu
“Ramluong kakuga mawangra paniu paliutu suikhai-e,
sichiujiu luzamga padbose paliuniu tiu-e.
Tutuong gasu paliuniu makhuidui daolu-e;
paliugu takisibang turaliga lunglu-e.
Paliugu matom-kabui khatdi kaminiu ndui kengjiu pikhai-e;
paliuleng withubo matom kabui, mily, kami
khatdi withubo chabanmiu nai sak withubo jawse kengjiu bamme.
kadin piuta mide; paliu-mai wimide.
Tiu kawibo tiutek siniu paliu ning mali mide.
Paliutu Kadampao Rawang tu paliu phutmide,
khatdi paliugu kangambo ranpaotu thonmide.
Paliuniu charameng kahumjiu
paliuniu kasa kamjiu palung kampom mide.
paliu pao-peh mainiu wadaodi simatai makbo kasanbo radung,
Israel mainiu wadaodi simakbo radung khuga charathiu khai mide.
Paliuniu paliu Rawang, paliugu kangambo ranpao,
paliutu karingbo pikhaibo patu mangai mide.
“Haise
Siniu paliu nahpuidung nai paliu nahpiudungtu thon mide.
Paniu din-e, ‘Iniu paliutu nkhakhai tamine;’
chamchang makbo mai, pakuon katanmai,
paliu khuga degu padsu ralo chiubo Iniu phuirabo-e.
chara-siak makbo chiudi chara kubo, paliu ra siniu alung kampom mide.
Sijengniu jat khattu Iniu thinlujiu paliu lung kampom khaine;
kapangbo jat situ Iniu thinlujiu paliu lung kampom khaine.
Agu lungpom, chamipuang kumbo hai taopadjiu
kadihriga bambo hinatu ruthonmi rabo-e.
kadih hanglam
“‘Iniu paliu riga pamalan thiumakbo magenthiubose pikhaine
khatdi agu tavaithu thin sujiu paliutu atung rabo-e.
Paliu mariubo nai kakhunbo gasu shai rabo-e;
mai kapingbo chararen gasu paliu shai rabo-e,
Pakhui kasabo kaniu siniu paliutu machaora
khatdi thiuhudungniu paliutu asunra Iniu langkhaine.
Chari thiujiu npui-nchengga shaine;
kikhun-ga kapingbo piphui khaine.
Akhangmaidi, aliumaidi shairabo-e;
npamnadung nai katingmaidung tudi masiak lakge.
Iniu paliutu kam mahaduak mirabo-e,
chiusai mai khatniudi paliutu maningtao lanlak mide.
Chiudi Iniu paliugu mikremaidungtu pi chaliang khaini makge,
paliutu pijiu amaidungtu ngam khaini makge.
I apumsiakniu paliutu niakpet khai mibo-e.’
“Israel mai haise pachun thiumakbo jat khatle;
paliu khuga ningting wadi ha-e.
Nde jengniu paliutu kamkao mibo gulo
chiubo paliuniu phuipad silu makge;
nde padbamlo chiubo paliuniu sitanglu makge.
Nde chiujiu chamai sang khattu mai khatniu,
khatdi chamai sang kariutu mai khangnianiu ngamlubo gulo?
paliugu ngamkambo Rawang niu paliutu thon mide.
Israel mai Rawang gu kangambo kum makjiu,
paliu radung hai sonne chiubo paliugu mikremai sira si-e.
Paliugu mikremaise, Sodom nai Gomorrah kumjiu sa-e,
mumken khatga kakhabo nai pakhui bambo mumsy masibo kum,
kaniutai gasu jaw kampadbo kumme.
“Paliugu mikremainiu kamkhai mibose
paliutu sajai pira pawan kabuibotu paniu khuanjiu bamme.
khatdi chakhum ruikhai rabo-e;
paliu kaokiu mirabo wan wangrabo-e;
paliu nchum mirabo tingmik nawang mide.
Paliuniu wathak thiura hamibo paniu ngaolubo ga,
patu machabo maitu paniu chalungsa khai rabo-e.
Sibo wan-ga
‘Naliuniu malumbo kangambo radungse ndega bamlo?
Naliuniu pamai wibo khao khoilu paliu khuga chara thiu khai-e
khatdi sakra paliu khuga jaw liakkhai-e;
Tuhoi paliutu pi wangjiu naliutu nkha khailo;
paliutu pi pakwang naliutu gukhai lulo.
“ ‘I, aronna Charawang-e, kakibo chara sira kachangbo makge.
Iniu kamshat, khatdi Iniu ringting pikhai-e;
Iniu kam ajam khai-e khatdi Iniu piwikhai-e,
Iniu kambotu mai khatniudi kham ngamlu lakge.
I hai ringjiu bambo Rawang si-e,
Iniu aben khengsude khatdi Iniu siangbo-e.
Kalikjiu bambo ahengse pamun thiulujiu
majibose kam khaira Iniu phuine.
Iniu agu mikremaidungtu chakhum ruirabo-e
khatdi atu mareng maidungtu Iniu sajai pirabo-e.
Agu tavaithu siniu paliu zaise ketpad rabo-e,
khatdi ahengniu atu angadmai hinatu bishat rabo-e.
atu atungjiu aphen mai khattudi masiak khai lakge;
bangkhai bammai khatdi ajammai katangdi shairabo-e.
paliutu kamshat mai hinatu paniu sajai pi-e.
Paniu pagu mikremai riga chakhum rui-e,
sichiujiu pamaidunggu nuan kuak khai-e.”
Israel maidungniu haise chiulu raleng Mose nai Nun nahpiu Joshua niu haibo lui thiu khaide.
Tingwang niu katikhaibo Mose niu maidung khuga pikhai loilubo saiga.

paniu din-e, “Iniu thainai naliutu pikhaibo chamtan hinase naliuniu piurabo-e chiubo chapsiak lulo. Haidungse naliu nahmaidung khuga dinlenbi-bilo, chiusai paliuniu Tingwang gu katikhaibo hinase chamchangjiu majailu sune.
Haibo katikhaise charuang-chapa cham makge; naliu ringsiak rabo chamme. Haidungse majailulo sichiusai naliuniu Jordan kenpadjiu lunggomlu rabo ramga naliu pating thengjiu lunglu rabo-e.”
“Moab kadih Jerikho namdi masuangga bambo Abarim Luongga khanglo; Nebo Luongga khanglo, khatdi Iniu Israel maitu pikhainejiu bambo Canaan kadih situ phuikhai lulo.
Hor Luongga nasingna Aaron shaikhai mibo kumjiu nangdi sibo luongga shai khaimi rabo-e,

palamra Israel maidung masuangga nanai khangniase akhuga chamchang makge. Zin gu ramjingga bambo Kadesh namdi mungga bambo, Meribah gu duiga naliuniu bambo lon, maidung suangga nanainiu atu chakhuang thiumakge.
Nangniu kadiulam suniu sibo dihtu phuimeng ngaolubui-e, chiudi Iniu Israel maidungtu pikhai rabo dihga nang ngutlu lakge.”
Tingwang mai, Mose niu haibo thoidamse Israel maidung riga pah shaisu rabo masuangga pikhai diakbo-e.
pahai Edom ga naimik thaokiubo kum
Paran Luong gasu pamaidungtu thaoben khai-e.
Paben majadlam chamipuang khat thinlu,
maza sang kariuniu patu majang bamme.
khatdi pagu thiubambo maidungtu gukhaibi-e.
siniu paphi hangga aliu makhum kiu-e
khatdi pagu chamtandung majai-e.
Mose niu aliutu pikhaibo tacheng-tajaidungse aliuniu majai-e,
haise aliu jatgu nkiuthubo chakhiu-chalan si-e.
Jupaodung nai paliu kiphiudung wang aruangbo wan-ga,
Mose niu Reuben kiphiu lamga din-e:
“Naliu chamai tamjiu bamliudi, Reuben kiphiu wadaodi hami lakge.”
Judah kiphiu lamga paniu din-e:
Paliutu kakibo kiphiu ruangga puiwang aruangkhai lanlo.
Paliu jengniu aphen khailo,
paliugu mikremaitu atungjiu paliutu nkha khailo.’
Urim nai Thummim
Nangniu paliutu Massah ga madiu lujiu
khatdi Meribah gu duiga paliutu kam majikhai-e.
Paliu pui-piutu suang, paliu singnamaitu suang
maksai paliu nahmaitu suang, paliuniu nkiujiu
natu chakhuang thiubo lenjiu nagu chamtan majai-e.
Namaidungniu nagu tacheng-tajai majai raleng paliuniu katikhai rabo-e;
Paliuniu nagu rathakbamga charathiu khai rabo-e.
Paliuniu kamboga kimbo thiukhailo.
Paliugu mikremai hinatu kampet khailo;
Paliutu wadaodi pi sulan khai mane.”
Benjamin kiphiu lamga paniu din-e:
“Haibo kiphiutu
Paniu paliutu n-nien marinpuiting hina akhe khaibo-e,
khatdi paniu paliu ruangga bamme.”
Joseph kiphiu lamga paniu din-e:
naliu dihga thoidam pikhaibo thiumilo.
Paliu dihga naimik thaokhaijiu parasy kaminbo thiumilo,
withubo rasyse chaken-tatun rimakjiu pi masi khailo.
Tiu withubo rasyniu paliu pao-peh ramluongga phuijiu bambo thiumilo.
Chami taobo chaphe gasu npaobo,
paliu ramse kawibo hinaniu phuibo thiumilo.
Haibo thoidamse Joseph kiphiuga wangbo thiumilo,
Palamra pasingnamai ruangga paniu jupao thiubo-e.
Joseph khuga matomchi pumtan, chara buichi kegu pumtan hina bamme.
Pake haira Manasseh mai sang khat khatdi Ephraim mai sang kariu si-e.
Paniu paliutu majang lujiu jatdungtu ram rabo-e
khatdi paliutu kadih malan ga tunmeng khai rabo-e.”
Zebulun nai Issachar kiphiu kania lamga paniu din-e:
“Zebulun niu duipui ga ali tadjiu lungwi khangbo thiululo,
khatdi Issachar niu paky luangga kalek wibo thiulo.
Paliugu ramluongga sangdiumaitu wangraleng paliuniu kukhai-e
khatdi siga majibo rathakse kadpatle.
Paliuniu duipui nai sibo mungga daolubo siniu paliugu chakhiu thiu-e.”
Gad kiphiu lamga paniu din-e:
“Naliu ram pi dikhaibo, Tingwang tu thuonlo.
Maipee, maiben phe-tap-tap miraleng
Gad mainiu ndongqui kumjiu khuan bamme.
Paliuniu withubo dihse paliuleng lulude;
Jupaogu dam paliutu pikhaide.
Israel maigu jupaodung wang maduibo lon
paliuniu
Dan kiphiu lamga paniu din-e:
“Dan haise ndongquipoi-e; Bashan gasu paniu machak padle.”
Naphtali kiphiu lamga paniu din-e:
Paliu kadihse Galilee gasu tingrunlam mengtang-e.”
Asher kiphiu lamga paniu din-e:
“Kakibo kiphiudungtu suang Asher tu thoidam pi-nkiu khai-e.
Pasingnamai ruangga patuse masen thubo thiululo,
pagu kadihga takisabang kengjiu lungbo thiumilo.
Pagu namdakse chagi rengmunniu gukhaibo thiumilo,
sichiujiu pawan machang manangbo hajiu lungbo thiumilo.”
Israel mai yo, naliu Rawang kumbo chara kaki ha-e,
paken kadibo siniu kamuang tuanglu tingpuk gasu naliutu nkhara wangkiu-e.
Tingwang niu pawan machang naliutu gukhai-e;
pagu tingtheng benpom siniu naliutu nkhakhai-e.
Naliuniu chari hangutboga paniu naliugu mikremaitu hathonpad khai-e,
paliu mathiutu kam maha mira naliu khuga dinkhai-e.
Sichiujiu Jacob kaikikdungse agi-manaijiu,
wadi manangmakbo tek-jaw kakengbo ramga,
tingpukgu kajikdui kiujiu pitim khaibo dihga paliu lung-e.
Israel mai yo, naliu hai dejiuga sanwilo!
Naliutu kumjiu
naliugu chagee khatdi naliugu chaheng si-e.
Naliugu mikremaidungniu lungsa khaira naliu khuga khengwang rabo-e,
chiudi naliuniu paliu riga maluijiu tadrabo-e.
Mose niu Moab gu taningdih gasu Nebo Luong khangjiu, Jerikho tingbanglam bambo Pisgah Luong ton-ga khangtangde, khatdi siga
Naphtali luongren pakhiangna; Manasseh nai Ephraim luongren; Judah gu luongren Mediterranean duipui tingnulam tangbo;
Judah dihgu tingrunlam; khatdi kadan-banggu namdi, Zoar gasu Jerikho ramjeng katang lenkhai-e.
Sigasu
Sichiujiu
Bethpeor namdi masuangga bambo Moab gu ramjengga
Mose niu kashaibo wan-ga pagu takum kai khat-je-makai tangmide; pase papum tanbam kha-e, khatdi sibo wan katang pamik wibam kha-e.
Moab gu ramjengga Israel maidungniu pah shai miboga naimikpui samriu achung khang-e.
Nun nahpiu Joshua hai ningtingniu phui-e, palamra Mose niu patu pabam malinra lukhaibi-e. Mose khugasu Israel maidungniu Joshua lad majai-e, khatdi
Egypt maigu chawang, pagu chakampaodung, khatdi sibo kadih pakhiangnatu atungjiu tasibo ngam nai maisuang habo ngam kamra
Israel mai mathiu masuangga Mose niu kapingbo ngam nai kadibo ngam kamkhai mibo kumjiu phaimiukakung khatnadi kamkhai makge.
Paniu din-e, “Avangpiu Mose shaimide. Nang khatdi Israel mai mathiu tuhoira kadenlulo, Iniu paliutu pikhai rabo ram Jordan Giu kenjiu tadsulo.
Iniu Mose tu dinkhai mibo kum, naliuniu ngut rabo kadihse Iniu nang khatdi amai mathiutu pikhai mide.
Naliu ramrai hai tingrunlam bambo ramjing gasu tingpilam Lebanon Luongdung katang, tingbanglam kadibo Euphrate Giuki gasu Hitt mai ram tonwang tingnulam Mediterranean Duipui katang rabo-e.

Joshua yo, nangniu ringbam then mai khatniudi natu kam chaliu khai lakge. Iniu Mose tu maluang khaimibo kumjiu natudi maluang khaine. Iniu natu pawan machang maluang bamne; Iniu wadaodi natu phutmi lakge.
Malumsiakjiu nalungchun chaplulo, palamra Iniu paliu pao-peh maidung khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo haibo ramgase naliuniu wang lungrabo wan ga nangniu paliugu jupao thiurabo-e.

Malumsiakjiu, nalungchun chaplulo, khatdi avangpiu Mose niu naliutu pikhai mibo tacheng-tajai pakhiangna majai siakne chiululo. Wakhatdi wathao thiumakbo thiumi tulo chiusai nangniu tadkhaibo hinaga nangniu tingthui lune.

Naliugu kahumbo wan hinaga tacheng-tajaigu ariakkhuang kensiak lulo. Nchun n-nien haisitu kenminjiu kenlulo, khatdi siga raokhaibo hina majaisiakne chiululo. Chiusai naliuniu lungwibo nai tathuibo thiulune.
Malumsiakjiu nalungchun chaplulo chiujiu Iniu natu chamtan pibose maningtaolo! Pingbo maksai lungchun nkhinbo thiumi tulo, palamra naliu
Joshua niu jupaodungtu
rijikyga ngutjiu maidung khuga haichiu dinkhai raleng chamtan pikhaide, “Katiu-kasak kadenlulo, palamra jengsum lungga naliu Rawang
Joshua niu Reuben nai Gad kiphiu khatdi Manasseh kiphiu paphan khat khuga din-e,
Naliu nao, naliu nah, khatdi naliugu khaorui-khaonatu khaidiak lujiu, naliugu riphenmai nai chari-maniase thinlujiu,
paliu singna Israel maitu nkha khaira paliu masuangga tadken padrai rabo-e. Israel maidung leng paniu manang makbo pikhaibo wan-ga, naliuniu malan wangjiu,
Paliuniu Joshua tu paokakge, “Nangniu aliutu dinbo hina aliu kamne khatdi nangniu langkhaibo hinaga aliu tadne.
Mose niu kadinbo aliu piubo kum nangniu dinbo piune,
Saokum mainiu nagu tienkamtu maksai nagu chamtantu majaimak maitu kamshat mirabo-e. Malum siakjiu nalungchun chaplulo!”
Jericho gu chawangniu sibonai nchun Israel mai khangnia charamtu matadra wang bamme chiubo chiulude,
Sijengniu paniu Rahab khuga chalad langkhaide: “Nakyga bambo maise charam matadjiu chakhum paora wangbo-e, siniu paliutu majang padlo!”

Paniu paokakge, “Mai khangsiara akyga wang-e. Chiudi paliuse sangde mailo chiubo I simakge. Paliuse namdigu rengdi kham makhabo masuang naimik ngutbo wan-ga tadmide. Paliu delam tadralo chiubodi I maniu khailu makge. Chiudi naliuniu majadjiu hasusai naliuniu paliutu minlu bui-e.” (Tuhoira Rahab niu chakhumpao kania situ chaky nsing genlam puikhang lujiu, siga paniu khai bambo langkuang siniu thapsin mibo-e).
Chawangniu langkhaibo maidungniu namdise phutlujiu tadmide, khatdi rengmunse kham mide. Paliuniu Israel mai chakhumpao maitu Jordan kenpadbo npui katangbo phiude.
Nchunse chakhum paomai jimakhaga Rahab niu nsing gase buangkhang lujiu
panai khuga din-e, “
Naliuniu Egypt phutbo wan-ga naliu masuangga bambo Hengbo Duipui tu
Sibo lamga aliu chiukaji-chiukari aliu pingmide; naliu lamga aliu hot hamide. Naliu Rawang,
Iniu nanaitu kungjiu akhikhai mibo kum, naliudi akikhuntu akhi khaine chiubo pazan-ga siang lujiu Iniu nanaitu malum kabuibo tasibo madan atu pikhailo.
Naliuniu apui-apiu achi-asingnamai khatdi paliu kikhun hinatu gukhaine chiubo akhuga ladriat thiu khailo. Aliutu kamshat khai tulo!”
Panainiu pakhuga din-e, “Anainiu dinbo kum aliu kam maksai Tingwang niu anai ringting lumi sulo! Aliuniu kambambo hai nangniu mai khuga dinmaksai, anainiu nakhuga ladriat thiu-e, sisera
Rahab niu namdigu rengdi mungga thiukhaibo kyga lung-e. Sijengniu paniu panaitu kiran gasu chariang khat ganiu pitad khai mide.
Paniu din-e, “Maluonggen railam tadkhailo maksai chawanggu riphen maidungniu nanaitu daolu rabo-e. Paliu malan wangmi makthen siga jengsum nbai milo. Sibo sailam nanai npuilam tadlan lubui-e.”
Panainiu pakhuga din-e, “Nangniu anaitu ladriat thiukhaibose anai majai rabo-e.

Haise nangniu kamsiak rabo-e. Aliuniu naliu ramga chari thiungutbo wan-ga nangniu aliutu pi npad khaibo kiran gase chalangriang kahengbo haise khin khailo. Nakyga napui, napiu, nasingnamai khatdi nakykhunmai mathiu bam aruang lulo.

Mai khatniu chaky lenlam padsai pashitse paronna pamao phung rabo-e, sibo ripse aliuniu phunglakge, chiudi mai khatniu naliu chaky lungga bam chambo maitu kamshat misai sibo ripse aliuniu phungrabo-e.
Wagaje, nangniu aliuniu kambo haise mai khuga dinsai nangniu aliu khuga thiukhaibo ladriat haise aliu majai lakge.”
Paniu suijiu panaitu langkhai mide. Panai tadmibo wan-ga, paniu chariang kahengbo kiran gase khin khaide.
Chakhumpaomaise maluong genlam tadlujiu nbai mide. Chawanggu riphenmai siniu panaitu jengsum charam pakhiangnaga phiude. Chiudi paliuniu panaitu phiudao makge.
Sibosai chakhumpao khangnia siniu maluong lamsu nkum lujiu, singgiu kenlujiu Joshua khuga malan wangde. Panainiu padmibo hina pakhuga paokhaide,
khatdi din-e, “
Pasaibo nai nsuan Joshua khatdi Israel mai mathiu nsuan kalu buangsulu, Acacia rijiky phutlujiu Jordan lam tadsude khatdi sise kenpad raleng kambambo tingga paliuniu siga rijiky kamlujiu khuan bamme.
Jengsum nai jupaodungse rijiky hinaga tadron wangde,
khatdi maidung khuga din-e, “Singku mainiu naliu Rawang,
Masuang wadaodi naliu haiga wang matai makha-e, sijengniu paliuniu naliu tadrabo npui lenkhai birabo-e chiudi Ladriat Bung khuga wangmana tulo. Sibo sailam mathakbam khat kumbo diujiu bamrabo-e.”
Joshua niu maidung khuga din-e, “Naliu ronna naliutu kam masan lulo, palamra nsuannai
Sichiujiu paniu singku maitu Ladriat Bungse ponlujiu maidung suangga tadraira dinde. Paniu dinbo kum paliu tende,
Ladriat Bung phungbo singku maitu paliuniu singgiu wangtangbo wan-ga taduise kabaijiu singgiu mungga chapmira dinbilo.”
Sichiujiu Joshua niu maidung khuga din-e, “Haiga wangmana lujiu
Naliuniu haichiu ngutboga paniu pachangjiu Canaan mai, Hitt mai, Hiv mai, Perizit mai, Girgash mai, Amor mai khatdi Jebush maitu hathon khai rabo-e.
gu Ladriat Bung naliu masuang raijiu kenpadbo wan-ga ringbambo Tingwang se naliu ruangga bamme chiubo naliuniu silu sune.
Tuhoi Israel mai kiphiu hinagasu chamai khang kariu niakiu kadalulo.
Kadihpiri pakhiangna
Sise atiat ting-e khatdi singgiuse tadui dibamme.
Maidungniu Jordan kenra rijiky phutbo wan-ga, singku mainiu Ladriat Bung phunglujiu paliu suang raijiu tadde. Singku mainiu singgiuga ken ngut gapboga,
taduise luangsao mide, khatdi Adam giuky khangtangjiu Zerethan namdi katang chungtang mide. Kashaibo Duipuiga luangkiubo pakhiangna kamtap mide khatdi Jericho genlam maidungse kenpad mide.
Maidungniu kasangbo jamga kenpad kamlu makthen
Sichiujiu jat siniu Jordan kenpad lubo wan-ga
“Kiphiu hina gasu npiumai khang kariu niakiu kadapad khailo,

khatdi Jordan n-gangga singku mainiu chap bambo gase tatu kariu niakiu khoiwang raleng paliutu chamtan pikhailo. Haibo tudungse naliu phunglujiu thainai nchun rijikyga phungwanglo chiujiu paliu khuga dinbilo.”
Sichiujiu Joshua niu kadalumai khang kariu niakiutu kulujiu din-e,
“Jordan genlam naliu Rawang,
Haibo tudungniu maidung khuga
naliuniu
Maidungniu Joshua gu chamtanse suide.
Joshua niu Ladriat Bung ponbo singkumai chapbo Jordan Giuki n-gangga tatukang kariu niakiuse somkhaide. (Sibo tudungse siga bamkha-e).
niu Joshua khugasu maidung khuga dinkhaijiu kamra chamtan pikhaibo hina kamlu makthen singkumai dungse Jordan n-gangga chap bamme. Mose niu chamtan pikhai mibose hai-e.
Maidung siniu kalangjiu singgiu kensude.
Paliu mathiu singgiu gen khatlam padkam mibo wan-ga, singkumai dungse
Mose niu paliutu tenraleng chamtan pibo kumjiu Reuben nai Gad kiphiumai khatdi Manasseh kiphiu phankhat siniu chari bamleng kaden lujiu kakimai suang tadrai-e.
niu maluang khaijiu chamai sang atai kumbo charileng kaden lujiu Jericho ramjeng mung kenpad sude.
Sibonai
Sichiujiu
Ladriat Bung phungkinmai singku maitu Jordan ganiu tadkhangra chamtan pikhai raleng din-e.
Joshua niu sikumjiu kamkhaide,
khatdi singku mainiu singgiu situ kenpad miboga, singgiuse tadui dijiu luanglan mide.
Karaibo hiugu jengriubo nai maidungniu Jordan kenpad lujiu Jericho tingbang Gilgal ga rijiky thiukhaide.
Jordan ga khoilubo tatukang kariu niakiuse Joshua niu siga somkhaide.
Paniu Israel mai khuga din-e, “Pasai kana, naliu nahmainiu haibo tudung ramba naliu khuga maniubo wan-ga,
naliuniu Israel mai Jordan sangjiu kenpadbo lamga dinrabo-e.
Paniu Hengbo Duipui aliuleng pisang khaibo kumgapjiu
Haisiniu kadihga bammai hina
Jordan tingnulam bambo Amor maigu chawangmai khatdi Mediterranean Duipui lam bambo Canaan maigu chawang mainiu Israel mai Jordan kenpad kamlu makthen
niu chamtan pikhaibo kum Joshua kamde, khatdi chagi rombo Luong kubo bamga paniu Israel maitu chagi rom khaide.

Israel mainiu Egypt tu phutlujiu wangboga npiumai hina chagi romkam migu-e, chiutadi takum atai lungga paliuniu ramjing kenwangbo wan-ga npiumai nahdung maitudi chagi rom makge. Egypt phutpadbo wan ga riphenpum hinadi
Sibo nahpiudungse wadaodi chagi rom makge, sichiujiu Joshua niu chagi-rombose haibo chaken kasan tu-e.
Chagi-rombose loikam lubo sai, paliu mathiu jamse wimak then rijikyga bamme.”
niu Joshua khuga din-e, “Egypt ga kavang thiujiu mangambose thainai Iniu naliu khugasu lupad mide,” Sijengniu sibo bam zan Gilgal
Pasaibo nai raithubo thiujiu Canaan gasu kapadbo katiu-kasak: paliuniu chakhi jaomakbo taruak khatdi alin tara chamiga rulujiu tiude.
Sigasu manna nkaikiu tamide sise Israel mai khuga wadi hamide. Sibo wan gasu paliuniu Canaan ga lingbo katiu-kasakse tiusu mide.

Joshua niu Jericho nawangbo wan-ga simak dakjiu pamasuangga maipiu khat chaheng ponlujiu chapbambo tu ngaode. Joshua niu pakhuga khanglujiu maniu-e, “Nang hai aliugu riphenmai ma, maksai mikre mailo?”
“Ira khatlamdi makge. I haira
Joshua kadihga kaokiu kahumjiu din-e, “Paohubo, I hai navang-e. Nangniu atu nde pi tenkhai nijiulo?”
Siga
Jericho gu rengmundung hina nkham mide khatdi Israel maidung situ akhejiu bammide. Siga mai khatniudi namdiga ngutlulak mide maksai npad lulak mide.
niu Joshua khuga din-e, “Iniu Jericho nai sibogu chawang khatdi sibogu kahubo riphen mathiutu naben ga pikhai mibo-e.
Nang khatdi nagu riphen mainiu namdi situ naikhatga tad magui lon guijiu jeng charuk tadlo.

Singku khang chinnia make khat-khat thinlujiu Ladriat Bung masuangga tadrabo-e, jeng chinniabo nai sira singkumai make mudbo wan-ga nang khatdi nagu riphen mainiu namdise tad magui lon chinnia rabo-e.

Sichiujiu paliu chakhuan khat thiujiu kahu khai sune. Naliuniu sise chiugapboga mai mathiudi naliu lai-padjiu makiak mara-kasin rabo-e, siga namdigu rengdise pangpadjiu kaokiumi sune. Siga riphenmai pakhiangnaniu namdise tad taron ngut rabo-e.”
Joshua niu singku maitu kulujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Ladriat Bungse ponlulo khatdi naliu khang chinnia make thin n-gamlujiu sibo suanglam tadlo.”
Sichiujiu paniu pamaidungtu

Sijengniu Joshua niu chamtan pikhaibo kumgapjiu, make ponmai singkumai suang raijiu akhemai tad mathon mide; haibosai Ladriat Bung ponmai singku mai sibo sai akhemai sailam tadle. Sibo wan-ga makese mudjiu bambo-e.
Chiudi Joshua niu pamaidungtu paniu chamtan pimak then senmakra chalad keng khatnadi dinmakra chamtan pikhaide.
Sijengniu haibo maidungniu

Pasaibo nai nsuan kalu Joshua buangsu lujiu, pasuangbo naigu chamtan kum lonniabo thiujiu namdi situ singkumai khatdi riphenmai siniu tad maguide: raiboga, akhebao munran maidung, padon ga make chinnia mudkinbo singku khang chinnia: sibo sai
Jeng niabo naidi paliuniu namdi situ tad magui lon guilujiu rijikyga malanwang mide. Jeng charukbo nai tangna paliuniu haichiu kamkhangde.
Jeng chinniabo nai sira paliuniu tingbenpad gapboga buangsu mide khatdi dinkhai mibo kumjiu namdi situ tad magui lon chinnia khaide.
Tad magui lon chinnia gapboga singkumai make mudsu rabo wan-ga, Joshua niu pamaidungtu chamtan pijiu din-e. “
Namdi nai siga bambo mania hina
Chiudi kam maha mirabo mania khatnadi naliu khoimak rabo-e, wagaje naliuniu kadin piumakjiu kamsai Israel mai rijikyga chariu magen thiubose naliuniu phungwang rabo-e.
Rangkang, kachia, maksai chaginiu kambo mania hina
Namdiga bambo maipui, maipiu, chabonmai khatdi katingmai mathiutu paliu hengniu bishatkam mide. Paliuniu matom-kabui, mily khatdi qonniamdi kamshat kam mide.
Sigasu Joshua niu chakhumpao kania khuga din-e, “Papum kajonpui kyga tadngut lujiu patu khatdi pakikhunmai maitu naliuniu ladriat khaibo kumjiu maluang padmilo.”

Sijengniu paliu tadlujiu Rahab tu, papui-papiu khatdi pasingnadungtu khatdi pakikhun-ga bambo mathiutu maluang npad mide. Paliuniu sibo kikhun mathiu khatdi kavang maidung situ Israel maigu rijiky mungga maluangwang khaide.
Sibosai paliuniu namdi nai siga bambo kachia, rangkanggi, tanaagi khatdi chagigu chiujiu paliuniu

Chiudi Joshua niu papum kajonpui Rahab khatdi pariang-parui hina ringting gukhai bi-e, palamra Jericho ga langkhaibo chakhumpao kaniatu paniu baikhai bide. (Pakai-pakik thainaidi Israel mai khuga lungbam kha-e).
Mai khatniu kaphung donsu sai, panah npiumai nahraise harabo-e;
Mai khatniu rengmun thiusu sai panah nathubose hakhai rabo-e.”
Haichiujiu
Bethel gu tingbanglam Bethaven mungga bambo Jericho gasu Ai katangbo, sibo kadihtu phuiraleng chamai kasiatu Joshua niu chamtan pijiu langkhaide.

Paliuniu sise kamlubo saiga, malan wang Joshua khuga paokhaide: “Ai tu mai hina aphenra pageng ha-e. Chamai sang nia maksai sang sum kumbo ronna langkhailo. Riphen pakhiangnatu siga aphenra langkhai tulo, sise nam kadibo makge,”
Sijengniu Israel mai sang sum kumboniu aphen sude, chiudi paliu masai nkhinrabo padmide.
Ai mainiu paliutu namdi rengmun gasu turali tangbo hajiu maluong hiuga paliu chamai khang samriu charuk kumbotu kamshat mide. Sichiujiu Israel mai paliu hot hajiu pingmide.
Joshua khatdi Israel maigu jupaodung chalung chariujiu paliu fai phet sude khatdi
Siga Joshua niu din-e, “Tanthubo
Tuhoira mikremai khugasu Israel mai nkhin mide, Hey
Canaan mai khatdi sibo kadihga lungmai hina sibo lamga chiusune. Paliuniu aliutu wanglujiu aliu mathiutu kamshatmi sune. Sichiusai nagu kendibo situ dechiujiu ranlu ralo?”

Israel mainiu nuan ten mide! Iniu paliutu pikhai raleng chamtan pikhaibo chamse kampang mide. Paliuniu suimakjiu kam maha mirabo maniadung kasia khoilude. Paliuniu agalujiu sibo lamga aratle, khatdi paliugu mania nai khai taruang mide.

Haijeng gasu Israel mainiu paliugu mikremaitu atungjiu chap ngam makbo-e. Paliuniu simai khugasu nkhin mide, palamra paliu ronna paliutu kam mahami raleng kammibo-e. Naliutu khoitulo chiujiu chamtan pibo mania kam mahami makthen Iniu naliutu majang khai lakge.
Buangsulo! Maidungtu kam masan milo, khatdi asuangga wangraleng paliutu pijiu kadenlulo. Nsuannai kaden raleng paliu khuga dinbilo, palamra, Israel mai Rawang,

Sijengniu nsuannai paliu kiphiu-phiu saisuijiu maluang padrabo-e chiujiu paliu khuga dinbilo. Iniu kadapadbo kiphiuse paliu kiriang saisuijiu pasuanglam wangrabo-e. Iniu kadapadbo kiriangse kikhun-khun saisuijiu pasuanglam wangrabo-e. Iniu kadapadbo kikhunse khat khat thiujiu pasuanglam wangrabo-e.
Suimakbo maniadung khoipadbo piu tura pakikhunmai panai pagu hina rumi rabo-e, palamra paliuniu Israel mai riga mangam kasabo hai phungwangbo-e sichiujiu agu Ladriat kampang mibo-e.”
Pasaibo nai nsuan kalu Joshua niu Israel maitu paliu kiphiu-phiu saisuijiu maluang padle, khatdi Judah kiphiu saisuijiu kadapad mide.
Paniu Judah gu kiphiutu, pakiriang-riang saisuijiu majang padboga Zerah gu kiriangtu kadapadle, Siga paniu Zabdi kikhuntu kadapadle.
Sichiujiu paniu Zabdi kikhuntu npiumai hinatu maluang padde, khatdi Zabdi tahpiu, Carmi nahpiu Achan tu kada padde.
Joshua niu pakhuga din-e, “Anah yo, haiga Israel mai Rawang,
“Kachang-e”, chiujiu Achan niu paokakge, “Israel mai Rawang,

Aliuniu khoiwangbo mania ruangga Iniu Babylon maigu ntiang kadibo kawibo khat, rangkanggi taju nia kumbo, khatdi kachia dumkhat taju phan suang ridbo ngaode. Iniu sibodungse lunijiu khoilude. Agu mathenkyga rangkang giniu pasingga khailujiu ruangbai nbambo naliuniu daosune.”
Sigasu Joshua niu mai khangsiatu langkhaide, paliuniu mathenkyga pakmeng-e khatdi palingjiu suimakbo maniadung nai rangkang giniu pasingga khailu siga khaibam niubose daode.
Sibo hinase paliuniu mathenky gasu khoipad lujiu Joshua khatdi Israel mai mathiu suangga khoiwang-e khatdi

Joshua niu Israel maidungtu majang lujiu Achan khatdi Achan nah npiumai, npuimai sigasu rangkanggi, kawibo ntiang kadibo, kachia dum, khatdi matom-kabui, qonniam, mily, pagu mathenky, khatdi pagu kabambo hina minlujiu paliuniu sise Chariubo Ramjengga puimengde.
Sichiujiu Joshua niu din-e, “Nde jenggasu nangniu aliu riga haikumbo chariubo phungwang gulo?
Paliuniu pariga tatukang kengjiu khuan khaide. Sise thainai tangbo siga bamme. Sijengniu sibo bamse Chariubo Ramjeng chiu kujiu bamme.
Sichiujiu

Jericho khatdi sibo chawangtu naliuniu kambo kum Ai khatdi sibo wangtu kamrabo-e, chiudi haibo wan gara mania khatdi khaorui hina naliuleng khoi lulo. Namdi situ pasai lamsu bungjiu chari thiungut raleng kaden sulo.
Sijeng gasu Joshua niu pagu riphenmai mathiutu majang lujiu Ai ga chari thiura kaden lude. Paniu pagu withubo riphen sang samriutu kadenlujiu nchunniu haibo chamtandung jaojiu langkhaide:
“Sibo namdi gen khatlam diuchang diumakboga nbai bamlo, chari aphenra kadenlulo.
I khatdi amaidung namdiga nguttang rabo-e. Ai mainiu aliutu atungjiu padbo wan-ga, aliuniu karaibo wan-ga kambo kumgapjiu, sailam mariwangjiu pakrabo-e.
Aliuniu paliutu namdi gasu maluangpad lumak then paliuniu aliutu hasune. Masuang kumjiu paliuniu aliu khugasu pakkinne chiubo paliuniu maning sune.
Sigasu naliuniu nbaibam gasu pakpad lujiu namdi situ haphun lumi rabo-e.
niu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, namdi situ naliuniu lulubo sai, sise chaminiu rumilo. Haise naliuleng pikhaibo chamtandung-e.”
Sichiujiu Joshua niu paliutu langkhaide, khatdi paliuniu paliu nbai bamga tadlujiu Ai gu tingnulam Bethel nai Ai kakga khuanbamde. Joshua ra riji bamga sibo nchun bammide.
Nsuan kalu Joshua buangsu lujiu riphen dungtu kuwang aruangde. Sichiujiu pah khatdi Israel maigu jupaodungniu paliutu Ai ga maluang ngutde.
Paliu nai Ai kakga bambo ramjengga, paniu riphendungtu majang lujiu namdi tadngutbo rengdi tingpilam rijibam kam lujiu bammine.
Paniu chamai sang mangiu kumbotu maluang lujiu namdigu tingnulam Ai panai Bethel kakga paliutu nbai khai-e.
Namdigu tingpilam bambo parathiubo charimai bamtu asunra riphenmai kaden lude, khatdi siga masiadiak mainiu tingrunlam asunrabo leng kamde. Sibo nchunse Joshua niu ramjengga bammide.

Ai gu chawangniu Joshua maidungtu ngaobo wan-ga paniu kalangjiu kamsude. Pah khatdi pamai mathiu sailamsu paliutu patu aphen ngutra kambambo situ simakjiu, masuanglam Israel maitu charithiu raleng Jordan ramjengga tadpad mide.
Joshua khatdi pamaidung malanbo thak thiusude, khatdi patam habo ramlam pakkhai mide.
Namdiga bambo npiumai mathiuniu paliutu haraleng kam mide, khatdi paliuniu Joshua tu hatadmiboga namdi gasu diubijiu tadmide.
Ai ga bambo npiumai hina Israel maitu hatad mide, khatdi namdise lepad manga khailujiu sise mai khatdi khuanra hamide.
Sigasu
khatdi paniu paben khengsu gapboga nbai kabam maidungse kalangjiu buangsu mide, khatdi namdiga pakngut lujiu sise haphun lude. Paliuniu kalangjiu namdi situ chami khai mide.
Ai mainiu mariwang phuibo tingga tingpukga mikha kenkhangbo tuse ngaolude. Paliu paklu raleng npui hamide, palamra patam habo ramlam pakkhai mibo Israel mainiu tuhoira paliutu aphenra mariwang lande.
Joshua khatdi pamai kakimaidung siniu namdi situ lulujiu chami khai mibose ngaobo tingga paliu mariwang Ai maidungtu kamshat sude.

Namdiga bambo Israel mai tuhoira chari bamga wang aruang mide. Sijengniu Ai maitu Israel mainiu chuong maguiting lude khatdi paliu mathiutu kamshat kam mide. Ai gu chawangse makjiu, mai khatnadi pakduak lumakge, khatdi siga mai khatnadi ringlu makge.
Patu minlujiu Joshua khuga puiwangde.
Patam habo ramga Israel maitu hatadbo mikremai hinatu paliuniu kamshat kam mide.
Joshua niu pangiuse Ai lam khengsu lujiu siga bammai hinatu kamshat kam makthen sise khaikiu makge. Sibo nai Ai maidung maipui-maipiu pakhiangna sang kariu-je-niakiutu kamshat mide.
niu Joshua khuga dinkhaibo kum, Israel mainiu namdiga bambo khaorui nai mania hina paliuleng lumide.
Joshua niu Ai rumide, khatdi kam maha kam mide. Sise thainai tangbo sikumjiu bamkha-e.

Paniu Ai gu chawangtu singbang khatga nkhek khaide, khatdi chawan tangbo papum siga khaidiakge. Naimik ngutbo tingga Joshua niu sibo pumse lupad raleng chamtan pikhaide, khatdi sise namdi ngutbo rengdi kamun-ga taliang khai mide. Paliuniu sise tubaw kadibo khatniu kaladsin khaimide, sise thainai tangbo bamkha-e.
Sichiujiu Joshua niu Ebal Luong riga
Mose gu tacheng-tajaiga dinbo kum: “Chagi manianiu phangpadbo tatuniu makjiu kakibo tuniu rathakbam kamkhai-e.” Israel maidungniu kam raleng
Siga Israel maidungniu phuibamboga Mose niu raokhai diakbo tacheng-tajaise Joshua niu tatu rammaiga rao chalipad khai-e.
Israel mai, paliugu jupaodung, chakampaodung, khatdi ladjanpaodung, sangdiu maidi
Tacheng-tajai khuangga raokhai mibo kumgapjiu Joshua niu thoidamdung khatdi tasiangdung hinagu tacheng-tajai pakhiangna pakhuan tanjiu kenpad khaide.
Paliu mathiu maipui, mainahdung khatdi paliu ruangga lungbambo sangdiumai jaojiu aruong bamboga, Joshua niu Mose gu chamtan hina kenpad khaibo-e.

Israel maigu chari ngambose Jordan gu tingnulam bambo chawang mai hina maluangga, maluang phiga khatdi Mediterranean Duipui ramjeng mung tingpilam Lebanon katang simide; haise Hitt mai, Amor mai, Canaan mai, Perizit mai, Hiv mai khatdi Jebus maigu chawang maidung-e.
Joshua khatdi Israel maitu atungjiu aphenra paliu mathiu madui lujiu khat thiu mide.
Chiudi Gibeon ga bambo Hiv mai, Joshua niu Jericho khatdi Ai tu kamkhai mibo chiulude,
khatdi patu son raleng paliuniu chaplude. Paliu tadlujiu katiu-kasakse kekmibo takhaoga khatdi khopmibo jawlahga jaw khailujiu qonniamdung bang thiukhaide.
Paliuniu kekmibo fai nai charui kamibo phitop piu-e. Paliuniu phungtadbo taruakse kikhio-khio mibo khatdi kalao taomibo-e.
Sichiujiu paliuniu Gilgal rijikyga tadlujiu Joshua khatdi Israel mai khuga din-e, “Aliu kadiubo ramlamsu wangbo-e. Naliu nai aliu kawi thiubotu aliu luni-e.”
Paliuniu Joshua khuga din-e, “Aliu natu mawabo tien thiumai-e.
Joshua niu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Naliu hai saolo? Naliu delamsu wangbo mailo?
Siga paliuniu pakhuga haibo racham din-e, “Aliu diuchang diubo ram gasu wangbo-e, chaibo, palamra aliuniu
khatdi Ashtaroth ga lungbambo Jordan tingbanglam Amor maigu chawang, Heshbon gu chawang Shihon khatdi Bashan gu chawang Og paliu khuga kamkhai mibo aliuniu chiude.

Aliu ramga lungbambo jupaomai khatdi maidung mathiuniu chabin tadraleng tiutek kasia kaden lujiu meng naliutu adaoraleng din-e. Aliuniu natu mawabo tien thiura khatdi aliu nai kawi thiulu natu macharaleng maniura dinkhai-e.
Aliugu taruak phuilo. Aliuniu chaky phutlujiu naliutu adaora tadsubo wan-ga sise kikhio-khio mijiu kalao taomide.
Aliuniu jaw khaibo chamigi takhao malibo wan gara sibodungse sanbambo-e, chiudi phuilo! Haidungse kekmide. Aliugu fai-ni khatdi phitopdungdi chabin tad mathengbo gasu kekmide.”
Israel mainiu paliu khugasu katiu-kasak kasia lukhaide, chiudi sibo lamga
Joshua niu Gibeon maitu chaka thiulujiu paliutu lungra kawi thiujiu suikhai bide. Israel maigu jupaodungniu sibo kawi thiubo ladriattu majai raleng ladriat tanjiu thiukhaide.
Kawi thiubogu kamlubo jengsum sai sibo maidungse kanaga lungbambo-e chiubo Israel mainiu silude.
Sijengniu Israel mai tadpad lujiu jengsum sai sibo maidung lungbo namdidung Gibeon, Chephirah, Beeroth khatdi Kiriath Jearim katang mengtangde.
Chiudi Israel mainiu paliutu kamshat ngamlak mide, palamra paliugu jupao dungniu
chiudi paliuniu paokakge, “Aliu
Aliugu ladriat jengniu paliutu pilungkhai rabo-e; wagaje aliu sichiulu maksai, Tingwang niu aliutu sajai pisune.
Paliutu pilung bamlo, chiujiu paliu aliuleng tasing-duang, khatdi tadui thuakrabo-e.” Jupaodungniu haichiu dinpad khai mide.
Joshua niu Gibeon maitu pakhuga maluang wangra chamtan pikhaide khatdi paniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Dekamjiu naliu haiga lunglujiu kadiulamsu wangmai-e chiujiu aliutu sonbolo?
Naliuniu haise kambo jengniu Tingwang niu naliutu lukhai tamine. Namaidungniu aliu Rawang gu masanbo bamleng tasing duangjiu khatdi tadui thuakjiu pawan machang kavang thiurabo-e”
Paliuniu kenkakge, “Aliuniu sise kam mide, chaibo, palamra naliuniu tad ngutboga
Tuhoi aliuniu napumtan hangga bamme; nangniu maji-e chiujiu maningbose aliutu pi tenkhai sulo.”
Sijeng gasu Joshua niu paliutu gukhaide, khatdi paliutu kamshat raleng Israel maitu suikhai makge.
Chiudi paniu paliutu Israel maileng khatdi

Jericho khatdi sibogu chawangtu kamkhaibo kum, Ai tu Joshua niu haphun lujiu kam masakam lujiu paliu wangtu kamshat mide, khatdi Gibeon mainiu kawi thiulujiu Israel mai ruangga lung bamme chiubo Jerusalem
Siga Jerusalem mai charensui mide, palamra Gibeon mai hai chawang khat bambo namdidung kumjiu kadibo bamme, sise Ai suang dibi-e,khatdi pamaidung hai chari aphensibo mai maliang-e.
Sijeng gasu Adonizedek niu haibo chamse Hebron gu Chawang Hoham, Jarmuth gu Chawang Piram, Lachish gu Chawang Japhia khatdi Eglon gu Chawang Debir khuga tacham langkhaide:
“Wang atu nkhajiu Gibeon tu aphenkhailo palamra pamaidungniu Joshua khatdi Israel maitu kawi thiumide.”
Haibo Amor maigu chawang khang mangiu, Jerusalem, Hebron, Jarmuth, Lachish khatdi Eglon gu riphenmai aruang lujiu, Gebeon taoweng lujiu situ chari thiusude.

Gilgal rijikyga bambo Joshua khuga Gibeon mainiu chalad langkhaide: “Paohubo, aliutu phutkhai tulo. Majadjiu wang aliutu nkha khailo! Aliutu rankhailo! Maluong ramga bammai Amor mai mathiu chari alam lujiu aliutu aphenjiu bamme.”
Sijengniu Joshua khatdi pagu riphen withubo charibao pakhiangna jaojiu Gilgal gasu tadsude.
niu Joshua khuga din-e, “Paliutu pingtulo. Chari ngambose Iniu naleng pikhai masuang mide. Paliu mai khatnadi natu atungjiu chapngam lulakge.”
Nchun masang Joshua khatdi pagu riphenmai Gilgal gasu Gibeon lam tadsude, khatdi paliuniu Amor maitu simak dakjiu aphende.

niu Amor maitu Israel maigu riphenmai suangga maisuang habo kapingbo kamkhaide. Israel mainiu paliutu Gibeon ga kamshat mide, khatdi Beth Horon lam tadbo npui katang paliutu hakiujiu tingrunlam Azekah khatdi Makkedah tangbo aphende.
Israel maigu riphen khugasu Amor mainiu pakkinbo wan-ga
Amor maitu Israel mainiu ngamra
“Gibeon ga naimik chapbam milo,
Aijalon Ramjengga, chahiu mathak milo.”
Sibo tingmik kumbo masuangga khatdi sibo saiga wadaodi
Haibosai Joshua khatdi pagu riphenmai Gilgal rijikyga malan wangmide.
Chiudi Amor mai wang khang mangiuse paktad mide, khatdi Makkedah tulimga nbaibam mide.
Mai khatniu paliutu daolujiu paliu nbai bamse Joshua khuga dinkhai bide.
Paniu din-e, “Tulimki kamun gase tatu kadibo kasianiu talui kham milo. Siga akhemai khangsiatu khailo.
Chiudi naliura siga bammi tulo. Mikremaitu aguijiu sailam paliutu aphenlo, paliutu namdidungga pingut khai tulo! Naliu Rawang,
Joshua khatdi Israel mainiu paliutu kamshat mide, chiudi khangsia maira paliugu rengdi lunglam nbai bamga ngutmibo jengniu kamshat lumakge.
Sichiujiu Joshua mai mathiu wa kasa thiumakjiu Makkedah ga bambo rijibam, pakhuga malan wangde.
Sibo kadihga bambo mai khatnadi Israel maitu suimakjiu chalad din ngam makge.
Sichiujiu Joshua niu din-e, “Tulimki kamunse, lepad lujiu, chawang khang mangiu situ akhuga pui wanglo.”
Sijengniu tulim kyse lepad lujiu Jerusalem, Hebron, Jarmuth, Lachish khatdi Eglon maigu chawangdungtu majang npad lujiu

Joshua khuga puiwangde. Sibosai Joshua niu Israel mai mathiutu pakhuga kuwang lujiu patu majang tadbo chakampaodungtu wangjiu chawang mai wongchengga paliu phi kuakhai raleng chamtan pikhaide. Paliuniu sikumjiu kamkhaide.
Sichiujiu Joshua niu pagu chakampaodung khuga din-e, “Pingbo maksai chalung nkhinbo thiutulo. Lungchun chapgapjiu malumlo, palamra haichiujiu
Sibosai Joshua niu chawangdung situ kamshat lujiu singbang mangiuga masiang khaide, siga paliutu chawan tangbo khaide.

Naimik ngutmiboga Joshua niu chamtan pide, khatdi paliu pumse lukiu lujiu paliuniu nbaikhaibo tulimki gase thonkhai mide. Tulimki kamun gase tatu kadiboniu kaladsin mide, tuhoidi paliu siga sichiujiu bamkha-e.

Joshua niu Makkedah tu asunjiu haphun lude khatdi sibo nai sibogu chawangtu ngam mide. Namdiga bammai hinatu paniu kamshat mide, mai khat tudi phutkhai makge. Paniu Jericho gu chawangtu kamkhaibo kum Makkedah gu chawang tudi kamkhaide.
Haibosai, Joshua khatdi pagu riphendungniu Makkedah gasu Libnah lam tadlujiu sisetu aphende.

niu Israel maitu haibo namdi nai sibogu chawang tudi ngamra pikhaide. Paliuniu mai khat tudi masiak khai makge, chiujiu siga mai hinatu kamshat mide. Jericho gu chawangtu kamkhai mibo kumjiu sibo wangtu kamkhaide.
Haibosai, Joshua khatdi pagu riphen dungniu Libnah gasu Lachish tadlujiu situ taoweng lujiu aphende.
Israel mainiu chari thiubo jengniabo naise
Gazer gu chawang Horam niu Lachish tu nkha raleng wang-e, chiudi Joshua niu patu ngamlude, khatdi paliu mai khattudi masiak khai makge.
Haibosai, Joshua khatdi pagu riphenmainiu Lachish gasu maluongram khangjiu Eglon tu aphende
Paliuniu sibo nai sisetu haphun lujiu Lachish ga kamkhai mibo kumjiu siga mai hinatu kamshat mide.
Haibosai, Joshua nai pagu riphen mainiu Eglon gasu maluongram khangjiu Hebron tu aphende.

Khatdi sisetu haphun lude. Paliuniu chawang khatdi namdiga bammai khatdi namdak mungga lungmana bammai hinatu kamshat mide. Joshua niu Eglon tu kamkhai mibo kumjiu, namdi situ ladjan thiujiu pakhiangna kam maha mide. Siga bambo mai khattudi ringjiu phutkhai makge.
Sichiujiu Joshua khatdi pagu riphendungniu sailam malan wangjiu Debir situ aphende.

Paniu chawangdi jaojiu khatdi lungmana bambo namdak pakhiangnatu haphun lude. Siga bammai hinatu paliuniu kamshat kam mide. Joshua niu Hebron khatdi Libnah maigu chawangtu kammibo kumjiu Debir khatdi sibogu chawangtu kamkhaide.

Joshua niu charam pakhiangna lulude. Paliuniu maluang ram, pakhan thiubo tingbanglam, tingnulam maluongphi bam sigasu tingrunlam kasangbo kadih katangbo chawangdungtu kamkao lude. Paniu mai khangkhat tudi masiak khaimakjiu, mai hinatu kamshat mide. Haise
Joshua gu charimen thiujiu tadboga tingrunlam Kadesh Barnea gasu duinai khen Gajah tangbo Goshen wenjeng pakhiangna jaojiu, tingpilam Gibeon katang lulude.
Charimen khat tadboga haibo chawang mai mathiu khatdi paliu ram pakhiangna Joshua niu ngamlude, palamra
Haibosai, Joshua khatdi pagu riphendung Gilgal rijiky lam malanwang mide.
Israel maigu chari kangambo chamse Hazor gu Chawang Jabin khuga wangtangbo wan-ga, paniu Madon gu Chawang Jobab, Shimron nai Achshaph gu chawangmai,
khatdi tingpilam maluang ramgu chawang mai, Galilee Ajai tingnulam Jordan Ramjeng maluang phibang khatdi Dor khuga bambo duinai khen ga katang chalad langkhaide.
Paniu Jordan khen nialam Canaan mai, Amor mai, Hitt mai, Perizz mai khatdi maluang ramga bambo Jebus mai khatdi Mizpah ramga bambo Hermon luong phiga lungbambo Hiv mai gadi chalad langkhaide.
Duinai khen ga bambo nbuiniang jiukha kengbo riphendung situ paliuniu majang lujiu tadpad sude. Paliugu chaqon khatdi chaqon-kari kengchang keng-e.
Haibo chawangmai mathiu alam lujiu Merom Giunakiga Israel maitu atungjiu chari thiuraleng rijiky thiusude.
Sijengniu Joshua khatdi pamai mathiuniu paliutu Merom Giunakiga maisuang habo lunlungga aphen sude.
Israel mainiu paliutu ngamra
niu chamtan pikhaibo kum Joshua niu paliu khuga kamkhaide: paniu paliugu chaqon phi kamtang khaide, khatdi paliugu chaqon-kari hinase rumide.
Sigasu Joshua niu malan wang Hazor tu haphun lujiu sibogu chawangtu kamshat mide. (Sibo wan-ga Hazor hai chawang kadih hina ruangga tanthubo thiu bamniu-e)
Paliuniu siga bammai hinatu kamshat mide, khatdi mai khat tudi maring phudkhai makge, sichiujiu namdise chami matia mide.
Chiubamdi, Joshua niu chami matia mibo Hazor se makjiu maluangga thiukhai bambo namdi rammai wadi Israel mainiu chami matia makge.
Israel mainiu haibo namdi dungga bambo paman kungbo khatdi khaorui-khaona pakhiangna paliuleng lulude. Chiudi paliuniu mai khattudi maring phudkhai makjiu mathiutu kamshat kammide.
niu pavangpiu Mose tu pagu chamtandung pikhai-e, sise Mose niu Joshua tu pikhai diakge, sise Joshua niu palingjiu majai-e.

Joshua niu charam pakhiangna maluongram khatdi maluang phibangga bambo ram, tingpi tingrun jainialam, Goshen wenjeng pakhiangna khatdi sibo tingrunlam bambo kasangbo dih, Jordan Ramjeng pakhiangna katang haphun lude.

Kadihse tingrunlam Edom gasu Halak Luong katangbo, sigasu tingpilam Baalgad katangbo, Harmon Luonggu tingrunlam Lebanon ramjeng katang kamsan padlu-e. Haibo kadihgu chawangmai nai Joshua niu pawan thengjiu chari thiu khaide, chiudi paniu paliu mathiutu minlujiu kamshat mide.
Hiv mainiu lungbambo namdi Gibeon tu ronna Israel mainiu kawi thiukhai-e. Kakibo pakhiangnatu chari thiuboga ngamlude.
Paliu mathiutu chalungsabo hajiu kam masajiu kamshat miraleng,

Haibo saiga, Joshua niu tadlujiu maluongram--Hebron, Debir, Anab khatdi Judah nai Israel maigu maluongram pakhiangnaga lungbambo Anakim kubo lungkabo jattu kam maha mide. Joshua niu paliutu khatdi paliugu namdi pakhiangna kam mahaduak mide.
Israel ramga Anakim mai khattudi phudkhai makge, chiudi Gaza, Gath khatdi Ashdod ga poinakhara masiak khai-e.
Sichiujiu maidung hai chari gasu mathak mide.

Khangkhat siniu Heshbon ga mawang bambo, Amor maigu chawang Sihon si-e. Pagu chawang kadihse Gilead dih paphan jao-e: Aroer gasu (Arnon gu ramjeng khen ga) khatdi sibogu ramjeng n-gangga bambo namdi; Ammon gu ramrai, Jabbok Giuki katangbo-e;
sise Jordan ramjeng jaojiu Galilee Ajai gasu tingrunlam Beth Zeshimoth (Kashaibo Duipui gu tingbanglam) khatdi Pisgah Luong phipan katangbo-e.
Paliuniu Rephaim gu kanam thubo chawang khat thiujiu bambo Edrei nai Ashtaroth tudi mawang bambo Bashan wangpiu Og tudi kamkao lude.
Pagu chawang kadihse Harmon Luong jaojiu, Salecah khatdi Bashan pakhiangna Geshur panai Maakah gu ramrai Gilead dih paphan khatdi Heshbon gu chawang Shihon gu kadih katang-e.

Jordan gu tingnulam bambo chawangmai mathiutu Joshua khatdi Israel mainiu Lebanon gu ramjengga bambo Baalgad gasu Edom mungga bambo tingrunlam Halak Luong tangbo kamkao lubo-e. Joshua niu sise kiphiudung ruangga njankhai bide khatdi paliugu thiubammi raleng pikhaide.

Haibo dihse maluongram, tingnulam maluang phibang, Jordan Ramjeng khatdi sibogu maluang phibang, tingbanglam pakhan thiubo ram khatdi tingrunlam kasangbo dih katang jao-e. Haibo dihse Hittit mai, Amor mai, Canaan mai, Perizit mai, Hiv mai, khatdi Jebus mainiu lungbam niu-e.
Israel mainiu pahangga pikhaibo namdidunggu chawang maitu kamkao lude: Jericho, Ai, (Bethel mungga),
Jerusalem, Hebron
Jarmuth, Lachish,
Eglon, Gezer,
Debir, Geder,
Hormah, Arad,
Libnah, Adullam,
Makkedah, Bethel,
Tappuah, Hepher,
Aphek, Lasharon,
Madon, Hazor,
Shimron Meron, Achshaph,
Taanach, Megiddo,
Kedesh, Jokneam, (Carmel ga bambo)
Dor (duinai khen ga bambo) Goiim (Galilee
khatdi Tirzah--pakhiangna chawangmai samriu khat kiu-e.
Joshua tuhoira tingsui mide.
Philistia dih pakhiangna khatdi Geshur dih pakhiangna,

tingrunlam Avvim dih pakhiangna khatdi, (Egypt maigu ramrai, Shihor giuky bambo dih gasu Canaan maileng lukhai bambo Ekron gu ramrai katang; Gaza ga lungbambo Philistia mai wangdunggu dih, Ashdod, Ashkelon, Gath khatdi Ekron chiujiu lura bamkha-e).
Canaan mairam khatdi Mearah (sise Sidon maigu-e) Amor maigu ramrai Aphek katang-e;
Gebali mairam; Baalgad gasu tingbanglam Lebanon pakhiangna sise Hermon Luong gu tingrunlam Hamath Pass katang bamkha-e.

Haise maluongram Lebanon Luongdung nai Misrephoth Maim kakga lungbambo Sidon mairam pakhiangna jao-e. Israel mainiu charithiu ngutboga Iniu haimai mathiutu hathon khaine. Iniu naliutu kamlo chiujiu chamtan pimibo kumgapjiu nangniu charamse Israel mai ruangga njankhai rabo-e.
Tuhoira charam haise kakibo kiphiu chakiu khatdi Manasseh kiphiu paphan siniu paliugu thiuraleng njan khai bilo.”
Paliu dih hai Aroer lam (Arnon Ramjeng mungga) khatdi sibo ramjeng n-gangga bambo namdi khatdi Medeba gasu Dibon gu pakhagen pakhiangna jaojiu lusan padde.
Siga Ammon ramrai katang khatdi Heshbon ga mawangbo, Amor maigu Chawang Sihon niu thiu khaibo namdi pakhiangna jaotang-e.
Sise Gilead jaojiu Geshur nai Maakah gu kadih Hermon Luong pakhiangna khatdi Bashan pakhiangna Salecah katang jao-e.
Sise Edrei nai Ashtaroth ga Rephaim gu kanam thuboga mawangbo Og gu kadihse jao-e. Mose niu haimaitu kamkao kiulujiu paliutu hathon mide.
Chiudi, Israel mainiu Geshur nai Maakah maitu hathon makge. Israel mai dihga paliu lungbam kha-e.
Mose niu charam njan khat Reuben kiphiuga paliu dam thiujiu pikhai bide.
Paliu dihse Aroer gasu (Arnon Ramjeng mung ga) khatdi sibo ramjeng n-gangga bambo namdi khatdi Medeba wenjeng pakhagen pakhiangna jao-e.
Sise Heshbon khatdi pakhagen-ga bambo namdi hina; Dibon, Bamoth Baal, Beth Baalmeon,
Jahaz, Kedemoth, Mephaath,
Kiriathaim, Sibmah, ramjenggu luongbutga bambo Zerethshahar,
Pisgah Luonggu pakhan thiubo bamga bambo Bethpeor, khatdi Beth Jeshimoth luong jaotang-e.

Siga Heshbon ga mawangbo Amor maigu Chawang Sihon gu kadih pakhiangna khatdi pakhagen-ga bambo namdi pakhiangna jao-e. Mose niu patu khatdi Media gu mawangpaodung: Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur, khatdi Reba tudi chiujiu kamkao lu-e. Paliu mathiuniu Chawang Sihon leng kadih thin bamniu-e.
Israel mainiu tasan-giak phui kasibo Beor nahpiu Baalam tudi paliu ruangga jaojiu kamshat mide.
Jordan hai Reuben kiphiugu tingnulam ramrai side. Haidungse Reuben kiphiu leng paliu dam thiujiu pikhaibo namdidung khatdi namdakdung si-e.
Gad kiphiugu kikhundung tudi Mose niu charam kasia paliu dam thiujiu lura njankhai bide.
Paliu dih hai Jazer khatdi Gilead namdidung, Ammon gu ram paphan khatdi Rabbah gu tingbanglam bambo; Aroer tangbo jaobo-e;
Paliu ram hai Heshbon gasu Ramath Mizpah khatdi Betonim katang, Mahanaim gasu Lodeber gu ramrai tangbo lusan padde.
Jordan ramjengga Beth Haram, Beth-Nimrah, Sukkoth khatdi Zophan, masiak bambo Heshbon gu chawang Sihon gu wangdih jaotang-e. Paliugu tingnulam ramraise Jordan giuki Galilee Ajai tingbanglam katang-e.
Haibo namdi khatdi namdakdung hai Gad kiphiu maigu kikhundung leng paliu dam thiujiu pikhaide.
Mose niu Manasseh kiphiumai paphan khatgu kikhundungtu charam jankhat thiujiu pikhaide.
Paliugu kadih hai Mahanaim khatdi Bashan mengtangjiu--Og gu chawang kadih pakhiangna, Bashan gu chawang kadih, Bashan ga bambo Jair gu namdung riak-charuk di jaojiu lusan padde.
Sise Gilead paphan, Bashan ga bambo Og gu chawang dihsinggu namdidung Ashtaroth khatdi Edrei jaotang-e. Hai pakhiangna Manasseh kiphiu Makhir kaikikgu kikhundung paphan leng pikhai bide.
Mose niu Moab ramjingga bambo tingga Jericho nai Jordan tingbanglam gu kadihse haichiujiu njan khaide.
Chiudi Mose niu Levi kiphiuleng charam pikhai makge. Israel mainiu

Jordan tingnulam bambo Canaan ram hai dechiujiu Israel mai ruangga njan khaimi gulo chiubo pahangga raokhai bamme. Singku Eleazar, Nun nahpiu Joshua, khatdi Israel mai kiphiudung nai kikhundunggu jupaodungniu chamai riak saisuijiu njan khaide.
niu Mose tu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, Jordan tingnulam bambo kiphiu paphantu charam chakiuse taden mataibo

Mose niu Jordan tingbanglam bambo charamse kakibo kiphiu nia paphantu pimasuang mibo-e. (Joseph kaikiktu Manasseh khatdi Ephraim chiujiu kiphiu nialeng thiujiu njan khaide). Chiudi, Mose niu Levi kiphiu maileng charam bam khatnadi pikhai makge. Sibosung matom-kabui nai mily dungtu khairabo piuriangli nai paliuniu lungrabo namdi thiujiu pikhaide.
niu Mose khuga chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu Israel mainiu charamse njan lude.
vangpiu Mose niu atu Kadesh Barnea gasu haibo ram matadra langkhaibo wan-ga I takum atai tangmide. Iniu lungchun masanbo chapaw phung wangjiu pakhuga paokhaide.
Chiudi Iniu tad macham mai siniu aliutu kam kapin khaide. Chiudi Iniu
Iniu sise kamkhaide, palamra Iniu tadkhai mibo ramse anahmai aliu dam thiujiu daosiak rabo-e, chiujiu Mose niu akhuga ladriat thiukhaibo-e.
Chiudi tuhoira, phuilo
Mose niu atu langpadbo wan kumgapjiu thainai tangbo tanbam kha-e. Iniu chari thiuboga maksai wa kakibo ngamdi kam ngam bamkha-e.
Chiusai tuhoira, Iniu khatdi amaidungniu paowangbo nai
Joshua niu Jephunneh nahpiu Caleb tu thoikhai bide khatdi padam thiujiu Hebron gu namdi hai paleng pikhai bide.
Hebron hai Kenizz mai Jephunneh nahpiu Caleb kaikik maigu thiujiu bamkha-e, palamra paniu chamchangjiu Israel mai Rawang,
Haibo masuang, Hebron hai Arba gu namdi chiujiu ku bamniu-e. (Arba hai Anakim gu dithubo thiubam niu-e).
Tuhoira charamse agi-manaijiu bammide.
Pahangga raokhai bambo kumjiu Judah kiphiumai kikhundungniu charamgu padam khat daode:
Tingrunlamse charam nhang kathubo Edom gu ramrai, Zin gu ramjeng katang-e.
Haibogu tingrunlam ramraise Kashaibo Duipui gu tingrunlam pamalan gasu,
Akrabbim Pass tingrunlam gasu Zin katang si-e. Sise Kadesh Barnea tingrunlam kiujiu Hezron tonwang Addar lam khangtangjiu, Karka lam mariwang lujiu,
Azmon wang katang-e, khatdi Egypt gu ramraiga bambo giuky suiwangjiu Mediterranean Duipui katang-e, siga ramrai loikhaide. Sise Judah kiphiugu tingrunlam ramrai si-e.
Tingbang lamgu ramraise Jordan ngutbo maruang bambo pakhiangna gasu Kashaibo Duipui nguttangbo si-e.
Tingpilam ramraise siganiu sujiu
Beth Hoglah katang, khatdi tingpilam Jordan Ramjeng phuikiubo maluang arop mengtangbo-e. Sibosai Bohan gu Tutuong mengtang-e. (Bohan hai Reuben napiu-e),
Chariubo Ramjeng gasu Debir katang, sichiujiu tingpilam kadad wangjiu Gilgal katang, sise Adummim Pass lamphan mariwang tingrunlam ramjeng katang-e. Padlanjiu Enshemesh duipin gasu Enrogel katang-e,

khatdi Hinnom Ramjeng kenpadjiu tingrunlam Jebus maigu namdi Jerusalem gu maluang katang-e. Sibosai ramraise Hinnom Ramjeng tingnulam maluangroi katang mengjiu Rephaim gu Ramjeng tingpilam pamalan katang-e.
Sigasu Nephtoah gu Singgiu kiutangjiu Ephron Luong mungga bambo namdidungga padtang-e. Sigasu Baalah (maksai Kireath Jearim) lam mari khaijiu,
Baalah gu tingnulam magui wangjiu Edom gu maluongram gasu mengjiu Jearim Luong (maksai Chesalon) kiujiu tingpilam mengtang-e, Beth Shemesh lam kiujiu Timna kenpadbo katangbo-e.
Siganiu ramraise Edron gu tingpilam maluang katang padtangjiu Shikkeron lam kadadwang Baalah Luong tonpadjiu Jamnia katang-e. Sise Mediterranean Duipui ga loikhaide,
Siganiu tingnulam ramrai thiukhaide. Haibo ramrai lungga Judah maigu kikhundung lung-e.
Caleb niu Anak kaikik-- Sheshai, Ahiman khatdi Talmai kiriang maitu namdi ganiu hathon mide.
Sigasu paniu Debir ga lungbam maitu aphenra tadde. (Haibo namdi situ Kiriath Sepher chiujiu kubam niu-e).
Caleb niu din-e, “Kiriath Sepher tu haphun lubo maitu Iniu anahpui Achsahtu magiangra pine.”
Othniel, Caleb singna Kenaz nahpiuniu namdise haphun lude, sijeng gasu Caleb niu panahpui Achsah tu magiangra paleng pikhaide.
Magiangbo naise Othniel niu panao khuga, papiu khugasu chalu bamkhat khengraleng matanjiu din sude. Siniu pagu qonniam gasu nkumboga, papiu Caleb niu pah nde lunigulo chiujiu maniude.
Paniu paokakge, “Tadui bambo ajai khat I luni-e. Nangniu aleng pikhaibo charam sira kasangbo dih-e.” Siga Caleb niu nribo khatdi n-hangbo duipinse paleng pikhai bide.
Judah kiphiumai kikhun dungniu paliu dam thiujiu daolubo ramse haide.
Paliugu namdidung tingrunlam dithubo sira Edom gu ramrai mungga bambodungse, Kabzeel, Eder, Jagur,
Kinah, Dimonah, Adadah,
Kedesh, Hazor, Ithnan,
Ziph, Telem, Bealoth,
Hazor Hadattah, Kerioth Hezron (maksai Hazor)
Amam, Shema, Moladah,
Hazzar, Gaddah, Heshmon, Bethpelet,
Hazor Shual, Beersheba, Biziothiah,
Baalah, Iim, Ezem,
Eltolad, Chesil, Hormah,
Ziklag, Madmannah. Sansannah,
Lebaoth, Shilhim, Ain khatdi Rimmon: paliutu lung maguibambo namdakdung jaojiu, namdi pakhiangna makai chakiu-e.
Maluong phiga bambo namdidung sira, Eshtaol, Zorah, Ashnah,
Zonoah, Engannim, Tappuah, Enam,
Jarmuth, Adullam, Socoh, Azekah,
Shaaraim, Adithaim, Gederah khatdi Gederothaim: paliutu lung magui bambo namdakdung jaojiu, namdi kariu madai kiu-e.
Sigasu nkiujiu Zenan, Hadashah, Migdalgad,
Dilean, Mizpah, Joktheel,
Lachish, Bojkath, Eglon,
Cabbon, Lahmam, Chitlish,
Gederoth, Bethdagon, Naamah khatdi Makkedah: paliutu lung magui bambo namdakdung jaojiu, namdi kariu charuk-e.
Libnah, Ether, Ashan,
Iphtah, Ashnah, Nezib,
Keilah, Achzib, khatdi Mareshah: namdi chakiu nai sibo wenjeng ga bambo namdung si-e.
Ekron nai sibo namdakdung nai namdung,
khatdi Ekron gasu Mediterranean Duipui katangbo Ashdod mungga bambo namdidung nai namdakdung pakhiangna-e.
Ashdod nai Gaza, khatdi sibo namdakdung nai namdung, Egypt gu ramrai giuky khatdi Mediterranean Duipui khen mengtangbo-e.
Maluong ramga Shamir, Jattir, Socoh,
Dannah, Kiriath Sepher, (maksai Debir)
Anab, Eshtemoa, Anim,
Goshen, Holon, khatdi Giloh: namdidung kariu khat nai pawonjengga bambo namdakdung chiujiu bamme.
Arab, Dumah, Eshan,
Janim, Beth Tappuah, Aphekah,
Humtah, Hebron, khatdi Zior: namdidung chakiu nai sibo wenjengga bambo namdung chiujiu bamme.
Maon, Carmel, Ziph, Juttah,
Jezreel, Jokdeam, Zanoah,
Kain, Gibeah khatdi Timnah: namdidung kariu nai sibo wenjengga bambodung chiujiu bamme.
Halhul, Bethzur, Gedor,
Maarath, Bethanoth, khatdi Eltekon: namdidung charuk nai sibo wenjengga bambo namdung chiujiu bamme.
Kiriath Baal, (maksai Kiriath Jearim) khatdi Rabbah: namdi nia nai sibo wenjengga bambo namdakdung chiujiu bamme.
Ramjingga Beth Arabah, Middin, Secacah,
Nibshan, Mataigu namdi khatdi Engedi: namdi charuk nai sibo wenjengga bambo namdakdung chiujiu bamme.
Josheph kaikiktu pikhaibo charam tingnulam ramraise Jericho mungga bambo Jordan gasu Jericho duipin dunggu tingbanglam khatdi ramjing katang nguttang-e. Sise Jericho gasu maluongram Bethel katang-e.
Bethel gasu Ataroth Addar tad tonwang Arkhi mainiu lungbo Luz tangbo-e.
Sigasu tingnulam meng Japhlet maigu wenjeng wangbo Beth Horon wenjeng katang-e. Sise Gezer khangjiu Mediterranean Duipui gu pamalan katang-e.
Josheph kaikik Ephraim khatdi tingnulam bambo Manasseh kiphiudungniu haibo ramdungse lude.
Haise Ephraim mai kikhundunggu kadih-e, paliugu ramraise Ataroth Addar tingbang gasu Nribo Beth Horon
sigasu Mediterranean Duipui tangbo-e. Mikhmethah se paliugu tingpilam bamme. Siga tingbanglam ramraise taokuiwang Taanath Shiloh khatdi situ tadken wangjiu Jonoah tingbanglam tangbo-e.
Sibosai Janoah gasu Ataroth khatdi Naarah tangbo, Jericho wangjiu Jordan gu pamalan tangbo-e.
Ramraise Tappuah gasu tingnulam meng Kanah gu giuky katang khatdi Mediterranean Duipui gu pamalan tangbo-e. Haise Ephraim kiphiumai kikhun dung leng paliu dam thiujiu pikhaibo ramdung si-e.
Manasseh gu ramrai lungga bambo namdakdung nai namdung kasiadi Ephraim maitu pikhaiboga jaode.
Chiudi paliuniu Gazer ga lungbambo Canaan maitu hathonmi makge, sijengniu Canaan mainiu Ephraim mai ruangga thainai tangbo lungbamme, chiudi paliutu kavangmai kumjiu manomjiu tatien pithiu khai-e.

Joseph nah katingbo Manasseh kaikik mai kikhundung kasia leng Jordan tingnulam charam pajam khat njankhai bide. Gilead piu Makhir se Manasseh nah tingthubopiu hai riphenmai ruangga kacharatbo khangkhatle, sijengniu Jordan gu tingbanglam bambo Gilead khatdi Bashan se patu pikhaide.

Jordan gu tingnulam masiak bambo ramse Manasseh kikhundung: Abiezer, Helek, Asriel, Shechem, Hepher khatdi Semidah paliuleng pikhaide. Haimaidungse Joseph nahpiu Manasseh kaikikdung-e, sichiujiu paliuniu kikhundunggu papee thiu-e.

Zelophehad hai Hepher piu-e, Hepher hai Gilead piu-e, Gilead hai Makhir piu-e, Makhir hai Manasseh piu-e, Manasseh hai panah npiumai lungmakge, chiudi npuimai nahdung ronna-e. Paliu zanniu Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milkah khatdi Tirzah chiu ku-e.
Paliuniu singku Eleazar khatdi Nun nahpiu Joshua khatdi jupaodung khuga menglujiu din-e, “Aliu riangrui npiumaitu charam njan khaibo kumjiu aliu lengdi pikhai raleng
Sijengniu Jordan tingbanglam Gilead khatdi Bashan ga dam kariu khaisanjiu,
pakiphiu npiumai lengdi npuimai lengdi pikhaibo jengniu mathiu leng njankhai bide. Gilead gu charamse Manasseh kaikik masiak bammai leng pikhaide.
Manasseh ram hai Asher gasu Shechem tingnulam Michmethath tangbo-e. Sichiujiu ramraise tingnulam meng Entappuah maitu jaotang-e.
Tappuah mai bambo ramse Manasseh gu-e chiudi ramraiga bambo Tappuah gu namdise Ephraim kaikik maigu-e.

Sichiujiu ramraise Kanah giuky lam kiutang-e. Paliu hai Manasseh ramga bamtadi giunagu tingnulam namdi dungse Ephraim maigu-e. Manasseh gu ramraise giuna tingpilam khangjiu Mediterranean Duipui gu pamalan tangbo-e.
Ephraim niu tingrunlam khatdi Manasseh niu tingpilam, Mediterranean Duipui siniu panaigu tingnulam gu ramrai thiubo-e. Asher siniu tingpi-tingnulam khatdi Issachar niu tingpi-tingbanglam bamme.

Issachar khatdi Asher gu kadih lungga, Beth Shan khatdi Ibleam, sibo wenjengga bambo namdakdung, Dor di jaojiu, (duinai khen ga bambo) Endor,Taanach, Megiddo khatdi pawonjengga bambo namdakdung hai Manasseh gu-e.
Chiudi Manasseh maidungniu sibo namdidungga lungbam maitu hathon makge. Sijengniu Canaan mai siga lungbam kha-e.
Israel mai pumtan nkiu khangbi bamtadi paliuniu Canaan mai mathiutu hathon makge, chiudi paliuniu simaitu manomjiu paliuleng pijiu tatien thiukhai-e.
Joseph kaikik mainiu Joshua khuga din-e, “Nde kamjiu nangniu aliuleng charam njan khat ronna pikhai gulo?
Joshua niu kenkakge, “Naliu mai kengjiu bamsai, Ephraim gu maluongram hai naliuleng siamjusai, Perizit mai dih nai Rephaim mai dihga tadlujiu naliuleng mariu ramse kam masan lulo.”

Paliuniu kenkakge, “Maluong ramse aliuleng buimakge, chiudi sibo ramjengga bambo Canaan mainiu chagigu chaqon-kari bambo, Beth Shan ga lungmai khatdi sibo wonjengga bambo namdakdung khatdi Jezreel Ramjengga lungmaidi bamme.”
Joshua niu Ephraim nai tingnulam bambo Manasseh kiphiu khuga din-e, “Pachangjiu naliu khang keng-e, khatdi naliu pumtan bamme. Naliu dam khat suang nkiujiu daorabo-e.

Maluongramse naliugu rabo-e. Sise mariuram bamdi kam masanlujiu pamalan khatlam suniu khatlam tangbo lululo. Canaan maidung siniu tanjiu bamtadi, chagigu chaqon-kari bamtadi, naliuniu paliutu hathon lubui-e.”
Charamse paliuniu ngamlubo sai, Israel mai mathiu Shiloh ga maduilujiu
Israel mai kiphiu chinniatu paliu damleng charam pikhai makhabo bamkha-e.
Sijeng gasu Joshua niu Israel mai khuga din-e. “Naliu pao-peh Rawang
Kiphiu hinagasu chamai khangsum jam akhuga pibam khailo. Paliu dam thiujiu paliuniu lunibo ram pakhiangna awa ajan raleng Iniu paliutu langkhaine. Sichiujiu paliu akhuga malanwang rabo-e.
Charamse paliu ruangga dam chinnia thiujiu njanpad sune, Judah niu tingrunlam khatdi Joseph niu tingpilam chiujiu lurabo-e.
Haibo jan chinnia raha raolujiu akhuga phungwanglo. Sigasu Iniu aliu Rawang,
Levi kiphiu maira charam masiak bambose naliu nai padam lulakge, palamra paliu dam sira
Joshua niu haichiu dinkhaiboga paliuniu charamse awa ajanra tadmide: “Tadlujiu charam pakhiangna awa-ajan lujiu akhuga malan wanglo. Sichiujiu Iniu Shiloh haiga

Sichiujiu maidung siniu charam pakhiangnaga tadkhaide, khatdi paliuniu dechiujiu sise padam chinnia thiujiu njan ralo chiubo kampad lujiu namdak rammaitu paliang thiujiu raokiu khaide. Sigasu paliuniu Shiloh ga bambo rijibam Joshua khuga malan wangde.
Joshua niu
Benjamin kiphiumai kikhun lengse charamse raiboga pikhaira mide. Paliu ram hai Judah mai Joseph kiphiu kania kakga bamme.
Paliugu ramraise tingpilam Jordan gasu Jericho gu tingpilam pakhan thiubo maluang ram chiujiu Bethaven gu ramjing katang-e.
Sibosai ramraise Luz (Bethel di ku-e) gu tingrunlam pabekki masuk kiujiu Ataroth Addar ga kiujiu, Nhangbo Beth Horon gu tingrunlam kiu katang-e.
Sigasu ramraise haibo luong tingnu lamsu tingrunlam kadadwang Judah kiphiugu thiubambo Kiriath Baal (maksai Kiriath Jearim) katang-e. Haisiniu tingnulam gu ramrai-e.
Tingrunlam gu ramraise Kiriath Jearim mungkhen ga sujiu Nephtoah gu Duipin-ga mengtang-e.

Sibosai Rephaim Ramjeng pamalan tangbo, tingpilam Hinnom Ramjeng ganiu phuipad ngaobo maluang phibang kiutangbo-e. Sigasu Jebus luong aropgu tingrunlam Hinnom Ramjeng kenpadjiu tingrunlam Enrogel kiu katang-e.
Sibosai tingpilamsu kadadwang Enshemesh katang khatdi Adummin Pass masuang Geliloth tangbo-e. Sibosai ramraise Bohan gu Tusom kiutang-e. (Bohan hai Reuben nahpiu khatle),
khatdi Jordan Ramjeng phuikiubo tingpilam maluang arop katangbo-e. Sibosai ramjenglam tadpadjiu
Beth Hoglah gu maluang arop tingpilam kenjiu Jordan Giuki ngutkhaibo Kashaibo Duipui mungkhen tingpilam loikhaide. Haisiniu tingrun lamgu ramrai-e.
Jordan siniu tingbang lamgu ramrai-e. Haidungse Benjamin kiphiumai kikhundungniu paliu dam thiujiu daolubo charamgu ramrai si-e.
Benjamin kiphiumai kikhundunggu namdidung sira Jericho, Beth Hoglah, Emek Keziz,
Beth Arabah, Zemaraim, Bethel,
Avvim, Parah, Ophrah,
Chepharammoni, Ophni, khatdi Geba: namdidung kariunia nai sibo wenjengga bambo namdakdung haisi-e.
Gibeon, Ramah, Beeroth,
Mizpah, Chephirah, Mozah,
Rekem, Irpeel, Taralah,

Zela, Haeleph, Jebus, (maksai Jerusalem), Gibeah khatdi Kireath Jearim: namdidung kariu madai nai pawonjengga bambo namdakdung haisi-e. Haise Benjamin kiphiugu kikhundungniu paliu dam thiujiu daolubo ramdung si-e.
Niaboga Simeon kiphiumai kikhundung leng pikhai-e. Sibo ramse Judah kiphiuleng pikhai mibo ramrai mengtang-e.
Sise Beersheba, Sheba, Moladah
Hazor, Shual, Balah, Ezem,
Eltolad, Bethul, Hormah,
Ziklag, Beth, Marcaboth, Hazor Susah,
Beth Lebaoth khatdi Sharuhen: namdidung kariusum nai sibo wenjengga bambo namdakdung si-e.
Ain, Rimmon, Ether, khatdi Ashan: namdi madai nai sibo wenjengga bambo namdakdung chiujiu bamme.
Haise sibo namdidunggu wenjengga bambo pakhiangna jaojiu tingrunlam Baalath Beer (maksai Ramah) katang mengtang-e. Simeon kiphiumai kikhun dungniu paliu dam thiujiu lulubo charamse haide.
Judah leng pikhai mibo dihse paliuleng buibo suang dibi mibo jengniu charam kasia Simeon kiphiuleng pikhai mide.
Sumboga siniu Zebulun kiphiumai kikhundung leng-e. Paliuniu daolubo ramse Sarid katang-e.
Sigasu ramraise Dabbesheth khatdi Jokneam tingbanglam giuna niatao lujiu tingnulam Mareal mengtang-e.
Sarid gu kakibo lamphan suniu Chisloth Tabor tingbanglam gu ramrai padtangjiu Daberath khatdi Japhia katang-e.
Sigasu tingbanglam wanglanjiu Gath Hepher khatdi Ethkazin, sigasu Rimmon npui ganiu Neah lam kadad wang-e.
Tingpilam Ramraise Hannathon lam kadadwang Iphtahel Ramjengga loikhaide.
Sise Katath, Nahalal, Shimron, Idalah, khatdi Bethlehem: namdi kariunia nai pawonjengga bambo namdidung chiujiu jao-e.
Haibo namdidung khatdi paliugu namdakdungse Zebulun kiphiumai kikhundungniu paliu dam thiujiu daolubo ramdung si-e.
Madaiboga siniu Issachar kiphiumai kikhundung leng-e.
Sibo ramdungse Jezreel, Chesulloth, Shunem,
Hapharaim, Shion, Anaharath,
Rabbith, Kishion, Ebez,
Remeth, Engannim, Enhaddah khatdi Bethpazzez chiujiu jao-e.
Ramrai sidi Tabor, Shahazumah, khatdi Beth Shemesh niataojiu Jordan ga mengtang-e. Sise namdi kariu charuk nai sibo wenjengga bambo namdakdung chiujiu jao-e.
Haibo namdidung khatdi paliugu namdakdungse Issachar kiphiumai kiriangniu paliu dam thiujiu daolubo ramdung si-e.
Mangiuboga siniu Asher kiphiumai kikhundung leng-e.
Sibo ramdungse Helkath, Hali, Beten, Achshaph,
Allam Melech, Amad, khatdi Mishal chiujiu jao-e. Tingnulam niu Carmel khatdi Shihor Libnath niatao-e.
Sise tingbanglam kadadwangjiu, ramraise Bethdagon meng tangjiu, Zebulun niataojiu khatdi Bethemek nai Neiel npui tingpilam Iphtahel Ramjeng niatang-e. Sise tingpilamsu kiulanjiu Kabul,
Ebron, Rehob, Hammon khatdi Kanah mengtangjiu Sidon katang-e.
Sibosai ramraise Ramah lam kadad wangjiu charireng thiukhai bambo Tyre namdi mengtang-e, sigasu Hosah lam kadadwang lanjiu Mediterranean Duipuiga loikhaide, Sise Mahalab, Achzib,
Ummah, Aphek khatdi Rehob: namdi makai nia nai sibo wenjengga bambo namdakdung chiujiu jao-e.
Haibo namdidung khatdi namdakdungse Asher kiphiumai kikhundungniu paliu dam thiujiu daolubo ramdung si-e.
Charukboga siniu Naphtali kiphiumai kikhundung leng-e.
Sibo ramraise Heleph gasu Zaanannim ga subo nphubang katang, sigasu Adaminekeb ganiu Jamnia chiujiu Lakkum katang mengtang-e sise Jordan ga loikhaide.
Siga ramraise tingnulam kadadwangjiu Aznoth Tabor gasu tingrunlam Zebulun niataojiu Hukkok gasu tingnulam Asher khatdi tingbanglam Jordan katang-e.
Charireng thiukhaibo namdidung sira Ziddim, Zer, Hammath, Rakkath, Chinnereth,
Adamah, Ramah, Hazor,
Kedesh, Edrei, Enhazor,
Yiron, Migdalel, Horem, Bethanath, khatdi Beth Shemesh: namdidung kariu chakiu nai sibo wenjengga bambo namdakdung si-e.
Haibo namdidung khatdi paliugu namdakdung hai Naphtali kiphiumai kikhundungniu paliu dam thiujiu daobo ramdung si-e.
Chinniaboga siniu Dan kiphiumai kikhundung leng-e.
Sibo ramdungse Zorah, Eshtaol, Irshemesh,
Shaalbim, Aijalon, Ithlah,
Elon, Timnah, Ekron,
Eltekeh, Gibbethon, Baalath,
Jehud, Beneberak, Gathrimmon,
Mejarkon khatdi Rakkon mengtangjiu Joppa wenjeng sidi jao-e.

Dan mainiu paliu ram hamibo wan-ga paliuniu Laish ga tadlujiu sisetu chari aphende. Paliuniu sise haphun lujiu sibo maidungtu kamshat mide, khatdi sise paliugu thiujiu lumide. Paliuniu siga lungwang lujiu namdi zan Laish kubo gasu paliu pao Dan zan lujiu Dan chiujiu mathak khaide.
Haibo namdung khatdi namdakdungse Dan kiphiumai kikhundungniu paliu dam thiujiu daobo ramdung si-e.
Israel maidungniu charam njanloi wangbo tingga, paliuniu Nun nahpiu Joshua leng charam pajam khat pikhai-e.
niu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu paniu khengbo: Ephraim maluang ramga bambo namdi Timnath Serah se paliuniu paleng pikhaide. Paniu namdise thiusulan lujiu siga lungde.
Singku Eleazar, Nun nahpiu Joshua khatdi Israel mai kiphiu kikhundungtu jupaodung siniu Shiloh ga,
Israel mai khuga paokhai raleng din-e. “Iniu Mose tu naliu khuga dinkhaibo chamtan kumjiu nbekhaibo namdi kada khailo.
Mai khatniu chamao chameng ganiu maitu kamshat lujiu siga pakwang misai chakhum ruira phiukinmai khugasu duaklu rabo-e.

Haibo namdidung khatga paniu paktad lujiu namdi lungga bambo ladjan bamga tadlo khatdi jupaodung khuga padmibo lamga din masan khailo. Sichiusai paliuniu patu namdiga pi ngutkhai lujiu patu lungrabo bam pikhaibo sune, chiusai paniu siga bamlu bui-e.

Wagaje siga chakhum luramainiu patu hawangsai namdiga bammainiu uina ben-ga patu benlen khaimak rabo-e. Paliuniu patu gukhai rabo-e. Palamra paniu chamaitu palung pombo ganiu makjiu chamao chameng gasuniu kamshat mibo-e.

Paniu sibo namdiga mathiugu ladjan daomak then khatdi Dibo Singku thiubambo mai siniu shai makthen bamrabo-e. Sichiujiu sibo mai siniu paniu paktad mibo pagu namdakga malan wangjiu pakyga lunglanbo sui-e.”
Sijengniu, Jordan gu tingnulam Galilee ga Kadesh, Naphtali maluang ramga Ephraim gu ramluonggen Shechem ga, khatdi Judah gu ramluonggen Hebron chiujiu paliuniu kadakhaide.
Jordan gu tingbanglam, pakhagen thiubo Jericho tingbanglam paliuniu Reuben gu kadih Bezer, Gad dih Gilead ga Ramoth khatdi Manasseh dih Bashan ga Golan chiujiu kadakhai-e.

Haidungse Israel mai mathiu leng khatdi sangdiumai paliu ruangga lungbam maidung leng nbekhaibo namdidung thiujiu kadakhaibo-e. Mai khatniu chamao chameng ganiu mai khattu kamshat misai chakhum ruira phiubammai gasu, siga gukhaibo daolune, paniu mathiugu ladjan daomak then patu kamshat mak rabo-e.
Levi mai kikhun gu jupaodung siniu singku Eleazar, Nun nahpiu Joshua khatdi Israel mai kiphiu kikhun gu jupaodung mathiu khuga tadle.
Canaan ram Shiloh ga bammai paliu khuga din-e “Aliuniu lungrabo namdi rammai nai sibo wenjengga aliugu khaorui lungra piuriangli chiujiu aliutu pira
gu chamtan saisuijiu, Israel mainiu paliu ram gasu namdidung kasia khatdi piuriangli kasia chiujiu Levi mai kiphiu leng pikhaide.

Levi mai kikhundung gasu Kohath kiriang maitu namdidungse pirai thurabo bamniu-e. Singku Aaron kaikik gasu lungwangbo kikhundungtu Judah, Simeon khatdi Benjamin gu kadih gasu namdi kariu-je-sum pikhaide.
Masiak bambo Kohath kiriang maitu Ephraim, Dan khatdi tingnulam Manasseh dih gasu namdi kariu pikhaide.
Gerson kiriang maitu Issachar, Asher, Naphtali khatdi tingbanglam Manasseh dih gasu namdi kariu-je-sum pikhaide.
Merari kiriang maidungtu Reuben, Gad khatdi Zebulun dih gasu namdi kariu-je-nia pikhaide.
Taden thonjiu,
Haibo namdidungse Judah nai Simeon ram gasu Levi kaikik gasu Kohath kiriangmai thiubo Aaron kaikik maileng
pikhai mibo namdi si-e. Paliu dam hai pikhai raithu rabo-e.
Paliutu Judah gu maluanggen lam bambo Arba namdi (Arba hai Anak piu-e), tuhoi Hebron kubo hai khatdi situ maguibambo piuriangli chiujiu pikhai-e.
Chiudi namdigu luzamdung nai sibo namdakdung chiujiu Jephunneh nahpiu Caleb leng padam thiujiu pikhai mibo-e.
Hebron riga khaisanjiu (nbekhaibo namdi dungga khat) pahangga bambo namdidungse singku Aaron kaikiktu: Libnah,
Jattir, Eshtemoa,
Holon, Debir,
Ain, Juttah khatdi Beth Shemesh nai paliugu piuriangli, Judah khatdi Simeon kiphiudung gasu namdi chakiu jaojiu pikhaide.
Benjamin gu kadih gasu namdi madai: Gebeon, Geba,
Anathoth khatdi Almon nai paliugu piuriangli jaojiu pikhaide.
Pakhiangna namdi kariusum nai paliugu piuriangli jaojiu Aaron kaikik singkudungtu pikhaide.
Ephraim gu kadih gasu namdi kasiase Kohath kiriangmai kakibo Levi mai kiphiuleng pikhai bide.
Paliutu namdi madai: Ephraim maluang ramga bambo Shechem khatdi sibogu piuriangli (nbekhaibo namdidungga khat) Gezer,
Kibzaim khatdi Beth Horon nai paliugu piuriangli jaojiu pikhaide.
Dan ram gasu paliutu namdi madai: Eltekeh, Gibbethon
Aijalon, khatdi Gathrimmon nai paliugu piuriangli jaojiu pikhai bide.
Tingnu Manasseh ram gasu paliutu namdi nia: Taanach khatdi Gathrimmon nai paliugu piuriangli jaojiu pikhai bide.
Haibo Kohath kiphiu mai kikhun dungniu daolubo pakhiangna namdi kariu nai paliugu piuriangli chiujiu jao-e.
Kakibo Levi maibao Gerson kydung mainiu tingbang Manasseh ram gasu namdi nia: Bashan ga bambo Golan (nbekhaibo namdidungga khat) khatdi Beeshterah nai paliugu piuriangli jaojiu daode.
Issachar dih gasu paliuniu namdi madai: Kishion, Daberath
Jarmuth khatdi Engannim nai paliugu piuriangli jaojiu daode.
Asher gu kadih gasu paliuniu namdi madai: Mishal, Abdon,
Helkath, khatdi Rehob, nai paliugu piuriangli jaojiu daode.
Naphtali ram gasu paliuniu namdi sum: Galilee ga bambo Kadesh nai sibogu piuriangli (nbekhaibo namdidungga khat) Hammoth Dor, khatdi Kartan nai paliugu piuriangli jaojiu daode.
Gerson kiriangmai, tam-tambo kikhundungniu daolubo pakhiangna namdi kariu sum nai paliugu piuriangli si-e.
Masiak bambo Levi mai, Merari kiriangmainiu Zebulun dih gasu namdi madai: Jokneam, Kartah,
Dimnah khatdi Nahalal nai paliugu piuriangli jaojiu daode.
Reuben dih gasu paliuniu namdi madai: Bezer, Jahaz,
Kedemoth khatdi Mephaath nai paliugu piuriangli jaojiu daode.
Gad kiphiu gasu paliuniu namdi madai: Gilead ga bambo Ramoth nai pagu piuriangli (nbekhaibo namdidungga khat) Mahanaim,
Heshbon khatdi Jazer, nai paliugu piuriangli jaojiu daode.
Sichiujiu Merari kiriangmaitu pikhaibo pakhiangna namdi kariunia-je-kiu-e.
Israel maidung ram thiubambo gasu, namdi pakhiangna atai tachad nai sibo wenjengga bambo piuriangli jaojiu Levi mai kiphiu leng pikhaide.
Sichiujiu
Paliu pao-pehmai khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo kumjiu
Paniu Israel mai khuga ladriat thiukhaibo hina
Sichiujiu Joshua niu Reuben, Gad, khatdi tingbang Manasseh kiphiu dungtu ku aruang-e.
Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “
Naliu niu wadao khatnadi naliu phenmai--Israel maitu phutmi makge. Naliu niu
Tuhoira, paniu ladriat thiukhaibo kum,
Mose niu naliutu chamtan pibo tacheng-tajai majaisiak lulo:

Joshua niu paliutu pagu thoidam khatdi haibo ladkengdung pikhaijiu paliu kylam langkhai mide: “Naliuniu naliugu mikremai khugasu daolubose naliu kiphiu nai naliu phenmaitu padam lu machamlo.” Sichiujiu paliuse paliu kylam wangmide.
Mose niu Manasseh kiphiumai paphan khattu Jordan tingbanglam charam pikhaide, chiudi kakibo paphan khattu kiphiu katammai jaojiu Jordan tingnulam dih pikhaide.
Sijengniu Reuben, Gad khatdi tingbang Manasseh kiphiumai siniu paliu kylam malanwang mide. Paliuniu Canaan ram Shiloh ga masiak bambo Israel maitu saodiak lujiu
Reuben, Gad khatdi tingbang Manasseh kiphiudungniu Geliloth wangtangbo wan-ga Jordan tingnulam bambo tinggasu paliuniu lungchun niataobogu kadibo rathakbam khat singgiu mungga thiukhaide.
Masiak bambo Israel mai khuga din-e, “Nkinglo! Jordan aliu genlam, Geliloth ga Reuben, Gad khatdi tingbang Manasseh kiphiu mainiu rathakbam khat thiukhaide.”
Israel mainiu haise chiuluboga, tingbanglam kiphiu dungtu atungjiu chari thiura paliu mathiu Shiloh ga wang maduide.
Sichiujiu Israel mainiu singku Eleazar nahpiu Phinehas tu Gilead ramga bambo Reuben, Gad khatdi tingbang Manasseh kiphiudung khuga langkhaide.
Kiriang hinagu kikhun hinagu jupao khat-khat, tingnulam kiphiu hina gasu khang khat-khat, sichiujiu jupaodung khang kariu chiujiu Phinehas sai suitadle.
Paliuniu Gilead ramga bambo Reuben, Gad, khatdi tingbanglam Manasseh mai khuga meng-e.
Sichiujiu
Peor ga,
Naliuniu tuhoira pasai suita mira dama? Thainai naliuniu
Sichiusai tuhoira, naliu ramga kahum raleng buimaksai pagu Mathenky bambo
Zerah nahpiu Achan niu dechiujiu suimakbo maniadung lamga chamtan piumak gulo chiubo maningtao khailo, sijengniu Israel mai jat hinatu sajai pikhaide. Achan paronna panuan jengniu shai makge.”
Reuben, Gad, khatdi tingbang Manasseh kiphiu mainiu tingnulam kiphiu dunggu jupao dungtu kenkakge:
“Ngamkambose Tingwang si-e! Pase
Aliuniu
Makge! sise aliuniu tenbo lamra pasai kana naliu kaikik mai dungniu aliu kaikik dungtu; Israel mai Rawang,
Paniu naliu Reuben khatdi Gad mai aliu kakga Jordan niu ramrai thiukhai-e. Naliuniu
Sichiujiu aliuniu charathiu raleng maksai wakadkhai raleng makjiu,
chiudi aliu saiga lungwangrabo aliu maidung nai naliu maidung kakga madan thiura, aliuniu rathakbam khat thiukhai-e, haise pachang siakbora aliuniu
Sise aliu chun makumme, sisera haikumbo pad dasai aliu kaikik maidungniu din-e; ‘Phuilo! Aliu pao-peh mainiu
Aliuniu pachang siakjiu

Singku Phinehas khatdi pasai suibo nammaigu jupaomai khang kariu, tingnulamgu kiphiumai kikhun maigu papee thiumaidung siniu Reuben, Gad, khatdi tingbang Manasseh maidungniu dinbo hai chiulujiu paliu lung kimmide.
Singku Eleazar nahpiu Phinehas niu paliu khuga din-e, “Tuhoira
Sigasu Phinehas khatdi jupaodungse Gilead ramga Reuben khatdi Gad maitu saodiak lujiu Canaan lam, Israel mai khuga malan wangjiu paliu khuga paokhaide.
Israel maidung paliu chun kimmide khatdi Tingwang tu thuonde. Paliuniu Reuben khatdi Gad mainiu lungbambo ramga tadlujiu chari thiujiu kam maha raleng dinlan tamide.
Reuben khatdi Gad mainiu din-e, “Haibo rathakbam siniu aliu mathiu khuga
Pawan katheng saiga
sijeng gasu paniu Israel mai mathiu, kating maidung, jupaodung, ladjan paodung khatdi maidunggu chakampaodungtu kuwang lujiu din-e, “Tuhoira I tingsui mide.
Naliu jengniu haibo jat mathiutu
Masiak khai bambo dih, masuang Iniu ngamlubo jat pakhiangnadi khatdi tingbanglam Jordan Giuki gasu tingnulam Mediterranean Duipui tangbo, Iniu naliu kiphiu mai mathiu dam pikhai mide.
naliu Rawang niu paliutu naliu khugasu pi malan khai rabo-e, khatdi naliuniu chari hangutboga paniu paliutu hathon khai sune.
Sijengniu Mose gu tacheng-tajai khuangga raokhai bambose piura khatdi pakhiangnase kamra manang silulo. Sise wa khatnadi wathao thiumakbo thiutulo.

Sigasu naliu ruangga masiak bammaidungtu aruangbo maksai paliu radung zan dinbo, maksai ladriat thiuboga sibo zandung thinpiubo maksai sibo radungtu kahumbo maksai siga makhum kiubo thakse kammak rabo-e.
Sibosung, tuhoi tangbo naliuniu bambo kumjiu,
Naliuniu chari hangutboga
Naliu, mai khatniu chamai sang khattu pipak khai ngamme, palamra
Sichiusai
Naliuniu malum makjiu naliu ruangga masiak bambo jatdungtu aruangjiu paliutu magiang dasai,
naliuniu chari hangutboga maomakjiu
“Tuhoira shai raleng ating hai nawang mide, Naliu mai hinaniu naliu hiuna nai naliu lungchun ga
Sichiudi paniu naliu khuga ladriat thiukhaibo hina majaibo kumgapjiu paniu wahina kamkhai sune.
Naliuniu

Joshua niu Israel mai kiphiu mathiutu Shechem ga majangwang madui-khaide. Paniu katingmai, jupaomai, ladjanmai khatdi Israel maigu chakampaodung mathiutu ku aruangde, sichiujiu paliuniu Tingwang bambo bamga wangde.
Joshua niu paliu mathiu khuga din-e, “
Sichiujiu naliu pao-peh mai Abraham tu Euphrate majupadbo ram gasu Canaan ram pakhiangnaga pikhaijiu patu Iniu jukhai bide. Iniu pakai-pakik kengjiu pikhaibide. Iniu patu Isaac pikhaibide,
khatdi Isaac tu Jacob nai Esau pikhai bide. Iniu Esau tu Edom gu maluongram padam thiujiu pikhai bide, chiudi naliu pao-pehmai Jacob khatdi panahmainiu Egypt lam tadmide.
Pasai Iniu Mose khatdi Aaron tu langkhaide, khatdi Iniu Egypt mai riga chariu magenthiubo piwang khaide. Chiudi Iniu naliutu jupad khaide,
Iniu naliu pao-pehmaitu Egypt gasu maluang pad khaide, khatdi Egypt maidungniu paliugu chaqon-karidung nai chaqon rimainiu paliutu hade. Chiudi naliu pao-peh mainiu Kahengbo Duipui wangtangbo wan-ga,

paliuniu akhuga nkhakhai raleng kapde, khatdi Iniu paliu nai Egypt mai kakga tamiubo pikhaide. Iniu Duipui tu pijiu Egypt mai riga luangwang khaijiu paliutu taduiniu kahakshat mide, Iniu Egypt maitu nde kamkhaimi gulo chiubo naliuniu si-e.’
“ ‘Pawan kathengkha naliu ramjingga lungkhai mide.

Sichiujiu Iniu naliutu Jordan tingbanglam lungkinbo Amor mai ramga maluang wang khaibode. Paliuniu naliutu chari aphende, chiudi naliuniu paliutu ngamra Iniu pikhaide. Naliuniu paliu ram lulude, khatdi naliuniu chari thiu ngutboga Iniu paliutu kam maha khaide.
Sichiujiu Moab gu chawang Zippor nahpiu Balak niu naliutu atungjiu chari thiu-e. Paniu Beor nahpiu Balaam khuga chalad langkhaijiu naliu riga siangkhai raleng pakhuga din-e.
Chiudi Iniu Balaam lad nking khai makge. Sijeng gasu paniu naliutu thoidam pikhai-e, khatdi haichiujiu Balak khugasu Iniu naliutu rankhaide.
