Naliuniu Jordan kenjiu Jericho wangtangde. Amor mai, Perizit mai, Canaan mai, Hittit mai, Girgash mai, Hiv mai, khatdi Jebus mainiu kambo kumjiu Jericho mainiu naliutu atungjiu chari thiu-e. Chiudi paliu mathiutu naliuniu ngamra Iniu pikhaide.
Naliuniu chari thiu ngutboga, Iniu Amor maigu chawang khangniatu hathon padlu raleng kam charen khaibi-e. Naliu heng nai tavaipi siniu paliutu situ wadi kamngam lurabo ha-e.

Naliuniu wadaodi tenmakbo ram khatdi naliuniu wadaodi thiumakbo namdidung Iniu naliutu pikhaide. Tuhoira naliu siga lungbamme, khatdi naliuniu lingmakbo mumken gasu mumsy khatdi naliuniu lingmakbo takibang gasu takisy tiubamme.’”
Joshua niu dinlan-e, “Sichiujiu tuhoidi,

Wagaje naliuniu patu machanimak sai, naliu pao-peh mainiu Mesopotamia ga kahumbo radungtu maksai naliuniu tuhoi lungbambo Amor maigu radungtu naliuniu saotu macharalo chiubo kada lulo. Aky khunmai nai Ira,
Maidungniu paokakge, “Aliu wadaodi kakibo ratu macha raleng

aliu Rawang niu aliu pao-pehmai nai aliutu Egypt ga kavang thiubambo gasu majangpad khaibide, khatdi paniu kamkhaibo tasibodungse aliuniu ngaode. Aliuniu tadken wangbo jat mathiuruang gasu paniu aliutu gukhaijiu jukhaide.
Aliuniu charithiu ngutboga
Joshua niu maidung khuga din-e, “Chiudi naliuniu
khatdi naliuniu sangdiumai ratu machajiu patu phutmisai paniu kadadwang naliutu atungjiu sajai pisune. Paniu karai masuangga wijiu kamkhai bamdi paniu naliutu kam mahami sune.”
Maidungniu Joshua khuga din-e, “Makge! Aliuniu
Joshua niu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliuniu
“Yo, aliuniu jengdin thiu-e,” chiujiu paliuniu din-e.
“Chiusai naliu khuga bambo sangdiumaigu radungse thonmilo, naliuniu Israel mai Rawang,
Maidung siniu Joshua khuga din-e, “Aliuniu
Sijeng gasu Joshua niu sibo nai maidungtu ladriat thiu khai-e, khatdi Shechem ga paniu tacheng-tajai majai raleng paliutu pikhaide.
Joshua niu haibo chamtandung Tingwang gu Tacheng-tajai gu ariakkhuangga raokhai-e. Sichiujiu paniu tatukang kadibo khoilujiu nphubang hangga
Paniu maidung mathiu khuga din-e, “Haibo tusomniu aliugu jengdin thiurabo-e.
Sibosai Joshua niu maidungtu langkhai mide, siga mai hina param ramga malan wang mide.
Sibosai,
Paliuniu patu Gaash Luong tingpilam Ephraim gu maluongram Timnath Serah ga bambo pagu kadihga baikhai mide.
Joshua niu ringbam then Israel mainiu
Aaron nahpiu Eleazar shai mide khatdi panahpiu Phinehas tu pikhaibo Ephraim gu ramluongga bambo Gibeah ga patu baikhai mide.
Joshua shai mibo saiga Israel mainiu

Judah kaikik mainiu Simeon kaikikmai khuga din-e, “Aliutu pikhaibo kadihga aliu nai ngut nchamkhe, khatdi aliuniu Canaan maitu charithiu machamkhe. Sigasu naliu damleng pikhaibo kadihga aliudi tad macham rabo-e.
Siniu Simeon kaikikmai nai Judah kaikikmai chariga tad ncham mide.
Paliuniu siga Adonibezek tu adaode, siga patu atungjiu aphende,
Paniu pak mijiu paliuniu patu hameng minlude, khatdi paben jungpui nai paphi jungpui danmide.

Adonibezek niu din-e, “Chawangmai riak chinniatu paliu ben jungpui nai paliu phi jungpui hina dan lujiu agu wakai hangga khai nbamme. Tuhoira Iniu paliu riga kamkhaibo kumjiu Tingwang niu ariga kamkhai bamde.” Patu Jerusalem ga majang wangjiu, siga pah shaikhai mide.
Judah maidungniu Jerusalem tu haphun lude. Paliuniu sibo namdiga bambo maidungtu kamshat lujiu namdise ruthon mide.
Sibo saiga paliuniu maluong dihga, maluong phibangga khatdi tingrunlam kasangbo kadihga lungbo Canaan maitu chari thiura tadmide.
Paliuniu Canaan maidung lungbambo Kiriath Arba chiujiudi kubo Hebron namditu atungjiu charithiu ngut sude. Siga paliuniu Sheshai, Ahiman, khatdi Talmai kiphiudungtu kamkao lude.
Sigasu Judah maidungniu sibo tingga Kiriath Sepher kubo, Debir namditu atungjiu charithiu ngutde.
Paliu ruangga Caleb chiu kubo mai khatniu din-e, “Kiriath Sepher tu haphunjiu chari ngamlubo maitu anahpui Achsah tu pijiu panao thiukhaine.
Caleb saikariupiu, Kenaz nahpiu, Othniel niu namdise haphun lude. Sijeng gasu Caleb niu panahpui Achsah tu pijiu panao thiukhaide.
Othniel niu panaotu magiangbo nai matanjiu papiu khuga chalu khat khengraleng panao khuga dinde. Sibo puiniu pagu qonniam gasu nkumde, siga Caleb niu nang nde lunilo chiujiu maniu-e.
Paniu kenkakge, “Iniu tadui bambo ajai kasia luni-e. Nangniu aleng pikhaibo kadihse kasangbo kadih-e.” Sijeng gasu Caleb niu paleng nribo nai n-hangbo ajaise pikhaide.
Mose pao kaikik, Keni mainiu Judah kaikik maitu majang lujiu kadanbang namdi Jericho gasu Judah ga bambo Arad gu tingrunlam patam kahabo kadihga wangde. Siga paliuniu Amalek mai ruangga lungkhaide.

Judah maidungniu Simeon maidungtu majang lujiu tad machamme, paliu aruanglujiu Zephath gu namdiga lungbambo Canaan maitu kam ngamlude. Paliuniu namditu tasiang pikhaijiu sisetu kam masa mide, khatdi situ Hormath

niu Judah maitu nkha khaibi-e, chiujiu paliuniu maluongdih lulude. Chiudi paliuniu Gaza, Ashkelon, maksai Ekron khatdi sisetu lung maguibo kadih situ haphun lumakge. Haibo duipui mungga lungbo maidungra chagigu chaqon-kari bamme, sijeng gasu, Judah maidungniu paliutu hapad ngamlu makge.
Mose niu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, Anak kaikik thiujiu lungwangbo kiriang sumtu hathon mibo, Caleb tu Hebron pikhai bide.
Chiudi Benjamin kaikik mainiu Jerusalem ga lungbambo Jebush maitura hathon makge, siniu Jebush maidungra sibo wan gasu haichiujiu Benjamin mai ruangga lungjiu bamme.
Ephraim nai Manasseh kiphiuniu sibo tingdaora Luz kubo, Bethel namditu charithiu sude.
paliuniu chamai khangkhat tadpadbo ngao lujiu pakhuga maniu-e, “Namdiga ndechiusai ngutlu ralo chiubo dinlen khailo. chiusai aliuniu natu kam masa lakge.”
Sijengniu paliu khuga paniu dinlen khaibi-e, siga Ephraim nai Manasseh mainiu sinapiu nai pakikhunmai maitu makjiu namdiga bammai hinatu kamshat kam mide.
Pasai paniu Hitt mai dihlam tadlujiu namdi khatga chaky thiukhai-e, situ Luz ku-e, sise nthai katangdi sichiujiu kubamme.
Israel maidungniu pumtan thinsu khangboga, paliuniu Canaan maidungtu manomjiu paliu tien pithiu khaide, chiudi paliuniu paliu mathiutu hathon pad lumakge.
Zebulun kiphiu mainiu Kitron nai Nahalal namdiga lungbambo maidungtu hathon padmakge, siniu Canaan maidungniu paliutu majang lungjiu bamme chiudi paliuleng manomjiu pi changam kamme.
Asher kiphiu mainiu Acco, Sidon, Ahlab, Achzib, Helbah, Aphek, khatdi Rehob namdidungga lungbambo maidungtu hathon pad makge.
Asher maidungniu Canaan maitu hathon padlu makbo jenggasu paliutu majang lujiu lung bamme.

Naphtali mainiu Beth Shemesh khatdi Bethanath namdidungga lungbambo maidungtu hathon padlu makge. Naphtali maidungniu Canaan maitu majangjiu lungbamme, chiudi paliutu manomjiu pi paliu ngam kamjiu bamme.
Amor mainiu Dan kiphiutu manomjiu maluong ramga pibam khai-e khatdi paliutu ramjengga pikiu khai makge.

Amor mainiu Aijalon, Shaalbim, khatdi Heres Luongga chiujiu lungbamme, chiudi Ephraim nai Manasseh kiphiu mainiu paliugu mawangbo chengga paliutu khai-e khatdi manomjiu paliutu pi paliu ngam kamjiu bamme.
Edom maigu ramrai haise, Sela gu tingpi gasu kiujiu Akrabbim Pass tangbo-e.

Haibo kadihga lungbambo maidung khuga ladriat wadi naliuniu kam makrabo-e. Naliuniu paliugu rathakbam kamkao siak rabo-e.’ Chiudi Iniu naliu khuga dinkhaibose naliuniu kam makge. Sichiudi naliuniu tamsinbo kamme!

Sijeng gasu naliuniu charithiu ngutboga Iniu nde kamjiu haibo maidungtu hathon pad makjiulo kachiubo tuhoi Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e. Paliuniu naliugu mikremai thiurabo-e, khatdi paliugu charatu kahum raleng naliutu jukhai mirabo-e.”
maza siniu haibo cham dinbo wan-ga, Israel maidung hina kapsu mide,
sichiubo jengniu sibo bamtu Bochim
Joshua niu Israel maidungtu paliu npuilam langkhai mide, khatdi mai hinaniu sibo kadihga padam padam luraleng tadmide.
Joshua niu ringbam thenna Israel maidungniu
vangpiu, Nun nahpiu Joshua hai pagu takum kaikhat-je-kariu tangmiboga shai mide.
Gaash Luong tingpi Ephraim gu maluongram Timnath Serah ga bambo pagu kadihga patu baikhai mide.
Sibo ken ga lungwang maidung pakhiangnadi shaikam mide. Sichiujiu sailam lunglanbo chaken gara Israel maidung leng
Sichiujiu Israel mainiu
Paliutu Egypt gasu majang npadbo Tingwang, paliu paopeh mai Rawang,
Paliuniu
Sijeng gasu
Paliuniu chari thiubo hinaga,
Chiudi
Chiudi Israel mainiu paliugu jupaodungtu wajeng simakge, Israel mainiu
niu Israel maigu jupao pikhai-e,
Chiudi jupaose shaimiboga, nda lunlungga wanglanjiu chaken karaibo suang sa-nkiu lan mide. Paliuniu kakibo ratu kahumjiu macha-e, sichiujiu paliugu kasabo tiense phutmi makge.
Sichiujiu
Joshua shaibo tingga lungbam khabo jatdung tura Iniu hathon lanlakge.
Paliu paopeh mainiu kambo kumjiu paliuniu npuiga tadrama maksai tadmak ralo chiubo phuipad rabo leng Iniu Israel maidungtu thinpiu rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu
Sijeng gasu, Canaan ga charithiu khai makbo Israel maidungtu madiura jat kasiatu
Paniu haikumbo kam khaibo haira charithiubo lamga Israel maigu chaken hinatu kati khaira, parathiujiu masuangga wadaodi charithiu matai makha maileng-e.
Sibo dihga masiak bammai sira, Philistine mai namdi mangiu, Canaan mai hina, Sidon mai khatdi Baal Hermon Luong gasu Hamath Pass katang, Lebanon Luongga lungbambo Hiv maidung haisi-e.
Paliu paopeh Mose khugasu
Sichiujiu Israel maidungniu Canaan mai, Hitt mai, Amor mai, Periz mai, Hiv mai khatdi Jebush maidung ruangga lungkhai mide.
Paliuniu tanao-tanah thiu akinjiu khatdi simai ratu kahumjiu lungsude.
Israel mainiu paliu
Siniu Israel maitu
Sigasu Israel maidungniu
gu hiupuinaniu pariga wangkiu khaide khatdi paniu Israel maigu jupao thiude. Othniel niu chariga tadle, khatdi
Sibo kadihga takum atai agi-manaijiu lungde. Sibosai Othniel shai mide.
Israel mainiu
Eglon niu Ammon mai nai Amalek maitu khat thiu lujiu, paliuniu Israel maitu kamkaojiu, kadanbang namdi Jericho namditu haphun lude.
Israel mai jatniu Eglon hangga takum kariu tachat lung khaide.
Sigasu Israel mainiu
Ehud papum siakniu chaheng munnia bambo kiurang nia paphan thengbo khat kampadle. Paniu sise pafai hang gasu pakhen majadlam phungkin-e.
Sigasu paniu pamai kawibopiu Eglon tu kalen pira thin wang-e.
Ehud niu patu kalen pibo wan-ga paliutu majang wangbo maidungtu paliu kylam malanwang mira leng dinkhaide.
Chiudi Ehud papum siakniu Gilgal khuga bambo tulimki khatga malanwang mide, khatdi Eglon khuga malan menglan lujiu, “Paken Dibopiu, naleng mahinbo champao khat akhuga bamme.”
Sigasu chawang niu “Pavang maidungtu panaitu ronna phudkhai diaklo!” chiujiu aja pikhaide. Sichiujiu paliu mathiu tadpad mide.
Sichiujiu chawangniu pagu agibo kichen-ga paronna ntao bambo lon, Ehud niu pakhuga wangjiu, “Tingwang khugasu wangbo naleng champao khat akhuga bamme.” chiujiu din-e, siga chawang chapkhang-e.
Ehud niu majad jailam bambo hengse paben mawilamniu thadpad lujiu chawang wonpui gase chu taronsuan khai mide.
Chahengse pathen katheng-kadun ngutjiu pa-nden katang ngutjiu pasaniu dangman mide. Ehud niu chahengse chawang wonpui gasu thadpad lan makjiu pasailam kati taron khailu tadmide.
Ehud niu lenlam npadlujiu, nkham namlujiu khatdi tenkhai diak lujiu tadmide.
Sichiujiu pavangmainiu wangboga akhamten khaidiakbo ngao-e, sichiudi paliuniu chawangpiu paronna kalungga mathakjiu bam talakge chiujiu maning-e.
Paliuniu khonlubui then khonjiu bamdi paniu lekhai makge, sigase paliuniu khamten thinlujiu lepadde. Siga paliugu papaopiuse kadihga shaijiu jibam niude.
Paliuniu khuanbambo wan-ga Ehud tadmide. paniu tulimki situ majuwang Seirah lam maren tadmide.
Paniu maluongram Ephraim wangtang lubosai, paniu make mudjiu Israel maidungtu chari thiura kusude; sichiujiu paniu paliutu majang lujiu maluong gasu kiusude.
Paniu din-e, “Asai suilulo! Naliugu mikremai thiu bambo Moab maitu ngamlura
Sibo nai paliuniu chariga withubo Moab mai sang kariu kumbo gilu-e; mai khatnadi paklu makge.
Sibonai Israel mainiu Moab maitu ngamlude, sichiujiu paliu dihga takum riaktachat agi-manaijiu bammide.
Pasaibogu jupaose Anath nahpiu Shamgar si-e. Paniu Philistine mai kai charuk tu matomchi tu kadapbo tangniu kamshatjiu Israel maitu gukhai bide.
Ehud shaimibo sai, Israel maidungniu
Hazor namdiga mawang bambo Canaan maigu chawang, Jabin niu paliutu kam kaora
Jabin hai chagigu chaqon-kari kai chakiu bamme, khatdi paniu Israel maidungtu lungsa makbo khatdi kasabo kamjiu takum makai mawang-e. Siga Israel mainiu kapjiu
Tuhoira Lappidoth nao Deborah haise phaimiukakung khat thiu bamme khatdi Israel maigu ladjanmai khat thiu bamme.
Sibo puiniu maluongram Ephraim dihga Ramah nai Bethel nam kakga kadanbang phiga ntaobam bamme, siga Israel maidungniu siga wangjiu pakhuga tacham maniu-niu-e.
Naikhat sibo puiniu tadlujiu Naphtali lungga bambo Kadesh namdiga, Abinoam nahpiu Barak khuga din-e, “
Jabin gu riphenpi Sisera niu natu atungjiu Kishon Giuki mungga charithiu lengra Iniu majang wangrabo-e. Pagu chaqon-kari nai riphenmai bamrabo-e. Chiudi Iniu natu pariga pijiu charise pingam khaine.”
Siga Barak niu kenkakge, “Nangniu asai suitadne chiusai I tadrabo-e, chiudi nangniu asai suitad lakge sai, Idi tadlakge.”
Sibo puiniu kenkakge, “Sui-e, Iniu natu majang tadne, chiudi nangniu ngamlubo chunwat ngaolakge, palamra
Barak niu Zebulun nai Naphtali kiphiu maitu Kadesh ga kuwang aruangjiu, chamai sang kariu pasai suikin-e. Deborah niu patu majangtad kin-e.
Sibo wan-ga Keni maipiu Heber niu Kadesh mungga bambo Zanannim ga nphubang phiga pagu rijiky thiulu bamme. Pase Mose mekpiu Hobab kaikik ganiu kakibo Keni mairuong gasu tampad mibo-e.
Sisera niu Barak se Tabor Luong riga khang mibo siluboga,
pagu chagigu kari kai chakiu khatdi pamai hinatu kupadle, khatdi Nkengmaigu Harosheth gasu Kishon Giuki lam katang langkhai-e.
Siga Deborah niu Barak khuga din-e, “Tadsulo!
Barak niu pagu riphen maitu majang lujiu asun suboga,
Barak niu chaqon-kari nai Nkengmaigu Harosheth lam riphendungtu hasude, sichiujiu Sisera riphen hinatu kamshat mide, mai khattudi masiak khai makge.
Sisera niu pak nbaijiu Jael rijiky, Ken mai Heber nao khuga wangde, palamra Hazor gu chawang Jabin niu Heber kikhun maitu kawi thiulujiu bamme.
Jael niu Sisera tu adao raleng padlujiu din-e, “Paohubo, ngutlo; agu rijiky hangga wanglulo. Pingtulo.” Siniu pah ngutde khatdi sibo puiniu patu jusung fai hiuga baikhai bide.
Paniu sibopui khuga din-e, “Chalungsajiu tadui atu pisak khailo; I chari mide.” Sibo puiniu chamigi lah lepad lujiu motom-ndui patu pisak khai-e, sichiujiu patu nbailan mide.
Sichiujiu paniu sibopui khuga mathenky kamun ga chap bamlo, khatdi mai khatniu haiga chamai bamma chiujiu nakhuga maniusai, ha-e chiu dinlo chiujiu ladti khai bide.
Sisera sira chariuju mijiu jibing tadmide, sigasu Jael niu kadiak nai ntuang khoilujiu, koina pakhuga wang, papeega gentron phen khaibijiu kadihga shai makhum bam mide.

Barak niu Sisera tu phiuwangboga Jael niu padlujiu patu adaojiu pakhuga din-e, “Haiga wanglo! Nangniu phiukinbo mai situ Iniu dinlen bine.” Siga paniu sibopui saisui ngutle, khatdi siga Sisera se kadihga chafaiky genbo ntuangniu papeega genkhai lujiu shaibam niude.
Sibo nai Tingwang niu Israel maitu Canaan mai wang Jabin tu ngamra pikhaide.
Paliuniu patu matanjiu atung bi-bijiu patu kam maha makthen paliuniu kamsude.
Sibo nai Deborah nai Abinoam nahpiu Barak niu haibo lui thiu-e:
maidungniu chunwijiu paliu pum pipadle.
Kinglo, naliu chawang maidung!
Mawang paodung, naliu chalung ngutjiu kinglo!
Iniu Israel mai Rawang
tarabung gejiu, chalui khat I thiu khaine.
nangniu Edom gu luongriang gasu tadpad miboga kadih hai malai-e,
khatdi tingpuk gasu tingriu kiu-e. Yo, kamuang gasu tadui riukiu khai-e.
khatdi Sinai gu
Anath nahpiu Shamgar gu tingmik nai, Jael gu tingmik nai, sibo kadihga
chaqon-kari tuanglujiu tadken makge, chabin tadmainiu npuikiga tadmakge.
Israel mai namdidung paruang chap bamme,
Deborah, nang wang makthen, paliu pumruang chap bamme,
Israel maileng papui kumjiu, Deborah, I wang-e.
Israel maidungniu kasanbo ratu kada mibo ga, sibo kadihga chari wang-e.
Israel mai chamai sang atai gasu, mai khatniu chagee maksai changiu thinbo bamma?
Alungchun hai Israel maigu jupaodung nai paliu pum pipad maidung khuga bamme.
Qonniam kakabo tuangmai naliu,
chaqon riga ntao bammai khuga sise dinkhai bilo,
naliuniu tadkhai nibo hinaga tadlune.
Kinglo! akhun mungga rio-rio bambo khuanse
maidung khuanniu diam-diamjiu
khatdi Israel mainiu ngamlubo lamga din bamme!
Sichiujiu
Jukhailo, Deborah yo, jukhailo! Jukhailo! Chalui thiujiu jukhailo!
Suanglam tadpad sulo, Abinoam nahpiu Barak,
kavang thiubambo maidungtu jupad khailo!
Siga malumbuibo maidung siniu paliugu jupaodung khuga wang-e;
Benjamin kiphiu maidung saiga, paliuniu Ephraim ramjingga kiu-e.
Charipidung siniu Machir gasu kiu-e.
Issachar gu jupaodungniu Deborah saisui wang-e;
Yo, Issachar wangjiu, Barak di suiwang-e, taning dihga paliuniu pasai suiwang-e.
Chiudi Reuben kiphiutu njan mide; paliu hai tadra tadmakra chapkhailu makge.
Dekamjiu paliu mily ruangga bammi jiulo?
Mily khuanpaoniu kubo khuantu king rama?
Yo, Reuben kaikik mai tura njan mide; paliu hai tadra, tadmakra chaplu makge.
Gad kaikik mainiu Jordan tingbanglam bam mide,
khatdi Dan kaikik maise aliam mungga bam mide.
Asher kaikik mainiu duipui mungga bam mide;
sichiujiu paliuniu taphu mungga lung bamme.
Chiudi Zebulun mai nai Naphtali maira chari bamga lung bamme.
Taanach dih, Megiddo giuky mungga, chawangdungniu wanglujiu chari thiude;
Canaan maigu wangdungniu chari thiude, chiudi paliuniu rangkanggi thintad makge.
Chagandung siniu tingpukga tadjiu, tingpuk lamsu chari thiu-e,
paliuniu Sisera tu atungjiu chari thiu-e.
Kishon giuky katanbo duiliu—Kishon duidet gasu paliutu maten mide.
Iniu pumtan jaojiu, tadngut rabo-e!
Siga chaqondungniu pakwangjiu paliu phiniu kadih taidinjiu bamme.
“Meroz riga tasiang wang milo,” chiujiu
“Siga lungbam mai riga, tasiang bam milo.
Paleng riphenniu aphen khaira wangbo kum,
Pasan withubo puise Jael si-e, Keni mai Heber nao-e—
pasan withubo puise mathenkyga lungbo pui-e.
Sisera niu tadui kheng-e, chiudi sibo puiniu matom ndui pibi-e;
sibo puiniu matom ndui niangse matai kawibo piang ganiu patu pikhai-e.
Sibo puiniu mathenky gu ntuangse ben khatlam,
benkhat lamniu changam kam maigu kadiakse thin-e;
sibo puiniu Sisera tu kadibing khaijiu papee kakhiuroi mide;
sibo puiniu papeese genphut khai mide.
Pah tapuga kadunkiujiu, kaowang sibo pui phiga wangtang mide.
Sibopui phiga kaokiu nkhuangkiu mide; kadihga kaowang shai mide.
Sisera puise kirankiga phui bamme; “Ndekamjiu pagu chaqon-kari wangri jiulo?”
“Ndekamjiu pagu chaqondung malanwang rijiulo?” chiujiu papuiniu maniu-e.
Ningtingthubo puiniu paokakjiu, khatdi paronna chamlamjiu bamme,
“Paliuniu maniadung khoira phiu bamme, khatdi riphen maidung siniu
aliumai khangkhat-khat maksai khangnia-nia pikhaira-e;
tathuak khaibo fai kawibo hinase Sisera leng kada bamme
chawangpuileng chawang kabet pikhai bamme.
Oh
chiudi nakahmaise naimik padkinbo kumjiu benmilo!
Sichiujiu sibo kadihga takum atai agi-manaijiu bammide.
Pakak khatga Israel mainiu
Midian mai hai Israel maisuang tan-hu-e, siniu Israel mai paliutu pingjiu tulimkiga khatdi nbaibam wibo maluongga nbai bamme.
Israel mainiu alin-tara lingbo wan hinaga, Midian mainiu Amalek maitu khatdi ramjingga lungmai kiphiudungtu majang lujiu paliutu charithiu-e.

Paliuniu sibo dihga mathenky thiu lujiu siga alin-tara padbo hina tingrun lam Gaza wonjeng katangbo kam masa mimi-e. Paliuniu mily, matom kabui khatdi qonniamdung khatdi Israel mainiu tiujiu lunglura wadi masiak khai makge.
Paliugu khaorui nai mathenky siniu takaodung kumjiu phuiting-e. Paliugu qontrao kengjujiu pariak sikam lakge. Paliuniu wanglujiu kadih kam masa mide,
Israel mainiu paliu riga wadi kamsilakjiu bamme.
Sichiujiu Israel mainiu
siga paniu paliu khuga phaimiukakung khattu langkhai bide, paniu Israel mai Rawang,

Egypt mai ben gasu khatdi haibo dihga naliutu atungjiu n-gi bammai gasu Iniu naliutu kalan khai bide. Naliuniu charithiu ngutboga Iniu paliutu hathon khaibo-e, khatdi Iniu paliu dihse naliuleng pikhaibo-e.
Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, I hai
Sibosai
gu maza siniu siga patu ngaolen khaijiu din-e, “
Gideon niu pakhuga din-e, “I maniubo suima? paohubo,
Siga
Gideon niu kenkakge, “Chiudi
Gideon niu kenkakge, “Nangniu atu chalungsajiu suikhaisai, nang hai
Iniu naleng katiu phungwangjiu kadpad makthen tadmi khai tulo.”
Paniu din-e, “Nangniu malanwang makthen Iniu khuan bamrabo-e.”

Sijeng gasu Gideon niu pakylam wanglujiu kamipoi khat langlu, khatdi chakhi khai makbo takhui taju kariu khoilu, taruak khuak sude. Paniu katiuse takam lungga khailu, chaganduise chaliga khailu ponwang, nphubang hangga bambo
Kamrabo hinase mazaniu patu dinkhai bide, chami nai taruakse tatukang riga khailo, sichiujiu chagandui sibo riga runkhailo, sikum gapjiu Gideon niu kamkhaide.
Siga
Paniu ngaobose
Chiudi
Gideon niu siga rathakbam khat
Sibo nai nchun
Sibo riga na Rawang,
Siga Gideon niu pavangmai khang kariutu majang lujiu

Namdiga lungmaidungniu pasaibo nai nsuan-son buangsu majilujiu padboga, rathak bamga Asherah khatdi Baal mengse bikao bamniubo, khatdi niabo tomchise siga thiukhai bambo rathak bamga rukhai bamdibo daode.
Paliuniu khat-khat khuga maniu sude, “Saoniu haise kammi gulo?” Paliuniu maniu kaliang wangjiu, sise Joash nahpiu Gideon niu kambo-e chiubo silude.
Siga paliuniu Joash khuga din-e, “Nanahtu haiga majang wanglo, aliuniu patu kamshat mine. Paniu Baal gu rathakbam kam masamide khatdi sibo mungga bambo Asherah gu mengdi bikao mide.”

Chiudi Joash niu patu munsun maidung khuga din-e, “Naliu hai Baal jengniu chap rama? Naliuniu padon ponjiu bamrama? Mai khat kumboniu patu atung-e sai, patu nsuan padmakhaga kamshatmi sune. Wagaje Baal siniu chara-e sai, patu pi paronna kalan lulo. Kamkao kiumibose pagu rathak bamme.”
Sigasu Gideon tu Jerubbaal
Siniu Midia mai, Amalek mai khatdi ramjingga lungmai kiphiu hina wang maduide, Jordan giuky kenpad lujiu, Jezreel gu Ramjengga maduisu mide.
gu hiupuina niu Gideon tu thin manluju paniu make mudkhaijiu Abiezer kiriang maitu pasai suira kukhaide.
Paniu chamai langkhaijiu Manasseh dihga kalungmai hina khugadi pasai suira kukhai-e. Paniu chamai langkhaiboga Asher, Zebulun, khatdi Naphtali kiphiumaidi wangjiu pasai suikam mide.
Siga Gideon niu Tingwang khuga din-e, “Israel maitu rankhaira nangniu atu thinpiu raleng chapkhai mide chiujiu nangniu din-e.

Wide, aliuniu chamiu kabiubo asaiphungga Iniu chakhaogiu fai hamkhai bamme. Sise nsuan susai chakhaogiu fai riga ronna kajikdui kiukhai diaklujiu kadihga kajikdui kiumakge sai, sigase Israel maitu rankhaira nangniu atu thinpiu rabo-e chiubo Iniu silune.”
Sise kumgapjiu padbam niu-e. Pasaibo nai nsuan-son sulujiu Gideon niu chakhaogiu faise luilu kariakjiu thunboga kajikdui kengkha padjiu wabung khat tadui mali phuilu-e.

Pasaidi Gideon niu Tingwang khuga dinlan-e, “Atu nalung pomkhai tulo, Iniu chalad khat dinlan khaine. Chalungsajiu Iniu chakhaogiu fai gasu madiulan khaine. Tuhoira chakhaogiu faitu pisang khailo chiudi kadihtu pitim khailo.”
Sibo nai nchun Tingwang niu sikum gapjiu kamkhai bide. Pasaibo nai chakhaogiu faise sangjiu bamniude chiudi kadihse kajikniu tim bamniude.
Naikhat Gideon khatdi pamai hina sumaji lujiu Harod Duipin mungga rijiky kamlujiu bammide, Midia mai bamse paliu gasu tingpilam Moreh Luong ramjing katangga rijibam kamlujiu bamme.
Siniu maidung khuga dinlo, ‘Mai khatniu ping-e sai chakylam pi malanwang milo, chiudi aliura Gilead Luong haiga bam mine.” Siga sang makai-je-nia malan mide, chiudi sang kariu bamkha-e.
Siga
Gideon niu pamaidungtu majang lujiu tadui sakra kiude, siga
Siga chamai kaisum ronna paliu benniu tadui bonkhang lujiu sakge, kakimai hinara khudungkiu lujiu sakge.
niu Gideon khuga din-e, “Tadui bonlujiu sakbo mai kai sum hainiu Midia maitu ngamlura Iniu naleng pikhai bine. Kakibo mai hina tura chakylam malan mira dinbilo.

Haichiujiu Gideon niu wahina kam ngamlubo khatdi make mud ngamlubo chamai kai sum situ makjiu kakibo Israel mai hina tura paliu kylam langkhai malankam mide. Midia maigu riji bamse paliu hanglam ramjingga bamme.
Sibo nai nchun Gideon tu
Chiudi nangniu hapingsai, navangpiu Purah tu majanglu rijibamga kiulo.
Paliuniu degu din bamlo chiubo nangniu chiusune, sichiusai nangniu hujiu halu sune.” Siniu Gideon nai pavangpiu Purah niu kiujiu mikremai rijibam mungga bamme.
Midian mai Amalek mai, khatdi ramjingga lungbo kiphiumaise ramjingga takaodungdi kum khatdi paliugu qontraodung duidi mungga nbui-niang kumjiu phuiting bamme.

Gideon niu wangboga, mai khatniu pakamai khuga pamang dinbambo chiu-e. Paniu din-e, “Takhuimoi lujiu kambo taruak pekkhat paiwang aliugu rijikyga mathenky khattu simrot mijiu, mathenkyse kaomibo khatdi kadihga kam marapu khaibotu Iniu man-e.”
Pakabo siniu paokakge, “Sise Israel maigu apangheng, Joash nahpiu Gideon gu-e! Kakibo ramba ha-e. Tingwang niu patu Midian mai nai aliu riphen hinatu ngamrabo pikhai mibo-e.”
Gideon niu mai khat mang chiulujiu, khatdi sibo ramba silujiu, khudungkiu Tingwang tu kahum sude. Sichiujiu Israel mai bamga paniu malanwang lujiu din-e, “Susulo!
Paniu pagu riphen kai sum situ njan sum thiulujiu mai hina khuga make khatdi wahenping lungga kahiu khailujiu pikhaide.
Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Iniu charibam mungga ngutlusai atu khonnak khailo, khatdi Iniu kambo kumjiu kamlo.
Sichiujiu aliuniu makese mud dasai, naliudi naliugu makese charibam mud maguijiu, “
Gideon nai pamai kaikhat siniu, rijiky munggase chunding akhemai siniu nkhiak lugapbo wan-gase mengtang mide. Paliuniu makese mud khaijiu paliuniu thinkinbo wabungse kampang khai-e,
khatdi kakibo baonia di sikumjiu kamde. Paliu mathiuse mawilam benniu kahiu thinne, majadlam benniu make thinne, khatdi “Apanghengse
Paliuniu rijikytu taowenglude, sichiujiu mikremaigu riphendungse marajiu pak kalak thiumide.
Gideon maidungniu paliugu make mud khaiboga
Sibosai Naphtali, Asher, khatdi Manasseh maidungtu pajai nia gasu kupadle sichiu paliuniu Midia maitu hasude

Gideon niu Ephraim luongrianglam lungmai hina khuga chamaitu langkhaijiu din-e, “Kiujiu Midian maitu aphenlo. Jordan giuky nai Bethbarah giuky katang Midian maitu pi kenpad makra khamlulo.” Ephraim maitu kumadui mide, khatdi paliuniu Jordan giuky nai Bethbarah giuna katang chapkham lude.

Paliuniu Midian maigu jupao kania Oreb nai Zeeb tu minlude; khatdi paliuniu Oreb tu Oreb Tukang ga kamshat khaide, khatdi Zeeb gu jaw langbo bam ga Zeeb tu kamshat khaide. Paliuniu Midian maitu hatajut wangjiu Oreb nai Zeeb peese Jordan genlam bambo Gideon khuga ponwangde.

Sigasu Ephraim mainiu Gideon khuga din-e, “Ndekamjiu Midia maitu chari thiuraleng tadbo wan-ga aliutu nang kumak jiulo? Ndekamjiu nangniu aliutu haichiu kamjiulo?” Paliuniu charai thiujiu haibo lamga haichiu dinde.
Chiudi paniu din-e, “Naliuniu kamkhai mibotu Iniu kam kangambo hainiu wadi din kadara ha-e. Ephraim mainiu poi kamkhaibo siniu akiriangmai hinaniu kambo suangdi nkiu-e.
Chiubamdi, Tingwang gu pumtan gasu naliuniu Midia maigu wang kania, Oreb nai Zeeb tu kamshat lude. Situ din kadara Iniu nde kamkhai milo?” Paniu haise dinbo wan-ga, paliu lung pombose nkhin mide.
Haibo tingga Gideon khatdi pamai kai sumse Jordan giuky wangtangjiu kenpadde. Paliu hai chiamide, chiudi mikremaitu hatad bamkha-e.
Paliuniu Sukkoth ga wangtangboga paniu namdakga lungmai khuga din-e, “Chalungsajiu amaidungtu taruak pikhailo. Paliu hai chiasiak mide, Iniu Midia mai wang Zebah nai Zalmunna tu hakinbo-e.”
Chiudi Sukkoth gu jupaodungniu din-e, “Ndechiujiu aliuniu nagu riphenmai leng katiu kasak piralo? Nangniu tuhoi tangdi Zebah nai Zalmunna tu minlu makha-e.”
Siga Gideon niu din-e, “Wide!
Sigasu Gideon niu Penuel ga khanglujiu siga lungbam mai khuga sikumjiu khengde, chiudi Penuel mainiudi Sukkoth mainiu kadinbo kumgapjiu dinde.
Sijeng gasu paniu paliu khuga din-e, “I wijiu malanwang rabo-e, sibo wan-ga, Iniu naliu kyton haise kamkao kammi rabo-e!”
Zebah nai Zalmunna niu panaigu riphentu majang lujiu Karkor ga bamme. Ramjingga lungmaigu riphenmai pakhiangna ruanggasu, 15,000 ronna bammide; riphenmai 120,000 tu kamshat mide.
Gideon niu Nobah khatdi Jogbehah gu naimik padlam, ramjing mungga bambo npui luikhangjiu riphenmai situ bungjiu aphen sude.
Midia mai wang kania Zebah nai Zalmunna pakmide, chiudi paniu hameng panaitu minlude khatdi panai riphenmai hinatu kam charen khaide.
Gideon niu chari bam gasu Heres Pass npui lam malanwang lanboga,
paniu Sukkoth ga akhangmai khattu minlujiu pakhuga maniude. Akhangmaina siniu Gideon leng Sukkoth namga papee kathiumai riak chinnia jan raokiu khaide.

Sigasu Gideon niu Sukkoth mai khuga tadlujiu din-e, “Naliuniu atu nkhakhai lakge chiujiu dinbose maningtaolo. Agu riphendungniu chiasiak mibo wan-ga Zebah nai Zalmunna tu minlu makhabo donniu katiu khe silakge chiujiu naliuniu dinmibo-e. Wide, haiga panai bamme!”
Sichiujiu paniu tathukan nai ramjinggu thureng kansiniu Sukkoth gu jupaodungtu sajai pikhaide.
Paniu Penuel ga bambo chakyton situ kamkao lujiu, sibo namdiga bambo maidungtu kamshat mide.
Sigasu Gideon niu Zebah nai Zalmunna khuga maniu-e, “Tabor ga nanainiu kamshat mibo maise dekumbo mailo?”
Panainiu paokakge, “Paliu hai natu kajon-e, paliuse chawangnah mai kum kamme.”
Gideon niu din-e, “Paliuse asingnamai-e, khatdi apuinahmai siakge. Iniu siangjiu din-e, naliuniu paliutu kamshat makge sai, Iniu naliutu kamshat lakge.”
Sichiujiu paniu panah tingthupiu Jether khuga din-e, “Sulujiu panaitu kamshat milo!” Chiudi sibo nahse chaheng thinsu makge. Pase makhin bi-e, palamra pase nakha-e.

Siga Zebah nai Zalmunna niu Gideon khuga din-e, “Sulo, nangniu anaitu kamshat milo. Kating mainiu katingtien kambo maji-e.” Sigasu Gideon niu panaitu kamshat mide khatdi panaigu qontrao wongchengga khin khaibo tiuriangse khilude.
Sibo sailam, Israel mainiu Gideon khuga din-e, “Nang khatdi nasai lamdi nakai-nakik mainiu aliu wang thiu rabo-e, Nangniu Midia mai khugasu aliutu kalan khai bide.”
Gideon niu paokakge, “Iniu maksai anahniudi naliugu mawangpao thiulakge.
Chiudi paniu wakhat dinsude, “Iniu naliu khuga wakhat maniu khaine. Naliuniu khoilubo chalandungse akhuga pilo.” (Media maidungdi ramjingga lungbo kakimai kumjiu kachia lan malan karenbo-e).
Maidungniu kenkakge, “Aliuniu haise pira jengniu aliu chunwi-e,” Paliuniu chafai khat hamkhai lujiu siga mai hinaniu chalan khoilubose pikhai bide.
Gideon niu kachia-lan daolubo paridse taju makai kumbo-e, sise tatiu, tataa khatdi ran-ranbo fai-ni Midia mai wangniu piubo, maksai qontrao wongchengga matiu khaibo situra chakkhai makge.

Gideon niu kachia khoilubo gasu charameng macha lujiu pagu namdak, Ophrah ga khaide. Israel mai hinaniu Tingwang tu thon lujiu charameng situ kahum sude. Sise Gideon nai pakikhun maileng tathak khatle.
Sichiujiu Israel mainiu Midia maitu ngamlude siniu kapingbo hamide. Gideon shai makthen sibo dihga tingkum atai agi-manaijiu lungkhaide.
Gideon niu pakylam malanwang lujiu siga lungmide.
Paniu panah piumai riakchinnia lung-e, palamra panao keng-e.
Shechem ga parammai liupui bamme, sibo puiniu panah piumai khat manakhai-e, pazanniu Abimelech chiujiu mathak khaide.
Joash nah Gideon tanpao wangjiu shai mide sichiujiu Abiezer kiphiu maigu namdak, Ophrah ga bambo papiu Joash rawga baikhai mide.
Gideon shai mibo sai Israel mainiu Tingwang tu malumta lanmide, khatdi Baal tu kahum lanmide. Paliuniu paliu ra Baal gu chamriat majai mide.
Sichiujiu paliutu mikremai khugasu gukhaibo
Paliuleng Gideon kikhun mainiu kawi kamkhai bibo tudi wajeng kukhai tamide.
Gideon nahpiu Abimelech niu Shechem namdakga meng-e, siga papui kiriangmai hina lungbamme,

Shechem mai khuga paliuniu wakhat maniura dinkhaide, “Naliu nde lunilo? Gideon nahmai riakchinnia siniu mawang rama? Maksai mai khatniu mawang ralo? Maning khailo Abimelech hai naliu tia khatdi naliu zairiang khatle.”,
Papui kiriangmai siniu Shechem maitu paleng npao khaide, chiujiu Shechem mainiu Abimelech hai paliu riangruibo jenggasu pasai suira chapkhaide.
Paliuniu rangkanggi riakchinnia Baal gu ladriat bung gasu patu pi-e, sichiujiu sibo rangkang siniu chamai kasamai bao khattu patu khat thiura paniu khanlude.
Paniu papiu ky Ophrah ga meng-e, khatdi siga tatukang khat riga Gideon nahmai, pasingnamai riakchinnia tu kamshat mide. Chiudi Gideon nah nathubo Jotham sira nbaimijiu kamshatlu makge.
Sichiujiu Shechem mai nai Bethmillo mai mathiu madui lujiu Shechem ga bambo masanbo nphubang ga mengde, siga paliuniu Abimelech tu Chawang pithiu khaide.
Jotham niu sise siluboga, paniu Gerizim luongga khang chaplujiu khatdi paliu khuga senjiu din-e, “Akhuan nking khailo, naliu Shechem maidung, sichiusai Tingwang niu naliu khuan nking khai rabo-e!
Nda pawan khatga tasingbang hina maduilujiu paliugu chawang leng kada-e. Paliuniu takibang khuga din-e, ‘Aliu wang thiu khailo.’
Takibangniu paokakge, ‘Naliu wang thiunesai, chara, chamaitu chakhuang thiuboga thinbambo asadui padta mine.’
Sibo sai singbangdungniu ndutsibang khuga din-e. ‘Nang wangjiu aliu wang thiu khailo.’
Chiudi ndutsy bangniu paokakge, ‘Naliu wang thiune sai, tiu kawibo arasy kahumbose masita mine.’
Singbangdung siniu mumsy ken khuga din-e, ‘Nang wangjiu aliu wang thiu khailo.’
Chiudi mumsy kenniu paokakge, ‘Naliu wang thiunesai, chara, chamaitu chunwi khai bambo mumjawse akhuga padta mine.’
Siniu singbangdung siniu tathu phega din-e, ‘Nang wangjiu aliu wang thiu khailo.’
Tathuphe siniu paokakge, ‘Naliuniu atu pi naliu wang thiuni siaksai, ahiuga madun lulo. Naliu sichiu maksai chaminiu agu tathuphe gasu taopadjiu Lebanon gu singchong bangdung ruthon mirabo-e.’

Sichiujiu Jotham niu dinkiulan-e, “Naliuniu Abimelech tu chawang thiukhaibose pachangjiu chalung masanjiu kambo ma? Naliuniu tuhoira Gideon tu maningtaojiu paniu kamkhai mibotu phuijiu pakikhunmaitu chakhuang thiubo gulo?
Apiuniu naliuleng chari thiukhaibose maning khailo. Paniu Midia mai khugasu naliutu ranpad raleng paringting chariu khai mibo-e.

Chiudi thainaira naliuniu apiu kikhuntu atung bamme. Naliuniu panah mai-riak chinnia situ tatukang khat riga kamshat mide-Naliu kiriangmai, pavangpui pen ganiu panahpiu Abimelech tu naliuniu Shechem gu chawang pithiu khai mide.

Chiudi tuhoira. naliuniu Gideon khuga khatdi pakikhunmai mai khuga thainai kamkhaibo hai pachangjiu naliulung masanbo-e sai, Abimelech tu majang chunwi lulo sichiujiu paniudi naliu khuga pachun wilulo.
Sichiu makge sai, Abimelech khugasu chami taopadjiu Shechem mai nai Bethmillo maitu ruthon milo. Maksai Shechem khatdi Bethmillo mai khugasu chami taopadjiu Abimelech tu ruthon milo.”
Sichiujiu paniu pasingna Abimelech tu pingbo jengniu pak marijiu Beer ga wanglung mide.
Abimelech niu Israel mai riga takum sum mawang khaide.
Sichiujiu Abimelech khatdi Shechem mai kakga Tingwang niu miktunbo pikhaijiu khat-khattu wita mide, khatdi paliuniu patu atungjiu lungsude.
Haise padbambo lamra Gideon nahpiudung chamai riak chinniatu kamshatra kachu khaibo, Shechem maidung nai Abimelech khuga paliugu kamaobo jeng gasu pikhaibo-e.
Shechem maidungniu maluong ton-ga Abimelech tu chon raleng chamai khai-e, khatdi paliuniu npuiga tadken wangmai hinagu sutle. Haibo lamga Abimelech khuga paokhaide.
Sichiujiu Ebed nahpiu Gaal niu pasingna maitu majanglujiu Shechem ga wang-e, siga Shechem mainiu patu malum kamme.
Paliu mathiuse mumsy luga menglujiu mumsy railujiu jaw kamlu changee sude. Paliuniu paliu rakyga wangjiu, siga paliu tiu-sak maniu lujiu Abimelech tu kagabo cham dinsude.

Gaal niu din-e, “Aliu Shechem ga bammai hai dechiubo mailo? Aliuniu deleng Abimelech tu machabam gulo? Pase saolo? Wakhat thiubamdi pahai Gideon nah-e! Zebul niu pakhu gasu aja lu-e, chiudi aliuniu ndeleng patu macha ralo? Nakiriang phungsu khaibo naky-pao, Hamor hangga bammilo!
Iniu hai maidunggu jupao thiulu sai, Iniu Abimelech tu kam mine! ‘Nagu riphen khaisan lulo khatdi padjiu aphen sulo’ chiujiu Iniu pakhuga dinrabo-e.”
Gaal niu dinbo cham chiukhai lujiu, namdigu mawangpao Zebul niu palung pomsude.
Paniu Arumah ga bambo Abimelech khuga champao mai lang khaijiu din-e, “Ebed nahpiu Gaal khatdi pasingnamai siniu Shechem ga wang bamme, khatdi natu namdiga bammak raleng paliuniu kamsu mide.
Siniu tuhoira nang khatdi namaidungniu nchun tingga tadpad lujiu chalulam nbai milo.
Nsuannai nsuan naimik padgapboga sulujiu naliuniu namditu bungjiu aphen sulo, sichiujiu Gaal nai pamaidung padjiu natu aphen susai, nangniu ngamlu buithen paliutu kambilo.
Sijengniu Abimelech nai pamaidung siniu nchun suniu Shechem lenlam padlujiu, pabao madai thiujiu nbai bam mide.
Abimelech nai pamaidung siniu, Gaal niu lenlam padjiu namdigu rengmun-ga chapbambo ngaoluboga, paliuniu nbaibam gasu paliu suchapde.
Gaal niu paliutu ngaolujiu Zebul khuga din-e, “Phuilo! Maluong ton gasu maidung tadkiu kin-e!”
“Paliura chamai makge, paliura maluong riga bambo wahiumana-e.” chiujiu Zebul niu paokakge.
Gaal niu dinlan-e, “Phuilo! Chamai kakeng khaniu maluong ton lamsu wangkiu kinne khatdi taden phuibo nphubang bambo npuilamsu chamaibao khat wangkinne!”

Sigasu Zebul niu pakhuga din-e, “Nangniu nachamkang dijiu kadinbose ndegulo? Haibo piu, Abimelech tu aliuniu ndeleng machajiulo chiu dinbo piuse nang-e. Nangniu din masajiu kamkhai mibo maidungse haibo maidung-e. Tuhoi tadpad lujiu paliutu aphen sulo!
Gaal niu Shechem maitu majanglu pad Abimelech tu aphensude.
Gaal pakmide, Abimelech niu patu hasude, khatdi chamai kengkha ajam mide namdi rengmun ga bammaidi ajam mide.
Abimelech hai Arumah ga lung-e, khatdi Shechem gasu Zebul niu Gaal khatdi pasingna maidungtu hapad mijiu paliu siga lung tamide.
Pasaibo nai Shechem maidungniu chalulam tadra rangbamme chiubo Abimelech niu silude.
Sijeng gasu paniu pamaidungtu majang lujiu pabao sum thiujiu njan khaide, khatdi chaluga nbaijiu khuan bamme. Namdiga maidungniu padbo ngaolude, paniu nbaibam gasu padlujiu maidungtu kamshat sude.
Abimelech nai pakang maidungniu katumjiu namdigu rengmun situ akhe raleng pakpad bamga kakibo bao nia siniu chaluga bammai hinatu asunjiu kamshat kam mide.
N-nien marinpuiting aphenjing khangde, Abimelech niu namdise haphun lude, maidungtu kamshat kam mide namdi situ kamkao mide, khatdi kadihse matainiu phuimide.
Shechem gu charireng gasu jupaodung hinaniu sibo racham chiuluboga, paliuniu Baal gu chamriat rakyga pakwang nbai sude.
Paliuniu siga madui bambose Abimelech khuga paokhai bide,
sijeng gasu paniu pamaidungtu majanglujiu Zalmon Luongga khangde. Paniu siga mari thinlujiu singke hanglujiu, sise pah makhuakga ponsude. Pamaidungtu sikumjiu katumjiu kamra dinkhaide.

Sichiujiu mai hina singke hanglujiu Abimelech saisuijiu ponwang chamai madui bambo kyga ponwang kabao khaide. Sichiujiu palungga bambo maidung situ chami matao khai mide, sichiujiu siga--charireng lungga--maipui maipiumai sang khat kumbo shaikhai mide.
Sibosai Abimelech niu Thebes ga menglujiu namditu taomagui lujiu haphun lude.
Siga chaky-ton matidbo khat bamme, chiujiu namdiga bambo mai hina maipui maipiu, jupaodungdi jaojiu siga pakwang nbaide. Paliuniu kalung lamsu khamten manlujiu chaky pilam pakkhang nbai mide.
Abimelech niu chaky-ton ga sunra hawangjiu kamun ga ngutlujiu chaky-ton situ chami rumide.
Chiudi maipui khatniu tasiu kaniakbo tukang rotkiu papee rotpang mide.

Siga paniu akhangmai chari mania phungbo maitu kalangjiu ku-e khatdi aja pide, “Naheng thadpad lujiu atu kamshat milo. Maipuiniu atu kamshat mide chiubo Iniu lunimakge.” Siga akhangpiu siniu pakhuga pakwang bikhaiboga pah shaimide.
Sichiujiu Israel mainiu Abimelech shaimibo ngaolujiu, paliu mathiu paky-kylam wangmide.
Haichiujiu Abimelech niu papiu khuga khatdi pasingna riak-chin-niatu kamshat mibogu kamaobose Tingwang niu pariga piwang khai bide.
Tingwang niu Shechem maitudi paliugu kasabo jengniu kam chariu khaide, sise Gideon nahpiu Jotham niu paliu riga padraleng siangkhaijiu dinkhai mibo si-e.
Abimelech shai mibo sailam, Dodo tahpiu, Puah nahpiu Tola niu Israel maitu khenrang thiukhaira wang-e. Pahai Issachar kiriangmai khatdi Ephraim maluongram Shamir ga lungbambo-e.
Paniu Israel maigu jupao takum makai sumkiu thiukhaibo-e. Sichiujiu pah shai miboga patu Shamir ga nbai khaide.
Tola wangbo saiga, Gilead ganiu Jair wang-e. Paniu Israel maigu jupao takum makai nia thiukhai-e.
Paniu panah npiumai samriu lung-e, paliuniu qonniam samriu tuang-e. Gilead kadihga namdi samriu bamme, tuhoidi haibo dungtu Jair namdung chiujiu kubamme.
Jair shaimijiu Kamon ga baikhai mide.
Israel mai Tingwang masuangga kamaobo pakak khat kamlanjiu Baal ra khatdi Astarte ratu kahum lanmide, sikumjiu Syria, Sidon, Moab, Ammon khatdi Philistine mai radung tudi kahum mide. Paliu
Siniu
Amor mai dih Jordan Giuki naimik padlam Gilead ga lungbo Israel mai hinatu takum kariu tachat paliuniu kam mathad wang-e.
Amon mainiu Jordan kenpadjiu Judah, Benjamin khatdi Ephraim kiphiudungtu charithiu-e. Israel mai chariu sui mide.
Sichiujiu Israel mainiu kapjiu
Sidon mai, Amalek mai, khatdi Moan mai niu naliutu kam mathad khaiboga, naliuniu akhuga kapjiu kheng-e. Iniu naliutu paliu khugasu rankhai makjiuma?
Chiudi, naliu tuhoidi atu saodiak lujiu kakibo radungtu kahum mibo jengniu naliutu Ira rankhai lanbi lakge.
Tadlujiu naliuniu kadalubo radung khuga kapkhai sulo. Paliuniu naliutu chariubo wan-ga rankhaibi sulo.”
Chiudi Israel mainiu
Siniu paliuniu sangdiumai ratu saolujiu
Sichiujiu Ammon mai riphenniu charibam kadenlujiu Gilead ga rijiky thiukhaide. Siga Israel maidungniu wang madui lujiu khatdi Gilead dih Mizpah ga rijiky kamlujiu bammide.
Siga maidungniu khatdi Israel maigu jupaodung siniu khat-khat khuga maniu-e, “Saoniu jupao thiujiu Ammon maitu aphen ralo? Mai khatniu kamkhai-e, sai Gilead ga mai hinagu jupao thiurabo-e.”
Jephthah hai papum jonbopui nah, Gilead ga katan kahubo riphenmai khatle.

Papiu Gilead naoniu lungbo kakibo npiumai nahdung bamme, paliuniu tan khangbo wan-ga Jephthah tu chaky gasu tadmira hasude. Paliuniu pakhuga din-e, “Nangniu aliu piugu kalek lura nadam wadi ha-e, nang hai kakibo pui nah-e.”
Jephthah niu pasingnamai khugasu pakmide khatdi Tob mai kadihga lungmide. Siga patuse wathak hamaidungniu masenjiu, khatdi patu maluang lung bamme.
Pasai pakak khatga Ammon mainiu Israel maitu chari thiusude.
Sichiu suboga, Gilead ga jupaodungniu Jephthah tu Tob mai kadih gasu kulanra meng-e.
Paliuniu din-e, “Wanglo khatdi aliutu jukhailo, sichiujiu aliu Ammon maitu aphenkhe.”
Chiudi Jephthah niu paokakge, “Naliuniu atu wajiuga manihjiu naliuniu atu apiuky gasu hathon mibo-e. Nde kamra naliuniu tuhoi chariubo wan-ga atu kulan jiulo?”
Paliuniu Jephthah khuga din-e, “Aliuniu nakhuga tuhoi wanglanbo-e palamra aliuniu natu majangwang nibose Ammon maitu chari thiura khatdi Gilead mai hinatu jukhai raleng-e.”
Jephthah niu paliu khuga din-e, “Ammon maitu chari thiura naliuniu atu chakylam majang wangsai,
Paliuniu paokakge, “Aliu sui-e.
Sigasu Jephthah niu Gilead maigu jupaodung saisui lujiu wang mide, sichiujiu maidungniu patu pi paliugu jupao khatdi mawangpao thiukhaide. Jephthah niu patien thiusu raga
Sichiujiu Jephthah niu champao maitu Ammon mai wang khuga, dinra langkhai-e, “Nangniu aliutu aphen bambose nde jengniulo? Nde kamra nangniu aliu kadihga charithiu ngutjiulo?”.

Ammon mai wangpiuniu Jephthah gu champao maitu paokakge, “Israel mainiu Egypt gasu tadpatbo lon, paliuniu adih Arnon Giuki gasu Jabbok Giuki tangbo khatdi Jordan Giuki chiujiu lulude. Tuhoi sise nangniu agi-manaijiu pimalan khai rabo-e.”
Jephthah niu Ammon mai wang khuga champaomai langkhai lanjiu
haibo cham kenkak khai-e, “Israel mainiu Moab mai dih maksai Ammon mai dih lumide tiubose maji makge.
Sisera haichiubo-e: Israel mainiu Egypt gasu tadpadbo wan-ga, paliuniu ramjing gasu Aqaba Zaibek tadken wangjiu Kadesh lam tadkhai mibo-e.

Sichiujiu paliuniu Edom gu chawangpiu khuga padihse tadken raleng khengra champaomai langkhai-e. Chiudi Edom gu chawangpiuniu paliutu suikhai makge. Moab mai wang khugadi paliuniu kheng-e, chiudi paliu dihga tadken raleng panai suikhai makge. Siniu Israel mai Kadesh ga bammide.

Sichiujiu paliuniu ramjing tadken wangjiu, Edom kadih tad maguijiu, Moab kadih, Arnon Giuki uigenlam wangtang makthen paliuniu tadwang mide. Siga paliuniu rijiky kamlujiu bammide, sichiujiu paliuniu Arnon kenpad makge, palamra sise Moab maigu ramrai-e.
Sichiujiu Israel mainiu champao maidungtu Heshbon gu chawang, Amor mai, Sihon khuga langkhaijiu, pagu kadih tadkenjiu paliugu kadihga wangraleng khengde.
Chiudi Sihon niu Israel maitu suinimak mine. Paniu pagu riphenmai hinatu kumadui lujiu Jahaz ga rijiky kam lujiu Israel maitu aphensude.
Chiudi Israel mai Rawang
Paliuniu Amor luongriang hina tingrunlam Arnon gasu tingpilam Jabbok khatdi tingbanglam ramjing gasu Jordan tingrunlam katang gomlude.
Sijengniu Israel mai Rawang,
Sise naliuniu lulan lura, kamsu jiuma? Naliu ra Chemosh niu pikhaibose thinlulo. Chiudi aliura aliu Rawang,
Naliuniu Moab gu chawangpiu Zippor nahpiu Balak suang wi-e chiujiu maning jiuma? Paniu Israel maitu wadaodi atung makge, wadao gara pah atung jiuma? Pah wadaodi aliutu atungjiu charithiu jiuma?

Takum kai sum Israel mainiu Heshbon nai Aroer khatdi sise lungmagui bambo namdak hina, khatdi Arnon Giuki hugen namdi hina lung gomlubo-e. Sichiusai ndekamjiu tuhoi wan-ga sibo hina lulan lumak jiulo?
Makge, Iniu nakhuga kamaobo wadi kammakge. Atu atungjiu charithiubo gasu nangra kamaobo kammide.
Chiudi Ammon gu chawang siniu Jephthah gu champaomai chamtu wajeng sikhai makge.
Sigasu
Jephthah niu
Iniu ngamlujiu malanwang lanboga, aky gasu atu adao raleng padbo raithubo maitu rujiu pipad khai rabo-e. Iniu sibo maitu pipadbo rathak thiujiu kadkhai rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu singgiu kenpadjiu Ammon maitu Jephthah niu charithiu sude, siga

Paniu paliutu aphenjiu Aroer gasu Minnith wonjeng maguijiu bambo namdi makai tangjiu khatdi Abel Keramim katangsi-e. Siga Ammon maitu kamshat makeng suimide, sichiujiu Israel mainiu Ammon maitu ngam lude.
Jephthah niu pakylam Mizpah gasu malan wangbo tingga panahpuiniu patu adaora chalen lenjiu nchom poi biujiu sunpad dao-e. Panahse sibopui ronna-e.
Paniu sibo puitu ngaoluboga, pachun sajiu, paniu pafai phetjiu din-e, “Oh, anahpui yo! Nangniu alung kampang mide! Ndekamjiu, nangniu alungchun kam chariu khai jiulo? Iniu
Panahpui siniu pakhuga din-e, “Nangniu

Chiudi sibopui siniu papiu khuga kheng-e, “Aleng haise kamkhailo. Atu chahiu nia phut khailo, chiusai akahmaitu majang lujiu ramluongga rontadjiu, I liuchang khat thiujiu shaimi ratu achungjiu majang kanuikhai lune.”

Patu tadsulo chiujiu paniu suikhaide, sichiujiu patuse chahiu nialeng langkhai mide. Sibopui khatdi pakahmaidungse ramluong riga khangjiu sibo puiniu chami thiumakjiu, khatdi pa-nah-pon makjiu shaimi ratu chunsajiu achung khaide.
Chahiu nia tanglubo sai sibo puiniu papiu khuga wanglande. Paniu nda
Haise Israel maigu cheng-jai phibang thiusu mibo-e,
chiubora aliumaidung takum machangna Gilead maipiu, Jephthah nahpuigu chariubotu maningtaojiu jeng madai rontad-tadle.

Ephraim maidungniu chari thiura kaden lujiu, Jordan Giuki kenpad Zaphon ga menglujiu Jephthah khuga din-e, “Naliutu maluong lujiu tadra aliutu kukhai mak lujiu ndekamjiu Ammon maitu aphenra lamrai kenpad jiulo? Aliuniu naliu ky rumi rabo-e!”
Chiudi Jephthah niu paliu khuga din-e, “Amaidung nai Iniu Ammon maitu n-gi masakhai mibo-e. Iniu naliutu kukhai-e, chiudi naliuniu atu paliu khugasu gukhai makge.
Naliu wangraleng Iniu ngaopad makboga, agu ringting thindeng lujiu, paliutu aphenra Iniu lamraise kenpad mibo-e, siga

Sigasu Jephthah niu Gilead mai hinatu kumaduilu, Ephraim maitu aphenjiu paliutu ngamlude. (Ephraim mainiu din-e, “Ephraim nai Manasseh ga bambo naliu Gilead maidung, naliura Ephraim gasu pakmibo mai-e!”)

Ephraim maidungniu pakmi rabotu khamraleng, Gilead mainiu Jordan kenpad suibo bamse chapkham mide. Ephraim mai khatniu kenpad raleng khengboga, Gilead maidungniu Ephraim maitu “Nang hai Ephraim maima? chiujiu maniu rabo-e, siga “Makge” chiujiu dinsai,

paliuniu patu “Shibboleth,” chiujiu dinra pakhuga dinrabo-e, siga paniu “Sibboleth,” chiujiu dinrabo-e, palamra paniu sise din masan padngam lulakge. Sichiusai paliuniu Jordan ken ngutmai hinatu minlujiu kamshat mirabo-e. Siga paliuniu Ephraim mai sang atai-je-niakiutu kamshat mide.
Jephthah niu Israel maigu jupao takum charuk thiukhai-e. Sichiujiu paniu shai miboga patu pagu namdi Gilead ga baikhai mide.
Jephthah shai mibo sai, Bethlehem maipiu Ibzan niu Israel maigu jupao thiu-e.
Paniu panah piumai samriu khatdi panah puimai samriu lung-e. Paniu panahpuidungtu pakiphiu makmai nao pithiukhai-e khatdi pakiphiu makbo aliumai samriutu luwangjiu panahpiudung nao pithiu khai-e.
Sichiujiu pah shai miboga patu Bethlehem ga baikhai mide.
Ibzan saiga, Zebulun mai Elon niu Israel maigu jupao takum kariu thiukhai-e.
Sichiujiu pah shaimiboga patu Zebulun dih Aijalon ga baikhai mide.
Elon saiga Pirathon mai Hillel nahpiu Abdon niu Israel maigu jupao thiukhai-e.
Pah panah piumai atai khatdi patahmai samriu bamme, paliuniu qonniam riak chinnia tuang-e. Abdon niu Israel maigu jupao takum tachat thiukhai-e.
Sichiujiu pah shai miboga Amalek maigu maluongram Ephraim ramga bambo Pirathon ga baikhai mide.
Israel mainiu
Sibo tingga mai khat Manoah kubopiu Zorah namdakga bamme. Pase Dan kiphiu gasu-e. Panao hai panah wakhatdi lungmakbo-e.
gu maza siniu patu lenkhaijiu din-e, “Nang hai nanah wakhatdi lung makge, chiudi nangniu napum ripjiu nanah piumai khat lung sune.
Kaniubo tiutek tiu makra, jaw maksai chiangna sakmakra kamsiak lulo;
khatdi nanah npiumai lungbose, nangniu patham kakip makrabo-e, palamra patu manabo nai ganiu Tingwang khuga ganripiu kumjiu kadkhai rabo-e. Ganripiu

Siga maipui siniu pakina khuga wangjiu din-e, “Tingwang mai khat akhuga wang-e, khatdi patu ngaobo nbiuse Tingwang gu maza kum siakge. Nang delam suniu wangbolo chiujiu Iniu pakhuga maniulu makge, khatdi paniu pazan akhuga dinkhai makge,

Chiudi paniu akhuga din-e chiubora Iniu awon phungjiu npiumai nah khat lungne. Sichiujiu paniu jaw maksai jaw-ari sakmak rabo-e maksai kakham-kaniubo tatek tiumak rabo-e chiujiu paniu dinkhai-e, palamra ngena hai Tingwang khuga paringting leng nkiubo thiujiu, ganripiu leng kadkhai rabo-e.”
Siga Monoah niu
Manoah niu khengbose Tingwang niu kamkhaide, sichiujiu maipui siniu chaluga ntao bambo wan-ga maza siniu pakhuga wanglanne. Sibo wan-ga pakina Manoah pakhuga ha-e,
Sijeng gasu sibo puiniu pak taron wang pakhuga din-e, “Phuilo! Ndanai mai khat akhuga wangbo piuse atu ngaolen khailan bamme.”
Manoah niu sulujiu panao saisui lujiu tadde. Paniu sibo piu khuga wanglujiu maniu-e, “Anao khuga chalad dinkhaibo piuse nangma?”
“Yo,” chiujiu paniu paokakge.
Siga Manoah niu maniu-e, “Naladse ndedao majijiu padralo, ngenase ndekum ralo? Paniu dekumbo ringting thiu ralo?”
Paniu mumsy reng gasu padbo wakhatnadi tiumak rabo-e; paniu jaw, maksai jaw-ari sakmak rabo-e maksai kaniubo tatek tiumak rabo-e. Iniu pakhuga dinbo hina hai paniu kamsiak rabo-e.”
Manoah niu sise
Chiudi maza niu din-e, “I bamtadi, Iniu nagu tatekse tiulakge. Chiudi nangniu sise aleng akhikhai bine sai Rapiu ga kadpadbo thiujiu rukhailo.”
Manoah niu kenkakge, “Nazan dinkhailo, sichiusai nangniu dinkhaibo cham majijiu wangtangboga aliuniu natu chakhuang thiulu sune.”
maza siniu maniu-e, “Ndeleng nangniu chamtan sikhai nijiulo? Haise maisuang kahabo zan khatle!
Siniu Manoah niu kamipoi khat nai alin-tara khoilujiu tatuniu kambo rathakbamga maisuang kahabo ngam kambo
Rathakbam gasu chamipuang taokhangbo wan-ga, chamipuang gasu
Manoah niu panao khuga din-e, “Maomakjiu anai shairabo-e palamra anainiu Tingwang tu ngaolude!”
Chiudi panaoniu paokakge, “
Maipui siniu panah piumai khat lungjiu pazan Samson chiujiu mathak khaide. Ngenase lungkhangboga
Sichiujiu paniu Zorah nai Eshtaol kakga bambo Dan gu rijikyga bambo tingga
Naikhat Samson niu Timnah ga kiu-e, sichiujiu siga Philistine mailiu khattu ngao-e.
Paniu pakilungga malanwang lujiu, papui nai papiu khuga din-e, “Siga Philistine mailiu Timnah ga achunbo bamme. Sibo puitu aleng lukhailo; Iniu patu anao leng luni-e.”
Chiudi papui nai papiuniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nde chiujiu nangniu nkengmai Philistine maitu nanao thiuralo? Aliu jatga, aliu kiriang gasu nangniu riliumai daolulak jiuma?”
Chiudi Samson niu papiu khuga din-e, “Sibo puitu ronna anaoleng Iniu lunibo-e. Iniu sibo puitu achunne.”
Papui nai papiu niura haise
Sichiujiu Samson niu papui nai papiutu majang lujiu Timnah ga kiu-e. Sichiujiu paliuniu mumsy luga tadken wang-e, siga paniu ndongquipoi khat marabo khuon chiude.
Bungjiu
Sichiujiu paniu meng aliupui situ npaoboga, sibo puitu pachun mide.

Watheng makbo saiga Samson niu sibo puitu panao thiura tadmide. Npui tadwangboga, paniu karaiga kamshat mibo ndongqui situ phuide, shaimibo ndongqui lungga makhui pabung ponjiu makhuidui bamniubo ngaoboga pasuang hamide.

Paniu makhuidui phepad paben ga khailujiu tiu jut-jutjiu tadwang-e. Papiu nai papui khuga wanglujiu kasia pikhaide. Paliuniu sise tiulude, chiudi Samson niu makhuiduise ndongqui kashaibo lunggasu kam lubo-e chiubo panai khuga dinmakge.
Papiu niu aliupui kyga tadde, siga Samson niu katiu-kasak kikhai-e. Haise chabon maigu tajai-e.
Philistine mainiu patu ngaobo tingga, patu maluong bamra chamai khang samriu langkhai-e.

Samson niu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu khuga chakhan khat khanne. Naliuniu magiangbo ngee jeng chinnia lungga khan ngam lusai ran-ranbo fainoi fai kawibo khatjam naliutu pine. Naliuniu khan ngam laksai, sikumjiu aleng pirabo-e.”
“Nakhanse aliu khuga dinkhailo, nking sukhe,” chiujiu paliu din-e,
Paniu din-e,
“Wa katiubo khao gasu katiubo mania padbo;
katanbo gasu wa kahumbo padbose degulo,”
Jengsum lungga paliu wadi khan ngam lulak mide.

Jeng madaibo nai paliuniu Samson nao khuga din-e, “Nakinatu sonlujiu chakhanse dinkhailo chiujiu maniulo. Nangniu sichiu maksai, aliuniu napiuky chami khaimi rabo-e, natudi rutaman mirabo-e. Nanainiu aliutu kukhai lujiu sontiura kambo makma?”
Sijengniu Samson naoniu pakhuga kapjiu wang din-e, “Nang atu lungsamak jiuma! Nang atu mareng jiuma! Nangniu aka-aphen maitu chakhan khan lujiu sise ndelo chiubo akhuga dinkhai makge!”
Paniu din-e, “Phuilo, Iniu apui nai apiu khugadi dinmakbo-e. Dekamjiu Iniu nakhuga dinralo?”

Haijeng gasu paniu khumkibo jeng chinnia lungga kapjing-jing sude. Siga paniu jeng chinniabo naise chakhan rambase pakhuga dinkhai bide, palamra paniu silura maniu saomakjiu bammibo jengniu dinkhai bide. Sigasu paniu Philistine mai khuga dinkhai bide.
Sichiujiu jeng chinniabo nai, Samson niu tazi kichen ga wangmakbo suangga, namdi mainiu pakhuga dinkhaide.
“Makhuidui suang hum nkiubo nde bamlo?
Ndongqui suang tan nkiubo nde bamlo?”
Samson niu paokakge, “Naliuniu atompui situ thinjiu chaluse phumakge sai, naliu tuhoi paokak silakge.”
Bungjiu
Sichiujiu panaose chagiang magiangbo nai paka kungthubo piuleng pikhai mide.
Watheng makbo saiga, chabanmiu atiat tingga Samson niu panaotu adaora kamipoi khat ponlujiu meng-e. Panaopiu khuga paniu din-e, “I anaogu kichen ga ngutkhaine.”
Chiudi paniu patu pingut khaimak mide.

Paniu Samson khuga din-e, “Nangniu patu mareng-e, chiubo Iniu pachangjiu maning-e, sijengniu patu Iniu nakabo piuleng pimibo-e. Chiudi pasai kariupuise aliuwi diang-e, tacham hane, pasung patu lululo.”
Samson niu din-e, “Thainai menra Iniu kam kanibo Philistine mai riga kam midi Iniu parip phunglakge.”
Sichiujiu paniu tadlujiu asathi kai sumtu minlude. Paniu asathi nia-nia mi rat aruanglujiu kahiuhan ratman khaide.

Sichiujiu paniu kahiuhan gase chami mataokhai lujiu asathidung situ Philistine mai luzamga phutkhai bide. Haichiu kamkhaibo gasu chaluga bambo miukhumtu ronna makjiu atiat wangkhai bambo miusy hinadi jaojiu rumoi mide.Takisy rengdi rukam mide.

Haise saoniu kambolo chiujiu Philistine mainiu maniu-kahio wangboga, Timnah maipiu Samson paoniu Samson naotu pakabopiu leng pikhai mibo jenggasu Samson niu kambo-e chiubo silude. Siniu Philistine mainiu wanglujiu sibo puitu chaminiu rushat mide khatdi papiu kydi ruthon mide.
Samson niu paliu khuga din-e, “Haise naliu ngamkam sai suibo-e! Iniu tasiang sianglubo-e, chiubora Iniu chakhum ruilu makthen talakge!”
Paniu paliutu asunjiu aphenboga mai kakengtu kamshat mide. Sichiulujiu paniu tadkiu Etam gu tulimkiga bam mide.
Philistine mai Judah ga menglujiu siga riji kamlujiu Lehi namdaktu hajiu chari thiusude.
Judah maidungniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Ndekamjiu naliuniu aliutu chari thiujiulo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Aliuniu Samson tu minlujiu bangmine khatdi paniu aliu khuga kambo kumsiak patudi kamkhai nejiu wangbo-e.”
Judah maidung chamai sang sum Etam gu tulimkiga kiulujiu Samson khuga din-e, “Philistine mainiu aliu riga mawangpao thiubambo nang simak jiuma?” Nangniu aliu khuga nde kamkhai migulo?
Paniu paokakge, “Paliuniu ariga kamkhaibo kumjiu Iniu kambo-e.”
Paliuniu din-e, “Aliuniu natu radlujiu Philistine mai ben-ga pikhai mira wangbo-e.”
Samson niu din-e, “Naliuniura atu kamshat lakge chiujiu akhuga ladriat thiu khailo.”

“Sui-e,” chiujiu paliuniu paokakge. “Aliuniu natu kamshat lakge. Aliuniu natu radlujiu paliu khuga pikhai rabo ronna-e.” Sichiujiu paliuniu patu chariang kasanbo nianiu radlujiu tulimki gasu puipadde.
Paniu Lehi ga wangboga, Philistine mainiu patu hajiu senwang-e. Siga bungjiu
Siga paniu qonniam kashaibo ajara khat daode. Paniu kinkiu sise khoilujiu chamai sang khattu kamshat mide.
Sichiujiu Samson niu chalui thiu-e,
“Konniam ajara thinlujiu Iniu chamai sang khattu kamshat lu-e;
Konniam ajara thinlujiu Iniu paliutu pon makhuan lu-e.”
Sibosai, paniu chami ajarase thon mide. Haise padbo bamtu Ramath Lehi
Sigase Samson niu chari-chang chari mide, sijeng gasu paniu
Siga Tingwang niu Lehi ga duipin khat pipad khaide. Samson niu sise saklujiu pagu chari kimlude khatdi pajeng wangmide. Sibo duipin situ Hakkore
Philistine mainiu sibo dih mawang bambo wan-ga Samson niu Israel maitu takum makai jukhai-e.
Naikhat Samson niu Philistine mai namdi Gaza ga tadle, siga paniu papum kajonpui khattu adao-e. Siga paniu patu nphiuji khai mide.

Gaza maidungniu Samson siga bamme chiubo siluboga, paliuniu sibo bamse wang taoweng lujiu patu chonjiu namdi rengmun ga nchun khonsang-e. Paliuniu maliu makjiu nchun khonsangjiu, paliu ronna haichiu maning-e, “Aliuniu tingbenpad katang khuanne, chiujiu aliuniu patu kamshat mirabo-e.

Chiudi Samson niu nchun akhuan katang ronna jikhaide. Sigasu paniu sulujiu namdi rengmun gu katiang kania chakid lujiu akham nai khamten jaojiu pakhiangna tunthuak mide. Paniu sise pah makhuak riga ponlujiu Hebron phuikiu ngaobo luongton riga thonkhai mide.
Haibo saiga, Sorek Ramjengga lungbo pui pazanniu Delilah kubo puitu ngaolujiu Samson niu marai mide.

Philistine maigu chawang mangiuniu sibo pui khuga wanglujiu din-e, “Samson hai ndechiubo thakga pagu pumtan bambo gulo, khatdi aliuniu nde kamsai pasuang tanjiu, patu radlu ralo, khatdi nde kamsai pah wathak thiusilak miralo chiubo paniu nakhuga dinkhai raleng kamlo. Sichiusai aliuniu rangkanggi sang khat kai khat jam natu pine.”
Sijeng gasu Delilah niu Samson khuga din-e, “Natu deguniu tankhai jiulo chiubo akhuga lungsajiu dinkhailo. Mai khatniu natu minlujiu ratlu misai khatdi nagu pumtan hamira paniu dechiu kamralo?”
Samson niu paokakge, “Paliuniu tavaipi riuriang kasanbo sangmakbo chinnianiu atu ratmisai kakimai kumjiu Idi apumtan hami rabo-e.”
Siniu Philistine mai wangdungniu tavaipiriu kasanbo sangmakbo chinniase Delilah khuga thinwang-e, sichiujiu paniu Samson tu ratman lude.

Paniu maidungtu kichen katambo khatga baikhai nbamme. Siga paniu “Samson! Philistine mai wangkinne!” chiujiu senpadle. Chiudi chalang riangtu chami rumibo kumjiu tavaipi riangse paniu n-gang tap mide. Sichiujiu paliuniu pagu pumtan siamtu sitang lumakge.
Delilah niu Samson khuga dinne, “Phuilo, nangniu atu sonjiu, kachangbo hai akhuga dinmakge. Ndechiujiu natu ratlu ralo chiubo chalungsajiu akhuga dinkhailo.”
Paniu paokakge, “Paliuniu chariang kasanbo thin matai makboniu atu ratmisai, kakimai kumjiu Idi apumtan hami sune.”

Siga Delilah niu chariang kasanbo thinlu patu ratlude. Sigasu paniu, “Samson! Philistine mai wangkinne!” chiujiu senpadle. Maidungse kichen khatga khuon bambo-e. Chiudi paniu chalang riangtu kumjiu chariangse pa-npomniu n-gang tap mide.
Delilah niu Samson khuga din-e, “Nang tuhoidi atu sonjiu akhuga kachangbo hai dinmakge. Mai khat-niu natu ndechiujiu ratlu ralo chiubo akhuga dinkhailo.”
Paniu paokakge, “Nangniu atham palep chinnia phen lujiu kadui raotangniu phen aruong misai kakimai kumjiu Idi apumtan hami sune.”

Delilah niu patu kam njip lujiu, patham lep chinnia phen aruanglujiu, kaduirao tangniu phen matip mide. Paniu “Samson! Philistine mai wangkinne!” chiujiu senpadle. Chiudi paniu rakpadboga patham phenbose nkhipad mide.
Siga paniu pakhuga din-e, “Nangniu atu nalung pimaklujiu dechiujiu nangniu atu lungsa-e chiu din gulo? Nangniu atu maluad sum sonmide, khatdi tuhoidi nagu pumtan bambo lamga akhuga nang din makge.”
Paniu pakhuga naikhat-naikhat maniu saomakjiu bamme. Paniu sibo lamga pakhuga din matanju mijiu chariu mide khatdi marilulak mide.

Siniu paniu palung kachang dinbi mide. “Apuiniu atu lungwangbo wan gasu atu kadkhaijiu Tingwang tu pikhai mibo ganripiu thiukhai mibo-e. Wagaje apitham rim misai, apumtan hamijiu kakimai kummi rabo-e.”

Sigasu paniu pachangjiu majibose pakhuga dinmide chiujiu Delilah niu silude, paniu champao khat Philistine mai wangdung khuga langkhaijiu, “Maluad khatra menglanlo. Paniu akhuga majibose din mide,” chiujiu dinde, sigasu paliuniu rangkang phung lujiu mengde.

Delilah niu Samson tu paniang riga kam njip khailujiu, mai khattu kukhaide, sibo piuniu Samson pitham phenlubo pakhi chinniase kakip mide. Sichiujiu paniu patu kam masa sude. Samson pagu pumtan hamide.
Sibosai paniu “Samson! Philistine mai wangkinne!” chiujiu paniu senpadle. Paniu raksu lujiu, “I hai nthen masuang kumjiu wadi makjiu, khilujiu paklu bui-e.” chiujiu maning sude. Chiudi
Sichiujiu Philistine mainiu patu minlude khatdi pamik ladmide. Paliuniu patu Gaza lam puiwangjiu tataagi riangniu patu ratlujiu patu kavangkygu wa kaniakbo tien kamra khai mide.
Sichiu bamga papeetham kakip mibose mawikhang lan sude.

Philistine mai wangdung wang aruanglujiu changi sude khatdi kadibo rathak thiujiu paliu ra Dagon situ kahum sude. Siga paliuniu chalui thiu sude, “Aliu raniu aliugu mikrepiu Samson tu ngamlura aliu khuga pikhai bide!”.

Paliuniu paliu ronna chunwijiu din-e, “Samson tu kupadlo, khatdi patu pijiu aliuleng tanui kamkhailo.” Paliuniu Samson tu kavangky ganiu kupadboga, paliuniu patu tanui thiujiu katiang kakga pichap khaide. Maidungniu patu ngaokhaiboga, paliu ratu thuonjiu; “Aliu raniu aliugu mikremaitu ngamra aliu khuga pikhaide, paniu aliu dihtu kam masa mide, khatdi aliu jat kengkhatu kamshat mide,” chiujiu chalui thiujiu paliu ratu thuon sude.
Samson niu paben jubo npiu mainah khuga din-e, “Chaky tungman bambo katiang gase atu pi niatao khailo. I siga mangiu khaine.”

Sibo ky kalung gase maipui maipiu kengkha wangjiu phuiting bamme. Philistine mai wangdung khang mangiu sidi siga bamme, khatdi siga maipui maipiu chamai sang sum kumbo sibo ky hangga Samson tu tanui thenjiu bambose phui bamme.
Sigase Samson niu kakheng thiude, “Tanthubo
Sichiujiu Samson niu chaky tungman bambo tiangdi nia situ n-guiman lude. Paniu paben majat mawi katiang khat-khattu tunman lujiu, palai padjiu tun sude,

khatdi Samson niu “Philistine mai nai atu pishai ncham khai milo,” chiujiu marungjiu senpadle. Papumtan pakhiangna khaijiu tunsude siga chakyse kaowangjiu chawang khang mangiu khatdi mai hina riga kaosim mide. Samson niu paringtingga kamshat mibo suang keng nkiujiu pah kashaibo nai chamai kakengtu kamshat mide.
Pasingnamai nai pakikhunmai kiujiu paphawse khoilude. Paliuniu patu ponwang Zorah nai Eshtaol kakga bambo papiu Manoah rawga baikhai mide. Paniu Israel mai riga takum makai jupao thiukhai-e.
Siga Micah chiujiu kubo, Ephraim ramluongga lungbam mai khat bamniu-e,
Paniu papui khuga din-e, “Mai khatniu rangkang sang khat-je-kaikhat nagu agaluboga, nangniu agatiumai riga siangkhai-e, chiubo I chiu-e, Phuilo, rangkangse akhuga bamme. Khoilubo maise I-ye.”
Papuiniu din-e, “Anah yo,
Paniu rangkanggise thin malanwang papuitu pi-e, siga papui niu din-e, “Anah riga tasiang wangmakra, I apumsiakniu rangkang haise masanjiu
Sigasu paniu papuitu sise pikhai mide. Paniu rangkang kai nia thinlujiu chagi aketmai khuga pijiu, tasingniu ruilubo charamengtu rangkang giniu makom khaira kamkhaide. Sise Micah kyga khaibamde.
Micah kubo piugu kahumbo bam khat bamme. Paniu charameng nai chara kahumboga piurabo fai kamkhai lujiu panahmai ruangga khang khattu pagu singkudung pithiu khaide.
Sibo tingga Israel mai chawang thiu makge; mai hina paniu, paniu machunbose kamjiu lungkinbo-e.
Sibo wan-ga Levi maigu chabonmai khat Judah namdak Bethlehem ga lung bamme.
Paniu Bethlehem tu saodiak lujiu kakilam lungra tadmide. Paniu chabin tadkinboga Ephraim gu ramluongga lungbambo Micah kyga wang-e.
Micah niu pakhuga, maniu-e, “Nang hai delamsu wangkin gulo?”
Paniu kenkakge “I hai Judah dih Bethlehem ganiu wangbo Levi mai-e. I lungrabo bam phiukinbo-e.”
Micah niu din-e, “Akhuga lunglo. Agu ladtipao khatdi singku thiukhailo, chiusai Iniu takum khatga naleng rangkang kariu, sigasu chafai-tani pine, khatdi nawandi kibine.”
Levi mai akhangpiuse Micah khuga lungraleng suikhaijiu, panah kumjiu lungbam mide.
Micah niu patu pagu singkuleng lukhaide, sichiujiu Micah kyga pahai lungbamme.
Micah niu din-e, “Tuhoira Levi mai khatniu agu singku thiulude,
Sibo tingga Israel mai chawang ha-e. Dan kiphiu mainiu haibo tingga lungkhai rabo paliu ramleng phiubam niu-e, palamra Israel mai kiphiu ruangga paliu damleng kadih paliuniu daolu makha-e.

Siniu Dan kiphiumai hina gasu kasi-kangaomai khang mangiutu kadalujiu Zorah nai Eshtaol nam gasu charam phuiraleng lang khaide. Paliuniu Ephraim gu maluong ramga mengtangbo wan-ga, paliuniu Micah kyga wangbam khaide.
Paliuniu siga bambolon, paliuniu Levi mai akhangmaina khuan chiulujiu, pakhulam padlujiu paliuniu maniu-e, “Nang haiga nde kambam jiulo? Saoniu haiga natu majang wangjiulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Micah niu pagu singku thiura aphijeng pijiu atu lukhaibo gasu I haiga bambo-e.”
Paliuniu pakhuga din-e, “Tingwang khuga aliugu chabintad haise wijiu tadngamlu suma chiubo maniu khai khelo.”
Singku siniu paokakge, “Naliuniu wakhatnadi manang raleng ha-e. Tingwang niu naliu npui phuikhaijiu tadkinbo-e.”

Siga paliu khang mangiuniu tadpadjiu Laish namdakga wangkhaide. Sidon mai kumjiu siga lungbam maidungniu wa manangbo hajiu lungbambo paliuniu ngaolu-e. Paliura agi-manaijiu, majijiu lung-e, mai khat tudi kam kabuak makge; paliuniu paliuleng pageng bambo hina daojiu bamme. Paliu hai Sidon mai khugasu kadiulam lungjiu bamme khatdi mai kakimai tudi khat thiujiu lung makge.
Paliu khang mangiuniu Zorah nai Eshtaol ga malanwang lanboga, param maidungniu paliu khuga naliuniu nde ngaolujiu wangkinlo chiujiu maniu-e.
Paliuniu kenkakge, “Wanglo, aliuniu Laish tu hasukhe. Aliuniu kadih khat ngao-e. khatdi sise wichang wi-e. Haiga mathaku mathakjiu bamtakhe; kalanglo! Siga mengjiu lulukhe!
Aliuniu siga ngutlusai, simaira wadi maning masabo thiumakge chiubo ngaosune. Sise kadibo kadih khatle; sibo ramse wadi kahabo thiumakge khatdi Tingwang niu sise naliutu pikhai bambo-e.”
Siniu chari thiura Dan kiphiu gasu chamai kai charuk Zorah nai Eshtaol gasu tadpadle.
Paliu khangjiu Judah kadihga bambo Kiriath Jearim gu tingnulam rijiky thiulujiu bamkhaide. Siniu tuhoidi sibo bamtu Dan maigu Rijiky chiujiu kubam kha-e.
Paliuniu sigasu tadpad lujiu Ephraim ramluongga bambo Micah kyga wangkhai-e.

Laish dihtu phuira tadmai khang mangiuniu paliu kamai khuga din-e, “Naliu haiga chaky khatga walun ruilubo situ rangkangginiu makom khai nbambo sima? Siga charameng katambodungdi bamme, chafai-tanidi bamme. Aliu nde kamralo chiubo naliu sima?”
Sichiujiu Levi maipiu lungbambo Micah kyga paliuniu ngutde, khatdi Levi mai akhangpiu khuga pah nde chiujiu lungbamlo chiubo maniu-e.
Siga Dan mai riphendung kai charukniu, chari thiura kaden lujiu, rengmun ga chap bamme.

Singku siniu rengmun ga riphen mai kai charuktu majang lujiu chapbambo wan-ga, chakhumpao mai khang mangiu siniu kalunglam tadtaron son ngutlujiu rangkangginiu makom khai nbambo tasingniu ruilubo rameng, katambo ramengdung khatdi chafai-tani sidi khoilude.
Maidung siniu Micah kyga ngutlujiu charameng khoibo tingga, singkuniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Naliu nde kambam jiulo?”
Paliuniu din-e, “Maliu tulo. Chalad dinmane. Aliugu singku khatdi ladtipao thiura suiwanglo. Kikhun khatgu singku khatdi ladpipao thiubo suang Israel maidunggu singku thiuboniu wimakma?”
Haisiniu singku chun pikiukhai mide, sichiujiu paniu masanbo maniadung khoilujiu paliu saisuijiu tadmide.
Paliuniu malan wangjiu, paliu nahdung, paliugu matom kabui khatdi paliugu khaoruidungtu puilujiu tadmide.
Paliuniu chaky gasu tad madiu mibosai, Micah niu pakining maitu kumadui lujiu Dan maitu chari thiura tadpad sude.
Paliuniu Dan maitu hamengjiu paliutu senjiu kude. Dan mai mariwang lujiu Micah khuga din-e, “Nde gulo? Haibo maibaose ndechiu ralo?”
Micah niu paokakge, “Naliuniu kambose nde thaklo? Naliuniu agu singkutu majanglu khatdi Iniu ruilubo charameng hina sidi khoilujiu tadmide! Aleng nde khaidiak nbamlo?”
Dan mainiu pakhuga din-e, “Nang chalad din makboniu wi-e, nangniu hai maidung lung kampom misai natu kam bine. Sichiusai nang khatdi nakikhun mai shai lune.”
Sichiujiu paliu tad mide. Micah niu paliu hai paleng tanju-e, chiubo ngaolude. Siniu pah pakylam malanwang mide.

Dan maidungniu Micah gu singku nai paniu machalubo maniadung khoilubo saiga, Bethrehob ga bambo ramjengga, agi-manaijiu, chakhuan-chara hajiu lungbambo namdak, Laish maitu paliuniu chari thiude. Paliuniu siga lungmaitu kamshat lujiu namdakse chami matia mide. Siga mai khatniudi paliutu rankhaira ha-e, palamra Laish hai Sidon gasu diumibo-e, sigasu paliu niu mai kakimaitu khat thiubo ha-e. Dan mainiu namdakse thiusu lande,sichiujiu siga lungbam mide.
Paliuniu paliu pao Jacob nahpiu, Dan zan lujiu Laish gasu kali lujiu, Dan chiujiu kumide.

Dan mainiu charamengtu kahum raleng thiusu khaide, khatdi Mose tahpiu Gershom nah Jonathan niu Dan kiphiu maigu singku thiujiu tatien thiubam mide, khatdi maidungtu kavangleng puitad makthen pakai-pakikniu paliugu singku thiujiu macha bamme.
tu kahumbo bam Shiloh ga bambo Mathenkiga Micah gu ramengse bamme.
Nda pawan khat, Israel mainiu chawang bam makhabo masuangga, Levi mai khatniu kadiubo Ephraim gu ramluongga lungbamme. Paniu Judah ga bambo Bethlehem mai liutu parammailiupui leng kude,
chiudi sibo puiniu patu palung pomjiu, papiu ky Bethlehem ga malanwang mide khatdi siga chahiu madai lungkhai mide.

Siga maipiu siniu sibo puitu meng hiamlanjiu pakhuga kuwang lanra kam sude. Paniu pavang khangkhat khatdi qontrao nia majang lujiu tadle. Maipui siniu Levi maipiu situ papiu kyse dinlen khaide siga papiu siniu patu ngaoluboga pachun wijiu lukhaide.
Papaoniu patu manai khaira khamme, siniu pah jengsum manai khaide. Panao-pakinase tiu-sak lujiu sibo nai nchun siga manaikhai lande.
Jeng madaibo nai nsuan-son sulujiu paliu tadsura kaden sude. Chiudi aliupui piuniu Levi maipiu khuga din-e. “Katiu tiukhai lujiu, nawan thiusui lujiu, koina tadlo.”
Siniu panai mathak kiulujiu tiu-sak lude. Sigasu aliupui piuniu pakhuga din-e, “Wide thainchun haiga mathak amansai khailulo.”
Levi maipiuse tadraleng kadenjiu suchap mide, chiudi papaoniu bamra khamlande, siniu sibo nai nchundi siga paniu bamkhai lande.
Jeng mangiubo nai nsuan kalu tadraleng kamme, chiudi aliupui piuniu din-e, “Chalungsajiu watiu khailan lulo. niending khangtang makthen bamkhailo.” Siga panai khangniase tiu-sak aruong lanbam mide.

Sichiujiu sibopiu, parammailiupui, nai pavangpiutu maluong lujiu tadra kamlan sude, papaoniu din-e, phuilo, chawan ramliang mide; nangniu nthai-nchun bamkhai lanluboniu wine. Tamiu wangji surabo-e; haiga bamkhai lanlulo. Nsuan nai nsuan kalu sulujiu tadgap talo.

Chiudi sibo piuniu nchun jikhai lanra suinita mide, siniu parammailiupui panai pavangpiu khatdi qonniam kania bang thiulujiu tadpad mide. Paliuniu Jebush (chiubora Jerusalem) manawangbo tingga chawan mide, siniu pavangpiuniu papaopiu khuga din-e, “Thaichun aliuniu Jebush mai namdiga mathakjiu jikhai miboniu wilakma?”
Chiudi papaopiuniu din-e, “Israel mainiu lungmakbo namdiga aliuniu mathak lakge. Aliuniu pabam diubibo lam tadpad lujiu nchun hai Gibeah maksai Ramah ga jikhaikhe.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu Jebush tadken lujiu paliu tabin npui tadwang mide. Paliuniu Benjamin mai kiphiu gu namdi Gibeah ga wangtangbo tingga naimik ngutmide.
Paliuniu npui kenpad lujiu siga ngut nchun jikhaira kam sude, paliuniu namdi ngutlujiu npui mungga ntao bamme, chiudi mai khatnadi paliu kyga nchun jikhaira paliutu kukhai makge.

Siga paliuniu bambo wan-ga tanpaomai khatniu chalu menglujiu chawan wangde. Pahai karaigara Ephraim gu ramluongga lungbo-e, chiudi tuhoira pahai Gibeah ga lungbam mibo-e. (Siga lungbambo kakimaira Benjamin kiphiu mai-e).
Tanpao siniu namdi npuiga chabin mainiu ntao bambo ngaolujiu pakhuga, “Ndelamniu wangjiulo? Ndelam tadralo?” chiujiu maniu-e.

Levi maipiuniu paokakge, “Aliuniu Judah dihga bambo Bethlehem ga mengbo-e, khatdi tuhoira aliu Ephraim gu ramluongga bambo aliu ky lam malanwang kinbo-e. Mai khatnadi aliutu thaichun bamkhaira kukhai makge.
Konniamleng magao nai patek aliuniu phungkinbo kumjiu arammailiupui, avangpiu aliuleng taruak nai jawdi phungkin-e. Aliuleng pageng bambo hina bam kamme.”
Tanpaoniu din-e, “Puidiga nchun bam pajai makge. Naliu akyga wangkhai milo! Iniu naliutu akhi khaine.”
Sichiujiu paniu paliutu majanglu pakyga wangde khatdi paliugu qonniam situ katiu pikhaibi-e. Pagiang maidung phi nkhiu lujiu katiu tiulude.
Chiudi tanpaoniu kajengga padlujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Makge, akamai-yo! Chiumakge, chalungsajiu kasabo, mangambo tien hai kamkhai tulo! Pahai agiangpiu-e.
Phuilo! Parammailiupui nai anahpui liuchangpui haiga bamme. Iniu panaitu tuhoi majangpad bine, panaitu maluang lulo. Panaitu naliu maning kam lulo. Chiudi tajai makbose haibopiu khuga kamkhai tulo!”

Chiudi maidungniu pacham nking khai makge. Siniu Levi mai piuniu parammailiupuitu kama lenlam majangpad khai bide, paliuniu sibo puituse manomjiu minsude, khatdi patu kam masajiu nchun majang sang khaijiu nsuan katangdi mathak makge.
Tingbenpad miboga maipui siniu tadwang pakinaniu bambo tanpao ky kamun-dengga kaokiu mide khatdi tingben padmak then siga paniu jibamme.
Pakina siniu nsuan sulujiu, tadsura leng nkham lepadboga panaoniu kamundengga paben gailujiu kaobam niubo ngaode.
Paniu din-e, “Susulo, Aliu tadsukhe.” Chiudi siga paokak makge. Siga paniu patu ponlujiu qonniam riga khailujiu pakylam tadwang mide.
Paniu pakyga wangtangbo wan-ga, paniu ngutlujiu paheng khoilujiu parammailiupui pum situ pakang kariu-je-niakiu leng dangpad lujiu, Israel mai kiphiu hinaleng pakang khat-khat njan khaide.

Sise kangaomai hinaniu din-e, “Haikumbo wadaodi ngaokhai matai makge! Israel mainiu Egypt ga npadlubo ganiu tuhoi katangbo haikumbo pad matai makge! Haibo lamga aliuniu wakhat kamrabo-e! Nde kamsai wiralo?”
Israel mai hina tingpilam bambo Dan gasu tingrun lam bambo Beersheba tangbo, sigasu tingbang lam bambo Gilead dih niudi kukhaibose kenkak khai-e. Paliuniu
Israel mai kiphiu hinagu jupaodungniu Tingwang maidung maduiboga jaokamme, khatdi siga chaphi rimai 400,000 bamme.
Sichiujiu Israel mai hinaniu Mizpah ga madui mide chiubo Benjamin kiphiu mainiu simide.
Israel mainiu maniu-e, “Aliu khuga dinkhailo, ndechiujiu haikumbo tajai kammakbo kammibo gulo?”
Parammailiupui shaimibo Levi maipiu siniu paokakge, “Arammailiupui anainiu Benjamin dihga bambo Gilead ga nchun bamkhai raleng ngutle.
Gibeah mainiu nchun atu kamra chaky taowenglujiu wang-e. Paliuniu atu kamshat miraleng kamme; siga paliuniu arammailiupuitu manomjiu minde; sichiujiu pahai shaimide.
Iniu papum ponwang, dantap taplujiu kangkhat-khat Israel mai kiphiu hinaleng njan khaibo-e. Haibo maidungniu kasabo lunlung, mangambo tien Israel mai riga kamkhai mide.
Naliu haiga bammai hina Israel mai-e. Haibo lamga aliuniu nde kamralo?”
Mai hina chapsu lujiu ladkeng khat thiujiu din-e, “Aliu mai khatnadi, mathenkyga lungmaidi, chakyga lungmaidi, chakylam malanwang lakge.
Aliu haichiu kam rabo-e: aliuniu taden phui rabo-e khatdi chamai kasiatu kadalujiu Gibeah tu harabo-e.

Israel mai jan-kariu thiujiu jan-khatniu riphen maileng katiu kasak kadenjiu akhine, khatdi kakimainiu Gibeah ga meng rabo-e, sichiujiu paliuniu Israel maitu mangambo tien kambo donniu sajai pirabo-e.
Sichiujiu Israel mai hina chunkhat thiujiu—namdak situ asunra makhiam lude.
Israel mai kiphiudungniu champaomaitu langkhaijiu Benjamin dih pakhiangnaga din-e, “Naliuniu ndechiujiu haikumbo kasabo tien kammi gulo?
Tuhoi, Gibeah ga kasabo tien thiumaitu pipadlo chiusai aliuniu simaitu kamshat mine khatdi Israel mai khugasu kasabo luthon mine.” Chiudi Benjamin kiphiu mainiu sibo chamtu paliu lung ngutkhai makge.
Benjamin kiphiu mai namdi hina gasu Israel maitu atungjiu aphen raleng Gibeah ga wang-e.

Sibo nai paliuniu riphenmai sang makai charuktu namdi gasu kupadlu-e. Paliu suangdi nkiujiu Gibeah mainiu, kadalubo mawilam wa thinsibo chamai kai chinnia bamme. Paliuniu thamhiukeng tudi chapiniu kettao lulakbo wadi thiumakge.
Sichiujiu Israel maidungniu Benjamin kiphiu mai makbo kati mawilubo riphenmai 400,000 khomwang nbamme.
Israel mainiu chara kahumbo bam Bethel ga mengde khatdi siga paliuniu Tingwang khuga maniu-e, “Sao kiphiuniu Benjamin maitu charithiu rai ralo?”
Sichiujiu Israel mainiu pasaibo nai tadpat lujiu Gibeah namdi mungga rijibam thiulu bamde.
Paliuniu Benjamin riphen maitu chari thiura tadpadjiu riphenmai mathiuse namdilam marijiu bamde.
Benjamin riphenmainiu namdi gasu padjiu chawan wang makhabo masuangga Israel mai riphen sang makai-je-nia kiutu gimide.
Siga Israel maidungniu kahumbo bamga wanglujiu
Sichiujiu Israel mai riphendungtu kam mahu khaide, khatdi paliuniu pasuangbo nai kamkhai mibo kumjiu chari maidungtu pi bamkhai lande.
Niabo thiujiu paliuniu Benjamin riphen maitu atungjiu hangutle.
Khatdi paniabo thiujiu Benjamin mainiu Gibeah gasu padjiu siga paliuniu kati mawilubo Israel riphenmai sang kariu tachattu gimide.
Sijengniu Israel mai hina Bethel ga khanglujiu achung sude. Paliuniu
Sibo tingga Tingwang gu Chamriat Bungse Bethel ga bamme, khatdi Aaron tah Eleazer nahpiu Phinehas niu sise akhijiu bambo-e. Maidungniu
Sichiujiu Israel mainiu riphen kasiatu Gibeah namditu taomagui lujiu nbai khai bamme.
Sichiujiu paliuniu pasumbo nai Benjamin riphen maitu atungjiu hangutle khatdi nthen masuang kumjiu riphen mai charibamga chaplujiu Gibeah jailam marilu bamme.

Benjamin mainiu chari thiura padle khatdi namdi ganiu tad madiu padmide. Masuang kumjiu paliuniu Israel maitu Bethel tadbo npui khatdi Gibeah tadbo npuiga chiujiu kamshat sude. Paliuniu Israel mai khang samriu kumbotu kamshat mide.
Benjamin mainiu din-e, “Aliuniu masuang kambo kumjiu paliutu bikao lude.”
Chiudi Israel mainiu tasiam kamjiu namdi gasu majang madiu padmide.
Israel mai riphenbaose masai npadle khatdi Baaltamar ga wang aruong lande, Gibeah tu taoweng bam mainiu paliu nbai bam, namditu magui bambo tulimki gasu hapad sude.
Israel mai kakganiu nkiubo mai kadalubo sang kariuniu Gibeah tu chari thiusude, khatdi charise tanchang-tan sude. Benjamin mainiu paliutu kamkao mirabotu silu makge.
niu Israel maitu Benjamin riphenmai situ chari pingam khaide. Sibonai Israel mainiu mikremai 25,100 tu kamshat mide.
Siga Benjamin mainiu paliutu kamkao mide chiubo silude.
Parathiubo Israel mai riphen baoniu Benjamin gasu malan npadde, palamra paliuniu Gibeah tu taoweng lujiu bambo maidungtu paripse pikhai mibo-e.
Sibo maidung siniu kalangjiu Gibeah lam ngut mide. Paliuniu namdiga tadmara padlujiu mai hinatu kamshat mide.
Parathiubo Israel mai riphenbao khatdi nbai bambo maidungniu madan khat kamme. Paliuniu namdak gasu mikhut khakhangbo ngaobo wan-ga,

Israel mainiu sulujiu charibamga ngutrabo-e. Sibo wan-ga Benjamin mainiu Israel mai samriutu kamshat mide. Paliuniu paliu ronna din-e, “Yo, aliuniu nthen masuang kamkhai mibo kumjiu paliutu bikao mide.
Sibo wan-ga madanse ngaode; namdak gasu mikhut khakhang sude. Benjamin maidungniu paliu sailam mariwangbo tingga namdak pakhiangnase chaminiu tao marenjiu taokhangbo ngaoboga paliu suang hamide.
Sigasu Israel maidungniu mariwangjiu Benjamin maitu kam nping charen mide palamra paliutu kam mahami rabose paliuniu simide.
