Paliuniu Israel mai khugasu malan lujiu kadih maruangbo bamlam pakkhai sude. Chiudi paliu paksi lulak mide. Paliutu parathiubo riphenbao nai namdi gasu npadbo maidung kakga minlude. Sichiujiu paliutu kam maha kammide.
Israel mainiu mikremaidungtu tathak gasu minlude, khatdi mathak makjiu hatajudwang Gibeah gu tingbanglam katang paliutu kamshat mide.
Benjamin mai riphen withumai sang kariu tachat kiutu kamshat mide.

Kakimainiu kadih maruangbo bamlam pakkhaijiu Rimmon Tudi lam pakkhai mide, paliu sang mangiutu npuiki ganiu kamshat mide, khatdi Israel mainiu Gideon lam bamdiak mibo maitu sang niatu kamshat lan mide.
Pakhiangna sibo nai Benjamin mai sang makai mangiutu kamshat mide, paliu mathiuse katan-kahubo riphendung-e.
Chiudi chamai kai charuk haira charam maruong bambo Rimmon Tudilam pakkhaijiu mari lude, khatdi paliuniu siga chahiu madai bamkhai mide.
Sichiujiu Israel mai malanwang Benjamin maitu maipui, maipiu khatdi nahmaidung sigasu khaoruidung hinadi kamshat mide. Paliuniu sibo wonjengga bambo namdak hina rumide.
Israel mainiu Mizpah ga maduilanbo wan-ga, paliuniu
Sichiujiu Israel mainiu Bethel ga wangde khatdi Tingwang bambo bam gase chawan katang bam khaide. Paliu khuan tanjiu khatdi paliu lung paliu rai thiujiu kapsude:
“Israel mai Rawang,
Pasaibo nai nsuan kalu maidungniu rathakbam khat siga thiukhailu, chakin thiubogu rathak leng khatdi rukhaibo rathak thiukhaide.

Paliuniu maniu-e. “Israel mai kiphiu ruangga maidung kasianiu Tingwang bambo bam Mizpah ga wang aruangbo wan-ga wangmakbo bamma?” (Mai khat kumbo Mizpah ga wangmaksai kamshat mirabo-e chiujiu paliuniu katanbo ladriat lumibo-e).
Israel maidungniu paliu singna Benjamin kiphiu maidung lamga chunsajiu din-e, “Thainai Israel mai kiphiu khat hamide.
Aliuniu masiak bambo Benjamin kiphiu mai naoleng aliu ndethak kamralo? Aliuniu
Israel mai kiphiudung kasianiu Mizpah ga wang aruangbo wan-ga jaomakbo bamma, chiujiu phiubo wan-ga, Gilead ga bambo Jabesh mai khatdi jaomak niubo paliuniu daolude,
riphen maidunggu tazan kubo gadi Jabesh gasu mai khatnadi kenkak makge.
Siniu madui bambo maidungniu paliugu withubo chamai sang kariu niakiutu haibo chamtan pikhaijiu langkhaide, “Tadlujiu Jabesh ga bambo maipui mainah pakhiangnatu kamshat kam milo.
Npiumai hina khatdi liuchang makmai hinatu kamshat milo.”
Jabesh mai ruangga liuchang kai madaitu paliuniu daolude, sichiujiu paliuniu Canaan ga bambo Shiloh gu rijikyga paliutu majang wangde.
Siga madui bammai mathiuniu Rimmon Tudiga bambo Benjamin maidung khuga chari thiuloi mide chiubo lad langkhaide.
Benjamin maidung malan wangde, khatdi kakibo Israel maidungniu paliutu Jabesh gasu paliuniu kamshat makbo aliumaidung situ pikhaide. Chiudi simaidung lengse chang makge.
Maidung siniu Benjamin maidung lamga amanta mide. palamra
Siniu aruang bambo jupaodungniu din-e, “Benjamin kiphiuga npuimai khatnadi hamide. Masiak khai diakbo maidung naoleng aliu nde kamkhe chiulo?
Israel mai kiphiu kariu-je-niakiu haise khatnadi hamak rabo-e. Benjamin kiphiu ringlura aliuniu npui khat phiurabo-e,
chiudi aliu nahpuidungtu lungraleng paliutu aliuniu suikhai mak rabo-e, palamra aliu nahpuidungtu Benjamin maidungniu magiang raleng suikhai mai riga aliuniu tasiang siangkhai mibo-e.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu makumme, “Takum machanggu Shiloh ga
Paliuniu Benjamin maidung khuga din-e, “Mumsirengga meng nbai lujiu khuan bamlo.

Shiloh ga bambo aliumaidungniu changee tingga chalen lenraleng padbo wan-ga, naliuniu mumsireng ganiu tadpadlo. Naliu khangkhat-khatniu aliumai ruanggasu matanjiu naliu naoleng lululo, khatdi paliutu Benjamin kadihlam majang lujiu wangmilo.

Paliu piubo maksai paliu piuniu naliu khuga menglujiu khengsai, haichiu dinlo, “Chalungsa khailo, aliuniu paliutu charithiubo gasu aliu naoleng majang lubo makge. Chiudi naliuniu paliutu aliuleng pikhai makbo gasu-e, naliuniu ladriat naliugu kampangbogu kamaobo makge.”

Benjamin maidungniu haichiu kamde; paliu mai hina Shiloh ga chalen lenbo aliumai ruanggasu paliu naoleng kadalujiu paliutu paliu dihlam majangwang mide. khatdi paliugu namdakdung thiulanjiu siga lungmide.
Sichiujiu kakibo Israel maidungdi tad mide, khatdi mai hinaniu pakiphiumai, pakikhunmai khatdi pagu chakhiu bamboga malan wang mide.

Nda, Israel mai wang thiumakbo tingga, charakhum khat paliu kadihga wang-e. Sijengniu Judah ga bambo, Bethlehem gasu Ephrath kiriang gasu mai khat, pazanniu Elimelech kubo hainiu panao Naomi khatdi panah kania Mahlon nai Chilion tu puilujiu Moab kadihga pakak khat lungtad sude.
Paliuniu siga lungbambo tingga, Elimelech shai mide, sichiujiu Naomi nai panah kaniatu ronna khaidiakge,
panainiu Moab mailiu—Orpah nai Ruth tu magiang lujiu maluang lung bamme.
Takum kariu saiga, Mahlon nai Chilion di shailan mide, sichiujiu pakinadi, panah kaniadi shaimijiu Naomi paronna bam mide.

Pakak khat saiga
Judah lam malan wangra paliu tadpad sude, chiudi npuikiga paniu panai khuga din-e,
“Chakyga malanwang, nanai pui khuga bammi talo. Nanainiu akhuga khatdi shaimi maidung khuga kawibo kumgapjiu,
Sichiujiu
Sichiujiu Naomi niu panaitu ramnajiu biang-hiu khai sude. Chiudi siga panai kapjiu dinsude,
“Chiumakge! Anaidi namaidung khulam, nasai suitad rabo-e.”
Naomi niu paokakge, “Anahpui kania yo, nanai malanwang siak sulo. Deleng nanainiu asai suitad nijiulo? Iniu anah npiumai lunglan lujiu nanaitu pijiu maluang lunglan lubui-e chiu nanai maning jiuma?
Chakylam malanwang sulo, Idi milanra tanpehju mide. Anah lunglanbo sui-e, chiujiu Iniu thaichun siak milujiu anah lunglan tadi panai akhang-khangbo katang nanai khonlu rama?
Haichiujiu nanainiu kakimai khuga milanmi ratu khamlu rama? Sichiu makge, anahpui kania yo, sisera wadaodi padsi lakge.
Sichiujiu paliu kaplan sude. Siga Orpah niu panaitu biang-hiu khailu ramnajiu, pakylam malanwang mide, chiudi Ruth niura panaitu kiapmanting lujiu bammide.
Siga Naomi niu pakhuga din-e, “Ruth yo, naningpuira pamaidung khatdi pa-rawang khulam malanwang mide. Nangdi pasai suilujiu tadsulo.”

Chiudi Ruth niu paokakge, “Natu saodiakra akhuga dintulo! Ira nasai suitad rabo-e. Nangniu tadbo bamga, I tadne, nangniu lungboga, I lungne. Namaise amai thiu rabo-e, khatdi na Rawang se a Rawang thiurabo-e.
Nang kashaibo bamga, I shairabo-e, khatdi atu siga baikhai rabo-e. kashaiboniu makjiu wakhat katamboniu pijiu ramna khaisai,
Ruth niu wakam tadi pasai suitad rabo-e chiubo Naomi niu ngaomiboga walad dinsan tamide.
Sichiujiu panai khangniase Bethlehem wangtang makthen tadsude. Panainiu siga wangtangboga, sibo namdakse chunwibo khuanniu rio-rio mide, siga maipuidung siniu haichiu dinsude, “Pachangjiu haise Naomi
Siga paniu paokakge, “Atu Naomi chiujiu kutalo, chiudi Marah
Iniu haibo bamtu phutlu, tadmibo tinggara agu kengjiu bamniu-e, chiudi
Haichiu Naomi niu Moab maipui, pamupui Ruth tu maluanglu wangbo-e. Panainiu Bethlehem ga wangbo tingga hai tathiu lu atiat sugapbo wan-e.
Pakina Elimelech kikhun gasu kalek kawibo khatdi pazan katadbo piu pazanniu Boaz kubo, Naomi singna khat bamme.
Naikhat Ruth niu Naomi khuga din-e, “Atiatjiu bammai luga I meng chamiu pon mataine. Maomakjiu mai khat kumbora pijiu pasai suikhai sune.”
Naomi niu paokakge, “Anah yo, tad matailo.”
Siga Ruth niu tadlujiu, luzamga tatien thiu bammai saisui lujiu, paliuniu pon kabangbo miubuidungse khom madui sude. Paniu mengbambo haise Boaz gu luga bamniu-e.
Pakak khat saiga Boaz papumsiak Bethlehem lamsu wanglujiu tatien thiubam maidungtu kahumme. “
Paliuniu paokakge, “
Tatien thiubam maidunggu papee khuga Boaz niu maniu-e, “Uibo maipuise saolo?”
Maipiu siniu paokakge, “Pahai Moab lamsu Naomi saisui wangbo sangdiumai pui-e.
Tatien thiumai saisui lujiu miubuise khom madui khaira, akhuga khengbo-e. Pahai nsuan kalu gasu khoikinjiu, tuhoi siakniu mathakra kahiuga ntaokiu khai gapbo-e.”
Siga Boaz niu Ruth khuga din-e, “Iniu natu kasia ladpi khaine. Haibo luga makjiu kakilam miusy khomra tadmane. Maipuidung situ maluang lujiu haiga tatien thiu bamlo;
paliuniu gebo jamse phuilujiu, paliu saisui tadlo. Natu kam mangam makra Iniu chamtan pimibo-e. Sichiujiu nangniu charibo tingga, paliuniu thuakkhai nbambo tadui-khiu gasu wang saklo.”
Ruth niu pazu kadihga makhumkiu lujiu Boaz khuga din-e. “Dekamjiu nangniu ajeng gasu haijiukha pukhai jiulo? Sangdiumai khattu dekamjiu nangniu haijiukha lungsakhai jiulo?”

Boaz niu paokakge, “Nakina shaimibo saiga nangniu nanai khuga kamkhai mibo hinase Iniu chiu-e. Sigasu nangniu napui-napiutu phutlu khatdi nadihtu phutlujiu nangniu wadaodi simatai makbo maidung ruangga dechiujiu lungra nang wang bamlo chiubo Iniu si-e.
Nangniu kamkhai—thiukhai miboga
Ruth niu paokakge, “Paohubo yo, nangniu atu kengkha lungsa khaibi-e. I hai navangmai khangkhat kum tangmak tadi, nangniu atu lungsa khaijiu koina npao khai bibo jengniu achun kam matha khaibide.”

Tek tiubo tingga Boaz niu Ruth khuga din-e, “Wangjiu taruak khuang khat tiu khailo, khatdi chakuang gasu sumlujiu tiulo.” Sijengniu tatien thiubam maidung saisui lujiu pah ntao kiu-e, siga rulubo taruak khuang Boaz niu paleng pikhai bide. Pawon-magiu katang pah tiulubo saiga katiuse kasia masiak lande.

Paniu miubuise khoilanra tadmibo tingga Boaz niu patien thiubam maidung khuga chamtan pi-e. “Miukhum gasu tangbo patu pijiu khoisulo, patu wadi khamra kamtulo. Sibo rigadi miukhum gasudi thadpad lujiu khaidiak bilo, sichiujiu patu pi khoikhuan lulo.”
Sichiujiu Ruth niu chawan tangbo miubuise khom madui sude, sise paniu biupadboga, taju kariu kumbo padle.
Paniu daolubose chakylam phungwangjiu, paniu dejiukha daolulo chiubose panai khuga lende. Paniu tiu masiak padbo katiu sidi phungwang pakhuga pikhaide.
Naomi niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Delamsu nangniu thainai hajiukha daolu jiulo? Sao luga nang meng jiulo? Natu lungsa khaibopiu tuse Tingwang niu thoikhaibo thiumilo!”
Maipiu pazanniu Boaz kubo luga mengbo-e chiujiu Ruth niu Naomi khuga dinkhaide.
Siga Ruth niu din-e, “Withubo sira, atiat loimak then, patien thiubam maidung saisui lujiu khoi bamra paniu akhuga dinkhai-e.”
Naomi niu Ruth khuga din-e, “Yo, anahpui yo, maipuidung saisui lujiu nangniu Boaz luga tatien thiubo siniu naleng wi-nkiu rabo-e. Nangniu mai kakimai luga mengsai, natu kam masakhai bidi sui-e.”
Sichiujiu Ruth niu tathiu nai chabanmiuse atiat loimak then paliu saisui lujiu miubuise khoiwang-e. Sichiujiu paniu panaitu maluang lung bamme.
Pakak khat saiga Naomi niu Ruth khuga din-e, “Nangniu naronna naky thiulujiu lungra, Iniu nakina leng phiukhai rabo-e.
Nangniu maipuidung saisui lujiu tatien thiuwang kinbo piu, Boaz hai akygu singnamai khatle chiubo maningtaolo. Tuhoi nking mawilo. Thainai chawan hai paniu tathiu hai biurabo-e.

Sijengniu nkhiu mawilujiu, parim wibose manuk sulo, khatdi nagu withubo fainise khai lulo. Sichiujiu paniu asai biurabo gase mengsulo, chiudi paniu tiulu makthen khatdi saklu makthen pijiu nang kabambose patu pijiu situlo.
Paniu kajibo bamse phuilujiu pah jipting miboga wang pafaise kaluikhang benlujiu, paphiga jikiulo. Siga nangniu degu kamralo chiubo paniu nakhuga dinkhai sune.”
Ruth niu paokakge, “Nangniu kadinbo hinase Iniu kamne.”
Sichiujiu Ruth niu asaiphung gase tadlujiu panainiu pakhuga dinkhaibo kumgapjiu kamsude.
Boaz niu tiulu saklubo sai pachun matha sude. Paniu magaotong khatga tadlujiu jikiu sude. Ruth niu koina tadlujiu chafaise kaganpad lujiu paphiga jikiu sude.
Nchunse paniu jikiang sujiu mariwangboga, paphiga maipui khat jibam niuboga, pasuang hamide.
Paniu maniu-e, “Nang hai saolo?”
“Paohubo yo, I hai Ruth si-e,” chiujiu paniu paokakge, “Palamra nangniu atu akhikhaira pathao bambo-e, nang hai nathubo singna khatle. Sijengniu lungsajiu atu lukhailo.”
Paniu din-e, “
Ruth yo, tuhoira nalung chariu talo, Nangniu kadinbo hinase Iniu kamkhai bine; namga bammai hinaniu nang hai nazu-nalun wi-e chiubo sibambo-e.
I hai lungmana thubo singnamai khatle, siniu natu phuikhaira angam—angiu bambo-e, chiudi asuangdi manadiangbo mai khat bamkha-e.

Thaichunra haiga bamlulo, nsuan padsai paniu natu phuikhai rama, phuikhai lakma chiubo anainiu phuikhe. Daosai wide, daomak tasai, ringbambo Rawang zan gasu Iniu siangjiu dinbo-e chiubora Iniu paripse phungrabo-e. Tuhoira jisulo khatdi nsuan tingbenpad makthen haiga bamsulo.”
Sijengniu paphiga jikhai lujiu tingben masan makhaga, mainiu patu simakra, palamra Boaz niudi pah siga bamkhai-e chiubo mai khat tudi pisikhai nimakbo jengniu—buangsu lujiu tadmide.

Boaz niu pakhuga din-e, “Nafai gaopad lujiu haiga hamkhailo.” Paniu hamkhaiboga, paniu tathiuse taju makai kumbo bonkhai lujiu pamakhuak ga ponthon khai bide. Sise ponlujiu kaluang lamse pah wang mide.
Paniu pakyga wangboga, panainiu pakhuga maniu-e, “Anahpui yo, dechiujiu tadkiu khai milo?”
Boaz niu pakhuga kamkhaibo hinase Ruth niu pakhuga dinkhaide.
Paniu dinlan-e, “Apumrong ronna nakhuga wangbo suimakge chiubo pah dinkhai lujiu haibo tathiuse aleng khaibibo-e.”
Naomi niu pakhuga din-e, “Ruth yo, tuhoira pakhiangna degu padralo chiubo koina khuanjiu phuira mide. Haibo lamse masan makthen, Boaz niu thainai mathak silak mibo-e.”

Boaz niu namgu maduibo bam rengmun gase meng ntaojiu bamde. Siga Boaz niu Elimelech gu nadiangbo singna khat bamme chiujiu dinkhai mibo piuse tadwang sude, siga Boaz niu patu kulujiu din-e, “Akabo yo, wanglo, ntao kiulo.” Siga paniu wangjiu ntao kiude.
Sigasu namgu jupaodung khang kariutu Boaz niu kukhaijiu, paliudi wang ntao kiude.
Paliuniu ntao kiuboga, paniu pasingnapiu khuga din-e, “Tuhoira Naomi niu Moab kadih lamsu malanwang lujiu, aliu singna Elimelech gu chaluse jonni mide,

siniu haibo lamse nangniu sibui-e chiubo Ira maning-e. Sichiujiu nangniu haise luni-e sai, tuhoi haiga ntaobam maidung masuang gasu liulu sulo. Chiudi nangniu luni makge sai dinlo, palamra haise raiboga nangniu liura pamaji bamme, sibo saigara Iniu liura amaji bambo-e.”
Sibopiu siniu din-e, “Iniu haise lurabo-e.”
Siga Boaz niu din-e, “Wichang wide, chiudi nangniu Naomi khugasu chalubamse liusai, Moab mai kamipui, Ruth situdi nangniu liurabo-e, sichiujiu sibo lubamse kikhun-gu shai mibo piu zan-ga bamrabo-e.”
Maipiu siniu paokakge, “Sichiusai Iniu chalu bamse liurabo gasu phutmi tane, palamra sise anahsiak mainiu sibogu kalekse lusi lakbo-e. Ira lumak tane, nang liulu sulo.”
Sijengniu, “Nang liulu sulo,” chiujiu maipiu siniu Boaz khuga dinbo tingga, paniu paphitop khoipad lujiu Boaz khuga pikhaide.
Siga Boaz niu siga ntao bambo jupaodung mathiu khuga din-e, “Thainai Iniu Elimelech khatdi panah kania Chilion nai Mahlon gu kabambo hinase Naomi khugasu liulude.

Sibo riga sanjiu—Mahlon gu kamipiu, Moab maipui, Ruth hai anao thiu mide. Haisiniu shai mibo kikhun-gu mania hinadi, pamaidung ruangga khatdi panamga pakiriang lin pijiu bamrabo-e. Thainai haise naliuniu lamchap thiubo-e.”
Jupaodung nai maidung siniu din-e, “Yo, aliu hai lamchap-e.
Haibo pui khugasu lungbo nahmaidung situ pijiu
Sijengniu Ruth tu Boaz niu panao leng pakylam puilu wangmide.
Maipuidung siniu Naomi khuga din-e, “

Namupui siniu natu lungsa-e, sichiujiu paniu npiumai nah khang chinnia suang monjiu kamkhai bide. Tuhoira paniu natah khat lungkhai bamde, sichiujiu paniu nang tanpeh mibo tingga pijiu natu manang makjiu kasanbo ringting pikhai rabo-e.”
Naomi niu ngena situ ponlujiu kiapman lude
Kiningga lungbo puidung siniu ngena zanse Obed chiujiu mathak khaide. Paliuniu mathiu khuga haichiujiu paosude, ‘Naomi leng npiumainah khat lungwang nbamme!”
Obed haise Jesse piu-e, pahai David piu-e.
Haise Perez gasu David tangbo kiriang si-e: Perez, Hezron, Ram, Amminadab, Nahshon, Salmon, Boaz, Obed, Jesse, David.
Ephraim ramluong dihga Ramah kubo namdi poinaga Ephraim kiphiu gasu Elkanah kubopiu lungbam niu-e. Pahai Jeroham nahpiu khatdi Elihu tahpiu-e, khatdi Zuph kiriangga Tohu kimai-e.
Elkanah panao nia-e, Hannah nai Peninnah-e. Peninnah ra panah lung-e, chiudi Hannah ra panah lungmakge.
Eli nahpiu kania Hophni nai Phinehas niu
Elkanah niu pipadjiu kadkhai machang damkhatse panao Peninnah leng khatdi damkhatniu panahmaidung leng pi-e.
Paniu Hannah tu haijiuga lungsa bamdi damkhat ronna pibam di-e, palamra
Peninnah, pagu mikrepuiniu patu re-e, khatdi kam mangam-e, palamra
Takum machang haichiu padle, paliuniu
Pakina Elkanah niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Hannah yo, nang dekamjiu kapbam jiulo? Nang dekamjiu makim bamjiulo? Dejengniu nalung chariutan-tan bamjiulo? I hai naleng nanah khang kariu suang nkiubo makma?”
Naikhat Shiloh ga paliu
Hannah niu ladrian thiujiu din-e; “Ngamkambo
Hannah niu pawan thengjiu
Hannah niu pakhuan padmakjiu pamuntai ronna malaijiu palungchun lamsu kakheng thiu-e. Sijengniu Eli niu maning-e haibopui hai jaw maniu mibo-e,
sichiujiu pakhuga din-e, “Jaw sak maniulubose naronna kamlen tami sulo! Jaw sak maniubo gasu maring padmi sulo!”
Hannah niu paokakge, “Makge paohubo yo, jaw maniubo makge, I wadaodi jaw sak makge! I hai alung ganiu
I haira gengmakbo pui-e chiu maning mane. I alung chariu-chang chariu mibo jengniu I haichiujiu kakhengthiu bambo-e.”
Eli niu din-e, “Agi manaijiu tadsulo, sichiujiu nangniu khengbo hina Israel maigu Tingwang niu pikhaibo thiu milo.”
Paniu paokakge, “Atu lungsajiu pawan machang maningtao khailo.” Sichiujiu pah tadmide, katiudi tamnakha tiulude, khatdi palung chariubodi hamide.
Pasaibo nai nsuan Elkanah khatdi pakikhunmai mai buangsu jilujiu,
Haichiujiu Hannah papum ripjiu panah piumai khat manade, paniu pazan leng Samuel mathak khaide, parambaniu “Iniu
Elkanah nai pakikhunmai maidungniu Shiloh lam tadjiu
Chiudi haibo wan ga Hannah niu mengmakge. Paniu pakina khuga din-e, “Ngena situ alao lubo sainiu, Iniu patu hai

Elkanah niu paokakge, “Wide nangniu wirabose kamsulo, ngena situ alao lumak thenna chakyga bam sulo. Tingwang khuga nagu ladriatse pachangjiu pipadbo thiumi sulo.” Sichiujiu Hannah niu ngena tuse akhijiu chakyga bammide.
Ngena situ paniu alao lubo sai Samuel tu majang lujiu takum sum tangmibo matomchi khat, takhuimoi taju kariu, khatdi jaw-lah khat phunglujiu Shiloh lam
Matomchi kamshat lujiu ngena tuse Eli khulam puimengde.
Hannah niu pakhuga din-e, “Atu maningtao bamma? Haiga chaplujiu
Iniu haibo ngenase pakhuga khengbo-e, khatdi Iniu khengbose paniu pikhai bide.
Sijeng gasu Iniu patu
Sichiujiu paliuniu sibo bamga
paniu kamkhai bibo jengniu dejiukha achunwi gulo!
Agu mikremaitu Iniu nui-e;
Tingwang atu nkha khaibo jengniu dejiukha achun wilo!
pakumbo mai khatdi ha-e,
aliu Rawang kumjiu gukhaibo mai khatdi ha-e.
Wasao thiuta sulo; wasao thiubo ladse saojing milo,
khatdi chamainagu ngamkamtu paniu ladjan thiu-e.
Katanbo riphenmaigu tavaithuse paniu kamtang khai-e,
chiudi kasonmai situ pitan khai ngamme.
Pawan khatga tiu-mali malanjiu bambo maidungse
tuhoira paliu tiutekleng phijiu bamme,
chiudi mariu maidungse tuhoira mariu lan tamide.
Nahkampui siniu panah khang chinnia lung nbamme,
chiudi panah kengbo puise wadi masiak khai makge.
paniu chamaitu kashaibo kadihga langkhai-e,
khatdi paliutu jusu khai lanne.
Paniu khangsia maitu kalek pi sakhai-e
khatdi khangsiatu pi wikhai-e;
khangsiatu pi manonkiu khai, khangsiatu pidikhai-e.
Paniu kalek samaitu tabuijiu gasu jusu khai,
khatdi pageng bammaitu paliugu chariubo gasu jusukhai-e.
Paliutu pijiu chawang nahmaitu chaka thiukhai bi-e,
chakhuang thiubo bamga paliutu pibam khai-e.
Kadihgu kaphung hai
sibo riga paniu kadihpiri hai thiukhaibo-e.
“Pakhuga chamchang maidung ringtingtu gukhaibi-e,
chiudi kasamai sira tamiuboga hakhai mi-e;
mai khatniu pagu pumtan gasu charise ngamlu makge.
paliu riga tinggen lamsu paniu tingsim langkhaine,
pagu chawang leng paniu pumtan pine,
Paniu kadalubo chawangtu pijiu chari ngam khaine.”
Sichiujiu Elkanah se paky Ramah lam malanwang mide, chiudi panahpiu Samuel sira Shiloh ga
Eli nahpiudungse kasabo maidung-e, paliu hai

maksai singkudungniu maidungtu dinkhaijiu bambo tacheng lamga paliu lung ngut makge. Sibosung mai khatniu pagu rathak thiurabose pipadboga, singkudunggu machamai siniu parangsum bambo wathuakpekse thinlujiu wang-e. Chamise langjiu bamga,
paniu pagu wathuakpekse chaganli lungga raokhai-e, sigasu wathuakpek siniu rampadbo hinase singkugu thiurabo-e. Shiloh ga rathak mania kadkhaira wangbo Israel mai hina khuga haichiujiu kamgap-gap-e.

Sibo rigasu pasase lupad lujiu chamiga rujiu kadkhai makhabo masuang gasu singkutu machamainiu wangjiu rathak thiubo piu khuga haichiu din-e, “Singku leng rubira chami kasia pilo; langlubo mise paniu luni makge, langmakbo ronna lu-e.”

“Majibose tenkhe, siniu chamise rukhai raikhe, sigasu nangniu lunibo hina lusui-e,” chiujiu maipiuniu sichiu paokak sai; Singkugu machamainiu din-e, “Suilakge tuhoi aleng pilo! Nangniu suimaksai Iniu sutjiu lumi rabo-e.”
Eli nahpiudunggu nuan hai
Sibo wan ga npiumainah Samuel hainiu masanbo fainoi ntiang khai lujiu
Papui nai papiuniu takum gu rathak thiura tad machangga pah-tiang poi khat charui lujiu phung meng-meng-e.
Siga Eli niu Elkanah nai panao khuga thoidam pikhaijiu Elkanah khuga din-e, “Nanainiu
Sichiujiu panai kylam malanwang mide.
Tuhoira Eli hai tanpaosui mide. Panahpiu kanianiu Israel maidung riga kambo hinase paniu chiude, panainiu
Sijengniu paniu panai khuga din-e, “Dekamjiu haikumbo ngam nanainiu kambam gulo? Nanainiu kasa kambo hina maidungniu akhuga dinbamme.
Haikumbose saomilo, anahmaidung yo!
Mai khatniu mai khat khuga nuan kamsai Tingwang niu patu chapdang khai lubui-e, chiudi
“Chiudi paladse panainiu nkingkhai makge, sijengniu
Ngena Samuel hai dikhangjiu Chara chamainiu lunibo lunlungga tankhang-e.
Phaimiukakung khatniu Eli khuga wangjiu din-e, “

Israel mai kiphiu pakhiangna gasu paky khuntu agu rathak bamga machajiu, parim wibose mataora, sigasu fainoi ntiang taronbose piulujiu atu npaora kadakhai mibo-e, khatdi rathak bamga rujiu kadkhaibo rathak maniase paliu dam lura Iniu pikhai mibo-e.

Chiusai dekamjiu amaidungniu pageng bamjiu rathak bamga kadkhaibo haitu namik phuiga haijiuga agem gulo? Eli dekamjiu atu suang, nangnah maitu chakhuang thiujiu amaidungniu aleng kadkhaibo ruanggasu withubo jamse kada gulo?
Israel mai
Phuilo nakykhunmai khatdi nakiriang mai chabonmai pakhiangna situ kamshat mira pawan wangkinne. Sichiusai nakykhunmai ruangga ringtheng ramai hamine.
Israel mai kakimai khuga thoidam pikhaibo wan-ga nalung makjiu khatdi kiamjiu bamsune, siga nakykhunmai sira mai khatnadi thenthuijiu lungtang lulak mide.
Chiudi nakai-kik khangkhat gasu singku kumjiu atu machara masiak khaine, chiudi sibo piuse pamik tiat mine, khatdi pachun thiusi lakmi sune, khatdi nakai-kik kakibo hinara tashit kasaga shai sune.
Nanahpiu kania Hophni nai Phinehas hai naikhat gasu shai nchambo nai Iniu dinkhai mibo hinase palingjiu padrabo-e chiubo sisune.

Iniu singku khat kada mine, sibo piuse alad piujiu atu malum sune, khatdi Iniu pakhuga machunbo hina tenkhai bine. Iniu pakhuga pakai-kik leng pikhaine, paliuniu pawan machangna agu kadalubo wangpiu masuangga machajiu bammi rabo-e.
Shai masiakbo nakai-nakikdungniu sibo singku khuga wangjiu rangkang maksai katiu kasak khengra wangsune, macha nkha khaijiu wakhat tiukhai raleng khengsune.”
Sibo wan-ga ngena Samuel se Eli gu jukhaibo saisuijiu
Pamik tiatna mibo Eli niu naikhat nchun paziga jibamme.
Samuel se masanbo Ladriat Bung khai bambo masanbo kyga jibamme. Tingben pad makhaga, chamibungse taojiu bam khaga,
niu Samuel tu ku-e. Paniu paokakge, “Yo, paohubo!”
sichiujiu Eli khulam pakwang lujiu din-e, “Nang atu kubose I haiga bamme.”
Chiudi Eli niu paokakge, “I natu kumakge; nazilam wanglan sulo.” Sichiujiu Samuel niu pazilam wanglan mide.
Chiudi Eli niu paokakde, “Anah yo, I natu kumakge, tadlujiu jilan sulo.”
Siga Samuel tu
Sijeng gasu Eli niu Samuel khuga din-e, “Tadjiu jilan sulo; paniu natu kulan sai haichiu dinlo! ‘
Karaiga kubo kumjiu
Samuel niu paokakge; “Rapiu yo, dinkhailo navangpiu, I nking bamme.”
Sibo nai wangtang dasai paphibang gasu kaloibo katang Eli kikhun-ga agu kapingbo hinase padrabo-e.
Iniu pakhuga dinkhai mibode, chiubora Iniu pakikhunmai tu tingtheng rerabo-e palamra panah kanianiu ariga chalad kasa din-e, panah kanianiu kambose Eli si-e, chiudi paniu khammi makge.
Sijengniu Eli kikhun riga Iniu ladrian thiujiu din madukhaibo-e, chiubora mai pingbo nuan jengniu padrabo situ luthon khaira rathak thiubo khatdi kadpad bamdi luthon ngam lakge.”
Tingben makthen Samuel se paziga bamde, sibosai paniu sulujiu
Eli niu patu ku-e, “Anahpiu Samuel yo!”
“Yo paohubo,” chiujiu Samuel niu kenkakge.
Eli niu maniu-e, “
Sijengniu pakhuga dinkhaibo pakhiangna Samuel niu dinkhai bide. Eli niu din-e, “Pa haira
Samuel tu
Kadih pake hina gasu Israel maidungniu Samuel hai
papum siakniu Samuel khuga wang madulen khai mibo bam, Shiloh ga madulen jutjiu bamme. Sichiujiu Samuel niu dinbo hina, Israel mai hinaniu lukhai bamme.

Sibo wan gase Philistine maidungniu Israel maitu chari thiura wang madui sude. Sijeng gasu Israel maidungniu paliutu aphenra kaden lude. Israel mainiu Ebenezer ga rijiky thiusude, khatdi Philistine mainiu Aphek ga thiukhaide.
Philistine mainiu paliu lai khaijiu chari aphende. Israel maidungtu kamkao lujiu chamai sang madai kumbotu chari bam gasu gimide.
Charibam gasu shaibangbo maidungse rijikylam malan wangboga Israel maigu papee maidungniu din-e, “Dejengniu thainai
Sichiujiu paliuniu champao maitu Shiloh lam langkhaide, khatdi
Ladriat Bungse wang tangboga Israel maidung mathabo khuanniu kadih hai chin-chin mide.
Israel mainiu kariobo khuanse Philistine maidungniu chiulujiu din-e, “Hebrew maidunggu rijiky lungga kariobo khuan hai nkinglo! Sise degu thaklo?” Hebrew maigu rijikyga
paliu hai pingmide siga haichiu din-e, “Chara khat paliu rijikyga wang bamme! Aliu harabo mide! Aliu khuga haikumbo wadaodi pad matai makge!
Pumtan bambo radung gasu saoniu aliutu rankhai ralo? Paliuse Egypt maidungtu ramjing gasu kamshat kam mibo radung-e!
Hululo, Philistine maidung! ‘Npiumai kumjiu aphenlo, haichiu maksai paliuniu aliugu kavang thiubo kumjiu, aliu hai Hebrew maidunggu kavang thiumi rabo-e, sijengniu, npiumai kumjiu aphenlo.”
Philistine maidungniu matanjiu aphen sude, siga Israel maidungse kaomide. Paliu kylam jonjiu paktad kammide. Siga chamai kengkhatu kamshat mide: Israel mai riphen sang samriutu kamshat mide.
Tingwang gu Ladrian Bung se haphun lude, khatdi Eli nahpiu Hophni nai Phinehas tu kamshat mide.
Benjamin kiphiu mai khatniu sibo naisiak chari bam gasu Shiloh tangbo pakwangde. Palung chariubo lenra pafai phetlujiu khatdi papeega tabui katup khai lujiu wangde.
Eli niu Ladriat Bung tuse manangjiu npui mungga ntao lujiu khuan bamde. Sibo piuniu namdak pakhiangnaga tachamse dinkhaide siga mai hina pingboniu phuilujiu kapsude.
Eli niu sibo khuan chiulujiu maniu-e, “Haimaidung khuan hai degu thaklo?” Sibo piuse Eli khuga tacham dinkhaira kalangjiu wangde.
Sibo wan-ga Eli takum riak-chakiu-je-tachat tangmide, khatdi pamik ngaota mide.
Sibo piuniu din-e, “Thainai I chari bam gasu pakpad lujiu haiga pakwang kinbo-e,
Eli niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Dethak thiumi gulo, anahpiu yo?”

Champaomai siniu paokakge, “Philistine mai suangga Israel mai hina pakkam mide, mai pingbo gu-e! Chamai kengkhatu gimide, hai ronna makjiu na-nahpiu Hophni nai Phinehas tudi kamshat mide, khatdi Tingwang gu Ladriat Bung di sutlude!”

Sibo piuniu Ladriat Bung lamga dinpad gapboga Eli se pabam gasu rengmun-ga masi kalakiu mide. Pahai tanpao mide khatdi pamai wi-e, sijengniu pawongcheng kadingak kiujiu shai mide. Paniu Israel maitu takum atai maluang khai-e.

Eli mupui Phinehas naose papum rip bamme, sichiujiu ngena lungrabo wan wangmide, sichiujiu bamga Tingwang gu Ladrian Bung sutlude, khatdi papao nai pakina shai mide chiubo khuan chiugap, bungjiu ngena lungkiu mide.
Pase shaira kumjiu bamboga patu akhi khaibo puiniu pakhuga din-e, “Hululo! Na-nah hai npiumai-e!” Chiudi paniu waladdi paokak makjiu maliu makjiu bam mide.
Paniu pazan leng Ichabod
Paniu din-e, “Tingwang kendise Israel mai khuga hamide, palamra Tingwang gu Ladrian Bungse mainiu sutmide.”
Philistine mainiu Ladriat Bung sutlujiu Ebenezer gasu paliu namdi Ashdod lam phungtad mide.
Paliugu charaky lungga phungwang lujiu paliugu Dagon rameng mungga khai nbamme.
Dagon ramengse
Pasaibo nai nsuandi sibo ramengse
(Sijengniu thainai tangbo Ashdod ga Dagon gu singkudung khatdi patu kahummai khatnadi sibo bamga paliu phi kemkhai humakge).
Padbambose paliu ngaoboga paliuniu din-e, “Israel maigu Rawang niu aliutu khatdi aliu ra Dagon tu rebambo gude. Haibo Ladriat Bungse aliu khuga khai nbam matheng daolakge.”
Sijeng gasu paliuniu champaomai dungtu langkhai lujiu Philistine mai wangpiu khang mangiutu kumadui lujiu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Israel maigu Tingwang gu Ladriat Bung haitu aliu dechiu ralo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Gath lam lutad sulo,” Sijeng gasu Philistine maigu namdi khat Gath lam lutad mide.
Sibo Bungse ponwang khaibo sai

Sijengniu Philistine maigu katambo namdi Ekron lam Ladriat Bungse langkhai lande; siga Ladriat Bung ponwang khaigapboga maidungse kap marungjiu dinsude. “Paliuniu haibo Israel mai Rawang gu Ladriat Bung ponwangbo hai aliutu kamshat kammi raleng-e!”

Sijeng gasu Philistine maigu wangdungtu kumadui lujiu haichiu din-e, “Pijiu haibo Israel maigu Ladriat Bungse pabamlam kalanmi sulo, sichiusai haisiniu aliutu khatdi aliu kikhundungtu kamshat makdi sui-e.” Siga maipingbogu chariuboniu namdi hinaga phui mide, palamra Tingwang niu paliutu sajai katanbo pikhai bide:
Shai kabangbo maidungdi kathai thiubo-ra hai mara karen sude khatdi sibo maidungniu paliu ra khuga nkha khaira kheng sude.
Philistia mai ramga
maidungniu singku maidung khatdi chamik thao-kadad maidungtu kulujiu maniu-e “

Paliuniu paokakge, “Naliuniu Israel mai Rawang gu Ladriat Bungse malan khaine sai naliugu kalen jaomakjiu malan khaibo pajai makge, naliu nuan kuakra kalen jaojiu kalan khai rabo-e. Sichiu-e sai naliu khuga thiuniubo wimi sune, khatdi naliutu paniu dejeng gasu pi chariu khai gulo chiubo silune.”
Paliuniu maniu-e, “Aliuniu degu kalen piralo?”

Paliuniu paokakge, “Kachianiu taliubo pabut mangiu khatdi kachianiu taliubo tazapui mangiu, chiujiu Philistine mai wangpiu hinaleng khat khat taliu khailo. Padbambo chararense naliu mai hina khatdi chawang khang mangiu riga wangbode.

Naliu khuga athiu padbo pabut lun kum khatdi naliu kadihga buang mariu bambo zapui luibo kachianiu taliu sulo, sikumbo siniu naliu dihtu kam maha mibode. Sise naliuniu Israel mai Rawang tu chakhuang thiujiu pikhai rabo-e, sichiusai paniu naliutu, naliugu radung khatdi naliu dihtu reta mine.
Dekamjiu Egypt maigu chawang Pharaoh khatdi Egypt maidung kumjiu naliu lung tanbam ralo? Israel maitu phutpad makthen Tingwang niu paliutu rekhai mibose mangai tulo.

Sijeng gasu kabuiniu jubo paphi madaigu matom kari kasanbo khat khatdi changam kam matai makhabo matompui nia kaden sulo; papoi kania situ pakyga khin khaimilo, sibo matompui kania siniu matom kari situ jurabo-e.

gu Ladrian Bungse matomniu jurabo lungga khailo, khatdi sibo mungga paman kungbo tasingbung lungga naliugu nuan kuakra kachianiu taliu khaibo kalen maniase khailo. Haichiu lujiu paronna tadra phut khai bilo.

Khatdi phuilo paronna Beth Shemesh lam tadmide chiusai Israel maigu Rawang niu aliu riga chariubo piwang khaibo-e chiubo silo. Chiudi sise tadmakge sai paniu haibo chararen hai pikhaibo makge, palam habo gasu matha padbo-e chiubo aliuniu silune.”
Paliuniu dinbo kumjiu kamde, matom karise matompui kaniaga rat khaide, khatdi papoidungtu chabawkyga khinkhai mide.
Ladriat Bungse matom kari lungga khaide; kachianiu taliulubo zapuidung khatdi athiu buttu luijiu taliu khaibo kachia khuangdungse tasingbung khat lungga khailujiu matom-kari gase khaide.

Matompui kanianiu matom-karise julujiu Beth Shemesh npuiga pak kalikbo thiumakjiu pak majijak tadmide. Pakjut marajut tadmide. Philistine maigu chawangdung khang mangiuse Beth Shemesh gu ramrai tangbo sisetu suipadde.
Beth Shemesh maidung taning kamga chalu atiatjiu bamme, paliuniu ngang phui khangboga Ladriat Bungse ngaode khatdi paliu chun wiboniu phuimide.

Matom karise Beth Shemesh maipiu Joshua gu chaluga tatu kadibo khat taiga mathak khaide. Siga maidungniu tasing karise kampangpad lujiu matompui kania situ kamshat mide, khatdi maring rukhaibo rathakse
Levi maidungniu
Philistine mai wang khang mangiu siniu paliugu tienkam situ phuikhai lujiu sibo nai Ekron lam malan mide.
Philistine maidungniu kachiabut mangiuse paliu nuan jengniu
Kachianiu taliubo tazadungse Philistine mai wang khang mangiuniu thinbo namdi charireng bambo khatdi rengmakbo namdung malinleng kadpadbo-e. Beth Shemesh maipiu Joshua luga bambo tatu kadibo riga
Beth Shemesh maidungniu din-e, “Saoniu masanbo
Paliuniu champaomaitu Kiriath Jearim ga bammaidung khuga haichiu dinkhaijiu langkhaide, “Philistine maidungniu
Sijengniu Kiriath Jearim mainiu
Samuel niu Israel maidung khuga din-e, “Naliu lungchun pakhiangna
Sijeng gasu Israel maidungniu paliugu Baal khatdi Astarte rameng hai taliang mide khatdi
Samuel niu din-e, “Israel mai hina Mizpah ga wang maduilo sichiusai Iniu
Sijengniu paliu mathiu Mizpah ga wang maduide. Paliuniu tadui poinakha thuaklujiu

Israel mainiu Mizpah ga wang madui bamme chiubo Philistine mainiu sigapbo wan ga, Philistine mai wang khang mangiuse paliu riphendungtu puilujiu Israel maitu aphenra tadsude. Sise Israel maidung chiulujiu pingmide.
Israel maidungniu Samuel khuga din-e, “Aliu
Samuel niu milypoi khat kamshat lujiu rathak mania thiujiu
Samuel niu rathak maniase kadpad bamga Philistine maidungniu Israel maitu aphenra nawang sude, chiudi sibo wan siakga
Israel maidungniu Mizpah gasu Bethcar tangbo Philistine maidungtu hajiu npuiki pathen-palen kamshat mide.
Siga Samuel niu tatukang khat khoilujiu Mizpah nai Shen kakga somkhaide, khatdi sibo zan Ebenezer
Haichiujiu Philistine maitu kamkao lude khatdi Samuel niu ringbam then Israel mai dihga chari wangmakra
Philistine mainiu Ekron gasu Gath tangbo haphungjiu lumibo namdidungse Israel maileng malankhai kamde khatdi Israel mai ram hina lulan lude, khatdi Israel mai nai Canaan mai kakga agi-manai mide.
Samuel niu ringbam then Israel maitu paniu mawang khai-e.
Takum machang paniu Bethel, Gilgal, khatdi Mizpah ga tadronjiu tathu-chara tiakkhai-e.
Sibosai Ramah lam malan wanglande, siga paky bamme. Sibo bamga paniu Israel maitu machajiu ladjanpao thiukhai-e. Ramah ga paniu
Samuel tanpao wangmiboga panahmai dungtu Israel mai riga ladjanpao leng khai-e.
Panah katingbopiu zanniu Joel ku-e khatdi nabopiu zanniu Abijah ku-e. Beersheba ga paliuniu ladjanmai thiu-e.
Chiudi paliura papiuniu tadbo kum makge. Paliura rangkangga chalung khai-e, sijeng gasu maidungniu pibo tanim lu-e, khatdi majibo ladjan thiukhai makge.
Israel maigu katingmaidung madui lujiu Ramah lam Samuel khuga wang-e.
Sichiujiu pakhuga din-e, “Phuilo tuhoira nang tanpao mide khatdi nanahmaise nasai suingam makge. Sijengniu jat kakimaidung kumjiu aliutu akhi taliu khaira chawang kadakhailo.”
Paliuniu khengbose Samuel palung aman makge; sijeng gasu paniu
Siga
Paliutu Iniu Egypt gasu juken padbo nai gasu thainai tangbo paliuniu akhugasu marijiu atu phutmide, khatdi kakibo ratu macha mide khatdi tuhoi paliuniu akhuga kambose nakhugadi kamsu mide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu dinbose kamkhailo, sichiu paliugu chawang maidungniu paliutu thinrabo thak kati khailo.”

“Naliu riga chawang thiurabose haichiu rabo-e, chiujiu Samuel niu din masan khaide. Naliu nahpiu maidungtu paniu riphenmai pithiu khai rabo-e, khangsiatu chaqon-kari riphenmai, hai ronna makjiu chaqon-kari suangga pakramai riphendung pithiu rabo-e.

Paniu riphenmai sang khatgu khatdi ringiugu papao thiura kadakhai sune. Naliu nahpiu dungniu paluga changam kamne, khangsianiu chalu gesune, khangsianiu riphen maigu benthin maniadung taliumai khatdi khangsianiu chaqon-kari taliumai pithiu khai rabo-e.
Naliu nahpuidungtu parim manam wibo wasadui pijiu niakkhai sune, khangsianiu alang raleng khatdi taruak khuakra leng lusune.
Naliugu withubo chalu mumsy reng, khatdi takisibang hina pagu chakampaodung leng pikammi rabo-e.
Naliuniu khomwangbo alindung dam kariuga damkhat, mumsy dui niak padbo dam kariuga damkhat chiujiu chakampaodung leng paniu lumi rabo-e.
Paniu naliu vangdungtu khatdi withubo khaorui, khatdi qonniamdungtu lulujiu paleng tatien thiumi rabo-e.
Naliugu milydungdi dam kariugu damkhat lulu sune, khatdi naliu pumsiak pavang thiusune.
Sibo wan wangdasai naliuniu kadalubo chawang jengniu naliu mad padjiu kapne, chiudi naliu dinlan bamdi nking khai lakge.”
Sichiudi Samuel ladtu chalung ngutkhai makge. Paliuniu din-e, “Suimakge! Aliuniu chawang khat masenne.
Aliugu chawang khat bamsai aliudi kakibo jatdung kum sune. Aliu riga chawangniu ladjan thiukhai sune, khatdi aliu suangga tadjiu chari aphenne.”
Paliuniu dinbo hina nking lujiu Samuel niu
niu paokakge, “Paliuniu masenbose kamkhai misulo khatdi chawang khat kadakhaibi misulo.” Samuel niu Israel mai dungtu paliu kylam wanglan mira dinkhaide.
Benjamin kiphiuga chakhiu-chalan kengbo khatdi pazan tadbo Kish kubo piu khangkhat bamme. Pahai Zeror tahpiu Abiel nahpiu-e, Aphiah nahpiu Becorath kiriangmai-e.
Panahpiu Saul kubopiu mai khat bamme, pahai pazu palun wi-e. Israel mai ruangga Saul niu chapithen khat ku-nkiu-e khatdi akhangwibodi nkiu-e.
Kish gu qonniam kasia hamide, sijeng gasu paniu Saul khuga din-e, “Kavang khattu majang lujiu qonniamdung tu phiutad sulo.”

Panainiu Ephraim gu ramluong tadtonjiu Shalishah tangbo tadde, chiudi siga qonniamdungse daomakge, sijeng gasu panainiu Shaalim tangbo tadde, sigadi qonniamdung tuse daomakge. Sibosai Benjamin ramtu tadken padde, sigadi ngaomakge.
Panainiu Zuph ram wangtangboga Saul niu pavangpiu khuga din-e, “Anai chaky lam malanwangmi sukhe, sichiu maksai apiuniu qonniamdungtu ronna makjiu anai jengniu palung manang bamta lakge.”

Kavangpiu siniu Saul tu paokakge, “Khuanno! Haibo namdiga masanbo mai khangkhat bamme. Patuse maidungniu chakhuang thiuchang thiu-e. Palamra paniu dinbo hina majijiu padle. Siga anai tadlujiu qonniamdungse dega daolu ralo chiubo maniusai, paniu anai khuga dinkhaibo sui-e.”
Saul niu maniu-e, “Siga anainiu tadsai anainiu paleng nde piralo? Anai bangga wadi hamide, tiubangbodi hamide, paleng pikhaira wadi hamide, anaigu wakhatra bamkha jiuma?”
Kavangpiu siniu paokakge, “Akhuga rangkang poinaga bamme, haise Iniu pakhuga pibo sui-e, sichiusai anai tadjiu daorabo bam paniu dinkhaibo sune.”

Saul niu paokakge, “Kawibo chunning-e! Anai tadkhe.” Sichiujiu masanbo mai lungbo namdak lamse panai tadsude. Sichiu panainiu tadkhangboga tadui thuak raleng padbo aliumaidung khangsiatu adaode. Panainiu aliumaidung khuga maniu-e, “Namdak gahai chakhan khanmaise bamma?”
(Karaidaora phaimiukakung khattu chakhan khanbopiu chiujiu kubamniu-e, siniu mai khat kumboniu Tingwang khuga wa maniura bamsai paniu “Khe chakhan khanbopiu khulam tadkhe,” chiujiu dinbo-e).

Riliumaidung siniu panaitu paokakge, “Yo, pah bamme. Tuhoi nanai masuangga tadmide. Nanai kalangbi jatjiu tadsai patu hatang lune. Nanai namdak wangtang gap dasai nanainiu patu maomakjiu daosune. Namdakga pah thainai wang mibo-e, palamra maidungniu maluonglam rathak kadpadra tad mide. Kukhai mibo maidungse pah wang makthen katiu tiulakge, palamra rathak maniase paniu thoidam khai raine. Tuhoi nanainiu tadpadsai paniu maluonglam katiu tiura tad makhaga patu adao sui-e.”
Sijeng gasu Saul nai pavangpiuse namdaklam majadjiu tad sude. Siga panainiu wangtang gapboga kahumrabo bamlam tadrabo leng tadpadbo Samuel tu panainiu dao lude.
Saul niu wangrabo masuang

“Nsuannai tuhoi kumbo wan gase Benjamin kiphiu gasu npiumai khattu nakhuga langwangne, nangniu sibo piutu amai Israel mai riga chawang thiura wasa manuk khailo. Paniu paliutu Philistine mai ben gasu kalan khaine, amai dungniu magenthiubo I ngaode khatdi nkha khaira kapjiu bambo Iniu chiukhaide.”
Samuel niu Saul tu ngaogapboga
Kareng kamun khen ga bambo Samuel khulam Saul se wangde khatdi maniude, “Chakhan khanbo piuse delam bamlo? Akhuga dinkhailo.”

Samuel niu paokakge, “I hai chakhan khanpiu side, Ania rathak bamlam tadkhe. Thainai nanaitu katiu tiu aruongne. Nsuannai nsuanniu nangniu maniubo hina dinkhai bine, khatdi nang tadrabo npui dinkhai bine.
Jengsum masuangga hamibo qonniamdung jengniu nalung manang mane, qonniamdungse daolude. Israel maidung ruangga masen kachangbose saolo? Sise nang-e khatdi napiu kiriangmai-e.”
Saul niu paokakge, “Israel mai puinah ruangga siamthubose Benjamin kiphiu-e. Khatdi Benjamin puinah ruangga sudi akimainiu siamthubo kimai-e. Haichiuboga nangniu akhuga deleng haichiu dinbam ralo?”
Sibo sai Samuel niu Saul khatdi pavangpiutu majang lujiu chaky kadiboga chamai khang samriu kumbo bambo bamga maluangwang kuangkai piga ntao khaide.
Samuel niu alangmai khuga din-e, “Iniu naliu khuga chamikang khaitam khaira pimibo mikangse lupadlo.”
Alangmai siniu lupad tamkhaibo pangense lupad lujiu, Saul masuangga khaide. Samuel niu din-e, “Phuilo, haibo mise tiulo.Iniu kukhai maidung nai tiu aruangboga nang tiura lupad khaibode.”
Sibo nai Saul nai Samuel tek tiu aruangde.
Paliuniu kahumbo bamgasu namdak malan wangboga paliuniu Saul zileng chaky nsing riga taliu khaide,
siga paniu jikhaide.
Tingben padboga chaky nshinglam jibambo Saul tu Samuel niu ku-e, “Sulo, Iniu na-npui dinkhai bine.” Saul se sude, khatdi pase Samuel nai puidi gase tadpadde.

Paliuniu namdak suanglam tadpadboga Samuel niu Saul khuga din-e, “Navangpiutu anai suang tadrai mira dinlo.” Kavangpiuse tadrai mide, khatdi Samuel niu din-e, “Haiga bamnak khai railo. Tingwang niu nde dinlo chiubo Iniu nakhuga dinkhaine.”
Samuel niu takisadui piang thinlujiu Saul piga runkhaide khatdi patu kapupjiu din-e, “

Thainai nangniu atu saodiak lujiu tadpadbo wan-ga Benjamin ramrai Zelzah ga Rachel gu charaw taiga maipiu khangniatu nang adao sune, panainiu nakhuga dinkhai sune, nangniu phiubambo qonniamdungse daolude, sichiujiu napiuniu qonniamdungtu manangta mide, natu manang bamde, paniu haichiu dinbamme, ‘Delam anahpiutu phiukhai ralo?’

Nangniu sibo bamgasu tadpadjiu Tabor ga masanbo singbang khat gase wangtang dasai Bethel lam Tingwang gu rathak bamga kadra tadbo maipiu khangsum tudi nangniu daosune, paliu ruangga khang khatniu milypoi sum, khang khatniu taruak pek sum, khatdi pasumbo piuniu chamigibung khatga jaw phuiget phungkinbo dao sune.
Paliuniu natu chunwijiu lukhai sune, naleng taruak peknia pibose, nang lurabo-e.

Sibosai nangniu Tingwang gu Gibeah Luongga tadrabo-e, siga Philistine maidung rijiky bamme, Namdak ngutrabo bamga nangniu phaimiukakung maidung phom khat rathakbam luong lamsu tarabung, nchom, nthiam khatdi nking jujiu mathenbo adao sune, paliuse chalen lenjiu sailad din madujiu wangsune.
Sibo wan-ga
Nakhuga haichiu paddasai Tingwang niu natu jukhaibo hina kamrabo-e.

Nangniu asuang Gilgal ga tadrai rabo-e, siga I natu adao sune khatdi rujiu kadpadbo khatdi chakin thiubogu rathak ngam kamsune. Siga I wangmak then jeng chinnia atu khuanbam niulo. Siga nangniu degu kamralo chiubo dinkhai sune.”
Saul niu Samuel tu saodiak lujiu tadra maningboga Tingwang niu Saul lungchun kasan pikhaide, khatdi sibonai Samuel niu dinbo hinase padde.
Saul nai pavangpiuse Gibeah wangtangboga phaimiukakung phom khattu daode. Sibo wan-ga Tingwang gu Hiupuina pakhuga wangkhaide. Siga padi paliutu maluang chalen lenjiu sailad din sude.
Patu kasimaidung siniu, pagu lunlung ngaobo tingga paliu karai khat-khatga maniu-e, “Kish nahpiu khugase dethaklo? Saul di phaimiukakung thiumi jiuma?”

Siga bambo maipiu khatniu maniu-e, “Kakibo phaimiukakung maigu—piudung sira sao-saolo chiubo naliu degu maninglo? Sijengniu Saul tudi phaimiukakung khatleng chakkhai lujiu, “Saul di phaimiukakung khat thiumi jiuma? chiubo hai dinmibo-e.
Haichiujiu Saul se palai padjiu chalen lenlubo saiga maluonglam kamkhai rabo rathak bamlam tadmide.
Saul piunaboniu pavangpiu panaitu ngaolujiu din-e, “Nanai delam tadkhaimi jiulo?”
Saul niu paokakge, “Qonniamdungtu phiutadbo-e. Anainiu qonniamdungtu phiudaolak mijiu, Samuel khulam tadbo-e.”
Saul piunaboniu maniu-e, “Paniu nakhuga nde dinlo?”
Saul niu paokakge, “Qonniamdungse daolan mide chiujiu paniu anai khuga din-e.” Chiudi papiunabo khugara pah chawang thiurabo-e chiujiu Samuel niu dinbose dinkhai makge.
Mizpah ga tachenggu thiujiu mai hinatu Samuel niu ku maduide.
Khatdi Israel maidung khuga haichiu din-e, “Israel maigu

I hai naliugu Rawang si-e, naliuniu magenthiu chariuboga jukhaibo piu-e, chiudi thainai naliuniu atu suita mide. khatdi naliuleng chawang pikhaira akhuga kheng-e. Wide, chaphiu maksai chakiriang saisuijiu
Samuel niu Israel mai kiphiu hinatu pijiu suanglam pipad khai lujiu tasan phuiboga

Samuel niu Benjamin kiphiu gu kiriangmaitu masuang lam kuwang khaide, Matri kikhun tu khoipad lande. Sibo sai Matri kikhun maitu pasuonglam wangkhai lujiu phuilanboga Kish nahpiu Saul tu kada padde. Chiudi paliuniu Saul tu phiudao lakmide.
Paliuniu
Sijeng gasu paliuniu pakmeng lujiu maidung ruangga juwangboga maidung suangku-e, mai hinase pakantuang kunakha-e.
Samuel niu maidung khuga din-e, “
Maidung siniu senpadde, “Ringthenglo chawang!”
Samuel niu maidungga chawang khatgu ngamse dinkhaide, khatdi ariakga raolujiu masanbo bamga khaimide. Sibosai paniu paliu kylam langkhai mide.
Saul di paky Gibeah lam malan mide, siga Tingwang gu pumtan pikhai mai khangsianiu patu majang tadde.
Chiudi buimakmai khangsianiu haichiu din-e, “Haibo piuniu degu kawibo aliuleng kamkhai ngam ralo?” Paliuniu Saul tu haichiujiu khan-e, khatdi paleng wadi phungwang makge.

Chahiu khat kumbo saiga Ammon mai wangpiu Nahash niu Gilead dih Jabesh namdiga chari thiujiu lumide. Jabesh ga bammai dungniu Nahash khuga din-e, “Aliu kakga suirabo khat taliukhe, aliuniu natu aliugu chawang-e chiujiu suikhaine.”
Nahash niu paokakge, “Naliu mai hinagu majatlam mikse lupad lujiu Israel maitu pijiu mangam khai sui-e chiusai naliuniu dinbose Iniu suikhai ngamme.”
Jabesh gu papeemai dungniu pakhuga din-e, “Israel dih pakhiangna champaomaitu langkhai lura aliuleng jeng chinnia pawan pikhailo. Mai khatdi aliutu nkha khaira hasai aliu nakhuga ngutkhai rabode.”
Champaomainiu Saul bambo Gibeah ga wangtangjiu paliu khuga chalad dinkhaiboga maidungse pingjiu khatdi manangjiu kapsude.
Sibo wan-ga Saul niu matomchidung julujiu chalu lamsu wangde, khatdi paniu maniu-e, “Degu chariubo bamjiu maidung kapbam jiulo?” Paliuniu Jabesh ga bammaidungniu phungwangbo chamse pakhuga dinkhaide.
Saul niu haibo cham chiugapboga Tingwang gu Hiuna wangkhaijiu palung thiuboniu phuimide.

Paniu matomchi kania kamshat lujiu pajan dimmoi lujiu champaomaitu Israel mai dih pakhiangnaga sise phungtadra dinkhaide, “Saokum mainiu Saul nai Samuel sai suijiu chari bamga tadmak maidung tura matomchi situ kumjiu paliutu kamshatmi rabo-e!”
Saul niu Bezek ga Israel mai 300,000 khatdi Judah mai 30,000 tu khom madui lude.
Sichiujiu paliuniu Jabesh maigu champaomai khuga din-e, “Nsuannai asiusuong maga naliutu kalan khai bine chiu naliu rammai khuga dinbilo.” Jabesh ga bammainiu haibo cham chiuluboga paliu chun wimide.
sichiujiu paliuniu Nahash khuga din-e, “Nsuannai aliu nakhuga ngutkhai rade, khatdi nangniu maningbo kumjiu kamsuide.”

Pasaibo nai nsuan kalu Saul niu pamaidungtu paphom sumleng njan khaide, khatdi tingbenpad gapboga paliugu mikremai Ammon maigu rijikyga charithiu ngutjiu niending tangbo kamshat ngambui then kamshat sude, masiak maidungse paleng-leng pakkam mide.
Israel maidungniu Samuel khuga din-e, “Saul haitu aliugu chawang leng buimakge chiu dinbo maidungse dega bamlo? Paliutu aliu ben-ga pilo; aliuniu paliutu kamshat mirabo-e!”
Chiudi Saul niu din-e, “Thainai mai khattudi kamshat suimakge, palamra thainai
Khatdi Samuel niu paliu khuga din-e, “Aliu mathiu Gilgal lam tadjiu Saul tu chawang leng din madu lankhe.”
Sijeng gasu paliu mathiu Gilgal lam tadde. Gilgal ga

Khatdi tuhoi phuilo naliutu jukhai rabo chawang bamde. I tanpao mide, apidi npuak mide. Anahmaidung naliu ruangga bamme. Iniu chabonting gasu thainai tangbo naliutu jukhaijiu bambo-e.

Saul niu takum khat chawang thiukhai lubosai Israel mai riga chawang thiubo paniabo kumga,

paniu chamai sang sumtu kadalujiu Bethel ramluong Michmash ga chamai sang niatu paniu majang bamme, khatdi sang khattu panahpiu Jonathan niu majanglujiu Benjamin kiphiu gu kadih Gibeah lam langkhaide, kakimaitu Saul niu chakylam langkhai mide.

Jonathan niu Philistine mai charipitu Geba gasu kamshat mide, khatdi sibo chamse Philistine mainiu chiulude. Sibosai Saul niu champaomaitu langkhaijiu Hebrew maidungtu make mutjiu, chari thiura namdi hinatu kukhaide.

Saul niu Philistine maigu charipitu kamshat mide, siniu Philistine mainiu paliutu mareng mide chiubo Israel mainiu simide. Sijengniu kubo khuanse mai hina chiulujiu Saul sai suilujiu Gilgal ga wangde.

Philistine mainiu Israel maitu chari thiura wang maduide, paliugu chaqon-kari sang samriu, chaqon rimai sang charuk, khatdi chaphi rimainiu duipuigu nbuiniang jiukha bamme. Paliuniu Bethaven naimik padlam, Michmash ga rijiky thiulujiu bamde.
Sibosai paliuniu Israel mai riga chari katanbo aphen wangde, siga Israel maidungse wa maning kamlak mide. Israel mai khangsianiu tulimki, chakha-turen, takhunky khatdi ajaiga paktadjiu nbai sude.
Khangsia mainiu Gad khatdi Gilead ramlam Jordan giu kenjiu paksude.
Sibo wan gase, Saul se Gilgal ga bamme. Siga paniu maluang lujiu bam ncham maidungse pingboniu kaphik rai-rai mide.
Samuel niu dinkhaibo saisuijiu Saul niu siga jeng chinnia Samuel tu khuan khangde, chiudi sibo wan katangna Samuel se Gilgal ga wang makge. Maidungse Saul tu saodiak mid-midjiu paksude.
Sijeng gasu Saul niu din-e, “Rujiu kadkhaibo rathak khatdi chakin thiubogu kadkhai rabo mania hinase akhuga luwanglo.” Siga paniu rukhaibo rathakse thiu khaide.
Sise kamlu gapboga Samuel se wangde, Saul niu Samuel tu daora padle,
chiudi Samuel niu din-e, “Nangniu degu kammi gulo?”
Saul niu paokakge, “Maidungniu atu saodiak karen sude khatdi nang wangne chiubo wan-ga wangmak mibo jengniu-e, haironna makjiu Philistine maidungse Michmash ga wang madui bam mibode.
Siga Iniu maning-e, Philistine maidungniu atu Gilgal gasu aphenra kambamde chiudi Ira
Samuel niu paokakge, “Sise kapangbo ngam kamme. Tingwang niu nakhuga pikhaibo ladriatse nangniu piumakge. Nangniu piubamsai
Chiudi tuhoira nangniu tingtheng mawanglak mide, palamra nang palad piumakge, sijengniu

Samuel niu Gilgal saodiak lujiu tadmide. Khangsia maidungse Saul sai suijiu chari kangmai thiude. Paliuniu Gilgal gasu Benjamin ram Gibeah lam tadboga pakang maitu pariak siboga chamai kai charuk kumbo ronna mide.
Saul nai panahpiu Jonathan khatdi pamaidungse Benjamin ram Geba ga khatdi Philistine maidungniu Michmash ga rijiky thiulu bammide.
Philistine maidungniu paliugu rijiky gasu chari munsum leng padde; baokhatniu Shual ram Ophrah lamsu rupwangde.
Bao khatniu Beth Horon khatdi kakibo kangkhat siniu Zeboim Ramjeng nai ramjing phuimeng tangbo lamsu rupwangde.
Israel mai kadihga chagi aketmai khatdi hade, Hebrew maileng chaheng-changiu taliubo Philistine maidung si-e.
(Israel maidungniu Philistine mai khugasu kafiu, mari, nkhena thinra kadamjiu pa-nsam khai-e.
Mari khatdi chagitang kadam lujiu maruak khaibo man rangkang khat, khatdi kafiu taliubogu rangkang nia lu-e).
Sichiujiu chari thiubo naise, Saul nai Jonathan makjiu, Israel mai riphendung leng chaheng-changiu khatnadi ha-e.
Philistine mainiu chari pabao khattu langkhai lujiu Michmash Pass ga lungkham mide.
Naikhat Jonathan niu pagu chari mania phungbo chabon maipiu khuga din-e, “Philistine maigu rijiky tadken pad mataikhe,” chiudi Jonathan niu papiu khuga dinmakge.
Saul se Gibeah ramgasu watheng makbo Migron ga majuongsy bang hangga chamai kai charuk kumbotu majang lujiu bamme.
(Shiloh ga
Jonathan niu Philistine mai rijiky tadken padrabo Michmash Pass chiu kubo tatu-khao kania chiubora Bozez nai Seneh chiu kubo chakhao-turen nia kakga tadtaron rabo-e.
Tingpilam bambo turen siniu Michmash lam pama mari bambo-e, khatdi khat siniu tingrunlam bambo Geba lamphan mari bambo-e.
Jonathan niu chabonmai khugase din-e, “Nkengmai Philistine maidunggu rijikyse tadken padkhe,
Chabonmai siniu paokakge, “Nangniu kambo hinaga I nasai suine.”
Jonathan niu din-e, “Wide, anai tadken sukhe, pijiu Philistine maidungniu ngaomi sulo.
Paliuniu aniatu khonra dinsai, ania bamga chap khonkhe.
Chiudi paliu khulam wangra kusai ania tadkhe, palamra sise
Sichiujiu panaitu Philistine maidungniu ngaora lenkhaide, khatdi Philistine maidungniu din-e, “Phuilo, Hebrew maidung khangsia chakhomki gasu nbai lujiu padkinne!”
Paliuniu Jonathan nai chabonmai tuse kude, “Hailam wanglo! Aliu chalad khat dinkhai raleng bamme!”
Jonathan niu chabonmai khuga haichiu din-e, “Asai suilo,

Jonathan niu maluong gase khudung lujiu buangkhangde, pagu chari mania phungbo piudi pasai suikhangde, Jonathan niu Philistine maidungtu kakhiu taliang mide khatdi chabonmai siniu paliutu kamshat mide.
Jonathan nai chabonmai siniu raithuboga chalu lung khat lunggasu chamai makai kumbotu kamshat mide.
Philistine ga mai hina charenkam mide, khatdi rijiky lungga bammai chari kangmaidungdi pingjiu kaphikrai-rai mide, kadih hai chin-chinjiu pingboniu phuimide.
Saul maidung Benjamin ramga khuanjiu bammaidung siniu Philistine maidung paliu chun thiuta mijiu pak mara bambo hai ngaode.
Saul niu pamaidung khuga din-e, “Aliu ruangga sao hamilo riphenmaidung riak chaklo.” Paliuniu phuiboga Jonathan nai pagu chari mania phungbopiu chabonmai piuse habamniu-e.
Saul niu singku Ahijah khuga din-e, “Taronbo ntiangse luwanglo. (Sibo nai Ahijah niu sise ponlujiu Israel maidung suangga bamme).
Saul niu singkutu npaojiu bamga Philistine mai riji lamse chakhuan kariobo haise sabi-bi sude, sijeng gasu Saul niu pakhuga din-e, “
Saul nai pakangmaidung siniu Philistine maitu chari thiura kemsude. Siga Philistine maidung pabam paji sita mijiu paliu ncham karai khat-khattu aphen sude.
Hebrew mai khangsia mainiu Philistine mailam liangne chiujiu tad ncham bammaidi paliu chap kalilan lujiu Saul nai Jonathan khulam suilan mide.
Ephraim luongga nbaijiu bammaidung khangsia mainiu Philistine maidungtu aphende.
Sibo nai Bethaven kenjiu aphende,

Israel maidung mariuboniu paliu jeng hamide, palamra Saul niu ladriat thiujiu chamtan khat pikhaide, “Iniu thainai atu mikre maidungtu chakhum ruilu makthenna mai khatnadi katiu tiusui makge, tiu maitu siangkhai rabo-e.” Sijeng gasu mai khatniudi sibonai marinpuiting wakhatdi tiumakge.
Paliuniu manamhang khat tadngutboga makhuidui kengjiu dao-e.
Manamhangse makhuiduiniu phui bamme, chiudi sise mai khatniudi tiumakge, palamra paliu mathiuse Saul niu siangkhai rabotu nping-e.

Chiudi Jonathan sira papiuniu maidung suangga chamtan pikhaibose simakge, sijeng gasu paniu thinbambo tathun siniu makhuidui khuang gase sumkhai lujiu makhuiduise tiude. Tiukhai gapboga pajengse tankhang mide.
Chiudi mai khatniu din-e, “Thainai mai khatniu katiu tiusai patuse siangkhai rabo-e.” chiujiu aliutu kapin khaibo jengniu, aliu mathiu mariubo jengniu aliu jengsa mide
Jonathan niu paokakge, “Dejiukha maipingbo gulo, aliu khuga apiuniu kamkhaibo guhai! Dejiukha Ira ajeng tanmi gulo, palamra makhuidui poinakha I tiukhai lude!
Aliuniu mikremaidungtu ngamlubo wan-ga katiu daobo wan-ga tiulu dasai dejiukha wiralo! Sise tiulu saira Philistine maitu kengjiu kamshat lubui-e.”
Sibo naise Israel maidungniu Philistine maidungtu Michmash gasu Aijalon tangbo aphenjiu chamai kengkhatu kamshat mibo-e, sibo wan-ga Israel maidung mariujiu paliu jeng sakam mibo-e.
Sijeng gasu paliuniu mikremaitu haphung lubo bamlam pakpad lujiu milydung nai khaoruidungtu minlujiu kamshat lujiu, chamise tazai bamjiu tiusude.
Paliuniu Saul khuga paokhai-e, “Phuilo maidungniu tazai bambo chamise tiujiu,
Saul niu senpadle, “Naliu chamai kajonmaidung-e! Haiga tatukang kadibo khat akhuga kalad wanglo.”
Sibo sai paniu chamtan khat pikhai lande: “Maidungniu tadlujiu paliugu matom-kabui, milydung juwangra dinlo. Aliuniu sise kamshat lujiu haigasu tiurabo-e, paliuniu tazai bambo chami tiujiu
Saul niu
Saul niu pamaidung khuga din-e, “Nchunsai aliu wangkiujiu Philistine maidungtu tingbenpad makthen aphenjiu paliutu kam mahakam makthen kamshat kam mikhe.”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Nangniu maningbo wirabose kamsulo.”
Chiudi singkuniu din-e, “Aliuniu raiboga
Sijeng gasu Saul niu maniu-e, “Iniu Philistine maidungtu aphen suima? Nang aliutu chari pijiu ngam khai rama?” Tingwang niu sibo nai npaokak makge.
Siga Saul niu pagu jupaodung khuga din-e, “Haiga wanglo, thainai aliuniu degu kamaobo nuan tenkhai mijiulo?
Israel maitu chari ngamkhaibo ringbambo
Siga Saul niu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu mathiu siga chaplo khatdi Jonathan anai haiga chapne.”
Paliu niu paokakge, “Nangniu maningbo wirabose kamsulo.”
Saul niu Israel mai Rawang,
Siga Saul niu din-e, “Anahpiu Jonathan nai atu kadapad khai lanlo.” Siga Jonathan tu madukhaide.
Jonathan khuga Saul niu maniu-e, “Nang nde tenkhai mijiulo?”
Jonathan niu paokakge, “I makhuidui poinakha athun hainiu tunglujiu tiumide—I shaira kaden bamde.”
Saul niu pakhuga din-e, “Nang shai maksai, Tingwang niu atu kakhiushat misulo!”
Chiudi maidungniu Saul khuga din-e, “Israel maileng chari dibo ngamkhaibo piu Jonathan tu kamshatmi rama? Makge! Aliuniu ringbambo
Sibosai Saul niu Philistine maidungtu hasao lujiu paliu dihlam malan mide.

Saul niu Israel maigu chawang thiulubo sai pabam hinaga pagu mikredungtu chari thiusude, Moab mai, Ammon mai, khatdi Edom mai, Zobah maigu wangdung khatdi Philistine maidungtu aphenboga paniu charise ngamkam lude.
Amalek maitu tangbo palai khaijiu paniu aphenjiu ngamkhaide. Israel maitu charithiu wangbo mai hina gasu paniu gukhai bide.
Saul nahpiudung sira Jonathan, Ishvi khatdi Malchishua paliu-e. Panahpui naraibopui zanniu Merab khatdi nabo puiniu Michal chiu ku-e.
Panaoniu Ahimaaz nahpui, Ahinoam si-e, pagu charipi siniu papiunabo Ner nahpiu Abner si-e.
Saul piu Kish khatdi Abner piu Ner hai Abiel nahpiu kania si-e.
Saul niu ringbam then Philistine maidungtu palai padjiu aphende. Sijengniu katanmai khatdi kahumai, kadaomai hinatu pagu riphenmai leng lukhai-e.
Paniu Amalek maitu sajai pinejiu bamme, palamra paliu pao-peh mainiu Israel maidungtu Egypt lamsu wangbo wan-ga atungbo donniu-e.

Tuhoi tadlujiu Amalek maidungtu aphenjiu paliugu kabambo hina kam mahakam milo; wadi masiak khai mane, chamai hina maipui, maipiu, mainah, ngena, kabui, mily, qontrao, khatdi qonniam hinadi kamshat milo.”
Saul niu Telem ga pagu riphendungtu khom madui wangjiu pariak chakboga Israel mai gasu charimai 200,000, khatdi Judah mai gasu 10,000 daode.
Saul nai pamaidungse Amalek mai namdilam tadlujiu singgiu bekga limjiu bamde.

Saul niu Keni maidung khuga din-e, “Naliu Amalek maidungtu saolujiu tadmi sulo, sichiusai Iniu paliutu kamshatboga, naliutu niatao mak rabo-e, palamra Israel maidungniu Egypt gasu padbo nai naliu pao-peh mainiu lungsa khaibi-e.” Sijeng gasu Keni maidung Amalek ram saodiakjiu tadmide.
Saul niu Amalek maidungtu aphenjiu Egypt gu tingbanglam Havilah gasu Shur tangbo kamkao lude.
Paniu Amalek maigu chawang Agag tu kamshat makjiu minlude, kakimai hinatu kamshat kam mide.
Chiudi Saul niu Agag tu kamshat makge khatdi withubo mily, kabui pamai wibodung khatdi kawibo mania hinase kam maha makge, chiudi pageng habo ronna kam mahabo-e.
“Iniu Saul tu chawang pithiu khaibose alung makge, palamra pahai asai suimakge khatdi agu chamtandung piumakge.” Samuel palung magen thiu mide khatdi paniu
Pasaibo nai nsuan kalu Samuel niu Saul tu adaora tadle, paniu Saul se Carmel namdilam tadmide chiubo chiude, siga paniu chaky khat paleng thiukhai bambo-e, Sigasu Gilgal lam tadmi bamdi-e.
Samuel se Saul khulam wang-e, Saul niu Samuel tu pad adaojiu din-e, “
Samuel niu maniu-e, Chiusai kabui khatdi milydung marabo khuan chiubo hai degulo?”
Saul niu paokakge, “Sise amaidungniu Amalek mai khugasu luwangbo-e, withubo kabui khatdi milydungse Tingwang khuga rathak thiujiu kadra leng-e, chiudi kakibodung hinara aliuniu kam mahakam mide.”

Saul niu din-e, “Akhuga din khailo.”

Chiudi tuhoi Iniu nakhuga kheng-e, a-nuan kuak khailo khatdi malanwang lankhe, sichiusai Iniu
Samuel niu paokakge “Iniu natu majangjiu malan lulak mide, nangniu
Samuel niu pakhuga din-e, “Thainai nakhuga Israel maigu chawang kadih hai
Israel maigu kendibo Tingwang sira arat makge, maksai palung kalilan makge. Pahai chamai makge--para palung kalimakge.”
Saul niu kenkakge, “I nuan tenmide, Israel mai khatdi papeemaidung suangga poinakhadi atu chakhuang thiubo lenkhailo. Iniu na-Rawang,
Sijengniu Samuel niu Saul tu majang lujiu malanwang mide, khatdi Saul niu
Samuel niu chamtan pide, “Chawang Agag tu akhuga majang wanglo.” Siga Agag hai pingboniu kaphikdi-dijiu pakhuga wangde, paronna maning-e, “Shairabo hai dejiukha kapingbo gulo!”
Samuel niu din-e, “Nahengniu maipuidung wajiukhagu napuan kam mahakhai mide, sikumjiu tuhoira napuidi panah-pon habo thiumilo.” Sichiujiu paniu Gilgal rathakbam gase Agag tu dimtap-tap khai mide.
Sibosai Samuel se Ramah lam tadmide, khatdi chawang Saul se paky Gibeah lam tadmide.
Samuel niu paringtingga Saul tu adaolan makge, chiudi paniu Saul jengniu huijiu bamme.
Samuel niu maniu-e, “Dekamjiu haise I kam ngam ralo? Saul niu haise chiusai paniu atu kamshatmi sune!”
Sibo rathak bamga Jesse tu kukhailo khatdi nangniu kamrabo guse Iniu lenkhai bine. Iniu dinbo maituse nangniu chawang leng wasa manuk khailo.”
Paniu paokakge “Yo,
Paliu wangboga Samuel niu Jesse nahpiu Eliab tu ngaode, paniu maning-e, “

Sibo sai Jesse niu panahpiu Abinadab tu kulujiu Samuel khuga majang wangde, chiudi Samuel niu din-e, “
Sibosai Jesse niu Shammah tu majangwang lande, Samuel niu din-e, “Patudi
Haichiujiu Jesse niu panahpiu khang chinniatu Samuel khuga majang wangde. Sichiudi Samuel niu pakhuga din-e, “Haimaidung khatna tudi
Samuel niu Jesse khuga maniu-e, “Nanah kakibo bam khama?”
Jesse niu paokakge, “Nathubopiu khat bamme, chiudi pase milydungtu khuanra tadmide.”
Samuel niu din-e, “Patu haiga wangra dinkhailo, pah wang makthen aliuniu rathakse kadkhai lakge.”
Sijeng gasu Jesse niu David tu kukhaide, pahai pajai-palun wi-e, papum wibo chabon mai khatle, khatdi pamik rakdi masanne.
Samuel niu takisase lulujiu David khuga pachimaidung masuang gasu manuk khaide. Sibonai gasu sujiu David khuga
Saul khugasu
Saul tu machamaidung siniu pakhuga din-e, “Aliuniu si-e chiubora Tingwang niu natu kam mathadra kasabo hiupuinatu langkhaibo-e.
Sijengniu, paohubo yo, aliuleng chamtan pikhailo, tara jusibopiu khattu phiu khaine. Nakhuga kasabo hiupuina wangboga sibo piuniu pagu tara jukhaisai nang wimi rabo-e.”
Saul niu paliutu chamtan pide, “Tara jusimai khattu phiulujiu patuse akhuga majang wanglo.”

Patu machamai ruanggasu mai khatniu din-e, “Bethlehem namdiga Jesse nahpiu chalui thiusibo mai khat bamme. Pahai pahot bambo, pajai-palundi wibo mai khatle, kawibo charimai khatdi tacham din ngambo mai khatle, Pahai
Sijeng gasu Saul niu champaomaitu langkhaijiu Jesse khuga haichiu din-e, “Na-nahpiu David mily khuankinbo piutu akhuga langkhailo.”
Jesse niu David tu Saul khulam kamipoi khat, taruak phungbo qonniam khat khatdi chaimigi jaw lah khat chiujiu langkhaide.
David niu Saul khuga wangjiu pangamse kamde. Saul niu patu lungsa nkiu-e khatdi pagu chari mania thinraleng kadakhai-e.
Sibosai Saul niu Jesse khulam tacham khat langkhai-e, “Iniu David tu masen-e, pijiu angam kamjiu haiga bammilo.”
Sibo nai gasu Tingwang niu langkhaibo kasabo hiupuinase Saul khuga wanggap sai David niu pagu tarabung khoilu mathen khai-khai sude. Sichiujiu kasabo hiupuinase padmisai pahai wimi mi-e.
Philistine mainiu Judah gu namdi Socoh ga charileng wang maduide; paliuniu Socoh nai Azekah kak Ephes Dammim kubo bamga rijiky kamsude.
Saul nai Israel maidungdi Elah Ramjengga wang maduijiu Philistine maitu aphenra kaden sude.
Philistine mainiu maluonggen khatlam, Israel mainiu gen khatlam chiujiu chapde. Paliu kakga taningdih kam khat bamme.
Gath namdi gasu mai khat Goliath kubo piuniu Philistine mai rijiky suangga chaplujiu Israel maitu n-gi khengsude. Pahai tachao charuk kumbo ku-e.
Pagu chari ponse tataagi maliang-e, paridniu taju ringiu chinnia-e, khatdi tataagigu chagi pirun khat runne.
Paphidi tataagigu chari manianiu domme, khatdi pamakhuakga tataagigu changiu khat ponne.
Pagu changiu sidi chafai dakbo takiampek siu-asiu-e, khatdi sibo pek siniu ridbose taju chinnia kumbo ridle. Pasuangga riphen mai khattu pagu chagee ponlujiu pitad khai-e.

Goliath niu chaplujiu Israel maikhuga haichiu senne, “Chari thiura chap nbenlujiu, naliu siga nde kambam jiulo? Ira Philistine mai-e, naliura Saul vang maidung-e! Atu atungra naliu ruanggasu mai khat kadapadlo.
Paniu ngamjiu atu kamshat lusai, naliu vang aliu thiurabo-e, chiudi Iniu ngamlujiu patu kamshat misai, naliu hai aliugu kavang thiurabo-e.
Tuhoi haiga Iniu Israel riphen maitu tatan aliatbo-e. Mai khat kumbo atu aphen ngamrabo naliu ruangga bamsai padlo!”
Saul khatdi pamaidung haise chiuboga, pingchang ping mide.

David hai Jesse nahpiu-e, pahai Judah lungga bambo Bethlehem gasu wangbo Ephrath maipiu khatle. Jesse panah npiumainah khang tachat lung-e, sigasu Saul niu chawang thiubo tingga, pahai thensui wangmibo-e.
Jesse nahpiu katingbo khang sumse charibam lam Saul saisui tadmibo-e. Katingbo piu zanniu Eliab, pasai kariubo piu zanniu Abinadab, khatdi pasumbopiu zanniu Shammah ku-e.
David hai nathubo piu-e. Pachimai khang sumse Saul khulam bammibo-e.
David niu pakak kakga papiugu milytu phuira Bethlehem lam meng-meng-e.
Goliath niu jeng atai, nsuan, chawan machang padjiu Israel maitu n-gi kheng sude.
Naikhat Jesse niu David khuga din-e, “Rijiky lam bambo nachimaidung leng taruak khuang kariu khatdi chara thalubo taju kariuse kalangjiu phungtad sulo.
Haibo kabui nduisa dom kariu siniu charipi leng pibilo. Nachimaidung dechiu bamlo chiubo simasan lujiu wanglo.
Chawang Saul khatdi nachimaidung khatdi kakibo Israel maidungniu Elah Ramjengga Philistine maidungtu aphenjiu bamme.”

David niu nsuan kalu sulujiu mily dungtu akhira pamalinleng langkhai lujiu Jesse niu pakhuga dinbo kumjiu katiu rammaise phunglujiu tadmide. Israel maidung chari aphen raleng tadsura senjiu bamga pase sibo bam mengtang mide.
Philistine mai khatdi Israel maidung khat-khattu miktun lujiu aphenra paliu chap kamlujiu bamde.
David niu pagu katiu kasak hinase chawanggu katiu kasak phuibopiu khuga khaidiak lujiu chari bamlam pakmengde, khatdi pachimaidung khulam wangjiu paliu dechiu bamlo chiubo maniude.
Paniu paliutu npao bamboga Goliath niu masuangting kumjiu Israel maidungtu n-gi khenglan sude, David niu pakhuanse chiulude.
Israel mainiu Goliath tu ngaoboga pingjiu pak sude.

Paliu karai khat-khat khuga din-e, “Patu phuilo! Pagu chaliangbo chamse nkinglo! Chawang Saul niu haibo piutu kamshatlu maileng tathuon kadibo pine chiujiu ladriat thiu mide, sichiujiu chawangniu panahpuitu magiangkhai bine-e khatdi papiu kymai tangbo ramkha pira hade.”

David niu pamungga bambo piu khuga maniu-e, “Haibo Philistine maipiutu kamshatlu maitu khatdi Israel maigu mangambo gasu khenrang thiukhai misai sibo piuniu nde daoralo? Ringbambo Tingwang gu riphenmaitu wameng kahumjiu bammai Philistine mainiu pijiu ngamkhai rabo maise saolo?”
Paliuniu pakhuga “Goliath tu kamshat lubo piuleng tathuon pikhai rabo guse dinkhai bide.”

David niu maidungtu npao bambose pachi tingthubopiu Eliab niu chiulude. Paniu David tu palung pomjiu, kasanjiu din-e, “Nang haiga degu kambam gulo? Nagu milydungtu ramjingga khaidiak lujiu saoniu phuibam mijiu nang haiga meng gulo? Nakumbo napoinah! Chari aphenbotu nang phuira mengjiuma?”
David niu maniu-e, “Tuhoi Iniu degu kamkhaimi jiulo? Iniu chalad khatnadi maniubo suimak jiuma?”
Paniu mai kakimai khat khuga mariwang lujiu sibo chamse maniu lande, khatdi paniu maniubo wan machang, nchamjiu paokak khaide.
David niu dinbose mai khangsianiu chiulude khatdi Saul khuga paokhaide, siga Saul niu David tu pakhuga kuwangde.
David niu Saul khuga din-e, “Pakendibo piu yo, haibo Philistine maitu mai khatniudi pingra ha-e! Iniu tadlujiu patu asunne.”
Saul niu paokakge, “Makge, dechiu nangniu patu aphen ngamlu ralo? Nangra nahmai-e, pah haira paringting riphen thiujiu bambo-e!”
David niu din-e, “Pakendibo piu yo, Iniu apiugu mily khuanbambo tingga ndongquiniu maksai chahomniu agu milypoitu ponlu tadmisai Iniu hameng sutlu-e, ndongqui maksai chahomniu atu kamra mariwangboga,
Iniu hamengjiu pawangkining charekman lujiu lekshat lu-e.
Iniu ndongqui nai chahomtu kamshat lu-e, sikumjiu ringbambo Tingwang gu riphenmai zan din masajiu bambo, charameng kahumbo Philistine mai khuga kamkhai rabo-e.
niu atu ndongquidung khatdi chahomdung khugasu gukhai-e; paniu haibo Philistine maipiu khugasu gukhai rabo-e.”
Saul niu paokakge, “Wide tadsulo,
Paniu David khuga pagu ripuandungse piura pikhaide, tataagi pirunse David piga runkhaide, khatdi charipuan ntiang piukhaide.

David niu charipuan khailujiu, khatdi Saul gu chahengse setkhai lujiu tadpad sude, chiudi pase ngam makge, palamra pah wadaodi haikumbo pon piumatai makge. Paniu Saul khuga din-e, “I haibo pon piulujiu chari aphen ngamlakge, I wadaodi haikumbo pon piumatai makge.” Sichiujiu paniu sibo pon hina luakpad mide.
Paniu milykhuanbo thun ponlujiu khatdi singgiu gasu madiobo tatukang mangiu khoilujiu pagu takhaoga khailude. Pagu talumpi thin kaden lujiu Goliath tu asunra leng tadmide.
Philistine maipiuse pagu chagee phungbo piutu pasuangga khailujiu David khulam tadwang sude, sichiujiu manajiu wangsude,
khatdi paniu David tu phuiminjiu phuiboga, David tu wajeng chakkhai makge, palamra David hai pazu-palun wibo khangnamai khatle.
Paniu David khuga din-e, “Sibo thunse nde lenglo? Atu tathi leng nangniu machak khai jiuma? Sichiujiu palung pomjiu para zan kujiu David tu siangsude.
“Wanglo,” chiujiu David tu thenjiu din-e, “Iniu natu nthingna khatdi khaoringniu tiura najan dan mara khaibi rabo-e.”
David niu paokakge, “Nangniu atu atungjiu chaheng changiu thinlujiu akhulam wangbo-e, chiudi I ra Ngamkambo
Thainai siak
Sigasu
Goliath niu David khulam tadwang sude, siga David niu Philistine maidung chap nben bambo lam patu aphenra majadjiu ha-ngutde.
Pabense pagu takhao lungga kanom ngutlujiu tatukang khat khoipad lujiu Goliath tu khenlujiu ketkhaide. Sise Goliath santongga kettaojiu, papee pangmide, khatdi Goliath se kadihga kaotungkiu mide.
David niu chaheng thinmakjiu chapi nai tatukang khatniu Goliath tu ngamlujiu kamshat mide.
Paniu pakwang Goliath riga chap lujiu paheng setbung gasu chahengse thadpad lujiu papeese dangjiu kamshat mide.
Philistine maidungniu paliugu charipi shai mibo ngaoluboga pakkam mide.

Israel mai nai Judah maidungniu senjiu hawangde, Gath tadbo npui pathen-palen khatdi Ekron rengmun tangbo hasude. Philistine maidungse Shaaraim lam tadbo npui, Gath khatdi Ekron tangbo ajamboniu kajanpan mide.
Israel maidungniu Philistine maitu hameng lujiu malanwang lanboga, Philistine maidunggu kabambo hina kapio lude.
David niu Goliath pi ponlujiu Jerusalem lam tad mide, chiudi Goliath gu chari mania sira paniu bambo kathenkyga khaidiak mide.
David niu Goliath tu aphenra padbo tingga Saul niu ngaoboga paniu pagu charipi Abner khuga maniu-e, “Abner, pahai sao nahlo?”
Abner niu paokakge, “Pakendibo piu I simakge.”
Saul niu chamtan pide, “Chiusai maniu lujiu wanglo.”
Sijeng gasu David niu Goliath tu gilujiu rijiky lam malanwang lanboga Abner niu patu Saul khulam majang wangde. David niu Goliath peese jubam kha-e.
Saul niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Rikhangpiu, nang sao nahlo?”
David niu paokakge, “I hai Bethlehem lamsu navangpiu Jesse nahpiu-e.”
Saul nai David npao loigap, Saul nahpiu Jonathan niu paronna patu lungsabo kumjiu David tu lungsa mide.
Sibo nai gasu Saul niu David tu pakhuga pibam khai lujiu pakylam pitad lan tamide.
Jonathan niu David tu tingtheng leng chaka khanjiu ladriat thiukhaide, palamra paniu David tu pahiunatu kumjiu lungsa-e.
Pah niu piubo ponse luakpad lujiu David leng pikhaide. Pagu charipuan, chaheng, tavaipi sironna makjiu khen-gakdi pikhaide.
Saul niu patu langkhaibo ngam hina David niu tathui kamlu-e, sijengniu patu Saul niu riphen maidunggu chakampao pithiu khaide. Haise Saul gu riphendung khatdi mai hinaniu chunwi kamme.

David niu Goliath tu kamshat lujiu riphendung nai malanwang lanboga, maipuidungniu Israel mai namdi hinagasu chawang Saul tu adaora padde. Paliuniu mathabo lui thiujiu chalen lenjiu nchom, siamtoy, tarabung jujiu daode.
Paliugu chunwibo gase maipuidungniu haichiu chalui thiu-e, “Saul niu chamai sang khat gilu-e, chiudi David niu sang kariu gilu-e.”
Saul niu haise suini makge, khatdi palung pomchang pommide. paniu din-e, “David niu sang kariu, chiudi atura sang khat ronna leng lukhaibo-e. Pasai paliuniu patu pijiu chawang thiukhai rabo thakge!”
Sibo nai gasu sujiu Saul niu David tu manma sude khatdi malum masasu mide.

Pasaibo nai Saul khuga kasabo hiuna Tingwang gasu wangjiu thinriap sude, pakyga chara kamengmai kumjiu bammide. David niu naimachang tarabung mathenbo kumjiu mathen bamme khatdi Saul niu changiu khat thin lujiu bamme.
Saul niu maning-e, “Iniu patu singbengga phen taman khaimi tane,” chiujiu paniu David tu phenlon nia khaide, chiudi David niu mari lude.
Saul niu David tu ping mide, palamra
Sijengniu David tu Saul niu chamai sang khatgu papeeleng kada lujiu pabam tamjiu khai mide. David niu pamaidungtu majang lujiu chari bamlam bammide.
sichiujiu paniu kambo hina tathui kamme, palamra
David niu tathui kamme chiubo Saul niu silujiu David tu pingbi-bi mide.
Chiudi Israel ga khatdi Judah ga bammai hina David tu lungsa-e. Palamra paniu kambo hina tathui kamna-e.
Saul niu David khuga din-e, “Haiga anah katingpui Merab bamme. Iniu patuse nanaoleng pibode, nangniu atu machajiu riphen khat thiujiu hujiu
David niu paokakge, “I kummai khatdi akykhunmai niu chawang tahpiu thiura leng buimakge?”
Chiudi Merab tu David naoleng pirabo wan wangbo tingga Meholah lamsu wangbo pazan Adriel kubo piu naoleng pimide.
Haichiudi Saul nahpui Michal niu David tu lungsa-e chiubo Saul niu chiulujiu pachun wide.

Paronna haichiu maning-e, “Iniu Michal tu David naoleng pilujiu Michal tu tathak pithiu khaira mide, haichiusai patuse Philistine mainiu kamshat misune.” Sijengniu Saul niu David khuga lonniabo thiujiu din-e, “Nang hai atahpiu thiurabo-e.”

Saul niu pavang maidung khuga chamtan pijiu David khuga dinkhaira ladti khaijiu din-e, “Chawangniu natu pachun kimde khatdi chawanggu chakampaodungniu natu masen kamme, tuhoi hai panahpuitu magiangra pajat wide chiujiu dinbamme.”
Sibo chamse paliuniu David khuga dinkhai-e, siga paniu paokakge, “Kalek samai, luimakmai I kumbo mainiu chawang tahpiu thiurabo hai alengra chunwibo-e khatdi aphaw chagabo-e.”
David niu dinbo chamse chakampaodungniu Saul khuga dinkhaide,

siga David khuga dinkhaira paliutu Saul niu chamtan pikhaide; “Chawang niu tanao manleng Philistine maitu kamshat lujiu, chamai kai khat duigee danwangbotu masenbo-e, siseniu pagu mikremaitu chakhum ruikhaibo leng-e.” (Haise Philistine mainiu David tu kamshat mira Saul niu taliubo-e)
Saul niu dinbose David khuga chakampaodung siniu dinkhaide. David niu chawang tahpiu thiulura pachun wimide. Magiangrabo suangga,

David nai pamaidungniu tadlujiu Philistine mai kai niatu kamshat lude. Sichiujiu paniu paliu duigeese chawang khuga pariak changjiu pikhaide. Haise paniu chawang tahpiu thiura leng-e. Siga Saul niu panahpui Michal tu David naoleng magiang khaide.
David tu
Sijengniu David tu pingbi-bi mide, khatdi pah karingthen David tu miktun sude.
Philistine mainiu chari aphenra wangsude, chiudi charibam machangga kakibo Saul gu charimaidung suang nkiujiu David niu ngam lude. Haichiubo donniu David hai pazan tadchang tadmide.
Saul niu panahpiu Jonathan khatdi pagu chakampaodung khuga paniu David tu kamshat mira kaden bamme chiubo pisikhaide, chiudi Jonathan niura David tu lungsa chang lungsa-e,
sijengniu David khuga Jonathan niu din-e, “Apiuniu natu kamshat raleng karam bamme, nsuannai nsuan mathingsi lulo, mahinbo bam khatga nbaijiu bamlo.
Nangniu nbai bambo luzamga apiu anai wangne khatdi Iniu nalamga pakhuga npaone, sichiujiu Iniu nalamga silubo bamsai nakhuga dinkhai bine.”

Jonathan niu David tu thuonjiu Saul khuga din-e, “Awangpiu yo, navangpiu David tu kamao kamkhai tulo. Paniu nakhuga kamaobo wadi tenkhai makge, haichiu makra jengniu natu nkhajiu paniu kambo hinaga nkhachang nkhajiu bambo-e.
Paniu Goliath tu kamshatboga paringting pipad khaimibo-e, khatdi
Jonathan niu dinbo cham Saul niu nking lujiu paronna palung thinriap lanjiu
Siga Jonathan niu David tu kulujiu pakhuga wahina dinkhaide. Sibosai Jonathan niu David tu Saul khulam majang wangjiu karaidao kumjiu chawangtu machajiu bamlande.
Philistine maidungniu chari sulande. David niu paliutu aphenjiu ngamkhaide khatdi paliuse pakkam mide.
Naikhat
Saul niu David tu singbengga pa-ngiuniu phen taman mira kamsude, chiudi David niu marilu mide, khatdi changiuse singbengga phenmading khai mide, David marilujiu pakmide.

Sibo nai nchun siak Saul niu mai khangsiatu langkhaijiu David ky khuanra khatdi pasaibo nai nsuan patu kamshat mira thaokhaide. David nao, Michal niu patu lad-pit khaide, “Nang thainchun pak marilu maksai nsuannai nang maomakjiu shairabo mide.”
Michal niu David tu kiranki gasu pipad lujiu pijiu pak mari mide.
Sichiujiu paniu pakyga bambo wameng tuse taziga majikhai lujiu, khatdi kamigiuniu papeetham leng taliu lujiu chakhumga khai lujiu chafai thapsin khai mide.
Saul gu riphenmainiu David tu phiuwangboga Michal niu paliu khuga din-e, pahai marajiu bamme.
Chiudi Saul niu pamaidungtu paliu miksiakniu phuira David khulam langkhaide, khatdi chamtan pikhai-e, “Pazise haiga ponwanglo, Iniu patu kamshatmi rabo-e.”
Paliuniu kalungga ngutboga tazi gase wameng majikhai bambo daode khatdi papeega kamigiu khailujiu chakhumga khaibam niude.
Saul niu Michal khuga maniu-e, “Dekamjiu nangniu atu haichiu sonbam gulo khatdi agu mikremaitu dekamjiu pi mari tadmi jiulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Patu mari lura khakhai maksai, paniu atu kamshat mine chiubo jengniu-e.”
David niu mari lujiu Ramah lam Samuel khulam tadmide, khatdi Saul niu pakhuga tenkhaibo hinase Samuel khuga dinkhaide. Sibo sai paniu Samuel nai Naioth lam tadjiu pawan khat bammide.
David se Ramah lam Naioth ga bamme chiubo Saul khuga dinkhai bide.

Saul niu David tu minra chamai khangsiatu langkhaide, siga phaimiukakungdung phom khatniu Samuel tu paliugu jupao khatle chiujiu chalen lenjiu, senjiu bambo paliu ngaode. Siga Tingwang gu hiupuinaniu Saul maidungtu thinriap mide khatdi paliudi chalen lenjiu sensude.
Haise chiulujiu kakibo champaomaitu langkhai lande, paliudi chalen lenjiu sensu mide. Paniu champaomaitu palon sum thiujiu langkhaide, siga paliudi sichiulan kam mide.
Sibo sai pah papumsiak Ramah lam tadde, paniu Secu ajai kadibo mungga wangtang lujiu Samuel nai David dega bamlo chiu maniude siga paliuse Naioth ga bamme chiujiu dinkhai bide.
Saul niu Naioth lam tadboga Tingwang hiupuinaniu patu thinriap lujiu padi chalen lenjiu khatdi senjiu Naioth ga wangtangde.

Paniu papuan luakpad lujiu Samuel suangga chalen lenjiu sensude tingmik marinpuiting khatdi nchun masang papumruang kalajiu bamde. (Haijeng gasu maidungniu haichiu din-e, “Saul di phaimiukakung khat thiumi jiuma?”)

Sibo sai David niu Ramah ram Naioth gasu pakjiu Jonathan khulam menglujiu paniu maniu-e, “Iniu nde tenkhai mijiulo? Ndegu kasabo Iniu tenkhaibo bamjiulo? Napiutu Iniu nde kamaobo tenkhai mibo bamjiu atu kamshat ra kamjiulo?”
Jonathan niu paokakge, “Natu kamshatra Tingwang niu suimakge! Apiuniu kambo hina akhuga dinmakbo ha-e, pageng bamdi, hadi akhuga wadi mahin makge. Haise majimakbo gu-e!”

Chiudi David niu paokakge, “Nangniu atu dejiukha kunglo chiubo napiuniu si-e. Paniu rangjiu bambo nakhuga pisikhai makra maning mibo-e, palamra nalung kam masa mine chiubo paniu si-e. Iniu nakhuga khatdi ringbambo
Jonathan niu din-e, “Nangniu lunibo hina Iniu kam khaine.”

Katiu tiubo kuangkaiga I bammakboga, napiuniu atu maniusai nangniu haichiu dinkhai khelo, “David Bethlehem lam pakikhunmai mai pakhiangna takum gu rathak kadpatra tadmide chiujiu nangniu suikhai rabotu Iniu kheng-e chiujiu pakhuga dinkhailo.
Napiuniu walad ha-e chiusaira atu wadu lakge chiudi paniu palung pomsai atu kam mahara machun bamme chiubo nang silo.

Hainakha nang atu lungsajiu tenkhaira mide. Anai mahinjiu ladriat thiumibose mangai dukhe, chiudi Iniu maobam saira nangniudi atu kamshat sulo! Dekamjiu napiu khulam atu kamshatra puiwang lan bamralo?”
Jonathan niu paokakge, “Haichiubo lungchun maning mane. Palingjiu apiuniu natu kam mahara machun bamme sai dekamjiu nakhuga dinkhai mak ralo?”
David niu maniu-e, “Napiuniu atu palung pomsai saoniu atu pisikhai ralo?”
