Jonathan niu paokakge, “Anai luzamlam tadkhe.” Haichiujiu panaise luzamlam tadde.
Jonathan niu David khuga din-e, “Israel mai
Paniu natu kam mahara machunjiu bamsai, Iniu nakhuga dinmaksai
Iniu ringbamdi, shaimidi, anai kakga masanbo ladriat thiumibose mangaimi tulo.
Anainiu lungsabo kumjiu akikhunmai tudi tingtheng lungsa khailo.
anaigu ladriatse panglan makjiu tingtheng bamlo. Haise kampang mi-e sai,
Jonathan niu patu lungsara David khuga ladriat thiulanne, palamra Jonathan niu David tu papumtu kumjiu lungsa-e.
Sibo sai Jonathan niu pakhuga din-e, “Nsuannai Hiusan Ngee-e nangniu katiu tiubo bamga bammak sai nang wangmakge chiubo lenrade.
Na-naihra nang ha-e chiubo sikam mine, sijengniu nang naikhat nbaikhai mibo bam, Ezel tubaw hiuga nbai milo.
Iniu sibo tubawtu majonjiu tavaithu sum ket khaine.
Sibo sai Iniu agu machapiutu phiura dinkhaine, Iniu patu haichiu dinsai ‘Phuilo, tavaithuse namungga bamme sise khoilo,’ chiubo rambara nang duaklude, nang padsui-e chiubo-e. Iniu ringbambo
Chiudi Iniu pakhuga haichiu dinsai, ‘Tavaithuse nakhu gasu kakibo genlamme’ sichiu dinsai phutlujiu tadmi sulo, palamra
Anainiu ladriat thiubo hai tingtheng majaibam lura
Sijeng gasu David niu luzam gase nbai mide, Hiusan Ngee-nai chawanse Saul katiu tiura wangde.
sigadi palunlungse kumjiu singbeng taiga wang ntao bamde. Abner niu pamungga bamme, khatdi Jonathan niu pasuonglam ntao muntuang bamme, David bamse maruong bamme.
Sibo nai Saul wadi dinmakge, paniu maning-e, “Pakhuga wakhat padmi bamta lakge, papum masanmak bamsui-e.”
Hiusan Ngee pasaibo naidi David bamse maruonglan bamde, siga Saul niu Jonathan khuga naniu-e, “Dekamjiu David katiu tiubo bamga danaidi thainaidi wangmak jiulo?”
Jonathan niu paokakge, “Paniu Bethlehem lam tadra akhuga kheng-e.

Paniu din-e, ‘Chalung sajiu I tadkhai lune, palamra namdilam akikhun maidunggu rathakgu khumkibo ngam bamme, siga achimaidungniu atu wangmak daolakge chiujiu chamtan piwang-e sijengniu nang hai akahmai-e sai Iniu asingnahmaitu adao khai lune,’ haijengniu pagu katiukaiga pah wang makbo-e!”

Haibo cham chiulujiu Saul niu Jonathan tu palung pomjiu din-e, “Tuhoira David nanai khat thiu mide chiubo I silude. Napuidi wajiukha kasabo khatdi malum suimakbo pui-e! Nang niu David lam liangkinbose natu naronna kamchariu bambo-e!
David niu ringbam then nang wadaodi haibo dihga chawang thiungam lakge chiubo nang simak jiuma? Tuhoi nang tadjiu patu haiga maluang wanglo—pah shaisiak rabo-e!”
Jonathan niu paokakge, “Dekamjiu patu kamshat ralo? Paniu degu kamaobo tenkhai mijiulo?”
Siga Saul niu Jonathan tu kamshat raleng changiu phenwangde, khatdi siga papiuniu palingjiu David tu kamshat mira maning mide chiubo Jonathan niu simide.

Hiusan Ngee jengniabo naise Jonathan palung pomjiu katiukai gasu wakhatnadi tiumakjiu tadmide. Paniu David leng maning khaijiu palung magen thiuchang magen thiu mide, palamra Saul niu patu kam mangam khaide.
Panainiu dinkhaibo saisuijiu Jonathan niu pasaibo nai nsuan luzamlam tadde paniu nahmai khattu majang lujiu tadde,
khatdi pakhuga din-e, “Iniu tavaithu ketsune, pakmeng tavaithuse khoiwanglo.” Npiumainahse pakjiu bamga Jonathan niu tavaithu khat pasuonglam ketkhai lande.
Nahmai siniu ketkhaibo bamlamse tadbbo tingga Jonathan niu senjiu din-e. “Tavaithuse suanglam bamme!
Siga chapbam tulo! Kalanglo!” Nahmai siniu tavaithuse khoilujiu papaopiu khulam malanwang lande.
Sibo nahmaise palam khatnadi simakge, Jonathan nai David ronna sibo-e.
Jonathan niu pagu maniase nahmai khuga pikhai lujiu sise namdilam ponwang mira dinkhaide.

Nahmaise tadmiboga David niu tubaw hiugasu chap sujiu, khudung kiujiu pazuse kadihga makhumkiu lonsum khaide. David nai Jonathan khangniase khat-khattu biang-hiujiu kapsude; Jonathan suangdi David niu magenthiu diang-e.
Jonathan niu David khuga din-e, “Tingwang niu natu majang khaibo thiu milo. Anaigu ladriat saisuijiu anaigu tah-nah tangbo tingtheng majaijiu bamra

“David niu paokakge, “Chawangniu haiga atu changam khat leng langkhaibo-e, paniu langkhaibo ngamse mai khatna khugadi dinsui makge chiujiu chamtan pikhai-e. Amaidung khugara atu adaorabo bam dinkhai mide.
Tuhoi nakhuga nde pisuibo bamlo? Aleng taruak pek khuang mangiu maksai nakhuga kabam bambo pikhailo.”
Singkupiu siniu din-e, “Akhuga kakibo taruak ha-e, masanbo taruak ronna-e; nahmaidungniu npuimaitu nphiuji makge sai nang lusui-e.”

David niu paokakge, “Palingbo-e, paliu masanne, amaidung sira pawan machang changam malabo gadi tadpadra sai characheng saisuijiu paliu pum kam masanjiu bambo-e; sichiusai haikumbo kakungbo tienkam leng dekamjiu masanmak ralo!”
(Sibo nai Saul gu mily khuanmai papeepiu Edom mai Doeg kubo piudi sibo bamga bamniu-e, palamra charachengse pijiu tathui khaira leng-e).
David niu Ahimelech khuga din-e, “Nakhuga chaheng maksai changiu aleng pikhaira bamsuma? Chawanggu chamtanse kalangju mijiu I aheng-a-ngiu maksai kakibo mania lunang makjiu-e.”
David niu din-e, “Sise aleng pikhailo, haisuong wi-nkiubo hade!”
David niu sibo bam saodiak lujiu Saul tu pingjiu Gath gu chawang Achish khulam pakkhai mide.

Chawang Achish khuga pamaidungniu din-e, “Haise Israel maigu chawangpiu David makma? Haibo piu lamga maipuidungniu chalui thiujiu chalen lenbo wan-ga Saul niu chamai sang kamshat lu-e, chiudi David niu sang kariu kamshat lu-e chiubo piu side.”
Paliuniu pakhuga wangboga David niu chara-masamai ali lujiu nahmai kumjiu namdi rengmun mungga kapanjiu maret sude, khatdi patamniu pah ntanggiu tangbo luangkiujiu bamde.
Siga Achish niu pamaidung khuga din-e, “Phuilo! Hainase chara-masamai-e! Deleng haikum maitu akhuga puiwang jiulo?
Chara-masamai hai bui makha jiuma? Akilung siakga haikum maitu puiwangjiu deleng kam kabuak khai jiulo?”

David niu Gath namdi gasu paktad lanjiu Adullam namdak mungga bambo tulim kyga nbai mide. Sise pachimaidung khatdi pakikhunmai maidungniu pah sibo bamga bamme chiubo silujiu paliudi wangjiu majang bamde.
Maidungniu rebo mai, maksai maipaw phungmaidung maksai maningbo wangtangmak maidung pakhuga chamai kai madai kumbo wangjiu siga paniu paliugu jupao thiujiu bamde.
Sigasu David niu Moab ram Mizpah bamlam tadjiu Moab maigu chawang khuga din-e, “Asuangga nde padralo chiubo Tingwang niu dinbo simak then chalung sajiu apui nai apiutu nakhuga pibam khai khelo.”
David niu papui nai papiutu Moab maigu chawang khuga saodiakde khatdi David niu tulimkiga nbai bamthen paliuse siga bamde.
Sibosai phaimiukakung Gad niu David khuga wangjiu din-e, “Haiga bamta sulo, tuhoi siak Judah lam tadsulo.” Sijeng gasu David niu sibo bam saodiak lujiu Hereth gu mariulam tadmide.

Naikhat Saul niu Gibeah ramluong khatga khiangpibang hangga changiu thinlujiu ntao bamme, khatdi pagu charipi maidungniu chap magui lujiu bamde. Siga David nai pamaidung bamme chiujiu pakhuga dinkhaide,

siga paniu pagu chakampao maidung khuga din-e, “Kinglo Benjamin maidung! David niu naliu mathiuleng chalu khatdi mumsireng pikhaine khatdi naliutu pagu riphen maigu chakampao pithiu khaine chiu maning jiuma?

Haichiujiu naliuniu atu mahin kamshat raleng kambam jiuma? Anahpiu Jonathan niu David nai chunchamjiu alam mibo lamga mai khatnadi akhuga dinmakge. David niu amai thiujiu bamga anahpiuniu kachukhaijiu atu kamshatra pajad phuijiu bamgadi mai khatnadi akhuga dinkhai makge.
Ahimelech niu
Chawang Saul niu singku Ahimelech khatdi pakinamai khatdi Nob ga singku thiujiu bammaitu pakhuga kuwangde.
Saul niu Ahimelech khuga din-e, “Ahimelech yo, nkinglo!”
Ahimelech niu paokakge, “Awangpiu navang haiga I bamme.”

Saul niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Dekamjiu nangniu David nai chuncham lujiu atu atung jiulo? Dejengniu nang paleng katiu kasak khatdi chaheng pikhai gulo? Khatdi Tingwang khuga paleng maniukhai gulo? Tuhoira paniu atu atungjiu kamshatra pajat wibo phiu bamme!”
Ahimelech niu paokakge, “David hai nagu chakampao ruangga malumsui thubo makma? Pase natahpiu, natu akhimaigu chakampao khatdi mai hinaniu nagu chawang kyga chakhuang thiujiu bambo-e.
Yo, Iniu paleng Tingwang khuga maniubose thainainiu raithubo gudi makge. Awangpiu natu mikrebo kumjiu navang atu khatdi akykhun maidung maoleng chakkhai mitulo. Haibo lamga I wadi simakge!”
Chawang niu din-e, “Ahimelech yo, nang khatdi nariang-narui hina shaisiak rabo-e.”
Pamungga akhejiu bammaidung khuga paniu din-e, “
Sijeng gasu Saul niu Doeg khuga din-e, “Nangniu paliutu kamshat milo!” Siga Doeg niu paliutu kamshat kam mide. Sibo nai paniu Ephod singku pon piusuimai singku riaktachad-mangiutu kamshat mide.
Saul niu Nob kadihga lungbambo singkudung, namdiga bammai npui, npiu, nahmai, ngena, kabui, qonniam khatdi mily, pakhiangna kamshat mira chamtan pikhaide, sichiujiu siga bambo hina kamshat kam mide.
Chiudi Ahimelech nahpiu khangkhat, Abiathar ra mari lujiu David khulam pakkhai mide.
Paniu
David niu pakhuga din-e, “Iniu Doeg tu sibo bamga ngaobo nai paniu maomakjiu Saul khuga paokhai rabo-e chiubo Iniu si-e. Sijengniu nariang-naruidung shaikam mibose Iniu parid phung rade.
Akhuga bamlo, wadi pingmane, Saul niu atu khatdi natu kamshat nibo-e, chiudi nang akhuga bammi sai wadi manangra ha-e.”
Paliuniu David khuga din-e, “Phuilo Philistine mainiu Keilah namdakga charithiu wangjiu chalu gekhaibo khatdi alin-tara pakhiangna sunglude.”
Sijeng gasu David niu
Chiudi David maidungniu pakhuga din-e, “Judah ga bamdi aliu pingjiu bamga Keilah lam tadjiu Philistine rimaitu aphenbi sai sa-nkiubo sui-e!”
Sijengniu

Sijengniu David khatdi pamaidung Keilah lam tadlujiu Philistine maidungtu aphende; paliuniu chamai kakeng khatu kamshat lude sigasu paliugu khaorui-khaona daolude. Haichiujiu David niu Keilah gu namdaktu rankhaide.
Ahimelech nahpiu Abiathar paklujiu Keilah ga David saisui wangboga, paniu singku pon phunglujiu wang-e.

David niu Keilah lam tadmide chiubo Saul khuga dinkhaide siga paniu din-e, “Tingwang niu patu aben ga pikhaibode, chagamtuniu kareng thiubo khatdi kareng kham bambo namdiga ngutbo hai David paronna tathakga manlude.”
Sichiujiu Saul niu pagu riphenmaitu kulujiu Keilah lam chari hawangjiu David khatdi pamaidungtu minra langkhaide.
Saul niu patu aphenra kaden bamme chiubo David niu chiulujiu singku Abiathar khuga din-e, “Singku ponse haiga luwanglo.”
Sibo nai David niu din-e, “
Keilah mainiu atu Saul khuga pipadmi suma? Iniu chiubo kumjiu palingjiu Saul wangrama?
David niu maniu lan-e, “Keilah mainiu atu khatdi amaidungtu Saul khuga pikhaimi suma?”
Sijengniu David khatdi pamai kai charuk kumbose Keilah phutlujiu tadmide, David niu Keilah gasu mari mide chiubo Saul niu chiulujiu pagu tenrangse saomide.
David niu Ziph Luong mungga bambo ramjingga nbaijiu bamme. Saul niu patuse phiusao makjiu phiu-e chiudi Tingwang niu David tu paben ga pikhai makge.
Saul niu patu kamshat mira phiu-e, chiubo David side.
Ziph mungga bambo Horesh ramjingga David se bammide.
Siga Jonathan menglujiu Tingwang niu gukhai bam rabo-e chiujiu kachukhai bide.

Pakhuga haichiu din-e, “Pingtulo, apiu Saul niu wadaodi natu kam masa ngam lakge. Nangniu Israel maigu chawang thiurabo-e, khatdi nahangga Iniu bamjiu changam kamne chiubo apiu Saul niu masanjiu simide.
Panai khangnia khat khattu mahinbo chaka thiujiu ladriat thiulude. David niu Horesh ga bamdiak mide khatdi Jonathan se pakylam malan mide.
Pakendibopiu yo, nangniu patu minnijiu bambo aliu si-e; sijengniu aliu dihga wanglo, patu minra aliu maomakjiu natu nkha khaine.”
Saul niu paokakge, “Atu haijiukha kungbo donniu naliu riga
Tadsulo, khatdi phui masan sulo, pase dega bamsiaklo khatdi siga patuse saoniu ngaolo chiubo phiululo. Pahai pason sa-e chiubo I chiu-e.
Paniu ndega nbai bamlo chiubo bam phiupad masansiak lusai majatjiu akhuga paowanglo. Sigasu Iniu naliutu maluang lujiu paniu sibo bamga bamniusai Iniu patu Judah ramlung pakhiangna hajiu phiurabo-e.”
Sijeng gasu paliuniu saodiak lujiu Ziph lam malan khaijiu Saul masuang tadrai mide. David khatdi pamaidungse Maon gu ramjingga Judaea ramjing maidi bammakbo taningram tingrun lam bamme.
Saul nai pamaidungniu David tu phiura kemsude, chiudi sibo cham David niu chiulude, siniu Maon ramjing chakhaoren lam tadlujiu bammide. Saul niu sise chiulujiu David tu hatad sude.

Saul nai pamaidungniu maluang jai khatlam David nai pamaidungniu jai khatlam tadjiu bamme. Saul khatdi pamaidungniu David nai pakangmaitu minra taoweng wangboga paliuse Saul khugasu majadjiu mari lura matan sude.
Sibo wan siakga champaomai khatniu wangjiu Saul khuga din-e, “Majadjiu malanwang sukhe! Philistine maidungniu aliu dihtu chari thiujiu bamme”
Sigasu Saul niu David tu hatajiu Philistine maidungtu aphenra tadmide. Sijengniu sibo bamtu Mpek khaibo Luong
David niu sibo bam saodiakjiu paniu nbaijiu bambo Engedi luongriang lam tadmide.
Saul niu Philistine maitu chari aphen lujiu malanwang lanboga David niu Engedi ramjing mungga bamme chiubo pakhuga paokhai lande.
Saul niu Israel mai ruangga kamsi thubo riphen maidung sang sumtu majang lujiu Chahung Khaoren naimik padlam, David nai pamaidungtu phiura tadde.

Paniu haichiu npui tadwangboga milydungtu khuanbo bam wangtang raga tulimki khat daojiu paronna pakak khat mathakra ngutde. Sibo wan siakga, David nai pamaidungse sibo tulimki pasad lunglam nbaijiu bamme.
Paliuniu David khuga din-e. “Haise naleng pajad wibo gu-e!
Chiudi David se palung chariujiu,
pamaidung khuga din-e, “
Haichiujiu David niu Saul tu kam masara suimakge sichiujiu pamaidung lungchun pikim khaide. Saul se sulujiu tulimki saodiak lujiu pa-npuilam tadlan sude.
Siga David niu pasailam padlujiu patu ku-e, “Paken dibopiu yo!” Siga Saul niu mariwangjiu phuide, siga David niu chakhuang thiujiu kadihga makhum kiu-e.
Sichiujiu din-e, Iniu natu kamshatra khen bamme chiubo maidungniu arat dinbotu nang dekamjiu malumbam jiulo?
Tuhoisiak nangniu tulimkiga bamboga,

Phuilo, apiu yo, Iniu thinbambo nafai rise phuilo! Phuilo Iniu natu kamshat suibode, chiudi sibo malinleng haise nakha romlujiu tamibo-e. Haigasu nangniu silune, chiubora Iniu natu aphenjiu maksai natu kam mahara maningmi makge, Iniu kamaobo wakhatnadi tenkhai makge chiudi nangniu atu kamshat mira hatadjiu bamme.
niu anai kakga saoniu maolo chiubo ladjan thiumilo! Nangniu ariga tenkhai mibo ngamkam saisuijiu
Kadincham ga dinbo nang si-e. ‘Kasamai ronna kasa ngam kamme.’ Siniu I natu kam masa lakge.
Phuilanlo Israel maigu chawangniu detu kamshatra machun kin gulo! Phuilo paniu detu habam jiulo! Kashaibo thitu phiukin guma, maksai chalaipuitu phiukin jiuma!
Anai kakga saoniu maolo chiubo
David niu dinloi gapboga Saul niu din-e, “Palingjiu nang hai anahpiu David sima?” sichiujiu pase kapsude.
Sibosai paniu David khuga din-e, “Nang majide, I maode, Iniu nakhuga kamaobo haijiuga tenkhai bamdi, nangra atu lungsa bamme!
Nangra dejiukha wilo chiubo thainai nangniu akhuga lenkhaide, palamra
Saokum mainiu patu mikremaitu minlujiu kam masa makjiu matha phudkhai ralo? Nangniu thainai atu lungsa khaibibo leng
Tuhoira nangniu Israel maigu chawang thiurabo-e chiubo Iniu si masande. Khatdi chawangdih hai nagu dihthin hangga bammi rade.
Chiudi
David niu sui-e chiujiu ladriat thiu khaide.
Sibosai Saul paky lam malan mide khatdi David nai pamaidungse paliu nbaibo bamlam tadlan mide.
Samuel shai mide siniu Israel maidung wang maduilujiu patu huijiu kapde. Sichiujiu paliuniu patuse paniu bambo Ramah ga baikhai mide.
Sibosai David niu Paran ramjingga tadmide.
Siga Maon namdi gasu Caleb kiriangga Nabal kubo piu khat bamme. Pahai Carmel namdi mungga charampao thiujiu bamme. Pahai kalek wibomai khatle, pagu mily sang sum khatdi kami sang khat bamme.
Panao Abigail hai palun wichangwi-e khatdi ningting-e, chiudi pakinara pagu ting-e khatdi palung pomtanbo mai-e.
Nabal niu Carmel ga pagu mily-giu kakipjiu bamme.
Ramjingga bambo David niu sise chiude.
Sijeng gasu paniu rikhangmai khang kariutu Carmel lam langkhaijiu, Nabal tu adaora, khatdi chunwicham paokhaira langkhaide.
Nabal khuga haichiu dinra paniu paliu khuga kati khaide, “Akapiu yo, David niu pagu chunwicham nakhuga langwang-e; nangdi, nakikhun maidi khatdi nagu kabambo hinadi wijiu bamra kanui khai-e.

Nang haiga nagu mily-giu kakip bamme chiubo paniu chiulujiu paniu natu haise sikhaira masenbo-e, chiubora nagu mily khuanmaidungse aliu nai bam aruong khai-e khatdi aliuniu paliutu wadi kasabo tenkhai makge, paliuniu Carmel ga kabambo wan-ga paliugu wakhatnadi agami makge.

Paliu khuga haichiu maniusai paliuniu sise nakhuga dinkhai sune. Thainai nagu chunwibo nai aliu nakhuga wangbo-e, aliutu lungsa khaira David niu dinkhai-e. Navang aliu khuga khatdi naka kakung David leng lungsajiu nangniu kabuibo pikhai sune chiubo maning-e.”
David kangmainiu Nabal khuga David zan gasu haichiu dinkhaide. Sichiujiu paliuniu siga khuan bamme.
Kanamboga Nabal niu paokakge, “David saolo? Pazan chiu matai makge! Thaidao ken ga haibo kadihga paktad mibo kavangdung keng bamme!
Agu mily khuanmainiu tiurabo khaorui, taruak khatdi tadui Iniu palun simakmai, degasu wanglo chiubo simak maileng Iniu wadi pilakge!”
David kangmainiu pakhulam malan wangjiu Nabal niu kadinbo hina dinkhaide.

Siga paniu chamtan pide, “Naliu heng thinsulo!” Siga paliuniu paliu hengse thinsude, David di pahengse thinsu lujiu pakangmai chamai kai madai situ majang lujiu tadsude, chamai kai niatu wa phui raleng saodiak mide.

Nabal vangpiu khatniu Nabal nao Abigail khuga din-e, “Nang chiulu makma? David niu ramjing gasu champaomai khangsiatu langwangjiu awangpiu khuga chunwicham phungwang-e. Chiudi paniu paliutu kam mangam khai mide.
Paliura aliuleng wichang wi-e; paliuniu aliutu wadaodi kam kabuak khai makge khatdi paliu nai chaluga pawan machang bam aruangbo tingga aliugu wakhat nadi agami makge.
Paliuniu aliutu khatdi aliugu milydung tudi nchun n-nien saomakjiu phuikhai-e.
Haise makumlujiu dechiu kamralo chiubo maning khailo. Haichiu maksai awangpiu khatdi kikhunmai hina riga sansabo padsui-e. Pahaira mai khat laddi nking khaibo mai makge!”

Abigail niu kalangjiu taruak khuang kainia, jaw phuitingbo lah nia, rulubo mily mangiu jan, alin-tara thalubo taju kariu chinnia, mumsy kakibo kuon kai khat, maruibum taruak kai nia, haise qonniamdung riga chabang thiukhaide.
Sibosai paniu pavangmaidung khuga din-e, “Naliu tadrai sulo, I naliu sai suine.” Chiudi paniu pakina khuga waladdi dinkhai makge.
Paniu pagu qonniam tuanglujiu maluongton tadton wangboga David nai pamaidungse pakhulam buangthuak padde.

David niu haichiu maningjiu bamme, “Haibo piugu maniadungse Iniu dekamra haibo ramjingga akhi khaibam jiulo? Pagu wakhatnadi agami makge, Iniu patu haijiukha nkha khaibibo sung thainai paniu akhuga haichiu tenkhai lanbo gude!
Nsuan tingben makhaga haimaidungtu kamshat kam makge sai Tingwang niu atu kakhiu shatmi sulo!”
Abigail niu David tu ngaoboga kalangjiu pak nkum lujiu kadihga makhum kiude.
David phiga makhum kiujiu pakhuga din-e. “Paohubo, lungsajiu acham nkingkhai khelo! Haibo maose Iniu phungra-e.
Chalungsajiu Nabal lad lukhai tulo, walengdi gengmakbo mai-e! Pazan saisuijiu para palingjiu kapangbo mai-e! Paohubo maidungniu wangbo wan-ga I siga bamdao lumakjiu-e.
niu nagu mikremai khugasu gukhaibo khatdi chakhum ruimakra kamkhaibo-e. Tuhoi Iniu ladriat thiujiu dinbo-e, chiubora nagu mikremaidung khatdi natu kam masara rangjiu bammaitu Nabal tu kumjiu
Paohubo yo, chalungsajiu Iniu naleng phungwangbo kalen haise lukhaijiu nahmaidung leng pikhailo.
Paohubo, chalung sajiu Iniu kammao khaimibo hinase kuak khailo.
Mai khatniu natu kamshatra kamjiu aphensai, mai khatniu paman kungbo chakhiubungtu ribo kumjiu, na-Rawang,
niu nakhuga ladriatkhai mibo saisuijiu kawibo hina tenkhaibo paniu natu Israel maigu chawang pithiu khaine.
Siga nangniu aman makra, khatdi nalung chariura ha-e awangpiu yo, palam hajiu kamshatbo makge chiudi nakhum ruibo-e. Paohubo yo,
David niu pakhuga din-e, “
Nagu makum kawibo jengniu Tingwang tu thuonlo, palamra chakhum ruijiu, maitu kamshatjiu amao bamrabo gasu thainai nangniu piduak khaide.
Naliutu kam masami rabo gasu
Sichiujiu paniu phungwangbo kalense David niu lukhaide khatdi pakhuga din-e, “Nakylam wanglan sulo, wa manang mane, nangniu masenbose Iniu kamkhai bine.”
Abigail se Nabal khulam malan wangboga, chawangniu tiu kabuibo tatekse tiusakjiu. Nabal se jaw sakjiu padiujeng thiubam niude. Sijengniu pasaibonai padmak then paniu Nabal khuga wadi dinmakge.
Paniu jaw maniuta mibo sai padmibo hinase paniu pakhuga dinkhaide. Siga Nabal hai siunang mide khatdi papum pakhiangna malai sita mide.
Jengriu saiga
David niu Nabal shaimide chiubo cham chiuboga paniu din-e, “
Sibo sai David niu Abigail tu magiang raleng npaora chamai langkhaide.
Pavangmaidungniu Carmel lam tadjiu pakhuga din-e, “David niu natu panaoleng lura aliutu langkhaibo-e.”
Abigail niu kadihga makhum kiujiu din-e, “Ira pavangpui si-e, pavangmaidung ngen khiura kaden bambo-e.”
Paniu kalangjiu buangsu lujiu pagu qonniam tongsude. Patu machabopui khang mangiutu majang lujiu David vangmai saisui wangjiu David nao thiu mide.
David niu Jezreel gasu Ahinoam tu khatdi tuhoi Abigail tudi panao thiude.
Sichiujiu bamga Saul niu David nao leng pikhai mibo, panahpui Michal situ Gillim namdiga bambo, Laish nahpiu Palti kubo piu khuga magiangkhai mide.
Saul niu sibo wan gapga Israel mai ruanggasu withubo riphenmai sang sumtu kadalujiu David tu phiura Ziph ramjinglam tad mide.
Hachilah Luong npui mungga rijiky taliu lujiu bamde, David se ramjingga nbaibam kha-e, khatdi Saul niu patu phiuwang kin-e, chiubo silude.
Paniu chakhumpao maitu langkhaide, siga palingjiu Saul se bamme chiubo silude.
Paniu sibo bamga tadlujiu Saul nai pagu riphenpi Ner nahpiu, Abner jibamsiak phuilude. Saul niu palunglam jibamme khatdi pagu riphenmainiu patu khuan mawibambo-e.
Hitt maipiu Ahimelech khatdi Joab singnapiu Abishai (paliu puiniu Zeruiah), khuga David niu maniu-e, “Nanai khangnia ruangga saoniu Saul gu rijiky tangbo asai suitad ralo?
Abishai niu paokakge! “Iniu tadne.”
Sibo nai nchun David nai Abishai se Saul gu rijikyga ngutde, khatdi Saul se rijiky n-gangga jilujiu pangiuse papee rinaga khunkhai lujiu jibambo daode. Abner nai pakangmaise patu jikhuan bamme.
Abishai niu David khuga din-e, “Tingwang niu thaichun nagu mikremaitu naben ga pikhaibode. Tuhoi Iniu pangiuniu patu chugui gasu chuphupmi tane. Iniu patu khun lonnia lakge!”
Chiudi David niu din-e, “Nangniu patu kamshatbo suimakge!
David niu dinkiulan-e, “Iniu si-e, Ringbambo
niu chawang pithiu khai mai riga Iniu aben khaira,

Sichiujiu David niu Saul pi mungga khai bambo changiu nai taduilahse khoilujiu Abishai panai tadmide. Dechiu padlo chiubo mai khatnadi simakge ngaodi ngao makge, paliu mai hina jijing mijiu maidi rakpad makge. Palamra
David niu pagen khatlam kenpad lujiu diusuibo maluangton ga chaplujiu,
Saul riphendung nai Abner tu kusude, “Abener yo! Iniu kubo hai nang chiuma?”
Abner niu maniu-e, “Sen marungjiu chawangtu pi kam marak khaibose saolo?”
David niu paokakge, “Abner yo nang hai Israel mai ruangga dithubo makma? sichiusai dekamjiu nawangpiu, chawangtu akhe mawimak jiulo? Tuhoisiak nawang piutu kamshat mira naliu jiga ngutbo-e.
Abner yo! Nang hai maomide, ringbambo
Saul niu David khuon silujiu maniu-e, “Nang hai anahpiu David makma?”
David niu paokakge, “Yo, pakendibo piu yo,”
Paniu haichiu dinsan khai-e, “Paohubo yo, dekamjiu tuhoi tangbo navangpiu atu phiubam gulo? Iniu degu kamaobo kamkhai mibo bamjiulo?
Pakendibo piu yo, Iniu dinbo cham nking khailo.
khugasu diujiu sangdiu maigu kadihga atu kamshat khai tulo. Dekamjiu Israel maigu chawangniu chalaipui kumbo atu kamshatra phiukin gulo? Ndekamjiu paniu atu nthingnatu kum hakin jiulo?

Saul niu paokakge, “I maomide, Anahpiu David yo, malanwang lanlo! Iniu natu kasa thiulan lakde, palamra thaichun nangniu aringtingtu phutkhai lan bide. I hai kapangbo mai-e! Mai pingbo ngam Iniu kam mide!”
David niu paokakge, “Pakendibo piu yo, haiga na-ngiu bamme, nahmai khattu langkhaijiu khoilulo.
Malumbuimai khatdi tacheng majimaitu
Thainaisiak Iniu naringting phut khaibo kum
Saul niu David khuga din-e, “Anahpiu yo, Tingwang niu natu thoidam pikhaibo thiumilo! Nangniu kambo hina tathuibo thiumilo.
Sichiujiu David se tadmide khatdi Saul di pakylam malanwang mide.

David niu paronna haichiu maning-e. “Naikhatra Saul niu atu kamshatmi rabo-e. Philistine mai ruangga bamsai mari raleng wibi sune, Israel mai ramlungga bamthenna Saul niu atu phiubam sune, bam madiu misai I duaklu sune.”
Sijeng gasu David niu pamaidung kai charuktu maluang lujiu Gath gu chawang Maoch nahpiu Achish khulam tadmide.
David khatdi pamaidungse Gath ga paliu kykhunmaitu majang lujiu lungmide. David niu panao kania Jezreel maipui Ahinoam, khatdi Carmel ga Nabal nao kamipui Abigail tu majang lung bamde.
David niu Gath lam pakmide chiubo Saul niu chiulujiu David tu phiuta mide.
David niu Achish khuga din-e, “Nang hai akamai-e sai Iniu lungra namdak poi khat pikhailo. Paohubo yo, nagu dihsing namdiga anai lung aruong bamra pageng bamson makge.”
Sijeng gasu Achish niu pakhuga Ziklag namdakse pikhaide. Haijeng gasu tuhoi tangbo Ziklag hai Judah mai wangdunggu thiujiu bamme.
David niu Philistine ga chahiu kariu-je-charuk lungkhai-e.
Sibo wan-ga David khatdi pamaidungniu ndagasu lungjiu bambo maidung Geshur, Girzi khatdi Amalek maidungtu aphende. Paliu ram Shur tangbo paniu chari thiujiu Egypt npui tangbo hakiujiu,
npui-npiu hinatu kamshat mide, khatdi milydung, qonniamdung, qontraodung, khatdi chapuan-taniadung sunglujiu Achish khulam malanwang lande.

Achish niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Thaidao nang delam chari hatad kinjiulo?” David niu patu paokak-e, “Judah ram tingrun maksai Jerahmeel kikhuang ram maksai Keni maidung lungbo luongriang lam chari hatad kinbo-e.”

Gath gu chawang khuga mai khatdi chalad paomakra khatdi tadmariu makra pah khatdi pamaidungniu degu kamkhai milo chiubo pisi makra David niu chamai hina maipui maipiu pakhiang natu kamshat kam mide. David niu Philistine ga lungbo wan-ga haichiujiu kamkhaide.
Chiudi Achish niu David tu malumme, paronna haichiu maning-e. “Patu pamai Israel mainiu haijiukha ngaokhai lakbo hainiu paringting loibo tangjiu paniu atu machajiu bammi rabo-e.”
Watheng makhaga Philistine mainiu Israel maitu chari thiura wangmadui sude, khatdi Achish niu David khuga din-e, “Nangniu sibambo si-e, khatdi nahmaidungse akhulam jaojiu chari thiurade.”
David niu paokakge, “Ira navangpiu-e, Iniu naleng degu tenkhai ngamlo chiubo nang ngao sune.”
Achish niu din-e, “Wide! Iniu natu agu tingthenggu akhepiu leng khai rade.”
Philistine mai riphendungse wangmadui lujiu Shunem namdi mungga rijiky thiu khaijiu bamme. Saul niu Israel maidungtu khomwang lujiu Gilboa Luongga rijiky thiu khaijiu bamme.
Saul niu Philistine maigu charibaotu ngaoboga pingsui mide.
Sijengniu
Sichiuboga Saul niu pagu chakampaodung khuga chamtan pide, chamang phungbo maipui khat phiu khailo, I tadjiu patu npaora mide.”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Endor ga maipui khat bamme.”

Sijengniu Saul paronna palun kam kalilujiu papuan katambo piulujiu, khatdi nchun tamiu gasu papammai khangniatu majang lujiu sibo puitu adaora tadde. Paniu sibo pui khuga din-e, “Degu padralo chiubo aleng nangniu hiuna khuga maniu khailo. Iniu pazan dinkhaine sibo piutu kukhailo.”
Sibo puiniu paokakge, “Chawang Saul niu chamang phungmai, sailad dinmaitu Israel mai kadihga bamsui makge chiubose nangniu sibambo-e, dekamjiu atu manjiu kamshatra tathak thiubam gulo?”
Siga Saul niu mahinbo ladriat khat thiujiu pakhuga din-e, “Ringjiu bambo
Sibo puiniu maniu-e, “Iniu naleng saotu kukhai ralo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Samuel tu kukhailo.”
Sibo puiniu Samuel tu ngaoboga charenjiu Saul khuga din-e, “Nang dekamjiu atu sonjiulo? Nang chawang Saul si-e!”
Chawangniu pakhuga din-e, “Pingmi tulo! Nang dechiujiu ngaolo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Kadih lunggasu hiuna khat padkinbo I ngao-e.”
Paniu maniu-e, “Sinase saotu kajuanlo?”
Sibo puiniu paokakge, “Katingmai khat padle, pase naonaobo ntiang khat ntiang-e.”
Siga Saul niu Samuel-e chiubo side, siga paniu chakhuang thiujiu kadihga makhum kiude.
Samuel niu Saul khuga din-e, “Dekamjiu nang atu kam kabuakjiu bamgulo? Dekamjiu atu kumalan wangjiulo?”

Saul niu paokakge, “I alung chariu-e! Philistine maidungniu atu chari thiu bamme, khatdi Tingwang niu atu phut mide. Paniu phaimiukakungdung khuga sudi, maksai amanglam sudi atu paokakta mide. Sijengniu I dekam ralo chiubo akhuga dinkhaira natu kubo-e.”
Samuel niu din-e, “
niu akhugasu natu dinkhai mibo kumjiu nagu chawang kadihse paniu nakhugasu lupad lujiu, natu malinra David khuga pikhai mibo-e.
Nangniu
Paniu natu khatdi Israel maitu Philistine mai ben-ga pikhaimi rade. Nsuannai hai, nang khatdi nanahmaise akhulam wangmi rabode, khatdi
Samuel niu dinbo chiugapboga Saul se pingboniu kadihga kaokiujiu kalatung kiumide. pase pajeng hamide, palamra nchun n-nien wadi tiuta mibo-e.
Pase pingju mijiu wathak thiura hade, chiubo sibo puiniu simide. Sibo puiniu pakhuga din-e, “Paohubo yo, nangniu khengbose kamkhaijiu, aringting pikhai mibo-e.
Tuhoi Iniu dinbo suikhailo, naleng katiu kasak kaden khaine, nang sise tiulo, sichiusai nang tadlan ngam sui-e.”
Saul niu suini makge, pah wakhatdi tiulakge chiu din-e, chiudi chakampaodungniu tiura matanjiu hiamjiu din-e. Kanamboga buangsujiu taziga ntaode.
Sibo puiniu pakhuga bambo kabuipoi pamai wibo khat kalangjiu kamshat khaide. Paniu takhui moi lulujiu chakhi khaimakbo taruak khuak khaide.
Sibo puiniu Saul khatdi pagu chakampaodung suangga katiuse ponwangjiu paliu sise tiude. Sibo nai nchun paliu tadmide.
Israel mainiu Jezreel gu Ramjeng duipui bamga rijiky thiujiu bamga Philistine mai phomniu Aphek ga wang madui bamme.
Philistine mai chawang khang mangiuniu paliu kangmai phom kai khatgu khatdi sang khatgu thiujiu charileng kamsude. David khatdi pamaidungse chawang Achish niu maluang lujiu pasailam kemsude.
Philistine maigu charipidungniu paliutu ngaolujiu maniu-e, “Hebrew maidung haiga degu kambam gulo?”

Achish niu paokakge, “Haise David si-e, Israel mai wang Saul gu chakampao khatle. Pahai akhuga pawan thengkha bamwang mibo-e. Paniu akhuga wangbonai gasu thainai tangboga paniu kamaobo khatdi tenkhai makge.”

Chiudi Philistine maigu charipidungniu Achish tu paliu lung pommide, khatdi pakhuga din-e, “Sibo piutu nangniu paleng pikhai mibo bamlam langkhai lanmilo. Aliuniu patu hai charibam khatga tad ncham khaitulo. Charibam gasu aliutu suimakjiu aphenlan sui-e. Aliu mai shai rabotu dangrabo suang, pawangpiu lam lianglujiu tatien thiumi sai saoniu siralo?
Haironna makjiu maipuidungniu chalen lenjiu chalui thiukhai bambopiu chiujiu dinbo David si-e. ‘Saul niu sang tu kamshat, David niu sang kariu kamshatle.’”

Achish niu David tu kulujiu din-e, “Iniu Israel maigu ringbambo Tingwang ga ladriat thiubo-e, chiubora nang alad piu-e khatdi agu chari bamga nang nai tadlujiu chari thiura maning-e. Nangniu akhuga wanggap gasu thainai tangbo kamaobo wadi ngaomakge. Chiudi chawang kakimainiu natu suita mide.
Sijengniu chakylam agi manaijiu malanmi sulo, khatdi paliutu amanmakbo thiukhai tulo.”

David niu paokakge, “Paohubo yo, Iniu degu kammao mibo bamjiulo? Nangniu dinbo kumme sai, Iniu nakhuga wangjiu machagap gasu tuhoi tangbo nangniu agu kamaobo daomakge chiusai dekamjiu awangpiu nagu mikremaitu chari thiura Iniu natu maluang tadmak ralo?”
Achish niu paokakge, “I sui-e, amik phuiga Tingwang gu maza kumjiu namao khatdi ha-e. Chiudi kakibo chawang mainiu, aliu nai nang chari bamga tadsui lakge chiubo donniu-e.
Sijengniu David yo, Saul tu saodiak lujiu akhulam wangmai naliu mathiu nsuannai nsuan sulujiu tingben pad kaji-kari haibo bam saodiak lujiu tadsulo.”
Sijengniu David khatdi pamaidung pasaibo nai nsuan kalu sulujiu Philistine lam malan mide, khatdi Philistine maidungse Jazreel lam tadmide.
Jengnia sailam David khatdi pamaidung Ziklag lam malanwang lande. Amalek mainiu Judah gu tingnulam khatdi Ziklag maitu chari thiude. Paliuniu namdakse chami matia mide,
khatdi npuimai hinatu minlude, paliuniu mai khat tudi kamshat makjiu, paliu mathiutu jutad mide.
David nai pamaidung wangboga namdakdungse chami ruduak mide, khatdi paliu nao-nah hina tudi jutad kammi bamniude.
David nai pamaidungse kapchang kapjiu, paliu jeng-ha makthen kapsude.
David nao kania Ahinoam khatdi Abigail tudi mintad mide.
Tuhoira David palung chariu mide, palamra pamaidung paliu nao-nah hakam mibo jengniu paliu lung pomjiu patu tatuniu rotra kamsude. Chiudi
David niu Ahimelech nahpiu Abiathar singku khuga din-e, “Phaimiu ponse luwanglo,” Abiathar niu sise luwangde.
David niu
Sijengniu David niu pamaidung kai charuktu maluang lujiu kemsu mide. Paliuniu Besor singgiu wangtangboga paliu khangsia maise bamdiak mide.
David niu chamai kai madaitu majang lujiu tadmide. Kakibo mai kainiase singgiu kenra ngam lakjiu, siga bamdiak mide.
David nai tad macham maidungniu Egypt gasu chabonmai khattu daode khatdi patuse David khulam majang wangde. Paliuniu paleng katiu kasak pikhaide,
sisera majongsy-ki nai mumsy-ki konnia-e. Paniu tiulubo sai tankhang lande, pase jengsum wadi tiuta- sakta mibo-e.
David niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nawangpiu saolo khatdi nang degasu wanglo?”
Paniu paokakge, “I hai Egypt mai-e, khatdi Amalek maigu kavang khatle. I mara mijiu awangpiuniu taliang khai diakbo jengsum tangmide.
Judah gu tingnu Cherethi luongriang khatdi Caleb kirianggu luongriangga chari hatadle, khatdi Ziklag se aliuniu chami rumibo-e.”
David niu maniu-e, “Sibo riphen maidung khulam atu majangkhai suima?”
Paniu paokakge, “Nangniu atu kamshat lakge, maksai awangpiu khuga atu pikhai lakge chiujiu Tingwang zan ga ladriat thiu saira paliu bam dinkhai sui-e.”
Paniu paliu bamlam David tu jukhaide.
Riphenmaise Philistine khatdi Judah lamsu sutwangbo chakhiu-chalandung paliu suangga khailujiu pabam tam-tamjiu tiusak maniu bamme.
Pasaibo nai tingben padgap gasu chawan tangbo David niu paliutu aphende. Chabonmai chamai kai madai qontrao tonglu pakmi maise makjiu kakimai khatnadi duaklu makge.
Amalek mainiu lumibo mania khatdi panao kania jaojiu mai hinatu David niu ranlan lude,
wakhat nadi hami makge. David niu pamaidung, paliu naodung khatdi Amalek mainiu lutad mibo mania hina daolan lude.
Pagu milydung nai khaorui khaonadung pakhiangna daolan lujiu pamaidungniu pama suangga wangjiu din-e, “Haise David gu-e!”

Sibo nai David niu paliu nai tad nchamra sonju mijiu Besor singgiu mungga chamai kai nia saodiakmi maidung khulam malan wanglande. Paliuniu David nai pamaidungtu sunpad adao-e. David niu paliu khulam khangjiu paliutu chunwicham paokhaide.

Chiudi palung kasiammai nai pageng kahamai, David nai tad nchammai siniu din-e, “Aliu nai tad ncham makmai lengra aliuniu daolubo mania sira paliuleng pilakge, paliuniu paliu nao-nahdungtu daolu sai siseniu suide.”
Chiudi David niu paokakge, “Asingna maidung,
Naliuniu dinbo hai khatnadi suimakge! Mai hina padam lu ncham rabo-e. Bamdiak lujiu nkhabam maidungdi, chari bamga tadmaidung nai padam nchamjiu daokam rabo-e.”
David niu haibo chamtan khat taliu khaide, sibo nai gasu sujiu Israel mai dihga haibo cheng-jaise thinsu mide.
David niu Ziklag ga malanwang lubo sai chari hatadbo gasu daolubo maniadungse pakamai lengdi padam njan khaijiu Judah mai jupaodung khuga haibo cham din-e, “
Sise paniu langkhaijiu Bethel ga bammaidung leng Judah gu tingnu lam Ramah ga bammaidung leng khatdi Jattir namdiga bammaidung leng, sichiujiu
Aroer, Siphmoth, Eshtemoa,
khatdi Racal, sigasu Jerahmeel namdak maileng, Keni maileng,
Hormah namdiga bammaidung Borashan, Athach,
khatdi Hebron ga langkhaijiu pikhaide. Paniu pamaidung tadkhai mibo bam hinaga njan khaide.
Philistine mainiu Israel maitu Gilboa Luongga chari aphende. Siga Israel mai kakengtu kamshat mide, khatdi kamshat kabangmaise chawang Saul khatdi panahmaidung jaojiu pakmide.
Chiudi Philistine maidungniu hameng paliutu minlude, khatdi Saul nahmai khangsum Jonathan, Abinadab khatdi Malchishua tu kamshat mide.
Charise tanjiu Saul tu aphenra wangde, siga patuse mikremaigu tavaithuniu kettaojiu, ajam masajiu ajam mide.

Pagu charinia phungjiu tadbo akhangpiu khuga paniu din-e, “Naheng thadpadjiu atu kamshat milo, sichiusai atu mikrebo, para kahabo Philistine mainiu kamshat lumak raleng-e.” Chiudi sibo akhangpiu siniu sise kamkhaira pingchang pingmide. Sigasu Saul niu paheng thadpad lujiu paronna patu chushat mide.
Sibo akhangpiu siniu Saul shaimibo ngaolujiu padi paronna pahengniu chujiu Saul nai shai ncham mide.
Haichiujiu Saul khatdi panahmai khangsum khatdi akhangmaise shai mide, sichiujiu sibo nai Saul mai pakhiangna shai mide.

Israel maidung Jordan giu tingbanglam khatdi Jezreel gu Ramjeng genlam bammaidungniu Israel maigu riphendung pakkam mide, khatdi Saul nai panahmaitu kamshat kammide chiubo paliu chiulujiu paliugu namdi phutlujiu pakkam mide. Sigasu Philistine maidungniu wangjiu paliu namga lungmide.
Chari thiulubo sai Philistine maidungniu kashaibo maidung khugasu wa mania khomtadboga Saul nai panah maidung shaijiu Gilboa Luongga bamniubo ngaode.
Paliuniu Saul pee danglude, pagu ripuan hina luaklude khatdi Philistine mainiu paliu rameng nai paliu mai khuga kawicham dinkhaira tacham paoronmaitu Philistine dih pakhiangnaga langkhaide.
Sibosai paliuniu Saul gu chariniase Astarte rapuigu rakyga ponwang khaide, khatdi papumse Beth Shan namdi chagamtu karengga natriniu genjiu maseng khaide.
Philistine maidungniu Saul khuga kamkhai mibo cham Gilead ga bambo Jabesh maidungniu chiuboga,
katan kahumai khangsianiu nchun masang Beth Shan lam tadde. Paliuniu Saul khatdi panahmai phawse lukiu lujiu, Jabesh lam phungwang siga paliutu rumide.
Paliuniu paliu radungse khoilujiu namdiga bambo khiangpibang hangga nphum khai mide, khatdi jeng chinnia kalumri khaide.
Saul shai mibo sai, David niu Amalek maitu ngamlujiu wang Ziklag ga jengnia manai khaide.
Pasaibo nai Saul gu rijiky gasu chabonmai khat wang pachun sabo lenjiu pafai-pani phet khatdi papeega tabui katup khai sude. David khuga wang chakhuang thiubo lenjiu kadihga makhum kiude.
David niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nang delamsu wangbolo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Israel maigu rijiky gasu I marilujiu pakwang kinbo-e.”
David niu din-e, “Degu padmi gulo akhuga dinkhailo.”
Paniu paokakge, “Chari aphen-bam gasu aliugu riphendung pakmibo-e, sichiujiu aliu mai kakengtu kamshat mide. Saul nai panahpiu Jonathan tudi kamshat mide.”
David niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Saul nai Jonathan shai mide chiubo hai nang dechiujiu silujiulo?”
Siga pah ariwang atu ngaolujiu atu ku-e. Siga Iniu paokakge, “Yo, Paohubo!”
Siga I saolo chiubo paniu akhu maniuboga, I hai Amalek mai-e, chiujiu paokak khai-e.
Siga paniu din-e, “Haiga wangjiu atu kamshat milo! I ajam masa mide, I shaira kum mide.”

Sichiujiu Iniu wangjiu patu kamshat mide, pase kaokiugap chiusai, pah shaisiak mirabo-e chiubo Iniu si-e. Sijengniu papee gasu Iniu pagu chawang pirun khatdi pa-npom gasu patahse luaklujiu nakhuga phungwang kinbo-e, chaibo yo.”
David niu pachun sajiu pafai-pani phet sude, pamaidungdi sichiujiu kamsude.
Chari aphenbo gasu Saul nai Jonathan khatdi
Pakhuga chakhum paowangbo chabonmai khugase David niu maniu-e, “Nang degasu wangbo mailo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Ira Amalek mai-e, chiudi nagu kadihga lungbam mai-e.”
David niu pakhuga maniu-e. “
Sichiujiu David niu pamai khattu kulujiu din-e, “Patu kamshat milo!” Siga sibopiu siniu Amalek maipiu situ kamshat mide,
Sichiujiu David niu Amalek maipiu khuga din-e, “Haise naronna nariga phungwangbo-e.
David niu Saul nai Jonathan tu huijiu haibo luise thiusude,
khatdi Judah maitu katikhaira chamtan pikhai-e. (Haise Jashar gu ariakkhuang ga raokhai bamme).
“Israel maigu maluong gase aliugu jupaodung shai mide!
Huthubo aliugu riphendungse kaomide!
Haise Gath ga maksai Ashkelon npuiga pisikhai tulo.
Philistine maipuidungtu pijiu chunwi khai tulo;
nkengmai nahpuidungtu pijiu chunwi khai tulo.
“Gilboa luongga tingdui maksai kajikdui pikiu khai tulo;
haibo luzamse pijiu tingtheng kathaidih pi thiumilo!
Palamra kahubo piugu chageese siga kaomide;
Saul gu chageese wasa manuk khai tamide.
Jonathan gu tavaipi sira shaisuibo-e,
Saul hengse lungsabo jaomak jingbo-e,
tan-hubo mikremai situ bikao kiu mibo-e.
“Saul nai Jonathan hai maisuang habo khat-khat tu kungbo-e;
shaidi-ringdi khat nakha-e;
lengreng suang majatle, khatdi ndongqui suang tan-e.
“Israel maipuidung yo, Saul jengniu achung lulo!
Paniu naliutu kalekwibo, hengmarenbo fainise pipiu khaibo-e,
khatdi kachia tiu-tah siniu naliutu karu khaibo-e.
Kahubo riphendungse kaomide, chari gase paliutu kamshat mide.
Jonathan sidi sibo luongga shaikhai mide.
“Singna Jonathan yo, najengniu I dejiukha chunsalo;
dejiukha nangniu atu kungkhai migulo!
Nangniu atu lungsabose dejiukha maisuang hagulo,
sise maipuigu lungsiat suang mon-e.
“Kahubo riphendungse kaomide,
paliu heng-ngiuse phut mide sise pageng hamide.”
Haibo sai, David niu
David niu maniu-e, “Dekambo namdi siralo?”
Sijengniu David niu panao kania, Jezreel maipui Ahinoam nai Carmel maipui, Nabal nao Abigail tu maluong lujiu Hebron lam tadsu mide.
Paniu pamaidung khatdi paliu kikhun tudi puiwang Hebron namdi mungga lungkhai sude.
Sigasu Judah maidung Hebron ga wangjiu David tu chawang leng wasa tai khaide.
Gilead ga Jabesh mainiu Saul tu baikhai mide chiubo David niu chiulujiu,
paniu haichiu khangsiamai khuga chalad din kalen khaide: “Naliuniu naliu wangtu chakhuang thiujiu baikhai mibo jengniu,
Sichiujiu
Tan-hujiu bamlo! Naliu wangpiu Saul sira shai mide, sichiujiu Judah mai siniu atu paliu wang leng chiujiu wasa manuk khai bide.”
Saul gu chari-chaibo, Ner nahpiu Abner niu Saul nahpiu Ishbosheth panai Jordan hugen, Mahanaim lam pakkhai mide.
Siga Abner niu Ishbosheth tu pijiu Gilead, Asher
Paniu Israel mai wang thiuboga pah takum atai tang mide. Sichiujiu pah takum nia mawang khaide.
Chiudi Judah maira David hangga bambo-e,
sichiujiu paniu Hebron gasu Judah dihtu takum chinnia-paphan mawang khaide.
Abner khatdi Ishbosheth gu chakampaodung, Mahanaim gasu Gibeon namdi lam tadlujiu,
Zeruiah kubo puiniu lungbo Joab khatdi David gu chakampaodungtu ajai gasu adao lujiu, phom khatniu ajai-gen khatlam, phom khatniu pajai khatlam ntao sude.
Abner niu Joab khuga din-e, “Aliuniu akhangmai khangsiatu kadapad lujiu chaheng-changiu karenbo khat kamkhe.”
Joab niu paokakge, “Wi ye, kamkhe.”
Sijengniu Ishbosheth lam liangmai, Benjamin mai phiu gasu khang kariu-je-niakiu niu, David lam liangmai khang kariuje-je-niakiutu pijiu aphen khaide.
Paliu mai hinase chaheng khat-khat thin lujiu, khat-khat lepga paheng-heng chukhaijiu khang makai-je-madaikiuse shaikam mide. Sichiujiu sibo bam situ “Chaheng-luzam” chiujiu kumide.
Sigasu chari kasabose padjiu Abner nai Israel maitu David mainiu ngamlude.
Siga Zeruiah nahpiu khang-sum, Joab, Abishai khatdi Asahel paliu jao-e. Asahel haira tathan kumjiu paktanbo mai-e,
paniu Abner sailam hasude.
Abner niu sailam mariwang phuilujiu din-e, “Asahel yo, haise nangma?”
Paniu paokakge, “Yo.”
Abner niu din-e, “Atu hatalo. Asailam charimai khat wangkinne, patu halujiu pagu kabam hina sutlulo.” Chiudi Asahel niu hasao makjiu hasude.
Abner niu dinlan-e, “Atu hata sulo! Iniu dechiu nachi Joab tu zudao ralo?”
Chiudi Asahel niu hata makge, siga Abner niu sailam pangiuse phenpadjiu, pawon gasu pangum phen taronsuan mide. Siga Asahel se kadihga kaokiu mide, siga mai hina wangjiu patu phui karen-e.
Chiudi Joab nai Abishai niu Abner tu halan sude, sichiujiu nchunse paliuniu Gideon gu ramjing puidiga, Giah gu tingbang lam, Ammah luong gase wangtang mide.
Benjamin kiphiu gasu maidung siniu Abner tu wang aruong lujiu maluong-phi gase chapkhom bamme.

Siga Abner niu Joab tu kujiu din-e, “Aliu haichiu tingtheng chari thiujiu bam rama? Pakanam lamra wadi padmakjiu kakhabo ronna mine chiubo nang simak jiuma? Aliu hai kadih khat mai-e. Namaidungniu aliutu hata miraleng dethengkha nangniu chamtan pimakjiu bamralo?”
Joab niu paokakge, “Ringjiu bambo Tingwang zan gasu Iniu siangjiu dinbo-e, nangniu haichiu dinmak sai nsuannai nsuan tangbo pijiu amaidungtu habam rabo-e,”
Sigasu Joab niu Israel maitu hata mira madan thiujiu make mudkhaiboga charise saomide.
Abner nai pamaidung siniu Jordan Ramjengse nchun tadsang sude; sichiu paliuniu Jordan Giuse kenlujiu pasaibo nai nsuan tangbo tadjiu, Mahanaim gase wangtang mide.
Joab niu hata mibo sai, paniu pamaitu khomwang maduiboga Asahel tu sikhaijiu khang kariu-je-chakiutu daolu makge.
David mainiu Benjamin kiphiu gasu Abner mai 360 tu kamshat mide.
Joab nai pamaidung siniu Asahel phawse phungwang pakikhunmai rawbam Bethlehem ga baikhai mide. Sichiujiu paliu nchun tadsangjiu nsuan kalu Hebron ga wangtang mide.
Saul kykhunmaitu nkhabo riphendung nai David tu nkhabo riphendung siniu pating thengjiu charithiu khang sude. Siga David niu tanbi-bi khangsude chiudi patu atungbo maira sonbi-bi kiumide.
Pahangga raokhaibo khang charuk hai David niu Hebron gasu lungbo-e, tingthubo siniu, Jezreel maipui Ahinoam niu lungbo Amnon;
Carmel maipui, Nabal gu kamipui, Abigail niu lungbo Khileab; Gashur mai wang Talmai nahpui Maacah niu lungbo Absalom;
Haggith niu lungbo Adonijah; Abital niu lungbo Shephatiah;
khatdi Eglah niu lungbo Ithream paliu-e. Paliu mathiu haitu Hebron gasu lungbo-e.
Sichiujiu Saul gu riphenmai nai David gu riphendung charithiu khangboga, Saul saisuimai ruangga Abner hai tanbi-bi khangsude.
Naikhatra Saul nahpiu Ishbosheth niu, Saul nao, Aiah nahpui Rizpah tu Abner niu maluangji-e chiujiu madamkhai sude.

Haisiniu Abner lung kampom masakha mide, sichiujiu paniu din-e, “Iniu Saul tu jonmi sune chiu nangniu maning jiuma? Iniu Judah maitu machasiak bamme chiujiu nangniu maning jiuma? Raithubo tingmik gasu Iniu napiu Saul tu, pasingna maitu khatdi pakamaitu akhi-machajiu bambo-e, khatdi David niu natu ngammi rabo gasu Iniu gukhai mibo-e; chiudi thainai nangniu atu maipui khat lamga kamaobo madam khai jiuma?
Saul khatdi pakai-kik khugasu chawang kadihse lupad lujiu David tu pijiu Israel mai nai Judah mai wang thiukhaijiu, pake khat lamsu pake khatlam tangbo David tu pi mawang khaine chiujiu
Ishbosheth niu Abner tu pingju mibo jengniu wakhat laddi paniu dinkhai makge.

Hebron ga bambo David khuga Abner niu chakhum paomai langkhaijiu din-e, “Haibo kadih haitu saoniu mawang ralo? Akhuga ladsiang thiukhailo, chiusai Iniu nalam liangjiu Israel mai mathiutu pijiu nagu pumtan hangga pilung khai bine.”
David niu paokakge, “Wide! Iniu pathak khat gasu ladsiang thiukhai bine: nangniu atu adaora wangboga Saul nahpui Michal tu akhuga puiwang rabo-e.”
David niu Ishbosheth khugadi chakhumpaomai langkhaijiu din-e, “Iniu Philistine mai, chamai kai legi pijiu magiangra liulubo anao Michal situ pilan sulo.”
Sijengniu Ishbosheth niu pakina, Laish nahpiu Paltiel khugasu patu
Patiel niu kapjiu-kapjiu Bahurim namdi tangbo hatad sude. Chiudi Abner niu “Nakylam malan sulo” chiu dinkhaiboga pah malan mide.
Abner niu Israel maigu jupaodung khuga tadlujiu paliu khuga dinsude, “Pating kathengkha naliuniu David tu pijiu naliu wang thiukhai nibo-e.
Tuhoi hai naliuleng pawande.
Abner niu Benjamin kiphiu mai khugadi dinlujiu, Hebron lam tadlujiu Benjamin kiphiu mai nai Israel mainiu suikhaibo chamse David khuga dinkhaide.
Abner niu chamai makaitu maluang lujiu David khuga, Hebron ga wangbo tingga, David niu paliutu pitiu mawi khaide.

Abner niu David khuga din-e, “Tuhoira Iniu tadlujiu Israel mai mathiutu pakendibopiu hangga pijiu lungkhai bine. Paliuniu natu paliu wang leng lukhaine, sichiujiu nangniu masenbose paliuniu nakhuga pikhaijiu kadih pakhiangna nangniu mawang rabo-e.” David niu Abner tu wadi manang makra David niu chamsiang kamkhai lujiu pah npuilam langkhai mide.

Pasai Joab nai David gu chakampaodungniu wa sungtadjiu kengkha maigu sungwangde. Sibo tingga Abner hai Hebron ga David tu maluong bammakniu-e, palamra David niu patu manang makra ladriat khat thiukhai lujiu langkhai mibo-e.
Joab niu pamaidungtu puilu wangboga, Abner hai Chawang David khuga wangjiu patu manang makra ladriat khaijiu tadmide chiubo cham pakhuga paokhaide.
Siga Joab niu chawang khuga tadlujiu haichiu din-e, “Nangniu degu kammi jiulo? Abner nakhuga wangbo-e—dekamjiu nangniu patu sichiu phutkhai mijiulo?
Paniu haiga natu sonra wangbo-e, nangniu kambo hina, tadkhaibo hina phuira wangbo-e, sise nangniu simasanjiu bambo-e!”
David tu phutkhai lubo sai, Joab niu Abner khuga ladlangtadmai langkhaijiu, paliuniu patu Sirah gu ajai gasu puiwang-e, chiudi haibo lamga David niu wakhatdi silu makge.

Abner niu Hebron ga wangbo tingga, Joab niu patu mahinjiu npao mali khaira kumjiu rengmun munglam kupad lujiu pawonpuiga chaheng jumkhaijiu kamshat mide. Haichiujiu paniu Joab singna Asahel tu kamshat mibo jengniu Abner tu kamshat mide.
David niu sibo chamse chiuluboga, paniu din-e, “Iniu khatdi amaidungniu Abner tu kamshat mibo lamga wadi simakge chiubo hai

Haibogu sajaise Joab nai pakikhunmai riga wangbo thiumilo. Chaken machang pakikhunmai ga ngena kiubo, maksai nphenbo, maksai npuimai ngam ronna kambo, maksai chari gasu gibo maksai katiu tiutang lulakbo pipadbo thiumilo!”
Sichiujiu Joab nai pasingna Abishai niu pasingna Asahel tu Gibeon ga chari thiuboga kamshat mibo khumse Abner tu gijiu pakhum lumibo-e.
Sigasu David niu Joab khatdi pamaidungtu paliu faini phetjiu maliufai benlujiu, Abner tu kiuhuira chamtan pikhaide. Sichiujiu kashai baiboga, Chawang David papumsiak tating saiga tadle.
Abner tu Hebron ga baikhaide, siga chawangse pakhuan padjiu kap marung-e, khatdi pamaidungdi sichiujiu kap kamna-e.
David niu Abner tu kiuhuibo lui haichiu thiu-e:
“Dekamjiu Abner niu kapangmai kumjiu shaimi gulo?
Paphi pabense ratmi makge, patu hai kamao maitu kamshat mibo kum kamshat mibo-e!”
Sichiujiu maidungse pajengniu kap lande.
Maidungniu David tu pijiu watiu khaira marinpuiting hiamjing-e, chiudi paniu ladtan thiujiu chamriat thiu-e, “Naimik ngut kamakga Iniu wa tiusai, Tingwang niu atu kakhiu shatmi sulo!”
Paliuniu haise silujiu paliu lung kimmide. Pachang siakjiu, chawangniu kambo hinase maidung lungchunse kimme.
Abner tu kamshatboga hai chawang wadi jaomakge chiubo David maidi, Israel maidi mathiu simide.
Chawangniu pagu chakampaodung khuga din-e, “Thainai hai Israel maigu kadibo jupao khat shai mide chiubo naliu simak jiuma?
Atu hai Tingwang niu kadakhaibo chawang thiubam tadi, thainaira I sonkiu mibo-e. Zeruiah nahmaidung hai aleng saju-e. Pamao bam maidung situ
Saul nahpiu Ishbosheth niu Abner tu Hebron ga kamshat mibo khuanse chiuboga pingmide, khatdi Israel mai hina manangkam mide.
Benjamin kiphiu, Beeroth gasu maigu sungtiu kinmai jupao khangnia bamme, Rimmon nah Baanah nai Rechab kubo Ishbosheth gu chakampao khangnia bamme. (Beeroth haitu Benjamin kiphiu leng lukhai mibo-e.
Paliu hai nda paphibang gasu Gittaim lam pakkhai mibo-e, sichiujiu siga lungbam mibo-e).
Rachab nai Baanah niu Ishbosheth kylam tadjiu, siga niending tingga, paniu jimathak bambo tingga mengtangde.
Kamun khuanbo puise tasiu kachang bambo gasu nguiniu mijiu jijing mide, siga Rechab nai Baanah se kalunglam ngutmide.
Panai kalung lam, Ishbosheth ji kichen-ga ngutboga, pahai jijing bamniujiu patu kamshat mide. Sichiujiu panainiu papee danglujiu ponlu, Jordan Ramjeng gase nchun tadsang-e.
Panainiu sibo peese Hebron ga ponwang Chawang David khuga kalen thiujiu pikhaijiu din-e, “Haise natu kamshatra kambo namikre Saul nahpiu Ishbosheth peesi-e. Thainai hai
David niu panaitu paokakjiu din-e, “Kapingbo hinagasu atu gukhaibo, ringbambo

Ziklag gasu mai khatniu, pah kawicham phungwang kinne chiu maningbo, Saul shit lamga, akhuga paowang-e. Siga Iniu patu minlujiu kamshat mibo-e. sise paniu kawicham phungwangbo phijeng leng Iniu patu pikhai mibo-e!

Sichiusai pakhui-pamao habo pakyga jip bambo maitu kamshat mibo, kasamaileng sira dejiukha sa-nkiu ralo! Patu kamshat mibo sung, tuhoi Iniu nanai riga chakhum lura mide khatdi kadihpiri gasu nanaitu kam maha mirabo-e!”

David niu chamtan piboga, pagu riphendungniu Rechab nai Baanah tu kamshat mide, sichiujiu panai-phi panai-ben danlujiu, Hebron gu ajai munggase jumaseng khaide. Paliuniu Ishbosheth peese ponwang Hebron ga, Abner rawga nphumkhai mide.
Sichiujiu Israel mai kiphiu hina, Hebron ga, David khuga wanglujiu din-e, “Aliu hai nazai nai natia-e.
Karaiga, Saul niu aliugu chawang thiubambo gadi, nangniu Israel maitu maluonglujiu chari thiubam niu-e, sichiujiu
Sichiujiu Israel maigu jupao hina Hebron ga, Chawang David khuga wangde. Paniu paliutu masanbo npao thiulujiu, paliuniu patu wasa manuk khaijiu, pah Israel mai wang thiumide.
Paniu chawang thiusubo tingga, David takum samriu ronna kha-e, sichiu paniu takum atai mawang khai-e.
Paniu Judah mai riga, Hebron ga takum chinnia paphan khatdi Jerusalem ga Israel mai nai Judah mai riga takum samriu-je-sumkiu mawang khaide.
(Chiudi David niu paliugu Zion gu charirengse sutlude, sigasu haisitu “David namdi chiujiu simide.”)

Sibo nai David niu pamaidung khuga din-e, “Iniu Jebus maitu kamarengbo kumgapjiu naliu ruanggadi mai bamma? Sichiusai tadui npui suikhang, siga bambo pamik tiatbo nai paphi paben tangmai situ kamshat milo.” (Sijengniu haichiujiu dinbo bamme, “Pamik tiadmai nai paphi paben tangmai siniu
Charireng situ sutlubo sai, David siga lungmide khatdi sibo zanse “David gu Namdi” chiujiu mathak khai-e. Maluong phi gasu tingbang lamsu taniang lakhangjiu namdi situ paniu thiu magui khaide.
Pahai pawan machang tankhang bi-bi sude, palamra Ngamkamkambo
Tyre wangpiu Hiram niu David khuga chali-chala thiura chamai langkhai-e, sichiujiu paniu singchong sing nai tasingsiam kasimai khatdi ruilubo tatu siniu chawangkining thiura paleng pikhai bide.
Sichiujiu pamai Israel maidung jenggasu
Hebron gasu wang Jerusalem ga lunglubo sai, David niu panao khatdi parammailiupui lusanjiu panahpiu panahpui kengjiu lunglande.
Pahangga raokhaibo nahdung hai Jerusalem gasu paleng lungkhaibo-e: Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibhar, Elishua, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elishama, Eliada khatdi Eliphelet paliu-e.
David haitu Israel mai wang pithiu mide chiubo hai Philistine maidung khuga dinkhaiboga, patu minra paliu rimai tadsude. David niu haise chiuluboga paniu charireng khatga tadkiude.
Philistine mai siniu Rephaim Ramjengga wanglujiu lungkham mide.
David niu
Sichiujiu David niu Baal Perazim ga tadlujiu Philistine maitu ngamlude. Paniu din-e, “
Philistine mainiu pakbo tingga paliu ramengdungse saokhai diakge, sise David nai pamainiu khoilude.
Sigasu Philistine mainiu Rephaim Ramjengga malanwang siga lungkham lande.
David niu
Singbang tonlamsu chaphipa khuan chiu dasai, chari thiu ngutlo, palamra Philistine maigu riphendung situ ngamlura Iniu naliu masuang tadngut raikhai bine.”
niu chamtan pikhaibose David niu kamde, sichiujiu Philistine mai situ Geba gasu Gezer tangbo hathon mide.
David niu Israel mai ruanggasu withubo riphenmai sang samriutu kumadui lande,
sichiujiu Judah ga bambo Baalah lam pakan phungbo wakhaomeng riga pawangbam thiujiu bambo Ngamkambo
Sise paliuniu maluong gen-ga bambo Abinadab ky gasu ponlujiu matom kari kasan khatga khaide. Abinadab napiu kania Uzzah nai Ahio niu sibo matom kari situ maluong tadkiu-e,
siga Ahio niu pamasuanglam tadrai kiu-e.
David nai Israel mai mathiuse paliulai padjiu
Nacon gu asaiphungga paliu wangtangboga matomchise paphi masuijiu Ladriat Bung situ thinmanra Uzzah niu paben henpadle.
Siga
Siniu sibo bam situ Perez Uzzah
David niu
Sijengniu Jerusalem lam lutad makra paniu palung chapmide, sibosung, paniu npui kakilam kalilujiu Gath namdiga bambo Obed Edom kyga sise lutad mide.
Siga chahiu sum bamkhai-e, sijengniu

Ladriat Bung jengniu Obed Edom kikhunmai mathiutu khatdi pagu mania hinatu thoikhai bide chiubo Chawang David niu chiulude; sijengniu Ladriat Bung situ Obed ky gasu Jerusalem lam changee kadibo khat kamlujiu paniu ponwang mide.
Ladriat Bungse pamaidungniu phiken charuk pontad lubo sai David niu paliutu khamlujiu paniu
David niu pakhen-ga chafai tappoi ronna khek lujiu
Sichiujiu padi Israel mai mathiudi Ladriat Bung situ Jerusalem lam chunwi ringajiu khatdi make khuan jaojiu ponwangde.
Sichiujiu sibo Bung situ namdilam phung ngutbo tingga, Saul nahpui Michal niu kiran gasu phuipadboga Chawang David niu chalen lenjiu machao kinbo ngaoluboga paniu patu paningmak mide.
David niu thiukhaibo Mathenky bamgase paliuniu Wabung situ ponwang khai mide. Siga paniu charathiujiu wa kadkhaide.
Paniu charathiu loilubo sai, paniu maidungtu Ngamkambo

sichiujiu paniu mathiuleng katiu-kasak jankhai bide Paniu Israel mai maipui, maipiu hinaleng taruak khuang khat-khat, chami karubo kang khat-khat, sigasu charasy-ki tam- tamna njankam khai bide. Sichiujiu mai hina paky-kylam wang mide.

Pasai, David niu pakikhunmaitu kanui khaira wangbo tingga, Michal niu patu adaora padle. Sichiujiu paniu din-e, “Thainai Israel mai wangpiuniu pazan kadibo kamkhai mide! Pagu chakampaodunggu kavangpuidung masuangga pah paronna kamengbo thak kamkhai mide!”
David niu paokakge, “Napiu sung khatdi pakikhunmai sung atu pamai Israel maigu jupaoleng kadakhai bibo
khatdi haisuong sajiu atu aronna Iniu kam mangam rabo-e. Nangniu atu wadi makjiu maning bamdi talakge, chiudi sibo puidung sira atu sisuang maning madi rabo-e!”
Sichiujiu Saul nahpui Michal niu wadaodi panah lung makge.
Chawang David tu
Siga chawangniu phaimiukakung Nathan khuga din-e, “Singbom singniu thiubo aky haiga Ira lung bamme, chiudi Tingwang gu Ladriat Bung sira mathenkyga bamme!”
Nathan niu paokakge, “Nangniu maningbo saisuijiu kamlo, palamra
Chiudi sibo nai nchun
“Tadlujiu avangpiu David khuga Iniu haichiu din-e chiulo, “Iniu lungrabo raky thiura hai nang makge.
Iniu Israel maitu Egypt dih gasu ranpad khaibo gasu tuhoi tangbo charaky lungga lung makge, chiudi mathenky lungga lungjiu nbinwang mibo-e.
Iniu Israel maitu maluong chabin tadkinbo lungga jupaodung
“Sijengniu, Ngamkambo
Nangniu tadkhaibo bam hinaga Iniu natu maluong khaibide. Sichiujiu nangniu tadngutboga Iniu nagu mikremai hinatu ngam khaibide. Iniu natu kadihpiriga dithubo jupaose pithiu khai bine,

Amai Israel maidungniu lungra Iniu pabam kadakhai bijiu siga paliu lung bamme, siga paliutu wadaodi kam chariu khai lanlak mide. Paliuniu haibo kadihga ngutkhaibo gasu paliutu palung kasamaidung siniu atungsao makha-e, chiudi haise padlanlak mide. Iniu nagu mikremai hina khugasu jukhaira khatdi nakai nakikdung pikhaira ladriat thiukhaibo-e.
Nangniu shai dasai, khatdi napao-napehtu maluong nphumkhai miboga, Iniu nanahmai ruanggasu khang khattu chawang pithiu khaine. Khatdi pawangkining dihse Iniu pitankhai bine.
Paniu aleng charakyse thiukhai rabo-e, khatdi Iniu pakiphiutu tingthengjiu bamra kamkhai bine.
Iniu papiu thiune, khatdi paniu anah thiune. Paniu kamaoboga papiu khatniu panah khattu sajai pibo kumjiu, Iniu patu sajai pirabo-e.
Chiudi Saul tu Iniu lupad lujiu natu chawang pikhaibo kumjiu, pakhu gasu Iniu nthadlan lakge.
Nangniu tingthengjiu nakai-nakik bamrabo-e, khatdi Iniu nawangdih haitu tingtheng pikhai bine. Nakiphiu hai wadaodi halanlak mide.”
Tingwang niu pakhuga madukhaibo hina Nathan niu David khuga dinkhai bide.
Sichiujiu Chawang David niu
Chiudi Tanthubo
Iniu nakhuga degu dinsuan ralo! Navang atu nangniu sibamme.
Haise kamkhaira nachun naning-e; nangniu kadibo pakhiangna kamkhaibo haise atu katikhai raleng-e.
Tanthubo

Kavang thiubambo gasu rankhai lujiu namaisiak pithiu khaibo Israel mai kumbo kadihpiriga katambo jat wadi ha-e. Kadibo khatdi maisuang habo nangniu paliuleng kamkhaibo jengniu kadihpiri pakhiangnaga nakendise phuimide. Nangniu Egypt dih gasu khenrang pithiu khailujiu namaisiak pithiu khaibo maidungniu tadngutbo saisuijiu katambo jatdung khatdi paliu radungtu hathon khaibide.
Nangniu Israel maidungtu tingtheng leng namaisiak pithiu khaibi-e, khatdi
“Tuhoira
Nakense dirabo-e khatdi maidungniu tingthengjiu haichiu dinrabo-e, ‘Ngamkambo
Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo
“Tuhoira Tanthubo
Akai-akikdungtu thoikhaira Iniu nakhuga khengbo-e, sichiujiu paliuniu nagu nkhase tingthengjiu daobam raleng-e. Tanthubo
Pakak khat saiga Chawang David niu Philistine maitu chari thiu lanjiu, paliutu ngamlude, khatdi paliu kadihse thinman kamlude.
Sibo sai paniu Moab maitu ngamlude. Paniu minlumai situ kadihga pi jikhai lujiu khangsum gasu khangniatu kamshat mide. Sichiujiu Moab maidungse pahangga lungjiu patu ramkha pi-e.
Sibo sai paniu Zobah dihga lungbo Syria mai wangpiu Rehob nahpiu Hadadezer tu Euphrate giuky munggasu ngamlan lude; pase pagu kadihtu thinmanra kambam niubo gasu-e.
David niu pagu chaqon tuangmai sang kariu-je-chinniakiu khatdi riphendung sang makaitu minlude. Paniu chaqon-kari kai khat leng chaqon masiak khailujiu kaki lamra pa-ngen kamtang kam mibo-e.
Damascus ga lungmai Syria mainiu Chawang Hadadezer tu nkhara langwangboga David niu aphenjiu chamai sang makai-je-niakiutu kamshat mide.
Sichiujiu paniu paliu kadihga riphenmai rijiky thiukhaijiu paliuse pahangga lungjiu ramkha pi-e. Pabam hinaga
Hadadezer gu chakampaodungniu phungkinbo kachiagu chageedungse David niu sutlujiu Jerusalem ga phungwang mide.
Hadadezer niu mawangbo Betah nai Berothai gasu paniu tataagidi kengjiu daolude.
David niu Hadadezer gu riphendung pakhiangnatu ngamlude chiubo Hamath gu chawang Toi niu chiu lude.

Hadadezer niu Toi tu wajiukha charithiu khangmibo situ paniu ngamlubo jengniu pachun wijiu panah Joram tu Chawang David khuga langkhaijiu kamdaode chiubo lad kanui khai-e. Kachia, rangkang khatdi tataagi kumbo kalendung Joram niu David leng phungwang-e.
Chawang David niu ngamlubo jatdung khugasu phungwangbo kachia nai rangkang hina sidi kahumboga thinra kadkhaide.
Paniu ngamlubo maidung sira Edom, Moab, Amnon, Philistine khatdi Amalek sigasu Hadadezer khugasu paniu sutlubo hinasi-e.
Edom ramlung pakhiangnaga paniu riphen maigu rijiky leng thiukhaijiu maidungse pahangga lung mide.
David niu Israel mai mathiutu mawang lujiu, pamai mathiutu majijiu khatdi wijiu kamkhai bamme chiubo paniu si-e.
Zeruiah nahpiu Joab niu riphenpao thiu-e, khatdi Ahilud nahpiu Jeboshaphat niu tachak khuangdungse phui-e.
Ahitub nahpiu Zadok nai Abiathar nahpiu Ahimelech niu singku thiu-e; Seraiah niu ladjanky gu raosuipiu thiu-e;
Jehoiada nahpiu Benaiah niu David tu akhemaigu papao thiu-e; khatdi David nahpiudung siniu singku thiu-e.
Saul kikhun gasu kavang khangkhat, pazanniu Ziba kubo khat bamme, patuse David khulam tadra dinkhaide. Chawang niu maniu-e, “Nang hai Ziba sima?”
“Yo,Paohubo degu pi kamkhai nilo,” chiujiu paniu paokakge.
Chawangniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Tingwang zan-ga Iniu ladriat thiukhai mibo saisuijiu patu lungsajiu akhi khaira, Saul kikhunmai kamasiak mai bam khama?”
Ziba niu paokakge, Jonathan nahpiu khangkhat bamkha-e, para paphi tangmide.”
Chawang niu maniu-e “Pah dega bamlo?”
Ziba niu paokakge, “Lodebar ga bambo Ammiel nahpiu Machir kyga bamme.
Sijengniu Chawang David niu patu kura langkhaide.
Saul tah khatdi Jonathan nahpiu Mephibosheth niu wangtangboga David tu chakhuang thiujiu pamaga makhum kiu-e. David niu din-e “Mephibosheth yo,” siga paniu paokakge, “Paohubo degu dinkhai nilo?”
David niu paokakge, “Pingtulo, napiu Jonathan jengniu, Iniu natu lungsa khai bine. Napao Saul gu kadih hina Iniu natu kalankhai bine, sichiujiu nangra pawan machang akuang-kaiga tiurabo-e.”
Mephibosheth niu makhumkiu lanlujiu din-e, “Paohubo yo, Ira tathi kashaibo khat sungdi tang makge! Dekamjiu nangniu atu haijiukha lungsa khai ralo?”
Chawang niu Saul vangpiu, Ziba tu kulujiu din-e, “Iniu nawangpiu Saul tah, Mephibosheth tu khatdi pakikhunmai gu kabam hina pikhai mide.

Nang khatdi nanahmai khatdi navangmai hinaniu nawangpiu Saul kikhunleng pakigu kadih tenjiu paliuleng katiu phungwang rabo-e. Chiudi papum siakra akuang-kaiga pawan machang agu kiriupiu thiujiu bamrabo-e.” (Ziba nahpiu khang kariu-je-mangiukiu khatdi pavang makai bambo-e).
Ziba niu paokakge, “Pakendibo piuniu chamtan pibo hina Iniu kamne.”
Sichiujiu Mephibosheth niu chawang gu kuong-kaiga chawang nahdung khangkhat kumjiu tiu bamme.
Mephibosheth nahpiu akhang chabonmai pazan niu Mica kubo bamme. Ziba kikhunmai mathiuse Mephibosheth vang thiumide.
Sichiujiu paphi nialam tangbo Mephibosheth se Jerusalem ga chawang kuong-kaiga tiujiu lungde.
Pakak khat saiga Amnon mai Wangpiu Nahash shai mide, sichiujiu panahpiu Hanun niu chawang thiulande.
Chawang David niu din-e, “Papiu Nahash niu akhuga kamkhaibo kumjiu Iniu Hanun khuga chaka wibose lenkhaine.” Sijengniu pagu lungsiat champao hai David niu langkhaide.
Paliuniu Amnon ga mengtangboga,

Amnon maigu jupaodungniu chawang khuga din-e, “David niu nahpiutu chakhuang thiubogu lungsiat cham paokhaira langkhaibo-e chiujiu nang maning jiuma? Sichiu makge! Namdi haitu kawi kasa phuira paniu chakhumpao langkhaibo-e, sichiujiu paniu aliutu ngamlu raleng-e!”
Hanun niu David gu chakampaodungtu minlujiu, paliu mun-giu jai khatlam gotmide, khatdi paliu nkhuang niaga paliu faise kakipthon lujiu phutkhai mide.
Chakylam malan wangra paliu mangamchang mangam mide. David niu degu padmilo chiubo lamga chiuluboga, paliu mun-giu puaklan makthen Jericho ga manaibam mira chalad din kanui khaide.

David tu paliu mikreleng kamkhai mide chiubo Amnon mainiu silujiu, paliuniu Bethrehob nai Zobah gasu Syria maigu riphen sang makaitu, Tob gasu chamai sang kariu-je-niakiu khatdi Maacah mai wangpiuniu chamai sang khat puilujiu wangra kukhai sude.
Haise David niu chiulujiu Joab tu riphen pakhiangnatu puilujiu aphenra langkhaide.
Amnon mainiu tadlujiu paliugu namdi Rabbah ga ngut rabo npui-npai gase paliu dangkham mide, khangsiamai, chiubora Tob mai nai Maacah mai khatdi Syria mai siniu kadih kamaruang lamse bam mide.
Mikremai siniu suanglam, sailam ha-ngutne chiubo Joab niu simide, siniu Israel maigu withubo riphendung situ paniu kadalujiu paliuniu Syria maitu muntuangbo gase bam mide.
Kamasiakbo kakimai situ paniu pasingna Abishai hangga khailujiu Amnon maitu muntuangbo gase khai mide.
Joab niu pakhuga din-e, “Syria mainiu atu ngamwang mide chiubo nang ngaosai wangjiu atu nkha khailo. Sichiujiu Amnon mainiu natu ngamwang mide chiusai, Iniu wangjiu natu nkha rabo-e.
Hululo khatdi tanlulo! Aliuniu aliu Rawang gu namdi jengniu khatdi aliumai jengniu aliulai padjiu aphen sukhe. Sichiujiu
Joab khatdi pamaidungniu chari thiujiu hangut sude, siga Syria mai paksude.
Syria mai pakmibo ngaoboga, Amnon maidi Abishai khugasu pakjiu namdilam pakkhai mide. Sigasu Joab niu Amnon maitu aphenbo gasu mariwang Jerusalem lam wangmide.
Israel mainiu paliutu ngam mide chiubo Syria mainiu siluboga paliugu charimai pakhiangnatu kumadui sude.
Euphrate Giukigu tingbanglam bambo Syria maitu Chawang Hadadezer niu kukhaide. Siga Zobah gu Chawang Hadadezer gu chari pi Helam khuga paliuniu Shobakh hanggasu wangde.
Haise David niu chiuluboga, paniu Israel mai riphendungtu khom madui lujiu, Jordan Giuki kenjiu, Syria mainiu paliu bam lulujiu patu aphen bambo Helam gase tadsude.

Charithiu sude, siga Israel mainiu Syria maigu riphendungtu hamalan mide. David nai pamaidungniu Syria maigu chaqon-kari tuangmai kai chinniatu khatdi chaqon tuangmai sang ataitu kamshat mide khatdi paliuniu mikremaigu charipi, Shobakh tu kam ajam khaijiu, pah charibam gasu shai mide.
Hadadezer hangga bambo chawangdungse paliutu Israel mainiu ngamlude chiubo siluboga, paliuniu paliu khuga kawi thiulujiu paliu hangga lungmide. Sigasu Syria mainiu Amnon maitu nkhara nping mide.
Naikhat paniu jiplujiu rakpadbo tingga pawangky riga khangde. Siga paniu tad magui bamga maipui khat pakyga tadui nkhiu bambo ngaolude. Pahai pazu palun wichang wi-e.
Pase saolo chiubo chakhumpao langkhaiboga, pahai Eliam nahpui khatdi Hittit maipiu Uriah nao, Bathsheba si-e chiubo silude.

David niu sibo puitu puiwangra chakhumpaomai langkhaijiu, paliuniu patu puiwangde siga paniu nphiuji khai mide. (Pahai sibo wan-ga khaophun rathakse kamloigap bamkha-e). Sichiujiu pase pakylam wang mide.
Pasai pahai papum rip mide chiubo silujiu David khuga paokhaira chakhumpao langkhaide.
David niu Joab khuga chalad din kalen khai-e. “Hittit maipiu Uriah tu akhuga langwanglo.” Siga Joab niu patu David khuga langwangde.
Uriah niu wangboga Joab nai riphendungse wibamma khatdi dechiujiu charithiu bamlo chiubo pakhuga maniu sude.
Sibosai paniu Uriah khuga din-e, “Chakylam tadlujiu pakak khatleng mathak lulo.” Uriah tadmide siga David niu pakikhunmai leng kalen pi khai-e.
Chiudi Uriah niu pakylam wangmakjiu rengmun ga chawangkining chawangtu akhemai khuga jibam mide.
Uriah pakylam wangmakge chiubo David niu chiuluboga, paniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Chakyga wangta matheng mibosai wanglujiu, dekamjiu nangniu nakyga wangmak jiulo?”

Uriah niu paokakge, “Israel mai nai Judah mainiu charithiubo bamga bamme, siga Ladriat Bungse paliu khuga bamme; agu jupao Joab nai pagu chakampaodungniu manam hangga rijiky thiulu bambo-e. Sichiusai, dechiujiu Iniu chakyga wanglujiu tiulu, saklu khatdi anaotu maluong jisu ralo? Haichiujiu masanboga Iniu sikumbo ngamse wadaodi kamlakge chiujiu siangmibo-e!”
Siga David niu din-e, “Sichiusai thainaira haiga bamlo, nsuannai natu langkhai bine.” Sichiujiu Uriah niu sibo nai khatdi pasaibo naise Jerusalem ga manai khai mide.
David niu patu tektiu kujiu siga pah jaw sak maniu mide. Chiudi sibo nai nchundi Uriah niu pakylam tadmakge; sibosung paniu pafai benlujiu chawangkininggu akhemai kichen-ga jilan mide.
Pasaibo nai David niu Joab khuga chamlen khat raolujiu Uriah tu langkhaide.
Paniu haichiujiu raokhai-e; “Chari tanthubo bamgase raibo baoga Uriah tu khailujiu, sailam nkhin milo, sichiu patu pi kamshat milo.”
Sichiujiu Joab niu namdi khattu sutra kambambo bamkhat, mikremainiu tanbambo bamkhatga, paniu kasibo bamga Uriah tu langkhai mide.
Namdi gasu mikremaigu riphendung padjiu Joab rimaitu aphen sude, siga David gu chakampaodung khangsiatu khatdi Uriah tu kamshat mide.
Sibo sai Joab niu charithiubo lamga David khuga din kalen khai-e.
Sichiujiu paniu ladlangtadbo piu khugase katikhai-e, “Charithiubo lamga nangniu chawang khuga paokhai kamlubo sai,
palung pomjiu paniu nakhuga maniubo sui-e, “Dekamjiu naliuniu namdi mungga siak wanglu aphenjiulo? Paliuniu singbeng gasu tavaipi ketpad rabo-e chiubo naliu simak jiuma?

Gideon nahpiu Abimelech tu dechiujiu kamshat mijiulo chiubo naliu maningtao mak jiuma? Thebes gasu maipui khatniu tasiu niakbo tukang taliangkiu patu kamshat mibo-e. Sichiusai, dekamjiu naliuniu singbeng mungga sibona-najiu wangjiulo?’ Haichiujiu chawangniu nakhuga maniusai nangniu pakhuga dinlo, “Nagu chakampao Uriah tudi kamshat mide.’”
Sichiujiu ladlangtadbo piu siniu tadlujiu, Joab niu pakhuga chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu David khuga paokhaide.
Paniu din-e, “Aliugu mikremai siniu aliusuang tanbijiu namdi gasu padlujiu aliutu manamjiuga aphen sude, chiudi aliuniu paliutu namdigu rengmun tangbo hangut sude.
Siga paliuniu singbeng gasu tavaipi aliutu ketpadjiu chawanggu chakampaodung khangsiatu gimide; nagu chakampao Uriah tudi gimide.”

David niu chakhumpao khugase din-e, “Joab tu kachu khai bilo, khatdi pachun samakra pakhuga dinbilo, palamra chari thiubo gase sao shairalo chiubo naliuniu wadaodi dinsilu lakge. Sisuang tanjiu hangutra kamjiu namdi situ sutlura kamlo.”
Bathsheba niu pakinatu kamshat mide chiubo chiuluboga patu hui sude.
Patu huibo tiense loimiboga David niu patu chawangkiningga puiwang chawang nao thiujiu panah piumai khat lungde. Chiudi David niu kamkhai mibo jengniu
Kalek wibo piuse khaorui khaona khatdi mily kengkha bamme.

Kalek sabo piu sira paniu liuwangbo milypoi khatnakha ronna bamme. Paniu sisetu akhijiu, sise panah maidung panai lungkhang-e. Sisetu paniu pakuangtek pijiu khatdi papiang gasu pisakjiu, pahingpomga ponjiu bambo-e. Sibo milypoise panahpui kumgapjiu paniu marui bambo-e.

Naikhatra kalek wibopiu kygase sangmai khat nbin wang-e. Kalek wibopiu siniu pagu khaorui ruanggasu khat kamshat lujiu paleng katiu pikhaira maja mide; sibosung paniu kaleksabo piugu milypoise ponlujiu pagiangpiu leng langkhai mide.”
Kalekwibo piu situ palung pomjiu David niu din-e, “Ringbambo
Haikumbo pathak kasabo ngam paniu kammibo donniu paniu lumibo dam madai paniu majon rabo-e.”
“Sibo piuse nang-e,” chiujiu Nathan niu David khuga din-e, “Israel mai Rawang,
Iniu naleng pawangdih khatdi panaodungtu pikhaibo-e; Iniu natu Israel mai nai Judah mai wang pithiu khaibo-e. Haise naleng buimaksai, haisuong nkiubo damnia Iniu naleng pikhai bine.

Sichiusai dekamjiu, agu chamtan majaimak jiulo? Dekamjiu kasabo ngam hai nangniu kammi jiulo? Nangniu Uriah tu chari gasu kamshat mibo-e, Patuse Amnon mainiu kamshat mibo-e. Sichiulujiu nangniu panaotu lulubo-e.
Tuhoira chaken machang, nakai-nakikmai kapingbo shitga shairabo-e, palamra nangniu alad piumakjiu Uriah naotu lulubo-e.

Nakikhun siak gasu, nakhuga kabuakbo phungwangra Iniu kamkhaine chiubo hai Iniu siangjiu dinbo-e. Iniu nanaodungtu nakhu gasu sutlujiu katambo mai khuga pikhaibo nang ngaosune; sichiujiu paniu paliutu n-nien lan-ga nphiujiu rabo-e
Nangniu mahinjiu nuan tenne, chiudi Israel mai mathiuniu haise ngaora Iniu n-nien lan-ga pipad khai rabo-e.”
David niu din-e. “
Chiudi nangniu haise kammibo jengniu
Sichiujiu Nathan pakylam wangmide.
Uriah nao Bathsheba niu David leng lungwangbo ngena situ
Ngena situ pi wikhaira David niu Tingwang khuga khengsude. Paniu kalum rijiu, nchun machang pagu kichen-ga tadlujiu kadihga jijiu bamme.
Pagu chakampaodungniu pakhuga tadlujiu patu buangsu mira hiamme, chiudi suimakjiu paliutu wakhatdi maluong tiukhai makge.

N-nidkak khat saiga ngenase shaimide, siga David gu chakampaodungniu sibo chamse pakhuga paoping mide. Paliuniu din-e, “Ngenase ringbam khagadi aliuniu patu npaobo tingga David niu aliutu npaokak makge. Sichiusai, dechiujiu ngenase shaimide chiubo aliuniu pakhuga dinsu ralo? Paronna patu kam masa mibo sui-e!”
Paliuniu khat-khat khuga ladtum bambose David niu ngaoboga, ngenase shaimide chiubo paniu silude. Sijengniu paniu paliu khuga maniu-e “Ngenase shaimi jiuma?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Yo, pah shaimide.”
David niu kadih gasu buangsu lujiu nkhiu sude, papee tham tamai sude khatdi pafai-pani kali sude. Sibo sai paniu
Pagu chakampaodungniu pakhuga din-e, “Haise aliuniu sitanglu makge. Ngenase ringbam khaga nang wadi tiu makge, chiudi pah shaimi gapboga nang sulujiu katiu tiu mide!”
David niu paokakge, “Yo, paniu ringbam khagara Iniu kalum rijiu kapbo-e.

Chiudi tuhoira pah shaimide, dekamjiu Iniu katiu makimjiu bamralo? Iniu ngena situ kam maring ngam jiuma? Paniu tadmibo bamgase Idi naikhatra tadrabo-e, chiudi para wadaodi akhuga malan wanglak mide.”
Sibosai David niu panao Bathsheba tu hiamkhaide. Paniu patu nphiu jijiu paniu npiumainah khat lungkhaide. David niu patu Solomon chiujiu pazan mathak khai-e.
Sichiujiu ngena zanse Jedidiah
Sibo wan gase Amnon maigu namdi dihsing Rabbah tu sutraleng Joab se matanjiu bamme.
Paniu David khuga chakhumpao langkhaijiu haichiu din-e, “Iniu Rabbah tu aphenjiu paliugu taduiduang sutlude.
Tuhoi narimaidungtu khom maduilujiu napum siakniu namdi situ aphen sulo. Sutlubo chiubo zanra I luni makge.”
Sijengniu pagu riphendungtu David niu khom maduilujiu, Rabbah lam tadlujiu aphen sude khatdi ngam lude.
Amnon maigu rameng Molech

Khatdi siga bammai situ tasing gebo tien, chagi aketbo tien khatdi chagamtu machabo tien pithiu khai-e. Amnon maigu kakibo namdak ga lungmai tudi paniu sikumbo tien piten khai-e. Sichiujiu padi, pamaidungdi Jerusalem lam malan wanglan mide.
David nahpiu Absalom tanpui mimakbo pazu palun kawibo pazanniu Tamar kubo pui khat bamme. David nahpiu katambo, Amnon niu patu marai sude.
Paniu patu maraiju kami jengniu pah mara mide, palamra paniu patu liuchangpui khat thiujiu daolura kungchang kungbo ngaopadle, palamra patuse npiumaitu zudao makra kham mibo-e.
Chiudi palung kasabo pakapiu pazanniu Jonadab kubo, David singna nahpiu khat bamme.
Jonadab niu Amnon khuga din-e, “Nangra chawang nahpiu-e, chiudi naimachangna nachun achungbo ronna I ngao-e. Degu bamjiulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Iniu asingna Absalom tanpui Tamar tu lungsabo gasu-e.”

Jonadab niu pakhuga din-e, “Kamara saothiujiu nang taziga jibam milo. Sichiujiu napiuniu natu phuira wangboga pakhuga haichiu dinlo, ‘Lungsajiu atanpui Tamar tu piwang lujiu atu katiu pikhai janlo. Pah paronna wanglujiu atu akhi khaibo khatdi katiu pikhaibotu I masenne’”
Sichiujiu Amnon kamara saothiujiu paziga jibam mide.
Chawang David niu patu phuira wang-e, siga Amnon niu pakhuga din-e, “Lungsajiu Tamar tu pi wanglujiu amasuangga taruak khuaklujiu aleng katiuse macha khailo.”
Siga David niu chawangkiningga bambo Tamar khuga chalad din kalen khai bide, “Amnon kyga tadlujiu paleng katiu akhikhai bilo.”
Paniu siga tadde, siga pah taziga bamniude. Paniu takhui tamnakha khoilujiu paniu patu kangaobo bamganiu taruakse khuak sude.
Paniu taruakse khuakloi lujiu pitiu khaira kamsude, chiudi paniu suimakge. Paniu din-e, “Mai hinatu hathon milo.” Siga paliu mathiu tadmide.
Siga paniu pakhuga din-e, “Taruakse aziga ponwanglo, sichiujiu nangniu amun-ga nphang khailo.” Siga paniu taruakse ponlujiu pakhuga wangde.
Paniu katiuse phebamga, paniu patu minman lujiu dinsude, “Akhuga wangjiu atu maluang jilo!”
Paniu din-e, “Sichiu makge, sikumbo kasabo ngamse kamra atu manomjiu kamtulo! Sikumbo gura kapingbo gu-e!
Dechiujiu Iniu mathiu ruangga ama ngangkhang lanngam ralo? Haise Israel mai ruangga mangamchang mangam rabo-e. Lungsajiu chawang khuga dinlo, sichiusai paniu atu naleng pikhaibo sui-e.”
Chiudi paniu dinbose Amnon niu lukhai makge, sichiujiu pasuang pah tan nkiubo jengniu paniu patu minlujiu kam masa mide.
Sichiu lubo sai Amnon khuga patu marengbo siniu phuiting mide, tuhoira paniu kalu patu maraibo suang nkiujiu mareng mide. Paniu pakhuga dinsude, “Haigasu tadmilo!”
Paniu paokakge, “Makge. Nangniu atu hathonbo siniu nangniu kamkhai mibo suang sa-nkiubo gu-e!”
Chiudi Amnon niu palad lukhai makge;
paniu patu akhi bambo pavangtu kulujiu din-e, “Haibo pui haitu akhugasu hathon milo! Patu jutaliang padlujiu akhamse tenman milo!”
Kavang siniu patu jupad lujiu akham tenman mide.
Tamar siniu sibo ken-ga chawang nahpuidungniu piubo ntiang taronbose
Paniu papeega tabui katup khailujiu, pah ntiang taronbose phetlujiu pazu kabalujiu kapjiu tadmide.

Papiubo Absalom niu patu ngaolujiu pakhuga maniu-e, “Amnon niu natu majom malajiu kamkhaibo ma? Atanpui yo, sikumbo siniu nalungchun kam chariujiu bam tulo. Padi nasingnapiu khatle, sijengniu mai khugadi dintulo.” Sichiujiu Absalom kyga Tamar hai pachun sajiu, achungjiu paronna lungsude.
Chawang David niu degu padmilo chiubo chiuluboga palung pomchang pommide.
Absalom niu patanpui Tamar tu Amnon niu min masa mibo jengniu patu marengchang mareng mide, siniu patudi npaota mide.
Takum nia sailam Absalom niu Ephraim namdi mungga bambo Baal Hazor ga mily-giu kakip sude, siga paniu chawangnah hinatu kukhaide.
Paniu Chawang David khuga tadlujiu din-e, “Paken dibopiu yo, agu mily-giu I kakip bamme. Siga nang khatdi nagu chakampaodung wangjiu changeebo gase jaokhai lubuima?”
Chawang niu paokakge, “Makge, anah yo, Aliu mathiu tadsai naleng chariuju mirabo-e.” Absalom niu kheng matande, chiudi chawangniu suimakjiu Absalom tu tadmira dinkhaide.
Chiudi Absalom niu din-e, “Wide, sichiusai asingna Amnon tura lungsajiu pi wangkhaibo suima?”
Chawang niu paokakge, “Deleng pah wangralo?”
Chiudi Absalom niu panahmai mathiutu pakyga wangkhaira suikhai makthen chawang khuga dinsude. Siga chawangniu suikhaide.
Chawang leng kabuibo maluadse Absalom niu kaden khaide.
Siga paniu pavangmai khuga ladti khai-e. “Amnon niu jaw maniu mawi mibo tingga Iniu chamtan pine, siga patu kamshat milo. Pingtulo. Parid hinase Iniu phungrabo-e. Hululo-kasut mitulo!”
Sichiujiu Absalom niu dinbo kumjiu pavangdung siniu Amnon tu kamshat mide. Siga katambo David nahpiudungse paliugu qonniamdung tuanglujiu pakkam mide.
Paliuse paliu kylam paktad kin khaga, David khuga paowang sude, “Absalom niu nanahpiudung hinatu kamshat mide-mai khat tudi masiak makge!”
Chawangniu chapkhang lujiu pafai pani phetjiu palung chariuboniu kadihga kaokiu mide. Patu maluong bambo pavangmai hinadi paliu faini phet sude.

Chiudi David singna, Shammah nahpiu Jonadab niu din-e, “Pakendibopiu yo, “Paliuniu nanahmai mathiutu kamshatbo makge. Amnon tu ronnakha kamshat mibo-e. Haise nda Amnon niu patanpui Tamar tu min masa mibo nai gasu Absalom zuwan gasu paniu rangmibose nang simibo-e.
Sijengniu nanahmai mathiutu kamshat mide chiubo champaotu malummi tulo; Amnon tu ronna kamshatbo-e.”
Sichiu bamga Absalom hai pakmide, sibo sai akhe bambo riphenmai siniu Horonaim
Jonadab niu David khuga din-e, “Iniu nakhuga dinmibo kumjiu—paliu hai nanahpiudung si-e.”
Paniu sise dinloi kaji-kari David nahmaidungse wangsude; paliu wanglujiu kap karen sude, siga David di pagu chakampaodungdi kap karen sude.
