chiudi Amnon jengniu pah achungloi mibo sai panahpiu Absalom tu adao khaira palung khenglulak sumide.
Chawang David niu Absalom tu wajiukha adao khainibose Joab niu simide,

sijengniu Tekoa ga lungbambo kaningtingbo maipui khattu paniu langkhaide. Paniu sibopui khuga din-e, “Nachun sajiu achung bambo thak nangniu kamlujiu achungbo ponse piululo khatdi napee thamdi tamai tulo, pating thengjiu nalung chariu khangmibo jaiga nang kamlulo.
Sichiujiu Iniu nakhuga dinkhaibo hai pakhuga dinlo.” Sichiujiu degu dinralo chiubose Joab niu pakhuga dinkhaide.
Sibopui siniu chawang khuga tadlujiu chakhuang thiujiu pasuangga makhum kiujiu din-e, “Pakendibo piu yo, atu nkha khailo!”
Paniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nangniu degu lunijiulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Paohubo yo, I hai kalek sabo kamipui-e. Akina shaimide.
Paohubo yo, anah npiumai khangnia bamme, sichiujiu naikhatra panai khangnia chalulam tadlujiu n-gisude, siga panaitu maidi matara hajiu khangkhat situ kamshat mide.

Sichiujiu tuhoira, chaibo yo, asingna mai hinaniu atu mikre mide sichiujiu anah khangkhat situ paliu khuga pilo, palamra paniu pasingna piutu kamshat mibo jengniu patudi kamshat mine chiujiu bamme. Paliuniu sichiu misai, I hai anah khatdi hajiu aronna lungra mide. Paliuniu amaning hina kam mahajiu akina zandi kam mahami rabo-e.”
Chawang niu paokakge, “Nakylam wangsulo, sibo lamga Iniu phuikhai bine.”
Paniu din-e, “Pakendibo piu yo, padbambo hinase, Iniu khatdi akikhun mainiu kamaobose phungrabo-e, nang khatdi chawang kikhun maigu kamaobo wakhatdi ha-e.”
Chawang niu pakhuga paokakge, “Mai khatniu natu kam kapin sai, patu akhuga puiwanglo, sichiusai paniu wadaodi kam mathad lanlak mide.”
Paniu din-e, “Pakendibopiu yo, na Rawang,
David niu paokakge, “Ringjiu bambo
Maipui siniu din-e, “Pakendibopiu yo, lungsajiu I chalad khat dinkhai lanni-e.”
Paniu pakhuga paokakge, “Wi ye, dinlo.”

Paniu pakhuga din-e, “Dekamjiu nangniu Tingwang mai khuga kamaobo hai kamjiulo? Nanah siaktu dekamjiu nangniu kavang thiumibo gasu pijiu malanwang makjiu nangniu dinkhai mibose naronna kammao bamjiulo?

Aliu mathiu shaikam mirabo-e, aliura kadihga pinkhai mibo wadaodi khom maduilan silak mibo tadui kumbo-e. Tingwang niudi kashai maitu pi ringwang lanmakge, chiudi kavang thiumibo sira chawangniu puiwang lanra kamlubui-e.

Tuhoira, Pakendibopiu yo, Iniu nakhuga haise dinbo rambara, maidungniu atu kapin bamme, sijengniu nakhuga wakhat khengsai, nangniu kamkhaibi sune chiu maning lujiu Iniu nakhuga khengra maning padbo-e.
Tingwang niu pamaileng pikhaibo kadih gasu atu khatdi anahtu kamshat mine chiujiu kapin bammai khugasu nangniu atu gukhai sune chiubo maning lujiu Iniu nakhuga dinbo-e.
Nangniu ladriat khaibo kumjiu atu gukhai sune, chiubo I malumme, chaibo yo, palamra chawang sira Tingwang gu maza kumjiu kasabo gasu kawibo situ sitam lubui-e. Na Rawang,
Chawang niu paokakge, “Iniu nakhuga chalad khat maniune, siga nangniu pachang siakjiu kamajibo hinase dinrabo-e.”
Paniu paokakge, “Pakendibopiu yo, maniu kani hina maniulo.”
Paniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Joab niu haise nakhuga dinkhai jiuma?”
Paniu paokakge, “Haise agu kakungbo asiang-e, Pakendibopiu yo, nangniu maniubo gase paokak sonra ha-e.
Chiudi paniu haise kambora pakhiangna hai kam majilu raleng-e. Padmibo hinase Pakendibopiu sira Tingwang gu maza kumgapjiu sibam kamme.”
Pakak khat saiga chawangniu Joab khuga din-e, “Nangniu machunbose kamkhaira Iniu alung chaplude. Tadlujiu chabonmai Absalom situ haiga puiwanglo.”

David tu chakhuang thiujiu Joab niu kadihga makhum kiujiu din-e, “Tingwang niu natu thoikhai bilo, Pakendibopiu yo! Tuhoira akhuga nalung kimme chiubo I silude, palamra Iniu khengbose nangniu kamkhai bide.”
Sichiujiu paniu buangsu mide khatdi Geshur lam tadlujiu Absalom tu Jerusalem ga puiwang lande.
Chiudi chawangniu Absalom tu chawangkiningga lungmakra chamtan pikhaide. Chawangniu din-e, “Iniu patu phuini makge.” Siniu chawang masuangga Absalom wangmakjiu pakyga lungbamme.
Israel mai ruangga pazu palun kawiboga Absalom kumbo mai khatdi ha-e; papee gasu paphi njung katangboga wakhatdi kasabo thiumakge.
Pathamdi wi-e, sichiujiu sise thengkhang miboga takum khat lungga paniu kakid lonnia-e. Chawanggu tadbambo tajuga sise madiuboga taju 2 suang kengjiu padle.
Absalom nah npiumai khangsum bamme khatdi pazu palun wichang wibo npuimainah pazanniu Tamar kubo khat bamme.
Absalom niu chawang tu zudao makjiu Jerusalem ga takum nia lungkhang mide.
Siga paniu chawang khuga khengra Joab tu langkhaide, chiudi Joab niu pakhuga mengmakge. Absalom niu patu kukhai lonnia-e chiudi Joab niu suimak lonnia-e.
Siga Absalom niu pavangmai khuga din-e, “Phuilo, Joab luse alu mungga bamme, siga tathiu puak bamme. Tadlujiu sise ruthon milo.” Siga paliuniu tadlujiu chami thonkhaijiu rumide.
Joab niu Absalom kyga tadlujiu dinsude, “Dekamjiu navangmai siniu alu rumi jiulo?”

Absalom niu pakhuga paokakge, “Palamra Iniu natu kukhaibo tingga nang wangmakbo donniu-e. Nangniu chawang khuga tadlujiu aleng khengkhai ratu Iniu masenbo-e: ‘Deleng Iniu Geshur tu phudlujiu haiga wangbam ralo? Siga I bamsai widiang rabo-e’”. Sichiujiu Absalom niu dinkiu-e, “Nangniu chawangtu adaora kamkhaibotu Iniu masenne, sichiujiu amao bamsai, pijiu atu paniu kamshat milo.”

Siga Joab niu chawang David khuga tadlujiu Absalom niu pakhuga dinbo hina dinkhai bide. Chawang niu Absalom tu kukhaide, siga paniu tadlujiu chawang suangga kadihga makhumkiu kahum sude, siga chawangniu patu biang-hiu khaijiu lukhaide.
Haibosai, Absalom niu paleng chaqon-kari nai chaqondung patu maluong tadra chamai ringiu kaden lude.

Paniu nsuan kalu buangsu lujiu namdigu rengmun npaiga meng chapsude. Siga mai khatniu n-gi athaobogu tathu chara jengniu chawang khuga ladjan thiura wangsai, Absalom niu patu kulujiu pah delamsu wanglo chiubo maniu-e. Sibopiu siniu pah sibo kiphiu gasu-e chiujiu dinkhai dasai,
Absalom niu din-e, “Phuilo tacheng tajai hai naliu khuga bamme. Chiudi naliugu tathu chara lamga nking khaira chawang sung malinbo mai ha-e.”
Sichiujiu paniu dinsan khai-e, “Dejiukha Iniu ladjanpao thiukhai nilo! Sichiujiu mai khatniu n-gi athaobo maksai tathu chara jengniu akhuga wangsai Iniu patu majibo ladjan thiukhai rabo-e.”
Mai khatniu Absalom tu daojiu pamasuangga makhum kiusai, Absalom niu padjiu patu jukhang lujiu biang-hiu khai-khai-e.
Chawang khuga ladjan thiura wangbo Israel mai hinatu Absalom niu haichiu kam kamjiu paliuniu palad phungra kamlude.
Takum madai saiga, Absalom niu Chawang David khuga din-e, “Paohubo yo, I Hebron lam tadkhaine, siga Iniu
Syria gu Geshur ga Iniu lungbambo tingga, paniu atu Jerusalem ga puiwang khai lansai, Iniu patu Hebron gasu kahum rabo-e, chiujiu
Chawang niu din-e, “Agi-manaijiu tadsulo.” Sijengniu Absalom se Hebron lam tadmide.
Chiudi paniu Israel mai kiphiu pakhiangna khuga champao pikhai mide, “Naliuniu make khuanse chiudasai, ‘Absalom hai Hebron ga chawang thiumide!’ chiujiu senlo.”
Siga Absalom niu Jerusalem gasu kukhaibo chamai kainia pasai suitad kinbo-e, chiudi paniu rangkinbose wadi simakjiu, paliura malum mawijiu suitad kinbo-e.
Siga paniu charathiu bambo tingga Chawang David gu ladpimai khat thiubambo Gilo namdak gasu Ahithophel tudi Absalom niu kukhaide. Chawangtu atungbo hai tankhangjiu Absalom saisuimai kengkhang sude.
Chakhumpao khatniu David khuga paokhaide: “Israel maidungniu Absalom kadin piura tasiang thiukhai mide.”

Sijengniu Jerusalem ga pasai suilujiu bammai chakampaodung mathiu khuga David niu din-e, “Aliuniu Absalom khugasu marine chiusai, aliu paknuangmi rade! Kalangsulo! Sichiu maksai pah haiga wangjiu namdiga bammai hinatu kamshatmi talakge!”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Yo, Pakendibopiu yo, nangniu kadinbo hina kamra aliu kaden lude.”
Sijengniu, chawangniu pakikhunmaitu, khatdi chakampaodung hinatu puilujiu tadsude, siga chawangkiningtu khonra parammailiupui khang kariutu ronna masiak khaidiak lujiu tadmide.
Chawang khatdi pamai hinase namditu phutlujiu tadsuboga kanamthubo kyga paliu mathak khaide.
Chawang tu akhemai siniu pasuangga wangboga pagu chakampao hinase pakhuga wang chap karen sude. Gath gasu pasai suikinbo riphenmai kai-charuk sidi pakhuga wangde,
siga chawangniu paliugu jupao Ittai khuga din-e, “Dekamjiu naliu aliu sai suitad kinjiulo? Malanwang chawang kasanbo khuga bammilo. Naliura sangdiumai-e, naliu kadihlam wangsulo.
Haiga pating kakkhat naliu lung khaibo-e, dekamjiu naliu asai suilujiu rontad kinralo? I delam tadkhai ralo chiubo Idi simakge. Namaidungtu puilujiu malan wangsulo—sichiujiu
Chiudi Ittai niu paokakge, “Pakendibopiu yo, nang tadkhaibo bam hinaga kashai tangbo tadra Iniu
David niu paokakge, “Wide, sichiusai tadsulo!” Siniu pamai hina khatdi pahangga bammai hinatu puilujiu Ittai tadsude.
David sai suimai siniu tadpat suboga maidungse paliu khuan tanjiu kapsude. Chawang siniu pamaidungtu puilujiu Kidron Giubek kenpad sude, sichiujiu paliu mathiu ramjing lamse tadsude.

Siga singku Zadok khatdi Levi maidung siniu Masanbo Ladriat Bungse ponlu tadkinne. Mai hina siniu tadpadloi makthen paliu ntao lujiu sibo Bungse khaikiu lujiu ntao khuan bamme. Singku Abiather di siga bamme.
Siga chawang niu Zadok khuga din-e, “Ladriat Bungse ponlujiu namdilam malan sulo.
Chiudi paniu pachun maksai paniu maningbose akhuga kamkhai misulo.”
Khatdi paniu Zadok khuga dinlanne, “Phuilo, nanah Ahimaaz nai Abiathar nah Jonathan tu puilujiu namdilam agi-manaijiu malanwang sulo.
Iniu nakhu gasu champao chiulan makthen singgiu kenpad lujiu ramjing gase Iniu khuanbam niune.”
Sijengniu Zadok nai Abiathar niu Ladriat Bungse ponlujiu Jerusalem lam bammide.
David niu kap-kapjiu Olive luonglam khang sude; pangenruong tadle, pachun sabo lenjiu papee takumlu tadle. Pasai suitad kinmai hinadi paliu pee takum karenne khatdi kap karenne.
Ahithophel niu Absalom gu chari thiuboga jaomide chiubo paokhaiboga paniu kheng-e, “
David niu maluongton ga kahumbo bamkhatga wangtangboga, malum suibo pakapiu Archite mai Hushai niu pafai-pani phetlu khatdi pasan ga tabui katupkhai lujiu bambo adaode.
David niu pakhuga din-e, “Nang asai suiwangbo siniu atu nkhason lulakge,

chiudi nangniu namdilam malanwang lujiu, Absalom khuga, nda napiutu machakhai mibo kumjiu tuhoidi natu machajiu lungne chiu wang dinbo siniu atu nkha lubui-e. Sichiujiu Ahithophel niu ladpikhaibo hinatu nangniu ngamlubui then atung khailo.
Singku Zadok nai Abiathar siga bamrabo-e chawangkining gasu nangniu kachiubo hina panai khuga paokhai bilo.
Panai nahpiu Ahimaaz nai Jonathan di panai sai suikinbo-e, sichiujiu nangniu kadaobo cham hinase paliutu akhuga nangniu langkhai lubui-e.”
Sijengniu David kabo Hushai niu namdilam Absalom tu maluong bam macham mira malan mide.
Chawang David niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Haibo maniadungse nangniu ndeleng phungtad kinjiulo?”
Ziba niu paokakge, “Qonniam hainiu chawang kikhun mainiu tuangra leng-e, taruak nai charasy hainiu maidung tiukhai raleng-e, khatdi jaw hai paliuniu ramjingga chariuju mibo tingga sakkhai raleng-e.”
Chawang niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nawangpiu Saul tah, Mephibosheth se delam bamlo?”
Ziba niu paokakge, “Para Jerusalem ga bamme, palamra tuhoi hai Israel mainiu papao Saul gu wang dihse patu kalan khaibi sune chiujiu pah maning bamme.”
Chawang niu Ziba khuga din-e, “Mephibosheth gu hinase nagu thiurabo-e.”
Ziba niu paokakge, “I hai navangpiu-e. Tingthengjiu Pakendibopiu chunningse kamrabo-e!”
David chawangniu Buhurim ga wangtangbo tingga, Saul singna padbo Gera nahpiu Shimei niu tasiang siangjiu wang-e.
David tu khatdi pagu chakampaodungtu, pamaidung nai patu khuanmaidungniu maguijiu bamdi, Shimei niu tatu marajon sude.
Shimei niu siangjiu din-e, “Tadmilo! Tadmilo! Chamaitu kagibopiu! Pamao kabambopiu!
Nangniu Saul wangdihtu sutlu khatdi Saul kikhun maitu kamshat mibo jengniu, tuhoira
Zeruiah nahpiu Abishai niu chawang khuga din-e, “Pakendibopiu yo, dekamjiu haibo thiniu natu siangjiu bamralo? Iniu tadlujiu papee dangmi tane!”
Chawang niu Abishai nai pasingnapiu Joab khuga din-e, “Haise nanai ngam wadi ha-e!”
Khatdi David niu Abishai khatdi pagu chakampaodung mathiu khuga din-e, “Anah siakniu atu gira kamjiu bambo-e, sichiusai dekamjiu haibo Benjamin maipiu haitu naliu suang habam ralo? Paniu atu siangra
Paniu atu siangbo hainiu amagenthak
Sichiujiu David nai pamaidungse paliu npuilam tadsude. Shimei niu paliu saisui tadjiu maluong lamse khangtang sude; paniu siangjut, tatu nai tabui marajutjiu tadsude.
Chawang nai pamaidungse Jordan wantangboga paliu sang mide, siga paliu mathak khaide.
Absalom nai patu maluong bambo Israel mai hinase Jerusalem ga ngut mide, siga Ahithophel di paliu sai suitad kinne.
David gu malum suibo, kahpiu Hushai niu Absalom tu daolujiu senjiu din-e, “Chawangse ringtheng bamlo! Chawangse ringtheng bamlo!”
Absalom niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nangniu pagu kadin piubo, nakahpiu David khugasu dekam pakmi jiulo?”
Hushai niu paokakge, “Iniu degu kamralo? Ira
Iniu awangpiu, nahpiutu macha makjiu saotu macharalo? Iniu napiutu machabo kum tuhoidi Iniu natu macha rabo-e.”
Sigasu Absalom niu Ahithophel khulam marilujiu din-e, “Tuhoira aliu haiga bamde, aliuniu degu kamra nangniu ladpikhai ralo?”

Ahithophel niu paokakge, “Tadlujiu napiu rammailiupuidung paniu chawangkiningtu khuanra khaibam maitu nphiuji milo. Sichiusai Israel mai hina siniu napiutu nagu mikre piu-e chiubo simi rabo-e, khatdi nasai suikinmai siniu paliu lung humi rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu chawangkininggu nshingga Absalom leng mathenky thiukhai bide, siga mai hina suangga Absalom niu tadlujiu papiu rammailiupuidung situ nphiuji khaide.
Sibo tingga David tadi, Absalom tadi Ahithophel niu ladpikhaibo hina situ Chara ladsiak kumjiu lukhai-e khatdi sise majai-e.
Sibo sai wathengkha makjiu, Ahithophel niu Absalom khuga din-e, “Thaichun Iniu chamai sang kariu niakiutu kadalujiu David tu hatad sune.
Paniu pajeng sajiu khatdi pachun sajiu bambo tingga patu Iniu aphen rabo-e. Siga pah pingmi rabo-e khatdi pamaidung hina pak mirabo-e. Iniu chawangtu ronna kamshatmi tarabo-e,
sichiujiu pamai hinatu nakhuga chamipuitu pakina khuga puiwangbo kumjiu puiwang lanrabo-e. Nangra mai khangkhattu ronna kamshat nibo-e, kakimai tura gukhai nibo-e.”
Ladpi khaibo haise Absalom khatdi Israel mai jupaodung khuga kawi kumjiu ngaokhai-e.
Absolom niu din-e, “Tuhoira Hushai tu kulo, sichiujiu paniu aliu khuga degu dinkhai ralo, aliu nking mataikhe.
Hushai niu wangboga Absalom niu pakhuga din-e, “Ahithophel niu aliu khuga haichiu din-e haise aliu suikhai rama? Sichiu maksai, degu kamralo chiubo nang aliu khuga dinkhailo.”
Hushai niu paokakge, “Ahithophel niu ladpikhaibo hai tuhoi lengra wimakge.

Napiu David nai pamaidung sira chari tanchang tanne chiubo nangniu sibamme, sichiujiu paliu poitu ponlubo chahompui kum, paliura paliu lung sachang sa-e. Napiura charithiu sibo riphen khatle, sichiujiu nchunra pamaitu pah maluang bam lakge.
Tuhoi siakra pah tulim kyga maksai pabam katam khatga nbaibam sune. David niu namaidungtu aphen sugap dasai, namaidungse ngammakge chiubo cham ronna maidungniu chiusune.

Sichiusai, huthubo namaidung, ndongquidung kumjiu kahumai sidi pingmi sune, palamra Israel mai hinaniu, napiu sira katan kahubo riphen khatle khatdi pamaidung sidi aphentan maidung-e chiubo sikam bambo-e.
Iniu ladpikhai nibo sira nangniu Israel mai hinatu, kadih pake hinagasu khomwangjiu, duipui taphu-ga nbuiniang kum khomwang madui lujiu, napumsiakniu chari thiura jukhailo.
Siga aliuniu David tu daosune, sichiujiu degu kambam jiulo chiubo pah sitang makhaga patu aphensune sichiusai padi khatdi pamaidi ringsi lakge.
Paniu namdi gase ngutmi tadi aliuniu chariang khoilujiu wang, namdi situ ramjeng nhanglam jukiu mirabo-e. Maluong rigase tatukang khatnadi masiak khai lakge.”
Absalom nai Israel mai mathiuniu din-e, “Hushai gu ladpikhaibo hai Ahithophel gu suang wi-nkiu-e.” Ahithophel gu kawibo ladpikhaibose lukhai makra
Sigasu Hushai niu singku Zadok nai Abiathar khuga paniu Absalom nai Israel maigu jupao khuga degu ladpikhai milo khatdi Ahithophel niu dechiu ladpi khailo chiubo hai dinkhai bide.

Hushai niu dinlanne, “Tuhoi kalang sulo! David niu thaichun chagiu kenpad lujiu ramjing gase jikhai makjiu chiudi Jordan se kenpad mira, sichiujiu patu khatdi pamaidungtu minkam lujiu gimi makra champao langkhai sulo.”

Abiathar nahpiu Jonathan nai Zadok nahpiu Ahimaaz niu Jerusalem lenlam, Enrogel ruakga khuan bamme, palamra panainiu namdi lamse ngutjiu maitu pi ngaokhaini makge. Siga kavangpui khatniu siga naimachang padjiu degu padbamlo chiubo panai khuga paokhai khai-e, siga panainiu tadlujiu chawang David khuga paokhai lan lan-e.

Chiudi naikhatra panaitu npiumainah khatniu ngaolujiu paniu Absalom khuga padlujiu paokhai bide. Sijengniu kalangjiu panainiu Bahurim ga mai khat kyga pakwang nbai khaide. Paky mungga takhunky khat bamme, sibo lungga panai buangngut mide.
Sibopiu nao siniu takhunki mase gomlujiu, sibo rigase alin marakhai mide, sichiujiu mai khatniudi sipadlu makge.
Absalom gu chakampaodungniu sibo kyga wanglujiu sibo pui khuga maniu-e, “Ahimaaz nai Jonathan se dega bamlo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Singgiuse kenlu pakmide.”
Maidung siniu panaitu phiusude chiudi phiudao lulakjiu, Jerusalem lam paliu malan mide.

Paliu tadmibo sai, Ahimaaz nai Jonathan se takhunky gasu npadlujiu wang chawang khuga paokhai bide. Panainiu Ahithophel niu patu dechiujiu rangsulo chiubo pakhuga paokhai bide khatdi din-e, “Kalangjiu singgiuse kenpadmi sulo.”
Siga David nai pamaidungse Jordan kensude sichiujiu tingben padboga paliu mathiu kenpad mide.
Ahithophel niu pagu ladpikhaibo wangtang makboga, pagu qonniam tuanglujiu pakylam wangmide. Sichiu pangam hinase kamlujiu, paronna nkhekshat mide. Patuse pakikhunmai maigu charawga nphumkhai mide.
Absalom nai Israel maidungniu Jordan kenpadbo tingga David ra Mahanaim namdakga wangtang mide.
(Absalom niu Joab sung, Amasa tu charipi leng malinkhai mide. Amasa hai Ishmael mai Jether nahpiu-e; papui siniu Nahash nahpui khatdi Joab pui Zeruah, singnapui Abigail si-e).
Absalom nai pamaidungniu Gilead kadihga rijiky thiulu bam sude.

David niu Mahanaim ga wangtangboga, patu Amnon ga bambo Rabbah namdi gasu, Nahash nahpiu Shobi niu, Lodeber gasu Ammiel nahpiu Machir niu khatdi Gilead ga bambo Rogelim gasu Barzillai niu sundao padle.

Paliuniu chakuang chapiang taniangly tazifai khatdi katiu-kasak hina David nai pamaidung leng phungwang-e; sigasu chabanmiu, tathiu-tek, rulubo alindung, chara, asio, makhuidui, wasa, kabui nduisa khatdi mily kasiadi phungwang-e. Ramjing gase David nai pamaidungse mariu charijiu khatdi magenthiu paliu sangjiu bamrabo situ paliuniu sibo jenggasu-e.
Chawang David niu pamai hinatu khomwang lujiu, chamai sang-leng, kai-leng njanpad lujiu paliutu thinmanra chakampaodung kadakhai sude.

Paniu pamaidung situ thomsum thiujiu, khatniu Joab hangga, khatniu Joab singna Abishai hangga, khatdi Gath gasu wangbo Ittai hangga khailujiu langkhai mide. Khatdi chawangniu pamaidung khuga din-e, “I apumsiakniu naliu sai suitad rabo-e.”

Paliuniu paokakge, “Nangra wakamdi aliu sai suitad tulo. Mikremai khugara aliu khangsiamai pakmi tadi, maksai aliu khangsiatu gimi tadi; nangra aliu sang kariu suang nkiubo-e. Nangniu namdi haiga bam lujiu aliutu nkhara langkhaiboniu wi-nkiu rabo-e.”
Chawang niu paokakge, “Naliuniu wi-e chiubose Iniu kamrabo-e.” Sichiujiu pamaidungniu sang-bao, kai-bao thiujiu tadpadboga pase rengmun mungga chap bamme.
Paniu Joab, Abishai khatdi Ittai khuga chamtan pi-e, “Ajeng gasu akhangpiu Absalom tura kam masa khai tulo.” David niu pagu chakampaodung khuga chamtan haise piboga riphendung hina chiu bamme.
David gu riphendung siniu manamga tadjiu Ephraim maigu mariu gasu Israel maitu aphen sude.
Israel maidung situ David maidungniu ngam lude; haise maipingbo chari ngambo khatle, sibo naise chamai sang makaitu gimide.
Charise aphen sujiu manamhang pakhiangna phuiting mide, sichiujiu chari bamga shaibo suang mariujiuga chamai kakengkha shai mide.

Simakdakjiu Absalom tu David mai khangsianiu ngaolude. Absalom se qonniam tuang kinne, sichiujiu nphubang kadi hangga tadwangboga, Absalom peese singkega kabetman mide. Konniamse pakmide siga Absalom tu masiangman bammide.
Haise David mai khatniu ngaolujiu wang Joab khuga paokhaide, “Paohubo, Absalom tu nphubang kega masiang bambo I ngao-e!”
Joab niu paokakge, “Nangniu patu ngaosai, dekamjiu sibo bam gasu patu gimi mak jiulo? Nangniu sichiu-e sai, Iniu naleng rangkanggi kariu nai khen-gak khat pirabo-e.”

Chiudi sibopiu siniu paokakge, “Nangniu atu sang khat pidi, Iniu chawang nahpiu riga a-njung khatnadi khengsu silakge. Chawangniu natu khatdi Abishai nai Ittai tu ajeng gasu akhangpiu, Absalom tura kam masakhai tulo; chiubo chamtan pibose aliu mathiu chiubo-e.
Siga Iniu chawang kadin piumakjiu Absalom tu gimi sai, chawang niu haise chiurabo-e, para wahina chiukam bambo-e, sichiusai nangniu atu gukhai silakge.”
Joab niu din-e, “Iniu nakhuga pawan kam maha silak mide.” Sichiujiu paniu changiu sum thinlujiu, nphubang kega masiang bambo, Absalom ringbam khaga pagaga phenkhai mide.
Sigasu Joab gu riphenmai khang kariu siniu wangjiu Absalom tu kamshat mide.
Chari thiuta mira Joab niu makese mudkhaide, siga pagu riphendungse Israel maidungtu hatadbo gasu malan mide.
Paliuniu Absalom phawse ponlujiu mariu lungga bambo chakhomky kasukga thonkhai lujiu tatuniu khai sin mide. Israel mai mathiuse pakmide, mai hina paky kylam pakwang karen mide.

Absalom niu ringbambo tingga Chawanggu Ramjengga tusom khat kamkhai diakge. Palamra panah npiumainah lungmakbo jengniu pazantu maningtaojiu bamraleng-e, sichiujiu thaidao katang Absalom tusom chiujiu sibam kha-e.
Sigasu Zadok nahpiu Ahimaaz niu Joab khuga din-e, “Iniu pakwangjiu
Joab niu din-e, “Chiumakge, thainaira nangniu kawicham hai paowang silakge. Kakibo nainiu nang paowangbo sui-e, chiudi thainaira chawang nahpiuse shaimibo-e.”
Sichiu lujiu paniu pavangpiu Sudan maipiu khugase din-e, “Tadlujiu nangniu ngaomibose chawang khuga paokhai bilo.” Kavangpiu siniu makhumkiu khailujiu paksu mide.
Ahimaaz niu matanjiu dinlan-e, “Degu padmilo chiubo I wadi manang makge, lungsajiu Idi kawicham hai phungtad khaine.
Joab niu maniu-e, “Anah yo, dechiujiu nangniu haise masen jiulo? Haiboleng nangniu tathuon wakhatdi daoson lakge.”
Ahimaaz niu dinlan-e, “Wakhat-khat thiujiu tadi I tadnijiu-e.”
Siga Joab niu din-e, “Chiusai tadsulo. Sichiujiu Ahimaaz niu npui gasu pakkiujiu Jordan Ramjeng pak tonjiu paniu kavang situ hamaju mide.
David hai namdi gu lenbo nai nungbogu rengmun kakga ntao bamme. Akhepiu siniu singbeng ton gase khanglujiu rengmun rigase chapjiu bamme; paniu phuipadboga, mai khat paronna pakwang kinbo ngaode.
Paniu sise chawangtu kulujiu dinkhaide siga chawangniu din-e, “Pah paronna sai, kawibo cham phungwang kinbo-e.” Pakkinbo piuse pakwang mana sude.
Sibosai akhepiu siniu kakimai khatdi pak wanglan kinbo ngaolujiu rengmun khuanbo piutu kulujiu din-e, “Phuilo! Mai khatdi pak wanglan kinne!”
Chawangniu din-e, “Hainadi kawibo cham phungwang kinbo-e.”
Akhepiu siniu din-e, “Pakwang raikinbo piuse Ira Ahimaaz kumjiu ngaokhai-e.”
Chawangniu din-e, “Para kawibo mai-e, siniu pah kawibo champao phungwang kinbo-e.”
Ahimaaz niu padiuwibo cham senjiu chawang masuangga pakwang makhum kiujiu din-e, “Na Rawang,
Chawangniu maniu-e, “Akhangpiu, Absalom sira wibamma?”
Ahimaaz niu paokakge, “Paohubo yo, nagu chakampao Joab niu atu langkhaibo tingga, wakhatra chakhuan kariobo I chiu-e, chiudi sise degulo chiubo I din ngam makge.”
“Haiga chapbam niulo,” chiu chawangniu pakhuga dinkhai lujiu pah tadpad chap bamde.
Siga Sudan maipiu kavangse wangtangjiu chawang khuga din-e, “Iniu Pakendibopiu naleng kawibo cham phungwang kin-e! Thainai hai natu atungmai hina riga
Chawangniu maniu-e, “Akhangpiu, Absalom se wibamma?”
Kavang siniu paokakge, “Paohubo yo, pakhuga padmibose namikremai mathiu khuga, maksai natu suinimak mai mathiu khuga pipadkhai ratu Iniu masenbo-e.”

Chawangse palung magenthiuboniu phui mide. Paniu rengmun mungga bambo kichen ga ngutlujiu kapsude. Paniu tad majutjiu kapjiu haichiu din-e, “Anahpiu yo! Anah Absalom yo! Absalom anah yo! Anah yo, Iniu nasung shailu sai wirabo-e! Anah Absalom yo!”
Chawang David hai Absalom jengniu kap bamme khatdi huibamme chiubo hai Joab khuga dinwang lande.
Sichiujiu chari ngamluboga chunwi rabo sung sibo naise David gu riphen mathiu lengse chunsabo thiu mide, palamra chawangniu panah jengniu huibamme chiubo cham hai paliu chiubo gasu-e
Namdi lung gase paliu charigasu mangamjiu pakwangbo kumjiu maliuna ngut karen mide.
Chawangniu papee takum lujiu pakhuan tanjiu kapsude, Oh, anah Absalom yo! Anah Absalom yo!”

Joab niu chawang kyga tadlujiu pakhuga haichiu dinsude. “Thainai nangniu namaidungtu kam mangam mide—namaidung hainiu nagu ringting, nanahpuidung, nanahpiudung khatdi nanaodung nai narammailiupuidunggu ringting gukhai bibo-e.

Nangniu natu lungsamai situ atung-e khatdi natu mikremai situ nkha-e! Nagu chakampaodung nai namaidung haitu nangniu wajengdi chakkhai makge chiubose masan siakjiu lenkhaide. Thainai hai Absalom niu ringbam lujiu, aliu mathiu hai shaikam misai nang nachun wirabo-e chiubo hai I silude.
Tuhoira tadlujiu namaidung khuga kam masanlulo.
Sigasu chawangniu sulujiu namdigu rengmun mungga ntao mide. Pamaidung siniu pah siga bamme chiubo chiulujiu paliu mathiuse pamungga wang madui sude.
Sibo lungga Israel mai mathiuse paky kylam pakkhai mide.

Kadih hinase paliu ronna n-gi karensude. Sichiujiu paliu karai khat-khat khuga dinsude. “Chawang David niu aliu mikremai khugasu aliutu gukhai bibo-e. Paniu aliutu Philistine mai khugasu gukhai bibo-e, chiudi tuhoira paniu pagu kadih phutlujiu Absalom khugasu pakmide.
Aliuniu Absalom tu aliu wang thiura wasa manuk khai mibo-e, chiudi patu hai chari gasu kamshat mide. Sijengniu, dekamjiu Chawang David tu puiwang lanra mai khatniudi kammak jiulo?”

Israel mainiu dinbambo cham hai Chawang David khuga wangtang mide. Siga paniu singku Zadok nai Abiathar tu Judah maigu jupaodung khuga maniura langkhai-e, “Dekamjiu naliuniu chawangtu pawangkining bamga puiwang lanra kanamthubo maise thiuralo?
Naliu hai agu singnamai-e, atia nai azai-e; dekamjiu atu puiwanglan raga naliu hai kanamthubo thiuralo?”

David niu Amasa khuga dinkhaira paliu khuga dinlan-e, “Nang hai asingna-e. Tuhoi gasu Iniu natu riphendunggu papeese Joab sung kada khai mibo-e. Iniu sichiu maksai Tingwang niu atu kakhiushat misulo!”
David ladkengniu Judah mai mathiu pah kadinpiura kamlude, sichiujiu paliuniu patu khatdi pagu chakampao hinatu maluang lujiu malanwangra chalad paokhaide.
Paniu malanwangbo npuiga Judah mainiu Jordan Giukiga patu sundaojiu singgiu kenbo katang kapaokhai-e.
Sibo wan gase Bahurim gasu Gera nahpiu Shimai niu chawang David tu daora pakwangde.

Paniu Benjamin kiphiu gasu chamai sang khattu maluanglu wangde. Siga Saul kikhun gu kavangpiu Ziba khatdi panah khang kariu-je-mangiukiu khatdi kavang makaitu maluanglu Jordan gase chawang suangga wangde.
Paliuniu chawanggu riphendungtu maluang lujiu singgiuse kenpad lujiu chawangniu lunibo tenkhaira wangde.
Chawangniu singgiuse kenra kam bamboga Shimei niu pakwang pamasuangga makhumkiu lujiu din-e,
“Pakendibopiu yo, nangniu Jerusalem phutkhai mibo nai Iniu nakhuga kamaobo tenkhai mibose lungsajiu kuak khailo. Sise wadaodi maning tingtheng khai tulo maksai nalung pomkhai tulo.
Paohubo yo, sise I kamaobo kammibo-e chiubo I si-e, sijengniu tingpilam lungmai ruanggasu Iniu thainai Pakendibopiu natu adaorai thura chiujiu wangbo-e.”
Zeruiah nahpiu Abishai niu din-e: “Shimei haitu kamshat mirabo-e, palamra

Chiudi David niu Abishai nai pasingna Joab khuga din-e, “Saoniu nanai chunning maniu jiulo? Nanainiu atu kam chariu khai rama? Tuhoira Iniu Israel mai wang thiumibo-e, siniu Israel mai khangkhat tudi thainai kamshat lakge.”
Khatdi paniu Shimei khuga din-e, “Natu kamshat lakge chiubo chamkeng hai Iniu dinbo-e.”
Mephibosheth niu Jerusalem gasu chawangtu sundaora menggapboga, chawangniu pakhuga din-e, “Mephibosheth yo, nang asai suitad khai makge. Dekamjiu tadmak jiulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Pakendibopiu yo, nangniu kasibo kumjiu I hai aphi tangmibo-e, Iniu nasai suitadra avangtu agu qonniam pi tongkhai khaira dinbo-e, chiudi paniu atu sonmibo-e.
Pakendibopiu nakhuga pah alamga aratjiu dinkhai mibo-e, chiudi nangra Tingwang gu maza kumbo-e, siniu nangniu maji-e chiubose kamsulo.
Apiu kykhunmai mathiutu Pakendibopiu nangniu kamshat kamlu buibo-e, chiudi nangniu atu nagu kuangkaiga tiura pikhai bibo-e. Pakendibopiu nakhu gasu Iniu nagu lungsiat haitu khengra buita mide.”
Chawangniu paokakge, “Nangniu chalad dinsuanra hamide. Saul gu chakhiu-chalan hai Ziba nanainiu dao machamra Iniu chapkhai mibo-e.”
Mephibosheth niu paokakge, “Pijiu pakhiangnase Ziba tu daomi sulo. Pakendibo piuniu wijiu pakyga wangtang lubo siniu alengra buimide.”
Gilead gasu Barzillai niudi Rogelim gasu chawang tu Jordan puikenra kiu-e.
Barazillai hai tanpaosui mibo, takum riaktachat tangmibo mai-e. Pahai lungwichang lungwibo piu-e, sichiujiu chawangniu Mahanaim ga bambo tingga paniu chawangtu katiu-kasak pikhai mibo-e.
Chawangniu pakhuga din-e, “Jerusalem ga asai suilujiu wanglo, Iniu natu akhikhai birabo-e.”
Chiudi Barzillai niu paokakge, “Ira ring matheng lak mide, dekamjiu Iniu Pakendibopiu saisui lujiu Jerusalem lam tadralo?

Ira takum riaktachat tangmide, wakhat niudi achun piwikhai tamide. Iniu tiubo sakboga wadi pahum pakhiang sitamide, khatdi chalui thiumai khuanse chiuta mide. Ira pakendibo Piutu kamchariu khaira ronna-e.
Haijiukha kadibo tathuonse I daobui makge. Sijengniu Jordan hugen tangbo ronna I natu maluangpad khai tane.
Sichiujiu akylam malanwang lujiu apui-piumai rawga shaikhai mitane. Haiga natu machakhai raleng anah Chimham bamme; Pakendibopiu nangniu patu puilujiu wang, nangniu kawi-wiboga thinpiu khailo.”
Chawangniu paokakge, “Iniu patu maluang tadmine, sichiujiu nangniu paleng lunibose kamkhai bine. Sigasu nangniu kakhengbo hina Iniu naleng kamkhai bine.”
Sichiujiu David nai pamaidung mathiuse Jordan kenmide. Paniu Barzillai tu biang-hiu khai lujiu pagu thoidam pikhai-e, sichiujiu Barzillai se pakylam malan mide.
Chawang situ Judah mai mathiuniu khatdi Israel mai paphan khatniu kapao padjiu singgiu kenlubo sai, paniu Gilgal lam tadkhaide, siga Chimham pasai suiwangde.

Siga Israel mai mathiuse chawang khuga tadlujiu pakhuga dinsude, “Pakendibopiu yo, dekamjiu aliu singnamai Judah maidung siniu natu, nakikhuntu, namaidungtu Jordan katang kapaopadra aliu suang paliugu maji bamme chiujiulo?”
Judah maidung siniu paokakge, “Aliuniu kambo sira, chawang hai aliu mai khatle. Haijengniu dekamjiu naliu lungpom jiulo? Paniu aliuleng tiutek di pimakge, wakhatdi paniu aliuleng pimakge.”

Israel maidungniu paokakge, “Pahai naliu mai khat thiujiu bamtadi naliuniu dinbo kumjiu chawang David tu sutlon kariu lubui-e. Dekamjiu naliuniu aliutu maning malajiulo? Chawang haitu puiwang lanra aliuniu makhiam thiurai mibo-e chiubo hai mangai tulo!”
Chiudi Israel maidung suang Judah maidungniu paliu lung thiu nkiu mibo-e.
Sijengniu Israel maidungse David tu phutlujiu Sheba saisui mide, chiudi Judah maidung sira David kadin piujiu Jordan gasu Jerusalem tangbo David saisui wangde.
Chawangniu Amasa khuga din-e, “Judah maidungtu kumadui lujiu nanaise haiga malan wanglo.”
Amasa niu paliutu kura tadmide, chiudi chawangniu riatkhaibo wan gase pah wanglan makge.

Sijengniu Abishai khuga chawangniu din-e, “Absalom suang nkiujiu Sheba niu aliutu kam chariu khaira mide. Amaidungtu puilujiu patu hasulo, chiumaksai paniu charireng kawibo sutlujiu aliu khugasu marimi sune.”
Sijengniu chawangtu akhemaidung, chiubora Joab maidungse khatdi kakibo riphendung hina Jerusalem tu phutkhai lujiu Abishai sai suilujiu Sheba tu hatad sude.

Paliuniu Gibeon ga tatukang kadibo khat bambo gase wangtangboga Amasa niu paliutu daode. Joab haira charithiura papuan khailubo-e, pahengse pabungga khailujiu pagu khen-gakga khinting khai nbambo-e. Paniu tadpadboga pahengse kai kiu mide.
Joab niu Amasa khuga din-e, “Akabo, dechiu bamlo? Sichiujiu pabianggiuse paben majatlamniu juman lujiu biang-hiu khai sude.
Joab niu paben khatlam thinbambo paheng siniu Amasa silu makboga, Joab niu pawonpuiga jumkhaijiu, palung-parai npad mide. Pah shainong mide, siniu Joab chukhai lan makge.
Sichiujiu Joab nai Abishai siniu, Sheba tu hatad sude.
Amasa mungga chapbambo Joab mai khatniu senpadle, “Joab nai David mai hinase Joab saisui lulo!”
Amasa phawse tazainiu maren lujiu npui n-gangga bamme. Mai hinaniu siga mathak bambose Joab mai khatniu ngaolujiu, paniu npuiki gasu luzamlam jukhai lujiu, chafai khatniu thaptom mide.
Sibo phawse npuiki gasu jupad mibo sainiu mai hina Joab saisui lujiu Sheba tu hasude.
Sheba niu Israel mai kiphiugu kadih hina tadron lujiu Abel Beth Maacah namdiga wangde, siga Bichri
Sheba se siga bamme chiubo Joab maidung siniu chiulujiu namdi situ wang taomagui mide. Paliuniu kareng lenlamse taniangky thiusu lujiu karengse kamkaora kadih chusude.
Sibo namdi gase ningtingbo pui khat bamme, paniu kareng gasu senpad sude, “Kinglo! Kinglo! Joab tu haiga wangra dinkhailo; I patu npao khainijiu-e.”
Joab niu padle, siga paniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nang hai Joab sima?
Paniu paokakge, “Yo, I ye.”
Paniu pakhuga din-e, “Paohubo yo, alad nking khailo.”
“Nking bamme,” chiujiu paniu paokakge.
Siga paniu din-e, “Ndara maidungniu haichiu dinbam niu-e, ‘Abel namdi gasu natu pijiu paokak khai bilo’-chiujiu paliuniu din bamniu-e.
Aliugu namdi hai kadibo khatle, Israel mai kadih ruangga agi-manaibo khatdi kadinpiubo namdi-e. Dekamjiu nangniu haisitu kam mahara kambam jiulo?
Joab niu paokakge, “Wadaodi kammakge! Iniu haibo namdi haitu wadaodi kam maha lakge, maksai kam masami lakge!
Sise aliuniu karangbogu makge. Ephraim kadih gasu Bichri nahpiu Sheba kubo khatniu Chawang David tu chari thiusubo-e. Hainapiu situ pikhailo chiusai Iniu namdi gasu tadmi rabo-e.”
Paniu paokakge, “Aliuniu papeese kareng gasu nakhuga taliang kiukhai bine.”

Sichiujiu paniu wang namdiga bammaitu npao lujiu, Sheba peese danglujiu kareng gasu, sise Joab khuga taliangkiu khai bide. Siga paniu pamaidung situ namdise phut mira madan thiujiu make mudkhai bide, siga paliuse paliu kylam malan wang mide. Sichiujiu Joab se Jerusalem ga chawang khuga malanwang mide.
Joab hainiu Israel maigu riphenpao-e; Jehoiada nahpiu Benaiah niu David tu khuanmaigu papao si-e;
Adoniram niu changam kammaigu papao si-e; Ahilud nahpiu Jehoshaphat niu ariakkhuangdungtu akhi-e.
Sheva niu ladjanky gu raosui thiu-e, Zadok nai Abiather niu singku thiu-e,
khatdi Jair namdak gasu Ira haidi David gu singku khat thiu-e.
David niu mawangbo kenlungga takum sumling charakhum kasabo khat wang-e. Haijengniu, David niu

(Gibeon maidung hai Israel mai makge; chiudi paliutu Israel mainiu gukhaine chiujiu ladriat thiukhai mibo Amor maigu kasiambo phom khatle, chiudi Saul niu Israel maidung nai Judah maidung jengniu palung thiujubo jengniu paliutu kam maha mira matansui khai mibo-e).
Sijengniu Gibeon maidungtu David niu kulujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Iniu naliuleng degu kamkhai ngam ralo? Naliu khuga kamaobo kam khaimibo jengniu I wakhatra kamkhai ni-e, sichiujiu naliuniu
Paliuniu paokakge, “Saul nai pakikhunmaitu aliuniu n-gibo hai kachianiu maksai rangkang niudi pi tasi lakge, maksai aliuniu Israel mai khangkhat tudi kamshat nibo makge”
David niu maniu-e, “Sichiusai Iniu naliuleng degu kamkhai ralo?
Paliuniu paokakge, “Saul niu aliutu kam maha kam lujiu Israel mai kadihga aliu mai khat tudi pijiu lungkhai nimakbo-e.
Sijengniu pakai-kik gasu npiumai khang chinnia aliu khuga pilo, sichiusai
Chawangniu paokakge, “Iniu paliutu pikhai rabo-e.”

Chiudi paniu Saul khuga Aiah nahpui Rizpah niu lungkhai diakbo panahpiu kania, Armoni nai Mephibosheth tu, khatdi Saul nahpui Merab niu Meholah ga bambo Barzillai nahpiu Adriel khuga paniu lungkhai diakbo nahpiu khang mangiutu puilujiu paliu khuga pikhaide.
David niu paliutu Gibeon maidung khuga pikhaiboga, paliuniu maluong rigase

Siga Saul rammailiupui Aiah nahpui Rizpah niu maliufai benlujiu chaphawdung bambo gase tatun kiujiu tingriu makthenna atiat ting gasu bamkhang sude. Chaphawdung situ tiumi makra n-nien sai thingnadungtu ha, khatdi nchun sai nkan khaodungtu hajiu bamkhang sude.
Rizpah niu kambambose David niu chiulujiu,

paliuniu Gilead ga lungbambo Jabesh maidung khuga meng Saul nai Jonathan rahdung khoilude. (Philistine maidungniu Saul tu Gilboa Luong gasu kamshat mibo naise paliuniu Beth Shan gasu mathiu machongbam gasu agalubo-e).
David niu Saul nai Jonathan rahdung khatdi masengshat mibo khang chinnia rahdungse khoikhon lude.

Sigasu paliuniu Saul nai Jonathan rahdungse chawangniu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu Benjamin maigu kadih Zela ga bambo Saul piu Kish rawga nphum khai mide. Sibo sainiu, Tingwang niu paliu kadihleng paliu rathoi paokak khaide.
Israel maidung nai Philistine maidung kakga chari padlande; siga David nai pamaidungniu Philistine maidungtu charithiu sude. Charithiu khang suboga David hai pasang parang mide.
Siga liangtuong pazanniu Ishbibenob kubo khatniu tataaginiu kambo changiu taju sum-paphan kumbo ripbo thinlujiu, khatdi chaheng kasan khat thinlujiu paniu David tu kamshat ngamlune chiu maning sude.

Chiudi Zeruiah nahpiu Abishai niu wang David tu nkha khaijiu liangtuong situ aphenjiu patu kamshat mide. Sigasu David maidungniu wadaodi pijiu David tu paliu saisui lujiu charithiu tadlan makra ladriat thiu khaide. Paliuniu din-e, “Nangra Israel maigu lungchun si-e, aliuniu natu pi hamini makge.”
Sibosai Gob ga Philistine maidungtu charithiu lande, siga Hushah gasu Sibbecai niu Saph kubo liangtuong khattu kamshat mide.
Sibosai Gob ga Philistine maidungtu charithiu lanjiu, Bethlehem gasu Jair
Gath ga chari thiunibo liangtuong khattu chari thiu lan-e. Paben njungdi charuk. pangen njungdi charuk para phung-e.
Paniu Israel maitu din masa-e, siga David singna Shammah nahpiu, Jonathan niu patu kamshat mide.
Paliu khang madai hai Gath gasu lungbo liangtuong kaikikdung-e. Sichiujiu paliutu David nai pamaidungniu kamshat mibo-e.
pase agu nbaibam kadibo si-e.
A-Rawang ra atu gukhaipiu-e,
siniu I pakhuga wa manangra ha-e.
Chagee kumjiu paniu atu gukhai-e;
paniu atu gukhaijiu atu baikhai-e.
Pase atu gukhaipao-e;
kapingbo gasu paniu atu gukhaijiu rankhai-e.
Iniu
paniu agu mikre maidung khugasu gukhai bi-e
Kashaibo riang siniu atu khinman bamme;
shairabo duiliu siniu ariga luong bamme;
Kashaibo riang siniu atu bangman bamme,
khatdi charaw siniu atu tathak thiukhai bamme.
Agu magenthakga Iniu
atu nkha khaira Iniu a-Rawang tu ku-e.
Paraky gasu paniu akhuan chiukhai-e;
atu nkha khaira khengbose paniu chiukhai-e.
Kadih haise pingboniu kachajiu bamme;
tingpukgu tudise puakjiu kachakam mide.
Palamra Tingwang palung pom mide!
Paniuki gasu mikhutse padbamme;
taobambo mibon nai kibambo matise pamun gasu padjiu bamme.
Paniu tingpuk situ phetkek padlujiu,
paphi hanggase tamiubo kamuang phungwang-e.
Cherubim
tingkai kanri gasu para nbin tadle.
Tamiubo siniu patu paronna pigom khai-e,
tadui phuibambo kamuangse pakhuga bamme.
Pamasuangga hengri-kalikbo siniu
kibambo miti situ pijiu taokhai-e.
Sichiujiu
siga Ngamkambo Tingwang khuanse chiu-e.
Paniu pagu tavaipise ketjiu pamikre maitu hapak khai-e;
hengri kalikbo siniu paliutu hapak khai-e.
makiak marung suboga, duipui singse lekhai-e;
sichiujiu kadihpiri mense lepad khai-e.
tadui kasukbo gasu atu jupad khai-e.
Papum tanbo amikre maidung khugasu paniu atu gukhaibi-e,
atu mareng maidungse alengra tanju-e.
Iniu magenthiu chariubo wan-ga paliuniu atu aphen-e,
chiudi
I shairabo bam gasu paniu atu gukhai-e
palamra paniu atu pachun kimme.
Acheng matipbo jengniu aphijeng pikhai-e Rapiu niu;
amao-ameng habo jengniu atu thoikhai bi-e.
a-Rawang chunning makbo Iniu kam makge.
Pagu tacheng-tajai hina I majai kamme,
pagu chamtan majai kamakbo thiumakge.
I amao-ameng ha-e chiubo pah sibamme,
sichiujiu kasa kambo gasu Ira mari mibo-e.
Sichiujiu acheng matipbo jengniu aphijeng pikhai-e;
palamra akhui-amao ha-e chiubo pah sibamme.
khatdi witathui maidung khuga nangra witathui-e.
Masan maidung khuga nangra masan-e,
chiudi kasamaidung khuga nangra sa-e.
Lung manon maidungtu nangniu gukhaibi-e,
chiudi lung chaliang maidungtu kam manon khai-e.
nangniu agu tamiubose kam maha khai-e.
Amikre maidungtu aphenra pumtan pikhai-e,
paliuniu dangman mibo situ ngamra pumtan pikhai-e.
Haibo Tingwang—ngamkam hai dejiukha wi-tathuilo;
dejiukha palad hai malum suilo!
Patu phiumai hinaleng pahai chagee kumbo-e.
Tingwang hai agu katanbo nbaiky si-e,
paniu a-npuise kam madio khai-e.
ramluong gase paniu atu gukhai bi-e.
Chari thiura paniu atu katikhai bi-e,
siniu tanthubo vaipise Iniu thinlu-e.
Oh
Nagu nkhasiniu atu pidikhai bi-e.
Atu minlurabo gasu nangniu baikhai bi-e,
sichiujiu wadaodi I kaomi makge.
Iniu amikremaitu hajiu paliutu ngamlu-e,
paliutu kam maha makthen I mathak makge.
Iniu paliutu kakhiuboga, paliu buangsu ngamlak mi-e,
ngamlu lakjiu paliu asuangga kaobam mi-e.
Chari thiura pumtan nangniu atu pikhai-e,
sichiujiu Iniu amikremaitu ngamlu-e,
Nangniu amikremaitu amasuangga pipak khai-e
Iniu atu mareng maitu kam maha lude.
Paliutu nkha khaira phui-e,
chiudi mai khat niudi paliutu gukhai makge;
paliuniu
Iniu paliutu niakpet mide, siga paliu tabui mawi mide;
npuikiga taniangtu kumjiu Iniu paliu riga tao maluijiu tadle.
Kadinpiu makbo amaidung khugasu nangniu atu gukhai-e,
sichiujiu jatdung riga nangniu atu pi mawang khai-e,
sichiujiu I simak maidungse ahangga lung-e.
Sangdiumaidung siniu akhuan chiuboga,
agu chamtan majaijiu, paliu asuangga makhum kiu-e.
Paliu hotse hamijiu paliugu charireng gasu
masandi-dijiu akhuga wang-e.
Atu gukhaibo Tingwang kendise dinronlo!
Agu mikremaidung situ paniu ngamkhai-e,
paniu jatdung situ pijiu ahangga lungkhai-e,
sichiujiu amikremai khugasu atu gukhai-e,
khatdi palung kasamai khugasu atu gukhai bi-e.
natu thuonbo lui I thiu bamme.
Tingwang niu chari ngambose pawangpiu khuga pikhai bi-e;
paniu kadakhai mibo, David situ khatdi pakaikikdung riga
pagu saomakbo lungsiatse tingthengjiu bamrabo-e.

Jesse nahpiu David haitu Tingwang niu kam madikhai bibo, khatdi Jacob Rawang niu chawang leng kadakhai bibo-e, paniu Israel maileng chalui kawi-wibo masingkhai bi-e. Haidungse David gu kanambo ladkengdung-e.
Israel mai Rawang niu dinkhai mide, Israel maitu gukhaipao siniu akhuga din-e,
“Tingwang tu chakhuang thiujiu nchang-majibo siniu mawangbo chawang sira,
kamuang habo nai naimik thaobo kumme,
khatdi tingriu lubo sai naimikniu piubuan riga thao nbiu kapad kumme.”
Sichiujiu Tingwang niu akaikiktu thoikhai rabo-e,
palamra paniu tingtheng halanlakbo
khatdi kalilan lakbo tasiang siniu ladriat thiu khai-e.
Sisetu Iniu masenbo-e; haise agu chari ngambo-e,
haise Tingwang niu maomakjiu piwangtang khai rabo-e.
Chiudi charatu simak maidung sira taliangpad mibo tathuse kumbo-e;
paliutu mai khatniudi chabenruangniu niasi lakge.
Nangniu chagi takap maksai changiu thinlujiu paliutu ruthon kammi rabo-e.
David gu pazan tadbo riphendung sira haidung-e; raithubo sira “Khang sum”
Khangsum ruanggasu paniabo piusira Ahoh kiriang gasu Dodo nahpiu pazan tadbo Eleazar hai-e. Naikhat David panainiu Philistine maitu chari thiu-e. Israel maidungse kaomibo-e,
chiudi paniu pachapga chaplujiu pahengse paben gasu khoipad lulak mibo tangna Philistine maidungtu aphenbo-e.

Khangsum ruang gasu pazan tadbo pasumbo piu sira Harar gasu Agee nahpiu Shammah si-e. Asio luzam khat bambo, Lehi ga Philistine maidungse wang madui mide. Siga Israel maidungse Philistine maidung khugasu paksude,
chiudi Shammah niu luzam gase pachap chaplujiu asun sude.
Atiatting wang manasuboga “Samriu” gu sum siniu Philistine maigu riphendungniu Rephaim Ramjengga riji thiulu bamga, khatdi David niu Adullam Tulimki khatga tadkiu-e.
Sibo wan ga David se renglubo maluongga bamme, khatdi Philistine maidung siniu Bethlehem tu sutlude.
David niu paky tu maningjiu din-e, “Mai khatniu Bethlehem gu rengmun mungga tadlujiu ajai gasu tadui ponwangjiu, Iniu sakkhai sai dejiukha wiralo!”
Pazan tadbo riphendung siniu Philistine maigu riji tad taronjiu meng ajai gasu taduise thuaklu wang David khuga pikhaide, chiudi paniu sise sakmakge khatdi sise paniu
sichiu paniu din-e, “
Haidungse pazan tadbo riphen khangsumgu ngamkamdung si-e.
Joab singna Abishai (panai pui se Zeruiah si-e) hai “Pazan tadbo khang samriu” gu jupao-e. Paniu pangiu thinlujiu chamai kai sumtu aphenjiu paliutu kamshat lujiu “Samriu”
Pahai “Samriu” ruanggasu pazan tadthubo thiujiu paliugu jupao thiu-e, chiudi “khang sum” kumjiu pazan hai tadtang makge.

Kabzeel gasu Jehoiada nahpiu Benaiah hai pazan tadbo riphen khangkhatle; paniu Moab maigu kadibo riphen khangnia kamshatbotu sijiu kahubo ngam kengkha kamkhai-e. Kabun kiubo nai paniu chakhomkyga kiulujiu ndongqui khattu kamshat lu-e.

Egypt maipiu pakhao kadi-kathengbo piu changiu thinlu wangbopiu khat tudi paniu kamshat mibo-e. Benaiah niu paheng thinlujiu patu asunjiu Egypt maipiu ben gasu pangiuse sutlujiu, siseniu patu phenshat mibo-e.
“Samriu” ruangga jaobo pazan tadbo Benaiah gu pahot gasu kambo ngamkamdungse hai-e.
Pahai paliu ruangga pazan tadbo piu-e chiudi pahai “Khang sum” kumjiu pazan tadtang makge. David niu patuse pagu akhe maigu papao pithiu khai-e.
“Samriu” ga jaobo khangsia siniu:
Joab singnapiu Asahel
Bethlehem gasu Dodo nahpiu Elhanan
Harod gasu Shammah nai Elika
Pelet gasu Helez, Tekoa gasu Ikkesh nahpiu Ira
Anathoth gasu Abiezer, Hushah gasu Mebunnai
Ahoh gasu Zalmon, Netophah gasu Maharai
Netophah gasu Baanah nahpiu Heleb
Benjamin ga bambo Gibeah gasu Ribai nahpiu Ittai
Pirathon gasu Benaiah
Gaash ramjeng mung gasu Hiddai
Arabah gasu Abialbon, Bahurim gasu Azmaveth
Shaalbon gasu Eliahba
Jashen nahpiudung Jonathan
Harar gasu Shammah
Harar gasu Sharar nahpiu Ahiam
Maacah gasu Ahasbai nahpiu Eliphelet
Gilo gasu Ahithophel nahpiu Eliam
Carmel gasu Hezro, Arab gasu Paarai
Zobah gasu Nathan nahpiu Igal
Gad gasu Bani, Amnon gasu Zelek
Beeroth gasu Joab ripuan phungbo Naharai
Jattir gasu Ira nai Gareb Hitt maipiu Uriah
Sichiujiu pazan tadbo riphendung hai
samriu-je-chinnia-kiu bamme.
Pakak khatga

Siga David niu pagu riphenpi Joab khuga chamtan pikhaide: “Nagu chakampaodungtu puilujiu kadih pake khat lamsu pake khatlam tangbo Israel mai kiphiu hina riak chaksulo. Dejiu bamlo chiubo I sikhai ni-e.”
Chiudi Joab niu chawangtu paokakge, “Pakendibopiu yo, tuhoi bambo suang dam kai nkiujiu na-Rawang
Chiudi chawangniu Joab nai pagu chakampaodungtu pijiu pagu chamtanse kamra dinkhai-e, siga paliuniu tadlujiu meng Israel maidung riak chaksude.
Paliuniu Jordan kenpad lujiu meng Gad maidung kadihga bambo Aroer gu tingrun lam ramjeng n-gangga riji thiukhaide. Sigasu paliuniu Jazer gu tingpilam tadsude,
sichiujiu Gilead lam khatdi Hitt maigu kadih Kadesh lam tadkhai sude. Dan lam paliu tadkhaide, sichiujiu Dan gasu paliuniu Sidon gu tingnu lam tadkhai sude.

Sibo sai paliuniu charireng thiukhai bambo Tyre namdigu tingrun lam tadkhaijiu Hiv maigu namdi khatdi Canaan maigu namdi hina tadkhaide,sichiujiu kanamthuboga Judah gu tingrun lam bambo Beersheba lam tadkhaide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu paliu kadih pakhiangna tadron lujiu Jerusalem ga chahiu chakiu khatdi jeng makai sainiu wanglande.
Riphen thiusuibo riak hainiu Israel mai lungga suniu 800,000, khatdi Judah mai lungga suniu 500,000, bamme chiujiu paliuniu chawang khuga paowangde.
Chiudi David niu chamai riak chaklubo sai, palung magenthiujiu paniu
Gad niu pakhuga tadlujiu
David niu paokakge, “Ira pingboniu din sita mide! Chiudi maidungniu atu sajai pibo hai Ira luni makge. Pijiu
Sijengniu Israel maidung riga
Jerusalem tu kam mahamira
Maitu kamshat bambo maza situ David niu ngaolujiu
Sibo naise Gad niu David khuga tadlujiu din-e, “Araunah gu asaiphung gase tadlujiu
David niu Tingwang gu chamtanse majaijiu Gad niu pakhuga dinkhaibo kumjiu mengde.
Araunah niu phuikiuboga chawang nai pagu chakampaodung pakhuga khangkinbose ngaolude. Siga paniu David masuangga kadihga makhum kiujiu maniu sude,
“Pakendibopiu yo, dechiura nang haiga mengkin jiulo?
David niu paokakge, “Chararen hai kham mira, Iniu nagu asaiphung hai liulujiu
Araunah niu paokakge, “Pakendibopiu yo, haise lulujiu nangniu maningbo saisuijiu
Araunah niu pakhiangna hai chawang khuga pikhai kamlujiu din-e, “Na-Rawang,
Chiudi chawang niu paokakge, “Chiumakge, Iniu haibo leng paman pirabo-e. Akhuga paman thiujiu lumakbose Iniu a-Rawang
Sichiujiu paniu
Chawang David hai tuhoira thenthui mawi mide, khatdi pavangmainiu patu chafai thapkhaijiu bamtadi, pahai lumsi lulak mide.
Haijengniu pagu chakampaodungniu pakhuga din-e, “Pakendibopiu yo, natu bam nchamra khatdi natu akhi khaira aliuniu liunamai khat phiukhe. Paniu nakhuga jine sigasu natu pijiu kam malum khaine.”
Israel mai dih pakhiangnaga pazu-palun kawibo riliu khattu phiu-e, sichiujiu paliuniu Shunem gasu riliumai khat, pazanniu Abishag kubo puitu daolude, sichiujiu patuse chawang khuga puiwang khai bide.
Pahai pazu-palun wichang wi-e, sichiujiu paniu chawangtu khuankhai-e sigasu patuse akhi khai bide, chiudi paniu patuse nphiuji khai makge.
Paniu Joab tu (papuiniu Zeruiah-e) khatdi singkupiu Abiathar tu maluang lujiu npao-e, siga paliuniu palamga nkhara suikhaide.
Chiudi singku Zadok, Jehoiada nahpiu Benaiah, phaimiukakung Nathan, Shimei, Rei khatdi David gu akhepiu paliura Adonijah lam ponmakge.

Naikhat Adonijah niu Enrogel gu duipin mungga bambo Kaniu Tudi ga rathak mania thiujiu milydung, matomchidung, sigasu pamai wibo matompoidungtu kadkhaide. Paniu chawang David gu kakibo nahpiudungtu khatdi Judah gasu chawanggu chakampaodungtu haibo rathak mania kadkhaibo ngee gase wangra kukhaide,
chiudi paniu pa-singnapiu Solomon maksai phaimiukakung Nathan, Benaiah, maksai chawanggu akhepiudungtu kukhai makge.
Nangniu naringtingtu sigasu nanahpiu Solomon gu ringtingtu rankhaini-e sai,

Iniu natu chawang David khuga tad majatlujiu khatdi pakhuga haichiu khengra ladtikhai bine, ‘Pakendibopiu yo, anahpiu Solomon niu chawang thiujiu nawangbam malinne chiujiu nangniu akhuga chamriat katanbo thiukhai mibo makma? Sichiu-e sai, dechiujiu Adonijah niu chawang thiumibo gulo?’”
Khatdi Nathan niu dinsan khai-e, “Chiusai, nangniu chawang David tu npaojiu bamga, Iniu ngutlujiu, narachamse kam masan khai bine.”
Haijengniu Bathsheba niu chawangtu adaora chawang-ji kichen lungga ngutde. Pahai tingchang tingmide, sigase Shunem lamsu wangbo riliupui, Abishag niu patu akhijiu bambo-e.
Bathsheba niu chawang masuangga makhum kiude siga paniu maniu-e, “Nang degu masenbo bamjiulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Pakendibopiu yo, nasailam anahpiu Solomon tu pijiu chawang thiune chiujiu nangniu na-Rawang,
Chiudi Adonijah niu chawang thiumide khatdi sibo lamga nangniu wakhatdi simakge.

Paniu matomchi, milydung sigasu pamai wibo matompoidung kengkha rathak mania thiujiu kadkhaide, sigasu paniu nanahpiudungtu, khatdi singku Abiathar tu, sigasu nagu riphen maigu munranpiu Joab tu sibo ngeega kukhai-e, chiudi paniu nanahpiu Solomon tu kukhai makge.
Pakendibopiu yo, saoniu nawang bamga chawang thiujiu malinralo chiubose nangniu paliu khuga dinkhai ratu Israel maidung pakhiangnaniu phuijiu bambo-e.
Nangniu haise kamkhai makge sai nang shai gapboga anahpiu Solomon anaitu hai maitu jonbo maileng lukhaimi rabo-e.”
Nathan niu chawangkiningga wangtangbo tingga, pahai tacham phajiu bam kha-e.
Phaimiukakung haise wangbamme chiubo chawang khuga paokhaide, siga Nathan niu ngutlujiu chawang masuangga makhum kiude.
Sigasu paniu din-e, “Pakendibopiu yo, Adonijah niu chawang thiujiu nawang bam malinne chiubo nangniu din madukhai mibo ma?

Thainai siak paniu tadlujiu matom-kabui, mily, sigasu pamai wibo matompoidung kengkha rathak mania kadkhai mide. Paniu nanahpiu pakhiangnatu kukhaide, nagu riphen maigu munranpiu Joab, sigasu singku Abiathar, sichiujiu tuhoi siak paliuniu patu maluang lujiu changee bamme khatdi paliu khuanniu, ‘Ringthenglo chawang Adonijah chiujiu sen bamme!’
Chiudi paohubo yo, paniu atu maksai singku Zadok tu, maksai Benaiah, maksai Solomon tu kukhai makge.
Nakendibo siniu pakhiangna haise suikhaibo ma sigasu chawang thiujiu nawangbam malin rabo nagu chakampaodung tudi dinkhai makbo ma?”
Chawang David niu din-e, “Bathsheba tu malan wangra dinlo”—siga pah wangjiu pasuangga chapde.
Sigasu paniu pakhuga din-e, “Agu chariu magenthiubo pakhiangna gasu gukhaibibo ringbambo
chiubora thainai Israel mai Rawang,
Bathsheba niu makhumkiu lujiu din-e, “Awangpiu, chawangse tingtheng ringbamlo!”
Sigasu Zadok, Nathan, khatdi Benaiah tu kura chawang David niu langkhaide, paliu wangjiu ngutboga,
paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Agu ladjanky gu chakampaodungtu naliu puilujiu; anahpiu Solomon tu pijiu agu qonniampoi riga ntaokhai lujiu, sigasu patuse,
Zadok nai Nathan niu wasa manuk khaijiu Israel maigu chawang pithiura, Gihon gu duipin ga kapaokiu khai bilo. Sigasu make mudjiu khatdi haichiu senlo, ‘Ringthenglo Chawang Solomon!’
Paniu awangbamga ntaora wangboga pasai suiwanglo. Paniu chawang thiujiu abam malin rabo-e, palamra Israel mai nai Judah maigu mawangpao thiura Iniu kada padmibo piuse haisi-e.”
“Haise kamkhai rabo-e,” chiujiu Benaiah niu paokakge, “khatdi na-Rawang,
niu naken dibo situ maluang khaibo kum, paniu Solomon tudi maluang khaibo thiumi sulo, khatdi nangniu mawang khai mibo suang pa-mawangniu lungwi nkiubo pithiu milo.”
Haichiujiu Zadok, Nathan, Benaiah, khatdi chawanggu akhepiudungniu Solomon tu pijiu chawang David gu qonniampoi riga ntao khaide, sigasu patuse Gihon gu duipin ga kapaokhai bide.
niu bambo Mathenky gasu ponwangbo takisa bungse Zadok niu ponlujiu, Solomon tu manuk khaide. Paliuniu make mudle, khatdi maidung siniu haichiu sen-e, “Ringthenglo Chawang Solomon!”
Sigasu paliu mathiuse pasai suiwangjiu, chunwi mathabo khuan senjiu khatdi nthiam-mudjiu, paliu khuan siniu kadih kam malai khaide.

Adonijah khatdi pagiang maidungniu changiloi wangboga, chakhuan kariobo khuanse chiude. Khatdi Joab niu make khuanse chiuboga paniu maniu-e, “Namdi lungga kariojiu bambo khuan pakhiangnagu rambase delo?”
Paniu tacham dinloi makhaga, singku Abiathar nahpiu, Jonathan wangde. Adonijah niu din-e, “Ngutlo, nangra kawibo mai-e, tacham kawibose nangniu phungwang bamta lakge.”
Jonathan niu paokakge, “I ping makge. Pakendibopiu chawang David niu Solomon tu pijiu chawang thiukhai mide.
Paniu patu kapao khaira Zadok, Nathan, Benaiah khatdi chawanggu akhepiudungtu langkhaide. Paliuniu patu pijiu chawanggu qonniampoi riga ntao khaide,

khatdi Zadok nai Nathan niu patu pijiu chawang thiura, Gihon gu duipin ga wasa manuk khai mide. Sigasu paliuniu namdi lungga tadlujiu, chunwijiu senbamme, khatdi maidungse tuhoira paliu khuan kariojiu bamde. Haise naliuniu chiubo khuan siakge.
Tuhoira Solomon hai chawang thiu mide.

Nkiubora, ladjanky gu chakampaodungniu paliugu chakhuang thiubo hai Pakendibopiu Chawang David khuga pira ngutlujiu din-e, ‘Na-Rawang niu pijiu natu suang Solomon tu pazan tad nkiubo thiu milo, khatdi Solomon gu mawangboniu nagu mawangbo suang lungwi nkiubo thiumi sulo.’ Siga chawang David niu paziga makhumkiu kahumjiu
khatdi kakheng thiu-e, ‘Aliu
Siga Adonijah gu kiriumai hinase pingmide, khatdi paliu mai mathiuse sulujiu sibo bamtu saodiak lujiu, palam tam-tamjiu tadkam mide.
Adonijah niu Solomon tu pingchang pingmibo jengniu,

Adonijah niu chawang Solomon tu ping-e sigasu paniu rathakbam kese pamman lujiu bamme chiubo chawang Solomon khuga dinkhaiboga paniu din-e, “Raiboga, Chawang Solomon niu atu kamshat lakge chiu ladrian thiukhai ratu Iniu masen-e.”
Solomon niu paokakge, “Paniu kadin piusai, pagu tham-hiukeng khatnadi niakhai lakge; chiudi paniu kadin piumakge sai, pah shairabo-e.”
Adonijah tu rathakbam gasu kuwangra Chawang Solomon niu langkhai-e. Adonijah niu chawang khuga tadde khatdi pamasuangga makhum kiude, siga chawangniu pakhuga din-e, “Nang chakylam wangmibo sui-e.”
David niu shaimi rabo tingga, paniu panahpiu Solomon tu kulujiu pagu kanamthubo thiujiu pakhuga ladti khai bide.
“I shairabo wanse wangmide. Malumboga chap matip bamlo khatdi lungchun matip lulo,
sigasu na-Rawang,
Nangniu pagu kadin piusai, akai-akikdungniu pagu chamtanse majai mawijiu paliu lungchun nai paliu hiuna siniu malumjiu bamthen, paliuniu Israel maitu mawangjiu lungrabo-e chiujiu paniu dinkhaibose
Dekamralo chiubo nangniu sibamme; nangniu patu pijiu charashitga pi shai khai mak rabo-e.
Chiudi nangniu patu sajai pikhai makbo suimakge. Dekam ralo chiubo nangniu sibamme, patu kamshat mirabo-e chiubo nangniu phuijiu bamrabo-e.”
David shaimide sigasu David namdiga baikhaide.
Paniu Israel maigu chawang takum atai thiukhaijiu, Hebron ga takum chinnia sigasu Jerusalem ga takum samriu sum mawang khai-e.
Solomon niu papiu David bam malinjiu chawang thiu-e, khatdi pawangdih gu pumtanse kam matip mawi suikhaide.
Sigasu Haggith kubo puiniu lungbo, Adonijah niu Solomon pui, Bathsheba khuga tadde. Siga paniu maniu-e, “Haise chaka thiubogu thiujiu mengkin jiuma?”
Paniu paokakge, “Yo, kawibo gu-e,”
siga paniu dinsan-e, “Iniu nakhuga wakhatra maniu khai nibo-e.”
Paniu paokakge, “Sise degulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Iniu chawang thiurabo-e khatdi haise Israel mai hinaniu machunbo-e. Chiudi haise pajai katambo lamsu padmide, sichiujiu asingnapiuniu chawang thiumide, palamra sise
Siniu tuhoira Iniu wakhat khengra bamme; lungsajiu suimakbo thiukhai tulo.”
“Sise degulo? “ chiujiu Bathsheba niu maniu-e.
Paniu paokakge, “Wichang wi-e. Iniu naleng chawang khuga maniu khai bine.”

Haichiujiu Bathsheba niu Adonijah malin ga chawangtu npaora tadde. Chawangniu papuitu kahumra suchapde khatdi pakhuga makhumkiu-e, sigasu paniu pawangbamga ntao lujiu papuitu paben majatlam ntaora chabam ponpad khaibi-e.
Paniu din-e “Iniu nagu nkha poinakhatu lunijiu khengne; chalungsajiu atu suikhai makbo thiukhai tulo.”
Paniu maniu-e, “Apui yo, sise degulo? Iniu natu suimakbo thiulakge.”
Papuiniu paokakge, “Nasingnapiu Adonijah nao thiura Abishag tu kamkhai bikhe.”

Chawangniu maniu-e, “Nangniu dekamjiu Abishag tu paleng pira kheng jiulo? Chawangbam sidi paleng pira nangniu khengbo sui-e. Wakhat-khat bamliudi pahai achi-e, khatdi singku Abiathar nai Joab niu palam chapjiu bambo-e!”
Sigasu Solomon niu

niu atu pijiu apiu, David gu chawang bamga kam matip khaibi-e; paniu pagu ladrian majai khaibi-e, sigasu chawang kadihse akhuga khatdi akai-akikdung khuga pikhai bide. Thainai siak Adonijah shairabo-e chiujiu ringjiu bambo
Haichiujiu Chawang Solomon niu Benaiah khuga chamtan piboga, paniu tadpad Adonijah tu kamshat mide.
Sigasu Chawang Solomon niu singku Abiathar khuga din-e, “Nadih-naram Anathoth lam wangmilo. Nang shaibui-e, chiudi tuhoi Iniu natu kamshat lakge, palamra nangniu
Sichiujiu Solomon niu Abiathar tu
Degu padmi gulo chiubose Joab niu chiulude. (Paniu Absalom lam chap makjiu, Adonijah lam chapkhai mibo-e). Haijengniu paniu

Joab niu Mathenky lungga pakkhai lujiu khatdi rathakbam mungga bamme chiubo chamse Chawang Solomon khuga dinwangboga, dekamjiu paniu rathakbamga, pakkhai jiulo chiubo Joab khuga maniura Solomon niu pawalangmai khattu langkhaide. Joab niu paokakge chiubora paniu
Paniu
“Makge,” chiujiu Joab niu paokakge. “I haiga shai rabo-e.” Siga Benaiah niu chawang khuga tadlan lujiu Joab niu dinbose paokhaide.

“Joab niu dinbose kamkhai bilo,” chiujiu Solomon niu paokak khaide. “Patu gimilo khatdi nphum milo. Sichiujiu Iniu maksai kakibo David kai-kik mainiu tadi Joab niu pakhui-pamao habo maidungtu kamshat mibogu paridse phunglan tami rabo-e.
Apiu David chun maniu makjiu Joab niu maitu gi-dangjiu kamaobo tien thiukhai mibo jengniu Joab tu
Panaitu kamshat mibogu sajaise Joab nai pakai-pakikdung riga tingthengjiu wangrabo-e. Chiudi
Haijengniu
Chawang niu Joab bamga riphen maigu munranpiu Benaiah tu khatdi Abiathar bamga, singku Zadok tu malin khai mide.
Sigasu chawangniu Shimei khuga langkhaijiu pakhuga din-e, “Jerusalem haiga naky leng thiulo. Siga lunglo khatdi sibo namditu phutmi mane.
Nangniu wakamjiu phutlujiu khatdi Kidron giuky tad maju misai, nang maomakjiu shairabo-e--khatdi haise naronna natu kamaobo leng lukhai rabo-e.”
“Wichang wide, Pakendibopiu yo,” chiujiu Shimei niu paokakge, “Nangniu dinbose Iniu kamne.” Haijengniu pah Jerusalem lungga pating thengjiu lung khaide.
Takum sum sailam, Shimei vangpiu kanianiu Gath wangpiu, Maakah nahpiu Akhish khulam pakkhai mide. Panaise Gath ga bamme chiubose Shimei niu chiuluboga,
paniu pagu qonniam tuanglujiu pavang kaniatu phiura, Gath ga bambo chawang Akhish khuga tadde. Paniu panaitu daolude khatdi chakylam panaitu puiwang lande.
Shimei niu kam khaimibose Solomon niu chiuluboga,
paniu pakhuga langkhaijiu din-e, “Jerusalem phut makra Iniu
Chiu-e sai, dekamjiu nagu ladrianse kampang lujiu agu chamtantu piumak jiulo?
Nangniu apiu David khuga kamaobo kamkhai mibo pakhiangnase simasan bamme. Siboleng
Chiudi paniu atu thoikhaine khatdi paniu David wangdihtu pijiu tingthengjeng tankhai birabo-e.”
Sigasu chawangniu Benaiah khuga chamtan pikhaiboga, paniu padlujiu Shimei tu gimide. Solomon niu tuhoira wahina thinman kam mide.

Solomon niu Egypt wangpiu nahpuitu panaoleng kulujiu Egypt wangpiutu akao mide. Paniu panaotu David Namdiga puiwang lujiu, pagu chawangkining, Charaky, sigasu Jerusalem thiu magui bambo kareng paniu thiuloi makthenna siga lung-e.
leng charaky thiulu makha-e, haijengniu maidungniu tam-tambo rathakbamga rathak maniadung kadkhaijiu bambo-e
Solomon niu
Nkiubo tingmik khatga paniu rathak maniadung kadkhai raleng Gibeon ga tadde, palamra sibo bamse parathiu thubo rathakbam thiubamdi-e. Karaiga paniu sibo bamga rathak mania kai-kai rujiu kadkhaide.
Sibo nai nchun pamanglam

Solomon niu paokakge, “Nangniu pawan machang navangpiu, apiu David tu, nagu kadibo lungsiat lenkhai-e, khatdi pahai nakhuga palung masanjiu, kadin piubo khatdi kawibo mai, thiubamdi-e. Sichiujiu nangniu nagu kadibo nai saomakbo lungsiat pakhuga lenjutjiu pakhuga panahpiu khat pikhaijiu, paniu thainai papiu bamga mawangjiu bambo-e.
Oh
Nangniu namai thiura kada lubo maidung, chamai kengju mijiu pariak chakngam lulakbo maidung ruangga I hai bamme.
Siniu namaidungtu majiboniu mawang lura khatdi kawibo nai kasabo sitam lurabo ningtingse akhuga pikhailo chiumakge sai, namaidung haijiukhatu Iniu dechiujiu mawang ngamlu ralo?”
Solomon niu haise khengboga
sijengniu, paniu pakhuga din-e, “Nang ringthengra maksai kalek wira maksai nagu mikre maidung shaira khengrabo sung, nangniu majijiu mawangra ningting khengbo jengniu,
nangniu khengbose Iniu kamkhai birabo-e. Mai khatniudi tadmibo chaken gadi, sigasu wanglan rabo ken gadi daolu makbo, nkiubo tasi nai ningtingse Iniu nakhuga pikhaibi rabo-e.
Nangniu kheng makbodi Iniu nakhuga pikhai bine: Nangniu karingthen naleng chakhiu-chalan khatdi chakhuang thiubo, chawang khatniudi wadaodi daolu makbose pikhai bine.
Khatdi nangniu agu kadin piujiu khatdi agu tacheng-tajai nai agu chamtandungse, napiu David niu majaibo kumjiu majaisai, Iniu naringtingdi pi thengkhai birabo-e.”
Solomon niu raksujiu khatdi Tingwang niu patu pamang lamsu npao khaide chiubose maningtao mide. Sigasu paniu Jerusalem lam tadmide khatdi
Naikhatra papum kajonbopui khangnia Chawang Solomon khuga panai pumsiak pamasuangga wangjiu chapde.
Panai ruanggasu khang khatniu din-e, “Pakendibopiu yo, I nai haibo puise chaky khat lungga lungbo-e, khatdi paniu siga bamboga Iniu npiumainah khat lung khaide.
Anahtu lunglubo jengnia sailam padi npiumainah khat lungde. Sibo kilungga anai ronna bambo-e, mai khatnadi siga bam makge.
Siga naikhat nchun paniu mao-mengjiu panah riga kalawang pasiu kapmaha mijiu shai mide.
Nchun pah buangsu lujiu, Iniu jitjing miboga anah situ ponlujiu wang paziga ponwang maji khai mide; khatdi kashaibo nah situ paniu aziga ponwang maji khai diakge.
Pasaibo nai nsuan, Iniu buangsu lujiu khatdi anahtu ntup khaira wangboga, ngenase shaijiu bamdibo Iniu ngaode. Iniu sisetu phuiminjiu phuiboga sise anah makdi-e.”
Chiudi khatbo puiniu din-e, “Makge! Ringjiu bambo ngenase anah-e, khatdi shaimibose na-nah-e!”
Karaibo pui siniu paokakge, “Makge! Shaimibo nahse na-nah-e, khatdi ringjiu bambose anah-e!”
Haichiujiu panai khangniase chawang masuangga ari sude.
Siga Chawang Solomon niu din-e, “Nanai khangnianiu ringjiu bambo nahse anah-e, anah-e chiujiu asut bamme khatdi shaimibo nahse nanah-e—nanah-e chiujiu din bamme.”
Chaheng khat ponwang raleng paniu langkhaide, sichiujiu sise ponwangboga,
paniu din-e, “Ngena haitu nia thiujiu dangbiang milo sichiujiu maipui kania lengse paphan-phan pimilo.”
Papui siakbo siniu, panahtu palung chunniu lungsaboniu phuilujiu, chawang khuga din-e, “Pakendibo piuniu suikhai-e sai, ngena situ kamshat tulo! Pakhuga pikhaimi talo!”
Chiudi khatbo puiniu din-e, “Ngenase anai khangkhat tudi khangkhat tudi pimane; nangniu maningbose kamsulo sichiujiu dangbiang milo.”
Siga Solomon niu din-e, “Ngena situ kamshat tulo! Karaibo puitu pimilo—pahai papui siakge.”
Solomon gu ladjanse Israel maidungniu chiuluboga, paliu mathiu patu chakhuang thiuchang thiumide, palamra Tingwang niu pakhuga majibo ladjan thiura ningting pikhaibo-e chiubose paliuniu simide.
Solomon hai Israel mai mathiugu chawang-e,
sichiujiu pagu kadibo chakampaodung sira:
Singku siniu: Zadok nahpiu Azariah
Ladjankygu machunrao kaniase siniu: Shisha nahpiu kania Elihoreph nai Ahijah
charao khuangdung phuibo siniu: Ahilud nahpiu Jehoshaphat
Riphenmaigu munranpiu siniu: Jehoida nahpiu Benaiah
Singku kania siniu: Zadok nai Abiathar
Luongrianggu dihthinpao siniu: Nathan nahpiu Azariah
Chawangky gu ladtipao siniu: Nathan nahpiu Singku Zabud
Chawangkininggu kavangmaitu phuibo siniu: Ahishar
Tatien thiumaidungtu phuibo siniu: Abda nahpiu Adoniram

Solomon niu chamai khang kariu-je-niatu Israel maigu dihthinpaodung thiura kadakhai bide. Paliuniu paliugu luongriang gasu katiu-kasak chawang leng khatdi pakikhun maileng npiumai khat-khatniu chawangleng khatdi pakikhun maileng npiumai khat-khatniu takum khat lungga chahiu khat-khatleng parid phungra pikhai-e.
Pahangga bambo zandungse haibo katheng-kadibo khang kariu-je-niakiu si-e khatdi paliuniu phuijiu bambo luongriangdung si-e:
Benhur: Ephraim gu maluang ram
Bendeker: Makaz gu namdidung, Shaalbim,
Beth Shemesh, Elon, khatdi Beth Hanan
Benhesed: Arubboth nai Socoh gu namdidung
khatdi Hepher luongriang pakhiangna
Benabinadab, Solomon nahpui Taphath tu panaoleng kubopiu siniu: Dor luongriang pakhiangna
Ahilud nahpiu Baana niu: Taanach, Magiddo gu namdidung,
khatdi Beth Shean mungga bambo,
Zarethan namdak mungga bambo,
Jezreel namdak gu duimilam,
Abel Meholah nai Jokmeam gu namdi tangboga
bambo luongriang pakhiangna
Bengeber: Gilead ga bambo Ramoth namdi,
khatdi Manasseh kaikik, Jair kiphiu gu Gilead ga bambo namdakdung,
khatdi Bashan ga bambo Argob luongriang,
sigasu rengmundungse tataagi tangniu kamkhaibo
khatdi kareng thiu mawikhaibo
namdak kadibo pakhiangna riak charuk haisi-e.
Iddo nahpiu Ahinadab: Mahanaim luongriang
Ahimaaz, kakibo Solomon nahpui Basemath tu panao leng kubopiu: Naphtali luongriang
Hushai nahpiu Baana:
Asher luongriang khatdi Bealoth namdak
Paruah nahpiu Jehoshaphat: Issachar luongriang
Ela nahpiu Shimei: Benjamin luongriang
Uri nahpiu Geber: Amor mai wangpiu Sihon
khatdi Bashan wangpiu Og niu mawang bamdibo Gilead luongriang
haibo kariu-je niatu chakmakjiu, charam pakhiangna riga dihthinpao khat bamme.
Judah mai nai Israel mai hai duipuigu chaphuga bambo nbuiniang kumjiu kengchang kengmide; paliu tiu-e khatdi sakge, sichiujiu amanjiu lung-e.

Solomon gu chawang dihse Euphrate giu gasu Philistia tangbo khatdi Egypt maigu ramrai tangbo lungga bambo jatdung pakhiangna si-e. Paliuniu paliugu ramkha pakhuga pi-e, sigasu paniu karingthen pamaidung thiujiu bambo-e.
Naikhatgu thiujiu Solomon leng pirabose takhui kawibo madadpiang sang-mangiu khatdi chaban madadpiang sang kariu;
matom-kabuiky kariu, patatek wijiu pamai wibo matom-kabui khatdi mily kai, tathan, chakheng poi, nkan-kaniudung, khatdi maruibum pikhai san rabo-e.

Euphrate giuki gu tingnulam bambo kadih pakhiangna, Euphrate riga bambo Tiphsah gasu, Gaza namdi gu tingnulam bambo pakhiangna riga Solomon niu mawang-e. Euphrate gu tingnulam bambo chawang hinase pahangga bamkamme, sigasu paniu pagu namda maitu kawi thiu kamme.
Paniu karingthen, Judah mai nai Israel mai hina amanjiu, kikhun hinaniu pagu-gu mumsireng khatdi n-dutsibang bamjiu manang makjiu lung-e.

Pagu dihthinpao kariu-je-niakiuse chahiu khat-khatleng thiujiu khangkhat-khatniu chawang Solomon gu kikhun leng khatdi pagu chawangkiningga tiujiu bambo maidung pakhiangna leng katiu-kasak kabuibo pirabo-e; pageng bambo hina pawan machangna paliuniu pi-e.
Dihthinpao hinaniudi pageng bambo bam hinaga paliugu thiupen nai magaoreng, chaqon-kari jubo qondung nai changam kambo khaoruidung leng pi-e.
Tingwang niu Solomon khuga tasi khatdi ningting, mainiu singam lakbo kasukbo lungchunse pikhai bi-e.
Solomon hai naimik padlam ningting maidung maksai Egypt gu ningting maidung suangdi ningting nkiu-e.
Pahai mai mathiu suang ningting nkiu-e: Ezrah maipiu Ethan, khatdi Heman, Calcol, sigasu Darda, Mahol nahpiudung suang ningting nkiu-e, khatdi pagu namda hinaga pagu kendi hai tadchia kamme.
Paniu kadincham sang sum sigasu chalui sang khat suang kengjiu masing khai-e.

Paniu Lebanon cedar bang gasu karengga puak subo chahubang tangbo, tasingbang nai chapiubang lamga dinkhai-e; paniu khaorui-khaonadung, thingnadung, paganiu tonjiu tadbo wakhaodung, khatdi chakha lamga dinkhai-e.
Kadihpiri pabam machangnaga chawangdungniu pagu ningting chiukamme, sichiujiu pachamtu nkingra maidungtu pakhuga langkhai-e.

Tyre wangpiu Hiram niu pawan machangnaga David gu chaka thiujiu lungwang mibo-e, khatdi Solomon niu chawang thiujiu, paniu David bam malin mide chiubo paniu chiuluboga paniu pakhuga dihsungpaodungtu langkhaide.
Siga Solomon niu haibo chamse Hiram khuga langkhai lande:
“Nangniu si-e chiubora chari kengbo jengniu apiu David niu pagu mikremainiu lungmaguijiu bambo hinatu aphenbo jengniu, charise ngamra
Chiudi tuhoira
niu apiu David khuga ladriat thiukhai-e, ‘Nanahpiu, nasailam Iniu pijiu chawang thiukhai rabopiu siniu, aleng charaky thiukhai rabo-e.’ Sichiujiu Iniu tuhoira

Haijengniu aleng cedarsing huikhai raleng namaidungtu Lebanon ga langkhailo. Amaidungniu paliutu maluang lujiu changam kamne, khatdi namaidung lengra nangniu chapkhai khaibose pikhai rabo-e. Nangniu simawi bambo kumjiu, amaidungra namaidung kumjiu singbang huisi makge.”
Solomon chamse Hiram niu daoluboga pachun wichang wimide, khatdi paniu din-e, “David bam malinjiu kadibo jatgu chawang thiura ningtingbo nahpiu David leng pikhaibibo jengniu
Sigasu pahangga bambo chamse Hiram niu Solomon khuga langkhai-e: “Nachamse Iniu daolude khatdi nangniu khengbose Iniu kamkhaira kadenjiu bamme. Iniu cedarsing nai kahiusing pikhai birabo-e.

Amaidungniu singpumdungse Lebanon gasu duipuiga jukiu lujiu, sigasu rampung genlam ponwangra khatdi nangniu masenbo bamga phanman kabao lujiu maten kiura sise kamkhai bine. Sise amaidungniu khirabo-e, khatdi namaidungniu sise phui rabo-e. Nakhu lamsu, amaidung leng katiu-kasak pikhai bira Iniu masenne.”
Sichiujiu Hiram niu Solomon leng cedarsing nai kahiusing pakhiangna paniu lukani then pikhai bide,
khatdi Solomon niu Hiram leng chabanmiu bawli
Chawang Solomon niu tatien thiuramai 30,000 tu Israel ram pakhiangna gasu kadapad lujiu,

paliutu phuira Adoniram tu khaibide. Paniu paliutu chamai 10,000 gu baosum thiujiu n-janpad khaide, khatdi pabao hina, Lebanon ga chahiu khat bam khailujiu sigasu chahiu nianiu paliu kylam wangbam bamme.
Solomon niu chamai 80,000 tu ramluonglam khailujiu, tatu phanglujiu, sise ponra chamai 70,000 khai-e,
khatdi paniu sibo maidungtu phuira khatdi changamse phuikhaira chamai 3,300 khaide.
Chawang Solomon gu chamtan saisuijiu paliuniu tatu kawibo khatdi kadibo phanglujiu Charaky phungleng kamsude.
Solomon nai Hiram gu changam kammaidung sigasu Byblos namdi gasu maidungtu pijiu tatu khatdi tasing macha lujiu Charaky thiura kamsude.
Israel mainiu Egypt phutmibo takum kai-madai-je riak-tachat sailam, Solomon niu Israel mai riga mawangbo takum pa-madaibogu niabo hiu, Ziv hiuga Solomon niu Charaky ngamse thinsude.
Palung lamse gaphek 27 theng-e, gaphek 9 di-e, khatdi gaphek 13.5 ku-e.
Ngutrabo kichense gaphek 4.5 suk-e, khatdi gaphek 9 di-e, masanbo bam det kumjiu di-e.
Charaky gu kibengse lepadrabo kirandung leng palung lamsuang lenlam paki abing nkiujiu kamkhai-e.
Charaky sailam khatdi lenlamgu kibeng tun-ga, chaky pasat sum thiu taman khai bamme, sibo sat hinase gaphek 2.2 di-e.

N-hang kachangbo sat lungga kichen hinaniu gaphek 2.2 di-e, n-gangbo sat lung siniu gaphek 2.7 di-e. Charaky singbeng satkhat suang satkhatniu n-hangbo suang apiubi khangrabo-e, sichiujiu kichen hinase npang khaimakjiu singbengga mangiu khai suira leng-e.
Charaky tuse tatu phangbo gasu machapadbo-e, chiusai charaky thiujiu bamboga, kadiak, mari maksai kakibo chagipek khuanse chiupadmak raleng-e.
Thiu taman khaibambo nhang thubo satse Charakygu n-hangbo jai niabo nai pasumbo satga khangrabo tason kamkhai bamme.
Sichiu Chawang Solomon niu Charakyse thiuloi khaide. Paniu nsing hai cedar singpek nai singpum kamkhai-e.
Pasat sum thiu taman khaibo ky, sat hinase gaphek 2.2 kujiu charaky ndanggu singbeng tun-ga thiukhaijiu, khatdi haidungtu cedar singpumniu mathuk khai-e.
“Nangniu agu tacheng-tajai nai agu chamtanse majaisai, Iniu napiu David khuga ladriat thiukhai mibose Iniu naleng kamkhai rabo-e.
Nangniu thiukhaibo, haibo Rakyga amai Israel maidung ruangga I lung rabo-e, khatdi Iniu wadaodi paliutu phut khai lakge.”
Sichiujiu Solomon niu Charaky se thiuloi khaide.
Palunglam bambo singbengse cedar singpekniu kadih gasu nsing tangbo topkhai-e, khatdi kadihgu chakaise kahiusingniu kamkhai-e.
Lungsinggu kichen, Masan Thubo Bam kubose, charaky sailam thiukhai-e. Sise gaphek chakiu theng-e khatdi sisetu cedar singpekniu kadih gasu nsing tangbo bengtam khai-e.
Masan Thubo Bam masuangga bambo kichen hai gaphek kariu-je tachat theng-e.
Cedar sing singpekdungse ruilujiu wameng nai charapen mengniu karu khai-e; palung pakhiangnaga cedar singpekniu topkhai-e, sichiujiu kibenggu tatudung tuse ngaopad mak raleng-e.
Charaky sailam lungsinggu kichen thiukhai lujiu, siga
Haibo lungsinggu kichen hai gaphek chakiu theng-e, gaphek chakiu di-e, khatdi gaphek chakiu ku-e, pakhiangnase masanbo kachianiu topkhai-e. Rathakbam situ cedar singpekniu topkhai-e.
Charaky lungse kachianiu topnam khai-e, khatdi palunggu kichen kamun gase kachiagi riangniu gingkhai-e, sisedi kachia giniu topnam khai-e.
Charaky lung pakhiangnase khatdi Masan Thubo Bam lungga bambo rathakbam haidi kachia giniu topnam khai-e.
Niase kadi-kati khatdi pajai-palunse ncham kamme. Khat-khatse gaphek 2.2 theng-e, chiujiu pakan ton khat gasu khatbo kanton kakse gaphek 4.4 diu-e.
Haise Masan Thubo Bam munggu pake nialam khai nda bamme, sichiujiu nkhung padbo pakan ton niase khatniu khattu kichen n-gang lannaga niatang bamme, khatdi kakibo pakan nia siniu kibeng niatang bamme.
Pakan nia phungbo khaoringse kachia giniu makom nam khai-e.
Para thiubo kichen nai palunglam kichen gu kibeng pakhiangnase pakan phungbo khaoring meng, kadanbang khatdi charapenniu karu khai-e.
Paham sidi kachia giniu makom khai bamme.
Takisingniu kamlubo akham lim niase Masan Thubo Bam gu kamun gase bamme; nkhampi gase machumbo wameng kamkhai bamme.
Akhamdungse pakan phungbo khaoring meng, kadanbang khatdi charapen mengniu karu khai bamme. Akhamdungse, pakan phungbo khaoring, khatdi kadan bangdungse kachia giniu topnam nbamme.
Parathiubo kichen ga ngutrabo akhamkhu madaise takisingniu kamkhai-e.
Kahiusingniu kampadbo kadip suibo akham nia bamme
khatdi sise pakan phungbo khaoring, kadan bangdung, khatdi charapen niu karukhai bamme, sisedi kachianiu topnam khai bamme.
Palung lamgu ladjankyse Charaky masuangga thiukhai bamme, kibeng situ thiu tamanjiu cedar sing pumniu pasat sum hina riga kamkhai bamme.
Solomon niu mawangbo tingkum pamadaibo kumgu niabo hiu, Ziv hiuga Charaky phungse donsude.
Solomon niu mawangbo takum kariu-je-khat, chahiu tachadbo hiu, Bul hiuga, rangsu khaimibo kumgapjiu, Charaky se thiuloi mide. Sise Solomon niu takum chinnia ngutjiu thiukhaibo-e.
Solomon niu paleng chawangkining thiukhaide, khatdi sise paniu thiuboga takum kariusum ngutle.
Lebanon lungga bambo Mariuky kadibo
Singbeng jainia lamse kirandungniu paren sum thiujiu kamkhai-e.
Akham nai kiran hai pakhu madai thiujiu kam khai-e, khatdi kibeng hinagu kiran ren sumse muntong kamna-e.
Kidi gu chenkhat hai gaphek 22 thengbo khatdi gaphek 13.5 dibo thiukhai bamme. Kathengbo kahiu thiukhaibose katiangniu tungman bamme.
Chawangbamgu Kichen, Ladjanky chiujiudi kubo, Solomon niu tathu tiabo bamse kadih gasu nsing tangbo cedar singniu kapiupek thiujiu kamkhai-e.

Haibo kydung pakhiangnase khatdi kadibo ladjanky hai tatu wichang wiboniu kaphung gasu kibeng ton tangbo thiukhai-e. Tatudungse phangbo pabam gasu macha padbo-e khatdi tatu phangbo gitangniu palung nai palen madadlujiu phang padbo-e.
Tatu phangbo bamgasu macha padlubo tatu kadibo siniu kaphungse donkhai-e, tatu kasianiu gaphek sum paphan theng-e khatdi kasianiu gaphek madai theng-e.
Haibo riga kakibo tukangdi, madad lujiu phangpad mibo, khatdi cedar sing pumdung bamme.
Chawangkininggu ladjanky, Charaky lungga ladjanky, khatdi Charaky ngutrabo kichen hai tatuniu dungkhaibo rensum hina riga cedar singpum bam kamme.
Tyre namdiga lungbambo tataagi ngamga pasiam wibo mai khat pazanniu Huram kubo piutu kuwang raleng Chawang Solomon niu langkhai-e.

Papiuse shaimibo-e, Tyre gasu-e, sigasu pahai tataagi ngamga pasiam wibo piu khatdi papui hai Naphtali kiphiu gasu-e. Huram hai wasi majatbo khatdi paben siam wiboga pating thengjiu kam wangmibo mai-e. Chawang Solomon niu patu tataagi tien pakhiangnaga phuikhaira kukhaiboga suikhaide.
Huram niu tataagi gasu katiang nia kampadle, khat khat siniu gaphek tachat theng-e khatdi padetniu gaphek mangiu suang di-e, khatdi sise charaky ngutrabo kamun gase machap khai-e.
Paniu tataagigu akhampi niadi kamme, akhampi khat khatniu gaphek 2.2 ku-e, sise akhamtiang ton ga khai rabo leng-e.
Haibo tiang ton hinase chagiriang tariluboniu,
khatdi tataaginiu kampadbo majongsy lunniu ren nia thiujiu karu khai-e.
Akhampi lunse nkinpen kumme, pakodniu gaphek 1.8 ku-e,
khatdi haise mawengbo sat, chagi kuiriang meng riga khai-e. Akhampi kamaguiga majongsy lun kai nianiu paren nia kam khai-e.
Huram niu haibo tataagi tiangse Charaky ngutrabo kamun masuangga kamkhai-e; parunlam bambo situ Jachin
Nkinpen lun kumjiu tataaginiu kamkhaibo akhampise katiang riga kamkhai-e.
Haichiujiu katiang ngamse kamloi khaide.
Huram niu tataaginiu mawengluibo akhun, gaphek 2.2 sukbo, gaphek 4.4 kubo, khatdi gaphek 13.2 dibo khat kam khai-e.
Mawengluibo akhun lenlamse pawongcheng katang tataagigu marao lunniu giak magui khai nbamme.
Akhun riga matomchi kariu-je-niakiu meng dungkhai bamme, matomchi sum-sum njanpad lujiu kadih pake madailam paliu zuse marikhai lujiu bambo-e.
Akhun siu hai tachao sum siu-e. Pawongchengse chapiang wongcheng kumme, nkinpen kumjiu lenlam nkuon khai-e. Akhunse tadui lah sang madai kumbo ngutle.
Huram niu tataaginiu kari kariu kampadle; khat khatse gaphek 1.8 theng-e, gaphek 1.8 di-e, khatdi gaphek 1.3 ku-e.
Haise paphi kamkhai lujiu pakandungniu juman khai-e,
paphi rigase ndongqui, matomchi, khatdi pakan phungbo khaoring lunse dungkhai-e; sigasu pakan riga khatdi pakan hangga bambo ndongqui nai matomchi lunse ntao nbung bambo lun ga kamkhai-e.
Kari hinase tataaginiu kambo paphise chagi pekniu ratman khai nbamme. Pake madaiga tadui jubung masengra tataaginiu kambo waguak bamme. Waguakse mathakbo ga nbungbo aliga karukhai-e.

Haibo lunse mawenglui-e sigasu pamun gase chabenniu kario ngut lujiu kamkhaibo charapen bang wajiuga bamme. Haise kari gasu tachao nia kukhang-e khatdi kari lunglam tachao khat nguttang makge, Sise palunglam nkuon roi-roiboniu kam magui khai bamme.
Paphise tachao nia ku-e; sise chagipekniu ratman khaibo kumjiu ngaopadle, paphiga chagitang kathengbo khat-khat ratman khailujiu kariga khat thiujiu kam khaibo-e.
Paphise chaqon-kari-phi kumme; pakuise, parangse, paphi kang, khatdi paphibut hina tataaginiu kam khaibo-e.
Karigu pake hinatu tungmanra chagipek madai khailujiu siseniu khat thiujiu kamkhai-e.
Kari riga chamibung dungraleng wadung tachao khat kubo kamkhai bamme; sisetu tungmanbo maniadungse khatdi pake pekdungse kari pumga khat thiujiu thiu taman khai-e.
Kari gase khatdi pake pekse pakan phungbo khaoring, ndongqui, khatdi kadanbang lunniu, maruangbo bam hinaga karu magui khai-e.
