Haichiujiu, karise haibo jaiga machapadbo-e; pakhiangnase macham kamme, kadi-kati khatdi palun ncham kamme.
Paniu kari mangiuse charaky runlam, khatdi kakibo mangiuse papeelam khai bamme; akhunse tingbang nai tingrun lam kamikga dungkhai-e.
Huram niu chali, karathuak, khatdi chakuang-chapiang kampadle. Paniu pangam pakhiangnase chawang Solomon leng
Mikhutki-tiang kadibo nia
Mikhutki-tiang ton ga khaibo
chapiang lun kumbo khamten nia
khamten hina riga wariang tarikhaibo meng
Tataaginiu kambo majongsy kai madai,
kai khat khatniu ren nia thiujiu,
sibo lungga khamten hina riga kam magui khaibo Kari Kariu,
Tadui jubung kariu,
Akhun
Matomchi kariu-je-nianiu akhuntu pon bambo
Chali, karathuak khatdi chakuang-chapiang.
Charaky leng mania pakhiangnase Huram niu Solomon leng kampadbose tataaginiu kamlik-lik khai kamme.
Chawangniu hai pakhiangnase Jordan Ramjeng lungga Sukkoth nai Zarethan kakga bambo chagi aketbo bamgasu macha padbo-e.
Solomon niu haibo tataagigu maniadungse madat makge, palamra haise kengchang keng-e, sijengniu haibo ridse wadaodi chakkhai makge.
Masan Thubo Bam masuangga chamibung dungkhai rabo padung, mangiuniu nrilam khatdi mangiuniu n-hanglam; charapen, chamibung, sigasu tajubung;

chapiang, chamibung kom, parim wibo mataorabo kuang, khatdi chami thuakkuang, Masan Thubo Bam ga khaibo akhamgu khamten Charaky lenlam bambo akhamgu khamten, haibo mania hinase kachia giniu kam lik-lik khai-e.
Paliuniu Gomlubo-Ngee, pachinniabo hiu Ethanim ga maduide.
Jupaodung hina madui lubo tingga, singkudungniu Chamriat Bungse ponsu lujiu,
Charakyga ponwang khaide, sigasu Levi maidung nai singku maidungniu
Chawang Solomon khatdi Israel mai mathiuniu Chamriat Bung masuangga madui lujiu, matom-kabui pariak singam lakbo charathiu khaide.
Sigasu singkudungniu Chamriat Bungse Charakyga ponwangjiu sise Masan Thubo Bam wakhaomeng hangga khaide.
Paliugu kariopadbo kan siniu wabungtu khatdi kaponbo pekse topsin khaide.
Mai khatniu Masan Thubo Bam masuang siakga chaplujiu phuisai kaponbo tupek kese ngao-e. Chiudi kakibo bam gasu phuisai ngaomakge. (Patangse nthai katang siga bamkha-e).
Sibo Chamriat Bung se Israel maidungniu Egypt gasu npadbo lon Sinai Luong ga
gu ran-ranbo nbiu siniu thaokhaiboga, paliu malanwang paliu tien thiusilak mide.
Sigasu Solomon niu kakheng thiu-e:
chiudi kamuang nai tamiuboga nang lungra kada mibo-e.
Tuhoira Iniu naleng paken kadibo ky thiukhaijiu
nangniu tingtheng lungrabo bam kamkhai bamme.”
Siga maidungniu chapbamboga Chawang Solomon niu paliu khuga mariwang lujiu, Tingwang niu paliutu thoidam pikhai raleng paniu kheng-e.
Paniu din-e, “Israel mai Rawang

‘Iniu Egypt gasu amaidungtu majang npadbo nai gasu, atu kahumrabo charaky thiuraleng Iniu Israel mai namdi khat gadi pabam kadakhai makge. Chiudi David nangniu amaidung riga mawang raleng Iniu natu kadalubo-e.’”
chiudi
chiudi nangniu sise wadaodi thiusi lakge. Sise nanahpiu siakniu arakyse thiurabo-e.’
“Sichiujiu tuhoira
Aliu pao-pehtu
Sigasu Solomon niu maidung bambo gasu tadngut lujiu rathakbam masuangga chaplujiu, paben henpad lujiu
kakheng thiu sude, “Israel mai Rawang,
Nangniu apiu David khuga ladriat khai mibose kalimakjiu tuhoi naladkeng hinase wangtang khaide.
Khatdi tuhoira, Israel mai Rawang,
Siniu tuhoira, Israel mai Rawang yo, navang apiu David khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo hina pijiu wangtang khailo.
Tingwang yo, I hai navang-e. Arathoi nking khailo, khatdi thainai Iniu nakhuga khengbose pikhai khelo.
Haibo bamse natu kahumrabo bam thiuraleng nangniu kadakhai mibo bamme: nsuan, n-nien haibo Raky tu khuankhailo. Iniu haibo Rakyga azu marilujiu kakheng thiuboga nking khailo.
Iniu khatdi amaidungniu haibo bamga aliu-zu marilujiu kakhengboga chiukhailo. Naky tinggen ga aliugu rathoi chiukhaijiu aliu nuan kuak khailo.
“Mai khattu kamao madam khaijiu haibo Raky rathakbamga pahai pamao habo mai-e chiujiu ladriat thiu raleng wangbo wan ga,
yo, tinggen lamsu nking khailo khatdi navangmaitu ladjan thiukhailo. Kamaobo piutu paniu kamkhai mibo saisuijiu sajai pikhailo, khatdi majibo piutu majijiu pikhailo.
“Namai Israel maidungniu natu suimakjiu nuan tenbo gasu paliugu mikremainiu paliutu ngamlubo wan ga khatdi paliuniu lungli lujiu haibo Rakyga, manonkiu lujiu nakhuga kuak khai raleng khengbo wan ga,
tinggen gasu paliu khuan nking khailo. Namaidung nuan kuak khailo, khatdi nangniu paliu pao-peh khuga pikhai mibo kadihga majang wang khailo.

“Namaidungniu natu atungjiu nuan kammibo jeng gasu nangniu pi tingriu khai tamibo wan ga, sigasu paliuniu lungli lujiu haibo Rakyga mariwang, manonkiu lujiu nakhuga kakheng thiubo wan ga, tinggen lamsu paliu khuan nking khailo.
Israel maidung nai chawanggu nuan kuak khailo. Paliuniu majibo kamraleng katikhailo. Sigasu, Oh

“Haibo kadihga chakhum wangboga, maksai chararen wangboga, maksai tingthung tingkainiu, maksai takaoniu chamiu kam masa miboga, maksai namaidungtu paliugu mikre maidungniu aphenboga, maksai mara-sathiubo padboga, maksai paliu ruangga chararen padboga,
paliugu khengbo rathoi chiukhailo. Namai Israel mai khat kumboniu, paliu lung chariujiu, paliu ben henpad lujiu haibo Rakyga kakheng thiusai,
paliu rathoi chiukhailo. Paliu mao kuak khailo, khatdi paliutu nkha khailo. Nang ronna chamainagu lungchun sibo-e, mai hinatu paniu kammibo saisuijiu kamkhaibo-e,
sichiujiu paliu pao-pehtu nangniu pikhaibo kadihga paliuniu lungjiu nalad piuraleng nangniu kamkhailo.
“Kadiubo ramga lungbo sangdiumainiu nagu kenditu chiujiu, khatdi nangniu namaidung leng changam kadi kamkhaibo jenggasu natu kahumra khatdi haibo Rakyga kakheng thiura wangbo wan ga,

paliu rathoi nking khailo, Nangniu bambo, tinggen gasu, paliu khuan chiukhaijiu, paliuniu nakhuga kamkhai raleng khengbose kamkhai bilo, sichiusai namaidungniu kambo kumjiu kadihpiriga bambo jat hinaniu, natu sijiu nalad piurabo-e, sibo wan ga paliuniu haibo Iniu thiukhaibo Raky haise natu kahumbo bamme chiubo silu raleng-e.

“Nangniu namaidungtu paliugu mikremaitu atungjiu charithiu raleng tadpadra chamtan piboga, paliuniu tadkhaibo bam hinaga, nangniu kada khaibo namdi nai Iniu naleng thiukhaibo Raky lam marilujiu paliuniu nakhuga kakheng thiubo tingga, paliu rathoi nking khailo.
Tinggen gasu paliu rathoi chiukhailo khatdi paliutu pijiu chari ngam khailo.
“Namaidungniu natu atungjiu nuan kammiboga khatdi mai khatnadi nuan kam makbo hamiboga—khatdi nagu lungpomniu paliutu kamkaojiu paliutu mai dihga kavang thiuraleng kadiubo kadihlam lutad bamdi,
maidunggu rathoise chiukhailo. sibo kadihga paliu lung lipadjiu, aliu hai kasamai-e, Oh,

Sibo kadihga paliuniu nchang majijiu chalung lipadjiu, nangniu paliu pao-pehtu pikhaibo kadih, nangniu kada khaimibo namdi nai Iniu naleng thiukhaibo Raky lamga, paliu zu marilujiu, nakhuga kakheng thiusai,
paliu rathoi nking khailo. Naky tinggen gasu paliu khuan nking khailo khatdi paliutu lungsa khailo.
Paliuniu natu atungjiu chari thiubo khatdi paliugu nuan pakhiangna kuak khailo, khatdi paliugu mikre maidungniu paliutu phuikhai sira kamkhailo.
Paliutu hai taobambo n-mang, Egypt gasu nangniu majang npadbo namaidung-e.
“Tanthubo
Nangniu Egypt gasu aliu pao-pehtu majang npadbo wan ga, navangpiu Mose khugasu paliutu chamai mathiu ruanggasu namai thiuraleng nangniu kadalubo-e chiujiu nangniu paliu khuga dinkhai mibo-e.”
Solomon niu
Chakhuan tanbo khat paniu senpadjiu siga wang madui bambo mai hina riga Tingwang gu thoidam khengkhai-e. Paniu din-e,
Paniu aliu pao-pehtu majangkhai mibo kumjiu, aliu Rawang,
paniu wadaodi aliutu saokhai makjiu, palad majai lura khatdi tacheng-tajai hina nai chamtan hina aliu pao-pehmaitu pikhaibo hina majaijiu lunglu raleng paniu kamkhaibo thiu milo.
Aliu
Sichiujiu kadihpiriga bambo jat hinaniu
Pamaidung naliuniu thainai, pagu tacheng-tajai nai chamtan hina majaijiu, aliu Rawang,
Siga Chawang Solomon khatdi mai hinaniu chara thiujiu
Paniu matom-kabuipi 22,000 khatdi aruanggu thiujiu mily 120,000 niu chara thiukhai-e. Sichiujiu paliuniu aruanglujiu Charaky kadpad khaide.

Sibo nai paniu n-gangbo kahiu nai Charaky wenjeng hina sidi kam masan khai-e, khatdi nphong kadkhaibo, alin-tara kadpadbo, khatdi aruanggu kadpadbo hinase charathiu khai-e. Haise kamkhaibo lamra tataaginiu kambo rathakbamga kadpadbo guse khairaleng siamju kami jengniu kam khaibo-e.
Sichiujiu Charakyga Solomon khatdi Israel mai hinaniu Gomlubo changee jeng chinnia
Jeng tachadbo nai Solomon niu maidung situ paliu kylam langkhai mide.
Chawang Solomon niu Charaky nai chawangkining khatdi katam-tambo paniu thiunibo hinase thiuloi lubo saiga,
niu pakhuga, paniu Gibeon ga bambo lon kumjiu, wanglen khai lande.

niu pakhuga din-e, “Iniu narathoi chiu khaide. Atu tingthengjiu kahumrabo bam thiurabo nangniu thiukhaibo Charaky haise Iniu kam masan khaide, Iniu haitu akhejiu khatdi pawan machangna gukhaijiu bamne.
Nangniu atu nalung masanjiu khatdi kawi thiujiu napiu David niu kamkhai mibo kumjiu machasai, sigasu nangniu agu tacheng-tajai hina piujiu khatdi Iniu natu chamtan khaibo hinase kamsai,
Israel maitu pawan machangna nakai-nakikniu mawangjiu bamne chiujiu Iniu napiu David khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo hinase Iniu majaikhai rabo-e.
Chiudi nangniu maksai nakai-nakikdungniu asai suita misai, Iniu nakhuga pikhai mibo tacheng-tajai khatdi chamtandungse nangniu piumak sai, khatdi kakibo radungtu kahum misai,

siga Iniu pikhai mibo kadih gasu amai Israel maidungtu Iniu hathon mirabo-e. Atu kahumrabo bam thiura Iniu kam masan khaimibo Charaky haidi Iniu phutmi rabo-e. Pabam machangnaga maidungniu Israel maitu nuimen rabo-e, sigasu ngaokhai lakbo lunlungga lungrabo-e.
Haibo Rakyse nchum mibo bamkhat thiumi rabo-e, haiga tadken wangmai hina ngaolujiu paliu suang harabo-e, ‘
Maidungniu paokakne, ‘Palamra paliu pao-peh maitu Egypt gasu puipadbo, paliu
Solomon niu Charaky nai pagu chawangkining thiubose takum makai bung ngutle.

Tyre wangpiu Hiram niu cedarsing khatdi kahiusing, sigasu kachia hina jaojiu pangamleng paniu masenbo pakhiangnase pikhai bide. Sise thiuloi mibo sailam, Chawang Solomon niu Hiram gu Galilee luongriang lungga namdak makai pikhai bide.
Hiram niu sise phuira tadde, chiudi paniu sise luni makge.
Haijengniu Solomon khuga paniu din-e, “Haichiujiu asingna yo, haidungse, nangniu akhuga pikhai bibo namdakdung si-e!” Haijengniu haibo bam situ tuhoi tangbo Cabul
Hiram niu Solomon leng kachiagi taju sang madai suang kengjiu pikhai bide.

Chawang Solomon niu Charaky nai chawangkining thiura, namdigu naimikpad jailam bambo ramlungga bamlujiu, khatdi namdigu kareng thiura changam kammaitu thinpiude. Paniu Hazor, Megiddo, khatdi Gezer, namdidung thiulan raleng thinpiu lan-e.

(Egypt wangpiuniu Gezer tu chari thiude, khatdi siga lungmaidung situ kamshat lujiu, namdise chami thonkhai lujiu sise sutlude. Sigasu Solomon niu panahpuitu panaoleng kuboga sibo kadihse panahpui leng chami thiubogu kalen thiujiu pikhai mide,
sise Solomon niu thiukhai lande). Pagu changam kammaidungtu thinpiujiu, Solomon niudi n-hangbo Beth Horon,
Baalath, Judah gu ramjing lungga bambo Tamar,
pagu katiu-kasak khatdi mania njanra baikhaibo namdidung, pagu chaqondung khatdi chaqon-karidung, sigasu Jerusalem, Lebanon khatdi kaki-kibo pawangdih lungga thinnibo mania pakhiangnase khai madui-e.

Pangam katanboga, changam kamra maileng Solomon niu Canaan maidung kai-kik, paliu ram lulujiu lungbo tingga Israel maidungniu kamshat kabangbo maidung situ thinpiude. Haimaidungse, Amor mai, Hitt mai, Periz mai, Hiv mai, sigasu Jebus mai, paliu kai-kikse tuhoi ken ga tangbo kavang thiujut wangmibo maidung pakhiangna jaokambo-e.

Solomon niu Israel maidung tura pijiu kavangmai thiukhai makge; paliuniu pagu charimai katheng-kadi maidung, chari maigu munran piudung, chaqon-kari thinmaigu papeedung, khatdi chaqon thinmaidung pithiu khai-e.
Solomon niu chaky thiubo ngamga katanbo ngamleng thiujiu changam kammaidungtu phuiraleng katheng-kadimai 550 bamme.

Namdigu naimikpad genlam bambo ram lungga Solomon niu pijiu pamaidungtu lungphui khaide, panao, Egypt wangpiu nahpuitu kulubo saiga, David namdiga paleng Solomon niu thiukhaibo chawangkiningga kaliwang mide.
Edom kadih lungga bambo, Aqaba gu Azaibek hugen, Elath mungga bambo Eziongeber ga, Chawang Solomon niu malee kengkha macha padde.
Duipuiga changam kam kasimai khangsiatu chawang Hiram niu pagu duipui npui gasu tadlujiu Solomon maidungtu maluang tatien thiura langkhai-e.
Paliuniu Ophir ramga malee tongtadjiu, sigasu kachia taju sang kariu-madai suang kengjiu Solomon leng phungwang lande.

Paniu pasai suimaidung phom situ, tiuchang, khatdi kachia kengkha qontraodung bang thiuphui ting lubo jaojiu phungwangde. Solomon panai adaoboga, paniu maning lubo chamkakdung pakhiangnase pakhuga maniude.
Paniu pakhiangnase paokak khaide; pakhuga dinpad kungbo wakhatdi hadi-e.
Sheba gu chawangpuiniu Solomon gu ningtingse chiukhaide khatdi paniu thiukhaibo chawangkiningse ngaokhaide.

Pagu katiu kuangkaiga machakhai bambo katiu-kasakse, pagu chakampaodung leng thiukhaibo ran-ranbo kydungse, pagu chawangkininggu chakampao mainiu thinpiubo ngamdungse khatdi paliuniu piubo fai-nidungse, chakhuang-changeega patu khuanbo maidung, khatdi Charaky lungga paniu pikhaibo rathak maniadungse paniu ngaokhai lude. Sise ngao khaijiu pasiu thipad silak mide, sichiujiu pasuang pi ha khaide.
Paniu Chawang Solomon khuga din-e, “Nalamga, khatdi nagu ningting lamga, Iniu aram gasu chiulubo hinase maji-e!
Chiudi apum siakniu tadlujiu pakhiangna haise ngaolu makthenna Iniu malum makdi-e; chiudi nagu ningting nai nakhiu-nalan hai nkiuchang-nkiu-e; Iniu paphan tadi chiumak bamdi-e.
Na-naodungse dejiuga paliu sanwilo! Khatdi pawan machang nakhuga bamlujiu nagu ningtingcham dinbotu chiutaojiu bambo navangmaidungse dejiuga paliu sanwilo!
Na-Rawang,

Pagu kalen thiujiu Chawang Solomon leng phung wangbose paniu pikhaide. Kachiagi taju sang madai suang kengbo khatdi parim wibo wamud nai tatiu-tataa kengkha phungwang pikhaide. Paniu pikhaibo parim wibo wamud haise Solomon niu kalen daobo ruangga dithubo-e.
(Hiram gu malee siniu Ophir gasu kachia phungwangbo nbensing nai tiuchang kengkha phungwang-e.

Solomon niu sibo singse thinlujiu Charaky nai chawangkininggu kareleng thin-e, khatdi nthiam-tarabung chalui thiusi maidung leng kampad khaibi-e. Haibo nbensing hai wadaodi Israel mai kadihga ponwang matai makbo; wadaodi haikumbo ngaolan tamibo sing-e).
Sheba wangpuiniu kakhengbo pakhiangnase Chawang Solomon niu paliu cheng saisuijiu palung dijiu pikhaibo riga pikhai sanbi-e. Sigasu pah khatdi pasai suimaidung Sheba gu kadihga malan wangmide.
Takum machangna Chawang Solomon niu rangkang taju sang makai-sum kumbo,

chali alimaidungniu, paliugu aliga gengsan lubo gasu piwangbo, sigasu Arabia mai wangdungniu paliugu ramkha pibo khatdi Israel mai luongrianggu dihthinpao mainiu piwangbo ramkha gasu daolubo riga sanjiu daotan-tanne.
Solomon niu chagee kadibo kainia kampadde, khatdi sibo chagee khat-khatga kachia taju chinnia kumbo ngutle.
Paniudi chagee siambibo kaisum, chagee khat-khat riga kachia taju nia kumbo ngutle. Paniu haibo chageedungse Lebanon Riu ga bambo Chaky kadibo gasu machapadbo-e.
Pagu chawangbam kadibo khatdi kamkhai-e. Sibo wangbam kasiaga chapuang-himniu top khai-e khatdi kasia gara withubo kachianiu topkhai-e.

Chawangbam khangraboga phikem charuk bamme, phikem hina kega ndongqui meng khat-khat bamme, pakhiangnase ndongqui kariu-je-niakiu bamme. Chawangbam sailamse matomchi khat meng, khatdi chaben-mangiu khaibo bamga ndongqui mengniu kamkhai-e. Haikumbo chawangbamse kakibo chawangdih khatgadi ngao makge.

Solomon niu ponsakbo chapiang hinase kachia giniu kampadle, khatdi Lebanon gu Mariu lungga bambo Chaky kadibo lunggu chali, chakuang-chapiang pakhiangnase kachiagi withuboniu kampadbo maliang-e. Rangkanggi tura thin piumak bamniu-e, palamra sise Solomon ken gara paman kungbo mania leng chakkhai makge.
Duinaiga Hiram gu malee nai tad machamradi pagu malee bamme. Pagu maleeniu takum sum machangna kachia, rangkanggi, chapuang-him, tajong khatdi kapeng phunglujiu wang-e.
Chawang Solomon hai kaki-kibo chawang suang lungwi nkiu-e khatdi ningting nkiu-e,
sichiujiu Tingwang niu pakhuga pikhai mibo tasi situ kadihpiri mai hina wangjiu nking-e.
Pakhuga tadmengmai hinaniu kachia, rangkang, chafai-tani, charinia, parim wibo, chaqon, sigasu qonniampoidung kalen thiujiu phungwang-e.Takum machang haichiujiu kam bambo-e.
Paniu mawangbo tingga rangkang hai Jerusalem lungga tatu kumjiu kengbo-e, sigasu cedar singse Judah gu maluong phiga bambo nbiubang kumjiu ngaowiboniu phui-e.
Musri nai Cilicia

sichiujiu Egypt gasu chaqon-kari jonbotu chawanggu chaliga papao thiubo maidung siniu khamme. Paliuniu Hitt mai nai Syria mai wangpiudung lengse chaqon-kari khat leng rangkanggi 600 sigasu chaqon khatga rangkanggi 150 leng jonkhai-e.
Paliuniu pijiu Israel maidungtu kakibo radungtu kahumnibo lungchun pi padmi rabo jeng gasu, haibo maidungtu magiang tulo chiujiu
Solomon niu panao masan siakjiu thiubo hai chawang nahpuidung kai chinnia-e, khatdi parammailiupuiniu kai summe. Paliuniu patu Tingwang khugasu pidiu khai mibo-e,
sichiujiu paniu thenwang miboga paliuniu patudi sangdiumaigu ratu kahumboga jukhaide. Papiu David kumjiu, pa-Rawang,
Sidon maigu charapui Astarte tu paniu kahumde, khatdi Ammon maigu matai marengbo chara Molech tudi kahumde.
Paniu nuan tenjiu papiu David niu kamkhai mibo kumjiu nchangta mide.
Jerusalem gu tingbanglam, maluongga Moab maigu matai marengbo ra, Chemosh tu kahumra, khatdi Ammon maigu matai marengbo ra, Molech tu kahumrabo bam khat paniu thiusu khaide.
Paniu kahumbobam kakengkha thiusu khaide, siga sangdiumai puidung, paniu luwangbo naodung siniu maruta mataojiu paliugu chara katam-tambotu kahumjiu charathiu sude.
Israel mai Rawang,

sichiujiu pakhuga din-e, “Nangniu akhuga ladriat thiukhaibose nason-naru sajiu kampang mide, sichiujiu agu ladriat majai makbo jengniu, nagu chawang kadih hai nakhu gasu lupadlujiu namai ruangga chakampao khat khuga sise pikhaimi rabo-e, chiujiu ladriat thiujiu dinbo-e.
Sichiu bamdi, napiu David jengniu haise nangniu ringbam thenra Iniu kamkhai lakge, chiudi nanahniu chawang thiubo tingga pi padkhai rabo-e.
Chiudi avangpiu David jengniu khatdi Iniu thiukhai mibo namdi, Jerusalem jengniu, chawang kadih pakhiangna Iniu pakhu gasu lutadmi lakge, sichiujiu chaphiu khatse patu khaidia rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu

Haibo masuang ga, David niu Edom maitu chari ngamlubo sai, pagu charipi Joab niu haiga kashai maitu bairaleng mengjiu pah khatdi pamaidungse Edom ga chahiu charuk bamkhai-e, siga paliuniu Edom maipiudung kakengkhatu kamshat mide,
siga Hadad khatdi papiu vang Edom mai, Egypt ga pakkhai maidungtu ronna masiak lubo-e. (Sibo wan ga Hadad haira nahpoinakha bambo-e).

Paliuniu Midian tu saodia lujiu Paran lam tadle, siga maidung kasia paliu khuga wangjiu jaokhai-e. Sigasu paliuniu Egypt paktangjiu chawang khuga wangkhai-e, paniu katiu kasak pikhaijiu chaky khatdi kadih kasia chiujiu Hadad tu n-jan khaibi-e.
Hadad niu chawangtu chaka thiu lude, khatdi chawangniu Chawang nao Tahpenes singnapui, pagiupuitu Hadad leng magiangra pikhai bide.
Paniu npiumainah khat lunglu-e, pazanniu Genubath ku-e, patuse chawangpui siniu chawang ky gasu makuat khai-e.
Chawang David khatdi pagu charipi Joab se shai mide chiubo Egypt dihga bambo Hadad khuga chalad wangtangbo tingga, Hadad niu chawang khuga din-e, “Atu pijiu agu kadihga malanwang raleng suikhailo.”
Chawangniu maniu-e, “Nde kamjiulo? Iniu natu wakhatra pitang makbo bamjiuma? Haijeng gasu nangniu nakyga malanwang mine chiujiu ma?”

Hadad niu chawang khuga paokakge, “Lungsajiu atu pi tadkhailo.” Sichiujiu paniu padihlam malan wang mide. Edom gu chawang khat thiujiu, Hadad hai kasabo mai khatle, sichiujiu Israel maigu mikre kasabo mai khatle.
Tingwang niu Eliada nahpiu Rezon tudi Solomon tu atung raleng kamkhaide. Rezon siniu pawangpiu, Zobah gu chawang Hadadezer khugasu paklujiu,

chamai kasamai pawangpiu hangga bammak maigu papee thiumide. (Haise David niu Hadadezer tu chari halubo sai khatdi paniu khat thiujiu bambo Syria maitu gilubo saiga padbo-e). Rezon khatdi pamaidung siniu tadlujiu Damascus ga lungmide, siga pamaidungniu patu Syria maigu chawang pithiu khaide.
Pahai Solomon niu ringbo tingga Israel maigu mikremai khatle.
Mai khang khatpiu Solomon tu atungbo piusira, pagu chakampao thiubo, Ephraim dih Zeredah ga bambo, Nebat nahpiu Jeroboam si-e. Papui hai kamipui-e, pazan niu Zeruah chiujiu ku-e.
Haise chari kathiubo rachamme.
Jerusalem gu tingbang lamse Solomon niu kadihse chu-makadjiu namdi karengse thiusu khaibo-e.

Jeroboam hai changam kam ngambo akhangmai khatle, paniu changam maranjiu kambo Solomon niu ngaoluga, patuse Solomon niu Ephraim mai khatdi Manasseh maigu kiphiudunggu kadihga changam kam maigu papeese pithiu khai-e.
Naikhatra, Jeroboam niu Jerusalem gasu chabin tadkinboga, Shiloh ga bambo phaimiukakung Ahijah niu patu mai kahaboga adaode.
Ahijah, paniu khaikinbo khen-gak kasanbo khoipad lujiu, phet kariu-je-niakiu thiu thiulujiu,
Jeroboam khuga din-e, “Patap kariuse naleng khoilulo; palamra Israel mai Rawang,

Solomon niu chaphiu khat lurabo-e, palamra Israel maigu kadih pakhiangna ruangga, namdise Iniu agu thiura kadalubo-e, sijengniu Jerusalem khatdi avangpiu David jengniu, Solomon leng chaphiu khatse pikhai diakrabo-e.

Iniu haise kambo lamra Solomon niu atu thonlujiu sangdiumaigu radung; Sidon maigu charapui Astarte; Moab mai ra Chemosh; khatdi Ammon mai ra, Molech tu kahum mibo jengniu-e. Solomon niu agu kadin piumakge, paniu kamaobo kammide, sichiujiu agu ladriatse paniu majai makge, khatdi papiu David kum makjiu agu chamtan majai makge.

Chiudi kadih pakhiangnase Iniu Solomon khugasu lutad lakge, khatdi paniu ringbam then Iniu patu pumtan pikhai bine. Avangpiu David tu Iniu kadalubo, agu chamtan khatdi tacheng-tajai majaibo jengniu haise Iniu kamkhai rabo-e.
Iniu Solomon nahpiu khugasu chawang kadih lupad lujiu, chaphiu kariu hai naleng pikhai rabo-e.
Chiudi Solomon nahpiutu pijiu chaphiu khatse majangjiu bamra, Iniu kamkhai rabo-e, sichiujiu atu kahumrabo bam, Iniu kadalubo namdi, Jerusalem ga David kaikiktu pi chawang thiujiu bamrabo-e.
Jeroboam, Iniu natu Israel maigu chawang pithiu khai rabo-e, khatdi nangniu thinnibo kadih hina thinrabo-e.

Nangniu acham hina majai lusai, agu tacheng-tajai saisuijiu lungkam lusai, Iniu natu chamtan pikhaibo haise avangpiu David kumjiu kamlusai, Iniu natu pawan machang majang bamrabo-e. Iniu natu pijiu Israel maigu chawang thiukhai rabo-e, khatdi nasaiga nakai-kik maidungniu David khuga Iniu pikhaibo kumjiu chawang thiurabo-e.
Solomon gu nuan jengniu David kaikiktu Iniu sajai pirabo-e, chiudi tingtheng leng makge.”
Sichiujiu Solomon niu Jeroboam tu kamshatra matan sude, chiudi paniu Egypt mai wangpiu Shishak khulam nbaira tadmide, siga Solomon shai makthen pah bammide.
Solomon niu kamkhaibo, palunlung khatdi pagu ningting lamga khaitang makbo hinase, Solomon gu rachamga raokhai bamme.
Paniu Jerusalem ga takum atai chawang thiujiu Israel dih pakhiangna mawang khaide.
Paniu shaimiboga David gu Namdiga baikhai mide, khatdi panahppiu Rehoboam niu patu malinjiu chawang thiude.
Shechem ga Rehoboam tadle, siga tingpilam bambo Israel maidung madui lujiu patu pijiu chawang thiukhaide.
Nebat nahpiu Jeroboam niu Solomon khugasu paktadjiu Egypt ga bambo wan ga sibogu champao chiuwangboga pah Egypt gasu malan wangde.
Tingpilam bambo maidungniu patu kura chamai langkhai-e, sichiujiu paliuniu Rehoboam khuga meng lujiu pakhuga din-e,

“Napiu Solomon niu aliuleng chabang karidbo pikhaijiu wajeng simakbo ngamkam aliu khuga kamkhaide; nangniu aliu bangrid hai kam masen khaine sai, khatdi aliutu pi lung njiukhai bine chiusai, aliu nagu chawang hangga bamne.”
“Jengsum saiga malan wanglo siga Iniu naliutu paokak khai bine, chiujiu paniu dinkhai bide.” Sichiujiu paliu wangmide.
Chawang Rehoboam niu papiu Solomon gu ladpimai katingmaitu kuwang lujiu chalad makhiamme, paniu maniu-e, “Haibo maidungtu Iniu nde chiubo lad kenkak khaira naliuniu atu ladpi khai ralo?”

Paliuniu paokakge, “Nangniu haibo maidung leng changam kawi kamkhai nisai, paliuniu khengboga paliuniu masen lubuibo chamniu paokak khaibilo. chiusai paliuniu pawan machang natu machajiu nagu chawang hangga bamrabo-e.”
Chiudi paniu kating maidungniu ladpi khaibo situ waleng chakmakjiu paniu pakahmaidung khuga tadlujiu, simaitu pagu ladpimai pithiu khaide.
Paniu maniu-e, “Iniu kamraleng naliuniu atu ndechiujiu ladpi khai ralo? Paliu bang kam masen khaira leng khengmai khuga Iniu nde dinkhai ralo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Haise nangniu paliu khuga dinkhai rabo-e, ‘A-jungna hai apiu khensuang di nkiubo-e!’
Haichiujiu dinbilo, ‘Apiuniu naliutu chabang karidbo pikhaisai, Iniu sisuang karidbo pikhai rabo-e; paniu naliutu singrangniu dapsai, Iniu naliutu chaqontu kadapbo tang thinlujiu daprabo-e!’”
Jengsum saiga, Jeroboam khatdi maidung hinase chawang Rehoboam khuga paniu dinbo kumjiu malan wangde.
Chawang siniu kating maidungniu ladpi khaibose lukhai makjiu paniu chalad kasabo maidung,

chabon maidungniu ladtikhaibo kumjiu dinkhaide, paniu haichiujiu din-e, “Apiuniu chabang karidbo naliu riga khaibi sai, Iniu sisuang karidbo pikhai rabo-e. Paniu naliutu singrangniu dapkhai sai, Iniu naliutu chaqontu kadapbo tang khoilujiu daprabo-e!”
Haise Tingwang niu chunning, Shiloh gasu phaimiukakung Ahijah niu Nebat nahpiu Jeroboam khuga dinkhai mibose wangtang raleng-e. Haichiujiu chawangniu pamaidung lad wadi nkingkhai makge.
Haichiujiu Israel maise chari sumide,
Judah kadihga lungbammai khuga ronna Rehoboam niu chawang thiuraleng khaidiak lujiu tadmide.

Sigasu Chawang Rehoboam niu changam kambambo maigu papaopiu, Adoniram tu Israel maidung khuga langkhaide, siga paliuniu patu tatu khoilujiu phenshat mide. Siga Rehoboam niu kalangjiu chaqon tuangjiu Jerusalem lam pakkhai mide.
Sibo wan gasu tingpilam bambo chawang kadihga bambo Israel maidungniu David kiphiutu chari thiusu mibo-e.

Jeroboam hai Egypt gasu malan wang bamme chiubo lad Israel maidungniu chiuboga, paliuniu patu kuwang lujiu paliu ruangga madui khat bamlujiu patu Israel maigu chawang pithiu khaide. Sichiujiu Judah kiphiu ronna David kaikik hangga bammide.

Rehoboam niu Jerusalem wangtangbo wan ga, Judah kiphiuga khatdi Benjamin kiphiu gasu withubo charimai 180,000 tu kuwang madui-e. Paniu chari thiujiu tingpilam bambo Israel mai kiphiutu pawangkining bamga khailan raleng kam sude.
Chiudi phaimiukakung Shemaiah khuga Tingwang niu din-e,
champao haise Rehoboam khuga, khatdi Judah kiphiu nai Benjamin kiphiu pakhiangna khuga dinkhaibo-e:
“Nasingnamai Israel maitu chari thiutulo. Naliu mathiuse chakylam wanglan sulo.Padbambo hinase agu chunning-e.” Paliu mathiuse Tingwang gu chamtan piujiu paliu kylam malanwang mide.
Israel maigu Chawang Jeroboam niu Ephraim luongga bambo Shechem namdiga charireng thiulujiu pakak khat siga lungkhai-e. Sigasu paniu sise phutlujiu Penuel namdiga charireng kamlujiu siga lungmide.
Paronna haichiu din-e, “Tuhoi kambambo kumjiu, amaidungniu Jerusalem ga tadlujiu sibo Rakyga chara thiujiu,
Paniu kachianiu kampadbo matomchi-poi khatse Bethel ga khatdi khatniu Dan ga khaide.
Sichiujiu maidung siniu Dan ga khatdi Bethel ga tadjiu kahumbo gasu nuan kam mide
Jeroboam niu maluangton gase kahumrabo bamdungdi thiukhaide, khatdi Levi kiphiu makbo maidungtu paniu singkuleng kada khaide.
Khatdi patachadbo hiugu jengriu mangiubo naise, paronna kampadbo Israel maidungniu maniara kamkhaibo Bethel gase tadlujiu charathiu khaide.
niu pikhaibo chamtan saisuijiu, phaimiukakung siniu rathakbam situ suimakbo lad dinkhaide; “Oh rathakbam, rathakbam, haise
Khatdi phaimiukakung siniu haichiujiu dinlan-e, “Haibo rathak bamse kaokiu marapiak mirabo-e, khatdi haiga bambo tabui sidi kam marakam mirabo-e. Sichiu dasai
Chawang Jeroboam niu haise chiukhaiboga siolujiu patu chamtan pipad khaide, “Sibo piutu min milo!” Sichiu khaigap chawang bense shaimijiu nkuon ngut silak mide.
Bungjiu rathak bamse kaokiujiu kadihga tabuise marapu mide, haise
Chawang Jeroboam niu phaimiukakung khugase din-e, “Lungsajiu
Phaimiukakung siniu
Sigasu chawang siniu phaimiukakung khuga din-e, “Asai suiwangjiu akyga wang katiu tiukhailo. Nangniu tenkhai bibo jengniu natu tathuon Iniu pikhaine.”
Phaimiukakung siniu paokakge, “Nagu chakhiu-chalanse paphan atu pibam tadi, Iniu nasai suiwangjiu wadi tiusak ncham silakge.
niu atu watiu-wasak mak raleng khatdi Iniu kamengbo npui gasu akylam malan wangmak raleng chamtan pikhaijiu bamme.”
Sijengniu paniu kamengbo npuiga malanwang makjiu kakibo npui gasu wangmide.
Sibo wan ga phaimiukakung katingmai khat Bethel ga lung bamme. Panahpiudung
Phaimiukakung katingpiu siniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Paniu wangmiboga ndebo npui gasu tadpad milo?” Paliuniu pah tadpad mibo lamse siokhai bide,
siga paniu pagu qonniamse paleng akhikhai raleng dinde. Paliuniu sise akhi khaibide, siga paniu hatadjiu
Judah gasu wangbo phaimiukakungse nphubang hangga ntaojiu bamniubo daode, Paniu maniu-e, “Judah gasu wangbo phaimiukakungse nangma?”
Paniu kenkakge, “Yo,I si-e.”
Paniu din-e “Akyga wangjiu katiu-tiu ncham khaikhe.”
Chiudi Judah gasu wangbo phaimiukakung siniu paokakge, “I nakyga wangdao lakge, khatdi nangniu taliu khaibose lukhai silakge. Iniu natu haiga wadi tiusak ncham silakge,
palamra Iniu wadi tiumak, sakmak raleng khatdi Iniu kamengbo npui gasu malan wangmak raleng
Sigasu Bethel gu phaimiukakung katingpiu siniu din-e, “Idi nakum gapbo phaimiukakung khatle,
Siniu Judah gu phaimiukakung siniu phaimiukakung katingpiu kyga wangjiu patu katiu tiu ncham khaide.
Haichiujiu paliuniu kuangkaiga ntaojiu bambo wan-ga, phaimiukakung katingbopiu khuga Tingwang chamse wangde,
paniu Judah gu phaimiukakung khuga senpad khaide, “Nangniu
Sichiujiu, Iniu suimakbo bamga nangniu tadlujiu katiu tiu mide. Haijengniu natu kamshat mirabo-e, khatdi naphawse nakygu charawga baikhai lakge.”
Paliuniu katiu tiuloiboga, phaimiukakung katingbo piu siniu Judah mai phaimiukakunggu qonniamse akhikhai bijiu,
paniu ntaolujiu tadpad mide. Npuikiga, ndongqui khatniu patu kamshat mide. Paphawse npuikiga kala bamme, khatdi qonniam nai ndongquise pamungga chap bamme.
Chamai khangsianiu npuiga tadwangboga paphaw situ ndongquiniu pamungga chapkhuan bambo ngaode. Paliuniu Bethel ga ngutlujiu sise paokhaide.
Phaimiukakung katingpiuniu sise chiukhaibo tingga paniu din-e, “Haibo phaimiukakungse
Sigasu paniu panah maidung khuga din-e, “Agu qonniamse I tongtadra kaden khailo.” Paliuniu sise akhikhai bide.

Paniu sibo riga tuanglujiu mengpadboga, npuiga phaimiukakungpiu phawse kala bambo mungga qonniam nai ndongqui siniu khuanbambo situ ngaode. Ndongqui siniu paphawse tiumak maksai qonniam tudi kamshat makge.
Phaimiukakung katingbopiu siniu paphawse ponlujiu qonniam riga khailujiu Bethel ga phungwang siga patu baikhai mide.
Paniu patu pakigu charawga baikhaide, patu kiuhui khai-e, khatdi “Oh singna yo, asingna yo! chiujiu kapjiu huikhaide!”
Kashai bailubo saiga, phaimiukakung siniu panahmaidung khuga din-e, “Iniu shaiboga haibo rawga atu baikhailo khatdi hainapiu mungnaga khailo.
gu chamtan saisuijiu Bethel ga bambo rathakbam lamga khatdi Samaria gu namdak ga bambo kahumbo bamdung pakhiangna lamga suinimakjiu paniu dinkhai mibose palingjiu padsiak rabo-e.”

Israel maigu Chawang Jeroboam hai kasabo npui gasu palung kali makjiu bamme, sichiujiu paniu thiukhaibo rathak bamga singkuleng wadi makbo kiphiu gasu kada khaide. Singku thiukhai nibo maitu paniu lukhai-e.
Paniu haibo nuan tenkhaibo jenggasu pawangkining kadihse hamirabo-e, khatdi nchum mirabo-e.
Sibo wan ga chawang Jeroboam nahpiu Abijah marajiu bamme.

Jeroboam niu panao khuga din-e, “Mai khatniudi natu simak raleng naronna nalun kam kali milo, khatdi I hai Israel maigu chawang thiurabo-e, chiujiu dinkhaibo phaimiukakung Ahijah niu lungbambo Shiloh ga tadsulo.
Taruak khuang kariu, manuanbo taruak tamnaga, khatdi makhuidui lah khat phunglulo. Anahpiu khuga nde padralo, chiubo pakhuga maniulo, paniu nakhuga dinkhaisu rabo-e.”
Sijengniu Ahijah ky Shiloh lam pah mengde. Tingmibo jengniu Ahijah se pamik ngaota mide.
Jeroboam panah marabo jengniu pakhuga sibo lam maniu raleng wangsune, chiujiu
Jeroboam naoniu wangbo tingga, pahai mai kakimai kumjiu kamlu wangde.

Chiudi paniu kamun ga ngutkinbo Ahijah niu chiulujiu pakhuga din-e, “Ngutlo, nang hai Jeroboam nao-e chiubo I si-e. Nang nde kamjiu nalun kam kalilujiu wangkin gulo? Naleng Iniu chalad kasabo dinkhaira mide.
Jeroboam khuga tadlujiu haise Israel maigu Rawang,
Iniu David kaikik gasu chawang kadihse lulujiu sise natu pikhaibo-e. Chiudi nangra avangpiu David kum makge, para alad majaijiu, agu ladriat piu-e, khatdi Iniu kamlo chiubo ronna kamme.
Nangra nasuangga mawang khai mimai suang nkiujiu nuan kam mide. Nangniu atu phut lujiu charameng kamlujiu khatdi chagi mengtu kahumbo gasu alungdi kampom mide.

Sijengniu nagu chawang kai-kikga chariubo Iniu pipad khaine, khatdi nakiphiuga npiumai hina situ kating kana pakhiangnatu kamshat mirabo-e. Nakikhun situ Iniu achunning thiujiu kam mahami rabo-e; chava situ kumjiu Iniu biakthon mirabo-e.
Nakiphiuga mai khatniu namdiga shaikhai sai tathiniu tiurabo-e, khatdi mai khatniu namdi lenlam shaikhai sai, simaitu chamitiuleng niu
Ahijah niu Jeroboam nao khuga haichiujiu dinkhai lande, “Tuhoi nakylam malanwang sulo. Nangniu namdak gase ngutgap chiuboga nanahse shaimi rabo-e.
Israel mai hinaniu palamga achungkhai lujiu khatdi patu baikhai rabo-e, Jeroboam kikhun gasu patu ronna bai mawijiu baikhai rabo-e. Palamra, Israel maigu Rawang,
Jeroboam kiphiutu kam mahabo piu situ

niu Israel maitu sajai pikhai rabo-e, khatdi singgiuga chahubangtu kanukbo kumjiu kanuk rabo-e. Kadih kawibo bam haigasu Israel maitu pethon mirabo-e, khatdi paliutu Euphrate giuky lenlam kam marakhai mirabo-e. Palamra paliuniu Asherah gu charapui meng kambo gasu palung kampom mide.
niu Israel maitu phut mine, palamra Jeroboam gu nuan jeng gasu Israel maitu nuan ga jukhai mide.”
Tirzah lam Jeroboam nao malanwang mide. Paniu paky wangtang gapboga, ngenase shai mide.
niu pavangpiu, phaimiukakung Ahijah khuga dinkhaibo kumjiu Israel maidungniu palamga achungjiu kiuhui khailujiu patu baimide.
Chawang Jeroboam niu kamkhai mibo, haiga khaitang makbo hinadi paniu chari thiubo khatdi pakhiangnagu raha Israel mai Wanggu Rachamga raokhai bamme.
Jeroboam niu chawang thiujiu takum makai-je-niakiu mawang khaide. Pah shaimijiu patu bai mide, khatdi panahpiu Nadab niu chawangbam malin mide.
Solomon nahpiu Rehoboam takum atai tingmibo wan ga paniu Judah gu chawang thiude, khatdi Israel mai ram lungga
Judah ga bambo maidung hai
Singbang phiga khatdi maluangga Asherah lun kahumra kamkhaide khatdi tatu khuanjiu, katiang kamkhaijiu paliuniu aratbo ratu kahumra kamde.
Sathubo sira, maipuidung, khatdi maipiudung siniu charameng kahumbo bamga makhabo tien thiujiu machabo haisi-e. Karaiga
Paniu Charakygu mania khatdi chawang kyga bambo, Solomon niu kambo kachia gu chageedung katangdi khoilude.
Siga paliutu malinra chawang Rehoboam siniu tataagi khoilujiu chagee kamde, khatdi chakampaodungtu chawangkining rengmunse akhe raleng malum khaide.
Chawangniu Charakyga wang machang, akhe mainiu chagee phunglu meng akhe-e, sichiujiu akhegu kichen ga wang malan-e.
Chawang Rehoboam niu kamkhaibo haiga khaitang makbo hina Judah maigu Chawang Rachamga raokhai bamme.
Rehoboam khatdi Jeroboam niu mawangbo ken gase saomakjiu khat khattu chari thiujiu lung-e.
Rehoboam shaimide sichiujiu David namdi chawang rawga patu baikhai mide, khatdi panahpiu Abijah niu patu malinde.
Israel maigu chawang Jeroboam niu takum kariu-je tachadkiu chawang thiukhangbo wan ga, Abijah hai Judah gu chawang thiusude,
khatdi paniu Jerusalem ga takum sum chawang thiukhaide. Absalom nahpui Maacah hai papui-e.
Papiu kumjiu padi nuan tende, sichiujiu papao David kumjiu
Chiudi David jengniu, panahpiu Abijah niu pasailam Jerusalem ga chawang thiujiu, Jerusalem thin mawira
niu David khuga haise tenkhaibo sira paniu patu pikim khaibo jengniu-e, chiudi Hitt mai kiphiu Uriah lamga makjiu paniu kakibo lamga pagu chamtan majai makbo thiu makge.
Abijah nai Jeroboam hai saomakjiu khat-khattu chari thiu jutjiu Abijah ken-ga lung-e.
Sichiujiu haiga khaitang makbo Abijah niu kamkhai mibo pakhiangna Judah maigu Chawang Rachamga raokhai bamme.
Abijah shai mibo ga David gu namdiga patu baikhaide, khatdi panahpiu Asa niu pabamse malinde.
Israel maigu chawang Jeroboam niu takum makai chawang thiuwangbo wan ga, Asa niu Judah gu chawang thiude.
Paniu Jerusalem ga takum atai-je-khat chawang thiukhaide, Absalom nahpui Maacah haise papeh-e.
Papao David niu kambo kumjiu, Asa niudi
Nkengmainiu chara kahumbo bamga makhabo ten thiujiu kambo mai pakhiangnatu paniu padih gasu hathon mide, khatdi pama suangga changam kammainiu kamkhai diakbo charameng hinase paniu luthon kam mide.

Chawangpui thiujiu bambo papeh tudi pabam gasu lupad mide, palamra paniu kadihtam wikhaibo Asherah gu charapui mengga suimakbo ngamse kamme. Kidron gu taning dihga Asa niu charamengdungse kamkao kiulujiu ruthon mide.
Asa niu nkengmaigu chara kahumbo bam hina kam maha makge, chiudi paniu pagu ringting pakhiangna
Papiuniu Tingwang khuga kamkhai mibo mania pakhiangnase paniu Charakyga kadkhai-e, pah papum siakniudi kachiadi rangkangdi kadkhai-e.
Judah maigu chawang Asa nai Israel maigu chawang Baasha niu pumtan thinbam then khat-khattu chari thiubo hai saomakjiu bamme.
Baasha niu Judah ga charithiujiu khatdi Judah tadpad tadngut mak raleng Ramah ga charireng thiusude.

Siganiu Chawang kyga khatdi Charakyga saokhai diakbo kachia rangkang pakhiangna Chawang Asa niu khoilude, khatdi sise Damascus ga bambo Hezion tahpiu Tabrimmon nahpiu Syria gu Chawang Benhadad khuga pagu chakampaodung khangsiatu langkhaijiu tacham haichiujiu langkhai-e:

“Aliu piumainiu kambo kumjiu chawat khat thiu mikhe. Haibo rangkang nai kachiase naleng kalen thiujiu phungmeng kinbo-e. Tuhoira nangniu Israel maigu Chawang Baasha tu chawat thiujiu bambose tamilo, sichiujiu pagu riphendung agu kadihga bambo gasu hapad mikhe.”

Asa niu khengboga Chawang Benhadad niu suikhaijiu pagu charipitu langkhaide khatdi Israel maigu namdi situ aphen raleng kamsude. Paliuniu Ijon, Dan, Abel Beth Maakah, Galilee Ajai wonjeng khatdi Naphtali kadih pakhiangna chari thiujiu ngam lude.
Sise Chawang Baasha degu padmi jiulo chiubo siluboga Ramah tu phutlujiu Tirzah lam pakkhai mide.

Sigasu Chawang Asa niu Judah luongriang pakhiangnaga chamtan khat pikhaide, sise mai khat niudi suimakbo thiumakjiu Baasha niu thinpiujiu charireng kamkhaibo Ramah gu charirengga bambo tasing-tatu hinase ponthon miraleng kamkhaide. Asa niu haibo mania hina thinlujiu Benjamin mai luongriang Mizpah nai Geba Mizpah ga charireng kamde.

Haiga khaitang makbo Chawang Asa niu kambo, pagu pahot kabambo tien khatdi namdiga paniu charireng kambo pakhiangnase Judah maigu Chawang Rachamga raokhai bamme. Sichiujiu paniu thenwang mibo wan ga paphi kathiubo ra phungjiu paphi samide.
Asa shaimiboga, David namdi chawang rawga patu baikhaide, khatdi panahpiu Jehoshaphat niu chawang thiujiu patu malinde.
Judah gu Chawang Asa niu mawangbo niabo kumga, Chawang Jeroboam nahpiu Nadab niu Israel maigu chawang thiude, khatdi paniu takum nia mawang khaide.
Pasuangga papiuniu kambo kumjiu, paniu
Issachar kiphiu, Ahijah nahpiu Baasha niu Nadab tu suimakjiu wakasa rangjiu Nadab tu kamshat mide khatdi pagu riphenmai siniu Philistia gu namdi Gibbethon situ sutlude.
Haise Judah gu Chawang Asa niu mawangbo pasumbo kumga padde, sichiujiu Baasha niu Nadab tu malinjiu Israel maigu chawang thiude.
Watheng makjiu paniu Jeroboam gu kikhun hinatu kamshat sude. Shiloh ga bambo phaimiukakung Ahijah,
Jeroboam niu Israel mai Rawang,
Nadab niu kamkhai mibose haiga khaitang makbo hina Israel maigu Chawang Rachamga raokhai bamme.
Judah maigu Chawang Asa khatdi Israel maigu chawang Baasha panai khangniase pumtan thinjiu bambo tingga khat-khattu chari thiujutjiu bambo-e.
Judah gu Chawang Asa niu mawangjiu bambo pasumbo kumga, Ahijah nahpiu Baasha niu Israel maigu chawang thiude, khatdi paniu Tirzah ga takum makai-je-madaikiu mawang khaide.
Pasuangga Chawang Jeroboam kumjiu, paniu
Hanani nahpiu phaimiukakung Jehu khuga

“Nangra wadi makbo mai-e, chiudi Iniu Israel maidunggu jupao thiuraleng Iniu natu kam khaibo-e, chiudi tuhoira nangniu nuan kamjiu Jeroboam kum mide sichiujiu amaidungtu nuan ga jukhai mide. Paliu nuan jengniu alung kampom mide,
siniu Jeroboam kikhuntu kamkhai mibo kumjiu, natu khatdi nakikhuntu Iniu kam mahami rabo-e.
Na-kikhun gasu mai khatniu namdiga shaikhai sai tathiniu tiu rabo-e, khatdi mai khatniu namdi lenlam shaikhai sai chamitiuleng niu
Baasha niu kambo pakhiangna khatdi pahotgu ngamkam hina, haiga raokhai tangmakbo hina Israel maigu Chawang Rachamga raokhai bamme.
Baasha shaijiu Tirzah ga patu baikhaide, khatdi panahpiu Elah niu malinjiu chawang thiude.
Baasha niu
Judah gu Chawang Asa niu mawangbo takum makai-je-charukkiu tangboga, Baasha nahpiu Elah niu Israel maigu chawang thiude, khatdi paniu Tirzah ga takum nia mawang khaide.

Pagu chakampao khat, Zimri, paniu chawanggu chaqon-kari paphantu phuijiu bambo piu siniu patu suimakjiu wa kasa rangsude. Tirzah ga naikhat, chawangkining phuibambo piu, Elah niu Arza kilungga jaw sak maniulu bamme.
Siga Zimri niu kalungga ngutlujiu, Elah tu kamshat mide, khatdi patu malinjiu chawang thiumide. Haise Judah gu Chawang Asa niu mawangbo takum makai chinniakiu tangmibo kumga padle.
Zimri niu chawang thiugap chiubo gasu Baasha kikhun mai hinatu khatdi pakamai hinatu kamshat su mide.
Sichiujiu Baasha tu suimakjiu
Paliuniu charameng kambo gasu, khatdi Israel maitu nuan ga jukhaibo gasu, Baasha khatdi panahpiu Elah niu Israel mai Rawang,
Elah niu kambo hinase, Israel maigu Chawang Rachamga raokhai bamme.

Judah gu Chawang Asa niu mawangbo takum makai-je-chinnia tingga, Zimri niu Tirzah ga Israel mai riga jeng chinnia mawang khai-e. Israel maigu riphendung siniu Philistia ga bambo Gibbethon namditu charithiujiu bamboga,
Zimri niu chawang tu suimakjiu gimide chiubo siluboga paliuniu paliugu charipi Omri tu Israel maigu chawang thiura kamkhai mide.
Omri khatdi riphendung siniu Gibbethon tu daosiak lujiu Tirzah ga mengjiu charithiu sude.
Namdise kaokiu mibo Zimri niu ngaoboga, paniu chawangkiningga kareng kamkhaibo lungga ngutjiu chawangky ningse chami khaijiu siga pah shaikhai mide.
Paniu
Zimri niu kambo haiga raotang makbo, khatdi pasan kasabo pakhiangnase Israel maigu Chawang Rachamga raokhai bamme.
Israel maidung njan nia padsude: khangsianiu Ginath nahpiu Tibni tu pijiu chawang thiuni, khatdi khangsianiu Omri tu masen mide.
Kanamboga Omri tu masenmai siniu ngamlude; Tibni shaimide, sichiujiu Omri niu chawang thiude.

Haichiujiu Chawang Asa niu mawangbo takum samriu-je-khatkiubo kumga, Omri niu Israel maidunggu chawang thiude, khatdi paniu takum kariu-je-niakiu kadih thinkhaide. Karaibo takum charuk haira paniu Tirzah kadihtu thinbo-e,

sigasu Samaria maluongram hai Shemer khugasu rangkang sang charuk leng lulujiu, Omri niu maluangga charireng kamde, siga namdi thiusu khaide, khatdi masuangga sibo maluanggu papao Shemer zan luijiu, sibo nam situ Samaria chiujiu mathak khaide.
Omri niu pasuangga lungkhai mibo maisuang nkiujiu
Pasuangga kamkhai mibo Jeroboam kumjiu, charameng kahumbo gasu Israel maitu nuan ga jukhaijiu Israel mai Rawang,
Omri niu kambo khatdi paniu kamkhai diakbo pakhiangna haiga khaitang makbo hina Israel maigu Rachamga raokhai bamme.
Omri shai miboga Samaria ga baikhai mide, sichiujiu panahpiu Ahab niu patu malinjiu chawang thiude.
Judah maigu Chawang Asa niu mawangbo tingkum samriu-je-tachadbo kum Ahab niu Israel maigu chawang thiude, khatdi paniu Samaria ga takum makai-je-niakiu mawang khaide.
Pasuangga mawangmai suang para
Chawang Jeroboam niu nuan tenkhaibo siniu paleng buimakge; paniu sisuang nuan ten nkiujiu Sidon gu Chawang Ethbaal nahpui Jezebel tudi panao kude, khatdi Baal tu kahumde.
Samaria ga paniu Baal leng charaky khat thiu khaijiu, paleng rathakbam kam khaide, khatdi sise parakyga khaide.
Charapui Asherah mengdi paniu khaide. Pasuangga chawang thiumai suangdi paniu Israel mai Rawang,
Paniu chawang thiubo tingga Bethel ga bambo Hiel niu Jerikho thiusu khai lande. Nun nahpiu Joshua khuga
Sigasu
“Nangniu bambo bamse phudlujiu tingbanglam tadjiu Cherith giuky Jordan gu tingbanglam nbaibam milo.
Nangniu tadui sakraleng sibo singgiuniu pikhai sune, khatdi n-gekniu
Elijah niu
Pah sibo singgiuki gasu tadui sakge, khatdi n-gek siniu nsuan chawan katiu kasak paleng ponwang-e.
Ting sata kamibo jengniu sibo giukidi pakak khat saiga sang mide.
Sigasu
“Sidon mungga bambo, Zarephath gu namdiga tuhoi tadlujiu siga bamsulo. Siga lungbambo kamipui siniu nawon thiukhai raleng Iniu patu chamtan pikhai mide.”
Sijengniu Zarephath lam Elijah niu tad mide, khatdi paniu rengmun ga wangtang gapda kamipui khat siniu tasing khoibam niubo daode. Paniu din-e, “Chalung sajiu tadui sakkhai raleng aleng janlo.”
Siga sibo puiniu tadui luraleng wangmibo ga, paniu kulan lujiu din-e, “Chalung sajiu taruak pekdi khoipad janlo.”
Paniu paokakge, “Ringbambo

Elijah niu pakhuga din-e, “Wadi manang tulo. Tadlujiu malod lengse kaden sulo. Sichiujiu nagu kabambo gasu taruak khuang poi kamlujiu aleng sise ponpadlo, sigasu malipadbo gasu nanah nanaileng kamlulo.
Palamra, haise Israel mai Rawang,
Elijah niu dinbo kumjiu kamipui siniu kamde, khatdi paliu mathiuse naimikpui wajiukha tiubui lude.
niu Elijah khuga ladriat thiukhaibo kumjiu chakuang poi gase takhuimoi hami makge, maksai chala gase takisase hami makge.
Pakak khat saiga kamipui nahse mara mide, pahai mara matanbi-bi mide, sichiujiu kanamboga shai mide.
Elijah khuga paniu din-e, “Tingwang mai yo, nangniu haikumbose dekamjiu akhuga kamkhai jiulo? Tingwang niu amao maning taojiu anahpiu haitu pi shaikhaira nang haiga wangjiu ma?”
Elijah niu din-e, “Ngena tuse akhuga pilo,” Ngena situ paniu paga gasu pamlujiu, paniu bambo chakairi kichen ga ponkhangjiu patu taziga maji khaide.
Sigasu paniu pakhuan tanjiu kakheng thiusude, “Oh
Sigasu Elijah niu paben henpad lonsum lujiu
niu Elijah gu rathoise paokak khaide; ngenase pasiu thilan sude khatdi ringlan mide.
Elijah niu npiumainah situ ponlujiu n-hangbo kichen-ga kiulujiu papui khuga pilujiu pakhuga din-e, “Phuilo, nanahse ring bamme!”
Paniu paokakge, “Nang hai Tingwang mai-e khatdi
Pakak watheng makbo sai, tingdui kiumakbo takum sumboga,
Sichiujiu Elijah niu tadpad mide.
Chakhum wangbose Samaria ga sadiang-e.
Chawang kining khuanjiu bambo, Obadiah tu Ahab niu haichiujiu ku-e. (Obadiah haise palung ngutjiu kahumbo piu khatle,
khatdi Jezebel niu
Obadiah khuga Ahab niu din-e, duipin hina khatdi singgiu hinaga anai tadlujiu phuiponjiu chaqondung khatdi qonniamdung tiujiu lunglura piubuan phiukhe. Aliugu khaoring khat tudi pijiu shaimi tukhe.”
Panainiu suikhai lujiu dekumbo bamga khairalo chiubo phuira katam-tambo bamlam tadsude.
Obadiah niu npuiga tadkinboga, bungjiu paniu Elijah tu ngaode. Paniu patu silude, pamasuangga makhum kiujiu maniu-e, “Paohubo, haise nang siakma?”
“Yo, I hai Elijah si-e,” chiujiu paniu paokakge. “Tadlujiu nagu chawang khuga I haiga bamme chiujiu dinkhai bilo.”
Obadiah niu paokakge, “Iniu degu kam mijiu, Chawang Ahab niu atu kamshat rabogu kapingbo hai nangniu pikhai jiulo?
Ringjiu bambo
Sichiujiu tuhoira nang haiga bamme chiubo hai Iniu wanglujiu pakhuga paokhai raleng nangniu masen jiuma?
Iniu natu saodiakjiu tadmiboga
Jezebel niu
Sichiusai dechiujiu nangniu atu tadra khatdi nang haiga bamme chiubo chawang khuga paokhai raleng chamtan pijiulo? Paniu atu kamshat mirabo-e!”
Elijah niu paokakge, “Iniu macha bambo ringbambo, Ngamkambo
Sigasu Obadiah niu Chawang Ahab khuga wanglujiu paokhaide, siga Ahab niu Elijah tu adaora tadpadle.
Ahab niu patu ngaoluboga, paniu din-e, “Haiga nang bamma--Israel maitu kam chariuthubo piuse nang-e!”
Elijah niu paokakge. “I niu kam chariu khaibo makge, nang--khatdi napiu niu-e. Naliuniu
Tuhoi Carmel Luongga Israel mai hinaniu atu adaoraleng chamtan pikhailo. Baal gu phaimiukakung 450 khatdi Chawangpui Jezebel niu nkha bambo Asherah rapuigu phaimiukakung 400 sidi jaojiu wanglo.”
Sijengniu Israel mai hina khatdi Baal gu phaimiukakungdung pakhiangna Carmel Luongga wangraleng Ahab niu kukhaide.
Elijah niu maidung khuga tadkhang lujiu din-e, “Naliugu maningse kam maji raleng pawan dethengkha ngutralo?
Sigasu Elijah niu din-e, “Tuhoi tangbo

Matomchi nia juwanglo, Baal gu phaimiukakung mainiu khatse thinlujiu, kamshat lulo, khatdi pajanse dimtap-tap lulo, khatdi sise tasing riga khailulo—chiudi siga chamira matao tulo. Idi matomchi khatse thinlujiu sise kumjiu kamlan rabo-e.
Pijiu Baal gu phaimiukakung maitu paliu ra khuga kakheng kamlulo, khatdi Iniu
Maidung siniu chunchambo khuanse senpadde.

Sigasu Elijah niu Baal gu phaimiukakung maidung khuga din-e, “Naliu chamai kengjiu bambo jengniu, naliu matomchi khat thinlulo khatdi kadenrai lulo. Naliu ra khuga kakheng kamlulo chiudi tasing gara chami khaitulo.”

Paliu khuga juwangbo matomchise paliuniu thinlujiu kaden sude, khatdi asiuting khangtang makthen kakheng thiusude. Paliuniu senne, “Aliutu paokak khailo, Baal yo!” sichiujiu paliuniu thiulubo rathak bamtu chalen len maguijiu bamme. Chiudi paokak khai makge.

Niending khangtang mibo wan ga Elijah niu paliutu tanui thiusude. “Chakhuan tanjiu kakheng thiulo! Pahai chara khatle! Pah nguiniu bam rabo-e, maksai mathakmi bamrabo-e, maksai pah chabin tadmi bamne, maksai pah jipjingmi bam rabo-e; naliuniu patu makiang subo sui-e!”
Sichiujiu phaimiukakung maidungse kakhengthiu matan sude khatdi paliu zai pad makthen nsinaniu
Paliuniu chalad kadinbo khatdi katam-tambo phajiu asiuting khangtang makthen kamde, chiudi kenkak khai makge, wakhuan khatdi chiulu makge.
Sigasu Elijah niu maidung khuga din-e, “Akhuga wang manalo,” Siga paliu mathiu pakhuga wang magui sude. Siga paniu
Paniu Jacob nahmai khang kariu-je-niakiu,
sibo tusiniu

Sibo rathakbam riga paniu tasing khai-e, matom janse dimtap-tap khaide, khatdi sise tasing riga khaide. Paniu din-e, “Karung madai tadui khaiphui lujiu sise kadkhai rabo mee khatdi tasing rigase runkhailo.” Sise paliuniu kamkhaide,
sichiujiu paniu din-e, “Kamkhai lanno,” sise paliuniu kamkhaide.” Sise kamkhai lanrailo chiujiu paniu din-e, siga paliuniu kamkhai lande.
Sichiujiu taduise luangkiujiu alenki chumagui khaibo bamse chungphui mide.
Asiuting wan-ga phaimiukakung Elijah niu rathakbamga ngut lujiu charathiujiu kakheng thiu sude, “Oh
Atu paokak khailo,
Maidungniu haise ngaoluboga paliu kadihga kaokiu lujiu dinpadle, “

Elijah niu chamtan pide, “Baal gu phaimiukakungdung situ minmilo; paliu ruangga pijiu mai khattudi pakmi tulo.” Maidung siniu paliutu minkam mide, khatdi Elijah niu paliutu julujiu Kishon Giukiga kamshat mide.
Sigasu Elijah niu Chawang Ahab khuga din-e, “Tuhoira, tadlujiu tiusulo. Iniu tingsiat khuanse chiu mide.”
Ahab niu katiu tiuraleng tadngut miboga, Elijah niu Carmel Luong ton ga khanglujiu, paniu kadihga makhum kiujiu, papeese patapu kakga khaide.
Paniu pavangpiu khuga din-e, “Tadlujiu duipui lamse phuisulo.”
Pavangpiu siniu tadlujiu malan wangjiu din-e, “I wadi ngaomakge,” Tadlon chinnia lujiu phuira Elijah niu din-e.
Tadlon chinnia lujiu malan wangjiu din-e, “Duipui gasu kamuangkang chamaiben ndi khat langkha tangmakbo khat Iniu ngao-e.”
Elijah niu pavangpiutu chamtan pide, “Chawang Ahab khuga tadlujiu tingsiatniu patu nammakbo masuangga paqon-kari tuanglujiu chaky malanwang milo chiu dinkhai bilo.”
Watheng makbo lungga tingpukse kamuang katikniu gomting mide, tingkaise hunwang sude, khatdi tingriu tanjiu wangsude. Ahab se paqon-kari tuanglujiu Jezreel lam malan mide.
gu pumtan Elijah khuga wangkhaijiu, paniu pafaise pakhen-ga khekman lujiu Ahab masuangga pak mathonjiu Jezreel npuilam pakwang mide.
Chawang Ahab niu panao Jezebel khuga Elijah niu kamkhai mibo pakhiangna khatdi paniu dechiujiu Baal gu phaimiukakung maidungtu kamshat migulo chiubo lamga dinkhaide.
Paniu
Elijah se ping mide, siniu pagu ringting leng pah paktad mide. Paniu pavangpiutu majang lujiu Judah ga bambo Beersheba ga tadmide.
Siga pavangpiutu khaidiak mide,
Elijah niu n-nien marinpuiting ramjingga tadsude. Paniu mathak lujiu singbang hiuga ntaode khatdi pah shaini mide. “Haise tanju-e,
Paniu singbang hang gase jikiujiu, jipjing tad mide. Simak dakjiu maza khatniu patu dikhaijiu din-e, “Sulujiu katiu tiusulo.”
Paniu ajangjiu phuiwangboga, manuanbo taruakkhuang khat, khatdi tadui henping khat pazipi munggase ngaode. Paniu sise tiulujiu khatdi saklujiu jilan mide.
gu maza siniu wanglanjiu niabo thiujiu patu makiang sujiu din-e, “Sulujiu tiusulo, maksai chabin tadrabo npuise naleng chariuju rabo-e.”
Elijah niu sulujiu tiu sude khatdi saklan sude khatdi sibo katiu kasak siniu masanbo Luong, Sinai tangbo naimikpui atai tadraleng kabuibo pumtan pikhaide.
Siga paniu tulimki khatga ngut lujiu nchunse mathak khaide.
Bungjiu
“Tadpadjiu amasuangga maluang ton-ga chaplo,” chiujiu
Kathi saiga, chami padlande—chiudi chamigadi
Elijah niu sibo khuan chiuboga, pah ntiang khoilujiu pazu jusung lujiu chap mide. Chalad khatniu pakhuga din-e, “Haiga nang degu kambam jiulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Ngamkambo
Israel maigu chawang leng Nimshi nahpiu Jehu tu wasa manuk khailo, khatdi phaimiukakung thiujiu natu malinra Abel Meholah ga bambo Shaphat nahpiu Elisha tu wasa manuk khailo.
Hazael niu kamshat raleng kamboga paklu maitu Jehu niu kamshatmi rabo-e. Khatdi Jehu khugasu marilu maitu Elisha niu kamshat mirabo-e.
Israel mai ruangga chamai sang chinnia—atu chakhuang thiu bammai, khatdi Baal ramengtu kapupjiu kahummak mai situ masiak khai rabo-e.”

Elijah niu saodiak lujiu tadpad mide khatdi Elisha siniu matomchi ndaadungtu majang lujiu chalu phubam niubo daode. Matomchi ndaa kariu-je-khatkiutu pamaga khailujiu, paniu kanamthuboga tadjiu chalu phubamniu-e. Elijah niu pah ntiang lupad lujiu sise Elisha riga thapkhai bide.
Siga Elisha niu matomchi situ phutlujiu, Elijah tu hatadjiu khatdi din-e, “Iniu apui nai apiutu kanui khai lujiu khatdi panaitu biang-hiu khai lujiu I nasai sui tadne.”
Elijah niu paokakge, “Wi-e, kalanwang sulo, Natu I kham makge!

Sigasu Elisha niu wanglujiu matomchi nda situ kamshat lujiu, sibo kabui-kaise khoilu tasing thiujiu langkhaide. Sibo mise maidungtu pikhaijiu, paliuniu tiude. Sichiujiu paniu Elijah gu nkhapao thiujiu pasai suilujiu tadmide.

Syria mai Wangpiu Benhadad niu pagu charibao pakhiangnatu khatdi patu nkha khaibo mawangpao samriu-je-niakiutu maluang lujiu, paliu qondung khatdi chaqon-karidung hinatu puilujiu, Samaria namditu tao magui lujiu charithiu sude,
Paniu namdi gase Israel mai Wangpiu Ahab khuga chakhumpaodung langkhaijiu din-e,
“Nangniu nagu kachia, rangkang khatdi maipui mainahdung khatdi katanmai hina madun sunra chawang Benhadad niu chamtan pikhai-e.”
Ahab niu paokakge, “Sui-e, awangpiuniu atudi, agu kabambo hinadi lukam mibo I sui-e chiujiu, Chawang Benhadad khuga dinkhai bilo.”
Pasai, Benhadad niu Ahab khuga katambo chakhumpaodung langkhai lande: “Nangniu nagu kachia, rangkang khatdi maipui, mainahdung hina akhuga pikhai mira Iniu nakhuga dinkhai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu tuhoira, Iniu nawang kiningga khatdi nagu chakampaodung kyga paman kungbo mania hinase phiura agu chakampaodungtu langkhaine. Haise nsuannai haikumbo wan-ga paliu wangtang rabo-e.”

Chawang Ahab niu pagu kadihgu jupaodung hinatu ku maduilujiu din-e, “Phuilo, haibopiu hainiu aliutu kam maha khaini mide. Paniu agu kachia, rangkang khatdi anao-anahmaitu khengra champao langkhai-e, siga Iniu suikhai mide.”
Jupaodung nai maidung siniu paokakge, “Paniu kadinbo wadi suikhai tulo; suikhaibo suimakge.”
Sijengniu Benhadad gu chakhumpao maidung khuga Ahab niu paokak khai-e, “Awangpiuniu kheng karaibo sira Iniu suikhai-e, chiudi kheng kanabo sira Iniu sui-ngam lakge chiujiu dinkhai bilo.”
Chakhumpaodungse malanwang mide, siga Benhadad khugasu katambo champao khat wanglan-e:
“Iniu chamai wajiukhatu puiwang lujiu nagu namdi haitu kam maha mine, Sichiujiu sibo tukangse paliu ben-ga majumlu tadmi rabo-e. Iniu haise kammak tasai chara siniu atu kakhiushat misulo!”
Chawang Ahab niu paokakge, “Palingbo riphen khatniura chari loibo sainiu wasao thiubo-e, pasuong gara sichiu makge, chiujiu Chawang Benhadad khuga dinkhai bilo.”

Ahab niu paokak khaibo hai, Benhadad niu parupmai, mawangpaodungtu paliu rijikyga maluang jaw sak bambo wan-ga daolude. Pamaidung siniu kadenlujiu namdi situ aphenra paniu chamtan pikhaide, sichiujiu paliu bam lulujiu bam mide.
Sibo kakga, phaimiukakung khatniu Chawang Ahab khuga wanglujiu din-e, “
“Chari thiuboga saoniu jukhai ralo?” chiujiu Ahab niu maniu-e.
Phaimiukakung siniu paokakge, “Luongriang-gu dithinpaodunggu chabon riphendung siniu jukhai rabo-e chiujiu
“Saoniu chari pakhiangnagu papeese thiuralo?” chiujiu chawangniu maniu-e.
Phaimiukakung siniu paokakge, “Nangniu rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu chawangniu luongrian-gu riphenmai, papeemai pakhiangna, 232 tu kukhaijiu madui sude. Sichiujiu Israel mai riphen pakhiangna, chamai sang chinniatu paniu kupad sude.
Benhadad niu parupmai samriu-je-niakiu situ paliu rijikyga maluang jaw sak maniu lujiu bambo wan, niending tingga charise thiusu mide.
Chabuan riphendung siniu hangut-rai sude. Riphendung baose Samaria gasu padkinbo-e chiujiu Benhadad niu langpadbo akhemai siniu paowang-e.
Paniu chamtan pi-e, “Paliuniu chari thiura wangjiuma, maksai agi-manaibo khengra wangjiuma simakge, paliutu maring minlujiu wanglo.”
Chabuan riphendung siniu jukhaijiu, Israel mai riphendung siniu aphen sude,
siga mai hina paniu-paniu aphenmai situ kamshat kam lude, Syria mai pakmide, Israel maidung siniu hamatan sude, chiudi Benhadad sira chaqon tuanglujiu chaqon rimaidung khangsiatu maluanglu pak mide.
Chawang Ahab niu luzamse sutlujiu, chaqondung nai chaqon-karidungse sutlude, sichiujiu Syria maitu kamshat masa mide.
Phaimiukakung siniu Chawang Ahab khuga din-e, “Tadlujiu nagu riphendungse khom madui lulo khatdi kadensui lulo, palamra makum karia tingga Syria mai wangpiuniu aphenlan rabo-e.”

Chawang Benhadad gu chakampaodung siniu pakhuga din-e, “Israel mai radung sira maluang radung-e, sijengniu aliutu paliuniu ngamlubo-e. Chiudi aliuniu paliutu ramjengga aphensai, aliuniu ngamsiak lubui-e.
Tuhoira mawangpao samriu-je-niakiu situ luthonmi lujiu, charipidung situ malin milo.

Sichiujiu ndanai natu thonmibo riphen jiukha khatdi paliu qondung nai chaqon-karidung riakse machamjiu kusulo. Aliuniu Israel maitu ramjengga chari thiune, sichiujiu thainai menra aliuniu paliutu ngamlu rabo-e.”
Chawang Benhadad niu paliu cham situ suikhaide.
Sibo kumgu kariakting gase pamaidungtu kulujiu Aphek namdiga Israel maitu chari thiu sude.

Siga Israel maidung sidi kaden sude, sichiujiu paliu padlujiu Syria maitu zu-penbo bamga pabao nia kamlujiu rijiky thiu khaide. Kadih luongriang pakhiang phuiting bambo Syria maitu kada khaiboga, Israel maira kami thom niatu kumjiu ngaokhai-e.
Phaimiukakung khatniu Chawang Ahab khuga tadlujiu din-e, “
Jeng chinnia hai Syria mai nai Israel mai khat khattu zu-penbo bamga, paliu rijiky thiulujiu bamkhang-e. Pachinniabo naise charithiu sude, siga Israel mainiu Syria mai sang kai khattu gimide.
Kamasiakbo maise Aphek namdiga pakkhai sude, siga namdi karengse kaokiujiu chamai sang makai-je-chinniakiu tu kapsin mide.
Benhadad di namdi gase pak-ngutjiu chaky kasailam ngut nbai mide.

Pagu chakampaodungniu pakhuga tadlujiu din-e, “Israel mai wangpiura lungsasi-e chiubo aliuniu chiu-e. Sichiusai aliuniu maliufai benlu, khatdi aliu wongchengga chariang kabet lujiu Israel mai wangpiu khulam tadra suikhailo, sichiusai paniu nagu ringting hai masiak khaibo sui-e.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu paliu khen-ga maliufai makhenlu, paliu wongchengga chariang kabet lujiu Ahab khuga menglujiu din-e, “Navangpiu Benhadad niu pagu ringting jengniu nakhuga kheng-e.”
Ahab niu paokakge, “Pah ringbam khama? Wide! Pahai asingnapiu kumbo-e!”
Benhadad gu chakampaodung siniu kawibo madanse phui bamboga, Ahab niu “singnapiu,” chiu dinbo situ khoilujiu, pakhuga din-e, “Nangniu dinbo kumjiu, Benhadad hai nasingnapiu-e!”
“Patu akhuga puiwanglo,” chiujiu Ahab niu chamtan pikhaide. Benhadad niu wangboga, chaqon-kariga maluang tad machamra Ahab niu patu kukhaide.

Benhadad niu pakhuga din-e, “Apiuniu napiu khugasu sutlubo namdak rammaise Iniu nakhuga malankhai bine, sichiujiu apiuniu Samaria ga chali-chala kambo kumjiu, nangdi Damascus ga chali-chala kambo sui-e.”
Ahab niu paokakge, “Sichiusai, natu Iniu phutkhai bine.” Paniu pakhuga kawithiu lujiu patu phutkhai mide.
sijengniu pakhuga paniu din-e, “Nangniu
Sichiujiu sibo phaimiukakung siniu katambo piu khat khuga padlujiu din-e, “Atu kakhiu khailo!” Haibo piu siniu kakhiu khaide; paniu kakhiu matanju mibo jengniu patu kam ajam mide.
Phaimiukakung siniu pazuse chafairenniu domlu, paronna lunli lujiu, Israel mai wangpiuniu tadken rabo npui munggase chaplujiu khon bamme.

Sichiujiu chawang siniu tadken wangboga, phaimiukakung siniu patu kulujiu din-e, “Pakendibopiu yo, I hai chari-aphen bam khatga charithiu bamboga riphenmai khatniu minlubo mikremai khattu akhuga puiwang lujiu din-e, ‘Hainapiutu akhe mawilo, paniu pakmi tasai, nagu ringting siniu majon rabo-e maksai rangkanggi sang samriu majon rabo-e.’
Chiudi Iniu kakibo lamga pujiu bamboga sinapiuse pakmide.”
Chawang siniu paokakge, “Nang naronna nashit dinpad mide, siniu namao jengniu nang majonra mide.”
Phaimiukakung siniu chafaise pazu gasu khipad sude, siga chawang siniu silude.
Siga phaimiukakung siniu chawang khuga din-e, “Haise
Chawangse palung magenthiujiu khatdi pachun sajiu paky, Samaria lam malanwang mide.
Jezreel ga bambo Chawang Ahab gu chawangkiningga, Naboth kubo piugu mumsireng khat bamme.

Nai khat Ahab niu Naboth khuga din-e, “Nagu mumsirengse aleng pilo; haise awang kiningga bambo jengniu, chaganniw reng I kamkhai nijiu-e. Iniu haisuang kawibo kadih khat naleng pikhaine, maksai nangniu paman lunedi, Iniu pikhai bine.”
Naboth niu paokakge, “Haise Iniu apao-apehmai khugasu daolubo kaleklung-e. Haise Iniu nakhuga pikhaira
Naboth niu pakhuga dinkhaibo ladkeng jengniu Ahab palungdi pom, palungdi chariujiu paky lam wang mide. Paniu katiudi tiumakjiu tadwang paziga nunglam marilu jibam mide.
Panao Jezebel niu pakhuga tadlujiu maniu-e, “Dejengniu nang haijiukha nalung chariu bamjiulo? Dekamjiu nang katiudi tiumak jiulo?
Paniu paokakge, “Naboth ladkeng jengniu-e. Iniu pagu mumsy rengse liura dinbo-e, maksai paniu kakibo nkhiak nisai chiujiu dinbo-e, chiudi sise paniu pibo suimakge chiujiu dinkhaibo-e!”
Jezebel niu paokakge, “Wide, nang hai chawang-e, chiu makma? Nachun wijiu buangsu watiu sulo. Naboth gu mumsy rengse Iniu naleng pikhaibi rabo-e!”
Sichiujiu paniu Ahab zan gasu chamlendung raolujiu, pagom-gomlu, pagu jupao maidung khuga langkhai sude.
Chamlen siniu din-e, “Mai hinatu kumadui lujiu kalum rilo, sichiujiu Naboth tu chakhuang thiubo bamga pikhai bilo.
Paniu Tingwang nai chawang tu tasiang siang-e, chiujiu patu din masa khaira kasamai khangniatu langkhailo. Sichiujiu patu namdi lenlam jupad lujiu tatuniu rotshat milo.”
Chakampaodung nai Jezreel namdigu jupaodung siniu Jezebel gu chamtan saisuijiu kam khaide.
Paliuniu maidungtu kumadui lujiu kalum rira, senron khaide, khatdi Naboth tu chakhuang thiubo bam pikhaide.
Chamai kasamai khangnia siniu patuse mathiu rong gasu Tingwang nai chawangtu paniu siang-e chiujiu dinkhai lujiu patu namdi lenlam jupad lujiu tatuniu rotshat mide.
Jezebel khuga champao haichiujiu langkhai-e: “Naboth situ kamshat mide.”
Jezebel niu champaose daoji-daori, paniu Ahab khuga din-e, “Naboth hai shai mide. Tuhoira tadlujiu, paniu nakhuga jonkhaira suimakbo mumsirengse lulu sulo.”
Sibo rengse luraleng Ahab niu tadpadnuang mide.
Tishbe gasu phaimiukakung Elijah khuga
“Samaria mai Wangpiu Ahab khulam tadsulo. Paniu Naboth gu mumsireng situ luraleng siga bamniubo nangniu daosune.

, Iniu pakhuga haichiu dinkhai-e chiubo pakhuga dinlo, ‘Sinapiu situ kamshat lubosai, nangniu pagu maniadi lura kambam jiuma?’ Iniu haise pakhuga dinkhaibo-e ‘Naboth zai haitu tathiniu maliak khai mibo bamsiak gasu, nazaidi paliuniu maliak rabo-e’”
Ahab niu Elijah tu ngaoboga, paniu din-e, “Agu mikrepiu yo, nangniu atu minlanlu jiuma?”
Elijah niu paokakge, “Yo, Iniu minlubo-e.
Sijengniu nakhuga
Nakikhun haise Nebat nahpiu Chawang Jeroboam khatdi Ahijah nahpiu Chawang Baasha kikhun kummi rabo-e, palamra nangniu Israel maitu nuan ga jukhaijiu agu lungpomse kamkhai mide.’
Jezebel lamgara, paphaw situ Jezreel namdi lung gasu tathiniu tiulu rabo-e.
Namdi lungga nasingna mai kashaimai phaw hina situ tathiniu tiurabo-e, khatdi namdi lenlam kashaimai phaw hina situ chamitiuleng
(Panao Jezebel cham phungbo gasu,
Israel maidungniu tadpadboga hathon mibo Amor maigu ramengtu kahumjiu, mangamthubo nuanse paniu kam mide).
Elijah niu dinloi gap, Ahab niu pafaise phetlujiu khoithon mide, khatdi maliufai ben mide. Paniu katiudi tiumakjiu maliufai riga ji, khatdi pachun sajiu khatdi palung chariujiu tadmariu sude.

“Ahab niu dechiujiu asuangga manuankiu milo chiubo nang ngaoma? Paniu haichiu kamkhai mibo jengniu pagu ringting lungga haise Iniu pipad khai lakge. Iniu Ahab kikhun ga kasa kamkhai rabose panahpiu ken ganiu kamkhai rabo mide.”
Israel mai nai Syria mai kakga takum nia agi-manaijiu bamme,
chiudi pasumbo kumga Judah mai Wangpiu Jehoshaphat niu Israel mai Wangpiu Ahab tu adao khaira wang-e.
Ahab niu pagu chakampaodung khuga maniu-e, “Dekamjiu aliuniu Syria mai wangpiu khugasu Gilead ga bambo Ramoth hai kalan lura wadi kammak jiulo? Haise aliu gu-e!”
Sichiujiu Ahab niu Jehoshaphat khuga maniu-e, “Ramoth tu aphenra nangniu asai suitad khai rama?
Jehoshaphat niu paokakge, “Nangniu tadkhe chiubo tingga I tadsui-e, agu riphendung nai agu chaqon riphendung hina kaden kam bamme.
Chiudi aliuniu raijiu
Sichiujiu Ahab niu phaimiukakung maidung kai madai kumbo bao khattu kulujiu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Iniu tadlujiu Ramoth tu aphen rama, aphenmak ralo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Aphen rabo-e
Chiudi Jehoshaphat niu maniu-e, “Aliuniu
Ahab niu paokakge, “Imlah nahpiu Micaiah kubo mai khat bamkha-e. Chiudi Iniu patu phuini makge, palamra paniu kawibose wadaodi aleng sailad dinkhai makge; paniu kadinbo sira kasabo maliang-e.”
Jehoshaphat niu paokakge, “Nangniu sichiujiu wadaodi dinmak rabo-e!”
Siga Ahab niu ladjanky gu chakampao khattu pijiu meng Micaiah tu majadjiu puiwangra lang khaide.
Chawang kaniase panaigu chawang pon piulujiu, Samaria maigu rengmun lenlam asaiphung gase panai wangbamga wang ntao bamme, siga phaimiukakungmai mathiuse panai masuangga, sailad dinjiu bamme.
Paliu ruang gasu Chenaanah nahpiu Zedekiah niu chagike kamlujiu Ahab khuga din-e, “Haise
Kakibo phaimiukakung hinadi sikum gapjiu din-e, “Ramoth tu hasulo, nanainiu ngamlu rabo-e.
Sibo kakga, Micaiah tu puira tadbopiu siniu pakhuga din-e, “Chawangniu ngamrabo champao hai phaimiukakung hinaniu dinmibo kumjiu, nangdi dinsai wi-nkiu rabo-e.”
Chiudi Micaiah niu paokakge, “Ringjiu bambo
Paniu Chawang Ahab masuangga wangbo tingga, chawang siniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Micaiah yo, Chawang Jehoshaphat anainiu Ramoth tu aphen rama maksai aphenmak ralo?”
Micaiah niu paokakge, “Aphen sulo! nanainiu ngambo sui-e.
Chiudi Ahab niu kenkakge, “Nangniu
Ahab niu Jehoshaphat khuga din-e, “Paniu aleng wadaodi kawibo khatnadi sailad dinmakge chiubo, Iniu nakhuga dinmi makma? Haise kasabo ronna kha-e!”
niu maniu bamme, ‘Ahab tu Ramoth ga kamshat mira, saoniu tadlujiu patu sonralo?’ Siga mazadung siniu katam tambo lad din bamme,
siga hiupuina khatniu
niu maniu-e, ‘Dechiujiu?’ Hiupuina siniu paokakge, ‘Iniu tadlujiu Ahab gu phaimiukakung hinatu arat dinkhai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu Micaiah niu munkom khai-e, “Haise padrabo-e.
Siga phaimiukakung Zedekiah niu tadkhang lujiu, pabiangse kaphijiu din-e, “
Micaiah niu paokakge, “Nangniu kasaigu kichen lungga nbaira pakngutbo tinggasu sisu rabo-e.”
Siga Chawang Ahab niu pagu chakampao khattu chamtan pikhai-e, “Micaiah tu minlujiu namdigu dithinpao Amon nai chawangnah Joash khuga pikhai milo.
Iniu wijiu malanwang makthen patu hai kavangkyga khai milo, sichiujiu taruak nai tadui ronna patu pikhailo.”
Micaiah niu senpadle, “Nangniu wijiu malanwang dasai,
Sigasu Israel mai Wangpiu Ahab nai Judah mai Wangpiu Jehoshaphat niu tadlujiu Gilead ga bambo Ramoth namdi situ aphen sude.

Ahab niu Jehoshaphat khuga din-e, “Aliuniu chariga haichiu mengbo tingga, Ira lunli lujiu tadne, chiudi nangra nawangpuan piulujiu tadlo.” Sichiujiu Israel mai wangpiuse lunli lujiu charibamga tadmide.
Syria mai wangpiu siniu mai khat tudi aphen makjiu, Israel mai wangpiutu ronna aphenra pagu chaqon-karigu charipi samriu-je-niakiu situ chamtan pikhaide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu Jehoshaphat tu ngaoboga, pahai Israel mai wangpiu bamne chiu maning lujiu, paliuniu patu hatad sude.
Chiudi paniu marajiu senpadboga, pahai Israel mai wangpiu makge chiubo paliuniu silujiu patu hata mide.

Chiubamdi pathakniu wijiu, Syria maigu riphen khatniu tavaipi-thu khat ketpadboga, siseniu Chawang Ahab gu ripuan kakga kettao mide. Siga paniu pagu chaqon-kari karipao khuga senpadle, “Atu kam ajam mide charibam gasu mari lujiu npad milo!”

Charithiubose tankhang subo tingga, paqon-kari riga mangak lujiu, Syria maitu zupenbo bamga chap bamme. Pajam gasu tazaise luangkiujiu chaqon-kari runse phuiting mide, sichiujiu chawan kiuboga pah shai mide.
Naimik kiusu raga Israel mai hina khuga chamtan hai wang-e: “Mai hinase pagu kadih dihlam khatdi pagu-gu namdilam malanmi sulo!”
Sichiujiu Chawang Ahab hai shai mide. Paphawse Samaria lam ponwang bai mide.
Pagu chaqon-karise wang Samaria maigu ajaiga khiu khaide, siga tathiniu wangjiu pajai maliak khaide, khatdi
Chawang Ahab niu pawangkining situ chapuang himniu karu khaibo khatdi paniu thiukhaibo namdi hina lamga Israel mai Wangdunggu Rachamga raokhai bamme.
Paniu shaimiboga panahpiu Ahaziah niu pawangbamse malin mide.
Israel mai Wangpiu Ahab niu mawangbo pamadaibo kumga, Asa nahpiu Jehoshaphat niu Judah mai wang thiu mide,
paniu takum samriu-je-mangiukiuga, chawang thiusujiu, takum makai-je-mangiu Jerusalem ga mawang khaide. Papui haira Shilhi nahpui Azubah si-e.
Pamasuangga, papiu Asa kumjiu,
Jehoshaphat niu Israel mai wangtu agi-manaijiu bamra kamkhai-e.
Jehoshaphat niu patan-pahot gasu chari thiuboga kamkhai mibo hina Judah mai Wanggu Characham khuangga raokhai bamme.
Papiu Asa ken gasu, nkengmai rathakbam ga maipuidi, maipiudi papum kajonmai hinatu paniu hathon mibo-e.
Edom kadihga chawang haniu-e; haise Judah wangpiuniu kadakhaibo pasung malinbopiu khatniu haisitu mawangbo-e.
Chawang Jehoshaphat niu duinaiga tadra malee
Siga Israel mai wangpiu Ahaziah niu pamaitu maluang lujiu maleese ramra dinkhai-e, chiudi Jehoshaphat niu suikhai makge.
Jehoshaphat shai mide siga patu David namdiga chawang kikhun gu charawga patu baikhai-e, siga panahpiu Jehoram niu chawang thiujiu patu malin mide.
Judah mai Wangpiu Jehoshaphat niu mawangbo takum kariu-je-chinniakiuga, Ahab nahpiu Ahaziah niu Israel mai wangpiu thiu-e, khatdi paniu Samaria ga takum nia mawang khaide.
Pasuang lungrai mibo, papiu Ahab, papui Jezebel khatdi Chawang Jeroboam paliu kumjiu Israel maitu nuan ga jukhaide.
Pasuangga lungkhaibo papiu kumjiu, paniu Baal tu kahumjiu khatdi machajiu, Israel mai Rawang,
Israel maigu Chawang Ahab niu shaimibo saiga, Moab mainiu Israel maitu atungjiu chari thiu-e.

Israel maigu Chawang Ahaziah niu Samaria ga bambo chawangky rigasu n-kaikiujiu ajam masa mide. Sijengniu pahai wilanlu rama, wilanlu laklo chiubo Ekron namdiga bambo Philistia mai ra Baalzebub khuga maniura ladlangtadmai khangsiatu langkhaide.
Chiudi
niu din-e, chiujiu chawang khuga dinlo,’ Najam gasu nang wilanlak mide; nang shaimi rabo-e!’”
khatdi ladlang tadmainiu chawang khuga malanwang lanboga, paniu maniu-e, “Dekamjiu naliu malanwang kinjiulo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Maipiu khat aliutu adaojiu wanglan misulo chiujiu dinkhai-e, khatdi
Chawang niu maniu-e, “Sibo piuse dekum gaplo?”
“Pahai chamiginiu machalubo ntiang ntiang-e, chamigi khen-gak khai-e,” chiujiu paliuniu paokakge,
“Haise Elijah si-e!” chiujiu chawang niu dinde.

Sigasu paniu Elijah tu puiwanglo chiujiu chakampao khat nai chamai ringiutu langkhaide. Elijah niu maluang riga ntao bamniubo ngao lujiu din-e, “Charawang mai yo, chawangniu natu wangkiulo chiujiu chamtan pikhai-e.”
Chawang niu katambo chakampao khat nai chamai ringiutu langkhai lande, khatdi paliuniu tadkhang lujiu Elijah khuga din-e, “Charawang mai yo, chawangniu natu kalangjiu kiulo chiujiu chamtan pikhai-e!”
“I hai Charawang mai-e sai, tinggen lamsu chami langkiujiu natu khatdi namaidungtu chaminiu rushat milo!” Sibo wan siakga chami langkiujiu chakampao nai pamaidung situ chaminiu rushat mide.

Sibo riga sanjiu chawangniu chakampao khat nai chamai ringiutu langkhai lande. Chakampaose maluang rigase khanglujiu Elijah masuangga khudung kiujiu din-e, “Charawang mai yo, atu khatdi amaidungtu lungsa khailo. Aliu ringtingtu gukhailo!
Chakampao khangnia khatdi panai maidungtu tinggen lamsu chami langkiujiu rushat kammide; chiudi atura lungsa khailo!”

khatdi chawang khuga din-e, “Tingwang niu dinmibo ladkeng sira hai-e; ‘Israel mai ruangga chara ha-e chiubo maningjiu—Ekron ga bambo ra Baalzebub tu npaora—champao maitu nangniu langkhaibo jengniu, nang wilanlak mide, nang shaimi rade!’”

Elijah khuga Tingwang niu dinmibo kumjiu Chawang Ahaziah shai mide. Ahaziah panah npiumai ha-e, sijengniu Judah maigu chawang Jehoshaphat nahpiu Jehoram niu mawangbo takum niabo kumga pa-singnapiu Joram niu patu malinjiu chawang thiude.
Chawang Ahaziah niu tenkhai mibo hina Israel maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Tingwang niu Elijah tu nbui-maribo tingkai ganiu tinggenlam lusumi rabo leng pawanse wangtang mide. Elijah nai Elisha niu Gilgal gasu kenpad sude.
Sichiujiu npuiga Elijah niu Elisha khuga din-e, “Tuhoira haiga nang bammi sulo,
Chiudi Elisha niu paokakge, “Ringbambo
Siga lungbambo phaimiukakungdung ruangga khatniu Elisha khuga wangjiu maniu-e, “
“Yo, I si-e,” chiujiu Elisha niu paokakge, “Chiudi haibo lamga din dukhe.”
Siga Elijah niu Elisha khuga din-e, “Tuhoira haiga nang bammi sulo,
Chiudi Elisha niu paokakge, “Ringbambo
Siga lungbambo phaimiukakungmai bao khatniu Elisha khuga wanglujiu maniu-e, “
“Yo, I si-e,” chiujiu Elisha niu paokakge. “Chiudi haibo lamga din dukhe.”
Sigasu Elijah niu Elisha khuga din-e, “Tuhoira haiga nang bammi sulo;
Chiudi Elisha niu paokakge, “Ringbambo

siga phaimiukakungmai ringiuniu panai saisui tadjiu Jordan giuky mengtang-e, Elijah nai Elisha haira Jordan giuky mungga chap bamme, khatdi phaimiukakungmai ringiu sira singgiu chaphu gasu diubijiu chap bamme.
Sibo wan-ga Elijah niu pagu ntiang kadibo lupad lujiu, khatdi sise kalui lujiu, taduitu siniu dapkhaiboga, taduise njanpad mide, khatdi Elisha panaise kasangbo kadih gasu hugen khatlamse padmide.
Siga, Elijah niu Elisha khuga din-e, “Atu lutad makbo masuangga Iniu naleng degu kamkhai diakra nangniu masenlo akhuga dinkhailo.”
Elisha niu paokakge, “Iniu nabam malin luraleng
“Haise pikhaira kakungbo gu khatle,” chiujiu Elijah niu paokakge. “Chiudi atu lukhang mibo nangniu ngaosai daolu rabo-e; nangniu atu ngaolu maksai, sise nang daolu lakge.”
Panainiu haichiu npaojiu tadkhangboga, bungjiu chamigu chaqondungniu chamigu chaqon-kari julujiu panai kakga wangde, sichiujiu nbui mariwangbo tingthung siniu Elijah tu tinggenlam lukhang mide.
Elisha niu sise ngaolujiu Elijah khuga din-e, “Apiu yo, apiu yo! Ngamkambo Israel maitu gukhaipiu yo! Nang tad mira dama!” Sigasu Elijah tu paniu wadi ngaolan tamide.
Palung chariujiu, Elisha niu pa-ntiangse phet-nia thiu mide.
Sigasu Elijah gu ntiang nkaikiubose Elisha niu khoilude. Khatdi malan wangjiu Jordan kungga chap bamde.
Paniu Elijah ntiangse taduiga dapkhaijiu din-e, “Elijah Rawang,
Jerikho ga bambo phaimiukakungmai ringiu siniu Elisha tu ngaolujiu din-e, “Elijah gu pumtan hai Elisha khuga bammide!” Paliuniu patu adaora tadlujiu pamasuangga khudung kiude,,
khatdi din-e, “Haiga aliu chamai khang ringiu katanbo mai maliang bamme. Aliuniu tadlujiu nawangpiutu phiukhe.
“Makge, naliu tadtulo,” chiujiu Elisha niu paokakge.
Chiudi paliutu tadsulo chiu dinkhai makthen paliuniu Elisha khuga matanjiu din bamme. Chamai khang ringiuse jeng sum tadronjiu Elijah tu phiu sude, chiudi patu phiudao makge.
Sigasu Jerikho ga khuanjiu bambo Elisha khuga malan wangde, khatdi paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Iniu naliutu tadtulo chiu dinkhai mibo makma?”
Jerikho ga bammai khangsianiu Elisha khuga wangjiu din-e, “Paohubo, nangniu sibambo kum, haise wisuibo namdi khatle, chiudi tadui hai sabo jengniu tanah kiumi mi-e.”
Paniu chamtan pi-e, “Wakuang kasanbo khatga matai tamnakha khailujiu akhuga khoiwanglo.” Sise paliuniu pakhuga khoiwangde.
Siga paniu duipinlam tadlujiu taduiga matai maruk khaijiu din-e, “
Elisha niu masande chiu dinmibo nai gasu taduise tuhoi tangbo masan jutjiu bam mide.
Elisha niu Jerikho gasu Bethlehem lam tadmide, khatdi npuiga npiumainah khangsianiu namdi gasu padlujiu patu tanui thiujiu din-e, “Pee kuakbo, pee-lana, haigasu tadmilo!” chiujiu sen-e.
Elisha niu mariwangjiu, paliutu palung aman makjiu phui-e, khatdi
Elisha niu Carmel Luonglam khangkhai lujiu Samaria lam malanwang mide.
Judah maigu Chawang Jehoshaphat niu takum kariu-je-tachat mawangkhai miboga Ahab nahpiu Joram niu Israel mai wang thiude, sichiujiu paniu Samaria ga takum kariu-je-niakiu mawang khaide.
khuga paniu nuan kamde, chiudi papiu nai papui Jezebel siat kumjiu satang makge; Baal tu kahumra papiuniu somdiakbo charamengse paniu kaladthon mibo-e.
Chiudi, pasuangga bamniubo Nebat nahpiu Chawang Jeroboam kumjiu Israel maidungtu paniu saomakjiu nuan ga jukhaide.
Moab maigu Chawang Mesha hai mily makuatjiu khatdi ramkha thiujiu tingkum machang milypoi 100,000 khatdi mily 100,000 gu milygiu Israel maigu chawang leng pibambo-e.
Chiudi Israel maigu Chawang Ahab niu shaimiboga, Mesha niu Israel mai riga charithiu sude.
Sibo wan ga Chawang Joram niu Samaria saodia lujiu pagu riphendungtu khom maduisude.
Judah maigu Chawang Jehoshaphat khulam tacham paokhai-e. “Moab maigu chawangniu atu atungjiu chari thiujiu bamme, patu chari thiuboga, nang asai suijao khailan rama?”
“I suine,” chiujiu Chawang Jehoshaphat niu paokakge, “Sichiujiu I nasai suiliang raleng chamai khatdi chaqon kaden bamde.
Debo npuilam aliutu aphenra tadlo chiujiulo?”
Joram niu paokakge, “Aliu npui kathengbo lam Edom gu ramjing kenjiu wangne.”
Sijengniu Chawang Joram khatdi Judah mai wang nai Edom mainiu chari thiura tadsude. Paliuniu jeng chinnia tadkhai lubo sai, tadui daota mide, sichiujiu chamailengdi khaorui lengdi hamide.
Chawang Joram niu din-e, “Aliu hai loi mide!”
Chawang Jehoshaphat niu din-e, “Haiga
Chawang Joram gu charipi thiubo khangkhatniu paokakge. “Shaphat nahpiu Elisha haiga bamme, pahai Elijah tu nkhabo piu-e.”
Chawang Jehoshaphat niu din-e, “Pahai pachang siakbo phaimiukakung khatle.” Sijengniu chawang khang sumse Elisha khulam tadsude.
Elisha niu Israel maigu chawang khuga din-e, “Iniu naliutu dechiujiu nkha ralo? Tadlujiu naliu puipiuniu maniukinbo phaimiukakung maikhuga maniu lulo.”
Joram niu paokakge, “Makge! Haichiu khaikhe tulo.
Elisha niu paokakge, “Iniu machajiu bambo ringbambo
Tuhoira chalui thiu kasimai khattu puiwanglo.”
Sichiujiu chalui kathiu mainiu pagu tara gegap khaiboga
siga paniu din-e, “
Naliuniu tingsabo maksai ting-hunbo ngaomak bamtadi singgiu hina taduiniu phuibamniu rabo-e, naliuniu khatdi naliugu khaorui-khaonadung siniu sakraleng mali malan bammi rabo-e.’”
Elisha niu dinlan-e, “Chiudi haichiu kambo hai

Naliuniu paliugu charireng kawibo kamkhaibo namdidungtu ngamlu rabo-e, naliuniu paliugu charasy bang hina huimi rabo-e, paliugu duipin hina khammi rabo-e khatdi paliugu kadih kawibo hinase tatuniu khonsim mirabo-e.”
Pasaibo nai, nsuan gu charathiubo wan ga, Edom lamsu tadui luangwangjiu kadih chungphui mide.
Chawang mai khangsum siniu paliutu chari thiura wangbamde chiubo Moab mainiu chiulubo wan ga chari mania thin kasi hina kating-kana simakjiu mathiutu kupad lujiu ramrai gase khuanjiu bam mide.
Pasaibo nai nsuan paliuniu buangsuboga, naimikniu taduitu thaokhaiboga taduise tazai kum heng maren mide.
“Haise tazai -e!” chiujiu paliu dinsude, “Mikrebo mai khang sumgu riphenmai paliu karai chari thiujiu, khatniu khattu kamshat bambode! Khe aliu tadlujiu paliu rijikyga bambo mania sung sukhe!”
