Chiudi paliuniu charibam mengtang gap chiubo wan ga, Israel mainiu paliutu chari aphen sude, khatdi paliutu hamalan sude. Israel mainiu Moab maitu hajutjiu kamshat sude,

sichiujiu paliugu namdidung kam masa mide. Kadih kawibo luzamga paliuniu tadken wangboga, chaluse phuimak then Israel mai hinaniu tatu thonkhai sude, paliuniu duipinkidi makad mide, khatdi charasy bangdi huikam mide. Kanamboga Kir Heres gu namdi ronna masiak khaijiu, getpi kathin mainiu chap magui lujiu chari thiu sude.

Moab maigu chawangniu pah chari ngam lulak mide chiubo silujiu, chaheng thin kasimai kai chinniatu majanglujiu mikre mainiu bambo gasu, Syria mai wangpiu khulam pak-mari lura matan sude, chiudi ngamlulak mide.

Sichiujiu pawangbam malin rabo panah tingthubo piutu Moab mai ra Chemosh leng kamshat lujiu kadkhai mide. Haise Israel mainiu ngaolujiu Israel mai charen masa mide. Sijengniu paliu dihlam masai nkhinjiu malan mide.

Phaimiukakung mai ruangga khangkhat nao kamipui khatniu Elisha khuga tadlujiu din-e, “Paohubo yo, akina shaimide! Nangniu sibambo kum, padi Tingwang tu pingbo mai-e. Chiudi tuhoira akinaniu rangkang paw phungdiakbo jengniu rangkang apuk khaibopiu siniu anah kaniatu kavangleng lumira chiujiu wang bamde.”
Paniu din-e, “Iniu naleng dekam khairalo? Nakyga nde-de bamlo, akhuga dinlo,”
Maipui siniu paokakge, “Takisa lahpoi khatse makjiu, wadi ha-e.”
Elisha niu pakhuga din-e, “Nakiningmai hina khuga tadlujiu nangniu ngamdiu then chaliruang mathiu sulo.
Sigasu nang khatdi nanah kaniatu kalungga majang ngut lujiu akham nam milo, khatdi takisase chali ruang hinaga runkhailo. Sise phuigap sai jupad milo.”
Sijengniu maipuise panah--kaniatu majanglujiu paky kalung lam ngutlujiu, akham nam mide, khatdi takisa lahse khoilujiu panah kanianiu mathiuwangbo chaliruang hina gase runkhai sude.
Paliuniu chali hina piphui khailubo saiga chali kaki bamkhama chiujiu maipui siniu maniu-e. Panahpiu khatniu paokakge, “Haisiniu kaloibo-e.” Siga takisase luangsao mide.
Phaimiukakung Elisha khuga maipui siniu malan mengboga paniu pakhuga din-e, “Takisase jonlujiu napaw hina ruimi sulo, khatdi nanah naliu khangsum leng ringlu kabuibo rangkang mali lubui-e.”
Naikhat Elisha niu kalek wibo pui khatniu lungbambo Shunem lam tadle. Sibo puiniu Elisha tu tek tiura ku-e khatdi sibo saira, Shunem tadbo wan machang sibo pui kyga katiu tiutan-tan mide.
Maipui siniu pakina khuga din-e, “Akyga wangtan-tan bambo piu haise masanbo mai khatle, chiubo I si-e.
Aliuniu chakai riga kichen khat macha khaikhe, siga tazi khat, wakai khat, bamrek khat, khatdi chamibung khat khai nbamkhe, chiusai paniu aliu khuga wangbo wan-wan ga bamlu rabo-e”
Sichiujiu Elisha niu Shunem ga nai khat malan wangjiu, pagu kichen lam khang mathak mide.
Maipui situ tadlujiu kuwanglo chiujiu pavang Gehazi tu Elisha niu din-e. Maipui siniu wangboga,

Elisha niu Gehazi khuga din-e, “Anaileng pageng bambo hina paniu chariujiu kaden khaibibo jengniu papao ruibo thiujiu, Iniu paleng degu kamkhai ralo chiubo maniulo. Chawang maksai charipi khuga tadlujiu paleng chalad kawibo Iniu dinkhai ratu masen bamta lakge.”
Maipui siniu paokakge, “Iniu amai ruangga bamjiu aleng changlakbo wakhatdi thiu makge.”
Elisha niu Gehazi khuga maniu-e, “Chiusai Iniu paleng nde kamkhai ralo?”
Gahazi niu paokakge, “Wide, pahai panah npiumai ha-e, pakinadi tanpao mide.”
“Maipui situ haiga wangra kukhailo,” chiujiu Elisha niu din-e, Maipuise wangjiu kamun-ga chapde.
Siga Elisha niu pakhuga din-e, “Ma-kum haikumbo tingga, nanah npiumai khat lung sune.
Maipui siniu din-e, “Oh! Paohubo yo, akhuga aratbo lad dinkhai jantulo. Nangra Tingwang mai khatle!”
Chiudi Elisha niu dinmibo kumjiu, pasaibo kum sikumbo wan ga maipuise panah npiumai khat manade.
Takum wajiukha bamlubo sai, atiat tingga, npiumainahse naikhat nsuan chalulam maidungtu maluang lujiu atiat bambo papiu khulam tad mide.
Nongbungjiu, “Apee thiu-e! Apee thiu-e!” chiujiu papiu khuga dinsude.
Papiuniu pavangmai khattu kulujiu din-e, “Haibo nahtu papui khulam majangwang milo.”
Kavang siniu npiumainah situ papui khulam phungwang mide. Papuiniu patuse niending katang paniang riga pon ntao bambo gasu shai mide.
Maipui siniu panah tuse Elisha gu kichen ga ponkhangjiu taziga majikhai diak lujiu khatdi akham nam lujiu tadmide.
Sigasu pakinatu kulujiu haichiu din-e, “Kavang khattu qonniam puilujiu wangra langkhailo. Phaimiukakung Elisha khuga tadrabo ngam I bamme. Ngamdiuthen I wanglan maji rabo-e.”
Pakina siniu maniu-e, “Thainai hai Tabamnai makge maksai Hiusan ngee naidi makge. Deleng nang thainai tadralo?”
Siga maipui siniu paokakge, “Wadi makge.”
Siganiu maipuise qonniam riga ntao lujiu, pavangpiu khuga din-e, “Ngamdiuthen qonniam haitu tad matanra kamlo, khatdi Iniu din makthen mathak tulo.”
Sichiujiu maipuise Elisha niu bambo Carmel Luonglam tadmide.
Kadiu lamsu maipui siniu wangkinbo Elisha niu ngaolujiu pavangpiu Gehazi khuga din-e, “Phuilo—Shunem lamsu maipuise wangkin-e!
Pak-kalang sulo, khatdi pakina nai panahpiu wijiu bamma chiujiu maniulo.”
Maipui siniu Gehazi khuga din-e, wahina wijiu bamme,

chiudi maipui siniu Elisha khuga wangtangboga pasuangga makhum kiujiu Elisha phi kiapman mide. Gahazi niu maipui tuse jupadra kam sude, chiudi Elisha niu din-e, “Phutkhai milo, palung chariuchang chariu bambo hai nang ngaomak jiuma? Chiudi haibo lamga Tingwang niu akhuga wadi dinkhai makge.”
Maipui siniu pakhuga din-e, “Paohubo yo, Iniu nakhuga anah npiumai lungra kheng jiuma? Haikumbo agu agunbo haitu kam mahami makra chiu dinmibo makma?”

Elisha niu Gahazi khuga mariwang lujiu din-e, “Kalang sulo! Athun hai thinlujiu tadsulo. Npuiga kadaobo maitu npaojiu mathakmi tulo, khatdi natu daobo maitu kenjiu pawan kam mahami tulo. Chakylam tad taron meng tathun haise npiumainah riga nbeng khailo.”
Chiudi maipui siniu Elisha khuga din-e, “Ringjiu bambo

Gehazi tadrai menglujiu Elisha thunse npiumainah riga nbeng khaide, chiudi siga pakhuan wadi padmakge, maksai karingbogu madan wakhatdi padmakge. Sijengniu Elisha khuga malan wangjiu din-e, “Npiumainahse buangsu makge.”
Elisha niu wangtangboga, paronna npiumainahniu bambo kichen ga ngutmide khatdi npiumainahse shaijiu taziga majikhai nbambose ngaode.
Paniu akham namlujiu Tingwang khuga kheng-e.
Sichiujiu npiumainah riga makhumkiu lujiu, pamun-ga, pamik ga khatdi paben-ga sonkhai sude, sichiu khaiboga npiumainah pumse lumwang sude.
Elisha niu buangsu lanjiu tadpad jat khailujiu wanglanjiu ngena riga sonkhai lande. Siga ngenase tasilon chinnia lujiu pamik rakpad mide.
Elisha niu Gahazi tu kulujiu ngena puituse kura dinkhaide. Maipuise wangboga Elisha niu din-e, “Haiga na-nahse bamde.”
Paniu Elisha phiga kaokiu pazu kadih niatang khailujiu panahtu majanglu tadmide.

Pawan khat, sibo ramlung pakhiangnaga charakhum wangde. Elisha niu Gilgal lam malanwang lujiu, phaimiukakung bao khattu katikhaijiu bambo wan ga, pavangpiutu n-mangga chali kadibo khat khengsu lujiu paliuleng katiu kaden khaira dinkhaide.

Paliu ruangga khang khatra chaganniw lura chalulam tadmide. Paniu nkan gu mumken khat dao-e, khatdi marao kumbo kengkha hilujiu phungwang-e, Paniu phungwangbose ndelo chiubo simakjingjiu langbambo chaliga taliu lujiu khai mide.
Katiu tiurabo leng lupadde, chiudi paliuniu chaganse machanjiu Elisha khuga din-e, “Haise patai karabo gan-e!”—tiusui lakge.
Elisha niu katiuse poinakha khenglujiu, sise chaliga taliang khaijiu din-e, “Katiuse paliuleng lupadlan bilo.” Sibo saiga tiubamdi wadi thiuta mide.

Katambo wan khatga, Baal Shalishah lamsu maipiu khatniu takumgu atiat karaibogu miusan taruak khuang makai khatdi miubui kasan phunglujiu Elisha khuga wang-e. Sise phaimiukakung mai bao situ pitiu khaira Elisha niu pavangpiu khuga din-e,
chiudi pavangpiuniu paokakge, “Haisiniu chamai kai khat leng builune chiubo nangniu maning jiuma?”
Elisha niu paokakge, “Paliutu pitiu khailo, palamra Tingwang niu din-e, paliuniu tiulubo saidi kasia malilan rabo-e”
Sijengniu pavangpiu siniu paliutu pitiu khaide. Khatdi
Paliuniu Israel maitu chari thiuboga, Syria maidungniu Israel mai npuimanah khattu kavang thiujiu minwang mibo-e, sibo puise Naaman naogu kavang thiubam niu-e.
Naikhat sibo pui siniu pawangpui khuga din-e, “Awangpiu niu Samaria ga lung bambo phaimiukakung khulam Ira pitad khaini-e! Chiusai paniu awangpiu rapot hai piwikhai birabo-e.”
Naaman niu haise chiuluboga chawang khulam tadlujiu npuimanah siniu dinbo ladse dinde.
Chawang niu din-e, “Israel maigu chawang khulam tadsulo khatdi haibo chamlen hai chawang khuga pikhai bilo.”
Sichiujiu Naaman niu rangkang sang samriu khatdi kachia khuang sang charuk khatdi chafai kawibo pamalin kariu phunglujiu tadmide.
Chamlen cham sira hai-e, “Haibo chamlen ganiu agu chakampao Naaman lamga pisikhaibo-e, nangniu hainapiu rapot hai kam mawi khairatu Iniu lunibo-e.”

Israel maigu chawangniu chamlense kenpadbo wan ga pasuong haju mijiu pafai phet sude, khatdi din-e, “Dechiujiu Syria maigu chawangpiuniu haibo Naaman rapot haitu piwi khaira malum jiulo? Atu hai karingbo khatdi kashaibo pumtan bambo Tingwang-e chiubo paniu maning jiuma? Pahai atu n-gi khengbambo-e chiubo hai masanjiu si-e.”

Degu padmi gulo chiubose phaimiukakung Elisha niu chiulujiu, chawang khuga tacham langkhai-e: “Dekamjiu nangniu haijiukha nalung chariubam gulo? Maipiu tuse akhuga langwanglo, khatdi Israel mai ruangga phaimiukakung bamme, chiubo pakhuga Iniu kamlen khai bine.”
Siga Naaman niu chaqon-kari ganiu pamaitu majang lujiu tadsude, khatdi Elisha ky kamun ga mathak khaide.
Elisha niu pavang khattu pakhuga langkhaijiu din-e, Jordan giulam tadlujiu papumse taduiga nphumlon chinnia sai parapotse wi masan siakmi rabo-e.
Siga Naaman se palung pomjiu tadmide, khatdi din-e, “Iniu maningbora phaimiukakung siniu akhuga padlujiu, pa-Rawang,
Sironna makjiu, Damascus ga bambo Abana, khatdi Pharpar giuniudi Israel ga bambo giu suang wi nkiu makma? Siga nkhiujiu I wilu bui-e!”

Pavangmaidung siniu Naaman khuga wangjiu din-e, “Paohubo, phaimiukakung siniu natu kakungbo ngam hai kamlo chiusai, nang sise kamrabo-e. Sichiusai dekamjiu paniu dinbo kumjiu napum nkhiu lujiu wimira kammak jiulo?”

Sijeng gasu Naaman niu Jordan giulam tadkiu lujiu Elisha niu dinkhaibo kum papumse siga nphum lon chinnia khaide, siga papumse masan siakjiu wi mide. Patiase nahmai tia kumjiu madiolan mide, sichiujiu papum wilan mide.
Paniu pamaidungtu majanglujiu Elisha khuga malan wangjiu din-e, “Israel mai Rawang makjiu chara kakibo ha-e; paohubo yo, agu kalen hai lukhai khelo.”
Elisha niu paokakge, “Iniu machajiu bambo ringbambo
Lukhailo chiujiu Naaman niu matanjiu din-e, chiudi pah lukhaibi makge.
Sijengniu Naaman niu din-e, “Nangniu agu kalen lukhai lakge sai, taniang hai qonniam bang nia chakylam phungtadra aleng pikhailo, palamra tuhoi ganiu
Haichiujiu Iniu awangpiutu maluong lujiu Syria mai ra, Rimmon rakyga mengjiu patu kahumsai,
“Agi-manaijiu tadsulo,” chiujiu Elisha niu din-e. Sichiujiu Naaman tadpad mide.
Siga Naaman niu watheng tadpad makhaga,

Elisha vangpiu Gehazi paronna haichiu dinsude, “Awangpiu leng Naaman niu wadi pikhai makjiu tadmide, Syria maipiuniu Elisha khuga pibose pah lurabo thao-e. Ringbambo Rawang niu silulo Iniu patu hatad sune khatdi pakhugasu mania kasiara khoilu rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu paniu Naaman sailam hatad sude. Naaman niu pasailam chamai pakmeng kinbo ngaolujiu patu adaora chaqon riganiu kiujiu, “Wa kamaobo bammi jiuma,” chiu maniude.

“Wadi makge,” chiujiu Gehazi niu paokakge. “Chiudi awangpiuniu haise nakhuga dinlo chiujiu atu langkhaijiu mengkinbo-e chiubora Ephraim luonglamsu phaimiukakung ruangganiu rup nia tuhoi wang bamme, siniu paliuleng rangkang sang sum khatdi chafai kawibo pamalin nia pikhai ratu masenjiu paniu atu langkhaijiu mengkinbo-e.”

“Lungsajiu rangkanggi sang charuk khoilulo,” chiujiu Naaman niu paokakge. Paniu matanjiu, rangkang gise takhao niaga khailujiu pikhaide khatdi chafai kawibo pajat niase kavang khangniatu pikhaijiu Gehazi maga raijiu langkhai mide.
Elisha niu lungbambo luongga panai wangtangbo wan ga Gehazi niu rangkang khao niase khoilujiu kalunglam khaimide. Sigasu Naaman vang kania situ lang malan khai mide.
Paniu chaky lungga ngut bamboga Elisha niu maniu-e, “Nang delam tadjiulo?”
“Oh, walamdi tadmakge, paohubo,” chiujiu paniu paokakge.

Chiudi Elisha niu din-e, “Maipiu siniu natu adaora pagu chaqon-kari ganiu kiubo wan gase ahiupuina siga bambo makma? Rangkang, chafai-tani, takisy-reng, mumsy reng, mily khatdi kabui, maksai kavang lusuibo wan makge!
Siniu tuhoira Naaman rapotse nariga khatdi nakai-nakik riga tingthengjiu bammi sulo.”
Gehazi tadpad gapga pakhuga charapotse bammide, pagise kabun kumjiu kapuang mide.
Naikhat Elisha niu phuijiu bambo phaimiukakung rupmainiu pakhuga suini makjiu din-e, “Aliuniu lungjiu bambo bamse siamju-e!
Jordan lam tadraleng aliutu suikhailo khatdi aliuniu lungrabo bam khat thiura singbang huisune.”
“Wide,” chiujiu Elisha niu paokakge.
Paliu ruangga mai khatniu paliutu maluang tadra pakhuga matanjiu kheng-e; paniu suikhaide,
khatdi paliu tadpad nchamde. Paliuniu Jordan ga mengtang lujiu, paliu tatien thiusude.
Mai khatniu singbang huibamboga, bungjiu pagu chagigu maripiangse tadui lungga tiakiu mide. “Paohubo yo, I dechiu ralo?” chiujiu paniu Elisha khuga manangjiu din-e, “Mari haise mathiu wangbo-e!”
“Debo jailam ntiakiu mijiulo?” chiujiu Elisha niu maniu-e.
Sibo piu siniu pabamse pakhuga lenkhai-e, siga Elisha niu tasingtang khat bitap padlujiu, sise tadui lungga thonkhaide, siga maripiang situ pijiu malam khang khaide.
“Lupad milo,” chiujiu paniu chamtan pikhaiboga, sibo piuniu marungkiu sise lukhang mide.
Syria maigu chawangniu Israel maitu chari thiubam niu-e. Paniu pagu chakampaodungtu makhiam thiu lujiu pabam wibo phuijiu charibam leng macha lude.
Israel maigu chawang khuga Elisha niu tacham paokhai-e. Chiubora sibo bamga wang manatulo siga Syria mainiu nbaijiu paliutu chuan bamme.
Sijengniu Israel mai wangpiuniu sibo bamga lungbam maitu dinkhai bijiu, paliu akhejiu bammide. Pawan kathengkha haichiu padmibode.
Haibo lamga Syria maigu chawang palung chariu suimide, pagu chakampaodung khuga maniu-e, “Naliu ruangga saoniu Israel mai wangpiu lam liangbam jiulo?”
Paliu ruangga khangkhatniu paokakge, “Mai khatdi ha-e. Pakendibopiu yo, chiudi nangniu nakyga mahin dinbambo katang phaimiukakung Elisha niu Israel maigu chawang khuga dinbambo-e.”
Chawang niu chamtan pikhaide, “Pah dega bamlo chiubo phiupadlo Iniu patu minrabo-e.”
Paniu sichiu dinbo wan gase Elisha niu Dothan ga bamme, siga paniu chaqon-kari jaojiu riphenmai kengkhatu silamse langkhaide. Paliuniu namdi gase nchuntingga mengtangde khatdi situ taomagui lude.

Pasaibo nai nsuan-chun Elisha vangpiu buangsu lujiu chaky gasu tadpadbo wan ga Syria maigu riphendung nai chaqondung khatdi chaqon-karidungniu namdi situ taomagui lujiu bambo ngaode. Paniu Elisha khuga malan wanglujiu din-e, “Paohubo yo, aliu hai shai rabo mide. Aliuniu nde kamralo?”
“Pingmane,” chiujiu Elisha niu paokakge. “Paliu khulam suang aliu khulam keng nkiu bamme.”
Sichiujiu paniu kakheng thiusude, “Oh
Syria maidungniu chari asunsu rabo wan-ga Elisha niu kakheng thiu-e, “Oh,

Siga Elisha niu paliu khuga wangjiu din-e, “Naliu npui kamakbo lam tadkhai mide, naliuniu phiubambo namdi sira silam makge. Asai suilo, khatdi naliuniu phiubambo piu khulam Iniu majang khai bine.” Sichiujiu paniu paliutu Samaria ga majang khaide.
Paliuniu namdi ngut tanggapboga, Elisha niu kakheng thiukhai lan-e, “
Israel mai wangpiuniu Syria maidungtu ngaolujiu Elisha khuga maniu-e, “Paohubo, Iniu haimaitu kamshatmi rama? Iniu haimaitu kamshatmi rama?”

“Suimakge,” chiujiu Elisha niu paokakge. “Charithiubo bam gasu naliuniu minlubo riphendungtu nangniu kamshat makrabo-e, paliutu pitiu, pisak khailo sichiujiu paliutu, paliu wangpiu khulam pimalan khai milo.”

Sijengniu Israel mai wangpiuniu paliutu maluad kadibo khat pitiu khaide, sichiujiu tiu-sak lubo sai, paniu paliutu Syria mai wangpiu khulam langkhai mide. Sibo sailamsu Syria mainiu Israel maitu chari thiuta mide.
Pawan khat bamnak lubo sai Syria maigu chawang Benhadad niu pagu riphenmai pakhiangnatu puilujiu Israel maitu chari thiusude, khatdi Samaria namditu taomagui lude.
Taomagui mibo jengniu namdiga katiu hamijiu katiu riangchang riangmide, chiujiu qonniam pee khatga rangkang riaktachat khatdi makhao-ba
Israel mai wangpiuniu namdigu kareng riga tadpadbo wan ga maipui khatniu sen-e, “Atu nkha khailo, Pakendibopiu yo!”
Paniu paokakge, “
Nagu chariubose ndelo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Ndanai maipui khat siniu anahtu langtiukhe, sichiujiu pasaibo naise panahtu langtiukhe chiujiu khanne.
Sijengniu anainiu anahtu langtiu lude, pasaibo nai Iniu panahtu langtiukhe chiuboga para panahtu bai mide!”
Haise chiuboga, chawangse palung chariuju mijiu pafai pani-phet lujiu maliufai benmide, sise patu kareng lungga maluang bam maidungniu ngao mide.
Paniu senpadle, “Thainai Iniu Elisha pee danglu maksai
Sichiujiu Elisha tu minra langkhai mide.

Sibo wan ga, Elisha sira pakhuga mengbo katingmaitu majang lujiu chakyga ntao bamniu-e. Chawanggu champaomai wangtang makhabo masuangga, Elisha niu katingmai khuga din-e, “Chamai kagibo piuniu atu gira chamai langwang kin-e! Tuhoi haiga pah wang dasai akham nam milo, sichiujiu patu pi ngutkhai tulo. Chawang papumsiakdi maipiu saigase suiwang kinne.”
Paniu haise dinloi makhaga, chawang siniu wangtang lujiu din-e, “Aliu khuga magenthiubo hina
Elisha niu paokakge, “
Chawanggu nkhapiuniu Elisha khuga din-e, “
Elisha niu paokakge, “Haise padbo nangniu ngaosune chiudi nangra wadi tiutao lakge.”
Samaria gu rengmun lenlam nphenmai khang madai bamme, khatdi paliu karai khatniu khat khuga din-e, “Haibo bamga shai makthen detu aliu khuanjiu bamralo?

Namdilam tadbo pageng ha-e, palamra sibo bamga aliu kami-mijiu shaira-e. Chiudi aliuniu haiga bamdi, shairabo-e, siniu Syria maigu rijilam tad sukhe; siga paliuniu aliutu kamshat makjiu kaki kamra ha-e maksai lungsakhai bibo sui-e.”
Sichiujiu, tamiu wangsuboga paliuniu Syria maigu rijibam lam tadsude, chiudi paliuniu sibo bam mengtangboga mai khat nadi hadi-e.
Riphenmai, chaqon khatdi chaqon-kari jaojiu chari wangkinbo khuan
Sijengniu chawan kiusuboga paliu ringlu raleng pakkam mide, paliugu rijiky, chaqondung khatdi qonniamdungtu saodiak lujiu paktad kam mide.

Chamai khang madai siniu rijibam mengtangjiu rijiky lungga ngutboga, katiu-kasak bamniubo, tiusak lude, siga bamdibo kachia-rangkang khatdi chafai-tani chiujiu paliuniu khoilude. Khatdi paliuniu khoilubose pabam katamlam tadlujiu baikhai sude. Mathenky kakibo gadi ngutde, sichiujiu paliuniu sigadi kam khaide.

Chiudi paliu karai haichiujiu dinsude, “Aliuniu kam bambo hai tajai tade! Palamra haijiukha kawibo champaotu aliuniu nbaijiu bambo hai majita mide, nsuan tingben padbotu khuanbam misai, aliu maomakjiu sajai daorabo-e. Sijengniu tuhoi tadlujiu chawanggu chakampao khuga haise paokhai sukhe!”

Sijengniu paliu Syria maigu rijibam phutlujiu Samaria lam malan wangjiu akhemaitu kulujiu dinsude: “Aliuniu Syria maigu rijibam lam tadboga mai khattudi ngaomakge khatdi chakhuan wadi chiumakge, chaqon nai qonniam khatnatudi khimakge, mathenkydung sidi palun bamme.”
Akhemaidungniu tachamse pisikhaide khatdi chawangkiningga sise paokhaide.

Sibo wanse nchun bamkha-e, chiudi chawang siniu buangsu lujiu pagu chakampaodung khuga din-e, “Syria mainiu aliu riga kamwang kinbo hai degulo chiubo Iniu dinbine! Haiga katiu riangmide chiubo hai paliuniu si-e, sijengniu paliugu rijibam saodiak lujiu chapiujiu lam nbaibam rabo-e. Paliuniu maningbora katiu phiuraleng namdi ganiu kenpadbo ga maring minlurabo-e khatdi namditu haphung lurabo-e.”

Pagu chakampao ruangga khang khatniu din-e, “Namdi haiga bambo maidung hai, nda masuang shaimi mai kumjiu shai nchum mahami rabo-e. Sijengniu kabambo chaqon mangiuse pikhaijiu chamai kasiatu pi tuanglujiu degu padbamlo chiubo phuira langkhaikhe.
Paliuniu maipiumai kasia kadalujiu chawangniu chaqon-kari nia langkhaijiu Syria maigu riphenmai khuga nde padbamlo chiubo phiura langkhaide.

Paliuniu Jordan giuky katang tadjiu phuide, khatdi npui pathen chafai-tani khatdi chari mania, Syria mainiu pakbo donniu kam nkai khaidiakbo ngaolude. Siga paliuniu malan wangjiu chawang khuga padbambo lamga paokhaide.
Samaria mai pakmeng karenjiu Syria maigu rijibamga kabambo hina sung lude. Khatdi

Sibo wan ga Israel maigu chawangniu patu machabo chakampao situ rengmun ga akhera kamkhaide. Chawangniu Elisha tu adaora tadbo wan ga, Elisha niu din masuang khaimibo kumjiu akhebo chakampao situ maidungniu pariga tao taluijiu taoshat mide.
Elisha niu chawang khuga dinmibo-e, pasaibo nai haichiubo wan ga withubo chabanmiu taju mangiuga maksai tathiu taju kariuga rangkang khat leng Samaria ga jonsu rabo-e,
sibo wan ga chakampao siniu paokakge, “
Dinkhai mibo kumgapjiu pakhuga padle, namdigu rengmun ga maidungniu patu tao-taluijiu taoshat mide.
Elisha niu dinbo saisuijiu pakikhunmai maitu puilujiu Philistia lam takum chinnia lung raleng tadmide.
Takum chinnia loilubo sai paniu Israel kadihga malan wangde, khatdi paky-paluse malan khailan khera chiujiu chawang khuga tadjiu khengde.
Chawangniu Elisha vangpiu Gehazi tu npao bamdibo paniu daode; chawangse Elisha niu kamkhai mibo tasibo lamga sinijiu bamme.

Elisha niu dechiujiu kashaimaitu kam maring khai milo chiubo lamga Gehazi niu chawang khuga dinjiu bambo wan ga, panahtu kam maringkhai mibo pui siniu panahtu majang lujiu paky-palu kalan khaira khengwang-e. Gehazi niu din-e. “Pakendibopiu yo, Elisha niu kam maringkhai mibo nahpiu puise haiga bamde!”

Chawangniu maniuboga, Gehazi niu dinbambo maji-e chiujiu maipui siniu paokakge, sijengniu chawangniu chakampao khattu kulujiu maipuigu paniu tadmibo tingkum chinnia lungga kapadbo hina khatdi paky-palu hina pikhaira dinkhai bide.
Syria maigu Chawang Benhadad niu marajiu bambo wan ga Elisha niu Damascus ga tadle. Elisha siga wang bamme chiubo chawang khuga dinkhaibo ga,
chawangniu chakampao ruangga khangkhat Hazael kubo khuga din-e, “Kalen khoilujiu phaimiukakungtu adaora tadsulo khatdi Iniu marajiu bambo hai wilune maksai wilakge chiubo

Sijengniu Hazael niu Damascus kadihga padbogu withubo hina qontrao atai bang thiulujiu Elisha khulam tadmide. Paniu Elisha tu adaolujiu din-e, “Navang, Chawang Benhadad rapot hai wimi suma, wilakmi rama chiujiu maniura atu nakhuga langkhaijiu mengkinbo-e.”
Elisha niu paokakge, “
Sigasu Elisha niu pamik rak taling lujiu pamik kakhip makjiu, Hazael pazu sakiu makthen pazu mating sude. Simak dakjiu Elisha pakhuan padjiu kapsude.
“Dekamjiu kapbam gulo paohubo yo?” chiujiu Hazael niu maniu-e.

Israel mai riga nangniu kamrabo kapingbo guse Iniu simide, chiujiu Elisha niu paokakge. “Nangniu paliugu charirengse chami thonkhai misune, withubo chabonmaidungtu gimi sune, paliu nahdungtu kajitshat misune, khatdi pawon phungbo puidungtu katang paliu won repang sune.”
Elisha niu din-e, “Nang hai Syria maigu chawang thiurabo-e, chiubo hai
Hazael niu Benhadad khulam malan wangboga, chawangniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Elisha niu nakhuga degu dinkhailo?”
Hazael niu paokakge, “Paniu akhuga din-e, chiubora nang hai maomakjiu wilurabo-e.”
Chiudi pasaibo nai Hazael niu chafai kadibo khat tadui sum lujiu chawang mun makadjiu kamshat mide.
Sigasu Hazael niu Benhadad bam malinjiu Syria maigu chawang thiu mide.
Israel maigu chawang Ahab nahpiu Joram niu mawangbo takum mangiu tangmibo wan ga Jehoshaphat nahpiu Jehoram niu pagu takum samriu-nia tangmibo wan ga Judah maigu chawang thiude.
Paniu Jerusalem ga takum tachat mawang khaide.
Panao hai Ahab nahpui-e khatdi Ahab kikhun kumjiu khatdi Israel mai wangdunggu kasabo npuiga padi suitadle.
Paniu

Sijengniu Johoram niu pagu chaqon-karidung maluang lujiu Zair lam tadmide, siga Edom mai riphendungniu paliutu taomagui mide. Nchun tingga pagu chaqon-karigu papeemaidung nai pase mari mide siga pagu charimaidung paky-kylam pakkam mide.
Sibo ting gasu sujiu Edom mai hai Judah mai khugasu khen-parang thiujiu lungmide. Sibo ting gasu Libnah namdi sidi charithiu sude.
Jehoram niu kam khaibo ngamkam hina Judah maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Jehoram shai miboga David namdiga bambo chawangmai rawga baikhai mide khatdi panahpiu Ahaziah niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Israel maigu chawang Ahab nahpiu Joram niu mawangbo takum kariu-niakiubo kumga, Jehoram nahpiu Ahaziah niu pagu takum makai-je-niakiu miboga Judah maigu chawang thiude,
sichiujiu paniu Jerusalem ga takum khat mawang khai-e. Papui zanse Athaliah ku-e, pahai chawang Ahab napui-e, khatdi Israel mai wang Omri tahpui-e.
Tanao magiangbo gasu Ahaziah nai chawang Ahab papao-pamek thiujiu, Ahab kikhunniu kambo kumjiu Ahaziah niu
Chawang Ahaziah niu Israel maigu chawang Joram nai khat thiulujiu Syria maigu chawang Hazael tu chari thiu sude. Gilead ga bambo Ramoth ga chari thiubo gasu Joram hai ajam mide.
Pajam wilubo gasu paniu Jezreel namdilam malan mide, siga Ahaziah di patu adaora tadle.
Sibo wan ga phaimiukakung Elisha niu phaimiukakung mai ruanggasu khangkhattu kulujiu sina khuga din-e, “Kadensulo, khatdi takysa henping hai thinlujiu Gilead ga bambo Ramoth lam tadsulo,
sichiujiu siga mengtang gapboga Jehoshaphat nahpiu Nimshi tahpiu, Jehu situ phiulo, pakang maidung ruangganiu kutampad lujiu mai kahabo bamga majang ngutlujiu,
takysa hai pariga runkhaijiu dinlo, ‘
Sijengniu nabo phaimiukakung piuse Ramoth lam tadmide.
Siga riphenmaigu chakampaodung maduijiu bamdibo paniu daode. Paniu din-e, “Paohubo, Iniu naleng champao khat phungwang kin-e.”
Jehu niu maniu-e, “Aliu ruangga saotu nangniu dinbambo gulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Paohubo, natu-e.”
Sichiujiu panaise kalunglam ngutmide khatdi phaimiukakung siniu Jehu piriga takysa runkhaijiu din-e, “
Nawangpiu thiujiu bambo Ahab nahpiu, chawang situ kamshat milo, sichiujiu Jezebel niu agu phaimiukakungdung nai avangmaidungtu kamshat mibo jengniu Iniu patu sajai pirabo-e.
Ahab kikhunmai pakhiangna khatdi patah panahmai pakhiangna shairabo-e; chiusai pakikhunmai ga bambo npiumai hina, kating-kana mathiutu kam mahami rabo-e.
Israel maigu Chawang Jeroboam khatdi Baasha kikhunmai tu Iniu kamkhai mibo kumjiu pakikhunmai tudi Iniu kamrabo-e.
Jezebel tu charawga baikhai lakge, Jezreel kadihga paphawse tathiniu tiulu rabo-e.’” Haichiu dinlubo sai nabo phaimiukakung siniu kichense saodiakjiu kalangjiu tadmide.
Jehu niu paphenmai chakampaodung ruangga malan wangboga paliuniu maniu-e, “Wi bamma? Chara kamengbopiu siniu natu degu dinjiulo?”
Jehu niu paokakge, “Paniu masenbose ndelo chiubo naliuniu sibambo side.”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Aliura simakge! Paniu nde dinkhailo aliu khugadi dinkhailo!”
Sibo wan siakga Jehu gu paka-paphenmai, chakampaodung siniu paliu fai gaopad tason gase hamkhai lujiu, khatdi siga Jehu tu pichap khai lujiu, make mudjiu senpadde, “Jehu hai chawang si-e!”

Syria maigu Chawang Hazael tu atungjiu Ramoth ga chari thiubo gasu patu kam ajam mibose taliura leng Jezreel ga mengjiu bambo wan ga Jehu niu Chawang Joram tu atungjiu kamraleng mahin kamsude. Sichiujiu Jehu niu pakangmai chakampaodung khuga din-e, “Naliuniu alam ponne chiusai, mai khat tudi Ramoth gasu pijiu tadpadbo suimakge khatdi Jezreel mai khuga kachan khaibo suimakge.”
Sigasu chaqon-kari tuanglujiu Jezreel lam pase tadmide. Joram se ajambo gasu wimakha-e, khatdi Judah maigu Chawang Ahaziah niu Joram tu phuira mengbamniu-e.
Jezreel ga charireng khonjiu bambo akhe piuniu Jehu khatdi pamaidungniu mengkinbo ngaolujiu sen-e, “Chamai kasia chaqon tuangjiu mengkinbo Iniu ngao-e.”
Joram niu paokakge, “Paliu hai akamai-e maksai mikremai-e chiubo silura chaqon katuangmai khattu langkhailo.”
Champaomai siniu Jehu khulam chaqon tonglu meng pakhuga maniu-e. “Chaka khat thiujiu mengkinbo ma chiubo chawangniu sini-e.”
Jehu niu paokakge, “Nangam-nathao ha-e. Asai suilulo.”
Chakyton-ga akhe bambo piuniu din-e, champaomaise pabam gara mengtang mide chiudi malanwang makge.
Katambo champaomai khat tudi langkhaijiu karaibo piuniu maniumibo kumjiu Jehu khuga maniu-e. “Jehu niu paokakge, “Nangam-nathao ha-e. Asai suilulo.”

Akhepiu siniu dinlan-e, chiubora champaomaise mengtang mide, chiudi malanwang makge. Khatdi sibo piuniu din-e, “Wangkinbo maigu papee hai charamengbo kumjiu chaqon-kariga tuanglujiu mengkin-e, pahai Jehu tu kajon-e!”
Chawang Joram niu din-e, “Agu chaqon-karise kaden khailo.” Kaden lujiu Joram nai Chawang Ahaziah niu pagu-gu chaqon-kari tuanglujiu Jehu tu adaora tadmide. Naboth luzamga paliu adaode.
Joram niu maniu-e, “Jehu nang hai agi-manaijiu mengkinbo ma?”
Jehu niu paokakge, “Napui Jezebel niu kamkhai diakbo tathoi, tasiam khatdi charamengse tuhoi katang aliu ruangga phuijiu bamboga, ndechiujiu agi-manai silu ralo?”
“Haise chari-e, Ahaziah yo!” chiujiu Joram niu senjiu, chaqon-kari ju masai lujiu paksude.
Jehu niu palai padjiu tavaipise ketboga Joram ngum kettaojiu pamalung tao mide. Sichiujiu Joram chaqon-kari ganiu shai mide,
siga Jehu niu pamajangpiu Bidkar khuga din-e, “Paphawse ponlujiu Naboth luzamga taliang khai milo. Maningtaolo chiubora anainiu Chawang Joram piu Ahab saisuibo wan-ga
‘Danai Naboth nai panahmaitu kamshat mibose I ngao-e. Siniu, Iniu ladriat thiubo-e chiubora haibo luzam siakga natudi sajai pirabo-e.’ Sijengniu

Chawang Ahaziah niu padbambose degulo chiubo ngaolujiu pagu chaqon-kari tuanglujiu Beth Haggan namdaklam pakkhai mide, siga Jehu niu hasude. “Patudi kamshat milo!” chiujiu Jehu niu pamaidung khuga din-e, khatdi Ibleam namdak mungga bambo Gur npuilam chaqon tuanglujiu khangboga paliuniu patu kam ajam mide. Chiudi paniu matanjiu Megiddo namdiga wangtangjiu siga shaikhai mide.
Pagu chakampaodungniu paphawse chaqon-kari khatga khailujiu Jerusalem lam phungwangjiu chawangmai rawga David namdiga patu baikhai mide.
Ahab nahpiu Joram niu Israel maigu chawang thiubo takum kariu-je-khatkiubo ga Ahaziah niu Judah maigu chawang thiude.
Jehu niu Jezreel ga wangtang mide. Degu padmi gulo chiubo Jezebel niu silujiu, pamikrun khailu, patham kabat manai lujiu chawangkininggu kiran-ga chaplujiu puidi lamse phuijiu bamme.
Jehu niu rengmun ga ngutbo wan-ga, paniu senjiu din-e, “Hey, Zimri yo!
Jehu ngang sujiu sen-e, “Sao sao, asai suipon mai bamlo?” Chawangkiningga bambo chakampao khangnia khangsumniu kiran gasu phuikiu-e,

siga Jehu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Jezebel tuse tuntaliang kiu milo!” Siga paliuniu patu tunkao mide khatdi Jezebel khugasu padbo zaise kibengga khatdi chaqon-riga kajin maren khaide. Jehu niu chaqon-kari tuanglujiu papumse niak-pet mide.
Chawangkiningga ngut lujiu malod tiu khaide. Sibo sai paniu din-e, “Tasiang phungbo pui situ ponlujiu baimilo; wakhat-khat thiujiu bamdi pahai chawang nahpui-e.”
Chiudi patu nphumra tadbo maidungniu papee ra khatdi paphi, paben ra makbo kaki daomakge.
Paliuniu haise Jehu khuga paokhaibo wan ga, paniu din-e, “Haise
Patu tiu masiakbo phawse chava kumjiu kajanpan khai rabo-e, sichiujiu mai khatniudi patu singam lak rabo-e.’”

Samaria namdiga Chawang Ahab kaikik riak-chinnia lung bamme. Jehu niu chamlen khat raolujiu sibo namdiga mawang paodung, siga bambo maidunggu papeedung khatdi Ahab kaikik maidunggu papeemai khuga langkhai-e. Chamlen cham sira hai-e:
“Chawang kaikikmaitu phuijiu bambo naliu-e khatdi chaqon-karidung, chaqondung, chari mania khatdi charireng namdi hina naliu ben-ga bambo-e. Sijengniu chamlen hai dao kaji dao kari,
chawang kaikik ruangganiu kabuibo mai khattu naliuniu kadalujiu patu chawang pi thiukhai sulo, chiujiu patu gukhaira aphen sulo.”
Samaria gu mawang paodungse manangjiu, paliuniu din-e, “Jehu tu aliuniu dechiujiu chari aphen ngamlu ralo? Chawang Joram khatdi Ahaziah niu katangdi ngamlulak tamibo-e.”

Sijengniu chawangkiningga chakampaodung khatdi namdigu chakampaodung, siga lungbam maigu papee thiumai madui lujiu Jehu khuga chamlen khat langkhai lande: “Aliura navang mai-e, khatdi nangniu kamlo chiujiu dinbo hina kamra aliu kaden lude. Chiudi mai khattudi aliuniu chawang leng kamkhai lakge.”

Jehu niu paliu khuga chamlen katambo khat raolujiu langkhai lande: “Naliu asai suine sai khatdi Iniu pibo chamtan majaine sai, sonnai haikumbo wan ga Jezreel gasu Ahab kaikik maigu peedungse akhuga phung menglo.”
Siga Ahab kaikikdung riak-chinnia tuse Samaria ga papee thiubo maidung siniu phuikhai, makuat khaijiu lung bambo-e.
Jehu gu chamlen ngaolubo ga Samaria ga papee thiumaidung siniu Ahab kaikik maidung chamai riak chinnia peese kaluang lungga khailujiu Jehu niu bambo Jezreel lam langkhai mide.

Ahab kaikikdung peese phungwang bamde chiujiu Jehu khuga dinbo wan-ga, tapeedungse namdigu rengmun ga pabao nia thiujiu khuan khaira khatdi pasaibo nai nsuan katang khai nbamra paliutu chawangniu chamtan pikhaide.

Nsuanse paniu rengmun lam padlujiu siga bambo maidung khuga din-e, “Chawang Joram tu kamshatra rangbo piu, khatdi kamshat mibo piuse I ye; sibogu paridse naliuniu phungra leng ha-e. Chiudi haibo maidungtu saoniu kamshat jiulo?
Haisiniu madubora, Ahab kaikikdung lamga
Sichiujiu Jehu niu Jezreel ga bammai Ahab gu pariang-parui hina, pagu chakampaodung, paka kakungmai khatdi singkudung khattudi masiak makjiu kamshat mide.
Jehu niu Jezreel phutlujiu Samaria lam tadde. Npuiga, “Mily khuanmai Rijiky” kubo bamga,
shaimibo Judah gu Chawang Ahaziah kiriangmai kasiatu adaojiu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Naliu hai saolo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Ahaziah kiriang mai-e. Aliu hai Jezreel ga bambo Chawangpui Jezebel nahmai khatdi pakikhunmai khulam mengraleng tadkinbo-e.”

Jehu niu pamaidung khuga chamtan pikhaide, Paliutu maring minlulo!” Paliuniu paliutu chakhomki mungga kamshat mide. Paliu pakhiangna hai, atai-je-niakiu-e, sichiujiu paliu mai khat tudi masiak makjiu kamshat kam mide.
Jehu niu tadpad lanboga pa-npuiga Rechab nahpiu Jonadab tu adao-e. Jehu niu patu kahum adaojiu din-e, “Ania hai tachun kajuan-e. Nangniu atu nkha khai rama?”
“Iniu nkhane”, chiujiu Jonadab niu paokakge.
Jehu niu paokakge, “Chiusai naben akhuga pilo.” Panaise benju lujiu Jehu niu patu chaqon-kariga jukhai lujiu din-e,
“I hai dejiukha
Siga mengtangbo wan ga, Ahab kiriangmai khatna tudi masiak makjiu kamshat kam mide, Haise
Jehu niu Samaria ga bambo maidungtu kumadui lujiu din-e, “Chawang Ahab ra Baal tu poinakha ronna machabo-e, chiudi Ira patu dijiu macha rabo-e.

Baal gu phaimiukakung pakhiangna, patu kahumbo mai pakhiangna khatdi pagu singku pakhiangnatu kuwang maduilo. Mai khatnadi wangmakbo suilakge; Iniu kadibo rathak thiujiu Baal khuga chara thiukhai rabo-e. Haise saokum mainiu wangmak sai patu kamshatmi rabo-e.” (Haise Baal tu kahumbo maitu kamshatra Jehu niu paru thiujiu kambo-e).
Sigasu Jehu niu chamtan pikhaide, “Baal tu kahum rabo leng tingmik khat riampad sulo!” Dinbo saisuijiu patingmik khat riampad mide,

khatdi Jehu niu Israel maigu kadih pakhiangnaga chalad pikhaide. Baal tu kahumbo mai khatnadi masiak makjiu wangde, mai khat nadi wangmakbo thiumakge. Paliu mathiuse Baal rakyga ngut kam mide, charakyse phuiting mide.
Sigasu fai-nidungse ponpadjiu kahumjiu bam maidung khuga pikhaira masanbo fai-ni akhijiu bambo singkutu Jehu niu chamtan pikhaide.
Sibo saiga, Jehu niu Rechab nahpiu Jonadab tu majang lujiu charakyga ngutjiu, khatdi siga bam maidung khuga din-e, “Baal tu kahumbo mai ronna haiga bam rabo-e. Khatdi

Sigasu Jonadab panainiu Baal leng wa kadpadjiu charathiu khaira khatdi rukhaiboga kadpadbo tien thiura ngutmide. Paniu chamai riak tachattu charaky lenlam pichap khai nbamme khatdi paliutu ladti khaijiu din-e: “Naliuniu haimai hinatu kamshat kammi rabo-e, saokum mainiu mai khattu pipakmi-e sai paringting nai pakmibo maigu ringting nkhiak rabo-e.”

Jehu niu kadkhaibo tien thiusu gapboga, akhebo mai khatdi chakampaodung khuga din-e, “Ngutlujiu paliu mathiutu kamshat sulo, mai khattudi pijiu pakpadmi tulo!” Paliuniu chaheng thinlujiu ngut, paliutu kamshat kam mide, khatdi paliu pumse lenlam jupad mide. Sigasu paliuniu charakygu n-nung kachangbo bamga ngutde.
Siga bambo masanbo tatu-tiangse khoipad lujiu rumide.
Sichiujiu masanbogu katiang khatdi charakyse kam maha mide, khatdi sibo rakyse tajun-chabaky thiujiu tuhoi tangbo bammide.
Haichiujiu Jehu niu Baal tu kahumbo maitu Israel mai ruangganiu kam maha mide.
Chiudi Jeroboam niu kamkhai mibo nuan, chiubora paniu Bethel khatdi Dan ga kachianiu machalubo matomchi tu kahumjiu Israel maitu nuan ga jukhaijiu kamaobo situ paniu ali mide.

niu Jehu khuga din-e, “Iniu Ahab kaikik mai riga kamkhai nibo tien hinase nangniu kamkhai bide. Sijengniu I nakhuga ladriat thiubo-e, chiubora nakai-nakik mainiu chaken madai katang Israel maigu chawang thiu rabo-e.”
Chiudi Jehu niu Israel mai Rawang,
Sibo tingga Israel maigu kadih hai

Jordan giuky tingbanglam, khatdi tingnulam Arnon giukiga bambo Aroer namdak katang, Gilead kadih nai Bashan luongren jaojiu, Gad mai nai Reuben mai lungbo ram khatdi Manasseh mainiu lungbambo naimik padlam katang lumide.
Jehu niu kamkhai mibo hina, patan-pahot jaojiu Israel maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Paniu shai miboga Samaria ga baikhai mide, khatdi panahpiu Jehoahaz niu pabam malinjiu chawang thiumide.
Jehu niu Samaria ga takum makai-tachat chawang thiujiu lungkhaide.
Chawang Ahaziah pui, Athaliah niu panahpiu shai mide chiubo sikaji-sikari, chawang kikhun ga kabambo mai hinatu kamshat mira chamtan pikhaide.

Ahaziah nahpiu Joash ronna marilu-e. Joash tudi kaki maitu kamshatboga jaomi rabo-e, chiudi panai Jehosheba niu gukhai bibo-e, pase Chawang Jehoram nahpui khatdi Ahaziah tanpui-e. Paniu patu alubo puitu majangjiu Charaky gu tazi kylam baikhai mibo-e, sichiujiu Athaliah khugasu patu bailubo-e.
Athaliah niu chawangpui thiubo takum charuk lungga Jehosheba niu Joash tu makuatjiu bai khangbo-e.

Chiudi takum chinniaboga singku Jehoiada niu chawang kikhun gu akhe maidung khatdi chawangkininggu akhemaitu charakyga wangrabo leng langkhaijiu din-e, siga paniu degu kamraleng rangbambo lamga paliu nai chamriat thiujiu ladsiang kam khaide. Paniu paliu khuga Chawang Ahaziah nah Joash tu lenkhaide,
khatdi chamtan hai paliu khuga din-e: “Tabamnai naliu ngamleng wangbo wan ga, damsum gu damkhat siniu chawangkiningtu akhe rabo-e.
Damsumgu damkhat siniu Sur Rengmunse akhe rabo-e, katambo damsumgu khat siniu akhe bambo rengmun sailam bamjiu akherabo-e.
Tabamnai changam kammakbo mai phom nia siniu Charakyga chapjiu chawangtu akhe rabo-e.
Naliu chaheng thinlujiu Chawang Joash tu akhe rabo-e. Paniu tadkhaibo bam machang naliu suitad rabo-e. Naliu khuga mai khatkumbo wang manasai patuse kamshat milo.”
Chakampaodungse Jehoiada niu katikhaibo majaijiu Tabamnai changamleng tadmai khatdi tadmakmai hinatu chiujiu pakhuga majang wangde.
Paliuniu chakampaodungtu Charakyga khai nbambo Chawang David gu changiu nai chageese pikhaide,
khatdi chawangtu akhera chiujiu Charaky kamaga chaheng kathinbo maitu pichap khaide.

Sigasu Jehoiada niu Joash tu majang padlujiu, paniu Joash piriga chawang pirun runkhaide, khatdi chawang mainiu thinrabo tacheng-tajaigu ariakkhuangse pakhuga pikhaide. Sibo sai Joash peega wasa manuk khaide khatdi Joash hai chawang thiumide chiujiu senpad khaide. Maidung siniu paliu ben kaphijiu sen-e, “Chawang hai ringthenglo!”
Chawangpui Athaliah niu akhemai khatdi maidungniu senbambo khuan chiulujiu Charakyga pak mengde, siga chamai kengjiu aruang bamdi-e.

Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu chawang kasanbo siniu Charaky kamun mungga, katiang khuga chapjiu bamdibo Athaliah niu ngaolude. Chawang tuse chakampaodung nai make mudbo mainiu chap maguilujiu, chamai hina matha-chunwibo khuan senjiu khatdi make mudjiu bamniu-e. Athaliah niu palung chariujiu pafai phetjiu senpadle, “Chari-e! Chari-e!”

Jehoiada niu Athaliah tu charaky mungga kamshat khaibo masen makge, sijengniu chari-pidung khuga chamtan pi-e: “Patu akhemaidung kakga khailujiu jupad milo, patu gukhaira matanbo mai situ kamshat milo.”
Paliuniu patu minlujiu chawangkining lam jumengjiu Chaqon Rengmun kubo bamga kamshat mide.
Singku Jehoiada niu, Chawang Joash khatdi chamai hinatu
Sichiujiu maidungse Baal raky lam tadlujiu sise rathon mide, rathakbam khatdi charameng hinadi kampang mide. Baal gu singku Mattan tudi rathakbam suangga kamshat mide.
Jehoiada niu akhemaitu Charakyga akhera pikhai-e.

Sichiujiu sibo sai pah khatdi, chakampaodung, chawanggu akhemai, khatdi chawangkining akhemai siniu chawangtu majang lujiu Charaky gasu chawangkininglam wangmide. Joash niu Akhebo Rengmun gasu ngutlujiu chawang bamga ntao mide.
Mai hina chunwiboniu phuimide khatdi tuhoira chawangkiningga Athaliah tu kamshat mibo jengniu tingjing- nging mide.
Joash niu pagu takum chinnia tangboga Judah maigu chawang thiusubo-e.

Israel maigu Chawang Jehu niu mawangbo takum chinnia tangboga, Joash niu Judah maigu chawang thiusude, khatdi paniu Jerusalem ga takum atai mawang khai-e. Papui haira Beersheba namdi gasu wangbo Zibiah si-e.
Paringting pakhiangnaga
Chiudi charamengtu kahumbo bamdungra kam maha makge, sibo bamga maidung siniu chara thiubo khatdi maruta mataojiu kahumbo ngam kam palunjiu bamme.
Singkumai hina paniu machaboga phungwangbo rangkangse khai madui rabo-e khatdi rangkangse Charaky thiu lanboga, pageng bambo saisuijiu thinpiu rabo-e.
Chiudi Joash niu chawang thiubo takum makai-je-sum tangbo katang singku maidungniu Charaky se thiu katin khailan makge.

Sijengniu Joash niu Jehoiada khatdi katambo singkudungtu kulujiu maniu-e, “Dekamjiu naliuniu Charaky hai katin makjiulo? Tuhoi ganiu sujiu naliuniu khai madui nbambo rangkangse benlen khai sulo, chiusai Charaky se katin surabo-e.”
Chiudi singku maidungniu maidung khuga rangkang lumakra, khatdi samibo charaky se katinmakra chapkhaide.

Sigasu singku Jehoiada niu wabung khat khoilujiu pagomga paki khat kamkhai lujiu rathakbam mungga, Charaky kamun majatlam khaide. Siga kahumra wangbo maidungniu kadwangbo rangkang hinase pangam padbo singkuniu wabung lunggase baikhaide.
Wabungga rangkangse kengkhang dasai, chawang kygu machunrao khatdi Singku Dibo siniu wanglujiu wabungse lepad lujiu padui langpad lubosai, parid madatle
Pariakse chak lujiu raolubo sai, Charaky gu changam kamboga parid phungjiu machabo maidung khuga rangkangse benlen khaide, paliuniu tasing ngam kam maidungtu, chaky thiumaidungtu,
tatu karuimaidungtu, tasing nai tatu kammaitu, chaky thiuboga thinra liubogu khatdi kaki-kiboga thinraleng pageng bamboga pikhai-e.
Sibo rangkang siniu rangkanggi piang, chakuang, make maksai chamibung machaboga maksai rangkang maksai kachiagu mania machaboga thinkhai makge.
Sibo rangkangse Charakyga tatien thiumaileng pi-e khatdi Charaky katinboga ngutrabo chapot mania luboga thinkhai-e.
Tatien thiubam maidungniu paliu lung masan siakjiu kambo jengniu paliuniu tatien thiuboga rangkang ndejiu ngutmilo chiubo pariak chakson makge.
Kamaobo khatdi nuan jengniu kadwangbo rangkang sira wabungga khaimi makge, sise singku maidung leng-e.
Sibo wan ga Syria maigu Chawang Hazael niu Gath ga chari thiujiu Gath tu ngam lude, sigasu Jerusalem tu chari thiura palung chap mide.
Judah maigu Chawang Joash niu pasuangga lungbam niubo Jehoshaphat, Jehoram khatdi Ahaziah niu
Joash niu kamkhaibo ngam hina haiga wangtang makbo Judah maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.

Chawang Joash tu pagu chakampaodungniu mahin kamshatra rangsude, sichiujiu paliu ruangga khangnia sira Shimeath nahpiu Jozakar, khatdi Shomer nahpiu Jehozabad si-e, Jerusalem gu tingbanglam bambo chaky khatga, Silla tadrabo npuikiga Joash tu kamshat mide. David Namdiga bambo chawangmai rawga Joash tu baikhai mide, khatdi panahpiu Amaziah niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Judah maigu chawang Ahaziah nahpiu Joash niu mawangbo takum makai-je-sum tangboga Jehu nahpiu Jehoahaz niu Israel maigu chawang thiude khatdi Samaria ga takum kariu-je-chinniakiu mawang khaide.
Pasuangga bamniubo Chawang Jeroboam kumjiu
Sijengniu Israel maitu
Sigasu Chawang Jehoahaz niu
niu Israel maileng jukhaipao khat langkhai bijiu, paniu Syria mai hang gasu, paliutu khenrang pithiu khaide, Sijengniu Israel mainiu masuang kumjiu agi-manaijiu lung khaide.
Chiudi Israel maigu Chawang Jeroboam niu paliutu nuan ga jukhai diakbo tiense phutmi makge, sichiujiu paliuniu kamaobo kamjiu bamme khatdi Samaria ga charapui Asherah mengse khaibam kha-e.

Jehoahaz gu chaqon tongbo riphenmai ringiu, chaqon-kari kariu, khatdi chaphi rimai sang kariu ronna makjiu Jehoahaz khuga riphenmai kaki hamide, palamra Syria mai wangpiuniu tabuitu tao maluibo kumjiu kaki lamra kam maha mide.
Jehoahaz niu tenkhaibo tien hina khatdi patan-pahot hinase Israel maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Pah shaijiu Samaria ga baikhai mide khatdi panahpiu Jehaosh niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Judah maigu Chawang Joash niu mawangbo takum samriu-je-chinnia tangboga Jehoahaz nahpiu Jehoash niu Israel maigu chawang thiude, khatdi paniu Samaria ga takum kariu-je-charuk mawang khaide.
Pahaidi
Jehoash niu kammibo tien hina, Judah mai wangpiu Ahaziah tu chari thiubogu patan pahot hina Israel maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Jehoash shaijiu Samaria ga bambo chawangmai rawga baikhai mide,khatdi panahpiu, niabo Jeroboam niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Elisha niu chamtan pi-e, “Tavaipi nai pathu kasia khoiwanglo,” Jehoash niu khoiwangde,
sise ketra kaden sulo chiujiu Elisha niu Jehoash tu dinde. Dinkhaibo kumjiu chawangniu kamde, khatdi Elisha niu chawang ben riga paben khaide.

Sigasu, phaimiukakungniu dinbo saisuijiu Syria lamphan bambo kiranse chawangniu lepatle. “Tavaipise ketsulo!” chiujiu Elisha niu chamtan pikhaide. Chawangniu tavaipise ketgap chiuboga phaimiukakung siniu din-e, “Nang hai
Sigasu Elisha niu chawangtu tavaithu kakibo khat khoilujiu, sise kadihga kakhiura dinkhaide. Chawangniu tavaithuse kakhiu lon sum khai lujiu tamide.

Siniu Elisha lung kampom mide, khatdi Elisha niu chawang khuga din-e, “Nangniu kakhiu lon mangiu, charuk khai rabo-e, chiusai nangniu Syria maitu ngam masan siak lurabo-e; chiudi tuhoira nangniu Syria maitu ngamlon sum ronnna rabo-e.”
Elisha shaijiu baimide.
Takum machang Moab mainiu Israel maitu chari thiu-e.

Pawan khat kashai baibambo wan ga, chari thiura ngutbo maitu ngaolujiu kashai pumse Elisha rawga taliang diakjiu maidungse pakmide. Kashaibo piu pumse Elisha ra hai niataogap chiuboga kashai pumse ringsujiu chapkhang-e.
Jehoahaz niu mawangbo tingga Syria maigu Chawang Hazael niu saomakjiu Israel maitu rejiu bamniu-e,
chiudi
Syria maigu Chawang Hazael niu shai miboga panahpiu Benhadad niu chawang thiude.
Siga Israel maigu Chawang Jehoash niu Benhadad tu chari ngamlon sum lude khatdi papiu Jehoahaz niu mawangbo wan ga Benhadad niu lumibo namdi hina Jehoash niu malan-lan kam lude.
Israel maigu chawang Jehoahaz nahpiu Jehoash niu mawangbo takum nia tangboga Joash nahpiu Amaziah niu Judah maigu chawang thiude.
Pagu takum makai-mangiu tangboga paniu chawang thiujiu takum makai-je-chakiu Jerusalem ga mawang khaide. Papui haira Jerusalem lamsu wangbo Jehoaddin chiu kubo-e.
niu palung kimrabo ngam paniu kamme. Chiudi papao chawang David kum makge; sibosung, papiu Joash niu kambo kumjiu padi kamme.
Paniu charamengtu kahumbo rathak bamdung rathonmi makge, sichiujiu maidungniu sibo bamga rathak mania kadbo khatdi maruta rukhaijiu charathiubo ngam kam palunne.
Amaziah pumtan daogap chiuboga, papiu chawangtu kamshat mibo chakampaodung tu kamshat mide.
Chiudi, paniu paliu nahmai tura kamshat makge, Mose gu tacheng-tajaiga
Matai Ramjeng kubo bamga Amaziah niu Edom mai sang kariutu kamshat mide. Sela kubo namdise paniu chari thiubo ganiu haphun lude, khatdi sise Joktheel chiu kujiu tuhoi katang bamkha-e.
Sigasu Amaziah niu Israel maigu Chawang Jehoash tu angatjiu chari thiuraleng champaomai langkhai-e.

Chiudi Chawang Jehoash niu pahangga bambo kumjiu champao pikhai lande: “Pawan khatga Lebanon Luongga bambo tathuphe khatniu cedar bang khattu champao khat langkhai-e: ‘Nanahpuitu anahpiu naoleng pilo.’ Siga nkan khao khatniu wanglujiu tathuphe situ taokao mide.

Tuhoira Amaziah yo, nangniu Edom maitu ngam lude sijengniu nang hai chaliangboniu phuimide. Nazan tadbambo siniu naleng kabuibo thiujiu nakyga bam milo. Nariga khatdi namaidung riga kachariubo wangra ndeleng nang phiubam gulo?”
Chiudi Amaziah niu wadi nkingkhai makge, sijengniu Chawang Jehoash niu pamaidungtu majang lujiu Judah ga bambo Beth Shemesh ga Amaziah tu chari thiude.
Amaziah gu riphendungtu ngamlude khatdi pagu riphendung hina paliu kylam pakkhai kam mide.
Jehoash niu Amaziah tu maring minlujiu Jerusalem ga juwang mide khatdi chakhet kai khat kum thengbo, Ephraim rengmun gasu Kamik Rengmun tangbo namditu rengmagui nbambo rengse kampang mide.
Paniu daolubo rangkang nai kachia hina charakyga bambo mania hina khatdi chawangkining ga bambo chakhiu-chalan hina khoilujiu Samaria lam wanglan mide. Paniu chamai khangsia tudi minlujiu wangmide.
Jehoash niu kamkhai mibo hina, Judah maigu Chawang Amaziah tu chari thiuboga patan-pahot pakhiangna jaojiu Israel maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Jehoash shaijiu Samaria ga bambo chawangmai rawga baikhai mide, khatdi panahpiu niabo, Jeroboam niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Israel maigu Chawang Jehoash niu shaimibo sai takum kariu-mangiu katang Amaziah niu Judah maigu chawang thiujiu lungkhai-e.
Amaziah niu kamkhai mibo hina Judah maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Jerusalem ga Amaziah tu kamshat raleng tathak thiubam di-e, sijengniu pah Lachish namdilam pakkhai mide, chiudi pagu mikremaidung siniu patu hamengjiu siga kamshat mide.
Papumse chaqonniu Jerusalem ga phungwangjiu Chawang David gu namdiga chawangmai rawga baikhai mide.
Judah maidungniu panahpiu takum kariu-je-charuk tangmibo Uzziah tu chawang pirun runkhaijiu chawang pithiu khaide.
Papiu shai miboga Uzziah niu chari ngamjiu Elath thiusu lande.

Judah maigu chawang nahpiu Amaziah niu mawangbo takum kariu-je-mangiukiu tangboga Jehoash nahpiu niabo Jeroboam niu Israel maigu chawang thiude khatdi paniu Samaria ga takum atai-je-khatkiu mawang khaide.
Paniu
Paniu Israel maigu hamibo luongren pakhiangna tingpilam Hamath Pass ganiu tingrunlam Kashaibo Duipui katang lulan lude. Haise Gath Hepher lamsu wangbo Amittai nah
Israel maigu magenthak, mai khatniudi paliutu nkha khaira habose
Chiudi Israel maitu tingtheng leng kam maha mirabo hai

Niabo Jeroboam niu kamkhai mibo ngamkam hina, chariga patan-pahot, khatdi dechiujiu Damascus lulan lulo chiubo, khatdi Hamath tu Israel mai ben ga malan khailan bilo chiubo pakhiangna Israel maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Sichiujiu Jeroboam shaijiu chawangmai rawga baimide, khatdi panahpiu Zechariah niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Israel maigu Chawang niabo Jeroboam niu mawangbo takum makai-je-chinnia tangboga, Amaziah nahpiu Uzziah niu Judah maigu chawang thiude.
Pagu takum kariu-je-charuk tangboga pah chawang thiude, khatdi pah Jerusalem ga takum ringiu-je-niakiu chawang thiujiu mawang khai-e. Papuira Jerusalem lamsu wangbo Jekoliah chiu ku-e.
Papiu saisuijiu, padi
Chiudi charameng kahumbo bamra kam mahami makge, khatdi maidungniu sibo bamga charathiubo tien thiujiu khatdi maruta mataojiu kahumbo tien thiujiu bam palun-e.

niu Uzziah tu nphenbo rapot pi marakhaijiu, sise paringting loibo tangjiu parapot thiukhai-e. Patien pangam hina saodiakjiu, paronna chaky khatga lungkhaide siga panahpiu Jotham niu kadih hai thin khaide.
Uzziah niu kamkhai mibo hina Judah maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Uzziah shai miboga David Namdi chawangmai rawga baikhaide, khatdi panahpiu Jotham niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.

Judah maigu Chawang Uzziah niu mawangbo takum samriu-je-tachat tangboga niabo Jeroboam nahpiu Zechariah niu Israel maigu chawang thiude, khatdi Samaria ga chahiu charuk chawang thiujiu kadih thin khaide.
Pasuangga lungkhai mibo mai kumjiu, padi
Jabesh nahpiu Shallum niu Chawang Zechariah tu kam mahara mahim kamjiu Ibleam
Zechariah niu kamkhai mibo hina Israel maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Judah maigu Chawang Uzziah niu mawangbo takum samriu-je-chakiu tangmiboga, Jabesh nahpiu Shallum niu Israel maigu chawang thiujiu Samaria ga chahiu khat mawang khaide.
Gadi nahpiu Menahem niu Tirzah lamsu Samaria ga wangjiu Shallum tu kamshat mide khatdi paniu chawang thiujiu Shallum bam malin mide.
Shallum niu kamkhai mibo hina, pagu mahinbo ngamkam hinadi jaojiu Israel maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.

Menahem niu Tirzah lamsu tad-taronwangbo pagu tabin npuiga, Tappuah namdi, khatdi siga lungbam maidung khatdi lung maguibambo kadihtu paniu kam maha mide, palamra sibo namdise pakhuga ngutmakge. Paniu pawon phungbo maipui won katangdi kampangjiu kamshat mide.
Judah maigu chawang Uzziah niu mawangbo takum samriu-je-chakiu tangmiboga Gadi nahpiu Menahem niu Israel maigu chawang thiude, sichiujiu Samaria ga takum kariu chawang thiujiu mawang khaide.
Israel maitu nuan ga jukhaibo Nebat nahpiu Chawang Jeroboam gu kasabo jaise majaijiu, padi
Assyria maigu wangdipiu Tiglath Pileser niu Israel maitu chari thiude khatdi Menahem niu rangkang taju sang samriu-je-madai khoilujiu pagu pumtan luthon mimakra chiujiu pakhuga pikhaide.
Menahem niu Israel mai kalek kawibo mai hinaga rangkang ringngiu, ringngiu manomjiu khalu pikhaibo-e. Sijengniu Tiglath Pileser padihlam malan wang mide.
Menahem niu kamkhai mibo hina Israel maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Pah shaijiu baimide siga panahpiu Pekahiah niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Judah maigu Chawang Uzziah niu mawangbo takum ringiu tangmiboga, Menahem nahpiu Pekahiah niu Israel maigu chawang thiude, khatdi paniu Samaria ga takum nia chawang thiujiu mawang khaide.
Padi, Nebat nahpiu Jeroboam gu kasabo jai saisuijiu, padi

Pekahiah gu charipi khat Remaliah nahpiu Pekah niu riphenmai ringiutu Gilead lamsu majangwang Samaria gu n-lungbo charireng gasu Pekahiah-tu mahin kamshatra rangjiu Samaria maigu chawangkiningga Pekahiah tu kamshat mide, sichiujiu Pekah niu chawangbam malin mide.
Pekahiah niu kamkhai mibo hina Israel maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Judah maigu chawang Uzziah niu mawangbo takum ringiu-je-niakiu tangmiboga, Remaliah nahpiu Pekah niu Israel maigu chawang thiude, sichiujiu paniu Samaria ga takum makai chawang thiujiu mawang khaide.
Israel maitu nuan ga jukhaibo Nebat nahpiu Jeroboam gu kasabo jai alijiu paniu

Pekah niu chawang thiubo wan ga Assyria maigu chawang Tiglath Pileser niu chari thiuboga, Ijon, Abel Beth Maakah, Janoah, Kedesh, khatdi Hazor namdidung hai lumide khatdi Gilead, Galilee khatdi Naphtali maigu luongriang hai lumide. Sichiujiu siga lungbam maitu Assyria lam kavang thiura jutad mide.
Judah maigu chawang Uzziah nahpiu Jotham niu mawangbo takum makai tangmiboga Elah nahpiu Hoshea niu chawang Pekah tu atungjiu kamshat mide, khatdi chawang thiujiu patu malin mide.
Pekah niu kamkhai mibo hina Israel maigu Chawang mai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Israel maigu chawang Remaliah nahpiu Pekah niu mawangbo takum nia tangmiboga, Uzziah nahpiu Jotham niu pagu takum makai-mangiukiu tangboga Judah maigu chawang thiude,
sichiujiu Jerusalem ga takum kariu-charukkiu mawang khaide. Papui hai Zadok napui, Jerusha si-e.
Papiu Uzziah niu kambo kumjiu Jotham di

Chiudi charameng kahumbo rathakbamra kampangmi makge, khatdi maidungniu sibo bamga charathiubo khatdi maruta mataojiu kahumbo tien thiubam kha-e. Charaky gu Tingpi Rengmun thiukhaibo piuse Jotham siniu-e.
Jotham niu kamkhai mibo hina Judah maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Jotham niu chawang thiubo tingga
Jotham shai miboga David namdigu chawangmai rawga baikhai mide, khatdi panahpiu Ahaz niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Ramaliah nahpiu Pekah niu Israel maigu chawang thiujiu mawangbo takum kariu-je-chinnia tangboga Jotham nahpiu Ahaz niu Judah maigu chawang thiude.
Pagu takum makai tangboga, paniu Jerusalem ga takum kariu-je-charukkiu chawang thiujiu mawang khaide. Papao Chawang David niu kamkhai mibo kawibo jaise para majai makge; sibo sung,
khatdi Israel mai wangdunggu kasabo jaise majai mide. Israel mai masuangga bamniubo matai marengbo tiense kamjiu,
Charameng kahumbo bamga, maluong riga, khatdi singbang hang machangga, Ahaz niu charathiujiu parim wibo matao khaide.
(Sibo wan-ga, Edom maigu wangpiuniu Elath namdise lulujiu, siga lungbambo Judah maitu hathon mide. khatdi tuhoi tangbo lung bamme).
Assyria maigu wangdipiu Tiglath Pileser khuga haibo champao jaojiu Ahaz niu chamai langkhaide: “Ira navangpiu-e. Atu chari thiujiu bambo Syria mai nai Israel mai wang ben ganiu atu wangjiu gukhailo.”
Ahaz niu Charakyga khatdi chawangkining ga kabambo kachia-rangkang hina, khoilujiu kalen thiujiu wangdipiu khuga pikhaide.

Tiglath Pileser niu Ahaz niu kakhengbo chiukhai bijiu pagu riphendungtu puilujiu Damascus ga chari thiujiu Damascus lumide, Chawang Rezin tu kamshat mide, khatdi siga lungbam maitu kavang thiujiu Kir lam juwang mide.
Chawang Ahaz niu Damascus lam Wangdipiu Tiglath Pileser tu adaora tadboga rathakbam khat ngaolude, khatdi sikum gapbo rathakbam khat thiura singku Uriah tu langkhaide.
Sijeng gasu Uriah niu Damascus lamsu dinwangbo rathakbam kumgap khat macha khaide, sise Ahaz niu malanwang makhaga sise macha loimide.
Damascus lamsu pah malan wangboga rathakbamse machaloi diakbo Ahaz niu ngaode,
siga paniu charathiujiu khaoring rukhaibo nai alin-tara kadpadbo, khatdi jaw liangkhaijiu kadpadbo khatdi aruanggu kadpadbo thiujiu tazai kajin khaibo tiense siga kam khaide.
khuga kadkhai mibo tanaagigu rathakbamse rathakbam kasanbo nai Charaky kakga bamme, sijengniu sibo rathakbamse Ahaz niu kasanbo rathakbam mung tingpilam sise kam khaide.

Sigasu Uriah tu paniu chamtan pi-e, “Agu rathakbam kadibo haise maidungniu nsuan rukhaijiu kadkhai raleng, khatdi chawan-gu alin-tara kadkhai raleng, chawangniu khatdi maidungniu rukhaijiu kadpadbo khatdi maidungniu jaw liang khaiboga thinpiulo. Khaorui kamshat khaijiu kadkhaibo zai hina haiga majao khailo. Chiudi tataagigu rathakbam haira chara chunning phiuboga thinpiu rabo-e.”
Chawang Ahaz gu chamtan saisuijiu Uriah niu kamkhaide.
Khatdi Assyria maigu wangdipiu chun pi kimkhai nibo jenggasu, Ahaz niu Charakyga bambo chawangbamse rathon mide khatdi Charakyga chawangniu ngutbo kamundi kham mide.
Chawang Ahaz niu kamkhai mibo hina Judah maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Ahaz shaimiboga David namdi chawangmai rawga baikhai mide khatdi panahpiu Hezekiah niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Judah maigu Chawang Ahaz niu mawangbo takum kariu-je-niakiu tangboga, Elah nahpiu Hoshea niu Israel maigu chawang thiude, sichiujiu paniu Samaria ga takum chakiu mawang khaide.
Padi
Assyria maigu Wangdipiu Shalmaneser niu patu atungjiu chari thiu-e, siga Hoshea niu Shalmaneser khuga ngutkhai mide sichiujiu takum machang pakhuga ramkha pide.

Chiudi pawan khatga Hoshea niu Egypt maigu chawang khuga champao maitu langkhaijiu patu nkha khaira kheng-e, khatdi takumgu ramkha thiujiu Assyria mai khuga pita mide. Haise Shalmaneser niu silujiu Hoshea tu minlu kavangkyga khai mide.
Shalmaneser niu Israel maitu chari thiujiu Samaria sutlude. Samaria tu ngamlubo takum sum tangmiboga,

Hoshea niu mawangbo takum chakiu tangmiboga, Assyria maigu wangdipiuniu Samaria tu haphun lude, Israel maidungtu kavang thiujiu Assyria lam jutad mide khatdi khangsiatu Halah namdiga, khangsiatu Gozan kadihga bambo Habor Giu mungga khatdi khangsiatu Media namdidungga pilung khai mide.
Samaria kaomibo lamra Egypt mai wang ben ganiu paliutu gukhaibibo khatdi Egypt ganiu paliutu jupad khai bibo
pamaidungniu wangbo tingga hathon mibo maidunggu tajai saisui mibo-e, khatdi Israel maigu chawangdunggu tajaise lukhai mibo-e.
Israel mainiu namdi pakhiangna, siamthubo ganiu sujiu dithubo namdi katang majimakbo ratu kahumbo bam thiukhai mide.
Maluongri hinaga khatdi paniu kengbo singbang hang hinaga tatu tiangdung khatdi charapui Asherah meng kam khaide,
sichiujiu maidungniu kambo kumjiu paliudi majimakbo rathak bamdungga parim wibo matao khaide,
sichiujiu charameng kahum tulo chiubo
Chiudi paliuniu majai makge;

niu katikhaibose paliuniu suimakge, paliu pao-pehmai khuga paniu ladriat thiukhaibo situ paliu lukhai makge, khatdi paniu kachan khaibo situ paliu chakhuang thiumakge. Paliuniu pageng habo ramengtu kahum mide, sichiujiu paliu hai pageng kahabo mai thiu mide, lungmagui bambo,
Paliuniu
Paliuniu paliu nahpiudungtu khatdi paliu nahpuidungtu majimakbo radung leng maring rujiu kadkhaide; paliuniu chamang phungbo, chabenriat khanbo, khatdi
niu Israel maitu palung pommide, khatdi Judah maigu chawangdihtu ronna masiak khai lujiu, paliutu pamasuang gasu luthon kam mide.
Chiudi Judah maidi
niu Israel maitu thon mide, paliutu sajai pikhaide khatdi paliutu kam maha makthen kasabo mikremai ben ga pikhai mide.
Paliuniu Jeroboam saisui mide khatdi paniu kamkhai mibo nuan hinase ali mide.
niu pavangmai phaimiukakungdung khuga kamkhaira dinkhai mibo kum, paniu paliutu pasuang gasu hathon mide. Sijengniu Israel maitu Assyria lam kavang leng jutad mide, sichiujiu siga paliu lungmide.

Assyria mai wangdipiuniu Babylon, Cuth, Ivvah, Hamath khatdi Sepharvaim namdidungga lungbam maidungtu pijiu chari ganiu minwang mibo Israel mai niu lungbam niubo bam, Samaria gu namdidungga pi lungkhai mide. Sibo namdidungse paliuniu sutlujiu papao thiujiu lungmide.
Siga paliu lung karaibo tinggara

Assyria maigu wangdipiu khuga haichiujiu dinkhaide, paniu Samaria ga pilung khaibo maidung hai, sibo kadihga bambo racheng simakge, sijengniu Tingwang niu ndongqui langkhaijiu paliutu kamshat bambo-e.

Sijeng gasu wangdipiuniu chamtan pi-e: “Aliuniu kavang thiujiu minwangbo singkudung rong ganiu mai khattu langkhaijiu, sibo kadihga bambo rachenggu tajaise paliutu kati khaira langkhaijiu siga pilung milo.”
Sijengniu Israel maigu singku Samaria ganiu hathon mibo maitu Bethel ga langkhaide, siga
Chiudi Samaria ga lungbam maise paliugu charameng machalujiu, Israel mainiu machadiakbo rathak bamdung gase khaide. Paphom-phomgu ramengse siga bammainiu macha sude:
Babylon mainiu Succoth Benoth ramengdung macha mide, Cuth mainiu Nergal ramengdung macha mide, Hamath mainiu Ashima ramengdung macha mide.
Ivvah mainiu Nibhaz khatdi Tartak mengdung macha mide khatdi Sepharvaim mainiu paliu radung Adrammelech khatdi Anammelech leng paliu nahmaitu maring rukhaijiu charathiu khaijiu sisetu macha mide.
Maidung hainiu
Sichiujiu paliu
niu paliutu ladriat thiu khaide khatdi paliutu chamtan pikhaide: “Katambo radungtu kahum tulo; paliu masuangga makhumkiu tulo maksai paliutu macha tulo, maksai paliuleng wadi kadkhai tulo.
Egypt dih gasu pumtan jaojiu naliutu puipat khaibo
Iniu naliuleng raokhai mibo tacheng-tajaidung khatdi chamtandungse pawan machang majai rabo-e. Naliuniu katambo radung kadin piumak rabo-e,
sichiujiu Iniu naliu khuga ladriat thiu khaibose naliuniu mangaimak rabo-e.
Naliu Rawang,
Chiudi maidung hainiu kadinbo majai makge, sichiujiu paliugu kaguangbo tajaidungse paliuniu majailan mide.
Sichiujiu
Elah nahpiu Hoshea niu Israel maigu chawang thiujiu mawangbo takum sum tangmiboga, Ahaz nahpiu Hezekiah niu Judah maigu chawang thiude.
Pagu takum makai-je-mangiukiu tangmiboga Jerusalem ga mawangjiu takum makai-je-chakiukiu paniu mawang khaide. Papui hai Zechariah nahpui Abijah si-e.
Papao Chawang David kumjiu, padi

Paniu nkengmai ra kahumbo bamdung kam maha mide, tatu tiangdungdi kamtang mide, khatdi charapui Asherah mengdungdi kamkao mide. Nehushtan kubo, Mose niu macha diakbo tataagigu kaniu sidi paniu kaditap-tap mide. Sibo wan katang Israel maidungniu sisetu chakhuang thiubogu maruta rukhaijiu macha kinniubo-e.
Hezekiah hai
Pahai
Sijengniu patu
Paniu Philistia maitu chari ngamlu-e khatdi siga paliuniu lungbambo siamthubo nam ganiu dithubo namdi, Gaza khatdi situ lungmagui bambo luongriang hinatu kam maha mide.

Hazekiah niu mawangbo takum madai tangmiboga—Chawang Hoshea niu Israel mai riga mawangbo takum chinnia tangmiboga--Assyria maigu Chawang Shalmaneser niu Israel maitu chari thiu ngutjiu Samaria lumide.
Samaria tu aphenbo takum sumboga, Samaria kaomide; haise Hezekiah niu mawangbo takum charukbo kum khatdi Hoshea niu mawangbo takum chakiubo kumme.
Assyria mai wangdipiuniu Israel maitu Assyria lam kavang thiujiu jutad mide khatdi kasia maitu Halah namdiga, kasia maitu Gozan kadih Habor Giu mungga kasia maitu Media namdiga pilung khai mide.
Samaria kaomibo lamra Israel mainiu
Chawang Hezekiah niu mawangbo takum kariu-je-madaikiu tangmiboga, Assyria maigu Chawang Sennacherib niu Judah maigu charireng thiu khai nbambo namdidungtu chari thiujiu ngamlude.

Hezekiah niu Lachish ga bambo Sennacherib khuga tacham langkhaijiu din-e: “Iniu kam maomibo-e; atu chari thiuta milo, nangniu, khengbo hina Iniu pine.” Assyria maigu wangdipiuniu paokak khaibo sira Hezekiah niu paleng rangkanggi taju sang kariu khatdi kachia taju sang khat pilo chiubo haisi-e.
Hezekiah niu Charakyga kabambo rangkang pakhiangna khatdi chawangkining gu chakhiuky gu bambo pakhiangna Sennacherib khuga pikhai mide.
Charaky akhamdungga bambo kachia khatdi papum siakniu akham tiangdungga kamkhai mibo kachiase lupad lujiu Sennacherib khuga pikhai mide.

Assyria maigu wangdipiuniu Lachish lam bambo riphen maidung bao khattu Jerusalem ga Hezekiah tu chari thiura langkhaide; haise chariga dikachangbo chakampao khangsumniu majang tadle, paliuniu Jerusalem mengtangboga chafai kadakbo tien kathiumainiu bambo npui gasu nrilam bambo akhun gasu chuwangbo alotlamga wangbam mide.

Sichiujiu paliuniu Chawang Hezekiah tu kura chamai langkhaide, khatdi pagu chakampaodung, chawangkining ga tatien kathiubopiu, Hezekiah nahpiu Eliakim, apaigu raosuipiu Shebna, khatdi ariakkhuang thinbo piu Asaph nahpiu Joah paliu khangsumniu tadjiu paliutu sundao-e.
Siga Assyria maigu chakampaodung rong gasu khangkhatniu paliu khuga din-e, Chawang Hezekiah niu haijiukha malumjiu bambo hai degu tulo chiubo chawangniu sini-e.
Paniu din-e, “Ladkengdungniu riphenmaigu ningting khatdi pumtan sung thiulune chiubo naliuniu maning jiuma? Assyria maitu chari thiuboga saoniu naliutu nkha khaira maning jiulo?

Egypt mainiu naliutu nkha khaira naliuniu malum bamme chiudi sisera chahutangniu tathun kakambo kumrabo-e—haise pangpadjiu naliu ben pelu rabo-e. Egypt maigu chawangtu malummai hina khuga haikumjiu padrabo-e.
Assyria maigu chakampao siniu dinkiulan-e, “Naliu Rawang, Rapiu tu malum bamme chiujiu naliuniu akhuga din rama? Jerusalem ga bambo rathakbamga ronna
Chawang zan ganiu naliutu Iniu ladriat khat thiune, naliu ruangga chaqon tongramai phiulu sai Iniu naliuleng chaqon sang nia pikhai bine!
Assyria maigu siamthubo chakampao tudi naliu sun-ngam lakge, khatdi Egypt mainiu naliuleng chaqon khatdi chaqon-kari pikhaira malum bambo sira mathaku-e!
gu nkhabo jaomakjiu naliugu kadihtu chari thiubambo-e khatdi kam maha bambo-e chiujiu naliu maning jiuma? Chari thiura khatdi kam mahara
Sigasu Eliakim, Shebna, khatdi Joah niu chakampao khuga din-e, “Aramaic lad ganiu aliutu npaolo, chaibo yo, Sibo lad aliu si-e. Hebrew ladga dintulo; haiga bammai pakhiangna nkingjiu bamme.”

Paniu paokakge, “Naliu khatdi chawang khuga ronna ladkengdung hai dinra chawangniu atu langkhaibo-e chiujiu naliu maning jiuma? Chiumakge, kareng riga ntao bammai khugadi Iniu din bambo-e, naliu kumjiu paliudi paliu ba tiurabo-e khatdi paliu jun sakrabo-e.”
Sichiujiu chakampaose chapsujiu Hebrew lad ganiu senpadle, “Assyria maigu chawangniu naliutu dinbambo hai nkinglulo!
Hezekiah niu naliutu sonmi makra Assyria maigu chawangniu naliutu kachan khaibo-e. Hezekiah niu naliutu gukhai ngam lakge.
tu malumra paniu naliutu pijiu sonmi tulo.

Hezekiah lad nking tulo. Assyria maigu chawangniu naliutu namdi gasu padlujiu pakhuga ngutkhai mira chamtan pibambo-e. Naliu mathiu naliugu mumsy ken ganiu mumsy tiubo, naliugu nfakbang ganiu faxy tiubo, khatdi naliugu akhun-ganiu tadui sakbo suikhai bine—

Chawangniu naliutu naliu dih kum gapboga pilung khai makthen, siga jaw macha raleng mumsy ken, taruak macharaleng alin-tara bamme; haise takisa khatdi makhuidui bambo kadih-e. Paniu chamtan pibose, naliuniu kamme sai, naliu shaimakjiu, ringlu rabo-e.
Katam-tambo jatdunggu radungniu paliugu kadihtu Assyria maigu chawang ben-ganiu gukhai ngamma?
Hamath khatdi Arpad mai radungse tuhoi delam bam milo? Sepharvaim, Hena khatdi Ivvah maigu radungse delam bam milo? Mai khatniu Samaria tu gukhai mibo bamma?
Dekumbo kadihga charadungniu paliugu kadihtu aliugu wangdipiu ben-ganiu debo wan-ga gukhai mibo bamlo? Sichiusai Jerusalem tu
Chawang Hezekiah niu paliu khuga dinkhaibo kumjiu, paliu ladkeng khatdi dinmakge, maliu makjiu bammide.
Eliakim, Shebna khatdi Joah paliu lung chariujiu paliu fai phetjiu, khatdi chawang khuga wanglujiu Assyria maigu chakampaoniu dinbo chamse paokhaide.
Chawang Hezekiah niu paliugu champao chiu-kaji chiu-kari, palung chariujiu pafai-pani phetjiu khatdi maliufai benlujiu
Chawangkining phuipao Eliakim, apaigu raosui Shebna khatdi singku katingmaitu Hezekiah niu Amoz nahpiu phaimiukakung Isaiah khuga langkhaide. Paliudi maliufai benlujiu tadle.

Paliuniu Isaiah khuga dinkhaira paniu dinkhaibo champao sira: “Thainai hai chariubo tingmikge; aliutu kam mangamjiu aliu zu kam masa khaide. Aliu hai manara kambambo chiudi manapad ngamlak bambo maipui khat kum mide.
Assyria maigu wangdipiu siniu ringjiu bambo Tingwang tu din masara pagu chakampaopi situ langkhaide. Din masajiu bambo cham hai na-Rawang,
Hezekiah gu champaose Isaiah niu daolubo ga,
haibo champao hai paniu langkhai-e: “
niu wangdipiu situ kabuakbo cham pichiu khaijiu pijiu patu padihlam malankhai mine, sichiujiu
Assyria maigu chakampaoniu paliugu wangdipiu siniu Lachish phutlujiu Libnah namdi munglam chari thiura tadmide chiubo silujiu silam patu npaora tadmide.

Sudan gu Chawang Tirhakah niu Egypt gu riphen maidungtu majangjiu paliutu chari thiura wangkinne chiubo cham hai Assyria mai khuga wangtang mide. Wangdipiu siniu haise chiulubo ga, Judah maigu Chawang Hezekiah khuga chamlen khat langkhaijiu
pakhuga haichiu din-e, “Nangniu malum bambo ra siniu aben ga nang ngutlakge chiujiu din bamme, chiudi siseniu natu sonmi tulo.
Assyria maigu wangdipiuniu kam mahane chiujiu machun mibo kadihtu, paniu kammibo hina naliuniu chiumide. Nangniu duaklune chiubo maning jiuma?
Apao-apeh mainiu Gozan, Haran, khatdi Rezeph gu namdidung kam maha mide khatdi Telassar ga lungbambo Betheden maitu kamshat mide, sichiujiu paliugu radung khatniudi paliutu gukhai ngam makge.
Hamath, Arpad, Sepharvaim, Hena, khatdi Ivvah namdidunggu chawangdungse delam bamlo?”
Chawang Hezekiah niu champaomai khugasu chamlense khoilujiu sise kende. Sigasu Charaky lam tadlujiu chamlense
kakheng thiu sude, “Oh
Tuhoira,
Aliu mathiuniu si-e,
Chara makbo, chamai benniu tasing tatuniu machapadbo ramengdung situ paliuniu ruthon mide.
Tuhoira, aliu Rawang,
Siga Isaiah niu Chawang Hezekiah gu kakheng paokak khaibo thiujiu champao khat pikhaijiu din-e,
niu din-e, “Oh, Sennacherib, Jerusalem namdiniu natu nuibamme, khatdi kaga bamme.
Nangniu din masa bambo khatdi nui bambose saotulo? Israel maigu masanbo Tingwang atu nang chakhuang thiu makbo-e.

Nagu chaqon-karidung siniu Lebanon gu kukachangbo maluongroi khanglu-e, chiujiu nangniu langkhaibo champao maidungniu akhuga chaliang bamme. Nangniu kuthubo singchong bangdung nai withubo maga bangdung huikao lu-e, khatdi sukthubo mariu lungga ngut tanglu-e chiujiu nangniu wasao thiujiu bamme.
Nangniu sangdiumai dihga akhun chulujiu tadui sak ngamme khatdi nagu riphen maidungniu Nile giuga paliu phi pankhaiboga sanglu-e chiujiu nangniu na-chaliang thiujiu bamme.
“Iniu pakhiangna hai ndasu kadenloi mibo-e chiubo nang wadi simak jiuma? Khatdi tuhoi haise Iniu kampad khaibo-e. Tatuniu rengkhaibo namdidungtu kamkao bambose Iniu nakhuga pumtan pikhaibo-e.

Siga lungbam maidung paliu pumtan hamide; paliu nping mide, khatdi paliu chun hamide. Paliu hai tingbang lamgu kathiubo tingkainiu hunwangboga chaluga maksai chaky npom riga bambo chapiubangtu hunthon mibo kum mide.
“Chiudi nangniu nde kambam gulo khatdi delam tadbamlo, chiubo Iniu nalamga sikam bamme. Nangniu ariga nalung pombambo I si-e.

Nangniu nalung pombambo khatdi nagu chaliangbo chamse Iniu daolude, khatdi tuhoira Iniu naniukise khakhoiniu juman mine, khatdi namunse chakung khai mine khatdi nangniu wangbo npuilam natu hamalan khai rabo-e.”

Sigasu Isaiah niu Chawang Hezekiah khuga din-e, “Haise padrabogu madan khatle. Thaikum khatdi makum naliu nkan-gu charasy ronna tiusune, chiudi pasaibo kum lamra naliu luga alin lingjiu atiatmi sune khatdi mumsy kendung lingjiu mumsy tiumi sune.
Charasy bangniu kadihga pamen jang masuk kiujiu pasy masibo kum, Judah ga ring kabang maidung sidi sikum sune.
Jerusalem ga khatdi Zion luongga ring masiabo chamai padsune, palamra haise
Haibo namdiga ngutmakjiu, paniu mengbo npuilam malan khai mine.
Agu kendibo situ Iniu chakhuang thiujiu khatdi avangpiu David khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo jengniu Iniu haibo namditu kakajiu gukhaine.’”
Sibo nai nchun
Siganiu Assyria maigu wangdipiu Sennacherib niu chari thiutajiu Nineveh lam malan khai mide.

Naikhat, paniu Nisroch rakyga kahumjiu bambo tingga panah kania, Adrammelekh nai Sharezer niu patu chahengniu bishat mide, sichiujiu panai Ararat kadih lam pakkhai mide. Panahmai ruangga katambo, Esarhaddon niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Sibo wan-ga Chawang Hezekiah marajiu shaira kum mide. Amoz nahpiu phaimiukakung Isaiah niu patu adaora wangjiu din-e, “
Hezekiah niu singbenglam pazu mari lujiu kakheng thiu sude.
Isaiah niu chawangtu saodiak lujiu tadmide, chiudi chawangkining rengmun kenpadmak khaga
maidunggu dithinpao, Hezekiah khuga malan wangjiu haichiu dinlo, “Napao David gu

Iniu natu takum kariu-je-mangiukiu pi ringsan khaine. Iniu natu khatdi Jerusalem namditu Assyria maigu wangdipiu ben ganiu gukhaine. Agu kendibo situ Iniu chakhuang thiujiu khatdi avangpiu David khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo jengniu haibo namditu Iniu gukhaine.”
Sigasu Isaiah niu chawanggu kavangdung khuga ndut-ta khoilujiu pagen kathiubo gase manuk khailo chiusai pah wimine chiu din-e.
Chawang Hezekiah niu maniu-e, “
Isaiah niu kenkakge, “
Hezekiah niu paokakge, “Sibo hiumana suanglam phikem kariu tadpadbo sira mala-e! Sailam phikem kariu pi nkhin khailo.”
Isaiah niu
Sibo wan-ga Baladan nahpiu Babylon gu Chawang Merodach Baladan niu Hezekiah mara bamme chiubo silujiu, paniu chamlen khat nai kalen khat Hezekiah khuga langkhaide.

Hezekiah niu champao phungwang maitu wijiu lukhaide, khatdi pagu chakhiu-chalan, kachia, rangkang, wa maniadung khatdi parim kawibodung khatdi chari mania hina paliu khuga lenkhai bide. Padihga kabambo mania hina paliu khuga Hezekiah niu lenkhai kamakbo khatnadi thiu makge.
Sijengniu phaimiukakung Isaiah niu Chawang Hezekiah khuga tadlujiu maniu-e, “Haibo maidung hai delamsu wangbolo khatdi paliuniu nakhuga degu dinjiulo?”
Hezekiah niu paokakge, “Paliu hai diuchang diubo Babylon lamsu wangbo-e.”
“Chawang kiningga paliuniu nde ngaomi gulo?”
“Paliuniu wahina ngao kammide. Iniu paliutu lenkhai kamakbo wakhatnadi thiu makge.”
Isaiah niu chawangtu haichiu dinkhaide, Ngamkambo
chiubora nawang kining ga kabambo wahina, napao-napeh mainiu thainai katang khuan madui diakbo hina Babylon lam lutad kam mirabo wanse wang sune. Wadi masiak khai diak lakge.
Nangniu manabo nakai-nakik khangsiatu kavangleng mintadmi sune khatdi Babylon gu chawangkining ga papum kamshat mimai pithiu khaijiu macha sune.”

Chawang Hezekiah niu paringting gara agi-manaijiu khatdi tathiu-chari hajiu lungne chiubo hai pah simasan mide, sijengniu paniu paokakge, “Tingwang gu champao nangniu akhuga pisikhaibo hai kawibo gu-e.”
Chawang Hezekiah niu kamkhai mibo hina, patan pahot, akhun chudiakbo khatdi namdiga alodlam chuwangbo pakhiangna jaojiu Judah maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Hezekiah shaimiboga panahpiu Manasseh niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Manasseh niu pagu takum kariu-je-niakiu tangbo ga Judah maigu chawang thiude khatdi paniu Jerusalem ga takum ringngiu-je-mangiukiu mawang khaide. Papui hai Hephzibah ku-e.
niu hathon mibo jatdunggu matai marengbo ngam kamjiu, Manasseh niu

Papiu Hezekiah niu kam maha mibo charameng kahumbo bamdungse paniu thiusu lande, Baal tu kahumrabo rathakbam hina thiusu khaide. Khatdi Israel maigu Chawang Ahab niu kammibo kumjiu charapui Asherah mengdi macha khaide. Manasseh niu chagandung tudi kahum mide.
tu kahum rabo bam Charaky gase, paniu charamengtu kahumrabo rathakbam thiujiu kahum mide.
Charaky kahiu nia gase chagandungtu kahumrabo leng rathakbam macha khaide.
Paniu panahpiutu maring rukhaibo rathak thiujiu kadkhaide. Chabenriat khanbo, tasiam kambo, taden mataibo khatdi chamang phungbo hina hai paniu kamde. Paniu

niu David nai panahpiu Solomon khuga, “Israel mai kiphiu kariu-je-niakiu gu luongriang hina gasu kahum raleng Iniu Jerusalem Raky haitu kadakhai mibo-e,chiujiu dinkhai mibo Charaky lung gase, paniu charapui Asherah mengdi ponwang dengkhai-e.

Sichiujiu Israel maidungniu agu chamtan hina majaijiu khatdi avangpiu Mose niu paliu khuga pikhaibo tacheng-tajaidungse piu-e sai, paliu pao-peh maidungleng Iniu pikhai mibo kadih gasu paliutu wadaodi hathon padra suikhai lakge.”
Chiudi Judah maidungse
“Chawang Manasseh niu kasabo hai kam mide, Canaan mainiu kammibo suangdi sa-nkiubo hai kam mide, paniu charameng machalujiu Judah maitu nuan ga jukhai mide.
Sijengniu, Israel mai Rawang,

Iniu Samaria tu kammibo kum, Iniu Israel maigu Chawang Ahab tu khatdi pakai-pakiktu kamkhai mibo kum, Jerusalem tu Iniu sajai pine. Chakuang khiubo mainiu chakuang khiubo tingga, thin makhum thin masijiu khiubo kum, Iniu Jerusalem maitu thin makhum thin masisu rabo-e.
Ring masiak lubo maitu Iniu phutmine, khatdi paliugu mikremai ben-ga paliutu pipad khaijiu mikremainiu paliutu ngammi rabo-e, khatdi paliugu kadihse sunglu rabo-e.
Paliuniu asuangga nuan kambo jengniu khatdi paliu pao-peh mainiu Egypt gasu padbo wan gasu sujiu atu alung kampom mibo jengniu, amaidung khuga haise Iniu pipad khai rabo-e.
Manasseh niu pakhui-pamao kahamai kengkhatu kamshatjiu Jerusalem npuiga tazai luang maren bamme; sibo riga Judah maitu paniu charameng kahumboga jukhaijiu
Manasseh niu kamkhai mibo hina, paniu kamaobo kam mibo hinadi Judah maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Manasseh shaimiboga patuse chawangkining ga bambo Uzza rengga baikhai mide, khatdi panahpiu Amon niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.

Amon niu pagu takum makai-je-mangiukiu tangboga Judah maigu chawang thiude, khatdi paniu takum nia Jerusalem tu mawangjiu lung khaide. Papui hai Jotbah namdak lamsu wangbo Haruz nahpui Meshullemeth chiujiu ku-e.
Papiu Manasseh kumjiu,
Papiuniu kambo ngamse padi kamde khatdi papiuniu kahum bamniubo charameng situ padi kahumde.
Papao-papeh maigu
Pagu chakampaodungniu Amon tu kamshatra mahin ranglujiu chawangkining ga patu kamshat mide.
Judah maidungniu Amon tu kagibo maitudi kamshat lanmide, khatdi panahpiu Josiah tu chawang pithiu khaide.
Amon niu kamkhai mibo hina Judah maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Amon tu Uzza rengga bambo rawga baikhai mide khatdi panahpiu Josiah niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Josiah niu
Paniu mawangbo takum kariu-je- tachadboga Chawang Josiah niu apaimaiky gu raosui Shaphan, Meshullam tahpiu khatdi Azaliah nahpiutu chamtan pikhaijiu Charakyga langkhaide:
“Singku Dibo Hilkiah khuga tadlujiu Charaky kamun khuanbo singku siniu maidung khugasu khalubo rangkang riakse dejiu milo chiujiu maniu wanglo.
Makhuan lubo rangkangse Charaky kathiumai ben-ga pimilo chiujiu patu dinbilo. Paliuniu sibo rangkangse
tasing ngam kam maidung, chaky kathiubo maidung khatdi tatu siam kasimaidung leng pirabo-e khatdi tasing, tatu luboga thinkhai rabo-e.
Changam phuipaodungse paliu lung masanchang masanne sijengniu paliu khuga pariak chaksiak-siakjiu phuira pageng ha-e.”

Shaphan niu chawanggu chamtanse Hilkiah khuga dinkhaiboga, Hilkiah niu pakhuga din-e, chiubora Iniu tacheng-tajaigu Ariakkhuangse Charaky ganiu daolude. Hilkiah niu ariakkhuangse pakhuga pikhaide, khatdi sise Shaphan niu kende.
Siga paniu chawang khuga malan wangjiu din-e, “Charakyga kabambo rangkangse navangpiu Iniu khoilujiu Charaky kathiumai khuga benlen khai mide.”
Siga paniu din-e, “Hilkiah niu pikhaibo ariakkhuang khat akhuga bamme.” Sichiujiu sise paniu chawang khuga kenpad khaide.
Ariakkhuangga raobambo chamse chawangniu chiuluboga, palung chariujiu pafai-pani phetsude,
khatdi chawangniu singku Hilkiah, Shaphan nahpiu Ahikam, Micaiah nahpiu Achbor, apaikygu raosui Shaphan khatdi chawangtu machapiu Asaiah khuga haidungse chamtan thiujiu din-e:
