“Alamga khatdi Judah mai pakhiangna lamga haibo ariakkhuangniu katikhaijiu bambo hina tadjiu

Hilkiah, Ahikam, Achbor, Shaphan khatdi Asaiah paliuniu tadlujiu maipui khangkhat pazanniu Huldah chiujiu kubo phaimiukakung khat Jerusalem mung khatga lungbambo maipui khuga maniude.(Pakina Shallum hai, Tikvah nahpiu, Harhas tahpiuse Charaky gu fai-ni akhibo piu-e). Paliuniu pakhuga palam hinase din masan khai bide.
Huldah niu paliutu chawang khulam malan wanglan sulo chiujiu dinkhaide,
khugasu wangbo champaodung hai patu pikhai bide: “Chawangniu kenmibo ariakkhuangga raokhai nbambo kum, Iniu Jerusalem khatdi siga lung bambo mai pakhiangnatu sajai pirabo-e.
Paliuniu atu phutlujiu katambo radung khuga charathiujiu bamme. Sijengniu paliuniu kammibo tiendung siniu alung kampom mide. Agu lungpom hai Jerusalem riga bamme khatdi sise kammit silakge.
Chawang khuga Israel mai Rawang,

Iniu Jerusalem khatdi siga lungbam maitu sajai pira kapinbo chamse nang chiulujiu nalung limide, asuangga napumsiakniu manon kiujiu, nafai-nani phetjiu kapde. Iniu haisitu mai phui kapingbo khat pithiu khaine, paliu zanse maidungniu tasiang thiujiu thin sune. Chiudi narathoise Iniu chiukhaide,
khatdi Jerusalem riga pipad khairabo chariubose nang shaimak thennara pipad khailakge. Iniu natu amansaijiu pi shai khaine.”
Paliuniu haibo champao phunglujiu Chawang Josiah khuga malanwang mide.
Josiah niu Judah khatdi Jerusalem ga jupaodungtu kumadui khaide.

Paliuniu Charaky lam singkumaidung, phaimiukakungdung khatdi kabambo mai pakhiangna, kalek kawimaidi, kalek kasamaidi tammakjiu tadde. Charaky ganiu daolubo ladriatgu ariakkhuang pakhiangna chawangniu mathiu maga ken madupad khaide.
Chawangniu katiang mungga chaplujiu papum pahiuna pakhiangna jaojiu

Judah gu namdidung khatdi Jerusalem mungga bambo charameng kahumbogu rathak bamga macha raleng Judah maigu chawangniu khai diakbo singkudungtu paniu paliu bamgasu luthon mide. Baal tu, naimiktu, chahiutu khatdi chagandungtu mania kadkhaijiu kahumbo singkudung tudi luthon mide.
Charakyga khai nbambo Asherah mengse luthon lujiu, Jerusalem lenlam bambo Kidron Ramjenglam khoipadjiu rumide, khatdi tabuise charao bamlam phe-mara mide.
Charaky lungga makhabo puidungniu bambo kyse paniu rathon mide. (Sibo bamgase maipuidung siniu Asherah kahumbo wan-ga thinpiu raleng chafai-tani dakjiu bamniu-e).

Paniu Judah maigu namdiga bambo singkudungtu Jerusalem ga majangwang mide khatdi paliuniu mania kadkhaijiu kahumbo rathakbam pakhiangna, padihga kabam hinase paniu kam mahakam mide. Dihthinpao, Joshua niu thiusubo rengmun mungga bambo Jerusalem rengmun mungga bambo chara-singbeng leng thiu khaibo rathakbam sidi paniu kamkao mide.
Siga bambo singkudungtu Charaky machabo suikhai makge, chiudi paliu kamai singku maidung leng pikhaibo chakhi jaomakbo taruakse paliuniu tiusui-e.

Judah maigu chawangdungniu naimiktu kahumboga kadkhai diakbo chaqonmeng sidi paniu luthon mide, khatdi kahumboga thinpiubo chaqon-karise paniu ruthon mide. (Haidungse chakampao kadibo, Nathan Melech niu lungbo ky gasu watheng makbo, rengmun mungga bambo rakyga khaibam niu-e).

Judah maigu chawangdungniu Chawang Ahaz ky riga thiukhai diakbo rathakbamse Chawang Josiah niu rathon mide. Sironna makjiu chawang Manasseh niu Charakyga khaidiakbo rathakbamdi jaojiu luthon mide; paniu rathak bamdungse kam maha mide khatdi patap-tapse Kidron ramjenglam thonkhai mide.

Jerusalem nai Olive luong kakga bambo Chawang Solomon niu thiukhai diakbo matai marengbo rameng--Sidon mai rapui Astarte, Moab mai ra Chemosh, khatdi Ammon mai ra Molech tu kahumbo bamse Chawang Josiah niu kam maha mide.
Chawang Josiah niu tatu tiangdungse kamtang kam mide, charapui Asherah mengdi kampang tap-tap mide, khatdi sibo bamse chamai rahniu thonphui mide.

Sigasu Josiah niu phuiboga maluong genlam charaw kasia bambo ngaolujiu, siga bambo charahdungse khoipad lujiu sibo rathakbam gasu ruthon mide. Haichiujiu paniu rathakbamse kam maha mide, nda changee khatga Chawang Jeroboam niu rathak bamga chapjiu bamboga, phaimiukakung mainiu dinmasuang khai mibo kum padmide. Chawang Josiah niu phuiboga phaimiukakung khat raw ngao lude.
“Uise sao rawlo?” chiujiu paniu maniu-e.
Bethel ga bambo mainiu paokakge, “Haise Judah lamsu wangbo phaimiukakung khat rao-e, khatdi nangniu haibo rathakbamga kambambo hai paniu din masuang diakbo-e.”
Josiah niu chamtan pi-e, “Haise haichiujiu khai nbam milo. Paradung hai thin kalimak rabo-e.”
Haichiujiu parahdungdi Samaria lamsu wangbo phaimiukakung rahdungdi thin kalimi makge.
Israel maigu namdi hinaga Israel maigu chawang mainiu thiukhai diakbo nkengmai rathakbam hina,
Nkengmai rathakbamga machajiu bambo singkudung pakhiangnatu paniu kamshat mide, khatdi rathakbam hinaga chamai rahse chami rumide. Sichiujiu Jerusalem lam pah malanwang mide.
Chawang Josiah niu ladriatgu ariakkhuangga raokhai bambo kum
Ladjanmai ken ganiu sujiu Israel mai khatdi Judah maigu chawangmai ruangga khatnadi haikumbo Kenpadbo Ngee kumjiu changi matai makge.
Tuhoi kanamboga Josiah niu mawangbo takum kariu-je-tachat gapboga haibo Kenpadbo Ngee hai changi khaide.

Singku dibo Hilkiah niu Charaky gasu daolubo tacheng-tajaigu ariakkhuangga raokhai bambose tadkiu raleng, Chawang Josiah niu Judah maigu chamang kaphungmai, chabenriat kakhanmai khatdi kikhun-kikhun-gu charameng pakhiangna khatdi nchangmakbo ratu kahumboga thinpiubo mania hina luthon mide.
Mose gu tacheng-tajai piu machang khianglubo, palung pakhiangna, khatdi pumtan pakhiangna jaojiu
Chiudi Manasseh ngamkam jengniu

niu din-e, “Israel maitu Iniu kam mibo kum Judah maitudi kam rabo-e; Judah maitu amik phuigasu luthon mine, khatdi Iniu kadalubo namdi nai Charaky, atu kahumlo chiu dinmibo bam Jerusalem tu Iniu taliang mirabo-e.”
Chawang Josiah niu kamkhai mibo hina Judah maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.

Josiah niu chawang thiubo wan ga Egypt gu Chawang Neco niu riphen maitu majang lujiu Euphrate Giu Assyria maigu wangditu chari nkhara tadmide, Chawang Josiah niu Megiddo lam Egypt riphen maitu khamra tadmide khatdi chari bamga shaikhai mide.
Pagu chakampaodungniu papumse chaqon-kariga khailujiu Jerusalem lam phungwangjiu chawangmai rawga baikhai mide.
Judah maidungniu panahpiu Joahaz tu kadalujiu chawang thiura wasa manuk khaide.
Joahaz niu pagu takum makai-je-sumkiu tang miboga, Judah maigu chawang thiude, khatdi paniu Jerusalem ga chahiu sum mawang khaide. Papui hai Libna namdiga bambo Jeremiah nahpui Hamutal ku-e.
Papao-papeh mai lunlung lujiu padi

Egypt maigu Chawang Neco niu patu Hamath kadihga Riblah kubo kavangkyga khaimibo wan gasu pagu mawangken loimide. Rangkanggi taju 3,400 khatdi kachia taju samriu-madai ramkha thiujiu Judah mainiu pira kam khaide.

Chawang Neco niu Josiah nahpiu Eliakim tu Josiah bam malinbo thiujiu Judah maigu chawang pithiu khaide. Khatdi pazan kam kalijiu Jehoiakim kukhaide. Chawang Neco niu Joahaz tu Egypt lam puitad mide siga pah shaikhai mide.
Egypt maigu chawangniu ramkha khengbo pira leng Chawang Jehoiakim niu pamai ruangga chakhiu-chalan kakeng katam saisuijiu ramkha kam khaide.
Papao-papeh mai saisuijiu, Jehoiakim di
niu pavangmai phaimiukakungdung khuga paniu kamrabo lam din masuang mibo kumjiu
Chawang Manasseh niu kamkhai mibo nuan hina jengniu
Parathiujiu pakhui-pamao kahamai kakengtu Manasseh niu kamshat mibo gasu-e. Sijeng gasu
Jehoiakim niu kamkhai mibo hina Judah maigu Chawangmai Ariakkhuangga raokhai bamme.
Jehoiakim shaimibo sai panahpiu Jehoiachin niu chawang bam malin mide.

Egypt maigu chawang khatnadi pagu riphenmaitu majang lujiu wadaodi Egypt ganiu chari thiura tadpadlan tamide, palamra Euphrate Giuki ganiu sujiu Egypt gu tingpilam ramrai katang Babylon gu chawangniu thinman lude.

Jehoiachin pagu takum kariu-je-tachatkiu tangmiboga Judah maigu chawang thiude khatdi paniu Jerusalem ga chahiu sum kadih thinjiu mawang khaide. Papui sira Jerusalem ga bambo Elnathan nahpui Nehushta chiu ku-e.
Papiu saisuijiu Jehoiachin di
Jehoiachin niu mawangbo tingga Babylon gu riphendungtu Nebuchadnezzar gu chakampaoniu majanglu Jerusalem ga chari thiungut Jerusalem tu ngamlu mide.
Sibo tingga Nebuchadnezzar papumsiakniu Jerusalem ga wangkhaide.

Chawang Jehoiachin, papui, panahpiudung, pagu chakampaodung khatdi pagu chawangkining gu chakampaodung jaojiu Babylon mai khuga ngutkhai mide. Nebuchadnezzar niu mawangbo takum tachat tangmiboga Jehoiachin tu kavangkyga khai mide.
Charakyga khatdi chawangkining ga bambo chakhiu-chalan pakhiangna Babylon lam phungtad mide.

Nebuchadnezzar niu Jerusalem ga bambo chawang nahmaidung, parathiubo maidung pakhiangna, chagi tien kathiumai jaojiu, tatien ga kacharatbo mai pakhiangna chamai sang kariutu jutad mide, sichiujiu madiu-maida dungtu ronna saodiakde.
Nebuchadnezzar niu parathiumai hinatu Babylon lam jutad maise sang chinnia-e khatdi changam kam kasimai sang khat, chagi tien kathiumai jaojiu, pakhiangna riphen pum kabuimai maliang-e.
Chawang Jehoiachin niu kammibo kumjiu Zedekiah di
niu Jerusalem khatdi Judah maitu palung pomjiu pasuang gasu hathon mide.
Zedekiah niu mawangbo takum kariu-je-khatkiu tangbo haichiujiu bam mide.
Sibo kum chahiu madaigu jeng kariubonai ganiu sujiu katiu riangchang riangmijiu maidung katiu tiura hasiak mide,

namdi rengdise kamput mide. Babylon mainiu namdise taomagui lujiu bamliudi, riphenmaise nchunting ganiu pak kammide chawanggu charapen-reng npui, nai kareng nia kakga bambo rengmun ganiu Jordan Ramjeng lam paliu pakkhai mide.
Babylon riphen mainiu Chawang Zedekiah tu hameng Jerikho mungga bambo Ramjeng ganiu minlude. Pagu riphenmainiu patu phutlujiu tad mide.
Paliuniu Zedekiah tu Riblah namdiga bambo Chawang Nebuchadnezzar khuga juwangde khatdi siga Nebuchadnezzar niu patu sajai pide.
Zedekiah niu phuijiu bamga panahpiudungtu kamshat mide; sigasu Nebuchadnezzar niu Zedekiah mikdi ladmide, khatdi chagiriang ratlujiu Babylon lam patu jutad mide.
Babylon mai Wang Nebuchadnezzar niu mawangbo takum kariu-je-chakiu, chahiu mangiugu jeng chinniabo nai pagu ladpipao khatdi riphenpi Nebuzaradan niu Jerusalem ga ngutde.
Paniu Charaky, chawangkining khatdi Jerusalem ga bambo parathiubo maidung ky hinadi chami ruthon mide,
pagu riphenmainiu namdigu karengdung kampang mide.
Namdiga bamdiak mai, chaben siam kasimai khatdi Babylon maidung khuganiu pak marilu maidungtu Nebuzaradan niu Babylon lam jutad mide.
Chiudi kalek sathubo maidung, paky palu wadi kahamai tura Judah ga paniu saodiak mide khatdi paliutu mumsy rengga khatdi chaluga tatien thiuraleng khaidiak mide.

Paliuniu Charakyga bambo kafiudung, khatdi rathakbam kam masanboga thinpiubo tabui ponbo kuangdung, chamibung thinpiubo maniadung, khaoring kamshatjiu kadkhaiboga tazai madonrabo kuangdung, parim wibo mataorabo kuangdung, khatdi tam-tambo tataagigu maniadung lutad kam mide.
Kachia maksai rangkang giniu machalubo mania hina chakuang poidung, khatdi chami mataoboga thinpad-thinngutbo chalidung jaojiu paliuniu lutad kam mide.
Charaky leng chiujiu Chawang Solomon niu machabo--tataagigu maniadung katiang nia, karidung, khatdi akhun kadibo--haise madat ngamlakbo rip-ripbo-e.

Katiang niase machamme: niase tachao kariu charuk ku-e, sibo tiang riga tanaagigu tachao nia kiurang sumdi khaisan bamme. Tataaginiu machabo wameng gase tataaginiu machalubo majongsy mengdungniu karukhai nbamme.
Sibo riga sanjiu, charipi Nebuzaradan niu Singku Dibo Seraiah, pahangga bambo singku Zephaniah, khatdi katambo charaky tien ga parathiubo mai khangsumtu kavangleng jutad mide.
Charipi khatdi namdiga bambo chawanggu ladtipaodung khang mangiu, riphenmaigu ariakkhuang thinbopiu, charipitu nkhapao khatdi katambo parathiubo mai chamai riak-charuktu namdi gasu paniu jutad mide.
Nebuzaradan niu Hamath kadihga Riblah kubo namdiga bambo Babylon mai wangpiu khulam paliutu jutad mide.
Siga chawangniu paliutu dap-daplujiu kamshat mide.
Sichiujiu Judah maidungtu paliu dih gasu kavang thiujiu jutad mide.

Mai hangga ngutkhai makbo Judah maigu chakampaodung khatdi riphendungniu haibo lamga chiulujiu Mizpah ga bambo Gedaliah khuga ngut mide, chakampaodung sira: Netophah namdi lamsu wangbo Nethaniah nahpiu Ishmael, Kareah nahpiu Johanan, Tanhumeth nahpiu Seraiah, khatdi Maakah lamsu Jezaniah haimaidung si-e.

Gedaliah niu paliu khuga din-e, “Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, chiubora Babylon maigu chakampaodungtu naliu pingra ha-e. Haibo dihga lungjiu, Babylon mai wangpiutu macha bamlo, chiusai naliu mai hina leng wirabo-e.”
Sigasu Israel mai pakhiangna kalek kawimaidi, kalek kasamaidi charipidung saisuijiu Babylon maitu pingbo donniu Egypt lam pakkhai mide.

Evilmerodakh niu Babylon maigu chawang thiubo kumga paniu Judah maigu Chawang Jehoiachin tu lungsa khaibijiu kavangky ganiu lepad khaide. Haise Jehoiachin niu kavangkyga bambo takum samriu-je-chinnia, chahiu kariunia, jeng makai-je-chinniaboga padmibo-e.
Evilmerodakh niu patu kungjiu kamme, khatdi Babylon ga minwangbo chawangmai ruangga patu chakhuangthiu nkiubo bamga khai bide.
Sijengniu Jehoiachin tu kavang-pon lilujiu chawang gu kuangkaiga maluang tiura suikhai bide.
Paniu karingthen paleng pageng bambo saisuijiu naimachang Evilmerodakh niu rangkang pikhaijiu lung-e.
Adam hai Seth piu-e, Seth hai Enosh piu-e, Enosh hai Kenan piu-e,
Kenan hai Mahalalel piu-e, Mahalalel hai Jared piu-e.
Jared hai Enoch piu-e, pase Mathuselah piu-e; Methuselah hai Lamech piu-e,
pase Noah piu-e. Noah panah npiumai khangsum lung-e: Shem, Ham, khatdi Japheth.
Japheth nahpiudungse—Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan Tubal, Meshech khatdi Tiras—haimaidungse paliu zan thinbo maidunggu pao-peh maidung-e.
Gomer kaikikdungse Ashkenaz, Riphath, khatdi Togarmah si-e.
Javan kaikikdungse Elishah, Spain, Cyprus, khatdi Rhodes si-e.
Ham nahpiudung sira--Kush, Egypt, Libya, khatdi Canaan—haimaidungse paliu zan thinbo maidung gu pao-peh maidung-e.
Kush kaikikdungra Seba, Havilah, Sabtah, Raamah, khatdi Sebteca si-e.
(Kush nahpiu Nimrod kubo bamme, pase kadihpirigu ridi ngam raithubo piu-e).
Egypt kaikikdungse Lydia, Anam, Lehab, Naphtuh,
Pathrus, Kasluh, khatdi Crete si-e. (Paliu khugasu Philistine maise lungkiubo-e).
Canaan nahpiudungse tingthubo siniu, Sidon, sigasu Heth—haimaidungse paliu zan thinbo maidung gu pao-peh maidung-e.
Canaan haidi Jebus mai, Amor mai, Girgash mai,
Hiv mai, Ark mai, Sin mai,
Arvad mai, Zemar mai, khatdi Hamath maigu pao-peh mai-e.
Shem nahpiudungse--Elam, Asshur, Arpakhshad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether, khatdi Meshek—haimaidungse paliu zan thinbo maidung gu pao-peh maidung-e.
Arpakhshad hai Shelah piu-e, pase Eber piu-e.
Eber niu panah npiumai khangnia lung-e; khang khattu Peleg chiujiu ku-e palamra paken ga kadihpiri maidungse njan padmide, khatdi khang khat piu situ Joktan chiujiu ku-e.
Joktan kaikikdungse Almodad mai, Sheleph mai, Hazormaveth mai, Jerahmai,
Hadoram mai, Uzal mai, Diklah mai,
Ebal mai, Abimael mai, Sheba mai,
Ophir mai, Havilah mai, khatdi Jobab mai si-e.
Shem gasu Abram kiriangse pahangga bambo si-e: Shem, Arpakhshad, Shelah,
Eber, Peleg, Reu,
Serug, Nahor, Terah,
sigasu Abram ye (Abraham chiujiudi si-e).
Abraham panah npiumai khangnia lung-e, Isaac nai Ishmael,
Ishmael nahpiudung niu chaphiu kariu-je-niakiugu papee thiu-e: Nabaioth (Ishmael nahpiu tingthubo gasu) Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema,
Jetur, Naphish, khatdi Kedemah.

Abraham niu parammai liupui khat pazanniu Keturah kubo puiniu, paleng npiumainah khang charuk lung khai-e: Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak, khatdi Shuah, Jokshan niu npiumainah khangnia lung-e: Sheba nai Dedan.
Medan niu npiumainah khang mangiu lung-e: Ephah, Epher, Hanokh, Abida, khatdi Eldaah.
Abraham nahpiu Isaac niu npiumainah khangnia, Esau nai Jacob tu lung-e.
Esau nahpiudungse Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jalam, khatdi Korah
Eliphaz hai pahangga bambo kirianggu paopeh maidung si-e: Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna khatdi Amalek.
Khatdi Reuel hai Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, khatdi Mizzah kirianggu paopehdung si-e.
Edom maigu khunlung maidungse pahangga bambo Seir nahpiudung gasu lungkiubo-e:
Lotan hai Hori nai Homam kirianggu paopeh mai-e (Lotan tanpui Timna kubo pui khat lung-e).
Shobal, hai Alvan, Manahath, Ebal, Shephi, khatdi Onam kirianggu paopeh mai-e.
Zibeon niu npiumainah khangnia, Aiah nai Anah tu lung-e. Anah hai Dishon piu-e, khatdi Dishon hai Hamran, Eshban, Ithran khatdi Cheran kirianggu paopeh mai-e.
Ezer, hai Bilhan, Zaavan, khatdi Jaakan kirianggu paopeh mai-e.
Dishon, hai Uz nai Aran kirianggu paopeh mai-e.
Pahangga bambo wangdung siniu Edom kadihga khatniu khatsai chawang thiujiu Israel mai ruangga chawang habo tingga mawang khai mibo-e:
Dinhabah gasu Beor nahpiu Bela
Bozrah gasu Zerah nahpiu Johab
Teman luongriang gasu Husham
Avith gasu Bedad nahpiu Hadad
(Paniu Midia maitu Moab kadihgu chari bamga kamkao lubo-e).
Masrekah gasu Samlah
Singgiu rilam bambo Rehoboth gasu Shaul
Akhbor nahpiu Baal Hanan
Pau gasu Hadad (panaose Matred nahpui
Mehetabel, Mezahab tahpui-e)
Edom maidungse pahangga bambo kiriangga njankhai-e: Timna, Alvah, Jetheth,
Oholibamah, Elah, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
Magdiel, khatdi Iram.
Jacob nahpiudung khang kariu-je-niakiu lung-e: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah,Issachar, Zebulun,
Dan, Joseph, Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, khatdi Asher.
Judah nahpiudung pakhiangna khang mangiu-e. Panao Canaan maipui Bathshua, gasu panah npiumai khangsum lung-e: Er, Onan, khatdi Shelah. Panah tingthubopiu Er hai sachang sabo jengniu
Judah niu pamupui Tamar khugasu, npiumainah khangnia, panai zanniu Perez nai Zerah tu lungsan lu-e.
Perez niu npiumainah khangnia, Hezron nai Hamul lung-e.
Pasingnapiu Zerah niu npiumainah khang mangiu lung-e: Zimri, Ethan, Heman, Calcol, khatdi Darda,
Zerah kaikik ruanggasu khangkhat, Carmi nahpiu Akhan niu, Tingwang khuga kadpat khaimibo maniatu khoibo gasu Israel maidung riga sansabo kapingbo piwang khai-e.
Ethan niu npiumainah khat, Azariah lung-e.
Hezron niu npiumainah khangsum lung-e: Jerahmeel, Ram, khatdi Caleb.
Ram gasu Jesse tangbo kikhun riangse pahangga bambo si-e: Ram, Amminadab, Nahshon (Judah kiphiugu pazan tadbo mai khat),
Salmon, Baoz,
Obed, khatdi Jesse.
Jesse niu npiumainah khang chinnia lung-e. Paliugu takum saisuijiu paliu hai: Eliab, Abinadab, Shammah,
Nethanel, Raddai,
Ozem, khatdi David.
Sigasu panahpui khangnia, Zeruiah nai Abigail lung-e.
Jesse nahpui Zeruiah niu npiumainah khangsum lung-e: Abishai, Joab, khatdi Asahel.
Kakibo panahpui Abigail niu Ishmael kaikik khat, Jether khuga chami thiu khai-e, sigasu panai nah npiumai khat pazanniu Amasa tu lung-e.
Hezron nahpiu Caleb niu Azubah tu panaoleng ku-e, sigasu panah npuimai khat pazanniu Jerioth kubo lung-e. Paniu npiumainah khangsum pon-e: Jesher, Shobab, khatdi Ardon.
Azubah shaimibo sailam, Caleb niu Ephrath tu panaoleng ku-e, sichiujiu panai nah npiumai khat pazanniu Hur kubo lung-e.
Hur nahpiuse Uri-e khatdi patahse Bezalel-e.
Hezron takum riak charuk khangmibo tingga, paniu Makhir nahpui, Gilead chipuitu panaoleng ku-e. Panai nah npiumai khat Segub kubo lung-e,
khatdi Segub panah npiumai khat Jair kubo lung-e. Jair niu Gilead luongriang lungga bambo namdi makaisumtu mawang-e.

Chiudi Geshur nai Aram wangdihniu siga bambo namdak riak charuktu, Jair nai Kenath gu namdung khatdi sibo mungga bambo namdakdungtu jaojiu chari thiu-e. Siga lungjiu bamdibo maidung pakhiangnase, Gilead piu, Makhir kaikikdung-e.
Hezron shaimibo sailam, Caleb niu papiu nao nabo pui Ephrath tu panaoleng ku-e. Panai nah npiumai khat pazanniu Ashhur kubo, Tekoa namdak phungpadbo piutu lung-e.
Hezron nah tingthubopiu, Jerahmeel, panah npiumai khang mangiu lung-e: katingbo saisuijiu, Ram, Bunah, Oren, Ozem, khatdi Ahizah.
Ram panah npiumai khangsum lung-e: Maaz, Jamin khatdi Eker, Jerahmeel niu panao kakibo pui, pazanniu Atarah kubo pui khattu ku-e, sichiujiu panai nah npiumai khat, Onam lung-e.
Onam panah npiumainah khangnia, Shammai nai Jada tu lung-e, khatdi Shammai niu panah npiumai khangnia, Nadab nai Abishur tu lung-e.
Abishur niu Abihail kubo puitu panao leng ku-e, sigasu panai nah npiumai khangnia, Ahban nai Molid tu lung-e.
Abishur singnapiu Nadab panah npiumai khangnia, Seled nai Appaim tu lung-e chiudi Seled niu panah khatnadi lungkhai makjiu shaimide. Appaim hai Ishi piu-e.
Ishi hai Sheshan piu-e, khatdi Sheshan hai Ahlai piu-e.
Shammai singnapiu, Jada, panah npiumai khangnia, Jether nai Jonathan tu lung-e, chiudi Jada panah khatnadi lungkhai makjiu shai mide.
Jonathan panah npiumai khangnia, Peleth nai Zaza tu lung-e. Haimaidung pakhiangnase Jerahmeel kaikikdung-e.
Sheshan panah npiumai lungmakge, npuimainahdung ronna-e. Pavang Egypt mai Jarha kubo khat bamme,
paleng paniu panahpui khattu panaoleng pikhaibi-e. Panai nah npiumai khat Attai kubo lung-e.
Attai gasu Elishama tangbo kikhun riangse pahangga bambo si-e: Attai, Nathan, Zabad,
Ephlal, Obed,
Jehu, Azariah,
Helez, Eleasah,
Sismai, Shallum,
Jekamiah, khatdi Elishama.
Caleb nah tingthubopiu, Jerahmeel singnapiu hai, Mesha ku-e. Mesha hai Ziph piu-e, pase Mareshah piu-e, pase Hebron piu-e.
Hebron panah npiumai khang madai lung-e: paliu haira— Korah, Tappuah, Rekem khatdi Shema.
Shema hai Raham piu-e khatdi Jorkeam pao-e. Shema singnapiu Rekem hai Shammai piu-e,
pase Maon piu-e, pase Bethzur piu-e.
Caleb niu parammailiupui Ephah kubo puitu lung-e, sichiujiu pakhu gasu panah npiumai khangsum lunglanlu-e: Haran, Moza, khatdi Gazez tu lung-e. Haran niudi npiumai nah pazan Gazez kubo khat lung-e.
(Jahdai kubo mai khangkhat panah npiumai khang charuk lung-e: Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet, Ephah, khatdi Shaaph).
Caleb parammailiupui kakibo pui Maacah kubo bamme, paniu npiumai nah khangnia, Sheber nai Tirhanah lung-e.
Pasai paniu panah npiumai khangnia lunglan-e: Madmannah gu namdak phungpatbopiu Shaaph; khatdi Shevah, gu namdak phungpatbopiu Machbenah nai Gibea.
Hairiga nkiujiu, Caleb panah npuimai khat Achsah kubo pui lung-e.
Pahangga bambo maidung haidi Caleb kaikikdung-e.
Hur hai Caleb nah tingthubo piu-e khatdi panaose Ephrath-e. Hur nahpiu Shobal niu Kiriath Jearim hai phungpatle,
panah niabopiu Salma niu Bethlehem phungpatle pasumbo nahpiuniu Bethgader phungpadtle.
Kiriath Jeream phungpatbopiu, Shobal hai Menuhoth paphan khatlam lungbo, Haroeh maidunggu paopeh mai-e,

khatdi pahangga bambo maidungse Kiriath Jearim ga lungbo paliu kiriang maidung-e: Ithri mai, Puthi mai, Shumath mai, khatdi Mishra mai-e. (Zorah nai Eshtaol gu namdi maidungse haibo kiriang maidung-e).
Bethlehem phungpatbopiu, Salma hai Atroth Beth Joab gu Netophah, khatdi Zorit mai gasu Manahath lungga bambo kiriang nia ruangga kiriang khat maidunggu paopeh mai-e.

(Pahangga bambo kiriang maise chamsiang raoboga khatdi raochali padboga kamsibo, Jobez namdakga lungbo maidung-e: Tirathi mai, Shimeathi mai, khatdi Sucathi mai. Paliuse Keni mai Rechab maitu tanao-tanah thiu akinjiu kalungmai-e).
Pahangga bambo maidungse David niu Hebron ga bambo tingga lunglubo panah npiumaidung paliugu takum saisuijiu bambo-e:
Amnon, papuiniu Ahinoam, Jezreel gasu-e
Daniel, papuiniu Abigail, Carmel gasu-e
Absalom, papuiniu Maacah,
Geshur wangpiu Talmai nahpui
Adonijah, papuiniu Haggith
Shephatiah, papuiniu Abital
Ithream, papuiniu Eglah
Jerusalem lungga paniu chawang thiujiu takum samriu sum mawang-e
khatdi siga panah npiumai kengkha lung-e.
Panao Ammiel nahpui, Bathsheba niu, panah npiumai khang madai lung-e: Shimea, Shobab, Nathan, khatdi Solomon.
Panah kakibo npiumai khang chakiu bamme: Ibhar, Elishua, Elpelet,
Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elishama, Eliada, khatdi Eliphelet.
Haibo npiumai nahdung pakhiangna riga sanjiu, David niu parammailiupui gasu npiumai kengkha lung-e. Panah npuimai khat, Tamar kubo puidi lung-e.
Haise chawang Solomon kaikikdung papiu gasu panah tangbo-e: Solomon, Rehoboam, Abijah, Asa, Jehoshaphat,
Jehoram, Ahaziah, Joash,
Amaziah, Uzziah, Jotham,
Ahaz, Hezekiah, Manasseh,
Amon, khatdi Josiah.
Josiah panah npiumai khang madai lung-e: Johanan, Jehoiakim, Zedekiah, khatdi Joahaz.
Jehoiakim panah npiumai khangnia lung-e: Jehoiakhin nai Zedekiah.
Haidungse Babylon mainiu kavangleng mintad mibo chawang Jehoiakhin kaikikdung-e. Jehoiakhin panah npiumai khang chinnia lung-e: Shealtiel,
Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama, khatdi Nedabiah.
Pedaiah panah npiumai khangnia, Zerubbabel nai Shimei lung-e. Zerubbabel hai npiumai nah khangnia, Meshuilam nai Hananiah piu-e, khatdi panahpui, Shelomith lung-e.
Panah kakibo npiumai khang mangiu lung-e: Hashubah, Ohel, Berechiah, Hasadiah, khatdi Jushab Hesed.
Hananiah panah npiumai khangnia, Pelatiah nai Jeshaiah tu lung-e. Jeshaiah hai Rephaiah piu-e, pase Arnan piu-e, pahai Obadiah piu-e, pahai Shecaniah piu-e.
Shecaniah panah npiumai khangkhat, Shemaiah, khatdi patahpiu khang mangiu lung-e: Hattush, Igal, Bariah, Neariah, khatdi Shaphat.
Neariah panah npiumai khangsum lung-e: Elioenai, Hizkiah, khatdi Azrikam.
Elioenai panah npiumai khang chinnia lung-e: Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Delaiah, khatdi Anani.
Haibo maidungse Judah kaikikdung khangsia mai-e: Perez, Hezron, Carmi, Hur, khatdi Shobal.
Shobal hai Reaiah piu-e, pase Jahath piu-e, pahai Ahumai nai Lahad piu-e, paliu hai Zorah ga lungbo maidunggu pao-peh maidung si-e.

Hur hai papiunah tingthubo piu-e Caleb nao Ephrath, khatdi pakai-pakik dungniu Bethlehem namdi phungpatbo-e. Hur panah npiumai khangsum lung-e: Etam, Penuel khatdi Ezer, Etam panah npiumai khangsum lung-e: Jezreel Ishma, khatdi Idbash, khatdi panahpui khat, Hazzelelponi lung-e. Penuel niu Gedor namdi phungpatle, sigasu Ezer niu Hushah phungpatle.
Tekoa namdi phungpatbo piuse Ashur ye, panao nia thiujiu, Helah nai Naarah tu ku-e.
Naarah panai nah npiumai khang madai lung-e: Ahuzzam, Hepher, Temeni, khatdi Haahashtari.
Ashhur nai Helah niu npiumai khangsum lung-e: Zereth, Izhar, khatdi Ethnan.
Koz hai Anub nai Zobebah piu-e, khatdi Harum nahpiu Aharhel gasu lungkiubo kirianggu paopeh mai-e.
Habez kubopiu, pakikhunmai-ga chakhuang thiuchang thiubo mai khangkhat bamdi-e, papuiniu pazan Jabez chiujiu mathak khaibide, palamra patu manabo thadse thiuchang thiu-e.
Chiudi Jabez niu Israel mai Rawang khuga kakheng thiu-e, “Atu thoidam pikhailo, Tingwang yo, khatdi kadih kengkha pikhailo. Akhuga bamkhailo khatdi kasaboniu atu kam mathiu rabo gasu gukhailo.”
Haichiujiu paniu khengbose Tingwang niu pakhuga pikhai bide.
Shuhah singnapiu, Caleb panah npiumai khat, Mehir lung-e. Mehir hai Eshton piu-e,
paniu panah npiumai khangsum lung-e: Bethrapha, Paseah, khatdi Tehinnah-e. Tehinnah hai Nahash namdi phungpatbo piu-e. Paliu kaikikdung siniu Recah ga lung-e.
Kenaz panah npiumai khangnia, Othniel nai Seraiah tu lung-e. Othniel panah npiumai khang nia Hathath nai Meonothai tu lung-e.
Meonothai hai Ophrah piu-e.
Seraiah hai Joab piu-e, pase Tasiam siamsibo Ramjeng phungpatbo piu-e, paliuse tasiamga maran maidung-e.
Jephunneh nahpiu Caleb panah npiumai khangsum lung-e: Iru, Elah, khatdi Naam. Khatdi Elah hai Kenaz piu-e.
Jehallelel panah npiumai khang madai lung-e: Ziph, Ziphah, Tiria, khatdi Asarel.

Ezrah panah npiumai khang madai lung-e: Jether, Mered, Epher, khatdi Jalon. Mered niu Egypt wangpiu nahpui khat Bithiah tu lu-e, sigasu panai nah npuimai khat, Miriam, khatdi npiumai khangnia, Shammai nai Ishbah lung-e. Ishbah niu Eshtemoa namdak phungpatle. Mered niudi Judah kiphiu gasu npuimai khattu lude, khatdi panai nah npiumai khangsum lung-e: Jered niu, Gedor namdak phungpatbo piu-e; Heber niu, Soco namdak phungpatbo piu-e, khatdi Jekuthiel niu, Zanaoh, namdak phungpatbo piu-e.
Hodiah niu Naham tanpuitu lu-e. Panai kaikikdungniu Keilah namdak ga lungbam dibo Garm kiriang nai Eshtemoa namdakga lungbam dibo Maakath kiriang maitu phungpatle.
Shimon panah npiumai khang madai lung-e: Amnon, Rinnah, Benhanan, khatdi Tilon.
Ishi panah npiumai khangnia lung-e: Zaheth nai Benzoheth.
Shelah hai Judah nah npiumai ruangga khatle. Pakai-pakikdungniu, Lekah namdak phungpatbo piu, Er; Mareshah namdak phungpatbo piu, Laadah; Beth Ashbea namdak lungga lungbo, fainoi dakbo kiriang;
Jokim khatdi Cozeba namdak lungga lungbo maidung; khatdi Moab maipuitu lulujiu sigasu Bethlehem ga lungwang mibo, Joash nai Saraph. (Haibo pao-peh rachamse nda racham mide).
Paliu hai chali machapatbo tien thiujiu chawang ngam kammai-e, khatdi Netaim nai Gederah namdak kaniaga lung-e.
Simeon panah npiumai khang mangiu lung-e: Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, khatdi Shaul.
Shaul nahpiu hai Shallum, patahpiu hai Mibsam, khatdi pagu tutai kanahbo hai Mishma-e.
Sichiujiu Mishma gasu Hammuel, Zakkur khatdi Shimei tangbo pariang-paruise lungkiu-e.
Shimei panah npiumai khang kariu-je-charuk sigasu panahpui khang charuk lung-e, chiudi pakai-pariang maira paliu nah-pon tamme, khatdi Simeon kiphiu haira Judah kiphiu kum kengpad makge.
Bilhah, Ezem, Tolad,
Bethuel. Hormah, Ziklag,
Beth Marcaboth, Hazarsusim, Bethbiri, khatdi Shaaraim.
Paliuniu katam-tambo bam mangiuga lung-e: Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Tochen khatdi Ashan,
khatdi sibo wonjengga bambo namdak rammai, Baalath namdak duimi-tingnu tangbo-e. Haibo rachamse paliuniu khaidiakbo paliugu kikhundung khatdi paliuniu lungbamdibo bamdung gasu-e.
Pahangga bambo maidungse paliu kirianggu papee thiubo maidung-e:
Meshobab, Jamlekh, Amaziah nahpiu Joshah Joel.
Jehu (Hoshibiah nahpiu, Seraiah nahpiu, Asiel nahpiu),
Elioenai, Jaakobah, Jeshohaiah, Asaiah,
Adiel, Jesimiel, Benaiah,
Ziza (Shiphi nahpiu, Allon nahpiu,
Jedaiah kaikik, Shimri, nai Shemaiah).
Paliu kikhundung nkiukhang jutjiu bambo jengniu,
paliu hai tingnulam lungchia padjiu Gerar
Paliuniu kadih maruangbo, piubuan wibo patam bambo dih wakhuan-wara habo khatdi agi-manaibo nkanram dijiu ngaolu-e. Karaiga Hamit mainiu sibo ramga lungbam niu-e.

Judah wangpiu Hezekiah ken-gasu, pariga paliu zan raokhai bambo maidungniu Gerar ga menglujiu siga lungjiu bambo maidunggu mathenky rammai, apa rammai kam maha mide. Paliuniu maidung situ hapad lujiu siga paliu tingthengjiu lungbam mide. Palamra siga paliugu milydung leng piuriang kawibo bamme.
Kakibo Simeon kiphiu rupmaidung chamai kai mangiuniu naimik padlam tadkhaijiu Edom ga meng-e. Paliutu Ishi nahpiudungniu maluang tadle: Paliu sira Pelatiah, Neariah, Rephaiah, khatdi Uzziel.
Siga ringbangbo Amalek maidungtu paliuniu kamshat mide, khatdi paliuniu siga tingthengjiu lungbam mide.
Judah kiphiuniu, tanthubo jengniu chaphiu hinagu mawangpao thiu-e).
Jacob nahpiu ruangga tingthubopiu, Reuben niu panah npiumai khang madai lung-e: Hanokh, Pallu, Hezron, khatdi Carmi.
Kikhun-gu charao khuangniu pahangga bambo Reuben kiphiugu kiriang maigu jupaodungtu lenkhai-e: Jeiel, Zechariah,
khatdi Azaz nahpiu Bela, khatdi Shema tahpiu paliu hai Joel kiriang mai-e. Haibo kiriang maise Aroer ga khatdi sibo luongrianggu duiruak lamsu Nebo khatdi Baal Meon tangboga lung-e.
Gilead ramlungga paliugu khaorui-khaona kengkha bamme, sigasu haichiujiu paliuniu charamse kengjiu Euphrate Giu npui pathen palen jangjiu bambo kum, lungkham mide.
Chawang Saul ken ga Reuben kiphiuniu, Hagri maitu chari thiujiu, paliutu chari bamga kamshat mide, sigasu paliugu kadih Gilead gu naimik padlam bambo lam lungkham lude.
Gad kaikikdungniu Reuben maigu tingpilam, Bashan kadih gasu Salecah gu tingbang katang lung-e.
Joel kiriang hainiu daoraibogu jupao-e, Shepham hainiu parathiuboga paniabo-e. Janai nai Shaphat hainiu Bashan ga katambo kirianggu daoraimai-e.
Haibo kiphiugu katambo kiriang chinnia siniu: Michael, Meshullam, Sheba, Jorai, Jacan, Zia khatdi Eber paliu-e.
Paliu hai Huri nahpiu Abihail kaikikdung-e, paliu paopeh mai siniu Abihail, Huri, Jaraoh, Gilead, Michael, Jeshishai, Jahdo, Buz,
Abdiel nahpiu khatdi Guni tahpiu, Ahi hainiu haibo kiriangdunggu papeethiu-e.
Paliu hai Bashan nai Gilead luongriangga khatdi Sharon gu piuriang-li pakhiangnaga lung-e.
(Haibo racham hai Judah mai wangpiu Jotham nai Israel mai wangpiu Jeroboam ken-ga padmibo-e).
Reuben, Gad khatdi Tingbanglam lungbo Manasseh mai kiphiugu riphendung siniu 44,760-ye, paliu hai chagee thinboga chaheng thinboga, khatdi tavaipi thinboga, kam kasimaidung-e.
Paliuniu Jetur, Naphish khatdi Nodab paliu kiphiu Hagri maitu charithiu-e.
Paliuniu Tingwang tu malumme sichiu paliutu nkha khaira paliuniu khengboga, Tingwang niu paliutu paokak khaijiu charise Hagrit maidung nai paliu watmaitu ngamlu-e.
Paliu mikre maidung khugasu qontrao 50,000, mily 250,000 khatdi qonniam 2,000, khatdi charigu kavangleng thiujiu chamai 100,000 haphunlu-e.
Paliuniu mikremai kengkhatu kamshatlu-e, palamra chari haise Tingwang chunning gasu kambo-e. Paliuniu sibo luongriang gase kavangthiu tadlan makbo
Tingbanglam bambo Manasseh maidung siniu Bashan luongriang gasu Baal Hermon, Senir khatdi Hermon Luong tangbo lung-e, sichiujiu paliu riakse kingjiu kengkha-e.

Pahangga raokhai maidung haise paliu kirianggu papeedung-e: Epher, Ishi, Eliel, Azriel, Jeremiah, Hodaviah khatdi Jahdiel. Paliu hai pazan tadbo riphendung-e, khatdi paliu kirianggu wakasibo jupaodung-e.
Chiudi maidung siniu paliu paopeh mai Rawang khuga chamchang makge, khatdi patu phutlujiu Tingwang niu paliu kadih gasu hathon mibo jatdung ratu kahum mibo gasu-e.

Sijeng gasu Tingwang niu Assyria mai wangpiu Pul (Tiglath Pileser chiujiudi sibo) piutu pijiu paliu kadihga chari hawang khai-e. Paniu Reuben, Gad, khatdi Tingbang Manasseh kiphiu maidungtu hathon padjiu Halah, Habor, Hara khatdi Gozan Giuki mungga pijiu tingtheng lungkhai mide.
Levi nahpiu khangsum lung-e: Gershon, Kohath khatdi Merari
Kohath nahpiu khang madai lung-e: Amram, Izhar, Hebron khatdi Uzziel.
Amram nahpiu khangnia lung-e, Aaron nai Mose khatdi panahpui khat, Miriam lung-e,
Aaron nahpiu khang madai lung-e: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazer khatdi Ithamar.
Eleazar nah Phinehas, Phinehas nah Abishua.
Abishua nah Bukki, Bukki nah Uzzi,
Uzzi nah Zerahiah, Zerahiah nah Miraioth.
Miraioth nah Amariah nah Ahitub.
Ahitub nah Zadok khatdi Zadok nah Ahimaaz.
Ahimaaz nah Azariah nah Johanan.
Johanan nah Azariah (pah hai Solomon niu thiukhaibo Jerusalem rakyga singku thiu-e).
Azariah nah Amariah khatdi Amriah nah Ahitub.
Ahitub nah Zadok khatdi Zadok nah Shallum.
Shallum nah Hilkiah khatdi Hilkiah nah Azariah,
Azariah nah Seraiah khatdi Seraiah nah Jehuzadok,
Chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu chari hangutjiu
Paliu nahpiu lungkamme. Gershon nah Libni khatdi Shimei;
Kohath nah Amram, Izhar, Hebron khatdi Uzziel.
Merari nah Mahli khatdi Mushi
Chaken chaken saisuijiu Gershon kaikikdung siniu: Libni, Jahath, Zimmah,
Joah, Iddo, Zerah, Jeatherai.
Kohath kaikikdung siniu: Amminadab, Korah, Assir,
Elkanah, Ebiasaph, Assir,
Tahath, Uriel, Uzziah, Shaul,
Eljanah nah nia lung-e. Amasai khatdi Ahimoth,
Ahimoth kaikikdung siniu: Elkanah, Zophai, Nahath,
Eliab, Jeroham, Elkanah,
Samuel nah khang nia lung-e: naraibo siniu Joel khatdi niabo siniu Abijah.
Merari kaikikdung siniu: Mahli, Libni, Shimei, Uzzah,
Shimea, Haggiah, Asaiah.
Tingwang gu Chamriat Bung Jerusalem ga phungwang khailubo sai Chawang David niu kahumbo bamga chalui thiura mai kadakhai-e.
Chawang Solomon niu charaky thiu makbo suanggadi Tingwang gu Chamriat Bung khaibambo Mathenky suangga paliu ngam thiujiu chalui thiu alinjiu bambo-e.
Haibo tiendon hina thiubo kiriangdungse pahangga raokiu khai bamme.
Kohath kiriangga: Joel nahpiu, Heman niu raithubo chalui thiumai baogu jupao thiu-e. Jacob katangbo majang khangbo pakiriang sira: Heman, Joel, Samuel,
Elkanah, Jeroham, Eliel, Toah,
Zuph, Elkanah, Mahath, Amasai,
Elkanah, Joel, Azariah, Zephaniah,
Tahath, Assir, Ebiasaph, Korah,
Ishar, Kohath, Levi, Jacob, haidungsi-e.
Niabo chalui thiumai baoga Asaph niu papee-e. Asaph kiriang hainiu Levi tangbo majang khaijiu: Asaph, Berechiah, Shimea,
Machael, Baaseiah, Malchijah,
Ethni, Zerah, Adaiah
Ethan, Zimmah, Shimei,
Johath, Gershon, Levi,
Ethan kubopiu Merari kimai siniu chalui thiumai bao sumboga papee thiu-e. Pakiriangniu Levi tangbo majang khaijiu: Ethan, Kishi, Abdi, Malluch,
Hashabiah, Amaziah, Hilkiah.
Amzi, Bani, Shemer,
Mahli, Mushi, Merari, Levi.
Levi kimai katambo mai tudi kahumboga katam-tamboga malin khai-e.

Mose gu chamtan saisuijiu Aaron khatdi panah maidungniu rathakbamga Israel mai nuan kuakra parimwibo matao-e khatdi kadngutbo tien thiu-e. Masanthubo Bamga kadngutbo tiendon-ga haibo kymainiu maomakjiu tien rabo-e. Pakhiangna haise Tingwang vangpiu Mose niu dinkhaibo saisuibo-e.
Aaron kaikikdung siniu Eleazer, Phinehas, Abishua,
Bukki, Uzzi, Zerahiah,
Meraioth, Amariah, Ahitub,
Zadok, Ahimaaz.
Kohath kiphiu Aaron kaikikleng charam haise pikhai-e. Levi mainiu charam njanboga haibo kiphiuniu charam kawibo daolu-e.
Judah ramlungga Hebron kubo ram khatdi sise maguibo ramjing pakhiangna side.
Sibo namdigu luzamdung khatdi namdung sira Japhunneh nah Caleb leng pikhaide.
Pahangga raokhaibo namdakdung haise Aaron kaikikdung leng pikhai-e: Hebron, nbekhaibo namdi
Benjamin ramga paliuleng pikhaibo namdi khatdi piubuan ramdung sira Geba, Ameleth, Anathoth. Sichiujiu namdi kariu sumkiu hai paliuleng pikhai-e.
Tingnulam Manasseh gu bambo namdi kariu hai Kohath kiphiu leng taden thonjiu njankhai-e.
Gerson kiphiu lengdi Issachar, Asher, Naphtali khatdi Bashan Tingbang Manasseh chiujiu namdi kariu sum njankhai-e.
Sikumjiu Reuben, Gad khatdi Zebulun ga bambo namdi kariu nia hai Merari kiphiuleng njankhai-e.
Haichiujiu Israel mainiu Levi maileng namdi khatdi piubuan ram pikhai-e.
(Judah ram Simeon ram khatdi Benjamin ramga bambo namdidungdi Levi maileng tasan phuijiu pikhai-e).
Kohath kiphiu khangsiamai lengdi Ephraim ga namdi khatdi piubuan ram pikhai-e.
Sisera Shechem, Ephraim luongbutga nbekhaibo namdi, Gezer.
Jokmeam, Beth Haron
Aijalon khatdi Gath Rimmon
Manasseh gu naimik ngutlam bambo namdi Aner khatdi Bileam khatdi sise maguibo piubuanram pikhai-e.
Gershon kiphiu leng pahangga raokhai bambo namdi khatdi piubuan ramdung pikhai-e: Manasseh gu naimikpadlam Bashan ramga Golan khatdi Ashtaroth.
Issachar ramganiu Kedesh, Deberath,
Ramoth khatdi Anem.
Asher ramganiu Mashal, Abdon
Hukok khatdi Rehob
Naphtali ramganiu Galilee ga bambo Kedesh, Hammon, khatdi Kiriathaim
Merari kiphiu khangsia maileng pahangga raokhai bambo namdakdung khatdi piubuanram pikhai-e.
Zebulun ram ganiu Rimmono khatdi Tabor.
Reuben ram ganiu, Jericho genlam Jordan naimik padlam: Bezer maluang ramjing Jahzah.
Kedemoth khatdi Mephaath.
Gad ramganiu: Gilead ga bambo Ramoth, Mahanaim
Heshbon khatdi Jazer.
Issachar nah khang madai lung-e: Tola, Puah, Jashub khatdi Shimron.

Tola nah khang charuk lung-e: Uzzi, Rephaiah, Jeriel, Jahmai, Ibsam khatdi Shemuel. Paliu hai Tola kiphiugu papeedung-e khatdi chariga katan kahu maidung-e. David ken ga paliu kaikikdung siniu 22,600-ye.
Uzzi nah khat lung-e: Izrahiah. Izrahiah nah khang madai-e: Michael, Obadiah, Joel khatdi Isshiah, paliu hai paliu phiuga papeedung-e.
Paliu nao keng-e, khatdi nahmai lung makeng-e. Siniu riphendung leng chamai 36,000 pipadkhai-e.
Raokhaibo ariak ganiu silu-e chiubora Issachar kiphiu ganiu chamai riak 87,000 haitu riphendung leng kamkhaide.
Benjamin nah khangsum lung-e: Bela, Bekher khatdi Jediael.
Bela nah khang mangiu lung-e: Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth khatdi Iri. Paliu hai paliu phiuga papeemai-e, khatdi chari ga katan kahu maidung-e. Haibo kiphiuga chari tadsuimai chamai 22,034 bamme.
Bekher nah khang chakiu lung-e: Zemirah, Joash, Eliezer, Eleoenai Omri, Jeremoth, Abijah, Anathoth, khatdi Alemeth.
Raokhaibo saisuijiu haibo kaikik chari tadsuimai chamai 20,200 bamme.
Jediel nah khat, Bilhan lung-e: Bilhan nah chinnia lung-e: Jeush, Benjamin, Ehud, Chennanah, Zethan, Tarshish, khatdi Ahishahar.
Haimaidungse paliu phiuga papeedung-e khatdi tan-hubo riphenmai-e. Paliu kaikikga riphen thiusuibo chamai 17,200 bamme.
Shuppim nai Huppim haibo kiphiu-e.
Dan nah khat, Hushim lung-e.
Naphtali nah madai lung-e: Jahziel, Guni, Jezer khatdi Shallum. (Paliu hai Bilhah kaikikdung-e).
Manasseh nah parammailiupui, Aramea niu lungbo khangnia-e: Asriel nai Makhir, khatdi Makhir hai Gilead piu-e.
Makhir niu Huppim nai Shuppim naoleng phiukhai-e. Patanpui zanniu Maacah ku-e. Mikhir nah niaboniu Zelophehad ku-e. Zelophehad niu puimainah ronna lung-e.
Makhir naoniu Maacah nah nia lung-e. Pazanniu Peresh khatdi Sheresh ku-e. Peresh nah nia lung-e: Ulam khatdi Rakem.
Ulam nah khat lung-e, pazan Badan ku-e. Haimaidung hai Manasseh tah Makhir khatdi Makhir nah Gilead kaikikdung-e.
Gilead tanpui Hammolekheth nah khangsum lung-e : Ishod, Abiezer khatdi Mahlah.
(Shemida nah khang madai lung-e: Ahian, Shechem, Likhi, khatdi Aniam).
Chaken-chaken saisuijiu Ephraim kaikikdungniu Shuthelah, Bered, Tahath, Eleadah, Tahath,
Zabad, Shuthelah. Ephraim nah khangniadi bamkha-e: Ezer nai Elead, panainiu Gath maigu khaorui agara kambo gasu panaitu kamshat mibo-e.
Papiu Ephraim niu pating thengjiu hui-e, khatdi pasingnamai wangjiu patu hiamkhai-e.
Sibosai Ephraim niu panaotu nphiuji khai-e, siga papum ripjiu piumai khat lungwang-e. Pakikhun-ga chariubo wang-e chiujiu, pazan Beriah mathak khai-e.
Ephraim nahpui khat bamme: pazanniu Sheerah ku-e. Paniu Nribo, Nhangbo Beth Horon, khatdi Uzzen Sheerah namdakdung kamkhai-e.
Ephraim nahpiu Rephah kubopiu khat bamkha-e. Rephah kaikikdung sira Resheph, Telah, Tahan,
Ladan, Ammihud, Elishama,
Nun, Joshua,

Paliuniu lulubo khatdi lungbo luongriang siniu Bethel jaojiu sibo mungga bambo namdakdung Naaran gu tingbang lamsu Gezer gu tingnulam tangbo khatdi pamungga bambo namdakdung hina jao-e. Sichiujiu Shechem nai Ayyah namdidung khatdi pamungga bambo namdakdung sidi jao-e.
Manasseh kaikikdungniu Beth Shan, Taanach, Megiddo, Dor khatdi sibo wonjengga bambo namdidungtu thinne.
Haibo bam hinaga Jacob nah Josheph kaikikdung lung-e.
Asher nah khang madai lung-e: Imnah, Ishvah Ishvi khatdi Beriah khatdi puimai khat, Serah lung-e.
Beriah nah piumai nia lung-e: Heber khatdi Malkhiel (Malkhiel niu Birzaith namdi phungpadbo-e).
Heber nah piumai sum lung-e: Japhlet, Shomer khatdi Hotham. Puimainah khatdi lung-e pazan Shua ku-e.
Japhlet nah piumai sum lung-e: Pashach, Bimhal khatdi Ashvath.
Shomer nah piumai khangsum lung-e. Rohgah, Jehubbah khatdi Aram.
Hotham nah piumai khang madai lung-e, Zophah, Imna, Shelesh khatdi Amal.
Zophah kaikikdung sira Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah,
Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Shilshah, Ithran khatdi Beera.
Jether kaikikdung sira Jephunneh, Pispa khatdi Ara.
Ulla kaikikdung sira Arah, Hanniel khatdi Rizia.
Paliu hai Asher kaikikdung-e, paliu hai kikhun maigu papeemai-e. Paliu zan tadmaidung khatdi, wasibo jupaodung-e. Asher kaikikdungga chari tadsuimai chamai 26,000 bamme.
Benjamin nah piumai mangiu lung-e: paliugu takum saisuijiu Bela, Ashbel, Aharah,
Nohah khatdi Rapha haidung-e.
Bela kaikikdung siniu Addar, Gera, Abihud.
Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,
Gera, Shephuphan khatdi Huram paliu-e.

Ehud kaikikdungra Naaman, Ahijah khatdi Gera haidung-e. Paliu hai Gera ga lungbambo kikhun pidung-e, chiudi paliutu hataliang padjiu Manahath ga wangjiu lungmibo-e. Gera hai Uzza nai Ahihud piu-e, paniu paliugu puitadga jukhai-e.
Shaharaim niu panao nia Hushim nai Baara tu tami-e. Pasai paniu Moab kadihga wang lungbo wan-ga paniu Hodesh tu panao ku-e khatdi npiumainah khang chinnia: Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malkam,
Jeuz, Sachia khatdi Mirmah chiujiu lunglu-e. Panah piumaidung hai paliu kiphiuga papee mai-e.
Paleng Hushim niu lungbo piumai khangnia bamme: Ahitub khatdi Elpaal.
Elpaal nah piumai sum: Eber, Misham, khatdi Shemed chiujiu lung-e. Shemed niu Ono khatdi Lod namdi khatdi siga lung magui bambo namtuakdung chiujiu phungpadbo-e.
Aijalon ramga kalungbo ruangga Beriah khatdi Shema niu pakikhunmai riga papee thiu-e, paliuniu Gath ramga kalung maitu hathonlu-e.
Beriah kaikik dungga Ahio, Shashak, Jeremoth,
Zebadiah, Arad, Eder,
Michael, Ishpah khatdi Joha chiujiu jao-e.
Elpaal kaikikdungniu: Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber.
Ishmerai, Izliah khatdi Jobab.
Shimei kaikikdungniu: Jakim, Zichri, Zabdi,
Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel,
Adaiah, Beraiah, khatdi Shimrah.
Shashak kaikikdungniu: Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,
Abdon, Zichri, Hanan,
Hananiah, Elam, Anthothijah,
Iphdeiah khatdi Penuel.
Jeroham kaikikdung siniu: Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah,
Jaareshiah, Elijah khatdi Zichri haidung-e.
Paliu hai Jerusalem gasu lungwangbo kaikikdung-e khatdi paliu hai paliu paopeh ken gasu kikhun gu papiu maidung-e.
Jeiel niu Gibeon namdi phungpadbo-e khatdi siga lung-e: panaoniu Maacah-e.
Jeiel kaikikga naraiboniu Abdon-e. Sibo sai Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zecher lung-e,
khatdi Mikloth, hai Shimeah piu-e. Paky kaikikdungniu Jerusalem ga bambo tam-tambo pakiphiu mai mungga lung-e.
Ner hai Kish piu-e, khatdi Kish hai chawang Saul piu-e. Saul nah khang madai lung-e: paliu sira Jonathan, Malkhishua, Abinadab, khatdi Eshbaal.
Jonathan hai Meribbaal piu-e khatdi Meribbaal hai Micah piu-e.
Micah nah piumai khang madai lung-e: Pithon, Melech, Tarea khatdi Ahaz.
Ahaz hai Jehoaddah piu-e, paniu panah piumai khangsum lung-e: Alemeth, Azmaveth, khatdi Zimri. Zimri hai Moza piu-e.
Moza hai Binea piu-e. Binea hai Raphah piu-e. Raphah hai Eleasah piu-e, khatdi Eleasah hai Azel piu-e.
Azel nah piumai khang charuk lung-e: Arzikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, khatdi Hanan.
Azel singnapiu Eshek niu piumai khangsum lung-e: Ulam, Jeush, khatdi Eliphelet.
Ulam nahdung hai chariga katan kahu maidung-e, khatdi tavaipi thinsimai-e. Patah panahmai kai khat ringiu-e. Pariga raokhaibo hina hai Benjamin kaikikdung-e.
Israel mai, kiphiu hina Israel maigu Chawang Ariak khuangga pariak raosiak khaibo-e.
Judah maidungtu paliu nuan jengniu sajai pijiu Babylon lam mintad mide.
Paliugu namdiga malanwang lungraithubo mai sira: Israel mai, maidamai, singkumai, Levi mai khatdi charaky tien thiumaidung si-e.
Judah kiphiu gasu, Benjamin kiphiu gasu, Ephraim kiphiu gasu khatdi Manasseh kiphiu gasu chiujiu Jerusalem ga wangjiu lung-e.
Jerusalem ga Judah kiphiu kalek 690 lung-e.
Omri tahpiu Ammihud nah Uthai niu Judah nah Perez kaikikdunggu jupao-e. Imri khatdi Beni haidi haibo kaikik mai-e.
Judah nah Shelah kaikikga Asaiah niu pakirianggu jupao-e.
Judah nah Zerah kaikikga Jeuel niu jupao-e.
Pahangga raokhaibo Benjamin kiphiu hai Jerusalem ga lung-e: Meshullam nah Sallu pahai Hassenuah nahpiu, Hodaviah nahpiu-e
Jeroham nah Ibneiah,
Uzzi nah Elah, pah hai Michri tah piu-e,
Shephatiah nah Meshullam pahai
Ibnijah nahpiu, Reuel nahpiu-e.
Haibo kiphiu kalek 956 Jerusalem ga lung-e. Pariga raokhaibo maidung hai pakiriangga papeemaidung-e.
Pahangga raokhai bambo singkudung hai Jerusalem ga lung-e: Jedaiah, Jehoiarib, Jachin,
Hilkiah nah Azariah (pah hai charakyga singku kadibo-e)
khatdi papao kiriangdung sira
Meshullam, Zadok, Meraioth khatdi Ahitub haidung-e.
Jeroham nah Adaiah, papaomai sira
Pashhur khatdi Malchijah
Adiel nahpiu Massai,
papaomaidung sira Jahzerah, Meshullam, Meshillemith khatdi Immer.
Singku kiphiuga papeedung pakhiangna 1,760-ye. Paliu hai charakyga
Pahangga raokhai bambo Levi maidungse Jerusalem ga lung-e: Hashub nah Shemaiah, paliu pao-peh maidung siniu Merari kiriangga
Azrikam khatdi Hashabiah-e,
Bakbakkar, Heresh khatdi Galal,
Micah nah Mattaniah-e,
paliu paomaidung siniu Zichri khatdi Asaph-e,
Shamaiah nah Obadiah-e,
paliu pao-peh maidung siniu Galal khatdi Jeduthun Asa nah Bekheriah-e khatdi papaoniu Elkanah-e
paliu hai Netophah namdi lungga bambo ramga lung-e.
Pahangga raokhai maidungniu charaky machajiu lung-e: Shallum, Akkub, Talmon khatdi Ahimon, Shallum hai paliugu jupao-e.
Nda karaiga suniu sujiu paliuniu Chawanggu Rengmun tingbang lam akhe-e khatdi Levi maigu mathenkydi akhe-e.
Shallum hai Kore nahpiu-e khatdi Ebiasaph tahpiu-e, pah khatdi Korah mainiu papao ken ganiu
Eleazer nah Phineas tu
Meshelemiah nah Zakhariah di

Pakhiangna chamai 212 tu kamun khuanra kadakhai-e. Panam tam-tam bamtadi pakiriangdung zan kating kanah sira raokhai-e. Chawang David khatdi phaimiukakung Samuel ken ganiu haibo kiphiutu kamun khuanra kadakhai mibo-e.
Paliu khatdi paliu kaikikdungniu Charaky kamun khuanbo ngam kamjiu bambo-e.
Pake madaigu rengdi kamun tingbang, tingnu, tingpi khatdi tingrun-ga kamun khat khat bamme siga akhepi khat khat bamme.
Kamun khuanbo maidi nam tam-tamboga lungbambo paliu singnadungniu jeng chinnia loidasai malin-linjiu khuanne.
Akhepidung khang madaise Levi mai-e, paliuniu parid phungjiu phui-e. Kichen hina khatdi kadwangbo hina paliuniu parid phungjiu phui-e.
Charaky mungga paliu lung-e, palamra akherabo hai paliu ngamme khatdi nsuan machang nkham lekhai rabo-e.
Levi mai khangsiatu kahumboga thinpiubo mania chakuang-chapiang phuira malin khaide. Mania lupad lungutboga pariak sisiakjiu paliuniu macha-e.
Khangsia maitu tatien tam-tamboga machara malin khai-e, sisera takhui macha ramai, jaw macha ramai, takysa macha ramai, maru macha ramai, khatdi parim manamwibo machara maidung-e.
Parim wibose khai aruanglujiu macharabo sira singku maidungniu kamrabo-e.
Korah kiphiuga Shallum nah tingthupiu Levi mai Mattithiah niu taruak khuak lujiu Tingwang khuga kadbo ngamga pikhai-e.
Kohath kymainiu Tabamnai tingmikga masanbo taruak charakyga kadrabo leng kadenboga parid phung-e.
Levi kikhun kasianiu charakyga chalui thiura parid phung-e. kikhun pimai kasianiu charaky lungga bamjiu tatien thiubo gasu khen-rang pithiu khai-e, palamra paliutu nchun-n-nien simakjiu kupad-padle.
Pariga raokhaibodung hai papao papeh lamsuniu wangbo Levi kiphiuga papee maidung-e, paliu hai Jerusalem ga lungbo papeemaidung-e.
Jeiel niu Gibeon kubo namdi khat phungpad lujiu siga lung-e. Panao zanniu Maacah ku-e.
Panah tingthupiu zanniu Abdon ku-e, khatdi katambo nahdung sira: Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab.
Gedor, Ahio, Zechariah khatdi Mikloth haidung si-e.
Mikloth hai Shimeah piu-e. Haidungniu Jerusalem ga lungbambo pakikhunmai maidung nai lung aruang-e.
Ner hai Kish piu-e khatdi Kish hai Saul piu-e. Saul nah khang madai lung-e. Sisera Jonathan, Malkhishua, Abinadab khatdi Eshbaal-e.
Jonathan hai Meribbaal piu-e khatdi Meribbaal hai Micah piu-e.
Micah nah khang madai lung-e: Pithon Melech, Tarea khatdi Ahaz.
Ahaz hai Jarah piu-e, Jarah nah piumai khangsum lung-e: Alemeth, Azmaveth khatdi Zimri. Zimri hai Moza piu-e.
Moza hai Binea piu-e, Binea hai Rephaiah piu-e, Rephaiah hai Eleasah piu-e khatdi Eleasah hai Azel piu-e.
Azel nah piumai khang charuk lung-e: Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah khatdi Hanan.
Philistine mainiu Gilboa Luongga Israel maitu chari thiu-e. Haibo rimen ga Israel maidung kakengtu kamshat mide, khatdi khangsia maidung Chawang Saul nai panah maidungra pak mide.
Chiudi Philistine maidungniu hameng Saul nahmai khangsum, Jonathan, Abinadab khatdi Melkhishua paliutu minlujiu kamshat mide.
Saul chapbam lam chari tanwangjiu Saul tu tavaipiniu kettaojiu ajam mide.

Saul niu pagu mania phungbo piutu haichiujiu din-e, “Charatu sikamakbo Philistine mainiu atu tanui thiujiu bamrabo suangra nangniu naheng thadpadjiu atu kamshat milo.” Chiudi chabonmai siniu pingjubo jengniu sise suimakge. Siga Saul niu paheng thadpad lujiu paronna patu chushat mide.
Sibo chabonmai siniu Saul shaimibo ngaolujiu padi paheng thadpad lujiu paronna patu chushat mide.
Haichiujiu Saul khatdi panahmai khangsumse shaimide. Pakai-pakik gasu chawang thiura hai hamide.

Jazeel Ramjingga bambo Israel maigu riphenmai hina pakkam mide, chiubo khatdi Saul nai panahmai shaimide chiubo chiulujiu paliugu namdi rammaitu phutlujiu pak karen mide. Siga Philistine mainiu wangjiu paliu dih lunggom mide.
Charithiu loilubo sai, Philistine mainiu kashaipum phuira tadlanjiu paliuniu Saul nai panahmaidung phawse Gilboa Luong gasu daolude.
Paliuniu Saul pee danglude khatdi paripuanse gao lude, sichiujiu Philistine ramlung pakhiangnaga khatdi paliu ramengdung nai paliu rammai mathiu khuga chunwibo chamse paoron wangde.
Paliuniu Saul ripuanse paliu raky khatga khaide khatdi papeese Dagon kubo paliu raky lungga maseng khaide.
Philistine maidungniu Saul tu kamkhai mibose Gilead ga lungbambo Jabesh maidungniu chiulujiu,
paliugu katan-kahumai khangsiatu langkhaijiu Saul nai panahmaidung phawse Jebesh ga phungwangde. Paliuniu nphubang hangga paliutu baikhai-e khatdi jeng chinnia kalumri khang-e.
paniu
Sichiujiu Hebron ga, Israel mai hina David khuga wang lujiu din-e, “Aliu hai nazai nai natia-e.
Karaiga, Saul niu aliugu chawang thiubambo gadi, nangniu Israel maitu maluang lujiu chari thiubam niu-e, sichiujiu
Sichiujiu Hebron ga, Israel maigu jupao hina Chawang David khuga wangde. Paliuniu patu masanbo npao thiulujiu, paliuniu patu wasa manuk khaijiu, paliu Israel mai wang pithiu khaide, haise
David niu wakamdi sibo namdi lungga ngut ngamlu lakge chiujiu Jebus maidungniu pakhuga din-e, chiudi David niu paliugu Zion charirengse haphun lude, sichiujiu haisitu “David Namdi” chiu kumibo-e.
David niu din-e, “Jebus maitu giraithubo piu siniu riphendunggu charipi thiurabo-e!” Zeruiah kubo pui nahpiu Joab niu riphendungtu majang lujiu charithiu raijiu charipi thiulu-e.
David niu sibo namdiga lungmibo jengniu haisitu “David Namdi” chiu kumibo-e.
Paniu ramluonggu tingbang lamsu taniang lakhangjiu namdise thiukhang lande, sichiujiu Joab niu namdigu kakilamse malankhai bide.
David hai pawan machang tankhang bi-bi sude, palamra Ngamkambo
David gu pazan tadbo riphendung sira haisi-e. Paliuniu Israel maidung mathiutu maluang lujiu,
Hakhmon kiriang gasu “Khangsumgu
“Khangsum” ruanggasu pazan tadbo siniu Ahoh kiriang gasu Dodo nahpiu Eleazer hai-e.
Paniu David lam ponjiu Philistine maitu Pas Dammim ribamga chari thiu-e. Paniu tathiu-luga mengbamga, Israel maidung pak karen sude,
sijengniu pamaidungtu puilujiu luzam n-gang gasu chaplujiu Philistine maitu chari thiusude. Siga
Naikhatra riphenmai khang samriu ruanggasu khangsum siniu Philistine maigu riphendungniu Rephaim Ramjengga riji thiubamga, David niu Adullam Tulimki gase tadkiu-e.
Siga David renglubo maluangga bamme, khatdi Philistine maidung siniu Bethlehem tu sutlude.
David niu paky lamga maningjiu din-e, “Mai khat kumboniu Bethlehem gu rengmun mungga tadlujiu ajai gasu tadui ponwangjiu, Iniu sakkhai dasai dejiukha wiralo!”
Pazan tadbo riphendung siniu Philistine maigu riji tad taronjiu meng ajai gasu tadui tamnakha thuaklujiu wang David khuga pikhaide, chiudi paniu sise sak makge chiudi sise paniu
sichiujiu paniu din-e, “
Joab singna Abishai hai “Pazan tadbo khang samriu”
Pahai paliu “Samriu” ruangga pazan tadthubo thiujiu paliugu jupao thiulu-e, chiudi pahai “Khangsum” kumjiu pazan tadtanglu makge.”

Kabzeel gasu Jehoiada nahpiu Benaiah hai pazan tadbo riphen khang khatle; paniu Moab maigu kadimai riphen khangnia kamshatbotu sijiu kahubo ngam kengkha kamkhai-e. Kabun kiubo nai paniu chakhomki ga kiulujiu ndongqui khattu kamshat khaide.

Egypt maipiu pakhao katheng-kadibopiu changiu thinlu wangbo piu khat tudi paniu kamshat mibo-e. Benaiah niu paheng thinlujiu patu asunjiu, pakpad Egypt maipiu ben gasu pangiu sutlujiu siseniu patu phenshat mibo-e.
“Samriu” ruangga jaobo pazan tadbo Benaiah gu pahot gasu kambo tienkamdungse hai-e. Pahai paliu “Samriu” ruangga pazan tadbopiu-e, chiudi pahai “khangsum” kumjiu pazan tadtanglu makge.
David niu pagu akhemaigu papao pithiu khai-e.
Pazan tadbo riphendung sira:
Joab singnapiu Asahel
Bethlehem gasu Dodo nahpiu Elhanan
Harod gasu Shammoth
Palet gasu Helez
Tekoa gasu Ikkesh nahpiu Ira
Anathoth gasu Abiezer
Hushah gasu Sibbecai
Ahoh gasu IIai
Netophah gasu Maharai
Netophah gasu Baanah nahpiu Heled
Benjamin ga bambo Gibeah gasu Ribai nahpiu Ithai
Pirathon gasu Benaiah
Gaash ramjeng mung gasu Hurai
Arbah gasu Abiel
Bahurum gasu Azemaveth
Shaalbon gasu Eliahba
Gizon gasu Hashem
Harar gasu Shegee nahpiu Jonathan
Harar gasu Sachar nahpiu Ahiam
Ur nahpiu Eliphal
Mecherah gasu Hepher
Pelon gasu Ahijah
Carmel gasu Hezro
Ezbai gasu Naarai
Nathan singnapiu Joel
Hagri nahpiu Mibhar
Ammon gasu Zelek
Beeroth gasu Joab ripuan phuibo, Naharai
Jattir gasu Ira nai Gareb
Hitt maipiu Uriah
Ahlai nahpiu Zabad
Shiza nahpiu Adina
(parupmai riphendung samriu ruangga Reuben kiphiu gasu jupao khat)
Maacah nahpiu Hanan
Mithan gasu Joshaphat
Ashterah gasu Uzzia
Aroer gasu, Hotham nahpiu kania,
Shamma nai Jeiel
Tiz gasu, Shimri nahpiu kania, Jediael nai Joha
Mahavah gasu Eliel
Elnaam nahpiu kania Jeribai nai Joshaviah
Moab gasu Ithmah
Zobah gasu Eliel, Obed khatdi Jaasiel.
David niu Chawang Saul khugasu pak maritad lujiu, Ziklag ga lung bamme. Siga wakam kasimai, malumjiu kasuibo riphendung,
Benjamin kiphiu, Saul kymai kakeng khaniu pakhuga wangjiu jao-e. Paliu haira tavaipi tadi n-getpi tadi majat-mawi ket kasimai maliang-e.
Paliu hai Gebeah gasu Shemaah nahpiu kania, Ahiezer nai Joash hangga bamme. Riphendung sira:
Azmaveth nahpiu kania,Jeziel nai Pelet
Anathoth gasu Berakah nai Jehu
Gebeon gasu Ishmaiah, “Samriu” ruanggasu
pazan tadbo riphenmai khat
Gederah gasu Jeremiah, Jahaziel,
Johannan khatdi Jozabad
Hariph gasu Eluzai, Jerimoth, Bealiah,
Shemariah khatdi Shephatiah
Korah kiriang gasu Elkanah, Isshiah, Azarel,
Joezer khatdi Jashobeam
Gedor gasu Jeroham nahpiu kania,
Joelah nai Zabadiah

David niu ramjinggu charirengga bambo tingga Gad kiphiu gasu pazan katadmai khatdi wakam kasimaidung suiwangbo riphendung zan hai raokhai-e. Paliu haira chagee nai changiu thinsiboga nkiubo maidung-e, paliu haira ramluongga tathan pakbo kum majatle khatdi ndongquitu phuipingbo kumjiu paliutu phui ping-e.
Paliu ngam saisuijiu pahangga paliu zan raokhai-e: Ezer, Obadiah, Eliab, Mishmannah, Jeremiah, Attai, Eliel, Johanan, Elzabad, Jeremiah, khatdi Machbannai.
Gad kiphiu gasu wangmai khangsianiu chamai sangtu thinbo chakampao karaimai thiu-e, khangsianiu chamai kaitu thinbo chakampao kanamai thiu-e.
Takum khatgu karaibo hiu lungga, Jordan giuky dibo tingga, paliuniu singgiuse kenlujiu sibo ramjingga lungmai singgiugu tingbang tingnuga lungmaidungtu kam mara khaide.
Benjamin nai Judah kiphiu gasu maidung rup khatniu David gu charireng lam tadle.

David niu paliutu adaora tadpad lujiu din-e, “Naliuniu chaka thiujiu atu nkha khaira wangsai, naliutu haiga lukhai-e. Wangjiu aliu saisui lulo! Chiudi Iniu naliutu wakhatdi kam masamak tadi, naliuniu agu mikremai khuga atu jonkhaira wangsai, aliu paopehmai Rawang niu sirabo-e khatdi naliutu sajai pikhai rabo-e.”
Paliu ruangga “Khang samriu” gu charipi, Amasai kubo situ Tingwang hiupuina niu thinman lujiu, paniu senpadle,
“Jesse nahpiu David yo, aliu hai nagu-e!
Kangambo hai natu nkhamai nai nagu-e!
Tingwang niu nalam liang bamme.”
David niu paliutu lukhaijiu, pagu riphen-ga paliutu chakampao pithiu khai-e.

David niu Philistine maidungtu maluang lujiu Chawang Saul tu aphenra tadkiubo tingga Manasseh kiphiu gasu riphendung khangsianiu David sai suiwang-e. Pachangsiakra paniu Philistine maidungtu nkhabo makge, palamra paniu karaibo pawangpiu Saul lam ponjiu paliutu pakhuga jonkhaimi suma chiujiu Philistine mai wangdung siniu patu ping-e, sijengniu paliuniu patu Ziklag lam langkhai mide.

Paniu malanwangboga, Manasseh gasu riphendung hainiu David saisui wang-e: Paliu haira: Adnah, Jozabad, Jediael, Michael, Jozabad, Elihu khatdi Zillethai. Manasseh ga paliugu chamai sang khat kadenkhai nbambo-e.
Paliuniu David riphen maidunggu chakampao thiu kamme, palamra paliu mathiu hai pazan tadkam mai maliang-e. Kanambo lamdi paliu hai Israel maigu chakampaodung thiubo-e.
Naimachangna David gu riphen ga maidung jaosan-sanjiu pagu riphen hai kengkhang nuang mide.
David niu Hebron ga bambo tingga,
Judah gasu chagee nai changiu thinsibo, khatdi wakam kasimai: 6,800;
Simeon gasu wa kati mawi kalumai: 7,100;
Levi gasu chamai: 4,600;
Aaron kaikik, Jehoiada saisui maidung: 3,700;
Zadok singnamai, aphen tanmai jupaodung:22
Benjamin (Saul kiriang siakmai) gasu: 3,000;
(Benjamin kiphiumai kakengniu Saul hangga bamjutle);
Ephraim kiriang gasu pazan tadmai: 20,800;
Tingnulam Manasseh gasu David tu chawang pithiura kadalubo maidung:18,000;
Issachar gasu jupaodung: 200;
(haibo jupaodung hainiu Israel mainiu degu kamralo chiubo simaidung-e);
Zebulun gasu kadin piujiu malum suimai khatdi mania hina thinsi mai: 50,000;
Naphtali gasu chagee nai changiu thinsi mai:37,000 sigasu paliugu jupaodung: 1,000;
Dan gasu wakamsi mawilu mai 28,600;
Asher gasu chari thiura kadenlu mai: 40,000;
Jordan gu tingbanglam bambo kiphiudung—Reuben, Gad, khatdi Tingbang lamgu Manasseh gasu mania hina thin sibo maise 120,000-ye.
Haibo riphendung hinaniu chari thiura kadenlujiu khatdi David tu pijiu chawang thiukhaira Hebron lam tadsude. Israel mai kakimai hinadi sibo chunse bam kamme.
Paliuniu siga David tu maluang lujiu paliu kahmainiu paliuleng kaden khaibo tatekse tiujiu jengsum manai khang-e.

Tingpilam bambo kiphiudung Issachar, Zebulun khatdi Naphtali tangbo maidungniu katiu-kasak hai--takhui, ndutsy majamsy-ki, jaw, khatdi takisa chiujiu qonniam, qontrao, chaqonpoi khatdi matomchi bang thiulujiu phungwang-e. Paliuniu matom-kabui khatdi milydung langtiura juwang-e. Pakhiangna haise chunwibo madupadjiu kadih pakhiangna gasu phungwangbo-e.
Chawang David niu pamaidung sanggu khatdi kaigu chakampaopi maitu npao sude.
Sichiujiu paniu Israel maidung mathiu khuga tacham madukhai-e, “Naliuniu suisai, khatdi aliu Rawang
Sichiujiu Saul niu chawang thiubo tingga wajeng sikhai makbo Tingwang gu Chamriat Bung situ tadlujiu phungwang mikhe.”
Sibo chamse mai hinaniu paliu chunwijiu suikhai kamme.
David nai pamaidungniu Judah gu luongriangga bambo Kiriath Jearim ga, chiubora Baalah namdi gase tadlujiu pakan phungbo wakhao riga ntao bambo
Chamriat Bungse paliuniu Abinadab ky gasu paliuniu ponpad lujiu matom-kari kasanbo gase khaide. Uzzah nai Ahio niu matom-kari situ jukhai-e,
David nai maidung siniu
Chidon gu asaiphungga paliu wangboga matomchise paphi masuijiu Ladriat Bung situ thin manra Uzzah niu paben henpadle.
Siga
siniu sibo bam situ Perez Uzzah
David niu
Sichiujiu David niu sise Jerusalem lam phungtad makjiu tamide. Sibosung, paniu Gath namdiga bambo Obed Edom kubo piu kyga khaidiak mide.
Haise siga chahiu sum bamkhang-e khatdi

Tyre Wangpiu Hiram niu David khuga chali-chala thiura chamai langkhai-e, sichiujiu paniu cedar sing pumdung khatdi tasing ngam kammai nai tatu ruimai jaojiu chawangkining thiura paniu paleng pikhaibi-e.
Sichiujiu pamaidung, Israel maidung jenggasu
Jerusalem ga, David niu panao thiusan lanjiu panah puidung panah piudung lungsan lan-e.
Jerusalem gasu lunglubo nahdung siniu: Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibhar, Elishua, Elpelet,
Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elishama, Beeliada
David haitu Israel mai mathiu wang pithiu mide chiubo hai Philistine maidung khuga dinkhaiboga, patu minra paliu rimai tadsude. Sijengniu paliutu asunra David niu tadsude.
Philistine maidungniu Rephaim Ramjengga menglujiu haphunra kamsude.
David niu Tingwang khuga maniu-e, “Iniu Philistine mai haitu charithiu rama? Nangniu atu charise pingam khai rama?”
Sichiujiu David niu Baal Perazim ga tadlujiu chari thiu sude, khatdi paliutu ngamlude. Paniu din-e, “
Philistine mainiu pakbo tingga paliu ramengdungse saokhai diakge, sise David nai pamaidungniu khoilujiu rumide.
Philistine maidungniu sibo ramjingga malanwang lanlujiu haphun lanra kamlan sude.
David niu
Singbang ton lamsu chaphipa khuan chiu dasai, chari thiu ngutlo, palamra Philistine maigu riphendung situ ngamlura Iniu naliu masuang tadngut rai bine.”
niu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu David niu kamde, sichiujiu Philistine mai situ Gibeon gasu Gezer tangbo hathonlan mide.
David gu makense pabam hinaga chiuchia mide, sichiujiu
David niu paky leng David Namdi
Sichiujiu paniu din-e, “Levi maidung ronna Ladriat Bungse ponrabo-e, palamra paliuniu haise ponra
Sijengniu Israel mai mathiutu paniu Jerusalem ga kumadui lujiu, paniu kadenkhaibo bamga ponwangra chamtan pikhaide.
Sibosai paniu Aaron kaikikdung nai Levi maidungtu kukhai-e.
Kohath kiriang gasu Levi mai, pakikhunmai mai 120 tu phuibo, Uriel;
Merari kiriang gasu 220 tu phuibo, Asaiah;
Gershon kiriang gasu 130 tu phuibo, Joel;
Elizaphan kiriang gasu 200 tu phuibo, Shemaiah;
Hebron kiriang gasu 80 tu phuibo, Eliel;
khatdi Uzziel kiriang gasu 112 phuibo, Amminadab paliu hai wang-e.
David niu singku Zadok nai Abiathar, khatdi Levi mai khang charuk, Uriel, Asaiah, Joel, Shemaiah, Eliel khatdi Amminadab tu kukhai-e.
Paniu Levi maidung khuga din-e, “Naliu hai Levi maigu jupaodung-e. Naliu ronna khatdi naliu singnamai Levi mai mathiutu kam masanlulo, sichiujiu Iniu kadenkhaibo bam gase Israel mai Rawang,
Palamra haise naliuniu raithubo thiujiu phungbo makge, aliuniu patu kahumrabo thakga kahum makbo jengniu aliu Rawang
Sigasu singkudung nai Levi maidungniu Israel mai Rawang
Levi maidung siniu Mose khuga chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu singkan-ga khailujiu paliu makhuak gasu ponsude.
David niu Levi maigu jupaodung khuga kakibo Levi maidung ngamleng pikhai bira, chiubora chunwibo lui thiura, nthiam mudra, siamtoy mathenra lengdi langkhaira dinkhai-e.

Chalui thiubo kiriang gasu pahangga raokhai maitu tataagigu siamtoy mathenra langkhai-e: Joel nahpiu Heman, pasingnapiu Berechiah nahpiu Asaph khatdi Merari kiriang gasu Kushaiah nahpiu Ethan. Paliutu nkha khaira kakubo-ruak thiura Zechariah, Jaaziel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Maaseiah khatdi Benaiah tu kadakhai-e.
Kanabo ruak thiura paliuniu Levi mai Mattithiah, Eliphelehu Mikneiah, Azaziah, khatdi charaky akhe maileng Obed Edom nai Jeiel tu kadakhai-e.
Chenaniah niu kamsibo jengniu Levi maigu chalui thiumai mathiutu thinra pikhaibi-e.

Ladriat Bungtu akhera Berechiah nai Elkanah tu Obed Edom nai Jehiah pamleng kadakhai-e. Singkumai Shebaniah, Joshaphat, Nethanel, Amasai Zechariah, Benaiah khatdi Eliezer tu Ladriat Bung masuangga make mudra kadakhai-e.
Sijengniu, Chawang David, Israel maigu jupaodung khatdi riphendung siniu Obed Edom ky gasu Ladriat Bungse phungraleng changee kadibo kamjiu mengde.
Tingwang niu Levi mai situ nkha khaijiu Ladriat Bungse ponlura, paliuniu kabuichi chinnia, mily chinnia charathiu khaide.

David niu withubo fainoise piulujiu kimme, chalui thiu maidungdi Levi maidung nai paliugu jupao Chenaniah siniu Ladriat Bung ponmaidung mathiuse sichiujiu khai kimme. David niu charathiubo fairen sidi khai kimme.
Sichiujiu Israel mai mathiuse Ladriat Bungse ponlujiu makiak mara kasinjiu, make mudjiu siamtoy nai nthiam thinjiu chunwijiu kapao wang-e.
Ladriat Bungse namdiga phunglu wangbo tingga Saul nahpui Michal niu kirankiga phuipadboga Chawang David niu chalen lenjiu, pachun wijiu machao kinbotu ngaolujiu palung amanta mide.
Paliuniu Ladriat Bungse ponwang David niu kaden khaibo mathenky gase khai mide. Sichiujiu paliu charathiu khaijiu chakin thiubogu rathakse Tingwang khuga kad khaide.
Charathiu loilubo saiga David niu
khatdi mai hinaleng katiu jankhai-e. Paniu Israel maigu maipui maipiu hinaleng taruak khuang khat-khat, chami karubo kang khat-khat khatdi majamsy-ki tam-tamna njankhai bide.
Israel mai Rawang,

Jupaoleng Asaph tu kadakhai-e, patu nkhara Zechariah tu kadakhai-e. Jeiel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Mattithiah, Eliab, Benaiah, Obed Edom khatdi Jeiel paliuniu tarabung mathen rabo-e. Asaph siniu siamtoy biurabo-e,
siga singku Benaiah nai Jahaziel niu pawan-wan ga Ladriat Bung masuangga makese mudrabo-e.
tu thuonbo lui thiura Asaph nai pakamai Levi maitu David niu pikhai raithubo-e.
paniu kamkhaibo haise jatdung khuga dinlo.
paniu maisuang habo kamkhaibo haise dinkhailo.
Aliu hai pagu thiulubo jengniu chunwi lulo;
patu kahum mai hina chunwi lulo.
Nkha khaira
khatdi saomakjiu patu kahum bamlo.
Jacob kaikik, Tingwang vangmai,
Israel kaikik, Tingwang niu kadalumai naliu,
Tingwang niu maisuang habo kamkhaibo
khatdi pagu ladjan haitu maningtao lulo.
pagu chamtanse kadihpiri pakhiangna leng-e.
Paniu tingtheng leng ladriat khai mibo,
Tingwang ladriat haitu mangai tulo,
Isaac khuga ladriat thiukhai-e.
sise tingtheng bamrabo-e.
Paniu din-e, “Canaan kadih hai Iniu naleng pine.
Haise nagu thiu rabo-e.”
Tingwang maidung hai pariak tambamniu-e,
Canaan kadihga sangmai thiubam niu-e.
Paliu hai kadih khat gasu kadih khatga
wangdih khat gasu khatga lungron bamniu-e.
Tingwang niu kamkhai-e;
paliutu gukhaira paniu chawangdungtu kachankhai-e:
“Iniu kadalubo avangdungtu kam masa mane;
agu phaimiukakungdungtu nia mane.”
Kadihpiri pakhiangna
Paniu aliutu gukhaibo kawi champaose naimachang paoronlo.
Pagu kendise jat hinaga paoronlo;
pangamkam kadibose mathiu khuga dinkhailo.
kakibo radung tusuang patu chakhuangthiu rabo-e.
Kakibo jatdung ra sira charameng maliang-e,
chiudi
Paken-pangam dibo siniu patu magui bamme,
pumtan nai chunwibose patu Kahumboky phuiting bamme.
Kadihga lungmai hina
paken-pangam dibo situ thuonlo.
Paken dibo
patu Kahumbokyga chunwibo podkad phungwanglo.
Paniu wangbo tingga, Masanbo khat masuangga makhum kiulo,
kadih mai hina pasuangga pingjiu kaphik lulo.
Kadih haitu malailan makra pabam khatga khai nbam mibo-e.
Ting-kadih yo chunwilo!
Dupui lungga bambo khaoring hina
luzamga bambo wahina chunwi-ringa lulo.
mariu singbangdung siniu chunwijiu makiak marasu rabo-e.
pagu lungsiat hai tingtheng-e.
Pakhuga dinlo, “Hey aliutu Ranpao Tingwang yo, aliutu gukhailo:
jatdung khugasu aliutu gukhaijiu,
aliutu puiwang aruang khailo;
sichiusai nazan masanbose aliuniu thuon rabo-e.”
Israel mai Rawang,
tuhoidi tingthengdi patu thuonlo!
Siga mai hinaniu
Chawang David niu Asaph nai pakamai Levi maitu Ladriat Bung khai nbambo bam gase saomakjiu phuikhaira pikhai-e. Paliuniu naimachangna paliu ngam thiujiu akhijiu macha rabo-e.
Jeduthun nahpiu Obed Edom nai pagu kiriang gasu chamai riak charuk-je-tachatkiu hainiu paliutu nkhakhai rabo-e. Hosah nai Obed Edom niu rengmundungse akherabo-e.
Singku Zadok nai pakamai siniu Gibeon ga
niu Israel mai khuga pikhaibo Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu paliu siga nsuan-chawan rukhaibo tiense thiujiu charathiu rabo-e.
gu tingtheng lungsiat jengniu, patu thuonjiu chalui thiura Heman nai Jeduthun tu kadakhai-e.
Kathuonbo lui thiuboga make mudra khatdi siamtoy nai kakibo tarabung mathenra sidi Heman nai Jeduthun niu phuirabo-e. Jeduthun gu kiriangmai siniu rengmundungse akherabo-e.
Chawang David hai tuhoira pagu chawangkining lungga lung bamme. Naikhat paniu mai khattu phaimiukakung Nathan khuga langkhaijiu pakhuga din-e, “Singchong singniu thiubo ky khat lungga I lung bamme,
Nathan niu paokakge, “Nangniu maning bambo hinase kamsulo, palamra Tingwang niu natu maluang bamme.”
Chiudi sibo nai nchun Tingwang niu Nathan khuga din-e,
“Tadsulo khatdi Iniu dinbose avangpiu David khuga dinlo. Iniu lungrabo raky thiurabose nangniu lakge.

Iniu Israel maidungtu Egypt gasu rankhaibo wan-gasu tuhoi tangbo, Iniu wadaodi charaky lungga lungkhai makge; Iniu pawan machang mathenky lungga lungjiu, pabam khat gasu pabam khatlam likhaijiu bambo-e.
Iniu Israel maidungtu majanglujiu agu chabin thiujiu tadbo bam hinaga dekamjiu singchong singniu charaky aleng thiukhai makjiulo, chiujiu Iniu kadakhai mibo jupao khatna tudi wadaodi maniu makge.’
“Haijengniu Ngamkambo
Nangniu tadkhai khaibo lam Iniu nasai suitad khai-e, khatdi nangniu hakinbo nagu mikre maidung pakhiangnatu kamkao khaibi-e. Kadihpirigu dithubo pazan tadbo jupaodung kumjiu Iniu natu kamkhai bine.

Iniu amai Israel maidung leng pabam khat kadakhai bamme sichiujiu siga Iniu paliutu pijiu lungkhaine. Siga paliutu mai khatniudi kam kabuak lanlakge. Paliuniu haibo ramga lungwangbo gasu paliutu palung sabo maidungniu chari thiuwang mibo-e, chiudi haise padlan lakge. Nagu mikre maidungtu kamkao khaira khatdi nakai-nakikdung pikhaira Iniu ladriat thiukhaibo-e.
Nang shaiboga haichiujiu natuse napao-napehdungtu nphum khaibo bamga baikhai rabo-e. Nanah piudung ruanggasu khangkhattu Iniu pijiu chawang thiukhaine sigasu pawangdihtu pijiu tankhai bine.
Aleng charaky thiukhai rabose paniu rabo-e, khatdi Iniu pagu chawang kiriang situ pijiu tingthengjiu bamkhai rabo-e.
I hai papiu thiurabo-e khatdi pahai anahpiu thiurabo-e. Patu pijiu chawang thiura Iniu Saul tu lupad lujiu paken ga kamkhai mibo kumbo agu nkhase, Iniu pakhu gasu nkhinmi lakge.
Amaidungtu pijiu phuikhaira Iniu patu lukhaine khatdi awangdihse tingtheng bamrabo-e. Pawangkining kiriangse wadaodi pamalan thiulakge.’”
Tingwang niu Nathan khuga madukhaibo hinase paniu David khuga dinkhai bide.
Sigasu Chawang David niu
Chiudi tuhoira nangniu ten nkiu khaijiu bamme; wangkinbo ken ga nangniu akai-akikdung leng ladriat thiukhaide, khatdi
Iniu nakhuga degu dinsuan ralo! Nangniu atu simasan bamme, haichiu bamliudi nangniu navangpiu, atu chakhuangthiu khaijiu bamme.
Haise aleng kam khaira nachun nachunning thiujiu khatdi aleng pasai wangrabo lenjiu bambo-e.
yo, nakumbo mai khatnadi ha-e; Naronna Tingwang-e chiubo aliuniu pawan machangna sibamme.

Namaidung pithiura kavang thiubo gasu nangniu rankhai mibo Israel mai makjiu kakibo jat khatnadi kadihga ha-e. Nangniu paliuleng kamkhai mibo kadibo nai maisuang habodung siniu kadihpiri pakhiangnaga nazan tadchia bamme. Nangniu namaidungtu Egypt gasu ranpad khaide khatdi namaidungniu tadpatboga kakibo jatdungtu hathon khai-e.
Nangniu Israel maitu tingthengjiu namai thiukhai-e, khatdi
“Haijengniu tuhoira,
Nazanse dijiu tadrabo-e, khatdi maidungniu tingthengjiu haichiu din-e, ‘

A-Rawang yo, nakhuga haibo rathoise alung hujiu khengra bamme, palamra pakhiangna haise nangniu navangpiu, akhuga madukhai mibode, khatdi nangniu akai-akikdungtu pijiu chawangdung thiukhaine chiujiu akhuga dinkhai mibo-e.
yo, nangra, Charawang si-e, sichiujiu nangniu haibo maisuang habo ladriatse akhuga thiukhaide.
Akai-akikdungtu thoikhaira Iniu nakhuga khengbo-e sichiusai paliuniu nagu nkhase lutao jutjiu bamrabo-e.
Pawan thengmakbo lungga Chawang David niu Philistine maitu chari thiulande khatdi paliutu kamkao mide. Paniu Gath namditu thinman lujiu khatdi sibo wonjenggu namtuakdungtu thinman lude.
Paniu Moab maitudi kamkao lujiu, sibo maidungse pamaidung thiuwangjiu paliuniu pakhuga ramkha pikhaide.
Pachaliga, David niu Hamath luongriang mungga bambo, Syria mai dihga Zobah wangpiu Hadazer tu chari thiude, palamra Hadadezer niu haibo luongriangse Euphrate nrilamse lulura matanbam di-e.

Pagu chaqon-kari sang khat, chaqon tongmaidung sang chinnia khatdi changen rimaidung sang makaitu David niu minlude chaqon-kari kai khatleng buibo chaqondungse paniu masiak khai lujiu kakibo qondung tura pangen kamtang kam mide.
Damascus gu Syria mainiu chawang Hadadezer tu nkhara riphenmai langkhaiboga, David niu paliutu asunde khatdi chamai sang makai-niatu kamshat mide.
Sigasu paniu chari maigu rijiky rammai paliugu luongriang lungga thiukhangde, sigasu paliu hai pamaidung thiu mide khatdi ramkhadungse pakhuga pikhaide.
Hadasezer gu chakampaodung niu pontad mibo kachiagu chagee dungse David niu haphun lude sigasu sidungse Jerusalem lam ponwangde.

Hadadezer niu mawang bamdibo namdi Tibhath nai Kun gasu paniu tataagidi kengga daolude. (Pasai Solomon niu haibo tataagise thinlujiu taduibung, chagitiang, sigasu Charaky leng tatagee gu chakuang chapiang kamme).
David niu Hadadezer gu riphenmai pakhiangna situ kamkao mide chiubo Hamath wangpiu Toi niu chiulude.

Haijengniu Chawang David tu kahumra paniu panahpiu Joram tu langkhaide khatdi Toi niu chari thiuchang thiukhai mibo Hadadezer tu paniu chari ngamlubo jengniu kamdaobo cham kanui khaide. Joram niu pagu kalendung thiujiu David khuga kachia, rangkang, khatdi tataaginiu kambo maniadung phungwangjiu pikhaide.
Chawang David niu haidungse Edom, Moab, Ammon, Philistine khatdi Amalek tu chari ngamlubo jatdung khugasu lulubo kachia nai rangkang jaojiu kahumboga thinpiura kadpat khaide.
Paniu Edom pakhiangnaga chari maigu rijiky thiukhangde, khatdi siga lungjiu bambo maidungse Chawang David maidung thiumide.
David niu Israel pakhiangna riga mawangde sigasu pamaidungtu pijiu pawan machangnaga masanjiu khatdi majijiu lungra kamkhai-e.
Abishai gu singnapiu Joab niu riphen maigu munranpiu thiubamdi-e; Ahilud nahpiu Jehoshaphat niu charao-khuangdungse thinbamdi-e;
Ahitub nahpiu Zadok nai Abiathar nahpiu Ahimelech niu singku thiubamdi-e; Seraiah niu ladjanky machunrao;
Jehoiada nahpiu Benaiah niu David gu akhemaigu papao thiubamdi-e; khatdi chawang David nahpiudungse patien ga katheng kadibo mai maliang-e.
Pawan thengmakbo lungga Ammon wangpiu Nahash shaimide, sigasu panahpiu Hanun niu chawang thiu-e.
Chawang David niu din-e, “Papiu Nahash niu akhuga kamkhai mibo kumjiu Iniu Hanun khuga malumbo chaka tiense lensiak rabo-e.” Haichiujiu David niu palungsiat madura pagu champao maidungtu langkhaide.
Paliuniu Ammon ga mengtangboga khatdi Chawang Hanun tu kuboga,

Ammon maigu jupaodungniu chawang khuga din-e, “David niu nahpiutu chakhuang thiujiu haibo maidungtu pagu lungsiat madura nakhuga langkhaibo-e chiubo nangniu maning jiuma? Chiumakge! Paliutu paniu kadihse meng matad phuilujiu chari thiura chakhumpao thiujiu langkhaibo-e!”
David gu champao maidungtu Hanun niu minlujiu, paliu ntanggiu kakip thonlujiu, paliu fai-nidungse n-gang gasu kakip taplujiu, paliutu langkhai mide.
Paliu hai paliu kylam malanwang mangam mide, haichiu padmibose David niu chiuluboga, paliu ntanggiu lunglan makthen malan wangmakjiu Jericho ga manai bammira tacham langkhaide.

Ammon mai nai chawang Hanun niu David tu paliu mikremai pithiukhai mide chiubo maningtao luboga, paliuniu Nribo Mesopotamia nai Syria maigu kadih Maacah khatdi Zobah gasu chaqon-karidung nai chaqon-kari tongmaidung mathiura kachia taju sang samriu madai pikhaide.

Paliuniu chaqon-karidung sang samriu-nia mathiu lujiu sigasu Maacah wangpiugu riphendungniu wanglujiu Medeba mungga rijiky thiukhaide. Ammon maidungdi paliugu namdi pakhiangna gasu padlujiu chari thiura kaden sude.
Degu padmi gulo chiubo David niu chiuluboga, paniu Joab nai parimai pakhiangnatu langpad sude.
Ammon mainiu tadpad paliugu dihsing namdi, Rabbah ga ngutbo npuiga chapkham sude, khatdi nkha khaira wangbo chawangdungse manamjiuga paliu chap lulujiu bam mide.

Mikremaigu riphendung khangsianiu pasuang lamsu khatdi khangsianiu pasai lamsu patu chari thiune chiubose Joab niu ngaoluboga, Israel maigu withubo riphendungtu kadalujiu Syria mai khulam muntuangjiu chapra kamkhaide.
Paniu kakibo riphendung situ pagu singnapiu Abishai tu pijiu Ammon maitu muntuangjiu chapra kamkhaide.
Joab niu pakhuga din-e, “Syria mainiu atu kamkaora kum misai, wangjiu atu nkha khailo, khatdi Ammon mainiu natu kamkaora kum misai, Iniu wangjiu natu nkha khaine.
Hujiu tanlulo! Aliuniu aliu Rawang gu namdidung nai pamaidung leng alai khaijiu matan sukhe. Sichiujiu
Joab nai pamaidungniu chari thiura masuang jonpadboga, Syria maise pakmide.
Syria mai pakmibose Ammon mainiu ngaoluboga, paliudi Abishai khugasu pakmide, sichiujiu namdilam ngutlan mide. Sigasu Joab niu Jerusalem ga malan wangmide.

Israel mainiu paliutu kammao mibose Syria mainiu siluboga paliu lung amanta mide, haijengniu paliuniu Euphrate Giuki naimik padlam bambo Syria kadih gasu riphenmaitu puiwang lujiu, paliutu Zobah gu chawangpiu Hadadezer gu riphendunggu munranpiu, Shobakh hangga khaisude.
David niu haise chiuluboga, paniu Israel maigu riphen maitu khom madui lujiu, Jordan Giu kenpad lujiu, Syria mai tu muntong lujiu khuan bamde. Charise thiusude,

khatdi Israel mainiu Syria maigu riphen maitu ha-malan khai mide. David nai pamaidungniu Syria maigu chaqon-kari karimaidung sang chinnia khatdi changen riphen maidung sang ataitu kamshat mide. Paliuniu Syria maigu munranpiu, Shobakh tudi kamshat mide.

Hadadezer hangga bambo chawangdungniu paliutu Israel mainiu kamkao mide chiubo siluboga, paliuniu David khuga kawi thiude sigasu pamaidung thiumide. Syria mainiu wadaodi Ammon maitu nkhalan nita mide.
Ammon maigu charameng Molech gu kachia pirun taju samriu-madai kumbo ripbo bamme. Sibo lungga bambo tiuchangse David niu khoilujiu papeesuangga khai mide. Paniu namdi gasu mania wajiukha sunglude.

Paniu namdiga bam maidungtu puilujiu wang tasing rombo, chagi kadambo khatdi mari kadambo tien pithiu khaide. Sikum gapjiu paniu Ammon maigu namdak pakhiangnatu kamkhaide. Sigasu pamaidungtu maluang lujiu Jerusalem ga malanwang mide.
Pasai, Gezer ga Philistine mai khuga chari padde. Haise Hushah gasu Sibbecai niu lungkabo piu khat pazanniu Sippai tu gimibo, khatdi Philistine maitu kamkao mibo wan-ga-e.
Lungkabo mai khat paben niaga njung charuk phungbo sigasu paphi niagadi njung charuk phungbopiu lungbambo Gath ga katambo ri padde. Pahai nda ken-ga lungkabo maigu kai-kik mai-e.
Paniu Israel maitu din masa-e, siniu David singna Shammah nahpiu, Jonathan niu patu kamshat mide.
David nai pamaidungniu kamshat mibo khangsum haise Gath ga bambo lungkabo mai kai-kikdung-e.
Satan niu Israel maidung riga chariubo phungwang khainibo jengniu David tu pijiu chamai riak chakra paniu kamkhaide.
