David niu Joab nai kakibo chakampaodungtu chamtan pikhaide: “Israel mai kadih pake khat gasu pake khatlam tadronjiu, maidung riak chaklo. Siga khang dejiukha lung bamlo chiubo Iniu sini-e.”
Joab niu paokakge, “
Chiudi chawangniu pijiu chamtanse Joab tu majaira kamkhaide. Joab niu tadpat lujiu, Israel mai dih pakhiangnaga tadron lujiu Jerusalem ga malan wangde.
Paniu Chawang David khuga charipum kabuibo mairiakse pakhiangna pikhaide, Israel mai ruanggasu 1,100,000, khatdi Judah mai ruanggasu 470,000 bamme chiubo madu khaide.
Joab niu chawanggu chamtanse lukhai makbo jengniu Levi kiphiu nai Benjamin kiphiutu chamai-riak chakboga jaokhai makge.
Padmibo lamga Tingwang niu kimkhai makge, haijengniu paniu Israel maitu sajai pikhaide.
David niu Tingwang khuga din-e, “Haikumbo kapangbo ngam kambo gasu Iniu nuan kammibo-e. Lungsajiu atu kuak khailo.”
Sigasu
“David khuga tadlujiu walam sum ruang gasu pachunning khat kadara dinlo. Paniu machunbose Iniu kamrabo-e.”
Gad niu David khuga tadlujiu,
Takum sum chakhum wangbo? Maksai nagu mikre maigu riphendung khugasu chahiu sum paktad mirabo? Maksai jengsum lungga
David niu Gad khuga paokakge, “Ira magenthiu asangsiak bamme! Chamainiu atu sajai piratu Ira masen makge.
Haijengniu
Sigasu Jerusalem tu kam maha mira maza khattu langkhai-e, chiudi palung lilan lujiu maza khuga din-e, “Saomilo! Sise buimide!” Siga mazase Jebus maipiu Araunah gu asaiphungga chapjiu bambo-e.

Mazase paben-ga paheng thinlujiu, Jerusalem kam maha mira, tingkai jiuga chap bambo David niu ngaode. Siga David nai maidunggu jupaodung siniu maliufai benlujiu paliu mathiu zuse kadihga makhum kiude.
David niu kakheng thiude, “Hey Tingwang yo, kamaobo kam mibose Iniu-e. Chamai-riak chakra chamtan pikhaibo piuse Iniu-e. Walam simakbo maidungniu degu kamkhai migulo? A-Rawang,
Araunah gu asaiphungga tadlujiu
David niu
Asaiphung gase Araunah nai panahpiu khang madai chabanmiu biujiu bamme, siga paliuniu maza situ ngao luboga, panahmaise pakjiu nbai mide.
Chawang David niu wang mana kinbose Araunah niu ngao kaji-kari, paniu asaiphungse phutlujiu pakwang pazuse kadihga makhumkiu niatang khaide.
David niu pakhuga din-e, “Nagu asaiphungse akhuga jonkhai khelo, chiusai chararentu kham mira, Iniu

“Pakendibopiu yo, lulu sulo,” chiujiu Araunah niu din-e, “Khatdi nangniu machunbo hinase kamlo. Rathak bamga rujiu kadkhai raleng haiga matomchi bamme, khatdi haiga asaibiu pek hainiu tasing thiujiu rura, sigasu kadpatbo thiujiu pira chabanmiu bamme. Iniu pakhiangna haise nakhuga pikhaibo-e.”
Chiudi chawangniu paokakge, “Makge, Iniu pamanse pi mawikhai rabo-e.
Sigasu paniu Araunah khuga asaiphung manleng chiujiu kachia khuang kai charuk pikhai bide.
Paniu siga
Pahengse khaikiu mira
Sigasu
Ramjingga Mose niu kamkhaibo
chiudi David niu Tingwang tu kahumra sibo bamga tadmakge, palamra paniu
Haijengniu David niu din-e, “Haiga
Israel mai ramlungga lungjiu bambo sanglun pakhiangna wang maduira Chawang David niu chamtan pikhaide, sigasu paniu paliutu changam kamra pikhaide. Mai khangsianiu Charaky thiura leng tatukang rui-e.
Natri kampadra khatdi tasinggu rengmun kamrabo leng wabungtang kamra chagi kakengga paniu pikhai-e, khatdi tatagee se kengchang kengbo jengniu parit madat ngamlu lakmide.
Tyre nai Sidon maitu cedar sing kengkha paleng ponwangra paniu dinkhaide.

David niu makumme, “Anahpiu Solomon niu thiurabo charaky se wichang-wibo khatdi kadihpiriga pazan tadbo thiusiak rabo-e. Chiudi pahai nah-e sigasu tatien thiutao makha-e, haijengniu Iniu haidungse macha masuangra mine.” Haijengniu David niu pah shai makhaga maniadung kengkha kaden khaide.
Paniu panahpiu Solomon tu kura langkhaide khatdi Israel maigu Rawang,
David niu pakhuga din-e, “Anahpiu yo, Iniu a-
Chiudi Iniu chamai kengkhatu kamshat mide sigasu chari kengkha thiukhai mide chiujiu
Palingjiu, paniu akhuga ladriat thiu-e. Paniu din-e, “Nanah npiumai khat lungne, paniu agi-manaijiu mawangne, palamra pagu mikremai hina khugasu agi-manaibose Iniu pikhaine. pazanse Solomon
Paniu aleng charaky khat thiune. Pahai anahpiu thiune, khatdi Iniu papiu thiune. Pagu chawang kiriang gasu Israel maitu tingthengjiu mawang rabo-e.’”
David niu dinkiu lan-e, “Tuhoira, anahpiu yo, na-Rawang
Khatdi

niu Israel maileng Mose khuga pikhaibo tacheng-tajai pakhiangnase nangniu majaisai, nangniu ngamlu rabo-e. Nalung chaplulo khatdi malum sonna lulo, khatdi pijiu wakhat niudi natu wa manangbo pithiukhai mitulo.

Charaky thiusu raleng, Iniu maranjiu kambo gasu daolubo kachia bawli 3,400 suang kengjiu, khatdi rangkang bawli 34,000 suang nkiujiu baikhai nbamme. Haibo riga, pamalan thiumakbo tatagee nai chagee pira bamme. Tasingdi akhuga bamme sigasu tatu kaden khai bamme, chiudi nangniu hairiga sanjiu thinwang nkiu rabo-e.
Tatien thiurabo mai nakhuga keng bamme. Tatu ka-kadibo bamga changam kamramai kengbamme, khatdi tatu karuimaidung nai tasingsiam simaidung, sigasu paliu bensiam kawimai changam pajat-jat,
kachianiu, rangkangniu, tataaginiu, sigasu chageeniu kam kangambo mai keng bamme. Tuhoira changamse thinsulo, khatdi
Solomon tu nkha khaira Israel maigu jupaodung pakhiangnatu David niu chamtan pikhaide.
Paniu din-e, ‘Naliu-Rawang
Tuhoira naliu Rawang
Israel maigu jupaodung, singkudung sigasu Levi maidung pakhiangnatu Chawang David niu puiwang madui khai bide.
Paniu Levi mai, npiumai takum samriu tangmibo maksai sisuang tingmibo maidung pakhiangnatu paliu riak chakde. Pakhiangnase sang samriu-je-tachatle.
Chawangniu chamai sang makai madaitu Charaky tien ga papao thiura, chamai sang charuktu charaokhuang hinase thinra sigasu n-gi-athaoboga tiakra suikhaide,
chamai sang madainiu akhebo tien thiura, khatdi chamai sang madainiu chalui thiuboga tarabung thinlujiu
David niu Levi maitu, paliugu kiriang saisuijiu, rupsum thiujiu: Gershon, Kohath, khatdi Merari chiujiu njan khaide.
Gershon panah npiumai khangnia Ladan nai Shimei lung-e.
Ladan panah npiumai khangsum: Jehiel, Zetham, khatdi Joel lung-e,
paliu hai Ladan gasu lungkiubo kirianggu papee-paga maidung-e. (Shimei niu panah npiumai khangsum: Shelomoth, Haziel, khatdi Haran lung-e).

Shimei niu panah npiumai nah khang madai: Johath, Zina, Jeush, khatdi Beriah tu, paliu tingkum saisuijiu lung-e. Jeush nai Beriah niu panai kaikik lung makeng makge, haijengniu panaitu kiriang khatleng chakkhai-e.
Kohath niu panah npiumai nah khang madai: Amram, Izhar, Hebron khatdi Uzziel lung-e.
Tingthubo piu Amram se, Aaron nai Mose piu-e. (Aaron nai pakai pakikdung tura kadapad tamsin lujiu, masanbo maniadungse tingtheng akhijiu,
Chiudi Tingwang mai, Mose nahpiudung, sira Levi mai ruangga jao-e).
Mose niu npiumainah khangnia, Gershom nai Eliezer lung-e.
Gershom nahpiudung ruanggasu jupaose Shebuel-e.
Eliezer niu npiumainah khatnaga ronna, Rehabiah lung-e, chiudi Rehabiah niu pakai-pakik kengga lung-e.
Kohath gu paniabo nahpiu Izhar niu npiumai nah khangkhat, Shelomith lung-e, pakirianggu papee khat thiujiu lung-e.
Kohath gu pasumbo nahpiu, Hebron niu npiumai nah khang madai: Jeriah, Amariah, Jehaziel khatdi Jekameam lung-e.
Kohath gu pa-madaibo nahpiu, Uzziel niu, npiumai nah khangnia, Micah nai Isshiah lung-e.
Merari niu npiumainah khangnia, Mahli nai Mushi lung-e. Mahli niudi npiumainah khangnia, Eleazar nai Kish lung-e,
chiudi Eleazar niu npiumainah ronna lungjiu npiumai nah khatnadi lungmakjiu shai mide. Panahpuidung siniu paliu singna Kish nahpiudung khuga mikhai-e.
Merari nah niabopiu Mushi niu npiumainah khangsum: Mahli, Eder, khatdi Jeremoth lung-e.
Hai maidungse Levi kai-kikdung, paky-riang gasu khatdi pakikhunmai tangbo, paliu mai hinase paliu zan raokhai mibo-e. Pakai-pakikdung hinase, takum makai, maksai sisuang tingbo mai hina,
David niu din-e, “Israel maigu
Haijengniu
David niu kanamboga ladtikhaibo saisuijiu Levi mai mathiuse takum makai khangtang miboga mai hinase chakamleng paliu zan raokhai rabo-e,

sigasu pahangga bambo tiendungse paliuleng pikhai bide: Aaron gasu lungkiubo singku maidung charakyga kahumbo jaojiu nkhara, ladjanky kahiu nai sibo kichense akhira, sigasu masanbo mania hinase kam tania makra pikhai-e;
Tingwang khuga kadkhaibo taruak, kadkhaibo takhui, chakhi khaimakbo taruak, kadkhaibo taruak, takisa khai ajamibo takhui, charakyga kadkhaibo hina parid madadra;
nsuan, chawan machang
Tabamnai, Hiusan Ngee nai khatdi katambo khuang-ngee hinaga parip phungrabo-e. Levi maidung riak saisuijiu pawan machangna tatien thiura kamkhai bamme.
Paliuniu
Aaron kaikikdung sira: Aaron nah piumai khang madai lung-e: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazer khatdi Ithamar.
Papiu shai makhaga suniu Nadab khatdi Abihu shairai mide, panai nah lungdiak makge, sijengniu pasingna Eleazer khatdi Ithamar niu singku thiu-e.
Chawang David niu Aaron nah maileng changam tam-tamjiu njan khaide. Siga Eleazer kaikik Zadok khatdi Ithamar kaikik Ahimelech niu patu nkhakhai-e.

Ithamar kaikik suangra Eleazer kaikikdungniu npiumai keng-e. Sijengniu pakiphiu phiuga haichiujiu papeemai kadakhai-e. Eleazer kaikikga papeethiubo chamai kariu charuk khatdi Ithamar kaikikga tachatle.
Eleazer khatdi Ithamar kaikikdungniu Charaky ngamga papee thiurabo-e khatdi kahumboga macharabo-e, haikumbo ngam kamra pikhaiboga paliu ruangganiu tadien thonlujiu chamai kadabo-e.

Eleazer khatdi Ithamar kaikikdung hai tadien thonjiu chagam alin-e. Levi maigu machunrao Nathanel nahpiu Shemaiah niu pariak rao-e. Chawang, pagu chakampaodung, singku Zadok, Abiathar nah Ahimelech, singku kiphiuga papeemai khatdi Levi mai mathiuniu lamchap thiujiu paliu zan rao-e.
Pakikhun makai madai siniu paliang thiujiu changam pikhaibo riak raokhai-e:
1. Jehoiarib
2. Jedaiah
3. Harim
4. Seorim
5. Malchijah
6. Mijamin
7. Hakkoz
8. Abijah
9. Jeshua
10. Shecaniah
11. Eliashib
12. Jakim
13. Huppah
14. Jeshebeab
15. Bilgah
16. Immer
17. Hezir
18. Happizzez
19. Pethahiah
20. Jehezkel
21. Jachin
22. Gamul
23. Delaiah
24. Maaziah
Haimaidung hainiu tam-tambo tien thiura khatdi Israel mai
Levi kaikikga kikhun gu papeemaidung sira:
Shebuel gasu lungkiubo Amram kaikik, Jehdeiah;
Rehabiah kaikik Isshiah;
Shelomith gasu lungkiubo kaikik, Jahath;
Hebron nah piumaidung paliu tingkum saisuijiu: Jeriah, Amariah, Jehaziel khatdi Jekameam.
Micah gasu lungkiubo, Uzziel kaikik, Shamir,
Micah singna Isshiah gasu lungkiubo, Uzziel kaikik, Zechariah-e;
Merari kaikikdungniu Mahli, Mushi khatdi Jaaziah.
Jaaziah nah piumai khangsum lung-e: Shoham, Zakkur khatdi Ibri.
Mahli nah khangnia lung-e: Eleazer khatdi Kish. Eleazer nah piumai lungmakge, chiudi Kish nah piumai khat lung-e, Jerahmeel.
Mushi nah piumai khangsum lung-e: Mahli, Eder khatdi Jerimoth.
Haimaidung hai Levi kiphiu gasu lungwang maidung-e.

Paliu riangrui bambo Aaron kaikikgu singkudungniu kambo kumjiu, kikhun hinaga papee khatdi singnamai ruangga nahbibo piuniu paliuleng chagam pikhaiboga taden thonbo gasu khai-e. Chawang David, Zadok, Ahimelech, khatdi singku kikhun gu papeedung khatdi Levi maidungniu lamchap thiujiu kamme.

Chawang David khatdi Levi mai jupaodungniu pahangga raokhai bambo Levi kiriang kahumbo maduiga mathiutu jukhaira kadakhai-e: paliu sira Asaph, Heman khatdi Jeduthun-e. Paliuniu tara khatdi siamtoy thinjiu

Asaph nah piumai khang madai: Zakkur, Joseph, Nethaniah, khatdi Asharelah. Haimaidung hai Asaph hangga bamme, chawanggu chamtan chiulu dasai Asaph niu papee thiujiu Tingwang gu champao din madurabo-e.
Jeduthun nah piumai khang charuk: Gedaliah, Zeri, Jeshaiah, Shimei, Hashabiah khatdi Mattithiah. Haimaidung siniu kahumboga paliu piu Jeduthun hangga tara gejiu
Heman nah piumai kariu madai lung-e: Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, Romamti Ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir khatdi Mahazioth.
niu chawanggu phaimiukakung thiu bambo Heman tu pumtan pikhaine chiujiu ladriat kamkhai mibo saisuijiu panah piumai khang kariu madai khatdi puimai khangsum pikhai-e.
Charaky kahumbo wan-ga paliu piuniu jukhaibo hangga paliuniu siamtoy khatdi tara thinjiu
Haibo mai khang makai madai hai wa-kam kasimai-e; khatdi paliu sai kasuibo Levi maidungse chalui thiu kasi maidung-e. Paliu pakhiangna chamai 288-ye.
Kating-kanah, kasimai-simakmai tamson makjiu taden thonjiu paliu tiendon kada-e.
Haibo mai 288 tu kikhun saisuijiu kiphiu kariu niagu pabao makai madai thiujiu njan padle, pabao hinaga parid phungbo jupao khat khat bamme. Haiga paliugu tiendon saisuijiu raokiu khai bamme:
1. Asaph kikhun mai Joseph
2. Gedaliah
3. Zakkur
4. Zeri
5. Nethaniah
6. Bukkiah
7. Asharelah
8. Jeshaiah
9. Mattaniah
10. Shimei
11.Uzziel
12. Hashabiah
13. Shebuel
14. Mattithiah
15. Jerimoth
16. Hananiah
17. Joshbekashah
18. Hanani
19. Mallothi
20. Eliathah
21. Hothir
22.Giddalti
23. Mahazioth
24. Romamti Ezer
Levi maidung charaky akhejiu machaboga changamdung pikhaibose haidung-e. Asaph kikhun mai, Kore nahpiu Meshelemiah hai Korah kiriang gasu-e.
Pahai panah npiumai khang chinnia lung-e, kating kanah saisuijiu raokiu khai-e: Zechariah, Jediael, Zebadiah, Jathniel,
Elam, Jehohanan, khatdi Eliehoenai.
Ammiel, Issachar khatdi Peullethai.

Obed Edom nah tingthubopiu panah npiumai khang charuk lung-e: paliu hai pakirianggu papeemai-e khatdi tan-humai-e. Shimaiah nahpiudung sira Othni, Rephael, Obed, Elzabad, Elihu khatdi Semachiah, nathubo kania hai kamsi thu-e.
Obed Edom kikhunmai hai wa kamsi-e, pakikhunmai mai riak-charuk-nia hai wa kamsi mawi mai-e.
Meshelemiah kikhunmai khatdi pasingnamai kariu-tachat haidi wa kamsi mawi mai-e.
Merari kiriang gasu Hosah-e panah piumai khang madai lung-e: Shimri niu papee-e, (naraipiu makge chiudi papiuniu papeeleng kadakhai-e).
Sibo sai Hilkiah, Tebaliah, khatdi Zechariah paliu-e. Hosah kikhun ganiu charakytu akhebo mai pakhiangna kariu-summe.
Kakibo Levi mai kikhun tam-tambo saisuijiu charakyga machara langkhaibo kum, charaky khuanmaidung tudi pabao njanpad lujiu changam tam-tambo kamra pikhai-e.
Kati-kadi thiumakjiu paliu kikhun saisuijiu saokimainiu ndebo rengmun akheralo chiubo taden thonjiu phui-e.
Taden thonboga tingbanglam bambo rengmun khuanra Shelemiah leng padle. Panah Zechariah leng tingpilam bambo rengmun khuanra taden thon padle. Pahai ladpikhai sibo piu-e.
Tingnulam bambo rengmunse Obed Edom leng taden thon padle khatdi panahpiudungniu wa mania rikhaiboky rengmun khuanra taden thon padle.
Shuppim khatdi Hosah leng tingnulam bambo rengmun, khatdi nrilam bambo npuiga Shallecheth Rengmun khuanra padle. Rengmun akhebo hai retkhaibo wan-ga malin malinjiu akhe-e.
Naimachangna khang charukniu tingbanglam rengmun akhe-e. Khang madainiu tingpilam, khang madainiu tingnulam khe-e. khang madainiu naimachangna wa mania khaiboky niaga khang nia-nia akhe-e.
Tingnulamsu apaiky ngutbo rengmun ga khang madainiu akhe-e khatdi apaiky rengmun siakga khang nianiu akhe-e.
Haimaituse Korah khatdi Merari kiriangga rengmun khuanra njankhai mai side.
Levi mai kakimainiu Tingwang gu chakhiu-chalan khatdi charakyga kadwangbo hina khai makhuanbo ky khuanne.
Gershom nah Ladan ganiu kikhun katam-tambo bao padle, panah Jehiel kimaidi jao-e.
Ladan nah piumai khangnia Zetham khatdi Joel niu Charaky gu chakhiu-chalan khatdi wa mania khai maduibo ky akhe-e.
Amram, Izhar, Hebron, khatdi Uzziel kaikik lengdi changam njankhai-e.
Mose kaikik ganiu Gershom nahpiu Shebuel niu Charakygu chakhiu-chalan machaboga papee-e.

Gershom singnapiu Eliezer khugasu Shebual di Selomith tu khat thiu-e, Eliezer hai Rehabiah piu-e, Rehabiah hai Jeshaiah piu-e, Jeshiah hai Joram piu-e, Joram hai Zichri piu-e khatdi Zichri hai Shelomith piu-e.
Shelomith khatdi pasingnadungniu Chawang David kiphiuga papeemai khatdi riphen gu papeemainiu
Paliuniu chari gasu khoiwangbo mania kam masan lujiu charakyga thinpiu raleng kadkhai-e.
Phaimiukakung Samuel, Chawang Saul, Ner nahpiu Abner khatdi Zeruiah nahpiu Joab niu Charakyga kadkhaibo mania hina sidi Shelomith khatdi paliu singnamainiu akhi rabo-e.
Izhar kaikikga Chenaniah khatdi panahmai khuga kadih thinbo ngam pikhai-e: ladjan thiubo khatdi Israel mai khuga padmibo racham pakhiangna raokhaira langkhai-e.
Hebron kaikik ganiu Hashabiah khatdi pasingnamai wa kasimai chamai sang khat kai chinniatu Jordan giu tingnulam bambo charam hinaga characheng khatdi kadih thinra pikhai-e.

Hebron kaikikga Jeriah niu papee-e, David niu chawang thiubo takum atai khangtangboga Hebron kaikik maigu kikhun tu kahio masanra kamme, sichiujiu sibo kikhun gasu nkiubo riphendung Gilead dihga bambo Jazer ga lungbam niubo daolude

Chawang David niu Jeriah kiriang gasu papeethiubo chamai sang nia kai chinniatu kadapadle, paliutu Jordan tingbanglam bambo Reuben, Gad khatdi Tingbang Manasseh ga bambo charam hina riga kadih thinbo khatdi tacheng-tajai ngam hina thinra pikhai-e.

Israel mai kiriangga papeedung khatdi kikhundunggu papeemai khatdi chawang kadih thinbogu chakampao maidung riakse hai-e. Takumgu chahiu machangnaga chamai sang makai madainiu pabam katam tambo thiujiu charipi khat hangga bamjiu paliu ngam tadkiu-e.
Pahangga raokhaibo maidung hai chahiu machang kali-lijiu kadih kathin maidung-e:
Karaibo hiuga: Zabdiel nahpiu
Jashobeam niu charipi thiu-e (pahai Judah kiphiu-e khatdi Perez kiriangga bambo-e).
Niabo hiuga: Ahohi kaikik
Dodai niu charipi thiu-e (Mikloth niu niabogu chari pi-e).
Sumbo hiuga: singku Joehoiada
nahpiu Benaiah niu charipi thiu-e.
Pahai chamai “Khang samriu”
riga charipi thiu-e (panahpiu
Ammizzabad niu haibo baogu charipi thiu-e,)
Madaibo hiuga: Joab singnapiu
Asahel niu charipi thiu-e.
(panahpiu Zebadiah niu patu malin dai-e).
Mangiubo hiuga: Izhar kaikikga
Shamhuth niu charipi thiu-e.
Charukbo hiuga: Tekoa gasu
Ikkesh nahpiu Ira niu charipi thiu-e.
Chinniabo hiuga: Pelon ga bambo
Ephraim mai Helez niu charipi thiu-e.
Tachadbo hiuga: Hushah ga bambo
Sibbecai niu charipi thiu-e (pahai Judah kiphiu nai Zerah kiriang gasu-e).
Chakiubo hiuga: Benjamin kiphiu
Anathoth gasu wangbo
Abiezer niu charipi thiu-e.
Kariubo hiuga: Netophah gasu wangbo
Maharai niu charipi thiu-e
(pahai Zerah kiriang gasu-e).
Kariukhatbo hiuga: Ephraim kiphiugu kadih Pirathon ga
bambo Benaiah niu charipi thiu-e
Kariuniabo hiuga: Netophah ga bambo
Heldai niu charipi thiu-e
(pahai Othniel kaikik mai-e).
Israel mai kiphiu-kiphiuga kadih thinmai pahangga raokhai-e:
Reuben
Zichri nahpiu Eliezer
Simeon
Maacah nahpiu Sephatiah
Levi
Kemuel nahpiu Hashbia
Aaron
Zadok
Judah
David singnapiu Elihu
Issachar
Michael nahpiu Omri
Zebulun
Obadiah nahpiu Ishmaiah
Naphtali
Azariel nahpiu Jeremoth
Ephraim
Azaziah nahpiu Hoshea
West Manasseh
Manasseh Pedaiah nahpiu Joel
East Manasseh
Manasseh Zechariah nahpiu Iddo
Benjamin
Abner nahpiu Jassiel
Dan
Jeroham nahpiu Azarel
Zeruiah kubo pui nahpiu Joab niu chamai pumriak raobo ngam tadkiu-e. Chiudi paniu kam tathui tanglu makge. Haibogu tazan raobo gasu
Chawanggu mania thinmaitu haichiujiu pahangga raokhai-e:
Chawanggu khai maduibo bam: Adiel nahpiu Azmaveth
Nam-namgu khai maduibo bam: Uzziah nahpiu Jonathan
Chalu-karenggu khai maduibo bam: Chelub nahpiu Ezri
Mumsy khai maduibo: Ramah ga bambo Shimei
Jaw khai maduibo: Shepham ga bambo Zabdi
Takisibang nai Biurui bangdung (maluong phiga ga bambo): Gedar gasu Baal Hanan
Takisa khai maduibo: Joash
Sharon Ramjengga kabuidung phuibo: Sharon gasu Shirtai
Taningga kabuidung phuibo: Adlai nahpiu Shaphat
Kontraodung phuira: Ishmael mai, Obil
Konniamdungtu akhibo: Meronoth gasu Jehdeiah
Milydung nai kamidung phuibo: Hagri mai, Jaziz.
Chawang David piunabo Jonathan hai ladpipao kawibo mai-e khatdi wasi mawibo mai khatle. Pah khatdi Hachmoni nahpiu Jehiel niu chawang nahdungtu ariak katikhai-e.
Ahithophel niu chawangtu ladpipao thiu-e. Archite mai Hushai hai chawang rupmai-e khatdi chawang leng laddin maidi thiu-e.
Ahithophel shai mibo saiga, Benaiah nahpiu Jehoiada khatdi Abiathar niu chawangtu ladpipao thiu-e. Joab niu chawang riphen maigu charipi thiu-e.

Israel maigu chakampao hinatu Jerusalem ga madui raleng Chawang David niu chamtan pi-e. Haichiujiu kiphiu hinagu chakampao maidung, chawang kadihtu thinbo chakampao maidung, kiriang hinagu jupaodung, chawang khatdi panahpiudunggu khaorui khaona khatdi, chakhiu- chalan machamai chawangkininggu chakampao maidung hina khatdi chariga papeemai katan kahumai chiujiu Jerusalem ga maduide.
Chiudi sise kamra paniu atu suimakge, dejengniulo chiusai I hai riphenmai khatle, sichiujiu aben gasu tazai kengjiu kampad mibo-e.
Israel mai Rawang
niu anahmaidung pi kengkhai-e, sibo ruanggasu anahpiu Solomon tu
Tuhoi paniu atu maning matipbo kumjiu, paniu agu tacheng-tajai hina majainiu bamsai pawangkining dihse tingtheng bamra Iniu kam khaine.’
“Siniu tuhoira, amaidung yo,

Solomon khuga paniu din-e, “Anahpiu yo, nangniu kahum bambo napiu Rawang tu sijiu, khatdi nalungchun pakhiangnaniu kamni thiunibo lungchun bamjiu patu machalo. Paniu nalungchun khatdi nagu luni hina sibamme. Nangniu patu phiusai daosune, paniu natu lukhai birabo-e, chiudi nangniu pakhu gasu taddiu misai, paniu tingtheng natu phutmi sune.
Pagu masanbo Raky thiura
Sibosai David niu Charaky thiu raleng rang masuang padbo, chakhiu-chalan rikhaibo kichen gu, kaki-kibo kichendunggu khatdi nuan kuak khaibo Masan Thubo Bam kichen gu chiujiu Solomon khuga pikhaide.
Paniu tathukyse thiura khatdi pamung maguibo kichendung thiura khatdi charakygu mania khatdi
Singkudung khatdi Levi maidungniu ngut lujiu Charaky tien thiurabo wan-ga thinrabo chakuang-chapiang rikhairabo pakhiangnagu chak masuang padmibose David niu patu pikhaibide.
Kahumbo wan-ga thinpiurabo kachiagu chakuang-chapiang kamboga ngutrabo kachiagu parip ngutra paniu dinkhaide. Sikumgapjiu rangkanggi gudi parip madatra dinkhaide.
Kachiagu chamibung khatdi chamibung khairabo padung khatdi rangkangginiu kambo chamibung hina kamraboga ngutrabo khatdi rangkanggise parip madatra dinkhaide.
Masanbo taruak khairabo kachia rangkangginiu kambo wakai taliuboga ngutrabo rangkang parip madat radi dinkhaide.
Masanbo kachianiu dechiujiu pathu thiubo wa raotiubo-thu, tathikuang, khatdi chapiang kamralo, chakuang-chapiang kamboga kachia nai rangkanggi ndekengga ngutralo,
khatdi maruta rukhairabo rathakbam kamboga khatdi
Chawang David niu din-e, “Haichiu marangkhaibo rao kaden khaibo hinase
Chawang David niu panahpiu Solomon khuga din-e, “Malum siakjiu nalungchun chaplulo. Tatien thiusulo khatdi wakhat niudi natu khamnam mitulo. Iniu macha bambo

Singkumai khatdi Levi maitu Charakyga tatien thiura changam pikhaide. Tatien thiuboga pabensiam wimai kakengniu natu nkhani bamme, chamai hina khatdi paliugu jupao hinaniu nagu chamtan hangga tatien thiura suikhai bamme.”
Charaky thiuraleng wa mania hina Iniu khonmadui khaibo—kachia, rangkanggi, tataagi tasingpum paman kungbo tu, tiuchang-tu, wameng kambo-tu khatdi tatu kakabo chiujiu kaden khaide.
Iniu kaden khaibo hina riga nkiujiu, Tingwang gu Raky thiura achun ngutbo jengniu agu chakhiu bambo kachia nai rangkanggi kadkhai-e.
Iniu withubo kachia bawli
Chabensiam kasimainiu palun wira karukhaibo ngamgadi thinrabo-e. Tuhoira saokum mainiu
Kirianggu papeedung, kiphiugu chakampaodung, riphen maigu charipidung khatdi chawang hangga kadih thinmai hinaniu, chunwijiu paniu-paniu kangam-ngambo kadpatde.
Charaky thiura kadwangbo pakhiangna kachianiu bawli 170 rangkangginiu bawli 340 tataaginiu bawli 620 khatdi chaginiu bawli 3,400 ye.
Gershon kiriangga chakhiu-chalan machabambo piu Levi mai Jehiel khuga paman kungbo tu kadwangbo hina pikhai maduide.
Maidungniu
Sijengniu mathiu suangga David niu
Nang hai dibo, tanbo, kendibo, kawibo, khatdi ngamkambo-e. Tinggen nai kadihga bambo hina nagu-e, khatdi nang hai chawang-e, wahina riga papaose nang-e.
Chakhiu-chalan hina nakhu ganiu wangbo-e, khatdi wahina riga nangra nagu pumtan nai jengtanniu mawang bambo-e, khatdi nangniu mai khattu kadibo khatdi katanbo pikhai ngamme.
Sijengniu, tuhoira, aliu Rawang
“Chiudi amaidung nai Iniu naleng wadi kadra ha-e. Palamra wahina
Hey,
Hey, aliu Rawang
Iniu si-e, chiubora
Aliu pao-pehmai Abraham, Isaac khatdi Jacob Rawang
gu ladriat tu pawan machang matipjiu phungbamra anahpiu Solomon khuga masanbo lungchunse pikhailo. Khatdi Iniu kaden wangmibo Charaky hai paniu thiu ngamra pumtan pikhailo.”
Sibo sai David niu mathiu khuga dinlan-e, “Naliu Rawang
Pasaibo nai paliuniu khaoring kamshat lujiu charathiujiu
Sibo nai mathiu tiulu saklujiu
Lonniabo thiujiu David nahpiu Solomon tu chawang-e chiujiu senpad lande.
Sichiujiu
Chakampaodung nai riphenmai hina, kaki-kibo David nah piumai hinadi Solomon hai chawang-e khatdi pahangga bamrabo-e chiujiu ladriat thiude.
Solomon tu jat hinadi chakhuang thiu-e khatdi
Sichiujiu Jesse nahpiu David niu Israel maigu chawang thiujiu lungkhaide.
Paniu chawang thiubo hai takum atai-e, paniu Hebron ga takum chinnia, Jerusalem ga takum samriu-sum chiujiu mawangkhai-e.
Kalek wibo khatdi chakhuang thiubo mai khat thiujiu pahai thenthui wangjiu shai-e. Paniu shaimibo sai panahpiu Solomon niu chawang thiude.
Chawang David niu lungkhaibo racham subo gasu kaloibo pakhiangna Phaimiukakungmai khangsum: Samuel, Nathan khatdi Gad niu raokhai bamme.

Raokhai bambo ganiu silu-e, chiubora pahai dechiujiu chawang thiumilo, pahai ndejiuga pumtan bamlo, paniu lungbambo wan-ga patu khatdi Israel mai khuga nde padmilo, patu lung maguibo chawangdih hinaga nde padmilo chiubo pakhiangna raokhai nbamme.
Chawang David nahpiu, Solomon niu Israel maigu Chawang kadihse thin matipjiu thinde, sichiujiu
Chawang Solomon niu chamai sang khatgu, chamai kai khatgu chakampaodung kadakhai lujiu khatdi kikhun-gu papee thiumai hinatu, khatdi kakibo chakampaodung hinatu majangtad lujiu,
Gibeon ga kahum raleng chamtan khat pikhaide. Paliuniu siga tadle, palamra,
(Kiriath Jearim gasu Ladriat Bungse luwanglan lujiu, Chawang David niu thiusu khaimibo, Jerusalem ga bambo Mathenkiga, Ladriat Bungse bammibo-e).
Hur tahpiu khatdi Uri nahpiu, Bezalel niu tataagi khoilujiu kambo rathakbamse Gibeon ga
Mathenky masuangga Chawangniu tataagi khoilujiu kambo rathakbam rigase kadpadjiu
Sibo nai nchun Tingwang niu Solomon khuga ngaolen khaijiu, maniu-e, “Iniu natu nde pikhaibo nang masenlo?”
Solomon niu paokakge, “Nangniu pawan machang apiu David tu lungsabo lenkhaide khatdi tuhoi nangniu atu pijiu patu malin khaijiu Chawang thiu khaide.
Hey,
Sichiujiu Iniu paliu riga mawangra jengniu tasi ningting pikhaibotu Iniu masenne. Sichiu maksai, haijiukha kengbo namaidung riga Iniu nde chiujiu mawang ngamlu ralo?”

Tingwang niu Solomon tu paokak khai-e, “Nangniu majibose kada lude. Chakhiu-chalan, maksai lungwibo maksai tazan tadbo maksai nagu mikre maidung shai raleng maksai nagu karingting theng raleng khengrabo sung, Iniu paliu riga natu pi chawang thiukhaibo, namaidung riga mawang ngamlu raleng ningting nai tasi nangniu kheng-e.

Iniu natu ningting nai tasi pikhai rabo-e. Sichiujiu sibo riga sanjiu namasuangga lungwang mibo chawang maksai lungwang lanrabo chawangdungtu suangdi nkiujiu Iniu natu lungwibo khatdi chakhiu-chalan, khatdi tazan tadbo pikhai rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu Solomon niu Gibeon ga bambo kahumbo bam,

Paniu chaqon-kari tongbo charimai sang khat kai madai khatdi chaqon tongbo riphen sang kariu nia chiujiu taliu khaide. Paniu khangsiatu Jerusalem ga khaide, khatdi paniu khangsiatu katambo namdidungga pibam khaide.
Paniu mawangbo wan ga kachia nai rangkangse tatu kumjiu Jerusalem ga mathiuniu thin-e, khatdi cedar singniu tasing kachangmakbo biuruibang sing kumjiu kengchang keng-e.
Chawangtu machamaidung siniu Musri nai Cilicia

Egypt gasu chaqondungtu maidih lam pikhaibo ngamse kamme. Paliuniu Hitt mai nai Syria mai wangtu chaqondung nai chaqon-karidung pikhaijiu, chaqon-kari hinaga rangkanggi kai charuk khatdi chaqon hinaga rangkanggi kaikhat ringiu-ga jonkhai-e.
Chawang Solomon niu

Mania phungwang raleng chamai sang riak-chinnia, khatdi changam kamraleng chamai sang riak-tachattu paniu khaide. Sigasu changam kambotu akhi khaira chamai sang sum kai charuktu parid phungra pikhaide.

Solomon niu Tyre gu chawang Hiram khuga champao langkhai-e: “Apiu chawang David tu nangniu majang changam kamjiu, pagu chawangkiningga chaky thiuraleng cedar pumdung patu jonkhai bibo kumjiu atu majang chali kamkhailo.

a-Rawang tu chakhuang thiura Iniu Charaky khat thiu bamme. Sise masanbo bamkhat thiujiu siga amaidung nai Iniu patu kahumjiu parai manam wibodung rukhaijiu, kadkhai rabo-e, siga aliuniu masanbo taruak pakhuga kadkhaijiu bamrabo-e, khatdi siga Hiusan padbo changee, N-nidnai kambo kumjiu, khatdi kakibo masanbo tingmikga aliuniu aliu
Iniu Charaky kadibo khat thiusu raleng matan bamme, palamra aliu Rawang hai kakimai ra suang di-nkiubo-e.

Tuhoi tangbo mai khatniudi Tingwang leng Charaky thiu ngam makge, palamra kadibo tinggen pakhiangna niudi patu pi bamkhai raleng builu makge. Chiusai Iniu ndechiujiu kakibo bamsuang nkiubo Tingwang khuga maruta rukhairabo Charaky khat thiu ngam luralo?

Tuhoira akhuga chamai khangkhat, kachiaga, rangkanggiga, tataagiga khatdi chagiga chiujiu karu khaira wameng raokhai simai khatdi chafaiga kahengbo kamaobo khatdi hengmangbo tathuak khisimai pikhailo. Judah gu chabensiam kamsimai khatdi Jerusalem ga apiuniu kada lubo maidungtu majang paniu changam kamrabo-e.

Nagu tasingngam kambo maidung hai ndejiukha kamsilo chiubo Iniu si-e, siniu cedar pum, maga-sing pum, khatdi juniper sing pum, Lebanon gasu akhuga langwang khai khelo. Singpum kengjiu ruiraboga namaidungtu nkhara
amaidungtu Iniu langkhaira kaden lujiu bamme, palamra sibo singpum ruilubo siniu kawibo Charaky kadibo Iniu thiuraleng matan bamme.
Nagu changam kambo maidung leng chabanmiu bawli
Chawang Hiram niu paokakbo thiujiu Solomon khuga chamlen khat langkhaide. Paniu raokhai-e, “Palamra
Tinggen nai kadih Dampao, Israel mai Rawang
Iniu nakhuga tasiam kamsibo piu ningtingbo pazanniu Huram kubo piutu langkhai kinne.

Papui hai Dan kiphiu mai khatle papiu haira Tyre mai-e. Paniu kachiaga, rangkanggiga, tataagiga, chagiga, tatuga, khatdi tasingga, mania ndetiujiu kampad ralo chiubo thak si-e. Chafaiga kahengbo, hengmangbo, kamaobo tathuak khikhaira khatdi fainoi kambodi kam ngamme. Pakhuga dinkhai bibo thak hina pajat-pajat thiujiu palun kampad ngamlubo-e. Napiu Chawang David jengniu changam kam maidungtu, khatdi nagu tasiam kamsi maidungtu majang lujiu pi changam kam sulo.
Siniu tuhoira nangniu ladriat kamkhaibo kumjiu chabanmiu, thiupen, mumjaw khatdi takisa hinase aliu khuga langkhai sulo.

Lebanon gu maluong gasu aliuniu naleng pageng bambo cedar sing hina huilujiu changam bam gasu rad kadui lujiu Joppa katangbo duipui gasu matenkiu khaibi rabo-e. Sigasu nangniu sise jupad lujiu Jerusalem lam phungwang lubui-e.”
Papiu chawang David niu tazan raobo kumjiu Chawang Solomon niu Israel maigu kadih ga lungbambo sangdiumai hinagu tazan rao-rao-e. Siga sangdiumai 153,600 lung bamme.
Paniu chamai 80,000 tu ramluongga tatu phangraleng khatdi sise ponra chamai 70,000 tu changam pikhaide, khatdi sibo maidungtu phuira khatdi changamse phuikhai bira chamai 3,600 pikhai bide.
Chawang Solomon paniu Chawang thiubo takum madaibo kumgu niabo hiuga thiukhang sude.
Chawang Solomon niu thiu khaibo Charaky thense gaphek makai chinnia padetniu gaphek chakiu-e.
Charaky gu tadngutbo kichen pathen padet haise gaphek chakiu, khatdi pakod gaphek ringiu ku-e. Palung gase masanbo kachianiu taisin khai-e.
Kidunbo kichense cedar singniu papuan thiulujiu kawibo kachia lujiu taisin khai-e, khatdi sise kadanbang khatdi wariang phen tarikhaibo lun kam lujiu papuan thiu khai-e.
Chawang siniu Charaky situ paman kungbo, palun kawibo tatuniu khatdi Parvaim kadih gasu kachia piwangbo siniu papuan thiu khai-e.
Paniu kachia lujiu Charaky gu singbeng, kajen, kamunkhu, khatdi kamun chiujiu taisin khai-e. Changam kammaidung siniu singbeng gase pakan phungbo wakhaomeng kamkhai-e.
Lungsinggu kichen situ Masan Thubo Bam chiu ku-e, sise gaphek chakiu theng-e khatdi gaphek chakiu di-e, sise Charakygu padet gapbo-e. Masan Thubo Bamgu singbeng situ taisin raleng kachia bawli
Natri kamboga kachia katup 570 thinpiu khai-e, khatdi nribo kichen-gu singbeng sidi kachianiu topsin khai-e.

Sichiujiu wakhao kania mengse tadngutbo bam masuangga zudaojiu chapkhai-e. Sise pakan nia-nia phung-e, siga niase chakhet khat kiurang nia theng-e, pakan niase kariopadjiu n-gangbo kichen-ga khat khattu niataojiu bamme khatdi pakan khatlamniu gaphek chakiu kumbo pathen padet dibo kichen-gu singbengga kariopad tungtangjiu bamme.
Masan Thubo Bamga jusungfai khat khaibose fainoi khatdi kakibo mania jaojiu kamkhai-e, sise kamaobo, kahengbo, khatdi hengmumbo niu palun thiukhaibo pakan phungbo khaoring lun kamkhai-e.
Chawangniu katiang nia kampadle, niase chakhet kariu mangiu paphan ku-e, khatdi sise Charaky masuangga khai-e. Sibo n-gangse chakhet khat kiurang nia kamkhai-e.
Katiang tonse phenlubo chagiriang khatdi tataagigu majongsyniu karu khai-e.
Sibo katiang niase Charaky tadngutbo bam mungga kam khai-e. Tingrun lam somkhaibo khat situ Jachin

Tataagi lujiu kambo mawengbo akhun khat pasukniu chakhet khat kiurang nia, palung sira n-gang gasu madad padbo chakhet nia kiurang madai, khatdi maguibose chakhet charuk kiurang chinnia dibo paniu kamkhai-e.
Akhun mung hinase paren nia thiujiu khat-khat riga akijiu karu khai-e. Karu khaibose matomchi lun kumjiu kam khai-e, sise akhun hinaga pajam-jam thiujiu kam khai-e.
Akhunse tataagi khoilujiu kambo matomchi kariu nia riga dungkhai nbamme. Sise sum thiujiu pake madaiga paliu zu mari khai nbamme.
Akhun-gu kasiubose ncheng 3 siu-e. Sibogu pimase chapiang pima kumme, nkuonkiubose charapen kumme. Akhun gase karung 60,000 kumbo ngutle.

Paliuniu tathikuang kariudi kamkhai-e, mangiu siniu Charaky gu tingrun lam khai-e khatdi mangiu siniu tingpilam khai-e. Pakhiangnase rukhaibo rathak thiuboga thinbo chakhao jan nkhiuboga thinpiu-e.Kadibo akhun ga bambo taduise singku maidungniu wa nkhiuboga thinpiu-e.
Paliuniu singkumai leng chiujiu nungbo kahiu khatdi ndanbo kahiu kamkhai-e. Kahiu nia kakga bambo rengmun gu kamunse tataagi khoilujiu topsin khai-e.
Akhunse Charaky mungga tingrun-tingbang lam kam khaibo-e.
Huram niu chali rammai, kavathuak rammai khatdi chakuangpoi rammaidi kampadle. Charaky jengniu paniu kamraleng Chawang Solomon khuga ladriat thiukhaibo hina paniu kamloi khaide:
Katiang nia
Katiang pimaga chakuang lun kumbo Paton nia
Paton kaniaga phenlubo chagiriangniu palun thiu khaibo
Palun thiukhai bambo paton niaga paren nia thiujiu
tataagi khoilujiu kambo majongsy kai madainiu kam magui khaibo
Matom kari kariu
Tathikuang kariu
Akhun
Matomchi kariu-je niakiuniu akhuntu tungbambo
Chalirammai, kavathuak rammai khatdi akheton machumbo rammai.
Huram niu tasiam simaigu papao thiulujiu tataagi kam masan kalubo gasu haibo hina,
Jordan ramjengga Zeredah
Haijiukha kampad khaibo maniagu tataagi ripse mai khatniudi madiu maningpad makge.
Chawang Solomon niu Charaky leng kachiagu maniadung kampadbo siniu: rathakbam khatdi Tingwang leng taruak kadkhaibo kuangkai,
Masan Thubo Bam suangga matao rabo kachia kawiboniu kamlubo chamibung nai padung rammai;
karu khairabo rapendung, chamibung rammai, khatdi takap rammai,

chamibung riang kakit rabo mania rammai, tathikuang poi rammai, maruta khai raleng chakuang rammai khatdi mitikang ponraleng khangli rammai chiujiu Chawang Solomon gu bamme. Haibo mania pakhiangna hai kachia masanbo khoilujiu kambo-e. Charakygu ndanbo kamun rammai nai Masan Thubo Bamse kachia niu topsin khai-e.
Paliu mathiuse Gomlubo Changeega wang maduide.
Jupaodung mathiu madui lubo saiga, Levi maidungniu Ladriat Bungse ponkhang-e.
Sichiujiu sise Charakyga ponwang khaide. Singku maidung nai Levi maidungniu
Chawang Solomon nai Israel mai hina Ladriat Bung masuangga wang madui lujiu matom-kabui khatdi pariak kengbo milysung charathiu khaide—pariak keng jujiu singam lumakge.
Sigasu singkumainiu
Paliugu kariopadbo kan siniu Ladriat Bung nai kaponbo pektu gomsin khai-e.
Mai khatniu Masan Thubo Bam masuang siakga chaplujiu phuisai kaponbo pek tonse ngao-e, chiudi kakibo bam gasu phuisai ngao makge. (Patangse nthai katang siga bamkha-e)
Sibo Chamriat Bung gasu Israel maidungniu Egypt gasu npadbo lon Sinai Luongga
khatdi pagu lungsabo hai tingtheng-e.”
Haichiujiu singkumainiu Charaky situ phutsuboga bungjiu
Sigasu Chawang Solomon niu kakheng thiu sude:
Nagu makendibo siniu tingtheng lungrabo bam khat
tuhoira Iniu thiukhaide.”
Israel mai hina siga chap bamme. Chawangniu paliu khulam pazu mari lujiu paliu riga Tingwang gu thoidam khengkhai-e.
Paniu din-e, “Israel mai Rawang

‘Iniu amaidungtu Egypt gasu majang npadbo wan gasu tuhoi katangbo atu kahumrabo bamleng Israel maigu kadihga bambo namdi khatnadi Iniu kada makge, khatdi Iniu amaidungtu jukhaira mai khattudi kada makge.
Chiudi tuhoira Jerusalem haiga atu kahumrabo bamleng khatdi David nangniu amaidung riga mawang raleng kada khaide.’
Khatdi Solomon niu dinkiu-e, “Apiu David niu Israel maigu
chiudi
Chiudi nangniu wadaodi sise thiulu lakge. Sise na-nahpiu, na-nahsiakniu atu kahumrabo Kise thiusu rabo-e!’
“Tuhoidi
Israel maidung khuga
Sigasu Solomon niu maidung bambo gasu tadngut lujiu rathakbam masuangga chaplujiu paben henpadjiu kakheng thiu-e.

(Solomon niu tataagi khoilujiu kambo tacham dinmai chapra wakai donkhai nbamme, khatdi sise kahiu n-gangga bamme. Sise pathen padet chakhet khat kiurang nia-e khatdi tachao nia kiurang sum ku-e. Paniu tacham dinmai chapra wakai gase buangkhang lujiu, mai hinaniu patu ngaolu buiboga khudung kiu-e, khatdi paben tinggen lam henkhang-e).

Paniu kakheng thiu-e, “Israel mai Rawang yo, tinggen nai kadihpiri lungga bambo chara khatnadi nakumbo ha-e. Nangniu namai khuga ladriat khaibose majaikhai bide, khatdi paliuniu chalung ngutjiu nacham majaiboga nagu lungsabose paliutu lenkhai bide.
Apiu David khuga nangniu ladriat khaibose nangniu wadi kali makge, sibo lad hinase thainai tathui khai bide.
Tuhoira Israel mai
Siniu tuhoira, Israel mai Rawang
a-Rawang yo, I hai navang-e. Arathoi hai nking khailo khatdi Iniu nakhuga khengbo haise pikhailo.
Nchun n-nien haibo Raky tu akhe khailo. Haibo bam gasu natu kahum rabo-e chiujiu nangniu ladriat thiukhai-e, siniu haibo Raky lam azu mari lujiu kakheng thiubo wan-ga akhuan nking khailo.
Haibo Raky lam paliu zu mari lujiu kakheng thiubo wan-ga namaidunggu rathoi nai agu rathoi chiukhailo. Naky tinggen gasu aliu rathoi chiukhaijiu aliu nuan kuak khailo.
“Mai khattu kamao madam khaijiu haibo Rakyga tasiang siangra majang wangbo wan-ga, pase pamao ha-e sai,
nagu tinggen gasu nking khaijiu navangmaitu ladjan thiukhailo. Kamaomai situ pamao jengniu sajai pikhailo khatdi pamao hamaitu lepad khailo, Hey
“Namaidungniu natu atungjiu nuan kam mibo gasu paliugu mikre maidungniu paliutu kamkao mibo tingga paliuniu nakhuga ariwang haibo Rakyga wanglujiu, manon kiujiu nakhuga kuakkhai raleng khengboga,
tinggen gasu paliu khuan nking khailo. Namaidung nuan kuak khailo khatdi nangniu paliuleng khatdi paliu pao-peh maileng pikhai mibo kadihga paliutu majangwang khailo.
“Namaidungniu natu atungjiu nuan kammibo gasu nangniu pi tingriu khai tamibo tingga, paliuniu paliu lung lilujiu, haibo Rakyga mariwang lujiu, manonkiujiu nakhuga kakheng thiusai,
Hey

“Haibo kadihga chakhum wangbo maksai chararen wangbo maksai miusytu tingthungniu maksai takaodungniu kam masa mibo tingga, maksai namaidungtu paliugu mikre maidungniu chari thiuboga, maksai paliu khuga thiuniubo wangbo tingga,
paliu rathoi nking khailo. Namai Israel mai ruanggasu, palung chariu jujiu, haibo Raky gasu paliu ben henpadjiu kakheng thiusai,
paliu rathoi chiukhailo. Naky tinggen gasu paliu rathoi nking khailo khatdi paliu nuan kuak khailo. Naronna chamaina lungchun sibo-e.
Nangniu aliu pao-peh maileng pikhaibo kadihga paliuniu nalad piujiu natu chakhuang thiujiu namaidungniu lunglu raleng, paniu-paniu kamkhai mibo kumjiu kamkhailo.

“Kadiubo kadih lam lungjiu bambo sangdiu mainiu nang-hai dejiuga tanlo khatdi dilo chiubo chiulujiu nangra tatien thiukhaira pawan machang kadenjiu bambo-e chiubo sijiu, paniu haibo Rakyga kakheng thiura wangboga,

parathoi nking khailo. Nangniu bambo tinggen gasu pakhuan nking khailo, khatdi namaidung Israel mainiu kambo kumjiu, kadihpiriga lung bambo mai hinaniu natu silujiu nalad piulu raleng, paniu khengbose kamkhailo. Sichiusai haibo Raky, Iniu thiukhaibo haise natu kahumbo bamme chiubo paliuniu silune.

“Namaidungniu paliugu mikremaitu atungjiu charithiu raleng tadpadra nangniu chamtan piboga, paliu tadkhaibo bam hinaga nangniu kadakhaibo namdi Iniu naleng thiukhaibo Raky lam mari lujiu paliuniu nakhuga kakheng thiubo tingga,
paliu rathoi nking khailo. Tinggen ga paliu rathoi chiukhailo khatdi paliutu pijiu chari ngam khailo.

“Namaidungniu natu atungjiu nuan kam miboga khatdi mai khatnadi nuan kam makbo hamiboga—khatdi nagu lungpomniu paliutu kamkao khaijiu paliutu mai dihga kavangthiu raleng, kadiubo kadihlam lutadmi bamdi,
namaidunggu rathoi chiukhailo. Sibo kadihga paliu lung lipadjiu, aliu hai kasamai-e chiujiu, paliu mao madu padjiu nakhuga kakheng thiusai,

Sibo kadihga paliuniu nchang majijiu chalung lijiu, nangniu paliu pao-peh maileng pikhaibo kadih, nangniu kadakhai mibo namdi khatdi Iniu naleng thiukhaibo Raky lam, paliu zu marilujiu, nakhuga kakheng thiusai,
siga paliu rathoi nking khailo. Naky tinggen gasu paliu khuan nking khailo khatdi paliutu lungsa khailo khatdi namaidunggu nuan hina kuak khailo.
“Tuhoira, Hey, a-Rawang yo, aliutu phui khailo khatdi haibo bamgasu khengbo rathoi nking khailo.

Tingwang, nagu pumtan-gu madan thiujiu, Ladriat Bung jaojiu, tuhoira chapsulo. Naraky haiga ngutjiu tingtheng bammilo. Nagu singkudung hinatu paliuniu kamboga thoidam khailo, khatdi paliutu nangniu kawi kamkhai bibo jengniu namaidungtu pi sanwibo thiukhailo.
Tingwang yo, nangniu kada khai mibo Chawang situ luthon khai tulo. Navangpiu David khuga nangniu lungsa khai mibose maningtao khailo.”
Singkudungniu Charaky ngut ngam lulak mide, palamra benran ranbo nbiu siniu Charaky phuimide.

Tinggen lamsu chami langkiujiu Charaky lungga kabenboniu phuimibo, Israel maidungniu ngaoluboga paliu zu kadihga makhumkiu lujiu Tingwang tu kahumme khatdi pagu kawibo nai pagu tingtheng lungsabo situ thuon sude.
Sigasu Solomon khatdi chamai hina charathiujiu
Paniu matom-kabui pi 22,000 khatdi aruanggu thiujiu mily 120,000 niu charathiu khaide haichiujiu paliuniu aruanglujiu Charaky kadpat khaide.
Singkudungniu paliutu pikhaijiu bambo bamdung riga chaplujiu, khatdi Levi maidungniu paliu khulam chap marilujiu Chawang David niu pikhai diakbo chaluigu tarabung thinlujiu

Solomon niu n-gangbo kahiu nai Charaky masuang, pawonjeng hinase kam masan khai-e, khatdi sigasu nphong kadkhaibo, alin tara kadpatbo, khatdi aruanggu kadpatbogu wasa chiujiu kadpadjiu charathiu khai-e. Haise kamkhaibo lamra tataagi khoilujiu kambo rathakbamga kadpatbo hina khairaleng siamju kami jengniu-e.

Solomon khatdi Israel mai pakhiangnaniu Gomlubo changee jeng chinnia mania-e. Siga chamai wajiu maidungse diuchang diubo tingpilam Hamath Pass khatdi tingrunlam Egypt maigu ramrai katangbo gasu wang bamme.
Paliuniu jeng chinnia rathakbam kadpadboga, khatdi jeng chinnia changeeboga jaojiu bamkhaide. Kanambo tingmikga changeebose loikhaide.
Khatdi pasaibo nai, pachinniabo hiugu naimikpui makai-je-sumkiubo nai, Solomon niu maidung situ paliu kylam langkhai mide.
Chawang Solomon niu Charaky nai chawangkining paniu kamraleng marang khaibo kumjiu kam tathui lubo saiga,
niu pakhuga nchun madulen khai-e. Paniu pakhuga din-e, Iniu narathoi chiukhaide, khatdi haibo Rakyga charathiujiu akhuga kadkhai rabo bamleng Iniu lukhai-e.
Iniu tingdui pikiuta khaibo wan-ga, maksai alin tara tiu mahara takaodung langkhaibo wan-ga, maksai amaidung khuga chararen wangbo wan-ga,
paliuniu kamaobo kambo gasu paliu lung lilujiu akhuga kakheng thiusai, siga Iniu tinggen gasu paliu khuan chiukhaijiu paliugu nuan kuak khaibi rabo-e khatdi paliugu kadihtu pi lungwi khailan rabo-e.
Iniu haibo Rakytu khuanbam rabo-e khatdi haigasu khengbo rathoi hina chiukhaira kaden lude.
Palamra haibo bam gasu tingthengjiu atu kahumbo bam thiuraleng Iniu kada lujiu kam masan khai mibo-e. Pawan machang Iniu akhe khaijiu haibo bamtu gukhaijiu bamrabo-e.
Iniu nakhuga chamtan pikhai mibo hina kamjiu agu tacheng-tajai piujiu, napiu David niu kamkhai mibo kumjiu chamchangjiu atu macha bamsai,
nakai-nakik mainiu Israel mai riga pawan machang mawang raleng napiu David khuga ladriat thiukhai mibose majaikhai rabo-e.
Chiudi Iniu nakhuga chamtan pikhaibo tacheng-tajaise nangniu khatdi namaidungniu majai makjiu, kakibo radungtu kahum misai,

siga Iniu natu pikhaibo kadih gasu Iniu natu luthonmi rabo-e, khatdi atu kahum raleng Iniu kam masan khaibo Raky haitu Iniu phutmi rabo-e. Chiusai pabam hinaga maidungniu Charaky situ wathao thiu makjiu nuimensu rabo-e.
“Charaky haisitu tuhoira chakhuangthiu mawijiu bamme, chiudi siga tadken mai hina paliu suang hajiu maniu sune, ‘Nde kamjiu
Maidungniu paokak rabo-e, ‘Paliu pao-peh maitu Egypt gasu majang npadbo paliu
Solomon niu pagu chawangkining nai Charaky kathiuboga takum makai ngutle.
Chawang Hiram niu patu pikhaibo namdi rammai sidi thiusu khai lande, khatdi Israel maidungtu siga lungraleng langkhaide.
Paniu Hamath nai Zobah Luongriangtu haphun lujiu
kathaidihga bambo Hamath namdiga charireng thiukhaide. Hamath ga bambo namdi hina thiusu lujiu siga katiu-kasak pipadbo bamleng kam khaide.
Solomon niu haibo: Nribo Beth Horon nai N-hangbo Beth Horon namdidung thiusu lu-e: (namdidungse charireng kamlujiu rengmun lepad-lengut suibo leng kamkhai-e),

Baalath gu namdi, khatdi namdi hinaga wa mania pipad rabo bamdung paniu kam khai-e, khatdi sibo namdi rammaiga chaqondung nai chaqon-karidung khai makhuan khai-e. Paniu chaky thiurabo leng marang khaibo kumjiu Jerusalem ga, Lebanon ga, khatdi paniu mawangbo kadih pakhiangnaga thiu khai-e.

Israel maidungniu Canaan kadih lubo tingga kamshat lumakbo Canaan mai kaikik hinatu manomjiu changam pijiu kamkhai-e. Sibo maidung ruangga; Hitt mai, Amon mai, Periz mai, Hiv mai, khatdi Jebus mai chiujiu jao-e, paliu kaikikdung hai nthai katangbo saomakjiu kavang thiujiu bamme.
Israel maidungtu matanjiu changamga thinpiu makge, chiudi riphenmai thiuboga, chakampaodung thiuboga chaqon-karigu papeedung thiuboga, khatdi chaqon tuangmaidungtu machaboga thinpiu-e.
Chaky katam tambo thiuboga manomjiu changamga thinpiu maidungtu phuiraleng chakampao maidung 250 khai-e.

Solomon niu panao, Egypt maigu chawang nahpuitu David gu namdi gasu paniu paleng thiukhaibo kyga pilung khai mide. Paniu din-e, “Pahai Israel maigu chawang David gu chawangkiningga lungmak rabo-e, palamra Ladriat Bung khai nbambo bamse masanbo-e.”
Charaky masuangga paniu thiukhaibo rathakbamga Solomon niu charathiujiu kadpatle.

Masanbo tingmik machang Mose gu Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu: Tabamnai gu, Hiusan gu Changee , khatdi Takum kaloibogu changee sumgu, --Chakhi khai makbo Taruak Ngeega, khatdi Gomlubo Ngeega rukhaibo rathak paniu kadpatle.

Papiu David niu kamkhai diakbo tajaidung hai chiubora, naimachang singkudung nai singkudungtu nkhabo Levi maidung chalui thiubo khatdi paliu ngam kambose paniu suikhai-e. Tingwang mai thiubo, David niu chamtan pikhaibo saisuijiu, nai machangna Charaky khuanmaidungniu paliu ngam kamjiu rengmun hina khuanbose paniu suikhai-e.
David niu singkudung khatdi Levi maidungtu wakhaiky lamga khatdi kakibo lamga katikhaibose machangjiu kadpatle.
Haichiujiu Solomon gu changam hina kam tathui khai lude.
Sigasu Solomon niu Edom kadihga bambo Aqaba gu Ajaibek ga bambo aliam mathakbam, Eziongeber khatdi Elath lam tadle.

Chawang Hiram niu pagu chakampaoniu papee thiubo, aliam taisibo mainiu thinbo aliamga paleng langkhai-e. Paliuniu Solomon gu chakampaodungtu majang lujiu Ophir kadihga mengjiu Solomon leng kachia taju sang kariu-je mangiu suang kengjiu phungwang-e.
Paniu pakhiangna kenkak khaibide, palengra wadi din masan padra kung kajubo ha-e.
Sheba gu chawangpuiniu Solomon gu ningtingbo situ chiulude khatdi paniu thiukhaibo chawangkiningse ngao lude.

Pagu chakuang kaiga machakhaibo tiutekdung, pagu chakampaodungniu lungbo kidung, pawangkiningga bambo maidungniu piubo pondung, pagu chakhuang-changeega khuanbo kavangdung khatdi Charakyga charathiu maidunggu fai-nidung hinase paniu ngao lude. Siga pasuang hajiu pasiu thipad silak mide.
Paniu chawang khuga din-e, “Iniu agu kadih gasu nalamga khatdi nagu ningtingbo raha chiulubose maji-e!
Iniu apumsiak tadlujiu ngaolu makthen, paliuniu kadinbose I malum makge. Iniu nagu ningting lamga paphan katangdi chiulu makbo-e. Nangra maidungniu dinbambo suang ningting nkiu-e.
Nangniu kabambo bamga bamjiu natu machajiu bambo khatdi nagu ningting cham kadinboga nkingtao lujiu bambo maidungse dejiukha paliu sanwilo!
Na-Rawang

Paniu phungwangbo kalendungse, paniu Chawang Solomon leng kachia taju sang madai suang kengbo khatdi parim wibo wamud nai tiuchang kengkha pikhaide. Chawang Solomon leng Sheba gu chawangpuiniu pikhaibo parimwibo wamud kumjiu kawibo ha-e.
(Chawang Solomon nai Chawang Hiram maidungniu Ophir gasu kachia, tiuchang, khatdi juniper sing phungwang-e.
Sibo sing thinjiu Solomon niu Charaky nai pagu chawangkininggu tason kamme, khatdi chalui thiumaileng nthiam-tarabung kamme. Judah kadihga haikumbo hai wadaodi ngaokhai matai makge).

Sheba gu chawangpuiniu kakhengbo hina Chawang Solomon niu pikhai bide. Haidungse paniu kalen phungwangbo situ nkhiakbo riga khaisanbo-e. Sichiujiu patu machamai situ maluang lujiu pagu Sheba kadihlam malanwang mide.
Takum machangna Chawang Solomon niu ramkha gasu kachia taju sang makai-je-sumkiu kumbo daobambo gasu, nkiujiu
chali-thiumai nai alimaidung khugasu dao-e. Arabia maigu chawangdung nai Israel maigu luongriang gasu dithinpaodung niudi kachia nai rangkang pakhuga phungwang-e.
Solomon niu chagee kai-nia kam padle, pakhiangnase kadamlubo kachia taju chinnia kumboniu topsin khai-e,
khatdi siambibo chagee kai-sumdi kam padle, pakhiangnase kadamlubo kachia taju sum kumboniu topsin khai-e. Pakhiangna haise paniu Lebanon gu Mariukajing ga
Chawangniu chawangbam kadibo khat kamkhai-e. kasialam chapuang himniu topsin khai-e, kakilam sira kachia masanboniu topsin khai-e.
Chawangbamga khangrabose phikem charuk bamme, sibo phipanse kachianiu topman khai-e. Chawangbamga chaben khairabo leng pajai nialam bamme, khatdi pake hinaga ndongqui meng kamkhai nbamme.
Chaphipan gase ndongqui meng kariu-je niakiu bamme, chaphipan pake niaga khat khat khai-e. Haikumbo chawangbam hai kakibo chawang maigu wadi ha-e.
Chawang Solomon gu chapiang hinase kachianiu kamme, khatdi Lebanon gu Mariu Kyga thinbo chakuang chapiang hinase masanbo kachianiu kamme, Solomon ken ga rangkangtu waleng chakkhai makge,

Duipuiga tadbo pagu maleedung thinbo papeemai nai Chawang Hiram gu maleedung thinbo papee thiu maidung khat thiulujiu tadle. Takum sum machangna, malee thinbo papee thiu maidung siniu kachia, rangkang chapuang-him. kapengdung khatdi tajongdung chiujiu phungwang-e.
Kadihpiriga Chawang kakimai suang, Chawang Solomon niu kalekwi nkiu khatdi ningting nkiu-e.
Tingwang niu pakhuga pikhaibo ningtingtu nkingra paliu mathiuniu palad maniu-e.
Paliu mathiuse Solomon khuga kalen thiujiu—kachia, rangkang, ntiang taronbo, chari-mania, parim wibo wamud, chaqondung, khatdi qonniamdung chiujiu pikhai-e. Haise takum machangna tadjiu bambo-e.

Chawang Solomon gu chaqon rammai khatdi chaqon-kari rammai khaibo chaky sang madai khatdi chaqon-rimai sang kariu niakiu chiujiu bamme. Kasia situ paniu Jerusalem ga khai-e, kasiatu katam tambo namdiga khai-e.
Pahai Euphrate Giuki gasu Philistine dih khatdi Egypt gu ramrai katangbo chawangmai hina ruangga tanthubo mawangpao-e.
Paniu mawangbo wan-ga rangkang hai tatukang kumjiu mathiu thinne khatdi cedar singse Judah gu chaphi npuiga bambo thinpiu makbo singdung kumjiu mali-malan bamme.
Solomon niu chaqondungse Musri

Solomon niu mawangbo racham kasu ganiu kanambo katang, haiga raokhai makbose phaimiukakung Nathan Rachamga, Ahijah niu Shiloh ga phaimiu cham dinbo Rachamga, khatdi Phaimiukakung Iddo gu Madungao Rachamga, raokhai bamme, sise Jerusalem gu chawang Jeroboam niu mawangbo gudi raokhai nbamme.
Solomon niu Jerusalem ga chawang thiujiu Israel mai kadih pakhiangna takum atai mawang-e.
Pah shaimibo ga David gu Namdiga nbai khai-e, siga panahpiu Rehoboam niu patu malinjiu chawang thiude.
Rehoboam niu Shechem ga tadjiu siga tingpilam bambo Israel mai hinatu ku maduilujiu patu chawang pi thiukhaira kamde.
Nebat nahpiu Jeroboam niu Chawang Solomon khugasu Egypt lam paktad mibo piuniu haise chiulujiu chakyga malan wangde.
Tingpilam bambo kiphiudungniu patu kulujiu khatdi paliu mathiu aruang lujiu Rehoboam khuga mengjiu pakhuga din-e.
“Napiu Solomon niu aliuleng chabang karipbo aliu riga pikhai-e. Nangniu aliu bangrip kam masen khaine sai, khatdi aliutu pi lung n-jiukhiu khaine sai, aliu nawang hangga lungne.”
Rehoboam niu paokakge, “Sibo lamga makum raleng naimikpui sum atu pikhailo. Sigasu malan wanglo.” Sichiujiu maidungse tadmide.
Chawang Rehoboam niu papiu Solomon tu ladtipao thiujiu machamaidung, kating maidungtu npaojiu paniu maniu-e, “Haibo maidungtu dechiubo lad Iniu paokak khaira naliuniu atu ladpikhai ralo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Nangniu haibo maidungtu lungsa khaijiu, paliuniu khengboga masen lubuibo cham paokak khai bilo, chiusai paliuniu tingtheng natu machajiu nawang hangga lung rabo-e.”
Chiudi paniu kating maidungniu ladpikhaibo situ waleng chakmakjiu paniu pakangmaidung khuga tadlujiu paliutu pagu ladpimai pithiu khaide.
Paniu maniu-e. “Iniu degu kamraleng naliuniu atu dechiujiu ladpikhai ralo? Paliu bang kam masen khaira kheng maidung khuga Iniu dechiujiu paokak khai ralo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Haichiujiu nangniu paliu khuga paokak khai rabo-e: ‘Ajungna hai apiu khen suang dirabo-e.
Apiuniu naliutu chabang karidbo pikhaisai, Iniu sisuang karidbo pikhai rabo-e; Paniu naliutu singrangniu leksai, Iniu naliutu chaqontu kalekbo tangniu daprabo-e!’”
Jengsum saiga, Jeroboam khatdi maidungse Chawang Rehoboam khuga paniu dinkhaibo kumjiu malanwang lande.
Chawang siniu katingmaidunggu ladpikhaibose lukhai makjiu, paliu lad kasabo maidung,

chabon maidungniu ladpikhaibo kumjiu dinkhaide, paniu haichiujiu din-e, “Apiuniu naliu riga chabang karidbo khaibi-e sai; Iniu sisuang karidbo khaisanbi rabo-e. Paniu naliutu singrangniu lekkhai sai, naliutu Iniu chaqontu kadapbo tang khoilujiu daprabo-e!”
Haise Tingwang niu machunbo, Shiloh gasu phaimiukakung Ahijah niu Nebat nahpiu Jeroboam khuga dinkhai mibose wangtang khai raleng-e. Haijengniu, chawang siniu maidungtu wajeng sikhai makbo-e.
Sichiujiu Israel mainiu chari thiusu mide.
Judah kadihga lungbam mai riga ronna Rehoboam niu chawang thiuraleng khaidiak lujiu tadmide!

Sigasu Chawang Rehoboam niu pagu changam kambambo maigu chakampao Adoniram tu Israel maidung khuga langkhaide, siga paliuniu patu tatuniu rotshat mide. Siga Rehoboam niu kalangjiu chaqon tuanglujiu Jerusalem lam paktad mide.
Sibo wan gasu tingpilam bambo chawang kadihga bambo Israel maidungniu David kiriangmaitu chari thiusu mibo-e.

Chawang Rehoboam niu Jerusalem wangtangboga, Judah kiphiuga khatdi Benjamin kiphiuga paniu withubo charimai 180,000 tu kuwang maduide. Haichiu chari thiujiu tingpilam bambo Israel mai kiphiutu pawangkining bamga khailan raleng kamme.
Chiudi phaimiukakung Shemaiah khuga Tingwang niu din-e.
Champao haise Chawang Rehoboam khatdi Judah kiphiu khatdi Benjamin kiphiu mathiu khuga dinkhai bilo.
“Naliu singna, Israel maitu charithiu tulo. Naliu mathiuse chakylam wanglan sulo. Padbambose agu maning-e.” Paliuniu Tingwang gu chamtan piujiu Jeroboam tu chari thiura tadmak tamide.
Rehoboam niu Jerusalem ga bamlujiu pahangga bambo Judah khatdi Benjamin gu namdi dunggu charireng thiu khaide:
Bethlehem ga, Etam ga, Tekoa ga,
Bethzur ga, Soco ga, Adullam ga,
Gath ga, Mareshah ga, Ziph ga,
Adoraim ga, Lachish ga, Azekah ga,
Zorah ga, Aijalon ga, khatdi Hebron ga chiujiu thiukhaide.
Paniu charireng katanbo thiukhai lujiu pakhiangnaga charipi khat-khat kadakhai bide, khatdi mathiutu piraleng katiu-kasak, takisa, khatdi mumjaw,
khatdi chagee nai changiudi pikhaide. Sichiujiu paniu Judah mai khatdi Benjamin maitu ronna mawangbo-e.
Israel maigu luongriangga bambo singkudung nai Levi maidung mathiu tingrunlam Judah ga wang-e.
Levi maidungniu kalungbo ram saodia lujiu kakibo kadih Judah nai Jerusalem ga wang-e, palamra Israel maigu Chawang Jeroboam nai patu malinmai siniu paliutu pijiu
Jeroboam niu paronna singku thiura chamai lukhai lujiu nkengmai ratu machajiu kahumra, khatdi rasadungtu kahumra, khatdi matommeng damlubo ramengtu kahumra kamkhaide.
Israel mai Rawang,

Haisiniu Judah gu chawang kadihtu pumtan pibam khaibo-e, sichiujiu takum sum paliuniu Solomon nahpiu Rehoboam tu nkhade khatdi Chawang David nai Chawang Solomon niu mawangbo hangga bambo kumjiu lungde.
Rehoboam niu Mahalath tu panao thiu-e, papiuse David nahpiu Jerimoth-e, khatdi papuise Eliab nahpui Abihail khatdi Jesse tahpui-e.
Panainiu npiumai nah khangsum, Jeush, Shemariah, khatdi Zaham tu lung-e.
Pasai paniu Absalom nahpui Maacah tu panao ku-e, siga panai nah npiumai khang madai, Abijah, Attai, Ziza, khatdi Shelomith tu lung-e.

Rehoboam niu kubo panao pakhiangna kariu-je-tachad khatdi parammailiupui riak-charuk chiujiu npiumai makai-je-tachad khatdi npuimai nah riak charuk lung-e. Panao nai parammailiupui mathiu ruangga paniu Maacah tu lungsa nkiu-e,
khatdi paniu panah mai mathiu ruangga sibopui nah Abijah tu lungsabo lenjiu, patu malinjiu chawang thiura paniu kadakhaide.

Rehoboam niu ningtingjiu panah piudungniu parid phungrabo ngamdung pikhai bi-e, khatdi Judah nai Benjamin dihga charireng kamkhaibo namdidungga paliutu pijiu lungkhai-e. Paniu palung dijiu paliuleng machakhai bi-e khatdi paliu nao lengdi taliu khaibi-e.
Rehoboam niu chawang thiujiu pumtan thinsu gap chiuboga padi, pamaidung mathiudi
Rehoboam niu mawangbo takum mangiubo kumga
chaqon tongmai sang riak charuk khatdi pariak chaksi lulakbo riphendung, sigasu Libya mai, Sukki mai khatdi Sudan mai alianglujiu Jerusalem tu aphen sude.
Charireng thiu magui khai nbambo Judah maigu namdidungtu haphun lujiu Jerusalem katang ha-ngutle.
Shishak khugasu mari raleng Judah maigu jupaodung nai Chawang Rehoboam maduijiu bamga phaimiukakung Shemaiah tadle. Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Haise naliu khuga
Chawang nai jupaodungniu paliugu kamaobo situ maningtao lujiu, paliuniu din-e, “
Chiudi Shishak niu paliutu ngam lurabo-e, siga paliuniu atu machabo nai kakibo mawang paodungtu machaboga ncham kamakbose silu rabo-e.
Sise malin raleng, Rehoboam niu tataagigu chagee rammai kamme khatdi chawangkininggu rengmundungtu akhebogu parid phungbo chakampaodungtu sise phuiraleng kamkhaide.
Chawangniu Charaky tad machang akhe maidung siniu chageedung phunglu tadle sichiujiu sise akhebo kichen-ga khoiwang khailan mibo-e.
Paniu

Rehoboam niu Jerusalem ga mawangjiu pagu pumtanse nkiu khang-e. Paniu chawang thiubo wan ga pagu takum atai-je-khat tang mide, khatdi paniu Jerusalem ga takum kariu-je-chinnia mawang khai-e, Israel mai kadih pakhiangna ruangga sibo namdise
Paniu kasabose kamme, palamra

Rehoboam niu changam kamsubo gasu kaloibo katang khatdi pakikhunmai-gu raokhaibo hai phaimiukakung Shemaiah gu Rachamga khatdi phaimiukakung Iddo gu Rachamga daorabo-e. Rehoboam nai Jeroboam khatniu khattu saomakjiu charithiu-e.
Rehoboam shai miboga David namdiga bambo chawang mai rawga baikhai mide, khatdi panahpiu Abijah niu patu malinjiu chawang thiude.
Israel mai Wangpiu Jeroboam niu mawangbo takum kariu-je-tachadkiubo kumga, Abijah niu Judah mai wang thiude,
sichiujiu paniu takum sum Jerusalem ga mawang khaide. Papui hai Gibeah namdi gasu wangbo, Uriel nahpui Micaiah si-e.
Abijah nai Jeroboam kakga chari pad sude.
Abijah niu charibao khat riphenmai 400,000 tu majang lujiu charithiu sude, khatdi Jeroboam niu charibao khat, riphenmai 800,000 tu majang lujiu atungjiu charithiu sude.
Riphendungse Ephraim gu maluongramga adaode. Chawang Abijah niu Zemaraim Luongga khang lujiu Israel mai nai Jeroboam khuga din-e: “Alad nking khailo!
Israel mai Rawang,
Nebat nahpiu Jeroboam niu pagu chawang Solomon tu atungjiu chari thiusu mibo-e.
Pasai paniu pageng kahabo kasamai bao khattu majang lujiu Solomon nahpiu napoinakha bambo, Rehoboam, paliutu kham silakbo khuga manomjiu paliu maning kam mibo-e.
Tuhoi
Naliuniu
“Chiudi aliura

Nsuan machang khatdi chawan machang paliuniu parim wibo nai maring rukhaibo rathakse thiujiu bamme. Paliuniu chara chengga masanbo taruakse wakaiga khailujiu pipad bamme, khatdi chawan machangga kachiagu chamibung khaiga chamibung matao khai-e.
Tingwang papum siakniu aliugu jupao-e khatdi pagu singkumai haiga make mudraleng kaden lujiu bamme, naliutu atungjiu chari thiura aliutu kujiu bamme. Israel maidung yo, naliu pao-pehmai Rawang
Sichiu bambo wan ga Jeroboam niu charibao kasianiu meng Judah maigu riphendungtu paliu sailamsu chon raleng langkhaide, sibo wan ga kasianiu paliu masuangga paliutu asun bambo-e.
Judah maidungniu ajanjiu phuiwangboga paliutu taomagui kamibose ngaode. Siga paliuniu
Judah maidungniu chakhuan tanjiu makiak sude, khatdi Abijah niu jupao thiujiu paliutu chari asun sude, Tingwang niu Jeroboam nai Israel maidungtu ngam khai bide.
Israel maidungse Judah maidung khugasu pakmide, khatdi Tingwang niu Judah maidungtu charise ngam khai bide.
Abijah nai pagu riphendungniu Israel maidungtu kam masajiu chari ngam lude—Israel maigu withubo riphenmai sang ringiutu kamshat mide.
Sichiujiu Judah maidungniu Israel maidung riga chari ngam lude, palamra paliuniu paliu pao-pehmai Rawang,
Abijah niu Jeroboam riphendungtu hatadjiu pagu namdi kasia: Bethel, Jeshanah, Ephron khatdi sibo namdidung mungga bambo namdungtu sutlude.
Abijah niu mawangbo ken-ga Jeroboam gu pumtan wadaodi wanglan makge. Kanamboga,
Chiubamdi Abijah haira tan khang nkiu sude. Pahai, panao kariu-je-madai-e khatdi panah npiumai makai-je-niakiu-e khatdi npuimai kariu-je-charukkiu piu-e.
Abijah gu Racham khaitang makbo, paniu dinkhaibo nai paniu kamkhaibose Phaimiukakung Iddo gu Rachamga raokhai bamme.
Chawang Abijah shaijiu David namdiga bambo chawang maigu rawga baikhai mide. Panahpiu Asa niu patu malinjiu chawang thiude, khatdi Asa hangga sibo kadihse takum kariu agi-manaijiu lungkhai-e.
Asa niu majibo nai kawibo kambo jengniu,
Paniu nkengmaigu rathak bamdung nai nkengmaigu kahumbo bamdung luthon mide, masanbo tusom kamkao mide, khatdi charapui Asherah mengse rathon mide.
Paniu Judah maidungtu paliu pao-pehmai Rawang,
Paniu Judah gu namdidung gasu nkengmaigu kahumbo bamdung khatdi parimwibo rukhaibo bamdung kam maha mibo jengniu pagu chawang kadihse paniu mawangbo ken gara agi-manaijiu lung-e.
Paken gase paniu Judah mai namdidungse charireng thiukhaide, khatdi pakak kathengkha chari thiumakge, palamra
Paniu Judah maidung khuga din-e, “Aliuniu namdi hinagu charireng khatdi chaky-ton kamkhaikhe, khatdi rengmundungse akhamlujiu khamten suirabo leng kam khaikhe. Aliu Rawang

Chawang Asa niu pagu riphenmai Judah gasu chagee thinmai khatdi changiu thinmai 300,000 bamme khatdi Benjamin gasu chagee thinmai khatdi tavaipi thinmai 280,000 bamme. Paliu mathiuse kati mawilu mai khatdi kahumai maliang-e.
Zerah kubo Sudan mai khatniu charibao khat chamai moi khat khatdi chaqon-kari kai sum puilujiu Judah tu aphenjiu Mareshah katang ha-ngutle.
Asa niu padjiu patu chari asunde, khatdi charibao niase Mareshah mungga bambo Zephathah Ramjengga paliugu charibam lusude.
Asa niu pa-Rawang
Asa nai Judah riphenniu paliutu asunbo wan ga
siga Asa nai pagu riphendungniu paliutu Gerar katang hatadle. Siga Sudan maidung kengkhatu kamshat mide, sichiujiu Sudan mai riphendungse charithiu ngam lulak mide.
Sigasu paliuniu Gerar wonjengga bambo namdi rammaitu kam maha mide, sichiujiu maidungniu
Paliuniu mily khuanmaigu rijiky tudi asunjiu mily nai qontrao pariak wajiukha sutlude. Sichiujiu paliuse Jerusalem lam malanwang mide.
Oded nahpiu Azariah riga Tingwang gu hiupuina wang kiukhaide,
siga paniu chawang Asa tu adao raleng tadle. Paniu din-e, “Benjamin mai khatdi Judah maidung mathiu, khatdi chawang Asa yo, alad nking khailo! Naliuniu
Palamra pawan kathengga Israel maidungniu majibo Tingwang jaomakjiu, paliutu katikhai rabo singkudung jaomakjiu, khatdi tacheng-tajai jaomakjiu lungkhai mibo-e.
Chiudi chariubo wangbo wan ga, paliuniu Israel mai Rawang
Sibo wan gara mai khatniudi tadpad tadngut ngamlu makge, palamra kadih pabam hinaga kasabo nai chariuboniu phui-e.
Jat khatniu jat khattu kam masa-e, khatdi namdi khatniu namdi khattu kam masa-e, palamra Tingwang niu chariubo nai magenthiubo paliu riga piwang khai-e.
Chiudi naliu hai matanlulo khatdi nkhinmi tulo. Naliuniu kam bambo ngam hinagu tathuonse pikhai rabo-e.”

Oded nahpiu Azariah niu sailad dinpadbo hai Asa niu chiulujiu, palung thiukhang mide. Paniu Judah mai khatdi Benjamin mai khuga bambo charameng hina khatdi paniu haphun lubo Ephraim maigu bambo charameng hina kakhiu taliang kam mide. Sichiujiu paniu
Asa gu chawang kadih gase Ephraim, Manasseh, khatdi Simeon gasu chamai kengkha wangde, palamra
Asa niu chawang thiubo takum kariu mangiubogu chahiu pasumboga paliu mathiu Jerusalem ga wang aruangde.
Sibo naise paliuniu chari gasu sungwangbo: matom-kabui kai chinnia khatdi mily sang chinnia chiujiu
Paliu pao-pehmai Rawang,
Mai khatkumbo, katingmaidi, nahmaidi, maipuidi, maipiudi patu kahummak maitu kamshat mirabo-e.
Haichiujiu paliuniu ladriatse piurabo-e chiujiu chakhuan khat thiujiu
Judah maidung hina paliu chunwide palamra paliu lung ngutsiakjiu haibo ladriatse kamkhaide.

Chawang Asa niu papeh Maacah tu chawangpui thiubambo pabam gasu lupad mide. Palamra paniu kadihtam wibo charapui Asherah mengkhat kampadle. Asa niu charamengse kamkao lujiu sise kamtap-tap lujiu Kidron Ramjengga rumide.
Sichiujiu Asa niu sibo kadihga nkengmaidunggu kahumbo bam hina kam mahakam mimak tadi, pagu karingtingga paniu
Paniu kadpatbo kachia rangkang hinadi, papiu Abijah niu Tingwang khuga kadkhai mibo hinadi paniu Charakyga kadkhaide.
Pagu mawangken takum samriu-mangiukiu tangbo lungga tathiu-chari wakhatdi bam makge.

Judah maigu chawang Asa niu mawangbo takum samriu charukbo kumga, Israel maigu chawang Baasha niu Judah ga chari thiuwang-e khatdi Judah gasu tadpad tadngutbo khammi raleng Ramah ga charireng kamsude.
Sijeng gasu Asa niu Charaky nai chawangkininggu chakhiu-chalan, kachia-rangkang khoilujiu Syria gu chawang Benhadad khuga champao jaojiu sise Damascus ga langkhaide;

“Ania piuniu khat thiubo kumjiu, aniadi khat thiukhe, Haibo kachia nai rangkangse naleng kalen thiujiu pikhaibo-e. Agu kadih gasu Israel maigu chawang Baasha tu khatdi pagu riphenmaitu hapad luraleng nangniu patu aruangjiu khat thiubambose thiuta milo.”

Asa niu khengbose Benhadad niu suikhaide khatdi pagu charipidung nai paliugu riphendungniu Israel mai namdidungtu asunra langkhaide. Paliuniu Ijon, Dan, Abel Beth, Maacah, khatdi mania khaimaduibo bam Naphtali gu namdi hina haphun lude.
Chawang Baasha niu padbambose chiulubo jengniu paniu Ramah ga charireng kambambose sao mide.

Sigasu chawang Asa niu Judah dih pakhiangna gasu maidungtu kumadui lujiu Ramah ga Baasha niu thinpiu bambo singpumdung nai tatudung ponthon mira paliutu chamtan pikhaide, khatdi paliuniu sise khoilujiu Geba nai Mizpah gu namdi rammaiga charireng kamde.
Sibo wan-ga phaimiukakung Hanani niu chawang Asa khuga menglujiu din-e, “Nangniu
Sudan mai nai Libya maigu riphendung haise, chaqon- kari nai chaqon tongmai kengjiu bammak jiuma? Chiudi nangniu
niu patu chakhuangthiu maidungtu pumtan pikhai raleng, kadihpiri pakhiangnaga akhejiu phui bamme. Nangniu kamengbo tien kammide, siniu tuhoi gasu pawan machang chari thiujiu bammi rabo-e.”
Phaimiukakung siniu haise dinkhaiboga Asa lung kampomsui mide sijengniu ratlujiu khai nbam mide. Sigasu Asa niu maidung khangsiatu kam masa sude.
Asa niu mawang subo gasu kaloibo racham hai Israel mai khatdi Judah mai Wangdunggu Rachamga raokhai nbamme.
Asa niu chawang thiubo takum samriu chakiubo kumga, paphi kathiubo ra marajiu tadpad silak mide; chiubamdi paniu
Takum nia sailam pah shai mide,

sichiujiu David Namdiga papum siakniu tatu bungkhai nbambo rawga patu bai khai mide. Patu bairaleng paliuniu parimwibo wasa manuk khai-e, khatdi patu kahuibo thiujiu paliuniu n-mang kadibo khat thiukhai-e.
Jehoshaphat niu papiu Asa wangbam malin lujiu, Israel maitu atungjiu pachap lumatip sude.
Paniu pagu riphendung situ, Asa niu haphun lubo Ephraim luongrianggu namdi, Judah maigu kadih khatdi charireng bambo namdiga pijiu bamkhai-e.
niu Jehoshaphat tu thoidam pikhai-e palamra paniu papiugu lungkhang karaibo lunlung saisui-e, khatdi Baal tu kahum makge.
Paniu papiu Rawang tu macha-e, khatdi pagu chamtan piu-e, khatdi Israel maigu chawangdungniu kambo kumjiu kam makge.

niu Jehoshaphat tu pijiu Judah maigu chawangdih thin matipra pikhai bide, khatdi maidung kakengniu paleng kalen phungwang-e, haijeng gasu pahai kalek wijiu maidungniu patu chakhuang thiuchang thiumibo-e.
Paniu
Paniu mawangbo pasumbo kumga chakampaodungtu Judah gu namdidung: Benhail, Obadiah, Zechariah, Nethanel, khatdi Micaiah ga katikhaira paniu langkhaide.

Paliutu Levi mai khang chakiu nai singkumai khang nianiu maluang tadle. Levi maidungse Shemaiah, Nethaniah, Zebadiah, Asahel, Shemiramoth, Jehonathan, Adonijah, Tobijah, khatdi Tobadonijah paliu-e. Sigasu singkumai siniu Elishama nai Jehoram-e.
Paliuniu
Lung magui bambo chawang hinaniu chawang Jehoshaphat tu atungjiu charithiu pingra
Philistine mai khangsianiu Jehoshaphat leng kachia nai katam-tambo kalendung kengjiu phungwang-e, khatdi Arab mai khangsianiu paleng mily 7,700 khatdi kami 7,700 phungwang-e.
Haijengniu Jehoshaphat hai pumtan bam nkiubi-bi mide. Judah dih pakhiangnaga paniu katanbo charireng khatdi namdidung thiukhai lujiu,
khatdi maniadung kengkha khailujiu pipad rabo bam kamkhai-e.
Paliugu kiriang saisuijiu, papee-para thiubo chakampaodungtu Jerusalem ga bamraleng paniu kamkhai-e.
Judah mai kiriang gasu Adnah niu riphenmaigu munranpao thiu-e, sichiujiu pahangga riphenmai 300,000 bamme.
Niabo munranpiu siniu Jehohanan-e, pahangga riphenmai 280,000 bamme,
khatdi pasumbo munranpao siniu Zichri nahpiu, Amasiah-e, pagu riphenmai siniu 200,000 ye. (Amasiah niu papum kadpadjiu
Benjamin maigu kiriang gasu, riphendunggu munranpao Eliada niu, papee-para thiubo riphen khat thiujiu chagee thinbo riphen maidung nai tavaipi thinbo riphenmai 200,000 gu charipi thiu-e.
Pagu niabo munranpaose Jehozabad niu thiujiu charileng kati mawilubo maidung 180,000 tu thinne.
Haibo riphendungniu Jerusalem ga chawangtu macha-e, khatdi hairiga sanjiu paniu riphen maidung khangsiatu Judah gu katam-tambo namdidung, charireng kamkhaibo bamgadi pibam khai-e.
Judah maigu Chawang Jehoshaphat niu kalekwi khangjiu pazan tadmiboga, pakikhunmai mai khatdi Israel maigu Chawang Ahab kikhun mai kakga chami-chawan thiubo

Takum wajiukha saiga Jehoshaphat niu Ahab tu meng adao khaira Samaria namdilam tadle. Jehoshaphat tu khatdi pasai kasui maidungtu chakhuangthiujiu, Ahab niu pagu milydung khatdi matom-kabui kengkha katiu kikhai raleng kamshat khaide. Gilead ga bambo Ramoth gu namditu chari thiuraleng paniu Jehoshaphat tu npao-e.
Paniu maniu-e, “Ramoth tu chari thiura nang asai suitad rama?”
Jehoshaphat niu paokakge, “Nangniu chari thiura tadbo bamga tadra Idi, agu riphendungdi kadenjiu bamme. Aliu nasaisui tadrabo-e.”
Sigasu paniu dinlan-e. “Chiudi raiboga aliuniu
Haichiujiu Ahab niu phaimiudung, kai madai kumbotu ku-ngut lujiu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Iniu Ramoth tu chari thiu rama, maksai thiumak ralo?”
Paliuniu paokakge “Chari thiulo. Tingwang niu natu pijiu chari ngamkhai bine.”
Chiudi Jehoshaphat niu maniu-e, “Aliuniu
Ahab niu paokakge, “Mai khat, Imlah nahpiu Micaiah bamkha-e, chiudi Ira patu mareng-e, palamra paniu wadaodi aleng kawibo khatnadi dinkhai makge; pawan machangna kasabo ronna din-e.”
“Nang sichiujiu dinmak rabo-e!” chiujiu Jehoshaphat niu paokakge.
Sijengniu Chawang Ahab niu ladzankygu chakampao khattu kuwang lujiu Micaiah tu kalangjiu puiwangra dinkhaide.
Chawang kaniase panaigu chawang pon piulujiu, Samaria gu rengmun lenlam, asaiphungga, panai wangbam riga ntao bamme, khatdi phaimiudung pakhiangnaniu panai masuangga sailad dinjiu bam-e.
Paliu ruanggasu, Chenaanah nahpiu Zedekiah niu, chagi make kamlujiu Ahab khuga din-e, ‘Haise
Kakibo phaimiudung hinadi sikum gapjiu din-e, “Ramoth tu aphenjiu hangutlo, nangniu ngamlu rabo-e,”
Haichiujiu bamboga, Micaiah tu majangra tadmibo chakampaoniu pakhuga din-e, “Kakibo phaimiudung siniura chawangniu ngamrabo-e chiujiu sailad din bamme, siniu nangdi sikum gapjiu dinboniu wisune.”
