Paniu chawang Ahab masuangga wangboga, chawangniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Micaiah yo, chawang Jehoshaphat anainiu tadlujiu Ramoth tu charithiu rama, maksai thiumak ralo?”
“Charithiu sulo!” chiujiu Micaiah niu paokakge. “Yo-e, nangniu charise ngamlu surabo-e.
Chiudi Ahab niu paokakge, “Nangniu akhuga
Ahab niu Jehoshaphat khuga din-e, “Paniu wadaodi aleng kawibo sailad dinkhai makge, haichiujiu kasabo din tan-tanbo-e, chiujiu Iniu nakhuga dinkhai mibo-e.”
Micaiah niu dinsan-e. “Tuhoira
niu maniu-e, Saoniu Ahab tu sonkhai bijiu patu pijiu Ramoth ga kamshat luralo?’ mazadung khangsianiu wakhat din-e, khatdi khangsianiu katambo din bamme.
Sichiujiu bamboga hiupuina khatniu
Hiupuina siniu paokakge, Iniu tadmeng lujiu Ahab gu phaimiudung pakhiangnatu pijiu aratbo dinra kam khaine.’
Haichiujiu Micaiah niu munkom khaide: “Haise padmibo si-e.
Siga phaimiukakung Zedekiah niu Micaiah khuga khanglujiu, pabiang kaphijiu maniu-e, “Dedaoniu
“Nangniu kichen lungga nbaira tadngutbo wan ga nangniu silu sune,” chiujiu Micaiah niu paokakge.
Sigasu Chawang Ahab niu pagu chakampaodung khang khat khuga chamtan pikhai-e, “Micaiah tu minmilo khatdi patuse namdigu dithinpao Amon, nai Chawang nahpiu Joash khuga pikhai milo.
Patu kavangky lungga khaimira panai khuga dinbilo sigasu Iniu wijiu wanglan makthenna patuse taruak nai tadui ronna pikhai bilo.”
“Nangniu wijiu malanwang lusai,
Sigasu Israel maigu Chawang Ahab nai Judah maigu Chawang Jehoshaphat niu tadlujiu Gilead lungga bambo Ramoth gu namditu charithiu sude.

Ahab niu Jehoshaphat khuga din-e, “Anainiu chari bamga tadngutboga Ira alun kam kali mine, chiudi nangra nagu chawang ponse khailulo.” sichiujiu, Israel maigu chawangniu charibamga palun kam kalilujiu tadmide.
Syria mai wangpiuniu pagu chaqon-karigu munranpaotu Israel mai wangpiutu makjiu kakimaitu charithiu tulo chiujiu chamtan pikhai bide.

Haichiujiu paliuniu Chawang Jehoshaphat tu ngaoboga, paliu mathiuniu pahai Israel maigu chawang-e chiubo lukhaide, sichiujiu mariwang lujiu patu asunra kamsude. Chiudi Jehoshaphat niu pakhuan senpadboga,
Pahai Israel maigu chawang makge chiubose chaqon-karigu munranpaodung siniu ngaoluboga, paliuniu patu hata mide.

Chiudi pathakniu wijiu, Syria maigu riphen khatniu tavaithu khat ketpadboga siseniu Chawang Ahab gu ripuan kakga kettao mide. “Atu kam ajam mide!” chiujiu paniu pagu chaqon-kari karibopiu khuga sen padde. “Sailam nkhin lujiu charibam gasu npadmilo!”
Charise tanjiu thiusuboga, Chawang Ahab niu pagu chaqon-kari riga buangkhang mangiu lujiu, Syria mai khulam phuijiu bamme. Naimik ngutmiboga pah shai mide.
Judah maigu chawang Jehoshaphat wijiu pawangbam Jerusalem ga malanwang mide.
Hanani nahpiu, phaimiukakung, Jehu niu tadlujiu chawangtu adaode khatdi pakhuga din-e, “Kasamaitu nkhabo khatdi
Sichiu bamtadi nakhuga wa kawibo kasiara bamme. Maidungniu kahumbo charapui Asherah mengdungse nangniu luthon mide, sigasu nangniu Tingwang maning kamra matan bambo-e.”
Paniu Jerusalem ga lungbam tadi tingrun lam Beersheba gasu tingpilam bambo Ephraim maluongram tangbo, maidungtu paliu paopehmai Rawang,
Judah maigu namdidung charireng kamkhai bambo hinaleng paniu ladjanpaodung kadakhai lujiu
paliutu ladtikhai-e: “Ladjan thiuboga ningting silo; naliuniu chamainagu pumtan-ga changam kamjiu bambo makge, chiudi
tu chakhuang thiujiu khatdi manangjiu changam kamlo, palamra aliu
Jerusalem ga Jehoshaphat niu Levi maidung, singkumai sigasu parathiubo khunlungmai khangsiatu
Paniu pahangga bambo ladtidungse paliu khuga katikhai-e, “Naliu ngamkam hinaga

Narammai karainiu namdi khat gasu maitu kamshat mibo tingga, maksai kakibo tacheng tajai maksai chamtan phungken mibo tingga, tathu-chara phungwangbo tingga, paliuniu dechiujiu ladjan-ga wangralo chiubo lamga naliuniu paliutu ladtikhai mawibi rabo-e, chiusai paliuniu

Singku Dibo Amariah niu characheng pakhiangnagu lamga kanambo pumtan thinrabo-e, khatdi Ishmael nahpiu Zebadiah, Judah maigu dithinpao siniu, kadihgu tathu pakhiangnagu kanambo pumtanse thinrabo-e. Levi mainiu ladzankygu chamsuise tadkiu bamme chiubose phuirabo-e. Hululo khatdi haibo ladtidungse tadkiulo, sichiusai
Pakak khat saiga Moab mai nai Ammon maigu riphen maidungniu Meunite maitu alianglujiu, Judah maitu charithiu sude.

Champaomai khangsianiu Chawang Jehoshaphat khuga wangjiu din-e: “Edom gasu riphenmai baodi khatniu Shaibo Duipui hugen lamsu natu chari aphenra wangbam-e. Paliuniu Hazazon Tamar tu haphun lude.” (Haise Engedi gu katambo zanne).
Jehoshaphat tu kam charen mide, sichiujiu
Judah maigu namdi hina gasu maidungniu Jerusalem lam
sichiujiu Jerusalem maidung nai paliu mathiuse Charaky kahiuga wang maduide. Chawang Jehoshaphat niu tadpad lujiu paliu masuangga chapde, sichiujiu pakhuan tanjiu kakheng thiu-e,
“Hey, aliu pao-pehmai Rawang,

Nang hai aliu Rawang si-e. Namai Israel maidungniu haibo kadihga wangbo wan-ga nangniu haiga lungjiu bamdibo maidungtu hathon mibo-e sichiujiu nakahpiu, Abraham kaikikdungtu, tingthengjiu haibo dihse paliugu thiura nangniu pikhaibo-e.
Paliu haiga lungbamme sichiujiu natu chakhuangthiu raleng Charaky khat thiukhaijiu bamme,

siga kapingbo, chariubo khatniudi paliutu sajai pira chariniu, chararenniu, maksai chakhumniu—wangjiu paliutu kam mathiu khai lakge chiubo silujiu paliuniu natu kahumra haibo Raky masuangga wangchap rabo-e. Paliuniu chariu magenthiubo tingga nakhuga kakhengthiu raleng-e, khatdi nangniu paliu rathoi chiukhaijiu paliutu gukhai luraleng-e.
Sichiujiu nangniu aliuleng pikhaibo kadih gasu, aliutu hapad mira paliuniu kambambo-e.

Nang hai aliu Rawang si-e! Paliutu sajai pikhailo, palamra aliutu chari thiurabo riphen maise kengchang-kengjiu, aliura paliu masuangga pumtan hade. Degu kamralo chiubo aliu simakge, chiudi aliutu nkha khaira aliuniu natu phuijiu bamme.”
Judah maipiudung hinaniu paliu naodung nai paliu nahdung jaojiu, Charakyga chapjiu bamme.
Chamai baodi ruangga bambo Levi mai khat khuga

Jahaziel niu din-e, “Pakendibopiu yo, khatdi Judah mai nai Jerusalem maidung pakhiangna yo, riphenmai kengbo haitu naliuniu zudaora naliulung nkhin makrabo-e maksai pingmak rabo-e. Chari thiurabose naliu ben-ga makjiu, Tingwang ben-ga bambo-e.
Nsuannai paliuniu Ziz kenpadboga paliutu asun sulo. Naliuniu paliutu Jeruel mungga bambo ramjing tadbo taningdih gasu adaosu rabo-e.
Naliuniu haibo charibam gasu asun lakge, naliu chapbam kamlujiu siga khuanjiu bamlo;
Sigasu Chawang Jehoshaphat niu kadihga pazu makhum kiude, sigasu maidung pakhiangnadi pasai suilujiu makhumkiu
Levi mai ruangga bambo maidung Kohath nai Korah kiriang mainiu suchap lujiu khatdi Israel mai
Pasaibo nai nsuan kalu maidungniu ramjing Tekoa mungga tadpadde, Paliuniu padboga, Jehoshaphat niu haichiu paliu khuga dinkhai-e; “Judah mai khatdi Jerusalem maidung yo! Naliu
Maidungtu npaolubo saiga, masanbo khuang-ngee nai piubo fai-nise piulujiu, sigasu chalui thiujiu riphen maidung masuangga tadpadra chawangniu chalui thiumaitu chamtan pikhaide: “
Paliuniu chalui thiusuboga charithiu wangbo riphen maitu
Ammon mai nai Moab mainiu Edom maigu riphen maitu charithiu sude, khatdi paliutu kam maha kam mide, khatdi paliu karai khatniu khattu kam marajiu aphen sude.
Judea maigu riphendungniu kathaidih lungga bambo akheky ton-ga menglujiu paliutu mikremai khulam phuiboga paliu shaijiu kadihga kala kabaotong bambose ngaode. Mai khatnadi marilu makge.

Jehoshaphat nai pagu riphen mainiu maigu mania sungra tadde, siga paliuniu matom-kabui, maniadung, chafai-tani, sigasu kakibo paman kungbo maniadung kengkha daode. Paliuniu sunglubo maniadungse khom maduiboga jengsum ngutle, chiudi kengju mijiu paliuniu pakhiangna khoikam lumak tade.
Pamadaibo nai paliuniu Beracah gu taningdihga wang madui-e siga
Jehoshaphat niu pagu riphen maitu majang lujiu Jerusalem ga chari ngamlujiu malanwang mide, palamra
Paliuniu namdi wangtangboga paliuniu nthiam-tara nai makehniu chalui thiujiu Charaky lam jontadde.
niu dechiujiu Israel maigu mikremaitu kamkao migulo chiubo chiulubo jat hinaniu pingmide,
sichiujiu Jehoshaphat niu agi-manaijiu mawangde, khatdi walam hinaga Tingwang niu patu manang makjiu lungra kamkhai bide.
Jehoshaphat niu pagu takum samriu mangiu tangmiboga chawang thiude sichiujiu takum makai mangiu Jerusalem ga paniu mawang-e. Papui hai Azubah-e, pahai Shilhi nahpui-e.
Pasuangga lungkhai mibo papiu Asa kumjiu, pahai
Chiudi nkengmaigu kahumbo bamdungse kam maha kammi makge. Sichiujiu maidungniu paliu lungchun ngutjiu paliu pao-pehmai Rawang tu kahumra mariwang makge.
Jehoshaphat niu mawang subo gasu kaloibo katang kamkhai mibo hinase, Hanani nahpiu Jehu gu Rachamga raokhai bamme, sise Israel maigu Chawangdung Rachamga jaobo khatle.
Pawan khatga Judah maigu chawang Jehoshaphat niu, kasabo tien kengkha kam khaimibo sira Israel maigu chawang Ahaziah tu akadbo gasu-e.
Eziongeber gu malee mathakbam ga, duinaiga tadrabo maleedung paliuniu kam khai-e.
Mareshah gu namdak gasu wangbo,Dodavahu nahpiu Eliezer niu Jehoshaphat tu kachan khai-e, “Nangniu Ahaziah tu akadkhai mibo jeng gasu, nangniu thiukhai bambose
Jehoshaphat shaimide sigasu David namdi lungga bambo chawang maigu charawga nphum khaide khatdi panahpiu Jehoram niu pabam malinjiu chawang thiude.
Judah gu chawang Jehoshaphat nahpiu Jehoram gu singnamai khang charuk: Azariah, Jehiel, Zechariah, Azariahu, Michael, khatdi Shephatiah bamme

Paliu piuniu paliuleng kachia, rangkang sigasu kakibo paman kungbo maniadung kengkha pikhai lujiu sigasu paliu khang khat-khattu pijiu Judah maigu charireng kamkhaibo namdidungtu phuira pikhai bide. Chiudi Jehoram niu tingthubo jengniu Jehoshaphat niu pijiu patu pabam malin raleng kamkhai bide.
Jehoram niu chawangdih thin mawiluboga, paniu pasingnamai pakhiangna khatdi Israel maigu chakampao khangsiatu kamshat mide.
Jehoram niu pagu takum samriu-nia tangmiboga chawang thiu-e, sigasu paniu Jerusalem ga takum tachat mawang-e.
Paniu kasabo chawang Ahab khatdi kakibo Israel maigu chawang maigu alitu lui-e, palamra paniu Ahab nahpui khattu panaoleng ku-e. Paniu
Chiudi
Jehoram niu mawangbo lungga Edom mainiu Judah maitu chari thiude sichiujiu pakhen-parang thiubo chawangdih thiu mide.

Haijengniu Jehoram nai pagu chakampaodung siniu chaqon-kari gasu padlujiu Edom maitu chari thiu-e. Siga Edom maigu riphen mainiu paliutu tao magui lude, chiudi paliuniu nchun paklura machajiu sigasu mari lude.
Edom hai Judah gasu pakhen-parang thiumibo-e. Haibo tingga, Libnah gu namdi sidi chari thiusude, palamra Jehoram niu paliu paopeh maigu
Paniu Judah maigu ramluongga nkengmai ra kahumbo bamdung thiukhaide, siga Judah mai khatdi Jerusalem maidungtu pijiu
Phaimiukakung Elijah niu Jehoram khuga chamlen khat langkhai-e. Sise haichiujiu kenpadle; “

Sibosung nangniu Israel mai wangdunggu lunlungtu luimide khatdi Ahab nai pabam malin maidungniu pijiu Israel maitu malum makra kamkhai mibo kum gapjiu, nangniu Judah mai khatdi Jerusalem maidungtu pijiu Tingwang tu malum makra kamkhaide. Nasuang wi-nkiubo nasingna maidung siaktudi nangniu kamshat mide.
Hai-jengniu,
Napum siakra narai thiubo-ra marajiu sise naikhat khat thiubi-bi khangrabo-e.”
Sudan mai khangsianiu lungbambo rampum gen munggase Philistine mai khatdi Arab mai khangsia lung bamme. Jehoram tu chari thiura
Paliuniu Judah maitu chari thiujiu, chawangkiningse haphun jutjiu, sigasu chawang naodung khatdi paliu nahdungtu nathubo Ahaziah tu makjiu kavangleng puitad kam mide.
Haichiu khailubo sai,
Takum nia kumbo poi-poi thiuwangjiu kanamboga sachang-sawangjiu chariu suijiu chawangse shaimide. Paliu pao-pehdung khuga kamkhai mibo kumjiu pamaidungniu chunsabogu n-mangse thiu khai mak tamide.

Jehoram niu pagu takum samriu-nia khangmiboga chawang thiude sigasu paniu Jerusalem ga takum tachad mawangde. Pah shai miboga mai khatniudi chalung makbo thiukhai makge. Paliuniu patu chawang kiriang maigu charawga makjiu David namdi lungga baikhai mide.

Arab mai khangsianiu simak dakjiu charithiu suboga nathubopiu, Ahaziah tu makjiu chawang Jehoram nahpiu pakhiangnatu kamshat mide. Haichiujiu tuhoira Jerusalem maidungniu Ahaziah tu chawang thiukhaijiu papiu bam pi malin khaide.

Ahaziah niu takum makai-nia khangmiboga chawang thiude, sigasu paniu Jerusalem ga takum khat mawang khai-e. Ahaziah niu chawang Ahab kikhun gu lunlung kumjiu lung-e, palamra papui chawang Ahab nahpui, Athaliah khatdi Israel maigu chawang Omri tahpuiniu kasabo ladtikhaibo jengniu patu kasaboga jukhai mibo-e.
Paniu

Paliugu ladtikhaibotu majaijiu, paniu Israel mai wangpiu Joram tu khat thiulujiu Syria wangpiu Hazael tu chari thiude. Gilead ga bambo Ramoth ga riphendungtu aphen sude, siga Joram tu charigasu kam ajam mide.
Pajam taliu raleng paniu Jezreel namdi lam malan wangmide, siga Ahaziah niu patu adaora tadde.
Joram tu adaora Tingwang niu kam khaibose Ahaziah kao mirabo leng-e. Ahaziah siga bambo tingga, Ahab kiriang maitu kam mahami raleng

Haibo kiriang maitu kam maha mira Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaibotu Jehu niu padraleng kamjiu bamboga, Ahaziah niu maluang lujiu tad ncham khaimibo Judea gu jupaodung khatdi Ahaziah tah maidung rup khattu paniu wang daode. Jehu niu paliu mathiutu kamshat kam mide.
Ahaziah tu phiusude, siga pahai Samaria ga nbai bamniujiu daolude. Paliuniu Jehu khuga puiwangjiu patuse kamshat mide. Chiudi papao chawang Jehoshaphat niu,
Chawang kadih mawang ngambo Ahaziah kikhunmai khatnadi masiak khai makge.
Chawang Ahaziah pui Athaliah niu panah situ kamshat mide chiubo cham chiukaji-chiukari, paniu Judah maigu chawang kikhun maidung pakhiangnatu kamshat mira chamtan pikhaide.
Ahaziah chipui,
Athaliah niu chawangpui khat thiujiu bambo takum charuk lungga baikhai bide.

Takum charuk sailam singku Jehoiada niu changam thinsu mine chiujiu palung chapmide. Paniu riphenmai katheng-kadimai khang mangiu: Jeroham nahpiu Azariah, Jehohanan nahpiu Ishmael, Obed nahpiu Azariah, Adaiah nahpiu Maaseiah khatdi Zichri nahpiu Elishaphat paliutu pijiu phomkhat thiukhaide.
Paliuniu Judah namdi pakhiangnaga tadronjiu Levi mai kiriang gasu papee kathiumai pakhiangnatu Jerusalem ga puiwangde.

Paliu mathiu Charaky lungga wang madui-e, khatdi siga paliuniu chawang nahpiu Joash jaojiu tasiang khat thiu-e. Jehoiada niu paliu khuga din-e, “Shaimibo chawang nahpiuse haiga bamme! Chawang David kaikikdungniu chawang thiuwang rabo-e, chiujiu
Haise aliuniu kamrabo-e. Tabamnai kahumbo tien thiura singkumaidung khatdi Levi maidung wangboga, paliu ruanggasu parup sum thiujiu rup khat siniu Charaky rengmundungse akherabo-e.
Pasumbo rup siniu chawangkining akherabo-e, sigasu rup khat siniu rengmun phibangga bamrabo-e. Chamai hinaniu Charaky kahiuga maduirabo-e.
Tatien thiu bambo singkudung nai Levi maidung makjiu mai khatnadi Charakyga ngut makrabo-e. Paliu ngut sui-e, palamra paliutu kadpat masan mibo-e, chiudi kakimaira
Levi maidungniu paliu heng ponlujiu, chawangtu maguijiu akherabo-e, khatdi chawangniu tadpad tadngutboga pasai suijiu bamrabo-e. Charakyga ngutra kambo maitura kamshat mirabo-e.”
Levi maidung nai Judah maidung siniu Jehoiada niu katikhaibose kamme. Tabamnaise paliu ngamkam gasu tadpad tadngut maidung tudi tamson makge, haichiujiu pakhiangnatu phuira munranpaodung bamme.
Jehoiada niu chawang David gu changiudung khatdi chageedung Charakyga khai nbambose chakampaodung khuga pikhaijiu paliuniu sise phui-e.
Chawangtu akhera chaheng phunglujiu bambo maidungtu paniu pijiu Charaky masuangga taomagui khai bamme.

Sigasu Jehoiada niu Joash tu puipad lujiu, chawang pirunse papeega runkhai bide, khatdi chawangniu mawangbogu tacheng-tajaigu ariak pekse pakhuga pikhaide. Haichiujiu patuse chawang pithiu khaide. Singku Jehoiada nai panahpiudungniu Joash tu wasa manuk khaijiu tatien pikhaide, sigasu mai hinaniu, “Chawangse ringtheng bamlo!” chiujiu sende.
Chawang jengniu maidung chunwijiu bambose Athaliah niu chiude, siga maidung madui bambo Charaky lunggase pah pak ngutle.

Sichiujiu kasanbo chawangniu Charaky ngutrabo bamboga chawang bamleng donkhaibo bamgase ntaobam niubo khatdi riphenmaigu katheng-kadi maidungniu khatdi make mudmaidung siniu patu khom maguijiu bambose paniu ngaode. Mai hinase paliu chun wijiu, make mudjiu bamme, sigasu chalui thiumaidung siniu paliugu nthiam-taradung thinlujiu changeebotu jukhaijiu bamme. Siga palung chariubo siniu pafai-pani phetjiu senne, “Chari-e! Chari-e!”

Athaliah tu Charaky mungga kamshat khaira Jehoiada niu suini makge, sijengniu riphen maigu katheng-kadi maidungtu paniu kupad lujiu din-e, “Patuse akhemai kak gasu lenlam puipad milo, sigasu patu gukhai raleng kambo maitu kamshat milo.”
Paliuniu patuse minlude, khatdi chawangkiningga patuse puiwang lujiu, Chaqon gu Rengmun gase patu kamshat mide.
Singku Jehoiada niu chawang Joash nai maidungtu puilujiu paliu hai

Sigasu paliu mathiu Baal rakylam tadlujiu sise kam maha mide. Paliuniu siga bambo rathak bamse khatdi charameng hinase kakhiu taliang mide sigasu Baal gu singku, Mattan tu rathak bamdung masuangga kamshat mide.
Jehoiada niu singkudung nai Levi maidungtu Charaky ngamse phuira pikhaide. Paliu khuga chawang David niu pikhaibo ngamdungse, Mose gu Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu
Characheng saisuijiu masan makbo maitu lenlam pijiu bamkhaira Charaky rengmun ga akhemaitu Jehoiada niu kam khaide.

Riphendunggu chakampaodung, jupaodung, khatdi kaki-kibo maidung pakhiangna Jehoiada saisui lujiu chawangtu Charaky gasu chawangkiningga puiwangboga jaode. paliuniu kadibo rengmun lamsu tadngutle, sigasu chawangniu pawangbam gase ntao mide.
Mai hinase chunwiboniu phuimide, sichiujiu Athaliah tu kamshat mide, tuhoira namdise chakhuan hajiu rim-rim mide.
Joash niu takum chinnia khangmiboga Judah maigu chawang thiu-e, sigasu paniu Jerusalem ga takum atai mawang-e. Papuise Beersheba namdi gasu wangbo Zibiah si-e.
Singku Jehoiada niu karingthen
Jehoiada niu chawang Joash naoleng khangniatu kadakhai bide, sichiujiu panainiu paleng npuimai nahdi npiumai nahdi kengjiu lungkhaide.
Paniu pakak khat chawang thiukhai lubosai, Joash niu Charakyse katin lanra chap khaide.

Paniu singku maidung khatdi Levi maidungtu Judah maigu namdi hinaga tadra khatdi Charakyse takumgu thiujiu thiu katin lanraleng maidung khugasu rangkang builura khomwang raleng chamtan pikhaide. Pawan siakga kamra paliu khuga dinkhaide, chiudi Levi maidungniu kamsu mari mide,
sijengniu paliugu jupao, Jehoiada tu paniu kulujiu din-e, “
(Maipui kasabo, Athaliah sai suimaidungniu, Charakyse kam masa mide sigasu masanbo maniadungse Baal tu kahumboga thinpiu mide).
Piwangbo chakhiu-chalanse khai madui raleng wakhaibung khat kampad lujiu, sise Charaky rengmun ga khailo chiujiu Levi maitu chawangniu chamtan pikhaide.
Tingwang vangpiu, Mose niu ramjingga raibo thiujiu khomkhai mibo ramkhase kumjiu mai hinaniu
Haichiu kambo siniu maidung nai paliugu jupaodungtu pijiu kimkhaide, khatdi paliuniu paliugu ramkhagu rangkangse phungwangjiu rangkang bunggase khai sude.

Sise phuijiu bambo chawanggu chakampaodung khuga Levi maidungniu sibo bungse naimachangna ponwang-e. Sise phuimiboga, chawanggu machunrao Singku Dibo piugu malin mainiu rangkangse khoipad lujiu khatdi sibo bungse pakhaiga khailan mirabo-e. Haichiujiu paliuniu rangkang kengga khomlu-e.
Chawang nai Jehoiada niu rangkangse Charaky katinbotu phuijiu bammai khuga pikhaide, sigasu paliuniu tatu ruimaidung, tasingsiam simaidung, khatdi chagi ngam kam maidungtu Charakyse katinra pikhaide.
Changam kam maidung hinase maranjiu kamde, khatdi Charakyse karaiga lun kumjiu, tingtheng tanbam raleng kamkhai lande.
Katinloi miboga, masiakbo kachia nai rangkangse tathikuangdung nai chakuang-chapiangdung Charaky leng kampadra chawang nai Jehoiada khuga pikhaide.
Jehoiada niu ringbam then, rathak maniase naimachangna Charakyga pikhai tan-tanne.
Pase tingsuijiu, takum kai-je-samriu khangtang lujiu, shaimide.
Paniu Israel maidungleng, Tingwang leng, khatdi Charaky leng kamkhai mibo tientu maningtaobo thiujiu, paliuniu patuse David Namdi lungga chawang maigu charawga bai khaide.
Chiudi Jehoiada niu shaimiboga, Judah gu jupaodungse paliuniu dinbotu nkingra Chawang Joash tu hiam sude.
Sichiujiu maidungniu paliu pao-pehmai
niu pagu phaimiukakung maitu langkhaijiu paliutu kachanjiu pakhuga malan wan-ga kamme, chiudi maidungniu paladtu nkingkhai makge.
Sigasu Tingwang gu hiupuina niu singku Jehoiada nahpiu Zechariah tu thinman lude. Maidungniu ngaolu rabo bamga paniu chaplujiu haichiu dinpadle, “Degu kamjiu
Zechariah tu suini makjiu kabuakboga chawang Joash jaode, khatdi chawanggu chamtan gasu maidungniu Charaky kahiuga Zechariah tu tatu khoilujiu phensude.
Zechariah piu Jehoiada niu pakhuga dinkhaibo lamga chawangniu mangai mide, sichiujiu paniu Zechariah tu kamshat mibo-e. Zechariah shai kiubo tingga, paniu senpadle, “Nangniu tenkhaibose

Sibo takumgu kariak-ting wangboga, Syria maigu riphenmainiu Judah mai nai Jerusalem maitu chari thiujiu jupaodung pakhiangnatu kamshat mide, khatdi mania kengkha sunglujiu Damascus lam phunglu wanglan mide.
Syria maigu riphenmaise tamme, chiudi

Patuse kam-ajam mathiu mide. sigasu mikremaidungniu masai nkhin miboga pagu chakampao khang nianiu mahinjiu patu kamshatra kamde, sigasu singku Jehoiada nahpiutu kamshat mibogu chakhum ruijiu patuse pazi gasu kamshat mide. Patu hai chawang maigu rawga makjiu David namdi lungga baikhai mide.
(Patu mahinjiu kamshatra kambo maidungse, Ammon maipui nah, Shimeah nahpiu Zabad, khatdi Moab maipui nah, Shimrith nahpiu, Jehozabad si-e).

Chawang maigu Ariakkhuangtu din masan khaibo ariakkhuangga, Joash nahpiudung racham, patu suini makjiu sailad dinkhaibo, khatdi paniu dechiujiu Charakyse katin khailo chiubo raokhai nbamme. Panahpiu Amaziah niu chawang thiujiu pawangbam malin mide.
Amaziah takum makai-mangiu khangmiboga chawang thiu-e, sigasu paniu Jerusalem ga takum makai-chakiu mawang-e. Papuise Jerusalem maipui Jehoaddin-e.
Tingwang lungchun kimbose paniu kamme, chiudi sise kamrao-raojiu kamme.
Paniu mawangjiu pumtan thin miboga, papiutu kamshat mibo chakampaodungtu paniu kamshat mide.
Chiudi paniu, paliu nahdungtu kamshat mak tamide, palamra Mose gu tacheng-tajai ga

Chawang Amaziah niu Judah mai khatdi Benjamin mai kiphiu npiumai pakhiangnatu, paliuniu lungbo kiriang saisuijiu riphenmai bao khat-khat thiura kamkhaide, khatdi chamai sang khattu, chamai kai khatgu bao kamlujiu pabaogu munranpiudung khai bide. Haiga takum makai tangmibo maksai sisuang tingmibo npiumai pakhiangnatu jaojiu, pakhiangna 300,000 ye. Paliu hai baokhat thiukhai mibo riphenmai, chari baoleng kadenlubo, changiu nai chagee thinsibo maliang-e.
Haibo riga sanjiu paniu riphenmai 100,000 tu Israel mai dih gasu rangkanggi taju 3,400 kumbo pijiu mathiu wang-e.
Chiudi phaimiukakung khatniu chawang khuga menglujiu din-e, “Haibo Israel maigu riphendungtu nangniu puitad tulo.

Charithiubo gase paliuniu natu pitan nkiu khai sune chiujiu nangra maning bamdi sui-e, chiudi chari ngam khaibo maksai kamkao khaibo sira Tingwang niu pumtan pibo gasu-e, siniu nagu mikremainiu pijiu natu kamkao khaimi rabo-e.”
Amaziah niu phaimiukakung khuga maniu-e, “Chiusai Iniu paliuleng rangkang pikhai mibose dechiu ralo?”
Phaimiukakung siniu paokakge, “
Haichiujiu Amaziah niu mathiulubo riphenmaitu chaky lam wangmilo chiujiu paliu khuga dinkhaijiu langkhai mide. Haiga paliuniu Judah maidungtu paliu lung pomchang pomjiu paliu kylam wang mide.
Amaziah niu palung thiukhangjiu pagu riphenmaitu puilujiu Matai Ramjeng lam tadmide. Siga paliu aphenjiu Edom riphen maidung sang kariutu kamshat mide.
Khatdi katambo sang kariutu hajiu minlude. Paliuniu kavangdungtu Sela namdi gu chakhao turen-ga puikhai lujiu, sigasu kamshatra chakhao hanglam tun taliang khai mide.

Sibo lungga Amaziah niu charibamga majang tadra suikhai mak tamibo Israel maigu riphendung siniu Samaria nai Beth Horon kakga bambo Judea gu namdidungtu chari thiujiu, chamai sang sumtu kamshat mide, khatdi mania kengga sunglude.
Amaziah niu Edom maitu kamkao lujiu malan wangboga, paniu paliu ramengdungse ponwang dungkhai lujiu, parim wibose mataojiu kahumde.
Haisiniu
Paladse dinloi makhaga, “Aliuniu natu, dedao suniu chawanggu ladpipao kamkhai mijiulo? Tacham dinta milo, maksai Iniu natu kakhiushat mine!” chiujiu Amaziah niu palad dongtap lujiu kham mide.
Phaimiukakung piuse tacham dinta mide, chiudi dinsao makhabo maga din-e, “Tuhoira
Judah mai wangpiu Amaziah nai pagu ladpi maidung siniu Israel maitu mahin kamra rangsude. Sichiujiu paniu Jehu tahpiu, Jehoahaz nahpiu, Israel mai Wang Jehoash khuga patu angadjiu aphenra

Jehoash niu haibo chamkakse Amaziah khuga langkhai-e: “Pawan khatga, Lebanon Luongga bambo tathupiu khatniu cedar bang khat khuga tacham langkhai-e: ‘Nanahpuitu anahpiu naoleng pikhailo.’ Siga nkan khaona khat tadken wangjiu sibo tathupiuse taonijiu kamkao mide.

Tuhoira Amaziah yo, nangniu Edom maitu kamkao mide chiujiu nachaliang thiu bamme, chiudi chakyga bam mira Iniu natu ladpikhaibo-e. Nariga khatdi namaidung riga kasabo ronna phungwangra nangniu dekamjiu kam kabuak bam jiulo?”
Chiudi Amaziah niu sise nking makge. Amaziah tu kamkao khai rabose Tingwang gu maning-e, palamra paniu Edom maigu charamengtu kahum mide.
Sichiujiu Israel mai Wang Jehoash niu Judah mai Wang Amaziah tu chari thiura tadpad sude. Judah ga bambo Beth Shemesh ga paliu adaojiu,
Judea riphendungtu kamkao mide, khatdi riphen maidungse paliu kylam pakwang mide.
Jehoash niu Amaziah tu minlujiu Jerusalem ga puiwang mide. Sigasu paniu namdigu karengse Ephraim Rengmun gasu Pake gu Rengmun tangbo, gaphek kai nia kum thengbo thense kam masa mide.

Charaky lungga bambo kachia nai rangkanggi pakhiangna, Charakygu mania Obed Edom kaikik mainiu akhejiu bambo, sigasu chawangkininggu chakhiu-chalan bung paniu sunglubose Samaria ga phungwang mide. Paniu chakampao khangsia tudi puilujiu wangmide.
copy
Judah mai Wang Amaziah hai Israel mai Wang Jehoash suang takum kariu-mangiu ringtheng-e.
Amaziah niu mawang subo gasu pagu kaloibo tangbo lungga paniu kamkhai mibo hinase Judah mai khatdi Israel Wangdunggu Characham khuangga raokhai nbamme.
Paniu
Paphawse chaqon riga khailujiu Jerusalem lam phungwang-e, sichiujiu David namdi lungga bambo chawang maigu charawga baikhai mide.
Judah maidung mathiuniu, takum kariu charuk khangmibo Amaziah nahpiu Uzziah tu chawang thiujiu papiu bam malinra kadakhai-e.
(Amaziah shaimibo sailamniu Uzziah niu Elath tu haphun lanlubo-e sigasu namdise thiulanbo-e).
Uzziah niu takum kariu charuk miboga chawang thiude, sigasu paniu Jerusalem ga takum ringiu-nia mawangde. Papui hai Jerusalem maipui Jekoliah si-e.
Papiu kumjiu,
Patu charachengga ladtipao, Zechariah niu ringbam then, paniu
Uzziah niu Philistine maitu chari thiu-e. Paniu Gath, Jamnia khatdi Ashdod namdidunggu rengdi kampang mide, khatdi Ashdod mungga bambo khatdi kaki-kibo Philistine ramga katambo charireng kamkhai-e.
Tingwang niu patu nkha khaijiu Philistine maitu, Gurbaal ga lungjiu bambo Arab mai khatdi Meunite maitu kamkaolu-e.
Ammon mainiu Uzziah khuga ramkha pi-e khatdi pahai tanchang tankhangjiu pakense Egypt tangbo tadtang-e.
Uzziah niu Jerusalem gu charireng thiu matipkhaijiu, Kamikki gu Rengmun, Ramjenggu Rengmun khatdi samibo kareng katin khaijiu pagu charirengse pitan khai-e.

Paniu nkan-charamga charireng, akhekydung thiu khaide khatdi akhun chukhaide palamra pagu khaorui khaonadung naimik ngutlam bambo maluong philamdi, taningdih gase keng bamme. Pahai tatien ga maranbo jengniu, maidungtu maluonggen-ga mumsibang somra sigasu kadih patam kawiboga chalu kamra paniu kachukhai-e.
Charithiu raleng kadenlubo pagu riphenmai kengkha bamme. Haise chawangniu maluong tatien thiubo parupmai khat, Hananiah niu phuijiu bambo machunrao kania Jeiel nai Maaseiah niu raokhaibo-e.
Riphendung situ katheng-kadimai khang 2,600 niu munranpao thiu-e.
Paliu hangga chawanggu mikremaitu asun ngamlura riphenmai 307,500 bamme.
Uzziah niu riphenmai leng chagee, changiu, gatop, ntiang, tavaipi khatdi tavaithu, sigasu chapiniu ket raleng talumsee chiujiu pikhaide.

Jerusalem ga bambo wa kamsi mainiu tavaipi nai pathu khatdi akhe kiton gasu khatdi namdigu rengdi gasu tatu kadibo tun kalakiu ralengdi kam khai-e. Pabam hinaga pazan tadle, khatdi Tingwang niu nkha khaibo jengniu pahai pumtan bamchang bamme.
Chiudi Chawang Uzziah niu tankhang miboga, pahai wasao thiusude, sigasu patu kamaoboga jukhaide. Paniu parimwibo rukhaibo rathakbamga parimwibo matao khaira Charaky lungga mengbo gasu
Singku Azariah tu maluang macham bambo, katan-kahubo singku riak-tachatniu, chawang saisui ngutjiu patu khamme.
Paliuniu din-e, “Uzziah yo! Nangniu
Uzziah hai Charaky lungga rathakbam gase sichiujiu parimwibo rukhaibo kuangse thinlujiu chapbamme. Paniu singkudungtu palung pomsude, siga panuang gasu nphenbo rase pasan-ga pad mide.
Azariah nai singkudungse pingjiu Chawang sanse mating sude, sichiujiu Charaky gasu patu tadmira kamde. Majadjiu pah tadpad mide, palamra

Pagu nphenbo rapot siniu, haibo sailamsu paringtingse masanta mide. Charaky lungga ngut ngam lulak mibo jengniu, pangam pakhiangna phutlujiu, panahpiu Jotham niu kadihse thinjiu bamga pakyga bam mide.
Chawang Uzziah niu mawangbo lungga kamkhaibo hinase Amoz nahpiu Isaiah phaimiukakung niu raokhai bamme.

Uzziah shaimide. Sigasu patuse chawang maitu nphum khaibo kadihga nphum khaide, chiudi pakhuga nphenbo-ra bambo jengniu chawang maigu charawga nphum khai makge. Panahpiu Jotham niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Jotham niu takum makai mangiu tangmiboga chawang thiude, khatdi paniu Jerusalem ga takum kariu-je-charukkiu mawang-e. Papuise Zadok nahpui Jerushah si-e.
Papiuniu kam khaimibo kumjiu
Charakygu Nribo Rengmunse Jotham niu thiukhai-e khatdi Ophel kubo Jerusalem wonjeng lungga namdigu karengse kam madipad khaide.
Judah maigu maluong ramga paniu namdidung thiukhaide, khatdi mariulungga paniu charireng nai akheky thiukhaide.

Paniu Ammon wangpiutu charithiujiu pagu riphen mainiu paliutu kamkao lu-e. Sigasu paniu pahangga bambo ramkhase takum khat-khatgu thiujiu takum sum Ammon mainiu pakhuga Rangkanggi taju 3,400, chabanmiu bawli
Jotham niu pa-Rawang
Jotham niu mawangbo wan-ga padmibo kaki-kibo, paniu chari thiubo, khatdi pasiam hinase Israel mai khatdi Judah maigu Chawang mai Rachamga raokhai nbamme.
Jotham niu takum makai mangiu tangmiboga Chawang thiu-e, sigasu paniu Jerusalem ga takum kariu charukkiu mawang khaide.
Pa shaijiu David namdiga bai khaide khatdi panahpiu Ahaz niu pabam malinjiu chawang thiu mide.
Ahaz niu pagu takum makai khangmiboga chawang thiude, khatdi paniu Jerusalem ga takum kariu charuk mawang khaide. Para papao Chawang David gu kawibo lunlung sai suimakge: sibosung
sichiujiu Israel maigu chawang mai lunlungtu majai-e. Tanaaginiu machapadbo Baal mengse pakhuga bamme.
Hinnom Ramjengga maruta matao-e, khatdi Israel mainiu lungwangbo wan-ga
Maluongga bambo nkengmainiu kahumbo bamdungga, sigasu singbang-hiu bambo hinaga Ahaz niu rathak mania kadkhaide, khatdi maruta matao khaide.
Chawang Ahaz niu nuan kambo jengniu pa-Rawang,
Israel maigu riphenmai Zichri chiu kubo piuniu chawang Ahaz nahpiu, Maaseiah tu, chawangkininggu chakampao Azrikam tu khatdi Chawanggu niabo munranpao thiubambo, Elkanah tu kamshat mide.
Judea maise paliu karai thiubamdi, Israel maigu riphen mainiu maipui-mainah 200,000 tu kavang thiuraleng minlujiu khatdi sunglubo mania kengkha jaojiu Samaria ga puiwang mide.
Oded kubo mai khat,
Haichiujiu tuhoira naliuniu Jerusalem mai khatdi Judah mai maipui,maipiutu tamson makjiu, naliu vangthiu raleng machun bamme. Naliudi, naliu Rawang,
Alad nking khailo! Haibo vangdungse naliu singnapui nai naliu singnapiudung-e. Paliutu pijiu tadmilo, maksai

Tingpilam bambo wangdihgu papee-para thiumai khang madai, Jehohanan nahpiu Azariah, Meshillemoth nahpiu Barechiah, Shallum nahpiu Jehizkiah, khatdi Hadlai nahpiu Amasa niudi riphenmaigu tienkam situ suimakge.
Paliuniu din-e, “Haibo vangdungtu haiga puiwang mane! Aliuniu
Sichiubo gasu riphen mainiu kavangdungtu khatdi paliuniu sunglubo maniadungse paliugu jupaodung khuga benlen khai mide.

Sigasu paliu khang madai situ sungwangbo mania gasu kavangdung lengse chafai-tanise n-jan khaira kadakhai mide. Paliuniu chafai-tani khatdi chaphitop paliu piura pikhaibide, tiubui-sakbuibo pikhaibide, sigasu paliu jamga takisa nunkhai bide. Tadngam lulak kajumaitu qonniamdung riga ponkhai bide, sigasu kavangdung pakhiangna situ Jericho ga bambo Judea luongriang kadanbanggu namdiga puiwang khai bide. Sigasu Israel maidung paliu ky Samaria lam malanwang mide.
Edom mainiu Judah maitu chari thiulanjiu kavang leng chamai kengkhatu minlude. Haijengniu Chawang Ahaz niu Assyria gu wangdipiu Tiglath Pileser khuga nkha khaira kheng-e.

Sibo wan siakga Philistine mainiu Judah gu tingrunlam maluong phiga bambo namdakdungtu sungjiu, chari hasude. Paliuniu Beth Shemesh, Aijalon, khatdi Gederoth, namdidung, sigasu Soco gu namdidung, Timnah nai Gimzo namdidung, paliugu namdakdung pakhiangna haphun lujiu, siga tingtheng lungmide.
Judah mai Wang Ahaz niu pamaidunggu majitu phungkenjiu, khatdi
Assyria maigu wangdipiuniu Ahaz tu nkha khairabo sung, patu atungjiu kam chariu khaibide.
Haijengniu Ahaz niu Charaky, khatdi chawangkining gasu kachia khoilujiu wangdipiu khuga pikhai bide, chiudi siseniu nkha khaibo daolu makge.
Pagu chariu magenthiubose sapalan suboga Ahaz niu,

Patu kamkao mibo Syria maigu radung khuga, paniu rathak mania kadkhaide. Paniu din-e, “Syria mai raniu Syria maigu chawang maitu nkha khai-e, haijengniu Iniu paliu khuga rathak mania kadkhai sai, paliuniu atudi nkhakhai surabo-e.” Haisiniu pariga khatdi pajat riga magenthiu chariubo phungwang khaide.
Hairiga sanjiu, paniu Charaky gu mania pakhiangna khoilujiu kampang kam mide. Paniu Charaky hai akham mide sichiulujiu, Jerusalem gu pabam hinaga rathakbam thiukhaide.
Judah ga bambo namdi nai namdak hinaga, nkengmainiu chara kahumrabo bamdung, sigasu sangdiumai radung khuga maruta rukhai raleng paniu kam khaide. Paniu haichiu kambo gasu paliu pao-pehmai
Paniu mawangsubo gasu kaloi tangbo lungga padmibo katam-tambo hinase Judah mai khatdi Israel maigu Chawang maigu Characham khuangga raokhai bamme.
Chawang Ahaz shai mide, sigasu patuse Chawang maigu charawga makjiu, Jerusalem lungga nphum khaide. Panahpiu Hezekiah niu Chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Hezekiah niu takum makai mangiukiu khangmiboga Judah maigu chawang thiu-e, sigasu paniu Jerusalem ga takum makai chakiu mawang-e. Papuise Zechariah nahpui, Abijah si-e.
Papao Chawang David gu lunlungtu majaijiu,
Hezekiah niu chawang thiuwangbo sai raithubo hiu lungga, paniu Charaky gu rengmunse lekhai lanjiu khatdi katin khailan bide.
Paniu singku maidung khatdi Levi maidung rup khattu naimik padlam bambo Charaky gu kahiuga kuwang madui lujiu,
paliutu siga npao-e. Paniu din-e, “Naliu Levi maidung naliu pumsiak kadpad masan lujiu khatdi naliu pao-peh mai
Aliu pao-peh mainiu aliu
Paliuniu Charaky akhamse khamlujiu, chamibungse matao makjiu, Israel maigu Tingwang Raky lungga maruta matao lumakge, maksai rukhaibo kadpadse pipat lumak tamide.
Haijeng gasu
Aliu pao-peh maitu charithiubo bamga kamshat mide, sigasu aliu nao-nahdungtu kavangleng puitad mibo-e.
“Tuhoira Iniu Israel mai
Anahmai yo, pawan kam mahata sulo.
Pahangga bambo Levi maise siga bamme:
Kohath kiriang gasu, Amasai nahpiu Mahath,
khatdi Azariah nahpiu Joel
Merari kiriang gasu, Abdi nahpiu Kish
khatdi Jehallelel nahpiu Azariah
Gershon kiriang gasu, Zimnah nahpiu Joah
khatdi Joah nahpiu Eden
Elizaphan kiriang gasu, Shemri nai Jeuel
Asaph kiriang gasu, Zechariah nai Mattaniah
Heman kiriang gasu, Jehuel nai Shimei
Jeduthun kiriang gasu, Shemaiah nai Uzziel
Haimaidungniu paliu Levi mai karaitu wang madui-e, sigasu paliu ronna characheng saisuijiu kam masande. Sichiujiu, paliuniu kamra

Singku maidungniu sise kam masanra Charaky lungga ngut-e sigasu characheng saisuijiu masan makbo hinase paliuniu Charaky lung gasu ladjanky kahiuga ponpad mide. Sigasu mania pakhiangnase Levi mainiu namdi lenlam Kidron Ramjeng lam ponthon mide.

Changamse raithubo hiugu raithubo tingmik nai thinsujiu, jeng-tachad lungga, wahinase, Charakyga ngutrabo kichen jaojiu kamloi mide. Sigasu paliuniu naimikpui tachad, sibo hiugu naimikpui kariu-charuk tangmak then, kahum raleng Charakyse macha masuangjiu changam kam khaide.

Levi mainiu pahangga bambo lamse Chawang Hezekiah khuga madu khaide: “Rujiu kadpad rabo rathakbam, masanbo taruak nai mania pakhiangna khairabo wakai jaojiu, Charaky gu characheng saisuijiu wahinase aliuniu kam masan mide.
Chawang Ahaz niu Tingwang tu malum matip makbo tingkum kakga lutamibo mania pakhiangna sidi aliuniu ponwang lan bamme, sigasu aliuniu sise kadpadlan mide. Pakhiangnase
Chawang Hezekiah niu majadjiu namdi maidunggu jupaodungtu puiwang maduide sigasu paliutu maluang lujiu Charaky lam tadle.

Chawang kikhun gu khatdi Judah maidunggu nuan luthon rabogu pipadbodung thiujiu khatdi Charaky kam masanra, paliuniu matomchi chinnia, mily chinnia, milypoi chinnia, khatdi kami chinnia hawang-e. Pipadbambo khaonadungse rathakbamga kadpad raleng Aaron kaikik mai singkudung khuga chawangniu dinkhaide.
Singkudungniu matomchidungse kamshat rai-e, sigasu milydung, sigasu milypoidung, sichiujiu kadpat khaibo hinagu tazaise rathakbam riga kajin khaide.
Kanamboga paliu riga paliu ben henkhai mibo chawang khatdi kahum bambo maidung khuga paliuniu kamise hapadde.

Sigasu singkudungniu kamidungse kamshat khaide khatdi mai hinagu nuan luthonbo thiujiu rathakbam riga khaoring zaise runkhai-e, palamra chawang siniu Israel maileng rujiu pipadbo khatdi nuan gu pipadbose kamraleng chamtan pikhaibo-e.
Chawanggu phaimiu, Gad nai phaimiukakung Nathan khugasu
khatdi siamtoy, chawang David niu thinpiu mibo maniadung hinase pi thinpiu khaira paliu bam pikhaide. Singkudung niudi make thin lujiu siga chapde.
Rujiu kadpad rabose pipadra Hezekiah niu chamtan pikhai-e; haichiujiu pipadbose thinsuboga, maidungniu
Siga bambo mai hinase kahumboga khatdi chalui thiuboga jaode, sigasu rathak maniadungse ruloi makthen chalui thiujiu bamme.
Sigasu Chawang Hezekiah nai maidung pakhiangnase khudung kiulujiu Tingwang tu kahumde.
David nai phaimiu Asaph niu raokhai bambo thuonbo luise
Hezekiah niu maidung khuga din-e, “Tuhoira naliu hai characheng saisuijiu masan mide, siniu
Paliuniu matomchi riak chinnia, mily kai khat, sigasu milypoi kai nia
sichiujiu paliuniu matomchi kai charuk khatdi mily sang sumdi rathak mania thiujiu maidungniu tiura hawang-e.

Haibo khaonadung pakhiangna kamshatra singkudung kengmakbo jengniu, changam loimak thenna Levi mainiu paliutu nkha khai-e. Haijeng gasu singku maidung kakengga paliu ronna characheng saisuijiu kam masanbo tiense thiude. (Singku maidung suang Levi maidungniu characheng saisuijiu kam masanbose malum matipjiu majai nkiu-e).

Rathak mania pipadjiu sise rukhai kam mibo riga sanjiu, maidungniu tiubo rathak mania gasu pipatbo pasase rukhai raleng, sigasu rujiu kadpatboga pikhaibo jawse liang khaira, singku maidungniu parip phungbo-e.
Haichiujiu Charakyga kahumbose thinsu lanbo-e.
Chawang Hezekiah nai maidungse paliu chun wikamme, palamra paliuniu hai pakhiangnase majatjiu kamlura Tingwang niu paliutu nkhakhai bide.
Chawang nai maidungse paliugu tenrangtu paliu lung kimde.

Haijengniu, Israel mai pakhiangna Dan gu duiruak lamsu Beersheba gu duimilam tangbo gasu Jerusalem lungga wang aruanglujiu, Kenpadbo ngee haise Tacheng saisuijiu karaiga suang wang makeng lujiu changee sude.
Pahangga bambo kukhaibo chamse champao maidungniu phunglujiu chawang khatdi pagu chakampaodung chamtan hanggasu Judah nai Israel dih pakhiangnaga tadde:
“Israel maidung yo, Assyria mainiu chari thiubo gasu naliu haira shai masiak lubo-e. Tuhoira, Abraham, Isaac, khatdi Jacob Rawang,
Naliu pao-peh maidung khatdi naliu singnamai Israel mainiu paliu Rawang
Paliu kumjiu, naliu lung tanmi mane, chiudi
Naliuniu

Champao maidungniu Ephraim mai khatdi Manasseh mai kiphiu kanianiu bambo luongriang lungga bambo hinaga, sigasu Zebulun mai kiphiuniu bambo duiruak lam tangbo tadle, chiudi maidungniu paliutu kagajiu nui mende.
Chiubamdi, siga Asher mai, Manasseh mai khatdi Zebulun mai kiphiu gasu Jerusalem ga wangnibo mai khangsia bamme.
Tingwang niudi Judah mai khuga tatien thiukhaijiu chawang khatdi pagu chakampaodunggu chamtan piubo gasu pamaningse kamlune chiujiu maidungtu pijiu khat thiukhai mibo-e.
Niabo hiu lungga maidung kengga Jerusalem ga, Chakhi khaimakbo Taruak Ngee changira wang aruang-e.
Jerusalem lungga rathak mania pipad raleng khatdi parim wibo mataoboga thinpiu khaimibo rathakbam hinase paliuniu ponlujiu sigasu Kidron Ramjengga sise taliang khai mide.

Sibo hiugu jengriu madai naise paliuniu Kenpadbo rathak mania leng milypoidung kamshat khaide. Singku maidung khatdi Levi maidung characheng saisuijiu masan makbo maidungse mangam chang mangam mijiu paliu ronna

Tingwang mai thiubo, Mose gu tacheng-tajaiga ladtikhaibo saisuijiu paliuniu Charaky lungga paliu bamse lukhaide. Levi mainiu charathiubo zaise singkudung khuga pikhaiboga, paliuniu tazaise rathakbam riga kajin khai-e.
Chamai kakengga characheng saisuijiu masan makbo jengniu, Kenpadbo milypoidungse kamshat ngam makge, haijengniu Levi mainiu paliu sung thiujiu kamkhai lujiu, khatdi milypoidungse

Haibo riga sanjiu, Ephraim mai, Manasseh mai, Issachar mai khatdi Zebulun mai kiphiu gasu wangbo chamai kakengganiu characheng saisuijiu kam masanbo tiense thiukhai lumakge, haichiujiu paliuniu Kenpadbose pajai kamakboga kamme. Chawang Hezekiah niu haibo rathoise paliuleng thoikhai-e:
“Hey
niu Hezekiah rathoi chiukhaijiu, paniu maidungtu kuak khai-e sigasu paliutu kam masa khai makge.
Jerusalem lungga wang maduilu maidungniu jeng chinnia siak mathajiu chakhi jaomakbo Taruak ngeese changee-e, sichiujiu naikhat-khat Levi mai khatdi singku mainiu
gu kahumbo tien-ga Levi maigu kamsi jengniu, paliutu Hezekiah niu thuon-e.
Paliu pao-peh
kakibo jeng chinnia changee lanraleng paliu chapkhai lude. Haichiujiu paliu chun wijiu changide.

Chawang Hezekiah niu matomchi sang khat sigasu mily sang chinnia maidungniu kamshat lujiu tiura matha pikhai bide, khatdi chakampaodungniu paliuleng katambo matomchi sang khat sigasu mily sang kariu pikhai bide. Singku maidung kakengga characheng saisuijiu kam masan lubo damse lutaolu-e.
Haijengniu mai hina—Judah maidung, singku maidung, Levi maidung, duiruak lamsu wangbo maidung, sigasu Israel nai Judah lungga pating thengjiu lungbam mibo sangdiu maidungdi paliu chun wide.
Jerusalem namdi hai chunwiboniu phuimide, palamra David nahpiu Chawang Solomon ken-gasu haikumbose khatnadi pad matai makge.
Singku mai khatdi Levi mainiu

Changee loimibo saiga, Israel maidung pakhiangna Judah gu namdi hinaga tadlujiu tatutiang rammai kampang mide, khatdi charapui Asherah mengdi bikao mide, khatdi rathak bamdung sigasu nkengmainiu kahumbo bam hinase kam maha mide. Sikumjiu paliuniu Judah mai dih pakhiangna, khatdi Benjamin mai, Ephraim mai, khatdi Manasseh mai luongriangga hinagadi kamkhai lujiu, paliu kylam malanwang mide.

Chawang Hezekiah niu singku maidung khatdi Levi maidung tatien thiu aruangbo phom, sibo hangga mai hina pagu-gu nkiubo tienduan bambo hinase lingsu khai lande. Haiga rujiu kadpatbo sigasu aruangbo gu pipad, Charaky lungga kahumboga padam lubo, khatdi chunwigu pipad sigasu Charaky gu katam-tambo damga thuonbogu pikhaibo jao-e.
Pagu matom kabui nai khaorui khaonadung nsuan-chawan rujiu kadpat raleng, sigasu Tabamnai, Hiusan Ngee nai, khatdi
Haibo riga sanjiu, singku maidung khatdi Levi maidungniu lurabose Jerusalem maidungniu phungwangra chawangniu maidung khuga dinkhaibi-e, haijengniu paliugu pawan hinase
Chamtan hai pikhai kaji-kari, Israel maidungniu paliugu withubo miusy, jaw, takisa, makhuidui, khatdi katam-tambo chalu gasu padbo wahinagu dam kariugu dam khatse kalen thiujiu phungwang-e.
Judah mai namdidung lungga lungjiu bambo maidung pakhiangnaniu paliu tom-buigu khatdi mily gu dam kariugu damkhat phungwang-e, sichiujiu paliuniu
Kalendungse pasumbo hiu gasu piwangsubose pasai pamadaibo hiu gadi pijut wangjiu khai kabao khang-e.
Dejiuga piwang khailo, chiubo chawang Hezekiah khatdi pagu chakampaodungniu ngaoluboga, paliu chun wijiu
Chawangniu singkumai khatdi Levi mai khuga haibo kalendung lamga npaode,
sichiujiu Zadok kaikik, Singku Dibo Azariah niu pakhuga din-e, “Maidungniu paliugu kalendung Charakyga ponwang bambo jengniu siga tiu-sakra mali-malanjiu bam rabo-e, khatdi kengga mali mide.
Chawang gu chamtan gasu Charaky mungga paliuniu wakhaikidung macha khai lude,
sigasu kalendung pakhiangnase khatdi dam kariugu dam khatse sigase bai khaide. Sise phuira paliuniu Levi mai pazanniu, Konaniah tu khaide, khatdi pasingnapiu Shimei tu pagu nkha thiujiu khaide.

Paliu hangga Levi mai khang kariutu pijiu changam kamra khai-e, simaidung sira: Jehiel, Azaziah, Nahath, Asahel, Jerimoth, Jozabad, Eliel, Ismachiah, Mahath, khatdi Benaiah. Pakhiangna haise chawang Hezekiah nai singku Dibo Azariah gu pumtan hangga kamkhaibo-e.
Charaky gu Naimikpad lam Imnah nahpiu Kore Charaky Rengmuntu akhepi thiubo Levi maipiuniu,

Pabam katam-tambo namdidungga lungbo singku maidung khatdi Levi maidungniu patu nkhabo-e, simaidung sira: Eden, Miniamin, Jeshua, Shemaiah, Amariah khatdi Shecaniah. Paliuniu katiu-kasakse paliu Levi mai karai khuga,

paliu kiriang saisui makjiu chiudi paliu ngam saisuijiu njan macham khaibi-e. Paliuniu npiumai takum samriu maksai sisuang tingmibo maidung pakhiangna khuga Charaky lungga parip phungbo, paliu ngam saisuijiu, padamse kamkhai-e.
Singku maitu paliu ngiudonse paliu kiriang saisuijiu pikhai-e, khatdi Levi mai takum makai maksai sisuang tingmibo maitu paliu ngiudonse changam kambo rup saisuijiu pikhai-e.
Paliu mathiu, paliu nao-nahdung, sigasu paliu khuga bambo hina zanse rao aruangkhai kamme, palamra paliu hai paliugu masanbo tiendonse tenbuibo wan ga tenra kadenjiu bamra pageng bambo-e.

Namdidungga lungjiu bambo singku maidung ruangga Aaron kaikikmai khuga maksai haibo namdi lungga bambo chakhaoniu piubuan tiurabo ramga singku maigu npiumai pakhiangnaga khatdi Levi kiriangga jaobo mai hinaga katiu-kasak njan khaiboga parip phung maidung siga bamme.
Judah ramlung pakhiangnaga chawang Hezekiah niu pa-Rawang,
Pahai kam ngamme palamra paniu kambo hinase Charaky leng, maksai Tacheng-tajai piujiu, pa-Rawang kadin piubo lungchun ga kamkhai-e.
Haichiujiu Chawang Hezekiah niu
Sennacherib niu Jerusalem tudi chari asunnijiu bamme chiubose Hezekiah niu ngaoboga,

Syria mainiu Jerusalem mungga wangboga pijiu tadui daomak raleng, tadui riangse namdi lenlamsu kamtap miraleng pagu chakampaodung paliuniu chaplude. Chakampaodung siniu chamai kengkhatu puimeng lujiu, siga luongjiu bambo duipindungse luangpadmak raleng makad kham mide.

Namdi rengse chawangniu katin khai-e, sibo riga akheky thiukhai-e, sigasu ndanbo kareng thiukhaibo hinase kam matidkhai-e. Haibo riga sanjiu, paniu Jerusalem phungguanggu naimik padlam bambo ramga thiukhai bambo charirengse katin khaide. Sigasu paniu changiu nai chageedi kengkha kampad khaibi-e.
Paniu npiumai hinatu namdi lungga riphen maigu munranpiudung hangga khaibi-e khatdi namdigu maruangbo bamga wang maduira chamtan khai-e.

Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Lungchun matip lulo khatdi malum matip lulo, sichiujiu Assyria maigu wangdipiutu maksai paniu maluangtad kinbo riphenmaitu pingmi mane. Pakhuga bambo pumtan suang, aliu khuga bambo pumtanniu tan nkiu-e.
Pakhuga chamainagu pumtan bambo-e, chiudi aliutu nkha khaira khatdi aliuleng asun khaira aliu Rawang,
Pawan khat saiga, Sennacherib nai pagu riphenniu Lachish ga bambo tingga, paniu pahangga bambo tachamse Hezekiah nai Judah maidung Jerusalem ga pasai suibambo maidung khuga langkhai-e!
“Assyria Wangdipiu, Sennacherib, Iniu maniubora minlu rabo Jerusalem lungga lungbam maidunggu malumse deguniu pijiulo.
Aliugu pumtan gasu
tu kahumbo nai rathak bamdung kam maha mibose paniu-e, sigasu Judah mai khatdi Jerusalem maidungtu rathakbam khatga ronna kahumra khatdi parimwibo matao khaira dinkhaibo-e.
Apao-apehmai nai Iniu katambo jat khuga kamkhai mibose naliuniu simak jiuma? Katambo jatgu radung siniu paliutu Assyria maigu wangdipiu khugasu gukhai mibo bamma?
Haibo namdidung hinaga chara khat kumboniu dedaoga paliugu namdidungtu aliu khugasu gukhai mibo bamma? Sichiusai, naliu raniu naliutu gukhai ngamme chiubose deguniu naliutu pi maningkhai jiulo?

Tuhoira, Hezekiah niu naliutu pijiu sonmi tulo, maksai jumao khairatu kam mane. Patu malum mane! Jat khatgu chara khatniudi pamaidungtu wadaodi Assyria maigu wangdipiu khugasu gukhai ngamlu makge. Haijengniu, naliu raniu naliutu gukhai ngam lakge!”
Assyria maigu chakampaodungniu
Wangdipiu siniu raokhaibo chamlen siniu
Jerusalem maidung namdigu karengga bammaitu kam charen khailujiu khatdi kam nkhin khailujiu namdise haphung malapa luraleng chakampao-dungniu haise Hebrew mai ladga sen-e.
Mai kakimai radung, chamai benniu machapadbo ramengdung lamga dinbo kumjiu paliuniu Jerusalem Rawang lamga din-e.
Sigasu chawang Hezekiah nai Amoz napiu phaimiu Isaiah niu Tingwang khuga kakheng thiu-e khatdi nkha khairaleng pakhuga kheng-e.

niu maza khattu langkhai-e siseniu Assyria maigu riphendung khatdi chakampaodungtu kamshat mide. Haijengniu wangdipiuse mangamjiu Assyria lam malanwang mide. Naikhat, paniu paraky lungga bamboga, panahpiudung khangsianiu paliu heng thinlujiu patu kamsai mide.
Haichiujiu
Maidung kakengniu
Pawan khat Chawang Hezekiah niu marajiu siga shaipai-e. Paniu kakheng thiuboga,
Chiudi
Kanamboga, Hezekiah nai Jerusalem maidungniu paliu ronna manon kiude, sigasu

Chawang Hezekiah kalek wichang wimide, haichiujiu mai hinaniu patu chakhuang thiude. Pagu kachia, rangkang paman kungbo tudung, parimwibo wamud, chageedung, khatdi katam-tambo paman kungbo maniadung khairabo kichen thiu khaide.
Haibo riga sanjiu, pagu miusy, jaw, takisa; matom-kabui leng chakhaoky, khatdi sibo mungga milydung leng apaky thiukhai bide.
Pakhiangna riga, Tingwang niu paleng milydung khatdi matom-kabuidung pikhaibi-e sichiujiu chakhiu-chalan kengchang kengbo jengniu paniu namdidung thiukhaide.
Gihon gu Duipintu luang maren tadmira dangkhaijiu khatdi lotdi khat kamkhai lujiu Jerusalem gu kareng lungga tadui juwangtang khaibose Chawang Hezekiah niu kamkhaibo-e.

Hezekiah niu kambo hina tathuilu kamme, pagu kadihga padju makbo khat padmibo sira Babylon maigu dihsungpaodungniu pagu kadihtu matadjiu phuira wangbo si-e, chiudi sise Hezekiah gu nkhai-rili saisuijiu Tingwang chunning gasu pipad khaibo-e.
Chawang Hezekiah niu kamkhaibo hina khatdi

Hezekiah shai mide, sichiujiu patuse chawang kikhun mai rawbam nri lamse baikhai-e. Paniu kashaiboga Judah mai nai Jerusalem mai hinaniu patu dijiu chakhuang thiukhai-e. Panahpiu Manasseh niu pawangbamse malin mide.
Manasseh takum kariu-nia khangmiboga Judah mai wang thiu-e, sigasu paniu Jerusalem ga takum ringiu-je-mangiu mawang-e.
Pamaidungniu wangboga

Papiu Hezekiah niu kam maha mibo charameng kahumbo bamdungse paniu thiusu lande. Baal tu kahum raleng rathak bamdung paniu thiukhai-e, charapui Asherah mengse kamkhai-e, khatdi chagandungtudi kahumde.
tu tingthengjiu kahumlo chiujiu dinkhaibo bam, Charaky gase, paniu nkengmai rachengtu kahumbo rathakbam macha khaide.
Charaky gu kahiu niagase chagandungtu kahumrabo leng rathak bamdung paniu macha khaide.

Paniu panahpiudungtu Hinnom Ramjengga rujiu kadpatbo rathak mania thiujiu kadkhaide. Paniu kasabo ratu npao-e khatdi chamik thao kadadbo nai chabenriat khanbo maitu npaobo khatdi chamang-mania phungbotu malumme. Paniu

niu David nai panahpiu Solomon khuga dinkhaibo bam Charaky lungga paniu charameng kamkhai-e; “Israel mai kiphiu kariu-niakiu gu kadih pakhiangna gasu kadalubo bam Jerusalem ga bambo Raky haiga atu kahumrabo-e.

Khatdi Israel maidungniu agu chamtan hinase piusai khatdi avangpiu Mose niu paliu khuga pikhai mibo Tacheng-tajai hinase piusai paliu pao-peh maidung khuga Iniu pikhai mibo dih gasu paliutu wadaodi hathon padlakge.”
Pamaidungniu lungwangbo tingga
Haijengniu
Pagu chariubo gasu pah manon kiujiu, pah-
Tingwang niu Manasseh rathoi chiukhaijiu patu pijiu Jerusalem lam malanwang khaijiu khatdi mawang khai lanjiu lungkhai bide. Haichiujiu

Haibo sailam, Manasseh niu David Namdigu naimik padlam bambo ndanbo karengse, Gihon gu duipin mungga bambo taningdih lungga bambo pabam khat gasu Chakha Rengmun gu duiruaklam khatdi Ophel kubo namdi lunggasu pakod kam maku khai-e. Judah gu kareng thiu mawilubo namdidung hinaga charipi khat-khat khailujiu riphenmaitu thinra paniu kamkhai bide.

Paniu sangdiumai radung khatdi charameng Charaky lungga khaibambose luthon mide, khatdi maluang riga bambo Charaky masuangga bambo nkengmaigu rathak bamdungse khatdi Jerusalem lungga katambo hinase paniu namdi lenlam ponthon mide.
tu kahumjiu bambo rathakbam sidi paniu katin khai-e, sigasu paniu chakin thiubogu kadpatbo khatdi chunwibogu kadpatbose sibo riga pipat khai-e. Israel mai
Maidungniu katam-tambo kahumbo bamga rathak mania kadpadjiu bamdi, paliuniu
Manasseh niu kamkhai mibo pakhiangna pa-

Chawanggu rathoi situ Tingwang niu paokak khaibibo, paniu palung lilan makbo masuangga kamkhai mibo nuan lamga—paniu kamkhai mibo kasabo, nkengmaigu kahumbo bamdung khatdi paniu machapadbo charapui Asherah meng khatdi paniu kahumbo radung pakhiangna haise Phaimiukakung maigu Characham ga raokhai bamme.
Manasseh shaimide sichiujiu patuse chawangkining ga nphum khaide, khatdi panahpiu Amon niu chawang thiujiu pabam malinde.
Amon niu takum makai-nia khangmiboga Judah maigu chawang thiu-e, sigasu paniu Jerusalem ga takum nia mawang-e.
Papiu Manasseh kumjiu paniu Tingwang masuangga nuan kamde, khatdi papiuniu kahum khai mibo charamengdungtu paniu kahumde.
Chiudi papiu kum makjiu, para palung manon kiumakge khatdi
Amon gu chakampaodungniu patu suini makjiu patuse chawangkiningga kamshat mide.
Amon tu kamshat mibo maidungtu Judah maidungniu kamshat mide, sigasu panahpiu Josiah tu pijiu chawang thiukhaide.
Josiah takum tachat khangmiboga Judah maigu chawang thiu-e sigasu paniu Jerusalem ga takum samriu khat mawang-e.
niu kimbo paniu kamme; papao- chawang David gu lunlungtu paniu majai-e, Tingwang gu tacheng tajai pakhiangna maning makungjiu majai-e.

Josiah niu chawang thiuwang mibo takum tachat lungga, pah nachang najiu bambo gasu, paniu papao Chawang David Rawang tu kahumsu mide. Takum madai sailam paniu nkengmaigu kahumbo bamdung, charapui Asherah mengdung, khatdi kakibo rameng pakhiangnase kam maha mide.

Paniu jukhai bibo gasu pamaidungniu Baal tu kahumbo rathak bamdungse kamkao lujiu khatdi sibo mungga bambo parimwibo rukhaibo rathak bamdungse kamkao mide. Asherah meng sigasu kakibo charameng pakhiangna situ charathiu khaijiu shai mibo rawdungse phetaliang mide.
Paniu nkengmaigu singku mai rase paliuniu kahum bamdibo rathakbam riga ru-e. Haichiu kamjiu, paniu Judah mai khatdi Jerusalem maitu characheng saisuijiu kam masan khai lande.
Sichiujiu paniu namdidung gadi kamkhai-e, sichiujiu nchum mibo Manasseh, Ephraim, khatdi Simeon, sigasu kadiubo tingpilam Naphtali tangbo haikumjiu kamkhaide.

Nribo wangdi gu luongriang pakhiangnaga rathak bamdung, khatdi Asherah ramengdungse paniu kam maha kam mide, sigasu parim wibo rathak bamdungse kampang kam mide. Sichiulujiu Jerusalem lam malanwang mide.
Paniu mawangbo takum kariu-je-tachat lungga, nkengmaigu kahumbo bam kam maha khaibo gasu paniu kadih nai Charaky kam masan khailubo sai, chawang Josiah niu

Charaky lungga khomwang nbambo, Levi mainiu akhejiu bambo rangkangse Singku Dibo Hilkiah khuga benlen khaide. (Sise Ephraim maidung khatdi Manasseh maidung khugasu, sigasu Nribo wangdih, khatdi Judah maidung, Benjamin maidung khatdi Jerusalem maidung khugasu khomlubo-e).
Haibo rangkangse Charaky katinboga phuikhaijiu bambo maidung khangsum khuga benlen khaide,
sichiujiu paliuniu sise tasingsiam simaidung nai chaky thiumaidung khuga tatu nai tasing lulujiu chaky katinboga thinpiura Judah maigu wangdungniu kamkhaibo-e.

Changam kammaidungse palam hinaga paliu lung masanne. Paliutu Levi mai khang madainiu paliu riga bamlujiu changamse phuikhai bi-e: Merari kiriang gasu Jahath nai Obadiah, khatdi Kohath kiriang gasu Zechariah nai Meshullam (Levi maidungse chalui thiuboga charatriak mai kamme).
Kakibo Levi mainiu maniadung ponmeng ponwangboga khatdi katam-tambo ngam kammaitu phuijiu bambo-e, khatdi khangsiamai siniu charaokhuangdungse rijiu khatdi baijiu macha bambo-e.
Rangkangse baikhaibo kichen gasu lupadjiu bamboga, Tingwang niu Mose khuga pikhai mibo,
Paniu Shaphan khuga din-e, “Iniu Tacheng-tajai gu ariakkhuangse haibo Charaky lunggasu daolude.” Paniu ariakkhuangse Shaphan khuga pikhaide,
sichiujiu Shaphan niu sise chawang khuga pontadde. Paniu madupadle, “Nangniu chamtan khaibo hina aliuniu kamkhai mide.
Charaky lungga khai bambo rangkangse aliuniu khoilude khatdi changam kammai nai sise phuijiu bammai khuga benlen khai mide.”
Sigasu paniu dinsan-e, “Hilkiah niu akhuga pikhaibo ariakkhuangse haiga bamme.” Sigasu paniu sise chawang khuga pakhuan tanjiu kenpad khaide.
Ariakkhuangse kenpadjiu bambose, chawangniu chiuluboga, pachun sajiu pafai-pani phet sude.
Sigasu pahangga bambo chamtanse Hilkiah, Saphan nahpiu Ahikam, Micaiah nahpiu Abdon,
“Tadlujiu

Chawanggu chamtan saisuijiu, Hilkiah nai maidungniu Jerusalem namsan ga lungjiu bambo phaimiupui khat, Huldah kubo pui khuga menglujiu makhiamde. (Pakina hai Tikvah nahpiu, khatdi Harhas tahpiu, Shallum hainiu Charaky gu fai-ni phuibo mai-e). Degu padmijiulo chiubose paliuniu pakhuga dinkhaide,
siga paniu paliutu chawang khulam lang malanwang lujiu pahangga bambo chamse
“Chawang khuga kenpad khaibo ariakkhuangga raokhai bambo tasiangse , Jerusalem nai siga lungjiu bambo maidungtu Iniu sajai pirabo-e.

Paliuniu atu luthon mide sichiujiu kakibo radung khuga rathak mania kadpat khai mide, sichiujiu paliuniu kamkhaibo hinagasu agu lungpom kamkhai mide. Agu lungpomse Jerusalem riga sumide, khatdi sise nkhinkiu silak mide.
Chawang palengra, haise Israel mai Rawang,

khatdi nalung limide, sichiujiu Iniu Jerusalem khatdi siga bammaidung situ kam charenjiu sajai pikhai rabotu nangniu chiuluboga, nafai-nani phetjiu khatdi kapjiu, amasuangga naronna manon kiu-e. Narathoi Iniu chiukhaide,
sichiujiu Iniu Jerusalem riga piwangkhai rabo sajaise nangniu ringbambo lungga wanglakge. Iniu natu pijiu agi-manaijiu shai khaine.”
Simaidungniu Chawang Josiah khuga haibo cham phung lujiu wangmide.
Chawang Josiah niu Judah mai khatdi Jerusalem maigu jupaodung pakhiangnatu kuwang madui-e,

sigasu paliu aruanglujiu Charaky lam, singkudung nai Levi maidung khatdi kakibo maidung kalekwimai, kaleksamai tammakjiu tad machamde. Paliu mathiu masuangga, Charaky gasu daolubo chamriat khuang pakhiangnase chawangniu pakhuan tanjiu kenpad khaide.
Paniu chawanggu chapbamga chaplujiu
Paniu Benjamin maidung khatdi Jerusalem ga bammai hinatu pijiu ladriatse majaira kamkhaide. Haichiujiu Jerusalem maidungniu paliu pao-pehmai Rawang khuga ladriat thiukhai mibose paliuniu majaide.
Israel maigu luongriangga bambo kamangambo charameng hinase chawang Josiah niu kam maha mide, sigasu paniu karingthen, paliu pao-peh mai
Chawang Josiah niu
Singku maidungniu Charaky lungga tenrabo ngiudonse paniu pikhai bide khatdi sise kam mawira kachu khaibi-e.
Paniu haibo ladtidungse Israel maigu katipaodung, Levi mai
Charaky lungga naliu bamdungse, chakyriang saisuijiu Chawang David nai panahpiu Chawang Solomon niu naliu khuga pikhaibo saisuijiu kamlo,
sichiujiu Israel mai kikhun hinatu naliuniu nkhalura naliu ronna kamlulo.
Naliuniu Kenpadbo Ngeeleng milydung nai kamidungse kamshat rabo-e. Tuhoira naliu ronna characheng saisuijiu kam masanlulo khatdi
Kenpadbo Ngeega maidungniu thinra, Chawang Josiah niu pagu khaorui-khaona gasu, milydung, milypoidung sigasu kamipoidung sang samriu khatdi matomchi sang sum pipat khaibi-e.

Singku maidung khatdi Levi maidungniu thinpiura pagu chakampaodung niudi paliugu pipad khaibide. Khatdi Charaky phuijiu bambo chakampaodung, Singku Dibo, Hilkiah, Zechariah nai Jehiel niu singku maidung leng mily poidung khatdi kami poidung sang nia-je-kai charuk khatdi changee lungga rathak mania thiujiu kadpad raleng matomchi kai sum pipad khaibi-e.

Levi maigu jupaodung Konaniah, Shemaiah khatdi pasingnapiu Nethanel, Hashabiah, Jeiel, khatdi Jozabad niu milypoidung khatdi kamipoidung sang mangiu, khatdi Levi mainiu rathak mania thiujiu pipad raleng matomchi kai mangiu pikhai bide.
Kenpadbo Ngeeleng wahina kadenluboga, singkudung nai Levi maidungniu paliu bamdung chawangniu chamtan khaibo saisuijiu lude.
Milypoi khatdi kamipoidungse kamshat lubo sai, Levi mainiu chakhaogise gaopad khaide, sigasu singku mainiu tazaise rathakbam riga kajin khaide.
Khatdi paliuniu maidung khuga, kikhun gu paphom saisuijiu chakhaodungse rujiu-kadpadra Mose gu Tacheng-tajaiga bambo saisuijiu paliuniu kadpad ngamlura, njan khai bide.
Levi mainiu tajaidung saisuijiu kenpadbo mise chamiga rude, khatdi kadpad mibo masanbodungse chali kadibodung, khatdi khanglidung gasu langlujiu, katumjiu chamise maidung khuga njankhai bide.
Haise kamlubo sai, Levi mainiu paliuleng khatdi Aaron gasu lungkiubo singkumai leng chami njankhai bide, palamra singkumaise nchun masang rathakgu chakhaose rujiu pu-sangbo-e.

Pahangga bambo wakamsi maidungse Chawang David gu ladtikhaibo gasu paliu khuga njan khaibibo bamdungga bambo Asaph kiriang maigu Levi maise: Asaph, Heman, khatdi, chawanggu phaimiu Jeduthun paliu-e. Charaky rengmundung akhejiu bambo maidungniu paliu ngam phutra pageng bamson makge, palamra kakibo Levi mainiu Kenpadbose paliuleng macha khai-e.
Haichiujiu, Chawang Josiah niu chamtan pikhaibo saisuijiu, sibo tingmik nai
Siga jeng chinniase Israel mai pakhiangna Kenpadbo Ngee nai chakhi khaimakbo Taruak Ngeese changee khaide.

Phai-miukakung Samuel ken gasu Kenpadbo Ngee hai, haikumjiu wadaodi changilu makge. Pasuangga mawangpaodung, singkudung, Levi maidung sigasu Judah maidung, Israel maidung, khatdi Jerusalem maidungniu,
Josiah niu mawangbo takum kariu-tachadboga changi khaimibo Kenpadbo Ngee kumbose wadaodi changi matai makge.

Chawang Josiah niu pakhiangna haise Charaky leng kamkhai lubo sai, Egypt wangpiu Neco niu Euphrate Giu riga bambo Carchemish ga aphenraleng riphenmaitu maluang lujiu wang-e. Josiah niu patu khamra matande.

Chiudi Neco niu Josiah khuga haibo champaose langkhai-e, “Iniu aphenrabo rihai nakhuga npaorabo ha-e, Judah mai wangpiu yo, Iniu natu chari thiura wangbogu makge, chiudi agu mikremaitu aphenra leng-e, sichiujiu kalangjiu kammira Tingwang niu akhuga dinkhaibo-e. Tingwang niu alam chap bamme, haijengniu atu atung mane, sichiu maksai paniu natu kam mahami rabo-e.”
Chiudi Josiah niu chari thiura chaplude. Tingwang niu Neco khuga dinbose paniu lukhai makge, haichiujiu paniu palun kam kalilujiu Megiddo gu taningdihga chari thiura tadde.
Chari thiujiu bambo lungga Chawang Josiah tu Egypt maigu tavaithuniu kettao mide. Paniu pavangmai khuga chamtan pijiu din-e, “Atu kam mathiu mide; atu pontad milo!”

Paliuniu patuse pagu chaqon-kari gasu pon padlujiu, pakhuga bambo, niabo kuon-kari riga ponkhai lujiu, Jerusalem lam phungwang mide. Siga pah shaimide, sichiujiu patuse chawangmai rawga nphum khaide. Pah shai miboga Judah maidung khatdi Jerusalem maidung pakhiangna achung khaide.

Phaimiukakung Jeremiah niu Chawang Josiah leng kiuhuibo lui khat masing khaibi-e. Haise Israel maidungniu, maipui-maipiu tammakjiu patu achungboga haibo luise thiu-e. Chaluise kiuhuibo lui khom madui khaibo lungga daolune.
Josiah niu kamkhai mibo hina paniu
khatdi paracham paphibang gasu kaloi tangbo--pakhiangnase Israel mai nai Judah maigu Chawang mai Rachamga raokhai nbamme.
Judah maidungniu Josiah nahpiu Joahaz tu kadalujiu Jerusalem ga chawang thiura wasa manuk khaide.
Joahaz niu takum makai-sum khangmiboga Judah maigu chawang thiu-e, sichiujiu paniu Jerusalem ga chahiu sum mawang khai-e.
Egypt mai wangpiu Neco niu patu kavangleng puitad mide khatdi Judah maitu pijiu rangkang taju 3,400 khatdi kachia taju 34 ramkha thiujiu pira kamkhaide.
Neco niu Joahaz singnapiu Eliakim tu pijiu Judah mai wang pi thiukhai-e, sichiujiu pazanse Jehoiakim chiujiu mathak kalikhai bide. Joahaz tu Neco niu Egypt ga puitad mide.
Jehoiakim hai Judah gu chawang thiubo wan ga pagu takum makai mangiu tangmide, khatdi paniu Jerusalem ga takum kariu khatkiu mawang khai-e. Paniu
Siga Babylon gu chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu Judah ga charithiujiu Jehoiakim tu minlude, khatdi patu chagiriangniu khinlujiu Babylon lam majangwang mide.
Nebuchadnezzar niu Charaky gu chakhiu chalan kasia khoilujiu sise wang Babylon maigu chawangkining ga khai mide.

Jehoiakim niu kambo katam-tambo, pagu ngamkam khatdi paniu kamao kamkhaibo, pakhiangnase Judah mai nai Israel maigu Chawangmai Rachamga raokhai nbamme. Panahpiu Jehoiachin niu chawang thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Jehoiachin takum kariu-tachat khangmiboga Judah maigu chawang thiu-e, sichiujiu paniu Jerusalem ga chahiu sum khatdi naimikpui kariu mawang khaide. Padi

Kariakting wangboga, Chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu Jehoiachin tu kavangleng Babylon lam puitad mide, khatdi Charaky gu rangkangbungse pontad mide. Sigasu Nebuchadnezzar niu Jehoiachin piunabou Zedekiah tu Judah mai nai Jerusalem maigu chawang pithiu khaide.
Zedekiah takum makai-je-khat khangmiboga Judah maigu chawang thiu-e, sichiujiu paniu Jerusalem ga takum kariu khat mawang khaide.
Paniu
Zedekiah niu Chawang Nebuchadnezzar tu Tingwang zan gasu kadin piune chiujiu matanjiu patu tasiang-siangra kam khaibo piutu chari thiude. Palung tanjiu palung linimak khatdi Israel maigu
Haibo riga sanjiu Judah maigu jupaodung, singkudung khatdi maidungniu paliu wonjengga bambo charameng kahumbo jatdunggu nuan kambo lunlung saisui mide, haichiujiu
Paliu pao-pehmai Rawang
Chiudi paliuniu Tingwang gu champaodungtu nuimenjiu, paladtu wajeng simakge, sijengniu kanamboga
Haijengniu paliutu pijiu chari thiura
Babylon wangpiuniu Charaky, sibogu rangkang, sigasu chawanggu chakhiu chalan khatdi pagu chakampaodungtu sunglujiu,mania pakhiangnase Babylon lam phungtad mide.
Paniu Charaky nai namdigu chawangkining khatdi sibogu chakhiu-chalan rukam mide, sichiujiu namdigu karengse kampang kammide.
Ringbangmai pakhiangnatu paniu Babylon lam puitad mide, siga paliutu khatdi paliu kai-pakikdungtu kavang thiujiu Persia Wangdih sumak thenna macha sude.
Haichiujiu
copy
Persia maigu Cyrus niu wangdipiu thiu karaibo kum lungga, phaimiu Jeremiah khuga
“Haise Persia gu wangdipiu Cyrus gu chamtan-e. Tinggen Rawang,
Cyrus niu Persia mai Wangdi thiu karaibo kumga,
“Haise Persia mai Wangdipiu Cyrus gu chamtan, Tinggen Rawang,
Pamai hinatu Tingwang niu maluang khaibo thiumi sulo. Naliuniu Jerusalem lam malan wangjiu, Israel mai Rawang,

Kavang thiujiu bammai khatniu malan wangra nkha khaibo pageng bamsai pakiningmai siniu nkhakhai rabo-e. Sichiujiu paliuleng kachia rangkang khatdi khaorui-khaonadungdi, Jerusalem Rawang kyga kadkhaira pikhai rabo-e.”
Siga Tingwang niu paliu lungchun kachu khaibo hina, Judah mai nai Benjamin mai kiphiu gasu papeemai hina, singkudung Levi mai hina, Jerusalem ga wangjiu
Siga paliu kiningmai hinaniu paliuleng kachia, rangkang, chakuang chapiang, khaorui khaona, khatdi paman kungbo mania hina Charakyga kadkhaira pikhaide.
Chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu Jerusalem Raky gasu khoilujiu parakyga khaimibo chakuang chapiang hina sidi Cyrus niu paliuleng pimalan khai bide.
Paniu haidungse Judah maigu dihthinpao, Sheshbazzar leng chawanggu nbungripiu Mithredath khuga pikhai bide.

haisi-e.
Sheshbazzar niu kavang thiubam maidungtu Babylon gasu Jerusalem tadbo tingga kachia nai rangkang kuang piangdung pakhiangna 5,400 hai phung tadle.
Babylon gasu kavang thiujiu bam maidungniu Jerusalem nai Judah ga malan wangjiu namdiga lungbamme. Paliu haise chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu kavangleng mintad mibo gasu Babylon ga lungmibo-e.
Paliugu jupaodung sira Zerubbabel, Joshua, Nehemiah, Seraiah, Reelaiah, Mordecai, Bilshan, Mispar, Bigvai, Rehum khatdi Baanah paliu-e.
Kavang thiulujiu wangbo Israel mai kiriang gasu wangbo pariakdung siniu:
Parosh khugasu - 2,172
Shaphatiah khugasu - 372
Arah khugasu - 775
Pahath Moab (Joshua nai Joab kaikikmai) khugasu - 2,812
Elam khugasu - 1,254

Adin khugasu - 454
Ater (Hezekiah chiujiu kubo khugasu) - 98
Bezai khugasu - 323
Jorah khugasu - 112
Hashum khugasu - 223
Gibbar khugasu - 95
Pahangga raokhaibo namdakdung gasu wangbo maidung riak siniu:
Bethlehem gasu - 123
Natophah gasu - 56

Azmaveth gasu - 42
Kiriath Jearim, Chephirah khatdi Beeroth gasu - 743

Kavangthiubo gasu singku kiriang gasu wangbo riak siniu:
Jedaiah (Joshua kaikik gasu) - 973
Immer gasu - 1,052

Harim gasu - 1,017
Levi kiriang gasu kavang thiulujiu wangbo maidung riak siniu:
Joshua nai Kadmiel (Hodaviah kaikik) gasu - 74
Charakyga chalui thiumai (Asaph kaikik) gasu - 128
Charaky akhemai (Shallum, Ater,Talmon, Akkub, Hatita khatdi Shobai kaikik gasu) - 139 ye.
Kavangthiubo gasu malanwang lujiu Charaky thiubo kiriang siniu:
Ziha, Hashupha, Tabbaoth,
Keros, Siaha, Padon,
Lebanah, Hagabah, Akkub,
Hagab, Shamlai, Hanan,
Giddel, Gahar, Reaiah,
Rezin, Nekoda, Gazzam,

Neziah khatdi Hatipha paliu-e.
Kavangthiubo gasu malanwang Solomon tu machabo kiriang riak siniu:
Sotai, Hassopheret, Peruda,
Jaalah, Darkon, Giddel,
Shephatiah, Hattil, Pochereth,
Hazzebaim, khatdi Ami paliu-e.
Kavang thiubo gasu malan wangbo charaky thiumai khatdi Solomon tu machabo mairiak pakhiangna siniu- 392 ye.

Tel Melah, Tel Harsha, Cherub, Addan khatdi Immer namdakdung gasu wangbo Delaiah, Tobiah khatdi Nekoda paliu kiriang gasu wangmai siniu - 652 ye, chiudi paliu haira Israel mai kaikik gasu lungwang siakge chiubo din masan ngam makge.

Pahangga raokhaibo singkudung siniu paliu paopehmai kiriang din masan ngamlak maidung siniu: Habaiah, Hakkoz, khatdi Barzillai paliu-e.(Singku Barzillai kiriangmai siniu Gilead ga bambo Barzillai kiriang gasu maipui khattu lulujiu, papao kiriang lutad mibo-e). Paliu pao-peh siaktu sita mibo jengniu paliutu singku thiura suita mibo-e.
Jehudi maigu dihthinpao siniu din-e chiubora singku khatniu Urim nai Thummim
Kavang thiubo gasu malan wangbo ariak pakhiangna 42,360 ye.
Maipui maipiu kavang thiumibo riak siniu - 7,337
chalui thiubo maipui maipiu riak siniu - 200
chakuangdung riak siniu - 736
chaqon poidung riak siniu - 245
qontraodung riak siniu - 435
qonniamdung riak siniu - 6,720 ye.
Kavang thiumaidung siniu Jerusalem lam
Paliuniu ngamdiuthen pipadle, sichiujiu paliuniu pipadbo riak pakhiangna siniu kachia taju 500, rangkang taju 2,800 khatdi singkudung leng ntiang taronbo 100 pipadle.

Singkumai, Levi mai khatdi khangsia mainiu Jerusalem ga khatdi pamungga lung-e, chalui thiumai, akhemai, Charaky ngam kammai siniu namdak mungga lung-e. Kakibo Israel maidung siniu nda paliu pao-peh mainiu lungkhaibo namdakga lung-e.
Pachinniabo hiu gase Israel maidung paliu nam namga wanglan mide, Paliu mathiu Jerusalem ga wang madui sude.

Siga Jehozadak nahpiu Joshua, pakahmaidung, khatdi Shealtiel nahpiu Zerubbabel khatdi pasingnamai mathiu siniu Israel mai Rawang gu rathak bamse thiusu lande, sichiujiu paliuniu, Tingwang nai Mose gu Tacheng-tajaiga raokhaibo saisuijiu chara thiujiu wakad khaira kamde.
Sibo kadihga lungbammai jengniu, kavang thiubammai khangsiase wangpingjiu bamdi paliuniu rathakbamse thiusu lande. Sichiujiu naimachangna nsuan chawan-gu rathakse thiusude.
Paliu cheng saisuijiu Mathenlenbo Changee naimachang wakad khaijiu changee sude.
Sibo rigasu paliuniu maring rukhaijiu Hiusan Ngeega
Maidung siniu Charaky se thiusu makha gasu chinniabogu raithubo nai gasu paliuniu

Maidung siniu tatu karuimai, tasing kammai situ rangkang pibo riga katiu kasak khatdi takisa pijiu Tyre nai Sidon lamsu wa nkhiakra Lebanon gu magasingse duipui gasu Joppa lam phungwangra langkhaide. Pakhiangna hai Persia mai wangdipiu, Cyrus niu suikhaibo gasu kambo-e.

Sijengniu Jerusalem ga paliu wanglubo takumgu niabo hiu gasu changam kamsu mibo-e. Zerubbabel, Joshua khatdi pagu kadihga lung maidung, Levi mai, pachang siakjiu kavang thiubo gasu malan wangmai hina aruanglujiu Charaky hai thiusu mibo-e. Levi mai takum makai khatdi sibo riga bammai hinaniu charaky thiusu rabo ngam hai parid phungsude.

Levi mai, Joshua nai panahmai khatdi pasingna mai, khatdi Kadmiel nai panahmai (Hodaviah gu kiriang) aruang lujiu Charaky thiusubogu parid phung-e. (Paliutu Levi mai Henadad gu kiriangmai hinaniu nkha khai-e).

Maidung siniu Charaky phungse donsuboga, singkumai siniu paliu ntiang taronbo khailujiu paliu ben ga makese thinlujiu, khatdi Levi mai Asaph kiriangmai siniu siamtoy thinlujiu wang chapde. Chawang David ken gasu raokhaibo kumjiu paliuniu
tu thuonbo luise paliuniu thiulan lanjiu bamme;
Singku kating maidung, Levi maidung khatdi kiphiugu papee maidung siniu Charaky phung hai thiusubo ngaoboga paliu chun sajiu kapsude. Chiudi kakimaidung sira chunwi ringajiu makiak mara bamme.
Mai khatniudi kakapbogu nai chunwi ringabo khuanse sitam pad ngam makge, palamra paliu khuan kariose kadiu lamdi chiujiu bamme.
Judah mai nai Benjamin maigu mikremai siniu, kavang thiujiu bam maidungniu wanglujiu, Israel mai Rawang,

Siga paliuniu Zerubbabel nai kirianggu katingmai khuga tadlujiu din-e, “Charaky thiubo gase aliudi jaokhaine. Naliuniu kahumbo Rawang situ aliudi kahumjiu, Assyria maigu wangdipiu, Esarhaddon niu aliutu haiga lungra langkhaibo tinggasu aliuniu pakhuga charathiujiu wa kadkhai bambo-e.”
Zerubbabel, Joshua khatdi kiriangmaigu katingmai siniu paliu khuga din-e, “Aliuniu aliu Rawang,
Siga lungbammai siniu Jehudi mai lung kam nkhinjiu khatdi kapinjiu charaky se pi thiumakra matan sude.
Paliutu kam masa khaira paliuniu Persia maigu dihthin maitu tanim thiusude. Paliuniu haise Cyrus niu mawangbo ken gasu Darius niu mawangbo ken
Wangdipiu Xerxes niu mawang subo ting gasu Judah nai Jerusalem ga lungbammai riga, mikre maidung siniu paliutu suini makbo chamse raokhaijiu bambo-e.
Persia mai Wangdipiu, Artaxerxes niu mawangbo ken gadi, Bishlam, Mithredath, Tabeel khatdi paliu rupmai siniu Wangdipiu khuga ariak raokhai-e. Sibogu chamlense Aramaic
Dihthinpao, Rehum, nai raosui Shimshai siniudi Jerusalem lamga Artaxerxes khuga pahangga chamlen hai raokhai-e:
“Dihthinpao, Rehum, luongriang gu raosui Shimshai, paliu rupmai, ladjanpaodung khatdi kakibo chakampaodung khatdi ndagasu Erekh ga Babylon ga khatdi Elam kadihga bambo Susa ga lungbammai,
khatdi paken pangam dibopiu Ashurbanipal niu paliu ky gasu hathon mijiu Samaria mai namdiga khatdi Euphrate Giuki Tingnulam lungbam mai mathiu khugasu-e.”
Chamlen ga raokhaibo cham siniu hai-e;
“Wangdipiu Artaxerxes khuga, Euphrate Giuki Tingnulam bambo navangdung khugasu.

“Nagu kakibo kadihlam lungbammai Jehudi mai siniu Jerusalem haiga wang lunglujiu kasabo khatdi kadin piumakbo namdi situ thiusu lanra kambambo lamga Pakendibopiu natu pisikhai-e. Paliuniu karengse thiusu lan mide, haise loiji sune.
Pakendibopiu yo, haibo namdise thiuloi misai, maidung siniu nagu ramkha pita mine sichiujiu chawanggu senlanse nkhinkiu mirabo-e.
Tuhoira, Pakendibopiu nahangga aliu hai bambo jengniu haikumbo hai pipadra luni makbo donniu, nda napao-napehniu khaidiakbo ariakkhuangga phuilo.

Nangniu phuisai, haibo namdi hai nda gasu chawang maidung khatdi kadihgu mawangpaodung hai kadin piumakjiu lungbo namdi-e. Haibo maidungse tingthengjiu thinpiura kungbo-e. Sijengniu haibo namditu kam maha mibo-e.
Sijengniu haibo namdi karengse kamloi misai, Pakendibopiu niu Euphrate Giuki Tingnulam bambo kadihtu thinpiu kungmi rabo-e, chiubo aliuniu masanjiu sirabo-e.”
Wangdipiu siniu haichiujiu paokak khai-e:
“Dihthinpao, Rehum, luongrianggu raosui Shimshai khatdi Samaria ga khatdi Euphrate Giuki Tingnulam lungbambo parupmai khuga kahum khai-e.
“Naliuniu langkhaibo chamlense chali padjiu akhuga kenkhai-e.
Sise phuira Iniu chamtan pikhai-e, siga Jerusalem hai nda gasu chawanggu kadin piumakjiu n-gi athaojiu khatdi kasa kambo mai-e chiubo daolu-e.
Pumtan bambo wangdungniu siga khatdi Euphrate Giuki Tingnu pakhiangna mawangjiu ramkha khatdi rampon lujiu bamniu-e.
Sijengniu agu chamtan daolan makthen namdise thiuta mira naliuniu chamtan pikhai milo.
Haise kamnuang milo, sichiujiu Iniu masenbo haira kasabo padmak raleng-e.”
Haibo chamlense Wangdipiu Artaxerxes khugasu Rehum, Shimshai khatdi paliu rupmai khuga kenkhaiboga, paliuniu Jerusalem lam kalangjiu tadlujiu, namdise thiusulan tamira, Jehudi maitu manomjiu kamsude.
Persia mai Wangdipiu, Darius niu mawangbo takum paniabo kum tangbo, Charaky thiusubo ngam hai mathak mide.
Sibo wan ga phaimiukakung kania, Haggai nai Iddo nahpiu Zechariah niu Israel mai Rawang zan gasu Judah nai Jerusalem ga lungbammai Jehudi mai khuga dinsude.
Shealtiel nahpiu Zerubbabel nai Jehozadak nahpiu Joshua niu tachamse chiuluboga Jerusalem ga charaky se thiusu lande, siga phaimiukakung khangnia siniu panaitu nkhakhai-e.

Simakdakjiu Euphrate Giuki Tingnugu dihthinpao Tattenai, Shethar Bozenai khatdi parupmai chakampaodung siniu Jerusalem ga wanglujiu dinsude. “Saoniu naliutu haibo Raky thiusu lanra mania pijiulo khatdi chamtan pijiulo?”
Sironna makjiu Charaky thiubo gahai sao-saoniu nkha khailo chiubo mathiu zandi maniu sude.
Chiudi Jehudi maitu Tingwang niu phuikhaijiu bambo jengniu, Persia maidunggu chakampaodung siniu Darius khugasu chamkak daolan makthen wadi kamkiu makge.
Wangdipiu khuga paliuniu haichiu raokhaijiu paokhai-e:
“Wangdipiu Darius khuga, agi-manaijiu mawang bamlo.

“Aliuniu Judah kadihga tadlujiu kadibo Rawang Raky se tatukang kadibo nai kachum kadi-dibo khailujiu singbengse thiusu mide. Changamse tadkiu mawijiu bamme, chiubo hai Pakendibo piuniu siraleng lunibo-e.
“Maidunggu jupaodung khuga Charaky thiusu lanrabo mania nai pumtan hai saoniu pikhai gulo chiubo aliuniu maniu-e.
Sigasu changam kambo gahai sao-saoniu jukhailo chiubo paliu zandi maniu-e.
“Paliuniu paokakge, “Aliura Tinggen nai kadih Rawang vangmai-e, siniu nda Israel mai wang katanbo piuniu thiukhaibo pabam gase aliuniu Charaky hai thiusu lan bambo-e.

Chiudi aliu paopeh mainiu Tinggen Rawang lung kampom khaibo jengniu Chaldean mai jat chawang Nebuchadnezzar tu paniu paliutu pi ngamkhai mibo-e. Charaky situ kam mahamibo-e khatdi pamaidungtu Babylon lam kavangleng mintad mibo-e.
Siga Chawang Cyrus niu Babylon mai Wangdipiu thiujiu mawang karaibo kumga, Cyrus niu Charaky hai thiusu lanra chamtan pikhaibo-e.

Nebuchadnezzar niu Jerusalem Raky gasu kachia, rangkang khatdi chakuang chapiang sutlu wang Babylon lam parakyga khaimibo hina paniu malankhai bi-e. Cyrus niu haibo mania hinase Judah maigu dihthinpao, paniu kadakhaibo piu pazanniu Sheshbazzar khuga benlen khaibo-e.
Pakhiangna haise paniu phunglujiu wang, nda thiukhai mibo bamga, charakyse thiusu lanra Wangdipiuniu pakhuga dinkhaibo-e.
Siga Sheshbazzar niu wanglujiu kaphungse donsu khaijiu, khatdi thiusujiu tuhoi tangbo thiubambo-e, chiudi Charaky hai loilu makha-e.

“Tuhoira, Pakendibopiu niu nachunne sai, Cyrus niu Jerusalem ga Charaky hai thiusu lanra chamtan pima pimaklo chiubo Babylon ga pijiu Charaokhuang hina phuira kamkhailo, sichiujiu haibo lamga nangniu degu maninglo chiubo aliu khuga pisikhailo.”
Sijengniu Wangdipiu Darius niu Babylon ga chawang gu tienkam ariakkhuang phiura chamtan pikhai sude.
Chiudi haise Media luongriangga bambo Ecbatana namdi gasu ariak majiuhanse dao-e. Siga daobo lad siniu:

“Wangdipiu Cyrus niu masuang karaibo kumjiu Jerusalem Raky hai charathiu khaira khatdi maring rukhaibo bam thiuraleng thiusu lanmilo chiubogu chamtan pikhai-e. Charaky hai pakodniu chakhet kariuje sumkiu paphan, khatdi padetniu chakhet kariu-je-sumkiu paphan dijiu kamrabo-e.
Singbengse tatukang sat sum riga machang tasingpum sat kamkhai rabo-e. Siga kangutbo hinase chawanggu nbung gasu thinrabo-e.
Chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu Jerusalem Raky gasu khoilubo kachia, rangkang khatdi bungra hinase Jerusalem Raky pabamga malankhai mirabo-e.”
Pahangga raokhai bambo cham hai Darius niu paokak lanbo chamme:
“Euphrate Giuki Tingnugu dihthinpao, Tattenai, Shethar Bozenai khatdi Euphrate Giuki Tingnulam bambo chakampaodung khuga,
“Charaky gase bamta milo, haise thiubotu kam kabuak talo.
Judah maigu dihthinpao khatdi Jehudi maigu jupaodung situ nda pabamga Tingwang gu Raky hai pijiu thiusulan milo.
Sibo Rakyse thiura naliudi paliutu nkha khailo chiujiu Iniu chamtan haise pibo-e. Changamse kasut makra khatdi siga ngutbo hinase chawanggu Euphrate Giuki Tingnu lamsu wangbo ramkha gasu pirabo-e.
