Nchun n-nien simakjiu singkudungniu pageng bamme chiujiu dinbo kabuichipoi, mily, maksai milypoi, Tinggen Rawang khuga maring rukhaira khatdi kadkhai raleng, chabanmiu, matai, jaw maksai takisa hina tadi naliuniu maomakjiu pikhai rabo-e.
Paliuniu Tinggen Rawang khuga charathiu khaijiu khatdi khengkhaijiu pagu thoidamse ariga khatdi anahmai riga wanglu raleng haise kamrabo-e.
Mai khatkumboniu haibo chamtanse majai maksai paky chumse thui machum lujiu pawonpui kati taronsuan mirabo-e. Khatdi pakyse kam mahami rabo-e.

Siga Charaky bambo situ Chawang khatniu maksai jat khat kumboniu kam taniajiu kam mahara kamsai patuse sibo Rawang siniu kam mahalujiu luthonmi rabo-e. Darius, Iniu chamtan haise pikhaibo-e. Haisitu majaiphu rabo-e.”
Siga dihthinpao Tattenai, Shethar Bozenai khatdi pakamai chakampaodung hinase Wangdipiugu chamtan kumgapjiu kam khaide.

Jehudi maigu jupaodung siniu charaky se thiu mawijiu thiukhang sude, siga phaimiukakung Haggai nai Zechariah niu kachu khai-e. Israel mai Rawang niu khatdi Persia mai wangdihdung Cyrus, Darius khatdi Artaxerxes niu paliutu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu Charaky hai thiuloi mide.
Wangdipiu Darius niu mawangbo charukbo kumgu Adar hiu pasumbo naise paliuniu Charaky hai thiuloi mide.
Siga kavang thiubo lamsu wangbo singkudung, Levi mai khatdi Israel mai hinaniu chunwi ringajiu Charaky hai kadkhaide.
Paliuniu siga kabuichi kai khat, mily kai nia khatdi milypoi kai madai chiujiu kadkhaijiu charathiu khai-e, khatdi Israel mai kiphiu hinaniu kami kariuje niakiu nuan leng charathiu khai-e.
Mose gu ariakkhuangga raokhaibo kumjiu paliuniu Jerusalem Raky leng singkudung nai Levi maitu kada khai-e.
Kavangthiubo lamsu malan wangbo mai hina siniu pasaibo kumgu raithubo hiu jengriu-je-madaikiubo naise Kenpadbo Ngeese chagi sude.

Singkumai hina khatdi Levi maidung siniu tacheng saisuijiu paliu ronna kam masan lude. Levi mai siniu malanwang mai mathiuleng, khatdi singkumai khatdi paliuleng Kenpadbo leng charathiubo khaoruidungse kamshat khaide.
Charathiu khaibo mise kavang thiubo lamsu malanwang mai mathiu khatdi paliuniu lungbo kadihga nkengmai rachengtu phutmimai khatdi Israel mai Rawang,
Chakhi khaimakbo Taruak Ngeese paliuniu chunwijiu jeng chinnia changee sude. Assyria

Takum wajiukha sailam, Artaxerxes niu Persia mai wangdipiu thiubo tingga Ezra kubo mai khangkhat bamme. Paniu papao-papeh maitu phiu malan wangjiu singku dibo Aaron tangbo majang wangbo siniu: Ezra hai Seraiah nahpiu-e, pahai Azariah nahpiu-e, pahai Hilkiah nahpiu-e.
Pahai Shallum nahpiu-e, pahai Zadok nahpiu-e, pahai Ahitub nahpiu-e.
pahai Amariah nahpiu-e, pahai Azariah nahpiu-e, pahai Meraioth nahpiu-e,
pahai Zerahiah nahpiu-e, pahai Uzzi nahpiu-e, pahai Bukki nahpiu-e,
pahai Abishua nahpiu-e, pahai Phinehas nahpiu-e, pahai Eleazar nahpiu-e, pahai Aaron nahpiu-e.
Ezra haira tasi simawibo Israel mai Rawang,
Paliuniu raithubo hiugu raithubo naise Babylon phutkhai lujiu, Tingwang niu nkha khaibo jengniu Jerusalem gase pamangiubo hiugu raithubo naise wangtang mide.
Ezra haira
Artaxerxes niu singku khatdi tasi simawibo khatdi tacheng-tajai hina silujiu bambo Ezra khuga Israel maitu
“Tinggen Rawang gu tacheng-tajai simawibo singku Ezra khuga Wangdipiu Artaxerxes niu haichiujiu raokhai-e.
“Awangdihga lungbammai, singkumai, Levi mai Jerusalem ga nasai suilu tadnimai Israel mai hina tadra Iniu chamtan pikhai-e.
Iniu khatdi agu ladpimai khang chinnianiu naliu Rawang gu Tacheng-tajaiga raokhaibo saisuijiu Jerusalem nai Judah ga bammai siniu dejiukha majai bamlo chiubo phuira langkhaibo-e.
Jerusalem ga bambo Raky, Israel mai Rawang khuga Iniu khatdi agu ladpimaidungniu kadkhai mibo kachia nai rangkangse phunglulo.
Sigasu Babylon luongriang gasu khalubo kachia nai rangkang khatdi Israel mainiu khatdi singku mainiu paliu Rawang Jerusalem Rakyga kadkhaibo hinase phunglulo.
“Nangniu haibo sen-lanse thin mawijiu thinpiu rabo-e, Sichiujiu Jerusalem Raky gase kabuichi, midangchi, milypoi, alin-tara khatdi jaw kadkhaira liurabo-e.
Kamasiakbo kachia-rangkang siniu naliu Rawang maning saisuijiu thinpiubo sui-e.
Nakhuga pikhai mibo bungra hinase nangniu Jerusalem ga Tingwang khuga kadkhai rabo-e.
Sigasu Charaky leng pageng bambo hina chawanggu nbung gasu nangniu daobo sui-e.
“Euphrate Giuki Tingnulam bambo nbungrimai mathiu siniu Tinggen Rawang gu Tacheng tajaigu tasi simawibo khatdi singku Ezra niu kakhengbo hina pikhailo chiujiu Iniu chamtan pikhaibo-e.
Rangkang taju 3,400, chabanmiu taju 10,000, jaw-lah 2,000, takisa lah 2,000 khatdi pageng bambo hina, matai katang pirabo-e.
Tinggen Rawang siniu patu Kahumbokyga pageng bambo hinase naliuniu pikhai rabo-e, sichiujiu paniu ariga khatdi asai mawanglan ramai riga palungpom kamkhai mak rabo-e.
Naliuniu singkumai, Levi mai, chalui thiumai, akhemai, tatien thiumai khatdi sibo Rakyga jaobo mai khuga ramkha hai khamak rabo-e.

“Ezra yo, na-Rawang niu natu pikhaibo ningting thinlujiu Euphrate Giuki Tingnulam na-Rawang gu Tacheng tajai piujiu lungmaitu thinra ladjanpaodung nai chakampaodung kadakhai rabo-e. Sibo tacheng-tajai simak maitu nangniu katikhai rabo-e.

Mai khatkumboniu na-Rawang gu Tacheng tajaiga, maksai Wangdipiugu tacheng majai maksai, patuse kashaiboniu maksai kavangthiu khaiboniu maksai pagu mania kam mahaboniu maksai kavangkyga khaijiu sajai pirabo-e.”
Ezra niu din-e, “Aliu paopehmai Rawang tu thuonlo! Paniu Jerusalem ga bambo
Tingwang lungsiat gasu, Iniu Wangdipiu, pagu ladpimai khatdi pagu pumtan bambo chakampao maigu nkha daolubo-e.
Artaxerxes niu Wangdipiu thiubambo tingga Ezra niu Babylon ga kavangthiu bam maitu maluang wangbo kirianggu papeemaidung sira:
Phinehas kiriang gasu Gershom,
Ithamar kiriang gasu Daniel,
David kiriang gasu Shecaniah nahpiu Hattush,
Parosh kiriang gasu, Zechariah pamai 150 jao-e, (paliu paopehmai riak raokhaibo khuang bamme)
Pahath Moab kiriang gasu Zerahiah nahpiu Eliahoenai, khatdi pamai 200 di jao-e,
Jattu kiriang gasu Jehziel nahpiu Shecaniah, khatdi pamai 300 di jao-e,
Adin kiriang gasu Jonathan nahpiu Ebed, khatdi pamai 50 di jao-e,
Elam kiriang gasu Athaliah nahpiu Jeshaia, khatdi pamai 70 di jao-e,
Shephatiah kiriang gasu Michael nahpiu Zebadiah, khatdi pamai 80 di jao-e,
Joab kiriang gasu Jehiel nahpiu Obadiah, khatdi pamai 218 di jao-e,
Bani kiriang gasu Josiphiah nahpiu Shelomith, khatdi pamai 160 di jao-e.
Bebai kiriang gasu Bebai nahpiu Zechariah, khatdi pamai 28 di jao-e.
Azgad kiriang gasu Hakkatan nahpiu Johanan, khatdi pamai 110 di jao-e,
Adonikam kiriang gasu Eliphelet, Jeuel nai Shemaiah khatdi maidung 60 di jao-e, (Paliura wang kanambi-e)
Bigvai kiriang gasu Uthai nai Zakkur khatdi pamai 70 di jao-e.
Ahava namdakga bambo alod gase Iniu mai hinatu kumadui lujiu siga jeng sum riji thiukhang-e. Siga singkumai bamme, chiudi Levi mai khatnadi ha-e.
Iniu jupaomai khang chakiutu, Eliezer, Ariel, Shemaiah, Elnathan, Jarib, Elnathan, Nathan, Zechariah khatdi Meshullam sigasu katipao kania Joiarib nai Elnathan paliutu langkhai-e.
Iniu paliutu Iddo lam, Charakyga changam kammai khangsiatu Charakyga Tingwang tu machara Casiphia ga papee thiubo khatdi parupmai khuga khengkhai-e.
Tingwang lungsiat gasu, paliuniu Levi mai khat, Mahli kiriangga suniu wakam kangambopiu Sherabiah khatdi panahmai khatdi pasingnamai kariu tachattu aliu khuga langkhai-e.
Paliuniu Merari kiriang gasu Hashabiah nai Jeshaiah chiujiu paliu singnamai khang makai tudi langkhai-e.
Sibo riga sanjiu Chawang David niu khatdi pagu chakampaodungniu Charakyga changam kamra khaimai 220 tudi Levi maitu nkhakhai radi bamme. Paliu mathiu zanse raokhai bambo-e.

Ahava Alod gase aliuleng kalum rijiu Tingwang masuangga aliu ronna kam manonlujiu aliugu tabin ga aliutu, aliu-nao, aliu nahdungtu khatdi aliugu mania hinatu gukhaira Tingwang khuga khengra Iniu chamtan pikhaide.

Aliugu tabin-ga aliutu akhe khaira Wangdipiu khuga Iniu riphen maitu khengra mangamme, palamra Tingwang niu patu malummai hinatu thoikhai bi-e, chiudi pakhu gasu marimi maitu palung pomjiu sajai pibo-e chiujiu Iniu pakhuga dinkhai kamigu-e.
Sijengniu aliutu gukhaira aliuniu kalum rijiu Tingwang khuga khengsude, siga paniu aliu rathoise paokak khaide.
Singkumai jupao ruanggasu Iniu, Sherebiah nai Hashabiah khatdi khang kariutu kada khaide.
Charaky lungga thinpiura, Wangdipiuniu, pagu ladpimainiu, chakampao mainiu khatdi Israel mainiu pikhaibo kachia, rangkang bungradungse madiulujiu, singku maidung khuga Iniu pikhai bide.
Iniu pikhai mibo sira:
rangkang- taju 22,000,
rangkanggi taju 70 niu kambo bungra
kachia taju- 3,400,
kachia taju 8.4 niu kambo chagankuang- 20
tataagi niu kambo, kachia gu panai nchambo chagan kuang 2, haidung si-e.
Iniu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu haira naliu paopeh Rawang,
Charaky wangtang makthen naliuniu phuimawi rabo-e. Sichiujiu Jerusalem ga bambo Israel maigu jupaodung, Levi maidung khatdi singkugu jupaodung khuga sise madad lujiu pikhai milo.”
Sichiujiu singkumai nai Levi mainiu kachia, rangkang khatdi bungra hinase Jerusalem Raky gara akhi mirabo-e.
Raithubo hiuga jeng kariuje-niakiubo naise aliuniu Ahava Alod situ phutlujiu Jerusalem lam tadsude. Aliugu tabin gase aliu Rawang niu aliugu mikremainiu atungbo khatdi limbo gasu maluang khaibi-e.
Aliuniu Jerusalem wangboga jeng sum mathak khaide.

Sichiujiu pamadaibo naise aliuniu Charaky gase tadlujiu, kachia, rangkang khatdi bungra hinase madad lujiu Uriah nahpiu Meremoth singku khuga benlen khai mide. Siga patuse Phinehas nahpiu Eliezar khatdi Levi mai khangnia, Joshua nahpiu Jozabad nai Binnui nahpiu Noadiah paliuniu maluanglu bamniu-e.
Wahinase chaklude khatdi madad lude sichiujiu sibo wan gasu tachak khuangse kamkhai mide.

Siga kavangthiubo gasu malanwangbo mai hina siniu Israel mai Rawang khuga rukhaijiu charathiu khairabo podkad hinase phungwang-e siga paliuniu Israel mai mathiuleng matomchi 12, kamichi 96, milypoi 77, kadkhai-e; paliu nuan gasu paliutu kam masanbo thiujiu kami 12, kadkhai-e. Pakhiangna hai

Khatdi Wangdipiuniu paliu khuga pikhaibo ladsiang khuang sidi paliuniu khoilujiu Euphrate Giuki Tingnu lamgu dihthinpaodung khatdi chakampaodung khuga pikhaijiu paliuniu Charakyga kahum maidungtu nkha khaide.

Haichiu kamlubo saiga, Israel maigu jupaodung khangsianiu wanglujiu, singku maidung nai Levi maidung siniu, Ammon, Moab khatdi Egypt kadih gasu maksai Canaan mai, Hitt mai, Periz mai, Jebus mai, khatdi Amor mai khugasu lung tamsin makge chiujiu akhuga wangjiu paokhai-e. Paliudi simaidungniu kambo mangambo ngamse kamkhai mibo-e.
Jehudi mai siniu sangdiumai puidung situ magiangjiu, Tingwang gu masanbo maidungse haichiu tania mide. Jupaodung nai chakampaodung siniu kamao kamboga papee thiumide.
Iniu haise chiuboga afai phetjiu apidi tamaimak, a-ntanggiudi majut makjiu achun saboniu phuilujiu ntaokiude.
Iniu siga chawan-gu rathak wan tangbo ntaobam miboga maidung siniu amungga ntao magui sude. Kavangthiubo gasu malanwangbo Israel mai khuga Tingwang niu dinbose chiulumai hina pingchang ping mide.
Chawan rathak wanse wangtangboga, Iniu achun sajiu bambo gasu, afai phet mibose khailujiu wang a-Rawang,
Iniu haichiu kheng-e, “Hey Tingwang yo, nasuangga Iniu apee ngangkhang radi mangamju mide. Aliu nuan hai aliu thensuang kukhangjiu tinggen tangbo tungtang mide.

Namaidung aliu haira, nda aliu paopeh ken gasu tuhoi katang nuan kamjiu bambo-e. Aliu nuandung jengniu, aliutu, aliu wangdungtu, aliugu singkudungtu, sangdiumai ben-ga pikhaijiu, aliutu kamshat mide, aliugu sutlude, khatdi aliutu kavangleng puitad mide. Aliu hai thainai kumjiu kamangambo siniu phuijiu bambo-e.
Hey aliu Rawang,

Aliu hai kavangthiu bamniu-e, chiudi siga nangniu aliutu phutkhai makge. Nangniu Persia mai Wangdipiudungtu pijiu aliutu lungsa khaijiu Judah nai Jerusalem lam malanwang lujiu lungra khatdi nagu Charaky hai thiusu lanra pijiu suikhai bibo-e.
“Chiudi haise padmibo sai, aliuniu degu dinralo? Nangniu navangmai, phaimiukakungmai khuga pikhaibo chamtanse aliuniu piutalan mide.
Aliuniu lungrabo kadih haise masan makge, palamra siga lungmaidungse kadih pake khatlamsu khatlam tangbo mai mataisabo ngamse paliu kamme chiujiu phaimiukakung mainiu aliu khuga dinkhai-e.
Sibo kadihga aliuniu lungjiu aman nisai khatdi aliu kaikiktu pijiu tingtheng lungkhai nisai, aliuniu wadaodi paliutu magiang makrabo-e khatdi paliutu nkhakhai makrabo-e chiujiu aliu khuga dinkhai-e.
Tingwang nangniu aliutu sajai pikhaijiu bamliudi aliuniu kamkhaibo kakhui-kamaobo, aliu nuan sung tangmakge chiubo aliu si-e, sichiujiu aliutu piring khaibo-e.
Sichiusai aliuniu dechiujiu nagu ladrianse wajeng simakjiu, kasabo maidung haitu magiang lanralo? Aliuniu kamlansai, nalung pomjiu mai khat tudi masiak makjiu aliutu kam mahami rabo-e.
Israel mai Rawang,
Ezra niu Charaky kamagase kapjiu haibo nuandungse paomadujiu kakhengthiu bamboga, maipuidung, khatdi maipiudung nahmaidung—Israel mai kakengkha kap marung kasinjiu pakhuga wang madui sude.
Siga Elam kiriang gasu Jehiah nahpiu Shecaniah niu Ezra khuga din-e, “Aliu sangdiumai puidungtu magiangjiu Tingwang tu malumbo gasu kampang mide, chiudi Israel maileng lukhai lanra poinakha bamkha-e.

Aliuniu haibo puidung haitu paliu nahdung jaojiu phutmine chiuboga ladrian katanbo khat Tingwang khuga kamkhai rabo-e. Nangniu khatdi Tingwang gu chamtantu chakhuang thiumai siniu, aliutu ladpi khaibose aliuniu kamrabo-e. Tingwang gu Tacheng-tajainiu lunibose aliuniu kamrabo-e.
Changam kamrabo haise nangniu parid phungrabo-e. Aliu nasaiga bamme, siniu tadlujiu kamsulo.”
Sijengniu singku maigu, Levi maigu khatdi Israel maigu jupaodung situ Shecaniah siniu dinbo kumjiu Ezra niu paliutu tasiang pisiang khai sude.
Sichiujiu Eliaship nahpiu Jehohanan niu bambo kalung lamse ngutlujiu kavangthiu tadmi maidung jengniu pachun sajiu sibo nchunse bamsang-e. Pah wadi tiumakge khatdi sakmakge.
Maidunggu jupaodung chamtan saisuijiu kavang thiutad mibo gasu malanwang maidung hina Judah gadi Jerusalem gadi bammai mathiuse Jerusalem ga wang maduira chamtan pikhaide.
Mai khatkumboniu jengsum lungga wangmak tasai pagu mania hina kam mahami rabo-e khatdi patuse mathiu ruangga chakkhaita mirabo-e.

Chakiubo hiugu, jeng makaibo naise jengsum lungga, Judah nai Benjamin luongriangga bammai hinase Charaky kamaga wang madui sude. Tingriu matanju kamibo nai maduigu kakungbo cham siniu mai hinase kaphikrai-rai mide.
Singku, Ezra niu chapkhang lujiu paliu khuga dinsude. Paniu din-e, “Naliu matun kamakbo jengniu sangdiumai puidungtu magiangjiu Israel mai riga chakhui-chamao phungwang mibo-e.
Sijengniu tuhoira naliu paopehmai Rawang,
Maidung siniu chakhuan senjiu paokakge, “Nangniu dinbo hina aliuniu kamrabo-e.”

Chiudi paliuniu dinlan-e, “Maidung kengju-e, khatdi tingsa mathiuju mide. Aliuniu haichiujiu haiga chapbam ngamlak mide. Haise aliuniu naikhat, jengnia lunggasu kamlu lakbo kumme, palamra aliu mai kakeng khaniu haibo nuan hai kammibo-e.

Aliugu chakampaodungtu Jerusalem ga bamlujiu haibo lamga pijiu parid phungmilo. Sangdiumai puidungtu lubo mai hina siniu namdiga jupaodung nai ladjanpaodungtu npaolu sulo. Haichiusai haibo lamga Tingwang lungpom gasu marilu bui-e.”
Levi maipiu, Meshullam nai Shabbethai gu nkha ponjiu chapbo Asahel nahpiu Jonathan nai Tikvah nahpiu Jahzeiah makbo mai khatniudi haibo lamga suini makbo thiumakge.
Kavangthiubo gasu malanwangbo maidungniu suikhaibo jengniu, kiriang hina gasu papeemaidung zanse Ezra niu kadalujiu raokhai-e. Kariubo hiugu raithubo naise paliuniu sibo lamga phiusude,
sichiujiu chahiu sum lung gasu sangdiumai puidungtu lubo maidunggu tathu hina paliuniu phiupad kam lude.
Sangdiumai puidungtu lubo mairiak siniu:
Singkumai, kiriang gasu raokiubo:
Joshua nai pasingnamai, kiriang gasu Jehozadak nahmai, Maaseiah, Eliezer, Jarib khatdi Gedaliah paliu-e.
Paliu hainiu paliu nao tamira ladriat thiukhai-e, khatdi paliu nuan jengniu charathiu khaira milychi khat kadkhaide.
Immer gu kiriang gasu: Hanani nai Zebadiah.
Harim gu kiriang gasu: Maaseiah, Elijah, Shemaiah, Jehiel khatdi Uzziah paliu-e.
Pashur gu kiriang gasu Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethanel, Jezabad khatdi Elasah paliu-e.
Levi maidung siniu:
Jozabad, Shimei, Kelaiah (Kelita chiudi kubo), Pethahiah, Judah khatdi Eliezer paliu-e.
Chalui thiumai siniu: Eliashib-e
Charaky akhemai siniu: Shallum, Telem khatdi Uri paliu-e.
Kakimaidung siniu:
Parosh kiriang gasu: Ramiah, Izziah, Malchijah, Mijamin, Eleazer, Malchijah khatdi Benaiah paliu-e.
Elam kiriang gasu: Mattaniah, Zechariah, Jahiel, Abdi, Jeremoth khatdi Elijah paliu-e.
Jattu kiriang gasu: Elioenai, Eliashib, Mattaniah, Jeremoth, Zabad khatdi Aziza paliu-e.
Bebai kiriang gasu: Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai khatdi Athlai paliu-e.
Bani kiriang gasu: Meshullam, Malluch, Adaiah, Jashub, Shoal khatdi Jeremoth paliu-e.
Pahath Moab kiriang gasu: Adna, Khelal, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattaniah, Bezalel, Binnui khatdi Manasseh paliu-e.
Harim kiriang gasu: Eliezer, Isshijah, Malchijah, Shemaiah, Shimeon, Benjamin, Malluch khatdi Shemariah paliu-e.
Hashum kiriang gasu: Mattenai, Matattah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh khatdi Shimei paliu-e.
Bani kiriang gasu: Maadai, Amram, Uel, Benaiah, Bedaiah, Cheluhi, Vaniah, Meremoth, Eliashib, Mattaniah, Mattenai khatdi Jaasu paliu-e.
Binnui kiriang gasu: Shimei, Shelemiah, Nathan, Adaiah,Machnadebai, Shashai, Sharai, Azarel, Shelemiah, Shemariah, Shallum, Amariah khatdi Joseph paliu-e.
Nebo kiriang gasu: Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jaddai, Joel khatdi Benaiah paliu-e.
Haimaidung hinase sangdiumai puidungtu paliu naoleng kubo-e. Paliuniu paliutu takhai lujiu, paliu nahdungtu maluong lujiu pitad mide.
Haise Hacaliah nahpiu Nehemiah niu kam tathuilubo tachak khuang-e.
Persia gu wangdipiu Artaxerxes niu mawangbo takum makaibogu Kislev hiuga Nehemiah, I Susa dihsingga bamme.
Judah lamsu, asingnamai khangkhat, Hanani niu chamai bao khattu maluanglu wang-e, Iniu simai khuga, Jerusalem lamga khatdi Babylon lam kavangthiu lujiu malanwang mai, singna Jehudi mai lamga maniu-e.

Ring masiak padlujiu chaky lam malanwang maidungse chariuchang chariujiu bamme, khatdi paliu mungga lungbo sangdiumai siniu paliutu nuimenjiu bamme chiubo paliuniu akhuga dinkhai-e. Sironna makjiu Jerusalem rengse palunjiu kaobam kha-e, sichiujiu rengmundungse nda rumibo gasu thiulan makha-e chiubodi paliuniu akhuga dinkhai-e.
Haibo lam hina Iniu chiugapboga, I ntao kiulujiu kap sude.
Tingmik wajiukha Iniu achungjiu wadi tiuta mide. Iniu Tingwang khuga kakheng thiu-e.
“Tinggen Rawang,
Navang Israel maileng Iniu nchun n-nien khengbo arathoi hai chiukhailo, sichiujiu atu phuikhailo,
Nangniu chamtan pibose kam makjiu, nangniu luni makbo kasabose aliuniu kam mide. Navangpiu Mose khuga aliuleng tacheng-tajaidung pikhaibose aliu piumakge.
Mose khuga nangniu dinkhai mibose tuhoi makumtao khailo: Israel mai naliuniu akhuga nchang makge sai, Iniu naliutu katambo jat ruangga pijiu lung mara-maren khaimi rabo-e.

Chiudi naliuniu akhuga malanwang Iniu naliu khuga pikhaibo chamtanse majai sai, naliuniu kadih pamalan katang lung mara-marenmi bamtadi, Iniu kadapad khai mibo kahumrabo bamga naliutu Iniu majangwang khailan birabo-e.’
Natu chakhuang thiubammai navang maidung paliu mathiu khatdi arathoi hai nking khailo. Chawangniu atu lungsa khaijiu thainai amaning tangra kamkhailo.”
Sibo tingga I wangdipiugu jaw machajiu bambo-e.
Chahiu madaisai naikhat, Wangdipiu Artaxerxes niu watiu bamga, Iniu paleng jaw ponwang-e. Iniu masuang chariubo lun paniu wadaodi ngaokhai makha-e.
Siniu akhuga paniu maniu-e, “Dechiu natu ngao chariusui jiulo? Nang mara makrai, nang nalung amanmak bijiu bamne.”
I asuang hamide.
Sichiujiu Iniu paokakge, “Awangpiu tingthengjeng ringbam milo! Apao-apehtu nphumkhai mibo namdi kam mahamijiu khatdi rengmundung chaminiu rumisai dechiu achun mathalu ralo?”
Chawangniu maniu-e, “Nangniu nde masenjiulo?”
Iniu tinggen lam bambo Tingwang khuga khenglujiu.
Iniu wangdipiu khuga din-e, “Pakendibopiu atu lungsa khaijiu Iniu khengbo pikhaine sai, apao-apeh maitu nphum khaimibo namdi Judah kadih situ Iniu thiusu lanra suikhailo.”
Iniu khengbo hai wangdipiu nai wangdipui siniu suikhaide. Iniu dethengkha tadralo, dedao malanwang ralo chiujiu paniu maniu-e siga Iniu pakhuga dinkhaide.
Sichiujiu Judah lam tadraleng Euphrate luongriang tingnu lamgu dihthinpaodung khuga ariak raokhaira Iniu pakhuga kheng-e.

Charaky akhebo rengmun hinaleng, namdigu karengdung khatdi Iniu lungrabo kyleng tasing pira chawanggu mariu thinpao Asaph khuga chawanggu chamlen raokhai raleng Iniu kheng-e. Tingwang niu atu majang khaibo jengniu, Iniu khengbo hinase wangdipiuniu pikhaide.
Riphenmaigu kadimai kasiatu khatdi chaqon riphendungtu wangdipiuniu langkhaijiu Euphrate giuky Tingnulam aliu kemsude. Siga wangdipiugu chamlense Iniu dihthinpaodung khuga benlen khaide.

Chiudi Beth Horon namdi gasu wangbo Sanballat, khatdi Ammon luongren-gu chakampao Tobiah niu, Israel maileng wa kawibo kamkhaira mai khat wang bamme chiubo cham chiuluboga, panai lung pomchang pomsu mide.
Jerusalem mengtangjiu jengsum bam khaide.

Iniu Jerusalem leng tatien thiukhaira Tingwang niu atu kachu khaibo lamga mai khat khugadi dinpad makge. Sigasu chunding tingga I buangsu lujiu apam kasia majanglujiu tadpadle. Iniu tuangbambo qonniamse makbo kakibo khaoring majang makge.

Nchun masang I naimik ngutlam bambo Ramjeng Rengmun gasu tadpat lujiu tingrunlam bambo Mantage gu Akhun kenpadjiu Taniabo Rengmun lam tad khaide. Haichiu tadwangjiu namdi karengdung pangmibo khatdi chaminiu rumibo rengmundung phui tadde.
Sigasu namdigu naimik padlam Duipuak Rengmun-gu tingpilam Iniu tadmari khangjiu Chawang Ajaiga khang khaide. Iniu tuangbambo qonniamse ngutra npui hamide,
siga Iniu Kidron ramjeng gasu, qonniam tuanglujiu karengse mengphui tadle. Iniu tadbo npuilam malan wangjiu Ramjeng Rengmun tadronjiu namdiga wanglan mide.

Siga bammai katheng kadimai khatniudi I delam tami gulo khatdi dekambo tien thiujiulo chiubo simakge. Tuhoi katangbo Jehudi mai karai, singkumaidung, jupaodung, katheng kadi maidung, khatdi tatien thiu nchamra mai khat nakha khugadi dinkhai makge.

Tuhoira Iniu paliu khuga din-e, “Jerusalem hai kam masalujiu taliangkhai bambo jengniu khatdi haibo rengmun hina kam mahamibo jengniu aliu dejiukha chariu bambo gulo chiubo phuilo! Namdi kareng hina taliulan sukhe; sichiujiu aliu mangam kam mahami sukhe.”
Tingwang niu atu dechiu majangkhai gulo khatdi dechiu atu nkhakhai gulo? Sigasu wangdipiuniu akhuga dinkhaibose Iniu paliu khuga dinkhai bide.
Paliuniu kenkakge, “Khe aliu thiu sukhe!” Sichiujiu paliuniu changamse kamsura kaden mide.
Aliuniu kamsu raleng rangbambose Sanballat, Tobiah, khatdi Arab maipiu Geshem paliuniu chiuluboga, nuijiu din-e, “Naliu nde kambam jiulo? Naliu wangdipiutu charithiu rama?”
Iniu paokakge, “Tinggen Rawang siniu aliutu pijiu ngamkhai rabo-e. Aliu hai pavang maidung-e, aliuniu thiusu mine. Chiudi Jerusalem ga naliugu mania wadi ha-e, haiga ndagasu naliu dam wadi ha-e.”

Namdi rengse dechiu thiusulo chiubo guse hai-e. Singku Dibo Eliashib nai pakamai singkudungniu Mily Rengmun hai thiulujiu kadngut khaide khatdi rengmundungse pabamga kam khaide. Paliuniu Kaikhat gu Akheky Ton tangbo khatdi Hananel gu Akheky Ton kadngut khaide.
Sibosai Jericho mainiu thiukiu lande.
Sibosai, Imri nahpiu Zakkur niu thiusu lande.
Hassenaah kiriang mainiu Chakha Rengmun thiusude. Paliuniu kachumdi, rengmundi pakhai-khaiga kam khaide. Sigasu khamten taliu khaide.
Uriah nahpiu khatdi Hakkoz tahpiu Meremoth niu sibo saiga thiusu lande.
Berekhiah nahpiu Meshullam khatdi Meshezabel tahpiuniu sibosai thiusu lande.
Baana nahpiu Zado niu pachali thiusu lande.
Tekoa mainiu pachali thiusu lande, chiubamdi nammaigu jupaodungra papao kathiumainiu langkhaibo ngamse kamni makge.
Paseah nahpiu Joiada khatdi Besodeiah nahpiu Meshullam niu Jeshanah Rengmun haise thiusu khaide. Panainiu kachumdi, rengmundi pakhai-khaiga kamkhaide, khamtense taliu khaide.
Gibeon gasu Milatiah, Meronoth gasu Jadon, khatdi Gibeon mai nai Mizpah mainiu pachali thiusu khaide, sichiujiu Euphrate giuky Tingnu lam dihthinpao kalungbo bam katang thiusu khaide.
Harhaiah nahpiu Uzziel, kachia kambo piuniu pachali thiukhai lande.
Parim wibo taliubo piu Hananiah niu Dibo Reng katang taliu khaide.
Jerusalem luongren paphan thinpao, Hur nahpiu Rephaiah niu pachali thiusu lande.
Harumaph nahpiu Jedaiah niu pachali, paky mungga bambo katang taliu khaide.
Hashabneiah nahpiu Hattush niu pachali kam khaide.
Harim nahpiu Malchijah khatdi Pahath Moab nahpiu Hashub niu pachali khatdi panainiu N-mang Kytonse thiukhai lande.
Jerusalem luongren paphan thinpao, Hallohesh nahpiu Shallum niu pachali thiulande. (Panahpuidungniu sibo tiense nkha khai-e).
Hanun khatdi Zanoa namdiga lungmainiu Ramjeng Rengmun thiusu lande. Paliuniu rengmun akham khatdi khamten taliu khai lande. Paliuniu gaphek kai madai atai thengbo Taniabo Rengmun katin khaide.
Beth Hakkherem luongren thinpao, Rechab nahpiu Malkijah niu Taniabo Rengmun katinkhaide. Paniu akham nai khamten taliu khaide.

Mizpah luongren thinpao, Kolhozeh nahpiu Shallum niu, Duiruak Rengmun thiusu khaide. Paniu rengmun hai khup khaide, khatdi akham kamlujiu khamten taliu khaide. Paniu Shelah Ajai mungga bambo chawang rengse David Namdi gasu tadkiubo tason katang kam khaide.
Bethzur luongren paphan thinpao Azbuk nahpiu Nehemiah niu, David rao, ajai khatdi riphenmai ky katang thiu khaide.
Pahangga bambo Levi mainiu kareng pachen kakeng thiusu khai lande:
Bani nahpiu Rehum niu pachali thiukhai lande,
Keilah luongren paphan thinpao, Hashabiah niu pagu luongren malin gasu pachali thiu khaide.
Keilah luongren paphan thinpao, Hanadad nahpiu Bavvai niu pachali thiu khaide.
Mizpah gu mawangpao, Jeshua nahpiu Ezer niu pachali chari mania baikhaibo ky magasu kareng ka-nbungbo katang thiusu khaide.
Zabbai nahpiu Baruch niu singku Dibo Eliashib ky ngutbo npui katang thiusu khaide.
Uriah nahpiu khatdi Hakkoz tahpiu Memeroth niu Eliashib ky pamalan katang thiusu khaide.
Pahangga raokhaibo singkudungniu kareng pachen kakeng thiusude:
Jerusalem wonjeng gasu singkudungniu pachali thiusu khaide.
Benjamin nai Haashub niu panai ky masuangga bambodung thiusu khaide.
Maaseiah nahpiu khatdi Ananiah tahpiu Azariah niu paky masuangga bambo hina thiusu khaide.
Henadad nahpiu Binnui niu Azariah ky gasu kareng kamik tangbo pachaliga thiusu khaide.
Uzai nahpiu Palal niu kareng kamik khatdi akhebam mungga bambo kakubo chawangkininggu akheky ton khatdi kareng kamik katang thiusu khaide.
Parosh nahpiu Pedaiah niu pachaliga naimik padlam Tadui Rengmun khatdi Charaky ton katang thiu khaide. (Ophel kubo namdi hai charaky tien thiumai kalungbo bam mungga-e).
Sibosai Tekoa mainiu pachali, niabo siniu Charaky akheky ton kadibo kamik gasu sujiu Ophel katangbo thiu khaide.
Singku phom khatniu Chaqon Rengmun gasu tingpilam paliu ky-ky katang thiukhaide.
Immer nahpiu Zadok niu pachaliga, paky maga bambose kamkhaide.
Tingbang Rengmun khuanpiu Shecaniah nahpiu Shemaiah niu pachali thiu khaide.
Shelemiah nahpiu Hananiah khatdi Zalaph nah pacharukbopiu Hanun niu pachaliga, panaigu niabo sad katang thiu khaide.
Berekiah nah Meshullam niu paky masuangga bambo pachalise thiu khaide.
Kachia aketpiu Malkijah niu haibo sai gasu thiusujiu Miphkad
Kachia aketmai khatdi chali-alimai siniu kanamthuboga kareng kamikga bambo kichen gasu Mily Rengmun katang thiu khaide.
Aliu Jehudi mainiu kareng thiusu lande chiubo cham Sanballat niu chiuluboga palung pomjiu aliutu dinriam sude.

Pamaidung khatdi Samaria mai riphenmai suangga paniu din-e, “Kasa kasonmai, Jehudi mai hainiu degu kam lune chiujiu maning jiulo? Paliuniu namdi thiusu lanra maning jiuma? Paliuniu charathiu khaibo gasu naikhat lung gasu thiuloi lune chiu maning jiuma? Haijiukha rumasa mibo tukhuan rigase tatuky thiulan lubui-e chiu maning jiuma?”
Pamungga chapbambo Tobiah niu dinsan lan-e, “Nde kumbo kareng paliuniu kam ngamlu bui-e chiujiulo? Asathi niudi kampang lubui-e!”

Siga Iniu kakheng thiude, “Hey Tingwang yo, aliutu nuimen bambo maidung ladse nking khailo. Paliu riga paliu mao kiukhai milo. Paliugu kabambo hinase pijiu maidungtu sutmilo, sichiujiu paliutu kavangmai kumjiu sangdiulam mintad milo.
Paliuniu kasabo kamkhai mibose kuakkhai tulo khatdi paliu maodungse mangai mane. Palamra thiusu bammai aliutu kam mangam khaide.”
Sichiujiu aliu mathak makjiu kareng thiusude, watheng makjiu paphanse loinuang mide, palamra maidungniu changam maranjiu kambo jengniu-e.

Aliuniu kalangjiu Jerusalem reng thiusu lande, khatdi kareng kaput hinadi makadlan mide, chiubo cham chiuboga Sanballat nai Tobiah khatdi Arabia mai Ammon mai, khatdi Ashdod mai hina paliu lung pomchang pommide.
Siniu paliu wangmadui lujiu Jerusalem tu atungjiu kam kabuakra makhiam sude.
Chiudi aliuniu nchun n-nien saomakjiu akhemai khailujiu, Tingwang khuga kakheng thiusude.
Judah mainiu thiubo lui khat bamme:
“Aliu chabang phungjiu asang mide;
siga bambo tumoise kaden kamlak mide;
karengse dechiu thainai thiu ngamlu ralo?”
Aliutu kamshat lujiu, aliu tienkam hai kam mahami makthen, aliuniu paliutu silakge maksai degu padbamlo chiubo aliuniu ngaolakge chiujiu aliu mikremai siniu maning-e.
Pawan wan saisuijiu mikremai niu aliutu kam masani bambo chamse paliu khuga lung bambo Jehudi maidungniu aliu khuga paokhai khaijiu bamme.
Sijengniu maidungtu chaheng, changiu, tavaipi thinlujiu taliuloi makthen pabam machang pakiriang-riang saisuijiu kareng saiga akhejiu kamme.
Maidungniu chalung chariujiu bambotu Iniu ngaojiu paliugu jupaodung khuga khatdi chakampaodung khuga din-e, “Mikre maidungtu pingmi mane.

Aliugu mikremainiu aliutu kam masakhai nijiu bamme chiubo aliu chiutang mide chiubo paliu chiulude, khatdi paliuniu rangbambo hina Tingwang niu kam mangamkhai mide chiubo paliuniu silude. Sigasu aliu mathiuniu wangjiu kareng thiusulan mide.
Sichiubo gasu aliu chamai paphanniu tatien thiu-e paphan khat siniu tavaipi, chagee, chaheng, changiu khatdi charipuan piujiu akhe sude. Haichiujiu aliugu jupaodungniu kareng kammaitu kachu khaide.
Sichiujiu ben khatlam changam kambo mania thin, khatdi benkhat lamniu chaheng-changiu, mania thinjiu changam kamsude,
chamai hina pakhen-pakhen-ga apangheng phunglujiu kamsude. Chari wangsai make mudkhai ramai khangkhattu amungga pichap khaide.
Iniu maidung khuga khatdi paliugu jupaodung khatdi chakampaodung khuga dinkhaide, changam kambo bamse pakak diumibo jengniu aliu khat-khat khugasu diumide.
Sijengniu make khuanse naliu chiugapsai akhuga wang madui milo. Aliu Rawang niu aliuleng aphenkhai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu naimachang, tingben padgap gasu nchun tamiu katang paphanniu changam kamme, paphanniu changiu ponlujiu akhe bamme.
Sibo tingga nchun kiusai namdi situ akhera khatdi n-nien sai changam kam lura, Iniu papee-para thiumai khatdi paliutu nkhajiu bammai mathiutu Jerusalem ga wangbam mira dinkhaide.
Idi, akamaidi, atu macha maidi, atu akhe maidi, nchun katang chafai tani lupad makjiu ji-e. Aliu mathiu chari mania khailu ji-e.
Pakak khat watheng makjiu mai kakengniu, maipui-maipiu tam makjiu paliu Jehudi mai karai khat-khattu din masa sude.
Khangsianiu din-e, “Aliu kalek lekdi mai-e, aliu ringraleng miusy pageng bamme.”
Khangsia mainiu din-e, “Aliu ky aliu lutu thindeng khaijiu katiu-kasak apukkhai bambo-e.”
Khangsia mainiu din-e, “Aliu lu aliu renggu rampon pira aliu rangkang apukjiu bamme.

Aliudi aliu singnamai Jehudi maigu kaikik-e. Aliu nahmaidi, paliu nahmai kum wimak jiuma? Chiudi aliura aliu nahdungtu kavang pithiu khai mide. Aliu nahpui khangsia tudi kavangleng jonkhai mide. Aliura wadi kam silak mide, palamra aliu ludi aliugu mumsy reng hinadi lukam mide.
Haichiujiu Iniu paliu lad chiukhaiboga alung pom mide,
khatdi tatien thiuraleng I chap mide. Iniu katheng-kadi maitu rujiu din-e, “Naliuniu naliu singnamaitu kam mathad bambo-e!”
Haibo ladbamdung makhiam thiu aruangra Iniu mathiutu kumaduijiu haichiu din-e,

“Aliuniu ngamlu buithen aliu singna maitu, jat katammai khugasu ranpad raleng karamjiu bambo-e. Chiudi tuhoi naliuniu naliu singnamaitu, kavangleng jonkhaira manomjiu kam bamme!” Siga papee-para kathiu maidungse wadi dinsanra hamijiu maliumak bam mide.

Siga Iniu din-e, “Naliuniu kambambose mao-e! Naliuniu Tingwang kadin piurabo thao-e, sichiujiu majibose kamrabo siakge. Haichiujiu aliugu mikremai Nkengmaitu pijiu aliutu nuimen makra leng kam rabo-e.
Iniu maitu katiu-kasak khatdi tasen-chalan apuk khai-e, akamaidi, atien thiumaidi haichiu apuk khai-e. Haibo hina hai ruilanra dinmakboniu wi-e.

Paliuniu tasen-chalan, katiu-kasak, jaw maksai takisa apukkhai mibo hina kuak khaibi misulo. Haichiujiu paliu khugasu lukhaibo chalu, mumsy-reng, takisy-reng khatdi chaky khatdi wahina kalan khaibi milo.”
Jupao mainiu paokakge, “Nangniu dinbo aliu kamne. Aliuniu paliugu hina kalankhai mine,khatdi chapaw hinadi khenglan lakge.”
Iniu singkudungtu kuwangjiu jupaodungtu aliugu ladriatse piura paliu suangga ladriat thiu khaide.
Sigasu Iniu agu khen-gak khipad kasungjiu din-e, “Ladriat piumak maitu
Siga bammai hinaniu din-e, “Amen!”

Artaxerxes niu takum makai gasu takum samriu-je-nia katang chawang thiuwangbo tingga Iniu naliugu dihthinpao thiujiu takum kariunia thiukhangbo tingga akikhun maidi, I dihthinpao khat thiujiu tiurabo tatekse tiumakge.

Amasuangga dihthinpao thiukhai mibo maidungniu maidungtu kam chariusui khaide, chiubora paliuniu katiu-kasak liura naikhat leng rangkang atai hai maidung khugasu lu-e. Paliu vangmai katangniu maidungtu kam mathad khai-e. Chiudi Ira Tingwang tu chakhuang thiubo jengniu sikumbo thak kam makge.
Agu pumtan hina kareng thiu lanboga ngutkhai kam mide, sichiujiu aleng wakhatdi kamkhai makge. Haichiujiu aleng tatien kathiumai hinaniudi kareng thiuboga atu maluang tatien thiu aruangde.
Lung magui bambo jat hinadi akhuga wang riukhai-e. Sibo riga Jehudi maigu jupaodung kai khat-je- ringiu tudi kikhai tan-tanjiu bamme.

Naimachang kabui khat, pamai wibo mily charuk, khatdi marui kengkha pipadle, khatdi jengriu machang kasanbo jaw pipadle. Chiudi maidungleng chariuju mira siniu dihthinpao khatleng pirabose aleng pilo chiujiu din makge.
Hey Tingwang yo, Iniu nakhuga kheng-e. Iniu maidungleng kamkhai mibo hina haise maningtao khailo.
Rengmun loimak tadi karengra loimide, kaputki hamide chiubo Sanballat, Tobiah, Geshem khatdi kakibo mikremai siniu chiulude.
Sanballat nai Geshem niu Ono Ramjenggu nam khatga atu adaokhe chiujiu tacham piwang-e. Sise panainiu atu kam maharabo thakge chiubo Iniu si-e.
Siga Iniu panai khuga champaomai langkhaijiu din-e, “I changam kakungbo kam bamme, I kiudao lakge. Iniu nanaitu adaora tadmisai, changam hai mathakmi rabo-e.”
Panainiu akhuga sibo ladse dinwanglon madai-e chiudi Iniu palunjiu paokak khai lan-lande.
Siga Sanballat niu pavang maitu pamangiubo thiujiu chamlense madan diangkhai makjiu atu pikhaira langkhai lande.
Sise haichiu raokhai bamniu-e:
“Nang khatdi Jehudi mainiu charithiu sura kamjiu karengse thiulan bambo-e chiujiu sang awonjeng mainiu din bamme chiujiu Geshem niu akhuga dinkhai-e. Natu chawang pithiu khaira nangniu kam bambo-e.

Nang hai Judah maigu chawang-e chiujiu Jerusalem ga senpadra nangniu phaimiukakungmai khangsia khuga din bamme, chiujiu paniu akhuga dinkhaide. Haibo cham hina hai Pakendibo piuniu maomakjiu chiumi bamta lakge. Sijengniu haibo lamga makhiamkhe.”
Iniu pakhuga haichiu tacham langkhai lande, “Nangniu din bambo hina hai aratbo lad ronna-e. Pakhiangna haise nangniu masing padbo lad maliang-e.”
Paliuniu aliutu kapinjiu changam pi mathak khaira kam bamme. Siga Iniu kakheng thiu-e, “Chiudi tuhoira Tingwang yo, atu pumtan pikhailo!”

Sibo tingga, Iniu Delaiah nahpiu, khatdi Mehetabel tahpiu, Shemaiah, malaipad ngamlak bambopiu khuga tadwang khaide. Siga paniu akhuga din-e, “Anai tadlujiu Charaky Masanbo Bamga akham namlujiu nbai mikhe, palamra natu kamshatra paliu wang sune. Kata-kadaobo nai nchun paliuniu natu kamshatra wangbo sui-e.”
Iniu paokakge, “Ira paklujiu nbairabo mai makge. Iniu Charakyga nbaijiu aringting duak luraleng kamsune chiu nang maning jiuma? Ira sichiu kam lakge.”
Iniu makumboga Shemaiah khuga Tingwang niu dinkhai makge, chiudi Tobiah nai Sanballat niu haibo lad dinra patu tanim pibo bamne chiubo I maning-e.
Atu kam kapinjiu, atu nuan-ga jukhaijiu, khatdi chamtan kam masajiu atu kam mangam khaira panainiu lankhaibo gu-e.

Iniu haichiu kheng-e, “Hey Tingwang yo, Tobiah nai Sanballat niu kam bambo hai maningtao khailo, sichiujiu panaitu sajai pikhailo. Atu kam kapinra kambambo phaimiupui Nodiah tu khatdi phaimiukakungdungtu maningtao khailo.
Changam hai jeng ringiu-je-niakiu kamkhai lujiu Elul hiu jengkai-je-mangiu kiubo nai kareng pakhiangna kamloi mide.
Siga aliugu mikremai aliutu lungmagui bambo jatdung siniu tacham hai chiuluboga paliu zu hamide, palamra Tingwang niu nkhabo jengniu haibo ngam hai loikhaibo-e chiubo mai hinaniu simide.
Sibo tinggase Jehudi maigu jupaodung khangsianiu Tobiah khuga chalad alamjiu bamniu-e.

Judah ga bammai kakeng khaniu Tobiah lam liangjiu bamniu-e, palamra paniu Jehudi mai Arah niu ponbo Shecaniah nahpuitu kubam niu-e. Sibo riga nkiujiu panahpiu Jehonanan niudi Berekiah niu ponbo Meshullam nahpuitu lubam niu-e.
Tobiah niu kawibo ngam kamkhaibo situ chakjiu maidungniu akhuga din-e sichiujiu Iniu dinbo hina paliuniu pakhuga paokhai lan bamniu-e. Haichiujiu paniu atu kapinbo cham piwang saomakjiu bamniu-e.
Tuhoira kareng taliuloi mide, rengmun akham hina pakhai-khaiga kamkhaijiu loikhai kam mide, charaky akhemai, chalui kathiu maidung tudi pangam-ngam leng khailan kam mide.

Jerusalem tu thinra Iniu chamai khangniatu: asingna Hanani nai charireng thinbo charipi Hananiah tu malin khaide. Hananiah hai malum suibo mai-e, sigasu Tingwang tu pingboga mai khatniudi kada silakbo mai-e.

Jerusalem karengse naimik pad masan makthen lemakra khatdi naimik ngutmi sai akhejiu akhamse tenman mira Iniu panai khuga dinkhaide. Jerusalem ga lungbam maidung siniu akhe khaira sigasu paliu khangsiatu akheky hina akhe khaira khatdi khangsia maitu paliu ky machang tad maguijiu phuibamra paliu khuga dinkhaide.
Jerusalem hai namdi kadibo khatle, chiudi siga kalungmai chamai kengju makge, siga chakydi thiukhai makeng makha-e.

Maidungtu, jupaodung nai chakampaodungtu kumadui lujiu paliu kikhun riak raokhaibose phuira Tingwang niu atu kachu khaide. Kavangthiu tadmibo gasu malanwang raimaidung riak raokhaibo Iniu daolubose hai-e:
Jehudi mai kakeng Babylon tu saokhai diaklujiu Jerusalem ga khatdi Judah ga pagu-gu namdiga wanglan karende. Chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu paliutu kavangleng jutad mibo gasu Babylon ga lungbam mibo-e.
Paliutu jupaodung siniu Zerubbabel, Joshua, Nehemiah, Azariah, Raamiah, Nahamani, Mordecai, Bilshan, Mispereth, Bigvai, Nehum, khatdi Baanah paliu-e.
Haise Babylon gasu wanglanbo Israel mai kiriangmai khatdi paliu riak si-e:
Parosh 2,172
Shephatiah 372
Arah 652
Pahath Moab (Jeshua panai Joab gu kaikik) 2,818
Elam 1,254
Jattu 845
Zakkai 760
Binnui 648
Bebai 628
Azgad 2,322
Adonikam 667
Bigvai 2,067
Adin 655
Ater (Hezekiah chiudi ku-e) 98
Hashum 328
Bezai 324
Hariph 112
Gibeon 95
Pao-pehdung lungkhaibo namdakdung khatdi malan wangbo siniu:
Bethlehem khatdi Netophah gasu 188
Anathoth gasu 128
Beth Azmaveth gasu 42
Kiriath Jearim, Chephirah, khatdi Beeroth gasu 743
Ramah nai Geba gasu 621
Michmash gasu 122
Bethel nai Ai gasu 123
Katambo Nebo gasu 52
Katambo Elam gasu 1,254
Harim gasu 320
Jerikho gasu 345
Lod, Hadid khatdi Ono gasu 721
Senaah 3,930
Haise Babylon gasu wanglanbo kiriangmai siniu:
Jedaiah (Jeshua kaikikmai) 973
Immer 1,052
Pashhur 1,247
Harim 1,017
Kavang thiubo gasu wanglanbo Levi maidung siniu:
Jeshua nai Kadmiel (Hodaviah kaikikmai) - 74
Charakyga chalui thiumai(Asaph kaikikmai) - 148
Charaky akhe maidung (Shallum, Ater, Talmon, Akkub, Hatita khatdi Shobai kaikikmai) - 138.
Kavang thiu mibo gasu wanglanbo Charaky machamai siniu:
Ziha, Hasupha, Tabbaoth,
Keros, Sia, Padon,
Lebana, Hagaba, Shalmai,
Hanan, Giddel, Gahar,
Reaiah, Rezin, Nekoda,
Gazzam, Uzza, Paseah,
Besai, Meunim, Naphushesim,
Bakbuk, Hakupha, Harhur,
Bazlith, Mehida, Harsha,
Barkos, Sisera, Temah,
Neziah, khatdi Hatipha.
Kavang thiubo malanwangbo Solomon vangmai siniu:
Sotai, Sophereth, Perida,
Jaalah, Darkon, Giddel,
Shephatiah, Hattil, Pochereth,
Hazzebaim, khatdi Amon.
Charaky tien thiumai nai karaiga Solomon vangmai mathiu, kavang thiubo gasu malanwangbo riak siniu 392 ye.

Tel Melah, Tel Harsha, Cherub, Addon, khatdi Immer namdakdung gasu wanglanbo mai Delaiah, Tobiah, khatdi Nekoda kiriangmai siniu 642 ye; chiudi paliu hai Israel mai kaikik siakge chiubora masanjiu din-ngamlu makge.

Pahangga raokhaibo singku kiriangmai hai paliu paopeh lamga rao masan khaibo bamson makge: Hobaiah, Hakkoz, khatdi Barzillai. (Barzillai singku paopeh niu Gilead mai Barzillai kaikik gasu maipui khattu magiang-e khatdi papao kiphiu jan lumibo-e). Paliuse paliu paopeh-riang hai-e chiubo simasan makge sijengniu paliutu singku mai-e chiujiu lukhai makge.
Urim nai Thummim thinjiu singku tien kam masanlu makthen Tingwang leng kadkhaibo katiu-kasak paliu tiusui makge chiujiu Jehudi mai dihthinpaoniu paliu khuga dinkhaide.
Kavangthiubo gasu malanwangbo maidung pakhiangna siniu 42,360 ye.
Paliu vangdung siniu maipui, maipiu pakhiangna 7,337 ye.
Chalui kathiumai maipui, maipiu pakhiangna 245 ye.
Chaqondung - 736
Chaqon kasiambodung - 245
Qontraodung - 435
Qonniamdung - 6,720
Charaky thiusu lanboga ngutrabo manleng chamai kakengniu nkha khaijiu piwang karende:
Dihthinpaoniu kachia taju 8
Charathiu raleng chapiang 50
Singkumai fai 530
Kiriang maigu papeemainiu kachia taju 168
Rangkanggi taju 1,250
Kakimaidungniu kachia taju 168
Rangkanggi taju 140
Singkumai fai 67 chiujiu pikhai-e.
Singkudung, Levi maidung, charaky akhe maidung, chalui thiumaidung, maidiu-maidung, charaky macha maidung, Israel mai hinase Judah namdidung khatdi namdakdung hinaga wangjiu lungde.

Pachinniabo hiu gase Israel maidungniu paliu nam-namga wangjiu lungkaren mide. Sibo hiugu raithubo naise, paliu mathiu Jerusalem gu maduibam, Tadui Rengmun gase wang madui-e. Siga paliuniu, Israel maileng
Sijengniu maidung maduibo bam npui-npiu khatdi nahmaidung sisui ramai khuga Ezra niu phungwangde.
Rengmun mungga tingben padgap gasu n-nien katang paniu Tacheng-tajaise paliu khuga kenkhai-e, sise maidungniu chalung ngutjiu nking-e.

Sichiujiu tasingpekniu rakhaibo wakai riga Ezra niu wangjiu chapsude. Sigasu Mattithiah, Shema, Anaiah, Uriah, Hilkiah, khatdi Maaseiah paliuniu paben majatlam khatdi Pedaiah, Mishael, Malkijah, Hashum, Hashbaddanah, Zechariah, khatdi Meshullam paliuniu mawilam chapde.
Maidung suang kubo bamboga, maidungniu patu phuijiu bambo gase chapde. Paniu sibo ariakkhuangse lepadgapboga maidungse chap khangde.
Ezra niu din-e, “Kadibo Rawang,
Maidungniu paliu ben khengsujiu “Amen! Amen!” chiujiu kenkakge. Paliu khudungkiu paliu zu makhum kiujiu kahumde.

Paliuniu pabam-bam gasu buangsujiu chapbamga pahangga raokhaibo Levi maidung: Jeshua, Bani, Sherebiah, Jamin, Akkub, Shabbethai, Hodiah, Maaseiah, Kelita, Azariah, Jozabad, Hanan, khatdi Pelaiah paliuniu tacheng-tajai ramba dinkhaide.
Paliuniu Tingwang gu tacheng-tajai kenpadjiu chali khaide paliuniu parambadi dinkhaide.

Tacheng-tajai khuangga raokhai bambose maidungniu chiuluboga, paliu lung niataojiu kapsude. Sijengniu dihthinpao Nehemiah nai singku khatdi Tacheng-tajai simawibo Ezra khatdi maidungtu Tacheng-tajai kati khaijiu bambo Levi maidung siniu maidung khuga din-e, “Haibo tingmik hai
Tuhoira naliu ky lam tadlujiu changi sulo,kahamai-dung leng naliugu katiu-kasakse njantiu njan-saklo. Thainai aliu
Levi maidungniu tadlujiu maidungtu hiamkhaijiu masanbo tingmik gahai chunsa makrabo-e chiu dinkhaide.
Sichiujiu paliu mathiu paky-kylam tadjiu chunwi mathajiu tiu-sakde, khatdi paliugu kabambo hinase kahamaitu njantiu njan sak sude, palamra paliu khuga kenkhaibose paliuniu paramba silude.
Pasaibo nai kirianggu papeemaidung, singkudung khatdi Levi maidungniu Tacheng-tajai katira Ezra khuga mengde.
niu Mose khuga pikhaibo Tacheng-tajaiga Kapuang Ngee ga Israel mai hina pakak khatleng thiukhaibo singniw kyga lungrabo-e, chiujiu dinkhaibo paliuniu silude.

Pahangga raokhaibo chiubora: “Tacheng-tajaiga raokhaibo saisuijiu singniwky thiusura maluonglam khangjiu kahiuke, takike, maronpenke, kadanniw khatdi katam-tambo singbangke siniu kamlo” chiujiu paliuniu haibo lad hai Jerusalem ga khatdi kakibo namdi nai namdak hinaga dinron khaide.”
Sijengniu mai hina singke katap lujiu paliu ky npom riga, kajengga, charaky jengga khatdi Tadui Rengmun nai Ephraim Rengmun ga chaky thiusude.
Kavang thiutad mibo gasu wanglanbo mai hina siniu nbaiky se thiusujiu siga lungde. Nun nahpiu Joshua ken gasu haise kam raithubo-e, sichiujiu mai mathiuse paliu diu wijiu chunwi mide.

Haibo changeegu suraibo nai gasu sujiu loibo katang Tingwang gu Tacheng-tajai hai palang khat-khat thiujiu naimachangna kenpad khaide, haichiujiu paliuniu jeng chinnia changide, sichiujiu jeng tachadbo naise Tacheng-tajaiga dinkhaibo saisuijiu ngeedi khat kamjiu loikhaide.

Sibo hiu jeng makai-je-madaibo nai paliu nuan jengniu chalung chariubo lenjiu kalum rira wang maduide. Jat katammai hina gasu paliu ronna tamsin padmide. Chariubo lenjiu paliu peega tabui katup khailujiu maliufai bensude. Sichiujiu paliuniu chapsujiu paliu nuan khatdi paliu paopehniu kammao khaibo hina madu padde
Wanchak sum kumbo
Levi maidung leng chakai rakhaide, sibo riga Jeshua, Bani, Kadmiel, Shebaniah, Bunni, Sherebiah, Bani, khatdi Chenani paliu chap bamme. Paliu khuan tanjiu paliu Rawang,
Levi mai Jeshua, Kadmiel, Bani, Hashabneiah, Sherebiah, Hodiah, Shebaniah khatdi Pethahiah paliuniu kahumra leng kujiu din-e:
“Chapsujiu naliu Rawang,
Patu tingtheng-tingtheng thuon bamlo!
Chamai hina kendibo pazantu thuonlo,
chamaigu thuonboniu buimakjiu tadi thuonlo.”
Israel mainiu haibo rathoiniu kakheng thiu sude:
nangniu tinggen nai tingpukgu chagandung damkhai-e.
Nangniu ramluong nai duipui lungga bambo wa katana damkhai-e;
nangniu mathiugu ringting pikhai-e.
Tinggen gu pumtan hina siniu makhum kiujiu natu kahumme.
haichiujiu patu Babylon gu Ur gasu jupad khaide;
nangniu pazanse Abraham chiu mathak kalikhai bide.
Pahai nakhuga chamchang mai-e,
sichiujiu nangniu pakhuga ladriat thiukhaide.
Canaan mai ram, Hitt mai ram, Amor mai ram,
Periz mai ram, Jebush mai ram, Girgash mai ram hinase
paleng pine chiujiu ladriat thiukhai mide
sichiujiu pakai-pakikdungniu lungbambo ram hai
nangniu paliuleng pikhai bide.
Nangniu nagu ladriat hai majaikhai bi-e,
palamra nangra chamchangbo-e.
“Egypt ga aliu paopeh mainiu chariukhai mibotu
nangniu ngao khai mide;
Hengbo Duipui gasu paliuniu nkha khaira
kubose nangniu chiukhaide.
Nangniu Egypt mai wang riga khatdi
pagu chakampaodung riga tasibo tien thiukhaide,
palamra paliuniu namaidungtu rebambose nangniu si-e.
Thainai tangjiu dinbambo nazan hai nangniu kamkhai mibo-e.
Nangniu namaidung leng duipui riga npui thiukhai-e
haichiujiu paliutu rampum gen-ga juken khaide.
Paliutu hatad kinmaitu duiliuga maten khaijiu
duipuiga tatu kum pahanglam malinkiu mide.
Paliutu n-niensai kamuang niu jukhai-e,
nchunsai paliu chamipuangniu thaoben khai-e.
Nangniu Sinai Luongga tinggen lamsu wangkiu lujiu
napum siakniu namaidungtu npao khai-e.
Sichiujiu paliuleng kawibo tacheng-tajai pikhaijiu ladti khai-e.
Nagu Tabamnai situ masanjiu maniara nangniu paliu khuga dinkhaide.
Haichiujiu navang Mose khugasu paliuleng tacheng-tajai pikhaide.
“Paliu won mariuboga, nangniu tinggen lamsu
paliuleng taruak pikhai-e,
Paliu charibo tingga, tudi gasu tadui pikhai-e.
Paliuleng pikhaine chiujiu ladriat khaibo kadih situ
thinman lura nangniu paliu khuga dinkhai-e.
Chiudi aliu paopehmai siniu paliu lung tanjiu khatdi chaliangjiu nagu chamtan situ majai makge.
Paliuniu nalad phungmakge;
nagu tienkam hina paliu mangai mide,
nangniu tasibo tenkhaibo hina paliu mangai mide.
Paliuniu wasao thiujiu paliugu jupaoleng kadalujiu,
Egypt lam paliutu kavang pi thiukhai lanra kamsude.
Nangra kuakkhaibo khatdi lungsasibo piu-e;
nangra nalungpom majad makge,
Nalungsiat hai didiang-e, sichiujiu nangniu
paliutu phudkhai makge.
Paliuniu kabuichi lun kumjiu charameng taliu padde.
Siseniu paliutu Egypt gasu jupadbo ra-e chiujiu din-e!
Chiudi nangniu paliutu ramjingga saokhai diakmi makge,
palamra nalungsiat hai didiang-e.
Nchun n-nien paliutu jukhai bambo
chami nai kamuang situ luthonmi makge.
Paliuniu kam rabose nalungsiat jengniu dinkhai bi-e;
nangniu paliutu manna pitiu khaibi-e,
khatdi sakra tadui pikhai-e.
Ramjingga takum atai lengse pageng bambo hina
nangniu paliuleng pikhai bi-e;
paliu fai-ni kekmi makge, paliu phidi tadmenmi makge.
“Paliutu jatdung nai wangdihdung situ nangniu pijiu ngam khai-e.
Sihon niu mawang bamniubo Heshbon dih,
khatdi Og niu mawang bamniubo Bashan dihtu paliuniu ngamlude.
Nangniu paliu kaikikleng tingpukgu chagan jiukha pikhai-e,
khatdi paliutu pi chari ngamkhajiu paliu paopehdung khuga
riatkhaibo kadihga paliutu pilung khaide.
Paliuniu Canaan kadihtu ngam lude;
siga lungbamniu maitu nangniu chari ngamkhaide.
Canaan mai khatdi paliu wangdung riga
nangniu kamkhai nibose namaidung khuga pumtan pikhaide.
Charireng rengkhaibo namdidung, kadihtam wibo ram,
chakhiu-chalanniu phuibo ky, akhun phekhaibo hina,
takisy bang, charasy bang mumsy reng hina namaidungtu pikhaide.
Paliuniu tiuni tiujiu paliu-mai wimide,
nangniu pikhaibo mania kawibo don gasu paliu amanjiu lung-e.
paliuniu nagu Tacheng-tajaise paliu sailam khai mide.
Nakhulam mariwangra paliutu rukhaibo
phaimiukakungdungtu paliuniu kamshat mide.
Paliuniu natu kam mangamkhai lan-lande.
Sijengniu paliutu mikremai ben-ga pikhai mide.
Paliu chariubo wan-ga nkha khaira natu ku-e,
Siga nangniu tinggen lamsu paliutu paokak khai bide.
Nalungsiat dibo donniu paliutu jukhaira langwang khaibi-e.
Mikremai ben gasu paliutu ranpad khaibi-e.
Agi-manaijiu lunglanbo wan-ga; paliu nuan tensu mide,
siga paliutu mikremai ben-ga khailan bide.
Chiudi paliu lung lilanjiu paliutu gukhaira khengbo ga,
tinggen lamsu nangniu chiu khailan bi-e,
nalungsiat dibo siniu paliutu gukhai bi-e.
Nagu kadin piura nangniu paliutu rukhai-e.
Nagu Tacheng-tajai piubo hainiu ringra bambidi,
paliu chaliang siniu nagu tacheng-tajai lukhai makge.
Paliura wasao thiujiu khatdi paliu lung tanjiu kadin piumakge.
Phaimiukakungdungtu kachu khaijiu, maidungga dinkhai-e,
chiudi namaidung hai paliu kuon tid mide,
sijengniu katambo jatdung ben-ga paliutu pingut khaide.
Sichiu bamdi, nalungsiat kadibo jengniu,
nangniu paliutu thonpadjiu kam mahami makge.
Nangra lungsasibo nai nkhasibo Rawang-e!
“Hey Tingwang, aliu Rawang yo, nang hai dejiu dilo!
Dejiukha maipingbo, dejiukha tanbolo!
Nagu ladriat situ nangniu majai khai-e.
Assyria mai wangdungniu aliutu rebo gasu,
tuhoi tangbo aliu dechiu khengwang migulo!
Aliugu chawangdung, aliugu jupaodung,
aliugu singkudung khatdi aliugu phaimiukakungdung,
aliu paopehdung khatdi aliu mathiu chariubo daomide.
Aliu dejiukha chariukhai migulo chiubo makumtao khailo!
Nangniu aliutu sajai pibose majibo-e;
aliuniu nuan kamjiu bam tadi nangra chamchangbo piu-e.
Aliu paopehdung, aliu wangdung, jupaodung,
khatdi singkudungniu nagu tacheng-tajai majai makge.
Paliuniu nagu chamtan nai kachan khaibotu lukhai makge.
Nagu thoidam gasu chawangdungniu namaidung riga mawang khai-e,
sichiujiu nangniu paliuleng pikhaibo maruangbo,
kadih-tam kawibo ramga paliutu pilung khai-e,
chiudi paliuniu nuan gasu marilujiu natu machalu makge.
Sijengniu, nangniu aliuleng pikhaibo ram kawibo
katiu kasak pikhaibo dihga tuhoira aliu kavang thiu bamme.
Aliuniu nuan kambo jengniu haibo dih gasu
kampadbo hina chawanggu thiukam mide.
Paliuniu aliu riga paliu chunning kam bamme,
aliugu khaorui-khaona rigadi paliu maning kam bamme,
Sijengniu aliu chariu hai pamalan thiuta mide!”
Padmibo hina jengniu, Israel mai aliuniu ladriat khat matipjiu raokhaide. Haichiujiu aliugu jupaodung, Levi maidung khatdi aliugu singkudungniu paliugu madan siga diangkhaide.
Hacaliah nahpiu dihthinpao, Nehemiah niu raithubo thiujiu pazan raokhaide, sibosai Zedekiah niu raokhai lande. Sichiujiu pahangga raokhaibo kumjiu mathiu zan raokiu-e:
Singkudungniu:
Seraiah, Azariah, Jeremiah,
Pashhur, Amariah, Malkijah,
Hattush, Shebaniah,Malluch,
Harim, Meremoth, Obadiah,
Daniel, Ginnethon, Baruch,
Meshullam, Abijah, Mijamin,
Maaziah, Bilgai, khatdi Shemaiah,
Levi maidungniu:
Azaniah nahpiu Jeshua,
Henadad kiriang gu Binnui,
Kadmiel, Shebaniah, Hodiah,
Kelita, Pelaiah, Hanan,
Mica, Rehob, Hashabiah,
Zakkur, Sherebiah, Shebaniah,
Hodiah, Bani, khatdi Beninu.
Maidunggu jupaodungniu:
Parosh, Pahath, Moab,
Elam, Jattu, Bani,
Bunni, Azgad, Bebai,
Adonijah, Bigvai, Adin,
Ater, Hezekiah, Azzur,
Hodiah, Hashum, Bezai,
Hariph, Anathoth, Nebai,
Magpiash, Meshullam, Hezir,
Meshezabel, Zadok, Jaddua,
Pelatiah, Hanan, Anaiah,
Hoshea, Hananiah, Hasshub,
Hallohesh, Pilha, Shobek,
Rehum, Hashabnah, Maaseiah,
Ahiah, Hanan, Anan,
Malluch, Harim, khatdi Baanah.

Israel mai aliu mathiu, singkudung, Levi maidung, charaky akhemaidung, Charakyga chalui thiu maidung, charaky tien thiumaidung, khatdi Tingwang gu Tacheng-tajai majaira jengniu aliu kadihga lungbammai sangdiumai khugasu paron-ronna tampad mibo maidung, aliu mathiu, aliu naodung, aliu nahdung, wasi lubui mibo maidung hina,

aliugu jupaodungtu aruang lujiu, aliuniu ladriat khaibose kampang misai tasiang daora chiujiu siangkhaide. Sichiujiu Tingwang niu pavangpiu Mose khuga pikhaibo Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu aliu lungne. Aliu Rapiu,
Aliu kadihga lungbambo sangdiumaitu tanao-tanah thiu akad lakge.
Tabamnai maksai kakibo masanbo tingmikga sangdiumainiu alin-tara maksai wakakibo mania phungwang jon bamdi aliuniu liulakge.
Takum chinnia machang aliu chalu tenlakge khatdi chapaw hina maha khaine.
Aliu pumtin Charakyga thinpiura takum machang rangkanggi katup mangiu phungwangne.

Charakyga kahumbo wan-ga thinpiurabo mania masanbo taruak, naimachang kadrabo tiutek, naimachang charathiubogu khaoring, Tabamnai, Hiusan Ngee, khatdi kaki-kibo khuang-ngeega kadrabo leng, masanbo maniakad, Israel maidung nuanleng kadkhai rabo maniakad, khatdi Charakyga katam-tambo pageng bambo hina aliuniu pirabo-e.
Tacheng-tajaiga raokhaibo saisuijiu
Aliugu alin-tara masi raithubose atiat lujiu khatdi charasy minrai thubo hina takum machang Charakyga phungwangjiu kad khaine.
Aliu nah naraipiutu Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu Charakyga singku maidung khuga phungwangjiu Tingwang khuga kad khaine. Aliu tom, aliu-bui aliugu mily nai kamidi piang raithubo poi hina kad khaine.
Takum machang chamiu minraithubo gasu kawibo chakhikhuang khatdi jaw, takisa, khatdi charasy hina Charakyga kadkhaira singkumai khuga phungwangne.
Chalu tien thiubo gasu kariudam lubo Levi maidung khuga aliugu kadih gasu padbo alin taragu kariudamgu damkhatse phungwangne.
Levi maidungniu kariudam lubo wan-ga Aaron gasu lungkiubo singkudungdi jaorabo-e, sichiujiu Levi maidungse paliugu kariudam khatse Charaky-ga thin piuraleng Charaky-gu chabawga phungwang rabo-e.

Israel maidung khatdi Levi maidung alin-tara, jaw, takisa, kadwangbo hinase singkudungniu paliu tien thiubammai khatdi charaky akhemainiu, chalui thiumainiu bambo bamga, charakygu mania makhuan khaibo bamga phungwang makhuanne.
Aliuniu aliu Rawang kytu wajeng simakbo thiu lakge.
Kikhun kariuga suniu kikhun khatniu masanbo Jerusalem namdiga lungra haichiujiu kakimai hinaniu kakibo namdak khatdi namdiga lungra Jerusalem maigu jupaodungniu taden thonjiu phuisude.
Jerusalem ga lungne chiujiu papum-pumniu suijiu padbo mai hinatu maidungniu thuonkiude.
Katam-tambo namdi khatdi namdak hinaga Israel mai hina, singkudung, Levi maidung, charaky tien thiu maidung, khatdi Solomon vangmai kaikikdung panam-namga lunglanjiu pagu-pagu mania thinpiu lande.
Jerusalem ga lungbo Judah luongren-gu kikhunmai jukhaibo riak pahangga lenkhai-e:
Judah kiphiugu chamai riak siniu:
Uriah nahpiu khatdi Zechariah tah Athaiah. Katambo paopehdung siniu, Amariah, Shephatiah, khatdi Judah nahpiu Perez kaikik Mahalalel haimai si-e.
Baruch nahpiu khatdi Kolhozeh tah Maaseiah. Katambo paopehdung siniu Hazaiah, Adaiah, Joiarib khatdi Judah nahpiu Shelah kaikik Zechariah haimai si-e.
Perez kaikik tan-hubo khang 468 Jerusalem ga lung-e.
Benjamin kiphiugu chamai riak siniu:
Meshullam nahpiu khatdi Joed tah, Sallu. Katambo paopehdung siniu Pedaiah, Kolaiah, Maaseiah, Ithiel khatdi Jeshaiah haimai si-e.
Gabbai nai Sallai hai paliu kiriang ka-nbang mai-e.
Benjamin kiphiumai Jerusalem ga lungmai hina khang 928 ye.
Zichri nahpiu Joel hai paliugu jupao-e, khatdi Hassenuah nahpiu Judah niu sibo namdigu paniabo kadibo khatle.
Singkudung siniu:
Joiarib nahpiu Jedaiah nai Jachin.
Hilkiah nahpiu khatdi Meshullam tahpiu Seraiah. Papao-papeh hainiu Zadok, Meraioth khatdi Singku Dibo thiukhaibo Ahitub haimai si-e.
Haibo kiriangmai khang 822 niu Charakyga machabo tien thiu-e.
Jehoram nahpiu khatdi Palaiah tah Adaiah. Papao-papeh siniu Amzi, Zechariah, Pashhur khatdi Milkhijah haimai si-e.
Haibo kiriangdunggu papee thiumai siniu 242 ye.
Azarel nahpiu khatdi Ahzai tah Amashsai. Papao-papehdung siniu Meshillemoth nai Immer hai-e.
Haibo kiriang gasu chariga tan-kahumai khang 128 bamniu-e. Paliugu jupaose kikhun khatgu kadibo mai Zabdiel ye.
Levi maidung siniu:
Hasshub nahpiu khatdi Azrikam tah Shemaiah. Papao-papeh hainiu Hashabiah nai Bunni si-e.
Charakyga tatien phungmai para thiubo Levi mai khangnia Shabbethai nai Jozabad hai kania si-e.
Mica nahpiu khatdi Zabdi tah, Asaph kaikik mai Mattaniah hai-e. Paniu charakyga chalui thiumai phom, thuonkiubo rathoi thiumaidungtu paniu jukhai-e.
Mattaniah tu nkhakhai rabo piuse Bakbukiah ye.
Shammua nahpiu, Galal tah, Jeduthun kaikik mai Abda ye.
Masanbo Jerusalem namdiga lungbo Levi mai hai khang 284 ye.
Charaky akhebo maidung siniu:
Akkub, Talmon, khatdi panaigu kaikik hina, mathiu khang 172 ye.
Kakibo Israel mai nai kamasiakbo singkudung khatdi Levi maidungse Judah gu namdi khatdi namdakga pagu-gu kaphung nai param-ramga lung-e.
Charaky tien thiumai siniu Ophel kubo Jerusalem ramlungga lungjiu Ziha nai Gishpa hangga tatien thiu-e.

Jerusalem ga lungmai Levi maidungtu Bani nahpiu khatdi Hashabiah tah Uzzi niu thin-e. Papao-papehdung hai Mattaniah khatdi Asaph kaikik mai Mica hai-e, paliu hainiu Charakyga chalui kathiumai riga papee thiu-e.
Haibo kiphiudung hainiu Charakyga chalui thiuboga paliang kamrabose dekum ralo chiubo chawanggu tajaiga raokhaibo bamme.
Judah kiphiumai, Zerah kiriang gasu Meshezabel nahpiu Pethahiah niu Persia maigu ladjan kyga Israel maigu malin thiubo-e.
Paliu mathiuniu paliugu luzam mungga bambo namdi hinaga lung-e. Kiriath Arba, Dibon nai Jekabzeel khatdi haibo namdidung mungga bambo nam hinaga lung-e.
Paliu hai Jeshua, Moladah, Bethpelet khatdi Hazarshual, khatdi Beersheba mungga bambo namdungga lung-e.
Paliuniu Ziklag namdiga Meconah ga khatdi sibo namdungga lung-e.
Sichiujiu Enrimmon, Zorah, Jarmuth,

Zanoah khatdi Adullam, namdak khatdi namdidung mungga bambo nam hinaga lung-e. Lachish ga khatdi sibo mungga bambo luzam dungga khatdi Azekah namdak khatdi sibo mungga bambo namdungga lung-e. Judah mai hai tingrunlam Beersheba khatdi tingpilam Hinnom Ramjeng kak lungga bambo ramgase lung-e chiu dinbo-e.
Benjamin kiphiudungse Geba, Micmash gu tingpilam, Ai, Bethel khatdi sibo mungga bambo namdungga;
Anathoth, Nob, Ananiah,
Hazor, Ramah, Gittaim,
Hadid, Zeboim, Neballat,
Lod nai Ono, khatdi Bensiam Kasimaigu Ramjengga lung-e.
Sichiujiu Judah mai ramga lungbammai Levi mai khangsiatu Benjamin kiphiu maidung nai lung aruangra kam khaide.
Pahangga raokhaibo singkudung nai Levi maidung hai Shealtiel nahpiu Zerubbabel panai Dibo Singku Joshua saisui lujiu kavangthiubo lamsu wanglan maidung si-e.
Singkudung siniu:
Seraiah, Jeremiah, Ezra,
Amariah, Malluch, Hattush,
Shecaniah, Rehum, Meremoth,
Iddo, Ginnethoi, Abijah,
Mijamin, Maadiah, Bilgah,
Shemaiah, Joiarib, Jedaiah,
Sallu, Amok, Hilkiah khatdi Jedaiah paliu-e.
Haimaidung hai Joshua tingga singku ruangga jupao maidung-e.
Levi maidung siniu:
Jeshua, Binnui, Kadmiel, Sherebiah, Judah, khatdi Mattaniah paliu hai thuonkiubo lui thiuboga papao thiu maidung-e.
Bakbukiah, Unno, khatdi paliu rup Levi maidungniu thiu kakra chalui thiubo phom kam khai-e.
Joshua hai Joiakim piu-e, Joiakim hai Eliashib piu-e, Eliashib hai Joiada piu-e,
Joiada hai Jonathan piu-e, khatdi Jonathan hai Jaddua piu-e.
Joiakim niu Dibo Singku thiujiu bambo tingga, pahangga bambo singkudung hai singkumai kirianggu papeemai-e:
Meraiah
Seraiah
Hananiah
Jeremiah
Meshullam
Ezra
Jehohanan
Amariah
Jonathan
Malluchi
Joseph
Shebaniah
Adna
Harim
Helkai
Meraioth
Zechariah
Iddo
Meshullam
Ginnethon
Zichri
Abijah
Miniamin
Piltai
Moadiah
Shammua
Bilgah
Jehonathan
Shemaiah
Mattenai
Joiarib
Uzzi
Jedaiah
Kallai
Sallai
Eber
Amok
Hashabiah
Hilkiah
Nethanel
Jedaiah

Eliashib, Joiada, Jonathan khatdi Jaddua niu Dibo Singku thiubambo tingga Levi mai kikhundunggu khatdi singku kikhundung papeedung janse raokiu khai bamniu-e. Darius niu Persia maigu wangdi thiubambo tingganiu haibo ariak raoloi khai bamniu-e.
Sichiujiu Levi mai kikhun ga papeemai dunggu tienkam khuangga Eliashib tah Jonathan ting katang nakha raokhai bamniu-e.

Hashabiah, Sherebiah, Jeshua, Binnui, khatdi Kadmiel niu jukhaiboga Levi maidungse paphom njan khaide. Tingwang mai thiubo David niu dinkhaibo saisuijiu Tingwang tu thuonjiu khatdi paokakjiu phom nia-nianiu thiujiu kamme.
Charaky akhemai: Mattaniah, Bakbukiah, Obadiah, Meshullam, Talmon, khatdi Akkub haimainiu Charaky Rengmun mungga bambo mania khaibambo bam hina phui-e.
Simaidung siniu Joshua nahpiu, Jehozadok tah, Joiakim khatdi dihthinpao Nehemiah, khatdi Tacheng-tajai sikamawibo singku Ezra paliu ken ga lungkhai maidung-e.
Jerusalem namdi karengse kadkhaibo wan-ga nthiam-tara khatdi siamtoy thinjiu thuonkiubo lui thiuramai Levi maidungtu paliu bam-bam gasu Jerusalem ga puiwangde.
Chalui thiubo Levi mai kikhundungse paliu lungbambo Jerusalem mung gasu khatdi Netophah mungga bambo namdak hina gasu,
khatdi Bethgilgal, Geba khatdi Azmaveth namdak gasu wang maduibo-e.
Singkudung nai Levi maidungniu paliuleng, maidungleng, rengmundung leng, khatdi namdileng masanbo tiense kam khaide.
Iniu Judah maidunggu jupaodungtu kareng riga kuwang madui khaide sichiujiu Tingwang tu thuonkiujiu namdi situ tad maguira paliutu paphom nia thiujiu njan khaide.
Karaibo phom siniu kareng riga benjadlam Taniabo Rengmun jailam tadpadle.
Hoshaiah niu chalui thiumai saiga tadle, sibo saiga Judah maigu jupao paphom khatniu suitadle.

Pahangga raokhaibo singkumai Azariah, Ezra, Meshullam, Judah, Benjamin, Shemaiah khatdi Jeremiah hainiu make mudjiu pasaiga suitadle. Haibosai Jonathan nahpiu khatdi Shemaiah tah, Zachariah niu suitadle. (Papao-papeh mai siniu Mattaniah, Micaiah khatdi Asaph kiriangga Zakkur paliu-e).

Pasaiga paky-kiriang maidung Shemaiah, Azarel, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nethanel, Judah khatdi Hanani—paliuniu Tingwang mai, David niu thinbo chalui thiuboga thinbo mania hina thinlujiu tadle. Wasi-mawibopiu Ezra niu haibo phomtu jukhai-e.
Duipuak Rengmun gasu David namdi katang tadkhang lujiu, David chawangky tadron ngutjiu tingbanglam Tadui Rengmun ga tadngut khaide.
Thuonkiubo paphom khatse kareng riga mawilam tadmari padle, khatdi sibo phom khatsai Idi suitadle. Aliuniu N-mang Kytonse tadron ngutjiu Kadibo Reng lamse tadpadle,

sigasu aliuniu Ephraim Rengmun, Jerusalem Rengmun, Chakha Rengmun, Hananel Kiton, khatdi Kaikhat gu Akheky hina tadron wangjiu Milydung Rengmun-ga wangtang khaide. Aliuniu tadron wangbose Charaky rengmun mungga loikhaide.
Haichiujiu Tingwang tu thuonkiujiu tadbo phom niase Charaky wonjengga wangtangde.
Iniu majang tadbo maidung riganiu sanjiu singkumai,
Eliakim, Maaseiah, Miniamin, Micaiah, Elioenai, Zechariah khatdi Hananiah paliuniu make mudjiu suitadle;
paliu saiga Maaseiah, Shemaiah, Eleazer, Uzzi, Jehonanan, Malchijah, Elam khatdi Ezer haimaise suitadle. Siga Jezrahiah niu majang tadbo chalui thiumaidungse paliu lai padjiu chalui thiujiu tadle.

Sibo nai paliuniu kengchangkha charathiu khai-e, sichiujiu maidungse chunwiboniu phuimide, palamra Tingwang niu paliu chun pi-ringa khai-e. Maipui-mainahdi changee ga jao-e, haichiujiu paliu khuanse kadiu-diu lamdi chiutang-e.

Sibo tinggase Charakyga maniakad piwangbo dam kariugu dam khat, sigasu charasy masipad raithubo khatdi alin-tara minpad raithubogu kadwangbo hina pakhai bamga khaimira kathinbo maiben-ga pikhaide. Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu maidungniu paliu luzam gasu singkudung nai Levi maidung leng maniakad piwang rabo hina khom taruang bambose hai maidungniu thinbo-e. Judah mai hinaniu singkudung nai Levi maidungtu kimbam niu-e.

palamra Tingwang gu Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu paliuniu kam masanbo tien khatdi Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaibo hina kambamniu-e. Charakyga chalui thiubam maidung nai Charaky akhe maidung sidi chawang David khatdi panahpiu Solomon niu taliu khaibo cheng saisuijiu paliu ngamse kambam-e.
Chawang David nai chalui thiubo Asaph ting ganiu sujiu chalui thiumaidung siniu Tingwang tu thuonbo khatdi thuonbo lui thiubo ga jukhai bamniu-e.

Zerubbabel nai Nehemiah tingga Israel mai hinaniu Charakyga chalui thiumaidung khatdi Charaky akhemaileng tingmik machang maniakad phungwang bamniu-e. Maidungniu Levi maidungleng masanbo maniakad pibamniu-e, khatdi Levi maidungniu singku maileng pirabo damse pibamniu-e.
Mose gu Tacheng-tajaise maidung khuga ken matanjiu kenkhai bamga Ammon mai maksai Moab maitu Tingwang maidung ruangga pijao suimakge chiubo ladse kenpadde.

Haise Israel maidungniu Egypt gasu tadpadbo wan-ga Ammon mai nai Moab maidungniu paliuleng tiura sakra pimakge chiubo jengniu-e. Sibosung Israel maitu siangkhai raleng paliuniu Balaam leng rangkang pijiu lankhai-e, chiudi aliu Rawang niu sibo siangse pithiu khai makjiu kawibo lam thoikhai bide.
Haibo chamtan hai Israel maidungniu chiulubo ga, paliuniu jat katam maidung tuse paliu ruanggasu lupad mibo-e.
Charakygu wakhaibam parid phungbo singku Eliashib niu Tobiah panai pawan katheng majang mawi bamniu-e.

Levi maileng, charakyga chalui thiumaileng, khatdi charaky akhemaileng alin-tara khatdi parim wibo, charakyga thinrabo mania hina khatdi singkumai leng piwangbo maniakaddung, alin-tara, jaw, khatdi takisa hina, khatdi makhuan khaibo kichen kadi khattu Tobiah niu thinra paniu pikhai mide.

Sibo wan gase Ira Jerusalem ga bam makge, palamra chawang Artaxerxes niu Babylon mai wang thiubo samriu-je-niakiubo kum gase pakhuga angamkam hina lamga paokhaira pakhulam tad mibo-e. Sibosai chawangniu suikhaibo saisuijiu
Jerusalem ga I malanwangde. Siga Eliashib niu Charakyga bambo kichen kadibo khatse Tobiah tu thinra pikhai-e chiubo siluboga asuang hamide.
Iniu alung pomju mijiu Tobiah gu hina taliang pad mide.
Sibo kichen hinase kam masanlan lujiu Charakygu maniadung, alin-tara kadwangbo khatdi parim wibo hina khailanra Iniu chamtan pikhaide.
Charakyga chalui thiu maidung nai Levi maidungse tiujiu ringbuira maidungniu piwang makbo jengniu Jerusalem phutkhai lujiu palu-lu lam lungtad lanmide chiubo I silude.
Charakytu wajeng simakbo jengniu chakampaodung situ Iniu rukhaide. Sichiujiu Iniu Levi maidung khatdi chalui thiumaidungtu Charakyga kuwanglan lujiu paliutu paliu tien piten khai lande.
Siga Israel maidungniu paliugu alin-tara, jaw khatdi takisa dam kariugu damkhat Charakyga phungwang lande.

Pahangga raokhai maidung situ Iniu wakhai bamse phuira kamkhai-e: Singku Shelemiah, Tacheng-tajai sikamawibopiu Zadok khatdi Levi mai Pedaiah, Zakkur nahpiu khatdi Mattaniah tahpiu Hanan niu paliutu nkha khai rabo-e. Haimaise paliu lung masan mai-e, sichiujiu paliuniu paliu kahmaidung leng wa-njan khai lubui-e chiubo Iniu malumme.
Iniu natu Kahumboky jengniu khatdi siga kahumbo tienkamga kamkhai mibo hinase maningtao khailo, a-Rawang yo.

Sibo wan-ga Tabamnaise maidungniu mumsy thunbambo I ngaode. Mai khangsianiu alin-tara, jaw, mumsy, ndutsy khatdi katam-tambo maniadung paliugu qonniamtu pi phunglujiu Jerusalem ga tadle, sijengniu Tabamnai wakhatdi jonbo suimakge chiujiu Iniu paliutu rukhaide.
Tyre namdi lamsu mai khangsia Jerusalem ga lungbam niu-e, sichiujiu paliuniu Tabamnai Israel mai khuga jonra chakha khatdi katam-tambo mania pajat hina haibo namdiga phungwang bamniu-e.
Jehudi maigu jupaodungtu Iniu rujiu din-e, “Naliuniu tenbambo kasabo tien hai phuilo! Naliuniu Tabamnai haitu kam tania bamme.
Haijengniu naliu paopehdung riga, haibo namdi riga Tingwang niu sajai pikhaibo-e, Haichiu bamdi naliuniu Tabamnai tingmiktu kam taniajiu Israel mai riga Tingwang lungpom wangsan raleng kam bamme.”
Haijengniu Tabamnai tingmik surabo chawan
Wa pajat-jat jonbo alimaidungse Nidwannai nchun nia-sumra namdireng lenlam bamkhai mibo-e.
Iniu paliutu rujiu din-e, “Nsuan padlan ratu khuanjiu bambo hai matha-e. Naliuniu haichiu kamlansai Iniu naliu riga pumtan thinrabo-e.” Sichiu kamkhaibo gasu sujiu paliuniu Tabamnai wanglanta mide.
Tabamnaitu masanjiu mania lura Levi maidungtu paliu pum kam masan lujiu rengmun hina akhejiu bamlo chiujiu Iniu paliu khuga chamtan pikhaide.
Hey Tingwang yo, haijengniu atu maningtao khailo, haichiujiu nalungsiat diboniu atu gukhailo.
Sibo wan-ga Jehudi mai kakengniu Ashdod mai, Ammon mai khatdi Moab mai liudungtu magiangjiu lung bamme chiubose I silude.
Paliu nahdung paphan-khat kumboniu Ashdod mai lad thiu mide, khatdi khangsia mainiu katam-tambo lad dinmijiu aliu lad dinsi tamide.

Iniu sikumbo piudung situ rukhaijiu, paliu riga siangkhaide, lekkhaide, khatdi paliu tham pekhaide. Paliudi paliu nahmai tudi jat katam maitu magianglan makra Iniu paliutu Tingwang zan-ga ladriat thiukhaide.

Iniu din-e, “Chawang Solomon tu nuan-ga kiukhaibo hai sangdiumai liutu lubo gasu-e. Pahai jat katammai wang suangdi didiangbo wang-e. Tingwang niu patu lungsajiu Jerusalem mai mathiu wang pithiu khai bide, chiudi haibo nuan-ga pah kaokhai mibo-e.
Sichiu-e, sai aliuniu naliu saisui lujiu, Tingwang lad piumakjiu sangdiumai liudungtu lubam rama?”
Joiada hai singku Dibo Eliashib nahpiu-e, chiudi Joiada nahpiu khatniu Beth Horon mai Sanballat nahpuitu kubo jengniu Iniu Joiada tu Jerusalem gasu hathon mide.
Hey Tingwang yo, haimainiu singkugu chakamtu khatdi nangniu singkudung nai Levi maidung khuga ladriat thiukhaibose dechiu kam tania mibo gulo chiubo maningtao khailo.
Sangdiumai hina khugasu Iniu maidungtu kam masan khaide, singkumai nai Levi maidungniu pangam-ngam saisuijiu tenraleng Iniu kamkhai bide.
Charathiuboga thinrabo tasingdi phungwangra Iniu taliu khai bide, sichiujiu maidungniu paliugu raithubo alin-tara khatdi minrai thubo rasy phungwang radi taliu khaide.
Hey Tingwang yo, haibo hina hai maningtao khailo khatdi haijengniu aleng wira kamkhailo.

Paniu mawangbo pasumbo kumga paniu pagu chakampaodung nai ladzanpaodungtu khumki khai bide. Siga Persia mai khatdi Media maigu riphendung nai dithinpaodung khatdi sibo luongriangga katheng-kadi maidungdi siga jaode.
Chawanggu paken dibo, ladzankygu maisuang habo singkhiubo, khatdi kangambo pakhiangnase paniu chahiu charukling lenkhaide.

Sibosai, chawangniu Susa gu dihsing namdiga bambo chamai hinatu kalekwibo khatdi kaleksabo tamson makjiu mathiutu khumki khaide. Sise nidkak khatling tadwang-e khatdi sise chawangkininggu kareng lungga kamme.

Kajengningse chalangriang kamaobo nai kakabo gu jusung fainiu karu khaijiu, sisetu rangkangginiu phen tarilubo fainoi riangniu talatu riga kuiwang rat taman khai-e. Bamchondungse kachia nai rangkangginiu macha khaibo gase talatu kakabo, talatu kahengbo, kapuangbo talatu khatdi kamaobo talatuniu makom khai-e.
Kachiapiang gasu jaw pisak khai-e, chapiang hina palun tam-tamjiu khatnadi kajon makge, khatdi chawangniu pagu chawanggu jawse pisak khaira palung dijiu pikhai-e.
Pamalan thiumakjiu jawse sakge; chawang siniu pawangkiningga mai hinatu paniu-paniu sak kangam then sakra pavangmaidung chamtan pikhaide.
Haichiu bamga, chawang kilungga chawangpui Vashti niu maipuidungtu khumki khaijiu bamme.

Khumkibogu jeng chinniabo nai chawangse jaw sakjiu pachun wibamme, siga paniu pavangmai, papum kamshat mibopiu khang chinnia, Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha, Abagtha, Zethar khatdi Carkas paliutu kuwangde.

Chawangpui Vashti tu pijiu pagu chawangpui pirun khailujiu, puiwangra paniu paliutu chamtan pikhaide. Chawangpui hai palun kawibo khatle, chawangpui lunwat situ pagu chakampaodung nai pagiang maidung khuga chawangniu lenkhai nibo-e.
Chiudi pavangmainiu chawanggu chamtanse chawangpui Vashti khuga dinkhaiboga, paniu suimakjiu ngut makge. Haisiniu chawang lung kampomsui mide.
Tuhoira chawanggu tajai bambo saisuijiu, padmibo lamga dekamralo chiubo tacheng-tajai lamga wasi maigu lungchun maniura, pagu ladpimaidungtu kukhaide.

Pagu ladpimai sira, Carshena, Shethar, Admatha, Tarshish, Meres, Marsena, khatdi Memucan paliu-e—paliu hai Persia nai Media maigu chakampaodung khang chinnia si-e, paliuniu chawang kadihgu kuthubo chakamky thinbam maidung-e.

Paniu haimaidung khuga din-e, “Chawang Xerxes, Iniu chawangpui Vashti tu akhuga puiwangra avangmai khuga chamtan pikhaide, chiudi paniu sise piumak mide! Aliuniu patu degu kamra tacheng tajaiga bamlo?”

Siga Memucan niu chawang nai pagu chakampaodung khuga dinpadle, “Chawangpui Vashti niu chawangtu ronna makjiu pagu chakampaodung tudi—palingjiu, chawang kadihga bambo npiumai hinatu kam mangam khai mibo-e!

Chawangpuiniu kamkhai mibo hai chiulubo wan-ga chawang kadihga bambo maipui hinaniu paliu kinatu wajeng sita mirabo-e. Paliuniu dinrabo-e, ‘Chawang Zerxes niu chawangpui Vashti tu pakhuga wangra chamtan pibo-e chiudi paniu wang makge.’

Persia mai nai Media maigu kadibo chakampaodung naodungniu chawangpuigu lunlung chiuluboga paliuniu paliu kinadung khuga naimik ngut makbo suangga haibo lamse dinsumi rabo-e. Maipiu naodung siniu pabam hinaga paliu kinadungtu chakhuang charao thiutami rabo-e, khatdi paliu kinadungniu paliu naodungtu paliu lung pommi rabo-e.

Haise suikhai-e sai, Pakendibopiu yo, Vashti niu wadaodi chawang masuangga wanglanta mira chawanggu chamtan padmilo. Haise wadaodi kam kalimi makra Persia mai nai Media maigu tacheng-tajaiga raokhai mira chamtan pikhai milo. Sichiujiu pasuang kawibo maipui khattu pijiu malin milo.
Nagu chamtan padbose haijiukha kadibo wangdih pakhiangnaga sichia khaibo wan-ga, maipuidung hinaniu paliu kinadungtu chakhuang thiujiu, kati-kadi thiuson makjiu lungmi rabo-e.”
Chawang nai pagu chakampaodungniu haibo chunningse lunikam mide, sichiujiu Memucan niu ladpi khaibose chawangniu kamkhaide.

Chawangdih luongriang hinagu ladga paniu tachamse langkhaide khatdi luongriang hinagu karaobo jai-aliga haichiu raokhai-e, chiubora maikina hinaniu paliu ky pao thiurabo-e sichiujiu kaloibo ladse paniu dinrabo-e.
Pasai, chawangniu pagu lungpom agikiu mibo saiga Vashti niu kamkhai mibose khatdi paniu palamga suini makjiu dinpad mibo lamse maningjiu bammide.
Haijengniu chawanggu ladpimai pakhuga nadiangmai khangsianiu pakhuga din-e, “Dekamjiu nangniu aliu kawibo chabonmai liuchang khattu phiura kammak jiulo?
Nawangdih luongriang hinaga chakampaodungtu kadakhai lujiu pazu-palun kawibo aliumaidungtu dihsing namdi Susa ga bambo nagu Harem
Sigasu nangniu lunithubo pui situ lulujiu patuse Vashti bamga pijiu chawangpui thiukhai milo.”
Chawangniu haibo ladtikhaibose kawibo ladbamme chiujiu lukhaide, sise paniu suikhaide.
Susa ga Jair nahpiu Mordecai kubo Jehudi mai khat lungbam-e, pase Benjamin mai kiphiu gasu-e khatdi Kish nai Shimei kaikik mai khatle.
Babylon gu chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu Judah gu chawang Jehoiakhin tu kavangleng Jerusalem gasu puitadbo ruangga Mordecai di jaowangbo-e.

Pagu singnapiu nahpui Esther kubo aliumai khat bamme. Hebrew mai zan kuga Hadassah ku-e; pahai pazu-palun kawibo khatdi papum kawibo aliumai khatle. Papui nai papiu shaimiboga, Mordecai niu patuse panahpui kumgapjiu makuat khangbo-e.
Chawanggu kasanbo chamtan hai padboga npuimai kengkhatu Susa ga puiwangde; Esther haidi paliu ruangga jaode. Patudi chawangkininggu Harem ga tatien thiu bambo Hegai niu phuira khai bide.

Hegai niu Esther tu masende, Esther niudi Hegai gu luniga lungkhaide. Hegai niu patuse paphibang gasu chalung sajiu papum akhikhaibo nai kawibo tiutek pikhai bibo kumjiu kam mawi khai bide. Hegai niu patu harem ga withubo bamse pikhai bide khatdi chawangkining gasu kada mawilubo maipui khang chinnianiu patu macha khaira kamkhai bide.
Tuhoira, Mordecai gu ladpikhaibo saisuijiu, Esther niu pahai Jehudi maipui-e chiubose mahinjiu bamme.
Pahai dechiujiu lungkhanglo—khatdi pakhuga nde padsu ralo chiubo lamga sira Mordecai niu naimachang chawanggu harem kahiu gase tadpat tadngutjiu bamme.
Palun wiraleng maipuidungniu machabose takum khat wangmide—parim wibo wasa manuk khaijiu machabo chahiu charuk ngutle khatdi Balsam sa
Aliumai siniu harem gasu chawang bamga tadbo tingga, paniu piuninibo fai-nise piurabo-e.

Paniu siga chawan mengrabo-e, khatdi pasaibo nai nsuanse patu katambo harem ga puitad rabo-e khatdi patuse chawang rammailiupuitu phuijiu bambo papum kamshat mibopiu Shaashgas ben-ga khai rabo-e. Chawangniu patu masenjiu pazan maniu mak saira paniu pakhuga tadlan makrabo-e.

Esther hai chawang khuga tadrabo wanse wangtang mide. Esther hai Abihail nahpui-e, khatdi papiunabo Mordecai niu patu hai panahpui kumgapjiu makuat khangbo-e; Esther tu kangaomai hinaniu patu masen kamme. Paleng pawanse wangtangboga paliutu akhijiu bambo papum kamshat mibopiu, Hegai niu patu ladpikhaibo fai-nise paniu khaide.
Sichiujiu Xerxes niu chawang thiumibo pachinniabo kumgu, chahiu kariubo, Tebeth hiuga, Esther tu chawang Xerxes suangga puiwangde.

Chawang siniu patuse kakibo maipuidungtu suangdi masen nkiu mide, sichiujiu chawanggu masen maraibo khatdi lungsabose paniu daolude. Paniu pagu chawang pirunse papeega runkhaide khatdi Vashti sungse patu chawangpui thiu khaide.

Sigasu Esther tu chakhuang thiubo thiujiu chawangniu kadibo khumki kam khaide khatdi pagu chakampaodung nai dithinpaodungtu kukhaide. Paniu pawangdih pakhiangnaga mathakbo tingmik thiura paoron khaide khatdi chawang khatgu kabuibo thiujiu kalendung njan khaide.
Haichiujiu bamga Mordecai tudi dihthinbo ngam khatga chawangniu kadakhai bide.

Tuhoi tangbo Esther niu pahai Jehudi mai-e chiubo mai khat khugadi pisikhai makge. Mai khat khugadi dinmakra Mordecai niu pakhuga dinkhai mibo-e, sichiujiu paniu pahangga aliu chahuna thiujiu palad piukhang mibo kumjiu tuhoi tangbo palad hai piujiu bambo-e.

Mordecai niu chawangkiningga chakampao thiujiu bambo lungga, chawanggu kichen ngutrabo kamun khuanbo chawangkining gu papum kamshat mibo piu kania, Bigthana nai Teresh niu chawang Xerxes tu ngaokhai lakge khatdi mahin kamshat mira rangsude.
Mordecai niu sibo lamga silude khatdi chawangpui Esther khuga dinkhai bide, sigasu Mordecai niu sipad lubose chawang khuga dinkhai bide.

Siga palamse kahio masan sude, khatdi paokhaibo chamse maji-e chiujiu sipad mide. Haijengniu panai khangniatu chamaitu nkhekshatbo kaiga nkhekshat mide. Chawang siniu haibo lamga pawangdihgu kakungbo ariakkhuangga raokhai mira chamtan pikhaide.
Pakak khat sailam chawang Xerxes niu Haman kubo piutu padihpipao bamga pikhai bide. Haman hai Agag.
Haman tu chakhuang thiubo lenjiu chakampaodung hinaniu pasuangga khudungkiu patu kahumra chawangniu chamtan pikhaide. Sikumjiu paliu mathiu kam kam-e, chiudi Mordecai niura sise kam makge.
Kakibo chakampaodung siniu dekamjiu paniu chawang cham piunimak jiulo chiujiu maniu-e;

sise kamra naikhat khat thiujiu paliuniu pakhuga din-e, chiudi paniu paliu chamtu nkingkhai makge. “Ira Jehudi mai-e,” chiujiu paniu din masan khai bide, “Haijeng gasu Iniu Haman tu kahumni makbo-e.” Sigasu paliuniu Mordecai gu lunlungse Haman niu khengngam lusuma chiujiu haibo chamse pakhuga paokhai bide.
Mordecai niu khudung kiujiu pamasuangga patu kahum lakge chiubose Haman niu siluboga

khatdi pahai Jehudi mai khatle chiubo siluboga palung pomchang-pom mide, khatdi Mordecai tu nkiubo sajai pirabo-e, khatdi Persia mai Wangdihga bambo Jehudimai pakhiangnatu kamshat mira chiujiu paniu rangsude.

Chawang Xerxes niu mawangbo takum kariu-je-niakiubo raithubo hiu, Nisan hiuga, paniu rangkhai mibose kampadra pajat wibo chahiu khatdi naimikpui phuipad raleng taden thonra Haman niu chamtan pikhaide (haisitu “purim” chiujiu ku-e). Haise chahiu kariu-je-niabo, Adar hiugu, jengriu-je-sumkiubo nai tadkiura chapkhai mide.
