Haichiujiu Haman niu chawang khuga din-e, “Nawang kadihgu luongriang pakhiangnaga chamai jat khat bamme. Mai kakimainiu kambo nai ncham makbo tacheng-tajai paliuniu mania-e. Nkiujiu, paliuniu chawang kadihgu tacheng-tajaitu majai makge, haijengniu paliutu akadjiu bamraleng nang masenbo makge.

Pakendibopiu nangniu sui-e sai, paliutu kamshat mira chamtan kamkhai milo. Nangniu haichiu kamsai, nawangdihgu tienkamleng chawanggu chakhiu bungga rangkang taju 340,000 pikhaira Iniu masanjiu chap ngamme.”
Mathiu khuga pisikhaibo khatdi chakampao mainiu thinbo, pagu njungkhapse chawangniu khoilujiu, Jehudi maigu mikrepiu, Agag kaikik, Hammedatha nahpiu Haman khuga pikhai mide.
Chawangniu pakhuga din-e, “Haimaidung nai paliugu rangkangse nagu-e; nangniu kamnibose paliu khuga kamkhai sulo.”

Haichiujiu raithubo hiugu jengriu-je-sumkiubo naise Haman niu chawanggu machunraodungtu kukhaide khatdi paoron rabo chamse dinkhaijiu—sise chawang kadihga din bambo chakhuan hinaga chalipad lujiu mawangpaodung, dithinpaodung khatdi katheng-kadimaidung khuga njan khaira kam khaide. Haise chawang Xerxes zan gasu kamkhai lujiu khatdi pagu njungkhap siniu diangkhai lujiu njankhai mide.

Tacham paoronmai siniu haibo chamse chawangdih pabam hinaga phungjan khaide. Sibo chamga dinkhaibo siniu naikhat lunggasu, Adar hiugu jengriu-je-sumkiubo nai, Jehudi mai kating-kana, maipui-mainah pakhiangnatu kamshatmi rabo-e. Paliutu lungsabo hajiu kamshat kammi rabo-e khatdi paliugu mania hinase lukammi rabo-e.
Sibo lungga bambo chamse luongriang hinaga pisi masan khai rabo-e, chiusai sibo tingmik wangbo nai mai hinaniu kaden lubui-e.

Chawanggu chamtan gasu tachamse Susa gu dihsing namdi lungga bambo maidung khuga pisi khaide, khatdi champaomai siniu sibo chamse kadih pabam hinaga phungtad mide. Susa namdi haitu kam kabuak khaijiu bambo tingga chawang nai Haman sira jaw sakjiu bamme.
Padmibo lam pakhiangna Mordecai niu siluboga palung chariujiu pafai-pani phettap-tap mide. Sigasu paniu maliufai benlujiu khatdi papeega tabui katup khai lujiu kap marungjiu namdi tadronjiu,
chawangkining rengmun wangtang makthen tadpat sude. Paniu palunglam tadngut makge, palamra maliufai benlujiu chawangkiningga ngutra suimakge.

Chawanggu champao paoronkhai mibo luongriang hinaga, Jehudimai hina kapjiu achungboniu phuimide. Paliu kalum rijiu kapsude khatdi paliu chun sajiu siudi thisude, khatdi mai kakengkhaniu maliufai benlujiu tabui jiuga kala sude.

Esther vangpuidung nai papum kamshat mibo piudungniu Mordecai niu kambambose Esther khuga paokhai biboga, palung amanta mide. Paniu Mordecai leng maliufai sung kakibo pon piura langkhai bide, chiudi paniu sise lukhai makge.
Siga chawangpuiniu pavangpiu thiuraleng kadakhaibo chawangkininggu papum kamshat mibopiu Hathakh tu paniu kulujiu, Mordecai khuga nde padbam gulo khatdi dekamjiulo chiubo kahiora langkhaide.
Hathakh niu namdi lungga, chawangkininggu rengmun wonjeng, Mordecai niu bambo lamse tadde.

Siga Mordecai niu padbambo hina khatdi Jehudi mai pakhiangnatu kamshat misai, chawanggu chakhiu bungga rangkang wajiukha pikhai bine chiujiu Haman niu ladriat thiukhai mibo hinase pakhuga dinkhai bide.

Jehudi maidungtu kam maha mira chamtan pikhai mibo, Susa ga jankhai mibo ariakpek khat paniu Hathakh khuga pikhai bide. Mordecai niu sise Esther khuga thintad lujiu sibo lamse paniu pakhuga din masan khaira dinkhai bide, khatdi paniu chawang khuga tadlujiu pamaidungtu lungsa khaira khenglulo chiujiu dinkhaide.
Sise Hathakh niu kam khaide,
khatdi Esther niu haibo chamse Mordecai khuga paomeng lanra pikhai bide:

“Mai khat kumboniu, maipui tadi, maipiu tadi patu kumakjiu ladjanky lungga ngutlujiu chawangtu adaosai, sibo maise shai rabo-e. Haise tacheng tajai-e: chawangtu ladpipaodung gasu luongriangga bambo maidung katang, mai hinaniu haise sikam bambo-e. Haibo tacheng-tajai gasu tadken lurabo npui khatnakha bamme: chawang siniu pagu kachia thunse mai khatleng kariopad khaibi sai, sibo maise pagu ringting kalan lune. Chiudi chawangniu atu langkhai mibose chahiu khat tangmide.”
Mordecai niu Esther champao daoboga,
paniu kachan khaibo ladkeng haise langkhaide; “Nang chawangkiningga bamme chiubo donniu kakibo Jehudi maisuang manang lakge chiujiu maningmi mane.

Nangniu haikumbo wan-ga maliu makjiu bammisai, tinggen lamsu Jehudi maidungtu gukhaira wangsu rabo-e, sichiujiu paliutu ranlu rabo-e, chiudi nangra shairabo-e khatdi napiu kikhunse loimi rabo-e. Chiudi haikumbo wan wangrabo bambijiu natu pijiu chawangpui thiukhai bambo ma! Saoniu siralo.”
Esther niu Mordecai khuga haibo chamkakse langkhaide:

“Tadlujiu Susa ga Jehudi mai hinatu ku madui lujiu; kalum riraleng kamlo khatdi aleng kakheng kamkhailo. Nchun n-nien jengsum hai wadi tiu-sak mane. Avangpuidung aliudi sise kumgapjiu kamne, sibo sailam tacheng- tajai gasu suimakjiu bamdi Iniu chawang khuga tadne. Haichiu kamboga I shaisiak raleng padjiu tadi, I shaira mide.”
Sigasu Mordecai niu sibo bamtu phutlujiu patu kamlo chiujiu Esther niu dinkhaibo hinase kamsude.

Paniu kalum rilubo jengsumbo naise Esther niu pawangkining pon khailujiu khatdi chawangkininggu ladjanky lungsinglam tad ngutjiu chawang bambo kichen lam pazu mahenjiu phuide. Chawangse kalunglam chawang bamga ntaolujiu kamun jailamse pazu marilujiu ntao bamme.
Chawang siniu chawangpui Esther lenlam chapjiu bambo ngaoboga, chawanggu suikhaibose daolude sichiujiu pagu kachia-thunse thinpad pikhaide. Siga paniu khanglujiu sibo tonse thin khaide.
“Haise degulo, chawangpui Esther yo?” chiujiu chawangniu maniu-e. “Nangniu lunibo akhuga dinkhailo, khatdi sise nangniu daolune—agu chawangdih paphan khatlam tadi sui-e.”
Esther niu paokakge, “Pakendibopiu yo, nangniu suikhai-e sai, Haman nanaitu thaichun agiang thiukhaira khatdi Iniu nanaileng macha khaibo akuang kanse tiukhaira khengbo-e.”
Chawangniu Haman tu kalangjiu wangra chamtan pikhaide. Sichiujiu Esther gu chagiang thiujiu chawang nai Haman niu maluadse tiura tadde.
Jaw sakjiu bamboga chawangniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nangniu degu lunijiulo, sise nangniu daolune. Nangniu agu chawangdih paphan khatlam khengjiu tadi nangniu khengbose Iniu suikhai rabo-e.”
Esther niu paokakge,
“Pakendibopiu yo, Iniu khengjiu bambotu suikhai-e sai, nsuannai maluang tiulan raboga Haman nanaitu pijiu agu chagiang thiu khailan ni-e. Sigasu Iniu masenbose din khaine.”

Haman niu katiu tiulujiu tadpad mide, siga palungchun kawibo maningjiu pachun wisude. Chiudi kamun-ga chap bamniubo Mordecai niu patu chakhuang thiukhai makbose ngaoboga, chiubora chapkhang makjiu tadi chakhuang thiubo madan khatnadi lenkhai makbo jengniu, Haman palung pomchang-pom mide.
Chiudi paronna patu thinriap lujiu pakylam wangmide. Sigasu paniu pakamaitu pakyga kukhaide, khatdi panao Zeresh tu paliu ruangga jaora din khaide.

Pahai dejiukha kalek wilo, khatdi panah npiumai nde kengkha bamgulo, dechiujiu chawangniu patu kakubo chakambam pikhailo, khatdi kakibo chakampaodung suang patuse chawangniu dejiukha parathiubo maileng lukhailo chiubo paliu khuga pa-n-geng thiu sude.
Haman niu dinkiu lan-e, “Nde nkiubo bamlo, chawangpui Esther niu chawang anai makjiu mai khat tudi maluang tiu makge, sichiujiu nsuanaidi anaitu kukhai lan bamme.
Chiudi, haise alengra Jehudi maipiu Mordecai niu chawangkininggu kamun-ga ntao bambo Iniu ngaobam thenna wadi alung kiu makge.”

Haijengniu panao nai pakahmainiu haichiu ladti khaide. “Dekamjiu chamaitu ju-maseng shatbo bam gaphek makai-je-niakiu kubo nangniu thiumak jiulo? Nsuanai nsuan siga Mordecai tu jumaseng shat mira chawang khuga nangniu dinsui-e, sichiusai nangniu katiu tiuboga nachun wijiu tadlu rabo-e.” Haman niu haise kawibo chunning-e chiubo lukhai lujiu, chamaitu jumaseng shatrabo bamse thiukhai sude.
Sibonai nchunse chawang jikiu lulak mide, haijeng gasu paniu chawangdihgu raokhaibo ariak khuangdungse ponwang lujiu pakhuga kenpadra chamtan pikhaide.

Paliuniu kenpadboga chawangtu mahin kamshatra kambambose Mordecai niu silujiu, khatdi nbai makjiu dinpadbo lamse jao-e, mahinbo tienkam haise chawang kigu kichen akhejiu bambo papum kamshat mibo piu kania Bigthana nai Teresh niu kambo-e.
Chawang niu maniu-e, “Dechiujiu aliuniu Mordecai tu chakhuang thiukhaijiu, degu tathuon pikhai milo?”
Pavangmainiu paokakge, “Paleng wakhatnadi kamkhai makha-e.”
“Chawang kiningga agu chakampaodung ruangga mai khat kumbo bamma?” chiujiu chawangniu maniu-e.
Tuhoi Haman niu ladjanky lungga ngutgap bamme. Paniu chamaitu jumaseng shatrabo bam kamkhaibo gasu Mordecai tu masengshat mira paniu chawang khuga khengra wangbo-e.
Haijengniu kavangdung siniu paokakge, “Haman haiga natu adaora khuanjiu bamme,”
“Patuse kalunglam pi-ngut khailo,” chiujiu chawangniu dinde.
Haijengniu Haman ngutde, siga chawangniu pakhuga din-e, Iniu chakhuangthiu khaini siakbo mai khat bamme. Haibo piuleng Iniu degu kamkhai ralo?”
Haman niu paronna patu maning-e, “Tuhoira chawangniu haijiukha chakhuangthiu khainibose saotu bamralo? Atu bamta lakge.”
Sigasu paniu chawangtu paokakge, “Nangniu piubo pondung—chawang ponniase haibo piuleng thinwangra chamtan pikhailo. Nagu chaqon riga chawanggu tatiu-tataa khaira lengdi chamtan pikhailo.

Sigasu nagu chakampao ruangga dithubopiu siniu sibo piu khuga haibo ponniase piukhai bilo khatdi patu pijiu namdi wonjengga pazu dijiu pitad khailo. Paliuniu tadjutjiu palung kadibo piu siniu haichiu senlo; ‘Phuilo, chawangniu chakhuangthiu khaini maitu haichiujiu tathuon pikhaibo-e.’

Siga chawangniu Haman khuga din-e, “Majad sulo, chapuan-tania nai chaqonse thinwang sulo, khatdi Jehudi maipiu Mordecai khuga sibo chakhuangthiu khaibo ponse pikhai bilo. Nangniu dinmibo kumjiu wahina paleng kamkhai bilo. Pahai chawangkininggu rengmun-ga ntao bamniubo nangniu ngao sune.”

Sichiujiu Haman niu chapuan-tania nai chaqonse thinwangde, khatdi paniu sibo maniase Mordecai tu piukhai bide. Mordecai niu chaqon riga buangkhang lujiu ntaode khatdi Haman niu jukhaijiu patu namdigu wonjengga tadjutjiu maidung khuga haichiu senjiu tadde, “Phuilo chawangniu chakhuangthiu khai nimai khattu haichiujiu tathuon pikhaibo-e.”
Haman niu palung aman makjiu pazu tomlu, pakylam majadjiu pakwang miboga, Mordecai niu chawangkininggu rengmun-ga malanwang mide.

Haman niu panao nai pakamai khuga wanglujiu pakhuga padmibo lam hina dinkhaide. Siga panao khatdi ningtingbo pakahmainiu pakhuga din-e, “Nagu pumtanse Mordecai khuga hakhai mine. Pahai Jehudi mai-e, siniu nang patu ngamlakge. Paniu maomakjiu natu kamkao mine.”
Paliuniu sichiu npao bamboga, chawangkininggu papum kamshat mibo piudung siniu Haman tu Esther gu maluad tiuboga majang wangra majadjiu wangde.
Sichiujiu chawang nai Haman se Esther gu maluad niabose tiu raleng tadmide. Sichiujiu jaw sakjiu bamga chawangniu pakhuga maniu lande,
“Tuhoira, chawangpui Esther yo, nangniu nde lunilo? Akhuga dinlo sichiusai sise nangniu daolune. Iniu agu chawangdih paphan khat katangdi pikhaibi rabo-e.”
Chawangpui Esther niu paokakge, “Pakendibopiu yo, Iniu chakhuangthiujiu khengbose suikhai-e sai, I ringlura khatdi amaidung ringlura Iniu lunibo-e.

Amaidung nai atu kamshat mira jonkhai mibode. Kavangleng jonkhai mibo riga sa nkiubo wadi ha-e, haichiubo donniu I maliumak silak mide, sichiujiu natu kam chariu makta rabo-e; chiudi aliutu kam mahami rabo-e, kam maha kammi rabo-e!”
Siga chawang Xerxes niu chawangpui Esther khuga maniu-e, “Saoniu haikumbose kam-hu luralo?” Sikumbo maise ndega bamlo?”
Esther niu paokakge, “Aliugu mikremai, aliutu rejiu bambo kasabo hai Haman si-e!”
Haman niu chawang nai chawangpui khuga pingboniu pazu charungjiu phuiwang-e.

Chawangse palung pomju mijiu, chapkhang kichense phutlujiu chawangkining lenlam kareng gase tadpad mide. Tuhoira chawangniu patu sajai pirabo-e chiubose Haman niu ngaopad mibo-e, sijengniu siga paniu chapbam lujiu chawangpui Esther khuga paringting leng khengra kam sude.

Chawangniu kareng gasu kichen-ga malan wangboga, paniu Esther jiga kaokiu lujiu gukhaira kheng-e, haise ngaokhai lujiu chawangniu marajiu senpadle, “Hainapiu siniu amasuang siakga tangna chawangpuitu manomjiu minra kam jiuma?”
Chawang siniu haise dinkhai kaji dinkhai kari papum kamshat mibo piudung siniu wangjiu Haman peese domman mide.

Sichiujiu paliu ruangga khangkhat pazanniu, Harbonah kubo piuniu din-e, “Pakendibo piu yo, nagu ringtingtu gukhaibo Mordecai tu masengshat mira Haman niu masengshat bam khat pakyga thiukhai nbambo-e. Sise gaphek makai-je-niakiu kubo-e!”
“Haman tu sibo riga masengshat milo” chiujiu chawangniu chamtan pikhaide.
Haichiujiu Mordecai tu ju masengshat rabo bam paniu thiukhaibo rigase Haman tu masengshat mide. Sigasu chawanggu lungpomse agikiu mide.

Sibo nai siak chawang Xerxes niu Jehudi maigu mikrepiu, Haman gu mania hinase chawangpui Esther leng pikhai mide. Mordecai hai pakiriang-e chiujiu Esther niu chawang khuga dinkhaide, siga chawangniu bamboga ngutra suikhai bide.
Chawangniu pagu madan diangkhaibo pagu njungkhap khoipad lujiu (haise Haman khugasu khoipad lanbo si-e) Mordecai khuga pikhaide. Esther niu Mordecai tu Haman gu chakhiu-chalan phuira malin khai mide.
Sigasu Esther niu chawang khuga makhumkiu lujiu khatdi kapjiu dinlan-e. Agag
Chawangniu pagu kachia thunse pakhuga khoipad pide, siga pah chapkhang lujiu din-e.

“Pakendibo piu yo, nangniu sichiujiu suikhai-e sai khatdi nangniu alamga manang khaisai khatdi haise nakhuga maji-e sai, haibo dihga lungjiu bambo Jehudi mai pakhiangnatu kam maha mira Agag kaikik, Hammedatha nahpiu Haman niu chamtan pikhai mibose kam khai makra tacham paoronra chamtan pikhai khelo.
Haikumbo sansiat kasabose amaidung riga wangsai, khatdi asingna maitu kamshat misai, dechiujiu I kheng ngamlu ralo?”

Siga chawang Xerxes niu chawangpui Esther nai Jehudi maipiu Mordecai khuga din-e, “Phuilo Haman niu mahinjiu Jehudi maitu kam mahara kambo jengniu patu Iniu masengshat mide, khatdi pagu maniase Esther leng pikhai mide.

Chiudi chawang zan gasu madan diangkhai lujiu tacham paoronra njankhai mibose kalan silakge. Chiudi kam suibo khatra, nangniu masenbose Jehudi mai khuga raokhaibo sui-e; sise nangniu chamtan gasu raolujiu chawanggu madanse diangkhaibo sui-e.”

Haise pasumbo hiu Sivan gu jeng makai-je-sumkiubo nai padmibo-e. Mordecai niu chawanggu machunraodungtu kulujiu Jehudi maidung khuga, khatdi dithinpaodung khuga, chakampaodung khuga, khatdi India gasu Sudan tangbo luongrian 127 hinagu chakampao thiubambo maidung khuga dinkhaira chamlense raokhai sude. Chamlense kadih pabam hinagu ladga khatdi paliuniu karaobo thakga raolujiu khatdi Jehudi maileng paliu ladga khatdi paliuniu karaobo thakga raolujiu njankhai sude.

Mordecai niu sibo chamlense chawang Xerxes zan gasu raokhaide, khatdi chawanggu madanse diangkhaide. Chawanggu chaqon ruangga maluongram tongtadboga majadthubo qondung tuangmaidungtu pikhaijiu njan khaide.

Haibo chamlen-ga Jehudi mainiu namdi hinaga chari asun raleng paliu ronna maduira chawangniu suikhaibo-e chiubo lad din masan khaide. Paliu ram lungga, luongren khatgu riphenmainiu Jehudi maidungtu, paliu naodung, maksai paliu nahdungtu chari thiu susai, Jehudi maidungniu asun lanbo sui-e khatdi paliutu chari thiuwang maidungtu kam maha midi sui-e; paliuniu sibo mai, mathiu mai khattudi masiak makjiu kamshat kam midi sui-e khatdi paliugu maniadungse lumidi sui-e.
Sibo chamlense Persia mai kadih pakhiangnaga Jehudi maidungtu kamshat mira suikhaibo tingmik, chahiu kariu-je-niakiubo Adar hiugu jengriu-je-sumkiu gasu sumi rabo-e.
Patingmik wangbo nai, Jehudi maidungniu paliugu mikremaidung riga chakhum ruira kaden lura jengniu haise tacheng-tajai kumgapjiu luongriang hinaga mai hina khuga pisi khaibo-e.
Chawanggu chamtan gasu chaqon tongmaidungniu chawanggu chaqondung tuanglujiu majad thuboga paktad sude. Sibo chamtanse dihsing namdi Susa ga bammai khugadi pikhai bide.
Mordecai niu chawanggu mao-majaibo nai kakabo fainoi piulu khatdi pakendibo kachia pirun khailujiu chawangkiningtu phuijiu tadpadde. Siga Susa puidi gase matha ringabo khuanniu rio-rio bamme.
Jehudi mailengra chunwi mathabo, tadiu wibo khatdi chari ngambo lungchun siniu phui mide.

Namdi nai luongriang hinaga chawang cham paoronbose kentaoboga, Jehudi maidungniu chunwijiu mathakbo khatdi changeebo tingmikleng kam khaide. Pachangjiu dinboga, kakibo maidungdi Jehudi mai thiu mide, palamra paliuse tuhoira Jehudi maitu ping mide.

Adar hiugu jeng kariu-je-sumkiubo nai chawanggu chamtan pikhai mibose thinsumi rade, Jehudi maidunggu mikre maidungniu paliugu pumtan hangga paliutu khailura agunjiu bambo tingmikse wangmide. Chiudi sibosung, Jehudi maidungniu paliu riga chari ngam mide.

Chawang dihga bambo Jehudi mainiu lungbambo namdi hinaga Jehudi maidungniu paliutu kam masara kam maidungtu asunra paliu ronna kaden lude. Pabam hinaga maidungniu paliutu pingmide, khatdi mai khatniudi paliu masuangga chapngam lumakge.
Palingjiu, luongrianggu katheng-kadi maidung, dihthinpaodung, chakampaodung, chawang malin maidung hinaniu Jehudi maitu nkha-e, palamra paliu mathiuse Mordecai tu ping mide.
Mordecai hai tuhoira chawangkiningga pumtan bambi-bi mide chiubo mai hina sichia mide.
Sijengniu Jehudi maidungniu paliugu mikre maidung khuga kamkhai nibose kamngam mide. Paliuniu simaidungtu chaheng thinlu asun sude khatdi paliutu kamshat kam mide.
Susa namdi lung siakga, Jehudi maidungniu chamai kai mangiutu kamshat mide.

Paliu ruangga Mammedatha nahpiu Haman nah khang kariu, Jehudi maidunggu mikremai: Parshandatha, Dalphon, Aspatha, Poratha, Adalia, Aridatha, Parmashta, Arisai, Aridai khatdi Vaizatha paliu-e. Haichiu bamtadi, chakyra sung makge.
Sibo tingmik siak Susa ga chamaitu kamshat mibo riakse chawang khuga madu khaide.

Sigasu paniu chawangpui Esther khuga din-e, “Susa lungga ronna Jehudi mainiu chamai kai mangiutu kamshat mide, Haman nahpiudung khang kariudi jaomide. Sichiusai luongriangdung gara paliuniu nde kamkhai mibam suralo! Tuhoira nangniu nde lunilo? Nangniu sise daolune. Katambo degu nang masenbo bamlo, nangniu sise daolune.”

Esther niu paokakge, “Pakendibopiu yo, nangniu suikhai-e sai, Susa ga bambo Jehudi mainiu thainai kam mibo kum, sonnai kamlanra suikhailo khatdi Haman nahpiudung pumse chamaitu masengshat khaibo bamga maseng khaira chamtan pikhailo.”
Haise kamra chawangniu chamtan pikhaide, sibo chamtanse Susa ga njan khaide. Haman nahpiudung khang kariu phawse maidung mathiu suangga sichiujiu lenkhaide.
Adar hiugu jeng kariu-je-madaikiubo nai Susa ga Jehudi maidung madui lanlujiu nkiubo thiujiu chamai kai sumtu namdi lungga kamshat lanmide. Chiudi paliuniu chakyra sungmi makge.

Luongriang hinaga bambo Jehudi maidi kaden lude. Paliugu mikremaidung sang riak chinnia mangiutu paliuniu kamshat lubo gasu paliuniu mikre maidung khugasu duak lude. Chiudi paliuniu chakyra sung makge.
Haise Adar hiugu jengriu-je-sumkiubo nai-e. Pasaibo nai, jeng kariu-je-madaibonai maitu kamshat lanta mide, khatdi sibo tingmik gase paliuniu tiu-sakjiu, matha-malabo tingmik pithiu khaide.
Susa ga bambo Jehudi maidungniu, jengriu-je-sumkiubo nai khatdi jengriu-je-madaikiubo nai paliugu mikre maidungtu kamshat mibo jengniu, jengriu-je-mangiukiubo naise mathakbo tingmik leng kam khaide.
Haijengniu namdak kasiamboga lungbo Jehudi maidungniu, Adar hiugu jengriu-je-madaikiubo naise chunwijiu mathakbo tingmik, khatdi khatniu khattu katiu-kasak kalen pibo tingmik pithiu khaide.
Haichiu padmibo hinase Mordecai niu raokiu khaide khatdi Jehudi mai pakhiangna, kadiugadi kanagadi Persia mai kadih pabam hinaga,
maidungtu haibo Adar hiugu jengriu-je-madaikiubo nai khatdi jengriu-je-mangiukiubo naise mathakbo tingmik thiujiu takum machangna maniara chamlen langkhaide.

Haibo tingmikdungse Jehudi mainiu paliugu mikremai khugasu duakpad lubo tingmik si-e; haise chunsabo nai tachun thiupad silak mibo wan gasu chunwi mathaboga kam kalikhaibo hiu khatle. Haibo tingmikdungse chakhuang changee thiujiu tiu aruang, sak aruangbo, khatniu khattu katiu-kasak kalen pibo khatdi kalek samaitu katiu kikhaira, paliu khuga dinkhai bide.
Sichiujiu Jedudi mainiu Mordecai gu ladtikhaibose majaide, khatdi takumgu changee khat thiujiu kam mide.

Agag kaikik, Jehudi maigu mikrebo piu-- Hammedatha nahpiu Haman niu Jehudi maitu kam maharabo tingmik chapkhai raleng taden thon-e (maksai “purim” chiujiu paliuniu ku-e); paniu paliutu kam maha mira rangkhaibo-e.

Chiudi Esther niu chawang khuga tadjiu, Haman niu Jehudi maitu kam mahara rangkhai mibogu sansabose daojiu chariu bamme chiubogu chamtan raokhaibo sung, Haman nai panahpiudungtu chamaitu masengshatbo bam gasu masengshat mide.
Haijengniu mathakbo tingmik situ Purim chiujiu ku-e. Mordecai gu chamlen jengniu khatdi paliu khuga padmibo pakhiangna jengniu,

Jehudi maidungniu sise tacheng-tajai khat kamkhaijiu, paliu kaikikdungniu, khatdi saokum mainiu Jehudi mai khat thiuwang sai Mordecai gu ladtikhaibo saisuijiu haibo tingmikdung haise takum machangna mania tan-tanra kam khaide.
Sailam lungwang rabo chaken hinaga Jehudi mai kikhun hinaniu luongriang nai namdi hinaga Purim gu tingmik haitu maningtaobo thiujiu pawan wangbo hinaga mania raleng chapkhai mide.
Sigasu Abihail nahpui, chawang nao , Esther niu Purim lamga masuang Mordecai niu chamlen raokhai mibo lamga tanjiu chamlen raokhaide.
Chamlen siniu Jehudi mai pakhiangna khuga raokhaibo-e, khatdi sibo ariakse Persia mai luongriang 127 pakhiangnaga langkhaide,

khatdi paliuniu achungbo wan nai kalum rijiu mania raleng tacheng-tajai kamkhai mibo kumgapjiu Purim gu tingmik situ paliu khatdi paliu kaikikdungniu mania raleng dinkhaide. Haise Mordecai nai chawangpui Esther niu pikhaibo chamtan side.
Esther niu Purim lamga kam matip khaibo chamtanse, charaogu majiuhan khatga raokhai bamme.
Chawang Xerxes niu pawangdih n-ganglam lungbam maidungtu khatdi duipui mung-ga lungjiu bam maidungtu manomjiu pi changam kamkhaide.

Paniu kamkhai mibo kadibo khatdi maisuang habo pakhiangna, paniu dechiujiu Mordecai tu kakubo ngam pikhai milo chiubo racham pakhiangnadi, Persia mai nai Midia mai wangdunggu ariakkhuangga raokhai nbamme.

Jehudi maipiu Mordecai hai Chawang Xerxes hanggara kadibo bampi paniabo-e. Patuse pamai Jehudi maidungniu chakhuang thiu-e khatdi masen kamme. Paniu pamaidungleng kawibo khatdi paliu kaikikdungniu manang makjiu lungra kamkhai bide.
Uz kadihga Tingwang tu malumbo khatdi patu ronna kahumbopiu pazanniu Job kubo mai lungbam niu-e. Pahai pawan machang kasabo kam miratu manangjiu bambo kawibo mai-e.
Panah piumai khang chinnia, puimai khangsum bamme.
Khatdi mily sang chinnia, qontrao sang sum, kabuichi sang khat, qonniam kai mangiudi marui bamme, pavangdungdi kengkha bambo-e, sichiujiu tingbanglam lungwi thubo piu-e.
Job nahmaidung siniu naimachang maluong katiu tiujiu khat khat kyga meng meng-e, siga paliuniu paliu tanpui khangsum situdi kukhai khaijiu bamme.

Sichiu maluong tiulubo sai Job niu nsuan kalu buangsu lujiu panahmai mathiutu kam masan khaira chara thiu-e. Paniu haichiu kambo sira panahmai ruanggasu paliu menglamsu Tingwang tu din masajiu nuan kammi bam sune chiu maningbo jengniu-e.
Tinggen maidung
niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nang degu kamkin jiulo?”
Satan niu paokakge, “Kadihpiri pakhiangna rontadjiu haichiu khangkiujiu bambo-e.
Satan niu paokakge, “Job niu nakhu gasu wakhatdi daomaksai paniu natu kahumjiu bam rama?

Nangniu pawan machang patu, paky khun maitu khatdi pakhuga kabambo hinatu gukhaijiu bambo-e. Paniu kambo hinaga nangniu thoikhaibi-e, sichiujiu pagu khaorui khaonatu kadihpiri pakhiangnaga pi lungphui khaibi-e.
Chiudi tuhoi nangniu pagu kabambo hina luthon milo, sichiusai paniu natu din masajiu siangmi rabo-e!”
Naikhat Job nahmaidung siniu paliu singna tingthubopiu kyga maluong tiubambo wan-ga,
Job khuga chakhumpao khatniu pakwang lujiu din-e, “Chaluga aliuniu matom thinjiu bambo-e sibo mungga qonniamdungse tagijiu bamme.
Siga simakdakjiu Sabean
Paniu palad dinloi makhaga kavang khangkhat wanglujiu dinsude, “Chagan wonjiu milydung nai mily khuanmaidung tudi kamshat kam mide. Haibo cham paokhaira aronna masiak lubo-e.”
Paniu dinloi makhaga kavang khangkhat pakwang lujiu dinlan-e, “Chaldean
Paniu dinloi makhaga kavang khangkhat pak wanglujiu dinlan sude, “Nanah maidungse tingthubopiu kyga katiu maluangtiu bambo-e,
siga ramjeng lamsu tingthung katan khat wang-e. Sibo tingthung siniu chaky hunkaojiu paliu mathiutu kamshat mide. Haibo cham paokhaira aronna masiak lubo-e.”
Siga Job niu suchap lujiu, palung chariujiu, pafai pani phetsude. Paniu papee gotlujiu kadihga makhum kiude.
Paniu din-e, “Apumrong atu manawangbo-e, apumruang I shairabo-e.
Wahina padjiu bamtadi Job niu Tingwang tu din masajiu nuan kammi makge.
Tinggen maidung
niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nang delam tadkhai kinjiulo?”
copy Satan niu paokakge, “Kadihpiri pakhiangnaga haichiu nkum nkhangjiu bambo-e.”
Satan niu paokakge, “Mai khatniu pah ringlu raleng wahina phutlubui-e.
Chiudi tuhoi nangniu papumtu kam masakhailo chiusai paniu natu siangmi rabo-e!”
Sijengniu Satan khuga
Siga Satan niu tadlujiu Job pum pakhiangna pijiu akhuankhai sude,
siga Job niu kara ponkhaibo bamga pagen kathiubo panagise got thonra chalipang khoilujiu meng ntaobam mide.
Panaoniu pakhuga din-e, “Nangra tacheng matipjiu bamme chiumakma? Dekamjiu Tingwang tu siangkhai lujiu shaimi mak jiulo?”

Job niu paokakge, “Nang wasimakbo lad din bamme! Tingwang niu wakawi piboga aliu lu-e. Paniu aliuleng chariu magenthiubo langkhaiboga dechiujiu aliuniu suimak ralo?” Haichiu chariu magenthiubo daojiu bamdi Job niu Tingwang tu wakhatdi kiamkhai makge.

Job kahmaidung khangsum Teman namdi gasu Eliphaz, Shuah gasu Bildad khatdi Naamah kadih gasu Zophar chiujiu wang-e. Job hai chariuchang chariu bamme chiubo khuan paliuniu chiuboga, paliuniu tadlujiu patu pachun kam kam njiu khaira wang-e.
Paliuniu pabam kadiu lamsu Job tu phuimeng ngao-e, chiudi palun sita mide. Paliuniu patu siluboga, paliu lung chariujiu paliu faini phetjiu paliu piriga tabui katup khaijiu kapjiu huisude.
Pagu magenthakse paliuniu ngaoluboga paliuniu waladdi dinmakjiu nchun chinnia,nien chinnia maliumakjiu maluang ntaokhang sude.
Kanamboga, Job niu patu manawangbo tingmik situ siangjiu dinpat sude.
Hey Tingwang yo, atu lungwangbo nchun situ siangkhailo;
atu manawangbo tingmik situ siangkhailo!
Tingwang yo, sibo tingmiktu pijiu tamiu milo.
Sibo nai situ pijiu ben khai tulo;
sibo tingmik situ pijiu wadaodi maningtao khailan tulo.
Chunsabo tingmik pi thiumilo.
Kamuangniu gomjiu pi tamiu milo, khatdi naimik situ pikiu milo.
Sibo nchun situ takum gasu luthon milo,
pijiu pariak chakkhai lan talo;
pasy masi makbo pithiu milo,
chunwi makbo nchun thiumilo.
Mantage.
Nsuan ganbiu situ pijiu benkhai tulo;
nsuan padlanra maning makbo nchun pithiu khailo.
Atu manabo nchun situ siangkhailo,
palamra magenthiubo nai chariuboga atu pilung wangkhai-e.
Apui alam lung gasu maksai atu managapbo gasu shaimi ni-e.
Deleng apuiniu pahingpomga ponkhai jiulo?
Dekamra paniu atu pontup khai jiulo?
Sibo tingga I shai misai, tuhoi I mathak bam rabo-e.
Nda chawangkiningdung thiukhai lanbo,
mawangpaodung nai chawangdung kumjiu Idi jibam rabo-e.
Sichiusai kachia nai rangkangniu paliu kyga,
makhuanting khaibo chawang nahdung kumjiu Idi jibam rabo-e.
Maksai mana makhabo ngena kumjiu Idi jibam rabo-e.
Kasamaidung siniu paliugu kasabose charawga loikhai mibo-e,
changam kambo gasu chiami maidungse kanambo gara mathak mibo-e.
Kavangkyga bammaidung sidi katanbo chamtan gasu mathak mibo-e,
khatdi njiu-satna bam mibo-e
Pazan tadmai, palun simakmai siga bamme,
chiudi kanambo gara kavangdungdi khenrang thiumi-e.
Chamaina hai deleng magenthiujiu ringbam ralo?
Dekamra chamainagu chunsaboga kabenbo hai pikhai jiulo?
Kashaibo haitu paliu khuanjiu bamme, chiudi haise wadaodi wang makge;
Paliura chakhiu-chalantu suang charawtu masenjiu bambo-e.
Shaijiu baimi makthen chunwibose daomakge;
Paliu sailam wangrabo tadon-changiuse pake hina lamsu
malim lujiu Tingwang niu baimi-e.
Katiu tiubo sung, Ira chunsajiu bamme, wadaodi I hoisao silakge.
Iniu kapingbo nai manangbose wang gap-gap-e.
Mathakjiu agi-manaibose alengra wadi ha-e,
agu magenthak hai pamalan thiumakge.
Job yo, I maliumak bamlu lak mide,
I wa dinpad sai nalung pom rama?
Nangniu maidung kakengkhatu katikhai mide,
khatdi kasa-kason maitu pitankhai mide.
Mai khatniu paphi masuijiu sonkiu chiamiboga,
nalad kengniu patu kachukhai-e.
Tuhoira chariubo hai nadam mide, chiudi haise daora nachun thiu makge.
Nangniu Tingwang tu kahumbo jengniu, agunbo nai malumbose nakhuga bamme,
siniu kamaobo ha-e chiujiu nangniu lu-e.
Tuhoira makum kalanlo. Tacheng matipmainiu sansabo daobo lamga din matailo.
Maidungniu kasabo luzam chulujiu kasabo lin lingkhaibo I ngao-e;
tuhoira paliuniu kasabose atiat bamme.
Tingwang niu palungpom gasu paliutu tingthung kumjiu kam maha mide.
Ndongqui niu marungbo kumjiu, kasamaise marungjiu kap bamme.
Tingwang niu paliu hiu kamtang mibo jengniu paliu maliuna bammi-e.
Wa kamshat tiura hamibo ndongqui kumjiu paliu shaijiu bamme,
paliu nahdungdi pak marakam mide.
Pawan khatga manuanbo cham wang-e, sise Iniu chiukungjiu chiu-e.
Nchun amang lamsu chara minbo kumjiu atu kamlop khai-e.
Pingjiu apum hai kaphikdung-dung bamme.
Hengri kalikbo siniu azu niakhaiboga, pingboniu agiuse chaprung-rung mide.
Wakhatra chapbambo I ngao-e, sise Iniu matingjiu phui-e,
chiudi sise degulo chiubo din ngamlakge.
Siga maliuna bambo gasu chakhuan khat chiu-e.
“Tingwang masuangga mai khatniu tacheng maji ngamma?
Maksai patu Dampao suangga masan ngamma?
Tingwang niu pagu tinggen vangmai tudi malum makge,
mazadunggu kamaobodi paniu daojiu bamme.
Paniu taniang gasu dambo gandam, tarimudtu kumjiu
niakpet mirabo situ paniu malum buima?
Mai khatniu nsuan ringbamdi sui-e, chiudi simakjingjiu chawan wang makga shaimidi sui-e.
Pagu kabambo hina hamide khatdi shaimide, sise paniu sitanglu makge.”
Job yo, ku matailo. Mai khatniu paokak khai suma?
maza khat khuga nang marilu buima?
Shairaleng manangjiu nalung pombo hai kapangbo wasi kamakbo gu-e.
Kapangmainiu wasao thiubotu Iniu ngao-e,
siga Iniu paliu riga tasiang siangkhai-e.
Paliu nahmaidung wadaodi amanbo ngaolakge;
paliutu gukhaira ladzankyga maidi chapsu lakge.
Kapangmaigu miusy tathujiuga puakbambose tad mariu mainiu tiurabo-e,
khatdi palek watse kacharimainiu ngaopun rabo-e.
Kasabose kadih gasu puakkhangbo makge,
magenthiubose kadih gasu puakkhangbo makge.
Makge! Magenthiubose paronna wangbo-e,
Haise chamirang machak padbo kumbo-e.
I hai nang-e sai, Tingwang khuga apai rabo-e.
Pagu kadibo ngamse aliuniu sitanglu lakge,
pagu maisuang habo ngam hai pamalan thiumakge.
Paniu tingriu khaijiu luzamga tadui kajin khai-e.
Yo, lung manonmaitu Tingwang niu jukhaibi-e,
khatdi kap-kiam bam maitu ringabo pikhai bi-e.
Pasiam kasamai lunise paniu kam kadat khai-e,
khatdi ningtingmaitu paliu thakga pi man mi-e, sichiujiu paliu wadaodi tathuilu makge.
Niending tinggadi paliura tamiuboga kabam kumme.
Chiudi kalek samaitu Tingwang niu kashaibo gasu gukhaibi-e;
pageng bam maitu mathadbo gasu paniu gukhai-e.
Paniu kalek samaitu agunbo pikhaibi-e,
khatdi kasamaitu pi maliumak khai-e.
Tingwang niu kam maji khaibo maise sanwi-e!
Paniu natu rukhaiboga nalung pommi tulo.
Tingwang niu kam ajamkhai bidi paniu domkhai-e;
paniu natu kam mathiu khaidi paniu natu wikhai-e.
Pawan saisuijiu kasabo gasu paniu gukhai bine;
Charakhum wangboga, natu pi ringkhai bine;
tathiu-chari wangsai kashaibo gasu paniu natu gukhai bine.
Maiken tiamai khugasu Tingwang niu gukhai bine,
khatdi hami rabo gasu paniu natu gukhai bine.
Tathiu chari padjiu mariuboga nangra nuisune;
khatdi nkankhaotu nangra pinglakge.
Nangniu tenbo luzamse tatu bamlakge;
natu wadaodi nkankhaoniu kam masa lakge.
Sichiujiu nagu mathenky gase agi-manai bamne;
nagu milydungse kasa kason thiulakge.
Kadihga piuriang kengkha bambo kum, nakai-nakik kengjiu lungrabo-e.
Chamiubang siniu atiat-ting tangbo min majin bambo kum,
nangdi tingthengjiu lungrabo-e.
Job yo, aliuniu haise nda katilubo gu-e.
Haise majibo-e, siniu tuhoira haise lukhai sulo.
Agu magenthak hai taju gasu madatsai,
duipuigu nbuiniang suang rit nkiu rabo-e;
12 siniu alad tanbo haitu naliu suang hami tulo.
Ngamkambo Rawang niu tavaipi thinlujiu atu ketmide,
sichiujiu karabo tai siniu apumga phuimide.
Tingwang gu kapingbo siniu atu taomagui mide.
Konniamniu piubuan giboga palung kimlu-e,
khatdi matomniu magao tiura daolu sai marata mi-e.
Chiudi matai hummakbo pachoi habo ganse saoniu tiu ralo?
Maruibum gu kakabo paraganse pachoi degu bamlo?
Sikumbo tatekse Iniu tiuni makge,
Iniu tiubo hinase aleng wimakbo maliang-e.
Iniu khengbose dejengniu Tingwang niu pimak jiulo?
Arathoi dekamjiu paokak khaimak jiulo?
Paniu haichiu kambam sai atu kamshat raleng ronna-e!
Sichiu paniu kamsai achun wijiu I machao bamrabo-e,
haijiukha I magenthiu bamdi Tingwang ra masanne chiubo Iniu si-e.
Pagu chamtan situ Iniu suimakbo thiumakge.
Ringlura agu pumtan degu bamjiulo?
Iniu agunbo hamisai dekamjiu ringbam ralo?
Atu hai tatuniu dammi jiuma? Apum hai chagi jiuma?
Atu ranlura ajeng hasiak mide; atu ranlura Iniu delam tadkhai ralo?
Tingwang tu Iniu mangaimi tadi, mangaimak tadi,
haikumbo magenthak gahai malumbuibo chaka pageng bam-e.
Chiudi akahmaidung yo, naliura tingriu tamisai,
sangnuang mibo singgiuse kumjiu atu sonjiu bamme.
Singgiudungse kabun siniu topnam bamme,
chiudi ting thiusu dasai sise tunmi-e, sichiujiu singgiuse sangmi-e.
Chali-alimai siniu tadui phiudao lakjiu shaimide.
chali-alimainiu Sheba nai Tema lam phiu tadle,
chiudi paliuniu machunbose sangmibo singgiu mungga shaimide.
Naliudi akhuga sikumbo singgiu si-e,
naliuniu asan sabo hai ngao lujiu pingboniu masai nkhin mide.
Atu kalen pikhaira, maksai amalin ga mai khangsiatu tanim pira,
maksai atu mikremai khugasu rankhaira, naliu khuga I khengjiuma?
Wide, amaodungse dinkhaijiu atu katikhai sulo;
maliumakjiu I naliu lad nkingne.
Nchangbo ladkeng sira mailung kimme,
chiudi naliura mathakhu lad din bamme.
Iniu dinbambo hai tingkai sangnu, wadi makge chiu naliuniu maning-e;
Sichiusai dekamjiu asang-asuang lad haitu naliu paokak bamjiulo?
Magennahtu naliu vang thiura taden thonjiu,
khatdi naliu kah kakungmaitu kam mahalujiu, lungwira matanne, naliura!
Azu phuilo, I arat lakge.
Naliu hai nkiuju mide, maji makbose dinta sulo.
Atu kammao bam talo, Ira majijiu bambo-e.
I aratbam sune chiu naliura maning-e—nde majilo, nde nkhuilo chiubo I sita mide chiujiu naliura maning-e.
Chamainagu ringting hai riphenmaigu lunlung kumme,
maranjiu tatien thiubambo ringting kumme.
Haise kavang khatniu ting aguibo bamtu masenbo kumme,
Haise tatien thiumai khatniu paphijeng daora agun kabambo kumbo-e.
Chahiu khat sai chahiu khat khuanjiu bamme,
nchun khat sai nchun khatniu chariubose phungwang bamme.
Alengra nchun hai pawan thengdiang-e;
Ira nchun jikiulu lakge,
kadatpad kadat ngutjiu tingben ratu ramgunne.
Apum pakhiangna parikniu phuimide;
panagi siniu topman bamme; sichiujiu kana luangsao makjiu bamme.
Achun-ara thiumakjiu aringting hai tad bamme.
Agu ringting hai langruikega chalang npui kabam suang majadle.
Maningtao khailo, Hey Tingwang yo,
aringting haira siuthi khat kumbo-e; achun wibo ting sira loimide.
Tuhoira atu ngao bamme nangniu, chiudi wadaodi ngaota mine.
Nangniu atu phiubam tadi Ira tadmine.
Chamaina haira kamuang tadjiu hamibo kum,
pah shai misai wadaodi wanglan makge;
patu kasimai hinadi mangaikam mi-e.
Chiumakge! I maliumak silak mide!
I alung pomchang pom mide. I chalad dinra mide.
Dekamra nang atu akhebam jiulo?
I hai kasabo duipuikhao-e chiu nang lukhai jiuma?
I jikiu mathakra matanne, athad gasu mathak khaira I phiu-e.
chiudi kapingbo mang siniu atu kapin khai-e;
2 nangniu madungao pikhaijiu, atu pijiu charamin khai-e.
Haichiu magenthiubo lunlungga lungbo suang atakuak charejiu shamiboniu wi-e.
Amakum hamide; I ringbam rao mide,
atu ronna phutkhai sulo; aringting hai pageng hamide.
Deleng chamainatu haijiukha lumakung jiulo?
Deleng pagu tienkamga nalung ngut jiulo?
Nsuan machang nangniu patu phuijiu bamme,
khatdi pawan machang patu madiujiu bamme.
Iniu atai mangilura pakak khatnadi,
nang atu phuisao khai lakma?
Anuan hainiu natu kam masami jiuma, kavangky khuanpao yo?
Iniu natu kam chariuju mijiu ma?
Dekamjiu atu nagu majonbam thiukhai jiulo?
Anuan haitu wadaodi kuak silakmi jiuma?
Akhui amao haitu kuak khai silakmi jiuma?
Iniu arawlam tadmira watheng tamide,
siga nang atu phiubamdi, Ira tadmi rabo-e.
Haikumbo lad hai dethengkha dinbam ralo?
Tingwang niu kamajibo situ wadaodi kam kadatmi lakge,
majibose paniu maomakjiu kamrabo-e.
Nanahmai siniu Tingwang masuangga maomi bam sune,
siniu paliu daobuibo saisuijiu paniu sajai pibo-e.
Chiudi tuhoi Tingwang khuga mariwang khenglulo.
Nangniu nchang siakjiu masan bamsai Tingwang niu wangjiu nkha khaine,
khatdi naphijeng leng naky khunmai tudi kalankhai bine.
Tingwang niu natu pikhailan rabose, nasen-nalan hamibo situ wadi kadasi lakge.
Ndagu ningting chamtu makum matailo;
puipiu mainiu sibamniubose makum khailo.
Aliu ringting hai dun nakha-e, aliu wadi simakge;
tingkao kawang kum aliu hai majadjiu tadmi-e.
Chiudi ndagu ningting siniu natu katikhai misulo;
paliuniu degu dinkhai ralo chiubo nking khailo:
“Chalim hai tadui habo bamga lungsi lakge,
ndiuga makjiu paliutu wagadi ngao lakge.
Haise siamjiu thindao lakbo tinggasu,
tadui sangmisai, haise agui raithu mirabo-e.
Charatu simak maise sibo chalimse kumbo-e;
Tingwang niu paliutu malod khat mangai misai, paliu chun hami rabo-e.
Paliura chalangriangga maksai—takepui ren-ga mangiu kakhaibo kumbo-e.
Sikumbo takepui ren-ga mangiu khaisai, haisiniu paliutu phungman ngamlu buima?
Paliuniu chalangriang situ majap sai, paliutu jumachap lubuima?”
Kasamai sira naimik biuga puak khangbo,
kareng lungga puakbambo piumen kumbo-e.
Paliu mense turaliga kenpadle,
sichiujiu tatukang hinaga khopman bamme.
Chiudi paliutu pepadmi sai paliu dega lunglo chiubo maidi sitami-e.
Yo, kasamaidunggu chunwibo sira sironna-e;
maidungniu wangjiu paliu bam malinmi rabo-e.
Chiudi Tingwang niu tacheng matipmaitu wadaodi phutkhai lakge,
maksai kasamaitu wadaodi nkha khai lakge.
Paniu nachun piwi khaijiu pi makiak mara khailan sune.
Chiudi natu marengmai riga paniu kamangambo pikhai sune,
sichiudi kasamai kyse hami rabo-e.
Chiudi chamainaniu dechiujiu Tingwang masuangga tathu tiak silu ralo?
Mai khatniu paokak silu lakbo ladkeng sang khat paniu maniusai,
saoniu paokak ngamlu ralo?
Tingwang haira ningtingbo khatdi pumtan bambo-e;
mai khatniudi pamasuangga chap ngamlu lakge.
Kachan khai makjiu maluongdungtu kam malai khai-e,
sichiujiu palungpom gasu paliutu kam maha mi-e.
Tingwang niu kathi langkhaijiu, kadih haitu
tungman bambo katiang situ kam malai khaijiu kadih haitu ju kanuk khai-e.
Paniu naimiktu padmakra kham ngamme,
nchundi chagandungtu pabiu pi padmak khai ngamme.
Tingwang niu tinggen ga bambo,
maksai duipuiga bambo wakhao riga tao maluiboga,
mai khatniudi nkha makge.
Tingwang niu tingpukga chagandungtu ju masiangkhai nbamme;
kachakiliu, khamten-khamtung, khatdi tingnulamgu chagan hinatu damkhai-e.
Pagu kadibo tienkam haise sitanglu lakge.
Pagu tienkam haise pamalan thiumakge.
Tingwang niu tadwang-e, chiudi Iniu patu ngaomakge.
Paniu masenbose paniu lumine,
siga mai khatniudi khamsi lakge.
Mai khatniudi patu “Nang degu kamjiulo?” chiu maniu silakge.
Tingwang gu lungpom hai saomakge,
Patu atungbo duipui-khao, Rahab
Sijengniu Tingwang tu dechiujiu, khatdi dekumbo ladniu paokak ralo?
Amao-ameng hatadi, ladjanpao Tingwang khuga
khengrabo sira lungsa khaira nakha-e.
Atu pijiu chalad dinkhaira suikhaidi,
paniu alad chiukhaine chiubo I malum makge.
Palam hatadi paniu atu kam kabuakjiu,
khatdi kam maha mira tingthung-tingkaise langkhaibo-e.
Asiu thira paniu suikhai makge,
agu ringting hai kakhaboniu pi phuikhai-e.
Tingwang riga Iniu pumtan thin rama?
Iniu patu ladjankyga puiwang rama?
Mai khatniu patu pitad khai ngamma?
I akhui-amao ha-e khatdi chamchang-e,
chiudi aladkengse kamaobo kumme;
khatdi Iniu dinbo hinase maora kumme.
Ira akhui-amao ha-e, chiudi I wakhatdi masenta mide,
Ira ringnita mide.
Wadi makge, maoma, maomakma simakge,
Tingwang niu aliutu kam mahami rabo-e.
Pamao habopiu siniu simak dakjiu shaiboga Tingwang niu nui-e.
Tingwang niu kadihpiri hai kasamai khuga pikhai-e.
Ladjanpaodung mikse paniu kamtiat mide.
Tingwang niu maksai saoniu kamjiulo?
Aringting hai majujiu bamme, wakhatdi kawibo ha-e.
Agu ringting hai majadthubo malee kumjiu tad bamme,
kalengniu lenkiu tazatu kathon suang majadle.
Iniu nuijiu agu magenthaktu mangaira kamme,
chiudi agu magenthak siniu atu hajiu bamme.
I hai kamaomai-e chiujiu Tingwang niu lukhai mibo I si-e.
Akhui-amao bamme chiujiu dinmisai, dekamjiu I manangbam ralo?
Tagaotaa siniu anuan hai khiu masan silak mide.
Tingwang niu karapon-ga atu thonkhai mide,
siniu afai-anidungdi akhuga wangra mangam mide.
Tingwang hai chamaina-e chiusai, Iniu patu paokak ngamme;
ladjankyga tadlujiu anaigu aribo lamga tathu hai tiaklu bui-e.
Chiudi anaikakga tadkhaira chaphipa khatnadi ha-e,
Tingwang anaikakga ladjan thiukhaira maidi ha-e.
Tingwang yo, atu sajai pikhaita sulo!
Nagu lungpomse akhu gasu luthon khai sulo!
I pingta mide, alungchun makum saisuijiu chalad I din sune.
I ringrao asang mide.
Alung pomjiu dinbo hai nking khailo.
Tingwang yo, atu kammaojiu bam talo,
agu kamaobose akhuga dinkhailo.
Nangniu haijiukha najai sajiu bam rama?
Nagu gandam haitu nuimen bam rama?
Kasamai tienkamga nuijiu bam rama?
Aliuniu kambo hai nang ngaoma?
Aliu ringting kum, nagu ringtingdi dunjiuma?
Sichiusai dekamjiu amao hinatu kamudjiu phiubam jiulo?
Dekamjiu amao hinatu kapiobam gulo?
I akhui-amao ha-e chiujiu mai khatniudi atu kadenglu lakge chiubo nang sibamme.
Nabenniu atu damjiu palun kamkhaibo-e.
Tuhoira sibo ben siniu kam mahajiu bamme.
Nangniu atu chagamniu damkhai-e chiubo maningtao khailo,
sigase atu tao-manui khai lanmi rama?
Apiuniu atu lung ngamra pumtan nangniu pikhai-e.
Apui won lungga nangniu atu pi mawikhai-e.
Apum haitu arah nai anenriangniu palun thiukhai-e.
Sichiujiu arahdung situ atia nai aginiu makomsim khai-e.
Aringting hai nangniu pikhai lujiu lungsa saomakjiu bamme,
nangniu manang khaibo jengniu I ringbambo-e.
Chiudi tuhoi nangniu atu mahin
kamshat mira kambo-e chiubo I silude.
Iniu nuan kamkhai misai kuak khai lakge chiujiu nang phuibambo gu-e.
Iniu nuan kambo wansiakga, magenthiubo hai I daonuang mi-e;
sichiujiu Iniu kamajibo kamdi, pageng bamson makge.
Ira asang mide, kamangambo ronna-e.
Iniu wakhat kam tathui lusai, atu ndongqui kumjiu nangniu hawang-e;
atu kam chariu khaira maisuang kahabo kamme.
Amaotu ronna nang phiujiu bamme, atu nalungpom saomakjiu bamme.
Atu kam masara nathak kasabose, nangniu rang bamme.
Tingwang yo, deleng atu manawang jiulo?
Mainiu ngao makhaga, I shai miboniu wi-e.
Alamlung gasu charao lam tad taron mijiu wadaodi lungwang makboniu wi-e.
Aringting hai hawangmi jiuma? Atu phut khailo!
Pawan bambo lungga Iniu achun wijiu lungkhai lune.
Wadaodi malanwang silak mibo,
tamiubo khatdi achungbo kadihga I tadjimi rabo-e.
Wathak walam simakbo tamiubo kadih,
kabenbo siakgadi tamiu mibo ramgase I tadmi rabo-e.
Haikumbo pachun kahabo lad haitu maidi paokak khai lakma?
Mai khatniu haijiukha palee kengbo siniu patu kam majilu buima?
Job yo, aliuniu natu paokak ngam lakge chiu nangniu maning jiuma?
Nangniu nuimenbo lad dinbo gase aliu maliumak tami rama?
Nangniu dinbo hina maji-e chiu nangra lu-e;
Nang hai Tingwang suangga masanne chiujiu nangra lu-e.
Tingwang niu natu paokak khaira dejiukha I masenlo!
Ningting daoraleng npui keng bamme,
khatdi chamaina leng sise sukchang sukge
chiujiu paniu nakhuga dinkhai rabo-e.
Nangniu daobuibo suang nkhin bijiu
Tingwang niu sajai natu pibambo-e.
Tingwang gu pumtan nai kendibose nangniu pamalan silu buima?
Tingwang lengra tingpuk hai pamalan bamme,
chiudi sise nalengra ngentang lakbo gu-e.
Tingwang niu charuidihse sibamme,
chiudi sise nangra sitang makge.
Tingwang gu kendi haira kadihpiri suang di-e khatdi duipui suang di-e.
Tingwang niu natu ladjan thiura puiwangsai saoniu khamlu ralo?
Pageng habo maidungtu Tingwang niu sibamme,
paliu ngamkam kasa hina paniu si-e.
Chahung siniu wakhuan sijiu pianglu-e saira, kapangmai siniu wasi lubui-e.
Job yo, nalungchun kam maji lujiu Tingwang khuga wanglulo.
Kasabo nai kamaobose naky gasu luthon milo.
Sichiujiu chap matip lujiu khatdi hujiu, kadihpiri haitu zudao lanlulo.
Sichiusai nagu magenthak hinase
nda tadui naiwangbotu mangaibo kumjiu mangaimi rabo-e.
Sichiusai nagu ringtingse n-nien suang bendiang mirabo-e,
khatdi tamiuthubo wanse nsuan tingbenpad karai kummi rabo-e.
Nagu ringtingse manangbo hajiu nachun wijiu lungmi rabo-e;
Tingwang niu natu gukhaine, khatdi natu pi mathak khai rabo-e.
Nagu mikremaitu nangniu pingta mirabo-e,
siga maidungniu paliutu nkha khaira nakhuga khengsu rabo-e.
Chiudi kasamaira manangboniu phuilujiu mari khaira npui hami rabo-e.
sichiujiu kashaibose paliu damme.
Yo, naliura maidung khuan si-e.
Naliugu ningting haidi naliu shaiboga, shai tamanmi rabo-e.
Naliuniu dinbo hina I sibamme, wakamdi naliu suang I nkhin makge,
naliuniu dinbo hina maidungniu sikam bamme.
Tuhoira akamainiu atu nuijiu bamme;
Ira acheng matipbo-e, khatdi akhui-amao ha-e,
chiudi paliu nuijiu bamme;
chiudi pawan khat gara Tingwang niu arathoi chiukhai mibo-e.
Naliutu kam chariu khaibo ha-e, chiudi naliuniu atu nuimenjiu bamme.
Kaomi lajiu bambo piutu naliuniu kakhiu bamme.
Charatu simakmai nai agatiumainiu agi-manaijiu lung bamme,
chiudi paliu gu pumtan ronna niu paliu rawang thiu-e.
Chakhao thingnadung siniudi naliutu katikhai lubui-e.
Duipui nai kadihga bambo khaoringdung khuga paliugu ningtingse maniulo.
Rapiu benniu paliutu dambo-e
chiubo paliu mathiu sibamme.
Tingwang niu pagu gandam hinagu ringting jukhaijiu bamme;
chamaina hinagu ringtingse pagu pumtan hangga bamme.
Naliuniu wa chamaobo situ sibam then, nakuonniu wa chiujiu bambo-e.
Tanpaomai khuga ningting bamme,
chiudi ningting nai pumtanse Tingwang khuga bambo-e.
Tanpaomai khaoti-e,
Tingwang khuga khaotibo nai pumtan bamme.
Tingwang niu rathon misai, saoniu thiulan ngam ralo?
Tingwang niu bangkhaibo maitu saoniu phutkhai ngam ralo?
Tingwang niu Tingduise khammiboga kadihse sangmi-e,
paniu taduise run kiusai duidetse wang-e.
Tingwang haira tanne, di pawan machang charise ngambo-e,
sonlumai khatdi sontiumai khangniase pahangga bamme.
Mawangpaogu ningtingse paniu luthonmi-e,
sichiujiu jupaodung situ kammeng khai-e.
Paniu chawangdung situ lupad lujiu kavangkyga khaimi-e.
Paniu singkumai nai pumtan thin maitu kam manonkhai-e.
Paniu malumsuibo maitu pijiu maliumak khai-e,
khatdi tanpaomaigu ningtingse luthon mi-e.
Pumtan thinmaitu paniu kam mangam khai-e,
khatdi jupaodunggu pumtanse pamalan kamkhai-e.
Kashaibo kum tamiu bambo gase paniu kabenbo langkhai-e.
Paniu jatdungtu pitankhai-e khatdi dikhai-e,
chiudi paniu paliutu ngamlujiu kam mahami-e.
Paliugu jupaodungtu paniu kammeng khailujiu,
khatdi pi manang khailujiu kam mahami-e.
Paliuse jaw sak maniumai kumjiu tamiuboga tad tangad lad-lad bamme.
Naliuniu dinbo hinase n-da I chiu mide.
Pakhiangnase I sibamme; naliuniu kasibo kumjiu I si-e.
Idi naliu suang nkhin makge.
Chiudi Iniu aribambo hai naliutu makge, Tingwang tu-e;
Agu tathuh hai Iniu pakhuga tiakhai nibo-e.
Naliugu wasimakse aratbo siniu gom bamme;
naliu haira mai khat tudi wikhai silakbo phaimiu kumbo-e.
Maliumakjiu bamlo, sichiusai khangsianiu naliu ningting-e,
chiu lukhaibo sui-e.
Iniu athu tiakjiu bamga nkinglulo.
Dekamjiu naliu arat bamralo?
Naliugu aratbo hai Tingwang leng geng lune
chiu naliu maning jiuma?
Naliuniu patu gukhaira kambam jiuma?
Pagu tathuhse naliuniu ladjankyga tiakkhai rama?
Tingwang niu naliutu phui mawijiu phuisai, paniu kawibo daolu rama?
Naliuniu chamainatu kammengbo kumjiu,
Tingwang tu kammeng lubui-e chiu maning jiuma?
Naliugu wasao thiubose bailu tadi, paniu naliutu rusu rabo-e.
Pagu pumtan siniu naliutu kam charen khai rabo-e.
Naliugu kadincham haira mangbui kum wadi pageng ha-e.
Naliugu aribo haira chagamniang kum pang paroi-soi mirabo-e.
Chalad dinra aleng pawan pikhailo, maliumak bam khailo.
Sichiusai degu padsu ralo chiubo silubui-e.
Agu ringting hai hamira I haping makge.
Achun-ara thiuta mide,
Tingwang niu atu kamshat midi dekam ralo?
Agu tathuh-charase Iniu pakhuga tiakrabo-e.
Ahot hainiu atu gukhai ngamlu tadi,
kasamai sira Tingwang tu wadaodi zudao ngam lakge.
Tuhoira Iniu masanjiu dinbo alad hai nking khailo.
I maji-e chiu sibo jengniu athu hai tiakra kaden bamme.
Tingwang yo, atu kammao khaira nang wangkin jiuma?
Sichiu-e sai, I maliumakjiu shaimi tane.
Iniu kengnia maniu khaine, sise suikhailo,
sichiusai nakhuga I nbaimi lakge;
Atu sajai pikhai tasulo, khatdi kapingbo siniu
atu kam mathad tasulo.
Oh Tingwang yo, nang din railo, chiusai Iniu paokakne.
Maksai Iniu dinne, nang paokak khailo.
Akhui-amao hai desilo? Iniu degu kamaobo kammi jiulo?
Atu degu kamaobo madam khai ralo?
Dekamjiu nang atu marimi jiulo?
Dekamjiu atu mikremaitu kumjiu nang kamjiulo?
Nangniu atu kapinjiu bam rama?
Ira wadi makge, chapiuniw nakha-e.
Magaoreng situ nang chari thiujiu bambo-e.
Iniu nahtingga kamkhai mibo kasabo situ
nangniu ariga madam khaijiu bambo-e.
Nangniu aphipa katang kamudjiu, agu phiken hina phiujiu
aphi hai chagiriangniu ratman khai-e.
Sijengniu Ira maren mibo sing khatdi marenmibo fai kumjiu ketap-tap mide.
Aliu mathiuse son tanujiu mana kamme.
Mathiuse pating kadunbo nai magenthiubo ringtingga tadbam kamme.
Aliu hai mawikhanglu charapen kum kuinuang mirabo-e;
aliu hai tingkao kawang kum hanuangmi rabo-e.
Tingwang yo, nang atu phiujiu
maksai atu madiujiu ladjan thiu rama?
Haijiukha taniabo chamaina khugasu
masanbose wakhatdi daosi lakge.
Paniu lungrabo pagu tinglangse nangniu
chak lujiu chahiu riakse riamkhai mibo-e, sise kali silak mibo-e.
Patu phuimakjiu, paronna phutkhai bilo;
paniu ngamsai paronna pi lungmi sulo.
Huimibo singbang sira puakkhang lanlujiu
pabuan padlanne chiubo maning sui-e.
Singmuise tingju mijiu, pamense kadihga shaimi tadi,
siga tadui taokhai sai sise bonpadjiu pabang kasan padlanne.
Chiudi chamainara shaimi sai sise pamalan-e;
pah shaimi sai dega bamjiulo?
Luangta mibo singgiu khatdi sangmibo ajai kumjiu,
chamainara wadaodi sulan makjiu shaimibo-e.
Wadaodi buangsu silak mibo-e,
tingpuk bamthen paliu jipjia gasu wadaodi sulanlak mibo-e.
Nagu lungpomse hamak then,
atu maningtao khai rabo tingse wangtang makthen
charuidihga atu baikhai miboniu wirabo-e.
Mai khat shaimi sai, pah ringsulan ngamma?
Chiudi magenthiu chariubo tingse loimak then, Ira khuanjiu bamne.
Siga nangniu atu kusai, I paokak rabo-e,
sichiusai nagu bensiam, atu kimkhai sune.
Nangniu aphiken hina phuijiu bam rabo-e,
sichiujiu anuandung nangniu pariak chakkhai lakge.
Iniu kamaobo kamkhai mibo pakhiangnase
nangniu nunthon lujiu kuak khai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu maluongdungse minkiujiu,
chakhao-turense hamibo wanse wangne.
Tudidung situ taduiniu kam mahajiu,
khatdi tingset katanbo siniu kadihtam situ pontad mine;
haichiujiu chamaina siniu machunbo
ringting situ nangniu kam maha mi-e.
Nangniu chamaina situ thinman lujiu
patuse tingtheng leng langkhai mi-e;
siga pase shaikiujiu pazuse tarut mi-e.
Panahmai situ chakhuang thiukhaine,
chiudi sise wadaodi paniu sitanglu lakge,
maksai paliutu kam mangam khaibo sidi pakhuga dinkhai lakge.
Palengra papumga thiuniubo ronna
khatdi palung chariubo ronna-e.
Job yo, Matha ladle! Pageng habo ladle!
Ningtingmai siniu nakumjiu wadaodi chalad dinlakge,
paramba kahabo lad siniu palam phelakge.
Nangniu tadkhaibo npui bamme sai,
mai khatniudi Tingwang tu pinglakge,
mai khatniudi pakhuga khenglakge.
Nagu kasabose, naladpad gasu simasan mide;
nagu kasabose, nagu khaotibo lad gasu nbaira kam bamme.
Iniu natu kammao sanra hamide;
naladkeng hina siniu natu kammaojiu bamme.
Nang hai lungraithubo maisi-e chiu maningjiu ma?
Tingwang niu maluongdung dambo tingga nang bamniu jiuma?
Tingwang niu wa damra rangbo guse nang chiukhai mibo bamma?
Chamainagu ningtingse nagu ronna jiuma?
Aliuniu simakbose, nangdi simakge.
Aliuniu ningting-tasi katibo hai,
napiutu lungwang makbo suangga lungrai mibo,
papee npuak mimai khugasu katilubo-e.
Tingwang niu natu pi wikhaibo situ dekamjiu suini makjiulo?
Pasung aliuniu chalad koina dinbambo-e.
Chiudi nangra nalung mathing makbo siniu
nalung pomjiu aliutu namik sajiu phui bambo-e.
Nangra Tingwang tu nalung pomjiu patu din masajiu bamme.
Pachangjiu mai khatse masanlu buima?
Tingwang masuangga mai khatra majilu buima?
Dekamjiu, Tingwang niu pagu mazatu katang malum makjiulo?
Paliu katang pamik phuiga masan makge.
Kasabo situ chamaina siniu tadui kasakbo kumjiu sak bambo-e.
Yo, chamainara kamaomai-e, chamaina haira pageng ha-e.
Job yo, tuhoira Iniu kasibo hai nking khailo.
Ningtingmai siniu paliu piu khugasu katilubose
wakhatdi nbai makjiu majibose atu katikhai-e.
Paliu kadihga sangdiumai lungmakge,
paliutu Tingwang khugasu jumari mira mai khatnadi ha-e.
Kasamai, maitu kam kam masamai sira;
paliu ringtingga magenthiubose daorabo-e.
Kapingbo khuan siniu pakuan ga senwang rabo-e;
paniu wadi manang makjiu bambo tingga
suttiumai siniu patuse komwang sune.
Tamiubo gasu mari lura pachun thiuta mide,
patu kamshat mira pabam khatga khuan bamme.
Sichiujiu chamitiulengniu paphawse tiura khuanjiu bamme.
Paleng tamiuwang kinne chiubo pah sibamme.
Sansabo siniu, pumtan bambo chawang kumjiu
patu aphenra khuanjiu bamme.
Kangambo Tingwang tu din masajiu,
pa-njum thunlujiu, papee kangum bambo mai sansiat sira haichiu rabo-e.
Sikumbo mai sira chaliangjiu, kadin piumakjiu
khatdi palung tanjiu pagu chagee phunglujiu
Tingwang tu aphenra pakwang kakin kumbo-e.
Sikumbo mai sira papaodungniu pakmiboga,
namdidung situ sutlubo maidung kumbo-e,
chiudi charise wangjiu sibo namdiga bambo
kydung situ kam mahami rabo-e.
Tingthengjiu pah kalek wisi lakge,
paguse tingtheng bam lakge, paringting katang hami rabo-e,
sichiujiu paniu tamiubo situ marilu lakge.
Chaminiu ruthon mibo singbang kumrabo-e,
sichiujiu papendung situ tingkainiu hunthon mibo kum rabo-e
Papang siniu, kasabo situ paniu malumsai,
kasabo siniu paphijeng thiu rabo-e.
Pawanse wangtang makhaga, kuimibo ke,
wadaodi madiaklan silak mibo singke kumjiu kuimi rabo-e.
Pahai pasy minsilak mibo mumsy kum,
khatdi pabuan bonsilak mibo takibang kumbo-e.
Charatu simakmai paliu kaikik thiu silakge,
khatdi tanimniu thiubo ky situ chaminiu kam mahami rabo-e.
Paliu haira kasabo ronna rangjiu, kasabo maliang kamjiu bambo-e;
khatdi maigu sontiu nibo lungchun siniu phuijiu bambo maidung si-e.
Sikumbo cham sira nda I chiukam mibo-e,
naliuniu din bambo sira kam mathadbo ronna-e.
Haichiu chalad ronna naliu dinjiu bam rama?
Naliuniu din kanam sang-jingne chiujiu ma?
I hai naliu, khatdi naliu hai I-e sai,
naliuniu kadinbo hina Idi dinlubui-e.
Wasao thiujiu Iniu apee kangumjiu
naliu khuga chalad kengjiu din lubui-e.
Kadincham dinjiu naliu jeng pitan khai lubui-e,
sichiujiu naliu chun kam aman khai lubui-e.
Chiudi nkha khaira Iniu wadaodi dinmakge,
khatdi maliumak bamdi amegenthak hai wason makge.
Tingwang yo, nangniu atu kam chariu khaide;
nangniu aky khuntu kamshat mide.
Atu nangniu minlude, agu mikrepiuse nang-e
agi nai ara ronna mide,
haise maidungniu amao-e chiu lukhai bamme.
Tingwang niu atu palung pomjiu
tatap-tap lujiu, marengbo mikphui siniu phui bamme.
Maidungniu atu tanui thiujiu atu taomaguilu kaphijiu bamme.
Tingwang niu kasamai khuga atu pikhai mide.
Agi-manaijiu I lungbambo-e,
chiudi Tingwang niu atakuak charek lujiu,
tun kadad kadajiu atu niakpet mide.
Tingwang niu atu wa majuanbam thiukhai lujiu,
wadi lungsa khai makjiu pake hina lamsu tavaithu siniu ketjiu bambo-e.
Lungpom sabo riphendungniu ngaokhai lakjiu kambo kum,
paniu atu kam ajamkhai lan-lanjiu bamme.
Iniu achungjiu maliufai benlujiu tabuijiuga ntao bamme.
Azuse heng maren makthen I kapjiu bamme,
sichiujiu amikse menjiu ahiumana siniu atu taoweng mide.
Chiudi Iniu alung pomboga maokhai makge,
Tingwang khuga arathoi maji bamme.
Hey kadihpiri yo, akhuga kamaobo kamkhaibo hai baikhai tulo!
Majibo situ Iniu kuboga maliumak khai tulo!
Mai khatra tinggen-ga, chapsu lujiu alam liangkhaira bamme.
Akahmaidungniu atu kagajiu nui bamme;
Iniu Tingwang khuga amatui luongjiu bamme.
Mai khatniu pakahbo leng kakhengbo kum,
Tingwang khuga aleng khengkhaira I ramgunjiu bamme.
Malanwang silakbo npuiga I tadbamme,
agu tingkum hai tadjiu bamme.
Aringting hai hamide, asiu thi ngamlak mide;
charawse makjiu wakhatnadi aleng hamide.
Mai hinaniu atu marengjiu bambo hai I phuijiu bamme.
Tingwang yo, alungchun masansiak bamme, alad hai lukhailo.
Alam chap khaira mai khatnadi hamide.
Nangniu paliu chun thiumakra kamkhai mide;
paliutu pijiu atu ngamkhai tulo.
Ndagu kadincham khatga, mai khatniu
pakabotu rangkang leng jonmiboga,
panahniu sibo sung magenthiu-e.
Tuhoira maidungniu sibo kadincham thinlujiu atu din kada bamme,
paliuniu wangjiu azuga tatai masiukhai bamme.
Agu magenthak hainiu amik tiatna mide;
aphi-aben hai awengmana kum poinakha mide.
Paliu lung masanne chiujiu dinmaise paliu suang hamide,
sichiujiu paliuniu atu hai chara tu simakmai kumjiu lukhai bamme.
Chakhuang charao thiusuimai siniu paliu majidiang-e chiu lukhai mide.
Chiudi paliu mathiuse amasuangga wang chapsai,
Iniu paliu mai khattudi khaoti mai-e chiujiu lukhai lakge.
Machunbo hamide, Iniu rangbo hina kao mide,
agu tinglang haidi loimide.
Akahmai niura nchun haitu tingbenbo-e,
khatdi tingbenpad kinne chiu din-e,
chiudi tamiuboga I bamme chiubo I si-e.
Agu machunbo sira charuidih ronna mide,
sibogu tamiubo gase I jikiumi rade.
Charaw situ Iniu apiu kurabo-e;
khatdi atu tiurabo masanpui situ
Iniu apui nai atanpuimai kurabo-e.
Iniu machun rabose degu bamlo?
Saoniu degu ngaojiulo?
Iniu charuidih lam tadbo tingga machunbose asai suitad lakge.
Job yo, nang kumbo hai maliumak bamlu lakma?
Aliu lad nking khaisai, aliu natu npao khaine.
Aliu hai matom kabui kumjiu pang-e chiu nang maning jiuma?
Nagu lungpom siniu naronna natu kam masajiu bambo-e.
Nalungpom jengniu kadihga chamai lungtami rama?
Natu kimkhaira Tingwang niu maluong situ pi kam kalikhai rama?
Kasamaigu kahiupuang situ kam midmi rabo-e;
chamise wadaodi taopad silakge.
Pagu mathenky mibungse midmi rabo-e.
Pagu phikemse matunjiu bamdi, tuhoira paphi masui mide;
pah nkhuang kiujiu paladga kaokiu mide.
Paniu pathakga tadkhaijiu, paphise tuhoira man mide.
Pathak siniu paphimikga mankham lujiu patu juman mide.
Tathakriangse kadihga baikhaijiu tathakse
pa-npuiga thiukhai mide.
Kapingbo hainiu patu khuanjiu bamme;
pagu phikem machang suitadjiu bamme.
Pah kalek kawibo mai-e,
chiudi tuhoira pah mariujiu tad bamme;
magenthiu chariubo siniu patu khuanjiu bamme.
Shaisuibo rapot siniu papum pakhiang phuimide,
sichiujiu paphi pabense tenmide.
Manang makjiu lungbambo pagu mathenkyse kampang lujiu,
Kashaibo Wangtu zudaora jutad mide.
Pagu mathenkyse kam masan lujiu,
chapiu kajinkhai lujiu tuhoira mai khatniu siga lungbo suimide!
Pake hina, pamen hina, shaikam mide,khatdi kikam mide.
Pagu kendise chaky gadi, charam gadi hamide;
mai khatniudi patu maningtao lanlak mide.
Patuse karingmai kadih, kabenbo bamgasu,
tamiubo bamga hathon mirabo-e.
Patuse malinra pakai-pakik maidi hamide.
Tingbang tingnu tangbo paken kachiumai hina
pingjiu kaphikrai-rai kam mide.
Haise kasamai sansiat si-e,
Haise Tingwang tu wajeng simak maigu santsiat si-e.
Dekamjiu naliu ladniu atu kam mathad bamjiulo?
Naliuniu saomakjiu atu kam mangamjiu bamme.
Sichiu mangambo hajiu naliuniu atu nuimenjiu bam rama?
Iniu kamaobo kammi bam tadi siseniu
naliutu degu kam masa khaibo bamjiulo?
Asuang naliu wi-e chiujiu naliu maning-e,
khatdi agu thiuniubo hai akhui amao gasu-e chiu naliura maning-e.
Haise Tingwang niu kamkhaibo-e chiubo naliu ngaomak jiuma?
Atu manra paniu tathak thiukhaibo-e.
Pagu lungpom situ Iniu suini makbo-e,
chiudi mai khatniudi alad lukhai makge.
Majibo situ Iniu kuboga, mai khatniudi alad chiukhai makge.
Tingwang niu a-npui dangkham mibo jengniu I tad taron ngamlak mibo-e;
paniu a-npuise tamiuboga baikhai mibo-e.
Alekwat hinase paniu luthon mibo-e,
khatdi chamtan tadbo hina sidi hamibo-e.
Pake machang paniu atu kam kabuak khai-e.
Paniu achun kam maha lujiu I asang miboga
atu thon mibo-e.
Tingwang niu atu palung pomchang pomjiu
pagu sathubo mikremaitu kumjiu paniu kamkhaibo-e.
Paniu atu aphenra parimaitu langkhai-e,
sichiujiu paliuniu agu mathenkyga chakhomky
chukhai lujiu atu manra tathak thiukhai-e.
Tingwang niu asingnamaitu pijiu atu mangai khai-e,
atu kasimai hina khuga, Ira sangmai kum mide.
Ariang aruimai nai akahmaidungse tadkam mide.
Agiang maidung siniu atu mangaikam mide;
avangpuidung siniudi atu zusi makmai maksai sangdiumai kumjiu lukhai-e.
Atu nkha nkhaira Iniu avangtu kuboga, atu npaokak tamide.
Akhenpui niudi asiurai manam ngamlak mide,
asingnamaidi akhuga wang manata mide.
Nahmaidungniu atu ngaoboga kagajiu nui-e.
Amun-hu siakniudi atu phuini tamide,
Iniu kakungmai siniu atu atungjiu bamme.
Ara situ aginiu topman bambo ronna mide;
aringting hai asangjiu khengbambo-e.
Naliura akahmaidung-e, Atu lungsa khailo!
Tingwang bensiniu atu kakhiu kaokiu mibo-e.
Tingwang niu kambo kumjiu naliuniu atu dekamjiu kam masabam jiulo?
Naliuniu atu mathad bambo hai bui makha jiuma?
Aladkeng hai mai khatniu nkingtao lujiu
ariakkhuangga raokhaira dejiukha Iniu masenlo?
Maksai aladkeng hai tatupekga bungkhai lujiu
tingtheng hamakra raokhaibo luni-e.
Chiudi kanamboga atu gukhaira tinggen ga
mai khat bamme chiubo I si-e.
Parik siniu agih haitu tiulu tadi haibo pum hainiu
Tingwang tu zudao rabo-e.
Amik siakniu patu ngao rabo-e,
siga pase zusi makmai thiulakge.
Alungchun hai nkhin mide,
palamra naliuniu haichiu din bamme,
“Aliuniu patu dechiu kam mathadlu ralo?”
Naliuniu atu aphenra amao phiujiu bamme.
Chiudi tuhoira nuan phungmai riga wangrabo
Tingwang lungpom situ pinglulo,
sichiusai ladjanpao khat bamme chiubo naliuniu sirabo-e.
Job yo, nangniu alung kam masa mide.
Siniu I natu paokak mak daolak mide.
Nangniu dinbo hai maitu kam mangambo gu-e,
siga natu dechiu paokak ralo chiubo I si-e.
Nda kadihpiri lungkiu karai gasu haise sibambo-e,
kasamaise wadaodi matha-chunwi phulu lakge.
Pase dikhangjiu,ting tungtang bamdi,
paniu kukhangjiu, kamuangtu papee tungtang bamdi,
patuse tabuitu kumjiu mudthon mirabo-e.
Patu kasimai siniu pah delam tadmi jiulo
chiujiu paliu suang hasune.
Para nchun mang kum, madungao kum hami rabo-e,
sichiujiu wadaodi ngaolan tami rabo-e.
Paniu lungbo bam gasu patu ngaota mirabo-e;
Kalek samai khugasu paniu agalubose
panahmainiu kawi kamra rangrabo-e.
Papumse parakeng hajiu chabonmai kum bamdi
tabui mawinuang mirabo-e.
Kasabose palengra tiuwi-chang tiuwibo kum,
paniu sibo tiuwatse lutao raleng pamun-ga nphangjiu bamme.
Chiudi sibo tatekse pawonpui gasu khapadjiu
watai karabo khakum khami rabo-e.
Kasamainiu agalubo lungwat sira maruipad mirabo-e;
Tingwang niu sise pawonpui lungga sudi lupad lanmi rabo-e.
Kasamai siniu wa kajuangbo sira karabo tai kumbo-e;
patai katanbo kaniuniu machaobo kumjiu patu kamshat mirabo-e.
Ndui nai makhuidui siniu singgiu thiujiu,
maksai takisaniu singgiu thiujiu luangbo situ para ngaotang lakge.
Paniu maranjiu kamlubo hinase mathakhu thonmi rabo-e;
pakhiu-palanse paniu tiurabo wan daolakge,
palamra kalek samaitu paniu wajeng simakge,
khatdi mainiu thiukhaibo kyse paniu sutlubo-e.
Paniu luniboga kakimbo ha-e.
Paniu katiuboga wakhatdi malipad makge,
chiudi tuhoira pakhiu-palanse loimide.
Paniu tan palanbo tingga, sansathubo siniu
patu niakpetmi rabo-e.
Paniu tiu kanithen tiu lulo!
Tingwang niu palungpom nai palungnot gasu patu sajai pirabo-e.
Paniu chagi hengtu pingjiu marenbamga,
tanaagigu tavaipi siniu patu ketkao mirabo-e.
Tavaithu siniu papum ket taronmeng, machumbo pamun siniu pamalung ket taojiu
kapingbo zaise jaokiu bamme.
Paniu kam lubo hina kam mahami rabo-e,
chamai benniu mataomakbo mi siniu pakikhunmai mathiutu rushatmi rabo-e.
Panuanse tinggen lamniu madu padjiu,
khatdi haibo kadih hainiu patu suini makbo lamchap thiu bamme.
Pagu chakhiu-chalan hinase,
Tingwang gu lungpom duidet siniu kam mahami rabo-e.
Kasamai sansiat sira haisi-e,
Tingwang niu pikhaibo kasamai sansetse haisi-e.
Iniu kadinbo hai nking khailo,
achun kimlura Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e.
Iniu chalad dinra aleng pawan pikhailo,
I dinloi lubo sainiu, naliu nuini sai nuilo.
Chamainatu Iniu n-gibo makge;
Iniu alung khenglu lakbo palam bamme.
Atu phuilo. Naliu suang hajiu atu phuibo hai
naliuleng buimakha jiuma?
Akhuga degu padbamlo chiubo lamga, I wadi din ngamlu lakge;
kapingbo siniu agiu magao-e.
Dekamjiu kasamai situ pi ringtheng khaijiu,
khatdi pi amankhai bamjiulo, Tingwang yo.
Paliu tah-nah kengjiu lungbotu paliuniu ngao-e.
Tingwang niu paliu kyga magenthiu chariubo pikhai makge;
paliu wadaodi manangjiu lungmakge.
Yo, paliugu khaorui khaonadung magenthiubo hajiu piang bamme.
Paliu nahdungse milypoi kumjiu mathen bamme,
khatdi nthiam tara mudjiu chalen len bamme.
Paliu haichiu magenthiu chariubo daomakjiu,
agi-manaijiu lungkhailu shaikiu mide.
Tingwang niu paliutu phutkhaira kasamai siniu din bamme;
Tingwang chunningse paliuniu luni makge.
Tingwang tien thiura maksai, pakhuga kakheng thiura pageng ha-e
chiujiu paliura maning-e.
Paliugu pumtan gasu paliu ngambo-e,
chiujiu paliuniu maningbose I suini makge.
Kasamaigu nbiuse wadaodi kammid khailak jiuma?
Sansabose paliu wadaodi daolak jiuma?
Tingwang niu kasamaitu palung pom gasu sajai pikhai lak jiuma?
Tingkainiu magaorengtu hunthon mibo kum,
maksai tingthungniu tabuitu hunthon mibo kum hunthon milak jiuma?
Papiu nuan jengniu panahtu Tingwang niu sajai pi-e chiu naliuniu din-e.
Makge! Tingwang niu paliu nuan jengniu, paliutu sajai pimi sulo;
Paliu nuan jengniu-e chiubo lenmi sulo.
Nuan phungmaidung siniu sajaise daorabo-e;
Ngamkambo Tingwang lungpomse paliuniu daomi sulo.
Mai khatniu pagu ringting loimi sai,
panahmai chunwijiu bamra manangjiu pah bamlu rama?
Kakulam bambo tudi ladjan thiujiu bambo
Tingwang tu chamainaniu katikhai lubuima?
Khangsia maira paliu pum wiban satjiu,
amansaijiu manangbo hajiu bamdi shaimi-e.
Khangsia maira wakhatdi chunwibo daomakjiu,
paliu lung magenthiubo siniu phuijiu shaimi-e.
Chiudi paliu mathiuse ncham kamna-e, paliutu shaijiu baikam mibo-e;
sichiujiu paliutu siniu tiumi rabo-e.
Kasabo lungchun naliu khuga bambose Iniu si-e.
Naliuniu maniu-e, “Kasa kambo kadibopiu kyse tuhoira dega bamlo?”
Chabin tadmaitu, naliuniu npao matai makma?
Paliuniu phungwangbo cham naliu simak jiuma?
Tingwang niu palung pomjiu sajai pibo naise
kasamai situ masiak khai-e.
Kasamaitu mai khat niudi pamao dinlenni makge,
paniu kammibo kumjiu chakhum ruikhai makge.
Khon mawikhai bambo rawbam lam pontadbo tingga
mai sang-sang siniu paphawse ponlujiu suitadle,
sichiujiu taniang siniu paphawse phesim mi-e.
Naliura, wadi makbo lad siniu atu thumjiu bamme!
Naliuniu dinbo hinase aratbo maliang-e!
Ningting thubo mai tuse thinpiura, Tingwang leng pageng bamlu buima?
Maji kambo siniu Tingwang leng genglu buima,
maksai nawat siniu patu nkha ngamlu buima?
Nangniu Tingwang tu pingbo jengniu, paniu natu rukhaibo makge,
maksai natu madiu khaibo makge.
Chiumakge, haise nangniu kasa kamjiu nuan kam njukhai mibo jengniu-e.
Nasingnaniu napaw-nara phungbo jengniu
pafai-panise nangniu gaolujiu papumruang phutkhai mibo-e.
Pasang-parang mibo maitu nangniu taduidi pikhaini makge,
khatdi pawon kamariu maitu nangniu kikhaini makge.
Kadihpiri pakhiangna haitu lura nagu pumtan siniu
natien thiujiu kamkhai kamigu-e.
Kamipuitu nkha khaira suimakbo ronna makjiu,
magennahgu suttiura nangniu masenbo-e.
Siniu tuhoira kapingbo haise nakhuga phuimide;
chakhomky siniu natu taoweng mibo-e.
Haise tamiuju mibo jengniu ngao lulak mibo-e,
sichiujiu tuhoira duidet siniu natu maliamphui khangmibo-e.
Kuthubo tinggen gase Tingwang niu bam lujiu,
chagandung situ phuikiujiu bambo makma?
Chiudi nangniu maniu-e, “Tingwang niu nde silo?
Kamuang siniu patu sungmibo-e. Dechiu paniu aliutu ladjan thiuralo?”
Paniu tingpukga tadjiu bamga, paniu ngaomakra kamuang siniu sungmide chiu nang maning-e.
Kasamainiu tadsao makjiu bambo npui gase
nangdi tadkhaira nachun khaimi jiuma?
Paliu kyga wangtang makha gasu paliutu duidet siniu maten tadmi rabo-e.
Paliu haira Tingwang tu lukhai makjiu,
paliuleng wadi kamkhai ngamlakge chiujiu lukhai maidung-e.
Chiudi paliutu pi lungwi khaibo haira Tingwang niu-e,
kasamainiu maningbo lungchun sira I sitanglu makge.
Kasamaitu sajai pibo ngaoboga kawimai siniu chunwi-e;
khatdi pamao hamai siniu chun wi-e.
Kasamai hina guse kam maha mine; masiakbo hinase chaminiu rumine.
Tuhoira Job yo, Tingwang tu kawi thiululo,
patu mikremai kumjiu kamta sulo, sichiusai paniu natu thoikhai bine.
Paniu katikhaibo hai lukhai lulo; palad hai nalungchun ga khai lulo.
Yo, nangniu kasa kamkhai mibo hinase thonlujiu
Tingwang khuga manonjiu wangrabo thao-e.
Nagu withubo kachiase khoithon milo; kachiase singgiuga thonkhai milo.
Kangambo Tingwang haitu nagu kachia thiululo
khatdi makhuankhai bambo rangkang thiululo.
Chiusai Tingwang tu tingtheng malummi rabo-e,
pase nagu ringabo phibang thiumi rabo-e.
Nangniu khengboga, paniu paokak khai bine,
khatdi ladriat khaibose nangniu majailu rabo-e.
Nangniu kambo hinase tathuilu rabo-e,
siga kabenbo siniu na-npuiga thaokhai rabo-e.
Wasao thiumaitu Tingwang niu jukiu lujiu lung manon maitu gukhai bine.
Nangniu kambose majijiu namao hasai, paniu natu gukhai bine.
Tingwang tu suini makjiu, khatdi alung pomjiu,
I maliu makjiu bamlu lakge,
Paniu bambo bamga tadlujiu patu I adaoni-e.
Alamga Iniu kamajibo hina dinjiu pasuangga athu hai tiakkhai ni-e.
Paniu dechiujiu atu paokakkhai ralo, I sikhaini-e.
Tingwang niu pagu pumtan hina thinlujiu atu atung rama?
Makge, Iniu kadinbose pah nkingkhai rabo-e.
Alungchun hai nchang-e chiu Tingwang khuga Iniu din ngamme,
akhui amao ha-e chiujiu paniu dinkhai rabo-e.
Iniu tingbanglam phui-e, chiudi Tingwang tu siga daomakge;
Iniu tingnulam phuidi patu daolu makge.
Tingwang niu tingbanglam khatdi tingnulam patien thiujiu bamme,
chiudi siga patu Iniu ngaolu makge.
Chiudi aphikem hina Tingwang niu sibamme,
atu madiusai I masan-e chiubo sirabo-e.
Paniu machunbo npui gase I tad bambo-e, wadaodi Iniu tadmaomi makge.
Tingwang gu chamtan situ pawan machang Iniu majai bamme;
amaning makjiu, pamaningse Iniu kambambo-e.
Pah wadaodi arat makge, mai khatniudi patu atung ngamlu lakge,
maksai paniu kamnibo gasu patu khamlu lakge.
Paniu aleng kaden khai mibose pi tathui khai rabo-e;
sise paniu rangkhaibo si-e;
Kapingbo siniu pasuangga I kaphikrai-rai-e.
Ngamkambo Rawang niu ahotse kam maha mide.
Tamiubo siniu pi pingkhaibo makge,
tamiubo siniu pijiu amik tiatkhai bamdi Tingwang niu kamkhaibo-e.
Tingwang tu machamai leng majibo ladzan thiura
dekamjiu tingmik nai pawan dakkhai mak jiulo?
Maidungniu kadih dao madi lura ramraise kam kali-e;
maigu milydung agalujiu paliu khaorui ruangga khaimi-e.
Paliuniu magennahgu qonniamse sutle,
khatdi kamipuiniu papaw ruimak then pabuichise jumanlu-e.
Lunglak maigu majise paliuniu khamme,
khatdi kahamaitu manomjiu pipak mari khai-e.
Sijengniu lunglakmai hai qonniam kumjiu ramjingga paliu tatek phiu tiu-e;
paliu poileng katiu phiu khaira pabam wadi daomakge.
Paliu luzam makboga paliuniu tatien thiu khai-e,
kasamaigu mumsirengga khom madui khai-e,
Nchun kiusai chafai ben makjiu ji kalakiu-e,
agibo gasu pilum khaira wakhatdi ha-e.
Ramluong ganiu kiubo tingriu siniu paliutu den matin khaide,
sichiujiu tutong dibo hiuga madun khaira phiu-e.
Kasamai siniu papiu habo ngenadung situ pi kavang thiu khai-e,
sichiujiu kaleksamai nahdung situ paliu paw sung thiujiu lu-e.
Chiudi kaleksamai sira paliutu bentom radi hajiu tad mariu bamme;
atiat tinggadi mariujiu paliu tad bamme.
Paliuniu takisytu wasaleng, khatdi mumsytu jawleng niakjiu bamme.
chiudi paliu pumsiakra charijiu bamme.
Namdiga ajam-thiuniu maidungse kapjiu bamme,
chiudi Tingwang niu paliu rathoi situ wajeng chakkhai makge.
Kabenbo situ suimakbo maidung bamme;
paliuniu haise sitang makge, delam jukhai ralo chiubo simakge.
Maitu kagimai siniu nsuan kalu buangsu lujiu
lunglakmaitu kamshatra tadle, sichiujiu nchun kiusai, agara tadle.
Kamakhamai siniu ting benpad ratu khuanjiu bamme,
mainiu patu ngao makra, pazu takum lujiu tadle.
Nchun kiusai agatiu mainiu chaky kampang-e,
sichiujiu n-nien sai paliu nbaimi-e.
N-nien gu kabenbo situ paliuniu ping-e,
chiudi paliuniu tamiuboga wadi pingbo ha-e.
(Zophar)
Kasamai situ duidetniu pontadmi rabo-e,
khatdi pagu kadihse Tingwang siangga bamme;
pagu mumsy rengga tadjiu wadaodi paniu tatien thiulan silakge.
Kabun siniu tingphu tingnaiga tunmibo kumjiu,
nuan phungmai sira karingbo kadih gasu tun mahami rabo-e.
Tuhoira papui niudi patu maningtao tamide;
kaomibo singbangtu kumjiu patuse tariniu tiulude.
Haichiu padbo sira paniu kamipuitu jumao khaibo,
khatdi panah kahabo puitu lungsa khai makbo jengniu-e.
Kangammai situ Tingwang gu pumtan siniu kam maha mine;
Kasamai situ Tingwang niu kamshat mine.
Pakak khat Tingwang niu patu pi ringkhaidi,
pawan machang patu phui saomak bambo-e.
Kasamainiu pawan khatga lungwikhang bam tadi,
chamiubuitu kamtap mibo kum pase kuimi rabo-e.
Haise mai khat kumbo suini makbo bamma?
Acham hai maji makge chiujiu mai khatniu din kadalu buima?
Tingwang hai pumtan bamme; mai hina pasuangga pingjiu bamrabo-e,
pagu tinggen kadihse agi-manaijiu bamme.
Patu machajiu bambo mazadung situ mai khatniu pariak chaklu buima?
Tingwang gu nbiu siniu benmakbo bam bamma?
Tingwang suangga pacheng majibo khatdi masanbo mai bamma?
Chiudi pamikphui gara chahiuse ben makge,
maksai chagandungdi masanbo ha-e.
Sichiusai, wakhaopui kumbo, warik kumbo, chamaina sira dechiu ralo?
Tingwang mikphuiga chamaina hai degu pageng bamlo?
Kasa kasonbo chamaina akumbo khuga,
naliugu nkha hai degu kagengbo bamlo!
Akumbo kapangbo mai khuga naliugu ningting dam lumacham khaibo,
khatdi naliugu kawibo lad pikhaibo hai degu pageng bamlo!
Saokum mainiu naliu cham hai nking silura naliu maning jiulo?
Haikumbo dinra hai saoniu naliu lungchun pikhai jiulo?
(Bildad)
Kadih hanglam tadui jiuga bambo kashaibo hiupuinase kaphikrai-rai bamme.
Charuidihse Tingwang suangga lekhai bamme;
haise pamik phuiga wakhatniudi gomnam makge.
Tingwang niu tingpigu tingpukse juden khai lujiu,
maruangbo bam gase kadihpiri haitu khai nbambo-e.
Tadui haitu kamuangniu phunglujiu sibo rip siniu
pangpadmi makra kham nbambose Tingwang niu-e.
Paniu chahiu bungchong situ kamuangjiuga baikhai-e.
Duipui situ paniu kam maweng khai lujiu tamiubo gasu kabenbo situ kamtam khai-e.
Tingpuk situ ponbambo katiang situ
paniu kapin khaiboga pingbo siniu kaphikrai-rai mi-e.
Duipui situ pagu pumtanniu ngamkhai-e;
pagu ningting siniu mantage Rahab
Pasiu hainiu tingpuktu kam masan khai-e,
khatdi pabenniu pakkinbo mantage
Chiudi haidung sira aliuniu poinakha chiulubo pagu pumtan gu pameng ronna-e.
Tingwang hai pachangsiak dejiukha dilo chiubo saoniu singamlu ralo?
Agu ringting haitu mathadjiu bambo, atu majibo ladjan thiu khai makbo jengniu,
Ngamkambo Tingwang zan-ga Iniu tasiang siangbo-e,
Tingwang niu asiu thira pikhai bamthen amun hainiu wadaodi kasabo dinlakge;
alee hainiu wadaodi aratbo dinlakge.
Naliu chamaina hai wadaodi maji-e chiubo wadaodi Iniu dinlakge;
kashaibo tingmik tangjiu asimak haitu Iniu mangiu khaijiu bamne.
Agu maji haitu Iniu wadaodi phut lakge, alungchun hai masansiak bamme.
Atu suini makjiu atungmai, chari thiumai, tacheng kahamai,
kasamai situ sajai pikhailo.
Tingwang niu aliu ringtingse lura wangboga,
charatu simak maileng degu machun bam ralo?
Chariu magenthiubo wangbo tingga
Tingwang niu paliu kapkhuanse nking khaibi rama?
Paniu pikhaibo chunwat gase, paliu chunwi rabo-e;
paliuniu pakhuga saomakjiu khengrabo-e.
Tingwang gu pumtanse dejiukha dilo,
Ngamkambo Tingwang niu rangkhaibose naliu khuga Iniu katikhai bine.
Naliura, naliu pumsiakniu ngaolu mibo-e;
sichiusai dekamjiu mathakhu lad dinbam jiulo?
(Zophar)
Ngamkambo Tingwang niu, palung kasamaitu haichiujiu sajai pirabo-e.
Paliu nahpiudung kengjiu bamdi, chariga kamshat kammi rabo-e,
sichiujiu paliu tiubui wadaodi daolakge.
Siga masiaklu maise chararen gasu shaimi rabo-e,
sichiujiu paliu naodung niudi paliu kashaiboga kapjiu huilakge.
Kasamaigu rangkang pariak sikamlak bamdi,
mainiu piukam kalak chafai-tani bamdi, kawimai siniu lukam mine,
khatdi ka-nchangmai siniu rangkangse daomi rabo-e.
Kasamai siniu paliu kyse takepui renkum,
maksai chalu khuanbo kavangdunggu apaky kum thiukhai bamdi sui-e.
Pawan khatga paliu kalek wijiu jikhai mide,
paliu buangsu lanbo gara, paliugu chakhiu-chalanse
hakammi bamniu sune.
Kapingbo duidet siniu bungjiu wangbo kum;
kapingbo tingthungse nchun wangjiu paliutu hunthonmi rabo-e;
tingbang lamgu tingkai siniu paliu ky gasu paliutu hunthon mirabo-e;
paliu lai padjiu mari lura kamjiu bamdi, wadi lungsa makjiu paliutu hunthonmi rabo-e.
Paliutu kam mahara kapin wangbo tingthung siniu paliutu hathonmi rabo-e.
Rangkanggitu lupadra chupadbam bamme;
kachiatu kam masanra pabam bamme.
Chamainaniu chagitu kadih gasu chu-e.
Tatu gasu tanaagi langpadle.
Sukthubo tamiubo gasu chamainiu wa phiupad lu-e;
paliuniu kadihgu kasukbose phuilujiu tamiubo gasu tatuse chupadle.
Mai khatniudi lungmakbo ram, mai khatniudi tadkhai makbo gase,
chariang gase mangiujiu, paliu ronna tatien thiujiu bamme.
Kadih gasu katiu hai lung padle,
sibo kadih gasu wahina kamtap-tap mi-e.
Kadihga bambo tu gase paman kungbo tu bamme,
sibo moigase kachiadi bamme.
Wakhunki npuise kalengniu ngaomakge,
sibo riga wadaodi kaleng lenwang lakge.
Ndongqui maksai kapingbo nkankhao
sibo npui rigase wadaodi tadwang makge.
Chamainaniu tanchang-tanbo tudungse chupadle,
kadibo maluong phibang katang chu-e.
Turali gase paliuniu alod chuboga
paman kungbo tuse paliuniu dao-e.
Paliuniu singgiu rokga chu-e,
sichiujiu baikhai bambose phiu padle.
Chiudi ningting situ delamsu aliu daolu ralo?
Aliuniu delamsu tasi haise katiralo?
Ningting hai chamaina khugasu daolakge;
mai khatniudi haibogu palingbose sitanglu makge.
Duipui nai duinaigu kasukbo gasudi ningting haitu daomakge.
Haisitu kachia, rangkangniu liulu lakge.
Withubo kachia nai tiuchang siniu haibo mansitu kada silakge.
Haise kachiakhuang suang kung-e, withubo kachia hiubung suangdi wi-e.
Ningting gu paman sira chaganmi-tu,
masing palik-likbo-tu, khatdi heng marenbo tu,
paman kungbo tudung suang nkiu-e.
Withubo majinbo-tu maksai masanthubo kachia
siniu ningting wat haitu kada silakge.
Sichiusai ningting phibangse degalo?
Delamsu aliuniu ningtingse daoralo?
Karingbo wakhao khatniudi sitang makge,
lenkinbo thingna siniudi simakge.
Kashaibo nai kahabo siniudi,
paliu racham hai pahiu ronna si-e chiujiu dinne.
Tingwang ronna sibo npuise si-e,
ningting daorabo bamse paronna si-e.
Palamra paniu kadihpirigu pamalanse ngao-e.
Tingpuk hangga kabambo hina para si-e.
Tingwang niu tingkaitu pumtan pibo gase
duipuileng padetse paniu retkhai-e;
Tingwang niu tingriura rangkhaibo wan-ga,
tingsim-kamao tadrabo npui kamkhaibo tingga,
paniu ningting haitu ngaolujiu,
pageng bambo situ paniu madiu khaijiu suikhai mibo-e.
Tingwang niu chamaina khuga din-e,
“Ningtingra, Rapiu tu chakhuang thiulo.
Wa sira, kasabo gasu mari lulo.”
Job niu haichiu dinsu lan-e.
Tingwang niu atu phuikhaijiu bambo tingga kum
agu ringting hai wanglan lu-e sai.
Sibo tinggara Iniu tamiuboga tadjiu bamdi
Tingwang niu pawan machang maluong khaijiu kabenbose pikhai-e.
Sibo tingga I lungwi bamniu-e,
Tingwang tu chaka thiujiu bambo jengniu,
paniu akikhuntu gukhai-e.
Ngamkambo Tingwang niu maluong khaibo tingga,
anahmaidung siniu atu maguijiu bamniu-e.
Atom, abui khatdi amidung siniu ndui kengjiu atu pikhai bamniu-e,
khatdi agu takibangse turaliga puakbam niu-e.
Namdigu katingmainiu atu adaobo tingga,
Idi paliu ruangga abam lujiu bamniu-e.
Katingmaidung siniu chap khangjiu,
atu chakhuangthiu bamniu-e,
khatdi nahmaidung siniu akhugasu tad marimi bamniu-e.
Maidunggu jupaodung siniu maliuta mi-e;
parathiu thubo maidungdi maliumak bammi-e.
Atu kadaomai hina, alad kachiumai hina,
a-ngamkam kawibo situ dinjiu bamniu-e.
Kalek samai siniu kapboga, Iniu nkha khai-e;
magennahdung siniu walam tad khaira hamiboga
Iniu nkha khaijiu bamniu-e.
Lung chariuchang chariumaidung siniudi atu thuon bamniu-e;
kamipuidung situ Iniu nkha khaijiu bamniu-e.
Kamajibo nai ka-nchangbo ronna I kamme.
I hai pamik tiatmai mik, khatdi paphi tangmai phi, thiujiu bamniu-e.
I hai lunglak maigu piu kumjiu bamniu-e,
khatdi zusimak maidungniu magenthiuboga nkha khaijiu bamniu-e.
Pathak samaigu pumtanse Iniu kam maha lujiu,
paliutu ngaokhai lakmai khugasu gukhai-e.
Ringthengra khatdi chakyga amansaijiu shai ratu ronna
I machun bamniu-e.
Pawan machang pamen-ga tadui bambo singke,
kajikdui timsao makjiu bambo singbang kumjiu I bamniu-e.
