Mai hina atu thuonsao makjiu bamniu-e,
apumtanse wadaodi nkhin makjiu bamniu-e.
Aladse pikhaiboga, maidungse maliuta mi-e,
khatdi Iniu dinbo ladse paliuniu maliumakjiu nking bamniu-e.
Alad riga maidi khaisan silak bamniu-e;
aladkeng hai tingdui kum riukiu bamniu-e;
chaken tingga chalu tien thiu mainiu tingriu situ masenbo kum,
mai hina acham haitu lukhaijiu bamniu-e.
Paliu lungchun thiusilak mibo tingga,
nuirim-rimjiu Iniu paliutu phuikhaiboga,paliu lung kimjiu bamniu-e.
Chawangniu pagu riphenmaitu jukhaibo kum,
paliutu jukhaibo hai angam thiujiu bamniu-e;
sichiujiu palung magenthiu chariu maitu pijiu aman khai bamniu-e.
Chiudi tuhoira asuang nahmaidung siniu atu tanui
thiujiu bamme!
Paliu piudung sira wadimakbo, athi suangdi tangmakbo-e,
Iniu agu milydung tudi pijiu khuanradi suikhai mak maidung-e.
Agu changam kamra lengdi paliura buimakbo maidung-e,
Paliu hai aleng wadi pageng hamaidung-e.
Paliura lunglakju mijiu, khatdi mariuju mijiu,
nchun manam hangga singmen kagi maidung-e.
Paliuniu singmendung ran kabao lujiu,
wadi parim-para thiumakbo nphiakmen tangbo ranlujiu tiu-e!
Agatiu maitu mara senjiu habo kum,
mai hinaniu paliutu mara senjiu habambo maidung-e.
Paliuse chakhao-charung bung lujiu tulimkiga lungbo maidung-e.
Paliu haira nkan khaoring kumjiu mara-kangungjiu tadkinbo-e,
khatdi pabao-bao thiujiu chaphejiuga nbepon kinbo-e.
Paliu zandi habo, pageng habo maidung-e,
paliu hai hathon mibo maidung-e.
Tuhoira paliuniu wang madui lujiu atu kagajiu bamme;
I hai wadi tamide, tanui thiuraleng gappe.
Paliuniu atu ka-gajiu nuimen bamme;
paliu hai asuang wi-e chiu maningjiu azuga tatai masiu khaijiu bamme.
Tingwang niu agu jengtan pi hakhai mibo jengniu
paliu lungpom padjiu, atu atung bamme.
Paliuniu atu wajengdi simakjiu, charithiu bamme;
paliuniu atu hajiu kanamthubo lungnotse kamkhaira rang bamme.
Agu nbaibamse paliuniu kam maha lujiu
atudi kam mahara matan bamme; paliutu kham khaira maidi ha-e.
Agu charirengse kampang lujiu, atu diangpet mira wang bamme.
Kapingbo siniu akhuga phuimide.
Amachen kadibose mikhut kumjiu tadmide,
khatdi agu lungwat hinase kamuong kum hamide.
Tuhoira I shaira pating namide; athad hai wisonta mide.
Arah hai nchun chagisang-e; athad hai wadaodi thiusao makge.
Tingwang niu awongcheng chakid lujiu afai-anidi kanuttap-tap mide.
Paniu atu taniangjiu gase taliang khai mide;
I hai kataniabo niang suang samide.
Tingwang yo, Iniu natu ku-e, chiudi paokak khai makge;
Iniu khengbo haitu wajeng lukhai makge.
Nangniu atu nathak sajiu kam bamme;
nagu pumtan padjiu, atu mathad bamme.
Nangniu atu tingkaiga pijiu hunthon khai mide.
Nangniu atu tingthung gase tunkhai mide.
Mai hinaleng kaden khaibo charui ramgase
nangniu atu jukhaijiu bamme chiubo I si-e.
Wadi kam ngamlakjiu, lungsa khaira ronna khengjiu bambo,
hamirabo maitu deleng atung bamjiulo?
Maidungniu magenthiu chariuboga, I kapmak jiuma?
Maksai kahamaileng I manang khaimak jiuma?
Matha-ringabo nai kabenbo situ Iniu masenbo-e,
chiudi chariubo nai tamiubo ronna wang-e.
Lungchun magenthiubo nai thiuniubo siniu atu kanuttap-tap mide;
nchun n-nien saomakjiu I kheng bamme.
Achungbo siniu phuilujiu I tad bamme, kabenbose wadaodi dao makge;
mathiu charuangga chaplujiu nkha khaira I khengjiu bamme.
Akhuan hai tany khuan maksai ruidi khuan kum
chunsabo nai tingjingbo siniu phui-e.
Agi hai tikli-li mide, kakhunbo siniu asang arang mide.
Pakak khatga chunwibo luise, I chiubam niu-e,
chiudi tuhoira kiuhuibo lui ronna chiujiu bamme.
Aliumaitu kasabo mikphuiniu wadaodi phuimakra,
Iniu ladrian tanjiu thiu-e.
Ngamkambo Tingwang niu aliu khuga degu kamkhai jiulo?
Chamaina tienkam phijeng hai dechiujiu paniu pikhailo?
Kamao kammaitu nchum mira langkhai-e.
Iniu kambo hina Tingwang niu sibamme,
Iniu tadbo phiken hina pah ngao bamme.
Iniu wadaodi maitu sontiura maksai,
athak kasabo kammakge chiujiu siangbo-e.
Tingwang niu alungchun nchangbo haitu
tajuga madatjiu akhui-amao wadi ha-e chiubo pi phuilulo.
Iniu majibo npui gasu marilujiu
alungga kasabo maning khai-e sai,
abenniu nuan kamkhaibo bamme sai,
agu miusy hinase hami sulo,
maksai Iniu tenkhaibo miusy hai pijiu maitu tiumi sulo.
Iniu kiningmai naotu masen masiajiu, pagu kamun-ga mahin mahiu-e sai,
pijiu anaotu maipiuleng alangbo khatdi maipiu ziga jibo thiumi sulo.
Sikumbo kasabo situ kashaibo siniu sajai pirabo-e.
Sichiusai agu kabambo hinase pijiu hamirabo charui-mi siniu rumi sulo.
Avangmai khatniu atu suini makjiu wa dinsai,
Iniu sise nking lujiu kam masan khai bi-e.
Iniu sichiu makge sai, Tingwang tu dechiujiu I zudao ralo?
Tingwang niu atu ladjan thiura wangboga Iniu degu dinralo?
Atu kadambo Rawang siniu avangmai tudi damkhaibo-e.
Iniu lunglakmaitu nkhara suimakbo wadaodi thiumakge,
maksai kami-magentu mariu-charijiu tadra,
maksai magenthiujiu tadra suikhai makge.
Paliutu Iniu chalungsajiu manang khai bi-e.
Paliu fai-ni liungamlak misai, Iniu paliutu chalungsajiu,
agu kamigiu gasu daklubo fainise paliuleng pikhaibi-e.
Siga paliu lungchun siakniu atu thuon-e.
Iniu magennahtu ladjankyga ngamdiu-e chiujiu sontiu-e sai,
pijiu aphi-aben tangmi sulo.
Palamra Tingwang gu sajaitu pingbo donniu
sikumbo ngamse wadaodi I ten-hu makge.
Wadaodi chakhiu chalan-ga, I mangiu khai makge;
maksai akhiu-alan-ga wasao thiubo ha-e.
Naimik-biu situ maksai chahiu-biu kawi situ wadaodi I kahum makge.
Atu chakhuang thiujiu aben kapupbo jengniu,
kamaoboga paliutu I jukhai makge.
Ngamkambo Tingwang tu mangai lujiu
Iniu nuan tenmi bamniu sai, kashaibo siniu atu sajai pimi sulo.
Agu mikremainiu magenthiubo ngaoboga,
wadaodi I achun wimi makge,
maksai paliuniu sansabo daoboga achun kawibo thiumakge.
Paliu shaira khengjiu, I nuan tenmi makge.
Zu simak maidungtu Iniu pawan machang lukhai-e,
chiubo angamkam maidungniu sibamme.
Chabin tadmaitu Iniu akyga pingutkhai-e,
paliutu wadaodi npui nchengga pijiu jikhai makge.
Maidungra paliu nuan baira kamme,
chiudi Ira wadaodi anuantu bai makge.
Mainiu atu khanra tiakra situ wadaodi Ira manangmi makge,
paliuniu khan-tiakjiu ruratu pingjiu wadaodi maliu makjiu I nbaimi makge.
Iniu kadinbo lad hai mai khatniudi nking khai lakma?
Iniu din bambo lad hina hai majibo-e.
Pijiu Ngamkambo Tingwang situ paokak khailo.
Atu suimakjiu atungmai siniu phungwangbo chamse raolujiu Iniu phiu-e sai,
wasao thiujiu amakhuakga khailujiu I pontadne,
pirun khaibo kumjiu apeega runlujiu tadne.
Iniu kambo hinase Iniu Tingwang khuga
ama ponmaku lujiu paokhai rabo-e.
Papao bambo luse Iniu sutlujiu ten-e sai—
chalu tenmai siniu tiumakjiu, Iniu sut tiu-e sai,
sibo luzamga miusy nai tathiu masibo sung
pijiu piumen nai tathuniu lunggom misulo.
Job ladse haichiu loikhaide.
Job niu pamao habo lamga chapmibo jengniu pakamai khang sumse patu paokakra kamta mide.

Chiudi pamungga chapbambo Elihu hai palung pomboniu khenglu lak mide, palamra Job niu Tingwang tu din masajiu paronna patu kam majijiu din bamme. (Elihu hai Ram kiphiuga bambo, Buz kaikik, Barakel nahpiu-e).
Paniu Job kamai khangsum tudi palung pomme. Paliuniu Job tu wadi paokak khaira habo hai, Tingwang tu kamaobo leng madam khaibo-e.
Palamra paliu ruanggasu Elihu hai nathubo-e, siniu paliu lad dinloi mira pah khuanjiu bambo-e.
Paliu khangsum siniu Job tu paokak ngamlak miboga palung pommide,
sichiujiu paniu haichiu dinsude.
Ira na-e, naliura katingmai-e,
sijengniu naliu khuga amaning din khaira I maraojiu bambo-e.
Naliu katingmainiu naliugu ningtingse dinrabo siakge chiujiu Ira lubo-e.
Chiudi Ngamkambo Tingwang hiupuina siniu
chamaina khuga wangjiu ningting pikhaibo-e.
Haise katingmai lungmatheng mibo jengniu ningting khangbodi makge,
maksai kamajibose silubo makge.
Siniu tuhoira Iniu degu maning bamlo chiubo naliu khuga dinkhaine,
naliu alad nking khailo.
Naliuniu ningting chamse phiulujiu dinbambose I koina nkingjiu bambo-e.
Iniu nking mawijiu nkingbo-e; chiudi naliura Job niu dinbo hai mao-e
chiujiu din ngamlak tane.
Dechiujiu ningting chamse naliu daolu jiulo?
Naliuniu ngam makbose Tingwang niu Job tu pi paokak khai rabo-e.
Job niu akhuga dinbo makge, chiudi naliu khuga dinbambo-e,
chiudi naliu kumjiu Ira wadaodi paokak lakge.
Job yo, paliura natu paokak ngamlakjiu tane.
Paliuniu wadi dinra hamiboga I khuanjiu bam rama?
Paliu wa dinra hamijiu chapbam mide.
Makge, tuhoira alungchun ladse paokak khai rabo-e,
chiudi Iniu maningbose nakhuga dinrabo-e.
I maliu makjiu bamlu lak mide,
I chalad dinmak bamlu lak mide.
Iniu chalad dinmak tasai, kasanbo jawse
chamigi bungga khaisai puakpang mibo kumra-e.
I khonlulak mide, I chalad dinra mide.
Haibo lad aribo gase Iniu mai khat lamdi chap lakge;
Iniu mai khat khugadi aratbo dinlakge.
I aratsi makge, Iniu aratbo dinsai,
Tingwang niu atu sajai pikhai nuangmi sulo.
Job yo, tuhoira, Iniu dinrabo lad hai nking mawi khailo.
Iniu maningbose dinra kaden lude.
Aladkeng hina hai paling siakbo-e, khatdi Iniu majibose dinbo-e.
Tingwang hiupuina siniu atu damlujiu aringting hai pikhaibo-e.
Nangniu arikhai nibose kadenlujiu ngamdiuthen atu paokak khailo.
Nang, I hai Tingwang mikphuiga nchambo-e,
ania haitu taniang gasu dambo-e.
Sijengniu nang atu pingra ha-e; Iniu natu ngamson lakge.
Nangniu tuhoi dinbo, Iniu chiulubo sira hai-e,
“I akhui amao ha-e, I wakhatdi kamaobo kammakge.
Ira achun-ara thiu makge, khatdi nuan gasu khenrang thiubo mai-e.
Chiudi Tingwang niu atu atungra kambo-e;
khatdi paniu atu mikremai khattu kumjiu kambo-e.
Paniu aphi hai chagiriangniu ratlujiu amalai hinase phui bambo-e.”
Chiudi Iniu nakhuga dinbo-e, Job yo, nang mao mide.
Tingwang haira chamaina hina suang dibo-e.
Mai khatniu suini makjiu dinbo situ, paokak khai makge chiujiu
nangniu Tingwang tu dechiu din masajiulo?
Tingwang niu dinlan-lanjiu bamdi, pachamtu lukhaimak bambo-e.
Maidungniu nchun jipjing mibo tingga paliu mang lamsu,
khatdi madungao gasu Tingwang niu dinkhai bambo-e.
Paniu dinbose paliuniu nkingra kamkhaibo-e,
sichiujiu paniu kachan khaiboga paliu ping-e.
Paliu nuan kamta mira Tingwang niu paliu khuga dinkhai-e,
sichiujiu paliuniu chaliang mirabo gasu paliutu gukhai-e.
Paniu paliutu kam mahami lakge, kashaibo gasu paliutu gukhai-e.
Chamaina pumga Tingwang niu thiuniubo langkhaijiu kam majikhai-e.
Kamarabo mai siniu wa tiukanibo hamijiu
tiuwi thubo tatek sidi paning malimi-e.
Papum hai sakiujiu, paraku ronna mi-e,
Sichiujiu charuidih lam tadra nawang mi-e.
Tingwang gu maza sang-sang bambo ruanggasu
khatniu wangjiu pagu ngiudonse pi maningtao khaijiu patu nkha khai-e.
maza siniu lungsajiu din-e, “Patu phutkhai bilo!
Patu charuidihga pi tadkhai tulo, khenrang thiura haiga paman bamme.”
Pase wilanjiu, chabonmai kum tankhang lan-e;
sichiujiu parathoise Tingwang niu paokak khai-e;
siga pachun wijiu Tingwang tu kahumra wahina kam majikhai lanbi-e.
Paniu mathiu ruangga haichiu din-e, “Iniu nuan kammide.
Majibose Iniu kam makge, chiudi Tingwang niu atu phutkhai bibo-e.
Iniu charuidihga tadmirabo gasu paniu atu gukhai bijiu I ringbambo-e.”
Tingwang niu pakhiangna haise kamkhai lan-lanjiu bambo-e;
paniu mai khat ringtingse gukhai lujiu chunwibose patu pikhaibi-e.
Tuhoira, Job yo, Iniu dinbambo lad hai maliumakjiu nking khailo.
Chiudi nangniu wa dinra bamsai, I nking mataine,
nang maji-e chiubo I suine.
Chiudi wa dinra hasai maliumakjiu alad hai nking khailo,
dechiujiu ningting ralo chiubo Iniu natu katikhai bine.
Naliu hai wajiukha ningtingmai khatdi khaotimai-e,
chiudi Iniu kadinbo lad hai nking khailo.
Tiu kawibo tatekse machanbo gasu silu-e,
chiudi ningtingbo chamsira naliuniu chiulubo gasu makge.
Haisira aliuniu kadarabo gu-e.
Para pakhui pamao ha-e, chiudi majibo ladjanse
Tingwang niu pikhai makge chiujiu Job niu din bamme.
Paniu din-e, “Dechiujiu I arat dinralo, khatdi dechiujiu I mao ralo?
I hai ajam masajiu ajam mide, chiudi I nuan phungmakge.”
Wadao khatra Job kumbo mai haitu naliu ngao mataima?
Tingwang tu paniu wadi chakhuang thiu makge.
Paniu kasamaitu maluangni-e, khatdi nuan phungmaitu maluang tadle.
Tingwang maning kamra matan bambo hai wadi kawi kamlu makge chiujiu paniu din-e.
Wa kasimaidung yo, alad hai nking khailo!
Ngamkambo Tingwang siniu kamaobo kam rama?
Chamaina tienkam saisuijiu paniu tathuon pibo-e,
khatdi paliu ngamkam saisuijiu paliu phizeng pibo-e.
Ngamkambo Tingwang niu kasabo kam lakge;
paniu wadaodi mai khattudi kammao khai makge.
Tingwang niu mai khat khugasu pumtan khengbo bamma?
Patu mai khatniu kadihpiri haitu phuikhaira pikhai jiuma?
Tingwang niu karingbo siuthi hai luthon misai,
karingbo mai siniu shaijiu taniang gase malan wangmi rabo-e.
Naliu ningting-e sai, tuhoira nking khailo.
Tacheng matipbo Rawang situ naliuniu ladjanthiu rama?
Paniu majibo situ mareng-e chiujiu naliu maning jiuma?
Chawangdung nai mawangpaodungse pageng hamiboga maksai samiboga
Tingwang niu paliutu ladjan thiu-e.
Paniu mawangpaodung lam chapson makge,
maksai kalekwimai lam ponjiu kaleksamaitu atungmi makge;
palamra paniu mai hinatu damkhaibo-e.
Simakjingjiu mai khatse nchun shaimidi sui-e.
Tingwang niu kakhiu khaiboga paliu hamibo-e;
pumtan kabammai situ paniu wadi kam makjiu gimi-e.
Maidunggu phikem hinase paniu phui bamme.
Nuan phungmainiu Tingwang suangga nbailura tamiu jubo bam ha-e.
Tingwang niu chamaitu ladjan thiura pating dakkhai sonra pageng ha-e.
Paniu jupaodung situ lupad lujiu, malin lanra wadi phui sonra pageng ha-e.
Palamra paliuniu kambambose paniu si-e,
paliutu nchun malod khat gasu ngamlujiu niakpet lubui-e.
Paniu nuan phungmai situ mathiu masuangga sajai pikhai-e.
Paliuniu pasai suimakjiu khatdi pagu chamtantu lukhai makbo jengniu-e.
Paliuniu lunglakmai situ Tingwang khuga pi kapkhaira manomjiu kamme,
sichiujiu paliuniu nkha khaira khengbo khuanse paniu chiukhai-e.
Tingwang niu wakhatdi kammakra palung chap misai,
mai khatniudi patu khansi lakge.
Paniu pazuse nbai misai, chamaina hai mathakhu tarabo-e.
Charatu simak mainiu mawangjiu kam masa bambose
jatdung siniu wadi kamlu lakge.
Job yo, nangniu Tingwang khuga na-nuanse paomadu padlujiu,
nuanse kamlanta mira ladriat thiulu dama?
Na-nuanse madu khaira Tingwang khuga khenglu dama?
Sichiujiu kasabose kamta mira nalung chaplu dama?
Tingwang niu kambose suimak lujiu, nangniu lunibose agunjiu ma?
Kadarabo hai Iniu makge, nangniu kadarabo-e,
tuhoira nangniu maningbose aliu khuga dinkhailo.
Job niu dinbo hinase pachun thiumakbo gasu-e;
paniu kadinbo haise mathaku-e chiujiu pachun kathiumai hina suikam rabo-e,
khatdi alad kachiumai hinaniu din rabo-e.
Job niu kadinbo hina hai maning matailo;
kasabopiu kumjiu pah chalad dinbamme chiubo naliu silubui-e.
Pa-nuan riga kadin piumakjiu atungboguse paniu khaisanjiu bamme;
aliu mathiu masuangga Tingwang tu paniu nuimenjiu bamme.
Job yo, Tingwang masuangga namao ha-e
chiujiu nangniu dinbo hai maji makge,
maksai, “Anuan hainiu, dechiu natu kam masajiulo?
Nuan kam makbo gasu Iniu degu genglu ralo?”
chiujiu Tingwang khuga maniubo hai maji makge.
Iniu natu khatdi nakahmaitu paokak rabo-e.
Tingpuk haitu phuikhai matailo! Kamuang hai dejiukha kulo!
Nangniu nuan kam bamdi, Tingwang khuga wa kasa ha-e.
Nangniu kamaobo hai kengkha kam bamdi,
sise pakhuga kamaobo bam jiuma?
Nangniu haijiukha tacheng matipbo jengniu Tingwang tu nkha bam jiuma?
Nakhuga Tingwang leng gengrabo wat wakhatdi ha-e.
Na-nuan jengniu nakahmaitu kam chariu khaibo-e,
khatdi kawi kambo siniu patu nkha khaibo-e.
Maidungtu kam mathadboga paliuniu kap marung-e;
maidungniu paliutu gukhaira paliuniu kheng-e.
Paliugu tamiuthubo wan-ga paliu chun pikhaira,
paliutu Dampao, Tingwang khuga paliu mariwang makge.
Chakhao, thingna suang ningtingra aliutu damkhaibo,
Tingwang khuga paliu mariwang makge.
Paliuniu nkha khaira kheng-e, chiudi Tingwang niu paokakkhai makge,
palamra paliu hai chaliang-e khatdi sa-e.
Paliuniu kapjiu bambo hai Ngamkambo Tingwang niu
phuikhai makge, maksai chiukhai makge.
Job yo, Tingwang tu nang ngaolu makge chiujiu din-e,
chiudi koina ginsi lulo; nathu-narase pasuangga bamme.
Tingwang niu nuantu wajeng simakge,
khatdi sajai pimakge chiujiu nang maning-e.
Nangniu chamlamjiu din bambo hai matha-e;
nangniu dinjiu bambo hai pachangjiu nang sitang makge.
Tingwang sung thiujiu Iniu dinbo haise khengsijiu
khatdi koina nking mawi khailo.
Atu Dampao, Tingwang hai maji-e chiubo lenra,
agu ningting hai keng bamme, Iniu kasibose Iniu din-e.
Iniu nakhuga dinbo hai wakhatdi kamaobo ha-e;
Pachangsiakjiu ningtingbo piutu namasuangga nangniu ngao-e.
Tingwang hai dejiukha tanlo! Para mai khattudi khan makge;
khatdi para simakbo wakhatdi ha-e.
Paniu nuan phungmaitu pijiu ringkhai makge,
khatdi lunglak maileng pawan machang majibose kamkhai-e.
Tacheng matipmaitu paniu gukhaibi-e;
chawangdung kumjiu mawangra suikhaibi-e,
sichiujiu tingtheng chakhuang thiukhaibi-e.
Maidungtu chagiriangniu ratman khaibo sira,
paliuniu kamaobo kam mibo jengniu-e.
Tingwang niu paliu nuan nai paliu chaliang thiubo situ lenkhaibo-e.
Paniu kachan khaibo situ chiulujiu kasabo gasu mari luraleng-e.
Paliuniu Tingwang kadin piujiu khatdi patu akhijiu bamsai,
paliuniu agi-manaijiu khatdi disujiu lungrabo-e.
Sichiu maksai, paliu chun thiumakjiu paliu shai rabo-e,
sichiujiu charuidihgu singgiuse kenjiu tadmi rabo-e.
Charatu simakmai sira paliu lung pomjiu bambo-e,
sichiujiu paliutu sajai pikhai bamdi paliutu nkha khaira kheng makge.
Kamangambo siniu phuilujiu chabon tingga paliu shaimi-e.
Chamainatu thiuniubo gasu Tingwang niu paliu mik pirak khai-e,
sichiujiu magenthiu chariubo gasu wa katikhai-e,
Magenthiubo chariubo gasu Tingwang niu natu pi amankhai-e;
khatdi nakuangkaise tiu kawibo tiutek siniu pi phuikhai-e.
Chiudi tuhoira nangniu daobuibo saisuijiu sajaise pikhai bambo-e.
Tanim siniu natu sonmi makra ningting lulo,
maksai kalek wibo siniu natu jumaomi makra phui lulo.
Nangniu kapjiu bambose wadi pageng ha-e;
tuhoira nagu pumtanniu nkhakhai ngamlak mide.
Jat hina harabo nchun situ ramgunta sulo.
Kasabo gasu mari lura kadenlu sulo;
nagu thiuniubo gasu mari lura haise nakhuga langwangbo-e.
Tingwang pumtan hai dejiukha dilo chiubo maningtao lulo;
pahai katipao mathiu suang di-nkiu-e.
Mai khatniudi Tingwang tu wakamra katikhai silakge;
maksai kasa kambo jengniu patu khansi lakge.
Paniu kamkhaibo jengniu pawan machang patu thuonjiu bambo-e;
nangdi patu thuonsiak rabo-e.
Paniu kam khaibo hinase mai hina ngao bamme,
chiudi haise mai khat niudi sitang makge.
Paken kadibose aliuniu masanjiu singam lakge,
maksai pagu tingkum riakse chak silakge.
Kadih gasu tadui ponkhang lujiu tingriu leng
kam kalikhaibo hai Tingwang niu-e.
Paniu kamuong gasu pi tingriu khaijiu kajikdui pikhai-e.
Tingwang niu bambo tingpukga kamuong siniu dechiu malailo,
maksai tingsimse dechiujiu pakhuan padbamlo chiubo mai khatniudi simakge.
Tingpuk pakhiangna riga hengri kalik khai-e,
chiudi duipuising sira tamiujiu bamme.
Haichiujiu paniu chamaina leng katiu kasakse
mali-malanjiu pikhaibo donniu ring bambo-e.
Hengri kalikbo situ pabenniu minjiu bambo-e,
khatdi paniu majonbo situ meng rottao khai-e.
Tingsim siniu tingthung wangkin-e chiubo pisikhai-e,
sise wangkinne chiubo khaoringdung siniu si-e.
Tingthung siniu alungchun haitu kengkha kam chariu
khai-e.
Tingwang khuan haitu, naliu mathiu nking khailo,
pamun gasu padbo tingsim khuan haitu.
Paniu tingpukga pake khat gasu pake hinaga
pijiu hengri haise kalik khai-e.
Paniu makiak marabo tingsim khuanse khatdi pakendigu
hengri kalik khaibo gasu pakhuanse chiu-e.
Aliuniu sitang lumakbo maisuang habose
Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaiboga padmi-e.
Paniu kabun situ kadihga pijiu kiura chamtan pi-e,
sichiujiu nbung-duidetse paniu langkhai-e.
Pagu tienkamse paniu lenkhaijiu chamaina ngamse pisao khai-e;
Nkan khaoring siniu paliu kylam wangmi-e.
Tingthung tingkaise tingrun lamsu wang-e,
khatdi agichang-agibo tingkaise tingpi lamsu wang-e.
Tingwang siu siniu tadui hai machingkiujiu kabunkang mawimi-e.
Tingwang chunning gasu kamuongjiu gase hengri pi kalik khai-e,
Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaibo hinase kadihpiri pabam hinaga paliuniu kamkhai-e.
Tingwang niu kadihpiritu tadui kajin khaira pijiu tingriu khai-e;
paniu chamainatu sajai pikhaira maksai palungsiatse lenkhaira paniu langkhai-e.
Job yo, malod khat makum khailo khatdi nking khailo;
Tingwang niu maisuang habo kamkhaibo hai makum khailo.
Tingwang niu pagu chamtanse dechiujiu pikhailo,
khatdi kamuongjiu gasu dechiujiu hengri kalik khailo chiubo nang sima?
Tingpukga kamuangse dechiujiu kenbam jiulo chiubo
Tingwang gu maisuang habo ningting bensiamse nang sima?
Makge, tingrun lamgu tingkai siniu kadih haitu mathad khaibo gasu nangra sibo-e.
Tingpuk situ juden padlujiu tataagi kum, tha-masan padbo gase
nangniu Tingwang tu nkhalu buima?
Tingwang khuga dinrabose aliu khuga katikhailo,
aliura wadi maningpad makge; aliura wadi dinra ha-e.
Ira Tingwang tu npaora kheng lakge,
deleng atu kam maha mira Iniu pawan piralo?
Tuhoira tingpukse pagu nbiuniu bensat bamme,
sisetu aliuniu phuira aliu mik magan-ju-e;
sichiujiu tingpuk haitu tingkai siniu hun masan khaijiu bamme.
Tingpi lamsu kachia nbiu kabenbose ngao-e,
sichiujiu Tingwang gu kendi siniu aliutu pijiu manang khai-e.
Tingwang gu pumtan hai dichang di-e,
siniu aliu pakhuga wangmana silu lakge, para pacheng matipbo-e
sijengniu chamainatu akhi bambo hai majibo-e.
Sichiusai mai hinaniu patu pingjiu bambo hai maisuang habo makge,
paronna ningting-e chiujiu bammai situ paniu wajeng sikhai makge.
Siga tingthung gasu
Wadi simakbo, mathakhu lad gasu
agu ningtingtu arijiu bambo nang saolo?
Npiumai khat kumjiu tuhoi suchap lujiu,
Iniu nakhuga maniubo hai paokak khailo.
Iniu kadihtu dambo tingga nang bamniubo ma?
Nangniu sijiukha sibam sai akhuga dinkhailo.
Haise delangkha ralo chiubo saoniu marangkhai jiulo?
Madatbo riangse saoniu jukhai jiulo?
Pakhiangna hai paokak khaira nang sima?
Kadihtu tungman bambo katiang situ saoniu thinman bamjiulo?
Kadihpirigu kamik-tiangse saoniu somkhai jiulo?
Nsuan tingbenpad suraga tinggen mazadung siniu
chunwi ringajiu makiak mara bamme, khatdi chagandung chalui thiu-e.
Kadihpiri lungsing gasu tadui pinpad rabo gasu
saoniu duipuigu rengmun situ kham khai jiulo?
Duipui situ kamuangniu sungkhaibo
khatdi tamiubo siniu gomkhaibo hai Iniu-e.
Iniu duipuigu ramraise retkhai lujiu rengmunse khamten khaibo-e.
Iniu din-e, “Sigasu nkiu makbo siga tangbo,
nagu katanbo duiliuse saokhai rabo-e.”
Job yo, nagu ringtingga tingmik khattu
nsuan padra nangniu chamtan pikhaibo bamma?
Kabenbo siniu kadihpiritu minlujiu,
kasamai situ paliu nbaibam gasu ju kanuk khaira,
wadao khatra nang chamtan pikhaibo bamma?
N-nien siniu ramluong nai ramjeng situ chafai kadip khaibo kum,
chagam riga masan siakjiu madan pikhai-e.
Kasamai lengra n-nien tingse benju-e
siniu paliugu kasabo tienkam gasu khammi-e.
Duipui rok gase nang meng matai mima?
Duinai rigase nang tad matai mima?
Charuidih gu tamiubo rengmuntu akhejiu bambose
mai khatniu natu lenkhaibo bamma?
Kadihpiri hai dejiukha dilo chiubo nang sima?
Si-e chiusai, atu paokak khailo.
Kabenbo nbiuse delamsu wanglo,
maksai tamiubo phibangse nang sima?
Paliuniu dethengkha tad madiu ralo chiubo,
maksai dechiu malanwang ralo chiubo
paliutu nang langkhai ngamma?
Kadihpiri kadambo wanse nang sibam sune chiubo I malumme,
palamra nang hai tanpaosui mide!
Iniu kabun nai kachaktu baikhaibo bamse
wadao khatra nang phuikhai matai mima?
Iniu paliutu magenthiu chariubo tingga
khatdi tathiu-chari tingga thinra kaden lujiu baikhai nbambo-e.
Naimikse debo bam gasu padlo chiubo,
maksai tingbang lamgu tingkai wangbo bam gase
nang mengtang mataimi dama?
Tingriu kiusai nbungdui luangra, khatdi tingthung tingkainiu tadra
npuise saoniu kamkhai gulo?
Mai khatnadi lungmakbo bam gase saoniu tingriu khai jiulo?
Kasangbo nai charibo kadih gase saoniu tadui kajin khaijiu,
piubuandung situ pi puakkhang khai jiulo?
Tingriu nai kajikduitu lungbo piu bamma?
Saose kabun nai bunku puilo?
Sichiujiu tadui situ pi tatu mawikhaijiu
duipui maga maching khaibo hai saoniulo?
Chagan baodung situ nang khin aruanglu buima?
maksai Kachakiliu situ kam maralu buima?
Chagandung situ nangniu pating pawan saisuijiu
jukhailu buima?
Maksai Ganbiu nai Ganna situ siokhailu buima?
Tingpuk tu mawangbo chengse nang sima?
khatdi sibo chengse kadihpiriga nang thinpiulu buima?
Nangniu kamuang khuga chamtan senjiu
pi tingriu khai ngamma?
Nangniu hengri situ kalik khaira chamtan pikhai sai
sise nakhuga wangjiu, “Nangniu kadinbo kamne chiujiu din suma?”
Nile giukise diwang kinne chiujiu saoniu Ibis
Maksai tingriu wangkinne chiujiu maruireng khuga saoniu dinkhai jiulo?
Saogu ningtingniu kamuang situ pariak chaklujiu
tingriu kiusa tatien pithiu khai jiulo,
sichiujiu tingriu siniu tabut situ pitankhai jiulo?
Ndongquidung siniu paliu renglungga nbaijiu bamboga,
khatdi papoidung siniu paliu sipga madunjiu bamboga,
nangniu paliu tatekleng phiulujiu paliu won-giu pikhailu buima?
N-gekdung
papoidung siniu akhuga katiu khengboga paliutu saoniu katiu pikhai jiulo?
Ramluongga bambo chahungniu dedao piangralo,
nang sima?
Tathan piangbo nang ngaoma?
Dethengga paliu won phunglo chiubo nang sima?
Paliuniu piangrabo pating-pawanse nang sima?
Paliu dekumbo wan-ga kadihga marungkiujiu
dekumbo wan-ga,piangralo chiubo nang sima?
Manamjiuga paliu poi tankhang lujiu tadmi-e,
sichiujiu paliu malanwang makge.
Chahungtu saoniu khenrang pithiu khai jiulo?
Paliutu saoniu khikhai bijiu tadronpon kinjiulo?
Ramjinggu piubuan kawibo kajaikhun gase lungjiu
paliu ky thiura Iniu pikhaibo-e.
Chakhuan kariobo namdi gasu paliu diujiu lung-e,
sichiujiu mai khatniudi paliutu hiamlujiu tatien thiuson makge.
Maluonggense paliutu pitiu khaibo bamme,
paliuniu madiakbo piubuan hinase phiu tiu-e.
Charatomchi siniu naleng tatien thiukhaibi suma?
Nagu khaorui kygase nchun khat jikhaira paniu suikhai suma?
Nangniu patu chariangniu khinlujiu chalu tien thiulu buima?
Maksai patuse naluga kabui-kaise pi jukhai ngamma?
Pagu pumtan gase nang mangiu khai ngamma?
Nagu kakungbo ngamse paniu kamkhai bira malum jiuma?
Nangniu atiatbo gase nagu asaiphungga tasiuse
patu pijiu ponwang khai ngamma?
Ruidi siniu dejiuga majadjiu pakan kaphap lulo!
Chiudi taduirui kumjiu para lenngam lakge.
Ruidi siniu kadih-siu kalumbo gasu gomra kadihga nbum khai-e.
Chamainiu maksai nkan khaoniu taopang mira para wadi manang makge.
Pabum situ pagu makbo kumjiu para lu-e,
sichiujiu pajeng-ha situ waleng chakkhai makge.
Patu ningting pikhai makbo khatdi kammeng khaibo hai Iniu-e.
Chiudi paniu paksu dasai, chaqon tudi, katuangmai hina tudi para nui-e.
Job yo, chaqontu haijiuga pi tankhaibose nangniu ma?
Paliu mihbon hai nangniu pikhai jiuma?
Takaodung kumjiu pi machak khaibo hai nangniu ma?
Paliuniu tasiboga chamainatu kamlop khaibo hai nangniu ma?
Ramjeng gase paliulai padjiu pak bamme,
chari kambo gase paliu laisang padjiu pak bamme.
Kapingbo rambase paliu simakge,
chaheng siniu paliutu pijiu malan khai makge.
Paliutu tuangkinmai siniu paliu heng-ngiu thin lujiu
naimik nbiu gase juang karok-rokjiu, paliu heng-ngiuse kathonjiu bamme.
Makese mudkhaiboga chapman lulakjiu paliu chun wijiu maju karen bamme.
Makese mud machang paliu marajiu bamme;
paliuniu chari bamse mengboga parimse si-e,
jupaodung siniu chamtan senbose paliu si-e.
Takaoleng siniu lenra pakan kaphingpad lujiu
tingrunlam lenkhaira nakhuga len ali jiuma?
Lengreng siniu maluonggen kakuga pasip ponra
nagu chamtan situ khuan jiuma?
Paniu kuthubo chakhao gase pasip ponne,
khatdi pamun liangbo tukang siniu parireng kamme.
Sibo bam gasu paniu kanagadi-kadiugadi,
wakhaotu kamshat lujiu tiura phuijiu bamme.
Wakhao phaw gase kalengdung wang madui bamme,
papoidung siniu sibo zaise sakjiu bamme.
Job yo, nangniu Ngamkambo Rawang tu
atungjiu bam rama?
Tuhoira nang paokak rama maksai taralo?
Iniu degu paokak ralo? Wakhatdi dinta mine.
Iniu dinrabo suang nkiujiu I din mide.
Sigasu tingthung jiugasu
Tuhoira npiumai khat kumjiu chapkhang lujiu,
Iniu maniubo hai paokak matailo.
I maji makge chiujiu dinlen khaini jiuma? Nang maji-e chiujiu ma?
Nang hai akumjiu tanbo ma?
Akhuan kumjiu nang makiak mara kasinlu buima?
Sichiu ngamsai kendibo nai pumtan siniu
napuan thiulujiu, khatdi chakhuang thiujiu chapkhang matailo.
Wasao thiujiu bammai rigase nagu lungpomse
runkiu khaijiu paliutu kam manon khailo.
Yo, kasamai situ paliu chapbam gasu
tunkiu lujiu ju manakiu khailo.
Paliutu ratlujiu charuidihga baikhai milo.
Sichiusai Iniu natu thuon raithu rabo-e,
charise nangniu ngamlude chiujiu suikhai rabo-e.
Khaoring Behemoth
para matom kumjiu chapiu tagi-e; Iniu patudi natudi damkhaibo-e.
Pakhuga bambo pumtan hai dejiukha tanlo!
Maksai patiakang gase dejiukha pumtan bamlo?
Pamise magabang kumjiu suchap bamme,
sichiujiu pangen-ga bambo tiase tanne.
Para hai chagi kumjiu tanne,
khatdi pangen hai chagitang kumme.
Agu gandam gasu pahai maisuang kahabo khaoring-e!
Patu Dampao ronna patu ngambo-e.
Nkan khaodungniu mathenjiu bambo luong gase
patu pi dikhangra piubuanse guikhai-e.
Paniu tathuphe jiugase ji-e, khatdi ndiujiu chapiujiuga paniu nbai-e.
Singgiu mung chapiujiuga khatdi tathuphe siniu patu jubaijiu pa-nbaibam thiu-e.
Singgiuse dimalipum bambotu para ping makge;
Jordan giu siniu pazuga luangphen bambo situ para wajengdi chakkhai makge.
Saoniu pazu domlujiu patu min ngamlu ralo?
Maksai saoniu patu tathak gasu manlujiu paniuse raolu ralo?
Maksai palee situ chariang khoilujiu ratlu buima?
Nangniu paniuse raolu buima?
Maksai pa-chamtanse chariangniu ratlu buima?
Paniu tadraleng nakhuga chamtan lurama?
Patu chalungsa khaira nakhuga kheng rama?
Paniu tingtheng natu akhi khaine chiujiu
ladrian thiujiu chamsiang kamkhai rama?
Makod bambo thingnatu kumjiu patu khinlujiu
navangpuidung chun pi wikhai lubuima?
Chakha minmai siniu patu chali thiulu buima?
Alimai siniu patu dantap-tap lujiu jonlu buima?
Nangniu pagu nbaikyse madatlujiu papeese
chakha phenbo ngiu siniu phenlu buima?
Malod khat patu thin mara matailo,
sichiusai nangniu wadaodi thinlan huta mine,
patu aphenbo haitu wadaodi mangaita mine!
Mantage situ ngaomai hina paliu hot hamijiu
kadihga nkhuangkiu mi-e.
Palung pomsu dasai, palungpomse sa-e,
mai khatniudi pasuangga chap-hu makge.
Saoniu patu aphen lujiu, manangmak taralo?
Kadihga lungmai khatniudi patu aphen silakge.
Mantage ngen lamga Iniu nakhuga din bine;
pahai dejiukha dilo khatdi tanlo.
Mai khatniudi pagise gaosi lakge,
mai khatniudi paripuanse phen taronlu lakge.
Sao khatniu pa-chamtanse phetpad lujiu
pahiu khap khai ngamlu ralo?
Pating hai chageedungniu tason khai nbamme,
sise tatu kum tanbo-e.
Paliu hai khai tamanted nbamme,
sibo kakga asiudi thipad lulakge.
Haise khai tamanted bambo jengniu
mai khat niudi ju npek silu lakge.
Paniu tasiboga hengri kalik padle,
pamik hai padkinbo naimik kum thaoban satle.
Pamun gasu chami padle, khatdi chamirang giuse padle.
Paniuki gasu mikhut padle,
sise chapiubuan thinlujiu karungtu kasubo kumme.
Pasiu siniu chami taopadle, pamun gasu chamipuangse padle.
Pawongchengse tanchang tanne,
sijengniu patu adaomai hina pingchang ping-e.
Pagi gase wakhatdi achop-ropbo bam ha-e;
sise chagi kum maniang-e khatdi tanne.
Tatukang kumjiu pakhuga kapingbo ha-e,
tasiu kaniakbo tukang kumjiu maniang-e khatdi tanne.
Paniu chapsuboga, tanthubo maidi charen-e,
kapingbo siniu paliu wadi kamlu makge.
Patu kam ajam khaira chaheng,changiu, tavaithu,
maksai mania wakhatnadi ha-e.
Chagise palengra magaoreng kum manonne,
khatdi tataagise marenmibo sing kumme.
Tavaithu khatniudi patu hapak silakge;
tatuniu patu phenbo hai, magaorengniu kaphenbo kumme.
Palengra changiu muise magaoreng kum-e,
maidungniu patu changiu phenbose paniu nui-e.
Pawon gihai chalee lang maliang kalubo kum liang-e,
asaiphunggu talingkang kumjiu chagamniangdih situ kamtap-tap mi-e.
Duipui situ paniu tadui langta khangbo kumjiu kariu aja khai-e,
wasa litu kumjiu pata lang kala khai-e.
Duipui situ pijiu pata pipad khaijiu
pasaiga pi benkhaijiu pa npuileng thiu khai-e.
Kadihpiriga patu kadara wakhatdi ha-e;
para wakhat tudi pingmakbo khao-e.
Chaliang thubo khaoring situ para wajeng chakkhai makge;
para nkan khaoring hinagu chawang-e.
Siga Job niu
nangniu machunbo hinase nangra kam ngamme.
Wadi simakbo Iniu nagu ningting situ
dechiu maniuhu ralo chiujiu nangniu din-e.
Iniu wadi simakbo lamga din mide,
Iniu si-ngam lakbo lamga Iniu tia-mide.
Nangniu dinbo tingga atu nkinglo
khatdi nangniu maniubose paokak khailo chiujiu din-e.
Karai gara mainiu akhuga dinbo ronna I sibamniu-e,
chiudi tuhoira amiksiakniu natu ngaolude.
Iniu dinmibo jengniu mangambo siniu tabut nai tabuijiuga kalajiu alung limide.

Tuhoira kabuichi chinnia, khatdi kamichi chinnia Job khuga juwang lujiu naliu jengniu chara thiukhailo. Job niu naliuleng kakheng thiukhai bine, sichiujiu Iniu parathoise chiukhaijiu, naliuniu daobuibo mangambose pikhai lakge. Paniu dinbo kumjiu naliura alamga majibose dinmakge.”
Sichiujiu Job niu pakamai khangsum leng kakheng thiukhai bibo saiga,
Job singnamai hina, patan-paliu hina khatdi karaiga pakamai hinaniu wangjiu patu phui-e, sichiujiu paliuniu patu majang lujiu pakyga changee nchamme. Pariga
Paniu npiumainah khang chinnia khatdi npuimainah khangsum lunglande.
Paniu tingthubo nahpui situ Jemimah, niabo puitu Keziah, khatdi nathubo pui situ Keren Happuch,
Kadihpiriga, Job nahpuidung kumjiu pazu palun kawimai ha-e. Paliu piuniu panahpuidung lengdi paliu singnapiudung leng kumjiu kalekdi njankhai bi-e.
Haibosai Job niu takum kaikhat-je-atai ringkhang-e, sichiujiu patahdung khatdi tutan kanabodi, kadiubodi ngaolu-e.
Sichiujiu Job niu tanpaosui lujiu shai mide.
Kasamainiu ladtikhaibo lukhai makjiu,
nuan phungmaidungtu ali makjiu, maksai
Tingwang leng pageng hamaitu maluang makbo maidungse san wi-e.
Sibo sung paliuniu nchun n-nien saomakjiu,
sichiujiu pawan gapboga pasy masine,
khatdi panui ntang makjiu bamrabo-e.
Paliuniu kambo hina tathui lurabo-e.
Chiudi kasamaidung sira haichiu makge;
paliura magaorengtu tingkainiu hunthon mibo kumme.
Nuan phungmai situ Tingwang niu ladjan thiune,
khatdi pamaidung khugasu lupad mine.
chiudi kasamai sira lung mahami rabo-e.
Maidungniu deleng mathagu rangkin gulo?
Paliu wangdung siniu kasa rang-e,
paliugu mawang paodung siniu
khatdi paniu kadakhaibo wang situ atung-e.
Paliuniu din-e, “Aliuniu paliu wang khugasu khenrang thiu mikhe;
paliu pumtan hangga bamta mikhe.”
Tinggen pawangbam gasu
khatdi paliugu kasabo tenrang situ kaga bamme.
Palung pomjiu paniu paliutu rukhaijiu khatdi laddinjiu bamme.
Paniu din-e, “Agu masanbo Zion luang gasu Iniu awang pithiu khai mide.”
Paniu akhuga din-e, ‘Nang hai anahpiu si-e, thainai Iniu napiu thiu mide.
Khenglo, kadihpiriga bambo jat hinatu
nagu thiura Iniu naleng pikhai bine.
nangniu paliutu taniangli kumjiu kampang paroi mine.’”
Tuhoira, chawangdung, alad nking khailo;
kadihpiri mawang paodung, haise kati lulo:
khatdi pakhuga pingjiu makhum kiulo.
Palung pom susai naliu shailune,
palamra palung pom hai majadle.
Pakhuga nbai khaira wangmaise pasan wi-e.
atu ngaokhai lakmai kengjiu bamme.
“Patu Tingwang niu nkhakhai lakge,
chiujiu paliuniu alamga dinjiu bamme.”
Chiudi
nangniu ahot pikhaijiu chari ngamkhai-e.
Nkha khaira
pagu masanbo luongbut gasu atu paokak khai-e.
Iniu nchun katheng-kadun jijiu bamdi,
Atu pake machang chap magui bammai,
mikremai sang-sang situ Ira ping makge.
Amikremai hinatu nangniu mathad khailo,
atu wakasa kam makra, paliutu phutkhai milo.
Chari ngambose
paniu pamaidungtu thoikhai bilo.
Atu gukhaipao, Tingwang yo,
Iniu kuboga atu paokak khailo!
Iniu chariu-magen thiubo tingga,
atu khakhaira nang wangkhai-e.
Tuhoidi atu lungsajiu athoi chiukhailo!
Chamainadung, naliuniu atu dethengkha
kam mangam bamralo?
Pageng habo situ naliuniu kungjiu,
dethengkha maji makbo saisui tadbam ralo?
Tacheng matipmaitu,
kadakhai mibotu maningtao khailo,
sichiujiu Iniu patu kuboga, paniu alad chiu khaibi-e.
haibo lamga naronna naziga maliu makjiu makum mawi lulo.
Majibo rathakse
patu malum lulo.
thoidamse kengjiu pikhailo!”
chiujiu khengmai keng bamme.
Nangniu atu pikhaibo ringabo sira,
katiu kasak kengjiu bammai suangdi nkiu-e.
Iniu kalakiu gapda aman saijiu jitadmi-e;
khatdi asiuthidi nking khailo.
A-Rawang yo, khatdi Awangpiu yo,
Iniu khengbo hai nking khailo!
Nsuan susai akhuan nking khailo;
naimik padsai, rathak kadkhai sune,
nangniu paokak khaira I khuan bamne.
Nangra kamao kammaitu masenbo Rawang makge!
Nasuangga kasabo situ suikhai makge.
Nasuang ga tasaothiumai chapngam makge;
kasamai hinatu nangra mareng-e.
Aratmai, lungpom kasamai khatdi sontiumai hinatu,
nangniu kam mahami rabo-e.
Nagu lungsiat kadi jengniu nakyga I wang lune;
naky masanboga I ngut kahum lune,
khatdi chakhuang thiujiu makhumkiu lune.
nachun kamra atu jukhailo,
nasai suira aleng npuise kam mala khailo.
paliura kam mahara ronna machunne;
paliu ladkeng sira aratle khatdi ani-e, khatdi shaibuibo siam siniu phui-e.
Tingwang yo, paliutu ladjan thiukhailo khatdi sajai pikhailo;
paliu thak gasu paliutu pijiu manmi sulo; nakhu gasu paliutu hathon milo,
palamra paliu nuanse kengju mide, khatdi paliuniu natu suini makge.
Chiudi nakhuga nbaibam daolumai hina chunwi ringane;
paliuniu chunwibo luise thiusao makjiu bamne.
Natu lungsamaitu gukhailo, najengniu paliu chun wisiak bamme.
pagu lungsiat siniu chagee kumjiu gukhai bine.
Nalung pomjiu atu kam mathad khai tulo!
Atu lungsa khailo, palamra I asang mide;
atu gukhailo, palamra I ajeng hasiak mide,
alungchun pakhiangna magenthiu mide,
nalungsiat siniu kashaibo gasu atu gukhailo.
Charuidih gasu nangtu maningtao silakge;

Chiudi paliuniu sitang makhaga,

Siga
paniu atu gukhai bibo jengniu I ringa rabo-e.
Ahiuna siniu
“Nang kumbo mai khatnadi ha-e!

lunglakmaitu kam mathadjiu bammai khugasu gukhai-e!”
Iniu wadi simakbo mao bamme chiujiu

Iniu magenthiu chariubo daosai paliura chunwi-e

Paliuniu atu kam chariujiu,

Paliuniu atungbo gasu atu gukhailo;

Sichiusai maidung ruangdiga Iniu natu thuonne,

paliutu kam mahanuang mirabo-e chiubo paniu si bamme.

Chiudi kasamaira shaimi rabo-e,

palamra

Nagu tavaithu siniu atu kam ajam khaide,

Nalungpom jengniu, I asang bamme;

Anuan jaiga I kahakjiu bamme;

Apang jengniu ajamse tenjiu manamsa mide.
Akhen nbung mide, I asang mide;
marinpuiting I achung bamme.
Kakhun asangjiu I shaira kum bamme.
Atu kam masa mide khatdi asang mide,

Iniu kapjiu bambo hai nang chiu bamme.
Alungchun kabuak mide, ajeng hamide,

Azam jengniu akamai nai akiningmai, akhuga wang manata mide;
akykhunmai tangbo akhuga wangta mide.
Atu kamshat nimai siniu tathak thiukhai bamme,

I hai pakuon tidmai kum, wadi chiungam tamide,

Agu magenthak haitu agu mikremaitu pijiu miktun khai tulo,
Iniu kaomiboga paliu diu pi wikhai tulo!

Iniu kawi kambo jengniu, kasabo malan khaijiu

A-Rawang yo, akhu gasu diumi tulo!
Atu ranpao
Iniu din-e, “Iniu kambo lamga I ningting rabo-e,

I chalad khatdi din makjiu maliumak bamne,

Chiudi agu magenthakse sa-nkiu mide,

Iniu makum makengthen, chariubi-bi-e;

Dedao I shai ralo?
Agu ringtingse dedao hami ralo, chiubo dinkhailo.”
Agu ringtingse dunnakha nangniu damkhai-e!

amikre mai khugasu dekamjiu
I chariu khengbam ralo?

Hey Tingwang yo, achun wibo phibangse nang-e,
Natu thuonbo lui thiujiu chaqonmibung Iniu june.
Hey Tingwang, a-Rawang yo.
Dekamjiu haijiukha achun sabam ralo?
Dekamjiu haijiukha I magenthiu bam ralo?
Ira Tingwang tu malumjiu bamne,
atu Ranpao, a-Rawang tu thuonjiu bamne.
Nda, aliu pao-pehmai ken-ga
nangniu wa kadibo kamkhai mibose

nangniu nkengmai situ hathon lujiu,

chiudi namaidungtu pijiu disu khai-e.
Namaidungse paliu heng-ngiuniu

Nang hai a-wang khatdi a-Rawang ye;

aliugu mikremaitu aliuniu ngamlubo-e.
Atu gukhaira agu tavaipitu maksai aheng situ
Iniu malumbo makge;

Pawan machang aliuniu natu thuon bamne,
tuhoidi tingthengdi natu thuon bamne.
Chiudi tuhoira nangniu aliutu thonmibo jengniu,
aliutu kam chaliu mide;
aliu riphenmaitu majang tadkhai makge.
Nangniu aliutu mikremai khugasu pipak khaide,
sichiujiu aliu guse paliugu thiumide.
Nangniu aliutu milydung kumjiu pi kamshat khaide,
sangdiumai kadihga aliutu hamara khai mide.
Nangniu namaidungtu pageng kahabo kumjiu,
paman poinakha leng jon mide.
Nangniu aliu khuga tenkhaibose,
aliutu lung magui bambo mainiu ngaolujiu,
aliutu nuimenjiu kaga bamme.
Nangniu aliutu jatdung ruangga pijiu
khan masakhai bamme;
paliu lung pomjiu paliu pi kangumjiu bamme.
Amikre mai nai atu ngaokhailak mainiu,
atu nuimenjiu khatdi khanjiu bambo jengniu,
ka-mangambo siniu azu sajiu bamme.
Aliuniu natu mangaimak tadi,
maksai nangniu aliu khuga ladriat khaibose,
aliuniu kampang mak tadi,
haidungse aliu khuga padjiu bamme.
Aliuniu nalad majai kamakbo ha-e;
aliuniu nagu chamtan piumakbo ha-e.
Chiudi nkan khaoring khuga aliutu phutkhai mide;
nangniu tamiu thubo bamga aliutu phutkhai mide.
Aliuniu aliu Rawang tu kahum makjiu,
sangdiumai ratu kahummi bamsai,
sise nangniu sibam rabo-e,
palamra mahinbo chamaina lungchunse nang si-e.
aliutu kamshat mirabo milytu kumjiu kam bamme.
Sulo! Aliutu tingtheng phutkhai tasulo!
Dekamjiu aliu khugasu nang nbai bam ralo?
Aliugu magenthiu chariubo hai mangai khai tulo!
Aliutu kadihga kamkaokiu lujiu niakpet mide;
aliutu tabui jiuga nkhuangkiu mide.
Wangjiu aliutu nkha khailo!
Nagu saomakbo lungsiat siniu aliutu gukhailo!

Tingwang niu pawan machang natu thoikhai bide.
Kangambo wangpiu yo, nahengse khengsulo;
nangra paken pangam kadibo piu-e.
Majibo nai nchangbo lamse chapjiu,
chari ngamra tadpad sulo!
Nagu pumtan siniu naleng ridise ngam khaine!
Nagu tavaithuse liang-e,
siseniu namikre maidung malungga rirabo-e;
jatdungse naphi hangga kaokiu rabo-e.
tingtheng tingthengjiu bamrabo-e.
Nangniu namaidungtu nchangjiu mawang rabo-e.
Nangra majibo situ masenne,
khatdi kasabo situ luni-e.
Sijengniu na-Rawang, Tingwang siniu
natu kada khaibo-e,
siniu kakibo wang riga suang nkiujiu,
chunwibose nakhuga pikiu khaibo-e.
Parim kawibo chamiangrim siniu
nafai rim thiujiu bamme;
khatdi chapuang himniu thiukhaibo kygase
chalui thiumai siniu natu thuonjiu bamme.
Nagu ladjankyga bambo riliumaise
chawang nahpuidung-e,
nawangbam majatlamse chawang khenpui siniu,
withubo kachia faini piulujiu chap bamme.
Chawang khenpui yo, Iniu kadinbo nking khailo—
namaidung nai nasingna maidung situ mangai milo.
Nalunwat siniu chawangtu kami lude;
pase nawangpiu-e, sijengniu pacham majai lulo.
Tyre mai siniu naleng kalen phungwangne;
kalek wimai siniu nachun kimra kam sune.
Chawang kiningga chawang-nahpuise bamme,
pase dejiukha palun wilo!
Pah-ntiang taronbose kachianiu charui-e.
Pah-ntiang taronbose khailujiu chawang khuga
pakamainiu patu maluang wang-e,
sichiujiu pakamai tudi paniu maluang wang-e.
Paliu chunwijiu khatdi ringajiu,
chawangkiningga tad ngutle.
A-wangpiu yo, nangra napao-napeh wangdungtu
malinra nanah kengkha lungrabo-e,
khatdi nangniu paliutu kadihpiri pabam hinaga
pi mawang khai rabo-e.
Nakendi situ aluiniu tingtheng thuonjiu bamne,
tingtheng mai hina natu thuon bamrabo-e.
Tingwang hai aliu nbaiky-e khatdi pumtan-e,
chariu magenthiubo wan hinaga nkha khaira kadenjiu bamme.
Sijengniu kadihpiri kasuakjiu maluongse
duinai kasuk lam malim wangmi tadi, aliura pinglakge;
duipuise kasuakjiu mara bamdi,
kathi siniu maluongtu kanuk bamdi aliura pinglakge.
Kukachangbo masanbo ky Tingwang namdi gase,
chunwat phungwangbo singgiu khat bamme.
Sibo namdiga Tingwang bambo donniu wadaodi sise kam maha lakge;
paniu nkha khaira nsuan-kalu wangne.
Tingwang niu tingsim khaiboga, jatdungse manang mine,
chawang kadihse malai mine khatdi kadihpirise hamine.
Ngamkambo
Jacob Rawang se aliu nbaiky si-e.
Kadihpiriga maisuang habo ngam paniu kamkhaibo haise phuilo.
Paniu kadihpirigu charise khamkhai-e,
chaheng-changiuse kam maha mide, khatdi chageese ruthon mide.
Paniu din-e, “Chari thiuta sulo, kadihpiriga khatdi jatdung ruangga,
tanthubo Tingwang se I ye chiubo silo.”
Ngamkambo
Jacob Rawang se aliu nbaiky si-e.
Mai hina chunwijiu naliu ben kaphilo!
Chalui khuan katanbo siniu Tingwang tu thuonlo!
Kuthubo,
pahai kadihpiri pakhiangnatu mawang bambo
kadibo wangpiu si-e.
Maidungtu chari ngamra paniu aliu khuga pikhai-e,
paniu jatdung riga aliu tu mawangpao pithiu khai-e.
Aliuniu lungrabo kadihse paniu kadakhai bi-e,
haise paniu lungsa maigu tasao si-e.
Tingwang niu pawangbamga nkiu bamme.
chunwibo khuan nai makese mudjiu bamme!
Tingwang tu thuonbo lui thiulo;
aliu wangpiutu thuonbo lui thiulo!
Tingwang hai kadihpiri pakhiangna wangpiu-e,
chalui niu patu thuonlo!
Pagu masanbo wangbam gase Tingwang ntao bamme;
paniu jat hinatu mawang bamme.
Jatdunggu mawangpaodung nai
Abraham Rawang se wang aruang bamme.
Riphenmai pakhiangna suang para tan nkiu-e;
mai hina riga paniu mawang bamme.
pagu masanbo luang, aliu Rawang namdi.
chawang kadibo namdi hainiu kadihpiri
pabam hinaga chunwibo phungwang-e!
Namdigu charireng lunggase nbaibam kawi bamme,
chiubo Tingwang niu lenkhai-e.
Chawangdung siniu Zion Luongtu chari thiura
wang madui bamme.
Chiudi paliuniu haise ngaoboga paliu suang hamide;
siga paliu pingjiu pak mide.
Paliuse maipui khatniu ngena lungrabo kumjiu
kapingbo nai manangboniu phuimide,
kapingbo tingthungga kasuak bambo malee kumme.
Tingwang niu kamkhaibo lamga aliu chiumide, tuhoira aliuniu ngaolude;
Ngamkambo
Tingwang yo, natu Kahumboky lunggase,
nagu saomakbo lungsiatse makumjiu bamme.
Maidungniu natu pabam hinaga thuonjiu bamme,
naken dibose kadihpiri pabam hinaga disanpad bamme.
Nchangbo siniu nangra mawang-e;
Zion ga maidung chunwi bamlo!
Nangniu majijiu ladjan thiukhai-e; Judah namdiga ringajiu bamlo!
Zion Luongga tadlujiu chaky ton riak chaklulo;
sichiujiu lungwang lanrabo chaken ga paokhai lura,
haibo kareng nai charireng hai matadjiu phui lulo.
“Haise aliu Rawang si-e, khatdi tingtheng Rawang thiu bamra-e;
wanglan rabo hinagadi paniu aliutu majang khai rabo-e.”
Haise mai hina nking lulo! Mai hina pabam hinaga nking lulo,
kati kadi tam makjiu, kalekwi maidi kaleksa maidi.
Amakum hai masan siak rabo-e, Iniu ningting ladkengse dinsune.
Kadincham khatga Iniu alungchun khai lujiu,
Iniu chaqonmibung jubo gasu chakhan-gu rambase dinkhai bine.
Kasabo mikremai siniu atu taokom lujiu bamdi,
kapingbo wan gase Iniu manang lakge.
Kasamai siniu paliu sen-lantu malum bamme,
paliu lungwat jengniu chaliang bamme.
Aliuniu wadaodi aliu ronna ranngam lakge;
Tingwang khuga aliu ringting man pingam lakge.
Palamra chamai ringting manse kengchang keng-e.
Paniu pi kangambo siniu wadaodi buimakge,
charaw lungga ngut makjiu, tingtheng ringbamra paniu khamsi lakge.
Kapangmai, wasi kamakmai kumjiu,
ningting maidi shaijiu bambo mai hinaniu ngao-e,
paliu khiu-lanse, paliu kaikik maileng saodiak mi-e.
Pakak khat paliugu kadih thiu bamliudi,
paliu rawse paliu ky thiumi rabo-e; siga paliu tingtheng bammi rabo-e.
Chamaina aliugu kadibo siniu,
aliu shai makra kham ngam lakge;
aliudi tathiu-chakhao kumjiu shaimi rabo-e.
Paliu ronna paliutu malum bammai khuga ndegu padralo phuilo;
paliu khiu-lan siniu kimjiu bammai—
paliuse milydung kumjiu shaimi rabo-e,
Kashaibo siniu paliutu khuanpao thiumi rabo-e.
Paliu phawse kadiubo bamga ten mahami rabo-e;
tacheng matipmainiu paliu riga tao malui rabo-e.
Chiudi Tingwang niu atu gukhaine;
paniu atu kashaibo pumtan gasu gukhai bine.
Mai khatniu kalekwi khangjiu bamdi,
mai khatniu lungwi nkiukhang bamdi manangmi tulo;
pah kashaibo nai wakhatdi phungtad ngam lakge;
pakhiu-palanse charawga patu maluangtad lakge.
Mai khatniu paringtingga kimjiu bamdi,
pachunning kam tanglubo jengniu patu thuonjiu bamdi,
tingtheng tamiubo pao-pehmainiu bambo,
charuidih gase padi tadmi rabo-e.
Chamaina aliugu kendi siniu aliutu shaimi makra khamlu lakge,
aliudi khaoring kumjiu shaimi rabo-e.
Ngamkambo Rawang,
paniu tingbang lamsu tingnulam bambo kadihpiri pakhiangnatu kujiu bamme.
Witathuibo namdi Zion gasu, pabiu kawibose Tingwang niu thaokhai-e.
Aliu Rawang se maliu makjiu wanglakge, chiudi taoban-satbo mi siniu pasuangga,
khatdi kapingbo tingthung tingkai siniu patu magui lujiu wangrabo-e.
Paniu pamaidungtu ladjan thiuboga, lamchap thiura tinggen nai kadihtu kujiu bamme.
Paniu din-e, “Charathiujiu akhuga ladriat thiu maidung,
khatdi atu malummai hina wang madui sulo.”
Tingwang haira pacheng matipbo ladjanpao-e chiubo tinggen siniu madujiu bamme.
“Amaidung yo, Iniu dinbo hai nkinglo, Iniu naliu Israel maitu ladjan thiu sune.
I hai Charawang, naliu Rawang si-e.
Naliuniu atu kahumjiu wa phungwang bambo,
khatdi naliuniu charathiu khai saomakjiu bambo jengniu naliutu I rubo makge.
Naliu khaoruiky gasu phungwangbo buichi, maksai michidungse Iniu lunibo makge;
palamra mariuga bambo khaoring hinase agu-e,
ramluongga bambo matom-kabui sang-sangse agu-e.
Nkan thingnadungse agu-e, khatdi luzamga bambo hinase agu-e.
“Iniu mariudi, naliu khuga kheng lakge,
palamra kadihpiri khatdi sibo lungga bambo hinase agu-e.
Iniu kabuichi janse tiubo ma, maksai kamichi zaise sakbo ma?
Thuonkiubo siniu Tingwang khuga naliu rathak thiujiu bamlo
khatdi naliuniu ladriat thiukhai mibose Ngamkambo piu khuga kadkhai lulo.
Magenthiu chariubo wangsai atu kulo;
Iniu naliutu gukhai bine, sichiusai naliuniu atu thuonlu bui-e.”
Chiudi kasamai khuga Tingwang niu din-e,
“Dekamjiu naliuniu agu ladriat situ dinlan-lanjiu bam ralo?
Dekamjiu agu chamtan lamga naliu dinbam ralo?
Iniu naliutu kam maji khaira naliu sui makge;
naliuniu agu chamtantu lukhai makge.
Naliura agatiu mai hina ka thiumi-e, khatdi naliuniu kamakha maitu maluang-e.
“Naliuniu kasabo dinra ronna rang-e, ka-aratbo dinra wadi manang makge.
Naliuniu naliu singnamaitu kammaora rang-e, khatdi paliu maotu phiu-e.
Naliuniu haise kamboga, Iniu wadi din makge, sijengniu Idi naliu kumme chiujiu naliu maning-e.
Chiudi Iniu tuhoi naliutu rukhaibo-e, haise naliuleng kam mala khaibo-e.
“Atu wajeng simakmai naliu haise nkinglo, maksai Iniu naliutu kam mahami rabo-e,
siga mai khatniudi naliutu gukhai ngamlakge.
Thuonkiubo rathak siniu atu chakhuang thiubo-e,
alad piumai hinatu Iniu gukhai bine.”
Hey Tingwang yo, atu lungsa khailo.
nagu saomakbo lungsiat siniu
anuanse kam masan khailo!
Agu kasabo hinase khiu masan khailo,
sichiujiu anuan gasu atu kam masan khailo!
Iniu amao-amengse si-e;
anuan jengniu pawan machang
I alung manangjiu bamme.
nangniu kasabo-e chiujiu maningbose I kam mide.
Sijengniu, atu ladjan thiubose maji-e;
nangniu atu kamao khaibose majibo-e.
Ira manabo tingmik gasu nuan phungmai-e;
apui wonlung gasu Ira nuan phungmai-e.
Ka-nchangbo nai majibo situ nangniu lunibo-e;
nagu ningting siniu atu phui khailo.
Anuan hai luthon khailo chiusai I masan mine,
atu khiu masan khailo, chiusai kabun suang I kamine.
Nangniu atu kam chariu khaijiu niakpet khai midi,
chunwibo nai ringabo khuanse atu pichiu khailo;
sichiusai achun wilan lubui-e.
Anuan haitu phuikhai tulo,
khatdi agu kasabose kam masan khailo.
Tingwang yo, alungchun kam masan khailo,
kasanbo nai kadinpiubo lungchun pikhailo.
Nakhu gasu atu hathon khai tulo;
nagu masanbo hiupuinase akhu gasu lumi tulo.
Nagu juringbo gasu wangbo chunwatse atu pikhai lanno,
sichiujiu nagu kadinse pi piukhai lanno.
Sichiusai nagu chamtanse nuan phungmaitu
Iniu katikhai rabo-e,
siga paliu nakhuga mariwang lan rabo-e.
Tingwang yo, agu ringting majuak khailo,
khatdi atu gukhailo;
sichiusai nagu tacheng matipbose chunwijiu
Iniu dinron tadne.
sichiusai Iniu natu thuonne.
Nangra rathak mania situ masen makge,
maksai Iniu kadkhai rabo-e;
maring rukhaibo rathak situ nangniu kim makge.
Tingwang yo, manuanbo lungchunse agu rathakge,
manuanbo nai lunglibo lungchun situ nangniu luthon lakge.
Tingwang yo, Zion tu lungsajiu nkha khailo,
Jerusalem karengse thiusu khai lanlo.
Siga kabuichi siniu nagu rathak bamga
maring rukhaibo rathak thiujiu charathiu khaine,
sichiujiu majibo rathak gase nalung kimrabo-e.
Naru kasabo piu yo, dekamjiu chaliang bam jiulo?
Tingwang gu chamchangbo sira tingtheng-e.
Maidungtu kam mahara nangniu rang-e;
naleese pamun liangbo nkhena kumme.
Nangra ka-aratbo ronna kamme.
Nangra kawibotu suang kasabo situ masenne,
khatdi majibotu suang aratbo situ masenne.
Ka-aratbopiu yo, naladkeng siniu,
maidungtu kam masajiu bamme!
Sijengniu natu tingtheng leng Tingwang niu
kam maha mirabo-e;
paniu naky gasu natu jupadmi rabo-e;
karingbo kadih gasu natu luthonmi rabo-e.
Tacheng matipmainiu haise ngaojiu pingrabo-e.
Paliuniu natu nuijiu dinsune,
“Phuilo, Tingwang khuga nbaira mangiukhai makbo piu haiga bamme;
para pakhiu-palan situ malumjiu bambo-e, sajut-jutjiu, mari lura phui bambo-e.”
Chiudi Ira Tingwang kyga puak bambo takybang kumbo-e;
pagu saomakbo lungsiat situ tingtheng malumjiu bamme.
Tingwang yo, nangniu kamkhai bibo jengniu, tingtheng natu I thuonjiu bamne;
nang hai wi-e chiubo namaidung ruangga Iniu din madu rabo-e.
Paliu mathiu sakamme,
sichiujiu kapingbo ngamse paliuniu kamme;
majibose kambo mai khatnadi ha-e.
Ningtingmai khatdi patu kahummai bamma chiujiu
Tingwang niu tinggen lamsu chamainatu phuikiu-e,
Chiudi paliu mathiuse kamaobo lam tadkam mide;
paliu mathiuse sa macham kamna-e.
Mai khatnadi kamaji kambo ha-e, mai khatnadi ha-e.
“Paliu simakge chiuma,” chiujiu Tingwang niu maniu-e.
“Kasa kammaise paliu chun thiumak jiuma?
Paliuniu amaidunggu suttiujiu,
wadaodi akhuga khengmakjiu lung bamme.”
Chiudi nthen masuang simatai makbo
kaping charenbose paliu khuga wang sune,
palamra Tingwang niu paliu mikremai
rahdungse kam marapu mirabo-e.
Tingwang niu paliutu lukhai tamide,
sichiujiu Israel mainiu paliutu ngam masansiak mirabo-e.
Israel maileng chari ngambose Zion lamsu wangra
Iniu dechiujiu kheng bamlo.
Tingwang niu Israel maitu pi lungwi khai lanboga,
paliuse dejiukha chunwi ralo!
Tingwang yo, nagu pumtan siniu atu gukhailo;
nagu jengtan siniu atu khenrang pithiu khailo!
Tingwang yo, arathoi hai chiukhailo;
aladkeng hai nking khailo!
Wasao thiumai siniu atu asunra wangkinne;
kasamai siniu atu kamshatra matan bamme,
paliura Tingwang tu wajeng simakge.
Tingwang hai atu nkhapao-e,
Paliugu ngamkam kasabo jengniu,
agu mikremai situ Tingwang niu sajai pimi sulo!
Paniu paliutu kam mahami rabo-e,
palamra pahai malumbuibo-e.
Natu Iniu thuonne palamra nang hai wi-e.
Agu magenthak hina gasu nangniu gukhai-e,
agu mikremaitu ngamkhaibose Iniu ngao lude.
Tingwang yo, arathoi hai chiukhailo;
Iniu khengbo haitu marimi khai tulo!
Arathoi nking khaijiu atu paokak khailo,
amagenthak siniu I asang mide.
Agu mikremai nai kasamai siniu kam mathadjiu kapinbo jengniu I asang mide.
Paliuniu ariga magenthiubo phungwang-e;
paliuniu atu pomme khatdi mareng-e.
Kashaibo kapin siniu atu niakpet mide,
yo, kaping-charenbo siniu atu kam charen mide.
Kapingbo nai manangbo siniu I asang mide;
tadiu kasabo siniu phui mide.
Makhao kumjiu I akan bamni-e.
lentadjiu I mathak khai ni-e.
Iniu kadiulam lentad lujiu,
ramjing gase aky thiubam ni-e.
Kabuak bambo tingthung tingkai gasu
kalangjiu agu nbaiky lam I tad mine.
haibo namdi lungga lungpom kasabo,
khatdi n-gi-athao situ Iniu ngao-e.
Nchun n-nien saomakjiu chakhui-chamao,
khatdi magenthiu chariubo siniu
namdi lungga bamsao makge.
Pabam hinaga kam mahabo ronna-e,
npui-ncheng gase maitu ngaokhai lakbo nai wasao thiubo siniu phuiting-e.
Haise mikremainiu atu nuimenbo-e sai, I phunglu bui-e;
haise atu atung mai khatniu akhuga wasaothiu bambo-e sai I nbai lubui-e.
Chiudi haise amaluangpiu, akabo amunhu siniu-e.
Kakungbo ladse aliuniu khat-khat khuga dinkhai mibo-e;
khatdi maluang lujiu Charakyga kahum macham khai mibo-e.
Agu mikremaise paliu tinglang chang makhaga shaimi sulo;
charuidih lamse ringjiu tadmi sulo!
Kasabo siniu paliu ky thiujiu paliu lung kasabo siniu phui bamme.
Chiudi Ira
sichiujiu paniu atu gukhaine.
Iniu kiamjiu siudi thibambo hai,
nsuan, n-nien khatdi nchun saomakjiu pakhuga wang bambo-e,
siniu akhuan hai paniu chiukhai bine.
Iniu mikre maidungtu aphen bambo gasu
paniu atu wijiu puiwang lan bine.
Tingtheng mawang bambo Tingwang siniu,
arathoi chiukhaijiu paliutu ngamlu rabo-e;
haise wadaodi paliuniu kam kalilu lakge,
palamra paliuniu patu ping makge.
Karaibo akapiu siniu paladriat kampang lujiu,
pakapiu situ asunjiu bamme.
Palad niamse wasa suang madio wi-e,
chiudi palung gara kamarengbo siniu phui-e;
wasa parim kawi kum palad niamse wi-e,
chiudi sise pamun liangbo heng kumjiu bi-e.
Nagu magenthak hinase
ka-nchangbo mai situ paniu wadaodi kam chaliukhai lakge.
Chiudi, Hey Tingwang yo nangniu maitu gimai,
khatdi aratmai situ paliu tinglangse changmakjiu paliu raw gase puitad mine.
Chiudi Ira nangtu malumjiu bamne.
Tingwang yo, atu lungsa khailo,
palamra pawan machang agu mikremai siniu
atu asunjiu bamme.
N-nien marinpuiting atu atungmai siniu
asun saomakjiu bamme.
Atu aphen maidungse kengchang keng-e.
Hey Ngamkambo
nakhuga I mangiu khai-e.
Iniu Tingwang tu malumme,
khatdi pagu ladriattu thuonne.
Patu malumbo jengniu Ira pinglakge.
Chamaina siniu atu degu kamlu ralo?
Marinpuiting katheng kadun agu mikremai siniu
atu kam chariujiu bamme;
dechiujiu atu kam masa luralo,
chiubo ronna paliuniu rangjiu bamme!
Paliuniu nbaibam khatga madui lujiu,
Iniu kambo hina mahin matadjiu,
atu kamshatra ronna rang bamme.
Tingwang yo, paliu siat kasa jengniu,
nagu lungpom gasu paliutu mathad khailo!
Iniu chariu khengbambo hai nang si-e,
amatui luang bambo hai nang si-e.
Haidungse nagu ariakkhuangga bambo makma?
Iniu natu kubo nai agu mikremaise
malanmi rabo-e.
Tingwang niu alam chap bamme chiubo I si-e.
Iniu
Iniu patu malumjiu bamne siniu pinglakge.
Wadi makbo chamaina siniu atu degu kamlu ralo?
Tingwang yo, nakhuga ladriat khai mibose
Iniu naleng kad khaine;
thuonkiubo maniakadse Iniu naleng kad khaine,
palamra kashaibo gasu nangniu atu gukhai bi-e,
khatdi mangambo gasu jupad khai-e.
Sijengniu ringbammai khuga thaokhaibo nbiu,
Tingwang khuga I tad mariujiu bamne.
Atu lungsa khailo, Tingwang, atu lungsa khailo,
palamra nbai raleng I nakhuga wang-e.
Kapingbo tingthung tingkaise loi makthen,
nakan sung gase I baira wang-e.
Kukachangbo Tingwang yo, Iniu natu ku-e,
pageng bambo hina Tingwang niu aleng pikhai-e.
Tinggen gasu paokak khaijiu atu gukhaine,
atu kam matad bammaitu paniu ngam khaine.
Pagu saomakbo lungsiat nai chamchangbose,
Tingwang niu atu lenkhai bine.
Mikremai siniu atu tao magui bamme,
chamaitu tiunibo ndongqui hiuse changiu nai tavaithu kumme,
paliu leese pamun liangbo heng kumme.
Tingwang yo, nagu kendise tingpuk gasu
kadihpiri pakhiangnaga lenkhailo!
Amikre mainiu atu minra tathak thiukhai bamme,
alung chariuboniu phui mide.
Paliuniu a-npuiga chakhomky chukhai bamme,
chiudi paliu ronna nkhuang khai bamme.
Hey Tingwang yo, Ira natu malumsiak bamme.
Iniu natu thuonjiu chalui thiune!
Ahiupuina yo, sulo!
agu chaqonmibung nai tarabung sulo!
Iniu naimiktu pisu khaine.
Maidung ruangga Iniu natu thuon bamne!
Nagu saomakbo lungsiatse tinggen tungtang bamme,
nagu chamchangbose tingpuk tungtang bamme.
Tingwang yo, nakendise tingpukga lenkhailo,
khatdi kadihpiriga naken dibose lenkhailo!
Mawangpaodung, naliu majibo ladjan thiu bamma?
Mai hinatu ladjan thiu mawijiu bamma?
Makge! Naliuniu kamlu buibo kasabo ronna machunjiu bamme,
kasabo ronna naliu kadihga kam bamme.
Kasa kammaise paliu ringting tadmao mibo-e;
paliutu manabo nai gasu aratbose dinsu kamigu-e.
Paliu haira kaniu kumjiu karabo tainiu phui-e;
pakuon katidbo niugam kumjiu paliu kuon makad mide,
sichiujiu kaniutu hiamsibo mainiu nthiam mudbo khuanse chiumakge.
Hey Tingwang yo, palungpom kasabo ndongquidung hiuse riothon milo.
Luangjiu tunmibo dui kumjiu paliu hami sulo;
npuikiga chapiuniwtu marap maha mibo kumjiu, paliutu marap mahami sulo.
Taniangjiuga taloinatu tao maha mibo kummi sulo;
shaijiu mana padbo ngena siniu naimik nbiu ngaomak kata kummi sulo.
Paliuniu si makhaga, piubuantu kumjiu,
kapingbo Tingwang lungpom siniu paliu ringjiu bamga mudthon misulo.
Nuan phungmaitu sajai pibose, tacheng matipmainiu ngaojiu chunwi rabo-e;
kasamai zai gase paliu nkuangne.
Maidungniu din-e, “Pachangjiu tacheng matipmaitu paphijeng pirabo-e,
yo, kadihpiritu ladjan thiubo Tingwang bamme.”
A-Rawang yo, amikremai khugasu atu gukhailo;
atu asunjiu bammai khugasu gukhailo!
Kasamai khugasu atu gukhailo;
chamaitu kagimai khugasu atu gukhailo!
Phuilo! Paliuniu atu kamshatra chon bamme;
pathak kasamai siniu atu asunra madui bamme.
Haise Iniu kamaobo maksai nuan kambo makge.
amao bambo gasu makge.
Sulo, Ngamkambo
atu nkha khaira wanglo;
Israel mai Rawang yo, haise nang phuikhailo!
Sulujiu charatu simakbo maitu sajai pikhailo;
haikumbo kasamaitu lungsa khai mane!
Chawan sai paliu wanglan rabo-e,
paliu hai tathi kumjiu wa manam ponjiu tadmariu kinne.
Paliuniu maitu khanbo nai kapinbo hai nking khailo.
Paliu mun-ga, paliu leese chaheng kumme,
chiudi paliu khuanse maidi chiu makge
chiujiu paliura maning-e.
charatu simakbo mai hinatu nangniu nui-e!
Hey Tingwang yo, nang hai agu nbaiky si-e,
Ira nagu pumtan ga mangiu khai bambo-e.
A-Rawang niu atu lungsajiu akhuga wangjiu,
agu mikremaitu ngamlubo atu paniu lenkhai bine.
Tingwang yo, paliutu kamshat khai tulo,
sichiujiu amaidungniu mangai makra leng-e.
paliutu kam marapu khaijiu, ngam khailo!
Nuanse paliu muntaiga bamme;
paliu ladkengse nuan maliang-e;
paliuniu wasao thiuboga pijiu manmi sulo!
Palamra paliu aratle khatdi tasiang siang-e,
nagu lungpom siniu paliutu kam maha milo.
paliutu kam mahaduak milo.
Sichiusai Israel maitu Tingwang niu mawang bamme
chiubo mai hina simi rabo-e,
sichiujiu paniu mawangbo hai kadihpiri
pabam hinaga disanpad rabo-e!
Amikre maise chawan wanglan rabo-e,
paliuse tathi kumjiu namdiga
wa changui ponjiu tadmariu kinne.
Tathi kumjiu katiu phiujiu rontad kinne,
khatdi paliu won-giu dao maksai, kangungjiu bamme.
Chiudi Ira nagu pumtan lamga chalui thiune,
nsuan machang nagu saomakbo lungsiat situ,
akhuan tanjiu chalui thiune.
Nang hai agu nbaibam si-e,
magenthiu chariubo tingga nbaibam si-e.
Atu gupao yo, natu Iniu thuon bamne.
Agu nbaikyse Tingwang ye,
Tingwang niu atu lungsa bamme.
Tingwang yo, nangniu aliutu luthon mide,
khatdi nalung pomjiu kam mangam khaide.
chiudi tuhoira aliu khulam mariwang khailo.
Nangniu kadih haitu dongbiang mide;
sichiujiu haise nangniu kam kanuk khaide,
haise kaomi lajiu bamme, tuhoira wikhai sulo.
Nangniu namaidungtu kam chariu sonna mide;
jaw sak maniu lubo kumjiu aliu tad ta-ngad lad-lad bamme.
Natu chakhuangthiu maitu kachan khaiboga,
hami rabo gasu paliu marenlu-e.
Nagu pumtan siniu aliutu gukhailo; aliu rathoitu paokak khailo;
sichiusai nangniu lungsabo maitu gukhai lubui-e.
Pagu masanbo kyga Tingwang niu din-e,
“Chari ngamlujiu Shechem tu Iniu njan mine,
khatdi Sukkoth Ramjengse amaileng njan mine.
Gilead nai Manasseh di agu-e; Ephraim hai aripuan pirunne,
khatdi Judah hai awang thun-e.
Chiudi Iniu Moab haitu agu tathikuang leng thinne,
khatdi Edom riga aphitop taliang khaine
haise agu-e chiubo madan lenkhaibo-e.
Philistia mainiu atu chari ngam lune chiu maning jiuma?”
Tingwang yo, kareng bambo namdi gase saoniu atu majang khai ralo?
Saoniu Edom ga atu jukhai ralo?
Nang aliutu pachangjiu thonmi rama?
Aliu riphentu nang maluang tadkhai lakma?
Mikremaitu chari thiura aliutu nkha khailo,
palamra chamaina nkha sira pageng ha-e!
Tingwang niu aliu lam liangsai aliu ngam lune;
aliugu mikremaitu paniu ngam khaine.
Tingwang yo, Iniu khengbo chiukhailo;
arathoi hai nking khailo!
Aky gasu tad madiu mibo chariubo lungchun siniu
natu I ku-e!
Manang makbo bam gase atu jukhailo,
palamra amikremai khugasu gupaose nang-e
nang hai agu katanbo nbaiky si-e.
I karingthen nagu masanbo ky gase lung khaine;
nakan hangga manang makjiu atu pibam khailo.
Agu ladriat hai nangniu chiukhai-e, Tingwang yo.
natu chakhuangthiu maiguse aleng pikhai-e.
Chawang ringting hai takum kengjiu khaisan bilo,
patu tingthengjiu piring khailo!
Tingwang yo, patu tingthengjiu pi mawang khailo,
nagu saomakbo lungsiat nai chamchangbo siniu
patu gukhailo.
Sichiusai natu pawan machang thuonbo lui thiune,
nakhuga ladriat khaibo kumjiu, naimachang Iniu kadkhaijiu bamne.
Atu gukhaira Tingwang khuga ronna
Ira mangiu khaijiu khuan bambo-e.
Atu gukhaipiu khatdi rankhaipiuse paronna-e;
pase alam liangpao-e,
sichiujiu Iniu wadaodi chaliu lakge.
Kaomibo kareng suang samibo mai khat situ,
dethengkha naliuniu atungjiu bamralo?
Patu chakhuangthiu khaibo bam gasu,
kamkaomi ratu ronna naliuniu masenne;
aratbo dinra naliu chun ngutle.
Thoidam ladkengse naliuniu din-e,
chiudi naliu lungchun lamra patu siang-e.
Tingwang khuga ronna Ira mangiu khai-e;
Iniu patu malumme.
Atu gupao khatdi ranpaose paronna-e,
pase alam liangpao-e,
sijengniu wadaodi I mangam lakge.
Agu juringbo nai chakhuang thiubo hai
Tingwang ronna pikhaibo-e;
pahai agu katanbo gupao-e;
pahai agu nbaibam si-e.
Amaidung yo pawan machang Tingwang tu malum bamlo.
Naliugu magenthiu chariubo hina pakhuga paokhailo,
palamra pahai aliu nbaibam si-e.
Chamaina hai malod khat siu kumbo-e;
katidi, kadidi pageng ha-e.
Paliutu madad matailo, paliu rip wadi ha-e;
paliu hai asiu suang masenne.
Kabuakbo gase malummi tulo;
maigu sutlujiu pageng daolune chiu maning tulo;
nakhiu-nalanse kengkhang bamdi malummi tulo.
Pumtan hai Tingwang pagu-e,
chiujiu dinbo malenna I chiu mide,
nangniu paliu phijeng pikhai-e.
Tingwang yo, nangra a-Rawang-e,
Iniu natu ramgunjiu bambo-e.
Alungchun pakhiangna siniu natu masenne;
sangkang mibo kadih, tadui habo ram kumjiu,
ahiupuina siniu natu charijiu khuan bamme.
Nagu masanbo ky gasu atu lenkhailo,
nang hai dejiukha naken dilo
khatdi dejiukha ngamlo chiubo atu lenkhailo.
Nagu saomakbo lungsiat hai ringting suang wi-e,
sijengniu natu Iniu thuon bamne.
Iniu karingthen natu thuonjiu bamne;
natu kahumjiu aben khengsujiu bamne.
Ahiupuina niu chunwijiu khatdi kimjiu
natu thuonbo luise thiujiu bamne,
natu thuonbo luise achun wijiu I thiu bamne.
Iniu aziga jikiuboga natu maningtao-e,
nchun katheng-kadun natu maningjiu bamme.
Nangniu atu pawan machang nkha khaibo jengniu
nakan sungga Iniu ringabo lui thiune.
Iniu nakhuga mangiu khai-e,
nabenniu atu gukhailo.
Atu kamshatra matan bam maise
charuidih lam tadkiu mirabo-e.
Paliutu chari gasu kamshat mirabo-e,
sichiujiu paliu phawse tanyniu tiumi rabo-e.
Tingwang niu patu charise ngamkhai bibo donniu
chawangse pachun wijiu bamne
Tingwang zan-ga ladriat thiumai hina patu thuonne,
chiudi ka-aratmai mun sira kabami rabo-e.
Tingwang yo, I chariujiu bamme, arathoi chiukhailo!
amikre maidungtu Ira ping-e, atu gukhailo!
Kasamainiu rangbambo gasu atu gukhailo,
kasamai rup gasu gukhailo.
Chaheng kumjiu paliu leese kariu bamme,
khatdi paliu ladkeng kasabo siniu
tavaithu kumjiu majon bamme,
Paliugu mangam kamakbo aratse
kadadpad majatjiu bamme;
paliuniu kawimai ken tiajiu kam maha bamme.
Paliu lungchun kasabo gase khat-khattu kachu khaijiu bamme;
tathak thiurabo bamse paliu makhiam bamme.
Paliuniu din-e, “Mai khatniudi paliutu ngao lakge.”
Paliuniu kasabo ranglujiu din-e,
“Aliuniu kasabo ngamse rang mawi lude.”
Chamaina lungchun nai maning hai maisuang ha-e.
Chiudi Tingwang niu paliutu tavaithu ketjiu bamme,
sichiujiu paliu simak dakjiu ajam mide.
Paliu ladkeng jengniu paliutu kam maha mine;
paliutu ngaomai hina paliu pee kangum bamme.
Paliu mathiu pingkammi sune;
Tingwang niu kam khaibose paliu maningtao sune,
khatdi pagu tienkam lamga paliu dinsune.
tacheng matipmai hina chun wine;
paliuniu pakhuga nbaibam daolune;
kawibo mai hinaniu patu thuon bamne.
Tingwang yo, aliuniu natu Zion ga thuon rabo-e,
sichiujiu aliuniu ladriat khaibose majai rabo-e.
Palamra aliu rathoise nangniu paokak khai-e
pabam hina lamsu maidung nakhuga wang rabo-e.
Paliu nuan jengniu mai hina nakhuga wangrabo-e.
Aliu khui-mao siniu aliutu kam mangam khai-e,
chiudi nangniu sise kuak khai-e.
Nagu masanbo kyga lungkhaira nangniu kadalujiu,
puiwangmai paliu sanwi-e.
Naky masanbo Raky gu thoidamdung gase,
naky kawibo gahai mania jengniu kimjiu bamra-e.
Nangniu aliutu chari ngamkhaibose paokak khai-e,
khatdi aliutu gukhaira nangniu maisuang habo kamkhai-e
Kadihpiriga bammai khatdi duinai hugen lam bammai hinaniu natu malum bamme.
Nagu pumtanse nangniu lenbo thiujiu
maluongdungtu pabamga pibam khai-e.
Duinai nai tingkainiu kabuakbo khuanse nangniu pi saojing khai-e,
khatdi maidunggu kabuakbo khuanse kam manon khai-e.
Nangniu kadibo ngam kamkhaibo jengniu
kadihpiri pakhiangnaniu natu ping-e.
Kadihpiri pake khatlamsu pake khatlam,
nagu tienkam siniu ringabo phungwang-e.
Nangniu kadihpiritu nagu lungsabo lenjiu tingriukiu khai-e,
khatdi kadih haitu patam pikhaijiu lungwi khai-e.
Nangniu pikhaibo singgiuse wadaodi sangmakjiu luang bamme,
haise nangniu kamkhaibo-e:
Phukhaibo luzam gase nangniu tingriu pikhai-e,
piubuanse puaksura kadih situ nangniu tingdui kajin khaijiu kam manuan khai-e.
Nawat siniu kawibo atiatse pikhai-e!
Nangniu tadkhaibo bam hina pasy kengjiu dao-e!
Ramluong gase piubuan pikhai-e;
siga khaoringdungse paliu chunwi bamme.
Luzam gase milydung phui bamme, ramjeng gase chamiuniu phui bamme;
Wahina siniu chunwibo lui thiujiu sen bamme!
Tingwang khu chunwibo khuanniu senlo, mai hina!
Pakendibo pazanse thuonjiu thiulo,
paken dibo zantu thuonjiu pakhuga kadkhailo!
Tingwang khu dinlo, “Nangniu kamkhaibo hai, dejiukha maisuang halo!
Nagu pumtanse haijiukha di-e chiubo nagu mikre mainiu pingjiu nasuangga makhum kiu-e.
Kadihga lungmai hinaniu natu kahum bamme,
paliuniu natu thuonbo luise thiu bamme,
paliuniu nazantu thuonjiu chalui thiu bamme.”
Tingwang niu kamkhaibo hai wangjiu phuilo,
maidung ruangga paniu maisuang habo kamkhai-e.
aliu pao-pehmai singgiuse paliu phiniu kenpadle,
sise paniu kamkhaibo jengniu aliu chunwi-e.
Pagu pumtan siniu tingtheng mawang bamme,
khatdi jat hina riga paniu phui bamme.
Mai khatniudi patu atungjiu charithiu tulo!
Jat hina aliu Rawang tu thuonlo;
naliuniu thuonbo khuanse pichiu khailo.
Paniu aliutu piring khaijiu bamme,
aliutu pikao mira paniu suikhai makge.
Tingwang yo, rangkanggi situ ru masanbo kumjiu,
nangniu aliutu madiu khai mide.
Nangniu aliutu tathakga pikao khai mide,
aliu ngum riga chabang karipbo thonkhai bide.
Nangniu mikremaitu aliu riga pitao malui khai mide;
aliutu chami nai duiliuga pitad khai mide;
chiudi tuhoira nangniu aliutu manangmakbo bamga puiwang khai bide.
Iniu nakyga maring rujiu kadkhaira phungwangne;
Iniu ladriat khai mibose naleng kadkhai rabo-e.
Iniu magenthiu chariubo wan-ga pikhaine,
chiujiu ladriat khai mibose Iniu pikhaine.
Iniu rathakbam gase milydung kad khaine;
siga Iniu kabuichi nai kamichi kad khaine;
sibo rim nai mikhutse tingpuklam khangrabo-e.
Tingwang tu chakhuang thiumai hina, wangjiu nking khailo;
sichiusai paniu aleng kamkhaibose, Iniu naliu khuga dinlen khai bine.
Nkha khaira Iniu pakhuga kheng-e,
Iniu chalui thiujiu patu thuonne.
Iniu anuan situ wajeng simaksai,
Chiudi Tingwang niu pachangjiu chiukhai bi-e,
paniu arathoi haitu nkingkhai bi-e.
Iniu Tingwang tu thuon-e,
palamra paniu arathoi haitu luthon makge,
maksai pagu saomakbo lungsiatse paniu akhu gasu khoi malanmi makge.
Tingwang yo, aliutu lungsajiu thoikhailo;
lungsabo mikkhuan siniu phui khailo,
sichiusai nachunse kadihpiri pakhiangna silune,
khatdi nagu juringbose jat hinaniu silune.
Tingwang yo, maidungniu natu thuonjiu bamlo;
mai hinaniu natu thuonjiu bamlo!
Jatdung siniu ringajiu chunwibo lui thiulo,
palamra nangniu maidungtu majijiu ladjan thiu-e,
khatdi kadihga jat hinatu maluang khai-e.
Tingwang yo, maidungniu natu thuonjiu bamlo;
mai hinaniu natu thuonjiu bamlo!
Kadih hainiu pagu atiatse phungwang-e;
Tingwang, aliu Rawang niu aliutu thoikhai bide.
Tingwang niu aliutu thoikhai bide;
pabam machangnaga mai hina patu chakhuang thiulo.
Tingwang niu sulujiu pagu mikremaitu kam mara khaide.
Patu ngaokhai lakmai hina mangamjiu pakmide!
Mikhut situ mud maha mibo kum, paniu paliutu hathon mide.
chami ga makhui tunmibo kum,
kasamaise Tingwang masuangga hamide.
Chiudi tacheng matip mai sira pasuangga chunwijiu ringa bamme;
chunwibo nai ringabo khuanse senjiu bamme.
Tingwang khuga chalui thiulo,
pazantu thuonbo lui thiulo;
kamuang riga tadkinbo paleng npui kadenlo.
pazanse
Patu Kahumboky masanboga bambo Tingwang siniu,
kamipui nai magennahtu manangjiu gukhai-e.
Paronna bammai ky leng paniu pikhai-e,
khatdi kavangkyga bam maitu khenrang pithiu khai-e;
chiudi kasa rangmai tura mibo maidi lung makbo kadihga thonkhai mirabo-e.
Tingwang yo, nangniu namaidungtu
ramjingga maluang padbo tingga,
palamra Sinai Rawang wangkinbo donniu-e.
Nangniu tingriuse kengjiu riukiu khai bi-e,
sichiujiu sangmibo dihse piwi khai lanbi-e;
namaidung siniu siga paliu ky thiu-e;
nawat siniu kalek samaileng pikhaibi-e.
maipuidung siniu tacham phungtadle:
“Chawangdung nai paliu riphendungse pakmide!”
Paliuniu sungwangbo maniadungse maipuidung siniu paliu kyga ponwangjiu,
rangkanggi niu makom khaibo makhao meng;
khatdi kawibo kachianiu kambo ran-ranbo kandungse njan bamme.
(Chari thiubo naise dekamjiu naliu khangsiamai kami kyga bammi jiulo?)
Ngamkambo Tingwang niu chawangdung situ,
Zalmon Luongga hamarapu khaiboga paniu kabun pikiu khai-e.
Kadibo Bashan Luong hai maluangton kengbo maluang khatle!
Tingwang niu lungra kadakhai mibo luongton gase,
dechiujiu nalung pomjiu phui gulo?

Masanbo bam Sinai gasu
pagu katanbo chaqon-riphen sang-sangtu maluanglu wangkinne.
kasamai khugasu paniu kalendung daolu-e,
siga
Naimachang aliu bangrip phung bambo
pase aliutu gukhaibo Tingwang si-e.
Aliu Rawang sira rankhaibo Tingwang si-e;
pahai
kashaibo gasu paniu aliutu ranpad khai-e.
Nuan kamjiu tadkinmai pagu mikremai peese,
Tingwang niu maomakjiu kampang mirabo-e.
Bashan gasu puiwang lanne;
Iniu paliutu duipuigu kasukbo gasu puiwang lanne,
sichiujiu naliuniu paliu zaiga nkuangne,
khatdi naliu thidung siniu maliak kanithen maliak rabo-e.”
Hey Tingwang yo, nangniu chari ngam lujiu wangbose mai hinaniu ngaolude,
awangpiu, Tingwang niu pagu Kahumboky masanboga tadron wangbose ngaolude.
Pasuangga chalui thiumai, pasailam tara thinmai,
n-gangga siamtoy biumai liunamaidungse bamme.
“Pamaidung aruangbo bamga Tingwang tu thuonlo;
Jacob kaikik hina
Raiboga siamthubo Benjamin kiphiu,
sibo saiga Judah gu jupaodung nai parupmai,
sibo saiga Zebulun nai Naphtali maigu jupaodung suikinne.
Hey Tingwang yo, aliu sung thiukhai mibo nagu pumtanse lenkhailo,
Chawangdungniu naleng kalen phungwangbo,
natu Kahumboky Jerusalem gasu lenkhailo.
Khaoring kumjiu bambo Egypt mai situ,
pijiu makhumkiu paliu rangkangse kadkhai makthen rukhailo;
kabuidung kumbo jatdung situ paliu poi tamanjiu rukhailo.
Chari thiunibo mai situ kam marapu khailo!
Egypt gasu dihsung paodung wangsune;
Sudan mainiu Tingwang tu kahumjiu paliu ben henkhang sune.
Kadihpirigu wangdih yo, Tingwang khuga chalui thiulo,
ndagu tingpuktu tuangkinbo pakhuga,
tanjiu senwang kinbo khuanse kinglo!
Tingwang gu pumtanse din madulo,
pagu kendise Israel mai riga bamme;
pagu pumtanse tingpukga bamme.
Israel mai Rawang niu patu kahumboky gasu
wangboga dejiukha mai pingbo gulo!
Paniu pumtan nai jengtanse pamaidung khuga pikhai-e.
Tingwang tu thuonlo!
Hey Tingwang yo, atu gukhailo!
Awongcheng tangbo taduise malimkhang mide;
taniangjiu gase I malim kiujiu bamme, siga taniang kang wadi ha-e,
tadui runsinglam I malimkiu mide; sichiujiu atu matentad mila bamme.
Nkha khaira kubo jengniu atakuak thiu mide;
khatdi nagu nkha situ phuijiu amik niumide.
amikremai siniu alamga arat din bamme.
Paliu hai tanne sichiujiu atu kamshatni bamme.
Iniu agamakbo maniase paliuniu atu pikhaijiu bamme.
Hey Tingwang yo, anuan hai namasuangga nbai makge;
Dejiukha I panglo chiubo nang sibamme!
Natu malumbo akhuga mangambo pikhai tulo;
Tanthubo
Natu kahumbo azu samira kamkhai tulo, Hey Israel mai Rawang yo!
Mangamboniu phuijiu bamme,
najeng ganiu atu kam mangamjiu bambo-e.
Asingnamai khuga I hai zusi makmai kum mide,
akykhunmai khuga I sangdiumai kum mide.
natu kam mangamjiu bambose ariga wangjiu bamme.
Kalum rijiu, atu aronna kam manonjiu bamme,
siga maidungniu atu kam mangamjiu bamme.
Lungchun chariubo fai-nise I piujiu bamme,
siga paliuniu atu nuimenjiu bamme.
Npuikiga paliuniu aken tiajiu bamme,
khatdi jaw sak maniu mainiu alamga chalui thiujiu bamme.
Chiudi Ira, natu kahumjiu bamne.
atu paokak khailo, palamra nagu lungsiatse di-e,
palamra nangniu gukhaira ladriat khai-e.
Taniangjiuga malinkiujiu bambo gasu atu gukhailo;
amikremai khugasu khatdi duiliu kasukbo gasu atu gukhailo.
Duidet gase atu pijiu maliam khai tulo,
kasukbo charaw gase atu pijiu malimkiu khai tulo.
nagu kadibo lungsiat siniu akhulam mariwang khailo!
Navangpiu khugasu nbaimi tulo;
magenthiu asang mide, tuhoi atu paokak khailo!
Akhuga wangjiu atu gukhailo;
amikremai khugasu atu rankhailo.
Atu dejiukha kam mangam bamlo,
amikre mainiu dejiukha atu kalungjeng simakjiu
chakhuangthiu makjiu bamlo chiubo nang sijiu bamme.
Kamangambo siniu alungchun kampang mide, khatdi manang asang mide.
Lungsa khaira khatdi nkha khaira I ramgun bambo-e, chiudi mai khat tudi I daolu makge.
I charibo tingga, paliuniu kakhiangbo dui pikhai-e.
paliugu masanbo ngeese nchumbo thiumi sulo!
Paliu mik ngaota mira paliu mik kam tiat khailo;
paliu pumtanse pawan machang sonbo thiumilo!
Nagu lungpomse paliu riga runkiu khailo;
nagu lungpom siniu paliutu ngam khailo!
paliugu mathenky gase mai khattudi masiak khai tulo!
Nangniu sajai pikhai maitu paliuniu mathadle;
nangniu kam kam ajam khaimai chariuse paliu din-e.
Paliu nuan situ nangniu pariak chak lujiu,
nagu juringbo gase paliu dam jaokhai tulo.
paliutu namaidung riakga chakkhai tulo.
Chiudi Ira magenthiubo siniu asangsiak mide;
Hey Tingwang yo, atu jukhang lujiu gukhailo!
Chalui thiujiu Tingwang tu Iniu thuonne;
chunwigu pipadjiu paken dibose Iniu dinronne.
Haise matomchi kadkhaibo suang,
khatdi pakiangbo kabuichi kadkhaibo suang
Pamad padjiu bammainiu haise ngao dasai paliu chunwi rabo-e;
Tingwang tu kahummaise pacheng ringmi rabo-e.
Wathak hamai khuan
khatdi kavangkyga bambo pamaitu paniu mangai makge.
Tinggen nai kadihniu, Tingwang tu thuonlo;
duipui khatdi palungga bambo khaoring siniu patu thuonlo!
Paniu Jerusalem situ rankhaijiu, Judah namdise thiukhai lanbi rabo-e,
siga pamaidung lungjiu paliu kadih thiu rabo-e.
Pavangmai kaikik siniu sibo kalekse lurabo-e,
khatdi patu lungsamai siniu siga lung rabo-e.
Hey Tingwang yo, atu gukhailo!
Tuhoi atu nkha khailo,
Atu kamshatra matanbam maidung situ
ngamlujiu, kam kabuak khailo.
Amagenthak jengniu paliu chun wibam mai situ,
sailam mariwangjiu kam mangam khailo!
Atu nuimen bammai situ, paliugu ngammakbo
siniu kam mangam khailo.
Nakhuga wangmaise chunwi ringabo thiulo.
Pawan machang nagu juringbo situ masenmai siniu
haichiu dinbam milo, “
Ira lunglakmai khatdi kason mai-e;
Tingwang yo, majadjiu akhuga wangkhailo.
atu nkha khaira rita sulo!
atu wadaodi kam chaliukhai tulo!
Palamra nangra tacheng matip-e,
atu nkha khaijiu rankhai bibo-e.
Athoi nking khaijiu atu gukhailo!
Manangmakbo agu nbaibamse nang thiukhailo,
khatdi katanbo kareng thiukhaijiu gukhailo;
palamra nang hai atu gukhaibo nbaibam si-e.
A-Rawang yo, kasamai khugasu atu gukhailo,
pathak kasamai pumtan gasu atu gukhailo.
I nahting gasu natu malum khangbo-e.
Agu ringting hai nakhuga mangiu khai-e;
atu manabo tingmik gasu nangniu gukhaibo-e;
Pachang Iniu natu thuonjiu bamne!
Nangniu alam chapkhai bibo donniu,
Agu ringting hai mai kakeng ga lunglenbo khatle.
Marinpuiting katheng-kadun naken kadibose
Iniu thuonjiu bamne.
Tuhoira I tanpao mide, atu suimak khai tulo;
tuhoira I asang mide, atu phutkhai tulo!
Amikremai siniu atu kamshatra rang bamme;
paliu makhiam lujiu atu chon bamme.
Paliuniu din-e, “Tingwang niu patu lukhaita mide;
pasailam tadlujiu patu min sukhe,
palamra patu gukhaira maidi hamide!”
Tingwang yo, tad madiumi tulo;
A-Rawang yo, atu nkha khaira rita sulo!
Atu atungmai situ ngamlujiu, kam maha milo!
Atu kam masara matan kinmai situ kam mangam khailo!
Ira natu malumjiu bamtan tanne;
natu thuonsao makjiu I thuon bamne.
Nagu kawibo situ I dinjiu bamne;
Iniu sitang ngamlak tadi, nagu juringbo lamga,
marinpuiting I dinjiu bamne.
nagu kawibo lamga ronna I din bamne.
I nahting gasu nangniu katikhai-e,
nagu maisuang habo tienkamse Iniu din bamne.
Tuhoira I tanpaojiu apee npuak mide,
Hey Tingwang yo, atu suimakbo thiukhai tulo!
Wangkinbo chaken hina khuga, nagu pumtan nai jengtan lamga,
Iniu din bamra atu maluang khailo.
Tingwang yo, nagu tacheng matipbose
tingpuk tungtangjiu bamme.
Nangniu kadibose tenkhai-e,
nang kumbo mai khatnadi ha-e!
Magenthiu chariubose nangniu ariga pikhai-e,
chiudi nangniu ajengtan pikhai lanjiu,
charaw gasu gukhai bine.
Nangniu atu kam madi nkiu khangjiu bamne;

Tarabung jujiu Iniu natu thuonsiak rabo-e;
A-Rawang yo, nagu chamchangbose Iniu thuon bamne.
Agu tarabung thinlujiu natu thuonbo lui thiune,
Israel maigu Masanbo Khat yo.
Nangniu atu gukhaibo jengniu,
chalui thiujiu Iniu makiakne.
alungchun pakhiangna natu thuonjiu bamne.
Nagu tacheng matipbo lamga marinpuiting
Iniu din bamne,
palamra atu kam masara matan bammai situ
nangniu ngamlujiu kam mangam khaide.
Hey Tingwang yo, nagu tacheng matipbose,
chawangtu katikhailo, nagu majibose paleng pikhailo.
Sichiusai paniu namaitu majibo ladjanse thiu lune,
