lungkalak maitu mawang lune.
Haibo ram haitu pi disu khailo,
khatdi tacheng matipbose pisi khailo.
Chawangniu lungkalak maitu ladjan thiu mawi khailo,

pageng bammai situ nkhai khailo.
Chahiu, naimik siniu benbam then,
namaidung siniu natu tingtheng kahum bamlo.
Chawangse luzamga tingriu khaibo kum,
khatdi kadihga kajikdui kiubo kum bamlo.
Tacheng matipbose paken ga pidisu khailo,
khatdi chahiuniu benbam then pidisu khailo.
Ephrates Giu gasu kadih pamalan tangbo thiu milo.
Ramjingga lungmai siniu pamasuangga makhum kiune,
pagu mikremai siniu tabuijiuga makhum kiune.
Spain wangdung nai chapiukakga lungmai,
khatdi Sheba nai Seba wangdung siniu paleng kalen phungwangne.
Chawang hina pamasuangga makhum kiune,
jat hinaniu patu macha rabo-e!
Kaleksamai nai lungkalakmai patu kumai hinatu,
paniu nkhajiu gukhaine.
Lunglakmai nai kasonmaitu paniu lungsa khaine;

Paliu ringtingse paleng paman kung-e;

Chawangse ringtheng bamlo!
Sheba lamsu paleng kachia phungwanglo;

Tingwang thoidamse pariga bamtan-tanbo thiu milo!
Padihga katiu kasak pikeng khailo;
Lebanon rasy keng kumjiu ramluong gase
masi phuiting khailo.
Luzamga piubuan puaksubo kum,
namdi gase chamainiu pi phuikhailo.

Jat hinaniu patu thuon bamlo;

Tingwang khuga paliutu thoikhaira kheng bamlo.
Israel mai Rawang,
paronna maisuang habo ngamdungse kambo-e!

Tingwang haira pachangjiu wi-e!
Chiudi Ira aphi anijiu nkhuang pai-e,
agu malumse hapai-e,

Paliu khuga thiuniubo ha-e

Maidung kumjiu paliu magenthiu makge;

Sijengniu chaliangbo situ paliuniu tatiu kumjiu matiu-e,
khatdi kasabo situ chafai kumjiu benne.
Paliu lungchun nai paliu makumse
kasabo ronna rangjiu bamme.
Maitu nuimenjiu kasabose paliuniu dinne;

Tinggen ga bambo Tingwang tu din masajiu,

Paliuniu din-e, “Tingwang niu wadi silakge,
Kukachangbo siniu wakhatdi phiudao lakge.”
Kasamai sira haikumbo-e.
Paliugu keng bamme, khatdi dao sanjiu bambo-e.
Iniu nuan kam makjiu, aronna masan bambo hai
pageng wadi hami rama?
Hey Tingwang yo, nsuan machang, nangniu
atu sajai pijiu marinpuiting kam mathad bambo-e!
Iniu haikumbo ladse dinbam niusai,
namaidung kumjiu I kammak bamniu rabo-e.
Iniu haise sira matan bambo-e, chiudi haise aleng kungjujiu bamniu-e.
Natu Kahumboky ga I wangbo gasu, kasamai khuga degu padralo chiubo I silu-e.
Nangniu paliutu ka-anibo bamga pitad khaijiu
paliutu hami raboga kamkao mirabo-e.
Paliutu kaping-charenboga thonkhai lujiu, paliutu kam maha mide.
Rapiu yo, nang suchap dasai, paliutu ngaotami rabo-e,
Alung pomjiu, arai khangmibo tingga
I hai nakhuga khaoring kumjiu, wadi simakjiu pang bamniu-e.
Chiudi Ira nakhuga bamsao makge, siga nangniu aben jukhai-e.

Tinggen ga nang makbo agu degu bamlo?

aleng pageng bambo sira pah ronna-e.
Natu thonmi maise pachangjiu shaimi rabo-e;

khatdi Tanthubo
alengra dejiukha maisuang habo gulo!

Tingwang yo, dekamjiu aliutu haichiu thonmi ralo?

Zion Luong situ maningtao khailo.

Tingwang yo, aliu mikremai siniu, dethengkha natu nuimen bam ralo?

Tingwang yo, aliutu wajiukha nangniu gukhai bide.
khatdi duinai khaopui peedi kampang khai-e.
paphawse ramjengga lungbo khaoniu tiura pikhai-e.

Nangniu nchun n-nientu dam khai-e;

Nangniu kadihpiri malan pikhai-e,

Chiudi,

mathad bambo namaidungtu mangai khai tulo!

tamiubo bam hinaga chakhuan-chara bamme!

Tingwang yo, sulujiu nalam phesulo!
Charatu simakmai siniu marinpuiting natu nuimen bamme, chiubo maningtao khailo!

Aliuniu natu thuon bamme, Tingwang yo,

Tingwang niu din-e, “Ladjan thiurabo wanse Iniu chakkhai nbamme,
Iniu ladjan thiu mawijiu thiune.
Kadihpiri khatdi sibo lungga bambo hina kacha midi,

Chaliangmai siniu wasao thiumakra,

khatdi mathak mira paliu khuga Iniu dinbo-e.”
Ladjan thiubo hai tingbang, tingnu lamsu,

sise kasamai riga paniu runkiujiu, paliuniu sise sak kam lude.
Chiudi Ira Jacob Rawang lamga dinsao lakge,

Judah ga Tingwang tu sijiu bamme,

Paniu mikremaigu tavaithuse kamtang mide,

Tingwang yo, nakense dejiukha dilo!
Nangniu nagu mikremaidungtu ngam lujiu

Paliugu kahubo riphenmai guse sutkam lumide,

Jacob Rawang yo, nangniu paliutu kapin khaiboga,

Sichiujiu mai hina natu ping kamme,
Nalung pombo wan ga mai khatniudi natu chap muntong ngam lakge.
Nangniu nagu ladjanse tinggen lamsu pisi khaiboga,

Kadihga mathadjiu bammaitu gukhaira,

Chamaina lungpom sira natu thuonra leng-e,

Nangniu ladriat khai mibose,
Lung manajiu bambo jat hinaniu paleng kalen phungwanglo.
Mai hina patu pingra Tingwang niu kamkhai-e;

Tingwang khuga Iniu alai khaijiu kap-e,
Iniu kap marung suboga, paniu akhuan chiukhai-e.
Iniu magenthiubo tingga,
aben henkhangjiu Iniu nchun khengsang-e,
chiudi ka-amanbose I dao makge.
Iniu Tingwang tu maning taojiu siudi thi-e;
Iniu makumjiu bamdi acheng ringson makge.
Paniu atu pi jipkiu khai makge;
alung magenthiubo siniu wa dinpad ngam makge.
Tadmibo tingmik khatdi tingkum situ I maningtao-e.
Nchundi I makum sang-e,
makumjiu aronna haichiu maniu-e:
Wadaodi aliutu wadaodi pachun kimlak jiuma?
Paniu aliutu lungsa tami rama?
Paniu ladriat khaibo hai pageng hami rama?
Lungsa khaira Tingwang mangaimi rama?
Palungsiat sung palungpom siniu malinmi rama?”
Siga Iniu din-e, “Atu kam masathubo sira,
Tingwang gu pumtanse hamibo donniu-e.”
karaiga nangniu kamkhai mibo maisuang habose Iniu maningtao lanne.
Nangniu kamkhai mibo hinase Iniu makum tao-e,
nagu kangambo tienkam hinase Iniu makumjiu bamne.
Tingwang yo, nangniu kambo hinase masanbo-e!
Nang kumjiu kadibo ra wadi ha-e!
Nangra maisuang habo kambo Rawang-e;
nagu pumtanse jatdung ruangga lenkhai bi-e.
Nagu pumtan siniu Jacob nai Joseph kaikik,

Tingwang yo, taduiniu natu ngaoboga paliu pingmi-e,

Pabam hinaga hengri kalik suboga,
kamuang gasu tingriu kiu-e.
Kadihpiri pabam hinaga hengri kalikjiu,
tingsim suboga haise pingjiu malai-e khatdi kathi-e.
Nangra kasuakbo duiliu rigadi tad-e

Nangniu milykhuanpao kumjiu namaidung haitu,
Mose nai Aaron hangga khailujiu jukhai-e.
Amaidung yo, Iniu katikhaibo,

ndagu mahinbose dinlen khai bine,
aliu pao-peh mainiu katikhaibose,
aliuniu chiulude khatdi silude.
aliuniu aliu nahmai khuga baimi lakge,

Israel maidungtu paniu tacheng-tajai,

Paliu nahmaitu pagu tacheng-tajai katikhaira,
aliu pao-pehmaitu paniu chamtan pikhai-e,
sichiujiu paliu nahmaidung khuga katikhaijiu,
kanabo ken siniu paliu khugasu singam lubui-e.
Haichiujiu Tingwang tu paliu malum lujiu,
paniu kamkhai mibose mangaimak raleng-e,
chiudi pagu chamtanse majaijiu bam raleng-e.
Sichiujiu paliu hai, Tingwang tu malum makjiu,
kadinpiu makbo khatdi chamchang makbo
paliu pao-pehdung kummak raleng-e.
Ephraim maidungse tavaipiniu paliu pon thiu bamdi,
chari thiubo naise pak mibo-e.
Tingwang khuga ladriat khaibose paliuniu majai makge,
khatdi pagu tacheng-tajai situ paliuniu piuni makge.
Paniu tenkhaibose paliu mangai mide,
paliu khuga maisuang habo tenkhaibose,
paliuniu ngaolujiu mangai mide.
paliu pao-pehdung masuangga,
Tingwang niu maisuang kahabose kamkhai-e.
paliutu maluangpad khai-e,
paniu tadui situ singbeng kum pichap khai-e.
nchun tingsai, chamipuangniu maluang khai-e.
Ramjingga paniu tudi gasu tadui luangpad khaijiu,
paliuleng tadui pikhai bi-e.
taduise singgiu kumjiu luangpad khai bi-e.
Chiudi paliuniu ramjing gase Kuthubo Rawang
kadin piumakjiu nuan kamjud-judjiu bamme.
Tingwang tu madiubui makjiu paliuniu madiu-e.
Paliuniu Tingwang tu atungjiu din-e,
“Ramjingga Tingwang niu katiu pikhai ngamma?
Paniu tudi situ dapkhai bijiu,
taduise singgiu kumjiu luangpadle;
chiudi paniu pamaidungtu taruak nai chami pikhai ngamma?”
Paliu khuanse
palung pomjiu pamaitu chaminiu rusude,
sichiujiu palung pomse nkiukhang mide.
Palamra paniu paliutu gukhai ngamme,
chiubo paliuniu malum makge.
Chiudi paniu akhamse lepadra, tingpuktu chamtan pikhai-e,
paliu tiura manna paniu pikiu khai-e.
Sichiujiu paliuniu maza tatekse tiu-e.
Paliuniu lunibose, Tingwang niu pikhai-e.
Sichiujiu tingbang lamgu tingkaise pi hun khai-e,
sichiujiu pagu pumtan siniu tingrun lamgu tingkai situ kam masung khaide.
Sichiujiu pamaidung leng paniu thingnadung,
nbuiniang kumjiu langkhaide;
paliu riziky n-gangga pikhaijiu,
paliugu mathenky kadang hina pi phui khaide.
Sichiujiu mai hina tiujiu magiu lude;
paliuniu masenbo hina, Tingwang niu pikhai-e.

chawang ruangga dithubo pithiu khaine.
Agu ladriatse Iniu pakhuga majai khaine,
Iniu pakhuga ladriat khaibose tingtheng leng-e.
Pakai-pakiktu tingthengjiu chawang pithiu khaine,

Chiudi pakai-pakikmai siniu,
agu tacheng-tajaise majai makjiu
agu ladriat majai maksai;

agu ladriatse majai maksai,

Chiudi David tu Iniu lungsabo hai saolakge,
maksai pakhuga ladriat khaibose Iniu maolakge.
Iniu pakhuga ladriat lubose kampang lakge,
maksai Iniu pakhuga ladriat khaibose khatnadi lumalan lakge.
“Azan masanboga malod khatniu tingtheng leng,
Iniu ladriat thiukhai mibo-e:
David khuga Iniu wadaodi arat lakge!
Pakai-pakikse lungtan-tanne,
khatdi naimikniu padbam then, Iniu pawangdihtu akhe khaine.
Haise tingpukga chahiuniu chamchangbo
lamchap thiu kabam kum rabo-e.”
Nangniu kadalubo wang situ nalung pomjiu,
patu wajeng simakjiu thon mide.
Navangtu chamriat khaibose luthon mide,
khatdi pawangkining pirunse taniangjiuga thonkhai mide.
Pagu namdi rengse nangniu kampang lujiu,
pagu chari rengse kam maha mide.
Pagu kabam hinase tad mariumai siniu aga lude;
pakiningmai hina patu nuimen bamme.
Pagu mikremaitu chari ngambose nangniu pikhai mide;
nangniu paliu chun piwi khai mide.
Pagu chari maniadungse pageng hamide;
sichiujiu patu chari bamga ngamkhai mide.
Pagu chawang thunse nangniu luthon lujiu,
pawangkining pirunse kadihga thonkhai mide.
Pating tang makhaga patu pi tanpao khai-e,
khatdi kamangambo siniu pazu gomkhai-e.
Nagu lungpomse chami kumjiu dethengkha taobam ralo?
Agu ringting hai dejiukha dunno, chiubo maningtao khailo;
nangniu dambo shaisuibo chamaina pakhiangna hakammi rabo-e,
chiubo maningtao khailo!
Saoniu ringbamjiu wadaodi shaimak ralo?
Dechiujiu chamainaniu charaw gasu mari ngam ralo?
David khuga nangniu ladriat khaibose degalo?
Navang atu dejiukha kam mangam bamlo, chiubo mangai khai tulo.
Nkengmainiu atu siangjiu bambo hai, dejiukha Iniu khengbambo gulo!
Paniu tadkhaibo bam hinaga, patu kam chaliu mide.

Hey
Nagu saomakbo lungsiat siniu tinggen tungtang bamme;
nagu chamchangbose tingpuk niatang bamme.
Hey Tingwang, nagu kendibose tingpukga,

Pagu masanbo bam gasu Tingwang niu senjiu bamme,
“Chari ngamboga Shechem tu Iniu njan mine;
khatdi Sukkoth Ramjeng hai amaileng njan mine.
Gilead di, Manasseh di agu-e,
Ephraim hai aripuan pisuang-e,
khatdi Judah hai agu ladjan thun si-e.
Chiudi Moab haitu Iniu agu tathikuang thiu rabo-e,
khatdi Edom riga aphitop thon khaijiu,
sise agu-e chiubo madu khai rabo-e.
Philistine mai riga, Iniu chari ngambo khuan sen padne.”

saoniu atu puiwang ralo, Hey Tingwang yo?

Nagu tacheng-tajai hai, I shaibo nai tangjiu piura chap lude.
Nacham majaisiak lumak maitu Iniu mareng-e,
chiudi Ira nagu tacheng-tajaitu lungsa-e.
Nangra alam ponpao khatdi atu gupao-e;
nagu ladriatga Iniu agunbo bamme.
Naliu nuan phungmai, akhu gasu tad milo.
A-Rawang gu chamtanse Iniu piune.
Nangniu ladriat khaibo pumtanse aleng pikhailo, chiusai I ringlu bui-e;
agu machun-ga atu pi-alung makbo thiukhai tulo!
Atu jukhailo, chiusai I wilu rabo-e,
khatdi nagu chamtan-ga pawan machang Iniu achun ngut lune.
Nagu tacheng-tajai piumakmai hinatu, nangniu luthon mine;
paliu son kasabo makum sira pageng ha-e.
Kasabo mai hinatu, nangniu kararen kum lukhai-e,
sijengniu nagu ladti situ Iniu masenbo-e.
Nagu ladjan jengniu, Ira manangboniu phui-e,
palamra natu I ping-e.
Majibo nai kawibose Iniu kam mide;
amikremai khuga atu phutkhai tulo!
Navangtu nkha khaine chiubo ladriat thiu khailo;
chaliangmai situ pijiu, atu kam mathad khai tulo!
Nangniu rankhaira ladriat thiukhaibo nkha situ
phuijiu khuanboga amik niumide.
Nagu saomakbo lungsiat siniu, atu phui khailo,
khatdi nagu chamtanse atu kati khailo.
I hai navang-e; atu ningting pikhailo,
chiusai nagu katikhai situ I silune.
palamra mainiu nacheng majai makge.
Nagu chamtantu Iniu kachiatu suang masen-e,
withubo kachiatu suangdi luni-e.
Sichiujiu Iniu nagu ladti hina majaine,

Nagu katikhai sira maisuang ha-e;
haise alungchun pakhiangnaniu majaine.
Nagu katicham din masan khaibo siniu kabenbo pikhai-e,
khatdi wasimak maileng ningting pikhai-e.
Nagu chamtan-ga alung ngutbo jengniu,
amun ngapad lujiu I asiu thi bamme.
Akhulam mariwanglo, khatdi atu lungsa khailo.
Natu lungsamai khuga kamkhaibo kum, akhuga kamkhailo.
Nangniu ladriat khaibo kum I kaorabo gasu atu gukhailo;
kasabose ariga pi wangkhai mane.
Atu kam kabuakjiu bammai khugasu, atu gukhailo,
chiusai nagu chamtanse Iniu majai lune.
Nangniu maluang khaijiu atu thoikhailo;
khatdi nagu tacheng-tajaise katikhailo.
Maidungniu nagu tacheng-tajaitu majai makbo donniu,
Amatui hai singgiu kum luang bamme.
khatdi nagu tacheng-tajaise maji-e.

amikremai siniu nagu chamtan situ lukhai makbo jengniu,
alung pombo siniu chami kumjiu alungga tao-e.
Nagu ladriat haira dejiukha majilo! Sise dejiukha Iniu masenlo!
I ra kasa-kason mai-e, siniu atu tajeng sikhai makge,

Nacheng matipbo hai tingtheng bamrabo-e,

Magenthiu chariubo nai manangbo siniu akhuga phui-e,
chiudi nagu chamtan siniu, aleng chunwibo phungwang-e.
Nangniu katikhaibo hina pawan machang maji-e;

Alungchun siakniu natu I ku-e,
atu nkha khailo, chiusai nagu chamtanse Iniu majaine!
Iniu natu kujiu bamme, atu gukhailo,

Naimik pad makhaga atu nkha khaira Iniu natu ku-e;

Nangniu katikhaibo situ makumjiu nchun I raksang-e.
Palamra nagu lungsiat hai saomakge;
akhuan chiukhailo, Hey
nagu lungsiatse lenkhailo, khatdi aringting pi khailo!
Atu kam mathad maise nawang kinne,

Chiudi nangra amungga bamme,
nagu chamtan haise tingtheng-e.
Nagu katikhai lamga Iniu nda silude;
nangniu sise tingtheng leng kamkhaibo-e.
Agu magenthak hai phuikhailo, khatdi atu rankhailo,

Alam ponjiu, atu lepad khailo;
nangniu ladriat khaibo kum atu gukhailo.
Kasamai tura rankhai lakge,
palamra paliuniu nagu tacheng-tajaise majai makge.
Chiudi nagu lungsiatra di-e,
nagu lungsabose lenkhailo, sichiujiu atu rankhailo!
Atu mikremai nai ngaokhai lakmai hai keng-e.
chiudi nagu tacheng-tajai situ Iniu majai makbo thiumakge.
Maitu jontiu maitu Iniu ngaoboga, alung pomboniu phui-e,
palamra paliuniu nagu chamtan situ majai makge.
Phuilo nagu katikhaibo situ dejiukha Iniu masenlo,
Nagu lungsiatra wadaodi kali makge, haijengniu atu gukhailo!
Nagu tacheng-tajai lungchun sira majibo-e,

Pumtan bammai siniu, majimakjiu atu chari thiu-e,

Iniu mareng-e, aratbo hinatu mareng-e,

Iniu thuonlon chinnia-e.

atu gukhailo,
Ka-arat maidung yo,
Tingwang niu naliu khuga degu kamkhai ralo?

Agi-manaibotu marengbo maidung situ

Paniu natu kamkao lakge, natu gukhaipiuse pawan machang rakjiu bamme.

Kapingbo hinaga
Nangniu mengbo, wangbo hinaga paniu natu tuhoidi, tingthengdi gukhai bine.
chiujiu paliuniu atu dinboga, I achun wi-e.
Tuhoira aliu Jerusalem rengmun nunglam chap bamme!
Jerusalem haira chun chamjiu khatdi mataiwijiu lungra,
kalankhai mibo namdi si-e.
Haise Israel mai kiphiuniu,

Haiga Israel mai wangdungniu,

Jerusalem agi-manai raleng khenglo:
“Natu lungsa maidung lungwibo thiumi sulo.
Nareng lungga agi-manaibo,

Singnamaidung nai akahmaidung jengniu,
Jerusalem khuga Iniu dinbo-e,
“Nakhuga agi-manaibo thiumilo!”

nang lungwi khangra Iniu khengbo-e.
natu Iniu phuikhang-e.

Ringjiu bambo khaoring hina
Haiga nangniu ningting nai kawibo ladtikhaibotu silujiu khatdi dinbambo pasukse silura kadincham bamme.
Paliuniu nang ningtingjiu lungra khatdi lungchun masanjiu, majijiu khatdi wijiu lungra katikhai birabo-e.
Paliuniu wasimak maitu pijiu khaoti khai ngamme khatdi chabonmaitu pijiu khaora khai ngamme.

Anah yo, nuan phungmainiu natu hiamboga, suikhai mane.
Paliuniu haichiu dinsai, “Wanglo, aliuniu maitu kamshatra phiukhe! Aliuniu pamao hamaitu palam haboga charuang-chapa thiura chonkhe!
Aliuniu paliutu adaoboga paliu wibamdi sui-e, ringbamdi sui-e, chiudi aliuniu paliutu mathad-mathiu khai bisai, paliu shaimi rabo-e!
Aliuniu chakhiu-chalan hina daolune, sichiujiu sutlubo maniadung siniu aliu ky khaiphui mikhe!
Wanglo, aliu saisui lulo sichiusai aliuniu agalubose aliu mathiu njan rabo-e.”
Anah yo, sikumbo maidungtu kangkhat thiujiu tadtulo. Paliu khugasu mari milo
Paliura kasa kamratu khuan ngam lulakjiu bambo-e. Paliura maitu kamshat ratu khuanjiu bambo-e.

namdigu rengmun-ga khatdi maidungniu maduijiu bambo hinaga senjiu bamme:
“Kapangmai yo! Naliu dethengkha pangjiu bamralo? Naliuniu dethengkha tasitu din masajiu bamralo? Wadaodi naliu lukhai lakma?
Iniu naliutu rukhaibo haitu lukhai lulo; Iniu naliutu ladti mawikhai bine, khatdi agu tasi hai naliutu pikhai bine.
Iniu naliutu wangra kujiu bambo-e, chiudi naliuniu nkingkhai makge. Naliuniu atu wajeng sikhai makge.
Iniu ladtikhaibo haitu naliuniu luni makge khatdi naliutu kam maji khaira naliuniu atu suikhai makge.
Sijengniu naliu magenthiu chariubo wan-ga, Iniu naliutu nuirabo-e.
Nping-charenbo siniu tingthung kumjiu, magenthiubo khatdi thiuniubo nai kanangbose hun matan wangboga Iniu naliutu nuimen rabo-e.
Siga naliuniu ningtingtu kusune chiudi Iniu naliutu paokak khai lakge. Naliuniu pabam machang atu phiusune, chiudi naliuniu atu phiudao lakge.
Tasi haitu naliuniu wadaodi lukhai makge khatdi
Naliuniu aladdintu wadaodi luni makge maksai Iniu naliutu katinkhaibo suini makge,
Sijengniu naliu tienkam saisuijiu, thiuniubo hai naliu daobui-e.
Wasimak maira ningtingtu lukhai makbo jengniu shairabo-e. Kapangmai hai wa mathingsi kamak jengniu lung mahami rabo-e
Chiudi alad lukhaimai hinara wadi ping lakge. Paniu wa kasatu manangra ha-e.”
Anah yo, Iniu natu ladtikhaibo hai silulo, khatdi sise wadaodi kamra mangai tulo.
Ningtingcham tu nking mawi lujiu silura kamlo.

niu ningting pikhaibo-e; pakhu gasu tasi-ningting wangbo-e.
Paniu tacheng matipmai, palung masan maitu gukhaijiu nkhakhai bibo-e.
Maitu lungsasi maitu, khatdi pakhuga pachun khaibam maitu paniu gukhai bine khatdi akhekhai bine.
Nangniu alad nkingsai, tacheng matipbo nai majibo ladjan hai nangniu silurabo-e. Nangniu kamrabo lamse nangniu silurabo-e.
Sichiujiu nang ningting mirabo-e, khatdi nagu tasiniu natu pi chunwi khai rabo-e.
Nagu tasi ningtingniu natu gukhai bine.
Khatdi kamaobo kammi rabo gasu natu ju marikhai bine. Kasamai khugasu natu ju marikhai bine.
Tacheng matipbo lunlungtu phut lujiu nuan gu tamiuboga lungmi maidung khugasu natu jukhai ngamme.
Paliura pageng habo khatdi kamaobo kamraboga chunwi-e,
paliura mainiu malum silak mibo maidung-e.
Palad-niam wijiu natu hiamwangbo, tacheng matipmakbo pui khugasu nang marilubui-e,
sibo pui sira pakina khuga matip makjiu, khatdi pagu masanbo ladriattu mangai mibo pui-e.
Nangniu pakyga tadsai kashaibo npui gase nang tadbambo-e. Siga tadkhaibo sira charuidihga tadkinbo-e.
Sibopui khuga tadkhai mibo mai khatniudi malanwang makge. Paniu karingbo npuiga wadaodi malanwang ngam makge.
Sijengniu kawibo mai khatdi tacheng matipmai sai nang suilulo.
Pacheng-pariak matipmai siniu aliu kadih haiga lungrabo-e.
Chiudi kasamai nuan phungmaitu Tingwang niu haibo kadih gasu singbang pethon mibo kumjiu pethonmi rabo-e.
Anah yo, Iniu natu katikhaibo hai mangai tulo. Nangniu kamra Iniu katikhaibo hai pawan machang maningtao bamlo.
Iniu katikhaibo hainiu natu pi lungwi khaine khatdi pi ringtheng khaine.
Kadinpiubo nai malumsuibo haitu wadaodi phutmi tulo. Haidung situ nawongga matiu lulo, khatdi nalungchun ga raokhai lulo.
Nangniu haichiu kamsai, Chara chamainiu natu thuonne.
Nangniu kambo hinaga
Naronna nang ningting-e chiujiu maning mitulo; kasabo gasu marilujiu
Nangniu haichiu kamsai, haise chapiu kawibo kumjiu, najam-naratu pi wikhai bine.
Nangniu daoraithubo kachia-rangkang maksai alin-tara withubo siniu Rapiu tu chakhuang thiubo thiujiu kadkhailulo.
Nangniu sichiusai, nabawse alin tamra siniu phui maliam khaibine khatdi naleng katiu kasak mali-malan khaibine.
Papiuniu panahtu rubo kumjiu
Ningting lumai—wasi kalumaise pasan wi-e.
Kachia-rangkang makhuan makeng lubo suang haisiniu naleng wi-nkiu-e.
Ningting hai tiuchang suang paman kung-e, nangniu haise wa kakitu pon kada silakge.
Ningting hainiu ringthengbo khatdi chakhiu-chalan sigasu chakhuang thiubo natu pikhai bine.
Ningtingniu agi-manaibo khatdi manangmakbo ringting pithiu khai-e.
Ningtingmai pasan wi-e, ningtingniu paliuleng ringting pikhai bine.
Pagu ningtingniu singgiutu piluang khai-e, khatdi kamuang siniu kadihpiriga pi tingriu khaibi-e.
Anah yo, nagu ningting tasitu thin matip lulo. Sise wadaodi nakhu gasu pitadmi tulo.
Paliuniu natu agi-manaibo khatdi chunwi mathabo ringting pikhai bine.
Nangniu na-npuiga naphi masui makjiu tad mawi ngam lune.
Nangniu nchun naziga jira wangbo tingga pinglakge, khatdi ji aman saijiu ji lune.
Kasamai khuga tingthung kumjiu wangbo kasabotu nangra manangra ha-e.
niu natu jukhai bine. Paniu natu pijiu tathakga mankhai lakge.
Nangniu kawi kam ngambo tingga, pageng bammai hina leng kamkhai bilo.
Nangniu nakining maitu tuhoi nkhakhai ngamsai, nsuannai niu nkha khaine khuanlo chiu dintulo,
Nakining maitu kam masara wadaodi rangtulo; pah natu malumjiu nakhuga mangiu khaijiu lung bambo-e.
Palam haboga mai khattudi ari-ara mane, paniu natu kasa kamkhaibo wadi ha-e.
Palung kasa mainiu wa kasa kamjiu bambotu manmami tulo,
Palamra wa kasa kammaitu
niu kasamai kikhun ga tasiang pikhai-e chiudi tacheng matipmai kikhun ga thoikhai-e.
Paniu wasao thiumaitu suini makge. Chiudi lung manon maitu lungsa khai-e.
Ningting mainiu chakhuang thiubo zan daone, chiudi kapangmaira kamangambo daosanne.
Anahmai yo, naliu piuniu naliutu katikhaibo nkinglo. Naliuniu nking mawi sai wasi lune.
Iniu naliutu katikhaibo hai kawibo-e, siniu pakhiangna maningtao lulo.
Iniu apui-apiu nah kamalibo thiujiu napoinah thiubambo tingga,
apiuniu atu katikhai-e. Paniu din-din-e, “Iniu dinbo hai maningtao bamlo, wadaodi mangaitulo. Natu Iniu katikhaibo kumjiu kamlo, sichiusai nang lunglune.
Ningting tasitu lukhai lulo! Iniu dinbo haitu mangai mane khatdi maning mala mane.
Ningting haitu phutmi tulo, patu lungsalo, sichiusai paniu natu nkha khaine.
Ningting lukhaibo hai nangniu kamlurabo gasu kungthubo si-e. Nangniu daobo hinaga wasibo haitu kada lulo.
Ningtingtu lungsalo, sichiusai paniu natu kam madikhai bine. Patu pam matip lulo, sichiusai paniu naleng chakhuang thiubo phungwang bine.
Paniu naleng pakendibo pirunse thiune.”
Anah yo, alad nkinglo. Iniu nakhuga din bambo hai kumjiu kam lulo, sichiusai nang ringtheng rabo-e.
Iniu natu ningting khatdi majijiu lungra npui katikhaibo-e.
Nangniu ningtingjiu tadsai wakhatniudi natu khamlakge, khatdi pakjiu kindi naphi masui lakge.
Nangniu katilubo hina maningtao tantanlo nangniu tasi ningting phiubo haise nagu ringting-e, haitu akhe mawilulo.
Kasamainiu tadbo lam tadtulo. Kasamai nkhai-rili saisui tulo.
Haise kamtulo, kasabo gasu mari lulo! Haise suikhai tulo na-npuilam tad taron milo.
Kasamaira wakasa kamkhai maksai jikiulu lakge. Paliura maitu wa kam masa makthen lungringjiu bambo-e.
Kasabo ngam khatdi kasabo lungpom hai paliugu katiu kasak kumbo-e.
Tacheng matip mainiu tadbo chabin sira tingben suraga tadbo kum, benbi-bi khangjiu ben masan mirabo-e.
Chiudi kasamai npui sira nchun kumjiu tamiubo-e. Siniu paliu nkhuang-e, chiudi detu masui jiulo chiubo paliuniu simakge.
Anah yo, Iniu kadinbo haise nking mawilo. Alad hai nking khailo.
Haise nakhu gasu wadaodi pitadmi tulo. Pawan machang maningtaojiu nalungga khailulo.
Haise daolumai hinaleng chapum wibo khatdi karingbo pikhaine.
Nangniu ndechiujiu maninglo chiubo makum mawilo; palamra naringtingse nagu makum nai maning siniu nalunlung dambo-e.
Maji kamakbo ladse wadaodi dintulo. Aratbo nai kamaobo lad dinboga wadaodi jaomane.
Nalungchun masan siakjiu nasuanglam phui majijiu tadlo, wadaodi mangamjiu napi kin masuk mitulo.
Nangniu kambo hina rang mawilo, sichiusai nangniu kambo hina wikam rabo-e.
Kasabotu marilujiu tad maji padmilo. Majibo npui gasu phiken khatnadi tadken padmi tulo.
Anah yo, agu ningting nai tasitu nking mawilulo.
Sichiusai nangniu najai-nali kawiboga dechiujiu lungralo chiubo silura-e, khatdi naladkengniu nang wa kasimai-e chiubo lenkhai rabo-e.
Mainao chamkengra makhuidui kahum kum humbam talakge khatdi paniu biangpup khaibo sira takisa sadui kumjiu madio bam talakge;
chiudi pakhiangnase loimiboga kakhabo nai kathiubo makjiu wakhatdi masiak lakge.
Paniu natu charuidihga maluong khai rabo-e, paniu tadkinbo npuisira kashaibo-e.
Para karingbo npuiga tad makbo-e, chiudi ron maha mibo-e, nde padbamlo chiubodi maningkhai makge.
Anah yo, tuhoi alad nking lubo hai wadaodi mangai mitulo.
Sikumbo pui khugasu marilulo! Pah kamun mung gadi tadwang mane.
Nangniu haise kamsai pakak khatga natu chakhuang thiukhai mibose, mainiu lutad mine khatdi nang chabonmai thiujiu lungsa simakbo mai ben-ga shai rabo-e,
Yo, nagu chakhiu chalan hinase khatdi nangniu kamkhai bambo hinase mainiu lutad mirabo-e.
Natia-nazan hinase tiulujiu nagu kashai ziga ahuijiu nang jibam mirabo-e.
Siga nangniu dinsune, “Dekamjiu katikhaibo situ Iniu wadaodi lukhaimak jiulo? Dekamjiu atu rukhaibo situ Iniu suikhai nimak jiulo?
Atu laddin khaimai kadinchamtu Iniu chiukhai makbo jengniu khatdi alung matip makbo donniu-e.
Sijengniu mathiu masuangga mangambo hai I daonuang mibo-e.”
Nanao khuga chamchang lulo, sichiujiu patu ronna lungsa lulo.
Maipui katamboniu naleng lungkhaibo nah siniu naleng kawi kamkhai silakge.
Nanah mainiu natu nkha khaira lungkhang rabo sangnu, mai katam mainiu nkha khaira makge.
Sijengniu nangniu maluang lung bambo pui khuga nachun khaijiu matha-ringajiu lunglulo.
Para palun wibo khatdi lungsabuibo tathanliu si-e. Palunwat siniu natu pi chunwi khailo, pagu lungsiat siniu natu juijiu bamlo.
Anah yo, nangniu dekamjiu nagu lungsabose maipui katammai khuga pikhai ralo? Dekamjiu nangniu mainao lunwat situ masen nkiumi ralo?
Nangniu kambo hina
Kasamaigu nuan sira tathak khatle. Panuan gu tathakga patu manmi rabo-e.
Paronna patu thinriapsi makbo donniu pah shaibo-e. Pameng lamsu patu paronna parawlam langkhai mirabo-e.
Anah yo, mai khat paw sung nang chaplubui-e chiujiu ladriat thiukhai mibo bamma?
Nalad gasu khatdi nangniu ladriat thiukhaibo gasu natu minman mibo khatdi manman mibo bamma?
Anah yo, sichiusai, nang maiben hangga bam mibo-e. Chiudi haichiu npadlan rabo-e: kalangjiu pakhuga meng, natu phut khaira khenglulo.
Naronna jibammi tulo maksai mathakmi tulo.
Thingnaniu maksai tathanniu tathiu kahamai khugasu maribo kumjiu sikumbo thak gasu mari lulo.
Kamakemai siniu matiangpui khugasu wa-kawi ngiudon katilu bui-e.
Paliugu jupao maksai mawangpao thiuson makge,
chiudi tatheting leng, chaken tinggasu paliuniu tatek kadenkhai mibo-e.
Kamakebo mai siniu dethengga jibam ralo? Pah dedao buangsu ralo?
“Maluat khat jithud khaine” chiu paniu din-e, “Aben makhumlujiu poinaga mathak khaine.”
Chiudi paniu jibambo tinggasu kaleksabo siniu suttiumai kumjiu chaheng-changiu thinlu patu aphen wang sune.
Pageng habo khatdi kasabo maidung sira aratbo cham dinjiu tadron kinbo-e.
Paliuniu natu sontiura paliu mik kakhipjiu khatdi pazu thiulenjiu bamme,
paliu lungchun sira pabam hinaga kam kabuak khaira ronna rangjiu bambo-e.
Haijeng gasu sansabo siniu paliutu wadi kachankhai makjiu, shaisiak rabo sansetse paliu daorabo-e.
Chaliangbo mikphui,
aratbo lee,
pamao hamaitu gibo ben,
kasa rangbo lungchun,
wakasa kamra majatbo phi,
aratbo riga arat sanbo jengdin,
khatdi pasingnamai ruangga wa kasa rangbo.
Anah yo, napui napiuniu natu katikhaibose wadaodi mangaimi tulo.
Pawan machang paliu ladse nalung chun-ga khailujiu khamten man milo.
Paliugu katikhaibo siniu nang nbin tadbo tingga natu gukhaine, nchun kiusai gukhaine khatdi n-nien tingga natu ladtikhai birabo-e.
Paliuniu ladpi khaibose kabenbo nbiu-e, paliuniu rukhaibo siniu nang dechiu lungralo chiubo katikhai birabo-e.
Haisiniu natu kasabo puidung maksai mainaogu taphanbo lad gasu ju marikhai ngamme.
Paliu lunwat kawibo siniu natu hiammi tulo, maksai paliu mikphui kasabo gase manmi tulo.
Mai khatniu chakhapuitu taruakpek khatniu hiamlu bui-e, chiudi makhabo ngamkam siniu pagu kabambo hina kam maha mirabo-e.
Nafai-nani rumakjiu nagaga chami khailujiu nang ponlu buima?
Chami miti riga naphi rumakjiu nang tad ngamlu buima?
Mainaotu maluang jibo hai sikum gapjiu sansabo-e. Haikumbo kammai hinara magenthiu rabo-e.
Agatiubo piu siniu mariujiu katiu agabo tingga maidi khan makge;
chiudi patu nimlusai, paniu dam chinnia majon rabo-e, pagu kabambo hina paniu majon rabo-e.
Chiudi makhabo maira pachun para thiumakmai, paronna patu kam maha bambo-e.
Patu kam mangam khairabo-e khatdi daprabo-e; pagu mangamse tingtheng rabo-e.
Pakinaniu palung pombo lungnotse mai khatniudi sitang lakge, khatdi pamalan thiulakge.
Majontu paniu lulakge, wajiukha kalen pibo siniu pagu lungpomse kimsi lakge.
Anah yo, Iniu nakhuga dinkhaibo nangniu kamrabo hai wadaodi mangai makjiu maningtao lulo.
Iniu dinbo hai kamlo, sichiusai nang ringlune. Iniu katikhaibo hai nangniu namiktu majaibo kumjiu manangjiu majai lulo.
Iniu katikhaibo hai pawan machang thinlujiu nalungga raokhai lulo.
Ningtingtu natanpui kum khatdi tasitu naka kungthubo kumjiu lukhai lulo.
Paliuniu mainao khatdi taphanbo lad dinbo puidung khugasu natu jumari khai ngamme.
Naikhat Iniu agu kiran gasu phuibamboga,
Wasimakbo chabonmai ruang gasu pangthubo piu khattu Iniu ngao-e.
Maipui khatniu lungbambo kamikke khatga bambo npui lamse pah tadkiu mide.
Paniu paky mungga chawan tamiu mibo tingga tadwang-e.
Paniu patu padjiu sundao-e; pase papum jonbopui kumjiu pafai pani piu-e khatdi waga pah rangbamme.
Pase kahubo pui-e khatdi mangam makjiu npuiga tadjiu bambo-e,
pakak khatsai kamik khatga, pakak khatsai npuikiga, wadaoga senkiga chapkhuan bambo pui-e.
Paniu chabonmai nah wongga kiaplujiu patu kapupjiu pazu-ga mating phui lujiu din-e,
“Thainai charathiuboga I tadlujiu wang bamme.
Sijengniu natu phiura I padbo-e. I natu adaonijiu padgapboga nang haiga bamniubo-e!
Iniu azise Egypt gu fainoi tarikboniu thaptom khai bamme.
Akhuga parim wibo wasadui khatdi parim wibo chamiangrimse bamme.
Wanglo, thaichunra mathen sangkhe. Ania khat khattu pamlujiu mathenkhe.
Akina chakyga ha-e. Pah chabin kadiulam tad mide.
Pah rangkang kengga phunglujiu tadmide, n-nid kak nia lungga pah wanglan lakge.”
Sichiujiu paniu patu palunwat nai paladniam siniu hiam lude.
Patuse kabuichitu kamshatra jutadbo kumjiu khatdi chakhengniu tathakga buangkhai mibo kumjiu pasai suitad nuang mide.
Siga pamalungse tavaithuniu ketbo kumjiu ketmi sune. Pase thingna khatniu pasipga wa kasabo bamme chiubo simakjiu lenwang mibo kumjiu tadmide.
Sijengniu tuhoira, anah yo, alad nkinglo. Iniu kadinbo hai nking mawilo.
Sikumbo puiniu nalungchuntu pijiu jukmi tulo, patu maningmi tulo.
Paniu mai wajiukhatu kam maha mibo-e khatdi pakhui sikam kalak siga shaikhai mibo-e.
Nangniu pakyga tadsai, charuidih lamse nang tadjiu bambo-e. Haise shainong rabo npui si-e.
Makumbo gasu pakhuanse pichiu khai ngamme.
Npui mungga bambo luongbut gase
khatdi npui-npai gase pah chap bamme.
Namdi lam ngutrabo rengmun gase paniu
chaplujiu ku bamme:
“Naliu mathiu khuga Iniu khengbo-e,
kadihpiriga bammai hinatu Iniu kubo-e.
Nashiu chap makhama? Nashiu chaplura katilulo.
Nang wa katira simakbo kapangmai ma?
Kinglo, Iniu nakhuga kadinbo hina hai
kawibo khatdi majibo chamme.
Iniu dinbambo hai majibo-e, aratbo situ Ira mareng-e.
Iniu dinbo hina majibo-e,
wadi majimakbo khatdi kamaobo ha-e.
Wa kasimai khuga haise masansiak bamme;
wa kasi-kangaomai lengra mala-e.
Rangkangtu suang aladdin haitu kadalulo.
Withubo kachiatu suang tasi haitu kadalulo.
“Ira Ningting si-e, tiuchang suang Ira wi-e,
nangniu atu wakhat niudi kadasi lakge.
Ira Ningting si-e, akhuga tasi bamme;
kamajibo ladzanse akhuga bamme.
kasabotu marengbo-e;
Ira chaliangbo nai wasao thiubotu
khatdi kasabo nai aratbotu mareng-e.
Iniu rangbose kamjiu bambo-e,
Ira wasibo-e khatdi Ira tanbo-e.
Iniu chawangtu pijiu dihthin khaira
khatdi mawangpaoniu tacheng-tajai kawi kamra nkha khaibo-e.
Kadihpiriga kalungmai hina,
wa kasimai khatdi katheng-kadimai hina
agu nkha thinjiu bambo-e.
Atu lungsamaitu Iniu lungsa-e,
atu phiumai hinaniu daolune.
Pi lungwi khaira khatdi pingam khaira akhuga
chakhiu-chalan nai chakhuang thiubo hai bamme.
Nangniu akhu gasu daobo haira,
withubo kachia suang, khatdi masanthubo rangkang suang widiang-e.
Ira tacheng matipbo npui tadbo-e,
Ira majibo npui saisuibo-e.
Atu lungsamaitu lungsingkhiu khai bine,
paliu kyse chakhiu-chalanniu piphui khai bine.
nda pagu gandam hina gasu raithubo-e.
Paphibang siakga atu damkhaibo-e,
kadihpiritu dam makhaga damrai mibo-e.
Duinai suang atu mana raibo-e,
tadui aladky padmakha gasu mana mibo-e.
Maluongdung suang atu manarai mibo-e,
luongbutdungtu pabamga khaimak gasu dam mibo-e.
Tingwang niu kadihpiritu khatdi sibo luzamtu
dam kamak gasu manarai mibo-e.
Tingpuktu paniu damboga khatdi duinai riga
tingbang-lamraise lenkhaiboga, I bam mibo-e.
Paniu tingpukga kamuang piken khaiboga,
paniu duinaigu duipin lekhaiboga I bam mibo-e.
Duipuitu kukhang makra paniu chamtan piboga,
kadihpiritu dam suboga I bam mibo-e.
I hai ngena kumjiu pamungga ntao bambo-e.
Naimachangna I hai pachun wat thiujiu bambo-e,
I pakhuga bamthen achun wi-e,
Kadihpiritu maluong achun wi-e,
khatdi chamaina khuga alung kim-e.
“Tuhoira, chabon maidung yo, alad nking khailo.
Iniu kadinbo kumjiu kamlo, sichiusai naliu chun wirabo-e.
Naliutu katikhaibo hai nkinglulo.
Ningtingmai thiululo, wa kalammi tulo.
Alad nkingmaise chunwi rabo-e,
aky-kamun ga khuanjiu bammaise donwi rabo-e.
Atu daolubo mai sira ringtingtu daolu mai-e,
khatdi paliu riga
Atu daomak maise patu paronna kam ajambo-e;
atu marengmai hinase kashaibotu lungsabo-e.”
Ningtingniu paky thiulune khatdi pasat chinnia kamlune,
Paniu changira wakhao gilujiu, jaw sak kawiboga pachoi khailujiu chakuang-kaiga dungkhai bamme.
Paniu namdiga pabam kuthubo gasu kura pavang- puidungtu langkhai mide:
“Pachun thiumak mai, wanglo!” Khatdi kapangmai khuga paniu din-e.
“Wanglo Iniu kaden khaibo tatek tiulo, khatdi pachoi khai mawi bambo jawse saklo.
Pachun thiumakbo kahdung situ phut lujiu lung milo. Tasi npuise suijiu lungmilo.”
Palungpom kasamaitu nangniu rukhaisai, kamangambo ronna daorabo-e. Kasamaitu nangniu katin khaisai, natu kam masa khaibo ronna-e.
Palungpom kasamaitu wadaodi rukhai mane; paniu natu marengmi rabo-e. Chiudi nangniu ningtingmaitu rukhaisai, paniu natu chakhuang thiune.
Ningtingmai khuga nangniu kadinthen pah ningting nkiubo-e. Nangniu tacheng matipmai khuga dinkhaibose paniu pagu ningtingga khaisan rabo-e.
Ningting hainiu nagu ringtingga tingkum khaisan birabo-e.
Ningtingse nakhuga bamsai naleng gengne; nangniu haisitu lukhai maksai, magenthiu rabo-e.
Kapangbo hai wasimakbo, palad marangbo mangam makbo pui kumbo-e.
Para paky kamun mungga, maksai namdigu kuthubo bamga ntaolujiu,
pangam pujiu tadmariu kinmaitu kujiu din bamme:
“Pachun thiumak maidung, wanglo!” Kapangbopiu khugadi paniu din-e,
“Ka-agabo dui hum nkiu-e. Ka-agabo taruak tiuwi nkiu-e.”
Pakyga tadkhaimi maise shairabo-e chiubo khatdi paliu hai charuidihga tuhoi bamme chiubo pakhuga mengbambo piuniura simakge.
Haidungse Solomon gu kadinchamme: Ka-ningtingbo nahpiuniu papiutu pi padiu wikhai-e, kapangbo nahra papuileng chariubo phungwang-e.
Nalung masan makjiu daolubo senlan siniu wa kawi kamlu lakge, chiudi nalung masanbo siniu naringtingtu gukhai ngamme.
Kamakebo siniu nang kaleksa mine, chiudi changam kam maranboniu nang kalek wimine.
Pachun kathiumai siniu atiat tingga chamiu khom madui-e; chiudi atiat tingga jibambo hai mangambo khatle.
Kawimainiu thoidam daone. Kasamai ladkeng siniu kasabo lunlungtu nbai-e.
Kawimai tura thoidam kumjiu maningtao bam rabo-e, chiudi kasamai tura mangainuang mirabo-e.
Wa maning kasi mainiu kawibo laddintu lukhai-e. Kapangbo cham kadinmaira hanuang mirabo-e.
Palung masan maira ringlura pumtan bamme chiudi palung masanmak maitura minnuang rabo-e.
Majibotu thin nbaibo siniu kam kabuak khaibo-e chiudi madujiu khan maise agi-manaibo leng kam bambo-e.
Kawimai ladkengra karingbo duipinne, chiudi kasamai ladkengra kasabo lunlungtu baikhai-e.
Wasi majatmainiu tasi cham din-e, chiudi kapangmai tura mathad bui-e.
Ningting mainiu daodiu then tasitu lukhai-e, chiudi kapangmainiu chalad dinsai kabuakbose diuta mibo-e.
Sen-lanniu kalekwimaitu gukhai-e; kaleksaboniu lunglakmaitu kam maha-e.
Kawi kambo phijeng sira karingbo-e chiudi nuan niura nuan ga jukhaibo ronna-e.
Rukhaibotu chiukhai maidungse ringlune. Chiudi paliu maoga suikhaimak mai sira phisui sabo-e.
Marengbotu baikhaibo maise ka-arat mai-e. Maiken tiamaise kapangmai-e.
Nang chalad din makengthen nuan kambo-e. Nang ningtingmai-e sai maliuna bamlo.
Kawimai ladkeng sira masanbo rangkanggi kumbo-e chiudi kasamai chunning sira wageng ha-e.
Kawimai ladkeng siniu mai kakengtu pigeng khai-e, chiudi kapangbo ladkeng siniu patu paronna kamshat lubui-e.
Kamao kamjiu chunwibose kapangbo-e, wa sinuang maira ningtingtu masenne.
Tacheng matip maira paliuniu lunibo daone, chiudi kasamaira paliuniu pingthubose daone.
Tingthung-tingkai wangboga kasamaitu pontad mine, chiudi palung masan maira wadi manangra ha-e.
Kamakemaitu wadaodi nangam kamra langkhai mane; kakhiangboniu nahiu chakimbo kum maksai mikhutniu namik subo kumjiu paniu natu kam mathadra ronna-e.
Kawimai makum siniu pijiu ringa khaine, chiudi kasamai makumra wadi lusonra ha-e.
Tacheng matipmaise pawan machang wibam rabo-e, chiudi kasamaira kadihpiriga lungsi lakge.
Tacheng matipmainiu ningting cham din-e, chiudi wa kasa dinbo lee situ khammi rabo-e.
Tacheng matipmai siniu lungsasibo cham dinne, chiudi kasamaira ladtan ronna din-e.
Wa madat nchang makbo maitu
Chaliang maitu kam mangam khai nuang bine. Lung manuonbo hai ningting nkiubo-e.
Nang wisai, lungchangniu natu jukhaibo-e. Maidungniu malum silakmai sira paliugu nchangmakbo siniu kam mahami rabo-e.
Nang kashaibo nai chakhiu-chalanse pageng ha-e, chiudi lungchun nchangbo siniu natu rankhai ngamme.
Nchangbo lungchun siniu mai khat ringting kam njiukhai ngamme, chiudi kasamaira paronna lung masuk mirabo-e.
Tacheng matipboniu, nchangbo maitu rankhai-e, chiudi mainiu malum silakbo maira patiuni kasaboga manmi rabo-e.
Kasabo mainiu shaiboga, pagu makumdi shai taman mirabo-e. Chakhiu-chalantu malumbora wadi pageng ha-e.
Tacheng matipmaitu kabuakbo gasu gukhai-e, chiudi haise kasamai khuga wangrabo-e.
Charatu simakbo cham npaoniu natu kam maha ngamme, chiudi tacheng matipmaigu ningting siniu natu rankhai ngamme.
Nchangbo maidung siniu, sanwiboga namdise tachun wi-e, khatdi kasamai shaiboga chunwibo khuan sen-e.
Tacheng matip mainiu paliugu thoidam piboga, namdise dikhang-e; chiudi kasamai ladkeng siniu namdi situ kam maha-e.
Maitu kasanjiu lungpom cham dinbo hai kapangbo-e. Nang nachun kathiumai sai maliuna bamlo.
Maiken tiamai khuga mahim lad dinkhai silakge, chiudi malumbuibo mai khugara dinkhai sui-e.
Jukhaibo mai hasai jat khatse kaomi rabo-e, Ladtikhai mai kakengthen pumtan bambo-e.
Zusi makmai paosung nangniu ruine chiujiu ladriat thiutulo, nangniu ladriat thiukhai sai nalung mak rabo-e. Sikumboga jaomakboniu wi-e.
Paladniam wibo khatdi lungsasibo puitu chakhuang thiu-e, chiudi mangui kahabo pui sira kamangambo gu-e.
Kamake mai wadaodi rangkang daolakge, chiudi chakiubo maira kalekwi mine.
Nangniu maitu lungsa khaibo haise naleng kawi kamkhai bambo-e.Nang nathak sasai, natu naronna kam ajambo-e.
Kasamaira pachangsiak wadi kagengbo ha-e, chiudi nangniu kamajibo tensai, natu maomakjiu tathuonse pikhai rabo-e.
Majibo kamra machun bammaise ringrabo-e, chiudi kasabo ngam kamra matanbam maira shairabo-e.
Palung kasa maning maitu
Kasamai tura maomakjiu mathadkhai rabo-e, chiudi tacheng matip maira marilubui-e chiubo nang silulo.
Wasi makbo palun kawibo puira, kavakpui munjuongga kachia khap kakhai kumbo-e.
Kawimainiu masenbo hina wikamna-e, chiudi kasamainiu lunibose daoluboga, mai hina chalung pomme.
Khangsia mainiu paliugu senlan kabambose pageng bamboga thinkhai bamdi lungwi khangmi-e. Khangsia maira pageng bamsiakboga thinkhai makjiu, ntidbam tadi lungwi sonlu makge.
Maitu lungsa silo, chiusai nang lungwi rabo-e. Maitu nkha khailo, chiusai natudi nkha khaine.
Tasiu makhuan lujiu paman khangra khuanbam maitu maidungniu siang-e, chiudi jonjiu bammaitu paliuniu thuon-e.
Nangniu machunbose wisai, natu chakhuang thiune, chiudi maitu kam-kabuakra nangniu phuibam sai, sise nangniu daorabo-e.
Pakhiu-palan ga mangiu khaijiu bammaise chaken tingga singniwdung kumjiu ntangmi rabo-e, chiudi tacheng matipmai sira karia tingga singniwdung kum bonkhang rabo-e.
Pakikhun-ga kabuakbo phungwang maira kanamboga paleng wadi ha mirabo-e. Kapang maira kaningtingmai vang thiujut-jut rabo-e.
Tacheng matipboniu ringting pikhai-e chiudi lungnuat kasaboniu luthonmi-e.
Tasitu lunimaira, paniu maomiboga laddin khaibotu luni-e. Rukhaira suimak mai sira kapangmai-e.
Kawimai khuga
Kasaboniu chapngam lurabo ha-e, chiudi tacheng matip maira chap matiplu-e.
Kawibo nao sira pakina padiu wijiu ri-ngabo-e chiudi pakina khuga mangambo phungwangbo nao sira pakina riga chara kasa phungwangbo-e.
Palung nchangbo mainiu natu akhi mawi khaine, chiudi kasamaira natu kalikra ronna kamme.
Kasamai ladkeng sira maitu kamshatbo-e chiudi tacheng matipmai ladkengra kapingboga gukhai-e.
Kasamaira pakai-pakik thiumakjiu lung masukmi rabo-e, chiudi tacheng matipmai kikhun sira lungkhang mirabo-e.
Nang wasinuangbo mai-e sai natu thuonrabo-e, nang kapangmai-e sai mainiu natu malami rabo-e.
Kadimai thak thiulujiu mariujiu kinrabo suang, maidiumai khat thiulujiu ringra matan kinbo siniu wi-e.
Kawimaira pagu khaorui khaonatu akhi mawi-e, chiudi kasamaira paliu nkhai sa-e.
Changam kamaran mai sira tiura kengbamme, chiudi kapangmai sira pajimakbo ngamga pawan kam maha kinne.
Kasamai hina kasabo ngam ronna machun kinbo-e, chiudi kawimaira matipjiu chap bamme.
Kasamai tura paladkeng gasu manmi rabo-e, chiudi nchangbo maira kabuakbo gasu marilu bui-e.
Nangniu tathuon daobo sira, nalad nai na-tienkam saisui rabo-e, nangniu daobuibose daobo-e.
Kapangmaira paliuniu maningbo ronna maji-e chiu maning-e. Ningtingmaira ladtikhaibotu nking-e.
Kapangmaira palung makbo bammisai sise madu nuangmi-e. Pachun kathiu maira mainiu khanbotu wajeng chak khai makge.
Majibose nangniu dinboga, nchangbose kambo-e, chiudi ka-aratbo siniu nchang makboga jukhai-e.
Wa makum makbo ladkeng siniu chaheng bibo jam kumjiu sukge, chiudi ningtingjiu dinbo ladkeng siniu wikhai ngamme.
Ka-aratbo sira paringting dun-e, chiudi majibora tingtheng lungrabo-e.
Wa kasa rangmaira paleng kasabo daonuang rabo-e, chiudi wa kawi kam maira chunwibo daorabo-e.
Tacheng matipmai khuga kasabo wadi padlakge, chiudi kasamaira kabuakbo ronna daorabo-e.
Pachun kathiumaira paliuniu sibamdi pawan kamakbo gara maliu makjiu bammi-e, chiudi kapangmaira paliu simakse madunuang mi-e.
Chakiuboniu natu pumtan pirabo-e; chiudi nang makesai kavang thiumi rabo-e.
Lungchun chariubo siniu nachun watse luthon mine, chiudi lungsasibo chamniu nachun piwikhai rabo-e.
Tacheng matip maira pakamaitu kawibo ga jukhai-e, chiudi kasamaira kamaobo lam jukhai-e.
Nang makesai, nangniu matan kinbose wadaodi daolakge, chiudi chakiusai sanwibose nang daone.
Tacheng matipbose karingbo npui-e, chiudi kasabora kashaibo npui-e.
Kaningtingbo nahdungra paliu puipiuniu paliutu rukhaiboga paliu chun ngutle, chiudi chaliangbo maidungra paliu maomide chiubo sui makge.
Kawimai tura paliu ladkeng jengniu tathuon pine, chiudi ka-aratmaira paliu tienkam kasajengniu mariujiu tadne.
Nagu ladkeng kajensi sai nang ringlune, palee kengmaira paronna patu kam masa bambo-e.
Kamakebo mainiu wadaodi pamaning tanglu lakge. Kachakiubo maira paniu maningbo hina tathui lubui-e.
Ka-nchangmaira ka-aratbotu mareng-e chiudi kasamai ladkengra kamangambo nai tadiusabo ronna-e.
Tacheng matipboniu pamao hamaitu ranlu-e, chiudi kasabo siniu nuan phungmaitu kamkao mibo-e.
Khangsia maira lungkawi saothiu bamdi, wadi ha-e, khangsia maira, lungkasa saothiu bamdi pagu kengkha bamme.
Kalekwi maira pagu rangkang ponlujiu pagu ringting ranne, chiudi kalek samai tura maidi kapin makge.
Tacheng matip maira ben bansatbo nbiu kumbo-e; chiudi kasamaira midmibo mibung kumbo-e
Wasao kathiuboniu kabuakbo makjiu kaki kamlu makge. Ladtikhaibotu phiuboniu ningting nkiu-e.
Malapajiu daobo senlanse hanuang mirabo-e. Matanjiu daolubo siniu, tingtheng bamrabo-e.
Agu agunbo wangtang makbo ga alungchundi tangmakge, chiudi ai maning wangtangboga ri-ngabose phuimibo-e.
Kawi katikhaibotu nangniu suimaksai kabuakbotu khengbambo-e, haisitu nangniu majaisai wadi manangra ha-e.
Ningtingmainiu katikhaibo sira karingbo duipinne; naringting chariubo daobo wan-ga duaklura haisiniu natu nkha khaine.
Ningtingbo niu chakhuang thiubo phungwang-e, chiudi malum daolak maira ka-nchumbo npuiga tadbambo-e.
Pachun kathiumaira wa kamsu makhaga makum rai-e, chiudi kapangmaira paliugu wasimakbo situ kamlenne.
Malum daolakbo chakhumpao siniu kam kabuak khai-e, chiudi malumsuibo mainiu agi-manaibo phungwang-e.
Wa kawi katilumak maira kalek sarabo-e khatdi mangam rabo-e. Rukhai kasuimaitu chakhuang thiu rabo-e.
Nangniu masenbo dao kaluse dejiuga wilo! Kapangmaira wa kasa gasu mari mira suimakge.
Ningtingmaitu maluanglo chiusai nangdi ningtingne. Kapangmaitu chaka thiusai nang nchum mirabo-e.
Kabuakbose pabam hinaga nuan phungmai saisui tadle, chiudi tacheng matipmai tura wa kawiboniu tathuon pikhai bine.
Kawimaira patah-panahleng pasen-palan khaidiak lubui-e, chiudi nuan phungmai senlanra tacheng matipmaigu thiumi rabo-e.
Tenmakbo luzamse kahamaileng pikhai bisai kengkha kamlubui-e, chiudi majimak mainiu piten makra khamme.
Nangniu nanahtu kasan maksai patu lungsa makbo-e. Nangniu patu lungsasai patu rukhai rabo-e.
Tacheng matip maira tiura kengbamme, chiudi kasamaira mariujiu tadle.
Maipuigu ningtingniu chaky thiusu-e, chiudi kapangbo siniu rathonmi-e.
Nchanglulo chiusai nangniu
Kapangmai palee keng-e; kaningtingmai ladkengniu patu gukhai-e.
Matomchi jaomakjiu chalu tensai nabawse maruongne, chiudi paliutu thinsai nabawse phuilu rabo-e.
Malumsuibo jengdinniu majibo dintan-tanne, chiudi malum daolakbo mainiura aratbo makjiu kakilad din makge.
Palungpom kasamaira wadaodi ningtingmai thiusi lakge, chiudi ningting maira wasi mala-e.
Kapangmai khugasu bam tamsin milo, paliuniu natu wakawi katikhaira wadi ha-e.
Kaningting maise dechiu wasi jiulo? Palamra paniu kamrabose ndelo chiubo si-e. Kapangmaise dekamjiu pangjiulo? Palamra pah paronna patu wasi-e chiu maning-e.
Kapangmaira nuan kam midi manang sonmakge, chiudi kawimaira kuak khaira masenne.
Nagu ringabodi naleng-e, nagu sansabo sidi naleng-e. Mai khatniudi padam pon ncham silakge.
Kasamai kyse hamidi kawimai kyra palun bamrabo-e.
Kanuibo siniu chunsabotu gomnam lubui-e. Chunwibose hamisai, chunsabo bammibo-e.
Kasamaira paliuniu daobuibose daora-e. Kawimaira paliu tienkam saisuijiu tathuonse daorabo-e.
Kapangmaira wahina malumme, chiudi pachun kathiumaira paliu phikentu phui-e.
Ningtingmaira kabuakbotu mari ngamlune, chiudi kapangmaira mari simakjiu kamnuangmi-e.
Palungpom kasamaira kapangbo ngam kamme, ningtingbi maira agi-manaijiu bam ngamme.
Wasimak maira paliu pangniu daobuibose dao-e, chiudi ningting maira tasiniu tathuon dao-e.
Kasamaira tacheng matipmai khuga kinkiujiu paliugu lungsiattu kheng-e.
Kaleksa maitura pakiningmai katangniudi masen makge, chiudi kalek wimaira paka keng-e.
Nadon winisai, kalek samaitu lungsalo maitu marengbo sira nuan-e.
Nangniu kawi kamsai maidungniu natu malumne khatdi chakhuang thiune; nangniu kasa kamsai kammao mibo-e.
Changam kamlo, chiusai nang ringlubui-e, chiudi nangniu ntaolujiu pharuang-pha bamsai kaleksa mirabo-e.
Ningtingmaitu chakhiu-chalanniu tathuon pikhai-e, chiudi kapangmai tura paliu pangniu madu-e.
Jengdinmainiu majibo dinsai maitu ranlu-e, chiudi paniu arat dinsai maitu jonbo-e.
Nang kashaibotu marilu nima?
Chawang khatgu kendibose paniu mawang bambo chamairiak saisuibo-e, paliu hasai pah wadi makge.
Agi-njangjiu bamsai nang ningtingbo-e, chiudi nalung pomsai, nang dejiuga panglo chiubo lenbo-e.
Agi-manaibo lungchunra chapum wibo-e, chiudi manmabo sira rasa kumbo-e.
Nangniu kaleksa maitu kam mathad sai, paliutu damkhaibo Tingwang tu menbo-e; chiudi kaleksa maitu lungsa khaibose kahumbo tienkam khatle
Kasamaira paliu tienkam kasa jengniu lung masuk mibo-e, chiudi kawimaira nchangbo tienkam jengniu paliu ringting ranlune.
Ningting hai wasinuang maigu makum hinaga bamme, chiudi kapangmaira ningting lamga wadi simakge.
Tacheng matipboniu jat khattu kam madi khai-e, chiudi nuan sira jat khatgu mangambo khatle.
Macha kasimaitu chawangniu palung kimme, chiudi matunmak maitu paniu rurabo-e.
Manonbo chamkakniu lungpomtu kam agikiu lu-e, chiudi marangbo chamkakniu mai lungpom kamkhai-e.
Ningting mainiu taphasai tasitu palun kam mawi khai-e, chiudi kapangmaira wadi makbo lad din-e.
Lungsasibo chamra ringting-e; chiudi chalad kasabora nahiupuinatu kam mason bambo-e.
Napiuniu natu katikhaibose nangniu wajeng simaksai kapangbo-e; paniu rukhaibo lukhaisai ningtingbo-e.
Tacheng matip maira paliugu chakhiu-chalan makhuanlu-e, chiudi kasamai gura pageng bamsiakbo wan wangdasai hami-e.
Tasi haise kapangmainiu makjiu, ningtingmainiu dinronbo-e.
Kawimainiu kakheng thiuboga
Kasamai npuitu
Nangniu kamaobo kamsai, natu ruphat khaibi rabo-e, natu rukhaibo nangniu suimaksai nang shairabo-e.
Charuidihga tangbo
Palungpom kasamaira rukhaibotu lunimakge, paliu suang ningtingmai khugasu wadaodi ladti khaira kheng makge.
Maidungse chunwiboga nuirim rimme, chiudi paliu chunsaboga, paliu zu achung-e.
Ningtingmaira wa katini-e, chiudi kapangmaira paliu pangniu kabuibo thiu-e.
Kalek samai ringtingra magenthiu-e, chiudi chunwi bammai ringtingra aman-e.
Kalekwi lujiu kabuak bambo suang, kaleksa tadi
Kamareng maitu chami gan maluang tiubo suang, lungsamaitu chaganniw gan maluang tiuboniu wi-nkiu-e.
Lungpom kasaboniu aribo padle, chiudi khengsiboniu agi-manaibo phungwang-e.
Nang makesai, pabam hinaga magenthiubo daone, chiudi nalung nchangsai kabuakbo daolakge.
Ningtingmai nahniu papiu chun pi wikhai-e, chiudi kapangmai siniu papui chunsiat phungwang-e.
Kapang maira paliu pangga paliu chunwi-e, chiudi ningtingmaira kamajibose kamme.
Daolubui then, ladtikhaibotu phiululo chiusai nang tathui lune, sichiu maksai nang ngamlakge.
Pawan gapboga majibo khatdi nchangbo ladkeng dindao lubose dejiuga chunwibo gulo!
Ningtingmaira kashaibo npui lam tadkiu makjiu, karingbo npui lam tadkhang bambo-e.
Wasao kathiumai kikhuntu
Nangniu nchang makjiu paton lusai, nakikhuntu kam kabuak khaine. Tanim lumane, chiusai nang ringtheng rabo-e.
Kawimaira paliu paokak makhaga makum rai-e. Kasamaira paokak nuang-e, siniu kabuakbose padle.
Kawimainiu kakheng thiuboga,
Nuirim-rimbo zuniu nachun piwikhai-e, khatdi kawibo champaoniu pi chunwi nkiu khai-e.
Natu rukhaibose lukhaisai nang ningtingmai-e.
Wa katini maksai, naronna natu kam mathiubo-e, natu rukhaibo lukhaisai nang ningtingbi mirabo-e.
Aliuniu wa rang-e, chiudi Tingwang chunning thiu rabo-e.
Nangniu kambo hina maji-e chiu maning bamdi lubui-e,chiudi
Nangniu rangboga
Wasao kathiumai hinatu
Kadin piulo khatdi chamchanglo, chiusai Tingwang niu na-nuan kuak khai bine.
Nangniu
Nchangmakjiu kengga daobo suang, nchangjiu poinaga daoboniu wi-nkiu-e.
Nangniu wa rangdi sui-e, chiudi Tingwang niu natien kamga jukhai rabo-e.
Chawangniu chara pumtan thinlujiu dinbo-e, pagu ladzanse majibo-e.
Chawangniu kasabotu khengman lulakge, palamra majiboniu kadih thinmaitu kam matip khaibo-e.
Chawangniu majibotu nking nibo-e, khatdi haise kadinmaitu paniu lungsa khaine.
Ningtingmainiu chawangtu pi chunwijiu bamra kamme; chawang palung pomsai, chamai shaibo sui-e.
Chawang lungsiatra chaken tingga kamuangniu tingriutu phungwangbo kumjiu siga ringbo bamme.
Kachia-rangkang suang, tasi ningting bamboniu wi-nkiu-e.
Kawimaira kasabo npuitu marenjiu tadle, sijengniu nang tadkhairabo bamse phui mawilo, sichiusai nang marilu bui-e.
Chaliangbo sira hamirabo-e, khatdi wasao thiubora lung masuk mirabo-e.
Wasao thiujiu suttiu kinbo suang, lung manonjiu lungsa kinboniu wi-nkiu-e.
Natu katikhaibose nking mawilo, sichiusai nang taphuang lura-e;
Pashiu chapbo ningtingmai situ pagu tasi-ningtingniu si-e. Paladniam kawithen mai pasai suini-e.
Ningtingmai khuga tasi haira karingbo duipin-e, chiudi kapangmai tura dinjing bamdi kalison makge.
Ningting maira paliu din makhaga makum rai-e, sichiujiu paliu kadinbo mai suini-e.
Lungsasibo ladkengra makhuidui kum humbo khatdi apum leng wibo gu-e.
Changam kammai mariubo siniu, patu changamga pijiu marankhai-e, palamra paniu pawontu kam magiukhai ni-e,
Kasamaira maitu kam masara phuijiu bamme, paliu ladkengdi kasaboniu phui-e.
Maiken tiabo hai kasamainiu dinronbo-e, paliura maitu kam kabuakbo ronna-e khatdi chakatu kampang khaibo-e.
Pathak kasamai siniu pakahmaitu sontiu-e, khatdi chariuboga jukhai-e.
Natu pahiu chagijiu pamik kakhipmaitu matingsi lulo; paliu wa kasa rangbam talakge.
Ringthengbose tacheng matip maileng tathuon-e; paliu pi npuakbose kendibo chawang pirun-e.
Pumtan tanbo suang, khengsiboniu wi-nkiu-e. Namdi pakhiangnatu thinmanbo suang napum naronna thinmanboniu wi-nkiu-e.
Tingwang maning silura maidungniu taden thonne, chiudi paokak khairabo sira Tingwang chun-e.
Kabuakboniu phuibo kyga chakhuang-changee thiujiu tiubambo suang, alung agi-manaijiu taruakpek tiuboniu wi-nkiu-e.
Matunmakbo wang nahpiu riga matunbo kavangniu pumtan thinjiu kalek damdi daolu bui-e.
Kachia nai rangkang tura chami gasu madiu-e, chiudi chamaina lungra
Kasamainiu kasabo chamtu nking-e, khatdi ka-arat mainiu ka-aratbo ladtu nking-e.
Nangniu kalek samaitu nuisai, paliutu damkhaibo Rawang tu nangniu nuimenbo-e. Mai pasan sabo wan-ga nachun wisai, natudi mathad khai rabo-e.
Nahmainiu paliu piu jengniu paliu geng thiubo kum, tanpao maidungdi paliu tah jengniu paliu geng thiu-e.
Chakhuangthiu buimaira ka-aratbo cham dinmakge, chiudi kapangmaira lukhai suibo lad wadi dinra ha-e.
Khangsia maira tanim hainiu maichun kam kamihlu-e khatdi wahina kamlubui-e chiu maning-e.
Natu mainiu pijiu masen nisai, paliu mao kuakkhai bilo. Maigu kamaobo maningtao makengbo siniu chakatu kampang-e.
Kapangmaitu daplon kai dapjiu katikhaibo suang, ningting maitu maluad khat kasan khaiboga simakeng lubui-e.
Pawan machang kasa rangjiu kabuakbo ronna kamjiu bammai khuga kashaibose champao kasabo kumjiu wang rabo-e.
Kapangbo ngam kamjiu tadkinmaitu adaobo suang, chahompui papoi ponphek mibotu adaobo siniu wi-nkiu-e.
Nangniu kawibo sung kasaboniu malan khaisai, tasan kasabo wadaodi naky gasu npadlan lakge.
Chalad ari-kasubo hai taduiduang pang karaibo kumbo-e; haise riju makhaga khamlulo.
Pamao hamaitu kam mathad khaibo maksai kasamaitu phutkhaibo, nia haise
Kapangmaitu tasi katikhaiboga rangkang thinbo hai pageng ha-e, palamra pakhuga mathiu charuangchun ha-e.
Chakadungniu pawan machang khat-khattu lungsa bamsai, magenthiu chariubo wan-ga phuikhai makbo singnara degu pageng bamlo?
Pachun thiu kamakbo mai ronna maipaw sung chapra ladriat thiubo-e.
Nuantu masenbo sira kabuakbotu masenbo-e. Pawan machang nangniu wasao thiu bamsai, magenthiu chariubotu kheng bambo-e.
Kasabotu maningjiu khatdi dinjiu bamsai, sansabo makjiu kaki daolakge.
Panah siniu kapangbo ngam ronna kambo piu lengra magenthiubo nai chunsabo makjiu kaki ha-e.
Chunwi-ringaboniu chapum piwikhai-e. Pawan machang achung bambose koina shaikiu bambo-e.
Palung masan makbo ladzanpaoniu mahin tanim lu-e, sichiujiu paniu kamajibose kam makge.
Wa kasibo maira ningtingbo ngamtu machun-e, chiudi kapangmaira kata kadao thiujiu kamme.
Kapangbo nahniu papiuleng chunsabo khatdi papui lung magenthiujiu maningkam lakbo phungwang-e.
Pamao kahabo maitu pijiu majonbose maji makge, kawimaitu kam mathadbo sira majibose kam kadat mibo-e.
Paronna nsisiak bambo maira chalad pangdin-din makge. Pachangjiu maliumak kabammaise wa kasimai-e.
Kapangmaidi pamun kabaman lujiu, maliumak bambisai patu wa kasimai-e chiu lukhaibo sui-e.
Maitu atuk silak maise paronna patu maning madimai-e, mainiu maji-e chiubose para suilakge.
Kapangmaira pah wa si-e, maksai simakge chiubo wajeng simakge, para ningting-e chiubo ronna, lenra matan-e.
Nuan nai kama-ngambo hai tad nchamme. Natu chakhuang thiubose hamisai, sibosung nangniu charuat malurabo-e
Mai khatgu chamkengse kasukbo duipui khatdi luangbambo singgiu kumjiu ningtinggu singgiu thiu ngamme.
Kamaomai lam ponjiu, pamao hamaigu majitu khambose maji makge.
Kapangmainiu chalad arisubo sira dapkhai ratu kheng bambo-e.
Kapangmainiu chalad dinboga paronna patu kam maha bambo-e, paladkeng gasu patu manmi rabo-e.
Maiken tiabo hai dejiuga wilo aliuniu haitu dejiuga masenlo.
Kamakebo maira wakam mahara kambo mai nai nchambo-e.
Wakhat khat thiujiu bamdi, kalek kawimaira paliugu chakhiu-chalanniu paliutu namdigu katheng kadibo singbeng kumjiu dangkhai bamme chiu maning-e.
Lung manuanmak maitu mai khatniudi chakhuang thiu makge, wasao thiumai sira hamirabo npuiga tadbambo-e.
Nangniu npaokak makhaga nkinglulo. Sichiu maksai nangra kapangbo-e, khatdi maitu kam mangambo-e.
Nangniu machunbo siniu nang marabo tingga nkha ngamme, chiudi sise nakhuga hamisai, nagu kanamthubo machunse hamibo-e.
Ningtingmaira wasikhai nijiu katira ronna paliu chun ngutbo-e.
Nangniu katheng-kadimaitu adaonisai, kalen phunglujiu tadlo, sichiusai malarabo-e.
Ladjankyga dinraimaise patu atungjiu bambo mainiu din makthen kamaji kum kamme (paokarai-majirai, paokana majina-e).
Pumtan bammai khangnianiu ladzankyga atungmisai, taden thonboniu kam manai lubui-e.
Nasingnatu nkha khailo, chiusai paniu natu namdigu katanbo singbeng kumjiu natu dangkha bine, chiudi nangniu patu n-gi-athaosai, paniu pakyga pijiu natu ngutta mirabo-e.
Nagu ladliu saisuijiu nang lungrabo-e.
Naladkengniu maitu kam maring ngamme, maksai kamshat ngamme; sijengniu nagu ladliu situ mathingsi rabo-e.
Nanao kawi daosai, wa kawi daolubo-e,
Kaleksa mainiu wa dinsai chakhuang charao chamniu dinne, chiudi kalekwi mainiu paokaksai palad marang-e.
Khangsia maigu chakara tingtheng makge, chiudi khangsia maigu chakara singna suang monne.
Pangjiu arat kinbo suangra alung nchangjiu kaleksa kinboniu wi-e.
Tasi hajiu chalung thiubora wimakge, khengsi makbora kabuakbo daorabo-e.
Khangsia mainiu kapangbo tienkam siniu paliugu kam mahalujiu,
Kalek kawimaira paka keng-e, chiudi kalek kasamaira chaka ha-e.
Nangniu ladzankyga arat dinsai, natu pi mathadkhai rabo-e, siga nang marisi lakge.
Mai hinaniu parathiumai nkhatu lura matankam na-e; nkhakhai simaitu mai hinaniu paka thiuni-e.
Kalek kasamaira pasingna lengdi pageng ha-e, pakadi ha-e. Paniu wajiukha matan bamdi pah daolakge.
Naronna natu nkhalo, khatdi daodiuthen wa katilulo; sichiujiu nangniu katilubose maningtaosai, nang disu rabo-e.
Ladjankyga arat dinmaira wakamdi mathad khairabo situ marisi lakge, pah nchummi rabo-e.
Kapangmaira amansaijiu lungsi lakge, khatdi kavangniu wa kasimai riga mawang silakge.
Nang nachun kathiumai-e sai, na-lungpomtu thinman lubui-e. Mai khatniu nakhuga maokhaibo situ maning maha khaibose withubo-e.
Chawang lungpom sira ndongqui marung-kabam kumbo-e, chiudi paniu nkhabo sira tingriu khaibotu kamachun kumbo-e.
Kapangbo nahniu papiugu lungwat kam maha lubui-e. Palee kengbo nao sira tingjao tap-tap kabam kumbo-e.
Mai khatniu papui papiu khugasu chaky-chalu khatdi chakhiu-chalan daolubui-e, chiudi
Nangniu make nisai make sulo, jijiu bamlo, chiudi nang nawon mariurabo-e.
Tingwang gu tacheng-tajaise majailo chiusai nang ringthengne, nang majai maksai shairabo-e.
Nangniu kaleksamai leng pibose
Nanahmai nahbo ting paliuniu silu buibo tingga rukhai bilo. Nangniu rukhai maksai paliutu kam mahabo ga nkha bambo-e.
Mai khatniu palungpom sasai, paniu paripse phungrabo-e, kabuakbo malod khat padmisai padlon nia pajai-e.
Nangniu maigu laddintu nkingjiu wa katini bamsai, naikhatra nang ningtingbo mai thiumi rabo-e.
Maidungniu wa kata-kara rangbamdi sui-e, chiudi
Patiuni kasabo hai ka-mangambo gu-e, ka-aratmai suangra kaleksabo siniu wi-nkiu-e.
Khangsia maira pamun-ga katiu nphangkhai radi make-e.
Wasao kathiumaitu sajai pirabo-e, sichiujiu wadi katisilak mainiudi silurabo ngiudon bamme. Nang ningtingmai-e sai, natu rukhai biboga silu bui-e.
Mangam kamakmai ronna papiutu wathao thiu makge, khatdi papuitu paky gasu hathonbo-e.
Anah yo, nang wa katini tamisai, nangniu sikalubo sidi mangaimi rabo-e.
Jengdinmai siniu maitu kam masara rangmiboga kamajibo ha-e. Kasamaira wa kasatu madiu ni-e.
Palungriak kasabo kapangmaira tadap tiusiak rabo-e.
Jaw sak maniubo siniu nakhuan tan khaira khatdi chakhuan chara kamkhai raleng-e. jaw sak maniubo hai kapangbo gu-e.
Ndongquitu pingbo kumjiu, palung kapombo chawangtu pinglulo, palung kampom khaibo haira aronna nkhek-kashat kumbo-e.
Kapangmainiu ari-arabo pisu khaibo-e, sikumbo gasu mari kalubose chakhuang thiubuibo-e.
Chalu katenbo piuniu pawannaga make mijiu palu tenkhai maksai, atiat tingga wadi daolakge.
Chamai lungchun sira ajai kasuk kumbo-e, chiudi ningting kabambo piuniu sise jupad ngamme.
Mai hinaniu pah wajiukha nchang-e, maji-e chiujiu dinbamdi sui-e chiudi pachang siakjiu pah saolo chiubo phuiminjiu phuilulo.
Lungchang phungbo khatdi kamaji kambo piu nahdungse paliu sanwi-e.
Chawangniu ladzan bamga ntao lujiu phuiboga kasabo situ paniu silu-e.
Mai khatniu palungchunse masan siakge pa-nuan gasu pah marilubui-e chiubo din ngamma?
Nchangmakbo madat nai taju kathin maitu
Nahmaitu paliu ngamkam saisuijiu si-e; paliu hai nchang-e, wi-e chiubo nang din ngamlu bui-e.
Aliu mikniu phuira, aliu kuonniu nkingra
Nangniu jijiu bamsai kaleksa mirabo-e, pujiu, changam kambam sai tiura-sakra mali-malan lubui-e.
Wa-liumai siniu chapot mania paman kung-e chiujiu dintan-tanne, chiudi paniu malan wangboga, paniu dejiukha chali thiululo chiubo lamga tasao kamme.
Nangniu dinbose nangniu sisai, nangniu kachia nai tiuchang suang paman kungbo daolubo-e.
Zu simakmai paosung ladriat thiukhaibo hai pang kajubo gu-e, pagu mania hinase pipad mirabo siakge.
Nangniu nchang makjiu kadaobo tiutekse katiubo tinggara amansai bamdi sui-e, chiudi sise tiuloigap dasai namunkiga nbui nphang phuitud mibo kumsu rabo-e.
Nangniu kawibo ladtikhaibotu daosai nang taphuang lurabo-e; rang masuang makjiu chari thiura tadtulo.
Ladtumbose mahim lura wakhat nadi ha-e. Palee kakengmai khugasu mari lulo.
Napui napiutu siangsai, nagu karingtingse tamiuboga chamibung midmibo kum hami rabo-e.
Nangniu nagu chakhiu-chalanse malajiu kadaothen, kawibose kam matam rabo-e.
Kamaobo situ nangniu chakhum ruira kam mane.
Maji kamakbo madat nai tajutu
Tingwang khuga kadkhaira ladriat thiusura maga maning mawi lulo.Pasai nalung niulune.
Ningtingbo chawang siniu kamao kam maitu silubui-e, sichiujiu patu lungsa makjiu paniu sajai pirabo-e.
Chawang khatniu nchangjiu, majijiu khatdi wijiu bamthen mawang lubui-e.
Aliuniu chabonmai pumtan masenne, khatdi katingmai pipuak tao kamimaitu chakhuang thiu-e.
Aliu lunlungse kam kalira kung-e.
Nangniu kambo hinase maji-e chiujiu maningdi sui-e, chiudi
Majibo nai kawibose kamlo; sise rathak mania phungwangbo suang
Kasamai sira, paliu arat nai wasao thiubo siniu thinman bamme, sise nuan-e.
Rang mawijiu ranglo, chiusai nangniu pasy kengjiu daone. Nangniu kalangju misai wadaodi kabuibo daolakge.
Nchang makbo gasu nangniu daobo lungwat hina hanuang mine, haisiniu natu kashaiboga jukhaine.
Kasamai sira paliu tienkam kasabo jengniu harabo-e, palamra paliuniu kamajibose kamni makge.
Pamao kabam maira kamaobo npuiga tadle, chiudi pamao kaha maira kamajibose kamme.
Palee kengbo naotu maluong lungra suang, n-shing riga lungboniu wi-nkiu-e.
Kasamaira, kasa kamraleng pu-e, paliura mai khat tudi lungsa makge.
Palung kasamaitu sajai pikhaiboga wasi kamak maidi wasi lu-e. Kaningting maitu ladtikhai sai pah wasi lu-e.
Tacheng matipbo Tingwang siniu, kasamai kilungga padbambo hina sibamme, sichiujiu paliutu kam mahara paniu phungwang rabo-e.
Kaleksa mainiu kakhengbo khuan nangniu chiukhai maksai, nangniu khengbo khuandi chiukhai lakge.
Mai khatniu natu palung pomsai, wa mahinjiu kalen piboniu wilubui-e.
Majibose kamboga, kawimai pachun wi-e, chiudi kasamaira manang-e.
Kawibo maning gasu rontad kamimai hina lengra kashaibo siniu khuan bamme.
Lungkawi-jai thiujiu, tiu kawi, sak kawi ronna matanjiu bamsai, nang wadaodi lungwi silakge.
Kawimaitu kamra rangkinbo magenthak hinase kasamai paliu riga wangrabo-e.
Palee kengbo nai takhan tanbo puitu maluang kalung suang, ramjinglam lungtad miboniu wi-nkiu-e.
Ningtingmaira paliugu chakhiu-chalan ga amansaijiu lung-e, chiudi kapangmaira daoji-daori paliugu rangkangse thinnuang mi-e.
Nchang lulo khatdi lungsa silo, sichiusai nang ringtheng rabo-e, khatdi mainiu natu chakhuang thiujiu kam mawi khaine.
Katanmainiu khuanbambo namdi khatdi paliuniu malum mawi bambo karengse ka-ningtingbo charipi niu kampang lubui-e.
Chariuboga wangrao sai nagu ladkengse mathing silulo.
Palung kasabo piutu akhuga dinlenlo, chiusai wasao kathiubo, chaliangbo khatdi wa-maningsi kamakbo piutu lenkhai bine.
Changam wadi kamraojiu kamakebo mai sira paliu ronna paliutu gijiu bambo-e;
paliuniu kambo hinara paliuniu lukani ronna maningjiu bambo-e. Chiudi tacheng matipmai siniu palung dijiu pipad ngamme.
Kasamai siniu charathiubotu, para thiujiu paliuniu kasabo lungchun maning lujiu phungwangbo rathak mania situ
Ka-aratmai jengdintu maidi malum makge, chiudi wa makum suibo maningtu mai hinaniu lukhai-e.
Tacheng matipmaidung siniu paliu lamga sibamme, kasamaidung sira wadi makbo kumjiu lenne.
Chari thiura chaqondungse nangniu kadenludi, pijiu chari ngamkhaibo sira
Tazan katadbo nai lungkawibo nia ruangga khat kadane chiusai tazan katadbo situ kadalulo.
Kalekwimai nai kalek samaigu nchambo khat bamme; sisera panai khangnia situ
Pachun kathiumaira wa kasa wangkinbotu ngao lujiu mari lubui-e, chiudi wa makumsi kamak maira siga tadkhai lujiu pasai chalung aman makjiu chuaklune.
Nangniu nagu ringtingtu lungsa-e sai, kasamaitu minlubo thak gase tadkhai tulo.
Nahmainiu dechiu lungralo chiubo majibose katikhai bilo, chiusai paringting bamthen maningtao bammi rabo-e.
Kaleksa maira kalek wimai vang-e. Maigu rangkang apuklo, chiusai nangse apuk khaibibo piu vang thiu mibo-e.
Nchang kamakbo siuse nangniu lingkhai sai, chariubose puak khangjiu, natu kam mathad khaibose pamalan thiulakge.
Lungchun dijiu kaleksa maitu maluang tiu khailo. Sichiusai nadon wirabo-e.
Palung kasamaitu mari milo, chiusai ari-arabo, n-gi-athaobo khatdi khat-khat zan thenbose hamine.
Nangniu masanbo lungchuntu, khatdi paladniam kawibotu masensai, chawangse naka thiurabo-e.
Kamakebopiu siniu paky lungga bamlujiu pah tadpadsai ndongquitu daosune chiujiu din-e.
Kamakhabo hai tathak khatle--
Nahmaidungra wadi simakbo, wa-majai simakbo hai pajai-e, chiudi pabiang kaphiphat khaibo siniu dechiu lungralo chiubo paliutu katikhai lubui-e.
Nangniu kalek kawimaitu kalen pijiu, kaleksa maitu pijiu kalek wikhai raosai, nang kaleksa mirabo-e.
Kinglo, ningtingmainiu dinkhai mibose Iniu natu katikhai bine. Paliuniu katikhaibo hai silulo.
Paliuniu dinbose nangniu maningtao lujiu, din chalilan lusai nangdi nachun wine.
Iniu natu pijiu
Iniu naleng ningting nai tasi chamkeng samriu raokhai nbamme.
Haisiniu pachang palingbo majibose desi siaklo chiubo ningting nai kawibo ladpikhaibose naleng pikhai bine. Sichiujiu natu langkhaibo tingga nangniu majibo chamkakse daojiu phungwang ngamme.
Nangniu ngamdiu-e chiujiu lung kasamai ma rupmi tulo, ladzankyga pangang kahamai ma rupmi tulo.
niu paliu lam liangjiu paliutu kapinmai situ kapinlan rabo-e.
Palungpom kasimai nai palungpom kasamaitu chaka thiu tulo.
Nangdi paliu nkhai-ali kasabose alimi sune, khatdi kali lulakmi sune.
Maipaw phungmai jengniu nang chap lubui-e chiujiu ladriat thiutulo.
Nangniu rui-ngam maksai, paliuniu nazi katangna ponlu rabo-e.
Napao-napeh mainiu riatkhai diakbo ramraise wadaodi kam kali mane.
Changam kawi kambo piutu atu lenkhailo, chiusai withubo suang wi-nkiubo khatdi chawangmai kah thiulu buibo piutu lenkhai bine.
Nangniu para kathiumaitu maluang katiu-tiubo lon, pase saolo chiubo maningtaolo.
Nawon mariujiu tiuni bamdi kasutsi lulo.
Paniu kadenkhaibo tatekse tiuniju mitulo; paniu natu tasiam kam bamdi sui-e.
Kalekwi nijujiu naronna natu kam chariumi makra ningtingsi lulo.
Nagu rangkangse pakan thiubo kaleng kumjiu mikhip khat gasu lentad mibo sui-e.
Pagu katingmai maksai patiuni kasamainiu kadenkhaibo tatekse tiuni mane.
“Wanglo, tiulanlo,” chiujiu paniu dinbamdi sui-e chiudi pamun nai palungchunse ncham makbo-e.
Nangniu tiukhai mibo hinase maruipad lanmi rabo-e; khatdi nangniu dinkhai mibo hinase matha tarabo-e.
Kapangmaitu laddin mane, paniu sise lusi lakge.
Nda ramrai kam kali mane, maksai kamagennah ram sut mane.
hai paliugu katanbo gukhaipiu-e, paniu paliu lam chapjiu natu atung rabo-e.
Nagu katipaoniu katikhaibo hinase silura matan lulo.
Nahmaitu kasan khaira majami tulo, pabiang kaphiphat khaibo siniu pah shailakge.
Haisiniu patu juring lubui-e.
Anah yo, nang ningting khangsai, I achun wichang wine.
Nangniu ningtingbo chamse dinsai, I adiu wirabo-e.
Nuan phungmaitu manma tulo,
Sichiusai, pasai nadon wirabo-e.
Anah yo, nkinglulo, sichiujiu ningting sijiu nagu ringtingleng makum lulo.
Jaw sak katan mai maksai pawonrek kadimaitu maluang tulo.
Jaw sak katanbo nai patiuni kasabo siniu lung maha mirabo-e. Nangniu tiubo nai jibo ronna misai, takhoppui-ren bennuang mirabo-e.
Napiu kadin piulo, pah hasai nang lungwang bamniu lakge. Napuiniu tanpeh miboga patu chakhuang thiujiu akhilulo.
Majibo, ningtingbo, wa-katikhaibo khatdi kawibo lungchunse paman kungbo siakge; chiudi sise nangniu jonlanra paman kungchang-kung-e.
Pacheng matipbo pui-piuse, chunwira kengjiu bambo-e, ka-ningtingbo nah khuga nadiuwi lura bamme.
Napui-napiutu pijiu najengniu chunwi lulo; napuitu sibo chunwatse pikhai bilo.
Anah yo, nking mawi lulo, Iniu lunglen khaibo haise nang ali lulo.
Chakhapuidung nai pachun karuangbo puidung hai kashaibo gu tathakge.
Paliuniu suttiu maidung kumjiu, chamai kakengtu pilung kalio khai mibo-e.

Pawan machang jaw sakjiu, kasan sanbo jawtu ronna phiujiu bammaitu lenkhailo, sichiusai Iniu pachun sajiu bambo, pawan machang tacham-chara ronna kampadjiu bambo piutu lenkhai bine. Pamikse heng-maren bamme, khatdi pakhuga wisi lulak mibo jamse bamme.
Wadao khatdi jawniu natu hiammi tulo. Haise heng marenjiu patah ta-nphop bamdi sui-e, sakwi bamdi sui-e.
Pasaibo nai nsuan padsai natu kaniu patai karaboniu machao khaibo kumjiu bamniu rabo-e.
Namik ngaoren ra-rajiu bamniu surabo-e, wa makum daolakjiu bamniu surabo-e, khatdi nalad tapha masan silulak bamniu surabo-e.
Nangniu duinai ga nagu malee tuangbo tingga tingkai-tingriuniu kabuakbo kum surabo-e.
Nangniu haichiu dinsune, “Mai khatniu atu dapkhai bamta lakge. Iniu mangai mibo bamta lakge. Dekamjiu Iniu buangsu ngam lulak jiulo? Piang khat I sakkhai lanni-e.”
Kasamaitu manma tulo, khatdi paliutu nkah tulo.
Kasabo ronna kamra paliura maningbo-e, paliuniu tapha padbo ladkeng hina mai khattu kam masa rabo maliang-e.
Kikhun haira ningting nai tasiniu thiubo-e.
Khaotisai kichendung hai paman kungbo nai palun kawiboniu karukhai-e
Pumtan katanbo suang ningtingboniu wi-nkiu-e, khatdi tasiniu pumtan suang wi-nkiu-e.
Chari thiusu makhaga, wahina kadensi rabo-e, sichiujiu laddin makeng khaibo siniu nang ngamrabo-e.
Ningtingbo chamsira kapangmainiu sitanglu lakge. Kakungbo ladga pah jaosi lakge.
Kasabo ronna nangniu rangjiu bamsai natu kasabo mai-e chiujiu lumine.
Kapang maigu maning hinase nuan-e. Wa kaki makjiu, maitu kasan ronna kasanbo maitu mai hinaniu mani-e.
Chakhuan-chara situ khengsi maksai, pachangjiu nang hai kason mai-e.
Mai khattu maji makjiu kamshatra kam bamsai, patu rankhaira wadaodi kasutmi tulo.
Nangniu na-ngam ha-e chiujiu dintulo, palamra Tingwang niu nalungchun sibamme. Paniu natu phui bamme khatdi sibamme. Paniu na-ngam kam saisuijiu naleng tathuonse pikhai rabo-e.
Anah yo, makhuidui tiulo, haise wibo-e. Sichiujiu makhuidui khuang gasu nalee pi hum khaibo kumjiu,
ningting hai nahiuna leng wisiakge chiubo silulo. Ningting silulo chiusai nadon wirabo-e.
Kasabo piuniu palung masanbo piugu suttiubo maksai paky kasutbo kumjiu kamtulo.
Palung kamasanbo piura wajiukha kaojiu bamdi buangsu lanlu bui-e; chiudi kasabo piu tura, sansabo siniu kam maha mirabo-e.
Namikre piuniu sansaboga chunwi pajai makge khatdi paniu paphi masuiboga chunwi pajai makge.
Nangniu kagajiu bamsai
Kasamainiu natu kam manangmi tulo; paliutu manma mitulo.
Kasamaira pasai duanleng ha-e wadi agun khaira ha-e.
Anah yo,
sikumbo maira malod khatniu hanuang mirabo-e, Tingwang niu maksai chawangniu kam mahakhai ngambotu nangniu simak jiuma?
Ningting mainiu haichiujiudi din-e:
Ladjanpaoniu chamiu mareng kambo hai mao-e.
Kamaobo piutu paniu pamao ha-e chiujiu dinsai pase pasan sabo-e, sichiujiu mai hinaniu patu mareng mirabo-e.
Ladjanpaoniu kamao maitu sajai pikhai sai, padon wirabo-e sichiujiu pazan tadrabo-e.
Palung masanjiu npaokak khaibo siniu chaka kachang-e chiubo lenne.
Nangniu tiujiu ringlu buibo luse bam makthen, naky thiukhang mane, ringlubui nang matan lubui-e chiubo sisiak lulo.
Pathak palam hajiu maitu malum masa mane, maksai patu kammao khaira chalad din mane.
“Paniu akhuga kamkhaibo kumjiu I kamgapne! Patu I si rabo-e!” chiujiu din tulo.
Iniu kapangbo, khatdi kamakebo piu luzamga tadron wang-e.
Siga tathu kenniu khatdi piumenniu phuiting bamme. Tatureng sidi kaomide.
Iniu haisitu ngaolujiu makum khai-e, sichiujiu haigasu ngiudon khat silu-e:
Nangniu nguiniusai poinakha ji mathak lulo. Naben makhum lujiu pakak khat jikhai lulo.
Chiudi nangniu jitad mibo lungga, kaleksabo siniu paheng, pa-ngiu thinlujiu suttiubo piu kumjiu nangtu chari thiuwang sune.
Haiga maidungniu Judah mai wang Hezekiah gu ladjankyga raokhaibo Solomon gu kadincham kasia bamkha-e.
Tingwang niu baikhai bambo jengniu patu aliuniu chakhuang thiu-e; chawangniu dinlen khaibibo jengniu patu aliuniu chakhuang thiu-e.
Chawangniu maningbo sira nangniu wadaodi sitang lulakge; paniu maningbambo sira tingpukniu kakubo kum khatdi duipuiniu kasuk kumbo-e.
Rangkanggi gasu taniabose lupad lujiu chagi-aketbo piu siniu palun kawibo wakhat aket lubui-e.
Kasabo ladpikhai maitu chawang khugasu lupad milo, chiusai pagu dihthinse maji-e chiujiu simi rabo-e.
Nabamse lulujiu nasuang kawimaileng pimibo suang, natu pijiu di-bibo bamga pikhaiboniu wi-nkiu-e.
Nangniu wakhat silugap ladjankyga mengnuang mitulo. Nasailam wangbo piuniu nang mao-e chiujiu din madu ngam lansai nang dechiu ralo?
Nakiningmai nai chuncham kamakbo bamsai, nanai ronna ncham lura makhiam lulo,mahim chamse mai nkengmai khuga pisimi tulo.
Sichiu maksai nang wakhatnadi baisi makge chiubo mai hinaniu silusai, kamangambose kam maha silakge.
Chalad din matao kalubo sira, kachia-rangkang khuang palun kawi kumbo-e.
Wa kawi chiukhai kanimai khuga wa-kasibo piuniu rukhai bibora, tiuchang maksai kachia njungkhap suang paman kungbo-e.
Malum suibo ladlang tadbo piuniu phungwangbo champao sira, tingthiubo atiat wan-ga tadui ka-agibo pisak khaibo kumbo-e.
Ladriat khailujiu wadaodi pikhai makbo sira tingriu khai makbo kamuang nai tingkai kumbo-e.
Ginsibo lungchun siniu tanthubo singbeng situ kampang lubui-e khatdi mawangpaodung tudi malum lura dinlubui-e.
Makhuiduise tiu makengju mane, tiu makengju misai maruipad lanrabo-e.
Nakiningmaipiu kyga nkimeng kalangju mane, sichiusai paniu natu manihmi surabo-e.
Kamao madam khaibo sira kamshat suibo chaheng-changiu maksai kaliangbo tavaithu kumbo-e.
Chakhuan-chara padbo wan-ga malum daolakbo maitu mangiu khaibora malai mibo hiuniu wa kasiabo, maksai paphi tangbo phiniu katad kumbo-e.
Palung magenthiubo piu khuga chalui thiubora, ka-agibo nai pafai gaothon mibo maksai kathiubo jamga matai manuk kakhai kumbo-e.
Chiusai kamangambo siniu paliutu chami karu kumrabo-e khatdi
Tingpi lamsu wangbo tingkainiu tingriutu phungwangbo kumjiu ladtumbo siniu lungpomtu phungwang-e.
Palee kengbo puitu maluong kalung suang, chaky nsing riga lungbo siniu wi-nkiu-e.
Kanamboga pabam kadiu lamsu kawibo champao phungwangbo sira, tingphujiu chari bambo tingga duigi-piang kasakbo kumme.
Kawibo piu siniu kasabo piuleng, npui pikhaibo sira kamanaobo giuruok maksai kam tania mibo akhun kumbo-e.
Makhuidui tiu makeng jubose kasabo kum, maithuon lumakeng kanibose sa-e.
Nagu lungpomse nangniu thinman ngam makbose, rengmakbo pumtan kahabo namdiga chari hangut malabo kumbo-e.
Paji kamakga kapangmaitu thuonbo sira, atiat tingga tingriubo, maksai tatun tingga kabun kiubo kumbo-e.
Nangniu wa kamao kam maksai, mainiu natu siangjiu bamdi wadi lakge. Sisera pah ntaobam kahabo thingnadungniu lenmeng lenwang kabam kumbo-e.
Chaqontu nangniu kadap kum, qonniamtu pamun ratbo kum, nangniu kapangmaitu daprabo-e.
Kapang mainiu chalad pangmaniu-maniubotu nangniu paokaksai, nangdi pakum gapjiu pangbo-e.
Kapangbo wa maniutu, kapangbo siniu paokak khailo, chiusai nakhuga maniubo piu sidi, paniu patu paronna maningbo kumjiu pahai ningting makge chiubo silubui-e.
Nangniu kapangmaitu chalad dinra pikhaisai, naphi danthon mibo kumbo-e, nang naronna chariu raleng khengbo-e.
Paphi katangmainiu tadlubo kumjiu kapangmai niudi kadincham thinlubui-e.
Kapangmaitu thuonbose n-getpiga tatu khailujiu ketra kam kabam kumbo-e.
Kapangmainiu ningting cham dinbo hai jawsak maniu mainiu paben gasu tathu khoipadra khi kabam kumbo-e.
Tadmariu wangbo kapangbo piutu chalan lankhaibose mai hinatu kam chariu khaibo-e.
Wadi kamakbo piu siniu ningting-e chiujiu lubo suang pangthubo piu siniu wi-e.
Kamakebo piu siniu paky gasu dekamjiu tadpad makjiulo? Pah detu pingjiulo? Ndongquitu pingjiuma?
Kamakebo piu siniu paziga ronna ji kadatjiu bambo-e. Pahaira akham pekniu hunri-rijiu bambo katangnadi tadpad makge.
Khangsia maira paliu mun-ga katiu nphang khaira katangna makejiu bambo-e.
Kamakebo piu siniu ningtingmai khang chinnia suang ningting-e chiujiu maning-e.
Nangam-nathao kahabo lad ariga jaobo sira, puidiga tadkinbo tathi-kuon julujiu kariak kabam kumbo-e.
Mai khatniu mai khattu kamaobo npuiga jukhai lujiu, charuong thiujiu-e chiujiu dinbose charamengbo piuniu shairabo heng-ngiu thin lujiu mathen kabam kumbo-e.
Tasing jaomaksai, chami mitmibo kum, ladtumbose hamisai n-gi-athaobose hami rabo-e.
Mitikang siniu kibambo kum, khatdi tasing siniu taobambo kumjiu, kasamai siniu n-gi-athoujiu bambo-e.
Ladtumbo hai dejiukha choilo! Aliuniu haise kajuangra dejiukha masenlo!
Lungchun masan makbo npaosira taniangliga baikhai nbambo masan makbo rangkanggise kumbo-e.
Wasao thiumai siniu pagu ladkengga, pagu marengbo lungchunse tason thiukhai nbamme.
Paliu ladkengse nkingwi bamdi sui-e, chiudi patu malummi tulo, palamra marengbo lungchun siniu pawongcheng katang phui bamme.
Paniu pagu marengbose nbailu bamdi, mai hinaniu patien kam kasa gasu ngao mirabo-e.
Maitu manra tathak thiu kabam maise, paliu ronna, paliu thakga manmi rabo-e. Kamin minra kammai tuse kabinted mirabo-e.
Ka-aratbo chamniu patu kam masara kambam maitu nang marengrabo-e. Lungchun masan makbo npao siniu kam nchum rabo makjiu, wakhatnadi phungwang makge.
Zusi-mak mainiu maksai mai khatniu natu pijiu din chakumi sulo, wakamdi naronna natu maning madimi tulo.
Tatu nai nbuiniang hai rip-e, chiudi kapangboniu kam chariubo mathad situ wadi din kadara ha-e.
Lungpom hai sa-e khatdi kam mahabo gu-e, chiudi chamanma haitu din kadara ha-e.
Mai khatniu patu wadi manang khaimakge chiujiu maningbo suang, madulangjiu patu kam maji khaiboniu wi-e.
Naka khatniu natu kam masa khaidi sui-e, chiudi namikrepiuniu nawong gaiman misai phuisi lulo.
Nang magiu bambo wan-gara makhuidui tadi tiurao sune, chiudi nangniu mariubo wan-gara kakhabo tatek sidi tiuwi surabo-e.
Chakyga bam makbo mai sira, thingna pasip gasu lentad mibo kumbo-e.
Parim wibo khatdi pakim wibo wasa siniu nachun piwikhai-e, chiudi magenthiu chariubo siniu agi-manaibo lungchunse kam maha mi-e.
Napiu-ka maksai naka situ mangai wi makge. Nangniu chariu magenthiubo daosai nasingna khuga wa nkha khengtulo; nakiningmai piu siniu kadiulam bambo nasingna suang, natu nkha nkiu rabo-e.
Anah yo, ningting silo sichiusai achun wirabo-e, khatdi atu kakhanmai hinatu Iniu paokak lubui-e.
Pachun kathiumai siniu magenthiu chariubo wangkinbo situ ngaolujiu mari lubui-e, chiudi wa makumsi kamak maira siga ngutkhai lujiu pasai palung niujiu bamrabo-e.
Kapangmai khatniu zusi kamakmai paosung chap khaisai, pagu kabambo mania hinase pasung lumi rabo-e.
Nsuan kalu nakhuan tanjiu nakapiutu nangniu makiang khaibose siangkhaibo panai nchamme.
Pakhuan-palee kengbo pui sira tatun tingga tingjao tap-tap kabam kumbo-e.
