Nangniu patu dechiujiu pi maliumak ngam ralo? Nangniu tingkaitu kham ngamma maksai nabenniu wasatu thinman lubui ma?
Chagitu chaginiu kariubo kum, mai khatniu mai khat khugasu wa katilubui-e.
Ndutbang khattu akhi mawilo chiusai nangniu pasy tiurabo-e. Pawangpiutu akhi mawibo vangpiu siniu chakhuang thiubo daobui-e.
Taduijiu gasu ngaobose nazu-e, sise kumjiu nalungchun gasu naronna natu si ngamme.
Chamaina luni sira, kashaibo charuidih lunise kumjiu pamalan thiu makge.
Kachia nai rangkanggi sira chaminiu madiu-e, sikumjiu chamaina maken sidi madiu lubui-e.
Kapangbo mai tura kashai katang dapbamdi pagu kapangbose pakhu gasu lupadsi lakge.
Nagu khaorui-khaona situ nangniu ngamdiu then phui mawilo,
Chakhiu-chalanse tingtheng makge, palamra jatdung katangna tingtheng makge.
Nangniu maluonggen jaikhat lamse magao ge-e, sichiujiu jaikhat lamse pasaibo kum leng puakkhang bambo tingga jaikhat lamsu nangniu mariangse ge-e.
Nagu mily-giu gasu nangniu chafai daklubui-e, nagu kami kasia jonlubo rangkang siniu kadih-charam liulubui-e.
Kami kasia siniu naleng khatdi nakikhunleng khatdi navang puidungleng ndui pikhai lubui-e.
Kasamai sira mainiu paliutu hamak tadi pakmi-e, chiudi palung nchangbo piu sira ndongqui kumjiu hu-e.
Jat khatniu nuan ten misai, paliugu mawangpao kali makengne. Chiudi chamai jat khatniu ningtingbo, khatdi wa maningsibo jupao bamsai, tandi tan-e, pakendi thengne.
Pumtan kabammai siniu kaleksa maitu kam mathadbo sira, chamiu buitu kam masabo tingriuse kumbo-e.
Nangniu tacheng-tajaitu chakhuang thiu maksai, nangdi kasamai lam ponbo-e; chiudi nangniu haise majaisai, nangniu paliutu atungbo-e.
Kasamai siniu kamajibo situ delo chiubo simakge, chiudi
Kalekwi lujiu nchangmakbo suang, kaleksajiu lungchang phungboniu wi-e.
Tacheng-tajaitu majaibo chabonmaise kaningting mai-e. Pageng habo maitu nkabo siniu papui-papiutu kam mangambo-e.
Nangniu lung kalakmai khuga paton-pana lulujiu, lungwi khangsai, nakhiu-nalanse lungkalak maitu nkhasibo piugu thiumi rabo-e.
Nangniu tacheng-tajaise majai maksai, narathoise Tingwang niu chiukhai lakge.
Nangniu lungchang phungbo piutu nason kasabo kamsai, nathakga nang kaokhai rabo-e.
Pamao kahabo piura paphijeng dijiu daorabo-e.
Kalek kawimai siniu paliu ningting-e chiujiu maningtan-tanne, chiudi pachun kathiubo kalek sabopiu siniu si-nkiu-e.
Kawimai siniu kadih thinluboga mai hinaniu chunwijiu changi-e, chiudi kasamainiu mawangbo tingga maidung nbaijiu bammi-e.
Nangniu na-nuanse nbaira kamsai, naringting wadaodi tathuisi lakge, sise din madupad lujiu phutmilo, chiusai Tingwang niu natu lungsa khaine.
Pawan machang
Kaleksa maise kasabo mawangpao khuga wathak thiura habo-e, para marung kabambo ndongqui maksai wa phebambo chahom kumbo-e.
Wa kawi maning simakbo mawangpao sira palungriak kasabo mai-e. Nchang makbotu marengbopiu siniu pating thengjiu mawang rabo-e.
Chamaitu kamshatbo mai sira paronna matanjiu paraw leng chubambo-e. Patu khamtulo.
Lungchang phunglo chiusai natu gukhai bine. Nangniu lungchang phungmaksai nang kaonuangmi rabo-e.
Chalu tien thiu kamaranbo piura tiura kengbamne. Pawantu kam mahajiu bammai sira kalek sajut-jut bam rabo-e.
Lungchang phungmai siniu magiujiu khatdi chunwijiu lungrabo-e. Chiudi kalekwi niju misai, natu sajai pirabo-e.
Chamiu-mareng thiubo sira kamaobo-e. Chiudi tanim poinakha jengniu khangsiamai ladjan thiu mao-e.
Paleng kasimai siniu lungwini nkiu mibo jengniu kalek kasabose dedao wangralo chiubo silu makge.
Mai khattu kam majikhai bilo, chiusai kabuan khaibo suang paniu luni nkiumi rabo-e.
Papui papiugu ka-agabose maobo makge chiujiu maningkin maise palunlungga ka-agamai suang wi-nkiubo makge.
Paleng kasibo hainiu magenthiu chariubo ronna phungwang-e. Sibosung, nangniu
Nachun-ning ronna kambose kapangbo-e. Nasuang ningtingmai laddin phunglujiu tensai nadon wilu bui-e.
Kaleksa maileng pikhai bilo, chiusai naleng wadi hami lakge. Kaleksamai khuanse nangniu nkingkhai maksai maidungniu natu siangrabo-e.
Kasamai siniu pumtan thinbo wan-ga maidungse nbai kam mirabo-e. Chiudi paliuniu kaomibo tingga pacheng matipmai siniu mawanglan mirabo-e.
Natu laddin khaibose chiukhai makjiu nakuon tanjut bamsai, naikhatra natu kadipet mirabo-e sichiujiu wadaodi kalan silak mirabo-e.
Pacheng matipbo mawangpaotu akhuga lenkhailo, chiusai pachun kawimaitu Iniu nakhuga lenkhai bine. Kasabo mawangpaotu akhuga lenkhailo, chiusai pamad padjiu lungkin maitu Iniu nakhuga lenkhai bine.
Ningtingtu nangniu lunisai, napiuniu nadon gasu padiu wine.
Papum kajonpui khuga rangkang kam maha khaibose kapangbo-e.
Chawang siniu kamajibotu machun sai, pajatse tanrabo-e, chiudi paniu rangkangtu ronna phiusai, paniu pagu kadihtu kam mahami rabo-e.
Nangniu nakahmaitu kasalam kabuan khaisai, naronna natu tathak thiubambo-e.
Lungchang phungmainiu chunwijiu khatdi khenrang thiujiu bamboga, kasamaidung tura paliu nuan ga manmi rabo-e.
Kawimai siniu lungkalakmai majise sijiu lung-e, chiudi kasamaira sikumbo sitanglu makge.
Maidungleng maningkhai simakbo mai siniu namdi pakhiangnatu kam kabuak khai-e. Ningtingmai siniu wahina kam agi khaijiu bambo-e.
Kaningtingmai siniu kapangmaitu ladjan thiura maluang wangbo tingga, kapangmai sira nuijiu pangdin dinjiu mara-e.
Kasamai sira lungchang phungmai hinatu mareng-e, chiudi tacheng matip mainiu sikumbo ringtingtu gukhaijiu bamme.
Kapangmai siniu paliu lungpomse mathiu maga madu-e, chiudi wa makum kasimaira khengsi-e khatdi thinman lu-e.
Mawangpao siniu ka-aratbo khumpaotu lukhaisai, pagu chakampao hina arat kam mirabo-e.
Lungkalak maidi paliutu kam masamaidi machambo khat bamme—
Chawang khatniu lungkalakmai majise phuikhaijiu bamsai, pase mawang matheng rabo-e.
Rukhaibo khatdi laddin khaibo haise nahmaidung leng kawibo-e. Nahmai khattu pijiu pakhen-parang thiujiu lungkhai sai, naikhatra paliu pui zu kam masakhai rabo-e.
Kasamai siniu pumtan thinmisai, chakhuan-chara keng-nkiukhang mirabo-e. Chiudi sikumbo maidung kaokiubo situ tacheng matipmainiu ngaosu rabo-e.
Na-nahtu laddin mawi khailo, chiusai pawan machang nangniu nageng thiujiu lungrabo-e. Paniu wadaodi natu kam chaliu khai lakge.
Tingwang niu jukhai makbo jat sira wadaodi pathiak-pariak thiusi lakge. Tingwang gu tacheng-tajaitu kamajai maise san wi-e.
Nangniu kavang situ npao khaibo gasu kam maji silakge. Paliuniu naladse sibam tadi wajeng sikhai lakge.
Wa makumson makjiu chalad kadinbo mai suang, kapangmainiu wibi-e.
Nangniu navang situ paliu luni hinase nahting gasu paleng pikhai bisai, naikhatra nagu kabambo hina paniu lumi rabo-e.
Lungpom kamajatbo siniu n-gi athaobo nai kabuakbo hai pipad khaibo-e.
Kachaliangbo siniu natu kamkao mirabo-e, chiudi lung manonsai, natu chakhuangthiu rabo-e.
Aga machambo pakapiu siniu pagu sathubo mikre thiurabo-e. Majibose paniu ladjankyga dinsai patu sajai pirabo-e, chiudi paniu dinmaksai Tingwang niu patu siangkhai rabo-e.
Mainiu natu maning mawikhaibose nangniu lukhai sai naphi masui rabo-e, chiudi nangniu
Mai hinaniu kawibo mawangpaotu luni kamme, chiudi kamajibose
Tacheng matipmai siniu kasamaitu mareng-e, khatdi kasamai siniu tacheng matip maitu mareng-e.
Haise Jakeh nahpiu Agur gu ladtan si-e:
“Tingwang niu atu maluong makge, Tingwang niu atu maluong makge, siniu I apumtan ha-e.
I hai chamai makjiu khaoring kumbo-e.
Chamainagu lungchunse akhuga hamide.
Ningtingse Iniu wakhatdi katilu makge,
siniu Tingwang lamga I wadi silu makge.
Saoniu tinggen tasise singam luralo?
Saoniu tingkaitu pabenniu thinman luralo?
Maksai saoniu taduitu chafai renniu domman luralo?
Maksai saoniu kadihpirigu arai kamkhai luralo?
Pase saolo nang sima? Panahmaise saolo?
“Paniu ladriat khaimibo hinase Tingwang niu majaijiu bamme. Gukhaira phiujiu bammai hinagu para chageese kumbo-e.
Paniu dinmakbose paniu dinbo-e, chiujiu nangniu dinsai, paniu natu rukhaijiu nang aratbo-e chiubo lenkhai rabo-e.”
Tingwang yo, I shai makbo suangga, nakhuga lamnia nakha khengbo-e:
arat makra atu nkha khailo khatdi atu pijiu kalekdi wikhai tulo, maksai kalekdi sakhai tulo. Sichiujiu Iniu tiubui nakha pikhailo.
Agu kengju misai natu wageng ha-e chiujiu Iniu dinlu bui-e, sichiu makjiu Iniu kaleksaju misai, Iniu agatiujiu a-Rawang zan kam masami lubui-e.
Pawangpiu khuga pavangpiu ken wadaodi din masa tulo. Natu siangkhaijiu nang magenthiu rabo-e.
Paliu piutu kasiang maidung khatdi paliu puitu thuon simak maidung khangsia mai bamme.
Taniachang tania bam lujiu paliura masanne chiujiu maning maidung bamme.
Paliura wichang wi-e khatdi maidin silakbo wat wi-e chiujiu maning maidung bamme!
Lungkalakmai nai wathak hamai ma ruptiujiu kalungmai bamme, paliura sikumbo ronna kamjiu lungbo-e.
Tabatpui nah khangnia bamme, panai zanse “Aleng pilo” chiu-e.
Wadaodi kimmakbo madai bamme:
Charuidih,
panah lungmakbo maipui,
tingriu khaira ngenbo kasangbo kadih,
khatdi mata silakbo mitao bambo.
Papiutu nuimenbo maksai papuitu kamarengbo maitura chamitiulengniu tiulura maksai n-gekniu pamik ladthon mibo sui-e.
Iniu singamlakbo madai bamme:
Tingpukga lenkinbo kaleng,
tudi riga tonmariu bambo kaniu,
duipuiga npui phuikinbo malee,
khatdi maipui nai maipiu lungsabo.
Malumsui makbo nao siniu makhalu wang, tadui nkhiu lujiu, “I wadi kamaobo kam makge” chiujiu din-e!
Kadihpiriniu kheng ngamlakbo madai bamme:
Kavang khatniu chawang thiubo,
kapangmainiu patiuni hina daolubo,
mataimarengbo puiniu kalek thiubo,
khatdi kavangpui khatniu pawangpui bam malinbo.
Kadihpiriga kasiambo khaoring chiudi ningting-chang ningtingbo madai bamme:
Matiangpui: paliu hai siamme, chiudi paliu tiutekleng chaken tingga paliuniu kadenlu-e.
Tatu-za: haise tansuan makge, chiudi tatu kakga lung-e.
Takao: paliu wang thiu makge, chiudi paliu alai khat thiujiu malai-e.
Masuipui: nangniu khat haitu nabenniu minlu bui-e,
chiudi chawangkiningga nangniu paliutu daolu bui-e.
Tadsubo tingga matai kawibo madai bamme:
khaoring ruang gasu tanthubo, khatdi wakhat tudi ping makbo: ndongqui
kamichi, katagubo maruireng,
khatdi chawangniu pamaidung suangga tadbo.
Nangniu pangjujiu wasaothiu kinsai khatdi kasabo rangkinsai mathak lujiu makum nsilulo!
Nangniu kabui nduise kariusai, pasase padle.
Nangniu mainiu jumsai, tazai padle.
Nangniu mai lungpom kamsai, chariu magen thiubo daone.
Haidungse chawang Lemuel puiniu pakhuga dinkhaibo ladtandung-e:
“Nangra Iniu khenglubo lungsabo apamnah si-e. Iniu nakhuga nde dinralo?
Npui-npiu thiujiu lungkaliobo ga nakhiu-nalan nchum khai mitulo khatdi najeng hakhai mitulo; paliuniu chawang kakeng tudi kam maha mibo-e.
Lemuel yo, kinglo. Chawangdungra jaw sakmak rabo-e, maksai pakai katanbo jawtu phiumak rabo-e.
Paliuniu jaw saksai, tacheng-tajaitu mangai mi-e, khatdi kaleksa maigu majitu waleng chakkhai tami-e.
Pakai katanbo jaw sira shailajiu bammai khatdi pamad padjiu chariubam maileng-e.
Paliutu pisak lujiu paliu magenthak nai chariuse pijiu mangai lulo.
“Paliuleng phesi kamak maileng phekhai bilo. Pumtan kahamaileng maji phiukhai bilo.
Mathiuleng dinjiu, tacheng matipbo ladjanpao thiu lulo. Lungkalakmai khatdi wathak hamai maji chapkhai bilo.”
Kamatunbo nao daora hai dejiukha kunglo! Para tiuchang suang paman kung-e!
Pakinaniu patu malumme, siniu pah wadaodi kaleksa lakge.
Paniu karingthen paleng kawibo kamkhai-e, wadaodi paniu patu kasabo kam lakge.
Pahai chalang thiujiu, chafai dakjiu khatdi pujiu bamme.
copy
Pahai chali thiukinbo malee kumjiu pabam katam-tam lamsu katiu phungwang-e.
Nsuan kalu paniu buangsu lujiu, pakikhunmai leng katiu akhi-e khatdi pavangmainiu nde kamralo chiubo katikhai bi-e.
Paniu kadih phuilujiu liu-e, khatdi paniu lingkhaibo mumsireng gasu chakhiu-chalan dao-e.
Pahai papum katanbo, changam chakiubo khatdi pabensiam kawibo pui-e.
Paniu kampadbo hinagu pariatse si-e, khatdi nchun masang changam kamjiu bamme.
Paniu jun kalubo langsiniu chafai dakge.
Lungkalakmai khatdi pageng kabammai hinatu paniu lungsa khai-e.
Kabun kiubotu para wadaodi manang makge, palamra pakikhunmai maileng lumbuibo fai bamme.
Paniu tazifai khatdi paman kakungbo fai dakge.
Pakina situ namdigu jupao khatle chiujiu maidung siniu si-e.
Paniu chafai khatdi khen-gak daklujiu ka-alimai khuga jon-e.
Pahai papum tanne, khatdi patu maidungniu chakhuang thiu-e, sichiujiu pasaileng manang makge.
Paniu ningting cham hai manuanjiu din-e.
Pahai pakikhun maileng pujiu, phiusao makjiu bamme
Panahmaidung siniu patu masenne, khatdi pakinaniu patu thuon-e.
Paniu din-e, “Maipuidung kakengkha wi-e, chiudi nang hai paliu mathiu suang wi-nkiu-e.”
Mating-wat sira pason sa-e khatdi pazu-palun kawibo sira hami rabo-e, chiudi
Paniu kakambo hina maning chakung kamna-e. Patu hai mai hinaniu chakhuang thiubui-e.
Haise Jerusalem ga chawang David nahpiu wa-makumsimai ningting cham-e.
Sisera pageng ha-e, pageng ha-e, chiujiu wa-makumsi mainiu dinbo-e. Ringting haira pageng ha-e. Wahina pageng ha-e.
Nangniu tatien maranjiu pu-e, chiudi sise naleng nde kagengbo lenkhai ralo?
Chaken khat wangjiu chaken khat tadmi-e, chiudi kadih hai palun bamme.
Naimik padlujiu, naimik ngutlan mi-e, sichiujiu malanwang lujiu padlan-e.
Tingkai niu tingpi, tingrun hun mariu tadlujiu hun maguiwang lanbo-e.
Singgiu hina duipuiga luangwang-e, chiudi duipuise phui maliam makge. Singgiuga tadui malan wangjiu luangpad lanne.
Wahina chariubo maliang-e, chamainiu din silakge. Amikniu ngaobo kimlakge, akuon hainiu chiusi lakge.
Masuang pad mibose pad daira leng-e, padmibose padlan rabo-e.
Paliuniu din-e, “Phuilo, haise wa kasanbo-e!” Chiumakge, sise nda pad mibo-e, aliutu mana makhabo gasu padjiu bambo-e.
Mai khatniudi tadmibotu maningtao makge, maksai lungwangra mai khatniudi tuhoi nai pasai kakga degu padralo chiubo maningtao lakge.
I wa-makumsimai, Jerusalem ga Israel mai wang thiu khaide.
Haibo kadihga damkhaibo mania hinatu matadjiu phuimin raleng Iniu rang-e.
Magenthiu chariubo hai Tingwang niu aliu riga pikhaibo-e.
Kadihriga padbambose Iniu ngao kamde, sai I naliu khuga dinbo-e, pakhiangna haise pageng ha-e. Sise tingkaitu hatad kinbo kumme.
Wa-nkhui mibo situ nang kam majisi lakge, wa kahabo situ nang chak silakge.
Aronna akhuga din-e, “I hai chamai kadimai khat thiu mide. Jerusalem ga amasuang mawangmai hina suang, I wasi nkiu-e. Tasi-ningting Iniu sisiak lude.”
Tasi nai kapangbo khatdi ningting nai kamengbo kakga sitam lura Iniu matande, chiudi Iniu silubose, Iniu tingkaitu hatad kinbo kumme.
Nang ningting bi-bi, magenthiu sanbi-bine, Nang wasi makengsai chariu makeng bi-bine.
Iniu aronna achun wijiu bamra maning-e, sichiujiu chunwibo situ phiu-e, Chiudi Iniu daobose pageng ha-e.
I silude kanuibo sira kapangbo-e, sibo chunwat sira naleng pageng ha-e.
Ningtingtu phiura lunibo kumjiu jawniu atu kam ringajiu pating kawi thiubam lura, Iniu maning-e, kadihpiriga pakak khatnakha lungkhaibo kakga, chamaina lunlungga amansai bamra Iniu maning-e.
Iniu kareng kam lujiu charasibang linglude, sichiujiu siga charasibang hina somkhai-e.
Iniu ajai chulujiu tadui luwang khai-e.
Iniu kavangmai kakeng liulu, khatdi kavangmainiu paliu nah manakhai-e. Nda Jerusalem ga kalungmai suangdi agu khaoruiniu keng nkiu-e.
Iniu mawangbo dih ganiu chawang maigu rangkang nai kachia makhuan lu-e. Maipui maipiuniu chalui thiujiu achun kam n-nga khai-e, khatdi maipiuniu lunibo maipui hinatu Iniu daolu-e.
Iniu lunibo hinase Iniu daolude. Matha-ringabo hina Iniu lurao makge. Iniu tenlubo donniu ageng thiu bamme, haidungse aphijeng-e.
Chiusai Iniu tenlubo khatdi a-ngamkam hinase Iniu maning lanboga pageng ha-e chiubo maningtao-e. Haise tingkaitu hakinbo kumgapjiu pageng ha-e.
Palamra, chawang khatniu kam lurabose nda chawang khatniu kamkhai mibo kumgap na-e.
Sijengniu ningtingbo, kasabo, maksai kapangbo lamse Iniu maning sude.
“Oh, kabenbose tamiubo suang wi-e, sikumjiu ningting sira kapangbo suang wi nkiu-e, chiubo Iniu silu-e.
Ningting maira tadrabo npui si-e, chiudi kapang maira simakge.” Chiudi Iniu silubose tasanset khatniu mai hinatu khuan bamme.
Iniu aronna makumme, “Idi kapangmai sansetse daorabo-e. Siniu ningting jubogu geng Iniu degu daoralo? Wadi daolakge, wadi daolakge.”
Mai khatniudi ningtingmai tudi, kapangmai tudi maningtao lakge. Wangkinbo tingga, aliutu mangai kam mirabo-e. Aliu mathiu shai kammi rabo-e, ningting maidi, kapang maidi kashaibo sira ncham-e.
Siniu ringting haise akhu gara matha-e, haisiniu chariubo makjiu wakhatdi phungwang makge. Pakhiangna hai matha-e, Ira tingkaitu hakinbo ga-e.
Iniu kamkhai mibo hinase aleng pageng wadi ha-e. Palamra pakhiangna haise amalinpiu khuga saodiak mirabo-e.
Sai pah ningtingmai suma maksai kapangmai suma saoniu silo? Chiudi Iniu haibo kadihga ten khaibo hina, khatdi aningting hina riga paniu papao thiumi sune. Pakhiangna hai pageng ha-e.
Sijengniu I tatien maran khai mibotu, maning khaijiu I alungniu-e.
Nangniu nagu tasi, ningting, khaoti, tasiam khaijiu tatien thiulu, wadi kammakbo mai khat leng khaidiakmi rabo-e. Haise pageng ha-e, khatdi maji makge.
Nagu ringting katheng-kadun, tatien tenjiu khatdi pujiu bambo siniu degu lenkhai ralo?
Nangniu ringbam thenna, magenthiu chariubo ronna daorabo-e. Nchun tingdi nalung hai njiu lumakge. Pakhiangna hai pageng ha-e.
Dechiujiu naliuniu wa tiumak sakmak lujiu chunwi ngamlu ralo?

Tingwang niu pachun kimmai khuga tasi, ningting, khatdi chunwibo pikhai-e, chiudi paniu nuan phungmaitu tatien maranjiu pi thiukhai-e khatdi makhuan khai-e, sichiujiu paliuniu daolubo hinase pachunmai khuga pikhaira leng-e. Haise pageng ha-e. Haise tingkaitu hatad kinbo ga-e.
Wahina pawan bamme, khatdi pawanse kadihriga Tingwang niu riamkhai mibo-e.
Paniu manara khatdi shairabo wanse riam khai.e,
lingrabo wan khatdi pethon rabo wan kam khai-e,
kamshat rabo wan khatdi kam mawi rabo wan,
rathon rabo wan khatdi thiulan rabo wan bamme.
Paniu chunsabo wan khatdi chunwi rabo wan pikhai-e,
achungbo wan khatdi lenrabo wan pikhai-e.
Masen rabo wan khatdi mani rabo wan,
kapup rabo khatdi kapup makrabo wan bamme.
Paniu phiurabo wan khatdi kam maharabo wan,
makhuan rabo wan khatdi taliang rabo wan kamkhai-e.
Kamkek rabo wan khatdi makhah rabo wan,
maliu mak rabo wan khatdi tacham din rabo wan bamme.
Paniu lungsa rabo wan khatdi mareng rabo wan,
chari thiurabo wan khatdi agi-manai rabo wan pikhai-e.
Aliu tienkam ganiu aliu nde genglu ralo?
Aliu ringtingga tatien pujiu khatdi chariujiu lungra Tingwang niu pikhai-e chiubo Iniu si-e.
Paniu pating saisuijiu wahina damkhai-e. Pah aliutu pikhaibo sira sailam wangrabo situ silura leng-e, chiudi paniu damkhaibo hina sikamsiak lura pikhai makge.
Iniu silude chiubora aliu tienkam hinaga hai ringbam then achun wijiu matanbam raleng-e.
Aliu mathiu tatien tenjiu, tiu-sak raleng khatdi chunwira kamkinbo hai Tingwang gu kalen-e.
Iniu sibo sira Tingwang niu dambo hina tingtheng leng-e. Nangniu wakhatdi khaisan lulakge, maksai luthon silu lakge. Chiusai Tingwang niu aliutu damkhaibo sira patu pingjiu bam raleng-e.
Padjiu bambo maksai padlan rabo hinase masuang padmibo-e. Tingwang niu wahinase pipad lan-lan khaijiu bambo-e.
Majibo nai nchangbo bamrabo sung, kasabo hainiu kadihpiriga bammibo Iniu sisan lu-e.
Aronna akhuga din-e, “Tingwang niu tacheng matipbo nai kasabotu machamjiu ladjan thiune, palamra wahina, pakeng bamjiu pawan saisui pad kambo-e.”
Aliu hai khaoring suang wison makge, chiubo lenra aliutu Tingwang niu madiubo-e, chiubo Iniu si-e.

Sichiusai, chakhao-chamaileng machambo sanset siniu khuan bamme. Khat shaimibo kumjiu khat sidi shai rabo-e. Paliu hai machambo gandamme. Chamaina hai wakhatdi khaoring suang wison makge, delosai ringtinggu paramba ha-e.
Paliu bam khatga wangjiu tabui mawikam mirabo-e. Siganiu paliu padbo-e, siga malanwang kamrabo-e.
Saoniu chamainagu hiupuina nrilam khang-e, maksai khaoringgu hiupuina kadih hanglam kiu-e chiubo silu ralo?
Sijengniu chamaina hainiu pagu tienkamga pachun wibo suang wa kawi ha-e, chiubo Iniu maningtao-e. Aliuniu kamlura wakhatdi ha-e. Aliu shaimibo saiga degu padralo chiubo silura wakhatdi ha-e.

Haibo kadihpiriga nchangmakbo hinatu Iniu phuilan-e. Maidungniu kam mathadjiu bammaise, paliutu nkha khaira maidi hajiu kap bamme. Paliutu kam mathad kabammai khuga pumtanse bammibo jengniu paliutu maidi nkha khaini makge.
Shaimibo maitu Ira masia-e; paliura tuhoi ringbammai suang wi-nkiu-e.
Chiudi si-kania suang widiangbo sira wadaodi lungwang makbo mai si-e, palamra paliuniu kadihpiriga kamaobo padjiu bambo haitu wadaodi ngao makge.
Maidungniu dekamjiu haijiukha marankin jiulo chiubodi Iniu silude: haise paliuniu paliu kiningmaitu manmabo donniu-e. Chiudi haise mathakhu-e. Haise tingkaitu hakinbo kumme.
Paliuniu din-e, chiubora benthuijiu bammaise kapangmai-e, pijiu paliutu mariujiu shaimi sulo.
Chiusai tingkaitu minra matanbo kum, bennia pu-jutjiu kinbo suangdi poinakha bamjiu alung agi-manaibo siniu widiang-e.
Ringting hai pageng ha-e, chiubo Iniu silude.

Mai khat paronna lung bamme. Panahdi ha, pasingnadi ha-e, chiudi paniu changam maranjiu kam bamme, chiudi pakhiu-palan bambo siniu palung kim makge. Paniu amankhai rabotu machun makjiu, changam maranjiu kambambose sao lenglo? Haisidi pageng ha-e, haichiujiu lungbora magenthiu ju-e.
Nianiu khat suang wi-nkiu-e, palamra aruang lujiu tatien thiuboniu thiu mawidiang lu-e.
Wagaje khatniu kaomisai khat siniu nkha khai lune, chiudi mai khatniu paronna bamlujiu kaomisai sise saju mine, mainiudi nkha khaira hamibo-e.
Wagaje agi-sai, khangnia ji-aruangsai lumlune, chiumakjiu naronna dechiu lumlu ralo?
Mai khangnianiu mai khat suang tan nkiu-e, chariang kengsum niu malui kalubose kamtap kung-e.

Mai khatniu kaleksa bamdi, padih wang thiulu bui-e, maksai kavang thiubamdi chawang thiulu bui-e, chiudi tingmiboga patu ladpikhaibose paniu suita misai, kaleksabo chiudi ningtingbo chabonmai khatsuang wison makge.
Kadihpiriga lung bammai hina lamga Iniu makum khaiboga, paliu ruang gasu chawang thiu malin lura chabonmai khatra bam-e, chiubo Iniu maningtao-e.

Chawang khat hangga chamairiak pamalan thiu makjiu bamta lakge, chiudi paniu tadmibo tingga, mai khatniudi pagu tienkam jengniu patu wajeng chakkhai son makge. Haise pageng ha-e. Haise tingkaitu hakinbo kumme.
Nangniu Charaky ngutbo tingga matip lulo. Kapangmainiu kadpadbo suang, siga wang nking mawi lubo siniu wi nkiu-e, palamra maidungniu majibo situ silu makge.
Nangniu din makhaga makum lulo, khatdi Tingwang khuga ladriat thiu nuang mane, para tinggen ga bamme, nangra kadihga bambo-e, siniu chalad din makeng mane.
Nang nalung chariusai, namang sabo nkiune, khatdi nang chalad din makengsai kapangbo lad dinmi sune.
Sijengniu nang Tingwang khuga ladriat thiumisai daolubui thenna katumjiu kamlulo. Para kapangmaitu wajeng chakkhai makge, nangniu dinkhai mibo kumjiu kamlulo.
Nangniu ladriat thiulujiu kammakbo suang, ladriat thiu makbo siniu wi-nkiu-e.

Nagu ladkengniu natu nuan-ga jukhai tulo, sichiujiu Tingwang gu singkumai khuga nang mao mide chiujiu dinraleng ronna-e. Dekamjiu Tingwang niu natu palung pomra kamgulo? Nangniu kamkhai mibose dekamjiu kam mahakhai lanralo?
Namang kengbam tadi, pageng habo ngam nangniu kamkhai bamdi, maksai wajiukha nalad kengbamdi, nangniu Tingwang suangga pingjiu chaprabo-e.

Kadih thinmainiu padihga kalek samaitu mathadjiu paliugu maji nai nchangbose pikhai makboga nasuang hami tulo. Chakampao hinatu gukhaira paliu riga mai khat bamkha-e, sichiujiu panai khangniatu gukhaira ku-nkiubo chakampao khat bamkha-e.
Chawang niudi chalu atiattu malumjiu bambo-e.
Nangniu rangkangtu masiasai, wadaodi nachun kim lakge; maksai nangniu kalek winisai naluni hina ngao lakge. Haise pageng ha-e.
Nang kalek wisai tiubo maidi kengbi bine. Tasi dao makengbo hai nagu kalekwat si-e.
Tatien thiumaira kengkha tiubam tadi poinakha tiubam tadi njitjiuna bamme. Kalek wimaira, wa kengbam tadi chalung puboniu njitkiu lakjiu bamme.
Kadihpiriga wakhat kapingbo I ngao-e, sisera mai khatniu pagu rangkangse kanangbo tingga thinra khuan bamme,
sichiujiu bamboga sansabo daojiu nchum mide, sichiujiu patah-panah mailengdi khaidiakra hatane.
Apui won ganiu aliu pumruang wangbo kumjiu, aliu pumruang tadlanne. Aliuniu wajiukha tatien maran khai mibose phunglu tadlakge.
Haise maji makma! Aliu wangbo kum gapjiu tadlan rabo-e. Tingkaitu hajiu matan bamtadi, nde ngaolu ralo?
Aliu ringting hai tamiuboga lungjiu achunsabo, alung chariubo, alung pombo khatdi thiuniubo ronna-e.
Haise Iniu silu-e, chiubora Tingwang niu pikhaibo gasu tiu-sakjiu mathabo siniu withu-e, haise chamainagu sanwat si-e.
Tingwang niu mai khattu chunwira chakhiu-chalan, pagu mania pikhai sai, patien kam gasu chunwijiu ringa lulo. Haise Tingwang gu kalen-e.
Pachun mathara Tingwang niu pikhaibo jengniu paringting dunjiu bamdi palung manangra ha-e.
Kadihri haiga wadi maji makbo kamkhaibo I ngao-e.

Tingwang niu khangsia maitu chakhiu-chalan, chakhuang thiubo khatdi wania hina, yo, paniu lukani hina pikhai-e, chiudi siseniu patu pi chunwi khai makge. Sibosung, zusimak maidung siniu haise padon thiumi-e. Haise pageng ha-e, khatdi haise maokam mide.

Mai khatniu panah kaikhat manalujiu ring matheng bamtadi, paniu paringting kawibo thin chunwi khailu maksai, khatdi patu kawibo nbai thiulu maksai, patuse shaijiu mana wangboniu wi nkiu-e, chiu Iniu dinbo-e.
Ngena khat lungwang lujiu, tamiuboga hakhai misai patuse mangaimi rabo-e.
Paniu wadao khatdi kabenbo situ maksai ringting ngaokhai mak tamibo-e, chiudi malod khat mathak lu-e,
chiujiu mai khatniu tingkum sangnia lungkhai tadi panai khangniase pabam khatga tadkam rabo-e.
Chamainiu patien thiu bambose tiuraleng ronna-e, chiudi pa-nrong chialu makge.
Nde chiujiu ningtingmaise kapangmai suang wi-nkiu jiulo? Wakhat kamjiu chamaina kalungbo cheng sibam tadi kaleksabo piuniu degu kamlu ralo?
Wa lunijiu changin bambo suang, wa akhuga bambotu achun wibambose wi-nkiu-e. Haise pageng ha-e, sise tingkaitu hakinbo ga-e.
Karaigasu ranglujiu wahina padmibo-e, Pasuang katan maitu mai khatniudi ari-ngam lulakge chiubo aliu mathiu si-e.
Nang ari mathengsai sabi-bi-e, siseniu nang wison lakge.
Chamai ringting hai tingkao kawangbo kum tadkinbo lungga chamaileng nde kawibo bamlo chiubo saoniu siralo? Pah shai mibo sai nde pad suralo chiubo saoniu siralo?
Khumkibo kyga kamengbo suang kap achungbo kyga mengboniu wi-nkiu-e. Palamra aliu mai hinatu kashaiboniu khuan bamme chiubo karing mainiu maningtao rabo-e.
Chunsaboniu nuibo suang wi-e, achungboniu wa-sisan lura bamme.
Chunwibotu ronna makum maise kapang mai-e. Ningting maira kashaibo lamdi makum tang-e.
Kapangmai lui nkingbo suang ningting mainiu rubo cham nkingboniu wi-nkiu-e.
Kapangmai nuibora chamiga tathu rukhaijiu puak parep-repbo kumbo-e. Sise wadi pageng ha-e.
Ningting mainiu maigu sontiusai kapangmai kum mibo-e; nang tanim lusai, nagu nkhai-rili samine.
Wahina suraibo suang kaloibo siniu niu wi-e.
Chaliangbo suang khengsiboniu wi-e.
“Oh, ndating maniadung widiangbo hai ndekam jiulo?” chiubo maniu mane, sisera ningtingjiu maniubo makge.
Karingmai hina ningting rabo thao-e; haise kalek dam daolubo kumbo-e,
Sichiujiu rangkang niu nkhabo kumjiu ningting niudi nkha khaine. Ningtingniu natu gukhaine haise tasigu pageng-e.
Tingwang gu bensiamtu maning khailo. Tingwang niu kam nkhui mibo situ saoniu kam maji luralo?
Naleng wa kawi daobo tingga, nachun wilulo, khatdi magenthiu chariubo wangbo tingga Tingwang niu chariubo nai chunwibo pikhai-e chiubo maningtaolo. Pasai degu padralo chiubo nangniu simakge.
Aringting hai pageng ha-e, chiudi siga Iniu wahina ngaokam lu-e. Kasamai khat ringbamdi kawimai shaimi-e.
Sijengniu wijumi tulo, maksai wasijumi tulo, dekamjiu naronna natu kamshat bamralo?
Chiudi sajumi tulo, mengjumi tulo, dekamjiu natingtang makjiu shai ralo?
Wahinaga kam kahebotu mari lulo. Nangniu Tingwang tu pingjiu bamsai nang tathui lubui-e.
Namdi khatleng mawangpao khang kariuniu tenkhaibo suang ningtingniu wi-nkiu-e.
Haibo kadihga ka-nchangmai, kawi kam tajutjiu maomakjing mai khatnadi ha-e.
Chalad kadin hinatu nking tulo, navangmainiu naken tiabo chamdi chiudao sune.
Nangdi sikumjiu nalung ganiu maitu pawan machang maiken tiajiu bambo si-e.
Iniu ningting thinjiu haibo hina madiu khai-e, ningtingra Iniu matan khai-e, chiuditu sise Iniu sitanglu makge.
Saoniu chamai ringting haise dechiu siaklo chiubo silu ralo? Sise siraleng kungju-e, haise silura sukju-e.
Chiudi aronna Iniu alai khaijiu tasitu phiu-e. Iniu ringtinggu pakeng sisiak lura khatdi mainiu maniubo situ paokak luraleng, kasamai siat silura khatdi kapangmaigu pangtu silura Iniu matan khai-e.

Kashaibo suangdi khadiangbo maipuitu Iniu ngao-e. Pagu lungsiat sira tathak gasu natu manman mibo kumbo-e. Pabenniu natu kiapman mibose chagiriangniu khinman mibo kumbo-e. Tingwang maning kam maira mari lune, chiudi nuan phungmai tura manmi rabo-e.
Yo, sichiujiu wa-makumsimai siniu din-e, Iniu phiukinboga haise mid-midjiu I silubo-e.
Iniu kakibotu phui-e, chiudi ngaolu makge. Chamai sang khat ruangga chakhuangthiu buibo maipiu khattu Iniu dao-e, chiudi maipui khattudi daolu makge.
Iniu silubora haisi-e; Tingwang ra aliutu dam mawisui khai-e, chiudi aliu ronna kam tanuak mi-e.
Ningtingmai ronna wahina paramba silu-e. Ningtingniu pazu kam benlu khatdi pazu wan kasabo tudi kam kalilu-e.
Chawangniu dinbo piululo, khatdi Tingwang khuga ladriat thiunuang mane.
Chawangra pachunning hina ten ngamme, siniu pakhu gasu tad mari lulo, sikumbo chariu rabo bamga bam matheng tulo.
Chawangniu pagu pumtan thinjiu patien thiu-e, siniu patu mai khatniudi angat ngamlu lakge.
Nangniu pagu chamtan majaibam thenna, kasabo daolakge sise ningting mainiu dechiujiu degu kamralo chiubo si-e.
Wahina kamra kabuibo wan nai majibo npui bamme, chiudi aliura poinakha ronna si-e.
Nde pad suralo chiubo aliu mai khatniudi silu makge, aliutu dinkhai biradi mai khatdi ha-e.
Mai khatniudi paringtingtu thin manra pumtan ha-e, maksai shairabo ting kham lurabo ha-e. Haise aliuniu mari lulakbo chari khatle, aliuniu aru thiujiu npadlu lakge.
Kadihpiriga kam bambo hina Iniu ngao-e, haibo kadihpiriga khangsia mainiu pumtan thinlujiu khangsia mainiu paliu hangga chariujiu bamme.
Yo, kasamai tudi paliu rawga bai khaibo I ngao-e, chiujiu charaw ganiu malan wangrabo npuiga paliugu tienkam kasabo situ mangai lujiu, namdiga bammai siniu paliutu thuon bamme. Haise pageng ha-e
Dekamjiu maidungniu kamaobo kamra masen satjiu bambo gulo? Palamra kamaobo situ sajai pinuang khai makge.
Nuan phungmai khatniu kamaobo kai kammi tadi ringjiu bamme. Yo, paliu dinbo Iniu si-e, “Tingwang cham majai bamsai wahina wilu rabo-e,
chiudi kasamai lengra wilakge.Paliu ringtingse tingkao kawang kumjiu paliugu chabuan tingga shaimi rabo-e, palamra paliuse Tingwang cham majai makge.”

Chiusai haise pageng ha-e. Phuilo, haibo kadihga degu pad milo, wadao gara nchang maidi kasamai kumjiu sajai ngao-e, kasamai tadi nchangmai kumjiu tathuon ngao-e. Haise pageng ha-e, chiujiu Iniu dinbo-e.

Sijengniu chamaina siniu paronna aman lura matan rabo-e palamra haibo ringting hai tiujiu, sakjiu paronna amanjiu lung rabo-e. Haise Tingwang niu pagu ringting pikhaijiu tatien thiubo lungga paniu kamrabo si-e.
Kadihpiriga padbambo hina hai Iniu ningting nijiu silura matan-e, sichiujiu nchun n-nien saomakjiu Iniu makumjiu bambo-e,
chiudi Tingwang niu degu kambamlo chiubo wadaodi silu makge. Nangniu wajiukha matanjiu bamdi wadi daolu lakge. Ningtingmaidung siniu si-e chiujiu din bamme, chiudi paliuniu silu makge.

Tingwang niu ningtingmai khatdi tacheng matip maigu tienkam, khatdi paliugu lungsabo nai marengbotu thinman bamme chiubo hai Iniu makum masukbo gasu silu-e. Mai khatniudi pamasuangga wangkinbo situ silu makge.

Siga wakhatdi tamson makge. Tacheng matipmai riga wangbo kum, kasamai rigadi wang-e, kawimai gadi kasamai gadi, tacheng matipmai gadi majai makmai gadi, charathiu maidi thiumak maidi, chamai kawimaidi kasamai suang wison makge; tasiang kamlubo piuse tasiang kammakbo piu suang wison makge.
Sansabo hai mathiu riga machamjiu wangbamme, haise kadihpiriga padbambogu kamaobo khatle. Chamainaniu karingthen, paliu lungchun hai kasabo nai kamengboniu phui-e, sichiujiu paliu shainong mi-e.
Chiudi kadihpiriga mai khatniu lung bamthen pagu machunbo bamkha-e; ringbambo thiniu shaimibo ndongqui suang wi-nkiu-e.
Yo, karingmainiu, paliu shairabotu sibamme, chiudi kashaimai niura wakhatdi simakge. Paliuleng chaphijeng bamta mibo-e. Paliutu mangai kam mibo-e.
Paliugu lungsabo, nai paliugu marengbo, paliugu manmabo lungchun hinase maluang shai mibo-e. Wadao khatdi kadihpiri haiga paliuniu wakamkhai sonra hamide.
Nagu katiu-tiujiu chunwilulo, na-jaw saklujiu ringa lulo. Sise Tingwang niu suikhaibo-e.
Pawan machangna matha ringa bamlo.

Tingwang niu pikhai bambo pageng habo ringting haibo kadihga bamthen chunwijiu, nangniu kungbo nanaotu majang lunglulo. Pageng habo ringting bambo tinglang gahai, nangniu chariubo daojiu bamtadi sise nadamme.
Nangniu kambo hinaga matanjiu kamlulo, palamra wang kinbo charuidihga sira, wakhatdi nangniu kamsanra ha-e maningtao dairabo ha-e, tasi ha-e, ningtingdi ha-e, siga nang tadkhai mirabo-e.

Iniu wakhat maningtao-e, kadihpiriga katanmai siniudi majuboga tan tajut lumakge, kahumai niudi chari ngam tajutlu makge. Ningtingmai siniu naimachang gengson lumakge, khaoramai niudi kalek wison lumakge, pazan tadmai niudi pachap kuson lumakge. Tasan sabo hai mai hina riga wangbo-e.
Nangniu wangkinbo nagu tinglangtu simakge. Nthingnatu simakjingjiu tathakniu manmibo kum, chakhatu alangniu manmibo kumjiu, aliu simak jingbo wan-ga aliutu sansabo siniu manmi rabo-e.
Iniu sibo wakhat bamkha-e, sise kadihpiriga ningting wat dinlenbo haisi-e.
Nda namdi khatga, chamai kengmakjiu lungbamme. Pumtan bambo wang siniu aphen sude. Paniu namdi situ taomagui lujiu charireng situ kampang raleng kaden lude.
Siga kalek kasamai khat lung bamme, pagu ningtingniu namdi situ kalan lubui-e. Chiudi mai khatniudi patu maning khaison makge.
Iniu dinjiu bambo-e, ningtingra pumtan suang wi-e, chiudi kalek kasabo piugu ningtingtu maidi wajeng chak makge, paladdi nking khai makge.
Mawangmai khatniu kamengmaigu apaimai maduiga chalad tanjiu dinbo suang, ningtingmai khatniu manuanjiu dinbo chamtu nkingbo siniu widiang-e.
Ningting siniu kawibo chari-mania pumtan suang wi-e, chiudi nuan phungmai khatniu kawibo kakeng khatu kam masa lubui-e.
Kashaibo tamang siniu parim wibo wasabung situ kam maten lubui-e, sikumjiu poinakha kapangbo siniu withubo ningting situ kam masa lubui-e.
Ningting mainiu majibo kamme chiudi kapangmainiu kamaobo kambose chamaina cheng-e.
Kapangmaitu npuiga sangmainiu daodi paladpad ganiu patu kapangmai-e chiubo silu-e. Papangse paniu mai hina khuga madu-e.
Wagaje nariga natu mawangpaoniu palung pomsai changam mathakra chiujiu kamtulo maliumak bamsai chamao dijiu bamdi kuak khai surabo-e.
Kadihri haiga Iniu maji kamakbo ngao-e, maji makbose mawangpao gasuniu padle.
Lungwimaitu wajeng simakjiu kapangmaitu kadibo dam pikhai mi-e.
Kavangmainiu chaqon riga tongbo, khatdi katheng-kadimainiu kavangmai kumjiu chaphiniu tad kinbotu Iniu ngao-e.
Wagaje nangniu tubaw kaladsai tatu siniu kam ajam lune. Nangniu tasing tisai, tasingniu natu kam ajam lune.
Nangniu mari mun samibose kariu mawilu maksai, sise thin changam kam matandiang rabo-e. Siniu maning masuang sonna luboniu wi-e.
Kaniu khui sibam tadi kaniuniu natu machaorai misai pakhui kasibose pageng ha-e.
Ningtingmaira dinpadbo ladniu chakhuang thiubo daolu-e, chiudi kapangmaira paladniu kam masami-e.
Paliuniu kapangbo lad dinsu rai-e, sichiujiu meng-nsi siakbo ladniu loikhai-e.
Kapangmaira chamlam jing-jing-e.
Mai khatniudi pasai ndepad suralo chiubo silu makge, khatdi mai khatniudi aliu shaimibo sai ndepad suralo chiubo dinsi lakge.
Paky wangraleng simak kajubo kapangmai sira paronna malaitami rabo-e.
Chabonmainiu chawang thiujiu pakahmaitu majang watiu-wasakjing bam misai sibo kadih sira kabuak mirabo-e.
Chiudi chawang khatniu palung chapsi sai khatdi jupaodung siniu katiubo wan sijiu, jaw sak maniumak bamsai sibo kadihse pasan wibo-e.
Mai khatniu makejujiu paky npom katinlu maksai, ting jaojiu kaomi rabo-e.
Tiu-sakbo siniu nachun piwi khai-e, jaw siniu nachun kamlum khai-e, chiudi sise rangkang hasai nangniu kamlu lakge.
Chawangtu khan tulo, nalungchun gadi maningmi tulo, nazi gadi kalek wimai ken tia tulo; Delosai len mariujiu bambo thingna siniu nachamse paliu khuga paowangbo sui-e.
Nagu rangkangse sangdiumai lithakga khailulo, pasai nang pageng daosu rabo-e.
Nangniu daolubose pabam kakengga khailulo, delosai haibo kadihga degu sansabo padralo chiubo nang silu makge.
Singbangse wakhat khatlam kaokhai bam tadi, kaokhaibo jailamse nkhuang bammi rabo-e. Kamuang niu jinting misai tingsa wangrabo-e.
Nangniu tingkai kawibo nai pating wipad rabotu khuan bamsai, nangniu alin khailu lakge maksai atiatlu lakge.
Tingwang niu wa hinatu dam khai-e, sichiujiu nangniu wakhatdi singamlu lakge, dechiujiu pawon phungpui lungga ngenase mawikhang bamlo chiubo nangniu silu lakge.
Naliu nsuan, chawan chalin mara khaijiu bamlo. Pakhiangna wipad rama, maksai khatniu khatsuang wipad ralo chiubo nang wadaodi silu makge.
Tingmik kawi daojiu nachun wisai sise kawi khatle.
Nangniu lungkhai mibo tingkum hina jengniu thuonkiu lulo. Nangniu wathengkha ringbamdi, shairabo ting sira sisuang thengdiang-e chiubo maningtao lulo. Siga wakhatdi machun sonra hamibo-e.
Chabonmai yo, nang chabon tingga nachun wilulo. Nang chabon tingga ringa lulo. nalung chun saisuijiu kamlulo. Chiudi nangniu kamkhai mibo hinase Tingwang niu ladjan thiune chiubo maningtao lulo.
Wakhat niudi natu kam kabuakmi tulo maksai kam chariumi tulo Nang tingthengjiu chabon thiubam lakge.
Sijengniu nang chabon tingga natu Dampao tu maningtao lulo, tamiubo tingmik khatdi tingkum wangtangjiu, “Ringa rabo ringting ha-e” chiujiu nangniu din makhaga maningtao lulo.
Chahiu, naimik nbiuse khatdi chagandungse naleng tamiu wangmi sune, khatdi tingriugu kamuangse wadaodi hatami sune.
Siga natu nkha bambo naphi nabense pajeng hawangjiu kaphikrai-rai misune. Nahiudi kiujiu nagu tatekdi siaminlak misune. khatdi namikse ngaorenra-rami sune.

Nakuon tidmi sune, npuiga chakhuan maliubodi chiutami sune. Nangniu wakaniakbo khuan chiuboga adiangbo khuanma, maksai chalui thiubo khuanma chiusune, khatdi jipjing bambotu nthingna khuan siniu kam marakmi sune.
Nangniu kakubo bam situ pingmi sune khatdi tad mariu radi manangmi sune. Napee-giu npuakmi sune. Nang naronna tad mariu kungmi sune, nang wa masenbodi hami sune.
Aliuniu tingtheng mathak rabo bamga wang mine sichiujiu aliugu kanamthubo bamgase aliu tadkinbo-e, sigase chunsa-achungbo npui-e.
Rangkanggi riangtu kakhiu khaisai, kachia mibung kaokiujiu pangmi sai, akhun-gu chariangse tapkiujiu tadui karungse pangroi mirabo-e.
Aliu pum hai tabuiga malanwang mine, khatdi karingbo siu hai, aliuleng pikhaibo Tingwang khuga malanwang mine.
Pageng ha-e, pageng ha-e, chiujiu Wa-makumsimai siniu din-e, pakhiangnase pageng ha-e.
Siniu Wa-makum kasi maise ningting-e, paniu silubo tasiniu maitu laddin khai-e. Paniu kadincham katilude khatdi palung masansiakjiu paliugu kamajibo situ madiu lude.
Sichiujiu pi amankhai rabo lad daora Wa-makumsimai siniu matanbo-e, sichiujiu paniu raopadbo ladkengse palingbo-e.
Wa-makumsimai cham haise milykhuanpao thun kawibo kumme, khatdi kadincham khom madui lubose natri gen matid kalubo kumme. Pakhiangna hai aliu mathiutu Khonpao Tingwang niu pikhaibo-e.
Anah yo, wakhatga matipdiang maksai sa-e. Ariak khuang raora pamalan ha-e, khatdi ariak ken mathiuju sai nang chiami rabo-e.
Kanamboga wakhat nakha dinra bamkha-e, Tingwang tu pingsilo, khatdi pagu chamtan situ majai lulo, sichiura chamainatu damkhaibo-e.
Tingwang niu aliu tienkam saisuijiu wa hinase kawibo tadi, kasabo tadi, mahinjiu kambo hina tadi ladjan thiurabo-e.
Namuntainiu atu kapupjiu bamme;
nalungsiat haira jaw suang wi-e.
Narim manam wi-e, nazan siniu natu pi maningtao khai-e.
Maipui khatniudi natu marai makbo thiu makge.
Atu nasai pisui khailo, anai pak mikhe;
nang a-wangpiu thiukhailo, nagu kichen-ga atu pingut khailo.
Anai chunwi machamkhe, jaw sak maniu lujiu mathen sukhe.
Maipui hinaniu natu lungsabo hai maisuang habogu makge.
Jerusalem maipuidung yo, Ira atia tik-e chiudi alun wi-e,
Kedar ramjingga bambo mathenky kum tik-e,
chiudi Solomon wangkiningga bambo zusungfai kum alun wi-e.
Atia tikbo jengniu atu wajeng simak khai tulo,
palamra naimikniu atu phu matik mibo-e.
Apiuhmainiu
Siniu I karura pawan daomakjiu-e.
Iniu lungsapiu yo, nagu milydungtu delam nang khontad ralo,
akhuga dinkhai khelo?
Niending ting paliu dega mathak ralo?
Dekamjiu Iniu maidunggu milykhuanmai ruangga natu phiutad bamralo?
Withubo pui yo, pabamse nang simak jiuma? Milydung sai suilujiu tadsulo;
Mily khuanmaigu mathenky mung gase tadlujiu namidung leng piubuan phiu sulo.
Iniu lungsapui yo, natura Pharaoh gu chaqondungtu khuanmai siniu,
chaqondungtu ngaojiu masenbo kumjiu, maipiudung siniu natu masen kamna-e.
Nagu thambonse nabiangga ngao ji-e,
sise nawongga tiuchang kumjiu maju kiu-e.
Chiudi aliuniu naleng kachia nai rangkangginiu
tatiuriang khat kamkhai bine.
Awangpiuse paziga jibamme,
agu parim manam wibo siniu phuiting bamme.
Amaraipiu siniu agariga jikiuboga parim kawibo siniu phui-e.
Amaraipiura Engedi gu mumsy rengga
penbambo nkan rapen kumme.
Ahuliu yo, nang dejiukha nalun wilo;
na-mikkhuanse lungsaboniu phui-e!
Iniu kungthubo piu yo, nangra dejiukha nalun wilo;
nangniu dejiukha alung pikim khailo!
madiakbo piuriangse ania zi thiurabo-e.
Singchong sing siniu aniaky kachum thiurabo-e,
khatdi maga sing siniu aniaky nshing thiurabo-e.
Sharon ga bambo nkan rapense aronna-e,
khatdi maluang taningga bambo nkinpense I-e.
Maipuidung ruangga sudi ahuliura tathu jiuga
penbambo nkinpen kumbo-e.
Iniu lungsathubo piu sira mariu singbangdung ruangga sudi
nfaxibang kumbo-e.
Ira sibo hiuga ntao lujiu parasy tiu kawibo situ tiubam ni-e.
Paniu atu pagu khumkibo kichen lungga
maluong wang lungsabo pengfaise ariga jutop khai-e.
Majamsy-ki siniu pi ajeng tankhailo,
khatdi nfaxy siniu achun kam marak khailo!
Ira khangliu thiunibo lungchun siniu khenglulak mide.
Paben mawilam siniu abenkhum thiu bamme,
paben majatlam siniu atu kiapman bamme.
Jerusalem maipuidung yo,
naliuniu anaigu lungsabo haitu kamphek lakge
chiujiu chakheng-tathan tadtiu majadbo kumjiu
ladriat thiu khailo.
Amaraipiu khuan I chiu-e.
maluang lamsu pah pak wang kinne,
ramluong lamsu akhulam pak wang kinne.
Amaraipiura chakhengchi kumme, maksai tathanchi kumme.
Singbeng mungga pah chap bamme; kiran khatdi kaputki gasu pah mahiu bamme.
Haise amaraipiuniu akhuga dinbo-e.
Amaraipui yo, wanglo; ahuliu yo, wangjiu asai suilulo.
Tathe tingdi loimide; tingdi sata mide.
Kaluong ningga charapen penphui bamme.
Haise chalui thiujiu bambo wan-e; luzamga makhaodung chalui thiu bamme.
Ndutsy minpadsu mide, mumsiken bonpad mide,
parim wiboniu phuimide;
ahuliu yo, wangjiu asai suilulo.
Nangra chakhao-turen ga, nbai bambo khao-chalid kumbo-e.
Mataiwibo nazuse I phuikhai ni-e
khatdi naladniam kawise nkingkhai ni-e.
Aniagu mumsireng penbambose kam masa makhaga,
tanidung nai tanipoidung situ min mikhe.
Amaraipiuse agu-e, I hai pagu-e.
Paniu pagu milydungtu nkinpen liga,
piubuan pi tagikhai bamme.
Tamiubose hawangjiu nsuan tingkai hunwang makhaga,
Amaraipiu yo, tathanchi kumjiu malanwanglo,
chakhengchi kumjiu Bether Luongga malan wanglo.
Nchun machang Iniu ajiga jikiu machang
lungsamai khattu Iniu man-man-e.
Iniu patu phiujiu bamme,
chiudi patu phiudaolu makge.
Iniu namdigu npui machang,
kamik machang tadronjiu bamme.
Lungsamai situ I phiujiu bamme,
chiudi patu phiudaolu makge.
Namditu akhejiu tadron bammai siniu atu dao-e;
Iniu paliu khuga maniu-e,
“Amaraipiutu naliu daoma?”
Paliu khugasu tadpad gapboga, Iniu patu daolu-e.
Apuiniu atu manakhaibo kichen-ga wangtang makthen,
Iniu patu kiapman lude, patu pitad lanlak mide.
Jerusalem maipuidung yo,
naliuniu anaigu lungsabo haitu kamphek lakge,
chiujiu chakheng tathan tadtiu majadbo kumjiu ladriat thiu khailo.
Chali alimainiu jonbo parim wibo
wamud nai wasa kumjiu ramjing gasu
wangkinbo mikhut riangse ndelo?
Israel maidung gu withubo riphenmai siniu,
patu akhe bambo riphen riak-charuk siniu
Solomon tu pawangbam gasu ponwang kin-e.
Paliu mathiuse chaheng thinsimai kamme,
paliu hai chariga katan-kahumai maliang-e.
Nchunniu chari thiuwangdi, paliu mathiuse chaheng phungkam bamme.
Withubo singniu kambo chawangbam gasu
chawang Solomon tu ponwang kinne.
Talai tiangse rangkangginiu makom khai-e,
khatdi kachianiu tathuak fai siniu topkhai nbamme.
Jerusalem maipuidung siniu lungsajiu dakkhaibo fainoi siniu,
kamalombo bam situ thaptom khai nbamme.
Zion maipuidung yo, wangjiu chawang Solomon tu phui tailo.
Pachun wijiu ringabo tingmik, panao thiubo nai
papuiniu papeega karu khaibibo chawang pirunse paniu khai lujiu bamme.
Amaraipui yo, nangra dejiukha nalun wilo!
Nafai limga sudi nagu lungsabo mikkhuanse dejiukha benjiu bamlo.
Na-thambonse Gilead luongga bambo kamigiutu
tingkainiu hunled-led kabam kumme.
Nahiuse tha-masan padbo maksai khiu masan padbo
milygiu kumjiu kapuang-e.
Nahiu hai liang machamme, wadi kiu makge,
macham ramjiu witathui-e.
Na-muntaise thambonriang kahengbo kum,
nangniu tacham dinsuboga ngao ji-e.
Nafai jiuga sudi nabiangpise ben majin bamme.
Nawongchengdi David kiton kum maweng wi-e, khatdi madio wi-e,
siga chagee sang khat masiang khaibo kum tiuriang khat bamme.
Na-nabomdi tathanliu kumme,
nkinpen jiuliga taphinbo chakheng kania piubuan tagi kabam kumme.
Parim wibo wasa nai wamud bambo maluong rigase,
tamiubose hawangjiu nsuan tingkai hunwang makthen I bam rabo-e.
Amaraipui yo, nang hai dejiukha wilo;
nangra dejiukha wi-tathuilo!
Lebanon Luong gasu wangjiu asai suilulo, akhenpui yo;
Lebanon gasu wangjiu asai suilulo.
Amana Luong, Senir Luong khatdi Hermon Luong,
ndongqui nai quiruk lung bambo gasu wanglo.
Ahuliu, akhenpui yo,
na-mikkhuan nai natiu matiu bambo tiuriang siniu alungchun kami mide.
Ahuliu, akhenpui yo, nagu lungsiat siniu alung hai pisu khai-e.
Nagu lungsiat haise, jaw suang mon-e,
narim kawibose—withubo chamiang rim suang nkiu-e.
Ahuliu yo, makhuidui watse namuntai-ga bamme;
nakhuanse alengra ndui nai makhuidui kumme.
Nafai-nanise Lebanon Luongga bambo
parim wibo chamiang-rim siniu phui-e.
Ahuliu, akhenpui sira agu mahin-gu karengsi-e,
khatdi rengkhai bambo maligu duipin si-e;
siga singbangse bon bamme.
Charapen reng lungga masi bambo majongsy bang puak kabam kumme;
siga withubo rasy masi bamme.
Siga makupen, takungpen, komchangpen, liangkupen khatdi takigee,
maksai parim wibo chamiangrim kumbo hina pamalan thiumakjiu bamme.
Parim withubo wamud, wasa hina siga bamme.
Lebanon Luong gasu luangkiubo singgiu nai duipuak siniu
kareng gase tadui kajin khaijiu, singgiu thiujiu luang bamme.
Tingpi gu Tingkai yo, sulo, Tingrun gu Tingkai yo,
areng lungga hunkhaijiu parim wibose hunphui khai sulo.
Amaraipiutu pagu karengga pi wangjiu withubo rasyse pitiu khai sulo.
Ahuliu, akhenpui yo, areng lungga I ngut bamde.
Parim wibo wasa nai wamudse, I khom madui bamme.
Akhuidui nai akhuidui khuangse Iniu tiu bamme;
ajaw nai nduise Iniu sak bamme.
Lungsa maidung yo,
lungsabo siniu maniumak then tiusulo khatdi saksulo!
Iniu jibamdi, alungchunra singringjiu bamme.
Amaraipiuniu akham maganjiu bambo I man-e.
Ahuliu, amarai, alungchun, agu aguipoina yo, I ngut khaine.
Kajikdui siniu apeetham tim mide, khatdi athamse mongren gasu manim mide.
I afai-ani lupad mide; dechiu I khailan ralo?
Aphi abendi khiuloi mide, dechiujiu Iniu kam tanialan ralo?
Amaraipiuniu akhamse niatang mide,
sijengniu pah wang manabam talakge chiujiu manang asang mide.
Patu pi ngutra I kaden lude, Iniu khamtense thin khaiboga
abense parim kawibo siniu phui mide, a-njungse parim siniu phui mide.
Iniu amaraipiu leng akhamse lekhai-e, chiudi para tadmide.
Pakhuanse dejiukha Iniu nkingkhai nilo!
Iniu patu phiu-e, chiudi phiudao lulak mide; Iniu patu ku-e, chiudi paokak tamide.
Namditu akhemaidung siniu atu daolujiu atu dapjiu kam ajam khaide,
akhemaidung siniu apee takum faise namdi kareng gasu phettap-tap mide.
Jerusalem maipuidung yo, naliuniu amaraipiutu daosai,
Ira khangliu thiunibo lungchun siniu,
asangsiak mide chiubo pakhuga dinkhai bine chiujiu akhuga ladriat thiu khailo.
Pazu palun withubo pui yo,
namaraipiuse kakimai suang dejiukha wi-nkiu jiulo?
Pakhuga degu tamsinbo maisuang habo bam jiulo?
Dejengniu aliuniu nakhuga ladriat thiukhai ralo?
Amaraipiura pazu-palun wi-e, khatdi tan-e;
para chamai sang kariu ruanggasu nkiubo khatle.
Pazu-rase hengban satle, khatdi manai wi-e.
Pa-thamse ndao-e, khatdi tik majing-e.
Pa-miksiuse singgiu mungga bambo agui mik kum ngaowi-e,
ndui gasu nkhiu masan padbo agui kumjiu singgiu mungga chap bamme.
Pa-biangpise parim wibo komchangpen penbambo kareng kum palun wi-e.
Pamuntaise nkinpen kum, parim wibo wasa siniu timriu-riu bamme.
Pabendi wi, pajungradi wi-e, sichiujiu paman kungbo njungkhapse khai bamme.
Papumdi madio wibo chapuang him kumme,
sibo riga paman kungbo tu sidi bamme.
Pahingpomdi kachianiu lang taman lubo parim wibo kachum kumme.
Pagu kendise di-e, Lebanon Luong ga singchong bangton kumme.
Pamuntaise kapup wi-e; palamga kadinbo hina siniu atu kami mi-e.
Jerusalem maipuidung yo, haise amaraipui lamga kamme.
Pazu-palun withubo pui yo, namaraipiuse delam tadmi jiulo?
Paniu tadkhai mibo bamse aliu khuga dinkhailo,
sichiusai nangniu patu daora aliuniu nkha khaine.
Amaraipiu sira pagu kareng lam, takuangpen penbambo lamse tadmide.
Kareng gase pagu khaoruidungtu katiu gui bamme, khatdi nkinpen khom madui bamme.
Amaraipiuse agu-e, I hai pagu-e;
nkinpen jiuliga pagu khaoruidung situ katiu gui bamme.
Amaraipui yo, nangra Jerusalem wat kum,
Tirzah namdi lunwat kawi kum, namdidunggu siuthi kabam kum wi-e.
Nazuse akhugasu nbiang milo, nazu wat siniu atu kami mide.
Nathambonse Gilead luongga kamigiutu tingkainiu hunled-led kabam kumme.
Nahiu hai tha-masan pad nbambo mily giu kakabo kum kapuong-e,
nahiu hai liang macham ramme; wadi kiumakge, machamjiu witathui-e.
Nabiangpise nafai jiuga sudi ben majin bamme.
Pijiu chawang situ panao riak charuk, parammai liupui riak tachat bamsulo,
pariak sitang lakbo liunamaidung pibam sulo!
Chiudi Ira khangkhattu ronna masenbo-e, para agui palun kawi kumbo-e.
Para papuinah kamaliliu-e, khatdi papui huliu-e.
Maipui hina patu ngaolujiu thuon kamna-e,
chawangpuidung, parammai liupuidung hina patu thuonbo lui thiu bamme.
Nsuan tingben pad karai kum benbo pui hai saolo?
Pahaira chahiu naimik nbiu kum wi-e, yo, bensatle.
Iniu talaobang liga kiulujiu, ramjengga bambo singbang luntu,
mumken kasan bon padbotu, khatdi majongsy situ phuira tadkiu-e.
Ira acheng kaphikrai-rai mide,
chari thiura kadenbo bambo chaqon tongmai siniu masensat kabam kum,
nagu lungsiat siniu atu kami lude.
Shulem mai liupui yo, lensulo, lensulo.
Nalense aliu phuikhai ni-e.
Iniu chalen lenjiu bambo haitu maidungniu
phuijiu bamboga dekamjiu naliuniu atu phuikhaini jiulo?
Nang hai dejiukha maisuang habo riliulo!
Naphitop lungga bambo naphise dejiukha ngaowilo!
Nakhenri ngaowi-e, pabensiam kawibo piuniu ruikalubo mania kumme.
Siga parim wibo jawniu masunphui nbambo piangse bamme.
Nkinpenniu dom magui nbambo miukhumse siga bamme.
Na-nabomse buirengke kania kum, maksai kajuireng pi
Nawongchengse chapuang him kyton kum ku-e.
Namik siuse namdi rengmun mungga bambo Heshbon namdigu ajai kumme.
Na-niu luongse Damascus ga bambo Lebanon kyton kum ngaowi-e.
Naduk wanse Carmel Luong kum ngaowi-e.
Nathambon phen kalubose withubo fainoi kum pawat hainiu chawang lungchun kami mide.
Nang haira dejiukha ngaowilo, dejiukha matai wilo;
nagu lungsiat hai dejiukha witathuilo.
Nangra kadanbang kum ngaowi-e,
na-nabomse gariusy kumme.
Iniu kadanbang gase buangkhang lujiu pasyse raitiu rabo-e.
Na-nabomse alengra mumsy-kuon kumme,
khatdi nasiu rimse parim wibo nfaxy kumme,
khatdi namuntaise withubo jaw kumme.
Sichiusai amaraipui khuga sibo jawse luangwangjiu
pahiu nai pamuntai luangphui khailo.
I hai amaraipiu gu-e, siniu pah atu masenbo-e.
Wanglo, ahubo yo, nkan-hang lamse tadsukhe,
sichiujiu manam jiuga
Siga ania buangsu maji lujiu, mumsireng gase tadlujiu
puaksubo, puaksu makbo,
pamum padbo, padmakbo, papen penbo penmakbo,
khatdi majongsyse masibo, masimakbo phui mataikhe.
Siga agu lungsiatse Iniu pikhai bine.
Siga mangui-gaa rimse nangniu lulu bui-e,
kawibo rasy hinase anai kamun mungga bamme.
Ahubo yo, kaguangbodi, kasanbodi siga naleng Iniu baikhai bamme.
Natu hai apuiniu pagaga pontup khaibo apiubo
Sichiusai Iniu natu npui-nchen gasu biangpupjiu bamdi,
mai khatniudi aman kamakbo thiu lakge.
Lungsabo hai nangniu atu kati khaira Iniu apui kyga natu puiwang lubui-e.
Pachoi khaibo jaw, agu majongsy jaw hai Iniu naleng pikhai bine.
Naben mawilamse abenkhum thiu lujiu,
naben majadlam siniu atu kiapman bamme.
Jerusalem maipuidung yo,
aliuniu aniagu lungsabo haitu kam kabuak lakge chiujiu ladriat thiu khailo.
Ramjing lamsu pagu lungsamaitu kiaplujiu wangkinbo hai saolo?
Nfaxy bang hanggasu Iniu natu makiang sukhai mibo-e.
Nagu lungsiat hai maileng makjiu aleng ronna-e.
Atu makjiu maitu kiap tulo.
Lungsabo hai kashaibo kumjiu tan-e,
khangliu lungchun hai kashaibo panai machamme.
Haise taobansat bambo mipuang kumjiu tao bamme.
Taduiniu kam mid silakge,
duidet siniudi pi malinkiu silakge.
Mai khat kumboniu lungsiat haitu pagu chakhiu-chalanniu liura kamsai,
lungpom ronna pah daorabo-e.
Aliu tanpui khat bamme, chiudi pa-nabom siambi kha-e.
Chabonmainiu patu nkira wangboga aliuniu paleng degu kamkhai ralo?
Paniu singbeng thiubam liusai, aliuniu paleng rangkanggi kiton thiukhai bine.
Paniu rengmun thiubam niusai, maga singniu khamten kamkhai birabo-e.
I haira singbeng si-e, a-nabom hai sibo kiton si-e.
Amaraipiu khuga I bamthen, achun kimjiu bamme chiubo paniu si-e.
Baal Hamon kubo bamga,
Solomon gu mumsy-reng khat bamme.
Maidungniu sise pakhu gasu ngelujiu, mai hinaniu paleng rangkang sang khat-khat pi bamme.
Pagu rangkang sang-sang siniu Solomon tu ramgunjiu khuan bamme,
palu tenmai damse kai nia-nia pikhai-e.
Aronna maligu kareng khat bamme.
Ahuliu yo, arenglung gase nakhuan pichiu khailo,
akahmaidung siniu nakhuan manuanbose nking khaini bamme.
Amaraipiu yo, parim wibo chamiang puakbambo ramluong lamsu,
chakheng, tathan kumjiu akhulam jongwang sulo.

Matom-kabuidung siniu paliugu papaodungtu si-e, khatdi qontraodung siniu paliutu degasu papaopiu siniu paliu tek pitiu khailo chiubo si-e. Chiudi amai Israel maidungniu sisuang nkiujiu sirabo-e. Chiudi paliura wadi simakge.
Naliura nchum mide, naliu nuan phungbo jat, naliu taniabo khatdi kasa-bo maidung-e! Naliu nuan siniu naliutu jukao mide! Naliuniu
Naliuniu dekamjiu atungbam jiulo? Naliuniu sajai daosan khaini bamkha jiuma? Israel mai yo, naliu peese tajamniu phuimide, sigasu naliu lungchun nai maningse wita mide.

Naliu pee gasu naliu phi tangbo naliu pumga kawibo jam khatdi hamide. Tajam-chara nai panagi n-gaobo jamse naliu pumgen-ga phui mide. Naliu jamse kam masanmi makge, maksai domkhai makge. Sibo riga chapiu wadi manuk khai makge.
Naliu kadihse wajiukha kam nchum mide, sigasu naliu namdidungse ruthon kam mide. Naliuniu phuijiu bamga, sangdiumaidung siniu naliu kadihse lumine khatdi wahina kam nchumkam mine.
Jerusalem ronna masiak bammide, sutlubo namdi khat kum mide, magaina lu maksai mumsy lu akhepiu gu apatu mainiu gukhaira habo kum mide.
Ngam-kambo
copy
Jerusalem mai yo, naliugu mawangpaodung khatdi namaidung hai Sodom nai Gomorrah maidung kumme,

Paniu din-e, “Naliuniu haibo rathak maniadung akhuga kadkhai bambo haitu Iniu luni-e chiujiu naliu maning jiuma? Naliuniu rujiu kadkhaibo mily, khatdi naliugu pamaiwibo khaorui suang kengjiu agu bamme. Naliuniu kadkhaibo matomchi zai khatdi mily nai kami zai haitu Ira mani mide.
Naliuniu atu kahumra wangboga haidungse ponwanglo chiubo saoniu naliu khuga dinkhai jiulo? Atu kahumbo kyga haichiu tajiu thiumakjiu tad mariulo chiubo saoniu natu dinkhai jiulo?

Naliugu pipaddungse phungwangra pageng ha-e. Naliuniu rukhaibo parim wibose Iniu lunita mide. Naliugu Hiusan gu chakhuang-changeega, naliugu Tabamnai, khatdi characheng tadbo maduiga I bam ngam lulak mide; haidungse naliugu nuanniu kam tania kam mide.
Naliugu Hiusan gu changeebo khatdi masanbo tingmikdungtu Iniu mareng-e; sibo bangrid hinase Iniu phungchia mibo-e.
“Kakheng thiubo tingga, naliuniu naliu ben henkhangbose Iniu naliutu phuikhai lakge. Naliu wajiuga kakheng thiubamdi, Iniu nking khai lakge, Palamra naliu bense tazainiu phuimide,
Naliu ronna khiu masan lulo. Naliuniu kambambo kasabo pakhiangna Iniu ngaojiu bambose saomilo. Yo, kasabose kamta milo,
khatdi majibo kamra kati lulo. Majibose kamne chiubo phuilulo mathad khaibo maidungtu nkha khailo, magennahdung situ paliugu maji pikhailo, khatdi kamipuidung lam chap khailo.”
Naliuniu akadin piugap sai, kadih gasu padbo kawibo rasydungse naliuniu tiurabo-e.
Chiudi naliuniu atu lukhai maksai, naliura sansajiu shairabo-e.
Pawan khatga chamchangjiu bambo namdise chakhapui khatgu lunlung kum mide! Pawan khatga tacheng matip maidungniu phuibam niu-e, chiudi tuhoira maitu kagi maidung ronna mide.
Jerusalem mai yo, nang hai pawan khatga rangkanggi kum bamniu-e, chiudi tuhoira nang hai gengta mide, nang hai kawibo jaw kum bamniu-e, chiudi tuhoira nang hai tadui ronna mide.

Naliugu jupaodungra kadin piumak maidung khatdi agatiu maidunggu chakadung-e; paliu haira pawan machangna maigu kalendung nai tanim lujiu bamme. Paliuniu wadaodi ladjankyga magennahdung lam chapkhai makge. Maksai kamipuidung siniu paliugu tathu-chara phungwangbose nkingkhai makge.
Haijengniu tuhoira Ngamkambo
Iniu naliutu sajai pine. Chagitu rumaliangbo kumjiu, Iniu naliutu kam masan khaine, khatdi naliugu masan makbo hinase luthonmi rabo-e.
Nda karaiga naliu khuga bamkhai mibo kumjiu Iniu naliu khuga mawangpaodung nai ladtipaodung pikhai rabo-e. Chiusai Jerusalem tu tacheng matipbo, chamchangbo namdi chiujiu kumine.”
Chiudi nuan kammai khatdi palad majai makmai hinatura paniu diangpetmi rabo-e; patu phut mimai hinatu paniu kamshatmi rabo-e.
Naliuniu singbangdung situ kahumbo jengniu khatdi naliuniu masanbo kareng-e chiujiu kamkhaibo jengniu naliu mangam lune.
Naliu hai kuiwang mibo nphubang kumjiu aguiwang mirabo-e, mai khatniudi tadui kajinkhai makbo kareng kumjiu aguimi rabo-e.
Chamirang poinaniu magaotu ruthon mibo kumjiu, pumtan bammai situ paliugu kasabo ngam siniu kam mahami rabo-e; siga mai khatniudi kham ngam lulakge
Haise Judah nai Jerusalem lamga Tingwang niu Amoz nahpiu Isaiah khuga pikhaibo chamme:
Wangrabo tingmik lung gara
Charaky bambo luongse kuthubo khat thiujiu
maluang hina suang kubo thiumi rabo-e.
Jat hinaniu siga jonwang sune,
siga maidung siniu din sune,
“Aliu
Paniu aliutu pijiu tenkhai nibo lamga aliutu kati khaine;
paniu kada khaibo npuiga aliu tadne.
Palamra
Zion gasu paniu pamaidung khuga dinkhaibo-e.”
Paliuniu paliu hengse kabui makaiga
khatdi paliu ngiuse chaganniw heng pithiu khai mirabo-e.
Jatdungniu wadaodi charithiu lanlak mide,
paliuniu wadaodi charileng kaden lanlak mide.
Tuhoira, Jacob kaikikdung yo,
Hey Tingwang yo, nangniu namaidung, Jacob kaikikdungtu phutmide! Kadihse tingbang lamsu khatdi Philistia lamsu chamik thao kadadbo ngam siniu phui mide. Maidungniu sangdiumai cheng-jai luimide.
Paliu ramgase kachia nai rangkangginiu phui bamme, sigasu paliugu chakhiu chalan hai pamalan thiu makge. Paliu ramgase chaqondung phuimide, khatdi paliugu chaqon-karidungse pamalan thiuta mide.
Paliu kadihse charamengniu phuimide, khatdi paliu benniu machalubo maniadungtu paliuniu kahum bamme.
Mai hinatu kam mangam khaijiu paliu zu kam masa khai rabo-e. Paliutu kuak khai tulo,
Sigasu chamainagu wasao thiubo nai chaliangbotu kam maha khairabo tingmikse wangrabo-e. Sichiujiu
Sibo tingmik nai Ngamkambo
Paniu Lebanon gu kakubo cedar bangdungtu khatdi Bashan ramga bambo nphubangdungtu kam mahami rabo-e.
Kakubo maluang nai luongbuttu paniu kam manaimi rabo-e,
kakubo chaky-ton khatdi charireng hinatu paniu kam machammi rabo-e.
Dithubo nai withubo maleedung tudi paniu pi malinkiu mirabo-e.
Chamainagu chaliangbo situ kam mahami rabo-e, khatdi chamainagu wasao thiubo situ kam mahami rabo-e. Charameng hinase kam mahakammi rabo-e, sichiujiu
Paniu kadihpiritu kanukra wangboga, maidungniu
Sibo tingmik wangboga, paliuniu machalubo kachia nai rangkanggigu charamengdungse zaseng nai chalen khuga thon khai mine.
niu kadihpiritu kanukra wangboga, maidungniu pagu lungpom gasu marira khatdi pagu pumtan nai pakendibo gasu nbai raleng chakhomky lungga khatdi luongbutgu chakhao tulimkiga nbai sune.
Shaimi rabo maidungtu malum khaimi tulo. Paliu gengse degu bamjiulo?
Tuhoira
paliugu charipidung khatdi paliugu riphen maidung, khatdi paliugu ladjanpaodung nai paliugu phaimiudung, khatdi paliugu taden phuimaidung nai paliu dihgu lamdin maidung,
paliugu riphen maigu khatdi maidunggu jupaodung, paliu kadih thinmaidung, sigasu padrabotu khamjiu maichun kam kamihjiu bambo mai hinatu luthon mirabo-e.
Maidungtu pijiu pasiuchap makhabo nahdungniu mawangra
Mai hinaniu paleng-leng kawibo phiusu rabo-e. Chabonmainiu paliu suang kating maidungtu chakhuang thiuta mine, khatdi gengmakbo maidung siniu paliu riga bambo maidung situ chakhuang thiuta mine.

Kiriang khat siniu paliu rong gasu mai khattu kadalujiu pakhuga haichiu dinbo wan wangsu rabo-e, “Magenthiubo tinggadi nangra wapiu khaira poinakhadi nakhuga bamme, haijengniu nang aliugu jupao thiu khailo.”
Chiudi paniu haichiu paokak sune, “I makge! Iniu naliutu nkha ngamlakge. Akhuga katiu kasak tadi chafai-tani tadi ha-e. Atu pijiu naliugu jupao thiukhai tulo!”
Yo, Jerusalem haira nchum mide! Judah hai kao mide! Paliuniu dinbo khatdi kambo hinase
Paliugu ladjanniu paliutu suimak rabo-e. Sodom maidungniu madulangjiu kamkhai mibo kumjiu paliuniu nuan kamme. Paliu haira nchum mibo-e, haise paliu ronna paliu riga phungwangbo-e.
Tacheng matipmaidung sira paliu chun wirabo-e, khatdi paliuleng wahina wikam rabo-e. Paliu phijengse daolu rabo-e,
Chiudi kasabo maidungra nchum mirabo-e; paliuniu maikhuga kamkhai mibose tuhoira paliu khuga kamkhai rabo-e.
Rangkang apukkhai maidung siniu amaidungtu kam chariu-e, khatdi paliu paw phungmaidung siniu paliutu sontiu-e.
Amaidung yo, naliugu jupaodungniu naliutu jumao mide, haijeng gasu naliuniu delam marikhai ralo chiubo simakjiu bamme.

niu pamaidunggu katingmaidungtu khatdi jupaodungtu ladjan thiura puiwang kinne. Paniu haichiu ladjan thiusune: “Naliuniu maireng humtiu-e khatdi kalek samai khugasu khoilubo siniu naliu ky khaiphui nbamme.
Naliuniu amaidungtu kampet khaira khatdi kaleksamai khugasu naliuleng genglura kamlubose naliugu maji ha-e. Dithubo, Ngamkambo
Chiudi Iniu paliutu sajai pirabo-e. Iniu paliu pee gotlujiu, peelana thiujiu pi tadkhai rabo-e.”
Jerusalem maipuidungniu paliu chaliang thiubo mania, tatiu tataadung paliu ngen-ga, paliu wongchengga,
paliu ntahga khaibo hinase
paliu npomga khatdi paliu khen-ga phung kinbo manguipiu;
paliu njungga khaikinbo njungkhap. sigasu paliu niukhap;
paliugu kawibo faini, nao-naobo ntiang, kasiubo faini khatdi rangkangkhao;
apiuri-ribo fai-ni; fainoi, chaben manuk fai, khatdi chawong-kabet sigasu paliu pee kabet-fai hinase

Paliuniu parim wibo thinbo sung paliu-rai manamsa mirabo-e, kawibo khen-gak sung, chariang kasaboniu khen-gak thiu rabo-e; matai wibo tham phungbo sung, paliu pee malami rabo-e; kawibo faini sung, paliuniu keren-renbo faini piumi rabo-e; paliu lun watse mangambo thiumi rabo-e!
Namdigu maipiudung yo, tanthubo maidung tudi chariga kamshat mirabo-e.
Namdigu rengmundungse achungjiu kapsune, khatdi namdi siakdi pafai-pani gaothon mijiu papumruang kadihga ntao bambo maipui khat kummi rabo-e.

Sibo wan wangbo tingga, maipui khang chinnianiu maipiu khang khattu minlujiu dinsune, “Aliu ronna tiura-sakra khatdi piura-benra phiu ngamme, chiudi nang hai aliu kina-e chiujiu dinra suikhailo, chiusai aliuniu chami thiumakjiu mangambose aliuniu khengson lakge.”
Jerusalem ga masiak diakbo mai hinatu Tingwang niu ringlu raleng kadakhaibo-e, paliutu masanmai chiu kumi rabo-e.
Palamra pagu pumtan siniu jatdungtu
Sigasu Zion Luongga khatdi siga wang madui bammai pakhiangna riga,
Pagu kendi siniu sibo namditu n-nien gu kathiubo gasu mahiukhai bine khatdi sibo bamtu manang makbo bam pithiukhai bine, tingthung tingriu gasu jusung khai bine.
akapiu nai pagu mumsy-reng lui-e:
Akapiugu mumsy-reng khat patam bambo
luongbut khat riga bamniu-e.
Paniu kadih chu-e khatdi tatudungse khoi thonjiu kam masan khai-e;
paniu withubo mumsy kense lingkhai-e.
Situ akhera paniu kakubo apaky khat thiukhai-e;
mumsy tao maluijiu padui thun raleng paniu kadih khun chukhai-e.
Mumsyse minpad ratu paniu khuan bamme,
chiudi mumsy hinase khiang mide.
Haijengniu tuhoira akapiuniu din-e, “Naliu Jerusalem ga khatdi Judah ga lungjiu bambo maidung, agu mumsy reng anai kakga ladjan thiukhailo.
Iniu arengleng wakhat kamtang khai makbo bamjiuma? Dekamjiu Iniu agunbo kawibo mumsy padmak jiulo, dekamjiu kakhiangbo mumsyse padjiulo?
Haise Iniu agu mumsy rengga kamrabo-e; khamza khaibo karengse luthon mine, khatdi kareng situ tunkao mine, khatdi siga bambo rasyse nkankhaodung situ pijiu tiumi sulo khatdi tao maluimi sulo.
Siga Iniu tathu-kara pijiu lunggom mine. Mumsyse Iniu thunta mine, sibosung Iniu tathu-karatu lunggom mira kam khaine. Siga tingdui kiumakra kamuangtu Iniu kham mine.”
Israel mai hai Ngamkambo
Judah maidung hai paniu lingkhaibo mumsy ken-e.
Paliuniu kawibo kamratu paniu ramgunbo-e,
chiudi sibo sung paliuniu maitu gi-dang-e.
Paliuniu majibo kamratu paniu ramgunbo-e,
chiudi paliuniu kasa kamkhai maidung siniu
majibo kamkhai raleng kujiu bamme.
Naliura nchum mide! Kabam maidung siniu bamsan raleng naliuniu chaky chalu liusan-e. Mai khatniudi lungkhaira hawang nuang mine, siga naliu ronna sibo dihga lungne.
Ngamkambo
Mumsiken ramkak kariu dih lungga dikhangjiu bambo gasu mumsy jaw-lah tachad ronna padrabo-e. Chalin madadpiang kai-je-riak tachadniu miusy taju kariu-je-tachadkiu ronna padrabo-e.”
Naliura nchum mide! Naliu nsuan kalu buangsu lujiu jaw saksude, khatdi nchunting katheng-kadun jaw sak maniujiu bamme.
Naliugu changeega nthiam tarabung khatdi jaw thinpiu-e. Chiudi
haijengniu naliutu kavang thiura puitad mine. Naliugu jupaodung kami-mijiu shairabo-e, sigasu chamai kakengniu charijiu shairabo-e.
Charuidih siniu paliutu tiuni lenglakjiu paliu mun ngapad lujiu bamme. Haisiniu Jerusalem gu kasi-kadin maidung khatdi chakhuan-charaniu phuijiu bambo maidung situ kajong lude.
Mai hina mangam rabo mide, sichiujiu chaliangmai hinatu kam manon khai rabo-e.
Chiudi Ngamkambo
Kao nchum mibo namdi lungga milypoidung siniu piubuan tagijiu khatdi kamipoidung siniu piubuan kawibose daolu rabo-e.
Naliura nchum mide! Naliura naliugu nuan gasu kampang lujiu khenrang thiu ngamlu makge.
Naliuniu din-e, “

Naliu nchum mide! Naliuniu kasabotu kawibo khatdi kawibo situ kasabo ku-e. Naliuniu tamiubotu kabenboga khatdi kabenbotu tamiuboga kam kadad khai-e. Naliuniu kakhabotu pi humkhai-e, khatdi kahumbo tuse kam makha khai-e.
Naliura nchum mide! Naliu hai ningting-chang ningting-e chiujiu naliuniu maning-e.
Naliura nchum mide! Jaw saktan maidung yo! Sak tabot sot-sot lujiu, hubo khatdi pingta mibo maidung yo!
Tanim jengniu pamao bam maitu naliuniu phutkhai-e. Sigasu pamao hamaitu paliu majibo daomakra khamme.
Haijengniu tuhoira, magaorengtu khatdi kimibo chapiubuantu chamiga rumaha mibo kumjiu, naliu mense tenmi rabo-e, khatdi naliu rapense kimine khatdi huntad mine, palamra naliuniu Ngamkambo
niu pamaidungtu palung pomjiu paliutu sajai pira paben henpat bamme. Maluongdungse kanuk sune, siga kashaimai phawdungse kara kumjiu puidiga shai kajan-pan bamne. Haichiujiu bamtadi

Paliu mai khatniudi chiabo thiumi lakge; paliu mai khat nadi paliu phi masui lakge. Paliu wadao khatdi ngui lakge maksai jipmi lakge. Khen-gak khat nadi ahiumi lakge; phitop riang khatnadi kam tapmi lakge.
Paliugu tavaithu hai pamun wi-e, sichiujiu paliugu tavaipise ketra kadenjiu bamme. Paliugu chaqon ntin haira matiangtu kumjiu tanne, khatdi paliugu chaqon-kari phise nbui maribo kumjiu tadle.
Paliu rimaidung haira ndongquiniu, wakhao tu kamshat lujiu paliu khugasu mai khatniudi sutmi makra ponlujiu marung kabam kumme.
Sibo tingmik wangboga, Israel mai riga, duipui khuan katanbo kumjiu, paliuniu senjiu kahuwang sune. Phuilo haibo dih hai! Tamiubo nai chunsabo ronna-e! Kabenbo situ tamiubo siniu kajong lude.

Pawan jengga benjiu bambo khaoringdung siniu chap magui bamme, sibo khaoring hinase pakan charuk-ruk phung kamme. Khaoringdungse paliu kan nianiu paliu zu tomme, khatdi kan nianiu paliu pum tomme, khatdi kakibo kan nia siniu lenra leng-e.
Paliuniu khat khattu kujiu din-e:
Masanbo, masanbo, masanbo!
Ngamkambo
Pakendibo siniu kadihpiri phui bamme.”

Iniu din-e, “Achun-ara thiuta mide! I hai nchum mide, palamra amuntai gasu padbo hinase nuanniu phui-e, khatdi nuanniu phuibo ladkeng maliang dinbo maidung ruangga I lung-e. Chiudi amiksiakniu, Chawang,
Siga khaoring ruangga khatniu, rathak bamgasu kibambo mitikangtu, takapniu machit lujiu, akhuga lenkiu-e.
Paniu amuntai situ kijiu bambo mitikang siniu niakhaijiu din-e, “Haisiniu namuntai niakhai mide, siniu tuhoira namaose hamide, khatdi nanuanse kuakkhai mide.”
Siga
Iniu paokakge, “Iniu tadne! Atu langkhailo!”

Siga paniu akhuga din-e, “Haibo maidung maningse kam mada milo, paliu kuonse kamtid milo, khatdi paliu mikse kamtiat milo, chiusai paliuniu ngaolu lakge, maksai chiungamlu lakge, maksai singamlu lakge. Paliuniu singam lusai, paliuniu akhulam mariwangsai, wikhaimi rabo-e.”
Iniu maniu-e, “Haise dethengkha haichiujiu bamralo,
Paniu paokakge, “Namdidungse kao nchumjiu, maruangmi makthen—chaky gase maidungniu lungtami makthen—haibo kadih siakdi kam mahami makthenna haise padrabo-e.
Maidungtu Iniu kadiulam langkhai mine khatdi kadih haise mainiu lungdao lakbo khat thiukhai mine.
Haibo kadihga lungbambo chamai kariu ruanggasu mai khat masiaklu tadi, patudi kam mahami rabo-e; pahai dongtap mibo nphubangmui kummi rabo-e.”
(Singmui siniu Tingwang maidung kasan sulan rabotu lenkhaibo-e).

Syria maigu riphendungniu Israel mai ramlungga wangjiu ngut masuang bam mide chiubo khuanse Judah mai wangpiuniu chiuluboga, tingkainiu singbangtu hun-kanukbo kumjiu padi, pamaidungdi pingboniu kaphik rai-rai mide.

Lungring sijiu khatdi maliu makjiu bamra, khatdi charenmi makra maksai kabuakmi makra pakhuga dinkhai bilo. Chawang Rezin nai pamai Syria maidung khatdi chawang Pekah gu lungpomse mikhut padbo pajong kaniasuang nkiubo makge chiulo.
Syria mainiu Israel mai khatdi paliu wangtu majanglujiu tason kam mide.
Paliuniu Judah maitu chari thiujiu, maidungtu kam manang khailujiu, paliu khulam jaomira, khatdi Tabeel nahpiu siniu chawang bamse malin mira kambo-e.
“Chiudi

Dekam jiulo? Palamra Syria mai hai pagu dihsing namdi, Damascus suang tan nkiubo makge, khatdi Damascus hai Chawang Rezin suang tan nkiubo makge. Israel mailengra haise takum riakcharuk-je-mangiukiu lung maren padlujiu jat khat thiulu lakmi rabo-e.
Israel mai hai, pagu dihsing namdi, Samaria suang tan nkiubo makge, sigasu Samaria hai Chawang Pekah suang tan nkiubo makge.
“Nagu malumse khengngam makge sai, nang khengngam lakge.”
“Naliu
Ahaz niu paokakge, “Iniu madan wadao khatdi khenglakge. Iniu
Siga Isaiah niu paokakge, “Kinglo, tuhoira, Chawang David kaikikdung yo, Maidungniu khengbambo situ phung ngamlulak mibose naliulung saju-e—Tingwang niu khengbambo tudi naliu khengngam lakmi rama?
Wide chiusai,
Paniu tankhangjiu kawibo kada lujiu kasabotu lukhai makra, kabui ndui sakrabo-e khatdi makhuidui tiurabo-e.
Sibo wanse wangmakbo tingga, naliutu kam manang khaibo chawang kaniagu kadih haitu kathaidih pithiu khaimi rabo-e.
“Sibo wanse wangboga,
Paliuniu pabam kasabo ramjeng khatdi chakhao-turen-ga lenwang khopjiu, paliuniu tathu—karaphe riga khatdi chapiubuan hina riga lunggom mirabo-e.
“Sibo wanse wangboga,
“Sibo wanse wangboga, chalu tien thiumai khangkhatniu matompoi khat, sigasu kami nia marui ngamlusai,
paliuniu nduise kengchangkha daolune chiusai paniu lunibo hinadi bammi rabo-e. Yo, sibo kadihga poinakha ring masiakbo mainiu kabui ndui nai makhuidui tiura daolune.
“Sibo wanse wangboga, kawibo mumsireng hina, rangkang sang khat pibuibo mumsireng situ tathuphe nai chariangken siniu lunggom mirabo-e.
Maidungniu tavaipi nai pathu thinlujiu siga tathiu hara tadne. Yo, kadih pakhiangnase chariang kenniu khatdi tathu-karabangniu kenphui mirabo-e.
Luongbut riga lungbo miusydung situ tathu-karabangniu lunggom mijiu mai khatniudi siga tadkhaita mine. Sise kabui nai milyniu tagibo bam thiumi rabo-e.”
Malum buibo mai khangnia, chiubora singku Uriah nai Jeberekhiah nahpiu, Zechariah tu jengdin thiura maluang lulo.”
Pakak khat saiga anao pawan phungmide. Anai nahpiu lunglubo sai,
Haibo nah siniu ‘Apui yo, Apiu yo’ chiujiu dikhangjiu kusi makhabo suangga, Damascus gu chakhiu-chalan hina khatdi Samaria lamsu sutwangbo pakhiangnase Assyria maigu chawangniu phungtad mirabo-e.”
Paniu din-e, “Haibo maidungniu Shiloah gu duiruak gasu luangwangbo manuanbo dui situ lukhai makjiu, Chawang Rezin nai Chawang Pekah masuangga pingjiu manang mide.
Iniu, Assyria mai wangpiu khatdi pagu riphenmai pakhiangnatu puiwangjiu Judah maitu chari thiune. Paliu hai Euphrate Giuki duidetniu pagu chaphuga luang kahak bambo kumjiu hawang rabo-e.
Judah ga duidet siniu diwangjiu paliu makhuakke katang kukhangjiu wahinatu naikammi rabo-e.”
Tingwang aliutu maluang bamme! Pagu henpadbo pakan siniu kadih haitu gukhaijiu bamme.
Jatdung yo, naliu pingjiu wang madui lulo! Kadiubo kadihga bam maidung naliu nkinglo! Yo, chari thiura kaden lulo, chiudi pingsi lulo!
Naliu wakamra ranglulo! chiudi sise wadaodi wangtang lakge. Npao kanithen npao lulo! Chiudi wahinase pageng ha-e, palamra Tingwang aliutu maluang bamme.
Maidungniu luijiu bambo npuise luimak raleng
“Maidungniu wa rangboga jaomane khatdi paliuniu manangjiu bambo lamga pingmi tulo.
, I haira, Ngamkambo khatdi masanbo-e, nangniu atu ronna pingrabo-e.
Agu masanbo gu kapingbo siniu I hai maidungniu paliu phi masui rabo tu kumbo-e, I haira Judah mai nai Israel mai sigasu Jerusalem wangdihtu manrabo tathak khat kumbo-e.
Mai kakeng khaniu paliu phi masui rabo-e; siga paliu kaokiujiu paliutu niakpet mine. Paliutu tathakga manmi rabo-e.”
Akhommaidung yo, naliu, Tingwang niu akhuga pikhaibo chamdungse lukhaijiu khatdi akhi sijiu bam rabo-e.
papum siakniu pamaidung khugasu nbai mibo-e, chiudi Iniu patu malumne khatdi agu ramgunbose pakhuga bamme.

Chiudi maidungniu sailad dinmai nai chamang phungmai, wa chamlamjiu dinmai khuga tacham maniura naliu khuga dinsune. Paliuniu din-e, “Sichiudi, maidung siniu hiunadung khugasu khatdi ringjiu bambo maidunggu malin ga shaimibo maidung khuga chamang phungra dinsu rabo-e.”
Naliuniu paliu khuga haichiu paokak rabo-e, “

Maidung siniu pabam hinaga paliu lung nkhinjiu paliu won mariujiu rontad sune. Paliu won mariu lamsu khatdi paliu lungpom lamsu paliu wangpiu nai paliu Rawang tu siangsu rabo-e. Paliuniu tingpuk lam ngang khangjiu phui sune,
maksai kadihga phui sune, chiudi paliutu thonkhai mirabo magenthiu chariubo nai tamiubo khatdi kapingbogu tamiubo situ makjiu katambo ngao lakge.

Zebulun nai Naphtali kiphiu kaniagu kadihse pawan khatga pazu sabam niu-e, chiudi pasai haibo luongriang ga chakhuang thiubo hai, Maditerranean tingbang lamsu Jordan hugen khatlam tangbo, khatdi sangdiu maidung siniu lungbo Galilee ga tadi wangrabo-e.
Paliu hai ting ka-ajuibo ramga lungbam niu-e
chiudi tuhoira kabenbose paliu riga thaoben khaijiu bamme.
nangniu paliutu pi chunwi khai bide.
Maidung siniu paliugu miusy atiatbo tingga chunwibo kumjiu,
maksai paliuniu chariga sutlubo mania njanbo kumjiu,
nangniu paliu khuga tenkhaibo situ paliu chun wi-e.
Palamra paliu bangrid thiujiu bambo wongkhamse
khatdi paliu makhuaktu lekjiu bambo chagi tangse nangniu kampang khaide.
Nda Midia rimaitu nangniu kamkao mibo kumjiu,
maidungtu kam chariujiu khatdi kam mahajiu bambo jattu nangniu kamkao khaide.
Chari thiuboga riphen mainiu sunglubo maniadung
khatdi tazai kaluikhai mibo paliu faini pakhiangnase chaminiu kam mahami rabo-e.
Aliuleng ngena khat lungkhai bamme!
Aliuleng npiumainah khat pikhai bamme!
Sichiujiu paniu aliugu mawangpao thiune.
Patuse, “Maisuang habo Ladpikhaipiu,”
“Ngamkambo Tingwang.” “Tingtheng Ringbopiu,”
“Agi-manaibo Wangnahpiu,” chiujiu kune.
pawangdih hai pawan machangna agi-manaijiu bamne,
Pagu pumtanse majibo nai nchangbo thinjiu,
Paniu Chawang David bam malinjiu mawangne,
tuhoi gasu kaloibo wan tangbo mawangne.
Ngamkambo
Israel maidung pakhiangna, Samaria gu namdi lungga lungbo mai hinaniu, haise paniu kamkhaibo-e chiubose silune. Tuhoira paliuse chaliangjiu khatdi wasao thiujiu bamme. Paliuniu din-e,
“Chagam kangniu thiubo kydidungse kaomide, chiudi aliuniu tatu kangniu thiu malinmi rabo-e. Biuruibang pumdungse huikao khai bamme, chiudi aliuniu withubo cedar singniu malinmi rabo-e.”
Paliutu asunra
Israel maitu kajong lura, Syria mainiu tingbang lam, khatdi Philistia mainiu tingnu lam, paliu mun n-nga padlujiu bamme. Haichiu bamliudi
Ngamkambo
Ngamkambo
Katingmai nai chakhuang thiubuibo maidungse papee ye khatdi pamise aratbo cham kadinbo phaimiukakung maidung si-e!
Paliutu jukhaijiu bambo maidung siniu paliutu jumao mide sichiujiu paliu chun kam maha mide.
Sijeng gasu
Tathu-karatu chaminiu karubo kumjiu maidunggu kasabo siniu tao bamme. Haise mariuga chami taojiu mikhut khathung-thung kabam kum taorabo-e.
Ngamkambo
Sibo ramlung pakhiangnaga maidungniu paniu-paniu daolubo saisuijiu kadao hina khoitiu rabo-e, chiudi paliu won mariubose kimlu makge. Paliu nahmai siak tudi paliuniu tiune!
Manasseh maidung nai Ephraim maidung khat-khattu chari thiune, khatdi paliu aruanglujiu Judah maitu chari thiune. Haichiujiu bamliudi
Naliura nchum mide! Naliuniu amaidungtu kam masara majimakbo tacheng tajai kampadle.
Haichiujiu naliuniu kalek samainiu daorabo dam khatdi paliugu maji daorabo hina gasu khamme. Haichiujiu naliuniu kamipuidung nai magen nahdunggu maniase suttiu-e.

Tingwang niu naliutu sajai piboga naliuniu dekam ralo? Paniu naliu riga kapingbose kadiubo ramlamsu phungwangboga naliuniu degu kamralo? Nkha khaibo daolura naliu delam pakkhai ralo? Naliugu chakhiu-chalanse delam baikhai ralo?
Naliutu chari bamga kamshat mirabo-e, maksai kavangky lam jukhai mirabo-e. Chiubam liudi

Alungpom kamkhaibo maidung, charatu simakbo jattu chari thiura, Iniu Assyria maitu langkhaine. Paliutu pijiu maigu sutra khatdi agara, sigasu puidiga bambo karasuttu kumjiu maidungtu taomalui mira Iniu langkhai mibo-e.”
Chiudi Assyria mai wangpiu sira chari thiurabo lungchunse pakhuga bamme. Paniu jat kakengtu kam mahara palung chap bamme.
Agu charipi hinase chawang khatle, chiujiu paniu wasao thiu bamme!
Iniu Calno nai Carchemish gu namdidung, Hamath nai Arpad namdidungtu chari thiujiu lulude. Iniu Samaria nai Damascus tu chari thiujiu lulude.
Charamengtu kahumbo wangdih, Jerusalem nai Samaria maigu charameng suang keng nkiubo situ sajai pira Iniu aben henpad khaide.
Iniu Samaria nai sibogu charameng pakhiangnatu kam maha mide, sikum siakjiu Jerusalem khatdi siga kahumbo ramengdungtu kam maha mine.”
Chiudi

“Pakhiangna haise Assyria mai wangpiu Iniu aronna kamlubo-e,” chiujiu pasao thiu-e. “I tanne, Ira si-e khatdi Ira ngao-e. Iniu jatdung kakga bambo ramraise kam maha mide. Sigasu paliuniu pon kabao khai bambo katiu kasakse sutlude. Siga lungjiu bambo maidung riga Iniu matomchi kumjiu taoni khai mide.

Kadihpirigu jatdung haira thingnasip khat kumbo-e, sichiujiu Iniu paliugu chakhiu-chalanse maruibum khoi madui malapabo kumjiu khoi madui lude. Pakan khatniudi atu kahap thonlu makge; pamun khatniudi ngapad lujiu atu machao kalam khai makge!”
Chiudi
Tuhoi tiu kanithen tiujiu bambo pamai kawibo maidungtu Ngamkambo

Israel maigu kabenbo, Tingwang se, chami mawimi rabo-e. Masanbo Israel maigu Tingwang se naikhat lungga chamipuang thiumi rabo-e, sibo mipuang siniu wahina rumaha kiujiu, tathuphe-karaphe katang ruthon mirabo-e.
Mai khattu kasabo rapotniu kam masa mibo kumjiu, mariu-kajing khatdi chalu-kareng pakhiangnatu kam mahami rabo-e.
Singbang hinase taodok mijiu sise nahmai khatniudi pariak chak ngamlumi rabo-e.
Ring masiak lubo Israel maidungniu paliutu kam maha mirabo jat riga mangiu khai tamirabo wanse wangkinne. Paliuniu paliugu malumse majijiu Israel maigu masanbo Rawang,
Israel maidung poinakha ronna paliugu kangambo Tingwang khuga wanglanne.
Tuhoi Israel maidungse nbuiniang kumjiu kengbam liudi, chamai poinakha ronna malanwang rabo-e. Kam maha mirabo siniu maidungtu khuan bamme, haise buigap-e.
Yo, paniu kamne chiujiu dinbo kum, Dithubo, Ngamkambo
Dithubo Ngamkambo,
