Iniu naliutu sajai pikhai lubo sai, Iniu paliutu kam maha mirabo-e.
Ngamkambo,
Sibo wan wangboga, Iniu naliutu Assyria maigu pumtan gasu khen-rang pithiu khai bine, sichiujiu paliu wongkhamse naliuleng bangrid thiutami rabo-e.”
Mikre maigu riphen mainiu Ai gu namditu sutlude! Paliu Migron tangbo tadpadle! Paliuniu paliugu katiu kasakse Michmash ga khaidiak mide!
Paliu npui kenpad lujiu, Geba ga sibo nchunse bamkhai mide. Ramah gu namdak lungga bambo maidungtu kam charen khaide, khatdi Chawang Saul gu namdak Gibeah lungga bambo maidungse pakkam mide.
Gallim maidung yo, sensulo! Laishah maidung yo, nkinglo! Anathoth maidung yo,paokak khailo!
Madmenah nai Gebim maidung ringlu raleng pak kimme.
Mikre maise thainai Nob gu namdak lungga bamme, khatdi siga paliuniu Zion Luong ga, Jerusalem namdiga, paliu njum thunlujiu paliu pee kangum bamme.
Singbang khat gasu bitap padmibo singkedung kumjiu Ngamkambo
Mariu n-gangga singbangdung tu mariniu huikaobo kumjiu, Lebanon gu withubo singbangdi kaomibo kumjiu,
pamaidungtu paniu mawangra khaotibo nai ningting pikhai rabo-e.
pacham majaiboga palung kimrabo-e.
Paniu tazu-chalun phuijiu maksai mai thaocham phungjiu ladjan thiu lakge;
paniu kalek samaitu masanjiu ladjan thiurabo-e
sigasu pumtan hamaigu majise phuikhai birabo-e.
Pagu chamtan gasu maidungtu sajai pirabo-e,
siga kasabo maidungse shairabo-e.
khatdi quirukdung siniu kamipoidungtu maluang ji aruangne.
Kabuipoidung nai chaquipoidung maluang tiu aruangne,
sichiujiu nahmaidungniu paliutu akhi sune.
Matomdung nai chahomdung maluang tiu aruangne,
khatdi matompoidung nai chaquipoidung agi-manaijiu ji aruangne.
Quichangdung siniu matom kumjiu magaose tiune.
Ngenadung siniu patai karabo kaniu mungga
mathen bamdi paliutu kam masa lakge.
Tingwang gu masanbo luongbut Zion riga, wakhatdi kahabo khatdi kasabo thiu lakge.
Duipuiga taduiniu phuijiu bambo kumjiu kadih haiga
Sibo tingmik wangboga,
Lung maratad mibo Israel mai nai Judah maidung situ kadih pake madai gasu puiwang lanrabo madanse jatdung khuga lenkhaira
Israel maigu chawang dihniu Judah maitu manma lanlak mide, khatdi Judah mainiu Israel maitu mikre lanlak mide.

Paliuniu aruanglujiu Philistine maitu tingnulam aphenne, khatdi tingbanglam bambo maidunggu mania sutne. Paliuniu Edom mai nai Moab maidungtu chari ngamlu rabo-e khatdi Ammon maidungniu paliu kadin piurabo-e.
niu Suez Zaibek kam masang mirabo-e, sigasu giuna chinnia ronna saodia lujiu, Euphrate giuse kam masang mira paniu kathiubo tingkai phungwangne, sichiujiu mai hina sise tadken padlu bui-e.
Sibo bamga ring masia padbo Israel maileng Assyria gasu puidi, paliu paopeh mainiu Egypt phutpadbo tingga bamniubo kumjiu bammi rabo-e.
Maidungniu haichiujiu chalui thiubo tingmikse wangkinne,
“Iniu natu thuonne,
Nangniu atu nalung pomjiu bamniu-e,
chiudi tuhoira nangniu atu hiam khaijiu, nalung pomta mide.
Iniu patu malum bamne khatdi pinglakge.
pahai atu ranpao-e.
Tadui ka-agi siniu charibotu pikim khaibo kum,
Tingwang niu pamaidungtu rankhaiboga paliu chunwijiu matha-e.”
Maidungniu chalui thiurabo tingmikse wangkinne,
Paniu kamkhai mibose jat hina khuga dinkhai bilo!
Pahai dejiukha dilo chiubo paliu khuga dinkhai bilo!
Paniu kadibo kamkhai mibo jengniu
Kadihpiri pabam hinaga haibo chamse pichiu khailo.
Zion ga lungbammai hinaniu senlo khatdi chalui thiulo!
Israel maigu masanbo Tingwang hai di-e,
khatdi paniu pamaidung ruangga lung bamme.”
Kathaidih luongton khat riga charigu pengfai jusu khai bamme! Riphen maidung khuga senlo khatdi chaliangbo namdigu rengmundung situ chari thiura paliu khuga naliu npom pon-chagang padjiu senlo.
niu pagu chaliangbo khatdi malum suibo riphendungtu masanbo chari thiura khatdi paniu palung pombo maidung situ sajai pira kukhai mide
Maluang riga maidung dungdi khuan, jatdung nai chawangdihdung siniu wang madui bambo khuanse nking khailo. Riphen maidunggu
Paliu hai kadiu-diubo kadih malan lamsu wangkinne.
Mai hina bense pachengsai riang-riang mirabo-e, khatdi mai hina hotse hami rabo-e.

Paliu mathiu pingkammi rabo-e, khatdi maipui khatgu manathad kumjiu thiubo thad siniu kheng ngamlakmi rabo-e. Pingbo siniu khatniu khat khuga phuisune, khatdi paliu zu haise mangambo siniu phui rabo-e.
gu lungpom kasabo, chami kumjiu taobo kapingbo lungpom tingmikse wangkinne. Kadihpiri haitu kathaidih pithiu khai mine, khatdi nuan phungmai hinatu kam mahami rabo-e.
Chahiu, chagan hina bentami rabo-e, naimik padtadi tamiumi rabo-e, chahiuniu pa-nbiu pikhai lanlakmi rabo-e.
Ringmasiak maira kachiasuang riang rabo-e.
Ngamkambo
“Babylon ga lungbambo sangdiu maidungse paliu ram-ramga, tathanniu tathiu hamai khugasu pakbo kum, khatdi mily khuanpao habo milydung kumjiu, lungmara marentad mirabo-e.
Minlubo mai hinatu chushat phenshat mirabo-e.
Paliu wathak thiura hajiu bamboga, paliu nahdungtu lekshat mirabo-e, paliu ky hinase sungtiu-humtiu mirabo-e, khatdi paliu naodungtu manomjiu minrabo-e.”
Paliuniu tavaipi nai pathuniu chabon maitu kamshat mirabo-e. Paliuniu ngenadung nai pamnahdungtu wakhatdi lungsason lakge.
Babylon hai chawangdih pakhiangna ruangga ngaowi thubo-e; haise siga lungbam maigu n-gengbo si-e. Chiudi
Rontad kinbo Arab mai khatniudi pagu mathenky siga lensu lanlakge, khatdi mily khuanmai khatniudi siga milytu pijiu tagi khai lanlakge.

Sigase kathaidihga lungbo khaorui-khaonadung siniu lungmi rabo-e, khatdi avengdungniu paliu sip ponkhai rabo-e. Ruididung siniu siga lungmi rabo-e, khatdi kao nchum mibo bam pakhiangnaga chahungdung siniu paliu nbaibam thiumi rabo-e.
Chaky tondung nai chawangkining hinase nkangquidung nai tanydung marabo kavai khuanniu kawan rabo-e. Babylon gu pawanse wangmide! Pagu tingmikdungse loimi lajiu bamme.”

niu paliuleng pikhaibo kadihga malanwang raleng Israel maidungtu jat kakeng ganiu nkha khai rabo-e, khatdi siga jatdungniu Israel maigu kavangdung kumjiu macharabo-e. Pawan khatga Israel maitu chari thiujiu sutlubose tuhoira Israel mainiu chari thiujiu sutmine, sigasu Israel maitu pawan khatga kam masa khai mibo maidung riga Israel mainiu mawangne.
Paniu haise kam khaiboga, paliuniu Babylon wangpiutu nuimenjiu dinsune:
“Palung kasabo wangpiu hai kaomide! Paniu mai khattudi, wadaodi kam chariu lanlak mine!
Paliu lung kasabo mawangpaodunggu pumtanse
paliu haira paliu lung pomjiu maitu kam masabo khatdi paliuniu ngamlubo jatdungtu wadaodi saomakjiu kam mathadjiu bambo maidung-e.
Tuhoira kanamboga kadihpiri pakhiangnaniu chariubo gasu mathakjiu agi-manaibo lutaojiu, khatdi mai hina chunwijiu chalui thiu bamme.
Cypress bangdung khatdi Lebanon gu cedar bangdungniu, kaomibo chawang riga paliu chun wijiu bamme, palamra paliutu huikao raleng mai khatdi hamide, tuhoira pah hamide!

“Charuidih siniu Babylon gu chawangtu paliu chun wijiu lukhaira kadenjiu bamme. Kadihpiriga pumtan bambo maidunggu mahiudungse kabuakjiu bamme. Chawangdunggu mahiudungse paliugu chawangbam gasu sujiu bamme.
Paliu mathiu siniu patu kujiu din-e, ‘Tuhoira nang hai aliu kumgapjiu sonmide! Nang hai aliu kumbo mai khatle!
Natura nthiam-taragu chalui siniu chakhuang thiukhai kamigu-e, chiudi tuhoira nang hai charuidih haiga bam mide. Tuhoira masanpui jiuga nazi thiulujiu khatdi takipui siniu nafai thiulujiu bam mide.’

Nangniu tinggen ga khanglujiu khatdi kuthubo chagandung riga nagu chawangbamse khaira nalung chun chapkhai kamigu-e. Duiruaklam bambo maluong riga charadungniu wang maduiboga nang hai chawang khat kumjiu ntaone chiujiu nangniu maning khai kamigu-e.
Kamuang riga nang khanglujiu Ngamkambopiu kum mine chiujiu nangniu dinkhai mibo-e.
Chiudi sibo sung natu charuidih suk kachangbo bamga pikiu khai mide.
“Kashaibo siniu pasuang hajiu, pamun ngajiu natu phui sune. Paliuniu maniu sune, ‘Kadihpiritu thin kanukjiu khatdi chawangdungtu kam malai khaijiu kapin bambo piuse, haibo piu sima?

Namdidungtu kam maha khailujiu khatdi kadihpiritu pijiu kathaidih thiukhai mibose haibo piu sima? Pagu kavangkyga bambo kavang maidungtu wadaodi lepad khaimakbo maksai paliu kylam pi tadkhai makbo piuse haibo piu sima?’
Kadihpirigu chawangdung pakhiangna siniu paliugu paman kungbo charao lungga jikam bamme,
chiudi naraw lengra ha-e, haichiujiu naphawse pon thonjiu tenmi rabo-e. Sise chariga shaimibo riphenmai phawdung siniu majiukhai lujiu, chakhomga thonkhaijiu tao malui mirabo-e.
Palamra nangniu nadihtu kammaha lujiu khatdi namaidung siaktu kamshat mide, natura kakibo chawangdung situ kumjiu nphumjiu bailakge. Kasabo nakikhun mai khatnadi ring masiak lakge.
Kamshat rabo maise sulo! Haibo wang nahpiudungse paliu pao-pehdung nuan jengniu shairabo-e. Paliu mai khatna niudi kadihpiriga wadaodi mawang lakge maksai namdiga lung lakge.”
Ngamkambo
Babylon haitu Iniu manamhang pithiu khai mine, khatdi siga avengniu lungne. Wahina biakthon mibo nphiak siniu Babylon maitu Iniu biakthon mirabo-e. Ngamkambo

Iniu Assyria maitu amai Israel mai dih gasu kam maha mine khatdi paliutu agu maluang rigasu aphiniu taoni rabo-e. Iniu amaidungtu Assyria maigu wongkham gasu khatdi paliuniu phungrabo bangrid gasu lepad khaibi rabo-e.
Haise kadihpiri leng Iniu rangkhai mibo si-e, sichiujiu jatdung situ sajai piraleng aben npom chagang pad mibo-e.”
Ngamkambo

niu lunglakbo pamaidunggu khuanpao thiu rabo-e, sichiujiu paliutu pi manang makjiu lungkhai rabo-e. Chiudi Philistia mai naliu riga paniu kapingbo charakhum langwangne, siga naliu mai khatnadi ringmasiak lulakge.
Philistia maigu namdidung pakhiangna naliu achunglujiu nkha khaira khenglulo! Naliu mathiu pingsi lulo! Tingpi lamsu kamuang kangkhat wangkinne—paliu haise wadi pingmakbo riphendung-e.
Philistia mai khugasu wangbo champaomaitu aliuniu dechiujiu kenkak ralo?
Ar nai Kir gu namdi situ nchun khat lunggasu kam maha mide, khatdi Moab kadih hai tingjing-nging mide.
Dibon maidungniu charakyga kapra khang-e. Moab maidungniu Nebo nai Medeseba namdidung riga paliu chun sajiu achung bamme; khatdi paliu chun chariujiu paliu pitham khatdi paliu ntanggiu gotthon mide.
Maidungniu puidiga maliufai benlujiu bamme; namdi wonjeng lam khatdi chaky npom riga maidung kapjiu achung bamme.
Heshbon maidung nai Elealeh maidungniu kapjiu paliu khuan senpad bamme, sichiujiu paliuniu senpadbo khuanse Jahaz tangbo chiu-e. Riphen maidung niudi kaphikrai-rai bamme; paliu hotse hamide.

Moab jengniu alungchun kapjiu bamme! Maidungniu Zoar khatdi Eglath Shelishiyah namdilam paktad mide. Mai khangsianiu Luhith tadbo npuilam khangjiu kapjiu tadle; khangsia mainiu Horonaim ga marikhai lujiu, chariujiu paliu khuan tanjiu kap ahik bamme.
Nimrim giuse sangmide, sibo mungga bambo chapiubuanse agui mide, khatdi madiakbo piubuanse wadi hamide.
Maidungniu paliugu mania hinase ponlujiu marira Masangli Ramjengga tadmide.
Kapbo khuanse Moab gu ramrai pabam hinaga chiu chiamide. Sise Eglaim nai Beerelim namdaklam chiutang-e.

Dibon namdakgu singgiuse tazainiu heng maren mide, sichiujiu siga lungbam maidung leng sa-nkiubo haise Tingwang niu kaden khai nbamme. Yo, Moab ga saokhai diak mibo maidung hinatu kamshat kammi rabo-e.
Sela namdi gasu ramjingga lung bambo Moab maidungniu Jerusalem ga mawangjiu bambopiu khuga milypoi khat kalen thiujiu langkhai-e.
Paliuniu Arnon giuky hugen gase khuanjiu bamme, khatdi thingnadungtu paliu sip gasu hathon padmibo kumjiu paliu chun thiumakjiu tadpad tadngutjiu bamme.

Paliuniu Judah maidung khuga din-e, “Dekam ralo chiubo aliu khuga dinkhailo. N-nien tingthiuboga pijiu ting-agui khaibo singbang khat kumjiu aliutu gukhailo, khatdi aliutu pijiu nagu mahiuga mathak khailo. Aliura maidihga lungmaidung-e; mai khatniudi phiudao lakbo bamga aliutu baikhailo.
Aliutu pijiu naliu ramga lungkhailo. Aliutu kam maha mira kambambo maidung khugasu aliutu gukhailo!”
(Kam kabuak khaibo nai kam maha khaibo hai loimi rabo-e, khatdi namditu kam mahara kamjiu bambo maidungse hami rabo-e.

Sigasu David kaikik ruanggasu mai khatniu chawang thiurabo-e, sichiujiu paniu pamaidungtu chamchangbo nai lungsaboniu mawang rabo-e. Paniu majibose kam majad khai rabo-e, khatdi majibo kam khairatu paniu phuikhai rabo-e).
Judah maidungniu din-e, “Moab maidungse dejiukha chalianglo chiubo aliuniu chiu-e. Paliu hai chaliang-e khatdi wasao thiu-e, chiudi paliuniu wasao thiubose mathakhu-e.”

Moab maidungniu chariu magenthiubo khengjiu bambo jengniu paliu kaprabo-e. Paliuniu Kir Heres namdi ga tiuwibo tiutek tiukhai mibo situ maningtaoboga paliu mathiu kaprabo-e. Paliu lung pi manang khairaleng paliutu hathon mirabo-e.

Heshbon mungga bambo chalu nai Sibmah gu mumsy reng hinase kam maha mide—jatdunggu mawangpaodung situ pi sak khaibo jawgu mumsy rengse kam maha mide. Pawan khatga mumsy kense tingbang lam bambo kathaidih khatdi tingnulam bambo Kashaibo Duipui gasu Jazer namdi tangbo kenpad tangbo-e.
Tuhoira Iniu Jazer leng kapbo kumjiu Sibmah gu mumsy reng jengniu kap-e. Agu mikdui hai Heshbon nai Elealeh leng luangkiu-e, palamra maidungtu pijiu chunwi khairabo leng atiatse hamide.

Kadihtam bambo luzamga bammai khatniudi tuhoira paliu chun wisilak mide. Mumsireng lungga mai khat khuandi chiuta mide, maksai chalui thiuta mide. Mai khatniudi jaw kamra mumsy taoni tamide; chunwibo khuanse hamide.
Iniu Kir Heres leng chunsabo jaojiu Moab leng chunsajiu kap-marung bamme.
Ramluonglam bambo charaky lam Moab maidungniu kakheng thiura paliu pon thiulujiu tadpad sude, chiudi siseniu paliuleng wadi kawibo kamkhai silak mide.
Haise
Haichiujiu tuhoira
Syria gu namdidungse tingtheng pijiu ramjing thiumi rabo-e. Siga milydung nai matom-kabuidung situ pijiu tagibo tiubo bam thiumi rabo-e, sichiujiu mai khatniudi paliutu hathon lakge.
Israel maidungniu maitu dangngam lulakmi rabo-e, khatdi Damascus niu pakhen parang thiubose hami rabo-e. Ring kabangbo Syria maise, Israel maidung kumjiu, mangammi rabo-e. Ngamkambo
Israel mai hai miusy gelubo khatdi atiatlubo luzam pabui khomlubo Rephiam gu ramjengga maruang bambo luzam khatdi nchum mibo kadih khat kummi rabo-e.
Mai khangsia ronna ring masiak rabo-e, khatdi Israel maidung hai takisy raikam mibo paton ga pasy nia-sum ronna masiak khaibo poinakha ronna masiak khaibo takisy bang kummi rabo-e. Israel mai Rawang,
Sibo tingmik wangboga, maidungniu paliugu Dampao, Israel maigu masanbo Rawang khuga nkha khai raleng mariwang rabo-e.
Paliu bensiakniu machalubo rathak bam gase paliuniu mangiu khailan tami rabo-e, maksai paliu bensiam kawibo--charapui Asherah mungga maksai maruta rukhai rabo rathakbam tuse malumbose saomi rabo-e.

Sibo tingmik wangboga, chari dangkham kawibo namdidungse kathaidih pijiu thiukhai mirabo-e, sichiujiu Hiv mai nai Amor mainiu Israel maidung khugasu paktad kinbo tingga saokhaibo namdidung kumjiu mathakhu saodiak mirabo-e.
Israel mai yo, naliutu kadibo tudi khat kumjiu rankhaibo khatdi gukhaibo Tingwang tu naliuniu mangai mide. Sibosung naliuniu masanbo kareng kamlujiu sangdiumai ratu kahumra kamme.
Chiudi naliuniu lingkhaibo nsuan siakga puakkhangjiu khatdi pabuan bonkhangjiu bam tadi, atiat silu lakge. Siga chariu magenthiubo nai wisi lulakbo thad ronna padrabo-e.
Pumtanniu phuijiu bambo jatdunggu kabuakbo khuan siniu duipui kasuak khuan kum khatdi tadui kadibo duidet kasuakbo khuan kum bamme.

Sibo jatdungse luang bambo duiliu katanbo kumjiu masuang tadjiu bamme, chiudi Tingwang niu paliutu rukhaine, siga paliu masaiwang lanjiu, luongbut riga nbuitu hunthon mibo kum, khatdi nbui-maribo kumjiu hathonmi rabo-e.
Chawan tingga paliuniu kapingbo kamkhai-e, chiudi nsuan tingga paliu hami-e. Haise aliu dih sutra kambambo mai hinagu sansiat si-e.

Sibo kadih gasu dihsungpao dungniu sibo bamgasu chahutangniu kamlubo aliam gasu Nile lam kiu-e. Majadbo ladlangtadmaidung yo, chaky lam malan wangmilo! Singgiu gasu njan lujiu naliugu katanbo nai pumtan bambo jat, naliugu katheng-kadibo khatdi pagiwi bansat bambo, kadihpiri pakhiangnaniu pingkamjiu bambo naliu maidung khulam tacham hai phungwang malanmi sulo.
Kadihga kalungmai hina, nkinglo! Kadih maluong ton-ga madanleng jusurabo pengfai tuse phuilo! Marung mudbo khuan situ nkinglo!
niu akhuga din-e, “Atiatting nchun kalumbo wan ga kajikdui kiubo kum khatdi n-nien tingphu-langa naimik nbiu thaokhaibo kumjiu Iniu tinggen lamsu phuikiu rabo-e.
Mumsy khom madui makhaga, papen hinase nkai kam miboga, khatdi mumsyse minpadboga, nsinaniu mumsy kentu ramtap malapabo kumjiu mikre mainiu Sudan maitu kam mahami rabo-e.
Paliugu riphen maidunggu kashaibo phawdungse nthingnadung nai nkan khaodung khuga thonkhai rabo-e. Kariak tingga thingnadungniu khatdi tathe tingga nkan khaodungniu paliugu tatek thiu rabo-e.”
Ngamkambo

niu din-e, “Iniu Egypt ga maidungtu chari thiura kamkhaine khatdi singna khattu singna khatniu, khatdi kiningmai khatniu kiningmai khattu suimakbo pikhaine. Suinimakbo namdidungse khatniu khattu chari thiune, khatdi suinimakbo chawangdung siniu pumtan asutrabo-e.

Egypt maidung niu marangbambo nai paliugu lunlung jaise Iniu kam maha mirabo-e. Paliugu charameng khuga nkha khaira khengsune, khatdi paliuniu chamang phungmaidung khuga tadlujiu shaimi mai hiuna khuga ladpi khaira maniu sune.
Egypt maitu Iniu pacheng-pajai khatdi palung kasabo chawang khuga pikhai mine, sichiujiu paliutu mawang rabo-e. Ngamkambo,
Tadui hai Nile giu suang nami rabo-e, sichiujiu singgiuse sangkiu mirabo-e.
Taduise sangkiu mibo jengniu aluad duise manamsa mirabo-e. Chahutang nai piumenbang hina aguikiu mirabo-e,
Khatdi Nile giuky mungga lingkhaibo alinbang hinase aguikiujiu hunthon mirabo-e.
Nile giu gasu chakha khajiu pa-tatek leng phiu kinmai hinase nkiu-marungjiu kapne; paliugu khakhoidung nai alangdungse pageng hami rabo-e.
Fainoi dakmaidungse manangmi rabo-e;
chafai dakmaidung nai tatien thiusi maidungse paliu lung magenthiujiu paliu chun nkhin mirabo-e.

Zoan gu jupaodungse kamengbo maidung-e! Egypt gu ningting thubo maidungniu kamengbo ladpise pikhai-e! Paliu hai nda karaiga kasi-kangaobo maidung nai chawang maidungtu malin maidung-e chiujiu, chawang khuga paliuniu dejiukha hujiu dinbo gulo?
Egypt gu chawang yo, nagu ningtingbo ladpipaodungse dega bamlo? Ngamkambo
Zoan nai Memphia gu jupaodungse kamengbo maidung-e. Paliu hainiu jattu jukhaira chiubo-e chiudi paliuniu jumaokam mide.
niu paliutu kamaobo ladpi khaira kamkhai mibo-e. Sijengniu, Egypt mainiu wahina kammao kam mide, sigasu paliu jai-alise jaw sak maniu, mainiu tangat lad-ladjiu pagu marui bamga nkhuangkiubo kum mide.
Egypt ga kalungmai, kalekwi maidi, kaleksa maidi, para-kathiumaidi, maidiu-maida maidi, mai khatniudi nkhakhai ngamlulak mide.
Egypt maidungniu npuimai kumjiu pingmi rabo tingse wangkinne.
Ngamkambo
Sibo wan wangbo tingga, Hebrew mai ladniu Egypt maigu namdi mangiu lungga dinmi rabo-e. Maidungniu Ngamkambo
Sibo wan wangbo tingga Egypt kadihga
Siseniu Egypt lungga Ngamkambo

papum siakniu Egypt maidung khuga madu khaine, siga paliuniu patu suikhaijiu kahumrabo-e, khatdi rathak mania pakhuga phungwang rabo-e. Paliuniu pakhuga ladriat katanbo thiune khatdi paliuniu ladriat khaibo hinase kamrabo-e.
niu Egypt maitu sajai pirabo-e, chiudi paniu paliutu wikhai rabo-e. Paliu pakhulam mariwang rabo-e, siga paniu paliu rathoi chiukhaijiu paliutu wikhai rabo-e.
Sibo wan wangbo tingga, Egypt nai Assyria kakga puidi khat bammi rabo-e. Panaigu namdi kakgase maidungniu tadpad tadngutjiu bammi rabo-e, khatdi sibo jat kania siniu kahum aruangjiu bammi rabo-e.
Sibo wan wangbo tingga, Israel mainiu Egypt mai nai Assyria maitu machammi rabo-e, sichiujiu sibo jat sum siniu kadihpiri pakhiangna khuga thoidam thiumi rabo-e.
Ngamkambo
Assyria maigu wangdipiu Sargon gu chamtan hangga, Assyria mai riphen gu charipiniu Ashdod gu namdi Philistine maitu chari thiusude.
Takum sum masuangga Amoz nahpiu Isaiah khuga, paniu khaibambo paphitop nai paniu benbambo maliufaise lupad mira
Ashdod tu chari ngamluboga,

Assyria maigu wangdipiuniu chari ngamlubo gasu minlumai situ paliu pumruang jutad mirabo-e. Kating-kana, paliu phiruangniu khatdi paliu pumruangniu, paliu dang luiku lujiu tadrabo-e, sichiujiu kamangambose Egypt mai riga phungwang rabo-e.
Sudan tu malumjiu, khatdi Egypt jengniu wasao thiu bam maise paliu chun hami rabo-e khatdi panglu-lu mirabo-e.

Sibo wan wangbo tingga, Philistine luongriangga lungjiu bambo maidungniu dinsune, ‘Assyria maigu chawangpiu khugasu aliutu gukhaira aliuniu mangiu khaijiu bambo, maidung khuga degu padmi gulo chiubo phuilo! Dechiujiu aliuniu ring masiak luralo?’”
Haise Babylon lamga champao si-e.
Kathaidihga nbui mari kawangbo kumjiu chariu magenthiubose kapingbo kadih khat lamsu wangrabo-e.
Wa kasa padbo, maitu jontiubo khatdi wakam kamahabogu madungao khat Iniu ngao-e.
Elam gu riphen mai yo, aphen sulo! Medesia gu riphenmai yo, namdidung situ taoweng sulo! Babylon niu kam chariu khaibose Tingwang niu kam mahami rabo-e.
Iniu ngaobo khatdi chiubo madungaose kapingbo nai charenbo siniu phuiting-e, haise maipui khatgu manathad kumbo-e.
Apee hai tawenglui-lui-e, khatdi pingbo siniu I masandi-di mide. Chawan wangrabotu Iniu ramgun-e, chiudi kapingbo makjiu wakhatdi phungwang son makge.

Madungao gase khumkibo khat kaden khai bamme; chagiang maidungtu pijiu ntao khaira leng kasing hamkhai bamme. Paliu tiu-sakjiu bamme. Siga bungjiu chamtan senpadle: “Chakampaodung yo! Naliugu chageese kaden lusulo!”
Siga
Chaqon riga khangnia-nia, khatdi qonniam nai qontrao tongbo maidungtu paniu ngaosai, paliutu phui mawijiu phuirabo-e.”
Akhepiu siniu senpadle, “Paohubo, Iniu agu akhe bamga nchun n-nien chapjiu bambo-e.”
Amai Israel maidung yo, naliutu chabanmiutu kumjiu manuikhai mide, chiudi tuhoira Ngamkambo
Haise Edom lamga champao si-e.
Edom lamsu mai khatniu atu kujiu din-e, “Akhepiu yo, nchun haise dejiukha majadjiu loimi ralo? Haise dejiuga majadjiu loimi ralo chiubo akhuga dinkhailo.”
Iniu paokakge, “Nsuanse padkinne, chiudi nchun wanglan rabo-e. Nangniu maniulan nisai, wanglanjiu maniu lanno.”
Haise Arabia lamga champao si-e.
Naliu Dedan maidung yo, Arabia gu kathaidihga bambo maidungniu,
tadui charijiu wangbo maidungtu tadui pikhai-e. Naliu Tema dihga lungmaidungniu, paky-palu kaha maidungtu paliu tatek pikhai-e.
Maidungniu paliutu kamshat rabo heng gasu, paliutu ketra kaden khai nbambo tavaipi gasu, tathiu chari ganiu shai rabo gasu mari raleng pakjiu bamme.
Sigasu
Tavaipi thinbo maidungse Kedar gu huthubo maidung-e, chiudi paliutu poinakha ronna masiak khai rabo-e. Israel mai Rawang,
Haise Madungao gu Ramjeng lamga champao si-e.
Degu padbam jiulo? Namdiga maidung siniu dekamjiu chaky npom riga chakhuan kariobam jiulo?
Namdi pakhiangnase chakhuan kariobo siniu phuimide.
Maidung haise chari aphenbo gasu shaibo makge.
Naliugu jupaodungse pakkam mibo-e, paliuniu tavaithuse khatnadi ketpad khai makjiu paliutu minkam mibo-e.
Tuhoira shaimibo amaidung riga kap marung-kasin khaira atu saokhai diaklo. Atu hiamra kamtulo
Haise Tanthubo, Ngamkambo
Elam kadih lamsu riphendungniu chaqon riga tuanglujiu, tavaipi nai pathuse phunglu wangbamde. Kir kadih lamsu riphendung siniu paliugu chagee phunglujiu kaden bamde.
Judah gu kadih-tam wibo ramjeng gase chaqon-karidungniu khatdi chaqon tongmai siniu Jerusalem rengmun mungga chap bamde.
Judah maigu charirengse kampang kam mide.
Sise padboga, charigu maniadungse naliuniu charinia khaibam ky gasu ponwanglo.
Siga Jerusalem gu karengse katin lanra pageng kabambose naliuniu silude. Naliuniu Jerusalem lungga bambo hinase phuilujiu namdi rengse katin lanra naliuniu tatukang kasiadi rathon mide

Tadui madon khaira, kaguangbo ajai gasu luangkiubo situ dangra, naliuniu namdi lunggase akhun kam khaide. Chiudi haise nda rang masuang khaibo khatdi pipad khaibo Tingwang khuga naliu chun ngut makge.
Tanthubo Ngamkambo

Chiudi sibosung naliuniu nuijiu matha-mala bamme. Naliuniu mily maksai matom-kabui gilujiu tiu-sakjiu bamme. Naliuniu din-e, “Aliuniu tiu kanithen tiukhe khatdi sak kanithen sakkhe! Nsuannai aliu shaimi rabo-e.”
Tanthubo Ngamkambo
Tanthubo Ngamkambo
“Nang hai sao-e chiujiu maning jiulo? Chakha-turen gase naraw bungraleng nagu maji nde bamjiulo?
Nang hai para kathiumai khat thiubamdi sui-e, chiudi Tingwang niu natu jupad thon mine.
Paniu natu n-getpuitu kumjiu kadih kadiulam thonkhai mine. Siga nangniu wasao thiujiu bambo chaqon-kari jiugase nang shaikhai mirabo-e. Nangra nawangpiu kikhun-ga kamangambo gu-e.
niu natu nabam kakubo gasu lukiu lujiu nagu chakamky gasu natu lupad mine.”
Nagu chakamky ntiang nai khen-gakse Iniu patu pikhai lujiu nakhuga bambo pumtan hinase patu pikhai mine. Pahai Jerusalem nai Judah maidunggu papiu kum rabo-e.

David kaikik thiubo, chawangpiu hangga siak Iniu patu pumtan pikhai bine. Paniu chawanggu khamtendungse thin rabo-e, sichiujiu paniu lekhaibose, mai khat niudi khamman lulakge, paniu khammibose mai khatniudi lepadsi lakge.
Iniu patuse ntuang
“Chiudi pasingnamai khatdi patu mangiu khaijiu bammai hinase pabangrip thiusu rabo-e. Paliuniu pakhuga, chalidung, chakuang-chapiang situ ntuangga wa maseng khaibo kumjiu maseng khai surabo-e!
Haise padsu dasai, matipjiu genkhai nbambo ntuangse ahiujiu mahin npadmi sune, sichiujiu siga maseng khai nbambo hinagu kaloibose thiumi rabo-e.” Haise

Duinai riga malee ramkin maise dejiukha sansabo thiuralo! Tyre ga naliugu malee bamse kam maha mide, sibo kidung khatdi pamungga bambo maleedung sidi nchum mide! Naliugu maleese Cyprus lamsu wangsai, haibo chamse silurabo-e.
Sidon maigu chali-thinmai yo, achung lulo!
Duipuise kenlujiu Egypt dihga bambo mumsyse liujiu khatdi jonjiu jat hina khuga alitadra naliuniu maidungtu langkhai-e.
Sidon gu namdi yo, naliura kamangambo gu-e! Duipui nai duinai siniu naliutu lukhai makjiu din-e, “Iniu wadaodi anahdung lungkhai makge. Iniu wadaodi anahpiudung maksai anahpuidung makuatkhang makge.”
Tyre haitu kam maha mide chiubo khuanse Egypt maidungniu chiusai paliutu kam charenjiu, paliu chun thiuta mirabo-e.
Phoenicia maidungse dejiukha sansabo thiuralo! Spain lam pakkhaira kamsulo!
Nda bammibo Tyre namdi hai chunwi ringabo thiulan ngamma? Haibo namdiga lungmai siniu duipui hugenlam namsan thomra langkhaibo makma?
Kadihpirigu chali-thinbo chawangnahdung siniu chakhuangthiubo Tyre, chawanggu namdi riga haikumbo phungwang khaira saoniu rangkhai jiulo?
Haise Ngamkambo
Spain ga namsan thomjiu bammai naliu tadlujiu kadih haiga tatien thiusulo! Naliutu gukhaira mai khatdi hamide.
niu pabense duipui riga henpad lujiu chawang kadihse kamkao mide. Phoenicia maigu chalithinbo namgang situ kam maha mira paniu chamtan pikhai mide.
Sidon namdi yo, nagu chunwibose loi mide, namaidungtu mathadjiu bamme. Paliuniu Cyprus lam pak mari khaidi, paliu siga nbai ngamlakge.

(Nkan khaoniu Tyre maitu tun kadat-kada khaibo hai Assyria mainiu makge, haise Babylon mainiu-e. Tyre maigu akheky-tontu taomagui lujiu, charireng situ kampang mibose Babylon mainiu-e, paliuniu namdi haitu kam maha khai lujiu tadmide).
Duinai riga malee ramkin maidungse dejiukha sansabo thiuralo! Naliuniu mangiu khaijiu bambo namdise kam maha mide.
Chawang ken khat, takum riakchinnia leng, Tyre tu mangaimi rabo wanse wangkin-e. Sibo tingkumse loimisai, chaluiga thiukhaibo kumjiu Tyre hai papum kajonpui kummi rabo-e:
Nagu nthiam-tara thinlujiu namdak gase tadron sulo,
kaleksabo, mangaimibo chakhapui yo!
Maidungtu kuwang lanlura, sise mathenjiu chalui thiulan lanlo.
Tingkum riakchinniase loidasai,
Paniu alijiu daolubo rangkangse paniu

Mai hina haibo sansetse machamjiu dao rabo-e: singkudung nai pamaidung, pavangdung nai pawangpiudung, kaliu-maidung nai kajon-maidung, apukbi-maidung nai apuk-lumaidung, kalekwimai nai kaleksamai machambo sanset hai daorabo-e.
Kadihpiri haitu kam marapu lujiu kam nchummi rabo-e.
Kadihpiri hai sangkiujiu kuimi rabo-e; kadihpiri pakhiangna sonkiujiu tingdi--kadihdi hakiu misune.
Chamai dung niu tingtheng leng riatkhaibo ladriat situ suimakjiu Tingwang gu tacheng-tajai tu kampang mibo jeng niu kadih hai tu kam-tania khaide.
Sijengniu kadihpiri haitu Tingwang niu siangkhai mibo-e. Maidungniu kamkhai mibo phijengse paliutu pilan bambo-e. Ringbammai riak hai nkhinbi-bi mibo-e.
Mumsy kense kui mide, jaw hai riang mide. Pakak khatga chunwi khai mibo mai hinase tuhoira chunsa mide,
paliugu ringabo lui thiubo, nthiam-tara khuan nai nchom khuanse chiuta mide.
Jao sakjiu mai khatniudi chunwijiu chalui thiuta mide; mai khatdi pasakwatse sita mide.
Namdi hinase chakhuan kario mide, sichiujiu maidung siniu marilura paliu ky-kyse khamten lujiu bamkam mide.
Maidung siniu npui-nchengga chakhuan senbamme, palamra siga jaw daota mide. Chunwibo kadih gasu hathon mide, haise tingtheng leng hamide.
Namdise nkamkui mide, khatdi haibo rengmundungse pangkaokiu mide.
Haise kadihpiri pabam hinaga, jat hina khuga padrabo-e. Haise singbangdung gasu takisy hinase railubo khatdi mumsy ken gasu mumsy hinase railubo, atiat loikam mibo kum rabo-e.
Ring masiaklubo maidung siniu ringajiu chalui thiune. Tingnu lam bambo maidung siniu
khatdi tingbang lam bambo maidung siniu patu thuon rabo-e. Duipui mungga lungbo maidung siniu Israel mai Rawang
Tacheng matip thubo jat Israel maitu thuonbo lui thiubose kadihpirigu diuthubo bam gasudi chiusune.
Chiudi alengra wadi machunbo hamide! Ira mathakhu hamide! Khatniu khattu jonbo hai nkiubi-bijiu kasabo hai nkiuliang-liang mide.
Mai hina, akhuan hai nkinglo! Siga kapingbo, chakhomki khatdi tathak siniu naliutu khuanjiu bamme.

Kapingbo situ marilura kambo maidungse chakhomkyga nkhuang khaine, sichiujiu chakhomki gasu marilura kambo maidung situ tathakniu manmi rabo-e. Nbung duidetse tingpuk lamsu runkiujiu kadihpirigu kaphung hai kam kacha khai rabo-e.
Kadih hai nkak-rak padjiu kam marapu mine khatdi lemangahong mirabo-e.

Kadihpiri haise mai khatniu jaw sak maniu lujiu tad tangat lad-ladbo kum, khatdi tingthungniu chalu-apatu hun kanuk won-wonbo kummi rabo-e. Kadihpiri haitu sibo nuandung siniu madiu lude, haise kaomi rabo-e, wadaodi sulan ngamlak mide.
Nrilamgu pumtan nai kadihpirigu mawangpaodung situ

Chakhomkiga juwang kabao khai nbambo kavangdungtu kumjiu Tingwang niu chawangdung situ khomwang aruangsu rabo-e. Paliutu sajai pirabo tingse wangtang makthen paniu paliutu kavangky gase bangkhai rabo-e.
Chahiuse tamiuwang mine, khatdi naimikse benta mine, palamra Ngamkambo
Iniu natu chakhuang thiujiu nazantu thuonne.
Maisuang habo hai nangniu kamkhai-e;
nangniu nda rangkhai mibose chamchangjiu pipad khai-e.
Nangniu namdidung situ kam nchum mide
khatdi paliugu charirengdungse kam maha mide.
Aliugu mikremainiu thiukhaibo
chawangkining hinase tingtheng leng hamide.
Pumtan tanbo jatdung siniu natu thuonne;
kasabo jatdunggu namdiga lungmai siniu natu pingkam rabo-e.
Kalek samai khatdi lunglakbo mainiu
chariubo tingga nbaira nakhuga pakwang-e.
Nangniu paliutu tingphu-tingnai gasu khatdi tingthung gasu
gukhaijiu nbaibam pikhai-e.
Pathak kasabo maidung siniu tingthung kum,
tathe tingga khatdi kasangbo kadihga
ting malang mibo kumjiu charithiu wang-e.
Chiudi,
pathak kasamai kario khuan situ, tingphu tanbo gasu
kamuangniu kam agi khaibo kumjiu kam mahajing khai-e.
Zion Luong haiga, Ngamkambo
Siga, magenthiu chariubogu kamuang kenkham bambo situ paniu luthon mahanuang mine
Tanthubo
Haise padboga, mai hinaniu dinrabo-e, “Pahai aliu Rawang-e! Aliuniu patu malumme, khatdi paniu aliutu gukhai-e. Pahai
Paliuniu tadui jiarabo kumjiu paliu ben henpad sune, chiudi Tingwang niu paliutu kam mangam khai rabo-e, siga paliu bense pajeng hajiu malinkiu mirabo-e.
Paniu Moab maigu charirengse paliugu kakubo singbeng tamanjiu kam mahami rabo-e, sichiujiu paliutu tabui jiuga pi talui khai rabo-e.
Maidungniu haibo luise Judah ramlungga thiurabo tingmikse wang kinne:
Aliugu namdise tan-e!
Tingwang papumsiakniu haibo rengse gukhai-e!
Namdigu rengmundungse lekhailo
majibo kamjiu chamchangbo jat situ pijiu ngut khailo.
tingthuibogu agi-manaibose pikhailo.
pawan machang paniu aliutu gukhai bine.
Paniu lung chaliang maitu kam manon khai-e;
paliuniu lungbambo katanbo namdi situ paniu kam maha khai-e,
khatdi sibo rengse tabuiga rotniang khai-e.
Kam mathad khai mibo mai siniu sibo riga tuhoi tadjiu bamme,
khatdi paliu phiniu tao maluijiu bamme.
paliuniu tadbo npuise manai bamme.
Aliuniu natu malumjiu nasai suine; aliuniu masenbo sira naronna-e.
Nchun kiusai Iniu natu ronna ramgun-e;
nangniu kadihpiri nai pamaidungtu ladjan thiusu dasai,
majibose delo chiubo paliuniu silu rabo-e.
Kasamai situ nangniu lungsakhai bam tadi,
majibose kamra paliuniu wadaodi sitanglu makge.
Tacheng matipbo maidunggu kadihga tangna paliuniu kasabo kamjiu bamme;
nagu kendibo situ paliuniu lukhaira suimakge.
nagu mikremaidung siniu simakge.
nangniu kaden khaibo sajai siniu paliutu kam mathad khailo.
Namaidungtu nangniu dejiukha lungsalo chiubo paliu khuga lenkhailo.
Lungwibose nangniu aliuleng pikhaine,
aliuniu kamlubo hina hai, nangniu haichiu kamkhai bibo gasu-e.
Aliu Rawang,
chiudi naronna aliu
Tuhoira paliu shai mide, wadaodi ringwang lanlak mide,
paliugu mahiuse ringwang lanlak mide,
palamra nangniu paliutu kam mahalujiu sajai pikhai mibo-e.
Mai khatniudi paliutu maningtao lanlak mide.
aliugu kadihse pake hinaga disan padle,
sichiujiu pakendibo hai naleng phungwang-e.
siga paliuniu achungjiu nakhuga kheng-e.
Aliu gen thiujiu aliu sang mibo-e,
chiudi aliuniu wakhatnadi manapad makge.
Aliuniu aliu kadihleng chari ngamlu makge;
aliu wakhatnadi kampadlu makge.
Shaimibo aliu maidungse ringwanglan rabo-e!
Paliu pumse ringwanglan rabo-e.
Charawga jibam maidung siniu sulujiu ringabo lui thiu rabo-e.
Kajikdui siniu kadihpiritu kam maring khaibo kum
nda shaimibo maidung situ
Amaidung yo, naliu ky kalunglam ngut lujiu akham milo. Tingwang lungpom haise loimakbo kakga hai naliu nbai lulo.

niu pagu tinggen wangbam gasu, paliu nuan jengniu ladjan thiurabo leng wang kinne. Kadihpiriga mahin kamshat mibo maidung situ madupad sune, sichiujiu kamshat khai mibo maidung situ kadih hainiu wakhatdi nbai khai lakge.
Sibo tingmikga
“Haibo riga Iniu saomakjiu phui bamme khatdi tadui kajin khaijiu bambo-e. Haise mainiu kam masamak raleng chiujiu Iniu nchun n-nien akhejiu bambo-e.
Iniu haibo mumsirengtu alung pomson tamine, sise tathu-karaniu kam masa mirabo bamsai, sise Iniu ruthon kammi rabo-e.
Chiudi amaidunggu mikremai siniu agu gukhaibotu lunisai, paliutu pijiu akhuga kawi thiululo. Yo, paliutu pijiu akhuga kawi thiu milo.”
Wangkinbo tingmik gase, Israel maidung, Jacob kaikikdungse, singbang kumjiu paliu men jang matipmi rabo-e, sigasu paliu mumse padjiu papen penrabo-e. Sichiujiu pasy siniu kadihpiriga phuimi rabo-e.
Mikre maidungtu kam masa khaibo kumjiu, maksai kam maha mibo mairiak kumjiu,
niu pamaidung tura kavangleng langkhaijiu sajai pikhai-e. Paniu paliu khugasu tingbang lamgu kasabo tingkai situ luthon khai-e.

Chiudi Israel maigu nuandungse, charatu simakbo maigu rathakbam hinase tumoi kumjiu kammoi-moi mibo sainiu khatdi charapui Asherah mengse luthon lujiu parim wibose kam maha mibo sainiu kuak khai rabo-e.
Namdigu charirengse kao nchum mide. Haise wadi habo ramjing kum pithiu khai mide. Sibo bamse matom kabuiniu wangjiu mathak khaibo khatdi tagibo bam thiukhai mide.

Singbang kedungse aguikam mide khatdi tangkam mide, sichiujiu maipuidung siniu tasingleng khoi khuan mide. Palamra maidungniu wadi simakbo donniu, paliugu Dampao Tingwang niu paliutu lungsa khai lakge maksai pagu lungsiat hai lenkhai lakge.
Sibo tingmik ga
Sibo tingmikse wangboga, Assyria nai Egypt lam kavang thiujiu bambo Israel maitu kuwang lanra make mudkhai sune. Siga paliuniu pagu masanbo luong Jerusalem gase wanglujiu
Israel maigu chawangdih hai nchum mide!

Paken dibo pirunse jaw sak maniu lubo jupaodung pee gasu kuimibo charapen kumme. Paliugu chaliangbo peese parim wibo siniu manuk mawi bamme, chiudi paliu hai jaw maniu mibo jengniu kashai kumjiu nkhuang bamme,
khuga katanbo mai khangsia khatdi pumtanniu aphenra kadenlubo, kachak rotbo kum, nbung duidet wangbo kum khatdi duidet wangbo kumjiu, wangra mai khangsia bamme, siseniu kadihpiri haitu naimi rabo-e.
Jao sak maniu lubo jupaodunggu chaliangse chaphiniu tao maluimi rabo-e.
Chaliangbo jupaodunggu kuiwang mibo makense masirai thubo ndutsy, minji-minri railujiu tiulubo kumjiu hami rabo-e.
Masiak lubo pamaidung leng Ngamkambo

Ladjanpaodung thiujiu macha bambo maidung khuga, khatdi namdigu rengmundung situ mainiu chari thiuwang rabotu phuikhaijiu bambo maidungtu pijiu paliu lung kam mahu khaira, paniu majibo lungchunse pikhaine.

Phaimiukakungdung khatdi singkudungniu haichiujiu jaw sak maniubo jengniu paliu tad ta-ngad lad-ladjiu bamme. Paliuniu jaw wajiuga khatdi chiangna saklubo jengniu paliu chun tanuak miboga paliu phi masuijiu bamme. Phaimiukakungdung siniu jaw sak maniuju mibo jengniu Tingwang niu langwangbo madungaose paliuniu singam lulak mide, sigasu singkudung niudi jaw sak maniuju mibo jengniu paliu khuga phungwangbo tathu-charase paliuniu tiakngam lulak mide.
Paliuniu ntaojiu bambo kuangkai gase maruiniu phui mide, sichiujiu masanbo bam khat nadi hamide.
Paliuniu alamga suini makge. Paliuniu din-e. “Paniu katikhaijiu bamme chiubo saoniu maning ralo? Saoniu pagu champaotu lukhai ralo? Haisira alaoloi gab lubo nahmaileng ronna gengbo-e!
Paniu aliutu pagiak khat-khat, paren khat-khat, ngiudon khat-khat thiujiu katikhaijiu bamme.”
Paniu naliu mathiutu mathakbo nai amanbo pikhai-e, chiudi naliuniu paladtu nkingni makge.
Haijengniu
Tuhoi Jerusalem ga, maidungtu mawangjiu bambo chaliangbo maidung,

Naliuniu kashai maitu kawi thiulude khatdi charuidihtu ladrian kamlude chiujiu chaliang-e. Sansabo gu kapingbose bungjiu wangboga naliu ringlune chiubo naliuniu lukhai siakjiu bamme, palamra naliu hai aratboga khatdi naliu ringlu raleng maitu sontiuboga mangiu khaijiu bambo-e.
Haise tuhoira, Dithubo
Majibo siniu kaphung madadbo riang thiurabo-e, khatdi chalung masanbo lungchun siniu sibogu madadriang thiurabo-e.”
Naliuniu mangiu khaijiu bambo aratbo pakhiangnase kachakniu rot mahakam mirabo-e, khatdi duidet siniu naliugu katanbo situ kam maha mirabo-e.
Kashaimaitu naliuniu kawi thiukhai mibose kam mahami rabo-e, sichiujiu charuidihtu ladriat thiubose lutami rabo-e. Sansabo kapingbo wangboga, naliutu gomnam mirabo-e.
Siseniu naliutu nsuan machang leklan lanjiu bam rabo-e. Sise naliuniu nchun n-nien phungbam rabo-e. Tingwang khugasu kasanbo ladkeng wangbam thenna, kapingbose wangsanjiu bamrabo-e!
Naliu hai kadincham ga, mai khatniu tazi kadunboga jijiu, paphi ntha daolakbo khatdi pafai dunjiu papum bentom tanglakbo kum rabo-e.
niu chari thiujiu Perazim Luongga, khatdi Gibeon ramjengga kamkhai mibo kumjiu, paniu kamrabo-e—pangam kamse tasibo kumjiu ngaopad sune. Paniu pagu dinsi lakbo tiense kamloi khai rabo-e.
Iniu naliu khuga pikhaibo kachankhai haitu naliu nuimen tulo! Naliuniu nui-e sai, naliu marira kungdiang rabo-e. Kadih pakhiangnatu kam maha mirabo Ngamkambo
Iniu dinbambo situ nkinglo; Iniu naliu khuga dinjiu bambo gase naliu lung khailulo.
Chalu tien thiumai khatniu phutan-tan makge sigasu chalin marukra kadentan-tan makge.
Paniu kadihse machalujiu, paniu tanam-nrah siudungse saokhai-e. Paniu chabanmiu nai tathiu lingkhai-e khatdi palu mungga katambo alin-tara lingkhai-e.
Paniu patiense dechiu kamralo chiubo si-e, palamra Tingwang niu patu katikhai bibo-e.
Paniu tanam-nrah siudungse biuraleng wadaodi saibuak karipbo thinmakge, sibosung paniu thinbuibo masenbo singtangse thinbo-e.
Paniu chabanmiuse biusao makjiu biubo gasu kam-nchummi makge, sigasu paniu matom karise, sibo luga hakhaijiu chalinse biupangmi makjiu dechiujiu biupad ralo chiubo si-e.
Haikumbo ningting pakhiangnase Ngamkambo
Tingwang gu rathakbam, Jerusalem haisiakdi nchum mide! David niu thiukhaibo namdise nchum mide! Pijiu tingkum khat saiga tingkum khat wangjiu pagu changeese changi bamsulo,

chiudi “Tingwang gu rathakbam,” chiujiu kukhai mibo namdi riga chariu magenthiubose phungwang khai rabo-e. Siga kapbo nai huibo siniu phuimi rabo-e, sichiujiu namdi pakhiangnase tazainiu phuimibo rathakbam chiujiu kumi rabo-e.
Tingwang niu namdi situ taomagui lujiu sisetu charithiu rabo-e.
Siga Jerusalem hai chalad dinpad masan ngamlakbo mahiu khatniu kadih hanglamsu tanuak thuak-thuakbo lad kadin kumjiu dinsu rabo-e.
Jerusalem yo, natu aphenjiu bambo sangdiumai hina situ tabui kumjiu mudthon mirabo-e, khatdi paliugu kapingbo riphendung sidi magaoreng kumjiu lentad mirabo-e.
Simakjingjiu khatdi bungjiu Ngamkambo

Paniu kapingbo tingthung tingkai khatdi taomaren bambo mipuangse langkhaiboga, Tingwang gu rathakbam chiujiu kubo namdi situ aphenjiu bambo jat gu riphendunggu heng-ngiu nai paliugu benthin hinase nchun amang manbo kumjiu, maksai nchun malod khat makumkhai kumjiu hanuangmi rabo-e.

Jerusalem tu aphenra wang madui bambo jat hinase pawon mariujiu bambo mai khatniu pamang lamsu wa tiu bambo, chiudi rakpadboga pawon mariu palunjut bamniubo kum, maksai charijiu bambo mai khatniu pamang lamsu tadui sakbam niubo, chiudi rakpadboga patakuakse sangjiu, pagu charise palunjut bamniubo mai kum rabo-e.
Pang palun jutjiu bamlo! Miktiat palun jutjiu bamlo! Jaw sakmak tadi maniu jutjiu bamlo! Mom khatdi sakmakjiu tadi tad tangad lad-lad bamlo!
niu natu nguiniujiu bamra kamkhai mide, jipjing bammilo. Phaimiukakungdungse maidung mik thiurabo-e, chiudi Tingwang niu paliu mik kamtiat mide.

Phaimiukakunggu madungao rambase naliu khugasu baimide; haise gomnam mibo ariakkhuang kum mide. Nangniu haise mai khat ken ngam mai khuga ponmengjiu naleng kenkhailo chiujiu dindi, paniu ken ngam lakge palamra haise gomnam mide chiujiu paniu nakhuga dinsune.
Nangniu haise kensi makmai khuga ponmengjiu naleng kenkhailo chiujiu dindi, paniu kensi makge chiujiu paokak sune.
Sijengniu simak dakjiu Iniu paliutu jumkhai khaibo gasu paliu chun kam tanuak khaimi rabo-e. Ningtingbo maise pangmi rabo-e khatdi khaotimai hinase mathakhu tami rabo-e.
Paliu chunning

Pakhiangnase papee-parun kadatmi rabo-e. Chali kadampao nai chalise saoniu nkiulo? Patu kadampao khuga paniu, “Nangniu atu dambo makge,” chiujiu dinrama? Maksai paniu pakhuga, “Nangniu kambambose nang simakge,” chiujiu dinrama?
Haisira kadin chamga, mariuram siniu chalu thiumi rabo-e, khatdi chalu siniu mariu mawilanmi rabo-e chiujiu kadin kumbo-e.
Sibo tingmikse wangtang dasai, pakuon tidmai siniu ariakkhuangse kenpadbo chiumi rabo-e, khatdi tamiuboga lungbambo, pamik tiatmai siniu paliu mik rakpadjiu ngaomi rabo-e.
Kaleksamai nai lungkalakmai siniu Israel maigu masanbo
Haise maitu mathadjiu kabammai, Tingwang lungpom kamjiu bambo maileng kaloibo thiumi rabo-e.
Tingwang niu maiken tiamai khatdi kamao maitu sajai pimakra khamjiu bammaitu, khatdi lungchun nchangmaitu kamajibose lutao makra aratjiu bammai hinatu Tingwang niu kam mahami rabo-e.
Sijengniu tuhoira Israel mai Rawang,
Iniu naliuleng pikhaibo nahdung situ naliuniu ngaoboga, I hai Israel maigu masanbo Rawang si-e chiubo naliuniu simi rabo-e. Naliuniu atu chakhuang thiujiu, khatdi pingjiu asuangga chap rabo-e.
Kapang mainiu silu rabo-e khatdi pawan machang palung pomjiu bammai siniu chunwijiu katilu rabo-e.”
Paliuniu agu ladtitu maniu makjiu Egypt maigu nkhatu phiura tadle. Egypt mainiu paliutu gukhaira paliu machun-e, sichiujiu paliuniu Egypt maigu chawangtu malumme.
Chiudi chawang siniu paliutu nkha ngam lakge, Egypt maigu nkhase kapingboga loikhai mirabo-e.
Paliugu dihsungpaodung siniu Egypt maigu namdidung Zoan nai Hanes ga mengtangjiu bammi tadi,
Judah maidungniu malumsui makbo jattu, agunjiu bambo, wa nkhatu pingam lulakbo khattu malum khai mibo jengniu, paliu lung makmi rabo-e.”

Haise tingrun lam bambo kathaidihga bambo wakhaodung leng Tingwang gu champao-e: “Dihsungpaodung siniu kapingbo namdi ndongquidung lungbo, sigasu patai karabo kaniudung bambo khatdi kalenbo kaniudung bamboga tadkenjiu bamme, paliugu qonniamdung khatdi qontraodung riga, paliutu nkha ngamlakbo jattu pirabo paman kungbo kalendung phunglujiu tadkinne.
Egypt mainiu pikhai rabo nkhase pageng ha-e. Sijengniu, Iniu Egypt tu charuang zan thiujiu “Wadi kamsilakbo Mantage,” chiujiu mathak khai-e.
Maidunggu lunlung haise ariakkhuang khat lungga raokhaira Tingwang niu akhuga dinkhai-e, sichiusai paliu hai dejiuga salo chiubose tingthenggu charao khuang thiujiu bammi rabo-e.
Paliu hai pawan machangna aratle, pawan machang
Paliuniu phaimiukakungdung situ pijiu maliu makra khamme. Paliuniu din-e. “Aliu khuga majibo lamga din mane. Aliuniu nking nibo ronna dinlo. Aliuniu maningbo ronna kamrabo-e.
Aliu npui gasu tadpad milo khatdi aliu npuise kham tulo. Naliu Israel maigu masanbo Tingwang lamga aliu chiuni makge.”
Chiudi haise Israel maigu masanbo Tingwang niu dinbo si-e: “Iniu dinbo haitu naliuniu lukhai makge, khatdi tathiu-chariga khatdi maitu sontiuboga mangiu khai-e.
Naliu hai mao-e. Naliu hai pajamra bammibo kakubo singbeng kumjiu kaonuangmi rabo-e.
Chagamli khattu kumjiu naliutu kampang mine, sichiujiu pang paroisoi mibo jengniu patap khatniudi miti kathiubo thuak silak mine, maksai akhun gasudi tadui thuak silak mine.”
Tanthubo

Sibosung, naliuniu naliugu mikremaidung khugasu pak majatbo chaqon tuanglujiu marilura rang-e. Marilura naliu maningbo maji-e. Naliu qondungse majat nkiu-e chiujiu naliuniu maning-e, chiudi naliutu hamaidungse naliu suang majat nkiu rabo-e!

Naliuniu mikremai riphen khattu ngaoboga naliu mai sang khat pak mirabo-e, sigasu naliutu pijiu paktad miraleng riphen maidung khang mangiuniu bui-e. Maluong ton ga pengfai maseng khaibo ronna makjiu naliu riphen mai khat nadi masiak lakge!
Haichiu bamliudi
Jerusalem ga lungjiu bammai naliu kap lanlak mide.
niu naliu khuga chariu magenthiubo pipad khaibo-e, chiudi papumsiakniu siga bamlujiu naliutu katikhai bine, siga naliuniu patu phiulan lakge,
Naliuniu puidi gasu majatlam maksai mawilam tadronmeng midi, paniu naliu khuga haichiu dinbo chamse naliu chiusune, “Haiga puidise bamme. Haibo npui sai suilo.”
Naliuniu naliugu kachianiu kambo charameng khatdi naliugu rangkangginiu makom khaibose taniabo-e, chiujiu “Akhuga bamta milo” chiu senjiu pon taliang mirabo-e!
Naliuniu chalin maruk khaibo wan hinaga,
Naliu lu phubo matom-kabui siniu withubo piubuanse maksai tatekse tiu rabo-e.
Naliuniu mikremaigu namdidungse chari thiujiu sutlubo khatdi paliutu kamshatbo naise, ramluong nai luongbut hinagasu duipin luangpad surabo-e.
Chahiuse naimik kumjiu benmi rabo-e, khatdi naimikse palunlung gasu benlon chinnia benjiu, naikhatniu jeng chinniagu nbiu padbo kum benmi rabo-e. Pakhiangna haise
Duidet siniu wahinatu pontad mibo kumjiu tingkaise pamasuangga langkhai-e. Haisiniu jatdung situ biakthon lujiu paliugu kasabo chunrang hina kam maha mine.
Chiudi Tingwang maidung, naliura chunwi rabo-e khatdi masanbo changeenai nchun naliuniu chalui thiubo kum chalui thiu sune. Israel maitu gukhaipao,
khuanse khatdi pagu sajai pikhaibo thadse paliuniu silubo sainiu, Assyria maise pingchang pingsu rabo-e.
niu paliutu kakhiu lan-lan khaine, siga pamaidung siniu chalui thiuboga nchom nai tarabung sao saisuijiu tad ncham ram-ram rabo-e. Tingwang papumsiakniu Assyria maitu aphen rabo-e.
Nda kadenkhai mibo n-mangmi siniu Assyria mai wangdipiutu rusune. Haise sukdi-suk, di-di-e, khatdi tasing kengga khonting khai nbamme. Sibo mise pitao khaira
Egypt maigu nkhaleng tadbo maidungse nchum mibo-e! Paliuniu Egypt maigu kadibo pumtan, chaqondung, chaqon-karidung, khatdi riphen maidungtu mangiu khai-e. Chiudi paliuniu
Pah dekam bamlo chiubo paniu si-e! Paniu sansabogu kapingbose langwang khai-e. Kasamaitu sigasu paliutu gukhaira kambo maidungtu paniu sajai pirabo kapingbo thakse ponpadjiu bamme.
Egypt maise chara makge--paliu hai chamai-e. Paliu qondungse tamsinbo makge.
Thingna khatniu papoinatu kaka khaira pasipga machao rao-rao wangbo kum, Ngamkambo
Naliuniu machapadbo nuanniu phuibo, kachia nai rangkangginiu kampadbo ramengdungse naliuniu ponthon mirabo wanse wangkinne.
Assyria tu chariga kam mahami rabo-e, chiudi chamainagu pumtan gasu makge. Assyria mai chari bam gasu pakmi rabo-e, khatdi paliugu chabon maidungtu pijiu kavang thiukhai rabo-e.
Paliugu chawangpiura pingjiu pakmi rabo-e, khatdi katheng kadimaidungtu haichiujiu kam charen khaibi rabo-e, Sichiujiu paliuniu paliugu chari pengfaidungse phutmi rabo-e.”
Pawan khatga chawang khatniu palungchun makumsijiu mawangbo khatdi jatgu jupaodungniu majiboga ladjan thiubo tingmikse wangsu rabo-e.
Paliu mathiuse tingkai gasu nbekhai rabo bam khatdi tingthung katanboga nbairabo bam kumsu rabo-e. Paliu hai kathaidihga luangwang bambo giuna kum, kadih patam haboga bambo tudigu mahiu kumrabo-e.
Paliu mik nai paliu kuonse maidunggu pageng bamboga lepad khai rabo-e.
Paliu-lung, paliu-rai kheng ngamlu lakjiu wakasibo lungchun siniu paliu tatien thiusu rabo-e. Khatdi paliuniu kamaningbose din rabo-e.
Kapangmai situ chakhuang thiubui-e chiujiu mai khatniudi maning lakge, maksai palung-parai kasamai situ palung nchang-e chiujiu dinlakge.
Kapangmainiu pameng cham din-e, khatdi kasabo ngam kamra ronna maning-e. Paniu kambo nai paniu dinbose
Pachun-para thiumakbo maise kasabo-e, khatdi kasabose kamme; paniu kaleksa maitu aratjiu kam nchumra mahinjiu kamme khatdi paliugu majise daomakra khamme.
Chiudi chakhuang thiubuibo mai siniu palung masanboga tatien thiu-e, khatdi majiboga chap matip-e.
Naliu lunlung talajiu lungbo, khatdi magenthiubo situ simakjiu lungbo puidung yo, Iniu kadinbo hai nking lulo.
Tuhoira naliu lung kimjiu bamsune, chiudi ma-kum haikumbo tinggara naliu lung manangmi rabo-e, palamra naliuniu khom maduira mumsy hamine.
Naliuniu wadi manang makjiu naliu lunlung talajiu lungkhai mibo-e; chiudi tuhoira pingboniu kaphik rai-rai mirabo-e! Naliu fainise gaopad lujiu naliu khense chafai-renniu khekman lulo.
Naliu chun achungjiu naliu-ga jumlulo, palamra kadih-tam kawibo luzam nai mumsirengse kam maha mide,
khatdi amaidunggu kadih gase tathupiu nai chaphepiu siniu lunggom mide. Chakyga chunwi bammai nai namdiga chamainiu phuiting bambo jengniu kaplulo.

Chawangkining sidi phutmi rabo-e, khatdi dihsing situdi kathaidih pithiu khai mirabo-e. Chaky hina khatdi sisetu reng magui khai nbambo charirengse tingtheng leng nchummi rabo-e. Sichiujiu siga chahungdung siniu tad-mariubo bam thiumi rabo-e, khatdi milydung siniu piubuan tagibo bam thiumi rabo-e.
Chiudi Tingwang niu aliu khuga, pagu hiupuina langkhai lanrabo-e. Nchum mibo dihse patam wiwang lanrabo-e, khatdi luzamga miusy kengjiu masilan rabo-e.
Kadih pabam hinaga tacheng matipjiu khatdi majibose kammi rabo-e.
Mai hina majibo kambo jengniu, siga agi-manaibo khatdi matipbose tingtheng bammi rabo-e.
Tingwang maidungse lungchun chariubo gasu khenrang thiumi rabo-e, sigasu paliu kyga agi-manaiboniu phuijiu khatdi amanjiu bammi rabo-e.
(Chiudi mariugase kachak rotkiusu rabo-e, khatdi namdi situ kamkao mirabo-e).
Miusy leng mali-malanbo dui siniu khatdi pabam hinaga qonniamdung nai matom-kabuidung leng kawibo piubuan jengniu mai hinase dejiuga chunwi ralo.

Aliugu mikremaise nchum mide! Paliutu mai khatniu sutmak tadi, sutkam lude, paliutu mai khatniu jonmak tadi, jonkam mide. Sichiujiu paliuniu suttiu rabo nai jontiu rabo wanse loiwang mide; sichiudi paliu pumsiak situ jontiubo nai suttiubo maniase thiumi rabo-e.
Nangniu aliuleng chari thiukhaijiu, chari thiubo khuan chiuboga jatdungse paktad mi-e.
Paliugu maniadung riga lenkiu thonjiu paliugu sutlu tadmi-e.
Paniu pawan machang pamaidungtu gukhaijiu bamme khatdi paliuleng tasi-ningting pikhai-e. Paliugu dithubo chakhiu chalan sira paliuniu
Kahumaidungniu nkha khai ratu kujiu bamme. Agi-manaibo phungwang rabo lamga matanjiu bambo dihsungpaodungse kapsai riang-riangjiu bamme.
Puidi gase kapingboniu phuijiu bambo donniu mai khatniudi siga tadkhai makge. Kawi thiubo hinase kampang mide khatdi ladriatdungse phungken mide. Mai khattudi chakhuang thiukhai tamide.

Kadihse nkamkui mide sise kathaidih thiu mide. Lebanon gu mariuse kuimide, patam bambo Sharon gu ramjengse kathaidih kum mide, khatdi Bashan nai Carmel Luong riga bambo singniwse pabang gasu ntang kam mide.
Naliuniu geng makbo guse rang-e khatdi naliuniu kambo hinase mathakhu-e. Ahiupuina haira chami kumbo-e siseniu naliutu kam mahami rabo-e.
Tatuta kamraleng tatu rubo kum, khatdi tathu-karatu rujiu tabui mawimibo kum, naliutu niak paroisoi mirabo-e.
Iniu kambo haise kanaga bammaidi, kadiuga bammaidi chiumi sulo, khatdi agu pumtan situ pisimi sulo.”
Nuan phungbo Zion maidungniu nping-charenjiu kaphik di-dijiu bamme. Paliuniu din-e, “Tingwang gu ladjan haira tingthengjiu taobambo chami kumbo-e. Sikumbo mi gasu aliu mai khat kumbo ringlu buima?”

Nangniu majibose dinjiu kamsai, ring lune. Nagu pumtanse thinjiu lungkalak maitu sontiu mane khatdi tanim lumane. Chamaitu gira kambo maidunggu tenrangga maksai katam-tambo, kasabo tien thiuboga jaomane.
Sichiusai nang ringlu rabo-e, nangse katanbo charireng lungga bambo kumgapjiu nagu pumtan bamrabo-e. Nangniu tiurabo tatek khatdi sakrabo duise daolune.
Chawang khatniu kadih khat gasu mawangjiu kadih pake machang paken-pangam dipadbo situ naliuniu ngaolan sune.
Sangdiumai nai chakhumpao maigu ramkha pibo situ pingbose pijiu maningtao khai raleng ronna-e.
Chaliangbo sangdiumai, naliuniu simakbo lad kadinmaitu naliuniu ngao lanlak mide.

Aliuniu characheng tadbo khuang-ngee changibo bam Zion tu phuilo. Jerusalem tu phuilo! Siga lungra dejiuga wiralo! Sise wadaodi malailan makbo, ratman bambo riangse wadaodi taplakbo, mathenky khat kumrabo-e.
niu pagu kendibose aliu khuga lenkhaine. Aliuniu kadibo singgiu nai giunadung mungga lungne, siga kasabo maigu maleese siga tadwang lakge.

Malee lungga bambo hinase pageng hamide, maleese ramsilak mide! Mikremai riphen-gu chakhiu-chalan pakhiangnase aliuniu sutlu rabo-e, siga wa-kakeng masiak rabo-e, sichiujiu paphi-paben tangbo mainiudi paliu dam daorabo-e.
Aliu dihga kalungbo mai khatniudi paleng wimakge chiubo wadaodi dinlak mide, sichiujiu nuan hinase kuak khaibi rabo-e.
Wanglo, jat hina maidung! Wang maduilujiu nkinglo. Kadihpiri pakhiangna khatdi sibo lungga lungjiu bambo mai hina haiga wangjiu nkinglo.
niu jatdung pakhiangnatu khatdi paliugu riphendung pakhiangnatu palung pomjiu bamme. Paniu paliutu kam maha mira ladjan thiukhai mide.
Paliugu kashaibo chaphawdungse nphum lakge, chiudi siga thonkhaijiu ten manamsu padrabo-e, khatdi maluangdungse tazainiu heng maren mirabo-e.

Chahiu, naimik khatdi chagandungtu tabuijiuga kam paroisoi khaimi rabo-e. Tingpuk haitu ariak majiuhan majiumibo kum hami rabo-e, khatdi chagandungse mumsibang gasu maksai dutsibang gasu singniwse ntang mibo kumjiu ntangmi rabo-e.
Charathiu khaibo milypoi nai kami zai kumjiu, paliu zai nai paliu sa siniu pahengse heng maren mirabo-e.
Maidungse charatomchi nai matomchi poidung kumjiu kao mirabo-e, sichiujiu paliu zai nai paliu sa siniu kadihpiriga heng maren mirabo-e.
Haise
Edom gu singgiudungse chamitam thiumi rabo-e, sigasu taniangse chaganmipiu thiumi rabo-e. Namdi pakhiangnase chamitam kumjiu rumi rabo-e.
Sise nchun n-nien saomakjiu taobam mirabo-e, khatdi mikhutse tingtheng khajiu bammi rabo-e. Sibo dihse chaken wajiukha mathakhu nchummi rabo-e, siga mai khatdi nbin mariu lanlak mide.
Avengdung nai n-gekdungniu siga wang lungmi rabo-e.
Sibo kadih situ mawang khaira chawang khatnadi lunglak mide, sichiujiu jupaodungse hamirabo-e.
Tathu nai karahniu chawangkining pakhiangna khatdi karenglung pakhiangna lunggom mirabo-e, siga tanydung nai avengdungniu lungmi rabo-e.
Nkan khaodung siniu siga tadpad tadngut bammi rabo-e, khatdi mahiudung siniu khat-khattu kujiu bamme. Siga kahipeh
Avengdungniu siga paliu sip ponne, khatdi paliu bum nbum khaijiu, siga paliu poi nkak padne, sigasu paliutu makuat khangne. Chamitiuleng
Charamse
Kathaidih siniu matha-ringa sune,
khatdi kathaidih gase charapen pen sune.
Kathaidih siniu chalui thiujiu, chunwijiu sune;
sise Lebanon Luong kumjiu ngaowimi rabo-e
khatdi Carmel nai Sharon gu luzamdung kumjiu patam bammi rabo-e.
Mai hinaniu
kaphikrai-rai mibo tapu situ jengtan pikhaine.
Palung nkhin mibo mai hina khuga dinlo, “Hululo khatdi pingtulo!
Tingwang niu naliu mikremaitu sajai pikhaijiu naliutu gukhaira wangkinne.”
khatdi pakuon tidmainiu chiulu mine.
Paphi tangmainiu machakjiu chalen lenlu mine,
khatdi palad padmak mainiu chunwijiu makiak sune.
Kathaidih gase duipindung luangpad sune;
Kathiubo nbui dihse ajai mawi mine,
khatdi kasangbo kadihse duipinniu phui mine.
Tanydungniu kalungbo bam gase,
piuriang nai chahubang puakkhang mine.
Siga puidi khat bam rabo-e, sise “Masanbo gu Npui” ku-e.
Nuan phungbo mainiu sibo npuiga wadaodi tadlakge;
siga tadra kapang mainiu tadkhai lakge.
Siga ndongqui bam lakge, palung kasabo wakhao sibo npuiga tadken lakge.
Paliuniu chunwi-ringajiu Jerusalem ga, chunwibo lui thiujiu wang rabo-e.
Paliuse tingtheng chunwi bammi rabo-e,
Magenthiujiu chunsa jengsabo gasu tingthengjiu khenrang thiumi rabo-e.
Hezekiah niu Judah maigu mawangbo takum kariu-madai kiubo kumga, Assyria maigu wangdipiu Sennacherib niu, Judah namdigu charirengtu chari thiujiu paliutu minlude.

Sigasu paniu pagu chakampaopi situ Lachish gasu Jerusalem lam riphenbao kadibo khattu chawang Hezekiah khuga langkhaijiu madunsunra chamtan pikhai-e. Chakampao siniu tadlujiu tadui akhun nrilamsu tadui luwangbo alenki mungga, chafai dakmainiu tatien thiubambo puidise tao magui lude.
Siga Judah mai khangsum: Chawangkiningtu thinbambo chakampao, Hilkiah nahpiu Eliakim, ladjankygu raosui Shebna khatdi charao khuang thinbo chakampao, Asaph nahpiu Joah paliuniu patu adaora padle.
Chawang Hezekiah niu parai lumjiu bambo hai degasu niulo chiubo wangdipiuniu sini-e chiujiu Assyria maigu chakampao siniu paliu khuga maniude.
Paniu din-e, “Ladkengniu riphen maigu kamsi nai pumtan situ naliuniu nkhiak lubui-e chiujiu naliu maning jiuma? Assyria maitu aphenboga saoniu naliutu nkha khaine chiu naliu maning jiulo?

Egypt mainiu naliutu nkha khaira, naliuniu malumjiu bamme, chiudi sisera chahutangniu tathun thiubo kumrabo-e. Sise pangpadjiu naliu bense pelu rabo-e. Egypt mai wangpiu khuga mangiu khaibo mai khuga haise kumjiu padrabo-e.”
Assyria maigu chakampao siniu dinkiu lan-e, “Maksai naliuniu naliu
Iniu naliutu majanglujiu wangdipiu zan gasu chali thiune. Naliuniu chaqon tongra mai kengjiu daolu sai, Iniu naliu khuga chaqon sangnia pikhai birabo-e.
Naliura Assyria maigu siamthubo chakampao khat lengdi jimakge, chiudi Egypt mainiu naliu khuga chaqon-karidung nai chaqon riphendung langkhaine chiujiu maning-e.
Iniu naliugu namditu
Siga Eliakim, Shebna khatdi Joah paliuniu chakampao khuga din-e, “Aramic ladniu aliutu npao khailo. Aliuniu sise si-e. Hebrew mailad din mane; singbengga bammai hina nkingjiu bamme.”

Paniu paokakge, “Chawangpiu naliu khuga ronna haise dinra atu langkhaibo-e, chiubo naliuniu maning jiuma? Chiumakge, naliu kumjiu pava-pajun tiuramai khatdi sakramai singbeng riga ntao bammai khugadi din bambo-e.”
Sigasu chakampao siniu chapsu lujiu khatdi Hebrew mai ladga senpadle, “Assyria maigu wangdipiuniu naliu khuga degu dinkhailo chiubo nkinglo.
Hezekiah niu naliutu pijiu sonmi makra naliutu paniu kachan khaibo-e. Hezekiah niu naliutu gukhai ngamlu lakge.
Sigasu

Hezekiah ladtu nking mane! Assyria maigu wangdipiuniu naliutu pijiu namdi gasu npadlujiu khatdi madunsun mira chamtan pikhai-e. Naliuniu naliu akhun gasu taduise sakra, khatdi naliugu ndutbang nai mumsiken gasu raitiura suikhai rabo-e--
chiujiu wangdipiuniu naliutu naliu kadih siakga kalungbo kumgapjiu, akhi khailu makthen siga taruak khuakra miusy, khatdi mumsy lura mumsireng pibam khai rabo-e.
niu naliutu gukhai bine chiubo maningjiu naliutu Hezekiah niu pijiu sonmi tulo. Kakibo jatdunggu radung siniu Assyria mai wangdipiu khugasu paliu namditu gukhai mibo bamma?
Hamath nai Arpad gu radungse tuhoi dega bamlo? Sepharvaim gu radungse dega bamlo? Mai khat kumboniu Samaria tu gukhai mibo bamma?
Haibo namdidunggu radung ruanggasu, aliugu wangdipiu khugasu paliugu namditu wadao gara gukhai mibo bamma? Chiusai
Maidungse Chawang Hezekiah niu paliu khuga dinkhaibo kumjiu maliumak bamme, paliuniu ladkeng khatnadi dinmakge.
Sigasu Eliakim, Shebna, khatdi Joah paliu lung magen thiujiu paliu faini phettap-tap lujiu tadmide, sichiujiu Assyria maigu chakampaoniu dinkhai diakbose chawangpiu khuga wang paokhaide.
Paliugu champaose chawang Hezekiah niu chiukaji-chiukari, palung chariujiu pafai phet lujiu, khatdi maliufai benlujiu,
Paniu chawangkininggu chakampao, Eliakim; ladjanky gu machunrao, Shebna; khatdi singku kating maitu, Amoz nahpiu phaimiukakung Isaiah khuga langkhaide. Paliudi maliufai ben kamme.

Haibo chamse Isaiah khuga dinkhaira paniu paliu khuga din-e. “Thainai hai chariu khengbo tingmik-e; Aliu hai sajai daobo jengniu mangamjiu bamme. Aliu hai maipui khatniu pana lungra pagen thiu bambo chiudi mana ngamlak pasangjiu bambo pui kum mide.
Assyria maigu wangdipiuniu ringbambo Tingwang tu din masara pagu chakampaopitu langkhai-e. Din masa khaibo haitu na-Rawang
Isaiah niu chawang Hezekiah chamse daoboga,
paniu haichiubo chamkakse langkhai-e: “Assyria mainiu naliutu kapinjiu,
Wangdipiu situ pijiu nsisiak makbo ladse chiukhaijiu pagu kadihlam malanwang mira
Wangdipiuniu Lachish phutlujiu khatdi Libnah mungga bambo namditu chari thiujiu bamme chiubose Assyria maigu chakampaoniu silude; haijengniu patu npaora siga tadle.

Egypt maigu riphen maitu, Sudan maigu Chawang Tirhakah niu majang lujiu, paliutu chari thiura wangkinne chiubo ladse Assyria mai khuga wangtangde. Wangdipiuniu haise chiuboga, paniu Judah maigu Chawang Hezekiah khuga haichiujiu dinkhaira chamlen khat langkhaide,
“Naliuniu malum bambo ra siniu, aliu hangga kaokhai lakge chiujiu dinkhai-e, chiudi siseniu pijiu naliutu sonmi tulo.
Assyria maigu wangdipiuniu kam maha mine chiujiu chapkhai mibo namdi situ paniu kam maha mibose naliuniu chiulude. Naliu mari lune chiu maning jiuma?
Apao-apeh mainiu Gozan, Haran, khatdi Rezeph namdidungtu kam maha lujiu, sigasu Talassar ga lungbo Betheden maidungtu kamshat mibo-e, siga paliu radung khatniudi paliutu ranlu makge.
Hamath, Arpad, Sepharvaim, Hena, khatdi Ivvah namdidunggu chawangdungse dega bamlo?”
Chawang Hezekiah niu champao phungmai khugasu chamlense khoilujiu sise kende. Sigasu paniu Charaky lam tadlujiu,
haichiu kakheng thiusude,
“Pakan phungbo khaoring riga ntaojiu nawangbamga bambo, Israel maigu Tingwang, Ngamkambo
yo, tuhoira, aliu khuan nking khailo khatdi aliu khuga degu padbamlo chiubo phui khailo. Ringjiu bambo Tingwang, natu Sennacherib niu din masajiu bambo pakhiangna hai nking khailo.
Aliu mathiuniu si-e,
khatdi paliu radung, wakamdi chara makbo, chamai benniu macha padbo tasing-tatu mengdung situ ruthon mide chiubo aliuniu si-e.
Chiudi tuhoira, aliu
Chawang gu rathoitu paokak khaibo thiujiu,
“Sennacherib yo, Jerusalem namdiniu natu nuijiu bamme, khatdi natu kagajiu bamme.
Nangniu din masajiu khatdi nuimenjiu bambo hai saotu-e chiujiu nang maning jiulo? Israel maigu masanbo Rawang, atu nangniu chakhuang thiu makbo-e.

Nangniu navangmaitu akhuga langkhaijiu tasao thiu-e chiujiu nagu chaqon-karidung pakhiangnatu nangniu puilujiu kuthubo Lebanon luongdungtu chari thiujiu ngamlude. Siga nangniu kuthubo cedar bangdung nai withubo singchong bangdungtu huikao lude, khatdi nangniu sukthubo mariu lungga mengtang lude chiujiu nachaliang thiu bamme.
Nangniu sangdiumai ramga akhun chulujiu tadui sakge, khatdi nagu riphen maidung phiniu Nile giuduise tad masang lu-e chiujiu nang wasao thiu bamme.

“Pakhiangna haise Iniu nda rangkhai mibo-e chiubo hai nang chiukhai makjiuma? Haise Iniu tuhoi pipad khaibo-e. Charirengniu thiu magui khaibo namdidungtu kampang paroi-soi khaira Iniu natu pumtan pikhaibo-e.

Siga lungbam maise paliu pumtan ha-e, siniu paliutu kam charen khai-e, khatdi paliu chun hami-e. Paliu haira luzamga bambo maksai chaky npom riga puakbambo piubuan maksai piumendung situ, tingbang lamgu tingkai kathiubo siniu hunthon mibo kumbo-e.
“Chiudi nangniu dekam bamlo khatdi delam tadkinlo, chiubo nalam pakhiangnase Iniu si-e. Nangniu atu dejiuga suini makjiu nalung pombamlo chiubo Iniu si-e.

Nagu lungpom nai nagu chaliangbo siniu kamkhai mibo ngamkamse Iniu silude; haijengniu tuhoira Iniu natu khakhoi thinlujiu naniu butlujiu khatdi namun-ga takung khailujiu nangniu wangbo npui gasu ju malan khaimi rabo-e.”

Sichiujiu Isaiah niu Chawang Hezekiah khuga din-e, “Haise degu padralo chiubo madan khatle. Thaikum nai makumra naliuniu nkan rasy ronna tiurabo-e, chiudi pasaibo takum gara naliuniu naliugu miusyse lingsuimi rabo-e, khatdi sise atiat lurabo-e, sigasu mumsibang linglujiu mumsyse tiulu rabo-e.
Judah ga ring masiak bammaise, kadih hanglam pamen jang masuk mibo bangdung siniu pasy masibo kumjiu dikhang rabo-e.
Jerusalem ga khatdi Zion Luong riga bambo maise ring masiak lurabo-e, palamra Ngamkambo
“Haise Assyria mai wangdipiu lamga
Paniu namdiga ngutkhai makjiu paniu wangbo puidi lamsu malanmi rabo-e.
Iniu haibo namditu, agu chakhuang thiubo zan gasu gukhaijiu kakakhai bine, palamra Iniu avangpiu David khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo-e.’”
Sigasu Assyria maigu wangdipiu Sennacherib se masai nkhin lujiu, Nineveh lam malankhai mide.

Naikhat paniu paraky lungga para Nisroch tu kahumjiu bambo tingga panahpiu kania, Adrammelekh nai Sharezer niu panai heng thinlujiu patu bishat mide, sigasu Ararat kadihlam maritad mide. Panahpiu katambo Esarhaddon niu wangdipiu thiujiu pabam malin mide.
Sibo tingga Chawang Hezekiah marajiu shaira kum mide. Siga Amoz nahpiu Isaiah phaimiukakung siniu patu phuira tadle khatdi pakhuga din-e, “Wa hinase kadenlujiu kam masanmi sulo chiujiu
Hezekiah niu singbenglam pazu marikhai lujiu kakheng thiusude:
Siga
“Napao David Rawang,
Iniu natu khatdi haibo Jerusalem namditu Assyria maigu wangdipiu khugasu gukhai rabo-e, khatdi Iniu namdi situ gukhaijiu bam rabo-e,”
Isaiah niu paokakge, “
Chawang Ahaz niu thiukhaibo tason rigasu,
Hezekiah niu marabo gasu wilan miboga thuonbo lui haise paniu raokhaibo-e:
Iniu tan palanbo tingga Iniu makum khai-e,
charuidih gase Iniu tadkhai mibo-e.
Ringtingse wadaodi Iniu lungkhai silak mide.
Ringjiu bambo kadihpiri haigasu,
Iniu wadaodi
Aringting hai rathon mibo mathenky kum,
Tadiu gasu danthon mibo chafairen kum,
danthon mide khatdi loikhai mide.
Tingwang niu aringting hai loikhai mide
chiubo Iniu maning khai mide.
Ndongquiniu arah phekpang mibo kum, chagibo siniu nchun I kapsang-e.
Tingwang niu aringting piloi khai mide chiubo Iniu maning khai mide.
Akhuan hai majaipai-pai mide, makhao kumjiu I kap bamme.
Tinggen lam phuibo siniu amik niumide.
Rapiu yo, haikumbo chariu hina gasu atu gukhailo.
Haise
Alungchun hai magenthiuju mijiu I jipkiu lulak mide.
Rapiu yo, Iniu naleng lungne, naleng ronna lungrabo-e.
Atu wikhaijiu, atu piring khailo.
Kasabo hina gasu nangniu atu gukhai-e.
Amagenthak hai agi-manaibo thiu mine. Amao hinase nangniu kuak khai-e.
Charuidihga bambo mai khatniudi natu thuonsi lakge;
Kashaimai siniu nagu chamchangbo situ malumsi lakge.
Iniu tuhoi natu thuonbo kum, karingmai siniu natu thuonbo-e.
Nang hai dejiukha chamchanglo chiubo papiuniu panahmai khuga dinkhai-e.
Aliuniu nthiam-tara thinlu, chalui thiujiu natu thuon bamne.
Aliuniu ringbam then natu kahumbo Kyga chalui thiujiu natu thuon bamne.
Ndut-tahse pajamga manuk khai bilo, sichiusai pah wimi rabo-e chiujiu Isaiah niu chawang khuga dinkhaide.
Siga Chawang Hezekiah niu maniu-e, “Iniu Charaky lam tadngam lune chiubo madanse degu bamlo?”
Sibo tingga, Babylon wangpiu, Baladan nahpiu, Merodach Baladan niu chawang Hezekiah marajiu bamme chiubo khuan chiulujiu paniu pakhuga chamlen khat langkhaijiu, kalen pikhai-e.

Hezekiah niu champaomai situ pachun wijiu lukhaide khatdi pagu chakhiu-chalan hina, pagu kachia-rangkang, pagu parim wibo wamud nai wasadung khatdi pagu riphendunggu mania hinase paliu khuga lenkhai bide. Pagu chakhiu-chalan khaibam gasu maksai pawangdihga bambo wakhatnadi paliu khuga lenkhai makbo thiu makge.
Siga phaimiukakung Isaiah niu Chawang Hezekiah khuga tadlujiu maniu-e, “Haibo maidungse delamsu wangbolo khatdi paliuniu nakhuga degu dinjiulo?”
Hezekiah niu paokakge, “Paliu hai diuchang diubo ram, Babylon gasu wangbo-e.”
“Paliuniu chawangkining ga degu ngaojiulo?”
“Paliuniu wahina ngaolude. Chakhiu-chalan baikhaibo ky lungga bambo hinase Iniu lenkhai makbo wadi thiu makge.”
Siga Isaiah niu chawang khuga din-e, “Ngamkambo
nagu chawangkining ga bambo mania hina, napao-napeh mainiu thainai tangboga makhuan khai nbambo mania hina Babylon lam phungtad mirabo wanse wangkinne. Wakhatdi masiakhai diak lakge.
Nakhu gasu lungkiu siakbo kaikikdung khangsiatu puitadmi rabo-e khatdi paliutu Babylon gu chawangkiningga machara papum kamshat maidung
Chawang Hezekiah niu haise, paringting lung gara agi-manaijiu khatdi wa manang makjiu bamrabo-e chiubo maning khai lujiu, paniu haichiujiu paokak khai-e, “
Aliu Rawang niu din-e, “Amaidung lungchun pikim khailo.
Paliu lungchun pikim khailo!”
Jerusalem maidungtu kachu khailo.
paliu hai chariu mathengju mide chiujiu paliu khuga dinkhai bilo
paliu nuanse tuhoira kuakkhai mide.
Paliu nuan jengniu kabuibo sajaise Iniu pikhai mide.”
Aliu Rawang leng ramjing gase npui kaden khailo!
Ramjeng hinase la chaku khai rabo-e,
ramluong nai luongbut hinase kam manakiu rabo-e,
taratbo kadihse kam manai khai rabo-e.
nkhuibo npuise kam maji khai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu
siga mai hinaniu haise ngao sune.
Iniu maniu-e, “Dekambo chamtu Iniu paoron ralo?”
“Mai hinase piubuan kumbo-e;
nkan rapensuang paliu bamtheng lakge chiujiu paoron khailo.
Piubonse agui mi-e khatdi charapense kui mi-e,
maidungse piubuan suang ringtheng lakge.
Yo, piubuanse kuimi-e, khatdi charapense aguimi-e,
chiudi aliu Rawang ladkeng sira tingtheng bam rabo-e.”
Jerusalem yo, maluang ton gase khanglujiu kawibo champaose paoron sulo!
Zion yo, chakhuan tanjiu senjiu kawibo champaose dinron sulo!
Dinpad sulo manangmi tulo.
Judah namdakdungga, paliu Rawang se wangkin-e!
paniu ranlubo maidungtu puilu wangkinne.
paniu milypoidungtu khom madui lujiu pagaga pamlujiu ponne;
paniu papuidung situ koina majang khaine.
Mai khatniu paben ndi gasu duipuitu madiulu buima,
maksai pakhet siniu tingpuk situ madadlu buima?
Mai khatniu chapiang thinlujiu kadihpirigu nbuitu madatlu buima?
Maksai maluang nai luongbuttu taju gasu madatlu buima?
Saoniu patu katikhai ngamlo, maksai ladpikhai ngamlo?
Wa silura, ngaolura khatdi dechiu kamralo chiubo
Tingwang niu sao khuga maniu ralo?
chapiukak sidi tabut kum masenne.
Lebanon gu mariuga bambo wakhao hinase
aliu Rawang leng kadkhaira buimakge,
khatdi siga bambo singbangdungse
chami thiuraleng tamju-e.
Jatdungse palengra wadi makbo-e.
Pahai dekum gaplo chiubo nangniu dechiu din kada silu ralo?
Para tasiam kasiam mainiu kampadbo
rameng situ rangkanggi kampadbo
khatdi kachianiu makom khaibo maniadungse kumbo makge.
Kachia, rangkang ponpad ngamlak mainiu marenmak rabo singtu kada-e.
Charamengse pi kaokiu makra paniu tasiam kasi maitu phiu-e.
Nang simak jiuma? Nakhuga nda dinkhai mibo makma?
Kadihpiri hai dechiu padmi gulo chiubo nang chiumak jiuma?
Haise pawangbamga ntao bambo piu siniu kam khaibo-e;
para ting-kadih riga ntao bamme,
sichiujiu nhanglam bambo maidung situ
kasiambo matiangpuitu kumjiu ngaokhai-e.
Paniu tingpuk haitu mathenky kum
khatdi jusungfai kumjiu juden khai-e.
Paniu pumtan bambo mawangpaodung situ
jukiu lujiu wadi makbo leng kam khai-e.
Paliura chapiubang poi kum,
pamen jangjiu pabuan bonsugap nakha-e.
magaoreng kumjiu hunthonmi rabo-e.
Masanbo Rawang situ saoniu kadahsi luralo?
Pah kumbo mai khat bamma?
Tingpuk lam phuikhanglo! Nangniu ngaobo gandungse saoniu damlo?
Riphen maitu kum paniu puitad bamme, paliu riakse dejiukhalo chiubo paniu si-e
paniu paliutu zan khat-khat thiujiu ku-e,
paliuse khatnadi halakge— pagu pumtanse dejiukha dilo.
Israel mai yo, dekamjiu
maksai paniu manang khai makge chiujiu suini makbo lad dinbam jiulo?
Naliu simak jiuma? Naliu chiumak jiuma?
kadihpiri pakhiangnatu paniu damkhai-e.
Para wadaodi chiamibo thiu makge, maksai magenthiubodi thiu makge.
Mai khatniudi pamaning simakge.
Pajeng hamibo maitu paniu pitankhai bi-e.
Chabonmaidi sonkiu mi-e; chabonmaidi chiasiak mi-e.
Chiudi
Lengreng kumjiu paliu kanniu lenrabo-e; paliu pakjiu bamdi chiami lakge;
paliu tadjiu bamdi paliu jeng sami lakge.
Tingwang niu din-e,
“Kadiubo kadihga lungbo maidung, naliu maliu makjiu nkinglo!
Ladjan-ga naliugu tathu tiakra kaden sulo
naliu maning dinra pawan bamme.
Aliu aruanglujiu saoniu majilo chiubo phuikhe.
“Tingbang lamsu chari ngambo piutu
paniu tadkhaibo bam machangnaga saoniu patu pingam khai jiulo?
Chawangdung nai jatdung riga saoniu patu charise ngamkhai jiulo?
Nbuiniangtu kumjiu pahengniu paliutu bikao mide.
Pagu tavaithu siniu paliutu tingkaijiuga
2 magaorengtu kumjiu hamara mide.
Paniu manang makjiu paliutu hatadle,
paniu majat-chang majatjiu hatadle!
Haise saoniu kamkhai jiulo?
Kadih racham haise saoniu rangpad jiulo?
khatdi kanambo gadi
“Iniu kambo hai kadiubo kadihga lungbo mainiu ngaokhai mibo-e;
pingbo nai manangbo siniu phuilujiu paliu kaphikdi-di mibo-e.
Sichiujiu paliu aruang lujiu wang-e.
Chaben siam kamsimai siniu khat khattu kathuat khaijiu bamme.
Tasingsiam kambo mai siniu kachia kambo mai khuga din-e, ‘Kam daode!
Charameng dambo piu siniu, natri genkhaibo piutu kachu khai-e.
Paliuniu din-e, ‘Kam matip khaibose wi-e’—
sichiujiu charameng situ paliuniu pabamga natri siniu ju-aruang khai-e.
naliura Iniu kadalubo maidungsi-e,
akapiu Abraham kaikik maidung-e.
Kadihpiri pamalan lamsu Iniu naliutu puiwangbo-e;
diuthubo lamsu Iniu naliutu kuwangbo-e.
Iniu naliu khuga din-e, “Naliu haira avang mai-e.”
Iniu naliutu luthon makge, chiudi kada khaibo-e.
Pingmi tulo—Iniu naliutu majang bamme!
I hai naliu Rawang-e wakhatniudi naliutu pijiu kam charenmi tulo!
Iniu naliutu nkha khaijiu pitan khai bine;
Iniu naliutu gukhaijiu rankhai bine.
“Naliutu paliu lung pombo mai situ
kam chaliujiu kam mangam khaibi rabo-e.
naliutu aphen maidungse shairabo-e,
sichiujiu kadihpiriga paliu hami rabo-e.
I hai
Iniu naliutu pitan khaijiu dinbo-e,
‘Pingmi tulo; Iniu naliutu nkha khaine.’
“Israel mai naliura siamme khatdi sonne,
chiudi pingmi tulo, Iniu naliutu nkha khaine.
Israel maigu masanbo Rawang, Iniu naliutu rankhaibo-e.
Iniu naliutu asaiphunggu kasing pithiu khai bine,
kasanbo nai kaliangbo taling tukang pithiu khai bine.
Maluongdung situ naliuniu kam mahami rabo-e.
Luongbutse pangjiu tabui mawimi rabo-e.
Naliuniu paliutu tingkaiga pon taliang khangne,
siga ting-hun siniu paliutu hunthonmi rabo-e,
sichiujiu tingthung siniu pon marami rabo-e.
I hai naliu Rawang thiulubo jengniu naliu chun wirabo-e;
Israel maigu masanbo Rawang atu naliuniu thuon rabo-e.
“Amaidungniu tadui charijiu
paliu takuak sangjiu tadui phiubo tingga,
Israel mai Rawang, Iniu paliutu wadaodi phutkhai lakge.
Kathaidih luongbutga Iniu singgiu piluang khaine,
aladduise pijiu ramjingga luangkhaine.
Iniu kathaidih situ ajai pithiu khaine
khatdi kasangbo dih situ luangbambo singgiu pithiu khaine.
Kathaidih gasu cedar bang, maronpen,
khatdi takibang Iniu pipuak khaine;
kathaidih situ mariu pithiu khaine;
sichiujiu kahiu-li, tajun-li, khatdi singchong-li pithiu khaine.
Maidungniu haise ngaoboga,
Israel maigu masanbo Rawang niu kamkhai-e chiubo paliuniu silurabo-e.”
“Jatdunggu radung yo, naliu thu-rase phunglujiu wanglo.
Naliuniu apai kanithen apaira phunglu wanglo!
Haiga wanglujiu, degu padralo chiubo dinlen railo.
Sise padboga aliuniu silubui-e.
Tadmibo lamga wang ladjankyga dinlenlo,
paliuniu kambo lamga aliu khuga dinkhailo.
Pasai wang lanrabo lamga dinkhailo,
sichiusai naliu hai chara-e chiubo silune!
kawima, kasama kamjiu, maisuang habo siniu pi phui khailo!
Naliuniu kambo hina hai wadi makge
naliutu kahumbo maise mangammi rabo-e!
“Tingbang lam lungbopiu khattu
tingpi lamsu paniu charithiu wangra Iniu patu maluang wangne.
Mawangpaodung tuse paniu taniang kumjiu paliu riga taomalui tadne,
chali dampaoniu chagamtu tao malui kabam kumrabo-e.
Haikumbo padra-e chiubose dinlen khailo,
sichiusai naliu hai maji-e chiubo aliuniu dinrabo-e!
Haibo lamga naliu ladkeng khatdi dinmakge,
naliu chamkeng wakhatdi chiumakge!
Tacham haise,
Jerusalem ga haichiu dinra langkhaibo-e.
‘Naliu maise wangkin-e!
Paliu hai chaky lam wang kin-e!’
Iniu charadung ruangga phuiboga,
paliu wa khatnadi dinra ha-e;
Iniu maniubo chamse mai khatnadi paokakra ha-e.
Haibo radungse pageng ha-e;
paliuniu wakhatdi kamlu lakge—
charamengdungse pumtan ha-e khatdi son-e.”
“Iniu pitan khaibo vangpiuse haiga bamme-
Iniu patu hai kadakhai mibo-e, Iniu pakhuga alung kimme.
Ahiupuina pakhuga Iniu piphui khai-e,
jat hina khuga majibose paniu phungwangne.
Paniu pakhuan palad padlakge,
maksai npuiki gase pakhuan tanjiu dinlakge.
Paniu chahubang khattudi riotang lakge,
khatdi taobambo mibung situdi kammid lakge.
Paniu mai hina leng tingthenggu majibose phungwang rabo-e.
Paniu palungchun nkhinmi lakge maksai manangmi lakge;
paniu kadihpiriga majibo kamkhai rabo-e.
Kadiubo kadihga lungbammai siniu
pagu katikhaibotu ramgunjiu khuan bamme.”
Paniu kadihpiri lundi, siga lung bambo wahina lundi damkhai-e;
khatdi siga lungbo chamaina mathiuleng ringting nai pasiu pikhai-e.
Sichiujiu tuhoi
Napen gasu Iniu chamaina mathiu khuga ladriat thiu khaine;
khatdi napen gasu Iniu jatdung khuga kabenbo phungwang khaine.
Pamik tiadmai mikse nangniu pingao khaine
khatdi tamiubo kavangkyga bammaitu khenrang thiujiu phutkhai bine.
“I hai
katambo ra khatniudi agu kendibo gase padam lusi lakge;
charameng siniu atu thuonbo damse lusi lakge.
Iniu din masuang khai mibose tuhoira wangtang mide.
Tuhoi, wakhatnadi kasanbose pad makhaga, Iniu naliu khuga dinkhai bine.”
kadihga lungmai hina pakendise thuonlo!
Duipuiga tad kinmai naliu patu thuonlo;
duipuiga bambo wakhao hina patu thuonlo!
Kadiubo dihga lungmai hina chalui thiulo!
Ramjingga khatdi namga lungmai Tingwang tu thuonlo;
Kedar ga lungmai hina patu thuonlo!
Sela namdiga lungbam mai hina
chunwibo khuanse maluang ton-ga senlo!
Kadiubo kadihga lungbo mai hina
thuonbo nai kendibose
pase chari thiuni siakjiu kaden bamme.
chari thiurabo khuanse paniu senpadle;
pagu mikremai riga pagu pumtanse lenkhai-e.
Tingwang niu din-e, “Pating kathengkha maliumakjiu I bam mibo-e
Iniu amaidungtu paokak khai makge.
Chiudi tuhoira kamkhai rabo wanse wangmide,
maipuiniu manathadga kapbo kum Iniu kap bamme.
Iniu maluongdung nai luongbutdung situ kam maha mine,
khatdi piubuan nai singbangdung situ kam agui kiujiu kamshat mine.
singgiu bambo ramjeng situ kathaidih pithiukhai mine khatdi ajai situ pisang khai mine.
“Iniu pamik tiadbo amaidungtu jukhaine
paliuniu wadaodi tadkhai matai makbo puidi gase jukhaine.
Tamiubose benkhai bine, taradbo kadihse kam manaikhai bine.
Haise agu ladriat si-e, Iniu kamkhai makbo thiulakge.
Charamengtu malumbo mai hina,
charamengtu paliu ra leng kubambo mai hina
chaliujiu kamangambose daorabo-e.”
Pamik katiatmai naliu phui mawi lulo!
Avangpiu suang pamik tiat nkiubo mai bamma?
agu ladlangtadbopiu suang pakuon tidbo mai bamma?
Israel mai yo, wajiukha naliuniu ngao mide,
chiudi sibo rambase degulo?
Dinbambose chiukhaira naliu kuon bamme,
chiudi pachangjiu naliu degu chiukhai mibo gulo?”
pagu tacheng-tajai nai katikhaidungse paken kam madijiu
pamaidungtu chakhuang pithiukhai nibo-e.
Chiudi tuhoira pamaidungtu sutmide,
paliutu kavangkyga khamten khai mide
khatdi kavangky lungga baikhai mide.
Paliugu agalude, khatdi sutlude
mai khatniudi paliutu gukhaira hamide.
Mai khat kumbo nking khaira bamma?
tuhoi gasu naliu chun ngutjiu nkingkhai rama?
Israel maitu saoniu wa suttiu mai khuga pikhaimi jiulo?
Aliuniu patu suimakjiu nuan kambo gasu
Paniu aliutu lunibo lunlungga aliu lungkhai makge
khatdi paniu katikhaibose aliu majai makge.
Sijengniu tathiu-chari thiubogu chariubo nai pagu lungpomse,
paniu aliutu pi niatao khaibo-e.
Pagu lungpomse Israel mai hina khuga chami kumjiu pi taokhai-e,
chiudi degu padbambo gulo chiubo aliuniu wakhatdi silu makge.
Israel mai yo, naliutu
damkhaibo
“Pingmi tulo—Iniu naliutu gukhai bine.
Iniu naliu zan kujiu, agu thiura kulubo-e
naliura agu-e.
Naliuniu tadui kasukbo kenboga,
Iniu naliutu maluang khairabo-e;
naliugu magenthiu chariubo siniu naliutu gommi lakge.
Naliuniu chami jiuga tadjiu bamdi, naliutu rumi lakge;
kakungbo siniu naliutu madiujiu bamdi
naliutu kam masami lakge.
Palamra I hai naliu Rawang,
Israel maigu masanbo Rawang, naliutu gukhaipiu-e.
Naliutu khenrang pithiu khaira;
Egypt mainiu phutkhaira Iniu kamkhai bine
Sudan mai nai Seba mainiudi
naliutu phutkhaira suikhai bine.
Naliu ringting gukhaira Iniu jat hinatu kamkhai bine,
palamra naliu hai Iniu kakungbo mai-e,
khatdi Iniu naliutu lungsajiu chakhuang thiubo hai naliutu pikhaibo-e.
Pingmi tulo—Iniu naliutu maluang bamme!
“Kadiubo tingbang lamsu khatdi diuthubo tingnu lamsu
Iniu naliutu chaky lam puiwang khai bine.
