Paliutu pitad khaira tingpi situ
khatdi paliutu khamkhai makra tingnu situ Iniu dinkhai bine.
Kadihpiri pabam hina gasu, khatdi kadiubo kadih gasu
pijiu amaidungtu malanwang khailo.
Paliu hai amai siakge,
kendibose aleng phungwangra Iniu paliutu damkhai mibo-e,”
Tingwang niu din-e,
“Amaidungtu ladjankyga kuwanglo.
Paliu mik bamme chiudi paliu mik tiadle;
paliu kuon bamme, chiudi paliu kuon tidle!
Sibo ladjan ga wangra jatdungtu kukhailo
paliu sao khatniu sailad dinngam ralo?
Tuhoi padbambo haise paliu ruangga saoniu din masuang ngam ralo?
Sibo radung nai paliu chamkengse maji-e chiubo lenkhaira
paliugu lamchap maitu pijiu puiwanglo.
“Israel maidung yo, naliura agu lamchap mai-e;
Iniu naliutu avang thiura kadalubo-e,
I aronna Charawang si-e chiubo silujiu naliuniu atu malumlu raleng-e.
I makjiu kakibo ra ha-e wadao khatdi bammak niu-e,
wadao khatnadi bamlakge.
naliutu gukhai ngambose aronna-e.
Degu padralo chiubo Iniu dinlen khai-e,
khatdi naliutu nkha khaira I wangbo-e.
Sangdiumai ra khatniudi haise kam makge
naliu hai agu lamchapmai si-e.
I hai Charawang si-e, pawan machang palunjiu bamrabo-e.
Agu pumtan gasu maidi mari ngam lakge;
Iniu kambo hai maidi kam kalilu lakge.”
Israel maigu masanbo Rawang, naliutu gukhaibo
“Naliutu rankhaira Iniu Babylon mai riga riphen maitu langkhai bine;
Iniu paliugu rengmundungse kampang lujiu
pamaidungniu makiakbo khuan situ kapbo khuan pithiu khaine.
I hai naliugu masanbo Rawang
Iniu naliutu dambo-e, Israel mai yo; I hai naliu wangpiu si-e.”
duiliu katanbo gase npui thiukhai-e.
Paniu chaqondung nai chaqon-karidung
khatdi kadibo riphendungtu kamkao mide,
Kaomide, paliu wadaodi sulan makra,
chamibunggu chamipuang kum midphid mide!
Chiudi
“Nda padmiboga mangiu khaijiu bamtalo,
maksai nda padmibo lunlungga bamtalo.
Iniu kasanbo kamkhai rabo situ phuilo.
Haise padjiu bammibo-e—tuhoidi naliuniu ngao bamme!
Ramjing gase Iniu puidi thiukhaijiu
siga naliuleng singgiu piluang khaine.
Iniu kadalubo amaidung leng,
ramjingga tadui piluang khai dasai,
nkan khaodungdi atu chakhuangthiu rabo-e;
tanydung nai ruididung siniu atu thuon rabo-e.
Paliu haira Iniu aleng damkhai mibo maidung-e,
siniu atu thuonbo luise paliu thiu rabo-e!”
“Chiudi naliura ajengniu chiasiak mide, Israel mai yo;
naliuniu atu kahumta mide.
Naliugu maring rukhaibo milyse akhuga phungwangta mide;
naliugu rathak mania thinlujiu wang atu chakhuang thiuta mide,
Iniu naliugu maniakad khengjiu naliutu kam chariu khaibo makge,
maksai parim wibo mataora khengjiu naliutu kam magenthiu khaibo makge.
Parim wibose naliuniu aleng liukhai makge
maksai wakhao saniu atu pikim khai makge.
Chiudi naliu nuan siniu abangrid pithiu khai-e;
naliuniu kamao kammibo jengniu atu kam chariu khai-e.
Chiudi Ira naliu nuan kuak khaibo Rawang si-e,
Iniu haichiu kambo sira, I kalu jenggasu-e.
Iniu naliu nuan situ pariak chakjiu bamlakge.
“Aliu ladjankyga tadkhe; naliuniu thukhai nibose phunglu wanglo!
Naliu maji-e chiubo lenra kamlu wanglo!
Naliu-pao tingthubo
naliugu jupaodungniu akhuga nuan kam mide,
khatdi naliugu mawangpaodung siniu atu Kahumboky kam tania mide.
Siniu Israel mai riga kam masa khaibo-e;
Iniu amaidungtu kam mangam khaibo-e.”
Iniu kadalubo, Jacob kaikik maidung yo.
Naliutu damkhaibo
Naliutu manabo ting gasu Iniu naliutu nkhawang kinbo-e,
Pingmi tulo; naliura avangmai-e,
Iniu lungsajiu kadalubo maidung si-e.
“Charibo tingga Iniu tadui pikhai bine,
kasangbo kadihga singgiu piluang khai bine
Naliu nahmaidung riga Iniu ahiupuina runkiu khai bine,
sichiujiu naliu kaikikmai riga agu thoidamse pikhai bine.
Tadui kajin khaibo piubuan kum,
singgiu mungga lungbo singbang kum, paliu mawikhang rabo-e.
“Maidung siniu khat-khat thiujiu din sune, ‘I hai
Israel maitu khat thiujiu lung aruangra paliu wangrabo-e.
Mai hinaniu
raokhai lujiu, paronna Tingwang mai khatle chiujiu din sune.”
Ngamkambo
“I hai raithubo, nathubo, khatdi khat nakhabo Rawang si-e,
I kamakbo chara kaki ha-e.
Iniu kambo kumjiu mai khatra kamlu buima?
Nda paphibang gasu kanamthubo wan tangbo lungga
padmibo, pad bambo, khatdi padlan rabo hinase
din madulen ngam lurabo mai bamma?
Amaidung yo, pingmi tulo!
Nda karai gasu tuhoi tangbo padjiu bambo hinase
Iniu din masuang khai mibo naliuniu sibambo-e,
siga naliu hai agu lamchap mai-e.
Dega kakibo ra bamjiulo?
Iniu chiu matai makbo katanbo ra bam jiuma?”

Charameng kampadbo maise pageng kahabo mai maliang-e, khatdi paliuniu maning makung bambo ramengdungse mathakhu-e. Haibo ramengdungtu kahumbo maidungse pamik katiadmai khatdi pachun kaha mai-e; paliutu kam mangam khai rabo-e.
Chagi siniu charameng kamlujiu sibo mengtu charatu kumjiu kambose wimakge!

Sikumbotu kahummai hinatu kam mangam khairabo-e. Charameng situ kampadbose chamaina niu-e, wakhatdi kamakbo gu-e. Paliutu puiwang lujiu ladjan thiuboga pi chapkhailo—paliuse kamangambo siniu phuijiu kapingbo daorabo-e.

Chagi akedmai siniu chagitang khat chami riga khoikhai lujiu pangam kamsude. Pabenjiang katanbo siniu kadiak ponlujiu chagi pekse palun padra kadam sude. Paniu changamse kamsu dasai, pase mariu-e, chari-e, khatdi chiami-e.
Tasingsiam kampiu siniu tasingse madatle. Paniu charaotang thinlujiu pameng giakpatle, pagu mania thinlujiu paniu palun kawibo maipiu khat meng ruipad lujiu pakyga khaira kamme.
Paniu cedar sing, nphu sing maksai cypress singse mariu gasu huilujiu thin-e. Maksai paniu laurel bang somkhai lujiu pidikhangra tingriutu khon-e.

Maipiu siniu tasing kasia lamse langtiu-rutiu raleng thin-e, kasia lamse charameng thiuraleng kamme. Kasia lamse chami magara, khatdi taruak khuakra thin-e, kasia siniu paniu kahum raleng charamengse kamme.
Kasia siniu chami thiulujiu—paniu chami rutiura khatdi paleng kimra thin-e. Paronna patu kam malum lujiu paniu din-e, “Dejiukha wilo, khatdi lumlo! Dejiukha kawibo gulo!”
Kamasiabo singse paniu khoi lujiu charameng kamlujiu makhumkiu sisetu kahumjiu din-e, “Nangse a-rawang-e, atu gukhailo!”
Haikumbo maidung sira pangjujiu paliu degu kamkin gulo chiubo simakge. Kamajibotu sira paliuniu paliu mik kaba mibo-e khatdi paliu lungchunse khamman mibo-e, siniu paliu chun hamide.

Charameng kambo piuse haichiu dinra pagu ningting maksai makum ha-e. “Tasing kasia situ Iniu rumide. Iniu mitikang rigasu taruak khuakjiu khatdi chamee rulujiu I tiu lude. Sichiujiu malipadbo tasing kasiase Iniu thinlujiu charameng hai kampadbo-e. Haiga Iniu tasingdum khat khuga makhumkiu kahum bambo-e!”

Haise tabui n-phangbo suang wison makge. Pagu kapang kamengbo lungchun siniu patu jumeng mibo jengniu, pahiunatu kalan silak mide. Paniu paben ga thinman bambo rameng situ paniu chara makge chiubo suikhai silak mide.
“Israel mai yo, haise maning taolo;
naliu hai avang mai-e chiubo maningtaolo.
Avangleng Iniu naliutu damkhaibo-e,
Siniu wadaodi Iniu naliutu mangai lakge.
Iniu naliu nuan situ kamaotu kumjiu biakthon mide.
Akhuga wanglo, naliutu gukhaibose Iniu-e.”
Tinggen mai naliu chunwijiu senlo!
kadihpirigu kasukbo bam hina senlo!
Mariuga singbang hina, maluang hina chunwijiu senlo!
“I hai naliutu ranpao,
naliutu damkhaibose Iniu-e.
Wahinatu dampao
Aronna tinggen haitu judeng khaibo-e;
Iniu kadihpiritu damboga, mai khatniudi atu nkha makge.
chagan ariak kasimaitu kam mangam khai-e.
Wakasimai ladtu Iniu lukhai makge,
khatdi paliugu ningting situ Iniu kammeng khai-e.
Chiudi avangpiu khuga din masuang khaijiu,
Iniu rangbose madu khaira champaomai langkhai sai,
Iniu rangbo khatdi sailad din mibose palingjiu piwangtang khai rabo-e.
Jerusalem ga maidung lunglanne chiujiu Iniu dinkhai-e,
khatdi Judah namdise paliuniu thiulanjiu
hamibo gasu namdidungse thiusulan rabo-e.
Duinai situ Iniu chamtan khatniu kam masang khai-e.
‘Nang-hai aleng mawangrabo piusi-e;
Iniu masenbose nangniu kamkhai rabo-e.
Jerusalem thiusu lanra nangniu chamtanse pikhai rabo-e;
siga Charaky phungse donsu rabo-e.’”
Paniu jatdungtu ngam lujiu chawangdunggu
pumtanse luthon mira patu kadakhai mibo-e;
“Naleng npuise apumsiakniu kaden khaine
maluongdung nai luongbutdung hina kam manai khai bine.
Iniu tataagi rengmunse kampang khai bine
paliugu chagi rengse kakhiupang khai bine.
Tamiubo khatdi nbaibo bamga bambo
chakhiu chalan hinase Iniu naleng pikhai bine;
siga I hai
Israel mai Rawang niu nazan kujiu natu kada lubo-e.
Avangmai, Israel maitu nangniu nkha khaira
Iniu kadalubo maitu—nangniu phuikhaira Iniu natu kadakhai mibo-e.
Nangniu atu simakjiu bamliudi
natu chakhuangthiu khaira Iniu pikhai mibo-e.
“I hai
Nangniu atu simakjiu bamliudi naleng pageng bambo pumtanse Iniu naleng pikhai bine.
Iniu haise kamkhaibo lamra, kadihpiri pabam hinaga bammai siniu
I hai
Tamiubo nai kabenbose Iniu damkhaibo-e;
thoidam nai tasiangse Iniu phung wangbo-e.
Chari ngambose tingpuk lamsu tingriu kumjiu Iniu riukiu khai bine;
siga kadih siniu lepadjiu lukhaine,
siga majibo nai khenrang thiubo siniu charapen kum penrabo-e.
Haise padra
patu machapadbo piutu ari-ngamlu buima?
Chali machapadbo piu khuga chagamniang siniu
pah degu kambam jiulo chiubo maniulu buima?
Patu machapadbo piu khuga chali siniu
nang wasiam simakge chiujiu dinbo suima?
Aliuniu aliu pui-piu khuga haichiu dinbo suima?
“Deleng nanainiu atu haichiu kamjiulo?”
Israel maigu masanbo Rawang,
“Nangniu anahmai lamga maniura na-ngam nathao ha-e
maksai Iniu degu kamralo chiubo katikhai raleng na-ngam ha-e!
I hai kadihpiri haitu damlujiu siga chamainatu lungra damkhaibo piu-e.
Agu pumtan siniu, tinggentu juden lujiu
Iniu chahiu, naimik khatdi chagandungtu thinman bambo-e.
I apumsiakniu Cyrus tu agu chunningse pi kam tathui khaijiu, wahina kam maji khaira-e.
Paniu nbin tadrabo puidi hina Iniu kam maji khaine.
Paniu agu Jerusalem namdise thiusulan rabo-e,
khatdi bangbambo amaidungtu khenrang pithiu khai rabo-e.
Haise kamra mai khatniudi paleng chaphi maksai tanim pimakge.”
Ngamkambo
“Egypt mai nai Sudan maigu chakhiu-chalanse naliugu thiurabo-e.
Pakhao kawibo Seba maise kavang thiujiu chagiriang khinlujiu naliu saisui rabo-e.
Paliuniu naliu suangga makhumkiu madu sune,
‘Tingwang niu naliutu maluang bamme, pah paronna Charawang si-e.
Israel mai Rawang hai pamaitu gukhaibo
paronna patu baikhai bambo Rawang si-e.
Charameng machapad maise pazu sarabo-e,
paliu mathiuse kamangambo daorabo-e.
Chiudi Israel mai tura
pagu chari ngambose tingtheng leng-e; pamaidungse wadaodi mangam lakge.’”
Paniu kadihpiri lun damlu—paniu haise kam matip khaijiu tingtheng leng kamkhai-e.
Paniu haise mathakhu leng dammakjiu chamainiu siga lungra damkhai-e.
Paniu haichiu din-e, “I hai
Haise Iniu mahin dinkhaibo makge maksai achunningse mahin baikhai makge.
Nchum mibo kadihga atu phiura Iniu Israel maitu machun sonbo makge
I hai
majibose delo chiubo Iniu pisi khaibo-e.”
“Chawangdih kaomibo gasu masiak lubo, jat hina—wang madui lujiu,
naliugu tathu-charase phunglu wanglo.
Wadi makbo, gukhai silakbo rameng situ maluang tad macham lujiu
kakhengthiu bammai naliu thu-rase phunglujiu wanglo.
Naliu thu-rase phunglu ladjankyga wanglo,
kamao maise khat-khat khuga maniululo.
Degu padralo chiubo saoniu din masuang khailo?
Pamaitu gukhaibo,
Kadihpiriga bambo mai hina tuhoi akhulam mariwangjiu ranlulo!
I aronna Chawang si-e.
haise wadaodi kali lakge, I hainiu ladriat khaibo-e;
Mai hinaniu asuangga khudung kiujiu khatdi makhumkiujiu atu kahum rabo-e.
“Chari ngambo nai pumtanse akhu gasu ronna daobo-e chiujiu paliuniu dinrabo-e:
atu marengbo maira mangambo daorabo-e.
Jacob kaikik situ
“Haise Babylon mai radunggu kaloibosi-e!
Bel nai Nebo tu pawan khat kahum bamdi-e,
chiudi tuhoira paliutu chiasiak mibo wakhao riga thonkhaijiu, qonniamdung bangrit thiu mide.
Charamengdung siniu gukhai ngamlakge;
paliutu minlujiu phungtad mide.
Haise Babylon mai radunggu kaloibo si-e!
“Jacob kaikik mai, masiak lubo amai yo, akhuan nkinglo.
Naliutu manawangbo tinggasu Iniu naliutu manang khai mibo-e.
I hai naliu Rawang si-e
naliu pee npuakjiu thenthui mibo katang manang khaibi rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu damkhaibo-e, siniu manangkhai bine;
Iniu naliutu nkha khaijiu gukhai bine.
Akumbo mai kaki bamjiu ma?”
Maidungniu paliugu rangkangkhao lepadjiu kachia runpadjiu bamme,
paliugu rangkangse taju gasu madiu bamme.
Paliuniu kachia aketmaitu lankhaijiu charamengse kampadle,
sichiujiu sisetu makhumkiu kahum bamme.
Paliuniu sise paliu makhuakga khailujiu pontad bamme;
paliuniu pabam khatga machap khailujiu sise malai silakjiu bamme.
Mai khatniu pakhuga khengbamdi haisiniu paokak ngam makge,
maksai chariubo gasu gukhai ngam makge.
“Naliu, nuan phungbo maidung,
Iniu kamkhai mibo hai maningtao khailo.
Nda degu padmi gulo chiubo maningtaolo;
I aronna Charawang-e chiubo hai sikhailo
khatdi akumbo maidi ha-e chiubo sikhailo.
Paphibang gasu padrabo hina Iniu din masankhai mibo-e;
degu padralo chiubo hai nda Iniu din masuang khai mibo-e.
Iniu rangbo hina wadi padmakbo thiulakge chiujiu Iniu dinkhai mibo-e,
Iniu machunbo hina Iniu kamkhai rabo-e.
Tingbang lamsu mai khattu
paniu takaoleng kumjiu thonkiu rabo-e
Iniu machunbose piwangtang khai rabo-e.
Iniu dinmibo-e, haise padrabo-e.
“Naliu, chalung tanjiu bammai, chari ngamrabose pating thengjiu bamkha-e
chiujiu maningbo mai, naliu alad hai nking khailo.
Chari ngambo tingmikse Iniu phungwang kin-e, haise pating thengta mide.
Iniu chari ngamrabose pating thengta mide. Iniu Jerusalem tu gukhaine
sichiujiu Israel maileng chakhuang thiubose phungwang khaine.”
“Babylon yo, nawangbam gasu nkum lujiu,
tabuijiuga kiu ntaomi sulo,
pawan khatga liuchangpui khat kumjiu,
mainiu kamkao lulakbo namdi thiu bamniu-e,
chiudi manuanbo nai manimbose nakhuga hamide!
Tuhoira nang hai kavang thiu mide!
Tatupense tun kari sulo! Tasiu thao sulo!
Nazu-gom faise lepad milo! Nagu fainoise khoipad milo!
Singgiuse kenra
Maidungniu natu napumruang ngaosu rabo-e;
nangniu manonkiu mibo nagu mangamse paliuniu ngao rabo-e.
Iniu chakhum rui rabo-e,
siga mai khatniudi atu khamsi lakge.”
Israel mai masanbo Rawang siniu aliutu khen-rang pithiu khaibo-e,
pazanse Ngamkambo
Babylon mai khuga
“Maliu makjiu tamiuboga ntao bamlo;
paliuniu natu wadaodi jatdunggu chawangpui kuta mine!
Iniu amaidungtu alung pomjiu paliutu agu makbo kumjiu kamkhai mibo-e;
Iniu paliutu nagu pumtan ga pikhaibo-e,
siga nangniu patu lungsa khai makge;
tanpao-tanpehtu katang, na-nkhai sakhai kamigu-e.
Tingthengjiu chawangpui thiubamne chiujiu nangra maning-e,
haichiu padne chiubo maningkhai makge
maksai haichiu loikhaine chiubo maning khai makge.
wijiu bamme wadi manangra ha-e chiujiu nangniu maning-e.
Nang hai Charawang kumgapjiu di-e
khatdi nakumbo maidi ha-e chiujiu maning-e.
Nanahdung wadaodi kahabo thiulakge
maksai kamipui thiulakge chiujiu maning-e.
Chiudi naikhat gasu, pawan khat gasu nia haise padmi rabo-e,
Nangniu chamik thao-kadadbo thin bamdi
nakina nai nanahmaise hami rabo-e.
“Nagu kasabo gase nangniu malumsui bamme
natu mai khatniudi ngaolakge chiujiu maning-e.
Nagu tasi nai ningting siniu natu jumao mide,
sichiujiu naronna din-e, ‘I hai Chara-e, akumbo mai khatdi ha-e.’
Chariu magenthiubose nariga wangrabo-e,
nagu chamik thao-kadadbo siniu wadi khamsi lakge.
Ka-nchumbose bungjiu wangrabo-e—
nangniu man matai makbo mang nchumse thiumi rabo-e!
Nangniu n-nahting gasu thinbam niubo
chamik thao kadatpiu nai kamihpiuse thinjiu bamlo.
Siseniu natu poinakha nkha khaibo sui-e,
nagu mikremaitu kam kapin khaibo sui-e.
Natu ladpi khaijiu bamdi nagu pumtan hamide.
Tinggen tiak phuijiu naimachang khatdi chahiu machang degu padralo
chiujiu chagan ariak kasimai siniu wangjiu natu gukhaimi sulo.
“Paliutu magaoreng kumjiu chaminiu ruthonmi rabo-e!
Paliuniu paliu ronna gukhai ngam lakge
chamibonse paliuleng thiujumi rabo-e,
lumbuibo mise paliu khuga hamide.
Nagu ringtingga nangniu wa- maniujiu npaokinbo chagan-ariak kasimai siniu
natu nkha khaibo sira haise ronna-e.
Paliu mathiu natu phutlujiu paliu npuilam tadmi rabo-e,
natu gukhaira maidi masiak lakge.”
Israel maidung yo, haise nking khailo,
naliura Judah gasu wangbo kaikikdung-e:
Naliuniu
Israel mai Rawang tu naliu kahumne chiujiu naliuniu din-e,
chiudi naliu ladse naliuniu majai makge.
Chiudi naliuniu chaliangjiu, naliu hai masanbo namdigu dihkhun mai-e,
pazan Ngamkambo
“Degu padralo chiubo, nda din masuang khai mibo-e;
Sise bungjiu Iniu kamkhai-e.
Naliu hai chagi nai tataagi kumjiu naliu lung tanrabo-e chiubo I si-e.
Naliugu charameng nai wamengdung siniu naliuleng kamkhaibo-e
chiujiu dinmakra haise pad makhaga nda masuang Iniu dinkhai mibo-e.
“Iniu dinkhai masuang mibo hinase tuhoira padkam mide;
agu masuangcham hai maji-e chiubo naliu suikhai rabo-e.
Tuhoira kasabo wangrabose Iniu karaiga din masuang khai makbose
Iniu naliu khuga dinkhai bine.
Haise tuhoi gasu Iniu pipad khaibo-e;
karaiga haikumbose wadaodi padmakbo-e.
Haise padbam niusai haise naliuniu sibam kamme chiujiu naliu din sune.
Naliura pawan machang kadinpiu makbo malum silakbo mai-e chiubo I si-e.
Sijengniu haibo lamga naliu wadaodi chiukhai makbo-e,
dekamjiu naliu kuon-ga chalad wadi ngutkhai mak jiulo?
“Maidungniu chamtantu thuon bamra Iniu alungpom hai kasutbo-e;
alung nkhinlan lujiu naliutu kam mahami lakge.
Rangkanggitu n-mang gasu maruakbo kumjiu
Iniu naliutu magenthiu-chariubo mi gasu madiu khai mibo-e.
Chiudi naliu hai pageng ha-e chiubo Iniu silude.
Iniu kambose ladriat jengniu kamkhai mibo-e—
Agu ladriattu chakhuangthiu makbo pi thiukhai lakge,
maksai agu kendise mai khat lengdi pikhai lakge aguse agu ronna rabo-e.”
“Iniu kulubo Israel mai yo, alad nkinglo!
I hai Charawang si-e, karaibo, kanabo,
khatdi khat nakhabo Charawang si-e.
Kadihpiri kaphungse abenniu dambo-e
khatdi tinggen tuse Iniu juden khaibo-e.
Tingpuk nai kadih situ Iniu kukhai sai paliu ronna pakwang rabo-e.
“Naliu mathiu wang madui lujiu nkinglo!
Iniu kadakhaibo piu siniu Babylon tu atungjiu
Iniu kamkhai nibose paniu kamkhaine chiubo
paliu radung khatniudi din masuang silakge.
Iniu patu kupad lujiu dinkhaibo-e;
Iniu patu jukhaijiu patu pingam khaibo-e.
“Tuhoira akhuga wang manalujiu Iniu kadinbo hai nkinglo.
Paphibang gasu Iniu madujiu dinmibo aladkengse majijiu pipad khaibo-e.”
(Tuhoira Dithubo
Naliutu gukhaibo
“I hai, naliuleng kawi katikhai nibo, naliuniu tadrabo npui siokhaibo
“Naliuniu agu chamtantu ronna majaisai,
wadaodi sangmakbo singgiu kumjiu, thoidamse naliuleng luangkhai rabo-e!
Chari ngambose duidet kumjiu naliu khuga luangwang rabo-e.
Naliu kaikikdung hai nbuiniang kumjiu pikeng khai bine,
sichiujiu paliutu wadaodi kam maha lakge, haise Iniu palingsiak kamkhai rabo-e.”
Chunwibo chamse senjiu pabam hinaga pisi khailo;
ramjingga puipadboga, mariu-charibo siniu kam mathadkhai makge.
Paniu paliuleng tudi gasu tadui pi luangpad khai-e;
paniu tudi situ lepang khaijiu tadui pijiu luangpad khai-e.
kadiubo kadihga lungbammai naliu!
Atu mana makha gasu
khatdi pavangleng kadakhai mibo-e.
Paben siakniu atu gukhai-e.
Paniu tavaithu kumjiu atu thinraleng
pamun kam mawi khai-e.
Paniu akhuga din-e, “Israel mai naliura avangmai-e;
palamra naliu jengniu, maidung atu thuon rabo-e.
Iniu din-e, “Iniu tatien thiu khai-e,
chiudi haise dejiukha kapangbo gulo!
Iniu apumtan ngutjiu kamkhai-e chiudi wadi kampadlu makge.”
Chiudi atu gukhaira Iniu
Iniu tenkhai mibo jengniu tathuonse aleng pikhaine.
Atu mana makha gasu
lung mara tadmibo pamai Israel maidungtu puiwang lanra paniu atu pavang leng kamkhai bi-e.
“Avangpiu yo, tatien kadibo kamra bamme.
Masiak bambo Israel mai khuga pakendibose
nangniu phungwangbo ronna makjiu,
jat hinaleng kabenbose natu Iniu pithiu khai bine,
sichiujiu kadihpiri pakhiangnatu ranlu raleng-e.”
Israel maigu masanbo Rawang khatdi ranpao siniu,
jatdungniu makhaojiu din masa bambo
mawangpaodunggu vangpiu khuga din bamme;
“Naliutu phutpad khaibo hai chawangdung siniu ngao sune;
Sichiujiu paliuniu chakhuang thiubo lenjiu suchap rabo-e,
chawang nahdung niudi haise ngao rabo-e,
sichiujiu paliuniu chakhuang thiubo lenjiu makhumkiu rabo-e.”
Haise padrabo-e palamra
Israel maigu masanbo Rawang siniu pagu ladriatse majai khai-e.
“Naliutu rankhaibo wanse wangtang sai, Iniu naliutu lungsa khai bine,
naliuniu nkha khaira kapjiu khengbose paokak khai bine.
Iniu naliutu akhijiu gukhai bine
sichiujiu naliu pen gasu mai hina khuga Iniu ladriat thiu khai bine.
Tuhoi matha nchum bambo naliu kadihga
Iniu naliutu pilung khai lan bine.
Kavangkyga bammai khuga Iniu din-e,
‘Khenrang thiujiu tadpad sulo!’
Tamiubo bamga bammai khuga Iniu din-e, ‘Kabenbo gase npad sulo!’
Maluangga tagibambo milydung kumjiu,
wadaodi paliu mariu-charilan lakge.
palamra paliutu lungsabopiu siniu paliutu majangjiu bamme.
Paniu duipin gase majangkhai bine.
“Ramluongdung tadtonbo puidi Iniu thiu khaine,
amaidungniu nbin tadra npuise Iniu kaden khaine.
Amaidungse tingpi, tingnu lamsu,
khatdi tingrunlam bambo Aswan
Tinggen yo, chalui thiulo! Kadihmai yo, chunwibo khuanse senlo!
Ramluongdungse chalui thiu sulo!
magenthiu-chariu bammaitu paniu lungsa khai bine.
Chiudi Jerusalem mainiu din-e,
Siga
“Maipui khatniu panahtu mangailu buima?
Paniu ponbo ngenatu lungsamak rama?
Maipui siniu panahtu mangaimi bamtadi,
Ira naliutu mangaisi lakge.
Jerusalem yo, Iniu naliutu mangai silakge!
Iniu aben ndiga naliu zanse raokhai nbamme.
“Natu thiusu lanra maise wangji sune,
khatdi natu kam mahajiu bammaise tadmine.
Degu padbamlo chiubo ajanjiu phuilo!
Namaidungse wang madui lujiu—chaky lam wangkinne!
I hai ringbambo Rawang thiubo jengniu
chamipui khatniu patiu-patah jengniu wasao thiubo kum,
naliuniu naliu maidung jengniu wasao thiu rabo-e.
“Naliugu kadih hai nchum mibo-e khatdi maruang mibo-e—
chiudi haiga lungra wangkin mailengse tuhoira haise siamju mibo-e.
Naliutu kam maha bammaise naliu khugasu diujiu tadmi rabo-e.
Namaidung kavang thiubo tingga manapadbo
maidung siniu naliu khuga dinsune,
‘Haibo kadihse aliuleng siamju-e—
aliu lungra pabam hamide!
Siga nangniu naronna dinsune,
‘Haibo nahdungtu saoniu aleng lungkhai jiulo?
Anahmaira hakam mibo-e Ira lung ngamlak mibo-e.
Atu kavangleng jutadjiu hathon mibo-e—
saoniu haibo nahdungtu makuatpad jiulo?
Atu ronna khaidiakbo-e,
haibo nahdungse delamsu wangjiulo?”
Dithubo
“Iniu jat situ madan pikhaiboga, paliuniu naliu nahdung situ
chakyga puiwang khairabo-e.
Chawangdungse naliu piu kummi rabo-e,
chawang naodungse naliu pui kummi rabo-e.
Paliuniu naliutu chakhuang thiujiu naliu suangga makhumkiu rabo-e;
chakhuang thiubo lenjiu lung manon mirabo-e.
Siga I hai
agu nkhatu khuanjiu bambo mai khattudi pijiu chunsa khai lakge.”
Riphen maigu maniase nangniu sutlu buima?
Palung-parai kasamai vang situ nangniu rankhai ngamma?
“Haise kumgapjiu padrabo-e.
Riphen maigu vangbamai situ lutad mine,
khatdi palung kasamainiu sunglubose minlu rabo-e.
Naliutu aphenmaitu Iniu aphenkhai bine
khatdi naliu nahmai situ gukhai bine.
Naliutu kam mathad bammai situ pijiu khatniu khattu kamshat khai bine;
paliuniu maitu gi-dangbo chalung pombo siniu paliu maniumi rabo-e.
Naliutu gukhaijiu khenrang thiukhaibo hai maidungniu siluboga I hai
I hai pumtan bambo Israel mai Rawang si-e chiubo paliuniu simi rabo-e.”
“Mai khatniu panaotu takhaibo kumjiu
Iniu amaidungtu hathonmi sune chiubo naliuniu maning jiuma?
Chiusai, tanao tabo ariakse dega bamlo?
Mai khatniu panahdungtu kavangleng jonbo kumjiu
Iniu naliutu kavangleng jonmine chiu naliuniu maning jiuma?
Chiumakge, naliu nuan jengniu kavang thiu mibo-e,
naliu khui-mao jengniu naliutu hathon mibo-e.
“Iniu amaidungtu gukhaira wangboga, dekamjiu paliu kenkak khaimak jiulo?
Iniu paliutu kubo tingga dekamjiu paliu paokak khaimak jiulo?
Paliutu gukhaira I hai sonju mijiuma?
Agu chamtanniu duipuitu pisang khai-e, kathaidihtu singgiu pithiu khai ngam-e,
siga chakhase tadui hamibo jengniu shai mibo-e.
Kashaiboga achungbo kumjiu,
Iniu naimiktu kam tamiu khai ngam-e.”
Degu Iniu dinralo chiubo Dithubo
pajeng hami maitu Iniu pitan khai ngamme.
Paniu katikhaibose alung ngutjiu nkingra
nsuan machang paniu kamkhai-e.
Pakhu gasu marimi makra maksai patu atungmi makra
Atu tanui thiujiu, abianggiu jamboga
khatdi azuga tatai masiu khaiboga, Iniu paliutu kham makge.
Paliugu tanui thiubo siniu atu kam masa lulakge
palamra Dithubo
Tingwang hai akhuga najiu bambo jengniu I mangam lakge.
I mao makge chiujiu paniu dinlen khai bine.
Mai khatniu ariga kamaobo madam khaini bamma?
Ladjanky gase aliu tad machamkhe!
Paniu madamkhai rabose phunglu wanglo!
Dithubo
saoniu atu kammao khai ralo?
Atu madam khai bammai hinase hami rabo-e,
paliu hai makhiu-tariniu tiulubo fai kumjiu hami rabo-e.
khatdi pavangpiu kadin piubo mai hina,
naliu npuise pachangjiu tamiu bamdi,
Maitu kam mahara kamjiu bammai,
naliu thak gasu naliutu manmi rabo-e.
Haise
wajiukha chariubo sansetse naliu daorabo-e.
“Nkha khai raleng khatdi gukhai raleng machunjiu wangmai, alad nkinglo.
Naliutu lungpadbo tu khatdi naliutu chupadbo turali situ makum khailo.
Naliu pao-peh, Abraham nai Sarah tu maningtao khailo, naliu pakai-kikdung yo,
Iniu Abraham tu kubo tingga, pah panah hakha-e,
chiudi Iniu patu thoikhaijiu paleng nahmai pikhai bi-e.
Iniu pakai-kik kengjiu pikhai bi-e.
“Iniu Jerusalem tu lungsabo lenkhaijiu,
nchum miboga lungbo mai hinatu lungsa khai bine.
Pagu kadihse kathaidih thiubam liudi,
Iniu Eden ga kareng kam khaibo kumjiu siga kareng pithiu khaine.
Siga chunwi-ringabo thiurabo-e,
thuonkiubo lui siniu atu thuon rabo-e.
“Amaidung yo, Iniu dinbo hai nkinglo;
Iniu jatdung situ katikhai bine:
Agu tacheng-tajai siniu paliu khuga kabenbo phungwangne.
Iniu majatjiu wang paliutu gukhaine;
agu chari ngambo tingse nawang sude.
I apumsiakniu jatdungtu mawangne.
Kadiubo kadih siniu I wangra khuan bamme,
paliutu gukhai rabo situ ramgun bamme.
Tinggen lam phuikhanglo, khatdi kadihga phuikiulo!
Tinggen hai mikhut kumjiu hamine, kadihse chafai kaguangbo kumjiu kekmine,
khatdi siga bambo maidungse tamang kumjiu shaimi rabo-e.
Siga Iniu phungwang rabo juringbo sira tingthengjiu bamrabo-e;
agu chari ngambo siniu loikhai rabo-e.
“Majibo situ simai, Iniu katikhaibo hai naliu chun ngutjiu nking khailo,
Maidungniu naliutu nuimenjiu kagaboga, naliu manangmi tulo;
paliura makhiu-tariniu tiu maha mibo fai kum hami rabo-e!
Chiudi Iniu phungwang rabo juringbo sira tingtheng bamrabo-e;
agu chari ngambose tingtheng leng-e.”
Sulo,
Nda nangniu kamkhai mibo kumjiu kam khailo.
Duipui-khao, Rahab tu
Duipui situ pisang khaijiu taduijiuga npui thiukhaibose nangniu-e,
sichiujiu nangniu gukhaibo maidungse sigasu kenpad lubo-e.
Nangniu gukhaibo mai siniu chunwi ringabo luise thiujiu khatdi senjiu
Jerusalem ga wangtang rabo-e, paliu tingthengjiu chunwi bamrabo-e.
Chariu-magenthiubose paliu khugasu tingthengjiu hami rabo-e.
“Naliu jeng pitan khaibose Iniu-e.
Piubon kumjiu kuinuang mirabo chamaina situ dekamjiu naliu pingralo?
Naliutu damkhai lujiu, tinggen situ juden khaibo
khatdi kadihpirigu kaphung donkhaibo
Naliutu kam mathadjiu kam maha mira kam bammai situ dekamjiu naliu pingjiu bamralo?
Paliu lungpomse naliutu niatang lakge.
Kavangkyga bambo mai situ khenrang thiura majatjiu phutkhai mirabo-e;
paliuleng pageng bambo tiutek hina pikhaibi rabo-e, paliu ringtheng rabo-e,
“I hai
Iniu duipui situ kam kabuak khaijiu kasuakbo khuan pipad khaibo-e.
Azan hai Ngamkambo,
Iniu kadihpiri phung hai donkhai lujiu tinggense juden khaibo-e;
Iniu Jerusalem mai khuga din-e;
‘Naliu hai amai-e! Iniu naliutu katikhaibo-e,
khatdi abenniu naliutu jukhaibo-e.’”
nangniu sise saklujiu maniujiu tad tangad lad-lad mide.
Natu jukhaira mai khatdi hamide.
Namaidung ruanggasu naben jukhaira mai khatnadi hamide.
Sansabose nariga nkiu mide, nagu kadihse chariniu kam maha mide
khatdi namaidungse kami-mi mide, natu lungsa khaira mai khatdi hamide.
Npui pake machangnaga namaidungse paliu jeng hajiu kaokiu bamme:
paliu hai maipiu thakga manmibo tathan kum mide.
Tingwang gu lungnotse paliuniu dao mide.
Jerusalem ga magenthiu bammai naliu,
jaw sak maniu maidungniu tad tangat lad-ladbo kumjiu bammai,
naliutu gukhaibo
“Alung pomjiu naliutu pikhaibo piangse Iniu luthon mine.
Naliuniu sak maniu lujiu tad tangat lad-lad bambo jawse naliuniu sakta mine.
Naliutu kam mathadjiu bammai,
naliutu npui-nchengga tabuitu kumjiu tao malui bammai
paliu khuga Iniu sise pikhai mine.”
Tingwang gu masanbo namdi yo, lungkawibo ponse piusulo!
Nkengmai siniu wadaodi nagu rengmun-ga ngut lanlak mide.
Jerusalem yo, naronna naphi kasam masan milo!
Tabuijiu gasu sulujiu nawangbam gase ntao milo!
Zion ga kavang thiujiu bammai yo,
naliutu bangkhaibo riangse khoipad milo!
Dithubo
Naliuniu Egypt dihga sangdiumai thiujiu lungra tadbo tingga naliu chunning gasu tadbo-e; chiudi Assyria mainiura naliuleng wadi pimakjiu manomjiu naliutu mintad mibo-e.

Sikumjiu tuhoi Babylon gadi padbo-e; naliu kavang thiumide, chiudi naliuleng wakhatnadi pimakge. Naliu riga mawangmai siniu wasao thiu-e khatdi chaliang saomakjiu chaliang-e, khatdi atu pombose len-e.
Pawanse wang dasai I hai Charawang si-e chiujiu Iniu dinkhai mibose, naliuniu suikhai sune.”
dejiukha maisuang halo!
Paniu chari ngambo khuanse senjiu Zion ga din-e,
“Naliu Rawang hai chawang-e!”
Namdi situ akhemai siniu chunwi-ringabo khuan sen aruangjiu bamme!
Nchum mibo Jerusalem yo,
chunwi-ringabo khuanse senpad sulo!
khatdi pamaidungtu pi amankhai bine.
haise kadihpiri pakhiangnaniu ngaorabo-e.
Babylon maitu saokhaira naliu kaden lulo!
Kakham-kaniubo maniase
naliu ronna kam masanlujiu phutmilo.
Thainai menra naliuniu kalangjiu tadra pageng ha-e,
naliuniu mahin mari tadra pageng ha-e.
Naliu Rawang,
pake hina lamsu naliutu gukhai bine.
“Avangpiura pangamse taphuang lurabo-e;
patu hai dijiu chakhuangthiu khai rabo-e.
Patu ngao khaiboga maidung kakengkha paliu suang hamide,
palunlung hai saju mibo jengniu chamailun ngaokhai tamide.
khatdi chawangdungse paliu suang hajiu wadi dinpadsi lulak mine.
Paliuniu patu ngaoboga, paliuniu wadaodi simatai makbo kasia sisan lune.”
“Aliugu champao haitu saoniu malum khai ralo?
Haiga
Pavangpiu siniu kasangbo kadihga pamen puak khangbo singbang kum rabo-e,
chiubo hai
Aliuniu patu wajeng chakkhaira pakhuga pazu-pazan kawibo maksai palunwat ha-e.
Pakhuga aliutu juwang raleng manguigaa wadi ha-e.
Aliuniu paken tiajiu lukhai mak tamibo-e,
magenthiu chariubose paniu khengkhai mibo-e.
Mai khatniudi patu phuikhai makge,
aliuniu patu hai wadi makbo kumjiu lukhaimak tamibo-e.
aliugu thiuniubo hinase paniu phungkhai mide.
Sichiujiu paniu chariubo khengkhai mibo hinase,
Tingwang niu langkhaibo sajai si-e, chiujiu aliuniu lukhai mibo-e.
aliuniu kasabo kamkhai mibo jengniu patu dapkhai mibo-e.
Paniu khengkhai mibo jengniu aliutu wikhai bide,
patu dapkhai bibo jengniu aliutu pi wikhai bide.
Aliuniu daobuibo sajaise
chiudi paniu sise manuanjiu khengkhai mibo-e; paniu ladkeng khatnadi dinpad makge.
Kamshat mira jutad kinbo milypoi kumjiu, pagiu kachipra jutad kinbo mily kumjiu,
ladkeng khatnadi pah dinpad makge.
Patuse minlujiu kamshat mira ladjan thiulujiu jutad mide,
pakhuga degu padralo chiubo mai khatniudi manang khai makge.
Aliu nuan jengniu patuse kamshat mibo-e.
paraw lengse kasamai ruangga kamkhai-e
khatdi kalek wimai ruangga patu nphum khai mibo-e.”
paniu shai khaibo shit hainiu kuak khaira phungwangbo rathak si-e.
Sichiujiu pah ringthengjiu pakai pakik ngaora leng-e,
agu chunning hai pakhuga tathui khai rabo-e.
Paniu chariubose khenglubo sai, chunwi-ringabose daolan rabo-e;
paniu chariu khengkhai mibose matha nchummi makge chiubo paniu si-e.
Iniu alung kimbo, kadinpiubo avangpiuniu maidung kakenggu sajai phungrabo-e,
sichiujiu papen gasu Iniu paliutu kuak khai rabo-e.
katheng-kadimai nai pumtan bammai ruangga pibam khaine.
Kasamaidung leng pagu ringtingse paniu chunwijiu pipad khai-e.
Paniu nuan phungmaidung malin thiujiu paliutu kuak khaira khengkhai mide.”
chiudi tuhoira nachun wijiu chalui thiujiu sensulo.
Tuhoira nanahdung hai, pakinaniu wadaodi
phutkhai makbo pui nah suang kengmi rabo-e!
Naliu lungbo mathenkyse kam madisan sulo;
chariangse kam matheng khai sulo,
khatdi ntuang tangse gen matip khai sulo!
Tuhoi katambo jatniu bambo naliu kadihse
naliu daolanjiu pakeh machang ramraise disanpad rabo-e.
Tuhoi kathaidih thiu bambo namdi hinase maidung lungphui mirabo-e.
Pingta sulo—nazu salanlak mide;
natu kam mangam lanlak mide.
Nangniu lakpuinamai khat thiubo wan-ga matun kamakbo lunlungse mangaimi rabo-e,
khatdi kamipuigu kamalibo chunsiatse mangaimi rabo-e.
Natu Dampao siniu nakina kummi rabo-e, pazanse Ngamkambo
Israel maigu masanbo Rawang siniu natu gukhai bine,
pahai kadihpiri pakhiangnagu mawangpao-e.
Israel mai haira, pakinaniu phut mijiu palung chariubo lakpui nahmai khat kum-e.
Chiudi
“Pakak khatleng Iniu natu phut khaibo-e
tuhoira karaiga suang lungsa diangjiu Iniu natu lukhai lanne.
Alung pomjiu pawan khat I mari mibo-e,
chiudi tuhoira tingthengjiu Iniu natu lungsabo hai lenkhai sune.”
Natu rankhaibo
kam mahalan makra ladriat thiukhai mibo-e.
Tuhoira natudi alung pomlan makra ladriat thiu khaibo-e;
Iniu natu kasanlan lakge, maksai sajai pilan lakge.
Ramluong nai luongbutdung minmibo sui-e,
chiudi Iniu natu lungsabo hai wadaodi pamalan thiu lakge;
khatdi agu agi-manaibo gu ladriatse Iniu tingthengjiu majai khairabo-e.”
Natu lungsabo
“Hey Jerusalem, nangra chariujiu bambo, mai khatniudi nkha khaira habo namdi-e,
Iniu nagu kaphungse paman kungbo tudung siniu thiukhai lankhai bine.
Iniu naky-tonse paman kungbo heng-marenbo tu siniu thiukhai bine,
chami kum taoban-satbo tu siniu nagu rengmunse thiukhai bine,
khatdi talatu siniu nagu singbengse thiukhai bine.
khatdi lungwibo nai agi-manaibose pikhai bine.
Nchangbo nai majibo siniu natu pitan khai bine,
kapingbo nai mathadbo gasu natu gukhai bine.
Mai khatniu natu chari thiusai, pase achun maniu makjiu kambo-e;
Natu aphenbo maidungse kaomi rabo-e.
“Nkungkee khatdi takap thin bambo chagi-aketmai situ Iniu dambo-e.
Chaheng-changiu thinlujiu maitu kamshatbo riphen tudi Iniu damkhaibo-e.
Chiudi chaheng-changiu wa khatniudi naliutu kam masalu lakge;
naliutu madam khaibo hina, naliuniu paokak buibo bamrabo-e.
Iniu avangmaitu gukhaijiu chari ngambose pikhai bine.”
Haise
“Tadui chari mai hina wanglo—haiga tadui bamme!
Naliu rangkang kahamai wangjiu alin-tara hai liulujiu tiulo!
Wangjiu, jaw nai kabui ndui liululo,
haise paman lulakge.
Nalung kim makbo gase deleng rangkang thinpiu khaijiu bam ralo?
Naliu phijengse pikhaijiu bamdi dekamjiu mariu bamjiulo?
Iniu kadinbo hai nkinglo,
sichiusai withubo tiutekse naliuniu tiu rabo-e.
akhuga wanglo chiusai naliuniu karingbose dao lune!
Iniu tingthenggu ladriatse naliu khuga thiukhai bine,
Iniu David khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo thoidamse naliuleng pikhai bine.
Iniu patuse jatdunggu jupao khatdi charipise pithiu khai bibo-e,
sichiujiu pakhu gasu agu pumtanse paliu khuga lenkhai bibo-e.
Tuhoira sangdiumaitu naliuniu kusune,
pawan khatra paliuniu simak bamniu-e,
chiudi tuhoira paliuniu naliu lam ponra pakwangsu rabo-e!
Haise Israel maigu masanbo Rawang, naliu
Iniu naliutu chakhuang thiubo khatdi paken dibose pikhai bine.”
tuhoi pah najiu bamme.
Kasamai siniu kasabo npuise phutlujiu
paliu lungchunse limi sulo.
Aliu Rawang
para majatjiu kuak khai sibo khatdi lungsasibo piu-e.
khatdi agu npui hai, naliu npui gasu tamme.
Tinggen siniu kadihpiri suang ku-nkiubo kumjiu,
a-npui nai alungchun hai naliu npui nai naliu lungchun suang ku-nkiu-e.
sise tingpuk lamsu kadihga kiujiu tadui kajin khai-e.
Haisiniu alinbangdung situ pipuak khang khai-e,
sichiujiu tiura katiu-kasak khatdi alin-tara pikhai-e.
Sise kumjiu Iniu dinpad mibo ladkengse,
Iniu karangbose kamkhai makbo thiu lakge;
Iniu kamraleng rangkhaibo hinase
sichiujiu kamsiak khai rabo-e.
“Naliuniu Babylon tu chunwijiu phutkhai rabo-e;
agi-manaijiu namdi gasu naliutu jupad khai bine.
Ramluong nai luongbutdung siniu chunwibo lui thiu sune,
khatdi singbangdung siniu chunwibo khuanse senpad sune.
Tuhoi thureng puakbo sung singchong bang,
khatdi tathuphe sung, maronpen bang pilung khai bine.
Haise tingtheng bamrabo madan si-e,
Tabamnaitu majaijiu thinmao makbo maitu Iniu thoikhai bine. Kasabo wakhatdi kammakbo maitu Iniu thoikhai bine.”
Papum kamshat mibopiu siniu, pah wadaodi panah lungngam lakge, maksai Tingwang maidung ruangga jaosi lakmide chiujiu wadaodi maning suilakge.
niu sikumbo mai khuga din-e. “Nangniu Tabamnaise majai mawisai, khatdi nangniu alung kimbose kamsai, khatdi agu ladriatse majai mawisai,
natuse atu Kahumbokyga, nanahpiudung khatdi nanahpuidung bambo suang nkiujiu nazanse maningtao khairabo-e. Natu wadaodi mangaimi lakge?”
“Iniu naliutu agu masanbo luang,
Dithubo

Paniu din-e, “Jupaodung, maidungtu kachu khaira maidung hinase pamik katiat maidung-e! Paliu wadi simakge. Paliura ngin-makbo thihase kumbo-e, paliura jilujiu paliu-mang manbo ronna-e. Paliura dejiukha jinilo!
Paliura patiuni sabo, wadaodi kabuibo daomakbo thidung kumbo-e. Haibo jupaodung hai paliu chun, paliu-ra thiu makge. Mai hinase pamaning-ning kamjiu, paleng-leng kagengbo phiu-e.
Jaw sak maniubo maidungniu din-e, ‘Aliuniu jaw tamnakha phiukhe, sichiujiu aliuniu saklu buithen sak khaikhe! Nsuannai thainai suang wi-nkiu rabo-e!’”
Kawimaidung shaimi-e, siga mai khatniudi sikhai makge maksai waleng chak khaimakge. Chiudi paliuniu kashaiboga magenthiu-chariubo siniu, paliutu wakam masa ngamlakge.
Kawibo ringtingga lungkhai mibo maidungse agi-manaibo dao-e khatdi kashaiboga mathak mi-e.
Naliu nuan phungmaidung ladjan thiuraleng haiga wanglo! Naliu haira tathoi kathinmai, mainao-mainahky kiumai khatdi kamakhamai suang wisonbo makge.
Naliuniu saotu nuimen bamjiulo? Ka-aratbo naliuniu saotu kaga bamjiulo?
Naliuniu masanbo singbang phiga npui-npiu thiujiu chara miujanpuitu kahumne. Singgiu mungga bambo tulimki gase naliu nahdungtu rathak mania thiujiu naliu kahumme.

Naliuniu siga tatukang kamanaibo khoilu wang paliutu chara kumjiu kahumme. Naliuniu siga jaw liangkhaijiu khatdi alin-tara phungwangjiu kadkhai-e. Sisetu I achun wirabo-e chiujiu naliuniu maning jiuma?
Naliu maluang kakubo gase charathiu raleng khatdi npui-npiu thiura tadle.

Naliuniu matai-kamarengbo ramengdungse naliu akham saiga denkhai-e. Naliuniu atu phutmibo-e; naliuniu naliu fai-nidung gaopad lujiu, naliu zi kadibo gase, naliuniu maluangji khaira paman pimibo naliu maraidungtu maluanglu ji-e. Siga naliugu npui-npui thiunibo lungchunse kimkhai mibo-e.
Naliuniu parim wibo khatdi pakim wibose manuk lujiu khatdi khoilujiu Molech ratu kahumra tadle. Sibo radungtu daora khatdi kahumra naliuniu kadiulam, charuidih tangbo chamang phungmaitu langkhai-e.
Naliuniu katam-tambo ratu phiujiu naliu chiasiak mide, chiudi naliu mathaklu makge. Naliugu matai kamarengbo ramengdung siniu naliuleng pumtan pikhaijiu naliu malaita lakge chiu maning-e.
Naliuniu kambose maji-e chiu naliu maning-e, chiudi Iniu naliugu n-khai-alise madupad sune, siga naliu ramengdung siniu naliutu nkhakhai ngam lakge.

Naliuniu nkha khaira khengbo tingga, naliuniu kahumbo ramengdung siniu naliutu pijiu gukhailo! Tingkai siniu paliutu hunthonmi rabo-e! Chiudi atu malum maidung siniu haibo kadihga lungjiu Araky gasu atu kahum rabo-e.”

“I hai kakubo khatdi masanbo Rawang, tingtheng ringbambo piusi-e. Ira kakubo khatdi masanbo bamga lungbambo-e, chiudi lung manuanbo khatdi palung limibo amaidung khugadi lungjiu paliu chun kam mawikhai ngamme.
Iniu amaidung ringting pikhaijiu, paliutu tingtheng alung pomjiu paliutu ladjan thiujiu bamlakge. Iniu paliutu tingtheng kammaojiu ladjan thiu bamsai, amaidungse shaikam mirabo-e.
Paliu nuan nai paliu tiuni-sabo jengniu, alung pomjiu, Iniu paliutu sajai pikhaijiu paliutu thonmibo-e. Haise paliu lung tanbo khatdi paliu chunning npui tadbo jengniu-e.
“Paliuniu tenkhai mibose Iniu ngao-e, chiudi Iniu paliutu wikhai bine. Iniu paliutu jukhaijiu, nkha khaine, khatdi achungjiu bambo maitu Iniu kam matha khaibine.
Kadiulam bambo maitudi, kanaga bambo maitudi, Iniu agi-manaibose pikhai bine! Iniu amaidungtu wikhai bine.
Chiudi kasamaidung sira mathak silakbo duipui kasuakbo siniu kataniabo nai kararen phungwang saomakjiu bambo kum rabo-e.
Nuan phungmai lengra nbaibam wadi ha-e,” chiujiu

Paliuniu atu naimachangna kahumjiu, paliuniu alad sikhai nijiu khatdi majai khaini paliu sang bamme chiujiu din-e. Iniu paliuleng majibo tacheng-tajai pikhaira, khatdi paliuniu atu kahumni siak bamme chiujiu paliuniu din bamme.”
Maidung siniu maniu-e, “
Naliuniu kalumribo gasu naliu lung kampom, khatdi naliu lung sajiu maitu n-gi-athao-e. Haikumbogu kalumribo siniu naliu rathoise Iniu chiukhai bine chiu naliu maning jiuma?

Naliuniu kalumribo tingga, naliu ronna naliutu kam chariu khai-e, chapiuniw kumjiu naliu pee makiang kiujiu tabui jiuga maliufai hamlujiu ji-e. Sikumbo situ naliuniu kalumribo kujiu ma? Sikumbotu Iniu alung kimlu bui-e chiu naliuniu maning jiuma?
“Iniu lunibo kalumribo sira; Maitu kam mathadbo riangse khipad milo khatdi majimakbo wongkhamse luthon milo, sichiujiu paliutu khenrang pithiu khai milo.
Kamariumai situ maluang tiulo khatdi kalek sajiu paky hamaitu naky lekhai bilo. Benra wadi kahamai situ chafai pikhai bilo, khatdi nasingna siaktu nkha khaira suimakbo thiutulo.

“Sichiusai Iniu naliu lam chapjiu naliu riga nsuan naimik kum thaokhai bine, khatdi naliu jamse wikhai nuang bine Iniu naliutu gukhaira pawan machang maluang khaine, pake hina lamsu Iniu naliutu gukhai bine.
Naliuniu kakheng thiuboga, Iniu paokakkhai bine. Naliuniu atu kuboga, Iniu kenkakkhai bine.
“Kasabo lunlung hina, kasabo ladkeng hina kam mathadbo hinase kam mahakhai lujiu;
kamariu maileng katiu pikhaijiu khatdi pageng bam maitu pikim khaisai, naliu mungga bambo tamiubose n-nien kum benmi rabo-e.

Sichiujiu Iniu naliutu jukhaijiu wa kawibo siniu naliutu pikimkhai bine, Iniu naliutu pitan khaijiu naliutu wikhai bine. Naliu hai tadui kakengbo kareng kum, maksai wadaodi luangsao makbo singgiu kum rabo-e.
Nda, matha nchum mibo phung rigase naliuniu thiusu lanrabo-e. Samibo kidung khatdi karengdung situ naliuniu thiukhai lanbo-e chiubo mainiu naliutu sirabo-e.”
naliuniu atu machabo gasu wangrabo chunwibose daorabo-e. Iniu naliu pao Jacob khuga pikhai mibo kadihga lungjiu kadihpiri pakhiangnaniu naliutu chakhuang thiukhai rabo-e, chiujiu
Haise naliu nuan jengniu, naliu rathoi chiukhai makbo-e. Naliuniu patu kahumra kamboga, naliu nuan siniu naliutu Tingwang khugasu ju-npek mibo-e.
Naliuniu aratbo gasu, wakasa kambo gasu khatdi maitu kamshatbo gasu mao mibo-e.
Naliuniu ladjankyga tadle, chiudi majibose naliu khuga ha-e. Naliuniu ngam lura, naliu arat din-e. Maitu kam masara naliuniu warang-e.

Naliuniu maitu kasa kamra rangbose patai-karabo kaniu bum kumgap-e. Sibo bumse kampang padsai, kaniu padle! Chiudi naliuniu wakasa rangbose wadi kawibo padlakge paliura takepui renniu kadakbo fai kum pageng kahabo-e!

Naliura pawan machang kasabo ronna rang-e, sisetu naliuniu khuan lenlakjiu bamme, pamao kahamaitu naliuniu kamshatra manang makjing-e. Naliu tadkhaibo bam hina naliuniu kam mahakhai-e khatdi kam masa-e.
Sichiujiu naliuniu tadkhaibo bam hinaga mari khairabo bam ha-e. Naliuniu kambo hina maji makge. Naliuniu tadbo npui sira kamaobo-e, sibo npuiga tadkhai mibo mai khatnadi marisi lakge.
Maidungniu din-e, “Aliutu kam mathad bambo mai khugasu, dekamjiu Tingwang niu aliutu gukhai makjiulo, chiubo tuhoira aliuniu silude. Aliuniu kabenboga tadkhaini-e, chiudi tamiubo ronna-e,
sichiujiu pamik tiadmai kumjiu, aliu kametjiu tad bamme. Aliuniu charuidihgu tamiuboga tadbo kumjiu, n-nien tingga gadi, nchun kumjiu aliu phi masui-e.
Aliu manang-e khatdi aliulung chariu-e. Mathadjiu bambo gasu khatdi kammaojiu bambo gasu aliutu gukhaira Tingwang tu aliuniu ramgun-e, chiudi wadi pad makge.
Aliuniu natu atungjiu, natu suimakjiu nasai suita mibo-e. Aliuniu maitu kam mathadjiu nakhu gasu aliu maritad mibo-e. Aliu maning hai kamaobo-e khatdi aliu ladkeng hai ka-aratbo-e.
Kamajibo situ luthon mide, siniu nchangbose wang mana silak mibo-e. Mathiu ruangga kamajibose paphi masui mide, siga ka-nchangbo lungchun wadi ha-e.
Siga masanbo lungchun hawang mibo jengniu, mai khatniu kasa kamta misai, pase kamao kammaigu miktunpiu
Mathadjiu bambo maitu mai khatniudi nkha khaira habo ngaolujiu pasuang hamide. Sijengniu pagu pumtan thinlujiu, paliutu gukhaijiu charise pi ngam khaine.

Paniu majibo situ charipuan ntiang kum, khatdi juringbo pumtan situ pirun kumjiu piurabo-e. Paniu wahinatu kam maji khairabo lungchun katanbo siniu, kamao kamjiu chariu khengbambo situ chakhum ruikhaira khatdi sajai pikhaira kadenjiu bamme.
Paniu pagu mikremaidung situ, paliuniu kadiulam lungbam tadi, paliuniu kamkhai mibo saisuijiu sajai pirabo-e.
Tingbang lamsu, tingnu lam tangbo mai hinaniu patu khatdi pagu pumtan situ pingkam rabo-e, paniu singgiu duiliu kum khatdi katanbo tingthung kumjiu wangrabo-e.

Iniu naliu khuga ladrian thiukhai bine; tuhoi gasu tingthengjiu naliuniu alad piujiu naliu nahdungtu naliu kaikikdungtu wangrabo chaken machangna alad majai raleng katikhaira Iniu agu pumtan nai agu katikhaibo hai naliu khuga pikhai mibo-e.”
Jerusalem yo, sulujiu naimik kum thaoben sulo.
Katambo jatdung tura tamiubo siniu gomnam mirabo-e.
Chiudi
pagu kabenbo nbiu siniu natu maluang khaine.
Jatdung situ nagu nbiuga juwang khaine,
Chawangdung situ nagu nsuan tingben karaiboga puiwang khaine.
Degu padbamlo chiubo ajanjiu phiulo;
Namaidungse chaky lam wangra madui bamme!
Nanahpiudungse kadiubo dih lamsu wang sune;
Nanahpuidung situ ngenadungtu kumjiu ponwang sune.
Naliuniu haise ngaosai chunwiboniu phui rabo-e!
Naliu chun wijubo jengniu machao sune.
Jatdunggu chakhiu-chalanse duipui hugen lamsu naliu khuga phungwang sune.
Kontraodungniu phungkinbo kadibo bangdungse Midian nai Ephah lamsu wang sune.
Sheba lamsu kachia nai parimwibose phungwang sune.
maidungniu paowang sune!
Kedar nai Nebaioth gu mily hina nakhuga rathak mania thiujiu phungwang sune.
Haise
Kamuang kumjiu tadmen-men wangkinbo maleedung hai degulo?
Makhao kumjiu chakylam lenwang kinne.
Maleedung haise kadiubo kadih lamsu,
Tingwang maidungtu paliu kylam phungwang kinbo-e.
Paliuniu Israel maigu masanbo Rawang,
pamaidungtu jat hinaniu chakhuang thiura paniu kamkhaibo-e.
“Sangdiumainiu naliu rengse thiu lanrabo-e.
Paliu wangdung siniu naliutu macha rabo-e.
Alungpom gasu Iniu naliutu sajai pikhaibo-e.
Chiudi tuhoira Iniu naliu lam ponjiu lungsabo lenkhaine.
Sichiujiu jatdunggu chawangdung siniu
paliugu chakhiu-chalanse naliuleng phungwang rabo leng-e.
Natu macha makbo jatdung situ kam maha kammi rabo-e.
“Kahiu sing, juniper sing khatdi singchong sing,
Lebanon mariu gasu withubo singse luwangjiu Jerusalem natu thiu sulan rabo-e.
Atu kahumboky lunse piwi khaira kamjiu,
agu namdise pakendibo pi thiukhaine.
chakhuang thiubo lenjiu nasuangga makhumkiu rabo-e.
Natu wajeng simak maidungse wangjiu naphiga makhumkiu kahum rabo-e.
Paliuniu natu, ‘
‘Israel maigu Masanbo Rawang Namdi, Zion, chiujiu kurabo-e.
“Nkamkui mibo khatdi nchum mibo namdi,
natu hai manihjiu wadaodi phutkhai lanlak mide,
Iniu natu kadibo khatdi palun kawibo pithiu khai bine.
Tingtheng-tingthengjiu chunwi-ringabo bam pithiu khai bine.
Maipui khatniu panahtu akhi-taliubo kum,
Jatdung nai chawangdung siniu natu akhi-taliu rabo-e.
Israel maigu ngamkambo Rawang niu natu khenrang pi thiukhai bibo-e.
“Iniu naleng tanaagi sung kachia,
khatdi chagi nai tasing sung rangkang nai tataaginiu
khatdi tatu sung chagi phungwang rabo-e.
Nagu mawangpaodung siniu natu kam mathad lanlak mide;
Iniu paliutu majibo nai agi-manaibo siniu pi mawang khai bine.
Kabuakbo khuanse chiulan lak mide,
naliu kadih haitu kam maha lanlak mide.
Iniu singbeng khat kumjiu sungkhai bine khatdi gukhaibi rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu gukhaibo jengniu naliuniu atu thuon rabo-e.
Maksai nchun tingga chahiu biuse pageng bamlak mide.
Palamra
Agu kendigu nbiu siniu naliu riga benbammi rabo-e.
Naliugu magenthiu chariubo tingmikse hamine.
Chahiu naimik suang tingtheng bammi rabo-e.
Namaidung siniu kamajibose kam rabo-e,
Haibo kadihse tingtheng naliugu thiurabo-e.
Iniu paliutu lingkhaibo-e, khatdi paliutu damkhaibo-e,
Mai hina khuga agu kendise paliuniu madulen khaira leng-e.
Siamthubo nai manonthubo kikhun siniudi
katanbo nai kadibo jat kummi rabo-e.
Kabuibo wanse wangtang dasai,
Iniu haise majatjiu pipad khaira-e.
I hai
Lunglakmai khuga kawicham phungwangjiu
magenthiu-chariu maitu wikhaira,
kavangkyga bam maitu phutkhai raleng,
paniu atu kadalujiu langwangbo-e.
paliugu mikremaitu ngamkhai rabo tingse wangkin-e
chiubo senpadra paniu atu langwangbo-e.
Chunsajiu achung bambo maitu
pijiu chunwi khaira atu langwangbo-e.
Zion ga chunsajiu bammai khuga achungbo sung chunwibo nai ringabo,
chunsabo sung thuonbo lui thiu rabo-e.
Paliu hai
Paliuniu majibo hina kam rabo-e.
Paniu kamkhaibo pagu tienkam jengniu
Tingwang tu thuon rabo-e.
Pating thengjiu nkamkui mibo namdise paliuniu thiusu lanrabo-e.
Amaidung yo, sangdiumaidung siniu naliutu macha rabo-e.
Paliuniu naliugu khaoruitu khuanrabo-e.
Naliu kadihse paliuniu tenjiu naliutu akhi rabo-e.
Naliu hai, aliu Rawang vangmai-e
khatdi
Jatdunggu chakhiu-chalanse naliuniu thinrabo jengniu
naliu wasaothiu lulo.
Naliugu kamangambose hami rabo-e.
Naliuniu naliu kadihga lungrabo-e.
Naliugu chakhiu-chalanse damnia nkiujiu kengkhang rabo-e.
Naliugu chunwibose tingtheng rabo-e.
“Iniu majibo situ luni-e, chiudi maitu mathadbo nai chakhui-chamao situ mareng-e.
Iniu amaidungtu majijiu paliu phijeng pirabo-e
chiujiu tingthenggu ladrian thiukhai rabo-e.
Paliu hai jatdung ruangga pazan katadmai thiu rabo-e;
Paliutu ngaomai hina siniu paliutu Iniu thoikhaibo-e chiubo simi rabo-e.”
Pahai chamipui khatniu pagu magiangbo pon khailujiu kabam kumme.
Tingwang niu patu hai chari ngambo nai juringbo siniu papuan thiukhai-e.
Pasyse puakkhangjiu dikhangbo kum,
Dithubo
Siga jat hinaniu patu thuon rabo-e.
Jerusalem tu kathuat khaibo chamse Iniu dinpad sune:
patu ranlu makthen I maliumak silakge;
Pagu chari-ngambose nchun kahiupuang kum ben-e.
Jerusalem yo, nagu chari-ngambose jat hinaniu ngao rabo-e!
Paliugu chawangdung siniu nagu kendibose ngao rabo-e.
Nang hai
Natu hai “Phutmibo,” chiujiu kulanlak mide.
Nagu kadih haitu “Luta mibo Nao,” chiujiu kulanlak mide.
“Tingwang niu palung kimbo Nao,” chiubo kasanbo zan siniu kumi rabo-e,
Pagu kadih haitu “Chunwijiu thiulubo Nao,” chiujiu kumi rabo-e
Palamra
Sijengniu pahai nagu kadih kina kummi rabo-e.
Khangnamai khatniu liuchangpuitu panaoleng lubo kumjiu,
Natu dampaoniu natu magiangjiu lurabo-e.
Naopaopiuniu naopaopui khuga pachun wibo kum,
Na-Rawang siniudi nakhuga pachun wirabo-e.
Jerusalem yo, narengtu khuanra Iniu akhemaitu langkhai nbamme;
Nchundi, n-niendi maliu makjiu paliu bamsi lakge.
Paliuniu
Paniu paliutu wadaodi mangai lakge.
Jerusalem tu paniu gukhaijiu, kadihpiri pakhiangnaniu thuonbo namdi pithiu khaijiu kalanlu makthen,
paliuniu patu pi mathak khai lakge.
Pagu pumtan thinlujiu kamkhai rabo-e.
“Naliugu miusyse naliugu mikremai tatek thiuta mirabo-e.
Sangdiumai siniu naliu jaw saklanlak mide.
Chiudi naliuniu lingkhaibo nai atiat lubo
miusy nai taruakse naliuniu tiu-sakjiu
Naliuniu tadlujiu khom madui lubo mumsy siniu kamlubo jawse
atu kahumboky ladzan bamga sak rabo-e.”
Jerusalem mai yo, namdi lenlamse padlujiu,
Namaidung malanwang kinmaileng puidi thiu sulo!
Npuise thiujiu, tukangdungse khoithon milo!
Jatdungniu silura madan kam khailo.
Paniu ranlu maitu puilujiu wangkinne,”
Natu hai, “Tingwang gu Masanbo Maidung,”
Jerusalem haitu, “Tingwang niu lungsabo Namdi,”
“Tingwang niu Mangai makbo Namdi,” chiujiu kumi rabo-e.
“Haise pumtan bambo
“Dekamjiu mumsy tao manuijiu jaw thunbopiu kumjiu paniu haijiukha kahengbo pon piujiulo?”
Amaidungtu gukhaira pawan wangtang mide, sichiujiu paliugu mikremaitu sajai pikhai rabo-e, chiujiu alung chap mibo-e.
Atu nkha khaira maidi habose Iniu ngaoboga asuang hamide chiudi agu lungpom siniu atu pitan khaijiu Iniu aronna charise ngamlubo-e.
Alungpom gasu Iniu jat hinatu tao malui lujiu kam marakhai mibo-e. Paliu ringting-zaise Iniu kadihga runkhai mibo-e.”
Aliuleng paniu kam khaibo hina jengniu Iniu patu thuon-e.
Pagu lungsasibo nai saomakbo lungsiat penniu,
Israel maitu paniu thoidam dijiu pikhai bide.
Haise maza khatniu makge, chiudi
Karai gasu paniu paliutu manang khaijiu bambo-e, chiudi paliuniu patu atungjiu pagu masanbo hiupuina situ kam magenthiu khaide. Sijengniu
Chiudi paliuniu
Mose khuga pagu pumtan siniu duipui situ njan khai lujiu, pamaidungtu kasuakbo duiliu gasu jupad khaijiu paken dibose tingtheng leng kamkhaibo
Khaoruidungtu piubuan kawibo ramjengga maluang khaibo kum,
Nang hai aliu piu-e. Aliu pao, Abraham nai Jacob siniura aliutu suikhai tamibo-e, chiudi

Dekamjiu nangniu aliutu nagu npui gasu piron mahakhai jiulo? Dekamjiu nangniu aliu lung pitan khaijiu nakhu gasu pi marikhai mijiulo? Natu machakhai mibo mai, pawan machang namaidung jeng gasu malanwang khailo.
Nagu masanbo maidung, aliutu pawan khat, aliugu mikremainiu hathon mibo-e; paliuniu nagu masanbo rathakbam situ taomalui khai mibo-e.
Nangniu aliutu wadaodi mawangkhai makbo kum, wadaodi namai kamakbo kumjiu kamkhai mibo-e.
Dekamjiu tingpuk situ kampang lujiu kiu makjiulo? Ramluong siniu natu ngaoboga pingbo siniu kaphik rai-raimi rabo-e.
Paliura kathiubo mi riga lang kala bambo tadui kum, kaphikrai-rai mirabo-e. Wangjiu nagu pumtanse nagu mikremai suangga madukhai sulo, Sichiujiu jatdung situ nasuangga pijiu kaphikdi-di khailo!
Aliuniu maningmak jingbo wan ga nang wanglujiu kapingbo kamkhai mibo-e, siga ramluongdungse natu ngaolujiu pingbo siniu kaphikrai-rai khai mibo-e.
Patu malumbo maileng haikumbo kamkhai-e chiubo mai khatdi ngao matai makha-e, maksai chiu matai makha-e.

Majibo kamjiu chunwi maitu nangniu lukhai-e, khatdi nachun ningga lungkhai mibo maitu maningtao khai-e. Aliuniu nuan kammibo jengniu, nalung pomme, nalung pomjiu bamliudi, aliu hai nda gasu kamaobo kamjiu bambo maidung-e.
Aliu mathiu nuan kam mide, aliugu withubo ngamkam katangna taniachang tania mibo-e. Aliu nuan jeng gasu, aliutu ntang mibo singniwtu kumjiu tingkainiu hunthon mibo-e.
Mai khatniudi nakhuga kakhengthiura wangmakge, maksai mai khat niudi nkha khengra wangmakge. Aliu nuan jengniu nang aliu khugasu nbai mide khatdi aliutu luthon mide.
Chiudi nangra aliu piu-e,
Siniu nalung pomjumi khai tulo maksai aliu nuantu tingtheng chakkhaijiu bam tulo. Aliu hai namai-e, aliutu lungsa khailo.
Nagu masanbo namdidung hai ramjing kum, Jerusalem hai nkamkui mide,
khatdi aliu paopehdungniu natu thuonbo, masanbo khatdi palun wibo bam aliu Rakyse chaminiu kam maha mide. Aliuniu masenbo bam hinase nchum mide.
yo, haise nangniu manang khai mak jiuma? Wakhatdi nang kamkhai lakma, aliutu haichiu pijiu magenthiu-chariubo khengjiu bam rama?
Paliu lung tanjiu kasabo ronna kamjiu paliu maningga tadjiu bam maitu Iniu sundaora kadenjiu bambo-e.
Paliuniu mangammak jingjiu alungpom kamjiu bamme. Paliuniu masanbo karengga
Nchun kiusai paliuniu tulimkiga khatdi charao lam tadjiu kashaimai mahiutu npao-e. Paliu kavak zandi tiu, nkengmai rathakga kadkhaibo ganduidi langlu sakge.

Sichiujiu paliuniu kakimai khuga din-e, ‘Aliu khuga bamtam milo, aliutu naliu niatao ralengdi aliura masan chang masan-e!’ Sikumbo maidung khuga I bamsi lakge, wadaodi midmakbo mise kumjiu paliu riga alung pomjiu bambo-e.
“Paliugu sajaise Iniu chapkhai mide khatdi raokiukhai mide. Paliuniu kammibose Iniu phui kamakbo thiu lakge.

Paliuniu kammibo khatdi paliu paopeh mainiu kammibo nuan jengniu, Iniu paliutu malan khai rabo-e. Paliuniu nkengmaigu maluang rakyga parim wibo mataojiu khatdi aken din masa mibo-e. Sijengniu karaiga paliu tienkam saisuijiu Iniu paliutu sajai pirabo-e.”
Iniu Judah kiphiuga bammai Israel maitu thoikhaijiu, paliuniu ramluong kadihse lurabo-e. Atu machabo maidungniu siga lungrabo-e.
Paliuniu atu kahum rabo-e, khatdi paliugu milydung nai khaoruidungse tingnulam bambo Sharon-gu Ramjengga, khatdi tingbanglam bambo Chariubo Ramjengga puitadjiu pi tagikhai rabo-e.
“Chiudi agu masanbo Zion luang tu phutmibo, sichiujiu tasan kawibo, chaphaw kawibo radung Gad nai Meni tu kahum maidung naliuleng tamsin khai rabo-e.

Naliu sanset sira kapingbo shit gasu shairabo-e, palamra Iniu naliutu kubo tingga naliuniu paokakkhai makge, maksai Iniu kadinbose naliu nkingkhai makge. Naliuniu alad majai makjiu kasa kamrabose kadalude.

Sijengniu naliu khuga Iniu dinbo-e chiubora alad majaijiu atu kahumbo mai siniu tiura-sakra kengjiu daorabo-e, chiudi naliura mariujiu tad rabo-e, khatdi chari rabo-e. Paliura chunwi rabo-e, chiudi naliura mangam rabo-e.
Paliura ringajiu chalui thiune chiudi naliura lungchun magenthiujiu kaprabo-e.
Iniu kadalubo maidung siniu naliu zan thenjiu tasiang siangrabo-e. Dithubo

Sibo kadihga lungbo mai khatniu thoidam khengsai Chamchangbo Rawang niu thoikhaira khengrabo-e. Mai khat kumboniu tasiang siang sai Chamchangbo Rawang zan-ga siangrabo-e. Nda masuanggu magenthiu-chariubo hinase mangai kammi rabo-e khatdi hakammi rabo-e.”
Iniu kasanbo gandam kambo jengniu naliu chunwijiu ringalulo. Kasanbo Jerusalem, Iniu damkhaibo sira chunwi-ringaboniu phuijiu bamme, siniu pamaidungdi chunwijiu bamme.
Jerusalem jengniu khatdi pamai jengniu I apumsiak chunwi-ringaboniu phui bamme. Siga kapbo bamlakge, wa-nkha khengbo bamlakge.

Ngena siniu pamnah thiujiu shailakge, paliu mathiu paliu-lun lungbui lungrabo-e. Takum kai khat lungkhai maidungse chabuan maileng chakkhai rabo-e. Sibo masuang shai misai, Iniu paliutu sajai pikhaibo madan-e.

Maidungniu chaky thiulujiu paliu ronna lungne--siga mai katambo maidung lunglakge. Paliuniu mumsy reng kamlujiu jaw kamsakne sise mai katambo maidungniu saklakge. Singbang kumjiu amaidung ringtheng rabo-e. Paliuniu kamkhai mibo hinase paliuniu daojiu chunwi rabo-e.
Paliu ngamkam hina taphuang rabo-e, khatdi paliu nahmaidung siniu chariu magenthiubo daolakge. Iniu paliutu khatdi paliu kaikikdungtu thoikhai rabo-e.
Paliuniu khengloi makha gasudi, Iniu paliu rathoise paokak khairabo-e.

Tanydung nai milypoidung maluang katiu tiune, ndongquidung siniu, khaoruidung kumjiu magao tiurabo-e, khatdi kaniuse patai karabo thiulan lak mide. Agu masanbo luang, Zion gase wakhatdi kahabo, maksai kasabo thiulan lak mide.”
I apumsiakniu ting-kadihpiri pakhiangna haitu damkhaibo-e! Palung manonjiu khatdi palung lilujiu alad majaimai riga, Ira alung kimbo-e.

“Maidung siniu paliu maning ronna kamme. Paliuniu kabuichi ponlu charathiu bamdi, chamainatu ponlu charathiu bamdi, milypoi kadkhai bamdi tathi-wong romkhai bamdi, alin-tara kadkhai bamdi kavak-zai kadkhai bamdi macham kamna-e. Kahumbo haitu kammeng kamwang khaibotu paliu diu wi-e.

Sijengniu, paliuniu pingthubogu magenthakse Iniu paliu riga phungwang khaine, palamra Iniu paliutu kuboga paliu kenkakkhai makge, maksai Iniu kadinbose paliuniu nking khai makge. Paliuniu alad majai makjiu kasabose kamrabose kadalubo-e.
Patu pingjiu palad majai maidung,
Kinglo! Namdiga khatdi Charakyga chakhuan kario-rio bambo khuanse,
Haikumbose mai khat kumbo ngao matai mima, maksai chiu matai mima? Jat khat hai naikhat gasu manalubo bamma? Zion niura jat khattu manara pating thengjiu chariu kheng lakge.
Iniu amaidungtu paliuniu manarabo tingga pijiu mana khailakge chiubo naliu maningmi tulo.”
Jerusalem tu maluang chunwi khailo;
pajeng gasu chunwi khailo, namdi haitu lungsamai hina!
Pajeng gasu chunsa khai mibo mai,
tuhoira patu maluang lujiu chunwi khailo!
Ngena khatniu papui ndui tupjiu chunwibo kum,
patu maluang chunwi macham khailo.
Jerusalem ga papuiniu panahtu hiambo kumjiu Iniu naliutu hiam khaibi rabo-e.
Haise padbo nangniu ngao dasai nachun wirabo-e; haisiniu natu pitan khai rabo-e, khatdi napum pi wikhai rabo-e. Siga nangniu,
Chami nai chaheng siniu pamao-pameng bambo mai hina situ sajai pirabo-e, siga maidung kakengkhatu kamshat mirabo-e.
Iniu paliu lungchun khatdi tienkam hina si-e. Jat hinatu khom maduira I wangkinne,
Paliuniu wang maduiboga, agu pumtan hainiu degu ngamlo chiubo ngaosune, khatdi paliutu sajai pibose Iniu-e chiubo silu rabo-e.

“Chiudi paliu khangsia maitu, Iniu kadiulam bambo jatdung, wadaodi akendi chiukhai matai makbo, maksai agu pumtan ngao matai makbo; Spain lam, Libya lam khatdi Lydia lam, tavaipi thin sibo maitu maluang lujiu Tubal lam khatdi Greece lam langkhaimi rabo-e. Sibo jatdung ruangga paliuniu akendi hai dinron rabo-e.
Paliuniu jatdung khugasu namaidungtu akhuga kalen thiujiu phungwang rabo-e. Israel maidungniu charakyga masanbo rathakgu miusy phungwangbo kumgapjiu paliutu agu masanbo luang,
Paliu khangsia maitu Iniu singkumai khatdi Levi mai pithiu khai bine.
Hiusan gu Changee hinaga khatdi Tabamnai hinaga, jat hinaniu Jerusalem haiga atu kahumra wang rabo-e,” chiujiu

“Paliuniu tadpadboga, atu mikre maigu kashai-phawse ngao sune. Paliutu tiubo masanpuise wadaodi shai lakge, khatdi paliutu rubo mise wadaodi mid lakge. Paliugu lunlung haitu mai hinaniu phuikhai chariusu rabo-e.”
Haise Benjamin kadihga bambo Anathoth namdigu singku khat thiubo, Hilkiah nahpiu Jeremiah niu dinkhaibo cham raokhaibo ariakkhuang-e.
Amon nahpiu Josiah niu Judah gu chawang thiubo takum kariu-je-sumkiuboga
khatdi Josiah nahpiu Jehoiakim niu chawang thiubo wan ga paniu pakhuga dinlan-e. Sibo saiga, Josiah nahpiu Zedekiah niu mawangbo takum kariu-je-khatkiubo tingga katang
“Iniu natu dam makhabo masuang gasu Iniu natu kada lubo-e, khatdi natu mana makhabo suangga, Iniu natu jatdunggu phaimiukakung thiura leng kadapad mibo-e.”
Iniu paokakge, “Kuthubo
Sichiudi
Paliutu pingmi tulo, palamra natu gukhaira Iniu maluang khai rabo-e.
Sigasu
Thainai Iniu natu jatdung khatdi chawangdih tu pamen peh thonra, khatdi kamkao mira, kam nchum mira, khatdi luthon mira, sigasu thiusu lanra khatdi lingsu lanra pumtan pikhaibo-e.”
Iniu paokakge, “Talaobang ke khat ngao-e.”
Sigasu
Iniu paokakge, “Tingpilam chali khat tahjiu bambo ngao-e, khatdi sise tamaliam mira kum bamme.”
Paniu akhuga din-e, “Haibo kadihga lungbambo maidung mathiu riga nchummi rabose tingpi lamsu wangrabo-e,

palamra tingpilam bambo mathiutu wangraleng Iniu kujiu bambo-e. Sichiujiu paliu wangdung siniu Jerusalem gu rengmun ga khatdi sibo mungga bambo rengdung khatdi Judah gu namdi katam-tambo gadi paliugu chawangbamse thiusu rabo-e.
Iniu amaidungtu sajai pirabo-e, palamra paliuniu nuan kam mide; paliuniu atu phutmide, khatdi kakibo ratu akadjiu charathiu mide, khatdi charameng kam lujiu sisetu kahum mide.
Kaden sulo, Jeremiah yo, tadlujiu Iniu natu dinra chamtan pibo hina paokhai sulo. Tuhoira paliutu pingta sulo, maksai nangniu paliutu majang bambo wan ga ping nkiura Iniu natu kamkhai rabo-e.

Nkinglo, Jeremiah yo! Haibo kadihga bambo mai hina, --Judah gu chawangdung, chakampaodung, singkudung, khatdi amaidungniu natu atungrabo-e. Chiudi thainai nangniu paliutu khamlu rabogu pumtan Iniu natu pikhaibo-e; nang hai chagitiangniu khatdi tataaginiu singbeng kam lubo namdigu charireng kumrabo-e. Paliuniu natu sunlu lakge, palamra natu gukhaira Iniu natu majang bamrabo-e.
“Naliuniu nahtingga dejiukha malum matiplo chiubo Iniu maningtao-e,
ania majang lung karaibo tingga nangniu atu dejiukha lungsalo;
wadaodi alin lingkhai makbo kathaidih gase nangniu asai suikhai mibo-e.
Israel mai yo, naliura agu ronna-e, naliu hai agu masanbo mania si-e.
Naliutu kam masabo mai hina riga Iniu chariu magenthiubose langkhai-e.
Jacob kaikikmai naliu, Israel mai kiphiudung naliu,
niu din-e;
“Naliu paopeh mainiu atu atungjiu degu atu madam khaira phungwanglo?
Degu kamjiu paliuniu akhu gasu marimi jiulo?
Paliuniu pageng habo charamengtu kahum mide
sichiujiu paliu ronna pageng kahabo mai thiu mide.
Iniu paliutu Egypt dih gasu ranpad lujiu, kathaidih, nbuidih, kasangbo dih
mai khatnadi lungmakbo maksai, mai khatnadi tadkhai makbo kapingbo kadih gasu
paliutu ramjingga maluangpad khai bide, chiudi paliuniu atu wajeng chakkhai makge.
Paliuniu paliu miusy atiat lujiu khatdi kawibo hina lutaojiu bamra
Iniu paliutu kadihtam kawiboga puiwang khai bi-e.
Sibosung paliuniu agu kadihse kam masa mide;
Iniu paliutu pikhaibo kadihse paliuniu kam tania mide.
“Dega
Agu singkudung siakniu atu simakge.
Mawangpaodung siniu atu atungjiu chari thiu-e;
phaimiukakungdung siniu Baal zan ga din-e,
sichiujiu pageng habo charamengtu kahum mide.
“Haichiujiu
Paliu kaikikdung riga agu tathuse Iniu phungwang rabo-e.
Cyprus gu chapiukak tingnulam tadsulo,
sichiujiu Kedar kadih tingbang lamse mai khattu langkhai sulo.
Siga wadaodi nda pad matai makbose naliu ngaosu rabo-e.
Katambo jatdung siniura paliu rase kachangmak bamliudi, wadaodi kali makge.
Chiudi amaidung siniura paliutu Iniu chakhuang thiujiu kakibo radungniu
kam ngamlakbo kamkhai bidi, wadi kam ngamlakbo radungtu thinlujiu Charawang atu nkhiak mide.
Sijengniu tingpuk haitu kapingbo siniu tun kanuk khaira Iniu chamtan pikhaibo-e,
siga kapingbo nai maisuang habo padrabo-e.
Palamra amaidungniu nuan nia kam mide:
kamasingbo duipin, akhu gasu paliu maritad mide,
khatdi paliuniu wadaodi tadui madun khai silakbo nkak mibo akhunse chukhai mide.
“Israel mai hai kavang makge; patu hai kavangleng lungwangbo makge.
Dekamjiu pagu mikremai siniu patu hakin jiulo?
Ndongqui kumjiu paliuniu patu kahiu marungjiu bamme;
paliuniu pagu kadihtu kathaidih pithiu khai mide,
khatdi pagu namdi hai kam maha lujiu kam nchum mide.
Yo, Memphis mai nai Tahpanhes mainiu
pagu tapeerongse kampang mide.
Israel mai yo, haise nangniu naronna nariga phungwangbo-e!
Iniu nagu puitadga maluang khaijiu bamdi, na-Rawang,
Nangniu Egypt dihlam malanwang lujiu Nile giu gasu tadui sak lanbo siniu
degu pageng daolune chiu maning jiulo?
Assyria lam malanwang lujiu Euphrate giuki gasu tadui sak lanbo siniu
degu pageng daolune chiu maning jiulo?
Nagu kasabo siniu natu sajai pirabo mide,
nangniu akhu gasu maritad mibo jengniu natu ladjan thiurabo mide.
Nangniu agu kadinpiu makjiu,na-Rawang
dejiukha salo, dejiukha khalo khatdi dejiukha maomilo chiubo nangniu silu sune.
Dithubo Ngamkambo
Dithubo
“Israel mai yo, naliuniu agu pumtan haitu nda gasu lukhaita mibo-e;
naliuniu alad piura khatdi atu kahumra suita mide.
Maluang kakubo hina riga khatdi madiakbo singbang hina hangga
naliuniu chara miujanpuitu kahum mide.
Iniu naliutu withubo alinpum gasu kadalubo mumsy ken kumjiu lingkhaibo-e.
Chiudi phuilo naliu hai ndekum milo!
Naliu hai tenmibo khatdi pageng hamibo mumsy ken kum mide.
Withubo tagaotaa siniu naliutu nkhiu bamdi,
naliugu kamaobo jamse Iniu ngaobam rabo-e.
Dechiu naliuniu naliu pumtu kam tania makge chiujiu din ngamlu ralo?
Baal tu wadaodi kahum makge chiubo naliuniu dechiu din ngamlu ralo?
Ramjeng gase dechiujiu nuanse naliuniu kamkhai mibo gulo chiubo phui matailo.
Nang haira kathaidih ga, nkan qontraoniu, wonrabo ting wangtang mijiu, pak mariu kabam kum mide.
Paniu wonni mibo tingga, saoniu patu thinman ngam luralo?
Patu wonkhai nibo pachi siniu patu paronna kam chariu sonra ha-e.
Patu wonkhai rabotu pawan machang para khuanjiu bambo-e.
Israel, mai yo, kakibo radungtu hajiu naliu jeng hata sulo, khatdi nakhu sangjiu bamta sulo.
Chiudi nangniu din-e, ‘Daolakge! I malanwang ngam lakge.
Ira sangdiumai radungtu lungsa mide sichiujiu paliu sai suitad mine.’”

Naliu mathiu mangam rabo-e naliuniu singbang situ naliu piu-e, khatdi tatukang situ naliu pui-e chiujiu din-e. Naliuniu akhuga malan wangrabo sung naliuniu akhu gasu tad mari mibo jengniu haise padrabo-e. Chiudi naliuniu chariubo wan ga, naliu khuga wangjiu naliutu rankhaira naliuniu akhuga kheng-e.

“Naliuleng naliuniu kasiam kalubo radungse dega bamlo? Paliuniu ngamme chiusai naliuniu chariubo wan ga, paliutu pijiu naliutu ranlulo. Judah mai yo, naliugu namdi kengjiu bambo kum, naliu radungdi kengjiu bamme.
Naliuniu suimakjiu bambose degulo? Naliuniu dekamjiu atu atungjiu chari thiubam jiulo?
Iniu naliutu sajai pi-e, chiudi haisiniu suimakge, naliutu pijiu kam maji khaira suimakge. Palung singrejiu bambo ndongqui kumjiu, naliuniu naliugu phaimiukakungdungtu gimide.

Israel maidung yo, Iniu dinbambo hai nking khailo. I hai naliu khuga kasabo kadih, tamiubo kadih khatdi kathaidih kummi jiuma? Sichiusai dekamjiu, naliuniu akhuga wadaodi malanwang makjiu naliuniu kam kanibose kamne chiu dinbam jiulo?
Liunamai khatniu patiu-pata maksai chamipuiniu pagu chami puonse mangai ngamlu buima? Chiudi amaidungra pating kathengkha atu mangai mide.
Lungsamaitu dechiu hatad ralo chiubo naliuniu simasan bamme. Sathubo pui siniudi naliu khugasu alilu bui-e.
Naliu fainiga lunglak mai zai nai pamao kahamai zai siniu kaniang kakhuak bamme, sise kasamai zai makge.
“Chiudi haikumbo hina hai padbam tadi,
naliuniu din-e, ‘I hai amao-ameng ha-e;
Naliuniu kakibo jatdunggu radung khulam maritad mibo jengniu naliu ronna naliutu kam mala mide. Assyria maidungniu naliutu kam khaibo kumjiu, Egypt mainiu naliu chun kam masa khai rabo-e.
Mangambo gasu naliu pi makhum lujiu Egypt dih gasu naliu tadpad rabo-e. Naliuniu malummai situ

Maluang ton hina gase phuikhang matailo. Siga nangniu chakhapui kumjiu kam khai kamakbo bam bamma? Kathaidihga Arab mainiu pathiu-pari piutu chon kabam kum, nangniu nagu maraidung situ khuanjiu bamme. Nagu makhabo tienkam hainiu kadih haitu kam tania mide.
Sichiubo jengniu ting hai malang mibo-e, khatdi kariak tingriudi wangta mibo-e. Nang hai chakhapui kumjiu bamdi, wadi mangam makge.
“Khatdi tuhoira nangniu akhuga din-e, ‘Nang hai apiu-e, sichiujiu I nahdao tinggasu nangniu atu lungsa khangbo-e.
Nangra pawan machang nalung pomjiu bam lakge; nangniu tingthengjiu atu suimakbo thiulakge.’ Israel mai yo, haichiujiu nangniu dinbo-e, chiudi nangniu kangam katang kasabose kam mibo-e.”
Paniu pakhiangna haise kam mibo saiga maomakjiu akhuga pah wanglan sune chiujiu Ira maningbo-e. Chiudi pah malanwang makge khatdi pagu nchang kamakbo hinase pah-singnapui Judah niu ngaolude.
Iniu Israel maitu tamibose Judah mainiudi ngao-e, sichiujiu paniu akhugasu maritad mibo jengniu patu hathon mibo-e, sichiu bamdi Judah mai siniu ping makge. Padi chakhapui thiu mide,
khatdi wadi mangambo thiu makge. Paniu kadih haitu kam tania mide khatdi tasingpek tatukangtu kahumbo gasu makha mide.
Haichiubo sai Israel maigu singnapui, Judah mai siniu akhuga malan wangbo thak kumjiu kamme; chiudi pagu tienkamga nsisiakjiu kam makge.
Sigasu

Iniu tadjiu Israel mai khuga dinkhaira paniu akhuga dinkhai-e, “Matun kamak Israel mai yo, akhuga malan wanglo. I haira lungsa sibo-e, siniu alung pomlak mide; Iniu naliutu tingtheng alung pomjiu bamlak mide.
Na-Rawang,

“Nchang kamakbo maidung yo, malan wanglo; naliu hai agu-e. Namdi hina gasu khangkhat-khattu khatdi chaphiu hina gasu khangnia-niatu Iniu kadalujiu, khatdi Iniu naliutu Zion Luong lam maluang wanglan rabo-e.
Alad kapiumai siniu naliutu mawangra Iniu kamkhai bine, sichiujiu paliuniu tasi nai ningting siniu naliu riga mawang rabo-e.

Sigasu sibo kadihga chalun kingpad rabo-e, siga maidung siniu agu Ladriat Bung lamga wadi dinsuan lakge. Paliuniu sise makum khai lakge maksai maningtao lakge; sise paliuleng pageng hamibo-e, paliuniu kakibodi kamlan lakge.
Sibo wan wangboga, Jerusalem haitu, ‘

Israel mai nai Judah mai khat thiumi rabo-e, khatdi tingpilam kavang thiutad mibo kadih lamsu aruanglujiu paliu wangrabo-e khatdi Iniu paliu paopehtu tingtheng leng paliugu thiura pikhai mibo kadihga malanwang rabo-e.”
“Israel mai yo, Iniu natu anahpiu thiukhai ni-e
sichiujiu naleng withubo kadihse pikhaini-e.
Nangniu atu apiu chiujiu kubo Iniu luni-e,
sichiujiu wadao khatdi akhu gasu maritad lanmakbo situ Iniu luni-e.
Chiudi nchang-kamakbo nao khat kumjiu,
nangniu akhuga nchangta mide.
Maluang ton gase chakhuan khat chiu-e:
Haise Israel mainiu kapjiu khengbambo-e,
palamra paliuse nuan lunlungga lungkhai mide
paliuniu paliu Rawang
paniu naliutu wikhaijiu naliutu nchangbo mai pi thiukhai bine.
Naliuniu din-e, “Yo, aliu hai
Maluang ton riga nkeng maigu kahumbo siniu aliutu wadi nkha khai makge. Israel maitu nkhabo haise aliu Rawang
Chiudi kamangambo ra, Baal tu kahumbo gasu aliugu khaorui, matom-kabui, aliu nahpuidung, aliu nahpiudungdi hakam mide, aliu paopeh mainiu nda kamkhai diakbo hinadi kam maha kam mide.
Mangambo siniu aliu jikiura mide, kamangambo siniu aliutu gomnammi sulo. Aliu paopeh mainiu khatdi aliiuniu, aliu Rawang
chiusai naliuniu chamtan thinjiu ladrian thiubose maji rabo-e. Sichiusai, Iniu paliutu thoidam pikhaira jatdungniu akhuga khengsu rabo-e, sichiujiu paliuniu atu thuon rabo-e.”
Judah mai nai Jerusalem mai, naliu
Sibo kadih pakhiangnaga make mudkhailo!
chakhuan tanjiu khatdi masan siakjiu senpad khailo!
Charireng bambo namdidung gase pakkhai raleng
Judah mai nai Jerusalem mai khuga dinkhai bilo.
Zion npuise siokhai bilo!
Kasa daomak raleng paksulo! Ribam tasulo!
kam nchum rabose phungwang kinne.
Ndongqui khatniu pa-nbaibam gasu padbo kumjiu,
jatdungtu kam maha raleng tadpad mide.
Paniu Judah tu kam maha mira wang kinne.
Judah gu namdidungtu kam nchum mirabo-e,
siga mai khatnadi lunglulak mide.
Siniu maliufai benlujiu, kaplulo khatdi achunglulo.
palamra
Sigase Iniu din-e, “Dithubo

Kathaidih gasu wa kam masa rabo tingkaise paliu khulam hunwang kinne chiujiu Jerusalem mai khuga paokhai rabo wanse wangkinne. Sise manuonbo tingkai lakge, sise magaoreng ronna hun thonrabo tingkai makge—
gu chamtan gasu wangbo tingkai haira sisuang tan nkiu rabo-e! Haise
Phuilo, mikremaise kamuang kumjiu wangkinne. Pagu charigu chaqon-karise nbui maribo kumme, khatdi pagu chaqondungse lengreng suang majadle. Aliura hamide! Aliura nchum mide!
Jerusalem yo, nalungchun-ga kasabo hinase kam masan milo, sichiusai naliutu rankhai bine. Nangniu nuan phungbo lungchunse dethengkha makumjiu bamralo?
Dan namdi nai Ephraim luang lamsu champao phungbo maidung siniu kasabo ladse dinmadu bamme.

Mikre maidungse kadiubo kadih lamsu wangkin-e sichiujiu paliuniu jatdungtu kachan khaira wangkin-e chiubo chamse Jerusalem mai khuga paokhaira-e. Sibo mikremaidung siniu Judah namdidungtu atungjiu senpad rabo-e,
khatdi chalu akhemai kumjiu Jerusalem tu taoweng magui mirabo-e, palamra pamaidung siniu
Judah yo, nangniu lungkhai mibo, khatdi kamkhai mibo gasu haise nariga wangbo-e. Na-nuan jeng gasu chariubo haise padbo-e; haisiniu namalung rijiu bambo-e.
Chariubo! Iniu chariubose kheng ngamlak mide!
Amalung! Alung hai tuk-tuk mide! I maliu makjiu bam lulak mide;
make khuan nai chariga senbambo khuanse I chiu bamme.
Kasabo hai khat saiga khat wangjiu bamme;
kadih pakhiangna kam nchum mide.
Bungjiu aliugu mathenkyse kam maha mide;
sibogu zusungfai sidi ketap-tap mide.
Dethengkha chari thiubo khuan nai
make mudbo khuan hai Iniu chiubam ralo?
Paliu hai kapangbo nahmaidung kumme, paliura wadi simakge.
Paliura kasabo ronna kamsi-e, chiudi kawibo ngamra kamsi makge.”
Iniu kadih haitu phuikiuboga—haise mathakhubo kathaidih si-e:
tingpukga—kabenbo wadi hamide.
Iniu maluongdungtu phuiboga—sise malai-e,
khatdi luongbutdung hai kangaklad-lad bamme.
Siga Iniu mai khattudi ngao makge; thingna katangdi lentad kam mide.
Kadihtam wibo ramse kathaidih thiu mide;
(Kadihpiri pakhiangna haitu pijiu ramjing thiumi rabo-e, chiudi paniu haisitu kam mahakam siak lakge chiujiu
Kadihpiri hai nchung rabo-e, tingpuk hai tamiu mirabo-e.
Paniu palung chapkhai mide sise kam kadat lanlak mide.
Chaqon tongmai nai tavaipi thinmai khuanse chiuboga, mai hina pakmi rabo-e.
Khangsianiu mariulam pakkhai surabo-e, khangsianiu chakhao-turen ga pakkhang surabo-e.
Namdi hina nkamkui mirabo-e, siga mai khatnadi lunglan tami rabo-e.
Jerusalem yo, nangra nchum mide!
Dechiujiu nangniu heng marenbo pon piubam jiulo?
Dechiujiu nangniu tatiu-tataa khailujiu khatdi namikga wa manuk khai bamjiulo?
Wadi pageng habo leng nangra karujiu bamme!
Nagu lungsa maidung siniu natu lukhai tamide, natu kamshatni mide.
Maipui manathad khuan kumbo Iniu chiu-e,
haise manarai thubo manathad khuan kumme.
Haise Jerusalem niu siudi thijiu kapbo khuan-e,
paben henpadjiu din bamme, “Ira nchum mide!
Paliuniu atu kamshat raleng wangkinne!”
Jerusalem mai yo, naliu npui gase pak sulo!
Ajanjiu phui khailo! Naliu ronna phuilulo!
Tajonky gase matadjiu phuilulo!
Mai khatniu majibo kamjiu Tingwang khuga nchangjiu kam bambo maitu daolu buima?
Naliuniu daolusai,
Nangniu
nangniu dinbo gase nachun ngut makge.
Pachangjiu
Paniu natu kakhiu khai-e, chiudi nangniu nalung ngutkhai makge.
Siga Iniu makumme, “Haiga lunglakmai nai wasimakmai ronna-e.
Paliu hai kapangbo lunlungga lung bamme;
paliu Rawang niu masenbo situ paliu simakge,
Iniu pumtan jaojiu paliutu npaorabo-e, paliu Rawang niu degu masenlo,
Chiudi paliu mathiuse
Sijengniu mariu lamsu ndongquidung siniu paliutu kamshat mirabo-e;
kathaidihga bambo tanidung siniu paliutu phettap-tap mirabo-e;
khatdi paliugu namdi gasu quirukdung siniu paliu riga machak thon rabo-e.
Sibo maidungniu tadpadboga, paliu nuan kengbo jengniu
khatdi Tingwang khugasu tingtheng maritad mibo jengniu paliutu phetbiang-biang mirabo-e.
Paliuniu atu phut lujiu kachang makbo ratu kahum mibo-e.
Amaidung magiu makthen Iniu pikhaibi-e, chiudi paliuniu npui-npiu lungmao mi-e,
sichiujiu paliu ringtingse makhaboga lungkhai mide.
Paliu hai pamaiwibo chaqonchi siniu charangbo kumjiu,
pakiningmai naotu majang khaini lenlak bamme.
Haikumbo haitu Iniu sajai pikhai mak tarama?
Haikumbo jat situ chakhum ruimak tarama?
Iniu mikremaitu langkhaijiu amaidunggu mumsy kense ramtap mirabo-e,
chiudi paliutu kam mahasiak lakge.
Pakedungtu riothon mira paliu khuga dinkhaine”
palamra sibo kedungse agu makge.
Judah mai nai Israel maidungniu atu jon masan siak mide.
Phaimiukakungdungse wadi makge, paliura pakhuan-palee kengbo ronna-e khatdi paliuniu
Israel maidung yo,
Paliu rimai sira katanbo tavaipi thinbo maitu lungsa makjingjiu kamshat mai-e.

Paliuniu naliugu mumsy, alin-tara, katiu kasak tiu mahami rabo-e. Paliuniu naliu nahpuidung, naliu nahpiudungtu kamshat mirabo-e. Paliuniu naliugu khaorui-khaona khatdi matom-kabuidungtu kamshatmi rabo-e, khatdi naliugu mumsy nai ndut bangdungse kam mahami rabo-e. Naliuniu maning mawi bambo namdigu charirengse paliu rimainiu kam maha mirabo-e.

Iniu dekamjiu haidungse paliu khuga kamkhai jiulo chiujiu paliuniu maniuboga, Jeremiah yo, paliutu dinbilo, chiubora paliuniu akhugasu maritad lujiu paliu kadih gasu sangdiumai ratu macha mibo jengniu-e, sichiujiu paliuniu sangmai dihga, zusimak maitu macha rabo-e.”
Naliu haira kapangbo khatdi kamengbo mai-e, naliu mik bamdi ngaomakbo, khatdi naliu kuon bamdi chiu makbo maidung-e, chalung ngutjiu nking khailo.
I hai
Chiudi naliu hai, naliu kuon tan-e khatdi kadinpiu makge, naliuniu akhugasu mari lujiu tad mide.
Iniu takum machangna naliuleng kariak tingriu nai chaken tingriu pikhaijiu takum machangnagu atiat pikhaijiu bamdi naliuniu atu chakhuangthiu khaira wadaodi maningkhai makge.
Chiudi sibosung, naliu nuan siniu kawibodung haise naliu khugasu lupad mibo-e.
“Amaidung ruangga kasamai lung bamme; paliu hai nthingnatu manra tathak thiukhai kabam kumbo-e, chiudi paliugu tathak sira chamaitu manra thiukhai nbambo-e.
Thingna thak kathiubo piuniu thingnaniu parekse khaiphui nbambo kumjiu, paliuniu maigu sungwangbo mania siniu paliu ky khaiphui nbamme. Haijengniu paliu lungwijiu pumtan bam mibo-e,

sichiujiu paliu tatek kawi jengniu paliu-mai wijiu bambo-e. Paliu thak kasabo nai paliu tienkam kasabose pamalan thiu makge. Paliuniu kami-magennahtu kamajibose pikhai makge maksai mathadjiu bam maitu majibose lenkhai makge.
“Haijeng gasu
Mai kapingbo nai ka-chariubose haibo kadihga pad bamde.

Phaimiukakungdung siniu ka-aratbo makjiu wadi din makge, phaimiukakung maidungniu chamtan pibo saisuijiu singkudung siniu mawang-e, sise amaidungniu sui makbo wadi thiu makge. Chiudi wahina pamalan kawangbo naise paliu nde kamralo?”

Benjamin maidung yo, wakasa daomak raleng paklulo! Jerusalem gasu mari milo! Tekoa ga make mud khailo, khatdi Beth Hakkherem ga chaminiu madan kam khailo. Magenthiu chariubo nai nchummi rabose tingpi lamsu wang kinne.
Zion namdi hai palun wi-e, chiudi haise kam mahami rabo-e;
Chawangdung siniu paliu rimaitu majang lujiu siga rijiky thiukhai sune.

Paliuniu din sune, “Jerusalem maitu aphenraleng kaden sulo! Kaden sulo! Aliuniu niending tingga aphen sukhe!” Chiudi sigase paliuniu dinrabo-e, “Rijumine, n-nien tingse hawang mine, khatdi chawan ramliang wangjiu kahiu kaokiu mide.
Nchunniu aliu aphenne; aliuniu namdigu karengse kam masami rabo-e.”
Ngamkambo

Akhun ga tadui kawibo chung kabam kumjiu, Jerusalem hainiu pagu kasabo siniu phui bamme. Namdi gase n-gi-athaobo nai ka-kabuakbo khuanse Iniu chiu-e; mara thiuniubo nai ajam thiuniubo hina Iniu ngao-e.

Jerusalem maidung yo, haibogu magenthiu chariubo siniu kachan khaibo thiululo, sichiu maksai Iniu naliutu phutmi rabo-e; Iniu naliugu namdi situ mai khatniudi lungmakbo kathaidih pithiu khaimi rabo-e.”
Ngamkambo
Iniu paokakge, “Iniu paliutu kachanjiu dinsai saoniu alad nking khai ralo? Paliu kuon tanne khatdi nagu champaotu nking khaini makge; nangniu atu dinra pikhaibo haitu paliuniu nui menne.
