yo, nangniu paliutu pomjiu bambo lungthad siniu atudi rujiu bamme, khatdi Iniu haise khengngam lulak mide.”
Siga
Paliu kydungse kakimai khuga pimi rabo-e, sichiujiu paliu ludung nai paliu naodung tudi pimi rabo-e. Iniu haibo kadihga lungmaidungtu sajai pirabo-e.
Mai hina, kati-kadi tam makjiu, chalung masan makjiu rangkang lura kamme, phaimiukakungmai nai singkumai katangdi maitu sontiu-e.
Amaidung jamse masakjam kumjiu paliuniu kamme. Agi-manaibo hatadi ‘Agi-manai bamme’ chiujiu paliuniu din-e.

Haikumbo kamangambo ngamse paliuniu kambo jengniu paliu zu samak jiuma? Wadi makge, paliura wadi kamangambo cheng simakge, paliu zudi hengriang makge. Sijengniu maidungniu kaomibo kumjiu paliudi kaomi rabo-e. Iniu paliutu sajai piboga, sise paliugu kaloibo thiumi rabo-e.
Chiudi paliuniu din-e, “Makge, aliu tadlakge.”
Siga
Sijengniu
Kadih yo, nking khailo! Paliugu ngamkam jengniu paliutu kam mahami rabo sajai haise Iniu phungwang kin-e, palamra paliuniu alad piumakge khatdi agu katikhaibotu lukhai makge.
Kadiubo kadih lamsu maruta, maksai Sheba lamsu paliuniu parimwibo akhuga phungwangbo situ Iniu wajeng chak khai rama? Paliu maniakad situ maksai paliu rathak mania situ Iniu alung kim makge.
Sijengniu haibo maidungtu Iniu paliu phi pimasui khaijiu kamkaomi rabo-e. Papiudung nai panahdung shairabo-e, sichiujiu chakadung nai kining maidung shairabo-e.

Paliuniu paliugu tavaipi nai chahengse thinsu mide; paliu hai sa-e, khatdi maitu lungsasi makge. Paliuniu chaqon tuanglujiu pakbo khuanse duipui kasuakbo khuan kumme. Paliuniu Jerusalem tu atungjiu aphen raleng kaden lude.”
Jerusalem mainiu din-e, “Aliuniu champaose chiulude, aliu benjeng hajiu thud-thud mide, maipui khatniu manathad khengbo kumjiu, magenthiubo lungchun siniu phui mide.
Aliuniu namdi lenlam khatdi npuiga tadpad huta mide palamra aliugu mikremai siniu chaheng-changiu thinlujiu, aliutu taoweng mide.”
Jeremiah yo, nangniu chagitu madiubo kumjiu, amaidungtu madiu lulo, paliu hai dekumlo chiubo phuilulo.
Paliu hai chagi nai tataagi katanbo kumjiu, paliu mathiu kuon tanjiu kadinpiu makge. Paliu mathiuse paliu lung masan makge, tadronjiu maiken tia-e.
N-mang gase chamitao mathiu bamme, chiudi pageng hamibo chagi haira thiupadjiu luangpad makge. Amaidungtu kam mawilan raleng pageng hamide, palamra paliu khuga kasabo mai situ luthonmi makge.
Paliutu pageng hamibo chagiba chiujiu kurabo-e, palamra
Judah maidungniu Charakyga kahumra wangboga rengmun gase
Ka-aratbo chamtu malumbo gasu mathak milo, ‘Aliura wadi manang makge! Haise
“Naliuniu kam bambo ngamse sao lujiu, naliugu lunlung hai kali milo. Naliuniu khat khat khuga wijiu khatdi nchangjiu kam lulo.
Sanglamniu lungwang mai, khatdi kami-magennah khugasu genglubo ngamse kam tamilo. Haibo kadihga pamao hamaitu kamshat tamilo. Kakibo radungtu kahumbose tamilo, siseniu naliutu kam mahami rabo-e.
Naliuniu kali misai Iniu naliu paopeh maileng tingtheng paliugu thiuraleng pikhai mibo kadihga hai Iniu naliutu pijiu lungkhaine.
“Phuilo, ka-aratbo chamtu naliuniu malumjiu bamme.
Naliuniu agatiu-e, chamaitu gi-e, mainao-mainahky kiu-e, aratbo dinjiu tasiang siang-e, Baal khuga akadjiu charathiu-e, khatdi naliuniu karai masuang simakbo ratu kahumme.
Iniu marengbo haise naliuniu kamme, sichiujiu Iniu bambo, Arakyga wang chaplujiu, haichiu din-e, ‘Aliura wadi manang makge!’
Atu Kahumboky haise agatiumai nbaibo bamme chiubo naliuniu maning jiuma? Naliuniu kam bambose Iniu ngao bamme.
Atu kahum raleng Iniu kadapad raibo bam Shiloh
Iniu naliu khuga dinlan-lanjiu bamdi, naliuniu sibo nuan hinase kamjiu bamme, naliuniu alad haitu lukhai makge. Iniu naliutu kuboga, naliuniu paokak khai makge.

Sichiujiu Iniu Shiloh ga kamkhai mibo kumjiu naliuniu malum bambo Araky haigadi Iniu kamkhai rabo-e. Iniu Shiloh ga kamkhai mibo kumgapjiu naliuleng khatdi naliu paopeh leng pikhaibo bam haigadi Iniu kamkhai rabo-e.
Naliu singnamai, Israel maitu hathonpad mibo kumgapjiu Iniu naliutu amasuang gasu hathon padmi rabo-e.
Paliuniu Judah gu namdi lungga khatdi Jerusalem gu npui-nchengga degu kambamlo chiubo nang ngaomak jiuma?

Nahmaidung siniu tasing nkhoi wang-e, maipiudung siniu chami thiusude, khatdi maipuidungniu Tinggen gu Chawangpui kubo charapui leng, takhui matin lujiu taruak khuakge. Paliuniu alung kampom khai raleng, kakibo radung khuga jawse liakjiu kadkhai bamme.
Chiudi paliuniu kam masa bambose atu ronna jiuma? Makge, paliu ronna paliutu kam masa bambo-e khatdi paliu ronna paliu riga mangambose phungwang bambo-e.
Sichiubo jengniu Dithubo
“Amaidung yo, chara kathiubo kasiara naliuniu rathakbam ga rukhai kam mide, khatdi kasiara tiuraleng naliuniu suikhaide. Chiudi
Iniu naliu paopehtu Egypt dih gasu majang npadboga, rukhaibo-kadpat maksai kakibo rathak thiura chamtan paliu khuga pikhai makge.

Chiudi alad majaira paliutu chamtan Iniu pikhai-e, sichiusai Iniu paliu Rawang thiurabo-e khatdi paliuniu amaidung thiu rabo-e. Sichiujiu Iniu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu paliuniu lungsai wahina hai paliuleng wilu rabo-e.

Chiudi paliuniu kadin piumakge khatdi paliu lung ngutkhai makge. Sibosung, paliu kuon katanbo nai paliu lung kasabo siniu masenbose paliuniu kamme, siniu paliu wikhang rabo sung sa-nkiu diang-diang mide.
Naliu paopeh mainiu Egypt dih gasu npadbo nai gasu thainai tangbo, Iniu naliu khuga, avangmai phaimiu-kakungdungtu Iniu langkhaijiu bambo-e.
Chiudi mai khatniudi lukhai makge, maksai chalung ngutkhai makge. Sibosung naliu paopehmai suang, naliu kuon tandiang-e khatdi kadin piumak diang-e.
“Siniu Jeremiah yo, nangniu haibo chamdungse amaidung khuga dinkhai rabo-e, chiudi paliuniu nalad nking lakge; nangniu paliutu kurabo-e, chiudi paliuniu paokak khai lakge.
Haibo jat siniu paliu Rawang
“Jerusalem maidung yo, achung lulo;
naliu pitham kakid lujiu taliang milo.
Maluong ton gase kashai kanuibo lui thiulo,
palamra
“Judah maidungniu kasabo ngamse kam mide. Iniu marengbo paliugu charamengse araky lungga ponwangjiu kam tania mide.

Hinnom gu Ramjeng gase paliuniu Topheth kubo rathakbam khat thiu khaijiu, siga paliuniu paliu nahpuidung khatdi paliu nahpiudungtu chamiga charathiu khaira kamme. Haichiujiu kamra Iniu paliutu chamtan pikhai makge, haise alungchun-ga wadaodi maningpad makge.

Sijengniu, Hinnom gu Ramjeng maksai Topheth chiujiu kuta mirabo wanse wang kinne, chiudi Wakhao Kamshatbo Ramjeng chiujiu kumi rabo-e. Siga paliuniu maidungtu nphum khaine, palamra charawbam leng pabam kakilam hami rabo-e.
Chaphawdung situ thingnadung nai nkan khaodung siniu paliu tatek thiurabo-e, sichiujiu paliutu mai khatniudi hathon khaira hami rabo-e.

Haibo kadihse kathaidih thiumi rabo-e. Judah gu namdidung khatdi Jerusalem gu npui-nchengga matha-ringabo khatdi tanao-tanah thiujiu chunwibo khatdi chakhuang-changee thiubo khuanse Iniu kam mahami rabo-e.
“Sibo wan ga Judah maigu chawangdung nai chakampaodung, khatdi singkudung nai phaimiu-kakungdung, khatdi Jerusalem ga lungbo mai hina rahse, paliu rao gasu kaladpad mirabo-e.

Paliu rahdungse khoi madui lujiu nphum khai rabo sung, kadih-tam kumjiu kadihga nkhuang marapu bammi rabo-e. Paliuniu lungsabo, khatdi machabo, khatdi paliuniu npaojiu kahumbo chahiu, naimik, khatdi chagandung masuangga paliutu kam marapu khai mirabo-e.
Sichiujiu kasabo jat gasu ring masiak kalumai, Iniu pilung mara khai mibo maidung siniu ringbambo suang kashaibo situ masensu rabo-e. Ngamkambo,
Pamaidung khuga dinkhaira
Sichiusai, amaidung, naliuniu dekamjiu malanwang makjiu, akhugasu tadmi jiulo? Naliura naliugu charameng situ thin matip lujiu akhuga malan wang raleng suini makge.

Iniu nking mawijiu nking-e, chiudi naliuniu majibo ladse din makge. Mai khatniudi pagu kasabo situ manang khai makge, ‘Iniu degu kamaobo kamkhai mijiulo?’ chiubo mai khatniudi maniu makge, chaqonniu charibamga paktad kinbo kumjiu naliu mai hinaniu pa-npui pui lam pakjiu bamme.

Aluak niudi dekumbo wan ga malan ralo chiubo si-e; sichiujiu makhaodung, takainadung khatdi kadainadung niudi dekumbo wan ga pabam kaliralo chiubo si-e, chiudi amaidung yo, naliura naliutu mawang bambogu tacheng-tajai hai degulo chiubo simakge.
Dechiujiu naliu ningting-e khatdi naliuniu agu tacheng-tajai si-e chiu dinjiulo? Phuilo, chalung masan makbo wakasimai siniu agu tacheng tajai haitu kam kali mide.
Naliugu ningting maitu kam mangam mide, paliu chun thiupad silak mide khatdi tathakga man mide. Paliuniu achamtu lukhai makge; tuhoira paliugu ningting dega bamjiulo?

Sijengniu paliu luse Iniu papao kasan maitu pikhai mine khatdi paliu naose kakimai khuga pikhai mine. Mai hina, kati-kadi, paliu lung masan makjiu rangkang daora matan-e. Phaimiukakungdung nai singkudungdi maidungtu sontiu-e.
Paliuniu amaidunggu tajam situ masak jam ronna kumjiu kamme. Wadi wimakbo wan ga, ‘Wa hina wibamme,’ chiujiu paliuniu din-e.

Amaidung yo, haikumbo matai marengbo ngam kambo jengniu naliu mangam makma? Chiumakge, naliura wadi mangam makge; naliu zu katang hengriang makge! Haijeng gasu maidungniu kaomibo kumjiu, Iniu naliutu sajai pibo wan- ga, naliu kaomi rabo-e, sise naliuleng kaloibo thiurabo-e.

“Maidungniu atiatbo tingga miusy khom maduibo kumjiu, Idi amaidungtu khom maduira masenne, chiudi paliura mumsy ken-ga pasy habo kum, ndutbangga pasy habo kumgap-e, khatdi panui agui mibo kumme, sijeng gasu nkengmai siniu sibo kadihse lumi raleng Iniu suikhai mibo-e.”
“Dekamjiu aliu ntaobam khajiulo?” chiujiu Tingwang maidungniu maniu-e. “Khe, aliu charireng thiukhaibo namdi gase, pakmeng shaikhai mikhe. Aliu Rawang
Wikhaibo nai agi-manaibotu aliuniu agun-e, chiudi pageng hamide, sibosung kapingbo wang-e.

Aliugu mikremai siniu Dan gu namdi ga bam masuang mide; paliugu chaqondungniu katasibo khuanse aliu chiu mide. Paliugu chaqonniu maraboga sibo kadih pakhiangna pingjiu kaphikrai-rai mide. Aliugu mikre maidungniu aliugu kadih, khatdi siga bambo hina, aliugu namdi khatdi chamai hinatu kam mahara wang bamme.”
Alung chariubo hai wisi lulak mide;
I alung chariu-chang chariu mide.
Kadih pakhiangna nking khailo!
amaidungniu kapbo khuan I chiu-e.
“Zion ga
Zion gu chawang siga hami jiuma?”
Paliu wangpiu
“Naliuniu dekamjiu naliugu charameng kahumjiu
khatdi pageng kahabo nkengmai ra khuga
makhum kiujiu alung kampom khai jiulo?”
Maidung siniu senpadle,
“Tatun-ting hai tadton mide, atiat-tingdi loimide,
chiudi aliutura ranlu makha-e.”
Alung hai pang mide
palamra amaidungtu niakpet mide;
Alung manangbo siniu achun thiuta mide.
Gilead ga chapiu-chaga hami jiuma?
Siga chara-taliupao phaimiu hami jiuma?
Sichiusai, dekamjiu, amaidungtu wikhai mak jiulo?
Apee haise tadui akhun,
amik haise matui aladky thiubam niusai;
kamshat mibo amaidung jengniu—
nchun n-nien saomakjiu I kapbam rabo-e.
Amaidung khugasu Iniu mari lujiu
kathaidih gase abamleng thiukhai ni-e.
Paliu hai nchangmak kamme,
maitu jontiu mai maliang-e.
Paliuniu aratbose dinra kaden bamme;
majibo sung nchang makbo siniu kadih haitu mawang bamme.
“Amaidungniu kasa kamlubo sai kamlan-lan-e,
khatdi atu paliu Rawang leng lukhai makge.”
Mai hina pakamaitu suimak kamme,
mai khatniudi pasingnatu malum makge;
palamra singnamai hina Jacob kumjiu sontiu-e
khatdi mai hina pakamai ken tia-e.
Paliu kamaitu jumao kam mide,
mai khatniudi majibo dinta mide;
paliu lee situ aratbo katikhai mide,
sichiujiu paliuniu nuan kamta makge.
Paliuniu kapingbo ngamse kamlan lan bamme,
aratlubo sai aratlan-lanjiu bamme.
Pamaidungniu patu phutmide,
chiujiu
Haijengniu Ngamkambo
paliutu chagi kamaruakbo kum maruak sune.
Amaidungniu kasabose kam mide, Iniu paliu khuga degu kamlan ralo?
Paliu leedungse patai karabo tavaithu kumme;
pawan machang paliu aratbo din-e.
Mai hinaniu kiningmaitu chaka lad din-e,
chiudi pachangsiakra tathak thiu bamme.
Haijengniu, paliutu Iniu sajai pimak rama?
Haikumbo jat riga Iniu chakhum ruimak rama?
Iniu din-e, “Maluang rammai jengniu I achungne,
khatdi piubuandung jengniu I kapne,
palamra paliu aguikam mide,
sibo jiuga mai khatnadi tadkhaita mide.
Khaorui-khaona khuan chiuta mide;
thingnadung khatdi nkankhao hina pakkam mide.”
siga tanydungtu pilung khai mine;
Judah gu namdi hai kathaidih thiu mine,
siga mai khatnadi lungta mine.”
Iniu maniu-e, “
Sibosung, paliu paopeh mainiu katikhaibo kumjiu Baal gu charamengtu kahumme khatdi paliu kuon tanne.
Sichiubo gasu Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo

Paliu paopeh maidungniu khatdi paliuniu chiu matai makbo katambo jatdung ruangga paliutu Iniu kam marakhai mirabo-e, khatdi Iniu paliutu kam mahaloi makthen paliutu atungra riphendung situ langkhai rabo-e.”
Ngamkambo
“Degu padjiu bamlo chiubo lamga makum khailo!
kashai kanuibo lui thiujiu achungbo puidungtu kukhai sulo.”
Maidung siniu din-e,
“Aliu mikga matuiniu chungphui makthen,
khatdi kapbo gasu aliu mik men makthen,
aliu khuga kashai baibo lui thiu khaira
kalangjiu wangra paliu khuga paokhai bilo.”
Zion ga kapbambo khuan nking khailo,
“Aliu nchum kam mide! Kamangambo siniu phui mide!
Aliuniu aliu dihtu phut khaira mide! Aliu kyse rathon kam mide.”
Iniu din-e,
Naliu nahpuidungtu dechiujiu achung ralo chiubo katikhai bilo;
khatdi kashai baibo lui dechiu thiuralo chiubo naliu kamai khuga katikhai bilo.
Kashaibo hai aliugu kiran gasu ngutjiu aliugu chawangkining katang ngut mide;
sichiujiu npui-nchengga bambo aliu nahdungtu
khatdi senkiga bambo chabon maidungtu haisiniu kamkao mide.
Kashai phaw hainiu pabam hinaga marapu mide,
chaluga chamiu wiraleng kadihtam mara khaibo kum phuiting mide.
Chaluga atiat maidung siniu chamiu gekhai nbambo miukhum kum mide,
haise mai khatniudi khom maduira hamibo miusy kum mide.
Haise dinra
“Kaningtingmainiu paliugu ningting jengniu, katan maidi paliu pumtan jengniu,
kalekwi maidi paliu lekwat jengniu chaliang mak rabo-e.
paniu atu silujiu khatdi alamga silujiu chaliang lulo,
palamra agu lungsabo hai saomakbo-e,
khatdi Iniu kambo haira nchangbo nai majibo-e.
Haidung siniu alung kimbo-e.
Israel mai yo,
Paniu din-e,
“Katambo jatdungniu tadbo npuilam tadtulo;
katambo jatdungniu pingjiu bamdi,
tingpukgu katasibo madanniu kam kabuakmi tulo.
Haibo maidunggu racheng sira pageng ha-e.
Mariuga huikao khai bambo singbangse tasing siam simainiu kamlubo mania-e,
sichiujiu kachia nai rangkangginiu karu khaibo-e.
Haise natriniu kam matip khai lujiu chap matipra kamkhaibo-e.
Sibo ramengdungse chaluga asen khaibose kumme;
paliu walad dinpad ngam lakge,
paliutu phunglu tadrabo-e, palamra paliu tadngam lakge.
Paliutu pingmi tulo;
paliuniu naliu khuga wa kasadi, kawidi kamkhai silakge.”
nang haira kangambo-e,
khatdi nazan hai di-e khatdi pumtan bambo-e.
Natu hai chakhuangthiu bui-e.
Nang kumbo mai khatnadi jatdunggu ningtingmai ruangga
maksai chawang ruangga ha-e.
Paliu mathiu pang-e khatdi meng-e.
tasingpek rameng gasu paliuniu degu silu ralo?
Paliugu charamengse Spain lamsu wangbo rangkanggi siniu topman khaibo-e;
Uphaz lamsu wangbo kachianiu topman khaibo-e,
paliuniu kampadbo bensiam hinase charui-rui kasimainiu dakpatbo
majaibo nai hengmumbo fainiu topman khaibo-e.
Chiudi,
nangra ringbambo Rawang si-e, khatdi tingthenggu chawang si-e.
Nalung pom susai, kadihpiri hai malai mi-e.
nalung pomse jatdung siniu kheng ngam lakge.
(Ting-kadihtu damkhai makbo radung situ kam mahami rabo-e, chiujiu naliuniu paliu khuga dinbilo. Paliura kadihriga pating thengjiu bamlakge).
pagu ningtingniu kadihpiri damkhai-e khatdi tinggentu juden pad khai-e.
Paniu chamtan piboga tingpuk riga taduise pakhuan padle;
paniu kadihgu pamalan gasu kamuangse phungwang-e.
Tingriubo wan ga paniu hengri kalik khai bi-e
khatdi pagu wakhaibam gasu tingkai langkhai-e.
Haise ngaoboga, maidungse paliu chun thiusi lakjiu mengmi-e;
charameng haira chamaina makumniu dambo-e,
palamra paliuniu dambo ramengse kamaobo-e khatdi karingbo siu habo-e.
Paliu hai matha-e, siniu wajeng simak rabo-e;
Jacob Rawang sira paliu kum makge, paniu wa pakhiangna damkhaibo-e,
khatdi paniu Israel maidungtu pamai siak thiura kadalubo-e.
Ngamkambo
Jerusalem mai yo, naliutu tao magui lude! Naliugu kabam hina kadenlu sulo.
niu naliutu haibo kadih gasu hathon mine, sichiujiu naliu mai khattudi masiak makjiu niakpet mirabo-e.
Jerusalem maidungniu kapjiu senpadle,
“Aliutu kam ajam masaju mide! Aliu jamse wilan silulak mide.
Haise aliuniu kheng ngamlu sune chiujiu aliuniu maning-e!
Aliugu mathenkyse samide, paliutu ratman khaibo chariangse tap mide.
Aliu nahmaidung tad maha kam mide, mai khatnadi aliugu mathenky thiusu lanra hamide;
jusungfaise lenkhai lanra mai khatnadi hamide.”
Iniu paokakge, “Aliugu jupaodung hai kapangmai-e;
jukhai raleng
Haijeng gasu paliu ngamlu makge, sichiujiu aliu hai lung mara kam mide.
Kinglo! Tacham wang bamme!
Tingpilam bambo jat khuga chakhuan-chara siniu kario bamme;
sibo riphendung siniu Judah gu namdidungtu
tanydung lungbo kathaidih pithiu khaimi rabo-e.”
mai khatnadi pagu ringtingtu thinman silakge.
aliutu kam masaju khai tulo, maksai nalung pombo wan ga,aliutu sajai pikhai tulo,
sise aliuleng pamalan thiumi rabo-e.
Nagu lungpomse natu suimak mai khatdi natu kahum makbo jatdung riga kiukhailo.
Paliuniu namaidungtu kamshat mibo-e;
paliuniu aliutu kam maha lujiu aliugu kadih hai kam nchum mibo-e.
“Chamriat lamga dinkhaibo haitu nking khailo. Chamriat hainiu dinkhaibo situ majai kamak mai hina riga
Israel mai Rawang,

Haibo chamriat hai, chami kumjiu taobambo Egypt dih gasu Iniu paliutu puipadbo tingga paliu paopeh khuga thiu khai mibo-e. Paliuniu alad majaira khatdi agu chamtan hinase kamra Iniu paliu khuga dinkhai mibo-e. Paliuniu akadin piusai, paliuse amai thiurabo-e khatdi Iniu paliu Rawang thiurabo-e.
Sichiujiu paliu paopehmai khuga ladriat khai mibose Iniu majai khaijiu, tuhoi paliuniu lungbambo kadihtam kawibo, lungwibo ramgase lungra Iniu pikhai bine.”
Iniu din-e, “Yo,
Siga
Iniu paliu paopehmaitu Egypt gasu maluang padboga, alad piuraleng paliutu tanjiu kachan khai mibo-e, sichiujiu thainai katangdi haibo maidungtu Iniu kachan khaijiu bambo-e.

Chiudi paliuniu nkingkhai makge, maksai majaikhai makge. Sibosung, mai hinaniu paliu kuon tanjiu kasabo kamjiu bamme. Iniu paliutu chamriatse majai raleng chamtan pikhai-e, chiudi paliuniu suimakge. Siniu haiga dinkhai bambo sajai hinase Iniu paliu riga phungwang khai rabo-e.”
Sigasu
Agu kadin suimakbo paliu pao-peh maigu nuan ga malan wangjiu, paliuniu katambo ratu kahum mide. Israel maidi Judah maidi Iniu paliu paopehmaitu pikhaibo chamriatse kampang mide.
Siniu, tuhoira

Sichiusai Judah maidung nai Jerusalem maidung paliuniu charathiujiu kadkhai bambo radung khuga nkha khaira leng khengsu rabo-e. Sichiudi haibogu kasabose wangbo wan ga sibo radung siniu paliutu wadi nkha khaisi lakge.

Judah maidungniu paliugu namdi kakengbo kumjiu paliu radungdi kengjiu bamme, khatdi Jerusalem ga lungbam maidungniu namdigu npui-ncheng kengbambo kumjiu matai-marengbo Baal ratu chara thiurabo rathakbam kengkha thiukhai nbamme.
Jeremiah yo, haibo maidung malin akhuga ladriat thiujiu kakheng thiu tulo. Paliuniu chariubo daobo wan ga nkhakhai raleng akhuga khengdi, Iniu paliu khuan nking khai lakge,”

Pakak khatga Iniu paliutu bon mawibambo olive bang, mataiwibo parasyniu phuibambo bang chiujiu kukhai mibo-e; chiudi tuhoira, tingsin khuan kumjiu, Iniu marapadjiu pakedungse riolujiu chamiga thonkhai mirabo-e.
“Ngamkambo
Agu mikre maidungniu atu kamshat raleng kam bamme chiubo

Atu hai kamshat raleng jupad khai nbambo milypoi kumme, paliuniu kasabo kambambose atu suimakjiu kambambo-e chiubo I wadi silu makge. Paliuniu dinbamme, “Singbang hai wibamkhabo wan ga dongtap mikhe; mai khatniudi patu maningtao tami raleng patu kamshat mikhe.”
Sigasu I kakheng thiu-e “Ngamkambo
Anathoth maidungniu atu kamshat khai nijiu bamme, khatdi Iniu
Siga Ngamkambo
Anathoth mai riga kasabo wangkhai raleng Iniu pawan dakkhai mide, sibo wanse wangboga, paliu mai khatnadi ringsi lakge.”
nangniu maji-e chiubo dinlen khai sune.
Chiudi majibo lamga Iniu nakhuga maniu rabo-e.
Dekamjiu kasamaidung hainiu haijiukha lungwibam jiulo?
Dekamjiu palung masanmak mai siniu tathuijiu bamralo?
Nangniu paliutu lingkhai-e, sichiujiu pamen padle;
paliu mawi khangjiu pasy masi-e.
Paliuniu natu pawan machang din mawi bamme,
chiudi paliuniu nalamga pachang siakjiu manang khai makge.
Chiudi,
Iniu kambambose nangniu ngao-e,
Iniu natu dejiukha lungsalo.
Milytu kamshat raleng jupadbo kumjiu kasamai haitu jupad milo;
paliutu girabo wanse wangmak then
paliutu akhejiu bamlo.
Dethengga aliugu kadih hai sangjiu bamralo
khatdi piubuandung hai aguijiu bamralo?
Chakhao-thingnadung hai shaijiu bamme,
palamra aliu hai kasabo jengniu-e.
Maidungniu din-e, ‘Aliuniu kambambo hai
Tingwang niu ngao makge.’”
“Jeremiah yo, nangniu maidung haitu majuboga chariu misai,
dechiujiu nangniu chaqontu majulu ralo?
Nangniu kadih maruangboga chapngam laksai,
dechiujiu nangniu Jordan mung mariu gase chapngam luralo?
Naky khunmai-siak, nasingna-siak katang niudi, natu jonmibo-e;
natu atungboga paliu jaomibo-e.
Chaka khat thiubo lad dinbamdi, paliutu malum tulo.”
“Israel maidungtu Iniu phut mide;
Iniu kadalubo jattu Iniu suita mide.
Iniu kakungbo amaitu paliugu mikremaigu pumtan ga pikhai mide.
Iniu kada lumainiu atu atungjiu bamme;
mariuga bambo ndongqui kumjiu, paliuniu atu thangjiu bamme,
sijengniu paliutu Iniu mareng-e.
Amaidung hai takaolengniu pake hina lamsu thon kabambo thingna kumme.
Sibo khumkyga wang tiura leng nkan khaodungtu kukhailo!
Agu mumsy reng hai sangdiumaigu mawangpaodung siniu kam maha mide;
paliuniu alu hai tao masa mide;
Iniu kakungbo kadih haitu paliuniu kathaidih pithiu khai mide.
Paliuniu kathaidih leng kamkhai mide
asuangga sibo kadihse nchum mide.
Kadih pakhiangna hai kathaidih mawi mide,
sichiujiu mai khatniudi manang khai makge.
Kakubo ram kathaidih tadken padjiu maidungniu sungtiura wangkinne.
Sibo ram pakhiangna kam maha mira Iniu chari langkhai-e;
mai khatniudi agi-manaijiu lungsi lakge.
Amaidungniu chabanmiu lingkhai-e, chiudi piumentu khom madui-e,
paliuniu changam kam maranne, chiudi siga wadi daolu makge.
Palamra agu lungpom kasabo siniu paliugu miusy lungpad makbo-e.”
Chiudi Iniu paliutu luthon padlubo sai, Iniu paliutu lungsakhai lanrabo-e; Iniu jat hinatu paliu dih, paliu ramga puiwang lankhai bine.
Paliu mathiu lungchun gasu amaidunggu tacheng lukhaijiu, pakak khatga paliuniu amaidungtu Baal zan ga pijiu tasiang siangkhai mibo kumjiu paliuniu, ‘
Chiudi jat khat kumboniu alad piumak sai, Iniu pamense pethon mirabo-e khatdi kam mahaduak mirabo-e.
Siniu I tadlujiu liulujiu khai sude.
Siga
“Euphrate Giukiga tadlujiu tanise tulimki khatga baikhai milo.”
Siga Iniu tadlujiu Euphrate Giuki mungga sise baikhai mide.
Pasai
Sijengniu I menglande, chiudi Iniu baikhaibo bamga mengboga sise marenjiu, thinpiu daolak mibose Iniu ngaode.
Siga
“Haichiujiu Iniu Judah maigu wasao thiubo nai Jerusalem maigu chaliang-chang chaliangbo situ kam mahami rabo-e.
Kasabo maidung haisiniu alad piu makge, paliu kuon tanjiu sajut-jut bamme, khatdi kakibo ratu kahumjiu macha bamme. Haijengniu, paliudi haibo gengta mibo nise kum mibo-e.

Tani siniu akhen ga khap mantingbo kumjiu, Judah maidung nai Israel maidungniu atu thin matip khai raleng Iniu machunbo-e. Iniu haise kamkhaibo sira paliuniu amai thiura khatdi azantu chakhuang thiujiu atu thuonlu raleng-e, chiudi paliuniu alad piu makge.”
Sigasu paliu khuga dinkhai bilo,
Sigasu karung-li karai adiangbo kumjiu kating-kanah tam makjiu Iniu paliutu kampang paroimi rabo-e. Paliutu kamshatboga, lungsa khaibo, manang khaibo maksai, majabo thiukhai lakge.”
Israel maidung yo,
Manon kiujiu palad nking khailo.
Tamiubose wangjiu maluongga naphi masui makbo suangga,
khatdi nangniu machunbo gase paniu tamiubose phungwang makhaga
Nangniu nking khai maksai, nagu chaliangbo jengniu, mahin I kaprabo-e;
alung thiujiu, amatui luangsu rabo-e,
palamra
Judah maigu tingrunlam bambo namdakdung situ, maidungniu taokom lude; siga mai khatniudi tadpad silak mide. Judah maidung mathiutu kavangleng jutad kam mide.”
Jerusalem mai yo, phuilo! Tingpilam suniu nagu mikremai wangkinne! Naliutu manang khaijiu paliu jengniu wasaothiujiu bam maidungse delam bamlo?
Naliuniu naliu kamai-e chiujiu maning maidung siniu naliutu kamkao lujiu, mawang misai, naliuniu degu dinralo? Maipui khatniu manathad kathiubo kumjiu naliu chariu rabo-e.
Dekamjiu pakhiangna haise naliu riga padjiulo, dekamjiu naliu fai-ni phet lujiu naliutu manom minjiulo chiubo naliuniu maniusai, naliugu nuan hai saju kami gasu padbo-e.

Patia katik maidung siniu paliu tia-tik kam kali ngamlu buima, maksai quiruk siniu pagiak katrikbose kam mahalu buima? Paliuniu kam kalilu tadi, naliura wadi kam ngam lakge, chiudi kasabo gasu kawibo situ katilu bui-e.
Kathaidihgu tingkai siniu magaotu hun taliang mibo kumjiu
Haise naliu sansiat rabo-e, chiujiu paniu din-e. Haise paniu naliu riga kam khaira chapkhai mibo-e, palamra naliuniu patu mangai mide khatdi aratbo ratu malum mibo gasu-e.
papumsiakniu naliu faini gaopad lujiu naliutu kam mangam khai rabo-e.

Paniu marengbo ngam naliuniu kambose paniu ngao lude. Chaqonchi siniu chaqonpuitu wonnijiu kahabo kum, maksai npiumai khatniu pakiningmai piu naotu majang nijiu pasai suitadbo kumjiu, naliuniu chaluga khatdi maluongga nkengmai ra saisui tadkinbo paniu ngao lude. Jerusalem mai yo, naliu nchum mide! Dedaosu naliu masanlu ralo?
Ting malang mirabo lamga
“Judah mai achung bamme;
sibo namdidungse shaikiujiu bamme,
siga bambo maidungse chariujiu kadihga ji kala bamme,
Jerusalem mainiu nkha khaira khengjiu kap bamme.
Kalekwi mainiu paliu vangmaitu tadui thuakra langkhai-e;
paliuniu akhun-ga meng-e, chiudi tadui daolu makge;
paliugu tadui-khiu
paliu cheng saijiu khatdi maningkam lakjiu
paliu zu nbiangjiu wanglande.
Palamra siga tingdui kiuta mijiu kadih hai sangmide,
chalu tien thiumaise paliu lung chariujiu, paliu zu kaba mide.
Tathan puiniu piangpad nuangbo papoi situ phut mide,
palamra siga piubuan hamide.
Nkan qonniam siniu maluang ton-ga chaplujiu
tany kumjiu pasiu thilop-lop bamme,
paliu mik rakkhang ngamlak mide,
palamra paliuniu piubuanse daota mide.
Amaidungniu akhuga kapjiu kheng-e,
‘Aliu nuan jengniu aliutu kammao bamdi,
Pawan kakengkha aliuniu nakhu gasu diujiu tad mibo-e;
aliuniu nakhuga nuan kammibo-e.
Israel maigu machunbose naronna-e;
chariubo gasu naronna aliutu rankhaibo-e.
Sangmai khatniu nchun khatleng nbinwangbo kumjiu
dechiu nangniu aliu khuga kamkhai jiulo?
Dekamjiu nang hai kam charen mibo mai kumjiu,
maksai nkha khaira pumtan kahabo riphenmai kum jiulo?
Pachang siakjiu,
Aliu hai namaidung-e, aliutu phutkhai tulo.’”
Haibo maidung lamga

Paliuniu kalum rijiu, paliutu nkha khai raleng kheng bamdi, Iniu nking khai lakge, khatdi paliuniu rukhaibo kadpad khatdi alin-tara kadpadbo gu mania phungwang bamdi, paliutu Iniu alung kim lakge. Sibosung, chari gasu khatdi kami-mibo nai chararen gasu Iniu paliutu kamshatmi rabo-e.
Siga Iniu din-e, “Dithubo
Chiudi

, Iniu kamrabose nakhuga Iniu dinkhaibo-e, Iniu langkhai makbo phaimiukakungdung siniu chamtan gasu chari padlakge, katiu riangbo haise haibo kadihga wang lakge chiu dinbam maitu Iniu kamrabo-e—mariu charibo siniu khatdi chariga Iniu paliutu kamshat mirabo-e.

Paliuniu dinkhai kamibo mai tudi sikum gapjiu kamshat mirabo-e. Paliu phawse Jerusalem gu npui-nchengga taliang khai rabo-e, khatdi paliutu mai khatniudi baikhaira harabo-e. Haise paliu mathiu khuga padrabo-e. Paliu naodung khugadi, paliu nahpuidung khatdi nahpiudung khugadi padrabo-e. paliu tienkam sabo jengniu paliu riga haidungse Iniu pikhai rabo-e.”
“Amatui hai nchun n-nien saomakjiu luang bamme,
Iniu kapbo hai wadaodi saosi lakge,
palamra amaidung hai ajam masajiu ajam mide.
Iniu chalulam mengboga, chariga kamshat mimai phawse Iniu ngao-e;
namdiga I tad ngutboga maidungse kami-mijiu shai bambo ngao-e.
Phaimiukakungdung khatdi singkudungse paliu ngam kam bamme,
chiudi paliuniu nde kambam jiulo chiubo simakge.”
Nangniu Zion maidungtu marengmi jiuma?
Dekamjiu wilan silak mira haichiujiu aliutu kam ajam khai jiulo?
Aliuniu agi-manaibo leng phiu-e chiudi wadi kawibo dao makge;
aliuniu wikhaira luni-e, chiudi sibosung nping charenbo wang-e.
aliuniu, aliu nuan khatdi aliu paopeh nuan din madu padle.
Nagu ladrianse maningtao khai lanjiu aliutu lukhai makbo thiu tulo;
nagu kendibo chawangbam Jerusalem gase pijiu mangambose wangkhai tulo.
Nangniu aliu khuga ladriat khaibose kampang khai tulo.
Jatdunggu charamengdung khatniudi tingriu pikhai ngam makge,
tingpukniu paronna tingriu khai ngam makge.
Oh
palamra pakhiangna nangniu kam khaibo-e.
Paliuniu delam tadkhai ralo chiujiu nakhuga maniusai, Iniu nakhuga dinkhai mibose dinkhai bilo:
Khangsianiu chararen gasu shai rabo-e—
sichiujiu paliu tadmi rabo-e!
Khangsianiu chari gasu shai rabo-e—
sichiujiu paliu tadmi rabo-e!
Khangsianiu kami-mijiu shai rabo-e—
sichiujiu paliu tadmi rabo-e!
Khangsia tura kavang leng jutadmi rabo-e—
sichiujiu paliu tadmi rabo-e!
Hezekiah nahpiu Manasseh niu Judah mai wang thiu bambo tingga paniu Jerusalem ga kamkhai mibo jengniu kadihpiri maidung mathiuniu paliu khuga padbo haitu pingra Iniu kamkhai rabo-e.”
“Jerusalem maidung yo, saoniu naliutu lungsa khaijiu
khatdi saoniu naliuleng chunsa khai ralo?
Saoniu naliu khuga chap lujiu
naliu dekum bamlo chiu maniu huralo?
Naliuniu atu thon mibo-e;
naliuniu akhu gasu masai mari mibo-e.
Siniu I aben kariopad lujiu naliutu chakitpet mibo-e,
palamra agu lungpom haitu kham lulak mide.
Haibo kadihgu namdak hinaga
naliutu magaoreng kumjiu khoithon mibo-e.
Iniu naliu nahdungtu kamshat mibo-e
palamra kasabo npui gasu naliu mathakmi makge.
Duipuiga bambo nbuiniang suang
naliu kadihga bambo kamipuidung hai keng-e.
Naliugu chabon maitu palantingga Iniu gimide,
sichiujiu paliu puidungtu kam chariu khaine.
Kapingbo nai chunsabo siniu
bungjiu paliutu Iniu kakhiu khai-e.
Panah khang chinnia hamibo puise
pachun thiusi lakjiu kaokiu mide,
pasiu kajanglop-lop bamme.
Pagu n-niense tamiu wang mide;
pagu mangam siniu palung chariu mide.
Tuhoi tangbo ringjiu bambo naliutu kamshat mira
naliugu mikremaidungtu Iniu suikhai rabo-e.

I hai dejiukha sansabo mailo! Deleng apuiniu atu haibo kadihpiriga lungwang jiulo? Haibo kadihga bambo mai hinatu Iniu arijiu n-girabo mide. Iniu mai khattudi rangkang apuk khai makge, khatdi mai khat gudi Ira khoi makge chiudi mai hinaniu atu siangjiu bamme.
yo, Iniu natu macha mawi maksai, khatdi agu mikremainiu chariu magenthiubo wan-ga Iniu paliu malin-ga alaisang padjiu khengkhai maksai, paliu siangse ariga wangbo thiumilo.
(Chagi, nkiujiu tingpi lamgu tataagi khai-ajalujiu kambo chagi situ mai khatniudi kamtanglu lakge).
Paliuniu wadaodi simakbo ramga paliugu mikremaitu machara Iniu kamkhai rabo-e. Palamra agu lungpom haise chami kumbo-e, haise tingtheng taojiu bam rabo-e.”
Siga Iniu din-e, “
Nangniu akhuga dinkhai-e, siga Iniu chalad hinase nking bambo-e. Ngamkambo Rawang
Iniu maitu majanglu tanui kamjiu pawan kawi thiukhaibo ha-e. Iniu nagu chamtan majaijiu alung pomjiu aronna bambo-e.
Dedonniu haichiu I chariubam jiulo? Dekamjiu ajam hai wilan silakmi gulo? Dekamjiu haise wimimak jiulo? Chaken tingga sangmibo giuna kumjiu nangniu achunning dekamjiu pitang khaimak jiulo?”
Haiga

Paliu khuga Iniu natu tataagigu singbeng kumjiu kamkhai rabo-e. Paliuniu natu atungjiu aphen sune, chiudi paliuniu natu ngamlu lakge. Natu gukhaira Iniu natu maluang khai rabo-e, khatdi natu wadi manangbo pithiu khai lakge.
Iniu natu palung kasamai khatdi pathak kasamai khugasu gukhai birabo-e.
“Haikumbo bamga nanao thiutulo, maksai ngena lungkhai tulo.
Haiga lungkhaibo nahdung khatdi paliu pui-piudung khuga degu padsu ralo chiubo Iniu nakhuga dinkhai bine.

Paliu hai chararen kasabo gasu shairabo-e, khatdi mai khatniudi paliu jengniu achung khai lakge maksai paliutu baikhai lakge. Paliu phaw siniu kadihga alin wira kadihtam mara khaibose kum rabo-e. Paliuniu chariga khatdi kami-mijiu shairabo-e; khatdi paliu phawdungse thingnadung nai nkan khaodunggu tatek thiu rabo-e.
“Kiuhuijiu bambo kilungga nang tadngut makrabo-e. Mai khat jengniudi nachun satulo. Iniu amaidungtu agi-manaira maksai lungsa kakungbo lenjiu thoidam pikhai tamine.

Kalekwi maidi, kaleksa maidi haibo kadihga shaikhai rabo-e, chiudi mai khatniudi paliuleng achung khai lakge, maksai paliutu bai khaira ha-e. Mai khatniudi patu paronna kam ajam lakge, maksai pachunset lenra papee got lakge.

Mai khatniu pagu lungsamai shaijiu bamdi, mai khatniudi pachun kam kamek khaijiu patu maluangtiu, maluangsak aruang khai lakge. Mai khatniu papui-piu shaijiu bamdi mai khatniudi chalungsabo lenkhai lakge.
“Maidungniu katiu kibambo kyga tadngut tulo. Paliutu majang tiu, majang sakra ntaoda tulo.
Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo

“Nangniu paliu khuga haidungse dinboga, Iniu dekamjiu paliutu haijiukha kasabo mathad pikhai raleng chapkhai mijiulo chiujiu nakhuga paliuniu maniusu rabo-e. Paliuniu dekumbogu kakhui-kamaobo kammi jiulo khatdi dekumbo nuan paliuniu paliu Rawang,
Siga
Sichiudi naliu paopehmai suang sadiangbo ngamse naliuniu kam mide. Naliu mathiuse chaqon tanjiu sa-e, khatdi alad piumakge.

Sichiubo jenggasu, Iniu naliutu haibo kadih gasu hathon padlujiu naliuniu khatdi naliu paopeh mainiu simatai makbo kadihga khaimi rabo-e. Sichiujiu siga naliuniu nchun n-nien sao makjiu katambo ratu machasu rabo-e, siga Iniu naliutu lungsa khai lakge.’”

Sibosung, ringbambo Tingwang Iniu Israel maitu tingpi lamsu khatdi kadih katam-tamboga Iniu paliutu hamara khai mibo lamsu majang wangbo-e chiujiu chamtan gasu ladriat thiujiu dinmi rabo-e. Iniu paliu paopeh leng pikhai mibo kadihga Iniu paliutu majang wanglan rabo-e. Rapiu, Iniu dinpad mibo-e.”
Paliuniu kambo hina I ngao bamme. Amasuangga wakhat nadi nbaibo ha-e; amaga paliu nuanse mahin ngam lakge.

Paliugu kasabo nai nuan jengniu dam nia pijiu majon khai rabo-e. Palamra paliuniu agu kadih haitu pasiu kahabo charameng phawdung siniu kam tania mibo-e, khatdi kamaobo paliu radung siniu piphui khai mibo-e.”
Mai khatniu paronna para damlu buima? Chiumakge,damlu tadi, siseniu chara kachangsiak thiusi lakge.”
Namaidungniu maluangton hinaga khatdi kamadiakbo singbang hang hinaga charapui Asherah meng kamkhai lujiu khatdi rathakbam thiukhai lujiu kahum bamme.
Naliuniu naliu ramlung pakhiangnaga nuan kamkhai mibo jengniu, pijiu naliugu mikremaidungtu naliugu chakhiu-chalan hina phungtad mira Iniu kamkhai mine.

Iniu naliuleng pikhai mibo kadihse naliuniu phutmi rabo-e, sichiujiu naliuniu wadaodi simakbo kadihga naliu mikremaidungtu machara Iniu kamkhai mine, palamra agu lungpom hai chami kumbo-e, haise tingthengjiu taobam rabo-e.”
“Akhu gasu marilujiu shai mirabo chamainatu
khatdi chamainagu pumtan ga, malumbo mai hinatu
Iniu ladjan thiu rabo-e.
Pahai kathaidih lungkhangbo wakhatnadi
lungpad silakbo chaphepiu kumbo-e.
Pakhuga wadaodi kawibo padlakge.
“Chiudi atu malumbo mai situ
Iniu thoidam pikhai rabo-e.
tadui bambo singbang kum rabo-e.
Haise tingthiubo wan wangdi manang lakge, palamra paniwdungse madiak bamme;
tingsa makdi manangra wadi ha-e;
haise pasy masijiu bamme.
“Saoniu chamaina lungchun singam luralo?
Haisuang pason-paru kasa wakhatdi ha-e;
haise wikhai raleng kungchang kung-e.
khatdi chamaina lungchun haitu madiu-e.
Mai hinaniu lungbo lunlung saisuijiu
khatdi kambo saisuijiu Iniu kambo-e.”
Lungchun masan makjiu rangkang daolubo mai sira,
pabum makbo bumtu kagombo thingna kumbo-e.
Pagu ringting palan tingga palek watse hami rabo-e
sichiujiu pamalanbo gara pase wadi makjiu kapangbo mai thiumi rabo-e.
Aliu Raky hai pakendibo chawangbam kumbo-e,
haise nda paphibang gasu maluang riga chap bambo-e.
natu phutmibo mai hinatu kam mangam khai rabo-e.
Tabuijiuga paliu zan raokhaibo mai kumjiu paliutu ngaota mirabo-e.
palamra tadui kawibo aladky,
Maidungniu akhuga din-e, “Aliu riga
Chiudi,
Atu kam charen khai tulo; chariubo wangbo wan-ga nang hai agu nbaibo bamme.
Atu rejiu bammai riga kamangambose phungwang khailo, chiudi atura masiak khailo,
Chawangdung khatdi Judah maidung khatdi Jerusalem ga lungbambo mai hina khuga khatdi rengmundung gasu tadngutmai, mathiu khuga dinkhai bilo.
Paliuniu paliu ringtingtu lungsa sai, paliuniu Tabamnaise chabang wadi phung mak rabo-e,
maksai paliu ky gasu wadi phungpad makrabo-e. Tabamnaise wadi kammak rabo-e; paliu paopehdung khuga chamtan pikhai mibo kumjiu, paliuniu sibo tingmiktu masanbo tingmik thiujiu mania rabo-e.
Paliu paopeh mainiu alad kadin piumakjiu chalung ngut khai makge. Sibosung, paliu kuon tan-e; paliuniu acham piumakge, maksai akhuga wa katini makge.

“Paliuniu agu chamtan hinase piurabo-e chiujiu paliu khuga dinkhai bilo. Paliuniu Tabamnaise haibo namdigu rengmundungga chabang khatnadi phungpad phungngut mak rabo-e, paliuniu Tabamnaise wadi kam makjiu masanbo tingmik thiujiu mania rabo-e.

Sichiusai paliugu chawangdung nai chawangnah- dungniu sibo Jerusalem rengmun ga ngutlujiu David niu thinbo pumtanse machamjiu thin rabo-e. Judah mai nai Jerusalem mai aruanglujiu paliuniu chaqon-kari nai chaqon riga ntao macham rabo-e, sichiujiu Jerusalem namdise pawan machang chamai phuijiu bamrabo-e.

Maidung hainiu Judah gu namdakdung gasu khatdi Jerusalem tu lungmagui bambo namdung gasu wangrabo-e; paliuniu Benjamin luongriang gasu, maluongphi lamsu, maluang lamsu khatdi Judah gu tingrun lamsu wangrabo-e. Paliuniu atu Kahumboky gase rukhaibo maniakad nai charathiubo, alin-tara kadpadbo nai parim wibo maniakad khatdi thuonkiubo maniakad phungwang rabo-e.

Chiujiu paliuniu alad kadin piujiu Tabamnai situ masanbo tingmik thiujiu mania rabo-e. Paliuniu sibo tingmikga Jerusalem gu rengmun-ga chabang khatnadi phungpad phungngut makrabo-e, palamra paliuniu phungpad phungngutsai, Iniu Jerusalem rengmun riga chami thonkhai rabo-e, sise mai khatniudi katai mid silu lakge.”
“Chalidambo kyga tadkiulo, siga Iniu agu champaose nakhuga pikhai bine.”
Siniu I tadkiuboga chali dampao siniu chali dambo phikuise kapinjiu chali dambam niubo ngao-e.
Chali damjiu chagamniangse thinpiuboga kam mawilu maksai paniu sibo gamniangse khoilujiu kakibo wakhat katambo kamlanne.
Sigasu
“Chali dampao siniu chagamniangtu chali kampadbo kumjiu Iniu Israel mai naliu khuga kamkhai rabo hai agu maji hajiuma? Chali dampao ben-ga chagamniang kabambo kumjiu naliudi aben ga bambo-e.
Sichiusai pawan kata-kadaoga, Iniu pethon mine, kampang mine, maksai jat khattu maksai chawangdih khattu kam maha mine chiu dinboga,
sibo jat siniu kasabo gasu mari misai, Iniu kamne chiu dinkhai mibose Iniu kamkhai lakge.
Sichiudi pajai khat lamsu, Iniu jat khattu maksai chawangdih khattu lingsu khaine, maksai thiusu khaine chiu dinboga,
sibo jat siniu akadin piumakjiu khatdi kasabose kam bamsai, Iniu kamne chiubose Iniu kamkhai lakge.

Sichiusai tuhoira, Iniu paliutu atungjiu sajai piraleng kaden lude chiujiu Jerusalem mai nai Judah mai khuga paokhai bilo. Paliu tadbambo npuise kalilujiu khatdi paliuniu kambambo nuan gu lunlung gasu mathak milo chiujiu paliu khuga dinkhai bilo.
Paliuniu paokakne, ‘Makge, aliuniu nde kamjiu sichiu ralo? Aliu mathiu aliu kuon tanbam palunne, khatdi aliuniu masenbo saisuijiu sa palun bamne.’”
“Haikumbo masuang wadaoga padkhai mima
chiujiu jat hina khuga maniu matailo.
Israel maidungniu kapingbo ngam kam mide!
Lebanon gu kakubo chakhao-turen-ga kabun kahabo ting bamma?
Ka-agibo ramluonggu giunase wadao gara luangsao mibo bamma?
Chiudi, amaidungniu atu mangai mide;
paliuniu charameng khuga parim wibo rukhai-e.
Paliuniu tadrabo npuiga paliu phi masui mide,
paliuniu kaguangbo npuise luita mide;
paliuniu kam tasikhai makbo npuiga tadmide.
Haibo kadih haitu tingtheng pakentia bam mira paliuniu kamkhai mide.
Haiga tadken mai hinaniu paliutu ngaolujiu paliu suang hami rabo-e,
paliu suang hajiu paliu pi kangum rabo-e.
Tingbang lamgu tingkainiu tabui hun marabo kumjiu
Iniu amaidungtu paliu mikremai masuangga hamara mirabo-e.
Paliu khugasu I aduk manuk mirabo-e;
chariubo wangdi, paliutu I nkha khai lakge.”

Sigasu maidungniu din-e, “Jeremiah tu wakhatra kamkhe! Pawan machangnaga aliutu katikhaira singku bamrabo-e, aliutu laddin khaira ningtingbo mai bamrabo-e, khatdi Tingwang gu champao dinpadra phaimiukakung bamrabo-e. Aliuniu pariga kamaobo madam khai sukhe, sichiujiu paniu kadinbose nkingta mikhe.”
Sijengniu I kakheng thiu sude, “

Kawibo sung kasaboniu malankhai rama? Chiudi atu pijiu nkai khaira paliuniu chakhomki rongkhai nbamme. Nangniu paliutu nalung pomjiu kamkhai mak raleng, Iniu paliu sung nakhuga wangjiu dechiujiu dinkhai milo chiubo maningtao khailo.
Chiudi tuhoira,

Kachan khai makjiu paliu kydungse pijiu humtiu lura chamai menditu langkhailo, sichiujiu nping charenjiu pi kap khailo. Paliuniu atu pi nkai khaira chakhomki rongkhai nbamme khatdi atu manra tathak thiukhai nbamme.
Chiudi,
Tadlujiu chagam karung khat liulo chiujiu
Hinnom Ramjeng gu Chalipang Rengmun lam tad taron lujiu, paniu akhuga dinkhaibo chamse paliu khuga paokhaira dinkhaide.
Haichiu dinraleng

Iniu haise kamkhai rabo lamra maidungniu atu phutlujiu kakibo ratu kahumjiu, khatdi charathiujiu haibo bamse kam tania mibo jengniu-e, paliuniu khatdi paliu paopehdung maksai Judah mai wangdung niudi haibo ratu simakbo-e. Paliuniu haibo bamtu pamao-pameng kahamai zai siniu kam tania mibo-e,
khatdi paliuniu Baal leng rathakbam kamlujiu paliu nahdungtu rathak leng thiujiu chamiga rukhai mibo-e. Sikumbo kamra Iniu paliutu wadaodi chamtan pimakge; haise wadaodi achun makumga pad makge.
Sijengniu, haibo bamsitu Topheth makdi Hinnom gu Ramjeng chiujiu kuta mirabo wanse wangkinne. Sibosung Chamaitu Gikhaibo Ramjeng chiujiu kumi rabo-e.

Haibo bamga Iniu Judah mai nai Jerusalem mainiu rangbo hinase kam kabuak khai rabo-e. Iniu paliutu mikremai ben-ga pikhaijiu paliutu kamshat mirabo-e. Iniu paliu phawse thingnadung nai nkankhaodung leng pikhaimi rabo-e.
Maisuang hajiu kapingbo nai kahabose, haibo namdi riga Iniu pipad khai rabo-e, sichiujiu siga tad kawangbo mai hinaniu paliu suang hajiu charen rabo-e.

Mikre maidung siniu namdi haitu taoweng lujiu maidungtu kamshat raleng kam rabo-e. Taokom lubo maise wajiukha magenthiu rabo-e, sichiujiu namdi lungga bam maidung siniu khat-khattu langtiu rabo-e khatdi paliu nahdungtu tadi langtiu rabo-e.”
Sigasu Iniu majang tad kinbo maidung masuangga karungse kampang khaira
khatdi Ngamkambo
Iniu ladriat thiubo-e, chiubora Iniu haibo namdi nai siga lungbam maitu Topheth tu kum kamkhai rabo-e.

Jerusalem ga bambo chaky hina, Judah mai wangdung ky hina khatdi chaky npom rigasu chagandung khuga maru matao khai mibo khatdi katambo radung khuga jaw liangkhaijiu kadpad khai mibo hinatu Topheth tu kumjiu kam tania khai rabo-e.”
Sigasu
Israel mai Rawang Ngamkambo
Iniu dinbo cham hai Immer nahpiu singku Pashhur, Charaky gu chakampao siniu chiulujiu,
atu dapsude, khatdi chagiriangniu ratlujiu Charaky lungga bambo, Benjamin Rengmun nrilamse khai milo chiujiu chamtan pikhaide.
Pasaibo nai nsuan, Pashhur niu atu ratkhai bambo gasu khipad lubosai, Iniu pakhuga din-e, “

papumsiakniu dinkhai-e, ‘Iniu natu khatdi nakamaitu kam charen khaine, sichiujiu paliutu mikremai gu chahengniu bishatbo nangniu ngaosu rabo-e. Iniu Judah maidung mathiutu Babylon mai wangpiugu pumtan hangga pikhai mirabo-e; khangsiatu kavangleng pagu kadihlam puitadmi rabo-e, khangsiatu kamshat mirabo-e.

Iniu paliugu mikremaitu pijiu haibo namdigu chakhiu-chalan hina sunglujiu khatdi siga bambo paliugu kabambo mania hina, khatdi Judah mai wangdunggu senlan katangdi sutlujiu wahinase Babylon lam pijiu phungwang mirabo-e.
Pashhur yo, natu, khatdi nakykhunmai hinatu Babylon lam minlujiu puitad mirabo-e. Siga nang shai khaijiu, khatdi nangniu aratbo dinkhai mibo nakahmaidung naliu mathiutu nphum khai mirabo-e.’”
Nangra asuang tan nkiubo-e, khatdi nangniu ariga pumtan bamme.
Mai hina atu nuimen bamme
n-nien marinpuiting paliuniu atu kagajiu bamme.
Iniu chalad phapad machang,
“Tathiu-chari-e! Kam mahami rabo-e!”
chiujiu I kapjiu senpadra mide.
pawan machang paliu lung pomjiu aken-tiak bamme.
Siga “Iniu
khatdi pazan gasu wa dinta mine,” chiujiu dinboga,
nagu champao siniu chami kumjiu
alungchun taojiu bamme.
Iniu sise thinmanra matanjiu kamme,
chiudi sise thinman ngamlak mide.
Maidungniu ladtum bambo I chiu-e,
“Pabam hinaga kapingbo ronna-e!
Siniu pumtan thinmai khuga patu paokhai bikhe!”
Aka kakungmai niudi I kaokiu ratu khuan bamme.
Paliu din-e “Pathak daosai patu sonlu bui-e”
sichiusai aliuniu patu minlujiu chakhum ruilu bui-e.”
Chiudi
alam chapjiu bamme,
sichiusai atu rejiu bam maidungse kaomi rabo-e.
Tingthengjiu paliu mangammi rabo-e,
palamra paliuniu ngamlu lakge.
Paliugu mangamse wadaodi mangai silakmi rabo-e.
Chiudi, Ngamkambo
nangniu maidung haitu majijiu madiu lude;
nangniu paliu lungchun nai paliu maning sibamme.
Sijengniu amikremai riga chakhum ruibo I phui khaine,
palamra Iniu agu magenthak hai naben ga pikhai mibo-e.
Paniu kasamaigu pumtan ga rejiu bambo maitu ranpad khai-e.
Apuiniu atu lungbo tingmik situ mangai milo!
Atu manabo wan-ga, “Nanah daolude!
Haise npiumai nah-e! “Chiu dinjiu apiu chun piwi khaira
tacham paowangbo mai riga tasiang wang milo.
Patu hai
kam maha mibo namdi kum pithiu khailo.
Patu hai nsuan tingga magen thiujiu kapbo khuan,
n-nien sai chariga kapingbo khuan pichiu khailo,
palamra atu manapad makhaga atu kamshatmi makge.
Kamshatmi bamniu sai, apui alamse araobam thiubamniu rabo-e.
Deleng atu lungwang jiulo?
Deleng chariu magenthiu chariubo ronna phungwangjiu
agu ringting hai mangambo siniu loikhai ralo?
Judah mai Wangpiu Zedekiah niu Malchiah nahpiu Pashhur nai Maaseiah nahpiu singku Zephaniah tu akhuga langwang haichiujiu kheng-e:
“Chalungsajiu
Siga
Zedekiah khuga, Israel mai Rawang
Iniu agu pumtan, agu lungpom, khatdi agu lungnot hina jaojiu natu aphen rabo-e.
Haibo namdiga lung bammai hinatu, chakhao tudi, chamai tudi, kapingbo raren gasu pijiu riamkammi rabo-e.

Chiudi natu, nagu chakampaodung khatdi chari gasu, katiu riangbo gasu khatdi chararen gasu shai kabangbo mai hinatu, pijiu natu miktunjiu kamshatni bambo namikrepiu Nebuchadnezzar siniu minlujiu kamshat mirabo-e. Paniu naliu mai khattudi masiak khai lakge, maksai mai khattudi lungsa khai lakge.
Sigasu maidung khuga dinkhaira

Namdi lungga bammai hinatu chariniu, maksai chakhumniu, maksai chararen gasu kamshat mirabo-e. Chiudi namditu aphenjiu bambo Babylon mai khuga tadlujiu madunsun misai, paringting tura kam mahami lakge.
Haibo namditu masiak makjiu kam maha mira Iniu alung chapkhai mide. Iniu Babylon mai wangpiu khuga pikhai mide, paniu haisitu ruthon kammi rabo-e.

Jerusalem nang hai pakam khatga, tukang kabambo riga ntao kabam kum bamme. Chiudi Iniu natu chari thiune. Nagu charireng situ mai khatniudi kampang lulakge maksai tadtaron silakge chiujiu nangniu din-e.
Chiudi nangniu kamkhai mibo jengniu, natu sajai pirabo-e. Iniu nawangkining situ chaminiu ruthon mine khatdi sibo mungga bambo hinatudi ruthon kam mine.
David kaikik, Judah wangpiugu chawangkining ga tadmeng raleng

Iniu naliu khuga chamtan pikhaibo kumgapjiu naliuniu kamsai, siga David kaikikniu paliu maidungtu majang aruang lujiu khatdi chawang thiujutjiu chaqon riga nai chaqon-kariga ntao lujiu chawangkininggu rengmun gasu tadpad tadngutjiu bamrabo-e.
Chiudi naliuniu agu chamtan haise majai maksai, Iniu naliu khuga siangjiu dinbo-e, chiubora haibo chawangkiningse nchum mirabo-e,
“Alengra, Judah gu chawangkining haise Gilead dih nai Lebanon Luong kumjiu palunwi-e; chiudi Iniu haisitu mai khatniudi lungmakbo nchummibo kadih pithiu khai mirabo-e.
Haisitu kam mahara Iniu maidungtu langwang kinne. Paliuniu mari thinlujiu wang kawibo singchong tiangdung hai dantap-tap lujiu chamiga thonkhai mirabo-e.
“Sibosai sangdiumai kakengkhaniu tadken wangjiu khat-khat khuga dekamjiu,
Siga paliuniu haichiujiu paokak sune, palamra naliuniu naliu Rawang akhuga ladriat thiukhai mibo situ phutlujiu kakibo radungtu macha mibo gasu-e.”
Judah maidung yo, Chawang Josiah jengniu kap tulo;
paniu kashaiboga achung khai tulo.
Chiudi panahpiu, Joahaz jengniura naliu chun sajiu kap lulo;
paliuniu patu jutad mirabo-e, wadaodi malanwang lanlak mide,
patu mana khaibo kadih situ wadaodi ngao lanlak mide.
Patu jutad mibo kadih gase pah shaikhai mirabo-e, sichiujiu haibo kadihtu paniu wadaodi ngaolan lulak mide.”
Mai khatniu maji kamakbo ganiu paky thiujiu
khatdi nchang kamakbo gasu kam madi padsai;
mai khatniu pamaidungtu matha pi tatien thiu khaijiu,
paliu phijeng pikhai maksai sibo piuse nchummi rabo-e.
Mai khat kumboniu haichiu dinjiu,
“Iniu aky kawibo khat thiujiu
matai kawibo chakaiky kichen thiune,”
sichiujiu paniu kiranse magasing khoilu,
pakhu kamkhai-e sai, khatdi kahengbo siniu
taikhai-e sai sibo piuse nchummi rabo-e.
Nangniu magasing ky thiulubo siniu
nang maisuang kawibo wang thiu mibo ma?
Napiu sira pagu ringtingga aman khai kamigu-e.
Para pawan machang majibo-e khatdi wibo-e,
pagu tienkam hinaga para dikhangbo-e.
Paniu kalek samaileng kawibo kamkhaibo-e,
khatdi wahinase palamga wikam na-e.
Chiudi nangra naleng ronna kasibo leng ngao-e;
nangra pamao hamaitu kamshatle
khatdi namaidungtu nathak sajiu kam mathadle.
Jehoiakim lamga
“Mai khatniudi pah shaiboga achung lakge,
sichiujiu ‘Dejiukha sansalo, singna yo,
dejiukha sansalo!’ chiujiu kap lakge.
Mai khatniudi kapjiu nkhiam lakge,
‘Awangpiu yo! Apao kahubo yo!’
Kashaibo qonniamtu juthon mibo kumjiu
patuse Jerusalem kareng lenlam juthon mirabo-e.”
Jerusalem maidung yo, Lebanon ga tadlujiu senpad khailo.
Bashan ramga tadlujiu kaplo; Moab Luongga khanglujiu kukhailo,
palamra nalam liangbo nawatmaitu chari ngam mide.
Nangniu lungwijiu bambo tingga,
chiudi nangniu suimakjiu nking khai makge,
Sise nangniu nagu ringtingga kam khai mibose gap-e;
Nangniu wadaodi
Nagu jupaodungtu tingkainiu hunthon mirabo-e,
Nalam liangbo nawatmaitu kavang thiura jutadmi rabo-e
nagu namdise sansabo thiujiu mangam mirabo-e
palamra nangniu kasabo kamkhai mibo jengniu-e,
Nangra Lebanon gu cedar bang jiuga manangbo hajiu bamme,
chiudi kathiubo siniu natu dapkhai rabo situ dejiukha manangbo gulo,
chiudi maipui manathad kumjiu kathiubose nang khengsu rabo-e.
sichiujiu natu kamshat nijiu bambo, nangniu pingbo maidung khuga pimine. Iniu natu Babylon mai Wangpiu Nebuchadnezzar khatdi pagu riphenmai khuga pimine.
Iniu natu khatdi napuitu manomjiu pi kavang thiutad mirabo-e. Nanaitu manakhai makbo kadihga nanai tadrabo-e, khatdi nanai siga shaikhai mirabo-e.
Nangniu haibo kadihtu phuikhai lanni rabo-e, chiudi nang wadaodi malanwang lanlak mide.”

Iniu din-e, “Chawang Jehoiachin hai, pang mibo chagamli pangtu mai khatniudi luni makjiu thonmibo kum makma? Sichiubo jengniu patu khatdi panahmaitu paliuniu wadi simatai makbo kadihga kavangleng puitad mibo makma?”
Hey kadih, kadih, kadihpiri yo!
“Haibo piu situ wadaodi pijiu tathui khai makra,
khatdi panahmai hina hamira ladjan thiukhai mibo-e.
David bam malinbo thiujiu Judah gu mawangpao thiuraleng
pakhuga pakai pakik padlakge.
Pamaidungtu kam masa khaibo khatdi kam maren khaibo Mawang paodung riga
Haise Israel mai Rawang,
Iniu paliutu kam marakhai mibo kadih gasu masiak bambo amaidungtu khomwang maduirabo-e, khatdi Iniu paliu kadihga majangwang khai rabo-e. Paliuniu paliu kaikikdung kingkajiu lung rabo-e.
Paliutu manangjiu phuikhaira Iniu Mawang paodung kadakhai rabo-e. Amaidungniu npingjiu chariu kheng lanlakge khatdi Iniu paliutu sajai pilan lakge.
Paniu chawang thiubo wan-ga, Judah maidungtu rankhai rabo-e, khatdi Israel maidung agi-manaijiu lungrabo-e. sichiujiu, patu ‘

Sibosung, Israel maitu tingpi lamsu maluang wangjiu khatdi Iniu paliutu hamara khai mibo kadih hina lamsu puiwang lanbo ringjiu bambo Tingwang chiubo zan thinlujiu tasiang siang rabo wanse wang kinne. Siga paliuniu paliu kadihga lungmi rabo-e.”
Alung hai pang paroisoi mide,
siniu I kaphik rai-rai mide;
palamra pagu masanbo lad donniu-e,
I hai jaw maniulu kabammai kumme.
Jaw sak makengju mibo mai kum mide.
paliuniu kasabo ringting khatdi paliugu pumtan thinpiu maojiu lung bamme.
khatdi piubuandungse kuikam mide.
“Phaimiukakungdung nai singkudung siniu charatu sita mide;
Charaky lung siakga paliuniu kasabo kam bambo situ Iniu minlude.
Paliuniu tadbo npuise anirabo-e khatdi tamiumi rabo-e;
Iniu paliu phi pimasui khaijiu nkhuang rabo-e.
Iniu paliu riga chariubo piwang khai rabo-e,
paliutu sajai pirabo wanse wang kinne.
Samaria maigu phaimiukakungdung siniu nuan kambo Iniu ngaolude:
paliuniu Baal zan ga tacham dinjiu amaidungtu jumao mide.
siniu sisuang sadiangbo nuan kambo Iniu ngaolude:
paliuniu mainao kiu-e khatdi aratbo din-e;
maidungniu kamaobo kamboga paliu nkha-e
sichiujiu mai khatniudi kasa kamboga nkhin makge.
Paliu hai Sodom nai Gomorrah maidung kumjiu sa-e.
“Sichiujiu, Ngamkambo
phaimiukakungdung lamga dinbo-e:
Iniu paliutu kakhabo bang tiura
khatdi patai karabo dui sakra pikhai rabo-e.
Palamra paliuniu charatu simakbo lunlungse
haibo kadihga lunglen khai mide.”
Ngamkambo
Iniu dinbo situ suimakjiu nkingkhai makbo maidungtu, paliuniu paliu khuga wahina wibamme chiujiu din-e. Khatdi paliuniu pakuon tanmai khuga wadaodi chariubo hai wanglakge chiujiu din bamme.”
Iniu din-e, “Haibo phaimiukakungdung ruangga mai khatniudi
Pagu lungpom sira tingthung, tingkai katanbo thiujiu chamai kasamai piriga wang rabo-e,
khatdi paniu kam kanibo kamlu makthenna sise mathak lakge. Sibo tingmik wangtangboga pamaidungniu haise masanjiu simi rabo-e.”

Paliuniu agu mahinbo lungchunse silusai, paliuniu agu champaose amaidung khuga dinkhaijiu bam rabo-e sichiujiu paliuniu kasabo lunlungga lungjiu bambo gasu paliuniu ngamkam kasabose phutlujiu bam mirabo-e.
“Tingwang I hai pabam khatnaga ronna makjiu pabam hinaga bambo-e.
Mai khatniudi Iniu patu ngao makbo bamga nbai lulakge. I hai tinggen nai kadih pabam hinaga bamme chiubo nang simak jiuma?
Paliu mang gasu Iniu paliutu agu champao hai pikhaibo-e chiujiu chamtan gasu ka-aratbo dinkinbo phaimiukakungdung situ Iniu sibamme.
Sibo phaimiukakungdung siniu, masing kalubo ka-aratbo dinjiu amaidungtu dethengga jumaojiu bam ralo?
Paliu piudungniu atu mangai lujiu Baal saisui mibo kumjiu, paliuniu chamangse dinboga amaidungniu atu mangai mirabo-e chiubo paliuniu maning-e.

Chamang kamanbo phaimiukakungdung siniu haise chamang-e chiubo dinrabo-e, chiudi agu champao chiusiak lubo phaimiukakung siniu agu champaose nchangjiu dinpad rabo-e. Magaoreng nai chamiupumtu dechiujiu din kada luralo?
Agu champao haira chami kumbo-e, khatdi tatu kadipangbo kadiak kumbo-e.
Khat khat lad phunglujiu agu champao thiujiu din bambo phaimiukakungdung situ Iniu atungbo-e.
Phaimiukakungdung siniu paliu chunpuak lad dinlujiu akhu gasu wangbo-e chiujiu dinbo maitudi Iniu atungbo-e.

Iniu, dinbo haise nking khailo! Ka-aratboniu phuibo paliu mang din bambo phaimiukakungdung situ Iniu atungbo-e. Sikumbo mangdung paliuniu dinboga paliugu ka-aratbo lad, paliugu chaliangbo siniu amaidungtu jumao mide. Iniu paliutu langkhai makge khatdi tadraleng chamtan pimakge, khatdi paliuniu maidungtu wadi nkha khaira ha-e.
Amai ruanggasu mai khatniu, maksai phaimiukakung khatniu maksai singku khatniu ‘
Sibo sung, mai hinaniu paka-paphenmai khatdi pariang-parui khuga haichiujiu maniu rabo-e ‘
Sijengniu ‘
Jeremiah niu phaimiukakungdung khuga maniu-e, ‘
Siga paliuniu agu chamtan haitu majai makjiu ‘
Iniu pachang siakjiu paliutu pepad lujiu paliu paopeh maidung leng khatdi paliuleng pikhai mibo namdi, akhu gasu diujiu taliangmi rabo-e chiubo hai paliu khuga paokhai bilo.
Iniu paliu riga tingtheng mangambo hai wadaodi mangai lulakbo thiujiu pikhai rabo-e.”
Karaibo takamse ndutsy kawibo khai bamme, sise minpad karaibo-e; katambo takamse kasabo ndutsy khai bamme; sise tiusi lakge.
Siga
Iniu kenkakge, “Ndutsy ngao-e. Kawibo khatse wichang wi-e khatdi kasabo khatse sachang sa-e, tiuradi saju mibo-e.”
Sichiujiu
“Israel mai Rawang
Iniu paliutu phuikhaijiu haibo kadihga paliutu maluang wanglan rabo-e. Iniu paliutu tunkaokiu makjiu thiusan khangkhai rabo-e; Iniu paliutu pepad makjiu lingkhai rabo-e.
I hai
“Judah gu chawang Zedekiah nai patu majang kadih thinmai, khatdi haiga bamdiakbo Jerusalem maidung maksai Egypt lam tadmi maidungtura

Iniu paliu riga wajiuga kasabo kamkhaiboga kadihpirigu jat hinaniu nping charensu rabo-e. Maidungniu paliutu nuimensu rabo-e, paliutu din charuang thiujiu kagarabo-e, sichiujiu pabam hinaga paliu zan din dengjiu tasiang siang rabo-e.
Iniu paliu paopeh maidungtu khatdi paliutu pikhaibo kadihga mai khattudi masia khai makra tathiu-chari, charakhum wangjiu katiu riangbo khatdi chararen haise paliu riga phungwang khai rabo-e.”
Iniu Judah mai nai Jerusalem mai mathiu khuga din-e,
“Iniu naliu khuga Amon nahpiu Josiah niu Judah mai wang thiujiu mawangbo kariu-je-sumkiubo kum gasu, tuhoi tangbo, takum makai-je-sum lungga
niu pavangmai, phaimiukakungdung situ langkhai saomakjiu bamdi naliuniu nkingkhai makge, maksai wajeng sikhai makge.
Naliugu kasabo npui gasu, kasabo tienkam gasu marilujiu lungmilo, chiusai
Katambo radungtu machajiu khatdi naliuniu kamlubo radungtu machajiu khatdi kahumjiu,
Chiudi
“Sichiujiu naliuniu pacham phung makbo jengniu, Ngamkambo

‘Iniu maidungtu tingpi lamsu khatdi avangpiu, Babylon mai wangpiu Nebuchadnezzar tu langwangne. Iniu paliutu puiwang lujiu Judah maitu khatdi sibo wonjengga lungmai hinatu atungjiu chari thiune. Iniu haibo jattu khatdi sibo wonjengga lungbo mai hinatu tingtheng leng kam nchum mirabo-e, sise mainiu phui pingbo khatdi maisuang habo lunlung thiurabo-e.
Paliugu chunwi-ringabo khuan khatdi tanao-tanah thiujiu mathabo khuan hina Iniu kam maha mine. Paliu mibung leng padui hami rabo-e, khatdi katiu-kasak hami rabo-e.
Haibo kadih pakhiangna nchum mine khatdi phuiping mine, sibo wonjengga bambo jat hina Babylon mai wangtu takum riakchinnia machajiu lungmi rabo-e.
Sibosai, Iniu Babylon haitu khatdi pawangdungtu paliu nuan jengniu sajai pirabo-e. Iniu sibo kadih situ tingtheng leng kam nchum mirabo-e.
Iniu jatdung riga kapingbo magenthak phungwangne chiujiu Jeremiah khuga dinkhai mibo hinase--khatdi haibo ariakkhuangga raokhai mibogu magenthak hina siniu Babylon maitu sajai pirabo-e.
Iniu paliu tienkam saisuijiu Babylon maitu chakhum ruikhai rabo-e, sichiujiu jatdung nai chawangdung vang paliutu pithiu khai rabo-e.’”
Israel mai Rawang,
Sise paliuniu sak lusai, paliu chun thiusi lakjiu, paliu tad tangat lad-ladmi rabo-e, palamra paliutu atungra Iniu chari langkhai mibo jengniu-e.”
Siniu

Sise Jerusalem ga khatdi Judah namdak hinaga, paliugu jupaodung nai chawangdungtu pisak khaide siga paliu hai kathaidih thiujiu sise maidungniu phuiping mirabo-e khatdi paliu suang hami rabo-e, sichiujiu paliu zan haitu katang tasiang thiujiu dinbam mirabo-e.
Sibo jawpiang gasu pisak khairabo maidung riak siniu:
Egypt mai wangpiu, pagu chakampaodung nai jupaodung;
Egypt mai hina khatdi Egypt dihga sangdiumai hina;
Uz kadihga chawangmai hina;
Ashkelon, Gaza, Ekron khatdi Ashdod ga bambo Philistia namdi hina;
Edom, Moab khatdi Ammon mai hina;
Tyre nai Sidon wang hina;
Mediterranean kadihgu chawang hina;
Dedan, Tema khatdi Buz namdi hina;
paliu pitham kakip madun mibo mai hina;
Arabia gu chawang hina;
kathaidihga lungbo jatdung wang hina;
Zimri, Elam khatdi Media wang hina;
tingpilam bambo, kadiugadi, kanagadi lungbo chawang hina hai-e.
Kadihpiriga kalungbo jat hinaniu haise sakkam rabo-e. Kanamthuboga Babylon mai wangpiuniu haise sakrabo-e.
Sigasu
Wagaje naben gasu chapiangse paliuniu pon raosai khatdi sigasu sakmak sai, Ngamkambo

Iniu agu namdi siak gasu kam mahabo tien hai thinsu rabo-e. Paliu tura sajai pilakge chiu naliuniu maning jiuma? Makge, paliutu sajai pirabo-e, palamra Iniu kadihpiriga lungbo mai hina riga chari langwang rabo-e. Ngamkambo
“Jeremiah yo, Iniu dinmibo hina hai nangniu paokhai rabo-e. Nangniu haibo maidung khuga dinkhai siak rabo-e.
Paniu pamaidungtu atungjiu makiak mara-kasin wangne;
mai khatniu mumsy niakjiu makiakbo kum paniu sen wangne.
Kadihpiriga kalungmai hinaniu pakhuan chiurabo-e.
Sibo kavai khuanse kadih pamalan tangbo chiurabo-e.
Paniu mai hinatu madiurabo-e khatdi kasamaitu kamshat mirabo-e.
Ngamkambo
Sibo nai
Kaplulo, naliu jupaodung, amaidungtu khuanpaodung, kap marungjiu senlulo! Achungjiu tabui jiuga nkhuang kalalulo. Naliutu kamshat mirabo wanse wang kinne, kamichidungtu kumjiu naliutu gimirabo-e.
Siga naliu marilura npui wadi hamide.
Naliuniu chunsajiu kap marung bamme, palamra
Ndongqui siniu pagu tulimki situ phutmibo kum,
“Charaky gu ladjan bamga chaplujiu Iniu nakhuga chamtan pikhaibo hinase, Judah lamsu siga kahumra wangmai khuga senpad khailo. Kamasiakbo wakhatdi thiu mane.
Maidungniu nking lujiu paliugu kasabo npuise thon mibo sui-e. Paliuniu sichiu kamsai, Idi paliugu tienkam kasa jengniu paliu riga phungwangra rangbambo gasu alung kali khaibi rabo-e.”
Maidung khuga dinkhaira
Khatdi avangmai, phaimiukakungdung situ langkhaijiu dinkhaibo hina naliu chun khairabo-e. Chiudi paliuniu dinkhaibose naliuniu wadaodi lukhai makge.
Naliuniu lukhai makjiu palun bamsai, Iniu Shiloh ga
Iniu Charaky lungga dinbo lad haise singkudung, phaimiukakungdung khatdi maidung mathiuniu chiulude,
sichiujiu
Haibo Raky hai Shiloh tu kumjiu kam maha mine, khatdi siga mai khatnadi lunglanlak mide chiujiu nangniu dekamjiu
Degu padmilo chiubo hai Judah maigu jupaodungniu chiuluboga, paliuniu paliu wangkining gasu Charakyga pakwang karen lujiu Kasanbo Rengmun gase ntao karen sude.

Sichiujiu singkumai khatdi phaimiukakung mainiu jupaodung khatdi maidung khuga din-e, “Paniu aliugu namditu din masabo jengniu patu hai kamshat mira chalad dintap khaibo suimide. Naliu kuon siakniu pacham chiulude.”
Siga Iniu din-e, “Haibo Raky khatdi haibo namditu din masa khaibo naliuniu chiulubo hina hai dinkhaira
Naliu Rawang
I haira naliugu pumtan hangga bammide! Naliuniu wi-e khatdi maji-e, chiujiu maningbo hina akhuga kamsulo.
Chiudi haise sisiak lulo wagaje naliuniu atu kamshat misai, naliu khatdi haibo namdiga pamao-pameng hamaitu kamshatbogu kamaobose naliu riga bam mide, palamra naliutu kachankhai raleng
Siga jupaodung nai maidungniu singku nai phaimiukakung maidung khuga din-e, “Haibo piuniu aliu Rawang,
Sibosai, katingmai khangsia suchap lujiu, wang madui bammai khuga din-e,
“Hezekiah niu Judah ga chawang thiubambo tingga, Moresheth gu phaimiukakung Micah niu mai hina khuga Ngamkambo
‘Zion haitu chalu kumjiu phumi rabo-e,
Jerusalem hai mathakhu nchum mirabo-e,
khatdi Charaky luongse mariu mawimi rabo-e!’
Chawang Hezekiah nai Judah maidungniu Micah tu kamshat makge. sibosung Hezekiah niu
(Siga mai kakimai Kiriath Jearim gasu, Shemaiah nahpiu Uriah niu
Chawang Jehoiakim khatdi pagu riphenmai khatdi chakampaodung siniu Uriah chamse chiuluboga, chawangniu patu kamshat mira kam sude. Chiudi Uriah niu sise siluboga pingjiu Egypt lam pak marentad mide.
Chiudi Chawang Jehoiakim niu Akhbor nahpiu Elnathan khatdi khangsia maitu Egypt lam tadjiu Uriah tu majang wangra langkhaide.
Paliuniu patu chawang Jehoiakim khuga pui wangde, paliuniu patu chawang khuga majang wangboga patu kamshat lujiu mathiu raobamga paphawse thonkhai mide).
Chiudi alam liangbo Shaphan nahpiu, Ahikam bambo jengniu atu kamshat mira maidung khuga pikhai makge.
aronna chamigi nai tasing tachai khaibo khoilujiu wangkham kamlujiu sise amakhuakga khailo chiujiu dinkhai-e.
Sigasu Edom, Moab, Ammon, Tyre khatdi Sidon maigu chawangdung, dihsungpaodung Jerusalem ga chawang Zedekiah tu adaora wangmai hina khuga dinkhaira
Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo
“Agu kadibo pumtan nai jengtan siniu kadihpiri haitu Iniu damkhaibo-e, khatdi chakhao, chamai hina lungra Iniu damkhaibo-e, khatdi Iniu kadalu maileng Iniu pikhaibo-e.
Avangpiu, Babylon mai Wangpiu Nebuchadnezzar hangga jat hinatu pikhaibo hai Iniu-e, sichiujiu khaoring niudi patu machara Iniu taliu khai mibo-e.

Jat hinaniu patu macha rabo-e. Sichiujiu pagu kadih hai kao makthen paliuniu patah-panah maidung tudi macha rabo-e. Sichiujiu pagu jat hainiu pumtan bambo jatdungtu khatdi kadibo wangdungtu macha rabo-e.

“Chiudi jat khat maksai chawangdih khatniu pagu mawangbo hangga ngutkhai maksai Nebuchadnezzar niu paliutu kam maha loimak then, chariniu, katiu riangboniu khatdi chararenniu sibo jat situ Iniu sajai pirabo-e.

Phaimiukakungdung cham maksai mai khatniu wangrabo lamga masuang dinkhaibo, maksai chamangniu maksai kashaibo hiunadungtu kuwanglu tadi, maksai chamik thao kadadbo tudi nking tulo. Paliuniu naliutu pijiu Babylon mai wangpiu hangga wangmak raleng kambo-e.
Paliuniu naliutu sonlujiu, naliutu naliugu kadih gasu, kadiubo kadih lam puitadmi rabo-e. Iniu naliutu hathonmi rabo-e, khatdi naliutu kam mahami rabo-e.
Chiudi jat khatniu Babylon maigu chawang hangga ngutjiu lungra suikhai sai, siga lungjiu tentiu ruitiujiu lungra Iniu suikhai bine.
Sikumjiu Judah maigu chawang Zedekiah khuga Iniu din-e, “Babylon maigu chawang hangga ngut khai milo. Patu khatdi pamaitu machalulo, chiusai naliu ringlu bui-e.
Dekamjiu namaidungniu chariga, maksai charakhum wangboga, maksai chararen ganiu shairalo? Sise Babylon mai wangpiu hangga ngutra suikhai makbo, riga padraleng
Pahangga ngutkhai makbo mailengra phaimiukakung maidungniu naliu khuga dinkhaibo situ nkingmi tulo. Paliuniu naliutu sonbambo-e.

papum siakniu din-e paniu paliutu langkhai makge sichiujiu paliuniu pazan gasu arat dinbambo-e. Siniu naliutu paniu hathon padmi rabo-e, sichiujiu naliutudi naliu khuga arat dinbo phaimiukakungdung tudi kamshatmi rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu
Paliu cham nking tulo! Babylon gu chawang hangga ngutkhai lulo chiusai naliu ringlune! Dekamjiu haibo namditu kam nchummi ralo?
Wagaje paliu haise phaimiukakung siakge sai khatdi

(Nebuchadnezzar niu Judah gu chawang Jehoiakim nahpiu Jehoiachin khatdi Jerusalem nai Judah gu jupaodungtu Babylon lam lutad mibo wan-ga katiangdung, tataaginiu kambo tadui-duang khatdi matom kari khatdi charaky gu chakhiubung kasia masiak khai diakge).
“Ngamkambo
Paliutu Babylon lam lutad mine sichiujiu Iniu paliutu alung kiulan makthen, siga paliu bammi rabo-e. Sigasu Iniu paliutu haibo bamga puiwang malan khai bine.
Israel mai Rawang Ngamkambo
Takum nia lung gasu chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu Babylon lam lutad mibo Charaky gu chakhiu-chalan hina luwang malan rabo-e.
Babylon lam puitad mibo Judah mai hina jaojiu, Jehoiakim nahpiu Jehoiachin, Judah gu chawangpiu tudi Iniu puiwang malanwang birabo-e. Yo, Babylon maigu chawang pumtantu kampangmi rabo-e.
Siga Charakyga chapbambo singkudung nai maidung mathiu suangga, Iniu Hananiah khuga din-e:
“Maisuang ha-e!
Chiudi Iniu nakhuga khatdi maidung khuga dinbo hai nkinglo.

Asuangga khatdi nasuangga dinkhai mibo phaimiu-kakungdung siniu tathiu-chari, chakhum wangrabo khatdi chararen hai jatdung riga khatdi pumtan bambo wangdih riga wangrabo hina hai din masuang khai mibo-e.
Chiudi phaimiukakung khatniu agi-manaibo wangraleng din masuang khaijiu, sise wangtang dasai, patuse phaimiukakung siakge chiujiu maidungniu lukhai-e.”
Sigasu Hananiah niu amakhuak gasu wongkhamse khoipad lujiu kakhiuroi-roi mide,
sichiu lujiu maidung mathiu masuangga din-e: “Nebuchadnezzar niu jatdung mathiu riga khai bambo wongkhamse haichiujiu kampangmi rabo-e, chiujiu
Pakak khat saiga, Hananiah khulam tadlujiu haise dinkhaira
“Nangniu tasinggu wangkham situ kampang lubo sui-e, chiudi paniu chagigu wangkham malin khai rabo-e, chiujiu
Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo
Sigasu Iniu Hananiah khuga haise dinsan khai-e, “Kinglo, Hananiah yo!
Sijengniu
Sichiujiu sibo kumgu chinniabo hiuga Hananiah shai mide.

Iniu chamlen raokhaibo hai chawang Jehoiachin, sigasu papui, chawanggu chakampaodung, Judah maigu jupaodung khatdi Jerusalem gu jupaodung, chabensiam simaidung, khatdi changam kamsi maidungtu puitad kam mibo saiga-e.
Iniu chamlense Shaphan nahpiu Elasah khatdi Hilkiah nahpiu Gemariah khuga pikhaibo-e, panaitu Judah gu Chawang Zedekiah niu Babylon gu chawang Nebuchadnezzar khuga langkhaibo-e. Sise haichiubo-e:
“Israel mai Rawang Ngamkambo
‘Chaky thiulujiu siga padbo hina tiujiu naliu lunglo.
Tanao-tanah thiujiu lunglo. Naliu nahdung tudi pijiu paliu nao-nah thiujiu nahmai kengjiu pilunglo. Naliu chalun kingkhangra kamrabo-e, pijiu nkhin kiumi tulo.
Iniu naliutu kavang thiukhaibo namdi hai wiraleng tatien thiulo. Paliu disu raleng akhuga paliuleng khenglo, paliu disu saira, naliudi disurabo-e.
Israel mai Rawang,
Azan gasu aratjiu naliu khuga dinbo-e. Iniu paliutu langkhaibo makge. Ngamkambo
Iniu wahina sibamme, naliutu pi magenthiu makra, pijiu aman khaira, pasaileng kawi pikhaira Iniu rangkhai nbambo-e.
Naliuniu akhuga wangjiu khengrabo-e, siga Iniu paokak khai rabo-e.
Naliuniu atu phiurabo-e, siga naliuniu daorabo-e palamra naliu lungchun pakhiangnaniu atu phiu-e.
Yo, Iniu din-e, naliuniu atu daolu rabo-e siga Iniu naliu kadih haise malankhai rabo-e. Iniu naliutu kavang pithiu khaijiu, lungmara tad mibo bam hina gasu Iniu naliutu khomwang lanbi rabo-e.
“Babylon ga phaimiukakungdung pikhai-e chiujiu naliuniu din-e,
David niu mawang khai mibo dihga, mawangrabo khatdi sibo namdiga bambo maidung lamga
Ngamkambo

Iniu paliutu tathiu-chari, charakhum khatdi chararen thinlujiu paliutu harabo-e, siga kadihpirigu jatdung siniu, paliutu ngaolubo mai hinaniu pingjiu charensu rabo-e. Iniu paliutu kam mara khaibo jengniu paliu suang harabo-e khatdi haise ngaobo mai hina siniu nping-charen kam rabo-e. Maidungniu paliutu kagajiu nuimen rabo-e khatdi paliu zan situ tasiang kumjiu dinrabo-e.
Haise paliu khuga padrabo-e palamra Iniu avangmai, phaimiukakungdungtu langkhaijiu acham dinbambo haitu paliuniu lukhai makge. Paliuniu nking khai makge.
Babylon lam kavang thiura Iniu langkhai mibo naliu mathiu,
“Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo

Sichiujiu Jerusalem gasu Babylon lam kavangleng mintad mibo maidung siniu mai khat riga tasiang siangnisai, paliuniu haichiu dinrabo-e, ‘Zedekiah nai Ahab tu Babylon mai wangpiuniu maring rushat mibo kum,
Paliu sansetse haichiu rabo-e, palamra paliu nuan hai kapingbo-e—paliu makha-e, khatdi
Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo
“Jehoiada sung natu
Dekamjiu Anathoth maipiu Jeremiah niu maidung khuga dinjiu bambo haitu wadi kamkhai makjiulo?
Patuse kham mirabo-e, palamra paniu Babylon ga bammaitu, siga lungmatheng mirabo-e, paliu ky, paliu lu, thiulujiu khatdi kamlujiu tiulo chiujiu dinbambo-e.”
Zephaniah niu chamlense akhuga kenkhai-e,
sichiujiu Babylon lam kavang thiutad mibo mai mathiu khuga Shemaiah lamga dinkhaibo hai pisikhai-e:
Israel mai Rawang,
“Iniu nakhuga dinbo hina ariakkhuang khatga raokhai lulo,
palamra Iniu amaidung, Judah mai nai Israel maitu malan khaira pawanse wang kinne. Iniu paliu paopeh leng pikhai mibo kadihse paliuleng pikhai lanjiu paliugu thiulan rabo-e.
“Charenbo khuan I chiu-e,
sise kapingbo-e, agi-manaibo khuan makge.
Tuhoira mathak lujiu makum khai lulo!
Maipiuniu tanah lungbo sima?
Chiusai dekamjiu maipiudung siniu paliu won kaba lujiu
maipuigu manathad kum marabam jiulo?
Dekamjiu mai hinase abasai mijiulo?
Kapingbo tingmikse wangkinne;
kakibo tingmikniu haisitu kada silakge--
amaidungniu chariu magenthiubo wan haise,
wangbamdi paliu ring masiak lubui-e.”
Ngamkambo
Sibosung, paliu Rawang,
Israel maidung yo, charenmi tulo.
Naliutu bangkhai bambo kadiubo kadih gasu Iniu naliutu gukhai rabo-e.
Naliu chakyga agi-manaijiu wang lunglan rabo-e;
naliuniu manangbo thiulakge,
mai khatniudi naliutu kam charen lanlakge.
Iniu naliu khuga wangjiu rankhai bine.
naliutu pilung marakhai bambo jat hinatu Iniu kam mahami rabo-e,
chiudi Iniu naliutu kam maha lakge.
Iniu naliutu sajai pikhai makjiu talakge;
chiudi naliutu sajai pikhai lubo sai Iniu naliutu wijiu akhi khai birabo-e.
“Naliu jamse wisilak mide,
naliu jam hai wikung mide.
Naliutu phuikhaira mai khatdi hamide,
naliu thad wilura chapiu wadi ha-e,
naliutu kam mawi lura maningta mide.
Naliutu lungsamai siniu naliutu mangaikam mide;
paliuniu naliutu phuison khaira machunta mide.
Iniu naliutu mikremaitu kumjiu aphensu mide; naliugu sajai hai tanju mide,
palamra naliu nuan hai kengju mide khatdi naliugu kasabose diju mide.
Naliu jam jengniu wa dinlan talo, sise wilan silak mide.
Iniu naliutu haichiujiu sajai pikhaibo-e, palamra naliu nuanse kengju mide
khatdi naliugu kasabose diju mide.
Chiudi tuhoira, naliutu kajong lumai situ kajonglu mirabo-e,
khatdi naliugu mikremai hinatu kavangleng puitad kammi rabo-e.
Naliutu rekhai mai hinatu rekhai rabo-e,
khatdi naliutu haphun mibo mai hinatu haphun kammi rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu wikhai lan bine, Iniu naliu jam hina wikhai bine,
naliugu mikre mainiu haichiu dinbamdi, ‘Zion hai hathon mibo jatle;
mai khat niudi patu manang khai tamide.’
“Iniu amaidungtu paliugu kadih malan khai bine
khatdi kikhun hinatu lungsa khai bine;
Jerusalem haise thiusu lanrabo-e
khatdi pawangbamse pikhailan rabo-e.
Siga lungbo maidungniu thuonbo lui thiune, paliu chun wijiu senne.
Agu thoidamniu paliu chalun king rabo-e;
agu thoidamniu paliutu chakhuangthiu khaine.
Karai masuanggu pumtanse pikhaijiu paliutu matipjiu pi lungkhai lanrabo-e;
naliutu rekhai maitu Iniu sajai pikhai rabo-e.
Paliugu jat gasu paliugu mawangpaose padrabo-e,
paliu ruanggasu chawangnah padrabo-e.
Iniu patu kukhai sai, pah akhuga wangrabo-e, kukhai maksai,wang-hu rabo saolo?
Paliu hai amai thiu rabo-e, khatdi Iniu paliu Rawang thiurabo-e.
Shairabo gasu paklu maidungtu Iniu kathaidih gasu lungsa khai bide. Israel maidungniu mathak raleng masenjiu bambo tingga,
kadiu lamsu Iniu paliutu ngaolen khai bide. Israel maidung yo, Iniu naliutu pawan machang lungsabo-e, sichiujiu agu saomakbo lungsiat hai Iniu naliu khuga lenkhaijiu bambo-e.
Pawan khatra Iniu naliutu thiusu khailan bine. Pawan khatra, naliuniu chunwi mathajiu nchom biulan rabo-e.
Samaria luongbutga naliuniu mumsy linglan rabo-e, sichiujiu naliuniu lingkhaibo mumsy hai naliuniu tiu rabo-e.
Yo, Ephraim luongbut rammai gasu akhemaidung siniu ‘Khe aliu Rawang
“Jatdung ruangga dithubo, Israel maidung jengniu ringabo lui thiulo.
Naliugu thuonkiubo lui thiulo,
kamasiak mai hinatu paniu ranlude.’
Iniu paliutu tingpilam suniu majang wangjiu
kadih pamalan-ga paliutu khom madui wang rabo-e.
Paphi tangmai nai pamik tiatmai
pawon kaphungpui, ngena mana surabo
puidung situ puiwang aruang rabo-e.
Kadibo jat khat thiujiu paliu malanwang rabo-e.
Iniu paliutu majang wanglan dasai,
paliuniu kapjiu khatdi kakheng thiujiu malanwang rabo-e.
Paliu phi masuimak raleng Iniu paliutu
npui manaibo gadi, singgiu gadi jukhai rabo-e.
I hai Israel mai piu-e,
Ephraim hai anah-naraibo-e.”
khatdi kadiubo singgiu hugen lamdi acham hai paoron khailo.
Iniu amaidungtu hamarapu khai-e,
chiudi mily khuanmainiu milytu gaobo kumjiu
Iniu paliutu gaowang aruang khai rabo-e.
Iniu Israel maidungtu khenrang pithiu khai-e,
khatdi katanbo jat khugasu paliutu ranpad khaide.
Iniu kalen pikhaibodung—jaw khatdi olive-sa,
matom-kabui nai milygu kalen jaojiu
paliuniu chunwijiu matha ringabo lui thiujiu Zion Luongga wangrabo-e.
Paliu hai tadui bambo kareng kumrabo-e;
paliuleng pageng kabambo hinase paliuniu daorabo-e.
Siga liunamaidung chunwijiu chalen lenrabo-e,
siga maipiudung, chabonmai khatdi katingmai mathiu chunwi ringa rabo-e.
Paliu achungjiu bambo gasu Iniu piring-nga khai bine
paliugu chariubo gasu pijiu amankhai bine.
Iniu singkudungtu tiuwithubo tatekse pitiu khai bine,
khatdi amaidung leng pageng bambo hina pikhaijiu kimkhai bine.
“Ramah lamse chakhuan khat I chiu-e, kiuhuijiu kap bambo khuan-e.
Rachel niu patu hiamjiu bamdi suimakge;
panahmai tadkam mibo jengniu pah kapjiu bamme.
Kaptajiu namatuise nunsang milo.
na-nahmaidung leng kamkhai mibo hinase naphijeng daomakbo thiu lakge;
mikremai dih lamsu paliu malanwang rabo-e.
Pasai wangraboga naliuleng agunbo bamme;
naliu nahmaidung chaky lam malanwang rabo-e.
“Israel maidungniu chunsajiu chamlam bambo khuan I chiu-e,
chiudi nangniu aliutu majai raleng katikhai-e.
Aliutu majang wanglan khailo;
Aliu Rawang,
Aliuniu nakhu gasu maritad mibo-e,
chiudi tuhoira malanwangni mide.
Nangniu aliutu sajai pikhaibo jengniu,
chunsajiu aliu pee makhumkiu mide.
Aliu zu sajiu mangam mide,
palamra aliuniu chabon tingga nuan ten mide.’
“Israel mai yo, nang hai anah kungthubo,
Iniu lungsa thubo nah si-e.
Iniu nazan dintaobo hinaga,
Iniu natu lungsabo lungchun siniu
alungchun hai nakhulam bam mide, Iniu lungsa khai bine.
Naliuniu saodiak mibo npui phiulan lujiu;
npui kam tasi khaijiu madan kam khailo.
Malan wanglo, Israel maidung yo,
naliuniu saodiak mibo ky nai namdi gase wanglo.
Malum habo maidung yo, dethengkha naliuniu makhinjiu bamralo?
Npuimai khatniu npiumai khattu gukhaibo kumjiu
Iniu kasanbo damjiu kam tamsin khai mide.”
Ngamkambo Israel mai Rawang,
masanbo bam haitu thoidam pikhaibo thiu milo.’
Maidung hainiu Judah dihga lungjiu, sibo namdi pakhiangnaga lungrabo-e, khatdi siga chalu tien thiumai nai milykhuanmai bamrabo-e.
Mariujiu bambo maidungtu pikim khaira katiu Iniu pikhai bine khatdi chariujiu bambo maidungtu pi mathak amankhai bine.
Sichiujiu, maidungniu dinrabo-e, ‘Iniu tadlujiu jikiu khai-e, khatdi buangsu mathak amansai khai-e.’
Iniu pamen bajiu, kam masa mira manang khaibo kumjiu, Iniu paliutu lingkhaira khatdi thiukhaira manangkhai lanrabo-e.
Sibo wanse wangboga maidungniu haichiu dinlak mide:
‘Puipiu maidungniu kakhiangbo mumsy tiu-e, siga panahmaidung hiu chakimme.’
Sibosung mai khatniu kakhiangbo mumsy tiusai pahiu chakim rabo-e, sichiujiu mai hinaniu pa-nuan nuan jengniu shairabo-e.”
Haise Iniu paliu paopeh maidungtu, paliu ben julujiu Egypt dih gasu npadbo tingga, ladriat thiukhaibo kum lakge. Iniu paliu kina kumjiu bamliu tadi, paliuniu agu chamriat haitu majai makge.

Iniu Israel maidung khuga kasanbo ladriat kamkhai rabo sira haichiu rabo-e: Iniu agu tacheng-tajai hai paliu lungga pikhaijiu, paliu malungga raokhai rabo-e. Iniu paliu Rawang thiurabo-e, sichiujiu paliuniu amaidung thiurabo-e.
Paliu ruangga mai khatniudi
N-nien tingga thaoben khai raleng
nchun thaoben khaira chahiu, chagan pikhaibi-e.
Paniu duipuitu kam malai khaiboga pakhuan padle
pazan haise Ngamkambo
Ting-kadih cheng kali makjiu bamthen
Israel maidungniu jat khat thiujiu bamrabo-e chiujiu paniu ladriat thiukhai-e.
Tingpuk situ madat ngamlu mibo nai khatdi kadih phibang sitang lubo nainiu,
paliu tienkam saisuijiu Israel maitu paniu luthon padrabo-e.
“Hananel kiton tingnu lamsu Pakebo Rengmun katang Jerusalem hai thiusu lanrabo wanse wangkinne,” chiujiu
Sichiujiu sibo ramrai riangse sigasu Gareb luongbut tangjiu Goah tu maguibo katang rabo-e.

Sibo ramjeng pakhiangna, kashaimaitu baikhaibo bam, wa taniabo taliang khaibo bam khatdi Kidron gu giurak riga bambo luzam hina, sigasu tingbanglam Chaqon Rengmun tangbo, akhuga masanbo thiumi rabo-e. Namdi situ wadaodi kam masabo maksai kam mahabo thiu lanlak mide.”
Sibo wan-ga Babylon mai wangpiu riphendungniu Jerusalem tu asunjiu bamme, sibo wan-ga atu hai chawangkininggu tathukyga bangman bambo-e.
Atu hai Chawang Zedekiah niu bangman khaibo-e, palamra
sichiujiu chawang Zedekiah niu mari lulakge. Patu minlujiu Babylon mai wangpiu ben-ga pikhaijiu, paniu patu zudao siakjiu npao rabo-e.
Zedekiah tu Babylon lam puitadjiu, Iniu patu wakhat kamkhai makthen, siga pah bamrabo-e. Paniu Babylon maitu aphen tadi, para taphuang lakge.
Apao Shallum nahpiu, Hanamel niu, Benjamin luongriangga bambo Anathoth gase palu liura dinwangne, palamra I hai pariang-parui ga nbangthubo khatdi liura akaji siakbo-e, chiujiu
Sichiujiu
Hanamel khugasu chaluse Iniu liulude, sibo manse rangkang kariu-je-chinniakiu pi-e.
Suikhaibo ariakga lamchap jaolujiu chamtan raokhailu, rangkangse taju gasu madiu lujiu pimide.
Sichiujiu suikhaibo ariak nai liulubo ariak hinase Iniu khoilude,

sise Iniu Mahseiah tahpiu, Neriah nahpiu Baruch khuga pikhaide. Iniu Hanamel khatdi liulubo ariakga paliu zan raokhai mibo lamchap maidung khatdi ladjankyga ntao bammaidung mathiu suangga patu pikhai mibo-e.
Paliu mathiu masuangga Iniu Baruch khuga din-e,
“Chalu liulubogu khatdi suikhaibogu ariak hina hai khoilujiu wangkinbo takum wajiukha baikhai mira leng Chagamli khat lungga khai milo chiujiu, Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo
Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo
Chalu liulubo ariakse Baruch khuga pikhai lubo sai Iniu kakheng thiu-e,
“Tanthubo

Sichiujiu nagu saomakbo lungsiatse chamai sang-sang khuga lenkhai-e, chiudi maidung siniu khatdi paliu puipiudung siniu nuan kammibo jengniu paliutu sajaidi pi-e. Nangra pumtan bambo khatdi kadibo Rawang si-e; nangra Ngamkambo
Ningtingbo ngam marang khailujiu nangniu kangambo ngamse kamme; maidungniu kambambo hinase nangniu ngao-e, khatdi paliugu tienkam saisuijiu nangniu paliutu tathuon pikhai-e.

Nda masuang, nangniu Egypt ga tasibo khatdi maisuang habose kam khai mibo-e, khatdi thainai tangbo saomakjiu, Israel mai khuga khatdi kakibo jatdung khuga kamkhaijiu bamme, sichiujiu pabam hinaga natu sikam bamme.
