Nagu tasibo nai maisuang habo ngam siniu aliugu mikremaitu kam nping, kam charen khaijiu Egypt dih gasu namai Israel maidungtu nangniu maluang npad khaibi-e.
Nangniu paliu paopeh maidung khuga ladriat khaibo kumjiu paliutu nangniu kadih patam wibo nai kalek wibo pikhai bide.

Chiudi paliuniu haibo kadihga wangjiu paliugu thiuluboga, paliuniu nacham majai makge maksai nagu katikhaibo situ lukhai makge; nangniu paliutu kamraleng chamtan pikhaibose paliuniu wadi kam makge. Sijengniu paliu riga nangniu haibo magenthak haise piwang khaibo-e.

“Babylon maidungniu namdi situ haphun lura charireng kam lujiu taoweng magui lude sichiujiu paliuniu chari hangutjiu bamme. Namdise chariniu, katiu riangboniu khatdi chararen gasu paliu ben-ga kaokhai mirabo-e. Nangniu din khaibose pachangjiu padboga ngaosu rabo-e.
Sichiu bamdi Tanthubo
Siga
“I hai chamaina hinagu Tingwang,
Iniu haibo namdi hai Babylon maigu Chawang Nebuchadnezzar khatdi pagu riphenmai khuga pikhaijiu paliuniu haise haphun lujiu chami ruthon mirabo-e.
Maidungniu chaky npom riga Baal tu kahumjiu maruta rukhaijiu kadboga alung kampom khaibo ky hinase jaojiu, paliuniu namdi haitu ruthon mirabo-e.
Israel maidung nai Judah maidunggu characham paphibang gasu achun wimakge khatdi paliu ngamkam siniu alung kampom mide.
Haibo namdiga bambo maidungniu, haise thiusubo nai gasu alung kampomjiu, alung kam masa mide.
Judah mai nai Jerusalem mainiu paliugu chawangdung nai jupaodung, singkudung nai phaimiukakungdung tu aruang lujiu, kasabo ngam hina kamkhai mibo jengniu, haise kam maha mira Iniu chapkhai mibo-e.
Paliuniu akhu gasu manuk lujiu tad mide; Iniu paliutu katikhaijiu bamdi, paliuniu nkingkhai makge khatdi sikhai makge.
Atu kahumra thiukhai bambo Charaky gadi matai-marengbo charamengse paliuniu kam khai-e, sichiujiu paliuniu haise kam tania mide.

Paliuniu Molech ra khuga paliu nahpuidung paliu nahpiudungtu charathiujiu kadkhaira, Hinnom gu Ramjeng ga Baal khuga rathakbam thiu khaide. Haikumbo kamra Iniu paliutu chamtan pikhai makge, sichiujiu paliuniu haikumbo kamjiu Judah maidungtu pijiu nuan kam khaine chiubo alungchun ga I maning khai makge.”
Israel mai Rawang,
Agu lungpom nai lungnuat thiujiu paliutu Iniu hamara khai mibo kadih pabam hina gasu maidung situ majangwang khailan rabo-e, sichiujiu paliutu haibo kadihga wadi manangbo hajiu pilung khai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu paliuniu amaidung thiurabo-e, khatdi Iniu paliu Rawang thiurabo-e.
Iniu paliu ringtingga machunbo khat paliuleng nai paliu kaikikdung leng wilura, pawan machang atu chakhuang thiura pikhaine.

Iniu paliu khuga tingthenggu ladriat kamkhaine. Paliuleng kawibose kamkhaira wadaodi Iniu mathak lakge, khatdi paliu lungchun pakhiangna siniu, atu pingra Iniu kamkhaine, sichiujiu paliuniu wadaodi akhu gasu maritad lanlak mide,
paliuleng kawi kamkhaibo jengniu alung kimbo thiurabo-e, khatdi Iniu paliutu haibo kadihga tingthengjiu pilung khai rabo-e.
“Iniu haibo maidung khuga chariubo phungwang khai mibo kum gapjiu, Iniu ladriat khaibo kawibo hinase paliutu pikhai rabo-e.

Maidungniu haichiu din bamme chiubora haibo kadihse kathaidih kummi rabo-e, siga chakhao-chamai khatnadi lungta mine, sichiujiu haise Babylon maidung khuga pikhai mine. Chiudi naikhatra haibo kadihga chaluse liulan rabo-e.

Maidungniu haidungse liu rabo-e, khatdi suikhaibo ariak gase tacheng-tajai raokhaijiu khatdi madan diangkhai lujiu lamchap thiukhai rabo-e. Haise Benjamin ramlungga, Jerusalem tu lung maguibo namdungga, Judah gu namdak hinaga, maluang ramga, khatdi Judah gu tingrun lam haise padrabo-e. Maidung situ paliu kadihga Iniu pilung khailan rabo-e.
Iniu ladjan-gu kavangkyga bambo wan,
Kadihpiritu damlujiu palun thiu khaibo khatdi pabam khatga khai nbambo
“Atu kulo, chiusai Iniu paokak khai bine; nangniu wadaodi simatai makbo, maisuang habo nai tasibo lamga Iniu natu dinkhai bine.
Israel mai Rawang,

Khangsia mainiu Babylon maitu aphen sune chiudi siga Iniu alungpom gasu kamshat mibo phawdung siniu piphui khai rabo-e. Iniu haibo namdi gasu maritad mibo-e, palamra haiga lungbo maidunggu tienkamse kasa jengniu-e.
Chiudi Iniu haibo namdi nai pamaidungtu wikhai lanjiu, paliutu wijiu pi lungkhai rabo-e. Agi-manaibo nai lungwibose mali-malanjiu pikhai bine.

Iniu Judah mai nai Israel maitu pi lungwi khai lanbine, khatdi paliuniu atu atungjiu nuan kammibo gasu paliutu kam masan khai lanrabo-e, khatdi paliuniu nda masuang lungkhai mibo kumgapjiu Iniu paliutu thiusu khai lanrabo-e.
Paliuniu atu suimakjiu akhuga kamaobo kamkhai mibo hinase Iniu kuak khairabo-e. sichiujiu Iniu paliu nuan nai paliuniu atung miboguse kuak khai rabo-e.

Jerusalem hai aleng ringabo, chakhuang thiubo, khatdi asao thiubo phibang khat thiurabo-e, khatdi Jerusalem maidung leng Iniu paliu namdiga kawibo kamkhaijiu disukhangbo hai kadihpirimai jat hinaniu sise chiuluboga pingjiu kaphik rai-rai surabo-e.”
Maidung siniu atu Kahumbokyga wangjiu thuonkiubo gu kadpadbo thin wangjiu chalui thiubo khuanse naliuniu chiusu rabo-e; siga paliuniu dinsune,
‘Ngamkambo
khatdi pagu lungsiat hai tingtheng-e!’
Karai masuang kum gapjiu haibo kadihtu Iniu pijiu lungwi khairabo-e.
Ngamkambo

Ramluong gen-ga bambo namdidung hinaga, Judah gu tingnulam bambo namdidung hinaga, Benjamin gu luongren ga bambo namdidung hinaga, Jerusalem tu lungmagui bambo namdung hinaga, khatdi Judah ga mily khuanmaidung siniu mily gaobo khuanse naikhatra senlan rabo-e.
sibo wan-ga David kaikik gasu tacheng matipbo chawang khat Iniu kadakhai rabo-e. Sibo chawangniu sibo kadih pakhiangnaga majibo nai nchangbo ngam kamkhai rabo-e.
Judah maidung nai Jerusalem maidungtu ranpad khaisai kasabo wadi hajiu lungbam mirabo-e. Namdi situ ‘
, Iniu ladriat thiukhaibo-e chiubora David kaikik siniu, siga pawan machang Israel mai wang thiurabo-e
khatdi Levi kiphiu gasu pawan machang singku thiujiu atu machajiu wa rukhaibo kadpad, alin-tara gu kadpad khatdi charathiubo gu tienkam hina kamrabo-e.”
“Iniu nchun, n-nientu situ ladriat thiukhai mide, sichiujiu paliuniu pawan-wan saisuijiu wangrabo-e, sibo ladriatse wadaodi kali lanlak mide.

Sikum gapjiu Iniu David khuga pakai-pakik siniu saomakjiu chawang thiuraleng chamriat thiukhai mibo-e. Siga Levi kiphiu mainiu singku thiujiu paliuniu atu pawan machang macha bamra Iniu singkudung khuga chamriat kamkhai mibo-e, sibo chamriatse wadaodi kampang lakge.

Iniu avangpiu David kaikik mai nai singku Levi kiphiu mai riakse pikeng khai rabo-e; sichiujiu tingpukga bambo chagan riak, maksai duipui taphuga bambo nbuiniang singam lulakbo kumjiu pikeng khai bine.”
“Iniu kadalubo kikhun kania, Judah mai nai Israel maitu Iniu luthon mide, chiujiu maidungniu dinbambo nangniu silu dama? Sichiujiu paliuniu amaidungtu wajeng simakjiu, jat khat leng lukhai tamide.
Chiudi

Haichiujiu Iniu kamkhai mibo kum gapjiu, Iniu Jacob kaikik maidung nai avangpiu David khuga agu ladriat saisuijiu kamkhai rabo-e. Abraham, Isaac, khatdi Jacob kaikik maidung riga mawang raleng David kaikik gasu khangkhattu Iniu kada khairabo-e. Iniu amaidungtu lungsa khaijiu paliutu pi lungwi khailanne.”
Israel mai Rawang,
Naliu paklu lakge; naliutu haphun lurabo-e khatdi naliutu paben ga pikhai mirabo-e. Naliuniu patu zudaojiu npaorabo-e; sichiujiu naliuniu Babylon lam tadrabo-e.
Zedekiah yo, Iniu nalamga kadinbo hai nking lulo. Natu chariga kamshat lakge.

Nangra agi-manaijiu shai rabo-e, khatdi namasuangga napao-napehmai chawang thiukhai maidungtu maruta rukhaijiu baikhaibo kumgapjiu naleng paliuniu maruta rukhaijiu natu baikhai rabo-e, Paliuniu najengga achungjiu dinrabo-e, ‘Aliugu chawang shai mide!’
Sichiujiu Babylon gu chawang riphendung siniu Jerusalem gu namdi situ asunjiu bambo wan-ga
Iniu siga bambo chawang Zedekiah khuga haibo champao pikhaide. Judah ga charireng kamkhaibo Lakhish nai Azekah ronna masiak khaibo situ chari maidung siniu asun sude.
Chawang Zedekiah nai Israel maidungniu kavangmaidung situ phutkhai mira ladriat thiukhaide,
paliuniu Hebrew mai vang dung situ, npuimai tudi, npiumai tudi mai khatniudi paliu karai kavang pithiuta mira suikhai lude.
Mai hina khatdi paliugu jupaodungniu paliu vangdung situ phut khai mira suikhaide khatdi paliu tu pi wadaodi kavang thiulan tara suikhaide.Paliuniu paliutu phutkhai mide,
chiudi pasai paliu lung lilan lujiu paliutu pi kavang thiukhai lanjiu khatdi manomjiu pi tatien thiukhai lan sude.
Siga Israel mai Rawang,
“Iniu naliu paopehtu Egypt mai vang thiubambo gasu, khenrang thiukhai lujiu maluang npadbo tingga ladriat thiukhai mibo-e. Iniu paliu khuga dinkhai mibo-e,

chiubora paliuniu takum chinnia tanggapsai, paliugu Hebrew mai vangdung situ phutkhai rabo-e, Hebrew mai kavang khatniu takum charuk tatien thiu khaisai pachinniabo kumga patu khenrang pithiu khai rabo-e, chiudi naliu paopeh mai siniu suikhai makge, maksai paliu lungga lukhai makge.

Chiudi tuhoi watheng makbo lungga naliu lungchun kalilujiu Iniu lunibose kam khaide. Naliu Israel mai karai kavangmaitu phutkhaijiu, khenrang thiukhaira naliu mathiuniu suikhaijiu, atu kahumbo Charaky lungga, amasuangga naliuniu ladriat thiukhaibo-e.

Chiudi naliu lungchun kalilan lujiu, atu chakhuang thiukhai makge. Paliuniu machunbo kumjiu, kavang thiubambo gasu khenrang pithiukhai mibo vangdung situ lulan lujiu, naliuniu paliutu manomjiu pi kavang thiukhai lande.
Siniu tuhoira,

Haise Judah mai nai Jerusalem maigu chakampaodung, chawangkiningga chakampao thiujiu bammai, singkumai khatdi jupaodung hina aruanglujiu, paliuniu matomchitu dongtap nia thiujiu bambo kakga tadjiu akhuga ladriat thiukhaide. Chiudi paliuniu sise kampang lujiu sibo ladriatse piumakge. Paliuniu matomchitu kamkhai mibo kumjiu Iniu paliu riga kamkhai rabo-e.
Iniu paliutu paliugu mikremai ben-ga pikhaijiu paliuniu paliutu kamshat lujiu, paliu phawdung situ thingnadung nai nkankhaodung siniu tiu rabo-e.

Judah maigu Chawang Zedekiah nai pagu chakampaodung tudi, paliutu kamshat nijiu bambo maidung khuga Iniu pikhai rabo-e. Paliutu asun khai lujiu mathak bammibo, Babylon maigu riphenmai ben-ga Iniu paliutu pikhaimi rabo-e.

Iniu chamtan pikhai rabo-e, siga paliuniu haibo namdiga malanwang rabo-e. Paliuniu chari asunjiu haisitu haphun lujiu chami ruthonmi rabo-e. Iniu Judah maigu namdidung situ mai khatniudi lungmakbo kathaidih pithiu khai mirabo-e.
“Rachab mai kiriangmai khuga tadlujiu paliu khuga tacham pao khailo. Sichiujiu paliutu Charaky gu kichen khatga majang wangkhai lujiu, paliuleng jaw tamnakha pikhailo.”
Siga Iniu Rachab kiriangmai pakhiangna—Jaaziah (Pase kakibo Jeremiah nahpiu-e, pahai Habazziniah nahpiu-e) khatdi pasingnamai hina khatdi panahpiu dungtu pakhiangnatu—

Igdaliah nahpiu phaimiukakung Hanan khommaigu kichen-ga majang wang khaide. Haibo kichense Charaky gu parathiubo chakampao khat thiubo, Sallum nahpiu Maaseiah gu kichen riga khatdi kakibo chakampaodunggu kichendung mungga bambo-e.
Sichiujiu Rechab maidung masuangga chakuang, chapiang gase jaw masunphui lujiu Iniu paliu khuga din-e, “Jaw poinakha sak khailo.”
Chiudi paliuniu kenkakge, “Aliu jaw sakmakge. Aliu paopeh Rechab nahpiu Jonadab niu aliu khuga ladpi khaijiu aliudi, aliu tah-nahmaidi wadaodi jaw sakmak rabo-e chiu-e.

Paniu aliutu haibo kadihga chaky-chalu kam makra khatdi mumsy ken lingmakra maksai liumak raleng ladtikhai diakge. Aliuniu mathenky lenlujiu haibo kadihga pawan machang sangdiumai kumjiu lungbamra paniu chamtan aliutu pikhai diakge.
Jonadab niu aliutu katikhai diakbo pakhiangnase aliuniu majai-e. Aliu pumsiakniu wadaodi jaw sakmakge, aliu naodungdi, aliu nahpiudungdi, maksai aliu nahpuidungdi sakmakge.

Aliuniu lungraleng chaky thiu makge--aliuniu mathenkyga lung-e, khatdi aliugu mumsireng, chalu, maksai miusy ha-e. Aliu paopeh Jonadab niu aliutu chamtan pikhai diakbo hinase aliuniu majai kamna kinbo-e.
Chiudi Chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu sibo kadihtu charithiu wangboga Babylon mai nai Syria maigu riphendung khugasu mari lura jengniu Jerusalem ga lungra chapkhai lujiu wang bambo-e.”
Siga Ngamkambo Israel mai Rawang,
Jonadab kaikik maidungra pagu chamtan ga jawsak makra pikhaibo majaijiu paliu ruangga mai khatnadi jaw sak makge, chiudi Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, naliura acham majai makge.

Iniu avangmai phaimiukakungdung situ naliu khuga langkhaijiu bambo-e, sichiujiu paliuniu naliutu kasabo npuise phutlujiu majibo kammi raleng dinkhaijiu bambo-e. Paliuniu naliutu kakibo ra kahumjiu macha makra kachan khaimibo-e, sichiusai Iniu naliu paopeh nai naliuleng pikhaibo kadihga naliuniu pating thengjiu lunglu rabo-e. Chiudi naliuniu alad nking makge khatdi akhuga naliu lung khaimakge.
Jonadab kaikik maira paliu paopehniu paliutu chamtan pikhaibose majai-e, chiudi naliura acham majai makge.
Sijengniu tuhoira, Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo
Siga Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo
Sijengniu Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo

“Charaohan khat khoilujiu Iniu nakhuga Israel mai, Judah mai khatdi jat pakhiangna leng dinkhaibo hina raokhai lulo. Iniu nakhuga dinkhai karaibo Josiah niu chawang thiuwang mibo wan gasu tuhoi katangbo dinkhaibo hina raokhai lulo.
Wakhat gasu Iniu paliu riga kamkhainejiu bambo wa kasabo hina Judah maidungniu chiuluboga, paliugu kasabo npui gasu marilu surabo-e. Chiusai Iniu paliugu kasabo nai nuanse kuak khai rabo-e.”
Siniu Neriah nahpiu Baruch tu Iniu kulujiu
Sigasu Iniu Baruch tu haibo katikhaidung pikhaide. “Charaky lungga mengraleng atu suikhai tamide.
Chiudi pasai maidungniu kalum rijiu bambo wan-ga nangniu siga tadra Iniu luni-e. Nangniu charaohanse nakhuan tanjiu kenrabo-e, sichiujiu
Sichiujiu daodiusai paliuniu paliugu kamaobo npui gasu maripad lujiu paliuniu
Siniu pakhuga Iniu kam raleng dinkhaibo kum gapjiu Baruch niu
Jehoiakim niu Judah mai wang thiubo takum mangiubogu chakiubo hiuga

Mathiuniu nkingjiu bamboga, Iniu pikhaibo ariakkhuang gasu Baruch niu kenpad khai-e. Paniu haise Charaky lungga ladjanky gu machunrao, Shaphan nahpiu Gemariah gu kichen gasu kenbo-e. Pagu kichen hai Charaky gu Kasanbo Rengmun mungga bambo-e.

Sigasu, paniu chawangkiningga tathuky raosui-gu kichen, chakampao maidung mathiu madui bamboga tadle. Siga tathuky gu raosui Elishama, Shemaiah nahpiu Delaiah, Akhbor nahpiu Elnathan, Shaphan nahpiu Gemariah, Hananiah nahpiu Zedekiah khatdi kakibo chakampao pakhiangna bamme.
Baruch niu maidung khuga kenkhaibo pakhiangnase Mikaiah niu paliu khuga dinkhaide.

Sigasu Baruch niu maidung khuga kenkhaibo charaohanse khoiwangra chakampaodungniu Jehudi (Kushi tah tutan kanabopiu, Shelemiah tah, Nethaniah nahpiu) tu langkhaide, Baruch niu charaohanse paliu khuga khoiwangde.
Paliuniu din-e, “Ntao kiujiu, charaohanse aliu khuga kenkhailo.” Siga Baruch niu sise kenkhai bide.
Paniu kenlubo saiga, paliu zu rung-rungjiu khatniu khattu phui sude, sichiujiu Baruch khuga din-e, “Aliuniu haise chawang khuga paokhai tangra mide.”
Khatdi paliuniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Tuhoi, aliu khuga dinkhailo, nangniu dechiujiu haise raokhai lujiulo? Jeremiah niu nakhuga kenlen khaibi jiuma?”
Baruch niu kenkakge, “Haibo lad hinase Jeremiah niu akhuga kenkhai bibo-e. chiujiu Iniu haibo charaohan haise charaoduiniu raokiu khaibo-e.”
Siga paliuniu pakhuga din-e, “Jeremiah nanai meng nbai milo. Nanai ndega bamlo chiubo mai khattudi pisitulo.”
Chakampaodung siniu charaohanse tathuky gu raosui, Elishama gu kichen-ga khaidiak lujiu, chawanggu tathukyga menglujiu, padbambo hinase paliuniu chawang khuga paokhaide.
Siga charaohanse khoiwangra Jehudi tu chawangniu langkhaide. Paniu sise Elishama gu kichen gasu khoilujiu chawang khatdi patu chap magui bambo chakampaodung mathiu masuangga kenpad khaide.
Sibo wanse tathe ting-e, siniu chawangse pagu tathe tinggu chawangkininggu kamaga chami thiulujiu ntao bambo-e.
Jehudi niu sise padum sum, madai kenloi gapboga chawangniu n-sina khat khoilujiu getap-tap lujiu sise chamijiuga taliang khai mide. Charaohan pakhiangna rukam makthen paniu sichiujiu kam sude.
Sichiujiu raokhaibo hinase chiulu tadi, chawang khatdi pagu chamkampaodung ruangga mai khatnadi kapingbo maksai manangbo lun lensuan makge.
Elnathan, Delaiah khatdi Gemariah niu chawang khuga charaohanse rumak raleng kheng-e, chiudi paliuniu khengbose paniu wajeng chakkhai makge.
Sichiujiu paniu Chawangnahpiu Jerahmeel, Azriel nahpiu Seraiah khatdi Abdeel nahpiu Shelemiah paliuniu agu machunrao Baruch anaitu minmira chamtan pikhaide. Chiudi
Iniu Baruch khuga pikhaibo charaohanse chawang Jehoiakim niu rumibo saiga,
kakibo charaohan khoilujiu karaibo khuangga raokhaibo hina siga raokhailan raleng dinkhai-e.
Sichiujiu chawang khuga dinkhai raleng
Siniu tuhoira,

Nangniu kamkhai mibo nuan jengniu nakaikik maitu khatdi nagu chakampao maitu Iniu sajai pirabo-e, Iniu kachan khaibo situ nangdi, Jerusalem maidungdi khatdi Judah maidungdi wathao thiukhai makge, siniu Iniu kamkhai nibo magenthiu chariubose Iniu naliu mathiu riga kamkhai rabo-e.”

Sichiujiu Iniu kakibo charaohan khat khoilujiu agu raosuipiu Baruch khuga pikhaide, sichiujiu Iniu dinpadbo hina kumgapjiu paniu raokiu khaide, sise karaibogu charaohan-ga raokhaibo panai machamjiu raokiu khaide.
Chiudi Zedekiah niudi, pagu chakampaodung niudi, maidung niudi
Aliu jatgu malin-ga, aliu Rawang
Sibo ting katangra atu kavangkyga khaimakjiu maidung ruangga tadpad tadngutjiu bamra suikhai bambo-e.
Babylon maigu riphendung siniu Jerusalem tu taokom lujiu bambo-e, chiudi Egypt maigu riphendungniu paliugu ramrai kenpad mide chiubo khuan chiuboga paliu malan mide.
Sichiujiu Israel mai Rawang,
“Egypt maigu riphendungniu natu nkhara npuiga tad kinne, chiudi paliu ky lam malan wangmi rabo-e.
Siga Babylon maidung wanglanjiu namdi situ asunjiu, khatdi haphun lujiu ruthon mirabo-e.
Babylon mainiu wanglan lakge chiujiu naliu ronna maninglujiu naliutu sonmi tulo, palamra Babylon mai wanglan rabo-e chiujiu
Naliuniu Babylon maigu riphendungtu ngamkam lujiu, ka-ajam maitu ronna thondiak mitadi, simaidung siniu buangsu lujiu haibo namditu ruthon mirabo-e.”
Egypt maigu riphendung wangkinbo jengniu Babylon maigu riphendung malan mide.
Siniu Jerusalem tu Iniu saodia lujiu kikhun gu adam luraleng Benjamin gu luongren lam tadra kamsude.

Chiudi Iniu Benjamin gu Rengmun wangtangboga riphen maidunggu chakampao, Hananiah tahpiu, Shelemiah nahpiu pazanniu Irijah kubo piuse siga bamniujiu atu kham lujiu, “Nangniu Babylon mai khuga pakkinbo-e!” chiujiu din-e.
Iniu kenkakge, “Sichiu makge! I pakkinbo makge.” Chiudi Irijah niu alad nking khai makge. Sibosung, paniu atu minlujiu chakampaodung khuga majang wangde.
Atu paliu lungpom mathiujiu atu dapraleng chamtan pikhaide, khatdi tathukygu raosui, Jonathan-gu kavangkyga khaimi raleng chamtan pikhaide.
Siga kadih hanglam bambo kichen khatga atu pating thengjiu bangkhaide.
Pasai bamnak khai lujiu Chawang Zedekiah niu atu kulujiu chawangkiningga paronna akhuga maniu-e, “
Iniu paokakge, “Bamme, Babylon mai wangpiu ben-ga natu pikhaimi rabo-e.”
Siga Iniu maniu-e, “Iniu kavangkyga ngutbuibo nde kamaobo nakhuga, maksai nagu chakampaodung khuga, maksai maidung khuga kamkhai mibo bamjiulo?
Babylon mai wangpiuniu haibo kadihtu asunmak rabo-e chiujiu dinkhaibo phaimiukakungmai khuga degu padmilo?
Tuhoira, Pakendibo piu yo, Iniu kadinbose kamlo. Chalungsajiu atu Jonathan-gu kavangkyga ngutlan raleng langkhai jan mane. Nangniu langkhaisai, I hai maomakjiu siga shaimi rabo-e.”

Siniu Chawang Zedekiah niu chawangkining gu tathukyga atu bangkhai raleng chamtan pikhaide. Iniu siga bamjiu naimachangna aleng taruakkhuang khat-khat hai, namdi lungga bambo taruak khuakbo bam gasu piwang-e.

niu din-e, “Haibo namdiga kabambo mai hina chariga, maksai katiu riangboga maksai chararen ga shai kammi rabo-e. Chiudi mai khat kumboniu paklujiu Babylon mai khuga madunsun misai patu kamshat lakge; paniu pagu ringtingse marilu rabo-e.”
niu dinkhaibo chamse Iniu haichiujiu din kiu-e, “Haibo namdi situ Iniu Babylon maigu riphenmai khuga pikhai mirabo-e, sichiujiu paliuniu haisitu haphun lurabo-e.”

Sigasu chakampaodungniu chawang khuga tadlujiu din-e, “Haibo piu situ kamshat mirabo-e. Paniu haichiu dinkhaibo gasu haibo riphen maidungtu kam mahon bambo-e, namditu phutjiu tadmibo maidung khugase haikum gapjiu paniu dinkhai mibo-e. Para maidungtu nkhara kam makbo-e; paniu paliutu kam masa khaira ronna kam bambo-e.”
Chawang Zedekiah niu paokakge, “Wichang wide, chiusai, naliuniu patu kam kanibose kamsulo; Iniu naliutu kham ngam lulakge.”
Siniu paliuniu atu chariang ratlujiu chawangkining tathukyga bambo, Malchiah gu akhun gase phutkiu khaide. Siga tadui wadi ha-e, taniang ronna bamme, siga Iniu malin kiu mide.

Sichiu bamtadi, Sudan maipiu Ebedmelech, chawangkiningga changam kambambo papum kamshat mibo piu siniu atu akhun-ga khai mide chiubo chiulude. Sibo wan gase chawang sira Benjamin Rengmun-gu tathukyga bamme.
Siniu Ebedmelech niu chawang khuga tadlujiu din-e.
“Pakendibo piu yo, haibo piuniu nde kamaobo kamkhai mijiulo. Paliuniu Jeremiah tu akhun lungga taliang khai mide, namdiga katiu-kasak hamibo jengniu, pah siga kami-mijiu shairabo-e.”
Sigasu chawangniu Ebedmelech tu chamai khangsumtu majang lujiu I shai makhabo masuangga akhun gasu jupad mira chamtan pikhaide.
Sijengniu Ebedmelech niu chawangkininggu wakhaiky gasu chamaitu majang lujiu chafairen kasaboniu chariang malui lujiu akhun lung gase taliangkiu khaibi-e.
Chariang siniu atu kam mathiu mak raleng, paniu atu chafairense ajak hangga khailujiu siga chariangse juman raleng atu dinkhaibi-e. Sise Iniu kamde,
sichiujiu paliuniu atu akhun gasu jupad khai-e. Sibosai atu tathuky gase pijiu bamkhaide.
Pawan khatga Chawang Zedekiah niu Charaky gu pasumbo kamun-ga atu majangwang lujiu din-e, “Iniu nakhuga chalad khat maniu rabo-e, siga majibo hinase nangniu akhuga dinkhaibotu Iniu luni-e.”
Iniu paokakge “Iniu majibose nakhuga dinsai, nangniu atu kamshat mirabo-e, khatdi Iniu natu ladti khaisai, nang nachun ngutlakge.”

Haichiujiu Chawang Zedekiah niu mahinjiu akhuga ladriat thiu-e, “Aliutu ringting pikhai bambo Rawang zan thenjiu Iniu ladriat thiubo-e, chiubora Iniu natu kamshat lakge maksai natu kamshat khai nijiu bammai khuga pikhai lakge.”
Sigasu Iniu Zedekiah khuga Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo
Chiudi nangniu madunsun lumaksai, haibo namdi situ Babylon maidung ben-ga pikhaijiu paliuniu rutaliang mirabo-e, chiujiu nangdi paliu khugasu paklu lakge.”
Chiudi chawangniu kenlakge, “Agu kadihmainiu Babylon maitu din masabo situ Iniu ping-e, paliuniu atu paliu khuga pikhaijiu atu kam mathad lubui-e.”
Iniu din-e, “Natu paliu ben-ga pikhai lakge.
Chiudi nangniu madun sunraleng suikhai maksai nde padralo chiubo
Siga Judah gu chawangkiningga saodiakbo maipui hinatu Babylon maigu chakampaodung khulam jutad mibo Iniu ngao-e. Sichiujiu paliu tadpadjiu bambo tingga dinbambo khuanse nking khailo:
‘Chawanggu withubo kahmaidung siniu patu jumao mide, paliuniu pariga mawang mide.
Tuhoira paphise taniangjiuga malinkiu mide, pakahmaidung siniu patu phut mide.”

Siga Iniu dinsan khai-e, “Nagu maipui mainahdung hinatu Babylon lam majangwang mirabo-e, khatdi nang napumsiakdi paliu khugasu paklu lakge. Babylon maigu chawangniu natu kavangleng puitad mirabo-e, khatdi haibo namdise ruthon mirabo-e.”
Zedekiah niu kenkakge, “Anainiu chalad npaobose mai khattudi pisikhai tulo, chiusai nangniu kasabo daolakge.

Iniu natu npao-e chiubo chakampaodungniu chiusai paliuniu nakhuga wanglujiu anianiu npaobose maniu rabo-e. Nangniu paliu khuga wa pakhiangnase dinsai natu kamshat lakge chiujiu paliuniu ladriat thiurabo-e.
Natu shairabo kavangkyga khailan makra akhuga khengbo-e chiujiu dinbilo.”

Sichiujiu chakampaodung siniu akhuga wanglujiu maniu sude, siga chawangniu akhuga dinkhai mibo kumgapjiu dinkhaide. Paliuniu wadi kam khaira hajiu tade, palamra mai khatniudi anainiu npaobose chiulu makge.
Sichiujiu Jerusalem tu haphun lumak thenna atu chawanggu tathukyga bangkhaijiu bamme.
Zedekiah niu Judah mai wang thiubo chakiubo kumgu kariubo hiuga, Babylon mai Wang Nebuchadnezzar niu pagu riphendung pakhiangnatu maluanglu wang Jerusalem tu aphen sude.
Zedekiah niu mawangbo, kariu-je-khatkiubo kumgu madaibo hiugu jeng chakiubo nai namdi rengse kampang mide.

(Jerusalem haitu haphun luboga, Babylon mai wangpiuniu pagu chakampaodung hinatu maluang lujiu wang, N-gangbo Rengmun nai Nergal Sarezer, Samgar Nebo, Sarsechim khatdi katambo Nerga Sarezer gase paliu bam thiu mide).

Chawang Zedekiah nai pagu riphendungniu degu padmilo chiubo ngaoluboga, paliuniu namdi gasu nchun pakmira kamsude. Paliuniu chawang kygu kareng gasu tad taronjiu kareng niatu thiu mathuk khai nbambo rengmun gasu pakjiu Jordan Ramjeng genlam paktad mide.

Chiudi Babylon maigu riphendung siniu paliutu hajiu Jericho gu ajengning gasu Zedekiah tu minlude. sichiujiu paliuniu patu Hamath luongriangga bambo Riblah namdiga bambo chawang Nebuchadnezzar khuga puiwang mide. Siga Nebuchadnezzar niu patu kamshat mira chalad tapkhai mide.
Riblah ga paniu Zedekiah niu phuibamboga panahmaidung situ kamshat mide, sichiujiu paniu Judah maigu chakampaodung tudi kamshat sude.
Sibosai paniu Zedekiah mik ladmide, sichiujiu chagiriangniu ratlujiu Babylon lam puiwang mira langkhai mide.
Sibo lungga, Babylon maidung siniu chawangkining nai maidunggu chaky hinase ruthon kamlujiu Jerusalem rengse kampang mide.
Kanamboga charipipao, Nebuzaradan niu namdiga masiak maidung nai patu suimakjiu paktad mibo hinatu kavangleng minlujiu Babylon lam wangmide.
Paniu Judah kadihga kaleksa thumai paky-palu wadi kahamaidungtu mumsireng nai chalu pikhai lujiu tadmide.
Chiudi Chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu charipipao Nebuzaradan tu pahangga raokhaibo chamtan hai pikhai-e:
“Tadlujiu Jeremiah tu phiulujiu, patu akhi mawi khailo. Patu kam mathiu tulo, chiudi paniu lunibo hinase paleng kamkhai bilo.”
Sijengniu pagu chakampaodung, Nebuzaraban khatdi Nergal Sarezer khatdi Babylon mai wangpiugu kakibo chakampaodung hinatu, Nebuzaradan niu puilujiu atu chawangkining gu tathuky gasu lupad mide.
Iniu wadi manangmak bamlu raleng, Shaphan tahpiu khatdi Ahikam nahpiu Gedaliah hangga paliuniu atu puiwang khai bide. Sichiujiu Iniu maidung ruangga lungjiu bamde.
Chawangkining gu ladjankyga atu bangman bambo tingga Sudan mai Ebedmelech khuga dinkhaira chiujiu, Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo
“Iniu haibo namdi haitu pidisu khai makjiu kam maha mine chiujiu dinkhai mibo kum, Iniu kamkhai mide. Haise padbo nangniu ngaosu rabo-e.
Chiudi
Iniu natu manang makjiu pibam khaine khatdi natu kamshat lakge. Nagu ringting hai nangniu mari lubui-e, palamra nangniu atu malum bamme.
Charipipao, Nebuzaradan niu atu Ramah ga lepad mibo saiga,
Charipipao siniu atu majangpad tamlujiu din-e, “Naliu Rawang,
chiujiu dinkhai mibose tuhoira paniu kamkhai mide. Naliuniu

Tuhoira, Iniu natu karatbo giriangse khipad lujiu natu khenrang thiu khaide. Nangniu asai suijiu, Babylon ga tadnisai tadbo sui-e, chiujiu Iniu natu phuikhai birabo-e. Chiudi nangniu tadni maksai, tadmakbo sui-e, nangniu kadih pakhiangna gasu kada kanibo kadasui-e, khatdi nangniu tadkhai niboga nang tadbo sui-e.

Iniu kenkak makjiu bamboga Nebuzaradan niu din-e, “Judah gu namdi dithinpao thiura Babylon mai wangpiuniu pikhai bambo, Shaphan tahpiu, Ahikam nahpiu, Gedaliah khuga malanwang sulo. Nangniu pakhuga khatdi maidung ruangga lungbo sui-e, maksai nangniu tadsai wine katiubo bamga tadbo sui-e.” Sigasu paniu atu kalen pikhaijiu khatdi atu majang katiu tiukhai lujiu, atu phutkhai bide.
Mizpah ga bambo Gedaliah khatdi sibo kadihga bamdiakmi mai ruangga lungraleng I tadmide.

Judah gu chakampaodung khatdi riphenmai khangsianiu madunsun makge. Babylon maigu chawangniu Gedaliah tu sibo kadihga kalek sathubo maidung, Babylon lam puitad makbo maidung riga pijiu dihthinpao thiukhai-e.

Siniu Nethaniah nahpiu Ishmael, Kareah nahpiu Johanan, Tanhumeth nahpiu Seraiah, Netophah gasu Ephai nahpiudung, Maakah gasu Jezaniah paliuniu paliu maitu majang lujiu Gedaliah khulam, Mizpah ga meng-e.

Gedaliah niu paliu khuga din-e, “Babylon maidung khuga madun sunrabo hai wadi npingmak raleng Iniu achamkeng naliu khuga pikhaibo-e, Haibo kadihga bamkhaijiu, Babylon maigu chawangtu machajiu lungmi sulo, chiusai naliu mathiu wijiu lunglu bui-e.
Ira Mizpah haiga bamrabo-e. Sichiujiu Babylon maidung wangbo wan-ga mathiugu malin thiujiu bamrabo-e. Chiudi naliuniu namdungga lunglujiu jaw, charasy, khatdi olive-sa khom maduijiu makhuan rabo-e.”

Sichiu bambo wan-ga, Israel maidungniu Moab ga, Ammon ga, Edom ga, khatdi kakibo kadihga bambo maidungniu Babylon maigu chawangniu Gedaliah tu paliugu dihthinpao pithiu khaijiu Israel maidungtu lungra suikhaide chiubo khuan chiulude.
Sijengniu, paliudi pabam katam-tamga lung marajiu bambo gasu Judah ga malanwang sude. Gedaliah niu bambo Mizpah ga paliuniu paliugu jaw nai charasy kengjiu phungwang-e.
Haibo saiga Johanan niu madunsun kamak maidung riphendunggu jupaodungtu maluang lujiu Mizpah ga bambo Gedaliah khuga wangjiu,
pakhuga din-e, “Ammon maigu chawang Baalis niu natu kamshatra Ishmael tu langkhai mibo nang simak jiuma?” Chiudi Gedaliah niu sise malum makge.

Sigasu Johanan niu mahin pakhuga din-e, “Iniu tadlujiu Ishmael tu kamshatmi tane haise saoniu kambo gulo chiubo mai khatniudi silakge. Dekambo jengniu patu pijiu natu kamshat raleng suikhai ralo? Sichiusai natu maluang lungbambo Jedudi maidungtu kam marakhai rabo-e, Sichiujiu Judah ga masiak diakbo maidung mathiu riga chariubo phungwang rabo-e.”
Chiudi Gedaliah niu kenkakge, “Sichiu kamtulo! Nangniu Ishmael lamga dinbambose maji makge.”
Ishmael niu maluang kinbo chamai khang kariu siniu paliu heng thadpad lujiu Gedaliah tu kamshat mide.
Mizpah ga Gedaliah tu majang lujiu lungbambo Israel maidung hina khatdi siga bambo Babylon maigu riphendung tudi Ishmael niu kamshat mide.
Pasaibo nai, mai khatniudi Gedaliah tu kamshat mide chiubo simakbo masuangga

chamai riak tachad Shechem gasu, Shiloh gasu khatdi Samaria gasu wangde. Paliuniu paliu bianggiu gotlujiu paliu fai-ni, phetlujiu khatdi paliu ronna kam-ajam lujiu wangde. Paliuniu Charakyga miusy nai parim wibo kadraleng phunglu wangbo-e.
Sichiujiu Ishmael niu Mizpah gasu tadpadjiu paliutu paniu kapjiu adaode. Paniu paliu khuga wangjiu din-e, “Chalungsajiu wang Gedaliah tu phuikhailo.”
Paliuniu namdi lunglam ngutmi gapboga, Ishmael nai pamaidungniu paliutu kamshat lujiu paliu pumse akhun khatga taliang khai mide.

Chiudi simai ruanggasu chamai khang kariuniu Ishmael khuga din-e, “Chalungsajiu aliutu kamshat khai tulo! Aliuniu chabanmiu, tathiu, olive-sa, khatdi makhuidui chaluga baikhai bamme.” Sijengniu paliutu paniu masiak khai-e.

Ishmael niu paliutu kamshat lujiu taliang khaibo akhun haise Israel mai wangpiu Baasha niu patu asunbo wan-ga chawang Asa niu chukhaibo kadibo akhun khatle. Sise Ishmael niu akhunse kashai phawniu khaiphui mide.

Sigasu Gadaliah niu phuijiu bamraleng riphen maigu chakampao Nabuzaradan niu pikhai diakbo, Mizpah ga bambo chawang nahpuidung khatdi kakimaidung tudi paniu kavang pithiu khaide. Ishmael niu pavangleng khangsiatu majang lujiu Ammon luongren lam tadkhai mide.
Johanan khatdi pasai suikinbo riphendunggu jupaodung siniu, Ishmael niu pathak kasabo kam mibose chiulude.
Sichiujiu maidungtu majang lujiu pasailam hatadjiu Gideon ga bambo ajai kadibo mung gasu patu hatang lude.
Ishmael niu kavangleng jutad kinmaidung siniu, Johanan niu riphendungtu majangwang kinbo ngaoboga paliu chunwi mide,
khatdi ariwang lujiu paliu khulam pak khai sude.
Chiudi Ishmael khatdi pamai khang tachat sira Johanan khugasu marilujiu Ammon kadih lam pak khai mide.
Sigasu Johanan khatdi pagu riphendungniu Mizpah gasu Ishmael niu Gedaliah tu kamshat lujiu kavangleng puitad kinbo riphendung, maipui-mainahdung, khatdi papum kamshat mimai situ paliuniu puilude.

Babylon maigu chawangniu sibo kadihgu dihthinpao thiuraleng pikhaibo Gedaliah tu Ishmael niu kamshat mibo jengniu Babylon maidungtu paliuniu pingmide. Siniu Babylon maidung khugasu mari raleng, paliuniu Egypt lam paktad mide. Paliuniu Bethlehem mungga bambo Chimham ga mathak khaide.
Sichiujiu riphendunggu jupaodung pakhiangna, Kareah nahpiu Johanan, Heshaiah nahpiu Azariah, paliu saisuijiu wangbo maidung mathiu jaojiu

akhuga din-e, “Aliuniu nakhuga khengbose kamkhailo! Aliu ring kabangmai mathiuleng kakheng thiu khailo! Pawan khatga aliu chamai kengjiu bamniubo-e, chiudi tuhoira, aliu chamai poinakha ronna mide chiubo nangniu sibamme.
Aliuniu tadrabo khatdi kamrabo hai
Iniu paokakge, “Wichang wi-e, sichiusai, naliuniu kadinbo kumgapjiu, Iniu aliu Rawang
Chiujiu paliuniu akhuga din-e, “Aliu Rawang
Aliuleng kawibo tadi, kasabo tadi, kakheng thiukhaira khengbo aliu Rawang
Jeng kariu saiga
siniu Johanan tu, riphendunggu jupaodung pasai suikinbo pakhiangna khatdi kakibo maidung mathiutu Iniu kuwang maduikhai-e.
Iniu paliu khuga din-e, “Israel mai Rawang,

‘Naliuniu haibo kadihga lungbam nisai, haichiu naliutu kamkao makjiu thiusu khai rabo-e; Iniu naliutu pethon makjiu, naliutu somkhai rabo-e. Iniu naliutu rathon makjiu, naliutu thiusu khai rabo-e. Iniu naliutu kam masa khaimibo jengniu aleng chariubo wajiukha padmide.
Babylon mai wangpiutu pingmi tulo. Iniu naliutu maluang khaine, khatdi pagu pumtan gasu Iniu naliutu gukhai bine.
Palamra I hai lungsa sibo-e, paniu naliutu lungsa khaira Iniu kamkhai rabo-e, khatdi naliu kyga naliutu pi malan wangkhai rabo-e.
“Chiudi naliu Judah ga bamdiak maidung naliu Rawang,
‘Naliuniu Egypt dihlam tadlujiu lung mine chiujiu chapkhai misai naliuniu pingbambo chari nai katiu riangbo siniu naliutu ngamjiu, naliu hai Egypt dihga shaikhai mirabo-e.

Egypt ga tadlujiu lungmine chiujiu maning kabambo mai hina chariga maksai katiu riangboga, maksai chararen ga shairabo-e. Paliu mai khatnadi ringlu lakge. Iniu naliu riga chariubo piwang khairabo gasu mai khatniudi marilu lakge.’
“Israel mai Rawang,
Haichiujiu Iniu dinlan-e, “Judah ga saodiak mai naliu khuga
chiubora naliuniu shaibuibogu kamaobo kam mide. Naliu jengniu aliu Rawang,
Tuhoi Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, chiubora aliu Rawang,
Sijengniu, haise maningtao lulo: Naliuniu tadnijiu bambo kadihga naliuniu tadsai chariga maksai katiu riangjiu kami-miboga maksai chararen ga naliu shai rabo-e.”
Aliu Rawang,
Sibo wan-ga Hoshaiah nahpiu Azariah khatdi Kareah nahpiu Johanan khatdi wasao thiumai khangsianiu akhuga din-e, “Nang hai aratle. Aliu Rawang,
Neriah nahpiu Baruch niu aliutu atungra natu kamkhaibo-e, sichiujiu Babylon maidungniu aliu riga pumtan thinlura khatdi aliutu kamshatra maksai aliutu Babylon lam majang tadmi raleng kambo-e.”
Sijengniu Johanan niudi, kakibo riphen-gu chakampaodung niudi maksai maidung siniudi Judah kadihga bamraleng
Sichiujiu Johanan khatdi riphenmaigu chakampaodung hinaniu Judah gu kadihtu saodia lujiu Egypt lam, jatdungniu lung maren tadmibo gasu wang aruang lanbo,
maipuidung, maipiudung, nahmaidung khatdi chawang nahpuidung hinatu puitad mide. Charipi Nebuzaradan niu Gedaliah hangga lungraleng khaidiak maidung, Baruch tudi, atudi, mathiutu puitad mibo-e.
Paliuniu
Siga bambo tingga
“Tatukang kadibo kasia khoilujiu, haibo namdigu dihthinmai ky rengmun mung puidi hangga chubai milo, nangniu kambo hai Israel maidung khangsia tudi pijiu ngaokhailo.
Sichiujiu paliu khuga dinkhailo chiubora Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo

Nebuchadnezzar niu wangjiu Egypt tu ngamlu rabo-e. Siga bam maidungse chararen ga shaira maidungse chararen ga shaimi rabo-e, kavang thiura maitu kavang thiura jutadmi rabo-e, khatdi chariga shaira maitu chariga kamshat mirabo-e.

Egypt maigu rakydungse Iniu chami thonkhaijiu rumi rabo-e, khatdi Babylon maigu chawangniu paliu radung situ ruthon mirabo-e maksai paliutu khoi taliang mirabo-e. Mily khuanmainiu pafai-pani chakhiu-chalai sangbo kumjiu, Babylon mai wangpiu siniu Egypt gu kadih haitu charise ngam masansiak mirabo-e.
Egypt dihga bambo Heliopolis ga masanbo tusom situ paniu kam mahami rabo-e, Egypt maigu raky hina ruthon mirabo-e.”
Israel maidungniu Egypt dih, Migdol gu namdidungga, Tahpanhes ga khatdi Memphis ga khatdi sibo dih tingrun lam, lungbam mai lamga
Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo
Paliuniu naliu nai naliu pao-pehmainiu kahum matai makbo radungtu kahumjiu khatdi machajiu sibo radung khuga charathiu khaide.
Iniu marengbo ngam, matai kasabo ngam naliuniu kammak raleng dinkhaira Iniu avangmai phaimiukakung dungtu naliu khuga langkhaibo-e.
Chiudi naliuniu nkingkhai makjiu naliugu kasabo charathiubo ngamse phutkhai makge.

Sijengniu agu lungpom kasabose Jerusalem npui-nchengga khatdi Judah gu namdidung riga runkiu khaibo-e, sichiujiu Iniu sise ruthon mibo-e. Paliu hai nchum mibo-e khatdi nthaiting katang mainiu phui kapingbo thiu bam mibo-e.
“Haichiujiu Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo

Naliuniu wang lungbambo Egypt dih, haigadi dekamjiu charamengtu kahumjiu khatdi katambo radung khuga charathiujiu alungpom kambam jiulo! Naliuniu naliu riga kasabo kamkhaijiu kadihpiri jat hinaniu naliutu nuimenjiu naliu zantu tasiang pithiu khaira kambam jiuma?
Haikumbo kasabo hina Judah gu namdakdung nai Jerusalem npui-nchengga, naliu paopeh mai Judah wangdung nai paliu naodungniu, khatdi naliu nai naliu naodungniu kamkhai mibose naliuniu mangaimi jiuma?
Sichiujiu tuhoi katang naliuniu naliu ronna manonkiu makge. Naliuniu atu chakhuang thiu makge, maksai Iniu naliutu khatdi naliu paopehtu pikhaibo tacheng-tajaise naliuniu majai makge.
“Sijengniu Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo

Judah maidungniu Egypt lam tadlujiu lung mine chiu maningjiu tadpadmi maitu haichiujiu kam maha khai rabo tuse Iniu phuibam rabo-e. Paliu mathiu, kati-kadi tam makjiu Egypt ga chari ganiu maksai mariu charijiu kami-mibo ganiu shairabo-e. Paliu haitu mai phuipingbo thiurabo-e, maidungniu paliutu nuimenjiu paliu zantu tasiang thiujiu thin rabo-e.
Iniu Jerusalem tu sajai pikhai mibo kumgapjiu, Iniu Egypt ga lungjiu bam maidungtu--chariniu, kami-mibo siniu, khatdi chararenniu sajai pirabo-e,

Ringlura Egypt ga pakkhaijiu lungmi mai Judah maidung mai khattudi masiak khai lakge. Paliuniu lunglan nijiu bambo, Judah ramga paliu mai khatnadi malanwang lakge. Paky-palu kahamai makjiu kakimai khatnadi malanwang lakge.”

Katambo radung khuga paliu naodungniu charathiujiu kadpadbotu sibo kinadung siniu, khatdi siga chapbambo maipuidung hina, Egypt gu tingrun lam lungbambo Israel maidung jaojiu, chamai kakeng khaniu akhuga din-e,
“Nangniu

Aliuniu kamne kachiubo hina aliuniu kamrabo-e. Aliu rapui, Tinggen gu Chawangpui tu aliuniu charathiujiu pakhuga jaw liakkhai rabo-e, khatdi Jerusalem gu npui-nchengga khatdi Judah gu namdak dungga aliugu chawangdung aliugu jupaodung, khatdi aliu paopeh maidungniu kamkhai mibo kumjiu aliuniu pakhuga jaw liakjiu charathiu khai rabo-e, siga aliuniu katiu-kasak kengjiu khatdi lung aman saijiu, chariubo thiu makge.
Chiudi Tinggen gu Chawangpui tu aliuniu charathiujiu kadkhai tamiboga khatdi pakhuga jaw-liak khai tamiboga, aliu kaleksa mibo-e, sichiujiu tathiu-chari gasu maksai katiu riangbo gasu shaibo-e.”
Khatdi maipuidung siniu dinsan khai-e, “Aliuniu taruak hai Tinggen gu Chawangpui lun kum kamlujiu, pakhuga charathiujiu kadpadbo, khatdi pakhuga jaw liakkhaibo situ, aliu kinadungniu suikhai-e.”
Haichiu atu kenkak maidung maipui maipiu mathiu khuga Iniu din-e,
“Naliuniu khatdi naliu paopeh dungniu, naliugu chawangdung nai naliugu jupaodung, khatdi Judah gu namdak dungga lungbo maidung nai Jerusalem gu npui-nchengga kadpad mibo nai charathiu khai mibose
Thainai tangbo naliugu kadih hai nchumboga bam mide, sichiujiu siga mai khatnadi lungta mide. Haise mainiu phui kapingbo thiu mide, sichiujiu naliugu tienkam kasabo jengniu
Naliuniu
Israel mai Rawang Ngamkambo
Chiudi tuhoi
Naliuniu lungwi khangmakjiu, nkhin kiubose Iniu phuirabo-e. Naliu mathiu hai loi makthen chariga maksai chararen-ga shaimi rabo-e.
Chiudi naliu ruanggasu shai masiak lubo khangsia ronna Egypt gasu Judah lam malan wangrabo-e. Sichiujiu ringlu maidung siniu, acham majima, maksai paliu cham majilo chiubo simi rabo-e.
, Iniu naliutu haibo bam gasu sajai pine chiubose kamlen khai rabo-e, khatdi naliutu kam maha raleng agu ladriat thiukhai mibose majijiu padrabo-e.

Iniu Judah gu chawang Zedekiah tu pagu mikrepiu, patu kamshat nijiu bambo Babylon mai wangpiu, Nebuchadnezzar khuga pikhai mibo kumjiu, Egypt mai wangpiu, Hophra tu kamshat nijiu bambo pagu mikrepiu khuga benlen khaimi rabo-e.”
chiubora Israel mai Rawang,
‘Ira tamine! Agu magenthak riga
“Chiudi

Naleng ronna nkiubo kamkhai raleng nangniu phuibam jiuma? Sichiu tulo. Iniu chamai hina riga chariu magenthiubo hai phungwang rabo-e, chiudi nagu ringting tura nangniu tadkhaibo bam hinaga marilu rabo-e.
Haise Egypt mai Wangpiu Neco gu riphentu Babylon mai Wangpiu Nebuchadnezzar niu Euphrate Giu munggasu, Jehoiakim niu Judah maigu chawang thiubo pamadaibo kum lungga chari thiujiu ngamlubo lamga-e:
“Egypt maigu chakampaodung siniu senpadle!
‘Naliugu chageese kadenlujiu chari gase hangut sulo!
Naliu qondungse kadenlujiu tongsulo!
Chagi-pirunse khailujiu chap nben sulo!
Naliugu changiu kariu sulo! Naliu ripuan piusulo!’
“Chiudi Iniu degu ngaolo?” chiujiu
“Paliu hai pingjiu masai nkhin mide.
Paliugu riphendungtu kam masakhai bide;
pingbo siniu ngamdiu then pakjiu sailam phuilan makjiu, majatjiu pak mide.
Pak katan maidung siniu paklu lakge;
riphendungse mari ngam lulakge.
Tingpilam, Euphrate munggase paliu phi masuijiu siga kaomide.
Nile giu kumjiu singgiu hugenlam maliampad bambo hai saolo?
Nile giu kumjiu singgiu hugenlam maliampad bambo hai Egypt si-e.
Egypt niu din-e, ‘Iniu sulujiu kadihpiritu gom mine;
Iniu namdidung nai siga lungbambo maidungtu kam maha mine.
Chaqondungtu tadra, khatdi chaqon-karidungtu
kadat-kalajiu pakra chamtan pikhai sulo!
Sudan nai Libya lamsu chagee phungmaidungtu,
khatdi Lydia lamsu tavaipi thinsibo riphenmaitu langpad sulo’”
Haise Dithubo Ngamkambo
thainai paniu chakhum ruikhai rabo-e;
thainai paniu pagu mikremaitu sajai pirabo-e.
Paheng siniu magiu makthen paliutu tiurabo-e,
khatdi kim makthen paliu zaise sak rabo-e.
Egypt maidung yo, Gilead lam tadsulo, khatdi chapiu-chaga phiululo!
Naliugu chapiu-chaga hinase gengta mide chiubo lenkhai mide.
wakhat niudi naliutu wikhai silakge.
Jatdung siniu naliugu mangambose chiulude;
naliuniu kapbose mai hinaniu chiulude.
Riphenmai khatniu khat riga tao maluijiu bamme,
panai khang niase kadihga kaokiu mide.
“Haise Egypt gu namdakdung, Migdol, Memphis, khatdi Tahpanhes ga paoron khailo:
‘Naliu ronna naliutu ranlura kadenlulo;
naliugu kabambo pakhiangnase chariga kam maha mirabo-e!
Dekamjiu naliugu kangambo ra Apis kaomi jiulo?
Naliugu riphen maidungniu paliu phi masuijiu kaokiu mibo-e;
paliu karai khat-khat khuga din-e,
‘Kalang sulo! Chaky lam aliumai khulam wangjiu,
mikremai heng-ngiu gasu mari mikhe!’
“Egypt wangpiu zan kasanbo pikhai bilo--
‘Pakhuan-palee Kengbo, Chaliang Rengbo, Kampaibo’
Ngamkambo
I hai ringjiu bambo Rawang si-e.
Tabor Luong tonniu maluang hina riga ku-nkiubo
khatdi Carmel Luongniu duipui riga, ku-nkiujiu bambo kumjiu
naliutu aphen maigu pumtan thiurabo-e.
Kavang thiujiu puitad mira kaden lulo, naliu Egypt maidung!
Memphis haitu kathaidih pithiu khaijiu,
mai khatniudi lungmakbo ram pithiu khai mirabo-e.
Egypt hai pamai wibo tompui kumme,
pamaki bambo wa khaopui siniu tingpilamsu chari thiuwang-e.
Paniu lankhaibo riphen maidungdi kabuipoidung kumjiu paliu pumtan hamide.
Paliu chaplujiu asun makge, paliu mathiu marilujiu pak mide.
Paliu shairabo tingmikse, paliu harabo wanse wangtang mide.
Egypt hai paliugu mikremai riphen wangboga,
kaniuniu katonbo khuan kumjiu pak mide.
Paliugu mari thinlujiu mariu singbangdungtu huikaobo kumjiu patu aphen rabo-e.
Paliu riakse chakra kengju-e; paliugu riphendungse takaodung suang keng-e.
Egypt maidungtu kam mangam khai mide;
paliutu tingpilam bambo maidungniu ngamlude.
Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo

sigasu paliutu kamshat nijiu bambo maidung, Babylon mai Wangpiu Nebuchadnezzar nai pagu riphenmai khuga benlen khai mine. Chiudi pasainiu, paliuniu karaiga lungkhai mibo kumjiu, Egypt dihga maidungse lunglan rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu kadiubo kadih lamsu naliuniu kavang thiutad mibo bam gasu gukhaibi rabo-e.
Naliu ky lam malan wangjiu agi-manaijiu lungrabo-e;
naliutu mai khatniudi kam kapin khai lakge, naliu manang makjiu lungrabo-e.
Iniu naliu khuga wangjiu gukhaine.
Naliutu hamara khai mibo jat hinatu Iniu kam mahami rabo-e,
chiudi naliutu Iniu kam maha lakge. Iniu naliutu sajai pikhai mak talakge,
chiudi naliutu sajai pikhai lubo saiga, Iniu wijiu kamkhai rabo-e.
Paniu din-e:
“Phuilo! Tingpi lamsu tadui diwang kinne,
sise singgiugu duidet kumjiu luangwang kinne.
Paliuniu haibo kadih khatdi siga bambo wa hinatu,
namdidung khatdi siga lungbambo maidung situ naimi rabo-e.
Maidungniu nkha khaira mara padsu rabo-e;
kadihga bammai hinaniu kap marungsu rabo-e.
Paliuniu chaqon phipa khuan, chaqon-kariniu tadbo khuan chiurabo-e.
Papiudung siniu panahmaidung khulam malan wanglak mide;
paliu benjeng shairui-rui mide.
Philistia maitu kam maha mirabo jengniu
Tyre nai Sidon gasu wangrabo nkha hinase kam maha mirabo wanse wangkinne.
Wajiuga magenthiu chariubose Gaza maidung khuga wang bamme,
chiudi Ashkelon maidungra wadi maliu makge.
Kakibo Philistia maidungse dethengkha achungjiu bamralo?
Naliuniu sise dethengkha kathonjiu bamralo?
Naliu hengse pabungga setkhai lan milo, siga khai lujiu mathak milo!
Atu pikhaibo ngamse bamlujiu Iniu dechiu mathak ngamlu ralo?
Iniu Ashkelon tu khatdi singgiu hugen lam lungbam maitu asunra chamtan pikhai mide.”
“Nebo maidungtu lungsa khailo—paliugu namdi kam maha mide!
Kiriathaim tu haphun mide, pagu katanbo charirengse kamkao mide,
khatdi sibo maidungtu kam mangam mide,
Moab gu kendise hamide. Heshbon tu mikremainiu haphun lude
khatdi Moab mai jattu kam mahara chon lude.
Madmen namdakse maliuta mirabo-e;
riphendungniu chari hawang rabo-e.
Horonaim maidungniu senpadle, ‘Chari-e! Chamai shaikam mide!’
“Moab haitu kam maha mide, nahmaidungniu kapbo nking khailo.
Luhith tadkhangbo npuiga kap ahikbo khuan,
Horonaim tadkiubo npuiga ahikjiu kap bambo khuan nking khailo.
‘Kalanglo, naliu ringlura paklulo!
Kathaidihga bambo qonniam kumjiu paklulo!’ chiujiu sen bamme.
“Moab yo, nangniu nagu pumtan nai nagu chakhiu-chalantu malum bamme,
chiudi tuhoira natudi ngammi rabo-e;
nara Chemosh di, pagu singkudung nai
chawang nahdung jaojiu kavangleng puitad mirabo-e.
Namdak khatnadi kam masakhai makbo thiulakge;
Ramjeng nai taningdih hakam mirabo-e.
Moab leng charaw khuan khangsulo; haise kam maha majimi rabo-e.
Siga bambo namdakdungse kam mahami rabo-e,
mai khatnadi siga lunglan lak mide.”
(Palungchun pakhiangna ngutjiu
“Sijengniu tuhoira, Moab haitu jawse kumjiu runpad mira Iniu chamai langkhai rabo wanse wang kinne. Sibo jaw-lahse maruang mirabo-e, khatdi sise kampangmi rabo-e.
Sibo wan ga Israel maidungniu Bethel tu paliuniu malumbo gasu paliu chun thiuta mibo kumjiu, Moab maidungdi paliu ra Chemosh tu malumbo jengniu paliu chun thiuta mirabo-e.
“Moab maidung yo, naliuniu dekamjiu chari thiuboga
chari-jai sijiu kahubo riphenmai kumjiu charipi thiuni jiulo?
Moab nai pagu namdidung situ kam masa mide;
siga withubo chabondung situ gikam mide.
Ngamkambo
Moab hai nchum mirabose wangkinne, haise wangji kinne.
“Sibo jat jengniu achung lulo,
sibo namditu lung mana bambo naliuniu, pazan tadbo situ naliuniu sibamme.
Siga pumtan bamjiu mawangbose kampang mide, chiujiu dinlo;
sibogu kendibo nai pumtanse hamide.’
Dibon ga lungbam maidung naliu, chakhuangthiu buibo naliu bam gasu nkum milo,
sichiujiu kadihga tabui jiuga ntao milo;
Moab tu kam mahara maidungse haiga bamme pagu charirengse kam masa mide.
Aroer ga lungbambo maidung naliu, puidi mungga chaplujiu khuanlo;
pak katanbo maidung khuga degu padmilo chiubo paliu khuga maniu lulo.
‘Moab hai kao mide,’ chiujiu paliuniu kenkak rabo-e,
‘Sijengniu kaplulo, haise mangambo gu-e.
Moab haitu kam masa mide chiujiu, Arnon Giuki ponjiu senkhailo!’
“Maluang bekga bambo namdidung: Holon ga Jahzah ga, Mephath ga,
Dibon ga, Nebo ga, Beth Diblathaim ga,
Kiriathaim ga, Bethgamul ga, Bethmeon ga,
Kerioth ga, khatdi Bezrah ga ladjan hai wang bamde. Moab kadihga bambo namdidung pakhiangna kadiubo gadi kanabo gadi ladjan hai wang bamde.
Moab gu pumtan situ niakpet mide; sibogu kangambo situ kam maha mide.
Moab yo, naliuniu Israel maidungtu kagajiu nuikhai mibose maningtao khailo. Chamai kasamaitu min aruang lubo kumjiu, naliuniu paliutu kam masa khai mibo-e.
“Moab ga lungbambo maidung yo, naliugu namdakdung situ phutmilo! Chakhao-tulimga meng lung milo! Singgiu bekga pasip ponbo khao-chalip kumjiu bam milo.
Moab hai chaliang ju-e! Paniu patu ronna wajiuga maning madijiu maidungtu sontiujiu, chaliangbo lunlungga lungbambo lamga Iniu chiu-e.
, Iniu paliugu chaliangbose si-e. Paliuniu wasao thiujiu bambo hai wadi makge, sichiujiu paliuniu kam bambose pating thenglak mide.
Sijeng gasu Moab ga bammai hina nai Kir Heres maidung hina jengniu I kaprabo-e.

Iniu Jazer, maidung leng suangdi nkiujiu Sibmah mai jengniu kaprabo-e. Sibmah gu namdi yo, nang haira mumkenniu pakese Kashaibo Duipui gasu kenpadjiu Jazer ga kentang mibo kumme. Chiudi tuhoira nagu tatun rasy nai nagu mumsyse kam masa mide.
Kadihtam kawibo Moab gasu chunwi-ringabo luthon mide. Mumsy kathunbo gasu padui luangpad tami raleng Iniu kham mide; Mai khatniudi jaw kampad raleng khatdi chunwibo khuan senpad raleng hamide.

“Elealeh nai Heshbon maidungniu Jahaz katang paliu khuan chiutang raleng marajiu senpadle; sibo khuanse Zoar maidungniu chiu rabo-e, khatdi Eglath Shelishiyah nai Horonaim katangbo sise chiu-e. Nimrim giuky katangna sangmide.
Moab maidungniu paliugu chara kahumbo bamga rukhaibo—khatdi paliu radung khuga charathiujiu kadpadbose Iniu khammi rabo-e.
“Mai khatniu kashai baibo lui nthiam mudjiu kathiu kum, alungchun hai Moab nai Kir Heres maidung jengniu chariu-e, palamra paliugu kabambo hina hamide.
Paliu mathiu paliu pee gotlujiu, paliu ntang giudi kakip mide. Paliu ronna paliu ben kam ajam lujiu mai hina maliufai benjiu bamme.
Moab maigu chaky npom hinaga khatdi maduibam hinagadi achungbo makjiu kaki ha-e, palamra mai khatniudi masenta mibo tadui-lahtu kumjiu Iniu kampang mide.
Moab maitu hamarapu mide! Kapjiu senpad sulo! Moab hai mangam mide. Haise nchum mide, lung maguibambo jat hinaniu haisitu nuijiu kaga bamme.
Lengreng khatniu pakan kaphing padlujiu thonkiubo kumjiu jat khatniu Moab riga thonkiu rabo-e chiujiu
sichiujiu sibo charireng nai namdakdungtu haphun mirabo-e. Sibo naise maipui khatniu ngena lungbo thad kumjiu Moab riphendungniu pingsu rabo-e.
Moab haitu kam masa kiujiu jat khat pithiu tami rabo-e, palamra paniu atu atungjiu charithiu-e.
Kapingbo, chakhomky khatdi tathak siniu Moab maidungtu khuan bamme.

Mai khatniu kaping-charenbo gasu matanjiu marilu npadsai, chakhomga nkhuang khai rabo-e, sichiujiu mai khatniu chakhom gasu matanjiu buang npadsai, tathak gasu manmi rabo-e, palamra Moab haitu kam maha mira

Pating-padih kahamaidung siniu Heshbon ga, nda pawan khat chawang Sihon niu mawangkhai mibo namdiga nbekhaira matan bamme, chiudi haise tuhoira chami tao bamme. Charitu masenbo Moab maidung luongriang nai ramluong hinase chaminiu ruthon mide.
Moab maidungtu lungsa khailo! Chemosh tu kahum maidung situ kam maha mide, paliu nahpui paliu nahpiudungtu kavang leng puitad kam mide.
Chiudi pawanse wangtang dasai,

Chiudi Iniu Rabbah gu dihsing namdi maidungtu pijiu chari thiubo khuan chiukhai rabo wanse wangkinne, sichiujiu sise mathakhu nchummi rabo-e, sigasu sibo namdungse ruthon kammi rabo-e. Sigasu Israel maidungniu paliu kadihse paliu khugasu sutlubo maidung khugasu lulanmi rabo-e.

Heshbon maidung yo, kapjiu senpad sulo! Ai haitu kam maha mide! Rabbah ga bambo maipuidung yo, achung lulo! Maliufai benlujiu khatdi achungjiu kap lulo. Naliu chun kabuakjiu paksulo. Naliu ra Molech situ pagu singkudung nai chawangnahdung situ min aruang lujiu kavangleng puitadmi rabo-e.
Naliu chamchang makbo maidung dekamjiu chaliang jiulo? Naliugu pumtanse kao mide. Dekamjiu naliugu pumtantu malum khaijiu, mai khatniudi naliutu hujiu asun ngam lakge chiu din jiulo?

Pabam hinagasu Iniu naliu riga kapingbo phungwang khaine, Naliu mathiu pakkammi rabo-e. Mai hina paniu paniu ringlura paktad mine, khatdi siga naliugu riphen maidungtu khom madui wanglanra mai khatnadi bamlakge.
“Chiudi Iniu Ammon maitu pijiu lungwi khailanne.
Dedan maidung yo, marilujiu, paksulo! Nbai milo! Esau kaikikdungtu Iniu kam mahami rabo-e, palamra Iniu paliutu sajai pirabo wanse wangkinne.
Maidungniu mumsy raiboga, paliuniu mumsy ken ga poinakhara masiak khai-e, sigasu ka-aga mainiu nchun tingga wangboga, paliuniu masenbo ronna khoi-e.

Chiudi Iniu Esau kaikikdungtu, paliu nbaibam khatnadi masiak makjiu, leduak khai mide, chiusai paliuniu nbai khaira daotami rabo-e. Edom maidung pakhiangnatu kam maha mide. Mai khat tudi masiak khai makge.
Naliugu magennahdung situ akhuga saokhailo, Iniu paliutu akhi lubui-e. Naliugu kamipuidungniu akhuga mangiukhai lubui-e.
“Sajai daobui makbo maidung niudi sajai pikhaibo piang gasu sakrabo-e, naliutu sajai pimak tane chiu naliuniu maning jiuma? Suimakge, naliuniu sibo piang gasu sakrabo-e!

I apumsiakniu Bozrah gu namditu mainiu phuipingbo kathaidih khat pithiu khaimi rabo-e chiujiu siangkhai mibo-e; maidungniu sisetu matingjiu phuisu rabo-e khatdi sibo zantu tasiang kumjiu thinpiusu rabo-e. Pamungga bambo namdungse tingthengjiu nchummi rabo-e,
Iniu din-e, “Edom yo, Iniu
niu naliu jeng pi hakhai mine, sichiujiu mai khatniudi naliutu chakhuang thiukhai lakge.

Naliugu chaliang siniu naliutu sonlude. Naliuniu maningbo kumjiu, mai khatniudi naliutu nping lakge. Naliuniu maluang kakubo ton, chakhao-turen kakubo luongga lungne; lengreng kumjiu naliuniu kakubo lam lungbam liudi,
Sodom nai Gomorrah ga padmibo kumjiu khatdi sibo mungga bambo namdakdungtu kam mahamibo kumjiu Edom ga padne. Mai khatnadi siga wadaodi lunglan lakge.

Ndongqui khatniu mariujiu gasu padlujiu Jordan genlam madiakbo piuriangliga ronpadbo kumjiu, Iniu wangne siga Edom maitu pijiu paliu kadih gasu paktad mira kamkhai rabo-e. Sigasu Iniu kadalubo jupao siniu sibo jat riga mawangne. Saoniu atu kada ngamlu ralo? Saoniu hujiu atu karen ralo? Saokumbo mawangpaoniu atu atung ngamlu ralo?

Haijengniu, Edom maitu Iniu suini makjiu kamra rangkhai mibotu, khatdi Teman gu namdi maidungtu kamra rangkhai mibo situ nkinglo. Paliu nahmaidung tudi jutad mirabo-e, siga mai hinaniu nping charensu rabo-e.
Edom kaomibo khuan chiu wangboga kadih pakhiangna malai rabo-e, sigasu maidungniu kapbo khuanse Aqaba Ajai-bek tangbo chiuwang rabo-e.
Lengrengniu pakan kaphingpad lujiu wa kathon kumjiu, Bozrah tu mikre mainiu lenwang thon rabo-e. Sibo naise maipui khatgu manathad kumjiu Edom riphendungtu kam kapin wangsu rabo-e.”
Damascus maidung paliu jeng hamijiu charen-alejiu pak mide. Maipui khatgu manathad kumjiu paliu magenthiu chariu bamme.
Pazan tadbo namdi, matha-malajiu bambose tuhoira hasiak mide.
Sibo naise pagu chabon maidung situ namdigu puidi gasu kamshat mine khatdi pagu riphendung situ kam maha mine.
Iniu Damascus gu karengga chami thonkhaijiu, Chawang Benhadad wangkining ruthonmi rabo-e. Ngamkambo
Haise Kedar kiphiumai nai Babylon mai Wangpiu Nebuchadnezzar niu ngamlubo, Hazor niu thinbambo luongriang lamga

Paliugu rijiky, paliu gu khaorui-khaona, paliugu rijikyfai khatdi paliugu kabambo hinase sutlulo Paliugu qontraodungse sutlujiu maidung khuga haichiujiu dinkhai bilo, ‘Kapingbo siniu naliutu tao maguibam mide!’
“Hazor maidung yo,
‘Wanglo! Manangmak jingjiu amansai bammai tuse aliu aphen sukhe! Paliugu namdi rengmunse khamten makge, haisitu wakhat niudi gukhaira ha-e.’
“Paliugu qontraodung nai khaorui-khaona hinase sutlulo. Paliu pitham kakip madun mibo maidung hinatu Iniu pabam machangna kam mara khai mine.
Hazor haitu tingtheng leng kathaidih pithiu khai mine, siga tanydung ronna lungrabo-e. Siga mai khatnadi lunglan lak mide.
Zedekiah niu Judah gu chawang thiulubo sai gap, Ngamkambo
Paniu din-e, “Elam tu pumtan pikhai bambo tavaipi thinmai pakhiangnatu Iniu kamshatmi rabo-e.
Kadih pake madai lamsu Elam tu atungjiu hawangra Iniu kamkhai rabo-e, khatdi paliuniu madun sunjiu lungkhai rabo bam hamakthen, paliuniu tadkhaira pabam bamthenna Iniu paliutu kam marapu khai rabo-e.

Iniu Elam maidungtu paliugu mikremai, paliutu kamshat nijiu bambo maidungtu npingra kamkhai rabo-e. Agu lungpom kasabo siniu Elam maidungtu Iniu kam mahami rabo-e, sichiujiu Iniu paliutu biakthon mira, paliutu atung raleng riphen maitu langkhai rabo-e.
Iniu paliugu chawang, paliugu jupaodungtu kam maha lujiu agu chawangbam thiusu rabo-e.
Chiudi pasai kana lam, Elam maidung lungwikhang lanra Iniu kamkhai lan rabo-e.
“Jatdung khuga tacham hai dinkhai bilo!
Haise paokhai bilo! Haise mahinmi tulo!
Babylon hai kao mide!
Pagu Marduk ratu kam maratap-tap mide!
Babylon gu charamengdung haitu kam mangam mide,
pagu matai marengbo ramengdungse kam paroi-soi mide!
“Tingpi lamsu jat khatniu Babylon tu asunra wangbamme, sichiujiu haisitu kathaidih pithiu khai mirabo-e. Chakhao chamai hina pakmi rabo-e, siga mai khatnadi lungtami rabo-e.”
Paliuniu Zion tadrabo npui maniujiu sibo npuilam tadrabo-e. Paliuniu akhuga tingtheng leng chamriat kamrabo-e khatdi sise wadaodi kampang lakge.

“Amaidung hai ramluongga mily khuanpaoniu kam maha mibo milydung kum mide. Paliu hai mily kumjiu ramluong khat gasu ramluong khatga ron maha kam mide, khatdi ndega paliu ky bamlo chiubo paliuniu mangai mide.
Paliutu daobo mai hinaniu paliutu asun-e, paliugu mikre maidungniu din-e, ‘Paliuniu

Iniu tingpilam bambo katanbo jatdungtu pisukhaijiu Babylon maitu pijiu charithiu rabo-e. Paliuniu chariga chap nbenlujiu hangut chari thiu rabo-e. Paliura tathiu hasimai, tavaipi ketsimai, wadaodi ketpai kamak mai-e.
Babylon tu sunglu rabo-e, khatdi paliu ky sungmai siniu, paliuniu lunibo hina khoilu rabo-e.
chiudi naliugu namdi siak haitu kam manon kiujiu kam mangam khai rabo-e. Babylon hainiu jat hina ruangga siamthubo thiumi rabo-e, haise sangkiujiu tadui kahabo kathaidih thiumi rabo-e.
Alungpom jengniu Babylon ga mai khatnadi lunglak mide, haise mathaku nchummi rabo-e. Haiga tadken wangmai hina paliu suang hajiu charensu rabo-e.
“Tavaipi thin maidung yo, Babylon tu chari thiura paren thiujiu haisitu taoweng magui sulo. Nagu tavaipi-thu hina thinlujiu Babylon tu ketsulo, palamra haisiniu

Sulujiu namdi maguibo hinaga chari thiura senkhai sulo! Tuhoira Babylon niu madunsun mide. Sibo kareng kampang lujiu pakhiangna kampang paroi-soi mide. Iniu Babylon haitu chakhum ruibambo-e. Siniu naliugu chakhum paliu riga ruikhai lulo. Paliuniu kakibo jatdungtu kam masa khai mibo kum gapjiu paliu khuga kamkhai bilo.
Sibo kadihga pijiu alin lingkhai tulo, maksai pijiu atiat khai tulo. Lungbambo sangdiumaidung siniu chari thiu bambo situ pingjiu paliu kylam malanwang mirabo-e.”
Haijeng gasu, Israel mai Rawang,

Iniu Israel maitu paliugu kadih malankhai birabo-e. Carmel Luongga khatdi Bashan luongriangga puakbo alin-tarase paliuniu tiurabo-e, khatdi Ephraim nai Gilead luongriangga bambo alin-tara paliuniu tiu kani hina tiurabo-e.
Sibo wanse wangboga, Israel mai khuga nuanse daolakge khatdi Judah mai khuga kasabo daolakge, palamra masiak khaibo maidunggu ringting situ Iniu kuak khaibi rabo-e.
Sibo ramga chari thiubo khuan chiu-e, sichiujiu wajiukha kam masakhai mibo-e.
Babylon mainiu kadihpiri pakhiangnatu kadijiu kaditap-tap mide, siniu tuhoira sibogu kadiakse kam tap-tap mide! Sibo kadihga padbambotu ngaolubo jat hina paliu suang hamide.
Babylon yo, nangniu atu atungjiu aphenne, khatdi Iniu tathak thiukhai bambo thakga natu man mide, sichiu bamdi nangniu sise simakge.
Iniu chari maniadung khaibo bamse lepad mide, sichiujiu agu lungpom siniu haise Iniu lupad mibo-e, palamra Tanthubo, Ngamkambo

Pake hina lamsu patu asunlo khatdi miusy khom madui wangkhai bambo chabowse kampang milo! Miusy khomwang khai nbambo kumjiu sunglubo hinase khai madui lulo! Sibo kadihse kam maha milo! Wakhatnadi masiak khai tulo!
Paliugu riphenmai hinatu kamshat milo! Paliutu gimilo! Babylon maidung nchum mide! Paliutu sajai pirabo wanse wangtang mide!”
(Pating-padih kahamai siniu Babylon lamsu Jerusalem ga wanglujiu, Babylon maidungniu patu Kahumboky tu kamkhai mibo chakhumse dechiujiu aliu Rawang,
Siniu chabon maidung situ namdi npuiga kamshat mirabo-e, khatdi sibogu riphen maidung mathiutu sibo tingmikga kam mahami rabo-e.
“Babylon mai yo, naliu hai chaliangboniu phuimide, siniu Tanthubo Ngamkambo

Naliugu chaliangbo jat phi hai masuijiu nkhuang kiurabo-e, naliutu mai khatniudi jumachap khangbi lakge, Iniu naliugu namdidungse chami khaimi rabo-e, khatdi siga lung maguijiu bambo hinatu kam mahami rabo-e.”
Ngamkambo
Chiudi paliutu ranpad khairabo piu haira tanbo-e--pazan haise Ngamkambo
Haibo mawangpaodung khatdi paliugu ningting hinase kashaibo-e.
Pagu aratbo phaimiudung sira kashaibo-e—paliu hai ndejiuga kapang gulo!
Pagu riphendung sira kashaibo-e—paliu hai dejiuga nping-charenbo daoralo!
Chaqondung nai chaqon-karidung situ kam masa milo!
Paniu puiwangbo riphendung sira kashaibo-e—paliu hai dejiuga son-tanu mailo!
Pagu chakhiubungse kam masa milo; wahina sunglujiu khoilulo.
Pagu kadihse pijiu ting-malang milo khatdi pagu singgiuse pisang milo.
Babylon haise kapingbo charamenggu kadih khatle,
siseniu maidungtu kammeng mibo-e.
Iniu Sodom nai Gomorrah tu khatdi siga lung magui bambo namdakdungtu kam mahamiboga padmibo kumgapjiu Babylon gadi padrabo-e. Mai khatnadi siga lunglan lakge,
“Kadiu lamsuniu kangambo jat,
tingpi lamgu kadih khat gasu maidung wang kinne;
chawang kakeng khaniu charileng kaden bamme.
Paliuniu paliu heng nai tavaipi thinsu mide; paliu hai kasabo nai lungsa simakbo-e.
Paliuniu paliu qon tongsuboga, paliu khuan haise duipui kasuakbo khuan kumme.
Paliuniu Babylon maitu atungjiu asun raleng kaden lude.
Babylon maigu chawang siniu tacham hai chiuluboga pajeng hajiu shairiang-riang mide.
Maipui khatgu manathad kumjiu, chariubo siniu patu thinman mide.
“Ndongqui siniu mariu kajingbo Jordan giuki gasu padbo kumjiu

Iniu Babylon gu namditu atungjiu kamra rangkhai mibo nai sibo maidungtu Iniu kamkhai raleng machun bambo haitu nking khailo. Paliu nahmaidung katang tudi jutadmi rabo-e, siga mai hinase nping charensu rabo-e.
Babylon kaokiuboga, kadihpiri pakhiangna kanukbo khuan khatdi nping charenbo khuan jatdungniu chiurabo-e.”

Tingkai siniu magaorengtu hun thonmibo kumjiu Babylon tu kam maha mira sangdiumaitu Iniu langkhai rabo-e. Sibo tingmik wangtangbo ga, paliuniu pake hina lamsu asunjiu kadih haitu sao maruang khai diak rabo-e.
Pagu riphen maidung situ pijiu paliugu charipuan khaira khatdi paliugu tavaipi pijiu ket raleng pawan pitulo. Chabon maidungtu masiak khai tulo! Riphen hinatu kam maha milo!
Paliu namdigu puidiga paliutu kam ajamjiu kamshat mirabo-e.
Israel maigu Masanbo Khat, atu paliuniu atungjiu nuan tenbam tadi, Ngamkambo
Babylon mai khugasu paksulo! Ringlu raleng paksulo! Babylon maigu nuan jengniu pijiu kamshat mitulo! Paliutu pikhai buibo agu sajai nai chakhum ruirabose Iniu tuhoi kamra mide.
Babylon hai kadihpiri pakhiangnatu pi maniu khaibo aben-ga bambo kachia-piang kumbo-e. Jatdung siniu haibo jaw saklujiu paliu chun thiusi tamide.
Babylon hai bung kaokiujiu kam maha mide! Pajengniu achung khailo! Sibo jamleng chapiu phiu khailo sichiusai pase wilubodi sui-e.

Siga lungbambo sangdiumaidung siniu din-e, ‘Aliuniu Babylon tu nkha khaira matanbo-e, chiudi sise riju mide. Tuhoira patu saodia lujiu aliu kylam wangmikhe. Tingwang niu pagu kangambo siniu Babylon tu sajai pijiu kam mahaduak mide.’”
Babylon maitu kam maha mira
Riphendunggu chakampao siniu chamtan pi-e, “Naliugu tavaithuse kariu sulo! Naliugu chageese kaden sulo!
Babylon gu kareng situ aphen raleng madan kam khai sulo. Akhemaidung mathingsi lulo! Akhemaidung situ langkhai sulo! Chonraleng chamaitu langkhai sulo!”
Babylon maidung khuga
Sibo kadihga singgiu kengjiu bamme siseniu pi lungwi khai bamme, chiudi sibo wanse hamide, khatdi sibogu karing riangse kamtap mide.
Ngamkambo
pagu ningtingniu kadihpiritu damkhai-e khatdi tinggen situ judenpad khai-e.
Pagu chamtan siniu tingpuk riga tingdui marajiu bamme,
kadih pamalan gasu paniu kamuang situ puiwang-e.
Tingriuboga paniu hengri kalik khai-e
khatdi pagu tingkaiky gasu tingthungse langkhai-e.
Haise ngaoboga, maidung hai mengjiu paliu chun thiuta mi-e;
charamengtu dambo maidungse mathaku-e
palamra paliuniu dambo radungse aratbo-e khatdi siga karingbo siu ha-e.
Paliu hai pageng ha-e, siniu wajeng simak rabo-e;
Jacob Rawang haira paliu kum makge;
pah haira wahina kadambo piu-e,
khatdi paniu Israel maitu pamai thiusiakra kada lubo-e,
Pazan hai Ngamkambo
“Babylon yo, nang hai agu charigu mania, agu kadiak si-e.
Iniu natu thinlujiu, jatdung nai chawangdihdung situ kadiniang mibo-e.
Chaqondung nai chaqon tuangmaidungtu
chaqon-karidung nai paliugu karipaodungtu,
maipui, maipiudungtu, kating-kana mathiutu kamshat mira,
akhang-aliu mathiutu gi mira,
mily khuanmaidung nai milydungtu kamshat mira,
chaqondung nai chalu phumaidungtu kamshat mira
mawangpaodung nai chakampaodungtu kamshat mira
Iniu naliutu thinpiu khaibo-e.”
Babylon yo, nang haira kadihpiri pakhiangnatu kam mahamibo maluang khat kumbo-e, chiudi
Nagu nchum mibo tukangdungse wadaodi chaky thiuboga thinpiu lanlak mide. Nang hai tingtheng kathaidih thiumi rabo-e.

“Aphen raleng madan kamlen khailo! Jatdungniu chiulu raleng makese mudkhailo! Babylon tu chari thiura jatdung kaden sulo! Asun raleng Ararat, Minni, khatdi Ashkenaz wangdihdungtu dinkhai bilo. Chari gase jukhaira chakampao khat kadakhai sulo. Takaodung kumjiu chaqondung tuse puiwang sulo.
Babylon tu atungjiu chari thiura jatdung kaden sulo. Media gu chawangdung, jupaodung khatdi, chakampaodung sigasu paliuniu thinman bambo riphendung pakhiangnatu langkhai sulo.
niu Babylon tu kathaidih pithiu khaira, khatdi siga mai khattudi pilung khaimak raleng rangkhai mibose kampadra jengniu kadih hai masandi-dijiu bamme.
Babylon gu riphendung siniu chari aphen taju, paliugu charirengga bam mide. Paliu hot hamijiu maipuidung kum mide. Namdigu rengmundungse kampang mide, khatdi chaky hinase chami ruthon kam mide.
Babylon gu namdi hai pake hina pangmibo jengniu Babylon mai wangpiu khuga paokhaira chiujiu chakhumpao khat sai khat wangjiu bamme.
Mikre maidungniu singgiu kenpadjiu haphun lude, khatdi charirengse ruthon mide. Babylon gu riphendungse kapingboniu phui mide.
Chamiubuitu asaiphungga tao nibo kumjiu, mikre maidungniu paliutu bikaokiu lujiu taoni jisu rabo-e. Israel mai Rawang, Ngamkambo
Babylon mai wangpiuniu Jerusalem tu dangbiang lujiu kajong lude.
Paniu namdi situ tadui-piangtu kumjiu kam maruang mide;
karapui kumjiu paniu kajong lude.
Paniu lunibo hinase paniu khoilude, kakilam sira marathon mide.
Zion maidungtu pijiu haichiu dinlo,
“Aliu khuga kamkhai mibose, Babylon mainiu parip phungrabo-e!”
Jerusalem maidungtu pijiu haichiu dinlo,
“Aliuniu chariu khengbambo haise Babylon mainiu parip phungrabo-e!”
Sichiujiu
Sibogu kadih situ kam nchum kiujiu nkan khaodungniu lungbo bam pithiu khai mine. Haise mai phuipingbo bam thiu mine, mai khatniudi siga lunglan tamine, kangaomai hina nping charensu rabo-e.
Babylon ga bammai mathiuse ndongqui kumjiu marungne, khatdi papoi kum marane.
Paliu tiuni saju jiuma? Iniu paliutu katiu kiraleng kaden lujiu pitiu-pisak maniu khai rabo-e. Paliu hai jikiu mine, sichiujiu wadaodi buangsu lanta mine.
Iniu paliutu milypoidung, kamidung khatdi midangchitu kumjiu dangshat mira jutad mirabo-e
Babylon lamga
Duipui siniu Babylon riga tadui naiwangjiu duiliu siniu gomsin mide.
Namdakdungse mai phui pingbo bam thiu mide, khatdi tadui kahabo kathaidih thiu mide, siga mai khatnadi lungta mide khatdi tad mariu tamide.
Iniu Babylon mai ra--Bel tu sajai pirabo-e, khatdi paniu agalubo maniadungse thonpad mira Iniu kamkhai rabo-e; jatdung siniu patu kahum tami rabo-e.
“Babylon gu karengse kao mide.
Israel maidung yo, sigasu paklu sulo! Agu lungpom kasabo gasu naliu ringlu raleng paklulo.

Naliu hotse hamitulo maksai mainiu din hiu-hiu bambo champaose chiulujiu manangmi tulo. Tingkum machangna katam-tambo khuan chiuwang sune--kadih khatniu kadih khattu, khatdi chawang khatniu chawang khattu chari thiubo khuan chiu sune.
Sichiujiu Babylon maigu ramengdung situ Iniu thinsu changam kamkhai rabo wanse wang kinne. Sibo dih pakhiangnatu kam mangam khai rabo-e, khatdi siga bambo mai hinatu kamshat kam mirabo-e.
Babylon tu kamkaojiu kam mahami raleng tingpi lamsu wangboga, kadihpiriga bambo khatdi tingpukga bambo hinaniu chunwijiu senpad rabo-e.
Kadihpiri pabam hinaga chamai kashaibo hai Babylon mainiu kambo-e, sijengniu tuhoira Babylon kaokiumi rabo-e palamra paniu Israel maidung kengkhatu kamshat mibo-e.
Naliuniu din-e, ‘Aliu zu kam masajiu kam mangam khai mide, aliu hai wathak thiu raleng hamide, palamra sangdiumaidung siniu Charaky gu masanbo bamdungse sutmide.’
Sijeng gasu, Iniu din-e, chiubora Iniu Babylon maigu ramengdungtu situ kamkhai sune, siga paliuniu kadihpiri pabam hinaga kap marung surabo wanse wang kinne.
Babylon maidungniu tingpuk lam buangkhang lujiu siga katanbo charireng thiukhang bamtadi, haisitu kam maha mira Iniu maidungtu langkhai rabo-e.
“Babylon ga kapjiu achung bambo khuanse nkinglo,
haise pagu kadihtu kam maha mibo jengniu-e.
Iniu Babylon tu kam maha mine
sichiujiu pi maliu tajing mine.
Riphendung siniu tadui kasuakbo khuan kumjiu
pakhuan kabuakbo siniu aphenjiu bamme.
Paliuniu Babylon tu kam mahara wang bamme,
pagu riphendung situ minlude, paliugu tavaipise tangmide.
I haira kasabo situ sajai pibo Rawang-e,
Babylon niu daobuibo saisuijiu Iniu kamkhai rabo-e.
Iniu paliugu Mawangpaodung, ningting maidung,
jupaodung khatdi riphendungtu jaw pisak maniu khai rabo-e.
Paliu jikiu mine, siga wadaodi buangsu ngamlakmi rabo-e.
Chawang, Iniu dinpad mibo-e, I hai Ngamkambo
Babylon gu katanbo rengse kadihga taliangkiu mirabo-e,
khatdi pagu rengmundungse ruthonmi rabo-e. Jatdunggu tienkam hinase mathaku-e
paliuniu matan khaimibose mirui thiu mide.
Ngamkambo

Mahseiah tahpiu, Neriah nahpiu Seraiah niu Chawang Zedekiah tu macha bamniu-e. Judah gu chawang Zedekiah niu mawangbo takum madaibo kumga, Seriah niu patu majang lujiu Babylon lam tadkinbo wan-ga Iniu patu wakhat katikhai-e.
Babylon tu kam mahami rabo lam hina khatdi Babylon ga padrabo lam hina Iniu ariak khatga raokhai-e.
Iniu Seraiah tu ladtikhai-e, “Nangniu Babylon wangtangbo wan-ga haiga raokhai bambo hina maidung khuga maomakjiu chakhuan tanjiu kenkhai bilo.
Sigasu kakheng thiulo, ‘
Seraiah yo, nangniu haibo ariakkhuang hai maidung khuga kenkhai kamlubo saiga, haise tatuga rat taman khailujiu Euphrate Giukiga taliang khai milo,
sichiujiu dinlo, ‘Haise Babylon ga padrabo-e, pahai malinmi rabo-e, wadaodi nphong khanglan lak mide, palamra
Haigasu Jeremiah ladkeng loikhaide.

Zedekiah niu Judah gu chawang thiubo wan-ga pagu takum makai-je-khat tangmide, khatdi paniu Jerusalem ga takum kariu-je-khat mawang khai-e. Papui haise Libnah namdiga lungbo Jeremiah nahpui pazan siniu Hamutal chiujiu ku-e.
Chawang Jehoiakim niu kambo kum gapjiu, Chawang Zedekiah niu
niu Jerusalem mai nai Judah maitu palung pomchang pom mide sijengniu paniu paliutu pakhu gasu hathon mide.
Zedekiah niu Babylon mai wangpiu Nebuchadnezzar tu atungjiu chari thiusude,
sijengniu Nebuchadnezzar niu pagu riphendung hinatu majang lujiu Zedekiah niu mawangbo takum chakiubogu chahiu kariubogu jeng riubo naise Jerusalem tu charithiu sude.
Paliuniu namdi situ tao magui lujiu Zedekiah niu mawangbo takum kariu-je-khat kiubo kum katang pamungga paliugu rijiky thiulujiu Jerusalem haitu taoweng magui lujiu bammide.
Sibo takum chahiu madaibogu jeng chakiubo nai, katiu riangju mijiu maidung siniu wadi tiuraleng hamibo wan-ga,

namdi gu karengse kampang sude. Babylon maigu riphendung siniu paliutu taoweng magui bamtadi, nchun tingga riphen maidung hina paktad kam mide. Paliuniu chawanggu kareng gasu tadpadjiu, kareng mun thiuwang arop khaibo bam gasu Jordan Ramjeng lam paktad mide.
Chiudi Babylon maigu riphendungniu Chawang Zedekiah tu hamengjiu Jericho mungga bambo taningdih gasu patu minlude, siga pagu riphen hinaniu patu phut mide.
Zedekiah tu Hamath gu luongren ga bambo Riblah namdiga bambo, Chawang Nebuchadnezzar khuga majang wangde, siga Nebuchadnezzar niu patu kamshat mira aja pikhaide.
Riblah gasu paniu Zedekiah nahpiudungtu kamshat mide. Sichiu paniu phui bamboga Judah maigu chakampaodung tudi kamshat mide.
Sibo saiga, paniu Zedekiah mikse ladthon lujiu patu ratlujiu Babylon lam majang wang mide. Zedekiah niu Babylon gu kavangkyga kashai katang bam mide.
Nebuchadnezzar niu Babylon gu chawang thiubo takum kariu-je-chakiugu chahiu mangiubogu jeng kariubo nai, chawang gu ladtipao, khatdi riphenpao, Nebuzaradan niu Jerusalem ga ngutle.
Paniu Charaky, chawangkining, parathiubo maidung ky Jerusalem ga bambo hina ruthon mide,
khatdi pagu riphen maidungniu namdigu karengse kampang mide.
Sigasu Nebuzaradan niu namdiga bambo wakam kasimai nai Babylon maitu suimak maitu Babylon lam majanglu wang mide.
Chiudi paniu Judah gara kaleksa thumai, paliugu wadi kahamaidungtu khaidiak lujiu chalu kareng kamra masiak khai diak mide.

Paliuniu kara-thuak kuang khatdi rathakbam kam masanbogu tabui khaibo kuang, chamibung mataoboga thinbogu mania, chara thiuboga tazai majao khaibo tathikuang, rukhaiboga thinbo tathikuang, khatdi tanaaginiu kambo charakyga thinbo mania hina khoitad mide.

Paliuniu rangkanggi nai kachianiu kambo mania hina kasiambo tathikuang, chami ponbo khangli, charathiuboga tazai majao khaibo tathikuang, tabui khaibo kuang, chamibung kadungbo tang, maruta rukhaibo kuang khatdi jaw-liak khaiboga thinbo tathikuang hinase khoilude.
Tanaaginiu kambo Chawang Solomon niu Charakyga khaibo; chaky pon thiukhaibo tiang nia, matom-kari, kadibo akhun khatdi chaky tungmanbo matomchi kariu niakiu--sise parip madat silakbo gu-e.

Sibo katiang kaniase, khatniu gaphek 8 ku-e, khatdi gaphek 5.3 maweng-e. Sikaniase paki putle, khatdi pasiuse ntin kakren 75 kumbo siu-e. Katiang nia piriga tanaaginiu kambo tonse gaphek 2.2 ku-e, khatdi sibo tiang pakhiangnase mangbuirasy lun kumboniu papuan thiukhai-e, pakhiangnase tanaaginiu kamme.
Patiang niaga masiang khaibo mangbuirasy pakhiangnase kai khatle, khatdi sibo ruangga riak chakiu-je-charuk haira kadih gasuniu ngao-e.
Haigasu nkiujiu riphenpi Nebuzaradan siniu Singku Dibo, Seraih, pahangga bambo singku Zephaniah khatdi parathiubo charakygu chakampao khangsumtu kavangleng puitad mide.

Namdi gasu riphendunggu chakampaopi namdiga bamniubo chawanggu ladtipaodung khang chinnia, charipitu nkhabo, riphenmai dunggu ariak akhi maidung khatdi kakibo parathiubo chamai khang riak charuktu majanglu tad mide.
Nebuzaradan niu paliutu Hamath gu luongriangga bambo Riblah namdiga bambo, Nebuchadnezzar khuga majang wangde.
Siga chawangniu paliutu dapkhai lujiu kamshat mide.
copy Sichiujiu Judah maidungtu paliugu kadih gasu kavang thiura puitad mide.
Haise Nebuchadnezzar niu maidungtu lutad mibogu ariakga raokhaibo si-e: paniu chawang thiubo takum chinniabo kumga chamai 3,023 tu puitad mibo-e;
pagu takum kariu-je-tachadboga Jerusalem gasu chamai 832 tu puitad mibo-e;
khatdi pagu takum makai-je-sumkiubo kumga chamai 745 tu Nebuzaradan niu puitad mibo-e. Pakhiangnase chamai 4,600 tu puitad mibo-e.

Evilmerodakh niu Babylon maigu chawang thiuwangbo kumga, paniu Judah mai Wangpiu Jehoiachin tu chalungsabo lenkhaijiu patu kavangky gasu lepad khaide. Haibo guse Jehoiachin tu kavang thiura jutad mibo sai takum samriu-je-chinniabogu chahiu kariu niakiubogu jeng makai-je-mangiubo nai padbo-e.
Evilmerodakh niu Babylon maigu kavang thiu machammai mathiu suang patu chakhuang thiu nkiu khaibijiu kakibo wangdung suang patu dibibo bamga khaibi-e.
Sichiujiu Jehoiachin tu pagu kavang ponse pi lilujiu chawanggu kuangkaiga katiu tiuraleng suikhaijiu pagu ringting kaloibo tangna tiuwang-e.
Sichiujiu paniu ringthenna paleng pageng bambo saisuijiu paphijeng thiujiu pikhai-e.
Pawan khatga maidungniu phuitingjiu bambo
Jerusalem hai, tuhoira tajinging-nging mide!
Kadihpiri mainiu chakhuang thiujiu bambo pahai tuhoira kamipui kum mide;
namdigu katheng-kadi maidungse kavang lunlungga lungmide.
Nchun kapsang bamme; matui luangsao makjiu bamme.
Karaibo kamai khatniudi patu hiamkhaira hamide.
Pawatmai siniu patu jonmide;
tuhoira patu atungmai maliang mide.
Judah maidung haise nkha khaira habo vangdung thiumide,
paliu ky gasu minlujiu jutad mide.
Paliugu wakhatnadi habo bam, katambo kadihlam paliu lungra mide.
Mari lura wakhatdi hamide, pagu mikremaidung siniu taomagui kam mide.
Masanbo tingmikga kahumra charaky gase mai khatnadi wangta mide.
Liuchangdungse paliu chunsiat lui thiu bamme,
khatdi singkudungse kap marungjiu bamme.
Namdi rengmunse maruang riang-riang mide,
yo, Zion hai chariusui mide.
Pagu mikremaidung siniu malin mide;
paliugu pumtanniu patu thinman mide.
Pamao jengniu patu kam mathad khai bide.
Panahmaidung situ minlujiu puitad mide.
Jerusalem gu kendi hai hamide,
paliugu jupaodung hai mariujiu sonmide;
tathiu hamai khugasu pakjiu pasang mibo
chakheng kum mide.
Kaomibo Jerusalem hai karaiga pagu kendi situ maningtao-e.
Mikremai khuga pah kaomiboga mai khatniudi patu nkha khaira hamide;
paniu kaomibo ga patu ngamlumai siniu nuimenjiu bamme.
Pagu kendise hamide, patu hai lungpom siniu minlude;
papumruang ronna mide.
Pah kap marungjiu bamme, mangamboniu pazu nbai bamme.
Jerusalem tu kapingbo nuan siniu kam tania mide.
Pagu taniabose malapajiu ngaomide,
chiudi pakhuga wangrabo sansiat situ, paniu wadi manangkhai makge.
Pah kaomibo hai kapingbo gu-e; patu hiamkhaira mai khatnadi ha-e.
pagu mikremainiu patu ngamlude,
siniu lungsa khaira paniu
Pakhiu-palan hina mikremaidung siniu suttad mide.
Nkengmai ngutsui makge chiu dinbo Raky gase paliu ngutmibo paniu ngao-e.
Wa tiukhaira phiujiu pamaidung kap bamme;
ringlu rabo tatek jengniu paliugu sen-lanse nkhiak mide, sichiujiu namdi siniu kapjiu senbamme;
“Atu phuikhailo!” chiujiu tadkenmai hina khuga paniu kapjiu din bamme.
“Amagenthak kumbo mai khatnadi daomakge,
“Kulamsu paniu chami hai langkhai-e, sibo mi siniu alungga tao bamme.
Paniu atu manra tathak thiukhai lujiu kadihga jukaokiu mide.
Sichiujiu mathad saomakbo gase paniu atu phutkhai mide.
“Paniu anuan hina pariak chaklujiu khin aruang khai mide;
sibo ridse awongchengga paniu masengkhai bijiu I asang mide.
siniu paliutu atungra ajeng hamide.
Paniu agu chabonmai situ kam maha mira riphen maitu langkhai-e.
Paniu amaidungtu mumsy niakbo kumjiu niakpet mide.
Sijengniu amatui hai luangsao mak bamme.
Maidi achun kam ringa khaira hamide, maidi kachu khaira hamide.
Mikremai siniu atu ngamlude, amaidung leng wakhatdi masiak khai makge.
“Iniu aben henpatle, chiudi mai khatniudi nkha khai makge,
Atu atungra mikremaitu pakeh hina lamsu
Paliuniu atu karasut kumjiu lukhai bamme.
“Chiudi
Mai hina akhuan nking khailo, khatdi amagenthak hai phuikhailo.
Agu chabonmai hinatu kavang thiura mintad mide.
“Atu nkha khaira awatmaidungtu Iniu ku-e,
chiudi paliuniu atu nkha khaini makge.
Singkudung nai jupaodung hina npui-nchengga shaijiu bamme,
ringlura katiu phiutadbo gasu-e.
Anuan jengniu alung chariujiu pangmide.
Npui-ncheng gadi maitu kamshat bam, kalung gadi chamai shai bamme.
“Iniu kap marungjiu bambo hai nking khailo;
atu hiamkhaira mai khatnadi ha-e.
Nangniu ariga chariubo pikhaiboga, agu mikremaise paliu chunwijiu bamme.
Iniu chariu khengbo kumjiu, agu mikremai tudi pikhaine chiujiu
ladriat khaibose pi wangtang khai sulo.
“Anuan jengniu atu sajai pikhaibo kum;
paliugu nkhai-rili kasabo situ ladjan thiu khailo.
Iniu magenthiujiu mara bamme, khatdi alung manangjiu bamme.”
Tinggen gu kendi situ paniu kam maha mide.
Palung pombo naise patu Kahumboky sidi phutmide.
Judah ramlungga bambo nam hinatu Rapiu niu lungsamak jingjiu kam maha mide,
sibo ramtu rengmagui bambo chari rengse paniu kampang mide,
paniu sibo kadih nai mawangpaodung riga mangambose pikhai mide.
Palungpom gasu paniu Israel maigu pumtanse kam mara mide;
mikremai wangboga paniu aliutu nkhakhai nita mide.
Pa lungpom mi siniu aliutu rujiu wahina kam maha mide.
Mikremaitu kumjiu aliutu paniu pagu tavaipise khenjiu bamme.
Aliugu chunwat nai ringabose paniu kam maha mide.
Jerusalem ga bammai, aliu pagu lungpom daojiu bamme.
Mikremai khat kumjiu, Rapiu niu Israel maitu kam maha mide;
paniu sibo wangkining gu charireng situ kam maha lujiu phut mide,
paniu Judah maidung riga pamalan thiumakbo magenthakse phungwang khaide.
Aliuniu patu kahumbo Rakyse paniu kampang tap-tap mide,
paniu masanbo tingmikdung nai Tabamnai situ kam maha mide.
Chawang nai singkudi pagu lungpomse niatang mide.
