Rapiu niu pagu rathakbam nai pagu masanbo Kahumbo kyse phut mide;
Mikremainiu sibo rengse rathon mira paniu suikhai mide.
Aliuniu patu chunwijiu kahumbo bamga paliuniu chari ngambo khuan sen bamme.
pakhiangnase kam mahara madat lude.
Chaky ton nai sibo singbengse tuhoira kaomide.
Rengmun nai khamtendungse kakhiu tap-tap mide.
Chawang nai wasimaidung situ kavangleng mintad mide.
Phaimiukakungdung siniu
Tacheng tajaise katikhai tamide.
Jerusalem gu katingmai hina maliu makjiu ntao bamme
paliu peega tabui katupkhai lujiu, khatdi maliufai benlujiu bamme.
Liunamaidungse paliu pee kadihga makhum bamme.
Alungchun magenthiubo jengniu, kapjiu amik niu mide.
Amaidungtu kam mahamibo jengniu alung chariujiu ajeng hamide.
Nahmaidung nai pamnahdungse namdigu npui-nchengga
paliu jeng hajiu nkhuang kabaoting bamme.
Mariubo nai charibo siniu kapjiu paliu puitu kujiu kap bamme;
ajam mibo kumjiu paliu npui nchengga nkhuang bamme,
khatdi paliu pui pamga, shaikiujiu bamme.
Hey, Jerusalem, lungsabo Jerusalem yo,
Iniu degu dinralo, Iniu natu dechiu hiamralo?
Mai khatnadi haikumbo magenthak daomakge.
Nagu sansabo hai duinai kumjiu pamalan thiu makge, wadaodi wisilak mide.
Nagu phaimiukakungdung siniu aratbo chamse makjiu wadi naliu khuga dinkhaira hamide;
naliu nuan dinpat madu khai makbo jengniu, paliu cham siniu naliutu sonmide.
Nalung lisonra ha-e chiujiu naliutu pi maning khai-e.
Namdi mungga tadwang mai siniu, naliutu nuimen bamme.
Jerusalem niu kaomibotu paliu pi kangumjiu nui bamme;
“Haise matai wibo namdise makma?
Haise kadihpirigu tasao thiubo bamse makma?”
Nagu mikremai siniu natu nuimenjiu, paliu mik sajiu phui bamme.
Paliu mun menjiu khatdi kagajiu din bamme,
“Aliuniu haise kam maha mide!
Aliuniu machunjiu bambose haiside!”
Paniu kachan masuang khaibo kum, lungsamak jingjiu kam maha mide.
Aliugu mikremainiu chari ngamra paniu suikhaide
sichiujiu aliu kaomiboga, paliu chun wira kam khaide.
Hey, Jerusalem yo, nagu singbeng tudi pijiu Rapiu khuga kapjiu senlulo!
Singgiu kumjiu namatuise nchun n-nien saomakjiu luanglulo;
kiuhuijiu kapbo siniu nasangsiak lulo.
Nchun masangdi buangsulan lanjiu Rapiu khuga kapjiu khenglulo:
na-nahmaitu lungsa khaira nalungchun kasiu padjiu khenglulo--
Nahmaidung hai npui nchengga kami mijiu shaikiu bamme!
Phuikhailo. Hey,
Dejengniu aliutu haichiu kam mathad bam jiulo?
Maipuidung siniu paliuniu kungbo nahdung situ tiu bamme!
Singkudung nai phaimiukakungdung situ Charaky lungsiakga kamshat bamme.
Kating-kana tammakjiu npui nchengga shai bamme,
Chabon maidungtu mikremai hengniu bishat bamme.
Nagu lungpom naise lungsamak jingjiu nangniu kamshat mide.
Kapingbo siniu atu taomagui mira agu mikremaitu nangniu kukhai-e,
nagu lungpom tingmik situ mai khatniudi mari silu lakge.
Iniu lungsajiu makuat khangbo anahmai situ paliuniu kamshat kam mide.
Tingwang niu sajai pirabo lamga kasibo maise I-ye.
Tamiubo gase paniu atu thonkhai masukbi-bi mide.
Lungsamak jingjiu paniu atu daplan-lanjiu bamme.
Paniu apum haitu maring rekpang lujiu arahdi kamtang mide.
Paniu atu magenthiu chariubo kavangky gase bangkhai mide.
Paniu manomjiu atu kashaibogu tamiubo gase lungra kamkhai mide.
Paniu atu chagiriang siniu bangman mide; I hai mari silakbo kavangsi-e.
Nkha khaira Iniu alai padjiu kap bamme, chiudi Tingwang niu chiukhai makge;
Tad tangad lad-ladjiu I tad bamme; Iniu tadkhaibo bam hinaga tatugu singbengniu khamjiu bamme.
Paniu chahom kumjiu atu lim bamme; ndongqui kumjiu atu machakkhang thon bamme.
Puidi gasu paniu atu hapad lujiu, phettap-taplujiu thon mide.
Pagu tavaipise thipad lujiu, pagu majonbamse atu pithiu khaide.
Paniu tavaithuse apumga sukjiu ketkhai mide.
Maidungniu atu marinpuiting nuimenjiu bamme;
atu hai paliu mathiuniu kagajiu bamme.
Paniu aleng pikhaibo katiu-kasak sira kakhabo nai magenthiubo maliang-e.
Paniu azu hai kadihga tun kathao kiujiu tatu gasu ahiu rodthiam mide.
Chapum wibo, agi-manaibo, khatdi ringabo situ I sita mide.
I ring matheng silak mide;
Athad nai aky habo lungchun hainiu, aleng kakha-karabo tai thiu mide.
Iniu makum saomakjiu makum bamme, sisera alungchun magenthiubo si-e.
Chiudi Iniu wakhat maningtaoboga agu makumse wanglan-e:
Nsuan naimik padbo kum, kasanbo lungchun wang rabo-e.
Patu malummai hina khuga
Sijengniu aliutu gukhaira patu khuanbo hai aliuleng withubo-e—
Sichiujiu chabon tingga aliu ginsijiu katilubose withu-e.
Aliu magenthiubo khengbo tingga, maliumakjiu aliu ronna ntao bamrabo-e.
Aliuniu suikhaijiu makhumkiu bamsai, agunbose wanglubui-e.
Aliutu rukhaijiu kam mangam bamdi, aliuniu wahinase lukhai sirabo-e.
Rapiu haira lungsa sibo-e, siniu aliutu tingtheng phutkhai lakge.
Paniu aliu riga chariubo pikhai lubui-e,
chiudi paniu aliutu lungsabo hai pachang siakge khatdi tanne.
Aliugu magenthiu chariuboga pachun wibo makge.
Aliu hiupuinatu kavangkyga kam chariu bambo hai Rapiu niu sibambo-e.
Ladjankyga majibose aliuleng pikhai makbose pah sibamme.
Majibose ladjankyga kam kadat mibo situ paniu si bamme.
Kawibo di, kasabo di pagu chamtan saisuijiu padbo-e.
Aliu maomeng jengniu aliutu sajai piboga, dekamjiu aliu suimak ralo.
Aliu lunlung phui katinlujiu
Tinggen lam bambo Tingwang khuga aliu lung lepad lujiu khenglukhe.
“Nagu lungpom siniu, nagu lungsiat situ bai mide,
sichiujiu aliutu hatadjiu kamshat mide.
Aliu rathoi chiukhaira lungpomgu kamuang siniu gomnam mide.
Nangniu aliutu kadihpirigu karapon thonkhaibo bam pi thiukhai mide.
“Aliugu mikremai siniu, aliutu kam mangamjiu nuimen bamme.
Magenthiu chariuboga aliu lungkhai mide,
khatdi kapingbo nai tadiu saboga aliu lungbamme.
Amaidungtu kam maha mibo jengniu amatui hai singgiu kumjiu luang bamme.
“Luangsao makbo singgiu gase amatui luangkhaijiu bamne.
Tinggen lamsu
Namdigu maipuidung khuga padbambose ngaomak then, alungchun hai magenthiubo niu phui-e.
“Palam hatadi, mikremaidung siniu marengjiu thingnatu manbo kumjiu atu manlude.
Paliuniu chakhomky lunggase atu maring thonkhai lujiu pamase tatukangniu kapsin mide.
Tadui siniu atu maliamkhang suboga I shaira namide chiujiu maning-e.
Arathoi hai chiukhaira Iniu khengboga, nangniu chiukhai bi-e.
Nangniu atu paokakjiu pingmakra din khaibi-e.
“Nangniu atu gukhaira wang-e, Rapiu yo, khatdi agu ringting hai rankhai bi-e.
Alam chap khailo: kamaobose atu madam khaijiu bambose nang sibamme.
Agu mikremaidung siniu dejiukha atu marenglo,
dechiujiu atu atung bamlo chiubo nang sibamme.
“Paliuniu atu kam mangam khaibose nang chiulude,
Paliuniu alamga dinjiu n-nien marinpuiting makhiam thiujing-e.
Nchun, n-nien saomakjiu, paliuniu atu tanui thiujiu kaga bamme.
Paliutu niakpet lujiu kapingbo siniu pi phuikhailo!
Paliutu hajiu kadihpiri gasu kam maha khailo!”
Aliugu kabenbo kachiase, pazu mangkiu mide;
Charaky tukangdungse npui nchengga nkhuang marapu mide.
Zion ga bambo chabon maidungse aliuleng kachia kum bambo-e,
chiudi tuhoira paliuse chagam-lise kum mide.
Tany siniudi papoidungtu akhi-e,
chiudi amaidung haira ruidiniu papoitu pa-nkhai kasabo kumme.
Paliu pamnadungse kami-mijiu shai bamme;
nahmaidungse katiu khengjiu bamme chiudi paliutu mai khatniudi pikhai makge.
Pawan khatga withubo tiutek tiukhai mibo maidungse,
tuhoira npui-nchengga kami-mijiu shai bamme;
lung amansaijiu makuatkhai mibo maidungse,
tuhoira karapon-ga katiu phiutad bamme.
lungbambo mai suang sajiu, amaidungtu sajai pikhai bide.
Aliugu chawang nahdung sira paliu pum kam tania makge,
kabun kumjiu masanne, paliura tanne, hu-e, khatdi paliu pum wi-bansat bamme.
Tuhoira paliu shaijiu paliu zuse mangkiu mide,
pabam paji simakbo npui-nchengga shaijiu nkhuang kalapu bamme;
paliu gise kiwangjiu paliu rahga topmanjiu singtang kum mide.
Katiu tiura hajiu kami-mijiu shaibo suang, chariga shaimibo maidungse wi-nkiu-e.
panahtu lungsabo puidung siniu paliu nahdung siaktu langtiu bamme.
Zion situ chaminiu rujiu tabui mawi mide.
Jerusalem gu rengmun-ga wadao khatnadi,
sangdiumai mawangpaodungniu chari thiungutne chiubo malumkhai makge.
Chiudi haise padmide, palamra pagu
phaimiukakungdung siniu nuan kam mide,
khatdi pagu singkudung siniu pamao kahamaidung situ kamshat mide.
Paliugu jupaodungse pamik tiatmai kumjiu npui-nchengga rontadjiu bamme,
tazai marenjiu tadkinbo jengniu paliutu mai khatniudi niakhai makge.
Maidungniu senjiu bamme, “Naliu hai tania mide! Tadmilo atu niatalo!”
Sijengniu paliutu mai khatniudi lukhai makjiu, jat khat gasu jat khatga paliu rontadjiu bamme.
paniu paliutu kam marapu khai mibo-e.
Paniu aliugu singkudung nai jupaodungtu wajeng chakkhai tamide.
Wadaodi nkha wanglakbo situ aliuniu phuijiu aliu sangsiak mide.
Wadaodi nkha khai silakbo jat situ aliuniu khuanjiu bamme.
Mikremai siniu aliutu phuijiu bambo jengniu,
npui-nchengga katang aliu tadpat silak mide.
Aliu tingse loimide; pamalanbose wangmide.
Paliuniu aliutu habo hai tingpuk lamsu kalengniu kathonbo suang majatle.
Paliuniu aliutu ramluong lamdi aliu-pa suikhang-e;
paliuniu aliutu ramjing gasu simak jingjiu minlude.
aliu ringting phibang tuse paliuniu minlude.
Edom mai nai Uz mai yo, ngamdiuthen naliu chun wijiu nuilulo.
Naliugu sansabo tingmik sidi wangtang kinne;
naliu pumruang jutadjiu mangambo siniu, tad matun silakjiu tadrabo-e.
Zion lengra panuan man pimide;
Chiudi Edom yo, natura
aliutu phuikhaijiu, aliu mangam haitu phui khailo,
Aliugu maniadung hai palun simakmai sangdiumai ben-ga bammide:
sangdiumai siniu aliu kyga lungbam mide.
Aliu piudungtu mikremainiu gimide,
sichiujiu aliu puidung hai kamipui thiu mide.
Aliuniu sakraleng tadui liujiu bamme;
aliuniu dikraleng tasing liujiu bamme.
Aliutu qonniamdung nai qontraodung kumjiu
hachang hajiu, aliu sang mide, mathak khaira suikhai makge.
Aliu ringlura, Egypt nai Assyria lam katiu takhengra tadle.
Aliu paopeh mainiu nuan tenkhai mide, chiudi tuhoira paliu tad mide;
sichiudi paliu nuan jengniu aliu chariu bamme.
Kavang suang samai siniu aliutu mawangjiu bamme,
paliu pumtan gasu aliutu mai khatniudi gukhaira hamide.
Chamaitu kagi maise pabam hinaga rontad bamme:
katiu phiutadboga aliu ringting hakhaijiu bamme.
Katiu kamariubo siniu kakhunbo kum mide,
aliu geehai n-mang kumjiu thiu chang thiumide.
Zion Luong siak gasu aliu naodungtu manom minjiu bamme:
Judea ram lungga bambo aliu nahpuidungtu manomjiu min bamme.
Aliugu jupaodung situ minlujiu jumaseng mide;
aliugu katingmaitu chakhuang thiukhai tamide.
Aliugu chabonmaitu kavangdung kumjiu tasiu pi niakjiu bamme;
piumainahdung situ pijiu tasing karidbo jujiu bamme.
Namdi rengmun gase katingmai ntaota mide,
khatdi chabonmaidi chalui thiuta mide.
Aliu ringtingga chunwibo hamide,
chunsabo siniu chalen lenbo sung thiu mide.
Aliu sao thiu khaira wa khatnadi hamide.
Aliuniu nuan ten mide, tuhoira aliu nchum mide.
Aliu lungchun magenthiusiak mide,
sichiujiu aliu matui siniu wadi ngaota mide,
palamra Zion luang kaojiu nkamkui mide,
tanydung siniu nchum mibo gase marajiu bamme.
Chiudi
siniu kaloibo tangna nangniu mawang rabo-e.
Dekamjiu aliutu haithengkha phutmi jiulo?
Aliutu maningtao khai lanlak dama?
Aliutu nakhuga puiwang khai lanlo,
Karaiga aliugu kendise malan khai lanlo.
Maksai nangniu aliutu tingtheng thonmi rama?
Nagu lungpomse pamalan thiuta mijiuma?
(Sise Chawang Jehoiakhin tu kavangleng mintad mibo sai takum mangiubo ga-e).
Babylon kadihga Chebar Singgiu mungga
Iniu ngang phuiboga tingpi lamsu tingthung wangbo ngao-e. Kamuangkang kadibo khat gasu hengri kalikjiu tingpuk kamagui hina taoban sat mide. Hengri kalikbo gase tanaagi kumjiu benwang-e.
Tingthung n-ganggase chamailun kumbo khaoring madai I ngao-e,
chiudi sibo khaoring hinase pazu madai khatdi pakan madai-dai bamme.
Paliu ngen hai ntha maji-kajakge, sichiu paliu ntinse matomchi ntin kumme. Sise tanaagi tha-masan kapadbo kum ben-e.
Paliu zu madai nai paliu kan madai ronna makjiu paliu kan madai hang hinaga chamai ben madai bam-e, kan khat hangga, ben khat jam bamme.
Paliu kan nia-nia kaphingpadbo tingga paliu kan roiniu khatniu khattu niataojiu pake madai lamse paliu malaibo tingga paliu pum ariwang makjiu pabao khat thiujiu malai-e.
Khaoring siniu, pakan nia kaphing padlujiu, khatniu khattu niatao-e, khatdi pakan niase kaphing padlujiu paliu pumtu gom bamme.
Khaoring hinase pake madailam paliu zu marikhai kamme, sichiujiu paliuniu tadnibo genlamse, paliu pum mariwang lanmakjiu tadngam-e.
Khaoringdungse hengri kalikbo majad kumjiu tadpad tangut bamme.
Mawengbo waphi madaise nchamram-e; sise paman kungbo tu kumjiu ran-ran-e, khatdi mawengbo phi khatniu phikhat lungga tarikhai bambo kum-e,
sichiujiu mawengbo phidung siniu tadkhai nibo pake madai gase tadkhai ngamme.
Paphidunggu pakhuse pamikniu phuiting bamme.
Khaoringdungse malaisai paphidung sidi sui malai-e, khaoringdungse kadih gasu lensu sai, paphidung sidi suikhang-e.
Khaoringdungse tadkanibo lam tadle khatdi mawengbo phidung sidi sikum gapjiu tadle, palamra khaoringdung siniu paliutu thin bambo-e.
Sijengniu khaoringdungse tadbo gadi, mathakbo gadi, lenbo gadi sibo phidung sidi sikum gapjiu kam bamme.
Sibo lungga khaoringdungse paliu kan kaphing padlujiu, kan nia siniu khat-khattu niatao bam, kan nia siniu paliu pum gom bamme.
Paliu lenpadboga paliu kan khuanse duipui khuan kum, riphenmai malai subo khuan kum, Ngamkambo Tingwang khuan kum I chiu-e. Paliuniu lenbo gasu mathak misai paliu kanse njui wangmi-e,
Chiudi paliu piri lamsu wakhuan khatra padjiu bamme.
Sibo piuse chamijiuga tanaagi kabenbo kumjiu bamme. Haisiniu pakhiangna riga bensat mide,
siga takimaly giak hina bamme. Thao bansat bambo nbiu siniu
Iniu haise ngaoboga, kadihga kaokiu azu makhum bammide, siga atu npaobo khuan chiu-e. “Shaisuibo mai yo, chapsulo. I natu npao khaini-e.”
Sichiujiu chakhuan siniu atu npaobam khaga, Tingwang gu hiupuina siniu alungga ngutlujiu atu jusu khaijiu chakhuan siniu dinlan-e,
“Shaisuibo mai yo, Iniu natu Israel mai khuga langkhaine. Paliuniu alad piumakjiu paliu paopehdung kumjiu atu atungjiu bamme.
Paliu lung tan-e, khatdi atu chakhuang thiu makge, sijengniu paliu khuga dinkhaira, Dithubo
Kadin suimakbo maidung siniu nalad nkingdi, nking makdi, paliu ruangga phaimiukakung bamme chiubo silu rabo-e.

“Chiudi Shaisuibo mai yo, nangniu paliutu maksai paliu chamtudi pingmi tulo. Paliuniu natu din masajiu khan sune, haise charuimai-gapui jiuga kalungbo kum sune. Sichiudi paliuniu dinjiu, khanbo-tiabo situ manangmi tulo.
Paliuniu nkingnidi, nkingraodi, Iniu dinlo chiubo hinase paliu khuga nangniu dinrabo-e. Paliu hai kadinpiu makge chiubo hai maningtao lulo.
“Shaisuibo mai yo, Iniu nakhuga dinbo cham hai nkinglo. Paliu kumjiu satulo. Iniu natu pikhaibo hai tiura namun n-nga padlo.”
Ariak majiuhan khat thinlujiu chaben khat akhu lam kariopadbo Iniu ngao-e.
Chaben siniu ariak majiuhanse lepadboga, jai-nialamse chunsabo kapbo, achungbo maliang raokhai nbambo Iniu ngao-e.
Siga paniu pibo ariak majiuhanse tiuraleng Iniu amun n-nga padle,
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, haibo ariak majiuhanse tiujiu nawon-giu tiululo,” Iniu sise tiu-e, tiuboga makhuidui kumjiu humme.
Sibosai Tingwang niu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Israel maidung khuga tadlujiu Iniu nakhuga dinkhaibo hina dinkhai sulo.
Iniu natu sangdiumai paliu lad kakungmai khulam langkhaibo makge, chiudi Israel mai khuga langkhaibo-e.
Iniu natu kadibo jatdung, paliu lad kakungmai khuga langkhai sai paliuniu nalad nkingkhai rabo-e.
Chiudi Israel mai khat niudi nalad nkingkhai lakge, paliuniu aladtu katangna nking khaibi lakge. Paliu mathiu lung tan-e khatdi kalamjiu kadin piumakge.
Tuhoira Iniu natudi paliu kumgapjiu nalung pitanchang tan khaine.
Iniu natu tatukang kumjiu matipra, khatdi hira kumjiu pitan khaine, paliu thak kasabo maidung situ pingmi tulo.”
Tingwang niu dinlan-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Iniu nakhuga dinbo hai nking mawilo khatdi wahina hai maning tasi lulo.
Sichiujiu kavangthiu bammai, narammai khulam tadlujiu, paliuniu nkingni tadi, nkingrao tadi Dithubo
Sichiujiu Tingwang gu hiupuina siniu atu jusu khai-e, siga asailam chakhuan katanbo khatniu dinbo I chiu-e, sise haichiu din-e, “ Kulam Tinggen ga bambo
Khaoringdung siniu paliu kan kakhapbo khuan, mawengbo-phi siniu karibo khuanse kathi khuan katanbo kumjiu I chiu-e.
Siga
Sichiujiu Chebar Singgiu mung Tel Abib namga kavangthiu bammai khuga I wang-e, khatdi siga I jeng chinnia bamkhangjiu, Iniu ngaomibo di chiulubo lamga asuang hajiu bamme.
Jeng chinnia saiga,
“Shaisuibo mai yo, Israel maigu akhepiu thiura Iniu natu kamkhai mibo-e. Iniu paliu riga kachan khaibo hina hai nangniu paliu khuga dinkhai bilo.
Nuan phungmai khattu panuan jengniu pah shairabo-e chiujiu Iniu dinkhaiboga, nangniu sise dinkhai makjiu pah shaimi sai, sibo bangripse nangniu phungrabo-e.
Nangniu kasabo mai situ kachan khaijiu paniu nuanse kamta makjiu shaimi sai, nagu ringting situ masiak khai rabo-e.

“Kawibo piu siniu kasabo tien kamsujiu, nangniu patu kachankhai makjiu, Iniu patu kapingbo thakga jukhaijiu pah shaimi sai, paniu kawibo kamkhai mibo situ Iniu maningtao khai lakge. Sichiujiu pah shai mibo paripse nangniu phungrabo-e.
Nangniu kawimai khattu nuan kam makra dinkhaijiu, paniu nalad chiulujiu nuan kammak sai pah ringlu rabo-e, khatdi nagu ringting haidi masiak khai rabo-e.”
Siniu I ajengning lamse tadpadle, siga
chiudi
Shaisuibo mai yo, natu chariangniu ratman mirabo-e, sichiujiu nang maidung ruangga tadpad ngamlak mirabo-e.
Iniu namun ratmi rabo-e nangniu kasamaitu chalad din ngamlak mirabo-e.
Sichiujiu Iniu natu chalad dinlura pumtan pilansai, Dithubo
Tingwang niu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai, chagam tukang khat khoilujiu namasuangga khailulo, sibo riga Jerusalem mengse retkhailo.
Sibosai, situ chari habo meng, kadih khunki, rijiky, khatdi charireng meng khatdi tao magui bambo meng retkhailo.
Khangli khat thinlujiu namdi nanai kakga khai milo. Namdi khulam mari khailo. Haise chari hangut rabo si-e, nangniu hangut rabo-e. Haise Israel mai jatleng madan khatle.

“Sichiujiu mawui jailam jikiulo, siga Iniu Israel maigu kamaobose nariga khai rabo-e. Paliu khui-mao jengniu, nang siga tingmik 390 chariu khengrabo-e. Paliuniu takum khat phungrabo sung nangniu naikhat phungra Iniu nariga kam khaibo-e.
Sise nangniu kamloi miboga, majat jailam mariwang jikiulo. Siga jeng atai nangniu Judah mai khui-mao jengniu chariu khengrabo-e, takum khat sung naikhat phungra Iniu kam khaibo-e.
“Jerusalem tu taomagui bambotu mating sonna lulo. Nang-njum thunlujiu namdi situ sailad thiujiu din masa khailo.
Charise thiuloi makthen, nangniu kakilam marikhai makra Iniu natu ratmanmi rabo-e.
“Tuhoi chabanmiu, tathiu, chara, asio, matui khatdi tasy tamnakha thin lulo. Pakhiangnase ja-tabot lujiu taruak khuak lulo. Sise nangniu mawuilam arilujiu jibambo jeng 390 lungga tiurabo-e.
Naikhat tiuraleng taruak kani 230 natu pine, khatdi pasaibo nai padlan makthen haise tiurabo-e.
Tadui sakra lengdi naikhatga padad bamrabo-e, naikhatga chapiang nia ronna sak rabo-e.
Chamai-bakang kasangboniu khoilu chami thiujiu, sibo rigasu taruak khuak lujiu mai hinaniu ngaoboga nang tiulo.”
Chiudi Iniu paokak-e, “Makge, Dithubo
Tingwang niu din-e, “Wichang wide, sichiusai matom-ba thinlujiu sibo rigasu taruak khuaklu tiulo.”
Paniu dinlan-e, “Shaisuibo mai, Iniu Jerusalem leng katiu pita mine. Siga bammaidung siniu paliu tiutek leng madatjiu khatdi tadui sakraleng chakjiu lung chariujiu magenthiu sune.
Paliuniu tiura-sakra hamijiu paliu lung manang sune, sichiujiu paliu nuan jengniu paliu hami rabo-e.”

Charise thiuloi miboga jansumgu jankhatse namdi lungga rumilo. Jan khatse khoilujiu nangniu namdi lungga tadbo tingga n-sina siniu romtap-tap milo. Jan khat malibose namdi lenlam tingkai jiuga marakhai milo, sichiusai Iniu aheng thinlujiu sise hatad rabo-e.
Tathamse poinakhara masiak khailujiu nafailiga domman milo.
Kasia khoipad lanlujiu chamiga thon khaijiu rumilo, Sigasu Israel maigu jat hina khuga chamise sumi rabo-e.”
Dithubo

Chiudi Jerusalem hainiu agu chamtan haitu kakibo jatdung suang hungken padle, pamungga bambo kakibo kadih suang paniu alad haitu majai makge chiubo len-e. Jerusalem hainiu agu chamtantu khatdi agu tacheng-tajaitu lukhai makge.
Tuhoira Jerusalem yo, Dithubo
Sijengniu, Dithubo
Iniu kamarengbo ngamse nangniu kammibo jengniu, wadao khatdi Iniu kam matai makbo, wadao khatdi kamlan lakbogu sajaise Iniu Jerusalem riga pikhai rabo-e.

Haijengniu Jerusalem ga bambo puipiudungniu paliu nahdungtu, paliu nahdungniu paliu puipiudungtu tiusu rabo-e. Iniu naliutu sajai pibamga ring masiak lumai situ pabam machangnaga kam marapu khai rabo-e.
“Iniu ringjiu bambo Tingwang thiubambo jengniu, haise Dithubo

Naliugu jansumgu jan khat siniu marajiu khatdi mariu charijiu shairabo-e; jan khat situ namdi lenlam chahengniu bishatmi rabo-e, khatdi jankhat situ tingkai jiuga marakhaijiu paliutu chahengniu hatad rabo-e.
“Iniu alungpom hai kim makthen nangniu alungnot hai daojiu bamrabo-e. Haise padboga, nagu matun kamakbo jengniu alung pombo-e chiubo nangniu sisu rabo-e.
Namungga tad wangbo jatdung siniu chap npen lujiu natu nuimen rabo-e.
“Iniu alung pomjiu natu sajai piboga jatdung siniu pingjiu charen rabo-e. Paliuniu natu ngaoboga paliu mikphui sajiu nuimen rabo-e.
Iniu naleng katiu-kasak pitami rabo-e. Sichiujiu nang kami-mi rabo-e. Mariu charibo siniu natu tavaipi thuniu kettaobo thad kumjiu khengsu rabo-e.
Nanahmaidungtu kamshatra Iniu katiu-kasak riangbo nai nkankhao langkhaine, haichiujiu naliutu kam maha mira Iniu chararen nai tathiu-chari langwang rabo-e.
“Shaisuibo mai yo chiujiu paniu dinne, Israel maigu maluongtu phuilujiu agu champao hai paliu khuga pikhailo.
gu ladkeng hai Israel maigu ramluongga dinkhai bilo. Dithubo
Paliugu rathakbamse kamkao mine khatdi maru mataobo bamse kampang mine. Siga bambo maidung hinatu paliu rameng masuangga gimi rabo-e.
Israel mai phawdungse Iniu mara kajan khaine, sichiujiu paliu rahdungse rathakbam mungga khoi marakhai rabo-e.
Israel maigu namdi hina kam mahami rabo-e, sichiujiu paliu ramengdungse kamtap-tap mine, paliugu maru mataobo rathakbam sidi ju kajanpan khaijiu wadi ngaota mirabo-e.
Pabam hinaga maidungtu kamshat kajanpan khai rabo-e, sichiujiu masiak lumai siniu I hai
“Iniu khangsia maitu masiak khaine, sichiujiu paliutu jatdung ruangga pilung marakhai rabo-e,

sibo ramga paliu kavang thiujiu lungtad mirabo-e. Siga paliuniu atu maningtao rabo-e, sichiujiu Iniu paliutu sajai pijiu kam mangam khaibo-e chiubo paliuniu sisu rabo-e palamra paliugu matun makbo lungchun siniu charameng situ atusuang paliuniu masendiang mide. Paliu ronna kamangambose kam mide palamra kasabo nai matai marengbo ngamse paliuniu kam mide.
I hai
Dithubo
Kadiulam bammaidungse marajiu shairabo-e, kanaga bammaidungse chari gasu shairabo-e, masiak lumaise kami-mijiu shairabo-e. Paliuniu agu lungpom lungnotse daorabo-e.

Paliu phawdungse paliu ramenggu rathakbam mungga, luongbut hina riga, ramluong hina riga, madiakbo singbang hang hinaga khatdi nphubang hang hinaga, paliuniu paliu rameng khuga charathiubo bam hinaga kajanpan khai rabo-e. Siga mai hinaniu I hai

Yo, Iniu aben henpadjiu paliu kadihtu kam mahami rabo-e. Iniu paliu kadih hai tingrunlam kathaidih gasu tingpilam bambo Riblah namdi tangbo, Israel mainiu lungbo bam hina wakhatdi masiak khai makjiu kam mahami rabo-e. Sichiusai mai hinaniu I hai
“Shaisuibo yo chiujiu paniu dinne, Dithubo

“Israel mai yo, kaloibose wangmide. Alungpomse naliuniu niatao rabo-e, palamra naliuniu kamkhai mibose Iniu ladjan thiu bambo-e. Naliugu matai kamarengbo lunlung jengniu naliutu Iniu sajai hai pirabo-e.
Iniu naliutu wakhatdi lungsa makjiu, wakhatdi masiak khai lakge. Naliu tienkam kasabo jengniu naliutu Iniu sajai pirabo-e, sichiusai I hai
Haise Dithubo
Haise kanambo si-e.Haise kaloibo si-e. Naliu hai loimide.
Kadihga lungbammai naliuleng kaloibo tingse wangmide. Patingse loimibo jengniu ramluong rigase tachun habo nai kabuakbo ronna makjiu chakhuang changee thiubose hamide.
“Agu lungpom lungnot daoji sune. Naliu tienkam jengniu naliutu Iniu ladjan thiubambo-e,khatdi naliugu nkhai-rili jengniu sajai pirabo mide.
Naliugu matai-kamarengbo jai-ali jengniu sajai pikhai dasai, I hai
Israel maidung leng sansabo tingmikse wangkinne. Kasabo hai nkiukhang bamme. Chaliangbo hai kuthuboga bammide.
Kasabo hainiu kasabo padsanjiu bamme. Paliugu chakhiu-chalan, paliugu kendibo maksai paliu zan tadbo wakhatdi masiak lakge.
Pawanse wangkinne. Kaliubo, kajonbo ramba hamirabo tingse wangkinne, palamra Tingwang niu mai hinatu sajai pikhai rabo wanse wangtang mide.
Chali-alimai khatnadi ringtheng lulak mide, palamra Tingwang gu lungpomse mai hina riga wang mide. Kasamai khatniudi ringsi lulakge.
Makese mud bamme, mai hina kaden sulo. Chiudi mai khat niudi chari thiura tadmakge, palamra Tingwang lungpomse mathiu riga wangkam mide.

Npui-ncheng gase n-gi-athao bamme, chaky gase thiuniubo nai mariu charibo bamme. Kareng lenlam tadpadbo mai hina n-gi-athaobo gasu shairabo-e, khatdi namdi lungga bammai hina thiuniubo nai mariu-chariboga shairabo-e.
Ajengningga makhaodungtu kam kapin khaibo kumjiu, khangsianiu ramluonglam paktad sune. Mai hinaniu paliu nuan jengniu kapjiu achungrabo-e.
Mai hina bense pajeng hamine khatdi paliu tapuse kaphikrai-rai mirabo-e.
Paliuniu maliufai benlujiu pabam hinaga masandi-dijiu bamrabo-e. Paliu pi gotmi rabo-e, sichiujiu paliutu kam mangam khai rabo-e.
Paliugu kachia-rangkang situ kararen kumjiu thonmi rabo-e, palamra
Pawan khatra paliu tiu-taa kawibo jengniu wasao thiukhai mibo-e, chiudi sise khoilujiu paliuniu matai marengbo ramengse kammide. Sijengniu paliugu sen-lan haitu
Agu kakungbo Rakyse kam tania bamdi, khatdi humtiu maidungniu kampangjiu kam taniajiu bamdi Iniu wadi kamkhai lakge.
“Wahinase kabuak mide--sibo kadihga chamaitu kagimainiu phuimide khatdi sibo namdi lungga kasabo maliang mide.
Iniu sathubo jattu haiga puiwang lujiu paliutu pijiu naliu kyga lungkhaine. Naliugu kahumbo bam situ kam tania khaibo tingga, naliu ruangga tanthu maidungse paliu hot hami rabo-e.
Kamanangbose wangkinne. Naliuniu agi-manaibo phiusune, chiudi wakamdi daolakge.

Chariu magenthiubo khat saiga khat wangsan rabo-e, sichiujiu kasabo champao siniu chagiu thiujiu luangsu rabo-e. Phaimiukakungdung siniu degu ngaolo chiubo naliuniu phiu sune. Singkudung siniu maidungtu katikhaira wadi hami sune khatdi katingmai siniu ladpi khaira hami sune.

Chawang siniu hui sune, chawangnah siniu paliu chun hami sune khatdi maidung siniu pingjiu kaphikrai-rai misune. Naliuniu kamkhai mibo hina saisuijiu naliutu Iniu sajai pisune khatdi naliuniu maitu ladjan thiubo kum gapjiu naliutu ladjan thiu sune. Haichiujiu I hai
Aliuniu kavangthiu tadmibo takum charukbogu charukbo hiuga jeng mangiubo naise Judah maigu jupaodungse akyga atu maluang ntao bamme. Simak bungjiu Dithubo
Iniu ngangsu phuiboga chamikumbo mai khattu Iniu madungao khat ngao-e. Sibo piu khen n-hanglamse chami kumme, pakhen nri lamse thapad masan kalubo tataagi kumme.

Paben kumjiu henpad atham gasu atu juman lude. Sibo madungao gase Tingwang gu hiupuina siniu atu tingkai gasu ponsujiu Jerusalem lam jukhang mide. Siga Tingwang gu lungpom bambo rameng khai bambo Charaky gu tingpilam rengmun lunglamse paniu atu puiwangde.
Tingwang niu akhuga din-e, “Shaisuibo mai, tingpilam phui khanglo.” Iniu phui khangboga, Tingwang niu marengbo ramengse rengmun-gu rathakbam mungga ngao-e.

Tingwang niu akhuga din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, degu padbamlo chiubo nang ngaoma? Phuilo, Israel maidungniu matai marengbo ngam kamjiu agu masanbo bamgasu paliuniu atu hapadbi-bi mide. Haisuang kasabo ngamdungse nangniu ngaosune.”
Paniu atu lenkhaibo ladjanky kamun munggase puiwang singbeng kaput khat ngaolen khai-e.
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, singbeng haise kampang lujiu ngutlo.” Iniu sise kampang padboga kamun khat dao-e.
Paniu akhuga din-e, “Ngutlujiu paliuniu matai marengbo ngam kambambose phui tailo.”
Sijengniu tadngut lujiu Iniu phui-e. Singbeng gase kaniu meng khatdi masan makbo khaoring
Haidungse Shaphan nahpiu Jaaziah jaojiu Israel maigu jupaodung riak chinnia bamme. Paliu mathiuse maru mataobo kuang thinkam bamme, sigasu mikhase khangjiu bamme.
Tingwang niu maniu-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Israel maidungniu mahin kambambo haise nang ngaoma? Paliura charameng phuiting bambo kichen lungga kahumjiu bambo-e. Paliuniu haichiu din marijiu bamme; “
Sibosai
Sichiujiu Charaky gu tingpilam bambo rengmun gase paniu atu puikhang lujiu maipuidungniu paliu ra Tammuz
Paniu maniu-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, uise nang ngaoma? Haisuang sa-nkiubo nangniu ngaosune.”

Sichiujiu paniu Charakygu ladjanky nunglamse atu pui-ngutle. Masanbo bamga ngutrabo kamun munggase chamai makai-je-mangiukiu ntao bamme. Paliuniu masanbo bam gasu masai ntaolujiu tingbang lam marilujiu, padkinbo naimik situ kinkiu kahum bamme.

Paliuniu agu lungpomgu lungnotse daorabo-e. Iniu paliutu masiak khailakge, maksai wakhatdi lungsa khai lakge. Paliu laipadjiu paliu khuan tanjiu paliuniu akhuga khengsune, chiudi Iniu chiukhai lakge.”
Sigasu Tingwang niu senpadbo I chiu-e, “Namdi situ sajai piramaidung naliu haiga wanglo. Naliugu chari-mania thinlujiu wanglo.”

Siga Charaky rengmun ga tingpilamsu chamai khang charuk paliu heng-ngiu thinlujiu wangnuang sude. Paliu ruangga khang khatra fainoi benlujiu wakhat raokhaira ponlujiu kimme. Paliu mathiuse wanglujiu tataaginiu kambo rathakbam mungga chap bamde.
Siga Israel mai Rawang niu bambo ran-ranbo nbiuse pakan phungbo khaoring
“Jerusalem pakhiangna tadron lujiu magenthiu chariujiu bammai mathiu san-gase giakkhai milo, palamra paliuniu namdi lungga matai marengbo tienkamse paliuniu kamkhai mibo-e.”
Sigasu Tingwang niu kakimai situ kulujiu dinbo I chiu-e “Pasai suilujiu namdi lunggase tadmeng kamshat sulo. Mai khattudi masiak mane, mai khat tudi lungsa khai mane.

Katingmai, akhangmai, aliumai, maipuimai, nahmai pakhiangnatu kamshat milo. Chiudi paliu san-ga giak khai nbammai situra mai khattudi dikhai tulo. Atu kahumboky lung haigasu kamsulo.” Sichiujiu Charakyga chap bammai paliugu jupaodung situ maluang lujiu paliuniu kamsude.
Tingwang niu paliu khuga din-e, “Charaky haitu kam tania milo. Palung pakhiangna chaphaw siniu piphui khailo. Changamse kamsulo!” Sichiujiu namdi lunggase maidungtu kamshat sude.
Sichiujiu maidungtu kamshatjiu bamboga, aronna chap bamme. Iniu kadihga azu makhum kiulujiu senpad sude, “Dithubo
Tingwang niu paokakge, “Israel mai nai Judah mainiu kapingbo nuan hai kammibo-e. Paliuniu kadihpiri pabam hinaga chamaitu kamshatjiu bambo-e, siniu Jerusalem lungga hai kasaboniu phuiting mide.
Chiudi Iniu paliutu lungsa khailak mide; paliuniu maidung khuga kamkhai mibose Iniu paliu khuga kamkhai rabo-e.”
Sigase fainoi benbambo piu siniu
Fai-noi benbambo piu khugase Tingwang niu din-e, “Khaoring hangga bambo mawengbo phi kak gase tadlujiu taobambo mitikangse ponphui ting lulo. Sichiujiu mitikangse namdi riga marakhai milo.”
Paniu tadbose Iniu phui bamme.
Paniu tadngutboga khaoringdungse Charaky gu tingrunlam chap bamme, sichiujiu n-lungbo kahiuse kamuangniu kenphui mide.
gu ran-ranbo nbiuse khaoringdung khugasu Charaky kamun mungga tadwang sude. Sichiujiu Charaky lung pakhiangna kamuang siniu phuiting mide, khatdi sibo kahiu lunggase pabiu siniu bensat mide.
Pakan phungbo khaoring kan khuanse kahiu lenlamdi chiupad bamme. Haise Ngamkambo
Fainoi benbo piu situ khaoring hangga bambo mawengbo phi kak gasu chami lura
Khaoring ruangga khangkhat siniu paliu ruangga bambo chamise pabenniu khoilujiu fainoi benbambo piu khugase pikhaide sibopiu siniu chamise khoilujiu tadmide.
Khaoring hina kan hanggase chamai ben kumbo Iniu ngao-e.
Siga Iniu mawengbo phi madaise macham ramjiu ngao-e. Sibo mawengbo phidungse paman kungbo tudung kumjiu bensatle, sichiujiu khat-khat kakga kabetman bamme.
Khaoring siniu malaibo tingga, paliuniu kakilam marikhai sonmakjiu, paliuniu tadnibo jailam tadlu bui-e.
Paliu pum, paliu ngum, paliu ben, paliu kan khatdi paliu phi hinaga pamikniu phuiting bamme.
Sibo mawengbo phidungse Iniu ngaoraibo madungaoga ngaomibo panai machamme.
(Haibo khaoringdungse Iniu Chebar Singgiu mungga ngaokhai mibo si-e). Khaoring siniu tingkaiga tadbo tingga mawengbo phidung sidi suitadle.
Paliuniu paliu kan kaphik padbo tinggadi mawengbo phidungse suitadjiu bamme.
Khaoringdungse mathak miboga, mawengbo phidung sidi mathak mi-e; khaoringdungse lenpadbo tingga mawengbo phidung sidi paliu saisui tadle, palamra khaoringdung siniu paliutu thinman bambo-e.
Sibo saiga

Iniu haichiu phuijiu bamga paliu kanse kaphing padlujiu kadih gasu lenkhang mide, siga mawengbo phidung sidi suikhang mide. Paliuniu Charaky gu tingbang rengmun gase poinakha mathak khai-e khatdi ran-ranbo nbiu siniu paliutu majang bamme.
Paliu haise Iniu Chebar Giukiga Israel mai Rawang hangga ngaokhaibo khaoringdung si-e.
Paliu mathiu zu madai, paliu kan madai khatdi sibo kan hangga chamai ben kumbo khat-khat bamme.
Paliu zuse Iniu ngaokhai mibo zuse kumgappe. Khaoringse tadmaji kajakjiu tadmide.

Tingwang hiupuina niu atu Charaky gu tingbang rengmun lamse jukhang khaide. Siga Iniu jatgu jupao kania Azzur nahpiu Jaaziah nai Benaiah nahpiu Pelatiah jaojiu chamai makai-je-mangiukiutu rengmun mungga ngao-e.
Tingwang niu akhuga din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, haibo maidung hainiu kasabo rang-e, khatdi namdiga kasabo ladpikhai-e.
Paliuniu din-e, “Aliuniu chakydung hai thiulan nongmi rabo-e. Namdi hai langbambo chali kumbo-e, aliu hai sibo lungga langbambo chameese kumbo-e, chiudi haisiniu aliutu chami gasu pirukhai makge.’
Sijengniu, Shaisuibo mai yo, tuhoira paliutu din masa khai sulo.”
Naliuniu haibo namdi lungga maidung kakeng khatu kamshat mide, sichiujiu kashai phawdung siniu npui-ncheng pakhiangna phuiting mide.
“Sijengniu Dithubo
Naliuniu chahengtu pingjiuma? Chaheng ponmaitu Iniu maluangwang naliutu aphen rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu namdi lenlam maluangpad lujiu sangdiumai khuga pikhai mine. Naliutu kamshat mira Iniu dinkhai mide,
sichiujiu naliu kadih gasu chari thiujiu naliutu kamshat mirabo-e. Sichiusai mai hinaniu I hai
Chali siniu chamee situ n-tasi lulakbo kumjiu namdi siniu naliutu n-tasi lulakge. Naliu hai naliu Israel mai kadihga bamliu tadi, Iniu naliutu sajai pirabo-e.
Naliuniu agu chamtantu majai mak, tacheng-tajaitu kampang lujiu kiningmai jatgu tacheng-tajaitu majai mibo wan-ga naliuniu I hai
Iniu haichiu sailad dinbambo wan-ga Pelatiah nkhuangkiu shai mide. Siga Iniu kadihga azu makhum kiujiu senpadle, “Makge, Dithubo
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Jerusalem ga lungbammai siniu natu khatdi kavang thiutad mibo nasingnamai Israel maitu din bamme. Paliuniu din-e, ‘Kavang thiu mibo maidungse

“Tuhoira kavang thiutad mibo nakangmai khuga Iniu dinbo hai dinkhai bilo. Iniu paliutu katammai kadih lam khatdi kadiubo jat ruangga pilung khaibo-e. Chiudi pawan khatra paliuniu tadmibo bamgasu Iniu paliutu maluang khai bine.
“Sijengniu Dithubo
Paliuniu malanwangbo tingga, taniabo nai matai marengbo hinase paliuniu thonmi rabo-e
Iniu paliutu kasanbo lungchun nai kasanbo makum pikhai rabo-e. Iniu paliugu tatu kum tanbo lungchunse luthon lujiu kadinpiubo lungchunse pikhai rabo-e.
Sigasu paliuniu agu tacheng-tajaise majai rabo-e khatdi agu chamtanse chamchangjiu piurabo-e. Paliu hai amai thiurabo-e khatdi Iniu paliu Rawang thiurabo-e.
Chiudi matai marengbo ramengdung nai taniabotu kahum nimai situ Iniu sajai pirabo-e. Paliuniu kammibo saisuijiu Iniu paliutu sajai pirabo-e.” Dithubo
Ringjiu bambo khaoringdungse lensu mide, siga mawengbo phidung sidi paliu sai suitad mide. Israel mai Rawang gu ran-ranbo nbiu siniu paliu riga bamme.
Sibo ran-ranbo nbiuse namditu phutlujiu tingbanglam bambo ramluong lam tadmide.
Sibo madungao gasu, Tingwang hiupuina siniu atu Babylon ga kavang thiu bambo gase juwanglan mide. Sichiujiu madungaose loimide,
sichiujiu
“Shai-suibo mai yo, nang hai kadin piumakmai ruangga lung bamme. Paliu mikra bamme, chiudi paliu wadi ngao makge; paliu kuonra bamme, chiudi paliu wadi chiu makge, palamra paliu hai kadinpiu makge.

“Tuhoira, Shaisuibo mai yo, paky-palu kahamai siniu kambo kumjiu nabangse thiulujiu tamiu makhaga tadsulo. Nangniu haibo bamtu saodiak lujiu, pabam katamlam tadbo situ pijiu mai hinatu lenkhailo. Natu suimak mai tudi pingao khailo.
Naimik bamkhaga nabangse thiulujiu kavang thiutad mirabo kumjiu, paliuniu ngaobo bamga chawanse tadsulo.
Paliuniu phuijiu bamboga nagu singbengse kamput lujiu sigasu nabangse khoi npadbo sidi lenkhailo-e.
Nabangse namakhuakga khailujiu khatdi namik domman lujiu nang tadpadbose paliutu ngaolen khailo. Nangniu kambambo haise Israel maidung leng kachan khaibo thiurabo-e.”
Pasaibo nai nsuan
“Shaisuibo mai yo, tuhoira kadinpiu makbo Israel maidung siniu nang degu kambamlo chiubo maniu bamme,
siniu Dithubo
Nangniu kambambo haise paky-palu kahabo mai thak kambambo-e, sichiujiu paliudi paliu-ky paliu-lu kahamai thiu mine, khatdi kavangleng mintad mine.
Chawang-nah siniu pabang thiulujiu paliuniu paleng singbeng kamput khaibo gasu tamiubo tingga paksu rabo-e. Paniu pazu takum lujiu tadne siniu pah delam tadkinno chiubo wadi ngao lakge.
Chiudi Iniu agu tathak thiukhaijiu patu manmi rabo-e. Sichiujiu Iniu patu Babylon lam puitad lujiu, patu pingaomak jingjiu kamshat mirabo-e.
Iniu pagu chakamkyga bammai, pagu ladpimai, patu akhemai hinatu kam marapiak khaijiu, paliutu kamshatra maidungniu phiusu rabo-e.
“Iniu paliutu katambo jat ruangga, sangdiumai kadihga kam marapiak khaibo tingga I hai

Iniu paliutu tathiu-chari gasu, katiu riangbo gasu khatdi chararen gasu poinakha ronna masiak khaine, sichiujiu paliuniu akhuga dechiujiu matai marengbo ngam kamkhai milo chiubo sisu rabo-e, khatdi I hai
“Shaisuibo mai yo, nangniu tiubo tingga khatdi sakbo tingga pingjiu masandi-dilo.
Dithubo
Tuhoi lungphui bambo namdi haitu kam maha mine, sichiujiu sibo kadih situ ramjing pithiu khai mine. Siga paliuniu I hai
Paniu din-e, “ Shaisuibo mai yo, dekamjiu Israel maidungniu haibo kadinchamse dinjiu bamgulo: ‘Pawan ra tadjiu bamme, chiudi din masuang khai mibo chamse wadi wangtang makge’?
Tuhoira Dithubo
“Israel mai ruangga nchang makbo madungao, maksai kamaobo sailad padta mirabo-e.

, Iniu paliu khuga dinkhai rabo-e, sichiujiu Iniu dinkhai mibo hinase kamkhai rabo-e. Haise pating thenglak mide. kadinpiu makbo maidung naliu ringtingga Iniu kamkhaine chiujiu kachankhai mibo hinase padrabo-e. Iniu dinkhai mibo-e, chiujiu Dithubo
“Shaisuibo mai yo, nagu madungao nai sailad hai pasai kana leng-e chiujiu Israel maidungniu maning-e.
Sijengniu, Dithubo
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, paliu ronna sailad leng kamlujiu dinbambo Israel maitu din masa khai bilo.
Dithubo
Israel maidung yo, naliugu phaimiukakungdung haira nchum mibo namdiga lungbambo tanydung kumgapjiu pageng hamide.
Paliuniu kaomibo singbeng situ akhe makge, maksai karengse paliuniu thiusulan makge. Siniu

Paliugu madungao hai aratbo-e khatdi sailad dinbambose maji makbo-e, paliuniu agu champao din bamme chiujiu paliu ronna kam bamme, chiudi Iniu paliutu langkhaibo makge. Chiudi paliuniu paliu chamse majisune chiujiu maning-e!
Iniu paliu khuga din-e: Naliuniu ngaobo madungao sira aratbo-e khatdi sailad dinbose maji makbo-e. Naliuniu sise aladkeng-e chiujiu din-e, chiudi Iniu naliutu npaokhai makge!”
Sijengniu Dithubo

Naliu gu aratbo madungao siniu maidungtu jumaojiu bambo naliutu Iniu sajai pirabo-e. Amaidungniu walamga makhiam thiubo tingga naliutu pijao khai lakge; Israel mainiu chamairiak chakboga naliutu chakkhai tami rabo-e; naliuniu naliu kadihga wadaodi malan wanglak mide. Siga I hai Dithubo
Paliugu singbengse kaomine chiujiu phaimiukakungdung khuga dinkhai bilo. Sibo riga kachak rotkiu rabo-e, khatdi tingriu katanbo langkhai rabo-e.
Singbengse kaoparoi-soi mirabo-e, siga naliuniu wa kakabo manuk khaibo situ degu pageng bamlo chiujiu mai hinaniu maniu sune.”
Tuhoira Dithubo
Paliuniu wa kakabo manuk khaibo situ kampangjiu, kaphung tudung situ rathon mira alung chap mibo-e, Haise kao paroisoi kiujiu naliu mathiutu kamshat mirabo-e. Siga mai hinaniu I hai
“Singbeng nai sibo riga wakaka manuk khaibo mai hinase agu lungpom lungnot niatao rabo-e. Siga Iniu naliu khuga, singbeng nai naliu hai hamide chiujiu dinrabo-e--
Jerusalem hai wahina wimak tadi wahina wibamme chiujiu dinbo phaimiudung naliu mathiu hami rabo-e!” Dithubo
khatdi Dithubo

“Maipuidung naliu nchummi rabo-e! Naliuniu chamik thao kadatbogu tiuriangse mai hinaleng jajiu bamme khatdi chamik thao kadatbo fairense mai hinaniu paliu pi takumra dakjiu bamme, sichiujiu paliuniu maidung piriga pumtan bamlu raleng kam bamme. Naliuniu amaidung piriga kashaibo nai karingbo pumtan thinlujiu naliuleng genglura ronna phui bamme.

Naliuniu taruak pek nai tathiu chaben kani khat jengniu amaidung masuangga atu chakhuang thiu makjiu aratle. Shaibui mak maitu naliuniu kamshatle, khatdi shaibui maitu naliuniu kamshat makge. Sichiujiu naliuniu amaidung khuga aratbo dinboga paliuniu naliutu malumme.”
Tuhoira Dithubo
Iniu naliu pikhek fairense siakthon mine sichiujiu naliugu pumtan gasu amaidungtu malod khat gasu pijiu mari mine. Siga I hai
“Naliugu aratbo siniu kawibo maidung, Iniu kam masakhai raomaitu naliuniu kam n-khin khai-e. Kasabo maidung situ paliugu kasabo gasu pi marikhai lujiu paliu ringting kalan lura khamme.
Sijengniu tuhoira naliugu majimakbo madungao nai aratbo sailadse pating loimide. Naliugu pumtan gasu Iniu amaidungtu rankhai mine, siga I hai
Israel maigu jupaodung khangsianiu
Siga
“Shaisuibo mai yo, haibo maidung haise charameng ga paliu lungchun khai mibo-e, sichiu charameng siniu paliutu nuan-ga jukhai mibo-e. Paliutu Iniu paokak khaine chiujiu paliuniu maning jiuma?
“Tuhoira Dithubo
Sibo ramengdung siniu Israel maidungtu akhu gasu jumari kam kammi gu-e, chiudi Iniu pikhai rabo chamkak hainiu pijiu paliutu agu kadinpiu khai lusune chiu maning-e.
“Siniu tuhoira Israel maidung khuga Dithubo
“Israel mai khatniu maksai Israel mai ruangga lungbambo sangdiumai khatniu akhugasu mari lujiu, charamengtu kahum lujiu, phaimiukakung khat khuga wa maniura wangsai,
Iniu patu suimakjiu atung rabo-e. Iniu patu mathiu maga kamlen rabo-e. Iniu patu amaidung ruanggasu lupad mirabo-e, sichiujiu I hai
“Phaimiukakung khatniu patu aratbo chamkak pikhaisai, sise
Phaimiukakung situdi pakhuga maniubo piuse tudi Iniu machambo sajaise pikhai rabo-e.
Iniu haise kamkhaibo sira Israel mainiu akhugasu pakta mira khatdi nuan gasu kam taniata mira kam khaibo-e. Palamra paliu hai amaidung-e, khatdi I hai paliu Rawang thiu rabo-e.” Dithubo

Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo,” kadih khatniu nuan kammi sai, khatdi akhuga chamchang maksai, Iniu aben henpadjiu paliugu katiu-kasakse kam maha mirabo-e. Iniu charakhum langkhaijiu chakhao chamai hinatu kamshat mirabo-e.
Siga Noah, Daniel khatdi Job paliu lungbamliu tadi, paliu khangsum gu kawibo siniu paliu ringtingtu ronna ranlu rabo-e.” Dithubo
“ Maksai Iniu nkan-khaoringdungtu langkhaijiu maidung situ kamshat khaisai, siga mai khatniudi tad mariu silakge,
uibo maidung khangsumse bamliu tadi, paliuniu paliu nahdungsiak tudi ranlu lakge chiujiu Dithubo
“Maksai sibo dihga Iniu tathiu-chari langkhaijiu chakhao chamai hinatu kamshat misai,
uibo maidung khangsumse bamliu tadi, Dithubo
“Iniu sibo dihga alungpomjiu chararen langkhaijiu chakhao-chamai kengkhatu kamshat khaisai,
siga Naoh, Daniel khatdi Job lungbamliu tadi, Dithubo

Khangsia mainiu ringmasiak lujiu paliu nahdungtu ranlutadi, paliuniu nakhuga wangbo tingga paliutu phuitailo. Paliu hai dejiukha salo chiubo khatdi Iniu Jerusalem riga ladjan thiubo hai maji-e chiubo silu rabo-e;
siga Iniu kambambo hina hai wilura kambambo-e chiubo naliuniu sisu rabo-e.” Dithubo
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, dechiujiu singbang khattu nai mumsy kentu din kadasi ralo? Dechiujiu mumsiken-ke nai mariu singbang situ din kadasi ralo?
Haise nangniu thin lujiu wa kagengbo kamlu buima? Haise thin lujiu wa guakhaira ntuang kamlu buima?
Haise chami thiuraleng ronna-e. Haise paton lam kiwangjiu n-gangga tikwang misai nangniu wa kagengbo kamlu buima?
Haise rumakha gadi pageng hamibo-e. Haise tuhoira chaminiu rumisai pageng degu bamlan ralo!”
Tuhoira Dithubo
Paliuniu chami khat situra mari lude, tuhoira katambo mi siniu paliutu rulan sune. Iniu paliutu sajai piboga, I hai
Paliuniu akhuga chamchang makbo jengniu, Iniu paliu kadih haitu kathaidih pithiu khai mirabo-e.” Dithubo
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Jerusalem niu kamkhai mibo matai marengbo ngam situ siokhailo.
Dithubo
“Natu hai Canaan kadihga manakhai-e. Napiu hai Amor mai-e khatdi napui hai Hitt mai-e.
Natu manabo tingga mai khat niudi natu nkhiu khai makge maksai nalaa gekhai makge maksai natu matai biamkhai makge maksai natu chafainiu majiukhai makge.
Haikumbo ngamse mai khatniudi naleng kamkhaijiu natu lungsa khai makge. Natu manabo tingga mai khatniudi natu lungsa makge. Natu hai nkanjiuga thonkhai nbam niubo-e.
“Siga Iniu tadpadboga nazai jiuga nang kahak bamniu-e. Napum pakhiangna tazai siniu phuiting bamniu-e, chiudi Iniu natu pishai khai makbo-e.
Iniu natu pabang wibo piubuanbang khat pithiu khai-e. Nangniu tankhangjiu khatdi dikhangjiu liunahmai khat thiu mibo-e. Na-nabomse padmide, natham thengkhang mide chiudi napumruang bamkha-e.

“Iniu wanglanbo tingga, natu lungsa rabo wanse wangtang mide. Napumruang situ Iniu a-ntiang khoilu majiukhai lujiu natu lungsara ladriat thiu khaide. Yo, Iniu natu magiangra ladriat thiukhaijiu nang hai agu thiu mibo-e.” Haise Dithubo
“Sigasu Iniu tadui thuaklujiu tazaise khiu masan khaibo-e. Iniu napum gase takisa manuk khai mibo-e.
Iniu natu tathuak kakhaibo fai siniu napuan thiu khai-e, withubo chamigi phitop pikhailu, fainoi siniu napee khek leng khatdi takhompui-re ntiang pikhaide.
Iniu naleng tatiu-tataa, taaben-taasi pikhai bibo-e.
Iniu naleng taniu-khap, chalan, khatdi matai kawibo chawang pirun pikhai bibo-e.

Nagu kachia-rangkanggu tatiu-tataa khatdi tathuak khaibo fainoi nai chakhao-tai fai kengjiu bam mide. Withubo takhuiniu khuakbo taruakse nangniu tiukhai mide, khatdi makhuidui nai takisadi naleng bam mide. Nalunwat hai ben bansat mide, sichiujiu nang chawangpui thiu mibo-e.
Nang hai jat hina ruangga nazu-nalun witathui-e, palamra Iniu natu haijiukha kam mawikhai bibo-e.” Haise Dithubo
“Chiudi nangniu nalunwat nai nazan tadbo situ nangniu thinlujiu nakhuga kawangmai hinatu maluangji ponjiu tadmide.
Nangniu nafaise khoilujiu nagu kahumbo bam situ khatdi papum kajonpui kumjiu napumse mai hina khuga pikhaijiu bamme.
Iniu naleng pikhaibo kachia nai rangkangse khoilujiu nangniu npiumai mengdung kamlujiu nangniu paliu khuga makha-e.
Iniu naleng pikhaibo tathuak faise nangniu khoilujiu charameng khugase kadkhai bamme, sise kumjiu Iniu naleng pikhaibo takysa nai parim wibose nangniu charameng khuga kadkhaijiu bamme.
Iniu naleng withubo tiutek--withubo takhui, takisa, makhuidui pikhaibose nangniu khoilujiu charamengdung khugase kadkhai bamme.” Dithubo
“Sigasu nangniu akhuga lungkhaibo nahpuidung khatdi nahpiudung situ nangniu charameng khugase jumeng charathiu khai-e. Haise nangniu akhuga dejiukha matun kamak gulo,
anahdung puilujiu charameng khuga charathiu khaibo hai saju makma?
Nangniu chakhapui kumjiu matai marengbo kamangambo ngamse kambambo wan-ga—nda nang nahtingdao napumruang tazai jiuga kaniang bambo situ wadao khatdi maningtao khai makge.”
Dithubo
sichiujiu npui-ncheng hinaga charamengtu kahumrabo bam kamkhai lujiu nangniu napum kajonbo ngamse kam bamme.
Nalunwat haitu nangniu taniangjiuga kalui kakhuak mide. Nakhuga kawangmai hinatu napum pikhai-e, sichiujiu naimachangna chakhapui suang sa-nkiu mide.
Nangniu nakiningmai, Egypt mai kacharangmai situ maluanglu jibamme, sichiujiu napum kajonbo ngam hainiu alung kampom mide.
“Tuhoira natu sajai piraleng Iniu aben khengsu mide, sichiujiu naleng pikhaibo thoidamse luthon mide. Nagu matun makbo lunlung jengniu natu kamarengbo Philistia mai khuga Iniu pikhai mide.
“Maidung haitu maluangbo siniu naleng kim makge, siniu Assyria maitu nangniu hatad lande. Nangniu paliugu chakhapuidi thiu khaide, chiudi paliuniudi naleng kim makge.
Sichiujiu chali-chala thinbo Babylon maigu chakhapuidi nangniu thiukhaide, chiudi paliuniudi natu pikim khailu makge.”
Haise Dithubo
Npui-ncheng hinaga nangniu charameng kahumrabo bam kamkhai lujiu siga kamakhabo ngamse kamkhai mide. Chiudi nangra papum kajonbo puidung kumjiu rangkangtu matan sonbo makge.
Nang haira pakinatu chalungsa makjiu zusi kamakmai khuga kamakhabo puise kumbo-e.
Papum kajonpui situra paman pibo-e, chiudi nangra namarai piudung siniu natu maluangji khaira mahin tanim pi-e.
Nang haira ka-nkiubo chakhapui jat khatle. Nangniu sichiu kamra mai khatniudi natu manomjiu kam makge. Natu mainiu paman pimakge, chiudi nangniu paliutu pibo-e! Yo, nangra tamsinbo-e.”
Sichiusai, tuhoira, chakhapui, Jerusalem yo!
Haise Dithubo

Haijeng gasu Iniu namaraipiudung—nangniu masenbo situdi, nangniu marengbo situdi puiwang taruangkhai rabo-e. Iniu paliutu puiwang natu pichap magui lujiu nafai-nanina gaodok padlujiu napumruang situ pijiu phuikhai rabo-e.
Nangniu makha-aga khaimibo nai maitu kamshat mibo jengniu, natu hai Iniu alung pomjiu kashaibo siniu sajai pikhai rabo-e.

Iniu natu paliugu pumtan-ga pikhaijiu paliuniu natu maluang makha khai mibo bam nai charamengtu kahum khaimibo bam situ rathon mirabo-e. Paliuniu nafai-naninase khatdi natiu-nataase khoilu tadmi rabo-e, sichiujiu natura napumruang ronna khaidiak rabo-e.
“Paliuniu natu tatuniu rotra maidungtu masukhai sune, sichiujiu paliu heng siniu natu dantap-tapmi rabo-e.
Paliuniu nakyse chami rumine, sichiujiu natu sajai pibo hai maipuidungtu pijiu phuikhai rabo-e. Iniu natu pijiu chakhapuise pithiuta mine, sichiujiu namarai piudung leng kalen pikhai tamine.
Sichiusai agu lungpomse hami rabo-e, khatdi alung hai agiwang mirabo-e. Sichiujiu alung pomta mine khatdi manma tamine.

Nang nahtingga dechiujiu Iniu natu akhikhai milo chiubo nang mangai mide. Sijengniu pakhiangna haise Iniu natu pijiu ruikhai rabo-e. Haijiukha matai marengbo riga dekamjiu npui-npiu thiujiu makhabo ngam haise nangniu khaisan jiulo?” Haise Dithubo

Nangra pachangsiakjiu napui kumgap-e. Paniu pakinatu khatdi panahmaidungtu thon mibo-e. Nang haira nasingna puidung paliu kinadung nai paliu nahdungtu manibo puidungse kumbo-e. Nasingnapui nanaigu namdi sira Hitt maipui khatdi Amor maipiu thiubam niubo-e.
“Nachipui sira tingpilam bambo Samaria nai panamdung si-e. Nasai kariupui sira tingrunlam bambo Sodom nai panamdung si-e.
Paliu phipa saisuijiu paliugu matai marengbo tienkamdungse aliboga nachun kimlu buima? Makge, pakak-kak gara nagu tienkam hai paliu suang sa-nkiu diang-e.
“Dithubo
Para khatdi panahmaidung sira chaliang-e, palamra tiura-sakra paliugu keng bamme, sichiujiu agi-manaijiu paliura lung-e, chiudi paliuniu lungkalakmai nai kalek samai situ wajeng chakkhai makge.
Paliu lung tanjiu, paliu wasao thiu-e khatdi Iniu marengbose paliuniu kamme, sijengniu paliutu Iniu kam maha mibo-e, haise nangniu sibambo-e.

“Nangniu kamkhai mibo nuan paphandi Samaria niu kamtang makge. Paniu kamkhai mibo suang nangniu matai marengbo hai kamkhai mide. Nagu kasabo haitu phuisai, nachipui tura din kadaboga pachun kahabo panai nchamme.

Siniu tuhoira nagu mangambo hai nangniu daorabo mide. Nagu nuandung haira nasingnapui suang sa-nkiu mibo-e, sichiujiu paliura paliu chun kahamai kumbo-e. Tuhoira nazu hengban lujiu kamangambose phungsulo palamra nangniu nasingnapuitu pijiu masanbo leng ngaopad khai mibo-e.”
Naronna nang mangam sune, khatdi nagu kamangambo hainiu nasingnapuidung sira dejiukha wilo chiubo lensu rabo-e.
Paliu disulan rabo-e, khatdi nangdi, nagu namdung tudi kalan khai lanrabo-e.
Nagu kasabose khoipad madu makbo suangga, nangniu wasao thiujiu bambo tingga,
nangniu Sodom tu din kaga khaimibo makma? Tuhoira nangdi pakumgap mide-- Edom mai, Philistia mai khatdi natu marengbo nakiningmai siniu natu thin kagajiu bambo-e.
Nangniu matai kamarengbo ngam kamkhai mibo jengniu, nang-hai chariusiak rabo mide.”
Dithubo
Chiudi nang nahtingga Iniu nakhuga ladriat thiukhai mibo kumjiu chakhuang thiukhai rabo-e.

Nangniu dechiujiu lungkhai milo chiubo pi maningtao khaine, sichiujiu nangniu nachipui nai nasai kariupuitu daolanboga mangam surabo-e. Iniu panaitu nanahpui kania kum pithiu khaine, haise Iniu natu ladriat thiukhaiboga haise jaolu makge.
Iniu nakhuga ladriat thiukhai lan bine, sichiujiu I hai
Nangniu kamaobo kamkhai mibo hinase Iniu kuak khai bine, chiudi nangniu sise maningtaobo wan-ga, namun ngapadra katang mangam surabo-e.” Dithubo
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Israel mai khuga din champanbo khat hai dinkhai bilo,
sichiujiu Dithubo
chali-alibo namdi khatga ponwang khaide.
Sibo saiga paniu Israel mai kadih gasu singbang lun khat ponlujiu kadihtam kawibo bam khatga lingkhaijiu sise puak mawikhang sude.
Sibo bangse mawikhangjiu, pakense kenphuiting mide, pakese lengreng khulam puakkhang sude pamense sukjiu kenkhang sude. Sibo mumsy kense pakedung nai paniwdung siniu phuiting mide.

“Siga kakibo lengreng pakan siukadibo khat bamme. Sichiujiu sibo mumsy-men siniu khatdi panui siniu paniu lungbambo karengga suang sibo lengreng khugasu taduise kengjiu daolu sune chiubo maningjiu pakhulam marikhai sude.
Sichiujiu sibo mumkense kadihtam kawiboga khatdi tadui kawiboga lingkhaibo jengniu pasyse kengjiu khatdi wijiu masi ngamlubo mumsiken thiu khang mide.
“Sijengniu Dithubo,
Yo, haise lingkhai mibo-e, chiudi haise puakkhangjiu khatdi ringjiu bam rama? Tingbang lamgu tingkaise wangboga sise aguimi lakma? Pokbambo gasu haise aguikiumi lakma?”

“Haibo kasabo maidung khuga din champanbo ramba haise paliu sima chiujiu maniu matailo. Babylon mai wangpiuniu Jerusalem ga wanglujiu pawangpiu nai pagu chakampaodungtu Babylon lam puitad mibo-e, chiujiu paliu khuga dinkhai bilo.
Paniu chawang kikhunmai khang khattu puilujiu pahangga matunjiu lungra kawi thiu lubo-e. Paniu parathiumai khangsiatu chariga minlumai thiurabo-e.
Sibo jat siniu sulujiu charithiu lan makra paniu ladriat thiu khai mibo-e.

Chiudi Judah mai wangpiu siniu suini makjiu Egypt mai khugasu chaqondung nai riphendung langkhaira kam sude. Haise paniu ngamlu rama? Kawi thiukhai mibo situ paniu kampang mibo jengniu patu sajai pimak daolakge!
“Dithubo
Babylon maidung siniu kadih-khunki nai chari-dangbam kamkhai lujiu maidung kakeng khatu kamshatra kamboga, Egypt mai wangpiugu katanbo riphendung siniudi patu nkhakhai ngamlakge.
Paniu kawithiujiu pagu ladriatse kampang mibo jengniu tuhoira mari ngamlak mide.”
Dithubo
Iniu tathiu hamaigu alang pariga thonkhaijiu patu manmi rabo-e. Iniu patu Babylon lam puitad lujiu akhuga paniu chamchang makbo jengniu patu sajai pirabo-e.
Pagu withubo riphendungtu chari gasu kamshat mirabo-e sichiujiu shai kabangmai situ pabam hinaga kam marapu khai rabo-e, siga
Haise Dithubo
“Iniu singchongsing kakubo tonse thinlujiu pake kasanbo pi bonpad khaine;
Israel maigu kuthubo ramluong gase somkhaine.
Haise pakedung padjiu khatdi pasy masijiu maisuang kahabo singchongbang pithiu khaine.
Thingna jat hina sibo hiuga nbejiu lungrabo-e.
Sibo dihga bambo singbang hinaniu I hai
Iniu kakubo bangdung situ huikiu lujiu kasiambo bangdung situ pijiu kukhai-e.
Kamadiakbo bang situ pi agui khaijiu kimibo bang situ pijiu madiak khai-e.
“Israel mai kadihga lungmai siniu kadincham haise dinlan lanjiu bambo hai degulo?
‘Paliu puipiudungniu kakhiangbo rasy tiu-e,
chiudi panahdung hiu chakimme.’
“Dithubo
Mai hinagu ringtingse agu kamna-e, papui papiugu ringtingdi, panahgu ringtingdi agu kamna-e. Nuan kammibo pase shairabo-e.
“Wagaje, pacheng matipbo, palung masanbo, khatdi kawibo mai khat bamme.
paniu Israel maigu charameng situ kahum makjiu khatdi kakham-kaniubo rakyga kadkhaibo rathak mania pa tiu makge. Paniu mai naotu kam masajiu khatdi maipuiniu khaophun phungbo tingga nphiuji makge.
Paniu mai khat khugadi aratmak, khatdi sontiu makge. Mainiu patu apukkhai bibose paniu ruilanjiu, mariu-chari maitu paniu kikhai-e khatdi pafai-pani kahamai leng pikhai-e.
Paniu paton-panaleng rangkang apuk khai makge. Paniu kasabo kam makjiu, wakhatgu chamribo hinaga kamajibo dinkhai-e.
Haikumbo mai siniu agu chamtan nai agu tacheng-tajaise majaibo-e. Pahai tacheng matipbo mai-e, siniu pah ringrabo-e,” chiujiu Dithubo
“Wagaje sibopiu nah siniu maigu suttiu, maitu kamshatjiu, papiuniu wadaodi kam makbose kamme.
Kakham-kaniubo rakyga kadkhaibo rathak maniase paniu tiujiu mainao-mainahtu kam masa-e.
Paniu kaleksamai situ sontiu-e, khatdi aratle, patu apukkhai maigu chapawse paniu ruilan makge. Paniu nkengmai rakyga tadlujiu matai kamarengbo rameng situ kahumme.
Paton-panaleng rangkang maitu apuk khai-e. Pahai ringlu buima? Makge, pahai ringlu lakge. Paniu matai-marengbo ngamdung hai kam mibo jengniu pahai shai rabo-e. Paronna pashitse phungrabo-e.
“Tuhoira wagaje paniabo piu nah khat bamme. Papiuniu kambo nuandungse paniu ngaolujiu, papiu thak kam makge.
Paniu Israel mai ramengtu kahum makge khatdi kakham-kaniubo rakyga kadkhaibo rathak maniase paniu tiu makge. Paniu mai naotu kam masa makge, maksai mai khattudi remakge khatdi sontiu makge.
Patu apuk khaibo maigu chapawse paniu malan khai-e. Paniu mariu-chari maitu pitiu-pisak khai-e khatdi pafai-pani kahamaitu pikhai-e.
Paniu kasabose kam makge khatdi paton-panaleng rangkang apuk makge. Paniu agu chamtan nai agu tacheng-tajaise majai-e, papiu nuan jengniu pah shai lakge, chiudi pah ringsiak rabo-e.
Palam khatlam dinlanjiu, papiu siniu sontiujiu khatdi mai hina khuga kasabo maliang kamme. Sichiusai paniu kamkhai mibo panuan jengniu pahai shai rabo-e.

“Chiudi naliuniu maniu-e, ‘Papiu nuan jengniu dekamjiu panahniu chariu khengmak ralo?’ Sisetu haichiujiu paokak khai-e, Chiubora panah siniu kamajibo nai kawibose kamme. Paniu agu tacheng-tajai situ majai mawijiu majai-e, sichiusai pahai ringsiak rabo-e.

Nuan kambo paniu shairabo-e. Papiu nuan jengniu panah chariu kheng lakge, maksai panah nuan jengniu papiu chariu khenglakge. Kawimai situ kawibo phijeng pikhai rabo-e, khatdi kasamai siniu pagu kasabo tienkam jengniu chariu rabo-e.
“Kasamai siniu nuanse kamta mijiu, agu tacheng-tajai paniu majaijiu, kamajibo nai kawibose paniu kam misai, pah shai lakge; pahai ringsiak rabo-e.
Panuan hinase kuak khaibi rabo-e, sichiujiu paniu ringlu rabo-e, palamra paniu majibose kam mibo-e.
Kasamai shaiboga Iniu achun wi-e chiujiu naliu maning jiuma?” chiujiu Dithubo

“Chiudi tacheng matipbo mai siniu kawibo kamta lujiu kasabo, matai marengbo tien kam misai, pase ringlu buima? Ringlu lakge! Paniu kawibo ngam kamkhai mibose maningtao khai lakge. Pagu nchang makbo nai panuan jengniu pah shaisiak rabo-e.
“Chiudi naliuniu din-e, ‘
Tacheng matipbo mai siniu kawibo ngamse kamta lujiu kasabo ngamse kam lujiu shai misai, paniu shaimibo hai pagu tienkam kasa jengniu-e.
Kasabo mai siniu nuan kamta lujiu kamajibo nai kawibose paniu kam misai, paniu pagu ringtingtu malan lubo-e.
Paniu kasabose kamta mide, kawibose kam mide chiubo silubo-e.
Naliu Israel maidungniu din-e, ‘
“Tuhoira Dithubo
Naliugu kasabo hina phut milo, kasanbo maning nai lungchun phunglulo. Dekamjiu naliu Israel mai shaini jiulo?
Iniu mai khat tudi pijiu shaikhai nimakge. Naliu nuan gasu marilujiu ringlulo,” chiujiu Dithubo
Israel mai chawangnah kania leng chunsabo lui hai thiukhai raleng
Napui hai ndongqui rong gasu chaquipui thiu bamniu-e!
Paniu papoi situ palung sabo ndongqui-reng jiugasu makuat khang-e.
Paniu papoi situ makuat khangjiu tathiu hara katikhai-e;
siga pase chamaitu tiubo khao thiu mide.
Jatdung siniu palamga chiulujiu patuse chakhom thak thiujiu manlude.
Paniu raolujiu Egypt dihlam jutad mide.
Daolubui then papui siniu patu ramgunjiu liangri bamme.
Sibosai paniu papoi khattu makuat khanglande,
siga pase palung kasabo ndongqui mawi mide
Paniu dikhang lubo sai patatek phiu tiura
katambo ndongquitu maluanglu tadsude.
Padi tathiu hasi khangjiu maitu tiubo piuse thiu mide.
Paniu charirengse kampang lujiu namdise kam masa mide.
Paniu marasu dasai sibo kadihga lungmaise pingchang-ping-e.
Patu aphenra jatdungse wang madui sude;
pabam hina lamsu maidung wang bamme.
Paliuniu paliugu tathiu habo alangse thonpadjiu
paliugu tathak gasu patu man lude.
Paliuniu patu parekga min khailujiu
Babylon mai wangpiu khulam juwang mide.
Israel maigu luongbutga paniu maralan makra paliuniu patu akhejiu bammide.
Napui hai singgiu mungga lingkhaibo mumkense kumbo-e.
Siga taduise keng bambo jengniu sibo kense panui nai pasyse masi kaget bamme,
Sibo kedungse tankhangjiu chawang thun thiura mawi khangde.
Mumkense mawikhang kamuangtu tungtangra mawi khangde.
Sibo bangse dejiukha wijiu dikhanglo chiubo mai hinaniu ngao-e.
Chiudi chalung pomjiu bambo ben siniu pamen situ
pepad lujiu kadihga taliang khai mide.
Tingbang lamgu tingkai siniu pasy situ kam maki mide.
Pakedung situ riangthon mide, sise kimijiu ruthon mide.
Tuhoira haise kathaidihga lingkhai mide,
tadui kahabo, kasangbo kadihga lingkhai mide.
Mumsibang mensitu chaminiu rumide;
pakedung nai pasy hinase ruthon mide.
Pakedungse wadaodi tanpad silak mide,
chawang thunse wakamdi thiusilak mide.
Haise chunsabo lui-e; haise thiulan-lanjiu bamme.
Haise aliuniu kavang thiujiu bambo takum chinniabogu mangiubo hiu jeng riubo nai-e. Israel maidunggu jupaodung khangsianiu
niu akhuga din-e.
“Shaisuibo mai yo, Dithubo
“Nangniu paliu riga ladjan thiura kadenlu dama, Shaisuibo mai yo? Sichiusai kamsulo. Paliu paopehdungniu matai kamarengbo tiendung kamkhaibose pijiu paliutu maningtao khailo.
Iniu dinbambo hai paliu khuga dinkhai bilo. Iniu Israel maitu kadakhaibo tingga, ladriat khat thiukhaibo-e. Iniu Egypt dihga paliutu ngaolen khai lujiu, paliu khuga dinkhai-e: I hai naliu Rawang
Iniu paliutu Egypt dih gasu puipad lujiu, Iniu paliuleng kadakhai mibo lungwibo khatdi kadihtam kawibo, withubo kadihse pikhaine chiujiu ladriat thiukhai mibo-e.
Paliuniu masenbo, matai marengbo ramengdungse phutmira khatdi Egypt maigu aratbo radung khugasu paliu ronna kam masan mira Iniu dinkhai mibo-e, palamra I hai paliu Rawang

Chiudi paliuniu kalamjiu alad nkingra suikhai makge. Paliuniu paliugu matai marengbo ramengdungtu maksai Egypt mai ra situ phutmi makge. Egypt dih gase paliutu agu lungpom lungnotse pijiu niatao khaira Iniu maningbo-e.
Chiudi sise Iniu kamkhai makge, palamra paliuniu lungbambo Egypt dih gasu Iniu paliutu ju-npad khaine chiujiu Iniu dinkhai mibo jengniu, chamtantu kam masa mirabo situ manangbo jengniu-e.
“Sichiujiu paliutu Iniu Egypt dih gasu ramjingga maluang npad khaibo-e.
Iniu paliutu agu chamtandung pikhaibi-e, khatdi kadinpiubo mai siniu ringlura agu tacheng-tajaise paliutu katikhaibi-e.
Tabamnai haitu madan thiujiu ribamra, aliu kakga chamsiang thiujiu Tabamnai haitu madan thiujiu ribamra,

Chiudi ramjing siakga katangna paliuniu atu kalamjiu tadmide. Paliuniu agu chamtandung nai tacheng-tajaidungtu thon mide, sise majai kalumai rigara karingbo pikhai rabo-e. Paliuniu Tabamnai situ kam tania mide. Sibo ramjing gasu agu lungpom lungnotse paliutu pi niatao khaijiu paliutu kam maha mira Iniu kadensu mibo-e.
Chiudi Iniu sise kamkhai makge, palamra Iniu paliutu Egypt dih gasu maluang padbo situ ngaolubo jatdung khuga chamtan haitu kam masa mirabo jengniu-e.
Sijengniu ramjing gasu Iniu paliuleng pikhai rabo lungwibo khatdi kadihtam kawibo, withubo kadih gase paliutu majangwang lakge chiujiu ladriat thiukhai mibo-e.

Iniu ladriat haise thiukhai-e, palamra paliuniu agu chamtanse lukhai makge khatdi agu tacheng-tajaise kampang mide, khatdi Tabamnai haitu kam tania mide—paliuniu paliu ramengdung situ kahumni nkiu mide.
“Chiudi Iniu paliutu lungsa khai lanbi-e. Ramjing gasu Iniu paliutu kamshat makra chaplubo-e.
Sibosung, paliu ruangga chabonmaidungtu Iniu kachan khaibi-e: Naliu paopehdungniu kampadbo tacheng-tajai situ majai tulo; paliu chengriak tadjiu, paliu ramengdung gasu naliutu kam taniami tulo.
I hai naliu Rawang
Tabamnai haitu masanbo tingmik leng thiululo, haisiniu aliu kakga ladriatgu madan thiu khaibo-e, sichiujiu I hai naliu Rawang

“Chiudi sibogu chaken siniudi atu kalamjiu tadmide. Paliuniu agu tacheng-tajai nai chamtandung situ majai makge, majai lumai lengra ringting pikhai rabo-e. Paliuniu Tabamnai situ kam tania mide. Ramjing gase alungpom siniu paliutu niatao khaijiu paliutu kamshat kam mira Iniu kaden lubo-e.
Chiudi Iniu sise kamkhai makge, palamra Iniu Israel maitu Egypt dih gasu puipad mibo ngaobo maidung khuga ladriat hai kam masa mira jengniu-e.
Sijengniu ramjing gasu Iniu paliutu ladriat katanbo khat thiukhai bi-e. Iniu kadihpiri pabam hinaga paliutu kam marapiak khaine chiujiu siangkhai mibo-e.

Iniu haise kam mibo-e palamra paliuniu agu chamtan nai tacheng-tajai dungse paliuniu kampang mibo-e, sichiujiu Tabamnai situ paliuniu kam tania mide, khatdi paliu paopehdungniu kahumbo ramengdung situ paliudi kahumjiu macha mide.
“Ringting pikhai silakbo gu wimakbo tacheng-tajai nai chamtandungse Iniu paliutu pikhai bi-e,
Iniu paliutu paliugu rathak gasu kam tania khai-e, sichiujiu paliu nah-naraidungtu pijiu charathiu khai-e. Haise paliutu sajai pikhaibo-e, sichiujiu I hai
“Tuhoira, Shaisuibo mai yo, Dithubo

Iniu paliuleng pikhaine chiujiu ladriat khai mibo kadih gase paliutu maluang wang khai bibo-e. Chiudi paliuniu luongbutdung khatdi madiakbo singbangdung situ ngaoboga, paliuniu siga charathiu tadmibo-e. Paliuniu maring rukhaibo khatdi jaw-liak khaijiu charathiubo siniu alung kampom mide.
Iniu paliu khuga maniu-e: ‘Naliuniu tadbambo kakubo bam hai delamlo? Sise paliuniu ‘Kakubo Bamdung’
Tuhoira Dithubo
Thainai tangbo naliuniu sibo kalense pikhaijiu, naliu nahdungtu chamiga rukhaijiu charathiu bamme. Sichiu bam lujiu Israel mai naliuniu agu chunningse degu bamlo chiubo maniura wanglan bamme! Dithubo
Naliudi katambo jatdung kumjiu, tasing-tatutu kahum ni-e chiujiu naliu lungga maning kamigu-e. Chiudi sise wadao khatdi pipad khai lakge.
“Dithubo
Naliutu kam marakhai mibo kadih lamsu naliutu khomwang madui lujiu agu lungpom nai pumtan siniu kamlen khai rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu ‘Jatdunggu Ramjing gase’ maluangwang lujiu, sigasu naliu zuga ladjan thiukhai rabo-e.
Iniu naliu paopehdungtu Sinai Ramjingga ladjan thiukhai mibo kumjiu naliu tudi ladjan thiukhai rabo-e,” chiujiu Dithubo
“Iniu naliutu thinmanting lujiu agu ladriat hai pijiu majai khai rabo-e.

Naliu ruangga kasamai khatdi nuan phungmai situ Iniu luthon mine. Paliuniu tuhoi lungbambo kadih gasu paliutu Iniu luthon mine, sichiujiu Israel mai kadihga paliutu pijiu malan wangta mine. Siga I hai
Dithubo
Agu masanbo ramluong,
Naliutu kam marakhai mibo kadih lamsu Iniu naliutu puiwang aruanglujiu, naliuniu rukhaibo rathak maniase Iniu lukhaine, siga jatdung siniu I hai masanbo-e chiubo sisu rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu pikhaine chiujiu ladriat khai mibo Israel mai kadih gase naliutu puiwang lanboga I hai
Siga naliu ronna dechiujiu kamangambo khatdi matai marengbo ngamse kamjiu naliu ronna kam tania mibo gulo chiubo maningtao rabo-e. Naliuniu kasabo kamkhai mibo jengniu naliu ronna naliu diu sarabo-e.
Iniu agu kendi situ gukhaibose Israel mai naliuniu ngaoluboga I hai
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, tingrun lam phui khailo. Tingrun lam situ din masa khailo, khatdi tingrun lamgu mariu situ sailad din masa khailo.
Dithubo
Iniu, chami hai matao khai mibo-e, haise mai khatniudi katai silakge chiubo hai paliuniu simi rabo-e.”
Chiudi Iniu suimakjiu din-e, “Dithubo
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Jerusalem tu din masakhai sulo. Maidungniu kahumbo bamdung situ din masa khailo. Israel mai kadih haitu kachan khai sulo,
chiubora
Iniu aheng thinsujiu tingpi lamsu tingrun lam tangbo aphensu rabo-e.
, Iniu aheng thinsu mide, haise khaikiu lanlak mide chiubo mai hinaniu sisu rabo-e.
“Shaisuibo mai yo, manang nsangjiu nalung pangpadra kumjiu siudi-thi lulo. Mai hinaniu natu ngaolu buibo bam gasu nchun sajiu siudi-thi lulo.

Nang dekamjiu siudi-thi bamjiulo chiujiu maniusai, pawanse wangkinbo jengniu-e chiu din bilo. Haise wangboga kapingbo siniu paliu lungchun phuimi rabo-e, paliu benjiang hami rabo-e, paliu hotse hami rabo-e sichiujiu paliu tapuse kachao khuak-khuak mirabo-e. Pawanse wangtang mide, sise haiga bam mide.” Dithubo
“Shaisuibo mai yo, sailad dinkhai bilo.
Chaheng-e, chahengse kariulude khatdi thalude.
Haise hengri kalikbo kumjiu tha-masansiak lude, bishat raleng kariu lude.
Amaidungniu kachan khaibo nai sajai pikhaibo situ
wajeng chakkhai makbo jengniu chunwi rabo hamide.
Chahengse thinpiu raleng thamasan lude.
Haise kariu lujiu khatdi thamasanpad lujiu bishatrabo piu ben-ga pikhai mide.
Shaisuibo mai yo, chunsajiu nkiu marunglulo;
haibo hengse amaidung leng-e khatdi Israel maigu jupaodung mathiu leng-e.
Maidungtu kumjiu paliu tudi bishat kammi rabo-e.
Nalung magenthiubo siniu nagah jumlulo!
Iniu amaidungtu madiu bambo-e, sichiujiu paliuniu lungli maksai,
pakhiangna haise paliu khuga padrabo-e.
“Tuhoira, Shaisuibo mai yo, sailad dinkhai sulo. Nabense kaphi khailo sichiusai chahengse bilan-lan rabo-e. Haise maitu kamshatbo, maitu kam charen khaibo heng si-e.
Haisiniu amaidungtu paliu hot kam maha mibo-e khatdi paliu phi pimasui khaibo-e. Iniu paliugu namdi situ hengri kalikbo kumjiu, khatdi bishat rabo heng siniu kapin bambo-e.
Pamun liangbo heng siniu majat lamdi, mawui lamdi bi-kajan sulo! Nangniu marikhaibo lam hina bi-kajan sulo!
Iniu aben kaphine, sichiujiu agu lungpomse loimi rabo-e,
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Babylon mai wangpiuniu paheng ponlu wangrabo npui nia giak khailo. Npui kaniase kadih pabam khat gasu padrabo-e. Sigase npui-rabo madan kamkhai bilo.
Npui khat siniu Ammon maigu Rabbah namdi, npui khat siniu charireng bambo Judah mai namdi Jerusalem situ siokhai bilo.
Babylon mai wangpiu siniu npui-rabo maksai npui-npai ga madan kamkhaibo bam gase chap bamme. Paniu delam tadralo chiubo npui situ phuijiu pagu tavaipise kanukjiu,

Tuhoira, paben majatlam siniu ‘Jerusalem’ tu siobo tavaipise thinlujiu bam mide. Haisiniu tadlujiu charibam leng kadenra, chari thiura, chakhuan senra, rengmun situ chonra, wakhunki chura khatdi nbaiky chura pakhuga dinjiu bamme.

Jerusalem mainiu haise malum makge palamra paliuniu kawithiu khai mibo situ paliura lukhaijiu bamme. Chiudi haise din masuang khaibo siniu paliu nuantu pijiu maningtao khai raleng-e sichiujiu paliutu mintadmi rabo-e.
Dithubo
“Israel maigu masan makbo mawangpao, kasabo piu yo, nagu tingmik, natu ladjan thiurabo tingmikse wangkinne.
Dithubo
Nchum mide, hamide! Yo, Iniu namdi situ kam nchum mirabo-e. Chiudi Iniu kadakhai mibo piu siniu wangjiu namdi situ sajai pikhai makthen haise padlakge. Iniu haise pakhuga pikhaimi rabo-e.
Kam maha rabo hengse kaden lude;
Haise hengri kalikbo kumjiu bishat raleng tha-masan lude.
Naliugu madungao sira maji makge, khatdi naliugu sailad sira aratle. Naliu hai sachang sa-e, naliugu kanambo sajai pirabo tingmikse wangkinne. Chahengse naliu wongchengga bikhai rabo-e.
“Chahengse khai milo! Naliutu damkhaibo, naliutu manakhaibo kadih gasu Iniu naliutu ladjan thiu rabo-e.

Iniu naliu riga chamipuangse thonkhai subo tingga naliuniu agu lungpom lungnotse niatao rabo-e. Sichiujiu wa kam maha kasimai, palungpom kasamai, wa kam maha kasimai, ben-ga Iniu naliutu pikhai mirabo-e.
Naliutu chami siniu kam mahami rabo-e. Naliu zaise naliu kadihga taokiu rabo-e, siga mai khatniudi naliutu maningtao lanlak mide.”
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Chamaitu gi-dangbo maidungniu phuibambo namdi situ ladjan thiura nang kadenlu dama? Paniu kamkhai mibo matai marengbo hinase pakhuga din masan khai bilo.
Dithubo

Maitu kamshat mibo jengniu nang maojiu bambo-e. Sigasu nangniu machapadbo charamengdung jengniu natu kam tania mibo-e, haichiujiu nagu tingmikse wangkinbo-e, natingse hamide! Sijengniu jatdungtu khatdi kadihna pakhiangnatu pijiu natu nuimen khaira Iniu kamkhaibo-e.
Nakhuga tacheng kahabo jengniu, kanagadi, kadiulam bambo maidungniu natu nuijiu-kaga bambo-e.
Israel maigu jupaodung hina paliugu pumtantu ronna malum lujiu, maitu kamshat bambo-e
Namdiga bambo mai khat niudi papui papiutu chakhuang thiu makge.Naliuniu sangdiumaidungtu sontiu-e, khatdi kami-magennah ma ruptiu-e.
Naliuniu masanbo bamdungtu chakhuang thiu makge, khatdi naliuniu Tabamnaitu manid makge.

Namaidung khangsianiu maidungtu kamshat lura paliu lamga aratjiu tacham din-e. Paliu ruanggasu mai khangsianiu charameng leng kadpat mibo rathak maniase tiu-e. Khangsiara paliu pumniu masenbo situ pawan machang pikim khaijiu bamme.
Khangsianiu paliu piu naotu majang ji-e. Khangsia mainiu maipuidung khaophun phungbo tingga manomjiu maluang nphiu ji-e.
Khangsianiu kamakhabo ngam kamjiu, paliu mupuidungtu maksai paliutu mana ncham makbo tanpuidungtu lungmao khai-e.

Namaidung khangsianiu maidungtu paliu phijeng donniu kamshatle. Khangsianiu Israel mai paliu karai khuga rangkang apuk khaibose paton-pana lura kamme, sichiu paliu ma ruptiubo gasu kalek wira kamme. Paliuniu atu mangai mide.” Dithubo
“Suttiubo khatdi maitu gi-dangbo namaidungtu Iniu aben jumkhai sune.
Sichiujiu Iniu naliutu kam maha suboga, naliu ben khengkhang lura naliu pumtan bamkha-e chiujiu naliu lung hubam khama?
Iniu namaidungtu kadih hinaga khatdi jat hinaga pijiu lung mara khai mine, sigasu nagu kasabo ngamkamtu pijiu pamalan thiukhai mine.
Sichiujiu kakibo jatdungniu naliutu chakhuangthiu lakge, siga I hai
“Shaisuibo mai yo, Israel maise akhuga wadi gengta mide. Paliu hai pageng hamibo tataagi-tanaagi, tin, chagi, khatdi takhiakgi—n-mang gasu maruak nkai padbo guse kum mide.
Haijengniu tuhoira Dithubo

Chaminiu chagi-batu: rangkang-ba, tanaagi-ba, chagi-ba, takhiakgi-ba khatdi tin-batu rutun mibo kum rabo-e. Agu lungpom khatdi lungnuat siniu paliutu chami gasu tun mibo chagi-ba kumjiu pitun mahami rabo-e.
Yo, Iniu paliutu Jerusalem ga pui aruang lujiu, paliu hangga chami thiune, sichiujiu agu lungpom siniu paliutu kam maha mirabo-e.
Rangkang gise n-mangbamga tun mibo kumjiu paliu hai Jerusalem ga hami rabo-e, sigasu paliu hai
“Shaisuibo mai yo,” paniu din-e, “Israel mai kadihse masan makge, sijengniu sisetu Iniu agu lungpom gasu sajai pirabo-e chiujiu Israel mai khuga dinkhai bilo.

Paliugu jupaodung hai ndongquiniu chakhao kamshat lubo riga marungjiu mara bambo kumgap-e. Paliuniu maidungtu kamshat lujiu, paliugu rangkang nai mania hina paliuniu ngamdiu then lulubo-e, sichiujiu paliuniu maitu kamshat mibo gasu kakeng khatu kamipui pithiu khai-e.

Singkudungniu agu tacheng-tajaitu kampang-e khatdi masanbo situ chakhuang thiu makge. Masanbo khatdi masan makbo chiubo kakga tamsinbose paliuniu kam makge. Masanbo khatdi masan makbo mania chiubo kakga npekbose paliuniu katikhai makge, sichiujiu paliuniu Tabamnaitu wajeng lukhai makge. Haichiubo jengniu Israel mainiu atu chakhuang thiu makge.
Dihthinmaigu chakampaodung hai tanyniu kamshat lubo wakhao-janse tatap-tap kabam kum-e. Paliuniu kalek wilura maitu kamshat bamme.
Chamainiu kibengtu manuk maka khaijiu tomkhaibo kumjiu phaimiukakungdung siniu paliugu nuandungse bai-e. Paliuniu ka-aratbo madungao ngao-e khatdi ka-aratbo sailadse dinpadle. Paliuniu Dithubo
Lungwimainiu maitu sonne khatdi maigu sutle. Paliuniu kalek kasamaitu kam masa-e khatdi sangdiumai ma ruptiu-e.
Agu lungpom siniu kampang tap-tap mibo kibeng situ thiukhang lan ngambo maitu Iniu phuijiu bambo-e, chiudi mai khat tudi Iniu ngaomakge.
Sijengniu agu lungpomse paliu riga chami kumjiu thon khaine, sichiujiu paliu tienkam jengniu paliutu Iniu kam mahami rabo-e.” Dithubo
“Shaisuibo mai yo,” paniu din-e, “Pawan khatga singnapui khangnia bamniu-e.
Panainiu chabonmai thiujiu Egypt ga lungbambo tingga, panaigu liuchang thiubo lunlungse hamide sigasu chakhapui thiumide.
Katingbo pui situ Oholah
Ohalah niu agu thiubamdi, pahai chakhapui khat thiujut-jutle, sichiujiu Assyria maitu paniu maraibo lungchun siniu phuiting bamme.
Paliu hai hengmumbo fai-ni piubo riphenmai, palung dimai, khatdi katheng kadibo chakampaodung-e paliu hai pazu-palun wibo chaqon riphen-gu chakampaodung-e.
Pahai Assyria maigu chakampaodung hinagu chakhapui-e, sichiujiu pagu charangbo siniu Assyria maigu ramengtu kahumjiu patu paronna patu kam taniaboga jukhai mide.

Egypt dihga pagu liuchang thiubo lunlungtu kam maha mibo gasu chakhapui kumjiu thiujut bambo-e. Paniu liunamai thiujiu bambo gasu maipiudungniu patu maluangji-e sichiujiu patuse chakhapuitu kumjiu kamkhai mibo-e.
Haijengniu, paniu maraibo Assyria maidung khuga Iniu patu benlen khai mibo-e.
Paliuniu patu papumruang phut khai mide, paliuniu panahpuidung tudi panahpiudung tudi minlujiu chahengniu kamshat mide. Pabam hinaga maipuidungniu pasansiat lamga pakentia bamme.
“Pasaikariupui Oholibah niu haise ngaobamdi, paniu sisuang sajiu chiubora Oholah niu chakhapui thiujiu kamkhai mibo suang kasabose kam mide.

Padi Assyria maigu katheng-kadi maidung, chakampaodung khatdi nchambo fai-ni piubo riphendung, chaqon riphen-gu chakampaodung, khatdi pazu-palun wibo maipiudung jengniu katalenbo lungchun siniu phui mide.
Paniu npui-npiu thiukhai mibose Iniu ngaolude, sichiujiu nabopui haidi katingbopui kumjiu sa-e.

“Paniu npui-npiu thiuboga ngut masukbi-bi mide. Katheng-kadibo Babylon gu chakampaodung mengdungse singbengga hengmarenbo siniu giak khaibo, paliugu khen-gak nai paliu pikhek kawibo situ masen masiabo siniu phui mide.
Paniu sise ngaoji-ngaori pagu katalenbo lungchun siniu pakhuga phui mide, sichiujiu Babylon mai khuga champao langkhai-e.
Babylon mainiu patu maluang nphiu jiraleng wangde. Paliuniu patu maluangjiu kam taniachang kam tania mide, sijengniu kanambo gara paniu paliutu mani mide.
Paniu paronna patu charuangga madulangjiu papumruang tadsude khatdi pahai chakhapui khatle chiubose mai hinaniu silura kam mide. Pachipuitu manibo kumjiu Iniu patudi mani mide.
Pahai karaidao suang sa-nkiu khangjiu, paniu liunamai khat thiujiu, Egypt ga chakhapui thiukhai mibo kum gapjiu kamsude.
Pahai charangchang charangbo qonniam maksai chaqonchi kumjiu kacharangbo lungchun siniu phui mide.”
(Oholibah yo, nangniu Egypt dihga liunahmai khat thiujiu bambo tingga npui-npiu thiujiu, maipiudungniu na-nabom thinjiu, nagu liuchang thiubo lunlung kam maha mibo situ nangniu kamlan nijiu bamme).
“Chiusai, Oholibah yo, haise Ngamkambo

Iniu Babylon mai nai Chaldean maidung pakhiangnatu Pekod, Shoa, khatdi Koa, gasu khatdi Assyria mai pakhiangnatu puiwang rabo-e. Akhang wibo chabonmai palung dibo maidung khatdi chakampaodung, parathiubo chakampaodung khatdi chaqon riphen-gu chakampaodung pakhiangnatu Iniu puiwang rabo-e.

Paliuniu riphen kengkhatu chaqon-karidung jaojiu khatdi charinia thinlujiu puiwang, duiruak lamsu natu chari aphenne. Chageeniu khatdi chagatopniu jusung lujiu, paliuniu natu taomagui lurabo-e. Iniu natu paliu khuga benlen khai mirabo-e, khatdi paliuniu natu paliugu tacheng-tajai gasu ladjan thiu rabo-e.

Iniu natu alung pombo jengniu, pijiu paliu lungpomga natu kamkhai rabo-e. Paliuniu naniu, nakuon romthon mirabo-e, khatdi nanahmaitu kamshatmi rabo-e. Yo, paliuniu nanahpuidung khatdi nanahpiudungtu nakhu gasu jupad lujiu paliutu maring rushatmi rabo-e.
Paliuniu nafai-nanise phetlujiu khatdi nagu tatiu-tataadungse khoilu rabo-e.

Sichiujiu Iniu nagu charangbo situ khatdi nangniu Egypt ga bambo gasu npui-npiu thiukhai mibo matai marengbo lunlung kamkhai mibotu khammi rabo-e. Nangniu charamengtu wadaodi phuilanta mine maksai Egypt lamga maning lanta mine.”
Haise Dithubo

Sichiujiu paliuniu natu mani mibo jengniu, nangniu kamlubo hinase khoilujiu napumruang ronna phutkhai diakne. Nangniu chakhapui thiukhai mibo khatdi nagu charangbo jengniu, haise nariga piwang khai rabo-e.
Nangniu jatdung khuga chakhapui thiukhai mide khatdi nangniu naronna charameng kahumbo gasu natu kam tania mide.
Nangniu nachipuigu phikemse luimide, sijengniu machambo sajai piangse ponsakra Iniu natu pikhaine.”
Dithubo
“Nangniu nachipui piangse ponsak rabo-e; haise di-e khatdi sukge.
Mai hinaniu paliu lung pomjiu chapiangse phuiting bamme, chiujiu nuimen rabo-e.
Nachipui, Samaria gu piang chiubora kapingbo nai nchumbo siniu natu pijiu maniu khaine.
Nangniu sise sakne khatdi majao masang lujiu,
sibo piang pangpadbo tap siniu nagah reksu rabo-e.
Dithubo
Tuhoira Dithubo

Panainiu maikina-mainahtu lungmao khai mibo-e khatdi maitu gi-dang mibo-e—charamengtu lungmao khailujiu khatdi panainiu aleng lungkhaibo nahdung situ kamshat mibo-e. Panainiu anahdung situ panai ramengleng kadkhai mibo-e.
Panainiu kam mibose hai ronna makge. Panainiu Atu kahumboky tu kam tania mide khatdi Iniu thiusu khai mibo Tabamnai situ kampang mide.
Panainiu anahmaidungtu charameng khuga rathak mania thiujiu kamshat khaibo naisiak, panainiu Atu kahumbokyga wanglujiu kam tania mibo-e!
“Kadiubo lamsu maipiudungtu wangra panainiu kukhai lan-lanne, sichiujiu maipiudungse wang-e. Singnapui kania siniu tadui nkhiulujiu khatdi chamikpiu nunkhai lujiu khatdi tatiu-tataa khaijiu bamme.
