Panainiu ngaowibo zi riga ntaolujiu, Iniu panai leng pikhai bibo kawibo maniadungse, parim wibo khatdi takisase panai suangga bambo wakai riga khaiphui lujiu bamme.

Maidunggu malaini-malaibo khuanse chiupad bamme, ramjing lamsu maipiudung rup khattu puiwang khaibo-e. Paliuniu maipuidung npom gase tataase khai bamme, khatdi mataiwibo pirunse paliu peega runkhai bamme.
Npui-npiu thiubo gasu pasang mibo maipui khattu chakhapui thiujiu paliuniu thinpiu bamme chiujiu Iniu aronna din-e.
Paliuniu haibo chakhapuidung khuga menglan-lan bamme. Paliuniu Oholah nai Oholibah kubo matun makbo puidung khugase wanglan-lan bamme.
Tacheng matipmai siniu paliutu ladjan thiu rabo-e, palamra paliuniu makha-agabo tiense kamme, sichiujiu paliu bense tazainiu heng-maren bamme.”
Haise Dithubo
Maidung siniu paliutu atungjiu tatuniu rot sulo, khatdi paliu heng thinlujiu paliu nahdungtu kamshatmi sulo, khatdi paliu ky ruthonmi sulo.
Paliuniu makha-agabo kumjiu kadihpiriga bambo puidungniu makha makra Iniu khammi rabo-e.
Singnapui kania yo, nanai khangnia haitu—nanainiu makha khaimibo khatdi charameng tu kahum khaimibo nuan jengniu nanaitu sajai pikhai rabo-e. Sigasu I hai Dithubo
Aliutu kavang leng mintad mibo takum chakiugu chahiu kariugu jengriubo nai,
“Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, “Thainai gu jengtung hai raokhai lulo, palamra thainai haise Babylon mai wangpiuniu Jerusalem tu haphun raleng kamsubo tingmik si-e.
Alad piumakbo maidung khuga haibo rambabose paliuleng Dithubo
Chali haise chami riga khengkhailo siga tadui masunphui khailo.
Sibo lungga withubo meekangse khailo—
pa-ntuang-jan, pangen-jan khatdi parakang kadalujiu sibo lungga khaiphui khailo.
Withubo mily janse khailo; sibo hangga tasingse katum khailo.
taduise pijiu lang kala khailo; sichiujiu parakang nai patiase suanglo.”
Haise Dithubo
Namdi lungga maitu gi-dangbo bamme, chiudi sise tabuiniu phesin mibo donniu tazaise kadihga jaokhai makge; sise tatukang riga ronna kajan khai bamme.
Nbai ngamlu lakbo bam, chalung pomjiu chakhum ruiraleng Iniu tazaise siga kamtao khaidiak mibo-e.”
Haise Dithubo
Tasing ponwang makenglo! Chamise mut khailo! Chameese langsulo! Chaganduise lang masang milo! Parakangse lang-hoi milo! Parahse rumilo!
Tuhoira maruang mibo chalise miti riga khengkhaijiu pijiu lang maren milo. Langlaimibose rumaha mibo sainiu chali haise characheng saisuijiu masanmi rabo-e,
sichiujiu langlai mibo pakhiangnase mibon-ga hakammi mak tadi masanmi rabo-e.
Jerusalem yo, nangniu npui-npiu thiubo jengniu natu hai kam tania mide. Iniu natu kam masanra matan bamdi nang hai tania mide. Agu lungpom lungnotse nangniu niatao makthen nang masan silak mide.
Dithubo
“Paniu din-e, Shaisuibo mai yo, “Nangniu lungsa thubo maitu Iniu jumkhai gui gasu lutadmi rabo-e. Nangniu suini makbo thiu tulo, maksai kapbo maksai mikdui khatdi kiukhai makrabo-e.
Nangniu kapjiu kahikbose pijiu maitu chiukhai tulo. Kap-huijiu achungbogu madan thiujiu napi gotlujiu, maksai naphirongniu tadmane. Nazu tom mane, maksai kap-huibo maidungniu tiubo tatekse tiu mane.”
Nsuan Iniu maidungtu npao khai-e. Sibo nai chawan anaose shaimide, pasaibo naise akhuga dinkhaibo kumjiu Iniu kamde.
Maidungniu akhuga maniu-e, “Nang dekamjiu haichiu kam jiulo?”
Siga Iniu paliu khuga din-e, “
Israel mai khuga haibo chamse pikhaira akhuga din-e: Charaky pumtan jengniu naliu chaliang thiu-e. Naliuniu haisitu phuini-e khatdi tadronjiu sise phuini-e, chiudi
Sigase Iniu kamkhai mibo haise naliuniu kamrabo-e. Siga naliu zuse tomlakge, maksai kap-huibo maidungniu tiubo tatekse naliuniu tiulakge.
Naliuniu naliu-pee gotlujiu, maksai naliu phiruangniu tadlakge, maksai kap-achungjiu tadlakge. Naliu nuan jengniu chiasiak mirabo-e, sigasu naliu khatniu khat khuga kapjiu sui-di thi sune.
Sigase Iniu naliu khuga madan khat thiurabo-e; Iniu kamkhai mibo hinase, naliuniu kamne.
Iniu haise kam khaibo nai, kam maha mirabo gasu marilubo khangsianiu wanglujiu sibo lamga naliu khuga dinkhai sune.
Sibo naisiak, naliuniu chalad dinlan rabo pumtanse daojiu naliuniu paliutu npao sune. Haichiubo lunlung gasu naliu hai maidung khuga madan khat thiurabo-e, sigasu I hai
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Ammon gu kadihtu suimakbo chamse dinkhai bilo.
Dithubo

Naliu chun wijiu bambo jengniu, tingbanglam bambo kathaidih ga lungbo kiphiudungtu Iniu pijiu naliutu chari ngamkhai rabo-e. Paliuniu naliu kadihga rijiky thiukhang rabo-e, sichiujiu siga lungrabo-e. Naliugu charasyse paliuniu tiulu rabo-e, khatdi kabui nduise paliuniu sakmi rabo-e.
Iniu Rabbah namditu qontraodung khaibo bamleng pithiu khaimi rabo-e, sigasu Ammon dih pakhiangnase mily khuanrabo bamleng pithiu khaimi rabo-e, chiusai I hai
“Haise Dithubo

Naliuniu haichiu kamkhaibo jengniu, naliutu Iniu katambo jatdung khuga benlen khaijiu paliuniu naliutu haphun lujiu khatdi naliugu maniase sutlujiu pontad mirabo-e. Iniu naliutu haichiujiu jat khat thiulanta mira maksai naliugu kadih bamta mira kamkhai mine. Sichiusai I hai
Moab maidungtu dangkhaijiu bambo namdidungtu chiubora withubo namdidung—Beth Jeshimoth, Baal Meon, khatdi Kiriathaim jaojiu Iniu chari thiu rabo-e.
Iniu Tingpilam bambo kathaidihga lungbambo kiphiudungtu pijiu Moab nai Ammon tu aruangjiu chari thiune, chiusai Moab haise jat khat thiulan tami rabo-e.
Iniu Moab maitu sajai pine, sichiusai I hai

Tuhoira Iniu Edom maitu sajai pine khatdi siga bambo chakhao chamai hinatu kamshat mirabo-e chiujiu madukhaibo-e. Teman namdi gasu Dedan namdi tangbo Iniu gengta mibo bam pithiu khai mine, sichiujiu maidungtu chari ga kamshat mine.

Amai Israel mainiu Edom mai riga agu chakhum ruikhai rabo-e, khatdi paliuniu Edom maitu pijiu agu lungpom lungnot hai niatao khai rabo-e. Iniu chakhum ruibo hai degu rambalo chiubo Edom mainiu sisu rabo-e.” Dithubo
Hai-jengniu, Philistia maitu Iniu chari thiujiu, paliutu hathonmi rabo-e chiujiu din madupadle, Philistia maigu taningdihga masiak khaibo khatdi siga lungjiu bambo mai hinatu Iniu kam mahami rabo-e.
Iniu paliutu katanbo sajaise pikhai rabo-e khatdi paliu riga chakhum ruikhai rabo-e. Paliuniu alungpom niatao rabo-e. Sigasu I hai

Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, haise Tyre namdi lungga bambo maidungniu paliu chun ringajiu bambo lamga-e. Paliuniu senpadle, ‘Jerusalem haitu kamtap-tap mide! Pagu chali-ali sibo pumtanse hamide! Paniu aliutu chari thiulan tami rabo-e!’
“Chiusai tuhoira, haise Dithubo
Paliuniu naliugu namdi karengse kam mahami rabo-e. Sigasu naliugu akhekydungse rathon mine. Sichiujiu Iniu tabut hinase biakthon lujiu, tatukang ronna masiak khai diak rabo-e.
Chakha khamaidungniu paliugu alangse sibo riga phumasang rabo-e, sibo bamse duipui lungga bammi rabo-e. Dithubo
sichiujiu paliu hengniu paliu ram n-ganglan-ga lung bambo maidungtu gimi rabo-e. Sigasu I hai
Dithubo
N-ganglan-ga bambo namdakga lungjiu bambo maidungtu chari thiubo gasu kamshat mirabo-e. Mikremainiu chakhomky chulujiu khatdi taniangky kamlujiu khatdi katanbo chagee kamlujiu natu aphen rabo-e.
Paliuniu naliugu karengse chagi thunniu kakhiu rabo-e, khatdi chagi tangniu naliugu akheky tonse kakhiu kaomi rabo-e.

Paliu qondungniu tadbo tabut siniu kamuang kumjiu naliutu gommi rabo-e. Paliu qondungniu jutadjiu bambo khatdi chaqon-kari khuan siniu nchum mibo namdigu rengmun gase tadken wangboga naliu rengmunse malaisu rabo-e.
Paliugu chaqon tongmaidungniu naliugu puidiga, naliu nahdungtu paliu hengniu bishatmi rabo-e. Naliugu katanbo katiangdungse kadihga thonkhaimi rabo-e.

Naliugu mikremaidung siniu naliugu chakhiu-chalan khatdi naliugu chali-alibo situ thinmi rabo-e. Paliuniu naliugu karengse tunkao lujiu naliugu kawibo ky hinase kam mahami rabo-e. Paliuniu tasing-tatu hina khatdi sibogu pamoi katang ponlujiu duipui lungga thonkhai mirabo-e.
Iniu naliu luidung haitu pijiu pamalan thiukhai mine, khatdi naliugu tarabung gejiu thiubo luise pi saojing khai mine.
Iniu tatukang ronna masiak diakjiu siga chakha khamaidung paliugu alangse phumasang rabo-e. Namdi haise wadaodi thiulan lulak mine. Dithubo
Dithubo

Duipuiga tadjiu lungbo jatdung wang hina, paliu wangbam gasu nkummi rabo-e. Paliuniu paliu wang pon khatdi tathuak khaibo fai-nidungse lupad lujiu kadihga masankhuak-khuakjiu ntaomi rabo-e. sichiujiu naliugu sansabo siniu paliutu kam charen masaju mibo jengniu paliu hai kakhutsao silakmi rabo-e.
Paliuniu kashai baibo lui haise naliu khuga thiusu rabo-e:
Pazan tadbo namdi situ kam maha mide!
Pagu maleedungse duipui ga maten mide.
Haibo namdi siniu duipui situ mawang bamdi-e.
Sichiujiu singgiu mungga lungmai hinatu kam charen khai mide.
Tuhoira, haise kaomiboga. chapiukakdungse kasuakjiu bamme,
Patu kam maha miboga pamaidungse charen mide”
Dithubo

Nda ken-ga lungkhai mibo kashai maigu kadihga Iniu naliutu langkiukhai mirabo-e. Iniu naliutu charuidihga tingthengjiu hamibo ruangga, kashai maitu maluang bam mira kamkhai mirabo-e. Haichiu padmibo jengniu wadoadi naliuniu karingmaigu kadihga lung lanlak mide.
Iniu naliutu nping-charenbo madanse pithiu khaine, sise naliugu kaloibo thiu rabo-e. Maidungniu naliutu phiu sune, chiudi naliutu wadaodi phiudao lulak mide.” Dithubo
“Shai-suibo mai yo, Tyre leng kashai baibo lui hai thiukhailo,
sibo namdi siniu duipui mungga lunglujiu, sibo duipui chaphuga lungbam mai hina situ chali alijiu bambo-e. Dithubo
“Tyre yo, nalunwat jengniu nang wasao thiu-e.
Naky hai duipui si-e.
Naky kathiumai siniu palun kawibo malee kumjiu thiukhai-e.
Paliuniu singpum lengse Hermon Luong lamsu singpumse thinpiu-e.
Nagu maleetiang lengse Lebanon lamsu cedar sing thin-e.
Paliuniu malee-ram leng atense Bashan lamsu nphubang thinpiu-e.
Paliuniu malee-ham lengse
Cyprus lamsu kahiubang thinpiu-e.
Sichiujiu chapuang him siniu thiu makom khai-e.
Naliutu tomkhaibo siniu fainoi si-e, Egypt gasu tathuak khilubo fainoi si-e.
Kadiulam sudi ngao tasi tamsin lubui-e.
Sibo riga tomkhaibose withubo fai siniu-e.
Sise Cyprus gu chapiukak gasu wangbo fainoi-e.
Nagu malee dungse Sidon nai Arvad namdi gasu wang-e.
Nagu wa kamsimai siniu maleese ramjiu bamme.
Malee kampadbo maidungse Byblos gasu wa kati mawi lumaidung-e.
Duipuiga tadbo maleedung hina nagu tajonkyga chali thiujiu bamme.
“Persia, Lydia khatdi Libya lamsu nagu riphenmai thiujiu bamme. Paliugu chagee nai paliugu chari pirunse nagu charirengga guakhai nbamme. Paliuniu nagu kendi leng charise ngamkhai mibo-e.
Arvad gasu wangbo riphendung siniu narengtu akhe-e, Gamad lamsu wangbo maidungniu naky-tontu akhe-e. Paliugu chageese nagu karengga guakhai nbamme. Paliuniu nalun kam mawi khaibo-e.
“Spain ga nangniu chali-alijiu rangkang, chagi, tin khatdi takhiakgi khoilujiu wa maniadungtu nkhiakjiu bamme.
Nangniu Greek, Tubal khatdi Meshech lamdi chali-alijiu kavang leng wa maniadung nai tataagi khoilujiu nkhiak bamme.
Nangniu changam kamra nai chari thiu raleng Beth Togarmah lamsu chaqon liujiu nagu maniadung jon bamme.
Rhodes

Syria maidung siniu nagu kadih gasu padbo maniadung liujiu bamme. Paliuniu paman kungbo tu, hengmumbo fai, tathuak-fai, fainoi, tatu kakabo nai kamajaibo hai naliugu chagiriang situ nkhiakjiu phungmeng bamme.
Judah mai nai Israel mainiu nagu mania liujiu, chabanmiu, makhui-dui, takisa-dui, khatdi parim wibo wamud phungwang bamme.
Damascus maidungniu nagu kadih gasu padbo maniadung liujiu Helbon lamsu jaw khatdi Sahar lamsu chakhaogiu phungwang bamme. Paliuniu nagu mania tu langlubo chagi nai parim wibo wamud akhiak bamme.
Dedan maidungniu nagu maniase sung thiujiu chamigi bamdung phungwang bamme.
Arab maidung nai Kedar gu jupaodung siniu nagu mania luraleng milypoidung, milydung khatdi kamidung phungwang bamme.
Nagu maniadung jengniu Sheba nai Raamah gu chali-alimaidung siniu tatiu-tataa, kachia-rangkang khatdi parim wibo wamud phungwang bamme.
Haran, Canneh, khatdi Eden namdidung, Sheba gu chali-alimaidung, Asshur nai Chilmad namdidung hina siniu natu maluang chali-ali thiu aruang bamme.
Paliuniu nakhuga talenbo fai-ni, hengmumbo fai khatdi tathuak khaibo fai, pagiak khai chan-chanbo kalung-ham, phen mawilubo riangphon jonjiu bamme.
Nagu maniadung situ dithubo malee gasu phungtadjiu bamme.
Nang hai duipuiga bambo pabang ripbo maleese kum mide.
Kadih gasu diujiu bambo lon nagu maleedung situ duipui gasu
tingbang lamgu tingkai siniu phungtad mide.
Nangniu alijiu bambo chakhiu-chalan hina,
nagu malee ruimaidung, hinase,
khatdi alijiu bammaidung,
malee lungga bambo nagu riphen hinase,
maleese pangjiu duipuiga hakhai kam mide.
Taduiga kahakkhai mibo maleedung khuanse
singgiu chaphuga pa-kavai khuan chiu bamme.
“Tuhoira malee hina nchum mide,
malee hinase chaphulam tadkam mide.
Paliuniu najeng gasu paliu peega tabui mara khaijiu,
khatdi taniangjiuga ji-kalajiu achung bamme.
Paliuniu najeng gasu paliu-pee gotlujiu maliufai ronna benlujiu
paliu lung chariujiu kap bamme.
Paliuniu naleng kashai baibo lui thiujiu bamme:
‘Saoniu Tyre tu kada silu ralo?
Tuhoira Tyre hai duipuiga saojing bam mide.
Nagu maniadung phungtad bambo siniu, jat hinaleng pageng pithiu khai mibo-e.
Nagu chakhiu-chalan khatdi maniadung siniu, chawangdungtu pijiu lungwi khai mibo-e.
Tuhoira duipuiga nang hai hakhai mide; Duinai gu kasukbo gase nang malim mide.
Nagu maniadung nai naleng tatien thiumai hinase duipuiga natu maluang hakhai mide.’
“Singgiu taphuga lungmai siniu nasansiat hai chiuboga paliu suang hamide. Paliu wangdung katangna nping charen mide, sichiujiu kapingbo hai paliu zuga raokhai nbamme.
Nang hai tadmide, tingtheng leng tadmide, kadihpiriga chali-alimai hina siniu nping-charen mide, paliudi nagu sansiat hai daorabo-e.”
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Dithubo
Nang hai Daniel suang ningting nkiu-e, sichiujiu wakhatnadi nakhu gasu nbailura ha-e chiujiu nangniu maning-e.
Nagu ningting nai nakamsiniu, kachia rangkangga natu pijiu lungwi khai-e.
Nangniu ningtingjiu chali-chala thiujiu, sigasu paton padjiu bamme. Nangniu nagu chakhiu-chalan-ga dejiuga nasao thiu bamlo!
“Tuhoi gasu, haise Dithubo
Iniu palung kasabo mikremaitu puiwangjiu natu aphenne. Nagu ningting nai nakamsiniu kamlubo ngaowibo mania hinase paliuniu kam maha mirabo-e.
Paliuniu natu gilujiu, tadui chungbambo charaw gase natu thonkhai mirabo-e.
Paliuniu natu giraleng wangboga nang hai chara khatle chiu dinjiu bam rama? Natu kam shatra maidung wangbo tingga, nang hai shaisui mai thiubam rabo-e, wakamdi chara lakge.
Nang hai tathi kumjiu paliu ra habo sangdiumai ben-ga shairabo-e. Dithubo
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Tyre wangpiu khuga wangkinbo sansiat jengniu chunsajiu achung khailo. Dithubo

Nang hai Tingwang gu kareng, Eden lungga lungbam di-e, sichiujiu paman kungbo tu pachat-pachat thin bamniu-e; kahengbo-tu nai kabenbo-tu; kakabo-tu, amangbo-tu, kamajinbo-tu nai talatu; majaibo-tu, manaiwibo-tu, khatdi tik malikbo-tu thinbam niu-e. Kachia gu tatiu-tataa nagu bamniu-e. Haidungse natu dam khaibo nai naleng damkhai mibo-e.
Siga natu akhera Iniu maisuang habo maza khat pikhai-e. Nangniu agu masanbo maluang riga lung-e khatdi paman kakungbo ran-ranbo tujiuga bamniu-e.
Natu dam khaibo nai gasu nangniu kasa kamsubo tingmik tangna najai-alise matunne.

Liubo nai jonboga nang pujiu bamdi-e, siseniu natu lungpomga khatdi nuan-ga jukhai mibo-e. Haijengniu Iniu natu pijiu agu masanbo luongse phut mira kamkhaibo-e, khatdi ran-ranjiu bambo tudung gasu natu akhe bambo maza siniu hathon mibo-e

Nalun watniu natu pi chaliang khai-e, khatdi nazan tadbo siniu natu kamengmai pithiu khai mibo-e. Haijengniu, Iniu natu kadihga hathon khaijiu kakibo chawangdung leng kachan khaibo thiu khaira natu thonpad mibo-e.

Nangniu liubo khatdi jonboga kasabose kambo jengniu nagu kahumbo bamse kam tania mibo-e. Haijengniu nagu namdi situ Iniu chami thon khaijiu rutaliang mibo-e.Natu phuibo maidung siniu tuhoira nang tabui mawi mibose ngaolude.
Nang hai nchum mide, tingthengjiu hamide, sichiujiu nalamga sikhai nijiu wangbo jatdung hinase npingjiu charen mide, nagu sansabo dam lumacham sune chiujiu pingmide.”
“Shaisuibo mai yo, Sidon maitu suimakbo chamse din madu khailo.
Paliu lamga Dithubo
Iniu nariga chararen langkhaine khatdi nagu npui-ncheng ga tazai piluang khaine. Natuse pabam hina lamsu chari thiune, sichiujiu namaidungtu pijiu kamshatmi rabo-e. Sigasu I hai
Dithubo

Siga paliu manang makjiu lungne. Paliuniu chaky-chalu thiujiu lungne. Paliutu wajeng simakjiu kamkhai mibo paliu kiningmai situ Iniu sajai pikhaine, siga Israel mai manang makjiu lungmi rabo-e.Sichiujiu I hai paliu Rawang,
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Egypt mai wangpiutu suimakbo chamse din madu khailo. Sichiujiu patu khatdi Egypt kadih pakhiangnatu sajai pikhai rabo lamga pakhuga dinkhai bilo.
Haise Dithubo
Iniu nang gu ajaiga khakhoi thinlujiu jusune sichiujiu singgiuga bambo khadung situ pijiu nakhuga wang madui khaine. Sichiujiu chakha siniu natu majiuman lujiu natu Nile giu gasu jupadmi rabo-e.

Iniu natu khatdi chakha pakhiangna situ kathaidihga pon taliang khai mirabo-e. Napum hai kadihga kaokiu mirabo-e, sichiujiu natu hai nphum khai lakge. Sise niu thingnadung nai nkan khaodung tatekleng pikhai mirabo-e.
Sigasu I hai
Paliuniu nariga mangiu khaiboga, nang pangmi rabo-e, khatdi paliu makhuakse duak rabo-e, khatdi paliu khense kamriam mirabo-e.
Tuhoi gasu Iniu maidungtu kulujiu chahengniu natu aphenra kam khaine chiubose Dithubo
Egypt hai pageng hami rabo-e. Sigasu I hai
“Nile giu haise nagu-e khatdi nangniu kampadbo-e chiu nangniu dinmibo jengniu-e,

I hai nagu mikrepiu khatdi nagu Nile gu mikrepiu thiu mibo-e. Iniu Egypt dih pakhiangnatu, tingpilam bambo Migdol namdi gasu, tingrunlam bambo Aswan namdi tangbo, Sudan maigu lamrai katangna pageng hamibo pithiu khai mirabo-e.
Chakhao chamai khatnadi siga tadken tamine. Takum atai lungga siga wakhatdi lunglak mide.

Iniu Egypt dihtu kadihpiri lungga nchum kathubo dih pithiu khai mine. Palamra takum atai-ling Egypt gu namdidungse nchum mijiu, kakibo namdi suang sathubo pithiu khai mirabo-e. Iniu Egypt maitu pating-padih kaha maidung pithiu khaine. Paliuniu kadih pabam hinaga pakkhaijiu katambo maidung ruangga lung rabo-e.”
Dithubo
sichiujiu Iniu paliutu paliuniu lung karaibo ky, Egypt gu tingrunlam pilung khaine. Siga paliugu kasonbo chawangdih khat, mathiu ruangga sonthubo chawangdih pithiu khaijiu,
paliuniu wadaodi kakibo jatdung riga mawanglan lakmi rabo-e. Iniu paliutu wajeng simakjiu paliuniu kakibo jattu paliugu maningga jukhai ngam lulak mira kam khaine.

Israel mainiu paliu khuga wadao khatdi mangiu khai lanlak mide. Egypt gu sansabo hainiu, paliu khuga mangiu khaibo haise dejiuga kamaobo gulo chiujiu Israel mainiu maningtao mirabo-e. Sichiu dasai I hai Dithubo
Aliuniu kavang thiutad mibo takum makai-je-chinniakiu gu karaibo hiugu raithubo naise,

Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Babylon mai wangpiu Nebuchadnezzar niu Tyre tu chari thiura tadpad mide. Paniu pagu riphendungtu chabang ridchang ridbo pijiu phungtad khaibo jengniu paliu pee rammaise tala mide, khatdi paliu makhuakse kalaili mide, chiudi chawangpiudi pagu riphen maidi paliuniu chariu khai mibogu gengse daolu makge.
Haijengniu tuhoira haise Dithubo
Pagu tienkam jengniu Egypt haitu Iniu pakhuga pikhaibo-e, palamra pagu riphendungniu aleng tatien thiujiu bambo-e. Dithubo
“Sise haichiu padboga, Iniu Israel maitu pijiu tankhang khaine, Ezekiel yo, Iniu dinkhaibo cham-hai, mai hinaniu chiulu buibo bamga, dinpad khaisai I hai
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Sailad dinkhailo, khatdi Dithubo
Kapingbo tingmikse wangkinne!
Kamuangse gomjiu, jatdung leng chariubo tingmikse nawang kinne.
Egypt ga chari wangkinne.
Sudan ga chariuchang chariubo padne.
Mai kakengtu Egypt ga kamshatmi rabo-e;
sibo dihse sunglu tadmi rabo-e sichiujiu nchummi rabo-e.
“Sibo riga Sudan, Lydia, Libya, Arabia, Kub, khatdi amaidung ruanggasu mathak wangbo riphendung situ kamshatmi rabo-e.”
Haibo dihse kadihpiri lungga nchum kachangbo thiumi rabo-e, sibo namdidungse kam nchum kammi rabo-e.
Iniu Egypt ga chami matao khaiboga patu gukhaijiu bambo maidung hinatu kamshatmi rabo-e, chiusai I hai

“Sibo tingmikse wangboga haichiujiu Egypt tu kam mahami rabo-e. Iniu malee gasu champao maitu langkhaijiu manang riangmakbo Sudan maidungtu masu khaine, sichiujiu paliutu kam charen khai rabo-e. Sibo tingmikse wangkinne!”
Dithubo
Paniu khatdi palung kasabo pagu riphenmai siniu wangjiu kadihse kam nchummi rabo-e. Paliuniu chaheng thinlujiu Egypt tu chari thiune, khatdi kadihse kashai phawniu phuimi rabo-e.
Iniu Nile giutu kam masang mirabo-e khatdi Egypt tu kasabo maidung khuga pikhaimi rabo-e. Sangdiumaidungniu paliu ram pakhiangnase kam nchummi rabo-e.
Dithubo
Tingrunlam bambo Egypt tu Iniu kam nchummi rabo-e khatdi tingpilam bambo Zoan namdi situ Iniu chami rumi rabo-e. Thebes gu dihsing namditu Iniu sajai pirabo-e.
Egypt gu charireng katanbo Pelusium namdi situ alungpom kasabo hai pijiu niatao khaine. Sichiujiu Thebes gu chakhiu-chalanse Iniu kam mahami rabo-e.
Iniu Egypt tu chami khaijiu, Pelusium situ pi chariu-magenthiu rabo-e. Thebes gu kareng rammaise kampangjiu ruthonmi rabo-e, khatdi namdi haitu pijiu duidetniu pontadmi rabo-e.
Heliopolis nai Bubasti maigu chabonmai chariga shaimi rabo-e, sichiujiu khangsiatu kavangleng mintadmi rabo-e.

Egypt maigu pumtantu Iniu kampang khaiboga khatdi chaliangjiu bambo paliugu jengtantu kam maha khaiboga, Tahpanhes riga tamiubo wangne. Egypt tu kamuangniu gomnam mine, sigasu pagu namdiga lungbo mai hinatu kavangleng puitad mirabo-e.
Haichiujiu Iniu Egypt tu sajai piboga, I hai
Aliuniu kavang thiu tadbo takum kariu-je-khatgu karaibo hiugu jeng chinniabo naise,
“Shaisuibo mai yo,” Paniu din-e, “Egypt mai wangpiu gu npomse Iniu kamtang mide, sise mai khat niudi domkhai makge, maksai sise wilan lujiu chaheng thinlan lura singtang mahanlujiu benkhai makge.
Tuhoi gasu, haise Dithubo
Iniu Egypt maitu kadihpiriga pilung mara-maren khaimi rabo-e.

Sigasu Iniu Babylon wangpiu npomse pijiu tankhai bine, khatdi ahengse paben ga pikhaine. Chiudi Egypt mai wangpiu npomse Iniu kamtangmi rabo-e, sichiujiu pase pagu mikremai suangga nkhuangkiu shai rabo-e.
Yo, Iniu patu kam mason khaijiu, Babylon mai wangpiutu pitan khaibi rabo-e. Iniu aheng pakhuga pikhaijiu, Egypt tu siokhaiboga I hai
Egypt maitu Iniu kadihpiri pabam hinaga kam marapiak khaine. Sigasu I hai
Aliuniu kavang thiutad mibo takum kariu-je-khatkiubo kumgu pasumbo hiugu raithubo naise
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Egypt mai wangpiu khatdi pamaidung mathiu khuga dinkhai bilo:
Dejiukha nang hai pumtan bamlo!
Iniu natu nde panai kada ralo?
Nang hai Lebanon ga bambo cedar bang kumme,
Panui kakengbo nai palun kawibo kedung siniu,
kukhangjiu kamuang tungtang bamme.
Pabang haitu pijiu mawikhangra pamen gase tadui luong bamme.
Mariuga bambo singbang hinaleng
tadui kajin khaira giuna luongjiu bamme.
Haise tadui kajin khaijiu bambo jengniu kakibo bangsuang ku-nkiu khang mide.
Pakedung hai thengkhangjiu dipadle.
Thingna jat hinaniu pake machang paliu pasib pon bamme.
Nkan khaodungniu pahiuga papoi piangkhai bamme.
Kadihpirigu jat hina siniu pahiu gase madun bamme.
Sibo singbangse dejiukha palun wilo—
Kuchang ku-e, pakedungdi theng-e.
Pamense sukjiu singgiu runsingga mengtang bamme.
Fir bang khatniudi haisuang pake kengson makge.
Plane bangdi haisuang pake dison makge.
Tingwang reng siakga bambo singbang siniudi haisuang palun wison makge.
Iniu pakedung hai marang khaijiu palun piwi khaibo-e.
Tingwang reng, Eden ga bambo singbang hinaniu, haisitu manma kamna-e.
“Tuhoira, Dithubo
sijengniu patu hai Iniu thon mide, sichiujiu sangdiumaigu mawangpao khuga pikhai mine. Singbang hainiu kasabogu kabuibose kamkhai rabo-e.
Pathak kasabo sangdiumai siniu haisitu huikao lujiu thonmi sune. Pakedung nai parangdung siniu paluong-pabek hina riga nkhuang kajan-pan mine. Sibo hiuga lungbambo jat hina tadkam mine.
Kaomibo singbang riga thingnadungniu lenwang taokhai bamme khatdi nkan khaodungniu sibo kedung riga tao malui bamme.

Sijengniu tuhoi gasu, tadui kajin mawikhai bamdi sibo singbangse wajiukha wijiu khatdi kamuang situ tungtangjiu bamdi, mathakhu mide. Pakhiangnase Shaisuibo maidung kumjiu matha nchum mide, charuidih lam tadmibo maidung khuga wangjiu nchum mide.”
Haise Dithubo

Iniu haisitu charuidihga langkhaibo tingga, kaokiubo khuan siniu jatdung hai pingjiu kaphik rai-rai mine. Eden ga bambo, khatdi kadalubo singbangdung, sigasu Lebanon gu singbangdung, charuidihlam tadmibo hina siniu paliu chunwi rabo-e.
Karaiga kaomibodung situ maluang lujiu bammira paliuse charuidih lam tadmide. Sibo hiuga madunkhai bammai mathiu situ jatdung ruangga kam marapu khaimi rabo-e.

“Sibo singbang sira Egypt mai wangpiu nai pamaidung hinatu dinbo-e. Eden ga bambo singbang khatniudi haisuang ku-nkiu makge khatdi wison makge. Chiudi tuhoira Eden gu singbangdungse kumjiu haise charuidihga tadkiujiu, charatu simakjiu chariga kamshat mibo maidung situ majang lungmi rabo-e. Haise Iniu dinkhai mibo-e,” chiujiu Dithubo
Aliuniu kavang thiutad mibo takum kariu niakiugu chahiu kariu-je-niakiugu raithubo nai,

Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai, Egypt mai wangpiutu tanjiu kachan khailo. Akhugasu daolubo champao haise patu pikhai bilo: Nangniu jatdung ruangga ndongqui kumjiu lung bamme, chiudi nang hai mantage siniu tadui maga masaokhang bambose kumme. Naphiniu tadui kam manaojiu masao khangboga singgiu dui situ kam tania khai-e.
Jat kakengniu wang maduibo wan-ga, Iniu agu alang thinlujiu natu thonrabo-e, sichiujiu paliutu pijiu alangse rampum genlam jupadmi rabo-e.
Iniu natu kadihga taliang khairabo-e khatdi natu tiuraleng kadihpiriga bambo thingna nai khaoring hinatu puiwang rabo-e.
Tenmibo naphaw situ Iniu ramluongga khatdi pabekga piphui khaine.
Iniu nazaise maluong riga runkhaijiu giunadung phui makthen run khaine.
Iniu natu kam mahabo wan-ga, Iniu tingpukse gomnammi rabo-e khatdi chagandungtu biakthonmi rabo-e. Naimik siniu kamuang hiuga nbaimi rabo-e, khatdi chahiu siniu pabiu padtami rabo-e.
Iniu tinggen-gu kabenbo hina kam midmi rabo-e khatdi nagu kadih situ tamiuboga thon khaimi rabo-e. Dithubo
“Nangniu simatai makbo jatdung khuga Iniu natu kam masa mibo racham din khaiboga, jat kakengniu magenthiu chariu rabo-e.

Iniu nakhuga kamkhaibo haitu jat kakengniu paliu suang hasune. Iniu aheng thadpadbo wan-ga, chawangdung hina nping charensu rabo-e. Nangniu kaokiubo tingmikse paliu mathiuse paliugu ringting jengniu npingjiu kaphik rai-rai mirabo-e.”
Dithubo
Palung kasabo jatdung situ pijiu naliu riga, paliu heng thadpad lujiu namaidung situ kamshat mirabo-e. Nangniu wasao thiujiu bambo namaidung khatdi nagu kabambo hinatu kam mahami rabo-e.
Iniu tadui chungbo bam hinaga nagu matom-kabuise kamshat khaine. Siga tadui situ kam manao khaira chakhao chamai khatnadi hami rabo-e.
Iniu nagu taduise kam mahami lujiu, singgiudung pijiu luangkhai rabo-e. Dithubo
Iniu Egypt tu kam masa khaijiu, siga lungbambo mai hinatu kam mahamibo wan-ga, paliuniu I hai
Haichiujiu kachansui khaibo siniu kashai baibo lui thiumi sune. Jatdunggu maipuidung siniu haibo lui thiujiu Egypt mai nai pamaidung jengniu achung sune. Dithubo
Aliuniu kavang thiutad mibo takum karu-je-niakiubogu karaibo hiugu jeng kariu-je-mangiubo nai,
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Egypt maidung mathiu sung achung khailo. Pumtan bambo jatdung situ tamanjiu paliutu charuidihga langkiu milo.
Paliu khuga dinlo:
“Naliu hai kakimai suang wi-nkiu-e chiu maning jiuma?
Naliudi charuidihga kiumi rabo-e,
khatdi charatu simak mai ruangga jibamra mide.
“Chariga shaimi maidungtu majang lujiu Egypt maidungniu kaokiu mine. Paliu mathiutu kamshatmi raleng chaheng khat kaden lude.

Egypt maidung lam liangjiu charithiu khaimibo dithubo liangtongdungniu Egypt maidungtu charuidihga chunwijiu adao rabo-e. Paliuniu senpadne: Chariga gimibo charatu simakbo maidung haiga wang nkum bamme, khatdi haiga paliu jibamme!’
“Pagu riphendunggu rawdungniu patu magui lujiu, Assyria di siga bamme. Paliu mathiu haitu chari ganiu gimibo-e,

sichiujiu paliu rawdung hai sukthubo charuidihga bamme. Pagu riphendung hinase chariga kaokiu mide, khatdi paliu rawdungniu parawtu maguijiu bamme. Sichiujiu paliuniu pawan khat kadihga lungbam maitu kam charen masakhai mibo-e.

“Pagu riphendunggu charawniu patu maguilujiu, Elam di siga bamme. Paliu mathiu haitu chariga gimibo-e, khatdi paliu hai chagi rom makjiu charuidihga wang nkum bamme. Karingtingga paliuniu nping-charenbo ngam kamme, chiudi tuhoira paliu hai mangambo daojiu chariga gimi maidunggu sansetse padam lumacham mide.

Chariga gimi maidung ruangga Elam hai jikiujiu bamme, khatdi pagu riphendunggu raw siniu patu maguijiu bamme. Paliu mathiu hai chagi rommak mai-e, paliu mathiutu chariga gimibo-e. Karingtingga paliuniu nping-charenbo kamkhai mibo-e, chiudi tuhoira paliu hai mangambo daojiu chariga gimi maidunggu sansetse padam lumacham mide.
“Meshech nai Tubal tudi panaigu riphendunggu rawniu magui lujiu bamme. Paliu hai chagirom makge, paliu mathiutu chari ganiu kamshat mibo-e. Paliuniu pawan khat ringbammaitu kam charen khai mibo-e.

Nda ken-gu charipidung tura paliugu chaheng pi makhum khaijiu khatdi paliugu chageeniu paliu pum tomsin khai lujiu, chari mania hina jaojiu charuidihga tadmi maidung situ chakhuang thiujiu baikhai makge. Sibo charipidung siniu pawan wan-ga kabuibo pumtan thinlujiu ringbammaitu thiulen len-e.
“Haichiujiu Egypt maidungtu chariga shaimibo, pagi rommak maidung ruangga niakpet khai mirabo-e.

“Edom di siga pagu chawangdung nai mawangpaodungtu majang lujiu bamme. Paliu hai pumtan bambo riphendung-e, chiudi tuhoira paliuniu chariga shaimibo chagirom mak maidungtu majang lujiu charuidihga jibamme.

“Tingpilam bambo chawang nahmai hina nai Sidon maidung siga bamme. Paliugu pumtanniu pawan khat maidungtu kam charen khai mibo-e, chiudi tuhoira paliuniu chariga shaimibo chagirom makbo maidung ruangga paliu zu sajiu wang mathak bam mide. Paliuniu charuidihga wangmibo maidunggu mangambose padam lumacham mide.
“Chariga kamshat mibo maidung hainiu Egypt wang nai pagu riphendung lungchun kimbose thiurabo-e,” chiujiu Dithubo

“Iniu Egypt mai wangpiutu pijiu ringbam maitu kam charen khainibo-e chiudi patu khatdi pagu riphenmai hina tu kamshat mirabo-e khatdi chariga shaimibo chagirom mak maidung ruangga jibammi rabo-e.” Dithubo

Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Iniu kadih khatga tathiu-chari langkhaibo wan-ga degu pad suralo chiubo namaidung khuga paokhai bilo. Sibo dihga lungmaidungniu paliu ruanggasu akhepiu khat kada khai rabo-e.
Mikre maidungniu ngut kinbo paniu ngaoboga, mai hinatu kachan khaira paniu nchom biukhai-e.
Mai khatniu sise chiulujiu wajeng simakjiu, mikremainiu wangjiu patu kamshat misai, siga pashitse paronna phungrabo-e.
Paniu shaibose pa-mao-e, palamra paniu kachan khaibo situ wathao thiumakbo-e. Paniu sise manangjiu palung ngutsai, pak mari lubui-e.

Chiudi akhepiu siniu mikremai ngut kinbo ngaolujiu chari nchom biukhai makjiu, mikremai siniu ngutjiu sibo nuan phungmaidung situ kamshat misai, shaimibo bangripse Iniu akhepiu riga piwang khai rabo-e.
“Tuhoira, Shaisuibo mai yo, Iniu natu Israel mai jatleng akhepiu thiura kada khaibo-e. Iniu nakhuga dinkhaibo kachan hinase paliu khuga nangniu dinkhai rabo-e.

Iniu kasamaise shairabo-e chiujiu dinkhai sai, chiudi paniu pagu ringting ranlu raleng pagu puitad kalira nangniu patu kachankhai makjiu, nuan phungmai thiujiu pah shaimi sai, paniu shamibogu paripse Iniu nariga pikhai rabo-e.
Nangniu kasamai khattu kachanjiu dinkhaiboga, paniu nuan kamsao makjiu, nuan phungmai khat thiujiu pah shaimi sai, siga nagu ringting haira kalan lune.”
Dithubo,

“Tuhoira, Shaisuibo mai yo, kawi mainiu nuan tenbo wan-ga, paniu kamkhai mibo kawibo siniu patu ranlu lakge chiujiu Israel mai khuga dinkhai bilo. Kasamai khatniu kasa kambo gasu mathak misai, patu sajai pilakge, khatdi kawimai khatniu nuan kam misai, pagu ringting kalan khai lakge.

Iniu kawimai khuga karingbose ladriat thiukhai sui-e, chiudi paniu kamkhai mibo kawibo siniu buimine chiu maningjiu nuan kammisai, paniu kamkhai mibo kawibo situ Iniu maningtao lakge. Pagu nuan jengniu pahai shairabo-e.
Kasabo maise shai rabo- chiujiu bamboga Iniu kachan khaine, siga paniu nuan kamta misai, majibo kawibo kam mibo-e—

champanjiu dinboga, paniu agalubo maniase malan wangsai, maksai apuk lubo maniase khoiwang lansai—paniu nuan kamta lujiu karingbo pikhai rabo tacheng-tajai saisui misai pahai shai lakge, chiudi ringlu rabo-e.
Paniu nuan kamkhai mibose Iniu kuak khaine, khatdi paniu majibo nai kawibo kammibo jengniu pah ringlu rabo-e.
“Chiudi Iniu kambose maji makge chiujiu namaidungniu din-e! Makge, maji kamakbose paliugu npui siniu-e.
Tacheng matipmai khatniu kawibo ngam kambo gasu saolujiu, kasabo ngam kammi sai, pahai shairabo-e.
Kasabo mai khatniu nuanse phutlujiu majibo nai kawibo kammi sai, pahai pagu ringtingtu ranlubo-e.
Chiudi Israel mai yo, Iniu kambose mao-e chiujiu naliuniu din-e. Naliuniu kambo saisuijiu Ira ladjan thiurabo-e.”
Sibo nai chawan paniu wangmakbo masuangga,

“Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Israel mai kadih nchum mibo namdidungga lungbambo maidung siniu din bamme: Abraham hai chamai khatle, kadih pakhiangna patu pikhai mibo-e. Aliu hai chamai kengjiu bamme, siniu tuhoira kadihse aliugu mide.’
Dithubo
Naliuniu naliu heng-ngiutu malum khaijiu bamme. Naliu tienkam hai matai mareng-e. Mai hinaniu npui-npiu lungmao-e. Kadihse naliu gu-e chiubo naliu dechiujiu maningpad jiulo?
“Dithubo

Iniu kadih situ pi nchumjiu kam mahami rabo-e, khatdi paliuniu chaliangjiu bambo pumtanse hami rabo-e. Israel maigu ramluongga tathiu chakhaoniu piphui khaijiu mai khatnadi siga tad mariu silakmi rabo-e.
Iniu maidungtu paliu nuan jengniu sajai pibo wan-ga sibo kadihse pageng hami rabo-e, sigasu I hai

Sichiujiu nangniu dinpadbose nking raleng amaidung wang madui-e, chiudi nangniu paliutu kamraleng dinkhaibose paliuniu kam makge. Chalungsabo lad hai paliu muntaiga bamme, chiudi paliuniu paliu tiuni sabo npui gase tadjiu bamme.
Paliu khugara nang hai charuang thiujiu marai-lui thiubo maksai tara gebo makjiu wadi ha-e. Paliuniu nalad hina nking-e, chiudi ladkeng khatnadi majai makge.
Chiudi nagu ladkeng hinase majijiu padboga—paliuniu majibo gase wangrabo-e—siga paliuniu phaimiukakung khat paliu ruangga bamme chiubo silu rabo-e.”
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Israel maigu mawangpaodungtu din masa khailo. Paliu khuga sailad hai dinkhailo khatdi Dithubo
Naliuniu ndui sakge, chakhaogiu fai-ni thinpiu-e khatdi withubo milytu kamshat lujiu langtiu-e chiudi naliuniu wadaodi milydung situ akhikhai makge.

Naliuniu kason maitu manang khai makge, kamara maidungtu akhikhai makge, ajammai jamse domkhai makge, ronmengmi maitu majangwang khailan makge, maksai hami maitu phiukhai makge. Sibosung, naliuniu paliutu kam masa-e.
Palamra milydung situ khuanpao ha-e, paliu hai tad mara-maren mide, khatdi tathiu chakhaoniu paliutu kamshat lujiu tiu bamme.

Sijengniu agu milydungse maluanggen nai ramluongga ronmeng tad mide. Paliu hai kadih pabam hinaga tad marapiak kam mide, sichiujiu mai khatnadi paliutu phuikhai makge maksai paliutu phiudao lura kamkhai makge.
“Tuhoira, naliu milykhuanpaodung yo,

I hai ringbo Rawang thiubambo jenggasu, naliuniu alad nking khai sai wisune. Agu milydungtu khuanpao habo donniu tathiu chakhaoniu paliutu kamshat lujiu tiulude. Agu mily khuanpaodungniu milydungtu phuikhai raleng kam makge. Paliu haira paliuleng ronna manang kinne, chiudi milydung situ manang khai makge.
Siniu naliu milykhuanpaodung yo, alad nkinglo.
Dithubo
Dithubo

Sichiujiu milykhuanpao khatniu pagu milydung tad mara mibo gasu khomwang maduijiu phui khaibo kumjiu Iniu paliutu phuikhai rabo-e. Paliuniu sansabo daojiu tamiuboga tad mara khai mibo bam hina gasu Iniu paliutu khomwang aruang khailan rabo-e.

Iniu paliutu sangdiumai dih gasu majang khaijiu khomwang aruangkhai rabo-e, khatdi paliu dihga majang wangkhai rabo-e. Iniu paliutu ramluongga khatdi Israel maigu giurak hinaga majangwang khai lan rabo-e, sichiujiu piubuan kawibo gase paliutu pitiu khai rabo-e.
Paliuniu manangbo hajiu piubuan kawibo ramluongga khatdi ramjeng kawiboga, khatdi Israel mai kadih madiakbo piuriangliga pijiu tagi khai rabo-e.
I apumsiakniu agu milydunggu khuanpao thiu rabo-e, khatdi paliu mathak khairabo bam Iniu phiukhai rabo-e. Dithubo

“Iniu hamibo situ phiurabo-e, ron maha mibo situ majangwang khai rabo-e, ajam mibo situ domkhai rabo-e, khatdi kamarabo situ wikhai rabo-e; chiudi pamai wibo khatdi katanbodung situ Iniu kam mahami rabo-e, palamra I hai kamaji kambo milykhuanpao-e.
“Sichiujiu tuhoira, agu milydung yo, naliu khuga Dithubo
Naliu khangsianiu withubo piuriang tiubose kim makge; naliuniu tiumakbo situ tao masa mi-e! Naliuniu masanbo dui sakge chiudi naliuniu sakmakbo duise tao manao mi-e!
Naliuniu tao masa mibo piuriangse agu kakibo milydung siniu tiurabo-e, khatdi naliuniu tao manao mibo duise agu kakibo milydung siniu sakrabo-e.
“Siniu tuhoira, Dithubo
Naliuniu marabo khat situ hithon padmi-e, khatdi milydung ruang gasu mathao taliang mi-e.
Chiudi Iniu agu milydungtu gukhai rabo-e, sichiujiu paliutu pijiu kam masa khai lakge. Iniu agu mily hinatu ladjan thiu rabo-e, khatdi kawibo nai kasabo situ khoi npekmi rabo-e.
Avangpiu David kumbo mai khattu paliugu khuanpao thiura, Iniu paliuleng chawang pikhai rabo-e, sichiu paniu paliutu phuikhai rabo-e,
, Iniu paliu Rawang thiurabo-e, khatdi avangpiu David kumbo khatniu paliugu mawangpao thiurabo-e. Iniu dinpad khai mibo-e.
Paliuniu manang makra Iniu paliu khuga chamriat kamkhai rabo-e. Sibo kadih gase kasabo tathiu-chakhaodungtu Iniu kam maha mine,sichiujiu agu milydungniu luzamga khatdi mariuga wijiu lungrabo-e.
“Iniu paliutu thoikhai rabo-e, khatdi paliutu pijiu agu masanbo luongga

Singbangdungniu pasy kengjiu masi rabo-e, luzam gase miusy kengjiu padrabo-e, khatdi mai hina kasabo hajiu padih-dihga lungrabo-e. Iniu amaidungtu ratman khaibo riangse khipad khaibo wan-ga paliuniu kavang thiu bambo gasu khenrang thiumi rabo-e, siga paliuniu I hai

Nkengmai jatdung siniu paliutu wadaodi sunglan lak mide, khatdi tathiu-chakhaoniu paliutu kamtiu lanlak mide. Paliu hai amanjiu khatdi kapingbo hajiu lung bammi rabo-e, khatdi paliutu mai khatniudi kam kapin kam charen lanlak mide.
Iniu paliutu patam wibo dih pikhai rabo-e, khatdi sibo dihga mariu-charibo thiulak mide. Sichiujiu kakibo jatdungniu paliutu nuimen lanlak mide.
Iniu Israel maitu gukhai bamme khatdi paliu hai amaidung-e, chiubo mai hina simi rabo-e. Dithubo
“Naliu hai, Iniu pitiu khaijiu bambo agu milydung, amaidung si-e, khatdi I hai naliu Rawang-e,” chiujiu Dithubo
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Edom maigu kadihtu din masa khailo.
Dithubo
Edom gu maluangdung yo, I hai naliugu mikrepiu-e!
Iniu naliutu kam nchummi rabo-e.
Iniu naliugu namdidungtu kam nchum mine,
khatdi naliugu kadihse kam masa mine.
Siga I hai
“Naliu hai Israel maigu saomakbo mikre mai-e khatdi pagu sansabo wan nai pagu nuan jengniu kanambo sajai pibo wan-ga pamaidungtu kamshat mibo-e.
Sichiujiu—I hai dithubo
Iniu Edom gu maluang haitu pageng hamibo pi thiukhai mine, khatdi siga tadken maidung hinatu kamshat mirabo-e.
Iniu maluang hina riga kashai phawdungniu pi phuikhai rabo-e, khatdi chariga kamshat mibo phawdung siniu maluangga khatdi ramjengga mara kajanpan khai rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu tingtheng leng kam nchum mine, khatdi naliugu namdidungga mai khattudi pi lungkhai lakge. Sichiusai I hai
Sijeng gasu, Dithubo
Sigase kam nchum mibo Israel maigu maluongdungtu nangniu wajeng simakbo khatdi paliu hai nangniu tiulu rabo-e chiujiu dinbo hai
Nangniu nalung pomjiu, chaliangjiu atu atungjiu dinbambose Iniu chiulubo-e.”
Dithubo
nangniu kaokiuboga kadihpiri pakhiangnaniu chunwi rabo-e. Seir gu maluangdung yo, Edom dih pakhiangna kam nchummi rabo-e. Sigasu I hai
khatdi Dithubo
“Sichiusai, sailad hai dinkhailo, khatdi Dithubo
Siniu tuhoira, Dithubo
“Dithubo
“Sijengniu Israel mai dihga sailad hai dinkhailo jatdungniu paliutu kam mangam khaijiu kam masa khai mibose, Dithubo
Dithubo
Chiudi Israel maigu ramluongdungga singbangdungse paniw bonlanjiu amai Israel maidung leng pasy masilan rabo-e. Naliu kylam wang majimi rabo-e.
Iniu naliu lam liang bamme, khatdi Iniu pachangjiu naliu dihga tatien tenlanjiu siga chalin lingkhai lanra kamkhai siak rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu pi kingkhai rabo-e. Naliuniu namdidung gase wang lunglanjiu kam nchum mibo hina thiu sulan rabo-e.

Iniu chakhao chamai riak pi kengkhang khai rabo-e, khatdi naliu nahmai pikengkhai rabo-e. Naliuniu lungkhai mibo kumjiu Iniu naliutu pi lungkhai rabo-e, khatdi karaiga suang naliutu pi lungwi khai rabo-e. Siga I hai
Iniu amai Israel maidung, naliutu haibo dihga majangwang pi lunglan khai rabo-e. Haise naliugu kadih thiurabo-e, khatdi naliu nahmaidungtu pijiu wadaodi kami-milan lakge.
“Dithubo
Chiudi tuhoi gasu sibo dihniu chamaitu tiubo dih thiujiu naliu nahmaidungtu agabo thiulan lakge, Dithubo
Jatdungniu thin kagabambo chiulan lakge maksai din masajiu tanui thiubambo ngaolan lakge. Sibo dihniu jatgu nahmaidungtu agabo kamlan lak mide. Dithubo
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Israel mainiu paliu dihga lungbambo wan-ga paliu lunlung nai paliu tienkam gasu paliutu kam tania mide. Paliugu lunlung haise npuimai khatniu khaophun tadbo
Paliuniu chamaitu gijiu sibo dihga kamaobo kamkhai mibo jengniu khatdi paliuniu charamengtu kahumbo jengniu sibo dihtu kam tania khaimibo gasu Iniu alungpomgu pumtanse paliutu pi niatao khaibo-e.
Paliuniu lung khaimibo lunlung nai kamkhai mibo lunlung jengniu paliutu Iniu thonpad mibo-e, khatdi Iniu paliutu sangdiumai dihga hamara khai mibo-e.
Paliuniu tadkhaibo hinaga, paliuniu chamtan masanbose kam masa khai mibo-e. palamra maidungniu din-e, ‘Haibo maidung hai
Israel maidungniu tadkhaibo bam hinaga chamtan masanbo gase mangambo phungwang khai-e, sijengniu sibo lamga atu pi maningtaobo-e.
“Sijengniu tuhoira, Dithubo
Naliuniu jatdung ruangga mangambo kamkhai mibo zan—chamtan kadibo masanbo situ Iniu paliu khuga kamlen khaibo wan gase—paliuniu I hai
Iniu naliutu jat hina nai kadih pabam hina gasu lukhai rabo-e khatdi naliugu kadihga naliutu majangwang khailan rabo-e.
Iniu naliu riga tadui masanbo kajin khairabo-e khatdi naliugu charamengdung nai naliuniu kamkhai mibo hina gasu naliutu kam masan khai rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu kasanbo lungchun nai kasanbo maning pikhai rabo-e. Iniu naliu lung tatu kumjiu tanbose khoithon mirabo-e khatdi kadinpiubo lungchun naliu khuga pikhai rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu ahiupuina pikhaibi rabo-e khatdi Iniu naliutu pikhaibo chamtan hina naliuniu majaijiu, agu tacheng-tajai saisui-e chiubo hiupuina situ Iniu pijiu phuikhai bine.
Sichiujiu Iniu naliu pao-peh maileng pikhai mibo dihga naliuniu lungrabo-e. Naliuniu amaidung thiu rabo-e khatdi Iniu naliu Rawang thiu rabo-e.
Naliutu kam tania khaibo hina gasu Iniu naliutu rankhai rabo-e. Iniu miusy mali-malan padraleng chamtan pikhai rabo-e, chiujiu naliu khuga chakhum wanglakge.
Iniu naliugu charasibang nai naliu luga parasy kengjiu pipad khaine, chiujiu chakhum wangjiu jatdung ruangga naliutu pi mangam khailan lakge.
Naliuniu kamaobo kamkhai mibo kamaobo jengniu naliuniu naliu ronna mangam surabo-e.
Israel mai yo, Iniu kambambo hinase naliu jengniu makge chiubo naliutu pi sikhaini-e. Naliuniu kammibogu mangambo nai tazu sabo hai naliutu pi niatao khaibotu Iniu masen-e. Dithubo
Dithubo
Naliu luzamse mariuram thiumibo tadken mai hinaniu ngaokhai mibo-e, chiudi Iniu naliutu pi siga tatien tenkhai lanne.

Haibo dih hai pakak khatga ramjing thiubam mibose Eden reng kum mine, khatdi namdidungse kamkao lujiu khatdi sunglujiu, kam nchum khai mibose tuhoira charireng thiulujiu wang lunglan bam mine chiujiu mai hinaniu dinrabo-e.
Sichiujiu
Dithubo
Tuhoi nchumjiu bambo namdidung situ pakak khatga charathiu rabo milydungniu Jerusalem ga phuibambo kumjiu chamai riakniu pi phuikhai rabo-e. Siga I hai
Iniu
Paniu atu sibo ramjengga majang tadle, siga Iniu chamai rahrong sangkang mibo kengchangkha bambo ngao-e.
Paniu akhuga din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, haibo rahrongdungse ringlanlu buima?”
Iniu paokakge, “Dithubo
Paniu din-e, “Charah ruangdung khuga sailad dinlo.
Dithubo
Iniu naliutu naliu nenriang nai naliu tia pikhaijiu naliu giniu topsin khai bine. Iniu naliutu karingbo siu pikhaine khatdi naliutu pi ringkhai lanne. Siga I hai
Sichiu atu dinkhaibo kumjiu Iniu sailad dinkhai-e. Iniu dinjiu bambo tingga, Iniu riap-riapbo khuan chiu-e, khatdi charahrongse wang mathuksu mide.
Iniu phuibambo tingga, charahrongse tanenriang nai tatia mawisin padjiu siga pagi siniu tomsin mide. Chiudi sibo rahrong gase karingbo siu wadi ha-e.
Tingwang niu akhuga din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, tingkai
Tingwang niu akhuga din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Israel maidungse haibo rahrongdung kumbo-e. Paliuniu din-e, chiubora paliu hai sangmibo-e, pasaileng machunbo wadi hamide.
Siniu amai Israel maikhuga sailad dinkhai bilo khatdi Dithubo
Iniu amaidungtu baikhai bambo rawdung lepad lujiu paliutu majang npadbo wan-ga, I hai
Iniu agu karingbo siuse paliutu pikhai rabo-e, paliutu piring khai lanrabo-e, khatdi paliutu paliu dihga pilung khai rabo-e. Siga I hai
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo Tasingthun khat thinlulo khatdi siga haichiu raokhailo, ‘Judah wangdih’. Sigasu katambo tasingthun khat khoilan lulujiu, siga ‘Israel mai wangdih,’ chiu raokhailo,
Sigasu tathun nia tonse khoi aruang lujiu nabenniu chakid manmilo sichiujiu paliutu pi tathun khat kumjiu ngaopad khailo.
Namaidungniu haibogu rambase dechiubo gulo chiujiu maniubo ga,
Dithubo
“Tathun niase nabenniu thinbambose maidungtu pi ngaokhailo.
Sigasu Dithubo
Iniu Israel maidunggu ramluongdungga pa-liutu pi jat khat thiujiu aruang khai rabo-e, siga paliuse jat nia thiujiu njan padbo maksai chawang dih nia thiujiu tampadbo thiulan lakge.

Paliuniu paliutu ronna matai marengbo ramengdungniu kam tania lanlakge, maksai paliu ronna nuan tenjiu kasa kamlan lakge. Paliuniu atu jonjiu nuan tenkhai mibo npui hina gasu Iniu paliutu khenrang thiukhai rabo-e, Iniu paliutu kam masan khai rabo-e; paliuniu amaidung thiumi rabo-e, khatdi Iniu paliu Rawang thiumi rabo-e.
Avangpiu David kumbo chawang khatniu paliugu chawang thiurabo-e. Paliuniu mawangpao khat hangga aruang rabo-e khatdi agu tacheng-tajai-dungse chamchangjiu piurabo-e.

Paliu paopeh mainiu lungkhai mibo dih, Iniu avangpiu Jacob khuga pikhaibo dihga paliu lungrabo-e. Siga paliu tingtheng lungbammi rabo-e, khatdi paliu nahmaidung nai paliu kaikikdung hinadi tingtheng lungbammi rabo-e. Avangpiu David kumbo khatniu paliu riga tingtheng mawangjiu lungmi rabo-e.
Paliuniu wadaodi kasa daomakra Iniu paliu khuga chamriat kamkhai rabo-e. Iniu paliu riak pi kengkhangjiu lungsu khai rabo-e, khatdi paliu dihga atu kahumbo Raky se tingtheng bammi rabo-e.
Iniu siga paliutu majang lungrabo-e; Iniu paliu Rawang thiu rabo-e, sichiujiu paliuse amaidung thiumi rabo-e.
Siga Charakyse bamjiu paliu ruangga tingtheng I bammi rabo-e, sichiu dasai
Paniu din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, Magog dihga Tubal mai nai Meshech mai jatdunggu mawangpaodunggu papee thiubo, Gog tu din masa khailo. Patu din masalo,
sichiujiu Dithubo

Iniu patu tun kadad lujiu pah ajaga khakhoi guakkhai lujiu patu khatdi pagu riphen situ ju taliang mirabo-e. Pagu riphendung sira chaqon tongmai, chafai-tani khat piubomai chiujiu kengchang keng-e, khatdi riphenmai hinase chagee nai chaheng khat jam thin kamme.
Persia gasu, Sudan gasu, khatdi Libya gasu maidung pasai suikin-e, khatdi mathiuse chagee nai chagi pirun khai kamme.
Gomer dihga aphenpum hina nai tingpilam bambo Beth Togarmah gu aphenpum hina pasai suikin-e, khatdi katambo jatdung gasu niudi maidung suikin-e.
Pasai suikinbo riphen hinatu kaden lujiu bamra pakhuga dinkhailo.

Takum wajiukha sailam tathiu-charitu pingmakjiu lungbambo, jatdung kakeng gasu majangwang lung aruang khai lanjiu bambo maidung dihga chari hangut raleng Iniu patu chamtan pikhai mide. Pating kathengga kathaidih thiumibo khatdi kam masa mibo, chiudi maidungniu tuhoira wijiu lungbambo, Israel maigu ramluong gase paniu chari hangut rabo-e.
Paniu pagu riphendungtu khatdi jatdung kakengtu puilujiu, tingthung kumjiu asun rabo-e khatdi kamuang kumjiu kadih situ gomsin mirabo-e.”
Dithubo
Maidungniu rengdi thiumakjiu mangiu khaira habo namdak hinaga agi-manaijiu, kasa hajiu manang makjiu lungbambo kadihga nangniu chari hangut raleng kamrabo-e.

Pakak khatga nchumjiu bam mibo namdidungga lungjiu bambo maidungtu nangniu sunglujiu khoilu rabo-e. Paliutu jatdung gasu majang wang aruang khai bambo-e, khatdi tuhoira paliugu khaorui-khaona nai chakhiu-chalan bamme khatdi kadihpirigu npui-npaiga lung bamme.

Sheba maidung nai Dedan maidung khatdi Spain gu namdakdungga chali-chala thiukin maidungniu natu maniu rabo-e. ‘Chari thiujiu mania sungra nagu riphendungtu nangniu ku madui ludama? Nchum mibo namdi hina gasu kachia, rangkang, khaorui-khaona, khatdi chakhiu-chalan sunglu raleng nangniu rangbam jiuma?”
Siniu Dithubo
nangniu kadiubo nabam tingpi lamsu, jat kakenggu pumtan bambo chaqon tuangmaitu majang lujiu kinbo-e.

Nangniu amai Israel maidungtu tingthung kawang kumjiu asun rabo-e. Pawanse wangbo ga, Iniu napen gasu kamkhaibo siniu jatdung khuga chamtan masanbo lenra, I hai saolo chiubo lenra Iniu natu agu kadihga charithiu ngutra langkhai rabo-e.
Iniu avang Israel maigu phaimiukakung khuga pisikhai mibo, patingse wangtangboga mai khattu maluang wangjiu amai Israel maitu chari thiurabo-e chiubose nang-e.” Dithubo
Dithubo
Alung pombo jengniu sibo tingmik gase Israel mai dihga kathi katanbo wangra Iniu dinpad mibo-e.

Chakha nai thingna hina, khaoring kati-kadi pakhiangna khatdi kadihpiriga bambo chamai hinaniu atu pingjiu kaphik rai-rai surabo-e. Maluongdung minkiu mirabo-e, chakhao-turendi minkiumi rabo-e, khatdi singbeng hinadi kaokiumi rabo-e.
Iniu Gog tu katam-tambo thak ganiu kam nping charen khairabo-e. Dithubo

Iniu patu chararen nai tazai luangbo siniu sajai pikhai rabo-e. Tingriu katanbo nai kachakniu chami nai chagan-mipiu aruanglubo siniu pariga khatdi pagu riphenmaidung riga khatdi palam liangbo jatdung riga runkiu khai rabo-e.
Haichiu kamkhaibo gasu jatdung hina khuga I hai dibo-e khatdi masanbo-e chiubo Iniu madu khai rabo-e. Siga I hai
Dithubo
Iniu patu kasanbo npuilam kam arikhaijiu kadiubo tingpi lamsu Israel maigu maluongram wangtang makthen patu jukhai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu Iniu paben mawilam su pagu tavaipi khatdi paben majatlam su pagu tavaithuse luthonmi rabo-e,
Gog nai pagu riphendung khatdi palam liangjiu bammaidungse, Israel maigu ramluongdungga shaijiu kaokiu rabo-e, khatdi Iniu paliu phawdungse thingna nai tathiu-chakhaodunggu tatek pithiu khai rabo-e.
Paliuniu kadihga shaijiu nkhuangkiu mirabo-e. Dithubo
Iniu Magog dihga khatdi kabuakbo wadi hajiu lungbambo duipui mungkhen pakhiangnase chami rumi rabo-e, chiujiu I hai
Amai Israel maidungniu chamtan masanbo situ silu raleng Iniu kamkhai rabo-e, khatdi Iniu chamtantu pi din masa khaita mirabo-e. Sichiujiu
Dithubo

Israel maigu namdidungga lungbam maidungniu thonkhai diakbo chari maniadungse dikrabo singleng khoirabo-e. Paliuniu chageedung, tavaipidung, tavaithudung, changiudung khatdi chahengdungse khoilujiu chami thiurabo-e sise takum chinnia lungga thinbui lurabo-e.

Paliuniu dikrabo singleng luzamga khoi lakge maksai mariuga singbang huilakge, palamra paliuniu thonkhai diakbo chari mania siniu buimi rabo-e. Paliuniu paliugu sungmi maidunggu sunglujiu khoi lanlu rabo-e.” Dithubo
Israel maidungniu chaphawdung baijiu khatdi kadih kam masan lanbo hai chahiu chinnialing ngut rabo-e.
Sibo dihga lungbammai hinaniu paliutu baiboga nkharabo-e, khatdi Iniu chari ngamlubo tingmik naise paliutu chakhuang thiukhai rabo-e. Dithubo
Chahiu chinnia loimibo saiga, kadih pakhiangna tadronjiu kashai phaw phiuraleng chamai kadapad rabo-e khatdi kadihga bamniubo pum hina baimi rabo-e. Sichiujiu paliuniu kadihse kam masan khai rabo-e.
Paliuniu sibo dih tadkhang tadkiuboga, paliuniu chamai rah daobo hinaga, wakam tasikhai lujiu charaw chumaidungniu wangjiu charahse khoilujiu Gog gu riphendunggu Ramjengga baikhai rabo-e.
(Riphen mai zan luijiu mathak khaibo namdak khat sibo mungga bamrabo-e). Haichiujiu kadihse kam masan khailan rabo-e.”

Paliuniu riphenmaidung phawse tiurabo-e, khatdi mawangpaodung zaise sakrabo-e, paliu mathiutu hai midangchidungtu kumjiu maksai milydungtu kumjiu maksai kamidungtu kumjiu maksai pamaiwibo buichitu kumjiu kamshat mirabo-e.
Iniu charathiujiu haidungtu kamshat khaiboga thingnadung nai tathiu-chakhaodungniu pasadungse paliuniu tiulubui then tiurabo-e khatdi paliuniu maniu makthen tazaise sakrabo-e.
Akuang-kai gase chaqon tongmaidung khatdi chaqon riphendung, khatdi chari thiura riphendung hinatu khomwang madui khai rabo-e. Dithubo
Sigasu Israel maidungniu I hai

Khatdi Israel maidungniu kavang thiu tadbose paliuniu atu atungjiu nuan kambo gasu-e chiubo jatdungniu simi rabo-e. Iniu paliu khugasu maritad mirabo-e khatdi paliutu pi paliugu mikremaidungniu kamkao khairabo-e khatdi paliutu pi chariga shaikhai rabo-e.
Paliuniu kasabo nai masan makbo kamkhai mibo gasu Iniu kamkhaibo-e, sichiujiu Iniu paliu khugasu maritad mibo-e.”
Dithubo
Paliuniu paliu dihga wijiu mai khatniudi paliutu kam masa makjiu lungmibo wan-ga paliuniu atu jonmibo gasu, paliu zu kasabo daobose paliuniu mangaimi rabo-e.
I hai masanbo-e chiubo jat kakeng khuga lenkhai raleng, Iniu amaidungtu paliugu mikre maidunggu kadih hina gasu maluang wang khailan rabo-e.
Sigase I hai paliu Rawang,
Iniu Israel maidung riga agu hiupuina runkiu khaibi rabo-e khatdi wadaodi paliu khugasu maritad lanlakge. Dithubo
Haise takum kasan-gu jengriu nai, aliutu kavang leng mintad mibo takum makai-mangiu sai khatdi Jerusalem tu haphun lubo takum kariu madai sailam sude. Sibo tingmik gase
Sibo madungao lungga Tingwang niu atu Israel mai ruangga puiwang-e sigasu maluang kakubo riga atu khaibi-e. Amasuangga dibo kydung pabao khat, namdi khat kumbo Iniu ngao-e.
Paniu atu puiwang mana khai-e, khatdi mai khat hai tataagi kumjiu bensatjiu bambo Iniu ngao-e. Pahai wa madatbo tang madiobo khat, khatdi wa-madatbo riang thinlujiu rengmun npui mungga chap bamme.

Paniu akhuga din-e, “Mathing silo, Shaisuibo mai yo, nking mawilo khatdi Iniu natu pingao khaibo hinase makum mawilo, palamra haijengniu natu haiga puiwangbo-e, nangniu ngaolubo hinase Israel mai khuga dinkhai bilo.”
Sigasu paniu ting-banglam mari khai bambo rengmun npuilam tadmide. Tason lamse paniu khanglujiu, papee gasu paniu kamun tangbose madatle; sise gaphek sum siu-e.

Siga tadngutbo bam khat bamme siga akheky sum-sum bamme, kichen hinase pathen-padet machamme. Kichen hinase gaphek sum-sum-e, khatdi paliu kakga bambo singbengse gaphek nia paphan siu-e. Akhegu kichendung genlam tadngutbo bam gaphek sum thengbo siniu charaky lam marikhai bambo tadngutbo kichen lam padtang bamme.

Paniu haibo kichense madatle, sichiujiu pasukse gaphek madai sukge. Sise Charaky mung nathuboga bambo rengmun npuigu pamalan tangbo bamme, khatdi sibogu kadiubo pamalan gase kibeng gaphek khat siubo bamme.
(Kichen hinaga tadngutbo akhegu kichendungse pathen-padet ncham kamme, khatdi paliu kakga bambo kibengse pasiu macham kamme).
Pachaliga, sibo piuniu tadngutboga maruangbo bamgu padetse madatle. Pakhiangnase gaphek charuk paphan-e, khatdi lenlam khaibo rengmundung kakga bambo maruangbo bamse gaphek mangiu-e.
Akhegu kichen rammai hinagu pamasuangga kareng kanabo khat pakodniu kiubao ringiu khatdi pasiuniu kiubao ringiu-e. (Kichendungse gaphek sumniu magui-e).
Sigasu paniu pathense pasailam bambo kichen khatgu kibeng sailamsu, tadngutbo bam kichen kibeng tangbose madatboga, sise gaphek kariunia paphan padle.
Pamalan ga bambo kadiubo kichense ladjanky kahiu khatga padtang bamme. Sibo kichense paniu madatle sise gaphek kariu di-e.
Rengmun npuigu pathen pakhiangnase rengmun gu ndanbo kibeng gasu kanamthubo kichense gaphek makai-mangiu-e.

Kichen hinagu ndanbo singbeng lungga kasiambo npui lekhai bam kamme khatdi kichendung kakga bambo n-lungbo singbeng gadi haikumjiu bam kamme. N-lungbo singbeng tadken padrabo kahiu gu singbeng gase kadan-bangmeng giak khai bamme.
Sibo piuniu rengmun npui gasu atu ladjanky kahiuga puingutle. Ndanbo singbeng tun-ga kichen samriu thiukhai bamme, khatdi sibo suanggase tatuniu donkhai bamme,
sise kahiu wonjeng pakhiangna mengtang bamme. Haibo ndanbo ladjanky kahiu haise n-lungbo ladjanky kahiu suang na-nkiu-e.
N-lungbo kahiu katang mengtangbo kubibo rengmun npui sat khat bamme. Sibo piu siniu rengmun npui nia kakgu pathense madatboga, sise gaphek ringiu padle.
Sigasu sibo piuniu ndanbo kahiu gasu mengtang bambo tingpilam bambo rengmun npuise madatle.

Akhegu kichen sum kakga bambo kibengse khatdi tadngut rabo kichen pakhiangnase tingbang lamgu rengmun npui kumjiu pathen-padetse macham kamme. Rengmun npui pakhiangnase pathense gaphek makai-mangiu-e khatdi padet siniu gaphek kariu-je-niakiu paphan-e.

Tadngutbo kichen kirankidung, khat-di kadanbang meng giak khaibose tingbanglam bambose kumme, Haibo rengmun ga khangtang raleng phipan chinnia kamkhai bamme. khatdi kichense ladjanky palan gasu kahiulam mari khai bamme.
Haise tingpilam bambo rengmun npui gasu n-lungbo kahiulam tadngutjiu, tingbanglam bambo kum gapjiu bamme. Sibo piu siniu haibo rengmun npui nia kakgu pathense madatboga, sise gaphek ringiu padle.
Pachaliga, sibo piuniu atu tingrun jailam puitadle, siga anainiu kakibo rengmun npui ngao-e. Paniu n-lungbo singbengse madatle, sise kakibo panai ncham kamme.
Haibo kichen-gu kumjiu, sigadi kirandung bamme. Rengmun npuigu pathen pakhiangnase gaphek makai-mangiu-e, khatdi padetse gaphek kariu nia paphan di-e.
Haiga khangtang raleng phikem chinnia bamme, khatdi siga tadngutbo kichense kahiulam mari khai bamme. Palunglam ngutrabo kahiu gase kadanbang meng giak khai bamme.
Haigadi, rengmun npuise n-lungbo gu kahiu katang ngut bamme. Niabo rengmun situ, maipiu siniu pathen madadboga, sise gaphek ringiu padle.
Sibo piuniu tingrunlam bambo rengmun npui gasu atu n-lungbo kahiulamse pui-ngutle. Paniu rengmun npuise madatle, khatdi haise ndanbo kibenglam bambo rengmun npui kumgapjiu pathen-padet ncham kamme.

Siga akhegu kichendungse, tadngut rabo kichense khatdi sibogu n-lungbo kibengdungse kakibo rengmun npui nunglam bambo kumjiu pathen-padetse ncham kamme. Haibo rengmundunggu kichen hinagu kirankidung bamme. Pathen pakhiangnase gaphek makai-mangiu theng-e khatdi padetniu gaphek kariunia paphan di-e.

Siga tadngutbo kichen siniu kakibo kahiu khulam mari khai-e, khatdi siga tadken padbo npui pathen gu singbeng riga kadanbang meng giak khai bamme. Haibo rengmun-ga khangtang rabose phikem tachat bamme.
Sibo piuniu tingbanglam gu rengmun gasu atu n-lungbo ladjanky kahiuga puingut khai-e. Paniu rengmun npuise madatle, khatdi sise kakibo kumjiu pathen-padet ncham kamme.

Siga akhegu kichendungse, siga ngutrabo kichense, khatdi sibogu n-lungbo kibengse madatboga kakibo rengmun npui panai macham kamme. Kama pakhiangnaga kiranki bam kamme, sigasu tadngutbo kichen lung gadi bam kamme. Pathen pakhiangnase gaphek makai-mangiukiu-e khatdi padetniu gaphek kariu nia paphan-e.
Tadngutbo kichenniu ndanbo kahiulam mari khai-e. Tadken padbo maruangbo bam singbeng riga kadanbang meng giakkhai bamme. Haibo rengmun khangtangra phikem tachatle.
Sigasu sibo piuniu atu tingpi lamgu rengmun npuilam puitadle, sise paniu madatle, sichiujiu sise kakibo nai pathen-padet ncham kamme.

Sise kumjiu, akhekygu kichendung, palung lamgu kibengdungse papuan kamkhai bambo, tadngutbo kichen, sigasu sibo wonjenggu kirandung bam kamme. Pathen pakhiangnase gaphek makai-mangiu-e khatdi padetse gaphek kariu nia paphan-e.
Tadngutbo kichense ndanbo ladjanky kahiulam mari khai bamme. Tadken padbo kahiugu kibengdung rigase kadanbang meng giakkhai bamme. Sibo rengmun khangtang rabose phikem tachatle.

Ndanbo kahiu gase tingpilam bambo n-lungbo rengmun npui gase chaky khat thiu taman khai bamme. Siga kichen-ga ngutrabo lengse kahiulam marikhaijiu lekhai bamme, sichiujiu paliuniu rathak mania thiujiu kadkhaira wakhao kashaibo pumse khiulujiu khai bamme.

Siga ngutbo kichen lung gase wakai madai bamme, sise kichen gu pake-nialam khai bamme. Haibo wakaidung rigase paliuniu rathak mania thiujiu rukhaira, maksai nuanleng kadpadra, maksai chapaw-ruibo maniakad leng chakhaose kamshat khai-e.
Kichen lenlam gadi nchambo wakai madai bamme, sise tingpilam bambo rengmun-gu jainia lamse khai bamme.
Sichiujiu rathak mania thiujiu kadkhaibo wakhaodung gikhai rabo bamse wakai tachat bamme: Kichen lungga madai khatdi kahiuga madai bamme.

Rukhaijiu kadkhaiboga thinpiu raleng wakai madai bambose tatu gasu bunglujiu kampadbo-e. Sise tachao khat paphan theng-e, khatdi padet sidi tachao khat paphan di-e, pakodse tachao khat ku-e. Sichiujiu wakhaodung kamshat lujiu kadkhai rabo maniadungse sibo wakaidung riga khai nbamme.
Wakai-khu maguibo pekse chaben ndi-nin khat langga-e. Kadkhai rabo mee pakhiangnase haibo wakaidung riga khai rabo-e.
Sigasu paniu atu n-lungbogu kahiulam puingutle. Siga n-lungbo kahiu jailamse lekhaibo kichen nia bamme, khatniu tingpilam gu rengmun lam, khatniu tingrunlam gu rengmun lam marikhai bamme.
Tingrunlam marikhai bambo kichense Charaky lungga machajiu bambo singkudung leng-e,

khatdi tingpilam marikhaijiu bambo kichense rathakbamga machajiu bambo singkudung leng-e, chiujiu sibo piuniu akhuga dinkhai-e. Singkudung pakhiangnase Zadok kiriang gasu lungkiubo-e; Levi kiphiumai ronna
Sibo piuniu n-lungbo ladjanky kahiuse madatle, sichiujiu sise gaphek ringiuniu magui-e. Charaky haise tingnulam bamme, khatdi sibo masuangga rathakbam khat bamme.
Sigasu paniu atu Charakygu kichen lungga ngutrabo kamun ga pui-ngutle. Paniu kamun madatboga gaphek chinnia di-e, sibo mung kamaguibo kibengse gaphek khat paphan siu-e.
Kichen gu kamun ga khangrabo, tasonse gaphek kariuniu padet thiujiu khatdi gaphek charukniu pasuk thiujiu kamkhai bamme. Ngutrabo bam jainia lamse katiang nia-nai bamme.
Pachaliga, sibo piuniu atu n-gang lanbo kichen, Masanbo Bam ga pui-ngutle. Paniu tadngutbo maruangbo bamse madatle: sise gaphek sum suk-e
khatdi gaphek mangiu di-e, pajai nialamgu kibeng hinase gaphek nia paphan siu-e. Paniu kichen haidi madatle: sise gaphek makai theng-e, khatdi gaphek kariu di-e.
Sigasu paniu n-nungthubo kichen ga ngutle. Sibo bamga tadngutbo maruangbo bamse paniu madatle: sise gaphek khat suk-e, sigasu gaphek sum di-e, jainia lamse gaphek sum paphan siubo singbeng bamme.
Kichense paniu madatle, khatdi sise gaphek kariuniu magui bamme. Haibo kichense n-gangbo kichen suang di-e. Sichiujiu paniu akhuga din-e, “Haise Masan Thubo Bamme,”
Sibo piuniu Charakygu n-lungbo singbeng siuse madatle, sichiujiu sise gaphek sum-e. Haibo singbeng tun-ga, Charaky wonjeng pakhiangnaga, paren-paren thiujiu gaphek nia dibo kasiambo kichendung bamme.

Haibo kichendungse pasat sum thiujiu, pasat khat-khatga kichen samriu-samriu bam kamme. Charaky ndanbo singbeng sat hinase n-hangbo sat suang, nribo sat siniu apiu nkiu-e, sichiujiu nribo kichen situ tungman son makdi suilu raleng-e.

Sichiujiu Charaky singbengse, haichiujiu lenlamsu phuiboga, paphibang gasu paton tangbo pasiuse nchambo kumjiu ngaokhai-e. Charaky ndanbo singbeng tun-ga kichendung rigase tason kadibo nia kamkhai bamme, sichiu khai bambo jengniu n-hangbo sat gasu n-gangbo satlam, sigasu nribo satlamdi tadkhang suilu raleng-e.

Haibo kichengu ndanbo singbengse gaphek nia paphan siu-e; Charaky gasu nribo jailam bambo kichendungga ngutrabo kamun khat bamme, khatdi duimilam bambodung leng kamun khat bamme. Siga alenki khat gaphek nia paphan dibo Charaky maguiboga bambo I ngao-e, sise kadih gasu gaphek sum ku-e sigasu kichendung situ Charaky singbeng siniu kam macham khai-e. Singkudungniu thinpiubo alenki nai kydidung kakgase Charaky det saisuijiu gaphek kariu maruangbo bamkhat bamme.
Charaky gasu tingnulam bambo maruangbo bam pamalanse gaphek atai-mangiu thengbo, khatdi gaphek samriu-mangiu diboky khat bamme; sibo wonjeng pakhiangnagu singbengse gaphek nia paphan sui-e.
Sibo piuniu Charaky lenlamse madatle, sichiujiu sise gaphek ringiu theng-e. Khatdi Charaky sailam maruangbo bam kenpadjiu tingnulam bambo kydigu kadiubo kak sidi gaphek ringiu-e.
Charaky suanglam kenpadbo kadiubo kakse, gen khatlam bambo maruangbo bamse jaojiu, sisedi gaphek ringiu-e.
Paniu tingnulam bambo diboky thense madatboga tadwangbo npui kathengbo jainiase jaojiu, sise gaphek ringiu padle.
Charakygu kichen ga ngutrabo kichen, Masanbo Bam, khatdi Masan Thubo Bam pakhiangnase
kadih satgasu kirandung tangbose tasingniu bengkhai-e. Haibo kirandungse tomsin khaira sui-e.
Charaky gu palungbo singbengse akhampi riga kukhangjiu kadanbangdung khatdi pakan phungbo khaoring mengdung giak khaijiu topsin khai bamme.
Kadanbang nai khaoringdungse, khatniu khat sailam, kichen maguibo npui pathen-palen giak khai bamme. Khaoring hina zuse nia-nia bamme:
chamaina zu siniu kadanbang bambo genlam mari-e khatdi ndongqui zu siniu katambo singbang jaikhat lam mari khai-e.
Singbeng hinase kadih gasu akhamdung rilam khaibo kumgapjiu kamkhai-e.
Masan Thubo Bam gu akham tiangdungse pathen-padet ncham kamme.
Masan Thubo Bamga ngutrabo suang gase tasingniu kamkhaibo rathakbam kumjiu ngaobo khat bamme.
Sise gaphek khat paphan ku-e, sigasu gaphek khat di-e. Kamiktiangdungse, sibo phi khatdi sibogu palen pakhiangnase tasing-niu kamkhai-e. Sibo piuniu akhuga din-e, “Haibo wakaise
Tad taronbo npui gasu ngutjiu Masanbo Bam nguttang suraga kamun khat bamme, sigasu tad taronbo npui gasu Masan Thubo Bam ga nguttang sura gadi kamun khat bamme.
Sibo kamun niase lekhak-dakbo akhamme, sise n-gangga lekhai bamme.
Singbengga giak khaibo kumjiu, Masanbo Bamgu akhamga kadanbang khatdi pakan phungbo khaoringdung mengdungse giak khai bamme. Sibo kichen ga ngutrabo akham lenlamse kapiupekniu topsin khaibo bamme.
Haibo kichen lenlamse kirandung bamme, khatdi singbeng hinase kadanbangniu karukhai bamme.
Sigasu sibo piuniu atu ndanbo kahiulam puitad lujiu Charaky gu tingpilam bambo diboky khat, sigasu Charakygu tingnulam bambo kydi gasu diumakbo bam khatga atu jukhai-e.
Haibo ky kadibose gaphek ringiu theng-e khatdi gaphek makai-mangiu di-e.

Pajai khatlam mari khaibo maruangbo bamse gaphek kariu di-e sise Charaky gu padet saisuijiu bambo-e, khatdi pajai khatlam siniu ndanbo kahiu npuilam mari khai bamme. Sise sat sum thiu khaijiu, sat khatniu sat khat suang thengpad nkiu-e.
Chaky kadibogu tingpilamse maruangbo bam gaphek mangiu dibo khatdi gaphek mangiu thengbo, lenlamsu ngutrabo npuidi bamme.
Diboky gu nribo kichense n-gangbo nai n-hangbo kichen suang siam nkiu-e, sise sailam thiupad san khaibo donniu-e.
Pasat sum bambo kichendung gase chakai kamkhai nbamme, sichiujiu kahiuga bambo kakibo dibo kydung kumjiu katiangniu ponman makge.

N-hangbo satga thiukhaibo dibokygu ndanbo singbenggu pathen phanse gaphek makai mangiuniu thiu matip khai bamme; sigasu kakibo gaphek makai-mangiu lunggase kichendung thiukhai bamme. Nrithubo satse pathen-padet pakhiangna kichendung thiukhai bamme.
Haibo dibokygu pamalan gase, kahiugu singbeng thiu subo bamgase, ndanbo kahiulam ngutrabo npui bamme.
Charaky gasu diumakbo tingrunlamse tamsinbo diboky khat bamme, sise Charaky gasu tingnulam pamalan ga bamme.
Kichendung suang gase maruangbo bamse tingpilam bambo kumgapjiu bamme. Sise pathen padet nchamme, palun machamme, khatdi ngutrabo bamdungse machamme.
Ting-runlam bambo dibokygu kichendung hangga singbeng thiusubo, tingbang jailam pamalan gase nkham khat bamme.
Sibo piu siniu akhuga din-e, “Haibo diboky niase masanne. Sibo lungga
Singkudungniu charaky lungga ngutboga ndanbo kahiulam tadboga, paliuniu
Sibo piuniu Charaky lungse madatloi miboga, paniu atu tingbanglam bambo rengmun gasu puipadle sigasu ndanlamgu pamung maguibose madatle.
Paniu madat riangse thinlujiu tingbang lamse madatle, khatdi sise gaphek 250-ye.
Sigasu paniu tingpi-tingrun, tingbang-tingnu pakhiang madatboga; pagen hinase pathen padet machamjiu gaphek 250 bam kamme,
sijengniu singbeng arop hinase gaphek 250 padle. Singbeng hainiu masanbo nai masan makbo chiubose kam tamsin khai-e.
Sibo piuniu atu tingbanglam mari khaibo rengmun gase puitadle,
siga Israel mai Rawang bambo ran-ranbo kabenbo nbiuse tingbang lamsu wangbo Iniu ngao-e. Tingwang khuanse duipui kasuakbo kumjiu chiupadle, khatdi kadihga ran-ranbo nbiuniu thaoben khai-e.
Haibo madungaose Tingwang niu Jerusalem tu kam mahara wangbo tingga Iniu ngaokhai mibo, Chebar Giuki mungga ngaokhai mibo kumgap-e. Siga Iniu azuse kadihga makhumkiu mi-e.
Ran-ranbo nbiuse tingbanglam bambo rengmun lamsu thaoben wanglujiu Charaky lunglam ngutmide.
Sibo piuse amungga chap bamme, siga Charaky gasu

“Shaisuibo mai yo, haise awangbam si-e. Haiga Iniu amai Israel maidung ruangga lungne, sichiujiu paliutu tingthengjiu mawangne. Israel maidungniu maksai paliu wangdungniu wadaodi chamtan masanbotu thinlujiu, kakibo radungtu kahumbo gasu khatdi paliu wangdunggu kashaibo phawtu baibo gasu kam tania lanlak mide.

Chawangdung siniu paliu wang bamgu kamundung khatdi akham tiangdungse, Charaky maga thiukhai-e, sichiujiu aliu kakga singbeng khat ronna bamme paliuniu kasabo matai marengbo tien hina kamjiu chamtan masanbotu kam tania mide, khatdi haichiujiu Iniu alungpom lamsu paliutu kam maha mibo-e.
Tuhoira paliuniu kakibo radungtu kahumta mirabo-e khatdi paliu wangdunggu kashaibo phawdungtu luthon mirabo-e. Paliuniu haichiu kamsai, paliu ruangga tingthengjiu I lungrabo-e.”
Sichiujiu

Wakamjiu paliuniu tenkhai mibo paliu nuan jengniu mangam sai, Charakygu tenrangse paliu khuga din mawikhai bilo: siga ngutbo wahina lunse khatdi sibogu tacheng tajai hinase dinkhai bilo. Pakhiangnase paliuleng raopad khai bilo sichiu sai paliuniu wahinase macha mawilujiu kamlu bui-e.
Haise Charakygu tacheng-tajai-e. Pawonjengga maguijiu bambo maluangton hai nsiangbo-e khatdi masanbo-e.”

Rathakbam n-hangthubo satse, singbeng phigasu, gaphek khat ku-e. Pachalibo satse pasai lamgu patai gasu pakhiangna mawengbose ntin-katikren ringiu bamme, sise gaphek nia ku-e. Sibo sat sailam bambo sidi pasailam tai gasu kampadjiu mawengbo pakhiangnase ntin-katikren ringiu-e.
Rukhaibo rathak, nribo sat sidi, gaphek nia ku-e. Kamik madaiga machum padbo tonse kakibo ton suang ku-nkiu-e.
Rathakbam ton maguibose, nalam-madai thiujiu, gaphek charuk bam kamme.

N-gangbo satgu mawengbo sidi nalam-madai thiujiu gaphek chinnia-e, siga lenlam padbo pakungse ntin-katikren makai-magiu ku-e. (Tadui npuise ntin-katikren ringiu di-e) Rathak bamga tadkhangbo tasonse tingbang jailam bamme.
Zadok gasu lungkiubo Levi kiphiugu singkudung ronna Iniu bambo bamga wangjiu atu macha rabo-e. Dithubo

Naliuniu sibo zai kasia thinlujiu rathakbam ton-gu pake padbo riga khatdi n-gangbo satgu pake rigase, khatdi patai kamaguibo gase kajin khai rabo-e. Haichiujiu naliuniu rathakbam hai kam masan khai lujiu sise kadpad rabo-e.
Nuan gu thiujiu rathak mania kadpadbo matomchise naliuniu ponlujiu sise Charaky lenlam nkiubo bam khatga rukhai rabo-e.

Pasaibo nai naliuniu pajam-para habo kamichi khat ponlujiu, sise nuan gu rathak mania khat thiujiu pipat rabo-e. Matomchi ponlujiu naliuniu kamkhai mibo kumjiu, sibo zai siniu rathakbamse kam masan rabo-e.
Haise naliuniu kamloi miboga, matomchipoi khat sigasu kamichipoi khat akhuga ponwanglo, sise pajam-para kahabo maliang rabo-e.
Singkudungniu sibo riga matai kajin khai lujiu sise akhuga rathak mania khat thiujiu kadpat rabo-e.

Nuan gu rathak mania thiujiu naikhat khatgu thiujiu jeng chinnia leng naliuniu kami khat-khat, matomchi khat-khat, khatdi midangchi khat-khat pipat rabo-e. Pakhiangnase chakhan-chara kahabo maliang rabo-e.
Singkudungniu rathakbamse jeng chinnia kadpadjiu thinraleng kaden khai rabo-e.

Sibo n-nidkakse loimiboga, singkudung siniu rathakbam riga rujiu kadpatbo khatdi maidungniu chakin thiubogu kadpatbose rathakbam riga pipat khai rabo-e. Sichiu sai Iniu naliu mathiutu alung kim rabo-e. Dithubo
Sibo piuniu atu Charaky wonjenggu tingbang genlam bambo ndanbo rengmun lam jukhai-e. Rengmunse nkham nam nbamme,
siga
Sichiudi mawangbambo chawangnah sira Iniu bambo bamgase ngutlujiu masanbo tatekse tiubo sui-e. Para ngutrabo-e khatdi pamalanbo kichen-ga tangbo tadngut taronbo sui-e.
Sigasu sibo piuniu atu tingpilam bambo rengmun gasu Charaky masuangga puingut khai-e. Iniu phuijiu bamga,
siga
“Kadinpiu makbo Israel maidungniu kamjiu bambo matai marengbo situ Dithubo

Pasa nai tazaise akhuga rathak mania thiujiu pipadboga paliuniu pagi rommakbo sangdiumai, acham majaimak maitu pijiu Charakyga pi ngut khaibo donniu paliuniu a-Raky hai kam tania mide. Amaidungniu haichiujiu matai marengbo ngam kambo gasu paliuniu agu ladriatse kampang mide.
Paliuniu Charakyga masanbo charachenggu tatien thiubo ngamse majai makge, chiudi sibosung paripse sung phungra sangdiumaidungtu pikhai-e.
“Pagi rommakbo sangdiumai khatniudi, acham majai makmai khatniudi, Israel maidung ruangga lungjiu bambo sangdiumai katangdi, pijiu agu Charakyga ngut lakge chiubose Dithubo

Charaky rengmun phuibo gasu khatdi Charaky ngam kambo gasu khatdi Charaky lungga paliuniu atu machabo sui-e. Maidungniu rujiu kadpatbo nai rathakleng pipadbo khaorui-khaonase paliuniu kamshatbo sui-e, khatdi paliuniu maidungtu machajiu paliu ngam kamjiu bamrabo-e.
Chiudi paliuniu Israel maileng charameng kahumbo ngam kam khaibo, khatdi maidungtu pijiu nuan kamra jukhaibo jengniu, paliutu sajai pisiak rabo-e chiujiu Dithubo
Paliuniu singkudung thiujiu atu machabo suimakge maksai masanbo mania mungga wangra, maksai Masan Thubo Bamga ngutbo suimakge. Haise paliuniu matai marengbo ngam kamkhai mibogu sajai si-e.
Paliuniu Charaky lungga kamrabo ngamdungse Iniu paliu khuga pikhaibo-e.”
Dithubo
Paliu ronna Atu kahumbokyga ngutjiu agu rathakbamga macha rabo-e, khatdi Charakyga kahumbo ngamse thin rabo-e.

Paliuniu Charakygu n-lungbo kahiuga ngutra rengmun ngutboga, paliu hai fainoi piurabo-e, paliuniu n-lungbo kahiuga maksai Charaky lungga tatien thiujiu bamboga, chakhaogiuniu dakbo fai-ni khatnadi piumak rabo-e.
Sichiu kamsai paliu kasuangdui padlakge, paliuniu fainoi pikhek khatdi fainoi-nise khai rabo-e, chiudi khen-gakra khai mak rabo-e.

Maidungniu bambo bam ndanbo kahiuga paliuniu tadpad suraga, Charaky lungga tatien thiujiu paliuniu piubo fainise masanbo kichen lungga khaidiak mirabo-e. Paliugu masanbo fai-ni hai maidung khugasu kam taniajiu kam masami makra paliuniu kakibo fainise piumi rabo-e.
Singkudungniu n-lungbo kahiuga tadngut rabo maga jaw wdaodi sakmak rabo-e.
Singkumai khatnadi mainiu tamibo puitu panaoleng lumak rabo-e; paniu Israel mai liuchangpuitu ronna maksai kakibo singkugu kamipuitu panaoleng kurabo-e.

N-gi athao padboga, singkudungniu tathuse agu tacheng-tajai saisuijiu tiakkhai rabo-e. Charachenggu chakhuang-changee hinase paliuniu agu tacheng-tajai saisuijiu thinrabo-e, sigasu paliuniu Tabamnaise masanjiu mania rabo-e.
Patu kam masan lanlubo sai, paniu jeng chinnia khuanlujiu,
sigasu Charaky gu n-lungbo kahiulam tangut lujiu patu kam masan raleng rathak mania pipat rabo-e, chiusai paniu Charaky lungga macha lanbo sui-e. Dithubo
Alin-tara pipatbo, nuan leng pipatbo, khatdi nkiubo pipat hinase singkudunggu tatek thiurabo-e, sichiujiu Israel mai ruangga aleng raipadbo mania hinase paliuniu lurabo-e.

Atiat raibo hinagu withubose khatdi akhuga pipadbo hinase singkudunggu thiu rabo-e. Maidungniu taruak khuakbo wan hinaga, paliuniu khuakpat raithubo taruakse singku leng pipatbo thiujiu pikhai rabo-e, sichiujiu agu thoidamse paliu ky riga bamrabo-e.
Singkudungniu nthingna maksai chakhao paronna kashaibo, maksai pakamainiu kamshatbo khao zanse tiumak rabo-e.”
Kadih haise chaphiu hinagu padam thiujiu njanjiu, damkhatse
Haibo jamse Charaky leng nalam-madai thiujiu kamagui hinase gaphek 250 rabo-e, sise gaphek makai mangiuniu padet thiujiu maruang khai rabo-e.
Haibo dih paphanse, mathakbam kariu nia paphan-gu njan khatse mathakbam mangiuniu padet thiujiu madat patrabo-e, haise Charaky jaojiu, masanthubo bamse jaorabo-e.
Haibo ramse masanbo bam thiujiu, Charaky lungga atu machajiu bambo singkudung leng raipad khaibo si-e. Haibo lungga paliu kydung khatdi Charaky bamleng thiu rabo-e.
Kakibo bamniu Charaky l ungga tatien thiubo Levi maileng thiurabo-e, sibo lungga paliuniu lungrabo leng namdakdung
Masanbo bam mungga katambo bamkhat, mathakbam kariunia paphan thengbo khatdi mathakbam nia paphan dibose namdi khatleng raipad rabo-e, siga Israel maidung ruanggasu lungnibo mainiu lungbo sui-e.

Charamse mawangbambo chawangnah leng raipad khairabo-e. Masanbo bamgu tingnulam ramrai gasu Mediterranean gu tingnulam duipui tangbo rabo-e; khatdi tingbanglam ramrai gasu sujiu sibo kadihgu tingbanglam bambo ramrai mengtang rabo-e, sichiujiu sibo kadihgu pathen hai Israel mai kiphiuga njan khai mibo pathense ncham rabo-e.
Haibo bamse Israel mai dih lungga mawangbambo chawangnah gu padam thiurabo-e, chiusai paniu kahamai dungtu kam kabuak mak rabo-e, chiudi kakibo kadihse Israel mai kiphiugu thiu rabo-e.
Dithubo
“Mai hinaniu chalung masanbo taju nai madatse thinpiu siak rabo-e:
“Kasangbo madat raleng ephah khatdi padui madat raleng bath hai machamme. Kakengkha niu tadbora homer-e.”
homer 1 = ephah 10 = bath 10
“Naliugu paripniu pahangga bambo kum rabo-e:
gerah 20 = shekel 1
shekel 60 = mina 1
“Haibo saisuijiu naliuniu naliugu pipadbo hinase kamkhai rabo-e:
Chabanmiu: 1/60 naliuniu atiat lubo gasu
Thiupen : 1/60 naliuniu atiat lubo gasu
Takisa: 1/100 naliu rasy bangga masibo gasu
(Sise bath niu madatlo: bath 10 = homer 1 = kor 1)
Mily: Mily 200 gasu mily 1
“Naliugu alin-tara pipaddungse phungwang rabo-e, chakhao papum nphuang rukhaira, khatdi chakin thiubogu pipadbodung phungwang rabo-e, chiusai naliu nuandungse kuak khaibi rabo-e. Dithubo
“Naliu dihga bambo maidung hinaniu haibo pipatdungse Israel maitu mawangbambo chawangnah khuga phungwang rabo-e.

Khaorui khaonase rukamra, alin-tara pipatdungse, khatdi jaw liakkhaibose Hiusan gu changeega, Tabamnai, khatdi kakibo khuang-ngeega Israel mainiu pipad khairabo si-e. Paniu nuan gu pipatdung, alin-tara pipatdung, maring rukhaibo pipatdung khatdi chakin thiubogu pipatdungse Israel maidunggu nuan luthonra paniu pikhai rabo-e.”
Dithubo
Singku siniu nuan leng kadpatbo tazai kasiase thinlujiu Charaky akham tiang rigase, khatdi rathakbam pake madai gase, n-nungbo kahiu lam ngutrabo rengmun katiangpi gase manuk khai rabo-e.
Mai khatniu simak dakjiu, maksai pasimak lamsu nuan kammi sai, sikumbo maileng chahiugu jeng chinniabo naise sikum gapjiu kamkhai rabo-e. Haichiujiu naliuniu Charaky hai kam masanjiu bam rabo-e.
Changibogu raithubo naise mawangbambo chawangnah siniu matomchi khat panuan leng khatdi pamaidung nuanleng thiujiu pipat siak rabo-e.
Changeegu jeng chinnia lungga naimachangna paniu
Kadkhai mibo matomchi nai midangchi hinaleng, miusy madatpiang kariu chinnia paphan sigasu takysa madat lah sum tamanjiu pipat khai rabo-e.
Dithubo

Mawangbambo chawangnah siniu ndanbo kahiu gase rengmun npui mungga bambo kichen-ga ngutlujiu khatdi singku siniu rathak maniase rukhaibo tingga khatdi chakin thiubogu pipatdungse kadkhaijiu bamboga rengmun tiang munnga chapbam rabo-e. Sibo rengmun-ga paniu kahum siakrabo-e sichiujiu tadpad lanrabo-e. Rengmunse chawan tangbo nkham mak rabo-e.
Tabamnai machang khatdi Hiusan Ngee nai machangna mai hinase rengmun masuangga kinkiujiu
“Tabamnaise chawangnah siniu rathak mania thiujiu rukhaira, milypoi charuk khatdi midangchi khat pajam-para kahabo
Midangchi hinaga paniu miusy madatpiang kariu chinnia paphan, khatdi milypoi hinagu paniu pikhai nibose phungwang rabo-e. Haikumbo alin-tara pipatbo hinagu paniu takysa madatlah sum phungwang rabo-e.
Hiusan Ngeega paniu kabuichipoi khat, milypoi charuk, khatdi midangchi khat, pakhiangna chakhan-chara kahabo pikhai rabo-e.

Kabuichi hinagu khatdi midangchi hinagu pipad rabose miusy madatpiang kariu chinnia paphan rabo-e, sigasu milypoi hinagu pipad rabo sira chawangnahniu pinibose pirabo-e. Haikumbo miusygu alin-tara hina gara takysa madat lah sum pipat taman rabo-e.
Chawangnah siniu rengmun npaigu tadngutbo kichense phutlujiu paniu ngutbo npuilamsu tadpat rabo-e.
“Chakhuang-changee khatga maidungniu
Maidungniu wangboga chawangnahse tadngut rabo-e, sichiujiu maidungniu tadpat miboga padi tadpad rabo-e.

Khumkibo tingmik naira khatdi chakhuang changee gara alin-tara pipadbose madatpiang kariu chinnia paphan nai kabuichi maksai midangchi hinagu thiujiu khatdi kahumra wangbo paniu milypoi hinagu pipad nibose phungwang rabo-e. Haikumbo alin-tara pipadbo hina gura takysa madat lah sum pikhai rabo-e.
“Mawangbambo chawangnah siniu
