Takhui taju niadi takysa madatlah khat jaojiu takhuiga ja-aruangra nsuan machang pipad rabo-e. Haise tingthengjiu
Milypoi, takhui, khatdi takysa haidungse tingthengjiu nsuan machang pipad rabo-e.”
Dithubo

Chiudi mawangbambo chawangnah siniu pagu kadih khat, patien thiujiu bambo mai khat khuga pikhai sai, Pimalanbo Takum wang lanboga sise chawangnahgu mania thiulan mirabo-e. Sise pagu-e, sise panahdung nai paleng ronna tingthengjiu thiurabo-e.

Mawangbambo chawangnah siniu maidunggu maniase lumak rabo-e. Paniu panahleng kadih khat piboga paleng pikhai mibo kadih gasu pikhai rabo-e, sichiujiu paniu amaidung khat tudi paliugu kadih lulubo gasu kam chariu mak rabo-e.”

Sigasu sibo piuniu atu n-lungbo kahiugu tingrunlam bambo khatdi tingpilam marikhai bambo kichendungga ngutrabo rengmun mungga puingut khaide. Haidungse singkudung leng masanbo kichendung-e. Paniu atu kichendunggu tingnulam bambo pabam khatlam siokhai lujiu din-e,

“Haise nuanleng rathak mania pipatbo maksai chapaw ruilanbo pipad thiujiu pikhaibo meese singkudungniu langbo khatdi pipadbo takhuise khuakrabo bamsi-e, sichiujiu masanbose ndanbo kahiulam ponpadbose maidungtu kam masamak raleng-e.”
Sigasu paniu atu ndanbo kahiulam puipad lujiu kamik madai hinaga siambibo kahiu, gaphek makai thengbo khatdi gaphek kariu mangiu dibo pijiu ngaolen khai-e.
Pakhiangnase tatuniu beng magui khai bamme, sigasu singbeng tun-ga n-mangbamdung jaojiu thiukhai bamme.
Sibo piuniu akhuga din-e, “Maidungniu rathak mania thiujiu pipadbose, charaky machamaidungniu langbo alangtiubo kichendung-e.”

Sigasu sibo piuniu atu Charaky gasu tingpilam bambo rengmun lam puipad lujiu khatdi tingbanglam marikhaibo rengmun gase atu pijiu tad magui khai-e. Rengmun gu tingrun lamsu singgiu khat luangpad bamme.

Pagu madatriang thinlujiu sibo piuniu tingnulam luangkiu bambo singgiuse tingbanglam jai madatboga sise gaphek kai mangiu bamdiboga, sibo singgiu gasu tadpad raleng atu din-e. Taduise a-mikraga ronna khangtang bamniu-e.
Sigasu paniu kakibo gaphek kai mangiu madatle, siga taduise atapuga khangtang-e. Kakibo gaphek kai mangiu madatsan kiuboga, taduise akhen-ga khangtang-e.
Paniu gaphek kai mangiu madat lanboga, sigara singgiuse sukchang sukmibo jengniu sise I kenpad ngam lulak mide. Sise sukju mibo jengniu jiapadbo makjiu tadken padra kung mide.
Paniu akhuga din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, pakhiangna haise simawi lulo.”
Sigasu sibo piuniu atu singgiu kunglam puipad khaibi-e,
khatdi Iniu siga padboga sibo singgiu kung jai nialamse singbang kengchang kengjiu bambo Iniu ngao-e.

Paniu akhuga din-e, “Haibo duise tingbanglam bambo dih katang khatdi tingnulam kiujiu Jordan Ramjeng gasu Kashaibo Duipui tangbo luangkiu bamme. Sise Kashaibo Duipuiga luangwangboga, duipuigu mataidui situ masanbo duiniu luangsim mide.

Singgiu siniu luangkhai khaibo jailamse, chakhaodung khatdi chakha pajat pakhiangna bammi rabo-e, Singgiu siniu Duipuigu tadui situ kam masan khai-e, sibo singgiu luangkhai khaibo jailamse, karingbo phungwang-e.

Engedi Duipin gasu Eneglaim gu Duipin npui katheng-kadun duipui kungga chakha khamai bam rabo-e, sichiujiu siga paliuniu paliugu alangse kam masangra phukhai rabo-e, siga Mediterranean Duipui ga bambo kumjiu chakha pajat-pajat kengjiu daorabo-e.
Chiudi kadih bekga khatdi pamungga ajai poi bambo dui sira masan ngamlu lakge. Sise matai padbo kajaikhun thiujiu bammi rabo-e.

Singgiu kung jai nialamse katiu pira singbang jat hina lung bamme. Paliu niwse wadaodi kuimakge, khatdi sise wadaodi pasy masisao makge. Sise chahiu machangna kasanbo rasy masi rabo-e, palamra sise Charaky gasu luangpadbo dui siniu kajin khaijiu bambo-e. Singbangdung siniu katiu-kasak pirabo-e, khatdi paniwdung siniu thiuniu maidungtu wikhai rabo-e.”
Dithubo
“Iniu haibo kadihse naliu paopeh maidunggu thiura pine chiujiu ladrian tanjiu thiukhai mibo si-e; tuhoira naliu ruangga njan macham lulo.
“Tingpilam bambo ramrai siniu Mediterranean Duipui gu tingbang lamsu sujiu Hethlon namdi lam, Hamath Pass lam, Zedad gu namdilam,
Berothah nai Sibraim gu namdidung lam (Paliu hai Damascus wangdih luongriang nai Hamath wangdih kakga bambo si-e), sigasu Ticon namdi lam (Hauran wangdih gu ramrai mungga bambo) tangbo bamme.
Haichiujiu tingpi lamgu ramrai hai Mediterranean gu tingpi lamsu sujiu Enon namdi tangjiu Damascus luongrianggu ramrai tangbo jaojiu khatdi Hamath Pass gasu sibogu tingpilam tangjiu bambo si-e.

“Tingbang lamgu ramraise tingrunlam kiujiu Damascus nai Hauran luongriang kakga pabam khat gasu sujiu tingnulam bambo Israel maigu kadih nai tingbanglam bambo Gilead kakga Jordan Giu niu ramrai thiujiu, Kashaibo Duipui rigasu Tamar mengtangbo si-e.
“Tingnu lamgu ramrai siniu tingrun-tingnu lamsu sujiu Tamar gasu Kadesh Meriba gu ndiu-bek, khatdi tingpi-tingnu gu Egypt mai ramrai saisuijiu Mediterranean Duipui tangboga bambo si-e.
“Tingnu lamgu ramraise Mediterranean hainiu ramrai thiujiu, tingbanglam khangjiu Hamath Pass gu tingnulam khangtangbo bam si-e.
“Haibo ramse naliugu chaphiu ruangga njan khailo;

haise tingthengjiu naliugu thiurabo-e. Naliu ruangga lungjiu bambo sangdiumaidung khatdi haigasu manalubo nahdung niudi naliuniu kadih njanboga paliu dam lurabo-e. Paliu haitu Israel maigu dihkhunmai thiujiu lukhai rabo-e, khatdi Israel mai kiphiu damse lura paliuniu taden thonjiu lurabo-e.
Sangdiumai lungjiu bambo mai siniu paliuniu lung aruangjiu bambo maidung kiphiugu padamse lurabo-e. Dithubo

Charamgu tingpilam ramraise tingbang lamsu sujiu Mediterranean Duipui gasu Hethlon namdi lam, Hamath Pass lam, Enon namdi lam, Damascus nai Hamath wangdih kakga ramrai tangbo si-e. Chaphiu hinaniu charam hai tingbang lamgu ramrai gasu sujiu tingnulam dipadjiu Mediterranean Duipui tangbo pahangga bambo saisuijiu tingpilamsu tingrunlam tangbo si-e:
Dan
Asher
Naphtali
Manasseh
Ephraim
Reuben
Judah

Pachalibo kadih jamse nkiubo thiujiu thinpiura raipad khairabo-e. Haise tingpi nai tingrun lamsu padetse mathakbam kariu nia paphan rabo-e, khatdi pathense tingbang lamsu tingnulam kiphiudung khuga pikhai mibo bam macham saisui rabo-e. Charakyse haibo bam lungga bamrabo-e.
Haibo bamgu n-gang gase nkiubo bam pathenniu mathakbam kariu nia paphan khatdi padetniu mathakbam kariu padbose
Singkudungniu paliu damse haibo masanbo bamgase lurabo-e, paliu damse tingbang lamsuniu tingnulam madatjiu mathakbam kariunia paphan khatdi tingpilamsu tingrun lamsu, mathakbam mangiu rabo-e.

Haibo masanbo bamse Zadok gasu lungkiubo singkudung leng-e. Paliuniu malumjiu atu macha-e khatdi kakibo Levi kiphiu mainiu kambo kumjiu khatdi kakibo Israel maidungniu kamaobo kamboga paliu suijao makge.
Haijengniu Levi kiriangmaigu nkiubo bamse pachaliga paliugu thiurabo-e, khatdi sise wahinagu masanthubo thiu rabo-e.

Levi kiriang gasu singkudung lengdi tingrun lamse nkiubo bamkhat bam rabo-e. Haisidi tingbang lamsu tingnulam madatjiu mathakbam kariu nia paphan rabo-e khatdi tingpilamsu tingrunlamse mathakbam mangiu rabo-e,
khuga kadpatbo bamse kadih pabam hina gasu withubo bamse rabo-e, sichiujiu sise wakamdi jonmak rabo-e, maksai nkhiak mak rabo-e, maksai kakimai khugadi pikhai mak rabo-e. Haise masanbo-e khatdi

Nkiubo bamgu masiakbose, pathenniu mathakbam kariu nia paphanne khatdi padetniu mathakbam nia paphanne, sise masan makge, chiudi sise maidung mathiuniu piura leng-e. Paliuniu siga lungsui-e, khatdi charamse thinpiu sui-e. Namdise sibo n-gang lan-ga bamrabo-e,
khatdi sise pathen-padet nchamjiu, nalam-madai thiujiu gaphek 2, 250 bambo-e.
Namdi maguibo padetse maruangbo bam gaphek 125 dibo bam rabo-e.

Namdi thiu lubosai masiak khai bambo kadihse masanbo bamgu tingrun ganiu sujiu—pathense mathakbam mangiu-e khatdi padetse mathakbam nia paphan-e, sise tingbanglam bamme khatdi tingnulam bambo siniu pathense mathakbam mangiu-e khatdi padetniu mathakbam nia paphan-e—sise namdiga lungjiu bambo maidungniu tatien tenrabo luzam thiurabo-e.
Namdiga lungbo mai chaphiu kata-kadao gasu tadi, sibo ramse tenbo sui-e.

Khatdi kadih n-gangga raipad tam nbambo pabam hinase madatboga pathen-padet machamjiu nalam-madai thiujiu mathakbam kariu-je-nia paphan bam kamme, khatdi sise namdiniu lungkham mibo bamse jao taman rabo-e.

Haibo bamgu tingbanglam khatdi tingnulam Charaky bamse, singkudunggu kadih, Levi maigu kadih, masiakbo ramse mawangbambo chawangnah gu-e. Sise tingbanglamniu sujiu Mediterranean Duipui lam padtangjiu, tingpilam Judah mai gu kadihniu pamalan thiukhai-e, khatdi tingrunlam Benjamin maigu kadih niu pamalan thiujiu bambo si-e.

Haichiujiu nkiubo kadihgu tingnulamse, masiak bambo kiphiudungniu pabam khat khat tingbanglam bambo ramrai gasu sujiu tingnulam Mediterranean Duipui mengtangjiu, tingpilamsu tingrunlam bambo pahangga bambo si-e:
Benjamin
Simeon
Issachar
Zebulun
Gad

Gad kiphiu leng pikhai mibo kadihgu tingrunlam, ramraise tingrun-tingnu lamsu sujiu Tamar gasu Kadesh gu ndiu-bek, khatdi tingpi-tingnulam Egypt maigu ramrai saisui padjiu Mediterranean Duipui tangbo si-e.
Dithubo
Namdigu singbeng palen madaigu pathen pakhiangnase gaphek 10,080 padle. Namdi zanse tuhoi gasu, “Haiga

Rapiu niu suikhaijiu chawang Jehoiakim tu paniu min lude khatdi charakygu chakhiu-chalandung kasiadi sutlude. Khangsia tudi paniu kavangleng minlujiu Babylon ga bambo paraky lam puiwang mide, khatdi sutlubo chakhiu-chalan hinase parakygu wakhaikiga phungwang khai mide.

Chawang siniu pagu chakampaodunggu papee Ashpenaz khuga chamtan pijiu kavang leng minwangbo Israel mai rong gasu chawang kikhunmai khatdi kadi-kathengmai kikhun gasu chabonmai khangsiatu kada raleng dinkhaide.

Paliu hai paliu zu, paliu lun wirabo-e, ningting-charak rabo-e, wa kati-mawi kalumai, wasinuang mai, khatdi paliu pumga pajam-para kahamai thiurabo-e, sichiujiu paliu hai chawanggu ladjankyga thinpiu kasuimai thiurabo-e. Ashpenaz niu paliutu Babylon mai lad kenra khatdi raora katikhai rabo-e.

Paliutu naimachangna chawanggu ladjankyga bammaitu katiu-kasak pibo kumjiu pirabo-e chiujiu chawangniu chamtan pikhai-e. Haichiujiu takum sum kati-alilubo sai paliuse chawang suangga wang chap rabo-e.
Paliu ruang gasu kadalumai sira Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael khatdi Azariah paliu-e, paliu mathiuse Judah kiphiu gasu-e.
Chakampaogu papee siniu paliu zan kasanbo, Belteshazzar, Shadrach, Meshach khatdi Abednego chiujiu mathak khaide.
Daniel niu chawanggu ladjan kyga katiu-kasak tiu-sakjiu chara-cheng gasu patu kam taniami makra chaplujiu, patu nkha khaira Ashpenaz khuga khengsude,
siga Tingwang niu Daniel tu lungsa khaira Ashpenaz khuga kamkhai bide.

Chiudi Ashpenaz niu chawangtu pingbo jengniu Daniel khuga din-e, “Naliuniu tiu-sakra chawangniu chapkhai mibo-e, sichiujiu naliuniu kakibo chabon maidung kumjiu naliu pum wibose ngaopad maksai, paniu atu kamshat mibo sui-e.”
Siga Daniel niu patu khatdi pakamai khangsumtu khuanra Ashpenaz niu khai nbambopiu khuga tadlujiu dinsude.
Paniu din-e, “Jengriu aliutu madiujiu, aliuniu tiura chapiuniw chaganniw khatdi sakra tadui nakha pikhailo.
Sichiujiu chawanggu ladjan kygu katiu-kasak, tiu-sak bammai chabon maidungtu nai aliutu kadajiu saoniu wi-nkiulo chiubo nang phui kada matailo.”
Jengriu leng paliutu madiura paniu suikhaide.
Pawanse tangjiu paliutu phuiboga paliu hai chawanggu ladjan kyga katiu-kasak, tiu-sak bammai suang, paliu pum wi-nkiubo khatdi tan-nkiubo ngao padle.
Sijengniu sibonai gasu paliuleng chawangniu pikhaibo sung chapiuniw chaganniw pikhaira paliutu khuanpiu siniu suikhaide.
Tingwang niu chabonmai khang madai situ ariakgu tasi-ningting khatdi wa makum kasibo khaoti pikhaide. Sibo riga paniu Daniel tu madungao nai chamang chalipadra ningting pikhai bide.
Chawangniu riatkhaibo takum sum sailam Ashpenaz niu chabonmai mathiu situ Nebuchadnezzar khuga puiwang khaide.
Chawangniu paliu mathiutu npao sude siga Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael khatdi Azariah paliuniu kakimai suang nkiujiu palung pikim khaide. Sijengniu paliu hai chawanggu ladjankyga bammai ruangga jaomide.
Wajiukha kakungbo ladlui chawangniu maniuboga maksai kakung-kungbo padboga, haimai khang madai hainiu pagu kadihga kakibo sailad kasimai maksai chamik thao kadadmai suang silon kariu nkiu-e.
Daniel hai Babylon mai kadihtu Persia mai wangdipiu Cyrus niu ngamlubo katang chawanggu ladjankyga bamkhangbo-e.
Nebuchadnezzar niu chawang thiukhangbo paniabo kumga paniu pamang khat mande. Haisiniu palung chun kam chariuju mijiu pah jipkiu lulak mide,

sijengniu pamangse din madu khaira paniu pagu sailad kasimai, chamik thao kadadmai, tathoi kasimai khatdi tasiam kasimaidungtu wangra kukhaide. Paliuniu chawang khuga wangbo tingga paniu paliu khuga din-e,
“Iniu manbo amang jengniu alung chariu-e. Sibo rambase Iniu sini-e.”
Paliuniu chawangtu Aramaic mai lad

Chawangniu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliuniu amang sidi dinrabo-e; khatdi paramba sidi akhuga dinkhai rabo-e chiujiu Iniu alung gasu chapkhai mibo-e. Naliuniu din ngamlaksai, naliu ncheng hinase tatap-tap lujiu, naliu ky hina sidi Iniu kam mahami rabo-e.

Chiudi naliuniu chamangse khatdi parambase dinpad ngamsai, Iniu naliuleng kalen ram-mai nai chakhuang thiukhaibo siniu tathuon thiujiu pikhai birabo-e. Tuhoira, chamangse khatdi parambase degulo chiubo akhuga dinkhai sulo.”
Paliuniu chawangtu paokak lan-e, “Pakendibo piuniu chamangse dinkhai sai aliuniu parambase dinkhai rabo-e.”
Siga chawang siniu pakhuan tanjiu dinsude, “Haise Iniu machunbo kumgap rabo-e! Iniu alung chapmibose naliuniu ngaolubo jengniu pawan haitu lumathengra kam bambo-e,

naliuniu chamangse dinpad maksai naliu mathiu sajaise machamjiu daorabo-e, pawan siniu wa kam kali wang mirabo-e chiujiu naliuniu maningbo jengniu aratbo chamse akhuga dinra naliu ronna suikhaibo-e. Chamangse degulo chiubo dinkhailo, sichiusai naliuniu parambadi din-ngamlu rabo-e chiubo Iniu simi rabo-e.”

Ladpimaidung siniu paokakge, “Pakendibo piuniu sinibose degulo chiujiu din-ngamlura kadihpiriga mai khatnadi ha-e. Dithubo khatdi tanthubo wang khatnakha niudi haikumbo cham hai pagu sailad kasimai, maimik thao kadadmai, khatdi tasiam kasimai khuga maniu matai makge.
Pakendibo piuniu maniubo haira kungju-e, sichiujiu haise chara niu makbo mai khatniudi sitanglu lakge, sichiujiu paliura chamaina ruangga lungmakge.”
Siga chawangse chami katao kum palung pomsu mide, sichiujiu Babylon ga bambo chawanggu ladpimai hinatu kamshat mira chamtan pikhaide.
Si-chiujiu Daniel nai pakahmaidung tudi jaojiu paliu mathiutu kamshat mira chamtanse kamkhai mide.
Siga chamaitu kamshatra chamtan pikhai mibo chawanggu akhepi Arioch khuga Daniel niu tadlujiu,
pagu ladkeng kadasui lujiu, dekamjiu chawangniu haikumbo kapingbo chamtanse pikhai jiulo chiubo maniu sude. Siga degu padmibo gulo chiubose Arioch niu Daniel khuga dinkhai bide.
Siga Daniel niu tadmengnuang lujiu pawan pikhai sanra, sichiusai paniu chawang khuga chamang rambase dinlura chawangniu suikhaira khenglude.
Daniel niu chakyga wanglujiu pakamai Hananiah, Mishael khatdi Azariah paliu khuga degu padmibo gulo chiubo dinkhaide.
Paliuniu tinggen Rawang khuga lungsiat khengjiu kakungbose paliu khuga pisikhaira sichiujiu paliutu Babylon ga bammai kakibo ladpimaidungtu nai tamanjiu kamshat mimak raleng paliu khuga dinkhai bide.
Sibo nai nchunsiak kakungbo guse Daniel khuga madungao khatga lenkhaide, siga paniu tinggen Rawang tu thuonjiu haichiu dinsude:
“Tingwang haira ningting-e khatdi pumtan bamme!
Tingtheng tingthengjiu patu thuonlo.
Paniu pawan nai pakentu thinman bambo-e;
paniu maidungtu chawang pithiu khai-e khatdi lupad khai-e;
paniu ningting-tasi pikhaibo-e.
Kasukboga khatdi nbaiboga bambose paniu madukhai-e,
tamiubo gase degu bamlo chiubo paniu si-e,
khatdi papumsiaktu kabenboniu magui bamme.
Apao-apeh Rawang yo, Iniu natu thuon-e, khatdi chakhuang thiu-e.
Nangniu atu ningting nai pumtan pikhai-e; arathoise nangniu paokakkhai bide,
khatdi chawang khuga degu dinralo chiubo aliu khuga lenkhai bide.”

Sijengniu chawanggu ladpimaitu kamshatra chamtan pikhaibo Arioch khuga Daniel niu tadlujiu dinsude. Paniu pakhuga din-e, “Paliutu kamshatmi tulo. Atu chawang khuga puiwang khailo, sichiusai Iniu pamang rambase pakhuga dinkhaibi rabo-e.”
Sibo wansiakga Arioch niu Daniel tu chawang Nebuchadnezzar masuangga puiwang lujiu chawang khuga din-e, “Pakendibopiu namang rambase dinkhaira Iniu Jehudi maigu kavang rong gasu mai khattu daolude.”
Chawang siniu Daniel (Belteshazzar chiujiudi kubo) khuga din-e, “Iniu manbo mangse khatdi sibo rambase nangniu akhuga dinkhai ngamlu rama?”
Daniel niu paokakge, “Pakendibopiu yo, sise din ngamlura tasiam kasimai, chamik thao kadadmai, sailad kasimai, maksai chagan ariak kasimai khatnadi ha-e.

Chiudi kakungbo guse madulenra tinggen lam Charawang khat bamme. Pakendibopiu yo, pasai wangrabo lamga paniu nakhuga lenkhaibo-e. Tuhoira Iniu nakhuga chamangse dinkhaijiu, nangniu jipbamboga ngaobo madungaose dinkhai bine.
“Pakendibopiu niu jipbamboga, pasai donleng nangniu mankhai mibo-e; kakungbo madukhaibo Tingwang niu degu padralo chiubo nakhuga lenkhaibo-e.
Tuhoira haibogu kakungbose akhuga lenkhai-e, haise Iniu mai khangkhat suang ningtingbo donniu makge, chiudi pakendibopiu, nangniu namanggu rambase silujiu nakhuga wangrabose silu raleng-e.
“Pakendibopiu yo, nagu madungao gase charameng kadibo khat nasuangga chapbambo nangniu ngao-e, sibo ramengse ran-ranbo khatdi benbo-e, sichiujiu sise phuipingbo khatle.
Sibo peese withubo kachia giniu, paga nai pa-npomse rangkang giniu, pakhen nai pahingpomse tanaaginiu giniu;
pangense chaginiu khatdi paphipase kasianiu chagi kasianiu chagamniu damme.
Sise nangniu phuijiu bamboga mai khatniudi thinmakjiu chakhao khat gasu tatukang kadibo khat taluiwang sibo chagi nai chagam niu dambo wameng tuse kaditaojiu sise kam paroi-soi mide.

Sibo wan gase sibo gi, chagam, tanaagi rangkanggi khatdi kachia ramengse niak paroi-soi mide, sichiujiu kariak tingdao asaiphungga tabut padbo kum mide. Pakhiangna situ tingkainiu hunthon mide, chiudi tatukangse dikhangjiu maluong khat thiujiu kadihpiri pakhiangnatu gomnam mide.
“Chamangse haisi-e. Tuhoira Iniu pakendibopiu khuga haibo rambase dinkhai bine.
Pakendibopiu yo, nang hai chawangmai mathiu rong gasu dithubo si-e. Tinggen Rawang siniu natu pumtan, jengtan, khatdi chakhuang thiubo pikhaijiu natu dithubo wang pithiu khai bibo-e.
Kadihpiriga lungbo mai hina, chakhao-thingna hina riga mawangra natu paniu kamkhaibo-e. Nangra kachiagu papee si-e.
‘Nahangga katambo wangdih bamkha-e, chiudi nakumjiu ditang makge, sibo saidi pasumbo, tanaagi gu wangdih bamjiu kadihpiri pakhiangnatu mawang bambo-e.
Sibo saidi pamadaibo wangdih, chagi kumjiu katanbo, wahinatu kampangjiu kam maratap-tap mirabo-e. Haisiniu chagi kumjiu karaibo wangdihdung situ kadipet lujiu kam marami rabo-e.

Nangniu paphipa nai pa-njung situ kasianiu chagi, kasiase chagamniu kambo ngao-e, Haibo ramba sira wangdih situ njanpad mirabo-e chiubo-e. Sise chagi nai chagam siniu dam aruang khai mibo kumjiu chagigu pumtan tamnakhara bamsu rabo-e.
Pa njungse kasianiu chagi kasiase chagamniu kambo ramba sira wangdih kasiase tan, kasiase son-ye chiubo gu-e.

Nangniu chagi situ chagamniu kam aruang khaibo ngao-e. Haibo ramba sira wangdihgu mawangpao mai siniu tanao-tanah magiangbo gasu paliu kikhundungtu ju-aruang khaibo si-e, chiudi chagi siniu chagam situ aruang silakbo kumjiu paliuse aruang silak mide.

Sibo mawang paodung ken-gase tinggen Rawang niu chawang kadih khat thiusu khaine sise wadaodi halakge. Haisitu mai khatniudi ngamlu lakge. Chiudi wangdih hina situ ngamkam lujiu, sise tingtheng bammi rabo-e.

Mai khatniudi thinmakjiu chakhao-ren khat gasu tatukang khat talui kiujiu chaginiu, tanaaginiu giniu chagamniu, rangkang giniu khatdi kachia giniu kambo rameng situ kampang mibo nang ngao-e. Pasai lam degu padralo chiubose kadibo Rawang siniu pakendibopiu khuga dinbambo-e. Nangniu dekumbo mang mansiak kami gulo chiubose Iniu nakhuga dinkhaibo-e, khatdi majibo rambase dinkhai bibo-e.”
Chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu kadihga makhum kiujiu, Daniel khuga charathiu khaira khatdi wa kad khaira chamtan pikhai sude.
Chawangniu din-e, “Na-Rawang hai chara rong gasu dithubo-e, chawangdung gu Rapiu-e khatdi kakungbo guse madukhaibo piu-e. Haise Iniu si-e, chiubora nangniu kakungbo gu haisi dinlen khai ngamme.”
Sichiu lujiu paniu Daniel tu kakubo bamse pikhaijiu paman kakungbo kalendung pikhaide, khatdi Babylon luongriang hina thinjiu chawangtu ladpimai mathiupi pithiu khaide.
Daniel niu khengbo jengniu Shadrach, Meshach, khatdi Abednego tu chawangniu Babylon luongriangga papaomai thiura pikhaide; sichiujiu Daniel sira chawanggu ladjankyga bamjut-jutle.
Chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu kachia rameng pakodniu tachao 60 kubo khatdi tachao 6 dibo khat Babylon luongriangga bambo Dura ramjengga thiu khaide.

Sigasu chawangniu pagu chakampaodung hina, chawangnahdung, dihthin paodung, dihthinpao-nkhadung, nkiubo chakampaodung, nbungridung, ladjanpaodung, ladjanpao-nkhadung khatdi luongriang hinagu chakampao hinatu wang maduira chamtan pikhaide. Chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu thiukhaibo charameng situ kadpatboga paliu mathiu wangkam rabo-e.
Charameng situ kadkhaira chakampaodung hainiu wang pasuangga chap magui suboga,
chakhuan katanbo khatniu senjiu din-e, “Jat hina, chakik hina khatdi chakhuan hina yo!

Naliuniu make khuan chiusune sibo sai nthiam- tara khuan khatdi nking khuan chiusune khatdi katam-tambo bungra hina mara aruang sune. Sichiujiu chalui khuanse chiugap dasai naliu mathiu hai Chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu thiukhaibo kachia rameng masuangga makhum kiujiu kahum rabo-e.
Mai khat kumboniu makhum kiujiu kahum maksai patuse minlujiu tao bambo n-mangga thonkhai mirabo-e.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu bungra hina khuan chiuboga, jat hina, chakik hina khatdi chakhuan hinase makhum kiujiu chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu thiukhaibo kachia-rameng haitu kahum sude.
Jehudi maidung situ din masarabo guse tuhoira Babylon mai khangsianiu kamsude.
Paliuniu chawang Nebuchadnezzar khuga din-e, “Pakendibopiu yo, tingtheng ringjiu bamlo!
Chaluise thiu sugap dasai mai hinaniu makhum kiujiu kachia rameng situ kahum rabo-e chiujiu paken dibopiuniu chamtan pikhai mibo-e,
siga mai khat kumboniu makhum kiujiu sise kahummak maitura taobambo n-mangga thonkhai mirabo-e chiujiu chamtan pikhai mibo-e.

Jehudimai ruanggasu nangniu Babylon kadihtu phuira chiujiu pikhaibo Shadrach, Meshach khatdi Abednego paliuniu pakendibopiu nagu chamtanse majai makge. Paliuniu naratu kahum makge, maksai nangniu thiukhaibo ramengga makhumkiu makge.”
Siga chawangse palung pomchang pomjiu simai khangsum situ pakhuga puiwangra chamtan pide.
Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Shadrach, Meshach khatdi Abednego yo, naliuniu ara situ kahumra khatdi Iniu thiukhaibo ramengga makhumkiu-kiu makge chiubo hai kachangbo ma?

Sichiu-ye sai tuhoira make khuan khatdi nthiam-tara khuan khatdi bungra hina marabo khuan chiu dasai, makhum kiujiu charameng situ kahum lulo. Naliuniu sise suimakge sai taobambo n-mangga naliutu thonkhai nongmi rabo-e. Naliutu gukhai ngambo chara bamme chiubo naliu maning jiuma?”
Shadrach, Meshach khatdi Abednego niu paokakge, “Pakendibopiu yo, aliuniu aliu ronna nta lakge.
Aliuniu machabambo Rawang siniu aliutu taobambo n-mang gasu khatdi nagu pumtan gasu gukhai ngamsai gukhai rabo-e.
Chiudi paniu gukhai mak bamtadi, aliura pakendibo piuniu thiukhaibo kachia rameng khatdi nara situ aliura makhum kiujiu kahum silakge.

Siga Nebuchadnezzar hai palung pombo siniu pazu heng-maren lujiu Shadrach, Meshach khatdi Abednego tu phuisude. Sichiujiu n-mangse palunlung thad gasu thiulon chinnia thiusanra paniu chamtan pikhaide.
Khatdi pagu riphenmai ruanggasu tanthubo mai siniu khangsum situ ratlujiu taobambo n-mang gase thonkhai mira chamtan pikhaide.
Sijengniu paliutu paliu ntiang-taronbo, paliu pirun khatdi paliu pon pakhiangna piukhai lujiu khatdi ratman lujiu paliutu taobambo n-mang gase thonkhai mide.
Tuhoira chawang siniu thiuchang thiura kamlo chiujiu chamtan katanbo pikhaibo jengniu paliu khangsumtu n-mangga ponkhaibo akhemaidung situ mibon siniu rushat mide.
Siga Shadrach, Meshach khatdi Abednego paliu tura ratman palun lujiu, taojiu bambo mibon n-mangga thonkhai mide.
Simakjingjiu Nebuchadnezzar se pasuang hajiu pangen chakukhang mide. Pagu chakampaodung khuga paniu maniu-e, “Khangsumtu ratlujiu taobambo n-mangga thonkhai mibo makma?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Yo, pakendibopiu yo, aliuniu sichiu khai mibo-e.”
Paniu maniu-e, “Sichiusai, chamijiu gase Iniu dekamjiu khang madai tad-taweng bambo ngaojiulo? Paliutu ratmakge, khatdi paliutu wadi kam masa makbo jai kumjiu ngao-e khatdi pamadaibo piuse maza khat
Sijengniu taobambo n-mang munggase Nebuchadnezzar niu khanglujiu senpad sude, “Tanthubo Rawang vangdung, Shadrach, Meshach khatdi Abednego yo! Npadlo!” Siga paliu npadnuang mide.

Chaminiu wadi kam masakhai makbo khangsum situ phuira chawangnahdung, dithinpaodung, dithinpao-nkhadung khatdi chakampaodung hina wang madui sude, paliu thamdi rumakge, paliu fainidi rumakge khatdi paliu khuga mikhut rimdi manam makge.

Chawang siniu din-e, “Shadrach, Meshach khatdi Abednego Rawang tu thuonlo! Patu malumjiu khatdi machajiu bambo maidung situ rankhai raleng paniu pagu maza langkiu khaibi-e. Paliu ra makbo kakibo ratu makhumkiu kahum makra paliuniu agu chamtan piumakjiu paliu ringting pondeng kamigu-e.

“Sichiujiu tuhoira jat hina, chakik hina khatdi chakhuan hina mai khat kumboniu chakhuang thiumakjiu Shadrach, Meshach khatdi Abednego Rawang tu din masasai, patuse pa-ncheng hina gasu danthon mirabo-e, khatdi pakikhunmai situ kam mahami rabo-e. Haichiujiu gukhai ngambo chara wadi ha-e.”
Khatdi chawang siniu Shadrach, Meshach khatdi Abednego paliutu Babylon kadihga paliu bam pikhang khai bide.
Kadihpiri ga kalungbo jat hina, chakik hina khatdi chakhuan hina khuga chawang Nebuchadnezzar niu pahangga raokhaibo champao hai langkhai-e:
“Kahum khai-e!
Tanthubo Rawang siniu akhuga maisuang habo khatdi tasibo lenkhaibo lamse nking khailo.
“Tingwang niu aliu khuga lenkhaibo hai dejiukha maisuang halo!
Paniu tasibo kamkhaibo hai dejiukha pumtan bamlo!
Tingtheng chawang thiubose Tingwang-e;
paniu tingthengjiu mawang rabo-e.
“Iniu awangkiningga lungwijiu, aman saijiu lung bambo-e.
Chiudi Iniu jipjiu bamga kapingbo mang khatdi manangbo madungao khat ngao-e.
Babylon ga lungbambo chawangtu ladpimai hinatu akhuga puiwang lujiu paliuniu sibo mang rambase akhuga dinkhaira Iniu chamtan pikhaibo-e.
Sichiujiu sailad kasimai, chamik thao kadadmai, wasiam kasimai khatdi chagan ariak kasimai hinatu puiwang lujiu Iniu amang dinboga, paliuniu sise akhuga paramba dinkhai ngam makge.
Siga Daniel se wangde (Patu hai ara zan saisuijiu Belteshazzar chiudi ku-e). Pakhuga charagu
“Sailad kasimaigu papeebo Belteshazzar yo, nariga charagu hiupuina bamme, siniu kakungbo hina nangniu singambo-e. Haise amang-e. Parambase akhuga dinkhailo.
“Iniu jipjiu bamboga, kadih n-gang lan-ga singbang kadibo madungao khat Iniu ngao-e.
Haise dikhang mid-midjiu tingpuk tungtang mide sichiujiu kadihpiriga lungmai hinaniu ngaochia mide.

Paniwse matai wi-e, khatdi pasyse kadihpiri ga lungmai mathiuniu tiubui masi bamme. Nkan khaoring hina pahiuga mathak bamme, thingnadung siniu pake hinaga pasip pon bamme sichiujiu khaoring hina pasyse tiu bamme.
“Iniu sibo madungao lamga haichiu makumjiu bamga tinggen lamsu maza khat singringjiu khatdi charakjiu kiubo I ngao-e.

Paniu pakhuan tanjiu senwang-e, ‘Singbang situ huikiu lujiu pakedung riangthon milo; paniwdungse riangthon milo khatdi pasy hinase kam mara milo. Sibo hangga bambo khaoringdung situ hathon milo khatdi pakedungga bambo thingnadung situ hathon kam milo.’
Chiudi singmui situ chagiriang nai tanaagi riangniu kadihga ratman milo. Sise piuriangli luzamga thonkhai milo.
“‘Tuhoira haibopiu riga kajikdui pikiu khailo, khatdi patuse tathiu-chakhao khatdi piubuan jiuga pilung milo.
Takum chinnia lungga patu chamaina lungchun makjiu chakhao lungchun pibam milo.

Haise singringjiu khatdi charakjiu bambo maza siniu chapkhai mibo si-e. Sichiujiu Tanthubo Rawang siniu chamainagu chawang riga pumtan bamme, khatdi paniu kadalubo mai—siamthubo mai khuga katang paniu pumtanse pikhai ngamme.’

“Haise Iniu manbo mangsi-e,” chiujiu Nebuchadnezzar niu din-e, “Tuhoira Belteshazzar yo, parambase degulo chiubo akhuga dinkhailo. Haise awangdihga ladpimai khatniudi dinngam makge, chiudi nangra dinngam lubui-e, palamra nakhuga masanbo ragu hiupuina bamme.”
Siga Daniel, Belteshazzar chiujiudi kubo pase charenjiu wadi dinpad ngamlak mide. Siga chawang siniu pakhuga din-e, “Belteshazzar yo, chamang haiga khatnadi paramba siniu natu kam charenmi tulo.”
Belteshazzar niu paokakge, “Pakendibopiu yo, sibo mangse Ira pijiu nakhuga padmakjiu nagu mikremai khuga pipad khaini-e.
Sibo singbangse kuchang kujiu tingpuk tungtang mibo-e, sise kadihpiriga lungmai hinaniu ngao kambo-e.
Sibo niwse mataiwi-e khatdi pasyse kadihpiriga lungmai hina mathiuniu tiubui-e. Nkan-khaoring siniu sibo hangga nbe bambo-e, khatdi thingnadung siniu pakega paliu sip ponbambo-e.
“Pakendibopiu yo, kakubo khatdi katanbo singbangse nang-e. Nang hai dikhangjiu tingpuk tungtang mibo-e khatdi nagu pumtanse kadihpiri pakhiangnaga dipadjiu bamme.

Pakendibo piuniu phuijiu bamboga tinggen lamsu maza khat kiujiu din-e. ‘Singbangse huithon milo khatdi kam maha milo, chiudi pamui situra kadihga khaidiak milo. Siga chagiriang nai tanaagi riangniu khinman lujiu luzamga bambo piuriang-liga thonkhai milo. Haibo mui riga pijiu kajikdui pikiu khailo, sichiujiu patu takum chinnia pijiu tathiu-chakhaotu maluang lung milo.’
“Sibo ramba sira hai-e, pakendibopiu yo, nakhuga padrabose Tanthubo Rawang niu madu khaibo-e.

Natu hai chamaina ruanggasu hathonmi rabo-e sichiujiu nang hai nkan khaoringtu majang lungmi rabo-e. Sichiujiu kajikduise nariga kiujiu nang hai kabuichi kumjiu piubuan tiujiu khatdi nkan jiuga takum chinnia lungrabo-e. Haise Tanthubo Rawang niu chamainagu chawang kadih hina thinman bambo-e, sichiujiu paniu pachunning maitu kadalujiu pikhai ngamme chiubo nangniu suikhai rabo-e.
Singmui situ pijiu kadihga thonkhai mira maza siniu chamtan pi-e. Haibo ramba sira Tingwang niu kadihpiri pakhiangnatu mawang bambo-e chiubo nangniu suikhaibo wan-ga nangniu chawang thiulan rabo-e.
Sijengniu pakendibopiu yo, agu ladpikhaibo hai majai lulo. Nuan kamlan talo, kamajibose kamjiu lungkalak maitu lungsa khailo. Sichiusai nang lung aman saijiu lungrabo-e.”
Pakhiangna haise chawang Nebuchadnezzar khuga padkam khaide.
Haise chahiu kariu-je niakiu saiga, Babylon ga pagu chawangkininggu chakai riga paniu tad mariujiu bamboga,
paniu din-e, “Phuilo Babylon hai dejiukha dilo! Iniu haise agu pumtan nai jengtan khatdi agu makendi madu khaira agu dihsing namdileng thiukhaibo si-e.”
Paladkengse pamun gasu dinloi makhaga tinggen lamsu chakhuan khatniu din-e, “Chawang Nebuchadnezzar yo, Iniu kadinbo hai nkinglo! Nagu chawang pumtan hai tuhoi gasu luthon mide.

Natu hai chamaina ruanggasu hathon mine, sichiujiu nkan khaoring jiuga lungjiu kabuichi kumjiu takum chinnia piubuan tiujiu lungrabo-e. Sigasu Tanthubo Rawang siniu chamainagu chawang kadihga pumtan bamme khatdi paniu pachun mai khattu kadalujiu pikhai ngamme chiubo nangniu suikhai sune.”

Sibo ladkengse palingjiu wangnuang mide. Nebuchadnezzar tu chamaina khuga gasu hathon mide khatdi kabuichi kumjiu piubuan tiusude. Kajikduise pariga kiujiu pagiuse lengreng kan kum theng mide khatdi pa-ntinse thingna n-tin kum theng mide.

“Takum chinnia hai loimiboga, Iniu tingpuk lam ngangkhang phuiboga, achun hai wanglande,” chiujiu chawang siniu dinsude. “Tanthubo Rawang tingthengjiu ringbambo situ Iniu thuonjiu chakhuang thiubo nai pakendibose aleng pikhai sude.
“Paniu tingthengjiu mawang rabo-e,
pawangdihse tingtheng tingtheng bamrabo-e.
Kadihga lungbambo maidungtu phuikiujiu paniu wakhat lengdi chakkhai makge,
tinggen ga bambo mazadung khatdi kadihga bambo maidung hai pagu pumtan hangga bambo-e.
Mai khatniudi patu atung ngamlakge,
maksai paniu kambambose mainiu silakge.

“Achunse wanglanboga, atu chakhuang thiubo agu kendi khatdi awangdihgu pumtan hina atu pikhai lan bide. Agu chakampaodung khatdi amaidungniu atu sundaode, sichiujiu karaiga suang nkiubo pumtan siniu chakhuang thiujiu awangdih pikhai lan bide.

Tuhoira, Nebuchadnezzar, Iniu Tinggen Wang situ thuonjiu, chakhuang thiujiu khatdi paken kadibo situ thuonkiu-e, Paniu kambo hina maji-e khatdi nchang-e, sichiujiu paniu chaliangmai situ kam manon khai-e.”
Nchun khat, Chawang Belshazzar niu katheng-kadimai sang khattu khumky kadibo kijiu paliu jaw sak aruangde.

Paliuniu sakjiu bamga Belshazzar niu papiu Nebuchadnezzar niu Jerusalem Raky gasu phungwangbo kachia nai rangkang giniu kambo chapiangdung nai chaqongdungse ponpadra chamtan pikhaide. Sise ponpad lujiu pagu katheng-kadi maidung, panaodung khatdi parammai-liupuidung mathiutu, maluang sak raleng chawangniu paliutu langkhaide.
Siga kachia piang nai kachia kuangse ponwang nuangjiu sigasu paliu mathiu jaw ponsak sude, khatdi
kachia, rangkang, tataagi, chagi, tasing khatdi tatuniu dambo radungtu thuon sude.
Siga bungjiu chamai ben khatniu chawangkininggu taikhai nbambo singbengga, chamibunggu withubo nbiu thaokhaibo bamga ariakse raokiu sude chaben siniu raobambose chawangniu ngaode.
Pase pingju mibo jengniu pazuse heng-maren mide, khatdi pataluongse kaphik rai-rai mide.

Siga khangsianiu chamik thao-kadadmai, tathoi kasimai khatdi chagan ariak kasimaitu puiwangra paniu senpad sude. Paliu wangboga, chawangniu paliu khuga din-e, “Mai khat kumboniu raokhaibo ariak hai kenpad lujiu parambase akhuga dinkhai ngamsai, patuse paman kungbo chawanggu fainoi piben khaine, khatdi chakhuang thiubo kachia tiuriangse pawongga matiu khai bine khatdi chawang kadih gase pasumbo pumtan pikhaibi rabo-e.”
Chawang gu ladpimaidungse wang karensude, chiudi mai khatniudi charaose kenpad simakge khatdi parambadi singam makge.
Palungchun magenthiubo siniu chawang Belshazzar zuse abasai mide, siga pagu katheng-kadimai siniu degu kamralo chiubo sita mide.

Chawangniu khatdi pagu katheng-kadimai siniu maliurio-riobo khuanse chawangnao puiniu chiulujiu khumkibo kichen lungga ngutde. Paniu din-e, “Pakendibo piu yo, tingthengjiu ringbamlo! Sichiujiu nalung chariuju mitulo khatdi manangju mitulo.

Nawang kadihga masanbo ragu hiupuina phungbo mai khat bamme. Napiuniu chawang thiubambo tingga, paniu charagu kawibo makum, ningting khatdi napiu Nebuchadnezzar niu patu sailad kasimai, chamik thao kadadmai, tathoi kasimai khatdi chagan ariak kasimai mathiugu papeebo pithiu khai mibo-e.

Pakhuga mainiu dinsilakbo pumtan bamjiu khatdi chamang ramba dinbogu, chakhan khanbogu khatdi kakungbogu dinpadbo ningting nai tasi bamme, sijengniu Daniel kubo, chawangniu patu Belteshazzar chiubo maitu kukhailo chiusai paniu paramba hinase nakhuga dinkhaibi rabo-e.”
Daniel situ chawang masuangga puiwang nuong khai biboga, chawangniu pakhuga din-e, “Nang hai Judah gasu chawang, apiuniu Jehudi maitu kavang leng minwangbo gasu puiwangbo Daniel sima?
Nakhuga masanbo ragu
Ladpimaidung khatdi chamik thao kakadad maidungtu haibo charao hai kenpadjiu parambase akhuga dinkhaira puiwangbo-e, chiudi paliuniu parambase singamlu makge.

Tuhoira nangniu kakungbo khatdi kasukbo ramba hai singamme chiubo Iniu chiu-e. Nangniu haise kenpadjiu parambase akhuga dinkhai ngamsai, paman kungbo chawanggu fainoise natu benkhaijiu chakhuang thiubogu kachia tiuriangse nawongga matiu khai bine khatdi chawang kadih gase natu pasumbo pumtan pithin khai bine.”
Daniel niu paokakge, “Nagu kalense naleng lumilo, maksai mai kakimai leng pimilo. Pakendibopiu lengse Iniu kenpad khaijiu parambase degulo chiubo dinkhai bine.
“Tanthubo Rawang niu napiu Nebuchadnezzar tu chawang kadibo khat pithiu khaijiu paken pangam kadibo pikhaibi-e.

Pahai dichang di-e, sijengniu jat hina, chakik hina khatdi chakhuan hinaniu patu pingjiu manang kamna-e. Paniu mai khattu kamshatni sai kamshat, paniu mai khattu piring khaini sai piring khaijiu bambo-e. Paniu chakhuang thiukhai nibo maitu chakhuang thiukhai, maksai kam mangam khainibo maitu kam mangam khaijiu bambo-e.
Chiudi paniu chaliangjiu, palung tanjiu khatdi pacheng samibo jengniu patuse pawangkining bamgasu lupad mibo-e, khatdi patu chakhuang thiubose kam maha mibo-e.

Patuse chamaina ruanggasu hathon mijiu pachun sidi chakhao lungchun kum mibo-e. Paniu chahungtu maluang lungjiu, kabuichi kum piubuan tiujiu khatdi nkan-manam hangga jijiu patu bentop khaira wadi hajiu kajikdui pariga kiukhai kamigu-e. Kanamboga Tanthubo Rawang siniu chamainagu chawang kadih hai thinman bambo-e, sichiujiu paniu pachun maitu kadalu pikhai ngamme chiubo paniu suikhai kamigu-e.
“Chiudi panahpiu nangniu pakhiangnase sibamliu tadi naronna natu kam manon khai makge.

Tinggen Rapiu situ nangniu atungjiu Paraky gasu phungwangbo chakuang chapiangse ponpad kamigu-e. Sichiujiu nagu katheng-kadimaidung nanaodung khatdi narammai-liupuidung naliu pontiu-ponsak lujiu, kachia, rangkang, tanaagi, chagi, tasing khatdi tatuniu kambo, chiusi makbo khatdi ngaosi makbo khatdi wadi simakbo ra situ thuon kamigu-e. Chiudi wahinatu thinjiu bambo, natu piring khaira maksai shaira, pakhen-parang thiujiu bambo Rawang situ nangniu chakhuang thiukhai makge.
Sijengniu haibo ladkeng hai raokhaira Tingwang niu chaben haitu langkhaibo-e.
“Raokhaibo charao sira haichiubo-e: ‘Chak lude, riam lude, madiu lude, njan mide.’
Chak lude, riam lude chiubo ramba sira, Tingwang niu nawangdih gu tingmik riakse chak lude, khatdi riam lude siniu loimi rade;
madiu lude chiubo ramba sira natu madiu lude, sichiujiu nang hai masenju mide;
njan mide chiubo ramba sira nagu kadihse njan mide, sise Mede mai nai Persia maileng pikhai mide chiubo-e.”

Siga Belshazzar niu Daniel tu paman kungbo chawanggu fainoi benkhaijiu khatdi chakhuang thiubogu tiuriangse pawongga matiu khaira pavangmai khuga chamtan pikhaide. Khatdi paniu patuse pawangdihga pasumbo pumtanse pithiu khai bide.
Sibo nchun siakse, Babylon mai wangpiu Belshazzar situ gimide;
sichiujiu chawang kadihse takum riakcharuk-je-niakiu tangmibo Mede maipiu Darius niu haphun lude.
Darius niu pawangdih pakhiangna phuira dithinpao kai khat-je-makaitu kadara palung chap mide.
Sibo riga paniu Daniel nai katammai khangniatu kada lujiu dithinpaodung situ phuijiu chawang maning kamraleng kada khaide.

Phuipaodung maksai dihthinpaodung kakimai suang wi-nkiubo ngam kamlu rabose Daniel niu lennuang sude. Pahai ningting tamsinbo jengniu, chawangdih pakhiangnagu papeebo pithiu khaira chawang siniu palung chap mide.

Siga kakibo phuipaodung nai dithinpaodung siniu Daniel niu kadih thinbo lamga kamaobo phuipadra matan sude, chiudi Daniel hai malumsuibo wadaodi kamaobo maksai masan makbo lungchun wadi habo jengniu paliuniu ngamlu makge.
Siniu paliu khat-khatga din sude, “Pagu chara chengga kamakbo aliuniu Daniel tu kammao khaira wakhatnadi daolak mide.”
Siniu chawang khuga paliu tadlujiu dinsude, “Pakendibopiu, chawang Darius yo, tingthengjiu ringbamlo!

Nagu kadihtu thinjiu bammai phuipaodung, dithinpaodung, dithinpao-nkhadung khatdi chakampaodung hinaniu, Pakendibo piuniu chamtan khat kam khaijiu mai hinatu thinra suikhaide. Jeng samriu lungga mai khatniudi pakendibopiu khugasu makjiu, mai khat khugadi, chara khat khugadi, wakhatnadi khengbo suimak rabo-e. Haise kampang maitu ndongqui-reng lungga thonkhai mirabo-e, chiujiu chamtan pikhailo.
Sichiujiu pakendibopiu siniu haibo chamtanse kam kali makjiu, haise Mede mai nai Persia maigu tacheng-tajai thiumira madan diangkhaijiu kamkhailo.”
Sijengniu chawang Darius niu chamtanse madan diangkhai mide,

Sibo chamtanse madan diangkhai mide chiubo Daniel niu siluboga paky lam wangmide. Paky sat nribo gase Jerusalem tu phuimeng ngaobo kiran khat bamme. Paniu nai-machangna kambo kumjiu kiranse lepad lujiu paniu khudungkiu naikhatga Tingwang khuga kakheng thiulon sum-sum sude.
Paniu Tingwang khuga kakhengthiu bambo hai Daniel gu mikremai siniu madan lude.

Siga Daniel tu kammao khaira paliu mathiuse chawang khuga tadsude, paliuniu din-e, “Pakendibo piuniu jeng samriu lungga hai mai khatniudi nakhugasu makjiu kakibo mai maksai chara khugasu wa khengsai patuse ndongqui-rengga thonkhai mirabo-e chiubo chamtan khat padjiu nagu madan diangkhai mibo-e.”
Chawang siniu paokakge, “Yo, Mede mai nai Persia maigu tacheng-tajai khat thiujiu kakungbo chamtan thiura kamkhai mibo-e, sise wadaodi kalisi lakge.”
Siga paliuniu din-e, Judah lamsu kavangleng minwangbo Daniel sira pakendibopiu natu chakhuangthiu makge khatdi nagu chamtanse majai makge. Para naimachangna kakheng thiulon sum-sum bamme.”
Haise chiukhaiboga chawangse palung takiu mide, sichiujiu Daniel tu gukhaira palai padjiu kam sude. Naimik ngutmak then pase matanjiu bamme.
Sichiujiu Daniel gu mikre maidungse wanglujiu chawang khugase dinsude, “Pakendibo piuniu sibamme, chiubora Mede mai nai Persia maigu tacheng-tajai chawangniu pikhai mibose kalisi lakge.”

Sijengniu Daniel tu minlujiu ndongquidungniu phuibambo renggase thonkhai mira chawangniu chamtan pikhaide khatdi patuse ndongquidungniu phuibambo rengga thonkhai mide. Paniu Daniel khuga din-e, “Nangniu nachun ngutjiu macha bambo Rawang siniu natu gukhaimi sulo.”
Sibo reng kamun gase tatukang kaladkhai lujiu chawanggu khatdi pagu katheng-kadimaigu madanse diangman khai mide, sise mai khatniudi Daniel tu gukhai ngammak raleng-e.
Sichiujiu chawangse pakyga wanglujiu wakhatnadi tiumak-sakmakjiu khatdi tanui-chapa thiumakjiu bamme, sibo nchunse wakhatnadi pah jipkiu lulak mide.
Nsuan kalu chawangse buangsu lujiu ndongqui reng lamse tadmide.

Paniu siga mengtang gapboga palung pujiu khatdi manangjiu kupad sude, “Ringjiu bambo Tingwang vangpiu Daniel yo! Nangniu nachun ngutjiu machabambo Rawang siniu natu ndongquidung khugasu gukhaijiu bamma?”
Daniel niu paokakge, “Pakendibopiu yo, tingthengjiu ringbamlo!

Tingwang niu pagu maza langkiujiu ndongquidung munse khamkhaijiu, paliuniu atu wadi kam masa makge. Paniu haise kamkhaibo sira I amao ha-e khatdi nakhuga kamaobo kamkhai makge chiubo paniu sibo jengniu-e, pakendibopiu yo.”

Chawangse pachun wichang wimide, sichiujiu ndongqui-reng gasu Daniel tu jupadmira chamtan pikhaide. Sichiujiu paliuniu patu jupadboga wakhatnadi patu kam masa makbose ngaode, palamra paniu Tingwang tu malumbo jengniu-e.

Sigasu Daniel tu kam kamaomai hinatu paliu nao, paliu nah, pakhiangnatu min taruang lujiu ndongquiniu phuibambo reng lunggase thonkhai mira chawangniu chamtan pikhaide. Paliutu kareng runsingga thonmeng tangmakbo suangga, ndongquidung siniu paliutu machakkhang thonjiu paliu rah katang kalaoroi-roi lujiu tiu mide.
Sigasu chawang Darius niu kadihpiriga lungbambo jat hina, chakik hina khatdi chakhuan hina khuga haichiujiu raokhai-e:
“Kahum khai-e!
Daniel Rawang haitu agu kadihga lungmai hinaniu pingjiu chakhuangthiu rabo-e, chiujiu Iniu chamtan pikhaibo-e.
“Pahai ringbambo Rawang-e, tingthengjiu paniu mawang rabo-e.
Pawangdihse wadaodi kam maha silakge,
khatdi pagu pumtanse wadaodi kaloibo thiu lakge.
Paniu gukhai-e khatdi rankhai-e;
tinggen lamdi kadihpiri gadi paniu maisuang habo khatdi tasibo ngam kamkhai-e.
Ndongquidung siniu kamshat mirabo gasu paniu Daniel tu gukhaibi-e.”
Daniel hai Darius niu mawangbo ken-ga khatdi Persia mai Cyrus wang ken-ga amanjiu khatdi wijiu lung-e.
Belshazzar niu Babylon maigu chawang thiu karaibo kum Iniu chamang khat man-e, khatdi madungao khat ngao-e. Iniu sibo mangse raokhai khai-e,
sichiujiu sibo nchun Iniu ngaokhai mibose hai-e:
Tingkai hai pake hina lamsu hunwangjiu duipui riga kasuakjiu bamme.
Duipui gasu thiuhu kadibo madai padle, sise khatniu khat khugasu palun tam-tamme.

Karaibo siniu ndongqui kumme chiudi lengreng kan kumjiu phung-e. Iniu phuibamboga pakandungse ntang mide. Thiuhu situ jukhangjiu chamai khattu kum pichap khaide. Siga patuse chamaina chun pikhai bide.
Niabo thiuhuse chahom kumme, sise pasailam phiniu chap bamme. Pahiu kania kak gase watupekra sum makiman bamme, siga chakhuan khatniu pakhuga din-e, “Sulo, nangniu ngamdiu then chamee hai tiu sulo!”
Iniu sichiu phuibamboga, katambo thiuhuse ngao lande. Haise quiruk kumme chiudi pangum gase thingna kan kumbo madai bamme khatdi papee madai phung-e, pumtan bambo kumjiu ngaokhai-e.

Pake situ Iniu phuibamboga, sibo kakgasu pake katambo khat padbo I ngao-e. Haise puakbambo ke-sum gasu mahin padbo-e. Haibo kese chamai mik phung-e khatdi wasao thiujiu chaliangbo ladse dinbo mun khat bamme.
sigasu chami giuki khat runpad bamme. Siga patu machara maise sang-sang bamme, khatdi pamasuangga pakhui sitang kamakbo maidung chap bamme. Ladjankyse patien thiusujiu, ariak khuangdungse lepad mide.

Sichiujiu Iniu phuibamboga pake poi khat khugasu wasao thiujiu chaliangbo khuan I chiu-e. Sichiujiu Iniu phuibamboga pamadaibo thiuhu situ kamshat lujiu taobambo mibon gase paphawse thonkhaijiu kam maha mide.
Katambo thiuhudunggu pumtan sidi luthon mide, chiudi paliutu pakak khat ringkhaira suikhai mide.
Sibo nchun gu madungao gase chamaina khat kumbo Iniu ngao-e. Patu hai kamuangniu majiu bamme, paniu akhuga wangmana lujiu, tingtheng ringbambo piu khugase pikhai mide.
Patuse pumtan, chakhuang thiubo khatdi chawanggu pumtan pikhai mide, sichiujiu jat hina, chakik hina khatdi chakhuan hinaniu patu macha rabo-e. Pagu chawang kadihse wadaodi halakge.
Iniu ngaobo madungao siniu atu kam charen mijiu alung manangsui mibo-e.
Palam hina hai dinkhaira Iniu chapbam mai ruangga khangkhat khuga tadkhang lujiu maniu sude, Siga paniu paramba hinase akhuga dinkhaide.
Paniu din-e, “Thiuhu kadibo madai haira kadihpiriga wangrabo wangdih madai si-e.
Khatdi Tanthubo Rawang gu maidung siniu chawang pumtanse daojiu haise tingtheng-tingtheng bammi rabo-e.”
Sibo sai kapingboniu phuibo thiuhu pagu tanaagi n-tin nai chagi-hiu siniu patatek siaktiubo khatdi paliu riga tao malui bambo, pamadaibo thiuhu lamga Iniu sisan ni-e.

Sigasu papeega pake kariu bambo khatdi ke sumse tangmibo sai ke-khat padlanbo lamga Iniu sisan ni-e. Haise pamik nai pamun bamme, haisiniu wasao thiujiu chaliang bamme. Haise kakibodung suang pingdiangbo khatle.
Siga tingtheng ringbambo piu siniu wangjiu Tanthubo Rawang maidung lam ponjiu ladjan thiusude. Tingwang maidung siniu chawanggu pumtan daorabo wanse wangtang mide.

Siga atu haichiujiu dinlen khai bi-e: “Madaibo thiuhuse pamadaibo wangdihga wangrabo-e khatdi haise kakibo wangdih gasu tamsin rabo-e. Haisiniu kadihpiri pakhiangnatu niakpet lujiu sibo riga taomalui rabo-e.
Pake kariu sira sibo chawang kadih mawangbo chawang kariu si-e. Sibosai katanbo wang khat padne, pahai karaimai gasu tamsin rabo-e, sichiujiu chawang sum situ ngamlu rabo-e.

Paniu Tanthubo Rawang situ din masa rabo-e khatdi Tingwang maidungtu kam mathad rabo-e. Paniu paliu racheng khatdi chakhuang-changee situ kam kalira kamne sichiujiu Tingwang maidung siniu pagu pumtan hangga takum sum paphan bammi rabo-e.
Sigasu tinggen gu ladjankyga ladjan thiujiu pagu pumtanse luthon mine khatdi patu kam mahami rabo-e.

Kadihpiriga bambo chawang kadih hinagu pumtan nai kendibo hinase Tanthubo Rawang maidung khuga pikhai mine. Paliugu wangdih pumtanse wadaodi halakge sichiujiu kadihpiriga mawangmai hina siniu paliu cham piujiu paliutu macha rabo-e.”
Haise kaloibo tienkam si-e.I hai pingju mibo jengniu abasai mide, sichiujiu wahinase I aronna baikhai mide.
Belshazzar niu chawang thiubo pasumbo kumga, Iniu ngaobo madungao niabose
Sibo madungao gase aronna bungjiu Elam kadihgu Susa namdi kareng lungga bamniu-e. I hai Ulai Giuki mungga I chap bamme,
sibo singgiu hugen gase pake katheng phungbo Milychi khat Iniu ngao-e, ke khatse khatsuang theng nkiu-e khatdi san nkiu-e.

Sibo Milychi siniu tingnulam, tingpilam khatdi tingrunlam pake siniu kadih mathao bambose Iniu ngao-e. Wakhao khatniudi patu mata silakge maksai pagu pumtan gasu marilu makge. Paniu kam kanibose paniu kamjiu chaliang mide.

Haibo rambase degulo chiubo Iniu asuang hajiu bamboga, tingrun lamsu kamichi khat pak taronsuan wangbo, khatdi sise kalangju mibo jengniu pangense kadihga niatang makge. Pamik kania kaknaga pake masan siakbo khat bamme.
Singgiu hugen khatlam Iniu ngaokhai mibo Milychi khulamse palai khaijiu pakwang sude.

Paniu Milychi situ asunbose I ngao-e. Palung pomju mijiu patuse paniu mathaojiu pake kaniase kamtang mide. Milychise marilura pumtan hamide. Patuse kadihga thonkiu mide khatdi pariga tao malui sude, siga mai khatniudi patu gukhai ngamra hamide.
Kamichise chaliangbi-bi khangsude, chiudi pagu pumtan kese pamalan khangboga sise tangmide. Sibo bam gasu pake madai puakkhang sude, sise pajai tam-tambo jailam marikhai-e.
Pake madai gasu pake-poi khat padjiu sibo pumtanse tingnulam khatdi tingbanglam khatdi Ladriat khaibo Dihlam disan padsude.
Haise papum tankhangjiu tinggen riphen, chagandung tudi asunbui khang sude, sichiujiu haisiniu khangsiatu kadihga taliangkiu lujiu paliu riga taomalui sude.
Haisiniu tinggen riphen Wangnahpiu tu tangbo din masa sude, khatdi pakhuga naimachangna kadkhai bambo rathak mania sidi khamjiu Charaky situ kam tania mide.
Naimachangna wa kadkhai rabo sung maidungse nuan kamjiu paliugu majibo characheng situ kadihga thonkhai mide. Sibo keniu kambo hina ngam kamme.

Siga maza khatniu khat khuga dinbo I chiu-e, “Madungao-ga ngaobodung haise dethengkha padralo? Naimachangna charathiu khaibo sung kapingbo maidiu sabo nuan hai dethengkha kamjiu bam ralo? Tinggen gu riphentu khatdi Charaky situ dethengkha tao maluijiu bamralo?”
Maza khat siniu paokakbo I chiu-e, “Haise tingmik 1,150 padrabo-e sibo lungga nsuan, chawan gu
Mai khatniu akhuga bungjiu wangboga madungao rambase degulo chiubo sira I matan bamme.
Ulai Giuki hugen lamsu chakhuan khatniu dinbo I chiu-e, “Gabriel yo, paniu ngaobo rambase pakhuga dinkhai bilo.”
Gabriel siniu amungga wangjiu chapboga I hai pingju mijiu kadihga kaokiu mide.
Paniu akhuga din-e, “Shaisuibo mai yo, parambase silulo. Madungao haise kadihpiri kaloibo tingga padrabo gu-e.”
Paniu atu npao bamboga, achun thiuta mijiu kadihga I kaokiu mide, chiudi paniu aben jujiu pichap khai lande,
khatdi paniu din-e, “Tingwang gu lungpom rambase degu padralo chiubo Iniu natu lenkhai bine. Madungao haise kaloibo wan leng-e.
“Milychi pake nia phungbo nangniu kangaobose Media mai nai Persia mai wangdihtu din kada khaibo-e.
Kamichi siniu Greece mai wangtu din kada khaibo-e, sichiujiu pamik kania kakga padbo palingbo kese karaibo wang si-e.
Karaibo kese tangmibo saiga pake madai puakpadbo siniu chawang kadihse jatdung siniu njan madai thiumibo donniu sise karaibo chawang kadihse kumjiu tantang lakge chiubo-e.
Sibo wangdihse loisu raga, paliuse saju mibo donniu paliutu sajai pirabo-e, paliu hai paliu lung tanjiu, nkhai-ali sajiu khatdi aratbo wang thiumi rabo-e.

Pase tankhang rabo-e, chiudi paronnagu pumtanniu makge. Paniu kasabose kamrabo-e khatdi paniu kambo hina ngamlu rabo-e. Pumtan bam maidung riga khatdi Tingwang maidung riga paniu kam nchumbose phungwang rabo-e.

Patiuni kasabo jengniu paru kasabo siniu ngamsu rabo-e. Paronna wasao thiujiu maidung kakeng khatu kachan khai makjiu kam maha mine. Paniu wahinagu dithubo Wangtu katang din masane, chiudi chamainagu pumtan jaomakjiu patuse kam maha mirabo-e.
Nsuan chawan rathak lamga nakhu dinkhai mibose pachangjiu padrabo-e. Chiudi tuhoira haise baikhai milo, palamra haise padrabo tingse thengjiu bamkha-e.
I hai marajiu khatdi achun sajiu pating kathengkha bamkhang-e. Sibosai I sulujiu chawangniu atu langkhaibo tiense kamra tadlan mide, chiudi madungao rambase Iniu sitang lumakbo donniu asuang hamide.
Mede mai Xerxes nahpiu Darius niu Babylon kadihtu mawang bamme.
Paniu mawang karaibo kumga, phaimiukakungdung Jeremiah khuga Rapiu niu dinkhai mibo Jerusalem tu takum riakchinnia kam maha mirabo lamga khatdi masanbo ariakkhuangse Iniu kenjiu makum bambo-e.
Siga Iniu maliufai benlujiu khatdi tabui jiuga ntao lujiu kalum rijiu, Rapiu Tingwang khuga alaipadjiu kakheng thiusude.
Iniu
Iniu din-e, “Rapiu Tingwang yo, nangra di-e, siniu aliu natu chakhuang thiu-e. Nagu ladriatga nangra chamchang-e khatdi natu lungsajiu nagu chamtan majaimaitu nangra lungsa khai-e.
“Aliu nuan kam mide, aliu kasa kam mide, aliu kamaobo kammide. Majibo nangniu lenkhaibo gasu aliu maritad mide, khatdi nagu chamtantuse aliuniu suikhai makge.
Navang phaimiukakungdung mainiu, aliu wangdung, aliugu jupaodung, aliu pao-pehdung khatdi aliu jat hina khuga dinkhaibo situ aliuniu lukhai makge.

Rapiu yo, nangra kamajibo ronna kamme, chiudi mangambose aliu ronna aliu riga phungwang-e. Haise Judaea ga, Jerusalem ga khatdi kadih pabam hina, kadiu gadi kanagadi lung maren tadmibo Israel mai aliu mathiu khuga padbambo-e, palamra paliu hai chamchang makbo donniu-e.
Aliu wangdung, jupaodung khatdi aliu pao-pehdung hina mangammak jingjiu nakhuga nuan kamkhai kamigu-e, Rapiu yo.
Aliuniu natu atungjiu bamdi nangra lungsasibo piu-e.
Navang phaimiukakungmai khuga dinkhaibo nagu tacheng-tajai saisuijiu lungra aliu Rawang nangniu dinkhai bidi, aliuniu nacham phung makge,

Israel mai hinaniu nagu tacheng-tajaise kampang mide khatdi nacham phung makge. Aliuniu nakhuga nuan kam khai mibo jengniu navangpiu Mose gu tacheng tajaiga raokhai nbambo tasiang hinase aliu riga wangbambo-e.
Nangniu aliu khuga khatdi aliugu jupaodung khuga dinkhai mibo saisuijiu aliu khuga kamkhaide. Kadihpiriga bambo kakibo namditu suang nangniu Jerusalem haitu sajai pi-nkiu khaibide.
Mose gu tacheng-tajai ga raokhaibo sajai hinase aliu riga pikhaibo-e. Oh
Hey
“Hey Rapiu aliu Rawang yo, Egypt dih gasu nangniu namaidungtu maluang padjiu nagu pumtanse lenkhai bide, nagu pumtanse tuhoidi maningtao bam-e. Aliu nuan kam mide, aliuniu kamaobo kam mide.

Karaiga nangniu aliutu gukhai bibo-e, sijengniu Jerusalem tu nalung pomjiu bamta sulo. Haise nagu namdi-e, nagu masanbo luong si-e. Aliu pao-peh mainiu kasa kamkhai mibo khatdi aliu nuan jengniu, aliutu lung magui bambo jat hinaniu Jerusalem tu nuimenjiu phui bamme.
Hey Tingwang yo, Iniu alai padjiu khengbambo arathoi hai nking khailo. Kam maha mibo natu Kahumboky se thiukhai lanlo; mai hinaniu nang hai Tingwang si-e chiubo silura haise kalankhai khelo.

Hey Tingwang yo, aliu rathoi nking khailo; aliutu phui khailo, aliu khuga bambo chariu magenthiubo khatdi nazan phungbo namdigu magenthak hina hai phui khailo. Aliuniu nakhuga kheng bamme, palamra aliuniu majibose kambo makge, chiudi nangra lungsasibo-e.

Rapiu yo, aliu lad chiukhailo. Rapiu yo, aliu nuan kuak khailo, Rapiu yo, aliu lad nking khaijiu tatien thiukhai sulo! Nang hai Tingwang si-e chiubo mai hinaniu silura rita sulo! Haibo namdi nai haibo maidung hai nagu-e.”
copy
Iniu kakheng thiujiu, anuan dinpad madujiu khatdi amai Israel maidung nuan dinpad madujiu khatdi pagu masanbo Raky tu kalan khaira Iniu alai padjiu
Sichiujiu Iniu kakheng thiujiu bamga, Iniu karaibo madungaoga ngaokhai mibo Gabriel siniu akhuga lenwang sude. Haise chawan gu rathak kadkhai rabo wan mibo-e.
Paniu dinlen khaide. “Daniel yo, sailadse nangniu silura, natu nkha khaira I wangbo-e.
Tingwang khuga nangniu khengsu gapbo gasu paniu natu paokak khai mibo-e. Paniu natu lungsabo jengniu pacham kakse nakhuga dinkhaira I wangbo-e. Madungaose Iniu dinlen khaibo hai nking mawi lulo.

“Tingwang niu namaidungtu khatdi naliugu masanbo namdi situ nuan nai kasabo gasu khen-rang thiukhai rabo hai takum chinnia-gu riak-chinnia ngutrabo-e. Siga nuanse kuak khaijiu majibo ladjanse thiusu rabo-e, sichiujiu madungao nai sailadse palingjiu padrabo-e, khatdi masanbo Rakyse

Haise raolulo khatdi silulo: Jerusalem thiusu lanra chamtan pikhaibo gasu, Tingwang gu kadakhaibo jupao wangmak then, takum chinnia gu chinniase wangrabo-e. Siga Jerusalem hai npui nai charireng jaojiu thiusu lanrabo-e, khatdi sise takum chinniagu riak-charuk-je-niakiu ngutrabo-e, chiudi haise chariu magenthiu rabo wansi-e.

Sichiujiu kanambo wan gase Tingwang gu kadalubo jupao situ maji makjiu kamshat mirabo-e. Namdi nai Charaky situ katambo mawangpao khatniu chari thiujiu kam mahami rabo-e. Tingwang niu kaden khaibo kanambo wanse tathiu-chari khatdi kam maharabose duidet kumjiu wangrabo-e.

Mawangpao siniu maidung kakeng khuga takum chinnialeng katanbo ladriat khat kam khaine, sichiujiu sibo wan-phanse loidasai, charathiubo nai wa kadkhaibose paniu kam mahami rabo-e. Mai kapingbo, wan haise Charaky ton kuthuboga katang bammi surabo-e, sichiujiu haise Tingwang niu paleng kaden khaibo kanambose wangtang makthen bammi rabo-e.”
(Cyrus niu Persia mai wangdi thiumibo pasumbo kumga, Daniel, Belteshazzar chiujiudi kubo khuga champao khat hai madukhai-e. Sibo champao hai majibo-e chiudi paramba sira kungchang-kung-e.
Sibo wan gase I achungjiu n-nidkak sum bamkhang-e.
N-nidkak sum lunggase Iniu chami-chakha, tiu kawibo khatdi sak kawibo wadi tiumak sakmakjiu maksai apidi tamai makjiu bambo-e.
Takum gu raithubo hiugu, jeng makai-je-madaikiubo naise, singgiu kadibo Tigris hugen gase I chap bamniu-e.
Iniu phuikhangboga, fainoi khatdi kachia khen-gak khekbo mai khattu Iniu ngao-e.

Papumse tiuchang kum ben-e. Pazuse hengri kalikbo kumjiu ran-ran-e, khatdi pamikse chami kumjiu hengban-satle. Pa-npom nai pangense thamasan padbo tanaagi kumme, khatdi pakhuanse chamai mendi khuan kumjiu senpadle.
Sibo madungaose aronna ngaobo-e. Asai siukin maise wakhatnadi ngaomakge, paliura pingbo jengniu pakjiu nbai mide.
Maisuang habo madungao haise phuijiu aronna chapbam niu-e. Ajeng hasiak mide, sichiujiu azuse kalimibo jengniu mai khatniudi atu silulak mide.
Iniu pakhuanse chiuboga, achun thiusita mijiu kadihga azu makhumkiu n-khuang bam mide.
Siga chaben khatniu aben jukhang khaijiu pi khudung khaide, sigadi I masandi-di bamkha-e.
maza siniu akhuga din-e. “Daniel yo, Tingwang niu natu lungsa-e. Sulujiu Iniu dinkhai rabose nking mawilulo. Atu hai nakhuga langkhaibo-e.” Paniu haichiu dinboga, masandi-di palunjiu I suchapde.
Siga paniu din-e, “Daniel yo, pingtalo. Nangniu ningting daolura naronna manonkiura chapkhaibo nai gasu Tingwang niu narathoi chiukhai mibo-e. Narathoi situ paokak khaira I wangbo-e.
Persia mai wangdih gu maza siniu atu jeng makai-je-khatkiu kham mibo-e. Persia ga atu ronna khaidiak mibo donniu, mazadung wang Michael siniu wangjiu atu nkha khaibo-e.
Namaidung khuga pasai degu padralo chiubose nangniu silura I nakhuga wangbo-e. Haise pasai wangrabo lamga madungao si-e.”
Paniu haise dinboga, alad padmakjiu kadihlam phuikiu-e.
Siga chamai lun phungbo maza siniu, paben henpad lujiu amuntai dikhai bide. Iniu pakhuga din-e, “Paohubo yo, haibo, madungao siniu ajeng kam mahaju mibo jengniu, I hai masandi-di saosi lak mide.
I hai pawangpiu masuangga chapbambo kavang khat kum mide. Dechiu Iniu natu npao ngamlu ralo? Ajeng hasiak mide khatdi asiudi hamide.”
Paniu atu thinkhai lanboga, ajeng tan sude.
Paniu din-e, “Tingwang niu natu lungsa-e, siniu wakhatnadi nalung chariu tulo maksai pingmi tulo.”
Paniu haise dinboga, ajeng tanbi khangjiu Iniu din-e, “Paohubo yo, nangniu dinrabose akhuga dinkhailo. Nangniu atu piwikhai bide.”

Paniu din-e, “Dekamra Iniu nakhuga wangjiulo nang sima? Majibo Ariak khuangga raokhaibose nakhuga madu khai raleng-e. Tuhoira Iniu Persia maigu akhepiu maza situ aphenra malanwang mine. Sibosai, Greek maigu akhepiu mazase wangrabo-e. Israel maigu akhepiu
Paniu atu nkha khaira, khatdi gukhaira pangam-e.
Sichiujiu Iniu tuhoi nakhuga dinrabo hai majibo-e.”

Maza siniu din-e, “Chawang khangsum niu Persia riga mawang lanne, siga pamadaibo piu hai kakimai suang lungwi rabo-e. Paniu lungwi pamalan khangboga khatdi tan-palan khangboga Greek mai wangdihtu atungsu rabo-e.
“Sigasu chawang katanbo khat padsu rabo-e. Pawangdihse dirabo-e khatdi paniu kamnibo hina kamsu rabo-e.
Chiudi pagu pumtan tan-palan khangboga pawangdihse njan-madai thiumi rabo-e. Pakhu gasu makbo katambo wangdungniu pasung mawang lanrabo-e, chiudi pagu pumtan kumjiu paliu mawang tanglu lakge.
“Egypt mai wangpiuse tanrabo-e. Pagu riphenpao khatniu pasuang tan-nkiujiu pawangdih kadibo lamse mawang surabo-e.

Takum wajiu saiga Egypt mai wangniu Syria mai wangtu kawi thiujiu panah aliupuitu chami thiukhai sune. Chiudi sibogu kawithiubo guse pating theng lakge, sichiujiu patudi, pakina tudi panah tudi khatdi pasai suiwangbo kavangmai tudi kamshat mirabo-e.
Pating thengmakbo lungga, sibopui kiriang mai khatniu chawang thiu surabo-e. Paniu Syria mai wangpiugu riphentu chari thiujiu paliugu charireng lungga ngutjiu paliutu ngamlu rabo-e.
Sichiujiu paliu rameng situ Egypt dihlam phungkhaijiu khatdi kachia rangkanggu maniase paliu rameng khuga kadkhai mirabo-e.
Agi-manaibo thiulubo takum wajiukha sai Syria mai wangniu Egypt tu chari thiusune, chiudi manomjiu patu pi malankhai mirabo-e.
“Syria mai wangpiu nahdungniu chari thiura kadenjiu riphen kakengtu khom madui sune. Paliu ruangga khangkhat siniu duidet wangbo kumjiu mikremaigu charireng situ aphen sune.
Siga Egypt mai wangpiuse palung pomjiu Syria mai wangtu chari thiujiu pagu riphen kakengkhatu haphun lurabo-e.
Paniu chari ngamlubo donniu khatdi riphendung kakengtu kamshat mibo donniu pah wasao thiu sune, chiudi paniu chari ngamjutjiu bamlakge.
“Syria mai wangpiuniu karaibo suang riphen khom makeng lan sune. Pawan saisuijiu paniu wa katimawi lumai khatdi kengdiangbo riphentu puilujiu wanglan sune.

Siga Egypt mai wangtu maidung kakengniu suimakjiu atung surabo-e. Sichiujiu Daniel yo, naliu jat gasu palungpom kasamai khangsia niudi paliuniu madungao ngaomibo saisuijiu chari thiu sune, chiudi paliuniu ngamlu lakge.
Sichiujiu Syria mai wang siniu chari rengse tao-magui lujiu namdi situ haphunmi sune. Siga Egypt maigu riphendung siniu chari thiu tami sune; paliugu tanthubo maidung siniudi paliu pumtan hami sune.
Syria maigu riphendung siniu paliu chunning kam sune, mai khatniudi paliutu kham lakge. Paniu pumtanse daojiu Ladriat khaibo Kadihga wang chap sune.
“Syria mai wangpiu siniu pagu riphendung hinatu majang lujiu chari thiura tadpad sune, sichiujiu panahpui
Sibosai, duipui gasu paniu jatdung kakengtu asunjiu ngamlu sune. Chiudi patu sangdiumai jupao khatniu ngamlujiu pagu chaliangbose kam maha mine; yo, Syria mai wangpiugu chaliangbose pakhuga bamme.
Chawangse pagu charireng lam malan khaimi sune, chiudi patuse mainiu ngammi rabo-e, sise pagu kanambo thiumi rabo-e.

“Katambo chawang khatniu pasai suilujiu pawangdihga chakhiu-chalan keng nkiu khangra maidung khuga ramkha lura chakampaotu langkhai sune. Chiudi chawang tuse wathengkha makbo lungga kamshat mine chiudi sise chari gasu makge, maksai charuang gasudi makge.”
maza siniu haichiu dinkiu lande: “Syria maigu pasai wanglan rabo wangpiuse kasabo mai-e, paniu chawang thiura pamaji wadi habo-e, chiudi pason-kasabo siniu maningmak jingjiu pumtanse sutlu sune.
Patu atungmai tura, Tingwang gu Dibo Singkutu katangna kam maha mirabo-e khatdi luthon mirabo-e.
Chagiang thiujiu paniu jatdung katam maitu son surabo-e, sichiujiu paniu jat poinakha riga mawang bam tadi, pahai tanbi-bi khangsune.

Paniu wadi kachan khaibo hajiu lungwibo kadihtu chari thiusu rabo-e khatdi nda papao papeh mainiu kam matai kamakbose paniu kam sune. Sichiujiu chari haphun lubo mania nai chakhiu-chalanse pasai suitad maileng njankhai sune. Paniu charirengdungtu aphenra rangsune, chiudi pawanse paleng hawangmi sune.

“Paniu Egypt mai wangtu aphenra hujiu riphen kadi khat khom madui sune, siga Egypt maidi riphen kang kadi khattu maluang lujiu asun sune. Chiudi Egypt mai wangpiu situ son mibo jengniu pah ngamlu lakge.
Pagu withubo ladtipao siniu patu kam mahami sune. Pagu riphen kakeng khatu kamshatjiu kam mahami sune.

Sichiujiu chawang khangniase kuangkai khatga maluang ntao lujiu tiu ncham sune chiudi panai lungchun sira sa-e, sichiujiu khat-khat khuga arat din sune. Pawan wangtang makbo jengniu panainiu masenbose wangtang lakge, palamra pawanse wangtang makha-e.

Syria mai wangpiu siniu Tingwang maidunggu characheng situ kam maha mira rangjiu paniu chari gasu haphun lubo mania hina phunglu pakylam wang mine, paniu kam kani hina kamjiu pagu kadihga malanwang mine.
“Pasai-kana paniu Egypt dihtu chari thiulan sune, chiudi siga tamsinjiu padsune.
Rom maidung siniu aliam gasu wanglujiu patu aphenjiu kam charen khai sune.
“Siga palung pomchang pomjiu malanmi sune, sichiujiu Tingwang maidunggu racheng situ kam mahara matan sune. Sibo rachengtu phutmibo maidunggu ladpikhaibo situ paniu lukhai sune.
Pagu riphendung khangsianiu Charaky situ kam tania mine. Naimachangna kadkhaibo rathak situ paliuniu khamjiu kapingbo charenbo guse kam sune.
Paru kasabo siniu sibo rachengtu phutmi maigu nkhase chawangniu lukhai sune, chiudi Tingwang saisui mai siniu aphen sune.

Maidunggu ningtingmai jupaodung siniu paliugu ningtingse maidung kakeng khatu katikhai sune. Chiudi pakak khatga paliu khangsia maitu chari gasu kamshat sune maksai maring rushat sune. khatdi khangsia maitu minlujiu kavang pi thiukhai sune.
Paliutu kamshatjiu bamboga, Tingwang maidungniu poinakha nkha daosune, chiudi khangsiamai paleng kasibo maidi padsune.

Ningtingbo jupaodung khangsia situ kamshatmi sune, chiudi maidung situ haibo jengniu kam masan khai rabo-e. Haise Tingwang niu retkhai mibo wanse wangtangjiu kanambo tingse wangmak then tadkiu bamrabo-e.

Papao-papehdungniu machabo radung tudi wajeng silakge, khatdi maipuidungniu masenbo ratudi wajeng chaklakge. Pachangjiu chara hinatu paniu wajeng chakkhai lakge. Palamra paliu mathiu suang pah di-nkiu-e chiujiu paniu maning-e.
Sibosung charirengtu gukhaibo ratu paniu chakhuang thiu sune. Sichiujiu papao-papeh mainiu wadaodi kahum makbo ra khuga paniu kachia, rangkang, tatiu-tataa khatdi paman kungbo kalen kadkhai sune.

Pagu charireng situ gukhaira paniu sangdiumai ratu kahum maitu lukhai sune. Patu mawangpao-e chiujiu lukhai maitu paniu chakhuang thiujiu chakam kadibo pikhaine khatdi tathuon thiujiu paliuleng kadih pikhai sune.

“Syria mai wangpiugu kanambo wanse wangsu dasai, Egypt mai wangpiu siniu chari thiu sune, siga Syria mai wangpiu siniu pagu pumtan pakhiangna jaojiu chaqon-kari, chaqondung khatdi maleedung kengkha thinlujiu aphenlan sune. Paniu kadih kakeng khatu duidet wangbo kumjiu chari thiu sune.
Ladriat Khaibo kadihtu tangna paniu chari thiujiu chamai sang-sangtu kamshat sune, chiudi Edom, Moab, khatdi Ammon kadihga masiak khai maise marilu rabo-e.
Paniu sibo kadih situ chari thiusuboga Egypt dih tudi masiak khai lakge,
Paniu Egypt maigu baikhai nbambo kachia nai rangkang, chakhiu-chalan khatdi paman kungbo mania hina lutadmi rabo-e. Paniu Libya nai Sudan maitu ngammi rabo-e.
Tingbang lamsu khatdi tingpi lamsu wangbo champao siniu patu kam charen khai sune, siga paniu palung pomjiu chari thiujiu maidung kengkhatu kamshat mirabo-e.
Paniu pawangdihgu kadibo mathenkyse Charaky thiukhaibo luong nai duipui kakga thiukhai sune. Chiudi patu nkha khaira mai hajiu shaimi rabo-e.”
Shaimi maidung kakengkha ringsulan rabo-e: sichiujiu khangsianiu tingtheng karingbose daorabo-e khatdi khangsianiu mangambose tingtheng khengrabo-e.
Ningtingbo jupaodung siniu tingpukgu kabenbo hinatu maluang ben macham rabo-e. Majibo kamra maidung kakengtu katikhai maidungse chagandung kumjiu tingtheng benbam sune.”
Sigasu maipiu khangnianiu singgiu hugen khat-khatlam chapbambo I ngao-e.
maza khat siniu hugen khatlam chapbambo maza khuga maniu-e, “Maisuang habogu kanambo wan hai dedao padsu ralo?”
Paniu kadinbose I chiu-e, chiudi parambase I silu makge. Sijengniu Iniu maniu-e, “Chiudi, paohubo yo, haise dechiu loikhai ralo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Tuhoira nang tadmi rabo-e, Daniel yo, palamra haise kaloibo wan wangmak then mahinjiu baikhai bamrabo ladkengdung si-e.
Maidung kakeng khatu kam masan khai rabo-e. Kasamaidung siniu sitang lakge, chiujiu paliuse sajutjiu bamrabo-e; haise kaningtingmai ronna sitanglu rabo-e.
Naimachangna rathak thiubo mathak mibo nai gasu Mai kapingbo hai padjiu, tingmik 1,290, padrabo-e.
Sichiujiu tingmik 1,335, tangbo malum lumaise padon wirabo-e!
“Sichiujiu Daniel yo, nangra kaloibo tangjiu malum lulo. Sichiujiu nang shaimi tadi kanambo wan gase nang ringsu lujiu nagu tathuanse daorabo-e.”
Sijengniu Diblaim nahpui Gomer kubo puitu Hosea niu panao thiude. Panai-nah nahraibo, npiumainah khat lunglubosai,

niu Hosea khuga din-e, patuse “Jezreel” chiu kulo. Palamra nda papao Jehu niu, Jezreel ga maitu kamshatjiu nuan tenkhai mibo jengniu, Israel mai wangtu Iniu sajai pira pating namide, Iniu Jehu kiriangtu kam mahami rabo-e.
Sichiujiu Jezreel Ramjeng gasu Israel maigu riphen pumtan situ Iniu kam maha mine.”
Gomer niu panah niabo thiujiu npuimai khat lung lande.
Chudi Iniu Judah maidungtu lungsa khaine, paliu
Gomer niu panahpui situ alaolubo sai, pawon phunglanjiu npiumainah khat lunglande.
Hosea khuga din-e, “Patu hai ‘Amaimakbo’” chiu kukhailo, palamra Israel maidung hai amai makge, Idi paliu Rawang makge.”
Judah mai nai Israel mai hai lung aruang lanmi rabo-e. Paliu mathiu khat thiulu rabo jupao khat kadalujiu paliu dihga lung amansaijiu lungrabo-e. Yo, Jezreel gu tingmikse kadibo tingmik thiurabo-e!
Sichiujiu nakangmai Israel maitu “Tingwang maidung” khatdi “Rapiu niu lungsa maidung” chiujiu kukhai sulo.
Anah maidung yo, naliu pui hai anao tamide, Idi pakina tamide, chiudi patu hiamlulo, paniu papum kajonpui thiujiu makha kinbo gasu sichiuta mira hiamlulo.
Paniu suimaksai, patu manapadbo nai kumjiu Iniu pafai-pani gaolujiu papumruang phutkhai mine. Iniu patu hai kasangbo nai patam kahabo kadih kumjiu charijiu pishai khaimi rabo-e.

Iniu panah maidungtu lungsa silakge, paliura mangam makbo chakhapui nahdung-e. Pah paronna haichiu din-e, “Ira arammai-khangpiu, aleng katiu kasak, chafai-tani, wasadui khatdi jaw pikhaibo maidung khulam tadmine.”
Sijengniu, patu kham mira Iniu tathuken siniu kareng rengnam mine.

Paniu pamaraipiudungtu hatad sune chiudi paliutu hatang lulakge. Paniu paliutu phiusune, chiudi paliutu daolu lakge. Siga paniu haichiu dinsune, “I akina karaipiu khulam malanwang mine --I hai, ndara tuhoi suang wijiu bam niubo-e.”
Iniu paleng, tek, jaw, wasa khatdi kachia rangkang khatdi paniu Baal tu kahumboga thinbo hinase pikhaibo-e chiubo wadaodi paniu suikhai makge.
Sijengniu, atiat tingga agu kalen pikhaibo alin-tara khatdi miusydungse lulan mine, khatdi pafai-pani pikhaibo chakhaogiu fai nai fainoise lulan mine.
Pamarai piudung masuangga Iniu pafai-pani gaothon mine, siga paliu mai khatniudi akhu gasu patu gukhai ngamlakge.
Iniu pagu chakhuang changee thiubo—chahiu gudi takum gudi Tabamnai mathakbo sidi wagu madui hinadi kam maha mine.

Pamarai piudungtu akhi khaibo jengniu paleng pikhaibo mumsireng nai ndutbangdung-e, chiujiu dinbo hinase Iniu kam mahami rabo-e. Sichiujiu Iniu pagu mumsireng nai charasireng situ manam pithiu khaijiu nkan khaodungniu kam mahami rabo-e.
Paniu atu mangai lujiu Baal khuga parim wibo mataojiu khatdi papuan kawibose khailujiu pamarai piudungtu hatad mibo jengniu patu mathad rabo-e. Haise
Sijengniu patu Iniu ramjingga puiwang lanne, siga Iniu marai chamniu patu hiamlan rabo-e.

Siga Iniu pagu mumsirengse paleng pikhai lanne, khatdi Magenthiubo Ramjeng situ machunbo kamun pithiu khai bine. Siga paniu nahtingga Egypt dih lamsu wangbo tingga paokakbo kumjiu paniu atu npaokak lanrabo-e.
Sichiujiu paniu atu pakina-e chiujiu kulan rabo-e, paniu atu pagu Baal si-e chiujiu kulanlak mide.
Iniu patu pijiu Baal zanse wadaodi dinlanlak mide.

Sibo tinggara Iniu nkankhaodung nai thingnadung hinatu ladriat thiukhaijiu, paliuniu amaidungtu kam masalak mide. Iniu sibo kadih gase tathiu chari maniadung, chaheng changiu khatdi tavaipi luthon mine, sichiujiu amaidung agi-manaijiu, wadaodi manang makjiu lungmi rabo-e.
Israel mai yo, Iniu natu anaoleng lune;
Iniu majijiu khatdi nchangjiu lungne;
Iniu saomakbo lungsiat nai lungsabose
nakhuga lenkhaijiu tingtheng agu thiumine.
Iniu agu ladriatse majaijiu natu agu thiumine,
siga nangniu atu
Sibo tingga Iniu amai Israel mai rathoi paokak khai bine.
Iniu kadihpiriga tingriu pikiu khai bine,
siga kadih gasu alin-tara khatdi mumsy khatdi takysa padrabo-e.
“Lungsamakbo situ” Iniu lungsabose madukhaine,
khatdi “Amai makbo” chiubo situ “Naliu hai amai-e” chiujiu kune,
siga paliuniu “Nang hai aliu Rawang si-e” chiujiu paokakne.
Sijengniu patu liulanra Iniu rangkang kariu-je-mangiukiu khatdi takhui taju kaikhat-je-ringiu pikhaide.
Siga Iniu pakhuga dinkhai mibo-e, pating kathengkha nangniu makha makjiu maksai napum jonmakjiu, atu khuanbam niusai, Iniu natu khuanbam niurabo-e.

Sichiujiu Israel maidungniu pating kathengkha paliu wang maksai jupao thiumakjiu, rathak thiumakjiu maksai masanbo katiang thiumakjiu, charameng thinmakjiu maksai wameng khoilujiu taden thon makjiu lungrabo-e.
Chiudi Israel maidungniu
Haibo kadihga lungmaidung riga
Paliuniu ladriat thiulujiu sise kampang-e, chamaitu gi-e, aga-e, npui-npiu lungmao-e. Chakhui-chamao hai nkiubi-bi-e, khattu gibo sai khattu gilanjiu bamme.
Sijengniu sibo kadihse sangmi rabo-e sichiujiu siga lungmai hina shaimi rabo-e chakhao thingna hina khatdi chakhadi shaimi rabo-e.”
Nchun n-nien saomakjiu naliu maigu humtiu-e, phaimiukakung maidungdi naliu suang wison makge. Iniu naliu pui, Israel tu kam maha mine.

Amaidungse hamide, palamra paliuniu atu lukhai makge. Naliu singkudungniu atu lukhai makge, Iniu katikhaibo haitu naliu suini makge, sijengniu naliutu Iniu suikhai lakge khatdi naliu nahmaidung situ agu singku leng suikhai lakge.
“Singkudung naliu kengbi-bi, nuan kambi-bi mide, siniu naliutu chakhuang thiubo sung kam mangam khai birabo-e.
Amaidung nuan gasu naliu lungwikhang mide, sijengniu paliutu pijiu nuan kamnibi-bira naliuniu masenne.
Maidungniu daobo sajai kumgapjiu naliudi daorabo-e! Naliuniu kasabo ngam kamkhai mibo jengniu naliutu Iniu sajai pirabo-e.

Naliu dam kajibo rathak maniase naliu tiurabo-e, chiudi mariujiu bamrabo-e. Naliuniu kadih tam kawibo ratu kahum bamdi naliu nah lunglakge, palamra naliuniu akhu gasu mari lujiu kakibo ra saisui tad mibo jengniu-e.”

Paliuniu tasingpek gasu madu khaira khengjiu bamme! Paliuniu sinibose tasingtang siniu paliu khuga dinkhaijiu bamme! Paliuniu atu phutmide. Maipui khatniu makha mibo kumjiu, paliudi katambo radung khuga paliu pum pimide.
Maluongton ka-nsiangbo bamga paliuniu charathiu khai-e, singbang kakubo khatdi singniu kengbo hanggase paliuniu maruta matao-e, palamra singbang hiuse aguijiu aman-e!
“Sijengniu naliu nahpuidungse paliu pum jon-e, khatdi naliu mupuidungse makha-e
Chiudi, haibo jengniu paliutu Iniu sajai pilakge, palamra naliura naliu pumsiakniu charakygu chakhapuidungtu
“Israel maidung naliu akhuga matunmak tadi, Judah maidung naliura sibo mao phungmak mai thiululo. Gilgal ga maksai Bethaven
Israel maidung hai qonniam kumjiu paliu lung tanne. Dechiujiu Iniu paliutu mily poidungtu kumjiu piuriang liga pitiu khai ralo?
Israel maidung hai charamengtu kahumra ronna machun mide. Paliu maningga pijiu tadsulo.
Jaw sak maniu lubo saiga, paliugu makhabo lunlungga paliu diu wijiu, chakhuang thiubotu suang mangambotu paliuniu masenjiu bamme.
Paliutu tingkainiu hunthon mirabo-e, sichiujiu paliugu nkengmai rathak gase paliu mangambo daorabo-e.

“Haise kinglo, naliu singkudung yo! Nkinglo Israel maidung yo, nking mawi lulo! Chawang kikhun ga lungmai naliu nkinglo! Naliu nchangjiu ladjan thiu rabo-e--sijengniu ladjan hai naliu riga wangrabo-e! Mizpah ga naliu hai tathak mawimide, Tabor Luongga tathak machung khai mide.
Akakia namdiga kasukbo chakhomky gasu Iniu naliu mathiutu sajai pirabo-e.
Israel mai hai dechiulo chiubo I si-e—paliuniu atu kahumra buimakge.”
Maidung siniu kasa kammibo jenggasu paliu Rawang khuga mariwang lulak mide. Charameng kahumbo siniu paliutu thinman lujiu, paliuniu
Israel maidunggu wasao thiubo siniu paliu riga senpadjiu bamme. Paliu nuan jengniu paliu phi masuijiu kao mide, Judah maidungdi paliu saisuijiu kao macham mide.
Paliugu mily nai matom kabui
khuga paliu chamchang makge; paliu nahdung hai paliugu makge. Sijengniu tuhoira paliutu khatdi paliu kadih haitu kam mahanuang mirabo-e.
Chari makese Gibeah ga mudkhai sulo! Ramah ga chari bangse biukhai sulo! Bethaven
Sajai pikhai rabo tingmikse wangkinne, siniu Israel mai hami rabo-e. Israel maidung yo, haise padsiak rabo-e!
Israel maidungse chariu magenthiujiu bamme: paliuniu daorabo kadihse hamide, palamra paliuleng wadi pikhaira hamai khulam paliu tadmide.
Iniu Israel maitudi, Judah maitudi kam mahami rabo-e.

“Israel maidungniu paliu dejiukha marajiu bamlo chiubo, khatdi Judah maidung siniu paliu jamse ngaoboga, Israel maidung siniu Assyria mai wangdi khuga nkha khengra tadmide, chiudi paniu paliutu wikhai silakge, khatdi paliu jam hai wikhai ngamlakge.
Iniu Israel mai nai Judah maidungtu ndongqui kumjiu atung rabo-e. I apumsiakniu paliutu tatap-tap lujiu thonmi rabo-e. Iniu paliutu jukariu suboga, mai khatniudi paliutu gukhai ngamlakge.
“Amaidungse paliu nuan jengniu magenthiu sui lujiu atu phiuwang lanmak then Iniu paliutu phutmine. Paliu magenthak gasu paliuniu atu phiuwangdi sui-e.”
Maidungniu din-e, “
Jeng nia jeng sum lungga paniu aliutu pisukhai lanjiu, aliu pakhuga lung mine.
tu silura aliu kamkhe. Nsuan tingben padbo kum, khatdi kariak tingga tingriu wangbo kum, pah aliu khuga maomakjiu wang rabo-e.”
Chiudi
Sijengniu naliutu ladjan thiura khatdi kam maha mira agu champaose naliu khuga dinkhaira agu phaimiukakung maitu langkhai mibo-e. Iniu naliu khugasu lunibo sira malapabo khatdi masanbo si-e.
Iniu naliu khugasu masenbo sira naliugu khaorui kadkhaibo makjiu, naliugu saomakbo lungsiat situ-e. Akhuga maring rukhaibo rathak suangdi amaidungniu atu sibo Iniu machunbo-e.
“Chiudi paliuniu haibo kadihga ngutgapbo gasu Adam
Gilead hai chamai kasamai khatdi maitu kagimai siniu phuibambo namdisi-e.
Singkudung hai maitu npuikiga limjiu wa suttiu mai kum mide. Masanbo bam Shechem lam tadbo puidi katangna gadi paliuniu maitu kamshat bamme. Paliuniu kasabo haitu kamni siakjiu kam bambo-e!
Israel mai khuga kapingbo hai Iniu ngaopad mide; amaidung hainiu charamengtu kahumbo gasu paliu ronna kam tania mide.
“Judah maidung yo, naliu ngamkam jengniu, naliu tudi sajai pira Iniu pating dak khai mide.

“Iniu amai Israel maidungtu wikhai lan nibo tingga, paliutu lung singkhiu khai lan niboga, paliu nkhai rili kasabo nai paliu ngamkam kasabo ronna ngao-e. Paliu khat-khattu sontiu-e, maiky kampang lujiu aga-e; npui nchengga maigu sutle.
Kasabo hina hai Iniu maningtao rabo-e, chiubo hai paliu wadaodi maning khai makge; chiudi paliu nuan hainiu paliutu tao magui mide, siniu paliutu I phuikhai mak daolak mide.”

Paliu mathiu hai paliu lung sachang sa-e, khatdi kadin piumakge. Paliuniu maitu marengbo sira n-mangga bambo masumdangse kumbo-e, haise taruak khuakmainiu chakhi khai lujiu npungkhai bambo pawan tangmak then phe-aja kamakbose kumbo-e.
Chawanggu changeebo nai paliuniu chawang nai chakampaodungtu jaw pi sak maniu khailujiu kammeng khai-e.
Yo, paliu thak kasabo hainiu n-mang kumjiu tao maren bamme. Paliu lungpom hai nchun kisang-e, khatdi nsuan padsai haise chami kumjiu tao maren pad mi-e.
“Paliu lungpom gasu paliugu jupaodungtu kamshatle. Paliu wangdung situ khat saiga khattu gijiu bamme, chiudi mai khatniudi nkha khaira akhuga kheng makge.”
Paliuniu haichiu sangdiumaitu akhaijiu bambo hainiu paliu pumtantu kam maha bambo-e chiubo simakge. Paliuleng tingmikse riamkhai mide, chiudi paliuniu sise simakge.
Israel maidunggu wasao thiubo hainiu paliu riga kapjiu bamme. Padjiu bambo hina jengniu paliu
Kapangbo makhao kumjiu, Israel mai len maguijiu bamme; pamaidung siniu raiboga Egypt maidungtu nkha khaira ku-e, sibo sai paliuniu Assyria mai khulam tadkhai-e!
Chiudi thingnatu kumjiu Iniu tathak thiulujiu paliu tadpadbo ga manmi rabo-e. Paliuniu kasa kam mibo jengniu paliutu Iniu sajai pirabo-e.
“Paliu hai nchum mide! Paliuniu atu phutlujiu atung bamme. Paliutu kam mahami rabo-e. Iniu paliutu gukhaini-e, chiudi paliuniu atu kahumbo thakse maji makge.

Paliu lung masanjiu akhuga kheng makge, chiudi charameng kahummai thak kumjiu paliuniu nkhuang kalajiu bamme. Paliuniu tek-jaw leng khengbo tingga, nkengmai kumjiu paliu ronna paliu-gen tazai kampadjiu bamme paliu hai dejiukha salo!
Iniu paliutu makuat khaijiu pitan khaibi tadi, paliuniu atu kasa kamra rang-e.

Paliuniu akhu gasu mari lujiu pumtan kahabo ra khulam tadmide. Paliu hai malum silak mibo, tapiap mibo tavaipi kum mide. Palamra paliugu jupaodungse paliu chamkang di-e, siniu nkhai kasabo shitga paliu shai rabo-e, siga Egypt mainiu paliutu nuirabo-e.”
Paliuniu atu paliu Rawang kujiu khatdi paliu hai amaidung-e chiu dinbamdi, paliuniu atu si-e chiujiu bamdi, paliuniu kawibose luthon mide.
Haijengniu paliugu mikremaidung siniu paliutu hasu rabo-e.
