“Amaidungniu chawang kada-e, chiudi paliu maningga kada-e, paliugu jupaoleng langpadle chiudi amaning gasu makge. Paliugu kachia, rangkang khoi lujiu charameng damme—siseniu paliutu kam mahara leng-e.
Samaria namdiga lungmaidung siniu kachia tomchi-meng kahumbo situ Iniu mareng-e. Iniu paliutu alung pomchang pomme. Charameng situ paliuniu dethengkha phutmakjiu bamralo?
Israel maidunggu chagi aket maidung siniu kampadbo charamengse chara makjing-e! Samaria ga kahum bambo kachia tomchi situ kampang tap-tap mirabo-e!
Paliuniu tingkai maruk khaisai, paliuniu tingthung tingkai situ atiat rabo-e! Wadaodi minpad silakbo luzam siniu wadaodi katiu lungpad silakge. Wagaje minpad tadi sangdiumainiu tiulu rabo-e.
Israel maidung haidi katambo jat kum mide, khatdi pangmibo chali kumjiu pageng hamide.
Nkan qonniam kumjiu paliu lung tanjiu, Israel maidung hai paliu maningbo npuiga tadmide. Paliutu nkhakhai raleng Assyria mai khuga tadmide khatdi paliutu jukhaira katambo jat khuga paman pimide.
Chiudi tuhoira Iniu paliutu khom madui lujiu sajai pisune. Assyria mai wangdipiu siniu paliutu mathad suboga paliu pum kathiubo siniu nkuon roi-roi surabo-e.
“Paliu nuan luthonra Israel mainiu rathakbam thiusu makengbi-bi paliuniu nuan kambi-bi mide!
Pariak singamlakbo katikhaise Iniu amaidung leng raokhai-e, chiudi paliuniu sise suimak jingjiu lukhai makge.
Paliuniu akhuga chara thiukhai lujiu, sibo meese paliuniu tiu-e. Chiudi

“Israel maidungniu chawangkining thiukhai-e, chiudi paliuniu paliugu Dampaotu mangai mide. Judah maidungniu charireng bambo namdidung thiukhai-e, chiudi Iniu chami langkhaijiu sibo chawangkining nai namdidungse ruthon mirabo-e.”

Israel maidung yo, naliugu changeebo nai nkengmai kumjiu kamta sulo. Naliu hai naliu Rawang khugasu mari lujiu, pakhuga nchangta mide. Haibo ramga lungmai naliu mathiuse chakhapui kumjiu naliu ronna Baal khuga jonkhai mide, sichiujiu paniu naliuleng pikhaibo-e chiujiu maningbo miusy situ naliuniu lungsa-e!
Chiudi naliugu miusy khatdi takisase tiubui lakge, khatdi jawse hami rabo-e.
Israel maidung siniu
Sibo sangdiumai kadih gase paliuniu jaw kamlujiu
Sichiusai

Sansabose wang dasai maidungse lung mara mine, siga Egypt mainiu paliutu khom madui lujiu Memphis ga paliutu baikhai mine! Paliugu kachia-rangkang khatdi paliuniu thiukhai kydung bambo gase tathuken nai chapheniu lungsim mirabo-e.

Tingwang niu atu phaimiukakung khat pi thiukhai lujiu pamai Israel maidungtu kachan khaira langkhaibo-e. Chiudi Iniu tadkhaibo bam machang naliuniu thingnatu kumjiu, manra atu tathak thiu-e. Tingwang tu Kahumboky siakga katang, maidung hai phaimiukakung gu mikremai thiu-e.
Gibeah ga
Israel maidunggu kendibose thingna kumjiu lentad mine, paliu khuga nahmai lungpadta mine, maipuidung pawon phungta mine, tanah taota mine.
Paliuniu nahmaitu makuatkhangdi Iniu lutad mine, mai khat tudi masiak khai lakge, Iniu haibo maidungtu phutkhaiboga paliu khuga kapingbo padrabo-e.”
Haibo maidung khuga degu kamkhaira Iniu khengralo? Paliugu maipuidungtu pijiu nakampui pithiu khailo! Paliuniu paliu nahtu makuat ngamlakbo pithiu khailo!
Israel mai hai pamen sangmibo singmen kumjiu paliu sy masi ngamlak mide. Paliu nah lunglak mide, paliuniu lungdi paliuniu haijiukha kungbo nahdung situ Iniu kamshat mine.”
Iniu machajiu bambo Rawang siniu pamaidungtu thon mine, palamra paliuniu pacham phungmakge, Paliu hai jatdung ruangga lungron ponjiu lungmi rabo-e.

Israel maidung haira mumsy masiphuiting bambo mumsirengse kumbo-e. Paliu lungwi khangbi-bi, paliuniu rathakbam thiu makengbi-bi-e. Paliu kadih siniu wapad makeng then, paliuniu kahumbo masanbo tukang tiangse palun kam mawibi-bi-e.
Pason paru kasabo lungchun phungmaidungse tuhoira paliu nuan jengniu chariubo kheng siakra mide. Tingwang niu paliugu rathak bamdung nai paliugu masanbo tiangdung situ kam mahami rabo-e.
Maidung siniu haichiu dinpadji surabo-e, “Aliugu chawang ha-e, palamra aliuniu
Paliuniu mathakhu lad talam bamme khatdi aratbo ladriat thiujiu pageng habo chawat thiujiu bamme. Majibo situ majimakbo pithiu mide. Phukhai nbambo luga patai karabo piumen puaksubo kumbo-e.
Samaria ga lungbam maidungse paliugu kachia tomchi
Charameng situ Assyria lam pontadjiu kadibo wangdipiu situ kalen thiujiu pimi rabo-e. Maidungniu ladpi khaibo situ Israel mainiu suimibo jengniu patu kam mangamjiu kam chaliukhai rabo-e.
Pagu chawang situ, tadui riga maten kinbo singpek kumjiu jutadmi rabo-e.

Israel maidungniu kahumbo, rameng bambo Aven raky situ kam mahami rabo-e. Thureng nai chaphepiu siniu paliugu rathakbam situ lunggom mirabo-e. Maidung siniu ramluongdung nai luongbutdung situ kujiu, “Aliutu baikhailo! Aliutu gomkhailo!” chiujiu senpadsu rabo-e.
Iniu nuan phungbo maidung haitu aphenjiu paliutu sajai pirabo-e. Jatdung wang aruang lujiu paliutu atungjiu sajai pisu rabo-e.

“Israel mai hai pawan khat gara thin agiu mibo tompuise kumjiu chamiuse taonira suikhai mibo-e. Chiudi matai kawibo pawangkining gase kabuikai khailujiu katanbo ngamse kamra Iniu chapkhai mibo-e. Iniu Judah maitu kabuikaise jura khatdi Israel maitu karathuakse jura kamkhai mibo-e.
Iniu din-e, ‘Naliuleng kasanbo kadihse phulujiu tacheng matipbo linse lingkhai sulo, khatdi naliuniu akhuga naliu chun ngutjiu machakhai mibo thoidamse atiat lulo. Tuhoi hai naliu
Chiudi sibo sung naliuniu kasabo linse lingkhaijiu sise atiatjiu bamme. Naliu arat gasu padbo rasyse naliu tiujiu bambo-e.
“Naliuniu naliugu chaqon-karidung khatdi naliugu pariak kengbo riphendung situ malumbo donniu,

charise naliu khuga wangjiu, naliugu charirengse kam mahami rabo-e. Haise Chawang Shalman niu Betharbel namditu chari thiuboga, maipuidung nai paliu nahdung situ kadipetjiu kamshat mibose kumgap rabo-e.
Bethel ga bammai yo, haise naliu khuga padrabo-e, palamra naliuniu kasabo kamkhai mibo donniu-e. Charise padgap sai, Israel mai wangpiuse shaimi rabo-e.”
“Israel mai nahtingga Iniu patu lungsa-e,
anahtu kumjiu Egypt dih gasu Iniu patu kupadbo-e.
Chiudi Iniu patu kukhaibo ga
pahai akhu gasu mari lujiu tadmide.
Amaidungniu Baal khuga chara thiukhaide;
paliuniu charameng gase parim wibo matao khaide.
Chiudi Iniu amai Israel mai ben julujiu tadraleng juchia khai bibo-e.
Iniu paliutu manang khai bibo-e, chiudi paliuniu sise simakge.
Iniu paliutu lungsabo nai kungbo siniu jukhai mibo-e;
Iniu abiangga ponkhang kiapkhai mibo-e.
Iniu kinkiu paliu won thiukhai mibo-e.
“Paliuniu akhuga wangra suimakbo jengniu, Egypt dihlam paliu malan khaira mide, khatdi Assyria mainiu paliutu mawang rabo mide.
Chari siniu paliugu namdise biak thonmi rabo-e, khatdi namdi rengmunse kampangmi rabo-e. Amaidung haitu kam mahami rabo-e, palamra paliuniu maningbo ronna paliu kamme.
Paliuniu akhu gasu pakmira ronna matanne. Paliu riga bambo wangkham jengniu paliu kapsune, chiudi paliu bangse mai khatniudi luakpad silakge.
Iniu natu dechiujiu thonmi ralo?
Iniu Zeboiim tu kambo kum maksai
Admah tu kam mahamibo kumjiu
dechiu natu kam mahami ralo?
Alungchun siniu wadaodi suilakge!
Iniu natu kungchang-kung-e.
Alungpom gasu natu sajai pikhai lakge;
Israel mai yo, Iniu natu kam maha lanlak mide.
Palamra I hai Tingwang ye, chamaina makge.
Masanbo Khat, Iniu natu maluang bambo-e.
Alung pomjiu nakhuga I wang lakge.
“Ndongqui kumjiu, Iniu paliugu mikremaitu kahiu suboga, amaidung siniu asai suiwang rabo-e. Tingnulam suniu paliu akhulam pakwang rabo-e.
Paliuniu Egypt dih lamsu thingna kumjiu khatdi Assyria lamsu makhao kumjiu lenwangsu rabo-e. Iniu paliutu paliu kylam puiwang lanbi rabo-e.

Israel mainiu nsuan gasu chawan tangbo pageng habo khatdi hamirabo ronna kamjiu bamme. Maipingbo nai kasabo ngamkam ronna paliu khuga nkiu khangjiu bamme. Paliuniu Assyria maitu majang wira kam bamme, khatdi Egypt mai khuga chali-chala thiujiu bamme.”
Judah maidung riga
chiubora maza tu nthijiu paniu ngamlubo-e. Paniu kapjiu thoikhaira kheng-e. Bethel ga Tingwang niu wangjiu aliu pao Jacob tu npao khai-e.
Ngamkambo Tingwang chiubo
Sijengniu tuhoira, Jacob kaikik maidung, naliu Rawang tu malumjiu, pakhuga malanwang lulo. Majijiu, palad phungjiu naliu Rawang niu kamkhai rabo situ ginjiu khuan bamlo.
Paliuniu din-e, ‘Aliu kalek wi-e, aliu san wi-e. Aliuniu nchang makjiu lungwibo haitu mai khatniudi dinra ha-e.’
Chiudi
“Iniu phaimiukakung maidung khuga npaojiu madungao kengjiu lenkhai-e, sichiujiu paliu khugasu amaidungtu kachan khai mibo-e.
Chiudi Gilead ga charamengtu kahumjiu bamkha-e, siniu charamengtu kahummai mathiuse shairabo-e. Gilgal ga matomchi thin lujiu charathiu bambo khatdi sibo rathakbam hinase tubaw thiumi rabo-e.”
Israel maidungniu Egypt dihga kavang thiujiu bambo gasu
Israel maidungniu
Karaigara Ephraim kiphiuniu chalad dinboga, Israel mai kiphiu hina ping-e; paliuniu Ephraim maitu ngang phui-e. Chiudi mai hinaniu Baal tu kahumjiu nuan kam mide, sijengniu paliu shairabo-e.

Chamai benniu, khatdi chamai maning siniu rangkanggi nai tanaaginiu kamlubo ramengtu paliuniu kahumjiu nuan hai tensao makjiu bamme. Sichiujiu paliuniu din-e, “Paliu khuga charathiu khailo!” Dechiujiu sikumbo matomchi lun-ga kamkhaibo charameng situ saoniu pamlujiu kapup ralo?

Sijengniu haibo maidung hai nsuan muangren kumjiu khatdi nsuan hanuang mirabo kajikduise kumjiu hami rabo-e. Paliu hai asaiphung gasu hunthon mibo magaoreng kum, khatdi mikhutki gasu padbo mikhut kum rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu kasangbo dih ramjing gase manang khai mibo-e.
Chiudi kadih kawibo gase naliu ngutlujiu naliu won magiu miboga khatdi naliu chari kim miboga, naliuniu wasao thiujiu atu mangai mibo-e.
Sijengniu naliutu Iniu ndongqui kumjiu atung rabo-e. Quiruk kumjiu naliugu npui nchengga limjiu chon rabo-e.
Papoi hamibo chahompui kumjiu Iniu naliutu atungjiu tatap-tapmi rabo-e. Ndongqui kumjiu pabam gasu Iniu naliutu tiulu rabo-e, khatdi nkan khaoniu tatap-tap mibo kumjiu naliutu tatap-tap mirabo-e.
“Israel maidung yo, Iniu naliutu kam mahami rabo-e! Sichiusai saoniu naliutu nkha ngam ralo?
Naliuniu chawang khatdi jupaoleng phiu-e chiudi paliuniu dechiujiu jatdungtu rankhai ngam ralo?
Iniu alungpom gasu naliutu chawangdung pikhai-e, sichiujiu alungpom gasu Iniu paliutu lutad lan mibo-e.
“Israel maigu nuan nai kamaobo hinase raolujiu khai bamme, khatdi sise baikhai bamme.
Israel mai ringlu rabo wan khatra bamkha-e, chiudi paliu hai lukhaira pangju-e, --manarabo ngena siniu papui won lung gasu npadni makbo kumjiu paliudi suimakge.
Haibo maidung haitu Iniu charuidih gasu maksai kashaibo pumtan gasu gukhai silakge. Kashaibo yo, nagu chararense phungwang sulo! Haibo maidung situ Iniu lungsa silak mide.
Israel mainiu chapiuniw kumjiu mawikhang bamdi, tingbang lamsuniu kathiubo tingkaise Iniu hunwang khaijiu paliugu akhun nai duipuise pijiu sangkhai mine. Paman kungbo hinase Iniu luthon mine.

Atu atungbo jengniu Samaria maitu sajai pikhai siak rabo-e. Pamaidungse chariga shaimi rabo-e, pamnahdung situ kadihga pon npuakped mirabo-e khatdi pawon phungbambo puidungtu paliu won rekpang mirabo-e.”
Israel maidung yo, naliu
khuga malanwang lujiu, naliugu kadkhaibo rathoise haichiu thiululo. “Aliu nuan hinase kuak khailo khatdi aliu rathoi lukhailo; sichiusai aliuniu ladriat khai mibo kumjiu aliuniu natu thuonne.
Assyria maidung siniu aliutu wadaodi gukhai ngam lakge, khatdi charigu chaqondung siniu aliutu gukhai ngam lakge. Aliugu charamengdungtu aliuniu wadaodi paliu hai Rawang si-e chiu dinlanta mine. Hey
“Amaidungtu Iniu akhuga puiwang lanrabo-e.
Alungchun pakhiangnaniu paliutu lungsa rabo-e;
Iniu paliutu alung pomta mine.
Kasangbo kadihga tingriu khaibo kumjiu,
Iniu Israel maidung khuga kamkhai bine,
paliu hai Lebanon gu singbangdung kumjiu
paliu men matip rabo-e.
Paliu hai charapen kumjiu penrabo-e.
Takisibang kumjiu paliu lun wijiu,
ringjiu kasanbo ke bonkhang rabo-e.
Paliu hai Lebanon gu singchongbang kumjiu
paliu rim manamwi rabo-e.
Iniu gukhaibo hangga paliu lunglan rabo-e.
Mumsirengga pasy masi mawibo kumjiu
paliugu miusyse masi mawi rabo-e.
Lebanon gu jaw kumjiu paliu zan tadrabo-e.
Charamengdung khuga Israel mainiu wadi kamra hamide,
paliu rathoise Iniu paokak khaijiu paliutu gukhai bine;
Tingtheng madiakbo singbang khattu kumjiu
Iniu paliutu sungkhai bine; I hai paliugu thoidam hina phibang si-e.”
Haiga raokhaibo hai ningting maidungniu silulo, khatdi paliu lungga khai lulo.
Haise Pethuel nahpiu Joel khuga
Nking mawilo, naliu kating maidung, Judah ga bammai hina nking khailo.
Haikumbose naliu ken-ga maksai naliu pao-peh ken-ga padkhai matai mima?
Haise naliu nahmai khuga dinkhai bilo, paliuniu paliu nahmai khuga dinkhai sai,
paliudi pasai kanabo ken-ga lungmai khuga dinmi sulo.
Takaodungse baokhat saiga baokhat alin-tara hina riga wangjiu,
baokhatniu tiu masiakbose baokhat siniu tiukam mide.
Jaw sak maniumaidung sulujiu kaplulo;
jaw sakjiu bammai naliu kap marung lulo;
palamra kasanbo jaw kam raleng mumsyse hamide.
paliu hai tan-e khatdi paliu riakdi kengjujiu sikam lakge;
paliu hiudi ndongqui hiu kumjiu liang-e.
Paliuniu aliugu mumsireng kam maha mide,
khatdi ndutbang hina gikam lude.
Pakeh hinase shaikam makthen, paliuniu pagi gaothon kam mide.
Chami thiurabo pui khatniu pakina rabo piu
shaimibo jengniu achungbo kum,
achungjiu kaplulo naliu chamainadung yo.
Charakyga kadkhaira miusydi, jawdi hamide
singkudung achungjiu bamme.
Miusy malang mide siniu kadih achung mide
palamra miusy hina kam masa mide,
mumsy sidi kimide takisibangdi ntang mide.
Chalu tenmaidung yo, achung lulo;
mumsireng akhijiu bammai naliu kaplulo,
palamra takhuimiu nai tathiuse hamide,
yo, alin tara hina kam maha mide.
Mumsibang nai ndutbang hina kikam mide;
charasibang hina aguijiu shaikam mide.
Chamainagu ringabose hamide.
Maliufai benlujiu kaplulo, rathakbamga macha bambo, singkumai naliu!
Charakyga tadlujiu nchun kapsang lulo!
Naliu Rawang, khuga kadkhaira katiu kasak wadi hamide.
Maidungtu kumadui lujiu kalumri raleng chamtan pikhailo!
Judah ga bammai hina khatdi jupaodung hinadi;
Charakyga madui lujiu naliu
Ngamkambo siniu kam maha rabo tingmikse dejiukha kapingbo gulo!
Aliugu miusy kam mahamibo jengniu wadi kamra simakjiu aliu phui bamme.
Aliu
Kadih sangmibo jengniu chalindi shaimide.
Siga miusy khom maduira lengdi hamide,
khatdi kamaruangbo chabaw sidi nchum mide.
Piubon hamibo jengniu matom kabuidungdi
chunsajiu kap-marung bamme, milydungdi magenthiu bamme.
palamra chaminiu ruthon mibo kumjiu chapiubuan, chaganniw hina kikam mide.
Nkan khaoring hinadi nakhuga khengjiu bamme,
palamra giunadungdi sangmide.
Tingwang gu masanbo Zion luang riga
kapingbo makese mudkhai sulo.
Judah ga bammai hina pingjiu masandi-di lulo.
Sibo nai sira tamiubo, achungbo,
kamuang siniu gom tamiu mirabo nai-e.
Tamiu wangbo kumjiu takao riphendung siniu
maluang riga kenwang kinne.
Haikumbose wadaodi padmatai makge,
khatdi wadaodi padlanlak mibo-e.
Chaminiu ru maha mibo kumjiu singbangdungse paliuniu tiulude.
Sibo kadihse paliu lengra Eden kareng kumme,
Paliu sailam sira kathaidih kum mide, wakhat niudi paliutu marilu lakge.
paliu hai chari-qon kumjiu pakge.
Maluong riga paliuniu machakbo khuanse chaqon-kari khuan kumme;
chapiuniw kashaibotu karubo khuan kumme.
Riphen mendiniu chari thiura kadenbo kum, paliu chap nben bamme.
Sichiujiu paliuniu tadpadbo situ mai hina pingchang pingmide,
mai hina zuse abasai mide.
Katanbo riphendung kum paliuniu chari thiu sude;
riphendung kumjiu, singbeng majiak khang sude.
Paliu mathiu tad matingjiu tadpad sude, sichiujiu paliu npui kali makge,
maksai khat-khat npuiga tadkhai makge.
Charireng gase paliu tadngut sude,
wakhat niudi paliutu khamman silakge.
Namdi situ paliuniu atungjiu ngut mide;
paliuniu singbengse majiak ngut mide;
chaky riga paliu buangkhang mide
sichiujiu ka-agamai kumjiu kiran gasu buangngut mide.
Chahiu, naimik sidi tamiu mide, sichiujiu chagandungdi benta mide.
Pacham majaibo riphendungse keng-e, khatdi tan-e.
Tuhoi tangbo
“Naliu lung lisiak lujiu khatdi kalum rijiu
sigasu naliu lung magenthiubo siniu kiu-huijiu akhuga wanglo.
Naliu fai phetbo siniu buimakge,
naliu lung pangpadjiu naliugu chariubo situ lenlo.”
Para manonjiu lungsa sibo piu-e
khatdi lungsaboniu phuijiu bamme;
para ginsi-e, khatdi pagu ladriatse majai-e,
para sajai pimakjiu kuak khaira kadenjiu bamme.
Sichiusai naliuniu katiu kasak thinlujiu pakhuga kadkhai lubui-e.
Zion Luong gase make mudkhailo;
maduitu kumadui lujiu kalum rira chamtan pikhai bilo!
Maidung situ khomwang aruang khailo;
masanbo maduileng paliutu kaden khailo;
kating maitu majang wanglo; nahmaidung nai npamnadung tudi khomwanglo.
Panao thiu kasan maidungdi paliu kyga bam makjiu wanglo.
naliu kapjiu khengsiak rabo-e.
Katambo jatdung siniu aliu ken tiakjiu, khatdi aliutu nuimenjiu
‘Naliu Rawang delam bammi jiulo?’ chiujiu dinkhai tulo.”
Siga
paniu pamaidungtu lungsa khai-e.
Paniu paliutu paokak khai-e;
“Tuhoira Iniu naliutu katiu kasak khatdi takisa pikhai bine,
sichiujiu naliutu pikim khai bine.
Katambo jatdung siniu naliu ken tiak lanlak mide.
Tingpi lamsu wangbo takao riphendung situ Iniu luthonmi rabo-e,
sichiujiu paliutu Iniu ramjing lam hathon mine.
Paliugu karaibo bao situ Kashaibo Duipui ga
khatdi sailam bao situ Maditerranean ga hathonmi rabo-e.
Paliu phawse ten manam mirabo-e.
Paliuniu naliu khuga kamkhai mibo jengniu paliutu Iniu kam mahami rabo-e.
“Lujamdung yo, manangta sulo, chiudi ringajiu chunwi lulo
palamra
Nkan khaodung yo, pingta sulo. Piubondung hai madiak mide;
singbangdungdi pasy masilan mide,
sichiujiu ndutsy nai mumsy kengjiu bam mide.
“Zion ga bammaidung naliu chunwi lulo,
Paniu naliuleng chaken tingga tingriuse pikhai bi-e;
paniu tathe tingriu sidi, tatun tingriu sidi karaiga kumjiu pikhai tan-tan bine.
Asaiphung sidi miusyniu phuimi rabo-e,
khatdi wasa thunbo bam sidi mumsy jaw nai takisaniu maliamphui mirabo-e.
Takaodungniu tiulubo naliugu miusy hamibo hinase
Iniu naliuleng pikhai lan bine,
haise Iniu naliutu atungjiu langkhaibo riphendung-e.
Tuhoira naliu tiu mali-malanjiu bammi rabo-e.
Naliuleng maisuang habo tenkhai bibo jengniu naliu Rawang
Amaidungtu wadaodi khan-tiak lanlak mide.
Sichiusai, Israel mai yo, I naliu ruangga bamme chiubo naliu simi rabo-e,
sichiujiu
Amaidungtu wadaodi khan-tiak lanlak mide.
“Pasai, Iniu ahiupuina mai hina riga runkiu khai birabo-e;
naliu nahpuidung, naliu nahpiudung siniu agu sailad din rabo-e;
katingmai naliuniu chamang man sune,
khatdi chabonmai siniu madungao ngao sune.
Siga Iniu ahiupuinase kavangpui rigadi kavangpiu rigadi runkiu khai bine.
“Sibo nai Iniu tingpuk nai kadihpiritu kachan khai sune;
siga tazai luangbo, chami taobo, khatdi mikhutgu kamuangse ngaosu rabo-e.
chahiuse tazai kumjiu heng marenmi rabo-e.
Haise
Iniu kadalu maise ringlu bui-e.’”
“Sibo tingga Judah nai Jerusalem situ pi lungwi khai lan bine.
Iniu jat hinatu khom madui lujiu, Ladjan thiubo Ramjeng gase puiwangne.
Siga Iniu paliutu ladjan thiune.
Paliuniu amai Israel maidungtu sangdiumai dihga kam marakhai mibo-e;
khatdi agu kadih Israel tu njantam mibo-e.
Paliuniu minlumai situ njan raleng taden thonjiu phui-e.
Paliuniu chakhapui nai jaw manleng puimainah tudi piumainah tudi jonmibo-e.
Naliuniu agu kachia, rangkanggi khatdi paman kungbo chakhiu chalanse naliu rakyga phungkhai mide.
Naliuniu Judah nai Jerusalem ga lungbam maitu sangdiumai Greek mai khuga jonkhai mide.
Tuhoira paliutu jonkhai mibo bam gasu Iniu paliutu majangwang lanne. Naliuniu paliu khuga kamkhai mibo kumjiu Iniu naliu khuga kamkhai sune.
Iniu naliu nahpui-nahpiudungtu Judah maidung khuga jonkhai mine; sichiujiu paliuniu paliutu kadiulam bambo Sabean maidung khuga jonkhai lanne.
“Haise jat hina khuga pisikhai bilo.
‘Chari thiura kaden sulo; riphendung situ kumadui sulo;
paliutu kumadui lujiu tadpat sulo!
khatdi kareng danbo hengse changiuleng aket sulo.
Kasa-kason maidi chari thiurabo-e.
Majat sulo, pamungga bambo jat naliu ramjengga wang madui sulo.’”
Oh
“Jat hina kaden lujiu Ladjan thiurabo Ramjeng gase wang sulo.
Siga
atiat tingga miusibangtu kumjiu paliutu bithonmi rabo-e;
mumsy thunbo bamgase maliampad makthen thunbo kumjiu thunrabo-e.”
Ladjan thiubo Ramjeng gase chamai sang-sang bamme.
Sichiujiu
Chahiu nai naimikse tamiumi rabo-e, khatdi chagandungse bentami rabo-e.
pakhuan siniu Jerusalem ga tingsimbo kum wangsai ting-kadih hai kanuk rabo-e.
Chiudi paniu pamaidungtu gukhai bine.
“Sichiusai, Israel mai naliuniu
I hai naliu Rawang
Ira agu masanbo luongbut Zion ga bamme.
Jerusalem hai masanbo namdi thiurabo-e;
sangdiumai siniu haisitu wadaodi ngamlan lakge.
Sibo ting gara maluongse mumsiken siniu kenphui mirabo-e,
maluang hina riga matom-kabuiniu phuimi rabo-e;
Judah ga bambo giuna hina tadui phuimi rabo-e.
sise Acacia Ramjengga luang khaine.
“Egypt dih hai ramjing thiumi rabo-e, khatdi Edom kadihse nchummi rabo-e,
palamra paliuniu Judah dihtu aphenjiu pakhui-pamao hamaitu kamshat mibo-e.
Kamshat mibo mai khumse Iniu ruikhai rabo-e;
kamaomai situ Iniu masiak khai lakge.
Chiudi Judah nai Jerusalem sira tingtheng bamrabo-e,
siga
Jerusalem gasu tingsim padle.
Carmel Luongga piubuanse aguikam mide yo,
piubuan hinase shaikam mide.”
copy
niu din-e, “Damascus ga lungbam maidung hai nuan kamlan-lanjiu bamme, haijengniu paliutu Iniu sajai pisiak rabo-e. Paliuniu Gilead ga lungbam maidungtu wajiukha kam masa khai mibo-e.
Sijengniu Chawang Hazael wangkiga Iniu chami lang khaine, khatdi Chawang Benhadad gu charirengse Iniu ruthon mirabo-e.
Iniu Damascus namdigu rengmunse kampang mine, sichiujiu Aven Ramjengga bammai tudi Betheden gu mawangpao tudi luthon mine, Syria ga lungbam maidungtu Kir dihlam kavangleng puitad mine.”
Sijengniu, Iniu Gaza namdigu karengga chami langkhaijiu paliu rirengse ruthon mirabo-e.
Iniu Ashdod nai Ashkelon namdigu mawangpaodungtu luthon mine, Iniu Ekron namdi situ sajai pirabo-e, sichiujiu Philistine ga masiak bammai hina shairabo-e.”
Sijengniu, Iniu Tyre namdigu kareng gase chami langkhaijiu paliu rirengse ruthon mirabo-e.”
Sijengniu, Iniu Teman namdiga chami langkhaijiu Bozrah gu charirengse ruthon mirabo-e.”
Sijengniu, Iniu Rabbah namdi karengga chami langkhaijiu paliu rirengse ruthon mine. Sichiujiu siga chari thiubo khuanse tingthung tingkai khuan kumjiu chiusune.
Siga paliu wang khatdi pagu chakampaodungtu kavangleng puitadmi rabo-e.”
Iniu Moab kadihga chami langkiujiu Kerioth gu charirengse ruthon mine. Riphen maidung siniu sen bamga khatdi makese mudjiu bamboga Moab maidungse shaimi rabo-e.
Iniu Moab gu mawangpaotu khatdi jupaodung situ kamshat mirabo-e.”
Sijengniu Judah mai riga Iniu chami langkiujiu Jerusalem gu charirengse ruthon mine.”
Paliuniu kasa-kason maitu tao malui-e, khatdi kalek samaitu npui gasu hithon mi-e. Papiu panahniu kavangpui khattu nphiuji-e, sichiujiu masanbo chamtan situ kam tania mide.
Chara kahumra wangbo bam hinaga, kalek samai khugasu sutlubo faise hamji bamme. Paliugu chapaw-chara sung sutlubo jawse paliuniu paliu Rawang kyga sakjiu bamme.
Iniu naliutu Egypt dih gasu maluangpad lujiu, tingkum atai ramjing gase majang khaijiu, Amor maidunggu kadih situ naliugu thiura pikhai mibo-e.
Iniu naliu nahmai khangsiatu phaimiukakung leng, khangsiatu ganripiu thiura kada khaibi-e. Israel maidung yo, haise pachangsiak makma?
Chiudi naliuniu ganripiutu pijiu jaw sakkhai-e, khatdi phaimiukakung maitu pijiu alad dinkhai makge.
Sijengniu tuhoira, Iniu naliutu kadihga niakpet mine, sichiujiu matom-kariniu pabang phungtad lakjiu marabo kum naliudi marasu rabo-e.
Pak tanmai siniudi marilu lakge, papum katan maidi paliu pumtanse hami rabo-e, sichiujiu riphenmaidi paliu ringting katang ranlu lakge.
Tavaipi thinmai niudi paliu chapga chap silakge, pak katan mainiudi marilu lakge, khatdi chaqon tongmaidi paliu ringting marilu lakge.
Sibo naira huthubo riphenmai siniudi paliugu chari-niase phutlujiu pak mirabo-e.”
Israel maidung yo, Egypt dih gasu maluang npadbo jat hina yo, Tingwang niu naliu lamga din bambo hai nking lulo:
“Kadihpiriga bambo jatdung ruanggasu Iniu naliutu ronna sibo-e, khatdi manang khaibo-e. Siniu naliu nuanse haijiukha kapingbo thiu mibo-e, haijengniu naliutu Iniu sajai pikhai siak rabo-e.”
Mai khangniase makhiam maksai dechiu tad macham luralo?
Mariuga ndongqui siniu patatek daolu maksai dechiu kahiu-marung ralo?
Ndongquipoi siniu pareng lungga wakhao minlu maksai dechiu marung ralo?
Tathakga pa-tatek khai maksai dechiujiu thingna manlu ralo?
Tathakse wakhatniu taokhai makjiu nkhap rama?
Maidungtu pi manang khai makjiu namdi gase chari makese mudlu buima?
Dithubo
Ndongqui siniu marungbo tingga saoniu pingmak ralo?
Dithubo
Egypt nai Ashdod wangkiningga lung bammai khuga pisi khailo: “Samaria luongriangga lung magui bam maitu kumadui lujiu, paliuniu kam tanuak mibo khatdi kamaobo tenkhai mibose phui matailo.”
Sijengniu mikremai siniu paliu dih taomagui lujiu, khatdi paliugu charireng kampang lujiu paliugu maniadung sutlu rabo-e.”

niu din-e, “Mily khuanpiuniu pagu milytu ndongquiniu tiuluboga pangentang nia ronna maksai pakuon ronna daobo kumjiu, tuhoi Samaria maigu amanboga mangiu khaijiu bam maise poinakha ronna ringlu rabo-e.
Tuhoi nkinglulo, Jacob kaikik maidungtu kachan khaibilo chiujiu Dithubo, Ngamkambo
“Iniu Israel maidungtu paliu nuan jengniu sajai pibo naise, Iniu Bethel gu rathakbam sidi kam mahami rabo-e. Rathakbam hinagu kamik hinase pijiu minkiu kammi rabo-e.
Iniu tathe kydungdi, tinglumkydi kam mahami rabo-e. Chapuang-himniu karukhai bambo kydungse nchummi rabo-e, sichiujiu kydi hinase kam mahami rabo-e.”
Bashan tompui pamai kawibo kumjiu pamai wibo Samaria maipuidung yo, kasa-kason maidungtu rejiu, khatdi naliu kinadung siniu naliuleng jaw ponlenra dinjiu bammai, haise nking khailo.
Dithubo
Naliutu nathubo mathak bam karengki gasu jupad lujiu thonmi rabo-e.”
Dithubo
Tingwang khuga naliugu taruakse chunwibo maniakad thiujiu kadkhai bamlo, sichiujiu naliuniu kadkhaibo lamga naliu geng thiujiu bamlo! Sikumbo situ naliura masenjiu bambo-e.
“Iniu naliu namdi pakhiang-nagase charakhum hai phungwangbo-e, chiudi naliu akhuga malanwang makge.

Naliugu miusyleng pageng bam palanbo tingga Iniu tingriu pikhai makge, Iniu namdi khatga pi tingriu khai-e, chiudi namdi khatga piriu khai makge. Lujam khatga piriu khai-e, chiudi luzam khatga piriu khai makge, sijengniu luzamse sangmibo-e.
Tadui chari mibo gasu ngamlak mibo maidung siniu tadui daosuma chiujiu namdi khat gasu namdi khatlam tadle, chiudi paliu sakbuibo daolu makge. Chiudi naliuniu akhuga malanwang makge.

“Iniu naliugu miusytu kam masara kathiubo tingkai langkhai-e. Takaodung siniu naliugu chalu-kareng hinaga bambo mumsiken, ndutbang khatdi takibang hina tiulude. Chiudi naliuniu akhuga malanwang makge.

“Iniu Egypt dihga langkhaibo chararen kumjiu naliu khuga langkhai-e, Iniu naliugu akhangmaidung situ chariga kamshat lujiu chaqondungse sutlude. Iniu naliugu rijiky gase kashaibo tenrai siniu pijiu manamsa khai-e. Chiudi naliu akhuga malanwang makge.
“Sijengniu, Israel maidung yo, Iniu naliutu sajai pirabo-e. Iniu haichiu kamrabo jengniu, agu ladjantu zudao raleng kaden lulo!”
Tingwang niu maluongdung nai tingkai haitu damkhaibo-e.
Chamainaniu pachun silura paniu kamkhai-e;
paniu n-nien situ nchun leng kam kalikhai-e.
Para kadih maga tadjiu bamme.
Ngamkambo
Israel maidung yo, Iniu naliu riga kashai baibo lui thiubo hai nkinglo:
Liuchangpui Israel maise kao mide,
wadaodi su-ngamlak mide!
Pahai kadihga kaokiu mide,
patu mai khatniudi khuaksu khaira hamide.
Dithubo
Israel maidung khuga
Beersheba lam kahumra tadtulo. Bethel ga atu adaora matan mane. Bethel se wadi makge. Gilgal lam tadtulo, pamaidung sira kavang thiujiu nchum mibo-e.”
Majibotu thin kadatmai khatdi maidungtu paliu maji gasu sontiumai, naliu hai harabo mide!
khatdi kachakiliu nai kamtung-khamtentu damkhai-e.
Paniu tamiubo situ n-nien leng kalikhai-e,
khatdi n-nien situ nchun leng kalikhai-e.
Paniu duipuiga bambo taduitu kulujiu kadihga pijiu tingriu khai-e.
Pazan hai
Paniu pumtan bam maidung pumtanse kam maha mi-e.
Ladjankyga chamchang dinjiu, majimakbotu atung maitu naliu mareng-e.

Naliuniu kalek samaitu kam mathadle, chiujiu paliugu miusy suttiu-e. Sijengniu, tatu kawiboniu thiukhaibo naliu kygase naliu lunglakge, khatdi naliugu mumsireng gasu kawibo jaw padbose naliu sak lakge.

Naliu hai dejiukha kakhui-kamaobo kammi gulo khatdi naliu nuan hai dejiukha kapingbo gulo, chiubo Iniu sibamme. Naliuniu kawimai tuse rejiu bamme, tanim tiu-e, khatdi kalek samaitu pijiu ladjankyga majibose daomakra khamme.
Sichiujiu, haijiukha kasabo tingga maliumakjiu bambo hai kaningtingbo gu-e chiujiu lu-e.
Kamaobo situ makjiu majibo situ machun lulo, sichiusai naliu ringlubui-e. Sichiusai naliuniu dinbo kumjiu Ngamkambo
Kasabo situ mareng lulo, khatdi kawibo situ lungsa lulo, sichiujiu ladjanky gase nchangjiu bamlura phui lulo. Sichiusai masiak bambo jatdung haitu
Khatdi sichiujiu Ngamkambo
Mumsireng gase huijiu-kap bamme. Haidungse padrabo-e, palamra Iniu naliutu sajai pikhaira wangkinbo-e, chiujiu
Haise mai khatniu ndongquitu pingjiu pakwangboga chahomtu adaobo kumrabo-e! Chiumaksai mai khatniu pakyga wang, singbengga mangiu khaiboga kaniuniu machaobo kumrabo-e!
gu tingmikse kabenbo makjiu tamiubo phungwang sune; haise kabenbo wadi habo, tamiutingbo tingmik thiurabo-e.
Naliuniu khaoring rukhaibo rathak thiu bamdi, alin-tara kadkhai bamdi Iniu sise luni makge; naliuniu pamai withubo khaoring phungwang bamdi Iniu sise luni makge.
Maikuon tarengbo luise thiuta milo, Iniu naliugu chaqonmibung khuanse wadi chiuni makge.
Sibosung, nchangbo siniu giuna kum, khatdi tacheng matipbo siniu singgiu kumjiu sao makjiu piluang khailo.

Chiudi tuhoi tangbo, Iniu naliutu Damascus majubo lam katang kavangleng puitadjiu bamdi, naliuniu naliu wang ra, Sakkuth rameng, khatdi Kaiwan gu chagan ratu kahumjiu ponlu tad bamme”, chiujiu Ngamkambo Rawang siniu din bamme.
Zion ga amansaijiu lung bammai, khatdi Samaria ga wadi manangbo hajiu lung bammai, kadibo jat Israel maigu kadimai, maidungniu wa-nkhara khengmeng bammai, naliu hai dejiukha chariu magenthiu ralo!

Calneth namdiga tadlujiu phuitailo. Sibo saidi Hamath namdi nai Philistine mai Gath namdiga tadkiu matailo. Paliu hai Judah nai Israel mai wangdih suang wi-nkiujiu ma? Paliu kadihse naliu kadih suang di-nkiu jiuma?
Naliuniu chariu magenthiubo tingmik situ suini makge, chiudi naliu ngamkam jengniu sibo tingmikse nadiang mine.
Naliu zi kawiboga ji-amansai lujiu, matom-kabuipoi-jan khatdi milypoi-jan tiujiu chakhuang changee thiujiu bammai, naliu hai dejiukha chariu magenthiu ralo!
David niu chalui masing lujiu chaqonmibung jujiu thiubo kum, naliudi masingni-e.
Naliuniu chapiang masun phuiting lujiu jawse sakjiu bamme, khatdi withubo parim wibose thinjiu bamme, chiudi Israel mai hamibo situ naliu chunsa khai makge.
Sijengniu raiboga kavang thiuraleng naliu tadrabo-e. Naliugu chakhuang changee thiubo khatdi chunwi malod tiubose hami rabo-e.
Dithubo, Ngamkambo,
Kikhun khatga chamai khang kariu masiak bamsai paliudi shaimi rabo-e.
Kashai bairaleng, kashaimai singna siniu paphawse kamalam ponpad sune. Pasingna siniu, “Siga chamai bamkhama?” chiujiu kusune.
Mai khatniu paokak sune, “Maidi hade!”
Siga pasingna siniu dinsune, “Maliu tulo! Aliuniu
Chaqon siniu tutong riga paklu buima? Mai khatniu duipuiga matom thinlujiu tatien tenlu buima? Chiudi naliuniu nchangbo situ karabo-tai leng, khatdi majibo situ kamaobo leng kamkhai mide.

Iniu
Siga paniu akhuga maniu-e, “Amos yo, nang nde ngaolo?”
“Madatriang khat ngao-e,” chiujiu Iniu paokakge.
Siga paniu din-e, “Iniu haise thinbo lamra amaidungdi singbeng kumjiu matunta mide chiubo lenbo-e. Iniu paliutu sajai pirabose alung kalilak mide.
Isaac kaikikdungniu chara kahum bambo bam hinatu Iniu kam maha mirabo-e. Israel maidunggu masanbo bam hinase nchummi rabo-e. Iniu chawang Jeroboam kiphiutu kam maha mirabo-e.”
Bethel gu singku, Amaziah niu Israel mai wang Jeroboam khuga chakhumpao khat langkhai-e: “Amos niu nangtu kamshatra, maidung ruangga kam bamme. Palad hainiu nagu kadihtu kam mahami rabo-e.
Paniu haichiu dinbamme: “Jeroboam hai chariga shai mirabo-e khatdi Israel maidungtu paliu dih gasu kavang leng puitadmi rabo-e.”
Sichiu lujiu Amaziah niu Amos khuga din-e, “Phaimiukakung yo, buimide! Judah lam malanwang lujiu siga nalad dinlo. Paliutu pijiu naphijeng pikhai bilo.
Bethel haigara nagu sailadse dinta milo. Haigara chawanggu kahumbo bamsi-e, khatdi maidung raky-e.”
Amos niu paokakge, “Ira chaphijeng leng sailad dinbo mai makge. Ira kabui khuanmai, khatdi ndutbangtu akhi mai-e.
Chiudi Iniu mily khuanjiu bambo gasu
Sijengniu tuhoira
Sijengniu, Amaziah yo,
Iniu Dithubo
niu maniu-e, “Amos yo, nang degu ngaolo?”
Iniu paokakge, “Charasy takam khat ngao-e.”
Sibo tingmik gara chawangkiningga thiubambo luise kap-huibo khuan thiumi rabo-e. pabam hinaga kashaibo phaw maliang mirabo-e. Paliutu tingjingbo bamgase thonkhai mirabo-e.”
Kalek samaidungtu tao maluijiu bambo khatdi son-tanu maitu kam mahara kamjiu bammai naliu haise nking lulo.

Naliu ronna haichiu din bamme, “Aliugu tasiu jonra, masanbo tingmik situ khuan ngamlak mide. Dedaoniu Tabamnaise loijiu, aliugu jonlan suralo? Sichiusai madat maolujiu, paman khaisan lubui-e; khatdi aliu khugasu liumai khuga tajuga sonlubui-e.
Aliuniu pageng habo banmiuse paman kungjiu jonlu bui-e. Sichiujiu aliuniu kalek sajiu chapaw ruingam lakmai, chaphitopdi lu-ngam lakbo maitu kavang leng lulubui-e.”
Sijengniu kadih haise kathi surabo-e, sichiujiu kadihga lungmai hina chariu magenthiu rabo-e. Kadihpiri pakhiangna thin kanuk khai rabo-e; haise Nile Giuki ka-kasuakbo kum rabo-e.
Niending tingga naimik ngutmijiu, tamiu mirabo tingse wangkinne. Dithubo

Iniu naliugu chakhuang changee situ kashai baibo khatdi chunwibo lui situ chunsajiu kapbo khuan pithiu khai mirabo-e. Iniu naliu pee gotlujiu maliufai piben khaine, khatdi panah khat nakha bambo puipiuniu panahse shaimijiu kiuhuibo kum naliutu pithiu khai rabo-e. Sibo naise pamalan-gu kasabo thiu rabo-e.
“Iniu kadihpiriga charakhum langkhai rabose pating wangkinne. Maidung siniu mariu sune, chiudi taruak leng makge; maidung siniu chari sune, chiudi tadui leng makge. Paliuniu
Maidung siniu tingpilamsu tingrunlam khatdi tingbang lamsu tingnulam tadron sune. Paliuniu
Sibo nai sira papum wibo akhang aliumaidi charijiu pajeng sajiu kaokiu sune.
Samaria mai rameng zan gasu tasiang siangmai, “Dan ra zan gasu,” maksai “Beersheba ra zan gasu,” tasiang siangmi mai hinase kaomi rabo-e khatdi sulanlak mide.”
Paliuniu charuidih lam paliu npui leng chukhai bamdi, Iniu paliutu juman lurabo-e. Paliuniu tinggen lam khangmidi Iniu paliutu jukiumi rabo-e.
Paliuniu Carmel Luong ton-ga nbai midi Iniu paliutu phiulujiu minlu rabo-e. Paliuniu duipui runsinglam nbai midi, Iniu duipuigu chakhaotu langkhaijiu paliutu pijiu maki rabo-e.
Paliu mikremai siniu paliutu kavang leng mintad midi, Iniu paliutu kamshat mira chamtan pikhai rabo-e. Iniu paliutu nkhakhai makjiu kam maha mira alung chapmibo-e.”
Dithubo, Ngamkambo
siga lungbam mai hina achung rabo-e.
Kadihpiri pakhiangna Nile Giuki kum kasuak rabo-e.
Paniu duipuigu tadui situ kulujiu kadihga runkiu khaibi-e, pazanse
Dithubo
Mariukuang lungga tasiu kachangbo kumjiu, Israel maidungtu tun kanukra Iniu chamtan pikhai rabo-e. Pageng hamaidung situ Iniu jatdung rong gasu luthonmi rabo-e.
“Tingwang niu aliu khuga kasabo wakhatdi piwang khai lakge,” chiujiu dinmai hina, nuan phungmai hinatu amaidung rong gasu chariga kamshat mine.
Sichiujiu Israel maidungniu masiak bambo Edom kadihse ngamlu rabo-e, sichiusai jat hinase agu thiulan kamrabo-e,” chiujiu pakhiangna padkhai bambo
“Atiat-ran lulakbo thiujiu miusy, khatdi jaw thaoran lulakbo mumsy
pi masikhai rabo tingmikse wangkinne, chiujiu
Parim wibo jawse maluongga jaokiu bamne,
sichiujiu maluong gase luangchiami rabo-e.
Iniu amaidungtu paliu kadihga puiwang lankhai bine.
Paliu namdi samibose katin lujiu siga paliu lung lankhai bine
paliuniu lingkhaibo alin-tara hina paliuniu tiurabo-e.
Iniu paliuleng pikhaibo kadih gase Iniu amaidungtu pilung khaine,
sichiujiu paliutu pethon lanlak mide.”
Haise Obadiah gu sailad si-e: Edom mai lamga Dithubo
siga aliuniu pagu champaose chiulude:
“Kaden lulo! Aliu Edom maitu chari thiura tadsukhe!”
Edom mai khuga
“Iniu naliutu kam mason mirabo-e,
siga mai hinaniu naliu ken tiaksu rabo-e.
Nagu chaliangbo siniu natu son mide.
Nagu dihsing namdise tatuniu charireng kamkhai bamme;
nakyse maluongton-ga thiukhai bamme,
sijengniu nangniu naronna din-e, ‘Saoniu atu jukiu ngamlu ralo?’
Nangniu nakyse lengreng sip kumjiu kakulam thiukhai bamdi,
chagan ruangga bambo kum ngaokhai bamdi, Iniu natu jukiu mirabo-e.
“Agatiu maidungniu nchun wangboga, paliuniu lunibo ronna khoi-e.
Maidungniu mumsy raiboga, kasiara masiak khai-e.
Chiudi natura nagu mikremai siniu kam maha duak mirabo-e.
Esau kaikik maidung yo, naliugu maniase sunglude.
Nawatmai siniu natu sonmide naliutu naliu dih gasu hathon mide.
Naliu khuga agi manaijiu bammai siniu tuhoira naliutu ngamlude.
Naliutu maluang tiubambo kahdung siniu naliutu tathak thiukhai bamde;
sichiujiu paliuniu din bamme, ‘Pagu ningtingse delam bamlo?’
“Iniu Edom maidungtu sajai pirabo-e,
paliugu ningtingmai situ kam mahami rabo-e,
khatdi paliugu tasise luthonmi rabo-e.
Teman gu riphenmaise ping masami rabo-e,
sichiujiu Edom ga bambo riphen hinatu kamshatmi rabo-e.
“Palamra nangniu nasingna, Jacob kaikikdungtu kamshat mide khatdi paliugu suttiu-e,
sijengniu naliutu kam mahami rabo-e, naliutu wadaodi chakhuang thiutami rabo-e.
Paliugu mikremaidungniu paliugu rengmun kampangbo naise nang siga chap bamme.
Jerusalem gu chakhiu-chalan sutbo sangmaidung kumgap naliudi sa-e.
Judah ga bambo nasingnadung siniu sansabo gase nang nadiu wimak rabo-e.
Paliu nchum miboga nang nuimak rabo-e.
Amaidungniu chariu magenthiubo naise naliu diu wijiu
namdi gase ngutlujiu, paliugu maniase sutmak rabo-e.
mari lura paliu pakkinbo wan-ga, chapdang lujiu paliutu minmak rabo-e.
Paliugu mikremaidung khuga benlen khaimak rabo-e.
“Jat hinatu,
Edom mai yo, nangniu kamkhai mibose nakhuga kamkhai sune.
Nangniu pikhai mibose natudi pikhai sune.
Agu masanbo luonggase amaidungniu kakhabo piangse sak khai mide.
Chiudi pamungga lungbambo jat hinaniu sisuang khadiangbo sajai piangse sak rabo-e;
sise saklujiu paliu hakam mirabo-e.
“Chiudi khangsiamai Zion Luong gase marimi sune, sise masanbo bam thiu rabo-e.
Jacob maidung siniu daobuibo kadihse daorabo-e.
Jacob nai Joseph maidungse chami kum rabo-e;
paliuniu Esau maidung tuse, magaorengtu chaminiu ruthon mibo kumjiu kam maha mirabo-e.
Esau kaikikdung mai khatdi ringsi lakge.
“Judah gu tingrunlam bammai siniu Edom ga lunggom mirabo-e;
maluongphi tingnulam bammai siniu Philistia situ ngammi rabo-e;
Ephraim nai Samaria gu kadihse Israel mainiu lumi rabo-e;
khatdi Benjamin maidung siniu Gilead tu ngammi rabo-e.
Tingpilam kavangthiubo gasu masiak lubo Israel mai riphendung siniu malan wangjiu,
Phoenicia tu ngamjiu tingpilam Zarephath tangbo ngammi rabo-e.
Jerusalem gasu kavang thiujiu Sardis ga lungbam maidung siniu,
tingrunlam bambo Juda maigu namdakdung situ ngammi rabo-e.
Jerusalem ga chari ngamlu maidung siniu Edom tu chari thiujiu thinmanmi rabo-e,
sichiujiu
Paniu din-e, “Kadibo namdi Nineveh gase tadlujiu siga lungbam maidung khuga dinkhai bilo; paliu hai dejiukha salo chiubo Iniu sijiu bambo-e.”
Chiudi
Chiudi

Malee rampaodungse pingchang pingjiu, mai hina para-para khuga nkha khaira khengsude. Sigasu maleese masen bira paliugu maniadung thonpad sude. Chiudi Jonah sira n-hanglam kiulujiu, malee lungga jipting bamme.
Siga malee rambo munranpi siniu patu daolujiu pakhuga din-e, “Nang dekamjiu jipting bamjiulo? Sulujiu nara khuga nkha khaira khengsulo. Paniu aliuleng manang khaijiu, aliutu kalan khaibo sui-e.”
Malee rampaodungniu khat-khat khuga dinsude, “Haikumbo kapingbo hai aliu saojengniu daojiulo chiubo taden thonjiu phui mataikhe.” Sichiujiu paliuniu taden thonboga, Jonah zan-ga padde.
Sijengniu paliuniu pakhuga din-e: “Chiusai tuhoira aliu khuga dinkhailo! Haibo lamga saotu madam khai ralo? Nang haiga nde kambam jiulo? Nang debo dih lamsu wangjiulo? Nang nde jatlo?”
“Ira Hebrew mai-e,” chiujiu Jonah niu paokakge. “Ira ting-kadih khatdi duipuitu dambo
khugasu pah pakkinbo-e chiubo hai Jonah niu paliu khuga dinkhaide.
Siga malee rampaodungse pingchang pingmide, sichiujiu pakhuga din-e, “Sise mai kapingbo gu-e!”
Tingthung tingkaise tanbi-bi sude, sijengniu pakhuga paliuniu din-e, “Tingthung tingkai haitu khamra aliuniu natu nde kamralo?”
Jonah niu paokakge, “Duipuiga atu thonkhai milo, chiusai haise saojing mine. Naliutu haikumbo tingthung tingkainiu kam kabuak bambo hai adon jengniu-e.”
Chiudi malee rampaodung siniu paliu laisang khaijiu maleese rampum genlam rampadra matan sude. Chiudi tingthung tingkaise tanbi-bi mijiu paliu tadkhaira hamide.
Sijengniu, paliuniu
Sichiujiu paliuniu Jonah tu ponlujiu duipuiga thonkhai mide, siga kasuakbose saonuang mide.
Haijengniu malee rampaodungse
Chakha wonpui lung gasu Jonah niu pa-Rawang,
“Hey
Iniu natu ku-e, siga nangniu atu paokak khai-e.
Kasukbo charuiram gasu nkha khaira
Iniu khengboga nang chiukhai bi-e.
Kasukbo duipui runsing gase atu thonkhaijiu
nagu duiliu katanbo siniu atu gomnam bamme.
Atu nabam gasu hathon mide
sijengniu nagu masanbo Rakyse wadaodi
ngaolan lak mide chiujiu I maning-e.
Ariga tadui maliamwang I kahak bamme;
duipui siniu atu gomting mide,
khatdi duipuigu mpe siniu apeetham kabetman mide.
Kadihtu tingtheng khamten khai bambo
maluang-men katang tadkiu mide.
Chiudi Oh
kasukbo gasu juring khai bide.
Aringting hai anijiu nkhuang mirabo tingga
Iniu nakhuga kheng-e,
akhuan chiukhai bi-e.
Pageng habo rameng situ kahumbo
maidung siniu nagu kadin piumakge.
Chiudi Ira natu thuonbo lui thiune,
Iniu naleng rathak mania pine;
sichiujiu Iniu ladriat khaibose kamne.
Juringbo hai
Siga
Paniu din-e, “Kadibo namdi Nineveh lamse tadlujiu, Iniu nakhuga dinkhai mibo chamse maidung khuga paokhai bilo.”
Sigasu Jonah niu
Jonah niu n-nien tadron jingjiu paoron sude, “Nineveh haitu jeng atai saiga kam maha mirabo-e!”
Nineveh maidungse Tingwang chamtu malum mide. Sijengniu paliu mathiu, mai hina, dithubo gasu siamthubo katang maliufai benlujiu khatdi kalum rijiu paliu lung limibo lenra chap mide.
Nineveh mai wangpiu siniu haise chiuluboga, pawangbam ganiu sulujiu khatdi papuan luakpad lujiu maliufai benlujiu tabui jiuga ntao mide.

Paniu Nineveh ga lungbam mai mathiu khuga tacham paoron khaide: “Haise chawang nai pagu chakampaodung khugasu padbo chamtan-e mai khatdi watiubo suimakge, chamai hina, matom kabui khatdi khaorui-khaona hina, watiu-wasakbo suimakge.
Chamai hina khatdi khaorui-khaona hina maliufai benkam rabo-e. Mai hinaniu Tingwang khuga pachun ngutjiu kheng matan rabo-e khatdi pagu-gu kasabo nkhai rili hina phutmi rabo-e.
Sichiusai Tingwang niu palungpom gasu palung kali khaijiu aliu shaimak lubui-e!”
Paliuniu kambambose Tingwang niu ngaode, paliu nkhai rili kasabo phutmibose paniu ngaode. Sijengniu paniu palung lilujiu paniu dinkhai mibo sajaise paliu khuga kamkhai makge.
Haijengniu Jonah pachun sachang samide khatdi palung pom mide.
Sichiujiu paniu kakhengthiu sude, “
yo, tuhoira atu pishai khai sulo. I ringbambo suang shaimiboniu wi-nkiu-e.”
Siga Jonah niu namdigu tingbanglam tadlujiu ntaobam mide. Nineveh ga degu padsu ralo chiubo phuira paniu wahiu kamlujiu ntao bamde.
, Tingwang niu Jonah tu amansaijiu mahiu khaira singbang khat pi puakkhang khai bide. Sibo singbang jengniu Jonah pachun wichang wijiu bamde.
Chiudi pasaibo nai nsuan, Tingwang niu sibo singbangtu kam masara nkiat langkhaijiu, tiushat mide.
Naimik padsuboga, Tingwang niu tingbang lamgu tingkai kathiubo langkhaijiu tingphu siniu Jonah shaira kum mide. Sijengniu pah shaini siak mide. Paniu din-e, “I ringbambo suang shaimiboniu wi nkiu-e.”
Chiudi Tingwang niu pakhuga din-e, “Sibo singbang jengniu nalung pomra nangam-nangiu degu bamjiulo?”
Jonah niu paokakge, “Alung pomra amaji bamsiakge, shaibuibo katang amaji bamme!”
Sichiusai, kadibo namdi Nineveh haitu dejiukha Iniu lungsa ralo. Sibo rigasu, haiga pachun thiumakbo nahdung 120,000 khatdi khaorui khaona wajiukha bamme!”
Naliu jat hina haise nkinglo;
Kadihriga lungmai hina haise nkinglo!
Tanthubo
Pagu tinggen raky gasu dinbo hai nkinglo!
Pagu masanbo bam gase
paniu kiulujiu maluangdung ton gase tadne.
Makhui khuangse chamiga tunmibo kum,
paphi hangga maluongdungse tunmi rabo-e;
luongbut gasu tadui runkiubo kumjiu
paliutu ramjeng gase runkhai mirabo-e.

Haibo hina padrabo-e, palamra Israel maidungniu Tingwang tu atungjiu nuan kammide. Israel mainiu kadin piumakbo hai saotu madam khai ralo? Haibo dihsing namdi siak Samaria niu-e! Judah mainiu charameng kahumbo haise saogu kamaobo gulo? Jerusalem siak niu-e!
Sijengniu,

Paman kungbo ramengdung haise kampang tap-tap lujiu,charaky gu papum kajonpuidung khuga pikhai mibo hinase chaminiu kam mahami rabo-e, khatdi wamengdungse karapon khaiga makhuanting khaimi rabo-e. Haidungse Samaria mainiu kadih-tam leng makhuan lubui-e, chiudi tuhoira pagu mikremai siniu charaky gu papum kajonpuidung pithiu khaira pabam katamlam paliutu puitad mine.”

Siga Micah niu din-e, “Haijengniu achun sajiu Iniu kiuhui rabo-e. Agu chunsabo hai lenjiu, Iniu aphirong khatdi apumruang tadrabo-e. Iniu tany kumjiu kanginjiu kangung rabo-e khatdi ruidi kumjiu kakuksu rabo-e.
Samaria mai jamse wisilak mide, sichiujiu sibo magenthak kumjiu Judah maidi daorabo-e; amaidungniu lungbambo, Jerusalem rengmun siakga nchumbo hai wangtang mide.”
Aliu san sabo lamga hai Gath ga bammai aliu mikremai khuga dintulo; nangniu kapbo hai pijiu paliutu ngao khai tulo. Beth Leaphrah

Shaphir maidung yo, napumruang mangamjiu kavang thiutad sulo. Zanaan ga lungmainiu paliu namdi gasu tadpad huta mide. Bethezel maidungniu kiuhuibo khuanse naliuniu chiuboga, siga nbaibam hamide chiubo naliuniu sirabo-e.
Maroth maidungniu mathak khaira ramgunjiu khuan bamme, palamra
Lachish ga lungbammai naliuniu chaqontu chaqon-kari pithiu khai-e. Naliuniu Israel mai nuan situ ali-e, sichiujiu Jerusalem maitu nuan ga jukhai mide.
Tuhoira, Judah maidung yo, Moresheth Gath namdaktu ramna sukhe chiu din mide. Israel mai wangdung siniu Achzib namdak gasu nkha daotami rabo-e.
Mareshah maidung yo,
Judah maidung yo, naliuniu kungbo naliu nahmai jengniu chunsabo lenjiu naliu tham karup milo. Chamitiuleng
Kasa rangjiu, nchun jikiu lakjiu bammaidungse dejiukha sansa ralo! Paliuniu rangkhai mibose, nsuan padjiu paliuleng pajat daogapboga paliuniu kasabose kam mi-e.
Paliuniu chaluse luni misai sutlu-e; paliuniu chakyse luni misai sutlu-e. Kikhun khatgu mania, maksai mai khatgu maniadi masiaklu makge.
Sijengniu
Pawanse wangtangboga, naliugu sansabo haitu maidungniu characham thiujiu din kadah surabo-e. Sichiujiu naliuniu daomibo kapingbo lamga paliuniu haichiu chalui thiu sune;
Aliura nchum kam mide!
khatdi aliutu mikremai khuga pikhai mide.”
Sijengniu, maidung leng kadihse
Maidungniu akhuga paoron wangjiu din-e, “Aliu khuga paoron wang mane. Sibo lamga wadi din tulo. Tingwang niu aliutu kam chaliukhai lakge.
Israel maidung hai Tingwang siang hangga bamme chiubo naliu maning jiuma?
Naliuniu amaidunggu maipuidungtu paliuniu masenbo ky gasu hathon lujiu, agu tingthenggu thoidam pikhaibo paliu nahdungtu sutlude.
Sulujiu tadsulo; nbai bamse haiga hamide. Naliu nuan siniu haibo bamtu kam nchum mide.
“Haibo maidungniu kalik aratjiu tek-jawse naliuleng singgiu kumjiu luangwang rabo-e,’ chiujiu aratbo sailad dinmai situ masen-e.”

“Chiudi masiak khaibo Israel maidung naliu mathiutu Iniu puiwang aruanglan khai rabo-e. Milydung situ paliu baoga khomwang aruangbo kumjiu Iniu naliutu puiwang aruangkhai birabo-e. Piubon kawiboga phuibambo milydung kumjiu, naliu kadihga maidungse wang machong lan rabo-e.”
Tingwang niu paliuleng npui lekhaijiu paliutu kavang thiubo gasu jupad khai rabo-e. Paliuniu namdigu rengmunse kampang lujiu khenrang thiujiu tadmi rabo-e. Paliu wangpiu,
Israel maigu mawang paodung naliu nkinglo! Kamajibo lamga naliu manangkhai rabo-e,
chiudi naliuniu kawibo situ mareng lujiu kasabo situ masen-e. Naliuniu amaidungtu maring paliu gi la-e khatdi paliu rahgasu paliu-tia maliam padle.
Naliuniu amaidungtu tiulude. Naliuniu paliu gi talujiu, paliu rahku kamtang mide, khatdi chamee kumjiu paliutu langra dantap-tap mide.
Naliuniu
Wa kalen pisai, agi-manaibo siniu ladriat khai, wa kalen pimak sai, chariniu kapin khaibo amaidungtu sontiubo phaimiukakung maidung khuga

“Phaimiudung yo, naliu tingse loimi lajiu bam mide, naliuleng naimik ngutmide. Palamra naliuniu amaidungtu jumao mibo jengniu madungao gu sailadse naliuleng hamide, siniu wakhatdi naliuniu sailad din ngamlak mide.”
Pasaileng din masuang maise din ngamlak mibo jengniu mangam rabo-e. Paliu mathiutu kam mangam khai rabo-e palamra Tingwang niu paliutu paokak khai tamide.
Chiudi atura,
Israel maigu mawang paodung naliu akhuan nkinglo; naliura nchangbo situ mareng-e, khatdi majibo situ kamaobo leng kamkhai-e.
Naliuniu Tingwang gu namdi, Jerusalem haitu maitu gibo bam khatdi majimakbo bam pithiu khaijiu bamme.
Namdigu mawang paodung siniu tanimleng dihthinbo ngamse kamme, singkudung siniu wa pisai Tacheng-tajaise chali padle, phaimiukakung mai siniu rangkang leng sailad din-e—sichiujiu paliu mathiuse
Wangkinbo tingmik gase tuhoi Charaky chapbambo luong hai,
mathiu ruangga kuthubo bam khat thiumi rabo-e,
luongbut hinagu paton thiumi rabo-e.
Jatdung wajiukha haiga jonwangjiu haichiu din sune,
Israel mai Rawang tu, Kahumboky lamse tadsukhe.
Siga paniu aliutu pachunningse kamra katikhai sune;
paniu kada khaibo npui gase aliu tadne.
Palamra
Zion gasu pamaidung khuga paniu dinkhaibo-e.”
tathu-chara hinase paniu tiakkhai bine.
Paliu hengse kafiu leng kam mine,
khatdi paliu ngiuse nsina leng kam mine.
Jatdung siniu wadaodi charithiu lanlak mide,
charileng wadaodi kaden lanlak mide.
pagu-gu mumsireng khatdi ndutbangli gase
mai khatniudi paliutu kapin lanlak mide.
Ngamkambo
Jat hinaniu para-ra gu kadin piujiu kahum rabo-e, chiudi aliura aliu Rawang,

Paliura chaky gasu diujiu tad mide khatdi paliu phi tangmide, chiudi masiak bammai khuga Iniu kasanbo phibang thiujiu kam khaine, sichiujiu paliu hai kadibo jat khat thiuwang rabo-e. Sibo wan gase Iniu paliutu Zion Luong gasu tingthengjiu mawangmi rabo-e.”
Naliu Jerusalem mai yo, Tingwang niu pamaidunggu mily khuanpiu kumjiu, pagu akheky-ton gasu phui khaijiu, nda pakak khat naliu wangdihgu dihsing thiukhai mibose kumjiu thiulan rabo-e,
Dekamjiu naliuniu haichiu kap marungjiu bam ralo? Dekamjiu maipuigu manathad kumjiu naliu magenthiu bam ralo? Naliu wangpiu hami jiuma, maksai naliutu ladpimaise shaimi jiuma?
Ngena manarabo pui thad kumjiu, Jerusalem mai hai paliu gen thiubo siniu nkuonroi-roijiu namditu phutlujiu, nkan hanglam tadmi rabo-e. Babylon lam naliu tadrabo mide, chiudi siga
Jatdung wajiukha siniu naliutu atungra wang madui mide. Paliuniu din-e, “Jerusalem haitu kam mahasiak mirabo-e! Haibo namdise nchum mibo aliuniu ngaosu rabo-e!”
Chiudi
Jerusalem maidung yo, naliugu riphendungtu khom madui sulo! Aliutu taomagui lude! Paliuniu Israel maigu jupaotu aphenjiu bamme!
Sichiujiu maipui siniu panah khat lungkhai makthen,
Paniu wangboga,
siga paniu agi-manaibose phungwang rabo-e.
Assyria mainiu aliu kadihse chari thiujiu, aliugu charirengse kampang ngutsai, paliutu aphenra aliugu tanthubo jupaodung situ aliuniu langpad khaine.
Maniagu pumtan siniu Nimrod kadih Assyria maitu paliuniu ngamlu rabo-e, sichiujiu aliu kadihtu charithiu ngutboga, paliuniu Assyria mai khugasu aliutu gukhai bine.
Masiak lubo Israel maidung sira

Sichiujiu jatdung ruangga masiak lubo mai sira mariujiuga maksai piuriangliga ndongquiniu patatek phiutiu kinbo kum, paniu milydung ruangga wanglujiu paliu riga machakkhang thonjiu phektap-tap mibo kum rabo-e—siga paliutu gukhaira agunbo hami rabo-e.
Israel mainiu pagu mikremaitu ngamlujiu, paliu mathiutu kam mahami rabo-e.
Naliu kadihga bambo namdidung situ Iniu kam maha mine khatdi naliugu charireng hinase kampang mine.
Naliuniu thinbo chamik thao kadadbo gaa situ Iniu kam maha mine, sichiujiu sailad din makra Iniu kamkhai mine.
Iniu naliugu charameng nai masanbo tukang-tiang situ kam maha mine; naliu pumsiakniu kamlubo situ naliuniu kahumta mirabo-e.
Naliu kadihga bambo charapui Asherah ramengdung situ khatdi naliugu namdidung situ Iniu kam maha mine.
Alad piumakbo jatdung hina riga, Iniu alung pomchang pomjiu chakhum rui rabo-e.”
Israel mai riga
Kadihpirigu halan makbo kaphung, ramluongdung naliu,
Iniu naliutu Egypt dih gasu jupad khaibo-e; kavang thiujiu bambo gasu naliutu rankhai bibo-e; naliutu jukhaira Iniu Mose, Aaron khatdi Miriam tu langkhaibo-e.

Amaidung yo, Moab mai wangpiu Balak niu naliu khuga degu kamra rangkhai gulo, siga Beor nahpiu Balaam niu dechiu patu paokak khailo chiubo maningtao khailo. Akakia gu rijiky gasu Gilgal tangbo lungga degu padmilo chiubose maningtao khailo. Naliutu rankhaira jengniu degu Iniu kamkhai milo chiubo haise maningtao khailo.”
Tinggen Rawang,
Iniu pakhuga mily sang-sang, maksai pakhui simakbo, takisa phungwangbo siniu
Chiumakge, kawibose kamra
Kasamai kygase paliu lung masan makjiu daolubo senlanse bamme. Iniu marengbo, nchangmakbo madadse paliuniu thin bamme.
Majimakbo taju nai madad thinbam maitu Iniu dechiujiu kuak khai ngamlu ralo?
Kalekwimai naliuniu kaleksamaitu kam masajiu bamme, khatdi naliu mathiu hai aratle.
Naliu nuan jengniu, naliutu kam mathiujiu kam mahami raleng Iniu kamsu mibo-e.
Naliuniu tiujiu bamdi kimlakge--mariujiu naliu tadrabo-e. Naliuniu maniase phunglu tadsune chiudi sise naliuniu baikhai ngam lakge, naliuniu bailubo hinase chari gasu Iniu kam mahakam mine.

Naliuniu alin-tarase lingkhai sune, chiudi sise atiat silakge. Naliuniu takisa gasu wasase niak sune, chiudi haise naliuniu wadaodi thinpiu lakge. Naliuniu jaw thao sune, chiudi sise wadaodi sakkhai lakge.

Haise padrabo-e palamra naliuniu Chawang Omri nai panahpiu Chawang Ahab gu kasabo thakse ali kami gasu-e. Naliuniu panaigu tasiam kasabo haise ali jut-jut kami jengniu naliutu din masajiu nchumbose naliu riga Iniu phungwang khai rabo-e. Pabam machangga naliutu chalung pomjiu pilung khai rabo-e.”
Mathaku-e! Ira singbangga charasy daomakbo khatdi mumsiken-ga mumsy daomakjiu mariubo piu kum mide. Mumsy hina khatdi tiuwibo ndutsy hina raikam mide.
Haibo kadihga palung masanbo mai khatdi hamide, Tingwang kadin piubo mai khatdi hamide. Mai hinase maitu kamshat ratu chonjiu bamme. Mai hinase parammai karaitu hajiu bamme.

Paliu mathiuse kasa kamra kamsi kamme. Chakampaodung khatdi ladjanpaodungniu tanim khengjiu bamme. Pazan katadmaidung siniu paliu maningga chalad dinjiu bamme, sichiujiu paliuniu wa kasa rang macham bamme.
Withubo khatdi palung masanthubo paliudi pageng habo piumendung kum kam mide.
Tingwang niu maidungtu paliugu akhemai khatdi phaimiukakung maidung khugasu kachankhai mibo kumjiu, paniu sajai pirabo tingmikse wang mide. Tuhoira paliu suang hajiu kabuak bam mide.
Naky ningmaitu maksai nakamaitu malum tulo. Nanao khuga dinkhaibo katang manang silo.

Haibo wan sira panahpiudung siniu, paliu piudungtu kapangbo kumjiu kam sune, panahpuidung siniu, paliu puidungtu atuk lakge, khatdi maipuinahmai siniu paliu naimaitu n-gi sune; sichiujiu mai khatgu mikremaise pakikhun siak mainiu thiu sune.
Chiudi Ira
Aliugu mikremainiu aliu riga nuimenjiu bamra palam ha-e. Aliu kaomide, chiudi aliu sulanmi rabo-e. Tuhoira aliu tamiuboga bamme, chiudi

khuga aliu mao mide, siniu aliu pakak khatra, pagu lungpomga khengbamra mide. Chiudi kanambo gara aliu khuga kamkhai mibo kamaobose paniu kam majikhai lan bine. Paniu aliutu kabenboga juwang khai bine, paniu aliutu gukhaibose aliu ringtingga ngaolu rabo-e.
Aliu mikremainiu haise ngaolujiu mangammi rabo-e—aliutu nuimenjiu bambo aliu mikremai siniu “Naliu Rawang
Jerusalem maidung yo, namdi rengse thiusu lanrabo tingse wangkinne. Sibo tinggara naliu kadih hai disanpad surabo-e.
Namaidungse pabam hina gasu—Assyria gu tingbang lamsu, Egypt gu tingnu lamsu, Euphrate luongriang lamsu, duipui nai ramluonggu kadiubo lamsu naliu khuga jonwang rabo-e.
Chiudi kadihpiri haira kathaidih mawimi rabo-e, palamra siga lungmaidungse paliu cheng sa-e.
Jatdungniu haise ngaolujiu, mangambo gasu paliu pumtan hami rabo-e. Paliu diusajiu, paliu mun kabami rabo-e, khatdi paliu kuon makadmi rabo-e.
Kaniu kumjiu tabuijiuga paliu ganiu tonsu rabo-e; paliugu charireng gasu paliu pingbo siniu kaphik-rai-raijiu wangrabo-e. Kapingbo siniu aliu Rawang
Oh
Nangniu aliutu lungsa khailan rabo-e. Nangniu aliu nuan situ naphi hangga tao malui khaijiu duipui runsingga thonkhai mirabo-e!
Nda nangniu aliu pao-pehmai Abraham khatdi Jacob kaikikdungtu nagu chamchangbo nai saomakbo lungsiatse lenkhaine chiujiu ladriat thiukhai mibose aliu khuga lenkhailo.
patu atungmai situ paniu sajai pirabo-e.
Pagu lungpom gasu paniu paliutu pi malan khai rabo-e.
siniu kamaomaitu paniu sajai pikhai makjiu talakge.
kamuangse paniu kakhaibo gasu padbo tabut si-e.
Paniu duipui situ chamtan piboga sise sangmi-e!
paniu singgiudung situ pisang khai-e.
Bashan luzamse agui mi-e, Carmel Luongdi majinre mi-e
khatdi Lebanon rapendungse kuimi-e.
khatdi luongbutdungse pamaga tunmi-e.
khatdi siga bammai hina masandi-di mi-e.
Paniu palung pomsai saoniu ringlu ralo?
Pagu lungpom gasu saoniu ringlu ralo?
tudise pamasuangga tabut mawimi-e.
pamaidungniu chariu magenthiubo tingga paniu gukhai-e;
pakhuga wangmaitu akhikhai bi-e.
Duidet siniu matentad mibo kumjiu
paniu pagu mikremaitu kam maha mi-e;
patu atungmai riga kashaibose langkhai-e.
Dechiujiu naliuniu
Paniu naliutu kam mahami rabo-e.
Mai khatniudi patu atung lonnia lumakge.
Tathu-karasut khatdi magaorengtu kumjiu
jaw sak mangiumai naliutu ruthon mirabo-e.
Nineveh yo, nakhu gasu,
Pamai Israel maidung khuga
Tuhoira, Assyria maidungniu naliutu bangman bambo pumtan nai chagiriang gasu khikhai bine.
Assyria maidung lamga
Nineveh yo, natu limlujiu bam mide!
Natu kam mara mirabo pumtanse wangbamde.
Aphenra chamaitu langkhai sulo!
Puidise akhe sulo!
Chari thiura kaden sulo!
Mikremaigu riphendung siniu chagee kahengbose phunglujiu
khatdi kahengbo ponse piu kinne.
Aphen raleng paliu kaden bamme!
Paliugu chaqon-karise taobambo mipuangse kumme!
Paliu qondungse machao bamme!
Chaqon-karidungse npuiga kagijiu bamme,
namdi gase pakmeng pakwangjiu bamme.
Kahiupuang kumjiu thaoben bamme
khatdi ting kalikbo kumjiu kalik bamme.
Chakampaodung situ kukhaijiu tadpadboga,
paliu phi masui sude,
Mikre maidungse paliu lai padjiu aphenra
kaden lujiu pakwang bamme.
Singgiu mungga bambo rengmunse pangmide;
chawangkiningse kapingboniu phuimide.
Chawangpui tuse kavangleng mintad mide;
pavangpuidungse makhao kumjiu kap bamme,
paliu chun sajiu paliu-gaa jumjiu bamme.
Ajai phakpadbo gasu tadui luangpadbo kum
maidungse Nineveh gasu pakpad bamme!
“Saomilo! Saomilo!” chiujiu ku bamme—
chiudi mai khatdi mariwang makge.
Rangkangse sutsulo! Kachiase sutsulo!
Namdise chakhiu-chalanniu phui bamme!
Nineveh hai hamide, nchum mide, nkamkui mide!
Lungchunse kapingboniu tun mide;
patapuse masandi-di bamme,
pumtanse hamide; pazuse abasai mide.
Ndongqui reng kumjiu bambo, ndongqui poidungtu pitiu khaibo bam,
chaquipui-chaquipiu tad mariujiu papoidungse
manang makjiu bambo namdise tuhoira delam bam mijiulo?
Ndongqui siniu chakhaose kamshat lujiu panao panaleng phettap-tap lujiu
pareng lunggase chaminiu phui bamme.
Ngamkambo
Maitu kamshatjiu, khatdi maigu senlan sutjiu bambo namdi yo,
hamirabo siniu natu khuanjiu bamme!
Kinglo! Dap-lekjiu bambo khuanse, adiangjiu bambo kari-phi khuanse,
pakjiu bambo chaqon phipa khuanse tadjiu bambo chaqon-kari khuanse kinglo!
Chaqon tongmaidung siniu asun bamme,
chaheng changiuse kalikjiu bamme!
Kashai phawse makhuanting mide, kashai phawse pariak sikamlak mide--
siga maidungse paliu phi masui bamme.
Papum kajonpui Nineveh situ sajai pibam-e.
Pazu-palun watsiniu jatdung situ kamihlujiu pavang thiura jutad mide.
Ngamkambo
Iniu nafaise gaothon lujiu, napumruang
nagu mangambose jatdung khuga lenkhaine.
Alungpom siniu natu chabajiuga thonkhai mine.
Maidung siniu pingjiu natu phui sune.
Natu kangaomai hina siniu pingjiu masai nkhinmi sune,
Paliuniu din sune, ‘Nineveh hamide!
Patu saoniu lungsakhai ralo? Patu saoniu kam ringa khai ralo?’”
Nineveh yo, Egypt mai dihsing namdi, Thebes suang nang wijiuma? Singbeng kumjiu Nile giuky siniu patu gukhaijiu bamme.
Paniu Sudan nai Egypt tu mawang bambo-e, pagu pumtanse pamalan thiu makge; Libya di patu alianglujiu bambo-e.
Chiudi Thebes ga bammaidungtu kavang leng jutad kamigu-e. Paliu nahdung situ npui-kamik hinaga dapshat mide. Paliugu jupaodung situ chagiriangniu ratlujiu puitad mide khatdi paliutu njan mara mide.
Nineveh yo, nangdi jawsak maniu mibo jengniu kaomi rade! Nagu mikremaidung khugasu paklura nangdi kamsu rade.
Nagu charireng hinase minmibo ndutbang kum; sibo bang situ tun kacha khaisai, namunkiga nkaikiu sune!
Nagu riphendungse maipuidung kum mide, siniu nagu mikremaidung khugasu gukhai ngamlak mide. Nagu rengmun-chum katang chaminiu ruthon mirabo-e.
Nagu charirengse katin lujiu, chari bamleng tadui thuak kadenlu sulo! Taniangse chagamtu kamraleng kaden sulo!
Wakhat khat kamjiu bamdi natu rutaliang mine, maksai chari gasu kamshat mine. Takaoniu tiulubo miureng kumjiu natu hunthon mine.
Takaodung kumjiu nang lunpad bamme!
Tingpukga chagandung suang kengjiu nangniu chali-ali maitu kampad bamme! Chiudi tuhoira, takaodungse pakan kaphingpad lujiu lentad mibo kumjiu paliutu ngaota mide.
Nagu chakampaodungse takaodung kumme, paliuniu ka-agibo tingga singbengga khopman bamme. Chiudi n-nien ting thiumi sai len maha mibo kumme, chiujiu paliu delam tadmilo chiubo maidi simakge!
Assyria mai Wangdipiu yo, nagu dihthinpaodung shai mide, khatdi nagu kadimaidungse tingtheng leng njip mide! Namaidungse maluong riga pak marakam mide, paliutu maidi chakyga puiwang lanra hamide.

Najamga khairabo piuse hamide, sichiujiu najamse wisi lulak mide. Natu kam maha mibo cham chiumai hinaniu paliu chunwijiu paliu ben kaphi bamme. Nagu pamalan habo thad gasu mai khat kumbo marilu buima?
Haise phaimiukakung Habakkuk khuga madulen khaibo
Hey,

Haikumbo magenthak haitu dekamra nangniu atu lenkhai jiulo? Haijiukha kamaobo haitu nangniu dethengkha phuijiu bamralo? Wakam mahajiu bambo khatdi kasabo thak siniu atu maguijiu bamme, khatdi pabam hinaga n-gi athaobo nai chari thiubo ronna-e.
Tacheng tajaise son mide, khatdi pageng hamide, sichiujiu kamajibose, wadaodi kamta mide. Kasamai siniu tacheng matipmaitu thinman mide, sijengniu kamajibose kammao mide.
Palungpom kasa mai mathak silakjiu bambo, Babylon maidung situ Iniu puiwang sune. Paliuniu katam-tambo kadih lura, kadihpiri tadronwang kinne.
Paliuniu kapingbo nai maidiu kasabose phungwang kinne, khatdi paliugu chaliangbose paliugu tacheng-e.

Paliu qondungse quiruk suang majadle, khatdi kamariubo tany suang paliu lungse sa-e. Paliugu chaqon tongmaidung siniu charam kadiu lamsu wangkinne; paliu qondungse kadihga paliu phi kasam bamme. Lengreng niu chami thonbo kumjiu paliu pakwang kinne.
“Paliugu riphendung siniu kapingbo thiujiu charise hawang kinne, sichiujiu paliu wangboga mai hina pingkamme. Paliuniu minlubo maidungse nbuiniang kumjiu keng-e.
Paliuniu chawangdungtu khatdi kadibo chakampaodungtu nuimenjiu bamme. Charireng khatniudi paliutu khamman lulakge, paliuniu kadihse dangman lujiu, sise lumi rabo-e.
Sigasu paliu tingkai kumjiu pakmide, paliu pumtanse paliu ra si-e.

Chiudi haijiukha pathak kasamaidung situ nangniu dethengkha phui ngamlu ralo? Kasabo situ phuira, namik sira masanchang masan-e, nangra kamao kammai lam chap makge. Sijengniu paliu suang tacheng matipmaidung situ haichiu kam mahajiu bamboga nang dekamjiu maliu makjiu bammi gulo?
Dechiujiu nangniu maidung haitu chakhatu kumjiu, maksai paliutu jukhaira habo wakhaodung kumjiu kambam ralo?
Chakhatu khakhoiniu minbo kumjiu, Babylon maidungniu maidungtu min lude. Paliugu alangse jupad lujiu paliu chunwijiu makiak mara bamme!
Paliuniu paliugu alang tudi kahumjiu bamme, khatdi rathak mania kadkhaijiu bamme, palamra paliugu alang siniu paliuleng withubo hinase pikhaijiu bamme.
Paliuniu paliu heng thinlujiu jatdung haitu lungsamak jingjiu tingtheng kam mahajiu bam rama?
Iniu agu akheky ton-ga buangkhang lujiu
niu atu haichiu paokak khai-e: “Iniu nakhuga madukhaibo hai wapekga masanjiu raokhai lulo, sichiujiu haise phuigap sai, kenlura kamkhailo.

Haise raokhai lulo, palamra haise padrabo tingse wangmakha-e. Chiudi patingse majadjiu wangkinne, khatdi Iniu natu lenkhaibo hai pachang siakjiu padrabo-e. Haise koina wangbo kumjiu ngao sune, chiudi khuanno, haise maomakjiu padrabo-e, rilak mide.
Pacham sira haichiu-e: ‘Kasa maidung ringlu lakge, chiudi tacheng matip maidungse ringlu rabo-e, palamra paliuniu Tingwang khuga chamchang-e.’”
Chakhiu-chalanra pason sa-e. Patiuni kasamaise chaliang-e, khatdi mathaksi makge, kashaibo kumjiu paliu wadaodi kim makge. Sijengniu paliuniu jat khat sai jat khattu charithiu bambo-e.

Ngamlu lakbo maidung siniu paliutu ngamlu maitu thangjiu din-e, “Naliugu makbose naliuniu lu-e, chiudi naliu nchum mirabo-e. Naliu paw phungmai khugasu naliuniu manomjiu sutlubo siniu dethengkha naliu lungwi khai ralo?”
Chiudi naliuniu simakhaga, naliuniu ngamlu mai siniu chapawse paton khailujiu majonra manomjiu matan wang sune. Mikremaidung siniu naliutu kam charen-ale khaine. Paliuniu naliugu sutlu rabo-e!

Naliuniu jatdung wajiukhagu sutlude, chiudi tuhoira masiaklu mai siniu naliugu sutsune, palamra naliuniu maidungtu kamshat mibo-e, palamra naliuniu kadihpiri maidungtu khatdi paliugu namdidung situ kam masa mibo-e.
Naliu nchum mide! Palamra sutlubo siniu naliu kikhuntu pi lungwi khaijiu naliu kyga chariu magen thiubo piwang khai makge.
Chiudi naliugu ngamkam siniu naliu kikhun-ga mangambo phungwang bamde; jatdung wajiukhatu kam maha mibose naliu ronna kam maha mibo-e.
Singbenggu tatudung siniudi naliutu atungjiu mara bamme, khatdi sibo kajendungniu marabo kavai khuan pad bamme.
Naliu nchum mide! Naliuniu maitu kamshat lujiu siga maji makbo namdi thiukhai-e.
Naliuniu ngamlubo jatdungse paliu ronna pageng kahabo ngam kam bamme, sichiujiu paliuniu thiusubo hinase mipon thiu mide. Haise Ngamkambo
Chiudi duipuiga tadui phui kabam kumjiu,
Naliu nchum mide! Naliu lungpom siniu naliu kiningmai situ kam mangam khai mide, sichiujiu naliuniu paliutu jaw sak maniu lumai kumjiu pi tad tangad lad-lad bamme.
Naliu tudi chakhuang thiubo sung mangambo siniu gomkhai rabo-e. Naliu ronna jaw sak- maniu lujiu tad tangat lad-lad surabo-e.

Naliuniu Lebanon mariu situ huithon mide, tuhoira naliutu huithon mirabo-e. Naliuniu siga bambo khaoringdungtu kamshat mide, tuhoira naliutu khaoringdung siniu kapin sune. Haise padrabo-e, palamra naliuniu maidungtu kamshat mide, palamra maidunggu kadih nai namdidungse naliuniu atungjiu kam maha mibo-e.
Charamengse degu pageng bamlo? Haise chamainiu dambo-e haise aratbo sangnu wadi makge. Haise damlujiu malumbo hai degu pawat bamlo! Npao ngam makbo ra situ dekam ralo!

Naliu nchum mide! Naliuniu tasingpek khuga din-e, “Sulo!” Maksai tatukang khuga din-e, “Su chaplo!” Charameng siniu naliutu madulen ngamma? Haise rangkang giniu maksai kachia giniu domman bamdi sui-e, chiudi siga karingbo ha-e.
Haise phaimiukakung Habakkuk rathoi-e.
Iniu chiulujiu pingboniu phui bamme.
Nangniu kamkhai mibo kadibo ngamdungse tuhoi aliu ken gadi kamkhai lanlo.
Nalung pombamdi, chalungsa khailo.
Edom gasu Tingwang wanglan kinne; Paran luong gasu masanbo Rawang wangkinne
Pakendi dibo siniu tinggense gomnam bamme; patu thuonbo siniu kadihpiri phui bamme.
Hengri kalikchan-chanbo nbiuse jaojiu pah wang kinne,
paben gasu pabiuse kalikchan-chan pad bamme; siga pagu pumtanse baikhai bamme.
Pamasuangga paniu chararen langkhai-e
sichiujiu kashaibo situ pasai suitadra chamtan pikhai-e.
Paniu mathak khaiboga kathise padle;
paniu phuikhaiboga jatdungse pingboniu kaphikrai-rai mi-e.
Nda bambo luongdungse kampang tap-tap mide;
paniu nda tadkhai mibo luongdungse marumkiu kam mide.
Kushan maidungniu pingjiu bambo
khatdi Midia maidung kaphik di-dijiu bambo I ngao-e.
Duipui siniu nalung kam masakhai jiuma?
Nangra kamuang riga tonglu tadle;
sichiujiu tingthung-tingkai siniu nagu chaqon-kari thiu-e,
namaidungtu pijiu chari ngamkhai-e.
Nangniu nagu tavaipise thinra kaden lude,
nagu tavaithuse thipad lujiu kaden bamme.
Nagu hengri kalik khaibo siniu kadihtu rekpangjiu lekhaide.
Kadih maluang siniu natu ngaoboga pingjiu kaphik rai-rai mi-e,
khatdi tingpuk gasu tingdui runkiu khai-e.
Kadih hangga bambo duise marajiu paliu kasuak khuanse tankhang-e.
Nagu majadbo tavaithu siniu kalik khaiboga,
khatdi nagu ran-ranbo ngiu kathon khangboga, chahiu nai naimikse chapmi-e.
Nalung pomjiu nangniu kadihpiri haitu tadron khaide;
nalungpom siniu jatdungtu taomalui khaide.
Nangniu kadakhai mibo wangtu khatdi namaidungtu gukhaira tadpadle.
Nangniu kasamaigu jupaotu kamshat mi-e, khatdi pasai suimai hinatu kam maha mi-e.
Lunglakmai aliutu mahin kam masara, tingthung-tingkai kumjiu wangboga
riphenmaigu papee situ nagu tavaithu siniu kettao mide.
Naqondung siniu duipui situ tao khaiboga kadibo tadui gase pata padle.
Pakhiangna hai I chiuluboga pingboniu amuntai tangna kakhutrai-rai mide.
Apum haidi masandi-di mide, sichiujiu aphidi khengkhang sita mide.
Aliutu miktunjiu aphenmaitu Tingwang niu sajai pira wangkinbo situ
Ira maliu makjiu khuanbam rabo-e.
Ndutbang siniu pasy masimak tadi, mumsy kense masimak tadi,
takisy masimak tadi,
luzamga alin-tamra masimak tadi,
milydung hina shaimi tadi
chakhao ky hinase maruangmi tadi,
Ira achun wijiu khatdi ringajiu bamne,
palamra
tathan kumjiu maomakbo phikense paniu atu pikhai-e,
khatdi maluong rigase paniu atu pi manang makjiu chapkhai-e.
chamaina hina khatdi chakhao hina, thingnadung nai chakha hinatu kam mahami rabo-e. Kasabo hinatu Iniu kam mahami rabo-e. Iniu mai hinatu kam mahami rabo-e, chiujiu mai khat tudi masiak khai lakge.

“Iniu Jerusalem maidungtu khatdi Judah mai mathiutu sajai pirabo-e. Baal tu kahumbo mai hina situ Iniu kam mahami rabo-e, sichiujiu nkengmai singku, patu machabo mai khat tudi pijiu maningtao khai lakge.

Chaky npom rilam khanglujiu naimiktu, chahiutu, khatdi chagandungtu, kahumbo mai hinatu Iniu kam mahami rabo-e. Atu kahumne khatdi alad kadin piune chiujiu tasiang sianglujiu, chiudi Molech ra zan gasu tasiang siangjiu bammaitu Iniu kam mahami rabo-e.
Akhugasu marilujiu asai suita mimai, khatdi akhuga wanglujiu paliutu jukhaira khengmak mai hinatu Iniu kam mahami rabo-e.”
niu din-e, “Khaoshat rabo naise Iniu chakampaodungtu, chawang nahdungtu khatdi sangdiumai thak alimai hinatu sajai pirabo-e.
Nkengmai kumjiu kahumbo mai khatdi agatiujiu maitu kamshat mai khatdi pawangpiu ky piphui khaira wasutkinbo mai hinatu Iniu sajai pirabo-e.
Namdigu n-hangbo jailam lungbo naliuniu haibo khuanse chiu dasai kiu-huijiu kaplulo, palamra chali-chala thiukinmai hinase shaimi rabo-e!
“Sibo tinggase Iniu chamibung thinlujiu Jerusalem maitu phiurabo-e. paliu ronna wasao thiujiu wa manang makjiu, ‘
Paliugu chakhiu-chalan hina sutlujiu paliu ky hinase kam mahami rabo-e. Paliuniu thiujiu bambo kygase paliu wadaodi lunglakge, maksai paliuniu lingkhaibo mumsireng gasu paliu mumjaw saklakge.”
Haibo tingmikse, lungpom tingmik, magenthiu chariubo tingmik, nchumbo nai kahabo tingmik, tamiubo nai katikbo tingmik khatdi kamuangniu gombo tingmik thiurabo-e,
sibo tingmikse chari make khuanse rengkhai bambo namdi khatdi kakubo chaky-ton situ riphendungniu aphenbo khuanniu phuimi rabo-e.
Mangam makbo jat yo,
gu lungpom mise naliu riga wangjiu, pagu lungnot siniu naliutu miureng kumjiu tingkainiu hunthonjiu pagu lungpomse lenkhai makhabo suangga, naliu wasi lulo.
Pagu chamtan majaijiu, kadihga lung manonjiu bammai naliu mathiu
Philistia mai naliu nchum mide, ajaikung mungga lungbam mai naliu nchum mide.
Duipui mungga bambo naliu dihse manamjiuga bambo mily khuanmai nai milydunggu apaky thiumi rabo-e.
Ring masiak lubo Judah maidung siniu naliu kadihga lungmi rabo-e. Siga paliuniu paliugu milydungtu senjiu Ashkelon maidung kygase paliu jirabo-e. Paliu Rawang,
I hai pachangjiu ringbambo
Moab maidung nai Ammon maidungniu chaliangjiu khatdi wasao thiujiu Ngamkambo
niu paliutu kam charen khai rabo-e. Paniu kadih radungtu kam mahami rabo-e, sichiujiu jat hina pagu-gu kadih gasu patu kahummi rabo-e.
Haisitu khaorui-khaonadung khatdi tathiu-chakhao hinatu pi jikhai rabo bam thiumi rabo-e. Nkamkui mibo gase avengdungniu lungne, sichiujiu kiran gasu mara sune. N-gekdung

Paronna patu maning madilujiu wadi manang makjiu bambo namdi gase sichiu padsu rabo-e. Siga lungbam maidung siniu paliugu namdise kadihpiriga dithu-e chiujiu maning-e. Sibo bamse dejiukha nchummi ralo, nkan khaoniu siga paliu mathakbam thiumi rabo-e! Siga tadkhai mai hinase pingjiu paliu giu magao surabo-e.
Jerusalem hai nchum mide, haise pamai siaktu kam mathadjiu khatdi kadin piumakbo, kasabo namdi-e.
Haisiniu
Pagu chakampaodungse marungjiu bambo ndongquidung kumme, pagu ladjan paodungse kamariubo, patiuni sabo, para tadi nsuan katang masiak khai makbo tanydung kumme.
Phaimiukakungdungse paliu ngiudon simakge, khatdi paliu lung magi-e; singkudung siniu masanbo situ kam tania mi-e, khatdi paliuleng kagengbo phiujiu Tingwang gu tacheng-tajaitu kam kadat mi-e.
Chiudi namdi lungga

Sichiusai amaidung siniu atu chakhuang thiujiu, alad phungjiu, Iniu paliutu katikhai bibo ngiudonse paliuniu wadaodi mangailak mine chiu Ira maning-e. Chiudi paliugu kasabo lunlung gase wangnuang mide.
“Khuanno,” chiujiu
“Sigasu Iniu jatdung situ kam kalikhai rabo-e, sichiusai paliuniu kakibo radungtu kahum makjiu akhuga ronna khengrabo-e. Siga paliu mathiuniu alad phungrabo-e.
Kadiubo Sudan lam lungmara tadmibo amaidung siniudi akhuga rathak mania phungwang rabo-e.
Sibo tinggara, amaidung, naliuniu atu atungkhai mibo jengniu mangamra pageng hamide. Wasao thiumai khatdi chaliangmai hinatu Iniu lupad mine, sichiusai naliuniu agu masanbo luongga
Siga Iniu palung manonjiu nkha khaira akhuga kheng maitu masiak khaine.
Ring masiak lubo Israel maidung siniu mai khat khugadi kamaobo kamlakge, aratbodi dinlakge, khatdi sontiu lakge. Paliu hai wadi manang makjiu lungwikhang rabo-e, sichiujiu mai khat tudi pingra ha-e.”
Israel maidung yo, chalui thiujiu ringabo khuan senlo!
Jerusalem mai yo, nalungchun pakhiangna ringa lulo!
paniu nagu mikremai hinatu luthon mide.
tuhoira pingra palam wakhatdi hamide.
Paliuniu Jerusalem ga lungbam mai khuga
haichiu dinrabo tingse wangkin-e,
“Zion gu namdi yo, pingtulo!
Naben situ pijiu pajeng hami tulo!
Na-Rawang,
pagu pumtan siniu charise pi ngamkhaine.
palamra
sichiujiu kasanbo ringtingse naleng pikhai bine.
Maidungniu chakhuang-changeega ringabo kum,
paniu ringajiu nakhuga chalui thiune.”
khatdi nagu mangambose luthon mide.
Patingse wangkin-e! Natu mathadmai situ Iniu sajai pirabo-e;
pangen tangmai hinatu Iniu gukhai bine khatdi kavang thiumi maitu Iniu puiwang khai bine;
paliugu mangambo sung pijiu chakhuang thiukhai bine.
Siga kadihpiriga lungmai hinaniu paliutu thuon rabo-e.
Patingse wangkin-e!
Lungmara tadmibo namaidung situ Iniu chakyga puiwang lankhai bine.
Kadihpiri pabam hinaga nazan haitu Iniu pijiu dikhai bine.
Haichiujiu naliu lungwi khanglan rabo-e.”
Ngamkambo
Siga phaimiukakung Haggai khugasu
“Amaidung yo, dekamjiu naliuniu chaky kawiboga lungbam lujiu atu Kahumboky haitu pijiu kaomaha bamralo?
Naliu khuga padbambose naliuniu ngaomak jiuma?

Naliuniu chamiuse kengkha lingkhai-e, chiudi poinakha ronna atiat wang-e. Katiu tiuraleng naliu khuga bamme, chiudi siseniu magiu makge. Naliu sakraleng jaw bamme, chiudi siseniu naliu chari kim makge! Naliugu chafai-tani bamme, chiudi siseniu pijiu lumkhai makge. Khatdi changam kamjiu bammai siniu ringbuibo leng katiu dao makge.
Dekamjiu haise padbam gulo, naliu ngao makjiuma?
Tuhoira maluang lamse khang, singpumse phiulujiu, Charaky se thiulan sulo; sichiusai I alung kimrabo-e khatdi atu kahumrabo thiak gasu kahum lubui-e.
“Naliuniu atiat mawiwang sune chiu maning-e, chiudi poinakha ronna atiat wang-e. Khatdi naliuniu atiat lujiu chakyga phungwangboga, Iniu mudthon mi-e.
Sijengniu tingriu khai makge, sichiujiu wakhatdi puakkhang ngam makge.
Iniu haibo kadihga ramluong gadi, luzam gadi, mumsireng gadi, charasireng gadi, alinbang puaksubo hina gadi, chakhao-chamai hina riga, naliuniu kambo hinaga, charakhum hai phungwang khaibo-e.”
Sigasu Zerubbabel nai Joshua khatdi Babylon lamsu kavang thiulu malanwangbo mai hinase
Siga Haggai niu
niu Charaky se thiusura, Judah gu dihthinpao, Zerubbabel, Singku Dibo, Joshua khatdi kavang thiulu malanwangbo mai hina lungchun pisu khaide. Sichiujiu paliuniu Ngamkambo
haise Darius niu Wangdipiu thiubo niabo kumgu chahiu charukbogu, jeng makai-je-madaikiubo nai thiusu mibo-e.
Sibo kumgu chinniabo hiugu jeng makai-je-khat-kiubo nai
Paniu Judah gu dihthinpao, Zerubbabel, Singku Dibo, Joshua khatdi maidung khuga dinkhaira Haggai khuga dinkhaide,
“Charaky se dejiukha palun wilo chiubo maningtaobo mai naliu ruangga mai khat kumbo bamma? Tuhoira naliuniu haise dechiu ngao khailo? Haise wadi sichiu lakge.
Chiudi tuhoira naliu mai khatdi nkhinmi tulo. Changamse kamsulo, palamra Iniu naliutu maluang bamme.
Naliuniu Egypt dih gasu npadbo tingga, Iniu naliutu maluang khaine chiujiu ladriat khai mibo-e. Tuhoi tangbo Iniu naliutu maluang bambo-e, siniu pingmi tulo.
Iniu jat hinatu luthonmi rabo-e, sichiujiu paliugu chakhiu-chalandungse haiga phungwang rabo-e, sichiujiu Charaky se chakhiu-chalanniu pi phuikhai rabo-e.
Kadihpirigu kachia nai rangkang hinase agu-e,
Kasanbo Raky hainiu kaguangbo suang ngaowi rabo-e, siga Iniu amaidungtu agi-manaibo siniu pijiu disu khairabo-e.” Ngamkambo
Darius niu Wangdi thiubo kum niabo kumgu chahiu chakiugu jeng makai-je-madaikiu nai Ngamkambo
Paniu din-e, “Singkumaidung khuga tadbambo ladbam hai maniulo:

Wakhat kamjiu mai khatniu masanbo chamikang hai rathakbam khat gasu pa-ntiang taronboga kadiplujiu ponlude. Sichiujiu pagu ntiang taronbo siniu taruak khuangga, langlubo tatekga, jawga, takisaga, maksai wa katiu khatga niakhai sai, siga katiuse masanmi rama?”
Sibo ladse maniuboga, singkudungniu paokakge, “Chiumakge, masan lakge.”
Singkudungniu paokakge, “Yo, taniami rabo-e.”
Siga Haggai niu din-e, “Sikumgapjiu jatdung rigase khatdi paliuniu kampadbo hina sidi, paliuniu rathakbamga kadkhaibo hina sidi tania mide chiujiu

Naliuniu Charaky se thiusulan makbo gara, naliugu miukhumse taju kainia bamniu sune chiu maningjiu tadboga, taju kariu ronna dao-e. Naliuniu karung khatga jaw-lah kaikhat daosune chiu maningjiu tadboga, jaw-lah atai ronna dao-e.
Naliuniu lingkhaibo hina riga Iniu tingkai kasabo nai kachak langkhai-e, chiudi naliu tuhoi tangbo lungli makge.
Thainai hai chahiu chakiubogu jeng makai-je-madai-kiubo, khatdi Charaky phung hai loibo nai-e. Tuhoi gasu degu padralo chiubo phuilulo.
Chamiu hami tadi, mumsibang bang, majongsibang khatdi takisibang masira hami tadi, tuhoi gasu Iniu naliutu thoikhai birabo-e.”
Sibo hiugu, jeng makai-je-madaikiubo naise
“Iniu tinggen nai kadihpiritu tun kanuk khai sune,

sichiujiu chawangdih nai paliugu pumtanse luthon mirabo-e. Chaqon-karidung khatdi tuangkinmai situ Iniu tun taliang mirabo-e; chaqondungse shaimi rabo-e, siga paliutu tuangkinmai karai khat-khattu kamshatmi rabo-e.
Sibo naise Iniu avangpiu Zerubbabel natu kada lujiu, chamtan gasu pi mawang khai rabo-e. Natu hai Iniu kadakhai mibo-e.” Ngamkambo
Maidung khuga haichiu dinkhaira
chiudi tuhoira Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e. Akhuga malanwang milo, chiusai I naliu khuga malanwang rabo-e.

Naliu pao-peh maidung kummi mane. Kasabo nuan gu lunlung gase lungta mira nda agu champaose phaimiukakung maidung khugasu paliu khuga pikhai mibo-e. Chiudi paliuniu achamtu nking makge maksai akadin piumakge.
Naliu paopeh maidung khatdi sibo phaimiukakung maidungse lungta mide.

Avangmai phaimiukakungdung khugasu Iniu naliu paopehdung khuga chamtandung nai kachan khaibo hinase pikhaibo-e, chiudi paliuniu sise wajeng chakkhai makge, siniu sibogu chariubose paliuniu daomide. Sigasu paliu lung lipad lujiu, Ngamkambo
Darius niu wangdipiu thiubo paniabo kumgu, chahiu kariu-je-khatkiugu, jeng makai-je-madaikiubo nai (Shebat hiugu) nchun madungao khatga
Mai khatniu chaqon kahengbo tongkinbo Iniu ngao-e. Paniu taningdih khat lungga bambo maronpen bang jiuga chap bamme, sichiujiu pasai lamse --kahengbo, tarukbo khatdi kakabo qondung bamme.
Iniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Paohubo yo, haibo qondung hai degu rambalo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Paliuse degu rambalo chiubo Iniu nakhuga lenkhaine.
niu paliutu kadihpiriga tadlujiu phuira langkhaibo-e.”
