Paliuniu maza khuga din-e: “Aliuniu kadihpiri pabam hinaga tadkhai kam mide, sichiujiu kadihpiri pakhiangnase wathak thiura hamibo lunlungga bamme.”
Siga maza siniu din-e, “Ngamkambo
siga Ngamkambo

sigasu chakhuan-chalad hajiu khatdi agi-manaibo lutaojiu bambo jatdungtu Iniu alung pomchang-pom mide. Iniu amaidung riga agu lungpom poinaga kasutjiu bamga, sibo jatdungniu amaidungtu kam chariu-chang kam chariu khai-e.
Sijengniu namdi situ lungsabo lenkhaira Iniu Jerusalem ga malan wangbo-e. Agu Charaky situ kalankhai rabo-e, khatdi namdise thiukhai lanbi rabo-e.”
Haise dinron tadra maza siniu akhuga dinkhai-e: “
Katambo madungao khatga Iniu matomchi ke madai ngao-e.
Atu npaojiu bambo maza khuga Iniu maniu-e, “Haibo wakhao kedunggu rambase degulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Haisiniu madu khaibora Judah mai, Israel mai khatdi Jerusalem maidungtu pijiu lungmara -maren khaibo kadihpirigu pumtantu dinbo-e.”
Siga
Iniu maniu-e, “Paliu hai dekamra wangbam jiulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Judah mai kadihtu niakpet lujiu khatdi pamaidungtu pijiu lungmara-maren khaimibo jat situ kam charen khai lujiu khatdi luthon mira paliu hai wangbambo-e.”
Katambo madungao khat, mai khatniu paben ga madatriang thinjiu bambo Iniu ngao-e.
“Nang delam tadralo?” chiujiu Iniu maniu-e.
Paniu paokakge, “Jerusalem tu madatjiu, sise dethengga thenglo khatdi delangga dilo chiubo phuira leng-e.”
Atu npaojiu bambo maza siniu pasuanglam tadpadboga, katambo maza khatniu patu adaora wangbo Iniu ngao-e.

Karaibo piu siniu katambo piu khuga din-e, “Jerusalem lungga chakhao chamai kengjiu bamrabo jengniu kareng kamrabose diju rabo-e chiubose pakmeng lujiu madatriang thinlujiu bambo chabon mai khugase dinbilo.
papum siakniu namdi kamaguibose chamigu kareng thiujiu gukhaine, sichiujiu pagu maken dijiu pah lungne chiujiu ladriat thiukhai mide.”
Naliutu mai khatniu dapkhaibose, Iniu kungthubo mai khattu dapkhaibo kumbo-e.”
Haijengniu Ngamkambo
Haise padboga, Ngamkambo
Sibo tingga jat kakeng khaniu
Judah hai pagu masanbo kadihga
gu maza siniu Satan khuga din-e, “Satan yo,
Siga Joshua se taniabo fai-ni piulujiu chap bamme.

maza siniu pagu tinggen machamaidung khuga din-e, “Haibo piuniu piujiu bambo taniabo fai-nise luthon milo. Sigasu paniu Joshua khuga din-e, “Iniu nagu nuanse luthon mide sichiujiu nangniu piura chafai-tani kasanbo nakhuga pikhai bine.”
Joshua pee ga masanbo pikhekse khek khaira paniu machamaidung khuga chamtan pikhaide. Sikumjiu kam khai bide, sichiujiu
Siga Ngamkambo

Joshua khuga dinkhai-e: “Nangniu agu tacheng-tajai majaijiu bamsai khatdi Iniu nakhuga pikhai mibo ngiudon hinase kamjiu bamsai, khatdi agu Charaky nai sibo ladjanky se phuijiu bamsai, amasuang ga bambo mazadunggu rathoi Iniu chiukhaibo kumjiu, narathoi chiukhai birabo-e.
Chiusai nkinglo, Joshua yo, Dibo Singku nangniu, nakamai singkudung karai khuan nking-e, sichiujiu haise pasai naleng kawibo madan khatle: Iniu nakhuga avangpiu Pake chiu kubo situ madukhai bine!
Iniu Joshua masuangga pake chinnia bambo tukang khat khai bamme. Iniu sibo riga wakhat giakkhai bine, sichiujiu naikhat lungga Iniu haibo dihgu nuanse luthonmi rabo-e.
Sibo tingmikse wangboga, naliu mai hinaniu naliugu mumsireng nai ndutsireng siniu maguijiu bambo lungga naliu kiningmaitu kuwang lujiu wadi manang makjiu, agi-manaijiu bammi rabo-e.”
Atu npaojiu bambo maza siniu wanglan lujiu Iniu jibambo kumjiu atu makiang sukhai-e.
“Nangniu degu ngaolo?” chiujiu paniu maniu-e.
Iniu paokakge, “Kachianiu kambo chamibungdung, khatdi sibo riga chamidui-lah bamme. Sichiujiu chamibungdung rigase chamibung chinnia bamme, paliu mungga pariang khat-khat bamme.
Sibo mibungdung mung nia lamse takisibang nia bamme.”
Siga Iniu maza khuga maniu-e, “Haise degu rambalo, paohubo yo?”
“Nang simak jiuma?” chiujiu paniu akhuga maniu-e.
“Makge, I simakge, paohubo yo,” chiujiu Iniu paokakge.”

Nasuang ga maluong kadibo kumjiu bambo khamnambose hami rabo-e. Nangniu Charaky se thiusulan rabo-e, sigasu nangniu kanamthubo tukangse pabamga donsu khaisai, “Ngaowi-e, Ngaowi-e!” chiujiu maidungniu senpad rabo-e.
Paniu din-e, “Zerubbabel niu Charaky gu kaphungse donsu khaide, khatdi paniu chakyse thiuloi khai rabo-e. Haise padboga, Iniu natu paliu khuga langkhaibo-e chiubose amaidungniu simi rabo-e.
Poinaga ronna kam khaibo donniu paliu lung makge, Chiudi Zerubbabel niu Charaky hai thiujut khangbo paliuniu ngaoboga, paliu chun wimi rabo-e.”
Khatdi takisa runkiu khaibo kachia niu kambo taduiping nia mungga bambo takisibang gu pake nia ramba hai detulo?”
Paniu akhuga maniu-e, “Nang simak jiuma?”
“Makge, I simakge, paohubo yo,” chiujiu Iniu paokakge.
Siga paniu din-e, “Haibo piu kaniase Tingwang niu kadalubo khatdi kadihpiri pakhiangnagu
Iniu phuilanboga, tuhoira ariak majiuhanse tingkaiga lenjiu bambo Iniu ngao-e.
Iniu ngaolubo lamga maza siniu maniu-e. Iniu paokakge, “Ariak majiuhan khat tingkaiga lenjiu bamme, haise gaphek chakiu theng-e khatdi gaphek madai paphan di-e.”

Siga paniu akhuga din-e, “Sigase kadihpiri pakhiangnaga wangrabo tasiangse raokhai nbamme. Ariak majiuhan jai khat lamse agatiu mai hinatu kadih gasu luthon mirabo-e khatdi jai khatlam siniu tasiangga aratmai hinatu luthonmi rabo-e, chiujiu dinkhai bambo-e.
Hai-bogu tasiangse paniu langkhai rabo-e, sichiujiu sise agatiumai hina kilung ga, khatdi pagu tasiangga aratmai hina kilungga ngut rabo-e chiujiu Ngamkambo
maza siniu wanglan lujiu din-e, “Phuilo! Wa khatra wangkinne!”
“Sise degulo?” chiujiu Iniu maniu-e.
Paniu paokakge, “Sise nbung khatle, haisiniu kadihpiri pakhiangnagu nuan situ lenkhaibo-e.”
Sibo nbungse misiniu.”
maza siniu din-e, “Maipui hainiu kasabo situ lenkhaibo-e.” Sigasu paniu sibo puitu nbung lungga tunkhai mide, khatdi pagomse gomkhai mide.
Iniu ngangphui khangboga taduirui kumjiu pakan phungbo maipui khangnia akhulam lenwang kinbo I ngao-e. Panainiu nbungse ponlujiu lentad mide.
Iniu maza khuga maniu-e, “Panainiu sise delam pontad ralo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Babylon lamga-e, siga paliuniu charaky khat paleng thiurabo-e. Charaky se thiuloi dasai, nbungse khailujiu kahum sumi rabo-e.”
Katambo madungao khat Iniu ngao-e. Tuhoira chaqon-kari madai hai tataagi gu maluang kadibo nia kak gasu padbo Iniu ngao-e.
Raithubo kuon-kari situ kahengbo qondungniu ju-e, niabo situ katikbo qondungniu ju-e,
pasumbo situ kakabo qondungniu sigasu pamadaibo situ tarikbo qondungniu ju-e.
Siga Iniu maza khuga maniu-e, “Paohubo yo, haibo kuon-karidung haise degu rambalo?”
Katikbo qondungniu jutad kinbo kuon-karise tingpilam tadjiu Babylon ga mengrabo-e, kakabo qondung siniu tingnulam, sigasu tarikbo qondung siniu tingnu lam bambo dihlam tadkinbo-e.
Tarikbo qondungse tadpadboga, paliuniu kadihpiritu phuitad raleng khuan ngamlu lakjiu bambo-e!” maza siniu din-e, “Tadlujiu kadihpiri haitu phui matailo!”—sichiujiu paliu tad mide.
Siga maza siniu akhulam senpadle, “Tingpilam tadjiu Babylon lam tadmibo qondung siniu

Paniu din-e, “Kavang thiutadbo gasu malan wangmai Heldai, Tobijah, khatdi Jedaiah niu, pikhaibo kalendungse ponlujiu Zephaniah nahpiu Josiah khulam kalangjiu tad sulo. Haimaidungse Babylon lam kavang thiutadbo gasu malanwang bambo-e.
Paliuniu pikhaibo kachia nai rangkang gasu chawang pirun khat kampadlo, sise Jehozadak nahpiu Dibo Singku, Joshua peega runkhai bilo.
Ngamkambo

Paniu thiukhang rabo-e, khatdi chawanggu chakhuang thiubose daojiu pamaitu mawang rabo-e. Singku khatniu pawangbam mungga chaplujiu paliuniu agi-manaiboga khatdi chunkhat lungkhat thiujiu tatien thiu aruangne.’
Chawang pirunse Heldai, Tabijah, Jedaiah, khatdi Josiah tu chakhuang thiubo thiujiu
Kadiulam lungjiu bam maidungniu wangjiu
Darius niu wangdipiu thiubo kum madaibo kumgu, chahiu chakiubogu (Kislev hiu), jeng madaibo nai
Bethel maidungniu

singku maidung khatdi phaimiukakung maidung khuga haibo champaose maniura langkhaide, “Charaky kam mahamibo jengniu, takum wajiukha aliuniu kamkhai mibo kumjiu, mangiubo hiu lungga kalum rijiu, aliu chunsajiu tuhoidi bam rama?”.
Paniu din-e, “Takum riak-chinnia lungga hai paliuniu mangiubo hiuga, khatdi chinniabo hiuga kalum rijiu chunsa achung khai mibose, atu chakhuang thiubogu makge.
Sigasu paliuniu tiu-sak khai mibose paliuleng kimbo ronna-e chiujiu haibo dihga lungjiu bambo maidung khatdi singku maidung khuga dinkhai bilo.”
Haise
“Iniu haibo chamtandungse nda amaidung khuga pikhai mibo-e: ‘Nchangbose kam bamme, khatdi khatniu khattu nkha sijiu, lungsabo lensiakjiu bamme chiubo nangniu phuisiak rabo-e.
Kami-magennah, maksai sangdiumai naliu ruangga lungjiu bambo, maksai pageng bambo mai situ kam kabuak tulo. Khatdi khatniu khattu kam masa rabo npui rangtulo.’
“Chiubamdi amaidungniu paliu lung tanjiu nking khai makge. Paliu lung limakjiu bamme,
sichiujiu paliu lungse tatu kumjiu tanne. Palamra nda lungkhai mibo phaimiukakungdung situ Iniu langwangjiu katikhai mibose paliuniu nking khai makbo jengniu, I alung pomchang pom mibo-e.
Iniu tacham kadinbotu paliuniu nking khai makbo jengniu, paliu kakheng thiuboga Iniu paokak khai makbo-e.
Sangdiumai dihga lungra Iniu paliutu tingthung kumjiu hunthon mibo-e. Haibo kawibo kadihga mai khat tudi pi lungkhai makjiu, matha nchum mibo-e.”
Ngamkambo
“Iniu Jerusalem tu nkha khaira agunjiu bamme, palamra Iniu pamaidungtu kungchang-kung-e, sibo lungsiat siniu atu pijiu pagu mikremai riga alung pomkhai mibo-e.
Iniu agu masanbo namdi, Jerusalem ga malan wangjiu siga lungne. Sise chamchangbo namdi chiujiu simi rabo-e, sigasu Ngamkambo
Thenthui wangmibo, tanpao-tanpeh mainiu tadbo tingga tathun mathunlu tadmaidungse namdigu maduibamga ntaolan rabo-e.
Sichiujiu npui-ncheng hina gase puimai-nahdung khatdi piumai-nahdung siniu phuitingjiu mathen bamlan rabo-e.
Saodiak mibo jatdung lengra haise wadaodi padlakge chiujiu lukhaibo sui-e, chiudi alengra haise padlu lakbo thiu lakge.
Amaidungtu puitad mibo dih gasu Iniu paliutu kalan khai bine,

sigasu paliutu tingbang, tingnu lamsu puiwang lanjiu Jerusalem ga pijiu lung khaine. Paliuniu amaidung thiu rabo-e, khatdi Iniu paliu Rawang thiujiu, paliu riga chamchangjiu khatdi majijiu mawang rabo-e.
“Hululo! Atu Kahumboky thiusu lanraleng kaphung donbambo tingga phaimiukakung mainiu dinkhai mibo ladkeng siakse tuhoi naliuniu chiujiu bambo-e.

Sibo masuang gara, mai khatniudi maidungtu lankhai ngam makge, maksai khaoring-khaona khatnadi mathiuhu makge, khatdi mai khatniu pagu mikremaidung khugasu marilu makge. Maidung siniu khatniu khattu suimakra Iniu kamkhai mibo-e.
Chiudi tuhoira masiak khaibo maidungtu Iniu tamsinbo jaiga kamkhai bambo-e.

Paliuniu paliugu miusyse agi-manaijiu linglune. Paliugu mumkense pasy masine, kadih gasu miusy hinase padne, khatdi tingduise mali-malanjiu riukiu khai bine. Amaidung ringmasiak lubo jattu Iniu haibo thoidam pakhiangnase pikhai rabo-e.

Judah maidung nai Israel maidung yo, karai gara sangdiumai siniu, khat-khattu haichiu dinjiu siangkhai mibo-e. ‘Judah mai nai Israel mai riga wangkhai mibo sansetse naliu riga wangbo thiumilo!’ Chiudi Iniu naliutu rankhaijiu, sigasu sangdiumaidung siniu, khatniu khat khuga haichiu dinsune, ‘Judah mai nai Israel mainiu daobo thoidamse naliuniu daobo thiumilo!’ Haijengniu pingtulo khatdi hujiu bamlo.”
Ngamkambo
Chiudi tuhoira Iniu Jerusalem maidungtu khatdi Judah maidungtu thoidam pikhaira rang bamme. Haijengniu pingmi tulo.
Haidungse naliuniu kamrabo-e: Khat-khat khuga majibose dinlo. Ladjankyga, pachang-palingbose pikhailo—agi manaibo phungwang lura kam khailo.
Khatniu khattu kam masarabo npui rangtulo. Tasiangga aratjiu jengdin thiutulo. Aratbotu, maji makbotu, khatdi tathu-chara kampadbo situ Ira mareng-e.”
Ngamkambo

“Pama-daibo, pamangiubo, pachinniabo, khatdi pakariubo hiu lungga kamkhaibo kalum ribose Judah maidung leng matha malabo khuang-ngee thiuwang rabo-e. Naliuniu majibo nai agi-manaibotu lungsa siakrabo-e.”
Ngamkambo
Namdi khat gasu wangbo maidungniu namdi khatlamsu wangbo maidung khuga din sune, ‘Ngamkambo
Ngamkambo

Sibo tingmik wangsai sangdiumaidung khang kariuniu Jehudi mai khangkhat khuga wanglujiu din sune, ‘Nakhuga wangrabo damse aliu lumacham khaini-e, palamra Tingwang niu natu maluang bamme chiubo aliuniu chiu-e.’”
Paniu Hadrach kadih nai Damascus namditu sajai pira chamtan pikhai mide. Israel maigu kiphiudung ronna makjiu, chiudi Syria gu dihsingdi
Hadrach ramraiga bambo Hamath haidi pagu-e, haise kumjiu Tyre nai Sidon gu namdidung, paliu kamsi pakhiangna jaojiu pagu-e.
Tyre niu paleng charireng kamkhai lujiu, kachia nai rangkang hai taniang kumjiu makhuan lude.!
Chiudi pagu bambo hinase
Katam-tambo jatniu Ashdod ga lungne.

Paliuniu chamise zairing bambo, maksai kaniu-karibo tatek tiuta mirabo-e. Masiak lubo maidung hinase amai thiu rabo-e, khatdi Judah kiphiuga bambo kiriangmai kummi rabo-e. Jebus mai kumjiu, Ekron maidi amai thiumi rabo-e.

Iniu agu kadihtu akhe khaijiu riphen mainiu haiga tadken wangrabotu khammi rabo-e. Palung kasabo maitu pijiu amaidungtu kam kabuak lantami rabo-e. Amaidungniu dejiuga chariu khengkhai migulo chiubo Iniu ngaolude.”
Ringajiu senlo, naliu Jerusalem maidung!
Phuilo, naliu wangpiuse wangkin-e!
Paniu chari ngamjiu chunwijiu wangkin-e,
chiudi manuanboga qonniam khat tuanglujiu--
qonniampoi rigasu wang kinne.
Jerusalem gasu chaqondungse Iniu luthonmi rabo-e;
chariga thinpiubo tavaipise kam mahami rabo-e.
Naliu wangpiu siniu jatdung ruangga agi-manaibo kamkhai birabo-e;
paniu duipui khat gasu duipui khatlam,
Euphrate Giu gasu kadihpiri pakhiangna mawangrabo-e.”
“Agu ladriat naliuniu majaibo jengniu rathak zai siniu madan thiujiu naliutu diangkhai mide.
Iniu namaidungtu khenrang pithiu khai bine;
tadui habo dih kavangthiu tadbo gasu khenrang pithiu khai bine.
Malan milo, kavangthiu tadmibo maidung tuhoira machunbose bamme;
Naliu nbai bamlam malan wangmilo.
Tuhoira Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e,
naliuniu chariu khai mibo hina jengniu
Iniu naliutu thoidam pikhaijiu dam nia pikhai lan bine.
Greek maitu aphen raleng,
Iniu Judah maitu riphenmaigu tavaipi kum,
khatdi Israel maitu tavaithu kum,
Zion maitu chaheng kum thinpiu rabo-e.”
ting kalikbo kumjiu paniu pagu tavaithuse ketpadne.
Dithubo
paniu tingrun lamsu tingthung jiuga tadpad rabo-e.
Ngamkambo
sichiujiu paliugu mikremai situ kam mahami rabo-e.
Paliuniu chari thiuboga jaw sak maniu mai kumjiu makiak marajiu tad rabo-e
paliuniu mikremaidung zaise kampad rabo-e;
sise charathiujiu wakhao zaise rathakbam riga runkiubo kum rabo-e.
Sibo tingmikse wangboga, mily khuanpaoniu
milydungtu kapingbo gasu gukhaibo kumjiu
Paliu hai kachiagu chawang pirun kumjiu
pagu kadih gase benrabo-e.
Sibo kadihse dejiuga palun wijiu matai wilo!
Chabon maidung siniu tek-jaw, tiu-sakjiu paliu pum wijiu bam rabo-e.
Takum gu kariak tingga tingriu pikhaira

Maidungniu charameng nai chaben-giak phui maitu npao-e, chiudi paliuniu daolubo chamkak sira aratbo-e khatdi mathakhu ladle. Mai khangsianiu chamang chalipad-e chiudi naliutu jumao khai raleng ronna-e, paliuniu chalung kamlum khaibose pageng ha-e. Sijengniu maidungse hamibo mily kumjiu tadmao kam mide. Paliu magenthiu chariujiu bamme palamra paliugu jupao ha-e.
Paliu ruanggasu mawangpaodung, jupaodung khatdi amaidungtu thinpiuboga munranpaodung padrabo-e.
Riphen maidungniu paliu mikremaitu npui-nchengga tao malui tadbo kumjiu Judah maidungniu chari ngam rabo-e. Paliuniu aphen rabo-e palamra
“Iniu Judah maidungtu pijiu tankhai bine;
Iniu Israel maidungtu gukhai bine.
Iniu paliutu lungsa khaijiu paliu kyga puiwanglan bine.
Paliu hai Iniu wadaodi luthon makbo maidung kumrabo-e.
I hai paliu Rawang
Iniu paliu rathoi paokak khaine.
Israel maidungse riphendung kumjiu tanrabo-e,
khatdi jaw saklu maidung kumjiu chunwi rabo-e.
Chari ngamkhaibo hai paliu kaikik siniu maningtaojiu bamne,
sichiujiu
“Iniu amaidungtu kuwang maduine.
Iniu paliutu gukhaijiu nda paliuniu lungkhai mibo
riak kumjiu pikeng khai bine.
Iniu paliutu jatdung ruangga pi lung maren khaimi tadi,
paliuniu pabam kadiu-diu lamsu atu maningtao lan rabo-e.
Paliudi, paliu nahdungdi ringlu rabo-e
sichiujiu paliu kyga wang aruanglan rabo-e.
Egypt nai Assyria lamsu paliutu Iniu paliu kyga puiwang khaibi rabo-e
sichiujiu paliu dih siakga pilung khai rabo-e.
Iniu paliutu Gilead nai Lebanon gadi pijiu lung khai rabo-e;
pabam hinaga maidungniu lungphuimi rabo-e.
Paliuniu chariubogu duipui tadkenboga,
siga Nile gu kasukbo duise sangmi rabo-e.
Chaliangbo Assyria hai manuan kiumi rabo-e,
khatdi kangambo Egypt gu pumtan hami rabo-e.
Iniu amaidungtu pijiu tankhaibi rabo-e;
paliuniu atu kahumjiu kadin piumi rabo-e.”
Lebanon yo, nagu akhamse lepad milo,
chiusai chaminiu nagu cedar bangdungse
Cypress bang kaplulo khatdi achung lulo—
palamra cedar bang hinase kaomide;
kendibo singbangdung tuse kam maha mide!
Bashan gu nphubangdung yo,
kaplulo khatdi achung lulo—mariu-riujingse bithon mide!
Mawangpaodungse chunsajiu kap bamme, paliugu kendise hamide!
Ndongquiniu marung bambo situ nkinglo;
Jordan Giu hugen lam bambo paliugu mariuramse kam maha mide!
A-Rawang,
Papaodung siniu paliutu wadi manang makjiu kamshat mi-e. Paliuniu chamise jonjiu din-e, ‘

Milydung liujiu khatdi jonjiu bambo mai siniu atu mathiu-e, sijengniu kamshat mirabo milydunggu khuanpaose Iniu thiude. Iniu tathun nia thinlujiu: khattu Iniu “Nkha khaibo,” chiu ku-e, khatbo situ “Chunchambo,” chiu ku-e. Sichiujiu Iniu milydungtu akhijiu phui-e.
Atu marengbo, kakibo mily khuanpao sumtu Iniu khengngam lumakge, sijengniu Iniu paliu mathiutu chahiu khat lung gasu lupad mide.

Sigasu Iniu milydung khuga din-e, “I naliugu mily khuanpao thiuta mirabo-e. Shaimi rabodung siniu shaimi sulo. Kam mahami rabodungse, kam mahami sulo. Masiak khaibodung siniu khat-khattu kam mahami rabo-e.”
Sigasu “Lam chapbo” kubo thunse Iniu thinlujiu
Sichiujiu sibo tingmik gasu ladriatse luta mide. Milydung liujiu khatdi jonjiu bambo maidung siniu atu matingjiu phui bamme, khatdi Iniu haichiu kam bambo hai
Sigasu paniabo thun, “Chunchambo” chiu kubose Iniu kamtang mide, sichiujiu Judah mai nai Israel maigu chunchambose kampang tap-tap mide.
Sigasu

Agu milydungtu phuiraleng mily khuanpao khat khai nbamme, chiudi kam maha mirabo milydungtu paniu nkha khai makge; maksai hamibotu phuison makge, maksai ajam mibo situ mathan mawi khai son makge, maksai masiak lubodung situ katiu pi tiukhai son makge. Sibo sung paniu pamai withubo milytu langtiu-e khatdi paliu ntindungse hipad mi-e.
Gengmakbo mily khuanpao sira nchummi rabo-e! Paniu pagu milydungtu phut mide. Chari siniu pagu pumtanse kam mahaduak mine. Pagu pumtanse nkhin mine, khatdi pamik majat lamse tiatmine.”
Haise tingpuktu juden khaibo khatdi kadihpiri damkhaibo, sigasu chamaileng ringting pikhaibo

“Iniu Jerusalem tu jaw piang khattu kumjiu thin rabo-e, pamungga bambo jatdungniu sise sak lujiu jaw-sak maniu maidung kumjiu tangat lad-lad surabo-e. Haichiujiu Jerusalem tu taoweng lubo saiga, Judah gu kakibo namdidung situdi taoweng mirabo-e.

Chiudi sibo wanse wangboga, Iniu Jerusalem tu karidbo tukang khat pithiu khaine—sise pon masura kambo jat siniu ajam rabo-e. Kadihpiri pakhiangnagu riphendungniu wang aruang lujiu patu chari thiu rabo-e.

Sibo wan ga Iniu paliu qondungtu kam charen khai rabo-e khatdi paliutu tongkinbo maidungtu kammeng mirabo-e. Iniu Judah maidung riga akhe khai rabo-e, chiudi Iniu paliu mikremaigu chaqondung mikse kamtiat khai rabo-e.
Sigasu Judah kiriang mainiu paliu karai khuga din-e, ‘Jerusalem ga lungjiu bambo pamaidungtu Ngamkambo Rawang,

“Sibo wan ga Iniu Judah kiriang maitu mariuga maksai minmibo miusy luzamga taobambo mi kum pithiu khaijiu, paliuniu sangnamaigu jatdungtu kam mahami rabo-e. Jerusalem maidungniu namdi lungga manang makjiu lungmi rabo-e.
Sibo wan ga Jerusalem lungga lungjiu bambo maidungtu
Sibo wan ga Jerusalem tu chari thiura kambo jat hinatu Iniu kam maha mirabo-e.
Sibo wan ga Jerusalem lungga kapjiu achungbose Megiddo ramjengga Hadad Rimmon

Sibo ramlungga bambo kikhun hina: David gasu lungwangbo kikhun, Nathan gasu lungkiubo kikhun, Levi gasu lungkiubo kikhun, Shimei gasu lungkiubo kikhun, khatdi kakibo kikhun hina paron-ronna kapjiu achungrabo-e. Sichiujiu paliu kikhunmai hina kiuhui rabo-e, khatdi maipiudung siniu maipuidung khugasu tampad lujiu achungjiu kiuhui rabo-e.
Ngamkambo

Sibo tingga charamengdung zanse sibo kadih gasu luthon mirabo-e, sichiujiu paliutu mai khatniudi maningtao lantami rabo-e. Phaimiukakung khatle chiujiu kadinbo maitu Iniu luthonmi rabo-e khatdi charameng kahum nibo lungchun hina luthonmi rabo-e.
Sigasu mai khatniu sailad dinra matansai, patu hai kamshat siakmi rabo-e chiubose papui nai papiuniu pakhuga din rabo-e, palamra paniu
Sibo ting wangboga, phaimiukakung khatniudi pagu madungao lamga wasao thiutami rabo-e, maksai maidungtu sonra phaimiukakung gu khio-khiobo fainise piuta mirabo-e.
Sibosung, paniu din-e, ‘Ira phaimiukakung makge, Ira chalu tien thiumai-e, Ira aringting pakhiangna chalu tien thiuwang mibo-e.’
Siga mai khangsianiu pakhuga haichiu maniusai, ‘Nagaga tajam bambose dekamjiulo?’ Paniu paokak sune, ‘Haise akabopiu ky gasu ajam mibo-e.’”
Sichiujiu sibo kadihga maidungse jan-sumgu jan-niase shaimi rabo-e.

Haichiujiu ringbangbo pasumbo njan situ Iniu madiune khatdi rangkanggitu chaminiu maruak masan khaibo kumjiu paliutu kam masan khai rabo-e. Kachiatu maruakbo kumjiu Iniu paliutu madiune. Siga paliuniu akhuga kakheng thiune, khatdi Iniu paliutu paokak khai bine. Paliu hai amaidung-e chiubo Iniu paliu khuga dinne, khatdi I hai paliu Rawang-e chiubo paliuniu din madu padne.”

niu jat hinatu puiwang aruanglujiu Jerusalem tu pijiu chari thiurabo-e. Namdise lutadmi rabo-e, chaky dungse sunglu rabo-e, khatdi maipuidungtu manomjiu min rabo-e. Chamai phankhat lamra kavang thiu tadmi rabo-e, chiudi khangsiamai tura namdi gasu puitad lakge.
Sigasu

Sibo tingga paniu Olive luang, Jerusalem gu tingbang lamse suchap rabo-e. Sichiujiu Olive luang haise tingbang lamsu tingnulam tangbo njan nia thiujiu ramjeng kadibo khat nkakpad rabo-e. Sibo luong phan khat lamniu tingpilam khatdi phankhat lamniu tingnulam tadkhaimi rabo-e.
Maluong kak kaniaga njan padbo ramjeng gasu naliu pak mari rabo-e. Judah wangpiu Uzziah ken-ga kathi wangboga naliu paopehdungniu kamkhai mibo kumjiu, naliudi paktadmi rabo-e. A-Rawang,
Sibo wan wangboga, siga agibo maksai chakimbo,maksai tamiubo wakhatdi bamlak mide.
Pawan machangna siga nchun tingdi n-nien kumjiu kabenbose bammi rabo-e. Haise dedao padralo chiubose
Siga

Luongriang pakhiangna, tingpilam bambo Geba gasu tingrunlam bambo Rimmon tangbo kam manai khai rabo-e. Jerusalem hai pamungga bambo kadih suang ku-nkiumi rabo-e; namdise Benjamin Rengmun gasu karaiga kaguangbo rengmun bamdibo, Hananel kiton gasu chawang kygu mumsy thunboky tangbo, Pakegu Rengmun tangbo bammi rabo-e.
Maidungniu manang makjiu, kam mahami rabo situ ping makjiu lungmi rabo-e.
Jerusalem tu chari thiubo jat hina riga,
Sibo wan ga
Jerusalem tu gukhaira Judah mainiu chari aphenne. Jat hinagu chakhiu-chalan, kachia-rangkang, khatdi chafai-tani mali-malanjiu paliuniu sunglu rabo-e.
copy
Paliugu mikremai rijiky lungga bambo khaorui-khaona, chaqondung, qonniam katibo-jat, qontraodung khatdi qonniamdung pakhiangna riga chararen kasabo pijiu wangkhai rabo-e.
Jat khat kumboniu Ngamkambo
Egypt mainiu Kapuang Ngeese changini maksai, jat hina riga
Haise Egypt mai riga, khatdi Kapuang Ngee changi makbo jatdung pakhiangna riga pijiu wang khai rabo sajai si-e.
Sibo wan ga chaqondunggu pakhuan makhiobo tiudung rigadi “
Jerusalem khatdi Judah pakhiangnaga bambo alangtiu-lidungse Ngamkambo
Haibo chamse Israel maidung khuga din khaira
Chiudi paliuniu paokakge, “Dechiujiu nangniu aliutu lungsabose lenkhai jiulo”
chiudi Iniu Esau nai pakai-kik maitu mareng-e. Iniu Esau gu ramluong situ kam maha mide khatdi sibo ramse nkankhao leng pikhai mide.”
Esau kai-kikdung, Edom maidungniu, “Aliugu namdakdungse kam maha mide, chiudi aliuniu sise thiulanne chiu dinsai,” siga
Israel maidungniu haise paliu miksiakniu ngaosu rabo-e, siga paliuniu din sune, “
Ngamkambo

Sisera—gengmakbo tiutekse agu rathak bamga kadkhaibo ganiu-e. Siga naliuniu maniu-e, ‘Dechiujiu aliuniu natu chakhuang thiumak jiulo?’ Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e—naliuniu agu rathakbamtu lungpom kamkhaibo gasu-e.

Naliuniu pamik tiatbo, maksai marabo, maksai paphi tangbo khaorui-khaona akhuga kadkhaira phungwang-e, siga wa kamaobo khatnadi ha-e chiujiu naliuniu maningjiu ma? Dihthinpao khuga haikumbo khaorui-khaona khat pikhaira kam matailo! Paniu naliutu kimlu buima, sichiujiu naliuleng wakhat pikhaibi rama?”
Tuhoira, naliu singkudung yo, aliuleng wilura Tingwang khuga kheng matailo. Paniu naliu rathoi situ paokak khai lakge, sise naliu mao rabo-e.
Ngamkambo
Kadihpiri pake hinaga bambo maidungniu atu chakhuangthiu-e. Paliuniu pabam hinaga parim wibo akhuga matao khai-e khatdi lusuibo rathak maniase kadkhai-e. Paliu mathiuniu atu chakhuangthiu-e!
Chiudi naliuniu pageng ha-e chiujiu lukhaibo tiutekse agu rathakbamga naliuniu kadkhai-e.

‘Haichiu kambo gasu aliura chiasiak mide!’ chiujiu naliuniu din-e, Sigasu naliuniu akhuga naliu chun ngut makge. Naliuniu aleng pipadbo thiujiu, naliuniu agalubo maksai paphi tangbo maksai kasa-kasonbo khaorui-khaona phungwang-e. Sikumbose Iniu naliu khugasu lukhaine chiujiu naliu maningjiu ma?

Pagu khaorui-khaonadung ruangga kawibo, aleng pine chiu ladriat thiukhai lujiu, kadpadboga sontiubo mai riga tasiang wangmi sulo! Palamra I hai kadibo chawang si-e, khatdi chamai jat hinaniu atu ping kamme.”
Ngamkambo

Naliuniu naliugu tienkam gasu atu chakhuang thiusiak rabo-e. Iniu dinbo haitu naliuniu nking khai maksai, Iniu naliu riga tasiang phungwang rabo-e. Naliu ringlu raleng daolubo maniadung riga Iniu tasiang pikhai mide. Palingjiu, naliuniu agu chamtan haitu kungjiu lukhai makbo donniu, paliu riga Iniu tasiang pikhai mibo-e.
Iniu naliu nahdungtu sajai pikhai rabo-e, khatdi naliuniu kadkhaibo khaorui-khaona ba siniu naliu zuga manuk khai rabo-e, sichiujiu naliutu chabajiu gasu jupad rabo-e.
Sigasu haibo chamtanse naliu khuga Iniu pikhaibo-e chiubose naliu simirabo-e, chiusai singkudung, Levi kaikikdung khuga agu ladriat thiukhai mibose kampang tami rabo-e.
Paliuniu kamaobo situ makjiu, kamajibo situ katikhai-e. Paliuniu akhuga kawi thiujiu lung-e; paliu ronna kamajibo situ kambo ronna makjiu, paliuniu kakimai tudi kasabo kamta mira nkha khai-e.
Tingwang gu palingbo tasi-ningtingse maidung khuga katikhai birabose singkudunggu ngiudon-e. Iniu machunbose katikhaira maidung siniu paliu khuga tadrabo-e, palamra paliu hai Ngamkambo
“Chiudi tuhoira singkudung naliuniu majibo npui gasu mari mide. Naliugu katikhai gasu mai kakengtu kamaobo tien thiura jukhai mide. Iniu naliu khuga ladriat thiukhai mibose naliuniu kampang mide.
Sijengniu, Israel maidungniu naliutu din masajiu khanra Iniu kamkhai rabo-e, palamra naliuniu alad majai makge, sichiujiu naliuniu amaidungtu katikhaibo tingga, mai hinatu nchamjiu kamkhai makge.”

Aliu mathiu piu khat bammak jiuma? Sichiujiu sibo Rawang siniu aliu mathiutu damkhaibo makma? Chiusai dekamjiu aliu khatniu khat khuga aliugu ladriat kampangjiu, khatdi Tingwang niu aliu pao-peh maidung khuga ladriat khaibo situ dekamjiu wajeng simak jiulo?
Judah maidungniu Tingwang khuga ladriat thiukhai mibose kampang mide, sigasu Jerusalem ga khatdi pabam hinaga mai kapingbo ngam kamkhai mide.
Haichiu kambo maidungtu
Naliuniu katambo wakhat kambo sira hai-e.

Paniu dekamjiu lukhai tami jiulo chiujiu naliuniu maniu-e. Sibo lamra naliuniu chabon tingga naliu nao leng ladriat thiukhai mibose naliuniu kampang mide chiubose paniu silubo jengniu-e. Pahai napampui-e, nangniu pakhuga chamchangjiu lungra Tingwang masuangga ladriat thiukhai mijiu tadi, nangniu ladriat thiukhai mibose kampang mide.

Tingwang niu nanaitu pijiu pumkhat, sigasu hiupuina khat thiukhai mibo makma? Haibo lamga pachun-ningse degulo? Sisera nanai nah lungjiu, paliuse Tingwang maisiak thiurabo leng-e. Haijengniu naliu mai khatniudi panao khuga ladriat thiukhai mibose kampangmak rabo-e chiubose simasan siak lulo.
“Tanao tabotu Iniu mareng-e,” chiujiu Israel mai Rawang,
Naliuniu
Chagi aketbopiu siniu rangkanggitu maruak masanbo kum, paniu ladjan thiura wangsune. Wa aketbopiu siniu kachia nai rangkanggitu maruak masanbo kumjiu
Sichiusai Judah mai nai Jerusalem maidungniu phungwangbo maniakaddungse, karaiga paliuniu kamkhai mibo kumjiu
Ngamkambo
“I hai

Naliu hai, naliu masuangga lungkhai mibo naliu pao-peh maidung kumjiu, agu tacheng-tajai gasu mari mide khatdi sise majai makge. Akhuga mariwang lanlo, chiusai Idi naliu khulam mariwang lanne. Chiudi naliuniu maniu-e, ‘Nakhuga mariwang lanra aliuniu degu kamsiak ralo?’

Iniu naliu khuga maniubo-e, mai khatniu Tingwang tu sontiubo hai majima? Chiumakge, chiudi naliura atu sontiu bamme. Naliuniu maniu-e, ‘Dechiujiu aliuniu patu sontiu jiulo?’ Naliugu pipadbo nai dam kariugu damkhat pibo lamga suniu-e.
Naliu mathiu riga tasiang bamme palamra jat hinaniu atu sontiujiu bamme.

Dam kariugu damkhat haise Charakyga phung wanglo, chiusai siga katiu-kasakse mali-malanjiu bamrabo-e. Atu madiu matailo, chiusai Iniu tinggen gu kiranse lepad lujiu, naliu riga wa kawibo mania hina runkiu khai bi-e chiubose naliuniu simi rabo-e.
Iniu chakhaodungtu pijiu naliugu miusy bangdungtu kam maha lakge, khatdi naliugu mumsy situ pijiu masi phuiting khai bine.
Sichiusai jat hinaniu naliutu sanwimai chiujiu kumi rabo-e, palamra naliu kadihse lungraleng kawibo bam thiumi rabo-e.
“Naliuniu alamga mai pingbo lad dinkhai mide,” chiujiu
Naliuniu haichiu din mide, ‘Tingwang tu machara pageng ha-e, Pacham majaira degu pageng bamjiulo, maksai aliuniu kamkhai mibose kamaobo-e chiujiu Ngamkambo
Aliuniu ngao bambo si-e, chaliangbo maidungse sanwi mai-e. Kasabo maidung siniu disubo ronna makjiu, paliuniu Tingwang gu khengsibotu madiu-e chiudi sigasu marilu kamme.’”
Sigasu
“Paliu hai amaidung thiurabo-e,” chiujiu Ngamkambo
Tacheng matipbo mai nai kasabo mai, khatdi atu machabo mai nai atu machamakbo mai kakga padrabose amaidungniu ngaosu rabo-e.”
Ngamkambo

Chiudi acham majaimai naliu lengra, agu rankhaibo pumtan siniu naliu khuga naimik thao khaibo kum sune, sichiujiu naimik biuniu wikhaibose phungwang rabo-e. Naliu hai matom poidungtu paky gasu lepadbo kumjiu, naliu khenrang thiujiu naliu chunwi rabo-e.
Iniu tatien thiusubo naise, naliuniu kasabo maitu ngammi rabo-e, khatdi paliuse naliu phipa hangga tabui kum mawimi rabo-e.
“Avangpiu Mose gu katikhaidung, tacheng-tajaidung khatdi chamtandung Sinai Luong ga Israel mai hinaniu majaira Iniu pikhai mibose maningtaolo.
Paniu papiumai nai panahmaitu puiwang aruang khai lanne; sichiu maksai Iniu wanglujiu naliu dihtu kam mahami rabo-e.”
Haise Abraham kiriang, David kaikik thiubo Jesu Khrista gu chavang-chavi lam si-e. Abraham gasu chawang David tangbo kaikik siniu:

Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, Judah khatdi pasingnadung; Sigasu Perez nai Zerah (papui siniu Tamar si-e) Hezron, Ram, Aminadab, Nahshon, Salmon, Boaz (papui siniu Rahab si-e) Obed (papui siniu Ruth si-e) Jesse khatdi Chawang David hai-e.

Babylon lam kavang thiulubo sai gasu Jesu tu manabo katang bambo kaikik siniu: Jehoiachin, Shealtiel, Zerubbabel, Abiud, Eliakim, Azor, Zadok, Achim, Eliud, Eleazar, Mathan, Jacob, sichiujiu Jacob niu Mary kina Joseph tu mana-e, sichiujiu Mary niu Messiah chiujiu kubo Jesu tu mana-e.

Sichiujiu Abraham gasu David tangbo chaken kariu-je-madaikiu-e, khatdi David gasu Babylon lam kavang thiubo katang hai chaken kariu-je-madaikiu-e, sigasu Messiah tu lungbo katang siniu chaken kariu-je- madaikiu-e.
Joseph hai ka-nchang mai-e, chiudi Mary tu mathiu suangga kam mangam khaini makge; sijengniu mahin paniu chagiang thiura npao lubose phut mira maning mide.

Paniu haichiujiu maning bamboga, pamang lamsu Rapiu gu maza siniu patu madu khaijiu din-e, “David kai-kik thiujiu bambo, Joseph yo, Mary tu nanao leng luping mane. Palamra paniu papum ripjiu bambose Masanbo Hiupuina khugasu-e.
Paniu panah piumai khat mana sune, khatdi nangniu pazanse Jesu chiujiu mathak rabo-e, palamra paniu pamaidungtu paliu nuan gasu kalan khaibi rabo-e.
Haidungse Rapiu niu phaimiukakung khuga dinkhai mibose wangtang raleng-e,
“Phuilo, liuchangpui khatniu papum ripjiu panah piumai khat lungsune, sichiujiu pazanse Immanuel chiujiu kune” (parambase Tingwang aliutu maluong bamme).
Sijengniu Joseph niu sulujiu, Rapiu gu maza niu dinkhaibo saisuijiu Mary tu maluong lung mide.
Sichiudi paniu ngenase lunglu makthen patu nphiuji makge. Sichiujiu Joseph niu pazanse Jesu chiujiu mathak khaide.
Herod niu chawang thiubo ken-ga Jesu tu Judaea ramlung Bethlehem ga mana khaide. Siga watheng makbo lungga tingbang lamsu ningting mai Jerusalem ga wanglujiu maniu-e.
“Jehudimai wangpiu leng mana khai bambo ngenase delam bamlo? Pagu chaganse aliuniu tingbang lam ngao lubo donniu patu kahumra wangkinbo-e.”
Haise chawang Herod niu chiuluboga palung magenthiu mide, khatdi Jerusalem ga bammai hinadi manang kammide.
Paniu singkudung khatdi tacheng-tajaigu katipaodungtu ku aruang lujiu maniu-e “Messiah haitu debo bamga mana ralo?”
“Judaea ramlung Bethlehem ga-e” chiujiu paliuniu paokakge. “Palamra phaimiukakung siniu haichiujiu raokhai bamme:
Judah ramgu namdidung ruangga nang-hai siam thubo makge;
palamra nakhu gasu amai Israel maitu maluang khaira jupaose padrabo-e.’ ”
Sijengniu tingbang lamsu wangmaidungtu Herod niu mahin kulujiu paliu khuga chagan ngaolen khaibo wansiaktu maniu lude.

Sichiujiu paniu paliu khuga haichiu din khaijiu Bethlehem lam langkhai mide. “Tadsulo, ngena situ phiu mawijiu phiulo, sichiujiu naliuniu patu daosai, atu pisikhailo, sichiusai Idi patu kahumra tadne.”
Sichiujiu paliuse tadmide, siga paliuniu tingbang lam ngaokhai mibo gan situ paliuniu ngaolande. Paliuniu haise ngaoboga, dejiukha paliu chun wijiu ringa kami gulo!
Haisiniu paliu masuangga tadjiu ngena bam wangtang makthen paliutu majang khaide.

Paliuniu kalunglam ngutboga ngena nai papui Mary tu ngaode, sichiujiu paliuniu khudung kiujiu patu kahumde. Paliuniu paliugu kalendung, kachia, maruta, khatdi parim wibo wasase kalen thiujiu paleng pikhaide.
Sichiujiu paliu manglamsu Tingwang niu Herod khulam malan wangmakra kachan khaibo jengniu npui katam lamsu paliu dihlam malanwang mide.

Paliu tadmibo sailam, Rapiu gu maza khatniu Joseph manglam madu khaijiu din-e, “Herod niu ngena haitu kamshatra phiuwang kin-e. Sijengniu sulujiu ngena nai papuitu puilujiu Egypt dihlam mari milo, sichiujiu Iniu nakhuga dinlan makthen siga bam milo.”
Joseph niu sulujiu ngena nai papuitu puilujiu sibo n-chun gasu Egypt dihlam tadmide.
Siga paniu Herod shaimak then bam mide. Haise Rapiu niu pagu phaimiukakung khuga dinkhai mibose wangtang raleng-e, “Iniu Anahtu Egypt dih gasu kupadbo-e,”

Tingbang lamsu wangmai siniu patu son mide chiubo Herod niu silujiu palung pomchang pom mide. Siniu Bethlehem ga khatdi sibo wonjengga lungbo ngena hina, takum nia tangmibo khatdi sibo hanglam bambo npiumainah hinatu kamshat mira paniu chamtan pikhaide—haise tingbang lamsu wangbo maidung khugasu paliuniu chagan situ ngaolubo tingse paniu silubo saisuijiu kambo-e
Haichiujiu phaimiukakung Jeremiah niu dinmibose wangtangra leng-e.
Rachel niu panahmaidung jengniu kap bamme,
patu hiambamdi pachun kiuta mide, palamra paliu shai mide.”
Herod shaimibo sai Egypt dihga Rapiu gu maza khatniu Joseph manglam madukhaijiu din-e,
“Sulo, ngena nai papuitu puilujiu Israel mai kadihlam malan wangmi sulo, palamra ngena situ kamshatra phiubambo maise shai mide.”
Sijengniu, Joseph sulujiu ngena nai papuitu puilujiu Israel mai kadihlam wanglan mide.
Chiudi Archelaus niu papiu Herod bam malinjiu Judaea ga chawang thiubambo silujiu siga tadra Joseph hai pingmide. Pamang lamsu Tingwang dinkhai bibo donniu Galilee lam wang mide.
Sichiujiu Nazareth namdakga wangjiu lung mide, palamra “Patuse Nazareth mai chiujiu kune”, haise phaimiukakungniu dinkhai mibose wangtang raleng-e.
Sibo wan-ga John Baptist niu Judaea gu ramjingga wangjiu dinron sude.
Naliu nuan gasu lungli lulo, palamra Tinggen gu Chawangdihse nawang mide,” chiujiu paniu din-e.
John haise Isaiah niu dinbambo piusi-e,
“Mai khatniu ramjingga chakhuan senkin-e,
‘Rapiu leng npui kaden khailo;
paniu tadrabo npuise kam maji khailo!’”
Jerusalem gasu, Judaea ramlung hina gasu khatdi Jordan giugen lamsu maidungse pakhuga wang-e.
Paliuniu paliu nuan din madupadle, khatdi paniu paliutu Jordan gasu tadui nphum khai bide.
Naliu nuan gasu lungli mibo rasyse ngaopad lura kamlulo.

Sichiujiu naliura Abraham kaikikdung-e chiubo donniu wang kinbo mathad rabo gasu marilu bui-e chiujiu maningmi tulo. Iniu naliu khuga palingjiu dinbo-e chiubora Tingwang niu haibo tukangdung gasudi Abraham kai-kik pithiu khai lubui-e!
Pamen gasu huimira marise kaden khai bamme; pasy masi makbo bang hina tura huilujiu chamijiuga thonkhai mirabo-e.

Naliuniu lunglibo lenra Iniu naliutu tadui gasu nphum khaibo-e, chiudi asailam wangkinbo paniu naliutu Masanbo Hiupuina nai chami gasu nphum khai rabo-e. Para asuang di-nkiu-e, Ira paphitop ponradi akaji makge.
Paben-ga kazap bamme siseniu parengdungse hunthon mirabo-e, sichiujiu miusyse pabowga khai madui mirabo-e, chiudi parengdung situ wadaodi midlan lakbo miga rumi rabo-e.”
Sibo wan gase Jesu niu Galilee gasu Jordan ga John khuga tadui nphum raleng wangde.
Chiudi John niu marilura din-e, “Nakhu gasu Iniu tadui nphumrabo pathao-e, chiudi nangniu akhuga wangkin jiuma?”
Chiudi Jesu niu patu paokakge, “Tuhoira pichiu khaimi sulo. Aliuniu haichiujiu Tingwang chunningse kamrabo-e.” Sichiujiu John niu suikhaide.
Jesu tu tadui nphum lujiu npad gapboga, tinggense paleng lekhaide, khatdi Tingwang gu Hiupuinase makhao kumjiu pariga kiutao khaibo paniu ngaode.
Siga tinggen lamsu chakhuan khatniu din-e, “Haise Iniu kungbo Anahpiu si-e, pakhuga alungchun kimme.”
N-nien atai, nchun atai katiu tiumakjiu wangboga Jesu hai mariu mide.
Siga Satan siniu pakhuga wangjiu din-e, “Nang hai Tingwang Nahpiu-e sai, haibo tudungtu taruak pijiu mawi khaira chamtan pikhailo.”
Sigasu Satan siniu Jesu tu masanbo namdi, Jerusalem ga puilujiu charaky ton-ga pichap khai lujiu, pakhuga din-e,
“Nang hai Tingwang nahpiu-e sai haigasu machakkiu lulo, palamra haichiujiu raokhai bamme,
“Tingwang niu natu nkha khaira pagu mazadung situ langkhai bine;
sichiujiu tatu gasu naphi naben ajam makra paliuniu natu jukhai bine.”
‘Nangniu na Rapiu Tingwang tu madiu tulo.’”
Sigasu Satan siniu maluong kakubo khatga Jesu tu puikhang lujiu chawang kadih hina khatdi paken dibo hina lenkhaide.
“Nangniu akhuga khudung kiujiu kahum khaisai, pakhiangna haise Iniu naleng pikhai bine,” chiujiu Satan siniu din-e.
Siga Satan siniu Jesu tu phut khai mide; khatdi mazadung wangjiu patu nkha khaide.
Paniu Nazareth tu phutlujiu Galilee Ajai uigenlam Zebulun nai Naphtali luongrianglam bambo Capernaum ga wanglung mide.
Haise phaimiukakung Isaiah niu dinkhai mibose wangtang raleng-e.
Jordan uigenlam nkengmai dih, Galilee si-e!
Tamiuboga lungbambo mai siniu kadibo nbiuse ngao sune.
Kashaibo kadih tamiuboga lungmai khuga, kabenbose thaokhai sune.”
“Naliu nuan gasu lungli lulo,
palamra Tinggen gu Chawangdihse nawang mide!”
Jesu niu Galilee Ajai uigen ga tadkiuboga chakha minbo singna kania, Simon, (Peter kubo) khatdi pasai kariupiu Andrew siniu ajaiga alang thonkin niubo ngaode.
Jesu niu panai khuga din-e, “Wanglo asai suilo, Iniu nanaitu chamai minmai pithiu khai bine,”
Sibo wansiakga panainiu panaigu alang phutlujiu pasai suitad mide.
Paniu tadkiu lanboga, Zebedee nah kania Jacob nai John tu ngaode. Panaise panaipiu Zebedee tu majang lujiu aliam lungga paliugu alang thinlu bamniubo gasu panaitu kukhaide,
sibo wansiakga panainiu panai aliam nai panai piutu phutlujiu pasai suitad mide.
Syria ramlung pakhiangna paracham chiulujiu, mai hinaniu thiuniu chariubo mai hina, rasaniu rebo, chakhuira marabo, papumphan shaibo hinatu phung wangjiu Jesu niu mathiutu wikhai bide.
Sichiujiu Galilee lamsu, Namdi Kariu lamsu, Jerusalem lamsu, Judaea lamsu khatdi Jordan uigen lamsu chamai mendi wangjiu pasai suitad kin-e.
Jesu niu chamai menditu ngao lujiu luongbut khatga tadkhangjiu ntao kiude. Siga pakhommaidung pakhuga wang maduide.
Siga paniu paliutu katikhai sude;
“Hiupuina ga sonne chiujiu kasi maise san wi-e;
palamra tinggen gu Chawangdihse paliu gu-e!
“Chunsa jengsajiu bammaise san wi-e;
palamra Tingwang niu paliutu pijiu amankhai bine!
palamra Tingwang gu ladriatse paliuniu daolune!
palamra Tingwang niu paliutu pikim khai bine!
“Maidungtu lungsasibo maise san wi-e;
palamra Tingwang niu paliutu lungsa khai bine!
palamra paliuniu Tingwang tu ngaolu rabo-e!
“Agi-manaibo leng tenbambo maise san wi-e;
palamra Tingwang niu paliutu panahmai kukhai bine!
palamra tinggen gu Chawangdihse paliu gu-e!
Ringa lulo khatdi chunwi lulo, palamra tinggen lam naliuleng tathuon kadibo bamme. Haise kumjiu nda karaiga lungkhai mibo phaimiukakung maidung tudi mathad khai kami gu-e.
Mai khatniudi chamibung matao lujiu takamniu gommi makge, chiudi kalungga bammai hina kabenbo nbiu situ ngaolura, padung riga dungkhai rabo-e.
Sikumjiu naliugu kabenbo nbiuse maidung masuangga thaoben khaijiu, naliu tienkam kawibo ngao lujiu tinggen lam bambo naliu Piu situ thuon lura naliugu kabenbo nbiuse thaoben khailo.

“Iniu Mose gu Tacheng-tajai khatdi phaimiukakung maigu katikhaibo situ kam mahara wangbo-e chiujiu maningmi tulo. Iniu sise kam mahara wangbo makge, chiudi paliugu katikhaibo situ pitathui khaira wangbo-e.
Ting-kadih bamthen, tacheng-tajaigu siamthubo lad maksai nathubo ladkeng hinase wang tathui makbo thiulakge, chiubo maningtaolo.

Sijengniu, mai khatniu siamthubo chamtan situ majailu maksai khatdi katikhai maksai, pase tinggen gu Chawangdih ga siamthu rabo-e. Sichiujiu mai khatniu Tacheng-tajaise majai lujiu khatdi maidungtu katikhai sai, pase tinggen Chawangdihga dirabo-e.

Sijengniu, naliu khuga Iniu dinbo-e, chiubora tinggen gu Chawangdihga naliuniu ngut raleng, Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung nai Pharisee maidung suang, Tingwang maning kamboga naliu malum matip nkiu rabo-e.

Chiudi tuhoira Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, chiubora mai khatniu pasingnatu palam hajiu palung pomsai, patu ladjan thiurabo-e, mai khatniu pasingnatu ‘Nangra mathakhu-e,’ chiujiu marusai, patuse apaimai ruangga puiwang rabo-e, khatdi mai khatniu pasingnatu pageng habo kapangbo chiujiu kusai, pase chami-zaiga tadrabo-e.
Sijengniu Tingwang leng rathak bamga wakhat kadkhaira ponwangboga, nasingnaniu natu amanmakbo maningtao sai,
nagu kalense rathakbam mungga khaidia lujiu, malanwang nasingna situ kawi thiulujiu, nagu kalense Tingwang khuga kad khailo.

“Mai khatniu nariga ladjan thiura phungwang sai, ladjankyga wangtang makhaga npui gasu patu kawi thiululo. Nang ladjan bamga wangtang misai, paniu natu ladjanpao khuga pikhaijiu, paniu natu chamai minmai khuga pikhaijiu, kavangkyga natu khaimi rabo-e.
Siga nangniu majonse ruiloi makthen npad silakmi rabo-e, chiubo hai Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e.
Chiudi tuhoira Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e: mai khatniu npuimai khattu makha khainibo mikphuiniu niu phuikhai sai, palungchun lamsu sibopui khuga nuan tenmibo-e.
Siniu namik majat lamniu natu nuan-ga jukhai sai, sise ladthon milo! Palamra napum pakhiangnatu charuidihga thonkhai mibo suang, napumgu mania khat hamiboniu wi-nkiu-e.
Naben majat lamniu natu nuan-ga jukhai sai, sise danthon milo! Palamra napum pakhiangna charuidihga tadbo suang naben khat haboniu wi-nkiu-e.

Chiudi tuhoira Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, mai khatniu panaogu matun makbo jengniu makjiu panaotu tabo suimakge, sichiu maksai paniu patu pijiu makhakhaibo-e, sichiujiu sibo puise milan misai makha mibogu kamaobose pakhu gasu padbo-e, khatdi mai khatniu tamibo pui situ lulansai pase mainao kiumibo-e.
Chiudi tuhoira Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e; naliuniu ladriat thiuboga wadaodi siangtulo. Tinggen tu dinjiu siangtulo, palamra haise Tingwang gu Chawang bamme;
maksai kadihtu dinjiu siangtulo, palamra haise paphi pan-e, maksai Jerusalem tu dinjiu siangtulo, palamra haise Chawang kadibo piugu namdi-e.
Naliu peetu dinjiu siangtulo, palamra naliuniu naliu tham-hiukeng khat tudi kam maka ngamlakge, maksai kam matik ngamlakge.
Siniu nachamse ‘Yo’, maksai ‘Makge’, chiubo ronna dinlulo, haibo riga nkiubo sira Kasabo Piu khugasu wangbo-e.
Chiudi tuhoira Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e: naliu khuga kamaobo tenkhaibo jengniu chakhum ruimane. Mai khatniu nabiang majatlam kaphi sai, mawilamdi lengkhai bilo.
Khatdi mai khatniu na-ntiang sutjiu ladzankyga puiwangsai, nafaidi pikhai bilo.
Sigasu mai khatniu natu manomjiu mathak bam khat pabang phung tadlo sai, mathak bam niadi phungtad khai bilo.
Mai khatniu nakhuga wakhat khengsai pikhai bilo, mai khatniu nagu wakhat mathiu khai nisai paleng mathiu khai bilo.
“Haichiu dinbo naliuniu chiumide, ‘Nakamaitu lungsalo, nagu mikremaitu marenglo.’
Chiudi tuhoira Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e: nagu mikremaitu lungsalo, natu siangkhai maitu thoikhai bilo, natu marengmai leng kawi kamkhai bilo, khatdi natu mathad maileng kakheng thiukhai bilo.
Sichiusai, tinggen lam bambo, naliu Piu nahdung naliu thiulu bui-e. Palamra paniu pagu naimikse kasamai nai kawimai riga thaoben khai bi-e, khatdi kawi kammai nai kasa kammai riga tingriu khai bi-e.
Naliutu lungsa maitu ronna naliuniu lungsa sai, Tingwang niu dechiujiu naliutu tathuon pikhai ralo? Ramkha khamaidi sichiu kambo-e!
Khatdi naliuniu naliu kamaitu ronna maning makung-e sai, ndegu nkiubo kamjiulo? Malummak maidi sichiu kambo-e!
Tinggen lam bambo naliu Piu witathuibo kumjiu naliudi witathui rabo-e!

“Sijengniu pageng kabam maileng naliuniu piboga wasao thiumaidungniu kahumbokyga khatdi puidiga kambo kumjiu kamtulo. Maidungniu paliutu thuonra sise kambo-e Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, paliura paliu dam loimide.
Chiudi naliuniu pageng kabambo maitu nkhabose naka kungthubo situdi pijiu simi tulo:
Sichiusai haise mahimgu thiurabo-e. Sichiujiu mahim ngaobambo naliu Piuniu tathuonse pirabo-e.

Chiudi naliuniu kakheng thiubo tingga, kalung lungsinglam ngutlujiu khatdi akham lujiu mainiu ngaomakbo naliu Piu khuga kakheng thiu lulo, sichiusai mahin phui bambo naliu Piuniu naliutu tathuonse pikhai bine.
“Naliuniu kakheng thiubo tingga, nkengmainiu pageng kahabo lad din lan-lanbo kumjiu kam tulo, palamra paliuniu kheng mathengsai, paliu rathoi chiukhai sune chiujiu maning-e.
Siniu paliu kum tulo. Naliuniu pakhuga khengmakbo suangga naliuleng pageng kabambose naliu Piuniu sibambo-e.
Sijengniu haichiu khenglo:
‘Tinggen lam bambo aliu Piu, Nazan masanbo thiumilo;
Nawangdih wangkiubo thiulo; Tinggen lam nachunbo kum, kadih gadi nachunbo thiulo.
Thainai aliu tiubuibo pikhailo.
Aliu khuga maokhai maitu, aliuniu kuak khaibo kumjiu; aliu maodi kuak khailo.
Kahiamboga aliutu jukhai tulo, chiudi kasabo gasu aliutu gukhailo.
Palamra, nawangdih, napumtan khatdi naken dibo tingtheng thiumilo. Amen.
Chiudi naliuniu maitu kuak khai maksai, naliuniu kamaobose naliu Piu niudi kuak khai lakge.

Naliuniu kalum ribo tingga, wasao thiumai siniu, achungbo zu lenbo kumjiu kam tulo. Paliuniu kalum ribose maidung khuga mahinra kam makge. Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, paliu damra loimibo-e.
Naliuniu kalum ribo tingga, naliu zu nphiu lujiu, naliu pitham tamai lujiu kamlo;
sichiujiu naliuniu kalum ribo situ maitu pi simakjiu mahin phuibambo naliu Piutu ronna pisilulo, chiusai mahin ngaobo naliu Piu siniu tathuonse pikhai rabo-e.
Sibosung, tinggen lam mathu nai tariniu tiu maha ngamlakbo, khatdi agatiu mainiu kampang lujiu aga ngamlakbo chakhiu-chalanse makhuan lulo.
Palamra naliugu chakhiu-chalan bamboga, naliu lungchundi bamrabo-e.
“Chamik hai chapumgu chamibung kumbo-e. Namikse wisai, napum pakhiangnase benrabo-e;
chiudi namikse wita misai, napumse tamiumi rabo-e. Sijengniu nakhuga bambo nagu nbiuse tamiumi sai, haise dejiukha tamiumi ralo!

“Mai khatniu, mai khangnia vang thiuda silakge, paniu khat situ lungsa misai, khat situ marengmi rabo-e; khatdi paniu khat piugu kadinpiu misai, khangkhat piugu kadin piusi lakge. Naliuniu Tingwang nai rangkang vang thiu nda silakge.

“Haise Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, naliuniu ringtinggu katiu-kasak khatdi chafai-tani jengniu manangmi tulo. Palamra ringting haise katiu-kasak suang nkiubo makma? Khatdi chapumse chafai-tani suang nkiubo makma?

Len mariujiu bambo thingnadungtu phuilo: paliuniu alindi lingmakge, chabow gadi phungwang makhuan makge; chiudi tinggen lam bambo naliu Piu siniu paliutu phuikhaijiu bambo-e! Naliu haira thingnadung suang nkiubo makma?
Naliu mai khatniu manangbo donniu poinakhadi ring matheng lubui ma?
“Siniu dekamjiu chafai-tani donniu manang bamralo? Phuilo, dechiujiu nkan rapendung hai puaksu bamlo? Paliuniu tatien thiu makge, maksai chafai-tani paliuleng dakmakge.
Sichiujiu Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, chiubora chawang Solomon niu pakhiu-palan haijiuga bamdi, haibo nkinpen kumjiu witang makge.

Thainai penbam lujiu, nsuannai kuikiujiu n-mang ga rumirabo piubuan haitu Tingwang niu papuan thiukhai bambo-e. Paniu naliutu sisuang nkiujiu naliu pon thiukhai makma? Naliu malum hai dejiukha siamgulo!
“Sijengniu ‘tiura-sakra leng, maksai piurabo leng delamsu wangralo chiubo manangmi tulo!’
(Haidungse nkengmainiu manangjiu bambo-e). Tinggen lam bambo naliu Piuniu haidungse naliuleng pageng bamme chiubo sibamme.
Sibosung, Tingwang gu Chawangdih khatdi pagu majibo situ nkiujiu phiululo, sichiusai paniu pakhiangna haise naliuleng pikhaibi rabo-e.
Sijengniu sonnai leng manangmi tulo; sise nsuannai khen thiujiu manangmi rabo-e. Naikhatgu chariubo riga khaisanra pageng ha-e.
“Tingwang niu naliutu ladjan thiumakra, naliudi maidungtu ladjan thiutulo,
palamra naliuniu maidungtu ladjan thiubo kumjiu, Tingwang niu naliutu ladjan thiurabo-e, khatdi naliuniu maidung khuga kambo kumjiu paniu naliu khuga kam rabo-e.
Naliu mikga karalik bamlujiu, dekamjiu maidung mikga karamud bambo situ naliuniu phuijiulo?
Naliu mikga karalik bamlujiu dechiu nasingna khuga, ‘Namikga bambo karamudse luthonmi bine,’ chiu dinjiulo?
Naliu wasao kathiu maidung! Raijiu naliu mikga bambo karalikse lupad milo, sichiusai nasingna mikga bambo karamudse lupadra masanjiu ngaolu rabo-e.
“Masanbo maniase tathi leng pitulo, paliuniu naliutu mariwang makira ronna-e. Nagu tiuchangse kavak masuangga thonkhai tulo—paliuniu sise taomalui khaira leng ronna-e.
“Khenglo, naliuleng pikhai bine; phiulo, naliuniu daolune; nkham maganlo, naliuleng lekhai bine.
Palamra khengmai hina leng pikhai bine, khatdi phiumai hina daolu rabo-e; khatdi nkham maganmai hina leng lekhaibi rabo-e.
Naliu papiumai khat kumboniu naliu nahmai khatniu taruak khengsai, naliuniu paleng tatu pikhai rama?
Maksai paniu chakha khengboga, paleng kaniu pikhai rama?
Naliu haijiukha kasamai thiubam liudi, naliu nahmaidung leng haijiuga kawibo pikhaira si-e, sichiusai tinggen lam bambo naliu Piu khuga khengmai lengra dejiukha kawibo pikhai ralo!
“Marumbo rengmun gase tadlo, palamra charuidih tadrabo rengmunse di-e khatdi sibo npuise tadra mala-e, sichiujiu siga tadmai keng-e.
Chiudi karingbo npuiga tadrabo rengmun sira marumme, khatdi sibo npuise tadra kung-e sichiujiu siga tadmai tamme.
Aratbo phaimiukakung maidung situ mari lulo; paliu hai lenlamra mily kumjiu naliu khuga wangsune, chiudi paliu lung sira tanidung kumbo-e.
Naliuniu paliu tienkam gasu silubui-e. Tathu bangniu mumsy masi makge, khatdi thureng bangniu ndutsy masi makge.
Kawibo bang siniu kawibo sy masi-e, chiudi kasabo bang siniu kasabo sy masi-e.
Kawibo bang siniu kasabo sy masi makge, khatdi kasabo bang siniu kawibo sy masi makge.
Kawibo sy masi makbo bang tura huilujiu chamiga thonkhaijiu rumi rabo-e.
Sichiusai paliu tienkam gasu aratbo phaimiukakung situ naliuniu silubui-e.
“Rapiu, Rapiu, chiujiu atu kumai hina tinggen gu Chawangdihga ngut lakge, chiudi tinggen lam bambo Apiu maning tenmaidung ronna ngutrabo-e.

Ladjan Tingmikse wangbo nai, maidung kakengniu ‘Rapiu, Rapiu, nazan gasu aliu niu Tingwang cham dinron khai mibo-e, nazan gasu aliuniu rasadungtu hathonjiu maisuang kahabo ngam kengjiu kamkhai mibo-e!’. chiujiu akhuga dinsune.
Siga Iniu paliu khuga dinsune, ‘Naliutu wadaodi I simakge. Naliu kasamaidung-e, akhugasu tadmilo!
“Sijengniu, alad chiulujiu majai kalumai sira, ningtingbo piu khatniu tudi riga chaky thiukhaibo kumbo-e.
Tingriu kiubogu tingrod tanwangdi, tadui naiwangdi, khatdi tingkai tanjiu hunwangdi sibo kytu kamkao lakge, palamra haise tudi riga thiukhai mibo-e.
“Chiudi alad chiulujiu majai kamak maira kapangbo piu khatniu nbuijiuga chaky thiukhaibo kumbo-e.
Tingriu kiujiu tadui naiwangsai, khatdi tingkai tanjiu hunwangsai, haise kaomi rabo-e. Sise pakao sajiu kaomi rabo-e!”
Para Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung kum makge; chiudi para pumtan jaojiu katikhai-e.
Jesu niu luongbut gasu nkumboga, chamai mendi pasai suiwangde.
Siga nphenbo mai khatniu pakhuga wangjiu pasuangga khudung kiujiu din-e, “Paohubo, nangniu nachun-e sai, nangniu atu kam masan ngamme.”
Jesu niu paben henpadjiu, khatdi patu kaba khaijiu din-e, “Iniu achun-e, masan milo.” Siga sibopiu rapotse winuang mide.
Siga Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Kinglo, mai khat khugadi haise dintulo, chiudi singku khuga tadlujiu nang wimide chiubo patu lenkhailo khatdi Mose niu chamtan pikhaibo saisuijiu charathiu milo.”
Jesu niu Capernaum ga ngutboga, Rommai chakampao khatniu patu adaojiu nkha khaira kheng-e.
“Paohubo, akyga avangpiu mara matanjiu malai lulakjiu paziga jibamme.”
Jesu niu din-e, “Iniu tadlujiu, patu wikhai bine.”
Chakampao siniu paokakge, “Oh chiumakge, paohubo, nangniu aky lungga wang khaira akaji makge. Chamtan ronna pikhailo, chiusai avangpiuse wilu rabo-e.

Palamra Idi asuang kadimai hangga bambo-e, khatdi ahang gadi riphendung bambo-e. Iniu mai khattu chamtan pijiu, ‘Tadlo’, chiusai pah tadle; khatdi katammai khattu chamtan pijiu, ‘Wanglo’, chiusai pah wang-e; khatdi avangpiutu chamtan pijiu, ‘Haise kamlo’, chiusai pah kamme.”
Jesu niu haise chiuboga, pasuang hamide, khatdi pasai suitad kinmai khuga din-e, “Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, Iniu Israel maidung ruangga wadaodi haikumbo malum bammaitu daomakge.
Iniu naliu khuga pachangsiak dinbo-e chiubora maidung kakengniu tingbang, tingnu lamsu wangjiu Abraham, Isaac khatdi Jacob tu maluong lujiu tinggen chawangdihga wang aruang sune.
Chiudi tinggen Dihga bamniura mai situ tamiubo ga thonkhaijiu, siga kapjiu paliu hiu n-getjiu bam sune.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu chakampao khuga din-e, “Naky lam wangsulo, nagu malum saisuijiu padmi sulo.”
Sichiujiu chakampao vangpiuse sibo wansiakga wimide.
Jesu niu Peter kyga tadwangboga, siga Peter naise kakhunjiu jibambo paniu ngaode.
Paniu paben dikhaijiu kakhunbose wikhai bide, siga paniu buangsu lujiu paliutu macha khai sude.
Chawan wangboga, maidungniu rasa phungmaidung kakengtu Jesu khuga puiwangde. Jesu niu rasadung situ chamtan thinjiu hathon khaide khatdi thiuniu mai hinatu wikhai bide.
Jesu niu haise kamkhaibo sira phaimiukakung Isaiah niu dinkhai mibose wangtangra leng-e, “Pah papum siakniu aliugu thiuniubo phungkhai-e, khatdi aliugu rapot hina paniu phungtad mide.”
Jesu niu chamai mendi pakhuga wang magui bambo situ ngaoluboga, paniu pakhommaitu ajai uigen khatlam tadmira chamtan pikhai-e.
Tacheng-tajaigu katipao khatniu pakhuga wangjiu din-e, “Katipao yo, nangniu tadkhaibo bam hinaga suitadra I kaden lude.”
Jesu niu patu paokakge, “Asathidi paky bamme, khatdi thingnadi pasip bamme, chiudi Chamai Nahpiu sira papee mangiu khaijiu mathak khairabo bam ha-e.”
Siga pakhommai kakimai khat siniu din-e, “Paohubo, I raiboga malanwang apiutu baikhai lujiu wangne.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Asai suilulo, pijiu kashai mainiu kashai maitu baimi sulo.”
Jesu niu aliam khat lungga ngutmide, siga pakhommaidung pasai suilujiu tadmide.
Siga tingthung katanbo khat bungjiu ajai gase wangde, siga aliamse taduiga malinra kum mide. Chiudi Jesu sira jiting bamme.
Khommaidung siniu pakhuga wangjiu patu makiangjiu din-e, “Rapiu yo, aliutu gukhailo! Aliu shailajiu bamme.”

Jesu niu paokakge, “Naliu dekamjiu haibo ping-pingjiulo? Naliu malum dejiukha siamlo!” Sichiujiu paniu buangsu lujiu tingkai nai tingthung kasuak bambo situ mathakmira chamtan pikhaiboga saojing mide.
Mai hinase paliu suang hamide. Paliuniu din-e, “Hainase dekumbo mailo? Tingthung nai tadui kasuakbo siniudi pacham majai-e!”

Jesu niu ajai uigen khat lam bambo, Gadara luongriang gase wangboga charao lamsu padbo mai khangniatu daode. Haina kaniase rasa phungbo mai-e, sichiujiu panaise sajubo donniu maidi sibo npuilam tad mariu makge.
Panainiu senjiu din-e, “Tingwang Nahpiu, Jesu yo, nangniu aliutu nde kamlo chiujiulo? Pawanse wangtang makhaga aliutu pi mathad khaira nang wangkin jiuma?”
Diumakbo bamga kavak dungdi khat bamme.
Sijengniu rasadung siniu Jesu khuga kheng-e, “Nangniu aliutu hathonpad mine chiusai, uibo vakdung khuga aliutu langkhai khelo.”
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Tadsulo.” Sichiujiu paliuniu kavakdung khuga ngut mide. Siga kavakdung pakhiangnase chakhaoga jongkhaijiu ajai lungga kahakshat kam mide.
Kavakdungtu khuanbam maidung siniu namdiga tadlujiu padmibo racham hinase khatdi rasadung nai maipiu kania khuga padmibose dinkhaide.
Sijengniu namdiga bammai hina Jesu tu phuira padle, khatdi paliuniu patu ngaoluga, paliu luongriang situ phutlujiu tadmira pakhuga kheng-e.
Jesu niu aliam lungga ngut lujiu pakiluang ajai uigen lamse malan wangboga,

maidung khangsianiu papum-phan shaibo khattu paziga majikhai lujiu ponwangde. Paliu malumse Jesu niu ngaoluboga, paniu papum-phan shaibo piu khuga din-e, “Anah yo, nama nsang lulo! Na-nuanse kuak khai mide.”
Siga Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung khangsianiu paliu ronna din sude, “Haina piuniu Tingwang tu din masa bamme!”
Paliuniu maning bambose Jesu niu silujiu din-e, “Dekamjiu sikumbo kasabose naliuniu maning bam jiulo?
‘Sulujiu tadsulo’, chiubo suang ‘Na-nuanse kuak khai mide,’ chiubo desiniu malalo?
Chamai Nahpiu siniu kadihpiriga nuan kuak khaira pumtan bamme, chiubo Iniu naliu khuga kamlen khai bine.” Sichiujiu paniu papum-phan shaibo piu khuga din-e, “Sulo, nazise ponlujiu naky lam wangsulo!”
Sinapiu siniu sulujiu paky lam wangmide.
Maidung siniu haise ngaoluboga pingmide, khatdi haikumbo pumtan hai maidung khuga kamlen khaibo donniu Tingwang tu thuonde.
Jesu niu sibo bam phutlujiu, tadpadboga ramkha khabo piu, pazanniu Matthew kubopiu siniu pagu chakamkyga ntaobam niubo paniu ngaolujiu pakhuga din-e, “Asai suilulo.”
Matthew niu sulujiu pasai suitad mide.
Pharisee maidung khangsianiu haise ngao lujiu pakhommaidung khuga maniu-e, “Dekamjiu naliugu katipao siniu haikumbo maidungtu maluong watiu bam jiulo?”
Paliuniu dinbose Jesu niu chiulujiu paokakge, “ Papum kawimai lengra phaimiu pageng ha-e, chiudi thiuniu maileng-e.
Masanbo ariakniu din-e, “Ira rathak mania situ makjiu lungsabo situ luni-e,” chiujiu dinbose detulo, tadlujiu phuilulo. Palamra Iniu kawimaitu makjiu, nuan phungmaitu kura wangbo-e.”
Sigasu John Baptist sai suimai siniu Jesu khuga wangjiu maniu-e, “Dekamjiu aliuniu khatdi Pharisee maidungniu kalumri rijiu bamdi nakhommaidungra wadaodi kalum rimak jiulo?”

Jesu niu paokakge, “Naopaopiuniu pagiang maidungtu maluong bamboga paliu chunsajiu bamra naliu maning jiuma? Sichiu makge! Chiudi naopaopiu situ paliu khugasu puitadmi rabo tingmikse wangsai paliu kalumri rabo-e.
“Mai khatniudi kaguangbo fai gase kasanbo fai khopkhai makge, palamra kasanbo fai siniu jutarut kiujiu kaguangbo fai jamse kamkek madimi rabo-e.

Sironna makjiu mai khatniudi kaguangbo jawbungga kasanbo jaw malikhai makge, palamra jawbungse puakpangmi rabo-e, sichiujiu jaw sidi jawbung sidi hakammi rabo-e. Sibosung kasanbo jawse kasanbo jawbungga malikhai rabo-e, sichiusai niase wikana lubui-e.”

Jesu niu haise dinbamboga Jehudi maigu chakampao khatniu pakhuga wangjiu, pamasuangga khudung kiujiu din-e, “Anahpui hai tuhoi siakniu shai mide, chiudi wangjiu pariga naben kaba khailo, sichiusai pah ringlanlu bui-e.”
Sijengniu Jesu sulujiu pasai suitad kin-e, siga pakhommaidung sidi pasai suitad kin-e.
Siga takum kariu-je-niakiu tazai kinbo pui khatniu Jesu sailam wanglujiu pafairi niakhaide.
Paniu paronna din-e, “Iniu pafairi-nadi niakhai sai, I wimi rabo-e.”
Jesu niu mariwang patu ngaolujiu din-e, “Nachun nsang lulo, anahpui yo nang malum siniu natu wikhai mide.” Sibo wan siakga sibo puise wimide.
Sigasu Jesu niu chakampao kyga wangboga, kashai kanuijiu nthiam mudjiu kap-huijiu bamniu-e.
Siga paniu ngutlujiu din-e, “Mai hina npad milo! Aliumainase shai makge, pahai jibambo-e!” Siga paliu mathiu patu nuimen sude.
Sichiujiu maidung situ hathon lujiu, Jesu niu npuimainah ziga ngutlujiu paben jukhaiboga pase buangsu mide.
Sibo rachamse, sibo luongriang pakhiangna chiuchia mide.
Jesu niu sibo bam phutlujiu, tadpatboga pamik tiatmai khangnia pasai suijiu haichiu senjiu tadkin-e, “David Nahpiu yo, anaitu lungsa khailo!”
Jesu se kalunglam ngut mide, siga pamik tiatbo khang niase pakhuga wangboga, paniu panai khuga maniu-e, “Iniu nanaitu kam mawi ngamme chiubo nanai malum jiuma?”
Panainiu paokakge, “Yo, malumme, Paohubo!”
Siga Jesu niu panai mikse dikhaijiu din-e, “Nanai malum saisuijiu padmi sulo.”
Siga panai mikse ngao mide. Jesu niu chamtan pijiu din-e, “Haise mai khat khugadi dintulo.”
Chiudi panainiu padlujiu Jesu lamga sibo luongriang pakhiangna paoron mide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu tadpadboga, maidung khangsianiu rasa ngutjiu palad padmakbo mai khattu Jesu khuga majang wangde.
Sichiujiu rasa situ hathon padmiboga sinapiuse npao sude, siga mai hina paliu suang hamide. “Aliuniu wadaodi haikumbo Israel mai ruangga ngaomakge,” chiujiu paliuniu dinsude.
Paniu maidungtu ngaoboga paliutu lungsabo lungchunniu phuimide, palamra paliu hai milykhuanpao habo milydung kumjiu, paliutu mai khatniudi nkha khaira hajiu chariu magenthiu bamme.
Sijengniu paniu pakhommaidung khuga din-e, “Atiat rabo hai kengjiu bamme, chiudi tatien thiura maira tamme.
Sijengniu luzam paopiu khuga, tatien thiumaitu langkhaira kheng lulo.”
Jesu niu pakhommaidung khang kariu-je-niakiutu ku aruang lujiu rasadungtu hathon padra khatdi mara sathiubo hinatu wikhaira pumtan pikhaide.
Ladlangtadmai khang kariu-je-niakiu zan sira: raiboga Simon (Peter kubo) khatdi pasai kariupiu Andrew; Jacob nai pasai kariupiu John panai haise Zebedee nahpiu kania-e;
Philip nai Bartholomew; Thomas nai ramkha khabo Matthew; Alphaeus nahpiu Jacob khatdi Thaddia;
Lungthiubo Simon khatdi Jesu tu jonbopiu Judas Iscariot paliu-e.
Haidung khang kariu-je niakiu situ Jesu niu haichiu katikhaijiu langkhaide: “Nkengmai ramga maksai Samaria mai namdaklam tadkhai mane.
Sibosung, hamibo milydung, Israel maidung khuga naliu tadrabo-e.
Tadlujiu haichiu dinron khailo, ‘Tinggen gu chawangdihse nawang mide!’
Thiuniu maitu wikhailo, kashai maitu kam maring khailo. Ka-nphenbo maidungtu wikhailo, khatdi rasadungtu hathon khailo. Matha pikhailo, palamra naliuniu matha daolubo-e.
Naliugu takhaoga kachia, rangkang, paisa phung mane;
nbin tadbo tingga takhao, maksai ntiang malin, maksai chaphitop malin, maksai tathun thin mane. Palamra tatien kathiu maise paphijeng daobui-e.
Naliuniu namdak khatga maksai nam khatga wangboga naliutu lukhai nimai khuga bamlo, sichiujiu naliuniu sibo bam gasu tadlan makthen siga bamlo.
Naliuniu chaky khatga ngutboga sibo ky situ thoikhai bilo.
Sibo kyga bammai siniu naliutu lukhai nisai, naliugu thoikhaibo kanuise pibam milo; chiudi paliuniu naliutu lukhaini maksai, naliugu thoikhaibo kanuise lulan milo.
Sichiujiu khangsia kyniu maksai namdak siniu naliutu lukhaini maksai khatdi naliu cham nkingkhaini maksai, naliu phiga bambo tabuise kasam khai lujiu sibo bam situ phutmilo.
Phuilo, naliutu minlujiu ladzankyga jutad sune khatdi paliuniu maduiky gasu naliutu dapsune.
Adon jengniu naliutu mawangpaodung khatdi chawang maidung masuangga ladjan thiujiu Kawichampao paliu khuga nai Nkengmaidung khuga dinra puiwang sune.
Naliutu ladjan thiura puiwangboga, naliuniu dinrabo lamga maksai dechiu dinralo chiubo lamga manangmi tulo; pawanse wangtangboga, naliuniu degu dinralo chiubo pikhaibi rabo-e.
Palamra naliuniu dinrabo ladse naliugu makge. Naliu Piu gu Hiupuina siniu naliu khuga dinkhai birabo-e.
Mai hinaniu naliutu adon jengniu mareng sune. Chiudi pamalan tangbo khenglu maitu rankhai bine.

Paliuniu naliutu namdi khatga kam mathadsai namdi khat lam paklulo. Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, chiubora Chamai Nahpiu wangmakbo suangga naliu ngamse Israel mai namdi lungga kamloi lulakge.

Sijengniu ariak namai siniu katipao kumlura, khatdi kavang siniu papaopiu kumlura kabuibose thiura kam rabo-e. Chaky paopiu situ Beelzebul ku-e sai, pakikhunmai mai situra sisuang sabo zan siniu kurabo-e!
Tamiuboga Iniu naliu khuga dinkhaibose naliuniu kabenboga dinpad rabo-e, khatdi naliuniu mahinjiu chiulubose chaky npom-gen gasu naliuniu senpad rabo-e.
Chapumtu ronna kamshat ngam lujiu hiunatu kamshat ngam makbo piutu ping tulo, chiudi chapum tudi hiuna tudi kamshat lujiu charuidih ga kam maha ngambo Tingwang tu ping lulo.
Palamra naliuniu damli khatniu takina niatu liu ngamme, chiudi naliu Piu chun maksai takina khatdi kadihga nkaikiu makge.
Naliu tura, naliu thamkeng hinadi siloi kamigu-e.
Sijengniu ping tulo, naliura takina wajiuga suang paman kung nkiubo-e!
“Mai khatniu mathiu suangga pase agu-e chiujiu din madupad sai, Idi tinggen lam Apiu masuangga patu din madupad rabo-e.
Chiudi mai khatniu mathiu suangga atu lukhai maksai, Idi tinggen lam Apiu masuangga patu lukhai lakge.
“Iniu kadihpiriga agi-manaibo phungwangbo-e chiujiu maningmi tulo. Makge, Iniu agi-manaibo makjiu, apang-heng phungwangbo-e.
Panahpiudung siniu papiumaidungtu atungra, panahpuidung siniu papuimaidungtu atungra, khatdi pamumaidung siniu panaimadungtu atungra I wangbo-e;
sichiujiu mai khatgu sathubo mikrese pakikhunmai siniu thiurabo-e.
“Mai khatniu papui papiutu, atu suang kungdiang sai, pase akhommai thiura buimakge; mai khatniu atu suang panahpui panahpiutu, kungdiang sai, pase akhommai thiura bui makge.
Mai khatniu pagu singchai phunglujiu asai sui maksai, akhommai thiura buimakge.
Mai khatniu pagu ringtingtu ranlura kamsai sise hami rabo-e; chiudi mai khatniu adon jengniu pagu ringting hakhai misai sise ranlu rabo-e.

Mai khatniu Tingwang lad dinron maitu, pase Tingwang lad dinronbo mai-e chiujiu lukhai sai, pagu tathuonse daorabo-e. Khatdi mai khatniu kawimai khattu, kawimai-e chiujiu lukhai sai, pagu tathuonse daorabo-e.
Naliuniu masanjiu silulo chiubora mai khatniu, siamthubo akhommai situ, akhommai-e chiujiu duigi-piang khat tadi pisak khai sai, pagu tathuonse daosiak rabo-e.
Jesu niu haidungse pakhommai khang kariu-je-niakiu situ katikhai lubo sai, paniu sibo bam phutlujiu sibo wonjengga lungbambo namdungtu katikhaira khatdi dinron khaira tadmide.
John Baptist niu kavangky gasu Khrista niu kambambo chamse chiulujiu, paniu pakhommai khangsiatu pakhuga langkhai-e.
Paliuniu Jesu khuga maniu-e, “Aliu khuga dinkhailo, nang hai John niu wangkinne chiubo piu sima, maksai aliuniu kakimaitu khuan ralo?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Malanwang, John khuga naliuniu chiulubo khatdi ngaolubose paokhai bilo:

Pamik tiatmai siniu ngao mide, paphi katangmai siniu tadlu mide, ka-nphenmaitu masankhai bide, pakuon tidmai siniu chiu mide, kashaimaitu kam maring khaide khatdi lungkalakmai khuga kawicham hai paoron khaide.
Atu malum masa makbo maidungse dejiukha san wilo!”
John pakhommaidung siniu tadmira kambamboga, Jesu niu palamga maidung khuga haichiu din-e: “Naliuniu ramjingga John khuga tadbo tingga degu phuira tadjiulo? Tingkainiu chapiuniw hun malai bambo tuma?
Naliuniu degu phuira tadjiulo? Chapuan kawi piubo piu tuma? Sikumbo pon piubo maidungra chawangkiningga lung bamme!
Akhuga dinkhailo, naliuniu degu phuira tadjiulo? Phaimiukakung tuma? Yo, maji-e, chiudi para phaimiukakung suang nkiubo-e.
Masanbo ariakniu John lamga haichiu raokhai nbamme: ‘Tingwang niu din-e, naleng npui thiu khaira, Iniu namasuangga agu ladlangtadmaitu langkhai rabo-e.’
Iniu naliu khuga palingjiu dinbo-e chiubora lungwang mibo mai ruangga John Baptist suang di-nkiubo ha-e. Chiudi tinggen gu Chawangdih gara siamthubo piu siniu John suang di-nkiu ye.
John niu dinron subo gasu thainai tangbo maidung siniu tinggen gu Chawangdihtu paliu-lai padjiu aphen bambo-e, sichiujiu palung kasamai siniu haisitu ngamlura matanjiu bambo-e.
Phaimiukakung hinaniu khatdi Mose gu Tacheng-tajai siniu John ken katangbo Chawangdih lamga dinjiu bambo-e;
sichiujiu paliu chamse naliuniu malumsai, John hai Elijah wangkinne chiujiu din masuang khai mibo si-e.
Pakuon kabammai hina nking lulo!
“Tuhoira Iniu thaidao ken-ga lungbambo maitu dechiujiu din kada ralo? Paliu haira senkiga ntao bambo nahmaidung kumbo-e. Bao khatniu bao khat khuga din-e,
‘Aliuniu tanao kapaobo lui thiuboga naliu lenkhai makge! Aliuniu kashai kanuibo lui thiu-e, chiudi naliu kapkhai makge!’
John niu lungwangboga pah mai tatek tiumakge, khatdi sak makge. Siga maidungniu din-e, ‘Pakhuga rasa bamme!’

Sichiujiu Chamai Nahpiu siniu lungwangboga pah wa tiu-e, khatdi sakge, siga maidung siniu din-e, ‘Phuilo hainatu! Para patiuni sa-e, khatdi pasakni sa-e, khatdi ramkha khamai nai nuan phungmai ka-e!’ Chiudi Tingwang gu ningting sira pagu majibo siniu lenjiu bamme.”
Jesu niu pagu maisuang habo tiendung kengjiu tenkhaibo namdakdungga lungbo maidung siniu paliu nuan gasu lungli makbo donniu sibo namdung situ paniu rukhaide.

“Chorazin yo! Dejiuga chariubo hai nang daoralo? Bethsaida yo! Dejiuga chariubo hai nang daoralo? Naliu khuga tenkhai mibo maisuang habodungse Tyre nai Sidon ga tenkhai bisai, siga bambo maidungse paliu nuan gasu lungli mide chiubo lenra nda maliufai benlujiu, khatdi paliu riga tabui mara khaijiu kamlenmi bam rabo-e!
Iniu naliu khuga palingjiu dinbo-e, chiubora Ladjan Tingmikga Tingwang niu naliutu suang Tyre nai Sidon maitu lungsa khaibi rabo-e!

Sichiujiu Capernaum yo, nangra tinggen lam naronna natu ponkhangjiu bamma? Natu charuidihga thonkhai mirabo-e! Naliu khuga tenkhai mibo maisuang habodungse Sodom ga tenkhai bisai, thainai tangbo sise bamniu rabo-e!
Ladjan Tingmik gase Tingwang niu naliutu suangdi Sodom situ lungsa nkiudiang rabo-e chiubo hai masanjiu silulo!”
Sibo wan gase Jesu niu din-e, “Tinggen nai kadih Rapiu, Apiu yo! Iniu natu thuonkiu-e, palamra ningtingmai nai wakasimai khuga nbai khaibose nangniu wadi simakmai khuga lenkhaibi-e.
Yo, Apiu, haise nangniu machunbo si-e.
“Chabang karip phungjiu, magenthiu chariu mai hina akhuga wanglo, Iniu naliutu pi mathak khai bine.
Wangjiu agu wangkham phunglulo, khatdi akhu gasu wa kati lulo, palamra Ira agi n-jang-e khatdi alung manon-e, siniu naliu mathakbo daolune.
Palamra Iniu naliuleng pikhai rabo wangkham sira mala-e, khatdi naliuleng pikhai rabo abangsira masen-e.”
Haise Pharisee maidungniu ngaoluboga, paliuniu Jesu khuga din-e, “Phuilo, nakhommaidungniu Tabamnai haichiu kambambose aliugu Tacheng-tajai siniu suimakge!”
Paniu Charakyga ngutlujiu, pah khatdi pamaidungniu Tingwang khuga kadkhai mibo taruakse tiu-e, haise paliuniu tiura Tacheng-tajainiu suimakbo-e; singkumai ronna sibo taruakse tiurabo-e.
Maksai Charakyga bambo singkudung siniu tania lijiu Tabamnai situ kampangjiu bamdi paliu maoleng chakkhai makge chiubo naliuniu Mose gu Tacheng-tajaiga kentao mak jiuma?
Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, chiubora sibo Raky suang kadibose haiga bamme.
Masanbo ariakniu din-e, ‘Ira khaoring rathaktu luni makge, chiudi lungsabo situ lunibo-e.’ Naliuniu haibo ramba sibam liusai, naliuniu pamao hamaidungtu ladjan thiulakge;
palamra Chamai Nahpiu hai Tabamnai gu Rapiu si-e
Jesu niu sibo bam phut lujiu, maduiky khatga wangboga,
paben khatlam kashaibo piu khat bamniu-e. Siga maidung khangsianiu Jesu tu kamaobo madam khai nibo jengniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Tabamnai maitu wikhaibo hai aliugu Tacheng-tajainiu suima, suimaklo?”
Sichiujiu chamai haira mily suang kung nkiubo makma? Sijengniu aliugu Tacheng-tajainiu Tabamnai mai khattu nkha khaira sui-e.”
Sichiujiu paniu paben khat lam shaibo piu khuga din-e, “Naben ntha padlo.”
Paniu pabense nthapadboga, khatlam kumjiu wimide.
Sichiujiu Pharisee maidungse phut lujiu tadmide, khatdi Jesu tu kamshatra rangsude.
Jesu niu patu kamshatra rangmide chiubose siluboga, sibo bam gasu tadmide; sichiudi chamai mendi siniu pasai suikin-e. Siga thiuniu maidung situ paniu wikhai bide.
Khatdi palamga maidung khuga dinmakra paniu paliu khuga chamtan pikhai bide.
Paniu haise kambora Tingwang niu phaimiukakung Isaiah khuga dinkhai mibose wangtangra leng-e.
Iniu lungsabo, khatdi Iniu alung kiubo
Iniu ahiupuina pariga langkhaine,
sichiujiu paniu jatdung situ ladjan thiune.
Paniu arilakge maksai pakhuan padlakge,
maksai npuiga chalad senpad lakge.
Pagu majibose wangtang makthen, nrongtang kaobamdi kamtang lakge,
maksai chamibung langriangse kibamdi, paniu kammid lakge,
sichiujiu mai hina patu malummi rabo-e.”
Sibo sai maidungniu rasa phungbo pamik tiatbo khatdi palad padmakbo piutu Jesu khuga majang wangde. Siga Jesu niu patu kam mawi khaijiu, palad pad mide, khatdi wa ngao mide.
Jesu niu kamkhaibo lamga mai hina paliu suang hajiu paliuniu maniu-e, “Pahai David Nahpiuse makjiuma?”

Paliuniu maning bambose Jesu niu silujiu paliu khuga din-e, “ Chawang dih khatniu paronna njan lujiu khat khattu chari thiusai haise watheng lakge. Khatdi kadih khatniu maksai kykhun khatniu paronna njan lujiu chari thiusai kaomi rabo-e.
Sichiujiu Satan siniu Satan khattu hathon bamsai, paronna patu njanpad mibo-e, chiusai pawangdihse kaonuangmi rabo-e!
Iniu Beelzebul gu pumtan thinlujiu rasatu hathon bamsai, naliu saisui maidungra saogu pumtanniu paliutu hathonpad jiulo? Sichiusai paliuniu naliutu ladjan thiurabo-e.

Chiumakge, haise Beelzebul niu makge, chiudi Tingwang gu Hiupuina siniu rasa situ hathon lura pumtan atu pibo-e. Haisiniu madu khaibo sira Tingwang gu Chawangdih hai naliu khuga wangbam mide chiubo lenkhaibo-e.
“Mai khatniudi katanbo piu situ ratmanmi maksai, paky kampang lujiu pagu maniadung sunglu lakge.
Sichiujiu Iniu naliu khuga pachang palingjiu dinbo-e chiubora maidunggu nuan hina khatdi kasabo lad hina kuak khai ngamme; chiudi mai khatniu Masanbo Hiupuina tu din masa sai, patu kuak khai silakge.
Mai khatniu Chamai Nahpiu situ din masadi kuak khai ngamme; chiudi mai khatniu Masanbo Hiupuina situ din masa sai, tuhoidi tingthengdi kuak khai silakge.
Naliu kaniudung—naliu kasamai thiulujiu dechiu kawibo din ngamlu ralo? Palamra lungchun-ga maning bambose chamunniu din padbo-e.
Kawibo mainiu kawibo ladkeng dinpadle, kasabo mai siniu kasabo ladkeng dinpadle.
“Pageng habo lad dinmibo hina lamga, Ladjan Tingmikga palam pirabo-e chiubo hai naliu sisiak lulo.
Palamra naliu ladkeng siniu naliutu kam majikhai rabo-e, khatdi naliu ladkeng siniu naliutu kammao khai rabo-e.”
Jonah niu chakha kadibo lungga nchun sum, n-nien sum bamkhai mibo kum, Chamai Nahpiu sidi kadih lungga nchun sum, n-nien sum bamkhai rabo-e.

Ladjan Tingmikga Nineveh maidungniu suchap lujiu naliu kien kasabo dinpad sune, palamra Jonah niu dinron khai mibose chiuluboga paliu nuan gasu lungli mibo-e; chiudi Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, chiubora haiga Jonah suang didiangbo bamme!

Ladjan Tingmikga Sheba Wangpui siniu suchap lujiu naliu kien kasabo dinpad sune, palamra Chawang Solomon gu ningtingtu nkingra paniu kadiu lamsu wangbo-e; khatdi Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, chiubora haiga Solomon suang didiangbo bamme!
“Rasa siniu mai khat khugasu npad lubo, sai mathak khairabo bam phiujiu tadui kasangbo bamga phiu tadle. Chiudi paniu daomakboga,
paronna din-e, ‘Iniu nda akyga malanwang mine.’ Sichiujiu malanwang lanboga paky se maruangjiu kam masansiak lujiu bamniubo daolude.

Siga paniu tadpad lujiu pasuang kasabo rasa chinniatu maluong lujiu siga ngut bammide, sichiujiu sinapiuse nda karaibo lunlung suang sadiang mide. Haise thaidao ken-ga lungmai kasamai khuga padrabo-e.”
Jesu niu maidung khuga sichiujiu wa katikhaijiu bamboga, papui nai pasingna maidung patu npaora kamaga wangjiu chapkhuan bamme.
Sijengniu maidung ruanggasu mai khatniu pakhuga din-e, “Phuilo, napui nai nasingna maidung natu npao khai nijiu kamaga chap bamme”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Apui saolo? Asingna maidung saolo?”
Sichiujiu paniu pakhommaidungtu siolujiu din-e, “Phuilo, haiga apui nai asingna maidung bamme!
Tinggen lam Apiu chunning tenbam maise asingna-e, atanpui-e khatdi apui-e.”
Sibo nai Jesu niu sibo ky phutlujiu ajai uigen khat lamse tadlujiu katikhaira ntao kiude.
Siga chamai mendi pakhuga wang madui suboga, paniu aliam khat lungga ngutlujiu ntao kiude, siga maidung sira ajai mungga chap bamme.
Paniu din champanbo thiujiu paliu khuga kengkha katikhai sude.
“Phuilo, mai khatniu chalin marukra tadpatle.
Paniu chalin maruk suboga kasianiu npuiga nkai khaide, sise thingnadungniu wangjiu khoitiu lude.
Kasianiu kadih-tam habo tatu riga nkai khaide, sigase kadih-tam habo jengniu puakpadjiu agui nuang mide.
Sise naimik padjiu tankhangboga aguinuang mide palamra pamense sukmakbo jengniu-e.
Kasianiu tathu jiuga nkai khaijiu puakkhang-e chiudi sibo bang situ tathuniu lunggom mide.
Chiudi chalinpum kasianiu kadih-tam kawiboga nkai khaijiu, pabangse puak khangde, sise pasy masijiu, kasianiu kai, kasianiu riak-charuk, khatdi kasianiu samriu maside;
Haichiujiu Jesu niu munkom khaide, “Naliu kuon kabam mai hina nkinglulo!”
Siga pakhommaidung siniu Jesu khuga wangjiu maniu-e, “Dekamjiu nangniu maidungtu npaobo tingga din champanbo hai thinjiulo?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Tinggen Chawangdihgu nbaibo ningtingse naliu khuga pikhaibo-e, chiudi paliu khugara pikhai makge.
Palamra kabambo piuleng khaisan bine, sichiujiu mali-malanjiu bamrabo-e, chiudi kahabo piu khuga sura kabambo poi sidi luthonmi rabo-e.
Iniu paliutu npaobo tingga din champanbo thinbo rambara, paliuniu phui bamdi ngao makge, paliuniu nking bamdi chiumakge khatdi simakge.
Sijengniu phaimiukakung Isaiah chamse paliutu dinbo-e:
‘Maidungniu nkingra nking-e chiudi simakge;
paliuniu phuira phui-e chiudi ngao makge.
Palamra paliu lungchunse kami mide,
palamra paliu kuon makad mide; khatdi paliu mik kaba mide.
Sichiumak sai, paliu mik ngaolu bui-e,
khatdi paliu kuon chiulu bui-e,
khatdi paliu lungchun siniu silu bui-e,
sichiujiu paliuniu akhulam mariwang, atu kulubui-e,
sichiusai Iniu paliutu wikhai lubui-e’ chiujiu Tingwang niu din-e.

Iniu naliu khuga pachang palingjiu dinbo-e chiubora phaimiukakung mai wajiu khaniu khatdi Tingwang maidung wajiu khaniu, naliuniu ngao mibose ngaokhaini paliu sangjiu tamibo-e, chiudi paliura ngaokhai lumakjiu tamide, khatdi naliuniu chiumibose chiukhaini paliu sangjiu tamibo-e, chiudi paliuniu chiukhai lumakjiu tamibo-e.
“Sichiusai, chalin marukbo rambase detulo chiubo nking lulo.
Chawangdih chamse chiulujiu simak maidungse npuimung ga nkaikhai mibo alinpum kumbo-e, paliu khuga lingkhai mibose Kasabo Khat siniu wanglujiu sutnuang mibo-e.
Tatu riga nkai khai mibo alinpum siniu tachamse chiubo tingga chunwijiu lukhai nuang lubo-e.
Chiudi haise paliu lungchun kasukga rimkhai lumakbo donniu paliuse pating theng makge. Sichiujiu sibo ladkeng jengniu magenthiu-chariubo, maksai mathadbo wangsai, paliuniu ladkengse phutnuang mibo-e.
Tathujiuga nkai khaibo alinpum siniu tachamse chiulu bamdi, paliu ringting jengniu manangbo, khatdi chakhiu-chalan jengniu lung pubo gasu tachamse kam maha mijiu pasy masilu makge.
Sichiujiu kadihtam kawiboga nkai khaibo alinpum siniu tachamse chiulujiu majai kalumai si-e, paliuniu pasy masijiu, khangsianiu kai, khangsianiu riak-charuk, khatdi khangsianiu samriu masilu-e.
Jesu niu paliu khuga din champanbo thiujiu dinkhai-e.
“Tinggen gu Chawangdih sira haikumbo-e, mai khatniu paluga chalin kawibo lingkhai-e.
Chiudi naikhat nchun, mai hina jimiboga, mikremai khatniu wangjiu chamiujiu gase piumen lingkhai lujiu tadmide.
Chamiubangse puakkhangjiu miubui padsubo tingga piumen sidi ngaopad sude.
Siga pavangdung siniu pakhuga wangjiu din-e, ‘Paohubo yo, naluga nangniu lingkhaibo sira kawibo chalin pum-e; chiudi piumen hai delamsu wangjiulo?’
Paniu paokakge, “Haise mikremai khatniu kambo-e.” Paliuniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Aliuniu tadlujiu piumendungse luthon mira nang suima?”
Paniu paokakge, “Chiumakge, naliuniu piumendungse khom maduiboga chamiu kasiadi luthon mibo sui-e.

Pijiu chamiu nai piumen situ atiatting tangbo lungbammi sulo. Sichiujiu Iniu atiat tingga changam kammaitu pijiu piumendungse pepad lujiu, sise rat madui lujiu ruthon mira, khatdi chamiu situ khommadui lujiu abow lungga khai madui mira dinkhai rabo-e.’”
Jesu niu paliu khuga din champanbo khat dinkhai-e, “Tinggen gu Chawangdihse haikumbo-e mai khatniu njiang siu paluga lingkhai-e.
