Haise alin ruanggasu siamthubo-e, chiudi haise puaksuboga dithubo bang thiumi-e. Haise pabang khat thiukhangjiu, thingnadungniu wangjiu pakega paliu sip pon-e.”
Jesu niu paliu khuga din champanbo khat dinkhai-e. “Tinggen gu Chawangdih haise chakhi kumbo-e: Maipui khatniu chakhi khailujiu tathuk matin khaijiu pungpad makthen khai nbamme.”
Jesu niu maidung khuga tacham kadin hina din champanbo thinjiu dinkhai-e. Paniu din champanbo thinmakjiu wakhatdi paliu khuga dinkhai makge.
Paniu haise kambora phaimiukakungniu dinmibose wangtangra leng-e,
“Iniu paliutu npaobo tingga din champanbo hai thinlujiu,
kadih dambo gasu simatai makbo guse paliu khuga dinkhai rabo-e.”
Jesu niu maidungtu phutkhai lujiu kalunglam ngutboga, pakhommaidungniu pakhuga wangjiu din-e, “Lujamga piumentu din champan khaibo rambase aliu khuga dinkhailo.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Chalin kawibo lingkhaibo mai sira Chamai Nahpiu si-e;
luzam sira kadihpiri haisi-e, kawibo lin sira tinggen dihga tadrabo mai si-e, khatdi piumen sira Kasabo Piu saisui rabo mai si-e.
Piumen lingkhaibo mikremai sira Satan si-e. Atiat ting sira chaken kaloibo si-e, khatdi atiatga changam kam maidung sira mazadung si-e.
Piumendung situ khom madui lujiu chamiga rumibo kumjiu, chaken kaloiboga sise padrabo-e.
Chamai Nahpiu siniu pagu mazadungtu langpadjiu Pawangdih gasu maidungtu nuan-ga jukhaijiu bammai khatdi kasabo tenmai hinatu khom madui lujiu,
taobambo chami jaiga paliutu thon khaimi rabo-e, siga paliu kapjiu paliu hiu n-giatjiu bamrabo-e.
Sichiusai Tingwang maidungse naimik kumjiu paliu Piu wangdih gase benjiu bammi rabo-e. Naliu kuon kabammai hina nking lulo.

“Tinggen gu Chawangdih sira haikumbo-e, mai khatniu chakhiu-chalan baikhai bambo luzam khat daolubo kumbo-e. Paniu haise baikhai lanlujiu, khatdi pachun wijiu, pagu kabambo hina jonlujiu wang luzamse liulude.
“Tinggen gu Chawangdih sira haise kumbo-e. Mai khatniu tiuchang kawibo phiujiu,
paniu paman kakungbose daoluboga, malanwang pagu kabambo hina jonlujiu sibo tiuchangse liulude.
“Tinggen gu Chawangdih sira haise kumbo-e. Chakha minmai siniu paliugu alangse ajaiga thonkhaijiu chakha pajat katam-tambo thonlu-e.
Sichiujiu alangse thonphui luboga paliuniu taphuga jupat lujiu ntaokiu, chakhase mathan-e. Kawibose paliu beng lungga khaimi-e, chiudi kasabo hinase thonmi-e.
Sichiujiu chaken kaloibo gase mazadung siniu tadlujiu kawimai rong gasu kasamai hinatu khom madui lujiu,
taobambo chami jaiga thonkhai mirabo-e. Siga paliu kapjiu paliu-hiu n-giatjiu bammi rabo-e.
Jesu niu paliu khuga maniu-e “Naliuniu haidungse silu dama?”
Paliu niu paokakge, “Yo, Rapiu.”
Sijengniu paniu din-e, “Haibo ramba sira, Tacheng-tajaigu katipaoniu Tinggen gu Chawangdihga khommai khat thiuluboga, chaky npaoniu pagu wakhaiky gasu kasanbodi kaguangbodi ponpadbo kumbo-e.”
Jesu niu din champanbo hai dinloibo sai, sibo bamse phutlujiu,
pakiluang lam wangjiu maduikyga katikhai-e. Siga pacham chiulumai hina paliu suang hajiu din-e. Paliuniu maniu-e, “Haikumbo ningting-tasi hai delamsu pah daolu jiulo?
Pahai tasingsiam kambopiu nahpiuse makma? Papuise Mary makma, maksai Jacob, Joseph, Simon khatdi Judas paliuse pasingnamai makma?
Patanpui maise haiga lungbambo makma? Haise paniu delamsu daolu jiulo?”
Sichiujiu paliuniu patu lukhai makge.
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Phaimiukakung situ parammai nai pakikhunmai mainiu makjiu, pabam hinaga chakhuang thiu-e.”
Palamra paliu malum habo donniu siga paniu tasibo tienkam kengjiu kamkhai makge.
Sibo tingga Galilee gu, mawangpao Herod niu Jesu kendise chiuboga,
paniu pagu chakampaodung khuga din-e, “Pahai pachangjiu John Baptist ringwang lanbo bam sune, sijengniu pakhuga maisuang habo ngam kamra pumtan bambo-e.”
Palamra pakak khatga John Baptist niu Herod khuga din-e, “Nangniu Herodias tu lubo hai maji makge!”
Herod niu patu kamshat nibam tadi, paniu Jehudi maidungtu ping-e, palamra paliuniu John haitu phaimiukakung khatle chiujiu lukhaibo-e.
Herod manabo tingmik gase Herodias nahpuiniu mathiu suangga chalen lenjiu Herod chun kam mawi khai bide.
Siga paniu pakhuga ladriat thiujiu din-e, “Nangniu kakhengbo Iniu natu pikhai bine.”
Papui cham maniu lujiu paniu pakhuga kheng-e, “Tuhoi John Baptist peese danglujiu chakuangga khailujiu haiga ponwanglo!”
Siga chawangse palung chariu mide, chiudi paniu pagiangmai mathiu suangga ladriat thiu khai mibo jengniu sise pikhaira chamtan pikhaide.
Sichiujiu paniu kavangky gasu John peese dangmide.
John peese chakuang khatga khailujiu ponwang aliupui situ pikhai mide, sise paniu papui khuga ponwang pikhai mide.
John pakhommaidung siniu wangjiu paphawse ponwang bai mide, haise paliuniu Jesu khuga wang paokhaide.
Jesu niu John racham hai chiuluboga, sibo bamse phutlujiu aliam tuanglujiu paronna tingjingbo bamga tadmide. Maidungniu sise chiuluboga paliugu namdungtu phutlujiu kadih gasu pasai suitad mide.
Jesu niu aliam gasu npadboga, maidung kakeng situ ngaojiu paliutu lungsabo lungchunniu phuimide, sichiujiu paniu thiuniumai hinatu wikhai bide.

Chawan ramliang wangmiboga pakhommaidung siniu pakhuga wangjiu din-e, “Tuhoira richang-ri mide, khatdi haibo bam hai mai habo bamme. Maidung haitu langkhai milo, sichiusai paliu ronna wangjiu namga katiu liutiu lubui-e.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Paliu tadmakdi sui-e, naliuniu paliu tiura wakhatra pikhai bilo.”
Paliu niu paokakge, “Aliu khuga taruak khuang mangiu nai chakhapek nia ronna bamme.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Sichiu sai sise akhuga luwanglo.”

Sichiujiu maidung situ piuriangliga ntao kiura paniu chamtan pikhai-e. Siga paniu taruak khuang mangiu nai chakhapek niase thinlujiu, tinggen lam ngangkhangjiu, Tingwang tu thuon sude. Paniu taruak khuangse thenpang lujiu pakhommaidungtu pikhaide. Sise pakhommaidung siniu maidung khuga njan khaide.
Mai hina tiu magiu kamlude, sichiujiu tiumali padbose pakhommaidungniu chabeng kariu-je-niakiu khoi madui lanlude.
Siga tiubo maidung riakse npui n-nah jaomakjiu chamai sang mangiu kumbo-e.
Paniu maidungtu phut khai lubo sai, Jesu niu pakhommaidung situ aliam tuanglujiu ajai uigen khatlam tadrai bamniura langkhai mide.
Maidungtu langkhai mibo sai paniu luongbut khatga paronna kakheng thiura khangde. Chawanse Jesu ronna siga bamme.
Tingkai tanbo donniu aliam situ ajaikung gasu hun madiu mide.
Nsuan wanchak sum nai charuk kakga Jesu niu pakhommaidung khuga tadui rigasu tadwang-e.
Paniu tadui riga tadwangbose paliuniu ngaoluboga, paliu ping masa mide. “Haise mahiu-e, chiujiu paliu pingjiu mara sude.
Siga Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Manang tulo. Haise I-ye, pingtulo.”
Siga Peter niu din-e, “Rapiu, pachangjiu haise nang-e sai Iniu nakhuga tadui rigasu wangra chamtan pilo.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Wanglo,” Sijengniu Peter aliam gasu npad lujiu tadui rigasu tadpad sude.
Chiudi tingkai tanbo donniu pase pingsude, siga tadui jiuga malin mira kum suboga paniu senpadle, “Rapiu, atu gukhailo!”
Jesu niu paben henpad patu majap lujiu din-e, “Nagu malum kahabo! Dekamjiu manangsu jiulo?”
Sichiu panai khangniase aliam lungga ngutmide, khatdi siga tingkaise hunta mide.
Siga pakhommaidungniu aliam lung gasu Jesu tu kahum sude. Paliuniu madujiu senpadle, “Pachangjiu nangra Tingwang Nahpiu si-e.”
Paliuniu ajaise kenlujiu Gennesaret luongriangga wangde.
Siga maidungniu Jesu tu silude, sijengniu sibo wonjengga thiuniu bammai hinatu paliuniu Jesu khuga pui wangra langkhaijiu, thiuniu maitu puiwangde.
Paliuniu thiuniu maidungtu pijiu pafai-ri niakhaira kheng-e; sichiujiu niakhaimai hinatu wikhai bide.
Pharisee maidung khangsia nai Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung Jerusalem lamsu Jesu khuga wanglujiu haichiu maniu-e,
“Dekamjiu nakhommaidung siniu aliu paopehniu katikhaibo situ majaimak jiulo? Paliuniu wa tiusu rabo suangga paliu ben ntik makge!”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Dekamjiu naliuniu Tingwang chamtan majai makjiu naliuniu katikhaibo saisui jiulo?
Palamra Tingwang niu din-e, ‘Napui napiutu chakhuang thiulo,’ khatdi ‘Mai khatniu papui nai papiutu siangsai, patu kamshat milo.’
Chiudi naliuniu katikhai-e chiubora mai khatniu papui nai papiu leng kagengbo khat nkhalu buidi, ‘Haise Tingwang gu-e’ chiujiu papui papiutu chakhuang thiu khai makge.
Haichiujiu naliugu katikhaibo situ lukhaira Tingwang chamtantu wajeng chak khai makge.
Naliu, wasao thiumaidung! Isaiah niu naliu lamga din masuang mibose dejiuga majilo!
chiudi paliu lungchun sira akhugasu diu-e.
Paliuniu atu kahum bambo hai pageng ha-e,
palamra paliuniu machalubo jai-ali situ agu tacheng-tajai kumjiu katikhai-e!’”
Sigasu Jesu niu maidung situ pakhuga kuwang lujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Nkingjiu silulo!
Chamai mun gasu ngutbo siniu maitu kam tania makge, chiudi palung lamsu padbo siniu maitu kam taniabo-e.”
Siga pakhommaidungniu pakhuga wangjiu din-e, “Nangniu dinkhaibo gasu Pharisee maidung lung kam mathiu mide chiubo nang sima?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Tinggen lam bambo Apiu niu lingkhai makbo bang hinatu pethonmi rabo-e.
Paliu jengniu manangmi tulo! Paliura pamik tiat maigu pamik tiatbo jupaodung si-e; sichiujiu pamik tiatbo khatniu pamik tiatbo khattu jusai, khangniase chakhomga nkhuang khaimi rabo-e.”
Peter niu din-e, “Haichiu dinbo ramba aliu khuga dinkhailo.”
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliudi maidung suang ningting sonbo makge.
Naliu simak jiuma? Amun gasu ngutbo hinase ai-mpuiga ngut lujiu tamud padmi rabo-e.
Chiudi amun gasu padbo sira palungchun lamsu padbo-e, sichiujiu haisiniu maitu kam taniabo-e.
Palamra lungchun gasu kasabo maning siniu maitu kamshatbo, mainao-mainah kiubo, makha-agabo, aratbo jengdin thiubo khatdi maiken tiabo hai padbo-e.
Haidung siniu naliutu kam tania khaibo-e. Chiudi chaben ntikmakjiu tiubo siniu naliutu kam tania makge.”
Jesu niu sibo bam phutlujiu Tyre nai Sidon namdilam tadmide.

Sibo luongriangga lungbambo Canaan maipui khat pakhuga wang-e. Paniu kapjiu din-e, “Paohubo, David Nahpiu yo, atu lungsa khailo! Anahpui khuga rasa bambo donniu pahai magenthiu-chang magenthiu bamme.”
Chiudi Jesu niu patu wadi kenkak khai makge, siga pakhommai siniu pakhuga wanglujiu kheng-e, “Patu hai langkhai milo! Pahai aliu sai suilujiu sentad kinbo-e.”
Siga Jesu niu paokakge, “Atu langkhaibo sira, hamibo Israel maigu milydung leng ronna-e.”
Haichiu bamga sinapui siniu wanglujiu paphiga makhum kiujiu din-e, “Paohubo, atu nkha khailo!”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Nahmaidung kuangtekse sutlujiu tathitu pibo pajai makge.”
Paniu paokakge, “Paohubo, sise maji-e, chiudi papaodungniu tiutao kiubose tathiniu khoitiu-e.”
Siga Jesu niu patu paokakge, “Nangra nagu malum kadibo pui-e! Nangniu lunibose nakhuga padmi sulo.” Sichiujiu sibo wan siakga panahpuise wimide.
Jesu niu sibo bam phutlujiu Galilee Ajai munglam tadmide. Paniu luongbut khatga khanglujiu ntao bamme.
Maidung kakeng siniu pakhuga paphi tangmai, pamik tiatmai, paben tangmai, palad padmakmai khatdi katam-tambo thiuniubo maidungtu puiwang khaide, sichiujiu paniu paliutu wikhai bide.
Maidungse palad padlak mainiu npao mibo, paben tangmainiu wimibo, paphi tangmainiu tadmibo, pamik tiatmainiu ngaomiboga paliu suang hamide, sichiujiu paliuniu Israel maigu Tingwang situ thuonde.

Jesu niu pakhommaidungtu pakhuga kuwang lujiu din-e, “Iniu haibo maidung jengniu alung makge, palamra paliu hai akhuga jengsum bamkhang mide, sichiujiu tuhoira paliu wadi tiuraleng hamide. Iniu paliutu mariujiu phutkhai mira alung makge, paliu npuiga mariujiu maliumibo sui-e.”
Khommaidung siniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Delamsu haibo ramjingga maidung haijiuga leng aliuniu katiu daolu ralo?”
Jesu niu maniu-e, “Naliu khuga taruak khuang dejiu bamlo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Taruak khuang chinnia nai chakhapek tamnakha bamme.”
Sijengniu Jesu niu maidung situ kadihga ntao kiura chamtan pikhaide.
Sichiujiu paniu taruak khuang chinnia nai chakhase thinlujiu Tingwang tu thuonkiu khaide, khatdi kampang lujiu pakhommaidung khuga pikhaide, sichiujiu pakhommaidung siniu maidung leng njan khaide.
Paliu mathiu tiujiu magiukam lude. Sigasu pakhommaidungniu tiumali padbose chabeng chinnia khoi madui lude.
Siga wa tiumaidungse npui, n-nahtu chakmakjiu chamai sang madai-e.
Sigasu Jesu niu maidung situ phutkhai lujiu, aliam lungga ngutlujiu, Magadan luongriang lam tadmide.
Chiudi Jesu niu paokakge, “Chawan ramliang tingka thao maren misai, ‘ting wimi rabo-e,’ chiujiu naliuniu din-e.
Khatdi nsuan tingbang lamse heng-mangjiu muangjiu thisai, ‘thainai ting sane,’ chiujiu naliuniu din-e. Naliuniu tingwan kawi kasa matad lu-e. Chiudi pating pawan madan tura singam lakge!
Tuhoi ken-ga lungbo maidung hai dejiukha salo, khatdi charatu simaklo! Naliuniu akhuga maisuang kahabo madan khengjiu ma? Makge, Jonah gu madan makjiu kakibo madan pikhai lakge.”
Sichiujiu paniu paliutu phutkhai lujiu tadmide.
Khommaidungse ajai uigen khatlam kenpadboga, paliuniu taruak phung mangai mide.
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Pharisee maidung nai Sadducee maidunggu chakhi situ naliu marisi lulo.”
Siga paliu karai arijiu din-e, “Oh, aliuniu taruak phungmakbo donniu haise paniu dinbo-e.”
Paliuniu din bambose Jesu niu silujiu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Dekamjiu naliuniu taruak kahabo jengniu naliu karai aribam jiulo? Naliugu malumse dejiukha siamlo!
Naliu wadi simak jiuma? Iniu taruak khuang mangiu kampang lujiu chamai sang mangiu leng pikhaibo situ, naliu maningtao mak jiuma? Naliuniu chabeng dejiu khoiphui lulo?
Khatdi taruak khuang chinniase chamai sang madaileng pikhaibose dechiulo? Naliuniu chabeng dejiu khoiphui lulo?
Iniu taruak lamga dinbo makge chiubo naliu simakbo hai dekumbo gulo? Sijengniu Pharisee maidung nai Sadducee maidunggu chakhi situ naliu marisi lulo!”
Sigasu paniu paliutu rubambo hai taruakgu chakhi makjiu Pharisee maidung nai Sadducee maidunggu katikhaibo lamga phuisira dinbo-e chiubo pakhommaidung siniu silude.
Jesu niu Caesarea Philippi luongriang namdilam tadlujiu, paniu pakhommaidung khuga maniu-e, “Maidungniu Chamai Nahpiu situ sao-e chiu dinlo?”
Paniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Naliuniu atu sao-e chiujiu lukhailo?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “John nahpiu Simon yo, nasan wi-e! Palamra majibo haise tazaipumniu makjiu tinggen lam bambo Apiuniu nakhuga madukhai bibo-e.
Sichiujiu Peter, Iniu nakhuga pachang paling dinbo-e, nang hai tudi si-e, sichiujiu haibo tudi riga Iniu agu phumling thiu khaine, sichiujiu kashaibo siniu wadaodi haisitu ngam lakge.
Iniu tinggen gu Chawangdihgu khamtense nakhuga pikhaine; sichiujiu nangniu kadihpiriga khambose tinggen lamdi khamne, khatdi nangniu kadihriga suikhaibose tinggen lamdi suikhai bine.”
Sichiujiu pahai Khrista si-e chiubo mai khat khugadi dintulo, chiujiu Jesu niu pakhommaidung khuga chamtan pikhaide.

Sigasu Jesu niu pakhommaidung khuga masanjiu din-e, “Iniu Jerusalem lam tadrabo-e, sichiujiu kating maidung, singku paodung, khatdi Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung khugasu I magenthiu-chariubo khengrabo-e. Atu kamshat mine, chiudi pasumbo nai I ringsulan rabo-e.”
Peter niu patu puipad mali lujiu rukhai-e. Paniu din-e, “Rapiu yo, sise wadaodi pad kaniubo-e. Tingwang niu sise suimakge.”
Jesu niu Peter khulam mariwang lujiu din-e, “Satan, akhugasu tadmilo! Nang hai agu puitadga aphi masui raleng-e, palamra nangniu maningbo hai Tingwang khugasu makjiu chamaina khugasu-e.”
Palamra paringting ranlu kani maise hamira-e, chiudi mai khatniu adon jengniu pagu ringting hakhai misai paniu daolu rabo-e.
Mai khatniu kadihpiri pakhiangna daolujiu, paringting hamisai degu kagengbo bamlo? Pagu ringtingtu nkhiak lurabo wadi ha-e.
Palamra Chamai Nahpiu siniu Papiugu kendiga pagu mazadungtu maluang lujiu, mai hina ngamkam saisuijiu tathuon piraleng wangrabo-e.
Iniu naliu khuga pachangsiak dinbo-e chiubora Chamai Nahpiu siniu Chawang kumjiu kiu makthen shaimak ramai khangsia haiga bamme.”
Jeng charukbo saiga Jesu niu Peter khatdi Jacob nai pasingna John tu majang lujiu maluong kakubo khatga khangde.
Sichiujiu paliuniu phuijiu bamboga Jesu lunli sude; pazuse naimik biu kum mide, khatdi pafai-pani hai kapuangjiu kabun kum mide.
Siga khommai khang sum siniu Mose nai Elijah niu Jesu tu wang npao bambo ngaode.
Sijengniu Peter niu Jesu khuga din-e, “Rapiu, aliuniu haiga bambo hai dejiuga wilo! Nangniu suikhaisai, Iniu naleng khat, Mose leng khat, khatdi Elijah leng khat chiujiu mathenky sum thiu khaine.”
Khommaidung siniu chakhuanse chiuboga pingjiu kadihga paliu zu makhumkiu kam mide.
Jesu niu paliu khuga wanglujiu paliutu kaba khaijiu din-e, “Sulo, pingtulo!”
Siga paliuniu ngangsu phuiboga Jesu ronna makjiu mai khattudi ngao makge.
Sichiujiu paliuniu maluong gasu kiulanboga, Jesu niu paliutu chamtan pi-e, “Naliuniu ngaolubo madungao lamga hai, Chamai Nahpiu siniu kashaibo gasu ringsulan makthen mai khat khugadi dintulo.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Pachang siakjiu Elijah niu wangraijiu, paniu wahina kaden khai rabo-e.

Chiudi Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, chiubora Elijah wang mibo-e, chiudi maidungniu patu silu makge, chiudi paliu chunning thiujiu patu kamkhai kamigu-e. Sikum gapjiu paliuniu Chamai Nahpiu tudi kamkhai rabo-e.”
Siga paniu dinbambo hai John Baptist lamga-e chiubo pakhommaidung siniu silude.
Paliuniu maidung khulam wanglanboga, maipiu khatniu Jesu masuangga wang khudung kiujiu din-e,
“Paohubo yo, anahtu lungsa khailo! Pahai chakhuira phungjiu, tadui-chami jiuga jongkhai khaijiu kinbo-e.
Iniu patu nakhommaidung khuga maluong wangbo-e, chiudi paliuniu wikhai ngam makge.”
Siga Jesu niu paokakge, “Naliu hai dejiuga malummak mailo, khatdi kamao mailo! Iniu naliutu dethengga maluong bam ralo? Sibo nahtu haiga maluong wanglo!”
Jesu niu rasa situ chamtan pikhaiboga, sibo nah khugasu pad mide, khatdi sibo wansiakga pase wimide.
Siga pakhommaidung siniu mahin Jesu khuga wang lujiu maniu-e, “Aliuniu dekamjiu rasa situ hathon ngamlak jiulo?”
Khommaidung mathiu Galilee ga wang madui bamboga, Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Chamaina Nahpiu situ maidung ben-ga pikhaijiu, paliuniu patu kamshat mirabo-e.
Chiudi pasumbo naise pah ringsu lanmi rabo-e.”
Khommaidungse paliu chun sasui mide.
Peter niu din-e, “Pimaksai dechiu ralo!”
Peter niu kalunglam ngutboga Jesu niu raijiu din-e, “Simon, nang degu maninglo? Haibo kadihpiri gu wangdungtu saoniu ramkhadung maksai chaphijeng hai pijiulo? Parammai niuma maksai sangdiumai niulo?”
Peter niu paokakge, “Sangdiumai niu-e!”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Sichiusai, wi-e, pamaidungra pimak rabo-e.

Chiudi maidung situ aliuniu kamkiam khaini makge. Sijengniu ajaiga tadlujiu khakhoi julo. Nangniu raithubo kamlubo chakha mun-ga rangkang khat dao sune. Sise anai damleng builu rabo-e. Sise khoilujiu paliu khuga aniagu ramkhaleng pimilo.”
Sijengniu nahmai khattu kulujiu paliu masuangga pichap khailujiu din-e,
“Iniu naliu khuga pachangsiak dinbo-e, chiubora naliuniu nahmaidung kumjiu lungliwang makthen, wakamdi tinggen gu Chawangdihga ngutlu lakge.
Tinggen gu Chawangdihga dithubo mai thiuni sai paronna patu kam manon lujiu, haibo nahmai kum lulo.
Sichiujiu mai khatniu haikumbo nahmai khattu chamtan gasu lukhaisai atu lukhaibo-e.
“Mai khatniu atu malumbo nahmai khattu nuan-ga jukhai sai pawongchengga tatupen khinkhai lujiu duipuiga thonkhai miboniu paleng wi-nkiu rabo-e.
Nuan-ga jukhaira kadihpiriga kengjiu bambo jengniu maning kam lakge! Palamra haise padjiu bamrabo-e, chiudi mai khattu nuan-ga jukhai maise san sa-nkiu-e!
Sichiujiu namikniu nagu malumse kam maha bamsai ladthon milo. Namik nia bamlujiu charuidihga thonkhai mirabo suang namik khat ronna karingboga ngutbo siniu wi nkiu-e.
“Naliuniu haikumbo nahmai khattu mala makra phuilulo. Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, tinggen lam paliugu mazadungse tinggen lam bambo Apiu khuga bamtan tanbo-e.
“Mai khatniu pagu mily kai khat bambo gasu, khat hamisai paniu degu kamralo chiubo naliu maninglo? Paniu riak-chakiu-je-chakiu situ phutlujiu hamibo mily khat situ phiutad rabo-e.
Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, paniu daolan luboga, kabambo riak-chakiu-je-chakiu situ suang hamibo mily khatse daoluboga pachun wi-nkiu rabo-e.
Sise kumgapjiu tinggen lam bambo naliu Piu siniu haibo nahmaidung khat tudi pi hamini makge.
Chiudi paniu naladse suikhai maksai, masanbo ariakniu dinbo kumjiu, napam khang khat, maksai khang niatu maluong lujiu jengdin thiura maluong tadlo.

Sichiudi paniu paliu ladtu nking khai maksai, pakhiangna haise phumlingga dinkhailo. Kanam thuboga paniu phumling ladtu suikhai maksai, patuse malummak mai maksai tacheng majaimak mai khattu kumjiu lukhai milo.
“Khatdi Iniu naliu khuga dinsan lanbo-e: kadihpiriga naliu khang nianiu chunjon lujiu walam khatga khengsai, tinggen lam bambo Apiuniu naliu khuga pikhai birabo-e.
Palamra khang nia khang sumniu chamtan-ga wang aruangboga, paliu ruangga I bamme.”
Palamra tinggen gu Chawangdih sira haikumbo-e. Pakak khatga chawang khatniu pavangdunggu tachak ariakkhuang situ phuira chap khaide.
Paniu phuisu gapboga, khang khatra pagu chapawse rangkang sang kariu phungbam niude.
Sibo kavang siniu sibo pawse rui ngamlak mide, sijengniu chawang siniu chamtan pi-e, “Nanao-nanah, nagu kabambo hina jonlujiu apawse ruisulo.
Chiudi kavang siniu chawang masuangga khudung kiujiu kheng-e, ‘Atu lungsa khailo, Iniu pakhiangna ruira kam rabo-e.’
Siga chawang siniu patu lungsajiu papawse kuak khai bijiu patu pitad khai mide.
“Sinapiu siniu tadpadboga pakapiu khatniu pagu rangkang kai khat phungbambo piutu daode. Paniu patu pawangkining katunman lujiu din-e, ‘Nangniu agu chapaw phung bambose ruisulo!’
Pakapiu siniu makhumkiujiu pakhuga kheng-e, ‘Atu lungsa khailo, Iniu nagu pakhiangnase ruira kam rabo-e!”
Chiudi paniu suimakge, sichiujiu paniu papawse ruilan makthen patu kavangkyga khai mide.
Haise kavang kakimainiu ngaoboga paliu lung makjiu wang chawang khuga pakhiangnase paokhaide.
Sichiujiu paniu kavangpiu situ kuwang lujiu din-e, ‘Kasabo vangpiu yo, nangniu khengbo jengniu agu chapaw nangniu phung bambo hinase Iniu kuak khai mibo-e.
Iniu natu lungsa khaibo kumjiu nangdi nakapiutu lungsa khai lubui-e.’
Chawangse palung pomchang pomjiu, paniu papawse ruiloi makthen patu mathadjiu bamra kavangkyga khai mide.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu munkom khai-e, “Sise kumjiu naliuniu naliu lungchun gasu naliu singnatu kuak khai maksai, tinggen lam bambo Apiu niudi naliutu kuak khaibi lakge.”
Jesu niu haidungse dinlubo saiga, paniu Galilee phutlujiu Judaea ramluong Jordan Giu uigen khat lamse tadmide.
Chamai mendi khatniu pasai suitad kimme, siga paniu paliutu wikhai bide.
Pharisee maidung khangsianiu pakhuga wanglujiu patu madiujiu maniu-e. “Aliugu Tacheng-tajaiga mai khatniu kasuibo lam bamsai panaotu tabo suima?”
Sichiujiu Tingwang niu din-e, “Haijengniu npiumai siniu papui papiutu phutlujiu panao nai aruanglujiu, panaise khat thiumi rabo-e.’
Sijengniu panai khangniase nia makjiu, khat thiumibo-e. Siniu Tingwang niu thamthui khai mibose chamainiu kam npekmi mak rabo-e.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Mose niu tanao tabo sui-e, chiubo sira naliu lung tanjubo donniu-e. Sichiudi gandam karaigara sichiubo makge.
Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, mai khatniu makhabo jengniu makjiu panao talujiu kakimaitu panao kulansai, pase makhamibo-e.” Khatdi tapadbo puitu lumaise mainao kiubo-e.
Pakhommaidung siniu pakhuga din-e, “Maipui khat nai maipiu khat kakga sichiu-e sai, mai khatniu panao thiumakbo siniu widiang sune.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Haise mai hina leng makge, chiudi Tingwang niu pumtan pikhaibo maileng ronna-e.

Maidungniu tanao thiu ngamlakbo palam kengjiu bamme: khangsianiu papui mana-gasu papum kashaimai bamme, khangsiara chamainiu kasiam lubo mai bamme, khatdi khangsiara Tinggen chawangdih jengniu tanao-tanah thiumakbo mai bamme. Haise majai ngam mainiu majai lulo.”
Maidung khangsianiu nahmaidungtu Jesu khuga puiwangjiu, paliu pi kaba khaijiu, kakheng thiu khaira puiwang-e, chiudi pakhommaidung siniu paliutu suimakjiu rukhaide.
Siga Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Nahmaidungtu khammi tulo, pijiu paliutu akhulam wangkhailo, delosai tinggen gu Chawangdihse haikumbo nahmaidung gu-e.”
Sichiujiu paniu paliu riga paben kabakhai bijiu tadmide.
Pawan khatga, Jesu khuga mai khat wangjiu din-e, “Kawibo katipao yo, tingtheng karingbo daolura Iniu degu kawibo kamralo? chiujiu maniu-e.”
Jesu niu patu paokakge, “Nangniu nde kamjiu akhuga kawibo lamga maniu jiulo? Kawibo sira khat ronna-e, sise Tingwang-ye. Chiudi nangniu tingtheng karingbose daoni sai chamtandungse majai lulo.”
Siga Jesu niu paokakge, “Maitu gitulo, makha mane, aga mane, arat mane;
napui napiutu chakhuang thiulo, khatdi nakiningmaitu napum kumjiu lungsalo.”
Siga chabonmai siniu paokakge, “Sise Iniu majai kam kinbo-e. Iniu degu kamsan ralo?”

Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Nangniu witathui lunisai, wangjiu nagu kabambo hina jonlujiu, lungkalak maitu pikhai milo, sichiusai nangniu tinggen Dihga chakhiu-chalan kengjiu daolu rabo-e, khatdi wangjiu asai suilulo.”
Sibo chamse chiuboga, chabonmaise pachun sajiu tadmide. Palamra pahai kalekwi-chang wimai-e.
Siga Jesu niu pakhommaidung khuga din-e, “Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, kalekwi mainiu tinggen gu Chawangdihga ngut raleng kung-e.
Iniu dinlanbo-e, kalekwi mainiu tinggen gu Chawangdihga ngutrabo suang, qontraoniu npin niukiga buang ngutbo siniu mala diang-e.”
Khommaidungniu haise chiuluboga paliu chun thiu silak mide. Sichiujiu paliuniu maniu-e, “Chiusai, saokum mainiu ranlubose ngaoralo?”
Jesu paliutu mating phuilujiu paokakge, “Chamaina niura haise wadaodi kamlu lakge, chiudi Tingwang lengra wadi kamlu lakbo ha-e.”
Siga Peter niu din-e, “Phuilo, aliura wahina phutlujiu nasai suitad kinbo-e. Aliuniu degu dao ralo?”
Sichiujiu mai khatniu ajeng gasu paky, palu, maksai pasingna, patanmai, maksai papui, papiu, maksai panao, panah maitu phutkhai misai, dam kai sanjiu daorabo-e, khatdi tingtheng ringbose daorabo-e.
Sichiujiu tuhoi raijiu bambo mai kakengniu nami rabo-e, khatdi tuhoi najiu bambo mai kakengniu raimi rabo-e.
“Tinggen gu Chawangdih haira mai khatniu nsuan sujiu pagu mumsirengga mengra tajeng kukhaibo kumbo-e.
Sichiujiu naikhat phijeng rangkang khat leng suijiu pajengmaitu mumsirengga langkhaide.
Pasaidi pa wanchak chakiu tingga senkiga tadpad lujiu maidung matha chapbambo ngaode.
Siniu paliu khuga din-e, ‘Naliudi agu mumsirengga menglo chiusai Iniu naliu phijeng kabuibo pikhai bine,’ siga paliu mengde.
Pasaidi paniu wanchak kariu nia khatdi sum tingga tadpad lujiu sikumjiu kulande.
Khatdi wanchak mangiu wan gadi tadpadboga khangsiamai matha chapbam niubo ngaolujiu paliu khuga din-e, ‘Naliuniu haiga n-nien marinpuiting wadi kammakjiu dekamjiu chapbam gulo?’
Paliuniu pakhuga din-e, ‘Mai khatniudi aliutu tajeng lankhai makge,’ Siga paniu paliu khuga din-e, ‘Naliudi agu mumsirengga menglo.’
Siga wanchak mangiu tingga mengmaidung siniu rangkang khat-khat daolude.
Siga meng karaimai siniu daomakeng sune chiu maning bamniu-e, chiudi paliu mai hina rangkang khat-khat dao kamme.
Siga paliuniu paliu phijengse daolubo sai papaopiu situ suini makjiu dinsude.
Paliura meng kanamjiu, wanchak khat ronna tatien thiubo-e, chiudi aliura marinpuiting tingcheng kathiubo lengjiu, kamjing khaibo aliu phijeng nai paliu phijeng dechiu ncham jiulo!
Siga papao siniu paliu ruangga mai khat khuga din-e, ‘Akabo yo, Iniu naliu mai khattudi sonbo makge, naliuniu rangkang khatleng suikhai mibo-e.
Nagu khoilujiu tadsulo, nakhuga pikhaibo kumjiu Iniu hainapiu leng pikhaira achun-e.
Iniu agu rangkang hai achun kamjiu thinra pathao mak jiuma? Maksai Iniu alung dibo jengniu atu naliu manma jiuma?
Jesu niu Jerusalem khangboga pakhommai khang kariu-je-nia situ majang npuikiga tamlujiu paliu khuga din-e.
“Phuilo, aliuniu Jerusalem lam tadkhang kin-e, siga Chamai Nahpiu situ singku paodung nai Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung ben-ga pikhaimi rabo-e, siga paliuniu patu ladjan thiujiu kamshatmi rabo-e,
sichiujiu patu nuimenjiu, dap-lekjiu khatdi singchaiga masengshat mira Nkengmai ben-ga pikhaimi rabo-e, chiudi pasumbo nai pah ringsulan rabo-e.”
Zebedee naoniu panah kaniatu majang lujiu wang, Jesu khuga panaileng wakhat kam khaira makhum kiujiu kheng-e.
“Nang degu luni jiulo?” chiujiu Jesu niu maniu-e.
Sibo puiniu pakhuga din-e, “Nawang kadihga nang wangbo nai, anah kania haitu khangkhatniu, naben majatlam, khatniu naben mawilam pijiu ntao khaira akhuga ladriat thiu khailo.”
Siga Jesu niu panah kania khuga din-e, “Naliuniu khengbambose naliu simakge. Iniu sakra kaden khai bambo piangse nanai sak ngamlu buima?
Panainiu paokakge, “Yo, sakngam lubui-e.”
Jesu niu panai khuga din-e, “Apiang gasu nanainiu sak ngamlu sune, chiudi aben majadlam maksai mawilam ntao rabo sira Iniu pingam lakge. Haise Apiuniu pikhai raleng kaden khaibo maileng pirabo-e.”
Haise katambo khang kariu siniu siluboga, sibo singna kania riga paliu lung amanta mide.
Siga Jesu niu paliutu kumadui lujiu din-e, “Nkengmaira paliugu mawangpaodung siniu paliu riga papao thiu-e; khatdi jupaodung siniu paliu riga papao thiujiu pumtan thin-e, chiubo naliuniu si-e.
Sichiudi naliu rong gara sichiu mak rabo-e, chiudi naliu ruangga dithubo thiunimai, paniu mathiutu macha rabo-e,
khatdi naliu ruangga raithubo thiunimai, paniu mathiu vang thiu rabo-e.
Chamai Nahpiu sidi mainiu patu macha khaira makjiu, paniu maitu macha khaira, khatdi mai kakengtu papum pipadjiu rankhaira wangbo-e.”
Jesu nai pakhommaidung siniu Jericho phutlujiu tadpadboga chamai mendi suiwang-e.
Siga pamik tiatmai khangnia npui mungga ntao bamme. Panainiu Jesu wangkinbo khuan chiuluboga senjiu din-e. “Oh Paohubo, David Nahpiu yo! Anaitu lungsa khailo!”
Maidung siniu panaitu maliu tulo chiujiu ru-e. Chiudi panai khuan tanliang liangjiu sen-e, “Oh, Paohubo, David Nahpiu yo! Anaitu lungsa khailo.”
Siga Jesu niu chapkhuan lujiu panai khuga din-e. “Nanaileng Iniu degu kamkhaira nanai luni jiulo?”
Panainiu paokakge, “Paohubo yo, anai mik pi ngao khailo”.
Jesu niu panaitu lungsajiu panai mikse dikhai bide, siga panai mikse ngaonuang mide, sichiujiu panaise pasai suitad mide.
Jesu nai pakhommai siniu Jerusalem wang mana suboga, khatdi Olive luang Bethphage ga wangtangboga, Jesu niu pakhommai khangniatu langkhaide.
Sichiujiu panai khuga din-e, “Nanai masuangga bambo namga tadsulo, siga nanai nguttang gapsai qonniam papui papoi khinbambo ngao sune, sise khilujiu akhuga juwanglo.
Siga mai khatniu nanai khuga chalad maniusai, haichiu dinlo, ‘Papaopiu niu haibo khouna situ pageng bamjiu-e,’ chiusai paniu khouna situ gao tadra suikhaibi rabo-e.”
Haise phaimiukakung siniu dinkhai mibose wangtang raleng-e:
Phuilo, naliu wangpiuse qonniam tuanglujiu wangkin-e.
Para palung manonjiu qonniampoi tuanglujiu wangkin-e.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu dinkhaibose pakhommaidung siniu tadlujiu kamkhai bide.
Paliuniu qonniam nai papoise juwang, sibo riga chafai thapkhai lujiu siga Jesu tu pijiu tongkhaide.
Chamai mendi siniu paliu faise npuiga thapkhaide, khatdi maidung khangsianiu kadanniu hiaklujiu npuiga thapkhaide.
Sichiujiu chamai mendi pasai-pasuang tadmai siniu sensude, “David Nahpiu tu thuonlo! Rapiu zan-ga wangbo maituse Tingwang niu thoikhai bilo! Hosanna! Tingwang tu thuonlo!”
Sichiujiu paniu Jerusalem ngutboga namdi pakhiangna chakhuan kariophui mide. Siga maidung siniu maniu-e, “Haise saolo?”
Siga maidungniu din-e, “Haise Galilee ga bambo Nazareth mai phaimiukakung Jesu si-e.”
Jesu niu charaky lungga ngutlujiu palungga, alijiu bammaitu hathon sude. Sichiujiu rangkang nkhiak bammai khatdi kaphina jonjiu bammai kuangkaise tun-kao marakhaide.

Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Haichiujiu Masanbo ariakga raokhai bamme, ‘Naliuniu Agu Kahumboky haitu kakheng thiubo ky pithiu khai rabo-e,’ chiudi naliuniu haisitu agatiumai nbaibam pijiu thiukhai mide.”
Sichiujiu Charaky lunggase pamik tiatmai khatdi paphi tangmai wangbo situ paniu wikhai bide.

Jesu niu maisuang habo kamjiu bambo khatdi nahmaidung siniu, ‘David Nahpiutu thuonlo!’ chiujiu Charaky lungga senbambo khuanse chiulujiu singku paodung khatdi Tacheng-tajai gu katipaodungse paliu lung pom mide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu Jesu khuga din-e, “Paliuniu chakhuan kam kariojiu bambo hai nang chiuma?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Yo, I si bamme. ‘Pamnahdung nai nahmaidung siniu tathuijiu thuon lura nangniu katikhai mide,’ chiujiu raokhai bambose naliuniu kentao mak jiuma?”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu sibo namdi gasu paliutu saodiak lujiu Bethany lam wang bamkhai mide.
Pasaibo nai nsuan paniu namdiga malan wangboga pawon mariu mide.

Npui mungga ndutbang khat ngaolujiu tadmeng phuiboga, paniu ronna bamniujiu wakhatdi daolu makge. Siga paniu sibo bang khuga din-e, “Nangra wadaodi narasy masita mirabo-e!” Siga ndutbangse aguinong mide.
Pakhommainiu haise ngaolujiu paliu suang hajiu din-e, “Dechiujiu haibo ndutbang hai aguinong mijiulo?”
Naliuniu malum siakjiu wakhat khengsai, sise daolu rabo-e.”

Jesu niu Charakyga ngutlujiu maitu katikhaijiu bamboga, singku paodung nai apaimaidung siniu pakhuga wangjiu maniu-e, “Nangniu haikumbo kamra nagu maji dega bamjiulo? Saoniu haibo pumtan hai natu pikhai jiulo?”
Jesu niu paliutu paokakge, “Idi naliu khuga wakhat maniune, naliuniu sise akhuga dinkhai sai, Iniu degu pumtan thinjiu haidungse kamjiulo chiubo dinbine.
John niu tadui nphumbo hai delamniu wangbo gulo? Tingwang khuga suma, maksai chamai khuga niulo?”
Siga paliu ronna ari sude, “Aliuniu degu dinralo? Aliuniu ‘Tingwang khuga sude’ chiusai, naliuniu nde kamjiu patu malum makjiulo? chiu dinrabo-e.
Chiudi aliuniu ‘Pahai chamai khugasu-e’ chiu dinsai, aliuniu maidungtu ping-e. Palamra mai hina John tu phaimiukakung khatle chiu lukhai-e.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu Jesu tu paokakge, “Aliu simakge!”
Siga paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Idi degu pumtanniu haidungse kamjiulo chiubo naliu khuga dinlakge.”
“Tuhoira naliuniu dechiu maninglo? Maipiu khat panah npiumai khangnia bamme. Paniu katingpiu khuga wangjiu din-e, ‘Anayo, nang thainai agu mumsirengga meng changam kamkhailo.’
Siga paniu paokakge, ‘I mengdao lakge’, chiudi pasai palung lilujiu paniu mengde.
Siga paniu panah nabopiu khuga wanglujiu sise kumjiu din-e. Siga paniu papiu khuga din-e, ‘Yo, I mengne’, chiudi para mengmak tade.
Haina kania ruangga saoniu papiu cham majailo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Katingbo piu siniu-e.”
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e: ramkha khamaidung nai papum kajonpuidung siniu naliu masuang tinggen gu Chawangdihga tadrai mirabo-e.

Palamra John niu naliu khuga tacheng madtipbo npui lenkhai mide, chiudi naliuniu patu malum makge. Chiudi ramkha khamaidung nai papum kajonpuidung siniu patu malum khaide. Naliuniu haise ngaolu tadi, naliu lung limakjiu patu malum khai makge.
Sichiujiu atiat tingse wangtang miboga papao siniu padamse lura pavangmaitu langkhaide.
Siga kareng tenbo mai siniu paliutu minlujiu, khang- khattu dapkhai bide, khangkhattu kamshat mide, khatdi khangkhattu tatuniu rotshat mide.
Pasaidi papaopiu siniu karaibo suang kengjiu pavangmaitu langkhai lande. Sigadi paliuniu paliutu sikumjiu kam khaide.
Siniu kanam thuboga, panahpiu tura paliuniu chakhuang thiusune chiu maningjiu paniu paliu khuga langkhaide.
Chiudi kareng tenmai siniu panahtu ngao lujiu, paliu ronna din-e, ‘Haise palek lurabo piu si-e, aliuniu patu kamshat mikhe, khatdi pagu maniase sut lukhe!’
Sichiujiu paliuniu patu minlujiu kareng lenlam jupat kamshat mide.
“Sichiusai papaopiu siniu wangjiu, kareng tenmaidung situ degu kamsu ralo?” chiujiu Jesu niu maniu-e.
Paliuniu paokakge, “Paniu sibo kasamaidung situ kamshat mirabo-e, khatdi karengse tenlujiu pating siakga atiat lujiu padamse paleng pikhai lubuimai khuga pikhaimi rabo-e.”
Chaky thiumainiu pageng ha-e chiujiu thonpad mibo tukang siniu
kungthubo kamik-tiangse thiurabo-e.
Haise Rapiu niu kamkhaibo-e;
haise maji-e, dejiukha maisuang habo gulo!’
Sijengniu I naliu khuga dinbo-e, “Tingwang gu Chawangdihse naliu khugasu lupad lujiu pasy masi lubuimai jat khuga pikhaimi rabo-e.”
Sibo tukang riga mai khatniu kaokhai sai pangtap tapmi rabo-e; khatdi mai khat riga sibo tukangse nkaikiu sai, pase tabui mawimi rabo-e.
Jesu gu din champanbo hai, paliutu dinbo-e chiubo singkupaodung nai Pharisee maidung siniu silude.
Sijengniu, patu minra paliuniu kamsude. Chiudi maidung siniu Jesu hai phaimiukakung khatle chiujiu lukhaibo donniu, paliuniu maidungtu ping-e.
Jesu niu paliu khuga din champanbo khat dinlan-e.
“Tinggen gu Chawangdihse haikumbo-e. Pawan khatga chawang khatniu panah nao thiura magiangbo ngee leng kaden khaide.
Magiangbo ngeega wangra masuang kukhai mibo maidungtu kura pavangmaitu langkhaide, chiudi paliu wangni mak mide.
Pasaidi, paniu pavang kakimaitu langkhaijiu din-e, “Phuilo, Iniu katiu kadenloi lude; siniu agu magiangbo ngeega wang khailo chiujiu langkhaide!’
Chiudi maidungse wangkhai makge, sichiujiu patien-tien lam tadkam mide; mai khatniu palu mengmi, mai khatniu alira tadmi,
khangsianiu pavangdung situ minlujiu, khangsiatu lekkhai bide, khangsiatu kamshat mide.
Siga chawangse palung pomchang pommide khatdi pagu riphenmaitu langkhaijiu, simaitu kam maha lujiu, paliu namdise ruthon mide.
Khatdi paniu pavangmai khangsia khuga din-e, ‘Magiangbo ngee hai kadenloi mide; chiudi kukhai maise wang makge.
Siniu naliu tadlujiu puidiga chamai kangaomai hinatu magiangbo ngeega puiwanglo.’
Sichiujiu pavangmai siniu puidiga tadlujiu, kawi-kasa rimakjiu kangao hinatu magiangbo ngeega kuwang phui khaide.
“Chawang siniu pagiangmai situ phuira ngutbo tingga, magiangbo fai-ni piumakbo mai khattu ngaode.
Siga chawang siniu pakhuga maniu-e, ‘Akabo yo, nang magiangbo fai-ni piumakge, dechiujiu haiga ngutbam jiulo?’ Siga pah wadinra hamide.
Siga chawang siniu pavangmai khuga din-e, ‘Padlujiu hainatu paphi-paben ratlujiu tamiubo kama lenlam thonkhai milo, siga pah kapjiu pahiu n-getjiu bammi rabo-e.’”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu munkom khai-e, “Kukhai maira keng-e, chiudi kadalu maira tamme.”
Sibosai Pharisee maidung wangjiu pakhuga wa maniujiu pagu chamkak gasu patu minra kamde.

Sichiujiu paliuniu Jesu khuga Herod rupmai nai paliu khommai khangsiatu langkhai-e. Paliuniu din-e, “Katipao yo, nangra majibo katikhai-e chiubo aliuniu si-e. Nangra mai khattudi pingmakjiu Tingwang chunningse majijiu maitu katikhai-e, palamra nakhuga chamiu mareng thiubo ha-e.
Siniu nalungchun dinkhailo? Aliuniu ramkhase Rom mai Wangdipiutu pirama, pimak ralo?”
Chiudi Jesu niu paliu maning kasabose silujiu din-e, “Kawijai thiubo mai naliuniu dekamra atu madiu jiulo?
Ramkhagu rangkanggise atu khoilenlo.”
Siga paliuniu rangkanggise pakhuga khoiwang bide.
Siga paniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Haise sao menglo, khatdi sao zanlo?”
Paliu niu pakhuga din-e, “Wangdipiu gu-e.”
Siga Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Wangdipiu guse Wangdipiu leng pimilo, khatdi Tingwang guse Tingwang leng pimilo.”
Sibo chamse paliuniu chiuluboga, paliu suang hajiu patu saodiak lujiu tadmide.
“Katipao yo, Mose niu din-e, mai khatniu panah lungmakjiu shaimi sai, pasai kariupiu siniu kamipui situ madiulujiu pi pachi nahleng lungkhai rabo-e chiujiu dinkhai-e.
Tuhoira, pabam khatga singna khang chinnia lung bamniu-e. Tingthubo piuse panao thiulujiu panah lungkhai makjiu shai mide, sichiujiu panao kamipui situ pasai kariupiu siniu maluong lungde.
Sise kumjiu niabopiu, sumbopiu, khatdi kanamboga khang chinnia siniu maluong lungkhai lujiu shaikam mide.
Sichiujiu simaidung sailam maipui sidi shai mide.
Tuhoira, ringsulanbo naira sibo puise paliu khang chinnia ruangga sao-nao thiu ralo? Palamra paliu mathiu patu maluong lungkhai kam mide.”
Jesu niu paliutu paokakge, “Naliu hai dejiukha maomibo gulo! Masanbo ariak situ maksai Tingwang gu pumtan situ naliu simakbo jengniu naliu hai maomide.
Palamra ringsulanbo nai sira tanao-tanah thiulakge, chiudi mai hinase Tinggen mazadung kummi rabo-e.
Siniu kashaimai ringsulanbo lamga Tingwang niu dinkhai mibose naliu kentaomak jiuma? Paniu din-e,
‘I hai Abraham Rawang, Isaac Rawang, khatdi Jacob Rawang-e.’ Para kashaimai Rawang makge, chiudi karingmai Rawang-e.”
Maidungse haibo cham chiuluboga paliu suang hajiu tadmide.
Sadducee mai ladse Jesu niu kam maha mide chiubo silujiu,
Pharisee mai ruangga Tacheng-tajaigu katipao khatniu wangjiu, patu madiujiu wakhat maniu-e.
“Katipao yo, Tacheng-tajai lungga debo chamtan siniu dithulo?”
Haise dithubo khatdi nkiuthubo chamtan si-e.
Niabo chamtan siniu: ‘Nangniu naky ningmaitu napum kumjiu lungsalo.’
Mose gu Tacheng-tajai nai phaimiu-kakungdungniu katikhaibo hina haibo chamtan nia hangga bambo-e.”
Pharisee maidung wangmadui bamboga, Jesu niu paliu khuga wakhat maniu-e.
“Naliuniu Khrista lamga nde maninglo? Pase sao kaikiklo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “David kaikikge.”
Jesu niu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Sichiusai, dechiujiu David niu Hiupuina pen gasu patu ‘Rapiu’, chiu kujiulo? David niu din-e,
Nagu mikremaitu naphi hangga khaimak then, aben majatlam ntao bamlo.’
David niu patu ‘Rapiu’ chiu ku-e sai, dechiujiu pase David kai-kik thiuralo?”
Mai khatniudi patu paokak ngamlak tamide. Sichiujiu sibo nai gasu mai khatniudi pakhuga chalad maniu hulan tamide.
Siga Jesu niu pakhommaidung khatdi chamai mendi khuga din-e,
“Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung nai Pharisee maidung siniu Mose gu Tacheng-tajaise chalipadle.
Sijengniu paliu kadinbose naliuniu majaijiu kamlulo. Chiudi paliu lunlung situra alitulo. Palamra paliuniu dinbo nai kambose macham makge.
Paliuniu karipbo bangse mai riga thonkhai-e, chiudi paliura paliu njung khatniudi nkha khaini makge.

Paliura mainiu lenlam ngaora ronna kamme. Phuilo, Tingwang chamtan raokhaibo pekse paliu san-ga khekhailu, khatdi paliu npomga matalujiu wasao thiu-e. Khatdi phuilo, paliuniu ntiang taronbo khailujiu, paliu khen-ga khen-gak kadibo kheklujiu wasao thiu-e.
Sichiujiu paliuniu chakhuang changee ga khatdi maduikyga kakubo bamga ntao ratu masen-e.
Khatdi paliutu mainiu ruangdiga kahumjiu ‘Katipao’, chiujiu kubotu paliuniu luni-e.
Chiudi mainiu naliutu ‘Katipao’, chiujiu kubotu masen tulo, palamra naliugu Katipaora khatnakha ronna-e, khatdi naliu mathiu singna khat kamme.
Sigasu naliuniu kadihpiriga mai khat tudi ‘Apiu’ chiujiu kutulo, palamra naliu Piu sira tinggen lam bambo paronna-e.
Mainiu naliutu ‘Jupao’, chiujiu kubotu masen tulo, palamra naliugu jupao sira Khrista ronna-e.
Sijengniu naliu ruangga dithubo pasiniu naliutu machabo mai thiurabo-e.
Mai khatniu paronna patu kam madi sai, patu kam manuan khai rabo-e, khatdi mai khatniu paronna patu kam manuan kiusai, patu kam madi khai rabo-e.

“Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung nai Pharisee maidung yo, naliu hai dejiukha san salo! Naliura wasao thiubo maidung-e! Palamra tinggen gu Chawangdihga maitudi pi ngutmakra khamme, naliudi ngutmakge, siga ngutra matanmai tudi naliuniu suikhai makge.

(Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung nai Pharisee maidung yo, naliu hai dejiukha san salo! Naliura wasao thiubo maidung-e! Palamra naliuniu kamipuimai ma ruptiujiu paliugu humtiu-e. Sichiudi wasao thiujiu kakhengthiu matheng-e. Sijengniu naliutu sajai pirabose sadiang rabo-e).

“Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung nai Pharisee maidung yo, dejiukha naliu hai san salo! Naliura wasao thiubo maidung-e! Palamra naliuniu mai khattu lungli khaira aliam tuanglujiu kadih pakhiangna tadron bamme; sichiujiu mai khatniu naliu jai majai misai, naliu suang damnia nkiujiu charuidihga pitad khaira naliuniu kamme.

“Pamik tiatbo jupaodung, naliu hai dejiuga san salo! ‘Mai khatniu charaky tu judengjiu siangbo hai wacham ha-e, chiudi charakygu kachia situ thindeng lujiu siangsai patu ratmibo-e’ chiujiu naliuniu kati khai-e.
Kapangbo pamik tiatbo mai yo! Kachiase dibo ma, maksai kachiatu kam masan khaibo charakyse dilo?
Sigasu ‘Mai khatniu rathakbamtu thin dengjiu siangbo wacham ha-e, chiudi rathakbamga kadkhaibo maniatu thin dengjiu siangsai patu ratmibo-e,’ chiujiu naliuniu kati khai-e.
Naliu hai dejiukha panglo! Kadkhaibo maniase dima, maksai kadkhaibo maniatu kam masan khaibo rathakbamse dilo?
Palamra mai khatniu rathakbamtu dinjiu siang-e sai, kadkhaibo mania hinadi jaojiu siang mibo-e.
Khatdi mai khatniu charakytu dinjiu siang-e sai, charakyga bambo patu jaojiu siang mibo-e.
Sikumjiu mai khatniu tinggentu dinjiu siang-e sai, Tingwang gu chawangbam khatdi sibo riga ntaobambo patudi jaojiu siang mibo-e.
Pamik tiatbo jupaodung yo! Naliu piang gasu tamangpui tura naliu singlu-e, chiudi qontraotu naliuniu kajong-e!

“Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung nai Pharisee maidung yo, naliu hai dejiukha san salo! Naliura wasao thiubo maidung-e! Palamra naliuniu chakuang-chapiang lenlamra nkhiu masan-e, chiudi palung lamra kapin tiubo khatdi lengsibo lungchunniu phui-e
Pamik tiatbo Pharisee maidung yo! Chakuang-chapiangse palunglam khiu masan milo, chiusai lenlamdi masanmi rabo-e.
Sikumjiu naliudi lenlam, maigu mikphui gara tacheng matipbo mai kumme; chiudi naliu lungchun lamra wasao thiubo nai nuan siniu phuiting bamme.

“Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung nai Pharisee maidung yo, naliu hai dejiukha san salo! Naliura wasao thiubo maidung-e! Palamra naliuniu phaimiukakung mai raw khuanne khatdi tacheng-matipmai rawdi karukhai-e.
Sichiujiu naliuniu din-e, ‘Aliu pao-pehmai ken-ga aliu lungbam niusai, paliu kumjiu phaimiukakung maitu kamshat mak bamniu rabo-e.’
Haichiujiu phaimiukakung maitu kamshat mibo mai nahdung-e chiubo naliu pumsiakniu jengdin thiu-e.
Sichiusai tadlujiu, naliu pao-peh maidungniu tensu mibose tenphu lura kamsulo.
Naliu kaniudung, khatdi kaniu kaikikdung yo! Naliutu charuidihga sajai pirabo gasu, dechiujiu naliu mari lune chiu maning jiulo?

Sichiujiu phuilo, Iniu naliu khuga phaimiukakung maidung, ningting maidung khatdi katipaodungtu langkhaine; siga naliuniu paliu khangsiatu kamshat sune, khatdi khangsiatu singchai gasu masengshat sune; khatdi khangsiatu maduiky ganiu dapjiu, namdi khat gasu namdi khatga hatad sune.
Pakhui-pamao kahamaitu kamshat mibo hai Abel zai gasu naliuniu Charakygu rathakbamga kamshat mibo Berachiah nahpiu, Zechariah zai tangbo, kadihga kiukhai mibo hinase naliu riga wangrabo-e.
Iniu naliu khuga pachangjiu dinbo-e: haibo sajai hinase tuhoi ken-ga lungbambo mai riga wangrabo-e.

“Oh, Jerusalem, Jerusalem yo! Naliuniu phaimiukakung maidungtu kamshat mide, khatdi Tingwang niu naliu khuga langwangbo maitu tatuniu rotshat mide! Maruipuiniu papoitu pakan hangga khailu kakukbo kumjiu, nanahmaitu Iniu dethengkha akhuga kuwang madui khainilo? Chiudi naliuniu suikhai makge.
Sijengniu phuilo, naliu Raky hai maruangmi rabo-e, khatdi nkamkui mirabo-e.
Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, “Rapiu zan-ga wangbo patu hai Tingwang niu thoikhai bibo thiu milo chiujiu dinpad makthen, tuhoi gasu naliuniu atu ngaotami rabo-e.’’
Jesu niu Charaky phutlujiu tadpadboga, pakhommai siniu thiukhaibo ky situ dintao khaira wang-e.

Chiudi Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Yo, naliuniu haidungse mataiwijiu phui bambo sui-e, chiudi Iniu naliu khuga palingjiu dinbo-e, haibo tukangdungse khatnadi masiak khai lakge, pakhiangna haise khoithon kammi rabo-e.”
Jesu niu Olive luongga bambo tingga, pakhommaidung siniu pakhuga mahin wang maniu-e, “Haise dedao padsu ralo? Kanambo ken-ga khatdi nangniu wangrabo tinggu madanse dechiubo gu padsu ralo?
Jesu niu paokakge, “Naliutu mainiu sonmi makra mathing sijiu bamlo.
Palamra mai kakeng khaniu chamtan thinlujiu, ‘I hai Khrista si-e,’ chiujiu mai kakeng khatu son sune.
Khatdi naliuniu pabam hinaga chari thiubo khatdi n-gi athaobo ronna chiusune, chiudi naliu lung chariumi tulo, palamra sikumbo hinase padsiak rabo-e chiudi sise kaloibo makha-e.
Sichiujiu jat khatniu jat khattu, chawang dih khatniu chawang dih khattu charithiu sune; pabam hinaga charakhum khatdi kathi wang sune.
Pakhiangna haise ngena manathad thiu karaibose kumbo-e.
Sibo wan-gase mai kakeng khaniu paliu malumtu phutmi sune, sigasu khatniu khattu pipad sune, khatdi khatniu khattu mareng sune.
Siga aratbo phaimiukakung kengkha padjiu, mai kakengtu son sune.
Sichiujiu kasabo hai nkiu khangjiu mai kakenggu lungsabo hai nkhinmi sune.
Chiudi kaloibo tangjiu khenglu maitu rankhai bine.
Sichiujiu Chawang dihgu kawicham hai jat hina khuga jengdin thiujiu, kadihpiri pakhiangna dinron lubo sai kaloibo wanse wangrabo-e.
“ Sichiujiu Judaea ga bambo mai siniu maluonggen lam pak marilulo.
Siga chaky npom riga bammai siniu pagu wania khoira nkummak rabo-e.
Sikumjiu chalulam bammai niudi, pafai-pani khoira malan wangmak rabo-e.
Sibo tingga pawon phungbo puidung khatdi pamna pontup kinbo puidungse dejiukha chariu ralo!
Chiudi naliuniu pak rabo wanse tathedao maksai Tabamnai padmakra Tingwang khuga khenglulo.
Sibo tingga padrabo sira, nda kadih damsu karai gasu tuhoi tangbo pad matai makbo, khatdi wadaodi padlan lakbo kapingbo mathadse thiurabo-e.

Chiudi Tingwang niu sibo tingmikdungse kam madun khai mide. Paniu kam madun khai maksai, mai khatniudi ring silakge. Chiudi paniu kadakhai mibo mai jengniu sibo tingmikdungse Tingwang niu kam madun khai mide.
“Sikumbo tingga maidungniu naliu khuga, ‘Phuilo, haiga Khrista bamme’, maksai ‘uiga bamme’, chiudi malummi tulo.
Palamra aratbo khristadung khatdi aratbo phaimiu-kakungdung padjiu kadibo madan khatdi maisuang habo kamjiu Tingwang niu kadalubo mai tudi sonmi sune.
Kinglo, haise pad makhaga Iniu naliu khuga din masuang khaibo-e.
Delosai tingbang lamsu hengri kalik khai sai, tingnu lamdi ngaobo kumjiu, Chamai Nahpiu sidi sikum siakjiu wangrabo-e.

Sichiujiu Mai Nahpiu wangrabo madanse tinggen lamsu maduwang sune: Siga kadihga lungbambo jat hina paliu gah jumjiu kapsune. Sichiujiu Mai Nahpiu siniu pumtan nai kendibo jaojiu kamuong tuanglujiu wangbo paliuniu ngaosune.
Siga kadibo makese mudsune, sichiujiu pagu mazadungtu langkiujiu tingpi-tingrun, khatdi tingbang-tingnulam bambo, paniu kadalumai hinatu khomwang madui sune.
“Ndutbang ganiu naliu silulo; haise pake padjiu pabuan bonsuboga naliuniu tinglum wangkinne chiubo si-e.
Sikumjiu naliuniu wahina hai ngao sai pah kamun mungga chapbam mide chiubo silulo.
Tuhoi lung bammai hai shai kam makbo suangga, haidungse padrabo-e chiubo maningtao lulo.
Tinggen nai kadih haira hami rabo-e, chiudi agu ladkeng sira wadaodi halakge.
“Pating pawanse Papiu makjiu, tinggen mazadung niudi, Nahpiu niudi simakge.
Chamai Nahpiu siniu wangrabo tingse Noah ken-ga padmibo kumjiu pad rabo-e.
Duidetse wangmakbo suangga, Noah niu malee lungga ngut makthen, maidung siniu watiu-wasakjiu, tanao-tanah thiujiu bamniu-e.
Sichiujiu duidetse wangjiu paliutu maten makthen paliuniu simakge; Chamai Nahpiu siniu wangbo gadi sikum rabo-e.
Siga mai khangnia chaluga tatien tenbam sune, khang khattu lutadmi sune, khatdi khang khattu saodiak sune.
Maipui khangnia athao-akao bam sune, khang khattu lutadmi sune, khatdi khang khattu saodiak sune.
“Haijengniu kadensijiu bamlo, palamra naliuniu Rapiu wangrabo tingmikse simakge.
Chiudi haise silulo, ka-agamaise dekumbo wan-ga wangralo chiubo chakypao siniu sibam niusai, paniu rakjiu bamrabo-e, sichiujiu agatiumai situ pijiu paky kampang khai lakge.
Sijengniu naliu kadensijiu bamlulo, palamra naliuniu maning makbo wan-ga Chamai Nahpiuse wang sune.
“Malumbuibo khatdi ningtingbo vangpiuse saolo? Pahaira pavang kakimaitu pawan gapboga katiu-kasak pikhaira papao siniu malin khaibo vangpiu si-e.
Papaopiu wangbo wan-ga patien thiujiu bamniubo vangpiuse dejiukha padon wilo!
Palingjiu Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, papaopiu siniu pagu mania pakhiangna riga sibo vangpiutu pi papao thiukhai bine.
Chiudi kasabo vangpiu siniu, pawangpiuse wangji lakge chiu maning lujiu,
paniu pakamaitu n-gi athaojiu, watiu-wasakjiu khatdi jaw maniujiu bamboga,
paniu maning makbo wan-ga, pawangpiuse wangde.
Siga pawangpiu siniu wanglujiu patuse dim-mara lujiu wasao thiubo mai damse lura, simai ruangga thonkhai mirabo-e. Siga pah kapjiu pahiu n-getjiu bammi rabo-e.
Siga khang mangiu sira ningtingmai-e, khatdi khang mangiu sira kapangmai-e.
Sichiujiu kapangmaidung sira paliu mibung thinlujiu, chiudi paliuniu chamidui sira khai makge.
Chiudi ningting maidung sira paliu mibung gase chamidui khailujiu tad kinne.
Naopaopiuse wangri mide, siniu aliumaidungse nguiniu mijiu njit mide.
“Siga chunding tingga chakhuan senwang sude, “Phuilo, naopaopiuse wang kin-e, wangjiu patu sundao sulo.’
Siga aliumaidungse sulujiu paliu mibung kaden sude.
Siga kapangmaidung siniu ningtingmaidung khuga din-e, “Naliu midui kasia aliuleng janlo, palamra aliu mibungse midlajiu bamme.”
Chiudi ningting maidung siniu paokakge, ‘Aliu lengdi builak, naliu lengdi builakmi sune, siniu naliu tadlujiu kajonmai khuga naliuleng liulujiu wanglo.’
Sichiujiu paliu liura tadmiboga naopaopiuse wangde, siga kaden lujiu bammaidungse naopaopiu tuse maluong lujiu magiangbo ngee ga ngutmide, siga nkhamse nam mide.
Chiudi paniu paliutu paokakge, “Palingjiu Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, I naliutu simakge.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu munkom khaide, “Kaden sijiu akhe bamlo; palamra naliuniu pating pawan situ simakge.
Sichiujiu paniu mai khattu rangkang sang mangiu, mai khattu sang nia, khatdi mai khattu sang khat, chiujiu pagu-gu kangambo saisuijiu paliu khuga pikhai lujiu, pah nbintad mide.
Sichiujiu rangkang sang mangiu daolubo piu siniu tadlujiu alibo gasu rangkang sang mangiu gengsan lude.
Sikumjiu nia dao lubo piu siniudi kakibo nia gengsan lude.
Chiudi khat daolubo piu siniu, tadlujiu kadih chulujiu papaopiugu rangkangse bai mide.
Sichiujiu pating katheng saiga paliu paopiu malan wangjiu, paliu lithakse riam sude.
Siga rangkang sang mangiu daolubo piu siniu kakibo rangkang sang mangiu thinsan lujiu, wangjiu din-e, “Awangpiu yo, nangniu rangkang sang mangiu atu pikhaibo-e, phuilo, I sang mangiu gengsan lude.’
Papaopiu siniu pakhuga din-e, ‘Kamdaode, kawibo khatdi malumbuibo vang; nangra wapoina riga malum suibo jengniu, Iniu natu wa kakengkha riga papao pithiu khaine; wangjiu agu chunwiboga padam lululo.’
Rangkang sang nia daolubo piu siniudi wangjiu din-e, ‘Awangpiu yo, nangniu atu rangkang sang nia pikhai-e, tuhoira, Iniu sang nia gengsan lude.’
Papaopiu siniu pakhuga din-e, ‘Kamdaode, kawibo khatdi malumbuibo vang, nangra wapoina riga malum suibo jengniu, Iniu natu wa kakengkha riga papao pithiu khaine; wangjiu agu chunwiboga padam lululo.’

Siga rangkang sang khat daolubo piu siniu wangjiu din-e, ‘Awangpiu yo, nangra nalung kasabo mai-e chiubo I si-e, nangra alin maruk khai makbo gadi ge-e, khatdi nangniu lingkhai makbo gadi khom madui-e.
Siniu, Ira pingjiu nagu rangkangse wangjiu kadih chulujiu bai mibo-e, phuilo naguse haiga bamme.’
Papaopiu siniu paokakge, ‘Kasabo khatdi kamakebo vang, Iniu lingkhai makbose gebambo, khatdi Iniu maruk khai makbo sidi khom madui bambo nang sima?
Wide, nangniu agu rangkangse thinlujiu rangkang kyga khaibam lubui-e, Chiusai Iniu malan wangboga agu rangkangdi, paton-panadi daolu rabo-e.
Sijengniu naliu wanglujiu pakhuga bambo rangkangse khoilujiu, rangkang sang kariu bambo piu khuga pikhai milo.
Sijengniu wa bambo mai khuga pisan khai bine, sichiujiu paniu keng-mali malan lubui-e, chiudi wa habo mai khugasu, pagu bambo poi sidi luthonmi rabo-e.
Sichiujiu pageng kahabo vangpiu situ lenlam, tamiuboga thonkhai milo, siga pah kapjiu pahiu n-giatjiu bammi rabo-e.”
Siga milykhuanpao siniu kamidung ruanggasu milydungtu kadatam padbo kumjiu, paniu paliutu baonia thiujiu kadatam pad sune.
Sichiujiu paniu milydung situ paben jatlam, khatdi kamidung situ paben mawuilam khai sune.
Sichiujiu chawang siniu paben jatlam bammaidung khuga din-e, “Wanglo, Apiu gu thoidam ngaolu maidung, kadihpiri dambo gasu naliuleng kaden khai nbambo chawang dihse lululo.
Palamra Iniu mariubo tingga naliuniu atu pitiu khai-e, Iniu charibo tingga naliuniu atu pisak khai-e, khatdi Iniu chabin tadbo tingga naliuniu atu naliu kyga piriu khai-e.
Iniu apumruangjiu bambo tingga naliuniu chafai-tani aleng pikhai-e, Iniu marajiu bambo tingga naliuniu wang akhi khai-e, khatdi Iniu kavangkyga bambo tingga, naliuniu wang atu phui khai-e.”
Siga tacheng matipmai siniu patu paokak sune, “Rapiu yo, nang mariubo aliuniu dedao ngaojiu pitiu khai jiulo, maksai charijiu bamboga pisak khai jiulo?
Maksai nangniu chabin mai thiujiu tadkinbo aliu dedao ngaojiu, natu aliu kyga piriu khai jiulo? Maksai napumruang kinbo dedao ngaojiu chafai-tani pikhai jiulo?
Sichiu makjiu nang marabo, maksai kavangkyga bambo aliu dedao ngaojiu wang phuikhai jiulo?”
Siga chawang siniu paliu khuga din sune, ‘Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, naliuniu haibo singna maidung ruangga siamthubo mai khat khuga tenkhaibose akhuga tenkhai mibo-e!’
“Sichiujiu paniu paben mawuilam bammai khuga din-e, ‘Tasiang phungmai naliu, akhu gasu tadmilo, Satan nai pagu mazadung leng kaden khai bambo tingthenggu chamijai gase tadmilo!
Palamra Iniu mariubo tingga, naliuniu atu pitiu khai makge, Iniu charibo tingga, naliuniu atu pisak khai makge;
Iniu chabin tadkinbo tingga, naliuniu atu naliu kyga piriu khai makge, Iniu marabo tingga khatdi kavangkyga bambo tingga naliu atu wang phuikhai makge.’

Siga paliuniu paokak sune, ‘Rapiu yo, nang mariu kinbo maksai chari kinbo; chabin tadkinbo maksai napumruang tad kinbo; marajiu bambo maksai kavangkyga bambo dedao aliu ngaojiu natu macha khai makjiulo?’
Siga chawang siniu paliutu paokak sune, ‘Naliuniu haibo siamthubo mai khat khuga tenkhai makbose akhuga tenkhai makbo-e.’
Sichiujiu tingtheng mathadbo bam gase paliutu thonkhai mirabo-e, chiudi tacheng matipmai sira tingtheng karingbo bamga tadmi rabo-e.”
Jesu niu haidungse katikhai loimibo saiga, paniu pakhommaidung khuga din-e,
“Jengnia saiga Kenpadbo Ngeese wangkin-e, chiubo naliuniu sibamme, siga Mai Nahpiu situ masengshat mira pipadmi rabo-e.”
Sigasu singku paodung khatdi kating maidung siniu Dibo Singku Caiaphas kijengga wang maduide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu Jesu tu mahin minlujiu kamshat mira makhiam thiu sude.
Paliuniu din-e, “Changee tingga aliuniu kamdao lakge, palamra maidungse kabuakmi rabo-e.”
Tuhoira Jesu hai Bethany ga, ka-nphenbopiu Simon kyga bamme.
Siga Jesu niu watiujiu bamboga maipui khatniu paman kungbo wasa, albaster bung khat thinwang lujiu papeega runkhai sude.
Sise pakhommaidungniu ngaoluboga paliu lung aman makjiu din-e, “Ndeleng haise kam nchum bam jiulo?
Haibo wasase jon mageng lujiu lungkalak maitu nkha khai lubui-e!”
Paliuniu dinbambose Jesu niu silujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliuniu nde kamjiu haibo puitu kam kabuak bamjiulo? Paniu akhuga kamkhai bambo hai wa kawibo gu-e.
Palamra naliuniu lungkalak maitura majang jut-jutjiu bam rabo-e, chiudi Ira naliutu tingthengjiu majang bam lakge.
Paniu ariga wasa runkhaijiu bambo hai, atu baikhai rabo leng kaden khaibo-e.
Palingjiu Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, kawicham hai kadihpiriga dinron bamthen hainapui siniu tenkhai mibose maningtaojiu bamrabo-e.”
Siga pakhommaidung khang kariu-je-niakiu ruangga, khangkhat Juda Iscariot kubo siniu singku paodung khuga tadlujiu din-e,
“Iniu Jesu tu naliu ben-ga pikhai sai, naliu aleng nde piralo?” Siga paliuniu rangkang samriu pakhuga pikhaide.
Sibo wan gasu paniu Jesu tu minlujiu pipadra pawan kawibo phiusu mide.
Tuhoira Chakhi khaimakbo Taruak Ngee raithubo naise pakhommaidung siniu Jesu khuga wangjiu din-e, “Kenpadbo Ngee maluadse tiura debo bamga kaden khaira nangniu masenlo?”
Paniu din-e, “Namdiga tadlujiu siga bambo mai khat khuga dinlo, ‘Katipaoniu din-e, Atingse manawang mide; siniu akhommaidungtu majang lujiu nakyga Kenpadbo Ngee se I changi khaine!”
Jesu niu dinkhaibo kumjiu pakhommaidung siniu tadjiu Kenpadbo Ngee lengse kaden khaide.
Chawanse wangboga Jesu niu paliu khang kariu-je-niakiu situ majang lujiu wa tiura ntao kiude.
Sichiujiu paliuniu wa tiubamga Jesu niu din-e, “Palingjiu Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, naliu ruangga mai khatniu atu jonmi rabo-e.”
Sijengniu pakhommaidungse paliu chun sajiu, khangkhat khat thiujiu, “Rapiu, sise Iniu rama?”, chiujiu maniu karen sude.
Haise raokhai mibo kumjiu “Chamai Nahpiu sira tadmi rabo-e, chiudi Mai Nahpiu situ jonbo maileng sira, maning kamlakge. Patu manawang maksai paleng wi-nkiu rabo-e.”
Siga patu jonrabo piu Juda niu din-e, “Katipao, Iniu rama?” Paniu patu paokakge, “Yo, nangniu dinbo si-e.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu watiu bamboga, Jesu niu taruak khuang khat khoilujiu, thuonkiubo rathoi khengkhai lujiu, khatdi thenpang lujiu pakhommaidung khuga pikhaijiu din-e, “ Khoilujiu tiulo, haise atia-e.
Sibo sai paniu chapiangse ponlujiu Tingwang tu thonkiujiu, khatdi paliu khuga pikhaijiu din-e, “Naliu mathiu haise saklo.
Palamra maidung nuanse kuak khaira luangpad khaibo chamriat kasanbo chamtan si-e.
Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, Apiugu chawang dihga naliutu maluong lujiu kasanbo mumjawse sak ncham rabo tingmik wangtang makthen, Iniu thainai gasu haibo mumjawse saklan lak mibo-e.”
Sichiujiu paliu chalui khat thiujiu Olive Luonglam tadkhai mide.

Sichiujiu Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Thaichun naliu mathiuniu atu phutlujiu pakmi rabo-e, palamra haichiu raokhai bamme, ‘Tingwang niu milykhuanpiu tu kamshatmi rabo-e, siga milydungse pak mara kammi rabo-e.’
Chiudi Iniu ringsu lanboga, naliu masuangga Iniu Galilee ga wangrai bamniu rabo-e.”
Siga Peter niu din-e, “Mai kakimainiu natu phutmi tadi, Ira wadaodi nangtu phutkhai lakge.”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e; “Iniu nakhuga pachang paling dinbo-e, thaichun marui khuang makhaga, nangniu atu simakge chiujiu dinlon sum rabo-e.”
Peter niu paokakge, “Iniu shaibo katangna sikumbose wadaodi dinlakge!”
Sikum gapjiu khommai hina sidi din-e.
Sigasu Gethsemane kubo bamga Jesu niu pakhommaidungtu maluong tadlujiu, paliu khuga din-e, “I uiga tadpad lujiu kakheng thiulujiu wangne. Naliu haiga ntao bamniulo.”
Sichiujiu paniu Peter nai Zabedee Nahpiu kaniatu majang lujiu tadpad mide. Siga palung chariuboniu phui mide.
Sichiujiu paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Alung chariuboniu shaira kum mide, naliu haiga atu khuanjiu liangri bam niulo.”
Paniu paliu khugasu poinakha tadpad lujiu, kadihga pazu makhum kiujiu kakheng thiu-e, “ Hey, apiu yo, daolu buisai, haibo piangse akhugasu luthon milo, chiudi achunbo makjiu nachunbo thiulo.”
Sichiujiu paniu pakhommai khang sum khuga malanwangboga paliu njitbam niubo ngaolujiu, paniu Peter khuga din-e, “Naliuniu wanchak kak khatnadi atu liangrijiu khuan ngam lakmi jiuma?
Kahiamboga ngutmi makra ningting charakjiu, kakheng thiujiu bamlo; Hiupuina siniura luni-e, chiudi chapum siniura sonne.”
Paniu tadpadlan lujiu kakheng thiu-e, “Hey Apiu yo, Iniu haibo piangse sakmak daolak jiuma, chiudi nachunbo thiulo.”
Pah malanwang lanboga paliu njitlan bamniu-e, palamra paliu mikse rakpadlak siakjiu bamniu-e.
Lonsumbo gadi paniu tadpad lujiu, kalu ladkeng kumjiu khenglande.
Sichiujiu paniu malanwang pakhommaidung khugase din-e, “Tuhoi tangbo naliu jijiu, mathak bam khama? Phuilo, Chamai Nahpiutu nuan phungmai ben-ga pipad rabo pawanse tuhoi wangtang mide.
Sulo, aliu tadsukhe. Phuilo, atu jonbo piuse haiga wang bamde.”
Sichiujiu paniu tacham dinbamga, phuilo, paliu khang kariu-je-niakiu ruangga Juda siniu singku paodung nai katingmai khugasu chaheng-changiu thinbo chamai menditu majang lujiu wangde.
Patu jonrabo piu siniu paliu khuga madan pijiu din-e, “Iniu kapup khaibo piu situ minrabo-e!”
Sichiujiu paniu Jesu khuga wangjiu din-e, “Wibamma, Katipao,” chiujiu patu kapup khaide.
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Akabo, nang haiga dekamra wangjiulo? Nangniu kamrabose majat sulo!”
Siga paliuniu wangjiu Jesu tu minlude.
Sigase Jesu tu maluongbam maidung rong gasu mai khatniu chaheng thadpad lujiu Dibo Singku vangpiutu bijiu pakuon bitap mide.
Siga Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Nahengse pabungga setkhai milo, palamra chaheng thinmai hina siniu chaheng gasu shairabo-e.
Iniu Apiu khuga khengsai paniu pagu mazadung sang-sang langwang ngam lulakge chiubo naliu maning jiuma?
Sichiusai dechiujiu, Masanbo ariakga raokhai bambose wangtang luralo?”
Chiudi phaimiukakung maidungniu raokhaibo chamse wangtang raleng haichiu padmibo-e.”
Siga pakhommai hina patu phutlujiu pak mara kam mide.
Jesu tu minlujiu maidung siniu Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung nai kating maidung madui bambo Dibo Singku Caiaphas kyga majang wangde.
Siga patu hatangsiak makjiu, Dibo Singku kyjeng tangbo Peter niu pasai suiwang-e, sichiujiu degu padsu ralo chiubo phuira akhemai ruangga ngut lujiu ntao bamme.
Siga singku paodung nai kating maidung mathiu siniu Jesu tu kamshatra aratbo jengdin phiu sude.
Sichiujiu aratbo jengdin kengkha madamkhai sude, chiudi tacham khatnadi pathao pad makge. Kanamthubo thiujiu, aratbo jengdin thiumai khangnia padlujiu din-e,
“Tingwang Raky se rathon milo, sichiujiu jengsum lungga sise thiulan lune chiujiu hainaniu dinbo-e.”
Siga Dibo Singku siniu sulujiu pakhuga din-e, “Maidungniu natu madam khai bambo jengdin lamga nang wakhatdi paokak khaira hajiuma?”
Chiudi Jesu niu maliumak palun-e. Siga Dibo Singku siniu pakhuga din-e, “Ringbambo Tingwang zan thinlujiu Iniu natu pi tasiang siangne; Nang hai Tingwang Nahpiu Khrista-e ma? Aliu khuga dinkhailo.”
Naliu nde maninglo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Pahai maomide, pah shaibui-e.”
“Khrista yo, natu saoniu jumjiulo? Nagu sailad chamse aliu khuga dinkhailo?”
Peter Ladjan thiubo ky kajeng gase Peter ntaojiu bamboga, Dibo Singku vangpui khatniu pakhuga wanglujiu din-e, “Nangdi Galilee mai Jesu tu majang kinbo mai khatle.”
Chiudi mathiu masuangga paniu suini makjiu din-e, “Nang nde dinjiulo, I simakge.”
Sibo sai paniu kahiulam padboga katambo kavangpui khatniu patu ngaolujiu siga bammai khuga din-e, “Hainase Nazareth Jesu tu majang kinbo mai khatle.”
Sigadi Peter niu suini makjiu, tasiang siangjiu din-e, “I, sinatu simakge.”
Sibo sai watheng makjiu siga chapbammai khatniu wangjiu Peter khuga din-e, “Nangdi haimai ruangga khangkhat siakge, palamra nalad ganiu natu si-e!”
Siga Peter niu din-e, “Iniu siangjiu majibose dinbo-e, I sinatu simakge. Iniu sinatu sisai Tingwang niu atu sajai pikhaibo thiumi sulo.”
Sichiu khaigap maruireng khuang mide.
“Marui khuang makbo suangga, nangniu atu simakge chiu dinlon sum rabo-e,” chiujiu Jesu niu pakhuga dinkhaibose Peter niu maning taode. Sichiujiu kamalam padlujiu kapchang kapsude.
Nsuan kalu, singku paodung nai kating maidung siniu Jesu tu kamshatra leng chapkhai mide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu patu ratlujiu Rommai gu dihthinpao Pilate khuga juwangde.
“Iniu pamao kahabo piu situ jon mibo hai nuan kammide,”
Chiudi paliuniu din-e, “Aliuniu dekam khaila? Haise nangam kamme.”
Siga paniu Charakyga rangkangse taliangkhai diaklujiu, tadpad paronna nkhekjiu shai mide.
Singkupaodung siniu thonkhai diakbo rangkangse khoilujiu din-e, “Haise Charaky gu chakhiu bungga khaibo pajai makge, palamra haise tazai man-e.”
Sijengniu paliuniu makhiam lujiu sangdiumaileng charawbam khat ‘Chali dambo Lujamse’ liukhaide.
Sijengniu sibo luzam situ ‘Tazai Lujam’, chiujiu tuhoi tangbo kujiu bamme.
Rapiu niu akhuga chamtan pibo saisuijiu haibo rangkangse khoilujiu ‘Chali dambo Lujamse’ lura Iniu pikhai mide.”
Rommai gu dihthinpao masuangga Jesu wang chapde: siga dihthinpao siniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nang hai Jehudimai wangpiu sima?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Nangniu dinbo si-e.”
Chiudi singku paodung nai kating maidung siniu patu kamaobo madam khaibo gase paniu wakhatdi paokak khai makge.
Siga Pilate niu pakhuga din-e, “Nariga kamaobo wajiuga madam khai bambose nang chiumak jiuma?”
Chiudi paniu pakhuga walad di paokak makboga dihthinpaose pasuang hachang hamide.
Kenpadbo Ngee tingga maidungniu phutkhai nibo kavangmai khattu dihthinpaoniu phutkhaira kasuibo tajai bamme.
Sibo tingga Barabbas Jesu kubo matun makbo piu khat kavangkyga bamme.
Haichiujiu maidungse wang aruangboga Pilate niu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Iniu naliuleng saotu phutkhaibo lunilo? Barabbas Jesu tu rama, maksai Khrista kubo Jesu tu ralo?”
Palamra paliuniu patu kambambo hai manmabo jengniu-e, chiubo paniu masanjiu sibamme.

Pilate niu ladjan thiubo bamga ntaobambo lon panaoniu mai khattu pakhuga langwangjiu din-e, “Nangniu pamao-pameng kahabo piu situ wakhatdi kamkhai mane, palamra thaichun amanglamsu, palamga chariusui khai mibo-e.”
Tuhoira singku paodung nai kating maidung siniu Barabbas Jesu tu khenglujiu, Khrista Jesu tu kamshat raleng maidungtu kachu khaijiu bambo-e.
Chiudi Pilate niu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Panai khangnia rong gasu Iniu saotu phut khaira naliu masenlo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Barabbas tu-e.”
“Sichiusai, Khrista kubo Jesu tu Iniu nde kamralo?” chiujiu Pilate niu paliu khuga din-e.
Paliu mathiuniu paokakge, “Patu masengshat milo.”
Siga paniu maniu-e, “Paniu degu kamaobo kamkhai mibo bam jiulo?”
Chiudi maidung siniu ‘Patu masengshat milo,’ chiujiu sen matanbi-bi mide.
Siga paliu mathiuniu paokakge, “Pazai hai aliu riga khatdi aliu nahmai riga wangbo thiu milo.”
Siga Pilate niu Barabbas tu paliuleng phutkhai mide, khatdi Jesu tu lekkhai lujiu masengshat mira pipad mide.
Sigasu Pilate gu riphendung siniu Jesu tu dihthinpao ky lam juwang mide, khatdi riphendung siniu Jesu mungga wang maduide.
Siga paliuniu pafai-panise gaopad lujiu, chafai kahengbo khat benkhaide.

Sigasu paliuniu tathu pirun khat taliu lujiu papeega runkhaijiu chahutang thun khat paben majatlam pikhaide. Sichiujiu paliuniu pamasuangga khudung kiujiu patu tanui thenjiu din-e, “Tingtheng ringbamlo, Jehudimai wangpiu yo!”
Paliuniu pazuga tatai masiu khaijiu pathunse khoilujiu patu kakhiujiu dapsude.
Sichiujiu paliuniu patu tanui thiuloi miboga pakhu gasu chafai kahengbose gaolujiu, pafaise patu benkhai dailujiu masengshat mira puitad mide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu tadpadboga Cyrene maipiu, Simon kubo piutu adaode, siga riphendung siniu, Jesu gu singchaise ponra manomjiu kam khaide.
Paliuniu Golgotha parambaniu, “Tapeeruang Luong” kubo bamga wangde.
Siga paliuniu Jesu tu kakhaboniu tabot mibo mumjawse pikhaide, chiudi paniu sise machan khai lujiu sak makge.
Sichiujiu ntao khuanjiu paliuniu patu phui bamme.
“Haise Jehudimai wangpiu, Jesu-e,” chiubo patu suini makbo chamse papee riga raokhai bamme.
Sichiujiu paliuniu pamungga, agatiu-kaliktiumai khang niatu, khang khattu paben majatlam, khatdi khang khattu paben mawuilam maseng khaide.
“Charakyse rakiu lujiu jengsum lungga thiu sulan ngamme chiubose nangma? Nang hai Tingwang Nahpiu-e sai, singchai gasu nkum lujiu naronna natu ran lulo.”
Sikumjiu singku paodung, Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung khatdi apaimaidung siniu patu tanui thenjiu din-e,
“Paniu kakimai tura ranlu-e, chiudi paronna patu ran ngam makge! Pahai Jehudimai wangpiu makma? Tuhoi singchai gasu wang nkum lulo, sichiusai aliu patu malum rabo-e!
Tingwang tu pah malumme, khatdi pah Tingwang Nahpiu-e chiujiu dinbo-e. Sichiusai wide, patu Tingwang niu rankhai suma aliu phui mataikhe!”
Sikumjiu patu singchaiga maseng ncham bambo agatiumai siniudi patu kamenbo ladse dinsude.
Niending tingga wanchak sum kumbo hai kadihpiri pakhiangna tamiu wang mide.
Sichiujiu wanchak sum kiubo ningga Jesu niu pakhuan tanjiu senpatle, “Eli, Eli, lema sabachthani,” chiubora “A-Rawang yo, A-Rawang yo, dekamjiu nang atu phutmi jiulo.”
Siga chap bammai khangsia siniu pakhuan chiulujiu din-e, “Elijah tu paniu ku bamme.”
Sigase paliu ruangga khang khatniu pakpad, marampuang khat khoilujiu kakhiangbo jawga sumlujiu chahutang ton ganiu kathonkhang patu pisak khaide.
Chiudi khangsianiu din-e, “Khuanno, Elijah wangjiu patu rankhai suma aliu phui mataikhe.”
Sibo sai pakhuan tanjiu senpad lanlubo sai, Jesu pasiu thisao mide.
Siga charawdungdi lepadjiu, Tingwang gu masanmai, shai mibo mai kakengkha ringsu lande.
Sichiu charaw gasu paliu padlujiu Masanbo Namdiga ngutbo maidung kakeng khaniu ngao-e.
Tuhoira riphen-gu kai-ripi nai Jesu tu akhejiu bammai siniu kathijubo khatdi padmibo hina ngaolujiu ping karen mide, sichiujiu “Pachangjiu pahai Tingwang Nahpiu siakge” chiujiu din-e.
Sibo ruangga Mary Magdalene, Jacob nai Joseph pui Mary, khatdi Zebedee nao chiujiu bamme.
Chawan wangboga Arimathea Joseph kubo kalekwibo piu khat wang-e. Padi Jesu khommai khatle.
Paniu Pilate khuga wangjiu Jesu pumse kheng-e, siga Pilate niu Jesu phawse Joseph khuga pikhaira chamtan pikhaide.
Siga Joseph niu sise ponwang kasanbo fainoi khatniu majiu khaide.
Paniu tudiga paraw leng bungkhai bambo kasanbo raw gase ponwang baikhai mide, khatdi tatu kadi khatniu kapnam khai lujiu wangmide.
Siga Mary Magdalene nai kakibo Mary se charaw situ muntong lujiu ntao bamme.
Tabamnai suangbo naise singku paodung nai Pharisee maidung aruang lujiu Pilate khuga wang din-e,
“Paohubo, aratbopiu hainiu ringbambo tingga ‘Jengsum saiga, I ringsulan rabo-e,’ chiu dinbo aliu maningtao-e.
Sijengniu jengsum tangbo paraw akhera chamtan pikhailo. Palamra pakhommaidung siniu nchun wang agalujiu ringsulan mide chiujiu dinsune. Sichiusai karaibo arat suang, kanabo arat siniu sadiang sune.”
“Naliuniu akhemaitu majang lujiu ngamdiu thenna akhe mawi sulo.” chiujiu Pilate niu paliu khuga dinkhaide.
Sichiujiu paliu wanglujiu charaw situ akhejiu, rawkham rigase madan diangkhai lujiu khuanra khaidiak mide.
Tabamnai sai Nidnai nsuan kalu, Mary Magdalene nai katambo Mary siniu charaw phuira mengde.
Phuilo! Siga simakdakjiu kathi katanbo khat wangde, palamra Rapiu gu maza siniu tinggen lamsu kiujiu tatuse kalad thon mide, khatdi sibo riga ntao bamde.
Pazu-rase hengri kalikbo kumme, khatdi pafai-panise kabun kumjiu kapuong-e.
Siga charaw akhejiu bambo maidungse pingju mibo donniu kaphik rai-raijiu kashai kum kaokiu mide.
maza siniu maipuidung khuga din-e, “Naliu pingtulo, masengshat mibo Jesu tu naliu phiukinne chiubo I si-e.
Pah haiga ha-e, palamra paniu dinmibo kumjiu ringsulan mide. Wangjiu patu maji khaibo bamse phuilo.

Tuhoira kalangjiu tadwang pakhommaidung khuga haichiu dinkhai bilo, “Kashaibo gasu pah ringsulan mide, sichiujiu naliu masuang Galilee lam paniu tadrai bamniu sune, siga naliuniu patu adao sune!’ Iniu naliu khuga dinkhai mibose maningtaolo.”
Sijengniu paliu kalangjiu charawse phutlujiu pingbo nai chunwibo siniu phuilujiu pakhommaidung khuga paokhaira paktad mide.
Paliuniu khommai khuga paokhaira tadbambo tingga phuilo, simakdakjiu Jesu niu paliutu dao lujiu din-e, “Naliu khuga agi-manaijiu bamlo.” Siga paliu wangjiu paphi thinjiu kahumde.
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Ping tulo. Tadlujiu asingnamaidungtu Galilee lam tadra dinkhai bilo, siga paliuniu atu adao sune.”
Sichiujiu maidungse tadmiboga, phuilo, akhemaidung khangsianiu namdilam wangjiu padmibo lam hina singku paodung khuga dinkhaide.
Siga singku paodung siniu kating maidung situ kumadui lujiu khatdi makhiam thiulujiu, riphendung lengse rangkang kengga pikhai lujiu, naliuniu haichiu dinlo,
“Aliu njip mibo tingga pakhommaidung siniu paphawse agalude.
Sichiujiu dihthinpao siniu haibo lamga chiuwang tadi naliutu wadi kam makra aliuniu dinlubui-e, siga naliu manangra wadi ha-e.”
Sichiujiu akhemaidung siniu rangkangse lulujiu, paliutu ladpi khaibo kumjiu kamde. Sijengniu thainai tangbo Jehudi maidungniu haichiu dinbam kha-e.
Paliuniu patu ngaobo tingga patu wangjiu kahumme, chiudi paliu khangsia maira malum masabi-e.
Jesu niu wang mana lujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Tinggen lamdi, kadih gadi pumtan hina akhuga pikhai mide.
Sijengniu pabam hinaga, naliuniu tadlujiu jat hinatu khommai pithiu khaijiu, Papiu, Panah, Masanbo Hiupuina zan gasu paliutu tadui nphum khailo.
Khatdi Iniu naliu khuga pikhaibo chamtan hinase majaira katikhai bilo. Sichiujiu phuilo, chaken kaloibo katang, Iniu naliutu majang khai bine.”
Haise Tingwang Nahpiu Jesu Khrista lamga Kawibo Champao si-e.
Haise phaimiukakung Isaiah niu raokhaibo kumjiu padbo-e:
“Tingwang niu din-e,
‘Nangniu tadrabo npuise kaden khaira,
Iniu agu ladlangtadmaitu nasuangga langkhai bine.’
Rapiu npuise kaden khailo;
pagu npuise kam maji khailo!’”

Sichiujiu John Baptist niu ramjing gase, maidungtu tadui nphum khaijiu khatdi dinron wang-e. Paniu maidung khuga din-e, “Naliu nuan gasu marilujiu tadui nphum lulo, sichiusai Tingwang niu naliu nuanse kuak khai bine”.
Judaea ramluong khatdi Jerusalem namdi gasu chamai kengkha tadpadjiu John chamse nking-e. Sichiujiu paliuniu paliu nuanse din madu padde, siga paniu paliutu Jordan Giu gasu tadui nphumkhai bide.
Paniu maidung khuga madujiu din-e, “ Asailam wangkinbo piu sira asuang di-nkiu-e. Ira kinkiujiu paphitop riangdi khira akaji makge.
Iniu naliutu tadui gasu nphum khaibo-e, chiudi para naliutu Masanbo Hiupuina gasu nphum khai rabo-e.”
Jesu niu Galilee ramluong Nazareth gasu tadpadbo pating watheng makbo lungga John niu patu Jordan gasu tadui nphum khai bide.
Sichiujiu Jesu niu tadui gasu npadgapda tinggen akhamse lepadbo khatdi Hiupuina siniu makhao kumjiu pariga lenkiu taobo paniu ngao-e.
Siga tinggen lamsu chakhuan khat senkiu-e: “Nang hai Iniu kungbo Anahpiu si-e. Iniu nariga alung kimme.”
Sichiujiu Hiupuina siniu patu ramjing lamse maluang khai mide.
Siga pah tingmik atai bamjiu, Satan siniu wangjiu patu hiam sude. Siga nkan khaoringdi bamme, chiudi mazadung siniu wangjiu patu akhi khaide.
John tu kavangkyga khai mibo sai, Jesu niu Galilee ga tadlujiu Tingwang gu Kawicham hai dinron sude.
Paniu din-e, “Pawanse wangtang mide, khatdi Tingwang gu Chawangdihse nawang mide! Naliu nuan gasu mari lujiu Kawicham haitu malum lulo!”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu Galilee Ajai mungga tadkiuboga chakha khamai khangnia, Simon nai pasai kariupiu Andrew niu alang thonkin niubo ngaode.
Jesu niu panai khuga din-e, “Wanglo, asai suilo, Iniu nanaitu chamai minmai pithiu khai bine.”
Siga panainiu panaigu alangse thondiak lujiu pasai suitadnuang mide.
Paniu sichiu tadpad lanboga, singna khangnia, Zebedee nahpiu, Jacob nai John tu ngaode. Panainiu aliam lunggase panaigu alang makhajiu bamniu-e.
Jesu niu panaitu ngao gapboga panaitu kude, sichiujiu panainiu panaipiu, Zebedee khatdi tajengmai situ aliam lungga phutkhai lujiu Jesu sai suitad mide.
Jesu khatdi pakhommaidungse Capernaum namdiga wangde, khatdi Tabamnaise Jesu niu maduikyga tadlujiu katikhai sude.
Paniu katikhaibose chiulubo mai hina paliu suang hamide; palamra paniu katikhaibo hai Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung kum makjiu, pumtan jaojiu kati khai-e.
Siga rasa phungbo piu khatniu maduiky lung gase ngut lujiu marajiu sen-e,
“Nazareth Jesu, nangniu aliutu degu kamkhaini jiulo? Nang aliutu kam maha mira haiga wang jiuma? Nang saolo chiubo I si-e; nangra Tingwang gu masanbo ladlangtadmai-e!”
Jesu niu rasa situ chamtan pijiu din-e, “ Maliu tulo, khatdi sinapiu khugasu npad milo!”
Rasa siniu maipiu situ kam mathiusui khai lujiu khatdi kam mara khai lujiu, pakhu gasu npad mide.

Siga mai hinase paliu suang hachang hamide, khatdi paliu karai khat-khat khuga din-e, “Haise dechiubo gulo? Haise katambo khatdi kasanbo katikhai makma? Hainapiu hainiu rasatu chamtan pira pumtan bamme, khatdi paliuniu pacham majai-e!”
Haichiujiu Jesu makense Galilee ramluong pakhiangna dinchia mide.
Jesu nai pakhommaidung, khatdi Jacob nai John jaojiu maduiky situ phut lujiu Simon nai Andrew kyga tad mide.
Siga Simon naise kakhunjiu paziga jibambose, Jesu wangji-wangkari pakhuga paokhaide.
Siga paniu pakhuga tadlujiu paben jusu khaiboga, kakhunbose winuang mide; sichiujiu paniu buangsu lujiu paliutu akhikhai sude.
Naimik kiujiu, chawanse wang miboga maidung siniu Jesu khuga mara-sathiu maidung khatdi rasa phungmaidungtu maluang wangde.
Sibo namdiga bammai hina, sibo ky kamaga wang madui sude.
Siga Jesu niu mara sathiubo mai hinatu wikhai bide, khatdi rasa phungmaidung tudi hathonpad khaide. Paniu rasadung situ pijiu wadi dinpad khai makge, palamra paliuniu patu saolo chiubo sibamme.
Pasaibo nai nsuan-kalu, ting benpad makhaboga, Jesu niu buangsu lujiu sibo kyse phutlujiu tadmide. Sibo namdak gasu katingjingbo bamlam kakheng thiura tadmide.
Siga Simon nai pakahmaidung siniu patu phiutad sude,
sichiujiu paliuniu patu daoluboga, pakhuga din-e, “Mai hinaniu natu phiukinbo-e.”
Chiudi Jesu niu paokakge, “Aliuniu haibo mungga bambo namdung gadi tadrabo-e, palamra haijengniu I wangbo-e.”
Sichiujiu Galilee ramluong pakhiangnaga dinron tadjiu maduikyga katikhai-e , khatdi rasadungtu hathon pad khaide.
Nphenmai khatniu Jesu khuga wangjiu, khudung kiujiu patu nkha khaira khengjiu din-e, “Nangniu sui-e sai, atu kam masan khai ngamme.”
Jesu niu patu lungsaboniu phuilujiu, patu kaba khaijiu din-e, “Iniu natu suikhai-e, masan milo.” (Ka-nphenbo rapot haitu masan kamakbo gu-e chiujiu lubo-e).
Siga ka-nphenbo piuse masannuang mide.
Sichiujiu Jesu niu pakhuga chamtan pikhai lujiu langkhai mide.

Paniu pakhuga din-e, “ Kinglo, haise mai khat khugadi din mane. Chiudi singku khuga tadlujiu natu piphui khailo, sichiujiu Mose gu chamtan saisuijiu, mai hinaniu tuhoira nang masan mide chiubo silura rathak maniase kadkhai milo.”

Chiudi sinapiu siniu sibo chamse pabam hinaga dinron-tad mide. Paniu din mathiuju kami jengniu Jesu se namdiga madujiu tad ngamlak mide. Sichiujiu tingjingbo bamga paronna bam mide, sigadi maidung siniu pabam hina lamsu pakhuga wangde.
Sibo saiga Jesu niu Capernaum ga wanglande, sichiujiu pase chakyga wang bamme chiubo sichia mide.
Siga maidung siniu wang madui subo tingga bamkhai radi hamide, kamunki katangna chapphui mide. Jesu niu siga tachamse katikhai sude.
Siga maidung khang madainiu papumphan kashaibo piu khattu pakhuga ponwangde.
