Chamai kengju mibo jengniu, Jesu khuga paliuniu patu ponwangtang lulak mide. Sijengniu chaky npomse ranput lujiu, paliuniu sinatu talaiga maji khai lujiu patun-ga phutkiu khaide.
Jesu niu paliugu malumse dejiuga dilo chiubo ngao lujiu papumphan shaibo piu khuga din-e, “ Anayo, na-nuanse kuak khai mide.”
Siga ntao bammai Tacheng-tajai katipaodungse paliu ronna maning sude,
“Paniu dechiujiu Tingwang tu din masabam jiulo? Mai khatniudi nuan hai kuak khai ngamra ha-e, Tingwang ronna nuan kuak khai ngambo-e!”
Paliuniu maningbose Jesu niu silujiu, paliu khuga din-e, “Naliuniu dekamjiu sichiu maningbam jiulo?
Papumphan shaibo piu khuga hai ‘Na-nuanse kuak khai mide,’ chiu dinbo siniu malama, maksai ‘Sulo, nazihamse pon lujiu tad sulo,’ chiubo siniu malalo?
Iniu naliu khuga dinlen khai bine, chiubora Chamai Nahpiu siniu kadihpiriga nuan kuak khaira pumtan bamme.”
Sichiujiu paniu papumphan shaibo piu khuga din-e,
“Iniu nakhuga dinbo-e, nazise pon lujiu nakylam wang sulo!”

Paliu mathiuse phuijiu bamboga sinapiuse sulujiu, pazihamse pon lujiu kalangjiu tadwang mide. Paliu mathiuse paliu suang hamide, khatdi Tingwang tu thuonjiu haichiu dinsude, “Aliuniu wadaodi haikumbo ngao matai makha-e!”
Jesu niu Galilee Ajai hugen lamse tadlan mide. Siga maidung kakengkha pakhuga wangjiu, paniu paliutu katikhai sude.

Sichiujiu paniu tadkiuboga Alphaeus nahpiu, ramkha khapiu pazanniu Levi kubo siniu, pagu chakamkyga ntao bamniubo ngaode. Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “ Asai suilulo.” Siga Levi niu sulujiu pasai suitad mide.
Pasai naikhat Jesu niu Levi kyga

Sise Tacheng-tajai katipaodung chiubora Pharisee maidung siniu, Jesu niu nuan phungmaidung nai ramkha khamaidungtu maluang tiu ncham bambose ngaolujiu, pakhommaidung khuga maniu-e, “Paniu dekamjiu ramkha khamaidung nai nuan phungmaidungtu maluang tiubam jiulo?”

Jesu niu paliu chamse chiulujiu, paliutu haichiu paokakge, “Papum kawibo maidung lengra phaimiu pageng ha-e, chiudi mara-sathiumaidung leng-e. Ira tacheng matipmaitu kura wangbo makge, chiudi nuan phungmaidungtu kura wangbo-e.”

Sibo tingga John Baptist saisuimai, khatdi Pharisee maidungra kalum rijiu bambo-e. Siniu maidung khangsianiu Jesu khuga wanglujiu haichiu maniu-e, “John Baptist pakhommaidung nai Pharisee maidungniu kalum rijiu bamboga dekamjiu nakhommaidungra kalum rimak jiulo?”

Jesu niu paokakge, “Naopaopiu siniu pakahmaidungtu maluang bamboga, dechiujiu paliu katiu tiumakjiu makim bam ralo? Sichiu makge. Naopaopiu siniu paliutu maluang bam thenna wadaodi paliu katiu makimbo pajai makge.
Chiudi naopaopiu situ paliu khugasu puitad mibo tingmikse wang sune, siga paliu kalum risu rabo-e.
“Mai khatniu ntiang kaguangboga, chafai kasanbo khopkhai sai, kasanbo fai siniu kaguangbo fai situ jukek madimi rabo-e.

Maksai mai khatniu chamigibung kaguangboga, jaw kasanbo liangkhai lakge; paniu liangkhai bisai, chamigi bungse puakpangmi rabo-e; sichiujiu jaw sidi, chamigibung sidi hami rabo-e. Siniu kasanbo jaw leng kasanbo chamigibung thin rabo-e!”
Siga Pharisee maidungniu Jesu khuga din-e, “Phuilo, nakhommaidung hainiu kambambo hai aliugu Tacheng-tajainiu suimakbo-e!”

Jesu niu paokakge, “David niu wa tiura hamibo tingga paniu degu kamkhai milo chiubo naliuniu wadaodi kentao mak jiuma? Pah khatdi pamaidung siniu mariu miboga, paniu Charakygase ngut lujiu Tingwang leng kadkhai mibo taruakse tiumibo-e.

Haise Abiathar niu Dibo Singku thiu kinbo tingga pad mibo-e. Aliugu Tacheng-tajai sai suisai, haise singku maidung ronna tiurabo taruakge; chiudi haise David niu tiu mide, khatdi pamaidung lengdi pikhai mide.”
Jesu niu munkomjiu din-e, “Tabamnai haise chamaina leng wira damkhaibo-e, chamaina haitu Tabamnai leng damkhaibo makge.
Sichiujiu Chamai Nahpiu haise Tabamnai gu papao si-e.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu maduikygase wanglanboga, paben kashaibo piu khat bamniu-e.
Jesu tu din masakhai nijiu bammai khangsia siniu, pah Tabamnai maitu wikhai suma chiubo phuijiu bamme.
Jesu niu paben kashaibo piu khuga din-e, “Pamasuang hailam wanglo.”
Sichiujiu paniu maidung khugase maniu-e, “Aliugu Tacheng-tajai siniu Tabamnai nde kamra suikhailo? Nkha khai rama, maksai kam masa khai ralo? Mai khattu rankhai rama, maksai kam maha ralo?”
Siga paliu wakhatnadi din makge.

Jesu niu palung pomjiu paliutu awajiu phui sude, chiudi paliu jengniu palung aman mak lan-e, palamra paliu lungse tandi tan-e khatdi maodi mao-e. Sichiujiu paniu uinapiu khuga din-e, “Naben ntha padlo.” Paniu paben ntha padboga pabense wimide.
Sijengniu Pharisee maidungse maduiky situ phut lujiu, Herod rupmaitu aruang lujiu Jesu tu kamshatra leng makhiam thiu sude.
Jesu nai pakhommaidungse Galilee Ajai lamse tadmide, siga maidung mendi khatniu pasai suitad kinne.
Paliu hai, Galilee lamsu, Judaea lamsu khatdi Tyre nai Sidon namdi mung lamsu wangbo-e. Paliuniu Jesu khuga wangbo sira paniu kamkhai mibose chiulubo gasu-e.
Maidungse kengju mibo donniu, patu kam maomi makra, paleng aliam khat kaden khaira dinkhaide.
Paniu thiu-niu maidung hinatu wikhai bibo jengniu, mara sathiubo mai hina siniu patu niatao khaira ahi karenjiu bamme.
Sichiujiu rasa phungmai siniu patu ngaoboga, pamasuangga nkhuang kiu-e khatdi paliu khuan tanjiu sen-e, “Nang hai Tingwang Nahpiu si-e!”
Jesu niu rasa khugase pahai saolo chiubo din makra chamtan tanjiu pikhaide.
Sigasu Jesu niu ramluong khatga khang lujiu, paniu lunibo maidungtu paleng kada khaide.
Paniu paliu khang kariu-je-niakiutu kulujiu, paliu khuga din-e, “ Naliu akhuga bamra, Iniu naliutu kada lubode; sichiujiu naliuniu dinron tadra Iniu naliutu langkhaine.
Sichiujiu naliuniu rasadungtu hathon ngamrabo pumtanse daorabo-e.”
Paniu kadalubo mai khang kariu-je-niakiu sira: Simon (Jesu niu pazanse Peter chiujiu kukhai-e).
Jacob khatdi pasai kariupiu John, panai hai Zebedee nahpiu kania-e (Jesu niu panaitu Boanerges, chiujiu kukhai-e, parambara, “Tingthung mai,” chiubo-e).
Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, Alphaeus nahpiu Jacob, Thaddaeus, lungthiubo Simon,
khatdi patu jonrabo piu Judas Iscariot paliu si-e.
Sigasu Jesu niu paky lam malanwang mide. Siga maidung kengsuikha wanglanbo jengniu Jesu nai pakhommaidungse katiu tiurabo wandi hamide.
Maidungniu, “Para kaluang mide,” chiu dinbo jengniu pakikhun mainiu patu maluangra wangde.
Sijengniu Jesu niu maidung situ pakhuga kuwang lujiu din champanbo thiujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Satan niu dechiujiu Satan tu hathon padralo?
Kadih khatniu paliu ronna njanpad lujiu paliu karai chari thiujiu aphensai, paliuse hami rabo-e.
Kikhun khatniu njanpad lujiu aphensai, paliu kaomi rabo-e.
Sikumjiu Satan wang kadihse njan misai, sise tingtheng lakge, chiudi kaomi rabo-e khatdi sise hami rabo-e.
“Katanbo piu situ ratmanmi makthen, mai khatniudi paky kampang lujiu pagu maniadungse sunglu lakge; chiudi patu ratman lubo sainiu, ngutlujiu pagu maniase sung rabo-e.
“Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, maidunggu nuan hina khatdi paliuniu kasabo dinbo hina bamliudi, sise kuak khai bine.
Chiudi mai khatniu Masanbo Hiupuina situ din masa-ye sai, patura wadaodi kuakkhai lakge, palamra paniu halan silakbo nuanse ten mibo-e.”
(Jesu niu haise dinbo rambara, maidung khangsianiu din-e, “Pakhuga kasabo hiupuina bamme,” chiujiu dinbo jengniu-e).
Siga Jesu singnamai nai papuise wangtangde. Paliuniu siga wanglujiu, patu phiu bamme chiubo chamse pakhuga paokhaide.
Jesu mungga ntaobam maidung siniu pakhuga din-e, “Phuilo, kajenglam napui nai nasingna maidungniu natu npaokhai nijiu chapkhuan bamme.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Asingna maidungse saolo? Apuise saolo?”
Paniu pamungga ntao magui bam maidungtu phuilujiu din-e, “Phuilo, haise apui-e, khatdi asingna maidung si-e!
Palamra Tingwang luni kambam maidungse asingna mai-e, atanpui mai-e, khatdi apui-e.”
Paniu paliutu katikhaiboga, din champanbo thiujiu katikhai-e. Sichiujiu paniu paliu khuga dinsude:
“Kinglo, mai khatniu chalin marukra tad padde.
Sichiujiu paniu luzamga alinse maruk suboga, kasianiu npuiga taokhaide, sise thingnaniu wangjiu khoitiu lude.
Kasianiu taniang kengmakbo turaliga taokhaide; alin pumse majadjiu puakkhang-e, palamra taniangse kengmakbo donniu, alinse puakkhang nuangbo-e.
Sichiujiu naimik padjiu naimik thaokhai suboga, alinbangdungse pamen sukmakbo jengniu kuinuang mide.
Kasiara tathujiuga taokhaijiu sibo bangdungse puakkhang-e, chiudi pasy masi ngamlak mide, palamra tathubang siniu sibo bangdungtu lungjin mide.
Chiudi kasianiu kadihtam kawiboga taokhaijiu, sibo bangdungse puakkhangjiu pasy kengjiu maside. Sichiujiu kasianiu samriu, kasianiu riak-charuk khatdi kasianiu kai chiujiu maside.”
Jesu niu munkomjiu din-e, “Pakuon bammai hina nking lulo!”
Jesu niu paronna bamboga, pachamse chiulumai khangsia maidung nai pakhommaidung khang kariu-je-niakiu siniu pakhuga wanglujiu paniu din champan khaibo rambase maniu-e.
“Naliuleng Tingwang gu Chawangdihgu kakungbose pikhai mibo-e,” chiujiu Jesu niu paokakge. “Chiudi lenlam bammai lengra pakhiangna hai din champan khaibo thiujiu pikhaibo-e.”
Sichiujiu: ‘Paliura phuijiu bamdi ngao lakge,
paliuniu nkingjiu bamdi silakge;
palamra paliuniu ngaolusai, khatdi silusai Tingwang khuga mariwang sai,,
paniu paliu nuanse kuak khai mirabo-e.’”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Din champan khaibo haitu naliuniu simak jiuma? Sichiusai, dechiujiu kaki-kibo din champan khaibo situ naliu singamlu ralo?
Chalin marukbo piu siniu, Tingwang ladkeng marukbo-e.
Chalin kasianiu npuiga taokhaiboga thingnaniu khoitiu lubose kumjiu maidung siniu chiukhai gapboga, Satan niu paliu khugasu luthon mibo-e.
Turaliga taokhai mibo kasia siniu, ladkengse paliuniu chiukhaiboga paliu chun wijiu lukhaibo-e.
Paliu lungchun kasuklam mengtang makbo jengniu sise tingtheng makge. Sijengniu paliuniu chiukhai lubo ladkeng jengniu magenthiu chariubo khatdi mathadbo wangsai paliu kaonuang mibo-e.
Khangsia maidung siniu tathu jiuga taokhai mibo kumjiu, paliudi ladkengse chiulubo-e.
Chiudi haibo ringting jengniu chalung pujiu, chakhiu chalan masenbo khatdi katam tambo lunidung siniu ladkeng situ kam maha mijiu pasy masi makbo-e.
Chiudi khangsia maidung sira kadihtam kawiboga taokhaijiu pasy kengjiu masibo kum, paliuniu ladkengse lukhaijiu, khangsianiu samriu, khangsianiu riak-charuk khatdi khangsianiu kai chiujiu masibo-e.”
Mahinbo hinase din madupad rabo-e, khatdi gomkhai bambo hinase lepad rabo-e.
Pakuon kabam hina nking lulo!”
Poinakha kabambo pakhuga khaisan bine, wadi kahabo piu khugasu poinakha bambo sidi luthon mine.”
Jesu niu din lan-e, “Tingwang gu Chawangdih haira maipiu khatniu paluga chalin maruk khaibo kumbo-e.
Paniu nchun jilujiu, nsuan padbo wan-ga alindungse puakkhang bamniude. Chiudi haise dechiu padmi jiulo chiubo paniu silu makge.
Sibo kadihtam siniu sibo bangdungtu pidi khangjiu, pasy masi sude; raiboga pabuan, sibosai pabui, sibo saiga pasy masi padde.
Sichiujiu pasyse minsubo tingga, khatdi atiatting wangboga, papaopiu siniu pagu nkhoina thinlujiu paluse gesude.
“Aliuniu Tingwang gu Chawangdih haitu dechiujiu din kada ralo?” chiujiu Jesu niu maniu-e. “Aliuniu dekumbo din champanbo thinjiu haisitu din kadakhai ralo?
Haise kadihpiriga siamthubo njengsiu kumbo-e, chiudi haise maipiu khatniu khoilujiu lingkhaijiu puakkhangboga,
pakak khat saiga dikhangjiu, dithubo bangse thiumibo-e. Sichiujiu sibo kedungse disuikhangbo ga thingnadung siniu wangjiu siga paliu sip ponkhaide.”
Jesu niu haichiu maidung khuga dinron tadboga, haichiu din champan khaibo siniu dinjiu katikhaide.
Din champan khaibo jaomakjiu paniu paliutu wadaodi katikhai makge. Chiudi paniu pakhommaidung situ majang tambo wan ga paliu khuga wahina hai din masan khaibi-e.
Sibonai chawanse Jesu niu pakhommaidung khuga din-e, “Aliuniu Ajai uigen khat lamse kenpadkhe.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu maidung situ phutkhai lujiu, Jesu niu bambo aliam lung gase ngutde. Siga aliamdung kakidi bamme.
Siga tingthung-tingkai katanbo khat wangjiu aliamse tadui nphumjiu malinra kum mide.
Siga Jesu ra aliam milamse kiulujiu chakhum makhum lujiu jipbam mide. Siga pakhommaidung siniu patu makiangjiu din-e, “Katipao yo, aliu shailajiu bamme, haise nangniu manangkhai mak jiuma?”
Jesu niu sulujiu tingthung-tingkai situ kasanjiu din-e, “Saomilo,” khatdi tadui kasuak bambo situ ru-e, “Mathak milo.” Siga tingthung-tingkaise saojing mide, khatdi rim-rim mide.
Sichiujiu Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Dekamjiu naliu haijiukha charen-ale jiulo? Naliu malum hakha jiuma?”
Chiudi paliura pingchang ping mide, khatdi khat-khat khuga dinsude, “Hainapiu hai saolo? Tingthung-tingkai khatdi tadui kasuakbo siniudi palad piu-e!”
Sichiujiu paliuniu Galilee Ajai hugen khatlam, Gerasa kadih lamse wangtangde.
Jesu niu aliam gasu npad gapboga, charaw lamsuniu wangbo piu khatniu patu adaode.
Hainapiu hai rasa phungbo jengniu charaw lam lungbambo-e. Chagiriang niudi patuse ratman silakjiu bambo-e.
Paphi pabense wajiukha ratman khai bidi paniu sibo giriangse kamtap-tap lujiu pakmi mibo-e.
Nchun n-nien simakjiu pahai charaw lam khatdi maluang lam rontadjiu, marajiu khatdi patu paronna tatuniu kadi ajamjiu kinbo piu-e.
Paniu Jesu tu ngaoluboga, pakwang, pamaga makhum kiude,
Khatdi pakhuan tanjiu din-e, “Kuthubo Tingwang Nahpiu, Jesu yo, atu dekam khaira nangniu machun jiulo? Tingwang zan gasu Iniu khengbo-e, atu sajai pikhai tulo!”
(Paniu haise dinbora Jesu niu pakhuga haichiu dinbambo donniu-e, “Kasabo hiupuina yo, hainapiu khugasu npad milo!”)
Sijengniu Jesu niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nazan sao kulo?” Paniu paokakge, “Azanra Dungdi chiu-e, palamra aliu riak hai kengsui-e.”
Sichiujiu paniu sibo luongriang gasu hathonmi makra Jesu khuga khengjiu bamme.
Sibo maluangphi gase kavak dungdi khat tangunjiu bamme.
Kasabo hiunadung siniu Jesu khuga kheng-e, “Aliutu kavakdung rong gahai pi-ngut khailo.”

Sichiujiu paniu paliutu suikhaiboga, rasadung siniu sibo piu khugasu npad lujiu kavakdung rong gase ngut mide. Siga kavakdung sang nia jiukha bambose chakhaolam jongkhaijiu ajai lung gase jongkhai kam mide.
Kavak khuanmaidungse paktadjiu, namdi lam khatdi luzam lamse padmibo chamse dinron tad mide, sichiujiu maidung siniu degu padmilo chiubo phuira tad karen sude.
Paliuniu Jesu khuga wangboga, rasa phungbo piu siniu pafai-pani khai mawi lujiu ntao bamniubo ngaoboga ping mide.
Rasa phungbo piu khuga khatdi kavakdung khuga degu pad milo chiubo ngaomaidung siniu, maidung khuga dinkhaide.
Sijengniu paliuniu paliu kadihse phut lujiu tadmira Jesu khuga kheng-e.
Jesu niu aliamse tong lujiu tadmira kamsubo tingga, rasa phungbo piu siniu pakhuga kheng-e, “I nasai suitad khaine.”
Chiudi Jesu niu patu suikhai makge. Sibosung, paniu pakhuga din-e, “Nakylam malan wang lujiu, Rapiu niu naleng dejiukha kamkhai bilo chiubo chamse paliu khuga dinkhai bilo.”
Sijengniu sibo piu siniu, Namdi Kariu gase tadlujiu, Jesu niu paleng degu kamkhai bilo chiubo chamse dinron sude; sichiujiu sibo cham chiulu maidung hina paliu suang hamide.
Jesu niu Ajai hugen khat lamse wanglanboga, maidung kakengkhaniu pakhuga wangde.
Maduiky gu chakampao, Jairus di siga wangde, paniu Jesu tu ngaoboga, pakwang paphiga makhum kiude.
Sichiujiu paniu kheng matanjiu kheng-e, “Anahpui hai mara-matanjiu bamme. Siniu lungsajiu akyga wangkhaijiu patu dikhailo, sichiusai pah wilubui-e khatdi ringlubui-e.”
Siga Jesu niu pasai suilujiu tadpadde. Siga maidung kengkha patu khommadui lujiu tad kinne.
Siga maipui khat takum kariu-je-niakiu tazai wangmibo pui bamme.
Sibo pui siniu pagu kabambo ponpadjiu, chapiu-chaga kasimai, phaimiudung khuga akhikhai mibo-e, chiudi wibibo thiu makjiu sabi-bi mibo-e.
Paniu Jesu rachamse chiuluboga, paniu maidung ruang gasu pasailam wang-e.
Paniu haichiu maning-e, “Iniu pafai-rise dikhai sai, wimi sune.”
Sichiu maning lujiu, paniu wang pafairise dikhaiboga, paniu tazai bambose winuang mide, khatdi palung chun gasu niudi parapotse wimide chiubo simide.
Sibo wan siakga pakhu gasu pumtan npad mide chiubo Jesu niu mide. Sijengniu maidung khulam paniu mariwang lujiu din-e, “Saoniu atu dijiulo?”
Pakhommaidung siniu paokakge, “Maidung haijiu khaniu natu khom maguiting bambo hai nang ngao bamlujiu dechiu, ‘Saoniu natu dijiulo,’ chiubo maniu jiulo?”
Chiudi sise saoniu dikhai jiulo chiubo Jesu niu ajangjiu phui bamme.
Maipui siniu pakhuga degu padmi jiulo chiubo paniu siluboga, pingboniu masandi-dijiu wang, paphiga makhum kiujiu, pakhuga padmibo hina paokhaide.
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Anahpui yo, nagu malum siniu natu wikhai mide. Agi-manaijiu tadsulo, khatdi nagu thiuniubo hina wimi sulo.”
Jesu niu haise din bamboga, Jairus ky lamsu walangtadmai khangsia wangjiu din-e, “Nanahpuise shai mide. Dekamjiu nangniu Katipao situ kampujiu bam ralo?”
Paliuniu dinbambo situ, Jesu niu chiu makbo kumjiu pakhuga din-e, “Manang mane, malumgap bamlo.”
Sichiujiu paniu Peter khatdi Jacob nai pasai kariupiu John tu makjiu kakimaitu pijiu pasai suikhai makge.
Paliuniu chakampao kygase wangboga, maidung siniu kap-huijiu bambo khatdi nkhiamjiu bambose ngaode.
Paniu kalunglamse ngut lujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Dekamjiu naliuniu haichiujiu kapbam jiulo? Ngena hai shai makge, pahai jibambo-e!”
Siga paliuniu patuse nui sude, chiudi paniu paliu mathiutu lenlam hapad mide, sichiujiu ngena pui nai papiu khatdi pakhommai khang sum situ puilujiu, ngenatu majikhai bambo kichen gase ngutde.
Paniu ngena bense julujiu pakhuga din-e, “Talitha koum,” chiubo rambara, “Ngena yo, sulo,” chiujiu Iniu nakhuga dinbo-e.
Siga pah buangsu nuang mide, khatdi tad mariu sude. (Pahai tingkum kariu-je-niakiu khangmibo-e). Haise padboga paliu suang hachang hamide.
Chiudi haise mai khuga din makra Jesu niu chamtan pikhaide, khatdi din-e, “Wa tiura paleng pikhai bilo.”
Jesu niu sibo bamse phut lujiu, pakhommaidung situ pakiluang lamse maluang lujiu wangde.

Tabamnaise paniu maduikygase wang lujiu katikhai sude. Siga maidung kengkha bamme, sichiujiu paniu katikhaibo gase paliu suang hajiu din-e, “Paniu pakhiangna haise delamsu silu jiulo? Dechiujiu paniu tasibo tienkamdung hai kamlu jiulo?
Pahai Mary nahpiu, tasingsiam kambo piuse makma? Pahai Jacob, Joseph, Judas khatdi Simon singnapiuse makma? Patanpui maidung haiga bambo makma?” Sichiujiu paliuniu patu lukhai makge.
Siga paniu thiuniumai khangsia piriga paben kaba khaijiu wikhaibo, makjiu katam-tambo tasibo tienkam kamlu makge.
Maidung siniu paliu malum wadi kahabo jengniu pasuang hamide.
Sigasu Jesu niu sibo wenjengga bambo namdung lamse rontadjiu katikhai sude.
Paniu pakhommaidung khang kariu-je-niakiu situ kulujiu, khang nia-nia thiujiu langkhaide. Paliuniu rasadungtu hathonpad ngambo pumtanse paliu khuga pikhaide,
khatdi paliu khuga chamtan pikhaide, “Naliuniu nbin tadboga, tathun makjiu, taruak, takheng tiubo beng, khatdi takhao lungga tasen-chalan wakhatdi phungtad mane.
Chaphitop khailo, chiudi ntiang malin phung mane.”
Paniu paliu khuga dinkiu lan-e, “Naliuniu nam khatga wangboga, naliutu lukhaibo kygase, sibo bam phutlan makthen siga bamlo.
Sichiujiu paliuniu maidung lung pili khaira, khatdi paliu nuan gasu mari lura dinron tadde.
Paliuniu rasadung kakeng khatu hathonpad khaide, khatdi thiuniu maidung kakengkha riga wasa nunkhaijiu paliutu wikhai bide.
Maidung khangsianiu din-e, “Pahai Elijah-e.” Chiudi khangsianiu din-e, “Pahai phaimiukakung khatle, ndagu phaimiukakung khat kumbo-e.”
Haise Herod niu chiuluboga, paniu din-e, “Pahai John Baptist si-e, Iniu papee dangmibo si-e, chiudi pah ringwang lanbo-e.”
Herod papum siakniu John tu minra khatdi ratlujiu kavangkyga khai mira chamtan pikhai mibo-e. Herod niu haichiu kambora, paniu maluang lung bambo pasingna Philip nao, Herodias donniu-e.
Siga John Baptist niu Herod khuga dinjiu bambo-e, “Nangniu nasingnapiu naotu maluang lungbo hai pajai makge.”
Sijengniu Herodias niu John Baptist tu palung pomchang pomjiu, patu kamshat mira phiu bambo-e, chiudi Herod bambo jengniu sise kam ngamlu makge.
Herod niu John tu nping-e, palamra John hai kawibo khatdi masanbo mai-e chiubo paniu si-e; sijengniu patu paniu wadi kam makge.
Kanamboga, Herodias niu pawan kawibo khat daolude. Haise Herod tu manabo tingmik, paniu chakampaodung, riphenpidung khatdi Galilee namdiga jupaodungtu maluang katiu tiubo nai-e.
Siga Herodias nahpui siniu wanglujiu chalen lenboga, Herod tu khatdi pagiang maidungtu pikim khaide. Sijengniu chawang siniu aliupui khuga din-e, “Nangniu degu lunilo? Nangniu lunibose pikhai bine.”
Paniu ladriat thiujiu pakhuga din-e, “Nangniu khengbose Iniu pikhai siakne, awang kadih paphan tangbo pikhai bine.”
Sijengniu sibo aliupui siniu npad lujiu papui khuga maniu-e, “Iniu degu khengralo?”
Siga papui siniu ladtikhai-e, “John Baptist peese khenglo.”
Aliupui siniu malanwang lujiu chawang khuga kheng-e, “Tuhoisiak John Baptist peese chakuang khatga khailujiu ponwangbotu Iniu luni-e.”
Tuhoira chawang hai palung magenthiu chang magenthiu mide, chiudi paniu pagiangmaidung suangga ladriat khai mibo jengniu kalan lulak mide.
Sijengniu John peese ponwangra, paniu akhemai khattu chamtan pikhaide. Sichiujiu akhepiu siniu kavangky lam tadlujiu John peese dangmide;
khatdi paniu chakuang khatga khailujiu ponwang aliupui khugase pikhai mide.
Haise John pakhommaidungniu chiuluboga, paphawse ponwang nphum mide.
Khommaidungse malanwang Jesu tu adaojiu paliuniu kamkhai mibo khatdi paliuniu katikhai mibo hinase pakhuga paokhaide.

Siga maidung tadpad tadngutjiu bam maidungse kengju mibo jengniu, paliu wa tiurabo wandi hamide. Sijengniu paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Aliu ronna pabam katingjingbo lam tadkhe, sichiujiu naliudi pakak khat mathak lulo.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu aliam gase ngut lujiu tajingbo bam khat lam tadsude.
Sichiudi maidung kakengkhaniu paliutu silude, sichiujiu paliuniu paliu namdungtu phut lujiu, Jesu nai pakhommaidung masuang raijiu wangsude.
Jesu niu aliam gasu npadboga, maidung situ phuikhaiboga, lungsaboniu phui mide, palamra paliuse milykhuanpao habo milydung kumjiu ngaokhaide. Sijengniu paliutu kengjiu paniu katikhai lan sude.
Haise rimibo wan-e, siga khommainiu wangjiu din-e, “Haise mai kahabo bamme, khatdi richang-ri mide.
Maidung haitu langkhai misulo, sichiujiu paliuniu kanabo luzamga khatdi namga tiuraleng piphiu tadmi sulo.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Naliuniu paliuleng wa tiura pikhai bilo.”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Aliuniu tadlujiu rangkang kai nia man taruak liulujiu wang paliutu kikhailo chiu jiuma?”
Siga Jesu niu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Naliu khuga taruak khuang dejiukha bamlo? Tadlujiu phui matailo?”
Paliuniu din-e, “Taruak khuang mangiu nai chakhapek nia bamme.”
Siga Jesu niu paliutu pijiu pathom thom thiujiu ntao khaira pakhommaidung khuga dinkhaide.
Sichiujiu maidungse kai thom, ringiu thom thiujiu ntao kiude.

Jesu niu taruak pek mangiu nai chakhapek niase thin lujiu, tinggen lam ngangsu lujiu, Tingwang tu thuonkiu khaide. Sichiujiu paniu taruakse phetpang lujiu maidung khuga njan khaira pakhommaidung khuga pikhaide. Chakhapek nia sidi paliu mathiu khuga sichiujiu njan khai bide.
Sichiujiu mai hina tiu magiu kamlude.
Sichiujiu khommaidung siniu tiu malipadbo chakha nai taruakse khoi maduiboga, chabeng kariu-je-niakiu khoiphui padde.
Siga katiumaise chamai sang mangiu-e.
Paniu maidungtu langkhai lubo saiga, pakhommaidung tudi aliam khat ganiu Ajai hugen khat lamse pamasuangga tadrai bamniura langkhaide.
Khommaidungtu ramnakhai lubo saiga, ramluong khatga kakheng thiura pah tadmide.
Chawanse wangsuboga, aliamse Ajai n-gangga bamme, siga Jesu ra kadihga bamme.

Pakhommaidungse aliam taiboga, magenthiu bamme chiubo paniu si-e, palamra tingkaise paliu khulam hunkhaijiu bamme, sijengniu nsuan wanchak sum nai charuk kakga paniu paliu khulam tadui rigasu tadwangde.
Sichiujiu paniu paliu mungnaga tadui rigasu tad wangbo paliuniu ngaoluboga, “Haise mahiu khatle” chiubo maning lujiu nping charen mide.
Palamra patu sichiu ngao luboga paliuse pingsui mide.
Siga Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Pingtulo, khatdi manang tulo, haise I-ye.”
Sichiujiu paniu paliugu aliam lung gase ngutde, siga tingkaise hunta mide. Sichiujiu pakhommaidungse paliu suang hachang hamide khatdi wathak thiura sita mide.
Sichiujiu chamai sang mangiutu kikhaibo rambase paliuniu sitang lumakge, paliu lungchun siniu makumtang lumakge.
Sichiujiu paliuniu Ajaise kenpad lujiu khatdi aliamse khinkhai diak lujiu Gennesaret ga wangde.
Paliuniu aliamse phutkhai gapboga, maidung siniu Jesu tu sinuang mide.
Pah bamme chiubo silubo jengniu sibo luongriangga bammai hinaniu thiuniubo mai hinatu paliu zi gasu ponwangde.
Sichiujiu Jesu niu tadkhaibo bam machangga, namdi gadi, luzam gadi, senky gadi thiuniu maidungtu puiwangjiu, pafairi nakhadi piditao khaira kheng-e, sichiujiu ditao khaimai hinatu wikhai bide.
Pharisee maidung khangsia nai Jerusalem lamsu wangbo Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung khangsia Jesu khuga wang madui bamme.
Siga pakhommaidung siniu, paliugu tajai saisuijiu paliu ben ntik makjiu wa tiubo paliuniu ngao lude.
(Palamra, Pharisee maidung nai Jehudi maidung siniu, paliu pao-pehdungniu katikhaibo saisuijiu tadkinbo-e: paliura tajai saisuijiu paliu ben ntik mawi maksai wa tiu makbo-e,
sichiujiu senky lamsuniu liuwangbose khiurai makthen tiu makbo-e. Sichiujiu paliuniu katam tambo tajaidung chiubora chakuang, chapiang, khatdi kakibo hinadi majai kamna kinbo-e).

Sijengniu Pharisee maidung nai Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung siniu Jesu khuga maniu-e, “Dekamjiu nakhommaidung hainiu aliu pao-peh maidungniu dinkhai diakbose majai makjiu, paliu bense tajai saisuijiu ntik masan makjiu wa tiu jiulo?”
Tingwang niu din-e, haibo maidungniu, paliu munniu atu chakhuang thiu-e,
chiudi paliu lungchun sira, akhugasu diuchang diu-e.
Paliuniu atu kahum bamdi, paliuleng kagengbo ha-e,
palamra chamainaniu kamlubo chamtanse,
Tingwang gu chamtan kumjiu katikhai-e!’
Sichiujiu Jesu niu din-e, “Naliuniu Tingwang gu chamtan haitu pajai khatlam khailujiu chamainagu chamtan situ katikhai-e.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu dinkiu-e, “Naliuniu Tingwang gu chamtan haitu lukhai mak lujiu, naliuniu katikhaibo chamtan situ pon makura kamme.
Palamra Mose niu chamtan pikhai-e, ‘Napui napiutu chakhuang thiulo,’ khatdi ‘Mai khatniu papui papiutu siangsai, pase shaimi sulo.’
Chiudi naliuniu katikhaibo sira, mai khatniu papui papiutu nkha lubuibo bamdi, haichiu din-e, ‘Haise Corban-e’, chiubora (haise Tingwang gu-e),
sichiujiu paniu papui papiutu nkha makra kamme.
Haichiujiu naliuniu maidungtu katikhaibo jengniu maidung siniu Tingwang ladtu lukhai makge. Sichiujiu naliuniu katam-tambo kengjiu kambo bamme.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu maidung situ pakhuga kuwang lujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu mathiu kinglo, khatdi silulo.
Lenlamsu ngutbo mania siniu mai khattudi kam tania makge. Chiudi mai khat khugasu padbo siniu kam taniabo-e.”
Pakuon kabam mai hina nking lulo.
Maidungniu patu saokhai lujiu tadmiboga khatdi paniu kalunglam ngutboga haibo rambase pakhommaidung siniu pakhuga maniu-e.
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Chiusai, naliudi maidung suang ningting sonbo makge. Haise naliu simak jiuma? Mai khat khuga lenlamsu ngutbo mania khatniudi patu kam tania makge,
palamra hainiu palungchun ga ngutbo makge, chiudi pawonpuiga ngutbo-e, sichiujiu papum lenlam tadmibo-e.” (Jesu niu haichiu dinbo sira, wa tatek tiubo hina suikamme chiubo madu khaibo-e).
Sichiujiu paniu dinkiu-e, “Chamaina lungchun gasu padbo siniu patu kam taniabo-e.
Palung lamsu, kasabo maning padbo siniu patu kamaobo tien thiura, agara, maitu gira,
npui-npiu thiura, patiuni-sabo khatdi katam-tambo kasabo hina chiubora, aratbo, pa-nkhai rili kasabo, manmabo, mai-ken tiabo, wasao thiubo, khatdi kapangbo lungchun
haikumbo kasabo hina hai chamaina lungchun gasu padbo siniu patu kam taniabo-e.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu saodiak lujiu Tyre namdi luongriang lamse tad mide. Paniu mai khat ky lungga ngut lujiu, pah bamme chiubo mai khat tudi pisikhai ni makge, chiudi nbaijiu bam ngam lulak mide.
Siga panahpui rasa phungbo maipui khatniu wanglujiu, Jesu phiga makhum kiujiu kheng-e.
Sibo pui sira nkengmai-e, patuse Syria gu Phoenicia gasu manabo-e. Paniu panahpui khugasu rasa situ hathonpad khaira Jesu khuga khengbo-e.
Chiudi Jesu niu patu paokakge, “Aliuniu nahmaidunggu tatekse khoilujiu tathitu pibo pajai makge.”
Paniu paokakge, “Katipao yo, chiudi nahmaidung kuangkai gasu kamtao kiubose tathiniudi khoitiu-e.”
Sijengniu pakhuga Jesu niu din-e, “Nangniu haichiu dinbo donniu nakylam wang sulo, nanahpui khugasu rasase npad mide.”
Sichiujiu paniu pakylam malanwang mide, khatdi panah khugasu rasase npad mijiu jibam niude.
Jesu niu Tyre luongriang situ phutkhai lujiu, Sidon tadron wangjiu, Galilee Ajai hugenlam, Namdi Kariu gase wangde.
Siga maidung khangsianiu pakuon tidbo khatdi palad padmakbo piu khattu puiwangjiu, pariga,paben kabakhaijiu wikhaira leng Jesu khuga kheng-e.
Sichiujiu Jesu niu patuse maidung rong gasu puipad mali lujiu, sinapiu kuonki nia gase pa-njung kariokhai lujiu khatdi patai masiukhai lujiu, paleese dikhaide.
Sichiujiu Jesu niu tinggen lam ngangphui lujiu, siudi thijiu sinapiu khuga din-e, “Ephphatha” chiubo rambara, “Lepad sulo.”
Siga sinapiu kuonse chiunuang mide, khatdi paleedi chalad dinpadnuang mide. Sichiujiu pase wadi kakhambo thiu makjiu chalad npao sude.
Haise mai khat khugadi din makra, Jesu niu paliu khuga chamtan pikhaide, chiudi paliuniu haibo lamga din mathiujiu dintad sude.

Sichiujiu haise chiulumai hina paliu suang hachang hamide. Sichiujiu paliuniu din-e, “Paniu wahina hai dechiujiu kamlu jiulo! Paniu pakuon tidmai tudi pichiu khai-e, khatdi palad padmak maitudi palad pipad khai-e.
Pating watheng makbo lungga, maidung kengjiu wang madui lande. Sichiujiu paliuniu wadi tiura hamibo tingga, Jesu niu pakhommaidungtu pakhuga kuwang lujiu din-e,
“Iniu haibo maidungtu lungsa-e, palamra paliuniu atu jeng sum maluangkhang mide, sichiujiu tuhoira paliu tiura leng wadi hamide.
Iniu paliutu kikhai makjiu paliu kylam langkhai sai, khangsia maira maliu midi sui-e, palamra paliu kadiu lamsuniu wangbo-e.
Pakhommaidung siniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Haikumbo ramjingga dechiujiu mai khatniu maidung haijiukha leng tiu kabuibo tatek daolu ralo?”
“Naliu khuga taruak khuang dejiukha bamlo?” chiujiu Jesu niu paliu khuga maniu-e.
Paliuniu paokakge, “Taruak khuang chinnia bamme.”

Maidung situ kadihga ntao kiura paniu chamtan pikhaide. Paniu taruak khuang chinniase thin lujiu Tingwang tu thuonkiu khaide, khatdi phetpang lujiu pakhommaidung khuga sise pikhaijiu, paliuniu maidung khugase njankhai bide.
Paliu khuga chakhapekdi bamniu-e, sise Jesu niu khoilujiu thuonkiu lujiu, sisedi paliu khuga njan khaira pikhaide.
Mai hinaniu tiu magiu lude, siga maidung riakse sang madai kumbo-e.
Siga tiu malipadbose khommaidung siniu khoimadui lanboga, chabeng chinnia khoiphui padde. Sichiujiu Jesu niu maidung situ paliu kylam langkhai mide.
Sichiujiu paniu pakhommaidung situ maluang lujiu, aliam khat gasu Dalmanutha luongriang lamse tadmide.
Jesu niu siudi thijiu din-e, “Dekamjiu thaidao ken-ga lungmaidung siniu tasibo lenra khengjiulo? Makge, Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e: haibo maidungleng katambo madan pikhai lanlak mide!”
Sichiujiu paniu paliutu saodiak lujiu, aliam lung gase ngut mide, khatdi Ajai hugen khat lamse kenpad mide.
Khommaidung siniu taruak phung mangaijiu khuang khat ronna phung lujiu, aliam lung gase tad kin-e.
Jesu niu paliutu rujiu din-e, “Phuilo, naliuniu Pharisee maidung nai Herod gu chakhi situ marisi lulo.”
Paliu ronna haichiu dinsude, “Paniu haichiu dinbo rambara aliu khuga taruak habo donniu-e.”
Paliuniu dinbambose silujiu, paniu paliu khuga maniu sude, “Dekamjiu naliuniu taruak habo donniu, manangjiu aribam jiulo? Naliu sitanglu makha jiuma? Haijiukha naliu chun hajiu bam rama?
Naliu mik bamme, chiudi naliu ngaomak jiuma? Naliu kuon bamme, chiudi naliu chiumak jiuma?
Iniu chamai sang mangiu leng taruak khuang mangiu phetpang khai mibose naliuniu mangaimi jiuma? Tiu malipadbose naliuniu chabeng dejiu khoiphui lulo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Kariu-je-niakiu.”
Jesu niu maniu lan-e, “Maidung sang madai leng Iniu taruak khuang chinnia phetpang khaiboga, tiu malipadbose chabeng dejiu khoiphui lanlulo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Chinnia.”
Siga paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Sichiudi naliuniu wadi sitang makha jiuma?”
Paliuniu Bethsaida ga wangbo tingga, maidungniu pamik tiatbo piu khattu Jesu khuga maluang wangjiu patu ditao khaira kheng-e.
Jesu niu pamik tiatbo piu situ paben julujiu kareng hanglam tadkiu mide. Sichiujiu paniu sinapiu mik gase patai masiukhai lujiu, patu kaba khaijiu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nang wa ngaoma?”
Sinapiu siniu ngangphui lujiu din-e, “ Yo, maidungtu ngao-e, chiudi paliuse singbang tadkinbo kumjiu ngao-e.”
Siga Jesu niu sinapiu mikga paben kabakhai lande. Siga sinapiu siniu wa phui nsijiu phuisuboga, wahina ngao masan mide.
Jesu niu patu paky lam langkhaijiu chamtan pikhai-e, “Nangniu sibo namgase ngutlan talo.”
Sigasu Jesu nai pakhommaidungse Caesarea Philippi mungga bambo namdung lamse tad mide. Npuikiga paniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Maidungniu I hai sao-e chiujiu dinlo?”
Paniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Naliura I hai sao-e chiujiu lukhailo?”
Peter niu paokakge, “Nangra Messiah si-e.”
Siga Jesu niu paliutu chamtan pijiu din-e, “Haise mai khat khugadi din mane.”

Sigasu Jesu niu pakhommaidungtu katikhai sude: “Chamai Nahpiuse wajiukha chariu magenthiubo khengsune, sichiujiu apaimaidung, singkudung, khatdi Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung siniu patu lukhai lakge. Patuse kamshat mine, chiudi pase jengsum saiga ringsu lanmi rabo-e.”
Paniu haise paliu khuga masan siakjiu dinkhaibo-e. Sijengniu Peter niu patu puipat mali lujiu rukhaide.
Chiudi paniu mariwang pakhommaidung situ phuilujiu khatdi Peter tu kasanjiu din-e, “Akhu gasu tadmilo, Satan. Nangniu maningbo haira Tingwang gu maning makge, chiudi chamainagu maning-e!”
Palamra mai khatniu pagu ringtingtu ranlura matansai, pase hami rabo-e, chiudi mai khatniu adon jengniu khatdi kawicham jengniu pagu ringting hakhai misai, patuse rankhai bine.
Mai khatniu kadihpiri pakhiangna daolujiu pagu ringting hamisai, paleng degu kagengbo bamlo? Sichiu makge.
Mai khatniu pagu ringtingtu nkhiak lurabo wa khatnadi ha-e.

Sichiusai, mai khatniu ajeng gasu khatdi agu kawicham jengniu haibo charatu simakbo khatdi kasabo ken-ga mangam misai, Chamai Nahpiu siniudi pakendibo Papiu nai masanbo mazadung masuangga wang dasai, pajengniu mangam rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu paniu dinkiu-e, “Haise maningtao lulo! Tingwang gu Chawangdihse paken dijiu wangbotu ngao makthen shaimak ramai haiga khangsia bamme.”
sichiujiu pafai-panidungse kapuangjiu ranran pad sude, kadihpiriga mai khatniudi haise kumjiu kam maka ngamlu lakge.
Khatdi pakhommaidung khang sum siniu Elijah nai Mose niu wangjiu Jesu tu npao bambo ngaode.
Peter niu padlujiu Jesu khuga din-e, “Katipao yo, aliuniu haiga bambo hai wi-e. Aliuniu naleng khat, Mose leng khat, khatdi Elijah leng khat chiujiu mathenky sum thiu khaine.”
Sichiudi paliu khang sumse pingchang-pingmide khatdi wadi dinra sita mide.
Paliuniu majatjiu khatdi ajangjiu phui-e, chiudi mai khat tudi ngao makge. Jesu ronna paliu khuga chap bamniu-e.
Sichiujiu paliuniu maluang gasu tadkiu lanbo tingga Jesu niu paliu khuga chamtan pijiu din-e, “Naliuniu ngaokhai mibose, Chamai Nahpiu siniu shailujiu ringsulan makthen, mai khat khugadi dintulo.”
Pagu chamtanse paliuniu majai-e, chiudi sibo lamga paliu ronna ari sude, “Kashaibo gasu ringsulanbo, chiubo ramba hai detulo?”
Sichiujiu paliuniu Jesu khuga maniu-e, “Dekamjiu Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung siniu Elijah wangraine chiu din jiulo?

Paniu paokak khaibo sira: “Elijah sira pachang siakjiu wahina kaden khaira wangrai kamigu-e. Chiusai dekamjiu Chamai Nahpiu situ lukhai makjiu magenthiu chariubo khengsonna rabo-e chiujiu Masanbo ariakniu din jiulo?

Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e: Elijah sira wangrai kamigu-e, khatdi maidungniu masenbo kumjiu paliuniu pakhuga kamkhai kamigu-e. Haise Masanbo ariakniu palamga dinkhai mibose wangtang raleng-e.”
Paliuniu khommai khangsiamai khuga wanglanboga, siga maidung kakeng khatu ngao-e, sichiujiu Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung khangsianiu paliutu arijiu bamme.
Paliuniu Jesu tu ngaoboga, paliu suang hamide, khatdi pakhuga pakwangjiu patu kahumme.
Siga Jesu niu pakhommaidung khuga maniu-e, “Dekumbo lamga naliuniu paliutu aribam jiulo?”
Maidung ruanggasu maipiu khatniu paokakge, “Katipao yo, Iniu anahpiutu nakhuga puiwangbo-e, palamra pakhuga rasa bambo jengniu pahai npaopad ngam makge.

Sichiujiu sibo rasa siniu kam mathad susai, patu tun nkhuang khaijiu, pamun gasu patai ta-nphopmi, pahiu kagetmi khatdi papum pakhiangna siakmi mibo-e. Iniu nakhommaidung khuga sibo rasa situ hathon khaira khengbo-e, chiudi paliuniu hathon ngam makge.”
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu hai dejiukha malum makbo mailo! Iniu dethengkha naliutu maluang bamralo? Iniu dethengkha naliutu nkhajiu bamralo? Ngena situ akhuga puiwanglo.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu Jesu khuga patu puiwangde. Sibo rasa siniu Jesu tu ngao kaji-kari, ngena situ kadihga tun nkhuangkiu, pamun gasu patai pi ta-nphop khai sude.
Jesu niu papiu khuga maniu-e, “Haise pating dethengkha wangmi jiulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Pah nadao gasu haichiu mibo-e.
Haichiujiu patu tadui chami gasu kam shatra kamjiu wangkinbo-e. Aliutu lungsajiu nkha khailo, nangniu nachun-e sai wikhai ngamme!”
Jesu niu din-e, “Yo, nang naronna suisai, malumbo mai khugara wahina ngam kamme.”
Papiu siniu senjiu din-e, “I malumme, chiudi bui makge. Atu nkha khailo!”

Maidung siniu pakhuga wang mana kinbo situ ngao lujiu rasa situ chamtan pijiu din-e, “Chaqon tidbo nai palad padmakbo hiuna yo, haibo nahpiu khugasu padmilo, sichiujiu wadaodi pakhuga ngutlan tamilo!”
Sibo hiuna siniu ngena situ kadihga tun nkhuang khai lujiu khatdi kam marakhai lujiu npad mide. Ngenase kashaibo kum mide; sijengniu mai hinaniu din-e, “Pahai shai mide!”
Chiudi Jesu niu sibo ngena bense jujiu patuse pisu chapsu khaide.
Jesu niu kalunglam ngutboga, pakhommaidung siniu pakhuga mahin maniu-e, “Dekamjiu rasa situ aliuniu hathonpad ngammak jiulo?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Kakheng thiuboniu makjiu wakhat niudi haikumbotu hathonpad ngam lakge.”
Paliuniu sibo bamse saodiak lujiu Galilee lamse tadwangde. Jesu niu pah dega bamlo chiubo mai khat tudi pi sini makge,
palamra paniu pakhommaidungtu haichiujiu katikhai bamme, “Chamai Nahpiu situ maidung khuga pikhaijiu kamshat mine, chiudi pase jengsum saiga ringsulan rabo-e.”
Haichiujiu katikhai bambo rambase, paliu sitanglu makge, chiudi paliuniu pakhuga maniuping-e.
Paliuniu Capernaum ga wangtangde, sichiujiu namga ngutboga Jesu niu pakhommaidung khuga maniu-e, “Naliuniu npuikiga nde lamga arikin jiulo?”
Chiudi paliuniu patu npao kak makge, palamra npuiki gase paliu ronna saoniu dithu ralo chiubo lamga arikhai mibo-e.
Jesu niu ntaokiu pakhommaidung khang kariu-je-niakiu situ pakhuga kuwang lujiu din-e, “Mai khatniu rainisai, pase mathiu suang nathurabo-e, khatdi mathiu vang thiu rabo-e.”
Paniu ngena khattu kuwang lujiu, paliu suangga pichap khai lujiu khatdi patu ben-gai lujiu paliu khuga din-e,
“Mai khatniu haikumbo ngena khattu azan-ga lukhai sai, atu lukhaibo-e; khatdi mai khatniu atu lukhai sai, atu ronna lukhaibo makge, chiudi atu langkhaibo Apiu tudi lukhaibo-e.”
John niu pakhuga din-e, “Katipao yo, mai khatniu nazan gasu rasatu hapad bamniubo aliu ngao lujiu, patu aliuniu kham mibo-e, palamra pahai aliu sai suimak mai-e.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Patu khammi tulo, palamra mai khatniu chamtan gasu tasibo ngam kambam sai, paniu atu kasabo kammi lakge.
Palamra aliutu atungmak maise aliugu thiurabo-e.
Haise maningtao lulo! Naliuniu asai kasuibo jengniu mai khatniu naliutu tadui piang khat sakra pikhai bisai, pagu tathuonse daosiak rabo-e.”
Mai khatniu atu malumbo nahmai khattu paphi masuira nuan-ga jukhai rabo suang, paniu tatupen pawongga khinkhai lujiu duipuiga thonkhai miboniu wi-nkiu-e.
Sijengniu natu nabenniu pimao khaisai, danthon milo! Naben nia bam lujiu midlan lakbo charuidihgu chamijiuga natu thonkhai mirabo suang, ben khat hajiu tingtheng karingboga ngutbo siniu wi-nkiu-e.
[Siga parikse wadaodi shai lakge, khatdi sibo mise wadaodi midlan lakge]
Khatdi naphiniu natu pimao khaisai, danthon milo! Naphi nia bamlujiu charuidihga thonkhai mirabo suang, naphi khat hajiu tingtheng karingboga ngutboniu wi-kiu-e.
[Siga parikse wadaodi shai lakge, khatdi sibo mise wadaodi midlan lakge]
Khatdi namik khatniu natu pimao khaisai, ladthon milo! Mik nia bamlujiu charuidihga thonkhai mirabo suang, mik khat hajiu Tingwang gu Chawangdihga ngutboniu wi-nkiu-e.
Siga parikse wadaodi shai lakge, khatdi sibo mise wadaodi midlan lakge.
“Palamra mai hinatu matai maruakbo kumjiu maruak rabo-e.
Sigasu Jesu niu sibo bamse phut lujiu Jordan giu kenjiu Judea ramluong lam tadmide. Siga chamai mendi pakhuga wanglande, sichiujiu paniu paliutu katikhai kinbo kumjiu katikhai sude.
Pharisee maidung khangsianiu wanglujiu patu tathak thiujiu manra kamsude. Paliuniu maniu-e, “Aliu khuga dinkhai janlo, aliugu Tacheng-tajai ganiu mai khatniu panao tabo suima?”
Jesu niu maniubo chamniu paokakge, “Mose niu naliu khuga dekumbo ladriat pikhai bilo?”
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Mose niu sibo ladriat naliu khuga raokhaibo sira, naliu lung tanjubo jengniu raokhaibo-e.
Chiudi nda paphibangga, ting-kadihtu damkhaibo tinggara, ‘Tingwang niu npiumai nai npuimaitu damkhaibo-e,’ chiujiu masanbo ariakga dinkhaibo-e.
Sijengniu npiumai siniu papui nai papiutu phut lujiu panaotu lung aruangmi rabo-e,
sichiujiu khang niase khat thiumi rabo-e.’ Sijengniu panaise nia makjiu khat thiu mibo-e.
Sichiusai Tingwang niu aruang khai mibo situ, chamainaniu kam npek mimak rabo-e.”
Paliuniu kalung lamse ngutbo tingga, pakhommaidung siniu haibo lamga Jesu khuga maniu lan-e.
Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Mai khatniu panaotu talujiu katambo puitu lunglan sai, paniu panao khuga makha mibo-e.
Sikumjiu maipui khatniu pakinatu malujiu, katambo piu khuga lunglansai, pase makha mibo-e.”
Maidung khangsianiu nahmaidung piriga pijiu kabakhaira, Jesu khuga maluang wang-e. Chiudi pakhommaidung siniu paliutu kasanjiu rukhaide.
Haise Jesu niu siluboga, palung pomjiu pakhommaidung khuga din-e, “Paliutu akhulam wangra kham tulo, palamra Tingwang gu Chawangdihse haikumbo nahmaidung gu-e.
I niu naliu khuga palingjiu dinbo-e chiubora mai khatniu haibo nahmai khat kumjiu Tingwang gu Chawangdih situ lukhai maksai wadaodi siga ngutsi lakge.”
Sichiujiu paniu nahmaidung situ pamlujiu paliu mathiu riga paben kabakhaijiu thoikhai bide.
Jesu niu npuikiga tadpadboga, mai khat pakwang pamasuangga khudung kiujiu, pakhuga maniu-e, “Kawibo Katipao yo, tingtheng karingbo daora Iniu degu kam ralo?”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Dekamjiu nangniu atu kawibo chiu kujiulo? Tingwang makbo mai khatdi kawibo ha-e.
Ladrianse nangniu sijiu bamme: ‘Maitu gimane; makha mane; aga mane; mai khat tudi arat madam mane; maitu sontiu mane. napui napiutu chakhuang thiulo.’”
Sinapiu siniu din-e, “Haibo ladriandung hai Iniu nda nahting gasu majaijiu lungkhang mibo-e.”

Jesu niu patu lungsabo mikhuanniu phuilujiu din-e, “Nakhuga wakhat machang makha-e. Tadlujiu, nagu kabambo hina jonlujiu, kaleksa maidung leng njan khai milo, sichiusai tinggen dihga nang kalekwi rabo-e; sichiujiu wang asai suilulo.”
Sinapiu siniu haise chiuluboga, pazu kin masuk mide khatdi pachun sajiu tadmide, palamra pase kalek wi-chang wibo piu-e.
Jesu niu pakhommaidung situ ajang phuilujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Kalekwi mainiu Tingwang gu Chawangdihga ngutrabo hai dejiukha kunglo!”
Haibo cham donniu pakhommaidungse paliu suang hamide. Chiudi Jesu niu dinlan-e, “Anahmaidung yo, Tingwang gu Chawangdihga ngutrabo hai dejiukha kunggulo!
Kalekwi mai khatniu Tingwang gu Chawangdihga ngutrabo suang, qontrao khatniu npin miga buang ngutbo siniu mala diang-e.”
Siga pakhommaidungse paliu suang ha matan mide; khatdi paliu ronna khat-khat khuga maniu-e, “Sichiusai, saokum mainiu ranlubo hai ngaolu ralo?”
Jesu niu paliutu phui mating lujiu din-e, “Haise chamaina lengra daolakge, chiudi Tingwang lengra wadi daolakbo thiu makge.”
Siga Peter niu din-e, “Phuilo, aliura wahina saodiak lujiu nasai suitad kinbo-e.”

Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Yo, haise Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e: mai khatniu ajeng gasu khatdi kawicham jengniu paky, palu, papui-papiu, pasingna, patan-panahtu haibo ringtingga phutkhai sai, paniu nkiujiu daorabo-e.
Paniu haichiujiu chariu magenthiubo khengkhai sai, padam kai nkiujiu chaky, chalu, papui-papiu, pasingna, patan-panah hai wangkinbo ringtingga daorabo-e, khatdi tingtheng karingbose daorabo-e.
Sichiujiu tuhoi mai kakeng khaniu raijiu bamdi kanammi rabo-e; khatdi mai kakeng khaniu kanamjiu bamdi raimi rabo-e.”

Tuhoira paliu Jerusalem lam tad kinne. Pingbijiu tadkinbo pakhommaidung suang, Jesu tadrai mide, khatdi maidung siniudi pingbijiu suitad karen kinne. Siga Jesu niu pakhommaidung khang kariu-je-niakiu situ puipad tamlujiu, pakhuga padrabo hinase dinkhai lande.
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Phuilo, aliuniu Jerusalem lam tad kinbo-e, siga Chamai Nahpiu situ singkudung nai Tacheng-tajai katipaodung ben-ga pikhaimi rabo-e.
Sichiujiu paliuniu, patu tanui thiujiu, tatai masiu khai sune, dapsune, khatdi kamshatmi mine. Chiudi pase jengsum saiga ringsulan rabo-e.
Siga Zebedee nahpiu kania, Jacob nai John niu Jesu khuga wanglujiu panainiu din-e, “Katipao yo, anaileng wakhat kamkhaira luni-e.”
Jesu niu panai khuga maniu-e, “Iniu nanaileng degu kamkhai ratu luni jiulo?
Panainiu paokakge, “Nangniu pakendibo nawangbamga wangbo naise, anai khang khattu naben majatlam, khang khattu naben mawuilam, natu maluang ntao machamra anainiu lunibo-e.”
Panainiu paokakge, “Yo, Ania ngamme.”
Jesu niu panai khuga din-e, “Iniu sakrabo piangse nanainiu sakngam sune khatdi atu tadui nphum rabo kumjiu nphum ngam sune.
Chiudi aben majatlam, maksai mawuilam ntaora pikhai rabo sira angam makge. Haisira Tingwang niu kadakhai lujiu, kadenkhai mibo maidung leng-e.”
Khommaidung khang kariu siniu haise chiuboga, Jacob nai John tu paliu lungpom karen mide.
Sijengniu, paliutu pakhuga kuwang lujiu Jesu niu din-e, “Maidung niura paliugu mawangpaodung-e chiumai siniu, maidung riga pumtan thinne, khatdi jupaodung siniu chamtan thin-e.
Chiudi haise naliu ruanggara sichiumak rabo-e. Naliu mai khat kumboniu dinisai, paniu mai mathiutu machamai thiurabo-e.
Khatdi naliu mai khat kumboniu karaibo thiunisai, paniu mathiu vang thiurabo-e.
Palamra Chamai Nahpiu sidi patu macha khaira wangbo makge, chiudi paniu maidungtu macha khaira, khatdi chamai kakengtu ranlu raleng, pagu ringting pipadra wangbo-e.
Jesu niu pakhommaidung nai maidung kakeng khatu maluang lujiu Jerikho ga wangboga, pamik tiatbo Tima nahpiu, pazanniu Bartima kubo khatniu npuiki mungga ntao lujiu takhengtiu bamniu-e.
Paniu Nazareth Jesu wangkin-e chiubo chiuluboga, pakhuan tanjiu sen-e, “David Nahpiu, Jesu yo, atu lungsa khailo!”
Siga maidung kakeng khaniu patu kasanjiu, maliumak bamra din-e. Chiudi paniu pakhuan tanliang- liangjiu sen-e, “David Nahpiu, Jesu yo, atu lungsa khailo!
Jesu niu mathakkiu lujiu din-e, “Patu kuwanglo.”
Siga paliuniu pamik tiatbo piu situ kulujiu din-e, “Nachun wilulo! Sulo, paniu natu kujiu bamme.”
Siga paniu pafaise gaopad lujiu pachun wijiu, Jesu khulam machaojiu wang-e.
Jesu niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Iniu naleng degu kamkhai ratu nangniu machun jiulo?”
Pamik tiatbopiu siniu din-e, “Katipao yo, atu pi-ngao khailo.”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Tadsulo, nagu malum siniu natu wikhai mide.” Siga pah ngaonuang mide, sichiujiu paniu Jesu saisui lujiu tad mide.
Paliuniu Jerusalem manawang suboga, Bethphage nai Bethany namdiga wangboga paliuniu Olive Luong gase khangde, Jesu niu pakhommai khangniatu haibo lad dinkhaijiu langkhai masuang mide,
“Nanai masuangga bambo nam gase tadsulo. Nanainiu siga mengtang gapboga qonniam poi wadaodi tong matai makhabo khat daosune. Sise khilujiu haiga juwanglo.
Siga mai khatniu nanai khuga. ‘Sise dekam ralo?’ chiu maniusai haichiu pakhuga dinlo, ‘Papaopiu siniu pageng bambo-e, khatdi langwang lanbi rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu panaise tadde, khatdi qonniampoise puidi mung katiangga khinkhai bambo daode. Sichiujiu panainiu khijiu bamboga,
pamungga chapbam mai siniu panai khuga maniu-e, “Sibo qonniampoise khilujiu dekam ralo?”
Jesu niu dinkhaibo kumgapjiu panainiu paokak khaiboga, panaitu paliuniu suikhai bide.
Paliuniu qonniampoise Jesu khuga juwang lujiu, paliu faise sibo riga thapkhai biboga, Jesu se tongsude.
Maidung kakeng khaniu paliu faise puikiga thapkhai sude, khangsia mainiu chapiuniw danlujiu thapkhai sude.
Pasai pasuang lam tadkinmaidung siniu haichiu sensude, “Hosanna! Rapiu zan ga wangmaitu Tingwang niu thoikhai bilo!
Wangkinbo aliu piu David wangdihtu Tingwang niu thoikhai bilo! Tingwang tu thuonlo!”

Jesu niu Jerusalem ga wanglujiu, Charaky lungga ngutde, khatdi wahina awa-ajangjiu phuikhaide. Chiudi haise chawan rimibo donniu Bethany lamse pakhommaidung khang kariu-je-niakiu situ maluang lujiu tadmide.
Pasaibo naise, paliuniu Bethany gasu malan wangboga, Jesu mariu mide.
Paniu pabam khatga phuimengboga, paniw lung nphob bambo ndutbang khattu ngaolujiu, daolu buisai chiujiu tadpadle. Chiudi paniu siga mengboga, paniw ronna daode, palamra haise ndutsy masibo ken makge.
Jesu niu ndutbang situ din-e, “Mai khatniudi nakhu gasu nasyse tiulan tamilo!” Haichiu paniu dinbose pakhommaidung siniu chiu bamme.

Paliuniu Jerusalem ga wangtangboga, Jesu niu Charaky lunggase ngutlujiu, wa jonjiu khatdi liujiu bammaitu hathon sude. Rangkang nkhiakjiu bammai nai makhao jonjiu bammai kuongkaidung khatdi paliu bamdungse tun taliang sude,
sichiujiu paniu mai khattudi Charaky lenlam wakhatdi pijiu ponpad makge.

Sichiujiu paniu maidungtu katikhai sude: “Tingwang niu dinbose Masanbo ariakga raokhai nbambo-e. ‘Araky haitu mai hinaniu, jat hinagu kakheng thiubo ky chiujiu kurabo-e!’ Chiudi naliuniu haisitu agatiumai nbaibam pithiu khai mide!”
Singkudung nai Tacheng tajai katipaodungniu haise chiulude, sijengniu paliuniu Jesu tu kamshatra npui phiusude. Paliuniu patu ping-e, palamra mai hinase pagu katikhai gase paliu suang hajiu bambo-e.
Chawanse wangsuboga, Jesu nai pakhommaidung namdise phudkhai lujiu tadmide.
Pasaibo nai nsuan kalu paliuniu npuiki gase tadwangboga, paliuniu ndutbangse ngaode. Haise pamen katangna shaimi bamniubo paliuniu ngao lude.
Degu padmilo chiubo maningtao lujiu, paliuniu Jesu khuga din-e, “Phuilo, katipao yo, nangniu siangkhaibo ndutbangse shai mide!”
Jesu niu paliutu paokakge, “Tingwang tu malumlo.
Iniu naliu khuga pachangjiu dinbo-e, mai khatniu malum siakjiu, wadi malum masabo thiumakjiu, haibo maluang situ duipui gase thonkhai milo chiu dinsai, sise padmi rabo-e.
Haijengniu naliu khuga Iniu dinbo-e: Naliuniu kakheng thiujiu, wakhat khengsai, naliu daosiak lune chiubo malumlo, sichiusai naliuniu kakhengbo hinase naliu khuga pikhai rabo-e.
Khatdi naliuniu kakheng thiura chapsu dasai, naliu khuga maokhai mimai situ kuak khai bilo, sichiusai tinggen lam bambo naliu Piu siniu naliu maose kuakkhai bine.
Naliuniu maidungtu kuak khai maksai, tinggen lam bambo naliu Piu siniu naliu nuanse kuak khai lakge!”
Paliuniu Jerusalem ga wangjiu Charaky lungga Jesu niu tad mariujiu bamboga Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung khatdi apaimaidungse pakhuga wangde.
Sichiujiu pakhuga maniu-e, “Haibo ngamdung hai kamra nagu maji degu bamjiulo? Haibo majise saoniu natu pikhai jiulo?”
Jesu niu paliutu paokakge, “Iniu naliu khuga wakhat maniune, sichiujiu naliuniu atu paokak khaisai, Iniu haidungse kamra agu maji degu bamlo chiubo Iniu naliu khuga dinkhai bine.
John niu tadui nphumbogu majise delam sulo; haise Tingwang khuga suma maksai chamaina khuga suniulo?”
Paliu karai ari sude. Aliuniu degu dinralo? Aliuniu ‘Tingwang khuga suniu-e,’ chiusai paniu din-e, ‘Sichiusai dekamjiu naliuniu John tu malummak jiulo?’
Chiudi aliuniu ‘Chamaina khuga suniu-e chiusai...’” (Maidungtu paliuniu ping-e, palamra mai hinaniu John hai phaimiukakung khatle chiujiu lukhai-e).
Sijengniu paliuniu Jesu tu paokakge, “Aliu simakge.”
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Sichiusai, degu majiniu haidungse Iniu kambo gulo chiubo naliu khuga dinkhai lakge.”
Sichiujiu mumsyse atiat ting wangsuboga paniu kavang khattu pareng mathak khaidiak maidung khuga padam lura langkhaide.
Mathak khai maidung siniu kavang situ minlujiu dapkhai bide, khatdi wadi pikhai makjiu matha kalan khai mide.
Sigasu papaopiu siniu kavang khattu langkhai lande; mathak khai maidung siniu patu dapjiu kam mangam khaijiu langkhai bide.
Papaopiu siniu kavang khattu langkhai lande, siga paliuniu patu kamshat mide.

Tuhoira langkhai lanrabo sira paniu kungbo panahpiuse ronna mide. Sichiujiu, kanam thuboga, paniu panahpiu situ mathak khai maidung khugase langkhaide. Paniu din-e, ‘Anahpiu tura paliuniu chakhuang thiusu rabo-e.’
Chiudi mathak khai maidung siniu khat khat khuga din-e, ‘Hainase papaopiu nahpiu kalek lurabo si-e. Wanglo, aliuniu patu kamshat mikhe, sichiusai pagu maniadungse aliugu thiumi rabo-e!’
Sichiujiu paliuniu panahpiu situ kamshat lujiu paphawse kareng lenlam thonkhai mide.
“Sichiu dasai, mumsireng paopiu siniu degu kamsu ralo?” chiujiu Jesu niu maniu-e. “Paniu wanglujiu simaidung situ kamshat lujiu katammai khuga mathak khai mirabo-e.
Pachangjiu naliuniu haibo Masanbo ariakse kentao bamrabo-e,
‘Chaky kathiu maidung siniu pageng ha-e chiujiu thon mibo tu siniu
wahinagu kungthubo thiumi rabo-e.
Haise Rapiu niu kamkhai mibo-e;
dejiukha maisuang habo gulo!’”

Jehudi maidunggu katingmaidung siniu Jesu tu minra kam sude, palamra paniu din champan khaibo hai paliutu dinbambo-e chiubo paliuniu simide. Chiudi maidung situ paliuniu pingbo jengniu, patu phutkhai lujiu tadmide.
Pharisee maidung khangsia nai Herod rupgu khangsiatu wa maniubo tathak gasu Jesu tu minra langkhaide.

Paliuniu pakhuga wanglujiu din-e, “Katipao yo, nangra mai khat tudi pi chariukhai makjiu majibose din-e chiubo aliu si-e. Nangra mai khat tudi manang makjiu Tingwang lamga majibose katikhai-e. Siniu Romai Wangdipiutu ramkha pibo hai aliugu Tacheng-tajaiga suima suimaklo? Aliu khuga dinkhailo. Aliuniu sise pirama, maksai pimak ralo?”
Chiudi Jesu niu paliu thakse ngaolujiu haichiu paokakge, “Dekamjiu naliuniu atu madiu bamjiulo? Rangkang-gi pum khat akhuga khoiwanglo, I phui mataine.”
Paliuniu rankanggi khat pakhuga khoiwang-e siga paniu maniu-e, “Haise sao menglo khatdi sao zanlo?”
“Wangdipiu gu-e” chiujiu paliuniu paokakge.
Siga Jesu niu din-e, “Wide, sichiusai Wangdipiu guse Wangdipiutu pimilo, khatdi Tingwang guse Tingwang tu pirabo-e.”
Jesu gu chamkakga paliu suang hamide.

“Katipao yo, aliuleng Mose niu raokhai diakbo cheng sira: ‘Mai khatniu panao thiujiu panah lungmakjiu shaimi sai, sinapiu saikariupiu siniu sibo kamipui situ lulujiu shai mibo piu nahleng panainiu lungkhai rabo-e,’ chiu-e.
Sichiujiu pawan khatga mai khangkhat pasingnadung khang chinnia bamniu-e; tingthubo piu siniu panao thiulujiu panah lungmakjiu shai mide.
Sigasu niabopiu siniu sibopui situ lulande, padi panah lungmakjiu shailan mide. Pasumbopiu khugadi sichiu padlande,
sichiujiu paliu mathiu khuga padde: singnadung khang chinnia siniu sinapui situ maluang lung khaide, chiudi ngena khatnadi lungmakjiu shaikam mide.
Tuhoira, kashaimaidung hina ringsulanbo naise ringsulan dasai, pase saonao ralo? Paliu khang chinniase patu maluang lung kam mibo-e.”
Jesu niu paliutu paokakge, “Dejiukha naliu hai maolo! Haise naliu simak jiuma? Haise naliuniu Masanbo Ariakkhuangtu maksai Tingwang gu pumtantu simakbo jengniu-e.
Palamra maidung siniu ringsulan dasai, paliuse tinggen gu mazadung kummi rabo-e, siga tanao-tanah thiubo bamlakge.

Tuhoira, kashaimaitu piringsu lanbo lamga, Mose gu Ariakkhuangga chaphepiu taobo lamga, naliuniu kentao makma? Siga haichiujiu raokhai bamme chiubora Tingwang niu Mose khuga din-e, ‘I hai Abraham Rawang-e, Isaac Rawang-e khatdi Jacob Rawang-e.’
Pahai kashaimai Rawang makjiu, karingmai Rawang-e. Naliu hai maoju mide!”
Tacheng-tajaigu katipao khatniu paliu npao bambose chiulude. Sadducee maidungtu Jesu niu paokak mawikhai mide chiubo paniu silujiu, paniu pakhuga wanglujiu maniu-e: “Dekambo ladrian siniu kungthulo?”
Rapiu Tingwang tu, nalungchun pakhiangna, nahiupuina pakhiangna, namaning pakhiangna khatdi napumtan pakhiangnaniu lungsalo.’
Niaboga kungthubo ladrian siniu: ‘Naky ningmaitu napum kumgapjiu lungsalo.’ Haibo ladrian nia riga nkiubo ha-e.”

Khatdi mai khatniu Tingwang tu palungchun pakhiangna, pamaning pakhiangna khatdi papumtan pakhiangnaniu lungsa rabo-e; khatdi paniu pakining maitu papum kumgapjiu lungsa rabo-e. Tingwang khuga khaoring kadkhaijiu, wa katam tambo kadkhaibo suangdi, haibo ladrian nia haitu majaibo siniu wi-nkiu-e.”
Haibo saiga mai khatniudi Jesu khuga wa maniu huta mide.
Jesu niu Charaky lungga katikhaijiu bamboga, paniu maniu-e, “Dechiujiu Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung siniu Messiah haise David riangrui-e chiu dinjiulo?
Masanbo Hiupuina siniu David tu kachu khaijiu din-e:
‘Rapiu niu a-Rapiu khuga din-e:
Iniu nagu mikremaitu naphipa hangga khaimak then,
aben majatlam ntao bamlo.’
David papum siakniu patu ‘Rapiu’ chiu ku-e sai dechiujiu Messiah hai David kai-kik thiusi ralo?”
Chamai mendi khatniu Jesu chamtu chunwijiu nking bamme.

Paniu paliutu katikhaijiu haichiu din-e, “Paliu ntiang kathengbo khailujiu senkiga maidungniu paliutu chakhuang thiujiu kahum khaira tad kinbo mai, sichiujiu maduikyga, khatdi khumkiboga pabam kawibotu kadajiu tadkinbo mai, Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung situ mari lulo.
Paliuniu kamipuidung ma ruptiujiu khatdi paliu ky humtiujiu kinbo-e, sichiujiu kakhengthiu mathengbo jai kamjiu bambo-e. Paliugu mathadse dejiukha sa nkiu ralo!”
Jesu niu Charaky gu rangkang bung mungga wang ntaolujiu, maidungniu paliugu rangkang thonkhai bambotu phui bamme. Lungwi maidung kakeng khaniu rangkang kengjiu thonkhai bamme;
siga kaleksabo kamipui khatniu wanglujiu paisa ginia, chiubora damli khat siga thonkhaide.
Paniu pakhommaidung situ ku madui lujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e chiubora haibo kaleksabo kamipui hainiu maidung suang kengjiu kadkhai bamme.
Palamra maidung siniu paliugu lungwibogu malipadbose khai-e; chiudi para haijiukha kaleksajiu bamdi, paniu tiujiu ringlu buibo, pagu kabambo hinase pikhai mide.”
Jesu niu Charaky gasu tadpadboga, pakhommai khatniu din-e, “Phuilo, katipao yo! Haise dejiukha ngao wibo kydunglo khatdi dejiukha maisuang habo tudunglo!”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Naliuniu haibo ky dungse ngaoma? Tatukang khatnadi masiak khai lakge, pakhiangnase kaladthon kammi rabo-e.”
Peter, Jacob, John khatdi Andrew niu Jesu khuga mahin wangboga, Jesu se Charaky kenpad lujiu Olive Luongga ntaobam niu-e.
Paliuniu din-e, “Haise dedao padsu ralo, khatdi haidungse padsu rabo tingga dekumbogu tasibo padsu ralo chiubo aliu khuga dinkhailo.”
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Ningting sijiu bamlo, sichiujiu naliutu mai khatniudi pijiu sonmi tulo.
Maidung kakeng khaniu chamtan gasu wangjiu din sune, ‘I hai pa-e!’ sichiujiu paliuniu maidung kakeng khatu aratjiu son sune.
Khatdi naliuniu pabam hinaga tathiu-chari khuan chiu sai manangmi tulo. Haikumbo hinase padsiak rabo-e, chiudi haisiniu kanambo wangmide chiubo makge.

Kadih khatniu kadih khattu chari thiu sune; chawang kadih khatniu chawang kadih khattu aphen sune. Pabam hinaga kathi wangsune, khatdi charakhum wangsune. Haidungse ngenatu manabo thad thiu karaibo kumbo-e.
Chiudi kanambose wangtang makhaga Kawicham hai mai hina khuga dinron khai rabo-e.

Sichiujiu naliutu minlujiu ladzankyga jukhaibo tingga naliuniu degu dinralo chiujiu manangmi tulo; naliu khuga pikhaibose dinlo. Palamra naliuniu dinrabo chamse naliugu makge; sise Masanbo Hiupuina khugasu wangrabo-e.
Maidung siniu paliu singna siaktu kamshat raleng pipad sune, khatdi papiudung siniu paliu nahdungtu pipad sune, sichiujiu panahdung siniudi paliu pui-piudung situ pipad sune.
Adonjengniu naliutu mai hina mareng sune. Chiudi kanambo tangna khenglu mai situ rankhaibi rabo-e.
Chaky riga bambo piu siniu kalungga pagu mania khoira nkum mak rabo-e.
Chaluga bambo piu siniu pafai khoira chakyga malanwang mak rabo-e.
Sibo tingga pawon kaphungpuidung nai npampuidungse dejiukha chariu ralo!
Haikumbose tathe tingga padmakra Tingwang khuga khenglulo!
Palamra sikumbo magenthak haise nda Tingwang niu kadih dambo gasu tuhoi tangbo pad makhabo-e. Khatdi haikumbose wadaodi padlan lakge.
Chiudi Rapiu niu sibo tingmik riakse kam madun khai mide; paniu sichiu khaibi maksai, mai khatdi ringsi lakge; paniu kadalu mai jengniu sibo tingse kam madun khaibo-e.
“Sichiusai, mai khatniu nakhuga, ‘Phuilo, haiga Khrista se bamme!’ chiu dindi sise malummi tulo.
Palamra aratbo khristadung khatdi aratbo phaimiukakungdung padsu rabo-e. Tingwang niu kadalubo maitu tangbo sonra paliuniu maisuang kahabo khatdi tasibodung kamsune.
Kaden sijiu bamlo! Patingse wangtang makhaga pakhiangnase naliu khuga Iniu dinkhaibo-e.
chagandungse tinggen lamsu tiakiumi rabo-e, khatdi tingpuk lam bambo pumtandungse paliu bam kalimi rabo-e.
Sichiusai Chamai Nahpiuse kamuang gasu pumtan nai maken dibo jaojiu madukiu surabo-e.
Sichiujiu Tingwang niu kadalu maitu khom maduira kadih pake madai gase mazadung situ langkiu rabo-e.
“Ndutbang siniu naliutu ngiudon khat katikhaibo thiululo. Paniwse madiakwangjiu khatdi pamum padsu dasai, kariak tingse wangkinne chiubo naliuniu si-e.
Sise kumjiu, naliuniu haidungse padbo ngao dasai, patingse nawang kinne chiubo sirabo-e.
Haidungse tuhoi lungbam maidungniu shaikam makhaga padrabo-e chiubo maningtaolo.
Tinggen nai kadihse hami rabo-e, chiudi agu ladkeng sira wadaodi halakge.
Akhe sijiu bamlo, mathing sijiu bamlo, palamra pating pawanse dedao padralo chiubo naliuniu simakge.
Haise maipiu khatniu pangamse kamraleng pavangdungtu khaidiak lujiu, khatdi kamun khuanbo piutu akhera khaidiak lujiu chabin tadmibo kumbo-e.
Sichiusai, kaden silo, palamra papaose dedao chakyga malanwang ralo chiubo simakge. Haise chawandi sui-e, chundingdi sui-e, nsuan kaludi sui-e, maksai naimik padgapbo gadi sui-e.
Paniu bungjiu wang dasai, nangniu jibamniubo paniu daomak rabo-e.
Sichiusai, Iniu naliu khuga dinbo hina hai, mathiu khuga dinbo-e. Akhe sijiu bamlo!”
Paliuniu din-e, “Aliuniu haise changee tingga kammak rabo-e, palamra maidung siniu chakhuan-chara kampadmi rabo-e.”
Siga maidung khangsiara paliu lung pom mide, khatdi khat khat khuga dinsude, “Parim wibo haitu haichiujiu kam nchum bambo hai pageng degu bamjiulo?
Haise rangkang kai sum suang kengjiu jonlu bui-e, sichiujiu kaleksa maidungtu njankhai lubui-e.” Sichiujiu paliuniu pakense tiak sude.
Chiudi Jesu niu din-e, “Patu pijiu pakhen pani pithiu milo! Dekamjiu naliuniu patu kam kabuak bamjiulo? Paniu kawibo khatdi matai kawibo ngamse akhuga kamkhai bambo-e.
Naliuniu kaleksa maidung tura tingtheng maluang bamrabo-e, sichiujiu naliuniu daolubo wan ga, paliutu nkhakhai ngamme. Chiudi naliuniu atura tingtheng maluang bam lakge.
Paniu kangambose paniu kam bambo-e, atu baikhai rabo tiense paniu kamkhai masuang bambo-e.
Tuhoi, Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, chiubora kadihpiri pabam hinaga kawicham dinron bamthen, paniu kamkhai mibo hai, patu maningtaobo thiujiu dinbammi rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu, khommai rong gasu khang khat, Judas Iscariot siniu dibo singku paodung khulam Jesu tu jonra tad mide.
Paniu dinbo gase paliu chunwi mide, sichiujiu patu rangkang pira ladriat thiu lude. Sijengniu Jesu tu paliu khuga pikhaira pajad kawibo hai Judas niu phiu sude.
Chakhi khaimakbo Taruak tiubo, Kenpadbo Ngee maluadleng milypoi kamshatbo naise pakhommaidung siniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Aliuniu debo bamga Kenpadbo maluadse kaden khaira nangniu lunilo?”
Siga paniu paliu rong gasu khangniatu haichiu dinjiu langkhai mide, “Namdi gase tadsulo, siga mai khatniu taduikhiu ponkin niubo nanainiu daosune.
Pasai suilujiu paniu ngutbo kygase ngutlo, khatdi chaky npao khuga haichiu dinlo, ‘Katipaoniu din-e, Iniu pakhommaidungtu maluang lujiu Kenpadbo Ngee maluad tiurabo bamse degalo?’
Siga paniu chakaigen lam kaden mawikhai bambo bamse lenkhai sune, siga nanainiu aliu mathiuleng wahina kaden khailo.”
Khommai kania siniu namdi lamse tadde, siga Jesu niu dinkhaibo kumgapjiu daode; siga panainiu Kenpadbo Ngee maluadse kaden khaide.
Chawanse wangboga, Jesu niu pakhommaidung khang kariu-je-niakiu situ maluang lujiu wangde.
Paliuniu chakuangkaiga katiu tiu bamboga, Jesu niu din-e, “Iniu pachangjiu naliu khuga dinbo-e, chiubora naliu rong gasu mai khatniu atu suimakjiu pipadmi sune.”
Siga pakhommaidungse paliu chunsa mide, khatdi khat-khat thiujiu pakhuga maniu sude, “Iniu ma, Iniu ma?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Haise naliu rong gasu pagu taruakse chakuang khatga atu sumtiu macham bambo siniu-e.
Chamai Nahpiu haira Masanbo ariakniu dinbo kumjiu shairabo-e; chiudi Chamai Nahpiu situ suimakjiu pipadbo piu sira dejiukha sansabo gulo! Patu mana wangmak tasai, pasan wi-nkiu rabo-e!”
Paliu katiu tiujiu bamboga, Jesu niu taruak khuang khat thinsu lujiu, Tingwang tu thuonjiu kakheng thiu khailu, khatdi phetpang lujiu pakhommaidung khuga pikhaijiu din-e, “Haise tiulo, haise atia-e.”
Sibosai paniu chapiang sidi ponsu lujiu, Tingwang tu thuonkiu lujiu, paliu khuga pikhaide, sise paliu mathiu sakde.
Jesu niu din-e, “Haise maidungleng luangkhai mibo zai, khatdi Tingwang gu ladriat situ madan diangkhai mibo chamtan si-e.
Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e: haibo mumjawse, Iniu Tingwang gu Chawangdihga wangjiu kasanbo mumjawse saklan makthen, wadaodi sak lanlak mide.”
Sichiujiu paliu chalui khat thiujiu, Olive Luong lamse tadpad mide.
Chiudi Iniu ringsulan dasai, naliu masuangga Iniu Galilee lam tadrai bamniu sune.”
Siga Peter niu paokakge, “Mai kakimainiu phutmi tadi, Ira wadaodi natu phut lakge.”
Jesu niu Peter khuga din-e, “Iniu nakhuga pachangjiu dinbo-e: thaichun maruirengniu khuang lonnia makbo suangga, nangniu atu simakge chiujiu dinlon sum rabo-e.”
Peter niu patun tanjiu paokak lan-e, “Iniu wadaodi sichiu lakge, Iniu kashaibo tangjiu natu maluang bam rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu kakibo pakhommaidung siniudi sikum gapjiu din kamme.
Paliuniu Gethsemane kubo bam gase wangde, siga Jesu niu pakhommaidung khuga din-e, “Iniu kakheng thiubo lungga, naliu haiga ntaobam niulo.”
Sichiujiu paniu Peter, Jacob khatdi John paliutu maluanglu tadmide. Siga chunsabo nai nchungboniu palung phui mide.
Siga paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Alungchun hai magenthiubo siniu, I shaira kum mide. Haiga naliu kakheng thiujiu bamniulo.”
Paniu poinakha tadpad lujiu kadihga makhumkiu lujiu, daolu buisai, magenthiu chariubose wangmak raleng kheng-e.
Paniu haichiu kheng-e, “Abba, Apiu yo, wahina nakhu gara sui kamme. Magenthiu chariubo piang hai akhugasu luthon khailo. Chiudi Iniu maningbo makjiu, nangniu nachunbo thiulo.”
Sichiujiu paniu malan npadboga, khommai khang sumse jibing bamniubo daode. Paniu Peter khuga din-e, “Simon, nguiniu naliu sangjiu ma? Wanchak kak khat lengdi naliuniu raksu ngamlak siakjiu ma?”
Sichiujiu paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Akhe sijiu bamlo, khatdi kahiamboga kaokhai makra naliu kheng lulo. Hiupuina sira masenjiu bamme, chiudi chapum sira son-e.”
Paniu tadpad lanlujiu kalu kumgapjiu kheng lande.
Sichiujiu paniu malanwang lanboga, pakhommaidungse jibing bamniubo daolande; paliu mikse rakpad lulak siakjiu bamme. Siga paliuniu pakhuga wadi dinra sita mide.
Paniu malanwang pasumboga, paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu mathakjiu jibam khama? Buimide! Pawanse wangtang mide! Phuilo, Chamai Nahpiu situ tuhoira nuan phungmai ben-ga pikhai mide.
Sulo, tadsukhe. Phuilo, atu suimakjiu pipadbo piuse haiga wang bamde.”

Jesu niu haichiu dinbamga pakhommaidung khang kariu-je-niakiu gasu khang khatse chiubora Judas se wangtangde. Paniu dibo singku paodung, Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung khatdi apaimaidungniu langkhaibo chaheng-changiu thinmai situ, majang lujiu wangde.
Sichiujiu pipad khaibo piu siniu maidung khuga madan khat pikhai-e, Iniu biangpup khairabo piuse naliuniu machun kinbo piusi-e. Patuse minlujiu khatdi ratlujiu puitad milo.”
Judas se wangtang gapda, paniu Jesu khuga wang lujiu din-e, “Katipao yo!” chiujiu patu biangpup khaide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu Jesu tu minlude khatdi thinman lude.
Chiudi siga chap bammai rong gasu khang khatniu paheng thadpad lujiu Dibo Singku vangpiu kuonse septap mide.
Siga Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Atu hai Tacheng-tajaiga kamaomai kumjiu, naliuniu atu minraleng, chaheng-changiu thinlu wangkin jiuma?
Naimachang Charaky lungga Iniu naliutu katikhaijiu maluang bambo-e; siga naliuniu atu min makge. Chiudi haise Masanbo ariakga raokhai bambose wangtang raleng-e.”
Sichiujiu pakhommaidung hinase patu saokhai lujiu pakkam mide.
Chiudi akhangmai khatra fainoi ronna ben lujiu, Jesu saisui kin-e. Paliuniu patudi minra kamsude.
Siga paniu pafaise thonkhai diak lujiu papumruang paktad mide.
Sigasu Jesu tu Dibo Singku khuga juwangde, siga dibo singku paodung hina, apaimai hina khatdi Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung hina wang madui bamme.
Peter se sailam npen bijiu suitad kinne, khatdi Dibo Singku ky jeng gase wangde. Siga akhemaidungtu padi maluang lujiu chami magajiu bamme.
Singkupaodung nai apaimaidung siniu Jesu tu kamshatra pamao phiujiu bamme, chiudi paliuniu wakhatdi daomakge.
Jengdin kakeng khaniu Jesu riga aratbo madam khaijiu bamme, chiudi paliugu jengdinse macham makge.
Sichiujiu maidung khangsianiu chapsu lujiu Jesu riga aratbo jengdin madam khaijiu bamme.
“Maidungniu thiukhaibo Raky hai rathon milo, chiusai jengsum lungga chabenniu thiu makbo khat paniu thiu lubui-e,’ chiu dinbo aliu chiu-e.’”
Sichiudi paliuniu madam khaibose wakhatdi macham makge.
Dibo Singku siniu paliu mathiu masuangga chapkhang lujiu Jesu khuga maniu-e, “Paliuniu nariga kamaobo madam khaijiu bambo haiga nang wadi paokakra hajiuma?”
Chiudi Jesu niu maliu makjiu bamme, wadi din makge. Siga Dibo Singku siniu patu maniu-e, “Nang hai Sanwibo Tingwang Nahpiu Messiah sima?”
Siga Dibo Singku siniu pafai phetjiu din-e,, “Aliuniu kakibo jengdin lusonra hade!
Paniu Tingwang tu ping makjiu dinbo hai chiulude. Naliu degu maninglo?”
Paliu mathiudi patu din masa karen sude, “Pahai mao siakge, patu kamshatra bui-e.”
Paliu khangsianiu Jesu gen-ga tatai masiukhai sude, khatdi pamik dom lujiu patu dapjiu din-e, “Saoniu natu dapbam jiulo din matailo.” Sichiujiu paliuniu patu julujiu kaphi sude.
Dibo Singku vangpui khat kamalam padboga, Peter ntaobam kha-e.
Peter niu chami magajiu bambose paniu ngao luboga, patu phui mating lujiu din-e, “Nangdi Nazareth Jesu sai suibo mai khatle.”
Chiudi paniu sise suimakge. “I simakge--nangniu dinbambose I simakge,” chiujiu paniu paokakge. Sichiujiu kama lenlam tadpad mide. Siga maruireng khuang mide.
Sibosai kavangpui siniu patu ngaolan lujiu pamungga chap bammai khuga din-e, “Padi paliu ruangga khang khatle.”
Chiudi Peter niu suimak lande.
Bamnak lubo sai, pamungga chap bammai khatniu din lan-e, “Nangdi paliu ruangga khang khatle chiubo suimak silakge, palamra nangdi Galilee gasu-e.”
Siga Peter niu din-e, “Iniu pachangjiu dinbo-e, chiubo siang ngamme. Naliuniu din bambo piutu Ira simakge!”

Siga maruireng siniu khuang lonnia mide, siga Jesu niu pakhuga dechiu dinkhai milo chiubo Peter niu maningtaode, “Maruireng siniu khuang lonnia makhaga nangniu atu simakge chiujiu dinlon sum rabo-e.” Siga pase pachun sachang sajiu kapsude.

Nsuan kaluse dibo singku paodung siniu kalangjiu katingmaidung, Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung khatdi Apaimai mathiutu ku aruang lujiu makhiam thiu sude. Paliuniu Jesu tu ratlujiu Pilate khuga julu wangde.
Siga Pilate niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nang hai Jehudimai wangpiu sima?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Nangniu dinbo si-e.”
Singkupaodung siniu Jesu tu kengchangkha madam khaijiu bamme.
Sijengniu Pilate niu pakhuga maniu lan-e, “Nang paokak khailak jiuma? Paliuniu madam khaijiu bambo hina hai nkinglo!”
Jesu niu wadi dinmakge, siga Pilate se pasuang hamide.
Kenpadbo Ngee machangnaga bangkhai bambo rong gasu maidungniu khengbo mai khattu Pilate niu phutkhai khai-e.
Sibo tingga maipiu khat pazanniu Barabbas kubo kabuakbo gasu maitu gimibo jengniu kavangkyga khai bamme.
Maidungniu wang madui lujiu sise kamkhai raleng Pilate khuga kheng sude,
Paniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Iniu Jehudimai wangpiu tuse phutkhaira naliuniu lunima?”
Singkupaodung siniu Jesu tu pakhuga pikhaibo lamse paniu simasan bamme, palamra paliuniu patu manmabo donniu-e.
Chiudi dibo singku paodung siniu maidungtu kalung lujiu, Barabbas tu paliuleng phut khaira Pilate khuga khengra dinkhaide.
Pilate niu maidung khuga dinlan-e, “Sichiusai, Iniu Jehudi mai wangpiu situ degu kamralo?”
Paliuniu senjiu din-e, “Patu masengshat milo!”
Siga Pilate niu maniu-e, “Paniu degu kamaobo kamkhai mibo bamjiulo?”
Paliuniu sen matanjiu din-e, “Patu masengshat milo!”
Pilate niu maidung situ pikimkhai nijiu paliuleng Barabbas tu phutkhai mide. Khatdi Jesu tu chariangniu dapkhai lujiu masengshat mira pikhai mide.
Riphendung siniu Jesu tu dihthinpao ky jengga pui ngutde khatdi paliu rupmaitu ku maduide.
Paliuniu Jesu tu liklikbo fai benkhai bide, khatdi tathu keniu kambo pirun papeega runkhaide.
Sigasu paliuniu patu kahumjiu din-e, “Jehudi mai wangpiu yo, tingthengjiu ring bamlo!”
Sichiujiu paliuniu patuse tathun thin lujiu papee kakhiujiu, pazuga tatai masiu khaide, khatdi khudung kiujiu pamasuangga makhum kiude.
Paliuniu patuse haichiu thenjiu nuimen khai lubo sai liklikbo faise khoipad lan mide khatdi pafaise benkhai lanbide. Sichiujiu paliuniu patu singchaiga jumaseng raleng puitad mide.
Paliuniu Jesu tu Golgotha parambaniu “Tapeeruang luang” chiu kubo bamga puimengde.
Siga paliuniu patu jaw nai singmendui kakhabo khai ajalujiu pisakra kamme, chiudi Jesu niu sise sakhai makge.
Siga paliuniu patu jumaseng khaide khatdi pafaise paliuleng njanra, taden thonjiu phuide.
Paliuniu patu jumaseng subose nsuan wanchak chakiu ga-e.
Patu madam khaibo ladkeng siniu raokhai-e: “Jehudi mai Wangpiu.”
Paliuniu agatiumai khang nia tudi Jesu tu maluang maseng macham khai-e. Khatniu paben majatlam, khatniu paben mawilam chiujiu jumaseng khaide.
Haise Masanbo ariakniu dinbose wangtang raleng-e, “Paniu kamaomai dam lumacham khai-e.”
Tuhoira singchai gasu nkumlo khatdi naronna natu ranlulo!”
Sise kumjiu, dibo singku paodung nai Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung siniu Jesu tu nuimenjiu, khat khat khuga din-e,
“Paniu maidung tura rankhai-e, chiudi paronna patu rankhai ngam makge. Tuhoira Israel mai Wangpiu Messiah siniu singchai gasu nkumbo aliu phuikhe, sichiusai aliuniu patu malum rabo-e!”
Sichiujiu Jesu tu maluang jumaseng macham khaibo khangnia siniudi patu din masajiu bamme.
Niending tingga kadih pakhiangna, wanchak kak sum tamiu wang-e.
Wanchak sum kiuboga Jesu niu pakhuan tanjiu senpadle: “Eloi, Eloi, lema sabachthani?” Sibo rambara, “A-Rawang yo, A-Rawang yo, dekamjiu nang atu phutmi jiulo!”
Siga bammai khangsianiu pakhuanse chiulujiu din-e, “Kinglo, paniu Elijah tu kujiu bamme!”

Paliu ruangga mai khatniu sak sabo jawse wapong khatga sumlujiu tathun ton-ga runglujiu pakwang, sise Jesu mun-ga madon khai-e. Siga mai khatniu din-e, “Khuanno, Elijah niu wangjiu patu singchai gasu lukiukhai suma aliuniu phuikhe!”
Pakhuan tanjiu senkhai lujiu Jesu shai mide.
Singchai mungga chapbambo riphenpi siniu Jesu dechiu shaikiu milo chiubo ngao-e. Paniu din-e, “Hainase pachangjiu Tingwang Nahpiu siakge!”
Paliu hai Jesu niu Galilee ga bambo gasu suikinbo, khatdi patu nkha khaijiu kinbo puidung-e. Jerusalem lamsu patu maluanglu wangbo puidung kakengkhadi siga bamme.
Siga Arimathea maipiu, Joseph niu wangbo hai chawan ramliang mide. Pahaise Apaimai ruangga chakhuang thiubuibo, Tingwang gu Chawangdihtu khuanbambo mai khatle.
Haise Kadenbo Nai-e (chiubora, Tabamnai suangbo nai-e) sijengniu Joseph niu Pilate khuga papum siakniu tadlujiu Jesu pum situ khengde.
Jesu se shaimide chiubo chiuluboga Pilate se pasuang hamide. Paniu riphenpi situ kulujiu Jesu se shaimibo nakkha mijiuma chiubo maniu-e.
Riphenpi ladse chiuluboga Pilate niu Jesu pumse lusui-e chiubo Joseph khuga dinkhaide.
Joseph niu papumse ponkiu lujiu sise fainoiniu majiukhai lujiu, tatuga bungkhaibo rawga baikhai mide. Siga paniu charawse tatu kadibo khatniu kaladsim mide.
Siga Mary Magdalene nai Joseph pui Mary siniu phuijiu bamme sichiujiu Jesu pumse dega khaimilo chiubo phuijiu bambo-e.
Tabamnaise loimibo saiga, Mary Magdalene, Jacob pui Mary khatdi Salome paliuniu Jesu pumga wasa hai manuk khaira tadde.
Nidnai nsuan kalu, naimik padgapbo tingga paliuniu charao lamse tadsude.
Paliuniu npuiki gase khat khat khuga din-e, “ Saoniu aliuleng rawkham tuse kaladpad khai ralo?” (Sibo tukang haise disuang kha-e).
Sichiujiu paliuniu phuikhangboga tatuse kalad padmi bamniu-e.
Sijengniu paliuniu charao gase ngutle, siga paliuniu akhangmai khat, chafai kakabo benlujiu, majat jailam ntaobam niubo ngaode. Siga paliu hai pingchang-ping mide.

Siga akhangmai siniu din-e, “Naliu ping mane, naliuniu singchaiga masengshat mibo Nazareth Jesu situ phiukin-e chiubo I si-e. Pah haiga hade—pah ringsulan mide! Phuilo, paliuniu haise patu baikhaibo bam haisi-e.
Tuhoira tadlujiu Peter nai pakhommaidung khuga haibo champao hai pikhai bilo: ‘Naliu masuang Galilee ga pah tadrai mide; paniu naliu khuga dinkhai mibo kumjiu naliuniu patu siga adao sune.’”
Sijengniu paliuse charao gasu paliu lung magenthiubo nai pingboniu phuilujiu paktad sude. Paliuniu mai khat khugadi dinmakge, palamra paliu hai pingchang-ping mide.
[Jesu niu kashaibo gasu ringsulan lubo saiga, Nidnai nsuan kalu paniu rasa chinnia hathonpad khaibo pui, Mary Magdalene khuga lenkhai raithu-e.
Paniu tadlujiu pakahmaidung khuga dinkhai bide. Paliuse kapjiu achungbam kamme]
Jesu ringbamme, khatdi paniu ngao-e chiubo paliu khuga dinboga, paliuniu patu malum makge.
Haibo saiga, Jesu niu paliu khangnia khuga, panainiu namdi npuikiga tadkinboga pathak tamjiu lenkhai-e.
Panainiu malanwang, kaki maidung khu dinkhaiboga paliu malum makge.

Kanamthuboga, Jesu niu pakhommaidung khang kariu-je-khatkiu siniu katiu tiubamboga lenkhai-e. Paliuniu malum habo donniu, khatdi pah ringbamme chiubo ngaolu maidungtu paliuniu malum makbo jengniu sigasu paliu lungchun tanbo jengniu paliutu paniu rukhai bide.
Paniu paliu khuga din-e, kadihpiri pabam machang tadchiajiu Kawibo Champao hai chamai jat hina khuga paoron khailo.
Mai khatniu malum lujiu tadui nphum lusai, patuse rankhai bine; mai khatniu malum maksai patuse kammao khai bine.
Malum maidung situ maisuang habo ngam kamra pumtan pikhai bine; paliuniu chamtan gasu rasadungtu hathonpad lune; paliuniu katam tambo ladniu dinsune;
paliuniu kaniu thinsu bamdi, maksai karabo-tai tiu-sak bamdi, wadi lakge; paliuniu thiuniumai riga paliu ben kabakhai sai wilu rabo-e.”

Khommaidung siniu pabam machang dinron tad sude, khatdi Rapiu niu paliutu maluang tatien thiukhai-e chiubo paliuniu dinron tadboga maisuang habo tienkamdung siniu madukhaijiu paliugu malum hai kam matip khai-e. (Chaladriang 9-20 haise khangsia maigu ariak gara khai makge).
Aliu ruangga padmibo lamga maidung kakengniu raopad raleng paliu lai padjiu kamkhai mibo-e.
Aliuniu dinbo kumjiu paliuniu raokhai mide chiubora paphibang gasu paliuniu haidungse ngaolujiu pachamdi paoron khai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu, Pakendibo piu yo, Iniudi paphibang gasu phui mawikhai mibo donniu, padmibo saisuijiu Idi nakhuga raokhai sai wisune chiu maningbo-e.
Iniu haise raokhaibo lamra nangniu katikhai mibo, majibo lamga masan siakjiu silura leng-e.
Panai khangniase Tingwang mikphuiga matipjiu Rapiu gu Tacheng-tajai hina majaijiu khatdi kadin piujiu lungbam mai-e.
Panaira panai nah lung makge palamra Elizabeth hai nakampui-e, khatdi Zechariah panai khangniase thenthui mide.
Naikhatra Zechariah damdi wangtangjiu Charaky lungga singku tiense kamra wangde.
Paliugu singku cheng saisuijiu paniu rathakbamga maru mataora taden thonpadle. Sijengniu paniu Rapiu gu Charaky lungga ngutde,
paniu maru matao bambo wan gase maidungniu lenlam kahumjiu bamme.
Paniu maru matao bamga, rathakbam majadlamse Rapiu gu maza khat chapbambo patu lenkhaide.
Zechariah niu patu ngaoluboga pingmide khatdi manang mide.
Chiudi maza siniu pakhuga din-e, “Pingtulo, Zechariah yo! Nangniu khengbo rathoise Tingwang niu chiukhaide, sichiujiu nanao Elizabeth niu piumainah khat lungsune. Nangniu pazan John chiujiu kurabo-e.
Pah lungwang dasai nang dejiuga chunwi-matha ralo, khatdi maidung kakeng niudi dejiukha chunwi ralo!
Pahai Rapiu mikphuiga kadibo mai khat thiu rabo-e. Para mumjaw maksai chiangna sakmak rabo-e. Patu managap gasu Masanbo Hiupuina siniu phuikhai mirabo-e,
sichiujiu paniu Israel mai kakengtu paliu Rapiu Tingwang khulam malankhai birabo-e.

Pahai phaimiukakung Elijah kumjiu pumtan bamjiu khatdi tanjiu Rapiu masuangga tadrai sune. Paniu papiudung nai panahdungtu pui aruang khai lanne; paniu kadin piumakbo nahdungtu tacheng matipbo lun-lungga jukhaine; paniu Rapiu maidungtu kadenkhai rabo-e.”
