Zechariah niu maza khuga din-e, “Haise dechiu pad ralo chiubo Iniu dechiu silu ralo? I tanpao mide, khatdi anaodi tanpeh mide.”

Chiudi pawan wangtang dasai majijiu padrabo haise, nakhuga Iniu dinkhaiboga nangniu malum makge. Haise nangniu malum makbo jengniu, nakhuga Iniu ladrian thiukhaibo haise wangtang makthen nakhuan hamijiu, npao ngamlak mirabo-e.”
Sichiujiu bamga maidung siniu Zechariah tu khuanjiu, paniu haitheng-theng dekamjiu Charaky lungga bammi gulo chiujiu paliu suang hajiu bamde.
Paniu padlanboga, paliutu npao ngamlak mide, sijengniu Charaky lungga wa tasibo khat ngao mide chiubo paliuniu simide. Paniu pakhuan pad lulak mibo donniu, pabenniu paliu khuga kamlen khaide
Zechariah niu Charakyga patiense loilujiu paky lam malanwang mide.
Sibosai panao Elizabeth papum ripmide, sichiujiu chahiu mangiuse paky gasu tadpad makjiu bam khangde.
Sichiujiu Elizabeth niu din-e, “Tuhoira Rapiu niu kanamboga atu nkha khai bide. Maidung ruangga Iniu mangambo haise paniu luthon khai bide.”
Elizabeth niu papum ripmibo chahiu charuk tangmiboga Tingwang niu pagu maza Gabriel situ Galilee ga bambo Nazareth namdakga langkhaide.
Chawang David kiriang gasu Joseph leng khammibo riliu khatleng champao paniu phungwangde. Riliupui zanse Mary chiu ku-e.
maza siniu pakhuga wangjiu din-e, “Nakhuga agi-manai bamlo! Rapiu niu natu maluang bamme khatdi natu dijiu thoikhai bide! Npuimai ruangga nangra sanwibo pui-e.”
maza gu champao siniu Mary lungchun kam chariusui mide, sibo cham siniu degu padsu ralo chiubo pasuang hamide.
Siga maza siniu pakhuga din-e, “Pingtulo, Mary yo, Tingwang niu natu lungsa khai bide.
Nangniu napum ripjiu nangnah piumai khat lungsune, khatdi nangniu pazanse Jesu chiu mathak rabo-e.
Pase paken dirabo-e khatdi Kukachangbo Tingwang Nahpiu chiujiu kurabo-e. Rapiu Tingwang niu papao David kumjiu patu chawang khat pithiu khai rabo-e,
khatdi paniu Jacob kai-kikga tingthengjiu chawang thiurabo-e; pawangdihse wadaodi pamalan thiulakge!
Mary niu maza khuga din-e, “I hai liuchang khatle. Dechiujiu haikumbose padsu ralo?”
maza siniu paokakge, “Masanbo Hiupuina siniu nariga wangrabo-e sichiujiu Tingwang pumtan nariga wangkiu rabo-e. Haijengniu masanbo ngena situ Tingwang Nahpiu chiujiu kurabo-e.
Naky phiuga Elizabeth tu maningtaolo. Pase thenthui mibo sai, tuhoi papum ripbo chahiu charuk tangmide, patuse nakampui chiujiu kumibo-e.
Palamra Tingwang niu kam ngammakbo wadi ha-e.
Mary niu din-e, “I hai Rapiu vangpui-e, nangniu dinbo kumjiu akhuga padmi sulo.” Siga mazase tadmide.
Sibosai Mary niu kalangjiu Judea ramluonggu namdi khatga tadmide.
Paniu Zechariah kyga tadlujiu Elizabeth tu kahum sude.
Elizabeth niu Mary gu kahumbo khuanse chiuboga palungga bambo ngenase nbob khang-e. Elizabeth se Masanbo Hiupuina niu phuilujiu,
pakhuan tanjiu din-e, “Nang hai npuimai ruanggasu nasan withubo pui-e, khatdi nangniu lungrabo ngenase paphaw chagaa-e!
Dekamjiu haijiukha kadibose akhuga padjiulo, chiubora a-Rapiu puiniu akhuga wangjiu atu phuikhai bibo hai!
Palamra nangniu zu-ngaobo cham dinbose chiugap, alungga bambo ngenase pachun wijiu nbob khang-e.
Nangniu Rapiu chamse nakhuga pachang palingjiu padrabo-e chiubo malum kalubo hai dejiuga nasan wibo gulo!”
Mary niu din-e: “Alung chunniu Rapiu tu thuon-e;
Tingwang, atu Rankhaipiu donniu ahiupuina chun wi-e.
Tuhoi gasu mai hinaniu atu sanwibo pui chiujiu kumine.
Palamra Kangambo Tingwang niu wa kadibo aleng kamkhai bide. Pazan hai masanbo-e.
Patu chakhuang thiu maitu chaken machang paniu lungsa khaibi-e,
pagu kangambo benpomse henpadjiu tasaothiu mainiu rangbo hinase kam mara khaibi-e.
lung manon maitu jusu khaibi-e.
Mariu maitu kawibo tatekniu pimagiu khaibi-e,
kalekwi maitu papumruang phutkhai bi-e.
Paniu aliu pao-pehmai khuga ladriat khaibose
wangtang khaijiu, Israel maitu lungsa khai bi-e!”
pakai-pakik hina khuga lungsiat hai lenkhai bi-e!”
Mary niu Elizabeth tu chahiu sum kumbo maluang bamlujiu paky lam malanwang mide.
Elizabeth niu ngena lungrabo ting wangtangjiu, paniu npiumainah khat manade.
Pakining maidung nai pasingnadungniu Rapiu gu maisuang habo lungsiatse patu pikhai bide chiubo chiuluboga, paliu mathiu chunwi machamde.
Siga papuiniu din-e, “Chiulakge! Pazanra John chiu kurabo-e.”
Paliuniu pakhuga din-e, “Chiudi sibo zan kajon sira nakiriangga ha-e!”
Sichiujiu paliuniu papiu khuga kamlenjiu ngena zan paniu dechiu kunilo chiujiu maniu-e.
Zechariah niu raokhai rabo pek khat khenglujiu raokhaide, “Pazan hai John chiu kurabo-e.” Dejiuga paliu suang hamilo!
Sibo wansiak gasu Zechariah pakhuan padlanjiu npaolan mide, sichiujiu paniu Tingwang tu thuon sude.
Pakining maidungse pingmide, sichiujiu sibo chamse Judaea ramlung pakhiangnaga dinchia mide.
Haibo cham chiumai hinaniu paliu lungga makumjiu haichiu din-e, “Haibo nah hai dechiu padsu ralo?” Palamra Rapiu pumtan hai pariga bamme.
John piu Zechariah se Masanbo Hiupuina niu phuilujiu, Charawang chamse haichiu dinsude:
“Israel mai Rawang Rapiu tu aliu thuon sukhe!
Paniu pamaidungtu nkha khaijiu, khenrang pithiu khai bide.
Paniu pavang David kai-kik gasu aliuleng kangambo Rankhaipiu pikhaide.
Pagu masanbo phaimiukakung mai khuga nda ladriat thiukhai mibo-e.
Paniu aliu mikremai khugasu gukhai bine,
paliugu pumtan gasu gukhai bine chiujiu ladriat thiukhai mibo-e.
Paniu din-e, aliu pao-peh maidungtu lungsabo lenkhai bide;
pagu masanbo ladriatse maningtao khai bide.
Paniu aliu pao Abraham khuga ladriat khaibo kumjiu,
aliugu mikremai khugasu gukhajiu, aliuniu ping makjiu patu macha rabo-e.
Aliu ringting bamthen pasuangga masanjiu khatdi nchangjiu lung rabo-e.
Rapiu masuangga nangniu tadraijiu paleng npui kaden khai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu maidung nuanse kuak khaijiu paliutu gukhai rabo-e,
chiubose pamaidung khuga dinkhai rabo-e.
Aliu Rawang haira lungsasibo nai palung manuonbo piu-e.
Pagu juringbo nbiuse aliu riga thaoben khai bine.
agi-manaibo npuiga aliutu jukhaijiu aliutu gukhai bine.”
Ngena siniu papumdi, hiupuina gadi tanjiu mawi khangde. Paniu Israel maidung ruangga lunglen makhabo suangga ramjingga lung-e.
Sibo wan-ga Wangdih Augustus niu Rom kadihga lungbambo mai hina mairiak raorabo-e chiujiu chamtan padle.
Haibo mairiak raoraithubo hai, Quirinius niu Syria gu dihthinpao thiubambo tingga-e.
Sichiujiu mai hinase pagu-gu namdiga pazan raora tadsude.
Joseph niu Galilee ga bambo Nazareth namdak gasu Judaea ga bambo Bethlehem namdiga, Chawang David tu mana khaibo bamgase tadde. Joseph niu siga tadbo lamra pase David kiriang mai-e.
Paniu panaoleng khamkhaibo, Mary situ maluang lujiu mairiak raobo ga panai zan raora tadde, Mary se papum ripmibo-e,
sichiujiu panainiu Bethlehem ga bambo tingga, ngena lungrabo tingse wangtang mide.
Paniu naraibo thiujiu, piumainah lunglujiu, failep khatniu majiu lujiu khaoring kuangga maji khai bamme, palamra panaileng kiriuky dao makge.
Sibo kadihga mily khuanmaidung khangsianiu paliugu milydung khuanjiu, luzamga jibamme.
Rapiu gu maza khatniu paliutu lenkhaijiu, Rapiu maken siniu paliutu thaoben khaide. Siga paliu pingsui mide,
siga maza siniu paliu khuga din-e, “Pingtulo! Iniu naliuleng Kawibo Champao phung wangbo-e, haise mai hina leng chunwi mathabo gu-e.
Thainai David namdiga naliuleng Rankhaipiu Khrista tu mana khai bamme!
Haisiniu naliuleng madan thiurabo-e: naliuniu ngena situ failepniu majiu lujiu khaoring kuangga majikhai bambo daosune.”
Simakdakjiu tinggen maza riphen kengsui wanglujiu sibo maza situ maluang lujiu Tingwang tu thuonjiu chalui thiu sude:
“Kukachangbo tinggen lam Tingwang ken dibamlo,
kadihpiriga paniu pachun kimmai khuga agi-manai bamlo!”
mazadung siniu tinggen lam wanglan miboga, mily khuanmaidung siniu khat-khat khuga din-e, “Aliuniu Bethlehem lam tadlujiu Rapiu niu aliu khuga madu khaibo, khatdi padbambo haitu phui mataikhe.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu kalangjiu tadmengboga Mary nai Joseph tu khatdi ngena siniu khaoring kuangga jibam niubo ngao daode.
Sichiujiu mily khuanmaidung siniu patu ngao luboga, mazaniu ngena lamga dinkhaibose paliu khuga dinkhaide.
Mily khuanmaidung siniu dinbo chiulumai hina paliu suang hamide.
Mary niu haidung pakhiangna hai maningjiu khatdi makumjiu bamme.
Mily khuanmaidungse mazaniu dinkhaibo kumjiu paliuniu ngaolubo khatdi chiulubo donniu Tingwang tu thuonjiu khatdi chalui thiujiu malanwang mide.
Mose gu Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu Joseph nai Mary niudi kam masan rabo tingse wangtang mide. Sichiujiu panainiu Jerusalem ga ngena situ Rapiu khuga kadkhaira phungtadle,
haise Rapiu gu Tacheng-tajai gadi raokhai bambo-e: “Nahraibo piumainah hinatu Rapiu leng kadkhai rabo-e.”
Paliuniu Rapiu gu Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu kaphina nia maksai makhao nia kadkhai ralengdi phunglujiu wang-e.
Sibo wan-ga Jerusalem ga maipiu khat Simeon kubo bamme. Pahai kawibo khatdi palungchun ngutjiu Israel maitu gukhai bira khuanbambo piu-e. Masanbo Hiupuina niu patu maluang khaijiu,
Rapiu niu ladriat khaibo Messiah situ ngaomak then pah shai lakge chiujiu ladriat thiukhaibo piu-e.
Hiupuina siniu Simeon situ Charaky lungga maluang ngut khaide.Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu papui nai papiu siniu ngena Jesu tu Charakyga phungwangboga,
Simeon niu ngena situ ponsu lujiu Tingwang tu thuonkiu sude:
“Tuhoira, Rapiu yo, nagu ladriatse pi wangtang khai bide,
siniu navangpiu atu agi-manaijiu phutkhai sulo.
Nangniu mai mathiu suangga kaden khaibo,
nagu juringbo situ amik siakniu ngaolude.
khatdi namai Israel maileng kendibo daolura-e.”
Simeon niu haichiujiu ngena lamga dinboga, papui nai papiu panai suang hamide.

Simeon niu paliutu thoikhaide khatdi papui Mary khuga din-e, “Haibo nah haitu pijiu Israel mai kakengtu kam maha khaira khatdi kakengtu juring khaira Tingwang niu kadakhai mibo-e. Paniu maidung lungchun mahinbose din madu padjiu, maidungniu patu atungjiu Tingwang gu madan thiurabo-e. Sichiujiu lungchun magenthiu chariubo siniu, apang-heng kumjiu namalung risune.”

Sigasu Asher kiphiuga Phanuel nahpui, pazanniu Anna chiujiu kubo phaimiukakungpui, kamipui khat bamme. Pase milubo sai takum chinnia ronna pakinatu maluang lung khaijiu, kamipui thiujiu tuhoi takum riaktachat-je-madaikiu tangmibo pui-e. Paniu Charaky situ nchun n-nien wadaodi saomakjiu Tingwang tu kahumjiu, khatdi kalum rijiu kakheng thiubambo pui-e.
Sibo wansiak gase paniu wanglujiu Tingwang tu thuonjiu khatdi Jerusalem tu khenrang thiujiu phut khaira khuanbam mai mathiu khuga ngena lamga dinkhaide.
Ngenase mawijiu tankhangde, khatdi ningtingniu phuikhang-e, khatdi Tingwang lungsiatse pariga bamme.
Jesu niu takum kariu-je-niakiu tangmibo gadi paliuniu sibo Ngeega tadle.
Changibose loilujiu paliu kylam malanwang suboga, ngena Jesu sira Jerusalem ga bam mide. Sise papui nai papiu siniu silu makge.
Maidung ruangga jaobam talakge chiu, maning lujiu, naikhat tadjing lubo sai panainiu pakiriang maidung nai pakahmaidung ruangga phiusude.
Panainiu patu phiudao lulak mibo donniu Jerusalem lam patu phiura tadlan sude.
Pasumbo naise Charaky lungga ntaolujiu, Jehudi maigu katipaodung ruangga paliu cham nkingjiu khatdi maniujiu bamniubo panainiu daolude.
Palad kingkhai mai hina khatdi pagu ningting chamkak chiulu mai hinaniu paliu suang hamide.

Papui nai papiuniu patu ngao luboga panai suang hamide, sichiujiu papuiniu pakhuga din-e, “ Anah yo, nangniu dekamjiu napiu anaitu haikumbo thak kamjiulo? Napiu anainiu natu phiujiu anai lung chariusui mide.”
Paniu panaitu paokakge, “Dekamjiu nanainiu atu phiukin jiulo? Ira Apiu kyga bammi rabo-e chiubo naliu simak jiuma?”
Chiudi pachamkak haitu panainiu sitanglu makge.
Sichiujiu Jesu niu panai saisui lujiu Nazareth lam malanwang panai kadin piujiu lungkhangde. Papuiniu haidung pakhiangnase palungga lidkhai bamme.
Jesu se papum tankhangjiu, ningting mid-mid khang-e, sichiujiu Chara chamai thoi lujiu lung khangde.

Wangdi Tiberia niu takum kariu-je-mangiukiu mawang wangmibo tingga; Pontius Pilate niu Judaea ramlungga dithinpao thiukinbo tingga, Herod niu Galilee mawang bamga, khatdi pasai kariupiu Philip niu Iturea nai Trachoniti luongriang mawang bamga; Lysania niu Abilene mawang bamga,
khatdi Anna nai Caiaphas niu dibo singkupao thiubambo wan ramjing ga , Zechariah nahpiu John khuga Tingwang chamse piwang-e.
John niu Jordan Giuki uigen pakhiangna tadronjiu, “Naliu nuan gasu mari lujiu tadui nphum lulo, sichiusai Tingwang niu naliu nuanse kuak khai bine,” chiujiu dinron wangde.
Phaimiukakung Isaiah ariakga raokhaibo kumjiu:
“Mai khatniu ramjingga senjiu kin-e:
Rapiu npuise kaden khailo;
2 paniu tadrabo npuise kam maji khailo!
Pabek hinadi kamphui khailo,
paluong hinadi kam ncham khailo.
Nkhuibo npuise kam maji khailo,
2 khatdi taradbo npuise kam manai khailo.
Sichiujiu Tingwang gu juringbose mai hinaniu ngao rabo-e!’”

Haikumbo ngamkam hainiu naliu nuan gasu mari lubui-e chiubo lenjiuma? Naliu ronna, aliura Abraham kaikikge chiu dinmi tulo. Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e Tingwang ra haibo tudung haitu pijiu Abraham kaikik pithiu khai ngamme!
Singbang situ huimira marise kaden lujiu paphibang gase khai nbamme; kawibo sy masi makbo hina situ huilujiu chamiga thonkhai mirabo-e.”
Maidung siniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Sichiusai aliuniu degu kamralo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Pah ntiang nia bammai siniu wadi habo maileng pikhai bilo, khatdi katiu-kasak bammai siniu wadi habo maitu njan tiulo.”
Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Suikhaibo rigasu kha nkiu mane.”
Riphendung khangsiadi pakhuga wangjiu maniu-e, “Aliu ndechiu ralo? Aliuniu degu kamralo?”
Paniu paliu khuga din-e. “Mai khat khugadi aratjiu, maksai manomjiu wa lutulo, khatdi mai khattudi kamaobo madam khai mane. Naliu phijeng siniu kabuibo thiululo.”
John hai Messiah sima chiujiu maidung siniu maning sude.

Sijengniu John niu paliu khuga din-e, “Ira naliutu tadui gasu nphum khaibo-e, chiudi asailam wangkinbo piu sira asuang di-e. Ira paphitop riangdi khira akaji makge. Paniu Masanbo Hiupuina nai chami ganiu naliutu nphum khai rabo-e.
Paben-ga kazap bamme, sichiujiu tasiuse biulujiu pabowga khai maduimi rabo-e, chiudi pareng situra midlan lakbo miga thonkhaijiu rumi rabo-e.”
Haichiujiu John niu pathak tam-tamjiu Kawicham hai maidung khuga dinronjiu, paliu npui gasu kali lura dinron khaide.
Sichiujiu John niu dihthinpao Herod tu pasai kariupiu nao Herodias tu lubo khatdi kakibo kasabo tienkam donniu rukhaide.
Siga Herod niu John tu kavangkyga khaijiu, kasabo tiense kamsan lande.
Maidung mathiutu tadui nphum lubo sai, Jesu tudi tadui nphum khaide. Paniu kakheng thiujiu bamboga tinggen akhamse lepad sude,
khatdi Masanbo Hiupuina siniu makhao lun kumjiu pariga kiutao khaide. Sichiujiu tinggen lamsu chakhuan khat senkiu-e, “Nang hai Iniu lungsabo Anahpiu siakge, Iniu nakhuga alung kimsiakge.”
Jesu niu pangam kamsubo tingga pagu takum samriu kumbo khangmide. Maidungniu patu maningbora, pahai Joseph nah, Heli nah,
Mathat nah, Levi nah, Melchi nah, Jannai nah, Joseph nah,
Mattathia nah, Amos nah, Nahum nah, Esli nah, Naggai nah,
Maath nah, Mattathia nah, Semien nah, Joseph nah, Joda nah,
Joanan nah, Rhesa nah, Zerubbabel nah, Shealtiel nah, Neri nah,
Melchi nah, Addi nah, Cosam nah, Elmadan nah, Er nah,
Joshua nah, Eliezer nah, Jorim nah, Mathat nah, Levi nah
Simeon nah, Judah nah, Joseph nah, Jonam nah, Eliakim nah,
Melea nah, Menna nah, Mattatha nah, Nathan nah, David nah,
Jesse nah, Obed nah, Boaz nah, Salmon nah, Nahshon nah,
Amminadab nah, Admin nah, Arni nah, Hezron nah, Perez nah, Judah nah,
Jacob nah, Isaac nah, Abraham nah, Terah nah, Nahor nah,
Serug nah, Reu nah, Peleg nah, Eber nah, Shelah nah,
Cainan nah, Arphaxad nah, Shem nah, Naoh nah, Lamech nah,
Methuselah nah, Enoch nah, Jared nah. Mahalaleel nah, Kenan nah,
Enosh nah, Seth nah, Adam nah, khatdi Tingwang nah-e chiujiu maning-e.
Jesu niu Masanbo Hiupuina phuilujiu Jordan lamsu wangbo tingga Hiupuina siniu ramjingga maluang khai mide.
Siga Satan siniu jeng atai hiamsude. Sibo lungga pah wakhatnadi tiumakge, sichiujiu tanusu lamra pawon mariu mide.
Siga Satan siniu pakhuga din-e, “Nang Tingwang Nahpiu-e sai, haibo tudung situ pijiu taruak mawira chamtan pilo.”
Sigasu Satan siniu maluang lujiu, kadihpiri wangbam hina malod khatniu lenkhaide.
Sichiujiu Satan siniu pakhuga din-e, “Iniu haibo pumtan hina khatdi chakhiu-chalan hina nakhuga pikhai bine. Palamra Iniu achunbo mai khuga haise pikhai raleng akhuga pikhai mibo-e.
Nangniu atu kahum khaisai, pakhiangna haise nagu thiu rabo-e.”
Sigasu Satan siniu patu Jerusalem lam maluang tadle, khatdi kuthubo Charaky ton-ga pichap khailujiu pakhuga din-e, “Nang hai Tingwang Nahpiu-e sai haigasu jongkiu lulo.
Palamra haichiu raokhai bamme, ‘Tingwang niu natu manang khaijiu pagu mazadungtu langkiu khai bine.’
Sironna makjiu, ‘Tatu gasu naphi kam ajam makra paliu benniu natu jukhai rabo-e.’”
Satan siniu Jesu tu kahiambo hina gasu madiuloi mibo sai, pakak khatleng patu saodiak lujiu tadmide.
Sigasu Jesu niu Galilee ga malanwang mide, khatdi Masanbo Hiupuina pumtan siniu patu maluang bamme. Paracham hai sibo wonjeng hina sichia mide.
Paniu maduiky gase katikhaide, sichiujiu mai hinaniu pakense dinjiu patu thuon sude.
Sichiujiu Jesu niu patu makuat khangbo bam Nazareth ga wangjiu Tabamnai machang maduikygase tadjiu bamme. Paniu Masanbo ariak kenra chapkhangde,
sichiujiu phaimiukakung Isaiah gu ariakkhuangse patu pikhaiboga, haichiu raokhaibo bamga paniu lepadjiu kensude:
palamra kawichamse lungkalak maidung khuga phungwangra paniu atu kadakhai bide.
Kavangkyga bammaitu lepad khaira, khatdi pamik tiat maitu pi-ngao khaira
khatdi pamad padjiu bammaitu khi khaira paniu atu langkhai bide.
Rapiu niu pamaidungtu rankhai rabo chamse madukhaira pawanse wangtang mide.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu sibo ariakkhuangse majiu lujiu, macha bambo piu khuga pikhai lujiu ntaokiu mide. Maduikyga bambo mai hina patu matingjiu phui bamme.
Siga paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Masanbo ariak hainiu dinkhaibose naliuniu chiulubo kumjiu, haise thainai wangtang khaide.”
Paliu mathiu lungchunse pakhuga ngut mide, khatdi paniu haijiukha chalad dinsibo gase paliu suang hamide. Sichiujiu paliuniu din-e, “Haise Joseph nahpiuse makma?”

Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliuniu haibo kadincham hai akhuga dinsu rabo-e, ‘Phaimiupiu yo, naronna natu kam mawi lulo.’ Capernaum ga kamkhai mibo naliuniu chiulubose akiluong haigadi kamkhailo chiujiu naliuniu akhuga din sune.”
Jesu niu dinkiu lan-e, “Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, Phaimiukakung situ wadao khatdi pakiluangga lukhai makbo-e.”
Chiudi Elijah situ Israel mai, kakimai khuga langkhai makjiu, Sidon luongriangga Zarephath ga bambo kamipui khuga ronna langwang khaibo-e.
Sichiujiu phaimiukakung Elisha ken-gadi ka-nphenmai kengjiu bamniu-e; chiudi Syria mai piu Naaman tu makbo mai kakimaitu piwikhai makge. “
Maduikyga bam maidung siniu haise chiuluboga paliu lung pomchang pom mide.
Paliuniu sulujiu, Jesu tu namdi lenlam jupad lujiu, paliu namdi thiukhaibo luongton gasu, chakhaolam tunkhai mira maningjiu maluang padde.
Chiudi maidung rong gasu pah tadpad mide.
Sigasu Jeau niu Galilee namdi lungga bambo Capernaum gase maidungtu katikhaira Tabamnaise tadde.
Pumtan jaojiu katikhai bibo donniu mai hina paliu suang hamide.
Maduiky lung gasu rasa phungbo maipiu khatniu pakhuan tanjiu senpad sude,
“ Oh! Nazareth Jesu yo, nangniu aliutu dekamlo chiujiulo? Aliutu kam mahara nang haiga wangjiuma? Nang saolo chiubo I si-e: Nangra Tingwang gu masanbo ladlangtadmai-e!”
Jesu niu rasa situ chamtan pi-e, “Maliu makjiu bamlo khatdi sibo piu khugasu padmilo! “ Siga rasa siniu paliu masuangga maipiu situ kamkao khailujiu wadi patu kam masa makjiu padmide.
Mai hina paliu suang hajiu khat-khat khuga din-e, “Haikumbo ladkengse dechiubo gulo? Pumtan jaojiu rasa situ chamtan pi-e, siga paliu padmide.”
Jesu ken haise sibo luongriang pakhiangnaga dinchia mide.
Jesu niu maduiky situ phutlujiu Simon kyga wangde. Simon naise kakhunjiu mara bambose paliuniu Jesu khuga paokhaide.
Paniu tadlujiu, paji mungga chaplujiu kakhunbo situ tadmira chamtan pide. Kakhunbose pakhu gasu tadmide, sichiujiu paniu sulujiu paliutu macha khai sude.
Naimik kiumibo saiga paka-paphen kabammai hinaniu mara sathiujiu bambo hinatu Jesu khuga puiwangde; paliu mathiu riga paniu paben kaba khaijiu paliu mathiutu wikhai bide.
Rasadung niudi maidung kakeng khugasu, “Nang hai Khrista, Tingwang Nahpiu si-e!” chiu senjiu pad karen mide.
Jesu niu rasadung situ maliu makjiu bamra chamtan pi-e, palamra paliuniu pahai Messiah-e chiubo sibam mibo-e.
Tingben padboga Jesu niu sibo namditu phutlujiu mai habo bamlam tadmide. Siga maidung siniu patu phiusude, khatdi paliuniu patu phiudao luboga paliutu phutkhai makra kamsude.
Siga paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Tingwang niu atu langkhaibo saisuijiu, Iniu katam-tambo namdi lamdi Tingwang gu Chawangdih lamga kawibo champao hai dinron tadrabo-e.”
Sichiujiu paniu sibo luongriangga bambo maduiky hinaga dinron khaide.
Ajai kunglamse aliam nia khinkhai bambo paniu ngaode. Siga chakha minmai siniu paliu aliamse phutkhai lujiu, paliu alang kam masanjiu bamme.
Jesu niu Simon gu aliam lung gase ngutlujiu singgiu chaphu gasu poinaga tai ngutra din-e. Sichiujiu Jesu niu aliam lung gase ntaolujiu maidung situ katikhai sude.
Paniu katikhai loi lubo saiga, paniu Simon khuga din-e, “Aliam hai tadui kasukbo jamga tai ngutlujiu nanaigu alangse thonkhailo.”
Paliuniu thonkhai gapboga chakha kengga thonpadjiu alangse kekra kum mide.
Sijengniu, paliu maluangmai kakibo aliamga bammai situ paliuniu benjiajiu wang paliutu nkha khaira kukhaide. Siga paliu wangde chiudi paliu aliam sidi phuimijiu, paliudi malim mira kum mide.
Degu padbamlo chiubo Simon Peter niu siluboga Jesu masuangga khudung kiujiu haichiu din-e, “Rapiu, akhu gasu tadmilo, Ira nuan phungmai-e.”
Paliuniu chakha kengga thonlubo jengniu paliu mathiu suang hamide.
Sikumjiu Simon kahmaidung Zebedee nahpiu kania Jacob nai John sidi panai suang hamide. Chiudi Jesu niu Simon khuga din-e, “Ping mane, tuhoi gasu naliu hai chamai minmai thiumi rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu paliugu aliamdung khatdi paliugu mania hinase singgiu chaphuga khaidiak lujiu Jesu sai suitad mide.
Jesu niu namdi khatga wangboga ka-nphenbo piu khat bamniu-e. Paniu Jesu tu ngaoboga, makhum kiujiu kheng-e, “Paohubo yo! Nangniu nachun-e sai, atu masan khaira
Jesu niu paben henpadjiu patu dikhaijiu din-e, “Iniu achun-e, wimi sulo!” Sibo wan siakga sibopiu rapotse winuang mide.

Sichiujiu Jesu niu patu chamtan pijiu din-e, “Mai khat khugadi din mane, chiudi singku khuga tadlujiu natu pijiu phui khailo; sichiujiu Mose niu dinbo kumjiu charathiu khaijiu mai hinaniu nang wimide chiubo pisi khaimi sulo.”
Sichiudi Jesu kense mai hinaniu sidiang-diang mide, khatdi mai hinaniu pakhuga wangjiu pacham nkingra khatdi pakhu gasu paliu rapotdung wikhaira wang karen sude.
Sichiudi mai habo bamlam para kakheng thiura tadmi mi-e.

Naikhat Jesu niu katikhaijiu bamboga Galilee, Judaea khatdi Jerusalem namdi hina gasu Pharisee maidung nai Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodungdi wangjiu ntao bamme. Jesu khuga mara-sathiu maidungtu wikhaira Tingwang gu pumtan bamme.
Siga maidung khangsianiu papumphan kashaibo piu khattu pazi ganiu ponwangjiu Jesu niu bambo ky lung gase, pasuangga khaira matan sude.
Sichiudi chamai kengju mibo donniu paliuniu patu pon ngutra kamdao lakmide. Sijengniu paliuniu chaky rilam ponkhang lujiu chaky npomse ranput lujiu pazi gasu Jesu masuangga ponkiu sude.
Jesu niu paliu malumse dejiuga dilo chiubo ngaolujiu, paniu sibopiu khuga din-e, “akabo yo, na-nuanse kuakkhai mide.”
Siga Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung nai Pharisee maidung siniu paliu ronna din sude, “Haichiujiu Tingwang tu wajeng simakjiu dinbambo mai hai saolo? Tingwang ronna nuan kuak khai ngambo-e!”
Jesu niu paliu maning silujiu, paliu khuga din-e, “Naliuniu dekamjiu sichiu maning bamjiulo?
‘Na-nuanse kuak khai mide,’ chiubo nai ‘Buangsu lujiu tadsulo,’ chiu dinbo desiniu malalo?

Chamai Nahpiu siniu kadihpiriga nuan kuak khaira pumtan bamme chiubo Iniu naliu khuga masanjiu dinlen bine.” Sichiujiu paniu papumphan kashaibo piu khuga din-e, “Iniu nakhuga dinbo-e, sulo, nazise ponlujiu naky lam wangsulo!”
Paliu mathiu masuang gasu, sibo piuse sulujiu, pazi ponlujiu, Tingwang tu thuonjiu paky lam wangmide.
Siga paliu mathiuse paliu suang hamide! Sichiujiu kapingbo siniu phuilujiu, Tingwang tu thuonjiu din-e, “Thainai aliuniu ngaolubo hai maisuang kahabo-e!”
Haibo sai, Jesu niu tadpadboga ramkha khabo pazanniu Levi kubo piuniu pagu chakamkyga ntao bam niubo ngaolujiu, Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Asai suilulo.”
Levi niu sulujiu, pagu hina phutlujiu, pasai suilu tadmide.
Sigasu Levi niu pakyga (kasia gara Jesu kyga chiu din-e) Jesu tu maluang katiu tiude, khatdi sibo giangdung ruangga ramkha khamai kengkha bamme, khatdi katam-tam maidungdi bamme.

Paliu ruangga bambo Pharisee maidung khangsia nai Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung khangsia siniu Jesu pakhommaidung khuga haichiu dinsude, “Naliuniu dekamjiu ramkha khamaidung nai nuan phungmaidungtu maluang-tiu, maluang-sak jiulo?”
Jesu niu paliutu paokakge, “Papum kawimai lengra phaimiu pageng ha-e, chiudi mara-sathiu maileng-e.
Kawimaidungtu kura I wangbo makge, chiudi nuan phungmaidungtu kura wangbo-e.”
Maidung khangsianiu Jesu khuga din-e, “John pakhommaidungra kalum rijiu kahum humme, khatdi Pharisee maidungdi sichiu-e, chiudi nakhommaidung sira tiudi tiu-e, sakdi sakge.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Naopaopiuniu pagiang maidungtu maluang bamboga, katiu makimjiu bamraleng maningjiu ma? Pachangjiu chiumakge!
Sichiudi naopaopiu situ puitad mibo nai wangsune, sichiu dasai paliu kalum risu rabo-e.”

Jesu niu paliu khuga din champanbo thiujiu dinsude: “Mai khatniudi kasanbo ntiangse phetlujiu kaguangbo ntiangga khopkhai makge. Paniu kasanbo ntiangse phetlujiu kaguangbo gase khopkhai sai, sise wadaodi macham lakge.
Maksai mai khatniudi kasanbo mumjawse kaguangbo mumjaw bungga khai makge, palamra kasanbo mumjaw siniu chamigibungse puakpang padjiu, mumjaw sidi chamigibung sidi hami rabo-e.
Sibosung, kasanbo mumjawse kasanbo mumjaw lah gase khai rabo-e!
Khatdi kaguangbo mumjaw saklubo saiga kasanbo mumjaw sakni makbo-e. Palamra “Kaguangbo siniu sakwi nkiu-e” chiujiu naliuniu dinbo-e.
Pharisee maidung khangsianiu maniu-e, “Aliugu Tacheng-tajai ganiu kambo suimakge chiubo dekamjiu naliuniu kamjiulo?”

Paniu Charakygase ngut lujiu, Tingwang khuga kadkhai mibo taruakse lulujiu tiumibo-e, khatdi pamaidung lengdi pikhai mibo-e. Sise aliugu Tacheng-tajai gasu singkudung siniu tiurabo sangnu, mai khatniudi tiusui makbo taruakge.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu munkomjiu din-e, “Chamai Nahpiu haise Tabamnai gu Rapiu-e.”
Tabamnai khatga Jesu niu maduiky khatga meng katikhaijiu bamme. Siga paben majadlam kashaibo piu khat bamme.
Tacheng-taijaigu katipaodung nai Pharisee maidung khangsianiu Jesu tu kammao khai nibo donniu, Tabamnai kamsui makbo ngamse kamsai chiujiu paliuniu patu phuijiu bamme.
Sichiudi Jesu niu paliu maningse silujiu sinapiu khuga din-e, “Chapsulo khatdi hailam suanglam wanglo.” Siga sinapiu siniu sulujiu chap khangde.

Sichiujiu Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Iniu naliu khuga maniubo-e: aliugu Tacheng-tajainiu Tabamnai nde kamra suikhailo? Maitu nkha rama, maksai kam masa ralo? Maitu juringkhai rama, maksai kam maha ralo?”
Paniu mai hinatu phui ajan lujiu, sibo piu khuga din-e, “Naben ntha padlo.” Sichiujiu paniu ntha padboga, pabense wilan mide.
Siga paliu lung pomchang pom mide, sichiujiu paliuniu Jesu tu degu kamralo chiubo paliu ronna makhiam thiusude.
Sibo wan-ga Jesu niu luongbut khatga kahumra khanglujiu nchunse Tingwang khuga khengsang-e.
Tingben padboga, paniu pakhommaidung leng khang kariu-je-niakiutu kada khaide, paliu zandungse:
Simon (paniu Peter chiu kukhaibo) khatdi pasai kariupiu Andrew; Jacob khatdi John, Philip khatdi Bartholomew,
Matthew khatdi Thomas, Alphaeus nahpiu Jacob, khatdi Simon (Lungthiubo chiujiu kukhaibo);
Jacob nahpiu Judas khatdi patu jonbo piu Judas Iscariot.

Jesu niu luongbut gasu pakhommaidung situ maluang lujiu kiuboga, paniu maidung kakeng khattu paning khatga maluang chap bamme. Siga Judaea lamsu, Jerusalem lamsu khatdi Tyre nai Sidon gu namdi lamsu chiujiu maidung kengkha wang bamme.
Paniu katikhaibo nkingra khatdi paliu rapotdungse pi wikhaira wangbambo-e. Rasaniu kam chariujiu bammaidungdi wangjiu paliutu wikhai bide.
Mai hinaniu patu niatao khaira matan bamme, palamra pakhu gasu pumtan padjiu paliu mathiutu wikhai bide.
Jesu niu pakhommaidung situ phui ajanlujiu din-e,
“Lung kalakmai naliu hai sanwi-e;
palamra Tingwang gu chawangdihse naliu gu-e!
“Tuhoi mariujiu bammai naliu sanwi-e, palamra naliutu magiukhai rabo-e!
“Tuhoi kapjiu bammai naliu sanwi-e; palamra naliu nuisu rabo-e!
Sichiusai chunwijiu chalen lenlulo, palamra tinggen lam naliuleng tathuon kadibo bamme. Palamra phaimiukakung maidung khugadi paliu paopeh maidungniu sikumjiu kamkhai mibo-e.
“Chiudi tuhoi kalekwi maidung dejiuga naliu sansalo;
naliu amansaijiu lungkhai mibo-e!
“Tuhoi magiujiu bammai dejiuga naliu sansalo, palamra naliu mariujiu tadrabo-e!
“Tuhoi nuijiu bammai dejiuga naliu sansalo; palamra naliu kap-kiamjiu tadrabo-e!
“Maidungniu din thuonjiu bammai naliura dejiuga sansalo; aratbo phaimiukakungdung situ paliu pao-peh maidungniu sichiu dinkhai kamigu-e.
“Chiudi alad nkingjiu bammai naliu khuga Iniu dinbo-e: Naliuniu mikremaidungtu lungsalo, naliutu mareng maileng kawi kam khailo,
naliutu siangbo maitu thoikhai bilo, naliutu kam masa khaibo maileng kakheng thiu khailo.
Mai khatniu nabiang khatlam kaphi khaisai, khatlamdi pijiu kaphi khailo; mai khatniu na-ntiang lenbose khoilu sai nungbo ntiang sidi pikhai bilo.
Nakhuga kheng mai hinaleng wakhatra pikhai bilo, khatdi mai khatniu nagu khoilusai, sise khenglan mane.
Naliu khuga pi kamkhai nibo kumjiu, maidung lengdi kamkhai bilo.”
“Naliutu lungsa maitu ronna lungsasai, dechiujiu naliuniu thoidam daoralo? Nuan phungmai niudi paliutu lungsa maitu lungsajiu bambo-e!
Khatdi naliuleng kawi kamkhai maileng ronna kawi kamkhai sai, naliuniu dechiujiu thoidam daoralo? Nuan phungmaidung niudi sichiujiu bambo-e!
Khatdi naliuleng daolan lune chiujiu malummaitu ronna apuk khai sai, naliuniu dechiujiu thoidamse daoralo? Nuan phungmaidung karai niudi nuan phungmaitu apuk khaijiu paliugu daolan lu-e!

Sichiu makjiu, naliu mikremaidung situ lungsa silo khatdi paliuleng kawi kamkhai bilo; daolanra maningson makjiu apuk khai bilo, sichiusai kadibo tathuonse naliuleng bamme, khatdi Kukachangbo Tingwang nahdung naliu thiurabo-e. Palamra paniu thuonkiu simakmai nai kasamaileng kawibo pikhai-e.
Naliu Piu lungsa sibo kumjiu naliudi lungsa silo.”

“Maidungtu ladjan thiu mane, sichiusai Tingwang niu naliutu ladjan thiulakge; maidungtu din masa mane, sichiusai Tingwang niu naliutu din masa lakge; maidungtu kuak khailo, sichiusai Tingwang niu naliutu kuak khai bine.

Maidungtu pikhailo, sichiusai Tingwang niu naliuleng pikhai bine. Pachangjiu, kamajaobo madadse naliuniu daolune; naliuniu phungtad ngamdiu then, lungsa sibo nkhase naliutu pikhai bine. Naliuniu maidungleng madadbo kumjiu Tingwang niu naliuleng madad khai bine.”
Ariaknah khatniu pagu katipao suang dimakge, chiudi paniu patiense loilu dasai, pagu katipao kummi rabo-e.”
“Dekamjiu namikga karalik bamlujiu, nasingna mikga karamud situ phuibam jiulo?

Dechiujiu namikga karalik bamlujiu, nasingna khuga ‘Singna yo, namikga bambo karamudse Iniu lupad bine chiu dinjiulo?’ Wasao kathiubo nang! Raijiu namikga karalik bambose lupad milo, sibo sainiu nasingna mikga bambo karamoise lupadra ngao masan rabo-e.”
“Kawibo bang siniu kasabo rasy masi makge, maksai kasabo bang siniu kawibo rasy masi pajai makge.”
Singbang hinatu parasy masibo gasu si-e; naliuniu ndutbang gasu tathusy raimakge, maksai mumsiken gasu thurengsy raimakge.
Kawibo mai siniu palungchun gasu kawibo lungchunse phungpadle; khatdi kasabo mai siniu palungchun gasu kasabo lungchunse phungpadle. Palamra palungchun ga phuibambose pamunniu dinpadbo-e.
“Iniu kadinbo naliuniu kammak lujiu, dekamjiu naliuniu atu ‘Rapiu, Rapiu’ kubam jiulo?
Mai khatniu akhuga wangjiu acham nking lujiu sise majailubo maise dekumbo mailo chiubo Iniu naliu khuga lenkhai bine.
Sinapiu sira tutong riga katiangkhun chulujiu chaky thiubo piu kumbo-e. Tadui diwangjiu situ naibamdi, sise thiu mawikhai mibo donniu sise malai makge.
Chiudi mai khatniu acham chiulujiu majai makbo mai sira, pamen habo ky kathiubo piu kumbo-e; sise tadui diwang dasai kaonuangmi rabo-e khatdi sise pakao sarabo-e!”
Jesu niu haidungse maidung khuga dinkhai lubo sai, Capernaum lam tadmide.
Rommai chakampao khatgu vangpiu paniu lungsabo piuse mara matanjiu shaira kum bamme.
Sibo chakampao siniu Jesu racham hai chiuboga, Jesu niu wangjiu pavangpiu situ wikhaira, Jehudimai katingmai khangsiatu langkhaide.
Paliuniu Jesu khuga wanglu matanjiu dinsude, “Hainapiutu nangniu nkhabui siakge.
Palamra paniu aliutu lungsa-e, sichiujiu paniu aliuleng maduiky khat thiukhai bibo-e.”
Siga Jesu niu paliu saisui lujiu tadsude. Pakyga wang manasuboga, chakampao siniu pakahmaidungtu langkhaijiu pakhuga din-e, “Paohubo, nang chariukhai tulo. Akumbo kyga nang wangra akaji makge,
maksai apumsiak niudi nakhuga mengra buimakge. Chamtanse pikhaigap talo, chiusai avangpiuse wimi rabo-e.

Delosai asuang pumtan bammai, chakampaodung hangga Idi bambo-e, sichiujiu ahang gadi riphendung bamme. Iniu khattu ‘Tadlo!’ chiuboga pah tadmi-e; Iniu khattu ‘Wanglo,’ chiuboga pah wang-e; khatdi Iniu avangmai khattu chamtan pijiu, ‘Haise kamlo!’ chiusai paniu sise kamme!”
Jesu niu haise chiuluboga pasuang hamide; khatdi pasai suikin maidung khulam mariwang lujiu paniu din-e, “Iniu haikumbo malum hai Israel mai ruanggadi daomakge!”
Sichiujiu walang tadmaidung siniu chakampao kyga malanwang lanboga pavangpiuse wimi bamniu-e.
Sibosai siak, Jesu niu Nain kubo namdi gasu, pakhommaidung khatdi chamai mendi khattu maluang lujiu wangde.
Paniu sibo namdi rengmun-ga wangtang gapboga, kashai ponpad maitu adao-e. Kashaibo piuse kamipui nahpiu khatnaga bambo-e, sichiujiu sibo namdakga maidung siniu patu maluang kin-e.
Rapiu niu patu ngaoboga, lungsaboniu phuimide, sichiujiu paniu pakhuga din-e, “Kap talo.”
Sichiujiu paniu tadpat tatingse dikhaiboga, tating ponkin maise chap mide. Jesu niu din-e, “Akhangpiu yo! Iniu nakhuga dinbo-e, buangsu milo!”
Siga kashaibo piuse sumide, khatdi npao sumide, siga Jesu niu patu papui khuga pikhai mide.
Siga paliu mathiu pingboniu phuimide, khatdi Tingwang tu thuon sude. Paliuniu din-e, “Aliu ruangga Phaimiukakung khattu lenkhaijiu, Tingwang niu pamaitu rankhaira wang bamme!”
Haichiujiu Jesu kendi hai Judea ram pakhiangna khatdi sibo luongriangga bambo nam hinaga chiukam mide.
John pakhommaidung siniu haibo chamdung hai pakhuga dinboga, paniu pakhommai khangniatu kulujiu,
Rapiu khuga langkhaijiu maniu-e, “John niu wangkinne chiu dinbose nang dama, maksai aliuniu mai kakimaitu khuanralo?”
Paliuniu Jesu khuga wangboga paliuniu din-e, “John Baptist niu aliutu langkhaibo-e, paniu wangkinne chiu dinbose nangma, maksai aliuniu mai kakimaitu khuanralo?”
Sibo wan-ga Jesu niu mara-sathiumai rapotdung, rasa phungmaidung, khatdi pamik tiat maidungtu wikhai bide.

Paniu John ladlangtad maidungtu paokakge, “Malanwang sulo, khatdi naliuniu ngaomibo nai chiumibo haise John khuga dinkhai bilo: Pamik tiat mainiu ngao ngamme, pangen tangmainiu tadlan ngamme, ka-nphenmaitu wikhai bi-e, pakuon katidmai chiu ngam bamme kashaimaitu piringsu khai-e, khatdi kawicham hai lung kalakmai khuga dinron khai-e.
Atu maning masamak maise dejiukha pasan wiralo!”
John ladlangtadmai wangmibo saiga, Jesu niu palamga maidung khuga dinsude: “Naliuniu ramjingga John khuga tadboga degu ngaora maning jiulo? Chapiuniutu tingkainiu hun malai bambo tuma?
Naliuniu degu phuira tadjiulo? Papuan katam khaibo piu tuma? Sikumbo kata-tambo pon piumai sira chawangky ningga lung bamme!
Akhuga dinkhailo, naliuniu degu phuira tadjiulo? Phaimiukakung tuma? Yo, pachangjiu naliuniu phaimiukakung suang monbo situ ngao-e.
Palamra John haise Masanbo ariakniu dinkhaibo khat si-e: ‘Tingwang niu din-e, namasuangga Iniu agu ladlangtad maitu langkhaijiu naleng npui kadenkhai rabo-e.’
Jesu niu dinkiu lan-e, “Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, John haise lungkhai mibo chamaina rong gasu dithubo-e, chiudi Tingwang gu Chawangdih gara siamthubo piudi John suang di-nkiu rabo-e.”
Chiudi Pharisee maidung nai Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodungra John niu tadui nphum khaibo situ lukhai makjiu khatdi Tingwang niu machunbo lukhai makbo maidung-e.
Jesu niu dinlan-e, “Iniu tuhoi lungbammai haitu dechiujiu din kada khai ralo? Paliu haitu ndeniu pon kada khai ralo?

Paliu hai senkiga ntao bambo nahmaidung kumbo-e. Mai khatniu mai khat khuga din-e, ‘Aliuniu tanao aruangbo lui thiu-e, chiudi naliu chalen lenkhai makge! Aliuniu kashai baibo lui thiu-e, chiudi naliuniu kapkhai makge!’
John Baptist niu tiumakge, khatdi sakmakge, siga naliuniu din-e, ‘Pakhuga rasa bamme!’
Siga Chamai Nahpiu siniu wangjiu tiu-e, khatdi sakge, siga naliuniu din-e, ‘Hainapiu haitu phuilo! Pahai patiuni sa-e, khatdi pasakni sa-e, sichiujiu ramkha khamai khatdi nuan phungmaigu chaka-e!’”
Sichiudi Tingwang gu ningting sira lukhaimai hina khuga majibo-e.”
Pharisee maipiu khatniu Jesu tu katiu tiura kujiu, Jesu niu pakyga wangjiu tiura ntao kiude.
Sibo namdiga nuan phungbo pui khat bamme. Paniu sibo Pharisee maipiu kyga Jesu wang bamme chiubo chiuboga, paniu parimwibo wasa khoilujiu wangde.
Sichiujiu Jesu saiga chaplujiu, kapjiu pamatui siniu pangen-ga majaokiujiu kam matim khaide, khatdi patham siniu manuk masang khaijiu, kapup khaide, khatdi parimwibo wasase manuk khai sude.

Haise Pharisee maipiu siniu ngaoluboga, paniu haichiu din-e, “Haina piu haise pachangsiakjiu phaimiukakung khatle sai, patu thinbambo pui haise saolo chiubo silubui-e; sichiujiu pahai nuan phungbo pui-e chiubo paniu sirabo-e!”
Jesu niu pakhuga haichiu dinsude, “Simon, Iniu nakhuga wakhat dinkhaira bamme.”
Paniu din-e, “Yo, katipao, dinkhailo.”
Jesu niu haichiu dinsude, “Pawan khatga maipaw kaphungmai khangnia bamme. Khangkhat siniu rangkang kai mangiu phung-e, khangkhat siniu rangkang ringiu phung-e.
Sichiudi panai khangniase rui ngamlak mide, sijengniu panai khangnia situ paniu kuakkhai mide. Chiusai tuhoira sibo piu siniu, panai khangnia ruangga sao situ lungsa nkiulo?”
Simon niu paokakge, “Paniu kuak khai makeng mibo piu situ-e, chiujiu Ira maning-e.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Nang maji-e.”

Sigasu Jesu niu maipui khulam mariwang lujiu Simon khuga din-e, “Nangniu haibo pui situ ngaoma? Iniu nakyga wangbo-e, chiudi nangra aphi khiura tadui pikhai makge, chiudi para pamatui siniu aphi nkhiu khaijiu khatdi patham siniu manuk masang khai bide.
Nangra atu kapupjiu adaokhai makge, chiudi para I ngutbo gasuniu kapupsao makha-e.
Nangra apiga wasa manuk khai makge, chiudi para aphiga wasase manuk khaijiu bamme.
Sichiusai Iniu nakhuga dinbo-e, paniu lungsa nkiubo jengniu pa-nuan kengbo situ kuak khai mide. Sichiujiu poinakha kuak khai bibo patu sira poinakha lungsabo-e.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu maipui khuga din-e, “Na-nuan hina kuak khai mide.”
Siga chakuangkai mungga taobam maidung siniu paliu ronna dinsude, “Haina hai saolo? Paniu nuandung tudi kuak khaijiu bamme!”
Siga Jesu niu sibo maipui khuga din-e, “Nagu malum siniu natu ranlude, agi-manaijiu tadsulo.”
Sibosai Jesu niu namdakdung khatdi nam-namga tadjiu Tingwang gu Chawangdih lamga Kawicham hai dinron tadle. Khommaidung khang kariu-je-niakiu sidi suitad kin-e.
Siga rasadung gasu wikhaibo puidung khatdi thiuniubo gasu wikhaibo puidung; khatdi rasa chinnia phungbo gasu hathonpad mibo pui, Mary (Magdalene chiu kubo pui);
khatdi Herod gu chakampao, Chuza nao Joanna, khatdi Susanna khatdi Jesu nai pakhommaidungtu nkhajiu bambo maipuidung suitad kin-e.
Maidung siniu namdi katam tambo lamsuniu Jesu khuga wangsude, sichiujiu maidung kengsui wangboga, Jesu niu din champanbo hai dinkhaide:
“Pawan khatga maipiu khatniu chalin marukra tadpadle. Sichiujiu paniu chalin marukboga kasianiu npuikiga taokhai mide, sise maidungniu taomalui mide khatdi thingnadungniu wangjiu khoitiu lude.
Chalin kasianiu turaliga taokhaijiu puak khangboga kadihtam kaha donniu sise shainong mide.
Chalin kasianiu tathuphe jiuga taokhaijiu puak khangboga, tathuphe siniu gomsin mibo jengniu sise shai mide.
Khatdi chalin kasianiu kadihtam kawiboga taokhaijiu puakkhang pasy masijiu kai maside.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu munkom khai-e, “Naliu pakuon bammai hina chiululo!”
Pakhommaidung siniu Jesu khuga, din champanbo rambase dechiulo chiu maniu-e,

Siga paniu paokakge, “Tingwang gu Chawangdih lamga mahinbo ningting tasise naliu khugara pikhai mibo-e chiudi kakimai khugara din champanbo thiujiu dinkhaibo-e, sichiujiu paliuniu phuibamdi ngaomakge, khatdi nkingbamdi simakbo-e.
“Din champanbo ramba sira: Chalin sira Tingwang gu ladkeng si-e.
Puikiga taokhai mibo alinpumdung siniu chiukhai kamimai si-e; chiudi Satan siniu wangjiu paliu khuga dinkhai mibose lupad mijiu, pijiu malumkhai makbo, khatdi ranlu makbo si-e.
Tatura liga taokhai mibo alinpumdung siniu chiukhaiboga chunwijiu lukhaibo-e. Chiudi sise pamen hajiu matipmak donniu pakak khat ronna malumkhai lujiu kahiambo wangboga kao kamibo si-e.
Tathuphe jiuga taokhai mibo alinpumdung siniu chiukhai mibo si-e, chiudi magenthiu chariubo maksai chakhiu-chalan wang dasai kam maha mibo si-e, sichiujiu wadao khatdi pasyse minpad makbo si-e.
Kawibo kadihga taokhai mibo alinpumdung siniu kawibo chamtu chiulujiu khatdi majailubo lungchun si-e, sichiujiu paliuniu khenglujiu pasy masilubo si-e.
“Baikhai bambo hina madulen kamrabo-e, khatdi mahinbo hinase kabenboga lenkhai kamrabo-e.
Jesu pui nai pagu singnadung siniu pakhuga wang-e chiudi maidung jiuga bammibo donniu pakhuga wangtang lulak mide.
Siga mai khatniu Jesu khuga din-e, “Napui nai nasingnamai natu adao khainijiu lenlam chap khuan bamme.”
Jesu niu paliu mathiu khuga din-e, “Apui nai asingnamai sira Tingwang cham hai chiulujiu majai kalu mai si-e.”
Naikhat Jesu niu pakhommaidungtu maluang lujiu aliam khat lungga ngutlujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Aliuniu ajai uigen khatlamse tadkhe.” Sichiujiu paliu tadsude.
Paliuniu aliam ramkinbo tingga, Jesu se jibing mide. Siga tingthung-tingkai bungjiu wangsude, sichiujiu aliamse taduiniu maliam phuimide, siga paliu manangchang manang mide.
Siga pakhommaidung siniu Jesu khuga tadlujiu, khatdi patu makiangjiu haichiu din-e, “Paohubo yo, Paohubo yo! Aliu shailajiu bamme!”
Siga Jesu niu sulujiu tingthung-tingkai situ chamtan pikhaiboga sise manon kiujiu, saojing mide.
Sichiujiu paniu pakhommaidung khuga din-e, “Naliugu malumse dega bamjiulo?”
Siga paliu suang hajiu khatdi pingjiu paliuniu khat-khat khuga din-e, “Haina hai saolo? Paniu tingthung-tingkai gu duiliutu chamtan pikhaiboga, paliuniu pagu kadin piu-e!”
Jesu nai pakhommaidungniu Galilee ajai uigen khatlam, Gerasa
Sichiujiu Jesu niu ajai uigen lamsu padboga, sibo namdiga rasadung phungbo piu khattu adao-e. Pawan kathengga hainapiu hai pafai-pani khai makjiu, khatdi chaky gadi bammakjiu, charawlam bambo piu-e.
Paniu Jesu tu ngaoboga, pakhuan tanjiu senne, khatdi paphibangga kaokiujiu din-e, “Kukachangbo Tingwang Nahpiu, Jesu yo! Nangniu atu dekam khai ralo? Atu sajai pikhai makra, Iniu nakhuga kheng-e!”

Paniu haichiu dinbo lamra, sinapiu khugasu rasa situ tadmira chamtan pibo donniu-e. Haisiniu pawan kathengkha patu thinman lujiu, patu ratkhaibo chagiriang sidi kamtap-tap lujiu manamjiuga rontadjiu bambo-e.
Jesu niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nazan saolo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Azanra, ‘Maidung’ chiu-e.” Palamra rasadung kengkha pakhuga ngutmibo-e,”
Sichiujiu rasadung siniu paliutu charui dihlam langkhaimi makra Jesu khuga kheng-e.
Sibo mungga maluanggen khatga kavak-dungdi khat bamme. Sijengniu rasadung siniu kavak-dung ruanggase ngut khaira Jesu khuga kheng-e, sichiujiu paniu paliutu suikhai bide.
Paliuniu sibo piu khugasu padlujiu kavak-dung ruanggase ngut mide. Siga kavak-dungdise chakhaoga jongkhaijiu ajaiga malinkam mide.
Kavak khuanbam maidung siniu padmibose ngaolujiu, namdaklam khatdi luzamlam paktadjiu sibo chamse dinchia mide.

Maidung siniu degu padmilo chiubo phuira padle, khatdi paliuniu Jesu khuga wangboga, rasadung phungbo piuse pafai-pani khai mawilujiu, palungchun majijiu Jesu phibangga ntaobam niubo ngaode, siga paliu mathiuse pingmide.
Sibo piuse dechiu wimibo gulo chiubo ngaolu maidung siniu maidung khuga dinkhaide.
Sichiujiu sibo luongriangga bammai hina pingju mibo donniu Jesu tu sibo bam gasu tadmira kheng-e. Siga Jesu niu aliam lungga ngutlujiu tadmide.
Sichiujiu pakhu gasu rasadung padmibo piu siniu Jesu khuga kheng-e, “I nasai suitad khaine.”
Chiudi Jesu niu pakhuga din-e,
“Chaky lam wanglujiu Tingwang niu naleng degu kamkhai bilo chiubo dinkhai bilo,” chiujiu langkhai mide.
Sibopiu siniu namdiga tadronjiu, Jesu niu paleng degu kamkhai bilo, chiubo dinron sude.
Jesu niu ajai uigen khatlam wangboga, maidungniu patu lukhai-e, palamra paliuniu patu khuanjiu bambo-e.
Siga mai khat Jairus chiu kubo piuse wang-e; pahai parammaigu maduiky gu chakampao-e. Paniu Jesu phibangga makhum kiujiu paky lam wang khaira kheng-e,
palamra panahpui khatnaga bambo, takum kariu-je-niakiu tangmibo nahse shaira kumjiu mara bamme.
Sichiujiu Jesu niu tadsuboga, maidung siniu patu khomphui lujiu tadkinne.
Paliu ruangga takum kariu-je-niakiu tazai kinbo pui khat bamme; paniu pagu kabambo hina phaimiu khuga pikhaijiu mathan kamigu-e chiudi mai khatniudi patu wikhai ngamlakjiu bambo-e.
Paniu maidung ruanggasu Jesu sailam wanglujiu pafairise niakhaiboga, paniu tazaijiu bambose sangnuang mide.
Siga Jesu niu maniu-e, “Saolo atu niabose?”
Mai hinaniu simakge chiu dinsude, siga Peter niu din-e, “Paohubo, maidungniu natu haichiujiu khom maguithui lujiu khatdi chapphuiting lujiu bambo-e.”
Chiudi Jesu niu din-e, “Mai khatniu atu niamide, palamra pumtanse akhugasu padmibo I si-e.”

Maipui siniu patu silude chiubo ngao luboga, Jesu phibangga pacheng kaphik rai-raijiu makhum kiude. Sichiujiu mathiu suangga, paniu deleng patu niakhai jiulo khatdi pah dechiujiu winuangmi gulo chiubo pakhuga dinkhaide.
Siga Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Anahpui yo, nagu malum siniu natu wikhai mide. Agi-manaijiu tadsulo.”
Jesu niu haichiu dinbamga, chakampao ky gasu walang tadmai khattu langwangjiu Jairus khuga din-e, “Ngenase shai mide, Katipao situ kam chariu talo.”
Sichiudi Jesu niu sise chiulujiu Jairus khuga din-e, “Manangmi tulo, malumjiu bamlo, sichiusai pah wimi rabo-e.”
Paliuniu sibo kyga wangtangboga, paniu Peter, John khatdi Jacob sigasu ngena pui nai papiutu makjiu mai khattudi kalung lamse pi suingut makge.
Mai hinase ngena donniu kapjiu khatdi huijiu bamme. Jesu niu din-e, “Kaptulo, ngena haise shai makge pahai jibambo-e!”
Siga paliu mathiu patu nuisude, palamra pah shai mide chiubo paliuniu si-e.
Sichiujiu Jesu niu paben julujiu haichiu din-e, “Ngena yo, Sumilo!”
Siga pase ringjiu sunuang mide, siga Jesu niu ngena lengse wakhat tiura pikhailo chiujiu paliu khuga chamtan pikhaide.
Sichiujiu papui nai papiudi panai suang hamide, chiudi padmibo lamga mai khat khugadi dinmakra Jesu niu chamtan pikhaide.
Jesu niu pakhommaidung kariu-je niakiutu kulujiu rasadungtu hathon padra khatdi thiuniu maidungtu wikhaira pumtan nai jengtan pikhaide.
Sichiujiu Tingwang gu Chawangdih chamse dinron tadra khatdi mara-sathiu maitu wikhaira paliutu langkhaide,
haichiujiu paliu khuga dinkhai-e, “Naliuniu tadrabo tabin donniu wakhatnadi phung tad mane: tathundi, takhaodi, katiu-kasakdi, rangkangdi, ntiang malindi phungtad mane.
Naliutu lukhaibo bamgase, naliuniu sibo namditu phutmak thenna sibo kyga bamlo;
Sichiujiu pakhommaidung siniu nam namga Kawichamse dinron tadjiu khatdi pabam hinaga maidungtu wikhaijiu tadronde.
Khangsianiu Elijah hai maduwang lanbo-e chiujiu din-e, khangsianiu nda phaimiukakung maidung rong gasu khang khat ringwang lanbo-e chiujiu din-e.
Herod niu din-e, “Iniu John pee dangmibo-e; chiudi Iniu palamga chiubambo piu hai saolo?” Sichiujiu paniu Jesu tu phuira karamjiu bamme.
Khommaidung siniu malan wangjiu, paliuniu kamkhai mibo hinase Jesu khuga dinkhaide. Paniu paliutu maluang lujiu, paliu ronna Bethsaida kubo namdi lam tadmide.
Maidungniu sise chiuluboga, paliudi pasai sui tadsude. Paniu paliutu lukhaijiu Tingwang gu Chawangdih chamse paliu khuga dinkhaide, khatdi thiuniu maidung hinatu wikhaide.

Naimik kiusubo tingga, khommai khang kariu-je-niakiu siniu pakhuga wanglujiu din-e, “Maidung haitu langkhai milo, sichiujiu paliuniu nam namlam tadjiu katiu phiutadjiu khatdi jikhaira langkhai milo, palamra haise maidi habo bamme.”
Chiudi Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu niu paliutu pi tiukhai bilo.”
Paliu niu paokakge, “Aliu khuga bambo sira taruak khuang mangiu nai chakhapek nia ronna bamme. Haibo maidung leng aliuniu tadlujiu katiu liura nangniu machun jiuma?”
(Siga maidungse sang mangiu kumbo bamme).
Jesu niu pakhommaidung khuga din-e, “Maidung haitu khang ringiu-ringiu bao thiujiu pi ntao khailo.”
Khommaidung siniu sichiujiu taliu khaide.

Siga Jesu niu taruak khuang mangiu nai chakhapek niase thinlujiu tinggen lam ngang phuijiu, paliu jengniu Tingwang tu thuonkiu khaide; khatdi thenpang lujiu sise pakhommaidung khuga pikhaijiu, paliuniu maidungleng njankhai bide.
Paliu mathiuse tiu magiu lude, sichiujiu malipadbose, pakhommaidung siniu chabeng kariu-je-niakiu khoi madui lanlude.
Naikhat Jesu niu paronna kahumjiu bamga, pakhommaidung pakhuga wang-e. Siga paniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Maidungniu I hai sao-e chiujiu dinlo?”
Peter niu paokakge, “Nang hai Tingwang gu Messiah si-e.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu haise mai khat khugadi din makra paliu khuga tanjiu chamtan pikhaide.

Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Chamai Nahpiuse chariu khengsiak rabo-e, sichiujiu apaimaidung, singku paodung khatdi Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung siniu lukhai lakge. Patu kamshatmi rabo-e, chiudi pasumbo nai pah ringsulan rabo-e.”
Palamra pagu ringting majamai hinase hami rabo-e, chiudi ajengniu pagu ringting hakhai mimai situ rankhaibi rabo-e.
Mai khatniu kadihpiri pakhiangna daolujiu, pagu ringtingse hamisai, paleng degu kagengbo daoralo? Maksai mai khatniu pagu ringting situ deguniu nkhiaklu ralo? Wakhat niudi nkhiak silakge!
Mai khatniu agu Kawibo Champao jengniu khatdi adonjengniu mangamsai, Chamai Nahpiu niudi paken diboga, khatdi Papiu kendiboga, khatdi masanbo mazadung masuangga wang dasai mangam rabo-e.
Pachang palingjiu Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e chiubora haiga bammaidung khangsiara Tingwang gu Chawangdihse paliuniu ngao makthen shailakge.”
Paniu haidungse dinlubo sai nidkak khat saiga, Jesu niu Peter, John khatdi Jacob tu maluang lujiu luongbut khatga kakheng thiura tadle.
Sichiu paniu kahumjiu bamboga, pazuse tamsinjiu kali mide, khatdi pafai-panidi kapuangjiu bensat mide.
Simak dakjiu mai khangnia wanglujiu patu npao sude. Panaise Mose nai Elijah si-e,
panaise tinggen-gu maken dibo ganiu wanglujiu, Jesu niu dechiujiu Jerusalem ga shai khaijiu Tingwang chunningse pi tathui khai ralo chiubo lamga npaode.
Siga Peter nai pakahmaidungse nguijingkiu mide, chiudi paliu raklop padboga Jesu gu kendibo gase mai khangniase patu maluanglu bamniubose ngaode.

Khangnia siniu Jesu tu phutmiboga Peter niu pakhuga din-e, “Paohubo, aliuniu haiga bambo hai dejiukha wilo! Aliuniu naleng khat, Mose leng khat, khatdi Elijah leng khat chiujiu mathenky thiukhaine.” (Paniu degu dinbamlo chiubo paniu sisiaklu makge).
Paniu haichiu dinbamga, kamuong khatniu wanglujiu paliutu majiu suboga khommaidungse ping mide.
Chakhuanse hamiboga, Jesu ronna bamniude. Haichiujiu paliuniu ngaolubo lamgase sibo tingga mai khat khugadi dinmakjiu, wahina mahinjiu bamme.
Pasaibo nai Jesu nai pakhommaidung khangsumse luongbut gasu kiuboga maidung siniu Jesu tu adao-e.
Maidung rong gasu mai khatniu senjiu din-e, “Paohubo yo, anah khat nakha bambo piu haitu phuikhaira Iniu nakhuga khengbo-e!
Rasa khatniu patu thinman lujiu, patu kam mathadjiu, kam mariudi-di khai khaijiu bambo-e, sichiujiu pamun gasu patai ta-nphopjiu patu kam magenthiu sonna mibo-e.
Iniu nakhommaidung khuga patu wikhaira khengbo-e, chiudi paliuniu kam mawi ngam makge.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Naliu hai dejiukha malum kamak mailo khatdi maji kamak mailo! Dethengkha Iniu naliutu maluang bam ralo? Sichiujiu paniu maipiu khugase din-e, “Ngena situ haiga puiwanglo.”
Piumainahse wangboga, rasa siniu patu kadihga kam nkhuang khai lujiu khatdi kam mariudi-di khai lande. Jesu niu rasa situ chamtan pijiu, ngena situ wikhai lujiu, papiu khuga pikhai mide.
Siga mai hinase Tingwang gu kangambo pumtan situ paliu suang hamide.
Jesu niu kamkhai mibo hina lamga maidung siniu paliu suang hajiu bamboga, paniu pakhommaidung khuga din-e,
“Iniu naliu khuga dinkhaibo haise mangai tulo! Chamai Nahpiu situ maidunggu pumtan-ga pikhaimi rabo-e.”
Chiudi pakhommaidung siniu haibo rambase sitanglu makge. Haise paliuniu simakra paliu khugasu baikhai mibo-e, chiudi sibo lamga paliuniu pakhuga maniura nping-e.
Paliuniu maning bambose Jesu niu silujiu paniu pamungga chap bambo nahmai khattu ponsu lujiu paliu khuga din-e,

“Mai khatniu chamtan gasu haikumbo ngena khattu lukhaisai, paniu atu lukhaibo-e; khatdi mai khatniu atu lukhaisai, atu langkhaibo patudi lukhaibo-e. Palamra naliu ruanggasu siamthubo pasiniu dithu rabo-e.”
John niu din-e, “Paohubo, mai khatniu nazan gasu rasadungtu hathonpad bamniubo aliuniu ngaolujiu, aliuniu patu kham mide, palamra pahai aliu ruangga jaomak mai-e.”
“Patu khammi tulo”, chiujiu Jesu niu pakhuga khatdi pakhommaidung khuga din-e, “Palamra naliutu atungmak maise naliu gu-e.”
Jesu tu tinggen lam lusu mira nawang suboga, paniu Jerusalem lam tadkhaira maning lujiu tadsude.
Samaria mai nam khatga paniu paleng kaden khaira walang tadmaitu pamasuangga langkhaide.
Chiudi maidung siniu patu lukhaini makge, palamra pase Jerusalem lam tadkinbo-e chiubo paliuniu si-e.
Haise khommai Jacob nai John niu ngaoboga, panai niu din-e, “Rapiu yo, aliuniu Elijah niu kambo kumjiu, tinggen lamsu chami kukiujiu paliutu kam maha mira nang suima?”
Jesu niu paliu khulam mariwang lujiu din-e, “Naliura wadi sitang makge, palamra Chamai Nahpiu siniu chamaitu kam mahara wangbo makge, chiudi paliutu rankhai raleng wangbo-e.”
Sigasu Jesu nai pakhommaidungse kakibo namlam tadmide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu tadkinboga, mai khatniu Jesu khuga din-e, “Nangniu tadkhaibo bam hinaga Iniu nasai suitadne.”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Asathidi paky bamme, khatdi thingnadi pasib bamme, chiudi Chamai Nahpiu sira jikhaijiu mathak khairabo bam ha-e.”
Paniu katambo mai khat khuga din-e, “Asai suilulo.”
Chiudi sibo piuniu din-e, “Paohubo yo, raiboga Iniu wanglujiu apiutu baikhai lune.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Kashaimainiu kashaimaitu pijiu baimi sulo. Nangra tadlujiu Tingwang Kadih chamse paoron lulo.”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Mai khatniu chalu phura kafiu thinsu lujiu, sailam mariphui lansai, pase Tingwang gu Chawangdih leng bui makge.”
Haibo saiga Rapiu niu khang riakchinnia-je-niakiutu
Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Atiatra leng kengjiu bamme, chiudi tenra maira tamme. Siniu atiatpao khuga atiatra maitu langkhaira khenglo.
Tadsulo, Iniu naliutu milypoi kumjiu tanijiuga langkhaibo-e.
Rangkang khao maksai, chabeng maksai, chaphitop phungtulo; npuikiga maitu kahum khaira mathak tulo.
Naliuniu maiky lungga ngutboga raijiu haichiu dinlo, ‘Haibo kyga agi-manaijiu bamlo.’
Siga agi-manaibotu lunibo mai bamsai naliugu agi-manaibo kahumse pariga pibam misulo; sichiu maksai naliugu agi-manaibo thoidamse lulan lulo.
Naliuniu riukhaibo kyga naliutu pikhaibo hinase tiu, sakjiu bamlo. Palamra tenbam maileng chaphijeng pirabo-e. Mai khat ky gasu mai khat kyga tad mariu tulo.
Naliuniu tadkhaibo namdi gasu maidungniu naliutu lukhaisai naliuleng kaden khaibose tiujiu,
sibo namdiga mara-sathiu maitu wikhailo. Khatdi siga bammai khuga haichiu dinlo, ‘Tingwang gu Chawangdihse naliu khuga nawang mide.’
Chiudi naliuniu namdiga ngutboga naliutu lukhai maksai tadpad lujiu haichiu dinlo,
‘Naliu namdi gasu wangbo tabui sidi aliuniu naliu riga kasam khai diakbo-e. Chiudi Tingwang gu Chawangdihse naliuleng nawang mide chiubo maningtao lulo!’
Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, Ladjan thiubo Naise Tingwang niu sibo namditu suang, Sodom situ lungsa nkiu rabo-e!
Ladjan thiubo Naise Tingwang niu naliutu suang Tyre nai Sidon tu lungsa nkiu rabo-e.
Capernaum yo! Naronna natu tinggen lam ponkhang lujiu bambo ma? Natura charuidih gase thon khaimi rabo-e!”
Khang riakchinnia-je-niakiuse paliu chun wichang wijiu malan wangde. Paliuniu din-e, “Rapiu yo, aliuniu nazan gasu chamtan pikhaiboga rasadung siniudi aliu kadin piu-e!”
Jesu niu paliutu paokakge, “Satanse Tinggen lamsu hengri kalikbo kumjiu tiakkiu mibo Iniu ngao-e.

Kinglo! Iniu naliutu pumtan pikhaibo-e, sichiujiu naliuniu kaniu riga khatdi charuimaigapui riga taomaluijiu tadra khatdi Mikrepiu pumtan situ ngamlura pumtan pikhaibo-e, sichiujiu naliutu wakhatniudi kam masa ngam lakge.
Rasadung siniu naliu kadin piubamme chiujiu naliu chun wimi tulo, chiudi Tinggen lam naliu zan raokhai mibo donniu naliu chun wilulo.”

Sibo wan gase Jesu niu Masanbo Hiupuina phuilujiu pachun wijiu, haichiu din-e, “Tinggen nai kadih Rapiu, Apiu yo! Iniu natu thuonkiu-e, palamra nangniu wasimaidung nai ningtingmai khugasu, baikhai mibose wasimak maidung khuga lenkhaibi-e. Yo, Apiu yo, haise nangniu machunbo si-e.
Sibosai Jesu niu pakhommaidung khulam mariwang lujiu paliu khuga mahin din-e, “Naliuniu ngaokhai mibo hina ngaolu maise dejiukha sanwilo!

Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, chiubora nda phaimiukakung maidung khatdi chawangdung kakeng khaniu, thainai naliuniu ngaolubose ngaokhai nijiu tamibo-e, chiudi paliuniu ngaolu makjiu tamide, khatdi naliuniu chiukhai mibose chiukhai nijiu tamibo-e; chiudi chiukhai tangmakjiu tamide.”
Jesu niu patu paokakge, “Masanbo Ariakniu dechiu dinlo? Naliuniu dechiu dinpad chalilo?”
Chiudi Tacheng-tajaigu katipao siniu patu paronna kam maji lunijiu, paniu Jesu khuga maniu-e, “Saose akyning mailo?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Pawan khatga maipiu khat Jerusalem lamsu Jericho lam tadkiuboga, agatiu maidungniu patu chonlujiu pafai pani sutlude, khatdi dapkhaijiu kashai kumjiu thonkhai diakge.
Siga singku khatniu sibo puidiga tadkiude, chiudi paniu sibo piutu ngaoluboga, npui katam lam maren tad mide.
Sikumjiu Levi mai khatniudi tadwangjiu sibo piutu ngaolujiu, npui katamlam maren tadlan mide.
Sichiudi Samaria maipiu khatniu sibo piu bambo bamga tadwangde, paniu patu ngaoluboga, patu lungsaboniu phuimide.
Paniu pakhuga wanglujiu, wasa nai mumjawse pajamga nunkhai bide khatdi domkhai bide, sigasu paniu sibo piutu pagu chakhao poi riga khailujiu kiriuky khatga, puiwangjiu paniu patu akhi khaide.

Pasaibo nai paniu rangkang nia khoipad lujiu, kiriupiu khuga pikhaide. Sichiujiu paniu kiriupiu khuga din-e, “Patu akhi mawi khailo. Iniu malan wangboga nangniu pakhuga thinkhai mibo hinase pikhailan bine.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu munkomjiu din-e, “Simai khangsum ruanggasu, saose agatiu maidungniu dapkhai bibo piu kiningmai kumjiu kamkhai bilo chiubo nang lukhailo?”
Tacheng-tajaigu katipao siniu paokakge, “Patu lungsa khai bibo piu siniu-e.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Sichiusai, nangdi tadsulo, khatdi sise kumjiu kamlo.”
Pasai kariupui Mary kubo khat bamme, paniu Rapiu phiga ntaolujiu paniu katikhaibose nkingjiu bamme.

Changam hinase paronna kamrabotu maning khailujiu Martha niu wangjiu din-e, “Rapiu yo, asai kariupui hainiu wadi atu nkha khai makjiu changam hina aronna kamrabose nangniu wajeng chakkhai mak jiuma? Wangjiu atu nkha khaira patu dinkhailo!”
Rapiu niu patu paokakge, “Martha, Martha yo! Nangra wa kakeng kambo donniu nalung manangjiu chariu bamme. Chiudi nakhuga wakhatra pageng bamkha-e.
Mary niu majibose kada lude, sise pakhu gasu wadaodi khoipad silak mibo gu-e.”
Naikhat Jesu niu pabam khatga kakhengthiu bamme. Paniu loimiboga, pakhommai khatniu pakhuga din-e, “Rapiu, John niu pakhommaidungtu katikhaibo kumjiu, aliutudi kakheng thiura katikhailo.”
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliuniu kakheng thiubo tingga haichiu dinlo:
‘Apiu yo, nazan masanbo thiu milo;
nawang kadihse wangkiu sulo.
Naimachang aliu tiubuibo pikhailo.
Aliu nuan kuak khailo,
palamra aliu khuga maokhai maitu aliuniu kuak khai-e.
Aliutu tanjiu madiukhai tulo.’”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu pakhommaidung khuga din-e, “Din champanjiu, naliu ruangga khang khatniu chundingga naliu kamai khangkhat kyga tadlujiu pakhuga dinlo, ‘Na-yo, atu taruak khuang sum apuk khai khelo.
Palamra akamai khangkhat chabin kadiu lamsu tuhoiniu akyga wangjiu, paleng pikhaira akhuga wadi hamijiu-e!’
Siga nakabo siniu haichiu dinsaira, ‘Atu kam chariu tulo! Akhamse khamten mide, khatdi nahmai aliu mathiu jikam mide. Iniu sulujiu natu wakhatnadi pikhai ngamlak mide.’

Wide, sichiusai dechiu ralo? Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e chiubora paniu naka thiubo donniu buangsu lujiu natu taruak pikhaimak tadi, nangniu mangam makjiu, khenglu khenglanjiu bambo donniu paniu sulujiu, nangniu lunibo hinase pikhai rabo-e.
“Sichiujiu Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e: khenglo, naliuleng pikhai bine; phiulo, naliuniu daolune; khatdi akham maganlo, naliuleng lekhai bine.
Palamra kakhengmai hinaleng pikhaibi rabo-e, khatdi phiumai hinaniu daolu rabo-e, khatdi akham magan mai hinaleng lekhaibi rabo-e.
Naliu papiumai khuga naliu nah siniu taruak khengsai, tatu pikhai rama? Maksai chakha khengsai kaniu pikhai rama?
Maksai paniu maruibum khengboga charuimaigapui pikhai rama?
Haijiukha naliu kasamai thiubam tadi, naliuniu naliu nahmaileng kawibo pikhaira si-e. Sichiusai, tinggen lam bambo Piu siniu khengmai hina khuga Masanbo Hiupuina se pikhaibi rabo-e!”
Rasa phungjiu npao ngamlakbo piutu Jesu niu rasa situ hathonpad miboga sinapiuse npao sude. Siga maidungse paliu suang hamide.
Chiudi maidung khangsianiu din-e, “Haise rasadung wangpiu, Beelzebul siniu, paliutu hapad ngambo pumtanse patu pikhaibo-e.”

Chiudi paliuniu degu maning bamlo chiubo Jesu niu silujiu paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Kadih khatniu parup rup kamlujiu, khat khattu chari thiusai tingtheng lakge; kikhun khatniu njanpad lujiu chari thiusai hanuangmi rabo-e.
Sichiujiu, Satan kadihse parup-parup thiumisai, haise dechiu tingtheng luralo? Naliuniu din-e chiubora Iniu rasadungtu hathonpad ngambose Beelzebul niu atu pumtanse pikhai bibo-e.
Iniu haichiujiu paliutu hapad bamsai, naliu saisui maidung sira saogu pumtan gasu paliutu hathonpad jiulo? Naliu saisuimai siakniudi naliu hai mao mide chiubo lenrabo-e!
Sichiu makge, Tingwang pumtan gasu Iniu rasadung haitu hapadbo-e, haisiniu Tingwang gu chawangdihse naliu khuga wangbam mide chiubo lenkhaibo-e.
Katanbopiu siniu chaheng-changiu thinlujiu paky khuanbamsai, pagu maniase wadi halakge.
Chiudi pasuang tanbibopiu siniu patu chonlujiu, patu ngammi sai, paniu mangiu khaijiu bambo heng-ngiu hinase sutlujiu tad mine sichiujiu paniu agalubo hinase njanmi rabo-e.
“Rasa siniu mai khat khugasu padboga, mathak khaira pabam phiujiu kasangbo kadihga rontadle. Haisiniu wakhatnadi daomakboga paronna din-e, ‘Iniu akyga malanwang mine.’
Sichiujiu haisiniu wanglanboga, paky se kam masan lujiu kaden khaibam niubo daode.
Siga rasa siniu tadpad lujiu pasuang kasabo rasa chinniatu maluang wangjiu siga lung mide. Sichiujiu, haise pad miboga, sibo piuse nda karaiga suang sa-nkiu mide.”
Haise Jesu niu dinboga, maidung ruang gasu maipui khatniu pakhuan tanjiu din-e, “Natu lungbopui khatdi akhibo puise dejiukha pasan wilo!”
Siga Jesu niu paokakge, “Sisuang, Tingwang chamse chiulujiu majailu maise pasan wi-e!”
Nineveh maidung khuga phaimiukakung Jonah tu tasibo pi thiukhaibo kumjiu, thaidao tingga lungmai lengdi Chamai Nahpiu siniu tasibo pi thiukhai rabo-e.

Ladjan thiubo Naise Sheba mai Wangpuiniu chapsu lujiu thaidao tingga lungmaidungtu ladjan thiu sune, palamra paniu pagu kadih gasu Chawang Solomon gu ningting situ nkingra tadkhai kamigu-e; sichiujiu Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, haiga Solomon suang kadibo khat bamme.

Ladjan thiubo Naise Nineveh maidungniu chapsu lujiu naliutu ladjan thiusune, palamra Jonah niu dinron wangboga paliu nuan gasu lungli kamigu-e; sichiujiu Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e chiubora haiga Jonah suang kadibo khat bamme!
Naliu mikse naliu pumgu chamibung kumbo-e. Naliu mikse wibamsai, naliu pum pakhiangna kabenboniu phui bamme; chiudi naliu mikse wita misai, naliu pum pakhiangna tamiuboga bamrabo-e.
Sichiusai naliu khuga bambo nbiuse tamiuboga bammi makra kamsiak lulo.
Naliu pum pakhiangna kabenboniu phuibamsai, tamiuboga wakhatnadi bam maksai, haisiniu chamibung mataoboga pabiu nakhuga thaokhaibo kumjiu, pakhiangna benjiu bamrabo-e.”
Jesu niu tachamse dinloi miboga Pharisee mai khatniu patu katiu tiura ku-e, sijengniu paniu tadlujiu tiuraleng ntao kiu-e.
Jesu niu katiu tiusu rabo suangga tacheng saisuijiu paben ntik makbo donniu, Pharisee maipiuse pasuang hamide.
Siga Rapiu niu pakhuga din-e, “Phuilo, naliu Pharisee maidungra naliu kuang, naliu piang lenlamra khiu masan-e, chiudi naliu lung lamra kasabo nai taniaboniu phui bamme.
Kapang maidung yo! Palenlam damkhaibo Tingwang niu palung lamdi damkhaibo makma?
Sichiujiu naliu kuang-piangga bambose lung kasamaidung khuga pikhai bilo, sichiusai pakhiangnase naliuleng masanmi rabo-e.
“Pharisee maidung yo, dejiukha naliu sansa gulo! Naliuniu maduiky gase kadakhaibo bamga ntaora, khatdi senky gase mainiu naliutu chakhuang thiujiu kahumbo situ naliuniu masenne.
Dejiukha naliu san kasa gulo! Naliu hai kam tasikhai makbo rawdung riga maidungniu simakjiu tadkhaibose kumbo-e.”
Tacheng tajaigu katipao khatniu pakhuga din-e, “Katipao yo, nangniu haise dinboga, aliutudi din masa kabam gu-e.”

Jesu niu paokakge, “Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung yo, dejiukha naliu san sagulo! Naliuniu phungtad lulakbo bangse maidung riga thonkhai lujiu, naliu njung khatniudi kariopad sibo bangtu phungra nkha khaini makge.
Dejiukha naliu san kasa gulo! Naliu pao-peh mainiu kamshat mibo phaimiukakungdung rawse naliuniu kam mawi khai-e.
Siga naliuniu naliu ronna suikhai-e, chiubora naliu paopehniu kamshat mibo phaimiukakungdung lengse naliuniu paliu rawleng chukhai-e.
Haijengniu Tingwang gu ningting siniu din-e, ‘Iniu paliuleng phaimiukakungdung nai walang tadmaidung tu langkhaine; siga paliuniu khangsiatu kamshat mine, khatdi khangsiatu kam mathad khaine.’
Sichiujiu kadihpiri damsubo gasu phaimiukakungdung tu kamshat mibose thaidao tingga lungmaidung riga mathad khai rabo-e,

Abel tu kamshatbo gasuniu Zechariah tu rathakbam nai Masanbo Bam kakga kamshat mibo tangjiu, mathad khai rabo-e. Yo, Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, thaidao tingga lungmaidungtu paliu mathiu sung mathad khai rabo-e!

“Tacheng tajaigu katipaodung yo, dejiukha naliu sansa gulo! Tasi ningtinggu khamtense naliuniu thinman lude; naliuniu, naliu ronna ngutkhai makge, khatdi siga ngutra matan bammai tudi naliuniu suikhai makge!”
Jesu niu sibo bamtu phutkhai lujiu tadmiboga, Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung nai Pharisee maidung-niu patuse khan-tiajiu dinsude, khatdi pakhuga wa kakengkha maniu sude,
sichiujiu patu tathak thiujiu palad gasu kamaobo madamjiu patu minra kamsude.

Maidung sang sang siniu wang maduijiu, paliuniu khat khat riga tao maluijiu ahi bamboga, Jesu niu raiboga pakhommaidung khuga din-e, “Pharisee maidung khi situ phuisilo, Iniu dinbora paliugu wasao thiubo situ-e.
Gomkhai bambo hina lepad mirabo-e, khatdi mahimgu hinase din madupad mirabo-e.
Sichiusai, tamiuboga naliuniu dinbo hinase benboga chiukam mirabo-e, khatdi naliuniu mahim ladtum khai mibo hinadi chaky npom rigasu senpad mirabo-e.
“Akahmaidung yo, Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, chapumtu gilujiu, sibosai wa kasa kamsan silakbo patu pingmi tulo.
Saotu ping ralo chiubo Iniu naliu khuga dinlen bine: gimibo sai charuidihga thonkhai ngambo Tingwang tu pinglulo. Iniu dinbo hai malumlulo, patuse naliu pingrabo siakge.
Takinapui mangiutu damli nialeng jonbo makma? Chiudi Tingwang niu takina khattudi mangai makge.
Nathamkeng hinadi pariak sikamlu mibo-e. Sijengniu pingmi tulo; naliura padung kengbo takina suang paman kung nkiubo-e!

“Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, chiubora mai khatniu mathiu suangga pahai asai kasui mai-e, chiujiu din madu khaisai, Chamai Nahpiu siniudi Tingwang gu mazadung masuangga patu din madu khai rabo-e.
Chiudi mai khatniu mathiu suangga atu lukhai maksai, Chamai Nahpiu niudi Tingwang gu mazadung masuangga patu lukhai lakge.
Palamra Masanbo Hiupuina siniu sibo wan-ga naliuniu dinrabose katikhai birabo-e.”
Maidung ruanggasu mai khatniu Jesu khuga din-e, “Katipao yo, apiuniu khaidiakbo maniase njan khaira asingnapiu khuga dinkhai khelo.”
Jesu niu patu paokakge, “Singna yo, nanai kakga ladjan thiura maksai nanaigu maniatu njanra saoniu atu pumtan pijiulo?”
Sichiujiu paniu paliu mathiu khuga dinsude, “Patiuni kasabo hina gasu naliu ronna maren lulo; palamra mai khatgu palingbo karingting sira pagu wajiukha bamjiu lungwibo mania siniu makge.”
Sigasu Jesu niu din champanbo hai paliu khuga dinsude; “Kalekwibo piu khatniu tasiu kengkha kamlude.
Paniu paronna haichiu maning sude, ‘Iniu agu miusydung hai waga khaira pakhai hamide. Iniu nde kamralo?’
Paronna haichiu din-e, ‘Iniu haichiu kamrade. Iniu abow haise ralujiu haisuang kadibo khat thiulujiu asiu khatdi agu kakibo maniadungse khaira mide.
Sibo naise Iniu aronna atu din-e, ‘Oh, Pasan kawibopiu yo! Takum wajiukha leng mania hina bamkam mide, koina njiu-njiangjiu tiulo, saklo khatdi naronna amansai lulo!’
Chiudi Tingwang niu pakhuga din-e, ‘Oh, Kapangbo piu yo! Thaichun siak nagu karingting hai hami rabo-e; sichiusai nangniu naleng-e chiujiu makhuan khai bambo maniadung hai saoniu luralo?’”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu munkomjiu din-e, “Tingwang leng lungwi khai makjiu, paliuleng ronna lungwi bambo maira haichiu rabo-e.”
Sigasu Jesu niu pakhommaidung khuga din-e, “Haijengniu, naliuniu tiujiu ringraleng katiu-kasak, maksai naliu pumleng,chafai-tani jengniu manangmi makra Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e.
Karingting hai katiu-kasak suang kungbo-e, khatdi apum hai chafai-tani suang kungbo-e.

N-gekdungtu phuilo: paliuniu wadi lingmakge, maksai wadi atiat makge; paliuniu khom maduibo ky maksai chabow thiumakge; chiudi Tingwang niu paliutu pitiu khajiu bambo-e! Thingnadung suang naliura paman kung nkiubo-e!
Naliu mai khatniu manangbo donniu poinakha ringthenglu buima? Maksai naliu then hai poinakha kam maku lubuima?
Naliuniu haikumbo kam ngam maksai, dekamjiu kakibo donniu manangbam ralo?

Manamga nkinpense dechiujiu puaksulo chiubo phuilo: paliuniu chalang thiu makge, maksai paliuniu adak makge. Chiudi Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, chiubora Chawang Solomon niudi haibo rapendung kumjiu wadaodi palekwat siniu karulu makge.

Nkan piubuantu karukhaibo haise Tingwang niu-e chapiubuan hainiu thainai penbam lujiu sonnai khoilujiu mangga rumi rabo-e. Sisuang monjiu paniu naliutu karukhaibi lakma? Naliugu malum hai dejiukha ha gulo!
“Sijengniu naliuniu tiurabo khatdi sakrabo donniu manang mitulo.
(Palamra haibo kadihpirigu nkengmai niudi haikumbo donniu manang kabamgu-e). Naliuleng haidungse pageng bamme chiubo naliu Piuniu sibambo-e.
Sibosung, pawangdih donniu manang lulo, sichiusai paniu haidungse naliuleng pikhai san bine.
“Kasiambo milypoidung yo pingmi tulo, palamra naliu Piuniu naliuleng Chawang kadihse pikhaira pachun wijiu bamme.

Naliugu hina jonlujiu, kahamaileng rangkangse njan khai milo. Sichiujiu wadao khatdi npikiu makbo tinggen lekwat situ matan lulo, palamra siga agatiumaidung siniu agalan ngam makge, khatdi makhiu-tariniu kam mahalan ngam makge.
Palamra naliugu chakhiu-chalan bamboga, naliu lungchundi bamrabo-e.
Paliu wangpiu siniu tanao aruangbo gasu wangra khonbambo vangdung kum lulo. Paliu wangpiuniu wangjiu nkham magansai lekhainuang bira, paliu kadenjiu khonbambo-e.
Paliu wangpiu wangbo tingga kadenjiu rakbam niubo vangdungse dejiukha san wilo! Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, paniu pa-ntiangse lupad lujiu, paliutu ntaokiura dinsune, khatdi paliutu khonkhai bine.
Paniu chundingga wangdi, sisuang rijiu wangdi, paliuniu kadenjiu khon bambose, paniu daosai dejiuga paliu sanwi ralo!
Sigasu chaky paopiu siniu agatiu maidungse dedao wangralo chiubo paniu sisai, simaitu wangjiu paky kampangra wadaodi suilakge, chiubo naliuniu si-e.
Sijengniu naliudi kadensiak lujiu bamlo, palamra Chamai Nahpiuse naliuniu maning makjingbo tingga wangrabo-e.”
Peter niu din-e, “Rapiu yo, din champanbo hai aliutu dinjiuma, maksai haise mai hinatu dinjiulo?”

Rapiu niu paokakge, “Sichiusai, saose malum suibo khatdi ningtingbo vanglo? Palamra papaopiuniu pakilung pakhiangna phuikhaira khatdi pavang kakimaidung tudi pawan gapboga katiu pikhaira malinkhai diakbo piu si-e.
Papao siniu wangbo tingga kaden lujiu bamniubo vangse dejiukha pasan wilo!
Pachang palingjiu Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, papao siniu sibo vang situ pagu kabambo hina pithin khai rabo-e.

Chiudi sibo vang siniu paronna, papao wangrabo ting thengbam kha-e chiu maninglujiu, kakibo vangdung situ maipui, maipiutu simakjiu dapbambo tingga, khatdi tiu-maniu, sak-maniu bambo wan-ga, papao piuse wangsai dechiu ralo?
Sichiujiu paniu maningkhai makbo wan gase papao piuse wanglujiu patuse dan marami rabo-e, khatdi patuse kadinpiu makbo maidung dam lura thonpadmi rabo-e.
Papao piuniu patu pikam khai nibose silujiu, sise kamra kaden makbo vang situra dapjiu mathadsui khai rabo-e.

Chiudi papao piuniu patu pikam khainibo simak tadi, poinagadi paniu kabuibo kambam niusai, patu masen bibo dapsiniu poinakha mathad khai tarabo-e. Pikhai makeng mibo pakhugasu kakengbose lulan rabo-e, pikhai nkiu mibo pakhugasu nkiubose lulan rabo-e.
“Iniu kadihpiriga chami khaira wangbo-e, sichiujiu sise taoloi bamniu sai Iniu dejiukha achun ralo!
Atu nphum khairabo khat bamme, sise loimak thenna dejiukha alung chariu gulo!
Iniu kadihpiriga agi-manaibo phungwang-e, chiujiu naliu maning jiuma? Chiumakge, agi-manaibo makge, chiudi palam pitam-tam khaira wangbo-e.
Tuhoi gasuniu khang mangiu bambo kykhun siniu khangsumtu khangnianiu, khangnianiu khangsumtu mikremi raleng-e.

Papiudungniu nahpiudungtu, khatdi nahpiudungniu paliu piudungtu mikremi raleng-e; khatdi papuidungniu nahpuidungtu, khatdi nahpuidungniu paliu puidungtu mikremi raleng-e; khatdi panaidungniu pamupuidungtu, khatdi pamupuidungniu panaidungtu mikre raleng-e.
Jesu niu maidung khuga din-e, “Naliuniu tingbanglam kamuang kensubo ngaosai, ting riune chiujiu din-e, khatdi sise pachangjiu padle.
Khatdi tingrun lamsu tingkai hunwang sai, naliuniu ting thiune chiujiu din-e, khatdi sise pachangjiu padle.
Wasao kathiu maidung yo! Naliuniu tingra matad lujiu, tingkai, tingriutu silu-e; sichiusai tuhoi ken-gu ramba haitu dekamjiu naliuniu simak jiulo?
“Naliuniu dechiujiu majibo siniu naliutu ladjan thiumak jiulo?

Naliuniu, mai khattu n-gijiu paniu ladjanky lam puitadra kamsai patu n-gikhai mibose kam mahakhai mira matan lulo. Naliuniu sichiulu maksai paniu naliutu ladjanpao khugase naliutu jukhaine, chiusai paniu naliutu chamai minmai khuga pikhaijiu paliuniu naliutu kavangkyga jukhai mine.
Sichiusai Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, naliuniu damli poi katang pikam makthen siga naliu bammi rabo-e.”
Sibo tingga maidungniu chara thiujiu bamga Pilate niu Galilee maidungtu kamshat mibo lamga Jesu khuga dinkhaide.
Jesu niu paliutu paokakge, “Kamshat mibo Galilee maidungse, kakibo Galilee maidung suang sa-nkiubo nuan kambo donniu-e chiubo naliu maning jiuma?
Pachangjiu chiumakge! Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e chiubora naliudi naliu nuan gasu lungli lumaksai, paliu kumjiu naliudi shairabo-e.
Siloam ga chaky-ton kaokiujiu chamai khang kariu-je-tachatkiutu kamshat mibose dechiubo gasulo? Jerusalem ga lungbambo kakimaidung suang paliuse sa-nkiubo donniu-e chiubo naliu maning jiuma?
Pachangjiu chiumakge! Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e chiubora naliudi naliu nuan gasu lungli lumaksai paliu kumjiu naliudi shairabo-e.”
Sigasu Jesu niu din champanbo hai paliu khuga dinkhaide: “Pawan khatga maipiu khat reng lungga ndutbang khat puak bamme. Sichiujiu paniu ndutsy phiutadboga wakhatnadi daomakge.

Sijengniu paniu pareng tenbo piu khuga din-e, ‘Phuilo, Iniu haibo ndutbangga pasy phiuwangbo hai takum sum tangmide chiudi Iniu wakhatnadi daomakge. Haise huithon milo! Deleng kadihtam haitu kam mahajiu bamralo?’
Chiudi kareng tenbo piu siniu paokakge, ‘Paohubo, haise takum khat lengra pichiu khaibam railo; Iniu haibo munggase chu magui lujiu kadihtam khai mataine.
Sichiujiu ma-kum hai pasy masi dasai wi-diangde; masi makjiu tasai haise nangniu huimidi sui-e.’”
Tabamnai khatga Jesu niu maduiky khatga katikhaijiu bamme.
Siga maipui khat khuga rasa ngutbo jengniu takum kariu-je-tachat marawang mibo pui khat bamme; pahai nkontarung mijiu wadaodi chap mating ngamlak mibo pui-e.
Jesu niu sinapuitu ngaoboga, paniu patu kujiu din-e, “Narapot gasu wimi sulo!”
Sichiujiu paniu pariga paben kabakhai biboga, pase paronna chap matingkhang mide sichiujiu Tingwang tu thuon sude.
Rapiu niu patu paokakge, “Wasao thiubo mai yo! Naliu mai hina, naliugu matomtu maksai qonniamtu pareng lunggasu Tabamnai khipad lujiu tadui pisak khai-e.
Tuhoi haibo pui, Abraham kaikik haitu Satan niu takum kariu-je-tachatkiu rewang mibo-e; patuse Tabamnai khikhai mak rama?”
Pagu chamkak hainiu, pagu mikre maidungse paliu ronna mangamjiu bamga, maidung sira paniu tasibo ngam kamkhaibo jengniu paliu chun wijiu bamme.
Jesu niu maniu-e, “Tingwang gu Chawangdih situ dechiujiu Iniu din kada ralo?
Sise haikumbo-e. Mai khatniu njengsiu khat khoilujiu paluga lingkhai-e, sibo bangse puakkhangjiu, singbang kadibo thiukhang-e, sibo kedung gase thingnadungniu wangjiu paliu sip ponkhaibo kumbo-e.’
Jesu niu maniu lan-e, “Iniu Tingwang gu Chawangdih haitu dechiujiu din kadakhai ralo?
Sise haikumbo-e. Maipui khatniu takhui takamga chakhi tamnakha jakhaijiu sise pungpad makthen khai bambo kumbo-e.
Jesu niu namdakdung khatdi namdungtu katikhaijiu Jerusalem lam jonwang kin-e.
Maidung khangsianiu pakhuga din-e, “Paohubo yo, maidung khangsia ronna rankhaibo daorama?”
Jesu niu paliutu paokakge,
“Marumbo rengmun-ga ngutra naliu matan lulo; palamra maidung kakengniu siga ngutra matan sune chiudi ngut ngamlakge.

Chaky paopiu siniu sulujiu akhamse khammi sune, siga naliuniu lenlam chaplujiu akhamse lekhaira maganjiu dinsune, ‘Aliuleng nkham lekhailo, Rapiu yo!’ Siga paniu naliutu haichiu paokak sune, ‘Naliu delamsu wangmailo I naliutu simakge!’
Siga naliuniu paokak sune, ‘Aliu hai nangtu tiu macham sak macham khaimibo mai-e; nangniu aliu namdakga katikhai mibo-e!’
Chiudi paniu dinsune, ‘Naliu delamsu wangmailo? I naliutu simakge. Naliu hai kasamai maliang-e, akhugasu tadmilo!’
Maidungniu tingbang lamsu khatdi tingnu lamsu, tingpi lamsu khatdi tingrun lamsu Tingwang gu chawangdihgu Ngee gase wang ntao sune.
Sichiusai tuhoi kanamaidung siniu raimi sune, khatdi tuhoi raijiu bam maidungse kanammi sune.
Sibo wan gase Pharisee maidung khangsianiu Jesu khuga wanglujiu din-e, “Nang haibo bamgasu tadmilo khatdi pabam kakilam maritad milo, palamra Herod niu nangtu kamshat raleng phiu bamme.”
Jesu niu paliutu paokakge, “Tadlujiu sibo tany khuga dinbilo: Iniu thainai, sonnai lungga rasadungtu hapadjiu wikhai kinbo-e, sichiujiu pasumbo naise Iniu angam loimi rabo-e,’
chiudi Iniu thainai, sonnai, khatdi pasaibonai angam kambam rabo-e; phaimiukakung situ Jerusalem ga makbo kakilam kamshatra maji makge.”

“Oh,Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Phaimiukakung maidung situ nangniu kamshat mibo-e, Tingwang niu pagu ladlangtad maidungtu langkhaiboga nangniu tatu rotshat mibo-e! Maruipuiniu pakan hangga papoinatu kagom kumjiu, Idi akan hangga naliu mathiutu gomkhai nibo-e, chiudi naliuniu atu suikhai makge!

Sijengniu naliu Raky hai nchummi rade. Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e chiubora naliuniu, ‘Rapiu zan gasu wangbo patu Tingwang niu thoikhai bilo,’ chiu dinmak thenna, naliuniu atu ngaolak mide.”
Tabamnai khatga Jesu niu Pharisee maigu jupao khat kyga katiu tiura tadle, siga maidungniu Jesu tu matingjiu phui bamme.
Siga paphi-paben menjiu bambo piu khat Jesu khuga wang-e,
siga Jesu niu Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung nai Pharisee maidung khuga maniu-e, “Aliugu Tacheng-tajainiu Tabamnai wikhaira suima, suimaklo?”
Chiudi paliuniu wakhatnadi dinmakge. Siga Jesu niu maipiu situ wikhai lujiu paky lam langkhai mide.
Sichiujiu paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu ruangga mai khangkhat nahpiu maksai matomchi khat, Tabamnaise ajai lungga nkai khai misai, naliuniu Tabamnai siakse patu jupad nuangmi lakma?”
Chiudi haibo lamga paliuniu patu wadi kenkak ngamlakjiu tamide.
Chagiangmai khangsianiu withubo bamdungse kada bambose Jesu niu siluboga; paniu din champanbo haise paliu mathiu khuga dinkhaide:
“Tanao aruangboga naliutu mai khatniu kukhai sai withubo bamgase ntaomi tulo. Nasuang parathiubo mai khattu kukhai bam niudi saoniu siralo,
