sichiujiu nanai khangniatu kukhaibo chakypao siniu wanglujiu nakhuga haichiu dinsune, ‘Haibo bamse patu pimilo.’ Sichiusai nang mangamjiu n-hangthubo bamga ntaomi surabo-e.

Sisuangra natu kukhaiboga tadlujiu n-hangthubo bamgase ntaolo; sichiusai chaky pao siniu wanglujiu nakhuga dinsune, ‘Akabo yo, pabam wibibo haiga wang ntao khailo.’ Haisiniu kakibo giangdung mathiu suangga natu chakhuangthiu khaibo-e.
Palamra paronna patu pidi khai maitu kam manuankhai rabo-e, khatdi paronna patu kam manuan khai maitu kam madikhai rabo-e.”

Sigasu Jesu niu pa-kiriupiu khuga din-e, “Nangniu katiu tiura kuboga, nakahmaidungtu maksai nasingna maidungtu maksai nakiriang maidungtu maksai lungwibo nakining maidungtu kumi tulo; palamra paliuniu natu kulanjiu nangniu kamkhai mibose ruilan ngamme.
Nangniu katiu tiura kuboga lungkalak maitu, paphi-paben katang maitu, khatdi pamik katiat maitu kukhailo;
sichiusai nasan wirabo-e, palamra paliuniu napawse ruingam lakge. Sichiujiu kawimaidungniu kashaibo gasu ringsulanbo naise Tingwang niu napawse ruikhai birabo-e.”
Sibo ruangga bammai khatniu haise chiuboga, paniu Jesu khuga din-e, “Tingwang gu Chawangdihgu changeega wangra maise dejiukha paliu san wiralo!”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Pawan khatga Khumkibo ngee kadibo khatga mai khatniu maidung kakengtu kukhai-e.
Khumkibo ngeese wangtangboga, paniu pavangmaitu langkhaijiu pagiang maidungtu kukhai-e, ‘Wanglo, wahinase kadenloi mide!’

Chiudi paliu mathiuniu khat-khat thiujiu kuak khailo chiujiu dinsude. Karaibo piuniu kavangpiu khuga din-e, ‘I chalu khat liukhai bamme sise phuira tadmak sai daolakge; lungsajiu Iniu khengbo hai suikhailo.’
Khangkhat siniu din-e, ‘Idi matomchi ndah mangiu lukhai bamme, situ phuira Iniu tadkinbo-e; lungsajiu Iniu khengbo hai suikhailo.’
Khang khatniu dinlan-e, ‘Ira anaothiu lugap bambo-e, sijengniu I wang daolakge.’

Pavang siniu malanwang pakhiangna haise pawangpiu khuga dinkhaide. Siga pawangpiuse palung pomchang pom mide khatdi pavang khuga haichiu din-e, ‘kalangjiu puidiga khatdi namdigu kamikga lungkalakmai, paphi-paben tangmai khatdi pamik tiatmaitu kuwanglo.’
Pavang siniu watheng makjiu din-e, “Nangniu dinbo kumjiu kamkhai mide, chiudi pabamra keng bamkha-e.’
Siga pawangpiu siniu din-e, Tadlujiu puidiga khatdi pabam hinaga tadkin maitu kuwangjiu aky piphui khailo.
Iniu naliu mathiu khuga dinbo-e chiubora kukhai mibo maidungse, mai khatniudi Iniu kaden khaibo katiu-kasakse tiukhaira ha ye!’”
Pawan khatga maidung kakengniu Jesu sai suilujiu tadkinboga paniu mariwang lujiu paliu khuga din-e,
“Mai khatniu atu hai papui, papiu, panao panahdung, pasingnadung, patandungtu khatdi papum suang lungsa nkiu maksai pase akhommai thiusi lakge.
Mai khatniu pagu singchai phunglujiu asaisui maksai pase akhommai thiusi lakge.
Naliu mai khatniu chaky thiura rangsai, paniu raiboga ntaokiu lujiu, pangamse kamra pagu rangkangse tanglu rama chiubo, paniu chakrai rabo-e.
Paniu kaphung chukhai lujiu, pakyse thiuloilu maksai kangaomai hinaniu patu nuirabo-e.
Paliuniu haichiu dinsune, “Haibo piuniu chaky hai thiura rangsubo-e, chiudi thiungam lakjiu tamibo-e!”

Chawang khatniu chamai sang kariutu maluang lujiu tadboga, patu aphenra wangbo chawang khat siniu chamai sang makaitu maluanglu wangsai, paniu ntaokiu lujiu sibo wangtu aphenra buima, buimaklo chiubo phuirabo-e.
Paniu buimakge chiu maningsai, paniu walangtad maidungtu langkhaijiu chawang khat siniu diujiu bamga, kawithiu mira khengrabo-e.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu munkomjiu din-e, “Naliu mai khatniu, pagu bambo hinase saodiak ngamlu maksai akhommai thiusi lakge.”
“Matai hai wi-e, chiudi matai haise pahum hamisai, dechiujiu kam mahumlan luralo?
Haise kadihtam lengdi gengta mibo-e, haise thonmi rabo-e. Pakuon bammai hina nking lulo!”
sigase Pharisee maidung nai Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodungse paliu ronna haichiu dinsude, “Haina piuniu nuan phungmaidungtu lukhai-e, khatdi paliutu maluang tiu-e!”
Sijengniu Jesu niu paliu khuga din champanbo hai dinkhaide:

“Naliu ruangga mai khang khatgu mily kai khat bambo gasu, khat hamisai paniu dechiu ralo? Paniu pagu mily riakchakiu-je-chakiu situ piuriang liga khaidiak lujiu, hamibo khat situ phiudao makthen phiurabo-e.
Sichiujiu paniu sise phiudao luboga, pachun wijiu pamakhuak rigasu ponlujiu pakyga wangrabo-e.
Sichiujiu pakahmaidung nai pakiningmaitu kumadui lujiu, paliu khuga din-e, ‘I achun wichang wi-e, palamra Iniu agu hamibo mily situ daolan lude, siniu aliu chunwi machamkhe!’
Sikumgapjiu Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, lungli lanra pageng hamibo tacheng tadmaidung riak-chakiuje-chakiu tusuang, nuan phungmai khatniu lungliwang lanboga tinggen lam chunwi nkiurabo-e.
“Sichiu maksai maipui khatniu rangkang kariu bambo gasu rangkang khat hamisai paniu dechiu ralo? Paniu chamibung matao lujiu, paky biakjiu phiudao makthen phiurabo-e.
Sichiujiu paniu phiudao luboga, pakahmaidung nai pakiningmaitu kumadui lujiu din-e, ‘I achun wichang wi-e, palamra Iniu agu hamibo rangkangse daolan lude, sijengniu aliu chunwi machamkhe!’
Sikumjiu Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, nuan phungmai khatniu lungliwang lanboga Tingwang gu mazadung siniu chunwi-e.”
Jesu niu dinkiu lan-e, “Pawan khatga maipiu khatniu panah piumai khangnia bamme.
Panah n-nahpiu siniu papiu khuga din-e, ‘Apiu yo, tuhoira adamrabo maniadungse aleng pikhailo.’ Sijengniu papiu siniu pagu bambo maniadungse panah kania damse njankhai mide.
Sichiujiu watheng makjiu panah nabopiu siniu pagu hina jonlujiu paky phutlujiu tadmide. Paniu pabam kadiubo lam tadlujiu pagu kabambo hinase wajeng simakjiu thinkam mide.
Sichiujiu paniu pagu bambo hinase thinkam mide. Siniu pah wadi thinra hamiboga, charakhum khumdi wangde.
Sijengniu siga lungbammai khunlungmai khat khuga wangde, paniu patuse kavak khuanra langkhaide.
Siga pase kavak tekdi tiujiu pawanse magiu khaini mide, chiudi mai khatniudi patu wadi pikhai makge.
Sichiujiu kanamboga paniu wa maningtao lujiu haichiu dinsude, ‘Apiuniu lanbambo kavangdung sira tiumali malanjiu bambo-e, chiudi Ira haiga wadi tiura hajiu makim bamme.
Iniu sulujiu apiu khulam wanglujiu din-e, ‘Apiu yo, Iniu Tingwang khuga khatdi nakhuga maomide.
Atu hai nanahpiu leng kuji tamide, chiudi nangniu lanbambo kavang khattu kumjiu atu lukhailo.’
Sichiujiu paniu sulujiu papiu khulam jonwang sude.
“Sichiujiu paniu kadiulam tadkin khaga papiuniu patu phuimeng ngaolude, khatdi lungsaboniu phuilujiu pakmeng daojiu panahtu pamlujiu kapup khai sude.
Panah siniu din-e, ‘Apiu yo, Iniu Tingwang khuga khatdi nakhuga maomide. Atu hai nanahpiu leng kuji tamide.’
Sichiudi papiu siniu pavangmaitu kulujiu din-e, ‘Kalang sulo, withubo faise khoipad lujiu patu benkhai bilo, khatdi paphitop nai njung khapse khai bilo.
Sigasu pamai wibo tomse gisulo, sichiujiu aliu chunwi matha sukhe.
Palamra anahpiu hai shaimibo-e, chiudi pah ringwang lan bamme; pahai hamibo-e, chiudi tuhoira daolan lude.’ Sichiujiu paliu chun wijiu matha sude.
Sibo wan gase panah katingpiuse chaluga bamme. Sichiujiu paniu chaky wang mana suboga chalui thiubo khatdi chalen lenbo khuan hai chiusude.
Siga paniu pavang khattu kulujiu nde kambo gulo chiu maniu-e.
Pavang siniu paokakge, ‘Nasai kariupiuse malan wanglan bamme; sijengniu napiuniu pachun wijiu pamai wibo khatdi paman kungbo tomse gilujiu matha bambo-e.’
“Siga pachi katingpiuse palung pomchang pomjiu chakyga wanglakde chiujiu bam mide; sijengniu papiu siniu padlujiu patu hiamjiu chakyga wangra din-e.

Siga paniu papiu khuga din-e, ‘Phuilo, takum haitheng lungga Iniu nalad majai kamakbo thiumakjiu kavang khat kumjiu lungwang mibo-e. Sichiudi nangniu aleng degu pikhailo? Kamipoi nadi akahmaidungtu maluang tiu nchamra pikhai makge.
Sichiudi nanahpiu hainiu pagu kabambo hinase matun kamak puidungtu maluangjiu kam mahakam lujiu wangda, nangniu paman kungbo tomse gilanbi jiuma!’
Papiu siniu din-e, ‘Anah yo, nangra pawan machang akhuga bambo-e, siniu agu kabambo hinase nagu-e.
Sichiudi aliu chunwijiu matha rabo-e, palamra nasai kariupiu haisira shaimibo-e, chiudi tuhoi pah ringwang lanbo-e; pahai hamibo-e, chiudi tuhoi patu daolan lubo-e.’”

Jesu niu pakhommaidung khuga din-e, “Pawan khatga kalekwibo piu khat bamme, sinapiugu changam phungpao, pavang khat ronna bamme. Changam phungpao siniu, pawangpiugu rangkangse thin mawi makge chiubo chamse kalekwibo piu khuga paowangde.
Sijengniu paniu patu kulujiu din-e, ‘Iniu nalamga chiubo hai dechiubo gulo? Agu maniagu pad-ngutbo tachak hina palam pilo, palamra nangniu agu changam phung silak mide.’
Siga pavangpiu siniu paronna haichiu din-e, ‘Awangpiu hainiu angam gasu atu lupad mine. Iniu dekam ralo? Iniu kadih chu ngam-lakrai, maksai Iniu takheng radi mangamme.
Tuhoira Iniu dekam ralo chiubo I si-e! Iniu angam hami tadi, akahmaidung siniu paliu kyga atu lukhai raleng kamra mide.’
“Sijengniu pawangpiu paw kaphungmai hinatu paniu kuwangde. Paniu raithubo piu khuga maniu-e, ‘Nangniu awangpiu pawse dejiukha phungbam jiulo?’
Paniu paokakge, ‘Wasa bung kai khat.’ Changam phungpao siniu din-e, ‘Nagu tachak khuangse haiga bamme, nangniu ntaokiu lujiu ringiu ronna-e chiujiu raokhai lulo,’

Sibosai paniu khangkhat khuga maniu-e, ‘Nangra dejiukha phungbam jiulo? Paniu paokakge, ‘Chabanmiu phaopot sang khat.’ Changam phungpaoniu pakhuga din-e, ‘Nagu tachak khuangse haiga bamme, kai tachat ronna-e chiujiu raokhai lulo.’
Haichiujiu ningtingbo jengniu pawangpiu siniu palung masan makbo changam phungpao situ thuonde. Haichiujiu haibo kadihga lungbo maidung siniu paliu ngamga, kabenbo nahdung suang ningting nkiu-e.”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu dinkiu-e, “Siniu naliu khuga Iniu dinbo-e: haibo kadihgu chakhiu-chalantu naliu ka thiu silulo, hainiu naliutu thonpad dasai, tingtheng ringbo kygase naliutu lukhai rabo-e.
Mai khattu changam poinaga malumsui sai, kadibo gadi malumsui rabo-e; mai khattu changam poinaga malum khaidao laksai, kadibo gadi malum khai silakge.
Naliutu haibo kadihgu chakhiu-chalan gadi malum maksai, dechiujiu majibogu chakhiu-chalan gase malum silu ralo?
Khatdi naliutu maigu maniaga malum khaidao laksai, saoniu naliutu naliugu maniaga malum silu ralo?
Haise Pharisee maidungniu chiuluboga, paliuniu Jesu tu nui-e, palamra paliuse rangkangtu masenbo maidung-e.
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu hai maidung masuangga majibo sao kathiubo mai-e, chiudi Tingwang niu naliu lungchun sibamme. Palamra chamainiu kakungbo leng lukhaibose Tingwang lengra wadi makge.
Sichiujiu sibo Tacheng-tajaiga siamthubo khattu kam maha mirabo suang, ting-kadih hamiboniu mala-e.
“Pawan khatga kalekwibo piu khatniu pafai-pani kawibo maliang piujiu lung amansai khai mibo piu khat bamniu-e.
Sigasu kaleksabo, pazanniu Lazarus kubo masakjiu akhuanbo piu khatniu,
sibo kalekwibo piu ky kamun gase, pakuangkai gasu ntiakiubose khoitiu khaira chiujiu wang-e. Siga pagen akhuanbo jamse tathiniu wangjiu maliak bamme.
Siga kaleksabo piuse shaikiu mide, sichiujiu Abraham mungga ntaolujiu tinggen maluadse tiura, mazadungniu puikhang mide. Siga kalekwibo piu sidi shaijiu bailan mide,
siga pase magenthiubo charuidih gase wangjiu, phuikhangboga, Abraham niu Lazarus tu maluang ntao bambose ngaode.
Siga paniu kujiu din-e, “Apiu Abraham yo! Lungsajiu Lazarus tu langkiu, pa-njung ton-gasu tadui sumlujiu alee pisum agi khailo, palamra haibo miniu magenthiu asangjiu bamme!”

“Chiudi Abraham niu din-e, ‘Anah yo, nangra nda nagu karingtingga kawibo maliang daomide, chiudi Lazarus ra kasabo maliang dao mibo-e. Siniu, tuhoira nangniu magenthiuboga, paniu amanboga bambo haide.
Sironna makjiu, aliu kakga kasukbo khunki hai bamme, sijengniu haigasu naliu khulam padkhaini maidi kenpad ngamlakge, khatdi naliu khulam niudi aliu khulam mai khatniudi kenpad ngamlakge.’
Siga kalekwibo piuniu din-e, ‘Sichiusai, apiu Abraham yo, apiu ky lam Lazarus tu langwang khaira, Iniu nakhuga khengbo-e,
siga asingnamai khang mangiu bamme. Siga patu pitad lujiu paliura haibo magenthiubo bamga wangmak raleng pijiu rukhailo.’
“Abraham niu din-e, ‘Nasingna maidungtu rukhai raleng Mose khatdi phaimiukakung maidung bamme; paliuniu dinbose nasingna maidungniu lukhai rabo-e.’
Kalekwibo piu siniu paokakge, ‘Siniu buimakge, apiu Abraham yo! Chiudi mai khattu pi kashaibo gasu ringwanglan lujiu paliu khuga langkhai bisai, paliu nuan gasu lungli lubui-e.’
Chiudi Abraham niu din-e, ‘Paliuniu Mose khatdi phaimiukakung maidung chamtu lukhai maksai, mai khatniu kashaibo gasu ringwanglan bidi paliu lung lisi lakge.’”
Jesu niu pakhommai khuga din-e, “Maidungniu nuan ga kaokhaira bamme, chiudi sise pipad khaibo maira dejiuga san salo!
Kasiambo nahmai khat haitu pijiu nuan ga kaokhaira kambo suang, tatupen kadibo khat pawongga khinkhai lujiu duipuiga thonkhai miboniu paleng wi-nkiu-e.
Sijengniu, naliuniu kambo hinaga ningting silo!
“Nasingnaniu nakhuga mao khaisai, patu rukhai bilo; sichiujiu paniu palung liwang lansai, patu kuakkhai bilo.
Paniu nakhuga naikhat maolon chinnia midi, paniu nakhuga wangjiu, “I alung limide,’ chiusai nangniu patu kuak khaibi rabo-e.”
Khommaidung siniu Rapiu khuga din-e, “Aliu malum pidi khailo.”
Rapiu niu paokakge, “Naliu malumse njengsiu langga bamsai, naliuniu haibo marebang haitu, haigasu npad lujiu uibo duipuiga lungmilo chiujiu dinsai, sise padmi rabo-e.
“Naliu mai khat vangpiu siniu chalu phujiu bamme, maksai milytu khuanjiu bamme chiukhe. Paniu chalu lamsu wangboga, naliuniu patu kalangjiu katiu tiusulo chiu din rama?
Sichiu lakge! Sibosung haichiu dinrabo-e, ‘Nakhen n-hang lujiu aleng katiu kaden khailo khatdi Iniu tiuloi-sakloi makthen khuanlo, sibo sainiu nang tiulo chiujiu dinrabo-e.’
Sichiujiu kavang siniu sibo chamtanse majaibo donniu patu thuonbo chamse din rama?
Naliudi haise kumbo-e; naliutu kamraleng pikhaibose kamloi dasai, haichiu dinno, ‘Aliu hai wadi makbo vangdung-e, aliuniu kamrabo hina kamloi lude.’”
Jesu niu Jerusalem lam tadra chiujiu Samaria nai Galilee kakga tadpadle.
Paniu nam khatga ngutboga ka-nphenmai khang kariuniu patu adao-e, siga paliuniu chap npen lujiu,
senjiu din-e, “Paohubo, Jesu yo! Aliutu lungsa khailo!”
Sichiujiu paliuniu tadkinboga, paliuse masan mide.
Paliu ruangga khangkhat siniu wimide chiubo siluboga, malanwang paniu Tingwang tu pakhuan tanjiu thuon sude.
Sichiujiu paniu Jesu phibangga makhum kiujiu patu thuonkiude. Haise Samaria maipiu-e.
Siga Jesu niu din-e, “Khang kariutu wikhai mibo-e; khang chakiu sira delam bammilo?
Haibo sangdiumai nakhaniu dechiujiu Tingwang tu thuonra wangjiulo?”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Sulujiu tadsulo, nagu malum siniu natu wikhai mide.”
Pharisee maidung khangsianiu Tingwang gu Chawangdihse dedaoniu wangralo chiubo Jesu khuga maniu-e. Paniu haichiu paokakge, “Tingwang gu Chawangdih sira haichiujiu wangne chiubo ngaolakge.
Mai khatniu, ‘Phuilo, haiga bamme!’ Maksai ‘Siga bamme!’ chiujiu dinlakge; palamra Tingwang gu Chawangdihse naliu ruangga bambo-e.”
Sibosai paniu pakhommaidung khuga din-e, “Naliuniu Chamai Nahpiu wangbo tingmiktu ngaoni sune, chiudi naliuniu sise ngaolakge.
Siga maidungniu naliu khuga ‘Phuilo, siga bamme!’ Maksai ‘Phuilo, haiga bamme!’ chiu dinsune. Chiudi sise phuira tadtulo.
Hengri kalikboga ting pake khat lamniu pake khatlam ngaochiabo kumjiu, Chamai Nahpiu wangbo tingmikdi sichiu rabo-e.
Chiudi raiboga pase magenthiu khengrabo-e, khatdi haibo ken-ga lungmaidung siniu patu lukhai lakge.
Noah ken-ga padmibo kumjiu Chamai Nahpiu Tingmik gadi padsu rabo-e.
Mai hinaniu tiujiu-sakjiu, khatdi tanao-tanah thiujiu bamboga Noah niu malee lungga ngutmibo sai tadui diwangjiu paliu mathiutu kamshat mibo-e.
Maksai, haise Lot ken-ga kumrabo-e. Mai hinaniu tiujiu, sakjiu, khatdi chali-alijiu, khatdi chaky chalu thiujiu bambo-e.
Chiudi Lot niu Sodom tu phutlujiu tadmibo naise tinggen lamsu chami nai chaganmipiu siniu riukiu khaijiu paliu mathiutu kamshat kam mibo-e.
Sise kumjiu Chamai Napiu tingmik sidi maduwang rabo-e.
Sibonai mai khatniu paky npom riga bamdi pagu mania khoira nkum mak rabo-e; sise kumjiu chalulam tadmibo paniudi paky lam malanwang mak rabo-e.
Lot naotu maningtaolo!
Mai khatniu paringting ranlura matansai hami rabo-e; mai khatniu paringtingse hakhai misai, ranlu rabo-e.
Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, “Sibonai nchunse mai khangnia tazi khatga jijiu bamdi, khang khattu lumine, khang khattu saodiak sune.
Maipui khangnia athao bam niudi, khang khattu lumine, khang khattu khaidiak sune.
Maipiu khangnia chaluga changam kambam niudi, khang khattu lumine, khang khattu khaidiak sune.
Khommaidung siniu maniu-e, “Rapiu yo, dega dechiu padsu ralo?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Kashaibo phaw bambo gase, chamitiuleng wang madui rabo-e.”
Jesu niu pakhommaidungtu pawan machang kakheng thiujiu bamrabo-e, wadao khatdi paliu lungchun nkhinmi makrabo-e chiubo katikhaijiu din champanbo hai dinsude.
“Namdi khatga Tingwang tudi pingmak, chamai tudi pingmakbo ladjanpao khat bamme.
Khatdi sibo namdi gasu kamipui khat pakhuga wanglujiu, “Agu mikrepiu khugasu amaji rikhailo!’ chiujiu khengsao makjiu bamme.
Pawan thengkha ladjanpao siniu suimakge, chiudi tanusu lamra paniu paronna haichiu din-e, ‘Iniu Tingwang tu pingmakge maksai chamai tudi chakhuangthiu makge,
chiudi haibo kamipuiniu haijiuga atu kam chariu bambo donniu, Iniu pagu majise phuikhaira mide. Iniu sichiu maksai, paniu haichiujiu wang bamsai atu kam chariujiu bamrabo-e!’”
Sichiujiu Rapiu niu dinkiu-e, “Haijiukha kasabo ladjanpao siniu dinbo haise nkinglo.
Sichiusai nchun n-nien saomakjiu nkha khaira khengbambo pamaidungtu Tingwang niu paliu lam chapkhai lakma? Paniu paliutu nkha khai lakma?
Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, paniu paliu lam chapjiu kamkhai siakbi rabo-e. Chiudi Chamai Nahpiu siniu wangbo nai kadihpiriga hai malummai daolu suma?”
Jesu niu din champanbo haidi, paronna patu kawimaileng lukhai lujiu katambo mai hinatura wathao thiumak mai lamga dinbo-e.
“Pawan khatga maipiu khangnia Charakyga kahumra tadle: maipiu khatniu Pharisee maipiu-e, khang khatniu ramkha khabo piu-e.

Pharisee maipiu siniu paronna chap npenlujiu haichiu kakheng thiu sude, ‘Oh Tingwang yo, Iniu natu thuonne, palamra I hai aluni samakge, alungchun masan makbo thiumakge, khatdi makha makge, Ira maikum makge. Iniu natu thuonne, palamra Ira uibo ramkha khapiu kumdi makge.
Ira n-nid-kak khatga kalumri lonnia-e, khatdi agu wangbo mania hinagu dam kariu gu damkhat hina pi-e.’
Sichiudi ramkha khapiu siniu chap madiulujiu, pazudi tinggenlam ngangphui humakjiu, chiudi paga kaphijiu din-e, ‘Oh Tingwang yo, nuan phungbo atu hai lungsa khailo!’

Jesu niu din-e, ‘Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, Tingwang khuga Pharisee maipiuse makjiu, ramkha khapiu siniu majibo-e. Palamra mai khatniu paronna patu maning madisai, patu kam masiam khaibi rabo-e; khatdi mai khatniu paronna patu kam manon kiusai, patu kam madi khaibi rabo-e.”
Maidung khangsianiu paliu nahdungtu kabakhaijiu thoikhai raleng Jesu khuga puiwangde, chiudi sise pakhommaidungniu ngaolujiu paliutu kasan khaide,
chiudi Jesu niu nahmaidung situ pakhuga kuwang lujiu din-e, “Nahmaidung haitu akhuga piwang khailo, paliutu khammi tulo, palamra Tingwang gu Chawangdihse haikumbo maidung leng-e.
Haise maning taolo! Mai khatniu nahmai khat kumjiu Tingwang gu Chawangdih haitu lukhai maksai wadaodi siga ngutsi lakge,”
Jehudi maigu jupao khatniu Jesu khuga maniu-e, “Kawibo katipao yo, tingtheng karingbo daolura Iniu degu kamralo?”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Dekamjiu nangniu atu kawibo chiu kujiulo? Tingwang ronna makjiu mai khatdi kawibo ha-e.
Chamtandungse nangniu sibamme: ‘Makha mane; maitu gimane; maigu aga mane; maitu aratjiu din masa mane; napui napiutu chakhuang thiu silo.’”
Sibopiu siniu paokakge, “Iniu nahgasu haibo chamtandung hai majaijiu lungkhang kinbo-e.”

Jesu niu haise chiuboga, pakhuga din-e, “Nangniu kam tanglu makbo khat bamkha-e. Nagu kabambo hinase jonlujiu kaleksabo maileng njan khai milo; sichiusai tinggen dihga chakhiu-chalanse nangniu daorabo-e; sichiujiu wangjiu asai suilo.”
Sinapiu siniu haise chiuboga, palung magenthiu mide, palamra pahai kalek wichang-wibo piu-e.
Sichiujiu paniu palung magenthiu mibose ngaoboga Jesu niu haichiu din-e, “Kalekwibo mainiu Tingwang gu Chawangdihga ngutrabo hai dejiuga kakung gulo!
Kalekwi mainiu Tingwang gu Chawangdihga ngutrabo suang, qontraoniu npin niukiga buang ngutboniu mala-e.”
Pachamse chiulu maidung siniu din-e, “Sichiusai, saokum mainiu ranlubose daolu ralo?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Chamaina khuga suilu lakbose Tingwang khugara suilubui kamme.”
Siga Peter niu din-e, “Phuilo! aliura nasai suira aliuky saodiak mide.”

Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Yo, Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, mai khatniu Tingwang gu Chawangdih jengniu, paky-palu maksai panao-panahtu maksai pasingnatu maksai papui-papiutu phutkhai misai,
haibo ken-ga kengkha daosanne, khatdi wangrabo chaken ga tingtheng karingbose daone.”

Jesu niu pakhommaidung khang kariu-je-niakiu situ majang malilujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Phuilo, Chamai Nahpiu lamga phaimiukakung maidungniu raokhai mibose pachangjiu wangtang khaira, aliuniu Jerusalem lam tadkinbo-e.
Patuse Nkengmai ben-ga pikhaijiu, paliuniu patu tanui thiusune, khatdi pazuga tatai masiu khaijiu patu kam mangam sune.
Paliuniu patu dapsune khatdi patu kamshatmi sune, chiudi pasumbo nai pah ringsulan mirabo-e.”
Sichiudi paliuniu haidungse silu makge; parambase paliu khugasu baimide, khatdi Jesu niu degu dinjiulo chiubo paliuniu sitanglu makge.
Jesu niu Jericho lam wang manasuboga, pamik tiatbo piu khatniu npui mungga ntaolujiu takheng bamniu-e.
Maidung siniu pamungga tadjiu bambo khuanse paniu chiuboga, paniu maniu-e, “Chakhuan kariobo hai dekambo donniulo?”
“Nazareth Jesu se wangkinbo donniu-e.” chiujiu paliuniu pakhuga dinkhai bide.
Siga paniu pakhuan tanjiu sen-e, “David Nahpiu! Jesu yo! Atu lungsa khailo!”
Pamasuangga bammaidung siniu patu maliu mane chiujiu kasan-e. Chiudi paniu pakhuanse tanliang liangjiu senlan-e, “David Nahpiu yo! Atu lungsa khailo!”
Sijengniu Jesu niu mathak lujiu, pamik tiatbo piu situ pakhuga puiwanglo chiujiu chamtan pikhaide. Paniu pakhuga wangboga, Jesu niu pakhuga maniu-e,
“Iniu naleng degu kamkhai raleng nang luni jiulo?” Paniu paokakge, “Rapiu yo, Iniu ngaokhai ni-e.”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Sichiusai ngaomi sulo! Nagu malum siniu natu wikhai mide.”
Sibo wansiak gasu pase ngao mide, khatdi Tingwang tu thuonjiu, paniu Jesu sai suitad mide. Chamai mendi siniu haise ngaoboga, paliu mathiuse Tingwang tu thuon sude.
Jesu niu Jericho ga wanglujiu rontad bamde.
Siga ramkha khabo papee khat, pazanniu Zacchaeus chiu kubo kalekwibo piu khat bamme.
Jesu hai dekumbo mailo chiubo pah phuikhai nijiu bamme, chiudi maidung kengbo donniu khatdi pase pakhao siambo donniu Jesu tu phuitang lulak mide.
Sijengniu maidung masuang paniu pakmeng railujiu biuruibang khatga buangkiu lujiu Jesu wangrabo tu phui bamme.
Sibo bamga Jesu niu wangboga, phuikhang lujiu Zacchaeus khuga din-e, “Zacchaeus, kalangjiu nkumlo, palamra thainai, I nakyga riukhai rabo-e.”
Zacchaeus niu kalangjiu nkumde khatdi pachun wichang wijiu patu lukhaide.
Haisitu ngaomaidung siniu haichiujiu khansude, “Haina piuniu nuan phungmai kyga riukhaira tadmide.”

Zacchaeus niu chaplujiu Rapiu khuga din-e, “Rapiu yo! PhuiIo, kaleksa maitu agu kabambo mania phankhat lamse pirabo-e, khatdi mai khatgu Iniu aratjiu lubam niusai, sise Iniu patu dam madai thiujiu pirabo-e.”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Thainai haiboky gahai juringbose wangde, palamra haina piudi Abraham kaikikge.
Chamai Nahpiu siniu hami maitu phiura khatdi rankhai raleng wangbo-e.”

Maidung siniu haise nkingjiu bamboga, Jesu niu din champanbo haise paliu khuga dinlan-e. Pah tuhoira Jerusalem wangtang kinbo-e, siniu Tingwang gu Chawangdihse ngaoji sune chiubo paliuniu maningjiu bambo-e.
Sijengniu paniu din-e, “Pawan khatga kadimai khatniu charam kadiu khatlam tadlujiu, chawang thiulujiu malanwang raleng tad mide.

Paniu tad makhaga, pavangmai khang kariutu paniu kulujiu, paliu mathiu leng kachia khuang khat khat khaidiak lujiu paliu khuga din-e, ‘Iniu nbintad mibo lungga haise naliuniu dejiukha lipad ngamlu ralo phui matailo.’
Haina piu haitu param maidung ngaokhai lakbo piu-e, sijengniu pasai lamsu paliuniu walangtad maitu langkhaijiu din-e, ‘Aliuniu haina piu haitu aliu wang thiura suini makge.’
“Chiudi sibo piuse chawang thiulujiu wanglande. Pavang maidung siniu dejiukha lipad lulo chiubo phuira paniu chamtan pikhai sude.
Raithubo piu siniu wanglujiu din-e, ‘Paohubo, nangniu pikhai diakbo gasu, Iniu kachia khuang kariu hai lipad lude.’
Paniu din-e, ‘Kamdaode, nang hai kawibo vang-e! Natu hai poi riga malum suibo donniu, Iniu natu namdi kariu paopiu pithiu khai rabo-e.
Niabo vang siniu wanglujiu din-e, ‘Paohubo, nangniu pikhai diakbo gasu Iniu kachia khuang mangiu hai lipad lude!’
Paniu sinapiu khuga din-e, ‘Nangdi namdi mangiu paopiuse thiurabo-e.’
“Kavang khat siniu wanglujiu din-e, Paohubo, nagu kachia khuangse haisi-e; Iniu chafairenniu majiu lujiu haise baikhai mibo-e.
Palamra nang hai kasabo donniu natu Ira ping-e. Nangra nagu makbose lu-e khatdi nangniu lingkhai makbose atiatle.’
Paniu pakhuga din-e, ‘Kasabo vang! Nagu ladkeng saisuijiu natu ladjan thiu rabode. I hai kasabo, agu makbotu lubo khatdi Iniu lingkhai makbotu atiatbo piu-e chiujiu nangniu si-e.
Sichiusai, wide, dekamjiu nangniu agu rangkangse rangkangbung kyga khaimi mak jiulo? Sichiusai Iniu malanwangbo naise paton-pana tamanjiu daolu rabo-e!’
“Sichiujiu siga chapbam maidung khuga paniu din-e, ‘Kachia khuangse pakhugasu khoilujiu, khuang kariu bambo piu khugase pikhai milo.’
Siga paliuniu din-e, ‘Paohubo, pakhu gara khuang kariu bambo-e!’
Paniu paokakge, ‘Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, poinakhadi bammaileng pikhai sanbine, chiudi wadi habo pakhu gasu, kabambo poi sidi lupadmi rabo-e.
Tuhoira, agu mikre maidung, atu pijiu paliu wang thiukhaini makbo maidung situ haiga puiwanglo, khatdi amasuangga paliutu kamshat milo.’”
Jesu niu haichiujiu dinlubo sai Jerusalem lam paliu masuang tadrai mide.
Paniu Olive Luong wangtangboga Bethphage nai Bethany wangtang suboga, paniu khommai khang niatu haichiu dinkhaijiu langkhaide.
“Nanai masuangga bambo namgase tadsulo, sichiujiu nanainiu ngutboga qonniampoi mai khatniudi tongkhai matai makhabo khattu khinkhai bamniubo ngaosune, Sise khilujiu haiga juwanglo.
Nanaitu mai khatniu dekamjiu sise khibam jiulo chiu maniusai, papaoniu thinrabo pageng bamjiu-e chiu pakhuga dinlo.”
Sichiujiu panainiu tadboga Jesu niu panai khuga dinkhaibo kumjiu daode.
Panainiu qonniampoi situ khibamboga papao siniu panai khuga din-e, “Dekamra nanainiu sise khibam jiulo?”
Panainiu paokakge, “Papaopiu siniu haise thinrabo ngam bamjiu-e”
Sichiujiu panainiu qonniampoise Jesu khuga juwangde. Khatdi paliuniu paliu faise sibo khao riga thapkhai lujiu Jesu tu pi ntao khaide.
Sichiujiu paniu sise tuanglujiu padboga maidung siniu paliu faise npuikiga thapkhai khuan sude.
Sichiujiu paniu Jerusalem wang mana suboga, Olive Luong kiusu raboga, pasai suikinbo maidung siniu, paniu maisuang habo ngamdung kamkhai mibose ngaolujiu paliu khuan tanjiu Tingwang tu thuonsude!
“Rapiu zan gasu wangbo chawang situ Tingwang niu thoikhai milo! Tinggen lam agi-manai bamlo, khatdi Tingwang maken dibamlo!”
Siga maidung ruanggasu Pharisee mai khangsianiu Jesu khuga din-e, “Katipao yo, nakhommaidung haitu maliumak bamra chamtan pikhailo.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, paliuniu maliumak bammisai tatudung hainiu paliu ronna marapad surabo-e.”
Paniu namdise wang mana suboga, haise phuikhai lujiu, khatdi kapjiu haichiu dinsude:
“Thainai hai agi-manaijiu bamrabo pageng bambo situ nangniu sibamniusai wirabo-e! Chiudi nangniu haisitu tuhoi sitanglu makge!
Nagu mikre maidungniu natu chap magui lujiu khatdi pake hina lamsu natu dangkham mirabo tingse wangkinne.
Paliuniu nareng lungga bammai hinatu kam mahami rabo-e; khatdi siga tatukang khat nakhadi masiak khaidiak lakge, palamra Tingwang niu natu gukhai raleng wangbo tingga nangniu sitanglu makge!”
Sibosai Jesu niu Charaky lunggase ngutlujiu, alijiu bam maidung situ haichiu dinjiu hasude:
“Masanbo Ariakkhuangga haichiu raokhai bamme chiubora Tingwang niu dinne, ‘Atu kahumboky haitu kakheng thiuboky kurabo-e!’ Chiudi naliuniu pijiu agatiu maidunggu nbaiky pithiu khai mide!”
chiudi paliuniu sise kamrabo npuise phiudaolu makge. Palamra paniu katikhaibo ladkengse khatnadi maidung siniu kam maha nimakjiu nkingjiu bamme.
Naikhat Jesu niu Charakyga maidungtu katikhaijiu bamboga, khatdi Kawibo Champaose dinjiu bamboga, singkudung, Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung khatdi apaimaidung siniu wanglujiu pakhuga maniu-e,
“Saoniu haidungse kamra natu pumtan pikhai jiulo?”
Jesu niu paliutu paokakge, “Sichiusai, Iniu naliu khuga wakhat maniu khaine, akhuga dinkhailo.
John niu tadui nphum khaibo pumtan haise Tingwang khuga suma, maksai chamaina khuga sulo?”
Paliu ronna ari sude, “Aliuniu dechiujiu dinralo? ‘Tingwang khuga niu-e,’ chiusai paniu din-e, ‘Sichiusai, dekamjiu naliuniu John tu malum mak jiulo?’
Sichiu makjiu aliuniu, ‘Chamaina khuga suniu-e,’ chiusai maidung siniu aliutu tatu komrabo-e, palamra John haise phaimiukakung khatle chiujiu paliuniu malumme.”
Sijengniu paliuniu paokakge, “Haise delam suniu wangbolo chiubo aliu simakge.”
Siga Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Sichiusai, Iniu dekambo majiniu haidungse kambolo chiubo naliu khuga dinkhai lakge.”

Mumsy khom maduirabo ting wangtang miboga, paniu padam rabose pikhailo chiujiu lankhai maidung khugase pavang khattu langkhaide. Chiudi lankhaibo maidung siniu pavang situ dapkhai lujiu wadi pikhai makjiu matha phutkhai lan bide.
Sijengniu paniu katambo vang khattu langkhai lande, chiudi patudi lankhai maidung siniu dapkhai lujiu khatdi kam mangam khai lujiu wadi pikhai makjiu matha phutkhai lan bide.
Sichiujiu paniu pasumbo vang situ langkhai lande; chiudi patudi lankhai maidung siniu dapkhaijiu, kam ajam tap-tap khailujiu phutkhai lan bide.
Sigasu mumsireng paopiu siniu din-e, ‘Iniu dekam ralo? Iniu anah siakbo haitu langkhai rabode; maomakjiu paliuniu patura chakhuangthiu khaisu rabo-e!’
Chiudi lankhai maidung siniu patu ngaoboga, paliu ronna haichiu dinsude, ‘Haise panahpiu palek lurabo piu siakge. Aliuniu patu kamshat mikhe, chiusai pagu kabambo mania hinase aliugu mirabo-e!’
Sichiujiu paliuniu patuse mumsireng gasu jupad lujiu kamshat mide.
“Sichiusai, mumsireng paopiu siniu lankhai maidung situ dechiu ralo?” chiujiu Jesu niu maniu-e.
“Paniu wanglujiu, simaidung situ kamshat mirabo-e, khatdi kakimai khuga mumsirengse pikhaimi rabo-e.”
Maidungniu haise chiuboga, paliuniu din-e, “Sichiu lakge!”
‘Chaky thiumaidungniu pageng
ha-e chiujiu thonmibo tu siniu nkiuthubo thiu rabo-e.’
Sibo tu riga nkhuang kiumai hinatu kamtap-tap mirabo-e;
khatdi sibo tu siniu mai khangkhat kumbo riga kalakiu-e sai,
patu niakpet mirabo-e.”
Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung nai singkudung siniu sibo bam gasu Jesu tu minra matan sude, palamra paniu din champanbo hai paliutu dinbo-e chiubo paliuniu silude; chiudi paliuniu maidung situ ping-e.

Sijengniu pawanse paliuniu phiusude. Paliuniu maidung khangsiatu paliu chun ngutbo jai thiujiu Jesu khuga wa maniura, sichiujiu palad gasu patu minlujiu Rom maigu dihthinpao khuga pikhai mira tanim pikhaijiu langkhaide.

Chakhumpaodung siniu Jesu khuga din-e, “Katipao yo, nangra majibo katikhaibo piu-e chiubo aliuniu si-e. Nangra chamai zu phuimakjiu, chiudi Tingwang maningse chamaina leng katikhai bibo-e chiubo aliuniu si-e.
Aliuniu Rommai Wangdipiu situ, aliugu ramkhadung pibo hai aliugu Tacheng-tajaiga suima, suimaklo? Aliu khuga dinkhai khelo.”
Chiudi Jesu niu paliu thakse silujiu, paliu khuga din-e,
“Rangkanggi khat akhuga khoiwanglo. Haibo riga bambose sao menglo, khatdi sao zanlo?” Paliuniu paokakge, “Wangdipiu-e.”
Siga Jesu niu din-e, “Sichiusai, wide, Wangdipiu guse Wangdipiutu pimilo, sichiujiu Tingwang guse Tingwang tu pilo.”
Siga maidung suangga paliuniu patu mindao lulak mide, khatdi pagu chamkak gase paliu suang hajiu maliu mak tamide.

“Katipao yo, Mose niu haichiu aliuleng Tacheng-tajai hai raokhai diakge: ‘Mai khatniu panao thiulujiu panah lungmakjiu shaimi sai, sibo kamipui situ pakina saikariu piuniu maluang lungrabo-e, sichiujiu shaimibo piu zan ga panah lungkhai rabo-e chiu-e.’
Nda pawan khatga singna khang chinnia bamniu-e; tingthubo piu siniu panao thiulujiu panah lungmakjiu shai mide.
Sigasu paniabo piu siniu sibo puitu maluanglung lande,
sibosai pasumbo piuniu maluang lung lande. Sichiujiu paliu khang chinnia siniu maluang lungkhai kamde chiudi paliu nah lungmakge.
Kanam thuboga, sibo pui sidi shai mide.
Tuhoira, kashaimai ringsulanbo naise, sinapuise sao nao ralo? Paliu khang chinnia siniu patu maluang lungkhai kam mibo-e.”
Jesu niu paliutu paokakge, “Haibo ken-ga lungmaidung siniu tanao-tanah thiubo-e,
chiudi kashaibo gasu ringsulanbo, uibo ken-ga lungra maidung sira tanao-tanah thiulan lakge.
Palamra paliuse mazadung kumjiu shailak mide. Paliura kashaibo gasu ringsulan mibo donniu, paliura Tingwang nahdung thiu mibo-e.
Mose niu kashai maidung ringsu lanne chiubo hai masanjiu dinkhai kamigu-e. Chaphejiuga chami taobo gasu Rapiu ra, ‘Abraham Rawang, Isaac Rawang, khatdi Jacob Rawang-e chiujiu dinkhai kamigu-e.’
Para kashai mai, Rawang makge, chiudi ringbam mai Rawang-e, palamra pakhuga mai hina ringjiu bambo-e.”
Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung khangsianiu din-e, “Sise kawibo chamkakge, Katipao yo.”
Palamra paliuniu pakhuga wa maniulan huta mide.
Jesu niu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Dechiujiu Messiah haise David kaikikge chiujiu din ralo?
Palamra David papum siakniu Tathoilui ariakkhuangga haichiu din-e,
‘Rapiu niu Arapiu khuga din-e:
Iniu nagu mikremaitu naphipa hangga pijiu
ntaokhai makthen aben majadlam ntao bamlo.’
David niu patu ‘Rapiu’ chiujiu kusai, dechiujiu Messiah hai David kaikikge chiuralo?”
Haichiujiu maidungniu pacham nkingjiu bamboga, Jesu niu pakhommaidung khuga din-e,

“Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodungniu, paliu ntiang kathengbo ntiang lujiu, khatdi senkiga paliutu chakhuang thiujiu kahum khai ratu masenbo; khatdi maduikyga, matha malabo bamga, chakhuang thiubo bamga ntaora kadabo;
khatdi kamipui-kaminah ma rupjiu sut tiubo, chiudi kakhengthiu mathengbo thak kamjiu tasao thiubo maidung situ naliuniu akhesi rabo-e! Paliutu pibo sajaise sathu rabo-e!”
Jesu niu haichiu phui ajang wangboga, kalekwibo maidungniu charaky gu chakhiu bungga paliu gu kalense khaibambo ngaode,
khatdi paniu kaleksabo kamipui khatniu paisa nia nakha khaikiubo sidi ngaode.
Siga Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e chiubora haibo kamipui hainiu maidung mathiu suang kadkhai makeng-e.
Palamra maidung sira paliugu kamalibo lungwat gasu khaibo-e, chiudi para haijiukha lunglak bamdi, pagu kabambo hina, paniu tiujiu ringbambose pikhai-e.”
Pasai suimaidung khangsianiu Charaky hai phuilujiu, dejiukha ngaowilo, khatdi Tingwang leng kadkhaibo hai dejiukha kawibo kalenno chiujiu din-e.
Siga Jesu niu din-e, “Naliuniu ngao bambo tukang hina hai, wakhat nakhadi masiak makjiu, ponthon kam mirabo tingse wangkinne.”
Paliuniu maniu-e, “Katipao yo, haise dedao padsu ralo? Khatdi haise padsu raga degu tasibo lenkhai ralo?”
Jesu niu din-e, “Maidung kakengniu, ‘I hai pah-e!’ khatdi ‘Pawanse wangtang mide!’ chiujiu chamtan gasu dinwang sune. Chiudi paliu sai suimi tulo.
Naliuniu chari thiubo khuan khatdi n-gi athaobo khuan chiudi pingmi mane; sikumbo hina padsiak rabo-e, chiudi sise kaloibo makge.”
Paniu haichiu dinkiu-e, ‘Kadih khatniu kadih khattu chari thiune; khatdi chawang khatniu chawang khattu aphen sune.
Siga kathi katanbo, charakhum wangbo, khatdi chararet katam tambo pabam hinaga padsune; siga tinggen lam katasi-sibo khatdi kapingbose padsune.
Haidungse pad makhaga, naliutu minlujiu kam mathad sune, naliutu maduiky-ky gasu ladjan thiujiu kavangkyga jukhai sune; naliutu chawangdung khatdi ladjanpaodung masuangga adon jengniu puiwang sune.
Haise naliuleng Kawicham dinra padao kachabo wan si-e.
Naliuniu degu dinralo chiubo manangmi tulo,
palamra Iniu naliuleng ningting tasi pikhaijiu naliugu mikre maidung siniu wadaodi naliutu din masa ngam lakge.
Naliutu naliu pui-piuniu, naliu singnaniu, naliu kikhun mainiu pipad sune, khatdi paliuniu naliu khangsiatu kamshat sune.
Adon jengniu naliutu mai hinaniu mareng sune.
Sichiudi naliu peegiu khatnagadi kam maha lakge.
Chap matipjiu bamlo, naliutu rankhaibi rabo-e.
“Jerusalem haitu riphendungniu chap magui lujiu bambo naliuniu ngao dasai, patu kam mahanuang mirabo-e chiubo naliuniu silulo.
Chiusai Judaea ga bam maidung siniu maluang genlam pakkhai sune; namdiga lungbammai hina pakmi sune, khatdi maluang genlam lungbammai paliura namdilam jontad lakge.
Palamra ‘Sise Sajai pikhaibo Tingmikdung si-e,’ haise Masanbo ariakga dinkhaibose wangtang raleng-e.
Sibo tingga papum ripjiu bambo puidung nai npampuidung lengra dejiukha magenthiu ralo! Mainiu din silakbo magenthak hai kadihpiriga padrabo-e, khatdi Tingwang lungpomse paliu riga wangrabo-e.
Sichiujiu khangsiatu chahengniu bishat sune, khatdi khangsiatu kadih katam tambo lam jutad sune khatdi nkengmainiu paliu tingse loimak thenna Jerusalem riga taomaluijiu bamrabo-e.
Kadihpiriga degu padkinbo gulo chiubo khuanjiu bammaidung siniu pingjiu shaikhang sune, palamra tingpukga bambo pumtan hinatu thin kacha khai kammi rabo-e.
Sibosai Chamai Nahpiu siniu pakendibo nai pumtan jaojiu kamuang rigasu wangkiu sune.
Haidungse padboga, chapkhang lujiu naliu pi mahen khanglo, palamra naliugu juringbose nawang mibo-e.”
Sibosai Jesu niu paliu khuga din champanbo hai dinkhai-e: “Ndutbang khatdi kakibo singbang hinatu matadjiu phuilo.
Naliuniu pamum hai padsubo tingga, kariakting wangkinne chiubo si-e.
Sikumjiu haidungse padsuboga, Tingwang gu Chawangdihse nawang mide chiubo naliu sirabo-e.
“Haidungse tuhoi lungbambo maidungniu shaikam makhaga padsu rabo-e chiubo maningtao lulo.
Tinggen nai kadihra hamine, chiudi aladkeng haira wadaodi halakge.
“Kadensijiu bamlo! Haibo karingtingga maluang tiubo, maluang sakbo khatdi haibo ringtingleng manangbo siniu pumi tulo, sichiu maksai sibo Tingmik siniu natu tathak kumjiu mannong mirabo-e.
Palamra haise kadihpiri pabam hinaga, mai hina khuga padrabo-e.
Kadensijiu bamlo, sichiujiu haikumbo hina padsai, Chamai Nahpiu masuangga chap ngamlu raleng pawan machang kakheng thiujiu bamlo.”
Nsuan machang maidungniu pacham nkingra Charakyga wang-wang-e.
Singku paodung nai Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung siniu maidungtu pingbo donniu mahim Jesu tu kamshatra tasiam phiusude.
Khommaidung khang kariu-je-niakiu ruanggasu khangkhat Iscariot kubo Judas lunggase Satan ngut mide.
Sichiujiu Juda niu singku paodung nai charaky akhemaigu chakampaodung khuga tadlujiu paniu dechiujiu Jesu tu paliu khuga pikhai ralo chiubo npao sude.
Paliu chun wijiu patu rangkang pine chiujiu suikhai mide.
Judas niu sise suikhai lujiu maidungtu pisi makjiu Jesu tu paliu khuga pikhai rabo wanse phiu sude.
Chakhi khaimakbo taruak Ngee se wangtangjiu Kenpadbo Ngee leng milyse kamshat rabo tingse wangtang mide.
Jesu niu Peter nai John khuga haichiu dinkhaijiu langkhaide: “Kenpadbo Ngee maluadse aliu tiuraleng tadlujiu kaden khailo.”
Panainiu pakhuga maniu-e, “Debo bamga anainiu kaden khaibo nang lunilo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Nanainiu namdi gase ngutboga, maipiu khatniu taduikhiu khat ponjiu tadkinbotu adao sune. Paniu ngutbo kygase pasai suilujiu ngutlo,
khatdi chaky paopiu khugase haichiu dinlo: ‘Katipaoniu nakhuga dinkhai-e, Iniu akhommaidungtu maluang lujiu Kenpadbo Ngee maluad tiurabo bamse dega bamlo?’
Siga paniu chakai rilam kam masansiak lujiu khaibambo bamse lenkhai sune, siga nanainiu wahinase kaden khailo.”
Sichiujiu panainiu tadboga Jesu niu dinkhaibo kumjiu wahinase panainiu daode, siga panainiu Kenpadbo Ngee maluadse kaden khaide.
Pawanse wangtang miboga Jesu niu pakhommaidung situ maluang lujiu chakuangkai mungga wang ntao kiude.
Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Iniu chariu khengrabo suangga, haibo Kenpadbo Ngee maluadse naliutu maluang lujiu tiukhaini sonna bambo-e!
Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, haise Tingwang gu Chawangdihga wangtang makthen Iniu tiulan lak mibode.”
Sibosai Jesu niu chapiangse thinsu lujiu, Tingwang tu thuonkiu lujiu din-e, “Haise lulujiu naliu njan saklo.
Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e chiubora tuhoi gasu Tingwang gu Chawangdihse wangkiu lanmak then Iniu haibo mumjawse saklanlak mide.”

Sibosai paniu taruak khuangse thinlujiu, Tingwang tu thuonkiu lanlujiu khatdi thenpang lujiu, paliu khuga pikhaijiu din-e, “Haise atia-e, naliuleng-e chiujiu pikhai mibo si-e. Haise atu maningtaojiu bamra naliuniu kambamlo.”
Sise kumjiu, katiuse tiuloi luboga paniu chapiangse thinsu lujiu haichiu din-e, “Haise azainiu diangkhai mibo Tingwang gu kasanbo ladriat si-e, haise naliuleng luangkhai mibo si-e.”
“Chiudi phuilo, atu jonmibo piu bense chakuangkai riga aben panai kario khai ncham bamme!
Chamai Nahpiu sira Tingwang niu machunbo saisui rabo-e, chiudi patu jonmibo piu sira dejiuga pasan salo!”
Sichiujiu haise saoniu kamralo chiubo paliu karai khat-khat khuga maniu sude.
Siga Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Mai nkengmaira paliu wangdungniu maidung riga paliugu pumtan bamme; khatdi paliu wangdungtu ‘Maidung Kamai,’ chiujiu ku-e.
Ntao lujiu tiubambo piu nai machajiu bambo piuse saoniu dilo? Pachangra ntao lujiu tiubambo piu si-e. Chiudi I hai naliu ruangga machajiu bambo piuse kumjiu bambo-e.
“Agu magenthiubo hinaga naliuniu atu maluang bambo-e;
Apiuniu atu mawangra agu majileng pikhaibo kumjiu, Idi naliutu naliu majileng pikhaibo-e.
Sichiujiu Awang kadih gase naliuniu, akuangkai gasu atu maluang tiu ncham khatdi maluang sak ncham rabo-e; khatdi chawangbam gase ntao lujiu Israel mai kiphiu kariu-je-niakiutu mawangjiu bamne.
“Simon, Simon! Phuilo, chamiubuitu tun kanukbo kumjiu, natudi tun kanukra Satan niu khenglude.
Chiudi Simon yo, nagu malumse kaomak raleng Iniu khengkhai mide. Sichiujiu nang akhuga malanwang dasai, nangniu nasingna maidungtu pitan khai rabo-e.”
Peter niu paokakge, “Rapiu, Iniu kavangkyga tadi, kashaibo tangjiu nasai suitadra Iniu kaden lude.”
Jesu niu din-e, “Peter, Iniu nakhuga dinbo-e, thaichun nangniu atu simakge chiu dinlon sum tangmak thenna maruireng siniu khuang lakge.”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Wakhat nakhadi machang kamakbo thiumakge.”
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Chiudi tuhoira, mai khatniu rangkangkhao maksai paibeng bamsai sise phungrabo mide; khatdi mai khatniu chaheng hasai, paniu pafai jonlujiu khatra liurabo mide.
Palamra Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e chiubora Masanbo ariak gase; ‘Patuse agatiu kaliktiu maidung ruangga chakkhai mide!’ Siniu raokhai mibose ajengniu wangtang rabo-e.”
Siga pakhommaidung siniu din-e, “Rapiu, phuilo, haiga chaheng niara bamme!”
Paniu paokakge, “Siseniu buide.”
Jesu niu palun jai kumjiu namdi situ phutlujiu Olive Luonglam tadmide; siga pakhommaidung siniu pasai suitadle.
Paliuniu sibo bamgase mengtangboga, paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu kahiamboga kaokhaimi makra khenglulo.”
Sichiujiu paniu paliu khugasu tatu phenbo kak khat kumbo tadpad lujiu khudungkiu kakheng thiu sude.
Paniu haichiu din-e, “Apiu yo, nachunne sai, haibo piangse akhugasu luthon milo. Chiudi achunbo makjiu nachunbose thiu milo.”
Siga tinggen lamsu maza khatniu kiulujiu patuse pitan khai bide.
Palung chun magen thiujubo donniu, paniu kakheng thiu katin khaide; sichiujiu pagu kasuangduise tazai puak kumjiu kadihga jaokiude.
Paniu kakheng thiubo bam gasu sulujiu pakhommaidung khuga malan wangboga, paliu lungchun magenthiujiu jibam niu-e.
Siga paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Dekamjiu naliu jibam jiulo? Sulo, kahiambo ga kaokhaimi makra sulujiu kakheng thiulo.”
Jesu niu haichiu dinbam khaga, pakhommaidung ruangga khangkhat Juda siniu chamai dungdi khattu puilujiu wangde. Paniu Jesu khuga wanglujiu pabiang kapup khaide.
Siga Jesu niu din-e, “Juda, nangniu Chamai Nahpiu situ biangpup khaijiu jonmira dama?”
Jesu tu maluang bambo khommaidung siniu degu padmi gulo chiubo siluboga, paliuniu din-e, “Rapiu, aliuniu aliu hengse thinsu rama?
Sichiu bamga paliu ruangga mai khatniu singkupaogu kavangpiu kuon majatlamse bitap mide.
Siga Jesu niu din-e, “Hainiu buide.” Sichiujiu paniu sinapiu kuonse dikhaijiu wikhai mide.

Sichiujiu Jesu niu singku paodung, charaky gu chakampaodung khatdi patu minra suiwangbo apaimaidung khuga din-e, “Naliuniu atu agatiu-kaliktiu mai khattu kumjiu chaheng-changiu thinlujiu minra wangkinbo ma?
Naimachang Iniu naliutu Charaky lungga maluang lujiu bambo-e, chiudi siga naliuniu atu minra kam makge. Chiudi tamiubo pumtanniu thinjiu bambo wan naliuniu haise kamrabo pawan mibo-e.”
Paliuniu Jesu tu minlujiu Dibo Singkupao kygase juwangde, siga Peter-se pakak diubijiu suitad kimme.
Kajengga chami thiulujiu ntao magui bambo gase Peter di suiwang ntao bamme.
Paniu siga ntao bamboga, kavangpui khatniu ngaolujiu din-e, “Haibopiu haidi Jesu saisuibo mai-e!”
Chiudi Peter niu suini makjiu din-e, “Maipui yo, Iniu patu simakge!”
Bamnak lubo sai, maipiu khatniu Peter tu ngaolujiu din-e, “Nangdi paliu ruangga jaobo mai khatle.”
Chiudi Peter niu paokakge, “Maipiu yo, I makge.”
Wanchak khat kumbo bamlubo sai mai khatniu din matanjiu din-e, “Pachang siakjiu hainapiu hai Jesu tu maluang bammai-e, palamra pahaidi Galilee mai-e.”
Chiudi Peter niu paokakge, “Maipiu yo, nangniu din bambose, I wadi simakge!”
Paniu haichiu dinjiu bambo wan-ga maruireng khatniu khuang mide.
Siga Rapiu niu mari wangjiu Peter tu phuikhaide; siga Rapiu niu pakhuga, “Thaichun maruireng niu khuang makhaga nangniu atu simakge chiu dinlon sum rabo-e,” chiubose maningtaode.
Siga Peter niu tadpad lujiu palung kheng ngamlakjiu kapchang-kap sude.
Jesu tu khuanbam maidung siniu patu tanui thiu sude khatdi dapsude.
Paliuniu pamik domlu, pabiang kaphijiu pakhuga maniu-e, “Saoniu natu dapbam jiulo? Din madu padlo!”
Sichiujiu paliuniu patu nuimenjiu tacham kengkha madam khaide.
Tingben padboga, katingmaidung, singku paodung khatdi Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodungniu wang madui lujiu, Jesu tu Apaikyga puiwangde.
Paliuniu din-e, “Nang hai Messiah si-e chiuma? Aliu khuga dinkhailo.”
Paniu paokakge, “Iniu naliu khuga dinkhai tadi, naliuniu atu malum lakge;
khatdi Iniu naliu khuga wakhat maniu tadi naliuniu atu paokak lakge.
Sichiudi tuhoi gasuniu Chamai Nahpiu siniu Ngamkambo Tingwang benjad lamse ntaobam mirabo-e.”
Paliu mathiuniu din-e, “Chiusai, nangse Tingwang Nahpiu sima?”
Paniu paliutu paokakge, “Naliuniu dinbose I-e.”
Siga paliuniu din-e, “Aliuniu jengdin phiu sonra hade! Aliuniu pamun siak ganiu chiulude!”
Maidung siniu sulujiu Jesu tu Pilate masuangga puiwangde,

Paliuniu haichiujiu patu madam khaijiu din masa sude: “Haibo piuniu aliutu npui kamaklam jukhaijiu, Wangditu ramkha pimak rabo-e, khatdi pah papumsiak Messiah chawang si-e chiujiu dinbo don-ga aliuniu patu minlujiu puiwang kinbo-e.”
Pilate niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nang Jehudimai wangpiu sima?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Nangniu dinbo si-e.”
Siga Pilate niu singku paodung nai maidung khugase din-e, “Iniu haibo piutu ladjan thiura pamao wadi daomakge.”
Chiudi paliuniu tanjiu din-e, “Paniu Judaea ramlung hinaga maidungtu katikhaijiu kam kabuaksu mibode. Paniu Galilee ga kamsu khaijiu tuhoi haiga wangbambo haide.”
Pilate niu haise chiuboga, paniu maniu-e, “Hainapiu hai Galilee mai-e chiuma?”
Pilate niu Jesu hai Herod niu mawang bambo luongriangga lungmai-e chiubo siluboga, khatdi Herod hai Jerusalem lungga bambo donniu pakhuga lang khaibo-e.

Herod niu Jesu tu ngaoboga pachun wichang wide, palamra paniu palamga chiujiu bambo-e, khatdi pawan kathengkha patu ngaokhai nijiu bambo-e. Jesu niu maisuang kahabo ngam kamkhaibo situ phuikhai nijiu agun bambo-e.
Sijengniu, Herod niu Jesu khuga wa kakengkha maniu sude, chiudi Jesu niu wadi paokak khaibi makge.
Singku paodung nai Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung siniu masuang tadpad lujiu Jesu tu katam-tambo lad dinjiu madam khai sude.
Herod nai riphendung niudi Jesu tu wajeng simakjiu tanui thiujiu then khaide; sichiujiu paliuniu pariga fainoi khat benkhai lujiu Pilate khulam langkhai malan mide.
Sibo nai gasu Herod nai Pilate hai chaka thiumide, sibo suanggara panaise mikremai thiujiu bamniubo-e.
Pilate niu singku paodung, jupaodung, khatdi maidung mathiutu ku aruang lujiu paliu khuga din-e,
“Haibo piu hainiu maidungtu npui kamaklam jukhai-e chiujiu patu naliuniu akhuga puiwangbo-e. Tuhoi Iniu naliu masuangga patu phuiboga, naliuniu patu madam khaibo kamaobodungse wadi daomakge.
Herod niudi pamao wadi dao makbo donniu aliu khuga langwang lande. Haibopiu hai shai raleng wakhatnadi buimakge.
Sijengniu Iniu patu dapkhai lujiu phutmi tane.
(Kenpadbo Ngee machang Pilate niu paliuleng kavangkyga bambo mai khattu phutkhai khai-e).
Maidung siniu senjiu din-e, “Patu kamshat milo! Barabbas tu aliuleng phut khailo!”
(Barabbas haitu namdi gase chalad padjiu khatdi maitu kamshat mibo lam ganiu kavangkyga khai nbambo-e).
Pilate niura Jesu tu phutkhai nibo-e, sijengniu patu phutkhai mira paniu maidung khuga dinlan-e.
Chiudi paliuniu senjiu dinlan-e, “Patu ju maseng milo! Patuse ju maseng milo!”
Pilate niu pasumbo thiujiu dinlan-e, “Paniu degu kamaobo kammi jiulo? Paniu shai buibo mao wadi kamkhaibo I daomakge! Iniu patu dapkhai lujiu phut khaimi tane.”
Chiudi paliuniu, paliu laipadjiu Jesu haitu ju maseng rabo-e, chiu sensude. Sichiujiu kanambo gara paliu khuan siniu ngam lude.
Sichiujiu paliuniu khengbose Pilate niu suikhai mide.
Sichiujiu maitu kamshat mibo piu situ paliuniu lunibo donniu phutkhai mide. Khatdi Jesu tu paliu maning thiujiu kamra pikhai mide.

Riphendung siniu Jesu tu julujiu tadsude, sichiu paliuniu tadpadboga, Cyrene maipiu pazanniu Simon kubo siniu manam lamsu namdi gase ngutra chiujiu wangbo piu khattu adaode. Paliuniu patu minlujiu, Jesu gu singchaise piphung khaide.
Chamai mendi khatniu pasai suikin-e, sibo ruangga maipuidung, khangsianiu padon jengniu kapjiu khatdi achungjiu kimme.
Jesu niu paliu khulam mariwang lujiu din-e, “Jerusalem maipuidung yo, Adon jengniu kap mane, chiudi naliu donjengniu khatdi naliu nahdung donjengniu kap lulo.
Palamra maidungniu haichiu dinrabo tingse wangkin-e, ‘Panah wadi kahamaidung, nakampuidung, wadao khatdi pontup khai kamakbo puidungse, dejiukha paliu san wilo!’
Sibo tingga maidungniu maluong dibodung khuga dinsune, ‘Aliutu kiugom khailo!’ Khatdi luongbutdung khuga dinsune, ‘Aliutu baikhailo!’
Palamra madiakring bambo mariutudi haichiu bamsai, kimibo gara dechiu kadai ralo?”
Jesu tu kamshat taman khaira, agatiumai khang niatu juwangde.
Paliuniu “Tapee luong” kubo bam gase wangtangboga Jesu tu maseng khaide, khatdi agatiumai khangnia situ, khang khattu paben majadlam, khang khattu mawilam jumaseng khaide.
Jesu niu din-e, ‘Apiu yo, paliutu kuak khailo. Palamra paliuniu kam bambose paliuniu sitang makjiu-e.”
Paliuniu taden thonjiu pafai-panidungse paliuleng njan lude.
Jehudi maigu jupaodung siniu patu tanui thenjiu, “Paniu maidung tura rankhai-e, Tingwang niu kadakhaibo Messiah si-e chiusai paronna patudi ranlulo,” chiujiu dinbose maidungniu phuijiu chap bamme!
“Nang Jehudimai wang-e chiusai naronna natu ranlulo.”
Papi riga haibo ladkengse raokhai bamme: “Haise Jehudimai wangpiu-e.”
Patu maseng ncham bambo agatiubo piu khat siniudi patu wajeng simakjiu din-e, “Nang hai Messiah mak jiuma? Natudi, anaitudi rankhai sulo!”
Chiudi khang khatpiu siniu patu kasanjiu din-e, “Nang, Tingwang tu pingmak jiuma? Pakumjiu nangdi dao ncham bambo-e.
Chiudi anaira majijiu, chiubora anainiu kamkhai mibo saisuijiu anaileng kabuibose daobo-e; chiudi para wadi kamaobo ha-e.”
Sichiujiu paniu Jesu khuga din-e, “Jesu yo, nagu chawang bamga wangbo naise atu maningtao khailo!”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Iniu nakhuga ladriat thiu khaibo-e chiubora thainai gasu nangniu atu Paradise ga maluang bam ncham bammi rabo-e.”
Siga Jesu niu pakhuan tanjiu senne, “Apiu yo, ahiupuina naben-ga Iniu pikhaide!” Paniu haise dinkhai lujiu shaikiu mide.
Riphendunggu chakampao siniu padbambo hina ngaoboga, paniu haichiu dinjiu Tingwang tu thuon sude, “Pachang siakjiu pahai kawibo mai-e!”
Padbambo situ phuibammai hinaniu degu padmilo chiubo ngaolujiu, paliu lung makjiu, paliu gah jumjiu, paliu ky-ky lam malan kam mide.
Jesu tu kasimai hina, khatdi Galilee gasu pasai suikinbo maipuidung siniu kadiulam chaplujiu sise phui bamme.
Siga Judaea ramlungga bambo Arimathea kubo namdi gasu Joseph kubo piu khat bamme. Pase Tingwang gu Chawangdih wangrabotu khuanjiu bambo, tacheng matipbo piu-e.
Para Apaimai khat thiujiu bamdi paliuniu suikhai mibo ladbam gase suimakbo piu-e.
Paniu Pilate khuga tadlujiu Jesu pum situ khengde.
Sichiujiu paniu papumse lukiu lujiu khatdi fainoi khatniu majiu lujiu, tatuniu bungkhaibo mai khattudi baikhai makhabo rao gase baikhai mide.
Haise Masannai-e, sichiujiu Tabamnaise sumi lajiu bambo-e.
Galilee gasu suikinbo maipuidung siniu Joseph tu maluang tadjiu, Jesu pumtu charao lungga baikhai mibose paliuniu ngaokhai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu paliuniu paliu ky ky lam malan mide, khatdi papumga parim wibo wasa nai manam wibose manuk khaira kaden lude.
Tacheng tajaigu chamtan saisuijiu, paliuniu Tabamnai sira mathak mide.
Nidnai nsuan kalu maipuidung siniu, paliuniu kaden lubo parim wibo wasase thinlujiu charao lamse tad sude.
Paliuniu rawkham tuse kaladpad bamniubo ngaode.
Sichiujiu paliuniu ngutboga, Rapiu Jesu pumse daomakge.
Sijengniu paliu suang hajiu chap bamboga, ranranbo fai benbo piu khangnia sibo mungga chap bamniu-e.
Siga maipuidungse pingju mijiu kadihga paliu pi makhum kiuboga, maipiu khangnia siniu paliu khuga din-e, “Dekamjiu naliuniu ringbambo patuse kashaimai ruangga phiukin jiulo?
Pah haiga ha-e, pah ringsu mide. Paniu Galilee ga bambo tingga naliu khuga dinkhai mibose maningtaolo:
“Chamai Nahpiu situ nuan phungmai ben-ga pikhaijiu jumasengshat mine, chiudi pasumbo naise pah ringsulan mine.”
Siga maipuidung siniu pachamse maningtao lujiu, charao gasu malanwang mide;
khatdi pakhommaidung khang kariu-je-khatkiu khatdi kakimaidung khuga pakhiangna haise wangjiu paokhaide.
Maipuidung sira: Magdalene Mary, Joanna, khatdi Jacob pui Mary paliu-e; paliuniu khatdi kakibo maipuidung siniu pakhiangna haise pakhommaidung khuga dinkhaide.
Chiudi pakhommaidung siniu maipuidung situ malum makge, khatdi paliuniu dinbose kamengbo gu-e chiujiu lukhaide.

Chiudi Peter niu sulujiu charao lamse paktad mide, paniu kinkiu phuiboga, fainoise majiukhai bambo makjiu, wadi ngao makge. Siga degu padmibo gulo chiubo simakjiu pasuang hajiu chaky lam malanwang mide.
Sibo naise pasai suimai khangnianiu Jerusalem gasu mathakbam kariu-je-khatkiu kumbo kadiubo, Emmaus kubo namga tadra tadkiude,
sichiujiu padmibo hina lamga panainiu khat-khat khuga din kin-e.
Sichiujiu panainiu dinjiu ari kinboga, Jesu niu wangmana lujiu, panaitu maluang lujiu tadkin-e;
panaidi patu ngao-e, chiudi wakhat nadi patuse si-nsilu makge.
Jesu niu panai khuga din-e, “Nanainiu haichiu tadkinboga, dekambo lamga khat-khat khuga arikin jiulo?”
Sichiudi panai chun sajiu chap bamme.
Panai ruangga khangkhat, pazanniu Cleopas kubopiu siniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Jerusalem ga nbin mengbo maidung ruangga, haibo kak lungga padmibodung simakbo hai nang naronna suma?”
Paniu maniu-e, “Degu padmi jiulo?”

Panainiu paokakge, “Nazareth Jesu khuga padmibo situ-e. Patu hai Tingwang niu kadakhai mibo phaimiukakung khatle, sichiujiu paniu dinbo khatdi kambo hinaga pumtan bambo piu-e, chiujiu maidungniu lukhaibo-e.
Chiudi aliugu mawangpaodung nai singkupaodung siniu patuse kamshat mira suikhai mibo-e, sichiujiu jumasengjiu kamshat mibo-e.
Israel maitu paniu khen-rang pithiu khai bine chiujiu aliuniu maningbo-e. Sichiujiu thainai haise jeng sum tang mibo-e.
Sigasu aliu ruangga maipuidung khangsianiu aliu suang kam maha khaide; paliuniu nsuan kalu charawlam tadboga papumse daomakge chiujiu din-e,
mazadungniu paliu khuga madu khaijiu, ‘Pah ringsu mide’ chiujiu aliu khuga paokhaide.
Sichiujiu aliu ruangga sudi khangsianiu charaw lamse tadlanjiu phuiboga, maipuidungniu dinbo kumgapjiu dao-e, sichiudi paliuniu patura ngaolu makge.”
Siga Jesu niu panai khuga din-e, “Naliuse dejiukha kapang mailo, phaimiukakungdung siniu dinkhai mibose dekamjiu naliuniu malummak jiulo!
Messiah niu haichiujiu chariu khengkhai maksai dechiujiu pakendibo gase ngutlu ralo?”
Sichiujiu Jesu niu Mose gu ariakkhuangga phaimiukakungdung siniu palamga raokhaibo hinase paphibang gasu, panai khuga dinjiu katikhai sude.
Sichiujiu panainiu tadkhai rabo namgase wangtangboga, Jesu niu tad madiu mirabo kumjiu kam sude;
chiudi panainiu patuse khamjiu din-e, “Aliu khuga manai khai milo, tuhoira rimide, khatdi tamiuwang kinne.” Sijengniu panai saisuilujiu manai khaira pah ngutde.
Katiu tiuraleng paliutu maluang ntaokiu lujiu, paniu taruakse thinsujiu thoikhaide; khatdi paniu taruakse thenpang lujiu paliuleng pikhaide.
Siga paliu mikse rakphak padjiu ngaode, khatdi paliuniu patuse silude, chiudi pase paliu khugasu halan mide.
Siga paliu karai khat-khat khuga dinsude, “Npuikiga tadjiu npao kinboga khatdi paniu Masanbo Ariakse aliu khuga dinjiu katikhaibo lonse aliu lungga chami taobambo kum makma?”
Sibo wan gasu panai sulujiu Jerusalem lamse malan wangboga, pakhommaidung khang kariu-je-khatkiu siniu wang aruang bamniubo daode.
Siga paliuniu “Rapiu hai ringsu siak mide! Paniu Simon khuga ngaolen khai-e,” chiujiu dinbamniu-e.
Panai khangnia siniudi npuikiga degu padmilo, khatdi Rapiu niu taruakse thenpang khaiboga, dechiujiu panainiu patu silulo chiubose paliu khuga dinlen khaide.
Sichiujiu panai khangnia siniu paliu khuga haichiu dinbamboga, simak dakjiu Rapiu papumsiak paliu ruangga wang chaplujiu, paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu khuga agi-manai bamlo!”
Siga paliuniu mahiu ngaojiu bamne chiu maning lujiu, ping masajiu charen mide.
Chiudi paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Dekamjiu naliu sibo nping pingjiulo? Dekamjiu naliu haichiu maning masa bamjiulo?
Aphi aben phuilo, haise I-e. Atu wangjiu dikhailo, palamra naliuniu atu ngaobo kumjiu mahiu sira patia khatdi paraa thiumakge.”
Paniu haichiu dinlujiu, paphi pabense paliu khuga lenkhaide.
Paliu chun wichang wimide khatdi paliu suang hamide; chiudi paliuniu malum masa bambo donniu, paniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Naliu khuga wa-tiura bamma?”
Paliuniu langlubo chakha puikhat pakhuga pikhai bide.
Paniu sise lulujiu paliu masuangga tiulen khai bide.

Sichiujiu paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Haidungse Iniu naliutu maluang bambo tingga dinkhai mibo si-e: Mose gu Tacheng-tajaiga, phaimiukakungdung siniu raokhaibo khatdi Tathoilui ga dinkhai mibose wangtang raleng-e.”
Sigasu Masanbo Ariakse silu raleng paniu paliu chunse pikhai bide, khatdi paliu khuga din-e,
“Haichiujiu raokhai mibo-e: Messiah se chariu khengrabo-e, khatdi kashaibo gasu pasumbo naise ringsulan rabo-e;
khatdi Jerusalem ganiu sujiu jat hinaga chalung lira khatdi nuan kuak khai raleng pazan gasu dinron tadrabo-e.
Pakhiangna haise naliuniu lamchap thiubo-e.
Sichiujiu Apiuniu ladriat thiukhai mibose I apumsiakniu naliu riga langkiu khaibi rabo-e. Sichiudi kakulamgu pumtanse naliu riga kiumak then, naliuniu namdi gase khuanjiu bamlo.”
Sichiujiu paniu paliutu thoikhaijiu bambo gasu, patuse tinggenlam lukhang mide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu patu kahumkhai lujiu, khatdi paliu chun wibo siniu phuilujiu Jerusalem lam malanwang mide,
sichiujiu Charakyga bamtan tanjiu Tingwang tu thuonjiu bamme.
Kadihpiri dammak gasu Ladkengse bamniu-e, pahai Tingwang panai bamniu-e, khatdi pahai Tingwang panai nchamme.
Paphibang gasu Ladkengse Tingwang panai bamniu-e.
Papen gasu Tingwang niu mania hina damkhai-e, gandam khatnagadi pakhu ganiu makjiu dambo ha-e.
Ladkengse karingbo phibang si-e khatdi karingbo haisiniu chamaina khuga kabenbo phungwang-e.
Kabenbo siniu tamiuboga thaoben khai-e, sichiujiu tamiubo siniu wadaodi kammid lanlu makge.
copy
Tingwang niu paladlangtadmai khat pazanniu John kubo piutu langkhai-e.
Paniu kabenbo lamga maidung khuga paokhaijiu, paliuniu pagu champao situ chiulujiu malum lura leng-e.
Pasiakra kabenbo makge, chiudi kabenbo lamga dinkhaira wangbo-e.
Haise palingbo kabenbo si-e, palamra kabenbo siniu kadihpiriga wangjiu chamaina mathiu khuga thaoben khai-e.
Ladkengse kadihpiriga bamniu-e, khatdi Tingwang niu papen gasu kadihpiritu damkhai-e, chiudi kadihpiri niu patu silu makge.
Paniu pagu kadihga wangbo-e, chiudi pamaidung siniu patu lukhai makge.
Chiudi maidung khangsianiu patu lukhai-e, khatdi patu malum khai-e, sichiujiu paniu paliutu Tingwang nahdung pithiu khaira pumtan pikhai-e.
Paliuse chamaina lunlung gasu Tingwang nahdung thiubo makge, chiubora chamaina khat piu nahdung thiubo makge, chiudi Tingwang papum siakniu paliu piu thiubo-e.
Sichiujiu Ladkeng siniu chamaina lun thiuwangbo-e, khatdi lungsiat nai majiboniu phui lujiu aliu ruangga lungwang-e. Aliuniu pakendise ngaode, sibo kendise Papiu gu kamalibo Nahpiu si-e.
John niu palamga dinjiu haichiu sen-e, “Hainase Iniu dinbambo pah si-e, pahai asailam wangkin-e, chiudi para asuang di-e; palamra atu dammak gasu para bambo-e.”
Pakhuga lungsiatniu phuijiu bambo jengniu, paniu aliu mathiutu thoi khaide sichiujiu aliu khatniu khattu thoikhai raleng-e.
Tingwang niu Tacheng-tajaise Mose khuga pikhai-e, chiudi lungsiat nai majibo haira Jesu Khrista khuga suniu-e.
Mai khatniudi Tingwang tu ngao makge. Pumlibo Nahpiu, Tingwang tu maluang bambo paniu patu pisi khaibo-e.
Jerusalem ga bammai Jehudi maigu apaimaidungniu, singkudung nai Levi mai khangsiatu John khuga langkhaijiu maniu-e, “Nang hai saolo?”
John niu paliutu paokak makbo thiumakjiu, haichiu dinkhai-e, “Ira Khrista se makge.”
John niu paokakge, “Chiumakge.”
Siga paliuniu maniu-e, “Chiusai nang hai phaimiukakungse ma?”
Paniu paokakge, “Chiumakge.”
“Sichiusai nang hai sao siaklo?” chiubo aliu khuga dinkhailo, aliutu langkhai mai khuga aliu pao malan wangra leng-e. “Nangniu nalamga dechiujiu dinralo?”
“Ira ramjingga chakhuan senkinbo si-e:
Rapiu niu tadrabo npuise kam maji khailo.”
Pharisee maidunggu walang tadmai siniu John khuga maniu-e,
“ Nang hai Khrista dimak, Elijah dimak, phaimiukakung dimak sai dekamjiu tadui nphumbo tien hai kambam jiulo?”
John niu paokakge, “Ira taduiniu nphum khaibo-e, chiudi naliu ruangga chap bambo piutu naliuniu simakge.
Para asailam wangkinne, chiudi Ira paphitop riangdi khira akaji makge.”
Haidungse John niu Jordan Giu tingbanglam bambo Bethany ga, John niu tadui nphum bambo lon padmibo-e.
Pasaibo naise Jesu pakhuga wangkinbo ngaolujiu John niu din-e, “Phuilo, uise Tingwang gu Milypoi, kadihpirigu nuan phung maha khaibo piu si-e!
Mai khat asailam wang kinne, chiudi para asuang di-e, palamra atu damkhai makha gasu para bambo-e, chiujiu Iniu dinbambo si-e.
Pase saokumbo mai thiu ralo chiubo simakge, chiudi Israel maidungtu pijiu patu silu raleng Ira tadui nphum khaibo-e.”
Sichiujiu John niu pagu jengdin thiujiu din-e, “Tinggen lamsu makhao kumjiu Hiupuina pariga kiu taokhaibo Iniu ngao-e.
Haise pa-e chiubo Ira silu makge, chiudi atu tadui nphumra langkhaibo Tingwang siniu akhuga din-e, ‘Mai khat piriga Hiupuina kiubo nang ngaosune, pase Masanbo Hiupuina gasu nphum khai rabo piu si-e.”
John niu din-e, “Haise Iniu ngao lubo-e khatdi naliu khuga dinbo-e, chiubora pase Tingwang Napiu si-e.”
Pasaibo naise John niu pakhommai khangniatu maluang lujiu chap bamboga;
paniu Jesu wangkinbo ngao lujiu din-e, “Phuilo, uise Tingwang gu Milypoi si-e!”
Paniu dinbose pakhommai khangnia siniu chiulujiu Jesu sai suitad mide.
Jesu niu mariwang paliutu ngao lujiu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Naliuniu degu phiukin gulo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Rabbi yo, nang delam lungkin jiulo?” (Rabbi ladkeng rambaniu ‘Katipao’ chiubo-e).
Paniu paokakge, “Wangjiu phuilulo?” (Haise n-nien wanchak madai ningga-e). Sichiujiu paliuniu pasai suilujiu paniu bambo bamse ngao lujiu sibo nai gasu pasai suitad mide.
Khang khat sira Simon Peter saikariupiu Andrew si-e.
Paniu pasingna Simon tu ngao lujiu din-e, “Aliuniu Messiah tu daolude.” (Paramba siniu Khrista chiubo-e).
Sichiujiu paniu Simon tu Jesu khuga puiwang-e.
Jesu niu patu phuilujiu din-e, “John nahpiu Simon yo, chiudi natuse Cephas chiujiu kumine.” (Cephas chiubo haise Peter chiubo panai nchambo-e, paramba siniu Tudi chiubo-e).
Pasaibo naise Jesu niu Galilee lam tadraleng kaden lujiu tadpadboga, paniu Philip tu daolujiu pakhuga din-e, “Asai suilulo.”
(Philip ra Andrew nai Peter niu lungbo bam Bethsaida gasu-e).
Philip niu Nathanael tu daolujiu din-e, “Tacheng-tajai ga Mose niu raokhaibo khatdi phaimiukakung mainiu raokhaibo patu aliuniu daolude, para Nazareth ga bambo Joseph nahpiu Jesu si-e.
Nathanael niu din-e, “Nazareth gasu wa kawibo padlu buima?”
Philip niu paokakge, “Wanglo, phui matailo!”
Nathanael niu pakhulam wangkinbo Jesu niu ngao lujiu din-e, “Haiga Israel mai masan siakbo piu bamme. Pakhuga kamaobo wa khatdi ha-e!”
Nathanael niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Degasu nangniu atu silu jiulo?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Philip niu natu kubo masuang, nangniu ndutbang hangga chapjiu bambo gasu Iniu natu ngaokhai mibo-e.”
Nathanael niu paokakge, “Katipao yo, nangra Tingwang Nahpiu, Israel mai Wangpiu si-e.”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Nang ndutbang hangga chap bamme chiujiu Iniu dinbo donniu nang malum jiuma? Nangniu haisuang kadibo ngao sune!”
Sichiujiu paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Iniu naliu khuga pachang paling dinbo-e, Tinggen nkhamse lepadbo khatdi Tingwang mazadung siniu Nahpiu riga kiu-khangjiu bambo naliu ngao sune.”
Jengnia saiga Galilee ga bambo Cana namdiga tanao magiangbo khat bamme. Siga Jesu puidi wang bamme,
siga Jesu nai pakhommaidung tudi kukhaide.
Sichiujiu mumjawse hamiboga Jesu khuga papuiniu din-e, “Paliugu mumjawse loimide.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Apui yo, Iniu degu kamralo chiubo nangniu dinra makge. Aleng pawan wangtang makha-e.”
Siga Jesu pui siniu kavang maidung khuga din-e, “Paniu naliu khuga dinbo hina kamkhai bilo.”
Jehudi maigu tacheng saisuijiu khiu masanbo thiak bamme, sijengniu siga tadui karung charuk bamme; karung khatse wa madatpiang kai khat kumbo ngutsui kamme.
Jesu niu kavang maidung khugase din-e, “Haibo karungdungse tadui maliphui khailo.” Siga paliuniu pawongcheng tangbo tadui maliphui khaide.
Siga paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Tuhoira taduise tamnakha thuaklujiu machapiu situ pikhai bilo.” Sichiujiu paliuniu taduise thuaklujiu pakhuga pikhaide.
Tuhoira paniu machanbo tingga sibo duise mumjaw mawui mide; mumjaw haise ndechiu wangbo gulo chiubo para silu makge, (chiudi kavangdung sira sibamme). Siga paniu naopaopiu situ kulujiu din-e,
“Mai hinaniu sak kawibo jawse raiboga njanbo-e, sichiujiu chagiangmai siniu sak maniu mibo sainiu wiju makbo jawse njanbo-e. Chiudi nangra tuhoi tangbo sak wibo jawse khai bamkha-e!”
Galilee ga bambo Cana gasu Jesu niu pagu raithubo tasibo tien hai thiukhai-e. sichiujiu paniu pakendise madukhai-e, sichiujiu pasingnamaidung nai pakhommaidung siniu patu malum mide.
Charaky lungga paniu matom-kabui, milydung khatdi kaphinadung jonjiu bambo khatdi rangkang nkhiakjiu bammaitu daode.

Siga paniu phenlubo chariang siniu thinlujiu Charaky lungga khaoring hinatu, matom-kabui khatdi milydung hinatu hapad sude, khatdi rangkang nkhiakjiu bam maigu pakaidungse tun makhum-tun masijiu rangkangse phe- mara mide.
Sichiujiu kaphina jonmaidung khuga chamtan thiujiu din-e. “Haigasu lupad milo! Apiu ky haitu ka-alibo bam pithiu khai tulo.”
Siga pakhommaidung siniu Masanbo ariakga dinkhai bambose maning taode, “Oh, Tingwang, nakyga Iniu kahumbo haise alungga chami kumjiu tao-e.”
Siga Jehudi maigu apaimaidung siniu paokakjiu haichiu maniu-e, “Haikumbo ngam kamra nangniu ndegu tasibo aliutu lenkhai ngamlo?”
Siga paliuniu maniu-e, “Nangniu haise jengsum lungga thiulan lubui-e ma? Haibo Raky hai thiuboga takum atai-je-charukkiu ngutkhai mibo-e.
Chiudi Jesu niu dinbo sira papum raky lamga dinbambo-e.
Sichiujiu paniu shailujiu ringsulan miboga pakhommaidung siniu haise paniu dinmibo si-e chiubo maningtao lude, khatdi Masanbo ariak nai Jesu niu dinbo situ malumde.
Kenpadbo Ngee tingga Jesu niu Jerusalem ga bambo lon tasibo ngam kamkhaibo ngao lumai kakeng khaniu patu malum mide.
Chiudi Jesu ra paliutu malumkhai makge, palamra paniu paliu mathiutu sibamme.
Paliu lamga mai khatniu pakhuga dinkhaira pageng ha-e, palamra paliu mathiu lungchunse paniu sikam bamme.
Jehudi maigu jupao khat pazanniu Nicodemus chiu kubo, Pharisee mai khat bamme.

Naikhat nchun paniu Jesu khuga wanglujiu din-e, “Rabbi yo, nangra Tingwang niu langwangbo katipao khatle chiubo aliuniu si-e; palamra Tingwang niu patu maluang khaibi maksai nangniu kamkhaibo tasibodung hai kamlu lakge.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Iniu nakhuga pachang paling dinbo-e, mai khatniu mana kasan
Nicodemus niu maniu-e, “Dechiujiu katingmai khatniu mana kasan lanlu ralo? Paniu wadao khatdi papui wonlungga ngutlan silakge, sichiujiu mana lonnia lulakge.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Iniu nakhuga pachang paling dinbo-e, mai khatniu tadui nai Hiupuina gasu mana kasanlu maksai, Tingwang gu Chawangdihga ngutsi lakge.
Chamai gasu manabose chamai-e, chiudi hiupuina gasu manabose Hiupuina-e.
Nang mana kasanlan rabo-e chiujiu Iniu dinboga nasuang hami mane.
Tingkai
Nicodemus niu maniu-e, “Haise dechiujiu padngam ralo?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Nangra Israel maigu katipao kadibo khatle, chiudi haise nang simak jiuma?
Iniu nakhuga pachang paling dinbo-e: Aliura kasibo dinbo-e, khatdi ngao lubose dinbo-e. Chiudi aliugu champao haitu naliuniu lukhaini makge.
Haibo kadihgu lamga Iniu dinboga naliuniu atu malum maksai, Iniu tinggen lamga dinsai dechiujiu naliuniu malumlu ralo?
Khatdi tinggen lamsu kiubo Nahpiuse makjiu mai khatdi tinggen lam khang makge.”
Sichiujiu patu malummai hina tingtheng ringbo ngao lune.
Palamra Tingwang niu kadihpiri haitu haijiukha kungbo donniu panah pumlibo situ pikhai bide, sichiujiu patu malum lumai hina shaimakjiu tingtheng karingbo daolura leng-e.
Palamra Tingwang niu Nahpiu situ kadihpiri haitu ladjan thiura langkhaibo makge, chiudi haisitu rankhai raleng-e.
Mai khatniu Nahpiu situ malum lusai patu ladjan thiu lakge, chiudi mai khatniu patu malum maksai ladjan thiuloi mibo-e, palamra paniu Tingwang Nahpiu pumlibo situ malum makbo donniu-e.
Haichiujiu ladjan thiu rabo-e. sisera kabenbo siniu kadihpiriga wang-e chiudi maidung siniu kabenbotu suang tamiubo situ masenne, palamra paliu tienkamse kasabo donniu-e.
Mai khatniu kasabo tien kamsai paniu kabenbo situ mareng mibo-e, palamra pagu tienkam kasabose madu padni makge.
Chiudi kamajibo kam maidung siniu kabenboga wang-e, sichiujiu kabenbo siniu pagu tienkamse Tingwang kadin piubo-e chiubo madulen raleng-e.
Haibo sai, Jesu niu pakhommaidungtu puilujiu Judaea ramlungga tadde, siga paniu paliutu maluang bam khaide, khatdi tadui nphum khaide.
John di Salim gasu diumakbo Aenon kubo bamga tadui nphum khaijiu bamme, palamra siga tadui kengbamme. Maidung siniu pakhuga wang karenjiu bamme, sichiujiu paniu paliutu tadui nphum khai-e.
(Haise John tu kavangkyga khai makhabo suang-e).
Jehudimai khangsianiu John gu pakhommaidung khuga tacheng saisuijiu kam masanbo lamga arijiu bamme.

Sijengniu paliuniu John khuga tadlujiu haichiu din-e, “Katipao yo, nangdi maningtao bamdi sui-e, chiubora Jordan gu tingbanglam nangniu dinkhai mibo piuse, tuhoira padi tadui nphum khaijiu bamme, sichiujiu mai hina pasai sui mide!”
John niu paokakge, “Tingwang niu patu pikhaibi maksai mai khatniudi kam ngam lakge.
Naliu pumsiakniu agu jengdin thiu bambo-e, chiubora ‘Ira Messiah se makge chiudi pamasuangga atu langkhaibo-e.’
Naopaopuise naopaopiu leng-e chiudi naopaopiu kahmaidung pamungga chap bammai siniu, naopaopiu khuan chiuboga paliu chun wi-e. Haichiujiu agu chunwibo hai wiphu lubui-e.
Ira nkhin kiubi-bi mine,chiudi para nkiukhangbi-bi rabo-e.”
Tinggen lamsu wangbo piuse mathiu suang di-nkiu-e, kadihpiriga lungmai hinase kadih gu-e, khatdi kadihpiri lamga dinbo-e; chiudi tinggen lamsu wangbo para mathiu suang nkiubo-e.
Para ngaolubo nai chiulubose dinbo-e, chiudi pachamse mai khatniudi lukhai makge.
Sichiudi pacham lukhai mai hinaniu Tingwang ra majibo-e chiujiu lukhaibo-e.
Tingwang niu langkhaibo paniu Tingwang ladkengse dinbo-e, palamra Tingwang niu pagu Hiupuina kaphuibose paleng pikhai-e.
Papiuniu Nahpiu situ lungsabo jengniu pumtan hinase paleng pikhai bibo-e.
Mai khatniu Nahpiutu malum lusai tingtheng karingbo daolune; mai khatniu Nahpiutu malum maksai tingtheng karingbose daolakge, chiudi Tingwang gu sajai hangga bamme.
Jesu niu John suang pakhommai keng nkiu mide, khatdi tadui nphum khai maidung keng mide, chiujiu Pharisee maidungniu chiude.
(Pachang siakra pakhommaidung siniu sangnu, Jesu papum siakra mai khattudi tadui nphum khai makge).
Jesu niu haibo chamse chiuluboga, paniu Judaea phutlujiu Galilee lam malan khai mide.
Sichiujiu pagu npuise Samaria kenjiu tadra padde.
Jacob akhunse siga bamme, Jesu niu npui tad jengniu, magenthiu mibo jengniu akhun munggase ntao mathak khaide. Haise niending tingga-e.
Siga Samaria maipui khat tadui thuakra mengde, siga Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Tadui sak khaira aleng khelo.”
(Pakhommaidung sira katiu liuraleng namdi lamse tadmibo-e).
Jesu niu paokakge, “Tingwang niu pibo kalense, khatdi nakhuga tadui sak khaira kheng bambo patuse nangniu sisai, nangniu pakhuga karingbo duise pikhaira nangniu khengbam rabo-e.”
Maipui siniu Jesu khuga din-e, “Paohubo, nakhuga thuakrabo piangdi ha-e, khatdi akhun haira sukge. Nangniu delamsu karingbo duise daolu ralo?
Aliu pao Jacob niu akhun hai aliuleng pikhaibo-e; sichiujiu panahmaidung khatdi patom pabuidung hinaniu haise sakjiu bambo-e. Nang, Jacob suang di-e chiujiu maning jiuma?”
Jesu niu paokakge, “Haibo akhun gasu sakmai hinara charilan rabo-e.
Chiudi Iniu pikhaibo dui sakmai hinara wadaodi charilan lakge. Iniu pikhai rabo dui sira palung gasu duipin thiujiu ringbo duise patu pikhaijiu, tingtheng karingbose thiumi rabo-e.”
Maipui siniu din-e, “Paohubo yo, sibo duise atu pikhai khelo! Sichiusai Iniu wadaodi charilan lak mine khatdi tadui thuakra haiga menglanta mine.”
Siga Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Sichiusai tadlujiu nakinatu kulujiu wanglo.”
“Akina ha-e,” chiujiu paniu paokakge.
Jesu niu paokakge, “Nakina ha-e chiujiu nangniu dinbose maji-e.
Sichiudi nangniu khang mangiu khuga lungkhai mide, sichiujiu tuhoi nangniu maluang lung bambose nakina kachang siakbo makge. Nangniu akhuga majibose dinbo-e.
Maipui siniu din-e, “Paohubo, nang hai phaimiukakung khatle chiubo I silude.
Aliu Samaria mai pao-peh mainiu haibo luongri gasu Tingwang tu kahumme, chiudi naliu Jehudi maidungniu Jerusalem gasu Tingwang tu kahum rabo-e chiujiu din-e.”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Maipui yo, atu malum lulo, maidungniu haibo luongri gasu maksai Jerusalem gasu Papiu situ kahummak rabo wanse wang kinne.
Naliu Samaria maidungniu detu kahum kinbolo chiubo naliuniu sisiak makge, chiudi aliu Jehudi maidungra aliuniu kahum kinbo patu si-e. Palamra juringbo haise Jehudi mai khugasu wangbo-e.
Chiudi pawanse wang kinne, wangdi wang bamde; maidung siniu Papiu situ Hiupuina gu pumtan gasu kahum rabo-e, khatdi paniu lunibo kumjiu majibo gasu kahum rabo-e.
Tingwang sira Hiupuina-e, khatdi patu kahum mai siniu Hiupuina ga khatdi majiboga patu kahum rabo-e.”
Maipui siniu pakhuga din-e, “Messiah wangkinne chiubo I si-e, sichiujiu paniu wangsai, paniu wahina aliu khuga dinkhaibi rabo-e.”
Jesu niu paokakge, “I hai pah si-e, natu npao bambo I si-e.”

Sibo wan-gase pakhommaidungse wangde, khatdi paniu maipui situ npao bamniubo ngaoboga paliu suang hamide. Chiudi paliu mai khatniudi paniu, “Degu luni jiulo”, maksai “Nang dekamjiu patu npao bam jiulo?” chiu maniu makge.
Siga maipui siniu paduikhiu khaidiak lujiu namdi lamse wangjiu maidung khuga din-e,
“Khe, meng phui matailo, Iniu kammibo hinase din madukhai bibo piu khat bamme. Pahai Messiah kubo piu sima?”
Sijengniu paliuniu namdi gasu mengjiu Jesu tu phuide.
Sibo wan-gase pakhommaidung siniu Jesu tu katiu tiura din-e, “Katipao yo, poinagadi tiukhailo.”
Siga Jesu niu paokakge, “Naliuniu simakbo agu tatekse bamme.”
Sijengniu pakhommaidung siniu paliu ronna dinsude, “Mai khatniu paleng katiu phungwang khaibi jiuma?”
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Agu tatek sira atu langwangbo pagu chunning nai patiense kamloi rabo si-e.
Naliuniu haichiu dinbo bamme, ‘Chahiu madai bamlujiu atiatne,’ chiudi Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, luzamse ngang phuilo, chamiuse atiat raleng min maren bamde!
Atiatra lankhaibo maileng chaphijeng pirabo-e, sichiujiu kagebo piu siniu tingtheng karingbo leng miusy khom madui-e; sichiujiu lingkhaibo piu nai gewangbo piuse chunwi macham rabo-e.
Kadinchamse maji-e, ‘Mai khatniu lingkhai-e, mai khatniu gewang-e.’
Naliuniu tenkhai makbo luzamga, maidungniu tenkhaibo luzamga Iniu naliutu langkhai-e, sichiujiu paliu tienkam gasu naliuleng genglu rabo-e,”
Sichiujiu sibo namdiga bammai Samaria mai kakeng khaniu Jesu tu malum mide, palamra maipui siniu haichiu dinbo jengniu, “Iniu kammibo hinase din madukhai bi-e.”
Sijengniu Samaria maidung siniu pakhuga wangjiu paliu khuga manai khaira kheng-e, sichiujiu Jesu niu siga jengnia manai khaide.
Pacham gasu maidung kengkha malum mide.

Sijengniu paliuniu maipui khuga din-e, “Tuhoira aliuniu malum lude, haise nangniu dinbo jengniu makge; paniu dinbo champaose aliuniu chiulujiu, pahai kadihpiritu Ranpao-e chiubo aliuniu pachang palingjiu silude.”
Siga jengnia manaikhai lubo sai, Jesu Galilee lam tad mide.
Palamra paniu haichiu din-e, “Phaimiukakung situ pakiluong gara chakhuang thiu makge.”
Paniu Galilee ga wangboga maidung siniu patu lukhai-e, palamra paliuniu Kenpadbo Ngee leng Jerusalem ga tadbo tingga, changee kak lungga paniu kamkhai mibo hinase ngaolude.
Jesu se Judaea lamsu Galilee ga wangkinne chiubo paniu chiulujiu, pakhuga wangjiu Capernaum ga wangjiu panah marajiu shaira kumjiu bambotu piwi khaira kheng-e.
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Tasibo khatdi maisuang habo ngamse ngaolu maksai naliu mai khatniudi malum lakge.”
Chakampao siniu paokakge, “Katipao yo, anahse shai makhaga wangjiu patu wikhailo.”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Tadsulo, nanahse ringlu rabo-e.” Sibo piu siniu Jesu ladtu malum lujiu tad mide.
Paniu npuikiga tadkinbo lon pavangmai patu meng daojiu din-e, “Nanahse wimide ringlu rabo-e.”
Dekumbo wansiak gasu ngenase wimi jiulo chiujiu paniu paliu khuga maniu-e. Paliuniu paokakge, “Danai wanchak khat ningga kakhunbose wimibo-e.”
Siga papiu siniu danai sibo wansiakga Jesu niu pakhuga, “Nanahse ringlu rabo-e,” chiujiu dinbo situ maning taode. Sijengniu pakikhunmai mathiu malum mide.
Haise Jesu niu Judaea lamsu Galilee ga wangbo saiga kamlon niabo tasibo si-e.
Haibo sai, Jesu niu Jerusalem lam changi raleng tadde.
Jerusalem gase Mily Rengmun mungga, kahun mangiu bambo ajai khat, Hebrew mai lad gasu Bethzatha kubo bamme.
Sibo kahun gase kamara maidung, pamik katiatmai, paphi-paben katangmai khatdi papum-phan kashaimai jibam karenne. (Paliuniu taduise malai rabotu khuanjiu bamme.
Palamra pakak kakga, taduise kam malai khaira Rapiu gu maza khat kiu-e. Siga taduise kam malai khaiboga tadui jiuga ngutrai thubo piuse parapot wilu-e).
Siga maipiu khat takum samriuje-tachatkiu marawang mibo piu khat bamme.
Paniu siga jibambo khatdi pating kathengkha marajiu bambo-e chiubose Jesu niu silujiu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nangdi wikhaini jiuma?”
Kamarabo piu siniu paokakge, “Paohubo yo, taduise thin malai khaigap chiuboga, atu ajai gase jukhaira mai hajiu bambo-e. Iniu ngutra matan bamboga mainiu asuang ngutraimi mijiu bambo-e.”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Nazise ponlujiu tad sulo.”
Sibo piuse winuang mide; sichiujiu pazise ponlujiu tad mide.
Haise Tabamnai padmibo-e,
sijengniu Jehudi maigu apaimaidung siniu wimibo piu khuga din-e, “Haise Tabamnai-e, nangniu nazi pon lujiu tadkinbose aliugu Tacheng-tajainiu suimakbo-e.”
Siga paniu paokakge, “Atu wikhai bibo piu siniu azi ponlujiu tadsulo chiujiu atu dinkhai bibo-e.”
Paliuniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Saolo, haikumbo ngam kamra nakhuga dinkhai bibo piuse?”
Chiudi wimibo piu siniu Jesu se saolo chiubo simakge, palamra siga chamai kengkha bambo-e, sichiujiu Jesu ra tadmibo-e.
Pakak khat saiga, Charaky lungga Jesu niu patu adao lujiu din-e, “Phuilo, tuhoira nang wimide; sijengniu nuan kamlan talo, sichiu maksai nakhuga haisuang kasa padbo sui-e.”
Sigasu sinapiu siniu, Jehudi maigu apaimaidung khuga patu wikhai bibo piuse Jesu niu-e chiubo wang paokhaide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu Jesu tu kam mathadra kamsude, palamra paniu wikhai bibose Tabamnai-e.
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Apiuse pawan machang changam kamjiu bambo-e, sijengniu Idi kamjiu bamrabo-e.”

Haibo cham jengniu Jehudi maigu apaimaidung siniu Jesu tu kamshatra rangsude. Palamra Tabamnai gu tacheng-tajai paniu kampangbo ronna makjiu, paniu Tingwang tu Papiu siakge chiu lukhaijiu, Tingwang tu pagu machamleng lukhai-e.
