Jesu piga kabet khaibo faise khatdi fainoise mainiu majiu khaibo makjiu paronna nkai khaibose ngaode.
Siga charawga mengtang raibo khommai sidi ngut lande, sichiujiu padi ngaolujiu malum mide.
(Kashaibo gasu pah ringsumi rabo-e chiujiu Masanbo ariakga dinkhai bambose panainiu sitanglu makha-e).
Sichiujiu pakhommaidungse paliu ky lam malanwang mide.
Mary se kapjiu charaw mungga chap bamme. Paniu kap-kapjiu charaw lungga kinkiu phui-e,
siga kakabo pon piubo maza khangnianiu, Jesu pum khaibo gase khatniu papee jailam, khatniu paphi jailam ntaobam niubo ngaode.
Panainiu pakhuga maniu-e, “Maipui yo, nang dekamjiu kapbam jiulo?”
Paniu paokakge, “Paliuniu a-Rapiu tu lutad mide, khatdi paliuniu patu delam baikhai milo chiubo I simakjiu-e!”
Sichiujiu paniu mariwang lanboga Jesu chap bamniubo ngaode, chiudi sise Jesu-e chiubo paniu silu makge.
Jesu niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Maipui yo, nang dekamjiu kapbam jiulo?”
Pahai kareng khuanpiu-e chiu maning lujiu, paniu pakhuga din-e, “Paohubo, nangniu patu lumi-e sai dega khai nbamlo, akhuga dinkhai janlo, Iniu tadlujiu patu ponlune.”
Siga Jesu niu patu ku-e, “Mary yo!”
Paniu pakhulam mariwang lujiu Hebrew lad gasu, “Rabboni!” chiujiu paokakge. (Parambara “Katipao” chiubo-e).

Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Atu ditulo. Palamra Iniu Apiu khulam wangtang makha-e. Chiudi asingna maidung khulam tadlujiu Iniu Apiu khulam khatdi paliu Piu khulam, a-Rawang khulam khatdi paliu Rawang khulam malan wanglan mine chiujiu dinkhai bilo.”
Sichiujiu Magdalene Mary niu tadlujiu pakhommaidung khuga, paniu Rapiu tu ngaolubo khatdi paniu pakhuga dinkhaibo hinase paokhaide.
Sibo Nidnai chawanse pakhommaidungse Jehudi maigu apaimaidungtu pingbo donniu akham tenlujiu bamme. Siga Jesu niu paliu ruangga wang chaplujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu khuga agi-manai bamlo.”
Haichiu dinlubo saiga, paniu paliu khuga paben nai palepse lenkhaide. Rapiu tu ngaoluboga pakhommaidungse paliu chun kawibo siniu phui mide.
Jesu niu paliu khuga din lan-e, “Naliu khuga agi-manai bamlo. Apiuniu atu langkhaibo kum, Iniu naliutu langkhai-e.”
Sibosai, paliu riga pasiu mudkhai lujiu din-e, “Masanbo Hiupuina daolulo.”
Naliuniu maidung nuanse kuak khai bisai, paliu tu kuak khai mibo-e; naliuniu paliutu kuak khaibi maksai paliutu kuak makbo-e.”
Khommaidung khang kariu-je-niakiu rong gasu, Thomas (Naphinbo chiujiu kubo) khatse Jesu wangbo tingga bam makniu-e.
Sijengniu kakimaidung siniu pakhuga din-e, “Aliuniu Rapiu tu ngao lude!”
Thomas niu paliu khuga din-e, “Iniu paben ndiga natri jamse ngao makthen, khatdi abenniu palep jamse ditao makthen, Ira malum silakge.”

N-nid kak khat saiga, pakhommaidungse akham lujiu bam aruang bamboga, Thomas di paliu ruangga bamme. Akhamse khamten khai nbamme, chiudi Jesu niu paliu ruangga wang chap lujiu din-e, “Naliu khuga agi-manai bamlo.”
Sigasu paniu Thomas khuga din-e, “Naben kario padlo, khatdi aben hai phuilulo, naben kariopad alepga kamed khailo. Malum makbose thiuta sulo, khatdi malum lulo!”
Siga Thomas niu patu paokakge, “a-Rapiu khatdi a-Rawang!”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Atu ngaolubo donniu nang malum jiuma? Atu ngao makjiu malum maidungse dejiukha donwibo mailo!”
Haibo ariakkhuangga raokhai makbo, Jesu niu pakhommaidung suangga tasibo kamkhaibo tiendung kengjiu bamme.
Chiudi haidungse raokhaibo sira Jesu hai Tingwang Nahpiu, Messiah si-e chiubo naliu malum lura leng-e; sichiujiu naliuniu malumbo pen gasu tingtheng karingbose daolura leng-e.
Haibo saiga, Jesu niu pakhommaidungtu Tiberia Ajai gasu ngaolen khai-e.
Haise haichiujiu padmibo-e. Simon Peter, Thomas (Naphinbo chiu kubo), Nathanael (Galilee ga bambo Cana gasu), Zebedee nahpiu kania khatdi Rapiu Jesu gu khommai katambo khangniase aruang bamme.
Simon Peter niu paliu khuga din-e, “Ira chakha khara tad mine.”
Siga paliuniu pakhuga din-e, “Aliudi nasai suilujiu tadne.” Sichiujiu paliu mathiuse aliam khat gasu tad mide, chiudi sibo nchunse wa khatdi paliuniu thonlu makge.
Nsuan naimik padsubo tingga Jesu se ajai mungga chap bamniu-e, chiudi haise Jesu-e chiubo pakhommaidung siniu silu makge.
Siga paniu paliu khuga maniu-e, “Akhangmaidung, naliu wadi thonlu mak jiuma?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Wadi thonlu makge.”
Jesu niu kungbo khommai siniu Peter khuga din-e, “Haise Rapiu-e!” Peter niu haise Rapiu si-e chiubo siluboga pafaise makhen lujiu taduijiu gase machak khai mide (palamra paniu pafaise gaopad mibo-e).
Khommaidung kakimaidung sira aliam gasu chaphu lamse chakhaniu phuibambo alangse julujiu wangde. Paliuse kadih gasu wathengkha makjiu, chakhet ringiu kumbo ronna diujiu bambo-e.
Paliuniu chaphu lamse npadboga, chami thiu nbambo khatdi siga chakha nai taruak rukhai nbambo ngaode.
Siga Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliuniu tuhoi thonlubo gasu chakha tamnakha khoiwanglo.”
Simon Peter niu tadpad lujiu chakha kadibo niu phuibo alangse taphulam jupadsude; siga chakhapui kai-khat-je-ringiu-je-sumkiu bamniu-e, haijiukha chakhase kengbamdi alangse kekmi makge.
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Wanglo, tiusulo.” Siga paliuniu, “Nang hai saolo,” chiubo maidi maniuhu makge, palamra pahai Rapiu si-e chiubo paliuniu simide.
Sijengniu Jesu niu tadpad lujiu chakha nai taruakse paliuleng njankhai bide.
Haise Jesu niu shailubo saiga, pakhommaidung khuga ngaolen khaibo palon pasumbo-e.
Paliuniu wa tiulubo sai, Jesu niu Simon Peter khuga din-e, “John nahpiu Simon, haimaidung suang nangniu atu lungsa ma?”
Paniu paokakge, “Yo, Rapiu, Iniu natu lungsa-e chiubo nangniu sibamme.
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Agu milypoidungtu manang khailo.”

Lonniabo thiujiu Jesu niu pakhuga din lan-e, “John nahpiu Simon, nangniu atu lungsa monma?” Paniu paokakge, “Yo, Rapiu, Iniu natu lungsa-e chiubo nangniu sibamme.” Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Agu milydungtu manang khailo.”

Lonsumbo thiujiu Jesu niu din lan-e, “John nahpiu Simon, nangniu atu lungsa diangma?” Jesu niu, “Nang atu lungsa monma?” chiujiu pakhuga maniu lonsum mibo jengniu Peter palung chariu mide; sijengniu paniu pakhuga din-e, “Rapiu yo, nangniu pakhiangna sikam bamme, Iniu natu lungsa-e chiubo nangniu sijiu bambo-e”
Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Agu milydungtu manang khailo.

Iniu nakhuga pachang paling dinbo-e: nangniu nahbo tingga, nangniu tadkhai nibo bamga nachun-narang thiujiu tadkhai mide, chiudi nangniu thenwang misai nangniu tadkhaini makbo bamga nabense ratlujiu jutad sune.”
(Haichiu dinbora, Peter hai dechiujiu shaikhai ralo khatdi sise Tingwang kendi phungwang rabo-e chiubo Jesu niu pisikhaibo-e). Sichiujiu Jesu niu pakhuga din-e, “Asai suilulo!”
Peter niu patu ngao luboga paniu Jesu khuga maniu-e, “Rapiu, hainapiu haira dechiu ralo?”
Jesu niu patu paokakge, “Iniu wanglan makthen, patu Iniu piringkhai nisai, na-ngam debam jiulo? Nangra asai suilulo!”

Sijengniu haibo khommai piuse shailakge chiubo cham hai Jesu saisui kinmai ruangga dinsude. Chiudi Jesu niu dinbora pahai shailakge chiubo makge; paniu dinbora, “Iniu wanglan makthen, patu Iniu piringkhai nisai, na-ngam debam jiulo?” chiubo-e.
Haibo chamdung dinjiu bambo khatdi raojiu bambo pahai khommai-e, sichiujiu paniu dinbambo haise majibo-e chiubo aliuniu si-e.
Sichiujiu, Jesu niu kamkhaibo hai kengjiu bamme. Pakhiangnase khat-khat thiujiu raokiusai, kadihpiri pakhiangna ga sibo ariak khuangdungse khaingut lakge chiujiu Ira maning-e.
Agu ariakkhuang karaibo gase, Jesu niu patien thiusubo gasu patu tinggen lam lusu mibo tingmik tangbo lungga kamkhai mibo khatdi katikhai mibo hinase Iniu raokhai mibo-e.
Patuse lusu makhabo suanggase, Masanbo Hiupuina pumtan pen gasu paniu pagu ladlangtad maileng kadakhai mibo maidung khuga katikhai-e.

Pah shaimibo saiga jeng atai lungga pahai ringsulan mide chiubo malum masamak raleng paliu khuga pathak kengjiu madulen khai-e. Paliuniu patu ngao-e, khatdi Tingwang gu chawangdih lamga paniu paliu khuga dinkhaibi-e.
Sichiujiu paniu paliutu maluang tiu bamboga, paniu paliu khuga haibo chamtanse pikhai-e: “ Apiuniu ladriat khaibo kalen, Iniu naliu khuga dinmibo kalen situ Jerusalem phut makjiu khuanbamlo.
John niura tadui gasu nphumkhai-e chiudi pakak khat sailam naliutu Masanbo Hiupuina gasu nphumkhai bine.”
Khommaidung siniu Jesu khuga wang aruangboga, paliuniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Rapiu yo, tuhoira Israel mai wangdihse nang malan khaibi surama?”
Jesu niu paliu khuga din-e, “Pating nai pawan sira Apiu gu pumtanne, sichiujiu sidungse dedao ralo chiubo naliuniu sitang lulakge.

Chiudi Masanbo Hiupuina siniu naliu riga kiukhai bisai, naliu khuga pumtanniu phuimi sune, sichiujiu ajeng gasu naliuniu Jerusalem ga Judaea ga khatdi Samaria ga khatdi kadihpiri pamalan tangbo lamchap thiurabo-e.”
Haichiu dinlubo saiga, paliuniu patu phuibambo gasu patuse tinggen lam lukhang mide khatdi kamuang siniu patuse paliu mikphui gasu baimide.
Pah khangmibose paliuniu tingpuk lam phuijiu bamboga, kakabo pon piubo mai khangnianiu paliu ruangga wangnuang lujiu din-e,

“Galilee maidung yo, dekamjiu naliu chaplujiu tingpuk lamse phui bamjiulo? Haibo Jesu, naliu khugasu tinggen lam lukhang mibo haitu paniu tinggen lam khangmibo naliuniu ngaobo kumgapjiu pah wanglan rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu pakhommaidungse Olive Luong gasu mathakbam khat kumbo diubo Jerusalem namdi lamse malanwang mide.

Paliuniu namdi gase ngutlujiu paliuniu bambo kilung gase, Peter, John, Jacob nai Andrew, Philip nai Thomas, Bartholomew nai Matthew, Alphaeus nahpiu Jacob, palung thiubo Simon, Jacob nahpiu Juda, paliu ngut mide.
Paliuniu kakheng thiura maipuidung nai Jesu pui Mary khatdi pasingna maidung paliu hai wang aruang tan-tan-e.
Pakak khat saiga, malum maidung chamai kai-je-makai kumbo wang madui bamboga, Peter niu chapkhang lujiu dinsude.
“ Asingna maidung yo, Masanbo ariakga dinkhaibose wangtang raleng, David khu gasu Masanbo Hiupuina siniu din masuang khaimibo, Jesu tu minbo maidungtu majang khaibo Juda lamga-e.
Juda hai aliu ruanggasu khang khatle, palamra aliu tienkamga patudi jaora kadakhai mibo-e.”
Jerusalem ga lungbambo mai hinaniu sise chiuboga khatdi sibo luzam situ paliu lad gasu “Akeldama,” parambaniu “Tazai luzam” chiujiu ku-e).
‘Pakyse maruangbo thiu milo;
mai khatniudi siga lungta milo.’
Haichiudi raokhai bamme,
‘Pasung mai khatniu malinmi sulo.’
John niu tadui nphumbo cham dinron subo gasu Jesu tu tinggen lam lukhang mibo tingmik tangbo jaobambo mai khat thiurabo-e.”
Sijengniu paliuniu : Barsabbas kubo (Justus chiudi sibo) Joseph khatdi Matthias kubo mai khangniatu kada padde.
Sichiujiu paliu kakheng thiu-e “Rapiu, mai hina lungchun nang sijiu bamme, sijengniu haina kania ruanggasu nangniu len khailo.
Judas niu panuan jeng gasu tadrabo bamlam tadmibopiu malin ga ladlangtadbo tien thiura maitu lenkhailo.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu panai khangnia ruanggasu taden matai sude, siga Matthias tu kadalude, sichiujiu patuse ladlangtadmai khang kariu-je-khatkiu ruangga lukhaide.
Siga simak-dakjiu tingpuk lamsuniu tingkai katanbo hunwangbo kumjiu paliu bambo kyse chakhuan khatniu phuiting mide.
Siga chamipuang kumbo khatniu mai hina khuga niataobo paliuniu ngaode.
Paliu mathiuse Masanbo Hiupuina niu phuimide khatdi Hiupuina siniu paliutu npao ngamra pikhaibo jengniu khatniu khat lad gasu npao sude.
Sise Kadihpiri pabam machangna gasu tacheng matip maidung wang aruangbo bam, khatdi Jehudi mainiu lungbo bam Jerusalem si-e.
Paliuniu haibo khuanse chiuboga maidung kakengkha wang maduide. Paliu mathiuse paliu suang hamide, palamra malum maidungse paliu lad lad gasu dinbambose chiu-e.
Paliu suang hajiu paliuniu haichiu din-e, “Haichiujiu dinbam maidung haise Galilee maidung-e!
Sichiusai dechiujiu aliu mathiuniu aliu dih lad ronna gasu dinbo chiubam jiulo?
Aliu hai Parthia, Media, Elam, Mesopotamia, Judea, Cappadocia Pontus, Asia,
Phrygia, Pamphylia, Egypt khatdi Cyrene mung Libia luongren gasu-e. Aliu khangsia maira Rome gasu-e,

Jehudi maidung khatdi Nkeng maidung, Jehudi mai racheng lumaidung di-e, khatdi aliu khangsia maira Crete nai Arabia gasu-e; chiudi Tingwang niu tenkhaibo tiendi haigasu aliu mathiuniu aliu lad gasu paliuniu dinbambo hai chiude!”
Maisuang haboniu phuilujiu paliuniu khat-khat khuga maniu sude, “Haise degu rambalo?”
Chiudi khangsia maidung siniu, malum maidung situ nuimenjiu din-e, “Haise jawsak maniu maidung-e!”

Siga Peter niu ladlangtadmai khang kariu-je-khatkiu situ majang chapsu lujiu pakhuan tanjiu maidung khuga dinsude: “Singna Jehudi maidung nai Jerusalem ga lungbam mai naliu mathiu akhuan nking khailo, Iniu haibo rambase naliu khuga dinkhai bine.
Naliuniu maningbo kumjiu maidung haise jaw sak maniubo makge, tuhoira nsuan wanchak chakiu ronna kha-e.
Chiudi haise phaimiukakung Joel niu dinkhai mibo si-e:
Iniu ahiupuina mai hina riga runkiu khaibine.
Naliu nahpui—nahpiudungniu aladse dinsune;
naliugu chabuan maidungniu madungao ngao sune,
khatdi kating maidung siniu chamang mansune.
Yo, Iniu avangpiudung khatdi avangpuidung riga
sibo tingmik gase agu hiupuina runkiu khai bine, sichiujiu paliuniu aladse dinpad sune.
Tinggen lamdi, kadihri gadi, Iniu maisuang kahabose kam khaine.
Siga tazai, chami khatdi mikhut padsune,
siga naimikse tamiuwang mine, khatdi chahiuse tazai kumjiu hengwang mine,
Rapiu gu kadibo khatdi kendibo Tingmikse wangtang makhaga haidungse padsune.
Sichiujiu Rapiu tu kumai hinatu gukhai bine.’

“Singna--Israel maidung yo, haibo ladkengse hai nking khailo! Nazareth Jesu hai chamaina khatle sichiujiu pagu chara pumtan pen gasu tasibo khatdi maisuang habo tiendung hinase Tingwang niu pakhu gasu naliutu kamlen khaibi-e. Naliu pumsiakniu haise sijiu bambo-e, palamra haise naliu ruanggasu kamkhai mibo-e.
Tingwang niu pachun saisuijiu Jesu haitu naliu ben-ga pikhaira chapkhai mibo-e; sichiujiu naliuniu patuse nuan phungmai khuga pikhaijiu patuse jumasengjiu naliuniu kamshat mibo-e.
Chiudi Tingwang niu patuse kashaibo pumtan gasu phutkhai bijiu piringsu khai mibo-e, palamra kashaibo siniu patu bangman ngam makge.
Palamra David niu palamga haichiujiu dinmibo-e,
‘Pawan machang Rapiu tu Iniu ngao-e; pah akhuga manajiu bamme, siniu I magenthiu chariubo daolakge.
Siniu achun wibo phui bamme, khatdi aladkeng hai ringaboniu phui-e.
I hai, hamirabo pum thiujiu bamdi, achun wijiu bamme,
Palamra charuidihga atu phutkhai lakge;
navangtu charaw lungga piten khai lakge.
Karingbo npuise atu lenkhaibi-e,
nangniu maluang khaibo jengniu, achun ringa saomakjiu bamme,’
“Asingna maidung yo, Iniu naliu khuga aliu pao kadibo Chawang David lamga masanjiu dinkhaine. Pah shaimide khatdi patu nphum mide, sichiujiu parawse thainai tangbo aliu khuga bamme.
Pahai phaimiukakung khatle, sichiujiu Tingwang niu paleng ladriat khaibo paniu si-e: Tingwang niu ladriat thiukhai-e, chiubora paniu David kaikik gasu David kumgapjiu chawang khat pithiu khaine.
Tingwang niu pasai kana nde kamkhai ralo chiubose David niu ngao kamigu-e, sichiujiu paniu Messiah ringsu lanrabo lamga haichiujiu dinkhai mibo-e.
‘Patuse charuidihga phutkhai lakge;
paphawse charaw lungga tenmi lakge.’
Tingwang niu haibo Jesu siaktu kashaibo gasu piringsu khai mibo-e, sichiujiu sibo lamga aliu mathiu hai lamchap-e.

Patuse Papiu Tingwang ben jatlam piringsu khai mibo-e, khatdi paniu ladriat khaibo kumjiu paniu Masanbo Hiupuinase pakhugasu daolubo-e. Naliuniu tuhoi ngaobo nai chiubo haise paniu aliu riga runkiu khaibibo pagu kalen si-e.
Palamra tinggen lam khangbose David pah makge, chiudi paniu haichiu dinmibo-e,
‘Rapiu niu Arapiu khuga din-e:
Iniu nagu mikremai situ naphipan pithiu khai makthen,
aben majadlam ntao bamlo.’
“Sijengniu Israel maidung hinaniu haise masanjiu silulo chiubora naliuniu jumasengjiu kamshat mibo Jesu siaktu Tingwang niu pijiu Rapiu khatdi Messiah pithiu khai mibo-e!”
Haise maidung siniu chiuboga paliu lung chariuboniu phuimide sichiujiu Peter nai ladlangtadmaidung khugase din-e, “Aliuniu degu kamralo singna maidung yo?”

Peter niu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu mai hina pa-nuan nuan gasu maripad lujiu Jesu Khrista zan gasu tadui nphum lulo, sichiusai naliu nuandungse kuak khai bine khatdi naliuniu Tingwang gu kalen Masanbo Hiupuina hai daolune.
Palamra Tingwang niu naliuleng khatdi naliu nahdung leng khatdi pakhu gasu diujiu tadmibo mai hinaleng aliu Rapiu Tingwang pakhuga wangra ladrian thiukhai mibo-e.”
Peter niu paliu khuga din-e khatdi ladkeng katam-tamboniu paliu khuga tanjiu din-e, “Kasabo maidung riga wangkinbo mathad gasu naliu mari lulo!”
Maidung kakeng khaniu pachamse malum lujiu tadui nphum lude, khatdi sibo naise maidung sang sum kumbo paliu phom gase wangsan lude.
Paliuniu ladlangtadmaidung khugasu katijiu chakin thiu khaide, khatdi chakin thiubogu maluad nai kakheng thiubo gase paliu chunkhat thiude.
Tasibodung khatdi maisuang habodung wajiukha ladlangtadmaidung khugasu tenkhai-e, sichiujiu mai hina pingboniu phui mide.
Malum maidung hina chunkhat thiujiu chakin kawi thiujiu paliugu kabambo hina mathiugu thiujiu bamme.
Paliuniu paliugu kabambo maniadung jonlujiu pageng bammaidung leng njan khaijiu bamme.
Naimachangna paliuniu Charakyga phom khat thiujiu wang aruang-e, khatdi paliu ky-ky lam chunwijiu maluadse mai hina chunkhat thiujiu tiu machamjiu bamme.
Tingwang tu thuonjiu mai hina chunchamjiu tiu aruang-ruang-e. Sichiujiu naimachangna Rapiu niu rankhai maidungtu paliu phomga pikhai san-sanjiu bamme.
Naikhat Peter nai John kakheng thiura Charaky lam chawan wanchak sum ningga tadle.
Siga Mataiwibo Rengmun kubo gase papui wonlung gasu paphi sajiu manabo maipiu khat bamniu-e. Naimachangna patuse Charakyga tadmai khuga takhengra sibo rengmun-ga patu phungmeng khai bambo-e.
Peter nai John tadngutbo ngaoboga paniu takheng lan sude.
Panainiu patuse matingjiu phui-e khatdi Peter niu din-e, “Anai khulam phuilo!”
Sijengniu, panai khugasu wakhat daosune chiujiu panaitu paniu phuijiu bamde.
Chiudi Peter niu pakhuga din-e, “Akhuga kachia rangkang wadi ha-e, chiudi akhuga kabambo Iniu nakhuga pikhai bine; Nazareth Jesu Khrista zan gasu Iniu natu chamtan pibo-e, sulujiu tadsulo!”
Sichiujiu paniu paben majatlamse julujiu pi chapkhang khaide. Siga paphi nai paphimikse tannuang mide;
sichiujiu pase machao sude, khatdi chapkhangjiu tadmariu sude. Sichiujiu paniu panai saisui lujiu Charaky lungga tad mariujiu khatdi machaojiu Tingwang tu thuonsude.
Paniu Tingwang tu thuonjiu tad mariu kinbose maidung siniu ngaode,
pahai Mataiwibo Rengmun-ga ntao lujiu takheng bambo piusi-e chiubo paliuniu siluboga, pakhuga degu padmi jiulo chiubo maningkhai lujiu paliu suang hamide
Sichiujiu sibo piu siniu Solomon Kahun kubo gase Peter nai John tu julujiu bamboga paliu suang hajiu, paliu mungga pakwang karen sude.

Peter niu maidung situ ngaoboga, paliu khuga din-e, “Singna—Israel maidung yo, dekamjiu haiga naliu suang hajiu, aliutu matingjiu phuibam jiulo? Hainapiu haitu pitad khaibo haise aliugu pumtanniu maksai characheng tadbo gasu-e chiubo naliuniu maning jiuma?

Abraham, Isaac khatdi Jacob Rawang, khatdi aliu paopeh Rawang niu pavangpiu Jesu khuga kendibo pikhai mibo-e. Chiudi naliuniu patuse pumtan thinmaidung khuga pikhai mibo khatdi naliuniu Pilate masuangga patu suikhai makjiu, Pilate niu patu phutkhai mira maning bamdi naliuniu patu suikhai makbo-e.
Pahai masanbo-e khatdi kawibo-e, chiudi chamaitu kagibo piutu naliuleng phutkhai bira naliuniu Pilate khuga khenglubo-e.
Naliutu karingbo npuilam jukhaibo piu situ kamshat mide, chiudi Tingwang niu patuse kashaibo gasu piringsu khailan bide, haise aliuniu lamchap-e.

Paphi sabo piu haitu pumtan pikhaibo haise pazan pumtan siniu-e. Naliuniu ngaobo khatdi sibo haise pazan-ga malumbo gasu tenkhai bibo-e; sichiujiu naliu mathiuniu ngaobambo hai Jesu tu malumbo gasu patu wikhai mibo-e.
“Tuhoira, asingna maidung yo, Iniu silude chiubora naliuniu khatdi naliugu jupaodung siniu Jesu khuga kamkhai mibose, naliu simak gasu-e.
Nda karaiga Tingwang niu pagu phaimiukakung maidung khuga pisikhai mibo-e chiubora pagu Messiah hai chariu khengrabo-e; sise haichiujiu piwangtang khaira kamkhai mibo-e.
Sijengniu, naliu lungli lulo, khatdi Tingwang khulam mariwang lulo, sichiusai paniu naliu nuanse kuak khai bine.
Sichiusai, hiupuina tankhai bibo wanse Rapiu khugasu wangne, khatdi naliuleng kadakhai mibo Messiah Jesu tu paniu langkhai bine.
Nda karaiga Tingwang niu pagu masanbo phaimiukakung maidung khuga pisikhai mibo kumjiu mania hina kamsan lanmak then pase tinggen lam bammi rabo-e.

Palamra Mose niu din-e, ‘Rapiu naliu Rawang siniu atu langkhaibo kumjiu phaimiukakung khattu naliu khuga langwangne, khatdi pase naliu ruang gasu padrabo-e. Paniu kadinbo hinase naliuniu majai rabo-e.
Mai khatniu sibo phaimiukakung ladse piumak sai, patu Tingwang maidung khugasu luthon lujiu kam mahami rabo-e.’
Sichiujiu Samuel gasu sujiu phaimiukakung hina khatdi pasailam wangmai hinaniu tuhoi ken-ga padbambo hinase din masuang kamigu-e.

Tingwang niu pagu phaimiukakungdung khugasu ladriat thiukhai mibose naliuleng-e, khatdi Tingwang niu naliu pao-pehmai khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo gase naliu jaomide. Paniu Abraham khuga dinkhai mibo kumjiu, ‘Iniu nakai-kik gasu kadihpiri mai hinatu thoikhai bine.’
Sijengniu Tingwang niu Pavangpiu situ kadalujiu, naliu khuga langkhaibo-e, sichiujiu mai hina naliu nuan gasu lungli lusai, naliutu thoikhai birabo-e.”
Peter nai John niu maidung khuga haichiu dinjiu bamboga, singkudung, Charaky akhe maidung khatdi Sadducee maidung khangsia wangde.
Paliuse aman tamide palamra ladlangtadmai khangnia siniu kashaibo gasu Jesu tu piringsu mide chiubo maidung khuga katikhaijiu bamme, haisiniu kashaimai ringsu lanne chiubo dinlen bambo-e.
Sijengniu paliuniu panaitu minlujiu kavangkyga pasaibo nai tangbo khai mide, palamra haise rimibo wan-e.
Chiudi tachamse chiulumai kakeng khaniu malumde, sichiujiu paliuse chamai sang mangiu kumbo tangmide.
Pasaibo naise Jehudi maigu jupaodung, kating maidung khatdi Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung Jerusalem ga wang maduide.
Paliuniu Dibo Singku Annas khatdi Caiaphas, John, Alexander, khatdi Dibo Singku kiriangmai mathiutu wang adaode.
Paliuniu ladlangtadmai situ paliu suangga pichap khai lujiu panai khuga maniu-e, “Nanainiu haise dechiu kamjiulo? Degu pumtan, maksai sao zan gasu haise nanainiu kamjiulo?”
Peter niu, Masanbo Hiupuina phuilujiu paliutu paokakge, “Maidunggu jupaodung khatdi kating maidung yo,
Paphi sabo piu situ wikhai mibo lamga thainai aliu khuga maniu bamsai,

naliu mathiuniu khatdi Israel mai mathiuniu sibambo-e, chiubora naliu masuangga chapbambo piu haitu naliuniu masengshat mibo chiudi Tingwang niu kashaibo gasu piringsu khai mibo Nazareth Jesu Khrista zan gasu piwi masan khai mibo-e.
Jesu haise Masanbo ariakniu dinbo si-e,
‘Naliu chaky kathiu maidungniu thonmibo
tukang situ kungthubo ndangtiang pithiu khai rabo-e.’
Juringbose pakhu gasu ronna-e; pakhu gasu makjiu aliutu rankhaira kadihpiriga kaki ha-e.”

Apaimaidung siniu Peter nai John gu kahubose ngaoluboga paliu suang hamide, sichiujiu paliuse wadi makbo tasi-ningting kahamai-e chiubo silude. Paliu hai Jesu tu maluang chaka thiukhai mibo maidung-e chiubo paliuniu silude.
Chiudi paliuniu wadi dinra hamide, palamra wikhai mibo piuse Peter nai John tu maluang lujiu siga chap bamme.
Sijengniu paliuniu Apaimai bamse phutlujiu tadmira panai khuga chamtan pikhaide, sichiujiu paliu ronna ari sude.

“Haibo maidung haitu aliuniu nde kamralo?” chiujiu paliu maniu sude. “Jerusalem ga lungbam mai hinaniu haikumbo tasibo tienkam hai paliu khugasu kamkhai bi-e chiubo sibamme, khatdi aliuniu haise suimakbo thiu silakge.
Chiudi haibo chamse maidung khuga Jesu zan gasu dinlan makra aliuniu paliutu chamtan pikhe.”
Sijengniu paliuniu paliutu ku malan ngutlujiu, wakam tadi Jesu zan gasu din makra maksai katikhai makra paliu khuga dinkhaide.
Chiudi Peter nai John niu paliutu paokakge, “Naliu ronna Tingwang suangga ladjan thiululo, naliu kadin piurama maksai Tingwang kadin piuralo.
Palamra aliu pumsiakniu ngaomibo khatdi chiumibose aliuniu dinmak silakge.”
Sijengniu Apaimaidung siniu panaitu ru-katinkhai lujiu phut mide. Paliutu kam mathad khaira leng daolakge chiubo paliuniu ngao-e, palamra mai hinaniu padmibo lamga Tingwang tu thuonjiu bamme.
Tasibo tienkam niu wikhai mibo piu haise takum atai rilam khang mibo piu-e.
Peter nai John tu phutkhai gap chiuboga, panainiu paliu phomga wanglujiu singku paodung khatdi kating maidungniu degu dinkhailo chiubo paliu khuga wang paokhaide.
Haise malum maidungniu chiuboga, paliu mathiu aruang lujiu Tingwang khuga kakheng thiude: “Ting-kadih khatdi sibo lungga bambo wahinatu Dampao khatdi Papaopiu yo!
Masanbo Hiupuina pen gasu aliu pao David, navangpiu khuga nangniu haichiu dinkhaibo-e,
‘Dekamjiu Nkeng maidung pom bamjiulo;
dekamjiu paliuniu gengmakbo maningbam jiulo?
Rapiu riga khatdi pagu Messiah riga, kadihpiri wangdungniu atung bamme,
khatdi mawangpaodung siniu suimakjiu bamme.”
Nangniu khatdi nagu pumtan nai nachunniu kadenkhai mibo hina situ atung raleng wang madui bamme.
Sichiujiu tuhoira, Rapiu yo, paliuniu aliutu kapinjiu bambo haise phui khailo, sichiujiu navangmai aliuniu nachamse hujiu dinlura suikhailo.
Nagu masanbo Vangpiu Jesu zan gasu tasibo khatdi maisuang habo tienkam kamlura khatdi thiuniubo wilura naben jusung khailo.”
Sichiujiu paliuniu khenglubo sai, paliu madui bambo bamse malai wangde. Paliu mathiuse Masanbo Hiupuina niu phuilujiu Tingwang chamse hujiu dinsude.
Ladlangtadmaidung siniu pumtan jaojiu Rapiu Jesu ringsulan mibo lamga jengdin thiu-e, siga Tingwang niu paliu mathiu riga thoidam dijiu pikhai bide.
Paliu ruangga mai khat lengdi tangmakbo thiumakge, Paky, palu bammaidung siniu jonlujiu daobo rangkangse,
phungwangjiu ladlangtadmai khuga pikhaijiu mai hinaleng pageng bambo saisuijiu njan khaijiu bamde.
Sichiujiu Cyprus gasu manabo Joseph, Levi mai khat ladlangtadbo, Barnabas kubo (parambaniu “Lungtu pikhaibibo”) siniu,
palu bambose jonlujiu rangkangse ladlangtadmai khuga phungwang pikhaide.
Chiudi Ananias kubo piu khatniu, panao Sapphira tu maluang lujiu pagu mania kabambo kasia jon mide.
Chiudi panaotu chunkhat thiulujiu rangkang kasialam paleng masiak lujiu kasia lamse ladlangtadmai khuga phungwang pikhaide.
Peter niu pakhuga din-e, “Ananias yo, dekamjiu Satan siniu natu thinman lujiu nangniu Masanbo Hiupuina khuga aratjiu nagu mania man kasialam naleng masiaklu jiulo?
Nangniu sise jon makhaga nagu thiujiu bambo-e, sichiusai dekamjiu haikumbo ngam kamra nangniu maning jiulo? Nangniu chamai khuga aratbo makge, chiudi nangniu Tingwang khuga aratbo-e!”
Haise Ananias niu chiugap, kaokiujiu shaimide; haise mai hinaniu chiulujiu pingboniu phui mide.
Chabon maidungniu wangjiu paphawse domlujiu ponpad baimide.
Wanchak sum kumbo sailam, degu padmilo chiubo simakjiu panaose wangde.
Peter niu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nakygu mania manse haironna nakina nanainiu daobo ma, akhuga pachang dinlo?”
“Yo, haironna kha-e,” chiujiu paniu paokakge.
Sijengniu Peter niu pakhuga din-e, “Dekamjiu nakina nanainiu Rapiu gu Hiupuinatu madiura maning jiulo? Nakinatu bai maidungse kamunkiga tuhoi bamkha-e, paliuniu natudi ponpadmi rabo-e!”
Sichiugap pase kaokiujiu paphiga shaimide. Chabon maidungse ngutjiu phuiboga padi shaimide, sichiujiu paliuniu patudi ponpad lujiu pakina mungga baikhai mide.
Phumlingmai hina khatdi haise chiulubo mai hina pingboniu phui mide.
Ladlangtadmaidung siniu maidung ruangga tasibo nai maisuang habodung kengjiu kamkhaide. Sichiujiu malum maidung hinaniu Solomon gu Kahun gase wang maduide.
Maidungniu paliutu din madijiu bamdi lenlam bammaidung mai khatniudi paliu phomga jaohu makge.
Chiudi paliu phom gase maidung kengbi-bijiu Rapiu tu malumjiu maipui maipiu kengbi-bi khang mide.
Sichiubo jengniu mara-sathiumai kakeng khatu npuiki gase taziga khatdi kasingga majikhaijiu Peter hiumana tadi pijiu niatao khaira ponpad khaide.
Sichiujiu Jerusalem wonjengga lungbam maidung siniu mara-sathiumai maksai kasabo hiuna phungbo maidungtu maluang wangjiu mathiutu piwi khaide.
Sijengniu Dibo Singku khatdi pakahmaidung hina, khatdi Sadducee mai lam ponmai hinase ladlangtadmaidung tu manmachang manma sude; sichiujiu paliuniu wakhat kamra rang sude.
Paliuniu ladlangtadmaidungtu minlujiu mathiugu kavangkyga pikhai sude.
Chiudi sibo nai nchunse Rapiu gu mazaniu kavangky rengmunse lekhaijiu ladlangtadmaidungtu phutkhaijiu paliu khuga din-e,
“Charakygase tadlujiu haibo kasanbo ringting lamga maidung khuga dinkhai bilo.”
Sibo cham situ ladlangtadmaidung siniu majaijiu nsuan kalu Charaky lunggase ngutlujiu katikhai sude.
Dibo Singku nai pakahmaidung siniu Jehudi maigu katingmai hinatu aruang lujiu Apaimaitu ku maduide; sichiujiu paliuniu ladlangtadmaidungtu paliu masuangga puiwangra chamtan pijiu langkhaide.
Chiudi chakampaodung siniu kavangky mengboga ladlangtadmaidung situ daomakge, sijengniu malanwang Apaimai khuga paokhaide,
“Aliuniu kavangkyga mengtangboga pakhiangnase khamja khamten khai nbamme khatdi akhe maidungse rengmun situ akhejiu bamme; chiudi aliuniu rengmunse lepadboga, mai khatnakha tudi aliuniu daomakge!”
Haise singku paodung khatdi Charaky akhe maidungniu chiuboga ladlangtadmaidung khuga degu padmi jiulo chiujiu paliu suang hamide.
Siga maipiu khatniu wanglujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Phuilo! Naliuniu kavangkyga khaimi maidungse Charakyga maidungtu katikhaijiu bamme!”
Sijengniu chakampao siniu pamaidungtu puilujiu ladlangtadmaidung situ majang wangde. Paliuniu pumtan thinmakge, palamra maidungniu paliutu tatu rotratu ping-e.
Paliuniu ladlangtadmaidung situ puiwang Apaimai masuangga pichap khaide, siga Dibo Singku siniu paliu khuga maniude.

Paniu din-e, “Naliuniu hainapiu zan gasu katikhai makra aliuniu chamtan pikhai mibo-e, chiudi phuilo naliuniu kambo haise degulo! Paniu shai mibose Jerusalem pakhiangnaga aliu don-e chiubo naliuniu dinron bambo-e!”
Siga Peter khatdi ladlangtadmaidung siniu paokakge, “Aliuniu chamai kadin makjiu Tingwang kadin piurabo-e.
Naliuniu singchai riga natri gianjiu kamshat mibo sai, aliu pao-pehmai Rawang siniu Jesu tu kashaibo gasu piringsu khai mibo-e.
Tingwang niu patu paben jatlam pi ntaokhai lujiu Jupao khatdi Ranpao pithiu khaijiu, Israel maidung lungli lura khatdi paliu nuan kuak khaira pawan pikhai bide.
Aliuniu haibo lamga jengdin thiubo-e. Pagu kadinpiumai khuga Tingwang kalen thiujiu Masanbo Hiupuina haise pikhaibo-e.”
Haise Apaimaidung siniu chiuluboga paliu lung thiuboniu phui mide sichiujiu, ladlangtadmaidung situ kamshatra rangsude.

Chiudi paliu ruanggasu mai mathiuniu chakhuang thiu bambo Pharisee maipiu khat, pazanniu Gamaliel kubo, Tacheng-tajaigu katipao khat, paniu Apaibam gasu chapsude. Ladlangtadmaidung situ puipad mira paniu chamtan pikhaide,
khatdi paniu Apaimai khuga din-e, “Singna Israel maidung yo, naliuniu haimaidung riga degu kamralo chiubo ningting silulo.

Nda pakak khatga Theudas niu pah kadimai khatle chiujiu madubo khatdi chamai kai madai kumboniu pasai suitad khai mibo situ maningtaolo. Chiudi patuse kamshat miboga, pasai suimai hinase pak marakam mide, sichiujiu pagu tienkam hina hamide.
Sibo saiga Galilee mai Juda kubopiu siniudi mairiak chakbo tingga padlan-e, sichiujiu pasaidi maidung kengjiu suitad khai mibo-e, chiudi patu kamshat miboga pasai suimaidungse hakam mide.

Sijengniu haibo lamga naliu khuga Iniu dinbo-e, haimaidung riga wadi kamkhai tulo. Paliutu paliu khenrang thiujiu phutkhai milo! Paliuniu maning bambo nai kambambose chamaina gu-e chiusai hami rabo-e.
Chiudi haise Tingwang khugasu wangbo-e sai naliuniu paliutu ngamlu lakge. Naliu ronna Tingwang tu charithiu bambo-e!” Gamaliel niu dinbose Apaibao siniu suikhaide.
Paliuniu ladlangtadmaidung situ ku-ngut lujiu khatdi dapkhai lujiu Jesu zan gasu wadaodi dinlan makra chamtan pikhai lujiu paliutu phutkhai mide.
Apaibao siniu Ladlangtadmaidung situ suikhaibo tingga paliu chun wimide, palamra paliuniu Jesu zan-ga mangambo hai bui-e chiubo Tingwang niu lukhai bide.
Sichiujiu naimachang Charakyga khatdi maidung kyga paliuniu Jesu hai Messiah si-e chiubo Kawibo Champaose katikhaide khatdi dinron khaide.

Sichiujiu pakhommaidungse kengkhang mibo donniu Greek lad dinbo Jehudi mai nai padihga Jehudi mai kakga ari-arabo padsude. Greek lad dinbo Jehudi mainiu paliugu kamipuidungtu naimachang njan bambo ramkhaga wajeng sikhai makge chiujiu dinsude.
Sijengniu pakhommaidung khang kariu-je-niakiu siniu malum maidung mathiutu ku-aruang lujiu din-e, “Aliuniu tasen-chalan thinbo lam gasu Tingwang lad dinronbotu phutbo sui makge.
Sijengniu singna maidung yo, naliu ruang gasu Masanbo Hiupuina phuibo, chakhan chara habo khatdi ningtingmai khang chinniatu kada padlo, sichiujiu aliuniu paliutu haibo lamga pikhai bine.
Sichiusai aliu pum hai aliuniu kakheng thiubo nai dinronbo ngamga pipad lubui-e.

Khommaidung siniu dinbose mathiuniu chunwijiu, paliuniu malumbo khatdi Masanbo Hiupuina niu phuibo pazanniu: Stephen, Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmena khatdi Antioch ga bambo Nkengmai piu Jehudi chengga ngutrai thubo Nicolaus paliutu kada lude.
Haimaidung situ paliuniu pakhommaidung khuga pikhaijiu, paliuniu paliu pi kaba khaijiu kakheng thiu khaide.
Haichiujiu Tingwang ladkeng hai dinron sude. Jerusalem ga pakhommaidung riakse haichiu kengbi-bi khangde; khatdi singkudung kengkha niudi malumbo situ lukhaide.
Tingwang niu dijiu thoikhai bibo khatdi pumtanniu phuibo, Stephen niu tasibo khatdi maisuang habodungse kengjiu maidung ruangga kamkhaide.

Chiudi patuse, maduikyga bammai Cyrene nai Alexandria lamsu wangbo khenrang thiumai-e chiujiu kubo Jehudi maidung siniu suini makge. Paliuniu Cilicia nai Asia lamsu wangmai Jehudi maidungtu aruang lujiu Stephen tu ari sude.
Chiudi Hiupuina siniu Stephen tu ningting pikhaijiu paniu dinboga, paliuniu patu arikao ngamlak mide.
Sijengniu paliuniu maidung khangsiatu tanim thiulujiu haichiu din-e, “Paniu Mose nai Tingwang tu suimakbo cham dinbo aliu chiu-e!”
Sichiujiu paliuniu maidungtu, kating maidungtu khatdi Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodungtu thin karung khaide. Paliuniu Stephen tu minlujiu Apaimaidung masuangga puiwangde.
Sichiujiu paliuniu pariga aratbo madam khaira maidung khangsiatu majang wang-e. Paliuniu din-e, “Hainapiu siniu pawan machang masanbo Raky nai Mose gu Tacheng-tajaitu suimakbo cham dinbo-e.
Nazareth Jesu niu Charaky haitu rathon lujiu khatdi Mose gu Tacheng-tajai hina kam kalikam mine chiu paniu dinbo aliu chiu-e!”
Apai bamga ntaobammai hinaniu Stephen tu matingjiu phui-e, siga pazuse maza zu kumjiu paliuniu ngao-e.
Dibo Singku siniu Stephen khuga maniu-e, “Haise kachangbo ma?”
‘Nakikhun khatdi nagu kadihtu phutlujiu Iniu natu lenkhai rabo kadih lamse tadlulo.’
Sijengniu paniu pagu kadihtu phutlujiu Haran lam lungra tadde. Abraham piu shaimibo saiga, Tingwang niu patu tuhoi naliuniu lungbambo kadih haiga piwang lung khaibi-e.

Tingwang niu Abraham leng chiujiu kadih poi chakhet phandi pikhai makge, chiudi Tingwang niu sise paleng pikhai bine khatdi pagu hinase pakai-kik leng pikhai bine chiu ladriat thiukhai bide. Tingwang niu ladriat thiukhaibo wan gase Abraham panah hakha-e.
Tingwang niu haichiujiu pakhuga dinkhai-e: ‘Nakai-kikdung siniu maidihlam lungtadjiu kavang thiune, siga paliutu takum kai madai kamre khaine.
Chiudi Iniu paliutu kavang pithiu khai mai riga ladjan thiu khaine, sichiujiu paliuniu sibo dih gasu padlubo sai haibo bamga paliuniu atu kahum rabo-e.’

Sigasu ladriatgu madan thiujiu Tingwang niu Abraham tu chagi rombo hai tenkhai bide. Sijengniu Abraham niu Isaac tu lunglubo sai jeng tachadbo naise pagi romme, Isaac niu panah Jacob tu pagi romme; khatdi Jacob niu panah khang kariu-je-niakiu aliu jatgu kadibo paodungtu paliu gi romme.

Joseph niu Egypt gu chawang suangga wangboga, Tingwang niu patu lungsabo lunlung nai ningting pikhai bide, sijengniu chawangniu Joseph tu chawang kilungga khatdi Egypt pakhiangnagu dihthinpao pithiu khaibide.
Sigasu Egypt khatdi Canaan dih pakhiangna charakhum kadibo wangjiu pi chariukhai bide. Siga aliu pao-peh maidung katiu wakhatdi daota mide,
sichiujiu Egypt dihga miusy kengbamme chiubo Jacob niu chiuboga paniu panahdung, aliu pao-peh maidung situ siga langkhai-e, haise paliu phiken karaibo si-e.
Niabo phiken gase Joseph niu pasingnamaidung khuga patu pisilen khai bide, khatdi Egypt maigu chawangniu Joseph kykhun maitu silude.
Sichiujiu Joseph niu papiu Jacob khatdi pakikhunmai mathiu, pakhiangna khang riakchinnia-je-mangiukiu haitu Egypt dihga wangra tacham pikhaide.
Sigasu Jacob niu Egypt dihga tadde, siga pah khatdi panahmaidung shaikhai mide.
Paliu phawdungse Shechem ga, nda Abraham niu Hamor mai khugasu liukhai bambo raw gase phungmeng nphum khaide.
Kanamboga Joseph tu simakbo chawang khatniu Egypt dihga mawangde.
Paniu aliu pao-peh maidung situ tasiam kamjiu, paliu nah npamnadungtu lenlam thon khaijiu pishai mira kam sude.
Haibo tinggase palun kawibo ngena Mose tu manade.
Patuse chaky gasu thonpadbo gasu chawang nahpui siniu panah kumjiu makuat khangsude.
Patuse Egypt maigu tasi-ningting hina katikhai bijiu pase pagu lad-liuga khatdi pagu tienkamga kendibo mai thiukhangde.
Egypt mai khangkhatniu paliu mai khangkhattu kam masa bamniubo paniu ngaolujiu sibo khum ruijiu Egypt maipiu situ kamshat mide.
(Sichiujiu patu hai Tingwang niu thinlujiu paliutu khenrang thiujiu phutkhai raleng kambo-e, chiudi sise paliura sitanglu makge).
Pasaibo naise Israel mai khangnia n-gi bamniubo paniu ngaolujiu mata khaide. Paniu din-e, ‘Phuilo nanai haira Israel mai kamna-e; dekamjiu nanai haichiu n-gi bamjiulo?’
Chiudi kam masa bambopiu siniu Mose tu tunthon mide khatdi paniu din-e, “Saoniu natu aliu riga mawangra khatdi ladjan thiura pikhai jiulo?
Danai nangniu Egypt maipiu khattu kamshat mibo kumjiu atudi kamshat mine chiujiu ma?’
Haise Mose niu chiuboga, Egypt dih gasu paktad mide khatdi Midian kadih lam lungmide. Siga panah piumai khangnia lungde.
Sise Mose niu ngaoboga pasuang hamide, khatdi sise degulo chiubo phui mawira paniu chaphejiu mung gase tadwang manade. Siga paniu Rapiu khuanse chiude:
‘I hai napao-napehmai Rawang-e; Abraham, Isaac khatdi Jacob paliu Rawang-e.’ Siga Mose pingboniu masandi-di mide khatdi degulo chiubo phuihu tamide.
Rapiu niu pakhuga din-e, ‘Naphitopse lupad milo, palamra nangniu chapbambo hai masanbo bamsi-e.

Amaidungniu Egypt dihga chariu magenthiu bambose Iniu ngaode. Paliuniu kap-kiamjiu bambose Iniu chiulujiu paliutu khenrang pithiu khaira wangbo-e. Wanglo, tuhoi natu Iniu Egypt dihga langkhai rabo-e.’
Paniu maidungtu Egypt dih gasu maluang padjiu tasibo khatdi maisuang habo hai Egypt dihga khatdi Hengbo Duipui ga khatdi ramjingga takum atai kamkhai mibo-e.
Israel mai khuga dinbose Mose niu-e, ‘Atu langkhaibo kumjiu, Tingwang niu phaimiukakung khat langwangne, khatdi pase naliu ruang gasu rabo-e.’
Pahai ramjingga aliu pao-pehmai dungtu majang lujiu, Sinai Luongga mazaniu patu npaokhai mibo si-e, sichiujiu Tingwang gu karingbo chamse aliuleng dinkhai bibo-e.
“Chiudi paniu dinbose aliu paopehmai siniu piuni makge; paliuniu patu tunpad lujiu, Egypt dihlam paliu malan mira maning-e.
Sijengniu Aaron khuga paliuniu din-e, ‘Aliutu majang khaira chara khat damkhailo. Egypt dih gasu aliutu majang padbo piu Mose khuga degu padmilo chiubo sita mide.’
Sichiujiu paliuniu matomchi meng khat kamlujiu, siga charathiu sude, khatdi paliuniu kamlubo gase chakhuang thiubo thiujiu changi sude.
Sijengniu paliu khugasu Tingwang niu mari mide khatdi tinggen gu chagandungtu kahumra pikhaide, haise phaimiukakung ariakkhuangga raokhai mibo kumbo-e:
‘Israel mai yo! Naliuniu ramjingga,
khaoring gikhaijiiu charathiu khai mibo takum ataise akhuga makge.’
Naliuniu ponkhai mibo mathenky se Molech gu-e,
khatdi Rephan se naliugu chagan rameng-e;
sise naliuniu kahumra damlubo rameng-e.
Sijengniu Iniu naliutu Babylon hugenlam kavang thiura langkhai mine.’

Pasai kanalam aliu paopehmai siniu paliu piudung khugasu daobo kumjiu sibo mathenkyse paliuniu Joshua saisui tadboga pontadle khatdi paliu masuangga Tingwang niu hathon khaibo kadih lamse pontadle. Sise David ken katangbo bamniu-e.
Paniu Tingwang masuangga lungsabo daolujiu Jacob Rawang tu pibam khairabo bam khengjiu daolude.
Chiudi paleng chaky thiukhaibo sira Solomon niu-e.
“Chiudi Kukachangbo Rawang sira chamainiu thiubo kyga lungmakge; haise phaimiukakungniu dinmibo kumbo-e,
khatdi kadih haise aphipan-e, chiujiu Rapiu niu din-e.
Dekumbo ky naliuniu aleng thiuralo?
Dekumbo bamga I lungralo?
Pakhiangna haise Iniu dambo makma?’

Naliu pao-peh mainiu kam mathad khaimakbo phaimiukakung bamma? Pagu tacheng matipbo Vangpiu wangrabo lamga dinkhaibo Tingwang gu ladlangtadmaidung situ paliuniu kamshat mibo-e. Sichiujiu tuhoi naliuniu sibo Vangpiu situ jonkhai lubo saiga kamshat mibo-e.
Naliuniu Tingwang gu tacheng-tajai haise maza khugasu daolubo-e chiudi naliuniu sise majai makge!”
Apaimaidung siniu Stephen ladse chiuluboga paliu lung pom matan sude sichiujiu paliu hiu chagi karen sude.
Chiudi Stephen se Masanbo Hiupuina niu phuilujiu tinggen lam ngangphui khangboga Tingwang kendibo nai Jesu se Tingwang ben jatlam chapbambo ngaode.
Sichiujiu paniu din-e, “Phuilo, Tinggen akhamse lepadbo khatdi Chamai Nahpiuse Tingwang ben jatlam chapbambo Iniu ngao-e.”
Apaimaidung siniu paliu kuon makad lujiu paliu khuan tanjiu sensude. Siga maidungse paliu khuga pakwang karen sude.
Sichiujiu paliuniu patu namdi lenlam jupad lujiu tatuniu rotsude. Siga jengdin maidung siniu paliu fai-nise akhangmai pazan Saul kubo khuga thonkhai diakge.
Paliuniu Stephen tu tatu rotjiu bamme siga paniu Rapiu tu ku-e, “Rapiu Jesu yo, ahiupuinatu lukhailo!”
Paniu khudungkiu lujiu pakhuan tanjiu din-e, “Rapiu yo, paliu nuan hai paliu riga pikhai tulo!” Haichiu dinkhai lujiu pah shaimide.
Sichiujiu Saul niu patu kamshatbo suikhai-e
Sibonai gasu Jerusalem ga bambo phumling situ kengchangkha kam mathad sude. Khommaidung makjiu malum maidung hinase Judaea nai Samaria ramlung pabam hinaga maratad mide.
Malum maidung khangsianiu Stephen situ baikhaide khatdi kengchangkha chunsa-jengsajiu kap khaide.
Malum maidung pak mara mibo maidung siniu pabam machangna tadlujiu tachamse dinron sude.
Philip niu Samaria ga para kathiubo namdi khatga tadlujiu maidung khuga Messiah lamga dinron khaide.
Philip niu kadinbose maidungniu paliu chun ngutjiu nking khai-e, khatdi paniu tasibo ngam kamkhaibose paliuniu ngaode.
Maidung kakeng khugasu kasabo hiunadung marajiu npad mide, khatdi paphi paben kashaimai khatdi katangmai kakeng khatu piwi khaide.
Sijengniu sibo namdi gase chunwi ringajiu bamme.
Siga Simon kubo piuniu Samaria maitu pagu chamik thao kadadbo tienkam siniu kam kadak khaijiu bamme. Pase paronna patu maning madijiu bambo-e,
sichiujiu namdiga bammai hinaniu paliu chun ngutjiu bamme. Paliuniu din-e, “Pahai Tingwang gu pumtan maksai, kadibo pumtan si-e.”
Paniu pating kathengkha pagu chamik thao kadadbo tienkam siniu paliu suang kam maha khaijiu bambo jengniu, paliuniu patu malumjiu bambo-e.
Chiudi Philip niu Tingwang gu chawangdih lamga dinbo khatdi Jesu Khrista lamga dinbo kawibo champao situ malum lujiu maipui maipiu pakhiangna tadui nphum sude.
Simon papumsiakdi malum mide, sichiujiu tadui nphum lubo saiga Philip khuga manajiu bamme khatdi tasibo nai maisuang habo kamkhaibo gase pasuang hajiu bamme.
Jerusalem ga bambo pakhommaidung siniu Samaria maidungse Tingwang chamkeng lutao lude chiubo chiulujiu, paliuniu Peter nai John tu paliu khulam langkhaide.
Sichiujiu panainiu mengtangboga, malum maidung siniu Masanbo Hiupuina daolura kakheng thiukhaide.
Palamra paliu mai khat nakha rigadi Masanbo Hiupuina se kiukhai makha-e; paliura Rapiu Jesu zan gasu tadui nphumbo ronna-e.
Sichiujiu Peter nai John niu paliu riga chaben kabakhaiboga, paliuniu Masanbo Hiupuina daolude.
Khommaidung siniu paliu riga kabakhaiboga malum maidung khuga Hiupuina pikiu khaibose Simon niu ngaode. Sijengniu paniu Peter nai John khuga rangkang kadkhaijiu din-e,
“Sichiujiu Iniudi mai khat riga aben kabakhai dasai Masanbo Hiupuinase daolura atudi haibo pumtan pikhailo!”
Chiudi Peter niu patu paokakge, “Nagu tasen-chalan nai nang hai charuidihlam tadmi sulo, palamra Tingwang gu kalen haitu nangniu rangkang khoilujiu lungam lune chiubo maning-e!
Aliugu tienkamga naleng wadi ha-e, palamra nalungchun hai Tingwang masuangga maji makge.
Sijengniu haikumbo lungchun gasu, lungli lulo, khatdi paniu nagu maning haitu kuak khaibira Rapiu khuga kheng lulo.
Palamra nakhuga manmabo lungchun siniu phui bamme sichiujiu natu nuan ga bangkhai bamme chiubo Iniu ngao-e.”
Simon niu Peter nai John khuga din-e, “Chalungsajiu Rapiu khuga aleng kheng khailo, sichiujiu nanainiu dinbo hinase ariga pipadkhai tulo.”

Paliuniu paliugu jengdin thiukhai lubo saiga khatdi Rapiu chamse dinlubo saiga, Peter nai John se Jerusalem lam malanwang mide. Panai npui tadga Kawibo Champaose Samaria mai kiluong kakengga panainiu dinron khaide.
Rapiu gu maza khatniu Philip khuga din-e, “Sulo, Jerusalem gasu Gaza lam tadbo npui n-hanglamse tadsulo (Haise thaidaora tadta mide).

Sijengniu Philip niu sulujiu tad sude. Siga Ethiopia wangpuigu chakampao ruangga parathiubo chakhiu makhuanpao Ethiopiamai papum kamshat mibo piu khatniu pakylam wangra tadwang kinbo-e. Pahai Jerusalem lam Tingwang tu kahumra tadlujiu tuhoi paqon-kari tuanglujiu paky lam malanwang kinbo-e.
Paniu sichiu tadbambo gase, phaimiukakung Isaiah ariakkhuang kenjiu tadkinbo-e.
Masanbo Hiupuina siniu Philip khuga din-e, “Paqon-kari gase buangkhang ntao sulo.”
Philip niu pakwangboga paniu phaimiukakung Isaiah gu ariakkhuang gasu kenkinbo chiude. Paniu pakhuga maniu-e, “Nangniu kenbambose nang sima?”
Chakampao siniu paokakge. “Mai khatniu atu katikhai maksai dechiujiu Iniu silu ralo?” Siga paniu Philip tu paqon-kariga buangkhang patu maluang ntaora kude.
Masanbo ariakkhuang paniu kenbamniubo bamsira hai-e:
“Milypoitu kamshatra jutadbo kumjiu,
milypoi situ pagiu kakip bamdi wadi dinmakge.
Patuse kam mangam khaide,
khatdi majibose patu suikhai makge.
Pavang-pavi lamga mai khatniudi din ngam lakge,
palamra kadihpiriga pagu ringtingse hamide.”
Chakampao siniu Philip khuga maniu-e. “Phaimiukakung siniu haise sao lamga dinjiulo chiubo akhuga dinkhailo? Palam gama maksai maikhat lam galo?”
Siga Philip niu haibo Masanbo ariakkhuang bam gasu sujiu Jesu gu Kawibo Champaose pakhuga katikhai bide.
Sichiujiu panainiu tadkiuboga tadui bambo bam khatga wangtangde, siga chakampao siniu din-e, “Haiga tadui tamnakha bamme. Tadui nphum rabo gasu saoniu atu khamralo?”
Philip niu pakhuga din-e, “Nangniu nalung chun pakhiangnaniu malumsai tadui nphumbo sui-e,”
Paniu paokakge, “Yo, Jesu Khrista hai Tingwang Nahpiu-e chiubo Iniu malumme.”
Chakampao siniu chaqon-kari situ kham lujiu, panai khangniase tadui bambo lamse tadkiude, sichiujiu Philip niu patu tadui nphum khai bide.
Panainiu tadui gasu npad gapboga, Rapiu gu Hiupuina siniu Philip tu puitad mide. Chakampao siniu Philip tu ngaolan tamide chiudi chunwiboniu phuijiu pagu npuilam tadmide.
Philip se Ashdod ga bamniu-e; sichiujiu paniu Caesarea lamse tadjiu Kawibo Champaose nam hinaga dinron khaide.
Sichiujiu Saul niu Rapiu sai suimai hinatu kamshatra kamjiu kapin bamme. Paniu Dibo Singku khulam tadlujiu,
Damascus ga bambo maduiky dung gasu maipui tudi, maipiu tudi, mai khat kumboniu Rapiu gu npuise tadmai bamsai paniu paliutu minlujiu Jerusalem ga puiwang raleng chamtan ariak khengde.
Sichiujiu Saul niu Damascus namdi nawang suboga tingpuk lamsu nbiu khatniu patu thao magui wangnuang mide.
Siga pahai kadihga kaokiu mide khatdi pakhuga chakhuan khatniu haichiu dinbo chiu-e, “Saul, Saul! Dekamjiu nangniu atu kam mathad bamjiulo?”
“Oh Rapiu yo, nang saolo?” chiujiu paniu maniu-e.
“I hai nangniu kam mathadjiu bambo Jesu si-e,” chiujiu chakhuan siniu paokakge.

khatdi paniu pasuang hajiu, kaphikrai-raijiu din-e, ‘Rapiu nangniu atu degu pi kamkhai nijiulo?” Siga Rapiu niu patu paokakge, “Sulujiu namdi gase tadngut sulo, nangniu degu kamralo chiubo siga dinkhai bine.”
Saul tu maluang chabin tadkin maidungdi walad din makjiu chap bamme; paliudi chakhuanse chiu-e, chiudi mai khat tudi ngao makge.
Saul niu kadih gasu chapkhang lujiu pamik rakpadle, chiudi wadi ngaota mide. Sijengniu paliuniu paben julujiu Damascus lam tadsude.
Jeng sum lungga paniu wadi ngao makge, sibo lungga pah wadi tiu makge, khatdi sak makge.
Damascus ga Khristian mai khat, pazanniu Ananias kubo bamme. Paniu madungao khat ngaojiu Rapiu niu pakhuga din-e, “Ananias yo!” Paniu paokakge, “Rapiu yo, haiga, I bamme, “
Rapiu niu pakhuga din-e, “Sulujiu Majibo Npui lamse tadsulo, sichiujiu Judas kyga Tarsus lamsu wangbo Saul kubo piutu maniulo. Pase kakheng thiujiu bamme.
Sichiujiu paniu madungao khat gasu Ananias kubo piu khatniu wangjiu pamik ngao lanlura pariga paben kabakhaibo ngaolubo-e.”
Ananias niu paokakge, “Rapiu, haina hainiu Jerusalem ga bambo, namaidungtu kam kapinjiu bambo khatdi maidung kakeng khaniu palamga dinbambo I chiu-e.
Khatdi paniu Singkupaodung khugasu natu kahum maidung hinatu minrabo pumtan khenglujiu Damascus ga wangbo-e.”
Rapiu niu pakhuga din-e, “Tadsulo, palamra paniu angam kamra, Nkeng maidung nai chawangdung khatdi Israel maidung khuga paniu chamtan din madu tadra Iniu patu kadalubo-e.
Khatdi paniu ajeng gasu chariu khengrabo hinase I apumsiakniu patu lenkhai bine.”

Sijengniu Ananias niu tadlujiu Saul niu bambo kygase tadngut lujiu paben kabakhai bide. Paniu din-e, “Singna Saul yo, nangniu haiga wangra tadkinbo npuikiga nangniu ngaokhai mibo Rapiu Jesu papumsiak niu atu langkhaibo-e. Paniu atu langkhaibora nangniu ngaolan lura khatdi Masanbo Hiupuina siniu phuilu raleng-e.”
Sichiugap chakha lip kumbo walip khat Saul mik gasu tiakiu mide, siga pamikse ngaolan mide. Pase chapsu mide khatdi tadui nphum mide.
Sichiujiu paniu wa tiulubo saiga, pagu pumtanse wanglande.
Damascus ga Saul niu malum maidungtu pakak khat maluang bamme.
Paniu maduiky gase tadlujiu Jesu hai Tingwang Nahpiu si-e chiubo dinron sude.

Pacham chiulumai hinase paliu suang hamide khatdi haichiu maniu-e, “Pahai Jerusalem ga sibo Jesu tu kahum maidungtu kamshat kinbo piuse makma? Khatdi paniu haiga simaitu minra khatdi singku paodung khulam paliutu puitad raleng wangbo makma?”
Sichiudi Saul niu Jesu haise Messiah si-e chiujiu dinbambo haise tanbi-bi khangjiu Damascus ga lungbambo Jehudi maidungniu patu paokak ngamlak mide.
Sichiu khangsuboga, Saul tu kamshat raleng Jehudi maidung makhiam thiujiu madui sude,
chiudi paliuniu rangbambose paniu silude. Sichiujiu paliuniu patu kamshatra chiujiu nchun n-nien saomakjiu namdigu rengmunse akhe sude.
Chiudi Saul saisuimai siniu naikhat nchun warek lung khatga khailujiu kareng lenlam phutkhai mide.
Saul niu Jerusalem lam tadlujiu pakhommaidung ruangga jaora kamsude. Chiudi paliuniu patu khommai khatle chiubo malum makge, palamra paliuniu patu nping karen-e.

Siga Barnabas siniu wanglujiu pakhommaidung khuga patu puiwang-e. Saul haitu dechiujiu Rapiu niu npuiki gase ngaolen khailo khatdi Rapiu niu patu npao khailo chiubo hai paniu wangjiu paliu khuga dinkhai bide. Khatdi Saul niu Damascus ga hujiu Jesu zan ga dinron khai mibose paliu khuga dinkhai bide.
Sichiujiu Saul niu paliutu maluang bamlujiu khatdi Jerusalem pakhiangnaga maluang tadjiu Rapiu zan ga hujiu dinron khai sude.
Paniu Greek lad dinmai Jehudi maidungtu npao-e khatdi ari-e, chiudi paliuniu patu kamshatra kamsude.
Haise malum maidungniu siluboga, paliuniu Saul tu Caesarea lam puitad lujiu patu Tarsus lam langkhai mide.

Sichiujiu Judaea, Galilee khatdi Samaria ramlungga bambo phumling hinaga agi-manaibo wan khat bamniu-e. Haise Masanbo Hiupuina pen gasu tankhangjiu chamaidi kengmid-mid khangde, sichiujiu Rapiu tu pingjiu chakhuang thiu bamniu-e.
Peter niu pabam hinaga tadronjiu bamme, sichiujiu naikhatra paniu Lydda ga lungbambo Tingwang maidung khuga tadde.
Siga paniu maipiu khat pazanniu Aeneas kubo papum phan khatlam shaijiu takum tachat pazi gasu sululak mibo piutu adaode.
Siga Peter niu pakhuga din-e, “Aeneas yo, Jesu Khrista niu natu wikhaimi sulo. Sulo, nazi kakam milo.” Siga Aeneas sunuang mide.
Sichiujiu Lydda nai Sharon ga lungbam maidungse patu ngaolujiu, Rapiu tu malumsu mide.

Joppa ga malumbo pui pazanniu Tabitha kubo maipui khat bamme. (Pazan hai Greek ladgasu Dorcas chiu ku-e, parambaniu “Tathanliupoi” chiubo-e). Pahai kawibo tienkam maliang kamjiu lungkalakmaitu nkhajiu bambo-e.
Sichiujiu bamboga pase marajiu shaimide. Papumse nkhiu lujiu chakai rilamse khai bamme.

Joppa haise Lydda gasu pangdiu diuju makge, sichiujiu Peter hai Lydda ga bamme chiubo chiulujiu, paliuniu mai khangniatu langkhaijiu pakhuga haichiu din-e, “Chalungsajiu aliu khuga kalangjiu wangkhailo.”

Sijengniu Peter niu panai saisuilujiu wangde. Paniu wangboga paliuniu patu majikhai bambo chakai rilamse puikhangde, siga kamipui maidung siniu ntao magui lujiu Dorcas niu ringbambo tingga charui khaibo fai-nidung khoilenjiu kapbambose patu lenkhaide.

Peter niu paliu mathiutu lenlam hapad lujiu khudungkiu kakheng thiude; khatdi paniu paphaw gase mariphui lujiu din-e, “Tabitha, sulo!” Siga pase pamik rakpad mide khatdi paniu Peter tu ngaoboga buangsu ntao mide.
Peter niu paben kariopadjiu jukhang khaide. Sichiujiu paniu malum maidung mathiutu khatdi kamipuidungtu kuwang lujiu patu ringjiu paliu khuga pikhai bide.
Haibo champaose Joppa pakhiangnaga chiumide sichiujiu maidung kakengkha Rapiu tu malum mide.
Peter niu chamigi ngam kambo, pazanniu Simon kubo piutu maluang lujiu pakak khat Joppa ga bam khaide.
Caesarea ga pazanniu Cornelius kubo, Rome riphenmai, “Italy Rimaiga” charipi khat bamme.

Pahai tacheng matipbo mai-e; sichiujiu pah khatdi pakikhunmai mai mathiu Tingwang tu kahumme. Pahai Jehudi mai kaleksa maidung wajiukha tudi nkhajiu khatdi Tingwang khuga kakheng thiu saomakjiu bambo-e.
Sichiujiu naikhat chawan wanchak sum ningga paniu madungao khatga Rapiu gu maza khatniu wangjiu patu “Cornelius,” chiu kubo masan siakjiu ngaode.
Paniu pingboniu phuilujiu maza situ phui-e khatdi din-e, “Paohubo, nde chiulo?”
Maza siniu paokakge, “Nangniu kakhengthiu bambo khatdi maidungtu lungsajiu nkha bambo hai Tingwang pachun kiude, sichiujiu natu paokak khai bide.
Sichiujiu tuhoira Joppa lam maidung khangsiatu Simon Peter kubo piutu phiura langkhailo.
Pahai duipui mungga chamigi ngam kambo Simon kyga riukhai bamme.”
Sichiujiu mazase tadmide, khatdi Cornelius niu pavang khangnia khatdi riphenmai ruanggasu tacheng matipbo piu khattu kukhaide.
Degu padmilo chiubo paniu paliu khuga dinkhaide khatdi Joppa lam paliutu langkhaide.
Pasaibo naise, paliuniu Joppa wang mana subo tingga, Peter niu niending wan gase chaky rilam khanglujiu kakheng thiu bamme.
Pawon mariujiu wa tiuni mide; sichiujiu pamasuang ga katiu kaden khaibo madungao khat paniu ngaode.
Siga tinggen akhamse lepadjiu warek kadibo khat pake madai gasu kadihga khin maju kiubo paniu ngaode.
Sibo lung gase chakhao jat hina, paganiu buangbo wakhaodung khatdi thingnadung bamme.
Siga chakhuan khatniu pakhuga din-e, “Peter yo, sulo, kamshat lujiu tiusulo!”
Chiudi Peter niu din-e, “Sichiu makge, Rapiu yo! Tacheng saisuijiu masan makbo maksai taniabo wakhatnadi I tiumakge.”
Chakhuan siniu pakhuga dinlan-e, “Tingwang niu masanne chiujiu madukhai mibotu, wadaodi masan makge chiujiu lukhai tulo.”
Haise padlon summe, sibosai maniase tinggen lam lukhanglan mide.
Madungao ramba hai detulo chiujiu Peter niu pasuang hajiu bamboga, Cornelius niu langkhaibo maidungse Simon ky se maniujiu rengmun gase chapjiu bamme.
Paliuniu kujiu maniu-e, “Haiga sangmai pazanniu Simon Peter kubo mai bamma?”
Peter se madungao rambatu makumjiu bamboga, Hiupuina niu din-e, “Kinglo, mai khang sumniu natu phiu bamme.
Sijengniu kadenlujiu tadkiu sulo, paliutu maluang tadra manang mane, palamra Iniu paliutu nakhuga langkhaibo-e.”
Sijengniu Peter niu nkum lujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliuniu phiukinbose I-ye. Dechiura naliu wangkin jiulo?”

Paliuniu paokakge, “Charipi Cornelius niu aliutu langkhaibo-e. Pahai Tingwang tu kahumbo khatdi kawibo mai-e, khatdi patu hai Jehudi mai hinaniu chakhuang thiubo mai-e. Tingwang gu maza khatniu natu pakyga kuwangra khatdi nangniu kadinbo nkingra pakhuga dinkhai bibo-e.”
Peter niu sibo nai nchunse paliutu manai khaira hiamlude.
Pasaibo naise paniu paliutu maluang lujiu tadsude; khatdi Joppa gasu malum maidung khangsiadi pasai suitad kinne.
Pasaibo naise Cornelius niu pasingna maidung khatdi paka kakung maidungtu maluang lujiu patu khuanbambo Caesarea gase paliu wangtangde.
Peter niu sichiujiu wangboga, Cornelius niu patu adaojiu pamasuangga makhum kiude.
Chiudi Peter niu patu jusu lujiu din-e, “Suchap milo, Idi chamai khatle,”
Sichiujiu kalunglamse Peter nai Cornelius npaojiu ngutboga, maidung kengkha bamniubo paniu daode.

Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu pumsiakniu, Jehudimai khatniu Nkengmaitu phuira maksai majang khat thiura suimakge chiubo sibamme. Chiudi mai khatnadi tacheng matip makge, maksai tania-e, chiubo Iniu maningbo suilakge chiujiu Tingwang niu akhuga lenkhai bide.
Sijengniu, naliuniu atu kumengboga, Iniu wadi karaobo thiumakjiu wangkinbo-e. Sijengniu naliu khuga Iniu maniubo-e, dechiura naliuniu atu kujiulo?”

Cornelius niu din-e, “Haise ndanai jeng madaibo nai suang haikumbo katang Iniu aky lungga chawan, wanchak sum tingga kalum rijiu kakheng thiujiu bambo tingga-e. Siga kabenbo fai-ni piubo mai khatniu simak dakjiu akhuga chapbam niu-e.
Khatdi paniu din-e, ‘Cornelius, nangniu kakheng thiubo khatdi maidungtu lungsa khaibo nagu tienkamdungse Tingwang niu suikhaide.
Joppa lam pazanniu Simon Peter kubo piutu tadlujiu kura maidungtu langkhailo. Pase duipui mungga lungbambo chamigi ngam kambo Simon kyga sangmai thiujiu bamme.’

Sijengniu, natu kura Iniu langkhainuang mibo-e, sichiujiu nang wangkhaibo hai wichang wide. Tuhoira aliu mathiu Tingwang masuangga bamme, sichiujiu Rapiu niu natu dinra katikhai bibose nkingra khuan bamme.”
Patu kahummai hinatu khatdi majibo kammai hinatu khatdi jat hinatu lukhaibi-e.
Paniu Israel maidung khuga mathiu Rapiu Jesu Khrista pen gasu agi-manaibogu Kawicham paokhaira langkhaibose naliuniu sibamme.
John niu tadui nphum khaibo lamga, Galilee gasu dinron subo gasu Israel mai kadihga padmibo pakhiangnase naliuniu sibamme.

Nazareth Jesu riga dechiujiu Tingwang niu Masanbo Hiupuina nai pumtan runkiu khai milo chiubo naliu sibamme. Tingwang niu patu maluang khaibo jengniu paniu pabam machang kawibo ngam kamjiu khatdi Satan hangga bammai hinatu wikhaijiu rontad khai mide.
Paniu Israel mai kadihga khatdi Jerusalem ga kamkhai mibo hinagu aliuniu jengdin thiubo-e. Sichiujiu paliuniu patu singchai riga natri gianjiu kamshat mibo-e.
Chiudi Tingwang niu patu jengsum saiga kashaibo gasu juringkhai bijiu ngaolen khaide,
chiudi mai hina khuga makjiu Tingwang niu kadalumai, chiubora paniu kashaibo gasu ringsu lanbo saiga, tiu-macham sak macham khaimibo aliu hainiu pagu lamchap si-e.
Sichiujiu paniu aliutu maidung khuga Kawicham dinronjiu khatdi patuse ringbammai khatdi kashai maitu ladjan thiura Tingwang niu kadalubo-e chiujiu din madura chamtan pikhai-e.
Phaimiukakung hinaniu palamga dinmibo-e chiubora patu malummai hina nuanse pazan pen gasu kuakhai bine.”
Peter niu haichiu dinbamboga, palad nkingjiu bammai mathiu riga Masanbo Hiupuinase kiukhai bide.
Jehudi mai malum maidung Joppa lamsu Peter tu maluang lujiu wangmaise Tingwang niu pagu Masanbo Hiupuina kalense Nkengmai riga kiukhai biboga paliu suang hamide.
Palamra paliuniu katambo lad gasu dinbambo khatdi Tingwang kendi situ thuonjiu bamme. Siga Peter niu din-e:
“Haibo maidungdi aliu kumgapjiu Masanbo Hiupuinase daolude. Sichiusai, paliuniu tadui gasu nphumra mai khatniu kham ngamma?”
Sichiujiu Jesu Khrista zan gasu paliutu tadui nphum khaira paniu chamtan pikhaide. Sichiujiu paliu khuga manaikhai sanra pakhuga kheng-e.
Khommaidung khatdi malum maidung hinaniu Nkeng maidungdi Tingwang chamse lutao lude chiubo hai Judea ramlungga chiukam mide.
Peter niu Jerusalem ga wangbo tingga, pagirombo Nkengmai don ponbo jengniu, patu khanjiu pakhuga haichiu din-e,
“Pagirom makmai kyga nangra riukhai-e sironna makjiu paliutu maluang katiu tiu-e!”
Sijengniu paphibang gasu degu padmilo chiubo Peter niu paliu khuga dinsude:
“Joppa namdiga Iniu kakhengthiu bamboga madungao khat Iniu ngao-e. Tinggen lamsu warek kadibo khat kumjiu pake madai gasu khinlujiu amungnaga majukiu khaibo Iniu ngao-e.
Iniu sibo lungga bambo situ phui mawijiu phuiboga, chaky khaodi, nkan khaodi, paganiu buangbo wakhaodung khatdi nkan thingnadungdi ngao-e.
Sigasu chakhuan khatniu akhuga dinbo Iniu chiu-e, ‘Peter yo, sulo, kamshat lujiu tiusulo!’
Chiudi Iniu din-e, ‘Makge, Rapiu yo! Tacheng saisuijiu masan makbo, maksai taniabo tiutekse Iniu wadaodi amun-ga khai matai makge.’
Chakhuan siniu tinggen lamsu dinlan-e, ‘Tingwang niu masan-e chiujiu dinmadu mibo situ masan makge chiujiu maning tulo.’
Haise padlon summe, kanamboga pakhiangnase tinggen lam lukhang lan mide.
Sibo wansiak gase Caesarea lamsu langwangbo mai khang sumniu I bambo kygase mengkin niude.

Wadi manangbo khatdi makhinbo thiumakjiu paliutu majang tadra Hiupuina siniu akhuga dinkhai-e. Siga Joppa gasu malum maidung khang charuk hainiu Caesarea tangbo asai suilu tadle, sichiujiu aliu mathiu Cornelius kygase ngutle.
Paniu paky lungga maza khatniu chapbam niujiu ngaolubo lamga aliu khu paokhai-e, paniu pakhuga haichiu dinkhai-e, ‘Joppa lam maidung khangsiatu langkhaijiu Simon Peter kubo piutu kura dinkhailo.
Paniu natu khatdi nakykhunmai mathiutu ranlurabo chamse dinkhai bine.’
Sichiujiu Iniu paliu khuga dinsu gapboga, paphibangga aliu khuga kumgapjiu paliu rigadi Masanbo Hiupuinase kiukhai bide.
Siga Rapiu niu dinkhai mibose Iniu maning taode: ‘John niura taduiniu nphum khai-e, chiudi naliura Masanbo Hiupuina gasu nphum rabo-e.’
Aliuniu Rapiu, Jesu Khrista tu malumboga, paniu aliuleng pikhaibo kalense kumgapjiu Tingwang niu Nkeng maidung khugadi pikhai bibo-e; sichiusai dechiujiu Iniu Tingwang tu khamlu ralo!”
Paliuniu haise chiuboga paliuniu ari-arajiu bambose mathak mide, khatdi Tingwang tu thuonjiu din-e, “Sichiusai Tingwang niu Nkeng maidungtu pijiu lungli lura khatdi ringlura pawan pikhai bide!”
Chiudi Sypra nai Cyrene gasu malum maidung khangsianiu Antioch lam tadlujiu Nkeng maidung khugadi Rapiu Jesu lamga Kawibo chamse dinron khaide.
Rapiu gu pumtanniu paliutu maluang khaibo jengniu maidung kakeng khaniu Rapiu tu malum mide.
Haibo chamse Jerusalem gu phumlingga chiulubo jengniu, paliuniu Barnabas tu Antioch lam langkhaide.
Paniu siga mengtangboga, Tingwang niu dechiujiu maidungtu thoidam pikhai bilo chiubo ngaoluboga pachun wide khatdi paliu lungchun pakhiangna Rapiu tu malumjiu bamra paniu katin khaide.
Barnabas hai kawibo mai, Masanbo Hiupuina niu phuijiu bambo khatdi malumbo jengniu maidung kakengkhatu Rapiu khuga puiwang lude.
Sigasu Barnabas niu Saul tu phiura Tarsus lam tadde.

Paniu patu daolujiu, Antioch lam majang wangde, khatdi panai khangniase siga aruang lujiu sibo phumlingga bammai kakeng khatu takum khatling katikhai bide. Antioch ga bammai malum maidungtu Khristian maidung chiujiu kurai thubo-e.
Sibo tingga phaimiukakung khangsianiu Jerusalem gasu Antioch lam tadde.

Paliu ruanggasu khang khat, pazanniu Agabus kubo piuniu Hiupuina pumtan pen gasu chapkhang lujiu kadihpiri pakhiangna charakhum kadibo khat wangne chiujiu dinkhaide. (Haise Claudius niu mawang bambo tingga padde).
Khommaidung siniu Judea ga lungbam mai malum maidung leng paliuniu ngamlubui thenna pikhaine chiujiu chaplude.
Haise paliuniu Barnabas nai Saul tu phumlingga langkhaijiu katingmai khuga rangkangse pikhaide.
Haibo tingga Chawang Herod niu phumling maidung khangsiatu kam mathad sude.
Paniu John singnapiu Jacob tu chahengniu dangshat mibo-e.
Haise Jehudi mai chunwibo-e chiubo paniu ngaoboga, paniu Peter tu minra kamsude. (Haise Chakhi jaomakbo Taruak Ngee tingga padle).

Sichiujiu Peter tu minlujiu, kavangkyga khaijiu charimai khang madai-madainiu khuanbo phom madaitu pi khuanjiu bamme. Herod niu patu Kenpadbo Ngee sainiu mathiu masuang gasu ladjan thiura chiujiu maningbo-e.
Sichiujiu Peter tu kavangkyga khai mide, chiudi phumling maidungniu paleng Tingwang khuga kakheng thiuchang thiujiu bamme.
Herod niu Peter tu mathiu suangga jupad rabo nchun suang gase, charimai khangnia kakga Peter se jibamme. Patuse chagiriangniu khinman bamme, khatdi kavangky rengmun gase akhe maidung bamme.

Kavangky lunggase Rapiu gu maza khat simakdak wangjiu pabiu thaoben khaide. maza siniu Peter khuga wangjiu, pamakhuak tun kalungjiu din-e, “Kalanglo! Sulo!” chiujiu makiang sude. Siga Peter ben gasu chagiriangse ntiakiunuang mide.
Siga maza siniu Peter khuga din-e, “Nakhen katin lujiu naphisop khaisulo.” Peter niu sichiujiu kam sude, siga maza siniu din-e, “Nafai benlulo khatdi asaisui lujiu padlo.”
Peter niu sichiu suipadde, para haise madungao-e chiu maningbo-e, chiudi haise madungao makjiu maza siniu pachangsiakjiu kambambo-e.

Sichiujiu panai siniu raithubo akhebo bam, sibosai niabo, sibosai kanamthubo chagi rengmun, namdilam tadngutbo rengmun chiujiu kenpad sude. Sichiujiu rengmunse paronna lepad khaijiu panainiu tadpadbo-e. Panainiu sichiu tadjiu bambo gasu, simak dakjiu maza siniu Peter tu saokhai diakge.

Siga Peter niu pakhuga degu padmijiulo chiubo silujiu din-e, “Tuhoira haise pachang siakge chiubo Iniu silude: Rapiu niu pagu maza langkhaijiu Herod pumtan gasu khatdi Jehudi maidungniu padsune chiujiu maningbambo hina gasu atu gukhai bide.”
Dechiu padmilo chiubo paniu silujiu John Mark pui, Mary kyga maidung kengkha wang madui lujiu kakheng thiubamboga wangde.
Peter niu kamun lenlamse magande, siga kavangpui pazanniu Rhoda kubo pui siniu npaora padde.
Paniu Peter khuanse silujiu pachun wiju mijiu akhamse lekhai makjiu Peter wang chap bamme chiubo ngut paokhaide.
“Nang chara masa mide,” chiujiu paliuniu patu din-e. Chiudi sise majisiakge chiubo paniu dinjiu bamme. Sijengniu paliuniu paokakge, “Haise pagu maza-e.”
Sichiu bamboga Peter niu akhamse maganjiu bamme. Sichiujiu paliuniu akhamse lekhaiboga, khatdi paliuniu patu ngaoluboga paliu suang hamide.

Maliuna bamra paniu pabenniu kamlen lujiu, patu dechiu kavangky gasu Rapiu niu puipad bilo chiubo paliu khuga dinkhaide. “Haise Jacob khuga khatdi malum maidung khuga dinkhai bilo,” chiujiu paniu din-e; sibosai paniu siboky gasu pabam khatlam tadmide.
Nsuanse padboga, khuanbam maidungse paliu suang hachang hamide, “Peter khuga degu padmi jiulo?” chiu chakhuan kario sude.

Sichiujiu patu phiura Herod niu chamtan pikhaide, chiudi paliuniu patu phiudao makge. Sijengniu paniu khuanbam mai situ maniu-e khatdi paliutu kamshat mira chamtan pikhaide. Haibo saiga, Herod niu Judea phutlujiu Caesarea ga pakak khat lung mide.

Herod niu Tyre maidung nai Sidon maidungtu palung pomchang pomme, siga paliuniu paphom khat thiulujiu patu adaora tadde raiboga paliuniu paliutu nkha khaira chawangkining khuan bambo Blasta tu hiamlude. Sigasu paliuniu Herod khuga tadlujiu agi-manaijiu lungra kheng-e, palamra paniu paliu kadihleng katiu-kasak hai chawang kadih gasu daobo-e.
Sichiujiu chaplubo tingmik gase Herod niu chawang pon piulujiu, pawangbamga ntaolujiu, maidung khuga tacham din bamme.
Siga paliuniu haichiu din-e, “Haise chamaina khuan makge, haise chara khuan-e!”
Siga Rapiu gu maza siniu Herod tu kakhiushat nuang mide, palamra paniu Tingwang tu chakhuang thiu makge. Patuse masanpui tiujiu shai mide.
Sichiujiu Tingwang chamse chiupad sude khatdi dikhang sude.
Barnabas nai Saul niudi panai ngamse Jerusalem ga loikhai lujiu John Mark tu puilujiu tad mide.
Antioch phumlingga, phaimiukakungdung khatdi katipaodung: Barnabas, Simeon (Katikbo chiujiu kubo), Cyrene gu Lucius, Manaen (dihthinpao Herod tu maluang lung khangbo piu) khatdi Saul chiujiu bamme.
Paliuniu Rapiu tien thiujiu khatdi kalum rijiu bamboga Masanbo Hiupuina siniu paliu khuga din-e, “Barnabas nai Saul tu aleng langpadlo, panaitu Iniu kukhai mibo ngamse kamraleng.”
Paliuniu kalum rijiu kakheng thiulujiu, panai riga paliu ben kabakhai lujiu panaitu langkhai mide.
Masanbo Hiupuina niu langkhaibo donniu, Barnabas nai Saul niu Seleucia lam tadde khatdi sigasu Cyprus lam tadlande.
Panainiu Salamis ga wangtangboga, Tingwang chamse maduikyga panainiu dinron sude, panai ngamga nkha khaira panainiu John Mark tu maluang tad kinbo-e.
Paliuniu Paphos tangbo tadwangboga, Jehudi maipiu pazanniu, Bar-Jesu kubo khatniu phaimiukakung khatle chiujiu dinbo chamik thao kadadbo piu khattu adao-e.
Pahai sibo dihga ningtingbo piu, dihthinpao Sergiu Paulus tu chaka thiubo khao-e. Dihthinpao siniu Barnabas nai Saul tu pakhuga wangra ku-e, palamra paniu Tingwang chamse nkingkhai ni-e.
Chiudi panaitu chamik thao kadadbo piu Elyma (pazan haise Greek ladga-e) hainiu suini makge, paniu dihthinpao tudi malumbo gasu jumari mira kamde.
Siga Saul—Paul chiujiudi sibo hainiu Masanbo Hiupuina niu phuilujiu, chamik thao kadadbo piu situ phui mating lujiu din-e,

Khatdi paniu dinne, “Chara kasabo nahpiu nang! Nangra kawibo hinagu mikrebo piu-e. Nakhuga kasabo thak maliang phui bamme, sichiujiu nangniu Rapiu gu majibotu pawan machang kam arat khaira matan bambo-e!
Tuhoira Rapiu benniu nariga wangsu rabo-e; sichiujiu namik tiat mirabo-e, sichiujiu pakak khat kabenbo haitu ngaotami rabo-e.”
Siga Elyma mikga muangren ngutjiu pamik ngaotanuang mide, siga paniu paben jukhaira maitu phiutad sude.
Haise dihthinpao siniu ngaoluboga malum mide; palamra Rapiu lamga katikhaibose pasuang hachang hamide.
Paul nai paka maidung siniu Paphos gasu aliam tuanglujiu Pamphylia ga bambo namdi Perga gase wangde, siga John Mark niu panaitu saodiak lujiu Jerusalem lam malan mide.
Paliuniu Perga gasu Pisidia ga bambo Antioch ga wanglujiu, Tabamnaise maduikyga tadlujiu ntao bamde.

Mose gu Tacheng-tajai nai phaimiukakung maigu masanbo ariakse kenpad lubo saiga, maduikygu chakampaoniu paliu khuga haichiu din-e: Singnamaidung yo, naliuniu lungtu cham maidung leng dinkhai rabo bamsai, dinkhaira aliuniu masenne.”
Siga Paul niu suchap lujiu, paben kahaijiu haichiu dinsude:
“Singna Israel mai khatdi Nkengmai, Tingwang tu kahum bammai mathiu alad nking khailo!

Israel mai Rawang niu aliu pao-peh maitu kadakhai lujiu, paliuniu Egypt dihga sangmai thiujiu bambo tinggasu pijiu kadibo jat khat thiukhai bide. Sichiujiu Tingwang niu paliutu Egypt kadih gasu pagu kadibo pumtan siniu maluangpad khaibo-e,
khatdi takum atai paniu paliutu ramjingga maluang khaibide.
Paniu Canaan kadihga jat chinniatu kam maha lujiu, pamaidungtu kadih npao pithiu khaibi-e.
Pakhiangna haise takum kai madai-je-ringiu ngut mibo-e. Haibo saiga, paniu phaimiukakung Samuel ken katang paliuleng ladjanpaodungtu pikhai bide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu chawang leng khengboga, Tingwang niu Benjamin kiphiu gasu Kish nahpiu Saul tu takum atai leng pikhaide.
Sichiujiu patu lupad mibo saiga, Tingwang niu David tu paliu wang pithiu khai bide. Tingwang niu palamga haichiu din-e: ‘Iniu machunbo mai, Jesse nahpiu David situ Iniu daolude.’
Haise paniu ladriat khaibo kumjiu, David kaikik gasu Jesu haitu, Tingwang niu Israel maitu Ranpao pithiu khai bide.
Jesu niu patien thiusu makha gasu, John niu Israel mai mathiutu paliu nuan gasu marilujiu tadui nphumra dinron mibo-e.

Sichiujiu John niu patiense loisuraga, paniu maidung khuga din-e, “I hai sao-e chiujiu naliuniu maning jiulo? Ira naliuniu khuanbambo pase makge. Chiudi phuilo pase asailam wangkinne, sichiujiu Ira paphitopdi paphi gasu luakpadra akaji makge.
“Abraham kaikikdung, Israel mai asingna maidung khatdi Tingwang tu kahumbo Nkengmai mathiu yo: juringbo cham langkhaibo hai aliu khuga sude!

Palamra Jerusalem ga lungbam maidung khatdi paliutu jupaodungniu pahai Ranpao-e chiubo silu makge, khatdi Tabamnai machang kenbambo phaimiukakung maidung ladse paliuniu silu makge. Chiudi paliuniu Jesu tu pimao khaibo gasu phaimiukakung maidung ladse piwangtang khai bide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu patu kamshat raleng palam daomak tadi, paliuniu kamshat raleng Pilate khuga kheng-e.
Sichiujiu Masanbo ariakga dinkhai mibose paliuniu pakhuga kamkhai lubo saiga, paliuniu patu singchai rigasu lukiu lujiu charao lungga baikhai mibo--e.
Chiudi Tingwang niu patuse kashaibo gasu pi ringsu lankhai bide,
sichiujiu Galilee gasu Jerusalem ga patu maluang nbintad maidung khuga naimikpui wajiukha madulen khai bide. Tuhoi, paliu hainiu Israel maidung khuga jengdin thiujiu bambo-e.
Sichiujiu naliu khuga kawicham phungwangra aliu haiga bambo-e:

Tingwang niu aliu pao-pehmai khuga kamkhaine chiujiu ladriat khaibose, tuhoira paniu aliuleng kamkhai bide, haise pakai-pakik thiubo Jesu tu piringsulan khaibo hai-e. Haise niabo Tathoiluiga raokhai bambo kumbo-e,
‘Nangra Anahpiu si-e;
thainai Iniu Napiu thiu mide.’
‘Iniu David khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo thoidamse,
Iniu nakhuga masanjiu khatdi palingjiu pikhai bine.’
‘Nangniu na-kadin piubo navang situ charao lungga pijiu tenkhai lakge.’
Palamra David niu pagu ringtingga Tingwang ngam kamkhai lujiu shai mibo-e, khatdi patuse papao-papehmai khuga nphum macham khai mibo-e, khatdi papumse charao lungga tenkhai mibo-e.
Chiudi haise Tingwang niu kashaibo gasu piringsulan khai mibo piu khugara padmakge.

Israel mai asingna maidung yo, aliuniu naliu khuga dinkhai nibo sira Mose gu Tacheng-tajai gasu khenrang thiu ngam lakbo maidung situ Jesu pen gasu khenrang thiu khaira, khatdi malum maidung nuanse kuak khairabo champao hai pikhai nibo-e.
Sijengniu, phaimiukakung maidungniu dinkhai mibose naliu khuga padmakra kaden lulo:
Palamra Iniu thainai kambambo hai,
mainiu naliu khuga katikhai bamdi, naliuniu malum lakge!’”
Paul nai Barnabas niu maduiky gasu tadmira kambamboga, wanglanbo Tabamnaidi wanglanjiu paliu khuga dinkhaisan lanra maidungniu panaitu kulande.

Maduise pengpad lubo saiga, Jehudi mai kakeng khaniu khatdi Nkeng maidung, Jehudi mai chengga ngutmi maidung kakeng khaniu Paul nai Barnabas saisui tadde. Khommaidung siniu paliutu Tingwang lungsiatga lungbamra lungtu cham dinkhaide.
Pasaibo Tabamnai sira namdiga bammai kakeng khaniu Rapiu chamse nkingra wangde.
Maidung situ Jehudi maidungniu ngaoluboga, manmaboniu phuimide; sichiujiu Paul ladkeng situ ari sude khatdi patu din masa sude.

Chiudi Paul nai Barnabas siniu huliang-liangjiu din-e: “Tingwang chamkeng hai naliu khuga dinrai rabo pathao siakge. Chiudi naliuniu lukhai makge khatdi tingtheng karingbose naliuleng buimakge chiujiu naliu ronna maningbo jengniu, aliuniu naliutu phutlujiu Nkengmai khulam tadmine.
Palamra haise Rapiu niu aliu khuga pikhaibo chamtan si-e:
‘Iniu natu Nkeng maidung leng kabenbo pithiu khaine,
Sichiujiu kadihpiri maina mathiu juringbose ngaolu raleng-e.”
Haise Nkeng maidungniu chiuluboga paliu chun wimide, sichiujiu Rapiu gu champao situ thuonde; sichiujiu tingtheng karingbo leng kadalubo malummai thiu mide.
Sichiujiu Rapiu gu champao hai sibo luongriang pakhiangna gase chiuchia kammide.

Chiudi Jehudi maidung siniu namdigu jupaodung khatdi Nkengmai puidung Tingwang tu kahumjiu bambo wasimai situ thaokhaide. Paliuniu Paul nai Barnabas tu kam mathad sude, khatdi sibo luongriang gasu panaitu hapad mide.
Ladlangtadmai dung siniu paliutu suini makbo lenjiu paliu phi gasu tabuise kasamkhai diaklujiu Iconium lam tadmide.
Antioch ga malum maidungse chunwibo nai Masanbo Hiupuina niu phuijiu bamme.
Iconium gadi sise kumjiu padde: Paul nai Barnabas niu maduiky lamse tadlujiu dinsuboga Jehudi maidung khatdi Nkengmaidung kakengkha malum mide.
Chiudi malum makbo Jehudi maidung siniu malum maidung situ suimakjiu Nkengmai khangsiatu kam masu khaide.
Ladlangtadmaidung siniu siga Rapiu gu champaose hujiu dinsuboga, tasibo khatdi maisuang habodung kamrabo pumtan paliutu pikhaijiu Rapiu lungsiat haira maji-e chiubo kamlen khaide.
Sibo namdiga bammaidungse phom nia thiujiu khangsianiu Jehudi maidung lam, khangsianiu ladlangtadmai lam ponsude.
Sigasu Nkeng maidung khangsia nai Jehudi maidung siniu paliugu jupaodungtu aruanglujiu ladlangtadmaidung situ kam masajiu tatu rotra kamsude.
Haise ladlangtadmaidung siniu siluboga, Lycaonia ga bambo Lystra nai Derbe lam khatdi sibo luongriang lam pakkhai mide.
Siga paliuniu kawicham hai dinron khaide.
Lystra gase papui managasu paphi sajiu tadngam lakbo maipiu khat bamme.
Sibo piuse siga ntao lujiu Paul chamse nkingjiu bamme. Pahai malum mide khatdi wikhaibo suide chiubo Paul niu ngaolujiu, khatdi paniu patu phuimating lujiu pakhuan tanjiu din-e,
“Chap mating khanglo!” Sibo piuse machak khangjiu tadmariu sude.
Paul niu kambo hai maidung siniu ngaoluboga, paliu Lycaonia mai lad gasu haichiu senjiu dinsude, “Chara siniu chamai lun thiujiu aliu khuga wang bamme!”
Sichiujiu paliuniu Barnabas tu Zeus chiu kude, khatdi Paul tu Hermes chiu kude, palamra pahai chalad kadinboga papee thiu-e.
Namdi lenlam bambo Zeus rakygu singku siniudi matomchi nai charapen thinwangjiu ladlangtadmai khugase charathiu khaira kamsude.
Paliuniu kamrabo khuanse Barnabas nai Paul niu chiuluboga, panainiu panai fai-ni phetjiu mathiu ruangga pakwangjiu haichiu sensude,

“Dekamjiu naliuniu haise kambam jiulo? Anaidi naliu kumbo chamaina-e! Naliuniu haikumbo pageng habo gasu, ting-kadih, duipui khatdi sibo lungga bambo pakhiangnatu dampao ringbambo Tingwang, khulam mariwang lura Kawibo champao haise dinkhaira anai haiga bambo-e.
Karaigara mai hina siniu pachunning-ning saisuijiu tadra paniu suikhaibo-e.

Chiudi paniu pawan machang kawibo ngam kamjiu bambo hai pisi khaijiu tinggen lamsu tingdui pikiu khai khatdi pawan saisuijiu miusydi pikhaibo-e; sichiujiu paniu naliutu katiu pikhaijiu naliu chun piwi khaijiu bambo-e.”
Ladlangtadmaidung siniu haichiu dinjiu bamdi, paliutu charathiu khaira kambambo gasu nta-ngam lakjiu bamme.
Siga Pisidia ga bambo Antioch nai Iconium lamsu wangbo Jehudi maidung siniu maidung situ hiamlujiu, Paul tu tatu rotjiu, shaimi bamne chiubo maningjiu kareng hanglam jutaliang khai mide.
Chiudi malum maidung siniu pamungga wang maduiboga, paniu buangsu lujiu namdi lamse ngutlan mide. Sichiujiu pasaibo nai Barnabas panai khangniase Derbe lam tadmide.
Paul nai Barnabas niu Kawicham dinronjiu khommai wajiukha khom lude. Sigasu panainiu Lystra lam, Iconium lam khatdi Pisidia gu Antioch lam tadde.

Panainiu malum maidungtu pitan khaide khatdi malumbo gase matipjiu bamra lungtu cham dinkhaide. Panainiu haichiu katikhai-e, “Aliuniu Tingwang gu chawangdihga ngutlu raleng chariu magenthiubo wajiukha khengrabo-e.”
Phumling hinaga panainiu katingmaileng kadakhai-e, khatdi kakheng thiubo nai kalumribo jaojiu malumbo gase bamlura panainiu Rapiu khuga paliutu pipad khaide.
Pisidia ramluong pakhiangna tadron lubo sai paliuniu Pamphylia ga wangde.
Siga panainiu Perga ga tachamse dinron lujiu Attalia lam tadlan mide.
Sigasu panainiu Antioch lam Tingwang lungsiat tienkam pikhaibose kamloi mibo jengniu aliamse tuanglujiu wanglan mide.

Panainiu Antioch ga wangtangboga, phumling maidungtu pui aruang lujiu Tingwang niu dechiujiu panaitu maluang tatien thiukhai bilo, khatdi Nkeng maidung leng dechiu malumbo npui lepad khai bilo chiubo paliu khuga dinkhaide.
Sichiujiu siga panainiu malum maidungtu maluang lujiu pating kathengkha bamkhaide.

Haibo lamga Paul nai Barnabas niu paliutu tanchang tanjiu ari sude, sichiujiu Antioch gasu Paul nai Barnabas; khatdi maidung khangsiara Jerusalem lam tadjiu haibo lamga pakhommaidungtu adao rabo-e chiujiu chapkhaide.

Paliutu phumlingniu langkhaide; sichiujiu paliuniu Phoenicia khatdi Samaria ga tadkhaiboga, dechiujiu Nkeng maidung siniu Tingwang khulam mariwang lulo chiubo paliuniu paokhaide; haibo cham hainiu malum maidung hina khuga chunwibo dijiu phungwangde.
Paliuniu Jerusalem ga mengtangboga, paliutu phumlingniu, pakhommaidungniu khatdi kating maidungniu lukhaide, siga Tingwang niu paliu khugasu tatien thiukhai bibose paliu khuga paokhaide.
Chiudi malum maidung ruang gasu Pharisee maidung khangsia siniu chapkhang lujiu dinsude, “Nkeng maidungdi Mose gu Tacheng-tajaitu majaira dinkhai rabo-e.”
Khommaidung nai kating maidungse haibo lamga makhiam thiura maduide.

Makhiamthiu mawilubo sai Peter niu chapkhang lujiu din-e, “Asingna maidung yo, Nkeng maidung khuga Kawicham dinronra, sichiujiu paliuniu sise chiulujiu malum lura, Tingwang niu nda naliu ruanggasu, atu kada khaibo naliuniu sijiu bambo-e.
Sichiujiu mathiu lungchun sibo, Tingwang niu Nkeng maidungtu suikhaibo hai, aliutu paniu pikhaibo kumjiu Masanbo Hiupuina paliu khugadi pikhaijiu lenkhai mide.
Paliu nai aliu kakga paniu wa katambo pithiu khai makge; paliuniu malumbo jengniu paniu paliu nuan kuak khaibo-e.
Sichiusai, dekamjiu aliu pao-peh mainiu maksai aliuniu phung ngamlakbo, bangrip haise malum maidung riga thonkhai ralo?
Sichiu makge! Aliu kumjiu, paliudi malumme, sichiujiu Rapiu Jesu lungsiat pen gasu ranlubo ngaode.”
