Tingwang niu Barnabas nai Paul khugasu Nkeng maidung leng maisuang habo khatdi tasibodung kamkhai bibose paliu khuga paokhaibo ga paliu mathiuse maliuna bammide.
Panai niu dinloi miboga, Jacob niu dinsude: “Asingna maidung yo, alad nking khailo!
Dechiujiu Tingwang niu raiboga Nkeng maidungtu paliu ruanggasu pamai thiura phuikhai bilo chiubo Simon niu dinmide.
Haise phaimiukakung maidung lad nai machamme. Palamra Masanbo ariak niu haichiu din-e,
siga David wangdih situ kalankhai bine;
chiujiu Rapiu niu din-e.
Samibose Iniu katinlan bine,
khatdi kam matan khailan bine.
Siga chamai jat hina Iniu aleng kada lubo,
Nkengmai hina akhuga wang rabo-e,
Rapiu niu haise nda pisikhai mibo-e.’
Jacob niu dinlan-e, “Haise amaning-e, chiubora Tingwang khuga mariwangbo Nkeng maidungtu aliuniu kam chariu makrabo-e.

Sibosung, tachengniu suimakbo charamengga kad khaibo tiutek tiumakra; npui-npiu lungmao makra; khatdi chakhao paronna nkhek shaibo jan tiumakra, maksai tazaise tiumakra, aliuniu paliu khuga chamlen khat raokhai rabo-e.
Palamra Mose gu Tacheng-tajai hai nda gasu Tabamnai machang maduikyga kenjiu bambo-e, khatdi palad hai namdi machang dinronjiu bambo-e.”

Sigasu pakhommaidung nai kating maidungniu phumlingmai hinatu puimadui lujiu Paul nai Barnabas saisui lujiu Antioch lam langkhaira chamaitu kada sude. Paliuniu malummai ruang gasu chakhuangthiu buimai khangsia, Barsabbas kubo Juda nai Silas tu kadalujiu,
paliuniu pahangga raokhaibo chamlense paliu khuga langkhaide:
“Naliu singna, pakhommaidung, khatdi kating maidung, aliu mathiuniu Nkengmai thiujiu manabo Antioch ga, Syria ga khatdi Cilicia ga lungbambo aliu singnadung khuga kahum khai-e.
Maidung khangsianiu aliu phom gasu tadpad lujiu, paliuniu aliu khugasu katikhaibo wadi daomak tadi aliuniu dinbo-e chiujiu naliutu kampad kamngutjiu kam chariu bamme chiubo aliu chiu-e.
Sijengniu aliu mathiu aruang lujiu maidung khangsiatu kadalujiu naliu khuga langkhaira suikhaide. Paliu sira aliu ka kakung, Barnabas nai Paul saisui tadjiu,
paliu ringting hai aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista tienkamga khengkhaira mide.
Sijengniu aliuniu, Juda nai Silas tu naliu khuga langkhaijiu aliuniu raokhaibose panai pumsiakniu naliu khuga dinkhai sune.
Masanbo Hiupuina siniu khatdi aliuniu naliu riga ka-nkiubo wadi khaisanni makge:

Sijengniu, charamengga kadkhaibo tatek tiumakra, tazaise tiumakra, charum shaibo wakhao jan tiumakra, khatdi npui-npiu lungmao makra naliuniu mari sirabo-e. Naliuniu haidungse kammakjiu bamsai naliu hai maji bambo-e. Wijiu bamra kanui khai-e.”
Champao phungmaidung situ Antioch lam langkhaide, siga paliuniu malum maidung situ ku maduilujiu chamlense pikhaide.
Haise maidung siniu kenluboga, lungtu cham pikhai bibo jengniu, paliu chun kawibo siniu phuimide.
Sichiujiu Juda nai Silas se panai pumsiakniu phaimiukakung thiubo donniu lungtu cham khatdi matipkhaibo chamse thengjiu paliu khuga dinkhai bide.
Siga pakak khat bamlubo sai, malum maidung siniu panaitu wijiu, khatdi agi-manaijiu langkhai mai khulam piwanglan mide.
(Chiudi Silas ra siga bamra palung chapkhai mide).
Paul nai Barnabas sira Antioch ga, maidung kakeng khatu maluang bamjiu Rapiu chamse katikhaide khatdi dinron khaide.
Siga pakak khat bamkhai lubo sai Paul niu Barnabas khuga din-e, “Aliuniu Rapiu lad dinron tadkhai mibo bam hina malan wangjiu aliu singnadung ndechiu bamlo chiubo phuikhai mataikhe.”
Siga Barnabas niu John Mark tu puitadra masenbo-e,
chiudi Paul niura patu puitadbo maji makge chiujiu maning-e, palamra pahai paliu ngamkam kaloibo tangna paliutu majangbam makjiu, Pamphylia gasu malanwang mibo-e.
Sichiu chalad ari matan khangjiu panai ramna mide: Barnabas niu Mark tu maluang lujiu Cyprus lam aliam tuanglujiu tadmide,
Paul niu Silas tu kadalujiu, malum maidungniu Rapiu khuga kakheng thiukhai lujiu tadmide.
Sichiujiu paniu Syria nai Cilicia tadronjiu Phumlingdungtu kam matip khaide.
Paul niu haichiu Derbe nai Lystra ga tadron wangboga pazanniu Timothy kubo Khristian mai khattu adao-e. Papui hai Jehudi Khristian khatle, papiura Greek mai-e.
Lystra nai Iconium ga lungbam mai mathiuniu Timothy haitu din mawi kamme.
Paul niu patu masenbo jengniu, paniu pagirom khaide. Paniu haichiu kamkhaibo sira, siga lungbammai Jehudi maidungniu Timothy piura Greek mai-e chiubo sibambo jengniu-e.
Sichiujiu paliuniu namdi hinaga rontadjiu Jerusalem ga bammai kating maidung nai ladlangtadmaidungniu dinkhaibose majaira paliutu katikhaide.
Sichiujiu Phumlingdungse naimachangna malumboga dikhangjiu paliu riakdi kengkhang mide.
Paliuniu Phrygia nai Galatia luongriang hina tadron khaide palamra Masanbo Hiupuina niu paliutu Asia luongriangga dinron tadra suikhai makge.
Paliuniu Mysia ramraiga nguttang lujiu Bithynia luongriang katang tadra kamme, chiudi Jesu Hiupuina siniu paliutu suikhai makge.
Sijengniu paliu Mysia haitu kenpad lujiu Troas lam tadkhai mide.
Sibo nai nchunse Paul niu madungao khatga, Mecedonia maipiu khatniu chaplujiu, “Aliu khulam wangjiu aliutu nkha khailo” chiujiu khengbo ngaode.

Haibo madungao haise Paul niu ngaokaji-ngaokari, aliuniu Mecedonia lam tadra kaden mide, palamra siga lungbam maidung khuga Kawicham hai dinron tadra Tingwang niu aliutu kukhaibo-e chiubo aliuniu chapkhai mide.
Aliuniu Troas gasu aliam tuanglujiu Samothrace lam tad taron wangjiu, pasaibo nai Neapolis lam tadkhaide.
Sigasu aliuniu Mecedonia ga para kathiubo khatdi Rome mainiu lungbo namdi Philippi ga wangde. Aliuniu siga pakak khat manai khaide.
Tabamnaise aliuniu namdi lenlam, Jehudi maidungniu kakheng thiura wang aruang sune chiubo maning lujiu singgiu munglamse tadde. Siga wangbo maipuidung situ aliuniu ntaokiujiu katikhaide.

Simaidung ruanggasu aliu lad chiukhaibo pui sira fainoi jonbopui Thyatira gasu Lydia si-e. Pahai Tingwang tu kahumbo pui-e, sichiujiu Paul niu dinbambo gase pachun ngutra Rapiu niu pachun lepadkhai bide.

Patu khatdi pakikhunmai maidungtu tadui nphumkhai lubo sai paniu aliutu ku-e, “I hai Rapiu tu malumbo mai-e chiujiu naliuniu lukhaisai akyga wangjiu bamkhailo.” Sichiujiu aliuniu tadra paniu hiamlude.

Naikhat aliuniu haichiu kakheng thiuraleng tadpadboga, kasabo hiuna phungbo kavangpui, chakhan khansuibo aliupui khatniu aliutu adao-e. Paniu chakhan khansuibo donniu patu makuatpaodung leng rangkang kengkha phungwangjiu bamme.
Paniu Paul aliu saisui lujiu haichiu senjiu tadle, “Haibo maidung hai Kukachangbo Rawang vangdung-e! Naliuniu dechiujiu juringbo ngaolu ralo chiubo paliuniu naliu khuga dinkhai bine!”

Haichiujiu paniu pating kathengkha dinkhang miboga, Paul niu palung makjiu mariwang kasabo hiuna khugase din-e, “Jesu Khrista zan gasu hainapui khugasu npad milo chiujiu Iniu natu chamtan pibo-e!” Sibo wan gase pakhugasu kasabo hiunase npadnuang mide.
Haise patu makuatpaodung siniu silujiu, chiubora paliuniu daokinbo rangkangse hamirabo jengniu, Paul nai Silas tu minlujiu namdigu katingmaidung khuga pikhaijiu mathiu ruangga juwangde.
Paliuniu Rome maigu chakampaodung khuga puiwang lujiu din-e, “Haibo maidung hai Jehudi mai-e, khatdi aliu namdiga paliuniu kammeng kamwangjiu maidungtu kam kabuakjiu bambo-e.
Aliugu tacheng-tajainiu suimakbo paliuniu katikhaijiu kinbo-e, aliura Rome maidung-e, siniu paliu chengse aliu lukhai silakge khatdi kamsi lakge.”
Sichiujiu maidung kakengkhadi wangjiu Paul nai Silas tu thangjiu chalad din karenjiu bamme.
Siga chakampaodung siniu Paul nai Silas gu fai-nidungse phetlujiu panaitu dapra chamtan pikhaide.
Sichiujiu dap masakhai lubo sai, panaitu kavangkyga pikhai mide khatdi kavangky khuanpaotu khuan mawijiu khuanra chamtan pikhaide.
Haibo chamtanse daolubo jengniu kavangky khuanpao siniu panaitu n-nungbo satlam tasingdumga panai ngen ratman lujiu khai mide.
Chunding wan gase Paul nai Silas niu Tingwang khuga kakheng thiujiu khatdi chalui thiujiu bamme, sise kavangkyga bammaidung kakimai siniu nkingjiu bamme.
Siga simakdakjiu kathi katanbo khat wangjiu kavangkyse jumalai mide. Siga kamun hinase lekam mide, khatdi kavangkyga bammai mathiu ngen ratkhai bambo giriangdungse nkhikam mide.
Kavangky khuanpao siniu rakkhangboga kamun hinase lepad mibo ngaoboga, kavangkyga bammai hinase pak kammi bamsune chiu maning lujiu, pahengse thadpad lujiu paronna patu kamshatra kamsu mide.
Chiudi Paul niu pakhuan tanjiu senpadle, “Naronna natu kam masa mitulo! Aliu mathiu haiga bamme!”
Kavangky khuanpao siniu chami matao khaira kujiu, Paul nai Silas phiga pingboniu masandi-dijiu pak ngutde.
Sichiujiu paniu panaitu maluang pad lujiu maniu-e, “Katipaodung yo, juringbo daolura Iniu dekam ralo?”
Siga panainiu paokakge, “Rapiu Jesu Khrista tu malumlo, sichiusai nangdi, nakikhun maidi juringbo daolune.”
Sichiujiu panainiu Rapiu chamse pakhuga khatdi pakikhunmai mai khuga dinkhai bide.
Sibonai nchun gasu paniu panaitu lupad lujiu panai jamdungse nkhiu khaide; sichiujiu pah khatdi pakikhunmai mai mathiuse tadui nphum kam mide.
Sichiujiu paniu Paul nai Silas tu pakylam puiwang lujiu katiu pikhaide. Siga pah khatdi pakikhunmai mai mathiuse chunwi mathabo siniu phui mide, palamra paliuniu Tingwang tu malum lude.
Pasaibo nai nsuanse Rome maigu pumtan thinpaodung siniu paliutu phutkhai mira chamtan pikhaide.
Sijengniu kavangky khuanpao siniu Paul khuga din-e, “Chakampaodung siniu Silas nanaitu phutkhai mira chamtan pikhaide. Siniu nanai phi masui makjiu, wijiu tadsulo.”

Siga Paul niu chamai minmaidung khuga din-e, “Anaigu kamaobo wadi ha-e, chiudi paliuniu anaitu mathiu ruang gasu dapkhaide. Sigasu paliuniu anaitu ladjan thiu makjiu kavangkyga khaide. Tuhoira paliuniu anaitu mahin phutkhai mira kamde. Anaira Rome mai-e! Sichiubo suilakge! Rome maigu chakampaodung paliu pumsiakniu haiga wangjiu anaitu phutkhai rabo-e.”
Chamai minmaidung siniu haibo chamse wang Rome maigu chakampaodung khuga paokhaide; sichiujiu paliuniu Paul nai Silas hai Rome mai-e, chiubo chiuluboga ping mide.
Sigasu paliuniu tadlujiu panai khuga kuak khaira khengde; sichiujiu paliuniu panaitu kavangky gasu puipad lujiu namdi gasu tadpad mira khengde.
Paul nai Silas niu kavangky gasu padlujiu Lydia kyga wangde. Siga panainiu malum maidungtu adaojiu, lungtu cham paliu khuga dinkhai lujiu tadmide.
Paul nai Silas niu Amphipolis khatdi Apollonia lam tadron lujiu maduiky khat bambo Thessaloni ga wangde.
Palun-jai kumjiu Paul niu maduikygase tadde. Siga paniu Tabamnai kak sum lunggase maidungtu chalad apai-e,

siga Masanbo ariak gasu khoipad lujiu katikhaijiu khatdi Messiah hai dechiu chariu khengralo khatdi kashaibo gasu dechiu ringsulan ralo chiubo dinlen khaide. Paul niu haichiujiu din-e, “Iniu naliu khuga dinbambo Jesu hai Messiah situ-e.”
Paliu khangsiara paliu lung kimjiu Paul nai Silas saisui mide, sichiujiu wasibo maipuidung kakengkha nai Tingwang tu kahumbo Greek mai kakengdi jaomide.
Chiudi Jehudi maidungse manma sujiu npui-nchengga tadmariu kinmaitu khom madui sude. Paliuniu namdi pakhiangna kam kabuak khai lujiu Paul nai Silas tu maidung ruangga juwangra Jason ky se kom sude.

Chiudi paliuniu panaitu phiudao lulakboga Jason nai malum maidung khangsiatu paliuniu pumtan thinpaodung suangga jupad lujiu sensude, “Haibo maidung siniu pabam hina kam kabuak bambo-e! Tuhoira paliu hai aliugu namdiga wangbamde,
khatdi Jason niu pakyga paliutu khai nbambo-e. Paliuniu Wangdipiu gu tacheng-tajai hina kampang lujiu katambo chawang, pazanniu Jesu kubo bamme chiujiu dinkin-e.”
Haibo cham hainiu paliuniu maidung situ khatdi namdigu pumtan thinpaodungtu pijiu lungthiu khaide.
Pumtan thinpaodung siniu Jason khatdi khangsiamai situ rangkang pijiu majonkhai lujiu phut mide.
Nchun kiugapboga, malum maidung siniu Paul nai Silas tu Berea lam langkhai mide. Panainiu siga wangtangboga, maduiky lamse tadde.

Siga bammaidungse Thessaloni maidung suang paliu lung di-e. Paliuniu tachengse paliu chun ngutjiu nking-e khatdi Paul niu dinbambose pachang palingma chiubo phuijiu paliuniu Masanbo ariakse naimachangna kenjiu bamme.
Maidung kakengkha malum mide, khatdi wasibo Greek maipuidungdi maipiudungdi malum mide.
Chiudi Thessaloni ga bambo Jehudi maidung siniu Paul niu Berea gadi Tingwang chamse dinron bamme chiubo chiuluboga, siga menglujiu maidung situ kam karung khaijiu kam kabuaklan sude.
Siga malum maidung siniu Paul situ duipui hugenlam langkhai mide, chiudi Silas nai Timothy sira Berea ga bammide.
Paul tu maluang tadmai siniu Athen tangbo tadkhaide. Sichiujiu Berea ga malanwang Silas nai Timothy tu daodiu then kalangjiu pakhuga wangra Paul niu dinkhai bide.
Paul niu Silas nai Timothy tu khuanjiu Athen ga bamboga, namdi gase charamengniu phuibambose ngaolujiu pachun samide.
Sijengniu paniu maduikyga Jehudi maidung nai Tingwang tu kahumbo Nkeng maidung situ khatdi senkiga tadmariu kinmaitu naimachangna puilujiu makhiam thiu aruangde.
Siga Epicurean maidung khangsia nai Stoic gu katipaodung sidi wangjiu patu makhiam machamde. Paliu khangsianiu haichiu din-e, “Wadi simakbo piu, hainiu degu dinkin jiulo?”
Chiudi paliu khangsianiu paokakge, “Pahai sangdiumai ratu dinkin kumme.” Paliuniu haichiu dinbo rambara, Paul niu Jesu ringsulan mibo lamga dinron kinbo jengniu-e.
Sijengniu paliuniu Paul tu Areopagus gu Apaikyga maluang wangjiu maniu-e, “Nangniu katikhai kinbo lamga aliu sikhaini-e.
Palamra nangniu dinkinbo kasiara tamsin-e, sise aliuniu paramba sini-e.”
(Palamra Athen ga lungbam maidungse wa kasanbo cham dinra, maksai nkingra masen kamme).
Siga Paul niu namdigu Apaiky masuang gase chapsu lujiu dinsude, “Naliu Athen maidung hai wahinaga tacheng matip-e chiubo Iniu ngao-e.

Palamra naliu namdiga Iniu haichiu tadron wangboga, khatdi naliugu kahumbo bam hinaga haichiu naliuniu raokhai bambo Iniu ngao-e, ‘Simakbo Rawang.’ Naliuniu kahum bambo chiudi naliuniu simakbo lamga tuhoi Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e.
Kadihpiritu khatdi sibo lungga bambo mania hinatu damkhaibo Tingwang se tinggen khatdi kadih Rapiu-e, khatdi para chamainiu thiubo rakyga lungmakge.
Paleng machang kamakbo wakhatdi aliuniu pikhai silakge, palamra paniu mai hinagu ringting khatdi mai hina siu thira pikhaijiu bambo-e.

Paniu chamai khang khattu damkhai lujiu sigasu kadihpiri pakhiangnaga lungra jat hina pikhaibo-e. Pa paronna wahinagu pawan khatdi pamalan hina raijiu pikhai lujiu, paliuniu lungrabo bamdung kadenkhai mibo-e.
Paniu haichiu kamkhaibo sira, paliuniu patu phiura, khatdi paliuniu patu daolura leng-e. Chiudi Tingwang sira aliu mai khat khuga niudi diumi makge;
haise mai khatniu dinmibo kumbo-e,
‘Pakhuga aliu ringjiu, malaijiu khatdi lungjiu bambo-e.’
Haise naliugu chalui karaomainiu dinmibo kumbo-e;
‘Aliudi panahmaidung-e.’
Sichiujiu aliu hai Tingwang nahdung thiubo saisuijiu Tingwang hai chamaina bensiamniu kamlubo kachia, rangkang, maksai tatu kumbo-e chiujiu maningbo suimakge.
Maidungniu simakbo wan haitu Tingwang niu phuitom khai lujiu, tuhoira mai hinatu paliugu kasabo npui gasu lunglira paniu chamtan pikhai mibo-e.

Palamra kadihpiri pakhiangnatu majibo siniu ladjan thiura paniu tingmik khat riatkhai lujiu paniu mai khattu kadakhai mibo-e. Sichiujiu paniu mai hina khuga sibo piu situ kashaibo gasu pi ringsu khai lanjiu lenkhai mibo-e!”
Kashaibo gasu ringsulanbo lamga Paul niu dinbo paliuniu chiuboga, khangsianiu patu nuimen-e, chiudi khangsianiu din-e, “Haibo lamga dinlanra aliuniu masenne.”
Sichiujiu Paul niu madui gasu tadpad mide.
Khangsianiu malumjiu paruangga jaomide, simai ruang gasu khang khatra apaimai Dionysius hai-e, siga maipui khat pazanniu Damaris sidi jao-e, khatdi maidung khangsia maidi bamme.
Haibo sai, Paul niu Athen tu phutlujiu Corinth lam tadmide.

Siga paniu Jehudi maipiu khat Pontus gasu manabo pazanniu Aquila kubo panao Priscilla tu maluang lujiu Italy gasu wangbotu adao-e, palamra wangdi Claudius niu Jehudi mai hina Rome tu phutmi rabo-e chiubo chamtan padle. Paul niu panaitu adaora tadle,
sichiujiu panaitu maluang lungjiu tatien thiu aruang khaide, palamra panainiu kamkinbo kumjiu padi chafai lenbo ky thiujiu lungkinbo-e.
Paniu Tabamnai machang maduiky gase menglu chalad apaijiu Jehudi maidung tudi Greek maidung tudi pikim khaira kamme.
Silas nai Timothy niu Mecedonia gasu wangtangboga, Paul niu pagu pawan hina tacham hai dinronboga pikhaijiu Jehudi mai khuga, Jesu hai Messiah si-e chiubo masanjiu katikhaide.

Paliuniu patu suini makjiu kasabo madam khaiboga, paniu pafaise kasungjiu paliu khuga din-e, “Naliu hai hamidi, naliu khenrang thiurabo-e! Ira wa kasa phungra ha-e. Tuhoi gasu Ira Nkengmai khulam tadmine.”
Sichiujiu paniu paliutu phudlujiu Tingwang tu kahumbo Nkengmai piu pazanniu Titus Justus kubo kyga bamkhaira tadmide; sibo piu kyse maduiky mungnaga bambo-e.
Maduiky gu jupao Crispus khatdi pakikhunmai mai mathiuse Rapiu tu malumde; khatdi Corinth ga bammai kakengkha tachamse chiulujiu malumde, khatdi tadui nphum karende.
Nchun khat Paul niu madungao khat ngaojiu siga Rapiu niu pakhuga din-e, “Ping mane, manang makjiu phutmi makjiu dinjiu bamlo,
palamra Iniu natu maluang khaine, sichiujiu mai khatniudi natu kam masa lakge, palamra haibo namdiga amaidung kengjiu bamme.”
Sijengniu Paul niu siga takum khat paphan, maidungtu Tingwang cham katikhaijiu bam khaide.
Gallio tu Achaia ga Rome gu dihthinpao pithiu khaiboga, Jehudi maidungse aruang lujiu Paul tu ladjankyga minwangde.
Paliuniu din-e, “Haibo piu hainiu tacheng-tajainiu suimakbo npui gasu Tingwang tu kahumra hiampon kinbo-e!”
Paul niu chalad dinra kamsu gapboga Gallio niu Jehudi maidung khuga din-e, “Haina siniu pagu nkhai-aliga kamaobo bamsai, naliu Jehudi maitu Iniu makhiamthiu machambo sui-e.
Chiudi haise ladkeng nai tazan lamga-e sai khatdi naliugu tacheng-tajai lamga-e sai, naliu ronna kamlulo. Iniu haikumbo lamga ladjan thiusi lakge!”
Sichiujiu paniu paliutu ladjanky gasu hathon mide.
Paliuniu maduiky gu jupao Sosthenes tu minlujiu ladjanky kajeng gasu dapsude. Chiudi sisetu Gallio niu walengdi sikhai makge.
Paliuniu Ephesus ga wangtangboga, Paul niu Priscilla nai Aquila tu phutkhai mide. Paniu maduikyga tadlujiu Jehudi maidungtu chalad apaijiu katikhaide.
Maidung siniu patu manai matheng khaira kheng-e chiudi paniu suikhai makge.
Chiudi paniu paliutu ramnaboga paliu khuga haichiu din-e, “Tingwang chunsai, naliu khuga I wanglanne.” Sichiujiu paniu Ephesus gasu aliam tuanglujiu tadmide.
Paniu Caesarea ga wangtangboga, Jerusalem ga tadlujiu phumling tu kanuikhai-e, sigasu Antioch lam tadmide.
Siga pakak khat bamkhai lubo sai, paniu Galatia nai Phrygia luongriang tadronjiu malum maidung situ kam matip khaide.
Sibo wan gase Jehudi mai khangkhat Alexandria gasu manabo pazanniu Apollo kubo Ephesus ga wangde. Pahai chalad din kasibo khatdi Masanbo ariak simawibo piu-e.
Patu hai Rapiu Npuiga katikhaijiu, pahai Jesu lamga pachun ngutjiu kati majikhaijiu bambo piu-e. Chiudi para John gu tadui nphumbo lamga ronna sibo-e.
Paniu maduikygase hujiu dinsude. Paniu dinbo hai Priscilla nai Aquila niu chiuluboga, patu chaky lam maluangwang Tingwang Npui gase kati mawisan khai bide.

Siga Apollo niu Achaia lam tadra chap mide, sijengniu Ephesus ga malum maidungniu Achaia ga bambo malum maidung khuga chamlen raokhaijiu patu lukhaira din khaide. Paniu siga mengtangboga Tingwang lungsiat penniu malum maileng pahai gengchang gengde.
Palamra paniu mathiu aruangbo gasu Jehudi maidungtu chalad apaijiu katikhaibo khatdi Masanbo ariak gasu Jesu hai Messiah si-e, chiubo dinlen khaide.
Apollos niu Corinth ga bamboga, Paul niu sibo luongriang hina tadron lujiu Ephesus ga wangtangde. Siga paniu khommai khangsiatu adaojiu paliu khuga maniu-e,
“Naliuniu malumbo mai thiuluboga Masanbo Hiupuina daolu dama?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “Masanbo Hiupuina bamme chiubo aliura chiu makha-e.”
Siga Paul niu maniu-e, “Wide, sichiusai naliuniu dekumbogu tadui nphum jiulo?”
Paliuniu paokakge, “John gu tadui nphumbo gasu niu-e.”
Paliuniu haise chiuboga, Rapiu Jesu zan gasu tadui nphum lude.
Sichiujiu Paul niu paliu riga paben kabakhaiboga, Masanbo Hiupuinase paliu riga kiukhaide; siga paliuniu katam-tambo lad dinsude, khatdi Tingwang champaose dinron sude.
Paliu hai chamai khang kariu-je-nia-kiu-e.
Chahiu sum lunggase Paul niu maduikygase tadjiu maidung khuga hujiu katikhaide, khatdi paliutu chalad apaijiu Tingwang gu chawangdih lamga pikim khaira kamme.

Chiudi maidung khangsiara paliu lung tanjiu malum makge, khatdi paliuniu mathiu masuang gasu Rapiu Npui haitu din masajiu din-e. Sijengniu Paul niu paliutu phutkhai lujiu malum maidung situ majang lujiu naimachangna Tyranna gu laddinky gasu makhiam thiu thiu-e.
Haichiujiu takum nia tadkhangboga, Asia luongriangga lungbo Jehudi maidi, Nkengmaidi Rapiu chamse chiukhaide.
Tingwang niu Paul khugasu maisuang habo tienkamdung kamkhai bide.
Sichiujiu pafai maksai paben manukfai tadi khoiwang thiuniumai riga niakhai sai wimi-e, khatdi kasabo hiunadungdi padmi-e.

Sichiujiu tad mariu kinbo Jehudi maidung khangsia niudi kasabo hiunatu hathonboga Rapiu Jesu zan thinjiu kamme. Paliuniu kasabo hiunadung khuga din-e, “Paul niu dinron kinbo Jesu zan gasu Iniu chamtan pi-e.”
Haise Jehudi maigu Singkupao Sceva nahpiudung khang chinnia siniu kambo-e.
Chiudi kasabo hiuna siniu paliu khuga din-e, “Jesu tu Iniu si-e, Paul tudi Iniu si-e; chiudi naliura saolo?”
Sichiujiu kasabo hiuna phungbo piu siniu paliutu machak thonjiu paliu mathiutu ngam mide. Paliuniu sibo ky gasu pakjiu ajam karende, khatdi paliu fai-nidung kamkek kam mide.
Haibo chamse Ephesus ga lungbambo Jehudi maidi Nkengmaidi chiujiu mathiuse pingboniu phuimide, sichiujiu Rapiu Jesu zanse dijiu chakhuang thiu mide.
Sichiujiu malum maidung kakeng khaniu wangjiu paliuniu tenkhai mibo khatdi thiukhai mibose madujiu bamde.
Chamik thao kadadbo maidungdi paliugu ariak khuangdungse mathiu ruangga ponwangjiu ruthon mide. Ariak khuangdung manse paliuniu chakboga rangkang sang ringiu padle.
Haichiujiu Rapiu pumtan pen gasu Rapiu cham hai dikhangde khatdi tankhangde.
Haikumbo hina padlubo saiga, Paul niu Mecedonia nai Achaia lam tadron lujiu Jerusalem lam tadra maning sude. Paniu din-e, “Iniu siga tadlubo sai, Rome phuiradi I tadrabo-e.”
Sichiujiu paniu Asia luongriangga bamdiak mibo patu nkhapiu kania, Timothy nai Erastus tu Mecedonia lam langkhai mide.
Haibo wan gase Rapiu gu Npui lamga Ephesus ga kakabuakbo kadibo khat padle.
Siga chagi akiatbo piu pazanniu Demetrius kubo piu siniu Artemis raky se rangkangginiu thiujiu sibo ngamga kamsi maidungleng pageng dijiu pikhai-e.
Sijengniu sibo ngam kammai mathiutu paniu ku-aruang lujiu paliu khuga din-e, “Singnamai yo, haibo ngam gasu aliu lungwijiu bambo-e.

Chiudi tuhoira haibo piu, Paul hainiu kambambo hai naliu pumsiakniu ngaolude khatdi chiulude. Paniu din-e, chiubora chamainiu dambo radung sira chara mak siakge chiujiu Ephesus haiga khatdi Asia luongriangga lungbam mai kakeng khatu hiamloi wangkinbo-e.
Sichiusai aliu tienkam gahai tazan kasabo wangra mide. Sironna makjiu charapui kadibo Artemis raky haidi mathaku mine khatdi paken kadibose Asia ga khatdi kadihpiri pakhiangnaga hamine!”
Haibo cham hai maidung siniu chiuboga, paliu lung thiujiu haichiu sensude, “Ephesus gu Artemis hai kadibo-e!”
Sibo khuan siniu namdise kabuak mide. Sichiujiu maidung siniu Paul saisui lujiu nbintad kinbo Mecedonia maipiu kania Gaius nai Aristarchus tu minlujiu mathiu malakyga puiwangde.
Siga Paul papumsiak mathiu suangga wangra maning-e, chiudi sise malum maidung siniu suikhai makge.
Sibo kadihgu pumtan thinpao pakahmaidung niudi patu pijiu mathiu malaky gase ngaolen makra tacham piwang-e.
Siga madui bambose chakhuan kabuak mide; khangsianiu chalad khat sen-e, khangsianiu katambo khat sen-e, palamra maidung kakeng siniu dekamra paliu wang bamjiulo chiubodi silu makge.
Maidung khangsianiu haise Alexander niu-e chiu madam khaijiu patu suanglam puiwang khaide. Siga Alexander niu maidungtu maliu makjiu bamra paben kahaijiu marilu rabo cham din sude.
Chiudi pahai Jehudi mai-e chiubo paliuniu siluboga, paliu mathiuse khat thiu lujiu wanchak nia kak kumbo haichiu senjiu bamme, “Artemis hai Ephesus gu kadibo-e!”

Sichiujiu kanamboga namdigu raosuipiu siniu maidung situ kam agikiu khai lujiu, paniu din-e, “Singna Ephesus maidung yo, Ephesus namdi hainiu kadibo Artemis rakytu khuanbambo-e khatdi tinggen lamsu masanbo tukang ntiak kiubo-e chiubo mai hinaniu sibambo-e.
Haise mai khatniudi suilakge chiura ha-e. Sichiusai, naliu agikiu rabo-e khatdi wa kasabo kammak rabo-e.
Haibo maidung hainiu charakygu wa aga makge maksai aliu rapuitu wa kasa dinmakge, chiudi naliuniu paliutu haiga puiwang bamme.
Demetrius niu khatdi pangam kam maidungniu mai khat riga ladjan thiura bamsai, ladjankyga puiwangra aliu khuga pumtan khatdi tingmikse bamme.
Sichiu makjiu sisuang nkiubo naliuniu luni tadi, namdigu ladjan thiubo madui bamme.
Palamra thainai padmibo lamga aliutu madam khaira tathu kadibo aliu riga wangbo sui-e. Aliuniu haichiu kam kabuakjiu bambo lamga mari khaira ha-e, khatdi wa dinkhaira ha-e.”
Haichiu dinkhaijiu, paniu mathiu madui bambo situ pi ramna khaide.
Chakhuanse hakiu mibo saiga, Paul niu malum maidungtu ku aruang lujiu lungtu cham dinkhai lujiu paliutu ramna khaide. Sigasu paniu Mecedonia lam tadmide.
Paniu sibo luongriang tadronjiu lungtu cham dinkhaide. Sichiujiu paniu Achaia ga wangde,

siga paniu chahiu sum manaikhai-e. Jehudi maidung siniu patu kam masara limbamme chiubo paniu siluboga, Syria lam tadra chapkhai mide; sijengniu paniu Mecedonia ga malanwangjiu sigasu tadronra chap mide.

Siga Berea gasu Pyrrhus nahpiu Sopater panai tadle; sichiujiu Thessaloni gasu Aristarchus nai Secundus; Derbe gasu Gaius; Asia luongriang gasu Tychicus nai Trophimus; khatdi Timothy niu patu maluang tadle.
Sichiujiu paliuniu aliu suang tadrai lujiu Troas ga aliutu khuanbam niu-e.
Chakhi jaomakbo Taruak Ngee sainiu, Philippi gasu aliam tonglu tadjiu, jeng mangiu sainiu Troas gasu aliu paliutu adao-e, siga aliu nidkak khat bamkhai-e.
Tabamnai chawanse aliuniu Rapiu maluad tiura wang aruang-e. Paul niu maidung khuga chalad dinjiu chunding katang dinkhang-e, palamra pasaibo naise pah tadmi rabo-e.
Aliuniu bambo chakai rilamse chamibung kengkha mataokhai bamme.

Siga akhangmai khat pazanniu Eutychus kubo siniu Paul niu dinbo ladse nkingjiu kiran taiga ntao bamme, sichiujiu Eutychus hainiu nguiniuju mijiu nguijing kiuboga pasat pasumbo gasu kadihga ntiakkiu mide. Paliuniu patu pon nkhangboga pase shai mide.
Chiudi Paul niu nkum patuse pamlujiu din-e, “Manang mane, pahai ringbam kha-e!”
Sigasu paniu chakai rilamse nkhang lanlujiu taruakse kampang lujiu tiude. Paliutu naimik pad kamak then npao khailujiu, naimik padboga pah tadmide.
Paliuniu akhangmai nah situ ringjiu pakyga puiwang mide khatdi paliu chun kawibo siniu phuimide.
Aliuniu aliam masuang tadrai lujiu Paul tu pijiu tuangkhaira chiujiu Assos lam aliam tuanglujiu tadmide. Palamra paniu kadih gasu tadbam niune chiujiu aliu khuga dinkhaibo-e.
Sichiujiu paniu aliutu Assos gasu daoboga, aliuniu patu phunglujiu Mitylene lam tadkhaide.
Sigasu aliuniu aliam tuanglujiu pasaibo nai Chios wangtangde. Pasaibo nai aliuniu Samos ga wangde, khatdi pasaibo nainiu Mileta ga wangtangde.
Asia luongriangga pawan wadi kam mahakhai makjiu, Ephesus maju tadmira Paul ra maningbo-e, daolubui sai Pentecost tingmik masuangga Jerusalem ga wangtangra para pujiu kinbo-e.
Paul niu Mileta gasu Ephesus ga tacham langkhaijiu, phumlinggu kating maidungtu paniu adaora dinkhaide.
Paliu mengtangboga, paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Iniu Asia luongriang wangtang gapbo nai gasu dechiujiu naliutu maluang khai milo chiubo naliu sijiu bamme.
Jehudi maidungniu kam chariubo jengniu, wajiukha kasabo wan gase, amatui padjiu khatdi manonjiu, Rapiu vangpiu khat kumjiu Iniu angam kamkhai mide.
Naliuleng genglu rabo donniu, dechiujiu Iniu mathiu ruanggadi naliu ky hina gadi dinkhai milo khatdi katikhai milo chiubo naliu sibamme.
Jehudi maidung tadi Nkeng maidung tadi, paliu nuan gasu mari lujiu Tingwang khulam wangjiu aliu Rapiu Jesu tu malum lulo chiubo champao hai Iniu tanjiu dinkhai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu tuhoira Masanbo Hiupuina niu dinkhaibo jengniu, I Jerusalem lam tadmine, siga nde padsu ralo chiubo I simakge.
Namdi hinaga kavangky nai chariu magenthiubo siniu atu khuan bamme chiujiu Masanbo Hiupuina niu kachan khaibo I sibamme.
Chiudi Iniu agu karingting haitu wadi chakkhai makge; Ira Rapiu Jesu niu pikhaibo atiense kam tathui lura, chiubora Tingwang lungsiat gu kawibo champaose paoronra situ machunbo-e.
“Iniu naliu mathiu khuga, Tingwang gu chawangdih racham dinron khai mibo-e. Sichiujiu tuhoira naliu mai khatniudi atu ngaolan tamine chiubo Iniu si-e.
Sijengniu thainai siak Iniu naliu khuga tanjiu dinbo-e; naliu mai khat kumbo hamidi, Ira amao hamide.
Palamra Tingwang gu chunning hai Iniu naliu khuga wakhatnadi pisikhai makbo hade.

Sijengniu naliu riga wangrabo hina khatdi Masanbo Hiupuina niu naliutu akhi khaira pikhaibo milydungtu khatdi naliu ronna tudi mathingsi lulo. Panahpiuniu shaikhaijiu pagu thiulubo Tingwang gu phumlinggu milykhuanpaodung thiululo.
Palamra Iniu tadmibo saiga, palung kasabo tanydungse naliu ruangga wangjiu, paliuniu milydung situ phutkhai lakge chiubo Iniu si-e.
Naliu ruanggasu maidung khangsianiu arat dinjiu malum maidungtu pijiu paliu saisui khairabo wanse wangsune.
Sijengniu akhe silo, khatdi Iniu takum sum lungga nchun n-nien simakjiu amatui padjiu naliu mathiutu katikhai mibose maningtao lulo.
“Sichiujiu tuhoira Iniu naliutu Tingwang niu akhi khaira, khatdi Tingwang niu pamaidung leng pikhaibo thoidam, khatdi pagu lungsiat cham siniu naliutu pidikhang rabo gase pikhaide.
Iniu mai khat gudi rangkang maksai kachia maksai chafai-tanitu masen makge.
Sichiujiu Iniu khatdi akahmaidungniu pageng kabam hinase aben hainiu kamme chiubo naliu pumsiakniu sibamme.

Haichiujiu changam hina Iniu naliutu kamlenbo hainiu son-tanu maidungtu haichiujiu nkha rabo-e chiubo haise Rapiu Jesu papum siakniu dinkhai mibo ladkengse pi maningtao khaibo-e. ‘Kadaobo suang pipadbo siniu sanwi-e.’”
Paul niu haichiu dinloi mibo sai, paniu khudungkiu lujiu paliu mathiutu maluang kakhengthiu khaide.
Paliuniu patu kiaplu biangpup khaijiu khatdi kapjiu ramna khaide.
Paliuniu chunsa nkiubo lamra, patu paliuniu wadaodi ngaodao lanlak mide chiujiu paniu dinbo jengniu-e. Sichiujiu paliuniu patu aliam tangbo kapaopad khaide.
Aliuniu paliutu ramnakhai lujiu tadmide. Aliamse tuang maji-kajak padlujiu Cos ga wangde; pasaibo nainiu Rhodes ga aliu wangtang-e, sigasu aliuniu Patara lam tadlande.
Siga Phoenicia lam tadra aliam khat aliuniu daojiu, sigasu aliu aliam tuanglujiu tadlande.
Aliuniu Cyprus tu ngaobo bam khatga wangtang lujiu, sigasu sibo hanglam bambo Syria lam aliam tuanglujiu tadde, Sigasu aliam siniu pabang saokhai rabo bam Tyre gase aliu tadlande.
Siga malum maidung khangsiatu aliuniu daojiu nidkak khat paliu khuga bamkhaide. Hiupuina pumtan pen gasu paliuniu Paul tu Jerusalem lam tadmakra din-e.

Chiudi aliuniu bamrabo wanse majumiboga aliuniu aliu npui lamse tadlan mide. Paliu mathiuse paliu nao-nahdungtu puilujiu namdi lenlam chagiu chaphu katang aliutu kapao padjiu, siga aliu khudungkiu kakheng thiu macham khaide.
Sichiujiu aliuniu khat khattu ramna lujiu aliudi aliam lung gase ngutmide, paliudi paliu ky lam malanwang mide.
Aliuniu aliu puitadse tadlanjiu, Tyre gasu aliam tuanglujiu Ptolemai ga wangjiu, siga malum maidungtu wang kanui khaijiu naikhat manai khaide.
Pasaibo naise aliuniu Caesarea ga wangtangde. Siga aliuniu Jerusalem ga nkhara mai khang chinnia kadapadbo ruanggasu kawicham dinronbo Philip kyga bamkhaide.
Chamithiu makmai panahpui khang madai siniu Tingwang cham din bamniu-e.
Judea lamsu wangbo phaimiukakung khat pazanniu Agabus kubopiu siniu siga wangbo tangna aliuniu siga manai khaide.

Siga paniu aliu khuga wanglujiu Paul gu khen-gakse khoilujiu paronna paphi paben ratlujiu haichiu din-e, “Masanbo Hiupuina siniu haichiu din-e; Jerusalem ga Jehudi maidung siniu haibo khen-gak paopiu situ haichiu ratlujiu, paliuniu patu Nkengmai khuga pikhaimi rabo-e.”
Aliuniu haise chiuboga, aliudi, maidung siniudi Paul tu Jerusalem lam tadmakra kheng-e.
Chiudi paniu paokakge, “Naliuniu kambambo hai degulo? Dekamjiu haichiu kapjiu alung kam chariu bamjiulo? Jerusalem gase atu ratmanbo ronna makjiu, Rapiu Jesu leng shaibo tangna, Ira kaden bambo-e.”
Aliuniu patu hiam ngamlak mibo jengniu, aliuniu patu haichiu dinkhaijiu phutkhai mide, “Rapiu niu machunbo thiumi sulo.”
Siga pakak khat aliu bamkhai lujiu, Jerusalem lam tadra kaden lude.
Caesarea lamsu pakhommaidung khangsiadi aliutu maluang tadjiu, aliuniu bamkhai rabo piu Cyprus lamsu wangbo Mnason, karai gasu malumjiu bambo piu kyga puiwang khaide.
Aliuniu Jerusalem ga wangtangboga, malum maidung siniu aliutu wijiu lukhaide.
Pasaibo naise aliutu puilujiu Jacob tu adaora tadde; siga phumlinggu katingmai hinadi bamniu-e.
Paul niu paliutu kanuikhai-e khatdi Tingwang niu pagu tienkam gasu dechiujiu Nkeng maidung leng kamkhai bilo chiubo dinkhaide.

Pachamse chiulujiu paliu mathiu Tingwang tu thuonkiude. Sichiujiu paliuniu din-e, “Singna Paul yo, Jehudi maidung sang-sangniu malumbo khatdi paliuniu Tacheng-tajaiga dejiukha paliu chun ngut bamlo chiubo nangniu ngaode.

Sichiujiu Nkengmai kadihga lungbo Jehudi maidungtu nangniu Mose gu Tacheng-tajai phutmira khatdi paliu nahdungtu chagi rommakra khatdi Jehudi mai cheng tadmakra katikhaijiu kin-e chiubo nalamga dinjiu bambo-e.
Sichiujiu nang haiga wangtang bamme chiubo hai paliu chiumi rabo-e. Sichiusai degu kam suralo?
Siniu nang haichiu kambotu aliuniu luni-e, chiubora tasiang sianglubo mai khang madai bamme.

Sijengniu paliutu maluang lujiu kam masanbo rathak gase jaojiu paliuniu tiurabo hinase pikhai bilo; sichiusai paliuniu paliu peese gotlubui-e. Sichiusai maidungniu nalamga dinbambose wadi maji makbo-e chiubo simi rabo-e, sichiujiu nangra Mose gu Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu lungbambo-e chiujiu simi rabo-e.

Sichiudi malum lubo Nkeng maidung sira aliuniu chaplujiu chamlen khat langkhai mibo kumjiu, paliuniu charameng khuga kadkhai mibo tiutek tiumak rabo-e, maksai tazai tiumak rabo-e, maksai charum shaibo wakhao jan tiumak rabo-e, khatdi npui-npiu thiubo gasu paliu pum kam taniamak rabo-e.”

Sijengniu pasaibo naise Paul niu khang madai situ puilujiu kam masanbo rathakse kamde. Sichiujiu paniu Charaky lunggase ngut lujiu kam masanbo lunggase, patingmik changmak then paliu mathiu leng khat-khat thiujiu charathiujiu bamrabo-e chiubo kamlen khaide.
Sichiujiu jeng chinniase loisubo tingga Asia luongriang lamsu wangbo Jehudi maidung khangsianiu Paul tu charaky lunggasu ngaolude. Paliuniu maidungtu kam karungkhai lujiu Paul tu jamman lude.
Paliuniu haichiu senjiu din-e, “Israel maidung yo, nkha khailo! Haibo piu hai pabam machangna tadronjiu Israel maidung khuga Mose gu Tacheng-tajai nai haibo Rakytu suimakra katikhaijiu kinbo-e!”
(Paliuniu haichiu dinbo rambara, Ephesus maipiu Trophimus tu Paul niu maluang kinbo ngaobo jengniu, Paul niu sinatu Charaky lungga maluang ngut bamme chiujiu maningbo-e).
Namdi pakhiangnase kabuak sude, sichiujiu maidungse pakwang karen lujiu Paul tu jamman lujiu Charaky akhamdung sidi khamkam wangmide.
Sichiujiu maidung siniu Paul tu kamshat mira kammiboga, Rome gu charipi khuga Jerusalem ga kabuak chang kabuak bamme chiujiu paokhaide.
Siga charipi siniu charimaidung khangsiatu maluang lujiu mathiu ruanggase pakwangde. Maidung siniu charimaidung situ ngaoboga, paliuniu Paul tu dapbambose mathak mide.
Charipi siniu Paul khulam wanglujiu patu minlude khatdi chagiriang nianiu patu ratmanra chamtan pide, Siga paniu maniu-e, “Haibo piu hai saolo, khatdi paniu degu kammi jiulo?”

Maidung ruang gasu khangsianiu wakhat din-e, khangsianiu katam din-e, Sichiujiu charipi siniu kabuak bambo lamga simasan lulak mibo donniu Paul situ riphendung bambo bam gase juwang mira chamtan pikhaide.
Paliuniu haijiukha patu ngaosa-e, sijengniu riphendung siniu patu pontad mide, palamra maidungse haijiukha samide.
Paliu mathiuse pasaiga wanglujiu haichiu sen-e, “Patu kamshat milo!”
Riphendung siniu Paul situ riphendung bambo bamga maluang ngut mira kambamboga, paniu charipi khuga din-e, “Wapoi nakha Iniu nakhuga dinbo suima?”
Charipi siniu maniu-e, “Nang Greek lad dinbo maima?
Sichiusai nda pakak khatga kabuakbo padjiu mania thinbo mai sang madaitu maluang lujiu ramjingga tadbo Egypt maipiu sira nang makma?”
Paul niu paokakge, “Ira para kathiubo namdi Cilicia ga bambo Tarsus gasu manabo Jehudi mai-e. Atu chalung sajiu maidung khuga chalad dinra suikhai khelo.”

Siga charipi siniu patu chalad dinra suikhai bide, siga Paul niu tason gase chaplujiu maidung situ maliumak bamra paben kahai khaide. Sichiujiu mai hinase maliuna bammiboga, Paul niu Hebrew mai lad gasu paliu khuga dinsude:
“Apui nahmai Jehudi maidung yo, naliu suangga Iniu alam dinbo haitu naliu nking khailo!”
Sichiujiu paniu paliu khuga Hebrew mai ladniu dinsuboga, paliuse maliu makjiu khatdi rim-rim miboga, Paul niu dinsude:
Sichiujiu haibo Npuiga tadmaidungtu Iniu kashaibo tangna kam mathad khai mibo-e. Iniu maipuidung tudi maipiudung tudi minlujiu kavangkyga bangkhai mibo-e.

Iniu majibo cham hai din bamme chiubo Dibo Singku siniu khatdi Apaimai siniu sijiu bambo-e. Paliuniu Damascus ga bambo singna Jehudi maidung khuga chamlen raokhaibo Iniu paliu khugasu daobo-e, sichiujiu siga bam maidungtu minlujiu khatdi ratlujiu Jerusalem ga puiwang paliutu mathad khaira Iniu tadbo-e.
“Sichiujiu Iniu Damascus manawang suboga, niending wan gase tingpuk lamsu pabiu ranranbo khatniu atu thao maguinuang mide.
Iniu kadihga kaokiuboga, chakhuan khatniu akhuga haichiu dinbo I chiu-e, ‘Saul, Saul! Dekamjiu nangniu atu kam mathad kinjiulo?’
Siga Iniu maniu-e, ‘Rapiu nang saolo?’ Paniu akhuga din-e, ‘Ira nangniu kam mathad kinbo Nazareth Jesu si-e.’
Atu maluang tadkin maidungse pa-nbiu situ ngao-e, chiudi atu npaobo khuan sira chiumakge.
Iniu maniu-e, ‘Rapiu yo, Iniu degu kamralo?’ Siga Rapiu niu akhuga din-e, ‘Sulujiu Damascus lam tadngut sulo, siga Tingwang niu maningbose nangniu kamra pakhiangna nakhuga dinkhaibi rabo-e.’
Pabiu ran-ranbo siniu amik ngaota mide, sijengniu atu maluang tadmaidung siniu aben julujiu Damascus ga ngutde.
“Sibo namdi gase aliugu Tacheng-tajaiga pacheng matipbo piu pazanniu Ananias kubo Jehudi mai mathiuniu chakhuang thiubo piu siga lung bamme.
Paniu amungga wang chaplujiu din-e, ‘Singna Saul yo, ngaomi sulo!’ Sibo wansiakga ngaolan mide sichiujiu Iniu patu phui-e.
Paniu din-e, ‘Aliu pao-pehmai Rawang siniu pamaning kamra, pagu kamajibo Vangpiutu ngaolura, khatdi paniu dinbo pakhuan chiulura natu kadakhai mibo-e.
Palamra nangniu ngaolubo khatdi chiulubose mai hina khuga nangniu jengdin thiurabo-e.
Sijengniu dekamjiu tuhoi khuanbam ralo? Sulujiu tadui nphum sulo, khatdi na-nuanse kuaklura pakhuga kakheng thiululo.’
“Iniu Jerusalem ga malanwang lujiu Charaky lungga kakheng thiu bamga madungao khat Iniu ngao-e,
siga Rapiu niu akhuga haichiu dinbo I chiu-e. ‘Kalang sulo, Jerusalem tu kalangjiu phutkhai milo, palamra haiga bammaidung siniu alamga nangniu jengdin thiubo situ lukhai lakge.’
Siga Iniu paokakge, ‘Rapiu yo, Iniu maduikyga tadlujiu, natu malum maidungtu minlujiu dapbose paliuniu masanjiu sibamme.
Sichiujiu nagu jengdin thiubo Stephen tu kamshatra Iniu sui khaibo-e khatdi patu kamshat maigu fai-nidungse Iniu akhikhai mibo-e.’
Siga Rapiu niu akhuga din-e, ‘Tadsulo, Iniu natu Nkengmaidung khulam langkhai rabo-e.’”
Paul niu haichiu dinbo katang maidung siniu nkingkhai lujiu, paliu khuan tanchang-tanjiu haichiu sensude, “Patu kam maha milo; patu kamshat milo! Pahai ringbamra buita mide!”
Sichiujiu paliu makiak-marajiu, paliu faini thin kajitjiu khatdi tabui marajon sude.
Rome maigu charipi siniu Paul situ riphendung bamga ju-ngut mira khatdi Jehudi maidungniu palamga makiak-marajiu bambo lamga dapjiu phiura chamtan pikhaide.
Chiudi paliuniu patu dapra kamsuboga, Paul niu siga chapbambo chakampao khuga din-e, “Rome mai khang khattu ladjan thiumakjiu dapra naliugu tacheng-tajai siniu suima?”
Haise chakampao siniu chiuboga, paniu charipi khugase tadlujiu maniu-e, “Nangniu kambambo hai degulo? Haibo piuse Rome mai-e!”
Sijengniu charipi siniu Paul khuga tadlujiu maniu-e, “Nang hai Rome maima, akhuga dinkhailo?” Paul niu paokakge, “Yo.”
Siga charipi siniu din-e, “Iniu rangkang kengkha pilujiu Rome mai khat thiumibo-e,”
Paul niu paokakge, “Chiudi Ira apui mana gasu-e.”
Siga Paul tu chalad maniura maidungse pakhugasu sailam nkhinpad mide; khatdi charipi sidi Paul hai Rome mai-e chiubo silujiu paniu patu chagiriangniu ratman khai mibose maning khaiboga pingmide.

Jehudi maidung siniu dekamjiu Paul tu din masa bamjiulo chiubo simasan lura jengniu, pasaibo naise paniu Paul tu chagiriang ratman khai bambo gasu khipad lujiu, singkupaodung nai Apaimaidung situ wang maduira chamtan pikhaide. Siga paniu Paul tu julujiu paliu mathiu masuangga pichap khaide.
Paul niu Apaimaidung situ phui mating lujiu din-e, “Asingna Israel maidung yo! Thainai tangbo Iniu Tingwang masuangga dechiu lungkhai milo chiubo I masanjiu sibamme.”
Dibo Singku Ananias siniu Paul mungga chapbammai khuga pamunse kakhiura chamtan pikhaide.

Siga Paul niu pakhuga din-e, “ Manuk maka khai nbambo singbeng nang, Tingwang niu natu maomakjiu kakhiu rabo-e! Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu atu ladjan thiura nang siga ntao bamme, chiudi nangniu Tacheng-tajai situ kampang lujiu atu dapra nangniu chamtan pikhai bamme!”
Siga Paul mungga ntao bam maidung siniu pakhuga din-e, “Nangniu Tingwang gu Dibo Singku situ pamao pibamme!”
Paniu haise dinkhai gapboga, maidungse paphom nia thiujiu, Pharisee maidung nai Sudducee maidung chiujiu chalad apaijiu tadpad tam-tam mide.
(Palamra Sadducee maidungniu din-e chiubora maidung siniu shaimibo gasu ringsulan lakge, khatdi siga mazadung maksai hiupuinadung ha-e; chiudi Pharisee maidungra sum situ malumme).

Chakhuanse tanbi-bijiu kario khang sude, siga Pharisee maidung, Tacheng-tajaigu katipaodung khangsia siniu chapkhang lujiu haichiu tanjiu dinsude: “Aliuniu haibo piu khuga wadi kamaobo daomakge! Hiupuina khatniu maksai maza khatniu pakhuga pachangsiak dinkhaibo sui-e.”

Haichiujiu aribo hai tanchang-tan khang mibo jengniu Paul tuse phettap-tapmi suma chiujiu charipi siniu manang mide. Sijengniu riphendung situ tadlujiu Paul tu paliu khugasu riphendung bamgase puiwang khai mira chamtan pikhaide.
Sibo nai nchunse Rapiu niu Paul khuga chaplujiu din-e, “Ping mane! Nangniu Jerusalem haiga ajengniu nagu jengdin thiu khai mide, sise kumjiu Rome gadi nangniu kamrabo-e.”
Pasaibo nai nsuanse Jehudi maidungniu aruang lujiu wakhat rangsu mide.Paliuniu Paul tu kamshat lumak thenna, wadi tiulakge maksai wadi saklakge chiujiu tasiang siang mide.
Haichiu rangbo haise chamai khang atai suang keng-e.
Sichiujiu paliuniu singku paodung khuga tadlujiu din-e, “Aliuniu Paul tu kamshat lumak thenna, wadi katiu tiulakge, chiujiu aliu tasiang siang lude.

Sijengniu, tuhoira naliuniu khatdi Apaimaidung siniu palamga wa sikhai sannibo kabam saothiujiu, Paul tu naliu khuga maluang kiulo chiujiu, Rome gu charipi khuga tacham langkhailo. Chiudi paniu haiga wangtang makhaga aliuniu patu kamshat mira kaden bamme.”
Chiudi haichiujiu limrabo khuan hai Paul tanpui nahpiu siniu chiulude; sijengniu riphendung bamgase paniu tadlujiu Paul khuga haibo lamga paokhai bide.
Siga Paul niu chakampao khang khattu kulujiu din-e, “Haibo akhangmai nah haitu charipi khuga majang meng khailo; paniu pakhuga wakhat dinkhaira bamjiu-e.”

Chakampao siniu patuse puilujiu charipi khuga majang meng din-e, “Kavangkyga bambo Paul siniu atu kulujiu haibo akhangmai nah haitu nakhuga majang meng khailo chiu dinbo-e, palamra paniu nakhuga wakhat dinkhaira bamme chiu-e.”
Charipi siniu patuse paben julujiu paronna tadpad pakhuga maniu-e, “Nangniu akhuga degu dinkhai nibo bamjiulo?”
Paniu din-e, “Jehudi maigu kating maidung siniu Paul haitu nsuannai Apaimaidung khuga maluang kiura nakhuga khengne chiu chaplude.

Chiudi paliu lad lukhai jan mane, palamra chamai khang atai suang kengjiu mahin patu chonjiu bamme khatdi limjiu bamme. Paliuniu patu kamshat lumak then wadi tiudi tiulakge, maksai wadi sakdi saklakge chiujiu tasiang siang lude. Tuhoira sise kamra paliuniu nachamtu ronna khuan bambo-e.”
Charipi siniu din-e, “Nangniu haise akhuga dinmide chiubo mai khat khugadi din mane.” Sichiu dinkhai lujiu paniu akhangmai nah situ langkhai mide.

Sigasu charipi siniu pagu chakampao khang niatu kulujiu din-e, “Thaichun wanchak chakiu ningga Caesarea lam tadra, charimai kai-nia, siganiu chaqon tongmai riak-chinnia khatdi changiu thinmai kai-nia kaden sulo.
Paul niu tuanglujiu tadra chaqon kasia pikhailo, sichiujiu patu pijiu Dihthinpao Felix khuga wijiu mengtang lura kamkhailo.”
Sichiujiu charipi siniu chamtan khat haichiujiu raokhaide:
“Paken dibo Claudius Lysia bamga, dihthinpao Felix niu kahum khai-e.
Jehudi maidungniu haibo piu haitu minlujiu kamshat mira kambam niubo-e. Pahai Rome mai-e chiubo Iniu siluboga, arimaidungtu majang lujiu Iniu patu ranpad khai bibo-e.
Paliuniu dekamjiu patu din masajiu bamjiulo chiubo Iniu sinibo jengniu patu paliugu Apaimaidung khuga maluang wangbo-e.
Chiudi patu kamshat raleng maksai kavangkyga khai suibo pamao wakhatdi ha-e chiubo Iniu silude; pariga madam khaibo siniura paliugu Tacheng-tajai lamga-e.

Sichiujiu patu kamshatra limbamme chiubo atu pisi khaiboga, nakhulam langkhai nuang mira Iniu chapkhai lujiu, pariga madam khaibo maidung situ namasuangga pijiu ataira paliu khuga Iniu dinkhai mibo-e.”
Riphendung siniu paliutu pikhaibo chamtanse majaijiu kamkhaide. Paliuniu Paul tu puilujiu sibonai nchunse Antipatris tangbo majang tad khaide.
Pasaibo naise paliuniu chaqon tong maidungniu patu maluang tadra khaidiak lujiu paliura malanwang mide.
Paliuniu patu Caesarea katang maluang kiu lujiu, Dihthinpao khuga chamlense benlen khailujiu Paul tu saokhaidiak lujiu malan mide.
Dihthinpao siniu chamlense kenlujiu, Paul hai degu kadih lamsulo chiubo maniude. Pahai Cilicia lamsu-e chiubo paniu siluboga,
paniu din-e, “Natu madam khaibo maidung wangtangbo sainiu nalad Iniu nking rabo-e.” Sichiujiu Paul haitu dihthinpao kyga akhemai khuga khaibam mira chamtan pikhaide.

Jeng mangiu saiga, Dibo Singku Ananias niu kating maidung khangsiatu khatdi chalamdinpao pazanniu Tertullus kubo khang khattu maluang lujiu Caesarea lam tadde. Paliuniu Felix masuangga wanglujiu Paul tu madam khai sude.
Siga Paul tu ku-ngut lujiu Tertullus niu haichiujiu madam khaibo chamse din sude:
“Pakendibo piu yo! Nagu ningting tasi hainiu jukhaibo jengniu aliu khuga agi-manaibo hai pating thengkha wangmibo-e khatdi aliu kadihga kawibo katam-tambo phungwang khai bide.
Haise pabam machangnaga aliuniu lunibo-e, sichiujiu pawan machang aliuniu natu dijiu thuonkiu bamme.
Iniu nagu pawanse lu mathengra luni makge, chiudi aliugu kadunbo racham hai nking khaira khengbo-e.
Aliuniu haibo piu haitu sachang sabo maileng lukhai-e; paniu kadihpiriga bammai Jehudi mai pakhiangna ruangga kam kabuakjiu bambo-e. Sichiujiu pahai Nazareth maidunggu jupao khatle.
Sigasu paniu Charaky haitu kam tania khaira matanbam niujiu, aliuniu patu minbo-e. Aliuniu patu aliugu Tajai saisuijiu ladjan thiura maningbo-e,
chiudi charipi Lysias niu wanglujiu aliu khugasu matanjiu patu sutlubo-e.
Sigasu Lysias niu namasuangga wanglujiu patu madam khaibose dinra chamtan pikhaibo-e. Nangniu pakhuga maniusai, patu aliuniu madam khaijiu bambo hai pakhu gasu nang silu bui-e.”
Jehudi maidung siniu wang aruang lujiu madam khaijiu bambo haise maji kambo-e chiujiu dinsude.
Dihthinpao siniu Paul situ chalad dinra kamlen khai biboga, Paul niu dinsude,
“Haibo jat riga nangniu takum wajiukha ladjan thiu wangmide chiubo I kasi jengniu, namasuangga Iniu alamga dinra daolubo jengniu achun wi-e.
Nangniu sibambo si-e chiubora, Iniu Jerusalem lam kahumra tadbose jeng kariuje-niakiu riga nkiu makha-e.
Iniu Jerusalem lungga mai khattudi aribam niubo maksai maduikyga bidi, maksai namdi lungga bidi maidungtu kam kabuak bamniubo Jehudi maidungniu daomakge.
Sichiu makdi paliuniu tuhoi ariga madam khaibo haise namasuangga dinlen ngam lakge.

Iniu haise namasuangga pachangsiak dinbo-e: Paliuniu mao-e chiujiu dinbo Npui gase Ira tadjiu aliu pao-pehmai Rawang tu kahumbo-e. Chiudi Mose gu Tacheng-tajaiga khatdi phaimiukakung maidunggu Ariak khuangga raokhai bambo hinase Iniu malumme.
Haibo maidungniu malumbo kumjiu Idi Tingwang tu malumme, chiubora mai hina, kawimaidi, kasamaidi, kashaibo gasu ringsulan kamne, chiubo situ Iniu malumme.
Sichiujiu Chara-chamai mathiu suangga, alung masan siakjiu bamra Iniu matanbo-e.
Sichiujiu Iniu kam masanbo rathakse thiuloi lujiu bambo gase paliuniu atu Charaky lunggasu daobo-e. Sigase maidung khuga kabuakbo wakhatdi ha-e.
Chiudi Asia luongriang lamsu Jehudi maidung khangsianiu namasuangga wangjiu, paliuniu ariga madamkhai nibo bamsai madam khaibo sui-e.
Sichiu maksai Iniu Apaimaidung masuangga chapbo lonse degu kamaobo bamlo chiubo paliutu tuhoi pijiu dinkhailo.
Iniu paliu masuangga chapbambo tingga lamkhat jengniu dinbo-e: Kashaimaidungse ringsulan rabo-e, chiubo Iniu malumbo jenggasu thainai atu nangniu ladjan thiu bambo-e.”
Sibo Npui lamga simakeng bambo Felix niu nking mawikhai-e. Paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Charipi Lysias niu wangbo tingga, Iniu naliu lamga makhiam thiune.”
Paul tu phuibambo chakampao siniu patu akhejiu bamlo, chiudi pakhen-pani thiujiu bamra khatdi paka maidungniu paleng chang kamakbo pikhaijiu bamra suikhailo chiujiu paniu chamtan pikhaide.
Pakak khat saiga, Felix niu panao Jehudi maipui Drusilla tu maluanglu wangde. Paniu Jesu Khrista tu malumbo lamga pijiu pakhuga dinkhaira Paul tu kukhaide.

Chiudi Paul niu kawibo lamga, papum paronna thinmanbo khatdi wangkinbo ladjan Tingmik lamga arikhang suboga Felix ping mide, sichiujiu paniu din-e, “Tuhoira nang tadmidi suide, Iniu pawan daolubo tingga natu kukhai lanne.”
Sironna makjiu Paul niu patu rangkang tanim thiujiu pikhai sune chiu maning lujiu, paniu patu npaora ku kalang-lang-e.
Takum nia saiga, Felix tu Porcius Festus niu dihthinpao thiujiu malin mide. Felix niu Jehudi maidung thuon lunijiu Paul tu kavangkyga khaidiak mide.
Festus niu sibo kadihga wangtangbo jeng sum sai gase, paniu Caesarea gasu Jerusalem lam tadde.
Siga singku paodung nai Jehudi maidunggu jupaodung wangjiu Paul riga madam khailan sude.
Paliuniu Festus khuga Paul tu Jerusalem ga puiwangra kheng-e, palamra paliuniu npuiki gasu patu kamshat mira limne chiujiu rangbo-e.
Festus niu paokakge, “Paul situ Caesarea gu kavangkyga khaibambo-e, siga I apum siakdi tadlan sune.
Singnapiu siniu kamaobo bamsai, pijiu naliugu jupaodungtu Caesarea lam asai suitad lujiu patu madam khaibo sui-e.”
Sibosai Festus niu jengriu nakha paliutu maluang bam lujiu Caesarea lam tadmide. Pasaibo naise paniu ladjanky gase wanglujiu Paul tu puiwangra chamtan pikhaide.
Paul niu wangtang gapboga, Jerusalem lamsu wangbo Jehudi maidungse suchap lujiu pariga wajiukha madam khai sude, chiudi paliu mai khatniudi sise pachang siakge chiubora dinlen ngam makge.
Chiudi Paul niu paronna maribo chamse dinsude: “Iniu Jehudi maidunggu Tacheng-tajaitu maksai haibo Raky tu maksai Rome gu Wangditu din masabo wadi ha-e.”
Chiudi Festus niu Jehudi maidung thuon lunibo jengniu, paniu Paul khuga maniu-e, “Jerusalem ga tadlujiu, sigasu amasuangga ladjan thiura nang suima?”
Paul niu din-e, “Atu ladjan thiu rabo bam Wangdihgu ladjanky siakga I chap bamme. Nangniu simasan bambo kumjiu, Iniu Jehudi maidung khuga kamaobo wadi kamkhai makge.

Iniu Tacheng-tajai situ kampang lujiu, shaidi suibo maomeng tenkhai bambo jengniu mari lura Iniu khengbo makge. Chiudi paliuniu ariga madam khaijiu bambo gase majibo hasai, mai khatniudi paliu khuga atu pikhai ngam lakge. Sijengniu Wangdi khuga wangra Iniu khengbo-e.”
Siga Festus niu pagu ladpipaodung khuga maniu lujiu paokakge, “Nangniu Wangdi khuga tadra khengbo jengniu, nang Wangdi khuga tadrabo-e.”
Pakak khat saiga Chawang Agrippa nai Bernice niu Festus tu adao khaira Caesarea ga wangde. (Bernice hai Agrippa tanpui-e).
Siga panainiu bamnak khailubo saiga Festus niu chawang khuga Paul lamga haichiu din-e: “Haiga Felix niu kavangkyga khaidiak bamniubo piu khat bamme:
sichiujiu Iniu Jerusalem ga tadboga, Jehudi maigu singku paodung nai kating maidungniu pariga wajiukha madam khaijiu patu ladjan thiu khaira akhuga dinbo-e.

Chiudi Iniu paliu khuga din-e, chiubora aliu Rome maidungra patu madam khai maidungse nai zudaojiu arimak then, khatdi patu madam khaibose paronna marilu rabo chamse dinmak then, mai khattudi pamao bamme chiujiu dinbo suimakge.
Sichiujiu paliuniu haiga wangboga pawanse Iniu kam maha makjiu, pasaibo nai siakse Iniu ladjankyga ntao lujiu sibo piu situ puiwangra chamtan pikhaide.
Patu atungmaidung siniu chapkhangjiu wa kakengkha patu madam khaijiu dinbo-e, chiudi Iniu maningbo kumjiu kasabo wakhatdi din makge.
Paliu mathiuniu patu aribo sira paliugu tacheng lamga-e, khatdi mai khat pazanniu Jesu kubo, shaimibo lamga-e, chiudi Paul niu pahai ringbamme chiujiu dinbo-e.
Chiudi Iniu haibo lamga wa maniu khaini sonra maning makbo jengniu, Jerusalem ga tadlujiu haibo lamga ladjan thiura pah suima chiujiu maniu-e.
Chiudi Paul niu pagu ladjan haise Wangdi khugasu ladjan thiuraleng kheng-e. Sijengniu Wangdi khulam patu langkhai lumakbo suangga patu akhejiu khonbamra Iniu chamtan pikhai mibo-e.”
Siga Agrippa niu Festus khuga din-e, “Haise Iniu apumsiak niu chiukhai nibo-e.”
Festus niu paokakge, “Nsuan nai nangniu palad nkingbo sui-e.”

Pasaibo naise Agrippa nai Bernice niu kadensui lujiu charipidung khatdi namdigu jupaodungtu maluang lujiu mathiu maduikygase ngutde. Sichiujiu Festus niu chamtan pikhaiboga, paliuniu Paul tu maluang ngutde.

Festus niu din-e, “Chawang Agrippa khatdi haiga aliu mathiutu maluang bam maidung; Naliuniu ngao bambo piu riga hai Jehudi mai haiga bam maidi, Jerusalem ga bammai hina niudi, wa madam khaijiu akhuga dinwangbo-e. Pahai ringra bui tamide chiujiu paliuniu senpad mibo-e.
Chiudi paniu shai buibo ngam kam mide chiubo Ira wadi daomakge. Sichiujiu paniu Wangdi khuga wangra khengbo donniu, Iniu patu langkhaira maning bambo-e.

Chiudi Iniu Wangdi khuga raokhaira walam khatdi ha-e. Sijengniu patu haiga Iniu naliu mathiu suangga nkiujiu, Chawang Agrippa nama suangga puiwangbo-e! Sichiujiu pagu ladjan lamga phui masan lubo sainiu, raokhaira I daobo sui-e.
Palamra kavangkyga bammai khatgu pamao simasan makjiu patu langkhai mira maji makge chiujiu Iniu maningbo-e.”
Agrippa niu Paul khuga din-e, “Nangniu nalamga dinnibo hina dinra suikhaide.” Siga Paul niu paben henpad lujiu, haichiu dinkiu sude:
“Oh, Chawang Agrippa yo, I asan wi-e chiu maning-e palamra thainai Iniu namasuangga Jehudi maidungniu atu madam khaibo hina,
nkiujiu Jehudi mai chengriak khatdi paliuniu chalad apaijiu bambo lamga masanjiu nang sibambo jengniu, chalungsajiu alad nking khaira Iniu nakhuga khengbo-e.
“Iniu nahting gasu dechiu lungkhang milo chiubo hai Jehudi mai mathiuniu sibambo-e. Iniu agu karingtingga dechiujiu agu kadihga khatdi Jerusalem ga lungkhai milo chiubo paliuniu sibamme.
Karai gasu Ira aliu cheng majai kathubo, Pharisee mai phom gasu-e chiubo paliuniu sijiu bambo-e.
Sichiujiu aliu pao-pehmai khuga Tingwang niu ladriat khaibo lamga, khatdi Iniu malumbo lamga tuhoi atu ladjan thiura haibo bamga I chap bambo-e.
Haise aliugu chaphiu kariu-je-niakiu siniu Tingwang tu nchun n-nien saomakjiu kahumjiu bambo malum donniu-e. Haibo malum jengniu Jehudi maidungniu atu madam khaijiu bambo-e, Pakendibo Piu yo!
Tingwang niu kashaibo piringsu khai-e chiubo hai dekamjiu naliu haiga bammai siniu malum mak jiulo?
Sise Iniu Jerusalem ga kamkhai mibo-e. Singku paodung khugasu pumtan daolujiu, Tingwang maidung kakeng khatu kavangkyga khai mibo-e; sichiujiu paliutu kamshatra dinsai, Idi siga suikhaibo-e.

Paliugu malumbo situ phutmira Iniu paliutu maduiky hina gasu wajiukha kam mathad khai mibo-e. Iniu paliutu wajiukha ngaokhai lakbo-e, palamra paliutu kam mathad raleng Iniu sangdiumai dihga katang tadkhai mibo-e.
“Haibo lamga Iniu singku paodung khugasu pumtan nai chamtan daolujiu Damascus lam tadbo-e.
Haise npuikiga niending wan-ga, naimik biu suang benbo khatniu tingpuk lamsu amungga khatdi atu maluang tabin tadkin maidungtu thao magui khaibo Iniu ngao-e.

Aliu mathiuse kadihga kaokiu mibo-e, siga Hebrew mai ladgasu chakhuan khatniu akhuga dinbo I chiu-e, ‘Saul, Saul! Dekamjiu nangniu atu kam mathad kinjiulo? Nang hai matomchiniu pakaiga masuibo kumjiu naronna natu kam mathiu kinbo-e.’
Siga Iniu maniu-e, ‘Rapiu yo! Nang saolo?’ Siga Rapiu niu paokakge, ‘Ira nangniu kam mathad kinbo Jesu si-e.
Chiudi sulujiu chapsulo. Iniu natu avang khat pithiu khaira jengniu natu lukhaibo-e. Thainai nangniu ngaokhai mibo hai khatdi pasai Iniu natu lenkhai rabo hai nangniu maidung khuga dinrabo-e.
Iniu natu langkhai rabo Israel maidung khatdi Nkeng maidung khugasu natu rankhaibi rabo-e.

Nangniu paliu mikse tamiubo gasu kabenbo pingao khairabo-e khatdi Satan pumtan gasu Tingwang pumtan situ pingao khairabo-e, sichiujiu paliuniu atu malumlu dasai paliu nuanse kuak khai bine, khatdi Tingwang niu kadalu maidung ruanggase paliu bam daolura-e.’
“Sijengniu Chawang Agrippa yo, Tinggen lamsu Iniu ngaobo madungao situ Iniu majai makbo gu makge.

Raithuboga Damascus ga khatdi Jerusalem ga, sigasu Judaea pakhiangna khatdi Nkeng maidung ruangga, paliuniu paliu nuan gasu lungli lujiu Tingwang khulam mariwangbo khatdi paliu lungli mide chiubo lenbo ngam kamra Iniu dinkinbo-e.
Haibo lamga Iniu Charaky lungga bambo tingga Jehudi maidung siniu atu minbo-e khatdi kamshatra matanbo-e.

Chiudi thainai siak hai Tingwang niu atu nkha khai bibo donniu, haiga Iniu chaplujiu, kati-kadi mathiu khuga agu lamchap pibambo-e. Iniu dinbambo haise phaimiukakung maidungniu khatdi Mose niu padsu rabo-e chiujiu dinkhai mibo si-e:
Chiubora Messiah haise chariu khengrabo-e, khatdi kashaibo ruang gasu piringsu raithubose thiujiu Jehudi maidung khatdi Nkeng maidung khuga juringbo gu kabenbose pisi khai rabo-e.”
Paul niu haichiujiu paronna palam phesuboga, Festus niu pakhuan tanjiu din-e, “Paul, nang kaluang mide! Nagu tasi simakeng mibo siniu natu kam chara masa mide!”
Chiudi Paul niu paokakge, “Chakhuang thiubuibo! I kaluang makge, I chara masa makge. Kamajibo palingbo ladse Iniu dinbo-e.
Oh, Chawang Agrippa yo, nakhuga Iniu hujiu dinbo-e, palamra haibo lam hina nangniu sijiu bamme. Pakhiangna haise kamikki gasu padbo makge, chiubo pakhiangna hai nang sikam bamme chiubo Iniu malumme.
Chawang Agrippa yo, phaimiukakung maidungtu nang malumma? Nang malumme chiubo I si-e!”
Siga Agrippa niu Paul khuga din-e, “Pawan kadunbo kak haigasu nangniu atu pi Khristian khat thiukhaine chiujiu ma?”

Paul niu paokakge, “Pawan dunma, thengma, nangdi khatdi thainai haiga alad nkingjiu bammai hinaniu, atu ratman bambo haitu makjiu, Iniu dinbambo hai wangtang lura Iniu Tingwang khuga khengjiu bambo-e!”
Siga chawang, dihthinpao, Bernice khatdi mathiuse chapsu mide,
sichiujiu mathiuse tadmibo saiga paliu karai khat khat khuga din-e, “Haibo piu hainiu shai buibo maksai kavangkyga ngutbuibo wakhatdi kam makge.”
Khatdi Agrippa niu Festus khuga din-e, “Haibo piu hainiu Wangdi khuga wangra paniu khengmak bamniusai patu phutkhai mira suibo-e.”
Aliuniu Italy lam malee tuanglujiu tadmine chiujiu chapluboga, paliuniu Paul tu khatdi kavangkyga bammaidung khangsiatu “Wangdi Riphen” kubo Rome riphendunggu chakampao Julius khuga benlen khaide.
Aliuniu Adramyttium gasu malee tuanglujiu Asia luongrianggu duipui lamse tadra kaden lujiu tadsude. Thessaloni gasu Mecedonia mai khat Aristarchus kubo piu aliu saisui kin-e.

Sichiujiu pasaibo naise aliuniu Sidon ga wangtangde. Julius niu Paul tu lungsa khaijiu paniu paka-paphen maidung khuga tad mariujiu adao khaira khatdi paleng machang kamakbo hinadi pikhaira suikhaide.
Sigasu aliu tadlan sude, sichiudi tingthung tingkaise aliu khulam hunkhaibo jengniu, aliuniu Cyprus kadihgu nbaiky lamse tadkhai mide.
Sichiujiu aliuniu Silicia nai Pamphylia duipuise kenlujiu Lycia ga bambo Myra ga wangde.
Siga chakampao siniu Alexandria lamsu wangbo Italy lam tadrabo aliam khat daolujiu, paniu siga aliutu khailujiu tadsude.

Aliu chariu chang chariujiu koina maleese ramjiu naimikpui wajiukha sainiu Cnidus namdiga wangtangde. Sibo genlamse tingkai niu aliutu pitad khai makbo jengniu, aliuniu Crete dihgu nbaiky lamse Salmone Kawibo Mathakbam tulimki kenjiu aliamse tongkiude.
Aliuniu matan tanjiu sibo genlamse kenpadjiu Kawibo Mathakbam kubo bam gase, Lasea namdi gasu diumakbo gase wangde.
Aliuniu pawan kathengkha, chabin tadraleng kung mibo donniu, Nchuk Thoibo Tingmik
“Singnamai yo, aliuniu nbin tadrabo npui hai kungchang kung-e; aliamdi, maniadungdi wajiukha harabo-e khatdi aliu ringtingdi hakhaibo sui-e chiubo Iniu ngao-e.”
Sichiudi riphen-gu chakampao situ charipi nai aliam paopiu siniu hiamlujiu Paul niu dinbo suikhai makge.

Sibo mathakbamse tathe tingga bamwi makbo bamme, maidung kakeng khaniudi tadpad miraleng din-e, khatdi daolu buisai Phoenix ga wangtangjiu, tathe tingga siga bamra machun karen-e. Phoenix haise Crete ga bambo tingrun nai tingnu lam khatdi tingpi nai tingnu lam bambo mathakbam khatle.
Tingrun lamsu tingkai koina hunri-ri wangde, siga maidung siniu paliu maningbo wangtang lubui-e chiubo maning lujiu, Crete tangbo tadra maleese tuanglujiu tadsude.
Chiudi pakak khat saiga tingkai katanbo, “Tingpi-tingkai” kubo tingkaise hunkiu sude.
Haisiniu malee situ huntaode, sichiujiu tingkai gase, aliamse tadkiu silak mibo jengniu, pijiu tingkai situ ponkhai nibo jailam ponkhai sude.
Cauda kadihga wangtangboga nbaiky daode. Siga aliuniu aliam situ katinkhai lande.

Siga paliuniu maleese jupad lujiu chariangniu khinkhaide. Libya jaibek lamse pakkhai mira paliuse kapingbo jengniu, paliuniu chariangse khin manakhai lujiu, malee situ pijiu tingkainiu hunmeng hunwangjiu bamra kamkhaide.
Tingthung tingkaise palunjiu hunbambo donniu, pasaibo naise paliuniu malee lungga bambo maniadungse lenlam thonpad sude,
pasaibo naise paliuniu maleegu maniadungse lenlam thonpad lan sude.
Tingthung tingkaise hunjiu bambo donniu, aliuniu naimikdi, chagandi ngaota mide. Sichiujiu kanambo gara aliu hai ringlune chiubo maningta mide.

Maidungse pawan kathengkha katiu tiuta mibo saiga, Paul niu paliu suangga chaplujiu din-e, “Singnamai yo, naliuniu agu kadin suisai Crete lam tadkhai mak rabo-e; sichiusai haibo magenthak haise aliuniu daolakge.
Chiudi tuhoi Iniu naliu khuga khengbo-e, hululo! Naliu mai khatnadi shai lakge, maleese ronna hakhai mirabo-e.
Palamra danai nchunse Iniu kahum kinbo Tingwang gu maza khatniu akhuga wangjiu din-e,
‘Ping mane! Paul yo! Wangdi masuangga nang chapsiak rabo-e. Sichiujiu natu lungsabo Tingwang siniu natu maluang tadkinmai mathiu ringting gukhaibi rabo-e.’
Sijengniu maidung yo, hululo! Palamra akhuga dinkhai mibo kumgapjiu padne chiubo Iniu Tingwang tu malumme.
Chiudi aliutu kadih pabam khatlam jukhaimi sune.
Tingthung tingkai siniu aliutu Mediterranean lam jukhai mibose jengriu-je-madaikiu tangmibo nchun-e. Chunding wan gase aliugu maleedungse kadihga wang mana mide chiubo maning masa sude.
Sijengniu paliuniu taduise madadbo tingga chakhet makai daode; sibosai paliuniu madad lanboga khet kariu-je-mangiukiu daode.
Sichiujiu maleese tura-lilam tadkhaimi sune chiubo paliuniu manang mibo donniu maleekhu madai haitu sailam khinman lujiu tingbenpad ratu paliu ramgun sude.
Sichiulujiu malee rampaodungse pak mira rangsude; sichiujiu maleese khipad khailan lujiu malee rambo tangse pasuanglam khai rabo thak kumjiu kamsude.
Chiudi Paul niu riphendunggu chakampao nai riphendung khuga din-e. “Malee rampaodung siniu malee lungga bam makge saira, naliu ringlune chiubo maning mane.”
Sijengniu riphendung siniu chariangse ramtap khaijiu malee situ pitad khai mide.
Nsuan tingben padsu rabo suangga, Paul niu paliu mathiu khuga wa tiura dinsude, “Tuhoira naliuniu wa tiuta mibo hai jeng kariu-je-madaikiu khangmide.
Sijengniu ringlu raleng wa tiukhailo chiujiu naliu khuga Iniu khengbo-e. Naliu thamhiukeng khatnadi halakge.”
Haichiu dinlubo sai, Paul niu taruak pek thinlujiu paliu mathiu masuang gasu Tingwang tu thuonkiujiu, sise thenpang lujiu tiusude.
Siga paliu mathiu chunwijiu, mai hinase wa tiu sude.
Sibo malee lunggase aliu chamai kai nia-je-riak chinnia-je-charukkiu bamme.
Sichiujiu mai hinase tiu magiu mibo sai, paliuniu maleese kam masen khaira takhui hinase duipuiga thonkhai mide.
Sichiujiu tingbenpad suboga, paliuniu bambo bamse malee rampaodung siniu sita mide, chiudi paliuniu tadui bao khat ngaode, sichiujiu paliuniu maleese siga ramwang lusai chiu maningde.

Sichiujiu paliuniu malee riangse ramtap khaijiu duipui gase thonkhai sude, siga paliuniu chariang sidi khipad khai lande. Sichiujiu paliuniu lenkhaibo faise pamasuangga jukhai lujiu tingkaitu pijiu hun malai khaijiu aliu tadpadde.
Chiudi maleese nbuiniangga mathao khai mijiu malai silak mide; sichiujiu maleemi lamse tingthung tingkai siniu kampang tap-tap mide.
Siga riphendung siniu kavangdungse pakmira manangbo jengniu kamshat mira kam sude.
Chiudi riphendunggu chakampao siniu Paul tu gukhai nibo donniu sichiu makra khamde. Sibosung mai hina situ pijiu tadui jiajiu rampum genlam pakkhai sude;
sichiujiu khangsia mainiu kapiupek thin lujiu, maksai pangpadbo maniase thinman lujiu suitadra chamtan pikhaide. Haichiujiu aliu mathiuse rampum genlam pakkhai lude.
Sichiujiu aliu rampum genlam npadkam lubo sai, sibo kadih situ Malta ku-e chiubo aliuniu silude.
Siga lung bambo maidung siniu aliutu maluang mawi khaide. Tingriubo khatdi agibo donniu, paliuniu chami thiulujiu aliutu pi maga khaide.
Paul niu tasing han khat ponwangjiu chami gase thonkhaijiu dikkhaiboga kaniu khat paben-ga kabetman mide.

Siga lungbambo maidung siniu Paul ben-ga kaniuse maju bambo ngao lujiu khat khat khuga din-e, “Haibo piu hai maomakjiu chamaitu kagimai bam sune, sichiujiu paniu duipui gasu mari lujiu tadi, majibo ladjan siniu patu piring khaira suita mibo-e.”
Chiudi Paul niu kaniu situ chami jiuga koina kajinkhai mide.

Pahai menkhang nuangjiu shai khangrabo situ paliura phuijiu bamme. Chiudi pawan kathengkha khonkhang lubo sai pakhuga wadi padson makboga, paliu maningse kali lujiu haichiu din-e, “Pahai chara khatle!”
Sibo bam gasu wathengkha makbo bamga sibo kadihgu chakampao Publius gu luzam khat bamme. Paniu aliutu wijiu lukhaide, sichiujiu aliuniu pakyga jengsum manai khaide.
Siga Publius piuse kakhunjiu khatdi tazai-kana tamud-ra marajiu jibamniu-e. Siga Paul niu pazi gase tadlujiu kakheng thiujiu paben kaba khaijiu piwikhai bide.
Haise padboga, sibo kadihga bammai maramai hinase wangde sichiujiu mathiutu wikhai bide.
Paliuniu aliuleng kalen kengkha pikhai-e, sichiujiu aliuniu malee tuanglujiu tadsubo tingga aliugu tabin tadga pageng bambo hinadi paliuniu pikhai bide.
Sibo kadih gase chahiu sum sai chiubora tathe tinggase aliuniu bamkhai lujiu, Alexandria gasu “Taphinbo Ra”, kubo malee gasu tuanglujiu tadmide.
Aliuniu Syracus kubo namdi gase wangtang lujiu siga jeng-sum manai khaide.
Sigasu aliuniu malee tonglan lujiu Rhegium gu namdiga wangtangde. Pasaibo naise tingrun lamsu tingkai hunsu lande, sichiujiu jeng-nia lungga aliuniu Puteoli ga wangtangde.
Siga malum maidung khangsiatu aliuniu adao-e, paliuniu aliutu nidkak khat manai khaira din-e. Sichiujiu aliuniu Rome ga wangde.

Rome ga malum maidung siniu aliu wang bamme chiubo chiulujiu Appius gu Senky namdak nai Kiriuky Sum lamsu wangjiu aliutu adao-e. Paul niu paliutu ngaoluboga pachun wichang wide, sichiujiu paliu mathiu Tingwang tu thuonkiude.
Aliuniu Rome ga wangtangboga, Paul niu paronna lungjiu riphendung siniu patu khuanjiu bamra suikhaide.

Jeng sum saiga, Paul niu siga lungbam mai Jehudi maigu jupaodungtu ku aruang khaide. Paliuniu wang maduiboga, paniu paliu khuga din-e, “Asingna Israel maidung yo, aliuniu pao-pehmai khugasu daolubo chengga maksai aliu khuga wadi kamaobo Iniu kammak tadi pijiu atu kavang thiu bambo-e khatdi Rome mai khuga atu haichiu pikhai bambo-e.
Sichiujiu akhuga wa maniu lubo sai, Rome mai siniu atu phutkhai nibo-e, palamra Iniu shai buibo wadi kam makge.
Chiudi Jehudi maidung siniu haise suimakboga, wa kamaobo kammak tadi atu hai Wangdi khuga ladjan thiura langkhaibo-e.
Sijengniu naliutu adao khaijiu npao khaira Iniu khengbo-e. Palamra, Israel maidunggu malumbo jengniu atu haichiujiu chagiriangniu bangkhai bambo-e.”
Siga paliuniu pakhuga din-e, “Nalamga kasa dinbo maksai Judea lamsu wangmai siniu nalamga wa kasabo phungwang makge, maksai nalamga chamlen khatdi aliuniu daomakge.
Chiudi nagu maning chamse nangniu dinbo aliu chiukhai ni-e, palamra naliuniu bambo phom haitu pabam hinaga din masa-e chiubo aliuniu si-e.”

Sichiujiu paliuniu Paul tu naikhat dinriat lujiu chamai kengkha wang madui lujiu Paul niu bambo bam gase wangde. Nsuan gasu chawan tamiubo tangjiu paniu Tingwang gu chawangdih lamga paliu khuga katikhai sude, khatdi paliuniu Jesu lamga malum lura Mose gu Tacheng-tajai gasu khatdi phaimiukakung maidunggu Ariak gasu khoipadjiu dinlenjiu katikhai sude.
Siga khangsia maira paniu dinbose malum mide, chiudi khangsianiu malum khai makge.

Sichiujiu Paul niu chalad dinjiu malenna katikhai lubo sai, paliu karai chuncham tamijiu tadmide. Paul niu din-e, “Naliu pao-pehmai khuga Masanbo Hiupuina siniu dejiukha wijiu phaimiukakung Isaiah niu dinkhai milo!
Palamra paniu haichiu din-e,
‘Tadlujiu haibo maidung khuga dinkhai bilo:
Naliuniu nkingjiu bamme, chiudi silakge;
naliuniu phuijiu bamdi ngao lakge.
Palamra maidung chun hai thiuta mide,
khatdi paliu kuonse makad mide,
khatdi paliu mikse kaba mide.
Sichiu maksai, paliu mikniu ngao lune,
khatdi paliu kuonniu chiu lune,
khatdi paliu chunniu silune,
sichiujiu akhuga malan wangjiu,
Iniu paliutu wikhai bine,’
chiujiu Tingwang niu din-e.”
Sichiujiu Paul niu haichiu munkom khaide. “Sichiusai, Tingwang gu juringbo champao hai Nkeng maidung khulam langkhai mine, chiubo naliuniu sirabo-e! Sichiusai paliura nking khai rabo-e.”
(Paul niu haichiu dinkhai biboga, Jehudi maidungse paliu karai ari matan khangjiu npek mide).
Palamra takum nia hai Paul niu paky man pijiu lung-e, siga patu adao khai nimai hinatu paniu lukhai-e.
Paniu Rapiu Jesu Khrista lamga khatdi Tingwang gu chawangdih lamga huchang-hujiu, pakhen-pani thiujiu katikhaide khatdi dinron khaide.
Jesu Khrista vangpiu, ladlangtadmai thiura kupad khaibo, khatdi Tingwang gu kawicham leng kadpad khaibo Paul niu:
Masanbo ariakga raokhai mibo kum kawicham haise Tingwang niu phaimiukakungdung khuga nda ladriat thiukhai mibo-e.
Sisera, Nahpiu, aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista haitu chamainagu lunlung ganiu David gu kaikik thiujiu mana khaide;
Masanbo Hiupuina gu lunlungga pahai kashaibo gasu ringsulan mibo donniu Tingwang Nahpiu-e chiubo madukhai mide.
Papen gasu Tingwang niu atudi ladlangtadmai khat pithiu khaijiu, Khrista jengniu jat hina kadin piujiu malumlu raleng-e.
Rome ga bammai naliu tudi Jesu Khrista gu thiulu raleng Tingwang niu kukhaibo-e.
Tingwang niu lungsajiu pamai thiura kulubo, Rome ga bammai khuga Iniu raokhaibo-e:
Aliu piu Tingwang khatdi Rapiu Jesu Khrista niu naliu khuga lungsiat khatdi agi-manaibose pikhaibo thiumilo.
Raiboga, naliugu malum hai kadihpiri pabam hinaga chiukam bamme chiubo donniu Jesu Khrista pen gasu Iniu a-Rawang tu thuonkiu-e.

Palam-ra, Iniu kakheng thiubo wan machang naliu lamga saomakjiu Iniu maningtao bamme chiubo Tingwang niu sibamme. Sichiujiu Nahpiu lamga Kawibo Champaose alungchun pakhiangna siniu dinron bamme. Sichiujiu Tingwang niu maningbo saisuijiu tuhoi kanambo wan haiga Iniu naliu khuga wangtang lura khengjiu bambo-e.
Palamra naliutu matipkhai raleng Hiupuina gu thoidam lutao machamra Iniu naliutu adao khaini siak bamme.
Iniu dinbo sira, naliudi agu malum pen gasu, Idi naliu malum pen gasu khat khattu nkha lura leng-e.
Palamra mai hina khuga, disumai khugadi, disumakmai khugadi, wakasimai khugadi, khatdi wasi kamakmai khugadi Iniu kamrabo thao bamme.
Sijengniu Rome ga bammai naliu khugadi, Kawicham hai dinron raleng Iniu machunjiu bambo-e.
Palamra Kawicham hainiu dechiujiu Tingwang niu maidungtu kam maji khailo chiubo madukhai-e; Haise raokhai mibo kumbo-e: “Malumbo gasu Tingwang khuga kam majikhai mibo maise ringrabo-e.”
Nuan phungbo khatdi kasa kambo maidung, chiubora majibo situ silura khambo maidung riga Tingwang gu lungpomse tinggen lamsu madulen khai mide.
Tingwang niu paliutu sajai pikhai mide, palamra Tingwang lamga silura, Tingwang papum siakniu kam malakhai mibo-e.

Tingwang niu kadihpiri dambo gasu pagu ngao ngam makbo lunlung chiubora pagu pamalan thiu makbo pumtan nai pagu charagu lunlung gasu masanjiu madukhai mibo-e; sichiujiu Tingwang niu damkhai mibo hinase paliuniu ngao mibo-e. Sijengniu sibo maidung situ kuak khai silak mibo-e.

Paliuniu Tingwang tu sibamme, chiudi patuse paliuniu Tingwang-e chiujiu chakhuang thiu makge, maksai patu thuon makge. Chakhuang thiurabo sung khatdi thuonrabo sung paliugu makumse mathaku mide, sichiujiu paliugu kapangbo lungchunse tamiu mide.
Paliuniu din-e, paliura ningting-e chiudi paliura pang-e.
Halan makbo Tingwang tu kahumrabo sung paliuniu halan suibo chamai, maksai thingna, maksai pangen madai thiubo khaoring, maksai paganiu tonjiu tadbo wakhaomeng kamkhai lujiu kahum bamme.
Sijengniu Tingwang niudi paliutu taniaboga, paliuniu machunbo saisuijiu paliuniu khat-khat khuga kamangambo ngam kamra pikhai mide.
Paliuniu Tingwang gu majibo situ aratboniu nkhiak mide. Dampao tusuang paniu damkhaibo mania situ kahumme, khatdi macha-e. Dampao Tingwang patura pamalan thiu makjiu thuon rabo siakge! Amen.
Haichiubo jengniu paliutu Tingwang niu mangambo lungchun gase phutkhai mide. Sichiujiu maipuidung siniudi pajai kamakbo lunlungga lungmaojiu pathak kamak kam bamme.

Sichiujiu maipiudung siniudi maipuidungtu maluang nphiuji rabo sung, paliu karai khat khattu maluang bamme. Sichiujiu maipiudung siniu paliu karai mangambo thak hai kambo jengniu, paliugu kamaobo saisuijiu paliu riga sajai phungwang bambo-e.
Palamra paliuniu Tingwang gu majibo tasise paliu lungchun-ga khaini makbo jengniu, Tingwang niu paliu chunse taniaboga pikhaijiu paliuniu kammak rabose kam mide.
Kasabo hina siniu phuilujiu, chiubora patiuni kasabo, npui-npiu lungmaobo, pathak sabo , maitu manmabo, maitu gibo, adap-alekbo, aratbo khatdi marengbo siniu phuijiu bamme.
Paliu ladtumme, maiken tiakge, paliuniu Tingwang tu mareng-e, tasao thiu-e, chaliang-e, khatdi tasao thiu-e. Paliura kasabo ronna rang-e, paliu puipiu kadin piumakge.
Paliu-chun paliu-ra thiu makge, paliu ladriat situ majai makge. paliura maitu lungsasibo maksai nkhakhai sibo wadi ha-e.
Haikumbo kammaidung sira Tingwang gu tacheng-tajai saisuijiu shai bui-e chiubo paliuniu din-e. Chiudi sikumbose paliuniu kamjiu bamme, khatdi maidungtu sikumbo kamra kachu khaijiu bamme.
Haikumbo kam maidungtu Tingwang niu pagu majiboniu ladjan thiu-e chiubo aliuniu si-e.
Chiudi singna yo, nangniu maidung riga ladjan thiu bambose naronna nariga ladjan thiujiu bambo-e! Tingwang gu ladjan gasu nangra marenlu bui-e chiu maning jiuma?
Maksai Tingwang gu kawibo, khengsibo khatdi njangbo situ nangniu suinimak jiuma? Tingwang haira lungsasibo-e chiubo pachangjiu nang sibambo-e, palamra nangniu lungli wangra paniu matanjiu bambo-e.
Chiudi nalung tanbo khatdi lukhai nimakbo lungchun siniu, Tingwang gu lungpom khatdi pagu majibo ladjan madupadbo Tingmikga naronna nagu chariubo situ pi nkiu khaijiu bambo-e.
Palamra Tingwang niu mai hinatu, pagu-gu tienkam saisuijiu chaphijeng pikhai rabo-e.
Mai khangsianiu kawibo ngam kamjiu, kendibo, chakhuang thiubo, khatdi halan makbo ringtingtu phiujiu bamme; paliutu Tingwang niu tingtheng ringbo ringting pikhaibi rabo-e.
Khangsianiu paliuleng ronna sijiu khatdi kamajibo situ lukhai makjiu kamaobo gase tadjiu bamme; sikumbo mai riga Tingwang niu palungpom nai lungnuat mise runkiu khai rabo-e.
Kasa kammai hina khuga chariu khengbo khatdi thiuniubo, raiboga Jehudi mai khuga, sibo saiga Nkengmai khugadi wangrabo-e.
Chiudi kawi kammai hina khuga Tingwang niu raiboga Jehudi mai khugadi, Nkengmai khugadi kendibo chakhuang thiubo khatdi agi-manaibo hai pikhai bine.
Palamra Tingwang niu mai hinatu machamjiu ladjan thiune, pakhuga chamiu-mareng thiubo ha-e.

Nkengmai khuga Mose gu Tacheng-tajai habam niu-e, Tacheng-tajai gasu paliu habam niu-e khatdi nuan tenbam niu-e. Jehudi mai khuga Tacheng-tajai bamniu-e, sichiujiu paliuniu nuan kam mibose Tacheng-tajainiu ladjan thiu-e.
Palamra Tacheng-tajai chiulu maidungse Tingwang masuangga majibo makge; chiudi Tacheng-tajai majaimai tuse kam maji khaibo-e.
Nkengmaira paliu khuga Tacheng-tajai ha-e, chiudi paliugu tienkam gasu, kamaji ka-nkhui sibo siniu paliu khuga Tacheng-tajaigu chamtan bambo kumme.

Paliugu lunlungniu lenbora Tacheng-tajaigu chamtanse paliu lungga raokhai mide. Pawan wan-ga paliu makum niudi, paliutu kammao khaibo khatdi pakak-kakga paliu lam chapkhaibo donniu paliu maningse niudi majibose lenkhai-e.
Sichiujiu agu Kawicham saisuijiu, kanambo Tingmikga Tingwang niu Jesu Khrista pen gasu mai hinagu mahimbo lungchun hinase ladjan thiu rabo-e.
Nang dechiu bamlo? Naronna natu Jehudimai ku-e, sichiujiu nangra Tacheng-tajaiga mangiu khai-e chiujiu Tingwang lamga tasao thiu-e.
Nangniu Tingwang luni silujiu, khatdi Tacheng-tajai gasu majibose katilujiu kadalude.

Nangniu pamik tiatmaitu majang khaibo khatdi tamiuboga bambo maidung leng kabenbo thiura, kapang maitu katipao khatdi wasi kamak maitu katipao khatle chiubo pachangjiu sisai Tacheng-tajaiga nang wasimai khatle chiubo sira-e.
Nangniu maidungtu katikhaibo kum, naronna natu katikhai lakma? Nangniu din-e, “Aga mane” chiujiu dinron-e, chiudi nangra aga rama?
Nangniu din-e, “Makha mane” chiudi nangra makha rama? Charamengtu marengbo nangniu, charaky gasu aga rama?
Tingwang gu Tacheng-tajai lamga nangniu wasao thiulujiu, Tacheng-tajai situ kampang lujiu Tingwang khuga mangambo phungwang rama?
Masanbo ariakniu dinbo kumbo-e, “Jehudi mai naliu jengniu, Nkengmai ruangga Tingwang zantu din masa bamme.”
Naliuniu Tacheng-tajai piusai chagi rombo pageng bamme; chiudi naliuniu Tacheng-tajai piumak sai chagi rombo pageng ha-e, khatdi naliuniu chagi rombo hai rommakbo kumbo-e.
Sijengniu chagi rommakbo Nkengmainiu Tacheng tajaigu chamtan hinatu piusai, Tingwang niu patu chagi rommai khat kumjiu lukhai lakma?

Sichiujiu palunlung gasu chagi rommak mainiu Tacheng-tajaitu wangtang khaisai, raokhai mibo Tacheng-tajai khatdi chagi rombo thiakse nakhuga bamliudi, Tacheng-tajaiga maobo natu paniu ladjan thiu lakma?
Palamra lenlam Jehudi mai thiubo hainiu Jehudi mai makge, sigasu lenlam ngaobo, chapumga chagi rombo hainiu chagi rombo makge.

Chiudi palung lamsu Jehudi mai thiubora Jehudi mai-e, haise raokhai mibo Tacheng-tajai gasu makge, chiudi Tingwang Hiupuina niu kamkhaibo tienkam si-e. Haikumbo mai siniu chamai khugasu makjiu Tingwang khugasu thuonbose daorabo-e.
Chiusai Jehudi mai thiubo pageng degu bamlo? Khatdi chagi rombogu nkiubo degu bamlo?
Palam hinaga, pachangjiu bamme! Raiboga Tingwang niu pagu kawichamse Jehudimai khuga pikhai bide.
Chiudi paliu khangsianiu malum makge sai dechiu ralo? Paliugu malumbui makbo siniu Tingwang gu malumbuibo situ waleng makbo thiukhai rama?
Palingjiu sichiu makge! Chamai hinaniu aratjiu bamdi Tingwang ra majibo-e. Masanbo ariakniu dinbo kumme,
“Nangniu chalad dinbo gasu majibose lenkhai siakrabo-e;
natu madiubo gase ngamkhai siakrabo-e.”

Chiudi aliugu majimakbo tienkam siniu Tingwang gu majibo situ pingao khaisai, aliuniu degu dinralo? Tingwang niu aliutu sajai pikhaibo hai pah maji makge, chiujiu aliuniu dinrama? (Haise chamaina lunlung saisuijiu maniubo-e).
Sise wadaodi sichiu makge! Tingwang hai majimak bamniu sai, paniu dechiujiu kadihpiri haitu ladjan thiu ralo?
Chiudi agu majimakbo siniu Tingwang gu majibotu madu padjiu paken pidi khaisai, dekambo lamniu atu tuhoi katangbo nuan phungmai-e chiujiu ladjan thiujiu bamralo?
Sichiusai haichiu dekam dinmak ralo, “Kawibo padlu raleng kasabo tenkhe?” Sikumjiu khangsia mainiu atu haichiu kamaoboga madam khaijiu bamme. Sikumbo maitu ladjan thiu raleng buibo-e.
Chiusai Jehudimai aliu hai Nkengmai suang wi-nkiu jiuma? Sichiu makge, palamra Jehudi maidi Nkengmaidi mai hina nuan hangga bambo-e chiubo hai karai gasu Iniu madukhai mibo-e.
Masanbo ariakniu dinbo kumjiu,
“Tacheng matipbo mai khatnadi ha-e,
ningtingmai khatnadi ha-e,
maksai Tingwang tu phiumai khatnadi ha-e,
Paliu mathiu Tingwang khugasu diu mide;
paliu mathiu kamaoboga tadkhai kam mide;
kamaji kambo mai ha-e, khatnadi ha-e.
Paliu leese kasaboniu phui-e;
paliu muntai gase karabo kaniutai siniu phui-e.
