paliuniu tadkhaibo hinaga kam masa khaibo nai kam maha khaibo ronna-e.
Paliura agi-manaibo npui simakge.
Tuhoira aliuniu si-e chiubora Tacheng-tajai hainiu mai hinatu Tingwang masuangga kammao kam mide chiubo silujiu kadihpiri pakhiangnatu Tingwang gu ladjan-ga puiwang raleng-e.
Palamra Tacheng-tajai majaibo donniu mai khattudi Tingwang suangga kam majikhai makge; delosai Tacheng-tajai hainiu nuan tenmide chiubo sira leng-e.
Chiudi tuhoira Tingwang niu chamainatu kam maji khaibo hai madukhai bide. Haise Mose gu Tacheng-tajai nai phaimiukakungdung siniu jengdin thiukhai bamdi sibogu Tacheng-tajaise wageng hamide.
Tingwang niu chamainatu kam maji khaibo haise Jesu Khrista tu malumbo gasu-e. Haise Khrista tu malummai hinatu-e, palamra pakhuga katambo wadi ha-e.
Palamra mai hina nuan kam mide, sichiujiu Tingwang gu kendibo gasu paliu diumide.
Chiudi Tingwang gu lungsiat sira Khrista Jesu pen ganiu tingtheng karingbo haise matha pikhai-e.

Tingwang niu patu pipad khai bide. Sichiujiu patu malumbo gasu maidung nuanse, paniu shai khaibo gasu kuak khai raleng-e. Tingwang niu haise kambora pase majibo-e chiubo lenkhaibo-e. Karaigara pahai khengsi-e sichiujiu maidung nuanse phui maha khai-e, chiudi tuhoira paniu nuan haitu ladjan thiujiu pase tacheng matipbo-e chiubo lenkhai bide. Haichiujiu Tingwang niu pagu majibose lenkhaijiu Jesu tu malumbo mai hinatu kam maji khai bide.
Chiusai chaliang rabo bam dega bamlo? Wakhatdi ha-e! Dekumbogu Tacheng tajai niulo? Tacheng-tajai piubo niuma? Makge, chiudi malumbo donniu-e.
Sijengniu aliuniu lukhaibora, Tacheng-tajai majaibo donniu makjiu malumbo donniu mai khat tuse kam maji khaibo si-e.
Pahai Jehudimai Rawang ronna jiuma? Nkengmai Rawang-di makma? Yo, Nkengmai Rawang-di thiubo-e.
Tingwang ra khatle, Jehudi mai tudi, Nkengmai tudi malumbo donniu kam majikhai birabo-e.
Sichiusai malumbo donniu Tacheng-tajai situ aliuniu thonmi jiuma? Chiumakge! Aliuniu Tacheng-tajai situ thin matip khaibo-e.
Aliu jatgu papiu thiubo Abraham lamga aliuniu degu dinralo? Paniu degu kamkhai mibo bamlo?
Pagu tienkam ganiu Tingwang niu patu kam majikhai bisai, paniu pageng dinra palam bamme; chiudi Tingwang suang gara sichiu makge.
Masanbo ariakniu din-e; “Abraham niu Tingwang tu malumme, sichiujiu pagu malum donniu patuse tacheng matip-e chiujiu Tingwang niu lukhai mibo-e.”
Tatien thiu maigu phijengse pikhai-e, chiudi sise matha pikhaibo kalen makge; sise mai khatniu matan kalubo gu-e.
Chiudi mai khatniu kamkhaibo makjiu Tingwang tu malumsai, pagu malum siniu kamaobo situ kam maji khaide. Sise pagu malum saisuijiu Tingwang niu kam majikhai bibo-e.
Changam jaomakjiu Tingwang niu tacheng matipbo leng lukhai bibo maira pasan wi-e, chiujiu David niudi dinmibo-e:
panuan kuakkhai mibo mai hina san wi-e!
Rapiu niu panuan situ chakkhai makjiu, kam mahakhai mibo maise san wi-e!”

Chiusai David niu dinbambo thoidam hai pagi rommaileng ronna ma? Pachangjiu sichiu makge. Sise pagi rommak mailengdi-e. Palamra masanbo ariak saisuijiu aliuniu din-e, “Abraham tu pagu malumbo donniu tacheng matipbo leng lukhaibi-e.”
Haise dekumbo wan-ga padmi gulo? Haise Abraham tu pagi rombo masuang gama, maksai sibo sailam sulo? Sise pagi rom makhabo masuang ganiu-e.

Pasainiu patu pagi rombo-e, sichiujiu pagirom khaibo hainiu Tingwang tu paniu malumbose kamlen khaijiu patu tacheng matipbo mai-e chiujiu lukhai-e. Sichiujiu Abraham hai Tingwang tu malummai hina khatdi tacheng matip-e chiujiu Tingwang niu lukhai maidung, paliu gi rom makjiu tadi tacheng matipbo mai hinagu hiupuina piu thiulu raleng-e.
Sichiujiu pahai chagirom mibo maidung khatdi patu pagi rommakbo suangga lungkhai mibo maidung, chiubora malummai mathiu piudi thiu rabo-e.
Palamra Tingwang gu ladriat haise Tacheng-tajai majaibo ganiu sai, chamaigu malumse wadi makge, khatdi Tingwang gu ladriatse pageng wadi ha-e.
Tacheng-tajai siniu Tingwang lungpom phungwang-e; chiudi Tacheng-tajai haboga Tacheng-tajaise majaira ha-e.

Haise Masanbo ariakniu dinkhai mibo-e, “Iniu natu kakengbo jatdung piu pithiu khaine.” Kashai maidungtu piring khaibibo khatdi haniubo situ pagu chamtanniu damkhaibo, Tingwang tu Abraham niu malumbo haise Tingwang suangga kawibo ladriatle.
Abraham niu daolura agunbo hajiu tadi malumbo, khatdi agun bambo donniu “ Jatdung Kakengbo piu” thiulubo-e. Haise Masanbo ariakniu dinkhai mibo si-e: “Nakai nakikse chagan jiukha lungrabo-e.”
Malumboga nkhin makbo jengniu, pagu tingkum kaikhat tangmijiu panah lung ngamlak mide, khatdi panao Sarah pawon phung ngamlak mide chiubo paniu chakkhai makge.
Pagu malum tu phutmakjiu, Tingwang gu ladriat situ paniu malum masabo thiumi makge; pagu malum tanbo donniu, Tingwang gu maken kadibo situ paniu thuonbam niu-e.
Tingwang niu ladriat thiukhai mibose maomakjiu tenkhai ngamme chiubo paniu masan siakjiu sibam niu-e.
Sijengniu malumbo gasu Abraham tu, “Tingwang niu tacheng matip-e” chiu lukhaide.
“Pah tacheng matip-e” chiu lukhai mibose paleng ronna raokhaibo makge.
Tacheng matip-e chiujiu lukhaibi ramai, Rapiu Jesu tu kashai mai rong gasu piring khaibibo patu malum lumai aliulengdi raokhai mibo-e.
Palamra aliu nuan jengniu patu kamshat mibo-e, khatdi aliutu kam majikhai raleng patu piringsu khai mibo-e.
Tuhoira malumbo gasu aliutu kam majikhai mibo donniu, aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista zan gasu aliu Tingwang khuga agi-manaibo bamme.
Tuhoira malumbo pen gasu Tingwang lungsiatga aliu bam mide. Sichiujiu Tingwang gu kendibose lutao lude chiubo jengniu aliu chun wijiu bamkhe!
Sichiujiu aliugu chariubo gase aliuniu chunwi-e, palamra chariubo siniu khengsibose padle,
sichiujiu khengsibo siniu Tingwang chunning phungwangjiu, sigasu agunbose phungwang-e.
Haibo agun siniu aliu chun kam masami makge, palamra Tingwang lungsiat gasu, aliu lungga pagu Masanbo Hiupuina kalense runkiu khai bide.
Palamra aliu pumtan hajiu bambo wan-ga, Tingwang niu Khrista tu kada lujiu kasamai aliuleng shaikhai bide.
Pacheng matipbo mai khatleng, mai khatniu shaikhai bira kung-e, khatdi kawibo maileng mai khatniu shaikhai biradi kung-e.
Chiudi Tingwang niu aliutu dejiuga lungsalo chiubo hai lenkhai bide, chiubora aliu nuan phungmai thiujiu bamniubo gasu Khrista niu aliuleng shaikhai bide.
Pazai luang khaijiu shaikhaibo siniu, Tingwang khuga aliutu kam maji khai bide, sichiusai nkiu-nkenjiu Tingwang gu wangrabo lungpom hina gasu paniu aliutu rankhai mibo-e!

Aliu hai Tingwang gu mikremai thiujiu bamniu-e, chiudi Panahpiu shaikhai bibo gasu pakamai thiu mide. Tuhoira aliu Tingwang kamai thiu misai, Khrista gu ringting siniu aliutu dejiukha nkiu-nkenjiu rankhaibi ralo!
Sichiubo ronna makjiu aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista pen ganiu tuhoi aliu Tingwang kamai thiulubo donniu aliu Tingwang khuga achun wijiu bamkhe.
Tacheng-tajai pikhai makbo suang gasu kadihpiriga nuan bamniu-e, chiudi Tacheng-tajai bam makbo donniu nuan situ chakkhai makniu-e.
Chiudi kashaibo siniu chamai hina riga Adam ken gasu, Mose ken katangbo nuan tenmak mai rigadi mawangjiu bamniubo-e. Sise Adam niu Tingwang gu chamtan majai makbo jengniu wangmibo-e.
Adam haise wangrabo piu khatse kumbo-e.

Chiudi khangniase ncham makge, palamra Tingwang gu kalen sira Adam gu nuan kum makge. Mai khat nuan jengniu mai kakeng shai mide chiubo majibo-e. Chiudi Tingwang gu lungsiat sira nkiu-nkenjiu dibo-e, sichiujiu mai khat chiubora, Jesu Khrista lungsiat ganiu mai kakeng khuga Tingwang gu lungsiat kalense daomibo-e.

Sichiujiu Tingwang gu kalen nai mai khat nuan hai ncham makge. Nuan khat kam miboga, “kamaobo” chiubo ladjanse wang-e; chiudi nuan wajiukha tenkhai mibo saiga mai dinsi lakbo, “mao makge” chiubo kalense wang-e!

Mai khat nuan jengniu kashaibo siniu mawangsu mide. Chiudi tuhoira mai khat chiubora Jesu Khrista niu kamkhai mibo haise dejiukha nkiu-nken ralo! Tingwang gu pamalan thiumakbo lungsiat daolubo mai hina situ Khrista gu lungsiat gasu khenrang thiura kam majikhai mide.
Sichiujiu mai khat nuan gasu mai hinatu ladjan thiu mibo kumjiu, tacheng matipmai khatgu tienkam gasu mai hinatu khenrang thiukhaijiu tingtheng karingbose pikhai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu mai khatniu kadin piumakbo gasu mai kakengtu nuan phungmai pithiu khai mibo kumjiu, mai khatgu kadin piubo siniu mathiutu kam majikhai mibo-e.
Kamao-kamengbo hai nkiu khangra Tacheng-tajai hai pikhaibo-e, chiudi nuan kengpadboga Tingwang gu lungsiatdi nkiu-nkenjiu kengpadle.
Kashaibo npuiga nuan niu mawangbo kum, Tingwang lungsiat siniu tacheng matipbo npuiga mawangjiu, aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista pen gasu tingtheng karingboga aliutu maluang khai bide.
Sichiusai aliuniu degu din ralo? Tingwang lungsiat hai kengkhang raleng aliu nuan-ga lungbam rama?
Palingjiu sichiu makge! Aliu nuan-ga shaikhai mibo-e, dechiujiu aliu nuan-ga lungbam ralo?
Khrista Jesu zan-ga tadui nphum mibo aliu mathiu, Rapiu gu shaiboga tadui nphum khai mibo-e chiubo naliuniu sisiak bamme.
Aliuniu tadui nphumbo gase, pagu kashaibo gase nphum ncham khai mibo-e, chiusai Rapiu gu kendibo ganiu Khrista tu kashaibo gasu piringsu khai mibo kum, aliudi kasanbo ringtingga lungmi raleng-e.
Palamra aliuniu Rapiu shaikhai mibo aliga khat thiukhai misai, Arapiu gu ringsulan mibo gadi khat thiurabo-e.
Nuan pumtu kam mahalujiu, aliuniu nuan vang thiuta mira, Khrista gu singchaiga aliugu kaguangbo lunlungse shaikhai macham mibo-e chiubo aliuniu si-e.
Palamra aliuniu shaikhai misai, aliudi nuan pumtan gasu khenrang thiu mibo-e.
Aliuniu Khrista panai shaikhai macham mibo donniu, aliudi pah panai ring macham rabo-e chiubo aliuniu malumme.
Palamra Khrista niu shaibo gasu ringsulan mibo donniu wadaodi shailan lakge, kashaibo siniu pariga wadaodi mawanglan lakge.
Paniu shaikhai mibo pashit sira nuan-ga malod khat shaikhai mibo-e, chiudi paniu ringjiu bambo ringting sira Tingwang khuga tingtheng karingbo si-e.
Haise kumjiu naliudi naliu ronna nuan-ga shaikhai mibo-e, chiudi Khrista Jesu pen gasu Tingwang khuga ring bambo-e,chiubo maningtao lulo.
Sijengniu nuan hainiu naliu mipum riga pijiu mawangmak milo.

Sichiujiu naliu pum maniase kasaboga thinjiu nuan ga pipad tamilo; chiudi naliu pumsiak hai Tingwang khuga kashaibo gasu ringwang lanbo kum, naliu pum mania hinase Tingwang khuga tacheng matipboga thinra pipad lulo.
Palamra nuan situ naliu riga pijiu mawangmak rabo-e, delosai naliu hai tacheng tajai hangga lung makge, chiudi Tingwang lungsiat hangga bambo-e.
Dechiu ralo? Aliu Tacheng-tajai hangga bam makge, chiudi Tingwang lungsiat hangga bambo jengniu nuan tenkhe chiubo ma? Sichiu makge!

Naliuniu mai khat kadin piune chiujiu pikhai misai sibo piu vang thiu mibo-e, kashaibo padrabo nuan vangdi sui-e, maksai Tingwang khuga kam majikhaibo kadin piubo vang thiudi sui-e chiubo naliuniu masanjiu sibamme.
Chiudi Tingwang tu thuonlulo! Palamra pawan khatga naliu nuan vang thiu bamliu tadi, naliuniu daolubo majibo katikhai gasu, naliu lungchun pakhiangnaniu kadinpiu lude.
Nuan gasu naliutu khenrang thiukhai mibo jengniu tacheng matipbo vang thiu mide.

(Naliu hai chamainagu kasonbo lunlungga bambo donniu, Iniu naimachangna ladga dinbo-e). Palamra pawan khatga naliu hai masan makboga khatdi kasaboga pikhaijiu bamniu-e. Sise kumjiu tuhoira naliu pum pakhiangna hai tacheng matipbo khatdi masanbo vang kumjiu pipad lulo.
Delosai naliu nuan vangmai thiubam niubo tinggara, naliu tacheng matipbo gasu khenrang thiubam niubo-e.
Tenkhai mibo maning khaijiu tuhoira mangambo gahai naliuleng degu kagengbo bamlo? Sibo ngamkamdung sira kashaibo si-e!

Chiudi tuhoira naliutu nuan gasu khenrang thiukhai mide, sichiujiu Tingwang vangmai thiu mide. Naliuleng kagengbo sira pakhuga pakhiangna pipadbo ringting si-e, sichiujiu siseniu tingtheng karingbo daolu rabo-e.
Palamra nuan phijeng sira kashaibo-e, chiudi Tingwang niu aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista pen gasu pikhaibo kalen sira tingtheng karingbo si-e.
Iniu dinrabo lamga naliuniu sisiak lurabo-e, singnamaidung yo, palamra naliu mathiuniu tacheng tajai lamga sibamme. Chiubora chamai ringbam thenna tacheng tajainiu paliu riga mawang-e.

Din rambajiu, npuimai mainao thiumibo pui khatniu pakina karingthen pakhuga tacheng tajai siniu ratkhaijiu bambo-e; chiudi pakina shai misai pakinaniu ratkhaibo tacheng tajai gasu, pakhen-parang thiu mibo-e.

Sichiujiu pakina ringbam then paniu kakibo npiumai khat khuga lungmi sai patu kamakhabo pui-e chiujiu kurabo-e; chiudi pakina shai misai, paniu pakhen-parang thiujiu kakibo npiumai khat khuga milanjiu tadi pase makhabo makge.

Asingna maidung yo, naliudi haibo cheng kumbo-e: Tacheng-tajaiga naliudi shaikhai mide; palamra naliu hai Khrista pumga khat thiu mibo-e, sichiujiu tuhoira naliu hai kashaibo gasu ringsulan mibo mai thiu mide, sijengniu aliu hai Tingwang tien thiura pageng bammai thiu mibo-e.
Palamra aliuniu chamainagu lunlungga lungbo tingga nuan-ga masenbo lungchun siniu Tacheng-tajai gasu aliutu kam kabuakjiu bambo-e, sichiujiu aliu hai kashaiboga loikhai mibo-e.

Chiudi tuhoira aliu Tacheng-tajai ganiu khenrang thiu mide, palamra pawan khatga aliutu bangkhaijiu bamniubo-e, chiusai raokhaibo tacheng tajai kaguangbo npuiga aliu tatien tenlan makjiu, Hiupuina gu kasanbo npuiga tatien thiura leng-e.
Chiudi chamtan gasu nuan siniu alungga masenbo lungchun pipad khai-e. Tacheng-tajai haboga, nuan hai kashaibo khat thiujiu bamniu-e.
Tacheng-tajai jaomakjiu I hai pawan khat ringbam niu-e; chiudi chamtanse wangbo tingga nuan hai ringsu mide, siga I shai mide,
sichiujiu ringrabo chamtan siniu alengra kashaibo padmide.
Nuan siniu pathak daolujiu chamtan jengniu atu sonlude, sichiujiu atu nuan-ga kamshat mide.
Sijengniu Tacheng-tajai siakra masan-e, khatdi chamtan sidi masan-e, maji-e, khatdi wi-e.

Sichiusai kawibo siniu akhuga shai khaira wangjiuma? Palingjiu sichiu makge! Chiudi nuan siniu kashaibo phungwang-e chiubo lenkhai raleng kawibo thiu lujiu, nuan siniu shai raleng tatien thiujiu akhuga shaira wang mibo-e. Sichiujiu chamtan jeng gasu nuan hainiu sa-nkiubo nuan phungmai pithiu khaibo-e.
Sichiujiu Tacheng-tajai haira hiupuina gu-e, chiubo aliuniu si-e; chiudi I haira shai suibo mai thiubo jengniu kavang khat thiujiu nuan ga atu jonkhai mibo-e.
Iniu kambambo hai degulo chiubo I simakge; palamra Iniu kamnibose Iniu kammakge, chiudi sibosung, Iniu lunimakbo Iniu kamme.
Iniu kamni makbotu Iniu kamjiu bambo haisiniu Tacheng-tajai hai majibo-e chiubo Iniu suibo-e.
Sijengniu sise tenbambo hai Iniu makge, chiudi akhuga bambo nuan siniu-e.
Palamra alungga kawibo wakhat nadi ha-e, chiubo Iniu si-e, delosai kamnibo lungchunra bamme chiudi kammakge.
Iniu kamnibo kawibose Iniu kammakge; sibosung Iniu masen makbo situ Iniu kamme.
Tuhoira Iniu masen makbose Iniu kamsai, sise kambambose Iniu makge; chiudi alungga bambo nuan siniu-e.
Sijengniu haibo tacheng-tajai gasu Iniu ngao-e, chiubora Iniu kawibo kamniboga kasabose akhuga bamjut-jutle.
Alung lamniu Tingwang gu tacheng tajaitu machunbo-e.
Chiudi tacheng-tajai siniu suimakbose apumga kamjiu bambo Iniu si-e, sise achun maning niura suinibo chiudi tacheng tajainiu suimakbo si-e. Haise akhuga bambo nuan siniu atu pikam khaibo-e.
I hai dejiukha chunsabo mailo! Haibo kashaibo pum gasu saoniu atu rankhai ralo?
Aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista pen gasu gukhai bibo Tingwang tu thuonlo!
Haichiujiu alung chunniu Tingwang gu Tacheng-tajaitu Iniu machabo-e; chiudi chamainagu apum siniu nuan-gu tacheng-tajai situ machabo-e.
Sijengniu tuhoi Khrista Jesu ga khat thiumibo maidungtu kamaoboga piwang khai lakge.
Palamra Hiupuina gu tacheng-tajai siniu, nuan gu kashaibo gasu atu khenrang thiukhai lujiu Khrista Jesu khuga lung aruangra jukhai mibo-e.
Chamaina pum sonbo jengniu Tacheng-tajai siniu ngam makbose Tingwang niu kamkhai-e. Paniu Nahpiu situ chamaina lunlungga langkhai lujiu nuan situ chamaina lunlungga ladjan thiukhai mide.
Tingwang niu haichiujiu kamkhaibo sira chamaina lunlung saisui makjiu, chiudi Hiupuina siniu lunibo situ pikim khai raleng-e.
Sichiujiu chamaina lunlungga lungmai siniu chamaina lungchun-ga maning-e. Hiupuina lunlungga lungmai siniu Hiupuina lungchun-ga maning-e.
Chamaina maning sira kashaibo-e, chiudi Hiupuina maning sira karingbo khatdi agi-manaibo-e.
Chamaina chunning siniu Tingwang gu mikre thiumibo-e; palamra paniu Tingwang gu Tacheng-tajai situ majai makge khatdi majai ngam lakge.
Chamaina lunlung majaimai siniu Tingwang tu pikim khai ngam makge.

Chiudi Tingwang gu Hiupuina siniu naliu lungga lungsiak bamme sai, naliu hai chamaina lunlungga lungta mide, chiudi Hiupuina gu lunlungga lungmibo-e. Mai khat kumboniu Khrista gu Hiupuina bammak sai para pagu makge.
Chiudi Khrista hai naliu lungga lungbamme sai, nuan jengniu naliu pum shai midi, Tingwang niu kam majikhai mibo jengniu naliu Hiupuina ga ringlubui-e.
Jesu tu kashaibo gasu piringsu khaibo Tingwang Hiupuina naliu khuga bamme chiusai, Khrista tu kashaibo gasu piringsu khai mibo paniu shai suibo naliu pum tudi pagu Hiupuina siniu piring khai lubui-e.
Sijengniu, singnamaidung yo, aliuniu kamrabo thao khat bamme, chiudi haise aliu chamaina pumniu masenbo kumjiu lungrabo makge.
Palamra naliuniu chamaina lunlung saisuijiu lungsai, naliu hai shai rabo-e; chiudi Hiupuina siniu naliu nuan-gu tienkam situ kamshat khai misai, naliu ringrabo-e.
Tingwang Hiupuina siniu majangkhai bibo maidung hina Tingwang nahdung-e.
Aliu Tingwang nahdung-e chiubo din madura Tingwang Hiupuina siniu aliu hiupuina situ nkhakhai-e.

Haichiujiu panahmai thiu-e sai, paniu pamaidung leng kaden khaibo thoidamse aliu daorabo-e. Sichiujiu Khrista gu chariubose aliuniu padam lumacham khai sai, pagu kendibo sidi aliuniu padam lutao macham rabo-e.
Tuhoi ken-ga chariu magenthiubo haise aliu khuga madu khairabo kendibo situ wadaodi pon kada silakge chiubo Iniu maning-e.
Palamra gandam hinaniu charijiu khuanbambo sira Tingwang nahmaidungtu madukhai rabo situ-e.

Palamra gandam hinatu hami raboga ladjan thiurabo haise pachunbo makge, chiudi haise Tingwang niu machunbo saisuibo-e, chiudi siga malumbo khat bamme, delosai gandam hina situ harabo gasu khenrang pithiu khaijiu Tingwang nahdung nai kendibose lutao machamra leng-e.
Palamra gandam hina siniu tuhoi katangbo maipui manathad kumjiu kap marungjiu bamme chiubo aliuniu si-e.
Sise gandam ronna makge, chiudi Tingwang gu karaibo kalen thiujiu Hiupuina rasy daolumai aliudi aliu lungchun gasu panahmai thiulura, aliu pumtu ranlura, haichiujiu kap marungjiu bambo-e.
Haibo malumga aliutu ranpad khaide. Tuhoira malumbo haise ngaojiu bambotu malumbo makge. Palamra ngao bambo situ malumbo pase saolo?
Chiudi ngao makbo situ aliuniu malum bamsai, khengsibo jaojiu aliuniu daolura khuan bambo-e.

Sikumjiu Hiupuina siniudi, aliuniu kasonboga nkha khai-e. Palamra aliuniu khengbuibose dechiu khengralo chiubo aliuniu simakge, chiudi Hiupuina papum siakniu, chaladniu dinsi lulakbo katang aliu lam ponjiu Tingwang khuga khengjiu bamme.
Chamaina lungchun ngaobo Tingwang niu Hiupuina gu maning delo chiubo si-e; palamra Hiupuina siniu Tingwang maningga pamaidung lam chapjiu kheng bambo-e.
Tingwang niu pamaning saisuijiu kulumai khatdi patu lungsamai lengra palam hinaga wikam najiu tadkiu lura kamkhai-e.
Tingwang niu kadapad mibo maidungtu paniu Nahpiu kum lukhaira lupad tam mibo-e chiusai Nahpiuse singnamaidung ruangga tingthubo nahpiu thiura-e.
Khatdi Tingwang niu lupad tam mibo maidungtu paniu kulude; khatdi paniu kupad mibo maidungtu kam majikhai lujiu, pagu kendibose paliutu maluong padam lumacham rabo-e.
Sichiusai aliuniu haibo lamga degu dinralo? Tingwang hai aliuleng-e sai, aliutu atungrabo saolo?
Tingwang paniu Nahpiu siaktudi masiak makjiu, aliu mathiuleng pipad khai bisai, paniu mania hina aliuleng matha pikhai lakma? Paniu Panahpiu situ aliuleng pikhai mibo makma?
Tingwang niu kadapad mibo mai riga saoniu ladjan thiu ralo? Tingwang papum siakniu kam majikhai mibo-e.
Chiusai saoniu paliutu ladjan thiuralo? Shaikhai mibo Khrista Jesu niu makge, paniu ringsulan lujiu khatdi Tingwang ben jatlam ntaolujiu aliuleng pakhuga khengjiu bambo-e.

Sichiusai aliutu Khrista gu kakungbo gasu kampang ngambo sao bamlo? Lungchun chariubo niuma? Megenthiubo niuma? Kamathadbo niuma? Katiu kasak riangbo niuma? Kalek sabo niuma? Kapingbo niuma? Maksai kashaibo niuma?
Masanbo ariakniu dinkhai mibose kumbo-e,
“Najeng gasu aliutu marinpuiting kamshatjiu bambo-e;
kamshat mirabo milydung kum,
aliutu lukhaijiu bamme.”
Chiudi aliutu lungsa khaibibo Rapiu donniu palam hinaga aliura kangam maidung suang nkiu-e.

Palamra Iniu malumbo sira kashaiboniu tadi, karingboniu tadi, tinggen mazadungniu tadi, kangambo maidungniu tadi, pumtan bambo mawangpao maidungniu tadi, tuhoi bamboniu tadi, wangkinboniu tadi, tinggen lam bamboniu tadi, kadih hanglam bamboniu tadi, kakibo gandamniu tadi, aliu Rapiu Khrista Jesu pen gasu, Tingwang niu kakungbo gasu aliutu kam npek ngamlura wakhatnadi ha-e.
Iniu majibose dinbo-e, Ira Khrista gu-e, siniu I arat makge. Alungchun hai Masanbo Hiupuina niu thinman bambo jengniu I arat makge chiubo I si-e.
Iniu dejiukha achun salo chiujiu dinboga, Iniu amaidungleng pamalan thiu makjiu alung chariubo-e. Paliu jengniu I apumsiak Tingwang siang hangga wangjiu, Khrista khugasu tampad mira machunbo-e.

Paliu hai Tingwang maidung-e, Tingwang niu paliutu panahdung pithiu khai mibo-e khatdi paken dibose paliu khuga madulen khai mibo-e. Paniu pagu ladriatse paliuleng kamkhai lujiu, paliu khuga Tacheng-tajai hai pikhai mibo-e. Sichiujiu paliu khuga majiboga kahumbose bamme; palamra paliuniu Tingwang gu ladriatse daolude.
Paliura pazan tadbo Hebrew mai pao-peh gasu lungkiubo-e, sichiujiu Khrista hai chamaina thiujiu, paliu jat gasu lungwang mibo-e. Wahina riga mawang bambo Tingwang tu tingtheng thuonjiu bamlo! Amen.
Tingwang gu ladriatse wangtang makge chiujiu Iniu dinbo makge; palamra Israel mai hina Tingwang mai kambogu makge.
Abraham kaikik hina Tingwang mai kambo makge. Tingwang niu Abraham khuga din-e, “Isaac khugasu nakai-nakik ngaorabo-e chiubo Iniu nakhuga ladriat thiu khaibo-e.”
Hai-chiubo ramba sira, chamaina lunlung gasu lungwangbo nahdungse Tingwang nahdung makge; chiudi Tingwang gu ladriat saisuijiu manawangbo nahdung sira majibo kaikik si-e chiubo-e.
Palamra Tingwang niu ladriat khaibo ladkeng sira: “Buigapbo wan-ga I wanglan rabo-e, siga Sarah niu panah npiumai khat lungrabo-e.”
Haise ronna makge. Palamra Rebecca nahpiu kaniase piu khat nakha thiubo aliu pao Isaac si-e.

Chiudi Tingwang maning madukhai raleng panai ruangga khangkhattu ronna kadalujiu Tingwang niu pakhuga din-e, “Katingbo piu siniu nabo piutu macha rabo-e.” Haise panaitu mana makbo suangga panainiu kawibo, maksai kasabo wakhatnadi tenkhai makbo suangga paniu haichiu dinmibo-e. Haichiujiu Tingwang gu kadabo haira pachun pamaning saisuibo-e, haise panainiu wakhat kamkhai mibo jengniu makge.
Masanbo ariakniu dinbo kumjiu, “Iniu Esau tu suang Jacob tu lungsa nkiu-e.”
Sichiusai, aliuniu degu dinralo? Tingwang khuga tacheng matip makbo bamjiuma? Wadaodi sichiu makge.
Palamra paniu Mose khuga din-e, “Iniu lungsa khaini maitu Iniu lungsa khai rabo-e; Iniu nkha khaini maitu Iniu nkha khai rabo-e.”
Haichiu-e sai, wa pakhiangnase mai khatniu masenbo maksai ngamkam saisui makge chiudi Tingwang gu lungsiat saisuibo-e.
Palamra Masanbo ariakniu Egypt mai wangpiu khuga din-e, “Natu Iniu thinpiu lujiu, agu pumtan lenkhaijiu khatdi kadihpiri pabam hinaga chamtan dinron raleng, Iniu natu chawang pithiu khaibo-e.”
Sichiujiu Tingwang paniu pachun paningmai khattu lungsa khaibi-e, khatdi paniu pachunmai khattu palung pitan khaibi-e.
Chiudi naliu ruangga mai khatniu akhuga dinsune, “Sichiu-e sai, dechiujiu Tingwang niu mai khatgu kamaobo situ siluralo? Saoniu Tingwang gu maningtu suimak ngamlu ralo?
Chiudi Tingwang tu paokak rabo nang saolo? Taniangli siniu patu kadampadbo piu khuga haichiu dinbo suima, “Nangniu atu deleng haichiujiu kampad jiulo?”

Chali kadammai siniu chagamniang situ paniu thin kanibo jaiga thinra khatdi sibo niangsiak ganiu chali nia kadam padra, khatniu ka-nkiubo ngamga thinra, khatdi katambo khatniu malabo ngamga thinra pagu maji bamme.
Tingwang niu kamkhaibose, sikum gapbo-e. Paniu pagu lungpom lenkhai nijiu khatdi pagu pumtanse lenkhai nibo-e. Chiudi pagu lungpomse kam mahami rabo jengniu ginjiu kheng khaibo-e.
Sichiujiu paniu lungsajiu pagu kendibo pikhaira machakhai mibo aliu riga pagu mali-malanbo kendise madukhai nibo-e.
Palamra Jehudi maidung ruanggasu ronna makjiu, Nkengmaidung ruanggasu niudi paniu kupad mibo maidungse aliu-e.
Haise paniu Hosea gu ariakkhuangga dinbo si-e:
“Amaidung kamak maitu Iniu ‘Amaidung’ chiu kune.
Iniu lungsa makbo jattu Iniu ‘Ahuna’ chiu kune.
‘Naliu hai karingbo Tingwang nahmaidung si-e,’ chiujiu kurabo-e.”
palamra Rapiu niu wahina hai majatjiu loikiu khaimi rabo-e.”
Haise Isaiah niu din masuang khai mibo-e, “Ngamkambo Rapiu siniu aliu kaikikdung khangsiatu masiak khai maksai, aliu hai Sodom nai Gomorrah kummi bamta lakge.”
Nkengmai siniu Tingwang khuga kam maji lura matanmak bamdi, malumbo donniu kam majikhai mide chiujiu aliuniu dinbo-e;
chiudi Israel mai siniu Tacheng-tajaiga mangiukhai lujiu Tingwang khuga kam maji lura, phiu bamdi kam maji khaibo situ daolu makge.
Dekamjiu daolumak jiulo? Palamra paliuniu malumboga mangiu khai makge, chiudi paliugu tienkamga mangiu khaibo donniu-e. Sijengniu “phisui kasabo tu riga” paliu phi masui rabo-e.
Haisitu Masanbo ariakniu din-e:
“Phuilo, Iniu Zion ga tatu khat khai nbamme,
maidung siniu siga paliu phi masui rabo-e.
Tudise paliu riga nkaikiu rabo-e,
chiudi mai khatniu patu malumme sai,
palungchunse kam nkhin khai lakge.”
Singna maidung yo, amaidungniu ranlubo daolu raleng dejiukha Iniu machun gulo! Iniu paliuleng dejiukha Tingwang khuga kakheng thiu bamlo!
Palamra paliuniu Tingwang tu malum matipsiak bamme, chiudi sise majibo tasiga mangiu khai makge.
Paliuniu Tingwang gu majibo situ wajeng chakkhai makjiu, paliu ronna maningbo situ pon maku lujiu, Tingwang niu pamaidungtu kam majikhai rabo gase paliu pum pikhai makge.
Khrista haira Tacheng tajaigu pamalan si-e, siniu patu malumbo mai hinatu Tingwang khuga kam majikhai mibo-e.

Chiudi malumbo donniu Tingwang khuga kam majikhai bibo lamga Masanbo ariakniu dinbose haichiu-e: “Naronna nalungga, saoniu tinggen dihga khangralo?” chiujiu maniu makrabo-e, (Sise Khrista tu pi-nkhin khai raleng-e).
“Maksai saoniu kadih hanglam kiuralo,” chiujiu nangniu maniu rama? (Sise Khrista tu kashaibo gasu piringsu khai raleng-e).
Siniu degu dinralo chiusai: “Tingwang gu Kawichamse nakhuga nawang mide, namun taiga bamme, nalung chun-ga bamme,” sise aliuniu dinronbo malumbo champao si-e.
Nangniu Jesu hai Rapiu-e chiujiu dinmadu padsai khatdi Tingwang niu patu kashaibo gasu piringsu khai mibo-e, chiujiu malum lusai natu rankhaibi rabo-e.
Palamra aliuniu malumbo gasu Tingwang niu aliutu kam majikhai-e, khatdi aliuniu dinmadu padbo siniu aliutu rankhai-e.
Masanbo ariakniu din-e, “Patu malumbo mai hinatu kam mangam khai lakge.”
Haise mai hina leng-e, palamra Jehudi mai tadi, Nkengmai tadi katambo ha-e. Tingwang haira machambo Rapiu thiu bambo-e; sichiujiu patu kumai mathiutu mali-malanjiu thoikhai bibo-e.
Palamra Masanbo ariakniu din-e, “Nkha khaira Rapiu zan kumai hinatu rankhaibi rabo-e.”

Chiudi maidung siniu dechiujiu malum matai makbo pakhuga nkha khaira kheng ralo? Khatdi dechiujiu paliuniu chiukhai matai makbo champao situ malum ralo? Khatdi kawichamse paoron khai maksai dechiu paliu chiuralo?
Khatdi maidungniu paliutu langkhai maksai, dechiujiu paliuniu dinrontad ralo? Raokhai mibose kumbo-e, “Kawicham dinron maidung wangbose dejiukha maisuang habo gulo!”
Chiudi paliu mathiu siniu kawibo champao situ lukhai makge, siniu Isaiah niu din-e, “Rapiu yo, saoniu aliugu kawi champao haitu malum khai ralo?”
Sichiusai, malumbo hai chiukhaibo gasu wangbo-e, khatdi chiukhaibo hai Khrista cham dinronbo gasu wangbo-e.
“Paliu khuan hai kadihpiri pabam hina chiukhai mide;
paliugu ladkengse kadihpiri pamalan katang dinron khai mide.”
“Amaidung lungchunse pithiu khaira,
Iniu jat khat kubo situ thin piune.
Sichiujiu kamengbo jat lunlung gasu paliu lung pijiu kampom khaine.”
“Atu phiumak maisiniu atu daolune;
akhuga khengmak maisiniu atu ngao lune.”
Paphibang gasu kadalubo pamaidungtu Tingwang niu luthon lakge. Elijah niu Tingwang khuga Israel mai lamga palung thiujiu haichiu din-e:
“Rapiu yo, paliuniu nagu phaimiukakung maidungtu kamshat kam mide khatdi nagu rathakbamse rathon mide! Atu ronna masiak khaibo-e, Sichiujiu paliuniu atu kamshat raleng phiu bamme.”
Siga Tingwang niu pakhuga dekumbo cham paokak khai bilo? “Aratbo ra Baal tu kahum makbo chamai sang chinniatu aleng baikhai bamme.”
Sikum gapjiu Tingwang niu pagu lungsiat gasu kadalumai tuhoidi tamnakha bamme.
Paniu kadalubo hai paliugu tienkam jengniu makge. chiudi pagu lungsiat jengniu-e. Palamra Tingwang niu kadalubo maidungse paliu tienkam jengniu-e chiusai Tingwang lungsiatse palingbo lungsiat makge.

Haise dechiubo gulo? Israel maidungniu phiujiu bambose paliuniu daomakge. Tingwang niu kadalubo ruanggasu kasiambo ruptu ronna daobo-e, sichiujiu kakimaidung sira Tingwang niu kuboga paliu kuon tidmide.
Haise Masanbo ariakniu dinbo si-e: “Tingwang niu paliu maning khatdi paliu lungchun kham mide; sijengniu thainai paliuniu ngao makge maksai chiu makge.”
Sichiujiu David niu din-e,
“Paliugu chakhuang changee gasu,
tathak thiu lujiu pi manmi sulo.
Paliuniu ngao makra paliu mik tiatmi sulo;
tingtheng chariuboga magenthiu bammi sulo.”

Chiusai Iniu maniu-e, Jehudi mainiu paliu phi masuiboga paliu hai haduak mibo ma? Palingjiu sichiu makge! Palamra paliuniu nuan kam mide, siga Juringbo hai Nkengmai khulam wangmide, chiusai Jehudi mainiu Nkengmaitu manma raleng-e.

Jehudi maidung nuan siniu kadihpiri maitu pijiu lungwi khaide, khatdi paliuniu Hiupuina ga nkhin mibo donniu Nkengmaitu pijiu lungwi khaide. Sichiusai Jehudi maidunggu machangbo riakse khai aruangbo wan-ga dejiukha witathuibo thiu ralo!
Nkengmaidung yo, Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e: Iniu Nkengmai khuga ladlangtadmai thiubam then Iniu asao thiu khaine.
Sichiujiu amaidung situ pi lungthiu khaijiu, paliu khangsiatu ranlura leng-e.
Palamra maidung situ Tingwang gu mikremai thiu bambo gasu, pakamai pithiu khai mibo-e. Sichiujiu paliutu lukhai misai degu padralo? Haise kashaibo gasu karingbose thiu mibo-e!
Raithubo taruak khuangse Tingwang khuga kadkhai misai, taruak kuang pakhiangna sidi pagu-e; khatdi singbang khatgu pamense Tingwang khuga kadkhai misai, pake-parang hina sidi pagu-e.

Chamai niu lingkhaibo Olive bang kese kasiara ramtap lujiu nkan gu olive bang kekhat siniu siga som malin khai-e. Sikumjiu naliu Nkengmaidung haidi sibo nkan-gu olive bangse kumbo-e, sichiujiu tuhoi naliuniu Jehudi maidunggu katanbo hiupuinagu karingbo damse lumacham bambo-e.

Sichiusai, ramtap mibo pake situ naliuniu din masamak rabo-e. Sichiusai naliu dechiujiu chaliang ralo? Naliura pake-parang ronna-e; naliuniu pamen situ nkha khaibo makge, chiudi pamen siniu naliutu nkha khai bambo-e.
Chiudi naliuniu dinrabo-e, “Yo, chiudi aleng pabam pikhaira, pake situ ramthon mibo-e.”
Sise maji-e. Paliuniu malum makbo jengniu ramthon mibo-e, chiudi naliura malum lubo jengniu pabam gase bambo-e. Chiudi sijengniu chaliangmi tulo, sibosung manangsi lulo.
Pabang siakbo kumjiu bambo Jehudi maitu Tingwang niu masiak khai makge; chiusai paniu dechiujiu naliutu masiak khai sune chiubo maning jiulo?

Haiga Tingwang gu kawibo nai kasabose aliuniu ngao-e. Kaomibo maitu paniu dejiukha kam masakhai bilo; chiudi naliuniu pagu lungsaboga bamsai, paniu dejiukha naliutu lungsa khai ralo! Chiudi naliuniu siga bammak sai, naliu tudi ramthon mirabo-e.
Chiudi Jehudi maidungniu paliugu malum makbo situ phutmi sai, paliuniu karaiga lungbo lunlung gase paliutu piwang khai lanrabo-e; palamra Tingwang niu sise kam ngamme.

Nkengmai naliura, nkan-gu olive bang kumjiu chaky gu olive bangga pijiu khopkhai bambo pakese kumbo-e. Jehudi maira chaky gu olive bang kumbo-e; sichiujiu pabang siakbo gasu ramthon mibo pake situ pilung khai lanra Tingwang leng maladiang rabo-e.

Asingnamai yo, kakungbo gu majibo khat bamme, sise Iniu naliu khuga pisikhai nibo-e, haise dejiukha naliu ningtinglo chiubo pisikhai rabo-e. Sisera palung tanbo Israel maidungse tingthengjiu bamlakge chiudi, Tingwang khuga Nkengmaidung riakse machang makthen bamra leng-e.
Palamra haichiujiu Israel maidungtu rankhaibi rabo-e. Haise Masanbo ariakniu dinkhai mibo-e,
“Rankhaipiuse Zion gasu wangrabo-e,
sichiujiu Jacob kai-kik gasu kasabo hinase luthonmi rabo-e.
haibo ladriatse paliu khuga wangtang khai rabo-e.”

Palamra Jehudi mainiu Kawibo champaose lukhai makbo donniu, Nkengmai sung paliuse Tingwang gu mikremai thiu mide. Chiudi Tingwang niu kadalubo paliu pao-pehmai jengniu paliu hai Tingwang gu chaka thiumibo-e.
Palamra paniu kadakhai mibo nai thoikhai mibo lamga Tingwang niu pachun limakge.
Ndara naliu Nkengmaidung hai Tingwang kadin piumak bamniu-e, chiudi Jehudi maidungse Tingwang kadin piumakbo donniu, tuhoira Tingwang gu lungsabo hai naliuniu daolude.
Sichiujiu naliuniu lungsabo haise daolubo kumjiu, Jehudi maidungdi Tingwang gu lungsabo daolura ga Tingwang kadin piulu makge.
Palamra Tingwang niu chamai hinatu lungsabo lenkhaira paliu mathiutu kadin piumakbo kavangdung pithiu khaide.
Masanbo ariakniu haichiu din-e,
“Saoniu Rapiu maning silu ralo?
Saoniu patu ladti khai ngam ralo?
saoniu paleng pikhai ralo?

Sijengniu asingnamaidung yo, Tingwang lungsiat hai aliuleng kadibo jengniu Iniu naliu khuga khengbo-e. Naliu pum hai karingbo rathak mania thiujiu pipad lura khatdi Tingwang tien thiuboga patu pikim khai lura kadkhai lulo. Haise naliuniu pikhai rabo majibo khatdi kabuibo si-e.

Kadihpirigu lunlungga naronna lung khaimi tulo, chiudi Tingwang niu nagu chunningse kam kali kam lujiu, nalunlungse kam kali milo. Chiusai Tingwang chunningra kawibo, patu pikim khaibo khatdi tathuibose delo chiubo nangniu silu rabo-e.

Sichiujiu Tingwang gu paman kungbo kalen aleng pikhai bibo jengniu, naliu mathiu khuga Iniu din-e: Wakamdi naliu ronna maning makumi tulo. Sibosung naliu lungchunse manonjiu, Tingwang niu naliu khuga pikhaibo malum saisuijiu naliutu ladjan thiu lulo.
Palamra aliugu chapum khatga katam-tambo mania bamme, khatdi maniadung hinagu katam-tambo ngam kam bamme.
Sikumjiu, aliu hai pariak kengjiu bamdi Khrista ga khat thiubo donniu, aliu pumkhat nakha-e, khatdi pum khatga katam-tambo maniadung bambo kumjiu, aliu mai hinatu pakhuga juwang aruang khai bambo-e.
Sichiujiu Tingwang niu aliu khuga pikhaibo palungsiat saisuijiu aliugu katam-tambo kalendungse thinrabo-e. Aliugu kalendungse Tingwang gu kawicham dinra sai, aliugu malum saisuijiu aliuniu dinrabo-e;
macharabo tien thiusai, aliuniu macha rabo-e; katikhai rabo tien thiusai, aliuniu katikhai rabo-e.

Maidung lungchun kachukhai rabo sai, aliuniu sichiujiu kachukhai rabo-e. Mai khatniu maidungtu pikhai rabo bamsai, lungchun dibo siniu pikhaimi sulo; mai khatniu pumtan bamsai, maranjiu kamkhaimi sulo; mai khatniu maidungtu lungsa khaisai, chunwi mathajiu tenkhaimi sulo.
Lungsabo sira masan siakbo lungchun siniu rabo-e. Kasabo situ mareng lulo, kawibo situ thin matip lulo.
Khatniu khattu Khristian singnamai kumjiu lungsalo, khatdi khatniu khattu chakhuang charao thiubo lenra lungchun ngut lulo.
Tatien maranlo, wadaodi make mane. Chunwi mathajiu khatdi lungchun ngutjiu Rapiu tu machalo.
Naliu lungchun ringajiu bamlo, naliu magenthiu chariuboga ginsilo, khatdi pawan machangna khengsao makjiu kheng bamlo.
Pageng bamboga Khristian singnamaitu nagu bambose pikhailo, khatdi sang-chabinmaidung leng naky lekhai bilo.
Chunwijiu bammaitu maluang chunwi machamlo, kapjiu bammaitu maluang kap nchamlo.
Mai hina leng manang macham khailo, chaliang mane, chiudi manuanbo maitu chaka thiu lulo. Naronna natu ningting-e chiujiu lukhaimi tulo.
Mai khatniu nakhuga maokhai misai, kamaobo siniu chakhum ruilan mane. Mai hinaniu wi-e chiujiu lukhaibose tenra matan lulo.
Mai hinatu agi-manaijiu maluang lung lura, ngamdiu then nangniu matan lulo.

Akahmaidung yo, wadaodi chakhum ruimane, chiudi Tingwang gu lungpom siniu pijiu ruikhaimi sulo. Palamra Masanbo ariakniu din-e, “Iniu chakhumse ruirabo-e, Iniu malan khai rabo-e, chiujiu Rapiu din-e,”

Sibosung Masanbo ariakniu dinbo kumjiu: “Nagu mikre mainiu mariusai, patu pitiu khai bilo; paniu charisai, patu pisak khai bilo; nangniu haichiu tenkhaibo donniu patuse mangambo siniu chami kumjiu rusu rabo-e.”
Kasabo siniu pingam khai tulo, chiudi kawibo siniu kasabo situ pingam khailo.
Pumtan thinjiu bammai hangga mai hinaniu bam rabo-e, palamra Tingwang niu suikhai makbo mai khat niudi pumtan daolakge, sichiujiu kabambo pumtan hinase Tingwang niu pikhaibo-e.
Mai khatniu ngao bambo pumtan thinmaitu suimakge sai, Tingwang niu macha khaibo situ suimakbo-e; sichiujiu mai khatniu sise suimak sai, paronna pariga ladjan phungwangbo-e.
Palamra kawi kamjiu bammaidung siniu pingra ha-e, chiudi kasa kam maidung siniu ping rabo-e. Nangniu pumtan thinmaitu pingmak ma? Kawibose kamlo, chiusai paliuniu natu thuon rabo-e,

palamra paliuniu Tingwang vang thiujiu naleng kawibose kamjiu bambo-e. Chiudi nangniu kasabo kamsai, paliutu ping lulo, palamra paliugu pumtan siniu kasa kambo maitu sajai pirabose pachang siakbo-e. Paliura Tingwang vangmai-e, siniu kasa kammai situ Tingwang gu sajaise pikhai rabo-e.
Tingwang gu sajai jengniu makjiu, chiudi kawi-kasa sibo lungchun siniu pumtan kathinmai hangga bamlulo.
Sijengniu paliuleng pikhai kabuibo hinase pikhai milo; napumgu khatdi maniadunggu ramkha pikhaijiu, paliu mathiutu chakhuang charao thiubose lenkhailo.
Khatniu khattu lungsabo paw phungbo makjiu, mai khat gudi chapaw phung mane. Palamra maitu lungsabo pasiniu Tacheng-tajai situ pi wangtang khai-e.

Chamtandung sira: “Makha mane; maitu gimane; aga mane; aratbo jengdin thiu mane, maigu masen mane,” haikumbo khatdi katam-tambo hina chamtan khatga din aruang nbamme, sisera “Naronna natu lungsabo kum nakining maitu lungsa lulo.”
Nangniu maitu lungsa-e sai, nangniu pakhuga kamaobo wadaodi kamkhai lakge; lungsabo hainiu Tacheng-tajai hinatu pi wangtang khaibo-e.

Haise nangniu kamsiak rabo-e, palamra nangniu jipbambo gasu buangsu raleng pawan wangtang mide chiubo nangniu si-e. Palamra karaiga aliuniu malumbo tingga suang, aliutu rankhaibi rabo wanse tuhoira nadiang mide.
Nchun tingse hawang mide, tingben padji sune. Sijengniu tamiubogu ngam hinase aliuniu phutmi sukhe, sichiujiu kabenbo ripuanse aliuniu piusukhe.
Jaw sak maniubo, makhabo, mangambo tien kam makjiu, n-gi athao makjiu, kabenboga lungmai nahdung kumjiu, matun majijiu lung mikhe.
Sichiujiu Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu chari maniase thinsulo, khatdi chamai pumgu tiutek phiubo khatdi chapumgu masen masiabo hina kamta milo.
Mai khat siniu pagu malum saisuijiu patu wahina pitiu khaibo sui-e, chiudi pagu malumga nkhinbo mai sira chaganniw ronna tiu-e.

Sichiujiu kata-kadao tiubo pasiniu wa tiumakbo maitu din masa mak rabo-e; sichiujiu chaganniw ronna tiubo pasiniu wakata kadao tiubo mai riga ladjan thiu rabo makge; palamra Tingwang niu patu suikhai mibo-e.
Mai vangtu ladjan thiurabo nang saolo! Papaopiu siniu, pase tathui lune, maksai tathuilu lakge chiujiu chap rabo-e. Sichiujiu Rapiu niu suikhaibo saisuijiu paniu ngamlu rabo-e.
Mai khatniu tingmik khattu nkiujiu lukhai-e, khatdi mai khatniu tingmik pakhiangnase macham kamme chiujiu lukhai-e. Mai hinaniu pagu-gu maning saisuijiu thin matip lulo.

Mai khat siniu tingmik khattu nkiujiu lukhaibose Rapiu tu chakuang thiubo-e, khatdi wakata kadao tiubo mai siniu Rapiu tu chakhuang thiujiu tiubo-e, palamra paniu Tingwang tu thuon bambo-e. Sichiujiu wa tiu makbo maise Rapiu jengniu tiu makbo-e, sichiujiu Tingwang tu paniu thuon bambo-e.
Aliu mai khatdi paleng ronna lungbo makge, aliu mai khatdi paleng ronna shai makge.
Aliuniu ringsai, Rapiu leng aliu ringbo-e, khatdi aliuniu shaikhai sai, Rapiu leng shaikhaibo-e. Haichiujiu aliu shaidi, ringdi, aliu hai Rapiu gu-e.
Palamra Khrista shaikhai mide khatdi ringsulan mide, sijengniu pahai kashaimai khatdi karingmai Rapiu thiurabo leng-e.

Sichiusai chaganniw ronna tiubo nangniu dekamjiu nasingnamai riga ladjan thiujiulo? Khatdi wa kata kadao, tiubo nangniu dekamjiu nasingnamaitu wajeng chakkhai mak jiulo? Tingwang niu aliu mathiutu pama suangga ladjan thiu rabo-e.
Palamra Masanbo ariakga haichiu raokhai mibo-e,
“Rapiu niu din-e, I ringjiu bambo donniu,
mai hina akhuga khudung kiurabo-e;
sichiujiu I hai Tingwang-e chiubo jat hinaniu madupad rabo-e.”
Chiusai aliu mathiugu tienkam saisuijiu mai hina Tingwang suangga, wahinagu palam pirabo-e.
Sichiusai aliuniu khat khattu ladjan thiubo hai kam tamikhe. Sibosung, mai khattu paphi masuira khatdi nuan-ga kaokhaira wadaodi matanmak rabo-e.

Rapiu Jesu khuga Iniu khat thiulubo jengniu, katiu kasakga wadi taniabo ha-e chiujiu Iniu malum siakge, chiudi mai khatniu katiu kasak kasiara tania-e chiujiu malumbo mai khugara maniase tania mibo-e.
Nangniu wakhat tiubo gasu, nasingnatu pachun kam chariu khaisai, nangniu kambose lungsabo ganiu makge. Khrista niu shaikhai mibo mailengse nagu tiutek siniu kam masami tulo!
Nangniu wi-e chiujiu lukhaibo situ pijiu kasabo zan phungmi tulo.
Palamra Tingwang gu chawangdihse tiubo khatdi sakbo makge, chiudi tacheng matipbo, agi-manaibo khatdi Hiupuina ga chunwibo si-e.
Sichiujiu mai khatniu haichiujiu Khrista tu machajiu bamsai, paniu Tingwang tu pikim khaibo-e, khatdi maidungniu suikhaibo-e.
Sijengniu agi-manaibo daolura sigasu khatniu khattu nkha khaiboga tankhang lura aliuniu kathuat khairabo siakge.
Tingwang niu kamkhaibo situ tiutek jengniu kam mahami tulo. Tiutek hina tiubo sui-e, chiudi mai khattu nuan-ga kaokhai rabo tiutek tiubose kamaobo-e.
Chami tiuboniu, jaw sakboniu maksai wakhat kambo ganiu nasingnamai phi pi masui khai makboniu wi-e.
Nagu malumbose Rapiu nanai kakga bambo thiumi sulo. Paniu suikhai miboga kamaobo lungchun bam makbo maise pasan wi-e.
Chiudi malum masabo pasiniu tiu khaisai, kamaoboga ngutkhai mibo-e, palamra sise malumbo ganiu makge; sichiujiu malumbo gasu makbo hinase nuan-e.
Malumboga katanmai aliuniu kason maitu paliu bang phungboga nkha khai rabo-e. Aliu ronna aliutu pikim khaibo thiumak rabo-e.
Chiudi aliu mathiuniu aliu singnamaitu paliugu malumboga dikhang lura paliuleng kawiboga pikim khai rabo-e.
Palamra Khrista niu paronna patu pikim khai makge, chiudi Masanbo ariakniu dinbo kumjiu, “Natu din masa khaibo hinase akhuga wangde.”
Palamra Masanbo ariakga raokhai mibo hinase khengsibo khatdi kachu khaibose aliuniu kamlura aliuleng raokhaibo-e.
Khrista Jesu niu kamlen khaibo saisuijiu, khengsibo khatdi kachukhai sibo phibang Tingwang siniu naliutu nkhakhai bibo thiumi sulo.
Sichiujiu naliu mathiu khuan khat thiulujiu aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista tu khatdi Papiu Tingwang tu thuon rabo-e.
Sichiujiu Khrista niu naliutu lukhai bibo kumjiu, Tingwang maken dilura naliu khatniu khattu lukhai lulo.

Palamra Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, chiubora Khrista ringtingga tenkhai mibo hai Jehudi mai jengniu-e, sichiujiu Tingwang niu paliu pao-pehmai khuga ladriat thiu khaibose wangtang khai-e chiubo lenkhaibo-e.
Sichiujiu haisiniu Nkengmai siniudi Tingwang gu lungsiattu thuonlu raleng-e. Haise Masanbo ariakniu dinkhaibo kumbo-e,
“Sichiujiu Nkengmai ruangga Iniu natu thuonrabo-e;
Natu thuonbo luise Iniu thiurabo-e.”
“Nkengmai yo, Tingwang maidungtu maluang lujiu, chunwi-ringa lulo!”
“Nkengmai hina Rapiu tu thuonlo,
mai hinaniu patu thuonlo!”
“Jesse kaikik gasu maikhat lungwang rabo-e:
paniu wangjiu Nkengmaitu mawangrabo-e,
sichiujiu paliuniu patu malum rabo-e.”

Agunbo phibang Tingwang niu chunwi ringabo khatdi naliugu malumbo pen gasu agi-manaibo siniu naliu lungga piphui khaibo thiumi sulo. Sichiusai Masanbo Hiupuina pumtan ganiu naliugu agun bambo situ pijiu dikhang khai rabo-e.
Asingna maidung yo, naliu khuga tasi ningting pakhiangna bamlujiu kawibo siniu naliu khuga phuijiu bamme, khatdi naliu khatniu khattu katikhai ngamjiu bamme chiubo Iniu malumsiak bamme.
Sichiujiu Iniu naliutu pi maningtao khai mibo lamga, haibo chamlen hainiu alung dijiu raokhaibo-e. Tingwang niu akhuga pikhai bibo thoidam jengniu I alung dijiu bambo-e.

Khrista Jesu vang thiulujiu Nkengmai leng tatien thiubambo-e. Nkeng maidung situ Masanbo Hiupuina donniu Tingwang khuga kadkhai kabuibo thiujiu paliu pum hai pipad lura, Iniu singku khat kumjiu Tingwang tu machajiu Kawicham hai dinronjiu bambo-e.
Khrista Jesu khuga khat thiulujiu, Tingwang tien Iniu tenbambo jengniu asao thiujiu bambo-e.
Nkengmainiu Tingwang cham majailu raleng, Iniu hujiu dinbo-e; sichiujiu Khrista niu akhuga tenkhai mibo situ Iniu dinbo-e. Pagu ladkeng nai pagu tienkam gasu haise paniu kamkhai mibo-e.
Tingwang gu Masanbo Hiupuina pumtan pen ganiu tasibo khatdi maisuang habo haise haichiujiu, Jerusalem gasu Illyricum tangjiu tadronbo hinaga Khrista lamga kawicham hai Iniu paoron khai mibo-e.
Mai katambo khatniu kathon khaibo kaphung riga thiukhai makbo kumjiu, Khrista lamga chiukhai matai makbo bam hinaga, Kawichamse pawan machang paoron rabo haise Iniu machunbo si-e.
Haise Masanbo ariakniu dinbose kumbo-e,
“Arapiu lamga dinkhai matai makmai siniu ngao rabo-e;
khatdi chiu matai makmai siniu silu rabo-e.”
Chiudi tingkum wajiukha kham mijiu bamdi, tuhoira haibo genlam Iniu kamrabo angamse loikhai mide, siniu tuhoira naliu khuga wangkhaira maning bamme.
Naliutu adaolubo sai, naliu nkha pen gasu Spain lam tadlu raleng, Iniu a-npuiga naliutu adao khaini-e.
Tuhoi siakra Jerusalem ga bammai jengniu Tingwang tien thiura I tadra kaden bamme.
Palamra Macedonia nai Achaia ga bambo phumling mainiu Jerusalem ga bambo kalek kasamai jengniu paliu chun wijiu pipad khaira rang bamme.

Sise paliu ronna chapkhai lubo-e, chiudi pachang siakjiu paliura paliutu nkha khairabo thao siakge. Palamra Jehudi maigu Hiupuina thoidamse paliuniu dao ncham bamme, sichiusai Nkengmai siniudi kadihpirigu mania siniu, Jehudi maitu nkharabo pathao siakge.
Iniu haibo tiense loimibo tingga, chiubora paliuleng makhuan khaibo rangkang hinase paliu khuga pikhai lubo saiga, Spain lam I tad rabo-e, sichiujiu agu tabin npui gasu naliutu adao rabo-e.
Naliu khuga I wangbo tingga, Khrista gu Kawicham nai thoidam kengjiu phungwang rabo-e chiubo Iniu si-e.
Singna maidung yo, Iniu naliu khuga khengbora, aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista donniu khatdi Hiupuina niu pikhaibo lungsiat donniu Tingwang khuga aleng kheng matan khaijiu bamlo.
Judaea ga bammai malum kamak maidung khugasu maren lura khatdi agu tienkam hai Jerusalem ga bammai, Tingwang maidungniu lukhai kabuibo thiulura aleng kheng khaijiu bamlo.
Sichiujiu Iniu achun wijiu naliu khuga wangrabo-e. Sichiujiu Iniu naliu khuga wangbo tingga, Tingwang niu pachun sai aliu mathiu chunwi macham lurabo-e.
Aliugu agi-manaibo phibang Tingwang niu naliu mathiutu maluang khaibo thiumilo. Amen.
Cenchreae ga bambo phumlinggu tatien thiubo aliu tanpui Phoebe tu naliuniu lukhaira Iniu chamtan thiujiu dinkhaibo-e.
Tingwang maidungtu kamkhai kabuibo hina naliuniu patudi nkha khai bilo; khatdi lukhai bilo. Palamra pahai maidung kakeng khuga, akhugadi kawibo chaka thiu bambo-e.
panainiu agu ringting jengniu, panai ringting khengkhai-e. Aronna makjiu, chiudi Nkengmaigu phumling hina niudi panaitu thuonkiujiu bamme.
Sise kumjiu panai kyga wang maduibo phumling tudi kanui khai-e.
Asia luongriangga Khrista tu malum raithubo piu, Iniu kungbo singna Epaenetus tu kanui khai-e.
Naliuleng tatien maransui khaibo pui Mary tu kanui khai-e.

Atu maluang lujiu kavangkyga bam ncham khai mibo chaka Jehudi maipiu Andronicus nai Junias tudi kanui khai-e, panaitu ladlangtadmai ruangga si mawi bamme khatdi panaise asuang Khristian thiurai bamniu-e.
Rapiu ga Iniu kakungbo Ampliatus tu kanui khai-e.
Khrista tien-ga ten nchambo Urbanus khatdi Iniu kakungbo asingna Stachys tudi kanui khai-e.
Khrista kadin piuboga lukhai buibo Apellesa tu kanui khai-e. Aristobulus kikhun-ga bammaitu kanui khai-e.
Singna Jehudi maipiu Herodion khatdi Narcissus kikhun-ga bammai Khristian singnamaitu kanui khai-e.
Rapiu tien thiu machambo Tryphaena khatdi Tryphosa, khatdi Rapiu leng tatien malenna tenkhai mibo Iniu kungbo singna Persis tu kanui khai-e.
Rapiu tien thiuboga matipjiu chap bambo Rufus tu khatdi atu panahpiu khat kumjiu pawan machangna akhi khaibo papuitu kanui khai-e.
Asyncritus, Phlegon, Harmes, Patrobas, Harmas, khatdi paliu ruangga Khristian singna thiujiu bammai mathiutu kanui khai-e.
Philiologus khatdi Julia, Nereus nai patanpui, Olympas khatdi paliu ruangga bammai Tingwang maidung mathiutu kanui khai-e.
Singna thiubogu biangpup khaibo siniu khat khattu kanui lulo. Khrista gu phumling hinaniu naliutu kanui khai-e.

Singna maidung yo, tuhoi Iniu naliu khuga khengkhaibo-e, maidungtu kampang khaibo khatdi maidunggu malum kam kadat khaibo khatdi naliuniu lukhai mibo katikhai situ suimak maidung tuse matadsi lulo, Paliu khugasu tamsinjiu bamlulo!

Sikumbo maidungniu tatien thiujiu bambo sira aliu Rapiu Khrista tu machabo makge, chiudi paliu wonleng matan kabammai-e. Paliu ladniam kawibo siniu khatdi kawibo npao siniu maidiu-maida maitu paliuniu sontiu bambo-e.
Naliuniu kawichamtu majaijiu bambo lamga mai hinaniu sijiu bambo-e, sijengniu naliu lamga I achun wijiu bambo-e. Iniu naliutu kawibo lamga wasibo, chiudi kasabo lamga wasi makbo thiura masen-e.
Sichiujiu aliugu agi-manaibo phibang Tingwang niu Satan situ naliu phihangga niakped khaibi rabo-e.
Aliu Rapiu Jesu gu lungsiat siniu naliutu maluang bambo thiumi sulo.
Haibo champao raobo piu Tertius, Iniu Rapiu zan-ga naliutu kanui khai-e.
Aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu lungsiat siniu naliu mathiutu maluang khaibo thiu milo. Amen.

Aliuniu Tingwang tu pamaken dibo pikhe! Jesu Khrista lamga Iniu Kawicham paoron khai mibo saisuijiu, khatdi nda tadmibo ken gasu baikhai nbambo majibose madukhaibo saisuijiu, Tingwang niu naliutu, naliu malumga pichap matip khai ngamme.
Delosai, tuhoira, nda baikhai mibo majibose tingtheng ringbo Tingwang gu chamtan saisuijiu Masanbo ariakga phaimiukakung maidunggu kadin piujiu malumlu raleng jat hina khuga madulen khai mide.
Paronna wahina sikambo Tingwang khuga Jesu Khrista jengniu tingthengjiu paken dibo thiumi sulo. Amen.
Tingwang chun ganiu Jesu Khrista gu ladlang tadra kadalubo Paul, nai aliu singna Sosthenes niu,
Aliu piu Tingwang khatdi Rapiu Jesu Khrista siniu lungsiat nai agi-manaibo naliu khuga pikhaibo thiumi sulo.
copy
Khrista Jesu ganiu Tingwang gu lungsiat naliuleng pikhaibo jengniu, Iniu Tingwang tu pawan machang thuon bamme.
Delosai naliu lad-lui hina gadi tasi hina gadi, Khrista pen ganiu wahinaga lungwi mide.
Sikumjiu Khrista gu jengdin haise naliu lungga bam matip lude.
Chiujiu naliu wakhat gadi nkhin mimakjiu aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista paken dijiu wangrabotu khuan bamlo.
Aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista Tingmik nai naliu maomi makra jengniu paniu naliutu pamalan tangbo pichap matip khai rabo-e.
Mai hina malum kabuibo piu Tingwang-e, paniu naliutu Panahpiu Rapiu Jesu Khrista tu majang khat thiu raleng kulude.

Chiusai singna maidung, naliu mathiuse chunkhat thiujiu din lura, naliu rong ganiu pangmi makjiu naliu lungkhat, chunkhat thiujiu bamlura Rapiu Jesu Khrista zan gasu naliu khu Iniu khengkhai-e. Khatnakha thiulujiu, mathiu chuncham lulo.
Delosai singna maidung naliu ruangga ari-arajiu bamme, chiubo Chloe kidung mainiu akhuga masanjiu dinkhai-e.
Sisera naliu khangsia mainiu, “I Paul khulam” khangsianiu “I Apollos khulam,” khangsianiu “I Peter khulam,” khangsianiu, “I Khrista khulam,” chiujiu din-e.
Naliuniu Khrista tu njan tap-tap mide! Paul niu naliuleng singchaiga shaikhai mijiuma? Naliutu Paul khommai thiura tadui nphum khai mijiuma?
Chiusai naliutu akhommai chiujiu tadui nphum khaibo-e, chiujiu mai khat niudi dinra ha-e.
(Yo, Iniu Stephanas khatdi pakikhun maitu tadui nphum khai bide, chiudi kakimai tura Iniu tadui nphum khaibo simakge).
Delosai tadui nphumbo tien thiura atu Khrista niu langkhai makge, chiudi Khrista niu singchai riga shaikhai mibose matha nchummi makra, ningting cham makjiu Kawicham din madu khaira langkhaibo-e.
Delosai singchai chamse nchummi ramai khugara kapangbo chamme, chiudi sise ranlumai aliu khugara Tingwang gu pumtan-e.
Palamra Masanbo ariakga haichiu raokhai bamme,
“Iniu ningting maidunggu ningtingse kam maha mine,
khatdi tasiam kasimai siamse wadi makbo leng pithiu khai mine.

Palamra Tingwang gu ningtingga, maidungniu paliugu ningting gasu Tingwang tu singam makra kamkhai mibo-e. Sibosung, “kapangbo” chiujiu kubo, aliuniu dinronbo ladkeng siniu rankhai raleng Tingwang niu suikhai mibo-e.
Jehudi mainiu wa tasibotu phuini-e, khatdi Greek mainiu ningtingtu phiu-e.
Chiudi aliura Khrista tu singchai gasu masengshat mibo racham dinronbo-e, sise Jehudi mai khugara phisui kasabo khatle, khatdi Nkengmai khugara kapangbo chamme.
Chiudi kulubo mai, Jehudimai tadi Nkengmai tadi, paliu khugara Khrista raha hai Tingwang gu pumtan nai ningting si-e.
Palamra Tingwang gu kapangbo chamse chamaigu ningting suang nkiu-e, khatdi Tingwang gu kasonbose chamaina pumtan suang tandiang-e.
Tuhoira singna maidung yo, Tingwang niu naliutu kulubo raha maning khailo. Chamainagu maning kumsai paliuse ningting mai makge, katan maidi makge, kadi katheng maidi makge.
Chiudi Tingwang niu ningting maitu kam mangam khaira kapang maitu kulubo-e khatdi Tingwang niu katan maitu kam mangam khaira jengniu kadih haiga kason maidungtu kada lubo-e.

Sironna makjiu kadihpiriniu maning masiamjiu kakhan katiak maidung tudi, khatdi wajeng chakkhai mak maidung tudi kada lude; sichiujiu kadihpiriniu papee-paga thiu maidung leng lukhai maitu kam maha khaira leng-e.
Sibo rambara, mai khatniudi Tingwang masuangga wasao thiu mak raleng-e.

Chiudi Tingwang niu naliutu Khrista Jesu khuga pi aruang khai-e, khatdi Tingwang niu Khrista tu aliugu ningting pithiu khai-e. Sichiujiu papen gasu aliutu Tingwang khuga kam majikhai-e, sichiujiu aliu haitu Tingwang gu masanbo mai thiujiu khenrang pithiu khai-e.
Haijengniu Masanbo ariakga raokhaibo kumjiu, “Wasao thiuni maise, Rapiu niu kamkhai mibo donniu wasao thiu lulo.”
Singna maidung yo, Iniu Tingwang gu masanbo majibo chamse dinronra naliu khuga wangbo tingga, Iniu aladkang dijiu kakungbo lad din makge.
Jesu Khrista tu singchaiga masengshat mibo cham makjiu, Iniu naliu khuga wa katambo khatnadi dinkhai makge.
Iniu naliu khuga wangbo tingga, I sonjiu bamme khatdi pingjiu kaphikrai-raijiu bambo-e.
Sichiujiu acham din gadi, maidung lungchun kimlura chamainah gu ningting chamkeng thin makge, chiudi Tingwang Hiupuina gu pumtan gasu dinkhai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu naliugu malum hai chamainah gu tasi ningting ganiu makge, chiudi Tingwang gu pumtan bamlura leng-e.
Hiupuina ga pasiu chapmi mai khuga Iniu ningting cham dinbo-e. Chiudi kadihpirigu ningting makge, khatdi kadihpiriga matha nchum mirabo pumtan thinmaigu ningting makge.
Chiudi kadihpiri dam makhabo maga Tingwang niu aliu maken dilu raleng kaden masuang khai mibo kamahinbo nai ka-nbaibo cham Tingwang ningting situ aliuniu dinbo-e.
Haibo kadihpirigu mawang maidung mai khatdi sise silu makge; paliuniu sise sibam niusai paken kadibo Rapiu tu masengshat makrabo-e.
Chiudi Masanbo ariakga raokhai mibo kumbo-e,
“Mai khatniudi ngao makbo maksai chiu makbo,
haichiu padne chiubo mai khatniudi
maning padmakbo hinase,
Tingwang niu patu lungsamai leng kaden khai mibo-e.”
Palamra Tingwang niu aliuleng Hiupuina pen gasu madukhai bi-e, chiubora Hiupuina siniu palam hinaga Tingwang gu kasukbo ladkengse phiu-e.
Mai khatniu palungchun gasu palamga sikambo kumjiu, Tingwang gu Hiupuina paronna Tingwang lamga sikambo-e.
Aliuniu haibo kadihpirigu hiupuina daolubo makge, chiudi Tingwang niu langkhaibo Hiupuina se daolubo-e, sichiujiu Tingwang niu aliutu pikhaibo hinase silu raleng-e.
Hiupuina gu kamajibo chamse aliuniu chamai tasiniu katikhai makge chiudi Hiupuina gu ladkeng thinjiu Hiupuina raha dinbo-e.

Hiupuina kahamai siniu Tingwang khugasu wangbo Hiupuina kalense dao ngam lakge. Sikumbo mai siniu wadaodi sitang lulakge, palamra sise palengra kapangbo kumjiu ngaokhai-e delosai kakungbo guse hiupuina lunlung gasu ladjan thiu rabo-e.
Hiupuina kabammai ronna wahina lamga ladjan thiu ngamme, chiudi mai khatniudi patu ladjan thiu ngam makge.
Masanbo ariakniu dinbo kumjiu,
“Saoniu Rapiu maning silu ralo?
Saoniu patu ladpi khai ngam ralo?”
Chiudi aliu khuga Khrista chunningse bamme.
Chiusai singna maidung, Iniu Hiupuina bammai khuga kadin kumjiu naliu khuga din daolakge; chiudi haibo kadihpiri mai thiujiu Khristian mai nahmaidung khuga kumjiu dinbo--e.
Iniu naliutu kabui-ndui pikhaibo-e, katanbo tatek pimakge; palamra naliuniu singam makge. Yo, tuhoi tangbo naliuniu silu makge.

Palamra tuhoi tangbo naliu hai kadihpiri mai kumjiu lung bamme, delosai manmabo lungchunniu n-gi athao bambo hai, naliu haibo kadihpirigu lunlungga lungjiu, haibogu jai-ali saisuijiu lung bamme chiubo makma?
Sichiujiu naliu khangsianiu, “I Paul khulam,” khangsianiu “I Apollo khulam-e,” chiubo hai naliu kadihpiri mai kummak jiuma?
Chiusai Apollo se saolo? Paul hai saolo? Anaira naliutu pijiu malum khaibo Tingwang vangmai nakha-e. Tingwang niu pikhaibo ngamse anaira kamgapbo mai-e.
Iniu lingkhai-e; Apollo niu tadui kajinkhai-e, chiudi pabangtu pi mawi khaibora Tingwang niu-e.
Sijengniu ling kakhaibo piudi, tadui kajinbo piudi wadi makge. Chiudi pijiu mawi khaibo sira Tingwang niu-e.
Chiusai lingkhaibo piudi, tadui kajin khaibo piudi katambo ha-e. Patien kam-kam saisuijiu paliu phijeng Tingwang niu pikhai rabo-e.
Palamra aliura Tingwang tien kathiu mai-e, khatdi naliura Tingwang luzam si-e.
Naliura Tingwang ky si-e.

Tingwang niu atu pikhaibo kalen saisuijiu, chaky thiu kasimai khat kumjiu, Iniu kaphung khat kathon khaibo-e, sichiujiu mai khatniu sibo riga chaky thiubo-e. Chiudi mai hinaniu dechiujiu thiuralo chiubo makum sonna lulo.
Palamra Tingwang niu Jesu Khrista khuga donkhai mibo makjiu mai khatniudi katambo kaphung kathon silakge.
Sichiujiu khangsianiu, kachia, khangsianiu rangkang, khangsianiu paman kungbo tu, khatdi khangsianiu tasing, khangsianiu tagai, khangsianiu magao thin lujiu kaphung gase chaky thiu sune.
Chamai hinagu tienkamse Khrista niu madukhai rabo-e. Palamra patingmik gase chami gasu mai hina tienkamse madukhaine, sichiujiu palingbose madukhai rabo-e.
Kaphung riga thiukhaibose chami gasu masiak lusai, thiukhaibo piuse paphijeng dao lune.
Chiudi mai khatgu tienkamse ruthon misai pase nchum mine; chiudi chami ganiu npad lubo kumjiu papum siakra ranlubo daolu bui-e.
Tingwang tu Kahumboky tu mai khatniu kam maha misai, Tingwang niu patu kam maha mine. Palamra Tingwang tu Kahumboky sira masanbo-e, khatdi sibo Kahumboky se naliu-e.
Mai khatniudi paronna patu son mitulo. Naliu ruangga mai khatniu kadihpiri lunlung saisuijiu paronna patu wasi-e chiujiu maningsai, wa kasimai thiulura jengniu pah kapangmai thiu lulo.
Delosai haibo kadihpiriniu ningting-e chiujiu lubo sira, Tingwang khugara mathakubo-e. Masanbo ariakga raokhai mibo kumjiu, “Tingwang niu wa kasimaidungtu paliugu ningtingboga minlude.”
Sigasu Masanbo ariak pabam khatga haichiu din-e, “Rapiu niu wa kasimai lungchuntu wadi pageng habo gu-e chiujiu si bamme.”
Sichiusai, mai khatniudi chamainiu kamlubo jengniu chaliangmi tulo, palingjiu wahinase naliu gu-e.
Palamra Paul tadi, Apollo tadi, Peter tadi, kadihpirigu tadi, ringbambo tadi, kashaibo tadi, tuhoi bambo tadi, pasai wangrabo tadi, pakhiangna naliu gu-e.
Sichiujiu naliudi Khrista gu-e khatdi Khrista hai Tingwang gu-e.
Naliuniu aliutu Tingwang gu kakungbo majibo lamga parib phungbo Khrista vangdung-e chiujiu maning khailo.
Sikumbo kavang khat sira papaogu malum kabuimai khat thiu rabo-e.
Tuhoira, naliuniu maksai, maidungniu atu ladjan thiuratu Ira wadi manang makge. Iniu atu, aronnadi ladjan thiu makge.
Alungchun nsisiak bambo-e, chiudi I amao ha-e chiubo gudi makge. Ariga ladjan thiurabo sira Rapiu niu-e.

Sijengniu majibo wanse wang makthen wadi ladjan thiu tulo. Kanambo ladjan sira Rapiu wangmak then khuan rabo-e, paniu wangsai tamiuboga baikhai bambo mai hina lungchunse madu khai rabo-e. Sichiusai mai hina Tingwang khugasu paniu daobuibo tathuonse daorabo-e.

Chiusai asingna maidung yo, “Tachengse majai lulo,” chiu dinbose naliuniu silura jengniu Apollo anainiu lunglen khai mibo situ naliuniu alilu raleng-e. Naliuniu mai khat jengniu tasao thiumi tulo, maksai mai khat kendi tiami tulo.
Saoniu naliutu mai suangga kam madi khai gulo? Naliu khuga bambo hinase Tingwang niu pikhaibo makma? Wide, sichiusai naliuniu kalen daomakbo kumjiu dechiu tasao kam ralo?

Naliuleng pageng bambo hina machangmi dama? Pachangjiu naliu kalekwi maima? Chawang thiumak tadi chawang thiu mima? Yo, naliu chawang thiu misai, I achun wi-e; chiujiu aliudi naliutu majang chawang thiu macham lubui-e.
Palamra siamthuboga Tingwang niu aliutu ladlangtadmai pi thiukhai-e, sichiujiu kamao madam khaijiu kadihpirigu mazadung khatdi chamai mathiu suangga kamshatra suikhai-e chiubo Ira ngaopadle.
Khrista jengniu aliura kapangmai-e, chiudi naliura Khrista tu khat thiu lujiu ningting mai-e! Aliura kason mai-e, chiudi naliu katan mai-e! Aliu tura khan tia-e, chiudi naliu tura chakhuang thiu-e.
Tuhoi siakdi aliura mariu charijiu bamme, maliufai ben bamme; aliutu dap bamme; bam khat gasu bam khatga tad mariu kimme.
Aliu pum siakniu maranjiu tatien thiujiu bamme, mainiu aliutu siangkhaidi, aliura paliutu thoidam pi-e, mainiu aliutu kam mathaddi, aliura kheng bamme!
Mainiu aliutu din masadi, lungsabo chamkengniu aliura paokakge. Aliura kadihpiri maigu kararen sung tangmakge; tuhoi katang aliura kadihpiri maigu kararen kaponmai thiu bamme.
Iniu haise raokhaibora naliutu kam mangam khaira jengniu makge, chiudi anah kakungmai thiujiu laddin khaibo-e.

Chiusai Khristian lunlungga naliutu phuikhai mai sang kariu bamdi, naliu piura khat ronna-e. Palamra naliu khuga Kawicham Iniu phungwangjiu Khrista Jesu khuga naliu khat thiulubo jengniu I hai naliu piu thiu mibo-e.
Sijengniu naliu atu alilulo chiujiu Iniu khengbo-e.

Haijengniu Iniu kungbo Khristian lunlungga malum kabuibo anah Timothy tu naliu khuga langwangbo-e. Khrista Jesu ga khat thiu lubo kasanbo ringtingga khatdi Iniu katikhaibo phumling hinaga naliuniu maningtao lura lang khaibo-e.
I naliu khuga wanglakge chiubo maningjiu, naliu khangsiamai chaliang bamme.
Chiudi Rapiu chunsai I naliu khuga wang majine, khatdi chaliangjiu kinmaitu paliu cham ganiu makjiu paliu pumtan ganiu I silune.
Palamra Tingwang kadihra tachamkeng ganiu makjiu pumtan pen ganiu-e.
Iniu singrang thin lujiu naliu khuga wang rama? Maksai lungsabo siniu manuanjiu wang ralo? Sikania ruangga dese naliuniu masenlo?
Sichiusai naliu dechiu chaliang ralo? Sibosung naliu chun sarabo-e, khatdi sikumbo mai situ mathiu rong gasu hathonmi rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu majang bam makdi ahiunaniu naliutu majang bambo kumjiu, haikumbo wa kasa kammai riga ladjan thiubo-e.
Chiubora aliu Rapiu Jesu zan gasu naliu nai aliu hiupuina aruang lujiu sikumbo maitu Satan khuga pikhaimi rabo-e.
Sichiujiu papum kam maha midi, Rapiu Jesu gu tingmik nai pa hiupuina tu juring lura leng-e.

Naliuniu masan siakjiu lungmira nuan-gu kaguangbo chakhise luthon milo sichiusai Iniu naliutu sibambo kumjiu, chakhi jaomakbo kasanbo taruakse naliu thiu lubui-e. Palamra aliugu Kenpadbo Ngee leng Khrista tu charathiu khai mibo-e.
Sichiusai nuan-gu kaguangbo chakhi nai kasabo taruak tiu makjiu, chiudi chakhi jaomakbo masanbo khatdi majibo taruakse tiujiu changi sukhe.
Kamakha maitu maluang mane chiujiu Iniu naliu khuga raokhai mibo-e.
Haise kadihpirigu makhabo maksai patiuni kasamai, maksai agatiumai, maksai charamengtu kahum maitu maluang mane chiubo makge; palamra sichiusai naliuniu kadihpiri gasu npadmi rabo-e.

Chiudi aliu singna maidung khangsianiu makhamai, patiuni kasamai, charamengtu kahummai, palad-liu kasamai, jawsak maniumai, maksai agatiumai thiusai paliutu maluang mane, chiubo ronna makjiu, tiudi tiu aruang mane chiujiu Iniu naliu khuga raokhai mibo-e.
Naliu khangsiamai riga tathu-chara bamboga, sise Tingwang maidung khuga tiak makjiu, malum makmai khuga mengjiu katiakbose pingmak jiuma?
Tingwang maidungniu kadihpiritu ladjan thiurabo-e chiubo naliu simak jiuma? Sichiusai naliuniu kadihpiri pakhiangnatu tiakrabo sai, naliuniu poinakha thutu tiak silak jiuma?
Aliuniu mazadungtu ladjan thiune chiubo naliu simak jiuma? Chiusai haibo ringting suang dejiukha nkiubo gulo!
Sikumbo padsai, phumling ga pabam hamainiu ladjan thiu khai rama?
Kamangambo gu-e! Pachangjiu naliu ruangga ladjan thiu kabuimai khatra bam lubui siakge.
Sibosung, Khristian mai khatniu pasingnatu ladjan thiura, malum makbo mai khuga tadjiuma?
Naliu ruangga tathu-chara tiakbo siniu naliu maosiak mide chiubo madu kami gu-e. Naliutu kammao khaiboniu widiang makma? Naliugu sutlubo siniu widiang makma?
Sibosung naliu singna karai khat khattu kammao khai-e, khat khattu sontiu-e!

Pachangjiu pacheng kasamai siniu Tingwang gu chawangdihga ngutlakge chiubo naliu sibamne. Naliu ronna sonmi tulo; npui-npiu lung kamaomai, mainaoky kiumai, npuimai karai maksai npiumai karai rikhibo, charamengtu kahummai,
maksai ka-agamai, patiuni kasamai, jaw sak maniumai, maiken tiamai, maksai son-tiumai khatniudi Tingwang gu chawangdihga ngutlakge.

Naliu khangsiamai nda sichiu kinniu-e, chiudi naliu nuan gasu, naliutu kam masan khai mide, naliutu Tingwang khuga kadkhai mide; sironna makjiu Rapiu Jesu Khrista zan ganiu Tingwang Hiupuina niu naliutu kam maji khai mide.

Khangsia mainiu din-e, “Katiu-kasak hai awon leng-e, awon hai katiu-kasak leng-e.” Yo, chiudi Tingwang niu nia situ kam mahami rabo-e. Apum haitu kamakhabo ngam kamra damkhaibo makge; chiudi Rapiu tien thiura leng-e, sichiujiu Rapiu niu apumleng pikhai rabo-e.
Tingwang niu Rapiu tu kashaibo gasu juring khai-e, sichiujiu paniu aliutu pagu pumtanniu piringsu khaine.
Naliu pum hai Khrista pumgu mania-e chiubo naliu si-e. Chiusai Iniu Khrista pumgu khat thiulujiu, papum kajonpuitu pumkhat thiu rama? Sichiu makrabo-e!
Maksai papum kajonpuitu pumkhat thiumi maise, sibo pui panai pumkhat thiu mibo-e chiubo naliuniu simak jiuma? Masanbo ariakniu masanjiu din-e, “Khangniase pumkhat thiu mibo-e.”
Chiudi Rapiu khuga khat thiumi mai sira Hiupuina ga khat thiu mibo-e.
Npui-npiu lungmaobo gasu mari lulo, chamainaniu nuan kambo hina chapum lenlam niu-e; chiudi npui-npiu maobo maira paronna papumtu mikrejiu nuan kambo-e.
Naliu pumse Tingwang khugasu daolubo-e, khatdi naliu lungga bambo Masanbo Hiupuina gu charaky-e chiubo naliu simak jiuma? Khatdi naliu hai naliu ronnagu makge, chiudi Tingwang gu-e.
Palamra naliutu pamanniu liu lude. Sijengniu naliu pum haitu Tingwang kendira thinpiu lulo.
Tuhoira, naliuniu ariak raokhaibo lamga.
Mai khatniu panao thiu makboniu wi-e.
Chiudi npui-npiu lungmaobo kengbo jengniu npiumai hina panao thiu milo, khatdi npuimai hina pakina bam milo.
Pakinaniu panao khuga pi kabuibose pimilo, khatdi panao niudi pakina khuga pimilo, sichiujiu khat khattu pijiu kimkhai milo.
Panaose paronna pariga pumtan ha-e, chiudi pakina khuga bamme,sise kumjiu pakina niudi paronna pariga pumtan ha-e, chiudi panao khuga bamme.

Nanai panao pakina chunjon lujiu pating kak khat kalum rijiu, kakheng thiura jengniu makbo, khatniu khattu suimakbo thiu mane; chiudi paronna papum thin mawi simakbo gasu Satan niu hiammi makra nanai bam aruangboniu wi-e.
Acham haira chamtan makge, haichiu lusai wine, chiubo gu-e.
Mai hinatu pijiu akumkam luni-e, chiudi mai hina khuga Tingwang gu katam-tambo kalen bambo jengniu, sise khangkhat khuga pajai khat, khangkhat khuga pajai katam khat bam mibo-e.
Chiusai kalek thiumakmai nai kamipuimai lamga Iniu dinbo-e, chiubora naliuniu akumjiu bam lusai wine.
Chiudi naliu ronna naliutu thinmanlu laksai, naliu kalek thiu milo, ginman lakjiu kabambo suangra kalek thiumibo siniu widiang-e.
Chiusai paniu tadmine, chiudi chami thiulan tulo, maksai pakina nai chun jonlujiu aruanglan milo; khatdi pakina niudi panaotu tami tulo.
Chiudi kakimai khuga Iniu dinbo-e, (Rapiu niu dinbo makge, chiudi Iniu dinbo-e). Khristian mainiu panaose malum kamak maitu lusai, khatdi paniu pakinatu majang lung nisai, sibo puitu tami tulo.
Chiusai Khristian maipui kinase malum kamak mai bamdi, paniu panaotu majang lung nisai, pakinatu mami tulo.

Delosai malum kamakbo pakina situ panao jengniu, patu Tingwang niu lukhaibo sui-e, khatdi malum kamakbo panao situdi pakina jengniu Tingwang mai thiu mibo-e, chiumaksai panai nahmai masan makge, chiudi tuhoira masan mide.
Chiudi malum kamakbo piuniu npekmi nisai npek milo, hai kumboga panao tadi, pakina tadi pachun paning kambo sui-e. Palamra Tingwang niu aliutu agi-manaijiu lungra kulubo-e.
Khristian maipui yo, nakinatu ranlune, ranlulakge chiubo nangniu dechiu silu ralo? Maksai Khristian maipiu yo,nanaotu ranlune, ranlulakge chiubo nangniu dechiu silu ralo?
Tingwang niu mai hinatu kukhaibo khatdi pikhaibo kalen saisuijiu lung lulo. Haise phumling hinaga Iniu katikhai kinbo chengsi-e.
Mai khatniu patu Tingwang niu kulubose sui-e, sai chagi rombo situ kam mahami tulo, chagi rom makbo mai khattu Tingwang niu kulubose sui-e sai, paniu chagi rom makdi sui-e.
Chagi rom maidi, rommak maidi wason makge, chiudi Tingwang lad majai kalubose pakhiangna-e.
Mai hinaniu patu kukhaibo kumjiu lungbam lulo.
Nda natu kubo tingga nang maivang thiu kin guma? Sibo jengniu nang nalung chariu tulo; chiudi nangniu khenrang thiulu buibo bamsai thiubo sui-e.
Palamra kavang thiujiu bambo gasu, Rapiu niu kukhai mibo maise, khenrang thiumibo-e; sikumjiu khenrang thiujiu kukhai mibo maise Khrista vangmai-e.
Naliutu paman pijiu Tingwang niu liulu mibo-e, sijengniu naliu maivang thiulan talo.
Singna maidung yo, naliutu dechiujiu kukhai migulo chiubo lunlung saisuijiu chakin thiujiu lunglulo.
Chiusai kalek thiumak mai jengniura Rapiu khuganiu chamtan daolu makge, chiudi Rapiu lungsiat jengniu malum kabuibo agu maning cham din khai-e.
Chiusai alungchunra, tuhoigu magenthiubo jengniu, mai khatniu pagu lunlung saisuijiu lungbambo siniu wi-e.
Nang kalek thiulubo mai ma? Chiusai npek mira maning tulo. Nang kalek thiu makha ma? Chiusai kalek thiura maning tulo.
Sichiujiu nang nanao thiune chiudi mao makge, maksai aliu mainiu chami thiune chiudi mao makge. Chiudi kalek thiubogu naimachangna chariu gasu duaklubo siniu wisuma chiujiu Iniu dinkhaibo-e.
Chiudi singna maidung Iniu maningbo sira hai-e, pating hai thengta mide, sijengniu tuhoi gasu paliu nao kabam maidi kahamai kum lulo.
Khatdi kap kabam maidi chunsa makmai kum lulo, khatdi paliu chunwi kabam maise paliu chun wimakmai kum lulo; chiusai naliu mania kabam maidi paliugu kahamai kum milo.
Khatdi chakhiu-chalan thin kakinmaidung, thin kamak mai kum lulo, Palamra tuhoi bambo kadihpiri hai pating thenglak mide.
Chiudi naliu lung chariu makjiu bambo siniu wi-e. Panao thiu makmai siniu dechiujiu Rapiu chun kimlu ralo chiubo ronna matanbo-e.
Chiudi panao thiu mimai siniu dechiujiu panao chun kimlu ralo chiujiu haibo kadihpirigu maniatu maning mi-e, sichiujiu patu jainia lam juman bambo-e.

Sichiujiu npuimai chami thiu kamakmai, maksai aliumai siniu papumdi, pahiupuinadi masan lura, sichiujiu Rapiu chun kimlura matanbo-e, chiudi chami thiu kamibo puira, dechiujiu pakina chun kimlu ralo chiubo kadihpirigu lungchun maning mi-e.
Iniu haibo cham dinbose, naliuleng kagengbo kabam jengniu-e, Iniu naliutu kam chariu khaibo makge, sibosung naliuniu pathao kamjiu, wadi maning kabuak makjiu Rapiu tien thiulu kani jengniu-e.
Chiudi khangsiamai panah aliumai mibui mibo bamsai kham kabambo pathao makge, chiu maning sai, patu pachun kam lujiu panahpuitu pimi lulo.
Chiudi sise palung ganiu wadu makge, palung pachang siakjiu paronna panahpuitu khamlu bui-e chiusai, sidi wi-e,
Khatdi mai khatniu panahtu chami pithiu khaine chiudi wi-e, sichiu makjiu pijiu chami thiu lakge chiudi widiang-e.
Mainao thiu kamimai, pakina ringbam then tajainiu patu ratman mibo-e, chiudi pakina shai misai paniu pachunmai khuga mibo sui-e, chiudi Khristian mai thiu rabo-e.
Chiudi achun kumme sai, pah mimakbo siniu widiang-e. Haise achun maning-e, khatdi I hai Tingwang Hiupuina dao kalumai-e chiu maningbo-e.

Tuhoira, naliuniu charamengga kadkhaibo tatek lamga raokhaibo lamga, paliuniu dinbo kumjiu, “Aliuniu wahina sibamme,” chiubo hai maji-e. Chiudi sikumbo tasi sira tasao kathiu gu-e, chiudi lungsabo siniu wakam lubui-e.
Mai khat kumboniu paronna wa si-e chiu maningsai paniu kasibose sitang makha-e.
Chiudi mai khatniu Tingwang tu lungsa-e sai paniu patu sibamne.
Chiudi chara kathiubo tatek katiubo sira, haibo kadihga chara kachangbo khatdi ha-e, chiubo aliuniu si-e, Khatnakha bambo Tingwang paronna-e, chiubo aliuniu sibamme.
Palamra tinggen lam, maksai kadihpiriga chara kengbo kum, papaodungdi kengjiu bamme.
Chiudi aliu lengra khatnakha bambo Papiu, Tingwang, wahina Dampao, khatdi papen gasu aliu ringjiu bambo—sigasu wahinatu papen gasu damkhaibo, khatdi aliuniu lungjiu bambo Rapiu Jesu Khrista si-e.

Chiudi aliu mathiuse haibogu majibo situ sikambo makge, khangsia mainiu tuhoi katang palun jaithiujiu charameng kahumbo lungchun bamjiu paliuniu tiubambo tatektu charamengga kadkhai mibo-e chiubo maning lujiu kadkhaibo rathak maniase tiusai pamaning sonbo jengniu kammao mide.
Katiu-kasak jengniu Tingwang khuga aliu wison makge, aliuniu tiu makdi sason makge, tiudi wison makge.
Chiudi nang naronna nchun-narang thiubo siniu, paliu malum matip kamak maitu nuan-ga jukhaimi makra maning sonna lulo.
Chiusai nang tasi kabambo siniu charathiubo kyga watiu bambo, mainiu natu ngao sai, padi charathiubo maniase tiura maning pad lakma?
Sichiusai nagu tasi jengniu kasonmai piutu kam mahami rabo-e, sinapiu lengdi Khrista niu shaikhai mibo-e!
Haichiujiu nasingna malum kasonbo piutu nangniu kam ajam khaibose, Khrista khuga nangniu kamaobo kam mibo-e.
Sijengniu agu tatekniu asingnatu kammao bamsai, Iniu wadaodi chami tiulan lakge. Sichiujiu asingnatu nuan-ga jukhai lakge.
Ira khenrang thiumai makma? I hai ladlangtadmai khangkhat makma? Iniu aliu Rapiu Jesu tu ngao khaimi makma? Naliu hai Rapiu khuga agu tienkam phizengse makma?
Mai kakimai khuga, I ladlangtadmai makge, chiudi naliu khugara I ladlangtadmai-e.
Maidungniu aken tiasai, Iniu haichiujiu alamga dinbo-e.
Agu tienkam jengniu atiu-asak I daobui makma?
Idi ladlangtadmai kakimai kumjiu, khatdi Rapiu gu singnamai kumjiu, maksai Peter kumjiu Khristian maipuitu anao thiu lujiu maluang nbin tadbo suimak jiuma?
Maksai Barnabas anai ronna haise kamrabo ma?
Mai khatniu riphen kamsai paronna pangam phiulan rama? Mai khatniu mumsireng renglujiu parasy tiumak rama? Mai khatniu khaorui marui lujiu pa-ndui tiumak rama?
Iniu kadinbo hai chamai cham ronna jiuma? Tacheng-tajai gadi sichiujiu din makma?
Mose gu Tacheng-tajai gadi “Nangniu thin bambo matomtu pamun ratmanmi tulo.” chiujiu raokhai nbambo-e, sise Tingwang niu matomtu kungjiuma?
Sichiu makge, pah aliu jengniu kadinbo siakge; delosai chalu kachu maidi, chamiu ka-atiat maidi padam dao macham lura leng-e.
Aliuniu naliu khuga Hiupuina lin lingkhai mibo-e, sichiusai, aliuniu naliu khugasu kadihpiri gu maniase daolanboga, sise aliuleng nkiuju mijiuma?
Mai kakimainiu naliu khugasu sise ngao lura machun-e sai, aliura simai suang nkiubo makma?
Chiudi haibo majise aliuniu thinpiu makge, chiudi Khrista gu Kawibo Champaoga kham-kanambo thiu makra aliu niu wahinaga khengsijiu bambo-e.
Charaky lungga tatien thiu bammai paliuniu charakyga kadkhaibo maniase tiu-e chiubo, khatdi rathak bamga machajiu bammai siniu rathak maniase padam dao machamme chiubo naliuniu sibamme.
Sikumjiu Kawibo champao dinronbo paliu siniu Kawibo champao gasu ringlu bui-e chiujiu Rapiu niu dinkhai-e.
Chiudi Ira haikumbo lunlungse tad makge, khatdi haikumbose alengdi kamkhaira Iniu raokhai makge. Palamra mai khat kumboniu agu wasao thiubo haitu khammi makra, Iniu shaikhai nibo-e.
Iniu Kawicham dinronboga asao thiura wadi ha-e. Idi Kawicham dinron maksai, maningkam lakbo sansabose adon thiu rabo-e.
Chiusai I aronna amaning thiujiu tatien hai thiusai, aphijeng dao rabo-e, chiudi aronna amaning makjiu tatien hai kamra atu Tingwang niu malin khaibo jengniu-e.
Chiusai Iniu aphijeng nde ngaoralo? Paman thiu makjiu Kawibo Champao Iniu dinronbo hai, aphijeng daomakbo jengniu, amaji hai dinsuan makge.
I mai khat vangdi thiu makge, chiudi maidungtu dao makeng lura jengniu, I hai mai hina vang thiu mibo-e.

Sichiujiu Iniu Jehudi maitu phiulura jengniu Jehudi mai khugara Jehudi mai kum tadle, sichiujiu Tacheng-tajai hangga kabam maitu phiulura jengniu Tacheng-tajai hangga I bamson mak tadi, kabam mai kum tadle.
Iniu Tacheng-tajai hangga bam makbo Nkeng maitu phiulura jengniu Tacheng-tajai hangga bam kamakmai kum tadle, chiudi Tingwang khugara I Tacheng-tajai kahamai makjiu Khrista gu tacheng majai kinbo-e.
Paliu lungchun kason maitu phiulura jengniu lungchun kason mai khugara kasonmai kum tadle. Khat kamdi, khat kamdi maitu kamlen lura jengniu mai hinatu maningjiu ajai-ali hai lungkhai-e.
Pakhiangna hai thoidam daolura chiujiu, Kawibo champao jengniu I kamkhai mibo-e.
Ka-majuboga mathiu pak kindi, khang khat ronna tathuonse dao-e chiubo naliu simakma? Naliudi tathuonse daolura paklulo.
Chiusai maju bammai hina siniu ngamlura matanjiu paliu pumtu thin manne. Chiudi paliura hamirabo tathuon situ matanbo-e, chiudi aliura tingtheng bamrabo situ matan kinbo-e.
Sijengniu Ira alai khaijiu pak kinbo-e; Ira akhun bammai khat kumjiu akhun pai makjiu bambo-e.
Sikumbo karen gase wangboga maomi makra Iniu apumtu thinman lujiu bambo-e.
Paliu mathiuse Mose sai kasuimai thiujiu kamuang nai duipui ganiu tadui nphum kam lubo-e.
Paliu mathiuse Hiupuina tatek tiu kami gu-e,
khatdi paliu mathiu Hiupuina dui sak kami gu-e. Paliutu majang khaibo Hiupuina gu tudi khat ganiu luong padbo duise sakbo-e, chiusai tudise Khrista papum siak si-e.
Chiudi Tingwang niu paliu kakeng-khatu pachun tamibo jengniu ramjing gase paliutu kam mara khai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu tuhoira paliu kum makra paliuniu aliu masuangga kamlen khai mibo-e.
Maksai paliu khangsiamai kumjiu charamengtu kahumbo mai thiumi tulo. Masanbo ariakga haichiu raokhai bamme, “Paliu ntao lujiu watiu-wasak maniu lujiu npui-npiu thiu sude.”
Paliu khangsiamai npui-npiu thiumibo jengniu, naikhatniu chamai sang-makai-je-sumkiutu kamshat mibo kumjiu, aliura sikumboga mao makjiu bamkhe.
Paliu khangsianiu Rapiu tu madiubo jengniu, kaniuniu paliutu machaosat kamibo kumjiu, aliura Rapiu tu madiu dukhe.
Khangsia mainiu Rapiu tu khanbo gasu Kashaibo maza siniu paliutu kam mahamibo kumjiu aliura khanmi dukhe.
Pakhiangna haise paliutu rukhaibo khat thiujiu pad kamigu-e, sichiujiu kanambo ken-ga wangtang mibo mai aliutu ladti khaira haidungse raokhaibo-e.
Sijengniu chap bamme, chiujiu maning bambo pase kaomidi sui-e, siniu matip sonna lulo.

Naliu khuga wangbo khatdi daobo hinase maidung khugadi wangkam mibo-e. Naliuniu ginlu lakbo siniu naliutu hiamkhai makge. Palamra Tingwang haira malum kabuibo-e khatdi paniu naliuniu ginlulakbogu kahiambose naliu riga paniu khaibi lakge, sichiu makjiu kahiambo kawangbo tingga naliuniu ginlu raleng pumtanse paniu naliutu pikhai bine.
Sijengniu kakungbo akahmaidung yo, naliu charameng kahumbo gasu mari lulo.
Iniu naliutu wa kasimai-e chiujiu din-e, sichiujiu naliu acham maning lujiu naliu ronna naliutu ladjan thiu lulo.

Rapiu Maluadga aliu pon lujiu Tingwang tu thuonjiu sakbo piangse Khrista zai ganiu aliu khat thiu mibo-e. Khatdi Rapiu zan ganiu aliuniu phet njan katiubo taruak khuang ganiu, aliu hai khat thiu mibo-e.
Palamra taruak khuang khatse aliu chamai kengbamdi njan tiubo donniu aliu pumkhat thiumibo-e.
Chiusai Iniu detu dinlen gulo? Rathak mania tiubo maksai charameng kahumbotu pathao-e chiubo ma?
Chiumakge, Iniu din kanibora nkengmainiu chara kathiubora chara kasabodung leng pipadbo-e, Tingwang leng pipadbo makge, siga Iniu naliutu pijiu chara kasabotu majang aruangra achun makge.
Naliuniu Rapiu piang nai chara kasabo piang ponsak aruang dao lakge, naliuniu Rapiu gu kuangkai nai chara kasabogu kuangkai ganiu watiu aruang dao lakge.
Maksai aliuniu Rapiu lungpom kamjiu patu atung rama? Aliu hai pasuang tan-e chiu maning jiuma?
Mai khatniudi paronna paleng phiu makjiu pakiningmai leng kawi phiu lulo.
Senkiga chami kajonbose naliu wadi maniu makjiu tiubo sui-e.
Delosai Masanbo ariakga haichiu raokhai bamme, “Kadih haidi, haibo lungga kabam hinadi Rapiu gu-e.”
Malum kamakmai khatniu natu majang wa tiura kusai, khatdi nang pakhu meng nisai, wadi maning chapengmi makjiu mainiu kapibose tiu lulo.
Chiudi khangsia mainiu nakhuga “Haise charathiubo gu-e,” chiusai, natu din kalenpiu jengniu, sise tiu mane.
