Iniu kadinbora, najeng ganiu makge, kakimai jengniu dinbo-e.
Dekamjiu mai kakimai lungchun siniu atu mao ralo? chiubo khangsia mainiu maniubo sui-e.
Iniu wa khat tiura Tingwang tu thuon bamsai, dekamjiu sibo lamga mainiu atu khammi ralo?
Sijengniu naliu watiudi, wasakdi, naliuniu kambo hinaga Tingwang maken kam madilura kam lulo.
Naliu Jehudi maitudi, Nkengmai tudi maksai Tingwang gu phumling tudi naliu khugasu paliu phi pi masuimi tulo.
Iniu kambo kumjiu naliudi kamlulo, Iniu aleng kagengbo phiuson makjiu mai kakengtu ranlura jengniu, mathiuleng genglu ratu phiukinbo-e.
Chiusai naliuniu wahina gadi atu maningjiu, Iniu dinkhai mibo hina majai kakin jengniu naliutu thuon-e.
Chiudi Khrista se npiumai pi-e, khatdi npiumaise npuimai pi-e, chiusai Tingwang se Khrista pi-e, chiubo naliutu pisikhai ni-e.
Npiumai niu papee takum lujiu kakheng thiubo maksai, dinronbo hai paniu Khrista tu chakhuang thiu makbo-e.
Sichiujiu npuimainiu papee takum makjiu kakheng thiubo, maksai dinronbo hai pakinatu chakhuang thiu makbo-e, sichiu kamsai papee gotmibo panai katam ha-e.
Npuimai khatniu papee takum maksai, patham kakip miboniu wi-e. Sichiujiu npuimai khatniu patham kakip mibo, maksai papee gotmibo jengniu mangam rabo jengniu papee takumboniu wi-e.
Npiumai khugara Tingwang lunlung nai kendibo madubo jengniu papee takumra pageng ha-e. Chiudi npuimaira npiumai kendi madubo-e,
palamra npiumaitu npuimai khugasu dampad makge, chiudi npiumai khugasu npuimaitu dambo-e.
Sironna makjiu npuimai jengniu npiumaitu dambo makge, chiudi npiumai jengniu npuimaitu dambo-e.
mazadung jengniudi npuimai khatniu pakina hangga bambo lenjiu papee takum rabo-e.
Chiudi Rapiu khugara panaodi pakinadi wa tamson makge.
Palamra npiumai jengniu npuimaitu dambo kumjiu, npiumaitu npuimai khugasu manabo-e, siniu npuimai khugasu padbo-e, sijengniu wahinase Tingwang khuganiu-e.
Naliudi maning khailo, npuimai khatniu papee takum makjiu Tingwang khuga kakheng thiubose pakaji ma?
Chara gandam gasudi npiumai khatniu patham majoksai kamangambo gu-e.
Chiudi npuimai khatniu papee tham phungsai ngao kawibo khatle, delosai papeetham kathengbose papee takumra jengniu-e.
Chiudi khangsia mainiu, haibo lamga arinisai sikumbo jai lamga aliuniu maksai Tingwang gu phumling ga tajai khaisonbo makge.
Iniu naliu khuga dinkhai mibo sira, naliuniu kahumra wang maduibo tingga naliuniu kawibo suang kasa kambo jengniu naliutu thuon makge.
Raiboga, naliu wang maduibo situ khangsia mainiu suimakge chiujiu akhuga paowang-e, sise kachangra kumme.
(Naliu ruangga chuncham kamakbose bamrabo-e. Naliu ruangga chuncham kamakbose padrabo-e palamra majibo kabam maitu situ pijiu ngaotam padrabo jengniu-e).
Naliuniu wang maduilujiu tiurabo maluadse Rapiu gu chawan maluad makge.
Delosai naliuniu sise katiubo tingga khat-khattu khuan makge, paron-ronna pawon giu tiumi-e, sichiujiu, khangsiamai won mariu, khangsiamai maniu mi-e.

Naliuniu watiu wasakra naliu ky habo jengniu sichiu kamjiu ma? Maksai naliuniu Tingwang gu phumlingtu wajeng chakmakjiu kahamai tudi kam mangam guma? Haibo lamga Iniu naliu khuga degu dinralo? Naliutu Iniu thuon rama? Haibo lamga naliutu I thuon silakge.
Palamra Iniu Rapiu khuganiu daolubo chamse naliu khuga dinkhai mibo-e, sisera Rapiu Jesu tu jonmibo nai nchun paniu taruak khuang thinlujiu,
sise phedpang lujiu, Tingwang tu thuonkiujiu din-e, “Haise naliu jengniu pikhaibo atia si-e, haise tiulo. Naliuniu atu maningtao bamra jengniu haibo thakse kamlo”

Wa tiulubo sai, sikum gapjiu, Rapiu niu chapiangse ponlujiu din-e, “Haibo piang haise chamtanniu madan diangkhai mibo Tingwang gu chamriat kasanbo si-e. Naliuniu haise sak machang atu maningtao taolo.”
Delosai naliuniu taruak khuang hai tiu machang khatdi chapiang hai sak machang Rapiu malanwang mak then paniu kashaibo racham dinronjiu bamrabo-e.
Sijengniu mai khat kumboniu buimakbo aliga taruak haise tiu, maksai chapiang haise saksai, Rapiu pumga khatdi pajaiga mao mide.
Sijengniu mai khatniu paronna pa-ali maning siak lujiu taruak haise tiulo khatdi chapiang haise saklo.
Palamra mai khat kumboniu Rapiu pum racham hai maning nsi makjiu sise tiu, khatdi saksai paronna pariga ladjan wangra tiukhai sak khai bambo-e.
Haijengniu naliu ruangga khangsianiu paliu jengsa, khangsianiu mara, khatdi khangsiamai shai mibo-e.
Aliuniu, aliu ronna maning sonna lusai, Tingwang gu ladjan hangga aliu wang lakge.
Chiudi Rapiu niu aliutu ladjan thiujiu sajai pikhai mibo-e, sichiujiu haibo kadihpiri nai aliutu ladjan thiu macham mak raleng-e.
Sijengniu singna maidung yo, naliuniu Rapiu gu chawan maluad tiura wang maduibo tingga khat-khattu khuan lulo.
Naliuniu wang maduibo haitu Tingwang niu ladjan thiu makra mai khatniu mariusai, paky gasu watiu lulo. Chiusai kakibo lam gara I wangbo sainiu din masanra mide.
Chiusai singna maidung naliuniu raokhaibo, Masanbo Hiupuina kalen lamga Iniu naliutu pisikhai nibo-e.
Naliuniu nda nkengmai thiujiu lungkinbo tingga, pasiu kahabo charameng tu kahumboga katam tambo npuiga jukhai mibo-e chiubo naliu sibamme.

Iniu naliutu pisikhai nibo sira, Tingwang Hiupuina niu maluang kinmai siniu, “Jesu riga tasiang wangmilo!” Chiu dinlakge, khatdi Masanbo Hiupuina niu maluang khai maksai, “Jesu hai Rapiu-e,” chiu din madupad lakge.
Chiusai tatiendi katam tambo bamme, chiudi Rapiu ra khatle.
Chiusai tatien kathiubo siamdi katam tambo bamme, chiudi sibodung kamsi lura wahina damkhaibose Tingwang-e.
Mai hina leng kagengbo kamlu rajengniu Hiupuina siniu mai hina riga pumtan len khai-e.
Sichiujiu Hiupuina siniu khangsia maitu tasiam kawibo pikhai-e khatdi sibo Hiupuina siniu khangsia maitu ningting cham dinra pikhai-e.
Sibo Hiupuina siniu khangsiatu malumbo, khangsia maitu wikhaibo pumtan pikhai-e.

Khangsiatu tasibo kamlura pumtan pikhai-e khatdi khangsiatu phaimiukakung cham dinlura pikhai-e, khatdi khangsiatu Hiupuina dungtu sitamlu kabuibo pikhai-e, khatdi khangsiatu chalad din chalilu kabuibo ningting pikhai-e.
Chiudi Hiupuina khat siniu katam tambo kalendung mai hina khuga pikhai-e, pakhiangna hai Hiupuina siniu jukhaibo-e.

Sichiujiu aliu mathiu hai Jehudi maidi, Nkengmai tadi, kavangmai tadi, khenrang thiumai tadi, Hiupuina khatniu pum khatga aliutu tadui nphum khai mibo-e, khatdi aliu mathiutu Hiupuina khatga pisak khai mibo-e.
Palamra apum mania hai khat ronna makge chiudi keng-e.
Changen Ira, chaben makbo donniu Ira chapumgu mania makge chiusai, sise chapumgu makge chiubo sui makge.
Khatdi chaqonniu Ira chamik makbo donniu Ira, chapum gu makge chiusai, siseniu chapumgu makge chiubo sui makge.
Apum mania hina chamik kam misai, chiuraleng dega bamlo? Pakhiangna chiuraleng maliang misai, parim manamra dega bamlo?
Chiudi tuhoira Tingwang niu pachunning saisuijiu chapumgu mania situ pikhai bide.
Khatdi pakhiangnase mania ronna thiusai, chapumra dega bamlo?
Sichiujiu maniara keng-e. chiudi chapumra khatle.
Sichiu makjiu chamikniu nangra aleng kagengbo ha-e chiujiu chaben khuga din ngam lakge; maksai apee niu nangra aleng wadi kagengbo ha-e chiujiu changen khuga din ngam makge.
Sichiu makge, chapumgu kasonbo mania jaomakjiu aliuniu wadi kamlulakge;
Khatdi pageng ha-e chiubo maniase pageng bamdiang rabo-e; sichiujiu palun wimakbo maniadung situ, aliuniu kakungbo mania thiujiu thin-e.
Aliugu kawibo maniadungse pageng ha-e. Chiudi chakhuang thiura habo maniadung situ Tingwang niu chakhuang thiu khai raleng kam aruang khai bi-e.
Palamra chapumse njan pad makjiu, mania khatniu mania khattu kunglu raleng-e.
Chapum mania khatniu magenthiu sai mania hina magenthiu kambo-e; khatdi mania khattu chakhuang thiusai mania hina pachunwi-e.
Naliura Khrista pumgu mania kamme.

Sichiujiu Tingwang niu phumling lungga maidung khangsiatu ladlangtadmai, khangsiatu phaimiukakungmai, khangsiatu katipaodung pithiu khai-e; khangsiatu tasibo ngam kamra pikhai-e; khangsiatu thiuniu maitu wikhaibo pumtan, khangsiatu nkha khaibo ngam, khangsiatu jukhaibo ngam, khangsiatu chalad katam tambo din ngamra pikhai-e.
Mathiuse ladlangtadmai ma? Mathiuse phaimiukakungmai ma? Mathiuse katipaodung ma? Mathiuse tasibo ngam kambo maidung kamma?
Mathiuse wikhaibo kalen daoma? Mathiuse tam-tambo lad dinma? Mathiuse chalad chalipad ma?
Chiudi nkiubo kalentu machun lulo.
Sichiusai nkiubo npui khatse Iniu naliu khuga lenkhai bine.
Iniu chamaina lad khatdi mazadung lad hina dinsi bamdi, lungsabo hasai, kakhing bambo siamtoy kumbo-e.
Iniu tacham dinsibogu kalen daojiu bamdi, kakung-kungbo lad khatdi tasi hina sijiu bamdi, Iniu maluongdungtu kam kali lurabo malum bamdi, akhuga lungsabo hasai, Ira wadi makge.
Iniu agu kabambo hina pipadjiu khatdi apum chami rura pipad bamdi, lungsabo akhuga hasai, aleng kagengbo wadi ha-e.
Lungsaboniu khengkhai bi-e khatdi nkhakhai bi-e; lungsabo niu manma makge; magi makge, chaliang makge;
lungsaboniu nkhai-ali sa makge, aleng phiu makge, pom makge; lungsaboniu kasabotu maning tingtheng makge;
lungsaboniu kasaboga chunwi makge, chiudi majiboga chunwi-e.
Lungsaboniu wadaodi phutkhai makge, sichiujiu malumboga, machunboga, khatdi khengsiboga wadaodi phutkhai makge.
Lungsabora tingtheng-e. Kawicham dinsimai bamme, chiudi malod khat ronna-e; katam-tambo lad dinbo kalen bamme, chiudi hami rabo-e; tasidi bamme chiudi hami rabo-e.
Palamra aliugu tasi nai kawicham dinsibogu kalen haira pakak khat leng ronna-e;
chiudi tingthuibose wangboga, tingthui makbose hami rabo-e.
Iniu nahtingga alad din-ga, alung chun-ga, khatdi amaningga nahmai khat kum kamkhai mibo-e, tuhoira I chamai khat thiu mibo jengniu, nahmai thakse kamta mide.

Tuhoi aliuniu ngaobambo haira chahiubung gasu ameng kaphuibo kumbo-e; sichiujiu nai khatra aliu zu-ngao siakrabo-e. Tuhoi Iniu sibo haira siphu makge; sichiujiu nai khatra Tingwang niu atu sitathuibo kumjiu Idi sitathuimi rabo-e.
Sichiujiu malumbo, agunbo khatdi lungsabo sum haise bamme; chiudi haidung ruang gasu lungsabo siniu dithu-e.
Sichiusai naliuniu lungsabo haitu matan rabo-e. Hiupuina gu kalendung nkiujiu Tingwang cham paoronbo kalen situ naliu lungchun ngutjiu matan lulo.
Delosai chalad katam tambo din bambose chamai khuga makjiu Tingwang khuga din kakin gu-e, sichiujiu palad situ maidi silu makge, sise Hiupuina gasu kakungbo lad din kabam gu-e.
Sichiujiu Tingwang cham mai khuga dinbam maise, maitu nkhajiu, khatdi kachu khaijiu maichun kam n-nga lura jengniu din kinbo-e.
Palad tamjiu wadin kinmaise paronna leng-e, chiudi Tingwang cham mai khuga din kinmaise phumlingtu kam mawi khaibo-e.

Naliu mathiutu pijiu palad tam-tamjiu wa dinbodi achunne, chiudi Tingwang cham mai khuga dinbose achun widiang-e, chiusai palad tam-tamjiu wa dinmai siniu phumlingtu nkhalura jengniu parambase maitu dinlen maksai, sisuang Tingwang cham dinbo siniu widiang-e.

Sijengniu singna maidung yo, Iniu naliu khuga wangbo tingga Iniu katambo lad dinsai degu pageng bamlo? Tingwang khugasu madukhaibo, maksai ningting cham, maksai kathuat khaibo cham, maksai kati khaibo cham phungwang maksai degu pageng bam ralo.
Pakhuan ronna padbo chiudi pasiu kahabo, nthiam, tarabung haitu phuilo—haise mathenbo tingga tamsinjiu pakhuan kampad maksai dechiujiu sitamlu ralo?
Sikumjiu make khuandi masanjiu mut masansiak khaibi maksai, saoniu chari thiura kaden silu ralo?
Sikumjiu naliudi mai khuga katambo lad dinbose masan maksai, dechiujiu mainiu siluralo? Naliu ladkengse tingkaiga hami rabo-e!
Kadihpiri katam-tambo lad kengjiu bamme, chiudi sise paramba kahabo thiu makge.
Chiusai mainiu chalad kadinbose Iniu simaksai, akhuga chalad kadinbo maidi simakge, ania khangniase sangmai kamme.
Sichiujiu naliuniu Hiupuina gu kalen situ phiukin siaksai, nkiujiu phumlingtu nkha lura kamlulo.
Sijengniu chalad katam tambo kadinmaitu parambadi din masan lura jengniu kheng lulo.
Delosai I chalad katam tamboniu kakheng thiusai, hiupuina ga kakheng thiubam gu-e, chiudi alung lamra I wadi simakge.
Chiusai I nde kamralo? Iniu ahiupuinatu maluang kakheng thiune, khatdi alung ganiudi kathuonbo lui thiune.

Maksai nangniu hiupuina ronna thinjiu khengsai, kakimai siniu sitanglu lakge, chiusai nangniu Tingwang tu kathuonboga dechiujiu “Amen” din daolu ralo? Palamra nangniu kadinbo rambase paniu silu makge.
Nangniu thuon mawijiu bamdi, kakimai lengra wadi makge.
I naliu mathiu suangdi nkiujiu katam tambo lad din-e, sijengniu Tingwang tu thuon bamme.
Chiudi phumling ga Iniu chalad katam tam gasu chalad sang kariu dinbo suang, silu buibo ladkeng mangiu ronna kadinbose achunne.
Singnamai yo, wa kasabo lamga nahmai kum lulo; chiudi wa makumbo lam gara katingmai kum lulo.
Masanbo ariakga haichiujiu raokhai bamme,
“Katam-tambo lad dinmaitu thin lujiu,
Iniu amaidung khuga din-e, chiujiu Rapiu niu din-e.
Iniu sangdiumai lad ganiu din rabo-e,
chiudi amaidungniu alad nking khai lakge.”
Siniu katam tambo lad dinbo haira malummai jengniu makge, chiudi malum kamakmai jengniu-e, sikumjiu Tingwang cham dinbora malum kamakmai jengniu makge, chiudi malummai jengniu-e.
Chiusai phumling mai mathiu wang maduibo tingga naliu chalad tam rit-ritjiu wa din karen misai, maidiumai maksai malum kamakmai naliu ruangga wangsai, naliu hai kaluang mide chiumak rama?
Chiudi mai hinaniu Tingwang cham dinjiu bamboga, malummak mai maksai maidiumai khat siga wangsai, paniu chiulubo jengniu, pamao pameng lamga paniu maning lujiu patu ladjan thiulu bui-e.
Sichiujiu paniu palung lepad lujiu Tingwang tu thuonjiu, “Naliu ruangga Tingwang bamsiakge chiu dinlu bui-e.” chiujiu din madupad lubui-e.

Chiusai singna maidung, dechiusai pathao siak ralo? Naliu wang maduibo lon khangsiamai chalui thiu, khangsiamai maitu laddin, khangsiamai madu khaibo cham din, khangsiamai chalad katam gasu wadin, sichiujiu sibo rambase khangsianiu din chali pad lura kamlo. Pakhiangnase phumlingtu nkhara kam lulo.
Khangsiamai chalad katam ganiu dinra bamsai kengthuboga malod khatga khangnia khangsum ronna pachali-li thiujiu dinlo, sichiudi parambadi khangsianiu dinsiak rabo-e.
Chiudi paramba dinramai hasai chalad katam-tambo dinmaise maliuna bam milo, sichiujiu mai khat situ pi paronna Tingwang tu npao bam milo.
Khatdi Tingwang cham dinra khangnia, khangsumtu pijiu dinlulo; sichiujiu kakimai situ pijiu paramba maning lulo.
Chiudi ntao kabam mai khatniu Tingwang khuganiu madukhaibo cham daolusai; tacham din karaibo piutu pisao khai milo.
Palamra naliu mathiuniu Tingwang cham dinjiu, khat-khat thiujiu dinboga mai hina silura khatdi kachukhai lura jengniu-e.
Tingwang cham dinbo kalen hai, chalad kadinbo piuniu thinman bambo-e.
Delosai Tingwang niu katanuakbo tu luni makge, chiudi chunchambo nai agi-manaibo situ masenbo-e.
Tingwang gu phumling hinaga, maipui hina maliumak bamlulo. Paliutu chalad dinra suikhai makge, Jehudi maigu Tajaiga dinbo kumjiu, paliuniu papao thiumak rabo-e.
Paliuniu palam khat sini sai paliu ky ganiu paliu kina khugasu maniu lulo, palamra charakyga npuimainiu chalad kadinbo hai ka-mangambo gu-e.
Maksai Tingwang cham hai naliu khugasu padjiu ma? Maksai naliu khuga ronna kawangbo guma?
Naliu ruangga mai khat kumboniu paronna patu phaimiukakung mai-e, maksai Hiupuina mai-e chiu lukhai sai, Iniu raokhaibo hai Rapiu gu chamtan-e chiubo silulo.
Chiudi mai khat kumboniu suini maksai, patudi suimak milo.
Sijengniu singna maidung yo, naliuniu Tingwang cham dinlura matan lulo; chiudi chalad katam tambo dinbo tudi khammi tulo.
Wahina hai wijiu khatdi pathiak thiujiu kam mawi lulo.
Tuhoira singna maidung yo, Iniu naliu khuga dinron khai mibo Kawibo champao, naliuniu lukhai lubo khatdi naliuniu chap matip bambo lamga naliutu pijiu maningtao khaini-e.
Iniu naliu khuga dinron khai mibo Kawibo champaose naliuniu thin matip bamlusai, siseniu naliutu juringlu rabo-e.
chiujiu patu nphum khai mide, chiudi Masanbo ariakga dinkhai mibo kumjiu, jeng sumbo nai pah ringsulan mide.
Sibosai paniu Peter khuga lenkhai-e, sibosai khommai khang kariu-je-niakiu khugadi lenkhaide.
Sibosai paniu maluad khat chamai kai mangiu suang kengmai khuga lenkhaide, paliu khangsia shai midi, khangsiara ringbam kha-e.
Sibosai paniu Jacob khuga, khatdi khommaidung mathiu khuga lenkhai-e.
I hai ladlangtadmai ruangga siamthubo-e, atura ladlangtadmai-e chiudi kubui makge, palamra Iniu Tingwang gu phumlingtu kam mathad khai mibo-e.

Chiudi Tingwang gu lungsiat gasu, tuhoi agu lunlung haise thiulujiu pagu lungsiat hai akhu pikhaibo-e, sise mathakubo thiumi makge; sibosung Iniu paliu mathiu suang masan diangjiu tatien thiu-e, chiudi sise Iniu makge, Tingwang khu gasu wangbo lungsiat siniu atu majang khaibo jengniu-e.
Chiusai naliuniu malum bambo haise, aliuniu dinron khai mibose akhuga niuma, maksai paliu khuga suniuma?
Sichiujiu aliugu Kawibo champao gase Khrista hai kashaimai rong gasu ringsulan mide, chiujiu dinron kinsai, dekamjiu naliu ruangga khangsia mainiu kashaimai ringsulan lakge chiu din gulo?
Sise pachangjiu kashaimai ringsulanbo ha-e sai, Khrista di ringsulan makbo-e,
sichiujiu Khrista ringsu lanmakge sai, aliu niu dinron kinbo hai mathaku-e, khatdi naliu malumdi mathaku-e.

Sironna makjiu, aliuniu Tingwang lamga arat mibo-e, palamra kashaibo gasu Khrista ringsulan mide chiujiu aliuniu dinron mibo-e, chiudi kashai maise ringsulan maksai, Khrista tu pijiu ringsulan khai makbo-e.
Palamra kashaimai ringsulanbo ha-e sai, Khrista di ringsulan mak rabo-e.
Sichiujiu Khrista ringsulan makge sai, naliu malumdi mathaku mibo-e, sichiujiu tuhoidi naliu nuan-ga bamkha-e.
Sichiusai Khrista tu malumjiu shaimi maidi matha nchum mibo-e.
Aliuniu Khrista khuga agun bambose tuhoi kalungbo tingga leng ronna-e sai, aliu hai kakimai suang pageng habo mai thiu mide.
Chiudi kashaibo gasu Khrista ringsulan mibo donniu, shai mimai hinadi ringsulan rabo-e.
Palamra mai khangkhat jengniu kashaibo wangmibo kumjiu, mai khangkhat jengniu kashaimai ringsulanbo haidi wangbo-e.
Delosai Adam jengniu chamai hina khuga kashaibo wangbo kumjiu, Khrista jengniu chamai hina khuga ringsulanbo hai wangbo-e.
Chiudi wahina pathak saisuijiu tadrabo-e, chiubora Khrista hai raithubo thiu rabo-e, sibosai Khrista wangbo Nai pasai sui maidung si-e.
Sichiujiu kanambose wangrabo-e; Khrista niu hiupuina ga mawangpaodung, khatdi pumtan hinatu ngam lujiu Wangdihse Papiu Tingwang khuga pikhai rabo-e.
Palamra Tingwang niu mikremai hinatu paphi hangga khai makthen Khrista niu mawang rabo-e.
Kanamthuboga ngamrabo mikre sira kashaibo si-e.
Palamra masanbo ariakniu din-e, Tingwang niu wahina Khrista phi hangga pikhai mide. Haiga “wahina,” chiujiu dinbo sira Khrista khuga pikhaibo Tingwang patura jaomakge, chiubo masanjiu si-e.
Chiudi wahinase Khrista gu mawangbo hangga pikhai lubo sai, Nahpiu papumsiakniu pakhuga wahina pikhaibo Tingwang khuga pikhai rabo-e, sichiusai Tingwang niu wahina riga mawang kam siak rabo-e.
Tuhoira, kashaimai lamga tadui nphum kalumai ndechiu ralo? Degutu paliu machunjiu kamkhai kami gulo? Kashaimai ringsulanbo ha-e sai, maidungniu dekamra tadui nphum khai kami gulo?
Aliudi nde kamjiu pawan machang pingjiu bamralo?
Singna maidung yo, Ira naimachang shaina-na kakin gu-e! Aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista khuga aliu khat thiu lubo jengniu, adiu wijiu bambo haise Iniu din madupadbo-e.

Chamaina lunlung kumjiu Iniu Ephesus ga bambo thiuhudung haitu aphensai aleng kagengbo degu bamlo? Chiudi kashai maidung ringsulan maksai, kadinchamga dinbo kumjiu, “Aliuniu tiukhe, sakkhe, palamra nsuannai aliu shaimi rabo-e.”
Naliutu sonmi tulo. “Kasabo kah siniu kawibo nkhai-rilitu kam masa mibo-e.”
Ningting lulo, sichiujiu nuan npui situ phut milo. Naliu khangsiamai Tingwang tu wadi simakbo donniu naliutu kam mangam khaira haise Iniu dinbo-e.
Chiusai khangsia mainiu “Kashaimai dechiujiu ringsulu ralo? Khatdi paliu pumse dechiumi ralo?” chiujiu maniu-e.
Kapangbo nang! Nangniu chalin saokhaibo tingga sise shai makthen puakpad makge.
Sigasu nangniu saokhaibose alinpumse maksai miusyse puakkhangbo makge, puakkhang rabo sira pasiu nakha-e.
Tingwang niu machunbo saisuijiu pasiuse pikhaibo-e khatdi pikhaibo pasiu saisuijiu mawikhang rabo-e.
Tatia hinase ncham makge, chamainagu tatia hai tamme, khaoringgu tamme, thingnagu tamme, khatdi chakhagu tamme.
Tinggen pumdi bamme, kadihpiri pumdi bamme, sichiujiu tinggen gu kawibo nai kadihpirigu kawibose tamme.
Naimik nbiu khat, chahiu nbiu khat, chagandung gu nbiu khat bamme, sichiujiu chagan khatgu nbiuse chagan khatgu nbiu gasu tamme.
Sikumjiu kashai maidungdi ringsubo-e, hami raboga baikhai-e, chiudi halan makraboga ringsu rabo-e.
Palun saboga khatdi kasonboga baikhai-e, chiudi palun kawiboga khatdi katanboga piringsu khailan rabo-e.
Chamaina pumga baikhai-e, chiudi hiupuina pumga piringsu khai lan-e. Sichiujiu chamaina pum bambo kum, hiupuina pumdi bamme.
Palamra Masanbo ariakga haichiu din-e, “Karaibo mai, Adam situ karingbo pumleng damkhai-e,” chiudi kanambo Adam situ karingbo Hiupuina thiujiu damkhai-e.
Hiupuina lunlungse wangraibo makge, chiudi chamai pumgu lunlung wangbo sainiu Hiupuina lunlung wangbo-e.
Karaibo Adam se kadih gasu-e, niabo Adam siniu tinggen lamsuniu-e
Kadihgu thiujiu bammaira taniangniu, damkhaibo mai khat kumbo-e, khatdi tinggen gu thiubo mai siniu tinggen lamsu wangbo mai khat kumbo-e.
Sichiujiu aliuniu taniang gasu damkhaibo lunlung piubo kumjiu, tinggen lamsu kiubo Nahpiu lunlungse thiumi rabo-e.
Singna maidung yo, Iniu haise dinbora, tatia nai tazai kaphungbo pum siniu Tingwang gu chawangdihga ngut silakge, hamirabo siniu hamakra thiudao lakge chiubo-e.

Chiudi kanambo makese mudkhai sai, malod khat, mik-khip kak khat lunggasu, aliu mathiu lunlimi rabo-e. Palamra makese mudkhai sai, kashai maidungtu halan makboga piringsu khaine, khatdi aliutu pijiu lunli khaine.
Palamra halan rabo hainiu halanmak rabo thiumi rabo-e, khatdi shailan rabo hainiu shailan makbo thiumi rabo-e.
Hasuibo haise hasui makboga, khatdi shaisuibo haise shaisui makbo pithiu khaibo tingga, haichiu raokhai mibo chamse wangrabo-e:
“Kashaibo situ kam maha mide, charise ngam masansiak mide!”
Oh kashaibo nagu mathadse dega bamlo?”
Kashaibo gu mathad sira nuan-e, khatdi nuan-gu pumtan sira tacheng-tajai si-e.
Chiudi aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista pen gasu aliuleng kangambose pikhaibo Tingwang patu thuonlo!

Sijengniu, Iniu kungbo singna maidung yo, mathing sijiu chap matip bamlo. Naliuniu Rapiu tien thiu bambose wadaodi mathami lakge chiubo sibambo donniu, pawan machang Rapiu tien thiuboga maranjiu kamlulo.
Iniu wangbo tingga, ramkhase kha makra, naliuniu daolubo saisuijiu Tabamnaise khoiwang makhuan milo.
Sichiujiu I wang dasai, malum suibo naliuniu kadakhai maitu langkhaijiu naliugu nkhase Jerusalem ga phungmengra pisikhaibo khatdi suikhaibo ariak Iniu raokhai bine.
Idi tadra pageng bamsai, paliu saisui lujiu tadbo sui-e.
Sichiujiu pakak khatra, daodiusai tathe ting katheng-kadun naliu khuga I bamkhaibo sui-e, sichiusai Iniu tadlanbo tabin-ga, naliuniu atu nkha khaibo sui-e.
Iniu malod khat ronna makjiu, Rapiu niu suikhai sai pating kathengkha naliutu maluang bamkhai nibo-e.
Siga suinimak maidung kengjiu bamdi changam kadibo khatdi kagengbo kamlurabo pajat kawi bamme.
Naliu mai khat niudi patu maning malami tulo, pijiu palung agi-manaijiu akhu malan wang lura nkha khailo, delosai paniu singna maidungtu majang wangra I khuan bambo-e.
Aliu singna Apollo tura, Iniu patu kachu khaijiu aliu singnamai naliutu wang phuikhaira langbambo-e, chiudi tuhoi siakra pah wangni makge; chiudi pating kawibo daoluboga padi wangsune.
Akhesilo, malum matip bamlo, hujiu bamlo, khatdi matipjiu bamlo.
Naliuniu kakambo hinaga lungsajiu kamlo.
Haikumbo maidung khatdi paliutu maluang tatien thiu bammaidung hina saisui lura Iniu naliu khu khengkhai-e.
Stephanas, Fortunatus khatdi Achaicus paliuniu, naliu malin thiujiu akhuga wangbo jengniu I achun wi-e.
Paliuniu naliu chun piwi khaibo kumjiu, achundi piwi khai-e. Paliutu thuonbui-e.
Haiga bammai singna maidung mathiuniu kanui khai-e.
Masanbo biangpup siniu khatniu khattu kanui khailo.
Haibo kanui chamse Paul I abensiakniu raokhaibo-e.
Mai khatniu Rapiu tu lungsa maksai, pariga tasiang wangmi sulo.
Maranatha! Aliu Rapiu wang kinne!
Rapiu Jesu gu lungsiat siniu naliutu maluang khaibo thiu milo.
Jesu Khrista ga agu lungsabo hainiu naliu mathiutu maluang khaibo thiu milo.
Aliu Piu Tingwang nai Rapiu Jesu Khrista gasu lungsiat nai agi-manaibo naliu khuga bammi sulo.
Nkha hina wangbo, aliu Rawang khatdi aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista Piu Tingwang tu thuonkhe!
Aliugu chariu magenthiubo hinaga paniu aliutu nkha khai-e, sichiujiu Tingwang khugasu aliuniu daolubo nkha thinlujiu maitu nkha lubui-e.
Khrista gu magenthiu chariubose aliuniu padam daobo kum, aliudi Khrista ganiu Tingwang gu nkha dijiu daolu-e.

Sichiujiu aliuniu magenthiu chariubo daosai, naliutu pi aman khai raleng khatdi juringlu raleng-e, sichiujiu aliutu nkha khaisai, naliu tudi nkha khaibo-e, sichiujiu naliugu khengsiboga pi aman khai raleng kamlen khaibo-e.
Sijengniu aliugu magenthiu chariuboga, naliudi khengkhai macham bambo jengniu, aliu chunwibo kumjiu naliudi wibamra, sibambo jengniu aliugu ramgunbose wadaodi limi makge.
Shai siakmi suma chiu maning khai mibo jengniu, aliu ronna aliutu malum makjiu, kashai maitu kam maringlubo Tingwang khuga ronna mangiu khai kami gu-e.
Asuang kahabo shit shairabo gasu paniu aliutu gukhai bide, sijengniu haichiu gukhaijiu bamra malum siak bamme.
Naliuniu kakhengbo ganiu aliutu nkha khai-e, sichiujiu maidung kakengniu aliuleng khengjiu bambose paokak khaijiu, Tingwang niu thoikhai bine, siga maidung kakengniu Tingwang tu thuon rabo-e.
Aliu chamainagu lungchun maning saisui makjiu Tingwang niu pikhaibo masan siakbo khatdi nsi-siakbo Tingwang gu lungsiat jengniu aliu chun wijiu bamme.
Aliuniu naliu khuga raokhaibo hai naliuniu kenlujiu silu raleng ronna-e.
Tuhoidi naliuniu aliu raha kasia sibam tadi,aliu Rapiu Jesu gu Tingmik ga sira sitathui lujiu, aliuniu naliu lamga aliu chun wibo kumjiu naliudi aliu jengniu naliu chun wirabo-e chiubo I maning-e.
Naliuniu san wibose thiulon nia lura maning lujiu, naliu khuga wangkhaira rangkhai mibo-e.
Palamra Iniu Mecedonia lam tadbo tinggadi, wanglanbo tinggadi naliu khuga wangkhaijiu, Iniu Judaea lam tadrabo tabinleng, naliu khugasu wa nkha daolu suma chiujiu rangkhaibo-e.
Iniu rangbose alungchun kasut rut-rutbo leng ngaopad jiuma? Iniu sichiu rangbo sira aleng gengrabo jengniu, “Yo, yo,” maksai “Makge, makge,” chiu dinraleng ronna ma?
Paling siakjiu Tingwang niu majibose dinbo jengniu, naliu khuga Iniu ladriat khaibo lamga, ‘Yo’ maksai “Makge” chiurabo makge.

Palamra naliu khuga Silas nai Timothy khatdi I apum siakniu Tingwang Nahpiu Jesu Khrista lamga dinron khai mibose, ‘Yo’ khatdi ‘Makge’ chiubo lamga makge. Sichiu makjiu, pasira Tingwang gu ‘Yo’ chiubo si-e.
Palamra Tingwang gu ladriat hinaga pahaira Tingwang gu ‘Yo’ chiubo si-e. Haijengniu Tingwang maken dilura Jesu Khrista pen gasu aliugu “Amen” si-e chiujiu dinbo-e.
Sichiujiu Khrista pen gasu Tingwang niu aliutu khat pithiu khaibo-e, khatdi Tingwang papum siakniu aliutu kupad khaibo-e.
Sichiujiu aliu hai pagu-e chiubo silura Masanbo Hiupuina siniu aliu lungga pagu madan diangkhai mibo-e, khatdi haise pachangsiak aliuleng pikhai mibo-e.
Iniu naliutu lungsabo jengniu haibo men-ga naliu Corinth ga wangkhai nimakbo-e, chiubo Tingwang niu agu jengdin thiubo-e.
Naliugu malumbo gahai aliuniu papao thiu nibogu makge, chiudi naliu chun wisan lura jengniu naliutu nkhajiu bambo-e. Palamra naliu hai malumboga chap matip bambo jengniu-e.
Sijengniu I wangjiu naliu chun kam masa khai lakge chiu maning mibo-e.
Iniu naliu chun kam masa khai sai, saoniu achun kam mawi khai ralo? Iniu paliu chun kam masa khaimai siniu, kam mawi khai rabo-e.
Iniu naliu chun kam masa khai raobo jengniu, naliu khuga wang makjiu raokhai rai mibo-e. Palamra Iniu achun wisai, naliudi naliu chun wibamme chiubo I malum siak-e.

Iniu alung magenthiu chariujiu amatui padbo siniu phuilujiu naliu khuga raokhai mibo-e, sise naliu lungchun kam chariu khaibo makge, chiudi agu lungsabo hai naliu khuga nkiu-nkenjiu bambose naliuniu silu raleng-e.
Mai khatniu mai khattu pachun kam masa khaisai, atu ronna makge, chiudi naliu mathiutu pijiu chunsa khaibo-e. (Iniu patu ru masajiu rukhai mibose wiju mide).
Sichiujiu naliu mathiuniu patu kam chariu khai mibose wiju mide.
Sijengniu tuhoira kuak khai mibo jengniu, patudi kachukhai bilo; sichiujiu patu pijiu chunsaju mitulo.
Sichiujiu naliuniu patu lungsa siak bamme chiubo patu pisikhaira naliu khuga khengbo-e.
Iniu naliu khuga raokhai mibose naliuniu wahina majai mawi bamme chiubose madiujiu silura leng-e.
Mai khatniu wakam mao mibo jengniu naliu pamao kuak khai-e sai, Idi pamao kuak khai mibo-e, khatdi Iniu mai mao kuak khaibose naliu jengniu Khrista masuang gadi kuak khai mibo-e.
Palamra Satan gu maningse aliuniu sibambo donniu-e.
Chiudi siga aliu singna Titus tu ngaolu makbo jengniu alung chariusui mide, sijengniu paliutu phutkhai lujiu Macedonia lam I tad mide.
Chiudi Tingwang tu thuonlo! Palamra pawan machangna Khrista pen ganiu aliutu kangamboga jukhaijiu, pabam hinaga parim wibo khat kumjiu Tingwang niu aliutu thinpiu khaide.
Palamra ranlumai khugadi, hamira mai khugadi, Tingwang khuga Khrista niu kadkhai mibo parim kawibose aliu-e.
Hami ramai khugara tenmibo parai manam kasabo si-e, chiudi ranlumai khugara karingbo phungwangbo parim kawibo si-e.
Aliura maidungniu kambo kumjiu Tingwang cham situ kam mala makge, chiudi Tingwang niu langkhaibo saisuijiu aliu pasuangga Khrista vangmai kumjiu alungchun nsi-siakjiu dinbo-e.
Tuhoi aliu ronna aliutu maning chagengmi jiuma? Sichiujiu khangsia mainiu paliutu suikhaibo chamlen raokhaibo kumjiu, aliuniu naliu khuga maksai naliuniu aliu khuga raokhai rama?
Chamai hinatu pisikhaira khatdi pijiu kentao khaira aliu lungga raokhai nbambo ariak sira naliu-e.

Ariak haise Khrista niu raokhai-e, sichiujiu aliutu naliu khuga langkhaibo-e. Haise charaodui siniu tukang riga raokhaibo makjiu, ringbambo Tingwang gu Hiupuina siniu chamaina malungga raokhai mibo-e.
Aliuniu haise dinbora, Khrista pen gasu Tingwang tu aliu malum lubo-e chiubo lenkhaibo-e.
Chiudi aliu ronna wakhatdi kamlu lubo ha-e, aliuniu wa kamlu rabo sira Tingwang khu ganiu-e.

Kasanbo Chamriat situ macha kabuimai thiura, paniu aliutu suikhaibo-e. Sise charao lun ganiu makjiu Hiupuina ganiu-e, palamra raokhaibo Tacheng-tajai siniu kashaibo phungwangbo-e, chiudi Hiupuina siniu karingbose pikhai-e.
Hiupuina gu tienkamga phungwang rabo kendi sira dejiukha diralo?
Ladjan thiubo lunlung siniudi kendibose phungwang sai, juringbo phungwang rabo tienkam siniu dejiukha kendibo phungwang ralo?
Tuhoigu kendibo siniu nkiudiang mibo donniu, karaibogu kendise hamide.
Palamra pawan khatleng ronna kendibose bamsai, tingtheng bamrabo leng sira dejiukha kendi nkiu ralo?
Aliu khuga haikumbo agun kabam jengniu aliu hubo-e.
Aliura nda Israel mainiu hamirabo situ phuiboga kabenbo nbiu situ ngao makra Mose niu zusungfai tombose kum makge.
Paliu lung tanju kami jengniu nthaidi kaguangbo chamriat kenbo tingga, zusungfaise tombam kha-e, chiudi Khrista khuga bambo maidungra sibo zusungfaise luthon mide.
Paliura nthai tangbo Mose gu Tacheng-tajai kenbo tingga paliuniu zusungfaise khai bamme.
Chiudi Mose lamga Masanbo ariakniu haichiu din-e: “Mai khatniu Rapiu khulam mariwang sai, paniu zusungfaise lekhai bine.”
Tuhoira “Rapiu khulam” chiubo gase Hiupuina khulam chiubo-e, siniu Rapiu gu Hiupuina kabambo gase khen-rang thiu mibo-e.
Zusungfai tommakjiu Rapiu gu kendise aliuniu ngaobo kumjiu, Rapiu khugasu wangbo, Hiupuina kendi gase aliutu palun kum gapjiu khatdi sisuang dibo kendi gase lunli khaibi rabo-e.
Tingwang lungsiat gasu changam haise kamra aliutu pikhaibo jengniu aliu nkhinmi makge.

Aliuniu mahinbo khatdi mangambo ngam hina phutlujiu, aliuniu maitu sonmi makge, khatdi Tingwang gu ladkeng situ kam aratkhai makge, sichiujiu Tingwang masuangga aliu lungjiu, mai hina khuga pisikhaira kam kinbo-e.
Aliugu kawichamse nbai kin-e sai, hamira mai khuga ronna nbai kinbo gu-e.

Paliuniu malum makge, palamra paliu lungchunse haibo kadihpirigu kasabo ra siniu kam tamiu mide. Tingwang gu kendibo Khrista gu Kawicham chiubora Tingwang lunlung siakgu kabenbo situ ngao makra paliu mikse kamtiat khai mibo-e.
Palamra aliuniu aliuleng dinronbo makge, chiudi Jesu Khrista hai Rapiu si-e, aliura Jesu jengniu naliu vang-e chiujiu dinronbo-e.
“Kabenbo siniu tamiuboga thaoben khaine,” chiujiu dinkhaibose Tingwang niu-e, sichiujiu Khrista zu ganiu Tingwang gu kendibo tasise aliuleng pikhaira, Tingwang paniu aliu lungchun thaoben khai-e.
Lunlibo pumtanse aliu khugasu makjiu Tingwang khuganiu-e, chiubo hai pisikhaira jengniu aliu hai Hiupuinagu chakhiu-chalan taniangly lungga kabambo kumbo-e.
Pawan kakengkha aliutu kam chariu khai-e, chiudi aliutu kam kaomi makge, pakak kakga aliu lung kampu suikhai, chiudi aliuniu agunbo hami makge.
Aliu mikremai keng bamme, chiudi aliu kamai hami makge, aliutu kam masasui khai-e, chiudi kam mahalu makge.
Jesu niu ringbambose aliu khuga madu khaira, Jesu gu shaibose aliuniu pawan machang phungkinbo-e.
Palamra shaimi rabo aliu pum gahai ringbambo Jesu haitu pisikhai nibo jengniu, aliu ringting pakhiangna Jesu jengniu pawan machang kashaiboga pikhai-e.
Sichiujiu kashaibo siniu aliu khuga tatien thiu kindi, naliu khugara karingbo siniu tatien thiu bamme.
Jesu tu piringsu khai lanbo Tingwang niu aliutudi, Jesu tu kumjiu piringsu khaine, sichiujiu naliutu khatdi aliutu pakhuga majang aruang khai rabo-e.
Pakhiangna haise naliu jengniu-e, khatdi Tingwang lungsiat hai maidung kakeng khuga wangsanjiu dikhangbo kumjiu, paliuniu Tingwang tu thuonjiu, khatdi kakheng thiujiu bam rabo-e.
Haijengniu aliu nkhinmi makge, aliugu kadih pum hai hawangjiu bamdi, aliugu hiupuina pumra naimachangna sanbi-bijiu bamme.
Palamra haichiu pakak khat chariubo siniu, wadaodi kada silakbo paken dibo tingtheng karingbo gase aliuleng kadenkhai bamme.
Palamra aliuniu wa kangaobotu phuimakjiu, ngao makbo situ phui bambo-e, palamra kangaobo sira pating kak khat ronna leng-e; chiudi ngaomakbo sira tingtheng leng-e.
Haibo kadihgu aliu pum mathenky haise maren midi, chabenniu thiumakbo tingtheng bamrabo tinggen ga, Tingwang papum siakniu thiukhai bambo ky se bamme chiubo aliu sibamme.
Tuhoira aliuniu haibo lamga aliu chun sajiu bamme, chiudi tinggen lamsu wangrabo bam situ aliuniu charijiu khuan bamme.
Chafai benbo jengniu aliu pumruang ngaopad lakge.

Haibo kadih gu mathenkyga aliu bambo tingga, aliu chun sajiu kap marung bamme, aliugu kadih pum haitu kam maha mira aliuniu masenbo makge, chiudi aliu pum hami rabo situ pi lunli khaijiu, tinggen pum thiu lura situ aliuniu machunbo-e.
Haijengniu aliutu Dampao Tingwang siniu aliuleng pagu Hiupuina pikhaira madan diangkhai lujiu baikhai nbambo-e.
Sijengniu pawan machang aliu hujiu bambo-e, sichiujiu aliu pum, aliu ky haiga bamthen Rapiu ky gasu diujiu bambo-e chiubo aliuniu si-e.
Palamra aliu ringting hai kangaoboga makjiu, malumbo gase bambo-e.
Aliuniu hujiu kinbose aliu pum ky haitu phutkhai lujiu Rapiu kyga bammi rabo jengniu-e.
Aliuniu haibo ringtingga, makdi wanglan rabo ringtingga patu pikim khai nibo-e.
Delosai Khrista niu ladjan thiubo bamga aliu mathiu wangkam rabo-e. Siga mai hinaniu haibo pum lunlungga kamkhai mibo saisuijiu kawibodi, kasabodi mai hina phijengse daorabo-e.
Sichiujiu Rapiu tu dechiu pingralo chiubo silujiu, aliuniu maidungtu hiamjiu bambo-e. Aliugu lunlung hina Tingwang niu masan siakjiu sibamme, sichiujiu naliu lungchun ganiu atu sibamra maning-e.
Naliu maga aliu ronna aliu tu thuon karabo makge, chiudi pagu lunlung jengniu makjiu, chamai maga wasao thiu kinmai situ paokak ngam lura naliu khuga pisi khaibo-e.
Aliu hai pachangsiak kapangmai ma? Sichiusai sise Tingwang jengniu-e. Aliu hai kaningtingmai ma? Sise naliu jengniu-e.
Sichiujiu Khrista gu lungsiat siniu aliutu jukhai bamme. Sisera mai khatniu mai hina leng shai khai mibo jengniu, aliu mathiuse pagu kashaibo damse lumacham bambo-e.
Paniu mathiu malin thiujiu shaikhai mide, siniu ringbammai siniu paleng ronna ringmakjiu, chiudi paliuleng shai lujiu ringsulan mibo paleng lungrabo-e.
Aliuniu haibo chamai lunlung gasu maitu ladjan thiu mak rabo-e, nda pakak khatga aliuniu Khrista tu chamaina lunlung gasu ladjan thiu khaimi tadi, tuhoira aliu sichiu tamide.
Sijengniu mai khat kumboniu Khrista ga khat thiumisai, para kasanbo mai thiu mibo-e, kaguangbo hinase tonmide, phuilo, mania hina sankam mide.
Wa pakhiangna haise Khrista pen gasu Tingwang niu kamkhaibo-e. Sichiujiu aliu hai pagu mikremai thiu bambo gasu pakamai thiu lura, khatdi kakimai tudi pijiu pakamai pithiu lura kamkhaibo-e.

Aliugu champao sira, Khrista pen gasu Tingwang niu mai hinatu pakamai thiura kamkhai-e chiubo si-e. Sise Tingwang niu paliu nuan situ chakkhai makge, sichiujiu pakamai thiulu rabo champaose aliutu dinra pikhaibo-e.

Haijengniu Tingwang papum siakniu kamkhai bamdi, Khrista pen gasu aliu khuga dinkhaibo-e. Sichiujiu Khrista sung aliuniu khengbo-e: Tingwang niu naliutu pagu mikremai thiu bambo gasu, pakamai pithiu khai mibo-e!
Khrista sira nuan phung makge, chiudi aliu jengniu, patu Tingwang niu aliu nuan pi phungkhai mide, sichiujiu aliudi Tingwang gu tacheng matipbose papen gasu lutao lura leng-e.
Rapiu khuga maluang tatien thiu aruanglujiu, naliuniu Tingwang gu lungsiat situ pageng haboga, kam nchummi makra aliuniu naliu khuga khengbo-e.
Palamra Tingwang niu dinbo hai nkinglo,
“Naliutu lungsa khairabo wan siakga Iniu naliu khuan chiu khai-e,
khatdi juringbo tingmikse wangtang miboga, Iniu naliutu nkha khai-e.”
Phuilo! Tuhoi hai Tingwang lungsiat daorabo wan-e; thainai hai juringbo tingmik si-e!
Aliu tienkamga mainiu kamaobo daomakra, mai phi masuira aliuniu wadaodi kam makge.
Chiudi aliu hai Tingwang vangmai-e, chiubo madukhaira aliuniu kambo hinaga kanangbo, magenthiu chariubo, daolakbo hinase khengkhai mibo-e.
Aliutu dapkhai mibo-e, bangkhai mibo-e, chakhuan-chara kampad khai mibo-e; sichiujiu aliutu nkiujiu tatien pithiu khai mibo-e, sichiudi tiumak, sakmakjiu khatdi jikhai makjiu lungkhai mibo-e.
Sichiudi aliugu masanbo lunlung, ningting, khengsibo, khatdi lungsabo siniu Tingwang vangmai-e chiubo hai Masanbo Hiupuina siniu lenkhai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu aliugu majibo champao Tingwang gu pumtan gasu aliuniu aphenra, khatdi aliutu kabeng lura tacheng matipbo ripuanse aliu khuga bamme.
Aliutu chakhuang thiu khai-e, khatdi kam mangam khai-e, kam chaliu khai-e, khatdi thuon khai-e. Aliuniu majibose din-e, chiudi aratmai kumjiu lukhai-e;
maidung siniu aliutu sibamdi, simakbo kumjiu kamme, naliuniu ngao bambo kumjiu aliu ringbamdi, kashaimai tu kumjiu lukhai-e.
Aliutu sajai pikhai bamdi, shai makge, aliu chun kam masa khaidi, aliu chun wijiu bamme; aliu kalek sabamdi, mai kakengtu pi lungwi khai-e, wakhatdi kahabo kum bamdi, aliugu keng bamme.
Corinth ga bambo kakung singna kakungmai yo, aliuniu naliu khuga masan siakjiu, aliu lung bai makjiu dinbo-e.
Aliuniu aliu lungchun hai naliu khuga bai makge, chiudi naliuniu aliu khugasu baibo-e.
Naliu hai anahmaidung kumjiu lukhaibo jengniu haise Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e: aliuniu naliutu maning khaibo kumjiu aliutu naliudi maning khailo. Naliu lungchun le-manga khailo!
Malum kamak maitu majang changam kam aruang tulo. Majibo nai kamaobose dechiujiu kangkhat thiulu ralo? Maksai kabenbo nai tamiubo dechiujiu aruang daolu ralo?
Khatdi Khrista nai Satan siniu dechiujiu chunkhat thiu luralo? Dechiujiu malummai nai malummak mai khat thiulu ralo?
Tingwang tu kahumbo ky nai wameng kahumbo kytu dechiu din kada ralo? Delosai aliura ringbambo Tingwang ky si-e. Palamra Tingwang niu haichiu din-e,
“Iniu amaidung khuga aky thiu khaine, sichiujiu paliu ruangga I lungne;
Iniu paliu Rawang thiune, khatdi paliuniu amai thiune.”
“Naliuniu paliutu phutmi rabo-e, paliu khugasu naliu npad milo.
Masan makbo situ wadi niatulo; sichiusai Iniu naliutu lukhai bine.
sichiujiu naliuse anahpuidung khatdi anahpiudung thiu rabo-e,
chiujiu Ngamkambo Rapiu niu din bamme.”
Iniu kungbo akahmaidung yo, haibo ladriandungse aliu khuga kamkhai bibo-e. Aliu pum nai aliu Hiupuina tu kam taniabo hina gasu, aliu ronna kam masan lujiu Tingwang tu pingboga masanjiu tathui lukhe.
Naliu lung aliu khuga lekhailo. Aliuniu mai khat tudi kam maokhai makge, aliuniu mai khattudi kam mahami makge, maksai aliuniu mai khat madi rupmi makge.
Iniu naliutu kam maora haise dinbo makge, palamra Iniu nda naliu khuga dinmibo kumjiu, aliuniu naliutu lungsabo jengniu aliu shaidi, ringdi khat thiujiu bam rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu masan siakjiu si-e, naliu jengniu ageng thiura bamme, sichiujiu Iniu haijiukha chariujiu bamdi hujiu bambo-e. Yo, achun wibo siniu phui bamme.
Chiudi pachun kasamaitu kachu khaira, Tingwang niu, Titus tu pi wangkhaibo jengniu, aliu lungchun hai kam ringa khai-e.

Pah wangbo ronna makjiu, naliu khuganiu padi pachun kimlubo jengniu-e, sichiujiu naliuniu atu agun bamme chiubo, khatdi naliuniu chun sabambo khatdi ajeng gasu naliu khengjiu bambo paniu aliu khuga paokhaibo jengniu achun wi-nkiu bamme.
Iniu chamlen raokhaibo jengniu naliu chun sa-e chiubo donniu, alung makge. Naliuniu pakak khat chun sakhai mibo situ, Iniu silujiu achun sa-e.
Chiudi naliu lung kam magen thiubo jengniu makjiu naliu lung magen thiubo gasu, naliu lung kali mide chiubo jengniu tuhoira achun wibamme.

Delosai Tingwang luni kamjiu chalung magenthiubo haira chalung kali lujiu juringbo daolu raleng-e, sijengniu wadaodi chalung niumi lakge; chiudi kadihpirigu luni kamjiu chalung magenthiubo sira kashaibo daora leng-e.

Phuilo, Tingwang luni kambo jengniu, naliu lungchun kam magenthiu khaibo haise naliu mao ha-e chiubo lenkhai-e. Sichiujiu kamao maitu ladjan thiu rabo jengniu naliu lung aman makbo, kam charen khaibo, naliu chun ngutbo siniu palam hinaga naliu kadenjiu bambo lunlungse masanjiu lenkhai-e.
Sichiujiu Iniu naliu khuga raokhai mibo sira wa kammao khai mibo, maksai kammao khai mibo mai jengniudi makge; chiudi Tingwang suangga naliu chun ngutkhaibo situ pisikhai raleng Iniu raokhai mibo-e.
Sijengniu aliutu kachukhai bibo-e. Aliutu kathuat khaibo ronna makjiu, naliuniu Titus chun wira nkhabo jengniu, aliu nkiu-nkenjiu chunwibo-e.
Iniu naliu khuga patu langkhaibo haiga I mangam son makge, chiudi aliuniu naliu khuga palam hinaga majibo dinbo kumjiu, Titus jengniu ageng thiubo haidi majibo-e.
Naliuniu patu lukhaijiu khatdi pacham majai khaisai, paniu naliutu lungsabo haidi nkiu khangrabo-e.
Sichiujiu Iniu palam hinaga naliutu malum lubui mibo jengniu dejiukha achun wibamlo!
Paliutu chariu magenthiubo siniu madiusui khai mide; chiudi paliuniu paliu lung dijiu pipad lubo jengniu paliu chun wijiu bambo-e.
Paliuniu kangambo ronna makjiu, sisuangdi kengjiu paliu pipadle, sise paliu chunrang thiujiu pinijiu pikhaibo-e.
Judaea ga bambo Tingwang maidungtu paliudi nkhakhai nijiu aliu khuga kheng-e.
Haise aliuniu maningbo suang nkiu-e! Raiboga paliuniu paliu pum Rapiu khuga pikhai-e, sigasu Tingwang niu masenbo saisuijiu paliu pumse aliu khuga pikhai-e.
Titus niu karai gasu kamsu khai mibo lungsabo tienkam haise naliu khugadi kamtang khai milo, chiujiu aliuniu patu lungtu pijiu kathuat khaibo-e.
Naliuniu wahinaga, malumboga, chalad-chaluiga, tasiga, nkhakhai niboga, aliutu lungsaboga tanjiu bambose aliuniu si-e. Sijengniu lungsasibo tienkamga naliu lung dijiu bamra aliuniu lunibo-e.
Iniu chamtan kamkhaibo makge, chiudi maidung siniu dejiukha nkha silo chiubo dinlenjiu, naliugu lungsabose tathui lura Iniu pisi khaibo-e.

Palamra naliuniu aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu lungsabose sibamme, chiubora pah kakhiumai thiubam liudi, naliuleng wilura phiubo jengniu kalek kasamai thiu khaide, sichiujiu paniu kalek kasamai thiukhaibo jengniu naliu kalekwi lura leng-e.
Alungchun haira ndasai kum naliuniu tensu khai mibose, kamloi khai misai wine. Palamra naliu hai kam karaimai ronna makjiu, kamnijiu kabam mai-e.
Kamnibo lungchun bamniubo kumjiu, naliuniu naliugu kabambo gasu kamloi lura, kambambo sidi tuhoi kamloi milo.
Naliugu kabambo saisuijiu pinijiu pikhaibo naliu kalense Tingwang niu lukhai rabo-e.
Naliutu kam chariukhai lujiu, kakimaitu pi aman khai rabo jengniu haise Iniu dinbo makge.
Chiudi tuhoi naliugu kabambo thinlujiu wa kahamaitu nkha lusai, paliudi naikhatra paliugu kabambose thinlujiu naliutu nkha lusai, naliu mathiu machamjiu lunglubui-e chiubo-e.
Masanbo ariakniu haichiu din-e, “Wa kakeng makhuan kalumaidi nkiu sonmak, poi makhuan kalumaidi tamson makge.”
Titus niu naliutu nkha khai nibo jengniu, Tingwang tu aliuniu thuon-e.
Aliuniu patu langkhaibo ronna makjiu paniu naliu khuga wangrabose palungchun gasu rang kamigu-e.
Kawichampao dinronboga phumling hinaniu thuonjiu bambo, singnapiu tudi langkhai taman kin-e.
Sironna makjiu Rapiu maken kam madi lura, khatdi lungsabo tienkam jengniu aliutu maluang tadra phumling maidungniu patu kadalujiu langkhaibo-e.
Sichiujiu aliuniu kam kinbo tienkam hinaga maidungniu aliutu maning maomi makra aliu ningting sijiu bamme.
Haise chamaina mikphuiga ronna makjiu, Rapiu mikphui gadi kamajibo thiu lura aliuniu maning kabambo gu-e.

Sijengniu palam hinaga aliuniu madiulubo khatdi silubose ronna makjiu palam hinaga pa-tagiu thiujiu nkhakhai nijiu bambo aliu singnapiu tudi panaitu maluang tadra langkhai kin-e. Sichiujiu naliuniu patu malum mawi bambo jengniu pah tuhoira pa-tagiu thiuchang thiujiu bamme.
Naliutu nkha khaira langkhaibo Titus haira amajang piu-e, khatdi patu majang kinbo kakimaidungse Khrista maken kam madi lura Phumlingdung malin thiu kakin maidung-e.
Aliuniu naliu jenggasu wasao thiu kinbose maji-e, chiubo Phumlingdungniu silura naliuniu paliutu lungsabo lenkhai bilo.
Judaea ga bambo masan maidungtu nkhabo lamga Iniu raokhai sonra angam ha-e.

Naliuniu nkha khaini bambo jengniu, Macedonia mai khuga Iniu asao thiujiu bambo-e. Iniu dinbo-e, “Achaia ga bambo singnadung siniu ndasai kum gasu nkha khaira kadenbam mibo-e.” Sichiujiu naliu lungchun ngutjiu bambo donniu maidung kakengkha lungchun pimasu khai-e.
Naliu jengniu asao thiujiu bambo situ pijiu mathakhubo thiumi makra, naliuniu nkha khaini bambo singna maidung situ Iniu langkhai kinbo-e.
Naliutu malumsiak lujiu Macedonia ganiu khangsiatu majang wangboga, naliuniu kaden mak bamniubo ngao sai, naliutu dinbo makjiu aliudi dejiukha mangam ralo?

Sichiujiu naliuniu kaden khai bambo kalendungse, paliuniu aliu wangbo masuangga kadenbam niura, aliuniu paliutu langkhai masuangbo-e. Sichiujiu I wangsai naliu thao kabambo makjiu, naliuniu kamkhai nibose kaden bamniu rabo jengniu-e.
Sichiujiu, poinaga maruk khaibo paniu poinakha atiat rabo-e, khatdi kengjiu marukhaibo paniu kengjiu atiat rabo-e, chiubo hai maningtao bamlo.
Mai hinaniu chalung niubo thiu makjiu, maksai kam maksai kasa jengniu makjiu, palungchun ganiu maningbo saisuijiu pikhai lulo, delosai chunwijiu pibo maitu Tingwang niu masenbo-e.
Sichiusai palam hinaga, pawan machangna mali-malanjiu kawibo ngam hinaleng naliugu kengjiu bamlura, Tingwang niu naliuleng thoidam pikhai ngamme.
Masanbo ariakniu din-e,
“Pageng bammai leng paniu majamakjiu pikhai-e;
pagu lungsiatse tingtheng leng-e.”
Pawan machang naliu lung dijiu pipad ngamra paniu naliuleng mali-malanjiu pikhai bine, sichiusai aliu khugasu daolubo naliugu kalen jengniu chamai kakengniu Tingwang tu thuonlu rabo-e.
Palamra naliuniu nkhakhai bibo tienkam siniu Tingwang maidung leng piwangtang khaibo ronna makjiu, Tingwang tu thuonbo hai kengpad sanlu-e.
Naliuniu Khrista gu Kawicham majai lubo jengniu, khatdi naliu ben dijiu mai hinatu pikhai bibo jengniu khatdi naliu malum jengniu, Tingwang gu kendi situ maidung kakengniu thuon rabo-e.
Naliu khuga Tingwang gu nkiubo lungsiat bambo jengniu, naliuleng paliuniu kheng bamme.
Mai dinsi lakbo pagu kalen jengniu, aliu Tingwang tu thuonkhe!

Naliu khuga bambo tingga, manuanbo khatdi njangbo, chiudi naliu khugasu diujiu tadmiboga palad katanbo, Paul I apumsiakniu, naliu khuga khengbo-e. Palamra Khrista gu manuanbo nai lungsabo pen gasu, Iniu naliu khuga wangsai atu kam masakhai makra Iniu khengbo-e.
Palamra aliuniu kadihpiri lunlung gasu kambo-e chiujiu dinbo maidung situ, aliu lad tanjiu dinrabo siakge.
Aliuniu haibo kadihpiriga lungbam tadi, aliuniu kadihpiri maning gasu chari thiu bambo makge.
Aliuniu aphenboga thinbo chaheng-changiuse kadihpirigu makge, chiudi katanbo situ kam mahalu rabo Tingwang gu pumtanse thinbo-e.
Kamaobo cham aribo hina khatdi chaliangbo hina Tingwang gu ningting tasiga aliuniu kam maha khaibo-e, sichiujiu aliu lungchun pakhiangna Khrista kadin piura kamkhaibo-e.
Naliuniu pachamse majai taphuang luboga, majaimak mai situ aliuniu ladjan thiu rabo-e.
Naliura ndanlamtu ronna phuikin gu-e. Mai khatniu paronna pahai Khrista gu-e chiubo maning bamma? Sichiusai Khrista khuga pah kabambo kumjiu, aliudi Khrista gu-e chiubo patu pisi lulo.

Naliutu kam masa makjiu, kam mawilura Rapiu niu aliu khuga chamtan pikhai bibo jengniu, Iniu asao thiubo hai nkiubi midi, sibo jengniu I mangammi makge. Sichiujiu naliutu rathonmi makjiu thiukhang raleng-e.
Agu chamlen raokhaibo gasu, Iniu naliutu kam kapin khaibo makge.
“Paul gu chamlen hai palad tan-e khatdi sa-e, chiudi pah npao aliu khuga kawangbo lonra, paladdi tanmak, khatdi pahai wadi makge,” chiujiu khangsianiu din sune.
Sichiujiu kadinmai situ aliu wangmak tadi, aliugu chamlen-ga tadi khatdi aliu wang aruangjiu bamdi, aliu tienkam hai wadi tamson makge chiubo pisikhai rabo-e.

Chiudi maidung khangsiara paliu ronna paliutu maning madijiu khatdi maitu pon kadajiu bammai situ aliuniu din kadamak rabo-e. Paliura dejiukha panglo! Paliu ronna maning madilujiu, maidungtu ladjan thiujiu bambo-e.
Chiudi aliura aliu chaliang thiubo hai pamalan bamme, sise Tingwang niu aliuleng pikhaibo riga nkiubo suimakge. Sise naliu khuga kamkhaibo situdi chakkhai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu naliudi sibo lungga bambo jengniu, Khrista lamga Kawichamse aliuniu phungwang sai nkiumi lakge.

Tingwang niu aliuleng pikhaibo rigasu, maidungniu kamkhai bibo jengniu aliu chaliang thiubo makge. Chiudi Tingwang niu pikhaibo lung gase naliu malum dikhang lura, naliu khuga tatien thiu khaira chiujiu aliuniu ramgun kabam gu-e.
Sichiusai naliu riga sanjiu, katambo kadih gadi Kawibo champao hai aliuniu paoron rabo-e, sichiudi maigu luzamga tatien thiukhai mibo jengniu aliu chaliang lakge.
Palamra mai khatniu paronna patu thuonbo makjiu, Rapiu niu thuonbose pathao siakge.
Iniu poinakha mengjiu bamdi naliuniu khengkhaira maning-e, chalung sajiu khengkhailo!
Naliuniu Khrista nao thiura, Iniu naliutu liuchangpuitu kumjiu ladriat thiu khaiboga, Tingwang niu palung thiubo kumjiu, Idi naliu lamga alung thiubo-e.
Karaiga kaniu siniu pason sabo pagu arat siniu Eve tu hiamlubo kumjiu, naliu tudi Khrista ga bambo majibo nai masanbo situ kam masami ratu I manang-e.

Delosai khangsianiu naliu khuga wangjiu, aliuniu dinron makbo kakibo Jesu racham dinronbo, maksai naliuniu katambo hiupuina siniu wangjiu, naliuniu chiu matai makbo kawicham dinron sai, simaitu naliu chun wijiu lukhai sune, chiubo donniu alung manangbo-e.
Naliuniu nkiu-nkenbo ladlangtad maidung-e chiujiu kumai suang, I hai nkhin mibo makge chiubo Ira maning-e.
Iniu tacham dinsi lumak tadi wasimak sonbo gura makge, chiubo hai pawan machang khatdi palam hina naliutu pisi khaibo-e.
Iniu naliutu kam madikhai nijiu, aronna atu kam masiam lujiu Tingwang gu Kawicham hai naliu khuga paman thiu makjiu dinron khai mibo jengniu, amao bamjiu ma?
Iniu naliutu maluang tatien thiubo tingga kakibo phumling khuganiu aphijeng lukhai mibo jengniu, paliutu Iniu son mide.

Iniu naliutu maluang tatien thiubo tingga, akhuga kanangbo padjiu rangkang pageng bam tadi, naliutu kampu khai makge; palamra Macedonia lamsu wangbo singna maidung siniu aleng pageng bambo hina phungwang khaibo-e. Karaiga kumjiu, pasai kanagadi Iniu naliutu kam chariu khai lakge!
Khrista gu majibose akhuga bambo jengniu, asao thiujiu bambo hai Achaia ramlung pakhiangnaga mai khat niudi kham lakge.
Iniu haise dinbo hai naliutu lungsa makbo jengniu ma? Iniu naliutu lungsabo hai Tingwang niu sibamme!
Aliuniu kam kinbo kumjiu paliudi kam kin-e chiu maningbo katambo “ladlangtadmaitu” khamlura jengniu, tuhoi Iniu kambambo kumjiu pasaidi kamjiu bamrabo-e.
Simaidungse ka-aratbo ladlangtadmaidung-e, sichiujiu Khrista gu ladlangtadmai thak kamjiu, paliu arat ngam kamkin mai-e.
Sise maisuang kahabo makge! Satan di paronna patu kabenbo maza kumjiu lunli lu-e.
Sijengniu pavangmai niudi tacheng matipmai thak kumjiu kam bamdi wa kadibo makge, pamalan gase paliu tienkam saisuijiu paliuniu daorabo-e.
I Kapangmai-e, chiubo mai khatniudi maningmi tulo, chiubo hai Iniu naliu khuga dinkhai lanbo-e. Naliuniu atu kapangmai-e chiujiu lukhai siaksai, siga asao thiurabo palam bamme.
Iniu tuhoi dinbo hai Tingwang chun ganiu makge, siniu asao thiubo hai kapangbo gu-e.
Chiudi maidung kakengniu chapum lamga wasao thiubo kumjiu, Idi asao thiura mide.
Delosai naliura ningting chang ningting-e, siniu kapangmai situ naliu chun wijiu khenglubo-e.

Maidungniu naliutu paliu vangleng lukhai bamdi, maksai naliu ma ruptiu bamdi, maksai naliutu tathak thiu bamdi, maksai wajeng sikhai makjiu bamdi, maksai naliu biang kaphi bamdi naliura simai khuga khenglu-e.
Aliuniu haijiukha mahonju mibo jengniu suikhai radi Ira mangamme!
I aronna atu din thuonbo makge, kapangmai kumjiu Iniu dinbo-e, Sichiujiu mainiu walam khatga husai, Idi hurabo-e.
Simaise Hebrew mai ma? I di-e. Simaise Israel mai ma? Idi-e. Simaise Abraham kaikikmai ma? I di-e.

Simaise Khrista ngam kakammai ma? I kapangmai kumjiu dinbo-e, I simai suang widiang-e; I simai suang maran-e, Iniu kavangkyga ngut makeng diang-e; mainiu atu dap makeng diang-e; khatdi pawan kakengkha shaipai-pai khai mibo-e.
Jehudi maidungniu atu leklon mangiu khaibo gasu, apum gen-ga pajam samriu-je-chakiu phung kin-e.

Rom mainiu malod sum atu tathunniu kakhiu-e, malod khat tatuniu rotle. Malee pangmijiu malod sum I chariusui khai mibo-e. Sichiujiu pawan khat gara wanchak kak makai-je-madaikiu I tadui jiuga bamkhai mibo-e.

Pawan kathengkha nbinjiu tadui kanaibo ganiudi, suttiumai khuga niudi, arammai Jehudi mai khuga niudi, Nkengmai khuga niudi, namdiga niudi, ramjingga niudi, duipuiga niudi, aratbo singnamai khuga niudi kapingbo hai daosui khai mibo-e.

Sichiujiu pawan kathengkha changam kamjiu chariusui khai-e, sichiujiu pawan kakengkha jikiukhai makge, pawan kakengkha mariu-charijiu khatdi kami-mijiu tadkhai kami gu-e; khatdi agijiu tadi, waga bamkhaira hajiu apumruang bamkhai kami gu-e.
Iniu dinkam lulakbo kengjiu bamme. Sibo riga Iniu naimachangna phumling hina jengniu alung chariujiu bambo gu-e.
Sichiujiu mai khat kumboniu nkhin miboga, Idi nkhin mi-e, khatdi mai khat kumboniu kamaobo kam miboga, alung chariuboniu phuimi-e.
Iniu asao thiuni siaksai, agu nkhinbo lunlung situ phuilujiu asao thiu-e.
I arat makge chiubo paniu sibamme, Rapiu Jesu Piu Tingwang zanse tingtheng donwibo thiu milo!
Iniu Damascus ga bambo tingga atu minra jengniu chawang Areta hangga bambo dihthinpao siniu, atu minra namdi rengmun-ga akhemai khailujiu lim bamme.
Chiudi atu nbung lungga khailujiu kareng kaputki gasu phutkhai bijiu pakhugasu marilubo-e.
Iniu wakawi kamlumak bamliudi, asao thiura bammide. Chiujiu Rapiu niu atu madukhaibo khatdi ngaolen khaibo tuhoira dinkhai sune.
Takum kariu-je-madaikiu tang mide, Khristian mai khattu Iniu si-e, (chapum jaoma, jao makma I simakge, chiudi Tingwang niu sibamme). Sinapiu situ kuthubo tinggen-ga majang khang mide.
Iniu din lan-e, sikumbo mai khattu Iniu si-e, (chapum jaoma, jao makma I simakge, chiudi Tingwang niu sibamme,) sinapiu situ Paradise ga puikhang mide.
Siga chamaina ladniu dinsi lakbo, khatdi chamaina mun gasu dinpad silakbo khuan paniu chiu-e.
Sina jengniu I wasao thiu-e, chiudi ajengniura, asao thiuson lakge, I hai dejiukha sonlo chiubo ronna lenkhaira ronna-e.
I chaliang ni-e, saira Iniu kamengmai kum makjiu chamchang siakjiu dinrabo-e, chiudi mainiu atu ngaolujiu khatdi acham chiulujiu atu maning madi mira kaping jengniu I chaliangmi makge.

Iniu asuang kahabo kengkha ngaolubo jengniu, aronna atu maning madi mira pingbo donniu tathu situ apumga pi duak khai-e, sise aronna atu maning madimi makra Satan ladlangtadmainiu atu kakhiu kinbo gu-e.
Sise akhu gasu luthon mira, Iniu Tingwang khuga khenglon sum mide.

Chiudi paniu akhuga paokakge, “Alungsiat hai naleng buibo-e, palamra agu pumtan haise nagu kasonboga tathui khaibo-e,” sichiujiu Khrista gu pumtan hai akhuga bamlura jengniu agu kasonbo hinaga asao thiujiu bambo-e.
Sichiujiu Khrista jengniu kasonboga, kamangamboga, mathadboga, magen kathiuboga, aleng kimbo thiu-e. Palamra Iniu kasonbo gase I tan bamme.
I kapangmai thiu mide! Sise naliuniu atu pithiu khaibo-e, haiga naliuniu atu thuonbui-e, palamra I wadimak tadi naliugu nkiubo ladlangtad maidung suang siamson makge.
Pachang siakjiu I hai naliu ruangga ladlangtadmai thiulu rabo jengniu tasibo khatdi maisuang kahabo tiendungse alai padjiu kamkhai mibo-e.
Tasen-chalan jengniu naliutu Iniu kam kabuak khaibo sangnu, naliu dega kakimai suang kasabo bamjiulo? Amao haise kuak khailo.

Iniu tuhoi naliu khuga wangra kadenbo haise lon sum mibo-e, sichiujiu naliu khuga I wadi khenglakge. Iniu naliugu rangkang makjiu, naliutu lunibo-e. Delosai panahmainiu papui-papiu maileng maning makjiu, chiudi papui papiuniu panah maileng maning rabo-e.
Iniu naliutu nkhara jengniu achun wijiu agu kabam hina, khatdi apum katangna pikhaini bambo-e. Iniu naliutu haijiukha lungsabo jengniu, naliuniu atu lungsabo hai nkhinmi rama?
Naliutu Iniu kam chariu khai makge chiubo hai naliu suisune. Chiudi khangsia maira Iniu asiam wijiu, asiam siniu naliutu minlubo-e chiujiu dinlu bui-e.
Dechiu kamjiulo? Iniu naliu khuga langkhaimai khugasu naliu ma ruptiu mibo bamjiu ma?

Iniu Titus tu siga wanglo chiujiu dinkhaibo-e, khatdi aliu singnapiu khattu langkhaijiu patu majang wang-e. Siga Titus niu naliu ma ruptiu mibo bamma? Anai khangnia chun khat, lung khat thiujiu kamkhaibo makma?

Naliu maga aliu ronna aliuleng kaphebo bamme chiu naliu maning bamme. Sichiu makge! Khrista chunning ganiu, Tingwang suangga aliuniu dinbo-e, sichiujiu aliuniu kambo hina naliutu nkha lura jengniu kamkhaibo-e.

Sichiujiu Iniu pasai wangboga, naliutu ngaojiu alungchun kimmak, khatdi naliudi atu ngaojiu naliu lungchun kimmak mira ping-e. Sichiujiu khat khattu n-gibo, manmabo, chalung pombo, leng-sibo, maiken tiabo, maitu khanbo, ladtumbo, tasao thiubo khatdi kabuakbo padmi ratu ping-e.

Sichiujiu pasai I wanglanbo tingga naliu kakga mai kakeng khaniu npui-npiu lungrongjiu kamangambo ngam kamjiu, kamakhamai siniu paliu lung lilu makbo jengniu, simaisung Tingwang niu atu kam mangam khaijiu adiu sara ping-e.

Nda karaiga nuan kamkhai mimai khatdi tuhoi nuan kamjiu bammai situ kuak khai silakge, chiubo haise Iniu naliu khuga wanglon niabo men-ga dinkhai mibo-e. Siniu thainai men-ga I wangsai, mai khatniudi marisi lakge.

Khrista alungga bambo jengniu, Iniu dinbambo hai kachangma, kachang maklo, chiubo naliuniu silubui-e. Paniu naliu khuga tatien thiubo tingga pagu pumtan habo makge, chiudi pagu pumtanse naliu khuga lenkhai mibo-e.

Palamra pagu kasonboga patu singchaiga masengshat mide, chiudi tuhoira pahai Tingwang pumtan ganiu ring bamme. Siniu aliudi pakhuga son-e, chiudi aliuniu naliutu khat thiu luboga Tingwang pumtan gasu aliudi patu maluang ring ncham lubui-e.
Malumboga bamma, bammak ma chiubo naliu pumsiakniu phuijiu matad lulo. Naliu pumsiakniu madiululo. Jesu Khrista naliu lungga bamme chiubo naliu simak ma? Sichiu maksai, naliutu suimakbo-e.
Aliutu suimakbo makge chiubo naliuniu sibam ratu Iniu maning-e.

Naliuniu wa kam maomi makra, Tingwang khuga aliu khengjiu bamme, haise aliuniu wa kam taphuang lu-e chiubo makge, chiudi aliu wakam taphuang lumakbo mai kumjiu bamdi, naliuniu kamajibose kamlura leng-e.
Delosai aliuniu majibo ganiu makjiu, majimakbo gasu wadi kam ngamlu lakge.
Aliuniu kasonboga, khatdi naliuniu katanboga aliu chun wi-e; sichiujiu naliu witathui lura aliuniu khengbo-e.

Haijengniu, naliu khuga I bam makbo tingga haise raokhaibo-e; palamra Iniu naliu khuga wangbo tingga naliutu kam kaomi makjiu kam matip lura, Rapiu niu atu pikhaibo pumtan thinjiu acham tanmi makra jengniu-e.

Tuhoira singna maidung yo, naliu mang wilo! Witathui lura matan lulo; Iniu khengbo hai chiukhailo; chunkhat, lungkhat thiu bamlo, khatdi agi-manai bamlo. Sichiujiu Tingwang gu lungsabo nai agi-manaibo siniu naliutu majang bamlo.
Singna thiubogu biang-hiu khaibo siniu khat khattu kanui khailo.
Tingwang maidung mathiuniu naliutu kanui khai-e.
Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu lungsiat, Tingwang gu kungbo khatdi Masanbo Hiupuina gu chakin thiubo siniu naliu mathiutu majang khaibo thiu milo.
Chamaina khuga suniu makge, mai khatniudi jukhaibo makge, chiudi Jesu Khrista gu khatdi patu kashaibo gasu piringsulan khaibo Papiu Tingwang gasu ladlangtadmai thiubo Paul Iniu,
khatdi atu majang bambo singnadung khugasu Galatia ga bambo phumlingdung tu kanui khai-e.
Aliu Piu Tingwang khatdi Rapiu Jesu Khrista niu lungsiat nai agi-manaibose naliutu pikhaibo thiu milo.
Haibo ken-gu kasabo gasu aliutu khenrang pithiu khaira aliu Piu Tingwang kadin piujiu, Khrista papumsiak aliu nuan jengniu pipad khaide.
Tingwang khuga tingtheng tingtheng paken kadibo thiu milo! Amen.
I asuang ha-e, Khrista lungsiat siniu naliutu kukhaibo patu phutlujiu kakibo kawicham khattu naliu khangsia mainiu lukhai mide.
Kakibo kawicham siga ha-e, chiudi khangsiamai siniu naliutu kam kabuakjiu Khrista gu kawicham gasu kam kali mira kam bamme.
Chiudi aliuniu naliu khuga dinkhai mibo kawichamse kamakbo naliu khuga, aliuniu maksai tinggen maza khatniu tadi dinsai pah tasiang daobo thiu milo!
Aliuniu nda naliu khuga dinkhai mibo kumjiu, Iniu dinlanbo-e, mai khatniu, nda naliuniu silubo gasu makjiu katambo dinjiu naliutu katikhai sai pase tasiang daomi sulo!

Palamra tuhoi chamainiu suikhaira I phiubam jiuma? Pachangjiu chiu makge! Tingwang niu suikhaira situ Iniu phiubo-e! Sichiu makjiu Iniu chamai maning kamra tuhoidi kam kinsai Khrista vang I thiusi lakge.
Asingna maidung yo, Iniu kawicham dinron kinbo hai chamai khuganiu makge chiubo naliu khuga dinbo-e.
Delosai Iniu chamai khuganiu daolubo makge, khatdi mainiu atu katikhaibo makge, chiudi Jesu Khrista papumsiakniu atu ngaolen khaibo-e.
Sichiujiu Iniu apao-apehmai chengga achun ngut nkiujiu, aliu Jehudi mai chengga Iniu apum pipad khaimibo-e.
Iniu Nkengmai khuga kawicham dinkhaira paniu Panahpiu situ akhuga lenkhai bide, sichiujiu Iniu mai khat khugadi makhiam thiura tadson makge.
Sichiujiu amasuang ladlangtad karaimai tudi phiujiu Jerusalem gadi khang makge. Chiudi Iniu Arabia ga tadlujiu Damascus ga malan wang-e.
Haise tingkum sum sailamniu Peter khuga pisikhaira I tadle, sichiujiu Jerusalem ga patu maluang lujiu nidkak nia bam aruang khai-e.
Siga Rapiu singna Jacob tu makjiu, ladlangtadmai kakimai khat tudi Iniu ngaodao makge.
Iniu raokhaibo hai majibo-e. I arat makge chiubo Tingwang niu sibamme!
Sibosai Syria khatdi Silicia lam I tadmide.
Sibo tingga Judea ga bambo phumling maidung siniu atu zusi makge.
Chiudi paliuniu atu, “Hainase nda aliutu ngaokhai lakjiu, kam mathadjiu, kam mahara kambo piu-e tuhoira paniu malumbo lamga dinron bamne,” chiubo ronna paliuniu din-e.
Sichiujiu ajeng gasu paliu niu Tingwang tu thuonne.

Tingwang niu akhuga madukhai bibo kum, Iniu Nkengmai khuga kawicham dinra tadkinbo-e chiubo paliu khuga Iniu mahin paokhai bide. Palamra Iniu kamkinbose, nda tadi, tuhoi tadi pijiu mathakhu pithiu khaini makge.

Chiudi atu majang kinbo Titus se Greek mai-e, aliu ruangga khangsiamai siniu pagi romra kamme, chiudi sise Iniu manomjiu pikam khai makge. Palamra aliuniu Khrista Jesu khuga khenrang thiujiu lungbo haitu paliura mahin matadjiu phiukin maidung-e. Paliuniu aliutu pijiu kavang thiukhai nibo-e.
Chiudi kawicham gu majibo hai naliu khuga pibam lura aliuniu paliuleng pawan hai pikhai makge.
Sichiujiu pajai khat ganiu Jehudi mai khuga kawicham dinra, Peter tu malumkhai mibo kum, Nkengmai khuga kawicham dinra atu malum khai-e chiubo paliuniu simide.
Palamra Tingwang pumtan pen gasu Jehudi mai khuga Peter tu ladlangtadmai pithiu khaibo kum, Nkengmai khuga atu ladlangtadmai pithiu khaide.

Sichiujiu Tingwang niu atu nkiubo tienkam pikhaibo haitu silujiu, jupao thiubam mai Jacob, Peter khatdi John paliuniu, Barnabas anaitu Nkengmai khulam tadra suikhaibo madan thiujiu anai ben jukachung khaide. Sichiujiu paliuniu Jehudi mai khulam khatdi Barnabas anaitu Nkengmai khulam tadra suikhaide.
Iniu machun bambose chiubora kaleksa maidungtu maningtao khaira, paliu mathiuniu anai khuga dinkhaide.
Chiudi Peter niu Antioch ga kawangbo lon Iniu pamaga pamao dinlen khai-e.
Delosai Jacob khuganiu chamai langwang kamak thenra pah Nkengmaitu majang watiu bambo-e, chiudi simai wangboga, paniu chagirom maitu npingjiu, Nkengmaitu maluang tiu makra nthad mibo-e.
Siga kakibo Jehudi maidungdi pakumjiu mahon kam mide, sichiubo mahonbo gase, Barnabas tudi paliuniu jutad mide.

Sichiujiu paliuniu majibo kawicham haise maji makbo npuiga tadkhai mibo situ Iniu silubo gasu, Iniu mathiu masuangga Peter khuga din-e. “Nangra Jehudi mai-e, chiudi nangra Nkengmai kumjiu kam kin-e. Sichiusai Nkengmaitu dechiujiu Jehudi mai cheng majaira nangniu hiamlu ralo?”
Aliu Jehudi mai-e nuan phungbo Nkengmai jatse makge.

Chiudi mai khattu kam maji khaibo hai Tacheng-tajai majaibo gasu makge, chiudi Jesu Khrista tu malumbo gasu kam maji khai-e. Aliudi Tingwang khuga kam maji khaira jengniu Tacheng-tajai saisui makjiu Khrista Jesu tu malumbo-e. Palamra mai khattudi Tacheng-tajaigu majaibo gasu Tingwang khuga kam maji khai makge.

Aliuniu Khrista tu malumbo gasu Tingwang khuga kam maji mibo-e, chiusai aliu hai Nkengmai kumjiu nuan phungmai-e chiuboga, Khrista hai nuan jengniu tatien thiu bambo-e chiura ma? Wadaodi sichiu makge.
Iniu kam pangmibo Tacheng tajai situ, Iniu kamkin liusai, Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu I mao mibo-e.
Sijengniu Tacheng-tajai sai suisai I shai mibo-e, Tacheng-tajai haisiakniu atu kamshat mibo-e, chiudi haise Tingwang khuga I ringlura leng-e. Atu singchaiga Khrista panai maluang kamshat mibo-e;
Sijengniu ringbambo hai I makge, chiudi Khrista niu alungga lungbambo-e. Tuhoi Iniu ringjiu bambo hai, atu lungsajiu paringting pikhai mibo, Tingwang Nahpiu situ malumbo jengniu I ringjiu bambo-e.
Iniu Tingwang lungsiattu lukhai makbose Iniu suini makge. Mai khatniu Tacheng-tajai pen gasu Tingwang khuga kam maji lusai, Khrista shai khai mibose mathakhu mibo-e.
Kapangbo, Galatiamai yo, saoniu naliu mik kam kadatmi jiulo? Naliu mik siakniu Jesu Khrista tu singchai riga masengshat mibo lunlungse ngaokhai mibo-e!
Naliuniu tacheng-tajai majaijiu tatien thiubo gasu Hiupuina daojiuma, maksai kawicham chiulujiu malumbo gasu daojiulo, chiubo akhuga dinkhailo.
Naliu haibo meng-meng bam khama? Naliuniu Tingwang gu Hiupuina maning gasu sulujiu, tuhoi naliu pumtan gasu pamalan thiukhaijiu tami rama?
Naliu mathakhu gasu haijiukha magenthiu khaijiu tami rama? Sichiusai, pachangjiu mathakhu-e.
Tingwang niu Hiupuina pikhaijiu naliu khuga tasibo kamkhaibo hai, Tacheng-tajai majaibo donniu ma, maksai kawicham chiulujiu malumbo ganiulo?
Sijengniu malumbo ganiu lungkinbo mai hinara Abraham kaikik maidung-e chiubo silulo

Kamalumbo jengniu, Tingwang niu Nkengmaidung tudi kam majikhai bine chiubo hai Masanbo ariakga dinkhai masuangjiu, Kawicham hai Abraham khuga haichiu dinkhai mibo-e: “Napen gasu jat hinatu thoikhai bine.”
Abraham niu malumbo jengniu donwibo daolude, sikumjiu malummai hina pakumjiu donwibo thiulu rabo-e.

Sijengniu tuhoira mai khat tudi Tacheng-tajai pen gasu Tingwang suangga kam maji khai makge chiubo masansiak mide, palamra Masanbo ariakniu haichiu din-e, “Malumbo pen gasu mai khattu Tingwang suangga kam majikhai mai ronna ringlu rabo-e.”
Chiudi Tacheng-tajai hai malumboga wadi kamra ha-e. Sibosung, Masanbo ariakniu haichiu din-e, “Tacheng-tajai pakhiangna majaimai siniu ringrabo-e.”

Khrista niu haise kamkhai mibo-e, chiubora Abraham khuga Tingwang niu ladriat thiukhai mibo thoidamse Khrista Jesu pen gasu Nkengmai khuga piwang khaira leng-e, sichiujiu malumbo pen gasu Tingwang niu ladriat khaibo Hiupuinase daolura leng-e.

Singna maidung yo, Iniu naimachangnagu lunlung gasu dinlen khaine, chiubora mai khangnianiu suikhaijiu chamsiang thiu lujiu madan diangkhai miboga, mai khat niudi kampangbo maksai khaisanbo sui makge.

Tuhoira Tingwang niu Abraham nai pakai-kik khuga ladriat thiukhai mibo-e. Masanbo ariakniu “pakai-kikdung” chiu dinmakge, chiudi “pakai-kik” khugasu chiubo-e sira khang khattu ronna dinbo-e, sise Khrista tu dinbo-e.
Iniu dinbo sira, Tingwang niu Abraham khuga ladriat khai mibose, majai khai raleng-e. Sichiujiu tingkum kai madai-je-samriu sainiu pikhaibo Tacheng-tajai siniu Tingwang gu ladriat situ kampang lakge.
Palamra Tingwang gu kalen hai Tacheng-tajaiga mangiu khai misai, pagu ladriat mathakhu mibo-e. Sijengniu pagu ladriat pen gasu, Tingwang niu Abraham khuga kalense pikhaibo-e.

Sichiusai, Tacheng-tajai haise dekam ralo? Haise Abraham khuga pikhaine chiujiu ladriat khaibose pakai- pakikse wangtang makbo suangga mao-e chiujiu lenkhai raleng-e. Sichiujiu Tacheng-tajai haise mazadungniu chakakna thiujiu pikhaibo-e.
Chiudi khangkhat ronna kam misai, chakakna hai pageng hamide, chiusai Tingwang paronna kam mibo-e.
Chiusai Tacheng-tajai haise Tingwang ladriattu suimak jiuma? Chiumakge! Chamainaniu karingbo daolura jengniu tacheng-tajai dao-e sai, sise majaibo gasu mai hinatu Tingwang khuga kam maji lubui-e.
Chiudi Masanbo ariakniu dinbo sira, kadihpiri pakhiangna nuan pumtan hangga bam mide, sijengniu ladriat khaibo sira Jesu Khrista tu malumbo pen gasu kalense pikhaibo-e.
Chiudi malumbose wangmakbo suangga, Tacheng-tajai siniu aliu mathiutu bangman mibo-e, sichiujiu malumbo haitu madukhai raleng-e.
Sichiujiu Khrista niu wangmakbo suang gara Tacheng-tajai hainiu aliutu thinman bamniubo-e, haise malumbo pen gasu aliutu Tingwang khuga kam majilura leng-e.
Tuhoira malumbo wan hai wangtang mide, siniu Tacheng-tajai hangga aliu bamta mide.
Delosai Jesu Khrista tu malumbo jengniu naliu mathiu Tingwang nahmaidung thiu mide.
Chiusai Jesu jengniu tadui nphum kalu hina chafai kaben kum Jesu tu benmibo-e.
Sijengniu Jehudi maidi Greek maidi tamson makge, kavangmaidi, khenrangthiu maidi tamson makge, maipuidi maipiudi tamson makge; delosai naliu mathiu Jesu Khrista ga khat thiu mibo-e.
Sichiujiu naliuniu Khrista gu thiumi saira, naliu hai Abraham kai-kik thiujiu Tingwang niu ladriat khaibose daolu raleng-e.
Chiudi Iniu dinkiu lanbo sira hai-e, papiugu kalek lurabo nah siniu, wahina riga papao thiu bamdi, nahting gara kavangmai khat nai watam son makge
Sichiujiu papiuniu pating riatkhaibo tingse tangmak then paniu jukhaimai khatdi machamai hangga bam rabo-e.
Sikumjiu aliudi hiupuina lunlungga pasiu kachapmai thiulumak then sira, kadihpiritu mawang bambo hiupuina vang thiu kinbo-e.
Chiudi pawanse wangtang gapboga Tingwang niu Nahpiu siaktu langkhai bide. Sichiujiu npuimai khugasu manawangjiu, Jehudi maigu Tacheng-tajai hangga lungkhai mide,
sise Tacheng-tajai hangga lungbam maitu rankhaira leng-e, sichiujiu aliu hai Tingwang nahmai thiulura leng-e.
Chiusai naliuniu panahmai thiulubo donniu Tingwang niu Panahpiu gu Hiupuina se aliu lungga langkhai bijiu “Abba, Apiu” chiujiu senpad lubo-e.
Sijengniu nang-hai kavang thiuta mide, chiudi panahpiu thiu mibo-e. Nang panah thiumibo jengniu, Tingwang niu panahmaileng pirabo hinase naleng pikhai birabo-e.
Karaiga naliuniu Tingwang tu simakbo tingga, naliu hai chara kachang makbo vang thiujiu bamniu-e.

Chiudi tuhoira naliu Tingwang tu silude, maksai Iniu haichiu dinni-e, tuhoira Tingwang niu naliutu silude. Chiusai dechiujiu naliuniu kasonbo khatdi pageng habo hiupuina hangga malanwang nijiulo? Dekamjiu naliuniu simai vang thiulan nijiulo?
Naliuniu nkiubo naimikpuidung, chahiudung, pating pawan saisuijiu tingkumdungtu mania kakin gu-e.
Naliu jengniu I alung chariu-e. Naliu jengniu, haijiukha I maran khai mibose mathakhu tarama?
Phuilo, singna maidung Iniu naliu khuga khengbo-e, akum lulo, Idi naliu kummai-e, naliuniu akhuga kammao khaibo wadi ha-e.
Iniu karaiga dechiujiu kawibo chamse naliu khuga dinkhaimi gulo chiubo naliuniu sibamme, sibo tingga I marajiu bambo-e.

Iniu apum kasabo jengniu naliutu kam chariusui khai bidi, naliuniu atu manibo maksai kakhan katiabo thiu makge. Sibosung, naliuniu atu tinggen gu maza khat kum, maksai Khrista Jesu tu kumgapjiu lukhaibi-e.
Siga naliu chun wichang wi-e! Siga degu pad milo? Sibo ting gara naliuniu naliu mik katang ladpad lujiu atu pikhai nibo-e chiubo Iniu din ngamme.
Chiudi tuhoi Iniu naliu khuga majibose dinkhaibo jengniu I hai naliu mikremai thiumi jiuma?

Naliu khuga paliu chun ngutbo thak kamkin maidungse pachangsiak kawibo makge, paliu maning sira wimakge. Paliuniu machunbo sira akhu gasu naliutu lupad mira kambo-e, sichiujiu naliudi paliu khuga naliu chun khai mira machunbo-e.
Tuhoi kawibo lungchun-ga tachun ngut bamsai wi-e, Iniu naliutu maluang bammak tadi sisera majibo-e.
Iniu kungbo anahmaidung yo, naliu lungga Khrista lunlung bammak then, naliu jengniu maipui khatniu ngena lungrabo mathad kumjiu I khengjiu bambo-e.
Tuhoi I naliu khuga bam aruang lujiu, katambo lunlungga tadkhai ni-e. Naliu jengniu alung chariu-chang chariu-e!
Tacheng tajai hangga bamni maidung, naliu khuga Iniu maniubo-e: Tacheng tajai siniu dinbo naliu chiumak jiuma?
Haichiu raokhai bamme, Abraham nahpiu khang-nia bamme, khang khattu kavangpuiniu lungbo, khang khattu Tingwang niu ladriat khaibo saisuijiu khenrang thiubo puiniu lungbo nahpiu si-e.
Siga kavangpui nahpiu sira chamaina lunlung saisuijiu mana-e, chiudi khenrang thiubo pui nahpiu sira Tingwang niu ladriat thiukhaibo gasu manabo-e.

Haibo lamga silura bamme, maipui khangnia hai chamriat nia situ din kada khaibo-e. Kavang lunlungga mana khaibo sira Hagar haisi-e, sichiujiu paniu Sinai Luongga kamkhaibo ladriat situ din kada khai-e.
Hagar haise Arabia dihga bambo Sinai Luongsi-e, haise tuhoi bambo Jerusalem kumbo-e. Sichiujiu pamaidung situ maluang kavang thiu bambo si-e.
Chiudi khenrang thiubo pui sira tinggen Jerusalem si-e, sise aliu pui-e.
Palamra Masanbo ariakga haichiu raokhai bamme:
“Nahkampui panah kahabo pui nachun wilulo,
manara manang makbo pui nachun wijiu senlulo!
Palamra pakina bambo pui suangdi
paronna bambo puiniu nahmai keng nkiu mine.”
Tuhoira singna maidung yo, naliudi Isaac kumjiu ladriat khaibo nahmaidung thiu mide.
Sibo tingga chapum sai suijiu mana khaibo paniu, Tingwang Hiupuina gasu mana khaibo situ mathadbo kum, tuhoidi sikumgap bambo-e.
Chiudi Masanbo ariakniu degu dinlo? Haichiu din-e, “Kavangpui situ panahpiu panaitu hathon milo, delosai kavangpui nahpiuse khenrang thiubo pui nahpiutu majangjiu papiugu kalekse lu macham silakge.”
Sijengniu, singna maidung yo, aliura kavangpui nahdung makge chiudi khenrang thiubo pui nahdung-e.
Aliugu khenrang thiubo hai Khrista niu pikhaibo-e. Sijengniu chap matip lulo, kavang thiulanra nangse suikhai lan talo.
Kinglo! Paul, Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e; naliuniu chagiromra kamkin sai Khrista se naliuleng pageng wadi ha-e.
Iniu naliutu kachan khai lanbo sira paronna chagiromra suikhai sai paniu Tacheng-tajai hina majai kamra suikhaibo-e.
Naliuniu Tacheng-tajai majaiboniu Tingwang khuga kam maji lura matan kinsai Khrista khugasu naliu ronna tampad mibo-e. Tingwang gu lungsiat lenlam naliura bam mibo-e.
Chiudi aliu lengra Tingwang Hiupuina gu pumtan gasu, aliugu malumbo siniu aliutu kam maji khaira khuan bambo-e.
Jesu Khrista khugara chagi rombo, rommakbo, wadi tamsonbo ha-e; chiudi malumbo gasu chalung sajiu tatien thiu kinbo si-e.
Naliura wahina kam mawi bamme! Saoniu naliutu kamajibo situ majaita mira khammi jiulo? Dechiujiu paniu naliutu hiamlu jiulo?
Haise naliutu kupad khaibo Tingwang niu makge.
“Chakhi poi siniu takhui pakhiangnase punglu-e,” chiujiu paliuniu dinbo si-e.

Chiudi Ira naliutu malum mawijiu bambo-e. Aliuniu Rapiu khuga khat thiujiu bambo jengniu, kamakbo jailam atu maningmi lakge chiubo Iniu malumme, sichiujiu naliu lung kam chariu khaibo mai situ Tingwang niu sajai pikhai rabo-e.

Chiudi asingna maidung yo, chagirombo hai kamsiak rabo-e chiujiu Iniu tuhoi tangbo dinron kinsai, dejengniu atu kam chariu bam ralo? Sise majibo-e sai, Iniu Khrista gu singchai lamga dinron bambo gase chariubo dao lakge.
Sichiujiu naliu lung kam chariu kinmaitu pijiu sitiu tadkiu sulo, sichiujiu paliu ronna paliu pum kamshat misulo, sise achun maning-e.
Sijengniu singna maidung yo, naliutu khenrang thiura kulubo-e. Chiudi naliu khenrang thiubo siniu chapumga pajat wiraleng makjiu khat-khattu lungsajiu machalulo.
Delosai ladriat hina chamtan khatniu pitathui khaibo-e. “Nakining maitu napumtu kum lungsa rabo-e.”
Chiudi naliuniu nkan khaoring kumjiu khat khattu kam masajiu khatdi kam mahajiu bamsai, sigase mathing silulo, sichiu maksai naliu khat khattu kam mahakam lubui-e.
Iniu haise dinbo-e: Hiupuina saisui lulo, chiusai naliuniu chapumgu masenbo kamlakge.
Palamra chapumgu masenboniu Hiupuina tu suini makge, khatdi Hiupuina gu masenboniu chapumtu suini makge, naliuniu masenbose kam makra hai kaniase suimakjiu atung bambo-e.
Hiupuina siniu naliutu jukhaijiu bamsai, naliu Tacheng tajai hangga bam makge.
Chiusai chapumniu masenbo sira malapa-e; sisera npui-npiu thiubo, taniabo, disumakbo lunlung, charameng kahumbo, tathoi thinbo hai-e.
Sigasu matai-marengbo, n-gi athaobo, manmabo, chalung pombo, tasao thiubo hai-e. Paliuniu, chamiu mareng thiubo, maithak kasa alibo, kamihlujiu kam masabo,

tiusak maniubo, chamai gibo, khatdi haikumbotu machambo ngam kam bambo mai hina Tingwang gu chawangdihga ngut lakge, chiubo Iniu naliu khuga raijiu kachan khai mibo kumjiu, tuhoidi naliutu haibo lamga kachan khai lanbo-e.
Chiudi Hiupuina rasy sira: lungsabo, mathabo, agi-manaibo, khengsibo, njangbo, kawibo, malumbo, manuanbo, papum thinman lumai si-e. Haikumbotu tacheng tajainiu suimakbo thiu makge.
Khrista Jesu gu thiulu mainiu chapumgu masen-masiabo hina singchaiga genshat mide.
Hiupuina siniu aliu ringting pikhai bide, sichiusai paniu aliu ringting haitu thinman rabo-e.
Aliu chaliangmi tukhe, maksai khat-khattu manmabo, khatdi wajai thiubo, khatdi chalung pombo hai thiuta mikhe.
Asingna maidung yo, mai khatniu kammao mibo silusai, naliu Hiupuina mai, siniu naliu jai wijiu sikumbo maitu kam majilan lulo. Sichiujiu naliudi sikumbo kahiamboga ngut makra phui lulo.
Naliuniu khat-khat bangrip phungkhailo, sichiujiu Khrista gu tacheng-tajai haise majai lulo.
Chiusai mai khatniu patu walun makdi paronna patu maning madimai sira paronna patu sonkinbo-e.
Chiudi mai hina paronna patu ladjan thiu lulo, chiusai mai kakimaitu kada makjiu paronna lamga pazu genglu rabo-e.
Palamra mai hina paron-paronna pabangrip phungkamra-e.
Tingwang ladkeng kati lumai siniu pagu katipao khugasu daolubo kawibo hinase pisikhai lulo.
Naliutu sonmi tulo, Tingwang tu tanui thiuwi makge. Palamra mai khatniu maruk khaibose paniu gelan rabo-e.
Delosai chapumleng marukmai siniu chapumgu kashaibo gelan rabo-e. Hiupuina leng marukmai siniu Hiupuina gasu tingtheng ringbo gesune.
Chiusai kawibo tien thiuboga chariumi dukhe, palamra aliuniu khengsijiu bamsai, pawan wangtangboga aliuniu atiat sune.
Sijengniu pawan kawibo daobo hinaga, mai hina khuga khatdi nkiujiu malumbo kikhun thiubam mai khuga kawibose aliuniu kamlukhe.
Phuilo, aben siakniu pagiak dijiu naliu khuga raokhaibo-e!
Naliutu chagiromra manomjiu kambam mai sira wasao thiujiu lenlam ronna kamkin mai-e, paliura. Khrista gu singchai lamga paliutu mathadkhai makra kamkinbo-e.
Paliuniu chagiromjiu kindi paliura Tacheng-tajai majai kamak maidung-e, chiudi paliuniu naliu pum lamga wasao thiura naliutu pijiu chagirom khaira masenbo-e.
Chiudi Ira aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu singchai jengniu makbo chaliang lakge; palamra pagu singchai jengniu kadihpiri hai akhuga shai mide, sichiujiu I hai kadihpiriga shai mide.
Delosai Khrista Jesu khugara chagirom maidi, rommak maidi wa katam ha-e, chiudi kasanbo gandam thiulubo si-e.
Haibo jaise majai kalumai khuga, agi-manaibo khatdi lungsabo bammi sulo, khatdi Tingwang mai mathiu khuga bammi sulo.
Munkom khaibo thiujiu mai khatniudi atu kam kabuak tamilo, palamra Ira Khrista vangpiu-e chiubo lenra agen-ga pajam bammide.
Singna maidung yo, aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu lungsiat siniu naliu mathiutu maluang khaimi sulo. Amen.
Aliu Piu Tingwang khatdi aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista niu lungsabo, khatdi agi-manaibo naliu khuga pikhaibo thiumi sulo.
