Aliuniu Rapiu Jesu Khrista Piu Tingwang tu thuonkhe! Aliuniu Khrista ga khat thiulubo jengniu paniu tinggen dihgu Hiupuina thoidamse aliutu pikhaijiu thoikhai bide.

Kadih dam makhabo masuang gasu aliu nai Khrista khat thiubo gasu pagu thiulura Tingwang niu aliutu kadalude, sijengniu aliu pama suangga kamaobo hajiu khatdi masanjiu bamrabo-e. Pagu lungsabo jeng gasu
Tingwang niu masuangjiu Rapiu Jesu Khrista pen gasu aliu tu panahmaidung pithiu khaira chapkhai mibo-e—haise paniu machunbo khatdi kapenbo-e.
Aliuniu Tingwang gu kendibo lungsiattu thuonkhe, palamra paniu kakungbo Nahpiu situ aliuleng matha kalen pikhaibi-e.
Palamra aliu khenrang thiura khatdi nuandung kuak khaira pajainiu aliutu liulude, Tingwang gu lungsiat hai dejiukha dilo!
Pagu tasi ningting gasu haijiukha madadkam lakbo hai aliuleng pikiu khai-e! Pagu ningting nai kasibo hinaga
Tingwang maning saisuijiu paniu mahin rangkhai bambose Khrista niu kam tathui khaira aliu khuga pikhai-e.
Tingwang niu ladriat khaibo tingmik wangtangbo nai paniu tinggen ga bambo hina khatdi kadihpiriga bambo mania hina Khrista khuga piwang aruangkam khai rabo-e, siga Khrista niu papee thiu rabo-e.
Tingwang niu rangkalubo khatdi pachun parang saisuijiu nda paphibang gasu aliu pamaidung khat thiulura Khrista pen gasu kada khai mibo-e.
Sichiusai Khrista ga agunjiu khuan bammai aliuniu Tingwang gu kendibo situ thuonjiu bamkhe!
Majibo champao chiubora kawicham chiulubo jengniu juringbo daolujiu naliudi Tingwang nah thiulubo-e. Naliuniu Khrista tu malum lude chiubo madan hai Tingwang niu Masanbo Hiupuina pikhaibo haisi-e.

Hiupuina daolubo hai Tingwang niu pamaidung khuga ladriat khaibo si-e, sichiujiu haisiniu tathuibo khenrang hai Tingwang niu pamaidung leng pikhaine chiubo aliu khuga palingsiak pisi khaibo-e. Pagu kendibo situ aliu thuonkhe!
Palamra, naliuniu Rapiu Jesu tu malum bambo khatdi Tingwang maidungtu naliuniu lungsabo Iniu silubo gasu, naliu jenggasu Tingwang tu thuonjiu khatdi khengboga maningtao tan-tanjiu bambo-e;
sichiujiu aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista khatdi pakendibo Papiu Tingwang siniu pagu ningting khatdi tasigu Hiupuina pikhaijiu naliuniu Tingwang tu silu raleng khengjiu bambo-e.

Sichiujiu naliu lungchun lepadjiu pagu kabenbo ngaolura Iniu kheng-e, sichiujiu paniu naliutu kukhaibogu agunse dejiukha maisuang habo thoidam pamaidung leng ladriat khaibo gulo chiubo naliuniu silura leng-e.
Patu malum lumai aliu khuga pagu pumtan hai dejiukha dilo, chiubo silura Iniu khengbo-e.
Sibo pumtan siniu kashaimai rong gasu Khrista tu piringsu khaijiu patu tinggen dihga paben majatlam pi ntao khaijiu bamme.
Sichiujiu Khrista tu tinggen ga mawang paodung, pumtan thinmai, katanmai, papaomai mathiu riga mawangjiu bamme, sichiujiu tuhoidi, pasai wangkinbo hina rigadi kuthubo zan kuse patu pikhai mide.
Sichiujiu Tingwang niu wa pakhiangna Khrista phihangga khailujiu patu wa pakhiangna pi pithiu khaira, phumlingga pikhaijiu kukachangbo Rapiu pithiu khai mide.
Phumling haise Khrista pum-e, khatdi wa pakhiangnaga machangjiu bambose Tingwang gu tathuibo si-e.
Sibo tingga naliu kadihpirigu lunlung saisuijiu naliu tadbam niu-e; sichiujiu Tingwang kadinpiu makjiu bammai tuhoi tingkai npao kadin piujiu lungkin niu-e.

Pachang siakjiu aliu mathiu hai chapumniu khatdi lungchunniu masenbo kamjiu aliuniu maningbo khatdi machunbo kamjiu lungbam niu-e, sichiujiu aliu lunlungga, aliudi maidung kakimai kumjiu Tingwang lungpomga lungbam niu-e.
Chiudi Tingwang lungsiatse pamalan thiumakjiu bamme, khatdi paniu aliu tu lungsabo hai dichang-di ye,
sijeng gasu aliu niu kadin piumakjiu hiuna ga shaijiu bambo gasu Khrista pen niu aliu tu karingbo ga phungwang khai-e.Tingwang lungsiat penniu naliutu rankhai mide.
Chiujiu aliutu pi Khrista nai ringsu ncham lujiu, tinggen dihga Khrista Jesu bamga aliutu mawang machamra kamkhai mide.
Sise Khrista Jesu gasu aliutu chalungsa khaibo jengniu pagu lungsiat pamalan thiumakbo, haise chaken machangnaga lungwang mai tudi pijiu silu raleng-e.
Palamra Tingwang lungsiat pen gasu malum lubo naliutu rankhai mide. Haise naliuniu matan lubo makge, chiudi Tingwang gu kalen-e, sichiujiu haibo lamga mai khat niudi chaliangmi mak rabo-e.
Aliuniu kawibo tien thiulura Tingwang niu aliutu Khrista Jesu nai damkhai mibo-e, sise paniu aliuleng macha masuang khai mibo si-e.
Sijengniu naliu maningtao lulo, ndara Jehudi mai paliu ronna “chagirom mai-e” chiujiu kumaidung siniu naliu Nkengmai situ “chagirom kamakmai-e” chiujiu kubam niu-e.

Sibo tinggara naliu Khrista khugasu tamsin bamniu-e. Naliu sangmaidung thiujiu khatdi Tingwang niu kada khaibo mai thiu makjiu, khatdi ladriat khaibo gadi naliu dam hajiu bamniu-e. Sichiujiu naliuniu agunbodi hajiu, naliu lungga Tingwang kahabo kumjiu lungbam niu-e.
Ndara naliu hai diuchang diujiu bamniubo-e,chiudi tuhoira Khrista Jesu pen ganiu naliutu juwang mana khai bide. Haise Khrista niu shaikhaibo jengniu-e.
Palamra Khrista papumsiakniu Jehudi mai nai aliutu khat thiukhaijiu agi-manaibose pikhai bide. Papum siniu kamtam bambo singbeng situ kampang khaijiu niasitu khat pithiu khai mide.
Sichiujiu paniu niasitu pakhuga kasanbo mai pithiu khai raleng agi-manaibo thiu khai mibo-e.
Paniu Singchai riga shaikhaibo siniu paliugu mikrebo situ kam maha khai-e; singchai siniu jat nia situ khat pithiu khailujiu Tingwang khuga puiwang khai-e.
Sijengniu Khrista niu wanglujiu diujiu bambo Nkengmai naliu khugadi, najiu bambo Jehudi maidung paliu khugadi agi-manaibo kawicham dinron khaide.
Sichiujiu Khrista jengniu aliu mathiu, Jehudi maidi Nkengmaidi Papiu bamga Hiupuina khat pen ganiu wanglura suikhai mide.
Sijengniu tuhoira naliu kadih katammai nahdung maksai sangmai thiulan tamide, tuhoira naliu hai dihkhunmai khatdi Tingwang kikhunmai thiu mide.
Sichiujiu Khrista Jesu niu kamikgu madanbo tiangdi thiujiu, naliu hai ladlangtadmai khatdi phaimiukakung mainiu kaphung donkhaibo riga thiukhai mide.
Pahai chaky thiukhaibo mania hinatu palun piwikhaijiu khatdi thiu aruang khaijiu bambo Tingwang khuga masanbo raky kadkhai mibo si-e.
Patu khat thiu lubo gasu naliu tudi maidungtu pi aruang khai lujiu Hiupuina pen gasu Tingwang lungrabo bamleng thiu khai mide.
Haijengniu naliu Nkengmai sung Khrista Jesu vang thiukinbo Paul Iniu khengbo-e,
Tingwang gu lungsiat penniu naliuleng wilura haibo tien thiura atu pikhai-e chiubo naliu chiumide.
Tingwang niu pagu kakungbo tenrang hai atu madulen khaijiu pisikhaibo-e. (Iniu haibo lamga poinakha raokhai mibo-e.
Iniu raokhai mibose naliuniu kensai, Khrista gu kakungbo, Iniu silubose naliudi silubui-e).
Haibogu kakungbose karaiga chamaina khuga pisikhai makbo-e, chiudi tuhoira Hiupuina pen gasu pagu masanbo ladlangtadmaidung khatdi phaimiu-kakungdung khuga pisikhai mibo-e.
Kakungbo chiubo sira kawicham gasu Nkengmai tadi Tingwang gu thoidam hai Jehudimai panai dao macham lude, sichiujiu pumkhat thiu lujiu Khrista pen gasu Tingwang niu ladriat khaibose dao macham lude.
Tingwang gu nkiubo kalen siniu, chiubora pagu pumtan gasu kawicham hai machara atu pikhaibo-e.
Tingwang mai mathiu ruangga I hai siamthubo-e, chiudi Khrista gu pamalan thiumakbo lungwat lamga Kawicham hai Nkengmai khuga phungtadra Tingwang niu atu pikhaibo-e.
Wahinatu Dampao Tingwang niu pagu kakungbo tenrangse nda gasu baikhai kabam gu-e,sichiujiu, Jesu Khrista pen gasu mai hina ngaolu raleng-e,
sichiujiu, tuhoi ken-ga, phumling hainiu, mazagu mawangpao hainiu khatdi tinggen ga pumtan thin maidung hainiu pagu tasi-ningting hai katam tambo jai gasu silu raleng-e.
Tingwang niu pagu tingtheng ringbo tien hai aliu Rapiu Khrista Jesu pen gasu kamkhai mibo-e.
Aliuniu patu malumbo jengniu Khrista tu khat thiulujiu Tingwang masuangga hujiu malum mawijiu tadlu bui-e.
Sijengniu Iniu naliu jengniu chariu kinbotu maning lujiu naliu lung nkhinmi tulo, sise naliuleng genglu raleng-e chiujiu Iniu naliu khuga khengbo-e.
Sijengniu aliu Piu masuangga I khudung kiulujiu, tinggen kikhun mai hina khatdi kadihga lungmai hinaniu pazan masanbo daolura leng khengbo-e.
Delosai paken kadibo chakhiu haise pagu Hiupuina pen gasu naliuleng pikhaira sichiujiu naliu lungchun tanjiu chaplura Iniu Tingwang khuga khengbo-e.
Sichiujiu malumbo pen gasu naliu lungga Khrista ky pithiu lura Iniu khengbo-e, khatdi lungsabo gase naliu men jang matip lura Iniu khengbo-e.
Sichiujiu masan maidung naliu mathiu khat thiu lujiu, Khrista gu lungsiat hai dejiukha dilo, thenglo, kulo, khatdi suklo chiubo pumtan silura leng-e.
Yo, naliuniu pagu lungsabo haitu, pakhiangna sikam lulak tadi, silu raleng Iniu khengbo-e. Sichiujiu Tingwang gu lunlung haise tathuijiu bamlu raleng-e.
Aliuniu maningbo khatdi khengbo suang nkiujiu pagu pumtanniu kam ngam lubui-e, sichiujiu Tingwang khuga kendibo hai, phumlingga khatdi Khrista Jesu khuga tingtheng, tingtheng thiu milo! Amen.
Sijengniu aliu Rapiu jenggasu kavang thiu kinbo Iniu naliu khuga kheng-e, naliutu kukhaibogu kabuimai thiulura lunglulo.
Sichiujiu pawan machang chalung manuanbo, njangbo khatdi khengsibo ga lunglulo. Naliuniu khat-khattu kasut sijiu naliugu lungsabo len lulo.
Agi-manaijiu naliutu rat aruang khaibo Hiupuina pen gasu khat thiubo situ majai luraleng matan lulo.
Naliutu Tingwang niu kukhaibo agun khat bambo kumjiu, chapum khat Hiupuina khat bamme.
Aliu Rapiu khat, malumbo khat, khatdi tadui nphumbo khat bamme.
Siga Tingwang khat, khatdi wahina Piu thiubo khat pakhiangna riga machangjiu khatdi pakhiangnagu Rapiu bamme.
Sichiujiu aliu mai hina leng kabuibo saisuijiu Khrista gu kalen hai pikhai bide.
Haise Masanbo ariakniu dinbo si-e,
“Paniu kakulam khangbo tingga, bangkhai bambo maidung kakengtu puikhang mide;
sichiujiu maidung leng kalen hai pikhaide.”
Chiusai tuhoira “paniu kakulam khangbo,” chiubo ramba hai delo? Haisira paniu raijiu n-hangbo kadih hangga kiukhai mide chiubo-e.
Sijengniu kiukhai mibo paniu tinggen dihga khanglujiu, ting-kadih pakhiangnatu piphui khaira leng-e.

Sichiujiu “maidungleng kalen hai pikhaibo-e.” Sichiujiu paniu khangsiatu ladlangtadmai, khangsiatu phaimiukakungmai, khangsiatu dinronmai, khangsiatu mily khuanmai, khatdi khangsiatu katipao thiura pikhai-e.
Khrista pum hai thiusuboga, Tingwang maidung siniu Khristian tien thiujiu lunglu raleng paniu macha khaibo-e.
Sichiujiu malumbo gasu Tingwang Nahpiu gu ningting-tasiga aliu khat thiujiu, Khrista lunlungga kabuimai thiulu raleng-e.
Sichiusai paliu ru kasamai siniu aliutu katikhaibo tingkai niu hunpad hun-ngut bambo khatdi duiliu katanboga lungbambo nahdung kumjiu lungta mikhe.
Sichiu makjiu, lungsaboniu majibo dinjiu, wahinaga papee thiubo Khrista khuga mawui khangjiu bamkhe.
Apumgu mania hina khai aruang bambo khatdi ncheng hina mathuk khai aruang lujiu paniu thin bambo-e, Sijengniu tam-tamjiu kambo hina hai lungsabo gasu aliu mawui khangjiu bamkhe.
Rapiu zan gasu Iniu naliutu rukhai-e, chiubora nkengmainiu paliu chun rongjiu tad bambo kum naliura lunglan talo.
Paliu lungse tamiuboga bambo-e, Tingwang niu pikhaibo ringting gase paliu dam ha-e, palamra paliuse wadi simakge khatdi paliu lung tanchang tan-e,
Paliura mangambotu simak jingjiu masan kamakbo tien hinatu kamni lenglakjiu, paliu ronna paliu pumtu ka-makhaboga pikhaijiu bambo-e.
Chiudi naliuniu Khrista racham katilubo sira haichiu makge.
Naliuniu palamga chiukhai mibo-e, khatdi pasaisui maidungtu kumjiu Jesu khuga bambo majibose naliu khuga katikhai mibo-e.
Sijengniu naliugu kaguangbo lunlung khatdi naliu suan kasabo hinase thon milo.
Naliu lungchun nai maning hai kam masansiak mirabo-e,
sichiujiu Tingwang lunlung kumjiu, majibo nai masanbose lenkhaibo kumjiu kasanbo lunlung gase naliu lungrabo-e.
Naliu lungpomdi, nuan kamtangmi tulo, khatdi naliu lung pomboniu naimik pijiu n-ngutmi tulo.
Satan bamleng pimane.
Maigu sontiu maidi, sontiu lan talo, chiudi sibosung pabenniu wa kawi kam lujiu pageng kabam maitu pipad lura matan lulo.
Nking kasabo lad wadaodi naliu mun ganiu dinpat mane, chiudi naliu cham kachiumai hina lungchun kimlura, din kabuibo lad ronna dinlulo.
Sichiujiu Tingwang gu Masanbo Hiupuina tu kam chariu tulo, palamra naliutu ranlurabo Tingmik tangbo paniu naliu riga madan thiujiu diangkhai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu lungpom kasabo, maji makbo lungchun, aladthang kasabo, tania senbo, maitu manmajiu maiken tiabo hina haise naliu khugasu luthon milo.
Sibosung, naliuniu khat khattu lungchun manuonjiu lungsa silulo, khatdi Tingwang niu Khrista pen gasu naliutu kuak khaibo kumjiu,naliudi khatniu khattu kuak khai lulo.
Naliu hai Tingwang gu kakungbo nahdung thiulubo donniu, pakum lura matan lulo.
Chiusai Khrista niu aliutu lungsajiu, aliu jengniu pagu ringting hai Tingwang khuga parim kawibo rathak mania thiujiu pikhaibo kumjiu naliudi lungsaboga lunglulo.
Naliu hai Tingwang mai thiu mibo jengniu, kamakhabo, npui-npiu thiubo, disu makbo, patiuni kasabo kumbo hai naliu ruangga din tulo.
Sironna makjiu taniabo ladliu, taphanbo ladliu, maksai arabo lad hina dinbui makge. Chiudi sibosung Tingwang tu thuonkiu lulo.
Chiusai kamakhamai, masan kamakmai khatdi patiuni kasamai hinase Khrista khatdi Tingwang gu chawang dihga padam ha-e, chiubo haise naliu silulo.
Mai khatniudi naliutu wadi makbo ladniu sonmi tulo, palamra pacham majai kamak maidung riga Tingwang lungpom wangrabo-e.
Sijengniu paliutu majangra wakhatdi pageng ha-e.
Delosai nda tingra naliudi tamiuboga bamniu-e chiudi tuhoira Tingwang maidung thiumibo jengniu, kabenboga naliu bammide. Sijengniu kabenbo nahdung kumjiu lunglulo,
palamra kabenbo siniu kawibo, tacheng matipbo khatdi majibo rasy hinase phungwangbo-e.
Sijengniu Rapiu niu lunibo hinase matan lulo.
Sichiujiu tamiuboga lungmaidung, pageng hamaidungtu majang chaka thiutulo. Sibosung paliu maomeng dinlen bilo.
(Palamra paliuniu mahin kambo tiense dinlenra katangdi mangambo-e).
Wahinase kabenboga phungwang sai, paliugu majibo lunlungse madupadmi rabo-e;
palamra masan siakjiu madukhai mibo hinase kabenbo thiumi rabo-e. Sijengniu haichiu din-e,
“Jitzing bambo nang buangsu milo,
khatdi kashaimai ruang gasu sumilo,
chiusai Khrista niu thaoben khai rabo-e.”
Sijengniu naliuniu kapangmai kum makjiu, ningtingmai kumjiu dechiu tadralo chiubo phui sonna lulo.
Pawan hina thin mawi silo, palamra pawan hai sa-e.
Sijengniu naliu kapangmai thiu makjiu, chiudi Rapiu niu naliutu degu pikam khai milo chiubo phui lulo.
Chiusai jaw sak maniu tulo, siniu natu kam maharabo ronna-e, sibosung Hiupuina niu phuilulo.
Sichiujiu luichang, tathoilui, khatdi Hiupuina luiniu khatniu khat khuga thiu dinlo; khatdi Rapiu khuga luichang nai tathoilui thiujiu naliu lungchun siak ganiu patu thuon lulo.
Wahina jengniu, aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista zan gasu pawan machang Papiu Tingwang tu thuon lulo.
Naliuniu Khrista tu chakhuang thiubo jengniu khat-khat hangga lunglulo.
Palamra Khrista papumsiakniu phumlinggu Ranpao thiulujiu, phumling pee thiubo kumjiu pakina kathiumaidi panao pee thiubo-e.
Sijengniu phumlingniu Khrista hangga kabambo kumjiu, mainao kathiumaidi wahinaga paliu kina hangga bamsi lulo.
Sise paniu ladkeng gasu phumlingtu taduiniu nkhiu masanlujiu Tingwang khuga kadkhai mibo-e.
Haichiujiu phumlingtu paronna palun piwi khaijiu, kam masanjiu khatdi khanra-tiakra hajiu, pajam-para thiu makjiu pakhuga pikhai lura leng-e.
Sikumjiu maikinadung siniu paliu ronna, paliu pumtu lungsabo kumjiu paliu naotu lungsa rabo-e. Panaotu lungsabo maise paronna patu lungsabo-e.
(Palamra aliuniu aliu pumtu mareng makge. Khrista niu phumlingtu manang khaibo kumjiu aliudi aliu pumtu manangjiu makuat khai-e.
Palamra aliu hai papumgu maniadung-e).
Sijengniu Masanbo ariakniu din-e, “Npiumai khatniu papui papiutu phut lujiu panaotu majang lung aruang rabo-e; sichiujiu panai khangniase pumkhat thiumi rabo-e.”
Tacham haise sukchang sukbo majibo-e, haise Khrista nai phumling alitu Ira kadin gu-e.
Chiudi haise naliu lengdi din suibo-e, maikina hinadi paliu pumtu lungsabo kumjiu paliu naotu lungsa lulo, khatdi mainao kathiumaidi paliu kinatu chakhuang thiu lulo.
“Napui napiutu chakhuang thiu lulo; haise ladriat nai chamtan karaibo si-e:
sichiusai wahinaga naleng wirabo-e, khatdi kadihriga ringtheng rabo-e.”
Naliutu phuibambo lon kambo kumjiu chamai mik ngaoleng ronna kambo makjiu, Khrista gu vangmai kumjiu nalungchun gasu pachangjiu Tingwang chun maning kamlulo.
Chamainatu machabo kum makjiu, Rapiu tu machabo kumjiu, chunwijiu naliu tien thiululo.
Kavang maidi khenrang thiumaidi, mai hinatu pagu-gu tienkam saisuijiu Rapiu niu tathuon pirabo-e chiubo maningtao lulo.
Kanamboga, Rapiu tu khat thiulujiu pagu pumtan pen gasu naliu pumtan thiu lulo.
Naliuniu Satan gu paru kasabotu sun-ngamlu raleng, Tingwang ripuan hina piululo.

Palamra aliuniu aphenrabo hai tazaipum riga makge, chiudi tinggen ga bambo hiupuina pumtandung riga, mawang paodung riga, pumtan thinmaidung riga, khatdi haibo tamiubo kadihpirigu pumtandung riga aphenrabo-e.
Sijengniu tuhoira Tingwang gu ripuanse thinsulo! Sichiujiu kasabo tingmikse wangsai, naliuniu mikremaigu aphen wangbo situ asun ngamme, sichiujiu chari thiulubo saiga naliu chap ngam lubui-e.
sigasu agi-manaibogu Kawicham dinronra kaden lubo siniu, naliu phitop thiululo.
Sichiujiu pawan machang malumbogu chageese thinlujiu chap lulo; siseniu kasabogu chami taobambo ngiu phenwangbo situ naliuniu kammit lubui-e.
Juringbogu chari pirun khatdi Tingwang ladkeng thiubo Hiupuina gu apanghengse thinsu lulo.
Tingwang niu nkha khaira pawan machang khenglulo. Hiupuina niu jukhaibo saisuijiu kakheng thiululo. Haijeng gasu wadaodi saomi makjiu, ningting-charak sijiu Tingwang maidung hinaleng khengjiu bamlo.
Sichiujiu kawichamse Iniu hujiu din ngamlura khatdi Tingwang niu pagu champaose atu pikhaira, alengdi kakheng thiu khailo.
Tuhoi I kavangkyga bamdi, kawicham jengniu Ira dihsungpao khat thiubambo-e. Iniu dinrabo kawichamse hujiu dintang lura aleng khengkhailo.
Naliuniu aliu racham silura khatdi naliutu kachukhai raleng, Iniu patu naliu khuga langkhaibo-e.
Singnamaidung mathiutu, aliu Piu Tingwang gu khatdi Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu agi-manaibo, khatdi malumbo nai lungsabo siniu maluang bambo thiu milo.
Aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu halan makrabo lungsiat situ lungsamai hina khuga Tingwang gu lungsiatniu maluang khaibo thiu milo.
Aliu Piu Tingwang khatdi Rapiu Jesu Khrista niu naliutu lungsabo nai agi-manaibo pikhaibo thiu milo.
Iniu naliutu maningtaobo wan machang Tingwang tu thuonjiu bamme.
Iniu naliuleng khengbo hinaga achun wijiu khengbambo-e.
Delosai naliuniu kawicham malum kalubo nai ganiu tuhoi katang, kawicham dinbogu atu nkha khaijiu bambo-e.
Sichiujiu naliu khuga kawibo ngam kamsu khai mibo Tingwang siniu kamphu khaijiu Jesu Khrista wangbo Nai tangjiu sise kamtang khaine chiubo Iniu masanjiu si-e.

Naliu hai pawan machang alungchun-ga bamme. Haichiujiu naliu jengniu, Iniu maning bambo hai majibo-e, palamra Iniu kavangkyga bamdi, kawicham dinjiu kam matip khaibo tinggadi, Tingwang niu atu pikhaibo gase naliuniu padam lutao machamjiu bambo-e.
Jesu Khrista niu pikhaibo lungchun gasu wangbo alungchun hai pachangjiu dinkhaibo-e chiubo Tingwang niu sibamme.
Sichiujiu majibo tasi nai tathuibo ladjan gadi naliugu chalungsabo hai nkiu mid-midjiu khangbamra Iniu kheng-e,
Sichiusai withubo situ kadalu raleng-e. Sichiujiu Khrista Tingmik gase taniabo khatdi masan makbo hina gasu naliutu khenrang thiukhai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu naliugu ringting hai Tingwang ken kam madira khatdi patu thuon raleng, Jesu Khrista ronna pikhai ngambo palingbo kawibo jai-ali siniu naliu ringting piphui khai rabo-e.
Asingna maidung, akhuga pad kabambo hai kawicham tensan padra nkha khaibo-e chiubo naliuniu sikhaira Iniu machunbo-e.
Haichiujiu atu bangbambo hai, I Khrista vangmai-e chiubo chawangkiningga bambo akhemai hina, khatdi pabam machang hinaga sibambo-e.
Sichiujiu atu bangbambo jengniu Rapiu tu malum bambo singnamai hinaniu pingbo hajiu Tingwang lad dinra hubi-bijiu bamme.
Khrista gu kawicham dinronbo gahai khangsia mainiu manmajiu khatdi ari-arajiu bamme, chiudi khangsia mainiu kawi maningjiu dinron bamme.
Paliuniu haise lungsabo gasu kam bambo-e, palamra Tingwang gu kawicham dinra atu pikhai-e chiubo paliuniu si-e.
Chiudi khangsia maira, atu bangkhai nbamboga kam chariukhai nibo jengniu paleng sibo lungchun gasu Khrista cham hai dinron-e.
Sise wadi makge! Palam hinaga—pajibo gadi, paji makbo gadi, Khrista cham dinron bamboga, Ira achun wi-e.
Palamra naliuniu kakheng thiukhaibo gasu khatdi Jesu Khrista niu Hiupuina pikhaibo nkha gasu atu phutkhai rabo-e, chiubo I si-e.

Iniu machunbo nai ramgunbo sira, agu ngiudon hinaga Iniu wakamdi maomi makra, sichiujiu Iniu shaimi tadi, ringbam tadi, apum pakhiangna Khrista leng maken dibo phungwang lura, alung nkhinmi makjiu bambo-e.
Palamra ringting hai delo? Iniu ringbambo hai Khrista leng-e, khatdi shamidi geng nkiu rabo-e.
Chiudi ringjiu bambo hainiu geng nkiu lura bamsai, Iniu kada sonra makge.
Haibo kakga atu kabinman bamme, haibo ringtingtu phut lujiu Khrista tu maluang bam machammi nibo-e, siniu wi-nkiu rabo-e.
Chiudi I ring bambo hai naliu lengra geng nkiu-e.
Naliuniu malumboga chunwi bamra khatdi wi-nkiu khangra naliu mathiutu maluang macham bamne chiubo masanjiu Iniu si-e,
Sichiujiu Iniu naliu khuga wanglanboga Jesu Khrista khuga ajengniu naliu chunwi nkiu raleng-e.

Naliu lunlungse Khrista ga kawicham leng kabuibo thiululo; sichiujiu Iniu naliutu zungaodi, zungao makdi, naliuniu chunkhat, lungkhat, thiujiu kawicham gasu malumboga, chap matip bamme chiubo naliu lamga Iniu chiu rabo-e.
Mikre maitu wadaodi pingmi tulo; pawan machang hujiu bamlo, sichiusai paliu hakiumi rabo-e, chiudi naliuniu ngamrabo-e, palamra chari ngambo hai Tingwang niu pikhaibo-e.
Palamra naliuniu patu malumbo gasu machabo ronna makjiu, paleng chariukheng khaira lengdi suikhai mibo-e.
Tuhoira naliuniu atu maluang aphenbo suide. Haise karaigadi naliuniu chiumibo kumjiu ngaomibo si-e, tuhoidi Iniu aphenjiu bambo-e.
Khrista ga naliu ringting hai pitankhai lulo, sichiusai palungsiat siniu naliutu pikim khai rabo-e. Naliuniu Hiupuinaga chakin thiulude, sijengniu khat khattu lungsajiu lukhai lude.
Sijengniu chunkhat lujiu khatdi lungsabo siniu chunkhat, lungkhat thiu lujiu achun kam mawi phu khaira Iniu khengbo-e.
Naliu paleng-leng ronna phiu makjiu, khatdi wasao thiujiu wakhatdi kam tulo, chiudi lung manuanjiu, naliu suang naliu kamai siniu widiang-e chiubo maning lulo.
Sichiujiu naliuleng ronna maningniu makjiu, khat khatleng maning khailo.
Naliuniu majai rabo lunlung sira Khrista Jesu gu lunlung si-e:
Pakhuga Tingwang lunlungse bamme,
chiudi pahai Tingwang nai machamme chiubo maningmi makge.
Chiudi chamai thiujiu kavang khat kumjiu
pahai chamaina lunlungga lungwang mibo-e.
Paniu lung manuanbo npuiga tadjiu kashaibo tangna kadin piukhaide;
sichiujiu singchai riga shaikhai mide.
Haijengniu, patu ku kachangbo bamga, Tingwang niu lukhang khaijiu,
tazan hina rong gasu dithubo zanse patu pikhai mide.
tinggen lamdi, kadihpiri gadi, sibo lungga
gandam hinaniu khudungkiu rabo-e.
Sichiujiu Papiu Tingwang ken dilura, jat hina, khatdi chakhuan hina siniu
‘Jesu Khrista hai Rapiu si-e’ chiujiu din madupad rabo-e.

Sijengniu, singna kungmai yo, naliu khuga I bambo tingga naliuniu acham majaibo kumjiu, tuhoi naliu khugasu I diujiu bammi tadi acham majai khailo. Sichiujiu naliugu juringbose tathui lura pingjiu khatdi manang sijiu Tingwang chun kamlulo,
delosai pachun maning kamlura khatdi pacham majai lura Tingwang niu pawan machang naliu khuga tatien thiujiu bamme.
Maitu khan makjiu khatdi ari makjiu wahina kam lulo,

chiusai naliuniu haibo kadihpiriga nuan phungmai khatdi kasamai ruanggasu naliu maomeng hajiu Tingwang nahmai thiulu bui-e. Sichiujiu naliuniu karingbo chamse dinboga tingpukga chagandung kumjiu paliu ruangga thaoben khai rabo-e.
Naliuniu sichiu bamsai, Khrista gu Tingmik gase I adiu wirabo-e, palamra Iniu alaisang padjiu maran kinbose mathakhumi makge chiubo madukhai rabo-e.
Sichiusai naliu malumniu Tingwang khuga kadkhaibo rathak mania gase agu ringting zai haidi jaokhai mibo-e. Sichiusai, achun wibo khatdi ringabo gase naliu mathiu daolu rabo-e.
Sikumjiu naliudi chunwi bamlulo, sichiujiu naliugu ringabose akhuga bamme.
Rapiu chun-e sai, naliu racham silujiu achun wilura jengniu, Timothy tu naliu khuga langwang majira I maning bamme.
Palamra naliuleng manang khaira achun ka-kajonmai hai paronna-e.
Kakimaidung sira Jesu Khrista tu makjiu paliuleng ronna phiukin mai-e.
Delosai anaira papiu panah kumjiu majanglu kawicham dinronjiu pageng kabambose padi lunglen khai mibose naliuniu sibamme.
Sijengniu ariga dechiu suralo, chiubo siji-siri Iniu patu langkhaira maning bamme.
Khatdi I apumsiak wangji luradi Rapiu khuga malumjiu bamme.
Akhuga bamjiu maluang tatien thiubambo, khatdi aphenjiu bambo, naliu tadjiu bambo khatdi nkha khaijiu bambo, aliu singna, Epaphroditus tu naliu khuga langkhaira maning bamme.
Padi naliutu ngaokhaini siakjiu bamme, palamra pah marajiu bamme chiubo naliuniu chiulubo jengniu-e.
Pachang siakjiu pase shaira kumjiu marakhai kamigu-e, chiudi Tingwang niu patudi, atudi lungsakhai bibo-e, sichiujiu chariu magenthiubo gasu paniu kalankhai bibo-e.
Sichiujiu naliuniu patu ngaolan lujiu naliu chun wilura khatdi alung chariubo nkhin lura jengniu patu Iniu naliu khuga langkhai kinbo-e.
Sijengniu naliudi Rapiu zan ganiu naliu chunwijiu singnamai khattu kumjiu patu lukhailo, khatdi haikumbo maitu chakhuang thiu lulo.
Palamra Khrista ngam kamrabo jengniu khatdi naliuniu atu maluang kamni bamdi, kamlu lakjiu bambose paniu kamra paringting maja makjiu, kashai katang pikhai mibo-e.
Kanamboga asingnamai yo, Rapiu khuga chunwijiu bam lulo, naliu khuga raokhai mibose raolanra alung makbo thiu makge, haise naliuleng wilu raleng-e.
Maitu kam masa kinbo thidung khugasu mari lulo, paliura maidung situ chagiromra matan kinmaidung-e.

Paliu makjiu, aliu hai palingsiakbo chagirom maidung-e palamra, Hiupuina pen gasu aliuniu Tingwang tu kahumme, khatdi Jesu Khrista khuga khat thiu lujiu chunwi kinmai-e. Aliura lenlamgu racheng situ malumbo makge.
Mai khatniu sikumbo lenlam racheng situ malum kinsai, Iniu nkiudiangjiu paliu suang malum rabo siakge.
Atu manalubo sai patachadbo nai chagirom lubo, Israel mai, Benjamin kiriang ganiu lungbo Hebrew mai zai ganiu atu manabo-e. Tacheng-tajai lam maning khaisai Ira Pharisee mai-e.
Chaliu karaobo lam chakwang lansai, Iniu phumlingtu kam mathad kathubo mai-e, khatdi tacheng-tajai situ majaijiu tacheng wibo lamgara amao wakhatdi ha-e.
Chiudi nda geng-e khatdi wi-e chiujiu Iniu chakkinbo hinase, tuhoira Khrista jengniu pakhiangnase mathakhu mide.

Sise ronna makge, Rapiu Khrista Jesu gu ningting tasi jengniu wahinase pageng hamide chiubo Iniu maningtao lude. Khrista jenggasu Iniu wahina thon mide, sichiujiu Iniu patu daolura jengniu wahinase walengdi chaksonta mide.
Sichiujiu Tacheng-tajai majaibo gase aronna matanbo makjiu Khrista tu malumbo ganiu-e, khatdi tacheng matipbose Tingwang tu malumbo gasu wangbo-e.
Iniu masenbo sira Khrista tu khatdi pagu ringsulanbo pumtan sigasu pagu magenthiu chariubo kheng machamjiu paniu shaibo kum shaikhai raleng situ-e,
sichiujiu atudi kashaibo gasu piringsu khailan rabo-e.
Iniu ngam lude, maksai tathui mide chiubo makge; chiudi Khrista Jesu niu aleng ngamkhai mibo jengniu, sibogu tathuonse Iniu daolura matan bambo-e.
Agu singna maidung yo, tathuonse Iniu daolude chiubo makge, chiudi Iniu sailam bambo situ mangai lujiu, asuanglam bambo situ alai padjiu hawang kinbo-e.
Sijengniu Khrista Jesu pen ganiu Tingwang niu kukhaibo tathuonse daolu raleng machunbo lam majijiu pak kinbo-e.
Aliu Hiupuina ga pasiu chap kamimai hina haichiujiu bamkhe, chiudi naliu khangsia mainiu wa katambo lungchun bamsai, Tingwang niu naliutu masanjiu dinlen milo.
Chiudi aliuniu tuhoi tangbo tadwang mibo kum tadjiu bamkhe.
Haise Iniu naliu khuga malenna dinkhai mibo-e, sise tuhoidi Iniu amatui padjiu dinkhai lanbo-e; chiubora maidung kakeng sira Khrista niu singchai riga shaikhai mibo situ mikre maidung-e.

Paliura kanamboga charuidihga hakhai mirabo-e, palamra paliu ra sira paliu pumniu masenbo si-e. Mangam rabo gase paliura wasao thiu kin-e, sichiujiu paliura kadihpirigu lunlungtu ronna machun kinbo-e.
Chiudi aliura tinggen maidung-e, sijengniu Ranpao, Rapiu Jesu Khrista niu tinggen lamsu kiurabo situ khuanjiu bamkhe.
Paniu wahinatu mawangrabo pagu pumtan siniu, pagu kendibo pum kumjiu, aliugu hasui rabo kasonbo pum haitu kam kali khai rabo-e.

Sijengniu, Iniu kungjiu khatdi ngaokhai nijiu bambo asingna kakungmai! Naliuniu atu dejiukha achun kam mawi khailo, khatdi naliu jenggasu Iniu dejiukha achun wijiu asao thiu bamlo! Sijengniu kakungbo singnadung yo, Rapiu ga matipjiu chap bamlo.
Rapiu ga chunkhat thiujiu Euodia nai Syntyche tu Rapiu ga singnapuidung kumjiu lukhaira naliu khuga khengkhaibo-e.

Yo, tatien thiu macham bammai nakhuga Iniu khengbo-e, maipuidung haitu nkha khailo, palamra Clement tu maluang lujiu kawicham dinronboga, aliu kahmaidung paliu zan Tingwang gu karingbo ariakkhuangga raokhai mibo maidungtu maluang tatien thiu macham khai mibo-e.
Pawan machang Rapiu ga chunwi bamlo, Iniu dinlan lanbo-e chunwijiu bamlo.
Naliu lungchun manuanbose mai hinaniu simi sulo. Rapiu hai wangji sune.
Wadi manang tulo, chiudi palam hinaga thuonbo jaojiu kakheng thiujiu naliuniu lunibo hina Tingwang khuga paokhaijiu bamlo.
Sichiusai Tingwang gu agi-manaibo, chamaina ningting suang nkiubo Khrista Jesu siniu naliu lungchun khatdi naliu maningtu gukhai bine.
Kanamboga singna maidung yo, kawibo hina khatdi thuonkiu buibo hinaga: majibo, lungchun dibo, nchangbo, masanbo, lungsabo, khatdi chakhuang thiubo hina hainiu naliu lungchun phuijiu bamlulo.
Naliuniu akhu gasu silubo khatdi daolubo, hinase chalad gadi, tatien gadi, wahinaga ali lulo. Sichiusai agi-manaibo pikhaibo Tingwang niu naliutu majang khai bine.
Naliuniu ajeng gasu maning khaibo jengniu Rapiu khuga achun wichang wi-e, naliuniu pachang palingjiu maningbam tadi pajat kawibo naliuleng habo donniu-e.
Aleng changmakbo jengniu dinbo makge, palamra agu kabambo siniu aleng kabuibose thiu bamme.
Dechiujiu nkhin kiuralo chiubo, maksai dechiujiu kengkhang ralo chiubo I si-e, walam hinaga khatdi pabam hinaga magiubo gadi, mariubo gadi, kengbo gadi, tambo gadi, kakungbose Iniu sibambo-e.
Khrista niu aleng pikhaibo pumtan pen gasu palam hinaga Iniu chap lubui-e.
Chiudi agu chariubo gahai, naliuniu atu nkha khaibo hai wichang wi-e.

Iniu Macedonia gasu tadpadjiu kawicham dinron subo tingga naliu Philippi mai phumling ronna atu nkha khaibo-e chiubo naliuniu masanjiu sibambo-e; naliu ronna agu kagengbo gadi, kahabo gadi padam lumacham bambo-e.
Iniu wa kalentu ronna masen sonbo makge, chiudi naliuleng kagengbo nkiu lura masenbo-e.

Sichiujiu Iniu pakhiangna daolude, khatdi machang kamakbo hade. Naliuniu pi wangbo mania hina hai parim wibo khatdi Tingwang niu suikhaibo, pachun kimbo rathak mania kumjiu, Epaphroditus khugasu daolude.
Sichiujiu naliuleng pageng kabambo hina Khrista Jesu penniu pagu pamalan thiu makbo chakhiu saisuijiu, a-Rawang niu pikhai bine.
Tuhoira aliu Piu Tingwang khuga tingtheng tingthengjiu paken kadibo thiu milo! Amen.
Khrista Jesu ga Tingwang mai hinatu kanui khai-e. Iniu haiga maluang bambo singnadungniu naliutu kanui khai-e.
Haiga bambo Tingwang mai hinaniu khatdi nkiujiu Wangdi kiningga bammai hinaniu naliutu kanui khai-e.
Rapiu Jesu Khrista lungsiat niu naliu mathiutu maluang khaibo thiu milo.
Tingwang chun ganiu Jesu Khrista ladlangtadbo Paul khatdi aliu singna Timothy anai khu gasu,
Colossi ga bammai Jesu Khrista zan gasu malumjiu singnamai khuga:
Aliu Piu Tingwang niu lungsiat khatdi agi-manaibo naliu khuga pikhai sulo.
Aliuniu naliuleng khengbo hinaga Tingwang aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista Piutu thuonjiu bambo-e.
Delosai naliuniu Jesu Khrista tu malumjiu khatdi masanmai hinatu lungsa bambo aliu chiu-e.
Majibo nai Kawichamse naliu khuga wangbo gasu naliuniu agunjiu bambo malum nai lungsiat gase naliu mangiu khaijiu bambo-e.
Kawicham haise kadihriga pasy masi makeng midmidjiu, Tingwang gu lungsiattu naliuniu chiulubo nai gasu thainai katang haichiu wang kinbo-e.
Khrista vang thiu macham bambo khatdi aliu jengniu tatien thiujiu bambo Epaphras khugasu naliuniu Tingwang lungsiat haise silude.
Hiupuina siniu naliu khuga pikhaibo lungsabo lamga paniu aliu khuga paokhaide.
Siniu anaidi, tachamse silubo nai gasu tuhoi katang naliutu Hiupuina gu tasi ningting siniu piphui khaijiu Tingwang chun silura naliuleng khengjiu bambo-e.
Sichiujiu Rapiu niu machunbo kum naliu lunglujiu khatdi pachun kimbose kamlu bui-e. Sichiujiu Tingwang gu tasi-ningtinga dikhangjiu kawibo sy masi lubui-e.
Sichiujiu wahina khengsijiu pagu kendibo pumtan gasu, naliutu pitan khaijiu naliuniu ngamlu bui-e.
Sichiusai Tingwang niu pamaidungleng kadenkhaibo kabenbo wangdihga naliu dam daolubo jengniu naliu Piu patu thuon lulo.
Paniu aliutu tamiubo pumtan gasu gukhaijiu, paniu lungsa kakungbo Nahpiu wangdih gase jupad khai bide.
Pazai pen ganiu aliutu rankhai bide, sichiujiu aliu nuan kuak khai bide.
Khrista hai amik niu ngaomakbo Tingwang lunsi-e. Pahai manarai thubo Nahpiu, gandam hina riga papee si-e.

Palamra Tingwang niu wahina papen gasu dam khai-e, tinggen lam bambodi, kadihga bambodi, ngaobodi, ngao makbodi, hiupuinagu pumtandung, papaodung, mawang paodung, khatdi pumtan thinmai hinatu damkhai mibo-e. Tingwang niu ting-kadih pakhiangnatu papen gasu khatdi paleng damkhai mibo-e.
Wahina suangga Khrista bamniu-e, sichiujiu papen gasu wahina situ pabam bamga pibam khai-e.
Pahai phumling pi-e; pahai karingbo phibang si-e. Pahai wahina suangga bamlubo jengniu, kashaibo gasu ringsulanbo naraibo Nahpiu si-e.
Palamra Nahpiu siniu Tingwang lunsiak ga lungwang rabo hai Tingwang niu machunbo-e.

Ting-kadih pakhiangna Nahpiu pen gasu pakhuga wanglanra Tingwang niu chapkhai mibo-e. Siniu Nahpiu tu singchai riga shaikhai bibo hainiu tinggen gadi, kadihpiri gadi wahinaga agi-manaibo pi thiukhai bide.
Ndara naliu maning nai tienkam kasabo saisuijiu, pagu mikremai thiujiu Tingwang khugasu naliu diujiu bamniu-e.
Chiudi tuhoira Nahpiu Khrista niu shaikhai bibo jengniu naliutu Tingwang kamai pithiu khai mide. Sichiujiu naliutu masan siakjiu, khatdi kamaobo hajiu pakhuga puiwang lura leng-e.

Naliuniu chiulubo kawicham khatdi agunbo gase malai makjiu malumbuibo kaphung rigase chap lulo. Haibo kawicham jengniu Paul Iniu pavang khat thiujiu, kadihpiriga mai hina khuga kawicham paoron khai mibo-e.
Tuhoira Iniu naliu jengniu magenthiu kheng bambo haise achun wi-e, khatdi Khrista niu papum haise phumling leng chariu khengkhai bamboga Idi adam lutaojiu phumling leng matan bambo-e.
Iniu haibo ngam kamjiu naliuleng kawibo thiulura, Tingwang niu atu phumling vang pithiu khaide. Haibo tienkam sira pachamse dintangsiak lura leng-e.
Chaken wajiukha chamaina khuga nbai wangmibose tuhoira pamaidung khuga madukhai mide.

Tingwang niu pamaidung khuga pisikhai mibo sira pagu shaikhai bambo lungwat nai kendibose madukhai raleng-e. Pagu kasukbo sira Khrista niu naliu lungga bamlujiu Tingwang kendise naliuniu lutao raleng-e.

Sijengniu mai hina khuga aliuniu Khrista haitu dinron kinbo-e. Sichiujiu ningting hina ponpadjiu mai hinaniu Khrista khuga khat thiulujiu, Tingwang masuangga pasiu kachapmai thiulura, paliutu kachan khaijiu khatdi kati khaijiu bambo-e.
Haibo ngamse kamloi lura Khrista niu akhuga pikhaibo pumtan hina thinjiu Iniu maranjiu bambo-e.
Sichiusai naliu jengniu khatdi Laodicea ga lungbam maidung, khatdi atu zu-ngao matai makbo mathiu jengniu, Iniu matanjiu bambo hai pisikhai nibo-e.

Iniu haichiu kambo sira paliu lungchun kachu khaibo gasu paliu lungsajiu aruanglu raleng-e. Sichiujiu nsisiakbo ningting siniu pagu pamalanbo lungsiat situ sitang lura leng-e. Haichiujiu paliuniu Tingwang gu kasukbo chiubora Khrista situ silura leng-e.
Khrista hai Tingwang gu nbai khai nbambo tasi-ningting hinagu chakhiu-chalan si-e.
Iniu haise dinbora, naliutu pijiu mai khat niudi aratbo chamniu sonmi makra leng-e.
Palamra, I apum hainiu naliutu maluang bammak tadi, ahiupuina siniu naliutu maluang bambo-e, sichiujiu naliuniu majiboga khatdi Khrista tu malumboga kali makjiu chap matip bambo donniu achun wibamme.
Naliuniu Khrista Jesu tu Rapiu-e chiujiu lukhai lubo kumjiu, patu maluang lungbam lulo.
Pakhuga naliu men jang matip lulo, sichiujiu naliutu katikhai mibo kumjiu thuon kiuboniu phuijiu malumbo gase lungbamlo.
Mai khatniudi naliutu chamainagu tasi nai tasiam siniu kam kabuakmi makra matip lulo; haikumbose Khrista gasu makjiu, chamainaniu katikhaibo kadihpirigu mawangbo hiupuina khugasu-e.
Delosai Tingwang gu machangbo lunlung hinase Khrista gu manuanbo lunlung gahai bamme, sichiujiu naliuniu patu khat thiulubo donniu naliutu pitathui khai mide.
Palamra pahai hiupuinagu mawangpao hina khatdi pumtan hinagu papee si-e.
Khrista ga khat thiulubo donniu naliura chabenniu makjiu, chiubora chamaina pum gasu kalipad lujiu Khrista gu chagi-rombose thiu lude, sichiujiu nuan pumtan gasu khenrang thiu mide.
Tadui nphumboga Khrista nai naliutu baikhai macham mibo-e, sichiujiu naliu malum gasuniu naliu tudi kashaibo gasu juringkhai bibo Tingwang pumtan siniu patu nai piringsu macham khai bine.
Tacheng-tajai habo Nkengmai thiubam niubo jengniu, hiupuinaga naliu hai ndara shaibam niubo-e. Chiudi tuhoira Khrista pen gasu Tingwang niu naliu nuan kuakkhai lujiu, karingboga juwang khai bide.
Aliutu bangkhai bambo, tacheng-tajaise khikhaira paniu singchai riga natri giankhaijiu lupad mide.
Hiupuina gu mawang paodung khatdi pumtan thinmai hinagu pumtanse, Khrista niu singchai rigasu luthon mide, sichiujiu mathiu suangga pagu chari ngambo tadtiu siniu lenkhai bide.
Sijengniu katiu-kasakbo, maksai wa maniabo, maksai Hiusan Ngee, maksai Tabamnai lamga mai khatniudi naliu riga, pijiu ladjan thiumi tulo.
Sikumbo hinara pasai wangrabo pameng si-e, pachangsiakbo sira Khrista hai-e.

Naliuniu maningbo saisuijiu, lung manuanbo sao thiubo khatdi nkiubo madungao jengniu mazadungtu kahumbo mai khat niudi naliutu kam kabuakmi tulo. Palamra wadi makbo chamaina maning gasu paliura wasao thiu kinbo-e,
sichiujiu paliura papee thiubo Khrista situ lukhai makge. Palamra Khrista pumga bambo ncheng khatdi tahi hinatu ju-aruang lujiu mawikhai bambo sira Tingwang niu machunboga dikhangjiu bambo-e.

Naliura Khrista tu maluang shai ncham lujiu, kadihpiri maigu tajai gasu khenrang thiura suikhai mibo-e. Chiusai, dekamjiu naliuniu kadihpiri mainah kumjiu Tacheng-tajai hangga lungbam jiulo? Sichiusai dekamjiu naliuniu,
“Haise thin tulo. Sise machan tulo. Sise nia tulo,” chiujiu dinbam jiulo?
Sikumbo hinara chamainaniu masingpad lujiu thinbambo chengjai wadi kamakbo katikhai si-e.
Sikumbo hinara chamaina maning saisuijiu mazatu kahumbo, khatdi lung manuanbo saothiubo, sichiujiu chapumtu kam mathadbo, chiudi pachangsiakjiu palungchun kasabo situ thinmanbo guse makge.
Naliuniu kadihriga bambo situ makjiu, nrilam bambo maniaga naliu chun ngut lulo.
Palamra naliu shaimide sichiujiu naliu ringting hai Tingwang khuga Khrista nai bai macham mibo-e.
Naliu ringting siakra Khrista si-e, sichiujiu paniu maduwangbo tingga, pakendi situ lumachamra naliu tudi madukhai birabo-e!

Sijengniu kadihpiriga bambo naliu pum maniadung chiubora; npui-npiu thiubo, masan kamakbo, makhabo, kasabo lungchun, khatdi patiuni sabo hina gasu kamshat lulo, (palamra patiuni sabo hai charamengtu kahumbo lunlung khatle).
Sikumbose maicham phungmakbo mai riga Tingwang lungpom wangbo-e.
Naliuniu sibo lunlungga lungkinbo tingga, sikumbo siniu naliutu thinman bamniubo-e.
Chiudi naliuniu chalung pombo, kasabo lungchun, manmabo, aladthang kasabo, taphanbo lad dinbo hina phut milo.
Naliu khat-khat khuga arat tulo, delosai naliuniu kaguangbogu tienkam hina phutmibo-e.
Sichiujiu kasanbo lunlung gase lungmibo-e. Haise Kadampao Tingwang niu pameng kumjiu damkhaijiu bambo-e, sichiujiu naliu patu sisiak luraleng-e.

Sijengniu kasanbo lunlung gahai, Nkengmai maksai Jehudi mai, chagi rommai maksai chagi rommakmai, khatdi disu kamakmai, wasi kamakmai, kavang mai, khenrang thiumai tamson makge, palamra Khrista haira mathiu gu-e, khatdi paliu mathiu khuga bamme.
Naliu khat khattu kasut silo, khatdi naliuniu aman makbo bamsai, kuak khai milo. Khrista niu lungsajiu naliutu kuak khai bibo kum, naliudi khat khattu kuak khailo.
Sibo hina riga, wahinatu tathuijiu ratman nbambo lungsabo situ piululo.
Khatdi Khrista gu agi-manaibo siniu naliu lungga ladjan thiu lulo, sibo jengniu naliu pumkhat thiura Tingwang niu naliutu kukhai mibo-e, sichiujiu thuonkiu sijiu bamlo.

Khrista gu ladkeng siniu naliu lungga juijiu bamlulo, Ningting pakhiangnaniu khatniu khattu katin khaijiu rukhailo, sichiujiu tathoiluiniu, luichangniu, Hiupuina luiniu naliu lungchun gasu Tingwang tu thuonjiu thiulo.
Sichiujiu Rapiu Jesu pen gasu Papiu Tingwang tu thuonkiujiu, chalad gadi, ngamkam gadi, naliuniu kambo hinaga Rapiu zan gasu kamlo.
Naliuniu kambo hina chamaileng makjiu, Rapiu leng kumjiu kamlulo;
Rapiu niu pamaidung leng pikhai rabo tathuonse naliu lengdi pikhai rabo-e chiubo maningtao lulo. Palamra naliuniu macha bambo Papao siakra Khrista si-e.
Sichiujiu kamao kammai hina situ paliu mao saisuijiu malan khai rabo-e palamra Tingwang haira chamiu-mareng thiu makjiu ladjan thiubo-e.
Khengsao mane, ningting charaksijiu Tingwang tu thuonjiu kheng bamlo.
Tingwang niu pawan kawibo pikhaijiu Khrista gu kakungbo chamse paoron lura aliulengdi kakheng thiu khailo. Palamra haijeng gasu tuhoi atu bangman bambo-e.
Sichiujiu Iniu dinrabose masanjiu din ngamlura kakheng thiukhailo.
Naliugu ladkeng hina matai kum humjiu, maitu lungsabo siniu manuanbo lad dinlo, khatdi mai hinatu paokak maji ngam lura naliuniu sirabo-e.
Aliu mathiu dechiujiu bamlo chiubo naliu khuga paokhaijiu, naliutu kachu khaira Iniu patu naliu khuga langkhaibo-e.
Naliuniu kungbo, khatdi malumbuibo singna Onesimus tudi majang tadmide. Haiga padbambo hina panainiu naliu khuga dinkhai bine.
Sigasu Justus kubo Joshua niudi kanui khai-e. Haimaidung khangsum hai ronna Jehudi mai khu gasu wangbo, Tingwang gu chawangdih leng tatien thiuboga atu kengjiu nkha khai-e.
Paniu naliuleng, khatdi Laodicea nai Herapoli ga bam maidung leng maranjiu bambo hai Iniu sisiak bamme.
Aliuniu kungbo phaimiu Lk, nai Demas niudi kanui khai-e.
Laodicea ga bammai aliu kamai Nympha tu khatdi pakyga madui bammai mathiutu aliuniu kanui khai-e.
Chiusai naliuniu haibo chamlense kenlubo sai Laodicea ga bambo phumling tudi pikhaira kamlo, khatdi naliudi Laodicea ganiu wangbo chamlense kenra kamlo.
Archippas khuga dinbilo, “Rapiu niu pikhaibo tienkamse kamtang lura matanlo.”
Paul, aben siakniu haibogu kanuikhaibo chamse raokhaibo-e. Atu bangman bambo hai mangai tulo!
Tingwang gu lungsiatniu naliutu maluang khaibo thiu milo.
Lungsiat nai agi-manaibo hai naliugu thiu lulo.
Aliuniu kakheng thiubo hinaga naliutu maningtaojiu Tingwang tu thuon saomakjiu bamme.
Aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista tu naliuniu malum lubo jengniu naliuniu dejiukha maranjiu bamlo chiubo aliu Piu Tingwang masuangga maningtaojiu bamme.
Aliu singna maidung, Tingwang niu naliutu lungsajiu pamaileng kadalude chiubo aliuniu si-e.

Palamra, aliuniu kawichamse naliu khuga katikhaibo khatdi phungwangbo ronna makge, chiudi pumtan nai Masanbo Hiupuina ganiu palingbose wangbo-e. Naliu khuga aliu bambo tingga naliu jengniu dechiujiu lungmilo, chiubo naliuniu sibamme.
Naliuniu wajiukha chariubo daojiu bamdi, Masanbo Hiupuina khugasu wangbo chunwibo champao siniu aliutu khatdi Rapiu gu lunlungtu ali lulo.
Macedonia nai Achaia lamsu paowangbo ronna makjiu, Tingwang tu naliuniu malumbo cham hai pabam hinaga chiu mide.
Palamra Rapiu cham hai naliu khuga Mecedonia nai Achaia ga dinron wangbo ronna makjiu naliuniu Tingwang tu malumbo hai pabam hinaga sikam mide. Siga aliuniu wadin sonra hamide.

Aliuniu naliu khu wangbo tingga, naliuniu aliutu lukhaibo khatdi naliuniu charameng tu kahumbo gasu phutlujiu dechiu karingbo nai majibo Tingwang tu kahumjiu patien thiumi gulo chiubo paliuniu dinbamme.
Khatdi kashaibo gasu piringsu khai mibo Nahpiu Jesu niu tinggen lamsu wangkiu rabo khatdi wangkinbo Tingwang lungpom gasu aliutu gukhai rabo situ dechiu khuan bam gulo, chiubo mai hinaniu din bamme.
Singna maidung, aliuniu naliu khuga wangbose matha makge chiubo naliu ronna sibamme.

Aliuniu naliu Thesalonia ga wangmakbo suangga, Philippi ga wangbo tingga aliutu kam magenthiu khaibo khatdi din masa khaibo hina naliuniu sibamme. Sichiujiu wajiukha aliutu khamjiu bamdi, pakhugasu wangbo Kawichamse dinkhaira Tingwang niu aliutu kachu khai-e.
Palamra aliuniu naliutu kam mahukhai bambose kamaobo maksai kataniabo maning ganiu makge, maksai aliuniu mai khattudi pathak makbo kamkhai makge.

Chiudi Tingwang niu machunbose aliuniu dinbo-e, palamra Kawichamse dinra Tingwang niu aliutu malum khai-e. Aliuniu chamainatu pikim khaira kambo makge, chiudi aliu lungchun kawi-kasa sibambo Tingwang tu pikim khaira aliu dinbo-e.
Delosai naliuniu sibamme, chiubora aliu wadaodi aratbo lad din makge, maksai ason kasabo chamse din makge. Tingwang niu aliugu lamchap si-e:
Aliuniu naliu khugasu maksai kakimai khugasu niudi chamaigu tathuon daora aliu matan makge.
Aliuniu Khrista gu ladlangtadmai thiujiu dinsuibo bamdi sichiu kam makge. Aliuniu naliu khuga bambo tingga, papuiniu panahmaitu akhibo kumjiu koina akhi khai-e.
Aliuniu naliutu haijiukha lungsabo jengniu, naliu khuga Tingwang gu Kawicham paokhaibo ronna makjiu, aliu ringting katang pikhai mibo-e. Palamra naliutu aliuniu kungchang kungbo-e.

Singna maidung yo, aliuniu dejiukha maranjiu tatien thiu khaimi gulo chiubo maningtao khailo! Naliu khuga aliuniu Tingwang gu kawicham dinronboga naliutu kam chariu makra aliu nchun n-nien saomakjiu maranjiu changam kam khai mide chiubo naliuniu palingjiu sibamme.
Malum maidung naliu khuga aliuniu dechiu masanjiu, majijiu khatdi kamao kamengbo hajiu tadkhailo, chiubo naliu niudi Tingwang niudi jengdin thiu bamme.
Papui-papiu mainiu, panahmaitu majaibo kum aliuniu naliutu akhi khai-e chiubo naliuniu sibamme.
Aliuniu naliutu kachu khai-e, kam aman khai-e khatdi pawangdih nai pakendibo dam lurabo lunlungga lungra aliuniu naliu khuga dinjiu bambo-e.

Aliuniu pawan machangna Tingwang tu thuonbose palam bamme. Aliuniu naliu khuga Tingwang cham phungwangboga naliuniu sise chamai cham makge chiudi Tingwang chamme chiubo naliuniu lukhai-e, sise palingjiu malummai naliu riga Tingwang niu tatien thiukhai bambo-e.

Singna maidung yo, Judea ga Tingwang gu phumling, Jesu Khrista saisui maidung khuga padmibo kum naliu khugadi pad bambo-e. Paliuniu Jehudi maidung khugasu chariubo kumjiu naliudi naliu rammai khuga niudi chariujiu bambo-e.

Paliuniu Rapiu Jesu tu, khatdi phaimiukakungdungtu kamshat mibo-e, khatdi aliutu kam mathad khaijiu bambo-e. Paliuniu Tingwang tu dejiukha pikim khaini makge! Dejiukha mai hinatu paliura ngaosa bambo-e!

Sichiujiu Nkengmai khuga Kawichamse dinkhaijiu juringbo daolura paliuniu aliutu khamme. Sichiujiu paliuniu kamaobo hai pamalan kamtang siakjiu bamme. Sijengniu tuhoira kanamboga Tingwang lungpom paliu khuga wangjiu bamme.
Singna maidung yo, aliuniu pakak khat ramna mijiu bamdi, aliu lungchun-ga sura makge, chiudi naliutu adao lanra matanjiu bamme khatdi ramgunjiu bamme.
Naliu khuga aliu wangnijiu bambo-e, Paul, Ira naliu khuga wangra leng matanchang matanjiu bambo-e, chiudi Satan niu aliutu khamjiu bambo-e.
Aliu Rapiu Jesu wangbo nai naliu jengniu aliu chun wirabo, aliuniu ramgunbo, aliu geng thiurabo situ phui bambo-e.
Palingjiu, naliu jengniu aliu geng thiurabo-e khatdi aliu chun wirabo-e.
Aliu singna, Timothy Khrista gu kawicham jengniu majang changam kam kakinbo patu pijiu naliutu kam matip khaira khatdi nkha khaira langkhai kin-e.
Sichiujiu haibo mathad jengniu naliu mai khatnadi chalung nkhinmi tulo. Haibo mathaddungse aliu niu khenglusai sise Tingwang gu chunning khatle chiubo naliudi sibamme.
Delosai naliutu majang bambo tingga dinkhai masuang mibo kumjiu mathadjiu bambo-e.
Iniu kheng ngamlak mibo jengniu Timothy tu langkhaijiu naliu malumtu pitan khaira, khatdi Satan niu naliutu hiammi makra patu Iniu langkhaibo-e, sichiu maksai aliu ngamse mathakhumi rabo-e.
Sijengniu singna maidung yo, aliugu chariubo nai magenthiubo hai naliu malum jengniu, aliu lung kachu khaijiu bambo-e.
Delosai naliuniu Rapiu khuga chap matip bamsai pachangjiu, tuhoira aliu ringbam mibo-e.
Tuhoira naliu jengniu aliu chun wijiu Tingwang masuangga bamjiu Tingwang tu aliu thuon bamme.
Naliutu wang zu-ngao lujiu, naliu malum kam mawi khaira nchun n-nien saomakjiu aliu khengjiu bamme.
Naliu khuga aliu wanglura aliu Piu Tingwang nai aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista niu npui kaden khaibo thiu milo!
Aliuniu naliutu lungsabo kum, naliu khatniu khattu khatdi mai hinatu lungsabose Rapiu niu kam matheng kam madi khaimi sulo.
Haichiujiu paniu naliutu pitan khai rabo-e, sichiusai aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista niu pamaidungtu aliu Piu Tingwang suangga puiwangbo naise naliudi masanjiu tathuilu rabo-e.

Kanamboga, singna maidung, naliuniu dechiujiu Tingwang chunningga lungralo chiubo aliu khugasu silude. Haise naliuniu lungbambo kumjiu, khatdi sisuang monjiu bamra Rapiu Jesu zan-ga aliuniu khengbo-e.
Palamra Rapiu Jesu pumtan gasu aliuniu naliu khuga ladtikhaibo hai naliu sijiu bambo-e.
Naliuniu npui-npiu thiubogu kamaobo lunlung gasu marilujiu, masan siakjiu lungra haise Tingwang chunning-e.
Naliu npiumai siniu panao khuga masanjiu khatdi chakhuang thiujiu lung rabo-e.
Tingwang tu simakbo malum kamakmai kum makjiu, chiubora chapumniu masen masiabo saisuijiu lungmak rabo-e.
Haichiujiu mai khatniudi Khristian gu singnatu kammao mak rabo-e maksai sontiu mak rabo-e. Haise kam makra karai gasu tanjiu dinkhai mibo-e. Palamra haikumbo ngam kammaitu Rapiu niu sajai pirabo-e.
Tingwang niu aliutu npui-npiu lungmaobo lunlungga lungra kukhai makge, chiudi masanboga lungra kukhaibo-e.
Sijengniu mai khatniu haibo katikhaise lukhai maksai paniu chamaitu lukhai makbo makge, chiudi Masanbo Hiupuina pikhaibo Tingwang tu lukhai makbo-e.
Singna maidung khatniu khattu lungsarabo lamga naliu khuga raolan makdi wi-e. Palamra naliutu karai gasu khatniu khattu lungsalo chiujiu Tingwang niu katikhai mibo-e.
Palingjiu naliu sichiujiu lung bambo khatdi Macedonia ga bambo singna maidung hinatu naliuniu lungsa bambo jengniu, haisuang wi-nkiujiu naliu bamra aliuniu khengkhai-e.
Nda masuang naliu khuga dinmibo kumjiu, maliu makjiu lung bamlo, naliu lungchun ngutjiu naliu ngam kam bamlo, khatdi naliu ringting leng matan lulo.
Sichiusai malummak maidungniu naliutu chakhuang thiu rabo-e, khatdi naliu mai khat khugadi mangiu khaijiu lung lakge.
Singna maidung yo, agunbo kahamai kumjiu, shaimi maidung lamga naliu lung chariu makra, aliuniu majibo hai naliutu pisikhai nibo-e.
Jesu shailujiu ringsu mibotu aliuniu malumme, sichiujiu patu malumjiu shaimi maidungtu Tingwang niu Jesu nai puiwang lanrabo-e chiubo aliuniu malumme.
Palamra Rapiu papumsiak tinggen lamsu nkiubo maza khuan nai Tingwang gu make mudbo khuan jaojiu senwang rabo-e. Siga Khrista ga shaikhai mibo maidung ringsu rairabo-e.
Sibo saiga, ringjiu bamniubo aliutu paliu nai tingpukga Rapiu tu adaora kamuong ga puikhang ncham rabo-e. sichiujiu aliu Rapiu nai tingthengjiu maluang bammi rabo-e.
Haijengniu naliu khatniu khattu haibo chamniu kachu khaijiu bamlo.
Singna maidung yo, pating pawanse dedao padralo, chiubo naliu khuga raokhaira pageng ha-e.
Palamra Rapiu wang rabo Tingmik sira ka-aga mainiu nchun kawangbo kumjiu wangne chiubo naliuniu sibamme.
Maidungniu, “wahina wikamjiu agi-manai bamme,” chiu dinjiu bamga bungjiu maipuiniu manarabo wonthad thiunuang kawangbo kum harabose paliu riga wang sune, siga mai khatdi marilu lakge.
Chiudi singna maidung, sibo Tingmikse naliu khuga ka-agamai kumjiu wangmakra, naliura tamiuboga bam makge.
Naliu mathiu hai kabenbo n-nien nahmaidung-e. Aliura nchun tamiuboga lungmakge;
Sijengniu kakimaidung kumjiu aliu jijiu bam dukhe, chiudi aliu rakjiu maring-marakjiu bamkhe.
Palamra maidungniu nchun jibo-e, khatdi nchun tingga paliuniu jaw sak maniubo-e.
Chiudi aliura kabenbo mai-e, siniu ningting charakjiu bamkhe. Sichiujiu aliuniu malumbo nai lungsabo gaatop khatdi juringbogu chari pirun khai lujiu bamkhe.
Delosai Tingwang niu aliutu palung pom daora kadakhaibo makge, chiudi aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista pen gasu juringbo daolu raleng-e.
Paniu wangboga aliu ringbamdi, shaimidi pakhuga ringjiu bamlura aliuleng pah shaikhai mide.
Haijengniu tuhoi naliuniu kam bambo kumjiu naliu khatniu khattu kachu khaijiu khatdi nkha khaijiu bamlo.
Singna maidung yo,naliu ruangga tatien thiujiu Khristian ringting lamga majang khaijiu, khatdi ladti khaijiu bammaitu chakhuang thiululo.
Paliu tienkam jengniu paliutu naliu chakhuang thiu nkiujiu lungsalulo. Naliu ruangga agi-manaibo bamlulo.
Singna maidung, naliuniu kamake maitu rukhailo khatdi pingtan maitu kachu khailo, khatdi papum kason maitu nkha khailo, khatdi mai hina khuga ginsijiu bamraleng, aliuniu naliu khuga khengbo-e.
Chakhum rui mane, chiudi khat khat khuga khatdi mai hina khuga kawi kamlura machun lulo.
Pawan machang chunwijiu bamlo,
Kheng saomakjiu bamlo.
Palam hina jengniu thuonkiujiu bamlo. Haichiujiu naliuniu Khrista Jesu tu khat thiulubo hai Tingwang chunning-e.
Masanbo Hiupuina tu kham tulo.
Phaimiukakung chamtu mala tulo.
Wahina madiu lulo, kawibo situ thin matip lulo,
khatdi kasabo hina gasu mari lulo.
Agi-manaibo pikhaibo Tingwang siniu naliutu pijiu kam masan lulo; sichiujiu naliu pum, naliu hiuna, khatdi naliu ringting pakhiangna Rapiu Jesu Khrista wangboga kamaobo hajiu bam lulo.
Naliutu kukhaibo paniu kaden khai birabo-e, palamra pase malum buibo-e.
Singna maidung, aliu jengniudi kheng khailo.
Malum maidung mathiutu, masanbo biangpup siniu kanui khailo.
Naliuniu haibo chamlense malum maidung mathiu khuga kenkhaira Rapiu pumtan gasu Iniu khengbo-e.
Aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu lungsiatniu naliutu maluang khaibo thiumilo.
Aliu Piu Tingwang nai Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu lungsiat nai agi-manaibose naliu khuga pikhaibo thiu milo.
Singna maidung yo, naliu jengniu Tingwang tu aliu thuon saomakjiu bamme, Haise pathao-e, delosai naliu malum dikhangjiu bamme, khatdi naliu mai hina khat khattu lungsa nkiu liang-liangjiu bamme.

Sichiujiu naliuniu ginjiu bambo mathad khatdi chariu magenthiu bambo hina jengniu aliu sao thiujiu bamme. Tingwang gu phumling mainiu haichiu chariu magen thiubo khengjiu malum bambo jengniu aliu chaliang thiubo-e.
Pakhiangna haise Tingwang gu ladjan hai majibo-e, sichiujiu naliuniu chariu magenthiu bambose pagu Wangdih leng kabuibo thiu rabo-e.
Naliutu kam chariujiu bammaitu Tingwang niu majibo kamjiu paliu riga chariubo pikhai rabo-e;
Sichiujiu naliudi aliudi chariukheng macham bammai mathiutu pi mathak khaibine. Haise Rapiu Jesu niu tinggen lamsu pagu ka-ngambo mazadung situ maluang wangbo nai pikhai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu Tingwang tu lukhai mak maidung khatdi aliu Rapiu Jesu gu Kawibo Champaotu majai mak maidungtu tao bambo mipuang niu kam mathad khai rabo-e.
Paliu haira, Rapiu gu kendibo nai chakhuang thiubo gasu kadapad lujiu, hami rabo tingtheng mathadbo gase chariu khengrabo-e.
Pamaidung nai patu malum maidung khugasu kendibo nai chakhuang thiubose daora paniu wangbo Tingmik gase naliudi paliu ruangga bamrabo-e, palamra aliuniu dinkhai mibo champaose naliuniu malum lude.

Haijengniu pawan machang aliuniu naliuleng khengjiu bambo-e. Paniu naliutu kupad mibo kabuibo ringtingga naliu lunglura aliuniu Tingwang khuga kheng bamme. Naliugu malumbo tienkamse tathui lura khatdi kawibo leng masenbo hinase pagu pumtan siniu piwangtang khaibo thiumi sulo.
Sichiujiu aliu Rapiu Jesu zanse naliuniu pakhuga, khatdi paniu naliu khuga paken dibose daolura aliu Rawang nai Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu lungsiat saisuijiu daobo thiumi sulo.
Chiubora Rapiu gu Tingmikse wang bamde chiujiu aliuniu sailad gasu dindi, naliutu katikhaijiu tadi, maksai chamlen gasu raokhaijiu tadi sikumbo gasu naliutu kam kabuakmi tulo.
Mai khatniudi naliutu pijiu sonmi tulo, palamra kanambo Charise thiuwangjiu khatdi charuidih leng kadakhai mibo Kasapiu Khatse padmak then sibo Tingmikse wang lakge.
Maidung siniu chara-e chiujiu kubo maksai maidungniu kahum kinbo mania hinatu atungjiu khatdi paronna patu kam madijiu, maidungniu kahumbo Charakyga tangbo ntao lujiu pase Tingwang-e chiubo din sune.
Iniu naliutu majang bambo tingga haichiujiu dinkhai mibo naliu maningtao mak jiuma?
Sichiujiu Kasabopiu Khat situ madu khaira tuhoi khamjiu bambose naliuniu si-e.Pawanse wanggap dasai pase maduwang surabo-e.
Mainiu dinsilakbo Kasabo siniu changam kamjiu bam mide, chiudi kham khaijiu bambo situ luthonmi makthen wangrabose padlakge.
Siga Kasabopiu Khat situ madukhai sune, siga Rapiu Jesu wangjiu pamun gasu padbo pasiu siniu patu kamshatjiu, kam mahami rabo-e.
Kasabopiu Khatse wangbo tingga Satan gu pumtan thinwangjiu katam-tambo aratbogu tasibo nai maisuang habo kamsu rabo-e,
Hamirabo maidung khugara kasabo hinase wangrabo-e, palamra juringbo daolura paliuniu majibo situ lungsa makge khatdi lukhai makge.
Sichiujiu paliuniu aratbo situ malumbo jengniu kasabose paliu khuga wangra Tingwang niu langkhaibo-e;
Sichiujiu majibo situ malum makbo mai hina, khatdi nuan ga paliu lungchun khai mibo donniu paliutu ladjan thiu rabo-e.

Rapiu niu lungsabo singna maidung yo, naliu lamga aliu pawan machangna Tingwang tu thuonjiu bamme. Palamra Tingwang niu naliutu karai gasu Hiupuina pumtan siniu masan mai thiulura khatdi majibo situ naliuniu malumbo jengniu juringbose daolura kadakhai mide.
Aliuniu naliu khuga Kawicham dinkhaibo haisiniu Tingwang niu naliutu kulude, paniu naliutu kukhaibo sira, aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu kendise naliudi padam dao macham lura leng-e.
Sijengniu, singna maidung yo, aliuniu katikhaibo ga khatdi aliugu chamlen gu majibo gase chap matip lulo.
Aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista papum siakniu, khatdi aliutu lungsabo, aliu Piu Tingwang niu pagu lungsiat gasu nkhinlan makbo hot nai matipbo agunse aliutu pikhaibo thiu milo.
Sichiujiu kawibo ngam kambo khatdi chalad chalui dinbo thiubo hinaga pijiu naliu lungchun kachu khaijiu naliutu pijiu tankhai bilo.
Kanamboga, singna maidung yo, Rapiu lad-lui hai majadjiu khatdi saomakjiu dinron lura khatdi naliu khuga kumjiu chakhuang charao thiujiu lukhai lura aliuleng kheng bamlo.
Tingwang niu aliutu tacheng kahamai nai kasamai khugasu ranlu raleng khengjiu bamlo, palamra mai hina tachamse malumbo makge.
Chiudi Rapiu haira malumbuibo-e, siniu naliutu paniu pitan khai bine, khatdi kasabopiu khugasu gukhai bine.
Aliuniu naliu tu malumra Rapiu niu suikhai-e, sichiujiu aliuniu naliu khuga dinkhaibose naliuniu kamjiu bamra malum bamme.
Tingwang gu lungsabo khatdi Khrista gu khengsibose si-nkiu khang lura Rapiu niu naliutu majang khaibo thiumilo.

Singna maidung yo, makejiu changam kam mak bam maidung, khatdi aliuniu naliutu ladtikhaibo chamse majaimak maidung situ majang chakin thiu tulo, chiujiu aliuniu Rapiu Jesu Khrista zan gasu chamtan pikhai-e.
Delosai aliuniu kambo kumgapjiu kamrabo-e chiubo naliuniu sibambo-e. Naliu khuga aliu bambo tingga make makge.
Aliu paman thiumakjiu maigu nkha khatdi lumakge. Sibosung naliu mai khattudi kam chariu makra, nchun n-nien changam maranjiu kamme.
Aliutu nkha khaira aliuniu khengbo pamaji habo makge, chiudi naliuniu aliu jai alitu alilura, aliuniu kamlen khaibo-e.
Aliu naliutu majang bambo tingga naliu khuga haichiu din-din-e, “Mai khat kumboniu changam kamni maksai tiudi tiumak milo.”
Haichiujiu aliuniu dinbo lamra naliu ruangga khangsia maidung changam makelu, maigu ngamkamtu khamjiu kam kabuak bamme chiubo aliu chiu-e.
Sijengniu simaidungtu pi matun tidjiu paliu ngam kamjiu, paliu ronna paliu wonleng phiutiu lulo chiujiu aliuniu Rapiu Jesu Khrista zan gasu paliutu chamtan pikhaibo-e.
Chiudi singna maidung yo, naliuniu kawi kamboga chiami tulo.
Sichiujiu mai khatniu aliugu champao haise majaimak sai, patuse silulo; patu kam mangam khaira patu majang tulo.
Chiudi naliuniu patu mikremai kum makjiu, singna khattu kumjiu rukhai bilo.
Agi-manaibo Rapiu niu naliu khuga pawan machangna khatdi wahinaga agi-manaibo pikhaibo thiumi sulo. Naliu mathiutu Rapiu niu majang khaibo thiumi sulo.
Haibo kanui chamse Paul, I aben siakniu raokhaibo-e. Agu chamlen hinaga, haichiujiu Iniu raokhaibo-e.
Aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu lungsiatniu naliu mathiutu maluang khaibo thiumi sulo.
Khrista Jesu gu ladlangtadbo Paul khugasu aliuniu agun bambo Ranpao Khrista Jesu nai Tingwang chamtan gasu:
Iniu Macedonia lam tadkinboga nakhuga dinkhai mibo kum, Ira natu Ephesus ga pibam nibo-e. Maidung khangsianiu siga kamaobo katikhaijiu bamme, sise nangniu khamkhai rabo-e.
Masing lubo rachamdung, nda chavang-chavi ladle chiujiu aribo gasu saomira, paliu khuga dinkhai bilo; sikumboniu malumboga Tingwang chunning kamlura ha-e.
Haibo chamtan hainiu masanbo makum gasu, lungchun gasu khatdi palingbo malum gasu lungsabose pijiu sukhai raleng-e.
Maidung khangsiara haigasu mari lujiu kapangbo ari-arabo gase hakhai mide.
Paliu hai Tingwang gu tacheng-tajai lamga katipaodung thiuni-e, chiudi paliu ladkeng siakdi silu makge khatdi paliuniu degu dinni siaklo chiubo paliuniu silu makge.
Tacheng-tajai hai pathao siakga thin khaisai, tacheng-tajai hai wi-e chiubo aliuniu si-e.

Maningtao rabo bamme, chiubora tacheng-tajai hai kawibo maileng pikhai makge, chiudi tacheng-tajaiga lungkhai makmai khatdi pakhui-pamao bammai, charatu simakmai khatdi nuan phungmai, pacheng—pariak matip makmai maksai hiunaga lungmakmai, papui papiutu gimai, maitu gimai;

npui-npiu lunlung ga palung karuangmai, maipui karai, maipiu karai npui-npiu thiubo maidung, chamaitu manomjiu kaminmai, aratbo mai, khatdi kamaobo jengdin thiumai, maksai majibo cheng-riaktu kati kadatbo maileng kamkhaibo-e.
Paken dibo khatdi donwibo Tingwang khugasu daolubo Kawicham paoronra khatdi katikhaira atu pikhaibo-e.
Agu tienkam jengniu pumtan pikhai bibo, aliu Rapiu Khrista Jesu tu Iniu thuonne. Patien thiura atu kadakhai bibo, khatdi atu kabuibo mai-e chiujiu suikhai bibo jengniu patu Iniu thuonkiu-e.

Karaiga Iniu patu nuimenjiu, kamrejiu, palamga kasabo dinjiu bamliudi, Tingwang niu atu lungsa khaibi-e, palamra Iniu patu malum makjiu, Iniu degu kamkinlo chiubo simakjiu bamliudi paniu atu lukhai bi-e.
Sichiujiu aliu Rapiu siniu pagu pamalan thiumakbo lungsiatse ariga runkiu khai bijiu Iniu malum lura, sichiujiu aliuniu Khrista Jesu khuga khat thiujiu bambo lungsiat hai pikhaibi-e.
Haise malumsuibo khatdi lukhai suibo siakge: Nuan phungmaitu gukhaira Khrista Jesu kadihpiriga lungwang-e; sibo rong gasu sathubo sira I-ye.

Sichiujiu nuan phungmai ruanggasu sathubo atu lukhaibo hainiu, pasai kana patu malumjiu tingtheng ringbo lutaora maileng Khrista Jesu gu khengsibo nai pamalan thiumakbo lungsiat hai bamme chiubo madu khaira Tingwang niu atu lungsa khaibo-e.
Tingthengjiu ringbambo Wang, shaimakbo, ngaotang makbo, khatnakhabo Tingwang khuga tingtheng tingthengjiu chakhuang thiubo khatdi paken pangam dibo thiumilo! Amen.
Anah Timothy yo, karaiga nalamga sailad dinkhai mibo saisuijiu, Iniu natu haibo chamtan hai pikhaibo-e. Chari thiuboga thiu mawi lura sibo ladkengdungse thin mawi lulo.
Sichiujiu masanbo lungchun nai nagu malumbo gase bamlulo. Khangsia maira paliu lungchun situ lukhai makbo jengniu paliu malumse kam maha mide.
Simai ruangga Hymenia nai Alexander si-e, panaitu Iniu Satan gu pumtan ga pikhai mibo-e; haisiniu paliugu arat dinbo situ khammi raleng-e.
Sichiujiu raithuboga, wa-khengbo, kakheng thiubo, chakhuang thiujiu khengbo, khatdi thuonkiubo haise mathiu sung Tingwang khuga kadkhai rabo-e;
aliuniu mai hinatu agi-manaijiu maluang lunglura chawangdung leng, khatdi pumtan thinmaidung leng khengjiu khatdi Tingwang tu pingjiu khatdi chakhuang thiujiu lungra leng-e.
Haise kawibo-e khatdi haisiniu aliutu Rankhaipiu Tingwang chun pikim khaibo-e.
Para mai hinatu rankhai ni-e khatdi majibo situ pisikhai nibo-e.
Palamra Tingwang khat bamme, khatdi Tingwang nai chamainatu pijiu khat thiukhaibo mai khat, Jesu Khrista se bamme,
paniu mai hinatu ranlura papum pikhai mibo-e. Haise Tingwang niu pawan siakga mai hinatu rankhai nijiu bamme chiubo madanse len khaibo-e.
Sijengniu Nkengmaidung khuga atu ladlangtadbo khatdi, katipao khat thiujiu malumbo nai majibo chamse dinronra langkhaibo-e. Iniu arat dinbo makge, pachangjiu dinbambo-e!
Phumlinggu aruang hinaga maipiudungniu paliu lung pommakjiu khatdi arimakjiu kakheng thiura Tingwang khuga papum kadpad lumai paben khengsujiu, kakhengthiu ngam maitu Iniu lunibo-e.
Sigasu Iniu lung manuanbo pui, pafai pani khai matunbo pui, papeetham karup makbo maksai paman kungbo kachia rangkangniu karubo makjiu,
chiudi tacheng matipbo tienkam kawiniu madu ngambo maipuidung tudi masenbo-e.
Maipuidung haise maliu makjiu manonjiu wa katirabo-e.
Paliuniu maipiu riga pumtan thinbo maksai laddinbotu Iniu suini makge; paliu hai maliu makjiu bamrabo-e.
Palamra Adam tu damraibo-e, sibo sainiu Eve tu dambo-e.
Sichiujiu sonlubose Adam tu makge, sonlubose maipui situ-e sichiujiu Tingwang gu tacheng-tajaise kampang mibo-e.
Chiudi maipui siniu malumboga, lungsaboga khatdi masanboga manonjiu khengsi bamsai, ngena lungbo tingga patu rankhai bine.
Haise palingjiu dinbo chamme; Mai khatniu phumlingga jupao thiunisai, paniu kawibo ngam situ masenbo-e.

Phumling khatgu jupao sira: pakhui pamao kahamai, panao khat ronna thiubo, manuanbo mai, papum paronna katin simai khatdi kamatunmai thiu rabo-e, sangmai zu thiusi rabo-e khatdi wa katikhai ngammai thiurabo-e;
Pahai tiu-sak maniumai, palungpom kasamai thiumak rabo-e, chiudi manuanbo nai agi-manaibo mai thiurabo-e; khatdi tasen-chalan-ga paluni kasamai thiumak rabo-e;
pakikhunmaitu akhi sibo khatdi panah maidungdi kadin piubo mai thiurabo-e.
Palamra mai khatniu pakikhunmai siaktu macha simaksai, dechiujiu paniu Tingwang gu phumlingtu phuikhai ngam ralo?
Malumboga pahai pasiu chapmai thiurabo-e, sichiujiu Satan kumjiu wasao thiujiu pimao mimak raleng-e.
Phumling lenlam bam mainiu patu chakhuang thiumai thiu rabo-e, sichiujiu Satan gu tathakga kaokhaijiu mangam makra leng-e.
Phumling ga nkhakhai maidungdi lungchang phungmai, pagu nkhai-rili kawimai thiu rabo-e; paliu hai jawga palung ngut makmai, maksai tasen-chalan-ga luni kasamai thiumak rabo-e.
Masanbo lungchun phungjiu malumbogu madukhaibogu majibo situ thin matipmai thiurabo-e.
Sichiujiu raiboga paliu jai-ali matadga paliu mao hasai, paliutu pijiu tatiense thiukhai rabo-e.
Nkhakhai mai naodungdi, paliu nkhai-rili kawimai, khatdi maiken tiamakmai thiurabo-e; paliu haidi agi-manaijiu lung manonmai thiurabo-e, khatdi wahinaga chalung masanmai thiurabo-e.
Phumlinggu nkhakhai mai panao khat ronna rabo-e, sichiujiu pakikhunmai nai panahmaitu macha ngammai thiurabo-e.
Paliu tienkam wijiu kamlubo nkhakhai maise kawibo kamlubo-e, sichiujiu paliuniu Khrista Jesu tu malumbo lamga hujiu dinlu bui-e.
Iniu haibo chamlen hai naleng raoboga, natu zu-ngao majira maning-e.
Chiudi Iniu wangri misai, haibo chamlen hainiu dechiujiu aliuniu Tingwang kykhun-ga, chiubora ringjiu bambo Tingwang gu phumling gu majibo tiangdi situ bajiu lungralo chiubo natu pisikhai rabo-e.
Aliugu tacheng haise dejiuga kungbo gulo chiubo mai khatniudi mangai silakge:
Pahai chamaina lunlungga lungkhai mibo-e,
Hiupuina siniu majibo situ madukhai mibo-e;
sise mazadung siniu ngaokhai mibo-e.
Jat hina ruangga patu hai dinron khai mibo-e,
sichiujiu kadihpiri pakhiangnaniu malum khai mibo-e
sichiujiu tinggen lam lukhang mibo-e.
Hiupuina siniu masanjiu din-e, chiubora kanambo wan-ga maidung khangsianiu malumbo situ phutmi sune, paliuniu aratbo hiupuina kadin piumi sune khatdi rasadungniu katikhaibo saisui misune.
Sikumbo katikhaidung sira, sontiubo arat siniu paoronbo-e, paliu lungchun sira chagitiniu rulujiu kabut kumbo-e.

Sikumbo maidung siniu tanao-tanah thiubo maksai tiumak rabo tiutek lamga katikhai kin-e. Chiudi Tingwang niu sibo tiutek hinase malum maidung siniu thuonkiubo rathoi lulujiu tiuraleng khatdi majibo situ silura damkhai mibo-e.
Tingwang niu damkhaibo hina wikamme, wadi luthon padra ha-e; chiudi thuonkiubo rathoi siniu wahina lukhai rabo-e;
palamra Tingwang chamkengniu khatdi kakheng thiubo siniu Tingwang khuga suikhai mibo-e.

Malumbo maidung khuga majibo katikhaidung haise pikhaijiu, naronna hiupuina tiutek tiujiu bamsai, khatdi nangniu tadjiu bambo majibo katikhai saisuijiu bamsai, nang hai Khrista Jesu gu kawibo vangse thiu bambo-e.
Chiudi dinbui makbo, charatu simakbo, masing padbo rachamdung gasu mari lulo. Charatu sibo lunlungga lunglura naronna matanjiu ali lulo.
Chamaipum kam mawibo sira poinakha-e, chiudi hiupuina lamga maningbora palam hinaga pageng bamme, palamra haisiniu tuhoi lengdi pasai lengdi, ladriat khaibo ringting bamme.
Haise malumsuibo khatdi lukhai suibo palingbo si-e.
Ringjiu bambo Tingwang tu malumjiu aliuniu matanbam bambo-e, khatdi kheng bambo-e, palamra mathiutu Rankhaipiu tu malumjiu, nkiujiu malummai leng matan bambo-e.
Haibo chamtandung khatdi katikhaidung hai paliu khuga pikhai bilo.
Nang nahkha-e chiujiu maitu pijiu natu ngao malami tulo, chiudi nagu lad-liuga, nagu nkhai-riliga, nagu lungsaboga, malumboga khatdi masanboga malum maitu lunglenbo thiululo.
I wangmak thenna, Masanbo ariak kenboga, dinronboga khatdi katikhaiboga nagu pawan pikhaijiu bamlo.
Phaimiukakung mainiu dinkhai mibo khatdi kating maidungniu nariga paliu ben khengsujiu natu pikhai mibo hiupuina gu kalen situ wajeng simakbo thiumi tulo.
Haidungse nachun ngutjiu ali lulo; sichiusai nagu tienkam situ mai hinaniu ngaomi rabo-e.
Naronna napumtu khatdi nangniu katikhaibo situ phuisi lulo. Haise nangniu majai lujiu kambam sai, nangdi, nalad chiulumai sidi ranlubose daolu rabo-e.
Maipiu katingmaitu kasan mane, chiudi patuse napiu kumjiu kachu khaijiu bamlo; akhangmaidung situ nasingnadung kum lukhailo.
Maipui kating maidungtu napuidung kumjiu lukhailo khatdi nahbimaidung situ natanpuidung kum, masanjiu lukhailo.
Pachangjiu paronna lungbambo kamipuidungtu chakhuang thiubo lenkhai bilo.

Chiudi kamipui khatniu patah panahmai bamsai, paliuniu raiboga paliugu tajai saisuijiu paliu kikhun lungga, paliu pui-piudung, paopehdungtu phuikhai rabo-e, palamra haichiu kambo siniu Tingwang chun pikim khaibo-e.
Paronna bambo kamipui, patu phuikhai raleng habopui siniu Tingwang khuga mangiu khaijiu nchun n-nien saomakjiu patu nkha khaira khengbambo-e.
Chiudi kamipui khatniu amanboga papum pikhaijiu bamsai, para ringjiu bamdi shaimibo-e.
Haibo chamdungse paliutu katikhai bilo, sichiusai mai khatniudi paliu khuga kakhui-kamaobo pikhai silakge.
Chiudi mai khatniu pasingna maitu nkiujiu pakikhunmai maitu phuikhai simak sai, para malumbo situ phutmibo-e, khatdi malum makmai khangkhat suang sa-nkiu mibo-e.
Kamipui khat situ takum riak-charuk majumak then, kamipui ruangga chakkhai tulo. Pase migui mikhaibo thiurabo-e,

khatdi kawibo tienkamga pazan tadmai thiurabo-e; panahmaitu makuat sibo, sangmai zu thiusibo, paka paphen thiubo Khristian mai khuga manonjiu lung khaibo, magenthiu chariu maitu nkha sibo khatdi kawibo ngam kamra palung ngutbo pui thiurabo-e.
Chiudi kamipui namaidung tura sibo riakga chakkhai tulo. Palamra paliu hai milan nibo lungchun padle, sichiujiu Khrista gasu maritad mi-e.
Sichiujiu paliuniu raijiu pakhuga ladriat thiukhai mibose kampangjiu maomi rabo-e.
Paliuniu chaky khat gasu khatga rontadjiu pawan kam maha mi-e; nkiujiu sabo sira, paliu hai maiken tiak, khatdi paliu pum alijiu, khatdi paliuniu dinmak rabo din-e.
Sijengniu kamipui n-nahmaira milan lujiu paliu nahdung lunglan lujiu, paliu kikhuntu akhi mibose Ira luni-e, sichiujiu aliu mikremaidung siniu aliutu din masamakbose wi-e.
Palamra kamipui khangsia niu sichiu mari lujiu Satan saisui mibo-e.

Chiudi Khristian maipui khatniu pakikhunmai-ga kamipui bamsai paniu paliutu akhikhai birabo-e; sichiujiu phumling ga chariubo pikhai mak rabo-e, sichiujiu paronna bambo kamipuidung situ akhi khai rabo-e.
Jupao thiujiu kawibo ngam kamjiu bambo kating maidungtu, nkiujiu dinronbo nai katikhaibo ngam kamjiu bammai situ damnia thiujiu chakhuang thiu buibo-e.
Palamra Masanbo ariak siniu din-e, “Tasiu biujiu bambo matomchi situ pamun ratmak rabo-e,” sichiujiu “Changam kambo pase paphijeng daobui-e.”
Phumling ga katingmai khattu pamao madam khaiboga khangnia maksai khangsum niu jengdin pimaksai lukhai tulo.
Nuan kammaidung situ mathiu ruanggasu rukhai bilo, sichiusai kakimaidung siniu pingmi rabo-e.

Tingwang masuangga khatdi Jesu Khrista masuangga khatdi masanbo mazadung masuangga nangniu haibo katikhaidungse majai lujiu, nangniu kambo hinaga mai khattudi chamiu mareng thiumakjiu, kamraleng Iniu natu kubo-e.
Mai khattu Rapiu tienkamga pipad raboga naben kaba khaira majatmi mane. Maidung nuan gase jaomi tulo; chiudi napumtu kam masanjiu bamlo.
Nangra marasibo jengniu, tadui ronna sak makjiu, nawon kuilura mumjaw poinakha saklulo.
Khangsia maigu kamaobo sira ngaopad nuang-e, sichiujiu paliu nuan siniu tadrai lujiu ladzan ga wang-e; chiudi khangsia maigu kamaobo sira pasainiu ngao padle.
Sise kumjiu kawibo ngamdung sira ngaopad nuang mi-e, sichiujiu ngaopadnuang makbo sidi bailu lakge.
Kavangmai hina siniu paliugu papaodungtu wahinaga chakhuang thiurabo-e, sichiusai mai khat niudi aliuniu katikhai bambo situ khatdi Tingwang zantu din masa lakge.

Khristian maigu kavangmai siniu paliugu papaodungtu din masa mak rabo-e, palamra paliu hai singna maidung-e. Sibosung, paliutu akhi mawi nkiu rabo-e; palamra paliu tienkam situ lubam maidungse paliuniu lungsabo malum maidung-e.
Nangniu haidungse katikhai rabo-e, khatdi dinron khai rabo-e.
Aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu majibo ladkeng tu suimakjiu khatdi aliu chenggu katikhaitu suimakjiu katambo cheng-riak katikhaibo sira, wasao kathiumai khatdi wadi simakbo mai-e.
Para kasabo lungchun siniu, ladkeng lamga ari-arabo, manmabo, n-gi athaobo, khat khattu khan-tiabo,kasabo chun niu maning masabo,
khatdi majibo situ lukhai tamibo khatdi wa maning sita mibo maidungtu saomakjiu ari-ara bamra leng ronna-e. Characheng chiubo hai lungwi khangrabo leng-e chiujiu paliura maning-e.
Wide, pagu kabambo siniu, palung kimjiu bamsai, tacheng hainiu mai khattu pi lungwisui khai lubui-e.
Aliuniu kadihpiriga nde phungwanglo? Wadi phungwang makge! Aliuniu kadihpiri gasu nde phungpad ngam ralo? Wadi phungpad ngam lakge!
Sichiusai aliuniu katiu-kasak khatdi chafai tani bam misai, siseniu buimibo-e.
Chiudi lungwi kanimaidung sira, lung mahami rabo nai hamirabo siniu kahiambo thakga jukhaijiu kapangbo thakga khatdi kasabo lungchun-ga kaokhai mibo-e.
Palamra tasen-chalantu masenbo haira kasabo hinagu phibang-e. Maidung khangsia maira haisitu luni kajubo jengniu malumbo gasu ron maha mide, khatdi paliu lungse magenthiu chariuboniu kampang mide.
Chiudi Tingwang mai thiubo nangra haidung gasu khamlulo. Tacheng matipbo, charatu sibo, malumbo, lungsabo, khengsibo khatdi manuanbo situ matan lulo.

Malumbogu majubo gase nalai khaijiu paklulo, khatdi tingtheng ringbose naleng matan lulo; palamra haibo ringting leng lamchap mathiu suangga thiura khatdi nagu malumbose dinra Tingwang niu natu kulubo-e.
Wahinagu ringting pikhaijiu bambo Tingwang, khatdi Pontius Pilate masuangga pagu malum din madukhai mibo Jesu Khrista masuangga Iniu natu chamtan pibo-e,
Jesu Khrista niu madukhai lanrabo Tingmik tangjiu nakhuga pikhai mibo chamtandungse majaijiu bamlo.
Pagu madulan rabo sira sanwibo Tingwang, khatdi Mawangpao, chawang riga Chawang khatdi chara riga Chara siniu pawan gapboga phungwang rabo-e.

Paronna halan makbo-e; para kabenboga bamjiu mai khatniudi pakhuga wangmana silakge. Mai khatniudi patu ngaomakge; mai khatniudi patu ngao ngam lakge. Pakhuga chakhuang thiubo nai tingtheng mawangbo thiumilo! Amen.

Haibo ringtingga lungwi maitu pijiu chaliangmi makra chamtan pikhailo, paliuniu wadi makbo lungwat situ malummi makjiu, chiudi aliu chunwira wadi maja makjiu pikhai bambo Tingwang tu malum lura, chamtan pikhailo.
Sichiujiu kawibo ngam kamra, kawiboga lungwi lura, chalung dijiu, maidungtu njantiu njan-sakra, paliutu chamtan pikhai bilo.
Haichiusai paliuniu pasaileng halan makbo chakhiu-chalanse makhuan lubui-e. Sichiujiu paliuniu majibo ringtingse daolubui-e.
Timothy yo, nakhuga pikhai mibo hinase thinpiu mawi lulo. Taphanbo lad dinbo khatdi kapangbo lad aribo, khangsia mainiu “Ningting” chiujiu kubo ariga jao mane.
Palamra khangsia mainiu sise daolune chiujiu matanbo jengniu, paliugu malumbo npui gasu hamide.
Tingwang lungsiatniu naliu mathiutu maluang bamlo.
Khrista Jesu tu khat thiulujiu ladriat khaibo ringting situ paoron raleng, Tingwang chunning gasu Khrista Jesu gu ladlangtadbo Paul khugasu:
Papiu Tingwang khatdi aliu Rapiu Khrista Jesu gu lungsiat, lungsa khaibo khatdi agi-manaibo pikhaibo thiu milo.
Apao-apeh mainiu thuonbo kumjiu alungchun masansiakjiu patien thiukinbo Tingwang tu, Iniu natu maningtao tan-tanjiu nchun n-nien kakheng thiuboga Iniu patu thuonne.
Nang matui padkhai mibo situ I maningtao-e, sichiujiu achun wira Iniu natu ngaodao khaini siak bamme.
Nagu masan siakbo malum khatdi napeh Lois nai napui Eunice gu malumbo situ I maningtao-e. Nangdi sichiu bamratu I malumme.
Haijengniu nariga Iniu aben kaba khaiboga Tingwang niu natu pikhaibo kalen situ kam maringjiu bamra natu pisikhai lanbo-e.
Palamra Tingwang niu aliu khuga pikhaibo Hiupuina sira mahonbogu makge; chiudi pagu Hiupuina siniu, aliutu lungsabo khatdi aronna atu thinman rabo pumtan pikhaibo-e.
Sijengniu aliu Rapiu lamga lamchap thiura; khatdi Khrista donniu kavangthiu bambo ajengniu mangammi tulo. Sibosung, Tingwang niu nakhuga pumtan pikhai bibo kumjiu Kawicham jengniu chariu khenglulo.

Paniu aliutu rankhaide khatdi pamai thiura kukhai bide, haise aliuniu matanlubo makge, chiudi pamaning khatdi pagu lungsiat jengniu-e. Haibo lungsiat hai nda paphibang gasu Khrista Jesu pen gasu paniu aliuleng pikhai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu tuhoira aliugu Rankhaipiu, Khrista Jesu niu wangbo gasu madukhai bide. Paniu kashaibogu pumtanse kam maha mide khatdi kawicham siniu halan makbo ringting situ madukhai bide.

sijengniu haibo lamga Iniu haichiu magenthiu kheng bambo-e. Chiudi Iniu malum siakjiu bamkha-e, palamra paniu atu malum khaibo saisuijiu sibo Tingmik wangtang makthen paniu gukhai ngamme chiubo Iniu malumme.
Nangniu suitad rabo jai-ali, Iniu natu katikhai mibo kumjiu majibo ladkeng situ thin matipjiu bamlo, khatdi aliuniu khat thiujiu bambo Khrista Jesu tu malumbo nai lungsabo gase bamlulo.
Aliu khuga bambo Masanbo Hiupuina pumtan gasu natu malum khaibo kawibo hinase, thin mawijiu bamlo.
Asia luongriang ga bambo mai hina, Phygelus nai Hermogenes jaojiu atu lukhai tamide chiubo nang sijiu bamme.
Rapiu niu Onesiphorus kikhunmai riga lungsabo pikhaibo thiu milo, palamra pawan kakengga paniu achun piwi khaibi-e. I kavangkyga bambo jengniu pah mangambo thiumakge.
Chiudi paniu Rome ga wangtang gapboga atu daolu makthen paniu phiu-e.
Pagu Tingmik gase Rapiu niu pagu lungsabo pikhai bibo thiu milo! Sichiujiu Ephesus ga paniu aleng dejiukha tenkhai bilo chiubo nangniu simasan bamme.
Anah yo, nangra aliuniu khat thiujiu bambo Khrista Jesu gu lungsiat gasu tan-hujiu bamlo.
Iniu jengdin maidung kakeng masuangga katikhaijiu dinkhai mibo situ thin lulo khatdi maidungtu kati chalikhai ngambo malumsuibo maidungtu langkhailo.
Khrista Jesu gu matunbo riphen khat kumjiu chariubo damse khenglulo.
Riphen khatniu pagu charipigu chakampao lung pikim khai nibo jengniu, paniu maidiu-maida maitu maluangmi makge.
Kamajuboga jaobo mathenmai khat siniu sibo mathen chengse paniu majai maksai tathuonse daolu makge.
Chalu tien thiumai khatniu, matanjiu tenkhai mibo saisuijiu atiat karaibo damse daorabo-e.
Iniu dinbambo hai makum mawi khailo, palamra pakhiangna hai singam lura Rapiu niu natu pikhai ngamme.
Iniu Kawicham dinronboga katikhai mibo David kaikik gasu shailujiu ringsulan mibo Jesu Khrista tu maningtaolo.
Iniu Kawicham dinronbo jengniu, chariujiu, haichiu chagiriangniu pamao kabam maitu bangbo kumjiu bangbambo-e. Chiudi Tingwang ladkeng tura bangman makge,
Khrista Jesu pen gasu juringbo daora khatdi pakendibose tingtheng phungwangra, pakhiangna haise Tingwang niu kadakhai mibo jengniu I khengjiu bambo-e.
Haise majijiu dinbambo si-e:
“Aliuniu pah panai shai ncham khai misai,
aliudi pah panai maluang ring ncham rabo-e.
aliuniu patu maluang mawang machamne.
Aliuniu patu suimak sai, padi aliutu suikhai lakge.
Aliu hai malumsui kamak mai thiu bamdi, para malum suibo-e;
palamra paronna pah maosi lakge.”
