Haise nangniu namaidung khuga pisikhai bamlo, khatdi ladkeng lamga ari-arabo thiu makra Tingwang masuangga matanjiu rukhai bilo, Sise wibogu makge, chiudi nkingmai situ kam masakhai rabo ronna-e.
Tingwang gu majibo champao situ majijiu katikhaibo, pangamga kamangambo kaha kumjiu, Tingwang masuangga nang maji-e chiubo lenlura maran lulo.
Maidungtu Tingwang khugasu pidiu khaibo taphanbo lad khatdi kapangbo ari-arabo gasu mari lulo.
Sikumbo katikhaidung sira tajam khaoniu tiujiu thiu jamna mibo kumbo-e. Haikumbo katikhaibo khangnia sira Hymenaeus nai Philetus si-e.
Panainiu majibo npui situ phutmide sichiujiu aliugu ringsulanbo haise loimide chiu dinjiu malummai khangsia malumtu kam masa mide.

Chiudi Tingwang niu donkhai mibo kaphung sira malailan lakge; khatdi sibo riga haichiujiu raokhai bamme. “Rapiu niu pamaidungtu sibamme” khatdi “Mai khatniu para Rapiu mai-e chiu dinsai kasabo ngam gasu mari lulo.”
Chaky kadi khat hangga chakuang chapiang pajat kengsui bamme: Kasiara kachia nai rangkangniu damme, kasiara tasing nai changamniu damme; kasiara kakungboga thin-e, kasiara malaboga thin-e.
Sichiujiu mai khatniu kasabo hina gasu paronna kam masan lusai, patu kakungboga thinpiu khaine, palamra para papaoniu kadpad mibo papaoniu thinra, kawibo tienkam hinaga thinra kaden khai mibo si-e.
Chabon thiubogu lungchun situ mari lujiu, tacheng matipbo, malumbo, lungsabo khatdi agi-manaibo, lungchun masanbo siniu aruanglujiu nkha khaira Rapiu tu kululo.
Chiudi kapangbo nai wasi kamakbo ari-arabo siniu kanamboga n-gi athaobo padle chiubo nangniu sibamme.
Rapiu vang maira n-gi athaobo thiumak rabo-e. Para mathiutu lungsa sirabo-e, khatdi kawibo, njangbo katipao khat thiujiu,
pagu mikremaitu kam majikhaijiu kheng rabo-e, palamra Tingwang niu paliutu lunglira pawan pijiu paliuniu majibo situ silubui-e.
Sichiujiu paliu lungchunse wanglanjiu, paliutu bangman lujiu pagu maning ngam kamra khaibambo Satan thak gasu mari lubui-e.
Kanambo tingmikdung gase kakungbo wan padsune chiubo maningtaolo.
Maidung siniu paleng sibo, patiuni sabo, chaliangbo, khatdi wasao thiubo, maitu din masabo, papui-papiu kadin piumakbo, mai nkhatu wajeng kumakbo khatdi tacheng matipmakbo;
maitu phuikhai simakbo, lungsa simakbo, maiken tiabo, palungpom sabo khatdi palung-riak sabo thiusu rabo-e; sichiujiu kawibotu paliuniu mareng surabo-e.
Paliu haira maitu sontiubo, pathak sabo, khatdi chaliangbo siniu phuisu rabo-e; paliuniu Tingwang tu suang ka-amanbo situ masenmi rabo-e.
Lenlamra paliu niu aliu rachengtu lukhaibo kum lujiu, chiudi pachang siakbo pumtan situ lukhai lakge. Haikumbo maidung khugasu mari lulo.
Mai khangsianiu maiky-kyga tadlujiu nuanbang phungjiu, khatdi katam tambo masen-masiabo lunlungga jukhaijiu,
khatdi majibo situ sikhai nijiu bambo, chiudi wadaodi sitang ngamlakjiu bambo puidungtu thin man maidung bamme.
Jannes nai Jambres niu Mose tu atungbo kumjiu, pachun hamibo mai khatdi malumboga nkhin mibo maidung siniu kamajibo situ atungjiu bamme.
Chiudi paliuniu pating thengjiu tadlu lakge, palamra paliu hai dejiuga kameng mailo chiubo mai hinaniu ngao mirabo-e. Sikum gapjiu Jannes nai Jambres khuga padmibo-e.
Chiudi Iniu katikhaibo, ajai-ali khatdi agu ringting machunse nangra luijiu bamme; khatdi agu malumbo, Iniu ginbambo, Iniu lungsabo, Iniu khengkhai mibo,

atu kam mathad khai mibo khatdi agu chariu hina nangra sibamme. Antioch ga, Iconium ga khatdi Lystra ga akhuga padmibo mainiu dinsilakbo mathadbo hinase sichiujiu Iniu khengkhai mibo hinase nangniu sibamme! Chiudi pakhiangna gasu Rapiu niu atu gukhaibi-e.
Charatu sijiu Khrista Jesu tu khat thiujiu lungkhai nimai hinatu kam mathad sune;
chiudi kasamai nai sontiumai siniu maitu sontiubo kumjiu paliutu paliu ronna sontiu sune, sichiujiu kasabo gasu sa-nkiu khangsu rabo-e.
Chiudi nangra majibo gase khatdi nangniu malum matip lubo gase chap matip bamlo. Nagu katipaodung situ nangniu sibamme,
khatdi nangniu nahting gasu silubo, Masanbo ariak siniu natu ningting pikhaijiu Khrista Jesu tu malumbo gasu juringbo daolune chiubo nang sijiu bamme.
Masanbo ariak hinase Tingwang niu pikhaibo-e, khatdi pageng bambo-e, haise katikhaira, kamaobotu rukhaira, majimakbo situ kam maji khaira khatdi majijiu lung lura katikhai raleng-e.
Sichiujiu Tingwang ngam kambo mainiu wa simasan lujiu khatdi kawibo ngam hina kamlu raleng-e.
Tingwang masuangga, chiubora ringbammai nai kashai maitu ladjan thiurabo Rapiu Khrista Jesu khatdi paniu Chawang thiujiu mawangra wangkinbo ruangga,
Kawichamse dinron tadra (pawan bidi, pawan mak bidi) pikim khaira, kasan khaira khatdi nangniu katikhaiboga kathuat khaijiu gin sira, Iniu nakhuga tanjiu dinbo-e.
Majibo cheng-riak katikhai situ maidungniu nking nimakbo wan wangsune, sichiujiu paliuniu lunibo situ paliuniu nking khai nijiu, paliu kuon masak bambose katikhaira katipaodung kengjiu pad sune.
Paliuniu majibo situ nking makjiu masinglubo rachamga paliu chun ngutmi sune.
Chiudi nangra palam hinaga naronna katinsi lulo; Tingwang vang khat kumjiu Kawicham dinronmai khat thiujiu natiense kamphu lura ginsijiu bamlo.
Alengra, kadkhairabo wanse wangtang mide; alengra haibo ringtingse saokhai diakra pawan wang bamde.
Majubo gase alai khaijiu, riatkhaibo bamga paktang khai mide, sichiujiu Iniu malumbo gase chap bamme.

Tacheng matipbo Ladzanpao, Rapiu niu Tingwang khuga kam majikhaibogu, chari-ngambo pirunse sibo Tingmikga aleng pira kaden khai nbamme, sise aleng ronna makge chiudi pah wangrabotu lungsajiu khuanbam mai mathiu lengdi-e.
copy
Majatjiu akhuga wangra matan khailo.
Demas niu haibo kadihpiritu lungsa mijiu atu phutkhai lujiu Thessaloni lam tadmide. Crescens niu Galatia lam khatdi Titus niu Dalmatia lam tadmide.
Luke ronna akhuga bamme. Mark tu phiulujiu nang maluanglu wanglo, palamra paniu atu changam gase nkhakhai ngamme.
Iniu Tychicus tu Ephesus lam langkhai mide.
Nang wangbo tingga, Iniu Troas ga Carpus khuga a-ntiang khaidiak mibose phunglujiu wanglo; ariakdung sidi,nkiujiu chamiginiu kambose phunglujiu wanglo.
Nangdi patu marisi lulo, palamra pah aliugu champaotu suimak jingbo-e.
Iniu alamga dinrai thuboga mai khatdi alam chapkhai makge; mai hina atu thonmibo-e. Haise Tingwang niu paliu mao chakkhai makbo thiu milo!
Chiudi Rapiu niu atu maluang khaijiu khatdi pumtan pikhaijiu Nkeng maidungniu chiulura, champaose Iniu dinphu lura nkhakhai bide; khatdi shairabo gasu atu gukhai bide.
Sichiujiu kasabo hina gasu Rapiu niu atu gukhaijiu pagu tinggen wangdih gase atu lukhai birabo-e. Pakendibose tingtheng tingthengjiu pakhuga thiumilo! Amen.
Erastus ra Corinth ga bamdiak mide khatdi Trophimus tu Iniu Miletus ga khaidiak mide, palamra pah maramibo donniu-e.
Tatheting wangtang makhaga wangra kamlulo.
Eubulus, Pudens, Linus, khatdi Claudius sigasu Khristian singnamai mathiuniu kanuikhai-e.
Rapiu Jesu Khrista niu naliu hiupuina tu maluang khaibo thiu milo.
Tingwang lungsiatniu naliu mathiutu maluang khaibo thiumilo.
Tingwang vang khatdi Jesu Khrista gu ladlangtadbo Paul khugasu.
Aliu cheng-riak ganiu majibose katikhaiboga paliutu jukhaira khatdi Tingwang niu kadapad mibo maitu pijiu malum khaira atu kadapadjiu langkhaide.
Tingtheng karingbose pikhaine chiujiu aratmakbo Tingwang niu nda paphibang gasu ladriat khai mibo-e.
Pawan gapboga pagu kawichamse paniu madukhai bide. Aliutu Ranpao Tingwang gu chamtan saisuijiu, dinron tadra atu langkhaide.
Iniu natu Crete ga khaidiakbo sira, kamra bambo hinase kam maji khaira khatdi namdi hinaga phumlinggu katingmaitu kada khaira leng-e. Natu ladtikhai mibose maningtao lulo.
Katingmai khat hai maikhan hamai, panao khat ronna bammai khatdi panahmaidi kamalummai, khatdi chalad chalui habo mai maksai mailiam makbo mai thiurabo-e.

Palamra phumlinggu jupaodung hai Tingwang gu tatien thiumaidung-e, siniu pahai maikhan phungmak mai thiu rabo-e. Pahai chaliangbo maksai chalung pomnuang sibo, maksai tiusak maniubo, maksai n-gi athao sibo, maksai tasen-chalantu paluni kasamai thiumak rabo-e.
Pahai sang-zu thiusibo, khatdi kawibotu masenbo mai thiu rabo-e, sichiujiu paronna patu thinman lumai, pacheng matipbo, masanbo, khatdi katinsibo mai thiurabo-e.
Pahai tacheng chariak situ thin matipjiu majibo situ katikhai ngammai thiurabo-e. Sichiujiu paniu majibo situ kachu khaijiu kamaobo situ dinlen ngammai thiurabo-e.
Palamra mai kakengga nkiujiu, Jehudi mai cheng gasu paliu lung lipad lujiu paliugu kapangbo cham siniu maidungtu sonjiu, atungmai kengjiu bamme.
Paliu mun kaba mira pageng bamme, palamra haikumbo maidungniu rangkang changinbo jengniu katikhai mak rabo situ paliuniu kati kadad khaijiu, kikhun pakhiangnatu kampang mide.
Paliu karai, paliugu phaimiukakung khatniu haichiu din-e, “Crete maidung haira pawan machang arat maidung-e paliura kasabo khaoringdung-e, khatdi kamrao tiuni maidung-e.”
Haise majibo-e. Siniu malumbo gase matipjiu chap lura paliutu rukhailo,
sichiujiu Jehudi maidunggu masinglubo rachamga khatdi majibo situ suimakbo maidunggu chamtandungse lukhai tamilo.
Masanbo maidung khugara wahina masanbo-e, chiudi taniabo mai khatdi malum makbo maidung khugara masanbo wakhat nadi ha-e, palamra paliu lungchun nai paliu maningse tania mide.
Paliuniu Tingwang tu si-e chiujiu din-e, chiudi paliu tienkam siniu suimakge. Paliura matai marengbo khatdi kadin piumakbo, khatdi kawibo tien thiura wadi buimakbo maidung-e.
Chiudi nangniu majibo cheng-riakse katikhailo.
Tanpaomainiu jawsak makra, nchangra, khatdi paronna patu thin manra, malum matipra, chalungsa sira, khatdi khengsira katikhailo.

Sikum-jiu tanpehmai niudi masanbo ringtingga lungkhai mibo puidung kumjiu lungra katikhailo. Paliuniu maiken tia makra, khatdi jaw-vang thiu makra kati khailo. Chiudi paliuniu kawibo katikhai sirabo-e.
Sichiujiu paliuniu maipui nahmaitu paliu kina, paliu nahdungtu lungsajiu,
paliu pum thin manjiu, masanjiu lungra, khatdi paliu kina hangga bamsira katikhai simai thiu rabo-e. Sichiusai Tingwang khugasu wangbo champao haitu mai khatniudi din masa lakge.
Sikumjiu chabuan maidung siniu paliu ronna paliu thinman sira kachukhai bilo.
Walam hina kawibo tien kamlenjiu, kawibo n-khai-riliga lunglen rabo-e. Sichiujiu nagu katikhaiboga lungchun ngutjiu nsisiak lulo.
Maidungniu khanmak tiamakra kabuibo ladse dinrabo-e, sichiusai nagu mikremai siniu, aliutu wadi dinkhaira hajiu mangammi rabo-e.
Kavangmainiu walam hinaga, paliugu papaomaidung kadin piujiu, paliutu pikimkhai rabo-e. Paliuniu paliutu arijiu paokakmak rabo-e, maksai paliugu agamak rabo-e.
Sibosung, paliu hai wi-e, khatdi malumbui-e chiubo lenrabo-e. Sichiujiu aliutu Ranpao Tingwang lamga katikhaibo gase maken dibo phungwang rabo-e.
Palamra juringbose mai hinaniu daolura, Tingwang niu pagu lungsiat hai madulen khai bide.
Aliuniu charatu simakbo khatdi kadihpirigu masen masiabo situ phut lujiu, aronna atu thin manbo, tacheng matipbo khatdi charatu sijiu lungra, sibo lungsiat siniu aliutu katikhaijiu bamme.
Sichiujiu aliugu sanwibo Tingmikga maduwang rabo pakendibo Tingwang khatdi Ranpao Jesu Khrista tu maduwang rabo situ aliuniu khuanjiu ramgun bambo-e.
Aliu khuimao hina gasu ranpad khaira, khatdi kawibo tienkamga chalung ngutjiu sigasu aliu hai pamai thiulura Rapiu niu aliuleng papumsiak pipad khai mibo-e.
Haibo ladkeng dinjiu, nalad chiumaidungtu kachu khailo, khatdi rukhailo. Natu pijiu mai khatniudi ngao malami tulo.
Namaidung siniu mawangpao dung khatdi pumtan thinmai hangga bam sira, kadinbo majaira, khatdi palam hinaga kawibo kamra katikhai bilo.
Paliuniu mai khat tudi kasabo lad din makra, chiudi mai hina khuga agi-manaijiu, chaka thiujiu, lung manuanjiu lunglenra katikhailo.

Palamra aliudi pakak khatga pangjiu, kadinpiu makjiu, maomengjiu lungkhai mibo-e. Siga aliu kamakhabo nai matha-malabo vang thiukhai mibo-e. Aliuniu maitu manihjiu khatdi manmajiu, mainiu aliutu mareng, aliuniu maitu marengjiu lungkhai mibo-e.
Chiudi aliutu Ranpao Tingwang gu lungsiat nai kakungbo siniu madukhaiboga, paniu aliutu rankhai bide.
Haise aliuniu kawi kambo jengniu makge, chiudi pagu Masanbo Hiupuina niu manasan khaibo khatdi kasan ringting pikhaijiu paniu aliutu rankhai bide.
Aliutu Rankhaipiu Jesu Khrista pen gasu, Tingwang niu aliu riga Masanbo Hiupuina se mali-malanjiu runkiu khai bide;
sijengniu palungsiat siniu aliutu Tingwang khuga kam majikhai lujiu aliuniu ramgunjiu bambo tingtheng karingbose daolu raleng-e.
Haise kamajibo chamme.
Nangniu haidungse katikhaijiu, Tingwang tu malum maidung siniu kawibo tienkamga pawan pikhaijiu, mai hinaleng kagengbo thiulura Iniu nkiujiu nakhuga dinkhai nibo-e.
Chiudi kapangbo lad aribo, chavang-chavi phuibo, n-gi athaobo, Tacheng-tajai lamga n-gibo, haikumbo hina gasu mari lulo, palamra haikumbo hinase gengmakbo-e khatdi mathakubo-e.
Paphom kampad tambo maitu malod nia tangbo kasankhai bilo, sibo saira patu wakam son lanra hamide.
Sikumbo maise kamaobo kam mibo-e, sichiujiu paliu nuan siniu paliu maomibo-e chiubo madukhai rabo-e.
Ladjanpao Zenas khatdi Apollos tu panai puitadga wahina machangjiu tadlura nalung ngutjiu ngamdiu then phuikhai bilo.
Aliuniu kawibo kamlujiu pageng bammaitu nkha lura kamrabo-e; wadaodi pageng kahabo lunlungga lungmak rabo-e.
Akhuga bambo mathiuniu natu kanui khai-e. Malumboga aliugu chaka thiubammai khuga aliugu kahumbo pikhai bilo.
Tingwang lungsiatniu naliu mathiutu majang khaibo thiu milo.
Khrista Jesu lamga bangkhai bambo Paul nai aliu singna Timothy niu:
Aliu kabo khatdi patien thiu macham bambo Philemon khuga,
khatdi nakyga aruang bambo phumling, khatdi aliu tanpui Apphia khatdi aliu singna Archippus khuga:
Aliu Piu Tingwang khatdi Rapiu Jesu Khrista niu lungsiat khatdi agi-manaibo naliu khuga pikhaibo thiu milo.
Singna Philemon yo, Iniu kakheng thiubo pawan machang natu maningtaojiu bamme khatdi a-Rawang tu thuonjiu bamme.
Tingwang maidung khatdi nangniu dechiu Rapiu Jesu tu malum bamlo khatdi patu lungsa bamlo chiubo I chiu-e.
Iniu khengbambo sira aliuniu Khrista khuga khat thiujiu bambo hainiu thoidam hinagu kasukbo ningtingse bamlura leng-e.
Singna yo, nagu lungsabo siniu atu malenna pijiu achunwi khaide khatdi wajiukha kam mahu khai bide! Palamra nangniu Tingwang maidung mathiu lungchun kam mawi khaide.
Haijengniu Khrista ga singna thiu bambo nangniu kabuibo tiense thiura Iniu hujiu dinbo-e.
Chiudi Iniu natu lungsabo jengniu, kating khat thiu bambo, khatdi Khrista Jesu jengniu tuhoi kavang thiubo Paul Iniu kheng-e.
Iniu kavangkyga bambo tingga Khrista ga anahsiak thiulubo Onesimus sung thiujiu nakhuga kheng-e; pakak khat kavangkygase I hai pagu hiuna piu thiukhai mibo-e.
Pawan khatga pahai naleng gengta mibo-e, chiudi tuhoira nakhugadi, akhugadi kagengbo thiumibo-e.
Iniu tuhoi patu nakhuga langkhaibo tingga, alungchun hai pasai suitad kinbo-e.
Kawicham jengniu I kavangkyga bambo tingga, paniu haiga bamjiu, nasung thiujiu atu nkha khaira Iniu lunibo-e.
Chiudi Iniu nachun maniu makjiu pikam khaini makge, Sichiujiu nangniu suikhai maksai, wakhatdi pijiu kamkhaini makge.
Onesimus hai nakhuga pakak khat diumibo-e, sichiudi haisiniu patu tingtheng nangniu daolan lura leng-e.

Tuhoira pahai kavang ronna makjiu, kavang suang monjiu, Khrista ga singna thiu mibo-e. Patu hai Iniu dejiukha kunglo! Sichiujiu patu hai nangniu dejiukha kunglan ralo, para Rapiu khuga kavangdi, singnadi thiu mibo-e.
Sijengniu, atu nangniu nangkah leng maningsai, nangniu atu lukhaibo kumjiu patu lukhailo.
Sichiujiu paniu nakhuga kammao khaibo maksai chapaw phungbo bamsai, sise adamga chak khailo.
Paul, Iniu haise aben siakniu raokhaibo-e, sise Iniu ruikhai bine, (Nang siakdi agu chapaw phung bamme chiubo Iniu natu din machiu khaini makge).
Sijengniu, singna yo, Rapiu zan gasu Khrista ga singna thiujiu acheng kam maring khailo.
Nangniu haise kamkhai sune chiubo maning lujiu Iniu nakhuga raokhaibo-e, Iniu dinbo suangdi nkiujiu nangniu kamkhai sune chiubo I si-e.
Sigasu aleng kiriubam kaden khaibam niulo, palamra naliu mathiuniu khengbo rathoise Tingwang niu paokak khaijiu, naliu khuga atu pimalan khai bine chiubo Iniu maning-e.
Sigasu Iniu maluang tatien thiu ncham bambo Mark, Aristarchus, Demas, khatdi Luke paliu niudi kanui khai-e.
Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu lungsiat siniu naliu mathiutu maluang khaibo thiu milo.
Karaiga Tingwang niu phaimiukakung pen gasu aliu pao-peh maidung khuga katam-tambo aliga kengjiu npaokhai bide.

Chiudi tuhoi kanambo tingmik lungga Panahpiu pen gasu paniu aliutu npao khai bide. Papen gasu Tingwang niu ting-kadih damkhai-e, khatdi damsuboga mania hinagu papao thiura Tingwang niu patu kadapad mibo-e.

Tingwang gu makendibo nbiuse pakhu gasu padle, khatdi pase Tingwang lun kum siakjiu pagu ladkeng pumtan siniu ting-kadihtu pibam khai-e. Chamaina nuan kuak khai lubo sai pase tinggen dihga Pumtan Dithubo Tingwang ben majatlam ntao bam mide.
Panahpiu siniu mazadung suang wi-nkiubo zan daolubo kumjiu, mazadung suang di-nkiubo ga patu damkhai mide.
Palamra Tingwang niu wadaodi pagu mazadung ruangga mai khat khugadi haichiu din makge,
“Nang hai Anahpiu-e; thainai gasu I Napiu thiu mide, chiujiu din matai makge.”
Maksai Tingwang niu maza khat lamga “Iniu Papiu thiurabo-e,
khatdi pah Anahpiu thiurabo-e,” chiujiu dinkhai makge.
“Tingwang gu mazadung hina siniu patu kahum rabo-e.”
“Tingwang niu pagu mazadungtu tingkai,
khatdi pavangdungtu chamipuang pithiu khai-e.”
“Oh nawang kadih hai Tingwang niu tingthengjiu pibam khai rabo-e!”
Nangniu namaidung riga majibo siniu mawang rabo-e.
Majibo situ nangniu lungsa-e khatdi kamaobotu mareng-e,
Sijengniu Tingwang na-Rawang siniu natu kadakhai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu nakang maidung suang nkiujiu natu chakhuangthiu khaibose pikhai mibo-e.”
“Rapiu yo, nangniu nda paphibang gasu kadih haitu damkhai mibo-e,
sichiujiu naben siakniu tinggentu damkhai-e.
Paliu haira hami rabo-e, chiudi nangra tingthengjiu bamrabo-e;
paliura chafai-tani kum marenmi rabo-e.
Paliutu ntiang kumjiu nangniu kadipmi rabo-e,
chafai-tani kumjiu paliutu kalimi rabo-e.
Chiudi nangra pawan machang palun bam rabo-e,
khatdi nagu ringtingra wadaodi pamalan thiulakge.”
“Iniu nagu mikremaidung situ naphipan pithiukhai makthen aben mazadlam ntao bamlo.”
Sichiusai mazadung sira ndelo? Paliura Tingwang tu machabo hiupuinadung khatdi juringbo daolura maitu nkhakhai raleng paniu langkhaibo si-e.
Sichiujiu aliutu hunthon mimak raleng, aliuniu chiulubo majibo situ nkiujiu thin matip rabo-e.
Aliu pao-peh maidung khuga mazadung siniu pikhai mibo kawichamse palingbo-e chiubo lenkhai mide, sichiujiu mai khat kumboniu sibo saisui maksai, khatdi sisetu majai maksai pase sajai daobui-e.

Sichiusai, haijiukha dibo juringbo situ aliuniu kalam misai dechiujiu aliuniu sibo sajai gasu marenlu ralo? Raiboga Rapiu papum siakniu haibo juringbo situ madukhai mide, sichiujiu pakhuan chiulu maidung siniu haise maji-e chiujiu aliu khuga lenkhai bide.
Sigasu Tingwang niu katasibo khatdi maisuang habo katam tambo dinjiu khatdi pamaning saisuijiu Masanbo Hiupuina gu kalen pikhaibo gasu paliugu jengdin thiukhai mide.
Aliuniu dinbambo wangrabo kasanbo kadihpiri hai mazadung khuga Tingwang niu pikhaibo makge.
Chiudi Masanbo ariak pabam khatga dinmibose kumbo-e;
“Tingwang nangniu maningtao khaijiu
bambo chamaina haise delo;
wadi makbo chamaina haitu nangniu
manangkhai bibo haise dekumbo gulo?
Nangniu patuse mazadung suang poinakha nkhin bijiu damkhaibo-e;
kendibo nai chakhuang thiubo siniu pagu pirunse pithiu khai bi-e;
sichiujiu gandam hina riga papao pithiu khaibi-e.”

Tingwang niu chamaitu damlujiu, “Mania hina riga papao pithiu khai-e,” chiujiu dinbo sira wahina hai, chamainah hangga bammakbo makge chiubo-e, chiudi tuhoi chamainah hainiu mania hina riga mawangbo aliuniu ngao-makge.

Chiudi Tingwang lungsiatniu, Jesu niu mai hina leng shaikhaira, mazadung suang poinakha nkhin bijiu damkhaibi-e. Sichiujiu paniu kashai tangbo khengkhai mibo jengniu kendibo nai chakhuang thiubo siniu pagu pirun thiujiu bambo aliuniu ngao-e.

Mania pakhiangna damkhaibo khatdi makuatjiu bambo Tingwang niu Jesu tu pi chariu khengkhai lujiu chamaina kakeng khatu pijiu paken dibose dao machamra pagu pumtan bambo-e. Palamra Jesu hai paliutu juringboga jukhaibo piusi-e.
Paniu maidungtu paliu nuan gasu kam masan khai-e sichiujiu kam masan khaibo maidung nai pase Papiu khat bamme. Sijengniu Jesu niu paliutu singnamaidung chiujiu kubo mangam makge.
Paniu Tingwang khuga din-e,
“Nangniu tenkhai mibose Iniu asingnamaidung khuga dinkhai bine.
Iniu paliugu maduiga natu thuonne.”

Paniu paliutu nahmaidung chiujiu kubora, paliu hai tatia khatdi tazai phungbo mai-e, palamra Jesu papumsiak paliu kumjiu chamainagu lunlung gase padam lumacham khai mibo-e. Paniu haichiu tenkhaibo sira paniu shaikhaibo pen gasu kashaibo riga pumtan bambo Devil tuse paniu kam mahami raleng-e.
Haichiubo thak gasu paliu ringting kashaibo situ pingjiu bammaitu khenrang thiujiu phutkhai raleng-e.
Palamra pachang-palingjiu paniu mazadung situ nkha khaibo makge, chiudi Masanbo ariakniu dinbo kumjiu, “Paniu Abraham kaikikdungtu nkhakhai bibo-e.”
Hainiu dinbora wahinaga pase singnamai kum rabo-e, sichiujiu Tingwang tien thiuboga paliugu malumbuibo khatdi lungsasibo Dibo Singku thiura-e; sichiujiu maidung nuanse kuak khai raleng-e.
Sichiujiu tuhoi kahiamboga ngutkhai maitu paniu nkha ngamme, palamra pah papumsiak kahiambo daojiu chariu khengkhai kami gu-e.
Tingwang niu kukhai mibo, agu Khristian singnamai yo! Tingwang niu langkhaibo Dibo Singku aliuniu malumbo Jesu tu makumtao khailo.
Mose tu Tingwang kikhun-ga malum kabuibo thiubo kum, patu kadapad khaibo Tingwang khuga padi malumbuibo-e.
Chaky thiubo mai khat situ chakytu suang nkiujiu chakhuang thiu-e. Sise kumjiu Mose tu suang Jesu tu nkiujiu chakhuang thiubui-e.
Palamra chaky hai mai khatniu thiubo-e, chiudi mania pakhiangna Tingwang niu damkhaibo-e.
Tingwang kikhun-ga Mose niu malumbuibo vang khat thiujiu, pasai padrabo lamga Tingwang niu dinrabose paniu dinkhai mibo-e.
Chiudi Khrista ra Tingwang kyga malumbuibo Panahpiu thiubo-e. Aliuniu ramgun bambo gase matipjiu khatdi hujiu chap bamsai aliu hai pakyga kalung mai-e.
“Nangniu thainai Tingwang khuan chiu sai,
ramjing ga naliu paopeh mainiu bambo tingga,
Tingwang tu madiujiu chari thiubo kumjiu naliu lung tanjiu bamtalo.
Siga paliuniu atu madiukhai mide.
Tingkum atai lungga Iniu tenkhai mibose paliuniu ngao khaimi tadi,
atu madiujiu alung phuikhai mide.
Sijengniu sibo maidung piriga Iniu alung pomjiu din-e,
‘paliuniu wadaodi acham majai makge khatdi agu ladriat piu makge.’
Iniu alung pomjiu siangmibo jengniu,
‘paliuleng pikhaibo mathakbam gase paliu ngut lakge!’”
Malumbo asingnamaidung yo, ringbambo Tingwang khugasu mari tadmi rabo, malum makbo, kasabo lungchunse naliu ruangga mai khat khugadi bam makra ningting silulo.
Sichiujiu naliu mai khattudi nuan niu sonmi makra khatdi lungchun tanmi makra, “thainai” chiu kubo lungga naimachangna naliu khatniu khattu nkhajiu bamlulo.
Palamra aliugu malumbo situ matipjiu paphibang gasu kanambo katang, thinbam sai, Khrista ga aliu padam dao machambo maidung thiurabo-e.
naliu pao-peh maidungniu Tingwang tu suimakjiu chari thiubo kumjiu naliu lung tanjiu bamtalo.”
Tingkum atai lungga Tingwang niu sao-saotu palung pomkhaimi gulo? Nuan tenjiu ramjingga shaikhai mibo maidung si-e.
“Iniu pikhai rabo mathakbo kadihga paliu wadaodi ngut ngam lakge,” chiujiu Tingwang niu siangkhai mibo maise saolo? Pacham majai makjiu charithiu maidung si-e.
Sichiusai paliu malum makbo donniu, riatkhai mibo kadihga ngut ngam makge chiubo aliuniu ngao mide.

Tuhoira, Tingwang niu aliu khuga ladriat thiukhai bide chiubora paniu dinkhai mibo mathakbose aliuniu daolura leng-e. Sijengniu paniu ladriat khaibo mathakbose naliu mai khatniudi daomakbo thiumak raleng aliu kadenjiu bamkhe.
Palamra paliuniu Kawichamse chiumibo kum aliudi chiulude. Paliuniu Kawichamse chiulude, chiudi paliuleng wadi gengson makge, palamra paliuniu chiulubose malum makbo donniu-e.
Chiudi aliura malum lubo jengniu, Tingwang niu ladriat khaibo mathakbose daolune. Haise paniu dinkhai mibo kumbo-e:
“Iniu alung pomjiu siangkhai mibo-e:
‘Iniu paliuleng pikhai rabo mathakbo kadih gase paliu wadaodi ngutlakge!’”
Paniu kadihpiri dammak gasu wahina loikhai bamtadi paliura mathakbo gase ngutlakge.
Palamra Masanbo ariak pabam khatga tingmik chinniabo nai lamga haichiu din-e: “Tingwang niu tingmik chinniabo naise pangam pakhiangna gasu mathak mibo-e.”
Haibo lamga dinlan-e: “Paliuniu wadao khatdi Iniu pikhai rabo mathakbo kadih gase ngutlakge.”
Kawichamse chiurai lumai siniu sibo mathakbose daolu makge, palamra paliuniu malum makge. Sichiusai khangsiamai ronna mathakbose daora suikhai mide.
Haise palingjiu lenkhaibo-e, chiubora Tingwang niu “Thainai” chiubo tingmik khat pikhai lanbo-e. Tingkum wajiukha saiga paniu David khuga dinkhai mibose Masanbo ariak bam khatga dinkhai-e:
“Thainai naliuniu Tingwang khuan chiulusai,
naliu lung tanjiu bamta sulo.”
Tingwang niu tingmik pachinniabo nai mathakbo kum, Tingwang maidung leng mathakbo khat bamme.
Tingwang niu tingmik chinniabo nai pangam gasu mathakbo kum, Tingwang niu ladriat khaibo daolubo mainiu pangam gasu mathak rabo-e.
Sibo mathakse daolu raleng paliu malum tangmakbo kumjiu, aliu mai khatdi kaomi makjiu, chiudi aliuniu daolu raleng matanjiu bamkhe.

Tingwang ladkengra karingbo, khatdi pumtan bambo, pamun nia bambo apang-heng suangdi liang-e. Haise hiuna nai lungchun aruangbo, ai-tahi nai ahiang wang mathukbo gadi kamtam lubuibo-e. Haisiniu chamaina lungchun nai pamaning situ ladjan thiu bambo-e.
Tingwang khugasu baingam lura wakhatnadi ha-e; damkhaibo mania hina Rapiu mikphuiga gomkhai makjiu lekhai bamme. Sichiujiu pakhuga aliugu tienkam lamga aliu mathiu pirabo-e.
Sichiusai aliuniu dinmadu padmibo malumbo situ tajum matipjiu bamkhe. Palamra aliugu Dithubo Singku, Tingwang Nahpiu Jesu, Tingwang masuang siakga tadkhai mibo-e.

Aliugu Dibo Singku haira aliugu kasonboga lungsakhai ngamlakbo makge. Chiudi pajai khatlamniu, aliutu kumjiu palam hinaga hiamkhai mibo Dibo Singku khat aliu khuga bamme, chiudi para nuan ga kaokhaimi makge.
Sichiusai aliuniu Tingwang gu lungsiat bambo chawangbam gase malumjiu mana wangkhe. Siga aliuniu pageng bambo saisuijiu lungsiat nai thoidamse daolu rabo-e.
Dibo Singku hinatu parupmai ruanggasu kadalujiu paliu mathiusung Tingwang tu machara, khatdi nuan jengniu charathiu raleng kadapad khaibo-e.
Sichiujiu padi palam hinaga kasonbo jengniu, simak-ngaomak mai khuga kamaobo kamkhaibo sui-e.
Sichiujiu papumsiakdi kasonbo mai thiubo jengniu maidung nuan leng ronna makjiu, panuan jengniudi charathiu bambo-e.
Sigasu mai khatniudi, Dibo Singku khat thiubogu chakhuang thiubose paronna kadalubo makge. Aaron tu kumjiu, Tingwang niu mai khattu kupad khaibo ganiu Dibo Singku khat pithiu khaibo-e.
“Nangse Anahpiu-e, thainai gasu I Napiu thiu rabo-e.”
“Nangra Melchizedek gu lunlung kumjiu tingthengjiu singku thiu rabo-e.”
Sichiujiu pase Tingwang Nahpiu thiubam tadi, pagu magenthiu chariubo gasu kadin piubose silu-e.
Sichiujiu patuse pi tathuikhai lubo saiga, pacham majai lumai mathiugu tingthengjiu juringbo phibangse paniu thiu mide.
Sichiujiu Melchizedek gu tajai saisuijiu patu singku dibo thiura,Tingwang niu din madukhai mibo-e.
Haibo lamga aliuniu dinra keng bamme, chiudi naliu khuga katikhaira kung-e, palamra naliu hai wasi kamani mai-e.

Chiudi naliura katipaodung thiulubui mibo-e, chiudi naliutu Tingwang gu karaibo ngiudon sidi naliutu katikhai lanra pageng bamme. Hainiu dinbora naliuniu katanbo tatek tiurabo sung, kabui-ndui sakra pageng bamkha-e.
Kabui-ndui sakmai sira ngena khat thiubam kha-e, palamra pase kamaji ka-nkhuibo lamga wadi simakge chiubo-e.
Chiudi katanbo tatek sira katingmaidung leng-e, paliura paliu tienkam gasu kawi-kasa sitam lubui mibo maidung-e.
Aliuniu Khristian thiu karaibogu katikhaise phutlujiu , kabuibo katikhaibo gase jontad sukhe. Tingwang tu malumbo gu kaphungse donlanjiu
tadui nphumbo lamga khatdi chaben henkhaibo lamga, kashai mainiu ringsulanbo khatdi tingthenggu ladjan thiubo lamga katikhai situ phutlujiu bamta sukhe.
Suanglam aliu jontad sukhe! Sichiujiu Tingwang niu suikhai sai, haise aliuniu kamrabo si-e.

Palamra paliu malum phutmi maidungtu dechiujiu lungli lanra puiwanglan ngamralo? Pawan khatga paliu Tingwang gu kabenboga bamniu-e; sichiujiu paliuniu tinggen gu kalense machantao mide khatdi paliu dam Masanbo Hiupuina dao kamigu-e.
Tingwang ladse wi-e chiubo paliuniu si-e, khatdi wangkinbo chaken-gu pumtanse paliuniu silu mibo-e.

Chiudi paliuniu paliugu malumbose phutmibo-e! Paliuniu lungliwang lanra wadaodi suilak mide, palamra paliuniu Tingwang Nahpiutu kamshat khai lanjiu khatdi patu mathiu masuangga kam mangam khailan rabo-e.
Tingwang niu kadih haitu thoikhaijiu tingriu khaibi-e, sichiujiu chalu tien thiu maileng gengrabo chapiubuan chaganniw pilung khaibi-e.
Chiudi haisiniu tathu nai kara ronna puakkhangsai haise wadi pageng hamide; sichiujiu haise Tingwang siang daojiu chaminiu ruthonmi rabo-e.
Chiudi kakungbo akahmaidung yo, aliuniu haichiu dinbamdi, naliu lamga wi-nkiubo khatdi juringbo guse aliuniu malum bamme.

Tingwang ra chamiu-mareng thiu makge. Naliu tienkam khatdi naliugu lungsabo situ paniu mangai lakge, sichiujiu naliuniu Khristian singnadungtu pikhai mibo khatdi pikhaijiu bambo situ paniu mangai lakge.
Naliuniu kanambo tangjiu ramgunjiu bamra khatdi naliuniu maningbose wangtang khaira aliuniu lunibo-e.
Naliu make makjiu, chiudi malum maidung kumjiu, khengsijiu bamra khatdi Tingwang niu ladriat khaibose daolumai thiura aliuniu masenbo-e.
Tingwang niu Abraham khuga ladriat thiuboga pagu ladriatse kamkhaira paniu dinriat khaibo-e. Pasuang di-nkiubo mai khatdi hamibo donniu, paniu ladriat thiubo gase pazan gasu dinriat khai-e.
Paniu din-e, “Iniu nakhuga ladriat thiu khaibo-e, chiubora Iniu natu thoikhai bine, khatdi nakai-nakik kengjiu pikhai bine.”
Abraham hai khengsibo donniu haichiujiu Tingwang niu ladriat khaibose paniu daolude.
Mai khatniu tasiang siangboga, pasuang di-nkiubo mai khat zan thinlujiu siang-e, sichiujiu tasiang siniu tacham aribo pakhiangnase chapkhai-e.
Tingwang gu ladriat daoramai khuga Tingwang niu pagu ladriat lamga wadaodi kam kalikhai lakge, chiubose paniu pisi masan khai nibo-e.
Tingwang haira kali makge, khatdi arat makge chiubo lam nia bamme. Sichiujiu aliu pakhuga bamlumai siniu aliu masuangga bambo ramgunbose thin matiplu raleng kachukhai-e.
Haibo ramgun siniu aliu ringtinggu malee rambo singtang thiujiu bamme. Haise pachangbo khatdi tinggen raky lungsingga ngutra lenkhai bambo, zusungfaise lelujiu ngutlu raleng-e.
Aliu malin thiujiu siga Jesu niu Melchizedek singku jaiga tingthenggu Dibo Singku thiujiu aliu masuangga ngutrai mide.

Siga Abraham paniu daolubo pakhiangnagu kariugu damkhatse pikhai-e. (Melchizedek gu karaibo zanse “Tacheng matipbo wangpiu”, chiu-e khatdi pase Salem wangpiu thiubam niubo donniu, pazan ramba sidi “Agi-manaibo Wangpiu chiubo-e.”)
Melchizedek gu papui-papiu maksai papao-papeh lamga wadi ha-e, sichiujiu patu manabo lamgadi maksai pah shaibo lamgadi ha-e. Pase Tingwang Nahpiu kumjiu tingtheng gu singku thiu bamniu-e.
Chiusai pase dejiuga dimai thiubam niulo. Aliu pao-peh Abraham niu chari gasu daolubo pakhiangna gu dam kariugu damkhatse pakhuga pikhai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu Levi kai-kik gasu singku thiumaidung siniu Israel maidung khuga, Abraham kai-kik thiubam tadi, dam kariugu damkhat lura tacheng-tajaiga chamtan pikhai mibo-e.
Melchizedek se Levi khugasu lungkiubo makge, chiudi Tingwang gu ladriat daolubo piu Abraham khugasu paniu dam kariugu damkhatse dao lubo-e khatdi patu thoikhai bibo-e.
Thoidam daobo piu suang thoikhai bibo piuse di-diangbo-e chiuboga maora ha-e.
Singku maidunggu lamgara kariugu damkhatse shaira maidungniu daobo-e chiudi Melchizedek lengra Masanbo ariakniu dinbo kumjiu, kariugu damkhatse ringjiu bammai khatniu daobo-e.
Haichiujiu dinboga, Abraham niu kariugu damkhat pibo tingga Levi di (kariugu damkhat khabo kai-kik) kariugu damkhatse pimibo-e.
Palamra Melchizedek niu Abraham tu adaobo ting gase Levi tu mana makhabo-e.

Levi maidunggu singku bam saisuijiu tacheng-tajaise Israel maidung khuga pikhai mibo-e. Levi maigu singku tiense luimachangjiu bamniu-e sai, tuhoira Aaron makbo, Melchizedek bam malinra, kakibo singku lungpadra pageng bamniu lakge.
Palamra singku bamse kam kalisai tacheng-tajai sidi kam kalimi rabo-e.
Sichiujiu aliu Rapiu sira haibo kiphiu gasu makge, khatdi pakiphiu gasu mai khatniudi singku thiujiu tatien thiubo ha-e.
Pase Judah kiphiu ganiu manabo-e chiubo simasan bamme; khatdi Mose niu singku maidung lamga dinbo tingga haibo kiphiu lamga dinkhai makge.
Palamse siwidiangra bamme, Melchizedek kumbo, katambo singku khat lungwang bamme.
Patuse, chamainagu tacheng-tajai chamtan gasu makjiu, chiudi pamalan thiu makjiu ringbambo pumtan siniu singku pithiu khaibo-e.
Palamra Masanbo ariakniu din-e; “Nang haise Melchizedek gu jai-ali gasu tingthengjiu singku thiurabo-e.”
Kaguangbo tachengse luthon mide, palamra sise pumtan ha-e khatdi pageng ha-e.
Palamra Mose gu Tacheng-tajai niu wakhatnadi pi tathui khai ngam makge. Sichiujiu tuhoira wi-nkiubo malum pikhai bibo donniu aliu Tingwang khuga manawang lude.
Nkiujiu Tingwang niu ladriat khaibo bamme. Kakimaidungtu singku pithiu khaibo tingga haikumbo ladriat thiu khaibo ha-e.
Chiudi Jesu haira ladriat khaibo khat gasu singku thiuwangbo-e. Sichiujiu Tingwang niu pakhuga din-e,
“Rapiu niu katanbo ladriat thiu khai-e,
sichiujiu sise paniu lumalan dai lakge:
‘Nangra tingtheng gu singku thiurabo-e.’”
Sichiujiu katambo ladriat siniu Jesu hai wi-nkiubo chamriat gu madan diangkhai mibo si-e.
Kakibo katambodi bamkha-e: sisera kakibo singku kengsui bamme, chiudi paliura shaimide siniu paliu ngamse tenphu ngamlu makge.
Chiudi Jesu ra tingthengjiu ring bamme, sichiujiu pagu singku tiense mai khat khugadi malin khai makge.
Sichiujiu para tuhoidi, wanglan rabo pawan hinagadi Tingwang khuga wangmaitu paniu rankhai ngamme, palamra pah tingtheng ringbamjiu paliuleng Tingwang khuga khengbambo-e.
Sichiusai Jesu hai aliuleng kagengbo pikhaibo Dibo Singku si-e. Pase masanbo-e; pamao ha-e maksai pakhuga nuan ha-e; pahai nuan phungmai khugasu tampad lujiu, kakubo tinggenlam khangmide.

Pahai kakibo Dibo Singku maidung kum makge, chiubora raijiu panuan leng, sibosai pamaidung nuan jengniu naimachangna charathiu bamra pageng ha-e. Pah papumsiak rathak mania thiujiu maluad khatniu kadpat khai mibose tingtheng leng-e.

Mose gu Tacheng-tajai siniu tathui makbo maidungtu Dibo Singkudung leng kada khai-e; chiudi Tacheng-tajai suang wang kanambo Tingwang gu ladriat siniu tingthengjiu tathui khaibo Nahpiu situ kadakhai mibo-e.
Chamainiu makjiu, Rapiu niu thiukhaibo mathenkyga Masan Thubo Bamga pahai Dibo Singku khat thiujiu macha bamme.
Dibo Singku hinatu kada khaibo sira Tingwang khuga kalen pikhaira khatdi khaoring rathak thiukhai raleng-e, sichiusai aliugu Dibo Singku siniudi wakhat pipadra bamme.
Sichiujiu pase kadihpiriga bamniu-e sai, Jehudi maigu Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu kalen pipadra singku maidung bambo jengniu, pase singku thiumak bamniu rabo-e.

Paliuniu singku tien thiubo sira palingjiu pameng ronna-e, sise tinggen-gu pameng ronna-e. Haise Mose khugadi machambo-e. Paniu Ladriat khairabo Mathenkyse thiu surabo tingga Tingwang niu pakhuga din-e, “Natu maluang riga ngaolen khai mibo kum gapjiu wahinase kambo-e.”

Chiudi tuhoira, Jesu tu singku tien pikhai mibose, Tingwang nai pamaidung kakga wi-nkiubo ladriat kamkhai mibo jengniu, chiubora ladriatgu wi-nkiubo gase mangiu khai mibo donniu, pahai paliu suang di-nkiu mibo-e.
Raibo ladriatga wadi maobo haniu-e sai, niabo chiubo hai wadi pageng bamson lakge.
Chiudi Tingwang niu pamaidung mao ngaolubo donniu din-e,
“Iniu Israel maidung nai Judah maidung khuga
kasanbo ladriat thiurabo wanse wangkinne chiujiu Rapiu niu din-e,
Sisera Iniu paliu paopeh maitu Egypt kadih gasu
paliu ben julujiu padbo tingga ladriat thiukhaibo kum lakge.
Agu ladriat gase paliu lungchun khai makge,
sijengniu paliu khuga Iniu achun ngut makge.
Tuhoira Israel mai khuga haibo ladriatse
Iniu thiu khaine chiujiu Rapiu niu din-e:
agu tacheng-tajaise paliu lungchun-ga pikhaine
sichiujiu paliu lungchun-ga raokhai bine
Iniu paliu Rawang thiurabo-e, khatdi paliuniu amaidung thiurabo-e.
Paliu ruangga mai khatniudi parammai khuga,
khatdi pagu singnamai khuga, ‘Rapiu tu silo’ chiujiu katikhai lakge.
Palamra paliu ruangga, siam thubo gasu
dithubo katang siniu atu simi rabo-e.
Iniu paliu nuanse kuak khai rabo-e
khatdi paliu maodungse maningtao lan lakge.”
Kasanbo ladriat saisuijiu, Tingwang niu karaibose pijiu guang khai mide; sichiujiu guangmibo hina khatdi kek mibo hinase hanuangmi rabo-e.
Karaibo ladriatga kahumrabo jaidung bamniu-e khatdi kahumbo bam sidi chamainiu kamjiu bamniu-e.
Lenlam Masanbo Bam chiujiu kubo mathenky khat thiukhang bamniu-e. Sibo lung gase chamibung dungbo bam khatdi Tingwang leng taruak pipad rabo tasingkai bamniu-e.
Niabo jusung fai lunglamse Masan Thubo Bam chiu kubo bam khat bamme.

Sibo lungga maruta matao raleng kachiagu rathak bam khatdi kachianiu topkhaibo Ladriat Bung khatdi kachiagu karung palungga manna bambo, pabuan bonbo Aaron thun khatdi chamtan raokhaibo tukang niase siga bamme.
Ladriat Bung rilamse Tingwang bambotu madukhaijiu, pakan phungbo khaoring meng, nuan kuak khaibo bamga paliu kansiniu gomlujiu bamme. Chiudi tuhoira sise katikhai sonra pawan tamide.

chiudi Dibo Singku ronna palungbo Mathenky gase tingkum khat lungga ngutlon gui nakha ngutle. Paniu papum siakleng khatdi maidungniu simakjiu kammibo nuanleng Tingwang khuga pipadbo tazaise pon ngutle.
Lenlamgu Mathenky se bam thenna Masan Thubo Bam gase ngutrabo npuise lepad makha-e chiubo Masanbo Hiupuina niu masanjiu katikhai bamme.
Haise thaidao kentu siojiu dinramba khaibo chamme. Haisiniu Tingwang leng pipadbo kalendung nai khaoringgu rathak mania siniu kahumjiu bammai lungchunse pikim khai ngam makge.

Palamra sikumbose tiura-sakrabo leng ronna-e, khatdi katam-tambo kam masan khaibo rathak ronna leng-e. Sikumbo hina sira lenlamgu lunlungsi-e Tingwang niu kasanbo tajaise thinsu makbo suangga ronna leng-e.

Chiudi Khrista haira tuhoi bambo kawibo hinagu Dibo Singku thiujiu wangkhai mide. Paniu machajiu bambo mathenky haise di-nkiu-e khatdi wi-nkiu-e, haise chamainiu thiukhaibo mathenky makge, chiubora haise damkhai mibo kadihpiri gasu makge.

Khrista niu mathenky lungga malodkhat, mathiu sung Masan Thubo Bamga ngutkhai mibo sira, kami nai matomchi zai thin makjiu, pazai-siak thinlujiu ngut, aliu mathiuleng halanmakbo juringbose daolu raleng-e.
Kami nai matomchi zai khatdi rukhai mibo wakhaopoi miruise masanmak maidung riga kajin khaijiu paliutu kam masan khai-e.

Haise maji-e chiusai, Khrista zai siniu kam masan khaibose dejiukha tathui ralo! Hiupuina pen gasu Tingwang khuga tathuibo thiujiu papum kadkhai mide. Pazai siniu gengmakbo racheng gasu aliu lungchunse kam maji khaijiu, ringbambo Tingwang tu aliuniu machara suikhai mibo-e.

Sichiujiu Tingwang niu kupadmi maidung leng Tingwang niu ladriat thiu khaibo, tingtheng gu thoidam ngaolu raleng Khrista niu kasanbo ladriat macha khaibo-e. Haise kam ngam lurabo-e palamra karaibo ladriat hangga bamniubo kakhui-kamaobo gasu kalankhai bira shaikhai mibo-e.
Ladriat thiukhaiboga, ladriat thiukhaibo paniu shaikhai bira pageng sidi bamrabo-e.
Ladriat khat chiubo hai papaoniu ringbam thenra wadi makge; chiudi paniu shaimibo sailam pad rabo-e.
Sijengniu karaibo ladriat sira tazai thinlujiu lingsubo-e.

Raiboga, Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu maidung siniu tadkiura Mose niu paliu khuga dinkhai mibo-e. Sibosai paniu matomchi zaise nai kami zaise tadui jiuga khai-aja lujiu, Tacheng-tajai gu ariakkhuang riga khatdi maidung hina riga, maramtang nai kahengbo wakhaogiu siniu kajinkhai lujiu din-e.
“Haibo zaise Tingwang niu naliu khuga chamtan pikhaibo ladriat si-e.”
Sise kumjiu Mose niu Mathenky khatdi kahumboga thinbo mania hina riga tazaise kajin khai-e.
Palingjiu, Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu wa hinase tazai siniu kam masan khai-e, sichiujiu tazaise runkhai bisai nuan hinase kuak khai mibo-e.
Tinggen gu jai-ali lubo mania hinase sichiujiu kam masan khairabo-e. Chiudi tinggen gu thiubo maniadung siak sira wi-nkiubo rathak mania thiura pageng bamme.
Palamra palingbo jai-ali lubo, chamainiu thiukhaibo Masan Thubo Bam kam khaibo lungga Khrista ngut makge, Para tinggen siakga ngutlujiu tuhoi Tingwang masuangga aliu malin thiujiu bamme.
Jehudi maigu Dibo Singku siniu tingkum machangna khaoring zai thinlujiu Masan Thubo Bamga ngutle. Chiudi Khrista ra papumse pipad lanra ngutson makge,

sichiu maksai, kadih damsubo gasu padi chariu magenthiu lanrabo-e. Chiudi tuhoira chaken kaloiboga paniu papum siaktu rathak mania thiujiu malod khatniu tingtheng leng pipad khaimibo jengniu nuanse luthon mira malod khat madukhai mibo-e.
Mai hinase shaisiak rabo-e, khatdi sibo saiga Tingwang niu ladjan thiu rabo-e.

Sise kumjiu Khrista niudi maidung nuan luthonra papumse rathak mania thiujiu malod khat pipad khai mibo-e. Paniu palon niabo thiujiu wangbo gara Nuan jengniu tatien thiu lakge, chiudi patu khuanjiu bammai dungtu rankhaira-e.

Jehudi maigu Tacheng-tajai haise wangkinbo palingbo khatdi malumsuibo leng bui makge; haise pameng nakha lenkhaibo-e. Takum machangna rathak haise kadkhaijiu bambo-e. Tingwang khuga wangra dechiujiu Tacheng-tajai siniu piwangtang khai luralo?
Tingwang tu kahum maidung nuanse pachangjiu masan misai, paliuniu manang tami rabo-e khatdi charathiu tami rabo-e.
Chiudi rathak mania siniu tingkum machangna nuan lamga pi maningtao khaijiu bambo-e.
Palamra matomchi nai kami zainiu nuanse wadaodi luthon ngamlu lakge.
“Rathak mania nai kalen pipadbo situ Rapiu nangniu masen makge,
chiudi nangniu aleng chamaipum khat kaden khaibi-e.
Khaoring pum rathak bamga rukhaijiu pipadbo,
maksai nuan luthonra kalen pipadbo situ Arapiu nangniu kim makge.
Sigasu Iniu din-e, ‘Tacheng-tajaigu ariakkhuangga raokhai mibo kumjiu,
Oh Tingwang, namaning tenra I haiga bamme.’”

“Raiboga paniu din-e, nuan luthonra, rathak mania, pipadbo khaoring pum majong khaibo, khatdi masanbo bamga rukhaijiu pipadbo situ a-Rapiu nangniu masen makge khatdi kimmakge.” Tacheng-tajai saisuijiu rathak pipadjiu bamdi paniu haichiu din mibo-e.
Sigasu paniu din-e, “Oh Tingwang yo, nangniu maningbo kamra I haiga bamme.” Sijengniu, Tingwang niu kaguangbo rathakdungse luthon lujiu, Khrista gu rathak siniu malinkhai mibo-e.
Palamra Tingwang niu masenbose Jesu Khrista niu kamkhai mide, paniu malod khat gasu papum pipad khai mibo siniu aliu mathiutu nuan gasu tingtheng leng masan khai mibo-e.
Sichiudi Khrista niu nuanleng charathiu khai guijiu tingtheng leng wi-nkiubo ga pipadkhai-e, sichiu lujiu pase Tingwang ben majatlam ntaobam mide.
Sijengniu tuhoira Tingwang niu pagu mikre maidungtu paphipan pithiu khai makthen khuanjiu bamme.
Lon-gui pipad gasu kam masan khailujiu maidungtu paniu tingtheng pi-witathui khai mide.
Sichiujiu Masanbo Hiupuina niudi aliu khuga pagu jengdin pikhai-e.
Rai-boga paniu din-e,
“Wangkinbo tingmikga Iniu haibo ladriatse paliu khuga thiu khaira-e,
chiujiu Rapiu niu din-e:
agu tacheng-tajaise paliu lungchun-ga pikhai bine,
khatdi paliu lungchun-ga raokhai bine.”
Haichiujiu paliu maodungse kuakkhai misai, nuan luthonra jengniu kalen pipadra pageng bamlan lak mide.
Chiusai, asingna maidung yo, Jesu niu shaikhai bibo donniu Masan Thubo Bamga ngutraleng khenrang thiu mide.
Paniu papum pikhaijiu, chiubora zusungfaise lekhaijiu, kasanbo npui, karingbo npuise aliuleng lekhai nbamme.
Tingwang kyga aliugu kadibo singku khat bamme.
Sichiujiu aliuniu nchangbo lungchun siniu khatdi palingbo malum siniu, chiubora kamaobo maning gasu kam masanlubo lungchun siniu, khatdi masanbo duiniu khiulubo jengniu Tingwang khuga manawang sukhe.
Aliuniu dinpad mibo machun situ matipjiu thin bamkhe, palamra Tingwang gu ladriatse malum kabuibo-e.
Aliu khatniu khattu manang khaijiu, khatniu khattu lungsabo lenjiu, kawi kamra nkhajiu bamkhe.
Khangsia maidungniu kambambo kumjiu, aliu wang aruangbo saomi dukhe. Rapiu gu Tingmikse nawangdiang mide chiubo silujiu, aliu khatniu khattu nkiujiu kachu khaijiu bamkhe.
Palamra aliuniu kamajibose silubo sai nuanse tenlan lanjiu bamsai, nuan jengniu charathiu lanra bam sonta mide.
Sibosung wahina ruangga wangkinbo Ladjan situ, chiubora Tingwang tu mikre maidungtu kam maha rabogu mi situ pingjiu khuanrabo si-e!
Mai khatniu Mose gu Tacheng-tajaise piumakjiu pamaose mai khangnia khangsumniu silubo lamchap thiusai patuse lungsabo thiumakjiu kamshat mibo-e.

Chiusai Tingwang Nahpiu tu din masabam maise dechiu ralo? Tingwang ladriatniu nuantu khiu masan khaibotu wajeng simakbo maise saolo? Hiupuina gu lungsiattu din masa bambo maise saolo? Mainiu din silakbo lungpomse pariga wang rabo-e chiubo maningtao lulo.
Palamra, “Iniu chakhum ruine khatdi padam pilan rabo-e,” khatdi “Rapiu niu pamaidungtu ladjan thiurabo-e,” chiujiu dinbo aliuniu sibamme.
Ringjiu bambo Tingwang ben-ga kaokhaibo hai mai kapingbo gu-e!
Karaiga naliu khuga padmibose maningtaolo. Sibo tingmik lungga Tingwang gu nbiu naliu riga thaoben khaiboga naliu chariu khengsui khai mide, chiudi kasabo siniu naliutu pi ngamkhai makge.
Naliutu mathiu masuang gasu kam mangamjiu, kam masakhai mibo-e, sichiujiu naliuniu sibo damse dao macham lura kaden kami gu-e.

Sichiujiu kavangkyga wangbogu chariuse naliuniu padam lu ncham khai mide,khatdi naliugu mania pakhiangna sutluboga, naliu chun wikhai mide, palamra halan makrabo, wi-nkiubo maniase naliu khuga bamme chiubo naliuniu silude.
Sijengniu, naliu lungchun nkhinmi tulo, palamra nkhin makbo siniu kadibo tathuonse phungwangbo-e.
Tingwang maning kamra khatdi paniu ladriat khaibose daolura naliuniu khengsira pageng bamme.
Palamra, Masanbo ariakniu din-e:
“Pawan poinakha bamkhai sai, wangrabo Rapiu se wangmi rabo-e;
pase wangribo thiu lakge.
Tacheng-matipbo amaidungse, malumbo gasu ringlu rabo-e,
chiudi paliu ruangga mai khatniu nkhin misai patuse Iniu kimlakge.”
Aliu hai masai nkhinjiu hamibo maidung makge, chiudi malumbo gasu ranlu maidung-e.
Malumbo chiubo hai aliuniu machunbo lamga nsi-siakbo si-e, khatdi aliuniu ngaomakbo lamga palingjiu sibo si-e.
Palamra malumbo hainiu karaiga lungkhai mibo maidungniu Tingwang gu suikhaibose daomibo-e.

Malumbo jaomakjiu mai khatniudi Tingwang tu pikim khai ngamlu lakge, palamra Tingwang khuga wangrabo mai siniu Tingwang bamme chiubo malumsiak rabo-e, sichiujiu patu phiu maitu tathuon pi-e chiubo malumsiak rabo-e.
Malumbo gasu Tingwang niu ladriat khaibo ramgase patu sangmai khat kumjiu lung khaide. Tingwang ladriat daolubo Isaac khatdi Jacob kumjiu padi mathenkyga lung-e.
Palamra Tingwang niu tingtheng leng kaphung donkhaibo riga thiukhaibo namdi situ Abraham niu khuan bamniu-e.
Abraham niu palam khatga shaibo kum bamniu tadi papen gasu chakai chakikse tinggen ga chagandung kum khatdi duipui hugen-ga nbuiniang kum pariakse kengpad lubo-e.
Haichiujiu paliuniu masanjiu paliu kadih leng phuijiu bambo-e chiubo madukhai-e.
Paliuniu saodiak mibo kadih lamga maningjiu bam makge; paliuniu maningjiu bamsai, paliu malanwang mira pawan daolu bamta lakge.

Sibosung paliuniu, ramgunbo sira wi-nkiubo namdi, tinggen namdi situ-e. Haijengniu, paliuniu Tingwang tu paliu Rawang-e chiujiu kuboga pa mangam makge, palamra paniu paliuleng namdi khat kaden khai bamme.
Tingwang niu pakhuga din-e, “Iniu ladriat khai mibo nakai-nakikse Isaac khugasu nangniu daorabo-e.”
Tingwang niu Isaac tu kashaibo gasu piringsu khai ngamme chiubo Abraham malumme, sichiujiu, Abraham niu Isaac tu kashaibo gasu ringjiu daolu-e.
Pawan khat nuan ga aman khaibo sung, Tingwang maidungtu maluang lujiu chariu khengra paniu masen nkiu-e.
Egypt kadihgu chakhiu chalan suangra Messiah donniu charuat tiujiu chariu khengboniu wi-nkiu-e chiubo paniu maning khai-e, palamra pasai daorabo tathuon situ paniu phuijiu bamniu-e.
Malumbo Mose niu chawang lungpomtu pingmakjiu Egypt kadihtu saodiak lu-e. Ngaomakbo Tingwang tu ngaobo kumjiu paniu sailam mariwang lanra suikhai makge.
Malumbo siniu Israel mai nah naraitu Kashaibogu maza siniu kamshat makra Kenpadbo Ngee hai lingsu khai-e khatdi kamun hina riga tazaise kajin khaira chamtan pikhai-e.
Ma-lumbo jengniu papum kajonpui Rahab tu Tingwang niu malum makbo mai ruangga kamshat khai makge. Palamra paniu Israel maigu chakhumpao maitu wijiu lukhaibi-e.
Malumbo ganiu kadihpiri pabam hina chari thiuboga paliuniu ngamlu-e. Paliuniu majibose kamjiu Tingwang niu ladriat khaibose daolu-e. Paliuniu ndongqui mun khamlu-e.
Katanbo mitu kammid lujiu chahengniu bishat rabo gasu marenlu-e, Paliuse sonbam liutadi tankhang mi-e, paliuse chari thiuboga tanchang tan-e sichiujiu sangdiumai riphendungtu ngamlu-e.
Malumbo pen gasu maipuidungniu shaimibo paliu singnamaitu ringwang lanbo ngaolu-e.
Khangsia mainiu khenrang thiubotu lukhai makjiu chiudi wi-nkiubo ringting leng chariubo khengjiu shaikhai mide.
Khangsia maitu tanui thiujiu dap masa khai-e khatdi khangsia maitu ratlujiu kavangkyga khai-e.
Paliutu tatuniu rotle, khatdi nkhoiniu rom nia thiu khai-e, paliutu chahengniu bishat khai-e. Paliutu mily nai kami giu piben khaijiu kam mangamjiu khatdi kam mathadjiu kam masa khai-e.
Kadihpiri hai paliu lengra wiliang makge! Paliu hai sangmai kumjiu manamjiuga khatdi chakhao-chakhaga khatdi tulimkiga ron tadjiu lungkhai mide.
Paliuniu malumbo pen gasu haikumbo hinase paliuniu kamjiu lungkhai mide, chiudi paliuniu Tingwang gu ladriat sira ngaolu makge.
Palamra Tingwang niu aliuleng wi-nkiubo maningse kadenkhai mide. Pagu maning sira aliu jaojiu paliutu piwi tathui khaibi rabo si-e.
Aliu lengra, jengdin thiumai kakengniu aliutu maguijiu bamme. Haichiusai aliutu ratman nbambo nuan gasu aliu paklura kamkhe, khatdi aliu masuangga bambo majubo tuse maning lujiu pak karen sukhe.

Paphibang gasu kaloibo tangjiu aliuniu malumjiu bambo Jesu tu aliu phuijiu bamkhe. Singchai jeng gasu paniu phutkhai makge. Sibosung nkiujiu wangkinbo chunwibo situ ngaolujiu singchai riga shairabotu marenmi makbo donniu, tuhoi pah Tingwang gu chawangbam majatlam ntaojiu bamme.
Paniu dechiu chariu khengkhai migulo chiubo maningtao khailo; paniu nuan phungmaigu marengbose dechiu khengkhai migulo! Sichiujiu naliu lungchun nkhinjiu phutmi tulo.
Palamra nuantu aphenjiu kamshat mirabo katang naliura khengkhai makge.
Tingwang niu naliutu panahpiu maitu kumjiu kathuat khaibo chamse naliuniu mangaimi jiuma?
“Anah yo, Rapiu niu natu kam maji khaiboga nachun ngutlulo,
khatdi paniu natu rukhaiboga nalung nkhinmi tulo.
Palamra Rapiu, paniu lungsabo mai hinatu kam maji khai-e,
khatdi paniu panahpiu kumjiu lukhaimai hinatu rukhai bi-e.”
Naliugu chariubose papiuniu panahtu rukhaibo kumjiu khengbam sai, Tingwang niu naliutu panahmai kumjiu lukhai bambo-e. Palamra papiuniu rukhai makbo nah sao bamlo?
Sichiujiu naliutu panahpiudung kumjiu rukhaibo ha-e sai, naliuse panahpiudung siak makge chiudi chakhapui nahdung-e.
Aliutu kam majikhai bibo, aliu chamaina piu bamme, khatdi aliuniu paliutu chakhuang thiu-e. Sichiusai dejiukha nkiujiu, aliugu Hiupuina Piu kadin piujiu lungralo!
Aliugu chamaina piudungniu aliutu lungsabo jengniu pakak khatleng aliutu rukhai-e; chiudi Tingwang niu aliutu pagu masanbo dam lumachamra jengniu aliutu rukhaibo-e.
Aliutu rukhaibo wan-ga aliutu pi chunwi makjiu pichun sakhai-e. Sichiudi rujiu laddin kalu maise pasai agi-manaibo gu rasy, tacheng-matipbo ringtingse daolu-e.
Majibo npui gase tadlulo, sichiujiu paphi tangmai siniu ngam makbo thiu makjiu chiudi wilura leng-e.
Mai hina khuga agi-manaibo thiu lujiu, khatdi masanjiu lunglulo, palamra haise jaomakjiu mai khatniudi Rapiu tu ngaolu lakge.
Tingwang gu lungsiat gasu nkhinmi makra mathing silulo. Mai khatniudi kakhabo men puaksujiu karabo tai thiumi makra kam lulo.
Hiupuina lunlungtu simakbo khatdi matun makbo Esau niu malod khat tatekleng naraibogu kalek lurabo damse jonmibo kummak rabo-e.
Naliuniu sibamme chiubora papiugu thoidam paniu luni lande, chiudi patuse hathon mide; palamra paniu kapjiu phiubam tadi palung lirabo wanse hamide.
Israel maidung khuga Sinai Luongga taobambo mi, tamiubo nai nchungbo, tingthung tingkai gasu wangkhai mibo kumjiu, naliu khugara wangtang makha-e.
Siga make marabo khuan nai chakhuan katanbose chiukhaiboga, chiukhai lumai siniu kakibo ladkeng chiulan makra kheng-e.
Palamra chamtan siniu, “Chakhao khat kumboniu maluang situ niatang khaisai, tatu niu phenshat mirabo-e,” chiu dinbo chamtanse paliuniu chiu ngam makge.
Sise mai phuipingbo lamga Mose niu din-e, “I pingbo donniu masandung-dung mide!”
Sibosung, naliura Zion Luongga khatdi ringjiu bambo Tingwang namdi, tinggen Jerusalem ga, khatdi mazadung sang-sang ruangga wangbam mide.

Naliura tinggen lam tazan raokhai nbambo, Tingwang gu naraibo nahpiudunggu chunwibo madui gase wangbam mide. Mai hinatu ladjan thiurabo Tingwang khuga khatdi kawimai hiupuina siniu maidungtu pitathui khaibo gase naliura wangbam mide.
Naliura Abel zainiu ladriat thiukhaibo suang wi-nkiubo, chiubora ladriat kasan kamkhaijiu tazai kajin khai birabo Jesu khuga wangbam mide.
Sibo wan-ga pakhuan siniu kadihpiritu kam malai khai rabo-e, chiudi tuhoira paniu ladriat thiukhai-e, “Iniu kadihpiri ronnatu makjiu tinggen tudi kam malaikhai lanrabo-e.”
“Lanrabo-e” chiubo ladkeng siniu malajiu lenkhaibo sira damkhai mibo maniase kam kachakhai lujiu luthonmi rabo-e, chiusai malailan makrabo maniase bammi rabo-e chiubo-e.
Sichiusai, aliu thuonkiujiu bamkhe, palamra malailan makbo Tingwang kadihse aliuniu daolude. Aliuniu thuonkiubo jaojiu khatdi Tingwang tu pikim khai lura chakhuang thiubo nai pingbo siniu kahumkhe;
palamra aliu Rawang haira palingjiu kam mahami rabo mi si-e.
Khristian singnamai kumjiu khatniu khattu lungsajiu bamlo.
Sangmaitu nakyga wijiu lukhaira maningtao lulo. Sichiu kambo gasu khangsianiu simak dakjiu mazadungtu lukhaijiu bamniu-e.
Kavangkyga bammaitu nangdi paliutu maluang bambo kumjiu maningtao khailo. Chariu khengjiu bammai tudi paliu kumjiu nangdi chariu kheng macham bambo maningtao khailo.
Magiangbo haitu mai hinaniu chakhuang thiu rabo-e, khatdi panao pakinaniu khat khat khuga matipjiu bamsi rabo-e. Npui-npiu lamga katania maitu khatdi kamakha maitu Tingwang niu ladjan thiurabo-e.
Sichiusai aliuniu hujiu dinkhe,
“Rapiu hai atu nkhapao-e, Iniu pingra ha-e.
Saoniu atu degu kamralo?”
Karaigasu naliu khuga Tingwang cham dinkhai mibo jupaodungtu maningtaolo. Paliuniu dechiujiu lungkhai milo, khatdi shaikhai milo, chiubo paliu malumse ali lulo.
Jesu Khrista haira ndanai, thainai khatdi tingthengjiu kali makge.

Katam-tambo rachenggu katikhai siniu naliutu majibo npui gasu jumaomi tulo. Katiu kasakbogu tacheng majaibo siniu makjiu, Tingwang lungsiat khugasu pumtan daobo siniu wi-e; katiu-kasakgu tacheng majaibo siniu wadi genglu lakge.
Jehudi maigu rathak bamga mawabammai siniu aliugu rathak bamga kadkhaibo rathak maniase tiubui makge.
Jehudi maigu Dibo Singku siniu, nuan jengniu tazaise Masan Thubo Bamga phungwang-e, chiudi khaoring pum sira kareng lenlam rumibo-e.
Sise kumjiu Jesu niudi pazainiu maidungtu nuan gasu khiu masan lura namdi lenlam shaikhai mide.
Chiusai aliu Rapiu khuga, namdi lenlam jontad sukhe khatdi pagu mangambo damse lu machamkhe.
Kadihriga tingthengjiu lungrabo namdi aliuleng ha-e; wangrabo namdi situ aliuniu phuijiu bambo-e.
Sijengniu, aliu pawan machang Tingwang tu Jesu pen gasu thuonkiujiu bamkhe, sise aliu munniu patu Rapiu si-e chiujiu din madubo si-e.
Kawibo kamjiu khatdi khatniu khattu nkha khaibose mangai mane, palamra haikumbo siniu Tingwang tu pikim khaibo rathak si-e.

Naliugu jupaodung kadin piulo, khatdi paliugu chamtan majailo. Palamra Tingwang khuga paliu ngamkam lamga pirabo jengniu, paliu mathak makjiu naliutu akhejiu bamme. Naliuniu paliu kadin piusai paliu ngamse chunwijiu kamrabo-e; sichiu maksai paliu chunsajiu kamrabo-e, sichiusai siseniu naliu khuga wadi geng lakge.
Aliuleng kakheng thiu khaijiu bamlo. Aliu lungchun masan bamme chiubo aliuniu simasan bamme, palamra aliuniu naliutu majibose pawan machangna pikam khai ni-e.
Sichiujiu Tingwang niu atu naliu khuga langwang khaira naliu chun ngutjiu kakheng thiubamra Iniu naliu khuga kheng khaibo-e.

Dibo Milykhuanpao, aliu Rapiu Jesu tu kashaibo gasu piringsu khaibo Tingwang siniu tingthenggu chamriatse madan diangkhai mide. Agi-manaibo Tingwang siniu Jesu Khrista pen-gasu, paniu machunbo saisuijiu naliuleng kagengbo hina kamlura pikhaibo thiu milo. Khrista khuga tingtheng tingthengjiu paken kadibo thiu milo! Amen.
Kachukhaibo cham dunnakha raokhaibo agu chamlen haise asingnamai naliuniu nking mawi khaira Iniu khengbo-e.
Aliu singnapiu Timothy hai kavangky gasu npad mide chiubo Iniu naliu khuga pisikhai ni-e. Paniu wangmaji sai, Iniu wangbo tingga patu maluang lujiu wangrabo-e.
Aliuniu kanui khaibo cham hai naliutu jupaodung mathiu khuga khatdi Tingwang maidung hina khuga paokhai bilo. Italy ga bambo singnamai niudi paliu gu kanuicham paokhai-e.
Tingwang lungsiat siniu naliu mathiutu maluang khaibo thiu milo.
Singnamai yo, naliu khuga madiubo pajat hina hai wangsai naliu sanwi-e chiu maning lulo, palamra naliugu malumbo siniu haikumbo madiubo hinatu ngam luboga, pumtanse wangbo-e.
Sichiujiu naliugu khengsibo siniu pi kaomi makra phui lulo, sichiusai wakhatnadi tangmakbo thiumakjiu tathui lubui-e.
Sichiujiu mai khat kumboniu ningting tang maksai, mai hinatu pikhai sibo khatdi paochali makjiu pikhaibo Tingwang khuga khenglulo, chiusai patu pikhai bine,
Chiudi nangniu khengbo tingga malum masa makjiu, malum siakjiu khenglulo, delosai malum masabo sira tingkainiu hunkhang hunkiujiu bambo duiliu tah kumbo-e.
Sikumbo mai siniu Rapiu khugasu wakhatnadi ngaolura agun tulo.
Palung chun nia phungbo para palung nchang mak mai-e.
Khristian mai kaleksamai situ Tingwang niu jukhang khai biboga chunwi lulo,
sichiujiu Khristian kalekwimai situ Tingwang niu jukiukhai biboga chunwi lulo. Palamra kalek wibose charapen kumjiu kuimi rabo-e.
Naimik tankhangjiu tingthiu suboga, chapiubuan situ phu agui mijiu, papense nkai mi-e sikumjiu kalek wimaidi paliu lai padjiu matan kinbo sidi hami rabo-e.
Kamadiuboga kaomi makjiu khenglu maise padon wi-e, palamra patu madiubose ngamlu misai, Tingwang niu patu lungsa maitu ladriat khai nbambo ringbo tathuonse paniu daorabo-e.
Aliu khuga kahiambo wangboga, ‘Tingwang niu aliutu hiambo-e’ chiujiu din tulo, palamra Tingwang niu mai khattudi kasaboga hiamkhai makge,
Chiudi aliuniu wakhat masenbo gasu jupad miboga khatdi aliugu kasabo lungchun siniu aliutu hiamlubo-e.
Sichiujiu kasabo lungchun siniu pawon phungmiboga nuan mana padle, khatdi nuan siniu dikhangboga kashaibo padle.
Lungsabo singnamaidung, naliutu pijiu sonmi tulo.
Kawibo kalen khatdi tathuibo kalen hina tinggen lamsu kiubo-e; haise tinggen nbiutu Dampao, kalimakbo Tingwang maksai tamiu lanmakbo pakhu gasu wangbo-e.
Paniu aliutu pagu gandam ruangga raithubo rasy thiulu raleng pagu majibo ladkeng siniu pamaning saisuijiu aliutu damwangbo-e.
Singna kakung maidung yo, mai hina nking silo, chiudi chalad dinnuang mane, khatdi chalung pomnuang mane chiubo hai maningtaolo.
Palamra chamai lungpom siniu tacheng matipbo Tingwang chunning kamlu makge.
Sijengniu masan kamakbo lunlung khatdi kasabo nkhai-rili hina phut milo. Naliutu ranlura, naliu lungchun-ga paniu lingkhai mibo ladkeng situ lukhai lujiu Tingwang khuga wanglulo.
Naliuniu chalad situ ka-nkingbo mai thiu makjiu, kakam maise thiu lulo.
Delosai mai khatniu tacham chiulujiu tatiense tenmak saira chahiubungga paronna pazu kaphuibose kumbo-e.
Paronna pazu phuikhai lujiu tadpad miboga mangai mibose kumbo-e.
Chiudi nangniu maidungtu khenrang thiukhai ngambo tacheng-tajai situ phuilujiu, khatdi nking lujiu mangai makjiu, tatien thiusai nangniu kambo hinaga Tingwang niu thoikhai birabo-e.
Nangniu, naronna nacheng matip-e chiu maning jiuma? Nangniu naleetu thinman ngam maksai nacheng matipbose mathakubo-e, khatdi naronna natu sonmibo-e.
Papiu Tingwang suangga masanbo khatdi nchangbo racheng sira: kami-magentu paliu magenthakga phuikhai sibo khatdi kadihpirigu kasabo lunlung gasu paronna maren lubo si-e.
Singnamai yo, naliuniu paken dibo Rapiu, Jesu Khrista situ malumbo donniu, chamai zu phuijiu chamiu-mareng thiumi tulo.
Wakhat kamjiu kalekwibo mai khatniu naliu ruangga kachia njungkhap khailu, papuan kawibo piulujiu wang-e, khatdi kaleksabo mai khatniu pafai pani kasabo khailujiu wangsai,
naliuniu pafai pani kawi piubo situ chakhuang thiujiu, “Haiga ntao khailo,” khatdi kaleksabo piu situ “Nangra siga chaplo, maksai nangra kadihga, aphi mungga ntaolo” chiujiu dinsai,
naliura chamai zu phuijiu kasabo lungchun siniu ladjan thiu mibo-e.
Singna kakungmai yo, nking khailo. Haibo kadihpirigu kaleksa maitu malumboga, khatdi patu lungsamaitu pikhaira ladriat thiukhai mibo wangdihse daora Tingwang niu kadakhai mibo-e.
Chiudi naliura kaleksa maitu chakhuang thiu makge, chiudi naliutu ladjan thiura leng kalekwimai situ naliuniu chakhuang thiu-e.
Paliura naliutu chakhuang thiukhaibo zan pikhai mibo situ din masakhai raleng-e.
Chiudi nangniu tazu phuilujiu chamiu-mareng thiu misai kamaoboga kaokhaijiu, Tacheng-tajai situ kampangjiu nuan kam mibo-e.
Mai khatniu Tacheng-tajai pakhiangna majai lujiu kengkhat majai maksai pakhiangna maomibo-e.
Palamra “Mainao kiu mane,” khatdi “Maitu gi mane,” chiu dinbose khang khatniu-e, sichiusai nangniu mainao kiumakdi, nangniu maitu kamshat misai, tacheng-tajaise kampang mibo-e.
Khenrang thiubo gasu ladjan thiura mai kumjiu, naliuniu chalad ronna din makjiu changamdi kam lulo.
Palamra lungsakhai makmai situ Tingwang lungsiat siniu ladjan thiune, sichiujiu lungsiat siniu ladjan situ ngamlubo-e.
Asingnamai yo, mai khatniu pagu malum bamme, chiudi pagu tienkam jao maksai, sise nde kagengbo bamjiulo? Pagu malum siniu patu kalanlu buima?
Naliu singnamai maksai naliu tanpuimai khatniu papumruang, maluad khat tatekdi hajiu bamsai,
naliuniu wadi gengrabo pikhai mak lujiu, “Tingwang niu natu thoikhai bilo! Wijiu bamlo, tiu magiujiu bamlo!” chiu dinsai pageng degu bamlo?
Sikumjiu malumbo haidi tatien jaomaksai kashaibo-e.
Khangsia mainiu “Mai khatra pagu malum bamme, mai khatniu pagu tienkam bamme,” chiu dinsai, Iniu paokakne, “Tatien jao makjiu pagu malumbose lenlo, Iniu agu malumbose tienkam jaojiu lenkhai bine.”
Tingwang ra khatnakha ronna-e chiubo nang malum ma? Nangniu malumbose wi-e, haise rasadungdi malumjiu khatdi pingjiu kakhutrai-rai bamme.
Kapangbo nang yo, malumbo tienkam habo sira mathakubo-e chiubo simakma?
Aliu piu Abraham tu dechiujiu Tingwang khuga kam majikhai bilo? Paniu panah Isaac tu kadkhaibo gasu-e.
Nang ngao makjiu ma? Pagu malumbo nai pagu tienkamse khatle, sichiujiu pagu tienkam gasu malumbo situ pi tathui khaibo-e.
“Sichiujiu Abraham niu Tingwang tu malumme, sijengniu patu tacheng matipbo mai kukhai mibo-e,” khatdi pahai Tingwang ka-e chiujiu Masanbo ariakga din bambose majibo-e.
Aliugu malum ronna makjiu aliugu tienkam gasu Tingwang khuga kam maji khai-e chiubo naliuniu sibamme.
Delosai Hiupuina jaomakbo pumse kashaibo kumjiu, tatien jaomaksai malumbose kashaibo-e.
Asingnamai yo, maidungtu suang aliutu ladjan thiu nkiudiang rabo-e chiubo silujiu katipao thiuni tulo.
Aliu mathiu maokamjiu bambo-e. Chiudi mai khatniu palad gase maomaksai pase witathuibo-e, paniu papum pakhiangna tudi khamlu bui-e.
Aliuniu chaqon mun ratman lujiu patu aliu chuningga, aliuniu pitad khai nibo bam hinaga pitad khai lu-e,
Maksai malee haitu tingthung katanbo gasu huntadmi makra aliuniu malee rambotang poi siniu ram mari lubui-e.
Sikumjiu alee hai apum gen-ga wania siamthubo khatle, chiudi hainiu chaliangbo chamkang dinbo-e.
Phuilo, mitikang poi khatniu mariu kadibo situ rumibo situ makum khailo!
Sikumjiu aliu lee hai chami kumbo-e. Haise aliu pumgen-ga kasabo hinagu phibang si-e. Paniu aliu pum pakhiang natu kam tania khaibo-e, aliu ringting haitu chami jaiga haisiniu thonkhaibo-e.
Delosai chamaina aliuniu khaorui-khouna, thingnadung khatdi paganiu tonkinbo hina khatdi duipuiga bambo hina tudi kam agiu lujiu bambo-e.
Chiudi mai khatniudi chalee tura khamnam lumakge. Sise khamsi lakbo kasabo khatle, khatdi haiga shairabo karabo tainiu phui bamme.
Aliuniu haise thin lujiu aliu Piu khatdi aliu Rapiu tu thuon-e, khatdi haise thinlujiu aliu kamai, Tingwang lunlungga damkhai bambo maitu siang-e.
Chamun ganiu thuonbodi, siangbodi padle. Singnamaidung yo, haise kammak rabo-e!
Duipin khat gasu kawibo dui nai kakhabo dui padmakge.
Singnamai yo, ndutbang ganiu takisy, maksai mumsibang ganiu ndutsy masi makge. Kasabo duipin ganiu kawibo dui luangpad makge.
Naliu ruangga ningtingbo khatdi wasibo mai bamma? Nagu tasi nai ningting situ nagu lunlung kawibo nai manuanbo ngamkam siniu lenrabo-e.
Chiudi naliu lungchun gasu maitu manmabo, maning masabo, khatdi lengsibo bamsai, naliu ningtingga nuan tenjiu chaliangmi tulo.
Sikumbo ningtingra kulamsu wangbo makge, chiudi sise kadihpiri gu-e, sise chamipumgu chara kasabo lungchun-e.
Palamra maitu manmabo khatdi lengsiboga, chuncham makbo khatdi kasabo hina bamme.
Chiudi kulamniu wangbo ningting sira raiboga masanbo, sibosai agi-manaibo, lung manuanbo, chaka thiubo, lungsasibo, kawi kamkhaibo si-e, haiga chamiu-mareng thiubo nai wasao thiubo ha-e.
Kawibose agi-manaibo kam mainiu agi-manaiboga lingkhaibo gasu padbo rasy si-e.
Delamsu naliu khuga n-gi athaobo padjiulo? Haikumbo hinase naliuniu wa changinbo khatdi naliugu matha-malabo gasu padbo makma?

Naliuniu tiu makeng ni-e, chiudi naliugu ha-e; naliuniu maitu kamshatra rang-e, manma-e chiudi naliuniu daolu makge; naliu n-gi athao-e khatdi chari thiu-e. Naliu khuga wa ha-e, palamra Tingwang khuga naliuniu kheng makbo donniu-e.
Naliuniu kheng-e chiudi daolu makge, palamra matha malaboga kam maha mirabo situ kheng-e.
Malumbui kamakmai yo, kadih haitu chaka thiuboniu Tingwang gu mikre thiubo-e, chiubo naliu simak jiuma? Siniu mai khatniu kadih haitu chaka thiuni-e sai paronna patu Tingwang gu mikremai thiu mibo-e.
Masanbo ariakniu dinbo hai maji makge chiujiu maning jiuma? “Tingwang niu aliu khuga pikhaibo Hiupuina jengniu palung thiujiu bamme.”
Chiudi paniu pikhaibo lungsiatse sibo lungthad suang nkiu-e. Siniu Masanbo ariakniu din-e, “Tingwang niu chaliangbotu suimakge, chiudi lung manon maitu lungsa khai-e.”
Sijengniu Tingwang khuga naronna pikhai lulo, khatdi Satan situ asun lulo, chiusai pah naliu khugasu pakmi rabo-e.
Tingwang khuga mana wanglo; chiusai padi naliu khuga manawang khai bine. Naliu nuan phungmaidung, naliu ben kam masan lulo! Sichiujiu wasao thiumai, naliu lungchun kam masan lulo!
Naliu chun sajiu kaplulo, naliu nuijiu bambo gasu kaplulo.
Rapiu masuangga naliu ronna lung manon lulo, chiusai paniu naliutu kam madikhai bine.

Singnamai yo, naliu khat khattu khan tulo. Naliuniu naliu singnamaitu khansai, khatdi ladjan thiusai, naliuniu Tacheng-tajai situ khan mibo-e khatdi ladjan thiu mibo-e. Sichiujiu nangniu Tacheng-tajaitu majai makbo-e,khatdi haisitu kammao mibo-e.
Tingwang paronna Tacheng-tajai pikhaipao khatdi ladjan pao-e. Paniu kam masa ngamme khatdi kalan khai ngamme. Chiusai nakamaitu ladjan thiubo nang saolo?
Naliu ringtingga sonnai degu padralo chiubo naliuniu simakge! Naliu ringting hai malod khat mikha kapadbo kumjiu, malod khat ngaokhai lujiu hanuangmi rabo-e.
Siniu “Rapiu chunsai aliu ringbam lujiu haise maksai uise kamne,” chiujiu din rabo-e.
Chiudi tuhoi naliu wasao thiujiu chaliang bamme, sikumbo hina sira kamaobo-e.
Sijengniu, aliuniu wa kawibo silujiu kam maksai, sise nuan-e.
Tuhoi naliu kakhiumai yo, akhuan king khailo! Naliu khuga wangkinbo chariubo magenthak jengniu kapjiu achung lulo.
Naliugu chakhiu-chalanse maren kam mide, khatdi naliu fai-nidungse pakhaoniu tiukam mide.
Naliugu kachia rangkangse mathuniu tiuloi mide, khatdi sibo mathu siniu naliugu jengdin thiune, khatdi naliu tiatu chami kumjiu rusune. Naliuniu haise kanambo tingmik leng makhuan khai nbambo-e.
Phuilo, naliuniu naliu lu mengmai phijeng pimakge. Paliu lung makjiu thubambo haitu nkinglo. Naliu lu gemainiu kapbo khuanse Ngamkamkambo Rapiu Tingwang kuon-ga chiuwang tang mide.
Naliuniu haibo kadihpiriga naliu-chun, naliu-ni thiujiu lung amansai bamme. Chiudi sise naliutu kamshat rabo tingmik leng makuatjiu bambo-e.
Naliuniu pamao hamaitu ladjan thiujiu kamshat mide, siga paliuniu naliutu kham makge.

Siniu singnamai yo, Rapiu wanglan makthen naliu ginsijiu bamlulo. Phuilo! Tatien katen mainiu paluga miusy atiatra jengniu tingriu khairatu agunjiu khuanbambo kumbo-e. Paliuniu chariuting, tatuntingtu khuanjiu bambo-e.
Naliudi ginsijiu bamlulo. Naliu lung matipjiu bamlo; palamra Rapiu tingmikse nawang mide.
Singnamai yo, naliutu Tingwang niu ladjan thiu makra, khat-khattu khan tulo. Phuilo, ladjanpaose kamun-ga chapjiu bamme.
Singnamai yo, phaimiukakung maidungniu Rapiu zan thinjiu, chariu magenthiu khengkhai mibose naliudi ali lulo.

Phuilo, sichiujiu khenglu maitu aliuniu donwi mai-e chiujiu ku-e. Sichiujiu Job niu khengkhai mibo thadse naliuniu sibamme, kanamboga Rapiu niu patu dechiujiu pikhai bilo chiubo naliu si-e. Palamra Rapiu haira lungsabo nai nkhakhai sibo piu-e.
Naliu ruangga mai khat kumbo magenthiu chariubo bamma? Patu pijiu kakheng thiu lulo. Mai khat kumbo pachun wijiu bamma? Patu pijiu thuonbo lui thiululo.
Mai khat kumbo thiuniujiu bamma? Patu pijiu phumlinggu katingmaitu kulujiu Rapiu zan ganiu wasa manuk khaijiu kakheng pithiu khailo.
Sichiusai malumjiu khengbo jengniu, thiuniu bambo patudi Rapiu niu wikhai bine, paniu nuan kamkhai mibo sidi kuakkhai bine.

Sijengniu naliu thiuniu makra khat khat khuga naliu maomeng dinpad lulo, khatdi khat khat jengniu kheng lulo. Tacheng matipmainiu kakheng thiubora tanchang tanbo-e, palamra siga Tingwang niu tatien thiukhai-e.
Elijah haidi aliu kumjiu chamai khatle, chiudi paniu pachun ngutjiu tingriu makra kakheng thiuboga, tingkum sum chahiu charuk tingriu tamibo-e.
Paniu kakheng thiukhai lanboga, tingriukiu lande, sichiujiu kadihpiriniu pasy masi lande.
Singnamai yo, naliu ruangga khangsia mainiu kamajibotu marijiu bambo gasu mai khatniu puiwang lan lusai,
paniu npui maojiu nuan ga kaokhaimi maitu kalan lubose, paniu shaimibo Hiupuina situ juringkhai mibo-e, sichiujiu nuandung kakeng khatu kuak khai lubo-e chiubo maningtao lulo.
Jesu Khrista gu ladlangtadbo Peter khugasu:
Tingwang niu kadalumai, Pontus, Galatia, Kappadocia, Asia khatdi Bithynia kadihga lung maratad mibo maidung khuga.
Papiu Tingwang niu machunbo saisuijiu khatdi, pagu Hiupuina siniu kam masan khai lujiu, Jesu Khrista zai siniu khiu masan lujiu pagu kadin piura naliutu kadakhai mibo-e.
Lungsiat nai agi-manaibo siniu naliu khuga phuijiu bamlo.

Aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista Piu, Tingwang tu aliuniu thuonkhe! Palamra pagu lungsiat kadi jengniu paniu Jesu Khrista tu kashaibo gasu piringsu khai lanjiu aliuleng kasanbo ringting pikhai bide. Haisiniu aliuleng karingbo agun pikhai-e.
Sijengniu Tingwang niu pamaidungtu pikhai rabo thoidam lungwatse aliuniu lura phuijiu bamme. Sidungse paniu tinggen dihga, halan lakbo, salan lakbo khatdi kuilan lakbo gase naliuleng kadenkhai bamme.
Sidungse, malumbo pen gasu khuanbam mai, khatdi Tingwang pumtan gasu, juringbotu kanambo wan tangjiu kadenjiu bammai naliuleng-e.
Tuhoi pakak khat chariu magenthiujiu naliuniu khengbambo jengniu naliu chunsajiu bamdi, haibo jengniu naliu chun wilulo.

Sidung siniu kambo sira naliugu malumbose pachangsiakge chiubo silura leng-e. Hamirabo kachiatu tangbo chaminiu madiu-e. Sijengniu kachia suang kungbo naliugu malumbo situdi khenglura madiu rabo-e; sichiusai Jesu Khrista tu madurabo Tingmik gase naliuniu thuon kiubo, paken-pangam dibo khatdi chakhuang thiubose daorabo-e.
Naliuniu patu ngaokhai mak tadi, naliuniu patu lungsa-e, naliuniu patu tuhoi ngaomak tadi naliuniu patu malumme. Sijengniu chaladniu dinsi lulakbo chunwi-matha malabo siniu phuijiu bambo-e.
Palamra naliuniu patu malum bambose, naliu hiunaleng juringbo daorabo-e.
Haibogu juringbo jengniu phaimiukakungdung phiu mawijiu phiu khai mibo-e, khatdi matad mawikhai mibo-e; sichiujiu naliutu pikhai rabo Tingwang gu kalen lamga paliuniu din masuang mibo-e.

Paliuniu pawanse dedao ralo khatdi dechiu wangralo chiubo sira matan khai kamigu-e. Paliu khuga bambo Khrista Hiupuina siniu pawan situ siojiu Khrista niu magenthiu khengrabo khatdi paken-pangam dibo siniu suiwang rabotu din masuang khai mibo-e.

Tingwang niu sibo phaimiukakungdung khuga lenkhai mibose paliuleng gengra makge, chiudi tinggen lamsu langwangbo Masanbo Hiupuina pumtan pen gasu Kawicham paoron maidungniu dinbo, tuhoi chiubambo hai naliuleng-e. Haidungse mazadung siniudi sinijiu bambo si-e.
Sijengniu changamse kam raleng naliu lungchun kadenjiu bamlo. Jesu Khrista tu madu khaiboga naliuleng pikhai rabo thoidam situ malumsiak lujiu kaden bamlo.
Naliuniu wa simakbo tingga machun kinbo lungchun siniu makjiu Tingwang kadin piululo.
Sibosung, naliutu kukhaibo Tingwang se masanbo kumjiu, naliuniu kambo hinaga masan lulo.
Masanbo ariak niu din-e, “Masan lulo palamra Ira masanbo-e.”

Mai hinaniu kamkhai mibo saisuijiu, chamiu-mareng thiu makbo ladjanpao Tingwang khuga kakheng thiubo tingga, naliuniu patu Apiu chiujiu ku-e; sijengniu haibo kadihriga lungbam then patu pingjiu lunglulo.
Palamra naliu pao-pehmai khugasu phungwangbo pageng kahabo lunlung gasu, naliutu khipad khaira paman pimide chiubo naliuniu sibamme. Haise kachia rangkang kumjiu hamirabo siniu makge,
haise paman kungbo pajam para habo milypoi kumbo, Khrista gu rathak siniu-e.
Tingwang niu patuse kadihpiri dammak gasu kadakhai mibo-e, sichiujiu naliu jengniu kanambo tingmikdung haiga madukhai bibo-e.

Papen gasu naliuniu Tingwang tu malum lude, sichiujiu patuse kashaibo gasu piringsu khaijiu paken pangam dibose patu pikhai mide; sichiujiu naliugu malumbo nai ramgunbose Tingwang khuga matipjiu bambo-e.
Tuhoira majiboga naliuniu kadin piubo jengniu naliu ronna kam masanlujiu naliu singnamaidungtu pachang siakjiu lungsa lude, siniu naliu lungchun pakhiangna ngutjiu khat khattu lungsa lulo.
Palamra ringjiu bambo khatdi tingtheng ringbo Tingwang ladkeng siniu, halanbo makjiu, halan lakbo pui-piu khat nahdung kumjiu naliu mana kasan lude.
Masanbo ariak niu dinbo kumjiu,
“Mai hinase chapiuniw kumbo-e,
paliu kendise nkan rapen kumbo-e.
Chapiuniu siniu ntangmi-e, khatdi charapense kuimi-e.
Chiudi Rapiu ladkeng sira tingthengjiu bam rabo-e.”
Haibo ladkengse naliu khuga dinkhai mibo Kawicham si-e.
Sijengniu, kasabo hina gasu naliu ronna mari lulo; kalik talo, chaliang talo, manma talo, maitu din masabo cham dintalo,
Ngenadung kumjiu, hiupuina gu ndui situ masenjiu bamlo, sise naliuniu sakjiu bamsai dikhangjiu ranlubose daolune.
Masanbo ariakniu dinbo kumjiu, “Rapiu hai dejiuga lungsa silo chiubo naliu pumsiakniu silude.”
Maidungniu pageng ha-e chiujiu thonmibo, chiudi Tingwang niu paman kungbo leng kadalubo ringjiu bambo tukang Rapiu khuga wanglulo.
Ringbambo tukangdung kumjiu, Hiupuina raky Khrista gasu Tingwang khuga suilu rabo rathakdung khatdi Hiupuina ga kadkhai rabo masanbo singkudung thiulura wanglo.
Palamra Masanbo ariakniu din-e,
“Iniu paman kungbo tukang kadakhai bamme,
sise Zion ga tiangdi pithiu khai bamme;
patu malummai siniu wadaodi chunsa lakge.”
“Chaky thiumaidung siniu pageng ha-e chiujiu thonmibo tukang haise
mathiu ruangga kungthubose thiu mide.”
“Haibo tukang hainiu maidung phi masuibo tudi pithiu khaine.”
Paliu phi masuibo sira paliuniu ladkeng situ malum makge, haise paliuleng Tingwang chunning si-e.

Pawan khat gara naliu haise Tingwang mai makjiu bamniu-e, chiudi tuhoira pamai thiu mide; pawan khat gara Tingwang gu lungsabo naliu simakjiu bam niu-e, chiudi tuhoira naliuniu pagu lungsabose ngaolude.
Akahmaidung yo, Iniu naliutu palun simak maidung khatdi pating-padih hamaidungtu kumjiu dinbo-e! Hiunatu pawan machang chari thiu bambo chapumniu masen masiaboga pikhai mitulo.

Nkengmai suangga naliu nkhai-rili wilulo, sichiujiu paliuniu naliutu wa kasa kammai-e chiujiu madam khaijiu bamdi, naliugu kawibo tienkamdungse ngao lujiu, pah wangrabo Tingmik gase Tingwang tu thuonlu rabo-e.
Rapiu zan gasu mai hinagu pumtan hangga bamlujiu, dithubo pumtan bambo Wangdi hanggadi bamlulo;
sichiujiu kawi kam maitu thuonjiu, khatdi kasa kam maitu sajai pikhaira paniu kadakhai bambo dihthinpao dung hangga lunglulo.
Palamra kapangmainiu wasi makbo lad dinbo situ naliugu kawibo tienkam siniu pi maliumak khaibose Tingwang niu luni-e.
Khenrang thiumaidung kumjiu lunglulo, chiudi khenrang thiubo siniu kasabo situ baimakjiu chiudi Tingwang vangmai kumjiu lunglulo.
Mai hinatu chakhuang thiululo, nasingna maidungtu lungsajiu Tingwang tu pinglulo khatdi Wangditu chakhuangthiu lulo.
Maivangdung, naliugu papaodung, lungsa simai tudi, pathak samai tudi chakhuang thiu silo.
Pagu chunning saisuijiu, naliuniu khengbui makbo magenthakse khengjiu bamsai, Tingwang niu naliutu thoikhai bine.
Palamra naliuniu kamaobo kambo donniu naliutu dapkhai-e sai degu kagengbo bamlo? Chiudi naliuniu majibo kamboga khengkhai mibo magenthak jengniu, Tingwang niu naliutu thoikhai bine.
Haijengniu Tingwang niu naliutu kukhai mibo-e, palamra Khrista niu naliuleng magenthiu khai mibo-e, khatdi naliuniu paphipa saisui tadra kamlen khai mibo-e.
Para nuan wadi tenkhai makge, khatdi pamun gasu aratbo cham dinbo maidi chiumakge.
Patuse kasa madam khaijiu, kam mangam khaiboga kasabo siniu paokak khai makge; patu kam magenthiu khaiboga, paniu kapin khai makge, chiudi tacheng matipbo Ladjanpao Tingwang tu paniu malumjiu bamme.
Aliu nuanse Khrista niu paronna singchaiga phungkhai mide, sichiujiu aliuniu nuan-ga shaikhai lujiu tacheng matipboga ringlu raleng-e. Patu kam ajam khaibo siniu naliutu wikhai mibo-e.
Naliura ronmeng mibo milydung kumbo-e, chiudi tuhoira naliuniu Milykhuanpao khatdi naliu hiuna Khuanpao saisuira puiwang lanbo-e.
Palamra naliugu jai-alise dejiuga masanlo khatdi chakhuang hiu builo chiubo paliuniu ngaomi ra-e.
Naliuniu matai wira, karu thiujiu naliu tham phenbo, tatiu-tataa khaibo, chapuan-tania piubose kamtulo.
Sibosung, naliu lungchun siniu, maliu makjiu manuanbogu kuimakbo lunwat siniu Tingwang masuangga paman kungthubose thiu lulo.
Palamra karaiga palung ngutbo puidung siniudi Tingwang tu malumbo lungchun lunwat siniu paliu kina hangga lungkhai mibo-e.
Sarah di sise kumbo-e; paniu Abraham kadin piujiu patu pawangpiu chiujiu kumibo-e. Naliuniu kawibo kamjiu wadi pingbo hasai, naliu hai panahmai thiu mibo-e.
Kanamboga, naliu mai hina lungchun nchamjiu khat thiululo; khatniu khattu singna kumjiu lungsa lulo, khatdi khatniu khattu lungsajiu chakhuang thiu lulo.
Kasabo situ kasaboniu malan khai mane, tasiang situ tasiangniu malan khai mane; sibosung thoidamniu malankhai bilo, palamra Tingwang niu natu kuboga thoidam pikhaira ladriat khai mibo-e.
Masanbo ariak niu dinbo kumjiu,
“Mai khatniu amanjiu ringkhai nisai khatdi kawibo situ ngaokhai nisai,
kasabo dinmak rabo-e khatdi aratmak rabo-e.
Paniu kasabo gasu mari lujiu kawibose kamrabo-e:
agi-manaibo situ palungchun pakhiangna ngutjiu matan rabo-e.
Palamra tacheng matipmai situ Rapiu niu phui bamme;
khatdi paliu rathoi nking khai-e;
chiudi kasa kammaitu para atung-e.”
Naliuniu kawi kamra matan bamsai, saoniu naliutu kasa kamralo?
Chiudi naliu lungchun gasu Khrista tu pingjiu Rapiu-e chiu chakhuang thiu lulo. Naliu khuga bambo malumse mai khatniu maniubo tingga paokak lura pawan machang kaden bamlo,

chiudi haise manuanjiu khatdi chakhuang thiujiu kamlulo. Naliu lungchunse masanjiu bamlo, sichiujiu naliu hai Khrista saisui mai-e chiujiu pagu nkhai-ali kasamai siniu naliutu dinboga, paliu mangambo daomi rabo-e.
Palamra Tingwang chun-e sai, kasa kambo suang, kawi kamjiu magenthiu khengboniu wi-nkiu-e.

Palamra Khrista niu mathiuleng khatdi nuan jengniu shaigui shaikhai mibo-e, nuan phungmai donsung kawibo mainiu shaikhai mibo-e, sichiujiu naliutu Tingwang khuga jukhai raleng-e. Papum situ kamshat mibo-e, chiudi hiupuinaga piring khai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu hiupuina lunlung gasu paniu tadlujiu bangkhai bambo hiupuinadung khuga dinron khai mibo-e.
Haibo hiupuinadungse Naoh ken-ga, paniu pagu malee ruikinbo tingga, paniu khuanbambo tingga Tingwang lad piumak maidung-e. Malee lungga bammai khang tachat ronna tadui gasu npad lubo-e.

Sise tuhoi naliutu gukhaibo, tadui nphum khaibo situ siokhaibo khatle. Haise chapumgu taniabo karaitu nkhiubogu makge, chiudi kawibo lungchunniu Tingwang khuga ladriat thiu khaibo-e. Haise Jesu Khrista gu ringsulanbo gasu naliutu rankhaibo si-e.
Pase tinggen lam khanglujiu khatdi Tingwang ben jatlam ntaolujiu maza hina khatdi tinggen gu pumtan thinmai khatdi pumtandung riga mawangjiu bamme.
