Khrista niu papumga magenthiubo khengkhai mibo jengniu, paniu tadkhai mibo npuise maningjiu, naliu lungchun matip lulo; palamra papumga khengkhai mibo mai siniu nuan-ga lungta mide.
Sijengniu tuhoi gasu naliugu kadihpiri ringting hai chamainiu masenbo makjiu Tingwang maningga lung lulo.

Nkengmaidungniu kam nibose naliudi karaiga kamjiu bamniu-e. Naliu ringtingse disumakbo, npui-npiu thiunibo, jawsak maniubo, tiulu-saklujiu tasao lad dinbo, jaw sak aruangbo, khatdi charamengtu kahumbo hai kamjiu bamniu-e.
Sichiujiu tuhoira naliuniu karaiga kasabo khatdi majimakbo lunlungga paliutu maluang tamibo jengniu paliu suang hajiu bamme, sichiujiu paliuniu naliutu din masajiu nuimen bamme.
Chiudi paliuniu paliu tienkamse ringbam maitu khatdi kashai maitu ladjan thiurabo Tingwang khuga pikhai rabo-e.

Sijengniu Kawicham haise kashaimai khugadi dinron khai mibo-e. sichiujiu mai hinatu ladjan thiubo kumjiu, paliu tudi ladjan thiurabo-e; Tingwang hai ringjiu bambo kum, paliudi ringlura haise paliu khuga dinron khai mibo-e.
Pawan hinagu kanambo tingse namide. Kakheng thiu ngamra naliu pum thinman lujiu kadensi rabo-e.
Nkiu-nkenjiu khatniu khattu lungsa silo, palamra lungsaboniu nuan wajiu khatu gomnam lubo-e.
Naliu khat khattu khan makjiu chagiang lukhai lulo.
Mai hinaniu Tingwang khugasu daolubo katam tambo kalendungse macha simai thiujiu maileng kawibo tenkhai silo.

Mai khatniu dinron sai, Tingwang champaose dinron khailo; mai khatniu tatien thiuni sai, Tingwang niu patu pikhaibo pumtan siniu kamlo, sichiujiu palam hinaga paken pangam dibo khatdi tingtheng tingthengjiu pumtan bambo Jesu Khrista gasu Tingwang tu thuonkiujiu bamlo. Amen.
Akahmaidung yo, naliuniu magenthiu chariu khengbambo haise wa katambo kumjiu naliu suang hami tulo,
Chiudi Khrista gu chariu khengbo naliuniu phung macham bambo jengniu chunwi bamlo, palamra pagu kendibose maduwangbo naise naliu chun wibo siniu phuimi rabo-e.
Naliu Khrista saisuibo mai thiubo jengniu, naliutu maidungniu kam mangam khaisai chunwi lulo, sibo rambara paken dibo Hiupuina, Tingwang gu Hiupuinase naliu riga bamme chiubo-e.
Naliu mai khat kumbo niu maitu kamshatbo gasu, maksai agatiubo gasu, maksai kamaokambo gasu, maksai kambui makbo maingam kambo gasu chariubo daobo thiumak rabo-e.
Chiudi, naliuniu chariubo hai Khristian mai khat thiubo jengniu sai, mangam tulo, chiudi naliuniu Khrista zan phungbambo-e,chiujiu Tingwang tu thuon lulo.
Ladjan thiurabo wanse wangkinne, sichiujiu Tingwang maidung situ raijiu ladjan thiurai rabo-e. Ladjan haise aliu khuga thiusu dasai, Tingwang gu Kawichamtu malum makmai paliu khuga dechiu ralo?
Masanbo ariak niu dinbo kumjiu
“Kawi maidung situ ranlura kung-e chiusai,
charatu simakmai nuan phungmai situ dechiu ralo?”
Sijengniu, Tingwang chunningga chariu khengjiu bammai-e sai, pagu ladriantu majaijiu kawibo tien thiujiu, paliutu Dampaotu malum matip bam rabo-e.
Kating khat thiubo Iniu, phumlinggu kating maidung naliu khuga dinbo-e. Khrista gu magenthiu chariubo jengniu I hai lamchap khatle, sichiujiu madukhai rabo kendi gase Idi jaorabo-e.

Tingwang niu naliu khuga pikhaibo milydungtu naliu chun ngutmakbo thiumakjiu, Tingwang niu masenbo saisuijiu akhi mawi khailo. Naliu ngamse naliu phijeng leng makjiu kamkhai nibo lungchunniu kamkhailo.
Naliu khuga pikhai bambodung riga mawangra kam makjiu milydung situ lunglen bilo.
Sichiujiu Dibo Milykhuanpao wang dasai, wadaodi pabiu halan lakbo paken dibo chawang pirunse naliuniu daorabo-e.
Sijengniu, ngamkambo Tingwang ben hangga naliu ronna lung manon lulo, sichiusai paniu pagu pawan wiboga natu pidikhai bine.
Naliugu chariu magenthiubo hina pakhuga saokhailo, palamra paniu naliutu manang khaijiu bambo-e.
Kaden sijiu, akhe bamlo! Naliugu mikrebo Devil siniu, marajiu bambo ndongqui khat kumjiu, maitu kajongra phiu bamme.
Naliugu malumboga matipjiu bamlo sichiujiu patu khamlulo, palamra kadihpiriga bambo naliu singnamaidung hinadi sikumbo magenthakse kheng macham bambo-e chiubo naliuniu si-e.

Chiudi naliuniu pakak khat chariu khenglusai, Khrista gu tingtheng kendibo gase jaora naliutu kukhaibo lungsa sibo Tingwang siniu naliutu pi tathui khaijiu, palingbo kaphung gase naliutu pumtan pikhaijiu kam matip khai rabo-e.
Tingthengjiu pakhuga pumtan pithiu milo! Amen.
Khristian maigu lungsabo biangpupbo siniu khat khattu kanui lulo.
Khrista ga bammai naliu mathiu khuga agi-manai bamlo.
Jesu Khrista vang khatdi ladlangtadbo, Simon Peter khugasu:
Tacheng-matipbo Tingwang khatdi aliutu Rankhaipiu Jesu Khrista gasu aliu kumjiu paman kungbo malum daolumai khuga:
Tingwang khatdi aliu Rapiu Jesu gu ningting pen gasu lungsiat nai agi-manaibo naliu khuga phuijiu bammi sulo.
Aliutu pagu kendibo nai kawibo lutaora kukhaibo, pagu ningting gasu Tingwang gu chara pumtan saisuijiu aliuniu majijiu tacheng matipboga lunglura wahina aliuleng pikhaide.
Sichiujiu paniu ladriat khaibo dichang-dibo khatdi paman kungbo kalense aliuleng pikhaide, sichiujiu haibo kalen gasu kadihpiritu kam mahami rabo kasabo lunlung gasu lungli lura leng-e.
Haijengniu naliugu malumbo gase kawibo khaisan lulo; naliugu kawibo gase ningting khaisan lulo;
naliugu ningting gase paronna katinsibo khaisan lulo; paronna katinsibo gase khengsibo khaisan lulo; naliugu khengsibo gase charatu sibo khaisan lulo;
naliuniu charatu sibo gase singnagu kakungbose khaisan lulo; khatdi singnatu kungbo gase lungsabo khaisan lulo.
Haidungse naliuleng pageng bambo watdung si-e, sichiujiu naliuniu haidungse machangjiu bamsai, paliuniu naliutu aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu ningtingga tanbo khatdi matipbo pithiu khai bine.
Chiudi mai khatniu haidungse bamlu maksai para pamik tiat mibo-e, siniu pah ngaosi lakge khatdi pagu kaguangbo nuan gasu khiu masan mide chiubose mangai mibo-e.
Sijengniu, asingnamai yo; Tingwang niu kukhaibo khatdi naliutu kadakhaibo situ simasan lura matanjiu bamlo; naliuniu sichiu bamsai naliugu malumbo situ wadaodi phut lakge.
Sichiujiu naliutu aliu Rapiu khatdi Rankhaipiu Jesu Khrista gu tingtheng ringbo Wangdihga ngut lurabo tathuibo majise pikhai bine.
Naliu sijiu bamdi, khatdi naliuniu daolubo majibo gase naliuniu chapjiu bamdi, naliuniu haidungse maningtaojiu bamra naliu khuga Iniu pisikhai lanbo-e.
Iniu ringbam thenna haidungse naliu lungchun-ga maningtao lan-lanjiu bamra, dinkhaibo hai agu maji-e chiujiu Ira maning-e.
Aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista niu akhuga masanjiu dinkhaibo kumjiu haibo hamirabo pum haise hajisune chiubo I si-e.
Sichiusai Iniu shaimibo saidi, naliuniu maningtaojiu bamra Iniu alaisang khaijiu kamrabo mide.
Aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista paken dijiu wangkinbo haise naliu khuga pisikhaira, aliuniu damlubo racham makge. Aliu mik siakniu, pagu kendibose ngaokhai mibo-e.
Papiu Tingwang siniu patu chakhuang thiubo nai kendibo pikhaibo gase aliu bamme, siga nkiubo kendibo gase pakhuga chakhuan khatniu din-e, “Haise Iniu kungbo Anahpiu si-e, pakhuga alungchun kimme.”
Aliuniu masanbo luongga patu maluang lujiu bamboga, haibo khuanse tinggen lamsu senwangbose aliu pumsiakniu chiulubo-e.

Sijengniu Phaimiukakung maidungniu dinkhai mibo champao suang aliuniu malumbo-e. Naliuniu haise lukhai sai, naliu san wirabo-e, palamra haise nsuan tingben pad makhaga, tamiubo bamga chamibung khat kumbo-e, haisiniu nsuan ganbiu kumjiu naliu lungga thaoben khaine.
Wahina riga, mai khatniudi Masanbo ariakga Phaimiukakung ladse paronna dinsi lakge chiubo hai maningtaolo.
Palamra Phaimiukakung champao haise chamaina maning gasu wadaodi padbo makge, chiudi Tingwang khugasu wangbo champaose paliuniu dinboga Masanbo Hiupuina siniu maidung situ thinman mibo-e.

Karaiga maidung ruangga aratbo phaimiukakungdung padmibo-e, sise kumjiu naliu ruanggadi aratbo katipaodung padne. Paliuniu harabo khatdi majimakbo tacheng katikhaidung phungwangjiu, paliutu gukhaibo Papaotu suimakjiu, hanuang mirabose paliu ronna phungwang rabo-e.
Sichiujiu maidung kakengniu paliugu lung katalabo lunlung gase suitadmi sune, sichiujiu paliu ngamkam jengniu, maidung siniu majibo Npui situ din masa sune.

Paliu tiuni sabo jengniu, aratbo katipaodung siniu paliuleng genglura, masing lubo rachamdungse naliu khuga dinsune. Palamra paliugu ladjanpaose nda gasu kadenjiu bamme, khatdi paliutu Kam maharabo Piuse rakkingjiu bamme!
Nuan tenbo mazadung situ Tingwang niu masiak makge, chiudi paliutu chagiriangniu ratlujiu, tamiubo charuidih gase thon khai mira, ladjan thiurabo Tingmik situ khuanjiu bamme.

Tingwang niu karaibo kadihpiri situ masiak khai makge, sichiujiu charatu simakbo maidung situ taduiniu naimaha mide; paniu gukhaibo sira tacheng matipra dinronbo Naoh khatdi mai katammai khang chinnia situ ronna-e.
Charatu simak mai khuga degu padralo chiubotu kamlen khaibo thiujiu Tingwang niu Sodom nai Gomorrah tu ladjan thiujiu chaminiu kam maha mide.
Paniu kawibo piu tacheng-tajai hamaigu jai-ali siniu kam chariujiu bambo Lot situ gukhai bide.
Kawibo piu siniu paliu ruangga lunglujiu, naimachangna paliugu kasabo tienkam ngaojiu khatdi palung magenthiujiu bambo-e.
Sichiujiu charatu simaitu dechiujiu paliugu magenthak gasu gukhaira, khatdi kasamaidung situ ladjan thiubo Tingmik leng dechiu khaibam ralo chiubo Rapiu niu sibamme,
nkiujiu paliu pumniu lunibo saisuijiu lungmai khatdi Tingwang gu pumtantu din masajiu bammaitu sijiu bamme.
Aratbo katipaodung hai hujiu, wasao thiujiu, khatdi nrilam bambo pakendibo situ wadi chakhuang thiu makjiu bamme; sibosung, paliuniu sisetu nuimenjiu bamme.
Haibo aratbo katipaodung suang, tan-hu nkiubo mazadung siniudi, Rapiu masuangga haichiujiu din masa makge.
Chiudi haibo maidung situra khaoring kumjiu minra khatdi gira langwang mibo-e, paliuniu simakbo hinatu nuimenjiu bambo-e. Paliutu khaoringdung kumjiu kam mahami rabo-e,

sichiujiu paliuniu kamkhai mibo kasabo hinase paliutu pimalan khai rabo-e. Paliuniu chunwibo sira n-nien tingga paliu pumtu pikim khaira phiu kinbo si-e; paliugu aratbo khatdi sontiubo jengniu, naliutu paliuniu maluang katiu-tiura mangamme khatdi makhin-e!

Paliuniu phuijiu bamnibo sira lung katalabo puidungtu ronna makjiu kaki ha-e; nuan kamrabo wadi pamalan ha-e. Paliuniu kason maidung situ tathakga jukhai-e. Patiuni sabo siniu paliu lungchun phui-e. Paliura Tingwang gu tasiang hangga bam mibo-e!
Paliuniu majibo npuise phut mide, khatdi paliu npui kam maha mide; paliuniu tasen-chalan lunibo jengniu, kasa kamra tadmibo Beor nahpiu Balaam npui suitad mide,
sichiujiu patuse pa-nuan jengniu rukhai mibo-e. Pagu qonniam siniu chamai khuan thiujiu, Phaimiukakunggu kamaobo tienkam gasu pimalan khai mibo-e.
Haibo maidung sira sangmibo singgiu kumbo-e, khatdi tingthung katanbo siniu kamaotu hun maha mibo kumbo-e. Tingwang niu paliuleng sukthubo tamiubo bamse kaden khai bamme.
Paliuniu chaliangbo khatdi kapangbo lad din-e, khatdi mari mira matanjiu bambo, kapingboga lungbammai situ, paliu lunlung talabo pum siniu paliuniu lunibo thakga tathak thiu bamme.
Paliu pumsiakse hamirabo lunlungga bangman bamlujiu, paliu khenrang thiumi rabo-e chiujiu maidung khuga ladriat thiu-e, palamra mai khatse patu ngamlubo piu vang thiu mibo-e.

Sichiujiu maidung siniu aliu Rapiu khatdi Rankhaipiu Jesu Khrista gu ningting gasu kadihpirigu kasabo pumtan gasu marilujiu, pasai sikumbo siniu paliutu minlanlu khatdi ngamlanlu dasai, sikumbo maidungse paphibangga suang sa-nkiu mibo-e.
Paliuniu tacheng matipbo npuise silujiu khatdi paliutu pikhaibo masanbo chamtan gasu mari mibo suang, wadi paliuniu simak bamniusai wi-nkiu rabo-e.
Sichiujiu paliu khuga padbo situ kadinchamga dinkhaibose maji-e chiubo lenkhai-e: “Tathiniu pamaruitu tiu lan-e,” khatdi “Nkhiu khai mibo kavakpui siniu taniangga nkuong lan-e.”
Kakungbo akamai yo, haise Iniu naliu khuga raokhai lon niabo chamlen-e. Chamlen nia gase naliuniu masanjiu naliu lungchun sulan lura, Iniu haidungse naliu khuga pisikhai lanra matanbo-e.

Nda masanbo Phaimiukakung maidungniu dinmibo ladkeng, sichiujiu Rapiu khatdi Rankhaipiu khugasu naliugu ladlangtadmaidung siniu naliu khuga pikhai mibo chamtanse naliuniu maningtao bamra Iniu masenbo-e.
Raithuboga, kanambo tingmikdung gahai lungtalabo paliu pumniu masenbo siniu thinman lumai khangsia padsune chiubo naliuniu sirabo-e. Paliuniu naliutu nuimen sune,
khatdi haichiu maniu sune, “Pah wanglanne chiujiu ladrian thiukhai mibo makma? Pah dega bamlo? Aliu pao-pehdung shaikam mide, chiudi pakhiangna hai nda kadihpiri damsubo gasu machamjiu bamme!”
Ndasu Tingwang niu chamtan pikhaibo gasu tinggen nai kadihpiri damkhai mide chiubose paliuniu suini makjiu suimakbo-e. Kadihpiri hai tadui gasu padle,
khatdi sibo dui siniu dijiu karaibo kadihpiri situ kam maha mide.
Sichiujiu tuhoi bambo tinggen nai kadihpiri haise, chaminiu kam mahara Tingwang gu chamtan-ga bambo-e. Haise charatu simakbo maidungtu ladjan thiujiu khatdi kam mahami rabo tingmikleng khai nbambo-e.

Maidung khangsianiu maningbo kumjiu, Rapiu niu ladriat khai mibo gasu manibo makge. Sibosung, para naliutu khuanjiu bambo-e, palamra paniu mai khat tudi kam maha mini makge, chiudi mai hinatu paliu nuan gasu pijiu lungli lunibo-e.
Sichiujiu mania hinase haichiu kam maha misai, naliu dekumbo mai thiu ralo? Naliugu ringting hai masanjiu lungrabo-e khatdi Tingwang khuga kadkhai rabo-e.

Sichiujiu naliuniu Tingwang gu Tingmik situ khuanjiu, sise wang majira naliu laisang khaijiu kamlulo, sibo Tingmik gase tinggen situ rumi rabo-e khatdi kam mahami rabo-e, sichiujiu sibo thad siniu tinggen-ga bambo hinase tunjiu hakammi rabo-e.
Chiudi Tingwang niu ladriat khaibo kasanbo tinggen nai kasanbo kadihpiri, tacheng matip mainiu bamrabo situ aliura khuan bambo-e.
Sijengniu akahmaidung yo, naliuniu sibo Tingmik situ khuanjiu, Tingwang masuangga masanjiu khatdi maomakjiu lungra khatdi pakhuga agi-manaijiu bamlura naliu laisang khaijiu matan lulo.
Tingwang niu patu pikhaibo ningting tasi thinlujiu aliuniu lungsa kakungbo singna Paul niu naliu khuga raokhai mibo kumjiu, naliutu ranlura aliu Rapiu niu khuanjiu bambo wan situ phuilulo.

Haise paniu pagu chamlen hina raoboga, pagu ladpui thiujiu raokhai mibo-e. Pagu chamlendung gase wasimakbo khatdi matun makbo maidung siniu, sitanglu lakbo Masanbo charawga raokhaibo kakungbodung bamme. Sichiujiu paliuniu paliu ronna kam maharabo guse phungwang rabo-e.
Chiudi akahmaidung yo, naliura haise sijiu bamme. Sijengniu kadenjiu bamlo sichiujiu tacheng-tajai habo kamaobo maidung siniu naliugu matipjiu bambo gasu jukaomi makra kamlulo.
Chiudi aliu Rapiu khatdi Rankhaipiu Jesu Khrista gu lungsiat nai ningtingga dikhangjiu bamlo. Tuhoidi, tingthengdi pakhuga paken dibamlo! Amen.
Karingbose ngaopad miboga, aliudi ngao lujiu pagu jengdin thiubo-e, sichiujiu tingtheng ringbo siniu Papiutu majang bambo, sichiujiu aliutu lenkhaibo chamse naliu khuga dinkhaibo-e.
Naliuniudi aliutu akadjiu bamlura, aliuniu silubo khatdi ngaolubose dinlen khaibo-e: Sichiujiu aliura Papiu nai Nahpiu Jesu Khrista tu akadjiu bamme.
Sichiujiu aliu chunwibose, tathui lura aliuniu naliu khuga raokhai-e.
Aliuniu Nahpiu khugasu silubo khatdi naliu khuga dinlen khaibo chamsira Tingwang sira kabenbo-e, khatdi pakhuga tamiubo wadi ha-e.
Aliu patu majang akadjiu bamme chiulujiu, tamiuboga tadbam sai aliu aratbo-e, khatdi majibose aliuniu kam makge.
Chiudi pah kabenboga tadbambo kum aliudi kabenboga tadbam sai, aliu khatniu khattu akadjiu maluang chakin thiu bambo-e,sichiujiu Nahpiu Jesu Khrista zainiu aliu nuan hina khiu masan mide.
Aliu niu nuan phungmakge chiu dinsai, aliu ronna aliutu sonbambo-e, khatdi majibose aliu khuga bam makge.
Chiudi aliuniu aliu nuan din madupad sai, aliu nuan kuak khaira khatdi aliu khui-mao hina kam masan khaira, Rapiu para malumbuibo khatdi majibo-e.
Aliu nuan ten makge chiujiu dinsai aliuniu Tingwang tu kam aratbo-e, khatdi pagu ladkengse aliu khuga bam makge.
Anahmai yo, naliutu pijiu nuan ten makra jengniu haibo chamse Iniu raokhaibo-e, chiudi mai khatniu nuan ten misai, aliu Piu khuga aliu sung khengra, tacheng matipbo Jesu Khrista bamme.
Khrista papumsiak hai aliu nuan kuak khai raleng-e, haise aliu nuan leng ronna makjiu nuan kam mibo mai mathiu leng-e.
Aliuniu Tingwang gu chamtan majai lusai, aliuniu patu masan siakjiu simibo-e.
Mai khatniu I patu silude, chiulujiu pacham majai maksai, pase aratmai-e, khatdi majibose pakhuga bam makge.
Chiudi mai khatniu pacham majai lusai Tingwang gu lungsabo siniu tathui khai siak mibo-e. Haisiniu aliu Tingwang khuga khat thiu mibo-e chiubo silu-e.
Mai khatniu Tingwang tu maluang akadjiu bamme chiu dinsai Khrista kumjiu lungrabo-e.

Sichiu bamdi, tuhoi Iniu naliu khuga raokhaibo hai kasanbo-e, palamra majibose Khrista khuga, khatdi naliu khugadi ngaopad mide. Palamra tamiubose kenpad mide, sichiujiu palingbo kabenbose benbam mide.
Mai khatniu pah kabenboga bamme, chiulujiu pasingnatu marengsai, tuhoidi pahai tamiuboga bamkha-e.
Mai khatniu pasingnatu lungsa sai kabenboga bamme, sichiusai siga chaphi masui rabo ha-e.
Chiudi mai khatniu pasingnatu marengsai pahai tamiuboga bamme, khatdi tamiuboga tadbam kha-e, sichiujiu tamiubo siniu pamik kamtiat mijiu ndelam tadkinlo chiubo simakge.
Anahmai yo, Iniu naliu khuga raokhaibo-e, palamra naliu nuanse Khrista pen gasu kuak khai mide.
Papiu maidung yo, Iniu naliu khuga raokhaibo-e, palamra karai gasu bambo patu naliu sijiu bamme. Akhangmaidung yo, Iniu naliu khuga raokhaibo-e, palamra naliuniu Kasabo khat situ ngamlude.

Anahmai yo, Iniu naliu khuga raokhaibo-e, palamra naliuniu Papiu situ sijiu bamme. Papiu mai yo, Iniu naliu khuga raokhaibo-e, palamra karai gasu bamniubo situ naliura sibambo-e. Akhangmaidung yo, Iniu naliu khuga raokhaibo-e, palamra naliu tanne khatdi Tingwang ladkengse naliu lungga bamme, sichiujiu naliuniu Kasabo khat situ ngamlude.
Kadihpiritu khatdi kadihpiriga bambo mania situ masia tulo. Naliu mai khatniu kadihpiritu lungsa-e sai, naliu khuga Papiutu lungsabo bam makge.
Kadihpiriga kabambo sira, chapumniu masenbo, amikniu masenbo hina, khatdi maidungniu wasao thiubo hina haise, Papiu khugasu makjiu, kadihpiri gasu wangbo-e.
Kadihpiri khatdi sibo lungga bambo chamainaniu masenbo hina hami rabo-e, chiudi Tingwang chunning tenmai hina tingthengjiu ringbam rabo-e.

Anahmai yo, pamalan tingse wangmide! Naliuniu chiulubo kum Khrista gu Mikrebo piuse wangsune, sichiujiu tuhoidi Khrista gu mikremai kengkha pad mide, sijengniu pamalan tingse wang mide chiubo aliu silude.

Paliuse aliu kangmai makge, sijengniu aliu khugasu tadpad mibo-e, paliu hai aliu kangmai-e chiusai paliuse aliutu majang bamniu rabo-e. Chiudi paliu tadmibo donniu, paliura aliu kangmai makge chiubo silura-e.
Chiudi naliura Khrista niu naliu riga Masanbo Hiupuina pikhai mibo-e, siniu naliu mathiuniu majibo situ si-e.
Iniu naliu khuga raokhaibo haira, naliuniu majibo situ simakge chiubo makge, chiudi naliura sibambo-e, sichiujiu aratbose majiboga bam makge, chiubo haidi naliu sibambo-e.
Sichiusai saose arat mailo? Mai khatniu Jesu se Khrista makge chiujiu dinmai si-e. Sikum maise Khrista gu mikre mai-e, paliuniu Papiu tudi Nahpiu tudi lukhai makge.
Mai khatniu Nahpiutu lukhai maksai, Papiu tudi lukhai makbo-e; mai khatniu Nahpiu situ lukhai sai, Papiu tudi lukhaibo-e.
Sichiusai karaiga naliuniu chiulubose naliu lungga bamlulo. Sibo chamse chiulujiu naliu lungga bamlu-e sai, naliudi Nahpiu nai Papiu khuga bam mibo-e
Haise Khrista papumsiakniu aliuleng pikhaira ladriat thiukhai mibo tingtheng karingbo si-e.
Iniu naliu khuga raokhaibo hai mainiu naliutu jumao mira kam bambo jengniu-e.

Chiudi naliu lengra Khrista niu pagu Hiupuina se naliu riga runkiu khai mide. Sichiujiu Hiupuina se naliu khuga bamthen mai khat niudi naliutu katikhaira pageng ha-e. Palamra pagu Hiupuina siniu naliutu wahina katikhai birabo-e, sichiujiu paniu katikhaibo hinase majibo-e, siga aratbo ha-e. Sichiusai Hiupuina siniu katikhaibo guse majai lujiu Khrista ga khat thiu lulo.
Sichiujiu anahmai yo, pakhuga bamlulo, sichiujiu patu madulen khaisai aliu humi rabo-e, chiusai pah kawangbo Tingmik gase pasuangga mangamjiu nbaimi lakge.
Khrista hai majibo-e chiubo naliuniu sisai, majibose kamkinbo-e, sichiujiu majibose kammai hina Tingwang nahmai-e.

Aka kakungmai yo, aliu tuhoira Tingwang nahmai mide, chiudi pasai dechiu suralo chiubo simasan lumakge. Chiudi Khrista tu madulen wangsai, aliudi pakum mine chiubo sibamme; palamra aliu patu zudaosiak rabo-e.
Haibo agunse mai khatniu Khrista khuga bamsai Khrista masanbo kumjiu padi masanjiu bam rabo-e.
Mai khatniu nuan kammi sai. Tingwang gu tacheng tajai kamken mibo-e, palamra nuan siniu tacheng tajai kamken mibo-e.
Khrista niu nuan kuak khaira wangbo-e chiubo naliuniu sibamme, khatdi pakhuga nuan wakhatnadi ha-e.
Sijengniu Khrista ga lung bammai hinase nuan-ga bam makge, sichiujiu nuan-ga lung bammai siniu patu ngaotang makge khatdi patu simakge.
Anahmai yo, mai khatniudi naliutu sonmi tulo. Mai khatniu majibo kam kinsai, Khrista niu tacheng matipbo kumjiu padi tacheng matip rabo-e.
Mai khatniu nuan kamkin sai para Satan khuga sude, delosai Satan sira karaigasu nuan kam mibo-e. Satan siniu kammibo situ kam mahara chiujiu Tingwang Nahpiu situ madulen khai mibo-e.
Tingwang nah khat siniu nuan tenjiu bam lakge, palamra Tingwang gu lunlung siakse pakhuga bamme, sichiujiu Tingwang se Papiu thiu mibo donniu nuanse paniu kamlan lakge.
Haigasu Tingwang nahmai nai Satan nahmaitu sitam lubui-e, mai khatniu majibodi kammak, khatdi pasingna tudi lungsa maksai, Tingwang nahmai makge.

Aliu hai Cain kum makrabo-e; para Kasabo Piu saisui lujiu pasingna Abel tu kamshat mibo-e. Dekamjiu Cain niu patu kamshatmi jiulo? Palamra pasingnapiu tienkam sira maji-e, chiudi pagu tienkamse maji makbo donniu-e.
Sijengniu singnamai yo, kadihpiri mainiu naliutu marengboga naliu suang hami tulo.
Aliu singnamaitu kakung jengniu, aliu kashaibo situ kenlujiu karingboga npad mibo-e. Mai khatniu maitu lungsa maksai pase kashaiboga bamkha-e.
Mai khatniu pasingnatu marengsai maitu kamshat mai-e, sichiujiu maitu kamshat mai khuga tingtheng karingbose ha-e.
Haichiujiu, aliuniu lungsabotu silu-e, chiubora Khrista niu aliuleng paringting pikhai-e.
Kalekwimai khatniu pasingna kanangbo ngaolujiu, chiudi palung gasu pasingnatu lungsa khai maksai, Tingwang tu paniu lungsa-e chiubo dechiu dinlu ralo?
Anahmai yo, aliuniu chalad, chaluiga ronna makjiu, ngamkam nai majibo siniu lungsakhe.
Aliuniu Tingwang suangga matipjiu bamsai, aliu hai majiboga bamme chiubo silu bui-e.
Sichiujiu aliu lungchun siniu aliutu kammaojiu bamsai, Tingwang sira aliu lungchun suang didiang-e, sichiujiu para wahina sikam bambo-e.
Iniu lungsabo akamai yo, aliu lungchun siniu aliutu kammao maksai aliu Tingwang suangga hujiu bamme.
Aliuniu khengbo hina pakhu gasu daolu-e, palamra aliu pacham majai bamme, khatdi pachun kiubose kam bamme.
Aliuniu Nahpiu Jesu Khrista tu malumjiu khatdi paniu dinkhaibo kum, khatniu khattu lungsajiu bamkhe, haise pagu chamtan si-e.
Mai khatniu chamtanse majai bamsai, Tingwang khuga pah bambo-e, khatdi Tingwang pakhuga bambo-e. Paniu pagu Hiupuina aliuleng pikhaibo jengniu, pah aliu khuga bamme chiubo silu-e.
Lungsabo akahmaidung yo, Hiupuina bamme chiujiu dinmai hinatu malum mane, chiudi Hiupuina se Tingwang ganiu wangbo ma chiubo matad lulo, palamra aratbo phaimiu kakeng pabam hinaga padmide.
Naliuniu haichiujiu Tingwang Hiupuina tu silulo: Jesu Khrista hai chamai lun thiujiu wang-e chiubo dinsai, Tingwang khuganiu wangbo-e.

Chiudi Jesu hai chamipum thiujiu lungwang-e chiujiu din madu makbo hiupuinase Tingwang khuganiu wangbo makge, sikumbo hiupuina sira Khrista gu Mikrepiu khugasu wangbo-e; sikumbo wangne chiubo hai naliu chiumide, sise tuhoidi wangbam mide.
Anah maidung yo, naliuse Tingwang gu-e, sichiujiu naliuniu aratbo phaimiukakungdung situ ngamlude, palamra naliu khuga bambo Hiupuinase kadihpiriga bambo hiupuina suang tandiang-e.
Sibo aratbo phaimiu dungse kadihpiri lamga din-e, sichiujiu kadihpiri siniu paliu lad lu-e, palamra paliu hai kadihpiriga bambo donniu-e.
Chiudi aliura Tingwang gu-e. Tingwang tu kasimai siniu aliu cham nking-e, Tingwang gu makmai siniu aliu cham nking makge. Haichiubo gasu majibo Hiupuina nai kamaobo Hiupuina situ sitam lubui-e.
Kakungbo akahmaidung yo, aliu khatniu khattu lungsa lukhe, palamra lungsabose Tingwang gasu wangbo-e. Lungsa sibo hai Tingwang nahmai-e, khatdi Tingwang tu sibam mai-e.
Maitu lungsa makmai hina Tingwang tu simakge, palamra Tingwang haira lungsabo-e.
Tingwang niu aliutu lungsabo hai Nahpiu tu kadihpiriga langkiu khaibo hainiu madukhai-e, sichiujiu papen ganiu aliu tingtheng karingbose daolu rabo-e.
Aliuniu Tingwang tu lungsa-e chiubo makge, chiudi paniu aliutu lungsabo-e, sichiujiu aliu nuan kuak khaira Panahpiu situ langkhaibo haise chalungsabo si-e.
Kakung akahmaidung yo, Tingwang niu aliutu haijiukha lungsa khai bi-e sai, aliudi khatniu khattu lungsa rabo siakge.
Mai khatniudi Tingwang tu ngao matai makge, chiudi aliuniu khat khattu lungsa bamsai, Tingwang hai aliu khuga bamme, sichiujiu pagu lungsabo siniu aliutu pitathui khai-e.
Haigasu aliu silu-e, chiubora aliuniu pakhuga bamsai, pah aliu khuga bamme; palamra paniu aliuleng pagu Hiupuina pikhaibi-e.
Sichiujiu aliuniu ngaolubo-e, khatdi Papiuniu Panahtu kadihpirigu Rankhaipiu thiura langkhai bi-e, chiujiu maidung khuga dinlu bui-e.
Mai khatniu Jesu hai Tingwang Nahpiu-e, chiu dinsai pahai Tingwang khuga bamme, khatdi Tingwang pakhuga bamme.
Tingwang niu aliutu lungsa-e chiubo aliuniu si-e, khatdi malumme.
Tingwang haira lungsabo-e, sijengniu mai khatniu lungsaboga bamsai Tingwang khuga bambo-e, sikumjiu Tingwang-di pakhuga bamme.
Ladjan thiubo Tingmikga aliu tathui lura lungsajiu bamkhe, palamra Khrista kumjiu, aliudi kadihpiriga bambo-e.
Lungsaboga wadi kapingbo ha-e, tathuibo lungsabo siniu kapingbo situ hathon mibo-e. Sichiusai kapingbo mai khuga tathuibo lungsiatse ha-e, palamra kapingbo sira sajai piboga bamme.
Aliuniu patu lungsa-e, palamra Tingwang niu aliutu lungsa raibo gasu-e.
Mai khatniu pah Tingwang tu lungsa-e chiulujiu pasingnatu marengsai para aratmai-e, palamra mai khatniu ngaobambo pasingnatu lungsa maksai, ngao makbo Tingwang tu lungsa ngamlakge.
Mai khatniu Tingwang tu lungsa-e chiusai, pasingna tudi paniu lungsa rabo-e, chiubo chamtan hai Khrista gasu aliuniu daolubo-e.
Mai khatniu Jesu hai Khrista-e chiubo malumsai, Tingwang gasu mana lubo-e, mai khatniu Papiutu lungsa-e sai Nahpiu tudi lungsa rabo-e.
Aliuniu Tingwang nahmaitu lungsa-e sai, pagu chamtan situ majaijiu Tingwang tu lungsa rabo-e.
Aliuniu Tingwang tu lungsabo hai pagu chamtan situ majai kakinbo si-e, sichiujiu pagu chamtanse aliuleng ripju makge.
Tingwang nahmai hinaniu kadihpiri haitu ngamlude, palamra aliu malumbo pen gasu-e.
Saoniu kadihpiritu ngamlu ralo? Tingwang Nahpiu Jesu tu malummai ronnaniu-e.

Jesu Khrista hai tadui gasu khatdi paniu shaikhaibo zai gasu nphum lujiu wangbo-e. Tadui ronna makjiu, tadui nai tazai thiujiu wangbo-e. Haise majibo-e chiujiu Hiupuina siniu jengdin thiukhai-e, palamra Hiupuina se majibo-e.
Haiga jengdin sum bamme,
sisera Hiupuina, tadui khatdi tazai si-e. Sum siniu jengdin khat thiubo-e.
Aliuniu chamainagu jengdin situ malumne, chiudi Tingwang gu jengdin sira sisuang tandiang-e, sichiujiu paniu Nahpiu lamga jengdin thiubo-e.

Mai khatniu Tingwang Nahpiu tu malum sai paliu lungchun ga jengdinse bam mibo-e, mai khatniu Tingwang tu malum maksai patu aratbo pithiu khai-e, palamra Nahpiu siniu jengdin thiubo situ malum makbo donniu-e.
Jengdin sira, Tingwang niu tingtheng ringbo aliutu pikhai-e, sibo ringtingse Nahpiu khuga suniu-e.
Mai khatniu Tingwang Nahpiutu lukhai-e sai, pakhuga tingtheng karingbose bamme; mai khatniu Nahpiu situ lukhai maksai, pakhuga tingtheng karingbose bam makbo-e.
Naliuniu Tingwang Nahpiu tu malumjiu bamsai, tingtheng karingbose ngaolude chiubo silura, Iniu haise naliu khuga raokhaibo-e.
Tingwang khuga aliu hujiu bamme, palamra aliuniu malumjiu pagu maning saisuijiu pakhuga khengjiu bamsai, paniu aliuleng pikhai bine.
Aliuniu khengbo hina paniu pikhaibi-e haise aliuniu ngaolude khatdi silude, haise majibo-e.

Mai khatniu pasingna shaibui makbo nuan kambo ngaosai, paleng kheng khailo, chiusai Tingwang niu shaibui makbo nuan kambo maitu ringtingse pikhai bine. Shaibuibo nuan bamme, paliuleng khenglo chiubo makge.
Kamaobo kambo hina nuan-e, chiudi shaibui makbo nuan bamme.
Mai khatniu Tingwang khugasu mana kasan lumai thiusai nuan kamlakge, chiubo aliuniu si-e; palamra Tingwang Nahpiu siniu paliutu rankhai mide, sichiujiu paliutu Kasabo Piu siniu kam masa ngam lakge.
Kadihpiri pakhiangna hai Kasabo Piu siniu mawangjiu bamdi, aliura Tingwang mai-e chiubo aliuniu si-e.

Tingwang Nahpiu wangkinne chiubo aliu si-e, sichiujiu paniu aliuleng ningting pikhai-e, sichiujiu majibo Tingwang tu aliuniu silu-e. Aliuniu majibo Tingwang khuga khatdi Nahpiu Jesu Khrista khuga khat thiujiu bamme. Haise majibo Tingwang si-e, khatdi tingtheng karingbo si-e.
Anahmai yo, aratbo radung gasu naliu ronna mari lulo!
Kakungbo Maipui khatdi panah maidung khuga, kating thiubo Iniu raokhai-e. Iniu naliutu majiboga lungsa-e, aronna makjiu majibotu kasimai hinaniu naliutu lungsa-e.
Delosai aliu khuga bambo majibo siniu, naliutu tingthengjiu maluang bamrabo-e.
Papiu Tingwang nai Nahpiu Jesu Khrista khugasu thoidam, lungsiat khatdi agi-manaibo aliu mathiuleng pikhaibo thiumilo, sichiujiu lungsabo nai majiboniu aliutu majang bammilo.
Papiu siniu chamtan pikhaibo kumjiu, naliu nahmaidung khangsia mainiu majiboga lungbambo silujiu dejiukha achun wibamlo!
Sichiujiu Iniu kungbo, maipui yo, Iniu nakhuga dinkhai nibo sira kasanbo cham makge, chiudi karai gasu aliuniu daolubo si-e, chiubora aliuniu khat khattu lungsajiu bamkhe.
Haise lungsabo-e, chiubora aliuniu Tingwang gu chamtan majaijiu bambo si-e. Naliuniu karai gasu chiulubo chamtan sira, lungsaboga naliu bamlulo.
copy
Palamra maitu sontiu mai kadihpiriga kengjiu padmide; paliura Jesu Khrista hai chamaina lun thiujiu wang-e chiubo suimakge. Paliu haise maitu sontiu mai-e khatdi Khrista gu Mikremai-e.
Mathing sijiu bamlo, aliuniu kamkhai mibo jengniu matha nchummi lakge, sichiujiu naliu phijeng sidi dao rabo-e.
Mai khatniu Khrista gu katikhaiboga bammakjiu, tad maju misai, Tingwang khuga bam makge. Mai khatniu Khrista gu katikhaiboga bamsai para Papiu nai Nahpiu khuga bamme.
Sijengniu katikhaibo cham hai thinmakjiu maidungniu naliu khuga wangsai paliutu naliu kyga lukhai tulo khatdi paliutu kanui khaibo ladkeng tangna dintulo.
Palamra mai khatniu sikum maitu kanui khaisai, pagu kasabo ngamga khat thiu mibo-e.
Iniu naliu khuga wa kakeng raokhai nijiu bamdi, ariak nai ariakdui siniu thinjiu raokhai lakde, chiudi Iniu naliutu zu-ngao siakjiu npaokhai nibo-e, sichiusai aliu mathiu chunse wirabo-e.
Naliuniu kungbo naliu Tanpui nahdung siniu naliutu kanui khai-e.
Iniu kungbo singna yo, nang hiunaga wibambo kumjiu napumdi wijiu bamra khatdi wahina wibamra Iniu kheng bambo-e.
Chiubora nangniu majiboga tadkinbo kumjiu, singna khangsianiu haiga wangjiu nang majiboga lungbamme chiubo paokhaiboga I achun wichang wi-e.
Anahmaidung siniu majiboga tadjiu bambo raha sikhaijiu achun wibamme, sisuang wira ha-e.
Iniu kungbo singna yo, nangniu aliu singnamai khatdi sangmai khugadi malumbuibo tien thiujiu bamme.
Nangniu lungsa khaibose phumling haiga paliuniu wang dinkhaide. Tingwang niu masenbo tabin gase paliutu nkhakhai saomakjiu bamlo.
Palamra malummak maidung khugasu paliuniu wadi lumakjiu, Khrista gu tienkam jengniu paliu tad kinbo-e.
Siniu aliudi sikum maitu nkhasiak rabo-e, sichiujiu paliugu majibo tienkam gase aliu dam daolu bui-e.
Iniu phumlingga raokhai-e; siga paliugu jupao thiunibo Diotrephes siniu aliu cham situ lukhaini makge.

Sijengniu I wangsai, paniu kakambo hina, paniu aliu lamga arat dinbo hinase Iniu dinlen bine. Sironna makjiu paniu aliu kangmai tudi lukhai makge, khatdi paliutu khat thiunijiu bammai tudi paniu khamme, khatdi phumling gasu paliutu hathonra matanne!
Iniu kakungbo singna yo, kasabo situ makjiu, kawibo situ ali lulo. Kawibo kambam mai hinase Tingwang gu-e; chiudi kasabo kamkin maise Tingwang tu ngaolu makbo mai-e.
Mai hinaniu khatdi majibo siniudi Demetrius tu din mawijiu bamme. Yo, aliudi pagu jengdin thiubo-e, chiusai aliuniu dinbo hai maji-e chiubo nangdi si-e.
copy
Iniu palam kakeng nakhuga raokhaira bamme, chiudi ariaktang nai ariakdui thinjiu naliu khuga raokhaini makge.
Chiudi aliu zu-ngao lujiu npao munsun maji ratu maning-e.
Naliu khuga agi-manaijiu bam lulo.
Nakamai mathiuniu natu kanui khai-e. Aliu kamai mathiu zan dinjiu kanui khailo.
Lungsasibo, agi-manaibo, khatdi lungsabo siniu phuibambo thiululo.

Kakungbo chakadung yo, Iniu naliu khuga aliu mathiugu juringbo lamga raora matanjiu bamboga, Tingwang niu pamaidung leng malod khatniu tingtheng leng pikhaibo malum jengniu aphenra naliutu kachu khaira pageng bam mide.

Palamra charatu simak maidung naliu ruangga simak jingjiu ngut mide, paliura aliu Rawang gu lungsiat lamga din kadat lujiu, paliu pumniu masenbo npui-npiu thiubo situ marilura kambo maidung-e. Sichiujiu paliuniu aliu Wangpiu khatnakhabo Rapiu Jesu Khrista tu suimak maidung-e. Paliuniu daorabo damse Masanbo ariakniu nda dinkhai masuang mibo-e.

Siga mazadung siniu paliutu pikhaibo pumtan rigasu nkiujiu kamken mibo, chiubora paliu bam situ phutmibo jengniu, kadibo Tingmikga ladjan thiura Tingwang niu paliutu ratlujiu tingtheng tamiubo bamgase khai nbamme chiubo maningtao lulo.

Sikumjiu Sodom nai Gomorrah khatdi sibo wonjengga bambo namdakdung sidi npui-npiu thiubo khatdi katanuakbo ngamse mazadung kumjiu tenkhai mibo mai hinatu tingthenggu chariubo chami siniu sajai pikhai rabose mathiutu kachan khaibo-e chiubo maningtao lulo.
Sichiujiu paliugu madungao saisuijiu paliuniu paliu pumtu nuan-ga jukhai-e, sichiujiu paliuniu Tingwang gu pumtan situ lukhai makge, khatdi pakendibo situ din masa-e.
Dithubo maza Michael katang niudi Satan situ, Mose pum lamga n-gijiu ariboga haikumbo kasabo ladse dintang khai makge, chiudi “Rapiu niu natu rukhaibo thiu milo,” chiubo ronna dinkhai tamibo-e.
Chiudi simaidung sira paliuniu sitang makbo lamga arijiu bamme, chiudi khaoring kumjiu paliu lungchun kasabo siniu paliutu kam mahajiu bamme.

Paliu haira dejiukha sansabo thiu ralo! Cain niu tadbo npui ga paliu tadkhai kam mide. Palamra tasen-chalan jengniu Balaam gu kamaobo npuiga tadkhai mide. Korah kumjiu paliu chari thiujiu paliutu kam maha mide.

Paliu mangam kahabo siniu naliu maduigu katiu-tiu aruangbo gadi kam taniajiu bamme. Paliu haira paliuleng ronna kasimai-e. Paliu haira tingkainiu phungtad kinbo tadui jao makbo kamuang kumbo-e. Paliu hai masimakbo singbang kumbo-e, sichiujiu pamen katang pepad mibo chaken singbang kumbo-e.

Paliu hai paliu mangam kahabo tienkam siniu duipuiga tingkainiu hun kabuak khangbo tadui-ta kumbo-e. Paliu hai jongkinbo chagandung kumbo-e, sichiujiu paliutu tamiu thubo bam gase tingtheng leng khai mira Tingwang niu kaden khai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu charatu simakbo ngamkam hina, khatdi charatu simakbo lad-lui dinkhai mibo hinatu ladjan thiu rabo-e!”

Paliu haira pawan machang takhanjiu khatdi maitu ronna madam khaijiu bammai-e, paliura paliugu kasabo maningga ronna tadmai-e. Paliu ronna wasao thiujiu, paliuleng gengrabo donniu maitu kabuat khaibo lad ronna dinmai-e.
Chiudi akamai yo, Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu ladlangtadmai-dungniu karaiga naliu khuga dinkhai mibose maningtao lulo.
Paliuniu naliu khuga din-e; “Kanambo wanse wangboga, charatu simakmai paliu maning ronna kammai padrabo-e, sichiujiu naliutu nuimen surabo-e.”
Paliu haira paliu maning ronna kamjiu paphom-phom kampad maidung-e, paliura Hiupuina daomak mai-e.
Chiudi akamai yo, naliura naliugu masanbo malum gase, matipjiu bamlo, khatdi Masanbo Hiupuina pumtan ga kakheng thiujiu bamlo.
Tingtheng karingbo daora aliu Rapiu Jesu Khrista gu lungsiat tu khuanjiu, Tingwang niu lungsaboga naliura bamlulo.
Malum masajiu bammaitu chalungsa khailo,
paliutu chami gasu juken khaijiu gukhailo; khatdi paliu pumniu nuan phungjiu pingbam maitu lungsa khailo, chiudi npui-npiu thiunibo paliu fai-ni situra mareng lulo.
Sichiujiu naliu phi masui makra gukhai ngambo, khatdi pagu kendibo suangga kamaobo hajiu naliutu pijiu chapkhai ngamra
khatnakhabo aliutu Ranpao, Jesu Khrista pen gasu chakhuang thiubo, paken dibo, kangambo khatdi pumtan hina nda pawan sumakbo gasu tuhoidi tingtheng tingthengdi Tingwang kendibo thiu milo! Amen.
Jesu Khrista khuganiu madukhaibo, Tingwang niu wakam katum wangmi rabodungse pavang maidungtu lenkhaira patu pikhai-e. Haise Khrista niu pagu maza tu langkhaijiu pavangpiu John khuga lenkhai-e.
Sichiujiu John niu ngaolubo hinase dinkhaibo-e paniu Tingwang cham khatdi Jesu Khrista jengdin, ngaolubo hina lamga jengdin thiukhai-e.
Phaimiukakung cham raokhai nbambo hai kentao lumai khatdi chiu kalumai khatdi majai kalumaise padon wi-e! Palamra wahina hai majadjiu padmi rabo-e.
Tuhoidi bambo, masuang gadi bamniubo, khatdi pasaidi wanglan rabo khatdi pawangbam suangga bambo Hiupuina chinnia khu ganiu;
Kadihga chawang maidung riga chawang khatdi kashaimai ruangganiu ringsu raithubo, malum kabuibo jengdin Jesu Khrista khuganiu lungsabo khatdi agi-manaibo naliu khuga bambo thiu milo.
Paniu aliutu lungsabo jengniu, pazainiu aliu nuan gasu aliutu rankhai bide.
Sichiujiu Papiu Tingwang tu machara aliutu pi singku maidung gu wangdih khat pithiu khai bide. Rapiu Jesu Khrista khuga tingtheng tingthengjiu paken dibo khatdi pumtan bambo thiumilo! Amen.

Naliu singna John, I hai chariubo gadi chawangdih gadi chariu kheng machamjiu bambo khatdi naliutu majang padam lubambo, Tingwang cham khatdi Jesu jengdin kathiu jengniu Patmos kubo chapiukakga bambo-e.
Rapiu Tingmik ga Hiupuina siniu atu thinman lujiu make khuan kumbo chakhuan katan khatniu asailamsu dinbo I chiu-e.
Siga dinbo siniu, “Nangniu kangao hina ariakkhuangga raolujiu sise phumling chinnia: Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamum, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia, khatdi Laodicea ga langkhailo.”
Siga atu npaobo piutu phuira chiujiu mari wangboga kachia mibung bam chinniatu Iniu ngaode.
Chamibung bam ruangga chamaina kumbo khang khat, sinase pafaise paphiga kiutang, khatdi paga-ga kachia khen-gak bamme.
Khatdi paphise tanaagi chami ganiu ru maheng kalubo kum, khatdi pakhuanse giudi khuan kumme.
Sichiujiu paben majatlam siniu chagan chinnia thinbamme, pamun ganiu pamun niabo apang-heng kum liangbo padle, khatdi pazuse naimik biu paranbo kumme.
Iniu patu ngaoboga, kaokiu kashaibo kum bammide, chiudi paben majatlam siniu atu dijiu din-e, “Pingtulo! Ira karaibo khatdi kanabo si-e.
Ira ringbambo si-e! Ira shaikhai mibo si-e, chiudi tuhoira Ira tingtheng tingtheng ringbam mine. Sichiujiu kashaibo nai charuidihgu khamtense akhuga bamme.
Sijengniu nang tuhoi ngaobodung khatdi haibo saiga padlan rabo hinase raokhai lulo.

Sichiujiu nangniu aben majatlam kangaobo chagan chinnia, khatdi kachia mibung chinniagu ramba haise kasukbo-e. Chagan chinniase phumling chinniagu mazadung si-e, khatdi chamibung chinniase phumling chinnia si-e.
“Ephesus ga bambo phumling gu maza khuga raokhaibo: “Haise paben majatlam chagan chinnia thin lujiu, kachia mibung chinnia ruangga tad mariu bambo piu khugasu-e.

Naliuniu maranjiu bambo, ginsijiu bambo, khatdi naliuniu kamkhai mibo hina Iniu si-e. Naliuniu kasa maidungtu khenglu lakjiu bambo, khatdi ladlangtadmai mak tadi paliu ronna ladlangtadmai-e chiujiu dinmaitu kawi-kasa matad lujiu paliu arat silujiu bambo Iniu si-e.
Naliura ginsijiu, ajeng ganiu chariu khengkhai mide khatdi khengsao makjiu bamme.
Chiudi naliuniu karaiga atu lungsabo kumjiu, lungsa tamibo jengniu alung makge.
Sijengniu naliu dechiujiu kaomibolo chiubo maning lujiu, naliu lung lilulo khatdi naliu tien karaibose tenlan lulo. Naliuniu lunglilu maksai, I wangjiu chamibungse pabam gasu khoi kali mine.
Chiudi Iniu Nicolaitans maitu marengbo kumgapjiu naliudi mareng bambo sira naliu khuga bamme.
“Ngam kalubo patura Tingwang gu Kareng ga bambo sailisingbang gasu tiura Iniu pamaji pikhai bine.”

Naliuniu chariujiu bambo I si-e; naliu kalek sa-e, chiudi pachangjiu naliura kalek wi-e chiubo I si-e! Satan gu madui ga bammai paliu Jehudimai mak tadi Jehudimai-e chiujiu dinmai siniu naliutu din masa bambo I si-e.

Chariubo naliu khuga wangnejiu bambo situ pingmi tulo. Phuilo, Satan niu naliu khangsia maitu madiura minlujiu kavangkyga khaisune, chiudi naliugu chariu rabose jengriu ronna leng-e, Sijengniu kashai tangbo malum lulo; chiusai naliuniu chari ngambo lubo jengniu tathuon leng karingbo pirunse Iniu pikhai bine.
“Ngamlumai tura shailon niabo mathad gasu kam mathadlan lakde.
“Pergamum phumling ga bambo maza khuga raokhaibo: “Haise pamun niabo apang-heng thinbambo piu khugasu-e.

Satan gu wangbam thiubambo ga naliu bamme chiubo I si-e. Naliuniu atu malumjiu bamme, khatdi Satan bamga bamjiu malumbuibo khatdi ajengdin thiu bambo Antipas tu kamshatbo tinggadi naliuniu naliu malum situ phut makge.

Chiudi naliu riga aman makbo kasia bamme: naliu ruangga khangsia, Balaam niu katikhaibo cham kaphungmai bamme, paniu Israel maitu charameng ga kadkhaibo rathak mi tiura, khatdi npui-npiu lunlung talara Balak tu katikhai-e.
Sise kumjiu Iniu marengbo Nicolaitans mainiu katikhaibo sai kasuimai naliu ruangga bamme.
Tuhoira naliu nuan gasu lungli lulo! Chiumaksai Iniu naliu khuga wangmajad lujiu amun ganiu kapadbo apangheng siniu paliutu chari thiune.
“Chari ngamlu maitu baikhai bambo mannase Iniu pikhai bine. Tatu kakabo riga tazan kasanbo raokhai bambose Iniu pikhai bine, sibo zanse daolumai paliu makjiu mai khatdi simakge.
“Thyatira phumling ga bambo maza khuga raokhaibo: “Haise pamik chamipuang kumbo,paphiniu tanaagi kum thamasan padjiu thaoben bambo Tingwang Nahpiu khugasu-e.
Naliuniu kambambose Iniu si-e. Naliuniu lungsabo, malumbuibo, naliu tienkam khatdi naliuniu ginbambo I si-e. Karaiga suang tuhoi naliuniu nkiujiu kambambo I si-e.

Chiudi naliuniu patu paronna phaimiukakungpui-e chiujiu kubo Jezebel tu suikhaibo jengniu alung makge. Paniu avangdungtu npui-npiu thiura talabo lunlungga khatdi charamengga kadkhaibo rathak tatek tiura leng katikhai-e.
Paniu palung lilura Iniu paleng pawan pikhai bibo-e, chiudi paniu pagu lungtalabo lunlung gasu lunglilu makge.
Sijengniu phuilo, patu paziga majikhai lujiu patu khatdi patu maluong npui-npiu thiumi maitu kam mathad khaine. Paliuniu haibo kasabo ngam gasu lungli maksai Iniu tuhoira paliutu mathad khai sune.

Iniu pasai kasuimai hinatu kamshat mine; sichiujiu phumling hinaniu Ira mai hina lungchun kametjiu mai hina maning sijiu bambo-e chiubo silune. Iniu naliu mai hinatu naliu tienkam saisuijiu pikhailan bine.

“Chiudi Thyatira ga bammai naliu khangsia maira kasabo katikhai situ suimakge; khangsia mainiu ‘Satan gu kasukbo, kakungbo-e’ chiubose paliu sitanglu makge. Iniu naliu khuga dinbo-e, chiubora karipbo bangse naliu riga Iniu khaisan lakde.
Chiudi Iniu wanglan makthen naliu khuga bambose thin matipjiu bamlo.
Kaloibo tangjiu Iniu masenboga tadjut-jajiu ngamlu maitu jat hina riga pumtan thinra Iniu pikhai bine.
Chagam litu kam pangroi mibo kumjiu, paliuniu jat hina riga chagithun thinlujiu senra, Iniu Apiu khuga daolubo pumtanse pikhai bine.
Iniu paliuleng tingsangpui sidi pikhai bine.
“Phumlingdung khuga Hiupuina niu dinbose pakuon kabam mai hina chiu lulo!”

“Sardis phumling ga bambo maza khuga raokhaibo: “Haise Tingwang gu hiupuina chinnia khatdi chagan chinnia bambo piu khugasu-e. Naliuniu kambambo Iniu si-e, naliu shaimijiu bamdi, naliuniu ringbambo zantad tadjiu bambotu I si-e.
Sijengniu sulo, shailajiu bambo gasu pitan lulo. Palamra naliuniu kambambose Tingwang masuangga wi tathuibo Iniu daomakge.

Sijengniu naliu dechiu katilulo, khatdi chiu lulo, chiubo maningtao lujiu naliu nuan gasu lungli lulo. Naliu kadenlu maksai, ka-agamai kumjiu I wang sune, dekumbo wan ga wangralo chiubo naliu silakge.
Chiudi Sardis ga bammai naliu khangsiamai naliu fai-ni kam masan kalumai bamme. Naliuniu kakabo pon piulujiu atu maluong tadne, palamra naliu sichiu buibo mai-e.

Sichiujiu chari ngamlumai situ kakabo pon piukhai bine, khatdi karingbo ariakkhuang gasu paliu zan luthonmi lakge. Paliuse amaidung-e chiubo Iniu Apiu masuangga khatdi pagu mazadung masuangga madujiu dinpadne.
“Phumlingdung khuga Hiupuina niu dinbose pakuon kabam mai hina chiululo!
Naliuniu kambambo I si-e, naliu khuga pumtan poinaga bambo I si-e, Iniu katikhaibo naliu majai lujiu atu malumjiu bamme. Mai khatniudi kham namlan ngamlakbo akhamse Iniu naliuleng lekhai bamme.
Phuilo, ka-aratmai, Satan saisuimai, paliu Jehudimai makdi Jehudimai-e chiujiu kumai situ Iniu wangjiu naliu phiga pi makhumkiu khai bine. Iniu naliutu lungsa-e chiubo paliu mathiuniu sisune.
Palamra agu chamtan naliuniu khenglubo donniu, kadihpiriga lungbammai mathiu khuga madiurabo chariu magenthiubo gasu Iniu naliutu gukhai bine.
I wangji sune, naliu khuga bambo chari ngambo gu tathuonse mai khatniudi sutmi makra thin matip lulo.

Chari ngamlu maitu Iniu Apiu Tingwang tu kahumbokyga katiang pithiu khai bine, sichiujiu pah sigasu wadaodi tadpadlan lakge. Iniu pariga a-Rawang zan, a-Rawang gu namdi zan, a-Rawang kadih gasu wangkiu rabo Jerusalem kasanbo zan, khatdi kasanbo azan sidi raokhai bine.
“Phumlingga Hiupuina niu dinbose pakuon kabam mai hina chiululo!
Naliuniu kamkhai mibose Iniu si-e; naliu hai agidi mak, lumdi mak bambo I si-e. Naliuniu agijiu bambo maksai thiujiu bambotu Iniu luni-e.
Chiudi naliuniu agidi mak, thiudi mak, lumlua-lua bambo jengniu Iniu naliutu amun gasu masiu thon mine.

Naliuniu din-e, ‘Ira kalek wi-e, amansai bamme, wa manangbo ha-e. Chiudi naliu hai dejiuga kasamai khatdi lung magenthiu mailo chiubo naliuniu silu makge! Naliura kalek sa-e, naliu pumruang bamme, khatdi naliu mik tiat-e.

Sijengniu, naliu lungwi lura akhugasu kachia kawibo liululo chiujiu ladpi khaibo-e. Napumruang mangambo situ bentom lura khatdi thaptom lura chafai kakabo sidi liululo. Namik tiatbo gadi khaijiu ngaolan lurabo piu sidi liululo.
Iniu lungsamai hinatu Iniu ru khaine khat di kasan khaine. Sijengniu maran lulo, khatdi nalung lilulo.
Phuilo, Iniu kamun-ga chaplujiu akham maganjiu bamme; mai khat kumboniu akhuan chiulujiu, akham lekhaisai, Iniu kalunglam ngutlujiu patu maluang tiune, khatdi paniu atu maluang tiune.
Iniu chari ngam lujiu Apiu wangbamga tuhoi Apiu mungga ntao bambo kumjiu, chari ngamlu mai hinatu awangbam gase amungga ntao macham bamra pikhai bine.
“Phumlingdung khuga Hiupuina niu dinbose pakuon kabam mai hina chiululo!”

Sibo wan-ga madungao khat gasu tinggen akham lepadbo I ngao-e. Iniu chiubo khuanse make mudbo khuan kumjiu akhuga dinbo I chiu-e, “Haiga khanglo chiusai haibo saiga padsiak rabo Iniu nakhuga lenkhai bine.”
Sichiujiu Hiupuina siniu atu thinman mide. Phuilo, tinggen gase chawangbam khat bamme, sibo riga mai khat ntao bamme.
Sibo piu zuse paman kungbo tudung talatu nai tabaipum kumme, sibo chawangbam tuse takimalyniu thao maguijiu kamaobo tu kumjiu malikjiu madiakbo kumme.
Sibo chawangbam mungga katambo chawangbam makai-je-madaikiu bamme, khatdi sibo riga apaimai makai-je-madaikiu kakabo pon piulujiu khatdi kachia pirun runlujiu ntao bamme.
Chawangbam gasu ting kalikbo nai tingsin kawangbo khuan kumjiu chiu-e. Sibo chawangbam suanggase kahiupuang chinnia tao bamme, sise Tingwang gu Hiupuina chinnia si-e.
Sibo chawangbam maguiboga khaoring madai paliu zu kabalujiu bamme.
Khaoring karaibose ndongqui kum, niabose kabuichi kum, sumbose chamai zu kum, madaibose lenkinbo lengreng kumme.
Sibo khaoring madaise paliu kan charuk charuk bamme, khatdi paliu kan lenlamdi palung lamdi pamik maliang bamme. Nchun n-nien saomakjiu chalui thiujiu bamme:
“Masanbo, Masanbo, Masanbo, khatdi Ngamkam-kamjiu bambo,
Rapiu Tingwang, masuangdi bamniubo, tuhoidi bambo,
pasai wangrabo gadi bamrabo.”
Ringjiu bambo khaoring madai siniu chawangbamga tingtheng tingtheng ringjiu bambo piutu thuonjiu, chakhuangthiujiu pakendibo lui thiujiu bamme.

Paliuniu sichiuboga, apaimai makai-je-madaikiuse tingtheng tingtheng ringjiu bambo chawangbam riga ntao bambo piu masuangga makhum kiujiu kahum bamme. Paliuniu chawangbam suanggase paliu pirun thonkhai lujiu din-e,
“Aliu Rapiu khatdi Rawang! Nangra kendibo,
chakhuang thiubo khatdi pumtan daobui-e.
Palamra wahinase napen gasu khatdi nachunning gasu padbo-e.”
Siga kangambo maza khatniu, “Ariak majiuhanse madan kampang lujiu lepad ngambo sao bamlo?” chiujiu dinbo chiu-e.
Chiudi tinggen gadi kadih gadi, kadih hanggadi sibo ariak majiuhanse lulujiu, lepad phui ngammai khatnadi ha-e.
Mai khatniudi sibo ariak majiuhanse lepadjiu phui ngambo habo jengniu I kapchang kapsude.

Siga apaimai khang khatniu akhuga din-e, “Kaptulo, phuilo, Judah kiphiu gasu Ndongqui, kadibo David kaikik gasuniu charise ngamlude, sichiujiu paniu madan chinnia situ kampang lujiu ariak majiuhanse lepad ngamme.”
Milypoi siniu tadwang chawangbam riga ntao bambo piu ben majat lamsu ariak majiuhanse khoilude.

Sigase ringbambo khaoring madaise nai apaimaidung makai-je-madai-kiuse Milypoi masuangga makhum kiu-e. Paliu ben ga tarabung khat khat thin bamme, khatdi parim wiboniu phuibo kachia kuangdi thin bamme, sise Tingwang maidunggu kakhengbo rathoise-e. rathoi-e.
Paliuniu chalui kasan thiu bamme:
“Nangra ariak majiuhanse khoilujiu madandungse kampangra khatdi lepadra bui-e.
Palamra nangtu kamshat mibo-e, sichiujiu nazai pen gasu chaphiu hina,
chakhuan hina, jat hina,
chakik hinatu Tingwang mai pithiu khaibi-e.
pithiu khaijiu aliu Rawang tu machara kamkhai bide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu kadihpiri gadi mawang rabo-e.
Khatdi paliuniu paliu khuan tanjiu chalui thiu-e:
“Kamshat mibo Milypoi siniu pumtan,
chakhiu-chalan, ningting-tasi, khatdi pumtan,
chakhuang thiubo, kendibo, khatdi thuonkiubose daobui-e.”
Khatdi tinggen-ga, kadihpiriga, kadih hangga, khatdi duipuiga lungbambo khaoring hina chalui thiu bambo I chiu-e:
“Chawangbamga taobambo nai Milypoi khuga chakhuang thiubo,
kendibo khatdi kangambose tingtheng tingtheng thiubam milo!”
Ringbambo khaoring madai siniu paokakge, “Amen!” Siga apaimaidungse makhumkiujiu kahum bamme.
Sibosai Milypoi siniu madan raithubose lepadbo I ngao-e, khatdi ringbambo khaoring madai ruanggasu khatniu pakhuan tingsinbo kumjiu dinbo Iniu chiu-e, “Wanglo!”

Phuilo, chaqon kaka khat Iniu ngao-e, sibo riga ntao bambo piu siniu tavaipi khat thinkinne khatdi, pakhuga chawang pirun khat pikhai mide. Pase chari kangambo piu kumjiu chari ngamra leng chaqonse tong lujiu tad mide.
Sibosai, Milypoi siniu niabo madanse kampangjiu lepad khaide, siga ringjiu bambo khaoring niabo siniu dinbo I chiu-e, “Wanglo!”
Siga chaqon kahengbo khat padde. Sibo riga tongbo piutu kadihpiriga chari thiura, sichiujiu maidungniu khat khattu kamshat rabo pumtan pikhai mide. Patuse apangheng kadibo khat pikhai mide.

Siga ringbambo khaoring madaibo gasu chakhuan khat senpadbo I chiu-e, “Chabanmiu taju khat hai naikhat jengphi-e, khatdi tasy taju sum hai naikhat jengphi-e. Chiudi takisibang nai mumsireng tura kam mahami tulo.”
Sibosai Milypoi siniu madaibo madanse kampangjiu lepadde; siga ringbambo pamadaibo khaoring siniu dinbo I chiu-e “Wanglo!”

Phuilo, chaqon ka-ababo khat padde. Pariga tuangbambo piu zanse Kashaibo ku-e, pasaiga charuidih siniu suikinne. Sichiujiu kadihpiri jan-madaigu jan-khattu chariniu, chakhum khumboniu, chararetniu khatdi nkan khaoringniu kamshat mira pumtan pikhai mide.
Sibosai Milypoi siniu mangiubo madanse kampangjiu lepad khaide. Tingwang cham dinronjiu khatdi paliugu jengdintu malumbo jengniu kamshat mibo hiunadungtu rathakbam hanggase Iniu ngao-e.
Paliuniu paliu khuan tanjiu senjiu din-e, “Ngamkam-kambo Rapiu, masanbo khatdi majibo! Kadihpiriga lungbammai siniu aliutu kamshat mibo khumse dedaoniu ruikhaijiu paliutu mathad khai ralo?”
Siga paliu mathiutu ntiang kaka nao-naobo pikhai lujiu, paliu kahmaidung nai paliu singnamaidungtu paliutu kumjiu kamshat kam makthenna pakak khat mathakjiu khuanbam niura dinkhaide.
Tingkai katanbo hunwangboga minmakbo ndutsytu hun nkai kiubo kumjiu tinggen ga chagandungse kadihga nkaikiu mide.
Tinggen situ ariak majiuhan majiubo kumjiu majiu wangmide, khatdi maluong nai chapiukakdung hinase paliu bam gasu kali mide.

Sichiujiu kadihpiriga chawangdung, papaodung, riphenmaigu papeedung, kalek wimaidung, pumtan thinmaidung, kavangmai khatdi khenrang thiumaidung khatdi katam maidung hinase maluong ga bambo tudi hiuga khatdi tulimkiga nbai sude.
Sichiujiu paliuniu maluong kadibodung nai tukangdung situ kujiu din-e, “Aliu riga nkai kiujiu chawangbamga ntao bambo nai Milypoi lungpom gasu baikhailo!
Khatdi naimik padlamsu maza khatniu Tingwang gu madan khat thinlu wangbo Iniu ngaolanne. Kadihpiri nai duipuitu kam masa mira pumtan pikhai mibo maza madaitu paniu pakhuan tanjiu ku-e.
maza siniu din-e, “Aliuniu Tingwang vangmaitu madanse paliu san-ga diangkhai lumakthen, kadihtu, duipuitu maksai singbangdungtu kam masami tulo.”
Tingwang gu madan paliu san-ga diangkhai mibo maidung riakse 144,000 ye, chiujiu akhuga dinkhai-e.
Madan diangkhai lu maise, Juda kaikik gasu sang kariu-je-niakiu, Reuben kaikik gasu sang kariu-je-niakiu, Gad kaikik gasu sang kariu-je-niakiu,
Asher Kaikik gasu sang kariu-je-niakiu, Naphtali kaikik gasu sang kariu-je-niakiu, Manasseh kaikik gasu sang kariu-je-niakiu,
Simeon kaikik gasu sang kariu-je-niakiu, Levi kaikik gasu sang kariu-je-niakiu, Issachar kaikik gasu sang kariu-je-niakiu,
Zebulun kaikik gasu sang kariu-je-niakiu, Joseph kaikik gasu sang kariu-je-niakiu, khatdi Benjamin kaikik gasu sang kariu-je-niakiu haisi-e.

Sibosai Iniu phuiboga, chamai jat hina, chakik hina, paliu ladlui katam-tam maidung, kakabo nao-naobo pon piumai paliu riak sikamlakbo chamai mendi chawangbam nai Milypoi masuangga, paliu ben-ga kadanniu thin lujiu chap bamme.
Siga chakhuan katanbo khatniu senpadle: “Juringbose chawangbamga ntao bambo aliu Rawang nai Milypoi gasu-e!”
Sichiujiu mazadung, apaimaidung, khatdi khaoring madai siniu chawangbamtu chap magui lujiu makhumkiu Tingwang tu kahumjiu din-e,
“Amen! Thuonbo, kendibo, ningtingbo, thuonkiubo, chakhuang thiubo, pumtan bambo khatdi kangambose tingtheng-tingtheng aliu Rawang gu thiubam milo! Amen!”
Apaimai khang khatniu akhuga maniu-e, “Nao-naobo kakabo pon piubam maidungse saolo, khatdi paliu delamsu wangbolo?”
Sijengniu paliuniu Tingwang gu chawangbam masuangga chap lujiu nchun n-nien saomakjiu charakyga patu machajiu bam mai-e, sichiujiu chawangbamga ntao bambo piu siniu paliutu gukhai bine.
Paliura wadaodi mariu lanlakge, maksai charilan lakge, maksai naimik gu tingphu-tingnai siniu kam masalan lakge.

Chawangbam n-gangga bambo Milypoi siniu paliugu Milykhuanpao thiune, sichiujiu paniu paliutu karingbo duipin gase majangkhai bine. Sichiujiu Tingwang niu paliu mik gasu paliu mikduise nunsang khai bine.
Milypoi siniu chinniabo madanse kampangjiu lepadboga, tinggen gase wanchak phan kumbo jing-jing mide.
Siga Tingwang masuangga chap bambo mazadung khang chinnia situ make chinnia pikhai mibo Iniu ngao-e.
Sichiujiu Tingwang masuangga chap bambo maza ben gasu parim wibo mikhase nai masanmaidunggu rathoise khang mide.
Sigasu maza siniu rathakbam gasu chamise parim wibo rubo bunggase kankhai phuilujiu kadihga thonkhaiboga, tingsinbo, hengri kalikbo khatdi kathi khat padde.
Sibosai maza chinnia siniu make chinniase thinlujiu mudra kaden mide.
Sibosai niabo maza siniu make mudkhaiboga, chami taobambo maluong kadibo khat kumbo duipuiga thonkhai mide. Siga duipuise jansum thiujiu jankhatse tazai mawui mide.
Duipuiga bambo khaoring hinadi jansum thiujiu jankhat shaimide, khatdi maleedungdi jansum thiujiu jankhattu kam maha mide.
(Sibo chagan zanse “Takaibang,” chiu ku-e). Taduise jansum thiujiu jankhatse kha mide, sichiujiu maidung kakengse taduise sakbo donniu shaimide, palamra taduise khamibo jengniu-e.

Sichiujiu Iniu phuibamga tinggen lamsu lengreng khatniu lenwang pakhuan tanjiu haichiu senpadle, “Oh, maningkam lakge, maningkam lakge! maza sumniu make mudlan rabo wan-gase, kadihga lungbamniu maise dejiuga sansa ralo!”
Sibosai mangiubo maza siniu pagu makese mudkhaiboga, chagan khat kadihga nkaikiubo, khatdi pakhuga pamalan thiumakbo charuidihgu khamtense pikhai mibo Iniu ngao-e.
Sichiujiu pamalan thiumakbo charuidihse paniu lekhaiboga n-mang kadibo khat gasu mikhut padbo kumjiu padde; siga naimik nai tingpukse sibo mikhut siniu tamiu mide.
Siga mikha gasu kaorengdung kadihga pad mide, sichiujiu paliutu charuimai-gapuigu pumtan pikhai mide.
Sichiujiu paliuniu piubuandung, singbangdung maksai piuriangdungtu niamakra, chiudi paliu san-ga Tingwang gu madan diangkhaimak maitu ronna kam masara paliu khuga dinkhaide.
Sibo kaorengdung siniu maidung situ kamshat raleng suikhai makge, chiudi chahiu mangiu lungga pi mathadkhai raleng ronna-e. Paliuniu mathadbose charuimai-gapui maki thad kumgapbo-e.
Sibo chahiu mangiu lunggase maidung siniu shaini sune, chiudi paliuniu shailu lakge; khatdi paliuniu kashaibotu phiu sune, chiudi kashaibose paliu khugasu pak mine.
Paliu thamse maipuimai tham kum, khatdi paliu hiuse ndongqui hiu kumme.
Paliu gase chaginiu kambo gatop kum, khatdi paliu kan khuanse chaqon-kari tuanglujiu chariga pak kabam kumme.
Paliu miga charuimai-gapuigu thad kumbo phung kinne, sichiujiu chahiu mangiu lungga chamainatu kam mathad raleng pumtan paliu khuga bamme.

Pamalan thiumakbo charuidih situ thinbambo maza siniu paliu riga chawang khat kumjiu mawang bamme. pazanse Hebrew mai lad ganiu Abaddon, Greek mai lad ganiu Apollyon chiu ku-e, (parambaniu Kam mahapao chiubo-e).
Karaibo maningkam lakbose ton mide, haibosai maningkam lakbo wanglan rabo nia bam kha-e.
Wakhuan siniu charukbo maza khuga din-e, “Euphrate giukiga bangkhai bambo maza madai situ phut milo!”
Sichiujiu sibo wan, sibo hiu khatdi sibo kum gasu chamai jansum thiujiu jan-khattu kamshat mira sibo maza madai situ phutkhai mide.
Chaqon riga tongkinbo pariak chaklubo siniu moi kai-nia ye chiujiu akhuga dinkhai-e.

Agu madungao gasu ngaobose haichiu-e, chaqon riga tuangkin maise paliu gatopniu chami kum heng, khatdi sapphire kumjiu majai-e, khatdi sulfur kumjiu majinbi-e. Chaqon peese ndongqui pee kumme, sichiujiu paliu mun gasu chami, mikha, khatdi sulfur padle.
Paliu mun ganiu padbo chami, mikhut, khatdi tatumi raret sum siniu chamai jan-sum thiujiu jan-khattu kamshat mide.
Palamra chaqondung pumtanse paliu mun-ga, khatdi paliu miga bamme. Paliu mise kaniu kumme, siseniu chamaitu kam ajamme.
Sichiujiu paliuniu maitu kamshatbo, chamik thao kadatbo, npui-npiu thiubo maksai ka-agabo gasu lungli makge.
Sibosai kamuangniu papuan piubo kangambo maza katambo khat, tinggen lamsu kiubo Iniu ngao-e; papeega takimalyriang bamme, khatdi pazuse naimik kum, paphise chamipuang kumme.
Paben-ga ariak majiuhan poi khatse lepad lujiu thin bamme. Paphi majatlamniu kadihga, mawuilam siniu duipuiga chap bamme.
Ndongqui kamarungbo khuan kumjiu paniu senpadboga, tingsimbo khuan chinnia siniu paokakge.
Sichiujiu tingsimbo khuan chinnia siniu dinbo situ Iniu raora kamsuboga, tinggen lamsu chakhuan khatniu din-e, “Tingsim khuan chinnia siniu dinbose madan diang milo, chiudi raokhai tulo.”
tinggen, kadih, duipui khatdi sibo lungga bambo hinatu damkhaibo, tingtheng tingtheng ringbambo Tingwang zan ganiu siangjiu din-e, “Pating hai thenglak mide!
Chiudi chinniabo maza siniu pagu makese mudkhai dasai, Tingwang niu pavangmai, phaimiukakung mai khuga din masuang khai mibo pacham kasukbose kamkhai sune.”
Iniu maza khuga mengjiu ariak majiuhan poinase atu pilo chiu kheng-e. Siga paniu akhu din-e, “Khoilujiu tiululo, haise nawan gara khasune, chiudi namun gara makhuidui kumjiu hum sune.”
Sichiujiu Iniu ariak majiuhanse lulujiu tiulude. Amun gara makhuidui kum humme, chiudi awan gara kha-e.
Sibosai kadihpiri pakhiang-naga, jat hinaga, chakhuan hinaga khatdi chawang hinaga Tingwang cham hai paoron sulo, chiujiu akhuga dinkhai bide.
Chiudi charaky ndanlam bambo situra madat mane, palamra sise nkengmai leng pimibo-e, paliuniu Masanbo Namdi situ chahiu atai-je-niakiu tao-malui tadne.
Iniu agu jengdin khangniatu langkhaijiu panainiu maliufai benlujiu naimikpui sang khat-je-kai nia-je-riak charuk alad dinronne.”
Mai khat kumboniu panaitu kam masara kamsai, panai mun gasu chami padjiu panai mikremaitu kam maha mine; sikumjiu panaitu kam mathadkhai nimai hinatu kamshat mirabo-e.

Panainiu Tingwang cham dinron bambo tingga tingpuk tu kham manlujiu tingriu kiumakra kamlu buibo pumtan panai khuga bamme; panai khuga taduitu tazai pi mawui khaira, khatdi kadihpiriga chararet katam-tamboniu pijiu mathad khairadi pumtan bamme.
Sichiujiu panai phawse, panai Rapiu tu masengshat khaibo kadibo namdi npui gase majikhai sune. Sibo namdise Sodom maksai Egypt tu din kada khaibo-e.
Panai pumtu chamai jat hinaniu, chakik hinaniu jengsum paphan phuikhang sune khatdi panaitu baimira paliuniu suilakge.

Panai shaimibo donniu kadihpiri mainahdung siniu paliu chunwijiu changi sune, khatdi mathajiu khat khatleng kalen pisune palamra haibo phaimiukakung kania jengniu kadihpiriga chariubo wajiukha wangkhai mibo-e.
Chiudi jengsum paphan saiga Tingwang khugasu karingbo siu panai lungga ngutjiu panai buangsu mide, siga panaitu kangaomai hina pingchang pingmide.
Sichiujiu tinggen lamsu chakhuan katanbo khatniu panaitu kubo chiu-e, “Haiga wang nkhanglo!” Sichiujiu panai kamuang gasu khang mide, sise panai mikre mainiu phui bamme.

Siga kathi katanbo khat padboga, namdise jan-kariu thiujiu jan-khattu kam maha mide, khatdi chamai sang chinniatu kamshat mide. Khangsiamai shai kabangmai siniu pingchang pingjiu kadibo Tinggen Rawang tu thuonsude.
Niabo maningkam lakbose tonmide, chiudi pasumbo maningkam lakbose wangji sune!
Siga Tingwang masuangga ntao bammai apaimai makai-je-madaikiu siniu paliu wangbam gasu makhum kiujiu Tingwang tu kahumjiu haichiu din-e,
Hey, Ngamkam-kambo Rapiu Tingwang,
nangra tuhoidi ndadi bambo-e!
Nangniu pumtan thinsujiu mawang subo jengniu aliu natu thuonne!
ladjan thiura pating wangtang mibo jengniu
kadihpiri mainahdung paliu lung pomboniu phuimide.
Nangniu navangmai, phaimiukakungmai,
khatdi namai hina, natu chakhuang thiumai hina
kati, kadi hinatu paliu phijeng pirabo tingse wangtang mide.
Sichiujiu kadihpiritu kam mahami maitu kam maharabo tingse wangtang mide!
Sibosai tinggen lam katasibo khat ngao-e, sise maipui khat naimikniu papuan thiujiu, paphi hangga chahiu, khatdi papeega chagan kariu-je-niakiugu pirun bamme.
Sibo puise pawon phungjiu, panah mana raleng manathad thiujiu mara sude.

Pami siniu tinggen lam bambo chagandung jansum thiujiu jankhattu kadihga jukiu mide. Sichiujiu sibo mantagese maipui panah manara kambambo pui masuangga chap lujiu paniu manapad gapsai kajuangtiu lura khuan bamme.
Chagithun thin lujiu kadihpiri bambo jat hinatu mawangra piumanah khat paniu mana khaide. Chiudi sibo nahpiu situ Tingwang gu chawangbam lam ponkhang mide.
Sichiujiu maipui siniu tingmik sang khat kainia-je-riak-charuk patu akhikhai raleng Tingwang niu kadenkhai bambo ramjing lamse paktad mide.
Chiudi mantage tuse ngam lude, siga patu khatdi pagu mazadung situ tinggen-ga bamra suita mide.
Sichiujiu Devil maksai Satan kubo kaniu tanpao, mantage kadihpiri pakhiangnatu kahiambopiu situ pagu mazadung nai kadihpiriga thonkhai mide.
Paliura Milypoi zainiu khatdi paliugu majibo jengdin siniu patuse ngam lude, sichiujiu kashaibo katangna paliu pingmakjiu shaikhai mibo-e.
Sijengniu tinggen maidung, khatdi siga lungbam maidung, naliu chunwi lulo; chiudi kadih nai duipui lengra maningkam lakge! Palamra Satan niu patingse hamide chiubo silujiu palungpom sui mide.”
Mantage siniu patu kadihga thonkhai mide chiubo siluboga, palung pomjiu npiumainah manakhaibo pui situ hasude.
Sibo pui leng kaden-khaibo ramjing lam lentad mira lengreng kadibo kan nia pikhai mide, sichiujiu paniu siga takum sum paphan bamjiu, mantage khugasu marimi rabo-e.
Siga mantage siniu pamun gasu tadui nbiu padjiu sibo puitu matentad mira duiliu katanbo khat piluang pad khaide.
Chiudi sibo puitu kadihniu nkhajiu pamun ngapadjiu singgiu situ mangilude.

Siga sibo mantage siniu maipui situ palung pomchang pom mide, sijengniu pakai pakikdung, Tingwang tu malum maidung hina, khatdi Jesu niu madukhaibo majibogu jengdin thiu kinmaitu chari thiura tadpad mide.
Sichiujiu mantagese duipui taphuga chapbam mide.
Thiuhuse quiruk kum, paphise chahom phi kum, khatdi pamunse ndongqui mun kumme. Mantage siniu pagu pumtan, nai pawangbamse pakhuga pikhai mide.
Sibo thiuhu peerong gasu pee khatra ajam masa mibo chiudi sibo jam wilan miboga, kadih maina hinaniu paliu suang hajiu pasai suitad mide.
Mantage siniu pagu pumtanse thiuhu khuga pikhai mibo donniu mai hinaniu patuse kahumme. Sichiujiu thiuhu situ paliuniu kahumjiu din-e, “Thiuhu haitu saoniu kajonlu ralo? Saoniu patu ngamlu ralo?”
Haisiniu Tingwang tu din masajiu, pazan, paniu lungbambo bam, khatdi tinggen lam lungbam mai hinatu siang sude.
Haisiniu Tingwang maidungtu aphenra khatdi paliutu ngamra suikhaide; sichiujiu kadihpiriga lungbammai jat hina, chakik hina, chakhuan hinatu ngamra pumtan pikhai mide.
Sichiujiu kamshat mibo Milypoi gu karingbo ariakkhuangga paliu zan raokhai makmai hinaniu sibo thiuhu situ kahum sune.
“Pakuon kabam mai hinaniu chiululo!
Mai khat kumbotu bangkhai rabo-e sai, patu bangkhai rabo-e; mai khat kumbotu chahengniu bishatra-e sai, patu bishat rabo-e, Haise Tingwang mainiu khengsira khatdi malumjiu bamra leng-e.”
Sibosai kadih hang gasu thiuhu katanbo khat khanglanbo I ngao-e. Haise mily ke kumbo kenia bamme, khatdi mantage kumjiu chalad din-e.
Haisiniu karaibo thiuhu gu pumtan thinlujiu ajamlujiu wimibo thiuhu situ kahumra kadihga lungmai hinatu manomjiu kamsude.
Niabo thiuhu hainiu maisuang kahabo kamjiu, tinggen lamsu kadihga chami pikiujiu, mai hina suangga tasibo kamlende.
Paniu thiuhu karaibo masuangga tasibo kamlen lubo siniu mai hinatu sonlude. Sichiujiu ajam lujiu wilan mibo thiuhu situ chakhuang thiubo thiujiu sibo meng kamra paniu dinkhai-e.
Sichiujiu sibo thiuhu nia meng situ pi pasiu thikhai lanjiu npao lanra, khatdi thiuhu meng situ kahummak maitu kamshatra pumtan pikhai mide.
Sichiujiu thiuhu siniu chamaina kati, kadi, kalekwimai, kaleksamai, kavangmai, khenrang thiumai mathiutu paliu ben majatlam maksai paliu san ga kam tasi khaira manomjiu kamde.
Sichiujiu thiuhu zan maksai, pazan riak kaphungmai makjiu mai khatniudi wa liubo maksai jonbo suimakge.
Haiga ningting sira bamme; kasimai siniu thiuhu riak chak lulo, sise mai khatgu pariak si-e, sibo riakse kai charuk-je-riak charuk-je-charukkiu-e.
Tinggen lamsu tingriu nai tingsinbo khuan kumbo I chiu-e. Haibo khuanse tara gemainiu paliugu tarabung gejiu chalui thiu bambo kumme.
Chamai 144,000 siniu ringbambo khaoring madai nai apaimaidung siniu chawangbam suangga chap lujiu paliu ronna thiusibo lui kasan khat thiujiu bamme. Haimaidung ronna kadihpiri gasu ranlu maidung-e.

Paliu hai npuimai khuga lungmao khaimakjiu paliu pum masan bammai-e; paliu haira khangchang maidung-e. Paliu haira Milypoi saisuijiu bam maidung-e. Paliu hai kadih maina ruanggasu ranlu karai maidung-e, khatdi paliutu hai Tingwang nai Milypoi khuga kadkhaira leng ranlu maidung-e.
Paliu hai wadaodi ka-aratbo dinmakge; Tingwang masuangga paliu maomeng hamai-e.
Sibosai kadihga lungbam mai jat hina, chakhuan hina, chakik hina, mai hina khuga kawichamse paoronra katambo maza khat tinggen lamsu lenwangbo I ngao-e.

Paniu pakhuan tanjiu sen-e, “Tingwang tu chakhuang thiujiu, pagu kendibo situ thuonlo! Palamra paniu maidungtu ladjan thiu rabose pating wangtang mide. Tinggen, kadih duipui khatdi duipintu damkhaibo piutu kahumlo!
Sumbo maza siniu raibo niasitu suilujiu din-e, “Mai khatniu thiuhutu maksai pamengtu kahummai maksai paliu san-ga maksai paliu ben ga kam tasi khai mai bamsai;
Tingwang lungpom jaw piangse patu pisak khaine. Sichiujiu paliutu Milypoi nai pagu mazadung masuangga chami nai tatumi gasu mathad khaine.
Paliutu mathadbo mikhase tingthengjeng khasao makjiu bamne. Thiuhu nai pameng situ kahummai maksai tasikhaibo meng phungmai hinatu nchun n-nien saomakjiu kam mathadjiu bamne.”
Haise Jesu tu malum lujiu khatdi Tingwang chamtan majai lumaitu khengsira kubo-e.
Sibosai Tinggen lamsu chakhuan khatniu dinbo I chiu-e, “Haise raolulo: Tuhoi gasu Rapiu tiendon-ga shaimi maise padon wi-e!”
Hiupuina siniu paokakge, “Yo, pachang-e. Paliu tienkam gasu mathak lulo, palamra paliu tienkamse paliu nai tad macham bamme.”

Sibosai kakibo maza khat charaky gasu lenpad lujiu kamuang riga ntao bambo piu khuga senjiu din-e, “Nagu nkhoina thinlujiu sulo, palamra atiat tingse wangtang mide; atiat raleng kadihpiri hai min marenwang mide!”
Siga kamuang riga ntao bambo piu siniu pagu nkhoina thin lujiu kadihpiri lu gesude.
Sibosai tinggen lamsu kakibo maza khat lenkiubo I ngao-e, padi kaliangbo nkhoi khat thin kinne.

Sibosai kakibo maza khat, chami riga pumtan thin bambo rathakbam gasu wang-e. Nkhoina thin bambo maza khuga paniu pakhuan senjiu din-e, “Nagu nkhoise thin lujiu kadihgu mumsy rengse gesulo, palamra mumsyse min maren mide.
Sichiujiu maza siniu pagu nkhoina thinlujiu kadihgu mumsyse gemadui lujiu, Tingwang gu lungpom mumsy thunbo bamga taliangkhai mide.
Sichiujiu mumsyse namdi lenlam mumsy-thunbo bam gasu thunjiu, tazai luangpad sude, sibo zaise chakhet khat kugasu, mathakbam kaisum thengga luangpad bamme.

Sibosai tinggen lam katasibo khatdi maisuang kahabo khat I ngao-e, siga maza chinnia siniu kanambo raret chinniatu thin lujiu bamme, sise kanambo thiurabo-e, palamra paliuse Tingwang lungpom gu kanambo thiu lenpadbo.

Sibosai likligu duipui chami tabotbo khat Iniu ngao-e. Siga thiuhu sibo mengtu ngamlu maidungtu Iniu ngao-e, pazanse pariak chakbo gasu si-e. Paliuse likligu duipui mungga chaplujiu, Tingwang niu paliu khuga pikhaibo tarabung thinlujiu chap bamme.
Tingwang vangpiu Mose lui nai Milypoi lui thiujiu bamme,
“Ngamkambo Tingwang Rapiu yo,
nagu tienkamse dejiukha dilo, khatdi maisuang halo!
Jat hina wangpiu yo,
nagu npui sira dejiukha majilo, khatdi nchanglo!
nagu kendise saoniu din madumak ralo? Masanbo sira naronna-e.
Nagu majibo tienkamse ngaojiu jat hinaniu natu kahumra wangrabo-e.
palamra nagu majibo tienkamse mai hinaniu ngaode.”
Siga chararet chinnia thin bambo maza chinnia fainoi ran-ranbo piulujiu khatdi kachia khen-gakniu paliu ga kheklujiu charaky gasu padle.
Sichiujiu ringbambo khaoring madai ruangga khatniu padlujiu Tingwang lungpomniu phuibambo kachia kuang chinniase mazadung chinnia khuga pikhai mide.
Tingwang gu kendibo nai pumtan gu mikha siniu charaky lungse phuimide, sijengniu kanambo raret chinniase maza chinnia siniu kamloi makthen, mai khatniudi charaky lungga ngut ngamlak mide.
Sibosai charaky ganiu wakhuan katanbo khatniu mazadung chinnia khuga dinbo chiu-e, “Naliu tadlujiu Tingwang lungpom kuang chinniase kadihga runkhai milo.”
Sibosai niabo maza siniu pakuangse duipuiga runkhai mide, siga taduise chamai kashaimai zai kummide, sichiujiu duipuiga kabambo khaoring hina shaimide.
Siga taduitu thinbambo maza siniu din-e, “Oh, Masanbo Rapiu yo, nangra ndadi, nthaidi bambo-e! Nagu ladjan sira majibo-e.
Palamra paliuniu Tingwang maidung nai phaimiukakungmai zaise runkiukhai bide, sichiujiu nangniu sise paliutu pisak khai bide. Haise paliu dam kabuibo si-e!”
Siga rathakbam gasu dinbo I chiu-e, “Rapiu Ngamkambo Tingwang! Nagu ladjan sira majibo-e.”
Sibosai madaibo maza siniu pakuangse naimik riga runkhai mide, siga chamaidung situ pathad siniu ru mathiu khaira suikhaide.
Paliutu pathad siniu machenjiu thiujubo gasu chararet padsude; chiudi paliuniu paliu lungli makjiu, patu thuon nimakjiu Tingwang zantu siang sude.
Paliugu mathad hai thiuju mibo jengniu Tingwang tu paliu siang sude, chiudi paliu tienkam kasabo gasu paliu lungli makge.
Siga mantage, thiuhu khatdi ka-aratbo phaimiukakung mun gasu chagaodung kumbo masan makbo hiupuinadung padbo I ngao-e.
Paliu hai chara kasabogu hiupuinadung-e, sichiujiu tasibodung paliuniu kamme. Tingwang gu Tingmik kadibonai chari thiura paliuniu kadihga lungbammai wangdungtu khom madui rabo-e.
Sibosai chinniabo maza siniu pakuangse tingkai riga runkhai mide, siga charaky lungga chawangbam gasu wakhuan khatniu senpadle, “Haise loimide.”
Siga ting kalikjiu, hengri kalikjiu, tingsin katanbo khatdi kadihpiriga chamaina lungwang lubo sai wadaodi pad matai makbo kathi katanbo khat wang-e.
Siga kadibo namdise jansum thiujiu pangmide, khatdi kadih hina gu namdi hina kam mahakam mide. Siga Tingwang niu kadibo Babylon tu maningtaojiu pagu lungpom jawpiangse patu monkhai bide.
Chapiukak hinadi ngao tamide, khatdi maluong hinadi hakam mide.
Kachak raretse sajubo donniu, Tingwang tu siangmai rigase kachak pum taju ringiu ripbo siniu tingpuk lamsu ntiakkiu rot sude.
Kadihga chawangdungniu patu maluong akhang-aliu thiujiu bamme khatdi sibo jaw siniu kadihpiri pakhiangnatu pisak khaijiu maniu kam mide.

Sibo puise chafai hengtarikbo nai hengmarenbo benlu, kachia tiu-taa khailu, paman kungbo tu, khatdi tiuchang matiu bamme. Sichiujiu akhang-aliu thiubo, ka-aratbo, khatdi kataniabo piang paben-ga pon bamme.
Sichiujiu pasan-ga mahinbo zanse raokhai bamme: “Kadibo Babylon, Kadihga Taniathubo khatdi Kamakhabo Pui.”
Sibo pui siniu Tingwang maidung nai Jesu jengdin thiumai zai saklujiu maniu bambo I ngao-e.
Iniu patu ngaoboga asuang hamide.
Siga maza siniu akhuga din-e, “Nang dekamjiu nasuang hajiulo? Iniu maipuigu khatdi patu phungkinbo thiuhu papee chinnia nai pake kariugu mahinbo rambase nakhuga dinkhai bine.

Sibo thiuhuse pawan khat lungkhai mibo-e, chiudi lungta mibo-e; haisiniu pamalan thiumakbo bam gasu padlujiu kam mahara wangkinbo-e. Sichiujiu kadih damkhai kamak gasu karingbo ariakkhuangga pazan raokhai makmai siniu paliu suang hajiu sibo thiuhu situ phuisune. Haise pakak khatga lungkhai mibo-e, chiudi lungta mibo-e; chiudi haise wanglan rabo-e.
Haise wa kasimainiu makum lubuibo bamme, chiubora papee chinniase luongbut chinnia si-e, sibo riga maipuise ntao bamme. Paliuse chawang chinnia si ye.
Khang mangiura kaomide, tuhoi khatse bamme; sichiujiu khatra pad makha-e, para padjiu pakak khat ronna bamkhai rabo-e.
Sichiujiu pakak khat lungkhai lujiu, chiudi tuhoi lungtamibo thiuhuse tachadbo chawang si-e, pase chawang chinnia ruanggasu padbo-e, patudi kam mahami rabo-e.
Haibo khang kariuse paliu lungchun khatle; paliuniu thiuhu situ paliugu pumtan nai ngambose pikhaine.
Paliuniu Milypoi situ chari thiune, chiudi Milypoi siniu kulumaidung, kadalumaidung khatdi malum maidungtu kulujiu paliutu ngamlu rabo-e; palamra pase chara riga Chara-e, chawang riga Chawang-e.”
Maza siniu akhuga dinlan-e, “Papum kajonpui siniu ntao bambo, nangniu kangaobo taduise jat hina, chamai hina, chakik hina khatdi chakhuan hina si-e.

Nangniu ngaobo pake kariu khatdi thiuhu siniu papum kajonpui situ mareng mine, sichiujiu paliuniu pagu kabambo hinase sutlu rabo-e, paliuniu patu papumruang phutkhai rabo-e; paliuniu patiase tiulujiu, chamiga thonkhaijiu kam mahami rabo-e.
Palamra Tingwang chamse wangtangra paliutu pichun khat thiulujiu thiuhutu pijiu paliu wang thiukhaine; sichiujiu Tingwang ladse wangtang makthen mawang rabo-e.
“Nangniu ngaomibo puise kadihga chawang maidung riga thinjiu bambo kadibo namdi si-e.”
Haibosai, tinggen lamsu maza kakibo khat kiubo I ngao-e. Pakhuga pumtan kadibo bamme, paniu pagu kabenbo siniu kadihpiri pakhiangna thaoben khai-e.
Siga paniu pakhuan tanjiu senpadle: “Kadibo Babylon kao mide! Pahai kao mide! Patuse rasadung, masan makbo hiunadung, khatdi kataniabo nai matai marengbo thingnadung siniu siga lung mide.

Palamra pagu npui-npiu thiubo lungpom jaw siniu jat hinase maniu mide, khatdi kadihga chawangdung siniu patu majang npui-npiu thiubo, khatdi kadihpirigu chali ka-alimai siniu katalabo lunlung gasu kalek wimide,
“Amaidung yo npad milo! Pakhu gasu padmilo!
Naliuniu pagu kamao-kamengbo gase jaomakra, khatdi pariga chararet wangrabodungse
naliu khuga wangmakra pakhu gasu padmilo!
sibo puigu kasabo lunlung situ Tingwang niu maningtao mide.
patu paphijengse pikhai bilo, khatdi paniu kamkhai mibo saisuijiu,
sibo damnia pariga pikhai bilo;
paniu naliu piangse kam tabuat khaibo kumjiu,
sibo damniase paleng tabuat khai bilo.
mathadbo nai chariubose pariga pikhai bilo!
Paronna palung ganiu din-e, “I chawangpui-e, kamipui makge;
I wadaodi magenthiu lakge!
Sijengniu naikhat lunggasu pakhuga, thiuniubo,
chunsa-jengsabo khatdi charakhumse bungjiu wangrabo-e.
Sichiujiu patu hai chaminiu rumi rabo-e;
palamra patu ladjan thiubo piuse, Rapiu Tingwang, kangambo piu-e.”

Patu mathadbose ngaolujiu khatdi patu padam lumachamra pingjiu kadiulam chaplujiu din-e, “Oh, maningkam lakge! Mai kapingbo gu-e! Kadibo Babylon Namdi, pumtan bambo namdi natu, pakak khat lung ganiu ladjan thiuloi mide.”

Paliugu lithakdung sira kachia, rangkang, paman kungbo tu, tiuchang, fainoi kawibo, hengtarikbo fai, takhompui-tai fai, heng-marenbo fai, parim wibo singdungniu, paman kungbo chakuang chapiang, tasing paman kungboniu kamlubo maniadung, tanaagi, chagi, khatdi matiang turaniu kambo maniadung-e.
Sigasu takimen, chagan-rimwi, parim wibo wamud, maruta, jaw, wasa, takhui, chamiu, matom-kabui, kami-mily, chaqon, chaqon-kari, kavang, khatdi chamai pum situ chali alikhai mibo-e.
Sichiujiu chali ka-alimainiu pakhuga din-e, “Nangniu masen masiabo maniadungse nakhuga hamide; khatdi watiu kawibo hina sidi hamide, sise nangniu wadaodi daolan lak mide!”
Haikumbo maniadung thinlujiu pakhugasu kalek lungwimi maidung siniu patu mathadbo situ kaping jengniu kadiulam chap lujiu nkhiamjiu din-e,

“Oh, Kadibo Namdi yo, maningkam lakge. Dejiukha nasan salo! nangniu fainoi heng-tarikbo nai heng-marenbo benlujiu khatdi kachia, rangkang, paman kungbo tu, khatdi tiuchangniu napuan thiulujiu bambo pui, “Dejiukha nasan salo! Dejiuga maningkam lakbo, kapingbo gulo!
Sichiujiu malod khat lungganiu pagu chakhiu-chalan hinase nchum kam mide!”
Khatdi malee karammai, tadui jiuga tad mariujiu chali alikinmai khatdi tad mariujiu kinmai hina siniu kadiulam chap lujiu patu karubo mikhase ngaoboga, paliu khuan tanjiu senpadle:
“Haibo Kadibo Namdi suang kadibo namdi padlak mide.”

Sichiujiu paliuniu paliu piga tabui mara khaijiu senpadle, “Maningkam lakge! Mai kapingbo gu-e! Taduijiuga lungjiu ali kinmai khatdi sigasu kalek wimi maidung hinase nchumkam mide. Pakak khat lung ganiu patu kam maha mide!”

Sigasu chamibungdi matao lanlak mide, khatdi tanao-tanah thiubo khuan chiu lanlak mide; palamra nagu chali ka-alimaidungse kadihpiriga dithu maidung-e, chiudi jat hinatu nagu aratbogu chamik thao kadatbo siniu sonmide.
Haibosai, tinggen lamsu chamai mendi khuan khatniu senwangbo I chiu-e, “Hallelujah! Juringbo, pakendibo, khatdi pumtan aliu Rapiu Tingwang gu-e.

Pagu ladjanse majibo-e, khatdi palingbo-e; Papum kajonpui siniu pagu npui-npiu thiubo, lung katalabo siniu kam taniamibo situ paniu ladjan thiubo-e. Sichiujiu pavangmai zai manse pariga chakhum ruikhai mide.”
Sibosai lonniabo thiujiu din-e, “Hallelujah! Sibo puigu mikhase tingtheng tingtheng khabam milo!”
Siga apaimai makai-je-madaikiu nai ringbambo khaoring madai siniu makhum kiujiu chawangbam riga ntao bambo Tingwang tu kahumjiu din-e, “Amen! Hallelujah!”
Siga chamai mendi khuan kum, langra khuan kum, tingsinbo khuan kumbo khatniu dinbo I chiu-e. “Hallelujah! Aliu Rapiu Tingwang Ngamkambo siniu Chawang thiu mide!
Aliu chunwijiu mathakhe, khatdi paken dibo situ thuonkhe. Milypoi gu magiangbo wanse wangmide, sichiujiu naopaopui siniudi kaden loimide.
Sichiujiu kakabo, masanbo, Kawibo fainoi benra patu pimide. (Kawibo fainoi sira masan maigu tacheng matipbo tienkam si-e).
Siga Iniu patu kahumra paphiga makhum kiude, chiudi paniu akhuga din-e, “Nang sichiu tulo: Ira nakamai, Jesu jengdin thiukinbo patu macha macham bambo-e. Tingwang tu kahumlo!
Palamra Jesu gu jengdin sira phaimiukakung maitu kathuat khaibo cham si-e
Pamikse chamipuang kumme, papeega chawang pirun kengkha bamme; siga pazan raokhai bambose paronna sangnu, mai khat niudi simakge.
Pafai-panise tazainiu rimkam mide, pazanse “Tingwang Ladkeng,” chiu-e.
Tinggen riphen dungse kakabo khatdi masanbo fainoi piulujiu chaqon kakabo tuanglujiu pasai suikin-e.
Paniu maidungtu chari thiura pamun gasu pamun liangbo apang-heng padle, sichiujiu paniu paliutu chagi thunniu senrabo-e; khatdi Ngamkambo Tingwang lungpomgu mumsy thunbo bamga tao malui bamme.
Khatdi pafai-pani rigadi, pahingpom rigadi, “Chawang Riga Chawang, khatdi Chara Riga Chara” chiubo zan raokhai bamme.
Naliuniu, chawang maidung, charipi maidung, chaqondung, khatdi chaqon tongmaidung, kavangmai khatdi khenrang thiumai, kati-kadi hina jan tiura leng wanglo.”
