Sibosai thiuhu, kadihga chawangdung, khatdi paliu riphendung siniu chaqon riga tongkinbo nai pagu riphendungtu chari thiura wang maduibotu I ngao-e.

Thiuhu nai pamaga tasibo ngam kambo aratbo phaimiukakung situ minlude; thiuhugu madan siniu kam tasikhaibo maitu khatdi sibo meng kahum maidungtu son mide. Panaitu minlujiu tatu taobambo mijai lunggase taliangkhai mide.
Khatdi kamasiakbo hinatu chaqon riga tongkinbo piu mun gasu padbo apangheng siniu bishat mide; sichiujiu simaidung zanse thingnadungniu paliu tiuni tiujiu bamme.
Sibosai tinggen lamsu kiubo maza khatniu paben-ga pamalan habo chakhomki khamten nai chagiriang kadibo khat thinlu kiubo I ngao-e.
Paniu mantage, kaniu tanpao, Devil maksai Satan situ minlujiu tingkum sang khat leng ratlujiu, pamalan habo chakhomki gase taliang khai mide.
Siga takum sang khat loimak then jatdung situ sonlan makra khamten khailujiu pariga madan diangkhai mide. Sichiujiu pakak khatleng patu lepad sune.
(Kakibo kashaimaidung sira tingkum sang khatse tangmak then ringlu lakge). Haise ringsu karaibo si-e.

Ringsu karaibo dam daolumaise padon wi-e, paliutu dijiu thoikhaibi rabo-e. Simai riga shailon niabogu pumtanse paliu khuga hamide. Sichiujiu paliura Tingwang nai Khrista gu singku thiurabo-e, khatdi tingkum sang khatse paliuniu patu majang lujiu mawang mine.
Tingkum sang khat loimibo saiga patu bangkhai bambo gasu Satan situ lepad khaine.
Sichiujiu kadih pake madaiga bam maidung, Gog nai Magog tu sonra paniu tadpad rabo-e. Satan siniu chari thiura maidung situ duipuiga nbuiniang jiukha kumjiu khom maduiwang rabo-e.
Sichiujiu paliu kadihpiriga mara padjiu Tingwang maidungniu bambo khatdi paniu lungsabo namditu chap maguilude. Chiudi tinggen lamsu chami ntiak kiujiu paliutu ruthon mide.

Sigasu paliutu sonbopiu Satan situ chami nai chaganmipiu tao bambo mijai gase thonkhai mide, siga thiuhu nai ka-aratbo phaimiu sidi bamme, sichiujiu paliutu tingtheng tingtheng nchun n-nien saomakjiu mathad khai rabo-e.

Siga kashai maidung kati, kadi tammakjiu chawangbam suanggase chapbambo I ngao-e, Siga ariakkhuangdung lepad khai bamme, sibosai ringbo ariakkhuang lepadle. Sibo ariakkhuangga raokhaibo paliu tienkam saisuijiu paliutu ladjan thiu bamme.
Sichiujiu duipui siniu palungga bambo kashaibo situ pipad sude. Charuidih siniudi paliu khuga bambo kashaimai situ pipad sude, sichiujiu paliu mai hinatu paliu tienkam saisuijiu ladjan thiune.
Sibosai kashaibo nai charuidih tu chamijai gase thonkhai mide. (Haibo mijaise shailon niabo si-e).
Sichiujiu mai khat kumbo situ karingbo ariakkhuangga pazan raokhaimak bamniusai, patuse chami jaiga thonkhaimi rabo-e.
Iniu Masanbo Namdi Jerusalem kasanbo gasu naopaopui khatniu papuan khailujiu pakinatu daorabo kumjiu Tingwang khugasu kiubo I ngao-e.

Sichiujiu chawang bam gasu katanbo khuan khat senpadbo I chiu-e. Phuilo, Tingwang gu kahumbo kyse chamai khuga bamme, paniu paliutu majang bamjiu paliuse pamai thiune. Sichiujiu Tingwang niu paliu khuga bamjiu, paliugu Tingwang thiune.
Siga paniu paliu mik gasu paliu matuise nunsang khaine, siga kashaibo, kap-kiambo, magenthiu chariubo maksai thiuniubo bamlan lakge. Karaibo mania hinase hamide.
Sigasu chawangbam riga ntao bambo piuniu din-e, “Phuilo, mania hina Iniu kam kasan kam mide!” Paniu akhuga din-e, “Haise raolulo, haibo chamse malum kabuibo khatdi majibo-e.”
Paniu din-e, “Loimide! Ira Alpha nai Omega si-e, karaibo nai kanabo-e. Karingbo duipin ganiu charimai situ Iniu matha pikhai bine.”
Chari ngamlubo maidung siniu haise akhu gasu daolune: Sichiujiu Iniu pa Rawang thiune, khatdi paniu anahpiu thiune.

Chiudi pingtanmai, kasamai, lung katanuakmai, chamaitu gimai. npui-npiu thiumai, chamik thao kadatmai, charamengtu kahummai, khatdi ka-aratmai hina tura chami nai chaganmipiu siniu taobambo mijaiga thonkhaimi rabo-e, sise shailon niabo si ye.
Sichiujiu kanambo raret chinnia niu phuibambo, kuang chinnia thinbambo maza chinnia ruangga khatniu atu kujiu din-e, “Hailam wanglo, Milypoigu naopaopui situ nakhuga lenkhai bine.”
Sichiujiu hiupuina siniu atu thinman lujiu maluong kakubo riga ponkhang khaide. Siga paniu atu Tingwang kendiniu ben bambo Jerusalem, Masanbo Namdi, tinggen dih gasu kiubo akhuga lenkhai-e.
Khatdi Tingwang maken kadibo siniu benjiu bamme. Sibo namdise tatu paman kakungbo kum, talatu kum, khatdi likligi kum masing kalik bamme.

Sibo singbangse di-e, khatdi ku-e, pagu rengmunse kariu-je-niakiu bamme, khatdi rengmun hinaga mazadung kariu-je-niakiu bamme. Sichiujiu rengmun rigase Israel mai kiphiu kariu-je-niakiu zan raokhai bamme.
Rengmun sum sum bamme: tingbanglam sum, tingnulam sum, tingpilam sum, tingrunlam sum chiujiu bamme.
Sichiujiu katiang kariuje-niakiu somkhaibo gase namdigu karengse thiukhai-e, sibo riga Milypoi nagu ladlangtadmai khang kariuje-niakiu zanse raokhai bamme.
Sichiujiu atu npaobo maza khuga namdi situ khatdi rengmun nai singbengse madat raleng kachianiu kambo tang bamme.

Sibo namdi detgu pake madaise macham ramme, pathen padet nchamme, khatdi pakod machamme. maza siniu namdi situ madatboga mathakbam sangnia-je-kai madai padle, sise pathen padet, khatdi pakodse nchamme.
maza siniu sibo singbeng situ madat suboga, sise tachao kai-je-makai padle.
Sibo singbengse talatu niu kamme, sichiujiu namdise kachia masanbo likli kumboniu kamme.
Namdigu rengdi tiangse tatu paman kakungbo siniu karu khai-e. Sichiujiu raithubo tiangse talatu, niabose kamajaibotu; sumbose ababotu, madaibose kamaobotu.

Mangiubose hengmarenbotu, charukbose tabaipum, chinniabose hengtarikbo-tu, tachadbose ngaotaronbo-tu, chakiubose majinbo-tu, kariubose kapuangbo-tu, kariu-je-khatbose kapubo-tu, khatdi kariu-je-niakiubose katikbo-tu siniu karu khai-e.
Sichiujiu rengmun kariu-je-niakiuse tiuchang kariu-je-niakiu kamme, khatdi rengmun hinase tiuchang khat khatniu kamme. Namdi npuise masanbo kachia maliangjiu likli masanbo ganiu ngao taronbo kumme.
Sibo namdi gase Iniu charaky ngao makge, palamra Rapiu Tingwang Ngamkambo nai Milypoise sibo raky ye.
Sibo namdiga chahiu, naimik biu pageng ha-e, palamra Tingwang gu kendibo siniu thaoben bamme, khatdi Milypoi siniu chamibung thiune.
Jat hina gasu ranlu maidungniu, sibo nbiuga tadmariu bamne, khatdi kadihrigu chawangdungniu, siga paliugu chakhiu-chalan phungwangne.
Sibo rengmunse n-nien marinpuiting katheng-kadun lekhaijiu bamme, khatdi siga nchun bammakge.
Sibo namdi gase jat hinaniu kendibo nai chakhiu-chalanse phungwang rabo-e.
Chiudi masan kamakmai, kamangambo ngam kammai, khatdi ka-aratmai situ siga pingut lakge; chiudi Milypoigu karingbo ariakkhuangga paliu zan raokhai lumai ronna siga ngut rabo-e.

Sibo singgiu siniu namdi n-gangga luong bamme, siga chahiu machang pasy masibo, takum khatga malod kariu-je-niakiu masibo, karingbo singbang bamme; sichiujiu sibo singniwdungse jat hinagu thiuniubo wikhaira leng-e.
Sibo namdiga Tingwang gu tasiang wadi daolan lakde.
Sibo namdiga Tingwang nai Milypoi gu chawangbamse bamme, siga pavang maidungniu patu kahumjiu bamme.
Paliuniu pazu ngaone, khatdi paliu san-ga pazan raokhai birabo-e.

Siga nchun bamlan lakde, Sichiujiu paliuniu chamibung nai naimik biuse pageng bamlan lakde, palamra Rapiu Tingwang niu paliugu nbiuse thiurabo-e, sichiujiu paliuse tingthengjiu chawangdung kumjiu lungne.

Sibosai maza siniu akhuga din-e, “Haibo ladkengdungse malumbuibo, khatdi majibo-e. Sichiujiu phaimiukakung maidung khuga pagu maza pikhaibo Rapiu Tingwang niu majadjiu padmi rabose pavangmai khuga lenkhai raleng, pagu mazatu langkhaibo-e.”
Jesu niu din-e “Phuilo, I wang maji kin-e! Haibo ariakkhuangga bambo phaimiukakung chamdung majai kalumaise padon wi-e!”
Pakhiangna hai John, Iniu chiu lubo-e khatdi ngaolubo-e. Sichiujiu Iniu chiulubo nai ngaolubo saiga, atu lenkhaibo maza situ kahumra I makhum kiu-e.
Chiudi paniu akhuga din-e, “Sichiu tulo! Idi nakumjiu kavangmai khatle, khatdi nasingnamai phaimiukakung mai khatle, haibo ariakkhuang ladkengtu majai kabam mai khatle. Tingwang tu kahumlo!”
Khatdi paniu akhuga din-e, “Haibo ariakkhuangga phaimiukakung chamdungse mahimmi tulo, palamra haidungse wangtangra pawanse namide.
Sichiujiu nchang kamakmai siniu, nchang makjiu bammi sulo; khatdi kataniamai siniu, taniajiu bammi sulo; khatdi kawimaise wibammi sulo, khatdi masanmai siniu, masanjiu bammi sulo.”
Ira karaibo nai kanambo si-e, khatdi paphibang nai kaloibo si-e.
Karingbo singbang rasyse tiura khatdi namdigu rengmun-ga ngutra paliu fai-ni katha masanlu maidungse paliu donwi-e.

Chiudi namdi lenlam sira lungtanuak maidung, chamik thao kadat maidung, makha-a-ga maidung, maitu gimaidung, charamengtu kahum maidung, khatdi paliu ladkeng gadi, tienkam gadi ka-aratmaidung hina bamne.
Haise chiulumai hinaniudi dinlo, “Wanglo!” Charijiu bammai hinaniu ringbo duise, paman thiumakjiu wang sak lulo.

Khatdi mai khatniu haibo phaimiukakung ariakkhuangga bambo ladkeng kasia luthon misai, Tingwang niudi karingbo singbang nai Masanbo Namdi ganiu pirabo, haibo ariakkhuangga raokhai bambose padam gasu lupadmi rabo-e.
Hai pakhiangnagu jengdin thiukhaibo piuniu din-e, “Yo, pachang-e! I wangji kin-e!” Amen.
Wangsulo, Rapiu Jesu!
Rapiu Jesu gu lungsiat siniu mai hinatu majang bambo thiumilo.
